text: UNOGADA onqabe ukugwaza ngembuzi enduneni eyamfaka emsebenzini, wenqaba nokufaka ushevu ezimotweni zabanye abasebenzi ukuze kube sengathi bangamasela baxoshwe emsebenzini, ugqenywe izingozi ekhanda nasesiphongweni yile nduna, wabomvu yigazi.UMnuz Felamandla Dlamini (38) waseMgungundlovu, uthe ugqenywa lezi zingozi ngensimbi yinduna yakhe uMnuz Siya Mhloshana epulazini abasebenza kulo iBaynesfield eThornville, eMgungundlovu.UDlamini usevulele induna yakhe icala ngalokhu.“Bengisathathe ikhefu ngidla isidlo sasemini ngenkathi induna ifika kimina ingishutha. Ngiyibuzile ukuthi ingishuthelani, yangithuka yakhipha insimbi emotweni ebihamba ngayo yangishaya ngayo ekhanda,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe uphuthunyiswe kudokotela omthunge izitishi eziyinqwaba ekhanda ngenxa yokuvuleka kwezingozi agqenywe zona.Ngokusho kukaDlamini, sekunesikhathi le nduna yaqala ukumcupha ngalezi zinkulumo kodwa enqabe.“Nganqaba ukufaka ushevu ezimotweni ezisetshenziswa o(ebagagula ngamagama) ngoba ngangisaba ukuthi uma sebephelelwa wumsebenzi, imindeni yabo izongibulala,” echaza.Uthe ngenkathi le nduna ibona ukuthi akayingeni eyokugwaza ngembuzi neyokufaka ushevu ezimotweni zabanye babasebenzi, yathi akayizamele isibhamu i-AK47, noma i-9mm.“Yangitshela ukuthi kukhona efuna ukumdubula, yathi uma ngihluleka ukwenza engitshele kona, kuzomele ngiyizamele okungenani izibhamu ngakithi eTugela Ferry eMsinga ngoba ziningi,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe nalapbo wayichitha induna wathi yena akakwazi lokho futhi akahlangene nendaba yezibhamu.UDlamini uthe kwenzeka konke lokho nje, ubembikela umqashi wakhe ngokushiwo uMhloshana kuyena, umqashi athi akangamnaki.Eziphendulela uMhloshana, uvumile ukuthi wamshutha uDlamini, nokuthi umgqeme nangensimnbi.Uthe ukumshutha kwakhe wayefuna ukuba nobufakazi bokuthi wamfica ehlezi phansi esikhundleni sokuthi ngabe uyazungeza njengonogada epulazini abasebenza kulo, kwazise ziningi izigebengu.Mayelana nokushaya uDlamini ngensimbi, uthe naye wayezivikela ngoba insimbi yiyona eyaba seduzane emuva kokuthi uDlamini wayemfingqele izibhakela.UMhloshana uziphikile ezinye izinsolo ezishiwo nguDlamini ngaye. Uthe uqanjelwa amanga.Umnikazi wepulazi ozibize ngoPeter, uthe uyalwazi lolu daba kodwa ucela ukungaphawuli ngalo ngoba olwangaphakathi, alumdingi omunye umuntu wangaphandle.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.“Owesilisa (38) kuthiwa ushaywe ngensimbi ekhanda esemsebenzini kuNtembeni Road, eBaynesfield. Kuvulwe icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza esiteshini samaphoyisa eThornville,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Uthe sekuboshwe owesilisa (28) ngaleli cala.
title: Ugqenywe ingozi yinduna enqaba ukugwaza ngembuzi

text: OSAZIWAYO sebenxuse ukuthi zingathengwa izimpahla zesitolo sakwaH&M, ngemuva kokuthi ngoMsombuluko lesi sitolo sifake isikhangiso somfana omnyama egqoke ijezi elibhalwe ukuthi “The coolest monkey in the jungle” okungahunyushwa ngokuthi Inkawu ehlakaniphe kunazo zonke ehlathini.Lesi sikhangiso sicasule abaningi basola isitolo ngokucwasa ngokwebala kusetshenziswa lo mfanyana.Abanikazi besitolo besheshe basikhipha isitatimende baxolisa ngaso. Bathe bayaxolisa kubo bonke abathintekayo ngesikhangiso futhi ijezi ebeligqokwe wumfana ngeke litholakale ezitolo zakuleli.Kodwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu baveze ukuphoxeka kwabo ngalesi sikhangiso. Nosaziwayo okukhona kubo uSomizi Mhlongo, Minnie Dlamini-Jones noKwesta baveze ukungenami kwabo.USomizi uthe akaze asithande lesi sitolo selokhu safika kuleli.“Okokuqala abakaze bakhombise ukuthi bangabantu abadayisela abantu bebala emikhankasweni yabo e-Afrika. Manje sekuyilokhu. Asibakhombise amandla enkawu ngokuthi singathengi,” kubhala uSomizi.UMinnie kucace bha ukuthi iyamcasula le ndaba njengoba evele wathi: “Abahambe bayoshona.”UKwesta uthe unazo izimpahla zakulesi sitolo futhi usethathe isinqumo sokuzishisa. “Ngizozishisa ekuseni,” kubhala uKwesta.UCassper Nyovest uthe ngeke aphinde athenge kulesi sitolo.Ngisho abaculi baphesheya kwezilwandle okukhona kubo uThe Weeknd noP Diddy bakhombise ukuphoxeka ngalesi sikhangiso. umshayisibhakela odumile uFloyd Mayweather uvele washintsha umbhalo obusesikibheni wabhala ukuthi Ngimnyama futhi ngimuhle.
title: Ulaka lwabantu ngesakwaH&M

text: KWABIKEZELWA wumphrofethikazi ngonyaka owandulela esazalwa ngawo, ukuzalwa kweSilo esikhotheme Inkosi Goodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.Lokhu kuvele emlandweni ngeMbube oshicilelwe uMntwana Thulani Zulu ekhasini lakhe ku-Facebook. UMdlokombane (72) ubeyindlalifa yeSilo sakwaKhethomthandayo uBhekuzulu kaSolomon esimthole  kuNdlunkulu wesibili, uThomozile Gezangani Ndwandwe ngo-1948.Kuthiwa umphrofethikazi wakwaMagasela wafika esigodlweni kwaDlamahlahla ngo-1947 evela eGauteng wabikezela ukuthi uNdlunkulu uThomozile uzothola umntwana kodwa kwakungamele amphathe noma amncelise. Kuthiwa lo mphrofethikazi waboniswa uNdlunkulu okaMpahleni waseMatshalini ukuthi wuye owayezoba wumzanyane akhulise iMbube, okuvela ukuthi lokhu kwashaqisa abaningi endlunkulu ngoba undlunkulu owakhethwa ukukhulisa umntwana wayewumuntu owayesephila namahlalakhona, impilo yakhe intekenteke kanti  kuthiwa wakhothama ngemuva kokugcotshwa kukaMdlokombane  ngo-1971. Izindaba zefu elimnyama eligubuzele uZulu, zimenyezelwe ngokusemthethweni  wuNdunankulu kaZulu umntwana uMangosuthu Buthelezi ngoLwesihlanu, okushiye indlunkulu nesizwe sonke silila.BekuyiNgonyama yesishiyagalombili ukubusa isizwe samaZulu selokhu sabunjwa yiSilo saKwaDukuza, uShaka Zulu phakathi kweminyaka u-1816  no-1828.IMbube yinkosi yesibili emhlabeni jikelele ukubusa isikhathi eside njengoba isihlale esihlalweni iminyaka engu-49 ilandela ngemuva iNdlovukazi yamaNgisi. ISilo sigcotshwe ngokusemthethweni ngoDisemba ka-1971 ngemuva kokukhothama kukayise, owakhothama ngo-1968.  Emuva kokukhothama kweSilo uBhekuzulu, oNgangezwe kuthiwa wathukuswa eSt Helena iminyaka emithathu. Isihlalo safudunyezwa wuyise omncane uMntwana u-Israel Mcwayizeni kaSolomon ongasekho, wabuya eseneminyaka engu-21 ukuzothatha isihlalo sobukhosi.Ngesikhathi sokubusa kwayo, iMbube igqugquzele isiko lokuhlolwa kwezintombi njengoba kunomgubho waminyaka yonke, obizwa ngoMkhosi Womhlanga, oba  sesigodlweni eNyokeni. Sabuyisa noMkhosi wokweShwama, lapho amabutho ebulala inkunzi yenkomo ngokuyisonta intamo. Kuthe ngo- 2009 abalwelwa amalungelo ezilwane baphikisa leli siko, beveza ukuthi izilwane zibulawa ngesihluku kodwa ngo-2018 laphinde lenziwa.Ngo-2009 siphumele obala iSilo sanxenxa abesilisa ukuthi basoke, kusetshenziswe izindlela zokusoka eziphephile ezigqugquzelwa aboMnyango wezeMpilo.NgoJanuwari 2012 ngesikhathi sikhuluma emgubheni  ka-133 weMpi yaseSandlwana,  iSilo saphumela obala sagxeka ukuthandana kwabantu bobulili bunye, okwagxekwa yizinhlangano ezabathandana nobulili obufanayo nenhlangano elwela amalungelo abantu. INdlunkulu kaZulu yaveza ukuthi isitatimende soNgangezwe sahumusheka ngokungesikhona njengoba wayeqonde ukuveza ukukhathazeka kwakhe ngezigameko zokuhlukumeza ngokocansi kubalwa nabahlukumezekayo abakulolu hlobo lothando.IKhomishini yamaLungelo Abantu kuleli ngo- 2016, yagxeka iSilo Samabandla ngesitatimende esasenza emcimbini owawusoPhongolo ngo-2015 ngesikhathi  sithi abokufika mababuyele emazweni akubo, okwahumesheka kwabaningi njengokuphaka impi. Kodwa iSilo sagcizelela ukuthi asikaze sisho ukuthi mabahlaselwe, sasiveza ukuthi abakuleli ngokungemthetho mababuyiselwe kwelakubo ngoba bafike bangaziphathi kahle kuleli.OkaBhushobukhali uhlonishwe ngeziqu zobudokotela yi- University of Zululand ngo-1994 emkhakheni othinta ezolimo. Ngo-1999 uphinde wahlonishwa ngeziqu ezifanayo kwezomthetho yiCoker College of South Carolina. Ngo-2011 wagcotshwa waba yiShansela e-ML Sultan Technikon KwaZulu-Natal. Ube wuShansela wophiko olukuleli  lwenyuvesi yase-USA, iNewport University.  Incwadi ngempilo yeSilo ethi; King of Goodwill  yashicilelwa ngo-2003.ISilo sakhuluma engqungqutheleni yamabandla, i-Synagogue of all Nations eLagos, eNigeria ngo-2004 ngokubaluleka kokuhwebelana noxolo. Besingomunye wabaholi abebephumela obala ngokubuyiselwa komhlaba kubantu abamnyama, besihleze sibeka eqhulwini ukubaluleka kwemfundo entsheni yakuleli.Sishiye emhlabeni ondlunkulu abayisithupha okuwuSibongile, uMaDlamini wasesigodlweni KwaKhethomthandayo, uBuhle KaMathe wasesigodlweni KwaDlamahlahla, uMantfombi Dlamini wasesigodlweni KwaKhangelamankengane, uThandekile Ndlovu wasesigodlweni KwaLinduzulu, uNompumelelo Mchiza wasesigodlweni eNyokeni noZola Zelusiwe Mafu. ISilo besibusela esigodlweni oSuthu.ISilo sinamazinyane angu-27. Ukukhothama koNgangezwe kwandulelwe ukusocongwa kwezinyane laso uMntwana uLethukuthula okhothame ngoNovemba nyakenye. Ubengomunye wamadodana eSilo amadala.
title: Kwabikezelwa ukuzalwa kukaMdlokombane

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUI SINGENA kweyokwethulwa kwezinhlelo inkakha yomdidiyeli womculo uRobbie Malinga ezoba nohlelo lwayo lwezingxoxo maduze.URobbie, osezakhele igama ngokudidiyela izingoma zikaNtando Bangani, Brown Dash, DJ Sbu, Naima Kay noZahara kuthiwa kulezi zinsuku umatasa uqopha uhlelo lwezingxoxo olubizwa nge
Chillas With Robbie Malinga.Umthombo opotshozele 
Isolezwe uthe sekuqoshwe iziqephu ezingu-11 zohlelo kanti ezinye zizoqoshwa uma seluqalile ukubonakala kuthelevishini.“Uhlelo kuthiwa luzokhonjiswa ku-SABC 1. Kuzoba wuhlelo olumnandi impela engicabanga ukuthi abantu bazoluthakasela. URobbie ulwenza nosomahlaya uSkhumba. Baluqophela e-car wash eseSoweto. Kufika osaziwayo abehlukene bezowasha izimoto bese exoxa nabo ngempilo yabo,” kusho umthombo ocele ligodlwe igama lawo ngoba i-SABC 1 ayikalumemezeli ngokusemthethweni uhlelo.Uqhube wathi uSkhumba ubuza noma yini futhi ayiphendule ibe yihlaya.“Akubhaliwe phansi ukuthi kumele babuze ini. Bakhuluma ngokufika ekhanda ngaleso sikhathi,” kuqhuba umthombo.Uthe phakathi kwabantu abaziwayo okulindeleke ukuthi bavele kubalwa uZahara, uJabu Mahlangu (Pule) owaduma kuChiefs, uNgqongqoshe wezemiDlalo nezokuNgcebeleka kuzwelonke uFikile Mbalula nabanye.Ngesikhathi leli phephandaba lihlangana noRobbie ngempelasonto kumaMetro FM Music Awards wale waphetha ukukhuluma ngalo.“Akukho engingakusho,” kusho uRobbie.Okubuye kwaqinisa izinsolo zokuthi uhlelo lusendleleni yisithombe asifaka enkundleni yokuxhumana i-Instagram lapho eme khona noSkhumba.Wabhala ukuthi abantu abagade izinhlelo zethelevishini ngeke zisafana.Okhulumela iSABC, uKaizer Kganyago, uthe akazi lutho ngohlelo.
title: URobbie ohlelweni lwezingxoxo?

text: KUZOKWENZIWA umfuziselo wethusi weSilo samaBandla uGoodwill Zwelithini nowayenguMengameli wokuqala wentando yeningi uDkt Nelson Mandela eMitchell Park, eThekwini.Le mifuziselo izokwakhiwa ngemuva kokuthi umhlangano wamakhansela alawula uMkhandlu weTheku ngoLwesibili ugunyaze ukuthi yakhiwe.Le mifuziselo izokwakhiwa iSivanda World Peace and Community Development Foundation okuyiyona ezothwala wonke umsebenzi kubalwa nezindleko kanti umkhandlu wona uzobe uqaphe umsebenzi.Ngokombiko owethulwe emhlanganweni ngoLwesibili, ukwakhiwa komfuziselo weSilo kuhloswe ngawo ukubungaza njengoba iMbube isiqede iminyaka engu-45 isesihlalweni.Isilo samaBandla isona esesihlale esihlalweni isikhathi eside uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye Izilo emlandweni weNdlunkulu kaZulu.Umsunguli weSivananda Wolrd Peace and Community Development Foundation, uMnuz Ishwar Ramlutchun, obuye abizwe ngoMntwana uMabheke osondelene kakhulu neSilo uthe lo mfuziselo kulindeleke ukuthi ube usuphelile ukwenziwa ngoSepthemba.Uthe ngeke aze azidalule izindleko zalo msebenzi.“Ngalo msebenzi sihlose ukuveza ukujula komlando wesifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natal esinezinhlanga ezixubile, lapho kukhona umlando wamaZulu, amaNdiya namakhaladi,” kusho uRamlutchun.Uthe lo mfuziselo uzosebenza njengesibonelo sokukhombisa ukubuyisana, ukubekezelelana nokuzibophezela kwalabo abalwela inkululeko ukuze iNingizimu Afrika ibe nentando yeningi.Khonamanjalo, Isilo sizobe sinomcimbi lapho sizobe sigubha iminyaka engu-70, sazalwa esigodlweni saso eNyokeni KwaNongoma kusasa.Ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi sigubha iminyaka engu-69, imbube yathi ifuna imigubho yalo nyaka ibe mikhulu kakhulu.
title: Kuzokwenziwa umfuziselo weSilo

text: OWESIFAZANE (47) ushayiswe yibhasi wafa ezama ukuwela umgwaqo uMngeni eThekwini, izolo ekuseni.Kuthiwa ubenganakile ewela umgwaqo ngesikhathi kuqhamuka ibhasi yaseKZN Metro Bus yamshayisa. Ufele khona lapho.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso.“Amaphoyisa aseDurban Central aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso. Ngokophenyo olusenziwe ngabo-7 ekuseni, owesifazane oneminyaka engu-47 ushayiswe yibhasi ezama ukuwela umgwaqo eMngeni ngasesiteshini sesitimela,” kusho uCapt Gwala.Kuthiwa ingozi iholele ekuthini kube nesiminyaminya sezimoto emgwaqweni kusalindwe imoto yezidumbu.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kamufi ayizange iphumelele izolo njengoba bekusalindwe abomndeni wakhe ukuba bezokhomba isidumbu ngokusemthethweni.
title: Ushayiswe yibhasi washona ewela umgwaqo

text: SIZOVALWA wu-Aldrin Sampear isikhala esishiywe wuBongi Gwala kwiSAfm.Izolo uNksz Kina Nhlengethwa ongumphathi siteshi weSAfm osabambile uthe kusukela ngoJanuwari 4, uhlelo lwantambama kulesi siteshi luzoshayelwa ngu-Aldrin.Lolu hlelo obelwaziwa ngokuthi iThe Talking Point seluzobizwa ngeBeyond the Headline uma selusakazwa  ngu-Aldrin ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu ngo-3 kuya ku-6 ntambama.UBongi Gwala ushiye kwiSAfm ekupheleni kuka-Okthoba kanti abalandeli bakhe bazwakalisa ukushaqeka okukhulu kwazise wabashiya bengalindele.U-Aldrin akamusha kwezokusakaza kwazise uyintatheli ebuye isakaze izinhlelo ezihlukene emsakazweni nakuthelevishini.Njengamanje u-Aldrin usakaza kwiPower FM.“Sijabule kakhulu ukwamukela uSampear kwiSAfm ngoba uza nolwazi olunzulu lwezokusakaza. Ungumethuli wezinhlelo zethelevishini nezomsakazo. Kuyimanje usakaza uhlelo olubizwa nge-African Perspective olukhonjiswa njalo ngoLwesithathu ebusuku kuSABC3,” kusho uNksz Nhlengethwa.Uthe ukufika kuka-Aldrin kuzokhombisa abantu ukuthi iSAfm izohlale igqamile, iletha izingxoxo ezihlabahlosile ezizokwandisa isibalo sabalaleli.Izolo u-Aldrin uthe u-2020 umphuce izinto azithandayo kodwa ubuye wamnika okuningi.“Nsukuzonke ngihlale ngibona okusha empilweni yami. Ngiwumkhiqizo weNingizimu Afrika nabantu bayo. Ngiyabonga kuwo wonke umuntu onginika ithuba. Lena eyethu. #SAfmBTH,” kusho u-Aldrin.Izolo abalandeli beSAfm bathe bayakujabulela ukuthi isikhala sikaBongi sizovalwa ngu-Aldrin ngoba naye ungumuntu okhaliphile.Omunye umlaleli uDa Vice Phele uthe:  “Nikhipha umlilo ngomunye umlilo. Siyakwamukela Aldrin Sampear.”UPhelokazi Bhelekazi StarMpresh Mbete ukhale ngokuthi uBongi Gwala wanyamalala bengalindele, akasalulaleli uhlelo lwakhe kodwa mhlawumbe lo mfana (Aldrin) uzomenza abuye ngoba uyawazi umsebenzi wakhe.
title: Usezosakaza kwiSAfm u-Aldrin Sampear

text: KUPHENYWA umsebenzi wasemtholampilo wasoThobothini, eJozini, osolwa ngokweba imishanguzo yokuthithibalisa igciwane lengculazi, ama-Antiretrovirals (ARVs).Kuthiwa lo msebenzi ubhadanywe ngonogada basemtholampilo iThobothini Community Health Centre (CHC) ephuma nemishanguzo yokuthithibalisa igciwane lengculazi, eyofuba, neyomfutho ophezulu wegazi.Umthombo ongaphakathi kulesi sikhungo uthe lo msebenzi okuthiwa usophikweni olubhekele ezabasebenzi nokuwulo olushushisa abasebenzi abasuke betholakale besephutheni, ubephuma emtholampilo ngoLwesibili ngesikhathi ebanjwa nale mishanguzo.Uthe lokhu yikho okwenze abanye abasebenzi basale beshaqekile ngesikhathi etholakala nale mishanguzo.Umthombo uthe lo msebenzi utholakale nezitsha eziyisikhombisa ebeziqukethe ama-ARVs waphinde watholakala nemishanguzo yofuba neyomfutho wegazi.“Onogada bebesesha iveni ebelihamba lo msebenzi njengoba kwenziwa nakwezinye izimoto uma zingena noma ziphuma emtholampilo.Bebeyiseshile ngesikhathi ingena wangasho ukuthi kunemishanguzo ayiphethe kodwa kwathi uma esephuma kwatholakala evenini abehamba ngalo phansi kwesihlalo imishanguzo eminingi yayo kungama-ARVs,” kusho umthombo.Uthe bekungekhona okokuqala ukuthi umsebenzi abanjwe eba le mishanguzo. Ngokusho kwakhe kunabasebenzi abahamba icala mayelana nodaba olufanayo futhi kuthiwa kunomunye umsebenzi okuke kwavela ukuthi ubewadayisela izikhungo ezizimele.Lo msebenzi uthe bakhathazekile ngalesi sigameko nezinye. Uthe ngokuthola kwabo abantu abadayisa le mishanguzo bayidayisa ngemali enkulu njengoba ethe omunye wake waveza ukuthi ibhodlela elilodwa linguR1400. Omunye umthombo uthe okubamangazayo ukuthi le mishanguzo itholakale esikhenkeni evenini ebelihamba lo msebenzi nokubenza bazibuze ngezinsolo abekwe zona njengoba naye azi ukuthi kuyaseshwa njalo uma umuntu ephuma noma engena emtholampilo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Ncumisa Mafunda uthe ngeke bakwazi ukuphawula kabanzi ngalolu daba njengoba lusingethwe ngabomthetho.“UMnyango awukwazi ukuphawula ngalolu daba ngoba lusezandleni zabomthetho. UMnyango ungakuqinisekisa futhi ukuthi lolu daba luzophenywa ngaphakathi emnyangweni,” kusho uNksz Mafunda.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa esiteshi samaphoyisa saseNgwavuma avule icala lokweba. Uthe kulindeleke ukuthi lolu daba ludluliselwe kumshushisi ukuze kuthathwe isinqumo mayelana nokushushiswa kwalo.
title: Ubanjwe ephuma nama-ARV ngeveni

text: USEPHENDUKE inkomo edla yodwa umshumayeli webandla laMaNazaretha ohlangothini lwaseBuhleni, okhala ngokuthi ukhishwa inyumbazana ngoba wakhuluma nabaseThembezinhle.UMnuz Felezwini Zakwe, odabuka eMsinga, uphethe isikhundla sokuba ngumshumayeli wohambo, okuchaza ukuthi uhambela amathempeli ahlukene, ashumayele khona. Imvamisa kwabaseThembezinhle nabaseBuhleni abadli ogqokweni lunye njengoba kunombango wobuholi usaqhubeka ezinkantolo phakathi kwabo.UZakwe ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi uhambisana nenkosi uMduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu, uqale ukuba yiNazaretha ngo-1991, kusabusa inkosi Amos Shembe, iNyangayezulu.Uthi into eyamdonsela amanzi ngomsele wukuthi wemukela abaseThembezinhle bezombona, eshonelwe yingane kanti kukhona abazomceba kwabaseBuhleni. Emuva kwalokho abasamfuni emathempelini usolwa ngokuba wumdayisi.“Ngifuna ukuveza kucace ukuthi mina ngihamba noNyazi futhi ngiyaluthanda. Angingene embangweni. Ngifuna ukusonta. Ngizisontela ngedwa ekhaya manje ngoba sengibonile ukuthi angisafunwa wumuntu. Ngiyafisa ilungiswe le nto, ngiqhubeke ngihlanganyele nabanye esontweni,’’ kubalisa uZakwe ozifikele emahhovis eSolezwe ngeSonto ekhathazekile.Uthi ubesethempelini, iDumiseka, oThongathi ngaphambi kokuba athole isikhundla sokuba wumshumayeli wohambo. Uveze ukuthi usezame kaningi exhumana nabantu abehlukene ebandleni ukuze kulungiswe udaba lwakhe, waze wazama nokuyobona uNyazi, kwasho ukuthi lumatasa nomsebenzi. Ukhale ngokuthi inkinga yakhe iwuphethe kabi nomndeni wakhe, kawusakwazi nawo ukuya esontweni, sekusontwa kwakhe.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe uyamazi uZakwe nodaba lwakhe uyalwazi, useke walubika. Uthe uZakwe akukho owayezokwenza uma abantu bezombona eshonelwe, wayengeke abajikise.“Ngiyambona uZakwe waseMsinga, uhamba nalo impela uNyazi, akaze ashintshe. Ngibona ukuthi kufanele ngixoxe nomvangeli wakhe, ilungiswe khona namuhla le ndaba. Sizozama impela ukuthi sithintane. Ngiyazibophezela ukuthi sizolungisa,’’ kuchaza uMncwabe.
title: Umshumayeli ukhala ngobandlululo eBuhleni

text: UPHITHENE ikhanda owesifazane waseNtinini eNquthu, okushe zonke izimpahla abezokwaba ngazo emshadweni okuhlelwa ukuthi ube maduze. Kumanje umakoti akakaze afike ekhaya ukuzobona umonakalo njengoba ethi akuvumi ngendlela adideke ngayo.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa siqale ngoMsombuluko emini umndeni uhleli kwenye indlu. Nezicishamlilo ebezisuka edolobheni eNquthu zifike indlu obekungeyotshani isingumlotha nezimpahla sezishe zonke.NangoLwesithathu omakhelwane nezihlobo bebelokhu bephuma bengena bebabaza umhlola kwazise umuzi ubulungiswa kwenzelwa ukuba umshado ufike konke kusezingeni.Ezindlini ezishile kubalwa eyotshani ebinezimpahla zomshado nezezingane zesikole uma kubalwa nezishe ngoLwesithathu, bese kuba ngenkulu enamagumbi angaphezulu kwamahlanu nayo eshile newurawondi kathayela okushe konke obekuphakathi kuyo. Izimpahla ezisindile kwenye yezindlu bese zibekwe egcekeni.UMnuz Bongani Nyandeni uthe udadewabo ubezoshada maduze, bese bethenge inqwaba yezimpahla ukuze bamkhiphe ngazo ekhaya ngokomshado wesintu.“Angiyazi ngempela le nto esehlele ukuthi ngingayichaza ngani ngoba kuyona le ndlu bekukhona nezinye izimpahla zezingane zesikole nezomfana walapha ekhaya obengekho esemsebenzini.“Izingane aziyile ngisho esikoleni ngoba kushe konke ebezinakho. Udadewethu lona obezoshada sisalindile naye ukuba afike azobona umonakalo osehlele njengoba engahlali lapha kodwa esemzini wakhe eNondweni. Okubi wukuthi amaphoyisa aseBabanango siwabizile kodwa kuze kube namhlanje (izolo) awakaze afike ezobona umonakalo ukuze avule necala, aphenye yize siwabize umlilo usasha,” kubalisa uNyandeni.UNkk Ntombi Nyandeni Mngomezulu (52) obezogcagca ngokwesintu, uthe usaba ngisho ukuya ekhaya ayobona umonakalo ngendlela ikhanda lakhe eliphithene ngayo.“Usuku lomshado besingakalukhiphi njengoba bekusenziwa amalungiselelo kuhlanganisa nakho ukuthengwa kwezimpahla zokungikhipha ekhaya ngokomshado.“Nakhu-ke sekwenzeka lo mhlola engingazi nokuthi ngizowuchaza ngithini. Mina ngashonelwa ngumyeni wami. Kodwa bengizoshada naye ngokwesintu yize engasekho. Kwawona lo mshado angisazi nokuthi uyoba nini uma kunje,” kusho uNkk Nyandeni Mngomezulu.Ezindlini ezishile kubalwa eyotshani ebinezimpahla zomshado nezezingane zesikole uma kubalwa nezishe ngoLwesithathu, bese kuba ngenkulu enamagumbi angaphezulu kwamahlanu nayo eshile newurawondi kathayela okushe konke obekuphakathi kuyo. Isithombe: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEInduna yendawo, uMnuz Sipho Ngobese, ithe kuqhaqhazela amadolo kuyo, imelwe yingqondo ngokwehlele lo mndeni.Uthe akazi ngempela ukuthi ngabe bekwenzenjani futhi yini imbangela yomlilo njengoba nomndeni wakwaNyandeni nawo ungazi ukuthi ngabe umlilo udalwe yini.Umndeni wakwaNyandeni umile ekutheni awusoli muntu kodwa amakhanda asadidekile.Umfana wakhona Isolezwe limfice eme kude negceke ebuka kude, kubonakala ukuthi umqondo wakhe uhambile ngenxa yokuthi naye ushelwe yikho konke, wasala nezimpahla abezigqokile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe ucela umndeni uye emaphoyiseni aseBabanango uxhumane nomphathisiteshi ukuze abasize kulesi simo ababhekene naso.
title: Kushe umuzi nomabo kuzoshadwa

text: KULINDELEKE ukuthi indodana kaQueen Noloyiso Sandile, uJonguxolo Sandile kube iyona ezothatha isikhundla sokuba yinkosi yamaRharhabe e-Eastern Cape kulandela ukudlula kukanina emhlabeni.Lokhu kuqinisekiswe okhulumela lesi sizwe, uMntwana uZolile Burns Ncamashe emithonjeni yezindaba.UQueen Noloyiso ubengunkosikazi wenkosi uMaxhoba Sandile, owadlula emhlabeni ngo-2011.Ngenxa yokuthi ngaleso sikhathi uMntwana uJonguxolo wayesemncane, isizwe savumelana ngokuthi kube unina obamba okwesikhashana.“Sekusele ukuthi kubikelwe uhulumeni ngokuthi uMntwana uJonguxolo uyena ozothatha ngoba iminyaka isiyamvumela,” kuchaza uNcamashe.INdlovukazi Noloyiso ubekwe endlini yakhe yokugcina ngeSonto e-Eastern Cape emva kokushonela esibhedlela iCecilia Makhiwane eMdantsane ngoLwesithathu olwedlule.UJonguxolo uchaze unina njengomuntu obezithobile, kangangokuthi ubungeke uze usho ukuthi waganela ebukhosini.“Nathi usifundisile inhlonipho, nokuthi ukuziphakamisa kwenza ungakwazi ukuphilasana nabantu,” usho njalo.
title: Sekubhekwe indodana ezothatha esobukhosi emva kokudlula kukanina emhlabeni
UMashaba usola i-ANC ngamaphoyisa atinyelwe 'ngabokufika' eGoli

text: Sabelo NseleAZOGCWALA imigwaqo amalungu eCosatu kusasa njengoba lo mfelandawonye wezinyunyana zabasebenzi uzoba nemibhikisho ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zezwe.Izolo iCosatu inxuse wonke amalungu ayo nabasebenzi ukuba bangalubhadi emsebenzini njengoba iqinisa umkhankaso wayo wokulwa nenkohlakalo, ukudilizwa kwabasebenzi nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane ezindaweni zokusebenza.Kuhlelwe ukuba kube nemibhikisho ezindaweni ezingu-14 ezahlukene kuleli kodwa lo mfelandawonye uthe isibalo sababhikishi ngeke sibe amakhulu ngamakhulu abasebenzi abajwayelekile uma kunemibhikisho ngenxa yokugwema ukubhebhetheka kweCorona.KwaZulu-Natal kulindeleke ukuthi abasebenzi bahlangane enkundleni yezemidlalo iCurries Fountain, lapho bezobe beholwa khona iPhini likaMengameli wesibili kwiCosatu, uNksz Louisa Thipe.Kuzoba nojenga lwezimoto kubhekwe ePinetown, lapho kuzobhikishwa ngaphandle kwesiteshi samaphoyisa.UNobhala jikelele weCosatu uMnuz Bheki Ntshalintshali, unxuse bonke abasebenzi abangezukuba ingxenye yemibhikisho ukuthi bahlale emakhaya njengengxenye yokweseka umkhankaso.“Sifuna ukubhekana ngqo nohulumeni nezinkampani ezizimele. Sifuna kuphele inkohlakalo eyenza ukuthi abantu balahlekelwe amathuba omsebenzi. Sesifikile isikhathi sokuthi silwe. Uma singaqhubeka sihlale phansi, ngabe kusho ukuthi siyasivuma isigwebo sikadilikajele esisinikwa uhulumeni nezinkampani ezizimele sokuphatha budlabha umnotho.”UNtshalintshali uthe ngomkhankaso bafuna ukufaka ingcindezi kuhulumeni nasezinkampanini ezizimele ukuthi zihloniphe izibopho ezazenza ngenkokhelo yabasebenzi, ukudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi nokuphuculwa kwezokuthutha nezimo zokusebenza kwezempilo.I-Cosatu ithe ayijabule ngendlela uhulumeni asingathe ngayo imali yeCovid-19 TERS.Le mali inikezwa abalahlekelwe imisebenzi noma ebebesebenza amahora amancane kunajwayelekile ngesikhathi sikathaqa.I-Cosatu isola ukuthi le mali ikhwatshanisiwe njengoba abasebenzi abaningi bengazange bayithole.
title: Imibhikisho ehlelwa yiCosatu ezweni

text: UMNYANGO wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi esifundazweni iGauteng usuyichithile imibiko yokuthi ulahlekile owesifazane waseTembisa, Ekurhuleni, okubikwa ukuthi uzale izingane ezingu-10 ngoMsombuluko. NgoLwesihlanu ntambama iziko lezindaba iNews24 libike ukuthi ngoLwesine kuvulwe icala lokulahleka kukaNksz Gosiame Thamara Sithole (37). Ibike ukuthi leli cala lavulwa ngoJuni 6 (ngeSonto) esiteshini samaphoyisa eTembisa South. UMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi eGauteng ushicilele isitatimende ngemuva kwalo mbiko uqinisekisa ukuthi uNksz Sithole usebathintile ebazisa ukuthi akalahlekile. Lo mnyango uthe amaphoyisa sebewazisile ukuthi uphephile futhi uzokwenza isimemezelo ngalolu daba maduze. Ekhuluma nephepha elinguzakwabo weSolezwe i-Pretoria News, ngoMsombuluko ebusuku uyise wezingane uMnuz Tebogo Tsotetsi, uthe uThamara ubelethe enamasonto angu-29 ezithwele.UTsotetsi uthe ngenxa yokuzalwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi izingane zisagcinwe egumbini labasesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela ezikuso. Uthe abantu bakuleli bazozibona uma sezikulungele ukubonakala emphakathini.
title: Akalahlekile owesifazane ozale izingane ezingu-10: umnyango

text: UCACISA ngokubiza unozinti weKaizer Chiefs u-Itumeleng Khune esikwatini seBafana Bafana umqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe, uMolefi Ntseki.UKhune, ezingamhambeli kahle izinto kwiChiefs kulezi nsuku, nguye yedwa umdlali waMakhosi esikwatini sabadlali abangu-26 esethulwe nguNtseki eSafa House, eSoweto ngoLwesine emini.Lesi sikwati sizobhekana neGhana ngoMashi 25 eFNB Stadium neSudan ekuhambeni ngoMashi 28 ukusonga eyokuhlungela i-2022 Caf Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon).UKhune, olandela u-Aaron Mokoena ngamava emidlalo eminingi emlandweni weBafana, uvuza amagoli udede kwiChiefs kulezi nsuku nokwenza uwonkewonke ungamuzwa kahle.UNtseki nokho ubeke ezakhe izizathu ngokumbiza.“Okuka-Itumeleng Khune ngeke ngikufihle ukuthi yingenxa yamava akhe ekudaleni kwelesizwe, kuleli zinga. Emidlalweni efana nalena ayadingeka amava. Ngesikhathi sibheka onozinti, omunye ebesimbeke iso ngu-Oscarine Masuluke weBaroka FC ngoba wenza kahle kakhulu kulezi nsuku ebhekene namaqembu amakhulu,” kusho uNtseki.“Nokho sibukile ukuthi ngokwamava sizowadinga amagalelo kaKhune. Yebo wenze amaphutha evuzisa amagoli emidlalweni yakamuva kodwa ngixoxile nabaqeqeshi beChiefs baveza ukuthi bake bakhuluma naye ngesimo sakhe.“Nami ngikhulumile naye savulelana izifuba. Ngameluleka ukuthi zizoba khona iziwombe njengoba ekhula eba mdala. Isithombe engisithole ngokuzinikela kwakhe ejimini kodwa sibe nomthelela ekutheni simsondeze ngoba kusho ukuthi akazivumeli izimo angitshele zona abhekene nazo njengendoda njengamanje.”UKhune usanda kuphoxa kweyeCaf Champions League ededela amagoli amane benqunywa yiWydad Casablanca ngo 4-0 eBurkina Faso.
title: UNtseki ucacise ngokubiza uKhune esikwatini seBafana

text: Utholwe eshonile obehambe nabangani beye emcimbiniPHILI MJOLIUTHOLAKALE eseshonile owesifazane waseMachunwini, eMsinga okuthiwa ubehambe nabangani bakhe beye emcimbini obukuyo le ndawo ngoMgqibelo.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba uNksz Thandeka Nono Mchunu ubehamba nabesifazane abathathu beye emcimbini kanti isidumbu sakhe sitholakale ngoMsombuluko.Umthombo wephephandaba osondelene nomufi, uthe ngemva komcimbi wasemini kuqhutshekiwe kwaphuzwa kwaze kwaba sebusuku.“Umufi nabehamba nabo bebephuza ebusuku. Sithole ukuthi bahlukane entathakusa ngeSonto. Endleleni kuthiwa kuvumbuke abesilisa ababaziyo babakhomba ngesibhamu befuna ukuhamba nabo ngenkani. Abathathu babalekile kodwa umufi wahluleka. Ngesikhathi befika ekhaya abazange basho ukuthi kwenzekeni ngoba bebesaba ihlazo lokuthi bebephuza,” kusho yena.Umthombo uqhube wathi ngakusasa umufi ufunwe wangatholakala.“Ilanga belishisa kakhulu ababefuna bafune kancane babuye baphindela emakhaya bezitshela ukuthi uzobuya kungenzeka ukuthi uhambe izindlela zakhe. Ngakusasa ngoMsombuluko isidumbu sakhe sitholakale ehlathini  sinamanxena okugwazwa. Kutholakale nokuthi udlwenguliwe ngaphambi kokubulawa,” kusho umthombo.UCapt Nqobile Gwala okhulumela amaphoyisa, uthe umufi wagcina ukubonakala entathakusa ngeSonto. Utholakale eMhlangana, eMsinga  ngoMsombuluko elimele kabi ekhanda.“Kuvulwe icala lokubulala eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa.”
title: Utholwe eshonile obehambe nabangani beye emcimbini

text: KUSHONE owesifazane obebhukhe kwelinye lamahhotela nobhuti  wakhe wasemzini namhlanje ekuseni bengazi ukuthi izinto zizongahambi ngohlelo. Lo wesifazane (56) uficwe uphiko lweReaction Unit South Africa emini namhlanje ehhotela elikuWick Street evele esethule ekhona nalo wesilisa (50). Lo wesilisa uzidelile wabiza uphiko lweReaction Unit South Africa ukuba liphuthume lizomsiza ngesikhathi esebona ukuthi sengathi usethule. Inkinga iqale ngesikhathi lo wesifazane ekhala ngenkinga yokucineka umoya esamuwotawota emuva kwalokho wavele wangabe esanyakaza. Uphiko lweReaction Unit South Africa efike kuqala endaweni yesigameko ikhethe ukuyigodla eminye imininingwane ukuvikela isithunzi salaba bobabili. Uphenyo mayelana nokushona kwalo wesifazane luyaqhubeka ukuthola ukuthi ngabe yini imbangela yokushona kwakhe. Kuthintwa okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe alikho icala elivuliwe ngalesi sigameko njengoba othintekayo ezishonele ngokwemvelo. Echaza uthe esimeni esinjena akuvulwa icala uma umuntu eshone ngokwemvelo, umndeni uwona ongachaza ngalolu daba ukuthi kwenzekeni.
title: Ushone ezijabulisa ehhotela nobhuti wasemzini

text: KUPHENDUKE impikiswano ukuphekwa ngemibuzo kukaNgqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, nommeli wowayeyisikhulu sakwaSars, uMnuz Tom Moyane, u-Advocate Dali Mpofu, kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yindlanzana izolo.Kube nokuphendulana phakathi kukaGordhan noMpofu ngesikhathi emsola ngezimpendulo ezingaphelele nezingacacile emibuzweni yakhe.Ngokusho kukaGordhan ukungahoshelani kwakhe noMoyane kwaqala ngesikhathi eqokwa esikhundleni ngo-2015. Wahlela umhlangano noMoyane ukuthola ulwazi ngokwakwenzeka kwaSars.Kwakunohlelo olusha lokusebenza olwaluthulwe yinkampani iBain Consulting Agency.UGordhan uthe uhlelo lwaholela ekutheni iSars ihluleke ukuqoqa intela. Kwaba neminyango eminingi eyavalwa eyayiqoqa intela. Kunabantu abaningi abaphelelwa wumsebenzi ngenxa yohlelo lokusebenza.UMpofu uhlokoloze ngemibuzo uGordhan ukuthi ukungahoshelani kwabo kwaqala nini, uGordhan uthe emuva nje kokuba aqokwe esikhundleni sokuba ngungqongqoshe.UMpofu kusalindeleke aqhubeke ambuze ngezinsolo zokuthi uMoyane uyena ngqo owaholela ekutheni kusolwe ukuthi kukhona okwakungahambi kahle kwaSars okwakwenziwa uMoyane.UMoyane uthe uGordhan wayemdlela umona njengoba ethi waba ngukhomishana wokuqala kwaSars ukuqoqa uR1 trillion wentela.Uthe njengoba aqoqa le mali uGordhan akazange amhalalisele.
title: Impikiswano kwikhomishini ephekwa ngemibuzo uGordhan

text: USEPHUPHA ngokuyodlala kwiCaf Confederation Cup umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows uClinton Larsen.NgeSonto ngo-3 ntambama Abafana Bes’thende bazoshukana ne-Orlando Pirates ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu emdlalweni owandulela owamanqamu eNedbank Cup.Iqembu elizonqoba kulo mdlalo lizodlala nozonqoba phakathi kweChippa United neSuperSport United abazotholana phezulukwi-semi final yokuqala ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, eBhayi.Umdlalo wamanqamu uzodlalelwa eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ngoJuni 24. Iqembu elizonqoba lizohlabana ngo-R7 million liphinde liyodlala kwiConfederation Cup.ISuperSport iyona evikela isicoco seNedbank. ULarsen exoxa nabezindaba ngemuva komdlalo wezakhe we-Absa Premiership neBaroka FC eMagogo ngoMgqibelo ntambama, uphumele obala ngesifiso sakhe sokubona i-Arrows idlala kwiConfed Cup.“Le midlalo esele izocacisa ngesizini yethu. Ngikholwa wukuthi izocacisa ukuthi sizoba nesizini enhle noma ebhedayo yini. Uma sifinyelela kowamanqamu siphinde siqede kwiTop 8 kuyoba ngenye isizini eyohlale isezingqondweni zabaningi kwi-Arrows. Uma sidliwa kuma-semi final siphinde siphume kwiTop 8 kuyoba isizini engeyinhle. Ngakho imidlalo emithathu ezayo imqoka kakhulu kithina. Uma udle umhlanganiso kwiNedbank uthola ithuba lokuyodlala e-Afrika. Mina ngadlala kabili kwiCaf Champions League neManning Rangers ne-Orlando Pirates. Ngiyazi ukuthi kunjani ukudlala khona futhi ngingathanda nabadlali bami bezwe lowo muzwa,” kusho uLarsen.“Uma uyodlala okokuqala e-Afrika usuke ungakakulungeli ukudlala khona ngokwanele. Into emqoka yisipiliyoni esikwenza uqine uma usudlala khona ngomuso. Isipiliyoni sokudlala e-Afrika sizobenza bakhule njengabadlali.”NgoLwesithathu ngo-7.30 ebusuku Abafana Bes’thende bazodudulana neCape Town City e-Athlone, eKapa koweligi.
title: ULarsen nethemba lokuyodlala kweyeCaf

text: Ngiyathemba nizijabulisa ngendlela ehlelekile futhi anikhithizi izinto ezingenasidingo ezizokwenza niqale unyaka ngokuya komashonisa.Kuzothi huuh uma siqala unyaka ngoba uphethroli wehla ngoR1.23 bese udizili wehle ngoR1.55 lokhu kuzokwehlisa umthwalo emahlombe ethuUngoti osiza abacwile ezikweletini uMnuz Neil Roodt uthe yize ukwehla kukaphethroli kuzokwehlisa izindleko zabantu kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi abakhithize impahla engenasidingo kunalokho kufanele baqede izikweletu.“Abantu kufanele baqede izikweletu zabo ngemali abazoyonga ngokwehla kukaphethroli ngoba akukho okuzoshintsha emnothweni futhi angiboni ukuthi kuzodaleka imisebenzi emisha,” kusho uRoodt.Uthe ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abathengi baseNingizimu Afrika bakweleta uR1.73 trillion okusho ukuthi baningi abadinga usizo lwezezikweletu.“Siyazi abantu bathenge kakhulu ngamaholidi, ngiyacela babophe izifociya ngoba kusazoba nzima, akukho okuzoshintsha emnothweni wezwe,” kusho uRoodt.Baningi abenza izinhlelo ezizoshintsha impilo yabo uma kuqala unyaka nathi singabathengi kufanele senze izinhlelo ezizosithuthukisa.UNkk Ester Ochse oyisazi sokutshalwa kwezimali eFNB uthe abathengi kufanele bazijwayeze ukwenza isabelomali bangaveli nje bakhithize noma yini.“Kufanele ube nohlu lwezidingo zakho zanyanga zonke, olokukhokha imali yesikole bese ufaka imali eduze kwalezo zidingo. Lokhu kuzokusiza ukuthi usheshe ubone ukuthi imali onayo iyazanela yini izidingo zakho. Kubalulekile ukuthi siphile ngokwamandla esinawo. Singabi nezidingo ezidlula imali yethu,” kusho uNkk Ochse.Uthe isabelomali akufanele sihlale siyinto eyodwa kodwa singashintsha sifake nezinye izidingo okubalwa imali okufanele uyilondoloze ngoba akufanele uthenge okuthile ube ungenayo imali oyilondolozile.Ube esekhipha lamasu ambalwa :Khokha izikweletu zakho “ Zibophezele ukuthi uzozikhokha ngesikhathi onqunyelwe sona izikweletu zakho futhi uma unemali ethe xaxa zama ukukhokhela esisodwa usiqede ukuze ukhululeke.”Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi basheshe baqede izikweletu zama-credit card ngoba ayayengana.Zinakekele ngokulondolozela umhlalaphansi. Lokhu ukwenza ngokubheka impilo yakho bese uzibuza ukuthi uma usugugile ufuna ukuphila kanjani. Lokhu kuzokusiza ukuthi wazi imali okufanele uyilondoloze.Iba nobudlelwano obuhle nemali ukuze wazi ukuthi uthengani, ubasiza kanjani abomndeni futhi ukubasiza kwakho ngabe kuba namthelela muni kuwe.Londoloza imali, uqale ngaleyo onayo, ukhumbule nokulondoloza imali yezimo eziphuthumayo. Le mali kufanele ikwazi ukufeza izidingo zakho zezinyanga ezintathu. Ungonga noma wuR300 ngenyanga.Thuthukisa ulwazi lwakho lwezimali futhi uqinisekise ukuthi imishwayilense ikhokhelwa kahle ikakhulukazi iLife cover.Khokha imali ethe xaxa ezikweletini zakho okubalwa ibond yendlu nezinye.Khonamanjalo kugqugquzelwa abantu ukuthi bafunde kabanzi ngezikhwama zomhlalaphansi futhi baqinisekise ukuthi izikhwama abalondoloze kuzo ziyabazisa ngezinguquko ezizayo.Kusukela ngoMashi ka-2019 izikhwama zempesheni kufanele zifundise abantu ngezindlela zokutshala imali ngoba iningi labo alinabo abeluleki bezimali.Kuthiwa uma sebethatha umhlalaphansi bayaxakeka ukuthi kufanele bayitshale imali yabo ukuze ibalonde isikhathi eside yingakho kufanele bahlonyiswe ngolwazi lokuthi bangayitshala kuphi.Uma udinga usizo lweZabathengi ungathinta uBoniswa Mohale ku-031 308 2743 noma umthumelele i-email [email protected]
title: [EZEZIMALI] Ongoti nezeluleko ngezezimali nezikweletu

text: KULINDELEKE ukuthi kusiphuke izidindi uma sekuthuthana iSuperSport United neKaizer Chiefs emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngoLwesihlanu njengoba womabili la maqembu engaziboni ephumile embangweni wesicoco seligi sale sizini.Umdlalo useMbombela Stadium ngo-8 ebusuku. Umqeqeshi weChiefs u-Ernst Middendorp usanda kuphumela obala ngokuthi uzolwa kuze kube sekugcineni ngaphambi kokuthi avume ukuthi simhlulile isicoco.Kanjalo noKaitano Tembo selokhu i-United ibuyelwe umgqigqo usekuvezile ukuthi “kusengenzeka noma yini ngesicoco seligi”.Amatsatsantsa a Pitori ahleli endaweni yesihlanu kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-38.Emidlalweni emihlanu edlule ashaywe kanye, awina kwemine. Ngaphezulu kwawo kuhleli iBidvest Wits abalinganayo nayo ngamaphuzu, iCape Town City, Mamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates.IChiefs abazobhekana nayo isendaweni yesikhombisa ngamaphuzu awu-35.“Ngicabanga ukuthi okusemqoka wukuthi siqhubeke nale ndlela esidlale ngayo emidlalweni edlule. Sizobhekana nomdlalo ngamunye njengoba manje osemqoka yilona oweChiefs esiya kuwona. Uma ubheka kusuka kunombolo 1 kuya endaweni yesikhombisa wonke la maqembu asangayinqoba iligi. Wonke lawo maqembu asazobhekana. Iseminingi imidlalo esele. Uma iya ngokuncipha yilapho kuzocaca khona,” kusho uTembo.Umdlalo womzuliswano wokuqala wala maqembu wanqotshwa Amakhosi ngo 1-0.“Njengomqeqeshi weSuperSport United engikubhekile wukuthi siwunqobe umdlalo. Kodwa ebholeni akekho onelungelo lokunqoba, kuyasetshenzelwa. Amalungiselelo ethu nesizokwenza emdlalweni yikhona okuzocacisa ukuthi ubani ophumelelayo. Umphumela odlule awusasho lutho. Sonke siyawadinga la maphuzu amathathu.”Lo mqeqeshi onikezwe izintambo ngokugcwele kuqala isizini, kufanele wukuthi uzothembela kumgadli wakhe uMxolisi Macuphu ukuthi uzoqhubeka nokuba bukhali.UMacuphu ufike ngoJanuwari kwi-United imboleka kwiWits. Nguyena oshaye igoli benqoba iFree State Stars ngo 1-0 ngempelasonto edlule.Useshaye amagoli amane selokhu efikile asize leli qembu lasePitoli labuyelwa yithemba ngokulwela iligi. .“Selokhu efikile ungomunye wabadlali ababalulekile eqenjini. Ngale ngokusishayela amagoli, ufike washintsha indlela esidlala ngayo ngoba ukhuthele noma engaliphethe ibhola. Ngijabule ngakho konke akwenzela iqembu,” kusho uTembo.
title: I-SSU izimisele ngokunqoba iChiefs

text: KUGCINE kuye ngamagama enkehli iKaizer Chiefs idedela izembe komunye umdlali njengoba sekucacile ukuthi ibachitha ngamunye futhi ayibheke nakuphela kwesizini.Izolo iChiefs inameke kwi-website yayo isitatimende lapho iveza ukuthi igcine ivumelene noBongolwethu Jayiya ukuthi kuhlukane izindlela.“Njengoba inyathuko yokulungiselela isizini ezayo iqhubeka, iKaizer Chiefs noBongolwethu Jayiya sebevumelene ngokunqanyulwa kobudlelwane babo ngemuva kwamasizini amabili. Lo mdlali wasesiswini ozalelwe eSoweto ufike kuMakhosi evela kwiCape Town City.“UJayiya uzibongele eqenjini, kuKaizer Motaung nemenenja yeChiefs uBobby Motaung ngokumnika ithuba.“Uphinde wadlulisa ukubonga nakubaqeqeshi asebenze nabo, kozakwabo kanjalo nakubalandeli ngokuhlezi behambisana naMakhosi.Iqembu lifisela umdlali konke okuhle ekusaseni lakhe futhi liyambonga ngokuba yingxenye yeGlamour Boys,” kubeka isitatimende.UJayiya ulandela abanye abadlali abasanda kuchithwa yiChiefs abanjengoHendrick Ekstein, Khotso Malope noGustavo Paez.Isolezwe like labika ngeledlule ukuthi noJayiya uyalandela kodwa obekusabambile wukuthi bebengavumelani neqembu ngemali abefuna limnike yona.U-Ekstein yena uxoshelwe ukufuna ukunyuselwa imali ngaphambi kokusayina inkontileka entsha abebexoxisana ngayo neqembu.Abavuselele izinkontileka kwiChiefs nguBernard Parker noJoseph Molangoane naye obekunokungabaza ukuthi uzogcinwa kwazise akadlali ngaphansi kuka-Ernst Middendorp.
title: I-Cheifs nezembe komunye umdlali

text: IMILUTHA yezidakamizwa isijike ukwenza njengoba kuthiwa isizitika ngokuphuza amanzi aphuma uma ipheke ama-pads (amaqakelo) abesifazane asesebenzile.Lo mkhuba omusha ubukeka uzobhincisela nxanye abezidakamizwa iwunga nenyaope. Kuthiwa uthandwa yintsha engenayo imali yokuthenge inyaope newunga ngenxa yokuthi imba eqolo. Ukuhlanganisa amaqakelo kulula ngoba bahambela imizi enabantu besifane baketule imigqomo bathathe amaqakelo asesebenzile noma baye lapho kulahlwa khona imfucuza bapequlule ukuze bathole amaqakelo.Kuthiwa uma sebewatholile amaqakelo asesebenzile, bawathatha bawabilise bese amanzi aphuma lapho bawaphuze.La manzi kuthiwa ayadakana, ulala ungazazi negama lakho, okuyinhloso enkulu yemilutha.Umsuka walo mkhuba, kuvela ukuthi ukhonjwa e-Indonesia njengoba ususabalele emazweni amaningi okubalwa neNingizimu Afrika.Ngokolwazi oluvela kweminye yemibiko wumkhuba osuneminyaka engaphezu kwemibili uqalile kodwa eNingizimu Afrika usanda kuqala ukubonakala eGoli. Kuthiwa umuntu ophuze le ‘jusi’ ephuma emaqakelweni, udakwa amakhemikheli asetshenziswe kuwona.Udokotela wabesifazane ongathandanga negama lakhe, uthe uyakweshwama lokhu.“Ngiyakweshwaba lokhu kodwa kunengozi kakhulu empilweni yomuntu,” usho kanje.Uthe okokuqala amaqakelo anekhemikhali i-Absorbent Core esetshenziswe ukubamba igazi kwiqakelo ukuthi lingagelezi."Lilodwa nje leli khemikhali alikulungele ukungena ngaphakathi liphuzwe ngoba alikudalelwe lokho kodwa lisebenza ukubamba okusaketshezi. Uma seliliningi ngaphakathi egazini lingaba yingozi.”Uqhube wathi i-chlorine nayo etholakala emaqakelweni ingakwenza ukuthi uma umuntu eyiphuzile azizwe esezulwini elincane. Udokotela udalule ukuthi ngokwesayensi uma into isibilisiwe amagciwane ayafa kodwa kukhona adlula aphile okuyiwo angabeka impilo yabaphuza lawo manzi asengcolile impilo yabo ibe sengcupheni.- Isolezwe ngeSonto
title: Imilutha ididiyela isiphuzo ngama-pads asebenzile

text: USEBHEKE umdlalo olandelayo kaGroup D umqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe leNigeria, uGernot Rohr ngemuva kokuthi ezakhe zikhale ngaphansi kwiCroatia ngo 2-0 emdlalweni wazo wokuvula kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eseRussia.Ukaputeni weCroatia, uLuka Modric, ushaye iphenathi ebe yisipikili sokugcina ngesiwombe sesibili kulo mdlalo obungeSonto ebusuku. Igoli lokuqala kube umkhonto ogwaze ekhaya ka-Oghenekaro Etebo kade uModric eshaye ikhona esiwombeni sokuqala.Lona bekuwumdlalo wesibili kaGroup D njengoba kowokuqala kutholene i-Argentina ne-Iceland ababambane ngo 1-1. Le miphumela ibeke amaSuper Eagles emsileni kanti iCroatia iqhwakele.Umdlalo olandelayo wamaSuper Eagles ungoLwesihlanu eVolgograd Arena ngo-5 ntambama lapho ezotholana phezulu ne-Iceland emvalele ekopini kwakuncane indawo uLionel Messi we-Argentina.“Akekho umuntu othanda ukuhlulwa kodwa siyakuqonda ukuthi iCroatia ibiyiqembu elingcono kunathi. Abadlali bami abasebancane benze amaphutha. Igoli lokuqala liqhamuke ngekhona kwathi elesibili kwaba yiphenathi. Ngicabanga ukuthi la badlali basebancane basadinga ukufunda, kwesinye isikhathi bakhombise ubudedengu ikakhulukazi uma kushaywa amakhona nama-free kick. Kuzomele sikulungise lokho,” kusho uRohr.Mayelana nokubhekana ne-Iceland okuyizwe elinabantu abangaphezulu kuka-300 000, uthe: “Kumele samukele lokhu kuhlulwa kodwa kumele siwine kwi-Iceland. Uma sinqoba umdlalo wethu olandelayo kungenzeka noma yini ukuze sidlulele phambili (kwiLast 16). Ngigculisekile ngendlela esizihlele ngayo emuva kodwa asizange sakhe amathuba amaningi okushaya amagoli. Kudingeka okungenani amaphuzu amane ukuze udlulele phambili. Konke kusezandleni zethu uma nje sizoqhubeka nokukholelwa ekutheni singakwenza lokho.”Inkakha yaseNigeria uJay-Jay Okocha, obehlaziya umdlalo kwiSuperSport, izwakalise ukungagculiseki ngezinqumo zikaRohr.“Umqeqeshi akazange ayisebenzele imali yakhe namuhla. Abaqeqeshi bakhona ukuze benze izinqumo, yena uthathe izinqumo okungezona ikakhulukazi kusengu 1-0,” kusho * -Okocha.Imiphumela yamanye amazwe ase-Afrika:I-Egypt eboshelwe kuGroup A ihlulwe yi-Uruguay ngo 1-0. Isizobhekana neRussia kusasa eSt Petersburg ngo-8 ebusuku okuwumdlalo okumele iwunqobe nakanjani ukuzibeka ethubeni le-Last 16.IMorocco izigwaze ngowayo ngegoli lika-Aziz Bouhaddouz alishaye bebhekene ne-Iran emdlalweni wokuqala kaGroup B. NgoLwesithathu izoshukana nePortugal eLuzhniki ngo-2 ntambama. Nayo kumele inqobe ukuze ingazitholi isheshe igoduka.Namuhla amehlo e-Afrika azothi njo kwiTunisia eqhuthana ne-England kuGroup G eVolgograd ngo-8 ebusuku. Sekukuyona ukuthi iqede umgqigqo omubi wamazwe ase-Afrika avule ngenduku.Kusasa iSenegal eyagcina ukudlala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-2002 iphuma kuma-quarterfinal, izolwela amaphuzu amathathu ibhekene nePoland emdlalweni ka-Group H oqala ngo-5 ntambama e-Otkrytie Arena.
title: Ithemba lokudlulela phambili koweNigeria

text: USENKINGENI umlingisi wethelevishini ophinde abe wusomahlaya ngemuva kokuthi obeyintombi yakhe emmangalele ngokuthi "umthelele" ngeHIV.Lo wesifazane oneminyaka ewu-20 (esingeke silidalule igama lakhe), owenza unyaka wokugcina ezifundweni zobunjiniyela eMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT), uthi unobufakazi bokuthi lo somahlaya ubezazi ukuthi uneHIV kodwa wangasebenzisa khondomu elala naye.“Ngaphambi kokuthandana naye, bengihlale ngihlolelwa iHIV ngithola ukuthi anginayo. Kodwa ngemuva kokulala naye ngithole ukuthi senginaleli gciwane. Impilo yami inzima nasesikoleni sengiyafeyila nokwenza ngenza unyaka wokugcina,” kusho le ntokazi ethi ngosuku lokuqala beya ocansini babephuzile. Kodwa yize kunjalo, ithi njengomuntu ozaziyo ukuthi uneHIV kwakumele angalali naye ngaphandle kwejazi lomkhwenyana.Akugcini lapho, nonina wengane walo somahlaya ohlala esifundazweni iMpumalanga, utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi ngesonto elizayo naye uyovulela lo somahlaya icala ngokumthelela ngeHIV.Unina wengane uthe wayeyintombi nto ngesikhathi ehlangana nalo somahlaya.Ebuzwa ukuthi kungani ebengamvuleli lo somahlaya icala lokumsulela, uthi yingoba ubengazi ukuthi kanti umuntu uyakwazi ukummangalela uma ekuthelele ngeHIV. “Mina wayengishaya futhi engithuka ethi yimi engamthelela ngaleli gciwane. “Nginazo izinhlamba zakhe engaziqopha abengithuka ngazo.” Ebuzwa ngalezi zinsolo lo somahlaya wenqabile ukuphuwula ngenxa yokuthi udaba lwakhe nale ntokazi yaseMUT selusenkantolo. “Ngiyamazi futhi ngike ngathandana naye kodwa sesahlukana. Angazi ufunani kimina manje ngoba sizohlangana naye enkantolo ngo-Agasti 10, lapho ngiyogeqa khona amagula ngalezi zinsolo azibhekise kimina.” I-United Nations inomhlahlandlela wokuvulela amacala nokuchibiyela umthetho ukubopha abathelela abanye ngeHIV ngabomu. NeSouth African Law Commission iyakweseka lokhu.
title: Usola usomahlaya ngokumthelela ngesandulela ngculazi

text: IMAMELODI Sundowns izodinga zivuke emaqandeni zonke izethenjwa zayo uma izimisele ngokudlulela kowamanqamu weCAF Champions League.Namuhla ngo-3 ntambama eLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli, iSundowns ibhekene nomqansa wukuphendula amatafula kwiWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco emdlalweni womlenze wesibili owandulela owamanqamu.Emdlalweni womlenze wokuqala ekuhambeni, iSundowns ihlulwe ngo 2-1. Idinga ukushaya igoli, ingangenelwa lutho ukuze iye kowamanqamu okokuqala kusukela yayiwina iChampions League ngo-2016. Lokhu akubuzwa ukuthi kuzoncika efomini yezethenjwa zomqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane ezingomakadebona ebholeni lase-Afrika.Kulaba badlali kukhona uThemba “Mshishi” Zwane oshaye amagoli amabili iSundowns ihlula iWydad ngo 2-0 esigabeni samaqoqo, uDenis Onyango obevimba ngisho impukane emlenzeni wokuqala. Abanye nguGaston Sirino, Hlompho Kekana noTiyani Mabunda okufanele bavikele udonga lwasemuva lwamaBrazilians, oluzoba kwenkulu ingcindezi ikakhulukazi uma iSundowns ithole igoli ngokushesha.UMosimane usevele ushilo ukuthi nakuba ekwazi ukuthi bazolishaya igoli eLucas Moripe kodwa neWydad iyakwazi ukushaya inethi.Ufanise uZwane, oseshaye amagoli ayisithupha kwiChampions League, nesihlabani seBarcelona * -Andres Iniesta owashayela iSpain igoli lokuwina iNdebe yoMhlaba eMzansi ngo-2010.“UThemba akayena umdlali wasohlangothini ogijima ngolayini agobe amabhola. Siyamvumela ukuthi aqhamuke lapho ethanda khona. Ungikhumbuza * -Iniesta,”kusho uMosimane.Nakuba uMzansi wonke unethemba lokuthi iSundowns ingawaphendula amatafula kwiWydad, ehlulwe kowamanqamu nyakenye, kodwa umlando uyayiphika. AmaBrazilinas asebhekane neWydad amahlandla ayisikhombisa kodwa asawine kabili kuphela. IWydad iwine imidlalo emine kwathi omunye badlala ngokulingana. Nokho ithemba lisekutheni kuyona yomibili imidlalo iSundowns eyiwinile kade idlalela ekhaya, okukhona kuwona ewuwine ngo 2-0 ezinyangeni ezedlule waphela sekuliwa.Impumelelo yeSundowns e-Afrika ishayelwa ihlombe nxazonke eMzansi, ngisho nabanye abaqeqeshi bayawabona amagalelo ayo ngendlela esikhule ngayo kwiChampions League.Umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho”Sredojevic uthe:”Ngiyayeseka iSundowns ukuthi idlulele phambili. Izodlala umdlalo onzima. Iqembu abazobhekana nalo alilula. Ngeke kube nezintuba eziningi njengoba bezikhona ekuhambeni. Kodwa anginakho ukungabaza ukuthi umqeqeshi uPitso uzolithola iqhinga elizokwenza badlulele kowamanqamu. Ngibafisela konke okuhle.”Opheka iBafana Bafana, uStuart Baxter uthe nabo kukhona abangakucosha kwiSundowns beyiqembu lesizwe.“Ngicabanga ukuthi benze kahle ekuhambeni kwiCasablanca. Igoli libanike ithuba elikhulu ngaphambi kowomlenze wesibili. Ngicabanga ukuthi iWydad izoba novalo kakhulu ngokuthi izodlala kanjani ngoba iyazi ukuthi uma ihlala emuva, ipaka ibhasi imizuzu engu-90, iSundowns inabadlali abanobuchule abangaluvula udonga. Uma futhi izoza phambili ifuna ukuthola igoli, ifake ingcindezi, okuyinto engiyingabazayo, izobhekana nobunzima. Ngifisa iSundowns idlulele phambili. Isizinze kakhulu kwiChampions League futhi abadlali bayo banamava. Lokho singakusebezisa eqenjini lesizwe,” kusho uBaxter.
title: Ibhekene nomqansa iSundowns eMoripe

text: BAZITAPELE izimpahla negilosa emzini kamakhelwane wabo abantu baseChesterville abebemsola ngokubakhokhisa imali abethi eyokugwazela umsebenzi wakwaMasipala weTheku.Izolo, labo makhelwane abebegane unwabu bathe umakhelwane wabo uNkk Cabangile Cele-Zikhali, ubebathembise ukuthi bazoqala emsebenzini ngoMsombuluko. Kuthe sekumele baqale wathi abaye emahhovisi ophiko oluqoqa intela kuleli iSouth African Revenue Service (Sars) bayofuna izinombolo zokukhokha intela.UNksz Nomvula Nyathikazi uthe uNkk Cele-Zikhali oke wasebenza ohlelweni obelwaziwa ngeCato Manor Greening, ubethi uqashwe umasipala ophikweni lwamanzi ngemuva kokuphela kwalolu hlelo ngoDisemba.“Uthe ube nenhlanhla waqashwa wuphiko lwamanzi, nathi asisolanga lutho ngoba ubethi uqale ngoJanuwari. Uthe kulolu phiko kunowesifazane abembiza ngokuthi uLulu, okunguyena onikezwa le mali ayiqoqayo. Ubethi uma sebeqashiwe laba bantu nguyena ozoba yimenenja yabo kodwa uzobe esebenza ngaphansi kukaLulu,” kusho yena.Kuvele ukuthi bangu-36 abathi baluthwe nguNkk Cele-Zikhali kanti umuntu ngamunye ubegwaza ngoR2 000. Iningi labo le mali liyiboleke komashonisa ngoba lithembe ukuthi seliwuthole umsebenzi.UNksz Siziphiwe Mfeka uthe ubeyitoho lapho esebenza khona, wesule emsebenzini wakhe ngoLwesine ngoba etshelwe ukuthi uzohola uR9 000 kwamasipala.“Lo mama ungibulele, ngangihamba naye engiqhuba ethi angesule emsebenzini ngoba sizoqala ngoMsombuluko emsebenzini. NgoMsombuluko sivukele kwaSars njengoba kade eshilo, sihlale khona kwaze kwavalwa elokhu ethi asimlinde uyeza uyolanda imifaniswano yethu. Kulapho sibone khona ukuthi sengathi siqoliwe sabuya seza la emzini wakhe. Ingane yakhe isitshele ukuthi ubekhona ufike wathatha isikhwama wahamba. Simthumelele imiyalezo simtshela ukuthi sizothatha izimpahla emzini wakhe, sizozibuyisa uma eselethe imali yethu,” kusho yena.Kuthiwa uNkk Cele-Zikhali uthumele imiyalezo kubagilwa ethi abalande imali yabo ngo-9 ekuseni, izolo. Abanye ubebasabisa ngokuthi uzobathakatha uma bengayeki ukumthuka. Sebefikile uthe le mali ayikho kuye kodwa ikulo wesifazane okuthiwa uLulu. Ingxenye yaleli qulu ihambe naye yaya ophikweni lwamanzi kumasipala lapho kade ethi lo wesifazane usebenza khona, kwalandulwa kwathiwa akekho umuntu onalelo gama.Ngemuva kwaloku ushintshile wathi kunoR40 000 awubekile komunye umuzi eGlenmore. Kuthe kusalungiselelwa ukuya khona washintsha wathi ucela kubizwe amaphoyisa aboshwe.Ebuzwa yileli phephandaba mayelana nalezi zinsolo, uNkk Cele-Zikhali uthe: “Ngicela nike ningiyeke kancane.”Emva kwalokho uhambile wayongena ekamelweni. Kube khona abamlandelayo bamphuca amaphilisi okuthiwa uke wazama ukuwaphuza.Uthe abathathe izimpahla zakhe bazidayise ngoba ayikho imali. Kulamule ukufika kwamaphoyisa umphakathi usho ukumqeda.Umyeni wakhe uMnuz Sanele Zikhali uthe ubazi ukuthi unkosikazi wakhe usebenza kwadokotela.“Ebengikuqaphela ukuthi bese sidla ukudla esingajwayele ukukudla layikhaya. Ngithe uma ngimbuza ubebhoka ngolaka abukise ngami kubangani bakhe ebengihlale ngibafica la ekhaya bephuza. Ngigcine ngizitshela ukuthi kusho ukuthi uwinile e-casino ngoba ungumuntu okhonze ukugembula kodwa akafuni ukungitshela. Ngishayelwe ucingo sengitshelwa ukuthi umuzi wami usengcupheni yokusha. Namhlanje, asinakudla abantu bathathe ngisho igilosa, asinalutho. Uma ngimbuza ngalokhu, akangiphenduli,” kusho yena.ULt Colonel Thulani Zwane, okhulumela amaphoyisa, uthe alikho icala elivuliwe ngalesi sigameko.UNksz Tozi Mthethwa, okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uthe abathi baqoliwe kufanele bavule amacala emaphoyiseni noma bathinte uphiko lwakwamasipala oluphenya ngenkohlakalo iCity Investigation Unit.“Awukho umsebenzi okhokhelwa imali kwamasipala, uma kunomuntu othi udayisa imisebenzi, umphakathi awumbike kulolu phiko,” usho kanje.
title: Bazitapele igilosa emzini wobaqolile

text: KUBUKEKA zimhambela kahle izinto emkhakheni wokulingisa kulezi zinsuku uLucia Mthiyane njengoba esejoyine umdlalo, iDurban Gen.U-Lucia, ozobe elingisa indawo ka-Albertina Cele kulo mdlalo, uzoqala ukubonakala namhlanje.Kulo mdlalo uzofika njengoba kusanda kudlula emhlabeni udadewabo ogane kwaGumede, uMaCele (Monica Thuli Zulu), noshone emuva kokuphatheka kabi kwase kuthinteka inhliziyo ngenxa yezigemegeme ebezenziwa ngumyeni wakhe uBab’Gumede (Sifiso Sibiya).Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelelwe abezindaba, u-Albertina ungowesifazane ozimele nongekho ntekenteke, oyimelayo into ayenzayo. “Ungowesifazane wasemakhaya okholelwa ukuthi kukhona isizathu esimenza abe okhethekile futhi kumele aphathwe ngendlela ephezulu noma yikuphi la aya khona. Ungowesifazane okwazi ukubona abantu ukuthi banjani esanda kuhlangana nabo, engakabazi kahle kodwa avele asho nje ukuthi lo muntu asembonile unjani futhi uphila impilo enjani. Imibono yakhe ayishintshi noma abantu bangamtshela okwehlukile, uma nje isinqumo esesithathile ngaleyo nto kusuke sekuphelile futhi engeke esawushintsha umqondo,” kuchaza isitatimende. Kulo mdlalo uzofika kwaGumede esezizwa ngenye indlela ngoBab’ Gumede futhi ngesikhathi behlangana okokuqala kula kuqala khona ingxabano yabo bobabili. Kulo mdlalo uMaCele ungomunye wabalingisi abasazonyamalala kuwona.Kuyimanje ungomunye wabalingisi abasanda kubonakala emdlalweni omusha othi Lingashoni ku-1Magic (103).Abanye abalingisi abasazonyamalala kulo mdlalo kubalwa uNtando Mncube, Lihle Dhlomo noSifiso Sibiya.Engxoxweni yakhe neSolezwe muva nje, uLucia uveze ukuthi ukujabulele ukubuya ekulingiseni njengoba eke wavela nakuDiep City isaqala.
title: Zimhambela kahle izinto uLucia Mthiyane

text: SEKUVELE ukuthi ubetaxelwa utshwala obubizwa ngomhozo obuye baziwe ngogadlaza (ubhokweni) owesifazane ovela enenebulwa yintombazane kwi-video, esabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuleli sonto.UNksz Cabangile “Macebe” Ngcobo (69) waseNkonjane, KwaHlabisa, uthi uyoyixoxela amagwababa echobana into emehlele.Omnenebulile umfundi kaGrade 11 waseBukimvelo High, uMbali Buthelezi (19).Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngeSonto uNksz Ngcobo uthe ubebeke isigubhu esinomhozo, uMbali wafika nabafana basithatha ngesikhathi esaxoxa nomakhelwane.Uthe uMbali usithathe wasinikeza abafana abebeza ngemuva ngesikhathi beya esikoleni ngo-Agasti 14, babaleka naso.Uthe wayecabanga ukuthi bayamdlalisa bazowubuyisa ubhokweni wakhe.“Ngabalinda kwaze kwaphuma isikole. Abafana babaleka ngesikhathi bengibona kodwa uMbali wangigolozela. Sagcina sesithukana naye. Idrinki ngangiyithenge ngoR20.“Ngamtshela ukuthi ngiyomceba kubo,” kusho uNksz Ngcobo.Uthe uMbali wahamba wayoshintsha umfaniswano wesikole, wahlangana naye engasadle nkobe zamuntu, esephethe isigubhu samanzi nenduku.“Akabuzanga lutho wangivuthuza ngenduku umzimba wonke. Wayehamba nezingane ezinye ezingomakhelwane bakhe, zabuya zangingunga kanti zifuna ukungiqopha. Umzimba wawusubaba wonke yinduku. Ngaya kubo ngisezinhlungwini nginjalo kodwa ngaqala enduneni eyakhelene nakubo, yangichitha yathi ingane ithi ingishaye ngoba ngiyithukile,” kusho uNksz Ngcobo.Uveze ukuthi bamphoqa uMbali ukuthi axolise, kwabe sekuphela kanjalo, bangakhuluma lutho ngokukhokhwa kwesigubhu sakhe noma ukumyisa emtholampilo.Uqhube wathi izinhlungu uqale ukuzizwa ngosuku olulandelayo, kodwa kungekho angamkhalela ngoba uhlala yedwa.NgoLwesihlanu uMbali ubizelwe emhlanganweni womphakathi obuhanjelwe nayikhansela lika-ward 1 kuMasipala iBig Five Hlabisa, uMnuz Mbongiseni Ntombela. Ubebizelwe ukuthi azophendula ngesenzo sakhe.Namhlanje kulindeleke ukuthi induna yendawo, uMnuz Jabulani Mdletshe, ikhiphe isinqumo esizothathwa umphakathi sokujezisa uMbali.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt-Col Thulani Zwane uthe intombazane ena-19 ivele eNkantolo yeMantshi KwaHlabisa ngoLwesine ngecala lokushaya.Uthe ikhishwe ngesexwayiso kepha icala lizobuyela ngoSepthemba 11.
title: Ubeshayelwa utshwala bakhe umama we-video

text: IMEYA kaMasipala eMthonjaneni, uMnuz Sbonginkosi Biyela uhlasele i-IFP ngabameli, ngenkathi izama ukuyikhipha esikhundleni. UMasipala waseMthonjaneni uzinze eMelmoth, ungomunye wabasezandleni ze-IFP. Abakhininda izindaba ze-IFP bathi imeya ibixoshwa kulesi sikhundla, futhi ixoshwa nasesigungwini esilawula ukusebenza komkhandlu. Kuthiwa sekuyizikhawana i-IFP izama ukumxosha kodwa kufike kube nongqingetshe, aphunyuke. Kamuva nje, kuthiwa ubebizelwe emhlanganweni ezoquliswa esolwa ngokweseka abathile ababebhikishela imenenja kamasipala. Abakhininda izindaba ze-IFP bathi ithimba le-IFP lifikile lizonika uBiyela incwadi yokumxosha kodwa wala waphetha ukuyisayina, waxoshwa khona kunjalo. Kulapho-ke uBiyela elufake kubameli udaba base bejijimeza i-IFP ngencwadi. UBiyela enikwa ithuba lokuphawula uthe umanqika ngokuchaza lolu daba. “Lolu daba angizukuphawula ngalo ngiyaxolisa ngoba luthinta umthetho,’’ kushaya uBiyela ngamafuphi ethumela umqhafazo. Ngaphambi kwalokho ucingo lubanjwe yindoda ethe uBiyela usemhlanganweni akakwazi ukukhuluma nocingo. Okhulumela i-IFP kuzwelonke uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe uBiyela ususwe esikhundleni sobumeya nesesigungu esiphezulu kodwa uzoqhubeka abeyikhansela kumasipala. UHlengwa uthe ikhona incwadi yabameli abayitholile abazoyiphendula kodwa bamile esinqumweni sabo. “Kunokungazinzi kwesimo emkhandlwini ngenxa yezinto okuthiwa zenziwa wuyena uBiyela. Iqembu lihlala libheka ukusebenza komasipala bese lithatha isinqumo.Indlela aziphatha ngayo iphambene nokuziphatha kwelungu leqembu ngoba uyazi ukuthi ukujutshwa kwabantu kusemseni weqembu,’’ kusho uHlengwa. Uthe okokuqala uBiyela wayengekho ohlwini lwamakhansela aphakanyiswe wumphakathi kodwa wafakwa ngomusa weqembu. Uthe I-IFP ike yahosha izimeya eziningi komasipala bayo, ithi izama ukulungisa ukusebenza kwabo. Kuyaziwa ukuthi eNquthu, kwahoshwa uMnuz Mabilabila Kunene osewashiya eqenjini. Kwaxoshwa uMnuz Sboniso Mbatha eNdumeni, kwakhishwa uMnuz Mzamo Buthelezi inkosi yaseMbongombongweni, eyayikuMasipala wesiFunda eZululand. Kuke kwashintshwa nezimeya kuMasipala eMtubatuba ogcine udliwa yi-ANC. Ngaphambi kwalokho yasusa uMnuz Sthembiso Mathaba kuMasipala KwaNongoma.
title: Imeya isasazele i-IFP ngabameli emva kokuxoshwa

text: IMBONGI ephinde ibe wumlingisi uSbo Da Poet ithi abantu abasha kumele babheke amathuba asezindaweni abakuzo ngaphambi kokuphumela kwezinye izindawo."Kuba kuhle ukuzithuthukisa endaweni yangakini kuqala bakwazi abantu bendawo ngoba yibo abazokweseka kukho konke. Ungaphumelela emakhaya," kusho uSbo."Nakuba abantu bengibona kothelevishini kodwa angilikhohliwe imuva lapho ngiphuma khona ngoba nakhona izinto ziyenzeka. Ngaqala eMandawe ukuduma ngaba yimbongi yendawo ngaphambi kokuphuma."USbo ubekhuluma eMzinto Town Hall lapho bekunombuthano wabantu abasha khona. Uveze ukuthi uzimisele ngokusiza abantu abasha baseMdoni, okuyilapho eqhamuka khona, ngokubhala izinkondlo nokulingisa.Le mbongi iveze ukuthi ayigcini nje kuphela ngokulingisa kwiSibaya kodwa iphinde ifake isandla nasethimbeni elibhalayo.Lo mbuthano wabantu abasha ubuhlelwe ngabeMgeni Water ngokubambisana neLinda Sibiya Foundation, okuyihlangano yowayengumsakazi woKhozi FM uLinda Sibiya.ULinda uthe bazokwakhela abantu abasha baseMdoni isikhungo sokuthuthkisa amakhono KwaDumisa."Ngesonto elizayo inkampani ezokwakha izoya ukuyobuka indawo bese iyaqala iyakha. Kuzoshaya uNovemba sekubonakala. Asiqali ukwenza into efana nalena yokubuyisela emphakathini. Sike saya eMshwathi sakha isikhungo samakhono futhi eMandeni sinikela ngamakhompyutha khona. Uma sisuka eMdoni sizoya eKing Cetshwayo."Kulo mcimbi uhlelo obeluphethwe khona umsakazi woKhozi FM uBheka Mchunu bekukhona iMeya yaseMdoni uThabani Dube, amakhansela nabanye.
title: Bazohlomula ngesikhungo samakhono eMdoni

text: Le filimu iyimpendulo yesikhalo seminyaka kubantu abamnyama njengoba kungokokuqala ukubona umlingisi odabuka e-Afrika edlala indawo eqavile.Ngesikhathi ngizwa ngale filimu bengithi ngizobona umdlalo ongacwaningisisiwe noveza izwekazi i-Afrika njengendawo okukhonya kuyo izilwane. Ngijabulile ngoba akuvezwanga kakhulu lokho. I-Black Panther yifilimu ekhuluma ngenkosi encane uT’Chaka noma iBlack Panther (Chadwick) othatha izintambo zokuhola izwe lase-Afrika elibizwa ngeWakanda ngemuva kokubulawa kukayise uT’Chaka (Kani). Njengoba kunabantu abathatha i-Afrika njengezwe elingaphucuzekile, iWakanda yizwe elinobuchwepheshe bamanje futhi eligwilikiswe ngezokumbiwa phansi ezilifaka engozini kwamanye amazwe omhlaba. Okokuqala nje ngithande yonke into ngeBlack Panther. Kusukela emawashini ahlakaniphile enza abantu bakwazi ukuxhumana kalula kuya esiqeshini lapho kuliwa khona ngenxa yokusetshenziswa kobuchwepheshe bamanje. Uvezwe kahle nomhlabathi wase-Afrika. Isiqephu esingichaze kakhulu yilapho ibutho leW’Kabi lisebenzisa izingubo zokulala njengehawu lokusivikela ezitheni. Ithimba labalingisi lididiyele izingwazi zodwa ezimnyama ezidume umhlaba wonke.Ngikujabulele ukubona u-Angela Bassett noForest Whitaker belingisa ndawonye noLupita Nyong’o noChadwick Boseman - kuxutshwe kahle izizukulwane. Ngikuthandile ukubona abalingisi bakuleli uJohn Kani, Atandwa Kani noConnie Chiume benza abadume ngako kule filimu.Kungithokozisile nokubona abalingisi besifazane abamnyama benikezwa izindawo ezimqoka kule filimu.U-Okoye (Danai Gurira) ungumkhuzi webutho lesifazane elivikela inkosi neWakanda.Kakukho soka lingenasici.Ulimi olukhulunywa abantu baseWakanda yisiXhosa kodwa esizwakala sengathi olunye ulimi.NgingumSuthu, isiXhosa ngezinye zezilimi ezinzima kuleli. Kuyacika ukuzwa indlela abazama ngayo. Alukho olunye ulimi lwakuleli obelungasetshenziswa?Le filimu iqhamuke ngesikhathi esifanele futhi yenza into eyisimanga njengokuvumela amaciko amnyama ukuba abe wungqaphambili futhi axoxe ngomlando wawo. Ezikhundleni eziqavile, njengokuqondisa, izingubo nezingoma kwenziwe abantu abamnyama. Cabanga ushaya ivosho esihlalweni sasebhayisikobho ngenxa yenoni legqom’ eliculwa wuBabes Wodumo elithi Wololo.
title: IBlack Panther iyimpendulo yesikhalo

text:
UMampintsha noBabes sekunamasonto bebonakala ndawonye ezithombeni nakuma-video ezinkundleni zokuxhuamana nasemcimbini kangangokuba sekucacela ngisho ingane ukuthi babuyelene.Kamuva nje kutwitter ushiye abantu bebambe ongezansi uBabes efaka ivideo yakhe noMampintsha bezipholele kwi-jacuzzi, emufisela usuku oluhle lokuzalwa emazisa nokuthi uyamthanda. Ngenyanga edlule bashaye umjikelezo wemicimbi bethula iculo labo iKhona Iyngane Layndlini. Uthando luvutha nje, lezi zithandani zike zavulelana amacala okushaya ngemuva kokusabalala kwevideo kaMampintsha eshaya uBabes ku-Instagram. Engxoxweni nephephandaba lansuku zonke lesiNgisi, iDaily Sun, uSimelane uthe akazi lutho ngokubuyelana kukaBabes noMampinstha. “Angikho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Ngijwayele ukuzwa amahemuhemu kubantu ukuthi sebebuyelene. Kodwa-ke uma kwenzeka lokho, kuzongiphula inhliziyo,” ucashunwa esho kanje. USimelane uthe njengekholwa usemxolele uMampintsha ngesenzo sakhe kodwa akahambisani nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane. BUKA: Ivideo efakwe uBabes Wodumo luTwitter efisela uMampintsha usuku oluhle lokuzalwa izolo: 
pic.twitter.com/XaEBiOJ7fG— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
June 27, 2019“Ngisho ngabe kuthiwa kwenzeka enganeni yami noma komunye umuntu ngiyakuzonda,” kusho yena. Ukuqulwa kwecala likaMampintsha kusamile njengoba bavumelana noBabes ukwelulekwa osonhlalakahle beFamily and Marriage Society of South Africa (Famsa). Ngemuva kokuvela kwezinsolo zokuthi kunowesifazane owashaywa uBabes, udadewabo uNondumiso Simelane kanye nomunye umculi weGqom’ uTipcee, uSimelane wathi akasazingeni izindaba zikaBabes. OBabes baphuma behleka bodwa kuleli cala kulandela isinqumo sikaNeliswa Zulu sokulihoxisa ukuze balulungise ngaphandle kwenkantolo.
title: Uyise kaBabes uphawula ngodaba lwakhe noMampintsha

text: KUZOQASHWA osonhlalakahle abangu-1 809 ukuze basize umphakathi kulesi sikhathi seCovid-19.Usho kanje uNksz Lindiwe Zulu onguNgqongqoshe kazwelonke wokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi kuleli.“Baningi osonhlalakahle asebengithintile befuna umsebenzi,” kusho uNksz Zulu.Uthe abanye osonhlalakahle bazobaqasha izinyanga ezintathu, bese kuthi abangu-1 200, bazonikezwa ithuba lokusebenza bebe beqeqeshwa.NgokukaNksz Zulu, osonhlalakahle laba bazosiza ekulekeleleni ngezidingo zomphakathi kulesi sikhathi sokusabalala kwe coronavirus.Uthe kunamavolontiya angu-600 azophuma umkhankaso wokusiza umnyango wakhe ekusabalaliseni amaphasela okudla emphakathini.Uthe unethemba lokuthi lokhu kusabalalaliswa kokudla kuzokwenziwa ngendlela enesithunzi emphakathini.“Njengamanje akuhlelekile ukusabalaliswa kokudla. Lokho kudala inkohlakalo nokwenzelela,” kusho yena.Uxwayise abanikezwa ukudla ukuthi bangaphindi kaningi ngesikhathi esisodwa ngoba ngokwenze njalo, bavalela nabanye abalambile ithuba lokuthi bathole okuya ngasethunjini.Mayelana neminye imininingwane ngokunye, uthe abantu bangashayela kule nombolo entsha yakwaSASSA: 082 0468 553.
title: Kuzoqashwa abanye osonhlalakahle ngeCovid-19

text: UNOZINTI weSuperSport United, uRonwen Williams uthi kumele kube ngabadlali asebemnkantshubomvu eqenjini abakhombisa ukuba ngabaholi ekutheni bakwazi ukuqeda isizini behleli endaweni egculisayo kwi-log.UWilliams ubekhuluma nabeSuperSport ngemuva kokuwashiswa ijezi yiCape Town City ngo 2-0 kwiNedbank Cup Last 32. Amatsatsantsa agilwe yiyona iCity idla isicoco seMTN 8 kowamanqamu kule sizini kanti bese kungokwesine bedlala kule sizini ekhala ngaphansi.Ukubhimba kwezinto kuleli qembu lasePitoli selokhu kuqale ngesizini edlule ngaphansi kuka-Eric Tinkler ogcine ekhonjwe indlela iqembu lisho ukuvika izembe.Umqeqeshi okhona njengamanje, uKaitano Tembo, unikezwe izintambo ngokugcwele ekuqaleni kwesizini kodwa kubukeka izinto zingahlangani.Kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership, Amatsantsantsa ayibambe endaweni yesikhombisa ngamaphuzu awu-26.“Sinabadlali abangabaholi eqenjini njengoMorgan Gould, Clayton Daniels noBongani Khumalo. Kodwa uma ubheka emidlalweni eyishumi edlule silokhu sibashintsha abadlali bethu basemuva. Ngicabanga ukuthi kuzomele sike sibe nomgqigqo odongeni lwethu ukuze kube nokuxhumana okungcono. Kusemahlombe ethu thina badlali abadala ukuthi sihole iqembu libuyele ekwenzeni kahle,” kusho uWilliams.Emdlalweni olandelayo i-United izobhekana neLamontville Golden Arrows kwiligi ngoFebhuwari 10.Lesi sikhathi esingamasonto amabili bengadlali mhlawumbe yisona esizosiza ekutheni kululame nabadlali abalimele.Omunye wabo uThabo Mnyamane ophume esiwombeni sesibili koweCity kanjalo noKhumalo ongazange awuqede umdlalo eselimele.UTembo uthe uMnyamane akakalumi ngokugcwele.Ngokwakhe ukuhlulwa kwabo yiCity kube ngenxa yokuthi abadlali bakhe abakhombisanga ukulambela ukunqoba.“Besilandela ngemuva kukhona konke obekwenzeka enkundleni. Bona (iCity) bebekulambele ukunqoba,” kusho uTembo.Uthe sebezogxila ekwenzeni kangcono kwiligi.“Awukho umbandela otheni engibekelwe wona ngaphandle kokuthi senze kangcono kunangesizini edlule.”Ngesizini ephelile i-United iqede endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kodwa yagcina ingene kwiTop 8 ngenxa yokuvunwa yisinqumo sikamahluleli weSafa owalahla i-Ajax Cape Town ngecala lokudlalisa uTendai Ndoro.
title: Ufisa kube nomgqigqo odongeni

text: UKUBONA izingane ezifunda ezikoleni zasemakhaya nezasemalokishini zibhuquza emakhaya ngoba izikole zivaliwe ngenxa yeCovid-19, kodwa  ezifunda ezikoleni zezinye izinhlanga ziqhubeka nokufunda, kumenze wavula inkampani efundisa odado ulimi.UNksz Gloria Thandekile Mngadi (30) waseNdwedwe, usungule uhlelo lokufundisa izingane ezincane ezineminyaka ephakathi kwemine kuya kwewu-12 ngoWhatsApp isiZulu nesiNgisi. Lolu hlelo ulubiza ngeNgosi Yabantwana.Kulolu hlelo izingane zifunda ukubhala nokufunda lezi zilimi.UNksz Mngadi oneDiploma yeLanguage Practice ayifundela eDurban University of Technology (DUT) uke wafundisa isiZulu khona eDUT, uyimbongi nombhali wezincwadi zezingane.Uthe ngesikhathi izikole zisavaliwe kuleli ukuze kunqandwe ukusabalala kweCovid-19, izingane ezifunda ezikoleni zasemakhaya nasemalokishini zaze zakhohlwa ebese zikufundile ngoba bezivuka ekuseni ziyodlala kanti ontanga yazo abafunda ezikoleni ezithuthukile, bebefunda besemakhaya kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe besimanje."Ingiphathe kabi le nto uma ngiyibuka, ngakhumbula ukuthi nami ngingowasemakhaya lapho kusanezinselelo eziningi. Izikole ezithuthukile bezisebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe ngoba abazali bezingane ezifunda kulezi zikole bayakwazi ukuzisebenzisa. Ngibe sengifikelwa ukuthi ulimi yilona olubaluleke kakhulu enganeni nasempilweni ngakho uma ngingafaka esivivaneni ngokuthi ngifundise izingane ulimi ngoba yilo olubaluleke kakhulu, kungaba kuhle. Ngikhethe ukufundisa ulimi lwesiZulu nesiNgisi ngoba ezinye izifundo ezifundwayo esikoleni, ezinye zifundwa ngesiNgisi kanti ekhaya ingane ikhuluma isiZulu. Ngibone kubalulekile ukuthi ingane izifunde zombili lezi zilimi iziqonde kahle ngoba ekilasini asikho isikhathi sokutolikelana. Lapha uma ingane ingazi ngiyayicathulisa,“ kusho yena. Uthe abazali abaningi banawo uWhatsApp, yingakho ekhethe ukuthi asebenzise wona ukuze axhumane nezingane ngawo."Inhloso yami enkulu ukuthi ngifundise izingane ukuthi zizethembe uma zikhuluma ulimi. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngifuna ukuthi ngizicije ukuze zikwazi ukungenela umncintiswano wezingane wokupela amagama, i-Spelling B. Ngikhathazwa ukuthi ngiye ngibone izingane zakwamanye amazwe ziqeqebula kwi-TV, uma ngiziqhathanisa nezethu ngibona ezethu zisilele emuva," kusho yena.Uthe izingane uzifundisa ngendlela elula kuzona; njengokucula nokudweba ngoba kulula ukuthi zikhumbule uma zifunda kanjalo."Ingane ehlala ifunda noma ngabe ifunda into encane ihlala inomqondo oqaqekile. Ngifuna ukutshala leyo mbewu kulezi zingane, zikukhuthalele ukufunda," kusho yena.Uma engafundisi odado uthe usuke esebenza enkampanini yakhe i-GTNAQM PTY Ltd eyenza imisebenzi ethinta ulimi.Incwadi yakhe yokuqala yezingane ethi UMimi noZuzu Esikoleni ishicilelwe ngo-2015, nyakenye ubhale eyezinkondlo ngeCovid-19. UNkz Mngadi unenhlangano esiza amantombazane ngamaqakelo, iGloria Thandekile Foundation, athi ibuye isize umphakathi njengoba kuneCovid-19.
title: Ufundisa odado ulimi ngoWhatsApp

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEAKAPHATHEKILE kahle neze uThabo September, ofaniswa nedlozi eliphilayo leSuperSport United, ngomkhuba waleli qembu osudonse inqwaba yamasizini, wokudedela ithuba embangweni wesicoco seligi ngemizuzu yokugcina.Kubukeka nakule sizini  i-United eqeqeshwa uKaitano Tembo, ishaywa induku eyodwa yokuphuma embangweni wesicoco seligi emzuliswaneni wesibili.Omunye angathi amanga ukuthi iqembu like laba ngekinye lamathathu asesicongweni isikhathi eside emzuliswaneni wokuqala. Selehle laze lafika kweyesithupha ngamaphuzu awu-35, emidlalweni ewu-22.Sekuphele imidlalo eyisithupha lagcina ukuqoqa amaphuzu aphelele kwiDStv Premiership. Lagcina ukuqoqa amaphuzu aphelele ekuqaleni kukaFebhuwari lishaya yona iCape Town City.USeptember owafika kuMatsatsantsa a Pitori  ngo-2006 njengomdlali wagaxa amakhokho emgibeni ngo-2016, uthi kule sizini ubezitshela ukuthi leli shobolo lizobaxolela.Uthe kule midlalo eyisishiyagalombili esele uma bengavuka bazithathe akhona amathuba okuqeda okungenani kumaqembu amathathu aphezulu. "Kanginazo izibalo eziqondile zamasizini esihlale siphuma embangweni wesicoco seligi ngemizuzu yokugcina, kodwa sekuyisikhathi eside. Kule sizini kubukeka lo mkhuba usheshe waqala kakhulu."Nakuba kunjalo, ngiyaziqonda izinkinga ezibhekene neqembu kule sizini, sinesikwati esincane kakhulu. Okunye okusishayile ukulimala kukaGabuza (Thamsanqa) noBradley Grobler", kusho uSeptermber oke waba yiphini likaTembo nyakenye.Ziyaqina izinsolo zokuthi leli qembu elalaziwa ngePretoria City eminyakeni edlule, lisendalini. Nokho izikhulu zalo, uKhulu Sibiya ongusihlalo noStanley Matthews oyisikhulu esiphezulu, bayakuphika lokhu. Kuvela nokuthi ngenxa yalokhu kudayiswa okubikwayo, sekukhona amaqembu acathamela abadlali be-United. Imibiko yakamuva ithi iMamelodi Sundowns, isihlwithe injini yayo uSipho Mbule obekudume ukuthi ufunwa iKaizer Chiefs.Kubuzwa uSeptember oseyinxusa leSuperSport ukuthi ngabe le mibiko ayiwo umthelela kokwenzeka enkundleni, uthe: "Kangifuni ukuphawula ngalawo mahebezi ngoba kangiwazi ukuthi ayiqiniso kangakanani. Nakuba kunjalo lezo yizindaba zehhovisi, kangikholwa ukuthi zingabaphazamisa abadlali. Siyaxoxa nabadlali, ekhempini umqondo wokunqoba usekhona.“I-United yagcina ukunqoba isicoco seligi kwisizini ka-2009/10 isaqeqeshwa uGavin Hunt. Lo mqeqeshi washiya enqobe iligi kathathu neqembu. Selokhu yagcina ukuyinqoba kayikaze iphume kwi-Top 8. Ezinye izicoco ezinqotshwe aMatsatsantsa a Pitori, iTelkom Knockout (2014), Nedbank Cup (2011/12, 2015/16, 2016/17) neMTN 8 (2017, 2019).
title: USeptember ukhathazekile ngeshobolo le-United

text: ISENGCUPHENI yemilando ehlukene iKaizer Chiefs okufanele nakanjani iwine umdlalo wokugcina ukuze izodlala kwiMTN8 ngesizini ezayo.IChiefs isiphenduke ihlaya kubalandeli bebhola eMzansi ngokuhlala endaweni yesikhombisa kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership isikhathi eside.Akusekho engakwenza ukuze iqede endaweni engaphezulu kwaleyo. Osekungenzeka ukuthi uma ihluleka ukuwina kwiChippa United eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium namuhla, izibeke engcuphenibhekane yokuphuma kwi-top8.Amakhosi agcina ukuqeda ngaphandle kwe-top8 ngesizini ka-2006/2007 okuyisizini eyawina ngayo iMTN8 iqeqeshwa ngu-Ernst Middendorp okunguyeka oyiphekayo kumanje.Nokho yaqeda ngaphandle kwe-top 8 engasekho uMiddendorp kwazise akayiqedanga leyo sizini. Uma Amakhosi ephumelela ukuhlula iChippa azohlala endaweni yesikhombisa ngamaphuzu angu-42 okuzosho ukuqeda ngaphansi kwendawo yesithupha okokuqala kusukela ngesizini ka-2006/2007.Ngaphezu kwalokho azoqeda enamaphuzu amancane okwesibili kusukela kwasungulwa iPremier Soccer League. IChiefs igcine kuwona angu-42 ngesizini ka-2006/2007 iqeda endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log. Leli kwaba yirekhodi elacisha elango-1994 lamaphuzu amancane eyawathola kuleyiNational Soccer League (NSL) First Division iqeda endaweni yesihlanu ngawu-40.Isitobha saMakhosi, uTeenage Hadebe, sikhathazekile ngesimo iqembu elikuso ekubeni kubhekwe ukuthi libange izindebe nezimbangi i-Orlando Pirates neMamelodi Sundowns.“Kubuhlungu ngoba iqembu elifana neKaizer Chiefs akufanele lilwele i-top 8 kodwa kufanele libange isicoco ngoba yiqembu elikwaziyo ukuwina izindebe. Ngiyakholwa ukuthi ngesizini ezayo sizokwazi ukulungisa amaphutha enzekile kule sizini. Singabadlali sinengcindezi kodwa siyijwayele,” kusho uHadebe.Itshe limi ngothi kwiChiefs ngenxa yamaqembu ebanga nawo i-top 8 okukhona kuwona iLamontville Golden Arrows, Highlands Park neBloemfontein Celtic.Njengoba kwenseka ngesizini ka-2006/2007, iChiefs yaqeda ngaphandle kwe-top 8 kodwa yawina indebe, nakulokhu isethubeni lokuwina iNedbank Cup ezoyibanga neTS Galaxy edalla kwiNational First Division (NFD) ngoMeyi 18 eThekwini.Akubuzwa ukuthi le ndebe ingazithoba izinhliziyo zabalandeli osekuphele iminyaka bagcina ukubona iqembu labo ukuhlabana.UHadebe ungomunye wabajoyine iChiefs enethemba lokuthi bazowina izindebe kodwa abayazi injabulo kusukela bafika eNaturena.“Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi sizoyiwina iNedbank Cup. Sibakweleta indebe abalandeli bethu. Kufanele sizame ukuqeda isizini kukhona esikuwinile. Lena kuzoba yindebe yami yokuqala kwiChiefs,” kusho uHadebe.Maye-lana noku-bhekana neChippa uthe: “Uma udlala nama-qembu avika izembe kubanzima ngoba alwa ngayo yonke indlela ukuze azosinda. Thina silwela i-top 8. Kufanele senze ngakho konke ukuthi siwuwine lo mdlalo.”Umqeqeshi weChippa uClinton Larsen uphawule wathi: “Okwethu okufanele sikwenze ukunqoba singabheki ukuthi kwenzekani kwabanye. Okuhle kakhulu ngokunqoba kwethu lomdlalo ukuthi siyobe sesiphephile ngisho esibanga nabo banganqoba ngoba simikahle ngasemehlukweni wamagoli.”
title: IChiefs engcupheni yokuphenduka ihlaya

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEINTSIKA yaMaZulu FC, uMbongeni Gumede, ijabulela ukuphenduka kwabo izintandokazi kubalandeli baleli qembu athi phambilini bebebadlula endleleni kungabi ndaba zalutho.Kulezi zinsuku abadlali nabalandeli boSuthu bahambela phezulu ngenxa yempumelelo yakamuva.USuthu lusendaweni yesihlanu kwi-log yeDStv Premiership ngamaphuzu awu-34. Selunqobe imidlalo emine kulandelana.NgeSonto luzovakashela iBlack Leopards eThohoyandou Stadium, emdlalweni weligi ngo-3 ntambama.Okubaluleke kakhulu ngalo mdlalo, uma leli qembu, eliqeqeshwa nguBenni McCarthy, linqobile, lingazithola linyukela endaweni yesithathu.
