Lokhu kungaba yizindaba ezinhle, hhayi kubalandeli baMaZulu FC kuphela kodwa kubathandi bebhola KwaZulu-Natal jikelele kwazise neLamontville Golden Arrows yenza kahle njengoba ibambe indawo yesibili kwi-log.Uma Abafana Be'sthende beshaywe yiSwallows, ngoMgqibelo, eDobsonville, uSuthu luzoba kweyesibili, bona behlele kweyesithathu.Uma benqobile, basazoqhubeka nokuhlala kweyesibili njengoba bezobe beshoda ngephuzu kwiMamelodi Sundowns eqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-40.Ukungadlali kule mpelasonto kweSuperSport United, esendaweni yesithathu, ne-Orlando Pirates ekweyesine, enikela eLibya koweCaf Confederation Cup, yikona okunika ithuba la maqembu aseKZN lokuhlala ngokulandelana phezulu. UGumede, ofike kuMaZulu ngo-2015, uthe kuyabagqugquzela ukuhlonishwa ngabalandeli babo ngale ndlela."Abalandeli bethu bajabule futhi bayabona ukuthi sizama ngakho konke. Uma sihlangana nabo endleleni sebeyasibingelela. Phambilini bebesidlula sengathi abasazi. Ukungabi khona kwabo ezinkundleni kusithikamezile, siyazi ukuthi nabo bebefisa ukuba yingxenye yale mpumelelo yakamuva. Engikucela kubona wukuqhubeka nokuseseka, impi kayikapheli," kubeka uGumede.Uqhube wathi nempumelelo yozakwabo ngabodwana iyabagqugquzela.Lapha ubekhuluma ngoMcCarthy, osanda kuhlonishwa ngenkomishi yomqeqeshi wenyanga, noTapelo Xoki odlala emuva, owathola eyegoli le nyanga.Omunye ngunozinti, uVeli Mothwa, obebizelwe eqenjini lesizwe.UGumede uthe ngokubuka izinto, maningi amathuba okufezeka kwephupho likamengameli wabo, uSandile Zungu, lokusonga besemaqenjini amane phezulu.Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership ngempelasonto:NgoMgqibelo - Ngo-3pm: Swallows v Lamontville Golden Arrows (Dobsonville Stadium).Ngo-5pm: Maritzburg United v Chippa United (Harry Gwala Stadium); Cape Town City v Baroka (Cape Town Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-3pm: Black Leopards v AmaZulu (Thohoyandou Stadium); Bloemfontein Celtic v TS Galaxy (Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium).
title: OwoSuthu uchazwa wuthando lwabalandeli

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEIMENENJA kaThulani “Tyson” Hlatshwayo idalula imfihlo yokugixatshezwa kwalesi sitobha isikhundla sobukaputeni sibe sifika ngakho kodwa kwi-Orlando Pirates.UMike Ntombela ophethe izindaba zikaHlatshwayo ophuma kwiBidvest Wits lapho abegqiza ibhande,  uthe akamangalanga kakhulu enikwa ibhande emdlalweni wokuqala ngesikhathi  iPirates ishaya iCape Town City ngo 1-0 kwi-quarter final eMTN 8.Uthe isizathu salokhu wukuthi uyamazi uHlatshwayo, ungumholi wokuzalwa.UNtombela, osebenze isikhathi eside kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uthe uHlatshwayo ulihlonipha kakhulu ibhola ngoba uyazi ukuthi ukuleli zinga akulo le mpilo ngenxa yalo.Nokuziphatha kahle kuyamsebenzela uHlatshwayo obuye abe wukaputeni weqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana.“UTyson uhlale ethi kimi, iqembu yilona elihamba phambili. Uma abadlali bezibeke phambili, belishiya ngemuva iqembu izinto kazilungi. Ngaphandle kwalokhu uTyson uyindoda yomndeni, akaphuzi akabhemi, uyisibonelo esihle enkundleni nangaphandle.“Kalikho ihaba kulokhu engikushoyo,  ungumholi wokuzalwa. Uhlonipha ngisho umuntu ohlala emgwaqweni. Kangimangalanga enikwa ibhande efika kwiPirates,” kusho uNtombela.Uthe lapho amangala khona yingesikhathi uHlatshwayo enikwa ibhande kwiWits nakwiBafana asegijime kuyo imidlalo ewu-44.“Ngesikhathi uTyson efika kwiWits ngo-2014 ukaputeni kwakunguVilla (uSibusiso Vilakazi weSundowns). Kwadlula isikhathi esincane uGavin Hunt wamnika ibhande. Naseqenjini lesizwe enikwa isikhundla esifanayo ngathuka ngoba babebaningi abadlali abaqotho. Emuva kwalokhu ngavuma  ukuthi ukuhola uzalwe nakho,” kuqhuba uNtombela.Uthe okunye okumsizile amava okudlala kuwo wonke amaqembu esizwe.KwiPirates ibhande bekungelikaHappy Jele kodwa uHlatshwayo ufike walithatha ngoba uJele usenokuqala ebhentshini. UNtombela ukholwa wukuthi ubuholi bukaHlatshwayo noJele kuzoyisiza kakhulu iPirates.EZimnyama zizibeke ethubeni elihle lokungena kowamanqamu eMTN 8 emuva kokushaya izimbangi iKaizer Chiefs ngo 3-0 emdlalweni womlenze wokuqala kowandulela owamanqamu. Umlenze wesibili ungeSonto eFNB Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.“Ukubakhona kwabantu ababili abahlakaniphile – uHlatshwayo noJele – kwiPirates kuziyosiza kakhulu. Banobuholi obuqotho. Ngibona izokwenza kahle kakhulu kule sizini kwiDStv Premiership,” kusho uNtombela.Izolo iPirates ihlule iBloemfontein Celtic ngo 1-0 koweligi eDr Petrus Molemela Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.
title: UTyson ungumholi wokuzalwa: Ntombela

text: UMDWEBI omangaze abaningi ngoLwesine etheleka esigodlweni seSilo samaBandla KwaNongoma nemidwebo emibili uthe nakanjani nowenkakha yomlingisi uMenzi Ngubane umdwebo ukhona. ULebani "Rasta" Sirenji uthe ngesikhathi ematasa nemidwebo yeSilo ubematasa eceleni nomdwebo wesilomo somlingisi esingasekho emhlabeni uMenzi Ngubane. Lo mdwebo kaMenzi uthe ngeke awudedele engakaqedi ngawo ngoba lokhu kwenza abantu bagcine sebemenza ihlaya nomsebenzi wakhe wehlelwe yizinga.URasta uthe umdwebo kaMenzi oke wabonakala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana unamekwe nesithombe seSilo bekungewona owakhe. Uthe akazi ukuthi abantu bakuthathaphi ukuthi useqedile ngale mdwebo ekubeni leli bekuyisonto elinzima kakhulu kuyena njengoba bebaningi abantu abakhulu ebekumele abadwebe. "Ngimatasa nokudweba uMenzi ngisabheka nendlela engizokwenza ngayo ukuhambisa lo mdwebo ngoba kunemthetho yeCovid-19," kusho uRasta.Umlingisi wesifazane naye oshone ngokulandelana noMenzi uNoxolo Maqashalala uthe akamshiyanga ngaphandle umatasa nomdwebo wakhe azomhlonipha ngawo bese ewudlulisela emndenini.Mayelana nokuya kwakhe KwaNongoma uthe bekudinga ukuthi aqunge isibindo njengoba ebesevele exwayisiwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kwaze kwaba khona nabamsabisayo. Yize imidwebo yakhe idumile futhi nabanye bosaziwayo benayo kodwa akumenzeli umehluko otheni njengoba engatholi mali ngayo. URasta uma kumele ahambise umdwebo kwesinye isifundazwe ugibela ibhasi ngobumnyama ukuze afike ekuseni engasezodinga indawo yokulala. Ngelinye ilanga kuyenzeka aswele nemali yokugibela yize edumile. Noma kunjalo ukudweba umsebenzi awuthandayo nawuzwa egazini futhi unesifiso sokuba nendawo yakhe yokwenza umbukiso ngomsebenzi wakhe nokwenza adwebe izithombe ngambili; azosipha umndeni nesinye asigcinayo ukuze sibe yingxenye yombukiso.
title: URasta uzohlonipha noMenzi Ngubane ngomdwebo

text: ISIFUNDAZWE saKwaZulu-Natal ngaphansi kohlelo lwe-KZN Travel Academy sizoqinisa amaxhamu ezokuxhumana nokumakethwa kwezindawo zokuvakasha namazwe angaphandle okubalwa nawaphesheya kwezilwandle. Lokhu kulandela ukuthi namhlanje kutheleke izimenywa ezingu-40 zezinkampani zezokuvakasha ezahlukene neziqhamuka emazweni ase-Afrika angomakhelwane kanjalo naphesheya kwezilwandle. Phakathi kwezinhlaka zokuvakasha ezikhona kubalwa nezisebenza ngokubambisana namazwe akhonzwe kakhulu izivakashi okubalwa iSpringbok Atlas egxile kakhulu e-UK, USA naseGermany. Ngaphandle kwayo kukhona neThompson Africa eletha kakhulu izivakasha esifundazweni saKwaZulu-Natal. Iningi lalezi zivakashi zeTompson Africa lisuke liqhamuka e-UK, Germany, USA, China nase-India. Lezi zicukuthwane zizohambela izindawo ezahlukene esifundazweni ezicebe ngomlando nemidlalo eminingi eheha izivakashi. Phakathi kwezindawo ezibekiwe kubalwa iSouth Coast, Drakensberg, Richards Bay, iTheku, Mhlanga, Elephant Coast nezinye. Isikhulu esiphezulu kwiTourism KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Phindile Makwakwa uthi laba abangu-40 bazinikezwa nethuba lokuhambela izindawo zokuvakasha kulesi sifundazwe. Amahhotela, B&B nezinye izindawo eziheha izivakashi bazokhonjiswa zona ngenhloso yokuyozimaketha emazweni angaphandle.  "Siyajabula ukuthi sikwazi ukuphinda sibe ne-travel Academy nakulo nyaka njengoba sesikwenza okwesibili. Kuhle nokubona ukuthi wonke umuntu esihwebelana naye useyabona ukuthi kumele abeyingxenye yayo. Inhloso enkulu ukuthi bakwazi nokuyimaketha iKZN abantu bayivakashele ngamaholidi, sikhule nesibalo sezivakashi eziqhamuka emazweni aphesheya kwezilwandle," kusho uNksz Makwakwa. Namhlanje lizoshona lezi zicukuthwane seziqalile ukuhambela ezinye zezindawo okubalwa kuzo neZimbali Coastal Resort eseduze neBallito eThekwini lapho befikele khona ekuseni. ILuthuli Museum eKwaDukuza ngenye yezindawo ezizovakashelwa, iLembe Winery nezinye. Lolu hlelo lwezokuvakasha luzoqhubeka kuze kulamule ukuphela kwempelasonto.
title: IKwaZulu-Natal nohlelo lokuzikhankasa kubavakashi

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEKUGQUGQUZELWA abantu ukuba bajove izinja zabo ukuze zingabi namarabi njengoba namhlanje kuyi-World Rabies Day yokuqwashisa ngalesi sifo.Ngokocwaningo lodokotela bezilwane baseNyuvesi yasePitoli, amarabi abulala abantu abangu-600 000 emhlabeni ngonyaka.USolwazi Louis Nel womnyango weMicrobiology and Plant Pathology kule nyuvesi usekhaleni lomkhakhaso obizwa nge-Global Alliance for Rabies Control (GARC).UNel unohlelo lokusiza amazwe ase-Afrika ukuba alwe nenkinga yamarabi.Ubuye afundise umphakathi ngokubaluleka kokugoma izinja ukuze zingabi namarabi, abhale nezincwadi ezibahlomisa ngolwazi lokuthi benze njani uma belunywe yizinja ezingagonyiwe.Uthe akuzona kuphela izinja ezidinga ukugonywa kodwa namakati nezinye izilwane ezifuyiwe kumele zigonywe.UNel uzovakashela izikole afundise izingane ngama-rabi nokubaluleka kokugoma izilwane.Ulwazi ngomkhankaso wakhe lutholaka kwi-website ethi www.rabiesalliance. org.Ungazivikela emarabini ngokuthi ugome izilwane zasekhaya okuyizinja namakati:n Ungalokothi uthinte inja egulayo ongayazi.n Bikela ababhekelele izilwane uma kukhona inja ezulazula ngalapho uhlala khona.n Phuthuma esibhedlela uma ulunywe yinja.
title: Usuqalile owokujovela amarabi ezilwaneni

text: UNOBHALA jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, uthe kumele asekwe uMengameli Jacob Zuma ngoba ungumengameli wezwe.UMagashule uthe asikho isinqumo esithathwe yinhlangano sokuthi uZuma akhishwe kuhulumeni njengomengameli.“Abantu abasho lokhu abafuna udumo nokuthandwa amaphephandaba. Akasekwe uZuma njengoba engaseyena umengameli we-ANC. Sanquma ukuthi bonke asebake baba ngomengameli be-ANC bazokwazi ukuba ngamalungu esigungu esiphezulu se-ANC, bamenyiwe ukuzothamela imihlangano yesigungu esiphezulu,” kusho uMagashule.Ukusho lokhu kugujwa iminyaka engu-106 kwabunjwa i-ANC eMgungundlovu izolo.Kuke kwezwakala ukuthi uZuma uzokhonjwa indlela njengoba engaseyena umengameli we-ANC kodwa engumengameli wezwe.I-ANC ithe akukho ukudideka ngoba isizinda samandla sikwi-ANC hhayi kuhulumeni ngoba abantu basuke bejutshwe yinhlangano kuhulumeni.UMagashule uthe umthetho awusebenze endabeni yepulazi iVrede Dairy eFree State.Usho lokhu nje ngoLwesihlanu oKlebe baseshe amahhovisi akhe njengoba kuphenywa iqhaza lakhe endabeni yaleli pulazi okuhlanganisa nomndeni wakwaGupta.“Abangasisabisi ngokuthi bazosibopha, abaphenye bathathe izinyathelo uma kunenkohlakalo,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe bafuna isifundazwe sibumbane wathi uma sintenga lesi sifundazwe noKhongolose uyontenga.“Bafuna kube nongabazane ngesifundazwe. Akumele iKZN intenge ngoba lokho kuyosho ukuthi i-ANC izoba ntekenteke. Lesi sifundazwe yisona esihambisa amalungu amaningi ngisho ePhalamende likazwelonke,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe abalwi neSilo namakhosi mayelana nokuthathwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo.“Ngeke sidle umhlaba weSilo sibe sisasaba abelungu abathatha umhlaba wabamnyama. Sifuna umhlaba ubuye, sizowudla ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe kudingeka kwesekwe eyemfundo yamahhala emenyezelwe nguZuma.
title: 'UZuma uyakudinga ukwesekwa'

text: UFUNA kuboshwe umbulali umndeni wentombazane yaseMacekwane, eMpangeni, etholwe ilengiswe ngothayi ababili ngoLwesibili.USiphelele Mbatha (19) obefunda uGrade 12 eQhamuka High utholwe ngoLwesibili enezimpawu zokudlwengulwa nokuklinywa ehlathini elibuqamama nakubo.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi noma kungaqondakali okuholele kulesi sigameko kodwa kusolwa omunye umfundi wakwesinye isikole.Umfowabo kaSiphelele, uMnuz Sizwe Mbatha (31) uthe: “Siwumndeni sivumelene ngokuthi angeke sidalule imininingwane eminingi ngalolu daba ngoba konke okungase kulekelele amaphoyisa sikubikile kuwona. Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi ukhona umkhondo esinawo. Eminye imininingwane ingase iphazamise uphenyo lwamaphoyisa,” kusho uMbatha ngamafuphi.Echaza ngokwenzeke ngaphambi kokufa kukadadewabo, uMbatha uthe baqala ukushaqeka ngoMsombuluko ngesikhathi umufi engabuyi esikoleni. “USiphelele wahamba eya esikoleni kodwa akazange abuye nabanye abafundi ngendlela okujwayeleke ngayo. Kuthe uma sishayela ucingo izingane afunda nazo nothisha wakhe sathola ukuthi esikoleni wayephume ngesikhathi esijwayelekile. Savele sazitshela ukuthi kusho ukuthi useqomile mhlawumbe uyolala esokeni,” kusho uMbatha.Uqhuba uthe ngoLwesibili ekuseni abafundi abebeya esikoleni bathole ijezi lomfaniswano wesikole abakholwe ukuthi ngelikaSiphelele ehlathini elingaphesheya kwakubo. “Bathe uma besazisa ngalokhu saphuma inqina siyobheka. Emuva kwamahora sibheka sisitholile isidumbu. Ubulewe kabuhlungu udadewethu. Kubuhlungu kodwa sinethemba lokuthi maduze nje umsolwa uzoboshwa."Ngokuthola kweSolezwe umufi ubeklinywe ngothayi ababili, owodwa ngowakhe wesikole abefunda kuso kuthi omunye kube ngowesinye isikole esisendaweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uColonel Thembeka Mbele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi isidumbu sikamufi sitholwe ehlathini sinezimpawu zokudlwengulwa nokuklinywa.“Amaphoyisa aseMpangeni aphenya icala lokubulala nokudlwengulwa. Umsolwa akakaboshwa kodwa uphenyo luyaqhubeka."
title: Umfundi utholwe elenga ngothayi

text: ABALANDELI bentokazi eyaduma ngokwethula izinhlelo zethelevishini sebezwakalise okukhulu ukukhathazeka kulandela ukusabalala izithombe zayo ezikhonondisayo. UKuli Roberts selokhu ebhadeka izithombe zakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okubalwa nekhasi lika-Instagram egqoke izimpahla zangaphansi ezahlukene. Lezi zimpahla zakhe zinhle ziqedile futhi akuqali ngaye ukuthi kubonakale osaziwayo beshutha bezigqokile, kodwa ukwehla kwesisindo somzimba namathanga abukeka sengathi ubethamele isigcaki kwethuse abaningi.Abalandeli balo saziwayo balokhu bebabaze njalo ezithombeni ezahlukene babodwa abazwakalisa ukuthi basola ukuthi mhlawumbe lo saziwayo akaphathekile kahle egazini nokungenzeka ukuthi uyagula. Babodwa abangakhathalele kuthenjwa abamtshela ezikabhoqo ukuthi akahlale ikhefu ngokunameka lezi zithombe ngoba azichazi nakancane. Abanye baze bambize ngogogo bese bebhansela ngamakhanda ahlekayo.Yize uKuli aduma kakhulu ngokuzikhulumela nokuphoxana eminyakeni edlule kodwa kulokhu ubukeka engazimisele nakancane ukuphawula nokuziphendulela kubantu abakhononda ngezithombe zakhe. Kunalokho uvele aqubise adlulise izinsuku ezimbalwa aphinde ababhansele ngesinye esedle omunye umsiko eshuthe ngesitayela esehlukile. Okunye okugqamayo kwezinye zezithombe azinameke ku-Instagram phambili ukuthi ukuthathwa kwalezi zithombe kubukeka sengathi kukhona nezimpahla zangaphansi azikhangisayo.
title: Ubadida ngomzimba uKuli ezinkundleni zokuxhumana

text:
BONGIWE ZUMAUKUBONA osaziwayo abaningi begida ndawonye bengakhuli ngemisebenzi abayenzayo kwamenza waba nomcabango webhizinisi owesifazane waseThekwini wasungula inkampani ebhekele imisebenzi yabo ngqo.UNksz Lawrancia Mqwebu (33) owazalelwa eNtuzuma kodwa osezinze eDurban North ungumnikazi weFAB Communications asebenza kuyo ngokubambisana nodadewabo uNksz Andile Mqwebu (30).Ngaphandle kwale nkampani uphinde abengumdidiyeli wolunye lwezinhlelo ezihamba phambili kuKhozi FM, i
Nethezeka noKhozi okuwuhlelo lukaMroza Buthelezi olungena njalo ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu.I-FAB Communications ibhekela yonke into ethinta usaziwayo kusukela ekumtholeleni umsebenzi awuthandayo, ukusayinwa kwezinkontileka kanjalo nendlela yokuziphatha emphakathini okungaba nasemicimbini eyahlukene.Uthe into eyenza wavula le nkampani eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule ukubona isidingo sezokuxhumana phakathi kosaziwayo nosomabhizinisi kanjalo nezinkampani abazisebenzelayo okwenza noma benza izinto ezihlukile kungabonakali.UNksz Mqwebu uthe ukusebenza kwakhe eGoli lapho ayiqala khona inkampani yakhe ethuthukisa ezokungcebeleka kwamsiza ukuzakhela igama ngokusebenza kahle nabanye bosaziwayo.Phakathi kosaziwayo abake basebenza iminyaka noNksz Mqwebu kubalwa uDJ Sbu we
Friends Like These asebenze naye ngaphansi kwe-Urban Brew iminyaka eyisikhombisa.Uphinde wasebenza noTrevor Noah, Proverb, Sorisha Naidoo, DJ Tira, L’vovo Derrango, Dineo Ranaka nabanye abaziwayo kwezokungcebeleka.“Ngiphezu kohlelo lokukhulisa inkampani ngisungule enye ezokwazi ukubhekela lonke lolu hlobo lwemisebenzi engiyenzayo.“Ukusebenza kakhulu nosaziwayo akusho ukuthi ngigxile kubo kuphela kodwa ngiyasebenza nosomabhizinisi abazimele kanjalo nezinkampani ezahlukene.“Kodwa kulabo abenza ezobuciko nabasafufusa ngiyabadlulisela kwabanye abantu ngoba ngokwenkampani yethu ngeke bakwazi ukukhokhela zonke izindleko esizibhekelayo.“Okusemqoka kakhulu kimi ukubona umuntu ekhula noma ngabe ungumculi kodwa kuningi angakwenza ngale kokucula ngoba akusiyo into ayenza zonke izinsuku,” kusho uNksz Mqwebu.IFAB Communications beyaziwa kakhulu eGoli kanti kulo nyaka uNksz Mqwebu useyimakethe yathola nodumo KwaZulu-Natal okwenza asebenze nabantu abaningi.Ukusebenza kwakhe kuKhozi FM ukuthatha njengezinye zezinto eziwumphumela wokwenza kahle kwenkampani yakhe nokuzifundisa kabanzi ngalo mkhakha.Ephetha uthe ngaphandle kosizo lukadadewabo noyise uMnuz Roland Mqwebu odume ngoMkhize ku
Muzi Wezinsizwa umfake isandla.
title: ULawrancia ungene ngenxeba kosaziwayo

text: ISIFUNDAZWE saKwaZulu-Natal siqinise umkhankaso waso wokulwa nobhubhane lwe-Corona njengoba izolo sethule isitimela esizosetshenziselwa ukuhlolela abantu leli gciwane.Lesi sitimela esifana nesibhedlela esingumahambanendlwana sinamagumbi angu-19 kanti phakathi kusona kukhona umtholampilo, indawo yokukhipha amazinyo, eyokuhlola amehlo nekhemisi.Lesi sitimela sizojikeleza cishe isifundazwe sonke sihamba sisiza abantu.Ethula inkulumo yakhe esiteshini sesitimela ePhoenix emva kokwethulwa kwalesi sitimela esinikelwe ngabakwaTransnet, uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe namhlanje (izolo) bazokwethula isitimela esibizwa ngePhelophepa 11.“Lesi sitimela sinazo zonke izinto ozidinga esibhedlela njengoba sinomtholampilo osezingeni, sikwazi ukwelapha siphinde sihlole abantu igciwane leCorona sikwazi futhi nokubheka nezinye izifo,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe ukusebenza kwalesi sitimela kuqhakambisa uhlelo lokusebenzisana kwezinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuthuthukisa, olubizwa ngeDistrict Development Model.“Kulolu hlelo, yilapho zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni zisebenza ngokubambisana. Kulesi sitimela kuzoba khona abasebenzi boMnyango wezeMpilo, abakwaTransnet nabombutho wezokuVikela wakuleli,” kusho uZikalala.UZikalala uthe ukubambisana kwenza ukuthi benguhulumeni bakwazi ukuba negalelo elikhulu ezintweni abazenzayo kunokusebenza beyinhlakanhlaka.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ngesikhathi kwethulwa isitimela esizosiza ekulweni neCorona esifundazsweni. Isithombe: NQOBILE MBONAMBIUNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, naye ugcizelele indaba yokubambisana wathi kulesi sitimela kuzophinde kube khona nabasebenzi boMkhandlu weTheku.“AbakwaTransnet ngesikhathi bekhuluma noNdunankulu bathe bazosinika lesi sitimela sisisebenzise ezifundeni ezinhlanu zesifundazwe. Sizoqala sizinze lapha ePhoenix lapho sizobe selapha sisiza nabantu besifunda iLembe. Sizosuka lapha siye eKing Cetshwayo, sisuke khona siye eZululand, sisuke khona siye Ogwini sivale ngoMgungundlovu, kuzona zonke lezi zindawo sizohlala amasonto amabili,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe bayazi ukuthi bayagxekwa ngokuthi sebenake kakhulu i-Covid-19, base bekhohlwa ngezinye izifo ezikhona.Ibamba lemenenja yakwaTransnet, ezosebenza kulesi sitimela, uDkt Mathapelo Mashuphu, lithe kusukela kuqale ubhubhane lwe-Corona, banikwe umsebenzi wokuba balekelela ukuze kuliwe kuphinde kunqandwe leli gciwane.Lesi sitimela siyaye sizungeze minyaka yonke silekelela umphakathi ngezifo ezinhlobonhlobo.
title: Kwethulwe isitimela esizosiza kwiCorona

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAUKHONJWE indlela uGordon Igesund obengumqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana ngemuva kokuba nomhlangano omfushane izolo ntambama nenhlangano eyengamele ibhola kuleli, iSouth African Football Association (Safa).Inhloso yalo mhlangano obusezindlini zeSafa, eGoli, bekuwukuthi u-Igesund azozikhalela kwazise isigungu esiphezulu seSafa bese sivele sihlangene ngempelasonto.Bahlangane ihora ngemuva kwalokho, isigungu ebesiholwa umengameli uDanny Jordaan, Norman Arendse, Natasha Tsichlas no-Andile Ndengezi saphuma nesinqumo sokungayivuseleli inkontileka yakhe.“Bekubalulekile ukuthi kube sekuhleleke yonke into ngaphambi kokuthi sidlale neSudan eKhartoum emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-African Cup of Nations eseMorocco. Ngemuva kwalokho sizodlala nompetha base-Afrika iNigeria. Ngenxa yale midlalo emqoka sibone kungcono ukuthi siqede ngalolu daba manje,” kusho uJordaan.IBafana iqhathwe neNigeria, Sudan, Namibia/Congo Brazzaville neLibya/Rwanda. Imidlalo yokuhlunga iqala ngoSepthemba.Echaza ngezizathu eziholele ekutheni ingabe isavuselelwa inkontileka ka-Igesund ephela ngo-Agasti 31, uthe: “Umbandela ayebekelwe wona, wukufaka iqembu eNdebeni yoMhlaba noma ke afinyelele esigabeni samaqoqo sokuhlunga. Ukungena kweyandulela eyamanqamu ku-Afcon (ka-2013) nakho bekuwumbandela. Akuzange kushiwo lutho ngemidlalo ye-African Nations Championship (CHAN) ngakho asigxilanga kakhulu kulokho. Uzibekile izizathu zakhe kodwa ekugcineni siyikomiti sinqume ukuthi ingabe isavuselelwa inkontileka yakhe uma isiphela ngo-Agasti 31.”UJordaan uthe bazomemezela umqeqeshi omusha ngemuva kukaJulayi 31 njengoba kuyima bezoqala ukuxoxisana nabangase bathathe umsebenzi.Unqabile ukuphumela obala ngokuthi uCarlos Queiroz oqeqesha i-Iran eya eBrazil noStephen Keshi oqeqesha iNigeria ngabanye babaqeqeshi abababhekile. Amagama alaba ahamba phambili kulabo okuthiwa bangase bangene endaweni ka-Igesund. Uthe akekho asebekhulume naye.U-Igesund uqashwe kuBafana ngoJuni 2012 esayina inkontileka yeminyaka emibili. Uthathe izintambo ngemuva kukaPitso Mosimane owakhonjwa indlela kwesikabhadakazi esuswa ekhempini yeBafana eyayiseRustenburg kwadingeka ukuthi ashaye imoto abheke eGoli eseyotshelwa ukuthi umsebenzi uphelile.Ngaphambi kokuthi kuthathe u-Igesund kwakubambe uSteve Komphela abagcine bebanga naye ukuthatha lo msebenzi.U-Igesund ufike iBafana isalelwe imidlalo emine kweyokuhlungela ukuya eBrazil.IBafana yayilindwe yiCentral African Republic ekhaya nasekuhambeni neBotswana ekhaya ne-Ethiopia ekuhambeni. Unqobe imidlalo emithathu washaywa kowodwa kodwa kwadlula i-Ethiopia eyaqeda esicongweni. Ku-Afcon ibafana yakhishwa yiMali kuma-quarterfinal.
title: Kuphelile obekuhlanganise u-Igesund neBafana

text:
THEMBA NTSHINGILAUMHOLI weNational Freedom Party (NFP), uNkk Zanele KaMagwaza Msibi, uthi ukwamukela isikhundla sokuba yiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezeSayensi nobuChwepheshe kwiKhabhinethi entsha kaMengameli Jacob Zuma, akusho ukulaxaza iqembu lakhe kodwa kunalokho kusho ukukhula kwalo.UNkk Magwaza-Msibi ukusho lokhu esithangamini nabezindaba ebesisemahhovisi eqembu eThekwini, ngemva kokuthi uZuma ememezele ukuthi usemqokele kulesi sikhundla.Namhlanje uzofungiswa e-Union Buildings ePitoli.“Ngenkathi iNFP iqala ukungenela ukhetho, umgomo wayo wawuthi izozimela njengeqembu lezepolitiki,” kusho uNkk Magwaza-Msibi.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi njengoba senginikezwe lo msebenzi nguhulumeni, iNFP isizoshabalala. Mina ngibona ithuba lokukhula kweqembu, lingabi namandla KwaZulu-Natal kuphela kodwa nakwezinye izifundazwe,” kuchaza yena.UNkk Magwaza Msibi obebukeka ethukile ubuye wabhoka wathi: “Futhi akuyona into entsha ukuthi kube khona umholi weqembu elithile onikezwa isikhundla kuhulumeni. Kungani kube sengathi kwenzeke okuhlukile uma sekwenzeka kwiNFP?”Wenze isibonelo ngomengameli we-IFP, uMangosuthu Buthelezi, Themba Godi, Peter Mulder, wathi sebake baba ngamalungu ePhalamende, banikezwa izikhundla kwiKhabhinethi, pho kungani uma sekungaye?Uthe akukho mehluko ongase wenze iqembu lakhe lifadabale ngoba usazoqhubeka nokufingqa imikhono alisebenzele.Ngokusho kwakhe, usazohlela uxhaxha lwama-
rally ezindaweni ezehlukene lapho ezobonga khona abalandeli baleli qembu ngokubavotela okhethweni lukazwelonke obelungoMeyi 7.Uthe lena ngenye yezindlela azokhombisa ngazo ukuthi akaqhelelene nabalandeli beqembu.Ugcizelele ukuthi ukunikwa kwakhe isikhundla, kuzothuthukisa impilo yabantu bonke baseNingizimu Afrika ngoba bazobe sebesebenzisana njengohulumeni namaqembu ahlukene.UMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, umhlaziyi wepolitiki, uthe uNkk Magwaza-Msibi usevele wayibulala wayiqeda nya iNFP ngokuvuma kwakhe ukuthatha lesi sikhundla.“Umuntu ozozuza lapha nguyena kuphela. Into azoyithokozela yimali njengoba ezothola ngaphezulu kwesigidi ngonyaka,” kuphawula uNdlovu.Mayelana neNFP, uthe kuzokwenzeka esaseZimbabwe lapho uMnuz Morgan Tsvangarai weMovement for Democratic Change avuma ukunikwa isikhundla sokuba ngundunankulu, iqembu lakhe lalahlekelwa abalandeli emva kwalokho.Uthe ukuqokwa kwakhe kuchaza kamhlophe ukuthi ngeke esaba naso isikhathi esanele seNFP kodwa usezonaka umsebenzi wakhe omusha.Okhulumela iHhovisi likaMengameli, uMnuz Mnuz Mac Maharaj, uthe njengohulumeni, baqale babheka indlela okungathuthukiswa ngayo abantu ngokulethelwa izidingo nokulwa nobuphofu emazingeni aphansi.“Ngokomthethosisekelo ka-1996 owamukelwa ukuthi ulawule izwe, i-ANC yazibophezela ukuthi isebenzisane namanye amaqembu ngenhloso yokudala ubunye nokugqugquzela intando yabantu,” kuchaza uMaharaj.UMnuz Sizwe Mchunu, ohola iDA esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uthe badumele kakhulu ngokuvuma kukaNkk Magwaza-Msibi lesi sikhundla.“Usengomunye wabaholi abaphikisayo ‘osegwinywe’ yi-ANC ngokumnunusela ngemali eningi ngesikhundla kuhulumeni,” kusho uMchunu esitatimendeni.Uthe okuhloswe yiNFP wukuhlomulisa abaholi bayo ngezikhundla kuhulumeni.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, i-ANC esifundazweni isishayele ihlombe lesi senzo sokuqokwa kwakhe.Ithe uZuma ukhombise ukuhambisana nezidingo zabantu ezweni, hhayi ezamaqembu ezepolitiki.
title: UZuma uqoke uKaMagwaza-Msibi

text: ISILOMO somsakazi woKhozi FM, uKhathide “Tshatha” Ngobe, sithe “ngeke ngimoshe isikhathi ngiphendulana nesiyabhuyabhu esingathi shu.” Besisho umculi kamaskandi, uDlubheke Khuzwayo.UTshatha ubekhuluma naleli phephandaba ngemuva kokuvela kwe-video kaDlubheke lapho ebebasola ngokungabakhokheli ngendlela efanele abaculi emcimbini Impucuzeko Maskandi Festival. Lo mcimbi uzoba ngoMgqibelo ePeople’s Park, eMoses Mabhida Stadium.“Ngeke ngiphawule lutho. Akaqali vele ukulokhu ekhuluma kanje. Uyangisanganela. Anginandaba naye. Ngizomthini umuntu ongezwani nabazali bakhe. Ngeke ngilokhu ngimosha umfutho wami, anginasikhathi nje sakhe,” kusho uTshatha ngokunengeka.Kwi-video, uDlubheke usole uTshatha nomunye umgqugquzeli womcimbi uXolani Mcineka ngokuba wogombela kwesabo ngokuthatha imali eningi abaculi babanikeze amanenjana.Imizamo yokuthola uMcineka ayiphu-melelanga njengoba ucingo belukhala luze luthule. Umyalezo athunyelelwe wona kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela engawuphendulanga.UDlubheke uthe bayaxhashazwa futhi abaholelwa lutho.“Ayikho imali esiyithola ngaloya mcimbi. Ngifuna kuzwakale kahle ukuthi ngisho kwiMpucuzeko Maskandi Festival hhayi yonke imicimbi.”Uqhube wathi umculi ngamunye kumele acule bukhoma kodwa bakhokhelwe imali engafiki ndawo.“Ibuhlungu kakhulu le nto, simuncwa amandla ethu sibhekile. Besithule le nto siyibuka iminyaka ngeminyaka.”Uthe uzowamela amaciko yize engathunywanga.Imizamo yokuthola uDlubheke izolo ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe belungangeni futhi nomyalezo athunyelelwe wona bekubonakala ukuthi awufundwanga.UTshatha uthe konke kumi ngomumo ngomcimbi futhi kade behlangene namaphoyisa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuzobe kuphephile.Abaculi abazonandisa kubalwa kubo uThokozani Langa, Igcokama, Khuzani, Osaziwayo, Inkosi Yamagcokama, Bahubhe, Shwi noMtekhala, Stability, Amageza Amahle nabanye.Umcimbi uqala ngo-10 ekuseni uphele ngo-10 ebusuku kanti amathikithi atholakala esangweni ngoR100 aweVIP abe nguR500.
title: Impi yamazwi phakathi kukaDlubheke noTshatha

text: I-URUGUAY izibeke endaweni engcono yokuthi ibalwe namaqembu azodlulela esigabeni somkhulajezi kwi-2018 FIfa World Cup iwola wonke amaphuzu amathathu kwiGroup A yehlula i-Egypt ngemuva kokutibula.Lo mdlalo enqobe khona ngo 1-0 ubudlalelwa Central Stadium, Yekaterinburg, izolo ntambama. Igoli elephule izinhliziyo zabalandeli be-Egypt lingqofelwe phakathi uJose Gimenez esikhathini esengezwe unompempe.Ukunqoba kwe-Uruguay kuyenze yalingana ngamaphuzu neRussia yona ebhaxabule ngo 5-0 iSaudi Arabia emdlalweni wokuvula obuseLuzhniki Stadium, ekomkhulu lakuleli yazwe iMoscow, ngoLwesine ntambama.EzikaFaro kuzofanele zibuyise isithunzi ngokushaya iRussia emdlalweni wesibili eSaint Petersburg Stadium, ngoLwesibili ngo 8 ebusuku.NgoLwesithathu i-Uruguay izobhekana neSaudi Arabia, eRostov Arena ngo 5 ntambama.Yize belingana ngamaphuzu kodwa ezikaVladimir Putin (Russia) yizona eziqhwakele phezulu eqoqweni u-A.Ukubuyela emdlalweni wayizolo, isiwombe sokuqala siphele amaqembu ebambene ngeqanda nhlangothi zombili.Phezu kokuthi kuyiwe ekhefini ingekho efuna ukugoba uphondo kodwa uLuiz Suarez, ucishe washiya kungadliwe eGibhithe ngesikhathi umcibisholo webhola lakhe lishayise eceleni kwenethi.Yize uSuarez ebethole leli thuba kodwa abafana bakaFaro bebewuphethe umdlalo ngale siwombe nakube bebengakwazi ukugqobhoza udonga lwe-Uruguay.Ngaphambi komzamo kaSuarez kuke kwaba nokuphakama kwezibili ngesikhathi * -Edinson Cavani, ededela imbhokodo yebhola kodwa unozinti we-Egypt, uMohamed Elshenawy, walala phezu kwayo.Ngesiwombe sesibili womabili amaqembu aqhubeke lapho ebegcine khona ngesokuqala.Abehlaselana ngamandla kodwa kube lukhuni ukugqobhoza nhlangothi zombili.Abantu besahlela izikhundla kule siwombe, uSuarez uphinde waphunyuka kubadlali basemuva be-Egypt kodwa waphinde wenganyelwa ukugeja, sebesukumile abalandeli be-Uruguay, becabanga ukuthi lisenethini.Ngomzuzu ka-71, Ahmed Fathi, we-Egypt uthole ibhola engakwesokudla, wadonsa inguzunga yeshodi efike yangena yaphelela ezandleni zikaFernando Muslera, unozinti we-Uruguay.Ngemuva kwale siqubu, abafana base-Uruguay baqhamuke nomunye umnyakazo lapho uSuarez ethole khona ibhola esebhokisini maqede waguquka wabhekana wabhekana nonozinti u-Elshenawy olithathe ezinyaweni zakhe.Ngalesi sikhathi besezithengana nhlangothi zombili kube ncane indawo nokwenze sahlala obala isikhala sesihlaba sayo uMohamed Salah.Le sihlabani seLiverpool siqale ebhentshini ngenxa yokuthi besikade silimele egxalabeni esakuthola bedlala neReal Madrid emdlalweni wamanqamu e-Uefa Champions League.Sezihubela sakusha, uCavani uthole ibhola engaphandle kwebhokisi wafuqa umcibisholo weshodi ovinjwe ngunozinti weGibhithe sekuvalwe amehlo.Ngemuva kwalesi siqubui-Uruguay iphinde yathola ifree kick ngaphandle kwebhokisi ethathwe uCavani oyishaye yavinjwa ngunozinti, wayichithela ngaphakathi kodwa uSuarez wahluleka ukuyiqedela. Abadlali be-Egypt baphinde badlala kabi ohlangothini lwesokudla phakathi kwebhoksi nomugqa wokuphela kwenkundla, unompempe wathi akube yifree kick.
title: Ziphulwe izinhliziyo ezikaFaro kunqoba i-Uruguay kowoMhlaba

text:
MCEBO MPUNGOSEBAPHUME begezeke igilo abathandi bomculo emcimbini obe yingqophamlando kuleli womrepha uCassper Nyovest ngokugcwalisa iThe Dome, eGoli ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. UCassper Nyovest ube ngumculi wokuqala wakuleli ukugcwalisa le ndawo ezibambele yena njengoba ijwayele ukugcwaliswa yizihlabani zaphasheya.Akubanga nje kuphela abalandeli bakhe abebekhona kodwa nosaziwayo nosopolitiki abaningi bavelile ukuzomeseka bamhalalisela ngomsebenzi wakhe. “Akumina engiqophe umlando namhlanje. Akumina, yini nonke enilapha ngaphakathi eniqophe umlando, ngiyanibonga nonke ngokubanami kulolu suku olukhulu kangaka empilweni yami,” kusho uCassper ebonga abalandeli.UCassper uvule iFill Up The Dome ngeculo i-
I Hope You Bought it, obekungaculi yena kuyo, kunalokho ubeqoke abalandeli abashintshashintshane ngayo ngaphambi kokuthi kungene yena. Kube nenhlokomo eseqhamuka okokuqala esteji, ezocula iculo i
Mmangwane okuyiculo elise-albhamini yakhe entsha, etholwe nguwo wonke umuntu obehambele lo mcimbi.Uqale enamahloni kodwa kuthe eseshaya i
Cooking In The Kitchen, apike kuyo umrepha wase-USA uThe Game kwavele kwacaca ukuthi usengene egiyeni.Elinye lamaculo amasha anandise ngawo kube yi-
War Ready, enesigqi setoyi toyi. Ecula leli culo ukhombise ama-video ezigameko zakamuva zabafundi bemashela ukuthi kwehliswe imali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, ngokunjalo nama-video emashi yango-1976.Kubaculi anandise nabo kubalwa u-Anatti, Riky Rick, Black Coffee, L Tido, Kyle Deutsch neMajor League. Kubo bonke laba baculi akukho noyedwa ocule amaculo angaphezulu kwamabili. UL Tido uhlanyise izihlwele ngeDlala ka Yona, u-Anatti washaya i
My Own noRiky Rick ngaphambi kokuthi kungene uBlack Coffee nge-
We Dance Again.Esebuya esiwombeni sesibili uCassper uzibambele yedwa kodwa isikhathi esiningi ubecula nge-autotune esebenzisana nebhendi esteji. Akazange ayicule i
Dust to Dust okuyiculo angcofa kulo u-AKA.
title: Bagezeke igilo abalandeli ekhonsathini kaCassper Nyovest

text: IZINTOMBI nto ezifunda eDurban University of Technology (DUT), eMgungundlovu, zivule ikilabhu yazo ezisiza ukuthi zihlele izigcawu zokufundisana nokwelulekana ngokuziphatha kwentombi nto, esikhungweni sezemfundo ephakeme.UNksz Wandile Khumalo (24) owenza unyaka wesithathu kwiNursing kulesi sikhungo, onguSihlalo weZimbali zeDUT Virgins Society, uthe izintombi nto uma zifika ezikhungweni zezemfundo ephakeme kuyenzeka zizifihle ngoba zisaba ukuthi zizobandlululeka kanti uma kunekilabhu yazo ziyakwazi ukuthi zisondelane ngoba ziphila impilo efanayo.“Ukuba umuntu omusha esikhungweni sezemfundo ephezulu kunzima ngoba usuke uqala ukuzimela, uqala ukungahlali nabazali, usuke uqala ukuthi kungabikhona umzali okukhumbuza ukuthi ngosuku lokuyohlolwa, usuke sewehlukene nezinye izintombi obujwayele ukuhamba nazo. Kwesinye isikhathi imigido nezinye izinto ezenziwa yizintombi zangakini ziyakweqa ngoba usuke ufunda. Ukwehlukana nabantu abaphila impilo efana neyakho kukwenza ukuthi uma ufika esikhungweni ufihle, ngoba awazi ukuthi le mpilo yamukeleka kanjani kontanga yenu abakhona lapha,” kusho yena.Uthe ukuzifihla kwesinye isikhathi kuholela ekutheni intombi nto ingene esilingweni ebesingagwemeka.“Ngale kilabhu yethu evulwe kulo nyaka sigquqquzela ukuthi intombi nto ayingene esikhungweni sezemfundo ephakeme, ifunde ize iphume isazigcinile. Senze uhlelo lokuthi kube nomama walapha eMgungundlovu ozofika esikhungweni sethu azosihlola njengoba besenza sisemakhaya. Okunye esikwenzayo ukuthi siba nezigcawu zokucobelelana ngolwazi njengabantu abasha sikhulume nangezinselelo esibhekana nazo,” kusho yena.Le kilabhu, uthe kulindeleke ukuthi yethulwe ngokusemthethweni emcimbini ozoba kuyo le nyuvesi maduze.“Isizathu sokuthi sifune ukuthi kube wumcimbi ukuthi yaziwe njengawo wonke amakilabhu akhona eNyuvesi. Njengoba kuyinto eqalayo sifuna ukuthi sike sikhombise ukuthi sizikhethele ukuzigcina kuze kufike isigaba esifanele. Sifuna nokuveza ukuthi njengoba kunenkolelo yokuthi siyaphoqwa ukuthi sihlolwe, akunjalo ngoba noma sesiziphethe siyaqhubeka nokuhlolwa, bengasekho abazali eduze kwethu,” usho kanje.Le ntokazi edabuka KwaMhlabuyalingana ithi: “Njengamanje ngingasho ukuthi ngifana nenduna okuyiyona ebheke ukuthi zonke izinhlelo zethu zenziwa ngendlela. Uma sishoda ngemali yokwenza izihlelo zethu kumele ngiphume ngiyoncela komasipala naseminyangweni, okwamanje ngingasho ukuthi yamukeleke kahle, siyakuthola ukwesekwa, “ kusho yena.
title: Kuvulwe ikilabhu yezintombi nto eDUT

text: UMNDENI wesiguli awukazowucisha umshini osekuyisonto lesibili siphefumula ngawo njengoba usalinde umbiko ogcwele esibhedlela osisola ‘ngokufa’ kwelungu lawo.Sekuphele izinsuku ezilishumi uNkk Dumisile Dlamini (49) waseMlaza ephefumula ngomshini esibhedlela esizimele eThekwini, odokotela abaphakamise ukuthi ucishwe.Umndeni wakhe usola isibhedlela iDurdoc ngokuba kwakhe kulesi simo, okuthiwa wangena khona ewumqemane eyohlinzwa.Umyeni wakhe, uMnuz Siboniso Dlamini, uthe namanje isimo sisenjalo kumkakhe, akukho okushintshile.“Akukho sinqumo esizosithatha okwamanje ngesimo sakhe. NgoLwesihlanu saya emhlanganweni esibhedlela, kukhona bonke odokotela ababekhona ehlinzwa. Umhlangano wathatha isikhathi esingaphezu kwehora kodwa akukho okubambekayo esabuya nakho,” echaza.Uthe ngenxa yokuthi abazitholanga zonke izimpendulo emibuzweni abebenayo, abaphathi besibhedlela babathembise ukuthi babezobuye bababize komunye umhlangano.UDlamini uthe usekhulumile nenkampani ekhokhela iMedical Aid, nayo ethe ifuna umbiko esibhedlela ukuze yenze uphenyo.Umndeni kaNkk Dlamini akuvumi wamukele ukuthi ngeke esasinda njengokusho kodokotela, abaphakamise ukuthi kucishwe umshini.Ukhala ngokuthi wangena esibhedlela ewumqemane, waphaphama emuva kokuhlinzwa engenalutho. Basola ukuthi kukhona okwenzeka emuva kokuhlinzwa kwakhe njengoba betshelwe ukuthi usefe ingqondo.Yize umndeni kaNkk Dlamini ukhathazekile ngokuthi izindleko zesibhedlela ziyanda, akuvumi uthathe isinqumo sokucisha umshini lungakenziwa uphenyo.UDlamini utshele Isolezwe ukuthi uma benqaba nombiko esibhedlela, uzobathathela izinyathelo zomthetho.UMnuz Vishu Rampartab oyiGroup Manager yeJoint Medical Holdings, engabanikazi beDurdoc, uthe bazimisele ukusiza umndeni ngayo yonke indlela, bathole nencazelo kodokotela ngokwenzekile.Uthe besizwile isikhalo somndeni futhi kwahlelwa nomhlangano ukuze kuboniswane.
title: Basafuna izimpendulo abesiguli esesiphefumula ngomshini

text: UMAKADEBONA kaDJ waseGermany kodwa ozinze kuleli, uRalf Gum, uthe akukho okungavimba ukuthi igqom’ ikhonye emhlabeni jikelele.URalf Gum ukusho lokhu engxoxweni ekhethekile neSolezwe ngoMsombuluko ntambama.“Angisiboni isizathu esingenza ukuthi ingabi yintandokazi phesheya. Umculo omusha ongajwayelekile, ngakho ngicabanga ukuthi ungaduma ngokushesha,” kusho uRalf Gum.“Amazwe omhlaba ahlale efuna umculo omusha ohlukile. Ngenxa yokuba kusha kwegqom’ ngicabanga ukuthi ingathatha abaningi ngempela. Konke manje kulele ekutheni imakethwe ngendlela,” kuqhuba uRalf Gum.Uthe njengoba bekukhona igqom’ nyakenye egcine ihlukanise unyaka ngengoma yeDistruction Boyz ethi Omunye, unethemba lokuthi kulo nyaka kuzoba yi-deep house.“Sengathi i-deep house ingabuyela endaweni yayo ngoba yiyo engiyithandayo. Kodwa izinto zihlale zishintsha ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi kunzima ukuqagela ukuthi yini abantu abazoyithanda ngalowo nyaka,” kusho yena.Lo DJ wodumo lwezingoma okubalwa kuzo iKissing Strangers, Complicated, All This For You, nezinye uveze ukuthi kulo nyaka uzokhipha i-albhamu entsha.“Sekunesikhathi ngigcine ukukhipha ngakho nakanjani ngiyakhipha. Maduze nje ngizoqala ngikhiphe amasingili azoba kuyona. Ngizosebenza no-Ayanda Jiya ongumculi omusha onethalente elimangalisayo, iMafikizolo engisanda kuyenzela ingoma njengoba igubha iminyaka engu-20 nje nabanye bangaphandle engijwayele ukusebenza nabo njengoKafele, Monique Bingham noPortia Monique.”Uthe zikhona nezingoma azozikhipha zabaculi asebenza nabo enkampanini yakhe iGo-Go Music.
title: Igqom’ ingakhonya naphesheya: Ralf Gum

text: SEKUMISIWE ukusetshenziswa kwamaphoyisa angaphansi kweSouth African Police Services (SAPS) nemifaniswano yawo emidlalweni yethelevishini evutshelwe lapha eNingizimu Afrika.Lokhu kuvezwe yimithombo engashayi eceleni eveze ukuthi sekuyophela inyanga yesithathu kwavela umyalelo ekomkhulu lamaphoyisa alapha eNingizimu Afrika wokuthi kumiswe.“Umlayelo ovela ekomkhulu lamaphoyisa walayela ukuthi kumiswe ukusetshenziswa kwamaphoyisa ekulingiseni izindawo ezisuke zidinga wona nokuthi abalingisi babonakale bedlubhe imifaniswano yawo. Kuthiwa kungenxa yokuthi kuzobuyekezwa kabusha imithetho ezohambisana nokusetshenziswa kwamaphoyisa nemifaniswano yawo emidlalweni,” kusho umthombo.Ngokomthombo, lo myalelo wathunyelwa ezinkampanini ezikhiqiza imidlalo namafilimu naseziteshini ezinkulu okubalwa kuzona iSABC.Phambilini kwathiwa kwaphuma umlayelo wokuthi lapho kunesidingo sokuthi kube nabalingisi abazenza amaphoyisa, kuhle kube yiwona uqobo azibambela mathupha alingise.Inhloso yokuthi azibambele maphutha amaphoyisa uma kunendawo edinga wona kwakuwukuthi aqondise kahle ngoba kwakunezinsolo zokuthi abalingisi babuye benze okuwathunaza isithunzi.“Kwakunesikhalo sokuthi baveza isithombe esingesilo iqiniso ngomsebenzi wamaphoyisa kanti nomfaniswano ubuye ugqokwe ngendlela ewehlisa isithunzi,” kusho umthombo.Kunesikhathi lapho umdlalo Uzalo besekulingisa khona amaphoyisa abethathwa esiteshini saKwaMashu. Ngokwemithombo ekulo mdlalo, sekumisiwe.“Akekho ogqoka umfaniswano wamaphoyisa manje kuZalo kanti namaphoyisa awasafiki. Sizwa kuthiwa eminye imidlalo isikhethe ukuthi izisungulele imifaniswano yamaphoyisa azobonakala kuyona kunokusebenzisa eyeSAPS,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi kuZalo amaphoyisa asegqoka izingubo zawo futhi kusetshenziswa igama lokuthi angabaphenyi ngoba kujwayelekile kubona ukubabona bezigqokele izingubo zabo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa akwaSAPS uNational Commissioner Brigadier Vish Naidoo uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi kumisiwe.“Akukhona ukuthi kukhona esingeneme ngakho kodwa sifuna ukubuyekeza kabusha igunya elinikwa imidlalo lokusebenzisa imifaniswano yamaphoyisa,” usho kanje.Uthe lokhu kuzothatha izinyanga ezintathu bese kwaziwa ngekusasa lalokusebenzisana.Okhulumela iSABC uMnuz Kaizer Kganyago uthe akanalwazi ngalokhu.“Thina njengabantu abathenga imikhiqizo ezinkampanini asinalwazi ngalokhu, abantu abakahle ukuphawula yizona izinkampani zemidlalo namafilimu,” usho kanje.
title: Kuvaliwe ukulingisa kwamaphoyisa emidlalweni

text: EMINYAKENI ezayo uma sikhuluma ngabesifazane abasebenze kanzima futhi abaliphakamisile ifulegi lakuleli ngokuba yisibonelo entsheni, uBonang Matheba (31), ngeke lisale ngaphandle igama lakhe.Le ntokazi ngihlangane nayo okokuqala sakhuluma isikhashana emcimbini wokwethula osaziwayo abazoqhudelana kumaDStv Mzansi Viewers Choice Awards, akade eseGoli, emasontweni amabili adlule.Kulo mcimbi ubengumphathi wohlelo, kanti kuzophinde kube nguyena ongumphathi wohlelo emcimbini omkhulu ozoba ngoNovemba 24.Ngifika ngimbona ukuthi ukhona ngacela izintokazi zeMzansi Magic ukuthi zingixhumanise naye njengoba kukuningi engingafisa ukukuxoxa naye.Kodwa ngenxa yokuba matasa ucele ukuthi sixoxe imizuzu engu-15, kwazise bekukhona lapho ebephuthuma khona.Le ntokazi inomoya ophansi futhi ikhululekile kodwa isheshe ikucacise ukuthi uma kukhona umbuzo owubuzayo engawuthandi ngeke iwuphendule, konke lokhu ikusho izihlekela.“Ngizalwa eNorth West futhi ngakhula khona. Kuthe eminyakeni yami yobuncane sasuka khona nomama saya eGoli njengoba ayesebenza khona, nokulapho ngifunde khona ezikoleni ezihlukene ezikhona eGoli.Bengiyingane ehlakaniphile kusukela ebuncaneni bami, ngazi ukuthi ngifunani empilweni ngenxa yokubona umama esebenza kanzima benobaba, yize base behlukene bengasathandani,” kuchaza uBonang.Uthe uqede isikole wayofunda eNyuvesi yaseJohannersburg, wenza izifundo zokukhangisa.“Ngineminyaka engu-15, ngibe nohlelo lokuqala kwithelevishini kuSABC 2, angibange ngisabheka emuva njengoba ngo-2007 ngaya kwinhlolokhono yohlelo lomculo iLive Amp lapho abantu baqala khona ukungazi nami ngabona ukuthi nginekhono elikhulu kunaleli ebengicabanga ukuthi nginalo njengoba ngafunwa yimisakazo ehlukene, izinkampani zaqala ukuthi zingicele ukuthi ngiziphathele imicimbi ehlukene,” kuchaza uBonanga.Uthe ukuzimisela nokuthanda umsebenzi wakhe yikhona okumbeke lapho ekhona manje.“Kukhona konke engikwenzayo, okukhulu noma okuncane ngiyazinikela futhi ngifuna konke kwenziwe ngesikhathi. Ngiwumuntu osigcinayo isikhathi ngenxa yokuthi singinika le mali enginayo manje, ngakho ukubona abantu bedembesela emisebenzini abayenzayo futhi bengazinikeli yikhona okubenza bangayi phambili,” kusho yena.Uthe kuzona zonke izinto asezenzile njengoba esezakhele igama phesheya kwezilwandle, kuleli nasezwenikazi i-Afrika, iphupho lakhe ukusiza intsha ifinyelele lapho ifuna khona.“Nginomfundaze engisiza ngawo intsha ukuthi ifeze amaphupho ayo. Ngiwumuntu ofuna ukusiza lapho kudingeka khona ukuze sonke siphile impilo esiyifisayo. Ngisho emndenini wami kuyaziwa ukuthi izihlobo zami ngiyazisiza lapho kudingeka khona.Ohlelweni lwami iBeing Bonang kusukela kwisizini yokuqala kwabonakala umzala wami uPinky, engifuna ukumfaka kule ndima engikuyona, ngimsize lapho kudingeka khona ngoba ngiyambona ukuthi angaya kude futhi okukhulu ukuthi ngiyamthanda ngenxa yenhliziyo yakhe enhle,” kuchaza uBonang.UBonang uthe ujabule ngokuba yingxenye yomcimbi wokugubha ukuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-100 kwazalwa uNelson Mandela, iMadiba iGlobal Citizen Festival, ozoba ngoDisemba.“Umcimbi omkhulu lona odinga ukuthi sonke sifake isandla kuwona. Ukuba yingxenye yawo kungenze ngathobeka futhi ngabona ukuthi kuningi okumele sikwenze ukuze iqhawe lethu uTata Mandela singalikhohlwa.Imicimbi ekhuthazayo ngempela lena njengoba iqhakambisa izwe lethu, ilibeka emazweni omhlaba,” kuchaza yena.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe usebudlelwaneni bezothando njengoba sekukhona owesilisa osolwayo empilweni yakhe kulezi zinsuku, uBonang uvele wahleka.Ebuzwa ukuthi kungenzeka azwakale emsakazweni ngemuva kokuhamba kuMetro FM, uthe uma ithuba liqhamuka angalithatha ngazo zombili ngoba umsakazo uyawuthanda.Uthe uyakuthanda kakhulu ukupheka, kwesinye isikhathi uyalishaya ibhodwe uma esekhaya.Uthe abazali bakhe bobabili unobudlelwane obuhle nabo ngokunjalo nezingane zakwabo.
title: Ngiyazinikela kukho konke engikwenzayo: Bonang

text: UPHITHENE ikhanda unina kaDJ waseThekwini othi indodakazi yakhe ibingakaze ikhombise ukuba nezimpawu zokugula njengoba kuyenele ngoMsombuluko.UNkk Mariah Masilela waseNanda, eNhlangwini, uthe indodakazi yakhe, uMiss K, ibingaxinekile kakhulu ngesikhathi iya emtholampilo."Sithole ucingo nje nathi singalindele, saziswa ukuthi ayisekho emhlabeni ingane yami. Kusithusile kakhulu ngoba ubengabambekile nhlobo. Ngibuhlungu ngoba indodakazi yami ibisebenza ngokuzikhandla kulo mkhakha ebikuwo futhi ibibonakala ukuthi isaya kude," kubeka uNkk Masilela.Uthe okumkhululayo emoyeni wukuthi ingane yakhe ikwazile ukwenza into ebiyiphupho layo isaphila."Ngemuva kokuthi ahlale nami phansi ecela ukungena emkhakheni wobumnandi, nganquma ukumkhulula ukuze afeze amaphupho akhe. Nangempela ubebonakala ematasa futhi ezinikele kakhulu emsebenzini wakhe. Yingakho ngiziqhenya ngaye," kusho uNkk Masilela.Uthe okwamanje umndeni uphezu kwamalungiselelo ezinhlelo zomngcwabo.UDJ Thotho, osebenze kakhulu noDJ Miss K, uthe ubuhlungu kakhulu ngokushona kukazakwabo."U-DJ Miss K ngimfice esenesikhathi angena kulo mkhakha kodwa wangisingatha. Ubesefana nodadewethu ngoba besizwana kakhulu naye," kusho uDJ Thotho. U-DJ Miss K ubengelona ivukana kulo mkhakha njengoba angena kuwo kanye noDJ HappyGal noCyndo. Ubephinde abe ngomunye woDJ abebemenywa yiGagasi FM ezinhlelweni ezikhonzwe kakhulu yintsha.
title: Isililo kushona uDJ waseThekwini

text: IJACOB  Gedleyihlekisa Zuma Foundation ithi ikujabulele ukuthi  uSihlalo wekhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana, iJaji uRaymond Zondo ugcine ephumele obala ngodaba lokuthi unengane nodadewabo kankosikazi  kaZuma, uNkk Thobeka Madiba-Zuma yize lokhu ekwenze sekudlule isikhathi.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba, ngoMgqibelo ngemva kokuthi ngoLwesine uZondo,  ephumele obala ngodaba lwengane, abenhlangano kaZuma babuye bakhwela badilika kwabezindaba bathi basole ngokungeyikho uZuma nabameli bakhe, bathi usebenzisa udaba lwangasese ukulwa izimpi zomthetho. Bathi lokhu bekungukugudluka ngamabomu kulokhu obekugonyulukwe uZondo.“Ngokwenza lokhu, (abezindaba) balibalekele iqiniso lokuthi lokhu kuvunywe nguZondo uqobo lwakhe. “Sesikhulumile ngokuphawula kukaZondo ngezitatimende kwabezindaba. Siyabona ukuthi izitatimende zikhishelwa uZuma kuphela azikhishelwa abanye ofakazi. Ziyingxenye yokwenzeka ezinkantolo lapho kunomkhuba wokuthi kwenzeke izinto okuqondwe ngazo ukubhekana noZuma nabasondelene naye.”Le nhlangano ithe ifisa ukukhumbuza umphakathi ukuthi ayikasifaki isicelo sokuthi uZondo azikhulule ekuholeni ikhomishini.Le nhlangano isola ukuthi isitatimende sabezindaba esikhishwe wuZondo sikhishwe ngoba kubanathile abacashile abayalele ukuthi senziwe ukuze kuhlengwe umuntu wabo.“Kuyamangaza ukuthi uZondo ukubone kufanele ukuthi aphawule ngodaba olusazothulwa ezithebeni zakhe. UZuma nabameli bakhe abakaze baluthinte udaba lwengane kaZondo. Kuyaphoxa ukuthi abezindaba nabahlaziyi babo bakwazi ukuba yingxenye yalokhu okwenziwe uZondo. Siyamcela uZondo nethimba lakhe elimeluleka ngokukhishwa kwezitatimende zabezindaba ukuthi balinde size sicele ukuthi azikhulule ekubeni usihlalo wekhomishini.”Isitatimende sithi yize ungekho umklomelo ozonikezwa oqagela ukuthi uZondo uzonqumani kodwa ibona ukuthi utatazelile wafuna ukuqagela ukuthi  isicelo sokuthi azikhululele ekubeni wusihlalo wekhomishini sizothini.“Asinaso nesiqiniseko sokuthi udaba lwengane beluzoba yingxenye yesicelo, asikho isidingo sokuxhamazela ngoba isinqumo sisezandleni zakhe uZondo.”Le nhlangano iphinde yaveza ukuthi isibonile isinqumo senkantolo enkulu  yokudluliswa kwamacala echithe isicelo sikaZuma nezindleko, ngesinqumo esasithathwe inkantolo enkulu yaseNorth Gauteng ebesidluliselwe kuyo. Inkantolo yaseNorth Gauteng  nayo yayimchithile yathi akakhokhele izindleko zecala.“Yize besingalindele isinqumo esizovuna uZuma enkantolo yaseNingizimu Afrika odabeni oluthinta uZuma kodwa besinethemba lokuthi izinkantolo zizoba nesibindi sokuzimela zingangeni kwipolitiki”Le nhlangano ithe iyabona ukuthi izinkantolo seziphenduke ingxenye yokuhlaselwa kukaZuma ngokwepolitiki.
title: Basola uZondo ngokufunzwa ngabathize

text: Igoli elibuyisele kwamhlaba iSundowns ebinethuba lokuqhwakwela ivule negebe lamaphuzu amathathu, lishaywe ngu-Ananious Gerbhardt esiwombeni sokuqala.Lo mphumela uvune iChiefs ebikade isizifake obishini ngokuhlulwa yiBidvest Wits ngo 1-0 emdlalweni owandulele lona.Emuva kwalowo mdlalo, abadlali beChiefs babukeke bedangele kubhalwe emehlweni ukulahlekelwa yithemba. Nokho akubuzwa ukuthi ukuhlulwa kweSundowns kuzobuyisa ithemba lokuthi basangakulwela ukudla isicoco.IChiefs selokhu yaqhwakela kusukela isanda kuqala isizini ka-2019/2020 njegNoba manje isihlezi ngokujeqeza.Amakhosi aqeqeshwa * -Ernst Middendorp alwela ukuqeda ishobolo lokungawini iligi njengoba agcina lesi sicoco ngo-2014/2015 ngaphansi kukaStuart Baxter.UPitso Mosimane oqeqesha iSundowns yena usemkhankasweni wokunqobela iqembu indebe yeshumi yeligi. Selokhu afika ngo-2012 usedle isicoco ezine zeligi.Ukuze kucace ukuthi isicoco sizogcina siye ngakuphi, iChiefs isidinga ukuwina imidlalo yayo emibili eyisalele ezoyidlala neChippa United neBaroka. ISundowns izothandazela ukuthi Amakhosi aqhuzuke bese yona iwina kwiPolokwane City nakwiBlack Leopards okungamaqembu avika izembe kwiPremiership.ISundowns iwatholile amathuba okushaya amagoli kodwa kwangalunga.Ngasohlangothini lweBaroka amaphuzu amathathu ayibeke ethubeni lokuvika izembe kwazise inyukele endaweni ka-13 kwi-log, ishiya ngaphansi kwayo AmaZulu nabakhaya bayo iLeopards, nePolokwane City esibambe amabhuleki emsileni.Emdlalweni wayizolo, iBaroka iqale ngomfutho ingayiniki ithuba iSundowns ebholeni. Isheshe yathola umvuzo ngomzuzu ka-20 ngesikhathi uGerbhardt engqofela phakathi ikhona kaTshediso Patjie.Esiwombeni sesibili, iSundowns ibuye yafuna igoli lokulinganisa kodwa ihluleka ukubhidliza udonga lweBaroka.
title: ISundowns ibuyele kwamhlaba ihlulwa

text: UDEDELWE ngoshwele izolo owayeyisikhulu samaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uVincent Mdunge.UMnyango wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo kuzwelonke ukuqinisekisile lokhu izolo wathi uMdunge uzoqhubeka nesigwebo sakhe ngaphandle lapho ezobe ebhekiwe kuze kube isigwebo sakhe uyasiqeda.Okhulumela lo mnyango, uMnuz Singabakho Nxumalo, uthe uMdunge udedelwe ngoshwele ngoba bekungokokuqala egwetshwa futhi eziphothulile nezinye izinhlelo okusuke kudingeka aziphothule. “Umnyango uyakuqinisekisa ukuthi uMdunge unikezwe ushwele ibhodi likashwele lomnyango kusukela ngoLwesibili (izolo). UMdunge ukwenze konke okuyingxenye yalolu hlelo, ube esehlolwa ithimba lethu okubalwa osonhlalakahle, odokotela bengqondo ukuze kufikwe esinqumeni sokuthi ukulungele ukudedelwa ngoshwele,” kusho uNxumalo.Uthe kunemibandela abekelwe yona azoyilandela ehambisana nokusebenzisana nomphakathi kanti uzobe eqashwe ngeso lokhozi kuze kube isigwebo sakhe siyaphela. UMdunge wagwetshwa ngo-2017 iminyaka emuhlanu ebhadla ejele. Walahlwa amacala okuqamba amanga nenkohlakalo ngoNovemba 2014.Wayekade egwetshwe ngoMeyi 2015 kodwa wakudlulisa ukulahlwa icala nesigwebo sakhe, kwezinye izinkantolo eziphakeme kodwa wahluleka njengoba kwaze kwathi ngo-Agasti 2017, waqala isigwebo.UMdunge kwavela ukuthi wayengenawo u-matric, waqamba amanga, waze wanyuselwa esikhundleni embuthweni wamaphoyisa njengoba aboshwa ekhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal. Egwetshwa kwaphuma nomyalelo ukuba kumele ayibuyisele emuva yonke imihlomulo ayithola embuthweni wamaphoyisa.Khonamanjalo uNxumalo uqinisekisile umbiko obukhishwe Isolezwe izolo ukuthi obeyisikhulu samajele eKZN, uMnuz Mnikelwa Nxele ukhonjwe indlela kulandela icala ebeliqulwa ngaphakathi elithinta yena ngqo. Okwamanje esikhundleni sikaNxele kusabambe uMnuz James Smalberger.
title: Udedelwe ngoshwele owayeyisikhulu samaphoyisa

text: UQALE izolo umshikashika wokumakwa kwamaphepha abafundi bakwa-matric KwaZulu-Natal njengoba abafundi bephothule ukubhala ngeledlule.Isitatimende sikaNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, sithe kuqale ngegiya eliphezulu ukumakela abakwa-matric.“Isifundazwe siqashe abamaki abangu-8 342, Ama-senior makers angu-1 334, angu-74 ama-chief markers, namaphini abo angu-1 334. Bangu-1 194 abangama-moderators,” kusho uMshengu.Kuqashwe nabasiza abamakayo abangu-184.Zingu-27 izikhungo zokumakela ezikhona esifundazweni kanti ukumakwa kwamaphepha kuzophothulwa ngoDisemba14, 2019.Ukufakwa kwamamaki kuzoqalwa kusasa kuze kuphele ngoDisemba 29, 2019. “Abamakayo bakhethwe ngenxa yolwazi nesipiliyoni kuleso naleso sifundo umuntu azobe esimaka. Siyathemba ukuthi lo msebenzi obalulekile bazowenza ngokucophelela,” kusho uMshengu.
title: Sekuqaliwe ukumakwa kwamaphepha abakwa-matric

text: KUPHELILE ukuqagela ngokugoma kothisha kuleli begomela iCovid-19 njengoba uMnyango wezeMpilo kuzwelonke uthe bazogoma ngesonto elizayo.Lo mnyango uthe ukulungele ukugoma othisha kusukelaa ngoLwesithathu oluzayo njengoba kunemigomo yeJohnson & Johnson (J&J) ezofika namhlanje kuleli.Lokhu kuvezwe yizikhulu zomnyango ebeziholwa yibamba likaNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uNkk Mmamoloko Kubayi-Ngubane, ngesikhathi zivele phambi kwekomiti lezempilo ePhalamende.UDkt Aquina Thulare walo mnyango, uthe kuzofika imigomo engu-300 000 namhlanje bese kufika eminye uma kuqala isonto elizayo okuyiyo abazogoma ngayo othisha.Uthe babalelwa ku-499 000 othisha abazogoma kuleli wathi emigomeni ezofika ngelizayo bazobe sebethatha eminye engu-199 000 ukuze bengeze kwanele ukugonywa kothisha.“Sisebenzisana nezinhlaka ezehlukene okubalwa izigungu zezikole, umkhandlu olawula othisha, umnyango wezisebenzi zikahulumeni nokuphatha njengoba sizogoma abasebenzi bakahulumeni. Sizogoma abasebenza ezikoleni zikahulumeni nabasebenza ezikoleni ezizimele,” kusho uDkt Thulare. Uthe kuzmele lolu hlelo lusheshe ngoba imigomo ezofika inesikhathi esifushane ngaphambi kokuba iphelelwe isikhathi.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezempilo uDkt Joe Phaahla, ligxeke labo abathi izikole azingavulwa njengoba kudlange leli gciwane.UPhaahla uthe njengoba othisha bezogoma asikho isidingo sokuthi kuvalwe izikole.“Abafundi abancane abazobuyela bonke ezikoleni iningi labo elineminyaka engaphansi kuka-18, ngakho abasuleleki kalula ngegciwane. Ngakho asikho isidingo sokuthi kube nabazothi azingavulwa izikole ngoba izwe selisesigabeni sesivuvu sesithathu.”Usho lokhu emuva kokuba i-EFF isabise ngokuthi izozivala izikole uma uNgqongqoshe wemfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, engazivali njengoba siphezulu isibalo sabantu abasuleleka ngegciwane.UNkk Motshekga uveze ukuthi uma sekuvulwa izikole ngoJulayi 26, bonke abafundi basemabangeni aphansi bazobuyela ezikoleni ngoba baphazamiseke kakhulu ngohlelo lokushintsha amasonto uma befunda.UDkt Nicholas Crisp iPhini lomqondisi jikelele emnyangweni wezempilo, uthe cishe balindele ukugoma othisha ababalelwa ku-405 000 ngoba bayazi ukuthi abanye sebagoma.Uthe bayazi ukuthi abanye ngeke bazihluphe ngokugoma.“Abanye sebagoma ngoba beneminyaka engu-60 kuya phezulu. Abanye siyazi ngeke bagome njengoba kunabantu abadala, kanjalo nabahlengikazi abangagomile ngoba bengafuni ukugoma.”Uthe sebeqalile baxoxa neminye iminyango okubalwa owamaphoyisa, owamasosha kanjalo nowojele ukuze kube ngabanye abasebenzi abazolandela bagome.UNkk Motshekga uthe bakulinde ngabomvu ukugoma othisha.Uthe bangagonywa cishe ngezinsuku ezimbalwa ngoba bawumkhakha obumbene.UNkk Kubayi-Ngubane, unxuse abantu ukuthi balandele imigomo yokuzivikela kuleli gciwane.Uthe kuyakhathaza ukuthi iGauteng iyona ezihola phambili ngezibalo wathi nezibalo zabangaphezulu kuka-13 000 abahaqekile ngosuku olulodwa kuleli ziyashaqisa.“Sikhathazekile ngemihlangano namarali abekhona ngosuku lwentsha ebizwa amaqembu ahlukene ezepolitiki ekubeni izwe lisesigabeni sesithathu. Sethemba abezomthetho bazosisza kubhekwane nala maqembu.”
title: Baqala ukugonywa othisha ngelizayo kuleli

text:
LUNGI LANGABAZOZIPHENDULELA phambi kwethimba eliqondisa izigwegwe abasebenzi bezempilo abane abathinteka esigamekweni sokushona kowesifazane owabelethela ethoyilethi esibhedlela eStanger.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo uthe laba bahlengikazi kulindeleke ukuthi bavele phambi kwesigungu esiqondisa izigwegwe kusasa nangoMashi 3. Lapha kulindeleke ukuthi baziphendulele ngesigameko sokushona kukaNksz Fikelephi Mfeka (40) esibhedlela iStanger Provincial ngoNovemba nyakenye.Emuva kokubika kwe
Solezwe ngesigameko sokushona kukaNksz Mfeka okuthiwa washonela ethoyilethi kungekho omnakile ebeletha, umnyango wezempilo udalule ukuthi sewumise abahlengikazi abayisikhombisa.“Sasimise abayisikhombisa kodwa sathola ukuthi abathathu kubona abathinteki kulesi sigameko. Bane abagcine bebekwa amacala. Bazoziphendulela phambi kwesigungu esiqondisa izigwegwe ngokwenzeka,” kusho uDhlomo.Ubekhuluma ngoMsombuluko ngemuva kokuya kulesi sibhedlela esesaziwa ngokuthi “kukwadlula wafa” ngenxa yochungechunge lwezigameko zokushona kweziguli ngendlela engaqondakali.NangoLwesihlanu uDhlomo ubeke waya kulesi sibhedlela eyokwethula ithimba elizophenya ngezigameko zokungaphathwa kahle kweziguli.UDhlomo uthe akulungile ukuthi isibhedlela saziwe ngokuthi sibulala abantu ngoba akusibo bonke abasebenzi baso abangawenzi ngendlela umsebenzi wabo.Uthe ubengayele ukuyothethisa abasebenzi esibhedlela kodwa ubeyobakhuthaza ukuthi baqhubeke nokwenza kahle umsebenzi wabo.UDhlomo uthe ngeke bayeke ukuphenya ngezigameko zobudedengu nokungaphathwa kahle kweziguli okubuye kuholele ekufeni kwazo.“Izigameko ezibikwayo ngeke sizishanele kepha sizoziphenya. Asikabi nayo imininingwane ephelelele ngesowesifazane owahlinzwa kodwa nakusona sizophenya bese senza okufanele uma sesiyitholile imiphumela yophenyo,” kusho uDhlomo.Ukhale ngesithombe esipendwa amalungu ephalamende namaqembu ezepolitiki aphikisayo, wathi asivezi iqiniso.Uthe lesi sibhedlela sinomlando omuhle futhi usaziqhenya kakhulu ngaso. Ngo-2011 sithole indondo yokuhlanzeka.Ngo-2013 sanconywa yinhlangano yezempilo iHealth Professions Council of South Africa (HPCSA) ngokuhamba phambili ekuqeqeshweni kodokotela bakuleli.
title: Bazochaza ngowashona ebeletha ethoyilethi

text: UFINYELELE kwelinye izinga ngoLwesithathu umkhankaso wokugqugquzela izakhamuzi zakuleli ukuthi zibeke imibono yazo ngesiphakamiso esamenyezelwa yiNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo kuleli, ukuthi i-Electoral Act 73 ka-1998, ayihambisani nomthethosisekelo wakuleli.Njengamanje lo mthetho uvalela ngaphandle abantu abangewona amalungu amaqembu ezepolitiki ukuthi bangenele ukhetho ngokuzimela.Izethulo zomphakathi ngalolu daba zizogcina ukwamukelwa ngoSepthemba 30.Abaholi bezinhlangano ezahlukene okubalwa kubo uMnuz   Mosiuoa Lekota ongumengameli weCope, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane we-One South Africa Movement nosomabhizinisi uDkt Michael Louis weNew Nation Movement okuyiyo eyafaka icala ngalo mthetho enkantolo, babe nesithangami sabezindaba lapho bakhumbuze khona abantu ukuthi sesifikile isikhathi sokuzwakala kwezwi labo nokugcwaliseka kokusebenza kwentando yabantu.ULekota uthe neFreedom Charter ikubeka obala ukuthi ngabantu abayophatha umbuso, wagqugquzela umphakathi ukuthi uthumele izethulo zawo kusukela manje, ucacise ukuthi ufuna ukuholwa abantu abakhethwe yiwona, hhayi ngamaqembu ezepolitiki.“Phambilini abantu bebengavunyelwa ukuzikhethela abantu abazobamela ephalamende. Lesi siphakamiso sokubuyekezwa kwalo mthetho, abantu bafuna ukuholwa abantu abaseduze nabo,” kusho uLekota.Uthe ukungenela ukhetho kwabantu bezimele bengekho ngaphansi kwenhlangano yezepolitiki, kuzobasiza  bakwazi ukuzimela, kuthuthuke nentando yabantu.Uthe umbono wabo wukuthi kuncishiswe amalungu ephalamende likazwelonke nesibalo samalungu ezishayamthetho zesifundazwe ukuze intando yabantu isebenze ngokufanele.UMnuz Mmusi Maimane we-One South Africa Movement, uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi abantu bakukeli abangenazwi, basebenzise leli thuba.“Njengamanje amasela enza konke akuthandayo.  Aphenyana wodwa.“Mangaki amaKhomishini asesunguliwe kungathathwa zinyathelo. Abathinteka enkohlakalweni ubabona sebephindela ephalamende futhi,” kusho uMaimane.Uthe okubuhlugu wukuthi leli lizwe lizohlala lisezikweletini izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.
title: Abantu abakhethe ababathandayo  okhethweni

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEIPHINI likaNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz David Masondo,  unxuswe ukuba athi ukushenxa ngenxa yezinsolo zokuxhaphaza impahla yombuso ekuxazululeni ukungahoshelani kwakhe nowesifazane azwana naye. Ikomiti elibhekene nokugcinwa kwesithunzi se-ANC libhalele isigungu esiphezulu sale nhlangano noMasondo limcela ukuba athi ukuhosha imfe okwesikhashana emisebenzini kahulumeni neyenhlangano ngenxa yokuthi izenzo zakhe zidicilela phansi isithunzi se-ANC.Encwadini ayilotshelwe ngusihlalo waleli komiti, kuveziwe ukuthi uMasondo ungumholi okhombise ukuzibophezelela emisebenzini yenhlangano nasezinhlosweni zayo kodwa izenzo zakhe zifuna ukugqiba lemisebenzi yakhe emihle."Siyathemba kunesifundo esifundekile kule nkinga obhekene nayo. Siyakwemukela ukuthi abameli bakho bakululeke ukuba ubikele oKlebe ngalolu daba futhi wenze njengokusho kwabo (abameli)’’. ’’Nakuba kunjalo, sicabanga ukuthi awucabangisisanga kahle...futhi bekumele wazi ukuthi ukubandakanya oKlebe kulolu daba lomndeni kuzovulela izinsolo zokuthi uxhaphaza amandla akho nezinsiza zikahulumeni. Awusilo nje ilungu lomphakathi elijwayelekile. Ungumholi oseqophelweni eliphezulu ku-ANC nephini likangqongqoshe’’. ’’Bekumele wazi ukuthi umsebenzi woKlebe ukuphenya ngenkohlakalo namacala angaphansi komthetho obhekene nokunqanda amacala ahlelwayo." Nethimba elithatha izinqumo kule nhlangano belisematasatasa emhlanganweni ngalolu daba.
title: I-ANC ifuna iphini likangqongqoshe lishenxe esikhundleni

text: KUFANELE ukuba akazange abuthi quthu ubuthongo ngempelasonto uStuart Baxter, oyinhloko yabaqeqeshi beBafana Bafana emuva kwezindaba zokuthinteka kabana kukaPercy Tau edlalela iqembu lakhe laseBelgium, iRoyale Union Saint-Gilloise ngoMgqibelo.Okwenza lo mqeqeshi ahlale emincile ukuvela kwezindaba zokulimala kukaTau okungangatshazwa ukuthi uthwele amathemba eBafana kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ese-Egypt ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo. UTau oshaye amagoli amabili iBafana izibekisela indawo kwi-Afcon beshaya iLibya, ukhishwe ngohlaka wangabe esabuya bebhekene neRoyal Excel Mouscron.Lo mdlali osanda kuqokwa ukuba iProximus League Player of the Season eBelgium, ushaye igoli lakhe lika-12 nelika-13 kulo mdlalo alimale kuwona. Yize ebenza kahle kodwa akazange awuqede ngenxa yokushayisana kabi nomunye umdlali. UTau ohambe kuleli evele ephethe isicoco sokuba umdlali wonyaka kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngesizini edlule, uyathinteka emagolini awu-26 ashaywe iRoyale Union Saint-Golloise kuyona yonke imiqhudelwano. Lokhu ukwenze kusukela efikile kuleli qembu elidlala esigabeni esiphakela esikhulu eBelgium. Usemabhukwini eBrighton & Hove Albion yase-England.Ngokwe-website yebhola eBelgium, iWalfoot.be, uTau uphawule ngokulimala kwakhe ngemuva komdlalo.“Kubuhlungu ukuthi angizange ngiwuqede umdlalo yize ngidlala kahle. Umdlali wezitha uwele kimina ngathinteka edolweni. Sibone kungcono ngikhishwe kunokuqhubeka kanti umonakalo mkhulu. Sizobona ngemuva kokuhlolwa ukuthi kuhamba kanjani. Indaba ye-Afcon akuyona into esemqondweni wami okwamanje ngoba ngingazonga emidlalweni ngithinteke ejimini,” usho kanje.Nakuba zizimbi lezi zindaba kuBaxter nakubona bonke abathandi bebhola kuleli, ezimnandi ezivela kuyona le website zithi uTau ubengahambi ngazinduku futhi engasizwa muntu ngemuva komdlalo. Osekubhekiwe ukuthi uzoba khona yini emdlalweni wokugcina njengoba isizini isongwa kule mpelasonto.
title: Kuminciwe uTau elimala kuyiwa kwi-Afcon

text: Black Leopards (1) 2Kaizer Chiefs (1) 1IBLACK Leopards ibuye sekusele umndondo, yashubisa impi yokuvika izembe emsileni we-log yeDStv Premiership.ILidoda Duvha yehlule iKaizer Chiefs ngo 2-1 emdlalweni weligi eThohoyandou Stadium, eLimpopo, ngoLwesithathu ntambama.IChiefs ibikade ibekwe phambili nguLeonardo Castro kodwa uTiklas Thutlwa washayela iLeopards amagoli amabili esiwombeni ngasinye.IChiefs ingene enkundleni izolwela amaphuzu okungena kwiTop 8 eyithikithi lokudlala kwiMTN 8 ekuqaleni kwesizini ezayo. Ngakolunye uhlangothi iLeopards ibizoqhubeka nempi yokuvika izembe kwazise isemsileni we-log yeDStv Premiership. Ukuba ihluliwe iLidoda Duvha, bekuzosho ukuthi izogawulwa yizembe uma iChippa United ithola iphuzu kwiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila ngoLwesithathu. Ngokuthola amaphuzu amathathu kwiChiefs, kade sekusele ukuthi umfundisi abusise kwehliswe ibhokisa, iLeopards isinethuba lokuqeda endaweni ka-14 kwi-log uma iqhubeka nokuqoqa amaphuzu emidlalweni esele.Ukubaluleka komdlalo wayizolo kugqame zibekwa ngendlela iChiefs neLeopards abawuqale ngayo. IChiefs icindezele iLeopards ifuna ukushaya igoli kuqala kodwa ihluleka uma isifike phambili. Ukungena iphindelela kusheshile ukuyisebenzela iChiefs ngesikhathi uCastro evalela phakathi ibhola eliwele kuyena, emuva kokuthi unozinti weLeopards, uJonas Mendes evimbe elikaHappy Mashiane sekuvalwe amehlo, ngomzuzu ka-10. Umvusi wenyamazane kube nguLazalous Kambole eqhamuka kwesokudla. Emuva kwegoli, iLeopards ivuke yazithatha, yaligcina ibhola kodwa ihluleka uma isifike phambili. Kugcine kuyilungele ngomzuzu ka-44  ngesikhathi uThutlwa eqedela ibhola likaTsheamo Moshoene aligobe eqhamuka kwesokunxele.Esiwombeni sesibili, iLeopards ibuye ngomfutho ofanayo. Kodwa iChiefs ibilokhu ikhombisa ukuba yingozi uma ingena engxenyeni enkulu yeLidoda Duvha. Ngomzuzu ka-64 uThutlwa ungqofele phakathi ibhola likaTebogo Makobela, obesanda kungena endaweni ka-Ethen Sampson.
title: ILeopards ishubise umbango emsileni idla iChiefs

text: UDINWE uyaveva umphakathi waseZinembeni, eMaqongqo, ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu, nomndeni wesitshudeni esineminyaka engu-21 esitholwe sibulewe ngesihluku esitolo sendawo.UNdumiso Mkhize (21) obenza izifundo zeScience eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal (UKZN) utholwe ebulewe ngeSonto kwesinye sezitolo zendawo, abangani bakhe ababili okuthiwa ubehamba nabo bona balimale kanzima,basesibhedlela.Laba bafana abathathu akwaziwa ukuthi badutshulwe ngubani kulesi sitolo, namaphoyisa akakabophi muntu ngesigameko.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe abasesitolo nabo bayazihlangula bathi abanalwazi bavuke sekunesidumbu egcekeni.Unina kamufi, uNkk Mabongi Gumede, obekhihla isililo ngendodana yakhe enguzinyo bulala, uthe ingane yakhe ibulawe okwesilwane.“Okusiphatha kabi njengomndeni wukuthi ingane yami ibulawe ngesihluku kodwa akatholakali umuntu oyibulele. Kubuhlungu ukuthi ingane yami idutshulwe esitolo kodwa akekho onolwazi ngokubulawa kwayo kuthiwa kuyaphenywa. Ingane yami ibulawiswe okwenja yadutshulwa ngesibhamu sokuzingela. Idubuleke esifubeni. Nasendaweni yesigameko siyifice isabambe isifuba ngesandla,” kusho uNkk Gumede ekhala.Umndeni kamufi uthe ufuna ubulungiswa ngokubulawa kwakhe.“Ngifuna ubulungiswa ngengane yami ebiyithemba lami njengoba beyenza izifundo seScience. Mina ngizisebenzela ezitolo eMgungundlovu. Ithemba lami lonke bengilibeke kuyona. Lo muntu ubenezingane ezimbili, eneminyaka emibili nenowodwa. Unina wengane endala uzithwele unezinyanga ezine,” kusho uNkk Gumede ekhala.Uthe ingane yakhe kuthiwa ibifake i-screwdriver ephaketheni layo ngesikhathi ibulawa.“Angazi ukuthi bebefunani esitolo ebusuku sekuvaliwe, angiyena nomuntu ovikela izingane uma beziyoganga bekumele ziboshwe zingabulawa,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Ilungu lomphakathi elikhulume neSolezwe lacela ukungadalulwa lithe okubadinile wukuthi kungani kungaphenyisiswa kuboshwe umuntu obulele.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala esiteshini saseBishopstowe, uphenyo lusaqhubeka kanti imbangela yokubulawa kukamufi ayaziwa. Akekho osaboshiwe. Amaphoyisa acele abanolwazi ngokubulawa kwesitshudeni ukuba baxhumane nanoma yisiphi isiteshi samaphoyisa.
title: Indida ngesitshudeni esitholwe sibulewe ngesihluku

text: LIGCINE limshonele umlisa waseSigxalabeni, eNkandla, obeseqede imizi yabantu eyiqhatha ezibiza ngomthandazi, enuka abantu ebabiza ngamagama, ethatha imali ethi uzobaxazululela izinkinga zabo. Ngokusho kukaMnuz Thembinkosi Mpungose oyinduna yesigodi naye ongumgilwa, lo mlisa onguMnuz Sandile Mchunu (26) obezibiza ngo'Mama Zwane' ohlala eMgungundlovu kodwa ebe ekhona endaweni, ubethi uhlola ocingweni. Emuva kokuhlola ubecela ukuthi bamfakele imali ezitolo kwaPep nakwaShoprite.Kuthiwa ngenxa yokuthi ubezazi zonke izinto ezenzeka endaweni, abantu bebemthinta bededelana bethi bathole isiklwebhisi somthandazi okutshela zonke ezakho ocingweni engakaze akubone."Kuxabene ubendle akungenelwana, imindeni ayibhekani ngenxa yalo muntu obezenza umthandazi. Miningi imizi engangenelani ngoba lo muntu ubekhomba umakhelwane ethi uyena othakathayo, nami ngangena esikhisini ngakhokha imali yokuhlola ocingweni wangitshela yonke into ngempilo yami,’’ kusho uMpungose.Uthe bagcine sebeyisola eyokuthi akukho mthandazi badlala isigangi somfana wendawo bamcuphela umgoga wabizwa kwesinye isigodi angaziwa kuso ukuthi azobethela, bathinta amaphoyisa wafike waboshwa khona lapho."Ngasola uma ngixoxa naye ocingweni ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle ngaqoqa umphakathi ngawuxwayisa ngalo muntu ngoba baningi abanye abesebawakile. Kwabanye ubethatha R4000 emuva kokubahlolela. Ngiyajabula ngoba ugcine evele obala lo mlisa,’’ kusho uMpungose.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi elingathandanga ukudalulwa nalo eligiliwe lithi lona lakhokha * -R1 350 lizitshela ukuthi izinkinga zalo zizolunga kanti lishaywa ngemfe ephindiwe.‘’Wayehlola eqekebula loya muntu sasithi sithole inkunzimalanga yomthandazi kanti sidlala iqola nje. Namanje sisakhala ngemali yethu esasiyithutha siyoyinika lo muntu ngenxa yokuhlupheka kanti siyamupha nje akukho mthamdazi,’’ kusho leli lungu lomphakathi.Kuthiwa bathuke boma abantu uma bethola ukuthi kanti bagilwa wumfana wendawo abebemethemba bengacabangi ukuthi engase enze imikhuba emibi kangaka.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuboshwa kwale ndoda wathi isivelile nasenkantolo."Amaphoyisa aseNkandla abophe uSandile Mchunu (26) ngecala lokukhwabanisa wavela enkantolo ngoLwesibili, usagqunywe esitokisini uzobuyela enkantolo ngoLwesibili oluzayo,’’ kusho uCaptain Gwala esitatimendeni asithumele.
title: Limshonele ‘umthandazi’ obehlola ngeselula

text: USINDE kukubi uthisha wesikole samabanga aphansi eNquthu ngesikhathi ehlaselwa abazali bengane ayifundisayo abamfice efundisa bamshaya ngenduku waba mabokoboko.Lesi sigameko senzeke esikoleni iLuvisi Primary, okwahlaselwa kuso kwabulawa umfundi nephini likathishomkhulu, uMnuz Vusi Ntombela ngo-2015, owayebuye abe nguSomlomo kuMasipala iNquthu owadutshulwa ngentululwane yezinhlamvu kwathinteka nabafundi omunye washona.Kulokhu kuthiwa kutheleke abazali bafica uNkk Mbali Moloi efundisa kwaGrade 3, bamshaya wanaba ngoba bemsola ngokuhlukumeza ingane yabo.“Bekungumama noyise womfundi kaGrade 3 abafike babuza ukuthi uphi umemu Moloi. Kuthe uma besuka baqonda kuyena bamngenela ngenduku. Izingane zikhale ubumayemaye sezithukile. Nathi sithukile ngoba phela besingazi noma bayamdubula yini njengoba kulesi sikole nothisha uNtombela wahlaselwa kanje wadutshulwa phambi kwezingane ayezifundisa. Indlela abamshaye ngayo ubengaboni ngisho emehlweni,” kusho omunye wabasebenzi.Uthe iphutha likaNkk Moloi wukuthi ngoLwesithathu ukhuze ingane efunda uGrade 3 ngoba ibihlupha omunye umfundi.Lo mthombo uthe okubi wukuthi uNkk Moloi uthe uma evula icala amaphoyisa aseNquthu amnqabela athi abantu okumele bavule icala abazali bengane ngakho yena uma elivula azombopha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuzomele uNkk Moloi axhumane nomphathisiteshi waseNquthu ngalolu daba.“Singameluleka ngokuthi abuyele esiteshini acele umphathi wesiteshi ukuze amsize kusukunyelwe udaba lwakhe,” kusho uGwala.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, ushaqekile ngalesi sigameko.“Noma ngabe uthisha ubesephutheni kodwa akekho onelungelo lokumshaya. Laba bazali bekumele baye emaphoyiseni bavule icala ukuze aphenye ukuthi ngabe izinsolo ezibekwa umemu Moloi ziyiqiniso yini. Amaphoyisa aqeqeshiwe ngakho yiwona obekumele abikelwe. Bebezothini ukube bebembulala bese ekugcineni bethola ukuthi umsulwa? Siyasigxeka lesi senzo futhi laba bazali bangaba senkingeni uma uthisha ebavulela icala efaka nabameli bakhe,” kusho uMahlambi.
title: Ushaywe abazali bengane ayifundisayo

text: INKUNZI esiluvava yomgadli we-Orlando Pirates, uJerry “Legs of Thunder” Sikhosana, ikhala ngokuqhela kukasihlalo u-Irvin Khoza eqenjini, ukushaywa ngesithende kwezingwevu zeqembu nokungalambeli impumelelo kwabadlali okudalwa wukushintsha kwendlela okwenziwa ngayo izinto.Ngesizini ephelile iBucs ibihlanganisa iminyaka ewu-80 yasungulwa kodwa esikhundleni semibhiyozo iphenduke ihlaya ihluleka ukungena kwiTop 8 okokuqala ngqa selokhu kwaqala i-Premier Soccer League (PSL) ngo-1996. Lokhu kuboza kwePirates kuze kwenziwa ihlaya nguyena uKhoza emcimbini wePSL wokuklomelisa abenze kahle lapho ebhuqe khona iqembu lakhe ngokudla umhlanganiso ekudlaleni ngokulingana.USikhosana uthe ukuwina imidlalo eyisithupha kuphela isizini yonke njengoba yenzile iBucs kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi iqembu kalisafani nakuqala. Selaphenduka laba yilapho abadlali bezenzela khona abakuthandayo.USikhosana, onomlando wokushayela iPirates igoli eyadla ngalo iCaf Champions League ngo-1995, ubekhuluma ne-Supersport.com ngoMsombuluko kwethulwa umsiko omusha weBucs.“Ngokwami kusemqoka ukuthi usihlalo abambe iqhaza eqenjini. Ngagcina ngazi ukuthi akufanele acasulwe usihlalo ngoba akekho ongazi ukuthi uma ediniwe uba njani. Singabadlali besazi ukuthi konke esikwenzayo akufanele simcasule usihlalo. Manje sekushonephi lokho? Kungenzeka kodwa nokuba matasa kakhulu kwakhe usihlalo kunomthelela. Njengoba eqhelile nje eqenjini izinto zilokhu ziyaqhubeka ziyonakala esikhundleni sokulunga,” usho kanje.Ukhalile futhi uSikhosana ngokungabhekwa nangeso kwabadlali bakudala beqembu. Uthe ngokwakhe kubalulekile ukuthi basondelane nalaba badlali bamanje. Ufuna bakwazi ukukhuluma nabadlali uma bebona kufanele ngoba ngaphandle kwabo (izinkakha) abadlali ngeke bazi ukuthi badlalelani futhi badlalela bani.“Angizami ukususa umsindo kodwa kusekhona uTeboho (Moloi) bekubonakala ukuthi kukhona umuntu wePirates omdala. Angisho ukuthi umsebenzi kaHarold (Legodi) noma okaBenson (Mhlongo) awukho kodwa kimina akuzwakali kahle ngoba ngiyazi iPirates ayikho kubona ngaphakathi. Ngenxa yesimo kwiPirates kudingeka umuntu ozoyenza le nto. Angizami ukubanyundela kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi mina ngingawenza lo msebenzi futhi ngimatasa ngiyazikhulisa ekuqeqesheni. Mhlawumbe uma ngingathola iziqu zami ngiyobhekwa ngeso,” kusho uSikhosana osanda kuthi uphupha ngokuqeqesha iPirates.Khonamanjalo izolo ntambama okhulumela iChippa United, uLuthatho Zibeka, ubhale kwi-Twitter ukuthi uBrighton Mhlongo obeyibamba kwiPirates usengunozinti wabo ngemuva kokusayina inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu.* Isolezwe libikile ngalolu daba ephephandabeni layizolo lapho uZibeko ethe akalwazi lusuka kuphi futhi bayoze bamemezele ngo-Agasti 3 ngezinguquko abanazo eqenjini.
title: Ingwazi yeBucs ikhala ngokuqhela kukaKhoza

text: IHhash’ Elimhlophe livumbuke nge-albhamu entsha ka-29 ethi Amawazawaza enezingoma eziwu-16 ayikhiphe ngaphansi kwesitebele somculo i-Universal Music.UBheki Ngcobo odume ngeleHhash’ Elimhlophe utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi yize esezakhele nabalandeli emazweni amaningi aphesheya kodwa umculo wakhe uyindlala kula mazwe. IHhash’ Elimhlophe elaqala ukukhipha izingoma ngo-1985, lithe ukujoyina i-Universal Music kube ngesinye sezinqumo elibona ukuthi bese kuyisikhathi sokuthi asithathe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umculo wakhe utholakala emhlabeni wonke.“Kuningi osekwenziwa manje ukusabalalisa umculo kubantu, le albhamu izotholakala nakuma-downloads okuyinto yesimanje. Ngiyajabula nokuthi umculo wami sewuzofika kalula ezitolo zakwamanye amazwe. Ngikhumbula nje ngise-India naseChina, abantu bakhona babengibuza izitolo abangawuthenga kuzo umculo wami kodwa ungekho. Umculo wesintu usegazini kuthina esiwuculayo kodwa ngoba uhamba nomyalezo, nabantu bakwamanye amazwe bayafunda kuwona futhi bayawuthanda, yingakho kumele sizame ukuthi bawuthole,” kusho iHhash’ Elimhlophe.Liqhuba liveze ukuthi le albhamu belilokhu lizihlanganisela yona ekhaya ngokubambisana nomndeni walo kusukela nyakenye.“Bese ngineminyaka emibili ngingakhiphi albhamu, vele angiyena umuntu ojaha ukukhipha njalo ngoba ngisuke ngifuna ukudlulisa umyalezo ngomculo. Kulokhu ngikhuluma ngothando nezimo eziningi abantu ababhekana nazo empilweni. Zikhona nezingoma ezimnandi zokujabula,” kusho iHhashi.Lithe ukusebenza ngokubambisana nomndeni walo ikakhulu izingane nonkosikazi walo, uLinah Ngcobo yikho okulenza lakwazi ukuphuma nolozolo lwe-albhamu.Ukuba seduze nomndeni walo lithe ngenye yezinto emenza abe yindoda emsabayo uNkulunkulu ngokubona nezinto ezinhle asebezizuze ndawonye njengomndeni.Lithe maduze lizotheleka KwaZulu-Natal lihambele izindawo ezahlukene nemisakazo lizokwethula yona le i-albhamu kubantu. Amawazawaza aseqalile ukutholakala ezitolo kanjalo nakuma-downloads.
title: Iya emazweni i-albhamu yeHhash’ Elimhlophe

text: ABASEKA owayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, bathi maningi amathuba okuthi basungule iqembu lezepolitiki.Lezi zindaba baziveze ngoLwesine emva kokuhlangana namakhosi, abemboni yamatekisi, izinhlangano zenkolo, uZuma, omakadebona nezinhlangano zabantu abasha abangasebenzi.UMnuz Reggie Ngcobo weMazibuyele Emasisweni, uthe abantu bayayifuna inhlangano yezepolitiki entsha. “Uma sixoxa nabantu kuwo wonke amazinga basitshela ukuthi bafuna inhlangano entsha yepolitiki, hhayi esebenzela umphakathi.
