Iqiniso wukuthi abantu bakithi bakholwa wukuthi izinkinga zabo zizoxazululwa yiyo,” kusho uNgcobo.AbeMazibuye Emasisweni bakholwa wukuthi uZuma wahlazwa yi-ANC ngesikhathi imphoqa ukuthi ahoxe esikhundleni kodwa manje ayisenawo amaqhinga selokhu ehambile.UZuma wayichitha imibiko yokuthi iMazibuye Emasisweni iyamshela ukuthi akhe iqembu lepolitiki nendodana yakhe uMnuz Edward Zuma waziqhelelanisa nale nhlangano, wathi yena noyise bayofela kwi-ANC.UZuma wathi laba abacabanga ukuthi angashiya i-ANC kusho ukuthi abamazi kahle.UNgcobo uthe bazosebenzisa izinkinga ze-ANC ukuhlela ikusasa le qembu labo.“Ngeke sithi i-ANC ayisekho kodwa izinkinga zayo sizozisebenzisa ukuheha abantu abafuna obunye ubuholi,” kusho uNgcobo.Uveze nokuthi abamboni uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa eza nezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa umnotho, ezokuthatha umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo nezinye iziphakamiso ezenziwe engqungqutheleni ye-ANC ebingoDisemba.Uthe bafuna kube neNdlu yamaKhosi, kubuyiswe umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo kuphinde kuxhaswe osozimboni abamnyama.“Sifuna amakhosi akwazi ukuthatha izinqumo ezindaweni zawo ukuze kuthuthukiswe izindawo zasemakhaya. Siwacelile namakhosi ukuthi asiseke,” kusho uNgcobo.
title: Iyaqonga eyeqembu elisha lepolitiki

text: KUNXUSWA amakholwa nabefundisi abazovakashela emabhishi ehlukene beyobhabhadisa ukuthi baqaphele ukuthi amanzi abangena kuwo awashoni kakhulu.Kuthiwa ngalesi sikhathi sePhasika kunamabandla abhabhadisa abazalwane bawo olwandle okubeka engcupheni amakholwa nalabo abasuke bezobhabhadiswa abasuke bengawajwayele amanzi.UMnuz Sputnik Ratau, okhulumela uMnyango wezaManzi nokuThuthwa kweNdle, uthe nyakenye kube nesibalo esikhulu sabantu abaminze emifuleni, emadanyini nasolwandle ngalesi sikhathi.“Ukwenyuka kwesibalo sabantu abashona ngenxa yokuthi babe nenkinga bebhukuda noma benza okuthile emanzini kuholele ekutheni siwumnyango siqinise umkhankaso wethu wokufundisa ngokuphepha emanzini, iWater Saftey Campaign,” kusho yena.Uthe njengoba kungamaholidi ePhasika iningi labantu lizochitha isizungu ezindaweni ezehlukene livakashele izihlobo nabangani. Kulezo zindawo kukhona amadamu, amachibi nemifula.“Abazali mabaqaphele ukuthi izingane aziyi emifuleni ngoba kungenzeka zithi ziyobhukuda ngoba zibona ezinye bese ziba nenkinga,” kusho yena.Ucwaningo olwenziwe yiNyuvesi yaseKapa iCape Peninsula University of Technology neLifesaving South Africa luveza ukuthi kunabantu abangu-100 000 eNingizimu Afrika abashona ngokuminza.Ngokombiko wenhlangano yezempilo iWorld Health Organisation (WHO) wango-2012 kuvela ukuthi ukuminza kungezinye zezinto ezibulala abantu abashona ngokungeyona indalo emhlabeni. Uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye izifo ukuminza kungokwesithathu ezintweni ezibulala abantu ngokungeyona indalo.
title: Isexwayiso kubefundisi ngokuminza kwamakholwa

text: UKUCOTHOZA kwamathuba okubizelwa kwiBafana Bafana kube nomthelela omkhulu ekutheni uFortune Makaringe ashiye kwiMaritzburg United eyisethenjwa aye kwi-Orlando Pirates ekubeni azi kahle ukuthi kufanele alwe ngakho konke anakho ukuthola isikimu kuyona.UMakaringe ukwabayisishiyagalolunye abasayiniswe yiBucs ngenhloso yokweqa iMamelodi Sundowns ebashaye kweseligi ngesizini edlule, bese ihamba ibanga elingcono kunaleli elihambe kwiCAF Champions League ngesizini edlule.Ngesikhathi ethulwa ngokusemthethweni njengomdlali wePirates, uMakaringe oneminyaka ewu-26 uvule isifuba wenaba ngezizathu ezimenze wangacabanga kabili ngesikhathi ethola ucingo obelumtshela ukuthi ufunwa yiBucs.Ngenxa yomlando womndeni wakhe kanjalo noweqembu, uzizwe ebophezelekile ukuthi asayine kuleli qembu kwazise ukhule kuyilona alilandelayo.“Umqeqeshi wami wokuqala kwaba ubaba wami. Wayeyileli elithusayo iBhakhaniya. Nakuba umama ubethanda lezi ezinye izinkunzi zaseSoweto kodwa umndeni nje wonke ubuyiPirates. Ngesikhathi ngiqala ukudlala ibhola bengazi ukuthi alikho elinye iqembu engingalidlalela ngaphandle kwePirates. Izimo ziyahluka-ke uma usubhekene nempilo kodwa kade ngakwazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngiyolidlalela leli qembu elinomlando ongaka,” usho kanje.Uyavuma ukuthi bekungelula ukushiya eMphithi kwazise ubeyisethenjwa kodwa ugcine ephoqeleka ngoba obekwenzeka ubengeke akuphikise. Uyavuma ukuthi umbango wejezi ujiye kakhulu kwiBucs kodwa futhi uMakaringe uthe yikho kanye-ke lokhu okuzomenza agqame.“Akekho umfana waseNingizimu Afrika ongaphuphi ngokudlalela iqembu elifana nePirates. Uma likuqoka leli qembu lokho kusuke kuwubufakazi bokuthi ikhona into ecacile oyenzayo uma usenkundleni. Okumqoka kakhulu ukukhumbula ngaso sonke isikhathi inhlanhla onayo ngokuthola ithuba lokudlubha lo mfaniswano onomlando ongaka. Ngiyazi umbango wejezi unzima kunalapho ngiphuma khona kodwa ngiyazethemba ukuthi uma ngilitholile ithuba ngizolibamba ngazo zombili ngaso sonke isikhathi,” usho kanje.Ngesikhathi evalelwa ekhoneni ngokuyikhona okukhulu okumlethe kwiPirates uthe: “Ukudlalela iBucs kuwavula kakhulu amathuba okudlalela iBafana uma uqhathanisa nalapho kade ngidlala khona.”UMakaringe usale sekuhlungwa abokugcina kwabebezoya kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ebise-Egypt muva nje.
title: OweBucs ucacisa ngokumxoshe eMphithi

text: ABASEBENZI bakhale ngohulumeni nabamabhizinisi azimele izolo bathi abanendaba nempilo nenhlalo yabasebenzi, ngenkathi bemasha ezweni lonke.Bagcwale izitaladi emadolobheni amakhulu emashini ebihlelwe ngokubambisana imifelandawonye yezinyunyana, iCosatu neSaftu.UMengameli weCosatu uNksz Zingiswa Losi, uxwayise abasebenzi ngokuthi bangavumi ukusetshenziswa, bavikele labo ababhekene namacala enkohlakalo.Ubehola imashi enkulu ePitoli ngaphandle kwamahhovisi oMnyango weziMali lapho behambise incwadi enohlu lwezikhalo.“Uma umuntu eboshelwa izinsolo zenkohlakalo akahambe ayophendula enkantolo. Singabasebenzi asingabizelwa ukuthi siyokweseka umuntu obhekene namacala athize, kuthiwe asiyolala enkantolo. Asingavumi maqabane ngoba uma abantu bedla imali, bayidla bodwa,” kusho uNksz Losi.Uthe uhulumeni namabhizinisi azimele sebekhombise kaningi ukuthi abanendaba nempilo nenhlalo yabasebenzi ngokushaya indiva izimfuno zabo.UNobhala jikelele weSaftu, uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi, obehola imashi eGoli uthe kumele basukume balwe.UVavi uthe elakuleli lilahlekelwe imisebenzi engu-2 million ezinyangeni ezintathu.Uthe lesi sibalo sengeza ku-10.8 million wabantu abebevele bengasebenzi ngoJanuwari.UVavi uthe bahlele uchungechunge lwemibhikisho kuze kube unyaka ozayo belwela izimfuno zabasebenzi.EThekwini ivalwe thaqa imigwaqo emikhulu engenela enkabeni yedolobha nezitolo, kwaba nesiphithiphi ngenxa yemashi yeCosatu.Imashi yesifundazwe isukele eCurries Fountain yayofika emahhovisi ayikomkhulu lamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, lapho kushiywe khona incwadi enohlu lwezikhalazo.ICosatu KwaZulu-Natal ithe ikufezile ebikufuna.Ithe ukuboshwa kosopolitiki, osomabhizinisi, nabasebenzi bakahulumeni woKlebe ngamacala enkohlakalo, kubangelwe ingcindezi uhulumeni ayifakelwe abasebenzi nabantu baseNingizimu Afrika.Okunye obekuhloswe ngemashi ukulwa nenkohlakalo, ukudilizwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabasebenzi umqashi futhi kuphoqwe uhulumeni ukuthi asungule amathuba emisebenzi.Bekufuqwa nomkhankaso olwa nokuhlukunyezwa nokubulawa kwabesifazane nezingane.Abasebenzi abebecula bekhuza iziqubulo, bafuna kuboshwe abakhwabanise imali ebibekelwe ukuthenga izimpahla zokuvikela kwiCorona nabaqashi abakhwabanise imali iCovid-19 TERS.UNobhala weCosatu esifundazweni uMnuz Edwin Mkhize, uthe: “Sikhathele imithetho yezomnotho eqeda imisebenzi, idale inhlupheko nokungalingani kwabantu emphakathini. Sikhathele inkohlakalo egubuzele izwe. Abasebenzi abaningi abayanga emisebenzini kuzona zonke izifunda.”UMkhize uthe * -42% wabantu baseNingizimu Afrika abasebenzi, wathi lena inhlekelele.“Ngesikhathi silwa neCorona kukhona abebematasa beba imali. Le nto ifana ncamashi nokubulala ngoba udla imali okumele ihlenge imiphefumulo. Ngomvalelandlini abasebenzi besemakhaya, kunezinkampani ezifake isicelo senkokhelo kwi-UIF kungafanele. Ezinye ezihlomulile azibakhokhelanga abasebenzi ezinye zibanika isincozuliwe.”I-Cosatu ifuna uhulumeni ahloniphe isivumelwano asenza nezinyunyana ngo-2018 mayelana nokunyuswa kwemali yabasebenzi.Incwadi enohlu lwezikhalo yamukelwe uNdunankulu uMnuz Sihle Zikalala.
title: Bagxeka uhulumeni ngokungabanakekeli

text:
MCEBO MPUNGOSEU MSAKAZI weNorth Coast Radio (104.0 FM), ozobopha ifindo likasofa silahlane nesithandwa sakhe seminyaka emihlanu, uthi ayikho into abeyilangazelele njengomshado empilweni yakhe.USabelo Mbuyazi (26), odume ngelikaSabza M emsakazweni, owenza uhlelo lwangoLwesihlanu kwiNorth Coast Radio, 
iFreaky Fridays, olungena ngo-9 kuya ku-12 ebusuku, uthi uselulindele ngabomvu usuku lwakhe olukhulu noMbali Makhoba (25).Lo msakazi uthe wahlangana noMbali ezokwenza izifundo zokusakaza eThekwini.“Ngiphothule uGrade 12 ngo-2009, ngabe sengiqala izifundo zeRadio Broadcasting nomculo eCreative Arts College. Ngenhlanhla angihlomulanga ngolwazi kuphela, kodwa ngakwazi ukuthola nomuntu osephethe inhliziyo yami,” kuchaza uSabza M, owayefunda eManqamu High School, KwaMbonambi, eRichardsbay.Njengamanje benoMbali banengane enonyaka, uNgelosi, kanti ngoFebhuwari wonyaka ozayo bazokwamukela eyesibili. Emshadweni wakhe, ozobe use-Earvin Park, ngoDisemba 20 kulonyaka, uSabza M uzobe emiswe ngozakwabo uDJ Amenisto noDJ Websta.Lo msakazi uthe enye yezinto ayithanda kunazo zonke ukuhlala nomndeni wakhe, bebukela amafilimu noma belalele umculo.Uthe njengomuntu owawufundela umculo, ngezinye izikhathi usebenza estudio aqophe nabaculi abasafufusa eRichardsBay.“Umculo yinto ehambisanayo nokusebenza emsakazweni. Ukukwazi ukukhuluma nje kuphela akwanele ngoba kumele ukwazi nangokukhuluma ngomculo owudlalayo,” usho kanje.Uthe izinhlobo zomculo azifela ngazo umculo wokholo, i-deep house nomaskandi.USabza uthe ungene emsakazweni emva kokuchazwa ngabasakazi abafana noLinda Sibiya, Khetha Gwala, noKhathide Ngobe, ayebalalela kuKhozi FM esakhula.
title: Ziyawushaya kuDJ weNorth Coast

text: KUZOPHINDE kusinde kwehlela kubanikazi bezimoto bakuleli njengoba intengo kaphetroli izophinde inyuke ngesonto elizayo.Lokhu kwenyuka nakho kuzofana nokwakamuva nje njengoba kuzoncinza kuzwele kwazise uzokwenyuka ngoR1.73 ngoLwesithathu ngoJulayi 1.Udizili wona kulindeleke ukuthi wenyuke ngoR1.74 kuthi upharafini wona wenyuke ngoR2.14.Ngokwenhlangano i-Automobile Association, ukwenyuka ngale ndlela kukaphetroli kusho ukuthi ilitha selizobiza uR15.13.Lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu bakuleli bazokhokha imali ewu-R52 kuya kuR130 okwengeziwe kuye ngokuthi umuntu uhamba ngemoto enethangi elingakanani.Yize amandla erandi ebe nomthelela kulokhu, kodwa lokhu kubukeka kungahambisani nentengo kawoyela nayo ethe ukuphakama njengamanje ngenxa yokuthi amazwe amaningi asesigabeni sokuxegisa eminye imithetho ngenxa yecoronavirus."Indlela intengo kawoyela ekhuphuke ngayo, ithe ayifane nokwehla kwayo okubonakale ngoMashi nonyaka,"kusho isitatimende sakwaAA.
title: Uyenyuka futhi uphethroli ngesonto elizayo

text: ODOKOTELA nososayensi bathi isinyathelo sokumiswa komgomo weJohnson&Johnson okwesikhashana kuleli, besifanele.Umengameli wenhlangano yodokotela, iSouth African Medical Association (Sama), uDkt Angelique Kotze, uthe nakuba abantu abayisithupha kwabangu-6.8 million, abagome ngalo mgomo okubikwa ukuthi babanenkinga yegazi elinamahlule e-United States, kuyisibalo esincane kakhulu kodwa bekufanele kumiswe kancane ukugoma kuze kutholakale lonke ulwazi ngalesi sigameko."Lesi sibalo sona sincane kakhulu ukuthi bekungenziwa isinqumo sokumisa uhlelo lokugoma ngenxa yaso kodwa bekufanele kwenziwe ukuze sazi ukuthi uma kwenzeka nakithi sizobhekana nayo le nkinga.  INingizimu Afrika inezinkinga zayo ezingafani nezase-US, kuleli kunodokotela abangu-30 000 asebegome ngalo mgomo akekho obe nenkinga engajwayelekile. Kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi bekumele sikushaye indiva okwenzeke e-US," kusho yena.UMnuz Sibongiseni Delihlazo okhulumela iDenosa, uthe ukumiswa kokugoma ngokubona kwakhe, besingekho isidingo sakho kungakabikhona isiqiniseko sokuthi amahlule egazini adalwe umgomo."Uma ubheka iminyaka yalaba bantu besifazane kungenzeka ukuthi bahlela umndeni, banenkinga yama-hormone kumbe yiyona iCorona ngoba nayo iyakwenza lokhu. Ukumiswa kwalolu hlelo kudale uvalo. Kungenzeka abantu babe manqikanqika ukugoma uma sekuqhutshekwa ," kusho yena.USolwazi Shabir Madhi ophethe uphiko lwesayensi yezempilo eWits University, uthe bekumele kumiswe kancane ukugoma wathi kodwa kumele kube nomshwalense obhekelele izinkinga zokugoma."Imithi yonke inabo ubungozi. Uma abantu beyingxenye yocwaningo kusuke kunomshwalense obhekelele izinkinga ezingavela. Kuyoba kuhle uma uhulumeni ebona ukuthi kunesidingo sokuthi kube nomshwalense ozobhekana nezinkinga ezinjengalezi njengoba kuzobe kugonywa abantu abaningi ngesikhathi esisodwa," kusho uMadhi.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, utshele amalungu ekomiti lezempilo ePhalamende ukuthi akazi imigomo, ekhiqizwa iJ&J obekumele ifike ngesonto elizayo, isazofika ngesikhathi ebekuvunelwene ngaso yini njengoba sekuke kwaba nokumiswa kwalo mgomo.Uthe umgomo okhiqizwa iPfizer uzoqala ukufika ngoMeyi, wathi sebesayine isivumelwano sokuthi iNingizimu Afrika isizothenga imigomo engu-30 million kule nkampani okuzogonywa ngayo abantu abangu-15 million."Izivumelwano esizisayine nePfizer neJ&J zinombandela wokuthi asikwazi ukufuna ukubuyiselwa imali uma kwenzeka sishintsha umqondo noma kuba nenkinga eholele ekutheni singabe sisawudinga umgomo wabo. Lo mbandela abawunikanga thina kuphela kodwa nemigomo ethengwe ngaphansi kohlelo lweCovax nethengwe i-African Union babeke umbandela ofanayo,"  kusho yena.
title: Bekufanele umiswe umgomo: odokotela

text: IZINKUNZI zaseSoweto, iKaizer Chiefs, zingase zivule unyaka ngokusayinisa isikwibhisi somgadli wase-Uganda, u-Emmanuel Okwi, osemabhukwini eqembu laseTanzania iSimba SC.Lokhu kuqinisa imibiko yakamuva ethi Amakhosi ngeke amnike inkontileka entsha umgadli wase-Italy, uGustavo Paez.Ngokwe-website yebhola yase-Uganda, iKawowo, “womabili amaqembu asevumelene ngokushintshana ngomdlali,” yize kungakashicilelwa lutho.U-Okwi uyabatshazwa ngokubasela igoli. Uqale ukudlalela izwe lakhe ngo-2009 kwiSC Villa yase-Uganda naseyidlalele amahlandla amathathu ahlukene.Okumangazayo wukuthi nakwiSimba uphezu kwehlandla lesithathu edlala kuyo. Amanye amaqembu ake wawadlalela yiYoung Africans yaseTanzania nezinkunzi zaseTunisia, i-Etoile du Sahel.Phesheya uke wathi qu kwiSonderjyskE yaseDenmark.Lo mgadli oneminyaka engu-26 ubeseqenjini leSimba elinqobe i-2017/2018 Tanzanian Premier League. Kuyimanje leli qembu ulisize langena kweyamaqoqo e-2018/2019 CAF Champions League. Izinombolo zakhe zamagoli zithi azifane nezikaBernard Parker. Empeleni emaqenjini esizwe bathi abalingane ngamagoli angaphezudlwana kuka-20 engu-65 nangu-70.Uma esayina kwiChiefs u-Okwi uzoficana nomkhaya wakhe uGodfrey Walusimbi abebedlala naye kwiSC Villa.UWalusimbi odlala emuva kwesokunxele badlala naye eqenjini lesizwe lase-UgandaAmakhosi aye ekhefini likaKhisimusi esele ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye kwiBidvest Wits esesicongweni.Lokho kudalwa wukushoda ngamagoli kwazise umshayimagoli ophambili kuMakhosi njengamanje nguKhama Billiat onamane. Ulandelwa nguLeonardo Castro onamabili, uPaez onelilodwa kanti ezaseMzansi zonke okubalwa kuzo uParker, Ryan Moon noLebohang Manyama zisathungatha elokuqala.Imenenja yebhola kwiChiefs, uBobby Motaung, isanda kuthi bazozwa ngomqeqeshi omusha, u-Ernst Middendorp, ukuthi bashone ngaphi nemakethe ngewindi lokudayiselana ngabadlali likaJanuwari.
title: IChiefs ingase isayinise unyazi lomgadli

text: UKHALELWE ngamasongo kaSigonyela umrepha uPitch Black Afro (Thulani Ngcobo) osolwa ngokubulala inkosikazi yakhe ngoDisemba 3.UPitch Black Afro uboshwe ngamaphoyisa aseGoli ngemuva kophenyo aluqale emuva kokutholakala kwesidumbu somkakhe endlini.ISowetan Live ibike ukuthi uPitch Black Afro washayela ucingo amaphoyisa ngemuva kokushona komkakhe uCatherine Modusane, besendaweni yokulala, ibed and breakfast, eYeoville, eGoli.Uphenyo lwaluveza ukuthi uzishonele kodwa kuthe uma sekuphenyisiswa kwatholakala ukuthi akunjalo kwase kuvulwa idokodo lokubulala.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseGauteng, uColonel Lungelo Dlamini, utshele Isolezwe izolo ukuthi uPitch Black Afro uzovela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseHillbrow namhlanje.“Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi kuboshwe umyeni wowesifazane owatholakala efile endlini wabekwa icala lokubulala,” kusho uDlamini.UPitch Black Afro wazakhela udumo eminyakeni eyedlule ngezingoma zakhe okubalwa kuzo ethi Neva Let You Go, Matofotofo nezinye eziningi.
title: UPitch Black Afro kwelokufa kowakwakhe

text: KUGXABHA izisu kothisha basezikoleni zaKwaMaphumulo njengoba uNgqongqoshe omusha woMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ethe uzowuqeda lo mkhuba wabo wokuzitika ngocansi nezingane zesikole.Othisha bakulezi zikole kuvela ukuthi bazitika ngezingane isidana, baze bathengele imindeni yazo amagilosa. Babuye bazishaye isifuba ngalo mkhuba njengoba asebelale nazo bezibiza ngamakati.Engxoxweni abe nayo naleli phephandaba kade eyovula isikhungo sezemfundo esifundisa ngezinto ezahlukene eDurban Girls High School, eGlenwood eThekwini izolo, uMshengu uthe lolu daba luseqhulwini ezinhlelweni zakhe njengoba ethe engena nje, wayetshelwa ngalo.“Sithinteke kakhulu njengomnyango ngothisha okuthiwa benza lokhu. Imizamo yokuthi bazama ukumboza lolu daba ngokuxhumana nabazali bezingane, ngeke ibasize ngalutho,” kusho uMshengu.Uthe bazokwenza ucwaningo lwabo futhi indlela abazolwenza ngayo luzovundulula yonke inkohlakalo eyenziwa wothisha ezikoleni zakule ndawo.NgokukaMshengu, ngeke basho ukuthi bazoluphothula nini uphenyo lwabo. Kodwa imiphumela yalo izokwaziswa abezindaba.UMshengu ukhuluma kanjena nje umthombo opotshozele leli phephandaba lolu daba, uthe kuyimanje othisha bahambela imindeni yabafundi ababakhulelisile, bazama ukubavala imilomo selokhu kuphume lolu daba.“Abanye babo bayafona besemsebenzi bafonela omama nogogo bamantombazane bebatshela ukuthi bangathi vu uma sekukhona abazokwenza uphenyo,” kusho umthombo.Ngokomthombo, abanye othisha abasolwa ngokwenza lokhu, sebenikeze abazali babafundi izimali ngenhloso yokubavala imilomo.Umkhandlu obhekele ukuziphatha kothisha, iSouth African Council for Educators (SACE), nawo ukugcizelele ukuthi uzojuba abaphenyi bawo ukuyophenya ngalezi zinsolo.UMnuz Themba Ndhlovu okhulumela lo mkhandlu, uthe okubuhlungu kakhulu ngalolu daba, ukuthi abazali bezinganekuthiwe bayasamukela lesi senzo.“Sizodinga abazali ukuthi kube yibona ababa ngofakazi uma sesiphenya ngalolu daba,” kusho uNdhlovu.Uthe inselelo enkulu ababhekana nayo uma sebenza uphenyo lwabo, abazali abangafuni ukuphumela obala babambisane nabo.Omunye umthombo uveze ukuthi kunomndeni osanda kuhlasela omunye wothisha kwesinye sezikole kule ndawo, owayethembise ukuthi uzokhokhela ukukhulelisa indodakazi yawo kodwa wangasigcina isethembiso.Leli phephandaba libikile ngalolu daba ngeledlule.
title: Kuzoshuba kothisha abakhulelisa abafundi

text: UNDUNANKULU ophumayo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Willies Mchunu, useluleke uNdunankulu ozongena neminyango ehlukene ukuthi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izincomo zekhomishini ebiphenya ngokubulawa kosopolitiki ziyalandelelwa.UMchunu uthe mkhulu umsebenzi owenziwe yiKhomishini kaMoerane eyayiphenya ngokubulawa kosopolitiki.“Mkhulu umsebenzi owenziwe yikhomishini, umbiko wayo waya ngisho kuMengameli. Okuhle ukuthi uMengameli ozongena uyalwazi udaba lwalo mbiko kanjalo noNdunankulu ozongena ubesesigungwini songqongqoshe, uyalwazi lolu daba,” kusho uMchunu.UMchunu, obe nengxoxo ne-Independent Media, ubephendula umbuzo ngalabo abakhala ngokuthi kwamoshwa imali kuqokwa ikhomishini eyayiphenya ngomsuka wokubulawa kosopolitiki kodwa kuze kube yimanje zisaqhubeka lezi zehlakalo azinqandeki.Uthe indaba yokubulawa kosopolitiki akuyona into ongamane uyixazulule ngosuku olulodwa idinga ukuthi kubanjiswane.Uqhube wathi ezindaweni ezaziyisizinda zodlame isimo sesadamba kuzona okubalwa namanye amahostela.“Kumele indaba yombiko ilandelelwe ingayekwa nje ukuze kuliwe nesihlava sokubulawa kosopolitiki.”Uthe ngesikhathi sakhe akukaze kube nezinsolo zokuthi kube nenkohlakalo kuhulumeni.“Singenelelile eMzimkhulu senza uphenyo kwaba nombiko owanikwa oKlebe ngendaba yakhona, esingenawo amandla okubopha abantu.“Sisukumile safuna kuphenywe lapho besizwile khona ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle kodwa lapho singazi khona asikwazi ukuthi sithi akuphenywe.”Ngodaba lwaseThekwini, uthe akudingekanga ukuthi benze uphenyo ngoba umkhandlu iwona owazenzela uphenyo wona.“Ngakhuluma neMeya nomphathi womkhandlu eThekwini, bangitshela ukuthi uphenyo lwabo olwaveza ukuthi kunezinto ezenzekayo, akuzange kuzenzekele umkhandlu owenza uphenyo.“Uma kukhona izinsolo zenkohlakalo, saziswa ngazo sifuna izincazelo noma sifune kuphenywe.”Uthe kuyamkhathaza ukuboswha kosopolitiki, wathi balinda uphenyo luze luphothulwe.“SineMeya ebisanda kuboshwa, kwahoxiswa amacala okwesikhashana, amaphoyisa angaphinda avuse amacala. Kuhle ukuthi kukhona okwenzekayo, uma umuntu ebekwa amacala kumele ahambe ayophendula enkantolo.”UMchunu uthe uthatha umhlalaphansi kuhulumeni, hhayi kwezepolitiki.“Ngithatha umhlalaphansi kuhulumeni, hhayi kwezepolitiki. Ngizoqhubeka ngibambe iqhaza ngiyilungu leSACP futhi ngiyilungu likaKhongolose.”
title: Ukhathazwa ukuboshwa kosopolitiki

text: IPHOYISA likamasipala weTheku elingasekho emhlabeni, lichazwe njengebeliwumpheme wokukhosela kubo bonke abebesondelene nalo njengoba lakwazi ukuthatha inqwaba yezingane zezihlobo lazifundisa ngamandla alo.Izingane zikaSeargent FaniFani Dladla (61) zikhulume kakhulu ngoyise enkonzweni yomngcwabo wakhe obuseHambanathi, oThongathi, izolo. UDladla ubulawe yimigulukudu egade umuzi wekhansela nozakwabo uConstable Nomasonto Mhlanga (40), eBhambayi, eNanda, ngoMsombuluko.UConstable Mhlanga naye ubekwe endaweni yakhe yokugcina ngakubo izolo.Enye yamadodakazi kaDladla, uNkk Chili, ithe uyise ubashiye bengabantu abaqotho abakwazi ukuzimela. Ichaze uyise njengobaba wazo zonke izingane ebezikhona konke lapho ahamba khona. Indodakazi yakhe ithe indlela abebasiza ngayo ibize imbuze ukuthi uhlala eyithathaphi imali ngoba ubehlala eyimpendulo njalo uma kunenkinga. Amadodakazi athe uyise ubeyindoda enamahlombe abanzi ethwala zonke izinkinga afake izisombululo.Kubalwe inqwaba yezifundiswa okuthiwa uzikhombe esikoleni zafunda zagogoda. Kuvele nokuthi ubewumuntu wenkolo futhi egqugquzela ukuzithanda ehlala eyincwasimende. "Ubeswenka ubaba baze bambize ngoJacob Zuma ngoba ubehlala egqoke kahle amasudi. Ubemuhle enomzimba omuhle ezithanda," kusho indodakazi.Amadodakazi aphinde ababaza uthando uDladla abethanda ngalo umkakhe emenzela yonke into.Indodakazi ibonge kakhulu nomasipala ngokuqasha uyise owakade engunogada wagcina eseyiphoyisa lomkhandlu. Ithe noma bekhala kodwa basale begezeke igilo ngoba uyise ubenzele konke kusenesikhathi.UDladla ubeseneminyaka engu-22 esebenzela umbutho wamaphoyisa kamasipala.Uzakwabo kaDladla uSuperintendent S Ndlovu uthe nabo balahlekelwe. Unxuse ukuthi abenzi bobubi bajeze kanzima ngoba abalindele ukuhlangana nabo sebecanasa emuva kwezinsuku ezimbalwa. Uthe kuyoba nzima ukuvala isikhala sikaDladla ngoba ubesebenza ngokuzinikela.Ihholo obekubanjwe kulo inkonzo yomngcwabo beligcwelele lichichima amaphoyisa kamasipala ezoshaya indesheni okokugcina kuzakwabo.
title: Lifihlwe ngesizotha iphoyisa elibulawe izigebengu

text: OBENGUMENGAMELI we-IFP Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi ukhale ngokwehla kwezinga lezolimo eZululand okwenza imindeni eminingi ibhuqwe yindlala.Ethula inkulumo yakhe emcimbini obusoKhukho oLundi izolo lapho uMkhandlu waseZululand kade wethula uhlelo lwentuthuko oludidiyelwe ulalela nezikhalo zomphakathi, uButhelezi uthe iqiniso elingephikiswe ukuthi * -40%, womphakathi waseZululand uzabalaza ngobuhlwempu obungachazeki.“Enye yezimpi esiyiphethe ngezandla zethu ukuntuleka kwamanzi, siyakuqonda sonke ukuthi iZululand ibhekene nesimo sesomiso esingaphezu kwamandla kwabanye bethu abangabalimi, njengami-nje ngiyakwazi ukufakaza ngokulahlekelwa yimfuyo kanye nezitshalo, kuyalimaza ukubona izitshalo zibuna namadlelo emfuyo eqothuka ngenxa yesomiso,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe iZululand idinga uR3.8 billion, ukuze ikwazi ukubhekana nesomiso.Uthe isomiso sinomthelela omubi kubantu.“Eminyekeni eyishumi eyedlule ngangikhuluma ngomasibambisane nobumqoka kwezolimo kubalimi.” Uthe imizi eminingi eZululand iphethwe ngabesifazane, okwenza ukuthi babe nomthwalo omningi emahlombe abo.Uthe njengoba abafundi bakwa-matric bebhala ezweni lonke kubalulekile ukuthi kukhiqizwe abafundi abazokwazi ukubamba iqhaza ekufukuleni umnotho wezwe.“Ngifisa ukuyikhuthaza intsha yaseZululand ukuba ishabashekele imfundo nokuvivinyelwa amakhono,” kusho uButhelezi.UButhelezi unxuse umphakathi ukuba uzame ukuzisiza ngokwawo ungathembeli kakhulu kuhulumeni.“Umnotho uyaqhubeka ngokwehlela ezansi, isimo sokungasebenzi siyaqhubeka kanti nezindleko zokuphila ziyaqhubeka nokundlondlobala,” kusho uButhelezi.Ithula inkulumo yayo, iMeya yoMkhandlu waseZululand uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi iveze ukuthi basanda kusayina isivumelwano sokusebenzisana nenyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal ezobasiza ngokuthi ibaqeqeshele abalimi basesiFundeni sabo.Uthe abenyuvesi sebefikile kubalimi baseZululand bezohlola ukuthi iziphi izitshalo ezifanele ukutshalwa.
title: UShenge ubalisa ngesimo sendlala nesomiso eZululand

text: SABELO NSELEZIHLALELE ovalweni izinduna ngenxa yokubulawa kwesinye sezishoshovu zenhlangano Ubumbano Lwezinduna ebesimdibi munye nezinduna ezamashela ehhovisi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal emasontweni amabili edlule.UMnuz Prince Hlabisa (58) obeyinduna eMatshamnyama, KwaHlabisa, udutshulwe wafa ngeSonto ntambama.UHlabisa ubehola Ubumbano Lwezinduna KwaHlabisa. Wayekhona  ezinduneni ezamasha emasontweni amabili edlule ziyokhuza ukubulawa kwezinduna nokufuna ukukhokhelwa imali ezithi ziyikweletwa nguhulumeni.Indodana kaHlabisa, uMnuz Khangelani Hlabisa, ithe uHlabisa udutshulwe yindoda engaziwa phambi kwenkosikazi yakhe nezingane ezisencane ezingakafundi ngisho isikole.“Ubaba ufike wangqongqoza, kwathi uma ethi uyavula wabe esethi lo muntu ‘ya ndoda’, wabe esedubula emva kwalokho. Udubule ephindelela, kuhlule noma esebaleka engena kwelinye lamagumbi ubaba, yamlandela indoda yaqhubeka nokudubula.“Ugcine esebaleka ephuma kulelo gumbi ngoba ebona ukuthi kuzolimala izingane ebesezibalekele khona, yalokhu iqhubekile nokudubula indoda.”Uthe uyise ubenamanxeba amaningi okudutshulwa. Bamphuthumise esibhedlela wafike waphelela khona.“Ubedubuleke esifubeni, esiswini, engalweni nasethangeni.”UHlabisa ube yinduna kusukela ngo-2006.UMnuz Phakamani Dlamini, woBumbano Lwezinduna, uthe uHlabisa ungenye yezinduna ezibe nenkinga ngesikhathi uhulumeni eqala ukuholela izinduna ngo-2016.“Kuvele kwaqhamuka umuntu othe naye uyinduna. Impilo yakhe ibisengcupheni ngoba ubeseze wathenga ngisho isibhamu esisemthethweni ethi uzama ukuzivikela.”Njengoba sekusondele amaholidi kaKhisimusi, uDlamini uthe unovalo lokuthi njengoba izinduna eziningi zibulawa ngazo lezi zikhathi.Zingaphezu kuka-22 izinduna ezisasanda kubulawa KwaZulu-Natal.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, ukugxekile ukubulawa kukaHlabisa.“Ukubulawa kwenduna uHlabisa kusawukuqhubeka kokuhlaselwa kobuholi bomdabu KwaZulu-Natal yilabo ababubukela phansi. Sifuna amaphoyisa aphuthumise uphenyo lwawo ukuze ziboshwe lezi zigilamkhuba.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala kodwa bekungakaboshwa muntu.
title: Uvalo ezinduneni kudutshulwa enye yafa

text: IDemocratic Alliance (DA) eKapa izimisele ngokuqhubeka nokuchibiyela umthetho sivivinyo ovumela ukuthi kudayiswe utshwala ezikoleni, iSchool Education Amendment Bill.Yize ngoLwesithathu  kube nenkulumo mpikiswano eshubile esishayamthetho amalungu eDA agcine evotele ukuthi uchitshiyelwe lo mthetho kodwa kulindeleke ukuthi isinqumo esizonika umkhombandlela sibe namuhla.Emhlanganweni wangoLwesithathu indlela obekushube ngayo amanye amalunga esishayamthetho asolwe ngokusabisa usihlalo wekomidi uMnuz Basil Kivedo.Ukuphasiswa kwalomthetho kuzobe kusho ukuthi kuvumelekile ukudayiswa nokuphuzwa kotshwala ezikoleni nasemcimbini yezikole, ngaphansi kwesimo esiqashiwe.Izikole ezinesifiso sokwenza imcimbi ozobe kudayiswa noma kuphuzwa khona utshwala kufanele zifake isicelo eMnyangweni wezeMfundo eWestern Cape. Ngemuva kwalokho, isicelo sibe sesibhekisiswa yisigungu esengamele isikole bese sikhipha umyalelo.Emhlanganweni, amalungu esishayamthetho e-ANC,  uMnuz Theo Oliver noMnuz Cameron Dugmore bebeshayisana ngamakhanda noSekela Sihlalo weKomidi uNksz Lorraine Botha. U-Olivier uthe abaningi abavumelani nalomthetho wokuphasiswa kokudayiswa kotshwala ezikoleni.“Mingaki imibono evela kumalungu omphakathi aphikisanayo naloludaba?, Iningi labantu liyaphikisana nokuphasiswa kwalomthetho, uqhubeka kanjani nawo? Uqhubeka ngaphansi kwasiphi isisekelo?” kubuza u-Oliver.U-Adv Lynn Coleridge-Zils, owumqondisi wenqubomgomo eMnyangweni wezeMfundo eWestern Cape uthe zibalelwa ku-83 izikole eziwesekayo lo mthetho.Ngesikhathi uDugmore ecela imininingwane yezikole eziwu-83 okuthiwa ziyaweseka lo mthetho, uColeridge-Zils uthe akanayo.Usotswebhu omkhulu weDA, uMnuz Mark Wiley, uthe imicabango yokuthi wonke umuntu uyawuchitha lo mthetho ayilona iqiniso.“Uyesekwa lo mthetho, kube nezikole eziwesekayo. Amaqembu,abafundi abadala nezinhlangano ezizimele abakwazi ukwenza imicimbi enotshwala ngenxa yomthetho okhona njengamanje.”
title: IDA isahlabela phambili nowokudayiswa kotshwala ezikoleni

text: UMBIKO woMvikeli woMphakathi mayelana nokubulawa nokukhishwa ezindlini kwabantu ehostela eGlebelands, eMlaza, uveza ukuthi uMkhandlu weTheku namaphoyisa bahlulekile ukwenza indawo iphephe.Umbiko okhishwe nguMvikeli woMphakathi, u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane, izolo uveze ukuthi umkhandlu namaphoyisa bahlulekile ukwenza kahle umsebenzi wabo.Okunye okuvele embikweni wukuthi umkhandlu awunawo amandla enele ekufakweni kwabantu ezindlini ehostela okwenza kube khona abantu abazicebisayo ngalakho.UMVIKELI woMphakathi, u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane, osola uMkhandlu weTheku namaphoyisa ngokuhluleka ukuvikela abantu basehostela eGlebelands eMlaza“Yize izikhulu zomkhandlu zithi kunabantu abawu-11 380 ababhalise emabhukwini abo kodwa amaphoyisa wona enze izethulo ezithi okwamanje bangaphezu kuka 19 000 abantu abakhona, okuyinto umkhandlu ongazange uyiphike,” kusho umbiko.Usola umkhandlu ngokwehluleka ukusebenzisa imigomo yasehostela eyashaywa ngo-1998.Umgomo wamahostela uthi umkhandlu kumele ube nezindawo zokuqashisa ezihlanzekile futhi okuphephile ukuhlala kuzona.“Kuyadumaza ukuthi ngemuva kweminyaka ewu-18 kwashaywa lo mgomo kodwa umkhandlu weTheku ubukeka ungamelani nawo,” kuqhuba umbiko.UMkhwebane uthe amaphoyisa ehlulekile ukwenza umsebenzi wawo wokuvikela abantu nokulwa nobugebengu eGlebelands.Umbiko uphinde uveze ukuthi namaphoyisa omkhandlu ehlulekile ukwenza umsebenzi wawo wokuvikela ubugebengu ehostela.UMkhwebane uphinde waveza ukuthi sincane isibalo sabantu ababoshwayo nabashushiswayo mayelana namacala athinta iGlebelands.Uphenyo ngokubulawa kwabantu luqale ngemuva kokuthi kwafakwa isimangalo ehhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi ngo-2015 nguSolwazi uMcquoid Mason, ongumengameli weCommonwealth Legal Education Association. UMason wakhala ngendlela okubulawa ngayo abantu ehostela.Ngesikhathi sophenyo, umvikeli woMphakathi wanika ithuba umkhandlu weTheku nebamba likaKhomishana wamaphoyisa esifundazweni ukuba baphendule ngezinsolo ezibhekiswe kuboUMkhwebane uphinde wathola ukuthi uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi wehlulekile ukusiza abantu abangabagilwa bodlame ehostela.IMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku neBamba likaKhomishana wamaphoyisa esifundazweni, uGeneral Bheki Langa, banikwe izinsuku eziwu-30 ukuze basho izinhlelo zabo mayelana neziphakamiso ezenziwe kubona.INhloko yezokuXhumana eMkhandlwini weTheku, uNksz Tozi Mthethwa, ithe umkhandlu uzowubheka umbiko bese uyaphendula kuMvikeli woMphakathi.Amaphoysa athe iziphakamiso eziningi zoMvikeli woMphakathi ngasohlangothini lwawo sezenziwe.
title: ‘Bahlulwa ukwenza iGlebe iphephe’

text: UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs uGavin Hunt, akazimisele ngokubekezelela abadlali abasebancane, abazophuma endleleni ngenxa yodumo.UHunt ufike kwiChiefs waphoqeleka ukuthi adlalise abadlali abasebancane ngenxa yesigwebo esidonswa yiqembu, sokungakwazi ukusayinisa abadlali abasha. Kulaba badlali kubalwa uNkosingiphile Ngcobo (21), Happy Mashiane (23) noDarrel Matsheke. Sebephenduke izintandokazi kubalandeli baMakhosi, ikakhulukazi uNgcobo osedlale imidlalo engu-12 washaya amagoli amathathu, noMashiane oseshaye inethi kabili emidlalweni eyisihlanu ayidlalile.Eminyakeni edlule iChiefs ihluphekile ngabadlali abasebancane abagcina bewuhlupho, bangene ezinkambeni sikaFaro emuva kokukhushulelwa esikimini esikhulu. Kulaba badlali kubalwa uThabiso "Skapi" Malatsi, Junior Khanye, Jabu Mahlangu nabanye."Iqembu selibe nabadlali abaningi abanjalo. Asibadingi labo badlali. Uma ngisekhona lapha, ngeke babekhona. Sesibe nabo abambalwa eminyakeni edlule abadale izinkinga. Uma ngisekhona ngeke babekhona abanjalo. Ngiseqiniseko salokho," kusho uHunt.Ukhuluma kanjena nje, uHunt usanda kuncoma abafana abancane ngendlela abazimisela ngayo kusukela ebanike ithuba esikimini. Ngaphansi kuka-Ernst Middendorp, kade bengadlali njalo oNgcobo noMashiane. Manje babukeka bezelwe kabusha ngaphansi kukaHunt. Lo mqeqeshi uncome uNgcobo wathi unekhono elimangazayo futhi udinga ukuhlala ezindaweni eziyingozi ukuze iqembu lizodla ngaye. Mayelana noMashiane uthe umthande eqala ukumbona ngoba uwuhlobo lwabadlali abagoba kahle ibhola.IChiefs engakahlulwa emidlalweni emine yakamuva, izinzile kwi-top 8. Isendaweni yesikhombisa ngamaphuzu angu-15 emuva kwemidlalo engu-13. Ngempelasonto ibuye nephuzu ibambana neStellenbosch eKapa.Kusasa Amakhosi azokwamukela iBaroka emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eFNB Stadium ngo-5 ntambama. NgoMgqibelo azobhekana ne-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni wabakhaya baseSoweto e-Orlando Stadium."Angikawucabangi umdlalo wabakhaya. Kusafanele silungiselele owangoLwesibili. Angikwazi futhi ukuphumuza abadlali. Kufanele siqhubekele phambili. Ukushaya igoli kuyakunyusa njengeqembu, ubenento ozobambelela kuyona. Sidinga ukwenza lokho kuyona yonke imidlalo. Uzolimala uma ungawasebenzisi amathuba, "kusho uHunt.
title: UHunt uthi ngeke abamele abadlali abahluphayo

text: UKHALA ezimathonsi ngokulimala kukaJoseph Molangoane, umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs uGiovanni Solinas owine umdlalo wakhe wokuqala njengomqeqeshi waMakhosi.IChiefs idlulele kowandulela owamanqamu weMTN 8 emuva kokwehlula iFree State Stars ngo 3-0 eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. Amagoli alethe injabulo kubalandeli ashaywe nguDumisani Zuma, Leonardo Castro noKhama Billiat. USolinas ubekade esishintshile isikimu aqale ngaso emidlalweni yeligi emibili edlule adlale kuyona ngokulingana ngo 1-1 neMamelodi Sundowns, wahlulwa yiBidvest Wits ngo 3-1. Kubadlali abathole ithuba lokuqala umdlalo kukhona uMolangoane, Zuma noSiyabonga Ngezane. Ukushaya into ecokeme kweChiefs kuphenduke usizi ngesikhathi uMakhehleni Makhaula weStars ephula uMolangoane esiwombeni sesibili. Ngaphandle kukaMolangoane, uSiphelele Ntshangase, ogcine eqokwe njengomdlali ovelele, akawuqedanga umdlalo ngenxa yokulimala eqakaleni.Ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva komdlalo, uSolinas ubezwakala ukuthi ubambe izinyembezi.“Ngijabule ngomphumela womdlalo kodwa ngiphatheke kabi ngomdlali wami. Kodwa lena impilo, linjalo ibhola. KuNtshangase akukubi kangako, ngikholwa wukuthi uzoshesha ukululama.Abadlali bami bashaqekile ngokulimala kukaMolangoane, abanye baphatheke kabi kakhulu. URama (Ramahlwe Mphahlele) kade ngikhuluma naye, ushaqekile. Balahlekelwe nguzakwabo, silahlekelwe ngumdlali obalulekile.Umlenze wakhe uphukile. Ngeke sibe naye isikhathi eside. Okubuhlungu ukuthi kade edlala umdlalo wakhe wokuqala kule sizini. Anginawo amagama okuchaza indlela engizizwa ngayo. Esingakwenza wukumbeka emkhulekweni,” kusho uSolinas ngosizi.IChiefs ishaye into ecokeme, kubhoke uNtshangase, Billiat noCastro. Izinkonondo zabalandeli ngokudlaliswa kwabadlali abadala zizwakele kwazise bakujabulele abakubone enkundleni. IChiefs izovakashela iBaroka emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ePeter Mokaba Stadium, eLimpopo kusasa ngo-7.30 ebusuku.“Lo mdlalo ubukade ubalulekile, owomkhumulajezi lapho kuwukuthi uyaqhubeka noma uyaphuma. Alikho ithuba lesibili. Sidlale kahle, sakha amathuba amaningi. Ngiyaziqhenya ngabadlali bami. Manje kudingeka sisebenze kanzima, silungiselele umdlalo olandelayo, sinyuse izinga ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi sisengafinyelela kwelinye izinga. Abadlali sebeqala ukuyiqonda indlela engifuna sidlale ngayo kodwa kusekhona okufanele sikulungise. Ngesikhathi sihamba phambili ngo 2-0 bekufanele sigcine ibhola kakhulu kodwa besilisheshisa kungenasidingo,” kusho uSolinas.Mayelana nomdlalo neBaroka uthe: “Kule ligi awukho umdlalo olula. Kule ligi wonke umdlalo yimpi. Alikho iqembu elilula. IBaroka iyiqembu elihle. Emdlalwen odlule ihlule iCape Town City ngo 2-1. ICape Town City iyiqembu eliqinile. Kuzoba wumdlalo onzima ikakhulukazi njengoba bekade bengadlali, bephumule. Ngaphezu kwalokho sizohamba, asikho isikhathi sokuphumula. Nginezinsuku ezimbili zokubheka iqembu lami, ngithathe isinqumo ngoba mhlawumbe sidinga ukushintshanisa abadlali. Kodwa ngifuna ukukhuluma nabadlali kuqala.”
title: USolinas ubalisa ngoMolangoane

text: INKANTOLO eNkulu eThekwini ibabaze izigwebo ezishaqisayo ezinikezwe abalahlwa amacala okudlwengula eNkantolo yeMantshi eMlaza eminyakeni edlule. Le nkantolo ibinquma odabeni olufakwe yizishoshovu ezilwela amalungelo ezingane nabesifazane ezikhalaze ngezigwebo ezikhishwa yiMantshi yaseMlaza beyisola ngokuba nesandla esithambile kubadlwenguli. Le mantshi itholwe inesandla esintengayo ngesikhathi kubuyekezwa ukwahlulelwa kwamacala amathathu okudlwengulwa kwezingane eminyakeni eyedlule. Ukubuyekezwa okukhethekile okwethulwe eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini phambi kwamajaji amabili kuveze ukuthi izinqumo zemantshi uK Bodlani "ziyethusa" futhi "ziphikisana" nomgomo wesigwebo sikadilikajele kulabo abadlwengula abantwana.Emacalweni abuyekeziwe kuvele ukuthi, uBodlani wagweba umsolwa iminyaka eyisihlanu, elengiswe iminyaka eyisikhombisa, ngokudlwengula indodakazi yakhe eneminyaka engu-11, kanti omunye umsolwa wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-10, eyisihlanu kuyona elengisiwe ngokudlwengula intombazane eneminyaka engu-10.Komunye umsolwa wesithathu wamgweba iminyaka emine elengiswe iminyaka engu-15 ngokudlwengula intombazane eneminyaka engu-15. Ecaleni lesine lokudlwengula wagweba umsolwa iminyaka engu-25, engu-18 kuyona ingeke ibe nawo ushwele. Emacaleni okuqala amathathu, ukugweba kukaBodlani kuchazwe njengokululaza ukusingathwa komthetho."Umphakathi uzolahlekelwa yithemba ekufakweni kwezigwebo yizinkantolo kanti futhi uzoshaqwa ukuthi labo abanukubeza izingane bazodedelwa babuyele emphakathini," kusho ijaji.Amajaji avumile ukuthi uma kwethulwa isigwebo kufanele kube nozwelo, kepha uBodlani "wenganyelwa kakhulu uzwelo" waze wakhohlwa ukubheka ubucayi bamacala."Izigwebo azihambisani nawo wonke la macala. Ecaleni lokuqala, imantshi ibone kungcono ukuthi umntwana abhekane nalowo ohlukumeze ukumethemba kwakhe wamdlwengula," kusho umbhalo."Ecaleni lesibili imantshi ikushaye indiva ukuthi umsolwa wabeka isisulu engcupheni yokwesuleleka ngesifo i HIV. " Ecaleni lesithathu kuvele ukuthi uBodlani wavumela ukusetshenziswa kobufakazi obungakaze bethulwe enkantolo njengengxenye yesizathu sesigwebo ayesikhipha.Isinqumo sokubuyekezwa siyale ukuba womane lamacala aqulwe kabusha eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza ngaphambi kwenye imantshi.Oyisishoshovu samalungelo ezingane, uJoan van Niekerk uthe, lezi zigwebo zethulwe ngaphandle kokubhekwa kokuhlukumezeka kwezisulu nokuthi abasolwa bazokwazi yini ukushintsha."Siyazi ukuthi abantwana belulama ngokushesha emzimbeni kodwa kukhona nokuhlukumezeka komoya. Umntwana odlwengulwe ubaba wakhe kuyahlasimulisa ngoba nguyena okufanele amvikele," kusho yena.Umqondisi weWomen and Men Against Child Abuse, uMiranda Jordan uthe, isinqumo sokubhekwa kabusha kwezigwebo "sihle kakhulu" kodwa kufanele kuthathwe izinyathelo ukuze kunqandwe le mantshi."Leli cala lincisha isisulu ubungane nobudala baso, kanti kukhona ukulimala emzimbeni nasemoyeni. Ukulimala kwengane kuyahlala ngoba ingane idinga ukwelulekwa ngokwengqondo isikhathi eside. Umthetho uthi abatholakale benukubeza izingane kumele bagwetshwe iminyaka engu-25 kuya phezulu."
title: Kugxekwe ijaji elifaka uswazi oluncane kubadlwenguli eMlaza

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZII SIKHULU esiphezulu seSouth African Football Association (Safa), uDennis Mumble, sithe bazoludingida ngempelasonto udaba lomqeqeshi weBafana Bafana, u-Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba.UMumble ubekhuluma nezintatheli eSafa House izolo ngesikhathi kuqhathwa amaqembu azodlala kuma-Pay-Offs e-ABC Motsepe League aqala ngesonto elizayo eBloemfontein.“Ngempelasonto kuzoba nomhlangano wekomidi elibhekelele ukusebenza kwabaqeqeshi bamaqembu esizwe. Lizodingida ikusasa likaMashaba. Naye uzokwethula umbiko wakhe ngokuthi kuhambe kanjani ngemidlalo yokuhlungela i-Afcon. Lizobe selisitshela ngokufanele kwenziwe,” kusho uMumble.Uthe nosomaqhinga weSafa, uNeil Tovey, kuwumsebenzi wakhe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinsiza ziyatholakala kuzona zonke izifunda zeSafa.“Kufanele kuthuthukiswe onompempe nabaqeqeshi, nokho okuyinto engeke yenzeke ngeminyaka emibili nje kuphela. Kuhle ukubona abadlali abafana noKeagan Dolly abebedlala emaqenjini amancane sebeseqenjini elikhulu.” kusho uMumble.UDolly ushaye amagoli amabili ngesikhathi iBafana iguqisa iGambia ngo 4-0 ngempelasonto kowokuhlungela i-Afcon.Ngokubona kukaMumble izinto kuBafana zibhimbe emidlalweni emibili yokuqala yokuhlunga. Elakuleli lavula ngo 0-0 libambana neGambia ekhaya kwathi ekuhambeni lathelwa phansi yiMauri-tania ngo 3-1.“Ngingathi izinto kazihamba kahle emidlalweni yethu emibili yokuqala. Bathi ihhotela ababehleli kulona belilihle kodwa abadlali babengeneme ngalo. Uzosichazela ukuthi kwenzekani ngoba i-Afcon neNdebe yoMhlaba kubaluleke kukhulu yize i-Afcon ilandela ngemuva. Nokho uma wenza kahle kokunye, maningi amathuba okwenza kahle nakokunye. Manje sesizobheka iNdebe yoMhlaba eRussia (ngo-2018),” kusho uMumble.Uzichithile izindaba zokuthi bazingela uGavin Hunt ukuvala ngaye isikhala sikaMashaba.“Akekho owethu oke wakhuluma ngoHunt. Lo muntu unenkontileka neqembu lakhe (iBidvest Wits),” kusho uMumble.
title: Isazodingidwa ekaShakes Mashaba

text:
KUKHONJWA abasakazi ababili abanesibongo esifanayo nesikhulu esithize soKhozi FM ngokwesula emsebenzini kukaNonhlanhla ‘Mdonso’ Ngcobo ngoLwesithathu ekuseni.Ngokusho komthombo ongaphakathi kulo msakazo, abasakazi nalesi sikhulu (esiwagodlile amagama abo ebebefaka ingcindezi yokuthi uMdonso athathe isinqumo sokuhosha imfe kulesi siteshi esihamba phambili eNingizimu Afrika nase-Afrika jikelele.UMdonso, obesakaza noZimiphi ‘Zimdollar’ Biyela uSigiya Ngengoma futhi bezibiza ngeZimdonso, uthe ushiye oKhozini ngenxa yengcindezi nokusatshiswa obese kuqhubeke isikhathi eside selokhu aqashwa kulo msakazo.Uqhuba umthombo uthe abasakazi basekhempini eyodwa nalesi sikhulu futhi bebesabisa uMdonso ukuze kubuyele omunye wabo kuSigiyaNgengoma.“Akungasolwa nje abalandeli nabaculi bakamaskandi, yilaba basakazi ebebengamfuni uMdonso ngoba befuna kuqashwe bona ohlelweni. Le nto ayiqali manje, baningi abasakazi asebeke bahlangabezana nenkinga yokusatshiswa kodwa bona babekezela. Indaba isuka emakhempini angaphakathi emsakazweni. Nawe njengoba wazi ukuthi uma kulwa izindlovu, wutshani obuqothukayo. Ngakho noMdonso uphenduke utshani.”FUNDA: 
Ukhale ngokusatshiswa osule oKhoziniEbuzwa uMdonso ngala mahlebezi, ucele ukungabe esaphawula lutho. Nomunye umthombo ongaphakathi uthe uMdonso ubeyisisulu sokungazwani kwabaphathi besiteshi.“Uzokhumbula ukuthi kunesikhulu esathatha isinqumo sokuthi kuyosakazwa umcimbi kaMroza Fakude kwaHlabisa kodwa kwanesinye esishaya phansi ngonyawo ekubeni kwase kumenyezelwe emsakazweni ukuthi uKhozi luzobe lusakaza bukhoma.”Omunye umthombo uthe yize kunabasakazi abaxoshisa abanye kodwa kunezikhulu zomsakazo ezishaya phansi ngonyawo.“Zithi ngeke labo basakazi abasolwayo baze babuyele kuSigiya Ngengoma, kunalokho kungasakaza uZimdollar yedwa. Abavele bakhohlwe ngoba izikhulu lezo azihambisani nokubuyiswa kwabo. Umthombo uphinde wadalulalu ukuthi kungase kube nezingxoxo phakathi kwabaphathi noMdonso njengoba kunabanye abacabanga noma abakholwa wukuthi lo msakazi uthathe ngamawala, mhlawumbe yisimo esingalungiseka lesi,” kuphetha umthombo wesithathu.Imizamo yokuthola umphathisiteshi uSbongi Ngcobo ukuba aphawule ayiphumelelanga ngenxa yokuthi ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe futhi akawuphendulanga umyalezo athunyelelwe wona nge-SMS.Okhulumela iSABC uNksz Neo Momudu wenqabile ukuphawula ngoba ethi usalinde incwadi ezikhulwini zoKhozi FM.
title: Kusolwa abasakazi nesikhulu ngolukaMdonso

text: Ukufika kwe-internet kule minyaka kuyishintshe kakhulu impilo. Kwafika neselula okwenza kwaba lula ukuxhumana. Yize ukufika kweselula kwathuthukisa indlela yokuphila, ushintsho lwangempela lubonakale lapho kufika lawa abizwa ngama-smart phone okwasho ukuthi amaselula asene-internet.Lokhu kwasho ukuthi sesikwazi ukuthola nokuthumela imiqulu (documents), imali, izithombe, umculo nokunye okuningi. Ngisho abantu abangenawo ama-akhawunti asebhange namhlanje bayakwazi ukuthola imali besebenzisa wona belu amaselula ane-internet.Kuningi okushintshile nasezimbonini ngenxa yobuchwepheshe be-internet namakhompyutha. Eqinisweni luningi ushintsho oluzayo njengoba kudlondlobala i-artificial intelligence efundisa amarobhothi ubuhlakani obusezingeni labantu nagaphezulu.Kasisho amarobhothi asemgaqweni lapha, kepha sisho la marobhothi asebenza ezimbonini enza imisebenzi efana nokupenda izimoto, ukuthutha izimpahla nokunye. Okujabhisayo wukuthi lobu buchwepheshe buzonciphisa imisebenzi. Yingakho kufanele sicabange ngamathuba amabhizinisi eza nabo. Kuyimanje baningi abantu abacabanga ukwakha amabhulokisi okwakha ngesikhathi sekwenzeka ukuthi wakhe udonga lwendlu ngosuku olulodwa usebenzisa i-3D printer. Kuningi-ke okwenziwa yila ma-3D printer, ayakwazi ukwenza amathuluzi, izimpahla, amathambo ngisho namalungu omzimba.Lobu buchwepheshe sebuyasebenza kwamanye amazwe nakwezinye izimboni lapha eNingizimu Afrika. Okufanele sikwenze wukuthi sizijube sifune lolu lwazi ngoba umnotho wakusasa uzodinga bona ubuchwepheshe lobu.Maduze nje i-virtual tourism izoba undabuzekwayo lapho abantu bezovakashela amanye amazwe ngaphandle kokushiya amakhaya abo. Lokhu sekuyenzeka ngenxa ye-virtual reality (VR) ekuthatha ikubeke ezindaweni ezikude yize ungakaze usuke ekhaya. Eminyakeni ezayo izimoto zizobe zizishayela zona, zisebenzisa ugesi, okuyosho ukuphela kwamagaraji kaphethroli. Obunye ubuchwepheshe obunzulu butholakala kwezolimo. Ukudla esikuthenga ezitolo kukhiqizwa ngobuchwepheshe obuqinisekisa ukuthi kwanele futhi kuphephile. Ukunisela izitshalo emasimini kuncike ekutheni angakanani amanzi adingekayo ngokutshelwa ngubuxhakaxhaka bemishiin efakwe emhlabathini. Ama-drones, okungamabhanoyi amancanyana azindizelayo, asetshenziswa ukwelusa imfuyo nokuchelela izitshalo ngemithi. Bonke lobu buchwepheshe buzoba yisisekelo somnotho wakusasa kanti ithuba lokuhlomula yilo leli iningi lisalibele.Amanye amazwe ahamba phambili ngobuchwepheshe kanti la ezweni ezinye izinhlanga zingaphambili kwethu ndlu emnyama. Cabanga nje kuthiwa sinikwa ithuba lokumba igolide noma insimbi ezimayini ezabelwe thina. Singakwazi nje ukusuka ekuqaleni kungekho lutho sakhe imayini eqhudelana nezinye emhlabeni? Sinalo ulwazi oluphelele lobuchwepheshe obudingekayo?Wonke umnotho uphethwe noma uzophathwa yilobu buchwepheshe. Nakho ukutshalwa kwemali akusele ngaphandle kulolu shintsho oluza nobuchwepheshe. Kunenqwaba yama-Apps umhlaba wonke okuhweba amasheya nokukhetha izinkampani ongatshala kuzona imali. Ngaphandle kobuhlakani be-internet namakhompyutha bekungaba nzima ukukhetha amasheya azodla umhlanganiso. Ngisho yona imali ye-internet efana ne-bitcoin isebenza ngabo ubuchwepheshe. Kusobala-ke ukuthi ukuze ube namathuba okwenza kahle ekutshaleni imali, kufanele wazi ngalobu bucwepheshe.Kungenjalo siyogcina ngokuthola imvuthu ngoba singenazo izikhali zokulwa lempi yomnotho.Yize obunye balobu buchwepheshe sebukhona empilweni yethu, ushintsho oluningi lulindeleke kule minayaka engu-20 kuya kwengu-30 ezayo. Akulula ukubona kude kangaka kodwa iyona indlela yokusungula amabhizinisi ayizikhondlakhondla. Uma kungenzeki kithina kufanele kwenzeke ebantwaneni bethu.Ngeke kusisize ngalutho ukubeka izaba, izingane zethu kufanele ziqhubeke nalokho esesikuqaleli. Cishe iningi lethu angeke lisakwazi ukufunda umongo walobu buchwepheshe kodwa singafunda ngemisebenzi yakho ukuze sizibeke emathubeni okuhlomula ngokomnotho.Ngaleso sikhathi singakhuthaza izingane zethu ukuthi zifunde kabanzi ngobuchwepheshe ukuze zincintisane nezinye izinhlanga emhlabeni jikelele.Uma siqhubeka singazihluphi ngolwazi lobuchwepheshe siyosala sinkemile ziqhubeke ezinye izinhlanga zigibele emakhanda ethu.Sishayele ku-031 829 5820. Sithinte kule email address [email protected]Thumela uWhatsApp ku-083 354 8794 ujoyine UbuntuWealth group. Hheshe!
title: Ubuchwepheshe namathuba okwakha umnotho

text: IPHINI likaMengameli waseNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa lithembise ukuthi lizoletha abatshalizimali kuleli njengoba lizobacela ukuthi beze kuleli uma seluya emhlanganweni weWorld Economic Forum (WEF), eDavos, eSwitzerland ngesonto elizayo.URamaphosa uzohamba nongqongqoshe ababhekele ezomnotho nosomabhizinisi ngoJanuwari 23 kuya kuJanuwari 26 uma eseyohlangana nabaholi bomhlaba engqungqutheleni yeWEF.“Ngizozikhulumela mathupha nabatshalizimali ngisizwa wosomabhizinisi bakuleli. Angingabazi ukuthi ngizobuya nabantu abazofaka imali emnothweni wethu, badale amathuba omsebezi, kuthuthuke umnotho.Sizolaya labo abazitshela ukuthi izwe lethu ngeke liphumelele, ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi sakha isithombe esihle kubatshalizimali,” kusho uRamaphosa.Amazwi akhe enanelwe nguMnuz Bonang Mohale oyisikhulu esiphezulu kwaShell SA obuye abe yisikhulu seBusiness Leadership South Africa (BLSA) othe bazosebenzisana nohulumeni ukunxenxa abatshalizimali.“Besiphatheke kabi ngoba ukwehliswa kwezwe lethu kwezomnotho kwakhe isithombe esibi kubatshalizimali kodwa sizimisele ukusebenzisana nohulumeni uma eshaya imithetho noma enza izinguquko, ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi umnotho uyakhula,” kusho uMohale.Uthe umhlangano weWEF uyithuba lokuthi bahlangane nabanye abaholi bamabhizinisi babaqinisekise ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ilindele abatshalizimali futhi umnotho wayo uzokhula.“Abatshalizimali sizobakhombisa ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika yizwe elilwa nenkohlakalo, elinezinkantolo ezizimele kanjalo namabhange azimele. Wumyalezo esiyowusabalalisa loyo,” kusho uMohale.
title: URamaphosa nethemba ngabatshalizimali

text: ISITESHI sakwaBET Africa (DStv channel 129) sithi sikujabulele ukwethulela abantu umdlalo wokuqala wamahlaya ovutshelwe kuleli.Kusukela ngoJanuwari 21, kulesi siteshi kuzokhonjiswa umdlalo iBlack Tax, okuzobe kulingisa kuyo intokazi esinegama kulo mkhakha uJo-Anne Reyneke. Kulo mdlalo uzobe elingisa indawo kaThuli Dlamini.Lo mdlalo ngeke nje ugcine ngokukhonjiswa kulesi siteshi kodwa nakwiShowmax uzokhonjiswa njalo ngoLwesibili uma usuqalile. Ekhuluma ngokuba yingxenye yalo mdlalo uJo-Anne, uthe uyakuthokozela ukuphinde abe yingxenye yomndeni wakwaBET Africa.“Bengisanda kwethula uhlelo oluthi Single Parent Looking for Love, kusona lesi siteshi, ngijabule ngokuphinde ngibe yingxenye yaso. Lesi siteshi singezinye esilokhu siqhubekile nokubeka abantu abamnyama kukhona konke esikwenzayo njengoba siqhubeka nokukhiqiza izinhlelo nemidlalo evutshelwe kuleli. Umdlalo uzogxila ekutheni kukhona konke okwenzayo empilweni beka umndeni wakho phambili futhi ubabonge kukhona konke abakwenzela khona futhi ubeke ngisho impilo yakho engcupheni ukuze ubavikele.”Uthe bemtshela ngalo mdlalo wajabula kakhulu ukuba yingxenye yawo njengoba uphinde ukhulume ngomndeni wabantu abasebancane abamnyama.“Umndeni ozogqama uzama ukulungisa impilo yawo emuva kokuthi ugogo nomkhulu wakhona izinto zingabahambelanga kahle empilweni. Isifundo nje esizofundwa abazowubuka ukuthi zonke izinto zizolunga futhi abantu kumele bakubonge konke abanakho.”UMonde Twala, wakwaBET, uthe kube yintokozo kubona ukukhiqiza lo mdlalo wokuqala wamahlaya kuleli ngaphansi kwabeBET.“Zingu-13 iziqephu ezizobonakala zalo mdlalo. Isigaba sokuqala sika-2020 sizoba ngesikhulu kakhulu esiteshini sakwaBET Africa njengoba sizobe siqale neminye esisayipheka okwamanje,” kusho uMonde.Abanye abalingisi abazobonakala kulo mdlalo uClementine Mosimane, Mandla Jwara, Jason Goliath, Sne Dladla, Daniel Janks nabanye.
title: I-BET Africa izohlekisa ababukeli ngeBlack Tax

text: UMASIPALA waseThekwini ukhungathekile ukuthi uzozithola kanjani izigidi zamaRandi ozikweletwa yinkampani yamabhasi iTansnat.Lesi kweletu seminyaka sesikhule saze safika kuR598 million.Lezi nhlangothi zombili zibambene ngezihluthu ezinkantolo, okwenza kube nzima ukuthola isisombululo kule mpicabadala.Izolo lo masipala uveze ukuthi usunongabazane ukuthi lesi kweletu siyoke sikhokheke, waphakamisa ukuthi umhlangano womkhandlu ubhunge ukuthi lolu daba lungasonjululwa kanjani.ITansnat ilawula amabhasi akwamasipala kanti isikweletu sayo kuthiwa sisuka ekuhlulekeni kwayo ukukhokhela ukusebenzisa izinsiza zikamasipala.Le nkampani iyona ekweleta imali eningi kunazo zonke izinkampani ezikweleta lo masipala.Isikhulu sezimali kumasipala, uMnuz Krish Kumar, utshele umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu izolo ukuthi umkhandlu kuzofanele uthathe isinqumo ukuthi kwenziwa njani ngalesi sikweletu.“Kunongabazane ngalesi kweletu njengoba impi yezomthetho phakathi kukamasipala nenkampani yamabhasi isithathe isikhathi eside. Umhlangano womkhandlu kuzofanele uthathe isinqumo ukuthi kwenziwanjani ngalesi kweletu?” Ohola inguyazana ye-DA kulo mkhandlu, uNksz Nicole Graham, uthe angeke bevume ukuthi lesi kweletu sisulwe.“Angeke sivume ukuthi kube nesixazululo sezepolitiki. Akulungile ukuthi amanye amabhizinisi nezakhamizi babhekana nolaka lukamasipala uma bekweleta kepha uTansnat wona uzoyekwa.”Umbiko othulwe uKumar kulo mhlangano, uveze ukukhula kwemali ekweletwa lo masipala.Kuvele ukuthi lo masipala ukweletwa imali enguR14.7 billion, okukhombisa ukukhula ngoR1.9 billion uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esifanayo ngonyaka owedlule.UKumar uthe lokhu kwenziwe umthelela ongemuhle wokubhebhetheka kobhubhane iCorona okuphazamise ukusebenza kwamanye amabhizinisi kwaphinde kwaholela nasekulahlekeni kwemisebenzi.Lo mbiko uphinde waveza ukuthi umasipala ulahlekelwa ingxenye eningi yamanzi owathengayo ngenxa yamapayipi avuzayo nokuntshontshwa kwamanzi.Kuvela ukuthi ulahlekelwa u-51% wamanzi owathengayo, nagcina ngokugobhoza phansi ngenxa yamapayipi avuzayo kanye nezakhamizi ezizitapelayo emanzini kamasipala.UKumar uveze ukuthi lesi sibalo sokulahleka kwamanzi siphezulu kakhulu kunaleso esijwayelekile.“Ngokujwayelekile isibalo siyaye sibe phakathi kuka-15% no-30% kepha umasipala ukhombisa ukuthi ulahlekelwa u-51%, okungaphezulu kwalokho okujwayelekile.”Lo mbiko uveze ukuthi lo masipala ulahlekelwa u-11.8% kagesi ngenxa yokuntshontshwa kwawo.Ngokujwayelekile omasipala balahlekelwa phakathi kuka-7% no-10% kugesi. I-DA ithe kuyakhathaza ukuthi umasipala ulahlekelwa inqwaba engaka yamanzi.“Ukulahlekelwa ngamanzi amangaka kusho ukuthi silahlekelwa izigidi zamaRandi ngoba la manzi siwathenga ngemali eshisiwe,” kusho uNksz Graham.
title: ITheku lixakwe isikweletu seTansnat

text: USALE udidekile umndeni wesalukazi esineminyaka engu-81 esitholwe sizilengisile ethoyilethi emzini waso eMondlo.UNkk Philile Mdletshe utholwe umakoti wakwakhe ezilengise ngentambo yokutheza ethoyilethi ngeSonto emini kodwa okuxaka umndeni wukuthi akabikanga lutho obelumphethe kabi.Kuthiwa waphuma sengathi uya endlini encane wangabe esabuya.Umakoti kuthiwa uthuke ezithela phezu kukanina eselenga endlini encane kungekho nencwadi ayibhalile ngokuthi kungani ezilengisile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, uthe kuvulwe idokodo ngokushona komuntu.“Amaphoyisa aseMondlo avule icala kulandela ukuzilengisa kowesifazane osemdala ethoyilethi lakwakhe. Imbangela yalokhu ayaziwa,” kusho uZwane.Amadodana kamufi, oMnuz Siphesakhe noSandile Mdletshe bathe bashaqekile ngokwenzekile.“Sididekile ngempela ngokuthi kwenzekeni njengoba umama ekhethe ukuba azilengise. Bengingekho ekhaya, ngithole ucingo nje selungazisa ngokwenzekile. Umama ubesemdala, bengingalindele ukuthi kungenzeka lokhu. Ubehlala ngokugula lokhu kwabantu abadala, ephathwa amadolo nokunye nje kodwa akukho obekungenza sisole ukuthi angazibulala,” kusho uSandile.Lo mndeni uthe ngelanga lesigameko umufi wavuka ngo-10 ekuseni, wadla. Kukhona umakhelwane ayehlezi naye endlini bezixoxela. Uthe esehamba, umufi waphuma engumuntu oya endlini encane.Ngokusho komndeni izintambo zakhe zokutheza bezihlala endlini yakhe. Kusolwa ukuthi intambo ayisebenzisile ngenye yezintambo atheza ngazo.Umufi kuthiwa akayena umuntu obejwayele ukukhononda kodwa ubevame ukugula adlikize abuye asinde.Umndeni uphinde waveza nokuthi umufi ubevame ukuthi uzozibulala kodwa angabiki isizathu. Bathe lokho bebengakunaki ngoba bebethi ukhulunyiswa wukuguga.
title: Indida ngesalukazi esizilengisile

text: Ngesikhathi umdlalo uqala, uqhamuke nenqwaba yabantu abebebasha endimeni okuhambe isikhathi bakhombisa ukukhula.Ngalokho Uzalo kumele lunconywe.Kuleli sonto ngike ngacabanga ukuthi empeleni kukhona owesifazane oqale indawo yakhe incane kuZalo kodwa sekuhambe isikhathi waduma.Bengicabanga uNtombifuthi Dlamini, odume ngelikaMadlala kulo mdlalo.Uqale eyilungu lesonto ebelibonakala ngaleso sikhathi kodwa manje lo mdlalo awupheli engavelanga.Indawo ayilingisayo ike yaba ngundaba mlonyeni ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi eshonelwa ngumyeni wakhe. Waphunyelwa yizizumbulu, ezagcina eziqolwe yisoka ebelithi liyamthanda uSbusiso (Simphiwe Majozi).Njengoba kusanda kuqala isizini yesihlanu nje yalo mdlalo, indawo yakhe kubukeka ikhula futhi kucacela noma ubani ukuthi usahleli kulo mdlalo.Ngibone kungcono kuleli sonto ngikhulume naye ukuze abalandeli bakhe bezomazi kangcono.Ngibe senginxusa inkampani ekhuluma nabezindaba eyingxenye yalo mdlalo ukuthi ingixhumanise naye.Akuphelanga zinsuku zingaki bangixhumanisa naye. Ungowesifazane onomoya ophansi futhi othanda ukuzihlekela.Ungitshele ukuthi uzalelwe wakhulela Kwa-E KwaMashu.Uthi ukhulele koninalume.Ngiyazi le engizoyiveza manje ukuthi izomangaza abaningi.Uyise kaNtombifuthi yingqalabutho eyazakhela igama emsakazweni wesiZulu uKhozi FM, uBongani “Kansas City” Mchunu.“Ubaba nomama abashadanga, lokhu kwenza ukuthi mina nezingane zasekhaya singasishintshi isibongo kodwa ngizalwa uyena uKansas,” kusho uNtombifuthi ngamafuphi.Le ntokazi ithi ukulingisa kuqhamuke isebenza emtholampilo.“Imfundo yami ngiyiphothule Esibonelo High khona, KwaMashu. Ngiqede esikoleni ngathola lo msebenzi emtholampilo kwaze kwaba * -2014 kuqala Uzalo. Sasizihlalele nje nozakwethu ngesikhathi kuqhamuka umfana ethi bafuna abantu abazoba yingxenye yalo mdlalo abazohlala nje esontweni uma kuqoshwa. Safika kukhona abantu abangaphezu kuka-300 ababezozama inhlanhla mina ngakhethwa kubona okuyinto eyangijabulisa kakhulu. Indawo yami beyikhula usuku nosuku. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwathiwa angibhalelwe engizokusho njengomama wasenkonzweni, kwathiwa ngizoba uMama uMadlala.”Uthe ukungena kwakhe kulo mdlalo kumtakule osizini oluningi nomndeni wakhe. Uthe ubebhekene nezinkinga ngemuva kokushona kodadewabo nonina wasala ekhulisa izingane zabo.“Kuyangijabulisa kakhulu ukuba yingxenye yalo mdlalo, kungifundise okukhulu ngokulingisa okuyinto engingasafuni ukuyiyeka. Njengoba sengikwazi nje ukulingisa sengilangazelele ukuthola ukuthola elinye ithuba kweminye imidlalo ukuze ngizokhula. Nabanye ozakwethu abakuwona lo mdlalo bangisize kakhulu bangicathulisa ngaze ngakwazi ukuzilungisa lapha nalapha uma sisebenza njengoba ngingakufundelanga ukuba umlingisi,” kuchaza yena.Ngodaba lwendawo ayilingisayo emenze waduma ngokuqolwa imali abesilisa uthe iyisifundo kubo bonke abesifazane sokuthi kumele bababheke abantu besilisa ababasondeza eduze kwabo.UNtombifuthi uthe naye wayenalo iphupho lokungena emsakazweni ngenxa yokuthi ukuzwa uyise esakaza kwakuhlwanyele okuthile ngaphathi kuyena.Uthe ungumuntu onamahloni kodwa kwithelevishini uyakwazi ukuwafihla angacaci kubantu.Uthe Uzalo wumdlalo omkhulu ake aba kuwona kodwa uke wathi xinti efilimini ethi Matolwane.Kubalingisi athe ubukela kubona yize bebaningi kodwa uthi uLeleti Khumalo udlala indima enkulu kuye.Uma esekhaya uthe uthanda ukuphekela umndeni wakhe ahlanze nomuzi.Uthi akashadile kodwa unazo izingane ezimbili.Uthe uyazifela ngeKaizer Chiefs nomculo ohlukene wakuleli.
title: Ubonga Uzalo ngokumnyula osizini

text: IMEYA yaseGoli futhi ezimisele ngokuqhubeka nalesi sikhundla ngemuva kokhetho lwanamuhla, uMnuz Parks Tau, ithe ukuvakashela kwayo lowo owayenguMengameli wezwe uMnuz Thabo Mbeki, akuhlangene nakancane ne-EFF nayo ebeyimhabele ngoMsombuluko.UTau uthe bekungekona okokuqala evakashela uMbeki kodwa emasontweni amabili edlule ubenaye uMbeki. “Bengikhona emasontweni amabili nohhafu edlule ngizomtshela ngomkhankaso we-ANC ukuthi uhamba kanjani. Into esasiyihlelile ngesikhathi sihlangana ukuthi ngizobuya ngizomethulela labo abangenele ukhetho.”Emhlanganweni wayizolo emzini kaMbeki eRiviera, uTau uthe bathole ithuba lokukhuluma ngokhetho nokuzilungiselela kwe-ANC.Ngohleko olukhulu uMbeki, uphinde amazwi akhe okuthi ngeke asho ukuthi uzovotela liphi iqembu namhlanje.“Ivoti lami liyimfihlo,” kusho uMbeki ekhuluma nezintatheli. Ebuzwa ngomhlangano nobudlelwano anabo ne-EFF, uMbeki uthe uzohlangana nanoma ngubani ocela ukubonana naye.“Iqembu le-EFF licele ukubonana nami. UMmusi Maimane we-DA uke weza wazongibona ekuqaleni konyaka, ngavuma.“IMeya uTau yacela ukuzongibona ngathi ayikho inkinga, angikwazi ukuthi ngixoshe abantu abafuna ukungibona,” kusho uMbeki.Uphinde wacacisa ngokungabonakali kwakhe emikhankasweni ye-ANC wathi yingoba ubengekho kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika ngesikhathi sokukhankasa kodwa ubegxile ezindabeni zase-Afrika.“Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi i-ANC isezandleni zabaholi abakahle futhi abawaziyo umsebenzi.”UMbeki ucele abantu bakuleli ukuthi baphume ngobuningi baye kovota namhlanje. “Kubalulekile ukuba nezwi ekulawulweni komasipala nokuthi balawulwe kanjani.”UNkk Thoko Didiza ongenele isikhundla sobuMeya eTshwane noMnuz Mzwandile Masina ongenele esobuMeya e-Ekurhuleni abakwazanga ukuvakashela uMbeki.ngenxa yeminye imisebenzi.
title: IMeya ehambele uMbeki ithi akuhlangene nokwe-EFF

text: KUDUMA ikhanda kowesifazane waseLovu ophaphame indlu yakhe yomxhaso isihaqwe ngamalangabi.UNksz Sindi Chamane (35) wasePhase1 eLovu, obelele nengane enonyaka endlini eshe ngoLwesihlanu, ebusuku usale nezingubo abezigqokile kuphela.UNksz Chamane uthe uphaphanyiswe wukushisa abekuzwa ezinyaweni. Uthe uma evuka ebheka ukuthi yini eshisayo wabona umlilo obuqhamuka ngasegumbini lokugezela sewokhele umbhede abebelele kuwo nengane yakhe.“Ngidonse ingubo ebesiyembethe , ngagoqa ingane ngavula ama-buglar gaurds ngaphuma nengane, angibange ngisakwazi ukubuyela ngaphakathi ngoba indlu yonke bese isha. Siphume nezinto ebesizigqokile kuphela, imifaniswano yesikole yezingane zami ezintathu ebingaphakathi, izitifiketi nokunye kushile,” kusho yena.UNksz Chamane uthe ngokubona kwakhe akuzona izintambo zikagesi ezishise umuzi wakhe ngoba beyingekho intambo kagesi egumbini lokugezela, isigubhu sikagesi uthe besiqondene nekhanda lombhede.“Kubukeka sengathi umlilo wokhelwe umuntu obengaphandle ngasegumbini lokugezela. Egumbini okuqale kulo umlilo izintambo zikagesi azifakiwe, manje ngeke ngisole zona. Angazi ukuthi ngingathi ubani owokhele umuzi wami ngoba anginasitha ebesingafisa ukungenzakalisa, ngesikhathi sokujabula. Angazi ukuthi bengimone ngani, angishise nengane encane pho?”Uthe akazi ukuthi uzoyithathaphi imali yokuthenga imifaniswano abeseyithengile kanye nokudla kwezingane zakhe.UMnuz Mxoli Mkhize wekomiti lezokuphepha endaweni uthe babikelwe ngalolu daba base beludlulisela ophikweni lukamasipala olubhekelele izihlekelele.“Sisalinde ukuthi lolu phiko lusazise ukuthi yini olungamsiza ngayo uNksz Chamane, okwamanje usaqube kumngani wakhe naye onendlu yomxhaso eyigumbi elilodwa, ngeke bakwazi ukuhlala kanje isikhathi eside, siyethemba uzosheshe aluthole usizo,” kusho uMkhize.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe uLt Col Thulani Zwane uthe kuvulwe icala lokucekela phansi impahla eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa aseManzimtoti.
title: Uphume nabekugqokile kusha indlu

text: KUBOSHWE intombazane eneminyaka engu-13 ngokubulawa kwesalukazi esitholwe sigqenywe ngesando ekhanda emzini waso osoThongathi.UNkk Idah Ngcobo (63) utholwe edindilize edamini legazi eFairbreeze ngoMsombuluko ekuseni ngemuva kokuthi omakhekwane bephuthume kwakhe ngoba bezwa kukhona okhalayo omemezayo.Umyeni kaNkk Ngcobo ubesaye esitolo emshiye nabazukulu bakhe ababili, oneminyaka emibili noneminyaka engu-13 ngesikhathi umufi ehlaselwa. Umsolwa uboshwe ngamaphoyisa ngoLwesibili wagqunywa esitokisini. Okhulumela amaphoyisa uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe: "Singaqinisekisa ukuthi umsolwa oneminyaka engu-13 uboshwe izolo ngokubulala. Kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam kusasa (ngoLwesine)."Umsolwa utshele omakhelwane ukuthi ubesemnyango eneka izimpahla ngesikhathi ezwa ugogo wakhe ememeza. Uthe ugijime waya endlini lapho efice khona indoda angayazi igqema ugogo wakhe obezihlalele kusofa egumbini lokuphumula. UNgcobo ushaywe yisifo sohlangothi ngenyanga edlule okuholele ekutheni angakwazi ukuhamba. Ngesikhathi omakhelwane bephuthuma endaweni yesigameko ngemuva kokumemeza kukamsolwa, batshele iphephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, iDaily News ukuthi indawo yesigameko ibinyantisa igazi. Omunye womakhelwane uthe umufi "ubelimele kakhulu".Indodana kamufu uMnuz James Ngcobo ithe bewumndeni basathukile ngalesi sehlo. "Angiqondi ukuthi ngubani ongafuna ukuhlasela umuntu ongakwazi ukuzilwela. Usikhulise kanzima edayisa oswidi nezithelo esikoleni. Besisajabulela ukumtotosa njengoba sonke sesikhulile sesizimele. Ubeyinsika yethu futhi eyikho konke, usikhulisile waphinde wakhulisa nezingane zethu futhi ubengakaze akhononde."“Umama ubengumuntu ozilungele ethanda ukuziyela esontweni. Ngisola ukuthi lesi yisenzo sobugebengu njengoba sakhelene nemijondolo,” kusho uNgcobo.Uthe unina ubehlala endlini ngenxa yesifo sohlangothi esimhlasele ngenyanga edlule. Uveze ukuthi umufi ubesele nabazukulu ababili oneminyaka emibili noneminyaka engu-13.
title: Kuboshwe intombazane (13) ngokugqenywa kwesalukazi (63) ngesando sashona

text: ZENYUKILE izibalo zabashone ezingozini zemigwaqo ngesikhathi samaholidi uma kuqhathaniswa nangesikhathi esedlule.Lokhu kumenyezelwe uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha kuzwelonke, uDipuo Peters esithangamini nabezindaba ebesibanjelwe eProtea Hotel, eGoli, izolo. UNgqongqoshe umemezele ukuthi bangu-1714 abantu abashone emigwaqeni yakuleli ngesikhathi samaholidi, okwenyuke ngamaphesenti amahlanu uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esedlule. U-40% wabashonele emigwaqweni ngabagibeli, u-34% ngabahamba ngezinyawo kwathi u24% kwaba ngabashayeli. Izingane ezineminyaka ephakathi kuka 0 no-4 zingu-6% kwathi abesilisa baba ngu-75%, kanti u23% kwaba ngabesifazane. Isifundazwe saseLimpompo yisona esibe nesibalo esikhulu sokwenyuka kwabashone emgwaqeni  njengoba sinyuke ngamaphesenti angu-31,  salandelwa isifundazwe saKwaZulu Natal ngamaphesenti angu-18, kwathi isifundazwe sase-Free State izibalo zanyuka ngo-17%. UNkk Peters uncome ababhekelele ezokuthutha ezifundazweni ezimbili, okuyi- Eastern Cape ne-North West njengoba izibalo zokushona kwabantu emgwaqeni zehlile kulezi zifundazwe. "Kumele sikuqonde ukuthi imikhankaso yokugqugquzela ukuphepha emgwaqeni akusikhona kuphela eyangesikhathi samaholidi, kodwa lemikhankaso siyiqhuba nsuku zonke ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabasebenzisi bomgwaqo,"kusho uNkk Peters.Uphinde wamemezela ukuthi umnyango wakhe wenze izivimbamgwaqo ezingu-432 ezweni lonke ngezikhathi zamaholidi.  Bangu 453 263 abakhokhiswe izinhlawulo ngamacala ahlukene, kwathi abangu- 28 238  kubona ngabashayeli abebeshayela bengawafakile amabhande, abangu-4 046 bahlawuliselwe ukukhuluma namaselula beshayela.Zingu-6 805 izimoto ezihlonzwe njengezingakulungele ukuba semgwaqeni, kwathi ezingu-2 501 zahudulwa.  UNkk Peters uthe isibalo esikhulu sababoshiwe, ngesababoshelwe ukushayela bephuzile. Ugcizelele umthamo wezimoto ubukhuphuke ngo 2% kulamaholidi uma kuqhathaniswa nadlule nathe kube nokukhula kwesibalo sabashayeli abasanda kuthola amalayisense.  "Izikhathi eziningi, ukushona kwabantu emigwageni kubangelwe ukugingqika kwezimoto abebezigibele nokushayisana kwazo," kuqhuba uNkk Peters.Ube esedlulisa amazwi endunduzo kubona bonke abalahlekelwe izihlobo zabo ezingozini zomgwaqo.
title: Senyukile isibalo sabashone emgwaqeni ngamaholidi

text: USuthu luyibambe emsileni namaphuzu awu-24 ngemuva kwemidlalo ewu-26. Selokhe ibuyile imidlalo AmaZulu asehlulekile ukunqoba emidlalweni emibili. Adlale ngokulingana neBaroka FC emdlalweni owawungenamagoli kanti ashaywe yiBidvest Wits ngo 2-1 komunye umdlalo. Imenenja yeqembu uQedi Dlamini uthe abadlali bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukunqoba imidlalo esele.  “Siyazi kubaluleke kangakanani ukuqoqa amaphuzu kulesi sigaba sesizini. Sinethemba lokuthi sizokwazi ukuthola amaphuzu aphelele uma sesibhekene neBloemfontein Celtic (namhlanje). Abafana bakhombisa ukuzimisela kulandela ukushaywa yiWits,” kusho uDlamini. “Kunzima emsileni. Ngeke wazi ngempela ukuthi kuzokwenzekani. Kusangenzeka noma yini kodwa ngeke sidliwe yizembe. Ngiyazi kunabantu abangaliboni iqembu lisinda kodwa sizobuya. Esidinga ukukwenza ukuvalela amathuba enethini. Kunamaphuzu awu-12 esizowalwela emidlalweni yethu yokugcina,” kuqhuba yena. Ngemuva kokubhekana neCeltic, uSuthu luzodlala neBlack Leopards, Stellenbosch FC neHighlands Park. Kule sizini AmaZulu asashaye amagoli awu-15 kuphela, awu-12 kuwo ashaywe umgadli uBongi Ntuli obalwa nabagadli abaphambili kwiligi. Ukucacisa izinkinga ezibhekene namaZulu phambi kwepali, ngaphambi kwegoli elishaywe uLehlohonolo Majoro ngempelasonto, leli qembu belinamagoli alinganayo nomgadli ozihola phambili ngamagoli kule sizini uGabadinho Mhango (14). “Sikhathazekile ngendawo esikuyo etafuleni kodwa siyethemba ukuthi kuzoshaya impelasonto ezayo singahleli kunombolo 16. AmaZulu anganyukela kunombolo 13 uma engashaya iCeltic namhlanje.
title: 'Sizolivika izembe' - owaMaZulu

text: UKHALA ngonya lomnikazi wesikhungo sekhaya labadala laKwaMashu umndeni wesalukazi esithathwe kulesi sikhungo isidumbu saso sesonakele ngemuva kokuthi benqwahe naso ngoba kuthiwa ukweleta imali yamanabukeni.UNkk Eunice Makhathini (81) waKwaMashu kwa-J, obehlala esikhungweni sekhaya labadala iThembeni Old Age Home khona KwaMashu, kuthiwa umndeni wakhe uthole ucingo ngokushona kwakhe ngoLwesithathu ekuseni luvela kumphathi wesikhungo.UNksz Thandi Ngcobo (56), oyindodakazi kaNkk Makhathini, uthe ngemuva kokuzwa izindaba zokushona kukanina uthumele imoto yamakhaza ukuthi iyolanda isidumbu ngalo uLwesithathu ngoba yena ubesemzini wakhe eMthwalume kodwa umphathi wesikhungo uNkk Thobile Mhlongo washaya phansi ngonyawo wathi isidumbu ngeke sithathwe ngoba umndeni umkweleta imali engu-R6 000 yamanabukeni yezinyanga ezimbili ongazikhokhelanga.UNksz Ngcobo uthe kuphoqeleke ukuthi babuye namaphoyisa ngakusasa beyolanda isidumbu sikanina basifica sesiqala ukonakala.“Sifike isidumbu silaliswe phansi kukhombisa nje ukuthi kade sahlala. Okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi besisendlini eyodwa nalapho kuhlala khona ezinye izalukazi ezigcinwe kulesi sikhungo,” kusho uNksz Ngcobo.Uphinde waveza ukuthi ngaphambi kokuba athole ucingo obelumbikela ngokushona kukanina uqale wafonelwa nguNkk Mhlongo ngesonto eledlule emtshela ukuthi uma kwenzeka unina eshona ngeke umndeni usithole isidumbu njengoba umkweleta imali yamanabukeni yezinyanga ezimbili. “Ngisola ukuthi ngenkathi engifonela okokuqala umama wayesevele eseshonile ngoba akazange angibikele ngokugula kwakhe kanti ubehlale engifonela uma kukhona okudingwa wumama,” kuchaza uNksz Mhlongo.Ngesikhathi ithimba lezintatheli zeSolezwe lifika emagcekeni alesi sikhungo izolo litshelwe ngamadoda athile abesegcekeni ukuthi uNkk Mhlongo usesemhlanganweni ngakho ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma nezintatheli. Zibe seziyalelwa ukuthi zimthinte enombolweni yakhe ngehora lesine. Ethintwa uNkk Mhlongo unqabile ukuphawula wacela ukuthi intatheli ibuye ngakusasa (namuhla) ukuze akhulume nayo umlomo nomlomo. “Ngeke ngikwazi ukukhuluma efonini, ngicela ufike, nami kukhona engifisa ukukukhombisa khona,” kusho uNkk Mhlongo evala ifoni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbhele, uthe lolu daba lubikiwe emaphoyiseni kodwa alikho icala eselivuliwe.Umndeni uthe usazolinda imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu ukuze ubone ukuthi zikhona yini ezinye izinyathelo zomthetho ozozithathela isikhungo.UMnyanggo wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi esifundazweni awutholakalanga ukuthi uphawule ngalolu daba.Okhulumela umnyango uNkk Ncumisa Ndelu ucele ukuthi athunyelelwe umqhafazo kodwa kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela ethi usalinde imininingwane ngalolu daba.
title: Ubolele ekhaya labantu abadala

text: ZILOKHU zenyukile izibalo zabahaqwa yiCovid-19 kuleli nababulawa yileli gciwane.Izibalo zakamuva ezikhishwe wuMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli, zikhomba ukuthi emahoreni angu-24 abahaqwe yileli gciwane bangu-1 129, okuholele ekutheni izibalo zabahaqwe yigciwane zenyukele ku-1 597 724.Izifundazwe ezihamba phambili ngezibalo zabahaqwe yigciwane, yiGauteng enabantu abangu-428 717, Eastern Cape enabangu-196 307,  Western Cape ngabangu-288 299 neKwaZulu-Natal enabantu abangu-337 397.UMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, ekhasini lawo leFacebook uthe emahoreni angu-24 bangu-64 abahaqwe yigciwane. Uthe lesi sifundazwe singesesine kwezihamba phambili ngezibalo eseziqale ukwenyuka zabahaqwe yigciwane, iGauteng ihamba phambili ngezibalo ezenyukayo.Bangu-54 825 ababulelwe yigciwane kuleli. Abashone esikhathi esingamahora angu-24 bangu-60.Ukwenyuka kwezibalo zabahaqwa yigciwane kuholele ekutheni abantu babe nengebhe, bazibuze ukuthi ngabe sesingenile yini isiqubu sesithathu sokuhlasela kwaleli gciwane. Abanye benze isiphakamiso sokuthi kuqiniswe imithetho elawula imingcele namachwepha.INhlangano yezeMpilo eMhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO), yenze isiphakamiso sokuthi kulawulwe ukungena kwezivakashi emazweni ehlukene. Ithe akumele imingcele namachweba kuvalwe ngoba lokho kuzophazamisa ezomnotho. Kodwa amanye amazwe ayazinqabela izivakashi ezivela emazweni akholwa wukuthi anengozi kakhulu.Izivakashi eziphuma kuleli kazivumelekile e-USA.Izivakashi ezisatshwa kakhulu ngeziphuma e-India.UDkt Zweli Mkhize onguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uthe kawekho amabhanoyi asuka e-India eza kuleli, izivakashi eziphuma khona ziyaxhuma. Ngenxa yalokho kubekwe imigomo emisha yokuthi izivakashi kumele zihlolwe. Uma kutholakala ukuthi zineCovid-19 zigonqe.
title: Ziyenyuka izibalo zeCovid-19 ezifundazweni ezine

text:
UKHONJWE indlela unesi wasesibhedlela sasePitoli iMediClini Meulmed Hospital ohlekise ngabesifazane abasola uMfundisi Timothy Omotoso ngokubadlwengula. UNksz Ivy Masuku ubengcofa abesifazane abasola lo mfundisi kuFacebook ngokubambisana nomunye wesifazane uNksz Nompumelelo Sithole. UMfundisi Timothy Omotoso ubhekene noxhaxha lwamacala athinta ukudlwengula nokushushumbisa abesifazane abangaphezulu kuka 30 abanye babo abebehlala emzini wakhe oseMhlanga, eThekwini.IMediClinic ngoLwesithathi ishicilele isitatimende yathi izokwena uphenyo ngalolu daba yaveza nokuthi uNksz Masuku akaseyona ingxenye yalesi sibhedlela ngemuva kokuhlekisa ngabamangalele lo mfundisi okubalwa kubo uNksz Cheryl Zondi ofakazayo. Good morning. Please find an official statement from Mediclinic below. Regards, the MCSA team. 
pic.twitter.com/jOYQlZZT2o— Mediclinic SA (@Mediclinic) 
October 17, 2018Phakathi kwezinto abazibhalile ezithuse abaningi bathe lo mfundisi ubabh%$## kancane.This is Ivy Masuku, a Nurse at MediClinic Meulmed Hospital in Pretoria and Nompumelelo Sithole, taking turns to shame Tim Omotoso's Rape Victims, including Cheryl Zondi.This is why many others die in silence because even hospital staff, shames rape victims.
