Uzidonsele amanzi ngomsele ngemibuzo ummeli ka-Omotoso
title: Kuxoshwe unesi ongcofe 'abadlwengulwa' u-Omotoso

text: UMQEQESHI weBloemfontein Celtic, uSteve “Mphathi” Komphela, uthi azimxaki izinkinga zemali ezikhungethe iqembu njengoba kuke kwateleka nabadlali ngenxa yokungaholi.UKomphela ujoyine iCeltic njengoba kuvalwe isizini ngemuva kokuhlala amasizini amathathu kwiKaizer Chiefs. Ubekhuluma nabezindaba eGreyville eThekwini lapho ebeluleka abadlali abebehlanganyele kwiSAB Under 21 National Championships.“Leyo ndaba yihhovisi elibhekene nayo. Kunezinto ongeke ukwazi ukwenza lutho ngazo njengomqeqeshi. Okwami ukuqeqesha bese bona bebhekana nakho lokhu okunye,” kusho uKomphela.Mayelana nokuza eqenjini elinezinkinga, uthe: “Ngihlezi ngisho ukuthi ngeke ufune umuntu ozoqhamuka nesisombululo uma ingekho inkinga. Uma kukhona umqeqeshi ohambayo kumele kube khona ofikayo. Bayadingeka abaqeqeshi.”Inhloso yakhe enkulu kwiCeltic wukuthi akhe uzinzo kodwa futhi uyakuqonda nokubaluleka kwemiphumela.Uthe umatasa namalungiselelo okuqala kwesizini lapho ezobhekana khona neChippa United emdlalweni wokuvula. NgokwePremier Soccer League (PSL) kulindeleke ukuthi isizini ka-2018/2019 iqale ngo-Agasti 4.Nokho kusasa i-Ajax Cape Town izonikela eNkantolo eNkulu yaseGauteng iyofaka amaphepha okumisa ukuqala kweligi.Udaba lumayelana noTendai Ndoro eyamdlalisa yize ayesegijime kwamanye amaqembu amabili ngesizini edlule.I-Ajax yalahlwa ngecala umehluleli weSafa, uWilliam Mokhari, kodwa yaluyisa enkantolo udaba yafike yayivuna ngokuthi kumele ibuyiselwe endaweni ka-15. Kodwa iPSL ikushaye indiva lokho imemezela ukuqala kweligi ngenyanga ezayo.Ebuzwa ngalo mdonsiwano uKomphela uthe: “Angiyazi kahle ingqikithi yawo kodwa ngiyakholwa wukuthi sineziphathimandla ezifanele zizokwazi ukubhekana nayo. Iligi izoqala maduze ngoba okwamanje akukho okubheke eceleni esisakuzwile ngakho siyaqhubeka namalungiselelo njengokujwayelekile.”
title: 'Kunezinto ongeke ukwazi ukwenza lutho ngazo' - Komphela

text: ZIQHUBEKILE nokugqama izinkinga zeKaizer Chiefs idlala ngokulingana nomakoti iTS Galaxy emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obuseFNB Stadium izolo ebusuku. Udonga lwasemuva oluvuzayo, ubuthuntu babagadli nokungazethembi kuholele ekutheni Amakhosi alotsholwe ngo 3-0 izimbangi zawo ezinkulu iMamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates emidlalweni edlule.Okungajatshulelwa umqeqeshi weChiefs, uGavin Hunt, ngomdlalo wayizolo ukuthi ezakhe azizange zingenelwe yigoli kulo mdlalo, kwazise ziyinhlekisa emuva selokhu kuqale isizini. Ngeke kodwa uHunt ajabule ngokuthi ezakhe azikazishayeli igoli kwiDStv Premiership selokhu kuqale isizini kwazise negoli ezanqoba ngalo zishaya iChippa United ngo 1-0, umkhonto wagwaza ekhaya kuGregory Damons.Isigwebo seFIFA sokungasayini badlali amawindi amabili, silokhu simile.Kube yinhlanhla ukuthi ezikaGavin Hunt ziye ekhefini zisabambene ngo 0-0 neGalaxy kulandela ukuthola iphenathi kwezivakashi ngomzuzu ka-26. ULindokuhle Mbatha obewuhlupho ophikweni lwesokudla, ubukise ngo-Erick Mathoho noKgotso Moleko, abamshaye phansi ebhokisini, unompempe walibeka emlotheni. Nokho umgadli wezivakashi uWayde Lekay uhlulekile ukubeka phambili ezakhe, ibhola lakhe lashaya ipali labuyela enkundleni.IGalaxy ibisebenzisa kakhulu izinhlangothi ukuzama ukulimaza iChiefs, nokuyinto ebinika inkinga uPhilani Zulu kwesokunxele noMoleko kwesokudla. Lokhu bekwenza uDaniel Cardoso noMathoho badonseke besuke ezindaweni zabo. UTshegofatso Nyama noKarabo Tsepe ngabanye babadlali beGalaxy abathole ithuba lokukhahlelela unozinti weChiefs uDaniel Akpeyi kodwa wabageza.Isiwombe sesibili siqale ngendlela ecishe ifane nesokuqala. Ubungafunga ukuthi abadlali beChiefs kabazani sanhlobo, indlela abebedlala ngayo. Isitayela sebhola somqeqeshi weGalaxy uDaniel Malesela sokugcina ibhola besimsebenzela, kwazise Amakhosi abengaliboni, engawakhi namathuba yize enabadlali abangcono kunalabo beGalaxy.Alikho ibhola elibabazisayo elivinjwe unozinti wezivakashi uWensten van Der Linde umdlalo wonke, phezu kokuthi iChiefs ithole inqwaba yamakhona kodwa yahlukeka wukuwasebenzisa. Izokujabulela ukuthola iphuzu iGalaxy kulo mdlalo kwazise iqhubekile nomgqigqo wayo omuhle njengoba ingakadliwa selokhu kuqale isizini. Lo mphumela usho ukuthi iChiefs ihlulekile ukubuyisa izinduku kwazise yehlulwa yileli qembu ngo 1-0 kowamanqamu kwiNedbank Cup kumasizini amabili edlule eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.Imiphumela yayizolo yeDStv PremiershipAmaZulu FC 2-0 Black Leopards; Kaizer Chiefs 0-0 TS Galaxy; Cape Town City 0-2 Mamelodi Sundowns; Bloemfontein Celtic 0-1 Orlando Pirates; SuperSport United 1-0 Stellenbosch; Tshakhuma FC 0-2 Swallows; Baroka 1-1 Lamontville Golden Arrows.
title: Amakhosi aqhubekile nokuba yinhlekisa

text: IMAMELODI Sundowns ilanyulelwe wunondweba ekugcineni ngesikhathi iyeka ithuba lokuvula igebe esicongweni se-Absa Premiership idlala ngokulingana neFree State Stars nayo eshisa umbango wokuba yizingqwele. Lo mdlalo ubuseLoftus Versveld izolo ebusuku.I-Free State idlale ingcwenga yebhola ngesiwombe sesibili kwala kancane ukuthi iwaqoqe wonke amaphuzu kodwa unondweba wayincisha iphenathi esobala ekugcineni. Ngaphandle kwale phenathi maningi amanye mathuba  ayekwe yileli qembu elilokhu liqhubekile nokumangaza ngemiphumela emihle.Ngaphandle kodede bamathuba abathathu atholwe nguJeremy Brockie, iSundowns igcine ngegoli likaPercy Tau alivalele ngomzuzu wesihlanu esiwombeni sokuqala.Lelo goli livele ngobuhlakani bukaLeandro Sirino wase-Uruguay obeqala ukuqala umdlalo kwiSundowns.UManqoba Mngqithi (obebambe izintambo okokugcina kwazise uPitso Mosimane ubesiqeda isigwebo sakhe), uqale lo mdlalo ngodonga oluhlukile kobeludlale kwiNedbank Cup ngeledlule kodwa lusheshe lwahlukana kulimala uSoumahoro Bangaly ovukwe yidolo elidala. Izivakashi ezibuye esiwombeni sesibili ngomfutho kodwa ziqale zawayeka amathuba ngaphambi kokuthi uSiphelele Mthembu agcine ezibeke ebuhleni ngomzuzu ka-53. Ngaso sonke isikhathi uma iFree State iya phambili bekuvalwa amehlo obekwenza nedlanzana labalandeli ebelihambele lo mdlalo likhumbule ukuthi vele irekhodi leSundowns alikho mnandi eLoftus.Ekugcineni unondweba uThando Ndzandzeka umangaze wonke umuntu encisha iFree State iphenathi esobala ebizowinisa izivakashi.■ EMDLALWENI womlenze wesibili wokuhlunga kuCaf Champions League obuyizolo ntambama eMauritius, iBidvest Wits ishaywe yiPamplemousses SC ngo 1-0 kodwa yadlulela esigabeni esilandelayo ngo 2-1 uma sekuhlanganiswa nomlenze wasekhaya ezikaGavin Hunt eziwunqobe ngo 2-0 ngeledlule.
title: I-Sundowns isindele isinqumo sikanondweba

text: Zakhele XabaAMAZULU azenzele phansi ephunyula amaphuzu abezokwehlisa ingcindezi empini yokubalekela izembe.USuthu luhambe phambili kabili kodwa lwagcina luphume nephuzu kwiBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLucas Moripe Stadium, e-Atteridgeville, izolo ntambama.Luqale umdlalo ludinga amaphuzu amathathu okuxebuka emsileni we-log yePremiership. Lokho akukhombise zibekwa ngesikhathi uLehlohonolo uMajoro elushayela igoli ngomzuzu wesithupha. Kodwa sekuzoyiwa ekhefini iCeltic ishaye elokulinganisa, libekwa enethini nguMatebang Sera ngomzuzu ka-41. Esiwombeni sesibili AmaZulu aphinde ahamba phambili ngesikhathi uJustice Chabalala elishaya ngakubo ngomzuzu ka-63 kodwa emuva kwemizuzu eyisihlanu uNdumiso Mabena ushayele Isiwelele elokulinganisa.Ngokuthola iphuzu, Usuthu lusukile emsileni lwanyukela endaweni ka-15 lwashovela phansi iPolokwane City.Komunye umdlalo obukade useTuks Stadium, iMaritzburg United ishikilisane neBidvest Wits kwaze kwaphela isikhathi ingekho efuna ukugoba uphondo. Lo mdlalo bekufanele udlalelwe eLucas Moripe kwazise iyikhaya leTeam of Choice kodwa wathuthela eTuks ngenxa yokuqondana kwezikhathi nowoSuthu. AmaZulu asebenzisa yona iLucas Moripe njengekhaya lawo.IWits kade idinga amaphuzu amathathu ukuze izovula igebe phakathi kwayo neSuperSport United ebanga nayo indawo yesithathu ezoyifaka emqhudelwaneni iCAF Confederation Cup. Ngokudlala ngokulingana, iTeam of Choice iyeke ithuba lokudiliza i-Orlando Pirates endaweni yesihlanu.Imidlalo esalele amaqembu amane asemsileni imi kanje:Black Leopards: SuperSport United, AmaZulu, Bidvest Wits neMamelodi Sundowns.Baroka: Mamelodi Sundowns, SuperSport United neKaizer Chiefs.Polokwane: Bloemfontein Celtic, Mamelodi Sundowns neBidvest Wits.AmaZulu: Black Leopards, Stellenbosch neHighlands Park.
title: Usuthu luzenzele phansi ludedela amaphuzu amqoka

text: UMCULI kamaskandi uKhuzani “Indlamlenze” Mpungose, uhloniphe iSilo samaBandla ngengoma eqhakambisa imfundo, njengoba uMdlokombane ubegqugquzela imfundo entsheni.Lo mculi wethule ingoma ngokubambisana neMind Empowers Youth Organisation (MEYO). UKhuzani uthi Uhlanga loMhlabathi belugqugquzela imfundo, yingakho ebone kuwumqondo omuhle ukuthi asebenzisane nenhlangano esiza abafundi, ukuthi baqhubeke nezifundo zabo.“Ngokwazi kwami Isilo besiyeseka yonke imikhankaso yeMEYO ngenxa yokuthi iqinisekisa ukufunda entsheni. Ngibone kungumqondo omuhle ukuthi ngisebenzisane nenhlangano egqugquzela ukufunda okuyindlela ehloniphekile yokusihlonipha ngento ebesiyithanda. Njengoba iMEYO isifundise abafundi abangu-166 000 eNingizimu Afrika, ngifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isibalo sinyuka kakhulu sabazosizakala njengoba isisebenzisana nami ngoba nginabalandeli abaningi, ” kuchaza uKhuzani.Uthe ingoma izophuma ngoMeyi 7, kanti kumanje bamatasa baqopha ivideo yalo ngoba bafuna iphume kanye nayo. Ngosuku elizophuma ngalo iculo elithi Izwe leMeyo, uthe lizobe selitholakala kuzona zonke izinkundla ezidayisa umculo nge-Internet. Yena usazosebenzisana nenhlangano isikhathi eside njengenxusa layo.Khonamanjalo lo mculi ubashiye befuna impinda abantu abebehambele indawo yobumnandi iMaqaqa Lifestyle, e-Adams ngoMgqibelo.UKhuzani obenandisa kule ndawo okokuqala, ungene ihora lonke esiteji ejabulisa abaculi ngezingoma zakhe ezihlukene.
title: UKhuzani uhlonipha iSilo ngeculo eligqugquzela imfundo

text: UMNIKAZI weloli eladala isibhicongo sengozi eyadlula nabantu abangu-24 eField's Hill, ePinetown, uzohlawuliswa uR25 000 emuva kokuvuma amacala abebekwe wona ngale ngozi. UGovendor ngeke angene ejele ngale nhlekelele eyenzeka ngo-2013, ngoSepthemba. INational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) ngoMsombuluko ithe babe nalesi sivumelwano nabammeli bomnikazi weloli. UGovender ubesolwa ngokuvumela umshayeli wakhe ukuthi asebenzise iloli elingekho esimweni sokuba semgwaqeni. Ubebhekene futhi necala lokuqasha umuntu obekuleli ngokungemthetho.Ngo-2013 iloli likaGovender, elalishayelwa uSanele May, lashaya irobhothi elibomvu emuva kokungasebenzi kwamabhuleki lashayisa izimoto kwafa abangu-24. USanele May, owavuma onke amacala abekwa wona, njengamanje udonsa isigwebo sakhe seminyaka elishumi eMzinto Prison. Engxoxweni neSunday Tribune emasontweni amabili edlule uMay uthe namanje kusamudla okwenzeka. USanele May osadonsa isigwebo sakhe seminyaka elishumi eMzinto Prison ngengozi eyabulala abantu abangu-24. Isithombe: NQOBILE MBONAMBI"Kwangithatha isikhathi ukwamukela into eyenzeka kodwa abanu baseMzinto Correctional Services nabeSanele May Support Group sebengisize kakhulu,"Waveza ukuthi wayibhalela yonke imndeni eyashonelwa exolisa. "Angikaze ngilithole ithuba lokubatshela ukuthi ngizisola kangakanani ngokwenzeka. Ngiyakholelwa ekuceleni uxolo. Yebo kwakuyingozi kodwa iyangidla ngaphakathi. Eminye imndeni yangibhalela ithi isingixolelile, abanye bangivakashela ngo-2015. Lokho kwangijabulisa," kusho uMay.
title: Ushaywe ngoswazi oluncane umnikazi weloli elabulala abangu-24 eField's Hill

text: UGQEMEKE olungeqiwa ntwala umkhakha kamaskandi kudlula emhlabeni uNicholas Zungu uMajotha. UMajotha ushone ngoLwesihlanu esibhedlela.Imenenja kaMajotha (39), uMzwandile Zungu, uthe kubethusile ukushona kwalo mculi ngoba bebetshelwe ukuthi useyalulama."Ngiqale ukuzwa ngokugula kwakhe ngoLwesibili. NgoMsombuluko sixoxe naye engakhombisi ukuthi ungumuntu ongaphilile ngalolo hlobo. Ngizwe ngoLwesibili ukuthi unenkinga yokubuyisa uma ethi uyadla waze waphuthunyiswa emtholampilo. Ufike emtholampilo wadluliselwa esibhedlela eKing Edward VIII. Esibhedlela kuvele ukuthi ushodelwa yigazi. Ngenhlanhla ufike khona wafakwa igazi. Imibiko ebengiyithola ibithi usengcono kakhulu futhi besinethemba lokuthi uzophuma esibhedlela kungekudala. Ngimangalile sengithola ucingo ngitshelwa ukuthi akasekho," kusho uZungu.Uthe azikaphothulwa izinhlelo zokungcwatshwa kwakhe kodwa kuzokwaziwa maduze uma umndeni usuxoxile.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abathandi bakamaskandi nabaculi bawo bebekhala nxazonke ngokudlula kukaMajotha bebaza ikhono abenalo emculweni. UMajotha wagqama kakhulu ngengoma yakhe ethi: Thulungasho Sengiyajola Manje. Wake waba sembangweni wegama leNdlabeyiphika neGcokama Elisha, lapho aveza ukuthi uyena Indlabeyiphika yangempela. UBejwayele ukukhipha ama-albhamu amabili ngonyaka okungebizwa ngoMajotha ebiphuma ngasekupheleni konyaka neyeNdlabeyiphika Yangempela ebiphuma njalo phakathi nonyaka. Imenenja yakhe ithe bebesezinhlelweni zokukhipha Indlabeyiphika Yengempela ngoJuni. Uthe bebezonyuka ngephasika ukuya eGoli ukuyoqopha kodwa baphazanyiswa ukuthi imenenja isuke yashonelwa emndenini wayo.
title: Igqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ekamaskandi kushona umculi

text: LIFUNA isinxephezelo sikaR10 million eMnyangweni wezoBulungiswa nokuHlumelelisa izimilo iphoyisa elalisebenza kwaKito, eCato Manor elikhala ngokuthi laboshelwa ize mayelana necala lokubulala lamiswa nasemsebenzini kodwa ekugcineni latholakalalimsulwa.UWarrant Officer Thulani Thango (48) manje osesebenza oPhikweni lwezobuNhloli emaphoyiseni usefake amaphepha lapho emangalela uMnyango kaNgqongqoshe, u-Adv Michael Masutha ngokumbophela ubala, okwaholela ekutheni kungcole igama lakhe emphakathini.UThango ukhala ngokuthi ukuboshwa kwakhe mayelana nezinsolo zokubulala uMnuz Jerome Sizwe Bayi ngo-2011, kusilimazile isithunzi sakhe njengoba kade esethathwa njengephoyisa eliyinkabi nokuyinto emqhathe nomndeni wakhe wagcina eshiywa ngisho unkosikazi wakhe.Enye into akhala ngayo ukuthi leli cala limdalele ukhwantalala nokuthi kusukela aboshwa akasakwazi ukunyuka esikhundleni sakhe sokuba nguWarrant Officer yize umsebenzi ewazi ngenxa yezinsolo ake abhekana nazo.Emaphepheni ahlanganiswe ngabameli bakhe, uThango uthi ufuna ukukhokhelwa amademeshe kaR10 million ngokungcoliswa kwegama lakhe ngemuva kokuboshelwa ubala.Isolezwe linawo amaphepha kaThango lapho efuna khona isinxephezelo.Elandisa ngecala lakhe emaphepheni abameli, uThango uthi wahamba nabanye ozakwabo beyofuna uBayi amchaza njengesigebengu esasiyingozi eSiphingo nokwathi uma ethi uyambamba wamhlasela ngocelemba, wabuye wazama nokumdubula naye wabe eseyaphindisela, wadubuleka washona.UThango uqhuba uthi, wamiswa emsebenzi wahamba icala lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe emsebenzini nelokubulala enkantolo kodwa zombili lezi zinhlaka zamthola emsulwa nokuholele ekutheni abuyele emsebenzini ngo-2014.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBulungiswa nokuHlumelelisa izimilo, uMnuz Mokoni Ratshitanga akazange atholakale ukuthi aphawule, ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe kanti nomyalezo ne-email athunyelelwe yona akazange akuphendule kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: Ufuna uR10m  owaboshelwa ubala

text: ISIBINDI nokukholelwa ekutheni lokhu akufisayo kuzokwenzeka, yikho okumnike amandla okuthi athathe isinqumo ngempilo yakhe, umlimi wesifazane osemncane.UNksz Mbali Bengu waseMfulamuhle eMzimkhulu, osalinde ukuthweswa iziqu zeBachelor of Education eDurban University of Technology, uthi akanayo ingcindezi yokufuna umsebenzi njengoba esanda kuqeda ukufunda, kunalokho lesi sikhathi usisebenzisela ukukhulisa ibhizinisi lakhe lokulima.Le ntokazi eqede iziqu zayo nyakenye, ingumnikazi weK' saselihle Fresh Vegetables, etshala iphinde idayise imifino nezinye izitshalo kule ndawo. Eminye imikhiqizo yakhe uyidayisela uSuperSpar oseMzimkhulu. Utshala emhlabeni oyihektha elilodwa nohhafu, kanti ngenyanga edlule ukhiqize amasaka e-butternut angu-50 (7kg), amaklabishi angu-400  namasaka amazambane  angu-45 (10kg).UNksz Bengu uthe akesabi ukulandela lokho asuke ekholwa ukuthi kuzomphumelelisa."Ngaphambi kokuthi ngifundele ubuthisha ngangisebenza ngipakisha impahla ezitolo. Ngayeka ngabuyela esikoleni ngayoqala kuGrade-11 ngoba nganginemiphumela ethile, engangifuna ukuthi ingingenise enyuvesi. Ngesikhathi ngikwenza lokho ngangiphokophelele ekutheni ngizoba wuthisha ngingazi ukuthi ngizothi ngisenyuvesi, ngithole ithuba lokufunda ngebhizinisi okungenze ngaba ngumlimi. Baningi ababengikhuza ngokushiya umsebenzi bethi asikho isiqiniseko sokuthi ngizophasa ngale ndlela engiyifunayo. Ngaphikelela ngoba ngazi ukuthi ngifuna ukuba wuthisha,"  kusho uNksz Bhengu.Uqhube wathi waqala ukuthanda ukulima ngesikhathi ebamba itoho epulazini langakubo, kodwa wazitshela ukuthi akuwona umkhakha  angangena kuwo ngoba ecabanga ukuthi kudingeka imali eningi ukuze abe nezinsiza ezibizayo zokusebenza."Ngaleso sikhathi sasiholelwa ngebhakede likatamatisi njalo ngosuku. Kwakuba kuwe ukuthi uyawudayisa noma uyawudla. Ngabuka ukuthi lo mlimi kusho ukuthi ukhiqiza into eningi njengoba ekwazi ukuthi aholele abantu abaningi kangaka, ngamabhakede katamatisi njalo ngosuku. Ngabona ukuthi kusho ukuthi uyayenza inzuzo ngomkhiqizo wakhe ngoba ukwazi ukukhipha into eningi kangaka aholele ngayo abantu. Kule minyaka  bengilokhu ngibona ukuthi la mapulazi asalokhu eqhubeka nokukhiqiza ngoba ukudla kuyadingeka ezweni,"  kulandisa umlimi.Uthe uqale ukulima ngo-2019 ngemuva kokuthola ukwelulekwa ngaphansi kophiko lwaseDUT (Ndumiso), iMidlands Entrepreneurship Centre and Students Desk. Uthe lolu phiko lwamhlomisa ngolwazi lwebhizinisi wathola noxhaso lwemali wase eqala ibhizinisi lakhe ngo-2019."Umkhiqizo wami ngithi ngiwutshala ngibe ngazi ukuthi uzothengwa ngubani. Lokho kwenza ukuthi ngingazitholi senginenkinga yokuthi angazi ukuthi umkhiqizo wami ngizowudayisela bani usulungile,"  kusho uNksz Bhengu.Uthe ngolunye ulwazi lokulima usizwa ngabalimi bangakubo njengoba esemusha kule ndima.
title: Ufakela isitolokazi  umlimi wesifazane osemncane

text: UPITSO Mosimane uthi akawasoli amaqembu akhiphe wonke amangwevu ukuze ahambe ibanga elide kwiNedbank Cup esifinyelele esigabeni samanqamu.Iqembu likaMosimane, iMamelodi Sundowns, likhishwe yiChippa United kwiNedbank esigabeni se-Last 32.Ngempelasonto iTS Galaxy ikhiphe iLamontville Golden Arrows, kwathi iKaizer Chiefs yawashisa ijezi i-United emidlalweni eyandulela owamanqamu.Ngaleso sikhathi iSundowns, beyilwela ukunciphisa igebe phakathi kwayo ne-Orlando Pirates ababanga nayo isicoco se-Absa Premiership.ISundowns iphumelele ekushayeni iBaroka FC ngo 2-1 e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, lancipha ngamaphuzu amathathu igebe phakathi kwayo nePirates eqhwakele kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-50.Namuhla eLoftus Versfeld ngo-3 ntambama, iSundowns izodudulana neChilli Boys emdlalweni esalele ngawo emuva kwiligi. Yingemuva kokuthi uMosimane ebuzwe ngakulindele kwiChippa, lapho ebalule khona ukuthi yena neqembu lakhe banemiqhudelwano emikhulu abagxile kuyo. Ubekhuluma iChippa isazobhekana neChiefs emdlalweni egcine ibhudluzwe kuwo ngo 4-2.“Angazi kwenzekani kwiChippa kodwa nayo iyiqembu okunzima kithina ukuthi silishaye kodwa-ke umdlalo weligi uhlukile kunowomkhumulajezi,” kusho uMosimane ezakhe ezahlulwa ngo 2-1 kwiNedbank Cup.Emdlalweni weligi womzuliswano wokuqala ekuhambeni iSundowns yanqoba ngo 1-0.“Angazi uma nje uke waphatha igama elithi ama-quarterfinal ubona izimanga. Lapha eNingizimu Afrika ziyathandwa izinkomishi ezincane kodwa kulungile nami ngangidlalela zona ngisekwiSuperSport United ngoba uzoyithathaphi iligi? Ayikho inkinga uma bezilwela kanzima lezi zindebe.”UMosimane ugcizelele elokuthi akakhulumi kanje ngoba ebengeke akujabulele ukunqoba iNedbank Cup kodwa wukuthi uyazi ukuthi kwiligi nakwiChampions League yilapho obuhlala obala khona ubungqwele.“Iligi neChampions League kuhlukile. Leyo miqhudelwano inemidlalo ebalelwa ku-30. Yilapho kucaca khona ukuthi uqine kangakanani nokuthi ungubani. Lapho kubonakala khona imidlalo oyinqobile, ohlulwe kuyona namagoli owashayile. Inkomishi le udlala imidlalo emine ufike kowamanqamu. Angisho ukuthi bengingafuni ukuwina iNedbank Cup kodwa bekumele sihlele kahle. Ngabe kunjani manje ukube besisadlala kuyona,” kusho uMosimane.Mayelana nokuthi uzizwa kanjani ngokunciphisa igebe kwezakhe nePirates, uthe: “Angazi sisele ngamaphuzu amangaki kwabaphezulu kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi sithole amaphuzu amathathu namuhla (ngoMgqibelo).”ISundowns isalinde ukugwetshwa yikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe lePremier Soccer League ngokudlalisa kungafanele uWayne Arendse. Isigwebo kungenzeka sihambisane nokuthi iphucwe iphuzu eyalithola emdlalweni eyabambana ngo 1-1 neBidvest Wits, elinye lamaqembu asenethuba lokudla isicoco seligi.
title: IChippa yiqembu okunzima ukuthi silishaye: Mosimane

text: AMADODA amabili aseMfume angeniswe esibhedlela emuva kokuthi kuthiwa adutshulwe ngamaphoyisa awafice edlala isinukha esitolo.UMnuz Qiniso Nzama (22) noMnuz Ntuthuko Shange (26) baseMfume, ngaseMkhomazi, badutshulwe ngeledlule.UNzama, odedelwe esibhedlela iScottsburgh ngoLwesihlanu, emva kokulaliswa izinsuku ezintathu, uthe wadubuleka emhlane ezama ukubaleka.Uthe odokotela bathe inhlamvu ngeke bayikhiphe okwamanje ngoba kungaba nomthelela omubi empilweni yakhe kodwa bamnika okokuthiba izinhlungu.UShange kuthiwa usesesibhedlela ngoba wadubuleka eduze komhlathi. Umngani wakhe uthe ufakwe izinsimbi ezimsiza ukuthi akwazi ukuvula umlomo.“Sasidlala isinukha singafikile ngisho kubantu abayisishiyagalombili. Kunokuthi asibophe uma siphule umthetho, avele avulela ngenhlamvu. Ngebhadi kwalimala mina noShange. Kunokuthi basisize ngoba sasilimele, bavele babaleka bangena emotweni basishiya kanjalo,” kusho uNzama.Uthe ufisa umthetho usebenze aboshwe amaphoyisa ngoba ukholwa wukuthi ayeqonde ukubabulala esebenzisa amandla awo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe likhona icala elivuliwe.“Kuphenywa icala lokuzama ukubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa saseMkhomazi kanti lizodluliselwa ophikweni olubhekelele ukuziphatha kwamaphoyisa i-Independent Police Investigate Directorate (Ipid),” kusho uNaicker.
title: Bathi badutshulwe amaphoyisa besesitolo

text: ‘ABANTU abazi iqiniso bathathu, yimina, uHlengiwe noNkulunkulu.”Usho kanje umakadebona womculo wokholo uSipho “Big Fish” Makhabane mayelana nezinsolo zokuthi wadla izizumbulu zikaHlengiwe Mhlaba, ayengumphathi wakhe.Iphephandaba lesiNgisi eliphuma ngeSonto libike ukuthi uMakhabane, owavumbulula uHlengiwe, usolwa yilo mculi ngokudla uR8.5 million wemali etholwa ngokudlala komculo emsakazweni nakwezinye izindawo, okubizwa ngama-royalties.Kuvela ukuthi uHlengiwe uthole ukuthi ezingomeni zakhe ezingu-90 ezaqoqa ama-royalties akhe kwaSouth African Music Rights Organisation (Samro), zingu-24 kuphela ezakhokha * -16.7% wemali okumele ize kuye.Kuvela ukuthi ukweletwa omunye uR8.5 million wemali yokudayiswa kwamaCD. Kuthiwa eminyakeni engu-10 wathola uR4.5 million kuMakhabane.Iphepha elikhiphe lokhu alimtholanga uMakhabane ukuthi aphendule imibuzo. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi uphatheke kabi ngale mibiko futhi ngeke aphawule kakhulu.“Abantu abazi iqiniso uHlengiwe, yimi noNkulunkulu,” kusho uMakhabane.“Akekho umzali okhulisa ingane abale kodwa namuhla kuhlangana abantu bathi angizobala. Kubuhlungu kimi ukuthi ingane engayikhulisa kanzima isikhuluma kanje ngami. Kulungile. UNkulunkulu, uSipho noHlengiwe bayazi. Sebengangena abelungu bezokwenza izibalo ngoba bafundile mina ngagcina ebangeni lesithathu,” kusho yena.Uthe okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi uHlengiwe akezi kuye bakhulume.Imizamo yokuthola uHlengiwe izolo ayiphumelelanga ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.“Ngisilungele isiphambano. Ngisho nababhala kuFacebook ngithi kulungile. UHlengiwe yindodakazi yami. Engakufunda wukuthi e-Afrika zingu-20% kuphela izingane ezibuyela emuva ziyobonga,” kusho yena.Iphephandaba liveze ukuthi uphenyo lommeli uGraeme Gilfillan oqashwe nguHlengiwe luveza ukuthi * -83.3% wama royalties ukhokhelwe umqambi ongaziwa obizwa ngoDP.Kuthiwa baningi abaculi abathintekayo okubalwa kubo uJabu Khanyile, Brenda Fassie, Miriam Makeba, Mahlathini nabanye.Ucwaningo lukaGilfillan lukhomba ukuthi ilinganiselwa kuR1.2 billion imali ethathwe egameni likaDP eminyakeni engu-55. Okhulumela iSamro ucashunwe ethi lesi samba siyihaba.
title: UBig Fish uphawula ngezokuqola uHlengiwe

text: UMHOLI weDA, uMnuz John Steenhuisen, ukhwele wadilika kuhulumeni wakuleli ngodaba lokusingathwa komgomo wobhubhane iCorona.Ethula eyakhe inkulumo ye-DA athe uyibhekise esizweni njengoba ngoLwesine kulindeleke uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa athule le nkulumo, uSteenhuisen uthe ukwahluleka kukahulumeni ukuthenga ngokushesha umgomo waleli gciwane kuzoholela ekutheni izwe lizithole selibhekana nesivuvu sesithathu nesesine salolu bhubhane.USteenhuisen uxwayise ngokuthi isivuvu sesithathu  nesesine singaphoqa ukuthi izwe libuye liphindele phansi kwemibandela eqinile yomvalelandlini, athe kungaguqisa ngamadolo umnotho wakuleli ovele uyantenga.“Baze baphaphama ngoJanuwari. Ngokombiko owethulelwe iKhabhinethi wuNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, iningi le migomo elindelwe izoze ifike ngo-Okthoba, Novemba noDisemba. Lokho kusho ukuthi angeke sikwazi ukugoma abantu abenele ukuze sikwazi ukugwema isivuvu sesithathu. Sisengcupheni yokwehluleka ukugwema isivuvu sesine.“Ukungasheshi kwethu ukuthola umgomo akusikho ukuthi ingoba amazwe amakhulu abegwevile nayo engafuni, njengoba kusho umengameli, kepha iqiniso ukuthi ngesikhathi la mazwe ebambe imigqa yokuthenga umgomo ngoMeyi, Julayi, thina sasingekho ndawo.”USteenhuisen uthe eyakhe inkulumo ihlukile kakhulu kuleyo ezokwethulwa ngumengameli, njengoba ethe eyakhe igeqa amagula ngezinkinga ezikhungethe leli zwe.Inkulumo yakhe ibigxile ezinkingeni ezimayelana nokulwa neCorona, ukutakula umnotho nokunyathelwa kwentando yeningi.USteenhuisen uthe kufanele engabe uhulumeni oholwa i-ANC ushiyile ezikhundleni kulandela ubufakazi obethulwe kwiKhomishini eholwa iJaji Raymond Zondo.Le khomishini izwe ukuthi izinkulungwane zamaRandi zemali yezinhloli yasetshenziswa ukuphazamisa ukusebenza kukahulumeni waseWestern Cape, ukuzama ukugwazela amajaji kanye nabezindaba ukuze bacheme nowayengumengali wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma.USteenhuisen uthe lokhu kungukunyathelwa kwentando yeningi, wathi kufanele engabe uhulumeni we-ANC ushiyile esikhundleni emuva kwalobu bufakazi.
title: I-DA igxeka uhulumeni ngolomgomo

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uqinise idolo abantu bakuleli ukuthi abazobuya eWuhan, eChina, namhlanje abaguli ngakho kasikho isidingo sokutatazela ukuthi bazothelela abanye abantu ngegciwane iCoronavirus.UMkhize ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba ebesisePolokwane, eLimpopo, izolo ebusuku, umemezele ukuthi senyukile safinyelela ku-16 isibalo sabaneCoronavirus.Uthe benze iphutha bethi bangu-17, njengoba indoda yaseFree State obekubikwe ukuthi yahlangana nosomabhizinisi waseChina isihlolwa okwesibili, kutholwe ukuthi ayinalo leli gciwane.UMkhize uthe laba bantu abangu-121 abazobuya namhlanje ngeke baze bayovalelwa esibhedlela ngoba kabaguli.“Abazona iziguli, abazona iziboshwa. Asizobafaka esibhedlela. Sizobabeka endaweni eyodwa ukuze sizokwazi ukubaqapha sibahlole izinsuku eziwu-14, bese siyabadedela emuva kwezinsuku ezingu-21 sesiqinisekisile ukuthi abanalutho. Bazobe bezihlalele ezindlini zabo ukuze bengazohlangana nabanye abantu. Lokhu sikwenzela uma kwenzeka betholakala ukuthi banalo leli gciwane,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe abantu abalindelekile balinganselwa ku-121 ngakho bebedinga indawo enkulu abazofikela kuyona.UMkhize uchaze ukuthi zingu-84 izindawo kuleli ezibhekiwe ukuze kuzotholakala efanele ukuba kubekwe laba bantu.“Sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi sibheke yonke indawo sabe sesivumelana kule ndawo eseLimpopo ngoba iyona ebivumelana nazo zonke izimo. Sithe abeze nabezindaba ngoba wusuku lokugcina lokuba nibe la. Kuzobe kuvaliwe lapha kugade amasosha namaphoyisa. Akekho okumele asondele lana nozovunyelwa,” kusho uMkhize.Kwezinye zezindawo, athe bake bazibheka, iseThala ngaseVryheid KwaZulu-Natal kodwa yachithwa ngoba kutholakale ukuthi kukude kakhulu nesikhumulo sezindiza, uma befika eKing Shaka kungamele bashayele ibanga elingaphezu kwamahora amahlanu.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi siletha abantu abagulayo eLimpopo ukuzogulisa abantu bakhona. Lapha kuzohlala abantu abaphilayo, uma kutholwa ukuthi kukhona onaleli gciwane uzokhishwa kule ndawo ayiswe lapho ezolashwa khona,” kusho uMkhize.Khonamanjalo, kuhlelwe umhlangano oyisipesheli weKhabhinethi oqala ngeSonto eTshwane lapho kulindeleke ukuba kukhulunywe ngodaba lweCoronavirus, okubalwa udaba lokulawula kokuphuma kuleli, nokunye.
title: Babuya namuhla abavela eChina

text: IMENENJA kaSiphelele “Stash” Ntshangase imyala ngokuthi asebenzise izinkinga zeKaizer Chiefs ukuze ezobuyisa ugazi kubalandeli bale kilabhu.UJazzman Mahlakgane ophethe izindaba zalesi sikhwishikhwishi uthe unethemba lokuthi uNtshangase uzoba nesizini enhle ngaphansi kukaGavin Hunt.Uqhube wathi ukudlala kwakhe emidlalweni eyedlule kubuyise ukuzethemba kuNtshangase.Ngemuva kwesikhathi eside lesi sibabuli silizwa ngendaba ijezi, uHunt usifakile emdlalweni wokuqala weDStv Premiership ezakhe zishaywa yiMamelodi Sundowns ngo-3-0.Uphinde wambophela emlenzeni wesibili weMTN 8, iChiefs eshaywe kuwo i-Orlando Pirates ngo-2-0.Kulo mdlalo wacishe washaya negoli. NoDoctor “16V” Khumalo kwaSABC wazwakalisa ukweneliseka ngendlela  adlale ngayo.“Sike sakhuluma noStash (Ntshangase) ubuyelwe yithemba ngendlela eyisimanga. Nakuba iChiefs ishayiwe kwimidlalo eyidlalile kodwa unethemba lokuthi izinto zizolunga.Ubona ezoba nesizini enhle ngaphansi kukaHunt. Ngimtshelile ukuthi akaqhubeke nokuzimisela.  Ingijabulisile indlela engimbone eyiyona,” kussho Mahlakgane.Leli qembu ligwetshwe iFifa ukungasayinisi abadlali amawindi amabili.“Yilona ithuba likaStash leli lokuveza ithalente lakhe. Akazimisele ngempela, abe umduduzi wabalandeli kulezi zinkinga ezikhona. Ngokuqhubeka kwesizini izinga lakhe lokudlala lizonyuka. Ngimfisela inhlanhla,” kuqhuba le menenja.Efika uNtshangase kwiChiefs ngo-2018, iqeqeshwa, uSteve Komphela, belilikhulu idumela abaningi bethi ubakhumbuza izinsuku zika Khumalo ngenxa yokuphasa ibhola okunenkosi phakathi. Ubephuma kwiBaroka abeshisa bheke kuyo.Ngesizini edlule ngaphansi kuka-Ernest Middendorp akadlalanga nowodwa umdlalo. Isizini enhle wayigcina ngeka-2018/19 edlala emidlalo ewu-20 sekuhlanganiswe yonke imiqhudelwano.UMahlakgane obuye aphathe izindaba zikaSiphosakhe Ntiya-Ntiya wawo AmaKhosi, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi kungamanga ukuthi lo mdlali ubesohlwini lwabadlali abebezochithwa iChiefs.“Abantu bakhuluma izinto abangazazi, uNtiya-Ntiya usezinhlelweni zomqeqeshi. Kufike umqeqeshi omusha kwiChiefs, naye kumele azimisele ukuze ezoheha iso lakhe”.Selokhu kufike uHunt, uNtiya-Ntiya akakalitholi ijezi.NgoMgqibelo AmaKhosi azodlala koweDStv Premiership neLamontville Golden Arrows kozoqala u-3.30, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont, eThekwini.Emidlalweni emithathu  iChiefs,  isashaye kuphela iChippa United. Igcine idlale ngokulingana neTS Galaxy.Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership ngempelasonto:NgoMgqibelo - Ngo-3.30pm: Golden Arrows v Kaizer Chiefs (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium); Stellenbosch v Chippa United (Danie Craven Stadium); Black Leopards v Maritzburg United (Thohoyandou).Ngo-6pm: Orlando Pirates v SuperSport United (Orlando Stadium).Ngo-8.15pm: Swallows v TS Galaxy (Dobsonville Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo3.30pm: Mamelodi Sundowns v AmaZulu (Loftus Versfeld Stadium); Cape Town City v Bloemfontein Celtic (Cape Town Stadium).
title: Imenenja kaNtshangase imnika iziyalo

text: ULungelo walimala kanzima emlenzeni nasentanyeni ephuma enxanxatheleni yezitolo eGoli.Elandisa Isolezwe ngalesi sehlakalo, uthi wayeyogibela itekisi i-Uber ngesikhathi kuqhamuka imoto yamshayisa.Uthe wathi evula isicabha kwaqhamuka le moto ihamba ngesivivini esiphezulu yashayisa le ayezoyigibela wase elimala.“Angikho esimeni esikahle nempilo inzima njengoba ngingasakwazi nokuqhuba nokulingisa ngenxa yalokhu kulimala. Njengoba ngikhuluma nawe nje ngiphuma esibhedlela ngiqale phansi ukufunda ukuhamba ngemuva kokulimala,” kusho uLungelo.Uthe kunzima ukufunda ukuhamba ngoba walimala kanzima emlenzeni.“Ngingajabula uma ngingalulama ngokushesha ukuze ngikwazi ukubuyela emsebenzini. Angenzi lutho okwamanje okuyinto engiphethe kabuhlungu ngoba ngiphuthwa yimisebenzi,” kusho uLungelo.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukuvezwa, uthe isimo salo mlingisi sesingcono kakhulu njengoba odokotela benze umsebenzi oncomekayo. “Naye ubakhuthalele odokotela kakhulu njengoba behlala bembheka ukuthi la alimala khona kuyalulameka yini,” kuchaza umthombo othe ukungabonakalali kwakhe emcimbini wezindondo amaSimon Mabhunu Sabela Awards ayeqokwe kuwona yingenxa yakho ukulimala.“Ku-Instagram kukhona isikhathi lapho ake afaka khona isithombe eveza intamo elimele efake okokuyisekela,” kusho umthombo.ULungelo uthe uhamba odokotela isonto nesonto ukuze alulame njengoba besamfundisa ukucathula.
title: Kunzima kumlingisi oshayiswe imoto

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezisebenzi zikahulumeni nokuphatha uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, uthi iCovid-19 ibafundisile bewuhulumeni ukuthi bayakwazi ukusebenza bembalwa abasebenzi njengoba kusetshenzelwa emakhaya.UMchunu obethula isabelo sezimali somnyango emkhandlwini wezifundazwe ePhalamende namhlanje, uthe mningi umsebenzi owenziwa ngabantu abambalwa ngenxa yeCovid-19.“Ukuqubuka kwaleli gciwane kusikhombisile ukuthi siyakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi omningi ngabantu abambalwa. Izikhulu zisebenzela emakhaya, okukhombisa khona ukuthi kudingeka kuhlinzekwe abasebenzi bahulumeni ngengqalasizinda yokukwazi ukusebenzela emakhaya.”Uthe inselelo ekhona wukuthi awukho umgomo othi kusetshenzelwa emakhaya. Ukubakhona kwalo mgomo uthe kungasiza nangomuso uma selingasekho leli gciwane.UMchunu uthe umkhakha kahulumeni ugubuzelwe yizinkolelo ezifana nokuthi bancane abanamakhono, inkohlakalo idla lubi, abasebenzi bayavilapha futhi abanye abasenamdlandla.“Okunye okumele sizibuze khona ukuthi ngabe ababhekele izimali eminyangweni kahulumeni bayamelana nenkohlakalo?” kubuza uMchunu.Uqhube wathi basabhekene nenkinga ngeGovernment Employees Housing Scheme (GEHS),  njengoba okwamanje bebalelwa ku-300 000 abasebenzi abahlomulayo ekubeni kumele babe baningi. UMchunu uthe kulesi sabelo esicela kuR600 000 million bashaywe kakhulu wukwehliswa kwaso okwenze behlisa ezinye zezinhlelo zomnyango njengoba iminyango eminingi yehliselwe isabelo sezimali ngenxa yeCovid-19.
title: ICovid-19 isifundise okuningi: Mchunu

text: I-SACP ithi izokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi akwehli ngisho indibilishi ngemilenze uma sekuthengwa umgomo wokuvikela ubhubhane iCorona.Leli zwe liphansi phezulu lizama ukuthenga umgomo wokuvikela ubhubhane oseluhaqe izakhamizi zakuleli ezingaphezu kwesigidi.Leli qembu lithi lizoqala umkhankaso wokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abekho abantu abazosebenzisa leli thuba ukuzinothisa ngemali yomgomo.Ngesikhathi igciwane libheduka ngasekuqaleni konyaka odlule, uhulumeni walahlekelwa yizigidi zamarandi ezehla ngemilenze ngesikhathi kuthengwa izinsiza zokuvikela ukusabalala kweCovid- 19Unobhala jikelele weSACP uMnuz Blade Nzimande, uthe kulokhu bazokube bebheke ngamehlo abomvu ukuthi ayibi khona inkohlakalo.“Ngeke siyivumele inkohlakalo nokuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso kuzo zonke izinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuthenga umgomo wokuvikela iCorona.”UNzimande ubekhuluma emcimbini wokugubha iminyaka engu-26 kwashona uMnuz Joe Slovo, owayengunobhala jikelele weSACP.UNzimande uthe bazophinde benze isiqiniseko sokuthi kulawulwa amanani omgomo ukuze wonke amazwe azokwazi ukuwuthenga.“Ngalo mkhankaso sihlose ukuqeda nya umqondo wezinkampani ezikhiqiza amakhambi, wokuhlale zibeka phambili ukwenza inzuzo. Ezweni lethu sifuna uhulumeni enze isiqiniseko sokuthi ukuthengwa komgomo weCorona, akuphenduli abantu abathize kubenze izigwili.”UNzimande uphinde wanxusa uhulumeni ukuba enze isiqiniseko sokuthi wonke umuntu uyawuthola umgomo uma usuthengiwe, kungabi khona ukwenzelela ekusabalalisweni kwawo.
title: ISACP ithi izokulwa nenkohlakalo yokuthengwa komgomo weCorona

text: USgumza oxoxe neSolezwe ngeSonto, uthe unesifiso sokuxhumana nabantu baseMnambithi, abachazele ngokwenzeka futhi kube nendlela azokwenza ngayo ukuthoba abantu amanxeba ngomonakalo owenzeka. Uthe ngeke abathembise abantu ukuthi kuzobuya yonke imali yabo eyacwila kodwa ikhona indlela afuna ukwenza ngayo nengaba wumthobanhliziyo kubantu abalahlekelwa yimali yabo beyitshale kwiBitcoin Wallet. USgumza obengakaze atholakale selokhu kwashiswa umuzi wakubo nezimoto zakhe, uthi selokhu ahamba eMnambithi ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko njengoba ehleli eThekwini. Uveze ukuthi zonke izinto ebezikhulunywa ngaye bezingamanga ngoba bekuthiwa ubalekele ukuboshwa.Uthe ngisho nomphenyi weCrime Intelligent, uyaxhumana naye kodwa akaboshwanga ngoba ayikho into emfaka ecaleni. “Mina ngikhona ngiseThekwini. Ngahamba eMnambithi ngenxa yokuthi kwakungasaphephile ngoba abantu babekholwa ukuthi ngidle imali yabo. “Empeleni iBitcoin Wallet kwakungekaMbheki Hlambisa owayezibiza ngoShozi noZwelinjani Bhengu owayezibiza ngoMbambo. Bobabili abakwaNqetho, ngaseHillcrest futhi bahleli khona kumanje. “Mina ngangisebenza ngiyiParamedic, ngibuye ngizidlalele amadayisi ngenhloso yokwenza imali ethe xaxa. Ngesikhathi ngithola ukuthi kuneBitcoin Wallet nami ngaqala ngafaka uR2000 wabuya usunguR4 000. “Lokho kwangiheha kakhulu ngagcina sengifaka imali enkulu ngempela ibuye. Ngigcine senginxenxa abanye abantu ukuthi asenzeni imali ngeBitcoin Wallet. “Abaningi engabafaka kuyona bathola inzuzo enkulu kwagcina sekungena inqwaba yabantu. UShozi noMbambo bathi ngoba nginekhono lokuqoqa abantu bathatha isinqumo sokungenza imenenja kanti sebezobaleka nemali yabantu, kwase kugaxela kumina,” kusho uSgumza. Imizamo yokuthola uShozi ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe lungngeni.USgumza owayesebizwa ngoNkulunkulu waseMnambithi, uthe naye walahlekelwa yimali eningi kwiBitcoin Wallet. Uthe wayefake uR1.6 million owawuzobuya usunguR3.2 million kodwa akazange athole ngisho nesenti. Uveze ukuthi wake wazama ukuya namaphoyisa kuShozi noMbambo kwaNqetho efuna baboshwe ukuze kubuye imali yabantu kodwa leyo mizamo yangaphumelela ngoba, uShozi noMbabo babiza abameli babo, abangabopheka. “Ngaze ngazama ukuyilanda ngobunsizwa le mali kuShozi noMbambo ngafike ngadutshulwa ngacishe, ngashona ngalaliswa nasezibhedlela,” usho kanje. Uthe nomama wakhe wahlaselwa wukhwantalala emva kokushiswa komuzi wakubo eMnambithi, ngoba ubesemhlalisa emizini yabantu bengasenalo ikhaya, wagcina ngokushona. Kumanje uphila ngokubamba amatoho okushayela amaloli njengoba awukho omunye umsebenzi. IBitcoin Wallet yayikuKeate Street eMnambithi. Abantu bakhona bebengasalali beyotshala imali yabo kuyona, abanye base beyiletha ngoplastiki. Kuthiwa abanye babesule nasemisebenzini ababeqashwe kuyona ukuze bathole imali yempesheni abazoyitshala kwiBitcoin Wallet, bethemba ukuthi bazokwenza inzalo eningi
title: Uphumela obala owaduma‘ngebhanoyi’ laseMnambithi

text: KUBOSHWE abesifazane ababili abasolwa ngokunganaki izingane zabo ezine ezishone kusha imijondolo e-Alexandra, eGoli, ngeSonto ekuseni.Kubikwa ukuthi laba besifazane bebecwile ezinkambini zikaFaro ethaveni ekulendawo ngesikhathi kusha imijondolo nezingane zabo.Ingane eyodwa ishonele endaweni yesigameko, ezintathu zishonele esibhedlela ngeSonto ntambama. Okhulumela isiteshi samaphoyisa e-Alexandra uCaptain Stephen Malatjie uthe laba besifazane bashiye izingane zabo ezineminyaka eqala ku-3 kuya ku-6 nomfana oneminyaka engu-14 ozalwa ngoyedwa wabo. Iphephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, iThe Star, lithole ukuthi lo mfana nguye othinte amaphoyisa ngesikhathi kuqubuka umlilo ngeSonto ekuseni kodwa yena akalimalanga. UMalatjie uthe kulekelele omakhelwane ukuzama ukucisha umlilo ngaphambi kokuthi kufike izicishamlilo.Abesifazane ababoshiwe, abaneminyaka engu-29 no-30 bazovela eNkantolo yeMantshi eWynberg ngoLwesibili.
title: Kuboshwe abesifazane besolwa ngobudedengu

text: BUCHITHEKE bugayiwe eDundee izolo kwabaleka namaphoyisa ngemuva kokuba izakhamuzi zamalokishi ehlukene ziwathela ngemvula yamatshe, zifuna kukhishwe esikhundleni imeya ye-IFP.Lezi zakhamuzi zivale thanqa ukuhamba kwezimoto edolobheni, ziveva yintukuthelo.Kuphazamiseke nokuhanjiswa kwamaphepha okubhala kwezinye izikole ngenxa yomphakathi oqale ukumashela edolobheni laseDundee kusuka ngehora lesine ekuseni.Kule mashi kugcine kukhona ababoshwayo njengoba kucekelwe phansi imigwaqo, izitolo nojantshi wesitimela.Lezi zakhamizi zivale yonke imigwaqo ephuma eDundee ebheke eVryheid, Nquthu, Newcastle, Glencoe naseMnambithi. Zitholane phezulu namaphoyisa zawashaya ngamatshe, agcina ebaleka maqede zehlela erenki yamatekisi ahambela eGoli zithi ziyoshisa amaQuantum. Nokho zikhalinywe abaqaphi bamatekisi benkampani iQomukufa Security abadubule phezulu bephindelela.Abagcinanga lapho, abanye, bangene ezitolo zokudla bazitapela kodwa kuthe uma sebebheke enxanxatheleni enkulu yezitolo bafika sezivaliwe.UMnuz Wandile Ngcobo, obengomunye wabaholi bemashi, uthe sebekhathele ukungaphathwa ngendlela kukamasipala nokukhohliswa ngezidingo. Phakathi kokunye, abakhala ngakho ukuthi iMeya esamisiwe, uMnuz Sboniso Mbatha, yathatha imali eyanikelwa imayini kumasipala ukuze kulungiswe ezinye zezikole eSibongile. UMbatha kuthiwa wabe eseyalela ukuba leyo mali iyokwakha inxanxathela yezitolo zaseGlencoe. Kukhalwa nangokuthi ama-rates anyuka ngaphandle kokubikelwa.Abanye kule mashi bebekhala ngokuthi kade babefaka izicelo zokubuyiselwa umhlaba kodwa kuze kube yimanje abatholi mpendulo.Le mashi ibihlanganisa abantu abebesuka eSibongile, Evokwe, eFrance nakwenziye izingxenye zaseNdumeni. IMeya ebambile, uDkt Isri Bedassi, izamile ukuzokhuluma nomphakathi kodwa bayixosha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe isimo sibe ngaphezulu kwamandla abo ngenxa yentukuthelo yabantu.Uveze ukuthi laba bantu bebebalelwa ku-3 000.Uthe bazame ukujuba amaphoyisa aseziteshini zakwezinye izindawo ezakhele iDundee ukuze azolekelela.Amaphoyisa athwale kanzima emgwaqweni uVictoria noFouche lapho abeshawa khona ngamatshe. Eminye imigwaqo ibivalwe ngezingodo namathayi avuthayo.Izolo lishone sekukhona ababoshiwe kodwa ababhikishi bebengazimisele ukuhlakazeka, besabisa ngokuthi bazoshisa ibhilidi likamasipala uma uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, engamlethi umuntu ozokwamukela izikhalo zabo ngoba abafuni zithathwe umuntu kuMasipala waseNdumeni.Lize lashona belokhu betshelwa ukuthi kukhona osuka eMgungundlovu ozokwamukela izikhalo zabo. Abanye bathutheleke esiteshini samaphoyisa lapho obesekuboshwe khona ingxenye yababhikishi.Okhulumela uNkk Dube Ncube, uMnuz Lennox Mabaso, ethintwa uthe usematasa wathi uzobuyela entathelini kodwa kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela engabuyelanga entathelini.Ucingo lukaMbatha belukhala lungabanjwa.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, ukugxekile ukuphazamiseka kwezikole ngalo mbhikisho.
title: Acele empunzini amaphoyisa kubhikishwa

text: KUPHENYWA amacala okubulala ngokungenhloso emva kokushona kwabantu abayisithupha ezingozini ezehlukene eThekwini ngempelasonto.NgoMgqibelo kushone amalungu amane omndeni wakwaKhan engozini eyenzeke ekhoneni lomgwaqo uDr Yusuf Dadoo (Broad Street) no-Anton Lembede (Smith Street) eThekwini.Ngokwemibiko evezwe abezimo eziphuthumayo bakwaRescue Care, kushayisane izimoto ezimbili enye yalala ngokhakhayi.Kukholakala ukuthi umndeni ubuphuthuma esibhedlela ukuze kwelashwe indodakazi yawo ebingaphilile kahle.Ababili abebehamba ngenye imoto basindile bayiswa esibhedlela esiseduzane.Ngawo uMgqibelo kushone abantu ababili kwalimala oyedwa eMountview ngase-Verulam.Ngokusho kwabeReaction Unit South Africa, bathole ucingo lubazisa ngengozi eyenzeke emgwaqweni u-Amora Drive ngase-Mountview.Imoto abebehamba ngayo kuthiwa iphaphalazile yabakhiphela ngaphandle yabe isigqamuka amalangabi.Ngokwesitatimende sabakwa-Reaction Unit bafike endaweni yesigameko abesilisa abathathu sebengaphandle kwemoto ebisha ubuhanguhangu. Ababili bashonele khona lapho kwathi oyedwa waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela sasoSindisweni kukubi.Kusolwa ukuthi imoto ibihamba ngesivinini esiphezulu ngesikhathi umshayeli ehluleka wukuyilawula. Ingozi iholele ekutheni kuvalwe umgwaqo isikhathi eside abezimo eziphuthumayo nezicima mlilo besasebenza. Abanye abashayeli baphoqelekile ukuthi basebenzise eminye imigwaqo ngesikhathi kusakhucululwa endaweni yengozi.Kwenye ingozi eyenzeke eMariannhill, itekisi ebithwele abagibeli iphaphalazile emgwaqweni yakhalakatheka emjondolo. Kulimale abantu abayisishiyagalombili kule ngozi.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo bakwa-ER24, uMnuz Russel Meiring, uthe bafice abantu bezulazula eduze kwetekisi.“Sihlole abagibeli sathola ukuthi bayisishiyagalombili abalimele. Sibaphuthumise esibhedlela ukuze belashwe ngokugcwele,” kusho uMeiring.Amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal ayaphenya ngembangela yazo zonke lezi zingozi, akekho osaboshiwe ngazo.
title: Umndeni kwabashone ezingozini zomgwaqo

text: ABANTU bakuleli bavuke umbhejazane ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bekhalaza ngokucishwa kukagesi okumenyezelwe ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Abakwa-Eskom bafake isitatimende izolo kwi-Twitter, esiveza ukuthi ugesi uzocinywa ngokwesigaba sesibili kuze kube wuMsombuluko (namhlanje) ekuseni. Abantu bazwakalise ulaka lwabo, abanye baze babachapha ngenhlamba abakwa-Eskom.Esitatimendeni abakwa-Eskom bathe: “Ugesi ungaphansi kwengcindezi, yingakho kuzoba nokucishwa kusukela ngo- 8 ekuseni namhlanje (izolo), kuze kube kusasa (NgoMsombuluko) ngo-5 ekuseni,”Kwi-Twitter abantu bakuleli bebevutha bengabaselwe.UKay, @kopano_1 uthe: “Kodwa yini niqambe amanga esizweni, nithi ngeke kucinywe ugesi phakathi kuka-Disemba 17, 2019 noJanuwari 13, 2020, kunjani manje,”UBentLFC @BrentV-RSA uthe: “Kungani ningakhulumi iqiniso kanye nje, nivele nisitshele ukuthi ugesi uzocinywa ngokwesigaba sesibili unyaka wonke ngoba nilokhu nithi nizowucisha kuyoze kube kusasa, sikhathele B%#*&.”Sakmen @SakmenSA uthe: “Nithi ukucinywa kukagesi kuzoqala ngo-8 ekuseni namhlanje (izolo), kodwa eSoshanguve kusukela izolo ebusuku ugesi awukho, namanje ekuseni awukho. Le nto yokucinywa kukagesi ilethelwe ukuzohlukumeza thina amalokishini.”USolomon Ngomane @ngomane_solomon uthe: “UCyril (Ramaphosa), waqamba amanga wathi ngeke ucinywe ugesi phakathi kuka-Disemba 17, 2019 noJanuwari 13. Ngicabanga ukuthi kumele axoshwe manje uPravin (Gordhan).”Esitatimendeni, abakwa-Eskom baqhube bathi, sekulungisiwe obekuyinkinga kwisiphehlimandla saseMedupi, kodwa basadinga ukubuyisela isimo kwesijwayelekile.“Ithimba lethu liyaqhubeka nokusebenza kanzima. Ngenxa yokungalungiswa kwezinto eminyakeni edlule, isimo singaphansi kwengcindezi. Sifisa ukukhumbuza amakhasimende ethu ukuthi ukucishwa kukagesi kuyalawulwa ukuze sizoqinisekisa ukuthi okoni izinto eziningi,” kusho abakwa-Eskom.
title: Bashiye abangalazi i-Eskom icisha ugesi

text: BAJABULE abesizwe sabaThembu ngemuva kokudedelwa ejele kweKumkani yabo, uBuyelekhaya Dalindyebo. Bathi bebengakulindele futhi okwenzekile, ukuboshwa kwenkosi kumele kungaphinde kwenzeke kuleli.IKumkani idedelwe ngeSonto ngemuva kokudonsa iminyaka emine yesigwebo sayo seminyaka engu-12.Okhulumela iKumkani, uMntwana Mthunzi Ngonyama uthe nakuba zisezintsha izindaba zokudedelwa kweKumkani kodwa isizwe sijabule kakhulu.Umntwana uthe bebengakulindele ngoba kade babezama ukuyikhipha ejele iKumkani, kungenzeki.“Sijabulile. Ubuye ephila ejele. Kube wuhambo olude futhi olunzima oluholele ekukhululweni kwakhe ejele.Ukudedelwa kwakhe kuzoletha uzinzo ebukhosini besizwe sabaThembu. Kwaba yihlazo ukuboshwa kweKumkani eNingizimu Afrika. Ingaphinde yenzeke into efuze lena. Kumele kuchitshiyelwe umthethosivivinywa omayelana nezinkantolo zobuholi bomdabu ozozinika amandla ukuze zikwazi ukuzithathela izinqumo ngokwazo ngezinto ezithinta isizwe,” kusho uMntwana uNgonyama.Uthe ubenondlunkulu weKumkani ngesikhathi ikhululwa ejele.“Kuyithintile iKumkani ukukhululwa kwayo. Ibishaqekile futhi ijabule kakhulu. Umoya wayo ukhululekile ukuthi ekugcineni ikhululiwe,” kusho umntwana.Uqhube wathi basazodalula izinhlelo mayelana nokubuyiselwa esihlalweni sobukhosi kweKumkani. Isizwe sabaThembu sinxenxe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi axolele iKumkani ngokuthi kusulwe wonke amacala egwetshelwe wona.“IKumkani ibonga bonke abantu ababambe iqhaza ekukhululweni kwayo, kusukela emakhosini, uMengameli wezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa nabantu bonke ababenemikhankaso eminingi eholele ekutheni iphume ejele.Okwamanje iKumkani isadinga isikhathi nomndeni wayo. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi izokhuluma nesizwe ngokuzokwenzeka,” kusho umntwana.Ukudedelwa kweKumkani ejele kuze ngemuva kokuthi uMengameli Ramaphosa ngesonto eledlule ememezele ukuthi kuneziboshwa ezingu-14 000 ezishicilelwe izigwebo iKumkani ebe ngomunye wazo. Lezi ziboshwa zancishiselwa izigwebo ngezinyanga ezingu-12.IKumkani yayingene ejele ngoDisemba 31, 2015 ngecala lokuthumba, amathathu okulimaza, amathathu okuthungela ngomlilo, elokubulala ngokungenhloso nelokuphazamisa ukusebenza komthetho.Umntwana uthe maduze kuzoba nomcimbi wokugezwa kweKumkani. “Sizomemezela ngezinhlela zawo. Simema wonke amakhosi ukuthi abe nathi kulo mcimbi.”Okhulumela uMnyango wezobuLungiswa nokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo, uMnuz Chrispin Phiri uthe iKumkani ikhululwe ngoshwele owejwayelekile.Uthe idonse ikota yesigwebo sayo ejele futhi iziphathe kahle, okwenze yakhululwa.Mayelana nokudedelwa ngoshwele ejele kwesishoshovu esaboshwa, sagwetshwa silwela imfundo yamahhala i#Fees Must Fall, uKanya Cekeshe, uPhiri uthe ibhodi elicubungula izicelo zeziboshwa ezicele ukukhululwa ngoshwele liyasicubungula isicelo saso nezezinye iziboshwa.Usihlalo wendlu yabaThembu kuleli, uMnuz Vusi Mvelase uthe babukeleka phansi beyisizwe ngokuboshwa kwenkosi yabo, okwabehlisa isithunzi.Ubonge uRamaphosa, inkosi ebambe isihlalo sobukhosi sabaThembu, * -Azenathi Dalindyebo, iContralesa, inkosi yamaXhosa esanda kukhothama uZwelonke Sigcawu, nabantu bakuleli.
title: Injabulo kuBuyelekhaya iKumkani

text: ABAHOLI bakahulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal bavakashele eSikhaleni, emndenini wowesilisa odutshulwe washona ngamaphoyisa eHonolulu, eHawaii, e-United States of America (USA), ngesonto eledlule.UMqondisi Jikelele waKwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Nonhlanhla Mkhize neMeya yaseMhlathuze uMnuz Mduduzi Mhlongo, baye kobhonga emswaneni emndenini kaMnuz Lindani Myeni (29), izolo.Amaphoyisa aseHonolulu athi uMyeni udutshulwe ngemva kokuba nengxabano namaphoyisa amathathu ayezombopha ngemva kokubikwa ngothile njengomuntu obezogqekeza. Azithethelela ngokuthi ayezivikela kowesilisa owayenodlame kuwona.UDkt Mkhize uye kulo mndeni ngokomyalelo kaNdunankulu, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala.UZikalala uthe uhulumeni usebenza ngokubambisana nomndeni noMnyango wezobuDlelwano namanye amaZwe ngenhloso yokulanda isidumbu sikaMyeni, e-USA. “Siwuhulumeni wesifundazwe sinethemba lokuthi buzokwenziwa ubulungiswa ngokuthi kuboshwe ababulali bakaMyeni nabobonke abathintekayo ngokushesha. Sijube umqondisi jikelele ukuba axhumane nomndeni ukuze siweseke ngokudingayo,” kusho uZikalala. UMhlongo udlulise amazwi enduduzo ewabhekise kulo mndeni wasehamba emazwini kaZikalala, ethi bafuna kwenzeke ubulungiswa.“Asifuni ukuqagela ngokwaholela ekudutshulweni kukaMyeni kodwa sifuna amaphoyisa nezinhlaka ezifanele balekelele umndeni uthole iqiniso futhi kuboshwe abasolwa ngokushesha,” kusho uMhlongo.Uthe bazolulandelela lolu daba futhi bafake isandla, baxhase umndeni ngokudingayo.
title: Ubuholi buvakashele umndeni wobulawe e-USA

text: I-NFP ifuna luphenywe woKlebe udaba lokulahleka kwemali yeqembu enguR1.2 million, okuthiwa ikhwabaniswe phakathi kukaDisemba 2019 noJanuwari 2020.Isolezwe ngeSonto lithole ukuthi kunecala elivulelwe abaholi ababili abaqavile eqenjini ngokuduka kwale mali okuthiwa ngeyeqembu. Kuke kwavela kaningi ukuthi iNFP inezinkinga zemali futhi ibhekene nezikweletu kodwa yona yathembisa ukuthi iyasilungisa isimo.UNobhala -Jikelele weNFP uMnuz Canaan Mdletshe uthi kunemali yeqembu engaqondakali ukuthi yenzeni futhi bavule icala ukuze baphendule labo ababethenjwe ngemali yeqembu."Kunombiko wekomidi lethu lezimali okhomba ukuthi kufanele sixhumane noKlebe ngoba kufanele siphenye sijule, sihlehle sifike ku-2014. Siyazi ukuthi bekukhokhelwa abacwaningimabhuku ukuba bahlolisise amabhuku. Imali besiyithola ePhalamende, kwi-IEC nasesiShayamthetho, sifuna konke kuhlale obala ngoba le mali ngeyabakhokhi bentela,’’ kusho uMdletshe.Uthe imali akufanele ibhubhudlwe kudliwe inyama echwachwabisiwe namawayini ekubeni kungeyabakhokhi bentela.UMdletshe uthe sebelivulile icala emaphoyiseni banethemba lokuthi azosebenza ngendlela egculisayo ukuze bathole iqiniso.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi likhona icala eliphenywayo." Amaphoyisa aseMbilo aphenya icala lokukhwabanisa. Kuthiwa phakathi kukaDisemba 2019 kuya kuJauwari 2020 kwakhwatshaniswa imali enguR1.2 million uphenyo lusaqhubeka ,’’ kusho uColonel uMbele.Kuvela indaba yemali nje, iNFP isanda kukhomba indlela abaholi ababili ibasola ngokungaziphathi kahle. Phezu kwakho konke lokho kunodaba olusenkantolo ngobuholi beqembu. Kunamalungu amangalele iqembu akhala ngengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi, ehlale Olundi ngoDisemba odlule. Leyo ngqungquthela yabuyisela uNkk Zanele kaMagwaza- Msibi kwesokuba wumengameli weqembu, kwathathwa nesinqumo sokuthi aqhubeke nokuhola kuze kulamule igodi. Amalungu athi ingqungquthela ayihambanga kahle futhi yayingekho emthethweni, udaba kulindeleke ukuthi lungene ngasekupheleni kwenyanga ezayo eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu.
title: Bafuna oKlebe baphenyengemali enyamalele

text: BAZOHLOMULA ngokungafani abemboni yamatekisi esikhwameni i-Independent Relief Fund for Taxi Industry esisungulwe ukubanxephezela ngokulahlekelwa yimali njengoba kuvalwe izwe.Isikhwama esithulwe ngokusemthethweni ngoLwesibili yinhlangano yabamatekisi iSouth African National Taxi Council (Santaco), kulindeke ukuthi kuhlomule kuso abashayeli nabasizi babo, osomatekisi nezimenenja zasemarenki.Okhulumela inhlangano kuzwelonke uMnuz Thabisho Molelekwa, uthe imali izokhishwa kanye.“Ngokuvalwa kwezwe, imboni yezokuthutha ilahlekelwa imali ebalelwa kuR25 million ezweni lonke. Siqoke inkampani yabacwaningi mabhuku iSekelaXabiso Internal Audit Consultancy ukuthi kube iyona ezokwengamela lesi sikhwama,” kusho uMolelekwa.Esithangamini sabezindaba eGoli uMengameli weSantaco uMnuz Phillip Taaibosch usikaze ukuthi umshayeli angakhokhokhelwa imali engaba u-R250 ngosuku kulezi zinsuku ezingu-21 zokuvalwa kwezwe kodwa uMolelekwa ekhuluma neSolezwe ugcizelele ukuthi imali izohluka njengoba abashayeli bamatekisi abahamba amabanga amafishane kukhona abebekucosha okuncane ukuqhathanisa nabamabanga amade bona abaduve emakhaya.Kuhlongozwa ukuthi imali ezokhishwa ibe ngu R3.5 billion.“Sesinxuse osomabhizinisi neminyango kahulumeni ukuthi iphonse esivivaneni. Sezikhona izinkampani ezimbili esezikhombise ugqozi lokufaka imali kulesi sikhwama kodwa isivumelwano nazo besingakasayinwa.”Uthe uma seluqalile uhlelo lokufakwa kwezicelo, amafomu azotholakala kwi-website yenhlangano noma bafake izicelo ngokushayela kuma-call centre enhlangano noma basebenzise iWhatsApp. Imininingwane ephelele izomenyezelwa uma sekumele kufakwe izicelo. Uqinisekise ukuthi bazosebenzisana nomnyango wezaseKhaya ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imininingwane kamazisi umuntu ayithumelayo iyiqiniso.
title: Izinhlelo zokunxephezela abemboni yamatekisi

text:
UZIQHATHE nolaka lwabesifazane uMengameli we-African National Congress Women's League (ANCWL) uNkk Bathabile Dlamini ngokugqoka umfaniswano weqembu lezepolitiki kwimashi yokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane eSandton eGoli ngoLwesihlanu.Le mashi ehlelwe yizinhlangano ezahlukene ezilwela amalungelo abesifazane kuleli ilandela ukubulawa nokudlwengulwa kwabantu besifazane okusabalale ezweni lonkana. Umfundi waseUniversity of Cape Town uNkz Uyinene Mrwetyana wadlwengulwa wabulawa ngumsebenzi wasePosini emasontweni amabili edlule. Ngemuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokubulawa kuka-Uyinene abantu bakuleli bagxile nakwezinye izigameko zakamuva zokudlwengulwa nokubulawa kwabesifazane kuleli. UDlamini nabanye be-ANCWL bebeyingxenye yeqoqo labesifazane eligasele eJohannesburg Stock Exchange eSandton entathakusa ukuyolwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane.Ukugqokwa kwemifaniswano yeqembu le-ANCWL akwehlanga kahle kubantu besifazane abahambele lemashi nokuze kwaholela ekutheni basole uDlamini ngokukhankasela iqembu lakhe ekubeni imashi ingeyokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane. Ngesikhathi befika oDlamini nabe-ANCWL eJSE, iqoqo ebelidinwe ligane unwabu limemeze lathi: "Khwezi! Khwezi!" likhumbuza laba baholi ukuthi babeseka owayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngesikhathi ebhekene necala lokudlwengula uNksz Khwezekile Kuzwayo. Ngesikhathi uZuma ebhekene naleli cala, uDlamini wakhombisa ukumeseka nokwabacasula kakhulu abesifazane bakuleli, bemsola ngokweseka umsolwa kunomgilwa. UZuma waphuma phambili kuleli cala.Kwivideo esabalale enkundleni uTwitter, uVirginia Magwaza wenhlangano elwela amalungelo abantu abathandana nobulili obubodwa i-Other Foundation ugxeke uDlamini ngokugqoka umfaniswano wezepolitiki."Angeke ngikwazi ukumasha nokhongolose ngoba uyena wonke osifake kulolu bishi esikulo. Le mashi akuyona eyeqembu, asiwafuni amaqembu epolitiki la," kusho uMagwaza.%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/SandtonShutdown?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#SandtonShutdown
#AmINext
#PayPatriarchyTax

title: #SandtonShutdown: Imbibizane kuBathabile Dlamini ne-ANCWL bejoyina imashi

text: ZANELE MSOMIIZINHLANGANO ezilwela amalungelo nokuvikelwa kwabesifazane zihlukene ngemibono ngesenzo sikaMengameli Jacob Zuma sokuphumela obala ngokudlwengulwa komunye wamakhosikazi akhe.NgoMsombuluko uZuma uphumele obala okokuqala esithangamini nabezindaba ngokudlwengula kukankosikazi angamdalulanga, athe kwenzeka eminyakeni engu-10 eyedlule.Ubephawula ngombiko woMvikeli woMphakathi wokuqiniswa kwezokuphepha komuzi wakhe eNkandla kanti ukuveza eyokudlwengulwa ubegcizelela isidingo sokuqinisa ezokuphepha.Yize engalidalulanga igama likankosikazi owadlwengulwa kodwa kuyaziwa ukuthi ubani unkosikazi wakhe owayehlala eNkandla ngesikhathi uZuma esanguNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha esifundazweni.Lolu daba lwabikwa phambilini kwabezindaba njengoba abasolwa abane baboshwa ngo-2001 ngesigameko esenzeka ngo-1999.ICommission for Gender Equality (CGE) ikushayele ihlombe ukuphumela obala kukaMengameli yathi kuzogqugquzela nabesifazane abesabayo ukubika ngokuhlukumezeka.UMnuz Javu Baloyi, okhulumela i-CGE, uthe lokhu kufakazela ukuthi ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane akukhethi.“Siyakholwa wukuthi lesi sitatimende esenziwe ngumengameli sizosiza ekuxwayiseni umphakathi ngenkinga izwe elibhekene nayo ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane. Wenze kahle avezele umphakathi ngoba ukudlwengulwa akuyona into okumele ifihlwe ngoba isithinta sonke,” usho kanje.UBaloyi uthe akuthusi ukukhuluma kukaZuma ngalolu daba ngoba uhulumeni wakhe uzama ngayo yonke indlela ukuqinisa imithetho yokuvikela abesifazane.ISonke Gender Justice Network okuyinhlangano yabesilisa egqugquzela ukuvikela ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane ishaye amakhala ngesenzo sikaMengameli.Le nhlangano ithe yize bekugqugquzela ukuthi izisulu zokudlwengulwa zikhulume ngakho, kushiya imibuzo ukuthi kungani uZuma akudalule manje.Ephawula ephephandabeni lesiNgisi lansuku zonke uMnuz Desmond Lesejane okhulumela le nhlangano usole ukuthi uMengameli ukhulume ngoba udaba lwaseNkandla selufake kakhulu ipolitiki.“Kungani akhulume manje emuva kwaso sonke lesi sikhathi? Uma umuntu ekhuluma ngalolu daba bekulindeleke ukuthi kube nozwelo.Kuyadingeka sazi nokuthi uMaKhumalo walulekwa yini emuva kwalesi sigameko,” kusho yena.ULesejane uthe yize bekuncoma ukuthi uMengameli ukukhathalele ukuvikela umndeni wakhe kodwa ngeke baphumule bonke abesifazane bakuleli bengakavikeleki ekuhlukunyezweni.Ngokujwayelekile kuba yisinqumo sodlwenguliwe ukuphumela obala yingakho kuthusile ukuthi uZuma azikhulumele ngokudlwengula komkakhe.
title: Ihlukene imibono ngokuphumela obala kukaZuma ngokudlwengulwa komkakhe

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane, akasafuni ukuyikhuluma esidlangaleni indaba kaKhama Billiat omataniswa nezakhe.Sekusabalele imibiko eveza ukuthi uMosimane ufuna isikhwishikhwishi saMakhosi uBilliat, obedlalela iSundowns eminyakeni edlule, washiya sekuphele inkontileka yakhe ngasekuqaleni kwesizini edlule.UMosimane kuthiwa ukhala ngokuthi ukube uBilliat ubekhona kwezakhe ngesizini edlule, ubezosheshe asinqobe isicoco se-Absa Premiership, ubengeke alinde umdlalo wokugcina njengoba amaBrazilians esinqobe sekuvalwe amehlo lesi sicoco eshaya iFree State Stars ngo 1-0 emdlalweni wokugcina weligi.NakwiCAF Champions League, ezikaMosimane ziphume emlenzeni wesibili owandulela owamanqamu. Abazazi zonke bathi uMosimane ukholelwa wukuthi ukube ubekhona uBilliat, bebezofika qathatha kowamanqamu ngenxa yokuthi lo mdlali waseZimbabwe ushaya amagoli aphinde avulele izikhala ozakwabo ukuba bavalele amagoli okuyinto akhala ngokuthi iyashoda kwezakhe.Ngemuva kokudlala ngokulingana kwaBafana Ba Style neChippa United ngoLwesithathu ebusuku, uMosimane uzikhiphile endabeni kaBilliat, ethi uhlonipha Amakhosi.“Angifuni kube sengathi angihloniphi, ngikhuluma ngabadlali bamanye amaqembu. Kubalulekile ukuthi ngiyazi indawo yami, ngicophelele ngoba ngingangena enkingeni ukukhuluma ngomdlali welinye iqembu. Ofuna ukwazi ukuthi siyaxoxisana yini neChiefs ngoBilliat, ngisacela abuze abaphathi beSundowns. Angiyona iSundowns mina, ngingumqeqeshi kwaphela,” usho kanje uMosimane etshela izintatheli ePort Elizabeth ngemva kokudlala ngokulingana kuba ngu 1-1 phakathi kwezakhe neChippa.Ukhuluma kanjena nje uMosimane, kungenzeka ukuba ufunde isitatimende seChiefs ebesichitha imibiko yokuthi iSundowns iyaxoxisana nabo ngoBilliat.“UBilliat uzinikele kwiChiefs alikho iqembu azolijoyina,” sisho kanje isitatimende seChiefs nalapho isabise khona ngokuthatha izinyathelo zomthetho nxa kuhubhuzwa amanga ngabadlali bayo.Ngokwemibiko iSundowns inunusela iChiefs ngoR15 million nabadlali abathathu, akucaci noma izokhetha oyedwa kubona noma izobathatha bonke.Phakathi kwabadlali okuvela ukuthi kungenzeka kushintshwane ngabo ukuze uBilliat abuyele eChloorkop, kubalwa * -Aubrey Ngoma, Lucky Mohomi noJeremy Brockie.Imidlalo yeMTN 8:Kusasa: Cape Town City FC v Polokwane City (Newlands Stadium, 3pm); Orlando Pirates v Highlands Park (Orlando Stadium, 6pm); Mamelodi Sundowns v Bloemfontein Celtic(Lucas Moripe Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Bidvest Wits v SuperSport United (Bidvest Stadium, 3pm).
title: UPitso uthi akasezuyikhuluma ekaBilliat

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZIEseGoliI SETHENJWA somgadli eqenjini lika-Under 20, uPule Maraisane, sithi sifuna ukulandela uBenni McCarthy osahamba phambili ngokuhlohlwa kwamagoli kuBafana Bafana.Lo mdlali, ogijima kuSecond Division ePortugal, kuTourezense, uthe naye usafuna ukudlalela iqembu elikhulu lasePortugal bese enqoba nalo iChampions League njengoba kwenza uMcCarthy ne-FC Porto.UMaraisane oneminyaka engu-20, nobegijima kuStars of Africa Academy ngaphambi kokuya ePortugal, usanda kunqoba iCommonwealth Cup, eRussia naMajita.Usenconywe kakhulu ngabalandeli bebhola ngisho nomqeqeshi wakhe abebehambe naye baya eRussia, uDavid Notoane, obize lo mfana osemncane ngoMessi waseNingizimu Afrika.UNotoane uthe asikho isidingo sokuthi sincome oMessi noRonaldo bangaphandle sibe sinabo abethu emalokishini nasezindaweni zasemakhaya.Lo mdlali uqokwe njengomgali ovelele njengoba ehlohle amagoli amathathu eRussia. Elokugcina ulishaye bedlala neFinland kowamanqamu benqoba ngo 2-1.“Ngingathanda ukuthi ngifane noBenni ngelinye ilanga. Ungomunye wabadlali engikhule ngibukela kubona. Nami ngingathanda ukuthi ngibe nendondo yeChampions League kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi ukuze ngiphumelele kulokho kuzofanele ngidlalele elinye lamaqembu amakhulu ePortugal, okubalwa kuwona yona i-FC Porto neSporting Lisbon. Ngiyazi ngeke kube lula kodwa ngingathanda ukuthi ngikwenze lokho,” kusho uMaraisane.Uthe manje amehlo abo asebheke kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ezodlalelwa eCanada ngasekupheleni konyaka yabangaphansi kweminyaka engu-20.“Ngemuva kokunqoba kwethu le midlalo ebiseRussia angingabazi ukuthi sizokwenza kahle nasemidlalweni yeCaf Youth Championship ezodlalelwa eSenegal ngoMashi. Kuzofanele silwele ukuthi siqede namaqembu amathathu azoya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika sizobenza ukuthi baziqhenye ngathi eSenegal ngoba sizoya khona nomqondo wokunqoba izindebe nokuyinto emqoka kithina njengabadlali baleli qembu,” kusho uMaraisane.Uthe ukwazana nokudlala isikhathi eside ndawonye yikona okusize iqembu eRussia.“Sesiyazana thina njengabadlali njengoba besisonke isikhathi eside. Bekungelula sibizwa ngezinkawu kodwa sazitshela ukuthi lapha sizele ukuzosebenza. Nokubanda kuleya ndawo bekusehlula thina. Kubonakele ngomdlalo wethu wokuqala nalapho sashaywa khona yiQatar. Kodwa ngajabula sikhuza ibuya sinikeza inkinga ababedlala nathi ngemuva kwalowo mdlalo. Lo mqhudelwano bekuyimidlalo emihle ezosisiza kakhulu ukuthi sidlondlobale kwesikwenzayo njengabadlali abasebancane.”UNotoane uthe ikusasa lalo mdlali lihle kakhulu uma engaqhubeka nokungaziphakamisi. “Ngijabulile ngaye, uzoya kude akukho angeke akwazi ukukwenza ngoba uyazethemba. Uyaluhlakaza udonga lwabadlali basemuva esisuke sidlala nabo. Ukwenza kungabi ngumsebenzi onzima,” kusho uNotoane.
title: UMaraisane ufuna ukulandela uMcCarthy

text: AKAKHETHILE ukuthi yiliphi iqembu azogijima kulo ngesizini ezayo inqobo nje uma kuzoba yiqembu laKwaZulu-Natal u-Ayanda Gcaba ochithwe i-Orlando Pirates.UGcaba uphumele obala okokuqala wathi usefuna ukugijimela iqembu laseKZN elikwi-Absa Premiership ngesizini ezoqala ka-2018/19.Uthe imibiko ethi engase esayine kuMaZulu FC ngeke aphawule ngayo.UGcaba, odabuka ePort Shepstone, uzophelelwa yinkontileka nePirates ekupheleni kwenyanga. IPirates isishilo ukuthi ngeke isamdinga ngesizini ezayo. Okunye okuvele kwacacisa bha ukuthi eziMnyama zakha kabusha, wukusayina abadlali abayisishiyagalolunye okubalwa kubona uBrilliant Khuzwayo, Vincent Pule, Ben Motshwari, Meshack Maphangule, Asavela Mbekile, Linda Mntambo, Abel Mabaso, Paseka Mako noKudakwashe Mahachi.UGcaba, ofike kwiPirates ngo-2012, uthe nakuba kuzwela ukuthi useyashiya kwiBucs kodwa angakujabulela ukuthi agijime emaqenjini aseKZN.“Eqinisweni mina ngingadlala noma kukuphi inqobo nje uma kuyiqembu laseKZN. Anginankinga neMaritzburg United, AmaZulu FC noma iLamontville Golden Arrows. Ngibona sekuyisikhathi sokuba ngizodlala ekhaya,” kusho uGcaba oke wagijima kwiFree State Stars.Uthe iPirates iyohlale isenhleziyweni yakhe ngoba imkhulisile kunobhutshuzwayo. Ufike kowamanqamu kabili neBucs emiqhudelwaneni yeCaf iChampions League ngesikhathi becijwa nguRoger De Sa ngo-2013 nakwiCaf Confederations Cup bwcijwa ngu-Eric Tinklerngo-2015.“Sisebenze kahle kakhulu no-de Sa kanye noTinkler. Engikuthanda kakhulu ngabo wukuthi bebekholelwa kithina njengabadlali nobekusifaka umfutho wokuba sizibongele kubona ngokushaya into ecokeme. Ngiye kwiPirates ngingakaze ngiphumele ngaphandle kwaseNingizimu Afrika ngakho lokho ngeke ngikukhohlwe,” kusho uGcaba.Uqhube wathi akananxa nomqeqeshi wePirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, nephini lakhe, uRhulani Mokwena, nakuba ekhuhle ibhentshi ngaphansi kwabo nokuholele ekutheni agcine ebolekisiwe kwiPlatinum Stars.“Anginanxa nabo nakancane. Ukuhlala ebhentshini ngamahlala khona uma ungumdlali ayikho into entsha kulokho. Kuphela nje okungisalele ukuba ngikhombise ukuthi ngingumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu eqenjini engizodlala kulona,” kusho uGcaba othe imenenja yakhe, uMike Makaab wePro Sport International, imatasa imzamela iqembu elisha azogijima kulo.
title: UGcaba ufuna ukudlala kunoma yiliphi laseKZN

text: SEKUQUBUKE izinsolo zokuthi kuneziguli ezigonqe esibhedlela saseThekwini ezihaqwe wubhubhane iCovid-19, okuthiwa zibhuqwa yindlala. Lezi zinsolo zivezwe ngoyilungu le-IFP omele ikomiti lezempilo esiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Ncamisile Nkwanyana.Leli qembu seliphonsele inselelo uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, ukuthi aphenye ngalezi zinsolo ezibhekiswe esibhedlela i-Addington.UNkk Nkwanyana uthe sekukaningi ethola izingcingo ezigulini ezilaliswe esibhedlela i-Addington, zikhala ngendlala.“Ngithole izingcingo ngitshelwa ukuthi kuneziguli ezingasidlanga isidlo sasekuseni, ezinye zithole iphalishi kuphela. Kuthe uma ngithinta ababhekele iziguli ezigonqile kulesi sibhedlela, bavuma ukuthi kukhona ezithole iphalishi kuphela kanti ezinye azilitholanga ngoba kunenkinga yokushoda kokudla. Ngiyazibuza ukuthi ingabe sekunesikhathi esingakanani kungekho ukudla okwanele kulesi sibhedlela njengoba kuthiwa inkampani ekulethayo iyashodelwa,” kusho uNkk Nkwanyana.Uthe kuyathusa ukuthi abaphathi balesi sibhedlela bathule bathini ngalokhu.“Sinxusa ungqongqoshe wezempilo ukuthi aphenye ngokushesha ngalolu daba. Kumele atshele umphakathi ukuthi yiziphi izinhlelo anazo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iziguli ezigonqile kulesi sibhedlela ziyakuthola ukudla nsuku zonke,” kusho yena.UNkk Nkwanyana uthe uphenyo lukangqongqoshe kumele luveze ukuthi inkampani eletha ukudla kulesi sibhedlela iyona yini enenkinga. Ukhale nangokuthi sekukaningi kunezinto ezingahambi kahle kulesi sibhedlela, okukhombisa ukuthi abaphathi bakhona babudedengu.Uthe uma kuyinkampani eletha ukudla enenkinga kumele ichithwe kufunwe enye noma kuthathelwe izinyathelo abaphathi base-Addington uma benephutha. Akukona okokuqala esifundazweni ukuthi kuvele izinsolo zezinkinga zokudla kwabagonqile ezibhedlela.Ngo-Ephreli kwavela ukuthi iziguli ezigonqe esibhedlela iClairwood eThekwini, zikhala ngokudla okonakele. Ezinye zalezi ziguli zabhala nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana ziveza izithombe zokudla osekonakele.Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba uMnyango wezeMpilo esifundazweni uthe usalinde umbiko e-Addington, okuze kwashicilelwa ungaphendulanga.
title: Bafuna uphenyo ngokulamba kwabagonqile  e-Addington

text: INKAMPANI yemikhumbi izoqeqesha intsha engaphezu kuka-5 000 yakuleli, ukuyivulela amathuba okusebenza emhlabeni jikelele.IShosholoza Ocean Academy esungulwe yiMSC Cruises, izoqala ngoNovemba ukuthatha intsha ezoqeqeshwa izinyanga ezintathu. Lokhu kuvele izolo ngesikhathi izikhulu zale nkampani zethula izinhlelo ngokukhula kwebhizinisi layo kuleli.Le ntsha izoqeqeshwa kulesi sikhungo esizoba yingxenye yeDurban Cruise Terminal eyakhiwa echwebeni laseThekwini.OyiManaging Director yeMSC kuleli, uMnuz Ross Volk, uthe lolu hlelo luzodonsa iminyaka eyisihlanu. “Lena kungenye yezindlela zokusabela kwikhwelo elishaywe uMengameli uRamaphosa (Cyril) ukuthi kuvulwe amathuba omsebenzi entsheni. Sizochitha imali engaphezu kukaR5 billion ukuqasha le ntsha. Asizobaphoqa asebeqeqeshiwe ukuthi baqhubeke nokusebenza nathi emuva kwalezi zinyanga eziyisikhombisa, abanye bangathanda ukubuyela kuleli nesipiliyoni bayosebenza emahhotela,” echaza.UVolk uchaze nangeDurban Cruise Terminal okwamenyezelwa ukwakhiwa kwayo ngo-2017. Uthe okwenza kuthathe isikhathi ukuthi iqale ukwakhiwa ukuthi bafuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isezingeni elifanele. Uveze ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwayo kuzovula amathuba omsebenzi alinganiselwa ku-10 000, kuchithwe uR3 million ekuqeqesheni intsha. Le ndawo kulindeleke ukuthi iqede ukwakhiwa ngo-2021.Okunye okuzojabulisa abathandi bezokuvakasha kuleli ukuthi ngoNovemba kuzokwethulwa omunye umkhumbi. I-MSC Grandiosa izoba nezindawo zokujabulisa izingane nemindeni.UVolk uthe nezinga lezobuchwepheshe liphezulu njengoba izivakashi kulo mkhumbi zizofakwa ibhangele elenza ukuthi zazi ukuthi elinye ilungu lomndeni likuphi emkhunjini. Uthe lokhu kungezinye zezindlela zokuqinisa ezokuphepha emkhunjini. Ngaphandle kokuvula amathuba omsebenzi, iMSC isisungule nenhlangano esiza ukuthuthukisa umkhakha wezokuvakasha nezamachweba. Uthe okukhinyabeza ezokuvakasha ngemikhumbi yabo kwabakuleli, izinkinga zokuthola amaPassport nezitifiketi ezintsha zezingane. Uthe sebenohlelo lokulwa nale nkinga, ingxenye yalo okuwukuba nemikhumbi ezozungeza izindawo ezingadingi lawa maphepha.UMnuz Angelo Capurro oyi-Executive Director kwaMSCS, uthembise ukuthi miningi imikhumbi esazokwethulwa kuze kushaye * -2027. Uveze nokuthi isibalo sezivakashi zabo kuleli sikhule ngo-51% kusukela ngo-2015. I-MSC isinemikhumbi engu-16 ehambela amadolobha angu-155 emhlabeni, nabasebenzi abangaphezu kuka-70 000.
title: Inkampani yemikhumbi izoqeqesha intsha

text: Sithembiso MkhizeOWAYENGUKAPUTENI weBafana Bafana, uLucas “Rhoo” Radebe uqala amalungiselelo okukwazi ukungenela ukhetho lobumengameli beSafa okulindeleke ukuthi lube ngo-2023.Le nkakha eyayingukaputeni weKaizer Chiefs ngaphambi kokuyothatha isikhundla esifanayo kwiLeeds United yase-England, ikuqinisekisile ukuthi isibheke ngabomvu isikhundla sikaDanny Jordaan sokwengamela iSafa. Iveze ukuthi sebewaqalile amalungiselelo okhetho ne-Local Football Association (LFA) yangakubo eDiepkloof, eSoweto ayilungu layo.“Ngeke ngithi sesiqale ukukhankasa kodwa simatasa ngamaqhinga angabeka ibhola lakuleli ezingeni lomhlaba. Ngalokhu kangisho ukuthi uboholi obukhona buyehluleka, empeleni benza kahle. Ikona nje ukuthi sekudingeka amasu amasha. Izinto ebholeni zishintshe kakhulu,” kubeka uRadebe.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi okhethweni luka-2018, lo makadebona owayengelinye lamasosha kaClive “The Dog” Barker anqoba i-Afcon ngo-1996, wakhishwa umthethosisekelo weSafa ophoqa abafuna ukungenela ukhetho ukuthi babe ngamalungu ama-LFA. Ngemuva kokuhoxa kukaRadebe no-Ace Ncobo owayengumompepe, uJordaan wakhethwa ngaphandle kokuphikiswa.Wayekhethwa ihlandla lesibili. Kwelokuqala, ngo-2013, wayengene esikhundleni sikaKirsten Nematendani.URadebe uthe ukholelwa ekutheni abadlali abadala kumele babe yingxenye yenhlangano ephethe ibhola kuleli ngoba babuqonda kahle ubunzima nobuhle bokuba senkundleni.“Ngikholelwa ekutheni ikakhulukazi abadlali abanqoba i-Afcon ngo-1996 sebekhule ngokwanele ngemiqondo ukuhola iSafa. Ngiyazi kulukhuni, akufani nokukhuluma kodwa uma sihlangene siyizinkakha singalibeka kwelinye izinga ibhola lakuleli.”URadebe owadlala iminyaka ewu-11 kwiLeeds, uveze ukuthi ufunde lukhulu ngokuphathwa kwebhola kuleli ngesikhathi esekomidini losomaqhinga eminyakeni edlule.Abanye abebekulo uFarouk Khan, Bhuti Mathathe, Anna Nyman, Neil Tovey noNatasha Tsichlas.Ngenyanga edlule, isigungu esiphezulu seSafa sibuyisele uRadebe kuleli komidi eliholwa nguJack Maluleka nesekela lakhe uBuddha Mathathe. Abanye abakulo uKhan, David Nyathi, Boebie Solomons, Sudesh Singh nomengameli weSA Football Coaches Association, uGreg Mashilo. UBrian Baloyi noFabian McCarthy bayingxenye yomnyango ohlanganise ezokumaketha nabezindaba.
title: URhoo ulungela ukuba ngumengameli weSafa

text: INHLANGANO i-EFF ijoyine abagxeka inkulumo yeNhloko yamaJaji kuleli uMogoeng Mogoeng, ebukeke yeseka uhulumeni wakwa-Israel.UMogoeng usegxijwe kakhulu ngakushilo engxoxweni ebibanjwe kwi-webnar yiJerusalem Post ne-chief rabbi yaseNingizimu Afrika, uWarren Goldstein.Inhloko yamajaji kuthiwa ithe izwe lashweba ithuba lokubhekana ngendlela enokulingana nodaba lwakwa-Israel nePalestine.Ugxekwe nayi-ANC nezinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo abantu ngoba zona zizwelana nabantu basePalestine.I-EFF ithe lokho akusilo iqiniso futhi yafuna kube nobumbano embhikishweni wokusekela ukushaywa indiva kwe-Israel. "Kufanee sihlangane sigxeke ukubuzwa kwenhloko yamajaji ngomkhankaso ngenxa yokuthi abantu abase-Afrika abenzanga into efanayo kubacindezeli. Lokho kuyabheda ngempela ngokomlando. Nanoma wubani onendaba nokuthi ingcindezelo nobandlululo kwaqedwa kanjani uzokwazi ukuthi kwaba wukungenelela kwabantu bangaphandle, okuhlanganisa imibhikisho nonswinyo,"kusho isitatimende saleli qembu.  "Ngabe akubanga bikho iNhloko yamajaji uMogoeng Mogoeng ophethe kwezomthetho kuleli uke leyo mibhikisho nonswinyo ekulweni nobandlululo akuzange kube khona." I-EFF inxuse uMogoeng ukuba ahoxise le nkulumo yakhe. Inhlangano elwela amalungelo abantu iBDS Coalition ifuna ikhomishini iphenye uMogoeng.
title: Bayanda abagxeka inkulumo yeNhloko yamaJaji kuleli

text: LUNGI LANGAU DIDEKILE owesifazane osekhulile waseMgababa, eMolweni othi useyikhangezwa esandleni imali yesibonelelo somzukulu (7) wakhe.UNkk Angeline Ndlela (58), uthi akasakwazi okumele akwenze mayelana nodaba lwesibonelelo somzukulu wakhe asesamukeliswa esandleni ngoba singena kumuntu ongahlali naye.UNkk Ndlela uthe inkinga yesibonelelo somzukulu wakhe iqale emuva kokuthi ebe nenkinga yokumnakekela wacela kosonhlakalahle basePinetwon ukuthi atholelwe indawo angagcinwa kuyo kuze kube uyakwazi ukumnakekela.“Umzukulu wami washiywa unina kimi, ngazama ukuhlala naye kodwa ngenxa yokuthi kwakunezinye izingane engangizinakekela ngacela osonhlalakahle ukuthi bangihlelele ukuthi athole ikhaya lapho enganakekelwa khona ngimthathe uma senginamandla. Inkinga enganginayo kakhulu wukuthi kwakunomunye umntwana engangimnakekela obelimele sengihluleka ukubanakekela bonke,” kuchaza uNkk Ndlela.Uthe osonhlalakahle bamhlelela ingane yathola umuntu owayezohlala nayo.Uthi umzukulu uhlale lapho isikhathi esingangeminyaka emibili wase ebuyiselwa kuyena ngoDisemba 2013.Uthe emuva kokuthi ebuyile ube esehlala naye okuthe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wazama ukumbhalisela imali yesondlo sikahulumeni wathola ukuthi vele uholelwa lapho ebehlala khona.“Ngathola ukuthi umama lo obehlala naye uyamholela. Ngithe uma ngixoxa nosonhlalakahle ngalolu daba bangitshela ukuthi imali kuzofanele ayihole bese eyiletha kimina ngoba ingane sengihlala nayo. Bathi kuzokwenzeka kanjalo kuze kube ingane ibuyiselwa ngaphansi kwami,” kusho uNkk Ndlela.Uqale ukusukumela lolu daba ngo-Okthoba nyakenye kodwa kuze kube manje uthi udaba alukalungi.Uthe ukhathazekile ngoba kusho ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uzongayitholi imali ngoba uze wadinga ukuba ayobika udaba lwakhe kwaSouth African Social Security (Sassa) ngoba engasayitholi imali.“Ufike ayikhiphe imali ayinike mina. Okungiphatha kabi ukuthi ngenyanga edlule uvele wathula. Ngimbuzile ukuthi kanti kwenzekeni ngemali wathi ivalekile. Ngibe sengiya kwaSassa ngathola ukuthi usayihola. Sengibuyela kuyena unginike ekaJanuwari neyale nyanga,” kusho uNkk Ndlela.Okhulumela uMnyango wezekuThuthukiswa koMphakathi uNksz Ncumisa Fandesi uthe akufanele imali yesibonelelo sengane ingene kumuntu ongahlali nayo.Uthe uNkk Ndlela makabuyele kobika kusonhlalakahle wathembisa ukuthi nabo bazolulandela.
title: Ukhala ngokukhangeza eyesibonelelo sengane

text: NGESIKHATHI iningi labantu lizijabulisa ezindaweni zokugcebeleka, izolo abazali basebenzise iholidi ukuze bayothengela izingane zabo umfaniswano wesikole.Isolezwe lihambele kwaGem Schoolwear osenkabeni yeTheku, kugcwele abazali nezingane ezizolinganisa umfaniswano wazo.Iningi labazali lithe alifuni ukuzithola selingena komashonisa liboleka imali yokuthenga imifaniswano, imali ebeyikhona selithenge ngayo izingubo zikaKhisimusi nezicoficofi zokuzijabulisa.UMnuz Nkosingiphile Ngcobo, uyise kaBusisani Ngcobo, ofunda * -grade 6 eNdimose Primary, eNdwedwe, uthe ngaphambi kokuthi athenge izingubo zikaKhisimusi noma ukudla uqala ngokuthenga umfaniswano wezingane zakhe ezine nezimbili zikamfowabo.UNgcobo ungomunye wabazali abebezothenga umfaniswano kwaGem Schoolwear, izolo.“Lapha ngizothengela abafana bami ababili umfaniswano. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngizosebenzisa uR2 500. Laba abanye ngizobathengela kwezinye izitolo ngoba owabo umfaniswano, izingubo ezimhlophe, azikho lapha. Ngizohamba ngiyozicosha kwezinye izitolo futhi azibizi. Ngihlele ukuthi ngizosebenzisa uR5000 ezimpahleni zesikole, kuzothi uma sengiqedile ngomfaniswano bese ngithenga izinto zokubajabulisa. Uma kushoda kuyoshoda zona,” kusho uNgcobo.UNksz Ncamisile Nsele waKwaBester ubezothengela indodakazi yakhe, uSlindile Mhlongo (13) ezofunda * -grade8 eJG Zuma.
