Uthe yonke iminyaka ngaphambi kokuthi athenge izinto zikaKhisimusi uqala ngomfaniswano.UNkk Beauty Khanyile waseNanda, unina kaNokwanda Khanyile (12), oyofunda * -grade 8 eMvaba High uthe umfaniswano uwuthenga ngoDisemba ngoba engafuni ukuthi uma imali isiphelile ayoboleka komashonisa.“Ngizosuka lapha ngiyothenga i-stationery. Uma sengiqedile sengizobona ukuthi ingakanani imali esele bese ngithenga izinto zokuzijabulisa nezingubo zikaKhisimusi. Angikwazi ukujabulela ukuthi ngithenge izingubo zikaKhisimusi okuwusuku olulodwa, ngiyeke ukuthenga umfaniswano ozogqokwa unyaka wonke,”UMnuz Muhammad Pandor, imenenja yakwaGem Schoolwear, uthe bayakukhuthaza ukuthi abazali bathenge umfaniswano ngaphambi kukaNcibijane, ukuze bathole konke abakudingayo.“Siyavula nangamaSonto, senzela ukuthi nabazali abasebenzayo bakwazi ukuzothenga. Uma abazali belinda kuze kudlule uNcibijane kumele balindele ukuthi kuzobe sekugcwele kakhulu, okwamanje kusagcwala ngezikhathi zekhefu ngoba abasebenzi abaningi basebenzisa leso sikhathi.“
title: Badele ukuzijabulisa bayothengela abafundi

text: UMASTER KG, ingoma yakhe ethakaselwa umhlaba wonke kulezi zinsuku, unxuse uhulumeni ukuthi abaxhase uma beyogqamisa izwe kwamanye amazwe.Lo mdidiyeli wenze ingoma ethi Jerusalema okucula kuyo uNomcebo Zikode, i-video yayo esanda kubukwa ngabantu abangaphezu kuka-50 million kuYoutube.“Kunabantu basemazweni aphesheya abafonayo abafuna ukuthi size khona. Sicela uxhaso kuhulumeni uma sihamba. Asikwazi ukuzenzela sisodwa ngaphandle kosizo,” kusho uMaster KG.Imenenja yakhe uMolau Rammala, ithe angaphezu kuka-60 amazwe afuna uMaster KG noNomcebo.Bakusho lokhu ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke, uNathi Mthethwa, enesithangami sokubahalalisela ebesibanjelwe online kwiMicrosoft Teams.UMthethwa uthe banohlelo lokuthatha amaciko akuleli bawayise kwamanye amazwe eyokhombisa ngethalente lawo khona bese nawakulawo mazwe eze kuleli.“Empeleni uhlelo olunjalo lugcine ngoDisemba e-Angola. Kuhambe amaciko ahlukene futhi sizobheka nezindlela esizosebenza ngazo nani, kumele silungise nje okuncane,” kusho uMthethwa.UMnyango wakhe ukuqinisekisile ukuthi nakanjani uzosebenza nala maciko ngoba agqamisa iNingizimu Afrika.UMaster KG uthe ukukholelwa emculweni wakhe futhi azame ukuwenza ube ngcono yikho okumenze waphumelela.“Ngaqala eTzaneen ukwenza isigubhu ngazama ukuzithuthukisa. Kuthe uma ngikhipha ingoma yami yokuqala iSkeleton Move ngawina izindondo eTexas kuma-Afrimma, eNigeria nezimbalwa lapha ekhaya. Yabukwa abantu abangu-23 million kuYoutube okuyilapho engaqala ukubona ukuthi kukhona into ekhona ngomculo waseLimpopo, kumele ngiwuthathe ngiwugcwalise umhlaba,” kusho uMaster KG.Uthe ngesikhathi besaqophe ingxenye yeJerusalema noNomcebo wenza i-video wayifaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kwaba nesasa kuyo le ngoma.“Ngambiza uNomcebo ngathi akabuye sizoqedela kwathi ngesonto lokuqala siyikhiphile yabukwa ngabantu abangu-1 million.”UNomcebo odabuka eHammarsdale, uthe ngesikhathi eqopha le ngoma wayengakhululekile emoyeni.“Yingakho ngithi indawo yami ayikho lapha. Nganginxusa uNkulunkulu ukuthi angithathe angise endaweni engcono ngoba izinto zazingangihambeli kahle emculweni.”
title: Bafuna uxhaso kuhulumeni abeJerusalem

text: SISALE dengwane isalukazi esishiselwe umjondolo eMalvern, eThekwini, okusolwa obeyisoka lendodakazi yaso.UNksz Mirriam Mfeka (74), waphuma ngesamagundane ngoMgqibelo ebusuku kusha amakamelo amabili omjondolo. Kulesi sehlakalo uNksz Mfeka ubelele nomzukulu oneminyaka eyisikhombisa abaleke naye. Usephila ngokulala komakhelwane njengoba engenandawo yokulala.UNksz Mfeka uthe okwenza asole obeyisoka lendodakazi yakhe wukuthi walibona ngaphambi kokuthi kushe umjondolo.“Kwakungu-1.30 ebusuku ngimbona esegcekeni. Wamemeza wathi angivale umnyango ngoba abangekho ngeke besabuya. Akuphelanga sikhathi ngezwa kuqhuma ngabona nentuthu endlini. Ngivuse umzukulu saphuma sabaleka, indlu yasala igqamuka amalangabi,” kuchaza yena.Uthe omakhelwane bazama ukucisha kodwa umlilo ubusungqongqisile. Uveze ukuthi umsolwa uyacanasa futhi uma esephuzile uyabatshela omakhelwane ukuthi nguye oshise indlu. Kuthiwa ubefuna ukumzwisa ubuhlungu uNksz Londi Magwaza (26) osemalile.UNksz Magwaza uthe naye ukholwa ukuthi obeyisoka lakhe oshisile.“Sekuphele izinyanga ezine sihlukene naye. Ubengishaya ngaze ngalaliswa esibhedlela. Angikaze ngimvulele amacala kodwa nganquma ukuhlukana naye ukuze ngibe nokuthula,” kusho yena.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant-Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe babikelwe ukuthi isigameko senzeke emijondolo yaseHuntley eMalvern.“Kuphenywa icala lokucekela phansi impahla, amaphoyisa asaphenya,” kusho uZwane.UNksz Sbo Nhlapho oyikhansela, uthe izolo bahambisele umndeni ukudla nezingubo zokulala. Uthe basazobona ukuthi bangasiza kanjani njengoba umndeni uswele nendawo yokulala.
title: Kusolwa obeyisoka lendodakazi ngokushiswa komjondolo

text: UMQEQESHI weBaroka FC esanda kudla isicoco seTelkom Knockout ngokushaya i-Orlando Pirates, uWedson Nyirenda, ukholelwa ekutheni kuwona wonke amaqembu amele iPremier Soccer League (PSL) emiqhudelwaneni yeCAF, iBucs iyona esethubeni elingcono.Lo mqeqeshi ukusho lokhu ngaphambi kokuthi iBucs iyeke ithuba lokuzithambisela ngesikhathi ibambana ne-African Stars yaseNamibia kowomlenze wokuqala ngempelasonto. Indlela iPirates eyakhe ngayo amathuba lapha kodwa angasebenza ishiye abaningi bengakholelwa ekutheni leli qembu lingabuyisa udumo lwango-1995 kodwa hhayi uNyirenda.“Ngiwumlandeli webhola lase-Afrika ngakho-ke ngiyibuka cishe yonke imidlalo esuke ikhonjiswa bukhoma. Ngiyazi ukuthi emaqenjini iNingizimu Afrika ewathumele kweyeCAF iPirates iyona enethuba elingcono. Iphekekile futhi uyayibona ngisho idlala ukuthi imiyalelo bayithatha injengoba injalo,” kusho uNyirenda.Lo mdlalo obuse-Orlando Stadium, iPirates ikhombisile ukuthi iphikwa yinhlanhla kuphela kodwa indlela yokudlala iqondile futhi nabadlali bakuqonda kahle kamhlophe okubhekwe kubona.Akujwayelekile ukuthi umqeqeshi afike ashaye iqembu kodwa ebe elitusa ngokuthi linawo amava okuqotha kwasani kwiCAF Champions League. IPirates ihamba neMamelodi Sundowns kwiChampions League bese kuba iKaizer Chiefs yona edlala kwiCAF Confederation Cup. IPirates idlale ngokulingana ne-African Stars kwathi iChiefs yazidlela amahlanga kwi-Elgeco Plus yaseMadagascar.“Alikho iqembu elikhombisa izimpawu zokuthi liqeqeshwa ngendlela ukwedlula iPirates. Ngenhlanhla umqeqeshi wayo (uMilutin Sredojevic) ungumngani wami. Indlela ahlangene ngayo nethimba lakhe akukho okunye engikubonayo ngaphandle kokuqotha i-Afrika yonke. Baqeqeshwe ngendlela abadlali bePirates futhi indlela abayithatha ngayo imiyalelo iyakhombisa ukuthi kwabona abadlali bacabanga ngendlela okufuna ngayo uMicho (Sredojevic) nethimba lakhe.“Kusukela ngifikile kuleli ezinyangeni ezinhlanu ezedlule, iPirates igqamile kimina yingakho ngiyithipha ukuthi ihambe ibanga elide kwiChampions League. Baqine nxa zonke futhi uma kukhona umdlali ongekho akuyona inkinga ngoba nalaba abasebhentshini bangena benze okufanayo. Ngenxa yalokhu ngiyabathipha ngoba konke abanakho izinongo zokucoboshisa kwasani kwiChampions League” kuphetha uNyirenda.
title: UNyirenda utusa iPirates kweyeCAF

text: KUBUKEKA sengathi iSouth African Football Association (Safa) ifuna ukumshaya ngekhadi elibomvu, engabe esazihlanganisa nonobhutshuzwayo lowo owayengunompempe ongabambi mshini kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL), u-Andile “Ace” Ncobo.Lokhu kungemuva kokuthi iSafa ixwayise uNcobo ngokuthi izombizela phambi kwekomiti layo eliqondisa ubugwegwe, imsola ngokudicilela phansi isithunzi senhlangano.Izolo uNcobo uthe ubengakayitholi incwadi embeka amacala. “Into engiyitholile wukusatshiswa okuvela esikhulwini esiphezulu singitshela ukuthi bahlela ukungibeka amacala futhi bafuna ngixoshwe. Ngemuva kwalokho kuqhamuke isitatimende esithunyelwe kwabezindaba esithi asahlanganiswa amacala engizobekwa wona. Ngisalindile ukuthola uhla lwamacala. Ngizobe sengiphawula uma sengilutholile,” kusho uNcobo.Okhulumela iSafa, uDominic Chimhavi, uqinisekisile ukuthi bahlanganisa amacala azobekwa wona uNcobo, ongaphansi kwesifunda seSafa, Amathole, e-Eastern Cape.UNcobo ube sematheni kusukela kwavela ukuthi ungomunye wabazobanga isikhundla sobumengameli beSafa noDanny Jordaan okunguyena oqhoqhobele izintambo njengamanje. UJordaan uthathe isikhundla sobumengameli ngemuva kokhetho lwango-2013. Ukhetho kwakumele lube ngoMashi 25 kodwa kwagcina kungenzekanga ngenxa yokuthi uNcobo wayelokhu eyiphela endlebeni esola iSafa ngokungalandeli imigomo yokhetho ngaphambi kokuthi lwenzeke.Muva nje iSafa iphinde yaba nomhlangano lapho kuvunyelwane ngokuthi ukhetho lobuholi obusha seluzoba ngoMeyi 29. Kulowo mhlangano kwavela ukuthi uNcobo waxolisa ngokugxibha iSafa esidlangalaleni. Nokho yena wakhipha isitatimende ekubiza ngamampunge aphindiwe ukuthi waxolisa.“Angisoze ngaxolisa ngokuba yimi. Ukuba yimina kuhlanganisa ukukhuluma nokuma kwengikholelwa kukho. Ngizoqhubeka nokuphawula uma ngibona lapho kwenzeka izinto ngendlela engafanele. Angikaze ngixolise, ngingasayiphathi ke eyokuxolisa kwiSafa njengenhlangano ngokuyidicilela phansi,” kusho uNcobo esitatimendeni ngesonto eledlule.Kubukeka sengathi uNcobo usefana nenunu engafi kwiSafa njengoba uChimhavi ethe kade ayekhuzwa kodwa alaleli.“Kumele abhekane nekomiti eliqondisa izigwegwe njengoba ubematasa ememeza kabi igama leSafa kwabezindaba nanoma yikuphi lapho ethanda khona. Uzobona ukuthi akudlalwa uma esebhekene namacala azobekwa wona,” kusho uChimhavi.Ebuzwa uChimhavi ukuthi ngabe indaba iqalwe wukuthi uNcobo asole iSafa ngokungalandeli imigomo yokhetho, uthe: “Kuningi nje akwenzile. Kade wayexwayiswa kodwa akalaleli. Sekuyisikhathi manje sokuthi abebhekane namacala akhe. Ukhulume kabi ngobuholi nangebhola. Isikhathi sokuthi umthetho usebenze.”Akacacisanga ukuthi luzoqedwa nini uhla lwamacala “kodwa khona kuzokwenzeka noma ngabe kuthatha isikhathi esingakanani”.
title: Ayipheli impi kaNcobo neSafa

text:
UNQGONGQOSHE wezeMfundo ePhakeme kuleli bekumele abeke umnqamulajuqu ocacisa ngokuthi isikhwama esiboleka izitshudeni imali yokufunda, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS) kumele sithathe isikhathi esingakanani ukulungisa izinkinga eziholela ekutheni izicelo zezitshudeni zingaphothulwa.Lokhu kushiwo yizitshudeni zezikhungo zezemfundo ephakeme KwaZulu-Natal, ngemuva kokuputshuka kwencwadi kaNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo kuleli uNkk Naledi Pandor, abeyibhalele usihlalo webhodi lwakwaNSFAS, uMnuz Sizwe Nxasana.Zithi yize sisihle lesi sinyathelo sokuthi iNSFAS ikumisile ukuthatha izicelo zika-2019, obekumele kuqale namhlanje kodwa bekumele kuhambisane nomnqamulajuqu wokuthi lezi zinkinga bazilungise ngesikhathi esingakanani.UMengameli womkhandlu wezitshudeni eMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT), uMnuz Sandile Dlamini yize bewujabulela lo myalelo kaNkk Pandor ngoba uzobeka ezinye izitshudeni ethubeni elingcono lokuthi kuhlaziywe izicelo zazo esezinesikhathi eside zingaphothulwa kodwa bakhathazekile ngokuthi akushiwo ukuthi lesi sikhwama sinikezwa isikhathi esingakanani sokuthi silungise izinkinga zaso.“Sekunesikhathi eside sisho ukuthi lesi sikhwama asisebenzi kahle. E-MUT kunezitshudeni zika-2017 izicelo zazo ezingakaphothulwa, kube nezitshudeni zika-2018 nazo ezisalinde ukuthi lesi sikhwama sithathe isinqumo sokuthi zizohlomula yini kuso. Ngempela uma kuphinde kuvulwa ukuthi kufakwe ezinye izicelo ngabe kuthiwa nazo kumele ziduve kwaNSFAS? Nginethemba lokuthi emhlanganweni esizoba nawo nomnyango neNSFAS ngeSonto uzocacisa kabanzi ngale mibuzo esisenayo.”FUNDA: 
Umyalelo kaPandor kwabeNSFASUMengameli womkhandlu wezitshudeni eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, (UKZN), uMnuz Sandile Zondi, uthe uNkk Pandor kumele agade ukuthi akalungisi inkinga ngokudala enye inkinga.“Ungqongqoshe ukhiphe lo myalelo ngenyanga yesishiyagalombili yonyaka ekubeni kade siwubikela umnyango ngezinkinga zalesi sikhwama.“Uma ukulungiswa kwezinkinga ezikhona kudonsa kuze kushaya uNovemba, kuzodaleka inkinga efanayo kwizitshudeni zonyaka ozayo. Ngabe kuyacaca ukuthi uthi okungenani lesi sikhungo asiphothule zonke izicelo ezingaphothuliwe ngo-Agasti, ngoSepthemba kuvulwe ukufakwa kwezicelo.”
title: Bafuna kucaciswe ngeNSFAS

text: KULELI sonto ngifonelwe enye insizwa ebikhathazekile emuva kokuthi imali ebiyifake kwenye i-akhawunti kuthiwa ayiveli. Ingishayele ucingo isegatsheni lebhange elithile ikhala ngokuthi abasebenzi abanaso isiqiniseko sokuthi imali yayo izobuya.Ngiyicele ukuthi ikhononde egatsheni ebikulo, icele nokuthumela i-email ngoba nami angazi ukuthi imali yayo izobuya nini.Kubalulekile ukuthi uma kukhona okungahambanga kahle ebhange usheshe ubike egatsheni okulo, ukhononde ngokubhala i-email.Ngiyazi abaningi benu bazokhala ngokuthi abanawo ama-email kodwa kuyasiza ukukhala nge-email ngoba akekho ophikayo ukuthi uke wakhala noma usulandelela uyakwazi ukusho ukuthi ulandelela luphi udaba. Khumbula akusizi ukushesha ushayele amaphephandaba uma unenkinga ngoba amabhange alawulwa wumthetho wokuthi awazikhulumi izindaba zawo nabanye abantu, akhuluma namakhasimende awo kuphela. I-Prudential Authority (PA) intswinye iSasfin Bank emuva kokuthi iphule eminye imigomo yeFinancial Intelligence Centre Act ka-2001. I-PA ithe iSasfin ayintswinywanga ngoba isolwa ngokushushumbisa imali kodwa kunemigomo ethile ekade ingalandelwanga.ISasfin izohlawuliswa uR500 000. Ibuye yayalelwa ukuthi iqeqeshe abasebenzi abathile ukulandela i-Financial Intelligence Act. I-PA ithe iSasfin iyakulandela eyalelwe ukuthi ikwenze. I-Consumer Goods and Service Ombud (CGSO) iyalele abantu ukuthi bayeke ukuthenga impahla kwiSA Trampoline emuva kokuthola izikhalo kubathengi abaningi.I-CGSO iveze ukuthi abathengi bese bekhokhe izibambiso eziphakathi kukaR3 200 noR6 400 kwiSA Trampoline kodwa abayitholi impahla yabo.Abanye sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu belinde impahla obekuthiwa izothunyelwa kungakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kuya kweziwu-14. UNksz Magauta Mphahlele we-CGSO Ombud uthe udaba uselubike kwi-National Consumer Commission ukuze iphenye bese ijezisa inkampani.“Siyacela abantu bangalokothi bathenge impahla eSA Trampoline ngoba sisayibikile kwiConsumer Commission. Umthetho uthi asixwayise abantu ngezinkampani ezingalaleli uma sithole izikhalo ngazo ngakho nalapha senza njalo. Sizoqhubeka nokushicilela amagama ezinkampani ezithatha imali yabantu ngaphandle kokubanika impahla abayithengile,” kusho uNksz Mphahlele. Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bangathuli uma izinkampani zibaphatha kabi kodwa bakhononde. Ucele abantu ukuthi bazibhekisise izitolo abathenga kuzo nge-internet, babheke ukuthi impahla isithunyelwe yini ngoba eziningi zinohlelo oluvumela ikhasimende ukuthi libheke impahla yalo.I-CGSO itholakala ku-0860 000 272. I-Financial Sector Authority (FSCA) ixwayise umphakathi ukuthi ungalokothi usebenzisane noMnuz Christiaan Burger Venter obuye abizwe ngelika “Mr Venter” ozibiza ngoMqondisi we-BVG Financial Solutions. I-FSCA ithole ukuthi uVenter uhambe ethi usebenzela yona aze athathe imali kubantu ekubeni engathunywanga yiyo.Ithe i-BVG yinkampani enika abantu usizo lwezimali esemthethweni kodwa iyaziqhelelanisa noVenter osebenzisa inamba ethi 067 084 7982  ne-email ethi [email protected]Kuthiwa uVenter uthembisana inzalo ka-20% no-35% ngosuku lwemali osuke uyitshalile.Kunxuswe abantu ukuthi bangasebenzisani nezinkampani ezingenalo igunya lokubanika usizo lwezimali ngoba uma sezicwilile kunzima ukuzithola.I-FSCA ibuye yaxwayisa abantu nge-First Cash esebenzisa isitifiketi somkokotelo ukunika abantu usizo lwezimali.Ukuthola ulwazi lokuthi inkampani ivumelekile yini ukunikezana usizo lwezimali ungathinta i-FSCA ku-0800 110 443  noma ku-www.fsca.co.za* Uma unenkinga edinga usizo lwezabathengi ungathumela i-email [email protected] ubhale ezabathengi endaweni yesihloko.
title: Bathengi yazini okuzonisiza ngalesi sikhathi seCoronavirus

text: SESENYUKELE kubantu abangaphezu kuka60 000 isibalo sabantu bakuleli osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi bahaqwe yicoronavirus. Sebewu-1 369 asebeshonileLezi zibalo zakamuva zikhishwe wuNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize othe namanje iWestern Cape isalokhu izihole njalo phambili ngesibalo esiphezuluu njengoba u-74% wasebeshonile kungowakulesi sifundazwe.Bangaphezu kwesiigidi abantu bakuleli asebehlolelwe leli gciwane kanti abawu-32 000 bahlolelwe leli gciwane emahoreni awu-24.Izolo bangaphez kuka-70 abantu abadlule emhlabeni ngenxa yaleli gciwane, u-39 wabo ngabaseWestern Cape.Izibala zakamuva zabashonileWestern Cape - 39Eastern Cape - 30Limpopo - 1UMkhize udlulise amazwi endunduzo kuyo yonke imindeni eshonelwe wathi isizwe sonke sinabo kulesi sikhathi esnzima kangaka.Asebesindile uthe bawu32 000 okwenza u56.5%. Iningi labo futhi abasindile abakhona eWestern Cape,njengoba bebalelwa ku25 000.Ezakamuva izibaloTotal CasesTotal DeathsRecoveriesActive CasesSouth Africa6192713543500825565Western Cape3892610052543512486Gauteng87815729485776Eastern Cape861520843934014KZN35736415721937North West8651128736Free State4359189237Limpopo2884175109Mpumalanga2431116126Northern Cape13815285
title: #Coronavirus: Sebengaphezu kuka60 000 abahaqwe yiCovid-19 kuleli

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthe isibalo samajoyinti siningi kakhulu uma siqhathaniswa nesamasonto nezinye izakhiwo. Uthe okumenza asho kanje yindima edlalwa utshwala ezigamekweni eziningi zokushaya ezenzeke kuleli."Ezehlakelweni zokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza ezingu-2 855 kuqinisekisiwe ukuthi utshwala babusuke buphuzwe ngumlimazi noma wumlinyazwa noma bobabili babedakiwe. Izigameko ezingu-2 047 zokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza zenzeke ema-bar, night club, emathaveni nasemashibhini." UCele uthe izifundazwe ezihamba phambili ngezehlakalo zokushaywa kwabantu yiGauteng neWestern Cape. "Izehlakalo ezingu-16 528 zokushaywa kwabantu zenzeka emindenini, okusho ukuthi umgilwa nomshayi bebazana. Ukudlonywa kotshwala sekusime emphinjeni singamaphoyisa nasemphakathini." Uthe kulezi zinyanga ezintathu kubulawe abantu abangu-4 976, okusho ukuthi isibalo salo nyaka sinyuke ngo387 uma kuqhathaniswa nesangonyaka owedlule ngalezi zinyanga. Izifundazwe ezinesibalo esikhulu sabantu ababulawe yiKwaZulu-Natal ne-Eastern Cape njengoba ukubulawa kwabantu kube wu-16.9% no21.5%. "Ngebhadi abantu abangu-1 327 babulawelwe emakhaya abo noma lapho kuhlala khona umbulali, okubalwa nasemakhaya, abangani  nakomakhelwane. Kwesinye isikhathi labo bantu bebenobudlelwano."  Uthe bangu-2 378 abantu ababulawe esidlangalaleni okunjengasemigwaqeni, emapaki, emabhishi nasemabhilidini asele dengwane." Imbangela yokubulawa kwabantu kukhonjwe ngenjumbane ubugebengu, ukuziphindiselela komphakathi ezigebengwini, impikiswano nokubanjwa kwenkunzi kuhlonyiwe. Yize isibalo sabadlwenguliwe, okubalwa kuso namadoda sehlile, kodwa bangu-9 518 abadlwengulwe phakathi kukaJanuwari noMashi. Lesi sibalo sehle ngabantu abangu-387 uma kuqhathaniswa nesangonyaka ofile. Ezigamekweni zokudlwengula kuvela ukuthi abantu abangu-4 130 bahlukunyezwe emakhaya abo noma awomdlwenguli. Kulokhu amacala amaningi okudlwengula abikwe esiteshini saseLusikisiki, e-Eastern Cape, esidlule esaseNanda njengoba bekuyiso ebesizihola phambili ngamacala okunukubeza ngocansi. UCele ube esenxusa umphakathi ukuba ubambisane namaphoyisa ekunqandeni ubugebengu, ikakhulukazi udlame lwasemindenini.
title: Senyukile isibalo sababulalana bedakiwe kusho uBheki Cele

text: KUPHELILE phakathi kukaPhilani Zulu weMaritzburg United noqweqwe lwemenenja uMike Makaab weProSport International okuyinkampani ebiphethe izindaba zalo mdlali.Isolezwe lithole lezi zindaba ngesikhathi lishayela uMakaab lifuna ukwazi ukuthi kuqhubekani ngoZulu ongabonakali emidlalweni yeTeam of Choice.UZulu akajimi neTeam of Choice kwazise unqabile ukuvuselela inkontileka naleli qembu okuvela ukuthi limholela amakinati.UMakaab ethintwa ngoZulu ukusho kwagcwala umlomo ukuthi akasasebenzisani nalo mdlali.“UZulu angisasebenzisani naye. Lo mfana sengathi kunomuntu omfaka umqondo obhedayo. Ngicabanga ukuthi nginamasonto amathathu ngagcina ukukhuluma naye. Ngifike ngikhulume naye ngamaqembu amfunayo kodwa avele afune itshe lemali. Sengathi uyakhohlwa wukuthi usenezinyanga eziyisithupha engadlali manje. Yingakho ngithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngimyeke,” kusho uMakaab.UZulu udlale ingcwenga yebhola ngesizini edlule ngesikhathi iTeam of Choice ivika izembe ku-Absa Premiership. Lokhu kwenze kwaba nenqwaba yamaqembu ebifuna ukumsayinisa.Ethintwa uZulu uvumile ukuthi akasasebenzisani noMakaab kodwa wangafuna ukudalula ukuthi usesebenzisana nayiphi i-agent. Leli phephandaba lithole izindaba zokuthi iKaizer Chiefs, Bidvest Wits noPolokwane City yiwona amaqembu abegaqele uZulu osolwa ngokufuna itshe lemali.KuTeam of Choice ujima neqembu lenkulisa. Wagcina ukudlala eqenjini elikhulu ngonyaka ophelile ngesikhathi kusekhona * -Ernst Middendorp. Usihlalo weTeam of Choice uFarook Kadodia unqabile ukuphawula ngodaba lwalo mdlali eziseka ngokuthi usekhulume kakhulu ngendaba yakhe.Inkontileka kaZulu neTeam of Choice iyaphela ngoJuni okuchaza ukuthi usengadlala noma yikuphi lapho ethanda khona ngesizini ezayo.
title: OweTeam of Choice ulaxaziwe

text:
SIZWE BLOSEU SHAYA ibuya kwithelevishini uPastor Sthembiso Zondo owazakhela udumo esangena ohlelweni olwenziwa wuLinda Sibiya, iVuka Mzansi kuKhozi FM.UZondo ungumfundisi webandla elibizwa ngeZero to Hero elikhonzela eMoses Mabhida, ubuyela kwi
Gospel Classic ezodlala ku-SABC 2 kusukela ngoFebhuwari 2.UPitso Thabo, ongumdidiyeli walolu hlelo, uziqinisekisile izindaba zokubuya kwalolu hlelo noPastor Zondo.“Abantu abaningi bathe bayamdinga uZondo ngoba izinkulumo zakhe ziyabakha, bekungekho esizokwenza ngoba kumele sibalalele ababukeli bohlelo,” kusho uPitso.Uphinde waveza ukuthi uZondo uzobe engahambi yedwa uzobambisana no-Archbishop Steven Zondo weRivers of Living Water Church okuyibandla elizinze eGoli.Uthe u-Archibishop Zondo ungumuntu okwaziyo ukukhuluma ezinye izilimi kanti uPastor Zondo yena uzogxila olimini lwesiZulu.UPitso uthe bazoqhubeka nabethuli balolu hlelo abakhona okungoTshepo Maseko noBongani Nchang ocula kwiMalaika.Lolu hlelo ngesikhathi luqala luke lwethulwa nguLinda Sibiya woKhozi FM kodwa luthe selubuya ubengasekho ngoba engumuntu okhuluma isiZulu kanti u-SABC 2 ubekelwe kakhulu labo bantu abakhuluma izilimi ezihambisana nesiSotho ekubeni u-SABC 1 ugxila kulezo okuthiwa ezamaNguni.UZondo uthe uzithokozela kakhulu izindaba zokubuyela kwakhe kwithelevishini, wathi okuhle ngakho wukuthi izinkulumo zakhe ezakhayo zizofinyelela kubantu abaningi ngenxa yalolu hlelo.“Njengamanje ngimatasa ngilungiselela lolu hlelo yingakho ngingasapheli eGoli, okungichaza kakhulu wukuthi abantu basazoke bangibone kwithelevishini njengoba lolu hlelo luzoba neziqephu ezingu-26,” kusho uZondo.Ubuye wadalula ukuthi izinto zimhambela kahle njengoba engase azwakale nakuMhlobo Wenene FM.Lo mfundisi uphinde abe ngumlingisi, uvela efilimini ebhalwe wuPastor Mjosty ebizwa ngokuthi
Kwaito Church Service 2, edlala yona indawo yokugqugquzela abantu.
title: UZondo ubuyela kwiGospel Classic

text: BANGENISE kwiMamelodi Sundowns otsotsi abaqola ngokwenza iwele inombolo yeselula yomdlali, isikhulu noma umqeqeshi ukuze bathumele umqhafazo kubangani nezihlobo zoqolwayo bese bechaza ngenkinga evelile edinga ukuba bafakelwe imali ebhange.Lo mkhuba, osuthanda ukwanda ngesivinini ikakhulukazi kubadlali bebhola elikhokhelayo, ungenise kwiSundowns lapho kuqolwa khona ngenombolo kanozinti waseZambia, uKennedy Mweene, umqeqeshi, uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane, nemenenja yeqembu, uPeter Ndlovu.Njengamanje iSundowns imatasa namalungiselelo omdlalo wayo omqoka weCAF Champions League lapho iya khona eNigeria ukuyodudulana nezinkunzi zakhona iLobi Stars ngoLwesihlanu.Njengoba kuqolwa ngezinombolo, akuphele sikhathi esingakanani amaqola kade engene enombolweni kaThemba Zwane efuna imali kubangani nasezihlotsheni zakhe esebenzisa igama lakhe. Akagcinanga ngalokho kodwa angene nasemakhasini akhe ezinkundla zokuxhumana abhala wonke umsangano oshiye uZwane emphakathini. Isilungisiwe nokho leyo njengoba esegadla koMweene, Mosimane noNdlovu.Ngenxa yalokhu iSundowns ithe ukuma kancane ekuzilungiseleleni umdlalo weLobi Stars yakhipha isitatimende ixwayisa ngezigilamkhuba.“Sixwayisa wonke umuntu ukuthi umqeqeshi wethu uPitso Mosimane, Peter Ndlovu noKennedy Mweene kabanankinga kodwa kukhona otsotsi abenze amawele ezinombolo zabo zikamakhalekhukhwini. Siyanixwayisa ukuthi ningalokothi nithumele imali uma kuvela umyalezo okhomba ukuthi laba basenkingeni ngoba lokho akukho,” ikubhale ekhasini layo le twitter lokhu iSundowns.NeKaizer Chiefs isanda kukhuza umkhuba ofanayo esikhathini esingangenyanga esedlule lapho izigilamkhuba bezigasele khona ngenombolo kaWillard Katsande. UKatsande uze wabhala naye kwelakhe ikhasi exwayisa ngokuthi inombolo yakhe eqala ngo-078 isinewele futhi abantu bangathumeli mali kuyo ngoba akanankinga.Phakathi kwabadlali asebeke baphoseka esikhinsini esifanayo singabala uKeagan Dolly odlala eFrance. NoLebohang Manyama weChiefs uke waphoseka esadlala eTurkey nyakenye.UManyama uze wathola usizo ngokuthi axhumane nenkampani ephethe izindaba zakhe. Nomqeqeshi uTebogo Moloi useke waba nale nkinga waze wacela Isolezwe ukuthi limsize asabalalise umyalezo wokuthi akaboshiwe futhi akayidingi imali.
title: Izigilamkhuba ziqola ngamagama abeSundowns

text: ZIYAQONGA izinkinga kwiBloemfontein Celtic okuvela ukuthi ishiywa yinqwaba yabadlali ngenxa yokungaholi nokungafezwa kwezethembiso zamabhonasi.Ngesizini ka-2018/2019 iCeltic ihlaselwe yizingqinamba ezahlukene okukhona kuzona ukuteleka kwabadlali benqaba ukuziqeqesha ngenxa yokungaholi. Kwesinye isikhathi bekudingeka obengumqeqeshi uSteve Komphela akhiphe ephaketheni lakhe ukulungisa isimo. ICeltic kusabalale ukuthi inenkinga yemali ngenxa yobuhlwempu bukasihlalo uMax Tshabalala ofuna itshe lemali kwabafuna ukuyithenga.Leli phephandaba lithole ukuthi ingase iqale isizini entsha iCeltic ipatanisa ngenxa yokuthi kunenqwaba yabadlali abafuna ukuhamba. ICeltic isivele ilahlekelwe ngunozinti uPatrick Tgnyemb osejoyine iChippa United emuva kweminyaka ewu-12 edlalela iPhunya Selesele. Ngaphezu kwalokho kuvele ukuthi iCeltic idayisele i-Orlando Pirates uBongani Sam ngesizumbulu sika-R5 million, Tshegofatso Mabasa ngo-R2 million noKabelo Dlamini ngo-R2 million kodwa awukho umehluko.“Kuzoba nzima kule sizini ezoqala. Kuhamba abadlali abanamava eqenjini. ULetlabika (Wandisile), Mabena (Ndumiso), Mashikinya (Given). Ngisho noPfumbidzai (Ronald) uthe yena akabuyi kunjena,” kusho umthombo.Imizamo yokuthola isikhulu esiphezulu uKhumbulani Konco ayiphumelelanga kwazise ucingo lakhe beluvaliwe.UMark Mayambela obekade efisa ukubuyela kwiCeltic ugcine eshintshe umqondo ngenxa yenhlupheko ebhekene naleli qembu. Umdlali wasesiswini uJacky Motshegwa ukuqinisekisile ukuthi namuhla uzoxoxa nabaphathi mayelana nekusasa lakhe kwiCeltic. Inkontileka yakhe iyaphela ngeSonto kodwa inombandela wokuyivuselela.Kuvele ukuthi abaphathi beCeltic bavulele izimenenja zabadlali ukuthi zilethe abadlali ukuze izokwazi ukuqala isizini ka-2019/2020.“Ungamangali uma kuqala isizini ishaya ngabadlali abangaziwa bodwa. Kumanje kuthungathwa abadlali abadlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League nakwi-SAB League. Isimo sinzima,” kusho umthombo.
title: I-Celtic ingase iqale isizini entsha ipatanisa

text: LUZOQALA ngoLwesihlanu kwiMzansi Magic uhlelo oluqale kwi-1Magic olwethulwa uPhat Joe, oludingida ezisematheni eNingizimu Afrika nasemhlabeni jikelele, oluthi Cheeky Palate. Izihloko okukhona kuzona ezithi Are men trash?, #BlackLivesMatter nezithinta isithembu, yizona ezizohamba phambili kulolu hlelo oluqala ngo-6.00 ntambama.Uhlelo luzokhombisa iziqephu eziwu-13.Ngaphandle kukasaziwayo azobe exoxa naye uPhat Joe, kuzoba nabanye abazobe behlanganyele engxoxweni babuye bazijabulise ngezidlo ezehlukene.Umqondisi wezinhlelo kwaM-Net, uNomsa Philiso, uthe ababukeli bangalindela abantu abaziwayo abazobheka izihloko ezisematheni nezikhathaza umphakathi.“Izihloko ezehlukene kodwa okuhlale kukhulunywa ngazo emphakathini yizona ezizobe zibhekwa. Ababukeli bethu abakhokhela iziteshi zonke zeDStv nabanye abanaso isiteshi, yibona abazojabulela kuqala lolu hlelo. Singasho ukuthi kuzoba khona nobumnandi njengomculo. Kuzobonakala abantu abaningi abasemkhakheni wobumnandi,” kusho uNomsa.Kosaziwayo uPhat Joe azohlala nabo phansi, kukhona uShauwn Mkhize, Hlomla Dandala, ilungu le-EFF uLeigh-Ann Mathys, isangoma esidume ngoGogo Dineo nosomahlaya uCeleste Ntuli.Isiqephu sokuqala esizobe sithinta ubungoma, uPhat Joe uzobonakala nosomabhizinisi wesifazane uNobuntu Webster, umethuli wezinhlelo uGerry Rantseli-Elsdon, Gogo Dineo, Joshua Maponga nomculi uZwai Bala, abazokhuluma ngezinto ezehlukene ezithinta ubungoma.Khonamanjalo; uhlelo oluthi Seng’khathele olwethulwa uLerato Mvelase, nalo lubuyile kwiMzansi Magic nakwiMzansi Wethu, kanti lukhonjiswa ngoLwesihlanu nangoMgqibelo.UThato Molamu yena wethula uhlelo olusha oluthi Abazali esiteshini uMzansi Wethu ngo-7.30 ntambama ngoLwesihlanu.Kulolu hlelo usiza abazali abancishwa ithuba lokubona izingane zabo, nalapho ebasiza khona ukuthi bakwazi ukuzibona futhi babe nobudlelwano nazo.
title: Luthuthela kuMzansi Magic uhlelo lukaPhat Joe

text: KUSIZE ukufika kwamaphoyisa aseBhekithemba, eMlaza, ngesikhathi umphakathi wasesigcemeni sakwa-AA ufuna ukudla luhlaza ikhansela laku-ward 84 kuMasipala weTheku namhlanje ekuseni. Umphakathi obuthukuthele ugane unwabu uhlasela emahhovisi kaCllr Bhekithemba Phungula asehholo lomphakathi eyofuna ngodli izijumbane zokudla. Amanye amalungu abebambe iqhaza kulo mbhikisho athe asekhathele inkohlakalo kaPhungula. "Ushushumbisa ukudla ngobumnyama, eyonikeza obhululu bakhe nezife$% zamantombazane ezimkhumulele amaphenti. Uma sifuna ukudla uyasithuka, athi asiyeke ukuzomkhamisela. Silambile njengoba kuvalwe izwe. Ukudla kukhona kodwa akafuni nakho." Elinye ilungu lithe uPhungula ujwayele ukusebenzisa itiye. "Ngisho kunemisebenzi, uyinikeza obhululu bakhe, thina sisale simunca izithupha," kusho ilungu elinqabile negama lalo. Lomphakathi unxuse kungenelele imeya nongqongqoshe ngoba sewubekezele kwenela ekubeni uququdwa yindlala. Kulo mbhikisho bekuphume ngisho nesinedolo isaguga nezintsha yendawo. Indlela umphakathi obuthukuthele ngayo bewusuze wakhohlwa ukuzivikela egciwaneni leCorona njengoba iningi belingazigqokanga izifonyo futhi limpintshene. Amalungu omphakathi wase-AA, eMlaza, abehlasele emahhovisi ekhansela laku-ward 84, eyofuna ngodli izijumbane zokudla Isithombe:SITHUNYELWENesibalo besibukeka singaphezu kuka-50, okuyisibalo esigunyaziwe uma kuhlangene abantu. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela kungakatholakali ukuphawula kwekhansela ngoba izingcingo bezingabanjwa futhi zicishwa. Kuhluleke ngisho selithunyelelwa nemiyalezo kodwa nayo beyingaphendulwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko. "Iqeqebana labantu livimbe umgwaqo lifuna ngenkani izijumbane zokudla. Umphakathi uhlakazwe ngokuthula ngamaphoyisa emuva kokwethulelwa inkulumo yikhansela," kuphetha uColonel Mbele.
title: Lisindele amaphoyisa ikhansela elisolwa ngokunqwaha nezijumbane eMlaza

text: USHAYA amakhala umphakathi waseSigodini, eMid-Illovo ngokubekwa komfowabo wenduna esanda kushona ukuthi kube uyena oqhubeka lapho kugcine khona umfowabo.Kusolwa Inkosi uLangalasembo Mkhize ngokubeka uMnuz Tu Dlamini ezintanjeni ngemva kokushona kukamfowabo uMnuz Bhekise Dlamini ngoJanuwari nonyaka.Umphakathi uthi isikhundla sobuduna akulona ifa futhi ufuna ukuba nezwi ekuqokweni komuntu ozowuphatha.Ngakulonye uhlangothi kuthiwa inkosi ithi akungaxhanyazelwa, akungajahwa ukuthi kubekwe enye induna ekubeni kusanda kushona uDlamini ngokugula.Amalungu omphakathi abuthane ehholo lomphakathi ngeSonto ezobhunga ngalolu daba kodwa ayifikanga inkosi okuthiwa iyadunguzela ngemva kokushaywa isifo sohlangothi.. Ilungu lomphakathi elixoxe naleli phephandaba, lacela ligodlwe igama lalo, lithe uDlamini wayenamakhansela amathathau asebenzisana nawo manje kusele elilodwa okumele ngabe kukhushulelwa lona esikhundleni sokuba induna.Ubale uMnuz Bongani Luthuli owasula, uMnuz Moses Mbewu Mthembu oshone ngonyaka odlule njengoba sekusele uMnuz Samuel Ndlela othwelwe wumphakathi ngeqoma.Kuthiwa uNdlela bese esebenze nenduma eshonile iminyaka ebalelwa kwengu-20 futhi uyaziqonda izinto ezenzeka emphakathini.“Inkosi ayisisusele lomuntu embekile ifake uNdlela. Ubamba kanjani uDlamini obekade engeyona ingxenye yomkhandlu wenduna. Umphakathi kumele uvunyelwe ube nezwi ezintweni ezithinta wona,” kusho ilungu lomphakathi.UNdlela akatholakalanga ukuba aphawule ngalolu daba.Iphini likasihlalo wendlu yobukhosi bakwaMkhize, Embo Thumini, uNksz Martha Shezi uthe uDlamini ubambile esikhundleni  ukuze alekelele inkosi edunguzelayo. Uthe inkosi inelungelo lokubeka induna efuna ukusebenza nayo.“Akekho oqokwe ngokugcwele kulesi sikhundla. Inkosi ithe kuzoke kumiwe kancane ukubekwa kwenduna entsha ngoba kusanda kushona uDlamini. Nayo iyadunguzela njengoba yashaywa yisifo sohlangothi,” kusho uNksz Shezi ngamafuphi.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Senzelwe, uthe umnyango awaziswanga ngalolu daba kodwa wakubalula ukuthi inkosi inelungelo lokuqoka induna efuna ukusebenza nayo.“Izinduna ezamakhosi. Umkhandlu wenkosi uno-40% wabantu abasuke bekhethwe umphakathi kuthi u-60% uqhamuke ebukhosini,” kusho uMzila.
title: Bayaveva ngokubekwa kwenduna abangayifuni

text: OWAYEYIPHINI likamengameli wezwe, uMnuz FW de Klerk, usexolisile ngenkulumo yakhe lapho ephike khona ukuthi ubandlululo lwabe luwubugebengu obubhekiswe ebantwini.Wakhuluma kanje enkulumeni yakhe yakamuva ayenza kwiSABC.Lokhu kukhuluma kwakhe kugxekwe kakhulu abamaqembu epolitiki nabezinhlangano ezingenzi inzuzo.UDe Klerk ube sematheni ngesikhathi kuphazamiseka inkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngeledlule lapho i-EFF yayifuna akhishwe ePhalamende ngenxa yale nkulumo yakhe ngobandlululo.USomlomo wePhalamende, uNksz Thandi Modise, wanqaba ukuba uDe Klerk akhishwe, wathi umenyiwe.Izolo kulandela ingcindezi yomphakathi, uDe Klerk uhoxise le nkulumo yakhe.Abaholi abahlukene okubalwa abe-ANC, i-DA, NFP nezinhlangano i-The Desmond and Leah Tutu Foundation, The Nelson Mandela Foundation, SA Council of Churches, owayengumholi weDA uMnuz Tony Leon, bangabanye abagxeke lesi sitatimende sikaDe Klerk. I-NFP ithe akaphucwe yonke imihlomulo.UDe Klerk uthe yobe kwabonile.“Ngiyavumelana nezinhlangano iDesmond and Leah Tutu Foundation, lesi akusona isikhathi sokuba siklwebhane ngezinga lokungamukeleki kobandlululo. Akwamukelekile nhlobo lokho. Inhlangano iThe FW de Klerk Foundation ikhethe ukuhoxisa isitatimende esenziwa ngoFebhuwari 14 nonyaka, iyaxolisa ngokudideka, ukudinwa nobuhlungu okwenziwa ilesi sitatimende,” kusho uDe Klerk esitatimendeni senhlangano yakhe.“Ngo-27 Ephreli 1994, ngaphansi kobuholi bami, udaba lobandlululo lwachithwa, kwaba nemizamo yokusebenzisana nazo zonke izinhlanga ngaphansi koMthethosisekelo okhululekile.”
title: Lugobile uphondo wasexolisa uDe Klerk

text: Njengoba isimo sempilo siguquguquka sizithola sinengcindezi yokushintsha izinqumo zethu. Lokhu kuba yinkinga kakhulu uma sithatha izinqumo ngemali. Kuba nzima ukugxila kulokho ofuna ukukufeza uma isimo sishintsha okungenza ushintshe indlela osebenzisa ngayo imali. Pho senze njani uma singakwazi ukuzigwema izimo ezinjalo? Yilapho-ke uhlelo olufana nebhajethi lubaluleke khona.Abeluleki bezezimali bayakugcizelela ukubaluleka kokuba nemali oyibekele ukubhekana nezimo eziphuthumayo.Kungaba ukuthatha umshwalense ukulungiselela izimo ezifana nokufa, ukugula noma ukulahleka kwempahla. Kodwa zikhona ezinye izimo esingakwazi ukuzikhava ngomshwalense ezidinga sibe nokheshi uma zivela. Ngaphandle kohlelo lokubhekana nezimo ezifana nalezi uzithola usuphazamisa izinqumo ozithathile ngokwakha umnotho. Kubi kakhulu uma usuphoqeleka ukuthi uboleke imali ezalayo. Ukuthatha izinqumo ezinqala ngomnotho kudinga sibe nolwazi olwanele noma ukwelulekwa esikuthembayo. Sikhuthaza ukuthi uma utshala imali ungafaki endaweni eyodwa kodwa uyisabalalise ezindaweni nasezinhlelweni ezihlukene.Sigcizelele nokuthi utshale izikhathi ezihlukene, kube khona okwesikhathi esifushane nokunye okwenzelwe isikhathi eside. Siluleka nokuthi uzixube izinhlelo kube khona lapho okwaziyo ukuthola imali ngokushesha ukwenzela izimo eziphuthumayo. Yazi ukuthi indlela yokwakha umnotho inamaginxiginxi afaka ukulahleka kwemali ngesinye isikhathi. Akuwona-ke umqondo omuhle ukufaka imali endaweni eyodwa ngethemba lokuthi izokhula noma kanjani. Isimo somnotho siyaguquguka okwenza singabi bikho isiqiniseko sokuthi izinto zizohamba kahle ngesikhathi esithile. Okuhle ukuthi ucwaningo lubonisa ukuthi imali iyakhula uma itshalwe isikhathi eside. Lapha sikhuluma ngesikhathi esingaba iminyaka eyishumi kuya phezulu.Kuyacaca ukuthi ziningi izinto okufanele uzibheke uma unquma ukukhulisa umnotho. Igxathu lokuqala ukuzibekela umgomo wokwakha umnotho nezigaba zokufikelela eqophelweni olihlosile. Konke lokhu ukwenza nje unawo umqondo wokuthi kuzofanele ubhekane nezimo eziphuthumayo kanti unalo uhlelo lwazo.Kusemqoka nokwakha ubudlelwane obuhle nemali. Lokhu ukwenza ngokuzifundisa imikhuba emihle yokuphatha imali. Kuqala ngokushintsha indlela ocabanga ngayo ngemali.Iningi lethu likhule lazi ukuthi imali yinto yokuthenga kungekho lutho oluphatha ukuthi uyakwazi ukwenza imali ngemali. Uma sishintsha umqondo sibuka imali ngeso lokukhanda umnotho ngayo, sizibeka ethubeni elihle kakhulu. Le ndlela yokucabanga yenza singaphuthumi ukuthenga kepha sicabange ukuthi singayikhulisa kanjani. Eminye yemikhuba emihle ongayenanela ukuthi ungathengi lutho ngemali ngosuku efike ngalo.Uma kungena iholo ebhange uyalinda okungenani usuku ngaphambi kokuthi uthenge noma ukhiphe imali. Lokhu kukunika ithuba lokucabanga ngezinto ezibalulekile okumele uzenze. Cela ibhange libambe imali ethile liyifake esikhwameni sokonga uma uhola.Nokwengqondo le mali ebanjwayo akuyona eyakho ukuthi uyisebenzise okwenza ubuyekeze ukuchitha kwakho imali ilingane nale oyitholayo.Ukuzijwayeza ukuthi imali awunayo ngisho ikhona kwenza ukuthi ungayichithi noma kanjani.Kuyasiza nokuqaphela ukuthi iziphi izimo ezenza ukuthi sichithe imali ngaphandle kwebhajethi esihlelile. Baningi abangena ogibeni lokuchitha imali ngoba befuna ukubukwa noma ukuhlabekisa izimbangi zabo.Ubudlelwane obuhle nemali bukusiza ukuthi ungalandeli iningi kepha wenze izinqumo ezikubeka emathubeni amahle kwezomnotho. Labo abazi kahle ngemali abanandaba nokuthenga izinto kunalokho baneqholo ngemali abayitshalile futhi bazizwa benamandla okumelana nanoma yisiphi isimo.Yize singephike ukuthi inhlanhla ibalulekile empumelelweni kodwa kufanele kucace ukuthi izinqumo esizithathayo zinomthelela emnothweni wethu. Uma sithatha izinqumo eziphusile kuhambisane nenhlanhla sizibona senza kahle kakhulu.Kuze kuthiwe inhlanhla uyazakhela ngokusebenza ngokuzikhandla nokuthatha izinqumo ezikubeka emathubeni. Asikwazi-ke ukuhlala silinde inhlanhla, kufanele sizibekele imigomo yomnotho sithathe izinqumo ezizokwenza iphumelele.Ngokubuka imali ngeso lokunotha sitshala umqondo wokuthi sigxile ekukhuleni kwemali hhayi ukuyichitha.- Sikhula ngoMnotho
title: Umthelela wezinqumo esizenzayo ngemali ekwakheni umnotho

text: BASATHUTHUMELA abahlengikazi basemtholampilo waseNdaleni eRichmond ngemuva kokuthi uzakwabo engqoklozwe ngenhlamvu umkhwenyana wakhe, maqede wazibulala emtholampilo ngoLwesine ntambama.Kuthiwa uMnuz Themba Bhengu (35) obengumabhalane esibhedlela iGreys, eMgungundlovu, ugasele kulo mtholampilo obekusebenza kuwo ingoduso yakhe, uNksz Nomusa Ngcongo (35) ngaphambi kokuthi ashayise emsebenzini.Ngokusho komthombo uBhengu upake imoto ngaphandle komtholampilo elinde kushaye ihora lesine lokuvalwa komtholampilo.“Ungene ngaphakathi sekuzovalwa, wafika waqhumisa isibhamu. Abanye abahlengikazi nabasebenzi basemtholampilo baphume ngejubane. Usale nentombi yakhe."Amaphoyisa abiziwe ukuthi azolekelela kodwa awazange esangena ngoba uvele wadubula intombi maqede wazidubula naye. Batholwe sebedindilizile bobabili,” kusho umthombo.Uthe kuqhume isililo emtholampilo abahlengikazi bekhalela uzakwabo obulawe ngesihluku esemsebenzini.UNksz Ngcongo okuthiwa ufike kulo mtholampilo ngo-2012 ephuma esibhedlela iGreys, uchazwe njengomhlengikazi obesebenza ngokuzikhandla futhi ezithanda iziguli.Kuvele ukuthi ubengenazo izingane, ubehlala kubo nonina ohlala ngokungaphili.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo, uzwakalise ukudumala ngokubulawa kwalo mhlengikazi.“Sishaqekile ngalesi senzo sobulwane. Okubi kakhulu ukuthi kwenzeka ngesikhathi kuqala umkhankaso wezinsuku eziwu-16 zokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane nezingane. Kusiphatha kabi ukubulawa kwabantu besifazane ngabantu abasondelene nabo, okufanele engabe bayabavikela,” kusho uDhlomo.Unxuse abesifazane ukuthi bayeke ukubekezelela ukuhlukunyezwa ngabathandana nabo kodwa bakhulume, bacele nosizo kwabomthetho.
title: Ungqokloze ingoduso yakhe naye wazibulala

text: IZITHELE phezu kwamathambo omuntu abegoqwe ngendwangu eluhlaza indoda yasemjondolo yaseSizamazulu, eNanda, ebimba umgodi wethoyilethi egcekeni lakwayo.Amathambo athathwe ngamaphoyisa ngoLwesihlanu ukuwadlulisela kochwepheshe ukuze bawahlole ukuthi ngakabani.Umnikazi wendlu okutholwe kuyo amathambo egcekeni layo, uMnuz Sibonelo Masikana (32), owathenga indlu eminyakeni emibili edlule, uthe okwamanje usaqube ezihlotsheni ngoba usathukile.“Ngangena kule ndlu kunethoyilethi lomgodi eselilidala. Ngiqhubekile nokulisebenzisa laze laba sesimeni esingabekezeleki. NgoLwesine ntambama ngabona ukuthi angimbe omunye umgodi ngakhe elinye ithoyilethi ngoba sesithwele kanzima nonkosikazi.“Ngithe ngisehla nawo umgodi ngabona indwangu eluhlaza ngathi ngiyayidonsa kwaqhasha ithambo lomuntu. Ngathi ngiyaqhubeka kwavela amanye amathambo nogebhezi,” kusho uMasikana.Uthe ube esebiza omakhelwane ukuthi bazombukisa umhlola omvelelayo egcekeni lakwakhe.“Sathinta amaphoyisa afika kwasho ukuthi sekumnyama athi azobuya ngakusasa ukuzomba. Afikile ngempela aqoqa wonke amathambo ahamba nawo. Athe asazohlola ukuthi amathambo ngakabani. Ngisathukile ngoba sengihlale isikhathi eside kule ndawo kanti angazi ukuthi kunomuntu owagqitshwa egcekeni,” kulandisa uMasikana.Umkhwekazi kaMasikana, uNksz Winnie Mchunu (51), uthe nguye owamtholela le ndlu ngemuva kokuthi owayehlala phambilini ehlale izinyanga ezimbalwa nesoka lakhe bahamba.“Umama owayehlala kule ndlu wayehlala ngokulwa nomyeni wakhe. Baze bakhetha ukuthutha. Ngabe sengitshela indodakazi yami ukuthi ikhona indlu edayisayo ngesikhathi ifuna indawo nomyeni wayo,” kusho uNksz Mchunu.Uthe ukutholakala kwama­thambo kubashiye nemibuzo yokuthi ngabe ngakabani.Ilungu lomphakathi elicele ukungadalulwa lithe lisola ukuthi amathambo ngawendoda yokufika eyayihlala nentombi kule ndlu eyanyamalala eminyakeni emine edlule.“Le ndoda yavele yanyamalala esikhaleni kanti yayingeve iyishaya intombi yayo. Asina­si­qiniseko sokuthi iyona kodwa siyasola. Indwangu ebigoqwe ngayo bekuyikhethini. Akekho umuntu ongasuka kude ayongcwaba umuntu egcekeni lakomunye umuzi. Sesilinde ukuzwa uphenyo lwamaphoyisa.“Igazi lomuntu liyakhuluma angikhathali kungaphela isikhathi eside kangakanani abulawa,” kusho leli lungu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aseNanda aphenya icala lokufa komuntu ngemuva kokuthi kutholakale amathambo omuntu egcekeni lomuzi womuntu obemba umgodi wethoyilethi.“Kuzohlolwa amathambo kwenziwe ulibofuzo ukuze ku­tholwe ukuthi nga­kabani. Sizobheka nokuthi wayebulawe yini nokuthi kwakwenzeke nini,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Uthole amathambo emba umgodi

text: UBOSHWE esesibhedlela omunye wabasolwa okuthiwa ubefunwa uthuli amaphoyisa ophiko oluphenya amacala ahleliwe KwaZulu-Natal.Lo msolwa kuthiwa uboshwe ngoLwesibili ngesikhathi amaphoyisa elandela umkhondo ngomsolwa obefunwa athole ukuthi ulaliswe esibhedlela eLadysmith enamanxeba okudutshulwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe lo msolwa uboshwe esesibhedlela kanti usagcinwe khona uqashwe ngamaphoyisa. Kuvele ukuthi icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala liyiswe eNkantolo yeMantshi eZakheni izolo, lo msolwa engekho, icala lahlehliselwa * -Okthoba 10 ukuze afake isicelo sebheyili.UZwane uthe ngoSepthemba 7 nonyaka ngabo 12.30, amadoda amabili ayehleli emotweni yawo eZakheni ngesikhathi ehlaselwa ngabasolwa abathathu.Kulesi sehlo kwadubuleka uMnuz Khumbulani Mazibuko (34) walimala kanti omunye ayenaye waphuma engenamyocu. Ngesikhathi kudutshulwa omunye wabasolwa washayiswa yimoto yabagilwa, isibhamu sakhe esikhulu sasala kwi-bonnet yemoto. Abasolwa babaleka ngemoto ababehamba ngayo.Umgilwa owalimala waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela eyolashwa amanxeba okudutshulwa kodwa washona.Kwavulwa icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa eZakheni, leli cala ladluliselwa ophikweni oluphenya amacala ahleliwe esifundazweni.
title: Ubanjwe esesibhedlela osolwa ngelokubulala

text: UMFANA oneminyaka ewu-11 ungomunye wabasolwa abawu-217 ababoshelwe ukudlwengula KwaZulu-Natal ngenyanga kaJune nonyaka.NgoLwesine amaphoyisa adalule ukuthi ngenyanga edlule abophe abasolwa abawu-217 ezifundeni ezahlukene ngamacala okunukubeza ngokocansi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa akulesi sifundazwe, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe ngoMeyi 25 kwaboshwa umfana oneminyaka ewu-11 eMadadeni eNewcastle kaSection 3."Amaphoyisa abopha abafana oneminyaka ewu-11 no-13. Sebevelile enkantolo iMadadeni Child Justice Court ngoJune 11. Badedelwa ezandleni zabazali babo ngoba basebancane ngokweminyaka,"kusho uColonel Mbele. Uthe kunecala lokudlwengula elavulwa eMadadeni okwaholela ekuboshweni kwalaba bafana. Laba basolwa abasebancane kulindeleke ukuthi baphinde bavele enkantolo ekupheleni kwale nyanga.Kuze kube manje, amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal asekwazile ukubopha abasolwa okugcine ngokuthi bathole izigwebo okukhona kuzo ukugwetshwa udilikajele neminyaka ewu-15.UColonel Mbele uthe ngenyanga edlule kuboshwe abasolwa abaphakathi kweminyaka ewu-11 no-80."Amahlanu kulamacala asephothuliwe ezinkantolo ezahlukene,"usho kanje.Ube esenxusa abantu ukuthi bangafeli ngaphakathi, babike ezehlakalo zokudlwengulwa kwezingane nabesifazane, bangakuvumeli ukusatshiswa.
title: Umfana oneminyaka ewu-11 ungomunye wababoshelwe ukudlwengula

text: Sithembiso Mkhize Ngemuva kweminyaka ewu-16 i-Absa nePSL besebenzisana, ngoJuni ibhange limemezele ukuthi ngeke lisaqhubeka nokusebenzisana nePSL.Kule minyaka ewu-16, i-ABSA ibe ngabaxhasi bePremiership ngokusemthethweni ewu-13. Isivumelwano sasayinwa ngo-2007 emuva kokuphuma kweCastle Lager, eyaqala neligi ngo-1996.Nakuba kungacaci ngemininingwane ephelele kodwa kuvela ukuthi iDStv nePSL eholwa usihlalo u-Irvin Khoza, sebeqede konke. Ngokomthombo isigaba esiphezulu seligi yakuleli sesizobizwa ngeDStv Championship. Kuvela nokuthi kulezi zinsuku lezi zinkampani zimatasatasa ziqopha izikhangiso.“Uma kukhona, kuncane kakhulu osekungaphazamisa lobudlelwano obuphenjwa iDStv nePSL. Njengoba iligi iqala ngasekuqaleni kuka-Okthoba, kulindeleke ukuthi ubudlelwano bumenyezelwe ngokusemthethweni ngaphambi kokuphela kwephezulu,” kubeka umthombo wathi udabukela iSABC, eyizimbangi zeDStv.Kuthintwa uGideon Khobane oyisikhulu esiphezulu kwaMultiChoice okuyinkampani ephethe iDStv, uthe: "Ngicela ukungaphawuli ngalolu daba. Thinta iPSL uqobo.”Uma kugcine ngokuthi iDStv ibe abaxhasi, kubukeka kuzobusa iMultiChoice, kwiPSL. Kumanje kuneMultiChoice Diski Challege (MDC) okuyiligi okudlala kuyo u-Under 21 wamaqembu esigaba esiphezulu.Le nkampani ibuye ibenesivumelwano nePSL sokusakazwa kwemidlalo esiteshini sayo, iSuperSport.Phambilini kwakuyiSABC esakaza imidlalo njengoba manje isiphila ngokusikelwa umbengwana wokusakaza imidlalo yePSL. Lokhu kudalwa ukuthi kunezakhamuzi zakuleli ezingenayo inkece yokukhokhela iDStv.I-ABSA ishiye iPSL isanda kumemezela ukuthi ngesizini ka-2018/19 yenze inzuzo ka-R1 billion okuyinto ebiqala.Imizamo yokuthola isikhulu esiphezulu esibambile kwiPSL, uMato Madlala ayiphumelelanga ngoba ucingo ubengaluphenduli kanjalo nomyalezo awuthunyelwe.Kube sekuzanywa uLux September okhulumela iPSL, wathi: “Kangilwazi udaba lweDStv. Ngicela ubuyele kuye uMadlala”.
title: Ngabe iDStv ingabaxhasi abasha bePSL?

text: UMNYANGO weMfundo ePhakeme ukhiphe uR1.3 billion ozosetshenziswa ukulungiselela ukuvulwa kwezikhungo bese zilwa neCorona.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uDkt Blade Nzimande, uveze lokhu ekade ephendula umbuzo awubuzwe ilungu lePhalamende leDA uSolwazi Belinda Bozzoli.USolwazi Bozzoli ubuze ukuthi ngabe umnyango ukulungele yini ukuvula izikhungo.Uphinde wabuza ukuthi ngabe kuzoqashwa abanye abantu abazoqinisekisa ukuthi izitshudeni ziyaqhelelana nokuthi ziphephile yini.Ephendula uNzimande uthe umnyango wakhe utshale imali enguR1.1 million nenye enguR1.5 million ukuze kulawulwe igciwane ezakhiweni zomnyango ezine, nasemahhovisi abo ayisithupha.“Kulesi sabelomali sibheke ukuba kube nezifonyo ezingu-3 800 zabasebenzi, okokubulala amagciwane, ama-scanner, okokuhlanza izakhiwo nokokuhlanza amahhovisi,” kusho uNzimande.Uphinde wathi: “Okunye okungaba izidingo kubekelwe uR2.3 million. Sekukonke umnyango ubeke uR5 million.”Uthe izikhungo zathunyelelwa izincwadi ngoMeyi 13 bebuza ukuthi izindleko zabo zokufundisa, ukufunda, ukuhlola nokulungisa izikhungo zingakanani wathi zacelwa ukuba zibuyise umbiko ngoMeyi 19.Uthe izikhungo zathi izindleko ziphakathi kukaR2.1 million kuya kuR 402.8 million.“Izindleko sezizonke zibe uR1.85 billion,” kusho yena.Uthe babonisane noMnyango wezeMpilo ngokuthi bazolekelelana.“Okwamanje ungqongqoshe unxuswe ukuba aphasise uR526.3 million kunyaka wezimali * -2020/21 woxhaso ukulekelela izikhungo ukulungiselela, ukubheka ezempilo nokuphepha,” kusho uNzimande.UNzimande uthe amakolishi amakhono athole uR780 million ukuze abhekane neCorona.
title: OkaNzimande ukhiphe R1.3bn ozosiza izikhungo

text: ZIWAKHALELE amadoda amabili asoLundi asolwa ngokweba imfuyo.Kuthiwa babanjwe izolo ehamba nemfuyo eShanelwane Reserve, eNgome.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe uphiko lwamaphoyisa abhekelele ukwebiwa kwemfuyo eZululand, alunywe indlebe ngala madoda amathathu okuthiwe antshontshe inkomazi nenkonyane.“Amaphoyisa aphuthume lapho ebikelwe ukuthi lamadoda ahamba khona. La madoda anele abona amaphoyisa abaleka angena ehlathini. Amaphoyisa akwazile ukubalandela abamba ababili, okuyindoda eneminyaka engu-38 neneminyaka ewu-45. Bahlulekile ukukhipha ubufakazi bokuthi lezi zinkomo ngezabo. Base beboshwa, bayogcinwa esiteshini samaphoyisa eNgome,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Uqhube wathi uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luveze ukuthi le nkomazi ingenye yezinkomo ezebiwa, kwayolotsholwa ngazo kwaNongoma.UColonel Mbele uthe kulindeleke ukuthi bavele namhlanje eNkantolo yeMantshi eNgotshe, bazobhekana necala lokutholakala nemfuyo eyebiwe. Kubuye kwatholakala nokuthi ayathinteka kwamanye amacala okwebiwa kwemfuyo abikwe kuyo le ndawo ngenyanga edlule.
title: Bazovela enkantolo ngezinsolo zokweba imfuyo

text: KUZOHLONISHWA omakadebona babaculi bakuleli, uBishop Benjamin Dube nomufi uDan Tshanda, ku26th South African Music Awards (Sama) ngemiklomelo yeLifetime Achievement Award kulo nyaka. UBenjamin ungezinye zezingwazi zomculo wokholo eziyibambe  ishisa yaze yapholela ezandleni. Ngokusho kwesitatimende uBenjamin ungomunye wamavulandlela kulo mculo owazakhela udumo ngeculo elahatshulelwa yizo zonke izinhlanga futhi eladayisa amakhophi awu25 000 elalithi Holy Spirit ngo1986. "I-albhamu yakhe yokuqala eyaqoshwa bukhoma eyayisihloko sithi I Feel Like Going On yazuza iPlatinum futhi yadayiswa nasemazweni amaningi e-Afrika nakwawase-Europe nase-America okukhona i-USA, Sweden, Netherlands, France, Australia, Japan nase-UK. Ungumsunguli nomfundisi omkhulu webandla iHigh Praise Centre eVosloorus, Ekurhuleni futhi wamukele inqwaba yezindondo ngisho nakumaSama. Akagcini ngokucula nokushumayela kodwa uphiwe nasekukhulumeni kangangoba useke washiyelana inkundla nabaholi abanohlonze okubalwa kubo uNelson Mandela, Thabo Mbeki, Bishop TD Jakes, Kirk Franklin noAndrae Crouch. Ungumnikazi wenkampani yomculo  iDube Connection, esikhiqize inqwaba yamacwecwe futhi usecije inqwaba yezihlabani zabaculi bokholo kuleli. Umufi uTshanda washisa kakhulu izikhotha ngeminyaka yo1980 ngohlobo lomculo olwalubizwa nge-bibblegum noma i-disco jive. UTshanda, odabuka eSoweto, waqala ukwaziwa esahola iqembu leSplash futhi babevutha bengabaselwe nge-albhamu eyayithi Peacock. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa igama lakhe lachunyiswa yicwecwe elalithi Snake nelalithi Imitshokotshoko. Ngeminyaka yo1990 leli qembu laqhubeka lapho ligcine khona ngenoni elalithi Eye For An Eye, Khoma Khoma nelithi Why. Ngeminyaka yo2000 wabe esesungula inkampani yakhe yomculo iDalom Music Distributers futhi bakhiqiza unqambothi lwama-albhamu adayisa kakhulu okwakukhona eyayithi Ndivhuwo nethi Sethopa. UTshanda ugcine esenabalandeli emazweni ahlukahlukene ase-Afrika lkubalwa kuwo iZimbabwe, Botswana, Namibia, Swaziland neNigeria. Awugcina ukuthakaselwa e-Afrika kuphela kodwa nasemazweni aphesheya kwezilwandle njengaseNorth America, Europe nase-Australia bawuthakaselile. Ngaphansi kwesandla sakhe kube sekuphuma abaculi okubalwa kubo oPatricia Majalisa, Matshikos neDalom Kids. Kulo nyaka umklomelo we-International Achiever Award uzokwamukelwa yiNdlovu Youth Choir yaseLimpopo ngenxa yezimanga eyazigila kwiAmerica’s Got Talent njengoba yaze yaphuma emzuliswaneni wamanqamu futhi yasayinwa yiSony Music,  ngokubambisana neSyco Entertainment, ephethwe yinkakha yaseBritain, Simon Cowell. Inhloko yamaSama, uNhlanhla Sibisi, uthe yimiklomelo emikhulu lena enikezwa amaqhawe adabuka kuleli. "Siyajabula ukuthi omunye wabazohlonishwa nguBishop Benjamin Dube, osadla anhlamvana ukuze abone ehlonishwa. Kumndeni kaDan Tshanda sithi yindlela esimkhumbula ngayo nesigubha ngayo amagalelo akhe esifisa niduduzeke ngakho’’. ’’Siyaziqhenya ngempumelelo yeNdlovu Youth Choir nokuba yisibonelo entsheni sokuthi yonke into ingenzeka. Bayifanele indondo ye-International Achievement Award," kuphetha uSibisi. AmaSama akulo nyaka azokhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic ngempelasonto ezayo.
title: Kuzohlonishwa ingqalabutho yomculo wokholo kumaSama

text:
SEKUQUBUKE umbango ngesidumbu sikaJabulani “HHP” Tsambo njengoba unkosikazi wakhe uLerato Roberta Sengadi esefake amaphepha enkantolo okuthi ufuna isidumbu sakhe athi akasazi sikuphi futhi ufuna ukuzingcwabela yena uHHP. Ufuna nokuthi kuhlehle umngcwabo obuhlelelwe ukuthi ube ngoMgqibelo eMahikeng eNorth West.Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo lolu daba luzodingidwa kusasa eNkantolo eNkulu eGoli.Kulawa maphepha kuvela ukuthi laba bashada umshado wesintu ngoFebhuwari 28, 2016 kanti ngokomthetho uLerato ungunkosikazi kaHHP.Kuvela lolu daba nje umndeni kaHHP usanda kushicilela isitatimende ucacisa ukuthi uLerato noHHP abakaze bashade. FUNDA: 
'U-HHP akaze ashadelwe' - umndeni“Ngifisa ukucacisa ukuthi uNksz Sengadi akasiye umfelokazi futhi akakaze ashade noJabulani," kusho okhulumela umndeni uMnuz Nkululeko Ncana.  Uthe uLerato wayeyingoduso kaHHP. Waqhuba waveza nokuthi uLerato waphuma emzini kaHHP ngonyaka odlule waqhubeka nempilo yakhe. Ngaleso sikhathi uLerato nonina bacelwa ukuthi bayeke ukukhuluma amanga angachazwanga ukuthi amayelana nani.ULERATO Sengadi ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwinkonzo yesikhumbuzo kaHHP ngoLwesibili. Isithombe: Simpiwe Mbokazi/African News Agency/ANA“Njengamanje umndeni wakwaTsambo unegunya lokwenza noma yini uma ngabe uLerato eqhubeka nokuqamba amanga.”UNcana ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uLerato nonina baye emzini kaHHP eRandpark Ridge eGoli, ngosuku ashona ngalo.Uthe bafika bafuna imininingwane okubalwa kuyona amakhadi asebhange, isikhwama semali, ucingo namaphepha omshuwalense kukaHHP. UNcana uqhube wathi laba bahambile babuye babuya ngoMgqibelo kanti bazozithela phezu kukayise kaHHP no-anti bakhe.Ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwinkonzo yesikhumbuzo ngoLwesibili uLerato ukukhahlele ngazo zombili ukuthi bebengashadile noHHP.
title: Umbango wesidumbu sika-HHP

text: ZIKHONJWA kwisiteshi sethelevishini izilomo ezimbili, okubalwa umsakazi nomlingisi weminye yemidlalo kwi-1 Magic. ULawrence Maleka wodumo lweThe River, uzovumbuka kuSABC 1 nohlelo olusha okulindeleke ukuthi lushise izikhotha. Lolu hlelo olubizwa ngokuthi Too Hot To Be Single kulindeleke ukuthi  luqale ngo-Ephreli 8. Ngokusho kweSABC wuhlelo lwabantu abafuna uthando ngendlela yesimanje futhi ebingajwayelekile kwindlu emnyama. Kujwayelekile ukuthi insizwa izibike kwintokazi eyibuke yayithanda uma ihlangana nayo kodwa lolu hlelo luzokwenza okuhlukile ngoba abanye bazoxhunyaniswa ngisho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Umuntu uzonikwezwa nethuba lokuzikhethela kubantu abahlukene, ahlunge aze afike kulo azizwa sengathi unazo zonke lezi zinto azifunayo ebudlelwaneni bezothando.Omunye ozokhonjwa kwiSABC, obengumsakazi weGagasi FM uZola Zeelovin. Le ntokazi ibingomunye wabasakazi abebengaconsi phansi kubalaleli  bomsakazo. Yize kwakuba muncu kubalandeli bakhe  ngesikhathi ekhipha isitatimende ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kodwa sebezokwazi ukumbona ohlelweni olusha lwezokuvakasha kuSABC 1. Lolu hlelo olubizwa ngokuthi Shayi'Round, kulindeleke ukuthi luqale ngo-Ephreli 7. Luzogxila kwezokuvakasha lubheka abangani, abasebenzi nezelamani.Owengamele ezokuxhumana kuSABC 1, uDzivhuluwani Siala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi iSABC inalezi zinhlelo wathi kuningi ababukeli abazokufunda ngobuhle bezokuvakasha nabazokuthakasela ngezobudlelwane bezothando.
title: Bahlabane ngezinhlelo ezintsha kuSABC 1

text: UKUQOKWA kukaMnuz Bheki Cele esikhundleni sokuba nguNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kujabulise abaningi abebelokhu bekhale njalo uma kwenzeka ubugebengu bethi akubuyiswe uCele, ngakolunye uhlangothi kunalabo abanovalo nongabazane ngobuholi bakhe, uDELI MNCWABE uyahlaziyaSEKUNGUMLANDO ukuthi kuphelile ngoNgqongqoshe obemandla nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, kwangena oke waba nguMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele obelokhu ekhaleleka njalo uma kuvela ukuthi izigebengu ziyazicanasela eNingizimu Afrika.Yize iningi likhombise ukujabula kodwa umlando wakhe ngesikhathi enguKhomishana wamaPhoyisa eminyakeni edlule, ubuyise uvalo nongabazane ngobuholi bakhe kwabaningi.Okhulumela inyunyana yamaphoyisa iPopcru, uMnuz Richard Mamabolo uthe bayakwemukela ukuqokwa kukaCele, wathi bayazi ukuthi uhlalelwe umqansa ongenyukwa mbongolo njengoba kufanele asebenze kanzima ukubuyisa isithunzi sezokuvikela.“Siyakwemukela ukuqokwa koNgqongqoshe abazosebenza emkhakheni wezokuphepha. Siyazi ukuthi uCele akamusha kulo mkhakha. Useke wasebenza njengokhomishana, isipiliyoni sakhe asithola ngokudlula sizomsiza ukungena athi khaxa asebenze kushunqe uthuli.“Okukuqala okufanele akwenze wukudiliza inqwaba yezikhulu kuzwelonke nasezifundazweni, aphinde aqinisekise ukuthi anele amaphoyisa eziteshini,’’ kusho uMamaboloAkumangazi ukubonakala kwezithombe zikaCele nama-video edansa abantu bejabuliswa yisinqumo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Eqokwe ngayizolo uCele, ufike lazwakala izwi lakhe njengoba ekade ehambele inkonzo yesikhumbuzo samaphoyisa aseNgcobo.“Akumele nife niphethe izibhamu,” waphinde watshela amaphoyisa la mazwi ake wawasho phambilini ukuthi amaphoyisa kumele ashaye enyameni kwizigilamkhuba.I-DA ikhuze umhlolo ngokubuyiswa kukaCele yathi kuyichilo eliphindiwe. UMnuz Zakhele Mbhele obhekele ezamaphoyisa uthe akasiboni isidingo sokubuyiswa kukaCele emaphoyiseni.“Kuyethusa ukuthi umuntu owake watshela amaphoyisa ukuthi awadubule enyameni ezigebengwini usebuyisiwe. Sihlala sigcizelela ukuthi umbutho wamaphoyisa udinga ukuphathwa abantu abafanele,’’ kusho uMbhele.Kunenkolelo yokuthi uCele uyaziswacisa izigebengu ngamazwi nangemiyalelo ayinika amaphoyisa.Nokho akhona amaphutha nogcobho ababonwa yilabo abangaphakathi emaphoyiseni, abakholwa wukuthi umuntu okulesi sikhundla kumele kube wumuntu osemnkantshubomvu emaphoyiseni.Kwamanye amaphutha akhonjwa kuCele, kubalwa udaba okukholakala ukuthi lwamxoshisa ekubeni wuKhomishana wamaPhoyisa, kubalwa udaba lokuthengwa kwesakhiwo samaphoyisa, nalapho owayenguMvikeli woMphakathi, * -Advocate Thuli Madonsela athi ingcabha yayikuCele ngalolu daba.Okunye okumdalele amazinyo abushelelezi yizinkulumo zakhe. Kuzona kubalwa ayenza ngesikhathi kuphenywa kabanzi icala lokubulawa kuka-Annie Dewani nokwakusolwa umyeni wakhe uShrien ngokumbulalela kuleli. Lolu daba lwagcina ukunakwa kusekhona uCele ngemuva kwalokho kwathuleka ngalo kwagcinwa kuboshwe uXoli Mngeni noMziwadoda Qwabe kwathi owayesolwa phambili uDewani waphunyula.UCele wabiza umsolwa ngenkawu esuke ezweni layo yazogila ubugebengu lapha eNingizimu Afrika. Lokhu akwehlanga kahle kwabaningi. Kwaphoqa ukuthi agcine ehlele ngezansi axolise ngenkulumo yakhe.Enye inkulumo ngeyokugqugquzela amaphoyisa ukuba adubule ashaye enyameni ezigebengwini, abuze emva kwendaba.Olunye udaba kube ngolombutho owaziwa ngeleTRT (amabherete) ake asolwa ngobuge-bengu nokungaziphathi kahle. Indlela abesebenza ngayo ibishiya imibuzo nezinsolo zokunga-hambisi kahle.Ubudle-lwano obuqinile phakathi kukaCele bubonakale ngisho esephumile esikhundle-ni sokuba ngukhomi-shana njengoba ake wakho-mbisa ukuweseka amanye awo ngesikhathi evela eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini eyoqula icala.Lokhu kukhombise ngokusobala ukuthi nakuba kwake kwakhona umsindo wokuthi akakaze abe yiphoyisa njengoba aye ngumkhuzi wawo, kodwa ukusebenza ngokuzimisela nokuba ngumuntu okwazi ukuxhu-mana nalo mbutho, kwenze waba ngumuntu ogcina ethenjwa yiwo.Phezu kwakho konke lokhu iningi labantu lithi uCele ubenza okufanele futhi unguMesiya ozokhipha umphakathi wakuleli ebugqileni obudalwa wukudlanga kobugebengu.Ubufakazi wukuthi ngesikhathi engukhomishana wamaphoyisa wenze umphakathi waphila ngokuphepha ngenxa yokuthi ubugebengu bubonakale behla.UCele waziwa ngokuzibambela mathupha efika endaweni yesigameko azibophezele ekuxazululeni inkinga nokuhambela imiphakathi abheke ukuthi yiziphi izinkinga ebhekene nazo.Nakuba nabanye bekwenza kodwa okukaCele kuyadlulela nokungenye yezinto emenze wathandwa ngabantu.Akekho ongakhohlwa ukuthi uCele uphinde abe nendaba nendlela amaphoyisa abukeka ngayo. Lokhu kubonakale ngesikhathi egqugquzela ukuthi awajime futhi akhece imikhaba, kugqame isifuba.Phakathi kobugebengu obebudla lubi kulezi zinsuku kubalwa ukuqolwa kwezimoto ezithwala imali.Nakuba kungakapheli ngisho isonto kodwa uCele usephawulile ngalokhu wathi ngesikhathi sakhe waqeda ngalolu hlobo lobugebengu. Uthe uzibophezele ukuqeda nya ngabo nangobunye obuphilisa lubhojozi umphakathi.Ukubuya kwakhe azohlenga isizwe yinto osekunesikhathi ikhaleleka. Lokhu kubonakale ngemikhankaso ethi #BringBhekiCele ne-#BringNdosiBack ebishisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Kwayena ubelibeka ngembaba elokuthi uyakhumbula futhi usawulobizela lo msebenzi. Ngamanye amazwi inkulumo ayenza emngcwabeni wowayengumsakazi uNat “Cool Kat” Gumbi, lapho athi ukhathele wukujahana namaklabishi, ufuna ukujaha izigebengu, lifezekile.
title: Bheki Cele: Sijabule noma sihlalel’ ovalweni...

text: UMA kukhulunywa ngabesifazane abayizingqalabutho emlandweni wenkululeko yezwe lethu usuke ungakaqedi ukukhuluma ungakaliphathi igama likamakadebona womzabalazo uNkk Nomzamo Winnie Madikizela-Mandela. Omunye uzozibuza ukuthi kungani sivele sisukela yena nje bebaningi kangaka, phela uMadikizela-Mandela owayibamba ishisa ngezikhathi zengcindezelo uhlanganisa iminyaka engu-80 esadla anhlamvana.Wazalwa ngo-1936 eMbongweni, eMbhizana esifundazweni i-Eastern Cape ezalwa nguMnuz Columbus noNomathamsanqa Getrude Madikizela. Abazali bakhe ababengothisha bashona eneminyaka engu-9. Lesi sishoshovu somzabalazo siyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC. Okunye abantu abaningi abangakwazi ngoMadikizela-Mandela wukuthi waqopha umlando ngokuba ngowesifazane omnyama wokuqala ukusebenza njengosonhlalakahle. Phela ngesikhathi sikahulumeni wobandlululo kwakuyivela kancane ukuthi umuntu onsundu athole imisebenzi enjalo.Uneziqu zeBachelor of Arts azithola e-University of Witwatersrand abe ne-National Diploma in Social Work ayithola eJan H Hofmeyer School of Social Work.UMadikizela-Mandela wajoyina i-ANC ngo-1950, kwathi ngo-1957 wahlangana nengqalabutho yomzabalazo eyagcina ingumengameli wokuqala omnyama wale lizwe, uDkt Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela. Washada noMandela emva kokuba ehlukanise nowayengunkosikazi wakhe u-Evelyn Mandela. Ngesikhathi uMadiba ehlangana noMadikzela wayenecala lokuvukela umbuso ehambisana nezinye izigayigayi zomzabalazo. NgoJuni 19, 1958 bashada baba nomuzi eSoweto, bathola amadodakazi amabili uZenani noZinzi.Izinto zake zaba nzima kakhulu empilweni kaMadikizela-Mandela ehlukunyezwa wuhulumeni wobandlululo ngoba eshade nalesi sishoshovu somzabalazo. Wayeshaywa, aboshwe engavunyelwe ukuya ezindaweni ezithile, enqatshelwa ukusebenza kubhekwa nokuthi uxoxa nobani. Konke lokhu kwakwenzeka ngesikhathi uDkt Mandela esejele eRobben Island lapho agqunywa khona iminyaka engu-27 ngamacala okuvukela umbuso.Njengoba IsiZulu sisho ukuthi akukho siziba singahlokomi, nakuMadikizela-Mandela akuhambanga kahle phakathi kwakhe noMadiba njengoba lagcina ligqabukile ifindo lomshado wabo.Ezikhundleni ezibalulekile ake aziphatha uMadikizela-Mandela kubalwa esokuba uMengameli we-ANC Womens League, aphinde abe yilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kuKhongolose, abuye abe yilungu lePhalamende kuzwelonke. Wake waba yiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezoBuciko namaSiko kuzwelonke, waba yiNhloko yoMnyango wezeNhlalakahle kuZwelonke.Wabuye wabamba elikhulu iqhaza ezinhlelweni nasemikhankasweni eminingi yenkululeko yezwe. Igama lakhe liyohlale lisemlandweni. Uke wasungula neqembu lebhola iMandela FC eyagcina iyamaniswa nezigameko zobelelesi.Uhlabane ngezindondo zokuhlonishwa azithola ngokuhlanganyela noDkt Mandela okuyi-Bremen Solidarity Prize neThird World Foundation Prize. Kamuva nje uke waphoxa umholi we-Economic Freedom Fighters uMnuz Julius Malema emtshela kwezikabhoqo ukuthi ngeke alijoyine iqembu lakhe. Phela ubudlelwane babo ungabufanisa nobukamama nendodana.UMadikizela- Mandela wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi alikho elinye iqembu lezepolitiki alaziyo emhlabeni ngaphandle kwe-ANC akhulela kuyona.Uke wahlushwa wukugula kodwa wabuye walulama. UMadikizela-Mandela ungomunye wabesifazane abansundu abayisibonelo esihle emphakathini okungathi uma intsha yakithi ibukela kuye kube kuningi ekuzuzayo empilweni ibe ngabaholi bakusasa abakhaliphile.
title: Isishoshovu esingumakadebona

text: UKAPUTENI weSuperSport United, uDean Furman, ugxeka abangabaza ikhono labanye onozinti okufanele bavale isikhala sika-Itumeleng Khune kwiBafana Bafana.UKhune weKaizer Chiefs, ulimale ehlombe ezinyangeni ezedlule nokuvela ukuthi uyoze adlale ngesizini ezayo.Lokhu akuzweli kuphela kwiChiefs, esibamba iyeka, kodwa nakwiBafana ayisethenjwa sayo. Iningi libona iBafana izoba nenkinga kakhulu ezintini ngokulimala kukaKhune oselenze elakhe ijezi kwiBafana iminyaka. Ngo-2015 kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon), umqeqeshi * -Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba, wamshiya uKhune owayesanda kubuya ekulimaleni. UMashaba ugcine ebavimbisa bonke onozinti ayehambe nabo, iBafana yakhishwa ekuseni.UFurman uthe uKhune akayona iBafana eyedwa.“Asikwazi ukuqala sikhulume ngomdlali oyedwa. Angicabangi ukuthi umdlali oyedwa uyiqembu lonke. U-Itu ungunozinti osezingeni eliphezulu, akukho ukungabaza ngalokho. Kodwa sinabanye onozinti abalaziyo ipali kule ligi. Siphatheke kabi ngokulimala kuka-Itu kodwa bakhona abanye abanekhono. Kufanele sibathembe ukuthi bazowenza umsebenzi,”kusho uFurman.Umqeqeshi weBafana, uStuart Baxter kufanele aqoke unozinti okuzothenjelwa kuyena uma elakuleli selibhekene neLibya emdlalweni wokugcina wokuhlungela i-Afcon ezoba se-Egypt. Umdlalo uzoba ngoMashi 22 ekuhambeni.Konozinti okubhekwe ukuthi aqoke kubona kukhona uRonwen Williams weSuperSport noDarren Keet weBidvest Wits. Ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezidlule kuqhamuke negama likaSiyabonga Mbatha waMaZulu.“Manje sekusezandleni zikaRonwen noDarren nabanye onozinti ababhekwe ngumqeqeshi ukuthi bathathe ijezi lika-Itu. Impi yalo izoshuba kakhulu. Kuzoba mnandi ukubona ukuthi ubani ozolithola. Ngiyabethemba kakhulu uRonwen noDarren. URonwen ngidlala naye kwiSuperSport angikwazi ukumncoma ngokwanele. Ungunozinti oseqophelweni eliphezulu. Unesibindi. Ngiyazi ukuthi uma eqokiwe angawenza umsebenzi. UDarren ngimazela eqenjini lesizwe. Udlala kahle kule sizini, bahlezi esicongweni se-logi. Kubona bobabili nabanye onozinti inselelo inkulu ukuthi ubani ozothatha ijezi," kusho uFurman.
title: Kubhekwe ozovala esikaKhune kwiBafana

text: INHLANGANO yebhola kuleli iSouth African Football Asociation (Safa) iyaveva ngesinqumo se-SABC sokungayisakazi ngesikhathi imidlalo yeBafana Bafana nakuba benesivumelwano sezigidi zamarandi esithinta ukusakazwa kwemidlalo.Isikhulu esiphezulu seSafa uDennis Mumble sibhoka siyakhahlela ngalolu daba sikhala ngokuthi abantu bakuleli akufanele baphucwe ithuba lokubona iqembu labo lidlala. Lo msindo uqubuke emuva kokuthi i-SABC ihlulekile ukuveza umdlalo ngesikhathi iBafana esicijwa wuStuart Baxter iqumba phansi iNigeria esibayeni sayo e-UYO emasontweni amathathu edlule, okwakuwumdlalo wokuqala wokuhlungela i-AFCON ka-2019. Lo mdlalo wavezwa emuva kwamahora amabili udlalile futhi abasakazi bawo nabahlaziyi babezenza sabantu abangakawazi umphumela womdlalo.I-SABC kuvele ukuthi idonsa kanzima ngokwezimali nokuphoqa ukuthi inciphise izindleko zayo. Kuyasoleka ukuthi ukungavezwa kwemidlalo ngesikhathi kuhambisana nokushoda kwezimali."Siyazi ukuthi babhekene nezinkinga zemali kodwa isizwe sifuna ukubona iqembu laso lidlala, sizoqhubeka nokulwela ukuthi imidlalo ivezwe bukhoma," kusho uMumble othe kuyichilo ukungasakazwa kwemidlalo yeBafana.Uveze nokuthi bazohlangana neSABC baxoxe ngalesi sivumelwano sokusakaza imidlalo abasenza ngo-2015 esizophelelwa yisikhathi ngonyaka ozayo. Isivumelwano sihambisana nokusakazwa kwemidlalo yeBafana emisakazweni yeSABC.UMumble ungene ezintangeni ebuzwa ngesizathu esenza ukuthi umdlalo weBafana neNigeria uvezwe kwiTV emva kwamahora amabili udlalile. “Uma kuyimidlalo yangaphandle sisuke singenawo amalungelo okuyisakaza, kuze kudingeke ukuthi le midlalo igunya lokuyisakaza lithengwe emazweni asuke eyisingethe."Engikuzwe ngosobhincamakhasana wukuthi iSABC ayibanga nayo imali eyanele yokuthenga igunya lokusakaza umdlalo baze bexoxisana ekutheni bathole isaphulelo esihambisana nokuthi umdlalo usakazwe ngemuva kwesikhathi. Uma isimo sinjalo kuchaza ukuthi kufanele siyeseke le nhlangano ngoba sibambisene nayo. Kuyasiphoqa ukuthi sigwinye itshe, kodwa akuchazi ukuthi seneme ngakho. Sibone ukuthi ngeke sikwazi ukuyozikhalela kwiCAF ukuthi ingenelele.”UMumble uqinisekise ukuthi iSABC izosihlonipha isivumelwano sabo ngokuthi ishweleze ngoR10mln oyingxenye yenzuzo kaR33.7mln abayenzile nonyaka esilobe izolo kusazocwaningwa amabhuku ayo.
title: ISafa ithukuthele ngesinqumo seSABC

text: KUBUKEKA sengathi kulo nyaka kuzihambela kahle izinsizwa ohlelweni lomculo ama-Idols SA, njengoba zihamba zodwa futhi zithola izincomo emajajini ngendlela ezicula ngayo.Inani lezinsizwa ezikhombisa ukuthi ziyaphi kulolu hlelo libukeka linyuka usuku nosuku njengoba zilokhu zidlulela ezigabeni ezilandelayo.Njengomuntu osebhale kakhulu ngalolu hlelo futhi osehambele iziqephu ezihlukene la luqoshwa khona angingabazi ukuthi kulo nyaka eyodwa yezinsizwa izodla umhlanganiso.Ngokujwayelekile kulo hlelo kuke kube nokudideka ukuthi obani abahamba phambili phakathi kwezinsizwa nezintokazi ngobugagu.Kodwa kulo nyaka kusheshe kwacaca ukuthi izinsizwa zizimisele.NgeSonto esiphuma kulo * -Unathi ukufakazele lokhu engikhuluma ngakho njengoba ebuyise izinsizwa ezimbili zaseGoli, uVictor noSandile.Laba bese bekhonjwe indlela kulolu hlelo kodwa ngenxa yekhono labo abalikhombisa zisuka kwaphoqa ukuthi babuye.Yize uSandile ngingeke ngisho ngiqiniseke ukuthi singambona ku-Top 16 ezokhishwa ngeSonto kodwa angingabazi ukuthi uVictor uphakathi.Le nsizwa ikhiphe ikhono layo lokugcina ngesikhathi icula ingoma kaVusi Nova ethi Ndikuthandile.Ngisho amajaji akubekile ukuthi isahlushwa uvalo nokuma endaweni eyodwa esiteji kodwa nawo akubeke kwacaca ukuthi inekusasa kuloluhlelo.Ezinye izinsizwa ezikhombise ukuzimisela futhi okucacayo ukuthi zizodlulela esigabeni esilandelayo uThato waseKapa, Mnqobi wasePitoli, King B waseGoli, noSnenhlanhla waseThekwini.Kulo nyaka ngesikhathi lezi zinsizwa nezintokazi ezihlukene ziculela izihlwele akekho osukumise izibukeli ngaphandle kukaKing B.Le nsizwa esencane iphimbo layo lenza lokhu okufunwa amajaji futhi nengoma asuke enikwe yona uyicula ngendlela, ukushiya umangele.Kuleli sonto uKing B ucule ingoma ka-Etta James ethi At Last.Lena yingoma yakudala kodwa uKing B wenze konke ukuthi ayicule ngokuzimisela angakhohlwa nelilodwa igama kuyona.Ezintokazini ezikhona manje kulolu hlelo nengicabanga ukuthi yizona esingazibona ku-Top 16, kukhona kuzo uNtokozo waseGoli, Nosipho waseMnabhithi noYanga waseKapa.
title: Zilinyusile izinga izinsizwa kuma-Idols SA

text: XOLILE MPISANEASETHELEKILE esiqhingini saseSaint Lucia amaProteas ukuzoqala amalungiselelo emidlalo yochungechunge lwama-test azoyidlala neqembu laseWest Indies.La maqembu agcina ukubhekana ngqo eWest Indies ngo-2010. Ngo-2016 ayeyingxenye yomqhudelwano owawufake neqembu lase-Australia. Bazodlala imidlalo yama-test emibili ezoba seDarren Sammy Cricket Ground khona eSaint Lucia.UDean Elgar, osanda kuqokwa ngokuphelele ukuba ngukaputeni weqembu lama-test kumaProteas, uthe kumele baqale uhambo olusha kule midlalo.“Kuyasijabulisa siyiqembu ukuthi sizophinda simele izwe lethu. Phezu kokuba sizobe sivalelekile ehhotela ngenxa ye-Covid 19 kodwa okubalulekile wukubuyela enkundleni,” kusho uElgar.“Into esemqoka wukuthi sisheshe sijwayele isimo sezulu nendawo esizohlala kuyona, ukuze amalungiselelo ethu ahambe ngendlela. Kumele sizimisele sisazilolonge ukuze le midlalo isithole sisesimeni esihle. Lokho kusezandleni zethu.”AmaProteas angena kulolu chungechunge nje asehlele endaweni yesikhombisa uma kukleliswa amaqembu ama-test emhlabeni, iWest Indies isendaweni yesithupha. U-Elgar uthe kumele balisebenzise leli thuba ukuze basuke kule ndawo engabafanele.“Kumele sishintshe indlela esicabanga ngayo, akulula kodwa ngoba sikhuluma ngabadlali abawu-18 abangafani. Inhloso wukuthi sonke sikholelwe kuleli qembu nezinhlelo esisebenzela phezu kwazo.“Inselelo enkulu enginayo nginguaputeni omusha wukuthi ngenze bonke abadlali bangethembe futhi bahambisane nezinhlelo ezizoyisa leli qembu phambili.”Kulo nyaka amaProteas asedlale kabili kuma-test, ahlule iSri Lanka ngo 2-0 ngoJanuwari ase ehlulwa yiPakistan ngo 2-0 ngoFebhuwari. Ngaphambi kwalokho babegcine bedlale ne-England ekuqaleni kuka-2020, bakhala ngaphansi ngo 3-1.U-Elgar uthe kabalitholanga ithuba lokuthi badlale into ehlangene ngenxa yokuthi imidlalo ibihlukene kakhulu.“Ubhubhane luphazamise okuningi. Asikwazanga ukudlala isibalo semidlalo esanele,  ngakho-ke kunzima ukusho ukuthi sikuliphi izinga siyiqembu. Njengoba sesithole leli thuba lokuqala kabusha, sifisa ukudlala imidlalo eminingi futhi sidlale kangcono,” kuqhuba uElgar.“Siyazi ukuthi kule midlalo yama-test esayidlala nePakistan kasidlalanga ngendlela esezingeni lamaProteas. Kuningi esikufisayo kodwa asikho isidingo sokuthi sigagamele ngoba ukwakha iqembu kuthatha isikhathi.”
title: AmaProteas azimisele ukunyathela ngolusha eWest Indies

text: USABHEKE ukushaya amanye amagoli umgadli weBlack Leopards, uMwape Musonda. Amagoli akhe amathathu asize leli qembu laseLimpopo labuya kade selisemuva, lakwazi ukuthola amaphuzu amqoka e-Absa Premiership ngempelasonto.ILeopards ibilandela ngemuva ngo 2-0 emdlalweni weligi obuseThohoyandou Stadium kulandela ukuthi uThabo Rakhale noLerato Manzini bebeke iChippa United phambili.Nokho uMusonda wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi ezakhe zithola intuba yokuphefumula ngaphambi kokuthi kuyiwe ekhefini.Esiwombeni sesibili ushaye amanye amagoli amabili. Lokhu kumbeka emagolini awu-12 okumenza ahambe phambili ngamagoli aseshayiwe kwiligi kule sizini. Abamlandela ngemuva uMothobi Mvala weHighlands Park, uTshegofatso Mabaso weBloemfontein Celtic nomgadli weBidvest Wits, uGift Motupa, bonke abanamagoli ayisishiyagalombili.Isibalo sikaMusonda sesiyasidlula esomgadli ovelele ngesizini edlule, uRodney Ramagalela noPercy Tau abaqede isizini namagoli awu-11.ILeopards isalelwe imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili kwiligi kanti uMusonda odabuka eZambia, ufuna ukuqhubeka nokuqhulula amagoli.“Ngijabule ngamagoli awu-12 futhi ngiyakholwa wukuthi ngisengenza kangcono. Sisalelwe imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili. Kuzomele ngiqhubeke ngilwe ngishaye amanye amagoli. Ngijabule ngokuthi ngishaye amagoli amathathu kodwa obekumqoka kakhulu wukutholela iqembu amaphuzu amathathu,” kusho uMusonda.Lo mgadli akaqali ukuvutha kwiLidoda Duvha. Ubukhali bakhe phambi kwamapali buyisize ekutheni ikhuphukele kwi-Absa Premiership ngesizini edlule, isuka kwiNational First Division (NFD).Sebedinga yena futhi ukuthi aqhubeke nomgqigqo ukuze bangabuyeli kwiNFD. ILeopards ibalwa namaqembu abalekela ukwehlela ezembeni. Amaphuzu amathathu angempelasonto ayibeke emaphuzwini awu-25, endaweni ka-12 kwi-log.Amaqembu angaphansi kwayo iFree State Stars, Chippa United neBaroka FC asengayidlula uma enqoba imidlalo yawo bese iLeopards idedela amaphuzu emidlalweni esele.“Yithina ebesizibulala emidlalweni edlule. Kumele sifunde singavumeli izimbangi zisilimaze kuqala ngaphambi kokuthi siphaphame.Kumele kube yithina esilawula umdlalo uqala uze uyophela,” kusho uMusonda.Emdlalweni olandelayo weligi bazovakashela e-Orlando Stadium bayobhekana ne-Orlando Pirates ngoMashi 29.
title: Umgadli weLeopards ugaqele lukhulu

text: BAGIXABEZWE ngoR3.5 million abadlali beFree State Stars ngemuva kokunqoba isicoco seNedbank Cup ngoMgqibelo.Leli qembu lihlabane ngoR7 million emuva kokuqumba phansi iTeam of Choice ngo 1-0 wegoli likaGoodman Dlamini eCape Town Stadium, eKapa.Isikhulu seqembu, uRantsie Mokoena sitshele Isolezwe ngemuva komdlalo wezaso neTeam of Choice ukuthi abadlali bazothola uhhafu wemali abayinqobile.“Noma kanjani abadlali bazohlomula ngempumelelo yeqembu. Sinohlelo oluqondile lwamabhonasi eqenjini. Lokhu akukhathelekile noma imidlalo yeligi noma eyemikhumulajezi. Bayazi bazotholani. Bazoya emakhaya bejabule. Uhhafu wemali esiyinqobile uzoya kubadlali,” kusho uMokoena.IStars iqede indlala yeminyaka iphuthwa yizicoco. Leli qembu bese liqede iminyaka engu-24 lagcina ukunqoba isicoco. Laligcine ngeCoca Cola Cup ngo-1994.“Kuyamangaza. Silinde isikhathi eside, bekumele kufike isikhathi. Sibe nesizini enhle. Bese sishoda ngendebe ukuhlobisa isizini yethu. Ngasekupheleni kwesizini abafana bakhathalile kodwa bazabalaza. Siyabonga kakhulu kubadlali. Abalandeli abaphume ngobuningi babo ngeke sibashiye ngaphandle. Ngijabule kakhulu. Angazi ngithini ngendlela engithokoze ngayo,” kusho uMokoena.Ngesizini ezayo iStars izodlala kwiCAF Confederation Cup.“Sisayinise abadlali abafike eqenjini basebenza. Umqeqeshi ufike isizini isanda kuqala. Impumelelo yethu incike ekuhleleni ngobuchule. Sinabadlali abaziphethe kahle.” kuphetha uMokoena.
title: Abadlali beStars bahlomule ngoR3.5 million

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane, uzibophezele ukweseka umdlali wasesiswini, u-Andile Jali, olale ebaliwe ngesonto eledlule ngecala lokushaya umkakhe.AmaBrazilians abemanqika ukuphawula ngesimo sikaJali okuvele ukuthi akaziqeqeshanga neqembu izinsuku eziphelele. UMosimane utshele abezindaba ngoLwesihlanu ukuthi akafuni ukukhuluma ngokwenzeka ngaphandle kwenkundla ngoJali.NgoMeyi uJali uboshelwe ukushayela ephuzile. Icala lokushaya umkakhe uNonhle Jali lizongena namuhla emuva kokuhlehliswa ngesonto eledlule.UJali ubedlala ngesikhathi iSundowns ihlulwa yiBaroka ngo 2-0 emdlalweni we-quarterfinal yeTelkom Knockout ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, ngoMgqibelo.“U-Andile wumdlali ophezulu, udlale kahle kakhulu namuhla. Usezingeni leBafana. Sijabule ngo-Andile. Umsebenzi wethu kwiSundowns wukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi udlala kaningi futhi kangcono kunalokhu ayikho manje.
