Ubonile indlela aphunga ngayo izitha nendlela aliphaka ngayo ibhola. Ungumdlali omuhle futhi siyamdinga. Sidinga ukumeseka ukuze adlale ibhola. Njengawo wonke umuntu sidinga ukumeseka.“Ungumdlali wethu, sifake imali kuye. Kuwumsebenzi wethu, ikakhulukazi mina, ukumeseka, ikakhulukazi ngalesi sikhathi. Usangishayele into ecokeme ekubeni ebhekene nobunzima. Ababaningi abantu, mhlawumbe nami, abangadlala ngendlela adlala ngayo ezimeni abhekene nazo. Mhlawumbe nawe njengentatheli ubungacela ukungadlali. Usendaweni enhle kwiSundowns, sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyameseka ukuze adlale ibhola. Ulapha ukuzodlala ibhola. Uma kukhona olunye usizo olungaphandle aludingayo, sizomtholela lona. Kuwumsebenzi wethu,” kusho uMosimane.ISundowns iphunyukwe yindebe yesithathu selokhu kuqale isizini ka-2018/2019. Ikhishwe kwiCAF Champions League, MTN 8 njengoba isiphuma kwiTelkom.Mayelana nokuhlulwa yiBaroka, uthe kufanele basemukele isimo. Wavuma ukuthi abawakhanga amathuba anele okushaya amagoli.“Kufanele samukele, siqhubekele phambili. Phezu kokuba umdlalo besikade siwuphethe sawulawula, lokho akusho ukuthi uzowina. Kufanele ushaye amagoli. Asizange silishaye igoli. Esiwombeni sesibili belingekho ithemba lokushaya igoli. Ngeke uyiwine yonke imidlalo. Siyayibongela iBaroka.”“ISundowns idlala kwiChampions League futhi kufanele sikulungele esizohlangana nakho kuyona. Silungiselela iChampions League. Imidlalo efana nalena iyakulungiselela ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi ungadlala kahle, ibhola lingashayi isandla ebhokisini kube yiphenathi. Lishayise kumuntu lingene phakathi, yigoli. Kunjalo ebholeni. Nathi siyohlomula ngelinye ilanga. Namuhla kubhekene nathi, siqhubekela phambili. Sihluliwe asikhonondi ngonondweba. Ngicela ningincome ngalokho.”
title: Sizomeseka uJali ngoba ungumdlali wethu: Pitso

text: UKUKHISHWA inyumbazane kwalabo asebehaqwe yigciwane iCorona kuletha itwetwe kubantu mayelana nokuhlolwa igciwane.Lokhu kunekelwe uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, ngamanye amalungu omphakathi eMlaza njengoba ebehambele khona ngoMgqibelo ukuyokuzwa amanzi ngobhoko ngohlelo lokungena umuzi nomuzi kuhlolwa igciwane okulindeleke lethulwe ngokusemthethweni wuNdunankulu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala kuleli sonto.UNkk Simelane-Zulu uthe amanye amalungu omphakathi azwakalise ukwesaba indlela abantu abambuka ngayo umuntu osekuvele ukuthi usehaqwe wubhubhane.“Njengohulumeni siyadinga ukuqinisa kakhulu ekufundiseni abantu ukuthi igciwane lithathelana kanjani ngoba sekunocwasana okukhulu emphakathini. Komunye umuzi esingene kuwo abasanda kudlulelwa yilungu lomndeni, basitshele ukuthi uma umuntu ephuma kwakhe ezodlula emasangweni alo muzi uvala umlomo okudala isithombe esibi sengathi yilo mndeni onaleli gciwane endaweni,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe abantu kufanele bazi ukuthi igciwane lingahlasela wonke umuntu uma engalandeli imigomo yezempilo ebekiwe.Ubehambisana namavolontiya azosebenza ukubheka abanezimpawu zegciwane nabanye kwabangu-1 400 abajutshwe ukuhlola abantu eKZN.Uthe ngaphambi kokuthi umuntu ahlolwe, kuzoqala labo abaqaphe izimpawu ukuthi bambuze imibuzo mayelana nezimpawu zokugula anazo nanokuthi useke wasondelana yini nomuntu onegciwane uma kutholakala ukuthi akanazo izimpawu futhi akakaze asondelane nonegciwane, ngeke ahlolwe kodwa uma kukhona okukodwa kwalokhu anakho bazobe sebemdlulisela kwabahlolayo.Uthe yize uhlelo lungakethulwa ngokusemthethweni kodwa ukuhambela kwabo eMlaza bekuhloswe ngakho ukuluhlola ukuthi uma selethuliwe yiziphi izinselelo abazobhekana nazo.Uhlabe ikhwelo lokuthi bonke abezempilo abangafisa ukuzovolontiya beze ngoba ithimba labangu-1 400 liyisibalo esincane kakhulu.Uthe bazobheka izindawo lapho kuzogcinwa abahaqwe igciwane kuyona yonke imikhandlu emikhulu esifundazweni kanti uqinisekise ukuthi kusasa uzobe esedlulisela kundunankulu izindawo lapho kuzobekwa khona lezi zibhedlela ezizoba ngomahambanendlwana.
title: Itwetwe ngokucwaswa kwabaneCorona

text: SESIGXEKWE kakhulu isenzo sebandla iThe Old Apostolic Church (OAC) ngokuvumela umfundisi walo ohola intsha ukuthi aqhubeke kulesi sikhundla ekubeni esolwa ngezenzo zokuhlukumeza ngokocansi.Leli bandla, eliseCape Town, lisolwa ababhekene nokuvikela amalungelo ezingane. Basola umfundisi Lavender Hill ngokuba yingxenye yohambo lwentsha yaleli lokuya eBotswana.Leli bandla selivikele umfundisi walo ngokuthi lithi ngeke limmise engakatholwa enecala.UNksz Lucinda Evans, ongusihlalo weCommunity Policing Forum (CPF) olwela amalungelo abesifazane nezingane eMitchells Plain, uthe isenzo sebandla sisho ukuthi ohlukunyeziwe aqhubeke nokuzithola esenkingeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa u-André Traut ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunecala elivulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa iSteenberg, nokuthi selivele lisenkantolo.Umfundisi usolwa ngokudlwengula umfundi kaGrade 12 waseSeawinds.Ngokuka Nksz Evans, iyamcasula indaba yokungahlonishwa kokuphepha kwezingane.“Sibe nombhikisho, senzela ukuthi angabi yingxenye yentsha ethatha lolu hambo. Sizwe kamuva ibhasi isihambile ukuthi uthathwe ndawana thile uma usanda kuphuma eCape Town,” kusho yena.UNobhala we-OAC esifundeni esikule ndawo uMnuz Edrick Ipland, uthe udaba useludlulisele kumphathi omkhulu ebandleni.Uthe sebenolwazi ngaleli cala. Ukuvumile ukuthi umfundisi ube yingxenye yabathabathe uhambo oluya eBotswana.“Emuva kokuthi sithole lo mbiko, ubengakatholakali enecala. Siyayihlonipha imithetho yezwe,” kuchaza u-Ipland.Khonamanjalo umfundisi waseGeorge kule ndawo, u-Areal Haarder owayengumholi we7th Day Adventist Church ePacaltsdorp, unikezwe isigwebo seminyaka emibili evalelwe ekhaya, wagwetshwa ukusebenzela umphakathi yiThembalethu Regional Court ngokuhlukumeza ngokocansi intombazane eneminyaka engu-10.Lokhu kuqinisekiswe okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority ezweni uMnuz Eric Ntabazalila.
title: Kugxekwe ibandla ngoMfundisi osolwa ngokudlwengula

text: UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Willies Mchunu uthi iyabakhuthaza imibono abayithola kubantu uma benza ucwaningo emphakathini, ngenhloso yokuthola ukuthi baphethe kanjani.Ethula inkulumo yakhe mayelana nesimo sesifundazwe, enkundleni yezemidlalo eRoyal Showgrounds eMgungundlovu, ngaphambi kokuthi axinwe ukugula, uMchunu uthe bathatha isinqumo sokuthi benze ucwaningo emphakathini, ukuze bafunde ukuthi ikuphi lapho bengenzi khona kahle.Uthe bakwenza lokhu ngoba bezibophezele ekutheni bashintshe impilo yabantu.“Siqale ukwenza lolu cwaningo ngo-2015. Siyajabula ukubika ukuthi manje sesiqede ucwaningo luka-2018 futhi siyisifundazwe sokuqala esibe nesibindi sathatha igxathu lokuthi siyekele umphakathi ukuba usihlole ukuthi sisebenza kanjani,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe okutholwe ucwaningo ukuthi u-39%, wabantu awugculisekile ngendlela abenza ngayo, wengeza ngokuthi * -61% ugculisekile. “Into abakhala ngayo kakhulu abantu abanxusa ukuthi isukumelwe, yindaba yokudala amathuba emisebenzi, ilandelwe indaba yezindlu, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhona nezemfundo ezisezingeni,” kusho uMchunu.Uvumile ukuthi bewuhulumeni basahluleka ukudala amathuba emisebenzi.“Yize umnotho wethu ukhula kusukela kuqale isigaba sale Khabhinethi ekhona kodwa lokhu kukhula kuphansi uma kuqhathaniswa nokuhanjiswa kwezidingo ngendlela umphakathi olindele ngayo nokudala amathuba emisebenzi,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe okwamanje bangu-2.635 million abantu abangasebenzi eKZN uma kuqhathaniswa nabangu-2.536, abebengasebenzi ngesikhathi esifanayo ngonyaka odlule.UMchunu uthe kuyacaca ukuthi ukudala amathuba emisebenzi esikhathini esedlule akuzange kuhambe kahle. Uthe enye into evelile ocwaningweni abalwenza emphakathini wukuthi abantu bafuna ukuphepha lapho behlala khona.‘”Mayelana nobugebengu sibone bukhula kakhulu kulesi sikhathi esikuso futhi buphazamisa ezomnotho namabhizinisi, okukhathaza kakhulu ukuthi amacala okubulala aphezulu,’’ kusho uMchunu.Uthe bazishaya isifuba ngohlelo lwabo lwezempilo olwenza abantu baphile isikhathi eside.“Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi isikhathi esiphilwa ngabantu ngokujwayelekile sesisukile eminyakeni engu-56, saya ku-60, phakathi kuka-2015 no-2016.”Uthe babone nempumelelo ekulweni nengculuzi.
title: Undunankulu ukhuthazwe imibono

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi weqiwe yinjabulo emuva kokuthola iziqu zobudokotela, ungoti wesiZulu oshonele eMpangeni.UDkt Khenani Makhoba (65) waseMlaza, ubefundisa isiZulu e-University of Zululand (oNgoye), lapho ethweswe khona iziqu zeDoctorate of Philosophy in isiZulu ngoLwesibili olwedlule. Ubengumbhali wengosi yeSolezwe ethi Inkundla Yokucobelelana Nobugugu.UNksz Nonduduzo Makhoba, oyindodakazi kamufi, uthe bathole umyalezo ngoLwesithathu ngokushona kukayise, obehlala emqashweni eduze kwenyuvesi.“Ubehambe ekhaya ngoMsombuluko esebuyela enyuvesi. Sisola ukuthi ujabule kakhulu ngoba kusukela ethweswe iziqu bekunemigubho ehlukene, kwaze kwashaya usuku aphindele ngalo enyuvesi. Nakhona ufike bamenzela umcimbi wokumhalalisela,” kuchaza indodakazi.Uthe akucaci ukuthi uyise ushone nini ngoba ngokwemibiko yezitshudeni abezifundisa, wagcina ekilasini ngoLwesibili. Kubonakale ngoba engatholakali ocingweni, kwayobhekwa endlini yakhe.“Okusijabulisayo ukuthi ushone ngokuthula. Utholakale elele embathile futhi ubengazange agule. Ubenesifo sikashukela, okungenzeka ukuthi ujabule kweqa ngoba ubekade azifuna lezi ziqu,” kusho uNksz Makhoba.Uthe uyise waqala ukuzibhalisela iziqu ngo-2002 abuye ayeke phakathi, yingakho ebejabule kangaka. Uveze ukuthi emigubheni uyise ubememe abantu akade abagcina, wahlanganisa zonke izihlobo. Okwenza umndeni ube nokuthula ngokushona kwakhe, ukuthi konke okwenzekile kuyizinkomba zokuthi bese kufike isikhathi. Uthe ubona sengathi imigubho bekuyindlela yokuvalelisa nokubonga kwabasondelene naye.UNksz Makhoba uthe ngisho isihloko asikhethile ngesikhathi enza ucwaningo kule PhD, besikhuluma ngokufa. Kodwa abanakanga ukuthi kusho ukuthini.UDkt Lucky Nkosi ongumsakazi woKhozi FM, ongomunye wabashaqekile uthe umufi kwakunguthisha wakhe eKwazini High, waphinda wamfundisa naseMpumalanga College of Education. Uphinde wamfundisa nase-University of Durban Westville esibizwa nge-University of KwaZulu-Natal. Uncome amava nolwazi olunzulu abe nalo ngesiZulu.Kuthiwa umufi ubesecele ukuthi agcine ukufundisa oNgoye kulo nyaka ukuze agxile kwezinye izinto.Ngesikhathi sokuloba, uNksz Naledi Hlefane, okhulumela inyuvesi uthe basazokhipha isitatimende uma sebeqoqe imininingwane.UMakhoba ushiye amadodakazi amabili, amadodana amathathu nomkakhe. Uzofihlwa ngesonto elizayo.
title: Kusolwa ukugajwa injabulo kushona ungoti wesiZulu

text: AYIPHUMELI obala i-Orlando Pirates ngokusayinisa isitobha esisanda kushiya isigubhukane kwiBloemfontein Celtic, * -Alfred Ndengane.I-Premier Soccer League (PSL) ikhiphe uhlu lapho khona iveza abadlali abanamakhadi aphuzi, nalabo abangeke bedlale ngenxa yezijeziso zamakhadi. Kuzothi kusasa nangeSonto kudlale ama-quarter final emqhudelwaneni iTelkom Knockout (TKO).Kumangaze abaningi ukubona igama likaNdengane ohlwini lwabadlali bePirates abanamakhadi aphuzi. Lokhu kushiye imibuzo kwazise iwindi lokuthengiswa kwabadlali alikavulwa, futhi nayo iBucs ibingakaze iphumele obala ngokuthi lesi sitobha sekukhona yini esikusayinile.Empeleni ukuvela ngalolu hlobo kwegama likaNdengane ohlwini lwabadlali beBucs, kuhumusheke ngokuthi iPirates isimbhalisile ohlwini lwabadlali bayo kwiPSL.Leli phephandaba liyakuqonda ukuthi uNdengane, uyaziqeqesha neZimnyama nokukholakala ukuthi ubezosayina ngoJanuwari nxa sekuvuleka iwindi lokuthengiselana ngabadlali.UNdengane ushiye kwiCeltic ngasekuqaleni kwenyanga edlule. Ushiya nje iSiwelele sidonsa kanzima, njengoba sinekinga yemali. Eminye imibiko ithe kunabadlali abangakhokhelwe sekuphele izinyanga.Kuvelile ukuthi uNdengane uhlale phansi neqembu badingida inkinga yemali base bevumelana ngokuthi inqanyulwe inkontileka yakhe.Isikhulu esiphezulu kwiPirates, uFloyd Mbele, asiphumelanga obala ngokuthi uNdengane usesayinile yini neBhakabhaka.“Sizolinda isikhathi esifanale bese sidalula konke okufanele ngokuthinta uNdengane. Yilokho nje engingakusho njengamanje,” usho kanje uMbele ebuzwa ngokubonakala kukaNdengane ohlwini lwabadlali bePirates lwamakhadi kwiPSL.Libuza leli phephandaba ukuthi ngabe yiphutha yini ukufakwa kwegama likaNdengane ohlwini lwePirates lwabanamakhadi kwiTelkom Knockout, uthe: “Njengamanje sisaxinwe ukuthi iqembu linemidlalo eminingi emiqhudelwaneni ehlukene. Kulikhuni satshe ukuthi singakhipha izimemezelo zalolu hlobo. Kuyothi uma kuvela ithuba, sikunekele konke izwe okuthinta uNdengane."Kusasa kulindeleke ukuthi kushunqe uthuli eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, uma sekutholana phezulu AmaZulu nePirates emdlalweni weTelkom Knockout ngo-6 ntambama.La maqembu ake ahlangana emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eKing Zwelithini, eMlaza lapho kuphele khona zibambene ngo 1-1. Komunye umdlalo weTelkom Knockout eMoses Mabhida Stadium, kuzotholana phezulu iKaizer Chiesf neSuperSport United ngeSonto ngo-3 ntambama.IMamelodi Sundowns izobhekana neBaroka FC eNew Peter Mokaba Stadium, kusasa ngo-3 ntambama. Ngo-8.15 ebusuku amehlo azobe ethe nje eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu, lapho kuzohlangana khona iMaritzburg United neBidvest Wits.
title: I-Bucs ayicacisi ngokusayinisa obeyisitobha seCeltic

text: MHLELI: Ngihlala eTshelimnyama esigcemeni saseDabe. Sikhathazekile ngenxa yokuhanjelwa wugesi njalo. Alipheli isonto ungahambile ugesi kodwa sibe sinalo ulwazi lokuthi akuyona i-load shedding.Ngibika mihla namalanga kuMasipala weTheku. Yebo baye bawulungise kodwa kuke kwaba nesikhathi lapho uhambe izinsuku ezimbili zilandelana futhi awunqeni ukuthi uhambe ebusuku.Sivuka ekuseni uma siya emsebenzini ungasekho. Silekeleleni ngoba le nto icacela noma wubani ukuthi inkinga ikuphi. Lapha kunendawo esanda kuvulwa ngabantu okuthiwa yiseHlathini.Abantu bakhona banogesi kodwa asikaze sibone kwengezwa iziphehli zikagesi ukubhekelela phela eminye imizi nayo edinga ukuphakelwa ugesi. Ngakho-ke thina sesizithola sihanjelwa wugesi ngenxa yabantu basehlathini, ekubeni umkhandlu ubavumelile bangena.Siyacela singabakhokhi bentela, siyizakhamuzi zaseTshelimnyama ukuthi asingahlukumezeki ngenxa yabantu abancela ugesi ngokungemthetho bese sithelwa amachapazelo. Besingathokoza uma kunganohlelo lokukhishwa abantu abazinyoka nyoka kwiziphehli ezisiphakela ugesi. Ngiyazi ngizoba mubi kubantu baseHlathini kodwa iqiniso limile, le nto ibingekho bengakakhi lapha.SNJ Madlala
title: Ugesi siwuqedelwa ngabantu baseHlathini

text: “I-AFRICA idinga ukuhlanganyela ngobuhlakani, kanjalo nesiphiwo esikhethekile sabo bonke omengameli (bezinhlangano eziphethe ibhola) emazweni angamalungu (eCaf).”Lawa ngamanye amazwi kaPatrice Motsepe ngesikhathi emukela ukuqokwa kwakhe ukuba  ngumengameli omusha weConfederation of African Football Association eRabat, eMoroco ngoLwesihlanu.“Uma sonke sisebenza ngokubambisana, unobhutshuzwayo e-Afrika uzokuba nempumelelo nentuthuko engakaze ibonakale phambili,” kusho le njinga yezimayini ekleliswe yaba ngeyesishiyagalolunye kubantu abacebile e-Afrika.Uthe uthokoze kakhulu (ngokuqokelwa esikhundleni). Ngakho izinto kuzodingeka zenziwe ngokukhulu ukushesha ngoba muningi kakhulu umsebenzi osadinga ukwenziwa. Kuzodingeka senze isiqiniseko sokuthi ibhola lase-Africa aligcini nje kuphela ngokwaziwa lapha e-Africa kuphela  kodwa nasemhlabeni wonke. “I-Africa ichitha izigidi zama-dollar minyaka yonke ithenga amalungela emidlalo yebhola komabonakude ukuveza amaligi angaphandle kwe-Afrika. Kunesidingo sokuthi sizakhele eyethu imikhiqizo, ngaleyo ndlela sizophumelela.“Ibhola lase-Africa ngeke liphinde lifane nakuqala. U-95% wezingxoxo zethu uzoba yibhola, ngiyavuma kuhle lokho, kodwa kuzofanele kube no-5% lapho sizoxoxa khona ngokubaluleka kwezinkampani ezizimele (ezingafaka imali ebholeni). Sidinga ukubuyisa ukuziqhenya, isithunzi nokuhlonishwa kwe-Africa,” kusho uDkt Patrice Motsepe.UMotsepe ukhuluma kanjena nje, ubhekene nenselelo enkulu yokukhipha iCaf ehlazweni engene kulo iphethwe ngu-Ahmad Ahmad obe ngumengameli wokuqala wale nhlangano odabuka e-Afrika esemazansi.U-Ahmad ngowaseMadagascar, umiswe iminyaka emibili engazihlanganisi nebhola emuva kokulahlwa ngamacala enkohlakalo.“Ukubola kwesandla”sika-Ahmad kubonakale nangokuthi womahlanu amazwe abemele iCaf kwi-2018 Fifa World Cup aphume wonke esigabeni samaqoqo, obekuqala ukwenzeka eminyakeni engu-36.Kuqokwa u-Ahmad, ekhipha u-Issa Hayatou, waseCameroon obeseqhoqhobele esokuhola iCaf iminyaka engu-29, kwaba khona abasola umengameli weFifa, uGianni Infantino ngokuba nomthelela emiphumeleni yokhetho.Nasekuqokweni kukaMotsepe angaphikiswa, asifihliwe isandla sika-Infantino kwazise ubephambili emihlanganweni ebiseMorocco ngaphambi kokhetho.Kule mihlangano bebekhona bobane abebebanga, uMotsepe, u-Ahmed Yahya waseMauritania no-Augustin Senhgor waseSenegal abaphume embangweni bamukela ngaphambi kokhetho izikhundla zokuba ngamaphini, elesibili nelokuqala kaMotsepe.Kanjalo noJacques Anouma wase-Ivory Coast, osale ekhalela “intandoyeningi” ekhonjwa kwesokuba ngumeluleki oyisipesheli kaMotsepe.Ukukhipha iCaf ehlazweni, nazi ezinye zezinto ngokombiko we-AFP, ezimele uMotsepe ukuba aziqondise.Ukulwa nenkohlakaloIgama leCaf lingcolisekile eminyakeni edlule lilandelwa yizinsolo zenkohlakalo, ezinye zazo eziqinisekisiwe ophenyweni lweFifa kwazise wamiswa iminyaka emihlanu u-Ahmad.Okufanele kukhathaze uMotsepe wukuthi ngaphambi kokumiswa u-Ahmad ubesekwa yizifunda ezingu-46 kwezingu-54 zeCaf ukuthi abuyele ihlandla lesibili ekubeni ngumengameli. U-Ahmad usolwa “ngokukhwabanisa imali, wukusebenzisa amandla ngendlela engeyiyo, wukwamukela nokunikezela ngezipho nokunye“.Indlela yokuphatha Umbiko wakamuva wocwaningo lwamabhuku olunzulu wePricewaterhouse Coopers uveze ukuthi iCaf inezinto eziningi ezikhokhela ngemali eqhamuka kuye ekhukhwini lakhe, okunika isithombe sokungaphathwa ngendlela kwezimali nenhlangano uqobo. Amabhuku ayo kuthiwe “kawakholakali” okuningi ukusebenza kwemali akunawo amaphepha akusekayo.Emahhovisi ekomkhulu eCairo kuthiwa ashoda ngabasebenzi, okuholela ekutheni abakhona badonse kanzima futhi bangabi namdlandla.Ukungabonwa kwiTV kwemidlaloInhlangano ehamba phambili ukusakaza ibhola lase-Afrika ngesiNgisi eseGoli, iSuperSport, igcine ngo-2019 ukukhombisa imidlalo yamaqembu yeCaf ngenxa yengxabano ngezinkontileka.“Ezinselelweni ezibhekene noMotsepe wukwakha ubumbano kwiCaf nokulungisa indaba yemidlalo kwiTV,” kusho uKalusha Bwalya, oke wengamela inhlangano eyengamele ibhola eZambia futhi oke wanqoba i-African Footballer of the Year.Wukulungisa ezokuxhumanaUma ungena kwi-website yeCaf kuncane kakhulu okuthola okumayelana nezindaba zebhola lase-Afrika.Uma uvula inkinobho ethi “Competitions? World Cup 2022” uthola uhla lwemidlalo, izinkundla namagama onondweba emidlalo yokuhlunga edlalwe ngoSepthemba 2019. Ayikho kodwa imiphumela, amagama abashaye amagoli nezikhathi zamagoli.Imidlalo ezodlala ngoMeyi iqhathwe ngoJanuwari 21, 2020 kodwa namanje uhla lwemidlalo olukhona kalunayo imininingwane edingekayo.Indaba yonondwebaZihlale zivela izinsolo zesandla semfene konondweba emidlalweni yeCaf.Ayikho iVAR e-Afrika futhi no-Infantino uyayibona inkinga, useze wathi akuqokwe uhlu lonondweba beqophelo base-Afrika abazoholelwa yiFifa.Ukulungisa udaba lwemihlomuloAmaqembu amaningi agcina engayikhuthaleli imidlalo yeCaf ngoba imali yemihlomulo iqala ukungena emuva kwemizuliswano emibili (kwiChampions League), emithathu (kwiConfederation Cup).Nalawo maqembu abekezela aze ayonqoba isicoco seChampions League esihambisana noR37 million, akhala ngokuthi akuwenzeli mehluko otheni kwazise isigamu sikhokha amabhonasi abadlali.“Kuyichilo ukuthi abanikazi bamaqembu anqoba izicoco bangena emaphaketheni abo ukuqinisa amabhuku ezimali,” kusho u-Infantino.
title: UMotsepe umelwe wukukhipha iCaf ehlazweni

text: IQEMBU lesizwe lebhola labesifazane iBanyana Banyana lifuqa owalo umkhankaso wokugcwalisa inkundla yodumo iMoses Mabhida eThekwini njengoba linxusa abalandeli ukuthi baphume ngobuningi ukuzolivalelisa.IBanyana izodlala okokugcina kuleli ngempelasonto ngaphambi kokuyoqhuba amalungiselelo eNdebe yoMhlaba emazweni.NgeSonto izodudulana neJamaica eMoses Mabhida ngo-3 ntambama emdlalweni wobungani. Amathikithi omdlalo atholakala bhusende eShoprite, Checkers nasema-computicket.Umuntu ngamunye uvumeleke ukucela amathikithi amane.“Sizowulungiselela ngendlela umdlalo wangeSonto njengoba ungowethu wokuvalelisa ngakho sifuna ukushaya into yamehlo kwazise sizobe siqala ukudlalela eMoses Mabhida futhi kuzobe kuwumdlalo wethu wesibili esiwudlala enkundleni yeNdebe yoMhlaba,” kusho umqeqeshi weBanyana uDesiree Ellis.NgoJanuwari iBanyana idlale eCape Town Stadium neNetherlands lapho abalandeli bephume ngobuningi. “Siyacela nakubalandeli balapha eThekwini ukuthi baphume ngobuningi njengoba sagcina ukudlala lapha ngo-2011 sihlungela ama-Olympic. Nalapha asidingi umphumela omuhle nje kuphela kodwa sidinga ukudlala ibhola elisizingeni.”IBanyana yawuwina ngo 3-0 lowo mdlalo ishaya iTunisia eKing Zwelithini StadiumUNothando “Vivo” Vilakazi owayekhona iBanyana igcina ukuza eThekwini, uthembise abalandeli ukuthi elakuleli ngeke liyele ukuyokwandisa isibalo kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eseFrance ngoJuni. IBanyana ikuGroup B neGermany, China neSpain. “IJamaica siya nayo kwiNdebe yoMhlaba, yingakho kumele sizikhombise ngayo ukuthi siyiqembu eliqinile. Lo mdlalo wayo uzosivezela ukuthi ikuphi lapho okusamele siqinise khona."Lesi sitobha esinemiqhudelwano emine ye-Africa Cup of Nations nama-Olympic amabili, sibonga uNkulunkulu ukuthi ngemuva kwemidlalo engaphezulu kuka-100 eqenjini lesizwe ekugcineni lifezekile iphupho lokuya kweyoMhlaba. “Wonke umdlali uyafisa ukuya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Ngibonga uMdali ukuthi usithe wasibeka khona siyiqembu. Lokhu bekungeke kwenzeke ngaphandle koxhaso lweSasol neSafa eesihlelele imidlalo namaqembu aphezulu. Ukudlala nje ne-USA kukodwa kukufundisa okuningi njengoba beyiqembu elikleliswe phezulu futhi kuzokwenza sifike kwamanye amaqembu amakhulu sesikwazi okumele sikulindele,” kusho uVilakazi odlalela iPalace Super Falcons kwiGauteng Sasol League.IBanyana izobhekana ne-USA ekuhambeni emdlalweni wayo wokugcina ngaphambi kokuya eFrance.
title: IBanyana ifisa ukugcwalisa iMabhida

text: UMA kushone umuntu onohlonze, ofana noMnuz Richard Maponya kuye kuthiwe "uwile umuthi omkhulu."UMaponya uyibekile induku ebandla. Njengesihlahla esikhulu esimagatshagatsha, kanjalo-ke nempilo kaMaponya ibimikhakha eminingi. Ungamchaza uthi ubengumnumzane oqotho, obeyisithombe esihle kubantwana kubazukulu bakhe nasemndenini wonke nje.Ungaqhubeka uthi ubengungqondongqondo wesigagayi esisekhaleni lempi yenkululeko yabantu abamnyama kwezomnotho. Ungaphinda futhi umchaze njengosonhlalakahle obezikhathaza ngesimo sokuphila nentuthuko yabantu abakhelene naye. Abantu baseSoweto bangofakazi balokhu.Lapho ubuhlakani bukaMaponya obuzibonakalise khona kwezohwebo nakwezamabhizinisi. Lapho-ke uMaponya ube ngumakhonya obengenantanga. Ngo-1964, uMaponya owayevele esemkatsh’ubomvu kwezohwebo, wahlangana nezinye izingwazi zangaleso sikhathi, basungula inhlangano esiyaziwa manje ngokuthi i-Nafcoc (National African federated Chambers of Commerce), qede bamqoka waba ngumengameli wokuqala wayo.Lesi senzo simuveza uMaponya njengomuntu owayekholelwa kakhulu ekuhlanganeni nasebumbanweni lwabantu abamnyama kwezohwebo. Le nhlangano wayihola ngobukhulu ubuqotho nokwethembeka, qede izintambo zobuholi wazidlulisela kwabanye abaholi abanohlonze, abafana noDkt Sam Motsoenyane.Le Nafcoc eyasungulwa uMaponya isamile namanje, nakuba ibhekene nezinkinga zokungaboni ngasolinye kwabaholi. Kuthe ngo-2011, ngenkathi kubunjwa sakuvuselela iBlack Business Council (BBC), okuyinhlangano ewukhukhulelangoqo oluhlanganisa izinhlangano eziningi zabamnyama kwezomnotho, kwaba uMaponya osishayela ihlombe, esisekela isinyathelo sokubumbana kwabantu abamnyama kwezomnotho. Imibono yakhe namasu okuqhuba impi yenkululeko kwezomnotho ibinohlonze oluyisimangaliso. Buningi kakhulu ubufakazi bokuthi uMaponya ubelusebenzela ubumbano nobudlelwano lwabantu abamnyama.UMaponya ubengusomabhizinisi wokuqala nowokugcina, owaziyo ukuthi ingcebo iyasetshenzelwa. Ubekholelwa kakhulu ekutheni ukuze umuntu aphile impilo entofontofo kufuneka avuke azenzele. Ngesikhathi esungula amabhizinisi akhe, uhulumeni wobandlululo wayengafuni nokuyizwa indaba yomuntu omnyama ofuna ukuba isicebi. Miningi kakhulu imigomo eyayibekwa uhulumeni wobandlululo endleleni yomuntu omnyama, lokho okwenza ukuthi babe mbalwa abamnyama abangena emkhakheni wezamabhizinisi. Nakuba kwakunjalo, kepha uMaponya akakuvumelanga ukuthi unya lwababusi babelungu lumuvimbe. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi kwalo mhlaba osekwakhiwe kuwo iMaponya Mall, uMaponya kwase kukudala ezama ukuwuthenga ukuze akhe inxanxathela yezitolo eyayizoletha ubungcono ezimpilweni zabathengi baseSoweto. Uphikelela onguMaponya uyena owazitholela ayezosebenzisana nabo abakwaZen Prop, okwaba yisinyathelo esibaluleke kakhulu esamsiza ukuthi iphupho lakhe liphumelele seyevile iminyaka engamashumi amabili esewuphethe umhlaba.Kuningi esikufundayo empilweni kaMaponya. Lena yindoda ebingakholelwa ekuthenini umuntu ahlale nje dekle phansi, angenzi lutho. Wakubeka ngembaba ukuthi yena uyosebenza kuze kufike ukuphela kwezinsuku zakhe emhlabeni. Nempela, ushona nje ubesavuka aye ehhovisi lakhe ayosebenza. UMaponya ubekholelwa wukuthi yinde kakhulu indlela okufanele ihanjwe umuntu omnyama anduba kutholakale inkululeko kwezomnotho. Ngakho-ke, ubethi phezu komkhono kuwo wonke umuntu onengqondo nezandla. UChichi, oyindodakazi yakhe, uthi uyise ubesazikhathaza nangemfuyo yezinkukhu nomkhiqizo wamaqanda okusepulazini labo elise-Winterton, ethi kufuneka balikhulise kakhulu kulo nyaka ka-2020.Umndeni bekuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu kuMaponya. Wasebenza ngokukhulu ukubambisana nonkosikazi wakhe umama uMarina Maponya, owashona emuva kokuxinwa isifo somdlavuza. Benonkosikazi wakhe bavula ibhizinisi elalinezinqola zokudayisa ubisi emigwaqweni yaseSoweto. Ngaleyo minyaka yama-1950s, iningi lemizi yangaleso sikhathi yayingenazo iziqandisi. Baba namahhashi emijaho, elinye lawo elaphuma phambili. Kuthe noma eseshonile unkosikazi wakhe, wafaka nabantwana bakhe emabhizinisini. Omunye wamadodakazi akhe abavelele asemabhizinisini asekhaya, uyena uChichi. Lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthu uMaponya ubekholelwa kakhulu ebuhlakanini babantu besimame. Indlela nje abesebenzisana ngayo nabantwana nabazukulu bakhe ebhizinisini, kuyafakazela ukuthi uMaponya bekuyindoda yamaqhinga namasu amahle. Siyathandaza, siyethemba ukuthi umndeni wakhe uzoqhubeka nokulivikela, uliphakamise igama nesithunzi sikaMaponya. Kumfanele ukuthula nokukhanya kwaphakade.Kuningi okuphawulekayo uMaponya ayezibophezele kukho. UMaponya wayenobuqotho obuyisimangaliso ekwakheni umcebo wakhe. Ubungeke nje uzwe kuthiwa uMaponya uyanukeka ekukhwabanisweni kwezimali zikahulumeni. Ubungeke uzwe kuthiwa uMaponya uqole abesebenzisana naye, wabaxhopha, qede wadla yedwa inzuzo. Ubengesilo isela elithatha ngozwane.UMaponya ubencamela ukuzinika isikhathi sakhe ezintweni abezenza, abe nesiqiniseko ukuthi uhambisa nohlelo lomthetho kukho konke abekwenza. Yikho nje engakhubekanga emjahweni abewungenele empilweni yakhe yonke. UMaponya ube wubufakazi bokuthi ukusebenza kanzima kunezithelo, bese kuthi ukusebenza ngobuqotho nokwethembeka benza impumelelo ingabi namkhawulo.Alale ngoxolo ubaba, uDokotela Richard Maponya.* UZungu ungumsunguli nosihlalo weZunguness neZungu Investments Company futhi ungumengameli weBlack Business Council
title: Ziningi izifundo esizithola empilweni kaRichard Maponya

text: Mhlengi ShangaseUNGQONGQOSHE wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, usamukele isinqumo sikahulumeni sokuxhasa iSAA ngoR10.5 billion ukuze kuphothulwe uhlelo lokutakula le nkampani.Lesi simemezelo esenziwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Tito Mboweni ethula isabelomali, sikhalise amaqembu ehlukene ezepolitiki.UGordhan uthe ukube ayifakwanga le mali kule nkampani ibizowa bhu bese kudingeka uR18.5 billion.“Abasebenzi bashayeke kakhulu ngoba bazothola uR32 000 kuphela noma kungathiwa umuntu useneminyaka emingaki esebenza. Abasebenzi bazothola le mali uma sekugunyazwe yonke into.”Uthe ngale mali okuzotakulwa ngayo le nkampani, izosebenza njengoba kuzoba nezinhlelo ezifana nokuqokwa kwebhodi lesikhashana, ukuqokwa kwezikhulu eziphezulu ezizobamba, ukukhokhela isikweletu esidala, ukusheshisa izinhlelo zokusungula inkampani entsha yezindiza okumele kwenzeke ngonyaka ozayo.“Uhulumeni uzosebenza nomkhakha ozimele ukusungula le nkampani.“Ukudiliza kulindeleke ukuthi kudle uR2.2 billion, kanti kunezinhlelo zokuthi kugcinwe abanye babasebenzi.”Izinyunyana zabasebenzi zikhale ngokuthi uhulumeni akabakhathelele laba basebenzi okunalokho ukhathalele ukulokhu etakula le nkampani.Zithe lokhu kubonakala ngokuthi kube nesiphakamiso sokuthi kunganyuswa amaholo abasebenzi iminyaka emithathu.Okunye ngukuthi izikhulu ezisezikhundleni eziphezulu kuhulumeni nakomasipala kumele zehliselwe imiholo ngoba zihola kakhulu.UMboweni uthe bekumele bazikhokhe izikweletu zabo ngoba babezibophezele.
title: UGordhan wemukela ukuhlengwa kweSAA

text: KUNGENZEKA umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, amangaze abaningi avimbise uBrilliant Khuzwayo emdlalweni owandulela owamanqamu kwiTelkom Knockout (TKO).AmaBhakabhaka azobhekana nezimbangi zawo ezinkulu iKaizer Chiefs ngoMgqibelo, eMoses Mabhida Stadium eThekwini, ngo-3 ntambama.Lokhu kushiwo uyena uqobo umqeqeshi weZimnyama ngesikhathi exoxa nezintatheli izolo eGoli, emahhovisi ePremier Soccer League (PSL).Ngokusho kukaMicho, isimo sikaKhuzwayo sihle kakhulu njengoba eseziqeqesha neqembu, futhi akakhombisi zimpawu zezinhlungu. UKhuzwayo usayiniswe iBucs ngasekuqaleni kwesizini ephuma kwiChiefs abekhuhliswa kuyona ibhentshi * -Itumeleng Khune.Ngeshwa lakhe uthe efika nje ngakho kodwa kweZimnyama walimala, nokuphoqe ukuthi ahlinzwe njengoba kuze kube yimanje engakaze adlale umdlalo osemthethweni neBhakabhaka.Nokho ngokusho kukaMicho, kungenzeka noma yini, hleze angase aqale ngaye lo nozinti odabuka eMlaza, eThekwini kulo mdlalo obhekwe ngabomvu kusasa.“Imidlalo emikhulu yalolu hlobo idinga ukuthi wenze izinto ngokwehlukile, ngoba umdlalo omkhulukazi. Uyethembisa kakhulu uKhuzwayo uma eziqeqesha futhi konke kuhamba kahle. Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi usezifakile esimeni lapho khona engakhethwa ukuba abe yingxenye yeqembu elizoya kulo mdlalo. Ngeke nokho ngaphumela obala ngithi uzoqala noma uzoba sebhentshini, okuningi kuzocaca kahle uma sesiziqeqesha kusasa (esho namhlanje),” usho kanje uSredojevic izolo.IMabhida yinkundla enza kahle kuyona uKhuzwayo. Ngo-2014 washaya into ecokeme evimbele iChiefs ibhekene nayo iPirates. Kulo mdlalo iChiefs yawina ngegoli likaTefu Mashamaite kusaphethe uStuart Baxter.Ziya kulo mdlalo nje, eZimnyama zihambela phezulu kwazise zisanda kushaya Abafana Bokuthula Noxolo ngo 2-1, eFNB Stadium emasontweni ambalwa edlule emdlalweni weligi.Empeleni nangesizini edlule, iPirates ishaye iChiefs ngo 3-1 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngoMashi nonyaka. USredojevic uthe ezakhe azikafiki ezingeni alifunayo, wathi lo mdlalo wakusasa uyithuba elihle lokuba bazibonakalise abadlali bakhe ukuthi sebesondele yini lapho ebafuna khona.“Leli yithuba elihle lokuthi sikhule. Kufanele sishiye isikhala sokufunda, ngoba ekugcineni amaphutha ayohlezi ekhona ngoba singabantu. Ngiyazi ukuthi abalandeli bethu balambeleni, ngiyazi futhi bazizwa kanjani nokuthi bafunani. Iqiniso ukuthi bafuna sidlulele kowamanqamu, ngakho sizozama konke okusemandleni ukuthi lokho kwenzeke,” ubeke kanje uSredojevic.
title: Kungase kuvimbe uKhuzwayo kwiBucs koweTKO

text:
Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abalandeli balo mdlalo bebengafuni ukukholwa ukuthi kuphelile ngendawo elingiswa nguThobani Nzuza kaMndeni obulawe umfowabo uJama. Ngesikhathi efaka isithombe ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram uThobani ebonga abantu abebemthumelela imiyalezo, abantu bebesaqhubeka bethi abakholwa ukuthi usefile uMndeni. [email protected]_van_setshedi_03 uthe, "ningakhathazeki bafwethu, uMndeni uzobuya uzohlengwa uVovo no2Ltr...uzobuya athathe isihlalo sakhe, uyabuya shemmmm ngeke phela siphathwe izinhliziyo kanje."[email protected]_meyiwa uthe,"bafwethu mhlawumbe umndeni ubephupha efa, angikwazi ukuphila ngaphandle kwakho Mndeni nakhu ngizizwa nginokhwantalala."[email protected]_mbiri  yena uthe, "yaze yabuhlungu Mndeni mfowethu lento eyenziwe uJama kuwe."#eHostela Thank you for Allowing us into your screens 📺 😢 Catch the repeat on Friday at 10pm and Meet us again On Sunday at 8pm

title: Abayizwa eyokubulawa kukaMndeni abeHostela

text: KUSHONE abantu abasha abangu-24 engozini kushayisana ibhasi ne-tekisi eduze kwaseGiyani, eLimpopo.Le ngozi edlule nabantu abasha ekuthiwa bebevela emcimbini wokugubha usuku lwabantu abasha obuse Polokwane.Le ngozi yenzeke emgwaqeni u-R81 ngeSonto ebusuku.Bonke abashonile bebehamba nge-Quantum, oyedwa osindile obegibele kuleli tekisi okhulumela amaphoyisa, uColonel Moatshe Ngoepe uthe ulimele kanzima.“Kusolwa ukuthi ibhasi netekisi i-Quantum, bebephambana, base bashayisana. Ibhasi belivela eGiyani liya ngase Mooketsi, itekisi ibiqhamuka ngaseMooketsi, liya ngase Giyani. Ebhasini kulimele umshayeli nabagibeli ababili, baphuthunyiswe esibhedlel. Abangu -24 etekisini bashone ujuqu, oyedwa olimele uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela,” kusho uColonel  Ngoepe.Kuthiwe uhlelo lokuqinisekisa imizimba yabashonile, iyaqhubeka.Lena bese kuyingozi yesithathu eLimpopo kulempelasonto ende.NgeSonto, kushone abantu abayisithupha kade kushayisana izimoto ezimbili emgwaqeni u-R81 ngaseGiyani.Enye yezimoto igqamuke umlilo yasha, nabantu ababili ngaphakathi.Kwenye ingozi yenzeke eGravelotte ngaphandle kwase-Phalaborwa ngoMgqibelo, kushone abantu besilisa ababili, kwalimala abangu-81 ngesikhathi ibhasi ebelithutha izitshudeni lishayisana ne-double cab (iveni). Abashonile bebehamba ngale veni beya eTzaneen.Isitatimende esikhishwe uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, unxuse abashayeli ukuba beqikelele emgwaqeni, belandele nemthetho womgwaqo kulempelasonto ende.
title: UMbalula unxusa abashayeli ukuthi baqikelele emgwaqeqni

text:
UDJ ongaconsi phansi kubathandi beHouse kuleli, uPrince Kaybee, uthuse abaningi ngoLwesine ekuseni edalula ukuthi uvezele unina umphambili. Lo DJ udalule lokhu ekhasini lakhe lezokuxhumana kutwitter elinabalandeli abangaphezulu kuka 44 000. Ebhala kule nkundla uthe: "uMa uze kimi wathi 'Kabelo ngicela ukubona ugwayi wakho' ngamkhombisa wase ethi 'joh uyawushisa ne? buka umnyama kanjani"UPrince Kaybe uqhube wabhala wathi lokhu kuchaza ukuthi ngokukanina inanazi ishisa njengewovini. Abantu abaningi ubathusule lo mbhalo, iningi lizibuza ukuthi umkhombiseleni unina umphambili ekubeni esemdala kangaka. Abanye bathe bebesazama ukukhohlwa udaba luka eMtee, ogile abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana eveza umphambili ngephutha kwivideo ayeyiqopha bukhoma ku-Instagram. Abantu baphawule kanje: Maybe Prince Kaybee is used to having foreplay with his mom.

text: AMAQEMBU ezepolitiki aseveze ulaka lawo ngezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane, amanye afuna ukuba abenza lokhu banikezwe izigwebo ezinzima noma kubuyiswe isigwebo sentambo.Laba bebekhuluma emuva kokuba kwande izigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane selokhu kube nothaqa ngenxa yeCoronavirus kusuka ngoMashi.I-ANCWL KwaZulu-Natal ithumele isitatimende ithi abesifazane ababili babulewe esifundazweni.I-United Democratic Movement (UDM) ithe kumele kubuye isigwebo sentambo. Abe-ANCWL bona bathi akusetshenziswe amakhemikhali ukushumpula isitho sangasese sezigangi futhi banganikezwa nhlobo ushwele abayotholwa namacala.“Sithi uma i-ANC ikholelwa ukuthi isamele intando yabantu ayilalele ukuthi abantu bathini. Kumele basho bona abantu ukuthi isigwebo sentambo asibuye noma cha. Intambo izolekelela ngoba ukubagweba akusizi,” kusho uNobhala jikelele we-UDM uMnuz Bongani Msomi.Uthe ngisho izincwadi ezivimbela abahlaseli ukuba bangasondeli azisasizi ngoba babulawa beziphethe abesifazane.I-ANCWL ithe uhulumeni kumele asisukumele lesi simo, aphasise ukuba kusetshenziswe amakhemikhali ukushumpula ubuntu.“Sidiniwe ile mibiko ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane. Sinxusa ukuba uhulumeni alubhekisise bese eluthatha njengesimo esiyinhlekelele kuleli,” kusho uNkk Nonhlanhla Gabela onguNobhala we-ANCWL esifundazweni.Okhulumela i-IFP, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe uhulumeni usenze okwahlukene ukulwisana nalesi sihlava kodwa akwenele.“Kudingeka ukuba kufundiswe abafana abancane, kulethwe osonhlalakahle emphakathini bese kunikezwa imali izinhlangano ezingenzi inzuzo ukuze zizohlalisa abesifazane nezingane ezidingayo,” kusho yena.OweDA, uNksz Nazley Sharif, uthe: “Kumele kube nezigwebo ezinzima kulabo abenza amacala okuhlukumeza. Ezikhathini eziningi laba abake balahlwa amacala baphinde benze amacala afanayo. Sesikhathele nje.”Abakhulumela i-ANC kuzwelonke oMnuz Pule Mabe noDakota Legoete, abazange batholakale ukuphendula.
title: I-ANCWL ifuna kushumpulwe ubuntu babadlwenguli

text: UYAPHIKA uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, ukuthi ukufakwa ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli kukaMasipala waseNquthu, kuyitulo lezepolitiki.Uphike walala ngomhlane ukuthi isinqumo sakamuva sokufaka umasipala ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli, siyimizamo yokuhlithwa umasipala kwi-IFP.Ikhabhinethi lesifundazwe lithathe isinqumo sokuthi liphinde lifake umasipala ngaphansi komlawuli ngesonto eledlule, ngemva kokuthi isinqumo sokuqala sokufaka lo masipala ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli sachithwa ungqongqoshe kazwelonke, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma.Lesi sinqumo sangesonto eledlule sicasule i-IFP, yathi siyitulo lokulekelela i-ANC ukuthi ikwazi ukuhlwitha lo masipala njengoba bethi i-ANC kade vele iwucuthele lo masipala. Kepha izolo uHlomuka uphikile ukuthi kunetulo lokuhlwitha umasipala kwi-IFP.Ekhuluma kwisithangami sabezindaba izolo eHowick, lapho ebezocacisa khona ngebanga eselihanjwe omasipala abangaphansi kweso lomlawuli, uHlomuka ubuze ukuthi kungani kungashiwo into efanayo uma umnyango ufaka ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli umasipala ophethwe yi-ANC.UHlomuka uthe komasipala abangu-10 esifundazweni abangaphansi kweso lomlawuli, iningi labo liphethwe yi-ANC.“Manje-ke uma ngifaka omasipala abangaphansi kwe-ANC ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli, kusuke kuseyitulo lezepolitiki nakhona? Yiliphi lelo tulo? Yini ebaluleke kangaka ngomasipala waseNquthu? Thina esikufunayo ukuthi umasipala waseNquthu ukwazi ukuhambisa izidingo kubantu. Yilokho okubalulekile kuthina.”UHlomuka uthe akubathusi nakancane ukuthi lo masipala usabisa ngokufaka loludaba enkantolo.“Sizophendula kahle uma sebewafakile amaphepha enkantolo. Noma ngubani angaya komemeza phezu kwentaba, athi uzosisa enkantolo, kepha agcine engalufakanga udaba enkantolo. Yingakho ngithi, sizophendula uma sebewafakile amaphepha enkantolo,” kubeka uHlomuka.Ekhuluma nabezindaba, uHlomuka uthe iningi lomasipala abangu-10 esifundazweni abangaphansi kweso lomlawuli, bakhombisa ukusimama, akusafani nangesikhathi umnyango uqala ukungenelela. Phakathi komasipala abangaphansi komlawuli kubalwa, uMsunduzi, uMzinyathi, uThukela, Mtubatuba, Abaqulusi kanye nabanye.UHlomuka uthe umasipala okuyiwo ophathisa umnyango ngekhanda ngowesifunda uMkhanyakude.“Akukho mahluko otheni osuwenzekile yize sizama ngakho konke okusemandleni ukulekelela. Ukungabi khona kozinzo kwezepolitiki kuholela ukuthi imihlangano yomkhandlu ihluleke ukuhlala.“Maningi amathuba okuthi lo masipala uzohluleka ukuphasisa isabelomali sawo. Lezi zinkinga ezikhungethe umasipala ziphazamisa ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo. Kunezinkinga zamanzi kulo masipala ikakhulukazi eNgwavuma naseMbazwana.”
title: UHlomuka uphika izinsolo zokucuthela umasipala waseNquthu

text: KUYE ngamagama enkehli ngesikhathi uCaster Semenya, ongumpetha wama-Olympics kwi-800m, kwabesifazane ephula irekhodi laseNingizimu Afrika lika-1000m, ebeselihlale iminyaka ewu-35, kusuka laqoshwa ngu-Ilze Wicksell ngo-1983.Le ngqophamlando yenzeke kwiLiquid Telecom Athletix Grand Prix Series, ebiseTuks Athletic Stadium, eTshwane ngoLwesine ebusuku.USemenya uphule irekhodi lika-Wicksell ngesikathi sika-2.35.43, kanti isikhathi esidala besiwu-2.37.20.Kuleli banga athi ubelokhu ekulangazelele ukuligijima ubephonselwe kulona inselelo yizintokazi ezimbili zase-Uganda, uHalimah Nakaayi noWinnie Nanyondo.Ngaphambi komjaho uSemenya wayekade elisongele leli rekhodi ngokuthi uma esuke kahle entanjeni, akangabazi ukuthi kuyobe kukhona okusina kulijeqeza.Emlenzeni wokuqala walolu chungechunge oluqale ngesonto eledlule, eRuimsig Stadium, eRoodepoort, eGoli lezi zintokazi bezigijima ibanga lika-800m.Ukungabikhona kukaSemenya kuzinikeze ithuba lokuthi zizidlele amahlanga njengoba kuyizona ezingene endaweni yokuqala neyesibili.USemenya wayekade eseMonaco eyokwethamela umcimbi wokukhishwa kwemiklomelo kubadlali abaphume phambili emidlalweni abayidlalayo emhlabeni (Laureus World Sports Awards).Ekhuluma ngempumelo yakhe yokwephula irekhodi leminyaka ngemuva komjaho uthe, nakuba ejabule ngokuthi ukwazile ukwephula irekhodi, kodwa uyacabanga ukuthi usengakwazi ukwenza isikhathi esingcono.“Ngijabule ngebanga engiligijimile nesikhathi engisenzile ekubeni kuyilesikhathi sokuqala kwesizini. Nakuba nginqobile kodwa ngiyacabanga ukuthi njengoba isikhathi siqhubeka sisebenza ezinyangeni ezimbili ngisengakwazi ukwenza isikhathi esingcono,” kuchaza uSemenya.Ebuzwa ngamalungiselelo amaCommonwealth Games uthe njengamanje umqondo uzokube ugxile kumaNational Championships aqala eTuks Stadium ngoLwesine aphele ngoMgqibelo.“Ngemuva kwalokho umuntu uzokuba eseqala ukubheka indaba yamaCommowealth Games. Ngizohlala phansi nalo lonke ithimba engisebenzisana nalo kusuka kumqeqeshi nabasizi bami sihlanganise amakhanda ukuze sizophuma neqhinga esizokuya nalo kuma-Commonwealth Games.Kumqoka kakhulu ukulalela abanye abantu ukuze ube ngumgijimi ophumelelayo,” kusho uSemenya ngonyaka odlule ubuye nendondo yegolide kade eyogijima kwi-IAAF World Athletics Championships ayeseLondon. Ukunqoba kukaSemenya kufakazele amazwi asanda kuphimiswa yingqwele yomhlaba kwi-100m uJustin Gatlin ukuthi abagijimi baseNingizimu Afrika balicokamisile izinga.
title: USemenya wenze eyamehlo ephula irekhodi leminyaka

text: KUYASILIMAZA isimo somqondo sabafundi ukuphinda iphepha abese bezitshela ukuthi sebelibhalile, okungaba nomphumela ongemuhle uma sekumenyezelwe imiphumela.Lokhu kushiwo ngabeluleki bezengqondo kulandela isimemezelo sikaNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga,  sokuthi amaphepha aputshukile azophinde abhalwe ngesonto elizayo.UMnuz Ndabe Myeza ongumeluleki wezengqondo, uthe lokhu kungahle kwenze imiphumela yabafundi ingabi mihle.“Abafundi bese bezitshela ukuthi sebeyaqeda ukubhala, abanye sebehlisile kancane emfuthweni abebenawo ngesikhathi beqala.  Abanye bese beqalile ukuzijabulisa ngezinto ezehlukene, ngakho ukubabuyisela esimeni sokubhala izifundo ezidinga kakhulu umqondo, kungaba nemiphumela engemihle ekuphasweni kwazo,”  kusho uMyeza.UNkk Hameeda Bassa-Suleman naye ongumeluleki wezengqondo, uthe ukubhala lawa maphepha okwesibili kuzobafakela ingcindezi nokhwantalala abafundi.“Bazoba bancane kakhulu abafundi abazokwazi ukwenza kangcono uma sekubhalwa izifundo.  Iningi labafundi lizothwala kanzima kakhulu ngenxa yalesi sinqumo sokuthi kuphinde kubhalwe amaphepha, bona abese bezitshele ukuthi baqedile ngawo,” kusho uNkk Bassa-Suleman.USihlalo wenhlangano elawula izigungu zezikole KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zwile Zulu, uthe udaba lokuphindwa kwamaphepha kumele lubukwe nxa zonke ukuze kuqhanyukwe nesisombululo esizovuna wonke umuntu.“Kuyiqiniso ukuthi abafundi kuzobafaka ngaphansi kwenkulu ingcindezi ukubhalwa kwamaphepha okwesibili ngoba bese bezitshelile ukuthi badlulile kuwo. Ngakolunye uhlangothi ukungaphindwa kwawo kungenza umfundi obewabhala, angabinakho ukuziqhenya okuphelele ngesitifiketi sakhe impilo yakhe yonke ngenxa yokuthi angahlale esoleka ngokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi wabhala eselibonile iphepha, okungenza noma eziphase kahle lezi izifundo angakutholi ukuhlonishwa okumfanele. Ukuphindwa kwawo kungabenza bazethembe abafundi,”  kusho uZulu.Uthe akuzona izinhlaka ezithile kuphela okumele zibe nombono kulolu daba kodwa kumele abantu bakuleli baveze imizwa yabo okungalekelela esinqumeni esiyisona.
title: Bahlaba ukuphindwa kwamaphepha

text: OMUNYE wabangani bami bakudala wayenengcwayi esasishaya amakhala ngayo sonke equlwini labangani bethu ngoba yayingaphiwe ubuhle, ngokubona kwethu.Cha yona le ntokazi kwakungekona ukuthi sasiyichwensa noma siyibeka amabala, ukuthi nje wawuthi uma ubheka yona bese uyiqhathanisa nomngani wethu, ubone ukuthi amanzi namafutha. Nokho umngani wethu wayezifela ngale ngcwayi futhi kuzicacela ukuthi akukho okwakuzomhlukanisa nayo.Engakuqaphela ukuthi nayo ingcwayi yayimthanda kakhulu lo mbhemu nokwenza ukuthi ngigcine sengiyibuka ngenye indlela indaba yabo.Okwenza ukuthi ngigcine sengibemukele ubudlelwano babo ukuthi ngabona ukuthi into yabo yayiyinhle.Ngazibuza ukuthi ngingubani mina ukunqumela umngani wami ‘ngophuthu’ lwakhe. Ekugcineni kwakumjabulisa ukuba nale ntokazi ngakho kwakumele ngikhohlwe yindaba yokuthi emehlweni ami intokazi yayingabukeki ngoba kusho ukuthi yena wayethi uma eyibuka kuthi cosololo ngaphakathi.Ngeke ngiyiqede le ndaba yalaba bobabili ukuthi yaphelela kuphi kodwa ngizohlala endabeni ethinta unobhutshuzwayo lo owuphuthu lwami engilidla imihla ngemihla.Njengoba kubuya imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership kusukela kusasa ngizwa kuthi angigide ngoba isizungu sebhola lethu bese singibulele kakhulu. Ngiyazi ukuthi njengoba ngijabule mina ngokubuya kwemidlalo yeligi yethu kukhona abangenandaba nalabo abalimisa ngesihloko elokuthi bancamela ukubuka imidlalo ye-English Premiership kunokuchitha isikhathi sabo ngophuthu oluyi-Absa Premiership.Omunye wake wangitshela emakhaleni ukuthi yena uncamela ukulala kunokubuka umdlalo we-Absa Premiership ngoba uyabhoreka.Uyazibonela-ke ukuthi asiyi nganxanye singemanzi singabantu ngoba sadaleka ngezindlela ezihlukile. Yikho nje ngagcina ngikuqonda ukuthi kungani umngani wami ayezifela ngentombi yakhe yize mina ngangiyibuka ngamanye amehlo.Uyabona lolu phuthu lwethu oluyi-Absa Premiership ngicabanga ukuthi luzokwehla kamnandi emphinjeni kulokhu ngoba zikhona izinongo ezithile engizithembayo ukuthi zizokwenza umehluko omkhulu kulona.Esokuqala nje isinongo yilesi sokuthi iqembu elizodla umhlanganiso ekupheleni kwesizini lizokhala lemuke no-R15 million. Phela phambili iqembu elibe ngompetha belithola * -R10 million ngakho ngibona le sizini izokwehluka kakhulu uma iqhathaniswa namaningi edlule.Okunye okungase kukhuphule izinga lophuthu lwethu ukuthi amaqembu ahlome ngabadlali abasha okubhekwe lukhulu kubona.Ngazi kahle ukuthi amaqembu afana neBidvest Wits, Orlando Pirates, Kaizer Chiefs neSuperSport United, ngeke ayivumele kalula iMamelodi Sundowns ukuthi idle isicoco okwesithathu kulandelana. Lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi kushunqe uthuli kubangwa ukuthi yiliphi iqembu elizokhala lemuke no-R15 million ekupheleni kwesizini.I-Pirates neChiefs bazowakhuphula kakhulu amasokisi kule sizini ngoba sebekuzwa ngendaba ukuphakamisa indebe. Empeleni womabili la maqembu aseSoweto aphoxeke kweyamanqamu ngesizini edlule. I-Bucs ishaywe yiBaroka FC kowamanqamu weTelkom Knockout isithembile, kanti iChiefs ingene ehlazweni ishaywa yiTS Galaxy kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup.Ngizizwa nginethamba elikhulu lokuthi uphuthu lwethu luzonambitheka kakhulu kule sizini size sibone nomgadli ozoshaya amagoli awu-20 nangaphazulu.Phela laba abathi iyabhora i-Absa Premiership basuke bekhala ngokuthi kuke kuphele impelasonto kunamaqembu angashayanga nelilodwa igoli imidlalo iphele ngo 0-0. Ngikubona kuzoshintsha konke lokhu kule sizini ngoba impi yesicoco izoshuba.Okubalulekile nje ukuthi abalandeli baphume ngobuningi babo bayokweseka amaqembu ukuze ibhola lethu libuyele ezingeni elalikulona eminyakeni eminingi edlule. Kulabo abangibona njengomuntu othandana nentombi engaphiwanga ubuhle ngithi abangiyeke nginjalo ngoba lobu budlelwano abasoze babenza lutho. Njengoba ngayemukela ingcwayi kamngani wami ngithi nabo abemukele ukuthi lolu phuthu oluyi-Absa Premiership angisoze ngihlukane nalo.Luwuphuthu olungenza ngisuthe ngiphinde ngisuthuse nalabo abaseduze kwami. Abafana beDistruction Boyz uma beyibeke indaba yabo bathi Omunye Phezu Komunye kodwa mina ngithi qhude manikiniki, akucace ukuthi ubani ingqwele uma sekusongwa isizini ngoMeyi. Alushe uphuthu lwethu!- Phansi Emgodini
title: Ngijabule kubuya uphuthu lwethu okuyi-Absa Premiership

text: I-MARITZBURG United ibuyele igijima kwi-Absa Premiership ishaya iRoyal Eagles emdlalweni wokuhlungela ukukhuphukela kwiPremiership ngoLwesithathu ntambama. Amagoli eTeam of Choice avalelwe phakathi uSiphesihle “Mbesuma” Ndlovu ngesiwombe sokuqala noThabiso Kutumela ngesesibili.Icacise zibekwa iMaritzburg ukuthi ifuna ukunqoba kulo mdlalo, abagadli bezivakashi uBongokuhle Hlongwane noJudas Moseamedi belokhu beluhluphe njalo udonga lwe-Eagles.Okuphawulekile ngalo mdlalo ukuthi uqale sekudlule imizuzu ewu-15 esikhathini ebesibekiwe. Okudale lokhu ukuthi bekushintshwa inethi obekusolakala ukuthi ayikho esimeni esifanele.Zibile khona izinkinga ngesikhathi kuphuma abadlali emhubheni njengoba leli phephandaba lingakubika ukuthi "bekunabathile’’ abebefuna ukungena kuqala enkundleni abadlali bengakangeni kodwa abomthetho benza umsebenzi wabo.Ngomzuzu ka-28 uLevy Mashiane odlala ophikweni kwi-Eagles ugobe ibhola elihle elihlangane nekhanda likaDiego Brown ohlulekile ukukweletisa iMaritzburg egeja ngekhanda.Ngomzuzu ka-41 uNdlovu ubeke phambili iTeam of Choice ngemuva kokuphaselana okuhle kwi-18 ye-Eagles, phakathi kwakhe noHlongwane.Ngesiwombe sesibili iqale ngamandla futhi iMaritzburg kodwa ingafiki epalini le-Eagles. Ngomzuzu ka-61 injini yeMaritzburg uFortune Makaringe yenze edume ngazo ijika amadoda, yagoba ibhola elihle elihlangane noMoseamedi wathi ulidla ngesithende elibeka enethini kodwa langaba namandla walicosha kalula unozinti we-Eagles, uPatrick Nyame.Ngomzuzu ka-70, uKutumela ushaye igoli lesibili leMaritzburg, ebeka enethini ingcwenga ye-free kick. Ubedlaliswe kabi nguPhilani Cele we-Eagles kuze kudaleka i-free kick.Izamile I-Eagles ukubuya kodwa kwaphika ukwenza.IMaritzburg isidlale imidlalo emithathu kulolu chungechunge lwemidlalo yangangenelwa yigoli. EzikaTinkler zisethubeni lokuqopha umlando wokunqoba yonke imidlalo yokuhlunga, nokungakaze kwenziwe ngaphambilini.Umdlalo wokugcina kweyokuhlungela uzoba ngoMgqibelo phakathi kweMaritzburg neTshakuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM), eHarry Gwala Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.
title: IMaritzburg isazohlala esigabeni esikhulu

text: NOKUBONGWA PHENYANEINTOKAZI yaseMpangeni uDJ Happygal, ikholwa ukuthi ukukhipha ingoma yayo ethi Bayaphithizela, kuzokwenza abantu bavuke bazithathe.Le ngoma uthe uyikhiphe ekuqaleni kwale nyanga, okuthe ngeledlule waqopha i-video yayo eThekwini, ezophuma maduzane.Ukhipha le ngoma nje nyakenye ukhiphe ethi, Injabulo apika kuyona uGigi Lamayne.“Njengoba ithi Bayaphithizela nje, ngichaza ukuthi sekuyisikhathi lapho eminye iminyango ebikade ivaliwe ngesikhathi sikathaqa wezwe, isivuliwe. Asisukume sizithathe senze konke esingakwenzanga ngenxa yeCovid-19.“Abantu abasukume basebenze. Bahambe bayoqedela esikoleni. Siqhubeke nempilo senze imali ukuze siphile. Ingoma ibuyisa ithemba, engingangabazi ukuthi abantu bazoyijabulela ngoba inomyalezo,” kuchaza uHappygal.Uveze ukuthi kuyona usebenze noThenjiwe osanda kungena endimeni yomculo nophrojusa waKwaMashu, uK Fanky.“Ingoma enesigqi se-Afro track, ngiyakholelwa kakhulu ukusebenza nophrojusa nabaculi abasafufusa njengoba benethalente elimangalisayo.“Nginethemba lokuthi le ngoma izoba ngezinye ezizodansisa abantu ngesikhathi samaholidi. Kodwa ngiyabanxusa futhi abantu ukuthi bajabule kodwa baphephe njengoba isihlava esibhekene naso singakapheli,” kuchaza uHappygal.Le ntokazi isingene nasekulingiseni kuthe kuqala umdlalo iDurban General, yaba ngomunye wabalingisi abavelayo kuwo.UHappygal uveze ukuthi akukapheli ngaye kulo mkhakha wokulingisa futhi kukhona omunye umdlalo awuqopha eKapa.UDJ Happygal uthembisa lukhulu ngengoma yakhe entsha ethi, Bayaphithizela ayikhiphe ekuqaleni kwale nyangaIsithombe: SITHUNYELWE
title: U-DJ ihlose ukuvusa ithemba ngengoma

text: Sabelo NseleOBENGUSIHLALO we-EFF eGauteng, uNksz Mandisa Mashego, usenekhaya elisha lezepolitiki.UNksz Mashego, osule ekubeni usihlalo we-EFF eGauteng kanye nasekubeni umholi waleli qembu kusiShayamthetho sakulesi sifundazwe ngonyaka owedlule, usejoyine i-ABC.Kumangale abaningi uNksz Mashego evumbuka kuleli qembu njengoba ngaphimbilini ebeke wamantaniswa neqembu lowayeyimeya yaseJohannesburg, uMnuz Herman Mashaba, i-ActionSA.UNksz Mashego ushiye kwi-EFF emuva kwengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi bukazwelonke lapho engaphumelelanga embangweni wesikhundla sokuba unobhala jikelele wale nhlangano.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uNksz Mashego, uthe nakuba ebemaningi amaqembu abenezingxoxo nawo, kepha uhehwe yimigomo ye-ABC, nokwenze wagcina eyijoyina."Bayakholelwa ekusebenzisaneni kobuholi bendabuko nezinhlaka zikahulumeni kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya. Bayakholelwa ekutheni umhlaba kufanele ubuyiselwe kubantu ukuze abantu bezokwazi ukukhiqiza ukudla."I-ABC iyiqembu elikholelwa ekutheni bonke omasipala abancane kufanele bahlanganiswe kwakhiwe omasipala bezifunda. Vele kungukumosha imali ukuba nomasipala abancane abaningi uma omasipala abakhulu njengeTheku, bekwazi ukusebenza. Nezifundazwe nazo kufanele zincishiswe."I-ABC yiqembu elasungulwa oke waba usihlalo we-ANC kusifunda INkosi Bhambatha, uMnuz Philani Mavundla, oke waba futhi imeya yoMkhandlu waseMvoti.Leli qembu lizokuba nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi nengqungquthela yemigomo ngenyanga ezayo.Igama likaNksz Mashego liyavela kumagama alabo abagaqele izikhundla kule ngqungquthela.Igama lakhe livela kwabagaqele isikhundla sikanobhalala jikelele wale nhlangano.UNksz Mashego uthe zibalulekile lezi ngqungquthela njengoba zizoqondana nemigubho yokuhlanganisa unyaka kwasungulwa leli qembu.Kulindeleke ukuthi uMnuz Mavundla akhethwe ngaphandle kokuphikiswa kwesikamengameli waleli qembu.Amanye amagama avelayo kwabangase bakhethwe kubalwa uMnuz Shadrack Chabalala ophakanyiselwe kwesikasekela mengameli noMnuz Bhungu Gwala ophakanyiselwe kwesikasihlalo kazwelonke.
title: Uvumbuke kwi-ABC uMashego obekwi-EFF

text:
UBabes ugxekwe kakhulu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kulandela ukubonakala kwivideo yaleli culo elithi  Kukhon’Iyngane Layindlini. Isihloko sale ngoma sisuselwe emazwini kaMampintsha awasho kwi-video eyafakwa nguBabes ngesikhathi emshaya ezinyangeni ezedlule.UBabes ubonakala kwi-video noMampintsha belingisa okuthiwa kwenzeka ngesikhathi eshaywa ngoMashi nonyaka. Kulingiswa kuphinde kuhlekiswe ngamaphoyisa abopha uMampintsha njengoba uBabes elwa nawo aze awakokozele kule video.Selokhu iphumile le video, uBabes usolwa ngokuhlekisa ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane ngale video kanti ilokhu ingene njalo imiyalezo yabantu bemgxeka abanye bemtshela ukuthi abasafune lutho olubahlanganisa naye.View this post on InstagramI could have been next!!This could have been you,your sister,your daughter,your niece.....We are not victims but survivors❤️A post shared by 
Bongekile Simelane(@babes_wodumo) on Mar 6, 2019 at 12:21am PSTOmunye umlandeli [email protected] uthe: “ezweni elinezinga eliphezulu lokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane awulusebenzisi udumo lwakho ngendlela engalekelela abesifazane asebeke badlula ekuhlukunyezweni.Njengosaziwayo kumele ngabe abantu babukela kuwe...lokhu okwenzayo kuphendule inhlekisa abantu ababekweseka,” usho kanje.Noma engayiphenduli imibhalo eminingi ezinkundlen zokuxhumana uBabes, uphendule lo mlandeli wamtshela ukuthi akanake izindaba zakhe.“Ehy sisi naka izindaba zakho...uphume ezindabeni zabantu ababili,” usho kanje.Umthombo osondelene nomndeni kaBabes uthe umndeni uphoxekile uzwa ngeculo nevideo kaBabes. Uyise umfundisi Mbongeni Simelane uthe useziqhelelanisile nalolu daba ‘lwezingane’.
title: ‘Naka izindaba zakho uphume kwezababili’ - Babes Wodumo

text: IZIKOLE zaseMsinga ngaphansi kwesifunda uMzinyathi zigubuzelwe yifu elimnyama kushona abafundi abane ezigamekweni ezehlukene zezingozi zomgwaqo.Abafundi abane bashone ezingozini ezimbili ezehlukene ngoMgqibelo. Kusolwa ukuthi abanye abashayeli abathinteka kulezi zingozi bebephuzilie.Kushone abafundi ababili baseZwelinjani Secondary nababili baseFabeni Primary.Engozini yaseZwelinjani Secondary kusolwa ukuthi bekushayela uthisha obekhothile, kweyaseFabeni kusolwa umshayeli weloli elishayisene netekisi ebithwele abafundi ukuthi ubebukhile.Ingozi yokuqala yenzeke emgwaqweni eHholwane, lapho kushone khona abafundi base-Zwelinjani High oneminyaka engu-16 noneminyaka engu-19.Laba bafundi kuthiwa bebevela emidlalweni yezikole ezihlukene behamba ngemoto kathisha iVW Polo ngesikhathi igingqika ngo-6 ntambama sebeya emakhaya.Ngokombiko otholwe yiSolezwe ongakaqinisekiswa amaphoyisa, kusolwa ukuthi uthisha ubephuzile eshayela imoto ngesivinini esiphezulu ngesikhathi kwenzeka ingozi.Uthisha kuthiwa uphume emotweni wabaleka.Abanye abafundi abalimele engozini baphuthunyiswe ezibhedlela.Abafundi baseFabeni kuthiwa bebephuma eThekwini bekade beyongcebeleka ngesikhathi itekisi abebehamba ngayo ishayisana neloli.Iloli kuthiwa beliphambana netekisi, lavele lasuka emzileni walo laqonda ngqo etekisini.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa uthi umshayeli weloli ubehluleka ngisho ukuma ngenxa yophuzo oludakayo, lokhu akuzange kuqinisekiswe amaphoyisa.Engozini kushone abafundi bakaGrade 3, uThabo Duma no-Asenele Dlamini.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe kuvulwe amacala amane okubulala ngokungenhloso.“Ingozi yeVW Polo kushone abafundi ababili kuyo emuva kokuba igingqikile, umshayeli asikamazi ngoba ubalekile endaweni yesigameko. Amaphoyisa aseMsinga aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso. Kwenye ingozi eyenzeke ngo-8:30 kushone abafundi ababili oneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye nona-10. Itekisi abebehamba ngayo ishayisane neloli emgwaqweni waseDundee. Abanye abafundi bayiswe ezibhedlela. Amaphoyisa aseGreytown aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso,” kusho uCol Mbele.Khona manjalo ngoLwesihlanu kushone umfundi esikoleni esingaphansi kwesifunda uMzinyathi ePro Nobis eDundee.UMalwande Mavundla (14) kuthiwa ubedlala ibhola lezinyawo kade kunemidlalo esikoleni sakhe ngesikhathi evele ewa phansi. Uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela esiseduze, washona efika khona.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi uthe bagqemeke ingozi ngokushona kwalaba bafundi.“Sitholile ngalezi zingozi ezimbili nesigameko sokushona komfundi kudlalwa. Sidumele kakhulu ngalezi zigameko. Sidlulisa namazwi enduduzo emindenini yabashonile,” kusho uMahlambi.
title: Kusolwa utshwala kubhubha abafundi

text: SIZOVALWA ngokushesha isikhala sobengumgadli weTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM), uRhulani Manzini, okhonjwe indlela kulandela ukungqimuza ngezibhakela uzakwabo ejimini.UManzini uxoshwe kwiTTM ekupheleni kwesonto eledlule emuva kokulahlwa yicala lokushaya umdlali wasemuva u-Alfred Ndengane. Laba ababili kuvele ukuthi badlalisane kabi ngesikhathi iqembu lizilolonga, kufakwe abadlali ngabahlanu eqenjini ngalinye. Kuthiwa uManzini noNdengane, basunduzene, bahilizisana, uManzini walahla ngequpha kuNdengane.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi namuhla iTTM izomemezela abadlali abasha okuhloswe ngabo ukuqinisa iqembu njengoba litabalasa ngasemsileni we-log yeDStv Premiership. Kulaba badlali kubhekwe umgadli noGeorge Lebese wodumo kwiKaizer Chiefs ophoqeke ukunqamula inkontileka yakhe neColorado Springs Switchback yase-US ngenxa yeCovid-19."URhulani simkhululile eqenjini emuva kokulahlwa yicala lokushaya uzakwabo kumahluleli ozimele. Yena ubekade emelwe yinyunyana yabadlali (South African Football Players' Union). Zonke izinhlangothi zanelisekile ngomphumela wecala. UNdengane ushayiwe. Kuzona zonke ke izindawo zokusebenza uma ushaye uzakwenu kusuke sekuphelile. Kusasa (namuhla), sizomemezela abadlali abasha nezinye izinguquko eqenjini," kusho uRufus Matsena oyisikhulu seTTM.Okunye okubhekwe ukuthi kuhlale obala namuhla yindaba yomqeqeshi. Izintambo zokuqeqesha okwamanje zibanjiswe uMpho Maleka noDavid Mathebula. Kukhona noDylan Kerr okuthiwa ungumcebisi wabaqeqeshi. "Isimemezelo sizosenza kusasa ngendaba yomqeqeshi nokunye okuzokwenzeka eqenjini. Lapho sizocacisa nendaba kaKerr. Okwamanje sinabo abaqeqeshi, uMaleka noMathebula. Ngicela ukugcina lapho," kusho uMatsena.Namuhla ngo-3 ntambama, iTTM izobhekana neMamelodi Sundowns emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ePeter Mokaba Stadium, eLimpopo. ISundowns izihola phambili kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-40 emuva kwemidlalo engu-18. I-TTM isendaweni ka-16 ngamaphuzu engu-19.Khonamanjalo izolo iChippa United imemezele ukuthi isiqashe uLuc Eymael njengomeluleki wethimba labaqeqeshi ngemuva kokuxosha uDan Malesela ngempelasonto. UMalesela ukhonjwe indlela kulandela ukubhaxatshulwa ngo 5-1 iMaritzburg United koweligi. U-Eymael kuthiwe uzoluleka ibhentshi elizobe lisabanjwe uSiyabulela Gwambi kuze kube wukuthi iChilli Boys ivumelana nabaxhasi bayo ngokuqasha lo mqeqeshi. Isitatimende esithunyelwe izolo siveze nokuth iqembu lisalinde imvume kwiSouth African Football Association (Safa) mayelana nokuqasha u-Eymael. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngoDisemba iChippa yayifuna ukumqasha kodwa yavinjwa yiSafa imsola ngokucwasa ngokwebala kulandela isigameko sokwethuka abalandeli ngezinkawu eTanzania lapho ayeqeqesha khona iYoung Africans.
title: Kuzovalwa isikhala soxoshelwe ukushaya kwiTTM

text: KUBUKEKA kuqala phansi ukungazwani phakathi kwezinkakha zabaculi bakamaskandi, uKhangelani “ DSD” Mhlongo neGcokama Elisha.Lokhu kugqame engomeni kaDSD ethi: Ayiyazi Lengoma ekwi-albhamu yakhe entsha, Imisebenzi kaShenge.U-DSD ukhwela uyadilika kwiGcokama Elisha, uthi kumele ligxile enkezweni liyeke ingoma ngoba aliyazi.Eminyakeni edlule kuke kwabikwa ukuthi uDSD waxabana neGcokama baze babambana ngezandla besemhlanganweni woMpheme owawusungulwe nguMenziwa Biyela ongasekho emhlabeni, okwakuhloswe ngawo ukuthi omaskanda babumbane bangaxhashazwa ngabahleli bemicimbi.Impi eyasuka phakathi kwabo yakhuzwa, kwabukeka sengathi sebethelelene amanzi.Muva nje uDSD ukhwele wadilika kwiGcokama Elisha elingcofa ngokungayazi ingoma.Ebuzwa uDSD, uvumile ukuthi ingoma wubeyibhekise kulona iGcokama Elisha.“Yilona Igcokama Elisha elingisukelile. Kunengoma yalo elisanda kuyikhipha, lapho lizibongela lase lidelela mina. Kuyona lithi: Ngizokuqeda kancane kancane kuhle kwamashethi eNjomane. Lokhu ngikubone likubhekise kimina ngoba yimina obizwa ngeNjomane. Bengingaqondile ukulisukela kodwa bengiphendula elikushilo ngami,” kusho uDSD.U-DSD uthe ngeke athule kuyilona Igcokama Elisha elimnyathela amakhona.Kuthintwa Igcokama Elisha, livumile ukuthi yilona eliqale ngokumngcofa uDSD.“Into engicasulayo wukuthi uDSD wasabalalisa amanga nabangani bakhe, wathi ungishaye ngempama sisemhlanganweni woMpheme. Ngifuna ukuthi aphumele obala atshele abantu ukuthi kayikho leyo nto yokuthi wangishaya ngoba akukaze kwenzeke lokho. Futhi bengingaqambi amanga ngokuthi amashethi akhe kawasekho. Kuyiqiniso ukuthi akasenabalandeli. Vele akukho muntu osabonakala egqoke imifaniswano yakhe. Bengingeke ngingayisho into ebonwa yiwona wonke umuntu, ikakhulukazi njengoba kusenento engiphethe kabi ngaye," kusho Igcokama Elisha.
title: Iqala phansi impi kukaDSD neGcokama Elisha

text:
BONISWA MOHALEKWAFEZEKA iphupho ayenalo obhekelele ezokukhangiswa kweSolezwe owayehlale enelukuluku lokusebenza ephephandabeni.UNkk Linda Nxumalo (38) uthe kudala wayefisa ukuba yintatheli yize lokhu kungenzekanga kodwa uthi iphupho lakhe lifezekile njengoba esesebenzela iphephandaba elidume kuzwelonke.UNkk Nxumalo uthe ngesikhathi eqeda u-matric wayezofundela ubuntatheli kodwa wagcina engene kwandaba zabantu (Human Resources).“Ngazalelwa eMbali Unit 1, ngifunde eMontebello okuyisona sikole esangibumba ngakwazi ukuzimela nokwamukela abantu abahlukene. Ngangifisa ukufundela ubuntatheli kodwa ngagcina sengithathe izifundo zeHuman Resource engazenza eTechnikon Natal. Yize ngangingathandi ukwenza i-HR kodwa ngacabangela umama owasikhulisa yedwa nezingane zasekhaya ezine. Ngafunda ngaphumelela. Umsebenzi wami wokuqala ngangisebenzela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, ngenza izikhangiso zemisebenzi, ngihlola abantu amakhono nokunye okwenziwa emkhakheni wakwa-HR,” kusho uNkk Nxumalo.Uthe ukufaka izikhangiso zemisebenzi emaphephandabeni kwamxhumanisa nabantu abaningi wagcina esethole umsebenzi enkampanini i-Ayanda Mbanga Communications asebenze kuyo iminyaka emihlanu ngaphambi kokusebenzela enye inkampani yamaphephandaba abenza kuyo izikhangiso.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe yini ayithandayo ngomsebenzi wakhe, uthe wukusebenzisana nabantu abasemazingeni angafani empilo.“Ngingumuntu wabantu, ngiyathanda ukusiza amakhasimende ami. Okungijabulisa kakhulu wukubona izinkampani ezincane zikhula ngenxa yokukhangisa kithina. Umsebenzi wami uyangisiza ukwakha ubudlelwano nabantu abangomacaphunakusale nalabo abasathuthuka, lokhu kuyangijabulisa zonke izinsuku uma ngizoqala usuku,” kusho uNkk Nxumalo.Ugqugquzele intsha ukuba ifunde, izazi ukuthi ifunani kuthi noma iwiswa yizivunguvungu zempilo ikwazi ukuvuka iqhubeke nempilo.Ingajahi izinto kodwa iqhubezele imfundo, isebenze, ihambe amazwe, ibone abantu ngoba lonke lolu lwazi luyamthuthukisa umuntu.Uveze ukuthi esikoleni wenza izifundo ze-General kodwa esefika eTechnikon kwakumele enze i-Accounting, okuyisifundo azifundisa sona waze waphumelela.Izingqinamba abhekene nazo kwezokukhangisa ubale ukungabi khona kwesabelo-mali esanele esibhekelele ezokukhangisa ikakhulukazi uma izinkampani zifuna ukwehlisa izindleko kodwa-ke uthe unalo isu adoba ngalo amakhasimende ngoba uyawatshela ukuthi ukukhangisa kwi-internet akuhehi wonke umuntu kodwa uma kuvela ephephandabeni elikhulu njenge
Solezwe baningi abantu abazosibona leso sikhangiso bathenge umkhiqizo.Uthe kufezeke iphupho lakhe eqashwa ukuthi akhangisele 
Isolezwe njengoba nonina elikhonzile futhi nguye owamchazela kabanzi ngokwenzekayo ephephandabeni.Mayelana nenkolelo yokuthi amaphephandaba awanalo ikusasa eliqhakazile, uthe okwamanje asazohlala kwazise eNingizimu Afrika akusibo bonke abantu abane-internet abasawathenga amaphephandaba futhi njengoba ezobuchwepheshe zithuthuka uyasibona isidingo sokukhangisa ephephandabeni.Ubalule ukuthi abantu sebeyaziqopha ngendlela efiswa yibo izinhlelo zethelevishini ngoba bengafuni ukuphazanyiswa yizikhangiso futhi nenkinga yokuphela kukagesi izokwenza izinkampani zingakhangisi kakhulu kuthelevishini nasemsakazweni ziqonde ephephandabeni.UNkk Nxumalo uneziqu ze-PostGrad in Marketing azithole eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, i-BTech ye-Labour Relations ayithole e-Unisa, i-National Diploma ye-HR ayithola e-Natal Technikon esibizwa nge-DUT.Useshade iminyaka engu-10 kanti benomyeni wakhe babusiswe ngezingane ezintathu abahlala nazo ePinetown.Uphethe ngokugqugquzela omama ukuba babe nesikhathi nomndeni noma ngabe basebenza imisebenzi ebagcina bematasa.
title: OweSolezwe ubeka imfundo phambili

text: UMKHANDLU olawula othisha ufuna bathathelwe izinyathelo ezinqala abafundi abashaya othisha kuleli.Lo mkhandlu iSouth African Council for Educators (SACE) ugxeke i-video esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapho abafundi ababili besifazane behlaganyela uthisha bamshaya baze bambhuquzise phansi.Okhulumela lo mkhandlu, uMnuz Themba Ndhlovu, uthe badumele ngale video wathi bayayigxeka kakhulu into eyenziwe yilaba bafundi.UNdhlovu uthe kudingeka kwenziwe okuthile ukuqeda izehlakalo ezifuze lezi.Akucaci ukuthi abafundi bakusiphi isikole abenza lokhu kodwa iveza behlanganyela uthisha, bemdonsa ngezinwele bamkhahlele aze alale phansi. Uthisha ubonakala naye engazibekile phansi egadla kodwa bayaqhubeka nokumshaya.“Kumele kuthathelwe izinyathelo ezinqala abafundi abenza into efuze le. Kudingeka bavikelwe, basekwe baphinde bahlonishwe othisha ngaso sonke isikhathi.”UNdhlovu uthe izigungu ezilawula izikole nomnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo kumele uthathele izinyathelo ezinqala laba bafundi.Izinyunyana zothisha zisigxekile isenzo sabafundi sokushaya uthisha. Zihlale zikhala ngokuthi selokhu kwavalwa induku ayisekho enye indlela abangaqondisa ngayo abafundi njengoba uma uthisha eshaye umfundi uthathelwa izinyathelo ngokushesha aze axoshwe emsebenzini.Izinyunyana zikhale ngokuthi awukho omunye umgomo onikwe izikole ukuthi ziqondise abafundi.Okhulumela umnyango uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga usigxekile lesi senzo sokushaywa kukathisha ngabafundi.
title: Umkhandlu ugxeke ukuhlaselwa kukathisha ngabafundi

text: BAPHASE ngamalengiso abafundi abebefunda ngamakhandlela behlala emqashweni eNkandla njengoba bethole o-A abayisikhombisa umuntu ngamunye.USivikelo Nkosi (18) noThobani Sibiya (18) bathole o-A abayisikhombisa kwathi uSiyabonga Mazibuko (19) noLungelo Nxumalo (22) bathola o-A abayisithupha.UNkosi uthole o-A kwisiZulu, English, Life Orientation, Agricultural Sciences, Geography, Life Sciences nePhysical Science. USibiya yena uthole o-A kwisiZulu, Maths, Life Orientation, Agricultural Science, Geography, Life Sciences nePhysical Science.USivikelo waseMpembeni eMpangeni, uthe wanquma ukuyofunda eBizimali High, eNhloshane ngoba elandela umlando omuhle wemiphumela.“Ugesi awukho, sikhanyisa amakhandlela. Sihlala emqashweni njengoba izindawo zokuhlala zingekho kodwa yize besifunda ngaphansi kwalezi zimo ngenze kahle kakhulu. Ngizokwenza iziqu zobudokotela eNyuvesi yaseKapa,” kusho uSivikelo.UThobani naye uthe ufuna ukwenza iziqu zobudokotela e-UKZN noma eWits.“Lezi zikhungo zilinde imiphumela nje kodwa sezingithathile. Ubaba angimazi, ngifundiswa ngumama onguthisha. Bekunzima ukufunda endaweni engenagesi kodwa umuntu uzamile ukuphasa kahle,” kusho uThobani.ULungelo, othole o-A kwi-English, Life Science, Agricultural Science, Geography, Life Orientation nePhysical Science, uthe ukusebenzisa izidakamizwa ayeke ukufunda, kumvule amehlo.“Ngaxoshwa ezikoleni eziningi engangifunda kuzona ngoba ngihlupha. Ngake ngaba nenkinga yezidakamizwa kodwa nganquma ukuthi ngisuke ekhaya eMpangeni ngayofunda eBizimali ukuze ngikwazi ukuziphatha. Ngidabule ngamalengiso sengidlulile ezintweni eziningi ebengizenza ezibhedayo, ngibheke ikusasa lami. Ngifuna ukwenza iMining Engineering eWits kodwa umama ngeke abe namandla ngoba ungumakhenikha,” kusho uLungelo.Uthe uthembe ukuthi uzothola umfundaze ukuze afukule umndeni wakhe.UMnuz Goodman Nsele, oyiPhini likathishanhloko kulesi sikole, uthe sekuphele iminyaka lesi sikole singenagesi.Uthe kwesinye isikhathi kuba mnyama uma kuphele uphethroli abawusebenzisa kwi-generator.“Impela ukube besinogesi ngabe senze kahle kakhulu emiphumeleni. Sicela ukufakelwa ugesi ngoba manje siqhudelana nezikole ezinayo yonke into,” kusho uNsele.* Khonamanjalo bathole o-A abahlanu abafundi baseMathunjwa High eVryheid oMinenhle Hlongwane noPhelelisa Mhlungu.UMinenhle waseNewcastle uthole o-A kwiLife Orientation, isiZulu, Life Sciences, Physical Sciences neMaths. UPhelelisa yena uthole kwiMaths, Physical Science, Life Orientation, isiZulu neLIfe Science.UPhelelisa uthe ufuna ukwenza iziqu zobudokotela eWits kanti uMinenhle ufuna ukwenza iChemical Engineering kuyo le nyuvesi.
title: Badabule o-A abebefunda ngekhandlela

text:
SELIPHINDE lagawula izembe emsakazweni ohamba phambili ngabalaleli Ukhozi FM njengoba kukhonjwe indlela umdidiyeli wohlelo lwasemini kwakhululwa noZuluboy.UZuluboy ubethula uhlelo lwe-hip hop i
Namba Namba ngoLwesihlanu ngo-11 kuya ku-2 entathakusa. Ubephinde abuye ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 kuya ku-6 ntambama nohlelo lwe-deep house i
Chillas.NgoLwesihlanu i
Namba Namba beyethulwa nguSbo Sithole no-Amanda Khanyile. I
Chillas yona yethulwe nguKhetha Gwala.UMsizi Nkosi ubedidiyela i
Nethezeka engena ngo-12 kuya ku-3 emini phakathi nesonto. Lolu hlelo lushayelwa nguMroza Buthelezi phambilini owayebambisene noChilli M owakhonjwa indlela maphakathi nonyaka.Isolezwe ngeSonto labika ukuthi uMsizi umiswe isigubhukane ngenxa yokuvele anyamalale emsebenzini engabikile.Kuthiwa kwakusolakala ukuthi ukunyamalala kwakhe emsebenzini kwakuhlobene nokuhambisa incwadi yakhe ethi
I’m a Different Mess than I was Yesterday okuthiwa amakhasimende ayifuna ubuthaphuthaphu.Okhulumela iSABC uMnuz Kaizer Kganyago ukuqinisekisile ukuthi laba bobabili abasekho kuKhozi FM.“Engikwaziyo wukuthi izinkontileka zabo zinqanyuliwe,” kusho uKganyago.Umthombo ongaphakathi kwaSABC, uthe uMsizi ukhululiwe emsebenzini wakhe ngenxa yokulova.“UZuluboy yena ngathi kunecala ayelenzile ezobizelwa ekomitini eliqondisa izigwegwe. Kunokuthi aye lapho uvele wafaka incwadi yokwesula emsebenzini,” kusho umthombo.Omunye uveze ukuthi abasebenzi baziswa ngalokhu ukuze “bengezwa kwabezindaba kuqala”.Imizamo yokuthola uZuluboy ayiphumelelanga. Owesifazane othe usebenza ehhovisi lakhe uthe umatasatasa uyaqopha eKapa. Uthe akanalo ulwazi ngokuhlukana kwakhe noKhozi FM. UZuluboy uke wamiswa ngoFebhuwari kanti kwabikwa emaphephandabeni ukuthi wayemiswe ngezinsolo zokudlala umculo wakhe ohlelweni lwakhe yize wawungafakiwe ohlwini.UMsizi ukuqinisekisile ukuthi akasekho oKhozini.“Abantu basoKhozini ngisengasebenza nabo ngomuso ngoba imboni yethu incane kakhulu. Kodwa abantu bayohlale bekhuluma beqagela ukuthi kwenzakaleni. Njengamanje ngifuna ukugxila emsebenzini wami omusha. Kukhona uhlelo lwezingxoxo oluzodlala kuSABC 1 engizoludidiyela,” kusho uMsizi.
title: Ukhozi FM lunqamule izinkontileka zababili

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi bebehlose ukuqotha imbokodo nesisekelo abalisa abebezenza amaphoyisa, abangqongqise izimoto ezine emzini wakwaNene, eMid-Illovo, ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Aselala obenyoni amalungu alo mndeni njengoba ekholelwa ekutheni kukhona abafuna ukuwabhuqa kulesi sigodi akhe kuso saKwaDwengu.Bekungekhona okokuqala lo mndeni usinda emizameni yokuwasoconga njengoba asinda ezigamekweni ezimbili ezehlukene, kwesinye okwatholakala kuso amagobolondo ezinhlamvu angu-20 kanti kwesinye kwatholakala angu-13.Echaza ngesigameko sangoMsombuluko ebusuku, amalungu alo mndeni, angathandanga ukudalulwa, athi kwatheleka amadoda amane ayedlubhe umfaniswano wamaphoyisa ngaphambi kancane kokuthi kube yiphakathi kwamabili, abe eseqala ukuthungela izimoto ngomlilo.“Ngicabanga ukuthi inhloso bekuwukuthi bathungele umuzi wonke ngomlilo bese bebulala wonke umuntu okhona,” kusho ilungu lomndeni elicele ukuba igama lalo lingadalulwa ngenxa yezizathu zokuphepha.“Kusize khona ukuthi sisheshe sivuke. Ngoba-ke nathi sinazo izibhamu ezisemthethweni sabe sesiphindisela, base bebaleka.”Kulesi sigameko kushe amaveni amabili nemoto eyodwa encane kwaba wumlotha kwathi enye encane yasha kancane.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lifika kulo muzi, amalungu omndeni abesababaza lesi sigameko, esho nokuthi aphunyule ngembobo yenaliti.Abebonakala ukuthi athukile kanti futhi abemehlo mane, njengoba ebeqalaza yonke into eyenzeka eduze kwawo.Leli lungu lomndeni lithe bazizwa bengaphephile  njengoba lithe bayasongelwa.“Umuntu akasahleli kahle. Silokhu sisongelwa, kuthiwa kufanele sitholakale. Sizizwa singaphephile ngempela. Mina ngike ngasinda ngidutshulwa ngoMeyi, le moto (ekhomba enye yezimoto ezishile) inezimbobo zenhlamvu ezingu-13. Lapho ngangidutshulwa ngesibhamu, i-9 mm, nange-AK 47.“Ngike ngadutshulwa futhi ngihamba nomzala wami. Lapho kwatholakala amagobolondo ezinhlamvu angu-20 ezibhamu i-R4 ne-R5.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbhele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokucekelwa phansi kwempahla.La malungu omndeni awufunanga ukuqagula ngembangela yokuhlaselwa kwawo.Kunemibiko yokuthi kunamalungu omphakathi aselala emahlathini kule ndawo ngenxa yempi eqhubekayo, okungacaci ukuthi isukaphi njengoba amalungu omphakathi ethi ayesaba ukukhuluma ngayo.
title: Sebelala obenyoni abasinde “amaphoyisa” engqongqisa izimoto

text: BASHAQEKILE abafundi baseZiphathele Secondary, eClermont emuva kokutholwa kwesidumbu somfundi walesi sikole esikhotheni esibuqamamana nesikole.Isidumbu salo mfundi (17) obefunda u-grade 12, sitholwe ngamalungu omphakathi kanti kuthiwa besisele ngephenti kwesingezansi.Ngesikhathi ithimba leSolezwe lifika eZiphathele ngabo-12 emini, abafundi bese bededeliwe ukuthi bagoduke njengoba abaningi bebekhala ngokuthi bathukile.UMnuz Sfundo Ndlovu ofundisa abafundi baseZiphathele i-maths utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ubizwe ngabanye abafundi ngabo-5.30 ntambama ngoMsombuluko bemtshela ukuthi kunesidumbu somfundi esikhotheni.“Ngithe uma ngifika ngabona umfundi ngase ngimboza ngesikhafu ngoba isingezansi besisele ngephenti obekubukeka sengathi belidatshulwa.“Kungiphethe kabi ngoba nasemathangeni ubeseluhlaza, ngisola ukuthi udlwenguliwe ngaphambi kokuthi abulawe,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe bafonele amaphoyisa aKwaDabeka, athatha ihora nohhafu ukuthi afike ukuzolanda isidumbu ngenxa yokuthi amaveni abengekho.“Umfundi ubenza i-maths ne-physical science ezimisele ngokufunda okwenzeka emkhathini ngoba ubethanda izinto eziphathelene nezinkanyezi,” kusho uNdlovu.UBuyanda Gama okhulumela iCongress of South African Students (Cosas) KwaZulu-Natal uthe baphatheke kabi ngokubulawa kwabafundi nokudlanga kodlame olubhekiswe ezinganeni nakwabesifazane.“Sicela uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha nokuPhepha koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal andise isibalo samaphoyisa asebenza emalokishini ngoba bandile ubugebengu.“Siphatheke kabi ngoba umfundi oshonile ubengunobhala weCosas lapha eZiphathele.“Siyacela amaphoyisa aphenye kabanzi ngoba kusolakala ukuthi wagcina ukubonakala ekhaya ngoMgqibelo eya ephathini akazange abuye njengoba etholwe eseshonile,” kusho uGama.Uthe uma ungqongqoshe engasandisi isibalo samaphoyisa bazomasha noma benze ezinye izindlela zokuthi andiswe ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi abantu abaphephile.Imizamo yokuthola abazali bomfundi oshonile ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lukanina belukhala lungabanjwa kanti olukaninalume belungena kwi-voicemail.UColonel Thembeka Mbhele wamaphoyyisa KwaZulu-Natal, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ngoMsombuluko kutholwe isidumbu sowesifazane esikhotheni esikuKings Road, eClermont.Uthe isidumbu besinezibazi esiswini nasemathangeni kanti okwamanje ayaziwa imbangela yokubulawa kwakhe njengoba kusahlolwa isidumbu namaphoyisa eqhubeka nophenyo.UMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa woMnyango wzeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uzwelane nomndeni womfundi oshonile wathi akazi kungani izigameko ezimbi zehlela izingane eziyikusasa lezwe.Ugqugquzele amaphoyisa ukuthi aphenye ngalesi sigameko ukuze kujeziswe izigilamkhuba.
title: Kutholwe umfundi ebulewe eClermont

text: IMEYA kaMasipala uBuhlebezwe, uMnuz Zamo Nxumalo, ithi ukunyundelwa nokungcoliswa kwegama layo okwenziwa ngamanye amaqabane kuhambisana nombango wesikhundla semeya yesifunda iHarry Gwala.UNxumalo, igama lakhe liyavela njengomunye wabantu abangase bavale isikhala esivuleke ngemuva kokuthi obeyimeya yaseHarry Gwala, uMnuz Mluleki Ndobe, enyukelwe izimendlela waqokwa njengePhini likaSomlomo esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo ngemuva kwezikhalo ngaye ngenkohlakalo nokuqasha izinhlobo zakhe, uNxumalo uthe iyamxaka indaba yalezi zinsolo ngoba nango-2011, zavela kuthiwa ukhohlakele ngoba engusomabhizinisi.“Okokuqala anginayo mina ingane esebenza kulo Masipala engiwuholayo waseBuhlebezwe. Akukho ngisho umuntu wakwaNxumalo osebenza lapha oyisihlobo sami noma okufana izibongo. Izingane zami zintathu futhi zisesesikoleni enye iseNyuvesi bese kuthi ezimbili zibe seHigh School. Ngesikhathi ngingena ihlandla lokuqala ngo-2011 ngakhulunywa kabi, kodwa sengithole imibiko encomekayo kaMcwaningi-Mabhuku iminyaka emine ilandelana,” kuchaza uNxumalo.Uthe usola ukuthi uhlaselwa ngoba kukhona abacabanga ukuthi kungenzeka aqokelwe ukuba yimeya yaseHarry Gwala. Uqhube wathi nalokho akazi ukuthi kungenzeka kanjani ngoba yisiFundazwe esinamandla okuqoka umuntu futhi le ndaba ayikakhulunywa.Kuze kube yimanje iHarry Gwala ayinayo imeya selokhu kuhambe uNdobe.Umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa, uveze ukuthi uNxumalo usejikele amakhansela amaningi uyawahlukumeza.“Okokuqala ugaqele ukuthatha izintambo zokuba yimeya kamasipala wesiFunda iHarry Gwala kodwa manje usevele washintsha, asiqondi ukuthi lokhu ukwenzelani.
