Yingakho sekuhlelwe ukhukhulela ngoqo womhlangano ukuze akhishwe esikhundleni.“Kuningi esikhala ngakho njengoba sifuna nokuba kuphenywe ngokuqashwa kwezingane zakhe ezimbili lapha kumasipala. Sifuna ukuthola ukuthi ngabe ilandelwe yonke yini imigudu efanele,” kusho umthombo.
title: Imeya ikhala ngombango wesishiywe nguNdobe

text: ZIFUNDA kanzima izingane zesikole samabanga aphansi iSunshine Primary, KwaMhlabuyalingana ezifundela emakilasini ayimijondolo.Lesi sikole siqale ukusebenza njengenkulisa kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi senziwa isikole samabanga aphansi. Izingane ziqala enkulisa bese zingena kuGrade 1 ziphume seziphase uGrade 6.Imithombo ekhulume naleli phephandaba, okukhona kuyo abasebenzi basesikoleni nabazali necele ukuthi kugodlwe amagama ayo, iveze ukuthi isikole sithwele kanzima ngenxa yokudembesela koMnyango wezeMfundo.OMUNYE wemijondolo esetshenziswa njengamakilasi asesikoleni samabanga aphansi iSunshine Primary KwaMhlabuyalinganaIsikole esinabafundi abalinganiselwa kwabangu-465 sinamakilasi amane ayimijondolo yepulangwe neyokhethe nelingumahamba nendlwana elanikelelwa isikole.Inkinga ngamagumbi abo wukuthi kungena imvula uma lina kungene namakhaza ngenxa yokuguga kwemijondolo.Ngokusho komunye wemithombo ngonyaka odlule isikole sicele usizo lwamakilasi eMnyangweni wezeMfundo esifundazweni.“Ngonyaka odlule sicele ukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo usisize ngamakilasi angomahamba nendlwana ngoba sicabangela izingane ngenxa yendlela ayiwona amakilasi. Sithenjiswe ukuthi kuzolethwa amakilasi angomahamba nendlwana kodwa kuze kube yimanje awafikile. Asisathembi nokuthi aseza,” kusho umthombo.AMANYE amagumbi esikole samabanga aphansi iSunshine Primary KwaMhlabuyalingana izingane zakhona ezifundela emakilasini ayimijondolo nangena amanzi uma linaLokhu kuqinisekiswe ngelinye ilungu lesigungu esilawula isikole nalo elicele ukuthi lingavezwa igama.Lithe bebezimisele ngokwandisa amabanga ngokuthi baqale ikilasi likaGrade 7 ngonyaka ozayo kodwa manje njengoba kungabonakali noma basazolethelwa yini amakilasi angomahambanendlwana abazi noma basazokwenza yini lokhu.“Kunzima ngempela ngoba besingenawo ngisho amadeski kwamanye amakilasi saze sacela kwesinye sezikole esakhelene nazo basinika. Izingane zethu bezihlala phansi okuyinto ebuhlungu ukuyibuka yenzeka ezinganeni,” kusho ilungu leSGB.Lithe bafisa sengathi kungaphuthunyiswa uhlelo lokulethwa kwamakilasi angomahambanendlwana.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe uMnyango wezeMfundo wesifunda uyazi ngesimo sesikole futhi sebayidlulisela ekomkhulu lomnyango.Uthe udaba lwesikole lunakiwe futhi sesifakwe ohlwini lwezikole ezidinga ukubhekelwa ngokushesha.
title: Bafundela emakilasini ayimijondolo

text: SITHOLWE sigqitshwe emgodini ngaphansi kombhede kamfowabo isidumbu sowesifazane obethungathwa ngemuva kokunyamalala eKraaifontein, eCape Town.Kubikwa ukuthi uNksz Patricia Masengo-Kock ugwazwe wabulawa wabe esegqitshwa emkhukhwini okule ndawo ngoMsombuluko odlule.Umfowabo useboshiwe, kanti amaphoyisa asondelene nalolu daba aveze ukuthi, uthe waphuza igazi lakhe ngemuva kokumbulala.Umndeni wabika ngokulahleka kukaPatricia ngoLwesithathu olwedlule kulandela ukungafiki kwakhe emsebenzini. Abomphakathi eBloekombos baqala bamthungatha ngokubambisana kodwa kuze kwashaya iSonto engatholwa.NgoMsombuluko amaphoyisa ezwa iphunga eliqandula ikhanda livela emkhukhwini wamfowabo kaPatricia, ongemuva komuzi kaPatricia emgwaqeni uMkhumbisi. Aphenya kulo mkhukhu, azithela phezu kwesidumbu sikaPatricia sigqitshwe ngaphansi kombhede womfowabo.Ilungu lomndeni elikhulume nephephandaba eliwuzakwabo weSolezwe, iDaily Voice, uthe lo wesilisa usanda kuzalwa kabusha (ngokwenkolelo yamaKrestu), futhi ubelekelela kuthungathwa udadewabo.UNksz Patricia Masengo-Kock, 29, ogwazwe wabulawa. Isithombe: SITHUNYELWE“Ubhema insangu, abhale umculo we-rap, kodwa uwumuntu onomoya ophansi kanti kamuva nje usanda kubhabhadiswa. Manje igama lakhe langempela uMnuz Sathane. Ngesikhathi sithungatha uPatricia ngesonto eledlule wayematasa elekelela amaphoyisa nabomphakathi,”  kusho ilungu lomndeni elithe liyahluleka ukwamukela ukubulawa kukaPatricia.Liqhube lathi: “Ubewumuntu onomoya omuhle, esebenza ngokuzikhandla, futhi ezazi ufunani empilweni. Asikholwa ukuthi umsolwa engabulala udadewabo, asikholwa ukuthi usehambile ngempela. Asikho isikhala somuntu onje (umsolwa) emphakathini wethu. Asimufuni la.” kusho leli lungu lo mndeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uSergeant Noloyiso Rwexana, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi owesilisa uvulelwe icala lokubulala. Uthe uzovela enkantolo yeMantshi eBlue Downs kuleli sonto.Daily Voice
title: Kutholwe isidumbu sowesifazane ngaphansi kombhede womfawobo

text: SEBETHEMBE ivoti labo ukuthi yilona elizoletha izimpendulo enkingeni yokungasebenzi, lisheshise ukuhlinzekwa kwabo ngentuthuko futhi libalwele ebugebengwini, abantu abebevota okhethweni lokuchibiyela eThekwini izolo.Bekunokhetho lokuchibiyela kuma-ward awu-12 komasipala abayisishiyagalolunye KwaZulu-Natal.EThekwini abavoti baku-ward 32, 36, 81 no-84 baqungele amakhaza nemvula bayovota.Wonke umvoti ubefika esikhungweni efake isifonyo afuthwe izandla ngesibulali magciwane, ahlolwe izinga lokushisa komzimba bese eyavunyelwa ukuba angene ngaphakathi avote.Amaphoyisa abenkanise ngaphandle kwezikhungo eqinise ezokuphepha.Amaqembu ezepolitiki i-ANC, IFP, EFF, African Independent Congress (AIC) abegxumeke amatende eceleni kwezikhungo zokuvota egaya ivoti okokugcina esiza nabavoti ngokubabhekela amagama abo ukuthi ayavela yini ohlwini lwabavoti.UMnuz Joel Mhlongo (68), ohlala kwa-AA eMlaza ku-ward 84 obevota, uthe izindlu zakhiwa zangaphela baningi abantu abangazitholile.Uthe uyathemba ukuthi ikhansela elisha lizoqedela ukwakha izindlu ezisele liphuthumise nezinye izinhlelo zentuthuko.UMnuz Thobani Mbokazi (25) ongumvoti waku-ward 84, uthe ukuvota kwakhe kuzoletha ushintsho emphakathini. Uthemba ukuthi intsha izohlomula ngamathuba emisebenzi kuthuthukiswe nengqalasizinda.Isikhala sekhansela kule ward sivuleke ngenkathi kudutshulwa uMnuz Bhekithemba Phungula kwakhe eNgonyameni ngoJuni.Bakhale ngobugebengu nokubanjwa inkunzi amaphara abavoti base-Albert Park enkabeni yedolobha eThekwini. Le ndawo ingaphansi kuka-ward 32 ohlanganisa ingxenye yedolobha, ihostela iDalton neClairwood.UNksz Thobeka Ndlela uthe njengomhlali wase-Albert Park ufuna ivoti lakhe limsheshisele ukulethwa kwentuthuko, kuqedwe ubugebengu ngoba babanjwa inkunzi emini baphucwe izikhwama namaselula nsuku zonke.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zobuHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, ufike esikhungweni sokuvota ku-ward 84 ezohlola ukuthi luqhutshwa ngendlela efanele yini uhlelo lokuvota.Ubekhathazekile ngesibalo esincane sabavoti wathi intuthuko ifika ngokuthiabantu basebenzise ilungelo lokuvota.Uthe umnyango wakhe uzolwa nokusocongwa kwamakhansela nabaholi bomphakathi njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni lomasipala ngo-2021.UMnuz Sihle Zikalala ongusihlalo we-ANC eThekwini uzifikele mathupha e-Albert Park ezoqinisa umkhankaso we-ANC, wathi amalungu obuholi obuphezulu bale nhlangano esifundazweni abetshalwe kuwo wonke ama-ward abenokhetho izolo.BAQUNGELE imvula namakhaza abantu baku-ward 84 eMlaza beyovota okhethweni lokuchibiyela obeluyizolo
title: Bathembe ukutakulwa yivoti ezinkingeni zabo

text: UMPHAKATHI waseNigeria usuphumele obala wazwakalisa ukungahambisani nodlame olubhekiswe kwabokufika kuleli nezinselelo ababhekene nazo ngemuva kokuvakasha kwamengameli wakuleliyazwe uMnu Muhammadu Buhari. Ngenyanga edlule, abantu bokufika bahlaselwa ezindaweni ezahlukene zaseGoli nokwaholela ekucekelekeni phansi kwezitolo zabo nokushona kwabantu abangu-12. Obambe izintambo zikamengameli wenhlangano iNigerian Community Western Cape uMnuz Cosmos Echie uthe: "Abantu abaningi baseNingizimu Afrika babambelele ezinkolelweni ezingezinhle ngabantu baseNigeria ezisuka kwimininingwane efafazwayo yokuthi abantu baseNigeria benza ubugebengu obufana nokuhweba ngezidakamizwa nokushushumbiswa kwabantu. Kepha, yidlanzana kuphela elenza lokhu kanti lomcabango kufanele ushintshe."U-Echie uthe, inqwaba yabantu baNigeria abanamabhizinisi aqondile kanti abanye bangabammeli, othisha kanye nosolwazi. "Kufanele sibheke futhi igalelo abalidlalayo eWestern Cape," kusho yena.NgoLwesine umengameli waseNigeria uMnuz Muhammadu Buhari uhlangane nomengameli wakuleli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ukudingida izindlela zokuqinisa ubudlelwano kuvinjwe nezinkinga zokuhwebelana kwamazwe ase-Afrika."Sikhathazekile ngokuthi izivumelwano zokuhwebelana ezikhona phakathi kwalawa mazwe womabili zenze okuncane ukuthuthukisa amabhizinisi asemancane noma ukunaka ukusebenza kwabantu baseNigeria abafundile. Kuvela ukuthi kuncane kakhulu okwenziwayo ukuthuthukisa ukubambisana kanti lolu dlame olusanda kuba khona lube nomthelela ongemuhle ebudlelwaneni obuphakathi kweNigeria neNingizimu Afrika," kusho yena.Isishoshuvu seNiger Delta uMfuneiwi Barry Wuganaale osehlale kuleli iminyaka engu-16 kuleli, uthe: "Kulandela udlame, sibone ukubaluleka kokuxoxa ngezindaba zethu kakhulu. Sibone ukuthi uma sithula, yilapho abanye bethola amandla okusicindezela."
title: 'Asishushumbisi izidakamizwa sonke' - abaseNigeria

text: MLUNGISI GUMEDEU MENGAMELI weCosatu uMnuz Sdumo Dlamini uthe ukulungele ukufa kunokuthi avumele umfelandawonye wezinyunyana udlale abathile abafuna ukufeza izinhloso zabo zezepolitiki.Ekhuluma embuthanweni obekukhunjulwa kuwo umholi weSACP osashona, uMnuz Smiso Nkwanyana, enkundleni yezemidlalo eFolweni, izolo, uDlamini obezwakala ngisho ekhuluma ukuthi akaneme uthe ngeke avumele ukuthengwa adayise ngomzabalazo.UDlamini uthe uyabona ukuthi kukhona abasebenzisa abathile kuCosatu ngenhloso yokulimaza i-ANC njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni ngonyaka ozayo.“Ngikhuluma nje kukhona abasikaza ukuphuma kwiCosatu, uma bephuma kumfelandawonye kuzosizakala umqashi ngoba phela bamele abasebenzi. Abaqashi bayazi ukuthi umgogodla we-ANC ngabasebenzi, yingakho sebethi abawunqamule lowo mgogodla ukuze bashaye i-ANC,” kusho uDlamini.Uphinde wathi akagaqele sikhundla ePhalamende ngokumisa uNobhala weCosatu uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi.UDlamini uqhube wathi kabanazo izinhlelo njengeCosatu zokushiya i-ANC wengeza ngokuthi abakuphuphi lokho ngisho belele.“Kumanje kukhona abakhuluma ngokuthi kumele kube nengqungquthela ephuthumayo. UMengameli weCosatu akaphikisani nalokho kodwa asikhumbule ukuthi ukuba nayo akuthathi imali engaphansi kuka-R12 million. Ngisho umuntu angathi uzosinika imali yokuthi siyisingathe kodwa sizobheka ukuthi uyithathephi,” usho kanje.UDlamini uthe abantu kumele bakwamukele ukwakhiwa uma benze amaphutha.Unxuse i-ANC neSACP ukuba beseke iCosatu kulesi sikhathi esinzima ebhekene naso, wathi lesi simo kumele sibe yisifundo kumfelandawonye wabo.UNobhala-jikelele weSACP, uDkt Blade Nzimande, uhambe emazwini kaDlamini wathi abafuna ukuhamba kuCosatu abahambe.UNzimande uthe izinkinga zeCosatu zigqugquzelwa yinkohla-kalo yabathile abaphendula umfelandawonye umbuso wabo.Uphinde wachitha imibiko ethi iSACP iyona exova iCosatu.UMnuz Sihle Zikalala onguNobhala we-ANC esifundazweni uxwayise abasebenzi wathi abayeke ukulandela abantu abathile kumfelandawonye.Uthe kumele benze isiqiniseko sokuthi iCosatu ihlala ibumbene ngoba ukuhlukana kwayo kungalimaza ukusebenza komfelandawonye wabo.
title: Aqatha kukhunjulwa oweSACP

text: Ingoma abengene ngayo ithi MakaBahle (Dali Wami). UMzukulu (28), waseQhibukhowe KwaCeza, uthe akawungenelanga lo mqhudelwano kodwa wafakwa abantu.“Mina ngabona ingoma yami isifakwe ohlwini lwezingoma ezibanga ukuhlukanisa unyaka. Yayikhethwe ngabantu. Ngimangalile sekuthiwa angilethe ubufakazi bokuthi ingoma yami ikhishwe nini. Ngayihambisa iCD yami (esihloko sithi Vukani Nonke) ebhalwe u2017. Ababange besangitshela lutho kodwa ngizwe sengaziswa abantu ukuthi sekunezinguquko kwiTop 10 yoKhozi, futhi ayisekho ingoma yami. Yafakelwani ingaqinisekisiwe?”Ecacisa uMzukulu uthe i-albhamu yakhe enale ngoma uyenze nyakenye kodwa wayikhipha kulo nyaka. “Yingakho le ngoma idume kulo nyaka, noKhozi luqale ukuyixhasa kulo nyaka. Ungabuza noma wubani le ngoma uqale ukuyizwa kulo nyaka.” Usole uKhozi ngokwenzelela ngoba bakhona abanye abaculi abangena ngezingoma ezindala.“Ingoma eyahlukanisa unyaka ngo-2005 yeMalaika ethi Destiny yayikhishwe ngo-2004. EyeDbn Nyts ethi Shumaya yakhishwa ngo-2013 kodwa yangena ohlwini lwezingoma zika-2014,” kukhala uMzukulu.Amabhinca athukuthele kakhulu ngoba athi abesevote kakhulu ngemali yawo.Athe uKhozi luwubukela phansi umaskandi njengoba lukhiphe ingoma kamaskandi kuphela.Uthe useyekela emabhinceni ngoba yiwo abefuna le ngoma ihlukanise unyaka ngo-2018. Uthe neyaBathandwa ethi Hhe Moya Wami ikwi-albhamu ethi Amagatsha ka-2017.Okhulumela iSABC, uNeo Momodu, uthe le ngoma bayikhishiswe ukuthi yakhishwa ngo-2017.“Ngokwemigomo yengoma yonyaka, ingoma kufanele ikhishwe ngonyaka waloyo mncintiswano.”Ephawula ngeyaBathandwa, uthe yaqala ukukhishwa ngo-2017 kodwa iqembu labuye layikhipha kabusha ngo-2018. Ingoma eyenziwe kabusha ivunyelwe ukungenela umncintiswano.Maqondana nomncintiswano ka-2005 uNeo uthe: “Kusemqoka ukuthi kwazeke ukuthi kuningi osekwenzekile, okubandakanywa nezinguquko ezintsha njengokuthi iyiphi ingoma echithwayo nokufanele ingene. Akukuhle ukuqhathanisa umncintiswano omdala nomusha.”
title: Ukhala ngoKhozi okhishwe kwiTop 10

text: ISILOMO sikaDJ wakuleli sithi sifuna umculo waso kube yiwona ozozikhulumela kubantu,sona ngeke sichaze kakhulu njengoba sesishaya ngesigqi esisha emculweni. UBlack Coffee ngoLwesihlanu okhiphe i-albhamu entsha enezingoma eziwu-12 ethi Subconsciously, eshaya ngesigqi esihlukile abesevele efisa ukushaya ngaso. Lokhu uthe uyazi ukuthi kwenze abantu abaningi bazibuza baziphendula ukuthi ngabe kwenzekani ngomculo wakhe wakuleli kodwa ukhethe ukuthula angachazi izinto eziningi. Usho kanje ngesikhathi ekhuluma ohlelweni Isidlo Sasekuseni kuKhozi FM. "Enye yezingoma ezibe nkulu yile engiyenze noDavid Guetta iDrive, yiyona eze nama-streams amaningi ngoba konke esikwenzile kusivunile. Ngisho nokusebenza naye engumuntu onabalandeli abaningi. Yize abantu bezohlala benemizwa ehlukene, bengazi ngenza i-deep house sebebona ngisebenza noDavid. Bekumele ngikhombise ubuholi, ngingalokhu ngichaza kakhulu ukuze abantu babone ukuthi kukhulu engikwenza ngomculo,"kusho uBlack Coffee.Eqhuba uthe iSubconsciouly  ufisa izikhulumele yona kubantu ngoba ufuna umculo wakhe usabalale kuwona wonke amazwe omhlaba, umuntu owulale ezweni lakhe angezwa sengathi wawenzelwe abantu abathile. Kodwa wonke amazwe ufuna ahlanganiswe yile albhamu, okwenze wasebenza nabantu abaningi futhi wazinikeza isikhathi esanele ngaphambi kokuthi ayidedele. Uveze ukuthi noma bezikhona izingqinamba zokusebenza ngendlela eyehlukile njengoba kuyisikhathi sikathaqa kodwa ukwazile ukusebenza nabanye abantu esebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe ukuhlanganisa le albhamu."Nginethimba esisebenza kahle kakhulu nalo eNingizimu Afrika naphesheya kwezilwandle. Uma senza into siyayihlalela phansi siyihlele, sibheke ukuthi sifisa ukuzuzani. Le albhamu ngeyokuqala enginikeza leli thuba lokusebenza nabantu ngisho naphesheya kwezilwandle. Nokusebenza nabantu bakuleli baningi abaculayo, abadidiyelayo nabanekhono elimangalisayo,"kusho uBlack Coffee.Kule albhamu uBlack Coffee usebenze ngisho nesilomo somculi saphesheya, uPharrel Williams, noDiplo ungomunye wabantu asebenze nabo noSun-EL Musician. UBlack Coffee uveze nokuthi abanye babantu asebenzisane nabo kule albhamu akakaze abonane nabo ngamehlo enyama ngenxa yokusebenza ngaphansi kwemigomo kathaqa kodwa unethemba lokuthi lesi yisiqalo sobudlelwano obungapheli. Ezinye zezingoma ezikule albhamu seziqalile ukudlala emsakazweni eminingi emkhulu nabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bayamukele ngesasasa.
title: Ushintshe isigqi somculo uBlack Coffee

text: AMAPHUZU amathathu emdlalweni wanamuhla kwi-Women Africa Cup of Nations (AWCON) azokwenza iBanyana Banyana ikwazi ukulala ubuthongo ngaphambi komdlalo wokugcina wamaqoqo.Lokhu kushiwo umqeqeshi uDesiree Ellis ngaphambi kokubhekana ne-Equatorial Guinea ngo-8.30 ebusuku eCape Coast Stadium.IBanyana ihleli endaweni yesibili kuGroup B ngamaphuzu amathathu ngemuva kokwehlula iNigeria ngo 1-0 emdlalweni wokuvula. Iqoqo liholwa yiZambia ebhudluze i-Equatorial Guinea ngo 5-0. Amaqembu amabili azoqeda ephezulu eqoqweni azodlulela kweyandulela owamanqamu. Uma iBanyana idlula kuzosho ukusondela ephusheni lokuya okokuqala emlandweni kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eseFrance ngonyaka ozayo. Amazwe amathathu azoqeda phezulu yiwona azomela i-Afrika kulo mqhudelwano.“Sinephupho nenjongo. Injongo yethu wukuya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Kuhlezi kunzima ukubhekana neqembu elibuya endukwini ngoba lizoza kithina lilwa. Kodwa-ke eqenjini sinabadlali abanesipiliyoni futhi abaziyo ukuthi leli yithuba lokugcina (kubona) ukuya kweyoMhlaba. Kumele siwulungele umdlalo ngoba sizobe sidlala nabantu abayingozi. Kumele siqinisekise ukuthi siyawathola amaphuzu amathathu. Angifuni kufike umdlalo wokugcina simincile. Kusemqoka ukuthi konke sikubeke ezandleni zethu,” kusho * -Ellis.Emdlalweni wokugcina wamaqoqo iBanyana izotholana neZambia ngoMgqibelo. I-Equatorial Guinea yahlula elakuleli kabili emqhudelwaneni wango-2012, okuhlanganisa nomdlalo wamanqamu. Ingene ngemizuzu yokugcina kwi-AWCON yalo nyaka ithatha indawo yeKenya. Ibuyiselwe isigungu sokubuyekezwa kwezinqumo seCaf ngemuva kokuthi kade itholwe inecala lokudlalisa umdlali ongafanele * -Annette Jacky Messomo. Uma kwenzeka i-Equatorial Guinea igcina ibalwa emaqenjini amathathu okumele aye eFrance ngonyaka ozayo ngeke ikwazi njengoba inhlangano eyengamele ibhola emhlabeni iFifa, iyidingisile nyakenye ukudlala kweyoMhlaba ngenxa yokubophela abadlali okwatholakala ukuthi bakokotele ubuzwe ngesikhathi kuhlungelwa ama-Olympic ango-2016 eBrazil. Leli lizwe lidingisiwe nasekudlalweni kuma-Olympic ango-2020 eTokyo.
title: IBanyana nephupho leyoMhlaba

text: BONISWA MOHALEUCWANINGO lwakamuva lwenhlangano esiza umphakathi i-Oxfam, luveza ukuthi selokhu kuqubuke iCovid-19, abampofu bahlupheka kakhulu kanti abacebile uyanda umcebo wabo.Lolu cwaningo olunesihloko esithi The Inequality Virus, lushicilelwe muva nje kanti luveza ukuthi kuthathe izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ukuthi izicebi eziwu-1 000 emhlabeni jikelele, zibuyelwe wumcebo wazo ozilahlekele ngesikhathi kuqala iCovid-19.Abacwaningi be-Oxfam baveza ukuthi abampofu kuzobathatha iminyaka ewu-10 ukuthi babuyelwe yimali ebalahlekele ngesikhathi kuqala iCovid-19.Kubuye kwavela ukuthi ngesikhathi abampofu belahlekelwa wumsebenzi, bengazi ukuthi bazodlani, izicebi ziyazikhipha ziye kwamanye amazwe noma ziyoshaywa wumoya ezintabeni.Kuvela ukuthi iCovid-19 yandise isibalo sabampofu ngo-200 kuya ku-500 million ngonyaka odlule.Okunye okuvezwe yilolu cwaningo wukuthi abantu abaningi babukeka sengathi abahlupheki ngenxa yokuthi bayasebenza kodwa uma bedilizwa bayafana nabampofu ngoba abanayo imali abayibekile.Laba bantu bangabacwali bezinwele, abashayeli bamatekisi, abahwebi basemakethe, onogada, abahlanza amahhovisi, abasebenza emafenini kanjalo nabasebenza emapulazini.Kuvela ukuthi izicebi eziwu-2 000 emhlabeni jikelele zinomcebo omningi ngokudlulele.Umcebo wezigwili eziwu-10 emhlabeni jikelele ungasiza wonke umuntu ukuthi angabi mpofu uma kungathiwa uyacazwa.Selokhu kuqubuke iCovid-19, ucwaningo luveza ukuthi baningi abesifazane abadiliziwe uma kuqhathaniswa namadoda.U-87% wabantu akade beyingxenye yalolu cwaningo bakholwa wukuthi iCovid-19 izokwandisa ukungalingani ngokwamaholo.U-57% ukholwa wukuthi iCovid-19 izokwandisa ukungalingani ngokobulili.Abacwaningi bacele izicebi ukuthi zikhokhele imigomo yeCovid-19 ukuze kugonywe bonke abantu emhlabeni jikelele.
title: Igadle kwezwela  kwabampofu iCovid-19: Oxfam

text: IYASHAYISANA imibono kubaholi abaphezulu be-ANC ngodaba lophenyo olubhekene noMvikeli woMphakathi u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane.Kubukeka kuzosiphuka izidindi uma isigungu esiphezulu sale nhlangano sesixoxa ukuthi kufanele amalungu avote kanjani uma iPhalamende selivotela isiphakamiso sokuthi u-Advocate Mkhwebane akhishwe esikhundleni.U-Advocate Mkhwebane ubhekene nophenyo lwePhalamende emuva kokuba ithimba ebelicubungula ukuziphatha kwakhe, liphakamise ukuthi aphenywe njengoba lithole ukuthi akaziphathanga ngendlela, futhi kube khona ukusebenza ngokungafanelekile ngasohlangothini lwakhe.Lolu phenyo lwalandela isikhalo seDA eyayithi ifuna u-Advocate Mkhwebane asuswe esikhundleni.Babodwa abashaya phansi ngonyawo abathi ngeke basivotele isiphakamiso seDA kanti abanye bathi kufanele ibhantshi ligcwale umoya ku-Advocate Mkhwebane.Phakathi kwalabo asebezwakalise ukusichitha isiphakamiso seDA kubalwa obeyimeya yaseThekwini uNkk Zandile Gumede, kanye nowayeyiPhini lemeya eMsunduzi uMnuz Mervyn Dirks.UNkk Gumede, oyilungu lesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uthe ukukhishwa kuka-Advocate Mkhwebane kungasho ukucindezelwa kwamalungelo abesifazane.UDirks oyilungu lePhalamende, uthe akufanele kube khona ilungu le-ANC elivotela isiphakamiso seDA, ayibize ngesitha.Omunye ohambe emazwini kaDirks, ilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC uMnuz Tony Yengeni.Isenzo salaba baholi sokweseka u-Advocate Mkhwebane, sekubaqhathe nozakwabo enhlanganweni.Ibibambene ngezihluthu kulabaholi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba amanye amalungu esigungu esiphezulu, okubalwa kuwo uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, noMnuz Derek Hanekom ekugxekile ukwesekwa kuka-Advocate Mkhwebane.UMbalula ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi u-Advocate Mkhwebane kufanele ahambe, wathi akasiyena uMvikeli woMphakathi kepha usebenzela abathize.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwe-ANC ayizange iphumelele.Okhulumela le nhlangano uMnuz Pule Mabe, ucele ukuthunyelelwa uhlu lwemibuzo kodwa kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engakayiphenduli.
title: Kuhlukene imibono kwabe-ANC ngolukaMkhwebane

text: ABAZALI bomsunguli wekhasi labesifazane elitholakala kuFacebook iLadies House bathi bacela ukukhulekiswa kusinde indodana yabo.USimthembile Chris Bhoni ongumsunguli weLadies House enabesifazane abawu 703k  besekuphele izinyanga kubuzwana ngokunyamalala kwakhe. UMnuz Mbongeni Bhoni waseLusikisiki onguyise kaChris uthe indodana yakhe iqale ikugula ngonyaka odlule kodwa bengazi ngoba ibiziqinisa."Bekuwu Novemba sikhuluma naye ocingweni nonina, samuzwa ukuthi ukhulumisa komuntu ongaphilile. Sagibela saze sayofika eNtuzuma lapho ebehlala khona. Samfica ebambekile ekhala ngekhanda. Sigqigqe izibhedlela odokotela bathi imeningitis. Size samthatha sabuya naye, kuyimanje simehlisa simenyusa. Akakalulami ngoba umqondo uyadideka njalo, nezinyawo azivumi ahambe uvele abopheke," kusho uBhoni.Eqhuba uthe bezwa nangekhasi lakhe leLadies House bayacela nokuthi abantu babakhulekise asinde ngoba ubenezifiso eziningi asafisa ziphumelele. "Sezwa nangabangani bakhe kodwa kwasho ukuthi asazi lutho ngoFacebook. Into engayicela ukuthi asazise uma enengane eThekwini singamthathi siyishiye ngemuva ingakwazi ekhaya. Kubuhlungu ukugulelwa ngalendlela ubungasebenzi njengathi.USimthembile uyena omdala ezinganeni zami eziyisithupha. Kunzima nokuhlala ubika usizi kubantu uma kumele siye esibhedlela. Kodwa ngoba siyamzala siyazama," kusho uBhoni. Ephetha uthe bona njengo mndeni bakhalela impilo yendodana yabo futhi banethemba lokuthi uNkulunkulu uzobazwela kulolu sizi ababhekene nalo. Kuvela lezi zindaba nje abesifazane baseLadies House bebesanda kushayelwa ihlombe ngokwakhela umndeni wakwaZuke eMlaza umuzi kanokusho. Lokhu kulandela khona ukuhlangana kuleli khasi likaChris.
title: Umndeni ucela imikhuleko ngomsunguli weLadies House ogqigqa odokotela

text: Umbuzo: Sineminyaka eyisithupha sishadile nomyeni wami. Selokhu ngambekezelela engathembekile isikhathi eside. Ngimbambe izikhathi eziningi oqotsheni elokhu ethembisa ukuwuyeka lo mkhuba. Ubudlelwano bethu bufana nobungekho ngenxa yalesi senzo sakhe. Ukumzwisa ubuhlungu ekade ngabhekana nabo, nami ngike ngazwana nomunye wesilisa futhi ngenza ukuthi angibambe ngamabomu. Manje sekume wonke umhlaba ngesenzo sami esisodwa vo. Kungani kunzima kangaka ukuxolela kumuntu wesilisa kodwa yena ngesikhathi engathembekile kimi wayelindele ukuthi ngimxolele nje kalula?Nokuthula, eThekwiniUkungathembeki ebudlelwaneni ikakhulukazi emshadweni kubuhlungu kakhulu. Ukuthi sesafunda kona nje ukuthi owesifazane kuphela ofanele ukubekezela ukungathembeki kowesilisa. Ayikho indlela owesilisa ahlukumezeka ngayo ehlukile kowesifazane mekukhona ukungathembeki ebudlelalweni benu. Ubuhlungu buyafana.Kulesi simo sakho, sicabanga ukuthi wonile ngokuphindisela okubi ngokubi, akwenziwa kanjalo. Empeleni uzehlise isimilo ngokuqoma ngoba uthi uzwisa omunye umuntu ubuhlungu.Siyazi ukuthi wenziwe ukucasuka nokufuna ukumuzwisa ubuhlungu njengoba usho. Kodwa isithunzi sakho sibaluleke kakhulu ukudlula ukuzwisa umuntu ubuhlungu. Ngeshwa ukuziphindiselela emshadweni akusebenzi. Uma kukhona la ningaboni ngaso linye, hlalani phansi nilungise. Makungalungi kungcono ushiye phansi kunokuthi uzehlise isithunzi.:Ngingowesilisa oneminyaka ewu-34, othandana nowesifazane oneminyaka ewu-29. Ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule ungihlanganise nomzala wakhe okokuqala. Manje inkinga engibhekene nayo ukuthi sekunenhlansi yothando phakathi kwami nomzala. Sobabili asazi singaphumela kanjani obala ngaphandle kokuthi kubekhona umsindo. Ngibona sengithanda umzala kakhulu ukudlula isithandwa sami.Kwenziwanjani mekunje?Igama ligodliwe:Uma ungasamthandi usisi kubalulekile ukuthi umazise ukuze nihlukane ngesizotha. Akukuhle ukuhlala nomuntu sewazi ukuthi inhliziyo yakho ikwenye indawo. Inobungozi obukhulu le nto oyenzayo futhi ingamubulala omunye umuntu uma ezitholele yena. Khumbula, usungena phakathi kwabantu bomndeni owodwa okungadala uqhekeko olukhulu phakathi kwabo. Ngeke sikukhohlise kuzoba nzima kakhulu esithandweni sakho ukuzwa lezi zindaba kodwa kungcono kunokuthi ulokhu udlala ngaye. Kusengenzeka ukuthi yinto edlulayo. Iyenzeka into enjalo. Icabangisise kahle lento ngaphambi kokuthi uthathe isinqumo.:Ngingowesifazane osemncane osethandane nowesilisa iminyaka eyisithupha. Noma umndeni wami ungakuthandi lokhu kodwa sihlala ndawonye nengane yethu kusukela eminyakeni emithathu edlule. Ngavuma ukuhlala naye ngoba wayengithembise umshado kodwa kuze kube manje akakaze avele ekhaya. Uma ngimbuza ngomshado uthi kusenezinto asafuna ukuzilungisa kuqala kubo kodwa akaphumeli obala ukuthi yini ngempela le aphezu kwayo kubo. Ngibona sengathi usehudula izinyawo manje. Ngikhathele ukuhlala nendoda engacacisi ukuthi ifunani empilweni.Igama ligodliwe:Kubukeka sengathi isoka lakho alikakakulungeli ukushada. Kumele aphumele obala ngokuthi yini ngempela le ayenza ekhaya ukuze nawe umuseke ezintweni azenzayo.Kodwa futhi kusengenzeka ukuthi kukhona ngempela asafuna ukukwenza kubo, uma kunjalo kubalulekile ukuthi umeseke ungalwi nalokho. Okubalulekile ukuthi nivumelane ngokuthi le nto ayenza ekhaya izomuthatha isikhathi esingakanani ukuze wazi ukuthi uzolinda isikhathi esingakanani nawe.:Sihlezi sixabana nonkosikazi wami maqondana nokusonta. Mina angisonti kanti yena ungumuntu othanda isonto kakhulu. Anginankinga nencane bengimthandela kona lokho. Bengimkhuthaza ngisho ukuya esontweni. Okungixakayo manje ukuthi akasenawo umdlandla wokuya esontweni futhi angazi yinto evelaphi le. Mangimbuza uthi usekhulile manje, akaseyena lowa muntu engamthola ewuye othanda isonto. Useqale nokuba nabangani engingabezwa kahle nokungathi abaziphethe kahle. Ngabe kwenzekeni ngempela, uphi unkosikazi wami engimaziyo?Igama ligodliwe:Wonke umuntu kuhamba kuhambe ashintshe empilweni, ukukhula loko. Kuyinto enokwenzeka kubantu abakhule behamba isonto kakhulu bengayazi enye impilo. Kubuye kudlule kodwa. Zama ukuthola ngempela ukuthi yini le emukhiphe esontweni futhi uzame ngisho ukuhamba naye kwamanye amasonto ukuze umkhuthaze.
title: [Ezothando] Sengithanda umzala wesinqandamathe sami

text: . Ngo-2020 kuzogujwa iminyaka engu-60, leli qembu laba khona.Lokhu kuvezwe okhulumela iMambazo, uXolani Majozi njengoba sekuvele izindaba ezithi umqondisi wamafilimi nama-video ezingoma ozinze eGoli, uMpumi Mbele, umatasa neqophamlando likaShabalala elizokwaziwa nge-Untold - A Documentary About Joseph Shabalala and Ladysmith Black Mambazo.Leli qophamlando lizoqoshwa KwaZulu-Natal futhi lixhaswe ngemali yikhomishini yamafilimu yaseKZN.“NgoLwesine (kusasa) besizohlangana nomndeni ukuze usibeke esithombeni ngalolu daba. Lona siyalwazi njengoba sesike sezwa ngalo futhi umndeni ujabule.“Lokhu okuvela manje akukhona kuphela okuzohlonishwa ngakho leli qhawe kodwa kuningi njengoba ubaba uShabalala kungekho ongawazi umsebenzi wakhe kuleli,” kusho uXolani.Uthe iphephabhuku nefilimu kuzobe kukhuluma ngokukhula kwakhe, kuze kube usungula iMambazo.“Lona umlando ongeke ulibaleke kalula njengoba uzofundwa, ubukwe izizukulwane. Ifilimu nayo izogxila ekukhuleni kwakhe kuze kube uqala iqembu,” kuchaza uXolani.Ephawula ngokwenza iqophamlando uMpumi uthe ugqugquzelwe ukubuka iMambazo nokuhlangana izikhawu eziningi noShabalala.“UHugh Masekela nguyena engaqale ngamcela ukwenza lolu hlobo lweqophamlando kodwa wangitshela ukuthi umuntu okumele ahlonishwe kakhulu kuleli nguJoseph Shabalala.“Sesiqalile ukusebenza ngaleli qophamlando futhi kukhona esesikuqophile sakukhombisa umndeni, wajabula kakhulu,” kuchaza uXolani.Uthe iqophamlando lizoqala ukubonakala eCinema ekupheleni konyaka ozayo noma ekuqaleni kuka-2020.“Sizoyiqopha KwaZulu-Natal ikakhulukazi eMnambithi, eBergville, eThekwini okuyizindawo akade egxile kakhulu kuzona. Ngeke silishiye ngaphandle iGoli nezinye izindawo zaphesheya azihambelile,” kuchaza uMpumi.
title: Ifilimu ngomsunguli weBlack Mambazo

text:
IMENENJAkaBabes Wodumo, uSanele Dlokolo, ithi iWest Inc. iyasihlonipha isinqumo esithathwe Ukhozi FM sokungalifaki iculo lakhe i
Mercedes emoyeni.Leli culo likaBabes alizwakali emoyeni kanti lokhu kulandela isinqumo sabaphathi boKhozi FM sokuthi bangalifaki ohlwini lwezingoma ezizwakala kulo msakazo ngezinsolo zokuthi likhuthaza isidakamizwa esibizwa ngeMercedes. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi nonyaka ngo-Ephreli kwasolwa isidakamizwa esibizwa ngeMercedes ngokufa kwabafundi abane baseThekwini. Ekhuluma ne
Solezwe ngesinqumo soKhozi FM sokuvala leli culo, uSanele uthe: “Sathola i-email isazisa ukuthi ngeke balidlale leli culo emsakazweni ngezizathu zokuthi likhuthaza umyalezo omubi wokudliwa kwesidakamizwa esabulala intsha eThekwini. UBabes usuke ekhuluma ngemoto kuleli culo futhi nasesithombeni esihambisana nalo kufakwe yona njengendlela yokuqhakambisa imoto eyiphupho lakhe.” kusho uSanele.“Noma kungekho ndawo lapho leli culo likhuthaza khona ukudliwa kwesidakamizwa, siyasihlonipha isinqumo sabo futhi asikaze sizame ukuqophisana nabo ngoba yibona abazi okufunwa abalaleli babo,” kuqhuba yena. Kuleli culo uBabes apike kulo uMampintsha noMadonone bazwakala bethi, ‘ngibambe mercedes, ngibambe nto yami, ngibambe music, ngibambe nto yami.’USanele uphinde waveza ukuthi abafuni ukugxila ezindabeni ezingekho zinhle kunalokho bafuna ukuqhubeka balungiselele isikhathi samaholidi esizobamatasa kakhulu.Ube esedalula nokuthi baba nezinkinga ngaphambilini oKhozini bezama ukufaka iculo uBabes azakhele udumo ngalo, i
Wololo.“Kuze kwaba le ngoma yobumnandi izwakala kuMetro FM, YFM nakwezinye iziteshi kwase kwayima beyifaka nabo,” kuchaza yena.Kuthintwa okhulumela iziteshi zakwaSABC, uKaizer Kganyango ucingo lwakhe belukhala engalubambi. UZandile Tembe oyimenenja yezinhlelo kuKhozi ucele ukuthunyelelwa i-email ngalolu daba kodwa wangaphendula.
title: Ntswi iMercedes kaBabes kuKhozi FM

text: UBHUQUZA ekhaya umfundi wesikole samabanga aphezulu iM.L Sultan Secondary, KwaDukuza emuva kokuthi ecebe omunye wothisha okuthiwa ubemumisa kabi, emeshela usuku nosuku esikoleni.Umfundi oneminyaka engu-17 esingeke simdalule ukuvikela isithunzi sakhe, kuthiwa akasalubhadi esikoleni ngoba kunothisha nabafundi abambuka kabi.Uyise womfundi esingeke simdalule naye ngakho ukuvikela isithunzi sendodakazi yakhe, uthi sekumphatha kabi ukuthi indodakazi yakhe isihleli ekhaya.“Akasayi esikoleni ngoba akasakwazi ukufunda akhululeke uyagxekwa, kuthiwa uzoqedela uthisha umsebenzi. Ngifisa athole esinye isikole esingeke sibize kakhulu lapho azoqhubeka afunde khona,’’ kusho uyise.Imithombo engaphakathi esikoleni ithi uthisha obhekene necala lokuxina kabi umfundi ngokumeshela, wesule isigubhukane washaya wachitha, akaziwa ukuthi ukuphi.Kuthiwa umfundi ubesekhathele ukweshelwa yilo thisha. Umfundi waze wenza iqhinga lokuthi aqophe ngeselula ingxoxo yabo nothisha ukuze abe nobufakazi.Lo mthombo ozazi zonke izindaba uthi uthisha wacela umfundi ukuba bathi ukuphuma esikoleni kanti ufuna ukumyisa endlini yakhe ayomncenga kahle ukuba amqome.Kuvela nokuthi waze wacela uzakwabo onguthisha onemoto owabahambisa wabashiya enxanxatheleni yezitolo nokuyilapho umfundi afika anqaba khona ukuhamba. Kuthiwa wayehamba emqopha yonke indlela.“Uyezwakala uthisha ethi kumfundi abahambe bayojika endlini bayokwenza ishandisi futhi kuzoba mnandi. Umfundi uzwakala ekhuza ebabaza ethi akayi lapho uyajika yena,’’ kulanda umthomboOkhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, uthe ucela umndeni womfundi ubambisane nabo emizamweni yokutholela umfundi esinye isikole.
title: Uthisha ecaleni lokucela isinene somfundi

text: MLUNGISI GUMEDEUMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma usegunyaze uphiko oluphenya amacala enkohlakalo akhethekile iSpecial Investigative Unit (SIU) ukuba luphenye mayelana nezinsolo zenkohlakalo okuthiwa ziqhubeka kuMasipala waseMsunduzi.Lezi zindaba zivezwe nguMnuz Bongani Majola, okhulumela ihhovisi likaZuma.UMajola uthe uZuma ujube iSIU ngaphansi kwesigaba somthetho 2(1) weSpecial Investigating Unit and Special Tribunals Act owasayinwa ngo-1996.Uthe phakathi kwezinto iSIU ezophenya ngazo yizinsolo zokungaphathi ngendlela izindaba zikamasipala, ukungaziphathi kahle kwamakhansela, izikhulu nabasebenzi bamasipala, ukungasetshenziswa ngendlela kwemali yabakhokhi bentela nokunyamalala kwemali yabakhokhi bentela.UMasipala waseMsunduzi usanda kuba sematheni ngemuva kokumiswa kwemenenja yomkhandlu, uMnuz Mxolisi Nkosi, esolwa ngokungaphathi ngendlela.Ukumiswa kukaNkosi kwathusa abaningi njengoba watuswa kakhulu ngokusiza umkhandlu ukuba uthole umbiko ongenagcobho ngemuva kweminyaka kade udonsa kanzima.Amakhansela amaqembu aphikisayo kulo mkhandlu aveza ukuthi ukumiswa kukaNkosi kugqugquzelwa wumbango wangaphakathi ku-ANC.IMeya yomkhandlu, uMnuz Chris Ndlela, yancoma uNkosi yathi bathole umbiko ohlanzekile ngenxa yokusebenza kanzima kwakhe.UNkosi kumanje umisiwe emsebenzini njengoba kusaqhubeka uphenyo ngaye.Ngaphambi kokuthi amiswe , kuvele ukuthi kunohlu lwamagama amakhansela nezikhulu zomkhandlu ezizobulawa kulo masipala.Kunemibiko ethi sikhona isikhulu esesibulewe igama laso ebelikhona emagameni alabo abazobulawa.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Lennox Mabaso, phambilini wathumela isitatimende lapho athi uNkosi umiswe emsebenzini ngoba kunezinsolo zenkohlakalo ezimthintayo.UMabaso wathi bathatha isinqumo sokuthi bammise ngoba befuna ukuthi uphenyo ngaye luqhubeke kahle, ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka.
title: Uzophenywa wuphiko olukhethekile owaseMsunduzi

text: UZOQHUBEKA nezifundo zomculo uDJ ophumelele umatric, uSakhiwe “DJ Eskay” Khuzwayo (19), obefunda eRoseway Waldorf, eHillcrest. Lo DJ uthi akakakholwa ukuthi uphumelele ngoba ubefunda kodwa exinwe nawumsebenzi wakhe enandisa emicimbini emikhulu phakathi nonyaka.U-DJ Eskay, uthi ubekulwela kakhulu ukuthi aqinise ezifundweni zakhe ngoba yizona ebezihamba phambili yikho ephumelele.Phakathi nonyaka uDJ Eskay uke wanandisa etendeni likaDJ Bongz emcimbini weDurban July okwakukhona kulo ngisho umculi waphesheya uChris Brown.Uthi phakathi nonyaka izifundo zakhe bezihamba phambili njengoba nabazali bakhe bamtshela ukuthi akame kancane emculweni.Engxoxweni abe nayo neSolezwe uthe kufezeke iphupho lakhe njengoba ngisho isikole esifundisa umculo eCorpa esise-Windermere, eThekwini simthathile ukuthi aqhube kuso izifundo zakhe zomculo.“Ikusasa lami endimeni yomculo liqhakazile, manje ngiyaqhubeka nomculo ngifuna ukufunda ngigogode kuwo. Ngibe nenhlanhla kakhulu njengoba ngesikhathi ngiqala ukuba nguDJ abantu bayithanda kakhulu indlela engiwuxuba ngayo uma nginandisa ngase ngibizwa ezindaweni eziningi,” kusho uDJ Eskay.Uthe useke wabizwa emcimbini kaDJ Tira wokuhlukanisa unyaka iFact Durban Rocks.Kulo mcimbi uthi wadlala ngaphambi kokuthi kungene uDJ osezakhele udumo, uBlack Coffee owamkhuthaza ukuthi aqhubeke nomculo njengoba enalo ithalente. “Ngike ngabizwa naseDrakensburg la bekunomcimbi wabantu abamhlophe obizwa ngeSmoking Dragon okuwumcimbi omkhulu nakhona, ngabona ukuthi umsebenzi wami uyathandwa ngabantu.”Unina kaDJ Eskay uNkk Lindiwe Khuzwayo uthe bajabule kakhulu ngokuphumelela kwendodana yabo ayidonsa ngendlebe ngenkathi iphasele  umatric ukuthi kumele ikhohlwe wumculo. Uthe babengayizwa indaba yokuthi uzoba nguDJ kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi eseqashwa emicimbini emikhulu babona ukuthi kuyamsebenzela. Ukugcizelele ukuthi indodana yakhe bazoyivumela ihambe iyoqhubeka nezifundo zayo zomculo.
title: U-DJ ophase umatric usazofunda

text: BAZOGCINWA ezitokisini kuze kube nguLwesihlanu abasebenzi abasolwa ngokuchitha indle emahhovisi kaMasipala weTheku ngesikhathi bebhikisha.NgoLwesihlanu olwedlule, iMantshi uVanitha Armu ithe abasolwa bazogcinwa esitokisini kube kuqhutshekwa nophenyo. Abasolwa babhekene necala lokususa udlame emphakathini.Enkantolo kuvele nokuthi senzekile isigameko esifuze lesi kulawa mahhovisi ngenyanga edlule. Njengamanje amaphoyisa kuthiwa acubungula ama-video awaqopha kunemibhikisho.Lokhu akwenza ngenhloso yokuthola ukuthi abasolwa abayisikhombisa ababoshiwe abamataniswa yini nesigameko sangenyanga eyedlule.Umbuso uveze zisuka ukuthi uzosiphikisa isicelo sebheyili, wathi leli icala libucayi futhi kungenzeka engezwe amacala athweswe abasolwa uma sebezofaka isicelo sebheyili ngo-Okthoba 25.Abasebenzi bezinkampani ezizimele kuma-ward ehlukene eThekwini bagasela emahhovisi ophiko lwezaManzi nokuThuthwa kweNdle banaphaza indle.Babenengwa ukuthi sekuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha bempompa amathoyilethi omgodi ngale kweholo.Kwaba mapeketwana ngemizuzwana kugasele laba babhikishi kulawa mahhovisi kuvimbanise indle eyayinaphazwe phansi nasezindongeni..Amaphoyisa kamasipala naweSAPS afika abopha abasolwa ngokushesha.Umkhandlu, ngomlomo womkhulumeli wawo uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uyihlabe wayihlikiza indlela enodlame ekhonjiswe yilaba basebenzi.Wanxusa izinhlaka zomthetho ukuba zenze isibonelo ngababoshiwe.UMayisela udalule nokuthi umasipala uzosungula uphenyo ngezikhalo zosonkontileka.
title: Bazohlala isonto esitokisini abachitha indle

text: SABELO NSELEUZOVELA phambi kwekomiti elibhekele ukuziphatha kwamalungu e-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, ongunobhala jikelele wale nhlangano.Isimemezelo senziwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yokuvala umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC izolo.Umhlangano uthathe izinsuku ezintathu kanti bekulindelekile ukuthi uthathe isinqumo ngekusasa likaMagashule njengoba ebhekene necala lenkohlakalo yethenda yezigidi zamaRandi.Bekukuningi ukuqagela ngaphambi komhlangano njengoba bekunamahlebezi okuthi uMagashule angase aphoqwe ukuthi ashenxe esikhundleni njengoba i-ANC yathatha isinqumo sokuthi abaholi abanamacala kufanele bashenxe ezikhundleni.URamaphosa umemezele ukuthi uMagashule uzovela phambi kwekomiti ngoMgqibelo.“Umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu usamukelile isinqumo sikanobhala jikelele, sokuyovela phambi kwekomiti. Abaholi abaphezulu kufanele babheke umbiko wekomiti bese bebikela isigungu esiphezulu ngeziphakamiso zalo.”Njengoba kunokwesaba ukuthi isinqumo singase sibhebhethekise ukwahlukana kwangaphakathi kwi-ANC, uRamaphosa unxuse amalungu enhlangano ukuthi ayeke ukwenza izinkulumo ezidala uqhekeko.URamaphosa ugxeke abashisa izikibha ezinobuso bakhe ngesikhathi kuvela uMagashule enkantolo ngo-Okthoba.“Ayiyinhle le nto yokuthi singamalungu e-ANC sishise izimpahla nefulegi lenhlangano uma kukhona esingathokozile ngako.Muva nje, kukhona amalungu enhlangano enze izinkulumo ezidala uqhekeko. Lokhu kuphazamisa imizamo yokubumba kabusha inhlangano. Njengabaholi kufanele sikugweme ukwenza izinkulumo ezilimaza inhlangano.”URamaphosa uphinde wamemezela ukuthi izifundazwe nezifunda okufanele zibe nezingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi, zizovunyelwa ukuba nezingqungquthela ngaphambi kokuphela kukaMashi.Uthe kuzona kuzolandelwa imigudu ebekiwe yokulwa nokubhebhetheka kweCorona.KwaZulu-Natal zinhlanu izifunda okufanele zibe nezingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi, iMoses Mabhida, eThekwini, Josiah Gumede, Lower South Coast neGeneral Gizenga Mpanza.
title: UMagashule uzovela ekomitini le-ANC

text: ISILOMO somdlali weLamontville Golden Arrows uKudakwashe Mahachi sizohlala kuBafana Bes’thende kuze kuphele isizini ngaphambi kokuthi sijoyine i-Orlando Pirates.Ngesizini ezayo uMahachi uzobe edlala kweZimnyama. UClinton Larsen, ocija i-Arrows, ukuqinisekisile lokhu. Sile sabika ngodaba lokuthi uMahachi usezogijima kwiPirates kusukela ngesizini ezayo.Ngemuva kombiko kube sekuvela ukuthi kungenzeka uMahachi aye kwiPirates kuleli windi.“Anginalo ulwazi ngokuthi kuzokwenzekani ngekusasa likaMahachi ezinyangeni ezine ezizayo. Engikwaziyo nje wukuthi ezinyangeni ezine ezizayo uzobe eyilungu leqembu. Okwenzeka ngemuva kwalokho-ke yinto engaphezu kwamandla ami,” kusho uLarsen.UMahachi usephenduke umsindisi we-Arrows. Ngempelasonto usize iqembu lakhe laqumba phansi iSuperSport United ngo 1-0 ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.Igoli likaMahachi lisize i-Arrows yaqeda ukhondolo lwemidlalo ewu-11 kuyo yonke imiqhudelwano inganqobi. Ngaphambi komdlalo wangempelasonto i-Arrows yayigcine ukunqoba ngoSepthemba 22 ngesikhathi ithela othulini iPlatinum Stars ngo 1-0 eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium.Nakuwona lo mdlalo uMahachi nguyena owaba yiqhawe eshaya igoli elanika Abafana Bes’thende amaphuzu amathathu.I-Pirates ayinaye umdlali osebenzisa unyawo langakwesokunxele enkabeni yenkundla. Yingakho kwesinye isikhathi iphoqeleka ukuthi isebenzise uThabo Matlaba okwaziyo ukusebenzisa inxele.UMarc Van Heerden naye uke wayibamba enkabeni yenkundla ngomzuliswano wokuqala ngesikhathi iBucs ishaywa yiMamelodi Sundowns ngo 3-1 e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, eGoli. UMahachi usezoze ayijoyine iPirates ngoJuni. Leli qembu lisasayine uPhetso Maphanga noDiamond Thopola.
title: IBucs isazomlinda kancane uMahachi

text: UNOZINTI weBidvest Wits, uBrighton Mhlongo, akadikibele ngokuphendulwa isibukeli kuleli qembu nakuba sekuyophela isizini engakaze alinuke ijezi.UMhlongo, ozakhele igama kwi-Orlando Pirates, usayine kwiZitshudeni ekuqaleni kwesizini esuka kwiChippaUnited emuva kokuhamba kukaMoeneeb Josephs oseyibamba kuMaZulu.Bekunethemba lokuthi uzokwazi ukumisa kabi uDarren Keet ovimbela iBafana Bafana okuvela ukuthi uyahamba kwiWits njengoba kuphela isizini.Nokho lokho akwenzekanga kwazise uKeet uyazitamuzela ijezi. Kunalokho umqeqeshi weWits, uGavin Hunt, usayinise uRicardo Goss obevimbela iKings kwiNational First Division (NFD). UGoss, ovimbe emidlalweni yeNedbank Cup, uyena osegcine ethole ithuba ngaphambi kukaMhlongo oseyibuka nabalandeli imidlalo yeWits.“Kufanele ngiqhubeke nokusebenza kanzima, ithuba lami liyeza. Zibe khona izikhathi lapho kudingeke ngihlale ebhentshini noma ngihlale nabalandeli, ngaphinda ngalimala. Kodwa akekho engingamgxeka ngalokho.“Ngicabanga ukuthi isikhathi sikaJehova siyisona. Ngihlala ngikholwa ukuthi ngithandaza uMdali wemilingo. Ngingahlala ezihlweleni namuhla, kusasa ngiqale umdlalo. Ngeke wazi. Okufanele ngikwenze ukubheka phansi, ngisebenze kanzima ngizithobe kungakhathaleki ukuthi yimuphi unozinti ozayo. Ngisho ungaletha * -Iker Casillas (waseSpain), noma ubani, engifuna ukukwenza wukusebenza kanzima ukuze kuhlomule iqembu,” kusho uMhlongo.Isimo abhekene naso uMhlongo asiqali kwazise kwiPirates uqale ukuzwa ubumnandi bokuvimba njalo ngemuva kokushona kukaSenzo Meyiwa. KwiChippa United ubemiswe kabi nguDaniel Akpeyi waseNigeria osevimbela iKaizer Chiefs.“Kusukela ngaliqala ibhola bekuhlale kunjena, ngibhekene nobunzima. Ngilwela yonke into. Lokhu kungiqinisile. Ngiyazi ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi kuyanyukela. Kodwa uma kunzima kufanele uqine nawe.“Ngingumuntu onjalo. Kufanele ngiqine, nginqobe izimo engihlangabezana nazo. Yilokho ebengikwenza selokhu ngaqala ibhola. Akukho okungangihlula manje,” kusho uMhlongo.I-Wits ngelinye lamaqembu asembangweni wesicoco seligi. Nakuba iphazamisekile ihlulwa emidlalweni edlule kodwa isizibuyisele endaweni efanele. IZitshudeni ziguqe ngo 1-0 kwiPirates emdlalweni weligi eBidvest Wits Stadium obungoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama.“Kufanele sibhekane nomdlalo ngamunye. Sithole amaphuzu abalulekile sibhekene neBloemfontein Celtic. Asifuni ukuzitshela ukuthi sekulungile. Yebo silahle amaphuzu emidlalweni edlule kodwa yibhola leli, kuyenzeka. Ngisho amaqembu amakhulu ayawalahla amaphuzu ngezikhathi ezibalulekile. Okubalulekile ukuthi ubuya kanjani. Ngiyakholelwa eqenjini lethu,” kusho uMhlongo.
title: UMhlongo uzoqhubeka nokuzikhandla kuze kulunge

text: YIZE uphiko oluqoqa intela kuleli, iSouth African Revenue Services (Sars) ithi yenza ngakho konke ukuthi isebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuze kutholakale imali yokuxhasa izinhlelo zikahulumeni, kodwa ikhala ngabaqashi abasahluleka ukulandela imithetho. AbakwaSars badalule lokhu esitatimendeni abasithumelele abezindaba izolo. "Izwe lethu libhekene nesimo esinzima emlandweni walo. Njengoba uMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa asikhumbuza ngoLwesithathu lwangoJuni 17 ukuthi sekuphele izinsuku ezingu100 siphila ngaphansi kwengcindezi ehlasele umhlaba wonke ngenxa yeCovid-19"."Ukuvalwa kwezwe kube nesidingo ukuze kuphephiswe izimpilo zabantu kodwa kuguqise umnotho wakuleli, kwanemisebenzi ephelayo, kwanamabhizinisi ahlengwayo futhi kwavela izinga lobubha nokungalingani uzweni lethu." AbakwaSars bathe basaqhubeka ukudlala indima esemqoka ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni uyaqhubeka nokuxhasa abasebenzi bezempilo ababeka izimpilo zabo engcupheni ukulwa nokubhebhetheka kwaleli gciwane ezinkumbini zabantu. "Siqhubekile nokubuyisela imali ezinkampanini nakubantu ukuze babhekane nezinkinga zemali. Ngalesi sikhathi esibucayi, abakwaSars baqhamuke nesu lokuthi bengabasiza kanjani ngendlela abakhokhi bentela". Enye indlela abathe baqhamuke nayo njengoba kusavalwe izwe, ukusiza abakhokhi bentela ababhalisa ngohlelo lwe-internet olubizwa nge-eFilling ukuba bathole inombolo ecacisayo ukuthi bakhokha intela. Bathe ukuqoqa intela bakuvule kusukela ngo-Ephreli 15 futhi kuzoze kugcine ngo-Agasti 2020 ukuqinisekisa abaqashi bayayilandela imithetho nemigomo neminye imininingwane iyathunyelwa kubakhokhi bentela ngabadwana. "Isigaba sokuqala sinikezwe abaqashi nabanikezela ngemininingwane (third-party data providers) abanjengezinkampani zama-medical aid, izikhwama zempesheni yokuthatha umhlalaphansi namabhange. Ngesikhathi salolu hlelo, abanikezela ngemininingwane bekulindeleke ukuba bathumele imininingwane ngaphambi komhla ka31 Meyi noma ngawo ngqo". "Iningi labo lenze kahle kakhulu kodwa kunabathize abahlulekile ukwenza umsebenzi wabo, okuthwalise kanzima abakwaSars ukuxhumana nabasebenzi babo futhi isenzo sabo siphazamise abanye abakhokhi bentela."Bathe isigaba esilandelayo sesiqalile lapho abakwaSars becubungula imininingwane yeThird Party futhi behlala ezithendeni zabaqashi abalandela imithetho nabahlulekayo ukuletha imininingwane yabo kwaSars ngesikhathi. "Kuyicala ukubamba intela kubasebenzi ebizwa ngePAYE kodwa ungayyiyisi kwaSars. Kuyicala futhi ukungayilethi imininingwane yakho kwaSars uma kudingeka. Kodwa ngaphezu kwakho konke, ukuphula imigomo kunomthelela omubi kubakhokhi bentela."Uhlelo lwesithathu bathe luzoqala ngo-Agasti 1 futhi ngalolu suku abakhokhi bentela bengalindela ukuthola ama-sms abaqinisekisa ukuthi abakwaSars sebebahlinzekele futhi ne-draft assessment seyiyatholakala kwi-eFilling noma kwiMobi app. Kuthiwa sizobe singekho isidingo sokugcwalisa nokuhambisa ama-tax return kulabo abazomukela i-draft assessment futhi uma kunemali okumele babuyiselwe yona, bangayithola esontweni lokuqala ku-Agasti. Lolo hlelo lubizwa nge-auto assessment. Umkhokhi wentela uyangena kwi-auto-assessment uma inkampani emsizayo ngokuthumela imininingwane yakhe imenzela. Abasebenzi, abangakazitholi izitifiketi ezibizwa nge-IPR5 bayanxuswa ukuba basheshe baxhumane nabaqashi babo futhi baqinisekise ukuthi bayazithola. Isigaba sesine sizoqala ngoSepthemba 1. Abakhokhi bentela abangakenzelwa noma abangayimukeli i-auto assessment, bengaqala begcwalise imininingwane yabo ngohlelo lwe-eFilling noma lwe-MobiApp. Abakhokhi bentela abahlulekayo ukugcwalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bamukelekile ukuthi beze emagatsheni akwaSars kodwa baqale ngokubekisa indawo, bengavele batheleke nje bengalindelwe. Abantu bakuleli bayagqugquzelwa nokuthi basebenzise kakhulu izinkundla zokuxhumana ngoba ziyasheshisa futhi zinqanda nokuthi igciwane lingabhebhetheki kubantu.
title: AbakwaSars noshintsho olunqala ngentela kulo nyaka

text: UMETHULI wohlelo lwakuSABC 3 lwezingxoxo iReal Talk with Anele, u-Anele Mdoda, usulile kulolu hlelo ukuze ezogxila kweminye imisebenzi.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe yiSABC izolo ntambama, u-Anele uthe ubeluthanda lolu hlelo futhi uyaziqhenya ngokusebenza neSABC 3 kusukela ngesizini yokuqala.Lolu hlelo lukhonjiswa ngo-6 ntambama phakathi nesonto.“Ngizwa sengathi ukuze ngikhule sekuyisikhathi sokuthi ngilushiye uhlelo ngigxile kwengifuna ukukuzuza ngomuso. Ngithanda ukubonga iSABC 3, ababukeli nabo bonke abanesandla ohlelweni ngethuba abanginikeze lona nohlelo. Ngiyethemba ukuthi akuphelile, sizobonana,” kusho u-Anele.U-Anele uzogcina ukubonakala ethula uhlelo bukhoma ngoLwesihlanu oluzayo.Isizini yamanje izodlala kuze kube wu-Okthoba nonyaka.Izinhlelo zokuthola umethuli omusha seziqalile futhi kuzomenyezelwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.I-SABC neCheeky Media, engabadidiyeli bohlelo, ithe iyakwemukela ukusula kuka-Anele obeseshayele uhlelo iminyaka elinganiselwa kwemibili.U-Aisha Mohamed ongumphathi wakwaSABC 3, ubonge kakhulu u-Anele wathi bamfisela inhlanhla kwazokwenza ngomuso.- Intatheli yeSolezwe
title: U-Anele Mdoda usulile kwiReal Talk

text: UGCINWE esitokisini owesifazane waseHammarsdale okuthiwa uncishe umoya usana lwakhe olunezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ngokulimboza ngesiqamelo ebusweni, laze lashona ngemuva kwengxabano noyise walo ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.UNksz Hlengiwe Radebe (23) kuthiwa uvele kafushane eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu, icala lakhe lahlehliselwa isonto elizayo lapho okulindeleke ukuthi afake isicelo sebheyili.Kuthiwa usana, uLuthando Zondi, luphuthunyiswe emtholampilo wendawo eHlengisizwe wuninakhulu uNksz Silungile Radebe ngemuva kokuthi indodakazi yakhe imtshele ukuthi isiyibulele ingane yayo.Ngokusho komthombo, emtholampilo bathole ukuthi usana beseluvele lushonile.“Kuthiwa unina wengane ufike wayithatha ihleli nogogo wayo endlini enkulu waya emakamelweni angemuva kwendlu. Kusolwa ukuthi uyincishe umoya ngokuyimboza ngesiqamelo yaze yashona ngoba ibingenazo izimpawu zokulimala noma zokuklinywa. Idamu lalo litholakale phansi. Ubuyele endlini ngemuva kwemizuzu ewu-15 watshela unina ukuthi useyibulele ingane,” kusho umthombo.Uthe kunamahlebezi athi uNksz Radebe ubehlale exabana noyise wengane, okusolwa ukuthi yikho okuholele ekutheni athathe isinqumo sokuyibulala.Ilungu lomndeni kayise kaLuthando, lithe bayaveva ngesenzo sikaNksz Radebe.“Akaqali ukuyenza le nto. Emasontweni ambalwa edlule uke wayiklinya ingane kodwa wahluleka ukuyibulala. Ubengaze ayibulale ngesihluku esingaka,” kusho leli lungu.Uthe bafuna abolele ejele uNksz Radebe ngokubulala umphefumulo ongenacala.Leli lungu linqabile ukuxhumanisa Isolezwe ngeSonto noyise wengane, lithe akekho esimweni sokukhuluma.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenenant Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aseMpumalanga abophe owesifazane oneminyaka ewu-23 ngecala lokubulala usana olunezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye.“Umsolwa uvelile enkantolo yeMantshi yaseMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu, kulindeleke abuyele ngemuva kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuyofaka isicelo sebheyili,” kusho uZwane.
title: Usesitokisini osolwa ngokubulala usana

text:
“Ngiyaxolisa ukuthi owesifazane owahlukumezeka ngenxa yami. Ngachitha isikhathi ejele, ngidonsa isigwebo engasinikezwa ingalo yomthetho. title: 'Ngiyaxolisa ukuthi owesifazane wahlukumezeka ngenxa yami' - Okmalumkoolkat

text: USENGUMFUNDISI umculi owaduma eqenjini lowokholo Ikhethelo futhi uvule nebandla lakhe.USgwili Zuma ocula owokholo abuye abe umsakazi wesiteshi esisakazela umphakathi, Imbokodo FM, usesungule ibandla labasindisiwe.Leli bandla okuyiWinners Corner Ministries, uliqambe ngohlelo alushayela kwiMbokodo FM.USgwili uthe yize lisungulwe uyena leli bandla kodwa unkosikazi wakhe, uThandeka Zuma, uyena osabheke konke ebandleni kwazise yena okwamanje umatasa kakhulu ngomsebenzi womsakazo nomculo.“Ibandla lisoLundi, eMahlabathini, liqale ukuba khona ngonyaka odlule. Umkami uyena obheke konke ngalo njengoba mina ngisalungiselela ukukhipha i-albhamu entsha ezophuma maduze nje,” kubeka uSgwili.Uqhube wathi inhloso yokuqala ibandla akukhona nje ukuthi ufuna ukuzicebisa ngemali yabazalwane njengoba sekuye kushiwo kanjalo kwabasuke besungule amabandla kodwa uthi yena uhlose ukushumayela izwi likaNkulunkulu ngazo zonke izindlela.NgokukaSgwili, usungule ibandla ngoba efuna ukwelapha imiphefumulo yabantu ngomculo wokholo, ngezintshumayelo nangokusakaza.Uthe ukuba matasa kwakhe yingoba usafukula inkampani yakhe yomculo njengoba isanda kujoyinwa abaculi abasuka kwezinye izinkampani.“Manje ngisafukula abanye abaculi esizokhipha nabo ama-albhamu maduze, okubalwa kubo uNqobile Mbandlwa, Anointed, noSandile Mntambo abasuka kwezinye izinkampani bajoyina eyami Umusa Event and Productions,” kuphetha uSgwili.
title: Usesungule ibandla lakhe uSgwili

text: I-MARITIME Academy eseMfolozi TVET College, eMpangeni, ezoqeqesha izitshudeni ezifundela ezamanzi, ivulwe ngokusemthethweni izolo.Isikhungo sakhiwe ngemali eyevile ku-R100 million. Sivulwe nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, ezoBuchwepheshe nokuQeqesha, uDkt Blade Nzimande. Sizokwamukela izitshudeni eziwu-68 okuzobe kungezokuqala ukufundela izifundo zeMaritime esikhungweni, esingesokuqala KwaZulu-Natal.UNzimande, obehambisana noNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, uthe isikhungo siyingqophamlando ngoba sinemishini esezingeni lomhlaba. Uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi abafundi bakhuthazwe ukungena emkhakheni wezamanzi, ongeminye ephethe umnotho.“Laba bafundi bazokwenza izinto eziningi emkhakheni wamanzi. Kukhona onjiniyela nabazoba ngabameli kulo mkhakha. Okuhle wukuthi leli kolishi lingelihamba phambili KwaZulu-Natal futhi lenza kahle kakhulu,” kusho uNzimande.Ubonge abafake isandla ekutheni kwakhiwe isikhungo. Uthe iTransport Seta ifake uR27 million kwathi iNational Skills Fund yafaka uR87 million.UMshengu uthe ukuvulwa kwesikhungo kuhambisana nombono womnyango wakhe wokugxila ezifundweni ezifukula umnotho. Uthe abafuni ukukhiqiza abafundi abangenalo ikusasa.USithembiso Mabaso (20) ofunda iMaritime Engineering, uthe ubevele ewuthanda umkhakha kodwa wachithwa efuna ukungena enyuvesi. Uthe wezwa ngethuba ezikhangisweni, wafaka isicelo wathathwa. UNtobeko Mpungose (20) naye ofunda iMaritime Engineering, uthe bayajabula ukuba yizitshudeni zokuqala zesikhungo.“Okusijabulisayo wukuthi sibe ngabokuqala ukuhlomula kulolu hlelo. Akujwayelekile ukuthi izinto ezinhle zilethwe emakhaya naselokishini,” kusho uMpungose.UMengameli weSRC, uBongani Mokoale, ubonge zonke izinkampani ezixhasile, wathembisa ukuthi bazosinakekela isikhungo. Uthe uyathemba ukuthi baningi abanye abasazoxhasa kwezinye izinhlelo ngoba amakolishi asabukelwa phansi.Isikhungo siqale ukusebenza ngo-Ephreli. Izitshudeni zokuqala zizoqeda emuva kweminyaka emine. Isikhungo sizosiza nentsha engaphandle edinga ukuqeqeshwa kwezamanzi.Bonke abakhulumile badonse ngendlebe umphakathi ukuthi ungalinge ucekele phansi isikhungo uma kubhikishwa.
title: Kuvulwe iMaritime Academy eMpangeni

text: UMGADLI omusha weKaizer Chiefs, uLeonardo Castro utakule iqembu evalela enethini igoli elinike Amakhosi amaphuzu amathathu ngomdlalo wakhe wokuqala ngesikhathi iqembu liqeda ishobolo leminyaka, lishaya iBaroka FC okokuqala emlandweni.UCastro ungene ngesiwombe sesibili endaweni kaRyan Moon. Ngomzuzu ka-84, ushaye ingcwenga yegoli ngemuva kwesidididi esidaleke ebhokisini leBaroka. UCastro ufike kuMakhosi kule nyanga esuka kwiSundowns. IChiefs iqede umdlalo ingasaphelele kulandela ukuthola ikhadi elibomvu kukaJoseph Molangoane ngomzuzu ka-72. Ushaye uKhutso Mohwatseleng ngendololwane.Igoli likaCastro liphinde lasiza Amakhosi avala igebe phakathi kwawo neMamelodi Sundowns ehlezi esicongweni.Njengamanje iChiefs isihlezi endaweni yesithathu kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership ngamaphuzu angu-29 emidlalweni engu-18. Isihlukaniswe amahlanu neSundowns eqhwakele.NgoMgqibelo iChiefs inethuba lokunciphisa igebe libe ngamaphuzu amabili uma ingashaya iSundowns eFNB Stadium.Umqeqeshi weChiefs uSteve Komphela akazange alishintshe iqembu lakhe elidle iPolokwane City ngesonto eledlule. Izinduku ezintsha zaMakhosi, uCastro noSiphelele Ntshangase baqale ebhentshini. IChiefs iye ekhefini ilandela emuva ngo 1-0 wegoli likaNguzana.Ngemizuzu engu-25 yokuqala iBaroka ithole amakhona ayisithupha. U-Itumeleng Khune utakule iChiefs kukubi ngesikhathi uRobin Ngalande edonsa inguzunga yeshodi ephebezwe yilo nozinti weBafana Bafana kwaba yikhona.Akuzange kuthuse ukubona iBaroka ihamba phambili ngomzuzu ka-31 ngesikhathi uNguzana eba yedwa ebhokisini ngemuva kwebhola ebelishaywe nguTalent Chawapiwa, lashaya ipali labuya lawela kulo mgadli walibeka enethini. Zithe zibuya ekhefini uRyan Moon ushaye igoli lokulinganisa ngemuva kwebhola abeligotshelwe nguSiphiwe Tshabalala ngomzuzu ka-47. Bekungokwesibili imidlalo ilandelana uMoon eshaya igoli lokulinganisa ngekhanda njengoba enzile nakowePolokwane.Ngesiwombe sesibili uKomphela ufake uCastro, Ntshangase noDumsani Zuma endaweni kaMoon, Tshabalala noGustavo Paez. IChiefs yiyona ebiphethe umdlalo ngesiwombe sesibili. Abadlali abafakwe nguKomphela bangene noshintsho.
title: UCastro utakule Amakhosi

text: UKUPHIKWA nguyise esemncane akuzange kumthene amandla umfundi osebhale incwadi ngokuphikwa nguyise, owaqale waphatheka kabi emuva kokuzwa lezi zindaba kodwa wangavumela ukuthi lesi simo simcindezele.U-Olwami Shangase (12) ofunda uGrade 6 eMbongintwini Primary, eZimbokodweni, ubhale incwadi esihloko sithi Rejected Treasure lapho echaza khona kabanzi ngokuphikwa nguyise, nokuthi nakuba sekwenzekile lokho akuzange kusho ukuphela komhlaba kuyena.“Inhloso yami yokuthi ngibhale le ncwadi, ukukhuthaza nezinye izingane eziphikwe oyise ukuthi zivuke zizithathe,” kusho  u-Olwami.Uthe namhlanje useyakwazi ukukhuluma ngalesi simo ngoba kwathi esezwile ngaso etshelwa unina eseneminyaka eyisikhombisa wasamukela nakuba kwakunzima.Uthe wasizwa ukwesekwa uyise ongamzali owagcina eseshade nonina ukuze aqhubekele phambili nempilo.“Nginxusa nabazali abangazizali izingane ukuthi baziphathe kahle njengoba nami ngathola ukunakekeleka kubaba ongangizali ngakwazi ukubona ukubaluleka kokunakekelwa komuntu,” kusho yena.Uthe ufisa ukwazisa nezinye izingane nabazali ukuthi ukuphikwa wubaba nokukhuliswa wumzali ongakuzali akumele kuthathwe njengento osekumele kuhlalwe kuyona kuze kumise impilo yomuntu.“Namhlanje ngiyaziqhenya ngengiyikho. Ukungavumeli kwami ukucindezelwa yilesi simo kungifundise izinto eziningi njengoba sengisungule nenhlangano yami iTell a Peer Group,” kuchaza yena.Uthe kule nhlangano ufundisa abanye abantwana abaphikwe oyise ukuthi basukume bazithathe.Ngaphandle kokubhala le ncwadi, * -Olwami uphinde athule izinkulumo ezikhuthazayo lapho ecobelela khona ngolwazi abanye ontanga yakhe nabantwana ababhekene nezinselelo zokulahlwa oyise, ukuvumbulula amathalente, nokulandela umsebenzi umfundi afisa ukuwenza nokunye okuningi.
title: Ubhale incwadi umfundi owaphikwa nguyise

text: OWAYEKHULUMELA uhulumeni wakuleli uMnuz Mzwanele Manyi ulaxaze uKhongolose izolo wajoyina i-African Transformation Movement (ATM).UManyi uthe isinqumo sokuthi ashiye i-ANC yingoba le nhlangano isiphambene nemigomo eyasungulwa ngaphansi kwayo.Uthe lokhu kubonakala ngokuthi ingqungquthela ifike inqume bese lezo zinqumo zingalandelelwa ngubuholi obuphezulu. “Ngifinyelele esinqumeni sokuthi ngoba i-ANC isikhathele, isiyacwila nokuthi ayisasebenzi ngokwezimiso zayo ukuthi ngiyishiye le nhlangano ngoba ibuyisela emuva lokho okwalwelwa kanzima. Le nhlangano isilahlekelwe wukwethenjwa ngokuhluleka ukukhulula abantu bakuleli.”Uthe unyaka odlule iwona omenze wanquma ukushiya i-ANC. “Asivumele i-ANC ithathe impesheni ukuze kufakwe abantu abasha, abanegazi elisheshayo. I-ATM yintsha ayinawo umlando wenkohlakalo nezethembiso ezingafezwa.”Leli qembu lasungulwa nyakenye nguMnuz Vuyolwethu Zungula nabanye abaholi beSA Council of Messianic Churches of Christ. UManyi uyilungu leBantu Church of Christ abaholi bayo abasungule i-ATM.Ememezela ukujoyina leli qembu uManyi ukhale ngokuthi i-ANC ayenzanga lutho ngesikhathi iMultichoice inqamula ukusebenza kwe-ANN7 emoyeni.Uthe abasebenzi abangu-500 balahlekelwa ngumsebenzi ngesikhathi kuvalwa lesi siteshi sethelevishini akuthenga emndenini wakwaGupta nephepha iNew Age ngoR450 million. “I-ANC ayishongo lutho abantu belahlekelwa ngumsebenzi. I-ANC ayilaleli kunamadolobha angalungisiwe sekuphele inqwaba yeminyaka kwatholakala intando yeningi. Abafundi baphonseka ezindlini zangasese bafe kodwa akekho umuntu othathelwa izinyathelo ngalokho,” kusho uManyi.Uthe ezinye zezizathu ezenze ashiye uKhongolose ngukuthi i-ANC ibonakala ingafuni ukuthatha umhlaba ngaphandle kwezinxephezelo okungenye yezinto okwavunyelwana ngazo eNasrec.Okunye ngukuthi le nhlangano ayifuni ukubhekana nezinto ezithinta izinguquko.Uthe kodwa akazange ajoyine leli qembu ngoba eyilungu leBantu Church of Christ wathi ibandla aliyona ingxenye yaleli qembu.UManyi noMnuz Hlaudi Motsoeneng ngabanye babantu abashiye uKhongolose njengoba ngoDisemba uMotsoeneng wasungula iqembu elisha.UMotsoeneng wathi iqembu lakhe i-African Content Movement lizogxila ekuqedeni indlala, ukubuyiswa komhlaba ukufundisa abangafundile nokunye.
title: Ulaxaze uKhongolose wajoyina i-ATM

text: MANCANE amathemba okuthi abashayeli abalinde izincwadi zokushayela abazivuselela ngesikhathi kunesiteleka sabasebenzi eMnyangweni wezokuThutha bazithole kulo nyaka.Balinganiselwa ku-90 000 abashayeli abalinde izincwadi zabo zokushayela abavuselela phakathi kukaJulayi noSepthemba.I-DA ngeledlule yenze isiphakamiso kuNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, sokuthi bangaboshwa abashayeli bakulesi sifundazwe abanobufakazi bokuthi izincwadi zabo bazivuselela futhi bazivuselela kusenesikhathi.Umnyango uthe ngeke uphambane nomthetho womgwaqo, abashayeli kumele babe nezincwadi zokushayela noma izincwadi zokushayela zesikhashana ngaso sonke isikhathi uma beshayela.UMnuz Rafeek Shah, okhulumela iDA kwezokuthutha, uthe lesi simo asamukeleki, umnyango bekumele wenze imizamo yokuthi kulungiswe lesi simo ngesikhathi abasebenzi abasophikweni lwemishini egaya amakhadi bebuyela emsebenzini.Umthombo waleli phephandaba ongaphakathi uthe ngesikhathi abasebenzi bebuyela emsebenzini baqala ngezicelo ezifike sebebuyele emsebenzini, bangaqala ngalezo ezazivele sezifakiwe ngesikhathi besesitelekeni.UMnuz Ishmael Mnisi okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha kuzwelonke uthe umnyango unalo isu lokusheshisa lolu hlelo kodwa akashongo ukuthi yiluphi.Uqhube wathi angaphezulu kuka-800 000 amalayisensi asegayiwe ngemuva kwesiteleka, kuwo angu-500 000 asethunyelwe kubanikazi bawo.Uthe abashayeli abalinde amalayisensi abo bayanxuswa ukuthi bathumele isms ku-33214 ukuze babone ukuthi ukwenziwa kwamakhadi abo kukusiphi isigaba.
title: Basazolinda abavuselela ezokushayela

text:
BARBARA MAREGELEU MNYANGO wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi eWestern Cape usuqoke ithimba elizohlola ama-website ezikhangiso nadayisa impahla kulandela ukuthuswa ngowesifazane wakulesi sifundazwe okhiphe isikhangiso kuGumtree efuna ozokhulisa ingane yakhe-(adopt) engakazalwa njengeyakhe.Isikhangiso sikhishwe ngo-Ephreli 17, sifakwe ngowesifazane okhulelwe othe uneminyaka engu-24.Lo wesifazane waseKuils River, uthe unezinyanga ezimbili ekhulelwe futhi ufuna ukuthi ingane yakhe ithathwe ikhuliswe ngomunye umndeni ngenxa yezinkinga zemali nokuzibophezela esikoleni.Ucele abafuna ukuthatha le ngane ukuthi baxhumane naye enombolweni yocingo ayifake kulesi sikhangiso.Iphephandaba elinguzakwabo we
Solezwe, i
Cape Times lizame izikhathi eziningi ukuthinta le nombolo kepha belulokhu lungangeni.Ngezikhathi zehora lesikhombisa ebusuku ngoMsombuluko bangu-88 abantu abese bevule lesi sikhangiso.NgoLwesibili sibonakale sesisusiwe.UMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi eWestern Cape uzamile kodwa wehluleka ukuthola ofake isikhangiso.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango, uMnuz Albert Fritz, ufanise isenzo sokunikelwa kwengane ku-Gumtree njengokushushumbiswa kwabantu.“Umuntu wesifazane akakwazi ukukhokhelwa ukuthi anikele ngengane ukuthi ikhuliswe ngabanye abantu. Lolu hlelo kumele lwenziwe ngumnyango wethu,” kusho uFritz.Unxuse abantu ukuthi balandele uhlelo oluyilo lokunikela ngezingane ngokuthi bathintane namahhovisi omnyango.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazwe, u-FC van Wyk, uthe isikhangiso besingazange sibikwe kubo.UNkk Penelope Whitaker wenhlangano yezingane ezingenabani, i-The Child Welfare Adoption Centre, uthe mhlawumbe kumele izinhlangano zabo zikhiphe izikhangiso ezazisa abesifazane ngokuthi yini abangayenza uma befuna ukunikela ngezingane zabo.
title: Ufake isikhangiso onikela ngengane

text: UDINGISIWE endaweni owesifazane osolwa ngokuqoma aze aquleke endaweni.Lo wesifazane (43), esingeke siligagule igama lakhe ukuvikela izingane, unezingane ezinhlanu nomfundisi oyinduna yenkosi, usolwa nangokudla silaza adle fumuka.Ubebikele leli phephandaba ukuthi udingisiwe endaweni ngoba ale induna, kodwa le nduna nomphakathi wonkana, bakhulume ngazwi linye bathi lo wesifazane ubesekhathazile endaweni.Kuthiwa uqoma amadoda anabafazi, namabhoxongwane.Kuvela ukuthi inkosi imdingisa nje yingoba isibona ukuthi kuzogcina kuxabene ubendle esizweni, njengoba sekuke kwaba khona ukulwa ngalo wesifazane izikhathi eziningi endaweni.“Sengimbambe oqotsheni kathathu namadoda ahlukene,” kusho induna. Ithe kwesinye seziwombe kwadingeka ukuthi ihlasele kweminye yemizi endaweni lapho unina wezingane zakhe ayelele khona neshende.“Ngangihamba nezinye izinduna zakwenye inkosi nengxenye yomndeni wakhe ngoba ngangifuna babe ofakazi,” kuchaza induna.Ithe ishende lasindiswa wukuthi lizishwelezele ngokuthi lo wesifazane wathi akasenandoda, kade yazishonela.Uthe kuyimanje unina wezingane zakhe unengane yelinye ishende ayithole bebe besahlala ndawonye.Nalo wesifazane uyavuma ukuthi ngempela unayo le ngane okungeyona eyenduna.“Kuyiqiniso ukuthi nginengane yangaphandle, kodwa vele naye akanendaba nami."Ngajoliswa wukuthi akazondli izingane futhi unomunye unkosikazi,” kusho lo wesifazane.Induna ithi, unina wezingane zakhe ayikaze imhlukumeze, kuphela ungumuntu othanda amadoda kuze kweqe.“Ngikhethe ukuthi ngimbike enkosini, ngingamenzi lutho olunye."Uthe unina wezingane zakhe usindele nokuthi ungumfundisi uyasonta.“Bengifuna abantu babone ukuthi uyena onephutha, yingakho kungekho okunye okubi engikwenze kuyena phezu kokuthi engigile wabukisa ngami ngalolu hlobo,” kusho induna.Lo wesifazane uyaluvuma nohide lwamadoda. Kodwa ugcizelela ngokuthi konke abekwenza kungenxa yokudinwa yile nduna engazinaki izingane.Okumenza ukuthi inhliziyo yakhe iqaqambe lona wesifazane, uthe yingoba umuzi axoshwe kade ehlala kuwo, wazakhela yena ngezikhwepha zakhe, induna ayikhiphanga ngisho isenti leli.Uthe ibimxhaphaza nje kuphela ngoba inomunye unkosikazi wesibili endaweni.Kuyimanje owesifazane lona uthe wehla enyuka nezivimbelo zenkantolo ngoba ufuna kwenzeke ubulungiswa ngomuzi akhishwe kuwo.Ufuna inkantolo imbuyisele kuwo.Induna ivumile ukuthi inayo enye inkosikazi nezingane. Mayelana nokondla izingane, induna ithe izingane zayo ziyafika zithathe imali kuyo njengoba zihambe nonina, okuyinto ayiphikayo owesifazane.Inkosi ayitholakalanga ukuba iphawule. Abesilisa abaficwe enkantolo yayo inkosi ngenkathi leli phephandaba lihambele khona, bathe bangumlomo wayo inkosi, ebizokusho vele ikuphathise bona.
title: Udingisiwe owesifazane onamadoda amaningi

text: UMHOLI kazwelonke weDemocratic Alliance (DA), uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, usexwayise amalungu ale nhlangano ukuthi akekho kuwona omkhulu ukwedlula leli qembu.Ubephawula okokuqala emva kokuthi ikhokhasi yale nhlangano ithathe isinqumo sokuxosha obeyiMeya yayo eKapa, uNkk Patricia de Lille.Ngaphandle kokuxoshwa kukaDe Lille kuleli sonto, le nhlangano iphinde yamisa ubulungu bakhe kuyona.Usolwa ngenkohlakalo phakathi kwayo okubalwa ukusebenzisa imali yabakhokhi bentela ukwenza ngcono umuzi wakhe.UNkk De Lille uyaziphika lezi zinsolo, uthi uzosiphonsela inselelo enkantolo isinqumo sokuxoshwa kwakhe.“Uma ikhokhasi yenhlangano isikhombise ukungabethembi ubuholi bakho, isuke ingekho enye into engaphinde yenziwe,” kusho uMaimane.Uthe kuyamangaza ukuthi kunabathile abafuna ukubambezela lolu daba. Uncome uNkk De Lille njengozakwabo ebezwana naye.“I-DA yinhlangano engacwasi ngokwebala, kodwa uma sekukhona ukungathembeki komuntu enhlanganweni, kumele uhambe. Sihola abantu lapha okuyibona abasivotela. Kumele senze okufanele,” kugcizelela uMaimane.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, kunezinkulumo nezinsolo ezithi iDA isebenzisa ubuhlanga ukuchitha abantu abamnyama.Kodwa uMaimane uzichithile zonke lezi zinsolo.Kuneminye imibiko ethi kwasayena uMaimane isikhundla sakhe sizulelwa amanqe kule nhlangano njengoba engumuntu omnyama.
title: Uma ikhokhasi ingasakuthembi akukho okungenziwa - Maimane

text: IQEMBU eliphikisayo iDemocratic Alliance (DA) lithi izwe lonke lilindele ukuthi umengameli Jacob Zuma asuswe esikhundleni sokuhola izwe, ashushiswe nabo bonke abanye abasolwa ngenkohlakalo. Selokhe kwavotelwa uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa njengomengameli omusha we-ANC ingcindezi yokuthi kususwe uZuma njengomengameli wezwe ilokhe ikhule njalo. Izolo, abazibize ngamalungu e-ANC futhi begqoke izikibha zayo batshele izintatheli ukuthi bazomashela ezindlini zombuso ezisePitoli (Union Buildings) futhi ngeke bahambe kuze kube uMengameli Jacob Zuma uyehla esikhundleni sokuhola izwe. Namhlanje umholi weDA, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, uthe sebekhathele yizingxoxo eziphakathi kukamengameli wezwe nowe-ANC. "Lelizwe lidinga ukuthu uZuma asuswe esikhundleni njengamanje, ashushiswe. Sidinga ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo ngokushesha, hhayi izingxoxo zikaRamaphosa," usho kanje. Sekunamasonto uZuma noRamaphosa bedingida isikhundla sakhe njengomengameli wezwe kanti amaqembu aphikisayo asola ukuthi ubuholi be-ANC sebuhlulekile ukumsusa. Amaqembu aphikisayo namhlanje athe afuna kube nevoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bukaZuma kuleli sonto ukuze ezokwazi ukuzibambela wona amsuse esikhundleni. "Abadedele iPhalamende lenze umsebenzi walo siqhubeke," kusho uMaimane. Imibiko engakaqinisekiswa iveza ukuthi uZuma uthe ufuna ukuvikeleka ngokomthetho uma ezokwehla esikhundleni. UMaimane uthe uZuma akumele avunyelwe abambe izwe ngobhongwane. "Uma efuna ukuvikelwa, ayikho indawo ephephe ukudlula ijele," kuphetha uMaimane. Khonamanjalo, njengamanje ubuholi obuphezulu be-ANC buhlangene ePitoli ukuzobhunga udaba luka Zuma. Kulindeleke ukuthi kuphume isinqumo kulolu daba namhlanje.
title: 'UZuma uzokuthola ejele ukuphepha' - Maimane

text: KUMISWE abasebenzi abane boMkhandlu waseHarry Gwala mayelana nezinsolo zokuholela abasebenzi abayizipoki.Laba basebezi abasebenza ehhovisi lezimali kuthiwa bamiswe ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule ngemuva kokuvela kokuthi bayathinteka kulezi zinsolo.Umthombo weSolezwe ongaphakathi kulo mkhandlu, uthe laba basebenzi sebeyiqedile imali yomkhandlu beholela izipoki.Uthe bebesebenzisana nomunye umsebenzi osehhovisi likaNdabazabantu.“Sisola ukuthi baningi abantu abasazomiswa emsebenzini njengoba kunezinsolo zokuthi baningi abathintekayo kulo mkhonyovu,” kusho umthombo.Uthe omunye walaba basebenzi kuvela ukuthi unezinkampani eziningi ezahlukene ezithola amathenda emkhandlwini.Okhulumela uMkhandlu waseHarry Gwala uMnuz Ndabezitha Ntenza izolo ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bakhona abasebenzi abane abamisiwe emsebenzini mayelana nezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.UTenza uthe bathathe isinqumo sokuthi laba basebenzi babamise emsebenzini ukuze uphenyo oluqhubekayo lungaphazamiseki.Uthe bazothatha isinqumo mayelana nekusasa labo uma sekuphothulwe uphenyo.“Siyasihlonipha isigaba somthetho esithi umuntu umsulwa kuze kuba utholwa enecala yinkantolo yomthetho,” kusho uTenza. Uthe laba basebenzi basolwa ngokuholela abasebenzi abayizipoki.“Bekunamahlebezi abezwakala kuthiwa kukhona abasebenzi bethu abaholela izipoki sabe sesiqala uphenyo nokuholele ekutheni kube khona abasebenzi abamiswayo,” kusho uTenza.Uthe bazimisele ngokuthi baphenye baze bafike ezimpandeni ngalezi zinsolo.“Ngifuna ukukusho futhi ukuthi njengoba siphenya, wonke umuntu igama lakhe elizothinteka sizomphenya noma ngabe ungubani,” kusho uTenza.Uthe umkhandlu wabo uzibophezele ekulweni nenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa yingakho unezinhlaka eziningi onazo ngenhloso yokulwa nalesi sihlava.
title: Inhlanzi ishelwe amanzi kwabasolwa ngezipoki

text: USWELE amaphiko umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, kulandela ukuphumelela kwakhe enza osekuhlule abaqeqeshi abaningi ngesikhathi efaka leli qembu kweyamaqoqo yeCaf Champions League okokuqala eminyakeni emihlanu.UMicho lokhu ukwenze ngoMgqibelo ekomkhulu laseNamibia, iWindheok enkundleni eyaziwa ngeleSam Nujoma Stadium, lapho iqembu lakhe linqobe khona ngo 1-0 kwi-African Stars. Igoli okudlule ngalo iPirates sekuhlanganiswe yomibili imilenze libaselwe uJustin Shonga.Lo mgadli waseZambia ushaya leli goli nje, uzikhipha ehlazweni kwazise uyena obegqamile kwizindimbane zamathuba iPirates ewayekile kowomlenze wokuqala obusekhaya emasontweni amabili adlule. Lowo mdlalo uphele ngo 0-0 okwenze iPirates yaya kulo mdlalo (wangoMgqibelo) neStars kunovalo kubathandi bebhola kuleli.Ngokunqoba lapha iPirates izibeke ethubeni elifanayo kweyamaqoqo lapho kungene khona nompetha balesi sicoco bango-2016, iMamelodi Sundowns. Okwesine kulandelana ukuthi ezikaPitso “Jingles” Mosimane zingene kweyamaqoqo eChamps League. IDowns ingene kulesi sigqoko ngokunqoba ngo 4-0 kwi-Al Ahli Benghazi yaseLibya ngoMgqibelo eLoftus Stadium.UMicho, wePirates egcine ukungena kweyamaqoqo ngo-2013, uzishaya isifuba ngalokhu akwenzile futhi uncome nabadlali bakhe ngokukhombisa ukukhula ngokomqondo.“Abadlali bakhombise okukhulu ukukhula ngokomqondo. Size kuwona (umdlalo) kunomphumela womlenze wokuqala emakhanda kodwa bakususa konke lokho ngesikhathi esifanele. Ngijabule ukuthi singene kweyamaqoqo ngemuva kweminyaka kungenzeki lokhu. Siphumelele ukwenza ebesizibekele khona. Inhloso yethu bekuyikhona vele ukungena kweyamaqoqo bese sibheka ukuthi sihlangana nani kuyona. Abadlali bakhombise ukuyifela iPirates ngakho-ke nakuyona eyamaqoqo sizohlala phansi sihlele ukuthi sifunani ngayo. Sibhekene neligi ekhaya esifuna ukwenza kahle kuyona kanti nakwiChampions League sibheke ukuhamba ibanga elide,” usho kanje lo mqeqeshi.Womabili la maqembu aseNingizimu Afrika, okuyiwona athwele amathemba okubuyisa udumo lwango-1995 nango-2016, azokwazi ngoDisemba 28 ukuthi aqhathwe nobani emaqoqweni awo. Phakathi kwamaqembu asevele azibekele indawo singabala oTP Mazembe yaseDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC), Esperance (Tunisia). Waydad Casablanca (Morocco), CS Contantine (Algeria); Lobi Stars (Nigeria), Ismaily (Egypt) neFC Leopards (Zimbabwe).KwiCaf Confederation Cup, iKaizer Chiefs izibekisele indawo kumzuliswano wokugcina wokuhlungela amaqoqo ngokunenebula ngo 3-0 imilenze yomibili i-Elgeco Plus yaseMadagascar. Ukunqoba ngo 3-0 ekhaya nasekuhambeni kwenze iChiefs yadlula ngo 6-0. Amakhosi azokwazi ngoDisemba 28 ukuthi aqhathwe nobani kulo mqhudelwano osunamaqembu agawuleke kwiChampions League.
title: UMicho uncome ukuzimisela kwezakhe

text: SEKUQUBUKE ingebhe kubantu bakuleli mayelana nokuthi uma ufisa ukuhlolwa ukuthi unalo yini igciwane iCorona kumele wenzenjani.Lokhu kudalwa wukukhula kwesibalo sabantu abanaleli gciwane kuleli.UMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli uthe imitholampilo nezikhungo zezempilo kuleli zivule izandla ukwamukela iziguli ezisola ukuthi zinaleli gciwane kodwa kumele uqale ushayele inombolo yamahhala yesikhungo esihlola izifo ezithathelanayo iNational Institute of Communicable Diseases (NICD) zichaze ukuze kubonakale ukuthi zingena ngaphansi kohla lwabantu okumele bahlolwe.UDkt Lwazi Manzi okhulumela lo mnyango uthe ukuze uhlolwe kumele ube wumuntu onezimpawu zaleli gciwane, kube wukuthi uke waya emazweni angaphandle noma uke wahlangana nomuntu oke waya emazweni anabantu abaningi abanaleli gciwane.Inombolo yeNICD u-0800 029 999 noma uthumele iWhatsApp ku: 0600 123 456, uma uKwaZulu Natal ungashayela neyomnyango ethi:033 395 3367 noma eyama-ambulensi ethi :122Uthe iNICD iyona eshoyo ukuthi leso siguli asiye kumuphi umtholampilo noma isikhungo sezempilo, ukuhlolwa kulezi zikhungo kumahhala.I-Lancet isikhiphe uhla lwezikhungo abantu abanemali yokukhokha abangaya kuzo beyohlola. Imali ekhokhwayo ukuze uhlolwe wuR1400.Uma ufisa ukwazi ngesikhungo esiseduze nawe iya ku-www.lancet.co.za
title: Ulwazi ngokuhlolelwa iCoronavirus

text: KUNGENZEKA angaphinde abonakale kwiKaizer Chiefs umdlali wasesiswini, uJoseph “Tight” Molangoane, ophuke umlenze ngasekuqaleni kwesizini.UMolangoane ulimale kabi ngesikhathi iChiefs ibhekene neFree State Stars emdlalweni weMTN8 eFNB Stadium ngo-Agasti nyakenye.Ulimale ekade eyithemba lobengumqeqeshi uGiovani Solinas okhonjwe indlela ngoDisemba. Bekunezinkulumo zokuthi uMolangoane uzobuya ingakapheli isizini ukuze asize ezakhe zifake umfutho wokugcina empini yesicoco se-Absa Premiership.UMolangoane useyaziqeqesha neqembu. Ngempelasonto edlule ubebukela iqembu laMakhosi leMultichoice Diski Challenge (MDC) lidlala eTembisa.Ukusho kwagcwala umlomo ukuthi nakanjani uzobuyela enkundleni ngoMashi kubantu ababembuza ngesimo sakhe. “Ngiyaziqeqesha ngokugcwele neqembu, sengiluleme manje. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngoMashi ngizobe sengikulungele ukubuyela enkundleni. Ngisebenza kanzima ukuthi ngibuyele esimeni. Isizini izophela sengibuyele ensimini,” kusho uMolangoane.Ukubuya kukaMolangoane kungezwakala kuyizindaba ezehla kahle kubalandeli beChiefs kwazise ungomunye wabadlali abadlala ngokuzimisela kuleli qembu. Nokho ngoLwesine, ngesikhathi iqembu lilungiselela ukuyodlala eThekwini,umqeqeshi * -Ernst Middendorp uyihlikize wayiqeda eyokubonakala kwalo mdlali enkundleni kule sizini. Abanye abadlali beChiefs abangeke besadlala kule sizini kukhona * -Itumeleng Khune noLebo Manyama abalimele.Uma kugcina kwenzeke okushiwo nguMiddendorp, kungenzeka uMolangoane angabe esabonakala edlubhe imibala yaMakhosi kwazise inkontileka yakhe ephelayo ngoJuni ayikavuselelwa kuleli qembu.Lo mdlali akuyena yedwa ophelelwa yinkontileka ekupheleni kwesizini kodwa nezihlabani okukhona kuzo uBernard Parker alaziwa ikusasa lazo eNaturena.Abanye abadlali abaphelelwa yizinkontileka kwiChiefs ekupheleni kukaJuni nguPule Ekstein, Ryan Moon, Ramahlwe Mphahlele noGustavo Paez olizwa ngendaba ijezi kule sizini.Indaba yezinkontileka kwiChiefs igadiswe okwemfihlo yerosari.Bekunomoyana wokuthi iChiefs izodedela abadlali abathize ngoJanuwari ngesikhathi kuvulwe iwindi lokusayinisa abadlali kodwa kwabuye kwavela izindaba zokuthi uMiddendorp ufuna ukubabhekisisa bonke abadlali kuze kuphele isizini ukuze athathe isinqumo esifanele ngalabo angeke esabasebenzisa.“Abantu abaningi banake indaba yenkontileka kaPule kodwa baningi abadlali abasesimeni esifanayo, abangazi ukuthi ikusasa libaphatheleni. Laba badlali sebengasayina izinkontileka namanye amaqembu.
