Nakho ukungazi ukuthi umiphi kungenzeka ukuthi kuyabaphazamisa enkundleni,” kusho umthombo okwiChiefs.Imidlalo yePremiership namuhla ngo 3.30pm: Baroka FC v Polokwane City(Peter Mokaba Stadium); Chippa United v SuperSport United (Sisa DukasheStadium)NgoLwesibili ngo 7.30pm:Orlando Pirates v Bloemfontein Celtic (Orlando Stadium); Cape Town City v Mamemlodi Sundowns (Athlone Stadium)NgoLwesithathu ngo 7.30pm: Free State Stars v Polokwane City (Goble Park)
title: Obeyithemba likaSolinas angase angabe esabonakala

text:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEI ndoda ebhekene necala lokubulala uNkk Anni Dewani, ikhulume yankwankwaza, yashaya ingwijikhwebu eNkantolo eNkulu eKapa, ngesikhathi iphekwa ngemibuzo mayelana nenombolo yayo kamakhalekhukhwini.UXolile Mngeni (25), (
osesithombeni), phambilini utshele inkantolo ukuthi wayesebenzisa umakhalekhukhwini wentombi yakhe kodwa efake ikhadi lakhe ngesikhathi eboshwa ngamaphoyisa ngoNovemba 16, 2010.Ngesikhathi umbuso umbuza ukuthi kungani pho iphoyisa elambopha lingawutholanga lo makhalekhukhwini, uthe wawusulahlekile.“Awushongo kanjalo ekuqaleni,” kusho iJaji Robert Henney.Ubufakazi bukaMngeni bakamuva, buzwakale buhluka kulokho akutshela amaphoyisa ngesikhathi eboshwa.UMngeni uthe kungenzeka ukuba inkantolo ayimuzwanga kahle noma yenze iphutha.Uthe ucingo lwalahleka ngaphambi kokuba aboshwe, wase eyokwenza i-sim swap eyenza wakwazi ukubuyisa inombolo yakhe endala.Uthe kodwa akaphindanga waba nomakhalekhukhwini emuva kwalokho.Umsolwa uyawaphika wonke amacala abhekene nawo ahlanganisa ukuduna, ukuthumba, ukubamba inkunzi nokubulala uDewani, owabulawa ngoNovemba 13, 2010 eGugulethu.Icala liyaqhubeka.
title: Umsolwa ushaye ingwiji kwelikaDewani

text: AMAPHOYISA abophe umkhwekazi kasomabhizinisi waseMpumalanga, owabulawa yiqulu lamadoda esemzini wakhe.Lo wesifazane oneminyaka engu-64, uboshwe ngoLwesithathu ngeledlule. Lo wesifazane uboshwe emuva kokuba kuboshwe indodakazi yakhe, umzukulu oneminyaka engu-19 namadoda amane, asolwa ngokubulala uMnuz Jabulani Isaac Nkosi.Bonke abasolwa abayisikhombisa bekulindeleke ukuba bevele enkantolo izolo.UBrigadier Leonard Hlathi, okhulumela amaphoyisa eMpumalanga, uthe uNkosi wayengumnikazi wendawo yokungcwaba edumile endaweni. Ukushona kwakhe kuthiwa kwakusolisa. I-The Star emasontweni amabili adlule, yabika ukuthi uNkosi wake wahlaselwa ngo-Januwari 8 nonyaka.Abahlaseli bafika emzini wakhe bafuna imali. Wazama ukulwa nabo, babe sebemdubula. Waphuthuma esibhedlela, wathola usizo.Kwadlula izinsuku ezingu-11, wabe esehlaselwa futhi. Kusolwa ukuthi unkosikazi wakhe esebenzisana nendodakazi yakhe eneminyaka engu-19 abahlela ukuba asocongwe yizinkabi. UHlathi uthe unkosikazi kamufi, uBusi, nendodakazi yakhe, ababesendlini ngesikhathi ehlaselwa, bathi abezwanga lutho bona.“Ngisho nabezimo eziphuthumayo namaphoyisa abizwa ngomakhelwane,” kusho uHlathi.Emuva kophenyo kwabe, sekuboshwa unkosikaziuBusi, ingane yalaba abashadile nabesilisa uMnuz Muntu Mashinini, uMnuz Sipho Dube, Thokozane Radebe noZenele Malindisi.Babhekene necala lokubulala neletulo lokubulala.Laba bekulindeleke ukuba befake isicelo sebheyili eNkantolo yaseBalfour, izolo.
title: Umkhwekazi ecaleni lokubulawa komkhwenyana

text: ISIHLABANI se-Afro house, uWinnie Khumalo, nendodakazi yakhe sebephumele obala bacacisa ngombango wengoma phakathi kukaDJ Prince Kaybee nophrojusa osafufusa, uDJ TruMpet. Ingoma esisuse umsindo eyenziwe ngokuhlanganyelwa wuPrince Kaybee noRethabile esihloko sithi Isivunguvungu. UTruMpet ubhale kuTwitter, wathi leli culo lintshontshwe kuye ngoba uyena owalididiyela kuqala noRethabile. Echaza uWinnie, wodumo lwengoma eyayithi Let Me Live My Life neyayithi Hey Laatie, uthe uPrince Kaybee  akahlangene nalezi zinsolo zokwebiwa kwengoma."Ngithanda ukuchaza ukuthi iWinnie K Productions (esho inkampani yakhe) isebenza kanjani. IWinnie K isebenza nabadidiyeli abahlukahlukene futhi uhlelo esilusebenzisayo i50/50 engomeni. Wena uqhamuka nezinsimbi, thina siqhamuke namazwi nezinhlamvu zengoma. Uma singavumelani, siyahlukana. Unelungelo lokusebenzisa izinsimbi zakho noma yikanjani, nathi sinelungelo lokusebenzisa amaphimbo nezinhlamvu zethu ngendlela yethu. Lokho okwenzekile izolo, umuntu nje ontula ulwazi. Sinikeze uPrince Kaybee izibusiso zokusebenzisa ingoma yethu. Umsebenzi wethu. Ayikho enye into yomunye uphrojusa ekulengoma ekaRetha noPrince Kaybee. Ngakho siyaxolisa kubalandeli bakaPrince Kaybee, kuPrince Kaybee/Universal nakubalandeli bakaRethabile. Nakunoma wubani othintekile ngale nto," kuchaza uWinnie.
title: OWinnie Khumalo bacacisa ngengoma abasolwa ngokuyeba

text: AWUPHELE umqondo wokuthi kunezingozi zePhasika ngoba izingozi zidalwa ngabantu ababudedengu.Usho kanje uMnuz Sfiso Shangase onguMphathi wehhovisi leSouth African National Taxi Council (Santaco) KwaZulu-Natal.UShangase uthe bebehlangene izolo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abagibeli baphephile uma beya emaholidini ePhasika nasezinkonzweni."Ayikho imoto engaphephile ezophuma erenke. Sizoqhuba uhlelo lwethu lukaHlokomela lapho sizozihlolela amatekisi ukuthi akulungele yini ukuhamba. Uma sithola ukuthi itekisi alikulungele ukuhamba sizolimisa bese kulayisa elisesimeni esifanele," kusho uShangase.Uthe abagibeli nabo kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi bagibela amatekisi asesimeni esifanele futhi bangaphuzi uma beyogibela ngoba yibona abagcina sebehlukumeza abashayeli nabanye abagibeli."Sifuna uphele umqondo wokuthi kunezingozi zePhasika yingakho abanikazi bomsebenzi bezozihlolela bona amatekisi baphinde basebenzisane namaphoyisa ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabagibeli. Siyacela abashayeli banikwe isikhathi esanele sokuphumula futhi bangalokothi bashayele bephuzile. Nabagibeli sicela bangaphuzi ngoba utshwala bubenza bahluphe," kusho uShangase.Udonse ngendlebe abaya ezinkonzweni zePhasika ukuthi babhukhe amakhumbi kusenesikhathi  futhi bangampintshani ematekisini kodwa babe yisibalo esivumelekile."Siyacela abantu bakithi bangabancengi abashayeli ukuthi babagibelise babe yisibalo eseqile kodwa okungcono babhukhe amakhumbi amaningi ukuze bafike bephephile lapho beya khona," kusho uShangase.
title: Azikho izingozi zePhasika-Santaco

text: NGESIKHATHI imboni yezobuciko isazikhotha amanxeba ngokudlula emhlabeni kwezinye izingwazi zamaciko, sekuphinde kwehla elinye ifu elimnyama. Bekusanda kushona umlingisi uMary "MaMpinga" Twala; umdidiyeli womdlalo owawuthi Umabatha, uWelcome Msomi; umculi uPatricia Majalisa, uDJ womculo wamapiano, Vusi "Papers 707" Mabuza; umlingisi wodumo kuHlala Kwabafileyo, Duma "Bheseni" Mnembe; umlingisi owake wavela kwiGenerations nakwiSidingo, u-Elize Cawood; umculi wokholo uCyril Mbongwa nomsakazi weZwi Lomzansi, uMfanafuthi "FK" Khumalo.Izolo kulalwe izinhliziyo sezibuhlungu emuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuhamba emhlabeni kwenye inkakha yabalingisi, u-Allen Booi. Lezi zindaba zidalulwe yinkampani ebimphethe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana iTrinity Management. "Siyadabuka ukunazisa ukuthi umlingisi u-Allen Booi udlulile emhlabeni esimzini wakhe oseGoli ekuseni (besho izolo). Umndeni uzokhipha isitatimende neminye imininingwane. #LalaNgoluthulaAllenBooi," kusho isitatimende seTrinity Management.UBooi ulingise emidlalweni eminingi yethelevishini okubalwa kuyo iGenerations, Isidingo, Muvhango, Soul City, Backstage, Mponeng, After Nine, Zero Tolerance, Zone 14, Zabalaza, Tsha Tsha, Society, Room 9, Jozi Strets, Isibaya, Intsika, Intersexions, 90 Plein Street, The Quuen,  A Place Called Home nakwiGazi. *Khonamanjalo uMbongwa uzofihlwa ngoLwesine kanti uMnembe, ovele wawa washona ekwakhe ngoLwesihlanu, uzongcwatshwa ngoMgqibelo emuva kwenkonzo yesikhumbuzo ezokuba ngoLwesine ngo2 ntambama eWalter Sisulu Hall eMzimhlophe.
title: Kuphinde kwawa omunye umuthi omkhulu endimeni yezokulingisa

text: IZIPHATHIMANDLA  zizama ukuletha ukuthula nozinzo emgceleni waseManguzi, kulandela izinsolo zokudubulana kwamasosha akuleli nomakhelwane babo, nokuholele ekushoneni kwamaphoyisa amabili aseMozambique. Lemizamo yenziwa nje kunovalo emphakathini ukuthi omakhelwakhe babo baseMozambique bangabavimbela ekungeneni ezweni labo uma befuna ukuqhuba amabhizinisi abo kuleliyalizwe. Akukacaci ukuthi yini edale ukuba kubulawe laba, kwazise kunezincazelo eziningi ezihlukene kodwa i- Independent Media itshelwe abantu bakulendawo abahlukene ukuthi lesi sigameko senzeke emhlabeni  waseMozambique, namasosha abethinteka asusiwe enkanjini yamasosha eKosi Bay.Ikomiti elangamele amatekisi athutha abantu kulemigcele ahlanganile, athi loludaba izoliyekelela ezandleni zabaphethe uphenyo. Ngakolunye uhlangothi iNkosi yamaTembe uMabhudu Tembe usenxuse ukuba kube nozinzo, wathi kuningi okuhlanganisa lamazwe amabili, kunalokho okuwahlukanisayo. Okhulumela amasosha u-Brigadier Mafi Mgobhozi, utshele i-Independent Media ukuthi balinde ukuhlangana nozakwabo baseMozambique bese kuba nombiko ohlangene abazowukhipha. “ Sithathe isinqumo sokuthi singakhiphi umbiko sodwa kodwa silinde ukuba siwuhlanganise nozakwethu. Sithumele ithimba ukuba liyohlangana nabo ngeshwa bajika esikhumulweni sezindiza ngoba kuthiwa abekho abantu okumele babe nomhlangano nabo bakuleliya lizwe. Bathe bazosinika olunye usuku esizohlangana ngalo,” kusho uMgobhozi.Usihlalo we-Border Taxi Association uMnuz Kenneth Mlambo, uthe bahlangene nozwakwabo baseMozambique ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lesi simo asiphumi esandleni. UMgobhozi ukuphikile ukuthi amasosha athinteka kulolu daba asusiwe enkanjini.
title: Iziphathimandla zifuna uzinzo eManguza

text: BAKHALA ngesihluku sokubulawa kukazakwabo odutshulwe yikhasimende kahlanu, abokufika abasebenza ukudiliva ukudla.UMnuz Cedric Musonera (33) waseBurundi, kuthiwa udutshulwe ngehora lesishiyagalolunye ebusuku ngoLwesibili emgwaqweni uFlorida eThekwini, ngaphandle kwesitolo esidayisa inyama ethosiwe. UMusonera kuthiwa ubenezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili eqale lo msebenzi.Umzala wakhe, uMnuz Karim Yodheho, uthe bebesebenza umsebenzi ofanayo nomufi kodwa bengahlali ndawonye.“Ngithole ucingo lokuthi usedutshuliwe, ngaphuthuma khona endaweni yesigameko. Ngimfice edutshulwe kathathu esifubeni, kanye engalweni nasemlenzeni. Sibize i-ambulensi waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela e-Addington. Ngihlale naye odokotela bezama ukumsiza kodwa besho ukuthi ababoni ukuthi uzosinda. Bakwazile ukukhipha izinhlamvu emzimbeni kodwa ubelimele kakhulu, washona ngo-2 ekuseni,” echaza.Uthe umzala wakhe ubesebenza kanzima ehlanganisa imali yokuzifundisa, enza unyaka wokuqala kwiChemical Engineering eDurban University of Technology (DUT).Izolo ozakwabo nabangani bakaMusonera baqhinqe lapho adutshulelwe khona, bephethe izingqwembe nesithombe sakhe bethi bafuna umsolwa ajeze. UMnuz Aaron Ndayizeye ongomunye wabangani, uthe bakhathazekile ngendlela ashone ngayo umufi. Uthe bathole ukuthi kunekhasimende ebelizothenga inkukhu echochobalisiwe lapho umufi ebezolanda khona ukudla azokudiliva.“Kuthiwa ikhasimende belifuna ukungenela kulayini lithi lijahile. UCedric naye obelinde ukudla ulitshele ukuthi bonke abantu bajahile. Iqale lapho ingxabano kanti ikhasimende lizomlinda emotweni emnyango,” echaza.Kuthiwa esephuma eyogibela isithuthuthu umufi, umsolwa umdubule kahlanu maqede wangena emotweni wabaleka.KUSOLWA ukuthi udutshulwe yikhasimende amahlandla amahlanu washona uMnuz Cedric Musonera waseBurundi obediliva ukudlaUColonel Thembeka Mbele, okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe isigameko senzeke ngelesishiyagalolunye ebusuku emgwaqweni uFlorida.“Owesilisa oneminyaka engu-33 utholwe enamanxeba okudutshulwa emzimbeni. Kusolwa ukuthi uxabane nomsolwa obalekile emuva kwesigameko. Umufi uphuthunyise esibhedlela washonela khona. Amaphoyisa aseBerea aphenya icala lokubulala,” kusho uColonel Mbele.
title: Bafuna ajeze obulale owaseBurundi

text: UKHALE ngeziqumo zikanompempe umqeqeshi weBloemfontein Celtic uLehlohonolo Seema ngenkathi iqembu lakhe lihlulwa ngo 2-1 ekhaya yiMamelodi Sundowns emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngoLwesithathu ebusuku eSeisa Ramabodu Stadium. ISiwelele besifuna ukubuyisa izinduku kwiSundowns eyabakhipha kwiMTN 8 emasontweni amabili adlule. Lomdlalo ubulindelwe ngabomvu ngenxa yebhola elidla utshani elidlalwa yilawa maqembu omabili selokhu kuqale isizini. ISundowns inqobe ngamagoli kaMosa Lebusa alishaye ngesiwombe sokuqala, nelikaThemba Zwane oshaye iphenathi. ICeltic ithole iphenathi ngesiwombe sesibili usuyophela umdlalo evalelwe nguSera Motebang kodwa uSeema ukhale kakhulu ngezinqumo zikanompempe, ikakhulukazi lesi sokunikeza iSundowns iphenathi. “Angijwayele ukukhalaza ngonompempe. Kodwa ngibona ngathi usibhekisele phansi unompempe ngendlela abethatha ngayo izinqumo. Kukhona izikhathi lapho athule khona ekubeni kudlaliswa kabi abadlali bami. ISundowns ibisidlalisa kabi ukuze ibulale umgqigqo wethu. Ngisafuna ukuyibhekisisa iphenathi kodwa angiboni kahle. Ngicabanga ukuthi unondweba ubengenza kangcono namuhla. Kodwa ngijabule ngendlela esiqede ngayo umdlalo, abadlali basebenze ngokuzikhandla kwaze kwafika ekugcineni," kusho uSeema ekhuluma nabeSuperSport.USeema ukhiphe uPotsane ngesiwombe sesibili, okube yisinqumo esithakaselwe uPitso Mosimane weSundowns, oveze ukuthi lomdlali ubewuhlupho ngesiwombe sokuqala. Ukuhlulwa kweCeltic kuyibeke endaweni ka-11 kwiligi kwazise isishaywe kabili kule sizini. UPitso usijabulele isinqumo sephenathi enikezwe ezakhe, wagcizelela ukuthi isinqumo sigunyazwa umthetho omusha weFIFA. “Unompempe udlalise kahle. Imithetho emisha ikubeka obala ukuthi uma ibhola likushaya esandleni ebhokisini, leyo yiphenathi. Kumele siwujwayele lomthetho,” kuchaza uPitso. Iqembu likaSeema lizobamba ikhefu leFIFA, lize libuye enkundleni ngoSepthemba 15 emdlalweni weligi libhekene nomafikizolo iStellenbosch FC, engakanqobi nowodwa umdlalo we-Absa Premiership.
title: Ukhale ngezinqumo zikanompempe uSeema

text: ZANELE MSOMIU kuvulwa kwamabhuloho amabili ngoLwesihlanu kuqede usizi kubantu baseClermont ku-ward 22 ngenxa yokuthi bekungahambeki uma kunemvula.Imvula yango-2011 yashiya abaningi abantu dengwane. Abakhahlamezeka banikwe izindlu eziwu-10.Lezi zindlu zomxhaso yizingxenye yeziwu-30 ezaqala ukwakhiwa emuva kokuhlaselwa kwemvula.Ikhansela, uMnuz Sibongiseni Mkhize, uthe amabhuloho avuliwe kubalwa elezimoto nelokuwela abahamba ngezinyawo.“Kule ndawo kunomfula iMvuzane oseduze nezikole ezine. Bekuba yinkinga uma line kakhulu ngoba izingane bezingakwazi ukuya esikoleni. Ngisho abasebenzayo bebethwala kanzima ngoba umfula ubugcwala,” kuchaza yena.UMkhize uthe kusukela ngo-2011 sebevule amabhuloho ayisikhombisa kanti kulindeleke ukuthi bavule amabili okugcina maduze.Mayelana nezindlu zomxhaso ezivulwe ngoLwesihlanu uthe ngezamalungu omphakathi izindlu zawo ezadilizwa yizimvula.“Laba ngabantu abebehlala emijondolo kodwa sithe kungcono bakhelwe izindlu ezinesithunzi ukuze baphephe nasemvuleni,” usho kanje.UMnuz Johannes Thusini (48), ngomunye wabahlomulile kukhishwa izindlu ngoLwesihlanu. UThusini, owashonelwa yinkosikazi futhi ongasebenzi, uthe ubehlala nezingane eziyisihlanu emjondolo wamapulangwe. Lo mjondolo bawakha ngo-2011 emuva kokudilikelwa yindlu yodaka.“Sekuzohlaleka kahle ngoba sahlukumezeka kakhulu ngo-2011. Besihleli kabuhlungu nezingane ngoba nawo lo mjondolo wepulangwe bewungaseneli. Nathi sesizokhululeka noma kuhlasela imvula ngoba siphephile manje kanti abengekho namandla okwakha,” kusho yena.Ngalo uLwesihlanu kuphinde kwanikezwa imifaniswano ezinganeni eziwu-10 ezintulayo eSithengile Senior Secondary School.UMkhize uthe lokhu kuyingxenye yohlelo alusungula engena ehhovisi ngo-2011. Inhloso yalo wukulekelela abafundi abantulayo nabayizintandane. Ngalolu hlelo uthe usiza zonke izikole ezisewadini yakhe kodwa ngoLwesihlanu bebegxile esikoleni esisodwa ngoba sekwenziwa kwezinye. Izikole zibhalisa amagama ezingane ezidinga usizo.
title: Kuqedwe usizi kuvulwa imizi namabhuloho

text: ISHAQEKILE i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ngokuthola izindaba zokusula isigubhukane kwemeya yayo kaMasipala waseNewcastle okuthiwa ibisongelwa ngokubulawa.Izolo i-ANC ithe ibone ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi u-Advocate Makhosini Nkosi ebimfake ngo-2016 esikhundleni sobuMeya usesulile esikhundleni ngaphandle kokuyazisa nokuyinto eyethusile.Okhulumela i-ANC esifundazweni, u-Advocate Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe ngisho unobhala ayikho incwadi ayitholile evela kuNkosi yokwesula nechaza izizathu.“Kusishaqisile ukuzwa ngokusula kukaNkosi esikuthole ezinkundleni zokuxhamana. Ngokujwayelekile umholi osuke ejutshwe uKhongolose ezinhlakeni zikahulumeni, uye abhalele unobhala uma esula kuleso sikhundla njengaye uMeya uNkosi nokuyinto engenzekanga kulolu daba. Nokho ubuholi be-ANC bebulokhu bumatasa kulawa masonto nokungenzeka ukuthi incwadi ikhona kodwa besingakayiboni. Kuzothi uma incwadi sesiyitholile sixoxisane naye,” kusho u-Adv Simelane-Zulu.UNkosi kuthiwa ubebhekene nengcindezi yokusatshiswa nokubikwe kwabezindaba.Lokhu kuthiwa kwenzeke ngemuva kokuba ejube uphenyo ngenkohlakalo yamathenda obekunezikhalo zokuthi atholwa ngabantu ababodwa, okungabaholi abathile kumasipala nabasondelene nabo. Ngo-2017 kuthiwa kuphoqeleke ukuba kwengezwe ezokuphepha kangangokuthi bekuthi uma eza eThekwini noma eMgungundlovu, ubephuma ngezinye izimoto eNewcastle bese uma efika eMnambithi akhishwe afakwe kwezinye ngoba besekunezinsolo zokuthi kukhona abamlandelayo.Ikhansela elizimele, uMnuz Blessing Mwali, lithe nabo le ndaba bayithole emoyeni kodwa sekubizwe umhlangano ophuthumayo wamakhansela.“Insimbi iyashisa ngoba usula nje sisanda kumisa iMenenja kaMasipala ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo ethinta ukuthengwa kwamathayi ezimoto zikamasipala. Akugcini lapho kunekhansela lekomiti elibheka ukusebenza kwezimali zomkhandlu, elisulile nalo ngoba uphenyo obelujutshwe nguye uNkosi obelwenziwa ngamathenda belithinta nalo lelo khansela,” kusho uMwali.Iphephandaba lendawo libike ukuthi uNkosi usebuyela kwezomthetho kanti wamukelwe iDurban Bar Council asezosebenza ngaphansi kwayo kusuka ngoJanuwari 15.UNkosi uthintwe kaningi izolo ucingo engalubambi. Nemiyalezo athunyelelwe yonaakayiphendulanga.UNkosi uke waba iLungu lesiShayamthetho emele i-ANC esifundazweni ngaphambi kokuba yiMeya yaseNewcastle ngo-2016. Ungummeli odumile esifundeni iMajuba District usemele izikhulu eziningi emacaleni ehlukene.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa nokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Lennox Mabaso, uthe bebengakezwa lutho ngokusula kukaNkosi.
title: Bashaqekile kwesula imeya eNewcastle

text: KUZOQOPHEKA umlando omusha ngoMkhosi weLembe njengoba uzokwenzelwa enkundleni yezemidlalo yaseThekwini iMoses Mabhida ukugubha iminyaka engu-200 kwabunjwa isizwe samaZulu
title: Uza eThekwini uMkhosi weLembe

text: NGEKE ukumele ukuba umqeqeshi weqembu elithathwa njengelikhulu kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) uma untekenteke.Lawa ngamazwi anokugoloza phakathi kaSteve “Mphathi” Komphela opheka Amakhosi asedlale imidlalo emihlanu ye-Absa Premiership ngaphandle kwewini. UKomphela uwasho la mazwi ngoLwesithathu ebusuku kulandela ukushaywa yiChippa United ngo 1-0 okwenze idlanzana labalandeli beChiefs lamlinda lapho kuphunywa khona lamchapha ngazo zonke izinhlamba limtshela ukuthi akahambe ngoba ubuyisela iqembu emuva esikhundleni sokuliyisa phambili.Amakhosi asedlale ngokulingana amahlandla amathathu kwase kukhala induku kwemibili emidlalweni yawo emihlanu edlule, anomunye umdlalo onzima nePlatinum Stars ebuyelwa ukuzethemba. Ukusasa ngo-6 ntambama eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium, eRustenburg.“Ngeke ngiphindisele ngilwe nabo (abalandeli njengoba bengithuka) ngoba konke lokhu okwenzekayo ngiyakuqonda futhi ngiyazi ukuthi kusuka kuphi. Kusemqoka ukuthi ngiqonde ukuthi lolu laka olungaka lususwa yini. Kuyiqiniso elingenakuphikiswa ukuthi uma izinto zingahambi kahle kumele lichaze ikhanda. Kulokhu yimina umholi ngakho-ke kusemqoka ukuthi ngiqonde okucasula abalandeli bese ngizama ukukulungisa,” kusho uKomphela.NgokukaKomphela isimo esibhekene neChiefs sinzima ngoba konke abakwenzayo bakwenza ngendlela kodwa imiphumela iyenqaba.“Ngeke ngilenze iphutha lokuhlaba abadlali bami ngoba konke engikufuna kubona bayakwenza. Yilezo zinto ezincane nje futhi ezidinga ukuthi siphinde sizibuyekeze, ngemuva kwalokho konke kuzolunga. Ngokwami abaholi yibona vele abasuke bebekelwe ukuthi kukhalwe kubona uma kunezinkinga."Lokhu kumele akwazi wonke umuntu onesifiso sokuba wumqeqeshi kwiPSL, ngingasayiphathike eyothanda ukuba yinhloko eqenjini elinezigidi zabalandeli.”Nakuba izinhlamba bezisho phezulu lapho kuphunywa khona kodwa abadlali beChiefs bebemlindile umqeqeshi wabo ukuze bamvikele kulabo abebesikaza ukumjikijela ngemva komdlalo.“Zikhona izinkinga kodwa akuzona lezi engicabanga ukuthi ngeke zilungiseke. Okuhle kakhulu ukuthi nginabadlali abasiqonda kahle isimo engibhekene naso,” kuphetha uKomphela.
title: UKomphela uyaqonda ngenhlamba eza kuye

text: UVUMBUKE ehlathini umgadli owazakhela igama emaqenjini ePremier Soccer League (PSL).Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uSiphesihle Nzimande obedlala kwiJomo Cosmos usayine kuMvoti United odlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League.Kuvele ukuthi uJomo Sono ongumnikazi weCosmos, obekudlala kuyo uNzimande, ukhombe indlela le nsizwa yaseThekwini maqede wazeseka ngokuthi akasenayo imali yokuyiholela.Kuthiwa ube esenika lo mgadli * -R10 000 kuphela ekubeni emkweleta isamba esithile. Kuvela ukuthi kube wumzukuzuku ukuthi uNzimande owake wadlala kwiPolokwane City, agcine ethole iphepha elimkhululayo kweZenkosi.Kuthiwa lo mdlali udaba uze walubika kwiSouth African Football Players Union (Safpu).Kuthintwa uTebogo Munyai weSafpu ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uNzimande ulubikile kubona udaba lokukweletwa uSono.Uthe begcina ukukhuluma nalo mdlali ubefuna iphepha elimkhululayo nemali ngesikhathi esisodwa. Uthe uNzimande ubatshele ukuthi kuneqembu elidlala ku-ABC Matsepe League elifuna ukumsayinisa.“Simtshelile ukuthi kuzomele akhethe okukodwa akufunayo. Simtshele ukuthi uma ethatha iphepha kuzobe kusho ukuthi akaseyena umdlali weJomo, ngamanye amazwi ngeke asayithola le mali. Sigcine simyale ngokuthi alinde ukuze udaba luzongena kwiPSL Dispute Resolution Chamber (DRC),” kuqhuba uMunyai.UBongi Gwala ongumnikazi woMvoti ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uNzimande usengumdlali wabo ngokusemthethweni.“Sisayine isivumelwano sokusebenzisana kulezi zinyanga ezisele kuvalwe isizini. Sinethemba lokuthi isipiliyoni sakhe sizosisiza kakhulu njengoba sisembangweni weligi,” kubeka uGwala.USono uthe kuyamjabulisa ukuthi ugcine ehlukene nalo mdlali. Uthe njengoba egijimela emaphepheni umphakathi ungamangala uma engaveza akwenza ngesikhathi bedlala eminye yemidlalo yeligi.“Ngikhuluma nawe nje iphepha likusihlalo woMvoti. Wenze kahle wahamba ngoba besisazomphenya ngakwenza sidlala nelinye lamaqembu aseThekwini. Ngimfisela inhlanhla,” kubeka uSono.Ngemali okuthiwa uyikweleta lo mdlali uthe ngeke akwazi ukuphendula.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi nyakenye uSono uxakazisane nale nyunyana kwakuncane indawo ngenxa yalo udaba lwamaholo.Ithumba liqhunjuzwe uClifford Mulenga waseZambia oveze emsakazweni ukuthi sekuphele izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye abadlali beCosmos bengaholi.UMulenga wadalula ukuthi lesi sikhulu simkweleta isamba esingu-R146 000.USono uziphendulele ngokuthi ngeke athathe imali yezingane zakhe ayiqulele ebholeni.
title: UJomo ukhulule umdlali oseyogijima kuMvoti Utd

text: BEZIQINILE ezokuphepha ngaphandle nangaphakathi kuMasipala waseMsunduzi izolo ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokufungiswa kwamakhansela amasha kamasipala kulandela ukukhishwa kwesigungu esidala.Ukuqiniswa kwezokuphepha kwenziwe emuva kokuvela kwezinsolo zokuthi kukhona amaqabane akulesi sifunda iMoses Mabhida abezofika ezogxoba itoyitoyi ngaphandle ngoba ephikisana nokufungiswa kobuholi obusha bukamasipala. Kuthiwa kunamaqabane angamfuni uMnuz Mzimkhulu Thebolla okhethwe njengeMeya entsha ngoba ekhala ngokuthi akaziwa. UThebolla we-ANC uthole amavoti angu-51, ehlula uMnuz Sibongiseni Majola weDA othole angu-24.Ethula inkulumo yakhe uThebolla, uthe kuqala isahluko esisha eMkhandlwini waseMsunduzi.“Ngifisa ukubonga i-ANC ngokungethemba ngalo msebenzi obalulekile wokuhola uMkhandlu waseMsunduzi.”Uthe uyabahlonipha abantu baseMsunduzi, wengeza ngokuthi uzimisele ngokubasebenzela ngokwethembeka.“Umsebenzi osihlalele ukuguqula isimo somkhandlu sisenze ngcono. Lokho ngeke sikwenze sisodwa siyi-ANC kodwa sinxusa namaqembu aphikisayo, siyeke ukungaboni ngasolinye kodwa sisebenzisane.”Esikhundleni sePhini leMeya kukhethwe uMnuz Inderjit Manilal odume ngoMapholoba ozuze amavoti angu-49, ehlula uMnuz Thinasonke Ntombela we-IFP othole amavoti angu-22.USomlomo omusha nguNkk Eunice Majola-Zondi we-ANC othole amavoti angu-51, ehlula uMnuz Reinus Niemand we-ACDA othole amavoti angu-19.Lilodwa ivoti okuthiwa licekelwe phansi okhethweni lukaSomlomo.UNkk Majola- Zondi uthe iphupho lakhe ngukuthi abumbe umkhandlu.Uthe ulindele ukuthi wonke amakhansela kubalwa nawamaqembu aphikisayo ukuthi ahloniphe uSotshwebhu omusha uMnuz Vusi Ntshangase.Ethula inkulumo yakhe emfishane uNtshangase uthe uzoshumayela ukuthi kube nobumbano emkhandlwini ukuze yonke into ihambe kahle.Uthe umkhandlu wabo wakhiwe ngamakhansela angu-78, amele abantu abangaphezu kuka-600 000. “Lo mkhandlu ngowenu mphakathi, yinina abanikazi balo mkhandlu thina njengamakhansela siyizisebenzi zenu.”Uthe ikusasa lomkhandlu likubona njengamakhansela, wengeza ngokuthi yibona abangawakha umkhandlu noma bawudicilele phansi.Ubuholi obudala bomkhandlu obukhishiwe ezikhundleni kubalwa nobeyimeya uMnuz Themba Njilo nabo bebukhona emcimbini wokufungiswa kwamakhansela amasha.Lo mcimbi ubuhanjelwe nawubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal kubalwa uSihlalo uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uNobhala uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli nePhini likaNobhala uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka.Sime kanje isigungu samakhansela e-ANC alawula umkhundlu, uThebolla, Manilal, Nkk Majola-Zondi, Mnuz Linda Madlala, Nkk Zanale Ngcobo, Nkk Gugu Madlala noMnuz Ntuthuko “Koloba” Ntshangase. I-DA inamakhansela amabili kuthi i-IFP ibe nekhansela elilodwa.UZikalala uhalalisele ubuholi obusha.
title: Amakhansela afungiswe egadwe amaphoyisa eMsunduzi

text: ‘UKUZINYANYA ngeke kusashintsha lutho ngamaphuzu esiwalahle emdlalweni wokuqala, ngakho kusemqoka ukuzithuntutha silungise wonke amaphutha ngeNamibia esibhekene nayo kulandelayo.’Lo umbono kaThemba “Mshishi” Zwane ngesimo seBafana Bafana edlala owesibili ka-Group D we-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) neNamibia namuhla ngo-10 ebusuku e-Al Salam Stadium, eCairo.UZwane, owudlale wonke owokuqala bekhala ngaphansi ngo 1-0 kwi-Ivory Coast, ukholelwa ekutheni ukubheka emuva ngeke kusabasiza ngalutho ngoba umsebenzi ubamele kwiNamibia. Lo mdlali weMamelodi Sundowns ubona ithuba kwiNambia kodwa futhi uyakushumayela ukuthi ukuyithatha kancane kungasheshe kuyiqede indlela yeBafana kwi-Afcon.“Siphatheke kabi. Besiwufuna kabi lo mphumela. Siqale lo mqhudelwano sazi ukuthi ukunqoba umdlalo wokuqala kuqaqa wonke amabhawodi. Sekwenzile sahlulwa, ngakho asisekho isidingo sokubheka emuva. Siyazinyanya ngalo mphumela kodwa sesikuxoxile ukuthi okuzosisiza ukuthi sikhohlwe ngokwenzeke sidlala ne-Ivory Coast. Siwulungele umdlalo weNamibia ngokomqondo,” kusho uZwaneOkukhalisa kakhulu uZwane ngomdlalo we-Ivory Coast ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani bangabi sefomini bonke abadlali ikakhulukazi laba abahlaselayo?IBafana ibalwe namazwe amathathu abephezulu ngokuhlohlwa kwamagoli ngesikhathi kusahlungelwa ukuya e-Egypt.“Angazi kwenzeke kanjani kodwa kuningi okusemqoka esingakwenzanga okuyikhona okuholele ekutheni namathuba amahle okuthola amagoli singawakhi ngendlela.”Ebuzwa ngokuthi bazoyivimba kanjani iNamibia ngoba nayo iza kulo mdlalo ibona ithuba lokuqoqa amathuba kwiBafana kusasa eCairo uthe kumele bashintshe ukwenza.“Okusemqoka ukuthi siqinisekise ukuthi ibhola lilawulwa yithina. Bazoza ngamandla bese sibabamba ngejubane okuyilona esidle ngalo kumafolosi ethu. Enye into ezosiza lapha ukuthi sidlala ebusuku lingasekho ilanga. Lokhu kuzosisiza ngoba abadlali abaningi esinabo abalijwayele ilanga. Okuhle ngaleli qembu ukuthi sonke sinomqondo owodwa. Ukuhlulwa kwethu kube okwethu sonke ngakho kusezandleni zethu futhi ukuthi sijabulise abalandeli bethu ekhaya ukuze kuzovuka ithemba."Akukho ukucasha ngesithupha lapha ngoba iwini kuphela elindeleke kithina,” kusonga uZwane.IBafana izobhekana neNamibia sebevele seyidlalile iMorocco ne-Ivory Coast ngo-7 ebusuku) kuyona le nkundla yaseCairo.ILog kaGroupd DAmaqembuPWDL PtsMorocco11003I. Coast11003Namibia10010S. Africa10010
title: UMshishi uthembisa lukhulu koweNamibia

text:
MALIBONGWE MDLETSHEIZOHLOMULA ngezibabuli zabadlali iBanyana Banyana uma konke kuzoya ngamagama enkehli, ezethenjisweni yiSafa ngeSasol Legue, okulindeleke iqale KwaZulu-Natal kule mpelasonto.Bese kuphele isikhathi eside kungacaci ukuthi liyaphuma noma liyashona yini ngeSasol League, okugijima kuyo amantomba-zane okuqokwa kuwo abadlali beBanyana, kangangokuba nesizini ka-2012/2013 igcine ingabanga khona.Nokho iSafa ithembise ukuthi sekuphelile ukuhlupheka kubaqeqeshi beBanyana, Basetsana (Under-20) neBantwana (Under 17) ngoba isizoqhubeka ngaphandle kwezihibe iSafa Sasol League kulandela ukuvuselela ngeminyaka emihlanu ukwesekwa ngemali kweligi kazwelonke yile nkampani kawoyela.Imininingwane ngokuvuselelwa kweSasol iqinisekiswe ngusihlalo wezemincintiswano eKZN, uKwenzakwakhe Ngwenya.“ISasol ivuselele ngeminyaka emihlanu kanti okuhle kakhulu wukuthi izibophezele yanyusa nemihlomulo yamaqembu kuzwelonke. Umpetha weligi wesifundazwe ubethola u-R30 000 phambilini kodwai kusukela ekupheleni kwale sizini usezothola u-R50 000. Nezindleko zokuhamba phambilini bekungu-R20 000 manje sekuzoba ngu-R30 000,” kusho uNgwenya, oveze nokuthi onondweba bazokhokhelwa amaqembu ezinkundleni njengoba kwenzeka kuSafa Second Division.Iqembu elizodla umhlanga-niso kuSasol League National Champs lizomuka no-R30 000 ngaphezu kwalo R50 000.Uthe amaqembu azoyihlanganisa imali akhokhele ngayo onondweba bese ethumela izicelo zokubuyiselwa yona kuSafa.Okudidayo nokho angathanda ukucacisa kukho uNgwenya, yindaba yamajezi.Emaligini angaphansi kweSafa, ikakhulukazi iSasol neSecond Division kwakubekwe umbandela wokuthi amaqembu asebenzise iPuma njengabaxhasi balo soseshini.Nokho 
Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kuSasol amaqembu azozidlalela nganoma yimaphi amajezi.I-KZN ihlukaniswe izigaba ezimbili, uStream A noStream B. UNgwenya uthe lokhu kucelwe amaqembu ngenhloso yokunciphisa izindleko zokuhamba.“Kuzoba khona uStream A no-B ngoba amaqembu azicelele ukuba kwenziwe kanje ukuze ayisishiyaga-lombili asondelene aqhuthane wodwa ngenhloso yokunciphisa izindleko. Ekupheleni kwesizini-ke bazoqhuthana ompetha bezigaba zombili kuphume okunguye ingqungqulu yesifundazwe,” kusho uNgwenya.Yikho lokhu kuhlukaniswa okuthiwa kwenze iKZN yasala ngamasonto amabili kwazise eGoli, North West, Limpopo naseWestern Cape sekunamasonto amabili beqalile.Imidlalo yeSafa KZN Sasol League ngempelasonto:Stream-A:NgoMgqibelo:Ntuzuma United v Kokstad Lucky Stars (G Sport Ground, 3pm), Durban Ladies v Galaxy Ladies (Risevior Hills, 1pm), Ugu Ladies v Simunye FC (Ugu Sprt Complex, 3pm)NgeSonto:Local United v Mubs (Kandahar Stadium, ngo 1pm),Stream-B:NgoMgqibelo:Stars of Tomorrow v Sunflower FC (Osizweni Stadium, 1pm),NgeSonto:Lindelani Ladies v Duck Ladies (TM Mshengu, 1pm), Umhlathuze Ladies v Umlazi Citizen Ladies (Esikhawini College, 1pm), Remax Shooting Stars v Newcastle Ladies (30 Piltochary RD, Westville, 3pm)
title: Kuyasuka lokho ngeSasol League KwaZulu-Natal

text: UKHALA ezimathonsi owesifazane waseMlaza okukhishwe imali yakhe yempesheni kaDisemba ongenakho nokudla endlini.UNksz Khalathi Florah Simelane (64), ongakwazi ukuhamba, ukhihla isililo uma exoxa ngosizi lwakhe. Uhlala yedwa, uthi akanazo nezihlobo angadla kuzo uKhisimusi.Usale noR290.46 empeshenini yakhe athole ukuthi kukhishweuR1 000 kuyona.Elandisa iphephandaba ngokumehlele uthe washonelwa yingane yakhe okwabe kungukuphela kwayo wasala yedwa emqashweni ahlala kuwona. Ukugula kwamenza wangabe esakwazi ukuhamba. Uthuma abantu ngisho kumele ayohola.Utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi ikhadi lokuhola lakwaSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa) lihlala kuyena kodwa ubethumela umfana ongumakhelwane ukuthi amkhiphele imali yempesheni.Uthe wagcina ukumthuma ekuqaleni kwenyanga edlule eholela uNovemba wayithola yonke imali. Njengoba ukuholela impesheni kaDisemba kusheshe kwaqala, uNksz Simelane uye kohola esitolo kwaJeena khona eMlaza ngoNovemba 30.“Ngifike ngashaqeka ngithola ukuthi emalini yami yomholo kusele uR290.46, bangivezela nesiliphu. Ngivele ngasangana ngoba ikhadi lami belikimina. Bangiyalele ukuthi ngiye emahhovisi akwaSassa, eMaweleni nakhona bakuqinisekisa ukuthi kukhishwe uR1 000 esitolo kwaSpar eMega City, ngoNovemba 28 ngo-8 ebusuku,” kuchaza uNksz Simelane.Emalini yempesheni ukhipha uR450 werenti yalapho ehlala khona.“Nginovalo lokuthi umasitende uzongixosha ngoba anginamali yerenti. Ngimbikelile ngenkinga engivelele kodwa wathi uyayifuna imali yakhe. Angikwazanga ngisho ukukhokhela umasingcwabisane,” kubalisa uNksz Simelane ekhala.Esingezansi asisebenzi kuNksz Simelane. Uthe kudingeka akhase uma ephuma endlini ngoba akuhambeki. Kudingeka athwalwe ayobekwa emgwaqweni emotweni uma kudingeka ahambe. Yilokho athe kwenza athumele uma kumele ahole. Isolezwe limfice ehlezi nomakhelwane wakhe obezomduduza ngoba ulokhu ekhale njalo.Okhulumela abakwaSassa KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Vusi Mahaye, uthe akumele umuntu anikeze noma ngubani inombolo yokuhola. Uthe ubugebengu bamakhadi buyenzeka ngisho kwaweSassa. Ucele ukuthunyelelwa imininingwane kaNksz Simelane ukuze bamzamele igilosa.
title: Ukhihla isililo ogilwe ngempesheni yakhe

text: UKUWA kwengane iwa isuka etafuleni noma kusofa kungaba yingozi enkulu kuyona ngakho kufanele abazali baqaphele.Amathuba okuthi izingane ezincane ziwe makhulu kakhulu njengoba zisuke zingakakhuli ngokufanele futhi zisuke zingakakwazi okufanele zikwenze ukuzivikela.UMnuz Dayne Olsen wabezimo eziphuthumayo kwa-ER24 eVaal uthe usanda kubizwa emva kokuba ingane iwe ikubo eSebokeng, eGauteng.Uthe ingane enonyaka owodwa ibilimele kakhulu ekhanda emva kokuwa isuka etafuleni.U-Olsen nozakwabo bezimo eziphuthumayo kudingeke ukuthi bayinike usizo oludingwa abantu abalimele kakhulu ngaphambi kokuthi ithathwe ngebhanoyi iphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.“Kujwayele ukuthi izingane ezincane ziwe. Ingozi ingenzeka noma ngabe umuntu omdala ezitshela ukuthi uzophuthuma enze le nto asuke eyoyenza bese eyabuya ngokushesha. Ngiyacela ukuthi ningazishiyi izingane zenu zinganakiwe ngisho umzuzwana nje. Ningazishiyi esihlalweni esiphakeme noma embhedeni ngoba ingane ingagingqika iwe embhedeni,” kweluleka u-Olsen.Ungabona kanjani uma ukuwa kwengane kungayilimaza:Ngokusho kwabesibhedlela iRoyal Children’s Hospital, eMelbourne, ukuthi ingane ilimale kangakanani uma iwile kuncike ezintweni ezilandelayo:* Iwe isuka endaweni ephakeme kangakanani* Iwe phezu kwani ngesikhathi iwa* Ishayeke phezu kwani ngesikhathi iwaKuthiwa indawo ingane esuke iwa isuka kuyona ingaba yingozi ngisho kungathiwa iphansi noma iphakeme kangakanani ngoba kungenzeka ukuthi iwele entweni engayilimaza.Izindawo eziqinile njengokhonkolo, ama-tiles nenhlabathi zithathwa njengezindawo eziyingozi uma ziqhathaniswa nezindawo ezithambile kunazo.Kubalulekile ukuthi kubekwe izinto ezingasiza ukuthi uma ingane iwa ingashayeki endaweni eqinile.Impahla enjengamatafula nenye enamakhona acijile kungcono ukuthi ibekwe eceleni endlini lapho ingane okungelula ukuthi iwele kuyona.Ongakwenza ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwengane:* Abazali nabantu abagada izingane kufanele bafunde usizo lokuqala iCPR.* Kufanele kube nezinsiza zezempilo ezingasetshenziswa uma ingane ilimele ekhaya.* Uma ingane iwile yibheke ukuthi ayilimele yini nokuthi asikho yini isidingo sokuthi iyiswe esikhungweni sezempilo iyohlolwa. Kubalulekile nokubheka ukuthi alukho yini ushintsho endleleni eyenza ngayo izinto emuva kokuthi iwile.* Iba nohlu lwezinombolo zabezimo eziphuthumayo kwiselula yakho nasodongeni endlini ukuze wonke umuntu azi ukuthi angathinta bani uma kuba nengozi. Inombolo yabezimo eziphuthumayo kwa-ER24 ithi - 084 124
title: Kuyingozi ukuwa kwengane, akufanele ukuthathe kancane

text: SEBENQUME ukumasha abalandeli beqembu lebhola, iKaizer Chiefs abangcilisekileBAHLONGOZA ukubhikisha abalandeli beqembu lebhola kuleli eseliphenduke ukudla kwenduku kule sizini, iKaizer Chiefs. Laba balandeli bathi ngeke iphele le nyanga bengamashelanga eNaturena, beyoshiya uhla lwezikhalo zabo, okubalwa kuzo ukungaphathwa kahle kweqembu abathi yikho osekuliphendule ihlaya kuleli. Bathi indlela eliphethwe ngayo iqembu isidale ukuthi lizizwe ngendaba izindondo kusukela ngo-2015.Abalandeli baMakhosi bakhala ngokuthi leli qembu kalibahloniphi njengabantu abalesekayo futhi libehlisa isithunzi. Ephawula omunye kwiTwitter, uthe: “Ngiyaziqhenya ngabalandeli baMakhosi ngokuthi bazimele. Ngithemba ukuthi kuzohamba kahle.”Bayakugxeka abanye loku, bathi yingani laba abakhalayo bengayishiyi iChiefs, babheke amanye amaqembu abangaweseka kwiPSL. Bobby will tell them thats a family business...u can move to another team if u aint satisfied...😂😂😂#KaizerChiefsProtest pic.twitter.com/jGqzRU2fTo#KaizerChiefsProtest we are sick and tired of this poor management i support this protest 100%We getting our club back...cant let this brand go down the drain in our life time#KaizerChiefsProtest pic.twitter.com/JpcxIIWQv6Enough is enough. It’s about time we march to Naturena. #KaizerChiefsProtest #KaizerChiefsMarch pic.twitter.com/rWp8jMllZ6Love to see it 😂😂😂I love it when fans are passionate about their sport and actually engage in making a positive change. Good luck makhosi amahle ✌🏽❤️love, a Buccaneer fan 🖤☠️ #KaizerChiefsProtest pic.twitter.com/oLZiHc6AfKIChiefs idonsa ngodizili kwiligi njengoba isendaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log yeDStv Premiership. Umqeqeshi wayo, uGavin Hunt, usabhekene nomqansa wokuzama ukufaka iqembu kwiTop 8 ukuze lizoba sethubeni lokunqoba indondo yeMTN 8 ngesizini ezayo. Ekhuluma neSowetan ngalolu daba okhulumela iChiefs, uVina Maphosa, uthe akukho angakusho ngasebekubonile ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kodwa bazohlangana bakudingide ngesonto elizayo.
title: AbeChiefs bahlela 'umbhikisho' ngokuboza kweqembu

text:
Kuphele usuku lwayizolo engundaba mlonyeni uBabes njengoba bekulindwe ukuthi avulele uMampintsha icala esiteshini samaphoyisa, nomndeni wakhe ubhunga nabezindaba ngalo lolu daba.NgoLwesibili esithangamini nabezindaba uBabes ugcine engaphumelelanga ngenxa yesimo sakhe sempilo.FUNDA: 
Uyisilwane uMampintsha: uyise kaBabes“Ngesikhathi kukhulunywa ngokuhlangana nabezindaba namhlanje, uBabes ubeyingxenye yalezo zingxoxo futhi ubezimisele ukuba khona. Namhlanje ekuseni ngabo 9.30 uvele wavukwa yisibibithwane kwadingeka ukuthi ahlolwe odokotela. Kwenzeka lokhu nje ubevele echithe usuku lwayizolo lonke ekhala,” kuchaza okhulumela umndeni uMhlonishwa Langa.ULanga uthe uBabes akekho muhle emoyeni nangokomzimba.Uyise kaBabes, uMfundisi Welcome Simelane ubonge ubonge uDkt Mpho Bikitsha okunguye obheke isimo salo mculi noKholeka Gcaleka omcebisa ngezomthetho kulolu daba.UMampintsha kulindeke ukuthi abe nesithangami sabezindaba namhlanje ngo-1 eBat Centre eThekwini.
title: Incazelo ngokungaveli kukaBabes Wodumo esithangamini nabezindaba

text: KUSHONE abantu abathathu kwalimala abawu-8, okubalwa kubo nezingane, kuginqika iveni ku-N12 ngaseKimberly namhlanje ntambama. Abezimo eziphuthumayo be-ER24 babizelwe endaweni yesigameko ngo-1.10 lapho bafike sekukhona amaphoyisa eSAPS. Iveni lificwe lihlezi ngesayidi eceleni komgwaqo, abagibeli belele eduzane nalo. Ngemuva kokuhlaziya isimo abezimo eziphuthumayo bathole abesifazane ababibili nomfana osemncane sebephangalele. “Abanye abawu-8 balashelwe endaweni yesigameko. Owesilisa oyedwa ulimale kanzima kanti ubesesimeni esibucayi,” kusho isitatimende se-ER24. Owesilisa obesesimeni esibucayi uhlengwe ngobuchwepheshe be-advanced life support ngaphambi kokuphuthunyiswa esibhedlela. Khonamanjalo, usesimeni esibucayi owesilisa oneminyaka ewu-65 owe ebhulohweni wathanqazeka emgwaqeni uN3, e-Ashburton, KwaZulu-Natal ngoLwesithathu ekuseni.  Abe-ER24 bamufice elimele kanzima emlenzeni, walashelwa emgwaqeni ngaphambi kokudluliselwa eMediclinic, eMgungundlovu.
title: Kushone abathathu kwalimala abawu-8 kuginqika iveni

text: USEPHENDUKE isilomo neqhawe elingaconsi phansi kubalandeli bakanobhutshuzwayo eNingizimu Afrika uPercy Tau.Lo mdlali ubefunwa nxa zonke ngabadala nabancane ngemuva kokuthi eshaye igoli eligqibe ihlazo kwiBafana Bafana ibambana ngo 1-1 neParaguay emdlalweni weNelson Mandela Challenge ngoLwesibili ebusuku eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.Igoli likaTau alibeke enetheni ngemuva kokuthola iphasi kuThulani Serero ongene esiwombeni sesibili, lingene ngomzuzu ka-90, sebeqalile ukuphuma abanye babalandeli abebethamele umdlalo.Kuthe ingakhala impempe yokuqeda umdlalo, kwakhuzwa “uPercy, Percy, Percy”, uhambisana nehlombe.Ngesikhathi abadlali bephuma enkundleni bengenela emhubheni oya emagunjini okushintshela, uTau ubelindwe ngabafananya besikole, abebefuna abasayinele izikibha zabo nokushutha naye.Abanye ukwazile ukubasayinela, ngaphambi kokuphazanyiswa owesifazane nowesilisa asebeqinile abathathe isithombe naye.Kwale noma umengameli weSafa, uDanny Jordaan, ethi abafana uzobacelela uSerero, bathi “cha sifuna uTau”.Nangesikhathi abadlali beyogibela amabhasi bebesekhona laba bafana bemlindele ukuthatha izithombe naye.UTau ogijima kwiRoyale Union Saint-Gilloise lapho ebelokiswe iBrighton & Hove Albion yase-England, ubengaqali ukushaya into ecokeme kwiBafana abanye abalandeli abangasayithandi kahle ngenxa yemiphumela ephoxayo.Ngempelasonto ube nesandla kwigoli lokulinganisa elakuleli lidlala neNigeria kowokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon). Udlule eshibilika phakathi kwezitobha zeNigeria ngaphambi kokukhipha iphasi ethole uLebo Mothiba, iqembu likaStuart Baxter lakwazi ukuphuma nephuzu elibalulekile kulo mdlalo.UBaxter ekhuluma nabezindaba uveze ukuthi ubehlele ukuthi uTau amshintshe esiwombeni sesibili.“Kodwa uyena umdlali wethu obewuhlupho odongeni lweParaguay. Ngimtshelile naye ukuthi angixolele kodwa kumele aqhubeke,” kusho uBaxter.Ephawula kwiSuperSport ngemuva kokuqokwa njengomdlali ovelele koweParaguay uTau, uthe: “Sisheshe sangenelwa yigoli kodwa sakwazi ukubuya ngamandla, salungisa indlela esidlala ngayo. Sithole igoli ngomzuzu wokugcina, okuyinto enhle.”Uthe unethemba lokuthi iBafana izoya kwi-Afcon eCameroon ngonyaka ozayo.“Sidinga ukuqhubeka nalo mgqigqo ngonyaka ozayo.”Elakuleli lidinga iphuzu kwiLibya ekuhambeni ngoMashi.
title: UTau useyisilomo ngokugqiba ihlazo eshaya igoli

text: UHULUMENI unyuse intela ekhokhwa uma uthenga impahla iValue Added Tax (VAT) ngo-1% yaba wu-15%. Ngizwile abantu bethi iphesenti elilodwa ngeke libahluphe ndawo kodwa-ke mina seliqalile ukungihlupha.Yingakho ngithinte inhlangano esiza abacwile ezikweletini i-credit ombud ukuthola ukuthi abantu abanezikweletu bazothikamezeka kanjani ngokunyuka kweVAT.UNkk Salem Nolubabalo Dya, obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwi-credit ombud, uthe ukunyuka kweVAT kuyinkinga kuwo wonke umuntu ngoba uma uboleke imali kusho ukuthi usuzokhokha imali ethe xaxa esikweletini sakho sanyanga zonke.Uthe iphesenti elilodwa liyimali ngakho abantu kufanele bashintshe indlela abaphila ngayo ngoba sebezokhokha imali ethe xaxa.“Abantu kufanele bazibuze ukuthi yiziphi izinto abangazidingi empilweni yabo bayeke ukuzithenga ngoba uma kuphela * -Ephreli sizowuzwa lo 1% okunyuswe ngawo iVAT. Ngicela abathengi bangazenzi ezinye izikweletu kodwa baqhubeke nokukhokhela lezo abanazo ukuze bangazitholi sebempintshekile,” kusho uNkk Dya.Udonse ngendlebe abathengi ukuthi bangasizibi isikweletu kunalokho baxoxe nezinkampani abazikweletayo ukuze bakhokhe imali encane bakwazi ukuqhubeka nempilo.“Kunomkhuba omubi owenziwa ngabantu bazitshele ukuthi ukungasikhokheli isikweletu kuzokwenza ukuthi obakweletayo baphelelwe ngamandla, usuke uzilimaza uma ungakhokhi ngoba ungcolisa igama lakho bese waziwa njengomuntu ongakhokhi,” kusho uNkk Dya.Uthe asikho isidingo sokuthi umuntu aze acwile ngokudlulele ngoba izinka-mpani zifuna ukukho-khelwa noma ngabe ukhokha imali encane inqobo nje uma nyanga zonke ukhokha.Uveze ukuthi abathengi abangaphezu kuka-10 million bayahluleka wukukhokhela izikweletu zabo.Uthe labo abavele ngekhanda ezikweletini kufanele bafune usizo lwe-credit ombud kungaze konakale kakhulu.I-credit ombud isizana mahhala uma unezinkinga zezikweletu zezitolo zezimpahla, imaliebolekisayo, ama-garnishee nokunye.Itholakala ku-0861 66 2837 noma ngokuvakashela i-website www.creditombud.org.za kanti ungathumela i-email [email protected] noma isms ku-44786 ucele ukuthi bakuthinte.Asingene emibuzweni yabathengi:Umbuzo: NginguZulu nginenkinga yegarnishee eseyidonse ngaphezu kuka-R4 000 emholweni wami, kuthiwa imali yesondlo. Idonswa ngabameli baseMpumalanga, angikaze ngihlale eMpumalanga angazi kungani kudonswa imali yami.Impendulo: Kufanele utshele abaqashi ukuthi awulazi lelo garnishee bese ubhala incwadi efungelwe emaphoyi-seni ukuze bayeke ukuthatha umholo wakho. Kungenzeka ukuthi basebenzise imininingwane yakho kamazisi kodwa ungayithinta ne-credit ombud ukuze ikulekelele.Umbuzo wesibili: Ummeli akafuni ukukhokha imali yami yokulimala engozini sengimcebe kwiKZN Law Society. Igama ligodliweImpendulo: ILaw Society ithe udaba lwakho luphenywa yisigungu sayo esithumele imibuzo kummeli wakho. Uma ummeli esephendulile kuzohlala esinye isigungu esizonquma ngokufanele kwenzeke. UNkk N Harripersad, ophethe iLaw Society KwaZulu-Natal, uthe ucela uxhumane nehhovisi labo emasontweni amabili ezayo. Sizophinde sithinte oKlebe ukuzwa ukuthi ummeli ongakhokhi uvulelwa icala elinjani ngoba kuyicala ukugweva nemali yomuntu ekhokhwe yiRoad Accident Fund.Umbuzo wesithathu: Ngidlelwe imali ebhange kodwa abasafuni ukuyikhokha. Igama ligodliweImpendulo: Uma ulahlekelwe yimali ebhange kufanele ubike khona bese bekunikeza inombolo yecala. Ubuze nokuthi kwenzekeni futhi kungani bengakwazi ukuyibuyisa imali yakho. Ngiphoxekile ukuthola ukuthi awunayo inombolo yecala futhi usalinde ukuthi ibhange libuyele kuwena. Uma udlelwe imali kufanele uzihluphe ngokuya ebhange ngoba uma ingekho inombolo yecala ibhange liyanqaba ukungisiza likhale ngokuthi aliyidaluli imininingwane yamakhasimende alo. Ngilincengile ibhange ukuthi likusize ngizokwazisa ngokuzayo ukuthi litheni.Uma unenkinga edinga usizo lwezabathengi ungangithumelela i-email [email protected]
title: Ukunyuka kweVAT kuzothikameza abanezikweletu

text:
NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEUHLUKENE phakathi umndeni wentombazane eshaywe ngumfowabo yaze yashona ngoba eyisola ngokuqoma, eNgoje, eLouwsburg.UBuyisile Nkosi (17) washaywa waze wafa ngumfowabo ngoJanuwari 10 nonyaka.Kuvele ukuthi uBuyisile obefunda uGrade 9, washaywa ngenduku yonogada, washonela khona lapho.Umfowabo uZimele Nkosi (22), unikwe ibheyili ka-R1 000 ngoMsombuluko (Januwari 18), icala labe selihlehliselwa uFebhuwari 29 nonyaka.Izolo 
  Isolezwe likhulume nelungu lomndeni elicele ukuba lingadalulwa igama.Leli lungu lithe isimo sibi emndenini njengoba behlukene phakathi kukhona abajabulela ukudedelwa komsolwa abanye badinwe bathelwa ngamanzi.“Isimo asisihle impela. Izingane zakwaNkosi ezabona udadewabo ebulawa, zihlulekile ukuhlala nomfowabo njengoba ededelwe. Ngakolunye uhlangothi abazali baseke ukuba adedelwe njengoba kuthiwa uyasebenza futhi uyondla (umsolwa). Lokhu sekwenze umndeni wahlukana phakathi.“Abanye bafuna amaphoyisa amgcine esitokisini, abanye bakhala ngokuthi bazofa yindlala abakwaNkosi, ngakho kumele aqhubeke asebenzele umndeni wakhe. Sekuyinkombankombane ongayazi nje,” kusho umthombo.Phambilini elinye ilungu lomndeni laliveze ukuthi bafuna umsolwa anganikezwa ibheyili ngoba bazibona bengaphephile.
Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abazali bengane bathi bacela umphenyi angayiphikisi ibheyili ukuze adedelwe umsolwa.“Inhliziyo iyaqaqamba. Siwumndeni asihambisani nhlobo nokudedelwa kwalo mfana (umsolwa). Empeleni asiphephile uma ededelwa ngoba ukwazi ukubulala udadewabo. Akangayitholi nhlobo ibheyili futhi sifisa abolele ejele ngesenzo sakhe esimbi. Namanje sisashaqekile yilesi simanga asenzile,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Ilungu lomndeni laveza ukuthi okubaxakayo wukuthi le ngane abeyisola ngokuqoma yayikade icelile ukuvakasha kubazali bayo.“Umufi wayekade ecele kunina ukuvakasha. Wamvumela. Kufike umsolwa evela emsebenzini eMnambithi, lapho ebengunogada khona. Ube esembuza ukuthi uvelaphi, ngaphandle kwempendulo, wavele wamshaya ngenduku.“Ube eselandelisa ngenduku yonogada okuyiyo amqongqothe ngayo waze washona. Konke lokhu bekwenzeka ezinye izingane zibukela,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu abadala babengekho ekhaya, kusele izingane zodwa.Imizamo yokuthola unina wezingane ezithintekayo kulesi sigameko ayiphumelelanga, ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe.
title: Uthole ibheyili kwahlukana umndeni

text: AYIKHO inqubekela phambili ekuthuthukisweni  kwabesifazane  uma amadoda esathatha izinqumo abesifazane beqhubeka nokwenza imisebenzi echazwa njengeyabesifazane kuphela.UMengameli  uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, usebenzise usuku lokuhlonipha abantu besifazane emhlabeni i-International Women's Day  ngokuthi abonge abesifazane abebebhekene ngqo neCorona ngenxa yokuthi benza imisebenzi emqoka.Uthe sekuphele iminyaka eminingi lugujwa lolu suku ngenhloso yokuthi amazwe omhlaba akhombise ukuthi  ayawubona umsebenzi owenziwa ngabantu besifazane  emikhakheni ehlukene.Uthe kulokhu lolu suku lugujwa ngaphansi kwesimo esingesihle ngenxa yokuthi umhlaba wonke uhlaselwe yiCovid-19." Abantu besifazane babambe iqhaza elikhulu  ekulweni nokwanda kwaleli gciwane kuleli, sibethulela isigqoko. Abantu besifazane abenza imisebenzi emqoka  abangabahlengikazi, odokotela, amaphoyisa, amasosha nabasebenza emkhakheni wezimo  eziphuthumayo benze umsebenzi omkhulu ,"  kusho yenaUmengameli usho lokhu encwadini  yamasonto onke ayibhalela isizwe ayibhale izolo ekhuluma ngezinto ezehlukene." Ngeke ngikhohlwe ukuzinikela okwenziwe othisha abenze isiqiniseko sokuthi izingane ziyafunda nakuba sibhekene naleli gciwane. Siyababonga abantu besifazane abangothisha, othishanhloko, abafundisa ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme nabenza imisebenzi yangaphakathi kulezi zikhungo ebebenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ukufunda kuyaqhubeka,“  kusho uRamaphosa.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala,  uthe uma kukhulunywa ngabantu abadelelekile kuye kufika abantu besifazane kuqala. " Yingakho uhulumeni eqhubeka nokuthuthukisa imithetho esiza ekutheni abantu abangena ngaphansi kwabantu abachazwa njengabadelelekile basizakale,"  kusho yenaUqhube wathi eKZN sebeluqalile uhlelo lokuthi abantu besifazane bahlomule ngo-30%  ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukiswa kosomabhizinisi. “ Ngo-2024 sizimisele ukuthi u50% wemali kahulumeni esetshenziswa kosomabhizinsi inikezwe amabhizinisi aholwa ngabesifazane,”  kusho uZikalala
title: Umengameli uncome abesifazane

text: NAKUBA i-Orlando Pirates ingathanda ukusheshe iyikhohlwe isizini ka-2016/2017 kodwa ukusala ngaphandle emaqenjini okuqala ayisishiyagalombili kungenza leli qembu lika-Irvin Khoza liwugubhe ngezinyembezi unyaka wesi-85 lasungulwa.Kule sizini iPirates eke yashaywa ngo 6-1 nango 6-0 uvela kuSuperSport United nakuMamelodi Sundowns ngokwehlukana, ingase iqede ingaphandle kwamaqembu okuqala ayisishiyagalombili okokuqala ngqa kusukela kwasungulwa iPremier Soccer League (PSL).Ukukhala ngaphansi ngo 1-0 kuBidvest Wits okulandelwe yiphuzu elilodwa emidlalweni emibili neSundowns neBloemfontein Celtic, kushovele iPirates kude neTop 8 kwazise amaqembu abanga nayo le ndawo okuyi-Ajax Cape Town (abadlala nayo kusasa) neLamontville Golden Arrows (abavala nayo isizini) bebeqoqa amaphuzu ngalesi sikhathi.Njengoba iPirates ena-32 wamaphuzu idlala ekhaya ne-Ajax enawu-35, ukulahla amaphuzu akuvumelekile ngoba uma ikwenza lokho kuzofanele ikhohlwe ngukugcina umlando wokuba yilona kuphela iqembu ebelingakaze likhale ngaphandle kwalo mqhudelwano weTop 8 ohamba nentshontsho lika-R8 million. Lokhu kuncike kakhulu futhi nakumphumela we-Arrows edlala neCape Town City eKapa ngesikhathi esifanayo.UThabo Matlaba odlala emuva kuBucs ukhale ngezinhlungu abazizwise abalandeli kulo nyaka okumele ngabe kujatshulwe ngawo.“Aseneme neze singabadlali. Sishaywe kakhulu kule sizini kungafanele. Ubuhlungu obukhulu kodwa sibuzwela abalandeli bethu abahlale njalo beseseka. Nakule sizini bebelokhu beqhubeke njalo beseseka yize izinto beziphika. Kungaba yinto embi kabi uma singase sigcine ngokuthi singangeni kuTop 8 ngalo nyaka omqoka kangaka kithina, '' kusho uMatlaba.Okwenza lo nyaka ubukeke uzoba ngonzima ukuthi kuphela amaphupho nge-Top 8 nje, neNedbank Cup okuyiyona kuphela ababambelele kuyona kuzocaca nakuyona ngeSonto njengoba bezobe bevakashele KwaMashu lapho beyobhekana khona ne-Arrows kowandulela owamanqamu ngeSonto ngo-3 ntambama, ePrincess Magogo Stadium.Kuyadabukisa ukuthi iPirates izithola ikulolu bishi ngesizini emqoka kangaka uma uzokhumbula ukuthi iminyaka engu-75 bayigubhe ngenqwaba yezicoco iziphinda kulandelana amasizini.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Kusasa ngo-7.30 ebusuku: Orlando Pirates v Ajax Cape (Town Orlando Stadium); Mamelodi Sundowns v Maritzburg Utd (Lucas Moripe Stadium); Platinum Stars v Kaizer Chiefs (Royal Bafokeng Stadium); Bloem Celtic v Free State Stars (Dr. Molemela Stadium); Bidvest Wits v Polokwane City (Bidvest Stadium); Cape Town City v Golden Arrows (Athlone Stadium); Baroka FC v Highlands Park (New Peter Mokaba Stadium); Chippa United v SuperSport United (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium)
title: I-Orlando Pirates izogubha iminyaka engu-85 idangele

text: KUSOLWA amaphoyisa ngokufa kowesilisa obesolwa ngokweba izimbuzi eMondlo, eVryheid.UMnuz Mthokozisi Khanye (38) ushonele esitokisini samaphoyisa saseVryheid ngoLwesibili kodwa idokodo ngokufa kwakhe kuthiwa libhalwe ukuthi ubulawe ukugula.Kuthiwa uKhanye ushaywe kanzima amaphoyisa waze wavuma ukuthi uzebile izimbuzi, waya kokhomba lapho abezidayise khona namadoda amane aboshwe nawo.Kuthiwa unenebulwe waze wacela amaphoyisa ukuthi amphuzise amanzi, anqaba.Sezitholakele izimbuzi azebile, kuthiwa uye kovalelwa esiteshini samaphoyisa evuza igazi enjalo, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi washayeka phansi, wafa.Umthombo waleli phephandaba ocele ukungavezwa, uthe ikhulunyelwa phansi indaba yokufa kukaKhanye esitokisini samaphoyisa.“Amaphoyisa aziwayo ukuthi ashaya abantu lawa abulale uMthokozisi. Anesihluku ngendlela emangalisayo futhi awathathelwa izinyathelo uma ephula umthetho,” kusho umthombo.Udadewabo kaKhanye, uNksz Bonisiwe Khanye, uthe umfowabo uboshwe entathakusa ngoLwesibili esemzini kababekazi wabo awugadile.UNksz Khanye uthe babikelwe ntambama ngoLwesibili ngumuntu othe umbonile uKhanye elele evenini yamaphoyisa ephuma igazi ngamakhala.Uqhube wathi esiteshini batshelwe amaphoyisa ukuthi uKhanye uphalaze igazi, waphelelwa amandla washona.“Kunobufakazi amaphoyisa abugodlayo. Udokotela uthe uzohlinza isidumbu uma esehlinzekwe ngemininingwane amaphoyisa ukuze kuvele ukuthi ufe kanjani.“Uthathwe ephila saka. Endlini abehlala kuyona bekumapeketwana kukhombisa ukuthi ubeshaywa ngaphambi kokuthi aboshwe,” kusho uNksz Khanye.UNksz Khanye uthe kuphakame umoya, basatshiswa emaphoyiseni ngenkathi befuna ukwazi ukuthi ufe kanjani umfowabo.“Silinde imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu bese sithatha izinyathelo,” kusho uNksz Khanye.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-38 ukhale ngokungaphili kahle ngoLwesibili esesitokisini.“Ubizelwe i-ambulensi ebizomphuthumisa esibhedlela. Esekhishwa esitokisini, uvele waquleka. Ukufa kwakhe kuqinisekiswe abezimo eziphuthumayo,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Okhulumela uphiko olubhekele amacala athinta amaphoyisa i-Ipid, uMnuz Sontaga Seisa, uthe usexhumene nozakwabo balesi sifundazwe ngalolu daba.
title: Kuphenywa amaphoyisa ‘ngoshaywe’ wafa esolwa ngokweba izimbuzi

text: UKUCWASA ngokwebala, ukunyathelwa ngezinyawo kwezigameko zokudlwengula, nokuhlukaniswa kwemindeni ngezinye zezinto okuthiwa zazenzeka emishini yaKwaSizabantu.Ofakazi abebekhuluma phambi kweKhomishini eVikela amaLungelo, amaSiko, uLimi neNkolo eseThekwini, batshele ikhomishini ukuthi baxoshwa kule mishini futhi abazange banikezwe ithuba lokuphendula kwababesolwa ngakho.Abadlwengulwa abazange bawavule amacala, abawavula bawavula sekwedlule iminyaka eyevile ku-20 isigameko senzeka.Ofakazi abathathu abafakaze izolo ngabesifazane.Babefunda esikoleni iDomino Servite engaphakathi emishini.Ufakazi wokuqala uthe unina wayesebenza emishini.Uthe washaywa ebuzwa ukuthi wazini ngabathile okwakusolwa ukuthi bayathandana kwathi uma ethi akazi lutho washaywa kwathiwa akakhulume iqiniso okwaholela ekutheni eqe.“Ngashaywa ubaba uMichael Ngubane ebusuku. Wangivalela endlini okwakushayelwa kuyo abonile. Entathakusa kwangena umama ohlanzayo. Wabuza ukuthi kwenzekeni, ngamtshela wakhohlwa ukukhiya, ngavula ngaphuma. Ngaya ekhaya, umama owayesaba ukuxoshwa emishini akazange enze lutho. Ngonyaka olandelayo ngadlwengulwa umsebenzi wakhona emishini ngiphuma esitolo esiseduze kwakhona emishini.”Uthe ngemuva kokubikela unina nomfowabo, wahanjiswa kudokotela wahlolwa ukuthi ukhulelwe yini.Isisebenzi sasemishini athi samdlwengula, uthe asiphikanga ngesikhathi sibuzwa ngabakubo ngokumdlwengula.Emishini kwathiwa unamanga uma kuliqiniso kusho ukuthi nguye oziyise kulesi sisebenzi.Uthe unina wathi akaye kudadewabo eMandeni aze abelethe kungekho owaziyo ngokukhulelwa kwakhe, wabuyela ekhaya ngemuva kokushona kwengane ngesikhathi ebeletha.“Unina walo muntu owangidlwengula owayenesikhundla emishini wafonela esibhedlela wathi ingane ayingcwatshwe uhulumeni mina ngabuyela ekhayaNgaphambi kwalesi sigameko umfowabo owayekhonza KwaSizabantu wadubula omunye (umfowabo) owayengakholwa khona waphoqwa ukuthi abhalise isitatimende esingamanga ngoba isibhamu kwakungesasemishini.“Kwathiwa angithi umfowethu omdala wayezivikela komncane owayemgwaza, enkantolo ngabona sekukhona ummese okwathiwa wayemgwaza ngawo engangingazi ukuthi waqhamuka kuphi. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi ukube akashonelanga esibhedlela ngabe amaphoyisa awatshelwanga,” kusho yena.UNksz Celimpilo Malinga uthe washaywa esolwa ngokuthi uqomile kwabizwa abazali bakhe, batshelwa ukuthi akahloniphi.“Ngo-1991 ngangineminyaka ewu-15 ngaphuma emishini nezingubo engangizigqokile. Ubaba owayekhonza KwaSizabantu waba yingxenye yababengishaya waze wathi ufuna ukungibeka inkamba beyibuza. Ngempela kwaba njalo ngoba ngangibukeka sengathi ngishile emilenzeni. Kwangithatha izinsuku ukuthi ngifike eMsinga ekhaya ngoba ngangingenayo imali yokugibela. Ngafika ngahlala ezihlotsheni ezehlukene ngibalekela ukuthi azi ukuthi ngihlalaphi, ngeshwa wagcina etholile ukuthi ngicashiswe yizihlobo,” kuchaza uNksz Malinga.Uthe wabuyela ekhaya ngemuva kweminyaka eyishumi efuna ukubuyisana noyise esikhundleni sokuthi bakhulume uyise wathi akayoxolisa KwaSizabantu“Umfowethu owayefunda KwaSizabantu waxoshwa, ubaba akabange esamxosha ekhaya,” kusho yena.Ofakazi bathi abafundi abamnyama babegunda kodwa abamhlophe bengagundi. Abamnyama kuthiwa babehlolwa ubuntombi abamhlophe bengahlolwa, kwakuthiwa ukuhlolwa yisiko labamyama kanjalo nokugunda.Namhlanje kuzofakaza abanye ofakazi namaphoyisa mayelana namacala avulwa.
title: Ubufakazi ngezimanga  zaKwaSizabantu

text: BASASHAQEKILE abahlengikazi basesibhedlela i-Edendale eMgungundlovu bethola isidumbu sikazakwabo sesonakele emqashweni oseGerisi, kwaMasikane, KwaDambuza.Omunye wozakwabo bakamufi obengumngani wakhe, uNksz Zinhle Mahlaba, uthe ugcine ukubona uNksz Florence Dombi Gabuza ngoLwesine ebusuku kade bezoya komunye umngcwabo.Uthe ubebuya emngcwabeni ngoMgqibelo, wathola ucingo obeluvela komunye uzakwabo luthi akabheke uNksz Gabuza ngoba akalubambi ucingo lwakhe.“Sihambe nomphathi wezindlu zomqasho sayobheka. Ngifike ngangqongqoza, kwangavulwa. Ngaphinda ngamshayela ucingo sengiphambi komnyango kodwa wangalubamba ucingo,” kusho uNksz Mahlaba.Uthe umphathi wemiqasho uze wangena ngewindi.“Ungene ngaphakathi wafike wavula umnyango njengoba ukhiye ubulenga esicabheni. Isidumbu sisifice sidindilizile, elele ngesisu, sesinuka.”UNksz Mahlaba uthe namanje umqondo wakhe usaphazamisekile ngento ayibonile.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Ncumisa Mafunda, uthe: “SiwuMnyango silahlekelwe kakhulu wumhlengikazi obenamava. Sikhalisana nomndeni, ukulahlekelwa yilungu lomndeni yinto ebuhlungu.”Omunye umthombo obukhona kutholwa isidumbu sikamufi ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe kuqale kwaba nephunga ebelixakile kodwa kungaziwa ukuthi liqhamuka kuphi.“Sibe sesibheka ukuthi liqhamukaphi, sathola ukuthi belivela endlini kaDombi. Isidumbu sakhe besinqunu futhi sinamathumba abebangelwe ukushisa,” kusho umthombo.Ubuye wachaza umufi njengomuntu obezithanda engenaso isikhathi sabantu besilisa.Abahlengikazi bathe basola ukuthi ubulawe yisifo sikashukela ngoba ubenaso.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Langa Gabuza, uthe bashaqekile ngokushona kukadadewabo ngoba kade benaye ngamaholidi kaKhisimusi.Uthe umufi ushiye emhlabeni odadewabo ababili nabafowabo abane. Ubengenangane futhi engenaye ahlekisana naye.“Uzofihlwa emathuneni asekhaya eBruntville, eMooi River, ngoMgqibelo ngemuva kwenkonzo ezoba sehholo lomphakathi ngo-9 ekuseni,” kusho uGabuza.
title: Kutholwe isidumbu somhlengikazi sesonakele

text: USibusiso Khwinana, odlala indawo kaLefa efilimini kasomahlaya uKagiso Lediga noDJ Black Coffee, ugwazwe wabulawa ngabantu abangaziwa ePitoli ngoLwesihlanu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eGauteng, uCaptain Mavela Masondo, uthe bathole ukuthi umufi ubenomngani wakhe ekhoneni emgwaqweni uPretorius noSteve Biko e-Acardia ebusuku.“Sithole ukuthi bebezimele kule ndawo umufi nomngani wakhe, kwasekuqhamuka abantu ababaphoqe ukuba babanike amaselula abo.Kube nomdonsiswano, kwagcina ngokuthi uSibusiso agwazwe kwesingenhla washona esendaweni yesigameko,” kusho uCaptain Mavela.Uthe amaphoyisa asaphenya, akukaboshwa muntu. UBlack Coffee ukhale kakhulu ngokulahlekelwa.“Silahlekelwe. Koze kube nini sikhala ngobugebengu obudlangile ezweni lethu. Bangaki abantu okufanele bashone ngaphambi kokuthi kusukunywe? Ubani okufanele simethembe ngempilo yethu neyemindeni yethu? Ubani okufanele simvotele?” kubuza uBlack Coffee.UNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko uMnuz Nathi Mthethwa, naye ukhalile ngokushona kwalo mlingisi waseSoshanguve, wathi ubesemncane futhi kusabhekwe lukhulu kuyena.Ifilimu iMatwetwe yenze kahle kakhulu emabhayisikobho.Ngaphandle kokulingisa, uSibusiso ubengomunye wabasunguli be-Independent Theatres Makers Movement.
title: Isililo ngokufa kobelingisa kwekaBlack Coffee

text:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEU MLINGISI waseMelika ohlonishwayo uForest Whitaker usephinde wakhombisa ikhono ngokudlala indawo yephoyisa elithungatha umbulali wentombazane yebala elimhlophe efilimini entsha esihloko sayo sithi 
Zulu.Le filimu inodlame nezigaba ezibuye zishaqise ngempilo yamaqembu ezigebengu aseNingizimu Afrika, iphinde iveze ukuthi isekhona insila yobandlululo kuleli.I
Zulu eqondiswe nguJerome Salle wodumo lwe
Largo Winch ikhonjiswe ngokokuqala emcimbini wokuvala ifestivali yamafilimu eba seFrance minyaka yonke, iCannes Film Festival ngeSonto.Kwabanye abalingisi abakuyona kubalwa u-Orlando Bloom odlala indawo yephoyisa lebala elimhlophe elizenzela umathanda nelingenandaba namthetho nomlingisi wakuleli uConrad Kemp.UWhitaker udlala indawo ka-Ali owaphunyula ekubulaweni ngamalungu eqembu lepolitiki Inkatha eyayingezwani namanye amalungu e-ANC.Uma esekhulile u-Ali uba yisikhulu sophiko oluphenya amacala okubulala eKapa nalapho ezimisele ukubamba abenzi bokubi ukuze bajeze.Ohambeni lwakhe kuvela ngokusobala ukuthi kusenezilonda zangesikhathi sobandlululo ezingazange ziphole.Le filimu iveza isithombe seKapa sokuthi yilowo nalowo uzicabangela yena, zonke iziphathimandla ziyakhwabanisa futhi kubusa umthetho wokuthi umphakathi uzijezisele wona izigebengu.UWhitaker wahlomula ngendondo ye-Oscar ngendawo ka-Idi Amin ayidlala kwi
The Last King of Scotland ngo-2006, futhi udume ngokungena khaxa endaweni ayilingisayo emafilimini akhe.Ukuzilungiselela ukuba kwi
Zulu, uthi wahlangana neqembu langempela lemigulukudu amanye amalungu alo ayesanda kuphuma ejele waya nasemiphakathini yawo ukuze angene kahle kule ndawo yomuntu odlule ebunzimeni ebuncaneni nasebudaleni bakhe.“Ngahlangana namalungu amaqembu aphuma ezindaweni ezahlukene, amanye awo ayesanda kuphuma ejele. Ngibona ukuthi kuyasiza ukuthola lapho indawo oyidlalayo isuselwe khona,” kusho uWhitaker.“Ithimba elilwa nobugebengu obunodlame langivakashisa ezindaweni eziningi impela, okwangisiza ngaqonda ukuthi kunjani ukuba selokishini,” kusho uWhitaker.Wengeze nokuthi ufunde ulimi lwesiZulu nesiBhunu emasontweni ambalwa ayezilungiselela ngawo ukuqopha.Phezu kokuba le filimu ithole ukugxekwa ngabaningi ngokuveza kakhulu udlame nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu okufaka ukunqunywa kwamakhanda nokudlwengulwa, uWhitaker uthi ishaya emhlolweni ngodlame olwenzekayo ngenxa yamaqembu odlame.“Kuke kwaba khona nokugaxa kwabantu ithayi amahlandla ambalwa eKhayelitsha ngisho sisekhona kuleya ndawo ngesikhathi siqopha,” kusho uWhitaker.Wengeze nokuthi ngesikhathi eqopha ubone amalungu omphakathi ephelelwa yithemba emaphoyiseni egcina esezijezisela ngokwawo izigebengu.Lokhu kusondele kakhulu efilimini njengoba u-Ali elangazelela ukuziphindiselela azenzele yena ubulungiswa.“Ukuzilungiselela ngiphinde ngachitha isikhathi esiningi namaphoyisa, abantu emphakathini bebethi awabalaleli, awabasizi futhi yiwona avumela abantu ukuthi benze bonke ububi obenzeka endaweni yabo,” kusho uWhitaker.“Kusukaphi konke lokhu? Buqhamukaphi bonke lobu buhlungu obuveza zonke lezi zinto?“Ngicabanga ukuthi yiyona yinto ekumele ixazululwe leyo,” kuqhuba uWhitaker.UConrad Kemp okunguyena yedwa umlingisi wakuleli efilimini uthe ukuzijezisela izigebengu yisenzo esesande kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika esenziwa ngabantu ababona sengathi umthetho kawubasizi.Kepha uWhitaker uthi isithombe esiyiso kasilahlekisi ithemba njengoba kuvezwa efilimini.Uthe kancane kancane, ukuxolelana okuphathelene nobandlululo kuyabonakala.Uthe kuphathelene nomlando wokuphathwa ngamanye amazwe kanti lezo yizindaba ekumele kuxolelwane kuzo kuqhutshekelwe phambili.“Kuza kancane kodwa leli lizwekazi ligcwele ithemba lempumelelo, liyakhula futhi liyashintsha liya phambili,” kuphetha uWhitaker.
title: Kuzosha izikhotha ngefilimu i‘Zulu’

text: ‘Washo inkomo yangempela, phela loyo uwu-freeway, kudluleka kalula kuyena”. Lawa ngamanye amagama okubizwa ngawo isitobha seMamelodi Sundowns neBafana Bafana uModjeka Madisha, uma abathandi bebhola kuleli bemsola ngokwenza iphutha elidliselayo.Yize lawa kuzwakala kungamagama alumelayo futhi angaphazamisa ngokomqondo uMadisha enkundleni nangaphandle kwayo, Lo mdlali uthi akakugqizi qala okushiwo ngaye, kuphela nje udlala ibhola qha.UMadisha unqobe izicoco ezintathu neSundowns ngesizini edlule okubalwa kuzona eseligi, Telkom Knockout (TKO)  neNedbank Cup. Empeleni usenqobe ngisho nesicoco esikhulukazi ezwenikazi i-Afrika, okuyiCAF Champions League newele laso iCAF Super Cup. Kumanje lo mdlali usesikwatini sikaMolefi Ntseki iBafana Bafana, esizobhekana neSao Tome and Principe emidlalweni emibili yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup Of Nations (Afcon), ezodlalelwa kuleli ngoLwesihlanu nangoMsombuluko.“Ngeke ngiphike ukuthi sike saba khona isikhathi esinzima ebholeni, lapho ngathukwa khona abadlali beqembu elithize ngesizini edlule kodwa umqeqeshi wami ngaleso sikhathi (esho uPitso Mosimane), wangihlalisa phansi wangitshela okumele ngikwenze. “Empeleni nje uManqoba (Mngqithi), nomqeqeshi uRulani (Mokwena) bawusizo ngoba bangitshela ukuthi anginake okumele ngikwenze enkundleni, nginganaki ukuthi abantu bathini,” kulandisa uMadisha ephendula umbuzo waleli phephandaba ukuthi ngabe umelana kanjani nengcindezi yokudelelwa abalandeli bebhola.UMadisha ubekhuluma ngesigameko esenzeke ngesizini edlule, iSundowns ishaywa iBaroka FC ngo 1-0 emdlalweni weligi kwiBio Bubble, eGauteng. Kwathi nxa kuphela umdlalo, abadlali bexhawulana, ibhentshi leBaroka lamphendula ihlaya uMadisha, limbiza ngekhongco elibuthaka kumaBrazilians. Lokhu kwanenga uMosimane, owagcina eseba nempi yamazwi nabadlali beBaroka nebhentshi layo.“Ngilimele ngokuhamba kukaMosimane. Bekuthi noma kunzima, angiyale, angisole nxa kunesidingo. Kodwa okungijabulisayo ukuthi sisaxhumana namanje, akuphelile ngobudlelwano bethu nakancane,” kulandisa uMadisha ecweba izinyembezi kubonakala ukuthi impela ufe olwembiza ngoMosimane osengumqeqeshi we-Ahl Ahly yase-Egypt.UMODJEKA Madisha umdlali weMamelodi Sundowns oke athole ukugxekwa okukhulu ngamaphutha awenza enkundleniIsithombe: BACKPAGEPIX
title: UMadisha akakugqizi qakala ukugxekwa

text: USELUFAKE kubameli bakhe umculi wakuleli uHeavy K udaba lwemali okuthiwa uyikweleta inkampani yaseBotswana eyamfakela imali kodwa wagcina engafikanga ezonandisa ngo-2017.UMkhululi Siqula, odume ngelikaHeavy K, kuthiwa unikwe incwadi yokuthi aboshwe yinkantolo yaseBotswana ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule ngemuva kokungafiki komunye umcimbi yize ayesekhokhelwe imali.Kuthiwa ukhishelwe la maphepha ngemuva kokuthi inkampani iBakgopeng Science PTY/Moronisi Entertainment ifune imali eyamkhokhela yona enguR87 000.Imenenja yalo mculi, * -Amos Mose, ithe udaba lwakhe nale mali lusingethwe abameli bakhe.Uthe abantu asebegijime babafaka enkantolo basakhuluma nabo ngodaba lwemali okwakumele bayifake kodwa bangabalalela.“Uma uqasha uHeavy K kumele ufake imali ngaphambi kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa zomcimbi. Nabo sabayalela kanjalo njengoba okwabo kwakuzoba nzima kakhulu ngenxa yokuthi bakwelinye izwe kodwa bangakwenza lokho. Ngenxa yokuthi imali bayifaka sekusele izinsuku ezincane, nathi sangayibona ingena ebhange, sacabanga ukuthi abayithumelanga ngoba kungangenanga mqhafazo ovela ebhange othi ingenile,” kusho * -Amos.Uthe bagijimela kwabezindaba nje bebesaqhubeka nokubatshela ukuthi udaba oluthinta bona bobabili seluphethwe abameli.“Kumanje sivela eBotswana njengoba bekunohambo uHeavy K abenalo emadolobheni akhona ehlukene. Ngesonto elizayo siya eLondon lapho lo mculi eyoqala khona uhambo lwakhe nabantu esisebenzisana kahle nabo,” kuchaza * -Amos.Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo uHeavy K kumele avele enkantolo ngo-Agasti 15 azochaza ngalolu daba.
title: Lukubameli olukaHeavy K nenkampani 'ayikweletayo'

text: SEZIQALE phansi izinkinga zokungaqoqwa kadoti emalokishini aseThekwini. Abahlali baKwaMashu ehostela baveze ukuthi sekudlule amasonto amabili ingaqoqiwe imfucuza kulendawo.Oyedwa wabahlala kule ndawo ocele ukungadalulwa uthe udoti ugcwele umgwaqo wonke, kunuka phu, futhi sekuphazamiseke nezokuthutha njengoba amatekisi engakwazi ukudlula kuwo.“Abahlala kulendawo bawusaphaze umgwqao wonke udoti  ngenxa yokuthi awusaqoqwa, sesikhathele ukuhlala endaweni engcolile. Izingane zethu zidlala ngawo, asikwazi nokuya emsebenzini ngoba amatekisi awakwazi ukudlula emgwaqeni,” kuchaza yena.Usonkontileka wendawo, uMnuz Gadafi Sibiya, usole umasipala ngokuhluleka ukugcina isethembeso sokuthi bazothuthukisa osomabhizinisi bomphakathi abasafufusa ngohlelo lokuqoqwa kukadoti.“Umasipala waqasha osomabhizinisi bomphakathi ngenhloso yokubathuthukisa, basebenza, kodwa manje akasafuni ukubakhokhela imali abasebenza ngayo. Noma sikhuluma sihambisa izikhalo zethu kumasipala izimpendulo asizitholi,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi amalungu omphakathi agcine ephoqelekile ukuthi avale umgwaqo ngoba sebekhathele ukulinda izimpendulo kumasipala weTheku.Omunye usonkontileka ocelwe ukungadaulwa uthe bathenjiswa imali kodwa sekuphele izinyanga bengayitholile.“Sekuzophela izinyanga ezintathu singayitholile imali yethu. Sathi sihlangana eCity Hall sifuna ukuzoletha izikhalo zethu sahlangabezwa amaphayosa, okwasimangaza ngoba sasingenzanga lutho olubi. Sasize ngokuzobuza ngemali umasipala asikweleta yona,” kusho yena.Inhloko yezokuxhumana esabambile kumasipala weTheku uMnuz Mandla Nsele uthe izingxoxo phakathi komkhandlu nosonkontileka zisaqhubeka.“Kwexwayiswa amalungu omphakathi ahlala eNingizimu neTheku ezindaweni okubalwa kuzo uMlaza, Folweni Cato Manor, Bonella, Chesterville, Cato Crest, KwaMakhutha namaphethelo ngezinkinga zokuqoqwa kadoti. Izingxoxo phakathi kosonkontileka, nabasebenzi bakwa-DSW abaqoqa udoti zisaqhubeka. Umkhandlu uyaxolisa ngokuphazamiseka kokuqoqwa kukadoti,” usho kanje.
title: Ziyaqonga izinkinga ngokungaqoqwa kwadoti eThekwini

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuThutha kuleli, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthi phansi amaphaphu kubantu bakuleli mayelana nodaba lokumiswa kwamabhanoyi amaningi okwenzeke izolo.UMbalula, ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba izolo, uthe amabhanoyi amiswe ngoba bekuqinisekiswa ukuthi konke kuhamba ngohlelo.UMbalula uthe ekupheleni kwaleli sonto isimo sizobe sesibuyele kwesejwayelekile.“Asikho isimo esibucayi esibhekene naso, okwamanje ukuhlolisisa nje ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi wonke umuntu uphephile. Kuzophela leli sonto konke sekubuyele esimeni esijwayelekile. Amabhanoyi azohamba ngokohlelo maduze nje,” kusho uMbalula.Kusukela izolo ekuseni, abebezogibela amabhanoyi bazithele phezu kwalesi simo lapho amabhanoyi amaningi abengaphumi futhi kungekho nangenayo ezikhumulweni zezindiza eziningi ngenxa yokuthi abemisiwe.Izolo abe-Airports Company South Africa ( ACSA), bakhiphe isitatimende bethi bayaqonda ukuthi iSouth African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA), imise amabhanoyi akwaComair nawakwaSAA kuze kube kuhlolisiswa konke okuthinta ukundiza kwawo.Okhulumela i-ACSA, uNksz Angela Karnein uthe: “Siyasebenzisana nabamabhanoyi ahlukene ukuze sibe nohlelo lokuba isimo sibuyele kwesejwayelekile.”Okuvezwe uMbalula wukuthi abeSACAA kade benophenyo emuva kwalo kube khona okuthize abangakuqondisisi okwenze bakhetha ukuba amiswe wonke amabhanoyi athintekayo kuze kube isimo siyalungiswa.Okhulumela iSAA, uMnuz Tlali Tlali ekhuluma ne-eNCA, uthe aphephile amabhanoyi abo, akukho okumele bazikhathaze ngakho abagibeli.Abahambayo kuthiwa kumele bathinte abezindiza abazozigibela ukuze bathole ukuthi azoqala nini ukuhamba. Abamabhanoyi amisiwe bazonikezwa olunye usuku ukuze baqhubeke nohambo labo.Lesi simo abamabhanoyi bathi baphezu kwaso ukusilungisa ngokushesha.
title: 'Amabhanoyi azohamba ngokohlelo maduze'

text: USHIYE umyalezo exolisa kwiWhatsApp maqede wadlisa izingane zakhe ezimbili umuthi wokubulala amagundane, ezinye ezimbili wazikhunga nazo owesifazane waseMhlasini, eVerulam, ngoMsombuluko.Umufi, uNksz Nonhle Nyawuza (32), uthumele unina umyalezo eziqophe izwi obuthi uyaxolisa ngazokwenza ngaphambi kokuthi atholakale esezikhungile nabantwana bakhe.UNksz Nyawuza kuthiwa ubexakwe yizinkinga zemali nokuntula umsebenzi obekwenza kube nzima ukukhulisa izingane eyedwa.NgeSonto kuthiwa umufi ufikelwe umuntu abemkweleta ezomfuna imali ezalayo ayiboleka.Kubikwa ukuthi izolo bekuzofika umalume wezingane ezozithatha zonke ziyohlala naye khona ezozifunela nesikole kwazise bezingafundi.Omakhelwane bathe uNksz Nyawuza ufike kuqala ekuseni lapho kugadwa khona izingane eyozilanda kanti uzozibulala.Kusolakala ukuthi uqale ngokudlisa umuntu wokubulala amagundane izingane zakhe ezindala uLuthando no-Akhona abaneminyaka engu-12 no-10, wabe esezithuma esitolo ukuthi aziyombolekela imali kanti uzosala akhunge lezi ezimbili eneminyaka emine uLwandile nenonyaka nezinyanga eziyisithupha uKhwezi. Kuthiwa lezi zingane ezindala sezibuya esitolo zizithele phezu kwezidumbu zezingane zakwabo zilenga eduze nesikanina endlini ebezihlala kuyo noninakhulu.Zibe sezimemeza, zikhala zihlaba umkhosi.Lezi zingane ezimbili ziphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ziyokwelashwa zimpompwe umuthi wamagundane eziwudliswe wunina.Umakhelwane uNksz Zonke Maphaphu, okunguye nomunye wesilisa abafike baqaqa abashonile, uthe ubone uLuthando engena ngewindi ngoba umnyango ubuvaliwe, maqede waphuma esekhala.“Ukhale wathi asisize unina ngoba uyazibulala. Sifike sasika intambo abezikhunge ngayo izidumbu sazibeka embhedeni. Sibize omakhelwane, sabe sesishayela unina kamufi ucingo. Sishayele amaphoyisa ucingo nawo angatholakala sabe sesibiza iReaction Unit,” kusho uNksz Maphaphu.Uchaze umufi njengomuntu obethula, obezikhululekele futhi engakhombisi zimpawu zokuthi unezinkinga.Umngani kamufi kwiWhatsApp ongathandanga kudalulwe igama lakhe ephepheni, uveze umyalezo kaNksz Nyawuza obuthi “Ngiyaxolisa nginithanda nonke” maqede wafaka uphawu lwenhliziyo.Unina kamufi, uNksz Gloria Nyawuza ubuye emsebenzini wasidinda isililo. Akathandanga ukukhuluma nabezindaba.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Fakazi Mdletshe, lithe lithole kwiWhatsApp ukuthi uNksz Nyawuza uzikhunge nezingane.UMdletshe uthe ushiye umhlangano abekuwona waphuthuma endaweni yesigameko.“Sishaqekile, yisigameko esithusayo lesi. Sicela umphakathi usebenzisane namakomiti uma unezinkinga onazo ukuze kungaze kufike ekutheni umuntu athathe isinyathelo esinjengalesi. Uma kuwukuthi bekuyinkinga yezingane besingangenelela izingane ziqhubeke zifunde, uma bekuwukuthi uyakweleta, besingazama izindlela zokuthi singenele akwazi ukuthi aphume kuleyo nkinga kunokuthi agcine ethathe umphefumulo wakhe,” kusho uMdletshe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe amaphoyisa aphenya amacala amabili okubulala nedokodo ngokushona komuntu.
title: Ushiye umyalezo kwiWhatsApp ozibulale nezingane

text: INHLANGANO esiza umphakathi iDemocracy Development Program (DDP), iphakamise uhlelo lokulwa nokuhlaselwa kwabokufika eThekwini, olubizwa ngeThe Migration Project.Kulolu hlelo osomabhizinisi bokufika bahlanganiswa nabakuleli ukuze basebenzisane, bacobelelane nangolwazi. Kuvela ukuthi kade baqala ukufuduka abantu basemazweni ase-Afrika, njengoba ngasekupheleni kuka-2013 bawu-232 million abantu abakade bengahlali emazweni abo. Abawu-19 million bahlala emazweni ahlukene e-Afrika, kuthi abawu-42 million bahlale kwamanye amazwe omhlaba. Izizathu zokufuduka kwabantu emazweni abo zihlukene kanti phakathi kwazo kubalwa udlame.UDkt Paul Kariuki onguMqondisi weDDP, uthe isizathu esenza kuhlaselwe abokufika eNingizimu Afrika, wukungabibikho kwamathuba omsebenzi nomnotho ontengayo.“Siyazi ukuthi bathwele kanzima abantu baseNingizimu Afrika, bazama ukuziphilisa kulesi simo somnotho esingesihle kodwa ukucwasa nodlame olubhekiswa kwabokufika, alusizi ngalutho. Sethule iThe Migration Project ukuze silungise indaba yamathuba omsebenzi kwabokufika nabakuleli. Sigxile ezindaweni ezinhlanu eThekwini, esiye sibone kuqubuka izigameko zokuhlaselwa kwabokufika kuzo,” kuchaza uKariuki.Izindawo abazibhekayo yiKwaMakhutha, KwaMashu, Umlaza, Isipingo neSydenham.IThe Migration Project izosebenzisana nosomabhizinisi, umphakathi kanye nezinhlaka ezithintekayo izinyanga eziwu-36. UKairuki uthe uhlelo lwamukelwe ngezindlela ezihlukene ezindaweni oluthulwe kuzo kodwa bathemba ukuthi luzoqeda ukucwaswa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabokufika.Abanye abayingxenye yalolu hlelo ngoMnuz Frank Muchava, ongowokufika kuleli nonebhizinisi lokulungisa izimoto ezishayisile, uzocobelelana ngolwazi nosomabhizinisi bakuleli abakhava impahla okunguNksz Thuli Khumalo noMnuz Phumlani Mazibuko.UMuchava usebenzisana noNksz Khumalo noMazibuko, ngokuthi  uma eqeda ukulungisa izimoto udlulisela ibhizinisi lokukhava izihlalo kubona.“UMuchava ufike sisebenzela lapha ngesikhathi ezoqala ibhizinisi lakhe. Sisebenzisana kahle naye. Ngiphatheka kabi uma kuhlaselwa abantu bokufika ngoba bangabantu njengathi. Ngicabanga ukuthi iThe Migration Project ingasebenza uma wonke umuntu engaba yingxenye yayo,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.UMuchava uthe abokufika bashiya emazweni abo ngenxa yezizathu ezihlukene kanti kuba nzima uma becwaswa uma bezama ukuziphilisa. “Sisolwa ngokweba imisebenzi yabantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Angizange ngebe msebenzi wamuntu, ngafika lapha nekhono lokulungisa izimoto, ngisebenzise lona ukuqala ibhizinisi ukuze ngiziphilise. Ngiyakwazi ukusiza abantu bakuleli ngamathuba omsebenzi ebhizinisini lami,” kusho uMuchava.UMnuz Siyanda Mkhize, ongumhwebi wasemgwaqweni KwaMakhutha, uthe usebenzela eduze kwamabhizinisi amabili abantu bokufika. Uveze ukuthi uye alwiswe ngabantu bakuleli uma evikela abokufika, nabathatha njengabafowabo.UKariuki uthe abantu abaningi bayafuduka emazweni abo emhlabeni jikelele ngakho kufanele kube nendlela yokuphilisana phakathi kabokufika nezakhamuzi zezwe. Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi kwakhiwe umphakathi osebenzisanayo lapho abantu bethola amathuba afanayo.
title: Uhlelo lokuhlanganisa abokufika nabakuleli
