text: INXUSA uMhlonishwa uLin Songtian ngo-Okthoba 31, 2017,  ube nomhlangano nabezindaba nezinjulalwazi eziNdlini zeNxusa laseChina ngeNgqungquthela kaZwelonke yesi-19 yeCommunist Party of China (iCPC). Bevile ku-80 osozindaba nezinjulalwazi abaya kulo mhlangano. Inxusa uMhlonishwa uLin lithe qaphu qaphu ngeNgqungquthela kaZwelonke yesi-19 yeCPC, wazisa akade bekhona ngombiko kaNobhala Jikelele uXi Jinping eNgqungqutheleni kaZwelonke yesi-19 okuzuziwe nokubaluleka kweNgqungquthela.Inxusa uMhlonishwa uLin uphawule wathi ngempela iNgqungquthela kaZwelonke yesi-19 yeCPC imqoka kwiChina njengoba isembhidlangweni wokwakha isizwe esisimeme ngayo yonke indlela nenqubo yobudlelandawonye ingena esigabeni esisha. Umbiko kaNobhala Jikelele uXi wenaba ngamasu, amaqhinga nezindlela ezintsha zokugqugquzela nokwenza ubudlelandawonye obunezimpawu zaseChina esahlukweni esisha nokwenza umqulu omusha weChina. Umbiko kaNobhala Jikelele uXi ubeka izidingo ezintsha ngezinqubo zasekhaya nezangaphandle, uveze ukuzinikela kweChina ukugqugquzela nokwenza ubudlelandawonye obunezimpawu zaseChina.Umbiko uchaze okulindelwe ngabantu baseChina nabantu bakwamanye amazwe, wadala isasasa nokwemukelwa ngezandla ezifudumele ngezinye izizwe. Inxusa uMhlonishwa uLin lenabe ngezinqumo ezimbili ezimqoka zezepolitiki ngeNgqungquthela, okuwukushintsha kwesimo sabantu baseChina nobudlelandawonye obunezimpawu zaseChina esahlukweni esisha.Inxusa uLin lenabe ngobizo lweCPC, ukushintsha komqondo osekelwe ebantwini weCPC, umqulu omusha womkhankaso wentuthuko yesimanje yaseChina nokubaluleka nokunotha kwe-Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, okuwukuthi umbono kaXi Jinping ngobudlelandawonye obunezimpawu zaseChina esahlukweni esisha. Kwezenqubo zangaphandle zeChina, Inxusa uLin lichaze inhloso yeChina yokulandela indlela entsha yenhlonipho, ubulungisa nokubambisana okunezithelo zawo wonke amazwe nomphakathi onekusasa lawo wonke umuntu ovulelekile, ongenankohlakalo nonobuhle, ukuthula, ukuphepha kwawo wonke umuntu nekusasa likawonkewonke.Inxusa uLin ubeke ilaka lakhe ngokusha okulindelwe yiCPC ukuqinisa isimilo eqenjini. Inxusa uLin ligcizelele ukuthi iCPC nabantu baseChina bakholwa wukuthi, beholwa yiXi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, ngaphansi kobuholi nobuhlakani babaholi beCPC noXi Jinping, lo mqulu omusha weNgqungquthela kaZwelonke yesi-19 yeCPC uzophumelela.
title: INxusa laseChina licacisela ebezindaba ngengqungquthela yesi-19 yamaKhomanisi aseChina

text: IPHONSEKE eweni elingu-400 wamamitha yashona indoda ebiyochitha udoti ngoplastiki eLuganda, eMariannhill.Umndeni kaMnuz Thami Mabaso (61) uthi ubeyochitha utshani begceke abeligunda ngoLwesibili washelela waphonseka eweni. Kuthiwa uphuke wonke amalunga omzimba.Amalungu omphakathi kuthiwa athungathe isidumbu sakhe asithola kwafika nethimba lamaphoyisa elitakulayo lazosikhipha.Indodakazi kaMabaso, uNksz Welile Hlongwane, ithe uyise ubejwayele ukuchitha izibi kule liwa njengabanye abantu.“Ubaba ubonwe umuntu onomuzi oseduze kakhulu kwewa ethulula utshani kanti uzoshelela awulandele akhalakathele nawo eweni. Phambilini wacishe wawa kodwa wabuya wasibikela umama wamthethisa wase eyeka,” kusho uNksz Hlongwane.Uthe bashaqekile uma uyise ephinda into akhuzelwa yona egcine isimbulala.“Samkhuza ngoba baningi opulasitiki badoti ekhaya asazi kungani ewuthulula engachithi konke. Ubenesifo sokuwa. Kukhona owake wakhalakathela eweni phambilini wafa,” kusho uNksz Hlongwane.Ikhansela lika-ward 13 eThekwini, uMnuz Reginald Cloete, lithe bashaqekile futhi bayazwelana nomndeni. UCloete, obekhona kutakulwa isidumbu sikaMabaso, uthe ubephuke wonke amalunga omzimba.“Abantu bahlala ezindlini zomxhaso eziseduze newa abachitha kulona udoti. Sicela imindeni iqikelele. Sidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini futhi sizolokhu sixhumana nawo ngalesi sikhathi esinzima,” kusho uCloete.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe ngoLwesibili ithimba lamaphoyisa aseThekwini elitakulayo liye eLuganda ngemuva kokubikelwa ukuthi kunowesilisa ophonseke eweni.UColonel Mbele uthe amaphoyisa atakule isidumbu kwavulwa idokodo ngokufa komuntu eliphenywa amaphoyisa aseMariannhill.
title: Uphonseke eweni wafa owesilisa obeyochitha udoti

text: UMSOLWA ecaleni lokubulala izingane zakhe ezine, wayekade ephume ngoshwele kwelinye icala lokubulala ingane kamakhelwane. USenyatse Lucas Phasha owayengummeli, usolwa ngokubulala izingane zakhe ngokuzishayela isipikili emakhanda. Lokhu wakwenza kulandela ukuba esole unkosikazi wakhe ukuthi uyajola. UBrigadier Motlafela Mojapelo, uthe eminyakeni edlule, lo msolwa wayejaha intombi yakhe ngesibhamu, eyisola ngokujola wabe eseyidubula. Inhlamvu kuthiwa yaphaphalaza, yangayidubula intombi, kwadubuleka ingane yakamakhelwane. Yagcina ngokushona esibhedlela.“Wadubula ezama ukudubula intombi, kwadubuleka ingane engenacala. Waboshwa, wagwetshwa ngecala lokubulala. Ngaleso sikhathi wayengummeli. Igama lakhe lacishwa ohlwini lwabameli ngenxa yokugwetshwa kwakhe. Wabe esededelwa ngoshwele ejele njengoba esesolwa ngokubulala izingane zakhe ezine, nakhona ubesola unkosikazi wakhe ukuthi akathembekile. Enye yezingane uze wathi akuyona eyakhe,” kusho uMojafela.Ngaphambi kokuba lezi zingane zibulawe, uPhasha wayebhala kwiFacebook esola unkosikazi wakhe ngokumjolela, wathi wamthelela ngegciwane ingculazi. Wabe esesho ukuthi izingane zakhe uKatlego (9), Joyce (7) Tshepo (5) no- Adel (3) ngeke aphinde azibone.“Ungidinile kabi nje lona (esho unkosikazi), nabangani bakhe nathandana nabo. Ngeke esasibona futhi kumele abulawe yigciwane lengculazi. Unkosikazi wami ungizwise ubuhlungu,” kubhala uPhasha kwiFacebook.Waphinde wafaka nesithombe sikankosikazi wakhe emgagula ukuthi unegciwane, ethi uhamba elala. Icala lizobuyela maduze enkantolo. Umsolwa usagcinwe esitokisini.
title: Kuvele ukuthi wayephume ngoshwele ‘owabulala’ izingane ezine

text: KUZOPHINDE kwehle ijoka kubanikazi bezimoto kuleli njengoba kulindeleke okunye futhi ukwehla kukaphethroli nodizili ngoJanuwari walo nyaka ozoqalwa.Ngokwenhlangano i-Automobile Association, kulindeleke ukuthi uphethroli wehle ngoR1 ilitha kuthi udizili wona wehle ngoR1.30 ilitha kanti upharafini wona kulindeleke ukuthi wehle ngoR1.22.Lolu shintsho kuvela ukuthi lwenziwa wukwehla kwentengo kawoyela ekupheleni kukaDisemba.Yize kunjalo kodwa amandla erandi lakuleli asesengozini njengoba kusenezinselelo ebhekene nohulumeni ukwehlisa isikweletu sikahulumeni nokulungisa isimo somnotho.-ANA
title: Kuzokwehla uphethroli nodizili ngoJanuwari

text: BAZOBHALISA mahhala abafundi abanezincwadi ezikhombisayo ukuthi bazosekwa yisikhwama sezimali iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).Lokhu kuvezwe yizikhungo zemfundo ephakeme KwaZulu-Natal, iDurban University of Technology (DUT) neNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal (UKZN).Izikhulu zeMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT) zona zithe noma abafundi bezitholile izincwadi ezivela eNSFAS zoxhaso kodwa kuzodingeka bakhokhe u-R1 000 wokubhalisa. ONgoye bathe bazophendula maduze ngokuzokwenzeka.UNksz Noxolo Memela, wezokuxhumana eDUT, uthe abafundi abafikayo asebethole izincwadi eziveza ukuthi bazoxhaswa bazobhalisa mahhala.Uthe labo abangazitholanga izincwadi kuzodingeka bakhokhe imali yokubhalisa.“Labo abangenazo izincwadi eziveza ukuthi balutholile uxhaso lweNSFAS kumele bakhokhe. Imali kumele bayifake kwi-akhawunti yaseDUT ukuze bakwazi ukubhalisa. Uma uyitholile incwadi ungabhalisa ngisho nakwi-website,” kusho uNksz Memela.Okhulumela iMUT, uNkk Mbali Mkhize, uthe nabo bayabudinga ubufakazi bokuthi umfundi uzoxhaswa nguNSFAS.Uthe kodwa kudingeka ukuthi bawukhokhe u-R1 000 wokubhalisa.“Imali yokubhalisa incane ngeke imhlule umzali. Njengoba kuqalile ukubhalisa abekho abafundi abasasinike inkinga ngoba bafike sebeyikhokhile imali yokubhalisa.”UNksz Normah Zondo, okhulumela i-UKZN, uthe abafundi abamukelwe yinyuvesi bathola nezincwadi ezishoyo ukuthi bazoxhaswa yiNSFAS kumele bakhokhe uR250 kuphela okuyimali eshoyo ukuthi bayakwamukela ukuthathwa.“Imali izobuyiswa uma iNSFAS isimxhasile umfundi ngokugcwele. Nalabo bafundi abangakazitholi izincwadi ezivela kwiNSFAS zokuthi bazoxhaswa nabo kuyadingeka ukuthi bakhokhe uR250 uma kungukuthi bazifaka izicelo zoxhaso. Nabo imali izobuyiswa kubo uma sebethole uxhaso kulesi sikhwama,” kusho uNksz Zondo.UMengameli Jacob Zuma wamemezela ukuthi abafundi abahlwempu abazali babo abahola uR350 000 ngonyaka noma ngaphansi bazofunda mahhala.Imali kumele kube yiholo labazali bobabili lihlanganisiwe kanti labo abahola kusuka kuR350 000 kuya phezulu bona bazokhokha imali yokufunda.Imfundo yamahhala izoqala kubafundi abenza unyaka wokuqala kuwona wonke amanyuvesi. Izonabela nakwabenza eminye iminyaka ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.Izokwethula kuze kube yiminyaka emihlanu. INSFAS ivele imemezelile ukuthi abafundi asebezitholile izincwadi zokuthi bazoxhaswa bazobhalisa baphinde bafunde mahhala.I-NSFAS ibikade ikhipha imalimboleko kodwa manje seyizokhipha imifundaze ngenxa yemfundo yamahhala.
title: Bazobhalisa mahhala abaxhaswa yiNSFAS

text: UKHALA ezimathonsi owesilisa waseMgungundlovu osola inyanga yodumo uBhodlumlilo ngokumqola * -R157 000 ethi welapha unkosikazi wakhe ‘ophuphunyelwa’ yizisu.UMnuz Lungelo Mzolo (41), uthi ugilwe yile nyanga yaseThekwini eyazana nomkakhe.“Umkami ubenenkinga yokuchithekelwa yizisu uma ekhulelwe. Ngenxa yokuthi nami benginenkinga yokulahlekelwa yimali ngendlela engingayiqondi ebhange, unkosikazi ungeluleke ngokuthi ngixhumane nale nyanga," kusho uMzolo.Nakuba engazange afune ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uyekiswe yile nyanga emsebenzini, uthe ubone kungcono esule emsebenzini ukuze aqhubeke ayothuthukisa imfundo yakhe ukuze enze umsebenzi ongcono.“Le nyanga yangitshela ukuthi ukunyamalala kwemali yami kudalwa wukuthi kunotokoloshe abayithathayo, yathi yona ingangisiza ekutheni ingisebenze ukuze le nto ilunge."Uthi le nyanga yathi kuzomele le mali ayinikeze yona ihlale kuyo ukuze ingabe isanyamalala, nangempela wakwenza lokho.“Yathi angiyovula i-akhawunti entsha ukuze uma isiyibuyisa le mali ingeke isaba nayo inkinga”.Eseyivulile i-akhawunti uthe le nyanga ibisihlale imthembisa zonke izinsuku ukuthi izombuyisela imali yakhe kodwa kuze kube yimanje iyambalekela.Uthe eflethini eyamkhombisa ukuthi ihlala kulona eThekwini ayisatholakali.Nocingo lwayo uthi isiyaluvala uma eyifonela kanti uma kwenzekile wayifonela ngolunye ucingo, ithi ingezwa ukuthi uyena iluvale.Uthe amaphoyisa athe ngeke akwazi ukumsiza ngoba imali aqolwe yona inkulu kakhulu.“Angazi kumele ngenze njani, ngididekile. Nemali engize ngayo lapha eThekwini ngiyibolekile ngethemba lokuthi hleze imali yami iphinde ibuye. Unkosikazi akasebenzi kanti angabeletha noma nini. Angazi ngizokwenzenjani."UMnuz Sboniso Zulu oyinyanga eyaziwa ngoBhodlumlilo, ukuvumile ukuthi baxhumana nalo wesilisa emva kokuba emtshele ukuthi kunomuntu ommise kabi ofuna ukumenzakalisa emva kokuthi ayetsheleke kuye imali.“Ngamtshela ukuthi kumele akhanyise ngoba umsebenzi anginikeza wona mkhulu kakhulu wokuthi ngivale lo muntu angamhluphi ngiphinde ngiqinise yena nomkakhe," kusho uBhodlumlilo.Ukuvumile ukuthi bavumelana ngokuthi imali ayifake kwi-akhawunti yakhe ngoba lo mlisa enenkinga ngokulahlekelwa yimali ngendlela engaqondakali.Uthe wamtshela nokuthi imithi yokwenza lo msebenzi onzima ngalolu hlobo, kuzomele ayoyilanda eManguzi.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi ngiyidle yonke imali yakhe. Bengimfakela o-R1 000 bokuthenga ukudla ngoba engitshela ukuthi ulambile.”Akakwazanga ukuqinisekisa imali eyagcina isisetshenziswe nguye ukwenza lo msebenzi ngoba ethi iziliphu azikho eduzane angabalela kuzo.
title: Ukhihla isililo ogilwe yinyanga ebiyelapha umkakhe

text: UKHALE ngeholo umqeqeshi wase-England, uMick McCarthy, okuvela ukuthi usohlwini lwabaqeqeshi abafunwa yiKaizer Chiefs.Silokhu sikhula isibalo sabaqeqeshi abakhonjwa kuMakhosi. NgoLwesibili kuke kwavela igama lowayecija iChelsea u-Ivram Grant noMcCarthy.Umthombo osondelene noMcCarthy uthe lo mqeqeshi ngeke awuthathe umsebenzi wokupheka iChiefs.“Mina ngazi umeluleki wakhe uMick. Ngikhulumile naye kodwa wathi ngeke akwazi ukuthatha imali eshiwo yiChiefs. Ukhala ngokuthi incane. Phela uMick useke waqeqesha kwi-English Championship nakwi-English Premier League. Akafani noStuart Baxter ongelutho e-Europe. UBaxter uqeqeshe emazweni okubalwa iSweden neFinland. Umsebenzi ongcono ake awenza e-Europe owokucija iqembu lesizwe lase-England lika-Under 19,” kusho umthombo.Ngokomthombo iChiefs ibeke u-R500 000 njengeholo lanyanga zonke kozoqeqesha iqembu.UMcCarthy useke waqeqesha iSunderland, Wolverhampton, Ipswich Town neqembu lesizwe laseRepublic of Ireland.USteve Komphela ufake isicelo sokwesula ngemuva kwezidubedube zaseMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, lapho abalandeli bavuka khona umbhejazane befuna ukumudla luhlaza kulandela ukuqunjwa phansi yiFree State Stars kuma-semi final eNedbank Cup.UKomphela uhlale amasizini amathathu kwiChiefs. Akazange anqobe sicoco, okuyinto emqhathe nabalandeli eNaturena.“Ngikhulumile noBobby ngokuthi zisavuliwe yini izicelo zabaqeqeshi abafuna umsebenzi wokucija iChiefs. Uthe zisavuliwe ngoba nami bengingafuni ukuchitha isikhathi kanti umuntu sebemtholile. Bona bafuna umqeqeshi wangaphandle onesipiliyoni. Omunye umqeqeshi wase-England ebengikhuluma naye ngomsebenzi weChiefs uthe akanazo izinhloso zokuqeqesha eNingizimu Afrika,” kusho enye i-agent ehloniphekile.UBaxter naye okuke kwavela ukuthi kungenzeka abuyele kwiChiefs akukho mnyakazo asayenzile kwiSafa.UVina Maphosa wezokuxhumana kwiChiefs uthe bazomemezela uma sebemtholile umqeqeshi omusha.
title: Ukhale ngeholo owase-England obefunwa yiChiefs

text: ASEHLANGA kahle isenzo sabalandeli beqembu kumqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs u-Ernst Middendorp, okhalaze ngokuthi abamhloniphi unozinti weqembu uDaniel Akpeyi. Abalandeli beChiefs abebehambele umdlalo we-Absa Premiership obuseNewlands Stadium ngoLwesibili onqotshwe Amakhosi ehlula iCape Town City ngo 2-1, bamemeze igama lika-Itumeleng Khune ngemuva kwegoli elishaywe uKermit Erasmus kungakapheli ngisho imizuzu emihlanu umdlalo uqalile.Lesi senzo asehlanga kahle kuMiddendorp, oveze ukuthi kumcasulile okwenziwe abalandeli. “Iyangicasula indlela abalandeli abaziphathe ngayo. Ngiyacela ukuthi banikeze u-Akpeyi ithuba. Akulungile ukuthi abalandeli bafune kudlaliswe uKhune emuva kwemizuzu emihlanu umdlalo uqalile. UKhune uzolithola ithuba lokudlala, kungakuhle uma abalandeli bengakhombisa inhlonipho ku-Akpeyi,” kuchaza uMiddendorp ekhuluma nabeSuperSport. UKhune (32) ongaconsi phansi kubalandeli beqembu, ugcine ukudlala kwiChiefs ngo-January ngesizini edlule njengoba elimale ihlombe okumenze waphuthelwa yindawo esikwatini seBafana Bafana ebesidlala kwi-AFCON ebise-Egypt nonyaka. Ngaphandle kukaKhune, iChiefs isinqobe imidlalo emithathu yeligi, yadlala ngokulingana kowodwa kanti u-Akpeyi noBvuma bavimbe kahle emidlalweni asebeyidlalile. UMiddendorp uvele wangena ezintangeni ngenkathi ebuzwa ukuthi ibikhona yini ingcindezi yokudlalisa ukapteni weqembu. “Abalandeli kade bememeza igama likaKhune kakhulu emva kwemizuzu emihlanu. Akumele sicasuke kakhulu. Ngichaza ukuthi kumele inqandwe isaqala into eyenziwa abalandeli. Ngaphandle kwalokho abalandeli baphume ngobuningi babo bezokweseka iqembu nokusijabulisayo kakhulu,” kuchaza uMiddendorp. Ukusayiniswa kwabadlali basemazweni angaphandle okubalwa kubo uSamir Nurkovic, Kearyan Baccus kanye noLazarous Kambole kwenze abantu abaningi bangabaza ikusasa lalo mdlali eqenjini njengoba isikhala sabadlali abavela emazweni angaphandle bese sigcwele kwiChiefs. Kodwa ukulimala kukaBruce Bvuma kuvulele u-Akpeyi ithuba lokuzibonakalisa njengoba elibambe ngezandla zombili okufakazelwa ukuvimba iphenathi emdlalweni weligi lapho Amakhosi edlala ngokulingana neSupersport United ngesonto eledlule.  Ukunqoba kweChiefs kuqinisekise ukuthi iyayigcina indawo yayo esicongweni seligi njengoba isiyoze idlale uma kuphela ikhefu lemidlalo yamaqembu esizwe lapho izobhekana khona nePolokwane City ngoSepthemba 14.
title: UMiddendorp ucikwe abalandeli abagxeka u-Akpeyi

text: ZILOKHE zimlandele njalo izibusiso ukapteni wamaSpringboks uSiyamathanda Kolisi njengoba sekuvele izindaba zokuthi usesayine ngaphansi kwenkampani yaphesheya kwezilwandle iRoc Nation. Lezi zindaba ziputshuzwe uqweqwe lentatheli yezemidlalo uRobert Marawa ekhasini lakhe kuTwitter lapho aveze khona ukuthi uKolisi useLondon, eNgilandi, ukuyosayina amaphepha esivumelwano. UMarawa uveze ukuthi lezi zindaba uzihletshelwe nguMqondisi weRoc Nation International Sports Africa u-Isaac Lugudde-Katwe. UKolisi ubengakaphenduli ngalolu daba lokusayina kwiRoc Nation. Lezi zindaba zivela ngemuva kokuba ehole iNingizimu Africa iwina iNdebe yoMhlaba yebhola lombhoxo eJapan ekuqaleni kwenyanga. UKolisi ubeseNgilandi kuleli sonto, nokuyilapho evele khona ohlelweni lwezemidlalo iSky Sports News. IRoc Nation okuyinkampani eyengamele abadlali, iphethwe ngumacaphuna kusale wase-United States of America (USA) uShawn “Jay-Z” Carter ozakhele udumo njengomrepha. Lenkampani yasungulwa ngo-2013 ngokuhlanganyela neCreative Arts Agency.Lenkampani imele iningi labadlali be-baseball, american football, basketball kanye nabesibhakela. UVictor Cruz we-Baseball noKyrie Irving odlala iBasketball bangabanye abadlali abasayine ngaphansi kweRoc Nation. Kubadlali bebhola ebaphethe kubalwa kubo u-Eric Bailly weManchester United, Jerome Boateng okwiBayern Munich, Kevin De Bruyne weManchester City, Romelu Lukaku ogijima e-Italy ne-Inter Milan noSamuel Chukwueze odlalela iVillareal eSpain basayine ngaphansi kweRoc Nation.
title: Usesayine kwiRoc Nation kaJay Z uKolisi - Imibiko

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, akafuni ifakelwe ingcindezi yokuphakamisa indebe iBafana Bafana kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezoqala ngoJuni 21 kuya kuJulayi 19 e-Egypt.IBafana ephekwa uStuart Baxter iqhathwe kuGroup D neMorocco, Ivory Coast neNamibia kulo mqhudelwano okungokokuqala udlalwa amazwe awu-24.UMosimane, oke wapheka iBafana, uthe ngokwakhe iBafana kumele izihluphe ngokuya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2022 eQatar.Ngokubona kwakhe amazwe asenhla ne-Afrika yiwona ayizimfivilithi ngokuthi enze kahle emqhudelwaneni walo nyaka.“Ngicabanga ukuthi iMorocco, Egypt neTunisia bazokwenza kahle. NeDRC ngingayibala lapho ngingathanda ukubona umngani wami uFlorent (Ibenge) enza kahle. ISenegal nayo inethuba, * -Aliou Cisse unabadlali abahle kukhona noSadio Mane. Sikhuluma ngabagadli abavelele kwi-English Premier League. Ngicabanga ukuthi yilawo mazwe anethuba.“Angithandi ukuthi sifake iBafana ingcindezi. Ngicabanga ukuthi kumele yakhele iqembu elizoya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Ukuba khona kwethu (kwi-Afcon) kwanele. Kodwa ke uma beyiwina kuhle nalokho mhlawumbe bangenzisa okweLeicester kodwa asingabafakeli ingcindezi,” kusho uMosimane.ILeicester City imangaze abaningi inqoba isicoco se-English Premier League ngo-2015/2016.Lo mqeqeshi osenqobe izicoco ezine ze-Absa Premiership nesisodwa seCAF Champions League, uthe angathanda ukubuyela ekuqeqesheni iqembu lesizwe.“Nokho hhayi manje. Uma ngingakwenza lokho ngingathanda kube yizwe lami noma enhla ne-Afrika, ngicabanga ukuthi sengiyabaqonda. Kodwa okwamanje asiyekele uStuart enze umsebenzi wakhe,” kusho uMosimane.Nokho ubuye wakuveza lokhu asekuveze kaningi kokuthi ubona uBenni McCarthy engaba wumqeqeshi omuhle weBafana.“UBenni angaliqeqesha iqembu lesizwe. Indlela ayiyona ikhomba lokho. Udinga ukuzisondeza kumqeqeshi osenamava azofunda kuyena.”UMosimane uthe nokho yena akasiye umqeqeshi afuna uMcCarthy ancele kuyena.
title: Angithandi kufakwe iBafana ingcindezi: Mosimane

text: IZINYUNYANA nabaphathi baseDurban University of Technology (DUT) kulindeleke ukuthi babuyele etafuleni ngodaba lwesiteleka samaholo esesidonse amasonto ayisikhombisa.Lokhu kudalulwe yiphini likaNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme kuleli uMnuz Buti Manamela, ngemuva komhlangano abe nawo nezinyunyana ezisesitelekeni okuyiNehawu, iTenusa neNteu, abaphathi baseDUT nabebemele abakwaCCMA.UManamela uthe kulo mhlangano zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo zivumelene ngokuthi zizobuyela etafuleni.“Isitekela sabasebenzi kule nyuvesi sesisesontweni lesikhombisa manje. Ngenxa yaso kuphazamiseke ukufunda nokubhaliswa kwabafundi. Sivumelene ukuthi abafundi abaphazamisekile bazoqhubeka babhalise. Okukhathazayo ngalesi siteleka ukuthi bezingekho izingxoxo eziqhubekayo ngaso. Sivumelene ukuthi kuzolandelwa uhlaka esilwenzile uma sekuqhutshekwa nezingxoxo. Izinyunyana zinikezwe ithuba lokuthi ziyobikela amalungu azo ngokukhulunywe kulo mhlangano. Engikujabulelayo wukuthi bonke abathintekayo bayabona ukuthi kunesidingo sokuthi kubuyelwe etafuleni. Nginethemba lokuthi singase siphele isiteleka kuleli sonto,” kusho yena.Uthe awukho umlingo awenzile ukuze le mihlambi eyalanayo ivumelane ukuthi ibuyele etafuleni kodwa kube yisinqumo sabo bonke abathintekayo.“Lezi zingxoxo kumele zibe khona ngaphambi kokuthi kuphele isonto,” kusho uManamela.Abasebenzi bakulesi sikhungo bafuna ukunyuselwa amaholo ngo-8.5% umqashi uthi angakwazi ukubanika * -6.5%.UMqondisi Duma unobhala weSasco KwaZulu-Natal, uthe banethemba lokuthi ukufika kukaManamela kuzothela izithelo ezinhle.“Namanje sisamile ekutheni siyabeseka abasebenzi ngezimfuno zabo kodwa sikhathazekile ngokuthi ukuteleka kwabo kuholele ekutheni singafundi. Njengoba sekudlule isikhathi eside singafundi kuzofaka ingcindezi kithina uma sekumele senze umsebenzi omningi ngenxa yokuthi kube nesikhathi esilahlekile,” kusho yena.
title: Ithemba ngesiphetho sesiteleka eDUT

text: Mbali KhanyileBAHLALELE ovalweni abantu baKwaDabeka kwa-F emuva kokutholakala kwezidumbu ezimbili - esengane nesowesifazane - izolo ehlathini eliseduze komfula lapho kulahlwa khona imfucuza.Kuthiwa izidumbu sowesifazane nesengane yentombazane okusolwa ukuthi ngeyakhe, zitholwe ngabantu abebedlula ehlathini eliseduze komfula, uMngeni.Izidumbu kuthiwa bezifakwe epotimendeni ebelinamaphepha anemininingwane yokuthi bebebehlalaphi.Kuthiwa isidumbu sowesifazane besinendandatho emunweni wesobunxele, sigqoke ingubo emfishane yokulala, sinemivimbo ekhomba ukuthi ubekade eshayiwe. Isidumbu sengane sona kuthiwa besiklinywe ngentambo entanyeni.Amalungu omphakathi aficwe yithimba leSolezwe, athe kuwathusile okwenzekile.UMnuz Sphiwe Khumalo osehlale iminyaka engaphezu kwengu-15 endaweni, uthe bazizwa bengasaphephile nezingane zabo zamantombazane ngenxa yokuthi sekuyinto ejwayelekile ukutholakala kwezidumbu zilahliwe ehlathini abakhe eduze nalo.“Ngenyanga edlule kutholwe isidumbu somfana omncane esasilahlwe kuyo le ndawo. Izingane zethu zihamba khona kuleya ndawo uma ziya ezikoleni, ngakho-ke sizizwa singasaphephile nhlobo,” kusho uKhumalo.Umphakathi wakule ndawo uthe ufisa zithathelwe phezulu izimo ababhekana nazo ngoba seziningi izigigaba zokutholwa kwezidumbu endaweni.Omunye wezakhamuzi, uNksz Athini Maqholo, uthe isifiso sakhe wukuthi kungenelele iziphathimandla zomthetho ngoba amaphoyisa endawo ayadembesela uma kumele asize umphakathi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile okwenzekile.“Kuvulwe amacala amabili okubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaDabeka. Amaphoyisa ayaphenya,” kusho uCol Mbele.
title: Kutholwe izidumbu zabesifazane KwaDabeka

text: OSOMATEKISI bakwaMashu bavulele amaphoyisa kaMasipala eThekwini icala lokushaya emuva kokuthi ebafice begade umsebenzi erenki KwaMashu ngo-Ephreli 23 abathela induku.Bathe amaphoyisa abashaye emuva kokuthi kade ebabuze ukuthi yibo yini abamisa izimoto?Okwabamangaza wukuthi amaphoyisa afika esiteshini samaphoyisa avula icala lokuthi bebengenazo izimvume zokusebenza erenki.UMnuz Muzi Hadebe, okusoseshini waKwaMashu obuye asebenze ophikweni lukaSantaco oluqaphe ukusebenza kwamatekisi, uHlokomela, uthe izimvume banazo kodwa amaphoyisa afika abashaya abalalisa phansi ahamba phezu kwabo ngezinyawo engasho ukuthi abashayelani.“Izimvume ayezifuna esesilalise phansi esinyathela sawatshela ukuthi zisezimotweni, aqhubeka nokusishaya. Emuva kwalokho asiphuca okhiye bezimoto, saboshwa. Esikhundleni sokuthi siyovalelwa KwaMashu esiteshini samaphoyisa ahamba nathi ehla enyuka esigadlaza ngemoto,” kusho yena.UMnuz Thabo Mhlongo, omunye usomatekisi owayegade umsebenzi, uthe ngokwakhe kukhona amaphoyisa ayebashayela khona ngoba ukuba ayefuna izimvume ayezofike azozibuza kodwa awekwenzanga lokho abashaya kuqala.“Esiteshini asifaka esitokisini esasinabanye abantu mhlawumbe abala ku-30. Abeka impilo yethu engcupheni ngoba kuthiwa abantu kumele baqhelelane,” kusho uMhlongo.Uthe waquleka waphaphama esibhedlela esempontshwa igazi kuthiwa wophele ngaphakathi.“Asikwazi ukushaywa kanje singekho isizathu. Amaphoyisa sifuna asicacisele. Esiteshini samaphoyisa kamasipala KwaMashu kuthiwa awekho amaphoyisa ayebike ukuthi asebenza kule ndawo. Esitokisini sakhishwa ekuseni kwathiwa sidedelwa ngebheyili yamahhala, singavelanga enkantolo. Imali eyayisezimotweni elinganiselwa kuR30 000, yalahleka. Amaphoyisa abuyisa uR150,” kusho uMhlongo.UHadebe uthi namanje indlebe yakhe ayizwa kahle emuva kokushaywa.“Ukuvula icala nakho bekuyinkinga amaphoyisa eshona ngapha nangapha engafuni ukusivulela. Kuphele izinsuku eziningi singayitholi inombolo yecala kuthiwa izothunyelwa nge-SMS kodwa ingangeni. Njengamanje icala livulwe yimina kuphela abanye kwathiwa bazobhala izitatimende ngoba ngeke kuvulwe amacala amaningi ngodaba olulodwa, “ kusho uHadebe.USnr Superintendent Paboo Sewparsad wamaphoyisa akwamasipala, uthe akazi lutho kodwa akakholwa wukuthi amaphoyisa angashaya abantu ngaphandle kwesizathu.“Kuyenzeka ukuthi amaphoyisa abe sendaweni angasebenzeli kuyo kodwa ukushaywa kwabantu ngale ndlela okuchazwa ngayo angikholwa ukuthi kwenzeka kanjalo. Ngisazolulandela udaba ngithole ukuthi kwenzekani.”UCapt Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa kamasipala avulelwe icala lokushaya.
title: Osomatekisi bavulele amaphoyisa icala

text: INKAKHA yomculi kamaskandi uKhangelani ‘DSD’ Mhlongo, usethathe isinqumo sokungena emabhizinisini kanti uzovula isitolo esidayisa imifaniswano yabalandeli bakhe.UDSD uthe ubone kungumqondo omuhle ukuthi imifaniswano yabalandeli bakhe itholakale kuyena ngqo, kunokuthi abalandeli bazenzele.Uthe konke sekumi ngomumo ngokuvulwa kwesitolo.“Sengingakuqinisekisa ukuthi isitolo sizoqala ukudayisa imifaniswano yabalandeli bami ngenyanga ezayo. Ngokwezinhlelo zami isitolo sizoqala ukubakhona eGoli ngenyanga ezayo. Ngizoqhubeka nokwenza ezinye izinhlelo ngoba ngifuna sibekhona naKwaZulu-Natal. Ngaphandle kokuthi izimpahla zami zizotholakala esitolo sami, zizogcina sezitholakala nakwezinye izitolo ezidayisa impahla yokugqoka. Ngisaxoxisana nezitolo engizofaka kuzona impahla yami, futhi ngikholwa ukuthi ngenyanga ezayo kuzobe sekwaziwa ukuthi zizotholakala kuziphi,” kusho uDSD.Lo mculi uzishaya isifuba ngalesi sinyathelo futhi eveze ukuthi yonke into iqalwa nguyena kubaculi bakamaskandi bese beyamlandela abanye.Uthe njengeSilo somaskandi, kumele ahlahle indlela njengoba ehlala enza futhi uyazi ukuthi baningi abazobukela kuyena, bamlandele.Uthe akumphathi kabi lokho ngoba nguyena ofika nezinto ezehlukile emculweni kamaskandi bese eyalandelwa ngoba usuke enza okuhle.Emculweni uDSD uthe ayikho i-albhamu ayiphushayo njengamanje.“Ngizongena estudiyo maduze ngiyoqopha. Njengoba kuza uDisemba kuyaziwa ukuthi ngivamise ukukhipha i-albhamu yoSaziwayo. Angigudlukile kulokho, abalandeli bami abalindele ngoba iyeza,” kuqhuba yena.Amagalelo kaDSD emculweni enza ukuthi awine emunxeni weBest Maskandi kumaSatma nakumaLife Changers Awards.Ungumsunguli weqembu Osaziwayo alibumba ngokubambisana noJaiva Zimnike emva kokuhlakazeka kwaMagcokama, okwakuyiqembu elaliphethwe wuMgqumeni nayengaphansi kwalo.Useke wahlonishwa nangeziqu zobudokotela njengoba ebizwa ngoDkt Khangelani Mhlongo manje.
title: Okamaskandi uzovula isitolo semifaniswano yabalandeli

text: UMENGAMELIuMnuz Cyril Matamela Ramaphosa.URamaphosa uzalwe eSoweto ngoNovemba ngo-1952. Ungusopolitiki, usomabhizinisi futhi ungusozimboni osebenze eyiPhini likaMengameli ngaphansi kukaMengameli Jacob Zuma kusukela ngo-2014.Uke waba nguNobhala-jikelele wenyunyana iNational Union of Mine Workers (NUM), waphinde waba nguNobhala-jikelele we-ANC.Ufunde enyuvesi yaseLimpopo.* IPhini likaMengameliuMnuz David Dabede Mabuza.UMabuza uzalwe eMpumalanga ngo-1960. Ngaphambi kokuthi abe yiPhini likaMengameli we-ANC, ubenguSihlalo we-ANC eMpumalamga aphinde abenguNdunankulu wakhona kusukela ngo-2009. Usebe yilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC, iNational Excecutive Committe (NEC) kusukela ngo-2007.UMabuza odume ngo-DD oke waba nguNobhala woPhiko lwabafundi i-Azaso kusukela ngo-1984 kuya ku-1985, uke waba futhi uSihlalo wenyunyana yothisha i-South African Democratic Teachers’ Union ngo-1986, kuya ku-1988. Ngo-1989 kuya ku-1993, ubenguthishanhloko waseLungisani Secondary School.Uke wabamba izikhundla ezahlukene esiShayamthetho saseMpumalanga.Ufunde e-Unisa.* USihlalo kazwelonkeuMnuz Gwede MantasheUGwede uzalwa eCala, e-Eastern Cape ngo-1955.Uke waba nguSihlalo we-SACP, waba futhi nguNobhala-jikelele weNUM ngaphambi kokuthi abe nguNobhala- jikelele we-ANC.Ufunde eWits nase-Unisa.* UNobhala-jikeleleuMnuz Ace Magashule.UMagashule uzalwa eTumahole eFree State ngo-1959. Usebe nguNdunankulu waseFree State kusukela ngo-2009, evala indawo kaNksz Beatrice Marshoff.Usebe nguSihlalo we-ANC eFree State iminyaka engu 23. Ufunde eNyuvesi yaseFort Hare.* IPhini likaNobhala-jikeleleuNksz Jessie Duarte.UNkk Duarte uzalwe ngo-1953 wakhula eCoronationville ,eGoli. Uke waba ngumsizi kaDkt Nelson Mandela ngaphambi kokuthi abenguNgqongqoshe esiShayamthetho saseGoli.Uke waba yinxusa lakuleli eMozambique, waba nguMkhulumeli we-ANC ngaphambi kokuthi abe yiPhini likaNobhala-jikelele we-ANC.Umlando wakhe awuvezi ukuthi ufunde kuphi.* UMGCINIMAFA-jikeleleuMnuz Paul MashatileUMashatile uzalwa eGeraldsville, ePitoli, ngo-1961. Uke waba nguNgqongqoshe wamaCiko namaSiko ngaphambi kokuthi abuyele esiShayamthetho saseGoli njengoNgqongqoshe wezokuHlaliswa kwabantu.Akucaci ukuthi ufunde kuphi.UBUHOLI obuphezulu obusha be-ANC okunguNksz Jessie (kusuka kwesokunxele) Duarte oyiPhini likaNobhala Jikelele, uMnuz Ace Magashule onguNobhala Jikelele, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe onguSihlalo kazwelonke, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa onguMengameli we-ANC, uMnuz David Mabuza oyiPhini likaMengameli noMnuz Paul Mashatile onguMgcinimafa Isithombe: MOTSHWARI MOFOKENG/ANA
title: Konke odinga ukukwazi ngobuholi obusha obuphezulu kwi-ANC

text: BANINGI abangaba yizisulu zokugebengwa ngenxa yabakufaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Kuthiwa izigebengu sezibheka kuzona ukuthi abantu bakuphi nokuthi banani ukuze zibalandele. Umbiko wocwaningo iCybersecurity Insight muva nje uveze ukuthi bangu-67% abakuleli ababona sekunzima ukugcina imininingwane yabo iyimfihlo ngenxa yezinkundla zokuxhumana.UMnuz Davie Loots, oyiChief Executive Officer ye-MUA Insurance Acceptances, uthe ukufaka noma yini ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kungakudonsela amanzi ngomsele.“Izigebengu nazo seziyasizakala ngenxa yokuthuthuka kwezinga lobuchwepheshe. Imininingwane efakwa ngabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nakwi-internet yenza kube lula uma izigebengu zihlela ukuqola. Abantu abangajwayeli ukufaka imininingwane yokuthi bakuphi, benzani nokuthi banani ngoba bangazidonsela ubugebengu,” kusho uLoots.Akuzona izigebengu kuphela okuthiwa zisebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana ukubona ezingabagebenga kodwa nezinkampani zemishwalense. ULoots uthe ezinye izinkampani zibheka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana uma umuntu efake isicelo sokukhokhelwa. Isibonelo ngumuntu onomshwalense wemoto ojwayele ukufaka izithombe zakhe ephuzile. Uma sekwenzeke ingozi abomshwalense babuyela ekhasini lakhe babheke ukuthi ingozi ayidalwanga yini yindlela aziphatha ngayo.ULoots uthe izinkundla zokuxhumana sezifana nemephu kwabafuna ukwenza ubugebengu.“Enye i-website eyingozi ekaGoogle Street View. Iveza imigwaqo nengaphandle lendawo umuntu akuyona. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi noma ubani abone ukuthi indawo imi kanjani nokuthi iphephe kangakanani,” kuchaza uLoots.Wenza isibonelo ngokusanda kwehlela usaziwayo wase-USA uKim Kardashian owahlaselwa yizigebengu wathi kungenzeka ukuthi izinkundla zokuxhumana zaba nomthelela kulokho.Amathiphu okugwema ukuba yisisulu sobugebengu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana:Qinisekisa ukuthi unenombolo eyimfihlo oyisebenzisa kwiselula ongena ngayo kwi-internet.Ungasebenzisi izinombolo eziyimfihlo ezilula njengosuku lokuzalwa.Ungahlali nenombolo eyimfihlo isikhathi eside ungayishintshanga.Ungavezi izithombe zezinto zakho ezibizayo.Ungafaki imininingwane ebalulekile njengekheli lakho nenombolo yocingo.Ungavezi i-number plate yemoto yakho.Phuma uma usuqede ukusebenzisa inkundla yokuxhumana ukuze uma kulahleka iselula izimfihlo zakho zingabonakali.
title: Izinkundla zokuxhumana zingakuqhatha notsotsi

text:
SIZWE BLOSEUKUSHIYA kukaMinenhle “Minnie” Dlamini obengumethuli we
Mzansi Insider, kufane nesibusiso kumakadebona kwezokusakaza njengoba esezongena esikhaleni sale ntokazi ngemuva kwesikhathi eside engabonakali.UKedebone Mkhabela wazakhela udumo ngesikhathi esengumethuli wezinhlelo ku-SABC 1, kuthe kungaphela uhlelo lwabethuli bezinhlelo kulesi siteshi, wangena emculweni nakwezokusikwa kwengqephu.Waba yilungu leqembu i-Tyte elalinengoma ethi 
Tindzaba licula ngesiSwazi.Elandisa 
Isolezwe ngokunyamalala kwakhe uthe ubesafuna ukuthola ukuthi ungubani futhi ufunani empilweni.“Ngingene kule mboni ngimncane ngingazi lutho ngayo, yingakho ngithe angihlabe ikhefu kancane kuyona,” kusho uKedebone.Uthe ngesikhathi esekwithelevishini ubehlale enesifiso sokubuyela emphakathini wangakubo eMpumalanga yingakho aze wathatha isinqumo sokuthumela isicelo somsebenzi kwiGwalagwala FM.“Ngazitshela ukuthi ngeke ngihlale ngaphezulu kweminyaka emibili, nangempela kwathi kungahlangana iminyaka emibili ngacela abaphathi ukuthi bangidedele,” kuchaza uKedebone.Uveze ukuthi kumsebenzele kakhulu ukubuyela eNelspruit, eMpumalanga, ngoba kuningi akuzuzile ngokuhlangana nomphakathi wangakubo futhi kuningi nawo okuzuzile kuyena.Uthe ngeke amangale uma abantu sebakhohlwa nawukuthi uke walingisa emdlalweni owuchungechunge ku-SABC 2, i
Muvhango.
title: Ushaya ibuya kwiTV uKedebone

text:
I SIZINI ye-Absa Premiership iqale ngegiya elingajwayelekile elihambisana nemibono eshayisanayo ngebhola lakuleli – noma angithi ngabadlali abathile.Ngandlela thize udaba lwebhola elinomjiko selubuye lwaba ngundabamlonyeni. Alulusha, kuvuke nje inyama ogqokweni ngoba sekukhona abakuqondayo ukuthi ukuveza umbono ohlukile ngeke kwabafaka esikiti. Sekukhona asebembulelwe iqiniso ngokuthi yini enye yezimbangela zokucwila komkhumbi ngebhola lakithi yize imali isikhiwa ngamahalavu emaqenjini.Noma ngingenaso isiqiniseko sokuthi lokhu kuxokozela ngomjiko odansisa izitha kuqalephi kodwa ngiqaphelile ukuthi indaba ibe mandla ngesikhathi umdlali wasesiswini uSifiso Myeni (
osesithombeni) egenda futhi etayela ngebhola emdlalweni weCaf Confederation Cup phakathi kwe-Orlando Pirates ne-Club Sportif Sfaxien yase-Tunisia.Kusuke uthuthuva ngesikhathi abadlali baleli qembu laseTunisia bethi abamudle nezibi benengwa wukuthi kungani ebukisa kudlalwa. Ongqeqe abasuke bebekelwe ukuba bahlaziye umdlalo bajobelela ngemibono, iningi labo bebabaza ukugcwaneka kukaMyeni. Empeleni ngesikhathi ngibuka lesi sigameko mina ngikitazekile njengeningi labalandeli beZimnyama abebesenkundleni bechwaza.Bakhwele badilika-ke abayizifundiswa esezambathiswa imfundisoze bethi uma umdlali engenzi njengabathile, kusho ukuthi akanasikole. Igama elisetshenziswayo lesiNgisi lalokhu kutayela nomjiko ebholeni lithi “showboating”. Ngeke ngathi nginolwazi olujule kangakanani lolimi lwesiNgisi kodwa engalucosha lwanele ukuthi ngikwazi ukucela izinkobe zokuphila, okuyisizathu iningi lethu libhidilisha isiNgisi noma sisiphika. Ngokuqonda kwami igama elithi showboating lisetshenziswa nxashana kubukelwa phansi okwenziwa wumuntu. Lesi senzo sigilwa umuntu ongunontandakubukwa. Kuthiwa futhi uyakhomikha. Kwezinye izigigaba lo mkhuba wokukhomikha wenziwa yiziyingayinga ezingenayo into ezingayenza. Le ncanzelo inginika isithombe esithi labo abathi abadlali abanomjiko ebholeni njengoMyeni benza lokhu empeleni bembathisa inhlamba enenzondo.Ngisho indoda engiyethemba njengonondweba uSylvester Ndaba yehlulekile ukusho ukuthi cha ayilithandi ibhola lomjiko, yaqanganisa nangokuthi yona umdlali owenza nje ingamnika ikhadi eliphuzi. Angiqondanga-ke ukuthi ngaphansi kwamuphi umthetho njengoba uNdaba kuyindoda yemithetho.Ngimangele sekuphahluka nomqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, eveza ukunganambithisisi kwakhe umjiko kaMasibusane Zongo wePlatinum Stars ewubiza ngomdlalo ongenambuyiselo. Lena yinkilayitheka yokuphawula okuvela kumqeqeshi oqembu lakhe lehlulwe yinqwaba yamagoli. Kungcono kwa-Platinum leyo edlale ngokulingana kodwa ibinomdlali ojabulise abalandeli.Intatheli yezemidlalo uSibongiseni Gumbi ilubeka kahle lolu daba kuFacebook uma ithi: “Saqala ukulahlekelwa abalandeli (ezinkundleni) mhla silibala ukuthi ibhola umdlalo wokuthokozisa abantu”. USomkhanda amadoda akaNomo, uvala umbhalo wakhe ngokuthi jwaphu nje, hhayi ngoba ehlose uthuthuva. Owami umbono uthi uyihlabe esikhonkosini.Incithabuchopho kwezebhola engiyithatha njengomunye wososayensi osecwaninge kanzulu ngonobhutshuzwayo eNingizimu Afrika, uZipho Dlangalala, yena akalumi ephephetha nxa ejula ngale ndaba. Lokhu kuthukwa kwebhola elehlukile elishiya izitha zingolamthuthu enkundleni ukubiza ngesifo esaziwa nge-AFS, ngokugcwele i-Apartheid Football Syndrome. UNyamenja unameka isithombe esicace bha ngokuthi empeleni usiko lwama-Afrika luyinqabakutholwa ngoba kukho konke esikwenzayo siyasampula, sifake izithoyiso. Ibhola silithatha njengomdlalo wokufika kwelengabadi kodwa kwaba nombono wokuthi lo mdlalo awuthakwe ngomjiko ukuze kujabule abawubukayo. Kodwa abasunguli, ngokwenyanya indlu emnyama, bayichitha le ndlela ngoba ingahambisani nabo futhi ibehlula, usho kanje lo mqeqeshi owaziwa ngemibono ejulile ebholeni.UDlangalala uthi-ke yisifo i-AFS wukugxeka nokuphikisa indlela abadlali bomdabu kuleli abazizwa bekhululekile ngayo uma bedlala. Enaba, uthi iNingizimu Afrika inekhono elingandile emazweni adlala ibhola – lapha bonke abadlali badlala sengathi bagijima esiswini (midfielders). Uma kungukuthi ubeshaya umhlahlo uGalu ngalo mbono, ngiyavuma.UJomo Sono, inkosi yebhola kuleli, ithi abayekwe abadlali bajabulise abalandeli. Ngingabuye ngithini ngoba isiphingwe enkulu nxa sekukhulume inkosi!Mhlawumbe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi siqale sakhe umfanekiso owodwa omele ibhola lakuleli. Simandla ngani? Ngomjiko namakhono azishaya samilingo ebholeni? Asiqinise kulokho-ke, siyeke ukuphendula izingane zethu amarobhothi enkundleni.
title: Asiqinise kwesimandla kukho bo

text: KUHLEHLISWE ngezinyanga ezimbili ukuqulwa kwecala elibhekene noMnuz Duduzane Zuma, oyindodana yowayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma.UDuduzane ubhekene namacala amabili okubulala ngokungenhloso kulandela ingozi yemoto eyenzeka ngo-2014 lapho ashayisa khona itekisi kwashona uNksz Phumzile Dube endaweni yesigameko noNksz Nanki Jeanette Mashaba owashonela esibhedlela.Leli cala lihlehlisiwe ukuze abameli baZuma bathole isikhathi esanele ukucubungula ubufakazi obusenkantolo. Umshushisi wombuso, u-Adv Yusuf Baba, wazise inkantolo ukuthi abameli baZuma babanikeze ngoLwesihlanu odlule ubufakazi obusenkantolo.OWAYENGUMENGAMELI kuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngesikhathi ephelezela indodana yakhe, uDuduzane, enkantolo yeMantshi eRandburg ngoLwesine. Isithombe: Itumeleng English/African News Agency (ANA)Leli cala lizoqhubeka ngo-Okthoba 26.Khonamanjalo, ngoJulayi nonyaka uDuduzane udedelwe ngebheyili kaR100 000 ecaleni lomkhonyovu elahlehliselwa uJanuwari ngo-2019.Ubhekene necala elithinta ukugwazelwa kowayayeyiphini likaNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas, okuthiwa kwenzeka ngo-2016.
title: UZuma weseke uDuduzane evela enkantolo

text: BAYA enkantolo ngoJulayi 25 osomatekisi baKwaZulu-Natal ababopha uphiko loMnyango wezokuThutha olubizwa ngoShanela bethi luyabahlukumeza.UMnuz Bhekisisa BK Nzuza, okhulumela i-United Taxi Owners in KZN, uthe emuva kokuboshwa wuShanela ezindaweni ezehlukene zaKwaZulu-Natal, osomatekisi baye bahlangana bakhetha ukufaka udaba lwabo enkantolo.“Kunamatekisi ahamba ngaphandle kwama-disc ngenxa yokuthi uma eboshelwa ukuthi awanawo amaphemithi ushanela ukhipha ama-disc. Itekisi liyadedelwa ukuba lihambe kodwa umnikazi walo uyaphoqwa ukuthi akhokhe imali yokuthi belihleli ephawundini yize lingakaze lihlale kulo. Ubuye ahlawuliswe enye imali yokuthi imoto ibihamba ngaphandle kwephemithi,” kusho uNzuza.Uthe ngosuku uma imoto iphucwe i-disc umnikazi wayo uhlawuliswa uR200 wokuthi ibigciniwe.“Ummeli wethu wuMnuz Piet Jacobs wenkampani yabameli iJacobs & Partners. Uwubophile uShanela ngoba sesikhathele yiwona usuhlukumeza. Besisenkantolo yeMantshi yaseNewcastle ngoMsombuluko yathi asibuye ngo-Agasti 7 khona naboMnyango wezokuThutha bezoziphendulela. Kuzothi ngoJulayi 25 siye eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu. Siyacela nabanye osomatekisi abahlukunyezwa wuShanela baxhumane nathi ngoba uma sihlangene sizokwazi ukulwa nokuhlukunyezwa,” kusho uNzuza.UMnuz Mluleki Mntungwa obhekelele ezokuxhumana eMnyangweni wezokuThutha nokuPhepha koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uthe abaphawuli ngezindaba ezisuke zi­sezithebeni zenkantolo.
title: Osomatekisi baseKZN babopha uShanela

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEKUBANJWE umoya emaqenjini adlala ku-Absa Premiership ngesinqumo seZimbabean Football Association (Zifa) mayelana nomkhonyovu wokuphekwa kwemiphumela yeqembu lesizwe laseZimbabwe owaziwa ngele-Asiagate.Amaqembu ahlanganisa iMamelodi Sundowns, Kaizer Chiefs, Bidvest Wits, Black Leopards naMaZulu ukubala ambalwa asengcupheni yokulahlekelwa yizihlabani uma zilahlwa yicala ngalo mkhonyovu okulindeleke ukuthi isinqumo sakhona siphume namuhla.Obuye abe wukaputeni weSundowns uMethod Mwanjale nozakwabo uNyasha Mushekwi, umqeqeshi weLeopards uSunday Chidzambwa, Thomas Sweswe weWits noRamson Zhuawo woSuthu bayingxenye yabangase babhekwe yisambane sokuxoshwa unomphela ebholeni lomhlaba uma belahlwa yicala.Lolu daba oseluze lwangenelelwa yiFifa kulindeleke ukuthi kuphume isinqumo ngalo namuhla kwazise lo soseshini usuqede konke ngophenyo.Abadlali beZimbabwe kuthiwa babemukeliswa imali ukuze badedele amazwe ahlanganisa iThailand, Vietnam, Oman, Singapore, Malysia neJordan ukuthi abahlule phakathi kuka-2007 no-2009.Baningi abanye abadlali abathintekayo kulo mkhonyovu abadlalela amaqembu aseNingizimu Afrika.Omunye umdlali othintekayo kulo mkhonyovu uMatthew Rusike osanda kusayina kuChiefs evela kuJomo Cosmos. Lo mdlali udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala egqoke ijezi leZimpofana ngesikhathi zishaywa ngo 4-3 yiBloemfontein Celtic kuMacufe Cup eFree State Stadium, ngeSonto.
title: Kubanjwe umoya ngolwe-Asiagate

text: IZINSIZWA ebezicabanga ukuthi zisengabeka amabil noma amathathu kumsakazi woKhozi FM, uSthandwa Nzuza, kumele zikhohlwe ngoba usethenjiswe umshado.USthandwa (33) ushayela Ikhwezi loKhozi ngo-2 kuya ku-4 ngoLwesihlanu entathakusa, iBhampa 2 Bhampa ngo-8 kuya ku-11 ebusuku ngoLwesihlanu aphinde abuye ngoMgqibelo ngo-12.30 nohlelo Ukhozi FM Top 20.USthandwa uthenjiswe umshado emcimbini obungeSonto eThekwini. Umsunguli wamaCrown Gospel Music Awards, uZanele Mbokazi, ufake isithombe sakhe noSthandwa besemcimbini ku-Instagram wathi ubefanele azozibonela umcimbi kaSthandwa ethembisana umshado nomngani wakhe.NoSthandwa izolo ekuseni ufake isithombe sakhe ekhasini lakhe le-Instagram. Ucaphune umbhalo weBhayibheli encwadini yeZaga 18:22 othi: “Ofumana umfazi uthola okuhle.”Uthe uyinto enhle kwathandana naye.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe ngeke amdalalule umuntu athandana naye ngoba ubudlelwano babo buyimfihlo.“Ngithathiwe," kusho uSthandwa.“Ngeke ngiphawule kakhulu. Angikaze ngimfake nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ngizifaka mina.”Kuthiwa umyeni kaSthandwa ungumuntu okholwayo kakhulu. Ezinyangeni ezedlule uSthandwa ubonakale elokhu efaka izithombe nama-video esenkonzweni. Akucaci ukuthi nguyena yini uyise wendodakazi yakhe, uHlelo, oneminyaka emibili.USthandwa kwake kwabikwa ukuthi uyingoduso kaMartin Vilakazi, owayengumphathi weMetro FM.USthandwa, odlala indawo ka-Innocentia oshadele esithenjini kuZalo, ngenyanga eyedlule utshele Isolezwe ukuthi akasicabangi isithembu.“Kumele ube nami noma uhambe. Ngisho ngikhuleka angisikhulekeli isithembu kodwa ngikhulekela umshado nomuntu oyedwa. UNkulunkulu uzongiphendula maduze.”
title: UyiSthandwa somuntu ngokomthetho

text: BAKHALA ngomphathi wesifazane obapotozayo aphinde abacele ucansi abesilisa abasebenzela inkontileka ezinze, eWyebank, ngasePinetown entshonalanga yeTheku.Laba besilisa basola uNksz Vuyelwa Mbotho, ngokubaheha ngocansi ngezindlela ezahlukene. Omunye wabantu abathi banqaba baphetha lo wesifazane emfuna ucansi, uMnuz Joseph Mshushusi (44) othi uphenduke isitha kulo mphathi ngemuva kwalokho. “Ngiqale ukusebenza nyakenye sifaka amapayipi amanzi. Lo sisi ukusebenzisa kanzima afune ukulala nawe. Uma uke wanqaba afune ukukuxoshisa emsebenzini. Ngenyanga edlule sahola imali engaphelele sakhononda kuye. Sayithola, sithe sesibuya sizosebenza wasitshela ukuthi sewuphelile umsebenzi sekuqashwe abantu abasha. Siyabona ukuthi ukhethe thina sodwa. Yingakho sifuna usizo ngoba uzoqhubeka nokwenza ukukhohlakala."UMshushisi uthi yena nabanye ozakwabo abathathu athole ukuthi bahlukunyezwa nabo, bagcine bexoshiwe kodwa kungacaci ukuthi yini isizathu.UMnuz Sanele Mkhize naye okhala ngezinsolo ezifanayo ngoNksz Mbotho uveze ukuthi kusukela ngoFebhuwari ubelokhu emdlalisa ngezinto eziphathelene nocansi ambuze nokuthi akafisi yini ukuzitika ngaye. “Wangithumelela umqhafazo ekhuluma ngezothando ngamziba. Ubelokhu eyenza le nto ngingamnaki, wathi esuka wathi angimboni yini ukuthi upakishe kanjani. Ubesehlala ethi iqolo lisanyakaza amakhehla ayavilapha. Ubesehlala engihlupha ethi angimnaki. Ngelinye ilanga wangithumelela uWhatsApp ngamziba, ngathi ngifika emsebenzi wayesengidinelwe engithethisa ebuza ukuthi angimphendulanga ngani."UNksz Mbotho evakashelwe yileli phephandaba uzihlangulile kulezi zinsolo.Uthe yena unendoda yakhe futhi akekho umuntu amhalelayo kulaba abamsola ngalokhu. “Banikezwa isaziso ngomhla ka-5 ngokuphela komsebenzi. Nginendoda nabantwana abawu-5 nabazukulu. Ngizwile ngoLwesithathu ukuthi uMshushisi uhamba engihlambalaza,” kusho uNksz Mbotho ophazanyiswe umnikazi wenkampani esaqhubeka nokuchaza.Lo mphathi wakhe umyalele ukuthi angakhulumi naleli phephandaba wasabisa nangokuthi uzokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuvala lolu daba.UMnuz Khumbuzile Fola naye ukhala ezimathonsi njengoba etshele leli phephandaba ukuthi wagcina emlingile waze walala naye. “Ngezwa sengibizwa omakhelwane bethi ungilinde endlini. Ngangifelwe yi-globe kagesi wangipha uR100 wathi angiyithenge, ngathi ngisagibela ebhakedeni wangenzela imikhuba wangibamba sagcina silala ngaleyo ndlela. Emuva kwalokho ubesehlala efuna ngenkani efuna nokuza endlini yami. Ugcine esethi angixoshise abantu emsebenzini, nganqaba ngaze ngagula. Ngaxoshwa ngisahamba icala naye angicindezela kulo ekubeni zikhona izincwadi zodokotela."Uthi kwase kucacile ukuthi lo wesifazane usedinwe wukungaqhubeki kokuncinzana kwabo ngocansi.Leli phephandaba liphinde lathola ukuthi laba balisa sebeyasongelwa ngokuphumela obala kwabo.Bathi yize bazi ukuthi lo wesifazane bangamvulela icala ngokubahlukumeza ngokocansi, kodwa njengamadoda ngeke basukunyelwe futhi bazohlekwa ngalokhu.
title: Abesilisa bakhala ngomphathi obacela ucansi aze abapotoze

text: SAMUKELWE ngo-elethu isinyathelo sikaNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube sokuxhasa abalimi abasafufusa, abatshala insangu ezosetshenziselwa ukwelapha, ngenhloso yokufukula umnotho namathuba emisebenzi.Lezi zindaba zivezwe nguNkk Dube-Ncube ekhuluma engqungqutheleni ngezensangu, iCannabis Investment Protocol, ebise-ICC, eThekwini, ngoLwesithathu.NgokweMoses Kotane Institute, kungabiza umlimi osafufusa imali elinganiselwa kuR23 000 ukuthola ilayisensi yokukhiqiza insangu. Ilayisensi iyingxenye yezinye izimfunno okubalwa kuzo ukuba nomhlaba obuyiliwe, ugesi wokukhanyisa, kanye nemvume evela kumnyango wezeMpilo. Ethula inkulumo phambi kwezihambeli engqungqutheleni uNkk Dube-Ncube uthe: “Sikholelwa wukuthi maningi amathuba okusebenzisa insangu ukuze ithuthukise imboni yezolimo neminye imikhakha. Ucwaningo luveza ukuthi imboni yensangu ingenza inzuzo enguR100 billion. I-United Nations ikholwa ngukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ikhiqiza u-2 300 wamathani ensangu ngonyaka, okuyenza ilale isithathu emhlabeni emazweni akhiqiza insangu.”Uthe iKZN yiyona esethubeni lokukhiqiza insangu eningi ngenxa yesimo sezulu esivuna ukukhula kwensangu kalula, uma iqhathaniswa namanye amazwe aphesheya, ikakhulukazi e-Europe.“Siwuhulumeni kasifuni ukuthi abantu basemiphakathini yethu abebevele beyitshala insangu bavaleleke ngaphandle. Sisizogxila ezindaweni ezisemakhaya ngoba zinomlando omude wokutshala nokusebenzisa insangu, yize bebekwenza ngokungemthetho. Njengoba uhulumeni esevula amathuba, kasifuni abantu basale ngaphandle,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Uthe bayazi ukuthi kunezinhlangano ezikhokhisa abantu ukuze zisabalalise ulwazi ngemboni yensangu.Uthe bewumnyango basazoqhubeka nezinhlelo zamahhala zokusabalalisa ulwazi ngale mboni.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe izigidi zamathuba emisebenzi azodaleka ngokutshalwa kwensangu.EMorocco kuthiwa angaphezu kuka-200 000 amathuba emisebenzi, adalwe ibhizinisi lensangu.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe abalimi kuzomele babe nemvume esemthethweni futhi konke kwenziwe ngokulandelwa komthetho.Uthe iminyango kahulumeni izosebenzisana kulolu hlelo njengoba uMnyango wezoLimo esifundazweni kulindeleke ukuthi uxhase ngocingo lokubiya emasimini ensangu.USihlalo we-EFF eKZN, uMnuz Vusi Khoza, uthe bayaseseka isinyathelo sikangqongqoshe futhi kumele abatshali bensangu baxhaswe ngomhlaba nangezinsiza zokusebenza.UKhoza uthe umhlaba nensangu kakubuyele kubanikazi bawo, okungabamnyama.“Akungalokhu kuthiwa abantu batshala insangu ngenxa yezempilo ngoba ibivele isetshenziswa endulo. Abantu kabanikwe izinsiza futhi bavulelwe ithuba, bayifake ezimakethe. Kwasiphatha kabi ukuthi emuva kokugunyazwa kwensangu ukuthi ibe semthethweni, kwanikwa ilayisense yokuhweba ngensangu inkampani yabamhlophe ekubeni bekhona abantu abamnyama,” kusho uKhoza.Uthe kumele ngabe kade baxhaswa ngomhlaba abatshali bensangu abamnyama.USihlalo kazwelonke we-IFP, uMnuz Blesssed Gwala, uthe bayasamukela isinyathelo sikangqongqoshe.“I-IFP yiyona eyafaka umthethosivivinywa mayelana nensangu, ithi ayisetshenziselwe ukwelapha. Kodwa esikushoyo wukuthi konke okwenziwayo kumele kulandelwe umthetho,” kusho uGwala.Umholi weDA eKZN, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthe iqiniso lithi umthunzi wezinkukhu ususemthethweni manje.“Kodwa nakhona konke okwenziwayo kumele kulandelwe umthetho. Siyasiseka impela isinyathelo sikangqongqoshe, yonke into eza namasu okufukula umnotho nokudala amathuba emisebenzi idinga ukwesekwa,” kusho uMncwango.Uthe akangabazi ukuthi imboni yezensangu izodala izigidi zamathuba emisebenzi.Okhulumela i-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu uthe bayameseka ungqongqoshe nesinyathelo sakhe.“Yize simeseka kodwa kumele kuqikelelwe ukuthi abantu abasha kabazimbandakanyi nensangu ngezindlela ezimbi, njengokuyibhema,” kusho uMthembu.Uthe kabangabazi ukuthi insangu izowufukula umnotho.
title: Kubiza uR23 000 ukuthola ilayisensi yokutshala insangu

text: KUBOSHWE iphoyisa eliwu-Warrant Officer (51) okusolwa ukuthi lithinteka emacaleni okubulala abantu abayisithupha eMpumalanga, eHammarsdale, ngonyaka odlule.Iphoyisa liboshwe ngoLwesihlanu eGoli emuva kophenyo olunzulu.Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, Lieutenant General Khombinkosi Jula, usekushayele ihlombe ukuboshwa kwephoyisa ebelifunwa mayelana nesehlakalo sangoDisemba 11.“Abaseshi be-Provincial Organised Crime Unit beholwa nguBrigadier Teboho Mbele kade belandela umkhondo izinyanga ezimbili. Noma behlangabezane nezingqinamba eziningana kepha bagcine bephumelele. Sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bonke abenzi bobubi bayabhekana namacala,” kusho uJula.Iphoyisa kulindeleke ukuthi livele enkantolo yemantshi eMpumalanga namhlanje nomunye asolwa naye uMnuz Buhlebakhe Khomo (29), yena owaboshwa ngo-Januwari 2.NgoDisemba 11 nyakenye, umndeni owawuhleli ekhaya lawo e-Unit 3 eMpumalanga ubuka ithelevishini wezwa ukuqhuma kwesibhamu kuvela esicabheni nasemawindini. Kwafa abantu abayisithupha abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-11 no-52 endaweni yesehlo.Umfana oneminyaka emithathu walimala emva kokudubuleka onyaweni kodwa wasinda. Kwavulwa amacala okubulala nawokuzama ukubulala esiteshini saseMpumalanga, idokodo ladluliselwa ophikweni oluphenya ngamacala ahleliwe esifundazweni ukuze kube yiwo aphenyayo.Ngenyanga edlule kubulawe usomatekisi waseShongweni Dam okuthiwa wadutshulwa amaphoyisa ayefike emzini wakhe efuna omunye okuthiwa wayesolwa ecaleni lokubulawa kwabantu abayisithupha.
title: Kuboshwe iphoyisa ngokufa kwabawu-6 eHammarsdale

text:
INGENA ilekanyana imyalezo yokumfisela ukululama ngokushesha usaziwayo wokuzivocavoca, uSbahle Mpisane, olimale engozini enyantisa igazi emgwaqeni uMargaret Mncadi Avenue, eThekwini, ezintatha zanamuhla.USbahle ubehamba ngonyanyavu lwemoto iBMW M4 eyisilahla kanti abezimo eziphuthumayo bathe le moto ishayise isigxobo esiseceleni komgwaqo.Kubikwa ukuthi uSbahle uphuthunyiswe eSt Augustines Hospital esesimeni esibucayi.Okhulumela iRescueCare, uMnuz Garrith Jamieson uthe abezimo eziphuthumayo balaphe owesifazane obesesimeni esibucayi ngemuva kwengozi kuMargaret Mncadi Avenue (Victoria Embankment).Uthe lo wesifazane welashelwe endaweni yesigameko ngaphambi kokuphunthunyiswa esibhedlela.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula emndenini wakwaMpisana ayiphumelelanga.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu bebefisela le ntokazi ethandana nokapteni weKaizer Chiefs, u-Itumeleng Khune, ukuthi ilulame ngokushesha.In other news..

title: USbahle Mpisane engozini yemoto enyantisa igazi

text: AMAPHOYISA aKwaZulu-Natal abophe abantu abangu- 226 ashaqa izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni ezingu-205 nezinhlamvu ezingu-1 534 ngesikhathi enemikhankaso ehlukene yokulwa nobugebengu ngo-Agasti.Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelwe kwabezindaba, okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kulezi zibhamu ezishaqwe ngamaphoyisa kukhona izibhamu ezincane ezingu 171, ama-shotgun angu-12 nama-rifle angu-10.“Kulandela ukwethulwa ngokusemthethweni komkhankaso wokuletha uzinzo ezifundazweni, sibheke kakhulu imikhankaso okuhloswe ngayo ukususa izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni emphakathini.“Ukwehlisa isibalo sezibhamu ezisemphakathini kwethu kuzosiza ngokuthi kwehle ubugebengu obubucayi obubikwayo esifundazweni sethu,” kusho uCol Mbele.Lezi zibhamu kuthiwa bezisetshenziswa ezimpini zombango, udlame lwamatekisi, ukubanjwa kwenkunzi kuhlonyiwe nokwebiwa kwemfuyo.Amaphoyisa ancome amalungu omphakathi alekelele amaphoyisa ngokuthi awabikele ngabantu abebenezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu.Aphinde anxusa ukuthi bangaphezi ukubambisana namaphoyisa ngokuletha ulwazi olungasiza ngokuthi kususwe izibhamu emphakathini. Abafisa ukunika amaphoyisa ulwazi ngobugebengu kodwa bangavezwa bangashayela inombolo yeCrime Stop ethi: 08600 10111.
title: Usebenzile umkhankaso  wokulwa nobugebengu

text: ULaduma Ngxokolo othunga izimpahla ezaziwa ngaMaXhosa, uSindiso Khumalo noRina Chunga weRi.Ch Factory bakhethwe ukuthi bathunge le misiko.Imisiko yiyona okuzobe kuqhakanjiswa ngayo lo mcimbi okulindeleke ukuthi ube seGreyville, eThekwini ngoJulayi 6.Lezi zimpahla zizokhonjiswa emcimbini ozobe uhanjelwe wosaziwayo emikhakheni ehlukene, osomabhizinisi nabantu abathanda ubumnandi.UMaXhosa uveze uthe ujabule ukuba yingxenye yalo mcimbi walo nyaka.“Okungijabulisa kakhulu ukuthi ngibe yingxenye yabasiki bengqephu abazochaza kabanzi ngesiqubulo salo nyaka,” kusho uMaXhosa kwiTwitter.URina Chunga uthe akangabazi ukuthi uzoba nesikhathi esimnandi uma sebeqala ukusebenza kulo mkhankaso.“Umsiko wokuqala usuphumile. Sesilinde ukuqala eminye. Ngijabule kakhulu ukusebenza neVodacom Red kulo nyaka okuyiyona ebhekele indaba yemfashini kulo mcimbi,” kuchaza uRina.Umsiki wengqephu, uDavid Tlale wuyena owanikwa lo msebenzi ngonyaka odlule. Isiqubulo sangonyaka odlule sasihambisana nombala obomvu.Iningi losaziwayo elalikhona laligqoke izingubo ezinombala obomvu, kwayena uDavid wayefake ibhantshi elibomvu elinemibala emnyama.
title: Kujutshwe abavelele ngendikimba yeVodacom July

text: ABE-MARITZBURG United baphokophelele ukujabulisa abalandeli babo ngokuqhubeka nokunqoba ekhaya ngemuva kokudla abakhaya AmaZulu FC ngo 2-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngempelasonto.AmaZulu aguqe ngamagoli kaBandile Shandu noSiphesihle Ndlovu. UNdlovu uqokwe njengomdlali ovelele kwiPremiership kaJanuwari izolo.Siphawula kwithelevishini ngemuva komdlalo isitobha seTeam of Choice uSiyanda Xulu, sibalule ukubaluleka kokunqoba imidlalo yasekhaya. Sikusho lokhu ngemuva kokuhlulwa wukunqoba emidlalweni edlule yeligi abayigijime ekhaya. Bashaywe yiSuperSport United babelana ngamaphuzu neChippa United.“Kuhlezi kumnandi ukudlala eHarry Gwala Stadium. Sibakweleta ibhola elihle nokuwina abalandeli ngoba isikhathi esiningi sinqoba ekuhambeni,” kusho uXulu.I-Team of Choice ihlezi endaweni yesihlanu kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-31. Lokhu kuyibeka ethubeni elihle lokuqeda kwiTop 8 amasizini amabili elandelana.“Sinezifiso zethu okuwukuqeda kwiTop 8 kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi kumele sizifake ingcindezi njengoba sineqembu elinabadlali abasebancane. Okwethu ukubhekana nomdlalo ngamunye,” kusho uXulu.Umdlalo olandelayo we-United uzophinde ube sekhaya ivakashelwe yiPlatinum Stars ngoLwesihlanu ngo-8 ebusuku.Umqeqeshi uFadlu Davids uthe maningi amaphutha abawenzile emdlalweni waMaZulu okumele bawalungise. Ubalule ukuhluleka wukusebenzisa amathuba abebewakha.“Kumele sigcine indlela esidlala ngayo singayidedeli. Kuningi okumele kulungiswe njengoba besebancane labadlali. Angibhekile ukuthi sihlezi kuphi kodwa okumqoka wukuthi sisawubambile umgqigqo obheke ekuzuzeni iTop 8 okuyiyonanto esizibekele yona,” kusho uDavids.Unxuse abalandeli wathi bangadikibali baqhubeke nokubeseka kuze kupheleisizini.“Konke esikwenzayo sikwenzela bona (abalandeli). Abadlali bayabadinga abantu abazobakhuthaza. Siyaziqhenya ngabo bahlezi benathi siwina, sihlulwa noma sidlala ngokulingana.”Eminye imidlalo yasekhaya yeMaritzburg owePolokwane City, Cape Town City, Mamelodi Sundowns bese ivala isizini neLamontville Golden Arrows.
title: 'Abalandeli bethu sibakweleta ibhola elihle'

text: SIZONYUKA isibalo sabantu abayizicukuthwane abazomumathwa yiMax’s Lifestyle, eMlaza, uma isiqediwe ukunwetshwa.Lokhu kudalulwe ngumnikazi wendawo, uMax Mqadi, izolo emini.“Phambilini bekungena amaVIP awu-750 kodwa manje isizothatha awu-1 500. Ngaphezu kwalokho sakhe amathoyilethi amasha ayisithupha, okusho ukuthi asewu-12. Ngezansi asewu-16 ngoba abaluleke kakhulu kumakhasimende,” kusho uMax.Uthe indawo entsha phezulu izobizwa ngokuthi yiseMzumbe kuthi ezansi kube yiseMzimkhulu.“NgingowasoGwini oluseningizimu. Ngesikhathi ngiza eThekwini ngawela umfula uMzimkhulu. EMzimkhulu yisekhaya elikhulu futhi abantu bebevele bekubiza kanjalo lapha. Ngesitsotsi eMzimkhulu yisebhange.”UMax uthe kubalulekile ukuhlala uthuthukisa ibhizinisi ukuze lihlale liheha amakhasimende.Ngesikhathi ithimba leSolezwe likhona abasebenzi bebematasa belungisa okokugcina endaweni ephezulu. Ngezansi bekusafakwa amapulangwe athe kuzoshaya uLwesine sekuphothuliwe.“Kuzobe sekusele lapha nalapha izinto abantu abangeke bazibone. Ngempelasonto yeDurban July kuzobe kuvuliwe bese kuthi ngemuva kwayo siqedele kahle. Indawo sizoyivula kahle kabusha ngokusemthethweni ekupheleni kukaJulayi noma ngo-Agasti lapho sizomema khona izicukuthwane.”Udalule uhla lwabazonandisa ngemicimbi abazoyenza ngempelasonto ezayo, okuyimpelasonto yeVodacom Durban July.NgoLwesihlanu bazoba ne-pre-party okuzonandisa kuyo uSjava, WTF, Kwesta, Fistaz Mixwell, Mobi Dixon, Merlon nabanye abaningi.NgeSonto kuneDurban July Wrap Up Party okuzoba ngokuka-11 ikhona. Kuboshelwe uDJ Tira, Tipcee, Distruction Boyz, Dladla Mshunqisi, Babes Wodumo, KO, Professor, Somizi nabanye.“Ukuqeda iminyaka ewu-11 kusho lukhulu. Amathikithi azotholakala esangweni.”
title: IMax's Lifestyle izoba nama-VIP amaningi

text: UQOPHE umlando udokotela owakhula elusa izinkomo, osebe ngowesifazane omnyama wokuqala ukuba yiCardiothoracic Surgeon. UDkt Lindiwe Sidali (35), osebenza esibhedlela eNkosi Albert Luthuli Central eThekwini, ungomunye wodokotela abambalwa abelapha izifo ezihlobene nenhliziyo namaphaphu e-Afrika. Uthe akubanga lula ukufika kuleli zinga njengoba eke waba yedwa kodokotela abebeqeqeshwa kulo mkhakha.UDkt Sidali, oseneminyaka eyishumi engudokotela, wafunda eCuba waqedela ukufundela ukuba yiCardiothoracic Surgeon e-University of KwaZulu-Natal.Uthe kumenza athobe ukuthi nguye yedwa ongowesifazane kulo mkhakha okusakhonya kuwo abesilisa.“Indlela ibinzima futhi inezinselelo kodwa kuningi engikufundile. Bengingeke ngiphumelele ukuba bebengekho abantu abebengiseka ngisho sekunzima,” kuchaza yena.UDkt Sidali wakhulela emndenini wezingane eziyisishiyagalombili, eDutywa e-Eastern Cape, wabuye wakhulela eNorth West lapho uyise ayesebenza khona ezimayini.“Ngaqeda * -matric eRakgatla High eWonderkop ngase ngithola umfundaze eMnyangweni wezeMpilo eNorth West ngayofunda eCuba. Abazali bami bebekholelwa ekunikeni abesifazane amathuba bekholwa wukuthi intombazane kumele izimele. Sakhuliswa ngokufana nabafowethu nabo befundiswa ukupheka nami ngafundiswa ukwelusa izinkomo,” kusho yena.Echaza ngomsebenzi wakhe kulo mkhakha uthe usiza iziguli ezinezifo ezithinta inhliziyo, amaphaphu nezinye izitho ezingaphakathi. Uthe lezi ziguli zisuke zidinga ukwelashwa okuyisipesheli kwesinye isikhathi kudingeka zihlinzwe. Wakhuthazwa othisha bakhe nomndeni ukuthi abe ngudokotela wavolontiya emtholampilo wangakubo eWonderkop ngo-2000 kuya ku-2001.“Ngangifuna ukubona ukuthi umsebenzi engingakwazi yini ukuwenza lo. Onesi emtholampilo bangikhuthaza bathi angifundele ubudokotela ngezwa nangohlelo lwaseCuba. Bengifuna nami ukuba isibonelo emphakathini ngoba ngiyathanda nokusiza abantu.”UDkt Sidali uthe izifo zenhliziyo ziyinkinga wanxusa abantu ukuthi bazinakekele. Uthe ukudla ngendlela efanele nokuzivocavoca kungabanciphisela umthwalo bengodokotela kulo mkhakha. Uveze nokuthi abantu kumele bajwayele ukuzihlola izifo ezihlobene nenhliziyo.Ebuzwa ngokushoda kwabesifazane kulo mkhakha uthe yingoba kusanemigoqo evimbile. Ulinganise ngokungabi nomengameli wesifazane kuleli wathi abesifazane abakanikezwa ngokwanele amathuba futhi abasekwa uma behluleka.“Sidinga ukuba nabesifazane abaningi abazoba yisibonelo ezinganeni zamatombazane emphakathini. Lokhu kungenzeka uma abesifazane bevulelwa amathuba futhi basekwe ngokulinganayo nabesilisa,” kusho yena.Uma engekho emsebenzini uDkt Sidali uthanda ukubhala izindaba zothando athe usazibhalela abangani kuphela. Uzimisele nokuqhubeka nezifundo zakhe emkhakheni weCongenital Cardiac Surgery.
title: Uqophe umlando udokotela owakhula elusa

text: UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe ngamampunge ukuthi njengoba sebeqale uhlelo lokubahlolela emakhaya abantu igciwane iCorona bahlose ukubathelela.Ethula inkulumo yakhe ebandleni lamaRoma eliseduze nemijondolo yakwaJika Joe eMgungundlovu izolo, ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni KwaZulu-Natal uhlelo lokuhlola abantu emakhaya iCorona, uZikalala uthe inhloso yalolu hlelo oluzoqhutshwa ibutho lamadelakufa ukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane.“Ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezedlule, sibone ama-video abesezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapho abantu bebethi lolu hlelo luhambisana nokuthi abantu bafakwe igciwane, siyafuna ukunika isiqinisekiso sithi olwethu uhlelo singuhulumeni lucacile, lumayelana nokuvikela abantu nokuthi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi abanaleli gciwane belashwa ngendlela,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe bayazi ukuthi nezigebengu zizozama ukuthi zigamanxe kulolu hlelo ukuze zigile imikhuba emiphakathini.“Ikhona imifaniswano ezogqokwa ngabantu abazobe behlola abantu emakhaya futhi bazobe behambisana nabahlengikazi, njalo uma kuhlolwa abantu kuzoqale kumenyezelwe emphakathini,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe bazophinde bamemezele nasemisakazweni ukuthi uhlelo luzoba kuphi ngasiphi isikhathi.“Ngakhoke sithi asingavumeli noma ngubani angene emakhaya ethu kodwa labo abavela kulolu hlelo kumele sibaphathe ngendlela siwumphakathi, ngiyafuna futhi ukugcizelela ukuthi lolu hlelo sizolwenza sibambisane nezinhlaka zika-Operation Sukuma Sakhe, umuntu oyofika engahambisani nobuholi be-ward uzobe engesiyo ingxenye yohlelo,” kusho uZikalala.KULINDELEKE ukuthi bagqoke kanje abantu abazolihlolela emakhaya igciwane liCorona, kwesobunxele uNkk Noluthando Nkosi, uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu nesikhulu eMnyangweni wezeMpilo eMgungundlovu uNkk Sindiswa Mbambo ngesikhathi kuqhutshwa uhlelo lokuhlolwa a kwabantu igciwane lakwaJika Joe eMgungundlovu izoloUZikalala ukhuluma kanje, kwezinye izindawo abasebenzi balolu hlelo bathwale kanzima besasazelwa ngezinja ngabantu abebengafuni bangene ezindlini ngoba bezwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuthiwa bazothelelwa ngegciwane.Uthe bahlose ukuthi leli thimba lingene emizini engu-139, njalo ngosuku.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe balindele ukuthi sikhule isibalo sabantu okuzotholakala ukuthi banaleli gciwane njengoba sebeqala uhlelo lokuhlola abantu.UNkk Simelane-Zulu uthe KwaZulu-Natal bangu-519, abanegciwane bangu-18, asebeshonile.Uthe balindele umbiko njengoba kunophenyo ngezibhedlela ezimbili ezizimele okuyiSt Augustine neKingsway ezivaliwe okwesikhashana emva kokuba nezibalo eziphezulu zabantu abaneCorona.“Sizolindela umbiko ukuthi uthini, iwona ozosho ukuthi yiziphi izinyathelo okumele zithathwe,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Ngesikhathi kuqhutshwa uhlelo, abantu abaningi bakwaJika Joe bakhale ngendlala nokuthi kukhethwa iphela emasini uma kukhishwa izijumbane zokudla.UZikalala uthembise ukuthi bazoziphenya lezi zinsolo.
title: Uchitha imibiko ngokuhlolwa kwabantu iCorona

text:
ISIQEPHU sohlelo lwakuMzansi Magic Utatakho esikhonjiwe kuleli sonto sibe ngesihlasimulisa umzimba ngendlela exakile.Siveze ngokusobala ukuthi noma iqiniso libuhlungu kodwa libalulekile kumuntu osuke ebhalele abalolu hlelo.Kulokhu ithimba likaTatakho belibhalelwe nguNonhlanhla Tseko (25) obedinga usizo lokufuniswa uyise.UNimrod Nkosi nethimba lakhe longoti benze abavame ukukwenza, okunguzama ukuqhamuka nezimpendulo kusetshenziswa ulibofuzo.NgokukaNonhlanhla unina wamtshela ukuthi unoyise ababili. Oyedwa ngowakwaNgubane, omunye owakwaNdlovu.  Unina ucele ukungabi yingxenye yohlelo.UNonhlanhla udalule ukuthi ubudlelwano phakathi kwakhe nonina abubuhle, empeleni unina unezinkomba zokungamfuni.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi unina wake wambiza 'ngesiqalekiso okwakufanele asikhingce sife ngesikhathi esangumntwana'. Amadoda okuthiwa angoyise baNonhlanhla abekhona futhi akuqinisekisile ukuthi womabili ayethandana futhi eya ocansini nonina kaNonhlanhla ngesikhathi esisodwa.Paternity tests should be compulsory,kids tested after birth. Imagine living a lie ur whole life😭 hhai man 
#utatakho— Nokwethu Mnisi (@Nokwe2Mnisi) 
July 24, 2018Kuvele ukuthi kwaba nesigameko sokuboshwa kwelinye lamasoka kanina kaNonhlanhla. Kungaleso sikhathi lo wesifazane abona khona ukuthi ukhulelwe.Ngesikhathi eteta umntwana, unina kaNonhlanhla kuthiwa wabhala incwadi wayiqondisa emndenini wesoka ayeboshwe nalo ukuba lizothatha umntwana.Umlisa owayesele engaboshiwe naye uthe watshelwa ukuthi wabe enguyise kaNonhlannhla.Ngemuva kokuhlolwa kwenziwa iDNA, kuhlaluke ukuthi womabili lamadoda uNonhlanhla akhule azi ukuthi angoyise empeleni amsulwa, ayikho engumzali wakhe.#Utatakho exposes woman more than absent fathers.— Insatiable (@HeIsGeoff) 
July 24, 2018Sometimes our own parents are the ones who hurt us the most. 
#Utatakho— RaisedInAfrica (@paballo_patsa) 
July 24, 2018Lokhu kumphathe kabi uNonhlanhla oze waveza ukuthi unina wake wamtshelwa ukuthi ngesikhathi eboshiwe wadlwengulwa. Lezi zinsolo ziqinisekiswe nayisitatimende esenziwa yisola likanina kaNonhlanhla ayeboshwe nalo. Yize kunjalo kodwa le ndoda ithe unina kaNonhlanhla akandanga ngamaningi ngalesi sehlakalo nokuthi senzeka kanjani, nini.Kungenzeka yini ukuthi unina kaNonhlanhla usenge ezimithiyo ngoba ezama ukuvikela indodakazi yakhe ngokwenzeka?It could have been that the Mom was raped in prison and to this day she still can’t bring herself to talk about it.. Rape survivors go through the most 😢

title: #Utatakho: Sihlasimulisa umzimba isiqephu sakamuva

text: UNINA  womfundi waseRhodes uNksz Khensani Maseko, uchaze indodakazi yakhe njengonkanyezi ebizoletha impilo engcono kubantu.Encwadini efundwe nguNksz Sandiso Maseko oyisihlobo sikaKhensani, unina kaKhensani uthe, indodakazi yakhe ibiyenza yonke into ngokuzikhandla futhi ibiletha uguquko empilweni yabantu. "Ngesikhathi ngikusa esikoleni uyokwenza ugrade 1, waphasa ngendlela engangingayilindele. Ngakubuka ushiya izingane ngesikhathi ugijima ku-100 meter. Ubuyinkanyezi, ngisho kwamatric wawufuna ingubo enobucwebe. Wathi ufuna ukukhanya njengechandlelier. Ubuyinkanyezi ngisho eNyuvesi, uletha uguquko empilweni yabafungi ngokuzihlanganisa nepolitiki," kusho incwadi efundwe nguSandiso.Umngcwabo kaKhensani ubuseNasrec, eGoli. Uchaze uKhensani njengomuntu obeyisibonelo esihle ngoba nokufa kwakhe kushiye abantu bedangele futhi bedidekile. ""Ubungunobuhle, uyigugu kimi nasemndenini, abangani nomakhelwane bebeukela kuwe. Namhlanje ngibonga uNkulunkulu ngokusinika iminyaka engu-23 ukuthi ube nathi. Ngiyathemba ukuthi uNkulunkulu uzongisiza ukubhekana nalesi simo esinzima," UKhensani uzibulale ngoLwesihlanu oludlule ekubo eGoli.Kuvele ukuthi uKhensani ubephila nokhwantalala emuva kokudlwengulwa yisoka lakhe nalo ebelifunda eRhodes ngoMeyi.
title: UNgcwatshwe ngesizotha uKhensani

text: Iphini leNhloko yamaJaji, uJaji Raymond Zondo wenze okungajwayelekile ekhipha umyalelo wokuthi kuphoqwe ijaji lenkantolo enkulu, uJaji Tintswalo Makhubele ukuthi azokwethula ubufakazi phambi kwale nkantolo.UZondo ozwakale ecikwa yisenzo saleli Jaji elikhethe ukungalubhadi kule khomishini namhlanje, uthe akwamukelekile ukuthi leli jaji lingabi khona ekubeni lazi kuqala unyaka ukuthi kumele lizovela phambi kwale khomishini.Usho lokhu ngemuva kokuthi ummeli walo u-Advocate Gift Shakoane, ecele le khomishini ukuthi ikuhlehlise ukuvela kwekhasimende lakhe kule khomishini ngoba ibingakalungeli.UJaji Makhubele wake waba ngusihlalo webhodi lesikhashana kwaPrasa kanti kunezinsolo zokuthi leli bhodi lagxambukela odabeno olwaluphakathi kukaPrasa neSiyaya Rail Solutions.Usolwa ngokuphoqa ukuthi le nhlangano ingene ezingxoxweni zokukhokhela uSiya esikhundleni sokuthi lolu daba lusingathwe abomthetho.UJaji Makhubele bekumele ethule ubufakazi kule khomishini namhlanje kodwa esikhundleni sokuthi kufike yena, kutheleke ummeli wakhe ngemizuzu yokugcina ezocela ukuthi kuhlehliswe ukulalelwa kwalobu bufakazi.UZondo unengekile ngokuthi leli jaji kungabi yilona elizozicelela ukuthi kuhehliswe ukulalelwa kobufakazo kodwa okunalokho uthumela ummeli nakhona ngemizuzu yokugcina.Ummeli wakhe uthe leli jaji libe sengozini yemoto ngoLwesine ngakho alikabi sesimweni esifanele.Kodwa omele le khomishini, u-Advocate Vas Soni, uthe leli jaji kade lazi ukuthi kumele livele phambi kwale khomishini. Nokuthi bekumele engabe usasibhala isitatimende esifungelwe esichaza kabanzi ngokubandakanyeka kwakhe odabeni lwakwaPrasa.Kuvela ukuthi uJaji Makhubele uthanda ukuba yinkinga njengoba eke waveza ukuthi ezincwadini ezifungelwe ezintathu azithinta igama lakhe ezilethwe kule khomishini, yena uzimisele ngokuphendula eyodwa kuphela."Kungani engazange asinike incwadi efungelwe..lo akuyena umuntu nje ojwayelekile ongawazi umthetho. Uyijaji unesipiliyoni, yini ngempela enzima la,"kubuza uZondo.Uthe kwasizathu sokuthi uJani Makhubele angabi khona kwikhomishini akasizwa kahle,wamtshela ukuthi akeze azovela kule khomishini angalokhu ebachithela isikhathi."Sekumele mina ngihlehlise ukuvella kwakhe kwikhomishini ngoba ekekho la. Konke lokhu kubambezela ikhomishini, nathi asinaso isikhathi esingazi ukuthi sizosenzani.Lolu suku wayetshelwe ngalo kudala kusenesikhathi..manje akasezi ke ngoba akekho esimweni sokuba phambi kwekhomishini,"kusho uZondo. Uthe uJaji Makhubele unikwa kuze kube uJulayi29 ukuthi alethe izincwadi ezifungelwe ezilindeleke kuyena.
title: UZondo ucikwe yiJaji elingafikanga kwikhomishini

text: INHLANGANO ebhekelele abezitolo okudayiswa sekulungele ukudliwa, iRestaurant Association ofSouth Africa (Rasa) isigxeke uhulumeni ngokwenqaba ukuthi kuvulwe izitolo zokudla ngokuphelele esigabeni sesithathu sokuvulwa kwezwe.Le mboni selokhu kwaqala ukuvalwa kwezwe, ishayeke kakhulu njengoba inqwaba yezitolo zokudla zavalwa ngoMashi, okwenze kwakhahlamezeka nenqwaba yabasebenzi.Njengamanje izitolo eziningi zokudla zikwazi ukudayisa ukudla ngokuthi amakhasimende afake ama-oda bese ezilandela ukudla noma kuhanjiswe ngohlelo lokulethelwe emakhaya.“Njengamanje sishayeke ngendlela emangalisayo,"kusho isikhulu esiphezulu kule nhlangano uWendy Alberts.Uthe ukungavulwa ngokuphelele kwezitlo zabo sekwenze ukuthi abantu abangaphezu kuka80 000 bazithola bengenamaholo isikhathi eside.“Kunenqwaba yezitolo eziphoqeleke ukuthi zivale, nsuku zonke ngithola izingcingo osomabhizinisi bezitolo bengitshela ukuthi bayayeka ukuhweba ngoba kunzima kakhulu. Kunzima kubona ukuphila kanje. Abanayo enye imali namabhange nawo awazimisele ukubaboleka imali,"usho kanje.Uthe okunalokho amabhange asebaklelise njengabantu okuzobakwazi ukubuyisa imali uma bebolekwa."Izitolo abezinobudlelwane obuhle namabhange iminyaka engaphezu kuka-30, sebeyachithwa amabhange. Athi nawo akukho mali ayitholayo evela kuhulumeni."Uthe banxusa uhulumeni ukuthi abazwele manje, ngoba asakwenzile njengamanje ukuthi abaphoqe ukuthi baqhube ibhizinisi ngendlela abangayazi."Asiwona amaTake Away futhi asizona izitolo ezipheka bese zihambisela abantu ukudla emakhaya,"usho kanje.Uqhube wathi ayikho into abangayenzile ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwamakhasimende uma eza ezitolo zabo, futhi le yinto athe bebevele beyenza uma bepheka noma belungiselela ukupheka ukudla kwabo."Njengoba ukwazi nje ukuthi uye kwaPick * Pay, ungene ugeziswe izandla ngesibulali magciwane ube ugqoke isifonyo, yikona kanye lokho okungenzeka nasezitolo zokudla".
title: Abezitolo ezidayisa ukudla okuvuthiwe bakhala kuhulumeni

text: IKAIZER Chiefs yehlulekile ukuvikela isicoco seMultiChoice Diski Shield (MDS) esinqobe nyakenye iphuma emzuliswaneni wamaqoqo kulo mqhudelwano izolo.IChiefs yehlulekile ukushaya izimbangi zayo i-Orlando Pirates kowabakhaya kuGroup A obuzocacisa ukuthi ngabe ngubani ozodlulela kowandulela owamanqamu kulo mqhudelwano. Igoli leBucs lishaywe uSimiso Bophelo ngasekupheleni kwesiwombe sokuqala. Elokulinganisa leChiefs lishaywe uSibusiso Milanzi sekuvalwe amehlo esiwombeni sesibili.IChiefs iyona ebicindezela ngemizuzu eyishumi yokuqala. U-Itumeleng Shopane odlala ophikweni lwesokudla, Sabelo Radebe ongumgadli noReamohetse Rorwana bebewuhlupho odongeni lwePirates nokuphoqe ukuthi * -Elson Sithole ongunozinti weBucs abe matasa.Kusukela emzuzwini ka-15 kuya koka-27 akukho okungako okwenziwe amaqembu, ngaphandle komjiko ongathi shu, obugcina uphelele eze, amathuba engakheki.Ngomzuzu ka-28 uLebohang Lesako odlala esiswini kwiChiefs uphase elihle ibhola elikhiphe qekelele uLebohang Matakanya wabhekana noSithole emapalini eBucs. Udlaliswe kabi uKagiso Madisha, unompepe wabeka i-free kick endaweni eyingozi. Nokho uSizwe Twala wakha amabhilidi lelo thuba lashabalala.Ibingasayeqi inkaba yenkundla iPirates, kuyiChiefs ecindezele. Lokhu bekudalwa ukuthi iPirates ibivele ifuna iphuzu kulo mdlalo kanti Amakhosi abedinga ukunqoba ngamagoli amathathu ukuze adlulele kowomkhumulajezi.Ngomzuzu ka-42, isinde ngokulambisa iPirates ngemuva komnyakazo omuhle wenxele uThabo Mokwena okhombise amandla nesibindi ejika amadoda kwesokunxele wagoba ibhola elihle elihlangane noMatakanya wathi ulibhajisa ezintanjeni laphuma eceleni kwepali.Ngesiwombe sesibili iChiefs iqale ngamandla, igcina ibhola futhi ihlasela. Ngomzuzu ka-10 esiwombeni sesibili uLesako udedele umshosha phansi ethi uyazumisa kuSithole emapili ePirates, walibamba ngqi kwachwaza inkundla.Umqeqeshi weChiefs * -Arthur Zwane umangaze abaningi ekhipha isethenjwa sezakhe uShopane, efaka uMilanzi. Ungene kwezwakala nokho, njengoba kuthe esanda kungena, uMilanzi wadonsa inkunzimalanga yeshodi, esebenzise kanzima uSithole emapaliniUSithole uphinde wageza uTwala ephume qekelele, ezihambela yedwa. UTwala bekufanele abheke ipali lapho lingakhona, abeke ibhola enethini kodwa walishaya laqonda ngqo kuSithole.Esikhathini esengeziwe sikanompempe, uMilanzi ushaye ingcwenga yegoli eliwumshosha phansi engaphandle kancane kuka-18, yachwaza inkundla.
title: IChiefs ihlulwe wukuvikela isicoco ibanjwa yi-Orlando Pirates

text: ZAKHELE XABAI NTOMBI endala yaseMtubatuba ayiziboni ihlukana nokugijima yize isisinde ezigamekweni ezimbili zokudlwengulwa ilungiselela imijaho emikhulu.UNksz Ntombi Masengane (63) waKwaNongoma kodwa ohlala KwaMsane, eMtubatuba, usezakhele udumo ngokungenela imijaho ehlukene KwaZulu-Natal. Ngesikhathi abanye intanga yakhe bebika izifo ezahlukene egazini eziphatha abantu asebekhulile kodwa yena uvuka ekuseni kusempondozankomo angene emgwaqweni alungiselele umjaho olandelayo. NgoMgqibelo uNksz Masengane udle umhlanganiso emjahweni uLundi Marathon 10 km kwabaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-60 obusuka oLundi Stadium uphinde uphele khona, wahlomula ngo-R1 000.Lo mjaho ubuhambisana noka-42 km onqotshwe abagijimi bangaphandle kwabesilisa nakwabesifazane.Nakuba uNksz Masengane ubekade esehleka kuvela elomhlathi emuva komjaho kodwa kushintshe isimo esechaza ngobunzima ahlangabezane nabo uma ejima ekuseni. Eminyakeni edlule wasinda edlwengulwa abafana ababili athe babemlinde endleleni, benza sengathi bayamphelezela.Phakathi kwemijaho aseke wayigijima kukhona iMandela Marathon esuka eMaritzburg iphele eHowick, Comrades Marathon egijinywa phakathi kweMaritzburg neTheku neSoweto Marathon.“Ngahlangana nabafana ababili phesheya kweMfolozi, basho igama lenye inkampani bathi basebenza kuyo. Ngababuza ukuthi bafunani, bathi bomele ucansi. Ngabuza ukuthi bayabona yini ukuthi bakhuluma nomuntu ongakanani, bathi abanendaba nalokho. Emuva kwalokho kwaba ongaphansi nongaphezulu. Ngaze ngasizwa yinyala eyaqhamuka, ababehamba ngayo bangibona ngiphakamisa isandla base beyabaleka abafana. Ngasala nengozi ekhanda,” kusho lo mgijimi.“Kungiphindile futhi ngilungi-selela iComra-des nyakenye. Banele bangibona bafonelana, bekhombisana ngami kodwa ngagcina ngisindile. Konke lokhu ngeke kungenze ngiyeke ukugijima. Ngiyoze ngiyeke uma imilenze yami ingasavumi. Ukugijima ngakuqala eminyakeni yawo- 1980 emuva kokuyeka i-karate.”UNksz Masengane unezingane ezimbili, enye yazo esiqalile ukugijima engunjiniyela eLesotho. Unomzukulu oyedwa. Echaza ngempilo yakhe yansuku zonke, kuhlale obala ukuthi akanaso isikhathi sokuhlala ekhaya aqhathe usizi njengoba ephila ngokuzidayisela erenki eMtubatuba nangempesheni.“Angiyingeni le mijaho okuthiwa eyabadala ehlelwayo ngoba kuhanjwa izinsuku eziningi kanti mina ngiyazidayisela. Uma ngilibele ukuhamba izinsuku, ngiyolala ehhotela ngizoba nenkinga.”
title: Sidlule kokuningi isalukazi esigijimayo

text:
ZODWA NDABAU FUNA izindodla zemali usihlalo weChippa United uSiviwe “Chippa” Mpengesi ngesibabuli saleli qembu uThami Sangweni oshelwa yizikhondlakhondla zamaqembu agijima ku-Absa Premiership.Isolezwe lithole lezi zindaba ngomthombo walo othembekile ukuthi uMpengesi ufuna u-R4 million emaqenjini agaqele uSangweni ongumfowabo kaSiyabonga “Nsimbi” Sangweni osanda kuthatha umhlalaphansi ebholeni elikhokhelayo.Amaqembu okuvela ukuthi acathamela uSangweni yiKaizer Chiefs, Orlando Pirates neBidvest Wits.“UChippa umbizisa ngamabomu uSangweni ngoba ufuna ukubalekisa amaqembu amfunayo. IChiefs iyona esike yabeka nemali engayikhokha ngoThami.
