UChippa ufuna u-R4 million kanti iChiefs izimisele ngokukhokha u-R1.6 million bese ezikhethela abadlali ababili ngaphezulu kulaba ebachithayo okuyinto uChippa angafuni nokuyizwa,” kusho umthombo.UMpengesi uthintwe yi
Solezwe wavuma ukuthi akhona amaqembu aseke amthinta ngoSangweni.“Akhona amaqembu aseke angithinta ngoSangweni kodwa ngeke ngiwadalule ngoba akuwona umsebenzi wami lowo. Into engingayisho ngoSangweni wukuthi ngeke ngimdayise ngoba ungumdlali obalulekile kithi njengoba sifuna ukuqhubeka la sigcine khona ngesizini ephelile. Angikwazi ukulokhu ngidayisa abadlali ekubeni nami nginesifiso sokuthi sidle noma isicoco esisodwa ngesizini ezayo. USangweni usezinhlelweni zomqeqeshi futhi engizokusho wukuthi kule sizini ngeke sidedele abadlali abaningi ngoba asifuni ukuhlakaza iqembu elibumbene,” kusho uMpengesi.Ngesizini edlule iChippa iqede kuTop 8 okokuqala okusho ukuthi izodlala kuMTN 8 ekuqaleni kwesizini ezayo.USangweni, osibamba sithule isisu, ufike kuChippa esuka kuMamelodi Sundowns ayilaxaze ngenxa yebhentshi. Ngonyaka odlule ubehambe neqembu lesizwe lakuleli elidlale ku-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon).UMpengesi ukuphikile ukuthi ufuna izizumbulu ngoSangweni. “Angikaze ngibe nezingxoxo ngoSangweni. Ngimile kwelokuthi ngeke ngimdayise nathi siyamdinga,” kusho uMpengesi.USangweni usalelwe yiminyaka emibili kuChippa. Kuthintwa ophethe izindaba zakhe, uLizwe Mthethwa we-Afstec Sport Group, uvumile ukuthi akhona amaqembu asemthintile.“Mabili amaqembu asengithintile futhi womabili azimisele ngokumthenga uSangweni. Kodwa njengoba enenkontileka neChippa kumele kuvume yona ukuthi iyamdayisa,” kusho uMthethwa.
title: Kumele ahlukane no-R4m afuna uSangweni

text: UMTHETHO ohlongozwayo ungase unikeze ongqongqoshe nephalamende amandla okulawula okwenzeka ezinkampanini zikahulumeni.Izolo ikomidi elibhekelele imithetho nezokuphatha ephalamende lithe kufanele kulungiswe imithetho ethile ukuze iphalamende libe namandla okukhuza ngaphambi kokuthi konakale izinto ezinkampanini zikahulumeni. USihlalo wekomidi uNkk Ayanda Dlodlo obuye abe nguNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya uthe ongqongqoshe kufanele babe namandla okushintsha  okwenzeka ezinkampanini zikahulumeni nokubiza izikhulu ezingenzi kahle. "Sifuna ukuphathwa kwezinkampani zikahulumeni kube sezingeni eliphezulu. Sifuna ukuba namandla okubiza abantu abangawenzi umsebenzi wabo ngoba izinkampani zikahulumeni zinenkinga yokuxhashazwa kwemali nenkohlakalo," kusho uNkk Dlodlo. Phakathi kwezinkampani zikahulumeni eziba sematheni ngokungaphathwa kahle kwemali kubalwa i-Eskom, Passenger Rail South Africa (Prasa) neSouth African Airways. Kumanje kunophenyo olwenziwayo ngokusetshenziswa kombuso yidlanzana nenkohlakalo ebiza lubi e-Eskom. UNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni uNksz Lynne Brown useziphendulele kwabenza uphenyo lwakwa-Eskom, esho nokuthi wayeholelwa ophathe yizikhulu. "Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi imali isebenza kanjani ezinkampanini zikahulumeni. Ukuze uma ingasakwenzi lokho obekuthiwe izokwenza kujeziswe abantu," kusho uNksz Dlodlo. Uthe umthetho abawuhlongozayo uzophinde ubheke nobudlelwano phakathi kwamaqembu epolitiki nohulumeni. I-ANC nayo ayisahambisani nokujutshwa kwamaqabane ezinkampanini ezithile njengoba ithi lokhu kuphazamisa ukusebenza kwazo. Ifuna kuqashwe abantu abaneziqu zomsebenzi abazowenza hhayi amaqabane kuphela.
title: Ongqongqoshe namandla athe axaxa

text: BAZOJUXUZA nabadlali bamaqembu ombhoxo, iCell C Sharks neToyota Cheeters, abathandi bobumnandi abazohambela Eyadini Lounge, eMlaza, namhlanje. Lawa maqembu azozwana amandla eKing Zwelithini Stadium emdlalweni wokuzilungiselela ukuqala kwesizini entsha bese emuva komdlalo abheke Eyadini Lounge.AmaSharks azobe eholwa ngukaputeni wawo uPat Lambie.INhloko yezokuVakasha eThekwini, uPhillip Sithole, ithe inhloso yalokhu wukuheha izivakashi ukuthi zihambele elokishini.“Sifuna ukugqugquzela ukubekezelelana ngokobuhlanga ngalokhu,” kusho uSithole.Uthe umdlalo uzoqala ngo-5 ntambama kuthi owesibili ube ngu-6.30 ebusuku. Kuyona yomibili kungenwa mahhala.“Kuyothi uma kuphela umdlalo bese kuyiwa Eyadini nabadlali, kwi-after party,” kusho uSithole.Uthe naseYadini kuzongenwa mahhala.Umnikazi waseYadini, uMjey Zama, uthe bazobe bebophele uDJ Feel, 8 Hours nabanye abaningi.“Abantu kumele beze bezojabula babone nabadlali bamaSharks namaCheeters bethathe nezithombe. Ngibathembisa umculo omnandi, ukuphepha nenyama eseqophelweni eliphezulu,” kusho uMjey.Akukhona okokuqala ukuthi amaSharks ehambele emalokishini ayodlalela khona. Ngonyaka odlule adlalela khona eMlaza abe esehambela eMax’s Lifestyle, eClermont naKwaMashu.
title: Kuzogcwala abadlali bebhola lombhoxo Eyadini

text: MHLELI: Njengophiko lwabantu besifazane eqenjini iNkatha (IFPWB) asiqale sisho ukuthi siyakwamukela ukuboshwa kowesilisa osolwa ngokubulala izingane zakhe ezintathu eThekwini.Njengabesifazane eqenjini sikhathazekile ngezigameko lapho abantu besilisa bekuthola kunzima satshe ukwamukela uma abesifazane abasebudlelwaneni nabo bebatshela ukuthi ucu alusahlangani entanyeni akuhlukwane.Bebone kungcono ukuthi baziphindiselele ngokuthi baqothe imbokodo nesisekelo ngisho izingane imbala. Siyazwelana kakhulu nayo yonke imindeni elahlekelwe zihlobo zayo ngenxa yodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane.Sithi asiphinde futhi sizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwethu okukhulu mayelana nezigameko zokubulawa kwabantu besifazane ngesihluku. Lokhu sikusho ngemuva kokubulawa kwesitshudeni sasenyuvesi yase-UCT u-Uyinene Mrwetyana kanye nomshayisibhakela wesifazane waseMdantsane uLeighandre Jegels kanye nabanye okungabikiwe ngokubulawa kwabo.Lezi zigameko zokubulawa kwabantu besifazane zenzeka esikhathini lapho izwe laseNingizimu Afrika lisenkingeni yokubhekana nezinga eliphezulu lokwanda kodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane, lwenziwa ngabantu besilisa. Abantu besifazane sebephenduke iziboshwa uqobo ezweni labo ngenxa yokwesaba ukwenzakaliswa ngabantu besilisa.Nathi siyavumelana nalabo abathi udaba lodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane kumele luthathwe njengesibhicongo senhlekelele ezweni okumele kubhekwane naso ngokushesha. Sinxusa-ke zonke izinhlaka zomthetho kuleli zwe ukuthi nazo zenze konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ziyalwa nalesi sihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kuphinde kubulawe abantu besifazane. Izinhlaka zomthetho kumele zisheshise ukwenza uphenyo kuwo wonke amacala abikwayo nasebikiwe athinta ukuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane. Simelene nokuthi kuphele iminyaka kungafinyelelwa esiphethweni samacala okuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane.Isikhathi manje lesi sokuthi uqine umthetho ovikela abesifazane. Bonke abahlukumezi kumele bajeziswe kanzima uma ngempela leli zwe lizimisele ukuvikela abantu besifazane.Ngakho-ke kungumsebenzi kahulumeni wakuleli zwe ukuthi avikele abesifazane kubahlukumezi.Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi nawo awubambe iqhaza ekulweni nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane nezingane. Ngaphandle kokuthi zonke izinhlaka zibambisane ngeke inqotshwe impi yodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane. Siyakholelwa kakhulu futhi ekutheni kumele kube nokushintsha komqondo kubantu besilisa babone ukuthi kuyinto embi ukuhlukumeza abantu besifazane.Siwuphiko lwabesifazane eqenjini iNkatha sithi sekwanele manje ngodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane. Into esiyidingayo nje kuphela uhulumeni ozimisele ekutheni aqhamuke namasu amasha angumkhombandlela ocacile oqondene nokulwa nodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane.UMntwana Phumzile ButheleziMPL,uSihlalo kazwelonke wophiko lwabesifazane eqenjini iNkatha (IFP Women’s Brigade)
title: Akuphele ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane

text: KUNGAKAPHOLI maseko kuvele izindaba zokuthi injinga yaseMzimkhulu, uMnuz Sbongeleni “ Mfishimfishi” Dlamini, izoshadelwa umsakazi woKhozi FM, uZimiphi “ Zimdollar” Biyela, sekuvele owesifazane okhala ngokulaxazwa wuDlamini anengane encane naye.Isolezwe ngeSonto lithole ngomthombo walo ongashayi eceleni, ukuthi uDlamini ulaxaze intokazi yaseVereeniging, eGoli, uLerato Tsoane abanengane enamasonto amabili nayo.Kuthiwa izinto bezihamba kahle phakathi kukaDlamini noLerato njengoba bese bethandane iminyaka emibili. Kodwa izinto ziqale ukushintsha nyakenye, sekufika uZimdollar empilweni kaDlamini.“Ukusondelana kukaDlamini noZimdollar nyakenye kuqubule umsindo phakathi kukaLerato naye (uDlamini).Inkinga ukuthi uLerato ubethi uma ebuza uDlamini ngobudlelwano bakhe noZimdollar, uDlamini athi bahlanganiswe wumsebenzi. Ligcine livelile iqiniso ukuthi bayathandana. Okubuhlungu ukuthi uDlamini alahle umama wengane yakhe ngenxa kaZimdollar,” kusho umthombo.Ethintwa uLerato, uthe impela banengane encane noDlamini kodwa usembalekele.“Ungilahle sekusele inyanga ngitete njengoba nginomntwana onamasonto amabili njengamanje.Indaba kaZimdollar ngiyaze ngonyaka odlule kodwa ubephika ukuthi bayathandana. Indlela ebesithandana ngayo bese kucaca ukuthi uzongithatha angenze umfazi wakhe. Angifuni ukwanda ngamaningi ngale nto ngoba ingiphatha kabuhlungu. UDlamini usengibhlokhile ocingweni lwakhe, angisakwazi ukuxhumana naye. Konke ngikubeka kuMdali futhi ngamandla kaNkulunkulu ingane yami izokhula yize isilahlwe nguyise,” kusho uLerato.USOMABHIZINISI uSbongeleni ‘Mfishimfishi’ Dlamini noLerato Tsoane kusahamba kahle phakathi kwaboUthe noma kubuhlungu kodwa kulungile ngoba sekucacile ukuthi uDlamini usezimisele ngoZimdollar.UMfishimfishi uthe uyamazi uLerato futhi banengane naye.“ULerato wuyena othathe isinqumo sokuthi ahlukane nami. Ngalokho angisho ukuthi sengiyilahlile ingane yami. Ngesonto eledlule bengikubo eVereeniging ngimhambisele imali yengane.Ngisho ekhaya kuyaziwa ukuthi nginengane naye kodwa umndeni wami ubungakayiboni. ULerato uhlushwa yisikhwele futhi useke waxabana noMaBiyela (Zimdollar) ngoba wamfonela ezama ukulwa naye,” kusho uDlamini.UDlamini uthe zonke izingane zakhe uyazazi uZimdollar futhi bavamise ukuzihambisela imali naye njalo ekupheleni kwenyanga ngoba ayikho ingane yakhe angayondli.
title: Ulaxaze onosana olobola uZimdollar

text: UYAZIQHENYA ngegalelo afike lakhe endimeni yomculo kamaskandi, uKhuzani Mpungose (28), okuthe ngempelasonto emcimbini wamaDStv Mzansi Viewers Choice Awards, wahlabana ngendondo yeBest Artist.UKhuzani ube ngowokuqala emculweni kamaskandi ukuqokwa kulo mcimbi, obuseSandton, eGoli.Akugcini ngalokho, le nsizwa yaseMatholampunga, eNkandla, isike yanandisa emicimbini emikhulu okujwayeleke ukubonakala kuyo abaculi bekwaito, house neJazz kodwa kube yiyo kuphela emele umaskandi.Ngemuva kokuhlabana ngale ndondo kulo mcimbi, ngibone kungcono ukuthi ngike ngikhulume nayo le nsizwa ngizwe ukuthi ingene kanjani kulo mculo.Ngithole nokuthi yiziphi izingqinamba ebhekene nazo empilweni njengoba isiphila impilo efiswa abaningi futhi isizakhele igama kuleli.Akubanga lula ukuyithola njengoba imatasa kodwa iphinde yathatha isikhathi eside ngempela ingixoxela ngokukhula kwayo.UKhuzani uveze ukuthi ekhula akubanga lula empilweni ikakhulukazi sekushone abazali bakhe.“Ngifunde ezindaweni ezehlukene eNkandla nasePitoli, kodwa isikole ngisiqedele ngo-2008, Esibhaka High khona eNkandla. Ekuqedeni kwami ngangifuna ukuba usonhlalakahle ngenxa yokuthi ngangifuna ukusiza izingane ezihluphekile njengoba namanje ngingafuni ukubona umuntu oswele ngiyathinteka kakhulu. Ngazama ukuthi ngifune uxhaso lwezimali zokufunda kwaNSFAS kodwa bangifuna uR800 owawungekho njengoba ngase ngisele nogogo kuphela. Izimali zikababa zathathwa unkosikazi wakhe omunye zonke wahamba nazo akangasishiya nalutho,” kusho uKhuzani.Uthe ngenxa yokubona isimo sasekhaya wakhetha ukuyofuna umsebenzi eNkandla edolobheni, wawuthola esikhungweni esisiza abaswele, iSizani Outreach.“Ngangihola uR900 ngenyanga, ngasebenza kuso izinyanga ezingu-9 kulesi sikhungo. Umculo ngase ngingenile kuwo ngisekhaya njengoba ngangicula vele, ngabona ukuthi kumele ngiye eGoli ngiyofuna amathuba angcono omsebenzi, kungekho ukuthi angiyofuna izinkampani zomculo ezingangisiza ngoba ikhono nginalo,” kusho yena.EGoli uthe wafike wasebenza ebhusha, nagcina exoshiwe kulowo msebenzi ngemuva kokuwa nohlangothi lonke lwenkomo.“Ngaleso sikhathi ngase ngingenwa umkhuba wokuthi kumaCD ngibheke izinombolo zabantu ababhalwe khona. Kula ngathola khona ekababa uShobeni Khuzwayo ophethe Izingane Zoma, ngamfonela ngamtshela ukuthi ngifuna ukucula. Ngenza konke lokhu nje ngiwunogada ngihola uR1800. UShobeni wangisiza kakhulu njengoba ngahlangana noMtshengiseni ngaqala ukusebenza,” kuchaza yena.Uthe ngo-2013 kula aqala ukukhipha i-albhamu ethi yena aphinde ahambe noMtshengiseni emicimbini ehlukene.“Ngangicula ebusuku, ekuseni ngiyosebenza ekubeni unogada. Noma ngicule emini ebusuku ngiyosebenza. Ngelinye langa umphathi wami waze wangishaya ngoba engifica ngilele. Ngangigibela nesitimela nokwathi abantu sebeqala ukungibona bangibingelele abanye bangibuze ukuthi yimi yini umculi kamaskandi, ngivume kwabanye kodwa kwabanye ngiziphike,” kuchaza yena.Uthe wafunda lukhulu kuMtshengiseni ngendima kamaskandi.“Wangitshela ukuthi uma abantu sebeqala ukubanga umsindo ngawe kula kuhamba kahle khona izinto futhi nempumelelo iseduzane. Ngakho nabantu uma besibona sixabana singomaskandi siphinde sijovane ezingomeni zethu iyona ndlela kulo mculo okukhulwa ngayo,” kuchaza yena.Ebuzwa uKhuzani ukuthi wayezibona ela ekhona yini engena kulo mculo uthe, wayezama inhlanhla kodwa uNkulunkulu waba naye.“Ngibonga uthando lwabantu kakhulu abangikhombise lona, lusho lukhulu kimi. Imfihlo yami ukuthi kumele uzisondeze kubantu ukuze bakuthande nabo. Ukuwina kumaDStv kungijabulisile kakhulu ngiyabonga kubona bonke abangivotele,” kuchaza yena.Uthe ukuqumba phansi o-AKA, Shekhinah noLady Zamar akuyona into elula.Ebuzwa ukuthi uphatheke kanjani abantu bekhala ngokuthi abamazi futhi uwine kanjani kulo mcimbi uthe, abantu bayohlala bekhala ngaso sonke isikhathi, yena ungumholi emculweni kamaskandi.UKhuzani maduzane uzokhipha i-albhamu yakhe entsha ethi Inhlinini Yoxolo Part 2 naveze ukuthi abantu bazoyithanda kakhulu.Le nsizwa iveze ukuthi ifuna ukuwushintsha futhi iwudumise kakhulu umculo kamaskandi kunalokhu oyikhona manje.Uma ezihlalele engasebenzi, uKhuzani uthe uthanda ukubuka ibhola aphinde azosele inyama azidlele yona.Ekhaya kubo uthe ungowesibili ezinganeni ezine kodwa umfowabo omdala sewadlula emhlabeni.Ekhaya uthe kusekhona ugogo wakhe amthanda ngenhliziyo yakhe yonke.Uthe uyazifela ngoZalo neSibaya njengoba ngezinye izinsuku ake adideke ukuthi abukeleni njengoba lezi zinhlelo zidlala ngesikhathi esisodwa.Uveze ukuthi akanaye umakoti kodwa ukhona owesifazane asebudlelwaneni bezothando naye.
title: UKhuzani nephupho lokudumisa umaskandi

text: UKHOMISHANA wamaphoyisa, uLt-General Khehla Sitole, uvikele amaphoyisa mayelana nophenyo lwawo lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa owayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates wathi ugculisekile ngomsebenzi osuwenziwe okwamanje.USitole ubephendula udaba oluphume kwiSunday Independent, uzakwabo weSolezwe obeluthi uMeyiwa wadutshulwa ngephutha ngomunye wabantu abayisikhombisa ababesendlini ekhaya kubo kaKelly Khumalo ngo-2014.Ihhovisi likaSitole lithumele isitatimende esithi udaba oluphume ephephandabeni luyadukisa.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa eminyakeni emihlanu edlule.Unina kaKelly, udadewabo, isoka lakhe, abangani babo oMthokozisi Twala noTumelo Madlala kuthiwa babekhona endlini ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu.Kuze kube manje akekho umuntu oseboshiwe ngokufa kukaMeyiwa.Ngeledlule umndeni kaSenzo uqoke i-AfriForm ukuba iphenye ngalolu daba.Iphephandaba libike okushayisanayo nalokho okwabikwa phambilini ukuthi uSenzo wadutshulwa ngabantu ababezobamba inkunzi kodwa laveza ukuthi wadubuleka ngephutha ngesikhathi ezama ukulamula udadewabo kaKelly noTwala ababexabana.Ngokusho kwephephandaba lithe obehola uphenyo, uColonel Bongani Gininda, kukhona izitatimende azigodla azithola ngo-2017 mayelana nokuthi ngubani owabulala uSenzo.Kuthiwa kunecala lokuphazamisa ukusebenza komthetho avulelwe lona uGininda ngonyaka odlule kodwa wavela wasuswa wayiswa KwaZulu-Natal. Iphephandaba liphinde labika ukuthi iNPA ingena ezintangeni ekukhipheni incwadi egunyaza ukuba aboshwe uGininda.USitole uthe uGininda usahola ithimba eliphenya udaba lukaSenzo wathi akasusiwe ecaleni.Uthe bayamazisa njalo ukuthi icala lihamba kanjani wathi wanelisekile ngomsebenzi osuwenziwe kuze kube yimanje.Unxuse abangaba nolwazi ngaleli cala ukuze beze nobufakazi ukuze balixazulule.
title: Ngigculisekile ngolukaMeyiwa: Sitole

text: ZAKHELE XABAU KHALA ngeshobolo elilandela umshayisibhakela wakhe umqeqeshi, uZwi Magudulela, kampetha we-SA middleweight uChristopher “Put Up or Shut Up” Buthelezi okuvele ukuthi usekhishiwe ezimpini zeLudonga Boxing Promotions ezizoba ngoNovemba 28 e-Olive Convention Centre, eThekwini.UButhelezi bekulindeleke ukuthi alwele ibhande le-World Boxing Association (WBA) Pan African middleweight noJimmy Mabundji waseDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC).Kuvele ukuthi ukugula kanzima kukanina, okuthiwa uphuma uyangena esibhedlela, sekuphoqe uphromotha uThulani Magudulela ukuthi amkhiphe ohlwini lwezimpi. Ubezobhulela amazolo impi ebhekwe ngabomvu yebhande le-International Boxing Organisation (IBO) flyweight phakathi kukampetha uMoruti “Babyface” Mthalane waKwaZulu-Natal noRenz Rosia wasePhilippines.UButhelezi, ongomunye wabashayisibhakela abamkantshubomvu kulesi sifundazwe, ubhekane nobunzima nyakenye ngaphambi kokuvikela ibhande lakuleli kuWalter “Black Mamba” Dlamini ngesikhathi eshonelwa nguyise omncane. Liphinde lamlandela ishobolo ngaphambi kwempi yakhe noRocky Junior waseBrazil ngesikhathi ethola ukuthi indodakazi yakhe idlwenguliwe. Isehlakalo sesibili sazwela kakhulu kuyena ngendlela yokuthi wayebuye ahluleke ukujima ekhala ngokuthi inhliziyo yakhe ishaya kancane, uphelelwa ngamandla. Isikhala sempi kaButhelezi sivalwe ngezoba phakathi kukaFaizel Malinga noPatrick Mukala abazoxhimfana empini yemizuliswano eyisithupha esigabeni se-super middleweight.“Ukuhoxa kwakhe akuzona izindaba ezimnandi ngoba kade sesibheke ukuthi uzolwela ibhande le-WBA. Iminyaka isihambile kuye, besifuna aqoqe noma yiliphi ibhande angalithola ukuze azenzele umlando ngaphambi kokushiya isibhakela. Kodwa konke kwaziwa nguMdali,” kusho uZwi.“Uthintekile emoyeni, yikho sifinyelele esinqumweni sokuthi angabe esalwa. UButhelezi uhlale enezinkinga njalo uma ezolwa, angazi ukuthi kwenziwa yini. Kulokhu okwedlule ubekwazi ukuqhubeka alwe noma kukhona okumehlele kodwa kulokhu kube ngaphezu kwamandla akhe.”Ngaphandle kukaButhelezi, kubukeka sekucaca ukuthi uThabiso “The Rock” Mchunu ngeke esabonakala kulezi zimpi ngenxa yokungaboni ngaso linye phakathi komqeqeshi wakhe uSean Smith nophromotha uMagudulela. Kuthiwa baxabana kanzima kubangwa indaba yokuthi uMchunu azolwela ibhande le-Interim WBA eThekwini okwaphikiswa nguSmith ezeseka ngokuthi umshayisibhakela wakhe uzokhathala futhi akakulungele ukulwela ibhande nokuthi incane imali ebekwe etafuleni.UZwi usezoba sekhoneni likaSiboniso “Pretty Tiger” Gonya ozolwela ibhande le-WBA Pan African bantamweight noCletus Mbhele waseGauteng. Ngaphandle kwalokho kuzobhekwa amaqhinga akhe uma uStephen “Scaracara” Mdluli esebhekene noMwezi Ndlovu.
title: Ukhale ngeshobolo kuhoxa uButhelezi

text: ATHWALE kanzima amaphoyisa nonogada bakaMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ngesikhathi etheleka esikhungweni avotele kuso namhlanje izinkumbi zabantu zimjabulela.URamaphosa ubeyovota esikoleni eHitekani Primary, eChiawelo lapho amukelwe khona ngenhlokomo. Abantu bebedudulana befuna ukuzibambela kuyena. Ubelokhu emamatheke njalo ephakamisa izandla ejabulela abalandeli. Kuhluleke ngisho abantu abebevimbile bezama ukuthi abantu bangafinyeleli kumengameli ngendlela abebebaningi ngayo. Umengameli ubephelezelwa umkakhe uDkt Tshepo Motsepe beyovota. Baqale etendeni le-ANC ebelingaphandle kwesikhungo sokuvota ngaphambi kokungena ngaphakathi. Ngesikhathi bengena esikhungweni abantu bebesaqhubeka nokududulana yize bekuvumeleke abambalwa ukuthi bangene ngaphakathi. Konakale ngesikhathi bonke abantu okubalwa nezingane, bedudulana beyongena emagcekeni esikole. Yilapho amaphoyisa nonogada bethwale kanzima ukuzama ukudambisa isimo.Abalandeli be-ANC abebengaphakathi bebememeza beshaya nesaga esidumile bethi “Phakama Ramaphosa.” Abalandeni be-EFF nabo abazibekanga phansi bememeza iqembu labo. Yize abaningi bekujabulele ukuyovota nomengameli, uNkk Gladys Tenyane (74) noNkk Norence Oliphant (69), baphatheke kabi ukuthi abakwazanga ukumbona. Bobabili bavote ekuseni kakhulu, babuyela esikhungweni ngoba bezwa ukuthi sekukhona uRamaphosa. UNkk Tenyane uthe uze wafisa ngabe ubemude kakhulu, okungenani akwazi ukubona ubuso bukamengameli.“Besingaphakathi kwetende le-ANC naye umengameli waya etendeni kodwa lutho ukumbona,” kusho yena.
title: #Ukhetho2019: Inhlokomo kutheleka uRamaphosa ezovota

text: UMA konke kuya ngamazwi kaRusell Paul osabambe njengesikhulu esiphezulu seSouth African Football Association (Safa) sekuphelile ngoThabo Senong obeqeqesha iqembu lesizwe lika-Under 20 elihlulwe kuyona yonke imidlalo kwiFifa Under 20 World ebisePoland.Inkontileka kaSenong owayeyiphini lika-Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba kwiBafana Bafana nelika-Owen Da Gama owayehola iqembu lesizwe lika-Under 23 kuma-Olympic Games ayeseRio de Janeiro, eBrazil neSafa iyaphela namuhla.Nokho ayikakhulunywa eyokuyivuselela. USenong ufake iqembu laseMzansi kabili koweNdebe yoMhlaba, wawina neCosafa Cup ngo-2017 eminyakeni eyisihlanu engumqeqeshi waleli qembu.Ngesonto eledlule, uSenong ucashunwe ekuqinisekisa ukuthi inkontileka yakhe ayikavuselelwa yiSafa.“Ngihlanganile naye, wangibuza imibuzo. Ngimtshelile ukuthi wasayina inkontileka ephelayo ngoJuni 30. Okunye kulele ethimbeni eliphethe abaqeqeshi nesigungu seSafa. Uma bekubuyisela, bazokubuyisela. Angikwazi ukukutshela okungaphezu kwalokho. Angikwazi ukuba yijaji,” kusho uPaul.“Uliholile iqembu kwiCosafa, walifaka koweNdebe yoMhlaba kabili. Kodwa umbuzo okufanele sizibuze wona, hhayi ngeqembu lika-Under 20 kuphela, kodwa ngawo wonke amaqembu esizwe wukuthi ukuzibekisela indawo emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu kwanele yini. Kungani amanye amaqembu emhlabeni nasezwenikazi i-Afrika ekwazi ukudlulela esigabeni samaqoqo. Yileyo imibuzo engithemba ukuthi uzokwazi ukuyiphendula, nabanye bazokwazi ukuyiphendula emibikweni yabo."Ikusasa likaSenong lisengcupheni nje ugxekwe kakhulu ngemuva kokushiya abadlali beKZN Football Academy abagijima emaqenjini asePortugal. Uphinde wahlalisa ebhentshini uKhanya Leshabela ozogijima kwiLeicester City egijima kwi-English Premier League.Ngaphandle kukaSenong, umqeqeshi weBanyana Banyana, uDesiree Ellis, kusalindwe ethule umbiko ngokwenzeke koweNdebe yoMhlaba ebiseFrance lapho iqembu lakhe libuye lingawinanga nowokubika umdlalo.Iqembu lika-Under 20 kufanele liqale amalungiselelo e-Afcon ezoba ngo-2021 eMauritania noweNdebe yoMhlaba ozolandela.Imi kanje imidlalo yeSafa KZN Sasol League yonke eqala ngo 1 emini:MUBS Ladies v Barcelona (Caluza Sports Ground); Makhanisi v Newcastle Ladies Ndumo (Sports Ground); Last Action v Sunflower WFC (Mnyameni(Sport Ground); DUT Midlands v Tiger Girls (Indumiso Sport Ground; Darnall Ladies vs Tottenham Ladies (Darnall Ground)80 Westville United vs Umlazi Arsenal (Westville Prison).
title: USenong engcupheni ngenkontileka

text: UMLISA waKwaNtombiziyaqonywa, eMahlabathini, uthi kusazothatha isikhathi ukuthi axole ngesenzo sikayise wakhe omncane omgence ngocelemba ekhanda ngoba emsola ngokuhlambalaza isithunzi  somkakhe okunemibiko yokuthi ujola nomshumayeli webandla lamaNazaretha.UMnuz Sfiso Mncwango (43) uthe namanje usazibuza imibuzo engaphenduleki ukuthi kungani uyise omncane emsola ngokungcolisa igama likankosikazi wakhe, athi uhamba emhleba kubantu ngokuthi ujola nombhishophi wethempeli laseSnethemba elingaphansi kwebandla lakwaShembe.Uthe sekunesikhathi kwaqala le ngxabano emndenini neyasuswa  wumsindo wokunukwa ngokuhlambalaza inkosikazi kababa omncane wakhe. Umndeni obusuhlale phansi kaningana udingida lolu daba, ubusuhlele usuku lwenhlawulo ngenhloso yokuthi amalungu athelelane amanzi njengoba elinye lawo (umsolwa) linqume ukuzihlakaza izinhlelo ngokuhlahlela umgilwa ngocelemba. Uyise omncane kaMncwango kuthiwa ngeSonto eledlule, ufice umgilwa ehlezi nabalisa ababili ajwayelene nabo, maqede wamgenca ngasendlebeni yangakwesobunxele  ngocelemba ayewuphethe.“Kube yinhlanhla ukuthi ngiphenduke ngibheke ngakuye ngenkathi ethi uyaqeda ngami. Njengoba ebeqonde ukungihlahlela ekhanda nje ngabe ngilele kobandayo. Kumanje ngiyafa yizinhlungu njengoba ngithungiwe endlebeni. Angazi ukuthi yini le engaka engone ngayo ubab’omncane njengoba ebesho ukungibulala ngocelemba? “Ngamtshela kwasekuqaleni ukuthi angiyazi le nto angisola ngayo. Ukuhlawula ngikuvumile nakho ngoba nginqena umsindo nokukhuluma.  Ungigenca ngocelemba nje bengimatasa nezinhlelo zokuthola imbuzi yokuhlawula,” kuchaza umgilwa.Eqhuba uthe yize umndeni umtshela ukuthi akaxole, kusekude ukuthi akhohlwe ngokumehlele njengoba kusale kancane ukuthi angcwatshwe. Uthe ufisa umthetho udlale indima yawo ngokuvalela umsolwa ngaphakathi ukuze ajeze ngesenzo asenze kuye.Ethintwa umshumayeli wethempeli iSinethemba, uMnuz Leonard Mncwango mayelana nalulo daba, unqabile ukuphawula. “Ngicela ukungaphawuli kulolu daba njengoba lusenkantolo. Okungimangazayo nje wukuthi lolu daba lomndeni selunekelwe izwe lonke,” kubeka umshumayeli kafushane. Okhulumela amaphoyisa uColonel Thembeka Mbele, usiqinisekisile isigameko sokulimala komlisa oklajwe ngocelemba. “Amaphoyisa asesiteshini saseMahlabathini avule icala lokushaywa komlisa oneminyaka engu-43. Kuboshwe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-48 nobekulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMahlabathini namhlanje (izolo),” kuphetha uCol Mbele.
title: Usinde egencwa ngocelemba nguyise

text: UMNDENI wowabe eyintatheli yakwaSABC ebimnkantshubomvu uthi iphumule ezinhlungwini nokukhandleka kokugula. Lokhu kushiwo nguMnuz Wandile Ndlovu oyindodana kaMnuz Stu Thembuyise Ndlovu (59), oshone ngoLwesibili entathakusa emuva kokuxinwa wukugula. UGatsheni obedume kanjalo kozakwabo, wathatha umhlalaphansi ngoMashi 2016 ngenxa yokugula.“Kubuhlungu ukushona kukababa yize egulile kodwa kunzima ukwamukela. Sizame konke kodwa ubesekhandlekile ngenxa yezinhlungu nokugula. Yize kubuhlungu kodwa uphumule ezinhlungwini,” kusho uNdlovu.Umufi owake wafunda izindaba kuKhozi FM, ubesebenze iminyaka engu-20 kwaSABC. Ushone esegxile ekucosheleni izindaba zezemfundo. Ukushona kwakhe kunyakazise zonke izinhlaka zomphakathi, okubalwa ozakwabo abebelokhu bebhonge emswaneni ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UBongani Mavuso osemkhakheni wezindaba, uthe ngaphandle komsebenzi umufi ubeyisishoshovu ekubhekeleni amalungelo abasebenzi njengoba kunguye owabajoyinisa inyunyana, iCommunications Workers Union (CWU).“Nami ngajoyina le nyunyana ngenxa yakhe ngoba nangesikhathi enguthisha wayephambili kwiSadtu. Nguyena obenxenxa abasebenzi abaningi beSABC ukuthi bajoyine iCWU. Kuthe noma esethathe umhlalaphansi kodwa ubeqhubeka nokusinikeza amasu neziyalo ngomzabalazo,” kusho uMavuso.Oyiphini likaMengameli weNatu uMnuz Allan Thompson uthe ukuthatha umhlalaphansi kukaGatsheni kwashiya esikhulu isikhala, baze bakhala kwaSABC ngokungacoshelwa kahle kwezemfundo. Uthe iNatu ibihlomula nangeziyalo zakhe.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwana uncome umufi ngomsebenzi awenzile ukuphakamisa imfundo ngenxa yokubika ngokuthembeka ngokungachemi.“Sizomkhumbula ngokusebenza kwakhe ngokuzikhandla, indlela abeziphethe kahle ngayo nangamancoko abenawo. Siyazwelana nomndeni wonke, abangani nozakwabo abesebenza nabo kwaSABC,” kusho uDlungwana.Umufi wajoyina iSABC ngo-1996 ekade enguthisha eMqhawe High eMzinyathi. Wayengumngani omkhulu futhi eyisihlobo sikaMnuz Mtholephi Mthimkhulu owayeyilungu lesiShayamthetho esifundazweni naye ongasekho. Wazalwa eZimpondweni, eNdwedwe, okuyilapho umndeni wakhe uthe wacela ukungcwatshwa khona.Ubebambe elikhulu iqhaza nasebandleni lakhe i-Apostolic Church Southern Africa, eyi-Elder esifundeni saKwaMashu.Ngo-1998 waba sengozini yemoto eyamlalisa esibhedlela isikhathi eside kodwa wabuye wasinda, wabuyela emsebenzini. Ngesikhathi sokuloba abeSABC bathe abakenzi malungiselelo mayelana nenkonzo yokumkhumbula. Inkonzo yomngcwabo izoba sekhaya eZimpondweni lapho ezofihlwa khona.Umufi ushiye umkakhe nezingane ezinhlanu.
title: Kushone uqweqwe lwentatheli yeSABC

text: ISINQUMO esikhishwe yinkantolo mayelana nodaba lukaLerato Sengadi lokufaka isicelo esiphuthumayo, ukuze athathwe njengonkosikazi womculi uJabulani “HHP” Tsambo obefihlwa ngempelasonto, siveze ngokusobala ukuthi udaba lwemishado yesintu lusafunwa ukucaciswa ukuze luqondwe kahle.Indlela esihlanganisa ngayo isiko lakwantu nezimiso zokushada zasempumalanga yiko okubanga ukudideka.UMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika uvikela ilungelo lakho lokuhlonishwa, ukulingana, ukuvikelwa ngokulinganayo umthetho, inkululeko yokukhetha inkolo nosikompilo oluthandayo nofuna ukuphila ngaphansi kwalo.Yingakho isiShayamthetho saphasisa imithetho elawula imishado eyaziwa ngeMarriages Act ebhekela kakhulu imishado yasentshonalanga ejwayele ukubizwa ngomshado omhlophe, iCivil Union Act ebheke imishado yabathandana nobulili obufanayo neRecognition of Customary Marriages Act ebhekele imishado yesintu.Yonke le mishado yenganyelwe iMatrimonial Property Act ebhekela ukulawulwa kwamafa ngesikhathi kusashadiwe, lapho sekwehlukaniswa noma uma kukhona odlula emhlabeni.Kufanele ngicacise ukuthi iMarriages Act neCivil Union Act ayinazo izimiso okufanele zenziwe ezithinta usikompilo lwakwantu.Isigaba sesithathu nesesine seRecognition of Customary Marriages Act, ebhekele imishado yesintu, zibalulekile kakhulu ngoba zibeka imibandela okufanele uyilandele ukuze ukwazi ukuba nomshado wesintu osemthethweni.Isigaba sesithathu sithi abashadayo kumele babe neminyaka engu-18 noma ngaphezulu bavumelane bobabili ukushada ngokwesintu.Isigaba sesibili, ngaphansi kwalesi esibalwe ngaphezulu sithi umshado wesintu kumele udingidwe kungenwe kuwona noma kulandelwe imikhuba noma izimiso ezilandelwayo uma kushadwa ngokwesintu.Okufanele kukhunjulwe wukuthi izigodi nemindeni kulandela amasiko ahlukene yingakho kufanele kuvunyelwane kuphinde kuqoshwe phansi ukuthi ikuphi okuzomele kulandelwe ukuze umshado wesintu uphelele.Yingakho kusuke kubalulekile ukulandela zonke izimo nemikhuba okuvunyelwene ngakho imindeni nabashadayo ezokhomba ukuthi umshado wakho wesintu uphelele.Isigaba sesine, sibeka ngokucacile ukuthi kuwumsebenzi walabo abasanda kushada ngokwesintu ukubhalisa umshado wabo eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya.Yilapho bethola khona incwadi yomshado eba wubufakazi obuqandula ikhanda ukuthi laba ababili abathandanayo bashadile futhi bashade ngokwesintu.Umshado wabo uyahlonishwa umthetho ngokugunyazwa yiRecognition of Customary Marriages Act.Isinyathelo esibalulekile lesi ngoba senza kwaziwe ukuthi inhloso yabashadile ibithini mayelana nomshado wesintu.Kwenza kube khona ubufakazi bokuthi bebefuna ukushada ngokwesintu kuphela noma kade besafuna ukushada ngokwasentshonalanga, lokhu okwaziwa ngomshado omhlophe befuna ukugcina isiko nje ngaphandle kokushada ngokwesintu.Kubalulekile ukuthi uma sekuthathwe isinqumo sikasofa silahlane kuqale kuhlelwe kahle, kutholwe nokwelulekwa ngokomthetho ukuthi lokho kuzokwenziwa kanjani.Uma unolwazi olugcwele mayelana nendlela oshade ngayo uzokwazi nokuthi ubufakazi obunjani obudingayo ukuze umshado wakho waziwe, ngaphandle kokuthi ucele inkantalo ikuqagule ukuthi ungoshadile.Okuhambisana nencwadi yomshado incwadi yokwaba amafa, phecelezi i-will. Ungakwazi ukuyisebenzisa ukwazisa abasele ukuthi uma ungasekho ufuna usingathwe kanjani umsebenzi wokukufihla nanokuthi obekungokwakho ufuna kutholwe wubani.Inkulu indima okusafanelwe ikhathulwe ukukhulisa ulwazi mayelana nokusebenza kwemithemtho yemishado, ikakhulukazi nakubafundisi.Okufanele kuqwashiswe abantu ngakho wukuthi yonke imithemtho eyengamele imishado iyalingana, inesisindo esilinganayo futhi ihlonishwa ngokufana. Kucaciswe nokuthi awukwazi ukuxuba le mithetho.Ukuze uzivikele wena nothandiweyo wakho, thola ukwelulekwa okuphelele uma usuthathe isinqumo sokubopha ifindo likasofa silahlane, ukuze ucaciselwe ngezinhlobo zemithetho nezimiso ezengamela imithetho elawula ukushada.
title: FUNDA: Konke odinga ukukwazi ngomshado wesintu osemthethweni

text: KUBAMBEZELEKE ukubhalisa e-Unisa eThekwini kuteleka izitshudeni nabasebenzi, ezitelekeni ebezenzeka kuzwelonke, izolo.Izisebenzi zakule nyuvesi ezweni lonke, ezingaphansi kwenyunyana iNational Education, Health and Allied Workers’ Union (Nehawu), zikhala ngamaholo, izimo okusetshenzwa ngaphansi kwazo nokunikezwa kwezinkampani zangaphandle umsebenzi.Okhulumela iNehawu kuzwelonke, uMnuz Khaya Xaba, uthe umqashi akakahlangabezani nezimfuno zabasebenzi.“Sifuna abasebenzi banyuselwe amaholo ngo- 9%. Kodwa umqashi ubeke u-6% etafuleni. Izimo abasebenzi abasebenza ngaphansi kwazo azigculisi.Kwezinye izindawo kunezakhiwo ezindala ezingekho esimeni. Ukuqashwa kwezinkampani zangaphandle ukwenza imisebenzi yasenyuvesi nakho sifuna kuphele,” kusho uXaba.Ngakolunye uhlangothi izitshudeni zona zivale umgwaqo odlula emasangweni enyuvesi zikhala ngezinkinga ezibhekene nazo zokubhalisa njengoba kuqale unyaka.US’fundo Sabela, ongomunye wabaholi bezitshudeni ophikweni iSimiso Nkwanyana, eThekwini uthe ukubhikisha kwabo akuhlangene nesiteleka sabasebenzi.“Sifuna izitshudeni ezingakwazi ukubhalisa ngenxa yokuthi zibanjelwe imiphumela yazo ngoba isikhwama sabafundi iNSFAS singakhokhile, zinikezwe imiphumela yazo. Futhi sifisa izingxoxo phakathi kwabaphathi be-Unisa nabasebenzi zisheshe ngoba zibambezela uhlelo lokubhalisa” kusho uSabela.Umengameli womkhandlu wezitshudeni e-Unisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLungelo Nhlabelo, uthe isigungu esiphezulu sabaholi bezitshudeni enyuvesi sizoba nesithangami nabezindaba namuhla ukucacisa konke okufunwa yizitshudeni.Okhulumela i-Unisa eKZN, uMnuz Siyabonga Seme, uthe bazitholile izikhalo zezitshudeni, inyuvesi iyazama ukwenza izinhlelo zokulekelela izitshudeni ezingakwazi ukubhalisa ngenxa yokungakhokhelwa yiNSFAS.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi akukho mpahla elinyaziwe ngesikhathi izitshudeni zibhikisha, amaphoyisa akwazile ukudambisa isimo.Ihhovisi likaNgqongqoshe uDkt Blade Nzimande wezeMfundo ePhakeme liphendulile ezimfunweni zenhlangano yezitshudeni.UNzimande uvumile ukuthi izitshudeni kumele ziyithole imiphumela yazo noma ngabe zikweleta isikhungo, ukuze zikwazi ukuyisebenzisa ukufuna umsebenzi noma ukuqhubeka nemfundo yazo.“Ngizoludingida lolu daba nabamanyuvesi akuleli,” kusho uNzimande esitatimendeni.Unobhala-jikelele weSouth African Unions of Students (Saus) uLwandile Mtsolo, uthe okunye okuvele ezimpendulweni zikaNzimande sebekucubungulile, okuningi abavumelani nakho, basazoqhubeka nokuteleka kuze kube izinto abazifunayo ziyenziwa. Uthe sebekhathele wukuthenjiswa izinto ezingafezwa.“Lapho ngibona ukuthi siyavumelana nongqongqoshe yisodabeni oluthinta ukuvulwa kabusha kokufakwa kwezicelo zezitshudeni ebezingakwazanga ukufaka izicelo kodwa esezithathiwe emanyuvesi futhi ezihlangabezanayo nezidingo ezifunwa ngamanyuvesi,” kusho uMtsolo.Uthe odabeni oluthinta izindawo zokuhlala izitshudeni, umnyango wakhuluma ngohlelo olubizwa ngeStudent Housing Infrastructure Programme, ngakho beyizitshudeni bayafisa ukwazi ukuthi uhlelo seluhambe igxathu elingakanani uma kubhekwa emuva eminyakeni emithathu edlule.Ngokwesitatimende sehhovisi likaNzimande, ihhovisi likaMgcinimafa kazwelonke selibeke eceleni imali enguR596 million ukubhekana nohlelo onyakeni wezimali u-2018/2019 no-2019/2020.E-University of KwaZulu-Natal kugcine sekuphoqa izolo ukuthi kumiswe ukubhalisa ngenxa yesiteleka sezitshudeni ebezikhala ngokunqatshelwa ukubhalisa ngoba zikweleta.Okhulumela i-UKZN, uMnuz Ashton Bodrick, uthe abaholi bezitshudeni bafuna ukuthi inyuvesi yamukele zonke izitshudeni ezinemindeni ethola imali engaphansi kuka- R350 000 ngonyaka, ngaphandle kokuthi zikhokhe imali yokubhalisa.“Inselelo esibhekene nayo ngeyokuthi u-78% wezitshudeni ezibhalisa kule nyuvesi zivela kulawa makhaya. Isikweletu sabafundi singuR1.7billion kodwa siyaqhubeka nokuqhamuka nezindlela ezizoqinisekisa ukuthi asikho isitshudeni esikhokha yonke imali esiyikweleta inyuvesi, ngaphambi kokuba sibhalise,” kusho Bodrick.
title: Iziteleka emanyuvesi ziphazamise ukubhalisa

text: ULinda uzakhele udumo ngokubhalela abanye abaculi izingoma, nezakhe. Phakathi kwazo kubalwa, iSokwenzenjani kaNaima Kay apike kuyo uRobbie Malinga.Ngo-2015 ukhiphe i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi, L.O.L. - Language of Love eyayigabe ngezingoma okubalwa kuzo ethi, Ngam’thanda Umuntu nezinye.“Uma usafika wenza okutshelwayo ukuthi lokhu kulungile, lokhu akulungile. Noma uthi uqinisa ikhanda uzenzela okwakho uyakhuzwa,” kusho uLinda.Lo mculi odabuka eChesterville, eThekwini uthe kwi-albhamu yakhe entsha ethi, Inhliziyo uthole ithuba lokuzibambela okuningi.“Le albhamu iwuLinda nje ngoba nasekudidiyelweni kwayo ngibe nesandla kakhulu yize ngisebenze noMjakes Thebe. Ngifuna abantu bangazi njengomuntu onethalente,” kuchaza uLinda.Le albhamu inezingoma ezingu-13 enye yazo ethi, Yim’ Okthandayo apike kuyo uZanda Zakuza isiqalile ukudlala emsakazweni.“Ngikhuluma ngezinto engidlule kuzo mina ngqo kwezothando ngiveze nemizwa yami. Ngibhale zonke izingoma futhi nesitayela somculo kuseyimi ngase ngengeza imisindo emisha esaR&B, mbaqanga ne-Afro jazz ukuze izokwamukelwa yiwo wonke umuntu. Umculo wami awunanhlamba nabantu abadala bangawulalela umculo.”Ubuye waveza ukuthi umcimbi wakhe iLove & Soul obuzoba seThe Joint Cafe ngoMeyi 4 usuhlehlisiwe.“Sibe nenkinga ngendawo sase siphoqeleka ukuthi sithole enye. Usuzoba seS43 kuMngeni ngaseMoses Mabhida Stadium ngoMeyi 25. Siyaxolisa kubantu ngobuhixihixi kodwa basengawasebenzisa amathikithi noma bathole imali.”
title: ULinda Gcwensa ne-albhamu entsha

text: INJINI yeCape Town City, uTeko “The General” Modise, ikhala ngobunzima bokubhekana neMaritzburg United eHarry Gwala Stadium ngesizini esanda kusongwa.UModise uyisethenjwa somqeqeshi weThe Citizens, uBenni McCarthy, ofake leli qembu kwiMTN8 ngesizini yokuqala engumqeqeshi. ICity imise kabi amaqembu amaningi kwi-Absa Premiership okukhona kuwona ne-Orlando Pirates eyikhiphe kwiNedbank Cup. I-The Citizens iqede endaweni yesihlanu kwi-log yePremiership nokuyiqhatha neTeam of Choice, esonge isendaweni yesine, kwiMTN8 okuzovulwa ngayo isizini ka-2018/2019. Lo mdlalo uzoba seHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.UModise ubekhuluma ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni abadlali abaqokelwe imiklomelo yePremier Soccer League (PSL) ngeledlule.“Lena bekuyisizini engaqondakali. Awukho umdlalo obukade uya kuwona unesiqiniseko sokuthi yiliphi iqembu elizowina. Kube kuhle ukubona iPirates ivuka emuva kwesizini engeyinhle ebe nayo, neMaritzburg United. Kithina siyiCity besinomqeqeshi omusha obekufanele sijwayele indlela afuna senze ngayo izinto,” kusho uModise.“Obekunzima kakhulu kule sizini ukuyodlala neMaritzburg enkundleni yayo. Bekungelula kuwona wonke amaqembu kwiPremiership. Angicabangi ukuthi likhona iqembu ebelithanda ukuya eHarry Gwala kule sizini. Wonke amaqembu athwale kanzima ukuyihlula eMaritzburg.”Emidlalweni emibili yesizini edlule iMaritzburg ihlule iCity ngo 4-2 eKapa kwathi eHarry Gwala badlala ngokulingana ngo 1-1.UModise ukhulume ngabadlali abaqokelwe imiklomelo okukhona kuyona owomdlali ovelele, iPSL Footballer of The Year ozobangwa nguPercy Tau, Hlompho Kekana beMamelodi Sundowns noSiphesihle Ndlovu weMaritzburg United. Lo mklomelo uhambisana nesizumbulu sika-R250 000.UModise uwine umklomelo iFootballer of the Year kabili kulandelana esayibamba kwiPirates.“Ngesikhathi ngiyiwina okokuqala yanginika ukuzethemba ngagcina ngiseqenjini lesizwe. Ngaleso sikhathi iPirates ibikade iqede isizini endaweni yesishiyagalombili nokwenza kube nemibuzo eminingi ngokuwina kwami. Okwesibili bengikade sengifuna ukuzakhela ukuhlonishwa, abantu babone ukuthi ngingumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu.”ICity izoqala isizini entsha ngaphandle kukakaputeni uRobyn Johannes osejoyine iBidvest Wits.
title: 'Bekunzima ukudlala neMaritzburg United'

text: MCEBO MPUNGOSEUMREPHA ongaconsi phansi kubalandeli bomculo kuleli u-AKA, usephumele obala waqinisekisa ukuthi ngeke abe yingxenye yeminye yemicimbi emikhulu kunayo yonke ye-hip hop kuleli, iBack To The City ezoba ngo-Ephreli 27 eNewtown, eGoli.U-AKA wagcina ukubonakala ngo-2011 kulo mcimbi onomlando omude ngokuqoqa abathandi bomculo besuka ezifundazweni ezihlukene kwazise kusuke kugujwa uSuku lweNkululeko.Esitatimendeni asikhiphe ngoMsombuluko ebusuku, u-AKA udalule ukuthi kube nokushayisana kwemibono phakathi kwakhe nabahleli bomcimbi okudale ukuthi agcine eselihoxisile igama lakhe.Uthe nakuba livela ezikhangisweni ezikhona, ngeke aze acule kulo mcimbi ngenxa yokubukelwa phansi ngabahleli bawo abahlulekile ukufaka igama lakhe phambili nabaculi baphesheya. Uveze ukuthi simdumaze kakhulu isikhangiso esifake igama lakhe livela kancane, lifakwe namanye amaciko akuleli.“Ngizithatha njengeciko elisezingeni lomhlaba. Sengike ngahambela amazwe amaningi, nginezindondo, inqwaba yabalandeli nemicimbi engicula kuyo bukhoma nomculo osezingeni ofakazela lokho. Ngibahlonipha impela o-Elzhi, Jay Live, Skyzoo noCamp Lo kodwa ngeke ngivume ukuthi iciko elinjengami lehliselwe entweni encane nje,” kusho lo mculi.Uthe ngokwesivumelwano abe naso ezingxoxweni nabahleli, ubefuna ukuthi iBack To The City yanonyaka ikugqamise kakhulu ukuthi useshaya ibuya ngokuthi afakwe phambili njengoba ayeshiye ekhala ngokubukelwa phansi kwamaciko ahamba phambili kuleli.Uthe lokhu ubezokwenza cishe mahhala ngoba imali abezoyihola ubezoyisebenzisa kuwo umcimbi ukuthi ashaye into ecokeme.Lo mrepha uphethe ngokuthi lokhu akuchazi ukuthi akasezwani nabahleli bomcimbi kodwa ufuna ukugqamisa ukuthi isekude kanjani indlela ebheke ekuguqulweni kwemiqondo ngendima yomculo.Phakathi kwabaculi bakuleli abazobe benandisa emcimbini kubalwa u-Elzhi, Riky Rick, Reason, L-Tido, Emtee, Fifi Cooper, Gigi Lamayne, Pro, Yanga, Proverb, Big Star Johnson, Nadia Nakai nabanye.Amathikithi ayatholakala kuPostnet nesekhasini leBack to the City kuFacebook ngenani eliqala ngoR150 kuya ku-R350.
title: Uhoxile u-AKA ekhala ngokungahlonishwa

text: AMAPHOYISA nabebelawula isiminyaminya emngcwabeni womfundi waseNkosibomvu Secondary, eHambanathi, oThongathi, obuyizolo bahluleke bancama ukulawula abantu.Yize amaphoyisa abevimbe emgwaqweni wakubo ka-Andile Bobo Mbuthu (16) ededela ababhalwe ohlwini lwabantu abangu-50 ebebevumeleke kulo mngcwabo kubonakale abantu sebegcwele emagcekeni omakhelwane bakubo kamufi besebenzisa izindlela ezinqamulelayo zokungena.Izikhulumi zichaze uBobo njengengane ebithanda ukusebenza. Unina omncane kaBobo uthe ubethanda ibhizinisi, waqala esemncane ukuqhuba izinqola ethuthela abantu izimpahla uma beyogilosa oThongathi.“Indlela ashone ngayo namanje sifisa ukwazi ukuthi wayenzeni,” kusho yena.UNokwanda Magudulela obefunda noBobo uGrade12 eNkosibomvu uhaye inkondlo echaza ngesihluku sokubulawa kwakhe.UNkk Zandile Mkhwanazi umakhelwane ufanise uBobo nohlamvu olukhethekile.“Ngicabanga ukuthi wayeneminyaka eyisikhombisa ezongitshela ukuthi ufuna ukusebenza. Ngelinye ilanga ngathi kuye akacele kunina khona sizohamba naye siye oThongathi ayosebenza njengoba egcine eseqhuba izinqola. Ukwehluka kwakhe ngikuthatha ngokuthi ubewuhlamvu olukhethekile yingakho ukunyamalala kwakhe kunyakazise umhlaba wonke, ngoba ubekhethekile,” kusho yena.Uthisha wakhe uNksz Reginah Khoza uthe uBobo ubenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyaziwa.“Zimbalwa izingane ezifika kothisha zizazise zisho ukuthi zingobani. Ubengumfundi onempilo,ephokophele phambili. Ubeke enze imikhuba ekucasulayo kodwa ukuzikhandla kwakhe ngomsebenzi kukwenze usheshe udlulise. Abafundi abasesigabeni sakhe basakhula bayawenza amaphutha. Kumele sibathande benjengoba benjalo,” kusho yena.Amaphoyisa ezama ukuhlela abafundi nomphakathi ukuze baqhelelane becula bedansa emuva kwenkonzo yomngcwabo ka-Andile Bobo Mbuthu waseHambanathi. Isithombe :Bongani Mbatha/ Africa News Agency (ANA)UMnuz Mthokozisi Nene usihlalo we-ANC oThongathi uthe umphakathi awuxabene namaphoyisa kodwa ulwela ukuthi abantu abonile baphathwe ngendlela efanayo nabanemali.Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka inkonzo, uma kunesikhulumi bekuthuleka.Kuthe sekuphuma ibhokisi likaBobo sekuyiwa emathuneni umculi ocula owokholo, * -Andile kaMajola osize umndeni ngokufihlwa kukamufi waqala iculo intsha yaphuma iqhasha iza etendeni inanela iculo.
title: Bafike ngobuningi kokaBobo

text: Mhleli: Kungaba kuhle siyikhulume le ndaba eyenziwa yiHhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi, njengoba kubukeka umphakathi ugabiselwa ngamalungelo kuleli lizwe.IHhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi liyingxenye enkulu yezinhlaka zikahulumeni obuswa ngokwentando yeningi, ngaleyo ndlela ziningi izinselelo ezikhona okumele kubhekwane nazo nsuku zonke.Siyaqonda ukuthi leli hhovisi lithwele kanzima, ekubeni nezinsiza kusebeza ziyingcosana ukubhekana nalo mthwalo.Ngamanye amagama ukuphawula kwami lapha akuhlobene nombono ongenaso isisekelo, kodwa kunalokho, inhloso yami enkulu ukudlulisa ukunganeliseki ngendlela leli hhovisi elingasabalali ngayo nxashane libheka usizi nokuhlupheka kwabantu ezweni lakithi.Mhlawumbe angikucacise ukuthi ikhwela elihlatshwa yileli hhovisi odabeni lwenkohlwakalo eyenziwa yizikhulu zikaHulumeni, iyezwakala, kodwa ngakolunye uhlangothi akufanele ukubuka koMvikeli woMphakathi besekugxila kongxiwankulu kuphela, ngoba indaba yokuhlukumezeka kwabantu ayipheleli lapho, njengoba abantu abaningi basahlaliswa ngasentuthwini kungafanele, ngenxa yokuntula ulwazi.Ngicabanga ukuthi akwanele neze ukuthi uMvikeli woMphakathi aluse izikhulu zoMbuso kuphela, ngokweziphambeko zazo,nokuyothi nxashane abaHlonishwa bebhadameka ebubini maqede kugijinyiswane nabo kuze kuyoshona ilanga, kube kanti uquqaba luphekwe ngobhojwana laphaya emazingeni aphansi.Ngokubuka okuphusile kufanele uMvikeli woMphakathi kumhluphe ukuthi abantu abaningi kuleli lizwe abanakho ukuqonda ukuthi uma sikhuluma ngelungelo elivikelekile, sikhuluma ngani, liqala nini ukuba khona, futhi ligcina kuphi ukuvikeleka kwalo.Le nto-ke, isidale izinkinga eziningi njengoba, kuphetha ngokuthi kwesinye isikhathi ilungelo lihlanekezeleke, bese kuyonakala.Ngalesi sizathu ngibona iHhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi lingenzi okwaneleyo nxa kuzosilela emuva lenkambiso ekusebenzeni kwakhe:-Ukusukuma kamuva ekuhlonzeni izinto ezihlukumeza umphakathi-Ukungabikho kohlelo olucacile ngokuqhubekayo lokufundisa umphakathi ngamalungelo awo.-Ukungavikeleki kahle ezigcawini zamacala abasebenzi(1) Ukusukuma kamuva ekuhlonzeni izinto ezihlukumeza umphakathi:Kumele uMvikeli woMphakathi akwazi ukuhlonza kahle izinto ezihlupha umphakathi nsukuzonke, ukuze ezokwazi ukubeka umgoga ngenhloso yokuvikela isizwe kulowomkhuba oqhubekayo.Akwenele ukusukuma kamuva umonakalo usuwenzakele, njengoba nesisho sithi, ‘elisuka muva likholwa yizagila’.(2) Ukungabikho kohlelo olucacile ngokuqhubekayo lokufundisa uMphakathi ngamalungelo awo :Amalungelo abhalwe phansi kuSomqulu kaHulumeni, kodwa engaziwa yizinkumbi zomphakathi, afana ncimishi namalungelo angekho, nxa ilungelo lingaziwa, kulukhuni ukuthi kubekhona omemezayo ngalo, kwelokuthi seliphuliwe, okusobala maningi amalungelo aphulwayo emphakathini, aphethe ngokungavikeleki.(3) Ukungavikeleki kahle ezigcawini zamacala abasebenzi:Abasebenzi ngenye ingxenye yoMphakathi engavikelekile ngokwaneleyo, ikakhulukazi ngoba nxa kunamacala ezigcawini ezixazulula izinkinga zabasebenzi, alukho uhlelo lwamahhala olubhekela ukulekelela umsebenzi ukuthi ethule udaba lwakhe ngosizo lomthetho,Njengoba sibona kwenzeka eziNkantolo zoMthetho, le nto iletha igebe elikhulu lokungalingani, phakathi komqashi ozifikela nommeli wakhe, kanti umsebenzi ngenxa yokuntuleka kwezikhwepha zomnotho, aphethe ngokudondolozela ngosizo lwenyunyana, nayo engahle ingabi sezingeni lokubhekana nesazimthetho sikamqashi.Konke lokhu kukhomba ubuthakathaka ehhovisini loMvikeli woMphakathi.Kuyoba kuhle nxa lezi zidingo zingabhekelwa esikhathini esizayo.Themba Xolani ZikhaliKWAMHLABUYALINGANA
title: [IMIBONO] Ngikhala ngokungasabalali kweHhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi

text: AZOWUDLELA ezitokisini uKhisimusi amadoda ayisithupha okubalwa kuwo nekhansela asolwa ngokubulala isishoshovu se-ANC eMoses Mabhida, uMnuz Msawakhe “Qashana” Mchunu ngemuva kokuchithwa kwesicelo sawo sebheyili yiNkantolo yesiFunda yaseMgungundlovu.Abasolwa, okuyikhansela laku-ward 10, KwaPata uMnuz Nkosinathi “TK” Gambu, oMnuz Skhanyiso Zimu, Sifiso Mbele, Mlungisi Zimu, Ayanda Ngubane noGift Zungu bebevele enkantolo ngoLwesihlanu, bezolalela isinqumo ngesicelo sabo sebheyili. UZungu uyindodana yePhini leMeya kuMasipala waseMgungundlovu uNkk Fucwana Zungu.Icala labo lihlehliselwe uJanuwari 23 futhi bazogcinwa ezitokisini.Abasolwa sebehlale isikhathi eside ezitokisini njengoba nesicelo sabo sebheyili sidonse cishe amasonto amathathu singaqedwa njengoba size saphothulwa ngoLwesihlanu.IMantshi, uMnuz Sello Maboee, ithe isizathu esidale ukuthi abasolwa banganikwa ibheyili wukuthi ukuphuma kwabo kungadala ukuthi kungabikhona uzinzo kwi-ward yabo njengoba kunezinhlangothi ezimbili ezibangayo.“Esinye isizathu wukuthi azikho izinto ezingajwayelekile abasolwa abazivezele inkantolo ebezingenza ukuthi babonelelwe banikwe ibheyili,” kusho uMaboee.Isinqumo sikaMaboee samukelwe ngezindlela ezingafani njengoba umndeni kamufi nalabo abamesekayo besijabulele. Ngakolunye uhlangothi izihlobo zabasolwa nalabo ababasekayo bona sibajabhisile.Esithangamini nabezindaba phambilini, okhulumela umndeni kamufi, uMnuz Phumlani Zuma, wathi bona bewumndeni bafisa ukuthi abasolwa banganikwa ibheyili kuze kuba kuqedwa ukuqulwa kwecala labo.
title: Kuchithwe esebheyili kwabasolwa ngokubulala owe-ANC

text: Bese kwaziwa ukuthi uCassper unomlando wokugcwalisa izinkundla ezinkulu okukhona kuzo iFNB, eseGoli ayigcwalisa ngonyaka odlule kodwa kulokhu amathikithi omcimbi adayise angaphela.Uthe uphoxekile ngokuthi ube­thenjiswe ukuxhaswa kodwa kwagcina kungenzekanga kwaze kwaphoqa ukuthi asebenzise imali yakhe.Ngemuva komcimbi ubhale kuTwitter wathi uphatheke kabuhlungu ngezingqinamba abhekane nazo ezimlahlekisele ngemali enkulu.“Ngisazoqhubeka. Ngiyabonga kakhulu kubantu baseThekwini.”Yize kube nezinkinga kodwa abalandeli bakhe ubageze ubebe ebadansisa kwaze kwavalwa umcimbi.UWUVALE kanje umcimbi wakhe iFillUpMosesMabhidaStadium uCassper Nyovest endiza emoyeni ecula ingoma ethi Tito Mboweni kwahlanya izihlweleUCassper ungene ngo-11 ebusuku emuva kokuvulelwa ngabaculi abahlukene okukhona kubo uSjava, Benny Maverick Black Motion, Distruction Boyz nabanye.Ezingomeni aziculile bekukhona ezintsha nezindala nezinye azicula nabaculi abahlukene.Lokhu bekwenza kubonakale abaculi abahlukene esiteji okukhona kubo uBabes Wodumo, Nadia Nakai, Shwi noMtekhala nabanye.IZIHLWELE ezidele ubuthongo zathamela umculo emcimbini kaCassper Nyovest obizwa iFillUp-MosesMabhida ngoMgqibelo ebusukuUShwi noMtekhala bajabulise iningi bevalelisa ngengoma yabo eyashisa izikhotha ethi Ngafa.NamaHotella Queens ahlanyise intsha ebikhona ngengoma ethi Lilizela Mlilizeli.Uchaze iningi uCassper evala ngengoma yakhe ethi Tito Mboweni eqhamuka endiza phezulu kwezihlwele kwahlanya iningi.
title: UCassper kumhlulile ukugcwalisa iMabhida

text: UMQEQESHI kaKevin “Two Guns” Lerena, uPeter Smith, ubamba uyayeka ngesimemo sokuyolwa emqhudelwaneni womhlaba iWorld Boxing Super Series.USmith, usecathulise uLerena wamenza omunye wabashayisibhakela asebeqala ukubhekisiswa esibhakeleni somhlaba. Ngesonto eledlule uLerena uvikele ngempumelelo ibhande le-International Boxing Organisation (IBO) cruiserweight ehlula ngamaphuzu uRoman Golovashchenko wase-Ukraine. ULerena ubeqala ukuvikela leli bhande kusukela eliwine ngoMashi lingaphethwe muntu ehlula uDmytro Kucher wase-Ukraine empini ebikade ise-Emperors Palace, eGauteng. Ubuqhawe abukhombise ebhekene noGlovashchenko buholele ekutheni afakwe ohlwini lwabashayisibhakela abazolwa kwiWorld Boxing Super Series phesheya kwezilwandle. Lo mqhudelwano, ohambisana nesizumbulu sikaR633 million kozowina, uqhatha abashayisibhakela abaphezulukwi-cruiserweight emhlabeni wonke.USmith uthe usafuna ukukhuluma nomphathi weGolden Gloves, uRodney Berman, ngaphambi kokuthatha isinqumo.“Ngizoxoxa noBerman kuleli sonto ngizwe imininingwane yonke ngalo mqhudelwano. Kufanele ngithole ukuthi obani abanye abashayisibhakela abakhona. Imali iyaheha impela. Kodwa kufanele ngicabangele uKevin. Uma kukhona abashayisibhakela abaziwayo kungaba yingozi ukuya khona,” kusho uSmith.“Abantu abazi ukuthi uKevin ngimakhe kanjani. Kufanele ngilinakekele ikusasa lakhe. Kuningi okusafanele ngimfundise khona. Bekulula kimina ukuvuma, ngimphonse emphandwini wezingonyama kodwa ngicabangela ikusasa lakhe. Lokhu abantu abakubona manje kuyena yizinto ebengilokhu ngimfundisa zona. Angiyena lo mqeqeshi obona ibhokisa lakhe lilwa kahle impi eyodwa bese ezitshela ukuthi useyingqwele.”ULerena ungumshayisibhakela wesibili eMzansi ukumenywa emqhudelwaneni omkhulu kulo nyaka. Umpetha weWorld Boxing Organisation (WBO) bantamwewight uZolani, “Last Born” Tete, uzolwa kwiWorld Boxing Super Series esisindweni sakhe. Kubashayisibhakela ababhekwe kwiWorld Boxing Super Series kukhona umpetha weWorld Boxing Council (WBC) ne-WBO, * -Oleksandr Usyk wase-Ukraine owahlula uThabiso Mchunu ngomngqimuzo womlalisa phansi ngo-2016, noMurat Gassiev waseRussia ophethe ibhande le-Interntional Boxing Federation (IBF) neleWorld Boxing Association (WBA) Super.“Isunqumo silele kimina, hhayi komunye umuntu. UKevin uyangethemba. Isibhakela ngesesikhashana, kumele wenze imali kodwa kufanele sibheke ubungozi. Angifuni siye laphayana ukuyokwengenza isibalo. Uma siqoka ukungenela umqhudelwano, kufanele siyowina.” kusho uSmith.
title: Umqeqeshi usabhala ecisha ngomqhudelwano

text: IGQAME ngehlazo lokwenyuka kwesibalo sokubulawa kwabantu iKwaZulu-Natal, ngesikhathi kwethulwa izibalo zobugebengu zesikhathi esiphakathi kuka-Ephreli 2019 noMashi 2020.Izibalo azisifaki isikhathi lapho izwe lisebenza ngaphansi kwemigomo ngenxa yeCorona. UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele ehambisana nezikhulu zamaphoyisa, wethule izibalo zobugebengu ePitoli ngoLwesihlanu.Nakuba zehlile izibalo zobugebengu kuzwelonke kodwa uCele ulibeke ngembaba elokuthi iKwaZulu-Natal ihamba phambili ngokubulawa kwabantu.Amacala okubulala abikiwe esifundazweni angu-4 859 okusho ukwenyuka ngamacala angu-464 uma kuqhathaniswa nokwedlule. Kusho ukuthi amacala enyuke ngo-10.6% esifundazweni. Uthe izindawo eziyinkinga zakhele iTheku kodwa bazozama ukuqinisa isandla ukunqanda isimo. Ukhale nangezinga lamacala ocansi adlala lubi kulezi zindawo ezingaseThekwini. Uthe utshwala buneqhaza elikhulu ekwenyukeni kwezibalo zobugebengu okukhalwa ngabo.“Inanda noMlazi yizindawo eziyinkinga kakhulu kodwa sinalo ithemba ngoba sethule umkhankaso i-Operation Vala esisowusebenzisela ukulwa nobugebengu esifundazweni. Isiteshi ebesiyinkinga saseNyanga, eWestern Cape sizamile ukwehla kulokhu kwenyuka ezaKwaZulu-Natal,’’ kusho uCele.Ongene wagxila ezibalweni ezichaza kahle kube wuGeneral Norman Sekhukhune ongungoti wezibalo embuthweni wamaphoyisa.Kuzwelonke izibalo zobugebengu zehlile zisuka ku-339 281 zaya ku-290 176 nokusho ukwehla ngamacala angu-49 105. Izibalo zichaza ukuthi ubugebengu behle ngo-14.5% uma kuqhathaniswa nonyaka odlule.Amacala okubulala enyuke esuka ku-21 022 ahlala ku-21 325 nokusho ukwenyuka ngamacala angu-303.Okusho ukwenyuka ngo-1.4% uma kuqhathaniswa nonyaka odlule.Awokuzama ukubulala ehlile esuka ku-18 980 aya ku-18 635 nokusho ukuthi ehle ngamacala angu-345. Lokhu kuchaza ukwehla ngo-1.8% kunawonyaka owedlule.Ukushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza kwehle kwasuka ku-170 979 kwaya ku-166 720 okusho ukuthi kwehle ngamacala angu-4 259, kwehle ngo-2.5%.Ukushaya nje okungatheni kwenyukile kusuka ku-162 012 kwaya ku-165 494 nokusho ukwenyuka ngamacala angu-3 482 kanti kuwukwenyuka ngo-2.1%.Ukubamba inkunzi ngesihluku kwenyuke kusuka -140 032 kwaya ku-143 990 nokuchaza ukwenyuka ngo-3 958 kanti kube wu-2.8%. Ukudunwa kwezimoto kusuke ku-16 026 kwaya ku-18 162.Ukubanjwa kwezimoto zemali kusuke ku-183 kwaya ku-164 nokusho ukwehla ngamacala angu-19.Akukho ngisho icala elilodwa emacaleni okubanjwa kwamabhange.
title: Behlile ubugebengu kwenyuka ukubulala eKZN

text: SIKHULU isililo emindenini yamadoda amabili abengonogada besiqiwi sikaMasipala weTheku, iSilverglen Nature Reserve, eChatsworth adutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu ashona ngoLwesine ekuseni.UMnuz Cyril Mduduzi Hlafuna (47) waseQoloqolo, eMthwalume noMnuz Jabulani Gwacela (36) waseMvutshini, ePort Shepstone badutshulwe ngabo-8 ekuseni ngesikhathi behamba ngeveni kamasipala, bejikeleza isiqiwi begadile.Yomibili imindeni ikhaliswa wukuthi ayibikelwanga ngemva kwesehlakalo, izidumbu zize zayiswa emakhazeni. Imindeni ithi ize yaziswa ngokushona kwamalungu ayo ngoLwesihlanu kusihlwa.UNkk Nokwazi Gwacela oyinkosikazi kaGwacela, uthi ubikelwe ngo-4:15 ntambama yiphoyisa lomkhandlu elaligada isiqiwi nomyeni wakhe, kudala.Bashonele endaweni yesehlakalo njengoba abahlaseli kuthiwa bathathe isikhwama semali sikaGwacela nesibhamu somsebenzi sikaHlafuna.UNkk Gwacela uthi ubengamtholi usuku lonke ocingweni umyeni wakhe nemiyalezo engayiphenduli, waze wafonela leli phoyisa ukuze limnike inamba yocingo kaHlafuna.“Iphoyisa likhihle isililo langibuza ukuthi bengingakezwa lutho yini ngoba lona alikwazi ukungitshela lutho. Ngigcizelele ukuthi lingitshele, lasho ukuthi umyeni wami noHlafuna badutshuliwe. Ngididekile ngangazi ngenzenjani, ngathumela ubhuti wami nomfundisi esiqiwini bayothola kwenzekeni, baziqinisekisa ukuthi akasekho umyeni wami,” kusho uNkk Gwacela ekhihla isililo.UGwacela ubeqashe eWelbedacht East, eChatsworth. Ushiye emhlabeni abantwana abane.UMnuz Musa Duma ongumzala kaHlafuna, uthe umufi ubeyinsika yekhaya, baziswe ngabasebenzi bomkhandlu emva kuka-7 ebusuku ngosuku lwesehlo. Ukhala ngokuthi izidumbu zisuswe endaweni yesigameko zayiswa emakhazeni, bengaziswanga lutho bewumndeni.“Ubafo ubehlala ngaphakathi esiqiwini kusukela eqala lomsebenzi ngeminyaka yo-2001. Ushadelwe ngoDisemba 2019. Ushiye umakoti esemncane nabantwana abathathu,” kusho uDuma.UDuma ugxeke umkhandlu ngokwehluleka ukuqinisa ezokuphepha kwabasebenzi bawo. Uthe abakwazi kwenza lutho ngamalungiselelo omngcwabo ngoba iphoyisa alifuni nomazisi kamufi lithi uyizibithi.IMeya yeTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, isigxekile lesi sigameko yadlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yabashonile. UKaunda unxenxe amaphoyisa ukuba asheshise uphenyo ukuze kuboshwe abasolwa. Wathi izigameko zalolu hlobo azijwayelekile, waseyalela ukuba kuqiniswe ezokuphepha kuzona zonke iziqiwi zabo.“Sicela noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi mayelana nesigameko ukuba asinikeze lona emaphoyiseni ukuze kuboshwe abasolwa,” kusho uKaunda.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aseBayview aphenya amacala amabili okubulala. Uthe abashonile bebenamanxeba okudutshulwa emzimbeni futhi bahlonzwe njengabashonele endaweni yesehlakalo.
title: Isililo kubulawa onogada esiqiwini eThekwini

text: SEKUQUBUKE umbango emndenini ngokungcwatshwa kowesifazane waseKuils River owadutshulwa wabulawa namadodakazi akhe amabili beqothwa ngumyeni wakhe ngaphambi kokuthi azibulale naye.Kubikwa ukuthi umndeni womyeni, uMnuz Sithembiso Ntombela (36, uyenqaba ukuvumela umndeni kaNkk Pumla Mvinjelwa-Ntombela (33) ukuthi uthathe izidumbu zabo.Izihlobo ezidiniwe zikaPumla, zithi azifuni ukuthi udadewabo angcwatshwe nombulali wakhe. UPumla namadodakazi akhe uNhlanhla noBajabulile, batholwa bedutshuliwe babulawa ekhaya labo eliseBardale Village ngeledlule, nomyeni wakhe uSimthembile okuthiwa washiya incwadi yokuzibulala ngaphambi kokuthi azinqokloze ngesibhamu. Udadewabo, uNksz Nondumiso Mvinjelwa, uthi ngemUva kwalezi zindaba ezithusayo, imindeni yomibili yavumelana ngokuthi kulindwe uyise kamkhwenyana uMnuz Mncedisi Ntombela (73) ukuthi alibangise eKapa esuka e-Eastern Cape ukuze kulungiselelwe umngcwabo.Bathuka boma uma bethola ukuthi umndeni kaSimthembile wabe usuhambe ngaphandle kwabo ukuyohlola izidumbu eTygerberg Mortuary."UPumla ubenesibongo esifana nesabo ngakho bakwazi ukunikezwa izidumbu ngaphandle kwethu, kepha kwangenelela abaphathi, imindeni yomibili yacelwa ukuba ihambe. Babe sebesitshela ukuthi umndeni wabo ose-Eastern Cape ubayalele ukuthi bangabe besakhulumisana nathi njengoba kuzolandelwa usiko lokuthi abafi bangcwatshwe ekhaya likayise wabo," kusho uNondumiso ekhuluma nephephandaba elingizakwabo weSolezwe iDaily Voice. UNondumiso uthe, sebeyile ukuyobonana nabammeli kanti futhi bazimisele ngokulwa nomndeni kaSimthembile enkantolo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uPumla namadodakazi akhe bangcwatshwa ekhaya likanina."Encwadini yokuzibulala, uyalele uPumla ukuthi athathe uR100 000 womgcwabo wakhe awunike unina bese angezi emngcwabeni wakhe. Yingakho sicabanga ukuthi ubehlele ukuzibulala yedwa," kusho yena.Umndeni kaSimthembile uthintwa wenqabile ukuphawula ngalolu daba.
title: Sekuqubuke umbango emndenini ngezidumbu zababulawa yinhloko yekhaya

text: BONISWA MOHALEIZINGXOXO eziqale ngo-8.30 ekuseni zaze zaphela ntambama phakathi kosomatekisi nezikhulu zikaMasipala zivune osomatekisi njengoba ededeliwe amatekisi amaningi abevalelwe ephawundini.Angu-44 amatekisi akhishwe ephawundini kanti amanye asele kusazolandelwa imigudu efanele ngokudedelwa kwawo.Lawo matekisi adedelwa nje kuke kwashuba ngoLwesibili eThekwini osomatekisi bengenela isiteleka esibuye saba nodlame saphoqa abagibeli ukuba balubhade phansi.Osomatekisi bebekhala ngokuthi amatekisi abo ayaboshwa avalelwe ephawundini ngenxa yenkinga yamaphemithi okufuneka ilungiswe eMgungundlovu wuMnyango wezokuThutha.IMenenja kaMasipala weTheku uMnuz Sibusiso Sithole, echaza ngesinqumo sokudedela amatekisi uthe kumele bachazele umshushisi ukuthi kungani la matekisi kumele asheshe adedelwe.“Sikubeke kwacaca ukuthi amatekisi kumele akhishwe ephawundini ngoba kuthikamezeka abantu baseThekwini nabaKwaZulu-Natal. Asifuni ukuphinde sibhekane nalesi simo ngakho kumele kube nokuxhumana wonke umuntu aqonde ukuthi amaphoyisa kaMasipala asuke egcina umthetho,” kusho uSithole.UMnuz Yusuf Khaliva weSantaco eThekwini uthe bajabule ngesivumelwano abasenzile noMasipala ngoba amatekisi abo azodedelwa mahhala njengoba bebecelile kuthi amanye kubhekwe ukuthi ayengene kanjani ephawundini kulandelwe imithetho.Uthe akusikhona ukuthi balwa nabagibeli noma babasebenzisa ukufeza izinhloso zabo kodwa uma amatekisi evalelwe ephawundini nabo bayahlukumezeka ngoba basuke bengasebenzi.“Siyakuqonda ukuthi uMasipala akusiwona okhipha amaphemithi, nguMnyango wezokuThutha owenza lokho kodwa kuyadingeka ukuxhumana okuhle phakathi kwethu nobuholi bukaMasipala. Sizoba nemihlangano nyanga zonke ukuxoxa ngezinkinga esibhekene nazo. Siyaxolisa kubagibeli ngokuthikamezeka okube khona, futhi siyabahlonipha ngoba bangobasi bethu,” kusho uKhaliva.UMnuz Mdu Nkosi ongumholi wekhokhasi ye-IFP kuMasipala weTheku uthe isiteleka samatekisi siyinkinga eThekwini ngoba impilo yabantu iba sengcupheni.“Kukhona abalimele abanye basayiniswa izincwadi zezexwayiso emsebenzini.“Kubalulekile ukuthi uMasipala aluxazulule udaba lwamatekisi ngoba kuma iKwaZulu-Natal yonke. Ukube amatekisi ebengahambi isonto lonke umphakathi ubuzophazamiseka ngoba baningi abantu abathuthwa yiwona. Abanye bahamba amacala, abanye balungiselela imingcwabo bonke bagibela amatekisi,” kusho uNkosi.Uthe okunye wukuthi amatekisi aboshiwe ayakhokhelwa nyanga zonke futhi abanikazi bawo baziphilisa ngawo, uma engasebenzi kusho ukuthi bazokweleta amabhange, izingane zingafundi bese nomphakathi ungathutheki.Uveze ukuthi ngisho amatekisi ahambela amabanga amade athulula eThekwini aba nenkinga uma kutelekiwe.Umholi wekhokhasi yeDA kuMasipala weTheku uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango ubhale ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook ukuthi: “Osomatekisi banqobile. Sisondela ekubeni ngumphakathi ongenamthetho ngoba abantu bavele besabise ngokwenza iKwaZulu-Natal ingalawulekile uma amacala ababhekene nawo engahoxiswa.”UNksz Tozi Mthethwa oyiNhloko yoPhiko lwezokuXhumana kuMasipala weTheku esitatimendeni uthe abagibeli bazojabula ukuthi uMasipala nobuholi bamatekisi basheshe bathola isixazululo sesiteleka.Uthe akusiwo wonke amatekisi adedelwe mahhala kodwa angu-44 akhishiwe kanti kwamanye bazolandela izinhlelo ezifanele.
title: Bawinile osomatekisi kwadedelwa izimoto

text: ALAHLWE elakubo amadoda amabili aboshwe ngamaphoyisa emzini ahlinzela kuwo izimoto oseZakheni ngoMsombuluko.UCaptain Nqobile Gwala wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uthe ukuboshwa kwalawa madoda aneminyaka engu-46 nengu-47 kwenzeke emuva kokuthi inkampani esuke ithungatha izimoto ezintshontshiwe ithole ukuthi enye imoto efunwayo iseZakheni.“Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa aseLadysmith ophiko lwezinja eyofuna imoto entshontshiwe eMansibilayo athole ukuthi namaphoyisa aseZululand afuna abasolwa abagqekeze umuzi eMondlo, eVryheid, ngeSonto. Amaphoyisa abe esesebenzisana alandela umkhondo afinyelela emzini okuhlizwa kuwo izimoto,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Uthe amaphoyisa abophe amadoda amabili awafice kulo muzi, ashaqa izimoto ezinhlanu okukhona kuzo iloli nezigadla ezimbili. Izimoto ezishaqwe ngamaphoyisa iToyota RunX okuthiwa lawa madoda abaleka ngayo emuva kokugqekeza umuzi eMondlo, iveni le-Isuzu, iVW Golf ebiphethe izimpahla ezebiwe.Kutholwe neNissan Sentra eyayintshontshwe eNondweni ngoJulayi ka-2016 neloli elalebiwe ngoMeyi kulo nyaka e-Elandslaagte.UCaptain Gwala uthe iloli laliphethe ifenisha ngesikhathi lidunwa.Uthe lawa madoda avele enkantolo yeMantshi yaseZakheni lapho ebekwe khona icala lokugqekeza umuzi nelokutholwa nempahla eyebiwe.“Abasolwa bazogqunywa ezitokisini ngoba amaphoyisa asaqhuba uphenyo,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Alahlwe elakubo amadoda eba izimoto

text: I-Eskom imemezele ukuthi izoqhubeka nokunqamula ugesi ngokwesigaba sesine kuze kube yikusasa emuva kokuthi imishini ethile ifile.Isikhulu esiphezulu se-Eskom, uMnuz Andre de Ruyter, sathi ugesi uzode unqanyulwa ezinyangeni eziwu-18 ezizayo ngenxa yokuthi kufanele kulungiswe ingqalasizinda endala.Izolo uMnuz Kevin Milenham, okhulumela iDA kwezamandla, uthe ayikho indaba ye-Eskom futhi uhulumeni kufanele ayeke ukuyitakula esikweletini sayo esiwu-R450 billion.Uthe i-Eskom iyinkinga emnothweni waseNingizimu Afrika ngakho kufanele kuqalwe ezinye izinhlelo zokuphehla ugesi ngaphandle kwe-Eskom.Kusukela manje uthe bazophakamisa ukuthi izinkampani ezizimele zikhiqize ugesi ozosiza ukuthuthukisa umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika nabantu abahlala ebumnyameni uma i-Eskom inqamula ugesi.Bazophinde baqhube umkhankaso wabo wokuthi kudayiswe ingxenye ethile ye-Eskom ukuze ikwazi ukwenza imali.Uthe uNgqongqoshe wokumbiwayo, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, kufanele avumele omasipala ukuthi bathenge ugesi ezinkampanini ezizimele ukuze banganciki kwi-Eskom.
title: Ugesi usazoqhubeka nokunqanyulwa: Eskom

text: SEHLILE isibalo sabantu abafa ezingozini zomgwaqo KwaZulu-Natal uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esifanayo ngonyaka odlule.Bawu-1 492 abantu abafe ezingozini zomgwaqo uma kuqhathaniswa no-2 032 ngo-2019.Izolo kukhunjulwe abantu abafe nabalimale ezingozini zomgwaqo KwaZulu-Natal emkhulekweni obuseBergville Sports Complex.Umkhuleko owaziwa ngeWorld Remembrance Day for Road Accident Victims, waqalwa yi-United Nations ngo-2005. Uba njalo ngeSonto lesithathu kuNovemba minyaka yonke.Kuhloswe ukuthi ngo-2030 zibe sezihhafuliwe izingozi ezenzeka emigwaqweni ezidlula nenqwaba yemiphefumulo.Izolo kuqale kwabekwa izimbali eduze komgwaqo uR74 eBingelela, eBergville, lapho kwafa khona abantu abayisikhombisa engozini ngo-2019.Emkhulekweni wayizolo kukhanyiswe namakhandlela kubongwa amaphoyisa nabezimo eziphuthumayo ngokuzinikela kwabo emsebenzini uma bebizelwa endaweni yengozi, kwabhekwa ukuthi bangasizwa kanjani abavelelwe yingozi nokuthi kuzobanjiswana kanjani ukuze kwehliswe isibalo sezingozi emigwaqweni.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, ubehola umkhuleko ehambisana nabamabandla ehlukene, amakhansela, amakhosi nezinduna.UNtuli uthe izingozi zehlile kodwa manje abantu sebefa ngezingozi ezidalwa ngamaloli.“Ingozi uma ineloli netekisi isuke inabantu abaningi. Izingozi zenzeke eWartburg, oLundi, eMelmoth, naseMtshezi. Ngiwubizile umhlangano wabasembonini yamaloli kodwa angibabizele ukuzobasola bese kuba inkombankombane.”Uthe umhlangano uzobheka ukuthi bangasebenzisana kanjani ukuze kushayelwe ngokucophelela kwehliswe izingozi.UNtuli unxuse abantu  ukuthi bashayele ngokucophelela futhi bayihloniphe imithetho yemigwaqo njengoba kubhekwe emaholidini kaKhisimusi.Uthe njengoba uNovemba kuyinyanga yezokuphepha, abantu abaziphathe kahle, bathandane, iyekwe indaba yokubambelana amagqubu kuhlaselwane emakhaya.Ekhuluma emkhulekweni, uMnuz Samkelo Khumalo, owasinda engozini ngo-Agasti 10, 2019, uthe akasakhumbuli kahle okwenzeka ngoba waquleka.“Ngikhumbula kancane ngitshelwa wothile ukuthi nginganyakazi ngoba ngizozilimaza. Ngilapha ukuzonitshela ukuthi ikhona impilo emva kwengozi kodwa asilandele imithetho yomgwaqo njengoba injalo. Asibophe amabhande futhi singashayeli siphuze utshwala. Asizibophezele ekuphepheni emigwaqweni ngoba kuwumsebenzi wawo wonke umuntu,” kusho uKhumalo.
title: Sehlile isibalo sabafa ezingozini zomgwaqo

text: Leli qembu libunjwe ngabasakazi bohlelo lwantambama phakathi nesonto kwiMetro FM, uSphectacula noDJ Naves.Ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka laba baveza ukuthi bazohambela izindawo ezahlukene begubha ukuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-10 besebenza ndawonye. Ukubhebhetheka kweCorona nokwethulwa kwemithetho yomvalelandlini kunyomfe izinhlelo zabo.“Akukho esingakwenza ukushintsha lesi simo. Esikujabulelayo nje wukuthi sisakwazi ukwenza umculo futhi sisakwazi nokungenisa imadlana yokuphila. Ngesikhathi kuqala umvalelandlini sibona imicimbi eyenzeka nge-internet yanda, sakucabanga ukuthi senze owethu ngoba sasihlele umjikelezo owaphazamiseka. Sabuye sabona ukuthi ukwenza into ezoba kwi-internet ngeke ize ibe namandla njengokuhlangana nabantu,” kusho uSphectacula.Labo DJ basanda kukhipha ingoma yabo entsha ethi Thelumoya abapike kuyo iJaziel Brothers noCassper Nyovest. Kuyona baxube i-hip hop nomculo wokholo njengoba bethi ukuphuma kwayo kufakazela ukuthi bangamakhosi angempelasonto njengoba benomculo ongadlalwa ngoLwesihlanu, uMgqibelo nangeSonto.“Ingoma yenza izimangaliso, abantu bayayithanda ngoba idlala emsakazweni. Sinesivumelwano neSABC sokuthi ingoma iphushwe khona izinsuku ezingu-10 bese iyaqala ukutholakala ezitolo zomculo ze-internet. Ivele yaba phambili kuma-charts emahoreni angu-24. Imfihlo yethu wukuthi sizinikeza isikhathi ngaphambi kokukhipha.“Ngonyaka odlule sakhipha iNgeke ngo-Ephreli, ngoJanuwari kulo nyaka sakhipha i-Okokoko njengoba sesikhipha lena ngo-Agasti.”Uthe banazo izingoma ezingahlanganisa i-albhamu kodwa abajahile ngoba bakholwa wukuthi ukuyiphusha kumele baye ngqo kubantu okuyinto okunzima ukuyenza okwamanje.
title: Ibe nesasasa ifika ingoma yeKings of the Weekend

text: LUZOQALA ngeSonto elizayo kuSABC2 ngo-6.30, ntambama uhlelo, iThe Coolest OG’s, lapho izaguga ezineminyaka engu-60 kuya ku-80 zizoqhudelana emidlalweni ehlukene.Lolu hlelo, oluqoshwe izinsuku ezingu-50 ubusuku nemini, inhloso yalo wukujabulisa izintombi nezinsizwa ezindala kuleli, esezihlala zihlezi emakhaya zingenzi lutho.Kulona kuzobonakala izaguga ezingu-12 zidlala imidlalo ehlukene, okuyothi isiqephu ngasinye kuphume oyedwa.Oyodla umhlanganiso ekugcineni uyokhala amuke nomklomelo ka-R100 000 ongukheshi.UBheki Ncube, ongumqondisi walolu hlelo, uveze ukuthi okuzobonakala kulona ngeke kukholakale ngezinye izikhathi kodwa bayaqinisekisa ukuthi konke kuyiqiniso.“Ngolimi lwesimanje singasho nje ukuthi sizobe siphethe izaguga ezisezintweni njengoba kuzona sizobe sifuna ulwazi oluningi kakhulu futhi eminye imidlalo izobe idinga ukuthi kube khona ababapha amaphoyinti yingakho kulolu hlelo sinamajaji asemikhakheni ehlukene kuleli okubalwa kuyo eyamafilimu neyokupheka. “Phakathi kwamajaji azobonakala kubalwa uZipho Sithebe osemkhakheni wemfashini, uSbu Makamedi osemkhakheni wokulingisa, u-Adon Domeyer osemkhakheni womculo njengoba enguphrojusa nonjiniyela osebenza nabaculi abahlukene emhlabeni no-Allison Greenlees owazi kakhulu ngomkhakha wokudla,” kuchaza uBheki. Uveze ukuthi indlela abazojajwa ngayo izogxila kakhulu endleleni abaphendula ngayo nabadlala ngayo kanjalo nasendleleni abagqoka ngayo.“Abantu abadala kuningi abakufundise intsha yakuleli eminyakeni edlule. Ngakho lolu hlelo lunika nabo ithuba lokuthi baphinde baxoxe izindaba zakudala ngempilo yabo. Angeke nje kube wuhlelo olunikeza ulwazi nemfundo ngamasiko kodwa luzobe lugcwele ubumnandi bodwa. Yize silushuthe ngesikhathi sobhubhane kodwa senze konke okusemandleni ukuthi baphephe ngaso sonke isikhathi. Lezi zaguga asingabazi ukuthi abantu bazozithanda kakhulu,” kuchaza yena.Uthe imidlalo abazoqhudelana kuyona kubalwa ukumodela, ukucula nokubhala izingoma, ukuqopha ama-video ezingoma, ukupheka, ukulingisa nokunye.
title: Kuzoqhudelana izaguga ohlelweni olusha kuSABC2

text: SIGODLIWE isinqumo mayelana nesicelo sikahulumeni sokudlulisa isinqumo esakhishwa yinkantolo eyathi imithetho kathaqa yesigaba sesine nesesihlanu ayihambisani nomthethosisekelo wakulelInkantolo enkulu yaseGauteng iyona obekulalelwe kuyo lesi sicelo.UMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu wanikwa ithuba lokuthi iyibuyekeze le mithetho.UJaji Norman Davis wacelwa wu-Advocate Wim Trengove SC, owayemele uNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango uDkt Nkosazane Dlamini-Zuma ukuthi anike lo Mnyango ithuba  lokusidlulisela kwenye inkantolo  lesi sinqumo ukuze sibuyekezwe.UTrengove wathi maningi kakhulu amathuba okuthi enye inkantolo ibone ngenye indlela.Umhlali wasePretoria uReyno de Beer nenhlangano yakhe iLiberty Fighters Network, ekuqaleni kwale nyanga yababela enkantolo ifuna imithetho kathaqa ithathwe njengaleyo engawakhi umqondo futhi engahambisani nomthethosisekelo.UDkt Dlamini Zuma wathi imigomo nemithetho kathaqa yayenzelwe ukulekelela abantu bakuleli ukuthi bavikeleke kwiCovid-19.
title: Sigodliwe isinqumo mayelana nemithetho kathaqa kuleli

text: ASELALA obenyomi amalungu omndeni wakwaMchunu eCato Manor, eMayville, ngenxa yendlu eklayeka izindonga okubangelwa amanzi aqhuma phansi egcekeni.Lo mndeni wakhelene nedamu lamanzi uMgeni Water, eWiggins.Bathi isingaphezu kuka-20 iminyaka benenkinga yamanzi ageleza egcekeni osekubheduke nezifo kwamosha nempahla yasendlini.Umnikazi womuzi uNkk Ntombikayise Mchunu uthe akanakwa uma ebikela abaseMgeni ngenkinga abhekene nayo.“Akekho ofuna ukungisiza ekubeni ngishintsha impahla yasendlini emosheka minyaka yonke ngenxa yamanzi abo. Aqhuma phansi egcekeni agelezele endlini, acekele phansi ama-tiles, ubhavu wokugeza nefenisha njengoba eseklaya nezindonga,” kusho uNkk Mchunu.Uthe kunuka isikhunta endlini, okuyiphunga eligcina selibagulisa.“Phambilini abaseMgeni bafika bakha udonga abalufaka oplastiki nokhonkolo bevimba amanzi kodwa aziphelanga izinyanga ezimbili aqala phansi aphuma. Umuntu uzowelwa indlu ephakathi ngoba angilutholi usizo,” kubalisa uNkk Mchunu.Ikhansela lendawo eku-ward 29 kuMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Mveli Mthembu, lithe seligqigqe kaningi kwaMchunu libafunela usizo eMgeni Water kodwa kunhlanga zimuka nomoya.UMthembu uthe ngoMsombuluko odlule ubekhona kulo muzi, wababikela abaseMgeni naseMkhwandlwini weTheku ngamanzi acekela phansi umuzi athe usalinde amathimba abo azohlola isimo.“Sengikhulumile nabezamanzi emkhandlwini ngaphinde ngabikela nabaseMgeni ukuze baphenye. Phambilini abaseMgeni bangitshele ukuthi akuyona inkinga evela edamini labo ngoba basanda kuwalungisa wonke amadamu abo. Ngibacele ukuthi ababuye bezobheka umonakalo owenzeka kwaMchunu, ngisalinde bona nosizo,” kusho uMthembu.Okhulumela abaseMgeni Water uMnuz Shami Harrichinder uthe imininingwane abanayo ikhombisa ukuthi lwadingidwa udaba nobuholi baseMgeni Water eWiggins ngoNovemba 2018.“Kwabe sekuqalwa uphenyo lokuthi asukaphi amanzi kodwa uphenyo lwamiswa emva kokumenyezelwa kokuthi izwe livelelwe yinhlekelele lafakwa esigabeni sesihlanu sikathaqa. Kuzoqhutshekwa nophenyo uma isixegisiwe imithetho kathaqa njengoba isesigabeni sesine,” kusho uHarrichinder.Uthe bayaqinisekisa ukuthi udaba bayalusukumela ukuze kutholwe ukuthi aphumaphi amanzi.
title: Bahlushwa amanzi aqhuma  egcekeni

text: KUKHALWA ngothisha okuthiwa ukhokhisa abafundi bakaGrade 4 no-5 uR50 umfundi ngamunye ukuze ezobafundisa isiNgisi ngempelasonto nangamaholidi.Uthisha wesikole iSizani Combined, eMhlali, kuthiwa uthatha le mali enguR50 (okhokhwa njalo ngenyanga) afake ngayo uphethroli wokuza esikoleni njengoba kusuke kungelona usuku lokusebenza.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi lo thisha wakhala ngokuthi ngeke esakwazi ukuqhubeka afundise abafundi ngempelasonto, kube sekufikwa esivumelwaneni salo R50.Kuthiwa abanye bakhala ngale mali njengoba kungakhokhwa kulesi sikole.Lo thisha kuthiwawathi uyazi ukuthi akuvumelekile ukuba uthisha athathe imali kubafundi ngakho abayikhokhe egaraji yena uzofika esethela khona uphethroli wakhe.Bathi uma ingane ingakhokhile ayifundi kuleli kilasi elengeziwe.Kunencwadi ebhalwe igama lalo thisha okuthiwa uyithumelele abazali ngaphandle kokwazisa ubuholi besikole ukuthi abazali kumele bakhokhe le mali egaraji elisendaweni. Kuthiwa ilapho efike athele khona uphethroli ngayo le mali.Umzali ongathandanga ukudalulwa uthe le mali ibathwalise kanzima.“Esikoleni akukhokhwa, manje kulolu daba lokufundisa izingane ngoMgqibelo kumele sikhokhe ukuze uthisha ezoba nemali kaphethroli wokuza esikoleni ezobafundisa. Abanye abazali abanayo le mali ngakho siba senkingeni,” kusho lo mzali ocele ukungadalulwa ngoba engafuni kucwaswe ingane yakhe.Omunye umzali othintwe Isolezwe naye wacela ukuba igama ligodlwe, uthe bayasibona isidingo sokuba lo thisha afundise izingane zabo.“Okwenzekayo ukuthi izingane zethu ziqala ukufunda isiNgisi kaGrade 4 no-5 ngakho zithwala kanzima. Uthisha ubekade ezizela yonke le eminye iminyaka ngoba wathi kukhona umlungu obemnikelela imali yokuza esikoleni.“Kusukela kulo nyaka ubengasameseki, kube sekuphakanyiswa ukuba sikhokhe le mali kaphethroli kathisha egaraji. Akuyona imali yokuthutha izingane zethu kodwa eyokuthi afake uphethroli ngoba uhlala kude futhi kusuke kungelona usuku lokusebenza. Thina abanye abazali siyasibona isidingo sokuba afundise izingane zethu,” kusho lo mzali.Omunye wabazali uthe uma bengenayo le mali, izingane zabo zisalela ngemuva.Kuthintwa lo thisha uNksz Rose Khuzwayo, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi akakhokhelwa uR50 kodwa le mali kusuke kungeyokuthutha abafundi.“Kusuke kungakhokhelwa uthisha ngale mali kodwa eyokuthutha abafundi ukuba beze esikoleni ngoba kusuke kunguMgqibelo. Le mali bayiyisa egaraji okuyilona elibathuthayo besuka ezindaweni ezahlukene,” kusho uNksz Khuzwayo.Uma ebuzwa ngokuthi lona obathuthayo ungubani nokuthi izinombolo zakhe zithini, uthe akazazi.Umzali uthe izingane zabo ziyazifikela esikoleni, ezikho ezokuthutha ezihleliwe.Kuthintwa usihlalo wesigungu sesikole uMnuz Blose, igama lakhe elingatholakalanga, uthe abazi lutho ngalo R50 okuthiwa ukhokhwa abazali.“Uma kukhona into ekhona esikoleni uthishanhloko uyangazisa, angazi ngempela ngalokhu kufunda okuthiwa kukhokhelwa uR50,” kusho uBlose.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe usazokhuluma nabaholi abaphethe lesi sikole bese ebuyela kwiSolezwe ngalolu daba.
title: Bakhala ngothisha okhokhisa oR50

text: INJINI okuyiyona eyayishayela isisu seMamelodi Sundowns kaTed “Makepisi” Dumitru idla izicoco zeligi ezintathu kulandelana, u-Eric Ramasike, ixwayisa amaqembu e-Absa Premiership ngobungozi beDowns kulandela ukuphuma kwayo kwiCAF Champions League neMTN 8 ngesonto elilodwa.ISundowns izobuyela kweyeligi okokuqala kusukela iphoxekile ikhishwa yiHoroya FC yaseGuinea kwiChampions League okulandelwe yimpoxo yokukhala ngaphandle kwiMTN 8 ishaywa iCape Town City. Izovakashela AmaZulu ngeSonto ngo-3 ntambama, eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza.Ngokusho kukaRamasike owayegqame eqenjini elabe libophele uCharles Motlohi, Joel Masilela noRoger Fuetmba, iSundowns isizoba yingozi kakhulu kweyeligi ukuvala ukuphenduka inhlekisa.
