Ngokusho kwalo mdlali owake wadlalela iBafana Bafana kanye, ngendlela amazi ngayo uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane opheka iSundowns, wonke amanye amaqembu asazobhekana naye kufanele agawule abheke.“Ngidlalile naye uPitso (Mosimane) ngakho-ke ngimazi kahle ukuthi ubenjani uma ehluliwe. Udaliwe ukuthi akakwazi ukwamukela okunye ngaphandle kokuwina. Lokhu usekufake nakubadlali bakhe ngakho-ke kuzoba nzima kwabasazobhekana nabo. Inkinga ukuthi iSundowns ayigcinanga ngokuphuma kwiChampions League nakwiMTN 8 kodwa kuhlekiswe ngayo nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Angikholwa ukuthi ukhona umuntu othanda ukubhekana noPitso ediniwe. Unekhono lokungena ezingqondweni zabadlali bakhe ngakho ngiyazi ukuthi nabo badinwe ngendlela efanayo. Azothwala kanzima wonke amaqembu asazobhekana neDowns kule sizini futhi ngingakubhejela nemali ukuthi izosivikela isicoco sayo seligi."ISundowns iya kulo mdlalo nerekhodi elihle uma ibhekene nezikaCavin Johnson kodwa umdlalo wokugcina zibhekene unqotshwe yileli qembu laseThekwini. Amagoli ashaywa abadlali asebeqinile uMabhuti Khenyeza noSiyabonga “Bhele” Nomvethe.Isinongo kulokhu ukuba khona kukaBongi Ntuli osemabhukwini eSundowns kodwa ubolekiswe kuMaZulu. Usezisholo ngowakhe ukuthi uma enganikwa ithuba angakujabulela ukushaya igoli ebhekene neqembu elingamboni njengomdlali ophelele kwazise yilokhu lamthenga kuwona AmaZulu lihlale limbolekisa.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:NgoMgqibelo: Chippa United v Baroka FC (Sisa Dukashe Stadium, 3pm); Cape Town City v Kaizer Chiefs (Cape Town Stadium, 3pm); Mariztburg United v Bidvest Wits (Harry Gwala Stadium, 6pm); Polokwane City v Free State Stars (New Peter Mokaba Stadium, 8.15pm); Orlando Pirates v SuperSport United (Orlando Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Black Leopards v Bloemfontein Celtic (New Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3pm); Highlands Park v Lamontville Golden Arrows (Princess Magogo Stadium, 3pm); AmaZulu v Mamelodi Sundowns (King Zwelithini Stadium, 3pm)
title: Uxwayisa awe-PSL ngeSundowns

text: BONISWA MOHALEUSEXOLISILE uSotshwebu we-ANC eMkhanyakude uNksz Maniza Chantal Ngcobo obonake kwivideo enika abantu amabhodlela otshwala obubizayo, iHennessy. NgoLwesithathu ebusuku uNksz Ngcobo ubhale ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook ukuthi ngoJuni 20 bangcwaba unina kwase kuthi ngo-Agasti 1 baba nomcimbi wokugeza ngokwesintu.“Ivideo esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana yathathwa ekhaya KwaMashaya, eMtubatuba ngamalungu omndeni. Asibuthenganga utshwala futhi angibudayisi utshwala. Angizange ngihambe nabo ngibuyise ekhaya kodwa loba tshwala obubonala kwivideo babusele ekhaya emuva komngcwabo kamama. Ngiwumuntu oseluleme kwiCovid-19 angisoze ngabeka impilo yami engcupheni ngokuphuza utshwala,” kusho uNksz Ngcobo.Kwivideo uNksz Ngcobo ubonakala ekhipha amabhodlela otshwala kube sekuqhuma umkikizo nomdanso kubantu bejabula.Uthe yize esecacisile ukuthi ivideo yathathwa ekhaya lakhe kodwa uyaxolisa.“Ngiyaxolisa ngendlela mina nomndeni wami esiziphathe ngayo kwivideo. Njengomholi ngithanda ukuxolisa kakhulu kubantu baseMkhanyakude nabaseNingizimu Afrika,” kusho uNksz Ngcobo.Ngeledlule Isolezwe libhale ngokusinda kukaNksz Ngcobo kwiCovid-19 eze egqugquzela abantu ukuthi balandele imigomo kahulumeni, baqhubeke nokugqoka izifonyo nokuqhelelana.USihlalo we-ANC eFar North uMnuz Ndodephethe Mthethwa uthe kuzohlanganiswa umbiko ube usuthunyelwa ehhovisi le-ANC laKwaZulu-Natal.
title: Uxolisile owe-ANC oqoshwe ephisana ngamaHennessy

text: BASALE beshaqekile osomatekisi baseVerulam, ngaphandle kwaseThekwini, izolo kudutshulwa usomatekisi wasoSindisweni, washona. UMnuz Melusi Maxwell Mphiri (26), udutshulwe emini kwabha ngo-12 engazelele.Abasondelene nodaba bathi bekungonakele lutho umufi ezihlalele etekisini, erenki yamatekisi aya e-Gateway,  exoxa nabanye abashayela amatekisi, ngesikhathi kuqhamuka umuntu obehamba ngezinyawo wamdubula wabe esegibela imoto, esuke yahamba.Kuthiwa kubaleke wonke umuntu ecasha, abanye bekhala ubumayemaye. Umufi udubuleke emzimbeni nasebusweni kwasala kugobhoza igazi phansi erenki.Abezimo eziphuthumayo i-Reaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), bathumele isitatimende kwabezindaba bathi umufi ulethwe emahhovisi abo aseduze nerenki selidume ladlula.“Kufike itekisi yapaka ngaphambi kwamahhovisi ethu, bekukhona abesilisa abaningi kulona. Behlile bememeza becela usizo. Etekisini bekunowesilisa obenamanxeba okudutshulwa emzimbeni nasebusweni. Uhloliwe ngabezimo eziphuthumayo kwatholwa ukuthi useshonile. Abebehamba nomufi bathe udutshulwe eserenki. “Emuva kokudubula umsolwa kuthiwa ubalekile wayongena esihlalweni somgibeli kwi-Toyota Etios empunga evele yashaya yachitha naye. Abebekhona babe sebegibelisa umufi etekisini bamphuthumisa ukuba eyothola usizo,” kusho abe-Rusa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala, uphenyo luyaqhubeka.Imenenja ehhovisi leSantaco KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sfiso Shangase, isigxekile lesi sigameko yathi amaphoyisa mawabophe abasolwa maduze.“Esingakusho ukuthi izimo ezinjengalezi embonini siyi-Santaco, kasihambisani nazo. Manje sisesigabeni sokukhetha ubuholi obusha embonini, ngeke ke sathi lokhu yisizathu sokubulawa kwakhe lo somatekisi. “Sifisa amaphoyisa aphenyisise ngalolu daba bese kuboshwa abasolwa. Sifisa nokudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nabasondelene nomufi,” kusho uShangase.Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuthola umndeni kamufi kayizange iphumelele izolo njengoba izinombolo zingazange zitholakale.
title: Kuqhume inganono erenki kubulawa usomatekisi

text: INKAMPANI ephakela ngamandla kagesi kuleli i-Eskom income uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal ngokugqugquzela omasipala kulesi sifundazwe ukuthi bakhokhe izikweletu zale nkampani.Esitatimendeni i-Eskom ithe izingxoxo nomasipala abakweletayo zokuhlela indlela yokukhokha, zihamba kahle njengoba omasipala ababekweleta imali enkulu sebezikhokhile izikweletu zabo kanti abanye bayaqhubeka nokuzikhokha.“Eminyakeni emithathu edlule  lo mnyango udlale indima enkulu ukuqinisekisa  ukuqhubeka  kwezingxoxo zokukhokhelana phakathi kwe- Eskom nomasipala abakweletayo,” kusho isitatimende.Lesi sitatimende siveza ukuthi, uMasipala Abaqulusi ukwazile ukusula isikweletu sawo sika- R52.5 million ngoDisemba ngemva kokuthi izikhulu zawo zahlala phansi neziphathimandla zenkampani kwahlelwa indlela okuzokhokhwa ngayo isikweletu.  Uthe umasipala ukwazile ukukhokha ngesikhathi okwakuvunyelwene ngaso.Abanye omasipala abakwazile ukwesula izikweletu zabo uMasipala waseMsunduzi, owaseNkosi Langalibalele wona ozoqeda isikweletu sawo kule nyanga noMasipala waseNewcastle osuwehlise isikweletu sawo ngo- R38.3 million. Kuthiwa uMasipala waseMpofana nawo usuqalile ukukhokha isikweletu sawoLe nkampani ithe kuqale kwaba nomdonsiswano phakathi kwe-Eskom nomasipala ababili,  owaseNewcastle nowaseMpofana kodwa kwagcina kuqhanyukwe nesisombululo.“I-Eskom izimisele nokuqhubeka nobudlelwano obuhle phakathi kwawo nalo mnyango esifundazweni ngethemba lokuthi nabanye omasipala ababhekene nezinselelo ezifanayo, bayagqugquzeleka ukuthi bakhokhe izikweletu zabo,” sisho kanje isitatimende.
title: I- Eskom incoma omasipala ngokukhokha izikweletu

text: KUSEKUBI esibhedlela kumdlali weMaritzburg United, uLuyanda Ntshangase, oshaywe wumbani ngesikhathi iqembu leMultichoice Diski Challenge (MDC) lidlala owobungani ngoLwesine olwedlule.Izolo usihlalo we-United, uFarook Kadodia, uthe basayicela imithandazo ezosiza umdlali ukuthi alulame njengoba esaphefumula ngemishini esibhedlela.“Kade ngiyile kombheka izolo (ngeSonto) sathola ukuthi usaphefumula ngamapayipi. Esikubhekile manje wukuthi akwazi ukuziphefumulela ngokwakhe. Uma odokotela kukhona okusha abasitshela khona sizokhipha isitatimende njengeqembu. Siyayidinga imithandazo ukuze alulame,” kusho uKadodia.Uthe isigameko senzeka ngoLwesine bedlala owobungani enkundleni engaphandle kwaseHarry Gwala Stadium lapho kwaba khona imvula nombani.Umqeqeshi weTeam of Choice, uFadlu Davids, uyena oveze lezi zindaba ngempelasonto ngesikhathi ephawula kwithelevishini ngemuva komdlalo wabo neSuperSport United we-Absa Premiership.Umdlalo uphele ngo 0-0 okuyiphuzu elibeke leli qembu laseMphithi endaweni yesine kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-34.“Ngiyaziqhenya ngendlela abadlali bami abadlale ngayo ngenxa yesimo esidlule kusona kulezi zinsuku ezimbalwa. Akulula ukubona uzakwenu eshaywa wumbani eyolala esibhedlela. Siyamkhulekela, siyamcelela imithandazo. Siyamdinga ukuthi alulame, sifuna ukumbona enkundleni. Sidlalile yize kade kungelula sakwazi ukuthola umphumela. Vele bengingalindele ukuthi abadlali bami babe nomfutho njengasemihleni kodwa emuva sikwazile ukuthi siqine,” kusho uDavids.Kwenzeka lokhu emasontweni edlule iqembu belisanda kulahlekelwa wumlandeli wokuqina, uDavids ambize ngoThandeka.Kuyona le sizini i-United ishonelwe umdlali wayo uMlondi Dlamini engozini yemoto.Ngo-2016 kwashona uMondli Cele engozini yemoto. Kukhona konke lokhu kuzomele uDavids nabadlali bakhe baqine njengoba ngeSonto kumele babuyele enkundleni ukuyobhekana neRoyal Eagles emdlalweni weLast 16 Nedbank Cup ePrincess Magogo Stadium ngo-3.30 ntambama.
title: Kubi kumdlali weqembu le-PSL oshaywe wumphezulu enkundleni

text: UMNIKAZI wenkampani eqopha imidlalo yethelevishini, uKutlwano Ditsele, uthe uyethulela isigqoko iFerguson Films ngokubanikeza umdlalo wabo iThe Imposter ukuthi bayididiyele.UKutlwano ungumnikazi weSetiri Films ekhiqiza iThe Herd ephele izolo ebikhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic.Esikhaleni sayo sekuzongena iThe Imposter phambilini eyayididiyelwa yinkampani kaShona noConnie Ferguson.UKutlwano ubhale ekhasini lakhe le-Instagram ukuthi baphoselwe inselelo yokuthi bawenze ngendlela yabo umdlalo. Uthe lesi yisikhathi esimnandi embonini yabo uma izinkampani zikwazi ukuhlangana zenze umsebenzi.I-The Imposter izobuya isishaya ngabalingisi abasha.UShona uthe bebefuna ukugqugquzela ukuthi abadidiyeli embonini basebenzisane ukwakha izinhlelo zethelevishini namafilimu.Umqondisi wezinhlelo zikaqedisizungu zeM-Net, uReneilwe Sema, uthe iThe Imposter izoba umdlalo wokuqala ukuthi bashintshanise izinkampani ukuthi zenze imidlalo kodwa zigcine into umdlalo okhuluma ngayo.Isizini yokuqala yayikhuluma ngamawele uMantwa noMatshepo Tau ababelingiswa nguThishiwe Ziqubu. UMantwa waphuma ejele wazophila impilo eyayiphilwa wudadewabo.Kwisizini entsha kuzobe kukhulunywa ngempilo kaTebogo “Tebza” Modikoane obhekene nengwadla yokondla umndeni wakhe. Ngakolunye uhlangothi iwele lakhe uGary Mokoena uphila impilo ewubukhazikhazi futhi uyimpunyela.Amawele azobe edlalwa nguMpho Osei.Abanye abalingisi ngoDidie Makobane odlala indawo kaMmabotho, uMmabatho Mogomotsi onguCandy, Gail Mabalane olungisa uKelebogile, Joyce Skefu ozoba uValeta, Seputla Sebogodi onguDali, Tiisetso Thoka odlala indawo kaPaballo, Nonhle Thema ongu-Evodia, Sonia Mbele ozoba nguBig Daddy, Kabelo Thai odlala indawo kaTurbo nabanye.
title: I-The Imposter ikhuza ibuya ngabalingisi abasha

text: NGEKE afungiswe ePhalamende obenguNgqongqoshe wezeMvelo kuleli uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane ngoLwesithathu.UMokonyane uqokwe yi-ANC ukuthi abe nguSihlalo woZihlalo ePhalamede, obhekene namakomidi.UMokonyane umholi wesibili we-ANC oqavile ohoxile ekufungisweni ePhalamende ngemuva kokuhoxa kukaMnuz David Mabuza obekulindeleke ukuthi afungiswe njengePhini likaMengameli.NgoLwesibili owayenguSomlomo ePhalamende uNkk Baleka Mbete nowayengungqongqoshe wezaseKhaya uMnuz Malusi Gigaba bakhethe ukuhoxa ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende.UMokonyane usebenze emnyangweni kahulumeni isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokukhonjwa yisigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC ePhalamende.UMokonyane, osendaweni yeshumi ohlwini lwe-ANC, useke waba uNgqongqoshe wezokuXhumana, wezeMvelo kanye nowaManzi neNhlanzeko. Usanda kusolwa ngenkohlalalo emnyangweni waManzi neNhlanzeko, okuthiwa uwushiye usesimeni esingesihle sezimali.Enye yezinkinga lo mnyango osabhekene nazo, isikweletu esibalelwa ku11.2 billion okuthiwa sidalwe ukungaqoqwa kwemali yamanzi ekweletwa omasipala, izinkampani zikahulumeni kanye nezinkampani ezizimele.UMokonyane igama lakhe liphinde lavela kwikhomishini kaZondo, ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana ngesikhathi kufakaza owayeyisikhulu eBosasa uMnuz Angelo Agrizzi. U-Agrizzi wazisa ikhomishini ukuthi uMokonyane wayegwazelwa ngoR50 000 ngenyanga ukuze avikele inkampani kwabezomthetho.INhloko ehhovisini likaMengameli uMnuz Zizi Kodwa ikuqinisekisile ukuthi uMokonyane ngeke afungiswe namhlanje kodwa wakuchitha ukuthi isizathu salokhu ngukuthi usehoxile ekubeni yilungu le-ANC ePhalamende.
title: UMokonyane usejoyine abangeke bafungiswe ePhalamende

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMUHSIN “Mshini” Ertugral uncoma uMato Madlala ngokubuyisa uMabhuti Khenyeza kwiLamontville Golden Arrows.Lo mqeqeshi oyinhloko yosomaqhinga eqenjini  lesizwe langakubo eTurkey, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ukubuya kukaKhenyeza kuzobasiza kakhulu Abafana Bes’thende ngoba ulazi njengoba ezazi usikompilo lwaleli qembu.Uthe okuhle ngoKhenyeza ukuthi uyayithanda i-Arrows, uyithatha njengekhaya lakhe lesibili.UKhenyeza ushaye ibuya kwi-Arrows ezoba yisekela likaMandla Ncikazi. Ubesehliselwe ekubeni umqeqeshi weqembu le MultiChoice Diski Challenge (MDC) kwiTS  Galaxy abefike kuyo ngesizini edlule ezoba yinhloko yabaqeqeshi ngesikhathi isadlala kwiGladAfrica Championship. Wadlala kwi-Arrows ngo-2002 kuya ku-2007. Ubuyile ngo-2015 kuya ku-2018.“Wenze isinqumo esihle kakhulu uMadlala ngokubuyisa uKhenyeza. I-Arrows uyazi njengoba ezazi, empeleni uma ukhuluma naye uyamuzwa ukuthi uyayithanda. Ngesikhathi ebuyele kuyo sikhulumile, wangitshea ngezinhloso zakhe kule ligi. Ngibafisela inhlanhla benoNcikazi. Uma kungaya ngezinhlelo zikaKhenyeza ngibona i-Arrows izokwenza kahle kule sizini,” kubeka u-Ertugral ogcine ukubonakala kuleli ngo-2019 eqeqesha iMaritzurg United.Ukhuluma kanjena nje u-Ertugral, umazi kahle uKhenyeza. Ngaphambi kokuthi ahambe eMaritzburg uke wasebenza naye eyiphini lakhe.Ngaphandle kwalokhu bake basebenza kwiChiefs ngo-2007 kuya ku-2008. Akekho owayezitshela ukuthi bayobuye bazwane ngoba baxabana kabi. Babuye basebenza ndawonye kwi-Ajax Cape Town ngo-2013 kuya ku-2014. U-Ertugral uke waqeqesha kuBafana Bes’thende phakathi kuka-2011 kuya ku-2012.Lo mqeqeshi uthe akuthandayo ngoKhenyeza wukuthi unalenkani nomfutho ayenawo ngesikhathi esadlala. Umyale ngokuqhubeka nokufunda nanokubukela kubaqeqeshi abadala.“Angiqale ngokubongela uNcikazi, uMabhuti angafunda lukhulu kuye. Engingamyala ngakho ukuqhubeka nokufunda, izinto zishintshile ebholeni lesimanje.  Akaphinde abukele kubaqeqeshi abadala. Nakuba nathi sesikhululile kodwa kukhona esisafunda kubona. Ngaleyo ndlela uzoya kude nokuqeqesha.”Selokhu kuqale isizini i-Arrows emdlalweni wokuqala ibambane neBloemfontein Celtic kwathi kowesibili yanenebula iSuperSport United ngo-3-1. Emdlalweni olandelayo, kusasa izovakashela iBaroka, ePeter Mokoba, eLimpopo ngo-7.30 ebusuku.UMABHUTI Khenyeza oseyiphini lomqeqeshi uMandla Ncikazi (abami naye) kwiLamontville Golden Arrows Isithombe: ARROWS TWITTER
title: U-Ertugral uncoma isinqumo ngoKhenyeza

text: SEBEQINISE ezokuphepha abasezitolo zakwaWoolworths ngemuva kwemibiko yokuthukuswa kweziqhumane ezitolo zabo eThekwini.Baphawule okokuqala ngalokhu izolo njengoba ngoLwesine amaphoyisa ophiko lwamabhomu ebizelwe kwesinye sezitolo ngemuva kokuthi omunye wabasebenzi ethole isiqhumane.Amaphoyisa kuthiwa asihlakazile isiqhumane singakalimazi muntu.Emasontweni amabili edlule kwatholakala iziqhumane ezitolo zakwaWoolworths ezisenxanxatheleni yezitolo eGateway nasePavilion.Isikhulu sakwaWoolworths uMnuz Kay Naidoo sithe sebeziqinisile ezokuphepha ukuvikela amakhasimende nabasebenzi baboUNaidoo uthe okwamanje abakawutholi umsusa wokutholakala kwalezi ziqhumane ezitolo zabo kodwa uphenyo lusaqhubeka.Uveze ukuthi basebenzisana namaphoyisa noKlebe, nezinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuqhamuka nesisombulo.“Uzoqaphela ukuthi sekwengezwe onogada kuzo zonke izitolo zethu KwaZulu-Natal. Sesifake nendlela entsha yokusesha abantu uma bengena ezoqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabantu,” kusho uNaidoo.Uthe bayazi ukuthi ukwandiswa kwezokuphepha ezitolo kungaphatha kabi amakhasimende abo njengoba izitolo zabo ziqhubeka nokusebenza.Uthembise ukuthi bazoqikelela ukuthi amakhasimende ayaqhubeka nokuthenga ezitolo zabo ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka.
title: Sekuqiniswe ezokuphepha ezitolo zakwaWoolworths

text: UNomvelo uphenduke ihlaya ngeledlule ngemuva kokusabalala kwesithombe sakhe esishuthwe kwithelevishini elingisa. Abantu bebabaza ubukhulu bekhanda lakhe.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngeSonto uNomvelo ongowokudabuka eVumanhlamvu, eNkandla, uthe into emphathe kabuhlungu ukuthi abantu bebemthumelela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uyayibona yonke into abayishoyo ngaye.Uthe okumxakayo ukuthi useneminyaka eyisikhombisa ajoyina lo mdlalo futhi akaqali ukuvela egundile ekhanda.“Angazi ukuthi kufinyelele kanjani ukuthi ngiphenduke ihlaya ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Le nto sekunesikhathi iqhubeka ngilokhu ngiyiziba. Kuze kwafika lapho ngicikeka khona, belokhu bethi nginempandla esiphundu. Ngibone kungcono ukuthi ngifake i-video ngikhulume ngale nto ukuze izophela,” kusho uNomvelo.Uqhube wathi uyaqala ukuhlukumezeka ngalolu hlobo selokhu aqala ukulingisa.“Ngiqale ukulingisa kwiScandal! ngineminyaka engu-16. Ngangisafunda eNational School of the Arts. AbeScandal! bacela esikoleni ukuthi bathumele abafundi abazoya kwinhlolokhono yabo. Ngaba nenhlanhla kwakhethwa mina. Selokhu ngasebenza khona kuze kube yimanje,” kusho uNomvelo.Uxwayise abantu ukuthi bacabange ngaphambi kokuhlekisa ngabanye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoba abawazi umonakalo ongadalwa ubudedengu babo.“Awukwazi ukuthi umuntu umgcone ngesici sakhe ube ungazi ukuthi uzophatheka kanjani.Abantu la ngaphandle banezinkinga eziningi. Uzokhuluma kanti usuyamcindezela, umfake ekhoneni elimnyama agcine esezenyeza ngendlela abukeka ngayo,” kusho uNomvelo.Uthe esakhula bebemgcona ngokuthi unekhanda elikhulu, ngakho lokhu kumbuyisele emuva.Uveze ukuthi uze wabuza unina ukuthi ngabe kukhona yini okuhlukile ngekhanda lakhe.Uthembise abalandeli bakhe ukuthi ngeke avumele okumehlele ukuthi kumphazamise emsebenzini nasempilweni yakhe.Uthe usazoqhubeka nokugunda izinwele zakhe uma ethanda.
title: Ugxeka abamgcona ngesici sakhe

text: UFAKAZI ecaleni elibhekene noThabani Mzolo osolwa ngokubulala isitshudeni saseMangosuthu University of Technology, uNksz Zolile Khumalo, uthe wakhonjwa indlela kulesi sikhungo.UMnuz Mfundo Mpungose, owayenza izifundo zeQuantity Surveying, uthe izikhulu zamxosha ngoba zithi nguye owafaka uThabani endaweni ehlala abafundi bakulesi sikhungo eseSouth Beach eThekwini, iLonsdale, kanti uzodubula uNksz Khumalo.UMpungose ubephekwa ngemibuzo uMshushisi u-Advocate Nadira Moosa nommeli kammangalelwa, * -Advocate Ndumiso Xulu ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini izolo.UMpungose uthe wavulela uMzobe ngenxa yokuthi wayemazela enhlanganweni yabafundi iSadesmo, uMzobe ayengumholi wayo futhi bobabili bekhonze umculo kamaskandi njengoba uMpungose ayeke afike esikoleni egqoke isikibha seqhawe lakhe, uKhuzani Mpungose.Ephekwa ngemibuzo ukuthi base benesikhathi esingakanani bazana, uMpungose uthe wayesazane noThabani izinyanga ezine futhi engalazi igama lakhe “ngangimazi ngoMzolo nje.”IJaji Nompumelelo Radebe, like lathukuthela ngesikhathi uMpungose noMzolo bebhekana maqede bemoyizela.Liyalele uThabani ukuba ahlukane nokumamatheka ngoba icala abhekene nalo libi futhi layalela noMpungose ukuba akhulume abheke kulo hhayi kwenye indawo.Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi uMpungose eyalelwa ukuba akhombise inkantolo ukuthi yimuphi lomuntu amvulela.UMpungose uke wajuluka wamanzi futhi wanyukubala nasebusweni ngesikhathi uXulu eveza ukuthi wayengaqali ukungenisa uThabani futhi uma ephika, abammeli bazoya eLonsdale beyofuna izincwadi eziqukethe ubufakazi.Ugcine evumile ukuthi wake wangena uThabani kodwa yena wayevulela umuntu owayehamba nozakwabo uSmiso Buthelezi, uThabani okuthiwa wathi uzogeza endlini yakhe ngosuku lwesigameko.Ngaphambi kokungena kukaMpungose, uXulu uqale wapheka umngani kamufi futhi owayekhona kwenzeka lesigameko, uNksz Akani Masenge, othe wayemazi ummangalelwa futhi wayehlale umufi emazisa ngokuthi uyamsongela futhi uyamhlukumeza.UNksz Masenge uze waveza ukuthi umufi wake wamvezela imihuzuko lapho ayeklinywe khona ngummangalelwa.UNksz Khumalo wadutshulwa wabulawa eLonsdale ngoMeyi nyakenye ngemuva kwengxabano eyaba phakathi kwakhe nomsolwa okuthiwa wayengayizwa kahle eyokwaliwa ngumufi.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeka phambi kwezinye izitshudeni ezazifunda nomufi.NgoMsombuluko uThabani uliphikile icala lokubulala nelokutholakala nesibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.Icala lihlehliselwe uMsombuluko ukuze kukhwele ebhokisini omunye ufakazi. Izithameli beziyingcosana kanti ummangalelwa ubegqoke ijakhethi ewukhakhi,ephuce kahle ikhanda.
title: Bathukuthelise ijaji bemoyizela enkantolo kwelesitshudeni esabulawa

text: IMEYA yaseMgungundlovu, uMnuz Themba Njilo, ithi babonga uNkulunkulu ngokuvikela umsakazi woKhozi FM olimale kabi esigamekweni okusolwa kuso ukuthi ubedunwa imoto.Kushaqise abaningi ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi uSbu Buthelezi wohlelo lwasemini Indiza Nathi ngo-12 kuya ku-3 ntambama phakathi nezinsuku udutshulwe amahlandla amaningana ngeSonto ebusuku eMbali, eMgungundlovu.UNjilo uthe kubuhlungu okuvelele lo msakazi.“Ngiphuma kuye nje (esho izolo emini), isimo sakhe siyagculisa kakhulu. Siyambonga uNkulunkulu. Uyakhuluma konke kuhamba kahle siyabonga asiqedi,” kuchaza uNjilo ngamafuphi.Umthombo okhulume naleli phephandaba uveze ukuthi uSbu ubekwenye yezindawo afuna ukuqala kuzo ibhizinisi eMgungundlovu.“Kuthiwa ubemile ngaphandle kule ndawo ngesikhathi kuqhamuka abalisa okungaziwa ukuthi bangaki abavele bavulela ngenhlamvu. Isicabha sakhe ungasibona ukuthi silimele kanjani njengoba kwanaye edubuleke esifubeni,” kuchaza umthombo.Uveze ukuthi lo msakazi kuthe ngesikhathi esedubulekile wangena emotweni wahamba wayofuna usizo.“Kuvela ukuthi ungene egaraji nala engalutholanga khona usizo njengoba abantu bevele bathuka babaleka ngisho nabasebenzi. Uphinde waqhubeka wazishayelela nokuthe endleleni waluthola wase ephuthunyiswa esibhedlela,” kuchaza umthombo.LESI ngesinye sezithombe ezilethe ithemba kwabaningi ukuthi uyalulama umsakazi woKhozi FM, uSbu Buthelezi, ngemuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi udutshulwe esigamekweni okusolwa ukuthi ubebanjwa kuso inkunzi eMgungundlovu ngeSonto ebusuku. USbu kulesi sithombe ubehanjelwe umculi wokholo uThobekile Mkhwanazi nabanye ozakwaboUveze ukuthi esibhedlela ukwazile ukulandisa abafike kuqala konke okwenzekile kodwa isimo sakhe sase siba sibana nokugcine esengeniswa egunjini labagula kakhulu.Abantu abaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bazwelane kakhulu noSbu ngokumehlele.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe icala lokuzama ukubulala ngemuva kwalesi sigameko.Uthe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-47 uhlaselwe ngabesilisa abangaziwa abavele bavulela ngenhlamvu ekhoneni lomgwaqo u-Archie Gumede noMoses Mabhida.UMbele uthe lona wesilisa ulimale esifubeni nasengalweni.Umculi wokholo uThobekile Mkhwanazi wehlise amaphaphu abaningi ngemuva kokuthi efake isithombe enaye lo msakazi esibhedlela.Okhulumela iSABC, uNeo Momodu, uthe abaphathi bakwaSABC nabasebenzi bonke bamfisela ukushesha alulame uSbu ngemuva kwesigameko esimehlele.Uthe lo msakazi uyalulama futhi isimo sakhe sempilo sihle kakhulu.
title: Uyelulama umsakazi woKhozi odutshuliwe

text: UMSAKAZI weZululand 97.0 FM, uMinenhle “Minimizer” Masondo, uthi abantu bammangazile ngendlela abameseke ngayo njengoba esedlulele emzuliswaneni olandelayo emqhudelwaneni woKhozi FM, iNext Winnie Mahlangu Competition.UMinenhle (30) waKwaMvulane, KwaNongoma, udlulele esigabeni esilandelayo emuva kokuhlula uBongiwe Gwala (29) waseMgungundlovu noSne Mkhize (engatholakalanga imininingwane yakhe).“Ngijabule ngendlela eyisimangaliso Ngiyazi kusewumncintiswano, kusazoshuba kakhulu kunakuqala kodwa ukuthi ngitonyulwe kulabo abathathu ebengikhethwe nabo kusho lukhulu kimi. Kugide idlozi kwakhazimula uNkulunkulu,” kusho uMinenhle.UMinenhle, oqale ukusakaza kwiNongoma FM 88.3 FM kodwa manje osekwiZululand 97.0 FM, uzichaze njengentokazi ewuthanda kakhulu umsakazo nehlezi ifuna ukwenza uguquko emphakathini waseNingizimu Afrika.Okhulumela iSABC, uNksz Mmoni Seapolelo, uthe Ukhozi FM lucele ukunikezwa ithuba lokwenza umncintiswano walo ngendlela yalo.“Onqobile uzomenyezelwa uma sekuphothuliwe ukubalwa kwamavoti. Njalo ngesonto emasontweni amane ku-Agasti kunabazoqhathwa kusukela ngoMgqibelo bese olayini bokuvota bevalwa ngoLwesine ntambama.“NgoLwesihlanu, uma sekuphothuliwe ukubalwa kwamavoti, kuzoba nesimemezelo sowinile masonto onke. Lokhu kuzoqhubeka kuze kube u-Agasti 27 emuva kwalokho isiteshi siyobe sesimemezela uWinnie Mahlangu olandelayo,” kusho uMmoni.Odabeni esibike ngalo ngomkhankaso woKhozi wokuthungatha umsakazi wesifazane ngeledlule, kwenzeka iphutha ngokuthi sithi kuphawule umphathi siteshi obambile uSbongi Ngcobo ekubeni kwakuphawule iSABC lo msakazo ongaphansi kwayo.I-SABC yiyo eyaphawula yasinika yonke imini-ningwane esayishicilela ngomkhankaso. Sithi yobe kwiSABC, uSbongi nabo bonke abathintekile.
title: Ube neMinenhle edlulela phambili emncintiswaneni woKhozi

text: BEKUKIKIZWA namakhorasi edla lubi abesifazane abathandana nabanobobulili obufanayo, abangabangani abane, abasonta ndawonye beshada kanyekanye.Emshadweni obuyindumezulu eDiakonia Centre, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo, izitabane beziphume ngobuningi ukuzohalalisela abashadayo. Bekushada uThabile Makhanya (30) noLunga Sithole (35), uNontobeko Dladla (23) noEnhle Xulu (34). Bathe bonke sebethandane iminyaka emine futhi bangabangani bokuqina. Umshado wabo bawubhalise eMnyangweni wezaKhaya phakathi nesonto, bagcwalisa ngomhlophe ngoMgqibelo.“Sisaqala ukuthandana abazali bebengayizwa kahle le ndaba. Bagcine bevumile ukuthi sishade ngoba babonile ukuthi sithandana ngempela. Siqale ngalo mshado omhlophe, owesintu usazolandela,” kusho uThabile.UNontobeko uthe abazali kumele bamukele ukuthi badalwe ngale ndlela, akumele banqatshelwe uma befuna ukushada. Uthe ulobole waqeda, basazokwenza umshado wesintu.UMfundisi Thandeka Mteshane weGod’s Presence Ministries of Faith, utshele abebeshada ukuthi bangabanaki abazobagxeka.“Basazonikhuluma, babuze nokuthi abazali bawubusise kanjani umshado onje. Ngiyabonga bazali nenze kahle nabusisa umshado.,” kusho umfundisi.Ukhwele wadilika kwabagxeka izitabane, wathi bayahlulela. Uthe isonto elabo bonke abantu.“Kungcono nina niphumele obala kunalaba abazifihlile. Ninganqeni ukuthatha amaBhayibheli niye kodumisa. Kukhona abayoba nenkinga baphuthwe ukungena izulu ngoba bebona abanye bethu phakathi. Bayojika endleleni bethi akukhona ezulwini. Bayekeni banehlulele kodwa uJesu usazobahlulela,” kugcizelela uMfundisi Mteshane.UNksz Zanele Mkhize obenguMatron of Honour futhi obebaboleke nezingubo zomshado, uthe abebeshada bebehlele ukugqoka amasudi bonke.“Ngibacebise ukuthi bagqoke izingubo ezimhlophe ukuze kuphelele. Ngikhulume nomakoti kuphela, “abakhwenyana” bengazi ngezinhlelo zabo zengubo emhlophe, yingakho bevele bakhala sebezibona,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.
title: Bashade kanyekanye abanobulili obufanayo

text: KUSHAQEKE abantu omaskanda behubhana esiteji besho ukuhluthulana ngequpha eWorkshop eThekwini kuleli sonto.UKhulekani “Phindamshaye” Manqele (23), ongumfowabo weGcokama Elisha, akasakwazi ukuyophromotha amaCD akhe eWorkshop ngemuva kokuphuma ngesamagundane esteji, ebalekela uzakwabo, uBahubhe Mkhize, omfice esacula ingoma emngcofayo kwasuka esinamandla.Lolu daba selushube kangangoba uPhindamshaye useze wabikela namaphoyisa futhi njengamanje usekubhaceni ngenxa yokusaba.Ngokusho komthombo ozibonele, uBahubhe utheleke lapho bekunandisa khona uPhindamshaye ethukuthele egane unwabu, ecikwa yingoma ebiculwa esteji esihloko sithi ITop 10 Yezinkunzi, lapho uBahubhe engunombolo 10 ekubeni imbangi yakhe, iThwasa Lekhansela lingunombolo 9.UBahubhe neThwasa Lekhansela bayinkukhu nempaka.Echaza uPhindamshaye uthe ubaleke wazephula ebona uBahubhe ezomshaya phambi kwabantu.“Bese kungokwesithathu uBahubhe engisabisa ngale ngoma, ethi angikhiphe igama lakhe uma ngingamsusi kunombolo 10”.UMASKANDI uPhindamshaye osekubhaceni ngenxa yokwesaba ngemuva kokuphuma ngesamagundane esteji Isithombe: FACEBOOK/PHINDAMSHAYEUPhindamshaye uthe yena wayengaqondile okubi ngale Top 10 Yezinkunzi kodwa wayebala abaculi abakhonzile.“Waqala wangisabisa ngo-Agasti 16 nangakusasa waphinde wangisabisa. Yingakho ngibone kufanele ngiyombika emaphoyiseni nokuyobhaca ngoba useyingozi kumina. Angisakwazi ukuyodayisa amaCD ami eWorkshop.” Eziphendulela uBahubhe uthe yena ubezidlulela nje eWorkshop njengoba ehlale enandisa khona.“Khona bengidiniwe ngesikhathi ngizwa lo mfana ecula le ngoma ngoba ngamxwayisa ngayo ngenxa yokuthi wasebenzisa igama lami singavumelene. Okungidina kakhulu lo mfana sihlale sinaye eWorkshop kodwa ukwazi ukuyocula ngami. Yini engangazisanga ukuze sivumelane naye. Uzibalekele ngingashongo lutho ngoba azi ukuthi sasivumelene ngani naye mhlazane sigcina ukubonana. Bengingazimisele ngokumshaya kodwa uma esehamba ekhuluma ngami ngoba efuna udumo, uzongiphoqa ukuba ngimthungathe ngize ngimthole futhi akekho ongangivimba. Sengikhathele ngabaculi baseWorkshop abangafuni ukusebenza kodwa abajaha udumo ngegama lami. Naye akasebenze njengabanye abafana,” kuphawula uBahubhe, ezwakala ukuthi unengekile.UBahubhe ngomunye womaskanda asebedumile. Uqwaqwade bonke omaskanda abadumile kwiMTN Maskandi Festival futhi wahlabana ngeFortuner. Wake wadla umhlanganiso kuMantshontsho Kamaskandi Awards nakumaSatma Awards. UPhindamshaye useyivukana elisakhiphe amacwecwe amabili, ethi Ukholo Lwami nelithi ITop 10 Yezinkunzi esimqhathe noBahubhe.
title: Bahubhane esteji bebanga ingoma

text: UMphako ubegwetshwe ukuthi akhiphe imbuzi noma izinkukhu ngokwehlisa u-3 Second isithunzi owayembize neGcokama Elisha ukuthi bezochaza nge-albhamu yalo mculi iDog Style abazwakala bedelela abaculi kuyona. UMphako wadelela u-3 Second ngokuthi athi ngeke eze ukuzoxolisa futhi usekhathele uyena njengoba elokhu ebiza abaculi bakamaskandi ukuthi abazoxolisa uma bexabene. UMphako waze wabhala nakuFacebook ukuthi u-3 Second akathathe isiginci angene estudiyo ashayane neGcokama Elisha ngengoma.Ngemuva kwale nkulumo le mbongi ibe nezinkinga isiphupha u-3 Second eyigwaza ngobhoko eyibuza ukuthi kungani ingamhloniphi. Kuthiwa nethelevishini ubengasayibuki uMphako ngoba bekuvele kube sengathi kuqhamuka u-3 Second kuyona egqoke umqhele wakhe.UMphako naye ukuqinisekisile ukuthi impela ubenenkinga waze wayocela uxolo ku-3 Second. Esefike kuyena lo melaphi umtshele ukuthi kumele alethe imbuzi noma izinkukhu azoxolisa. Wathi uma engenayo into azoxolisa ngayo kuzomele azokwelusa izinkomo zakhe izinsuku ezintathu ukuze kuphele isigwebo.UMphako bekulindeleke ukuthi alethe imbuzi ngeSonto noma aqale ukwelusa izolo ka-3 Second njengoba ayevumile ukuthi uzokwenza kanjalo uma engabi nawo amandla okukhipha imbuzi yenhlawulo. Izolo uMphako ugcine eyilethile imbuzi abethembise ukuthi uzoyiletha ezoxolisa.U-3 Second uthe uyamxolela wathi imbuzi le abeyilethile uzobikela amadlozi akhe ngayo ukuthi usexolisile. Ngesikhathi efika uMphako ka-3 Second, lo melaphi uke wasikaza nokumkhiphisa inkomo kodwa wabuye wehlela ngezansi.
title: Uxolise ngembuzi uMphako ku-3 Second

text: INDODANA kaBrenda Fassie, uBongani, izoveza konke okwenzeka empilweni yayo emuva kokudlula kukanina  emhlabeni.UBongani uzokuveza lokhu ohlelweni, iFinding Bongani Fassie, ezoqala ngMgqibelo, ngo-20h30.Kulolu hlelo uzoveza ukuthi kwenzekani ezimalini azishiyelwa ngunina nokuthi ibe njani iminyaka engu-17 unina engasekho.ULindiwe Mbonambi weMoja Love uveze ukuthi kulolu hlelo kuzogqama indlela uBongani akhule ngayo, eqala yaba ngefudumele kodwa yahamba yaba nzima.“Uzalelwe ekhaya elifudumele kodwa ngemuva kokudlula emhlabeni kukaBrenda, impilo yaba nzima kakhulu. Abantu bazobona ukuthi impilo ayiphilile ibingelula ngempela futhi ibe namuphi umthelela. Uzoveza ukuthi webelwa kanjani imizi ayeyishiyelwe nguBrenda kanjalo nezigidi zemali, ezinye zazo agcina engazitholanga, nokuthi ukuzihlanganisa nabantu abangalungile kwamlethela buphi ubungozi empilweni yakhe,” kuchaza uLindiwe. Uqhube wathi uBongani uzochaza kabanzi ukuthi abantu abathembisa ukuthi bazomnakekela bamjikela kanjani ngesikhathi esedinga usizo kubona. “Kukhona abantu, ngesikhathi kushona uBrenda, abathembisa ukuthi bayowa bevuka noBongani, uzoveza ukuthi lukhona yini usizo aluthola kubona noma cha. Wuhlelo lolu abantu abazoluthokozela kakhulu njengoba luzoveza okuningi okungenzeka ukuthi abantu bebezibuza ngakho mayelana nalo mfana,” kuchaza yena.Kulolu hlelo kulindeleke ukuthi kubonakale osaziwayo okukhona kubo uMercy Phakela, Kuli Roberts noChicco Twala.Lolu akulona kuphela uhlelo kulesi siteshi okulindeleke ukuba ludonse amehlo abaningi. Kuqala isizini yesibili yohlelo, Isencane Lengane, ngoMgqibelo, ngo-20h00.Kulolu hlelo kuzobonakala abashadikazi abasebancane, uSiyacela noThando, emuva kweminyaka emithathu bashada.Nohlelo olwethulwa wuJub Jub, Uyajola 9/9, nalo lushaya ibuya ngeSonto, ngo-21h00.UJub Jub noMoss Makwati bazobambisana ukusiza abantu abafuna ukubhekelwa omaqondaba babo ukuthi basathembekile yini.
title: UBongani Fassie nohlelo ngempilo yakhe kuMoja Love

text: WILLEM PHUNGULAUTHEMBISA ukusheshisa ukukhishwa kwamatayitela ezindlu zomxhaso kahulumeni uNgqongqoshe omusha woMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal.UMnuz Ntuthuko Jomo Sibiya, nguye oseqhoqhobele lo mnyango nowezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi emva kwezinguquko ezimenyezelwe nguNdunankuku uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ngoLwesibili. Engxoxweni ekhethekile neSolezwe ngeSonto, uSibiya uthe zisuka nje uzosheshisa ukukhishwa kwamatayitela osekuneminyaka eminingi ebhajwe emahhovisi eMgungundlovu. Bekulokhu kunesikhalo kubantu abaningi ukuthi labo abahlomula ngezindlu zomxhaso bafana neziqashi kuzo njengoba kungekho zicucu abaziphethe, okukhombisa ukuthi ngezabo. Bekunezinkulumo ezithi uhulumeni usaba ukuthi abantu bazozidayisa izindlu zomxhaso, bese bebuyela emjondolo futhi. Kwake kwavela ukuthi abantu bazidayisa ubuthaphuthaphu izindlu ngenxa yendlala, bese bephinda beyogxumeka imijondolo.USibiya uthe ngesikhathi uhulumeni akhela abantu izindlu, enye inhloso kwakuwukubuyisa isithunzi somuntu omnyama. Uthe uzosungula ithimba elizosebenza ubusuku nemini ukusheshisa ukunikezwa kwabantu amatayitela, ukuze bazibone bengabanikazi bezindlu ngokuphelele."Ngicela ukubonga inhlangano yami i-ANC ngokungethemba. Yize umuntu njengelungu lesiShayamthetho le nhlangano kade ekulindele ukuthi kungenzeka ngelinye ilanga inhlangano imjube esikhundleni noma yisiphi kodwa kungethusile ukuthi inhlangano ingijubele ukuhola iminyango emibili. Kodwa-ke ngithembisa ukuthi ngizosebenza ngokuzikhandla futhi ngizohlala amagqozo kuyo indaba yamatayitela, osekuneminyaka ebambeke emahhovisi awo eMgungundlovu nezinye izidingo eziphuthumayo zomphakathi," kusho uSibiya.Ngasohlangothini lweMisebenzi yoMphakathi uthe uzogxila kakhulu ekuphuculeni indlela yokusebenza kohlelo olwaziwa nge-EPWP.USibiya uzalwa eNquthu esigodini eSilutshana lapho akhula futhi wafunda khona imfundo yamabanga aphansi naphezulu. Wafunda eSilutshana Primary naseKucabangeni High, wabe esedlulela eNquthu High lapho aphothula khona ibanga leshumi. Babebane kwabo kodwa wadlula umfowabo kwasala yena nodadewabo ababili. Ushadelwe, umkakhe ungusonhlalakahle. Uneziqu zepolitiki azizuza eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal ngo-2009. Kwipolitiki wakhethwa waba ngusohlalo wentsha ye-ANC eThekwini ngo- 2011 kuya ku-2013. Ngo-2014 kuphoqeleke ukuba abuyele ekhaya eNquthu lapho efike wakhethelwa esigungwini sesifunda iNkosi uBhambatha. Ngawo u-2014 uphinde wakhethwa njengelungu lesiShayamthetho emva kokhetho lukazwelonke. Ngo-2018 ukhethelwe esigungwini sesifundazwe se-ANC. Ngo-2019 ubuyelile esiShayamthetho waqokwa waba ngusihlalo wekomiti lezemfundo kwaze kwaba wuLwesibili njengoba eqokelwe kwesobungqongqoshe.
title: Uthembisa ukusheshisa amatayitela ungqongqoshe omusha

text: KUFE owesifazane ngesikhathi amalungu amane omndeni ehlaselwa eNanda Newtown A ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Amaphoyisa aphansi phezulu athungatha abahlaseli. Amalungu amane, umama nezingane ezintathu, kuthiwa ahlaselwe esendlini, agwazwa.Kuthiwa abahlaseli bebefuna ilungu lomndeni elithile.Ngesikhathi uhlaselwa umndeni umemezile wase uzwiwa wumakhelwane owuphuthumise esibhedlela.Umama ugcine eshonile, izingane zakhe zisesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala nawokuzama ukubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa eNanda.“Ngokophenyo oselwenziwe amadoda amabili angene emzini osemgwaqweni Isivumelwano eNanda. Kugwazwe amalungu amane omndeni. Kushone owesifazane oneminyaka ewu-51 emtholampilo wasendaweni. Abanye bayiswe esibhedlela lapho belashwa khona. Uphenyo lusaqhubeka. Akekho osaboshiwe,” kusho uCapt Gwala.
title: Kufe oyedwa kuhlaselwa umndeni

text: I-EFF ihlabe yahlikiza umbono kaNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Tito Mboweni, othi akuvalwe inkampani yamabhanoyi kuleli iSouth African Airways (SAA) ngoba yehluleke yancama ukwenza inzuzo okufanele iyenze.UMboweni osanda kuqokwa, ubekhuluma engqungqutheleni yabatshalizimali ebiseNew York lapho eveze khona ukuthi iningi imali elahlekayo ngale nkampani yezindiza.Okhulumela i-EFF, uDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi, uthi uMboweni uthathe ngamawala uma ethi akuvalwe iSAA."Siyazazi zinkinga ezikhungethe le nkampani yezindiza kodwa sinalo ithemba lokuthi kukhona okungenziwa ukuze ivuselelwe."Kufanele kulungiswe isimo kwenziwe ukuthi le nkampani ihlomulise abantu abaningi kuleli."Uma ubheka izinga lezingozi zomgwaqo kucaca ukuthi kufanele ukundiza ngamabhanoyi kube yinto ephambili,” kusho uDkt Ndlozi.
title: I-EFF igxeka umbono kaMboweni ngeSAA

text: I-COVID-19 isibuye yagadla kumaRoma aKhatholika eNingizimu Afrika, kulokhu ithathe u-Archbishop Abel Gabuza, obengumsizi wombhishobhi waseThekwini.UGabuza (64) ushonele esibhedlela iHillcrest, lapho ebelaliswe egumbini labagula kakhulu emuva kokuxinwa yiCovid-19.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba, uCardinal Wilfrid Napier ongu-Archibishop waseThekwini, uthe badabukile kakhulu ngokushona kukaGabuza. Uveze ukuthi ubesenabo iminyaka eyela kwemibili.“Ubengumuntu onomusa, omnene onemfudumalo futhi othanda abantu. Ukushona kwakhe kusho ukulahlekelwa kwamaKhatholika wonke ase-Afrika eseNingizimu. Sibonga kakhulu kodokotela akade bemnakekela nabo bonke abasebenzi basesibhedlela saseHillcrest,” kusho uNapier.Udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini kaGabuza, okubalwa udadewabo uNksz Hildegarde nomzala wakhe uKhomotso. UGabuza wazalwa ngoMashi 23 ngo-1956, wakhula eNingizimu Afrika ngezikhathi zobandlululo elokishini, i-Alexandra, eGoli.Emuva kokushona kukayise wahamba wayofunda esikoleni lapho abafundi behlala khona, ngoba unina wayezama ukumvikela odlameni olwaluqhubeka e-Alexandra. Emlandweni wakhe kuvela ukuthi kade wakuthanda ukuba ngumpriste kusukela eyingane. Wagcotshwa njengompriste ngo-1984.UNapier uthe izindaba zokushona kukaGabuza zizodluliselwa nakuPhapha Francis.
title: ICovid-19 isithathe u-Archbishop Gabuza

text: ISIKHULU seMasterDrive, u-Eugene Herbert, sithi uma umshayeli noma umgibeli engahlali kahle noma ufase ibhande ngendlela efanele ubuchwepheshe bokubavikela bungadala umonakalo omkhulu.Uthe abashayeli nabagibeli abafasa kahle amabhande futhi abahlala kahle banciphisa amathuba okufa ngo-67%."Lokhu kukhombisa ukubaluleka kokusebenzisa ezokuphepha ngendlela. Abantu abaningi, bengazi noma bazi, bahlala ezimotweni hhayi ukuvimba ubuchwepheshe bokuphepha ukuthi busebenze kahle kuphela kodwa ngendlela engadala okunye ukulimala."Uthe nazi izindlela ezinobungozi zokuhlala:- Izinyawo kudashboard: Ama-airbag aphuma ngesivinini esifinyelela ku-250km/h. Uma iphuma izinyawo zikwi-dash, esikhundleni sokukuvikela ingaphula amathambo emlenzeni, okhalo noma emgogodleni nokungaholela ekutheni ufe.- Ukuhlala ugone ingane noma isilwane: uncisha ingane ithuba lokuthi ifase ibhande uyenze ukuthi iphume ngewindscreen ngesivinini imoto ehamba ngaso. Uma i-airbag iphuma izoshaya ingane noma isilwane ngesivinini esingu-350km/h.- Ukuhlala ngemuva ungalifasile ibhande: engozini abantu abangalifasile ibhande nezilwane bazoshaya ezihlalweni zangaphambili ngesivinini imoto ebihamba ngaso. Lokhu ngeke kulimaze abangemuva kodwa kungabulala abagibeli abangaphambili.- Ukungalifasi ngendlela ibhande: ibhande kumele lifaswe naleli elincane elingezansi okhalo leli elide lihlale ngasentanyeni. Kumele lingahlali entanyeni noma ngaphansi kwengalo.- Gwema ukuhlala uqethuke ingalo iqonde ibambe isiteringi. Awuboni kahle phambili futhi isiteringi awusibambi kahle. Hlala ngendlela yokuthi uma uqondisa ingalo isihlakala sithinta phezu kwesiteringi futhi ingalo iyagoba kancane.
title: Hlala ngendlela efanele emotweni

text:
ILINDELWE ngabomvu ifilimu yesilomo sikasomahlaya wakuleli uTrevor Noah, ezothathelwa encwadini ekhuluma ngempilo yakhe, iBorn A Crime.UTrevor Noah, okumanje uhlala e-United States kwazise ungumethuli wohlelo iThe Daily Show kuleliya lizwe, udalule izindaba ezithakaselwe abaningi zokuthi kuzoqoshwa ifilimu ngempilo yakhe.Ngesikhathi edalula lokhu umfo kaNoah wazise abalandeli bakhe ukuthi umlingisi obalwa nabaphambili njengamanje emhlabeni, uLupita Nyong’o, uzolingisi indawo kanina.“Umama wami umuntu wesifazane onamandla ongaba yibutho laseWakanda kalula. Ngakho ngikubonela kufanele kakhulu ukuthi indawo yakhe ilingiswe umlingisi osemnkantshubomvu, uLupita Nyong’o” kusho uNoah ekhasini lakhe lezokuxhuma kwi-Instagram.ULupita, okumanje usematheni ngendawo ayidlala kwifilimu iBlack Panther njengebutho elivikela izwe laseWakanda, uthe usekulindele ngabomvu ukulingisi nokuphrojusa le filimu.“Ngesikhathi ngifunda incwadi kaTrevor Noah iBorn A Crime ngangihluleka ukuyibeka phansi. Kungijabulisa kakhulu ukunazisa ukuthi ngizobe ngilingisa futhi ngiphrojusa ifilimu ngale ncwadi!” kusho lo mlingisi ekhasini lakhe kwi-twitter.Ngaphandle kokulingisia kwiBlack Panther uLupita useke wazakhela udumo kwifilimu eyanqoba inqwaba yezindondo emhlabeni, i-12 Years A Slave, waphinde wabonakala nakwiStar Wars.Njengoba kwaziwa ukuthi unina kaNoah, uPatricia Noah, ukhuluma IsiXhosa lo mlingisi ngeke athwale kanzima kakhulu kwazise kwiBlack Panther uqalile ukucathuliswa kuso abalingisi bakuleli u-Atandwa Kani noyise uJohn Kani nabo abalingis kuyo.Lo mlingisi ucashunwe yi-website yezokungcebeleka, iTshisaLive, ethi IsiXhosa sinzima kodwa uyasithanda.Okwamanje uNoah akakamemezeli ukuthi ubani ozodlala indawo yakhe kule filimu.My mom is a powerful woman who could easily be one of the beautiful soldiers in Wakanda. So it's beyond a perfect fit that she would be portrayed on the big screen by the radiant and regal Lupita Nyong' o. I'm beyond excited. 🙌🏽🤗 #Repost @lupitanyongo: When I read @TrevorNoah's "Born A Crime," I could not put the book down. Excited to announce that I will be starring in and producing its feature film adaptation! #BornACrimeA post shared by 
Trevor Noah(@trevornoah) on Feb 21, 2018 at 6:09pm PST
title: Umlingisi ophambili kwifilimu engempilo kaTrevor Noah

text: MDU NCALANEEbika eseGallagher EstateUMENGAMELI we-African National Congress uMnuz Jacob Zuma, usebenzise inkulumo yakhe yokuvula ingqungquthela yesine kazwelonke yokudingida imigomo yombutho ukucacisa kabanzi ngesiphakamiso sezomnotho esesaziwa ngeSecond Transition esisemqulwini wamaqhinga nezindlela ezinzulu zokuwaphumelelisa iStrategy and Tactics. Lesi siphakamiso ngesinye esisuse inkulumo mpikiswano ezifundazweni ezehlukene ezinye zivumelana naso nezinye zisichitha.Abangahabisani nalesi siphakamiso bebethi sihambisana nokuthi uZuma athathe ihlandla lesibili lokuhola uKhongolose engqungqutheleni ezoba seMangaung eFree State ngoDisemba, kanti abanye bebezibuza ukuthi kuze kuqanjwe lesi siphakamiso NgeSecond Transition nje yayibekwe nini iFirst Transition, abanye bethi yini entsha eqhamuka naleli qhinga ezokwehluka kobekwenziwa eminyakeni engu-18 eyedlule kusukela uKhongolose wathatha izintambo zombuso.UZuma uthi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi kubuyelwe emuva ezinqumweni ezingathathekanga ngenxa yesimo ngesikhathi sezingxoxo ezaholela enkululekweni iCodesa. “Eminyakeni emibili sizobe sihlanganisa iminyaka engamashumi amabili yenkululeko. Kumele sizinuke amakhwapha manje sibheke izinqumo okwakunzima ukuzithatha ezingxoxweni zeCodesa, sibheke ibanga esesilihambile ekuthuthukiseni izimpilo zabantu kusukela siziqaqa emaketangeni obandlululo sizifaka embusweni wentando yabantu. Kumele sibheke ukuthi sibhekephi nalo mshikashika. Kuyasicacela ukuthi namanje umnotho usesezandleni zabesilisa abamhlophe nokwenza kule minyaka engu-18 eyedlule siqhubeke nokuba nezinselelo ezinzima okuwububha, ukungalingani kwezomnotho, nokwentuleka kwamathuba emisebenzi,” kusho uZuma.UZuma uthe uKhongolose nezwe lonkana libe nempumelelo esigabeni sokuqala sentando yabantu. “Ngo-1994 sakwazi ukuyovota safaka uhulumeni wentando yabantu. Sikwazile ukutshala isiko lokuthi njalo eminyakeni eyisihlanu abantu bakhethe uhulumeni wabo kabusha, sashaya umthethosisekelo owaphasiswa ngo-elethu, sakha iPhalamende eliqapha ukusebenza koNgqongqoshe, sakha uhlaka oluzimele lomthetho, saphasisa imithetho eyayisingaphezulu kuka-700 eminyakeni eyishumi yokuqala nokwakuqinisekisa ukusiphula izingxabo zobandlululo, saba nomqulu wamalungelo abantu bonke. Lapha besisaqinisa isisekelo senqubo yentando yabantu. Kuningi futhi esehlulekile wukuphumelela kukhona njengoba imiphakathi yethu isasilele emuva ngezidingo futhi isabhekene nobubha, ukungasebenzi nokungalingani, nokuyinto egadla kakhulu entsheni nakwabesifazane,” kuchaza uZuma.UZuma uthi ngeSecond Transition, uKhongolose uhlose ukuqhamuka nokhukhulela ngoqo womkhankaso wokulwa nalezi zinselelo ubheke ngqo isimo sezomnotho ngale kokwesaba ngoba isizinzile inqubo yentando yabantu. Uthi manje isimo sezombusazwe sesizinzile wase ebala nezinto esezifezwe wuhulumeni kubantu waphinda wakucacisa ukuthi baningi abanye ezingakafi-nyeleli kubona izidingo. “Manje sekuyisikhathi sokuthi siqhamuke nento ezokwenza umehluko ngokushesha. Abantu kumele bazi ukuthi yilapho lo mqondo weSecond Transition uqhamuke khona, njengoba sekukhona abakhuluma sengathi asazi ukuthi sikhuluma ngani kulo mbono. Kumele kuphele nya ukuthi sibone abantu bemasha emigwaqeni ngenxa yezidingo bagcine sebemosa khona lokhu okuncane esesibalethele khona. Lokhu kuzoqedwa yinhlanganisela yamaqhinga anqala azofukula umnotho, kuvuleke amathuba emisebenzi, kuphele nobubha,” kuchaza uZuma.UZuma uthi lokhu kungenzeka uma kuzokwakhiwa amaqhinga azodidiyela uhulumeni, izinkampani zikahulumeni, izinkampani ezizimele, kwakhiwe izinhlelo ezizokwenza ukuthi babe baningi abantu abaqashwayo, kuphinde kuphuculwe nendlela yokuphakela abantu izidingo.“Le migogo kumele kube yiyona ekhuthaza ukuthuthuka kwabantu abansundu ukuze babe ngabanikazi bomnotho njengoba sibonile ukuthi amaqhinga esike saqhamuka nawo njengeBroad Based Black Economic Empowerment, engasisizanga kakhulu,” kusho uZuma.UZuma uthi izinhloso zeSecond Transition ngezokuthuthukisa umnotho ngokushesha nokulinganiswa kwawo kubo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba kubeka iFreedom Charter. Uthi uKhongolose uphakamisa le ndlela entsha yokufukula umnotho ngesikhathi esibi lapho amazwe angaphansi kwe-Eurozone ethwele kanzima. Uthi yize kunjalo izwe alikakabi senkingeni. Uthe kuzomele kuqiniswe izinhlaka zokuqeqesha nokuthi intsha ikwazi ukungena ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, umphakathi wabansundu ungene emkhakheni wezimayini, ezolimo, ezokuvakasha nezemvelo, okuyimikhakha engumgogodla womnotho.“Akumele nje sibheke udaba lokufaka izimayini ngaphansi kukahulumeni ngokuthi kumele sizifake kumbe singazifaki kodwa kumele sibheke ngale kwalokho sikhumbule ukuthi iFreedom Charter ithi kumele sabelane sonke thina esisezweni, nokuthi esikwenzayo kube yinto evikelwe wumthetho,” kuchaza uZuma.Emuva kwenkulumo kaZuma izithunywa zihlale amagqozo kumaKhomishini angu-12 adingida imigomo eyehlukene. Kulindeleke ukuba abike ngezisombululo azithathile kusasa uma sekuphothulwa ingqungquthela.
title: UZuma ucacise ngeSecond Transition

text: UMGADLI waMaZulu FC, U-Emiliano “Nkathazo” Tade, odabuka e-Argentina, ugcine esayine kwiMamelodi Sundowns njengokwesifiso sikaPitso Mosimane ocija amaBrazilians.UMosimane ubengafuni ukusho igama lomgadli abemfuna kodwa izolo iSundowns igcine iqinisekisile ukuthi isimtholile uTade kanti uBongi Ntuli, obebolekiswe yiDowns kuSuthu, uzohlala unomphelo kuMaZulu, ngokwesivumelwano.Njengoba iwindi livala namuhla, uMosimane uthe ubemincile ukuthi ukuqala kahle kwezingxoxo kungaphazamiseki ngoba ufuna umgadli ongalibheki ipali futhi ongaqhamuki kumaligi angaphandle ngoba kusazothatha isikhathi ukuthi ajwayele ibhola lakuleli.UMosimane ukusho lokhu ngoLwesibili ebusuku ngemuva kokuthelwa kwezakhe othulini wuSuthu ngo 2-0, emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli.“Sisekhona isikhashana ewindini ngakho kukhona esikuhlanganisayo. Sifuna umgadli ongalibheki ipali, ngoba sekucacile ukuthi siyashoda ngamagoli, nakuba amathuba siwakha. Lo mgadli kuzofanele kube uwumuntu odlala lapha ekhaya, ngoba uma eqhamuka ngaphandle kusazomthatha isikhathi ukuthi ajwayele. Angifuni ukukhuluma kakhulu ngalo mdlali, ngoba izingxoxo ziyaqhubeka futhi ziqhubeka ngendlela esijabulisayo neqembu lakhe, ngakho angifuni konakale izinto,” usho kanje uMosimane.UMosimane usanda kudedela uToni Silva waseGuinea-Bissau, osejoyine i-Al Ittihad yase-Egypt. Sekungumlando ukuthi uSilva ushiye angalazi kulo mqeqeshi embiza ngoxovizwe obulala ikusasa labadlali njengoba ebathenga ajike abaduvise ebhentshini.“Akufanele sisayinise umgadli obengadlali ngoba kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthi abe sesimeni esihle sokudlala. Okwesibili kufanele kube ngumgadli oqonda kangcono okwenzeka lapha ebholeni laseNingizimu Afrika ngoba kuthatha isikhathi ukuthi abadlali bangaphandle bajwayele kuleli. Uma ngingenza nje isibonelo ngo-Ali Menza udonsa kanzima. Umdlali wangaphandle owasheshe wajwayela uLeornado Castro (osedlalela iKaizer Chiefs),” kuqhuba uMosimane.Ekhuluma ngomdlalo wabo noSuthu, uMosimane ukhombise ukubeka izaba wangayivuma induku.“Sakhe inqwaba yamathuba njengokwejwayelekile sangawashaya amagoli. Iqembu ebesidlala nalo ububona ukuthi lingcono kunathi ngokukhathala kwazise thina sidlala njalo ezinsukwini ezintathu. Lesi yisikhathi esinzima eqenjini, ngidinga ukwesekwa, nabadlali badinga ukwesekwa ngoba ekugcineni sonke singabantu. Nginxenxa abaphathi beqembu, abalandeli nethimba labaqeqeshi ukuthi sonke sibambisane ngoba izikhathi ezinzima kakhulu lezi,” kubalisa uMosimane.
title: Umgadli woSuthu uphelele kwiDowns

text: IQEMBU laseNingizimu Afrika lekhilikithi amaProteas lenze elidume ngako uma lidlalela enkundleni yaseThekwini, iKingsmead, njengoba liphinde ladedela iwini seliyiphethe ngezandla kwi-test yokuqala abakhale ngaphansi kuyona ngewikhethi eyodwa bebhekene neSri Lanka.IKingsmead yinkundla yenhlanhla kwiSri Lanka kanti eyamashobolo kumaProteas. Lokhu kuphinde kwagcwaliseka ngesikhathi uKusal Perera egila izimanga ewinisa iqembu lakhe kade kungekho nokuncane okukhomba ukuthi linganqoba. Le bekuyiwini yesibili ye-test yeSri Lanka kule nkundla kwazise ngo-2012 iSri Lanka ihlule amaProteas abeholwa uGraeme Smith.Kuzokhumbuleka futhi ukuthi nango-2003 ngesikhathi amaProteas ephuma kabuhlungu koweNdebe yoMhlaba, agilwa yiSri Lanka futhi kwakudlalelwa eKingsmead. Isiyonke imidlalo yamaProteas ayigijime kule nkundla iyisishiyagalolunye, anqoba emibili athola isibhaxu kweyisikhombisa.Ngesikhathi uPerera eshaya ibhola liya ezintanjeni kushwiba uKagiso Rabada ngaphambi kokuthi abadlali baye etiyeni, ubeqinisekisa ukuthi iSri Lanka iyawunqoba umdlalo ngewikhethi eyodwa. Akuzange kukholakale lokhu uma uzokhumbula ukuthi iwikhethi yesishiyagalolunye yamaProteas ayithole iSri Lanka ishoda ngama-runs angu-78 kungasasele muntu. UPerera noVishwa Fernando abebhetha naye bewinisa iSri Lanka, ama-runs abawahlanganisile abenza irekhodi lokuba amaningi kunawo wonke ehlanganiswa abadlali bokugcina.Ngokwabathandi bekhilikithi baseNingizimu Afrika, lo mphumela uyimpoxo ebabazekayo ngokomqondo nasekuzithembeni nje ngaphambi kokuqala kweNdebe yoMhlaba. Nakuba kuyindlela ehlukile yokudlala kodwa amaphutha abenziwa ukaputeni uFaf du Plessis emisa abantu ezindaweni ezingafanele obekwenza uPerera azidalele, kushiye imibuzo ngokuqina kokhakhayi kuyena ngaphambi kwalo mqhudelwano weNdebe yoMhlaba.Bekungokwesibili emlandweni uPerera ehlanganisa am-runs angaphezulu kwayikhulu. Akungatshazwa futhi ukuthi indlela adlale ngayo ngeke aphinde ayikhohlwe. Uhlale enkundleni amahora amahlanu ebhekene nezingwazi zabashwibi ezihlanganisa oDale Steyn, Rabada noDwayne Olivier. Ubhekane namabhola anzima angaphezulu kuka-200.
title: Aphinde aphikwa yizinto amaProteas

text: UBUHOLI beSantaco esifundeni iDurban West sebuzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngezigameko zokuqothwa ngenhlamvu kosomatekisi bakasoseshini waseMpumalanga (Hammarsdale) njengoba kudutshulwe ababili kuleli sonto.Njengamanje usoseshini waseHammarsdale awunaye usihlalo kwazise uMnuz Mbhekeni Hlophe obekulesi sikhundla ubulawe ngoKhisimusi, iPhini lakhe uMnuz Dumisani Magwaza labulawa ngoJulayi nyakenye.NgoMsombuluko kubulawe uMnuz Mthethomusha “Mthetho” Ngubane noMnuz Mnuz Stephen Somfana Makhaye.USihlalo weSantaco eDurban West, uMnuz Mathula Mkhize uthe banezinyanga ezintathu beqokiwe njengobuholi obusha kulesiya sifunda kodwa abakuqaphelile wukuthi inyanga ayipheli kungabulawa usomatekisi eHammarsdale.“Sinohlelo lokuvakashela ososeshini abangu-20 abangaphansi kwethu, besizohamba ngohlu oluthile kodwa ukubulawa kwabantu eMpumalanga sekuholele ekutheni sihlele ukuya khona kuleli sonto. Sizohlala phansi namalungu kasoseshini waseMpumalanga ukuze sizwe ngawo ukuthi inkinga ikuphi. Emuva kwalowo mhlangano sizobe sesihlangana noNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda nezinhlaka zokuphepha ukuze kuziwe nekhambi lokuvimba ukubulawa kwabafowethu,” kusho uMkhize.Ugqugquzele osomatekisi ukuthi uma kukhona ukungaboni ngasolinye bahlale phansi baxoxe njengosomabhizinisi kunokuthi badubulane.“Asifuni kuze kufike esigabeni sokuphazamiseka kokuthuthwa komphakathi njengoba kwenzekile kwezinye izindawo. Siyacela osomatekisi baxoxisane uma kukhona ukungaboni ngasolinye. Sizoxoxisana noKaunda ukuthi aqinise ezokuphepha kubanikazi bomsebenzi ngoba eMpumalanga kubulawa bona abagibeli abathinteki ndawo,” kusho uMkhize.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe zikhona yini izinhlelo zokuthi kube nokhetho kusoseshini waseMpumalamga njengoba kunezikhala ezimbili ebuholini obuphezulu, uthe bonke ososeshini kufanele babe nobuholi obuphelele kodwa bazoqale bahlangane namalungu aseMpumalanga ngaphambi kokwenza izincomo zokuthi kube nokhetho beyisifunda. Isifunda iDurban West singamele izindawo ezakhele iPinetown namaphethelo kanti kunososeshini abangu-20 ohlwini lwalesi sifunda ekubeni kunososeshini omncane Inteke Taxi Owners Association.UMkhize uthe usazohlangana namalungu obuholi baseNteke ngoba lo soseshini akawazi emabhukwini akhe. “Sizoxoxisana nabo, sizwe ukuthi basebenza kanjani sihlahle nendlela eya phambili ngekusasa labo njengoba besebenza esifundeni sethu. Njengamanje uhlu lunososeshini abangu-20, Inteke ayikho kulona.”Amaphoyisa athe asaphenya ngokubulawa kwamadoda amabili eHammarsdale kanti bekungakaboshwa muntu.
title: I-Santaco isukumela olodlame

text: UMDLALI obalwa nabahlonishwayo kuleli asebeke bamela iBafana Bafana, uTeko Modise, ugeqe amagula ngokusetshenziswa komuthi eqenjini lakhe lakudala, i-Orlando Pirates.UModise (34) osegijima kwiCape Town City, udalule lokhu encwadini ekhuluma ngempilo yakhe enesihloko esithi Inside: The Curse of Teko Modise. Lo mdlali ugijime kwiPirates kusukela ngo-2007 kuya ku-2011.Phakathi kwezinto azibalulayo kule ncwadi ngokusetshenziswa komuthi kuleli qembu, ubala ukuthi bonke abadlali beqembu ‘babegeziswa’ yisangoma seqembu phakathi kwamabli  ngaphambi komdlalo.“Kuningi uTeko okwakumele akujwayele kwi-Orlando Pirates. Okunye kwakho indawo yomuthi kuleli qembu,” kusho umbhalo ocashunwe kule ncwadi.“Ngesikhathi uTeko efika kwiPirates wahlangana nesangoma seqembu. Ngesonto lakhe lokuqala isangoma sathi sifuna ukuzama into entsha. Emagumbini abadlali okushintshela ngaphambi komdlalo isangoma sasibeka induku emnyango . Bonke abadlali kwakumele bagxume bayeqe.”Ngokwencwadi, uma izindlela ezintsha zingasebenzanga, isangoma sasibuyela kokujwayelekile - ukuhlamba. Abadlali kuthiwa babevuswa phakathi kwamabili ngaphambi komdlalo, bageze ngamanzi afakwe 'amakhambi'.“Abadlali abaningi babenezinkolelo zabo, lokhu kwakungabaphathi kahle. Nokho ke kwiPirates yonke into yenziwa njengeqembu. Unenkolelo yakho noma awunayo, uyangena uhlambe.”Uthe noma babekwenza lokhu, imiphumela yayingaguquki. Isangoma sasilokhu sigcizelela ukuthi abadlali abawusebenzisi ngendlela umuthi.“Wabona ukuthi abadlali bayageza uma beqeda ukuhlamba emanzini athakiwe, nokuchaza ukuthi umuthi wawusuka, waqhamuka necebo elisha. Manje kunokuthi bageze phakathi kwamabili, abadlali babegeza ngaphambi komdlalo, bangene ebhasini, baye enkundleni.“Amanzi ayemnyama kakhulu, awazi ukuthi yini ekhona kuwo. Wawubona amahlamvu nezinti kodwa ungazi ukuthi yini enye ephakathi. Wawuncinzelwa kakhulu (uma usugezile)”Incwadi kaModise ibhalwe uNikolaos Kirkinis, yashicilelwa yiJacana Media.
title: UTeko ugeqa amagula ngokusetshenziswa komuthi kwiPirates

text: ISITOBHA seKaizer Chiefs, uMario Booysen, siqinisa idolo ozakwabo ngokuthi akufanele bavumele ukugxekwa ngabalandeli kushabalalise ukuzethemba.IChiefs iphuma esibhaxwini sika 2-1 esithelwe yi-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni wabakhaya ngempelasonto. Lokhu kulethe ibohlololo ePhefeni ngemuva kokuthi abalandeli bebekade sebethemba ukuthi bazokwazi ukuziphindiselela. Emuva kwalo mdlalo abadlali bagxekwe kakhulu, ikakhulukazi uBooysen owenze iphutha eliholele ekutheni eZimnyama zishaye igoli lesibili.Izolo, eNaturena, bekubonakala ukuthi abadlali abakadluli kokwenzeke kowabakhaya. Ubukade ungekho umdlandla nenjabulo ejwayelekile ngesikhathi iqembu liziqeqesha.UBooysen uthe bekungelula ukukwamukela ukuhlulwa yiPirates. “Bekunzima ukukwamukela ngoba senze konke okusemandleni kodwa ngikholwa wukuthi besingenza kangconywana. Ngibona kufanele sithathe okuhle esikwenzile, siqhubekele phambili sigxilise imiqondo yethu emdlalweni olandelayo."Ngaphandle kokugxekelwa iphutha alenzile uBooysen, iminwe eminingi ibheke kumqeqeshi uGiovanni Solinas ngokushintshashintsha abadlali basemuva, ikakhulukazi abadlala maphakathi.“Ebholeni kwesinye isikhathi uyawenza amaphutha. Kwesinye isikhathi uma wenza iphutha ujeza kanzima. Ngicabanga ukuthi sonke siyafunda kulona. Ngilenzile iphutha kodwa ukubheka phambili, kuya ngokuthi liyangikhulisa yini, ngizame ukulilungisa enkundleni yokuziqeqesha ngoba ekugcineni kufanele sigxilise imiqondo kokuphambi kwethu. Ngokwezinga labadlali esinabo, noma ubani angadlala. UDanny (Daniel Cardoso), Mathoho (Eric) noSiya (Siyabonga Ngezana) sonke singawenza umsebenzi. Kusezandleni zomqeqeshi. Awukwazi ukungabaza izinga labadlali esinabo ikakhulukazi emuva. Yebo, siyagxekwa kakhulu kodwa akufanele kuqede ukuzethemba. Asizithembe noma sigxekwa. Ngiyakholwa wukuthi ngeke umane ube ngumdlali obhedayo ngokushesha. Kufanele ugxilise umqondo wakho kokuhle, ukhule."IChiefs inengcindezi yokuwinela indebe abalandeli asebefile yinkemane. Izobhekana neSuperSport United kwi-quarterfinal yeTelkom Knockout eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ngeSonto, ngo-3 ntambama. UBooysen, odlale kwiSuperSport amahlandla amabili, ufuna ukubeka iqembu phambili kunokubeka ekhanda ukugadulisana nabangani bakhe. Uqede isizini edlule egijima kwi-Ajax Cape Town emuva kokuphela kwenkontileka yakhe neMamelodi Sundowns asayine kuyona ngo-2014 esuka kwiMaritzburg United.ISundowns imbolekise amasizini amabili uBooysen kwiSuperSport okuyiyona ekhiphe iChiefs kwiMTN8. “Kuhlale kufana nempi uma uzobhekana nabangani bakho neqembu odlalile kulona. Kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi kufanele sigxile eqhingeni lethu esinalo naseqenjini ngoba njengomdlali ungazithola usuwenza amaphutha okuyinto ongayidingi. Kuhlale kukuhle ukubhekana neqembu odlalile kulona kodwa ekugcineni kufanele ugxilise umqondo wakho emsebenzi. Uma singadlala ngokuzinikela angiboni sizophuma kwiTelkom. Sibheke ukudlulela emzuliswaneni olandelayo. ISuperSport inabadlali abasezingeni. Baneqhinga esilaziyo. Kodwa kufanele sigxile kithina.”
title: Asizithembe noma sigxekwa - Booysen

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIJomo Cosmos (4) 4 Chippa United (1) 3K UVELE ubuthaka ngezindlela eziningi kuJomo Cosmos abaningi abayibona isendleleni ebheke kuNational First Division (NFD) icishe ilahla amaphuzu ikade ihamba phambili ngo-4-1 kowe-Absa Premiership abawudlale neChippa United izolo ntambama, e-Olen Park.Nakuba iCosmos idlale leli okuthiwa linenkosi phakathi esiwombeni sokuqala, kwesesibili bese ubona ukuthi abadlali bayo sebefisa ukuthi umdlalo uphele. Uma iqembu lihluleka wukubambelela lihamba phambili ngo-4-1 nakanjani lisengcupheni yokubalwa nabalekela izembe.Esiwombeni sokuqala iCosmos imangaze abaningi ishaya amagoli amane kodwa kwesesibili abadlali bese bebitoza bonke bengasalifuni ibhola. Indlela iCosmos eqale ngayo yenze abaningi bazitshela ukuthi sesifikile lesi sikhathi uJomo Sono ahlale ekhuluma ngaso ethi iqembu lakhe lizomangaza abaningi ngokuthi ngeke libe sesibalweni samaqembu azobe elwela ukuvika izembe ngoMeyi wonyaka ozayo.Ukube umdlalo bewuphela ngesiwombe sokuqala bekungeke kuthuse kubalandeli beligi yakuleli ukuvuswa yizindaba zokukhonjwa indlela komqeqeshi weChippa, uRoger Sikhakhane, uma uzoyetshisa kahle indlela iCosmos ebukise ngayo ngamaChilli Boys.Ukuqala ngomfutho kweCosmos kukhokhelwe ngomzuzu ka-20 ngesikhathi uCharlton Mashuba ebhakuzisa inethi kungazelele muntu. Uthole ibhola elide elisuka esiswini lawela kuyena zingalindele izitobha zamaChilli Boys. Kudlule imizuzu eyisikhombisa kwavela iphenathi ethathwe uBrice Aka wayivalela enethini ukuphefumulisa kangcono ezikaJomo.Ngomzuzu ka-30 u-Andile Mbenyane obesenesikhathi engabonakali kuChippa kulandela ukuvelelwa yisifo ekhaya, ukhishiwe ngoba kubonakala ukuthi inkinga ingakuyena. Akusizanga lokho ngoba uPentjie Zulu ushaye elesithathu esuka nalo emuva.Ulibuyisile elilodwa uRhulani Manzini ngoka-38 kulandela ukudlala kamnandi kwesisu seChippa kugqame uLerato Chabangu noSandile Zuke. UManzini uyena ongene endaweni kaMbenyane zaqala zahlangana izinto zikaSikhakhane esegadla ngababili. Lesi kungaba esinye sezinqumo ezimbela uSikhakhane igodi.Kuphinde kwangena elinye igoli ngonyawo lukaSipho Mngomezulu seziya ekhefini zaya kulona kungu 4-1 okuyinto ebingeke yehle kahle kuMpengesi.Nakwesesibili isiwombe bekuseyiCosmos ebibukeka iyingozi futhi yakha namathuba ngokukhulu ukuzikhululekela. Ligcine livelile elesibili ngonyawo luka-Aristide Bance ngomzuzu ka-70. Liphinde langena elinye ngomzuzu ka-85 lishaywa nguLucas Twala.Komunye umdlalo, iBloemfontein Celtic engayazi iwini emidlalweni emihlanu iphinde yathola induku ka-2-0 ivela kuMpumalanga Black Aces ebuyele endaweni yesithathu esicongweni se-log.
title: Ubuthaka iCosmos isinda kuChippa

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, usephumele obala ngekusasa likaKhama Billiat ozophelelwa inkontileka naleli qembu laseNaturena maduze. Kuningi ukuqagela ngekusasa lalo mgadli waseZimbabwe osehlale amasizini amathathu kwiChiefs eyamlanda ngedumela kwiMamelodi Sundowns. Ngokombandela wenkontileka ephakathi kukaBilliat neChiefs, iqembu livumelekile ukwelula ngenye isizini. Okunye osekubikwe kaningi emithonjeni yabezindaba ukuthi uBilliat ungomunye wabadlali abanesipiliyoni abazodilizwa kwiChiefs ngoba besolwa ngokubhacaza, nokuyinto eholele ekutheni izinto zibhimbe kakhulu kunakuqala kule sizini.Kuvela ukuthi ufunwa uthuli ngamaqembu ase-Egypt, i-Al Ahly neZamalek. Ephawula ngoBilliat ngemuva kokuthi iChiefs ibuyise isithunzi ngokuqumba phansi omkhaya baseSoweto, i-Orlando Pirates, ngo-1-0 koweDStv Premiership obuseFNB Stadium ngeSonto uHunt, uthe: "UBilliat usezinhlelweni ezinkulu zeqembu. Iyangixaka le mibiko ethi akekho ezinhlelweni zeqembu. Ngiyazibuza ukuthi ngempela abezindaba bakuthathaphi lokhu abakubikayo? Okumqoka njengamanje ukuthi abuye ngamandla njengoba ephuma ekulimaleni. Njengamanje useqalile ukugijima kancane. Ngihlalele emthandazweni wokuthi cishe emasontweni amabili azayo alulame ngokuphelele bese simnika noma imizuzu engu-20 athi ukugijima kancane.“IChiefs ihleli endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-23.UHunt, obekubonakala ukuthi kumjabulisile ukunqoba iPirates ebesimphendule ithofi, ubuye wancoma indlela uBernard Parker adlale ngayo enkabeni yesisu. Naye uParker ikusasa lakhe aliqondakali eNaturena. UHunt ubeqala ukwehlula iBucs. Yamshaya kabili emdlalweni owawundulela owamanqamu eMTN 8. Sekuhlanganiswe yomibili imilenze eZimnyama zanqoba ngo-5-0. Emlenzeni wokuqala weDStv Premiership ziphinde zanqoba ngo-2-1. Le miphumela yenze abanye babalandeli baMakhosi baqala bangabaza ubuholi bukaHunt. Lo mqeqeshi uthe bazosebenzisa ikhefu lamasonto amabili lemidlalo yeFifa ukulungisa amaphutha nokwamukela abadlali ababuya ekulimaleni. Igoli enqobe ngalo iChiefs libe lihle, liqotshelwa enethini umthakathi wezindaba uSamir Nurkovic, wahluleka wancama ukulivimba unozinti uSiyabonga Mpontshane. IBucs ihlulwa nje bese kuphele imidlalo eyisithupha ingayazi induku.  Ukunqoba bekuzoyibeka endaweni yesibili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership. Njengamanje ibambe indawo yesine ngamaphuzu awu-35.Umqeqeshi wayo uJosef Zinnbauer uthe: "Besiwafuna ephelele amaphuzu kodwa izinto azihlangananga. Ingimangazile indlela iChiefs eqome ukusizuma ekubeni ibidlala esibayeni sayo. Mina angeke ngiliphasise lelo bhola. Bazamile abadlali bami nokho,“ kusho uZinnbauer.
title: UHunt ucacisa ngekusasa likaBilliat eNaturena

text: ABACWANINGI baveza ukuthi ukudlala ama-video games anodlame kungenza izingane zigcine zingabantu abakhula benodlame.Lokhu kuvezwe ocwaningweni olwenziwe emazweni ahlukene lubheka imidlalo edlalwa yizingane nomthelela engaba nawo kuzona.Belubheka umthelela wokuzibandakanya kule midlalo ezinganeni ezingaphezu kuka-17 000 emhlabeni wonkana.Abacwaningi besikhungo semfundo ephakeme iDartmouth College, e-United States, baveze ukuthi iningi labo likholelwa ekutheni ukudlala ama-video games anodlame kunyusa amathuba okuba nodlame - basebancane abaphikisana nalokhu.USolwazi Jay Hull, ongungoti kwezokwelashwa kwezifo ezithikameza ingqondo ongomunye wabacwaningi abahamba phambili, uthe imiphumela yabo iveza ukuthi ukudlala ama-video games anodlame kunomthelela ekutheni izingane zigcine zinodlame.“Ngokwemiphumela esiyitholile sikholwa ukuthi kuyacaca ukuthi amavideo games anodlame anomthelela ekunyukeni kwamathuba odlame,” kusho uHull.Abacwaningi babheke imikhuba yodlame ezinganeni ezidlala ama-video games anodlame esikhathini esingangezinyanga ezintathu kuya eminyakeni emine ziwadlala.Izigameko zodlame abebezibheka kuzona bekuwukushaya ezinye izingane noma ukulwa nezinye izingane esikoleni - bebebheka nokushiwo ngabazali bazo, izingane ezilingana nazo nothisha ngezigameko zodlame esezike zabandakanyeka kuzona.Abacwaningi bathe banethemba lokuthi ucwaningo lwabo lungashintsha imicabango yalabo abebezitshela ukuthi ama-video games awanamthelela otheni ezinganeni.Ucwaningo lwabo lulandela olunye asebeke balwenza phambilini obelubheka umthelela wama-video games ekuziphatheni kwezingane - njengoba beveze ukuthi iningi lawo seligqamisa ukubhema, ukuphuza nocansi olungaphephile njengezinto ezinhle nokunomthelela othile ezinganeni eziwadlalayo.Amanye akhuthaza abantu ukuthi bashayele budedengu - okwenza ukuthi zithi ziqala ukushayela izingane zishayele budedengu.
title: 'Ama-video games anomthelela wodlame ezinganeni'

text: KUBANJWE umoya ekhempini ye-Algeria efike kuTotal Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ithwelwe ngeqoma ukuthi izobhubhisa njengoba ingase iwashe ijezi kweyamaqoqo kwazise ikhale ngaphansi kuTunisia kokaGroup B izolo ntambama, eStade de Franceville, eFranceville, eGabon.Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi i-Algeria isaphumelele ukuqoqa iphuzu elilodwa emidlalweni emibili kanti izovala iqoqo ngonzima kakhulu njengoba izodudulana neSenegal ezihola phambili ngokukleliswa kwamazwe e-Afrika. Lo mdlalo ungoMsombuluko. Ngalolo suku iTunisia izobe ibhekene neZimbabwe.Njengoba bekulindelekile womabili la maqembu esenhla nase-Afrika abengancengani yize bekuyi-Algeria ebonana kangcono. Nokho iTunisia isheshe yakhombisa ukuthi izoma emuva bese iphuma ngesivinini okuyinto ebiyisebenzela kwesinye isikhathi kodwa kufike kubhede uhlelo kubagadli bayo uma kwenzekile bafika phambi kwamapali e-Algeria.Obekungalindelekile ukuthi i-Algeria iqale lo mdlalo ngaphandle kukaRias M’bolhi (olimele) okungunozinti wayo wokuqina futhi uyena oyilamulele kuZimbabwe emdlalweni odlule lapho bebambane khona namaWarriors ngo 2-2.Esiwombeni sokuqala uSlimani uhlulwe ithuba elilula ngekhanda engamakwe muntu lo mgadli weLeicester City yase-England eliqondisa ngqo ku-Aymen Mathlouthi ongukaputeni futhi ongunizinti wompetha be-Afcon bango-2004, iTunisia. Ngoka-20 umzuzu noka-23 ngokuhlukana uYoussef Msakni weTunisia naye udlale ngethuba kade kuyikhona wamlandela noRiyad Mahrez wenza okufanayo.Umfutho we-Algeria nokuhlupha kukaSlimani obekubhoke esiwombeni sokuqala kube iwona futhi oqapheleka ngokushesha sezibuya ekhefini. Nakhona lapho i-Algeria ibisawuphethe umdlalo kodwa ingeyonaingozi. ITunisia iyona eyibone kuqala inethi ngonyawo lukaMsakni kodwa lashaya kukaputeni * -Assia Mandi umkhonto ugwaza ekhaya ngoka-50.Kusabatshazwa lokho, uFaouzi Ghoulam wenze iphutha elikhulu ededela uWabbi Kazri aphinde wamwisa esebhokisini kwadaleka iphenathi ethathwe uNaim Sliti oyibeke enethini ngoka-66.Ngemuva kokungena kwala magoli ibisalokhu iqhubeke njalo nokuzama i-Algeria kodwa kuze kwaqala isikhathi esengeziwe kwayima uSofianeHanni eshaya elokubika ekhaya le-Algeria.
title: Kubanjwe umoya ekhempini ye-Algeria

text: ABANTU abaningi bayakujabulela ukubizwa ngamagama amahle ahambisana nezikhundla abaziphethe emsebenzini, ikakhulukazi uma beqashwe yizinkampani ezinkulu kodwa owesifazane waseNgwelezane washiya umsebenzi wokuba wumabhalane wakhetha ukuqoqa udoti emigwaqweni.UNkk Nokubonga Mnyango abanye abambiza ngoBabes Kadoti, uthi akumkhathazi lokhu ngoba vele udoti uyawuthanda futhi akaligqizi qakala iphunga elibi elithaphuka kuwo.UNkk Mnyango ungumsunguli wenkampani uThando Recyclers, le nkampani uthi ikhuthaza umphakathi ukuthi ungawulahli budedengu udoti, iphinde ukhuthaze wona umphakathi ukuthi uzenzele imali ngokuqoqa udoti osengabuye usetshenziswe ngokuthi uwudayise.Le nkampani uthi uyisungule ngemuva kokuthi ebone ukuthi kanti udoti uyimali. Lokhu uthi wakubona ngesikhathi ethunywe enkampanini abeyisebenzela ukuthi ayodayisa amaplastiki asesebenzile asetshenziswa yile nkampani ukuhlola ukuthi izingodo ezidayisayo ziswakeme kangakanani, ngo-2014“Bekungakhethwa ukuthi ngubani othunywa ukuthi ayodayisa oplastiki, ngo-2014 kwathunywa mina, ngathatheka uma ngibona ukuthi kanti udoti unemali ngabuye ngabuza nokuthi kungani bewuthenga bangitshela ukuthi bakwenzela ukuthi kongiwe imvelo.“Uthando lwami lokonga imvelo lwaqala lapho, angibange ngisachitha sikhathi ngaqala ngaqoqa udoti ngawubeka egcekeni lami ngaphambi kokuthi ngiye emsebenzini. Kwabaningi ukuqoqa izigubhu, amabhodlela, amathini namaphepha kwakubukeka njengokuhlanya,” kusho yena.Lo mcabango womakhelwane uthe waqina kakhulu ngesikhathi eseyeka umsebenzi enza lo msebenzi ngokugcwele ngo-2015. Imali ayithola emsebenzini uthe wathenga iveni elidala waliqamba ngokuthi “money maker”.Ngawo lowo nyaka wangenela umncintiswano owawuhlelwe uMkhandlu uMhlathuze, iResponsible Tourism Challenge, emunxeni oqondene nokuqoqwa kukadoti. Wawina isikali asisebenzisela ukukala udoti, okwamsiza ukuthi avule isikhungo esizothenga amabhodlela, izigubhu namaphepha emphakathini.“Ngo-2017 kwavuleka elinye ithuba ngangena ngaphansi kohlelo lwakaCoca-Cola Beverages SA (CCBSA) olukhuthaza ukuthi abafundi baqoqe udoti ikakhulukazi izigubhu, amabhodlela namaphepha. Ngathola izikole ezingu-14 engazifaka kulolu hlelo, zenza umsebenzi oncomekayo okwaholela ekutheni ngichonywe uphaphe lwegwalagwala, emncintiswaneni iBusiness Women of the Year ohlelwa yiyo iCCBSA,” kusho yena.
title: Kwamvulela uMnyango wemali ukuqoqa udoti

text: INHLOKO yophiko lwezokushushisa u-Advocate Shamila Batohi, ithe ngamampunge ukuthi yathola uR1.7 milllion emkhankasweni kaMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, iCR17 esakhankasela ukuhola i-ANC.“Into engekho le. Angicabangi ukuthi kumele ngiyiphendule. Angazi kungani abantu benza lokhu.”Uthe le yimizamo yokumdidisa emsebenzini wakhe.“Ngeke kunginqide lokhu ukuthi ngenze umsebenzi wami. Isiqalo lesi, kukhulu okuzayo. Ngesikhathi ngiphonswa imibuzo ngifake isicelo sokuthi ngikhethwe kulesi sikhundla ngasho ukuthi izinto ezinje zizokwenzeka.”Usho lokhu ekhuluma kwiMorning Live izolo ekuseni emuva kokuvela kwezinsolo zokuthi wathola le mali.Kuthiwa yena namanye amajaji bathola le mali kwiCR17.Lokhu kusabalele kwiTwitter abantu babuza ukuthi bangazethemba kanjani ezokushushisa nezobulungiswa uma kungukuthi amajaji ayagwazelwa.
title: UBatohi uchitha eyomkhankaso kaCR17

text: UPHUME esephelezelwa amaphoyisa umhloli obevalelwe ngabafundi befuna ngodli ukuhlolwa ukuthi abanayo yini iCoronavirus.Abafundi baseNqabakazulu High KwaMashu, ngoLwesibili bavalele umhloli bedinwa ukuthi ufike engahambi nabasebenzi bezempilo ababhekelele ukuhlonza nokuhlolwa kwabanegciwane ekubeni kade bethenjiswe ukuthi bazofika.Abafundi abafunda uGrade 12 bathi batshelwe ukuthi omunye wothisha unegciwane ngoLwesihlanu, kwangadalulwa ukuthi ungubani, obekuzobasiza ukuthi bazi ukuthi bake bathintana yini naye.Omunye umfundi oficwe yileli phephandaba uthe kutholakala ukuthi uthisha unaleli gciwane nje, sekukathathu befika esikoleni amakilasi engahlanziwe, uma bebuza kuthiwe abahlanza esikoleni abafikanga.“Siyayithanda imfundo kodwa impilo kithina ibaluleke kakhulu. Othisha bethu sathi uma sibacela ukuthi basichazele ukuthi njengoba kunothisha onegciwane yisiphi isinyathelo esilandelayo, bathi ababona ongoti balesi sifo akukho abazositshela kona, bahlala egumbini labo saze sahamba singatshelwanga lutho,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi ngoMsombuluko bafike bavala amasango befuna ukuthi abezempilo abawongoti bafike bazobachazela ngoba othisha bebethi abazi lutho.“Sigcine siwavulile amasango ngoba kuthiwa nakanjani namhlanje (izolo) bazofika abasebenzi bezempilo bazosichazela. Umhloli ufike wangayiphendula imibuzo yethu washo lokho abefuna ukukusho kithina. Samcela ukuthi akaphume esikoleni ngoba akayixazululi inkinga esinayo. Siphumile esikoleni savala amasango samtshela ukuthi akasibizele ongoti abesithembise bona obekuthiwe bazofika. Asiqondile ukudelela othisha bethu kodwa siyazi ukuthi uma singangena emakilasini kanti sinegciwane singase singaqedi ukufunda,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi umhloli ubabizele amaphoyisa afike abadubula ngezinhlamvu zenjoloba.“Umhloli ubone ukuthi abafundi abalwela amalungelo abo kumele badutshulwe kunokuthi alungise udaba lwethu. Thina siyayithanda imfundo uma sekulungisiwe esikhala ngakho sizobuyela emakilasini futhi sizimisele ngokufunda isikhathi esengeziwe ngoba siyazi ukuthi kube nesikhathi esilahlekile ngesikhathi kumisiwe ukwenziwa kwezinye izinto kuleli,” kusho yena.UMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa okhulumela Mnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uthe bakhuza umhlola ngabafundi abavalele umhloli esikoleni.“Siyazi ukuthi kunovalo ngalesi sifo kodwa udaba lokugula komuntu udaba olubucayi okungelula ukuthi ludalulelwe wonke umuntu okuyisona sizathu esiholele ekutheni abafundi bangatshelwa ukuth yimuphi uthisha ohaqekile. Lesi akusona isikhathi sokuthi sikhombane ngeminwe kodwa yisikhathi sokuthi sesekane. Udaba lokuhlolwa kwesifo oloMnyango wezeMpilo, yibo abachazayo ukuthi ngubani okumele ahlolwe nokungamele ahlolwe. Abafundi asikho isidingo sokuthi bagolozele othisha bathi bafuna ukuhlolwa ngenkani. Abafundi siyacela ukuthi benze umsebenzi wabo bangagxambukeli emsebenzini wezempilo,” kusho yena.Uthe njengomnyango zintathu izinto abazibheke kakhulu ukuthi izinsiza zokuphepha zikhona ezikoleni, ukuthi kuyafundwa njengoba kuke kwalahleka isikhathi nokuthi unyaka wokufunda ungalahleki.“Impi asiyidingi ezikoleni, sidinga kufundweUCaptain Nqobile Gwala okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe uthe abafundi bakulesi sikole babe nombhikiso okuholele ekutheni kubizwe uphiko lwamaphoyisa olulwa nodlame emphakathi.“Amaphoyisa adubule laba fundi ngezinhlamvu zenjoloba ngenhloso yokubahlakaza , kubo akekho olimele noma oboshiwe,” usho kanje.
title: Ulaka befuna ukuhlolwa iCorona

text: UHULUMENI uzoqhubeka nokuholela isibonelelo sabangasebenzi kanye nohlelo loxhaso lwesikhashana lwabasebenzi i-UIF Covid-19 Temporary Employer/Employee Relief Scheme (Ters).Lokhu kumenyezelwe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ethula inkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni izolo ePhalamende eKapa. URamaphosa umemezele ukululwa kwesikhathi sokukhokhwa kwalezi zimali ezaqala ukukhokhwa ngonyaka owedlule njengengxenye yemizamo kahulumeni yokulekelela labo abakhahlanyezwa ukubheduka kwegciwane iCorona.Isibonelelo sabangasebenzi, obekufanele sigcine ukuholelwa kule nyanga, sizolulwa ngezinyanga ezintathu kanti i-UIF Covid Ters yona izoholelwa kuze kube uMashi 15.“Amabhizinisi emikhakheni eyahlukene asadonsa kanzima kanti nemindeni eminingi nayo isathwele kanzima njengoba amathuba emisebenzi engavumi.“Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule sibe nezingxoxo nezinhlaka ezahlukene emikhakheni yamabhizinisi kanye nezabasebenzi, abaphakamise ukuba sinwebe uxhaso lwezomnotho kanye nolwezenhlalakahle.“Yingakho sinqume ukunweba isibonelelo sabangasebenzi. Lesi sibonelelo sikhombise ukuba isisombululo sesikhashana ekwehliseni umthwalo emahlombe kwizakhamizi ezihlwempu.”URamaphosa uthembise ukuqhubeka nokuqinisa ukusebenza kwezinhlaka zezomthetho ukuze kuliwe nenkohlakalo.“Inkohlakalo ivimba ukuthuthukiswa kanye nokukhula kwezwe. Okudalulwa kwiKhomishini (iJaji uRaymond) kaZondo, zikhombisa ngokusobala izinga lokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana kanye nenkohlakalo. “Ubufakazi obethulwe kule khomishini bukhombise ngokusobala ukuthi izinhlaka zokulwa nobugebengu zibuthaka kangakani. Yingakho kubalulekile ukuthi siqhubeke nezinhlelo esiziqale eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule, zokuqinisa lezi zinhlaka.”URamaphosa uthe kuningi asebekwenzile ukuqinisa ukusebenza kwalezi zinhlaka kubalwa nokuqashwa kwabaholi abasezingeni ukuhola lezi nhlaka nokwenza ngcono ukusebenzisana kwezinhlaka ezilwa nobugebengu. URamaphosa uveze ukuthi basemkhankasweni wokuphucula ukusebenza komasipala.“Miningi imizamo esiyenzayo ukwesekela omasipala ukulungisa inkinga yokwahluleka komasipala ukuhlinzeka ngamanzi kanye nokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda.“Sigxile kakhulu ekuqasheni abantu abawufundele umsebenzi komasipala ukuze senze isiqiniseko sokuthi ziyahanjiswa ngendlela izidingo.”URamaphosa uthe uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokulwa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane. Umemezele ukuthi kunoR128 million osubekwe eceleni ukuqhuba imikhankaso yokulwa nalesi sihlava.Uthe basebenzisana ne-Eskom ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isimo sayo sezimali siyathuthuka, inciphisa izikweletu nokuncika kuhulumeni.Uveze ukuthi kunezinhlelo ezizomenyezelwa wuMnyango waMandla nokuMbiwayo zokufaka ugesi owu-2 000 megawatts ozobhekelela izimo ezibucayi.Kunezinhlelo zokuthola ugesi owu-11 800 megawatts ongayingcolisi imvelo.Uveze ukuthi i-Eskom iveze ukuthi izodinga u-4 000 kuya ku- 6 000 megawatts kagesi kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo ngoba iziteshi zikagesi zizobe seziphelelwa yisikhathi.Uthe ukulungiselela ukushoda kwalo gesi i-Eskom isiqalile ukuthola owu-2 600 ozophehlwa ngomoya nangelanga.Kuzobuye kutholakale ugesi owu- 5 000 megawatts kubakhiqizi bakagesi abazimele ukugwema ukucima kukagesi.
