Omasipala nabo bazokwazi ukuthenga ugesi uma sekuphothulwe umthetho ozolawula lokhu.Yize engakhulumanga ngazo zonke izinkampani zikahulumeni kodwa uthe zizoqashwa ngeso lokhozi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ziba nozinzo.Uphinde wafisela iSilo samaBandla uGoodwill Zwelithi, ukwelulama okusheshayo.
title: Sizoqhubeka isibonelelo sikaR350 sabangasebenzi

text: INKAKHA yomlingisi esanda kuba sematheni ngokuphumela obala ukuthi inenqwaba yamathoyizi ocansi, ithi icishe yalahlekelwa wumsebenzi kulandela ukudalula kwayo lezi zindaba.ULillian Dube ngo-Agasti waphenduka undabuzekwayo ngenkathi ekhuluma nelinye lamaphephandana aphuma ngeSonto eveza ukuthi unamathoyizi ocansi abalelwa kwayisikhombisa, wakhuluma nangokubaluleka kokuzithanda kwabesifazane.Uthe lokhu kucishe kwamlahlekisela ngomunye wemisebenzi ayenzayo. Noma kunjalo kodwa uthi akazisoli nakancane ngokukhuluma ngocansi.Kuleli sonto ekhuluma emsakazweni iMetro FM, uveze ukuthi wenza ihaba ngokuthi athi unamathoyizi ayisikhombisa, empeleni mathathu.“Nginamathathu kodwa noma ngabe ayisikhombisa akusho ukuthi ngingabe ngiwasebenzisa wonke kanye kanye. Uwagqoka wonke amahembe akho kanye kanye...cha?”.Eqhuba uveze ukuthi ukuphawula kwakhe kuleli phephandaba kwamdonsela amanzi ngomsele kubaphathi bakhe.“Ngeke ngisho ukuthi iyiphi leyo nkampani ecishe yangixosha ngoba benganeme ngale nto. Ngathi ngizokhuluma, ngeke ngithule ngoba kunabantu besilisa esibathandayo abehlelwe wumdlandla kwezocansi. Kwenziwenjani-ke, baye komakhelwane?”.ULillian uphinde wakuveza nokuthi akazisoli nangenkulumo yakhe aba nayo kwithelevishini noThomas Mlambo ekhuluma ngokuthi kubalulekile nokuncelwa kwamabele kwabesifazane uma abathandanayo bezijabulisa enkonzweni yasekameleni.Waze wabala ukuthi uma amadoda engajwayelwa ukubotoza amabele abesifazane, nawo angakwazi ukuzwa uma sekukhona isigaxa esingaba wuphawu lomdlavuza webele. Kanjalo nabesifazane wabakhuthaza ngokuthi nabo kumele kube khona abakuncelayo.-ANA
title: Ucishe waphelelwa yitoho ngenxa yamathoyizi ocansi

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEUMQEQESHI obambile weBanyana Banyana uDesiree Ellis uqoke iqembu labadlali abangu-22 abazobhekana neFrance kowobungani ngenyanga ezayo.Umdlalo ungoJanuwari 22 eSaint-Denis, eReunion Islands ngo-9 ebusuku, ngokwesikhathi sakuleli. Ikhempu kulindeleke ukuthi iqale ngempelasonto kaJanuwari 13-15.U-Ellis ukhethe iningi labadlali ababebeyibambe ku-Africa Women Cup of Nations ebiseCameroon ngoNovemba lapho iqembu lathola khona indawo yesine. Ubabonelele nalabo badlali abenze kahle ngesikhathi kunemidlalo kazwelonke yeSasol League egcine inqotshwe yiBloemfontein Celtic ngasekuqaleni kwenyanga. Andile Dlamini (Mamelodi Sundowns); Roxanne Barker (SC Heerenveen, Netherlands); Yolula Tsawe (JVW, Johannesburg)  Nothando Vilakazi (Palace Super Falcons), Janine Van Wyk (JVW), Bambanani Mbane, Zenhle Chabaku (both Bloemfontein Celtic), Lebogang Mabatle (TUKS), Noko Matlou and Lebohang Ramalepe (both Ma-Indies FC), Nompumelelo Nyandeni, Linda Mothlalo, Gabriela Salgado                      (all JVW), Leandra Smeda, Thembi Kgatlana (both UWC Ladies), Refiloe Jane (Mamelodi Sundowns), Silindile Ngubane (Durban Ladies)                    Rhoda Mulaudzi, Andisiwe Mgcoyi (both Mamelodi Sundowns), Jermaine Seoposenwe (Samford University, USA), Shiwe Nogwanya (Bloemfontein Celtic), Bontle Mashilo (TUT-Pretoria)
title: Sebeqokiwe abazomela iBanyana

text:
MINENHLE MKHIZEAKADIKIBELE ngokusala ngaphandle ohlwini lwabadlali abazobanga umklomelo womdlali omncane ovelele ku-Absa Premiership uPhakamani “Phaka” Mahlambi weBidvest Wits.Namuhla e-Emperors Palace eGoli ngo-8.30 ebusuku, iPremier Soccer League (PSL) izochoma uphaphe lwegwalagwala abadlali abenze kahle ngesizini ka-2015/2016.Alikho igama likaMahlambi kulabo abazoklonyeliswa namuhla. Kodwa lo mdlali uthathe amehlo ezinkumbi zabathandi bebhola eNingizimu Afrika ngemilingo abeyigila enkundleni.Umklomelo weYoung Player of the Season uzobangwa ngu-Aubrey Modiba weMpumalanga Black Aces, Rivaldo Coetzee noSello Jaftha weFree State Stars.UMahlambi exoxa ne
Solezwe ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi akakhatha-zekile ngokusala ngaphandle.Lo mdlali akayiqedanga isizini ngemuva kokulimala idolo maphakathi nesizini.“Angiphathekile kabi nakancane ngokuphuthwa ngumklomelo womdlali omncane ovelele. Bonke abaqokiwe bakufanele ukubanga lo mklomelo. Mina ngiphazamiswe ukulimala futhi angiyena umdlali odlalela imiklomelo. Abaqokiwe benze kahle futhi ngibafisela inhlanhla,” kusho uMahlambi.UMahlambi udlale imidlalo engu-14 washaya amagoli amahlanu kule sizini esanda kusongwa. Ngokomthetho wePSL umdlali kufanele adlale imidlalo engu-15 kuya phezulu ukuze aqokelwe emiklomelweni yale nhlangano.Ngesizini edlule lo mklomelo unqontshwe nguPhumlani Ntshangase weWits.Lo mdlali odabuka eMlazi uwuthathe kuKeagan Dolly weMamelodi Sundowns.UMahlambi ufake isandla ekutheni iqembu lesizwe lika-Under-23 lizibekisele indawo kuma-Olympic Games aseRio de Janeiro, eBrazil ngo-Agasti.“Njengamanje sengiyazihambela. Nokho ngeke ngidlale kuma-Olympic. Angiboni ukuthi kuzoshaya isikhathi sokuqala kwawo sengiluleme ngokugcwele.“Angizimisele ngokujaha ukubuyela enkundleni ekubeni ngizizwa kahle ukuthi angikalulami,” kusho uMahlambi.Iqembu lakhe liqede endaweni yesibili ku-Absa Premiership egcine inqontshwe yiSundowns.“Sidlale kahle kakhulu njengeqembu. Ngesizini ezayo uma singaqhubeka ngale ndlela esidlale ngayo bese siba nomgqigqo ngicabanga ukuthi singenza kangcono kakhulu,” kusho uMahlambi.Abaqokiwe kweye-Absa Premiership:Young Player of the Season: Aubrey Modiba, Rivaldo Coetzee, Sello Jaftha.Goalkeeper of the Season: Denis Onyango, Moeneeb Josephs, Shu-Aib Walters.Defender of the Season: Thabo Nthethe, Thulani Hlatshwayo, Vuyo Mere.Midfielder of the Season: Hlompo Kekana, Keagan Dolly, Khama Billiat.Player’s Player of the Season: Khama Billiat, Keagan Dolly, Hlompo Kekana.Footballer of the Season: Khama Billiat, Keagan Dolly, Hlompo Kekana.Coach of the Season: Gavin Hunt, Pitso Mosimane, Muhsin Ertugral.Goal of the Season: Ben Motswari v Chippa, Mpho Makola v Chippa, Thabo Rakhale v Aces.Top Goalscorer: Collins Mbesuma (14 goals)
title: Akabadleli umona ontanga ngomklomelo wovelele

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe uhlela ukuba nomhlangano ophuthumaya nodokotela bzikhungo ezingoqhibukhowe ezibonakala ziqubuka ngokukhula ukushesha kodwa zibe zibeka izinga labantu abahlaselwe yiCovi-19 esimeni esibucayi ngenxa yokuthi umsebenzi wazo aziwenzi ngendlela efanele.UNkk Simelane-Zulu ukhulume kanje emva kokuthi uNdunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe ezwakalise ukuphatheka kabi ngalesi senzo esithangamini sabezindaba eThekwini ngeSonto esimayelana nezibalo zeCovid-19 KwaZulu-Natal, wabeka izizathu zokungahleleki komsebenzi owenziwa yilezi zikhungo.“Okwalezi zikhungo kuyakhathaza ngoba nathi sibona sekufika imiphumela esikhathazayo ngazo. Lezi zikhungo zivesane zibeke itende bese zithi zihlolela abantu iCovid-19,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Ngokusho kwakhe, odokotela laba abanendaba nokuthi umuntu ukusiphi isimo, njengoba bayaye batshele nababahlolela leli gciwane ukuthi noma bangahlala ngaphakthi ezimotweni zabo, akunankinga.“Kunemininingwane eminingi lezi zikhungo ezingayithathi kubantu ezibahlolayo. Sesihlele ukuthi sibe nomhlangano nazo maduze nje ngobuchwepheshe besimanje ukuze zisichazele ukuthi kwenzekani ngempela,” usho njalo.Uthe bake baba nayo inkinga efanayo ngoMashi, kodwa babaxwayisa odokotela abenza lokhu.Uthe njengoba sekucaca ukuthi sebaphinde babuyela kulokho ababekhuzwa ngakho phambilini, bazophinde bakhulume nabo ngoba kuningi okungahambi kahle abakwenzayo.
title: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo uzohlangana nodokotela bezikhungo zoqhibukhowe zeCovid-19

text: KULINDELEKE ukuthi avele enkantolo namhlanje owesilisa waseVerulam obize umengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Cyrl Ramaphosa, ngegama lokucwasa abantu abamnyama eliqala ngo-K, kwivideo esabelele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UMnuz Kessie Nair kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo yeMantshi ePhoenix ngemuva kokuboshwa oKlebe ngoLwesithathu.Okhulumela oKlebe kuzwelonke, uBrigadier Hangwani Mulaudzi, uthe uNair uvulelwe icala lokudicilela phansi isithunzi nokuphehla udlame.“Uboshwe ngemuva kokuvulwa kwecala ngoLwesithathu, uzovela enkantolo yemantshi ePhoenix. Kulindeleke ukuthi kube khona amanye amacala azothweswa wona uma umsolwa esevela enkantolo,” usho kanje.Owayeyikhansela emkhandlwini weTheku futhi olwela amalungelo omphakathi eChatsworth, uMnuz Brandon Pillay, uthe nguye ovulele uNair icala futhi usazombika nakwiSA Humans Rights Commision. UPillay uthe uNair uqale ngokubhala imibhalo ecwasayo ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook ngaphambi kokuthi afake iVideo,“Sifisa abantu bazi ukuthi inkulumo yakhe ayimele abomdabu waseNdiya kuleli,” kusho uPillay.Kwivideo ayifake kuFacebook uNair uzwakala ebiza uRamapahosa ngegama eliqala ngo-K izikhawu eziningana, emsola ngokucindezela abantu bakuleli. Ngasekugcineni uyaqhubeka acwase abantu abamnyama ababize ngezinkawu nezimfene.
title: Ukhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ocwase uRamaphosa ngokwebala

text: KUPHELILE kwabebeqagela ngoRobert Marawa nokubuyela kwakhe eSABC emuva kokuthi inhlangano yokusakaza imemezele ngokusemthethweni ukuthi uzozwakala kusuka ngo-Agasti 1.Kuke kwaba nesikhulu isidididi ngokuqashwa kwakhe emasontweni adlule.Kulindeleke ukuthi uMarawa ethule izinhlelo ezimbili kanyekanye. Uzozwakala kuMetro FM ethula ezemidlalo ngoMsombuluko kuya ngoLwesihlanu ngo-6 kuya ku-7.Ngezinsuku ezifanayo uzophinde azwakale kuRadio 2000 kusuka ngo-6 kuze kube wu-8 ebusuku.Okhulumela iSABC, uKaizer Kganyago, uthe konke obekungakalungiswa phakathi kweSABC noRobert kugcine kulungisiwe futhi iSABC isikulungele ukumamukela.“Sikubheke ngabomvu ukuthi abuye azokwenza umsebenzi oncomekayo ezinhlelweni zethu kuphinde kube nokunyuka kwabalaleli ezinhlelweni azobe ezenza njengoba beqhubeka benyuka usuku nosuku,” kusho uKaizer.UMarawa uthe lokhu ukubona njengokuqhubeka kobudlelwano bakhe neSABC nokuzinikela kwayo ekuletheni izidingo zabantu. Ukuthola ukwesekwa okukuleli zinga kubalulekile kimi ukuze ngizokwazi ukuphakela abalaleli izinhlelo ezisezingeni eliphezulu, ezifanele abalaleli bethu. Ukudlala kohlelo eziteshini ezimbili kanye kanye siyethemba kuzonyusa isibalo sabalaleli,” kusho yena.Emasontweni adlule kuvele izindaba zokuthi kuphenywa izikhulu ezimbili zeSABC okukhona kuzo esibhekele ukusebenza khona, uChris Maroleng, okuthiwa azilandelanga umthetho ngokuqasha uRobert.Iphephandaba eliphuma ngeSonto, libike ukuthi uMaroleng noNkk Marcia Mahlalela baziswe ukuthi bazobekwa amacala ngokubuyisa uRobert.Uphenyo ngalolu daba lwaluqalwe ngobeyisikhulu esibambile eSABC, uNkk Nomsa Philiso, emuva kokuthola izikhalo kubasebenzi bekhononda ngokubuyiswa kukaRobert.Emacaleni obekuthiwa bazobhekana nawo kubalwa elokwehlisa esikhundleni umsebenzi onqabe ukubhala incwadi encoma ukuthi kuqashwe kabusha uRobert. Elesibili elokusayina inkontileka kaRobert ngaphandle kokuyihambisa kobhekele izimali zezemidalo ukuze asho ukuthi ikhona yini imali yokuholela uRobert.Elesithathu elokusayina inkontileka ezodla imali eningi eSABC ekubeni uNkk Mahlalela kufanele kube nguye oqinisekisa ukuthi imali ayimosheki kule nhlangano. URobert uzohola * -R7 000 ngohlelo olulodwa okusho ukuthi ngenyanga wenza * -R154 000 okuzodla iSABC * -R5.5 million eminyakeni emithathu.
title: UMarawa uzozwakala emsakazweni maduze

text: I-ANC igxekwe ngamalungu amaqembu aphikisayo ePhalamende ngokuvikela uNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya, uMnuz Malusi Gigaba ongafuni ukulungisa umthetho i-Immigration Amendment Bill, yize sekuphele izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo imcele ukuthi awulungise.Izolo uGigaba noMqondisi Jikelele woMnyango wezaseKhaya, uMnuz Mkhuseli Apleni nezinye izikhulu bebevele ePhalamende beyophendula ngezingqinamba zomnyango.Umhlangano ubizwe emuva kokuthi uMnyango wezaseKhaya uthathe izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ukulandela umyalelo weNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ewucela ukuthi ulungise isigaba esithinta ukuboshwa kwabantu bokufika abangene eNingizimu Afrika ngokungemthetho.Inkantolo yomthethosisekelo yanika uMnyango umnqamulajuqu kaJuni nonyaka ukuthi kube sekulungiswe zonke izigaba zomthetho wabokufika eyayikhala ngazo.U-Apleni utshele amalungu ePhalamende izolo ukuthi lolu daba lwafika esamisiwe ngo-Novemba wonyaka odlule.UMnuz Haniff Hoosen weDA uthe kuyihlazo ukuthi umnyango awukwenzi okushiwo yiNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo futhi uyaqhubeka nokubopha abokufika ngaphandle kokubashushisa.Uthe ufuna ukwazi ukuthi imalini esichithiwe ngamacala athinta uMnyango wezaseKhaya ongalaleli.UNkk Deborah Raphuti oyilungu le-ANC uthe kufanele umnyango ulandele okushiwo enkantolo ngoba kuzovikela wonke umuntu.UNkk Hlengiwe Hlophe-Mkalipi uthe uGigaba kufanele azikhulumele ePhalamende kungashiwo ukuthi makenze isitatimende okuyisiphakamiso esenziwe ngamalungu e-ANC. “Akasona isangoma, uyakwazi ukuzikhulumela. Asisho ukuthi uyena ongawulandelanga umthetho kodwa sithi njengoMphathi woMnyango kufanele asho okuthile ngokwenzeka emnyangweni wakhe. Angathuli kube sengathi uwupopayi, musani ukumvikela.”Kodwa uNkk Raphuti uthe abavikeli muntu ngoba wonke umuntu kufanele aziphendulele ePhalamende.
title: I-ANC igxekwe ngokuvikela uGigaba

text: UMNDENI womphathi wesikhungo esigcina izingane ezihamba amacala, obulewe, ePinetown ufuna kuphenyisiswe ngokubulawa kwakhe njengoba usola ukuthi kusetshenziswe izingane.UMnuz Meshack Ntshangase (40), waseNkwezela eBulwer, ubulawe emagcekeni esikhungo i-Excelsior Child and Youth Centre, ePinetown ngoMsombuluko.Kusolwa izingane ezigcinwe kulesi sikhungo, ezineminyaka ephakathi kuka-13 no-17 ngokubulawa kwakhe, njengoba ezine kuthiwa zeqile emuva kwalesi sigameko.Lezi zingane kuthiwa zithathe isikhwama semali, i-laptop nokhiye wemoto kamufi zasebenzisa uphahla lwesikhungo ukubaleka.Isidumbu sikaNtshangase kuthiwa sitholwe sisethoyilethi kodwa amachaphazelo egazi akhomba ukuthi uhlaselwe esephaseji. Ugwazwe ngento ecijile. UNtshangase nguyena kuphela obesebenza njengoba abasebenzi besikhungo betelekile.Izolo ngesikhathi Isolezwe likulesi sikhungo abasebenzi bebeqhinqe ngaphandle kwesango bephethe izingqwembe okubhalwe kuzo izikhalo zabo. Bathe noma sekwenzeke lesi sigameko bazoqhubeka nokuteleka.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Zithulele Ntshangase, ufike kulesi sikhungo ehamba nendodana kamufi uMxolisi, bezolanda imoto yomfowabo ebisapakwe emagcekeni.UZithulele utshele Isolezwe ukuthi kusenzima ukukhuluma ngodaba lomfowabo kodwa bafuna kuphenyisiswe ukuze kuvele iqiniso ngokubulawa kwakhe.“Umfowethu bekungumuntu oqotho. Izingane ezihlala kulesi sikhungo bezimthatha njengoyise okwenza kube nzima ukukholwa ukuthi zihlasele umfowethu, ngaphandle kokuthunywa ngumuntu omdala. Sifuna amaphoyisa aphenyisise,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe ngesikhathi ebikelwa ngesehlo utshelwe ukuthi umfowabo unamanxeba amabili okugwazwa kodwa emakhazeni ubone inqwaba yamanxeba entanyeni, esiswini nangasesifubeni.Umufi unezingane ezimbili, uMxolisi noThembeka. Ubehlala nenkosikazi yakhe emafulethini akulesi sikhungo. Umufi waqala ukusebenza kulesi sikhungo ngo-1994. Kuthiwa ubewukhonzile umsebenzi wakhe njengoba kwesinye isikhathi ubelandwa eselivini ukuba azoxazulula izinkinga kule ndawo. E-Excelsior kuhlala izingane ezibhekene namacala obugebengu kodwa ezingeke zigcinwe ejele ngenxa yeminyaka yazo. Ngemuva kwesigameko, izingane ebezisele zithathiwe zayiswa kwezinye indawo.Akekho osaboshiwe ngokubulawa kukaNtshangase.Osebenza nanye ocele ukungadalulwa uthe bathwele kanzima njengoba bengakwazi nokukhushulwa ezikhundleni, abanye beba yitoho isikhathi eside. Umnyango uthe ukuqhinqa kwabasebenzi akukho emthethweni.
title: Basola itulo ngokubulawa  kwesikhulu esikhungweni

text: USEZWAKALISE ukukhathazeka umethuli wezinhlelo zethelevishini mayelana nokuhlukumezeka kwabesifazane abahlala bethenga amaqakelo nyanga zonke. USiv Ngesi ongomunye wosaziwayo besilisa abalekelela abesifazane ngamaqakelo uveze ubunzima abhekana nabo kulo mkhankaso. USiv emakhasini akhe ezokuxhumana okubalwa uTwitter no-Instagram ukhala ngokuthi abantu besilisa abaningi abasemandleni babukeka bengayikhathalele indaba yabesifazane namaqakelo.Yize uSiv ezama ukungqongqoza kweminye iminyango ukuzama ukuthola izindlela zokuthi abesifazane bahlinzekwe ngamaqakelo kodwa uthi kubukeka kusewuqansa ngoba abantu besilisa abaningi abayiboni indaba yamaqaleko njengento edinga ukusukunyelwa kulekelelwe abesifazane. Kunalokho abantu babona izindlelo zokwenza ibhizinisi elizofaka imali nyanga zonke. Lokhu uveza ukuthi kuyezwela kuye ngoba kusho ukuthi abesifazane bazoqhubeka nokubhekana nengcindezi yezindleko zamaqakelo nyanga zonke.Lesi sihloko sikaSiv sithinte abantu abaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okubalwa nabanye bosaziwayo. Bephawula abantu abanye baveze ukuthi kufanele ngabe amaqakelo ahlinzekwa mahhala njengoba uhulumeni enza nakumakhondomu. Abanye bathi yize ikhona imkhankaso efunze ekaSiv kodwa kusekude phambili ngendlela esekukhulunywe kakhulu ngaso lesi sihloko kufanele engabe sewukhona umehluko uhulumeni awenzile.USiv uthe uzimisele nokulokhu elishumayela ivangeli lamaqakelo amahhala kwabesifazane kuze kube kuyenzeka. Lokhu uthe ukholelwa ukuthi kungawehlisa umthwalo emahlombe kulabo abangakwazi nokubhekana nezindleko zokuthengwa kwayo nyanga zonke
title: Ulwela abesifazane ngeyamaqakelo owethelevishini

text: UZOQEDELA isigwebo sekhadi elibomvu bese ebuyela “ekhaya” umdlali wasemuva weKaizer Chiefs uLorenzo Gordinho ozobuyela eNaturena ngemuva kokubolekiswa kwiBloemfontein Celtic.UGordinho ubolekwe yiPhunya Sele Sele maphakathi nesizini edlule kusaqeqesha uSteve Komphela kwiChiefs.Lo mqeqeshi ugxekwe kakhulu ngalesi senzo kwazise kukhona abebekholwa ukuthi bakhona abanye abadlali basemuva abebengahanjiswa.Izikhalo ziqubuke ngisho ngaphakathi kwiChiefs. Ekupheleni kwenyanga uGordinho uzobuyela eNaturena ukuyoqala impilo entsha ngaphansi komqeqeshi * -Ersnt Middendorp. Nokho abalandeli abajahe ukuthi ayoxazulula izinkinga zaMakhosi emuva kungase kufanele balinde kancane kwazise usaqedela isigwebo sekhadi elibomvu alithole ngesonto eledlule iCeltic ihlulwa AmaZulu ngo 3-0 eThekwini.Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi uGordinho uzofika kwiChiefs sekunesikhathi agcina ukudlala okungasho ukuthi umqeqeshi ngeke akwazi ukumsebenzisa.IChiefs inomdlalo onzima lapho izobhekana khona neMamelodi Sundowns kowe-Absa Premiership ngoJanuwari 5 eFNB Stadium, eNasrec. Lo mdlali wasemuva uzobe esekulungele ukudlala ngoba isigwebo sizobe sesiphelile kodwa konke kulele kuMiddendorp ukuthi uzombona enjani ejimini.UGordinho uqale isigwebo sakhe ngempelasonto edlule ngesikhathi ezakhe zihlulwa yiHighlands Park ngo 2-1 kowe-Absa Premiership.Uzophinde ahlale ngaphandle uma iCeltic isibhekene neCape Town City ngoMgqibelo.Okhulumela iChiefs, uVina Maphosa, wenqabile ukwenaba ngokubuya kukaGordinho.“Iqembu adlala kulona uGordinho lingasithathela izinyathelo uma singakhuluma ngaye. Lizothi sikhuluma ngomdlali walo. Ngeke siphawule kuze kuba sekupheleni kwenyanga. Okwamanje usengumdlali weCeltic,” kusho uMaphosa.Nokho imithombo ethembekile ikuqinisekisile ukuthi uGordinho ubuyela eNaturena.Ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2018/2019, kuqubuke umdonsiswano phakathi kweChiefs neCeltic ngoGordinho kwazise Amakhosi kade esefuna abuye eNaturena phezu kokuba izinyanga eziwu-18 okwakuvunyelwene ngazo bezingakapheli. Kugcine sekujikijelwana ngamazwi kwathenjiswana nezinkantolo.Nokho kugcine kuvela ukuthi uGordinho uyena obefuna ukubuyela eNaturena ngenxa yesimo esingemnandi eBloemfontein kwazise abadlali kade bebuye bangaholi ngenxa yesimo semali esinzima iqembu elibhekene naso.Imizamo yokuthola isikhulu esiphezulu seCeltic, uKhumbulani Konco, ayiphumelelanga kwazise ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe.IChiefs izobhekana ne-Elgeco Plus yaseMadagascar emdlalweni womlenze wesibili weCAF Confederation Cup ekuhambeni ngoMgqibelo.Emlenzeni wokuqala eMoses Mbhida Stadium, eThekwini kudlule iChiefs ngo 3-0.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Kusasa: Bidvest Wits v Chippa United (Bidvest Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: AmaZulu v Lamontville Golden Arrows (King Zwelithini Stadium, 3.30pm); Cape Town City v Bloemfontein Stadium (Cape Town Stadium, 6pm); Maritzburg United v Baroka FC (Harry Gwala Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Highlands Park v SuperSport United (Makhulong Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: Kubuya indodana yolahleko kwiChiefs

text: I-EFF kuphoqeleke ukuthi ize iphume ePhalamende izolo ngemuva kokusuka komsindo mayelana nodaba lokudliwa komhlaba.Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema izolo uqhubekile nokutshela abantu bakuleli ukuthi abazitapele umhlaba ongasebenzi.USomlomo uMnuz Lechesa Tsenoli uxwayise uMalema wathi kumele ahloniphe umthethosisekelo.“Abantu abaqhubeke nokuthatha umhlaba, lo mhlaba ngowethu, uma i-ANC ifuna ukubulala abantu ibabulalela umhlaba, ayikwenze lokho,” kusho uMalema.UMalema uphendule ngokudinwa kuTsenoli ethi imuphi umthetho omvimbelayo ukuthi atshele abantu ukuthi abathathe umhlaba.“Ayikho into ozoyenza, ayikho futhi leli Phalamende into elingayenza, mina ngithi abantu abaqhubeka nokuthatha umhlaba, asidinge mvumo kuwena, noma ePhalamende noma kuMengameli futhi asinandaba namuntu,” kusho uMalema.UMalema utshele uTsenoli ukuthi akenze noma yini athanda ukuyenza.
title: UMalema usayiphaka eyomhlaba

text: INKAKHA yomlingisi uSeputla Sebogodi, iveze ukuthi indawo yayo kwisizini yesine yomdlalo iThe River ezoqala ngoMsombuluko, izoletha into abantu abangayilindele.USeputla ulingisa indawo kaMohumi Ditshwene, ongubaba kaTumi, obuye ngoba ezoziphindiselela kuLindiwe Dikana (Sindi Dlathu). Uqale ukubonakala kulo mdlalo ngonyaka odlule, nalapho avela khona amasonto amabili wanyamalala.Kulo nyaka uphinde wavela, lapho Isolezwe lihabule ukuthi usebuye unomphela kulo mdlalo ngeke esanyamalala.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uSeputla, uthe indawo yakhe usuku nosuku izoshiya ababukeli bomdlalo bebambe ongezansi.“Lona ngomunye wemidlalo engadumazi nakancane, ukuba yingxenye yawo nje kusho lukhulu kimi. Indawo kaMohumi izokhula kule sizini yesine ezoqala, futhi uzoqhubeka nokuba yisitha sikaLindiwe, ngoba kuningi afuna ukuziphindiselela ngakho kuye. Ngiyabathembisa ababukeli ukuthi abaqhubeke nokubuka mdlalo ngoba kusazoshuba,“ kusho eSeputla.Uveze ukuthi nokuba seduzane nendodana yakhe uThapelo (Khabzela) nayo elingisa kulo mdlalo, kumenze wathokoza emoyeni.“Yize ngangingathandi angene kulo mkhakha wokulingisa ngenxa yezingqinamba engizaziyo, kodwa ukumbona enza kahle kangaka kuyangijabulisa. Ngangifuna abe emkhakheni wamabhange abale izimali, ngoba wayenza kahle kuMaths nakuPhysics esikoleni. Siyathemba ukuthi abantu bazoqhubeka nokuthakasela umsebenzi wethu sesindawonye,“ kuchaza yena.Isolezwe lihabule ukuthi kule sizini ziyanda izitha zikaLindiwe kunakuqala futhi uzojikelwa nangumyeni wakhe uZweli (Hlomla Dandala).Umthombo uphinde waveza nokuthi uTumi (Larona Moagi), uyashiya kulo mdlalo kanti kuzoba nomshado lapho kuzoba nesidumo, bese kufa othile.
title: Uthembisa lukhulu kwiThe River

text:
KUNGENZEKA uThabo Sonjica anyukele esigabeni esingaphezulu, ayolwa ku-lightweight kulandela ukuphucwa ibhande lakhe ngempelasonto edlule ngoba ehlulwe wukushaya isisindo ebesilindelekile.Uphromotha wakaGolden Gloves okuyisitebele esiphethe lo mshayisibhakela, uRodney Berman, uthe ngeke bamlahle kunalokho bazomzamela kwesinye isigaba.USonjica weqe ngo-2kg esigabeni se-junior featherweight nokuphoqeleke ukuthi alishiye ibhande lakhe le-IBO abelinqobe nyakenye.Lo mshayisibhakela ungenile eringini wahlulwa ngamaphuzu nguRoli Gasca wasePhilippines empini ebise-Emperors Palace ngempelasonto kodwa obese kungasasizi ngoba bese livele lihambile ibhande ngenxa yokusinda ngokweqile kunokulindelekile.“Umuzwa wokuqala ongifikele kube owokudinwa wukuthi ibhokisa lingaziphatha ngale ndlela engahloniphekile. Lokhu bekungeke kwehlise izinga lomqhudelwano kuphela kodwa kungabulala nekusasa lakhe. Kodwa uSonjica usemncane ngokwesibhakela akanaso isipiliyoni. Unethalente eliyisimanga futhi angaba nekusasa eliqhakazile uma engathola ukuphathwa okufanele akhuliswe ngendlela,” kusho uBerman.Uthe inzika yenkinga kaSonjica (onethambo elide) wukuthi umzimba wakhe umenza ubukeke efanelwe wukulwa esigabeni esingaphezulu kwese-junior featherweight.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ubude bakhe bumkhomba ukuthi kufanele ngabe ulwa ezingeni eliphezulu, okuyizigaba ezimbili ngaphezulu kwalesi akusona. Kufanele azakhele igama ku-junior lightweight. Ulahlekelwe ngokunikela ngebhande le-IBO kodwa sisekhona isikhathi sokuthi awine ezinye izicoco ngoba unethalente, udinga ukukhula ngengqondo.”UBerman ube esebongela uRyno Liebenberg ohlule uDeni Grachev waseRussia empini yebhande le-WBC light-heavyweight silver. ULiebenberg uselwe izimpi ezingu-16 ngaphandle kokwehlulwa. – 
Intatheli yeSolezwe
title: Uzanyelwa ukufakwa esigabeni se-lightweight uSonjica

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEI-MARITZBURG United ishaywe yiMamelodi Sundowns, kwathi umqeqeshi wayo u-Ernst Middendorp, wakhala ngokulimala kwenye yezinsika zakhe.Ukushaywa kwe-United ngo 2-0  kuyilimazile njengoba yehlele endaweni ka-13 kwi-log yeDStv Premiership, ngamaphuzu awu-25. Isimo sayo kasisihle, ihlukaniswe yiphuzu neChippa United ehleli endaweni ka-15 kwi-log. Ibambene ngawu-25 neTshakhuma FC ekweyesi-14 neStellenbosch ebambe unombolo-12. Kubukeka kumphoqa kuMiddendorp ukunqoba kule midlalo emihlanu emsalele, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayalivika izembe.Ukushaywa kwayo kuqhubeze ishobolo lokwehluleka ukushayela ePitoli, iSundowns iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye. Kubuzwa uMiddendorp ukuthi ngaphambi kwalo mdlalo, ubekulungiselele kanjani ukuqeda lolu khondolo, uthe: "Amalungiselelo ahambe kahle kakhulu. Sineqembu elakhiwe abadlali bezinga eliphezulu. Sishaywe ukulimala kukaJudas  Mosemaedi ngasekuqaleni kwesonto. Nakuba kunjalo bakwazile ukuyibamba ishisa labo ebekade bekhona.“UMiddendorp ukhale ngezakhe eziyeka oqekelele bamathuba, athi yikho okubaqhathe nezitha. "Ngasekuqaleni komdlalo sibe nenhlanhla yokungangenelwa yigoli. Nakuba kunjalo abadlali beSundowns bagcine bekwazile ukusebenzisa amathuba osuku, bashaye amagoli amabili. Thina sithole amathuba amathathu kuya kwamane kodwa asiwasebenzisanga ngendlela efanele. Wonke amathuba besiwahlelele, kawenzekanga ngephutha. Besihlasela, sinqoba amabhola, singena ngqo ebhokisini lezitha. Kuze kwaba kathathu. Lo mdlalo besiwulungiselele kahle kusukela uqala. Okusihlalele manje ukuthi sivuke sizithintithe kule midlalo esisalele. Siyasazi isimo esibhekene naso, nginethemba lokuthi sizokwenza kahle,“ kusho uMiddendorp.ITeam of Choice iye kulo mdlalo inethemba ngenxa yokungashaywa emidlalweni emithathu edlule. Mhlawumbe okuzothokozisa uMiddendorp nezakhe ukuthi bazoba nesikhathi esanele sokulungiselela umdlalo olandelayo, womkhaya neLamontville Golden Arrows.Uzoba ngoLwesithathu ngo-3 ntambama eHarry Gwala Stadium.Ngemuva kwawo iMaritzburg izosalelwa oweTshakhuma ozoba ePeter Mokaba Stadium, oweCape Town City, eCape Town Stadium, oweSuperSport United eLucas Moripe Stadium, nowaMaZulu ekhaya.
title: UMiddendorp ubalise ngokulimala komgadli bedliwa

text: UBHEKE ukuthi bashaye amagoli amabili noma amathathu kusukela ngoLwesihlanu uma bedlala imidlalo yasekhaya umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso Mosimane.Leli qembu laseChloorkop lizodlala neKampala City Council koweCAF Champions League, eLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli, ngoLwesihlanu ngo-7 ebusuku.“Bayiqembu elinzima, kuzobe kungumdlalo omkhulu ngoLwesihlanu. Kufanele sishaye amagoli ekhaya ngoba akulula ekuhambeni. Amagoli amabili noma amathathu mahle uma nidlala ekhaya. Ngibabonile ngesikhathi benqoba umdlalo wabo ngo 7-0 ekhaya. Kunomdlali oshaya amagoli kuleli qembu odlala ngenxele. Bayingozi enkundleni yabo encane enotshani obungebona obemvelo. Kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi abalishayi igoli lapha kithi,” kusho uMosimane.Uthe ukuvikela isicoco seChampions League yinto engenzeka. “Kodwa udinga ukuthi abadlali bakho bangalimali, futhi babe sefomini. Kumele ungalishintshi iqembu lakho owine ngalo. Thina sibulawa ukungabi khona kukaKeagan Dolly. Indawo yakhe iyabonakala kodwa angisho ukuthi ngeke sidlale sinqobe uma engekho. Bengidlalisa uThemba Zwane kodwa bekungenele njengoba yena edlala ngonyawo lwesokudla, kanti akasheshi njengalona ohambile.”Uveze ukuthi ubulawa ngabadlali abalimele wathi kodwa abanye bebengadlali ngesikhathi bebhekene neMariveni ngoba ubebabekele oweCAF.“UTiyani Mabunda ulimale ehlombe, noHlompho Kekana bengithi uzodlala imizuzu engu-45 eKapa kodwa kwangakwenza ngoba bengingafuni ukuthi ngithathe amashansi. ULucky Mohomi ubengakajwayeli indlela esidlala ngayo. Ngigcine abadlali abafana noBangaly Soumahoro ngenzela lo mdlalo. UWayne Arendse unamakhadi kodwa kusafanele basitshele bona abeCAF,” kusho uMosimane.Uthe iqembu lakhe alidlalanga kahle libhekene neMariveni FC koweNedbank Cup kuyo le nkundla ngoMsombuluko. “Okubalulekile ukuthi sidlulele phambili kulo mqhudelwano. Bake bathi ukusithwalisa ubunzima begoloza ukudedela igoli. Kodwa siyijwayele imidlalo enjena, nangesikhathi sidlala neVasco Da Gama kwakunjena kowandulela owamanqamu weNedbank Cup.”ISundowns inqobe lo mdlalo ngamagoli kaLeonardo Castro no-Anthony Laffor. “Kuhle ukuthi ugcine elitholile igoli uCastro. Ubelifuna naseKapa. Kodwa engikuthandayo ngaye ukuthi akakashintshi.”
title: UPitso unethemba ngendebe yeCAF

text: IMeya yeTheku uKhansela Mxolisi Kaunda, yamukela zonke izivakashi edolobheni, futhi inxusa izakhamuzi ukuthi ziqhubeke nokwamukela izivakashi ngezandla ezimhlophe.Wazisa nomphakathi ukuthi unqenqema oluhamba abantu ebhishi (i-promenade) luvuliwe ukuze abantu bakwazi ukugijima, bahambe ngama-bhayisikili futhi bazingcebelekele nje kulona. Kodwa unxuse wonke umuntu ukuthi alandele imigomo ebekiwe ukuze kungasabalali iCoronavirus njengoba izwe lingena kwisivuvu sesibili.Esabela ekhweleni likaMengameli, uKaunda uthe uMasipala wenze izinguquko ezinhlelweni zamaholidi alo nyaka.Nazi ezinye izinguquko:Kunomthetho wokuthi umuntu abe esekhaya kusuka ngo-11 ebusuku kuya ku-4 ekuseni;Kuzomele wonke umuntu agqoke isifonyo uma esendaweni yomphakathi noma isakhiwo okubalwa nezinto ezithutha umphakathiUtshwala abuvumelekile ukuthi buphuzelwe ezindaweni zomphakathi okubalwa amabhishi namapaki, ngaphandle kwasezindaweni ezinemvume yokuthi zibudayise;Azovalwa amabhishi eThekwini kusuka ngoDisemba 16, 25, 26 no-31, 2020 kanjalo no- 1,2,3 Januwari, 2021. Izakhamuzi zingaqhubeka nokugijima esihlabathini, zihambe noma zenze i-yoga kanjalo nezinye izinhlelo ezithuthukisa impilo. Ama-Park and Ride emabhishi azovalwa ngalezi zinsuku ezibaluliwe uMongameli;Ngezinye izinsuku, amabhishi azovulwa kusuka ngo-9 ekuseni kuya ku-6 ntambama. Ama-Lifeguards azobe ekhona eqaphe isimo ukuthi abekho abamukayo. Ama-Park and Ride azosebenza ngalezi zikhathi;Kuphoqelekile ukuthi abantu baqikelele ukuthi ngesikhathi sokuthi basekhaya, sebezivalele ezindlini njengoba kungekho ozovunyelwa ukuthi alale ezindaweni zomphakathi okubalwa ematekisini, emabhasini kanjalo nasezimotweni;Awuvumelekile umculo odlalela phezulu.Abangalandeli imigomo ebekiwe, izinsuku okuvulwe ngazo amabhishi, ukungafakwa kwezifonyo nokungaqhelelani, kuzokwenza ukuthi avalwe lawo mabhishi kuze kuphele isikhathi samaholidi. Abezomthetho basiqaphile isimo ukuze kulandelwe yonke imigomo,” kusho uKaunda.IMeya inxuse abamahhotela, izindawo zokudlela emalokishini ukuthi zingajahi ukwenza imali zibeke engcupheni abasuke behambele lezi zindawo.Amaphoyisa edolobha kanjalo nezinhlaka zezokuphepha zizoqinisekisa ukuthi imigomo iyalandelwa ikakhulu ezintweni ezithutha umphakathi njengamatekisi, okuyiwona athutha ingxenye enkulu yezakhamuzi zaseThekwini.Imibhiyozo emuva kwemingcwabo ivaliwe kanti kuzovunyelwa kuphela abangu-100 uma kunemicimbi ezindaweni ezivalekile kube abangu-250 kuphela ezindaweni ezivulekile.Izinhlelo zamaholidi eThekwini zihamba ngendlela. ITheku lilindele ukwamukela izivakashi ezingu-540 000 ngamaholidi, kusuka ngoDisemba 1 kuya kuJanuwari 31, 2021, okusho ukuthi kuzongena uR3 billion kwiGDP. Yize kunjalo kodwa isibalo sezivakashi sehle ngo-25% uma uqhathanisa nezibalo zango-2019 ngenxa yeCovid-19 nemigomo yomvalelandlini.IMeya  uKaunda, uveze ukuthi ziyaqhubeka izinhlelo zamaholidi emalokishini ahlukene eThekwini.Lezi zinhlelo zilethe umuzwa kaKhisimusi emalokishini njengoba kucule yonke ibhendi yeKwaZulu-Natal Philharmonic Orchestra, iLadysmith Black Mambazo, Thandeka Ndlovu kanjalo nabanye abaculi.Esontweni lesithathu likaDisemba, uKaunda ube nesidlo nezingane ezingcebeleke nase-Ushaka Marine World. Uvakashele izindawo ezithandwa izivakashi okuyiseMhlanga, Florida Road, Umlazi naseChesterville, ukuyoxoxa nabanikazi bezindawo zobumnandi kanjalo nabahambela lezi zindawo.Unxuse izakhamuzi nezivakashi ukuthi ziqaphele futhi zilandele imigomo yeCovid-19, wanxusa ukuthi kwehliswe isibalo salabo abaya ezindaweni ezigcwala kakhulu.“NgoDisemba, sifuna ukuqinisekisa izivakashi ukuthi zizokwazi ukuthola konke ezikudingayo njengokuhambela zonke izindawo ezizithandayo. Yingakho siya naseMlazi-ukuze sihambise ezokuvakasha kubantu futhi sihambise nomyalezo womkhandlu ngalesi sikhathi,” kusho uKaunda.Emuva kwesimemezelo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngemigomo yeCovid-19 ngalesi sikhathi samaholidi, uKaunda uthe uMkhandlu uyayeseka yonke le migomo. “Noma siqonda ukuthi izivakashi edolobheni zizodumala, kodwa sizoyilandela yonke imigomo ebekiwe ukuze izivakashi ziphephe futhi sihambisane nokudingwa umkhakha wezokuvakasha.”Udalule nebanga elihanjiwe ohlelweni lokuthi kufukulwe umnotho weTheku, okufaka ukuvula ezokuvakasha okuyisisekelo sesithathu.Ubalule nokuthi uMkhandlu weTheku usebenza nomnyango wezempilo, owezokuthuthukiswa komnotho, ezokuvakasha kanye nezemvelo, owezokuthutha nokuxhumana komphakathi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi nezakhamuzi ziphephile eThekwini ngamaholidi.IDurban Tourism izoba nezinhlelo zokuqwashisa ngokuphepha emalokishini ahlukene kusuka ngoDisemba 20.IMeya inxuse intsha nabanye ukuthi behlise noma bangayihambeli imicimbi okugcwala kakhulu noma amaphathi angasabalalisa umbhedukazwe waleli gciwane.Inxuse umphakathi ukuthi uphuze ngokuzinakekela, uqhelelane, ungabi yiqulu kodwa imicimbi kube eyabantu abambalwa.“Zigwemeni izindawo ezigcwalayo, ezingenakho ukuphefumula okwanele. Phumelani ngaphandle nijabulele isimo sezulu saseThekwini. Washani izandla, nigqoke izifonyo ngendlela okuyiyo emakhaleni nasemlomeni, hhayi esilevini,” kusho uKaunda.
title: Luvulwe ngaphansi kwemigomo yeCovid-19 unqenqema oluhamba abantu ebhishi (i-promenade)

text: BAZIQEQESHA naMaZulu FC abadlali ababili abanamava okudlala esigabeni esiphezulu ebholeni elikhokhelayo.USiphelele “Shaka Zulu” Mthembu noMakhehleni Makhaula bazama inhlanhla Osuthwini emuva kokunyamalala isikhashana ebholeni.UMthembu ugcine ukudlala kwiCape Town City isaqeqeshwa nguBenni McCarthy kanti uMakhaula ubedlalela iHighlands Park esidayisile esizokwaziwa ngeTS Galaxy.UMthembu ungumgadli odle ngamandla, yize engawashayi njalo amagoli kodwa uyakwazi ukuvulela ozakwabo izikhala kwakheke amagoli. Eminyekeni edlule ubangwe yizinkunzi zaseSoweto iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates. Ugcine ewadlalele womabili amaqembu ayintandokazi ebholeni lakuleli. Hleze ukugxekwa okugqamile ngoMthembu okuyaye kushiwo ngabalandeli bebhola wukuthi akawashayi amagoli amaningi alandele umsebenzi wakhe wokuba ngumgadli. UMakhaula ugqame kakhulu kwiFree State Stars. Uyakwazi ukudlala esiswini nasemuva. Unonyawo oluqinile nokho, uma emaka kusiphuka izidindi.“UMakhaula noMthembu bajima noSuthu. Bafike ngoLwesine olwedlule, basaziqeqeshe cishe kabili neqembu. Umqeqeshi * -Ayanda Dlamini ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi ufuna iqembu elizodlalela ukunqoba izicoco ngesizini ezayo, yingakho kulandwe laba badlali. Kunzima ukusho ukuthi bazosayina noma kuzokwenzeka kuphi kodwa kubukeka sengathi basagculisekile okwamanje abaqeqeshi,” kusho umthombo.Iphini lomqeqeshi kuMaZulu, * -Alan Freese, usebenzile noMakhaula kwiHighlands Park nanoMthembu kusekhona iPlatinum Stars.Esikhathini esedlule AmaZulu abenenkinga yodonga lwasemuva oluvuzayo, okungenzeka ukuba ukuthola uMakhaula kungasiza ukuvimba izitha engxenyeni enkulu yeqembu.Babukeka bebukhali abagadli boSuthu uBongi Ntuli noLehlohonolo Majoro abebevutha ngesikhathi kusongwa imidlalo yePremier Soccer League (PSL).Kodwa ukuthola uMthembu njengomgadli, kunganika ithimba labaqeqeshi indlela eyehlukile yokudlala phambili, ngenxa yokuthi uyakwazi ukugcina ibhola ecindezekile.Okhulumela AmaZulu, uBrilliant Mkhathini, uvumile ukuthi laba badlali baziqeqesha nezakhe.“Yebo bakhona, baziqeqesha neqembu. Laba ngabadlali ababili abanamava okudlala esigabeni esiphezulu. Yize kunjalo, kubalulekile ukungasayini umdlali ngento owawumazela yona kodwa umsayine ngoba kukhona okubonile,” kusho uMkhathini.
title: UMthembu noMakhaula baziqeqesha naMaZulu

text: AHLABE ahlikiza inkulumo kaMengameli wezwe abeyibhekise esizweni amaqembu aphikisayo ePhalamende ethi akayeke ukuphupha ngezinto ezikude alungise okonakele manje.Abamaqembu aphikisayo bakhale ngokuthi abantu balambe manje, abasebenzi manje, bayadlwengulwa, ubugebengu budlangile, abantu abanazo izindlu kodwa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ubatshela ngephupho lokwakha idolobha elisha, isitimela esihamba ngesivivini nokunye.Umholi weDA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane uthe abadingi amaphupho kodwa badinga umnyakazo manje.Uthe kudingeka uhlelo olucacile lokuthi okonakele kuzolungiswa kanjani.“Kumele kulungiswe indaba yokungasebenzi kwabantu kuleli. Ngeke imisebenzi ize ngezimayini noma ngezolimo kumele kugxilwe kwezobuchwepheshe. Akuhlukaniswe kabili i-Eskom, kudayiswe inkampani yamabhanoyi iSAA kuyekwe nendaba yomshwalense wezempilo iNHI ngoba iyabiza. Akulungiswe ezemfundo ngoba izingane zigibela amatekisi zisuka lapho zihlala khona ziye ezikoleni ezingcono,” kusho uMaimane.Uthe kwakumele kwehliswe isibalo songqongqoshe kwiKhabhinethi, kungandiswa amaphini ongqongqoshe. Uthe kumele avunyelwe uMvikeli woMphakathi ukuthi aphothule uphenyo ngomnikelo uRamaphosa awuthola kwiBosasa.Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema uthe uRamaphosa kumele ayeke ukuphupha ngoba unguMengameli.“Yeka ukuphupha, kumele wenze izinto zenzeke. U-9.9 million wabantu abangasebenzi, manje okuyinhlekelele. Uma uthi eminyakeni engu-10 ezayo uzokwakha imisebenzi yabantu abangu-2 million, kusho ukuthi u-7 million ngeke usebenze,” kusho uMalema.Uthe bafuna izitshudeni zingakhokhi nhlobo imali yokubhalisa ezikhungweni zemfundo wathi ileyo imfundo yamahhala.“Asazi uMandela wabonani kuwena thina esingayiboni. Asinaso isizathu sokuthi sikususe esihlalweni sakho ngoba ukhethwe ngabantu kodwa uma kungukuthi awuphenduki ulungise amaphutha akho ngemali owayithola yomkhankaso wokuba nguMengameli we-ANC siyophoqeleka ukuthi sikususe,” kusho uMalema.Umholi we-IFP inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi uthe kumele kuboshwe abantu abenza inkohlakalo okumanje ababoshiwe.Uthe kumele kube nekhomishini ezobhekana nendaba yenkohlakalo kuleli.UShenge uncome isinqumo sokuthi kumele kusekwe omasipala abandonsa kanzima.UMnuz Nqabayomzi Kwankwa we-UDM, uthe baningi abantu abangasebenzi kuleli ngakho kumele kwenziwe umnyakazo manje.UDkt Zweli Mkhize, uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, uthe ngosuku bangu-212 abantu abasuleleka ngengculazi wathi abesilisa abadala abathelela amantombazane amancane.“I-NHI izobakhona iyona ndlela yokubhekana nokuthi kuhlinzekwe ngezempilo.”UMnuz Bheki Cele, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uthe bayalwa nenkohlakalo wathi angu-1800 amadokodo anikwe uphiko lwezokushushisa ukuze kushushiswe abathintekayo.Uthe bazosungula uphiko oluzoqeqesha abaseshi ukuze kuqiniswe umsebenzi abawenzayo.UCele uthe bayalwa nezehlakalo zodlame ezigubuzele izikole zakuleli.“Siyalwa namacala okuhlukumeza ngokobulili njengoba kukhona abantu-692 abathole odilikajele ngawo. Angu-3 234 amadokodo abephenywa uma sihlanganisa odilikajele benza iminyaka engu-30 521.”UDkt Blade Nzimande, uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, iSayensi noBuchwepheshe, uthe isikhwama esixhasa izitshudeni ngemali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme sizoxhaswa ngoR82 billion eminyakeni emithathu ezayo kulabo abafunda emanyuvesi.Uthe lesi sikhwama sizoxhasa izitshudeni zasemakolishi ngoR24 billion kule minyaka wathi kumele kukhiqizwe ama-artisan.I-EFF iphumile ngesikhathi sekukhuluma uNgqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni uMnuz Pravin Gordhan yathi izobuya uma eseqede ukukhuluma.URamaphosa uzophendula namhlanje yonke imibuzo.
title: 'Asazi uMandela wabonani kuwena thina esingayiboni'

text: KULINDELEKE ukuthi owayeyisikhulu seSouth African Airways (SAA), uNksz Dudu Myeni, avele enkantolo yasePitoli namhlanje aziphendulele ngecala elafakwa yi-Organisation Undoing Tax Abuse (Outa).Ukuqulwa kwecala likaNksz Myeni lahlehliswa ekuqaleni kwenyanga emuva kokungalibhadi kwakhe enkantolo.Amacala abhekene nawo asukela esicelweni esafakwa yi-Outa neSAA Pilots Association (SAAPA) ngoMashi 2017, sokuthi inkantolo ikubeke kucace ukuthi waba ngumqondisi owahluleka ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe.Ngalokhu bafuna ukuthi inkantolo imphuce ilungelo lokuba aphinde abe ngumqondisi kwezinye izinkampani.UNksz Myeni wayekade engusihlalo weSAA kusukela ngoDisemba 2012 kwaze kwaba wu-Okthoba 2017.Ngesikhathi engafiki enkantolo yasePitoli wathumela umyalezo eveza ukuthi ngeke akwazi ukukhokhela izindleko esuka kwakhe eRichards Bay eya enkantolo.Obekudala isidididi ecaleni likaNksz Myeni wukuthi ubesafake isicelo kubaphathi beSAA sokuba iSAA ikhokhele izindleko zecala. Ubesalinde impendulo ngalokho.Abe-Outa baveza ukuthi abakholelwa wukuthi uNksz Myeni akanayo imali yokuza ecaleni kwazise igama lakhe livela njengomqondisi ezinkampanini eziningi.
title: UMyeni enkantolo yasePitoli namhlanje

text: UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uJosef Zinnbauer akafuni ukuzifaka ingcindezi ngempumelelo yeZimnyama kwiCAF Confederation Cup.IPirates izibekisele indawo esigabeni samaqoqo eConfederation Cup emuva kokuhlula iJwaneng Galaxy yaseBotswana ngo 4-0 uma sekuhlanganiswa imiphumela yemilenze yomibili. Ngesikhathi iPirates igcina ukufinyelela kulesi sigaba, yahamba yaze yafika kowamanqamu lapho yahlulwa khona yi-Etoile du Sahel yaseTunisia isaqeqeshwa ngu-Eric Tinkler ngo-2015.Ngemuva kokuhlula iJwaneng Galaxy  ngo 1-0 e-Orlando Stadium ngeSonto ebusuku, uZinnbauer uthe kuseva ukuthi usengasho  ukuthi ukuqina kweqembu lakhe kulibeka ethubeni lempumelelo.Izolo bekulindeleke ukuthi aqhathwe amaqembu azogadulisana esigabeni samaqoqo. Kuwona kukhona izinkunzi ezaziwayo ebholeni lase-Afrika i-Enyimba yaseNigeria, CS Sfaxien yaseTunisia, neRaja Casablanca yaseMorocco. Kukhona nomakoti iNAPSA Stars yaseZambia."Anginalo ulwazi ngamaqembu ase-Afrika kodwa sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyaluthola ulwazi ngawo wonke aseqoqweni lethu. Okwamanje angazi ukuthi yimaphi aqinile nangaqinile. Ucwaningo esizolwenza luzokwenza sibone ukuthi amathuba ethu empumelelo angakanani. Ngiyazi ukuthi ibhola lase-Afrika linzima. Wonke amaqembu analo ithuba lokuyiwina iConfederation Cup. Okwethu wukuthi siqhubeke nokulwa. Asikwazi ukuzithela ngabandayo ngoba sesifike esigabeni samaqoqo," kusho uZinnbauer odabuka eGermany.Ukuphuma kweGalaxy kulo mqhudelwano kusho ukuthi alisekho iqembu laseBotswana elisele emqhudelwaneni weCAF. IGalaxy iwele emdlalweni wokuhlungela isigaba samaqoqo eConfederation emuva kokukhishwa yiMamelodi Sundowns kubangwa indawo kwesamaqoqo eChampions League.Umqeqeshi wayo, u-Ovis Rapotsane, uthe uyaziqhenya ngabadlali bakhe kwazise iligi imisiwe ezweni lakhe ngenxa yeCovid-19. Nokho uveze ukuthi izikhulu zidalule ukuthi izobuya emasontweni amabili ezayo."Sidlale neqembu elinzima i-Orlando Pirates eselidlale imidlalo engu-24. Thina sisadlale eyisithupha kuphela. Ngiyaziqhenya ngabafana bami. Alidlalwa ibhola eBotswana. Kodwa ke ngizwile ukuthi iyaqala iligi emasontweni amabili ezayo," kusho uRapotsane.KwiCaf Champions League iKaizer Chiefs izokwamukela iHoroya yaseGuiena emdlalweni wanamuhla eFNB Stadium ngo-6 ntambama. IChiefs izobe iqala ukudlala kulo mqhudelwano kweyamaqoqo kulandela ukuvinjwa ukuya eMorocco ukuyodlala neWydad Casablanca ngemuva kokuthi leli lizwe elisenhla ne-Afrika libeke umgomo wokungavumeli abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngenxa yeCovid-19.
title: Owe-Pirates akafuni ukuqagela ngempumelelo yabo kwiCaf

text: UBONGA ukuthi ubengekho endlini owesifazane waKwaMashu oshayelwe ucingo ngomakhelwane umuzi wakubo usungamalangabi.UNksz Slindile Cele waKwaD KwaMashu, obevakashele isoka lakhe ngeSonto ngesikhathi kusha umuzi wakubo, uthi ubonga ukuthi bekungekho muntu endlini enkulu ngesikhathi kusha umuzi wakubo.“Ngijwayele ukuthi uma ngivakashile ngibuye ngeSonto, kulokhu bengizobuya ngoMsombuluko ngoba ingane yami beyingekho, ivakashile njengoba kuvalwe izikole. Kusho ukuthi sinengane yami besizosha singqongqe nomuzi ukube besingaphakathi,” kusho yena.Uthe yize kungaziwa ukuthi umuzi ushiswe yini kodwa yena uyazichitha izinsolo zokuthi umuzi ushiswe yizintambo zikagesi ebezinenkinga. Indlela obekusha ngayo ubona sengathi kukhona okuthelwe kuwo.“Ukube bekuyizintambo umalume ubezozwa kuqhuma, manje akuzwakalanga lutho kubonakale ngelangabi nje. Nginemidlinzo eminingi ngalesi sigameko. Mina anginaso isitha ebesingafisa ukungishisa nendlu kodwa amanye amalungu omndeni anazo izitha abengafisa ukwenzakalisa umndeni wawo, kodwa angifuni ukuchaza kakhulu ngakho,” kusho yena.UNksz Cele uthe umuzi onamakamelo amane okulala ushe wangqongqa kwaze kwasha nohhafu wendlu engaphandle, elala umalume wakhe.Lo mndeni, osale nezingubo obuhambe nazo, uthi usacushiswe ngabangani.“Asikazi ukuthi sizothathani sihlanganise nani ngoba umuzi ushe wonke kanje. Ngeshwa omunye umalume okunguyena obekhokhela umshuwalense wendlu wagwetshwa ngoJanuwari. Thina esisele besingakazenzi izinhlelo zokuthi sikhokhe,” kusho yena.Lo mndeni awulivulile icala ngalesi sigameko.
title: Ushaya amakhala ngokusha komuzi

text: BANINGI abantu abathi abakwazi ukuqala usuku lwabo ngaphandle kwenkomishi yekhofi, kukhona ngisho abesifazane abaze bathi bayalithandiswa uma bekhulelwe. Kodwa ongoti bezempilo bathi ukuphuza ikhofi ukhulelwe kungaba nemithelela emibi enganeni oyikhulelwe.Ucwaningo lwakamuva luveza ukuthi iningi lezingane ezizalwa zinesisindo esikhulu, zisuke zitholwe abesifazane abakhonze ikhofi. Bathi isithako esikulesi siphuzo, i-caffeine, iyona edala ukukhuluphala ngokweqile kulezi zingane.Lezi zingane azigcini nje ngokukhuluphala zingakazalwa, ngisho sezikhulile ziba nenkinga yokukhuluphala okunzima ukukulawula.Yingakho bethi inkomishi eyodwa noma ezimbili zekhofi kwabakhulelwe, kubeka ingane yakho engcupheni yokukhuluphala ngokweqile ngesikhathi isiyongena esikoleni.Ungoti obehola lolu cwaningo we-University of Gothenburg Sahlgrenska Academy eseSweden, uSolwazi Verena Sengpiel, uthi abesifazane bangazivikela izingane zabo kulokhu.“Kungaba umqondo omuhle ukuzibamba noma zivumelekile izinkomishi ezintathu ngosuku. I-caffeine akusiyo imishanguzo umuntu aphoqelekayo ukuthi ayithathe,” kusho uSengpiel.Kodwa noma kunjalo ongoti bathi akukabacaceli kahle ukuthi yikhona kuphi okwenza i-caffeine ikhuluphalise izingane. Ithimba ebelenza lolu cwaningo lihlanganise abasefazane abakhulelwe abaphuze ikhofi labalandela nezingane baze bayobeletha.Liqhubeke nokubalandela lenza ucwaningo izingane zaze zaba neminyaka engu-8.Izingane ezibalelwa ku-5% zabesifazane ababephuza ikhofi bese ziqalile zinesisindo esingaphezulu zineminyaka engu-5.Noma ucwaningo lusaqhubeka nokwenziwa kodwa uSengpiel ukhuthaza ukuthi abesifazane bahambele kude nekhofi uma bekhulelwe.Ngaphandle kwalolu cwaningo, abesifazane abakhulelwe bayaxwayiswa nangokuthi bahambele kude eziphuzweni ezinika amandla kwazise nazo zinesithako esingadala izinkinga enganeni engakazalwa. Kulabo abasazama ukukhulelwa, lesi sithako singaba yisithiyo, nakhona ongoti bathi kungakuhle baziqhelanise naso.Lesi sithako kuyenzeka sitholakale nasemithini yokwelapha umkhuhlane, abesifazane abakhulelwe kumele babuze kodokotela babo ukuthi imithi yomkhuhlane ababanika yona noma abazithengela yona ibalungele yini.
title: 'Ikhofi alilungile komama abazithwele'

text: KUHELEZA umoya wobumbano ekhephini yeKaizer Chiefs okubukeka ihanjelwa kahle yizinto njengoba iqhubeka nomgqigqo wayo omuhle.Lokhu kuvezwe nguGeorge Maluleka enkulumweni abe nayo naleli phephandaba. UMaluleka ungomunye wabadlali abasefomi kulezi zinsuku njengoba edlala ibhola elincomekayo. Lokhu kufakazelwa wukuthi ahambe nemiklomelo yomdlali ovelele imidlalo emibili ilandelana. Uthole lo mklomelo emdlalweni wabo neFree state Stars nakoweMaritzburg United.UMaluleka, oyibamba esiswini, uthe ukudlala kahle kwakhe kuwumthelela wokubumbana kweqembu.“Ngiyavuma ngenza kahle kakhulu futhi nami ngiyazizwa nginokuzethemba. Yize ngidlala kahle akuwona umsebenzi wami kuphela kodwa ukubambisana kahle nozakwethu. Angikwazi ukuzishaya isifuba ngithi konke kuwumsebenzi wami, yingoba sonke eqenjini sinephupho elilodwa lokwenza kahle,” kusho uMaluleka.Lo mdlali ugcizelele ukuthi njengoba iqembu liqhubeka lenza kahle yingoba banokubambisana okuhle nomqeqeshi bebonke bengabadlali.“Kumnandi ngisho ukuya ejimini. Ngicabanga ukuthi bonke abadlali bayakulangazelela ukuza ejimini ngendlela okumnandi ngayo,” kube uMaluleka.Uthe njengoba kubukeka bewuqale kahle umlenze wesibili we-Absa Premiership ukholwa wukuthi bazoqhubeka nokwenza kahle.“Sifuna ukubhekana nomdlalo ngawodwa, sizimisele ngokuthi wonke umdlalo esiya kuwo siqoqe amaphuzu aphelele. Luselude ukhalo okumele siluhambe ngaphambi kokuthi kuphele isizini, yikho ngingafuni ukukhuluma ngesicoco seligi manje,” kusho uMaluleka.Uthe indlela iqembu elidlala ngayo ubona sengathi sezibuye unomphelo izinsuku zenjabulo kuChiefs.“Uma sibona abalandeli bethu bejabule nathi siyajabula. Lokhu kusenza siye enkundleni sinokuzithemba kanti kuyasisiza ekutheni sidlale kahle. Ngicabanga ukuthi izinsuku zenjabulo sezibuyile kuChiefs futhi ngeke zisaphela.”UMaluleka ukhuluma kanjena nje ngezinsuku zenjabulo iChiefs abazange bayiqale kahle isizini njengoba abalandeli beChiefs bebengafuni ngisho ukuyizwa eyomqeqeshi uSteve Kompela kwazise imiphumela yayingamvuni. Ngaphandle kokungaqali kahle emidlalweni yeligi Amakhosi akhishwe emiqhudelwaneni yemikhumulajezi, iMTN 8 neTelkom Knockout. Ngemuva kwalokho badlali ngokulingana imidlalo eminingi ilandelana.
title: Ubabaza umoya wobumbano uMaluleka

text: SELIDLULISE amazwi enduduzo emindenini KaNksz Tozama Mantashe iqembu le-African National Congress esifundazweni sase-Eastern Cape kulandela ukudlula kwakhe ngenxa yezimo eziphathelene neCovid 19. UNksz Mantashe ubeyilungu lasePhalamende nophinde abe ngudadewabo kaSihlalo we-African National Congress kuzwelonke uMnuz Gwede Mantashe.Kubikwa ukuthi ushone izolo ebusuku emuva kokugula ngenxa yeCovid 19. Isitatimende esikhishwe yi-African National Congress yase-Eastern Cape siveza ukuthi ushonele esibhedlela exinwe ukugula. UNksz Mantashe uchazwe njengomuntu obezinikele kuleli qembu futhi eseneminyaka engaphansi kwalo.Uke wasebenza njengoMngcinimafa wegatsha ngo-2003 kuya ku-2005 emuva kwalokho waba nguNobhala wegatsha ngo-2005 kuya ku-2008 kwase kuthi ngo-2008 waqokelwa kwikomidi lesifunda iChris Hani.Waqhubeka nokusebenzela leli qembu enza imsebenzi eminingi eyahlukene iminyaka ilandelana kwaze kube uqokelwa esikhundleni  sasephalamende.
title: ICovid seyidlule nelungu lephalamande lakaMantashe

text: UMSAKAZI wesikhondlakhondla somsakazo, uKhozi FM, uPhindile Phewa owaziwa ngelikaPhindi P, usebonge abalandeli bakhe ngokuyamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala.I-albhamu yakhe, ebizwa ngokuthi yiWorship World ayikhiphe ekupheleni konyaka odlule, ingeyokuqala egcwele njengoba ngo-2018 wakhipha i-EP enezingoma ezine kuphela. “Ngithola imiyalezo engikhuthazayo mihla namalanga abantu bencoma izingoma zami. Sengiyazazi nabazithanda kakhulu ikakhulukazi le ethi Yebo Bakithi nengawina ngayo ngo-2018,” kusho uPhindy P.Uthe ukwesekwa akutholayo kuyamangalisa futhi ubonga akaphezi kumdidiyeli wakhe, uWonder Khwela, okunguyena abayipheka naye le albhamu.Uveze ukuthi isizathu sokuthi angapiki muntu kule albhamu wukuthi usafuna ukukhula njengoba kuseyi-albhamu yakhe yokuqala.“Kodwa-ke noma kungathiwa kukhona engangifuna ukumpika angikholwa ukuthi wayengaba khona umculi ongavuma ukupikwa yimina ekubeni kufana nokuthi kusewumsebenzi wami wokuqala lo,” kubeka lo mzwilili.Uqhube wathi kungenzeka aqale apike abanye abaculi bowokholo uma eselungiselela i-albhamu yakhe elandelayo.UPhindy P akagcini ngokuba wumculi nomsakazi kodwa ubuye abe ngumethuli wezinhlelo, umlingisi nomphathi wohlelo.Elandisa ngohlelo lwakhe alushayela kuKhozi FM, ‘Ulibo Lokuqala’, nolungena njalo ngoLwesibili kuya Lwesihlanu ngo-4 kuya ku-5 ekuseni, uthe nakhona abalaleli bamtshengisa uthando oluyisimanga.“Ngike ngithuke isimanga ukuthi kukhona abalaleli abangalenzi iphutha lokungibukela (live) ngise-studio ekubeni uhlelo lwami lungena ekuseni kakhulu. Lokho kungenza ngizimisele kakhulu kunakuqala ngenxa yothando engilitholayo,” usho kanje.Uthe okwamanje i-albhamu yakhe isatholakala ezinkundleni ezidayisa umculo nge-internet kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi izotholakala nasezitolo zomculo.Akafunanga ukwanda kakhulu ngempilo yakhe yangasese njengoba uma ebuzwa ngokuthi singawulindela yini umshado kuyena maduze, evele wahleka wathi: “Lutho okwamanje anginamuntu engithandana naye”.
title: OwoKhozi ubabaza ukwesekwa kwe-albhamu yakhe

text: SELIPHINDE labuya lelo dimoni lokubulawa kwabesifazane nezingane. Sesiphinde sabuyela kulesi sikhathi lapho owesifazane ethuka izanya uma ebona owesilisa ngoba akazi uphezu kwaziphi izinhloso.Yileso sikhathi lapho wesaba ngisho ukuthuma esitolo ingane yentombazane okungenzeka ibuye iyisidumbu. Abesifazane besaba nokuvuka ekuseni bayozivocavoca emgwaqweni ngoba kungenzeka balandelwe, babulawe.Njengomuntu onentshisekelo yezindaba ezithinta abesifazane, ngizithole ngizenzela inhlolovo, ngayithumela kwabesilisa nabesifazane ukuzwa ukuthi bacabangani ngalesi sihlava. Emibuzweni yami bengifuna ukwazi ukuthi banamiphi imibono nokuthi babona konakelephi.Kungiphathe kabi ukuthi, indlela abantu abacikeke ngayo, sebefuna kubuye ngisho isigwebo sentambo. Kule nhlolovo ngithole isithombe sokuthi abesifazane babesaba ukwedlula izilwane abesilisa.Kuyangithunuka ukubona kusekhona abesilisa abazivikelayo basho nezizathu ezenza kubulawe abesifazane. Lokhu kwenza ngibone ukuthi kusekude ukuthi sinqobe. Indlela igama labesilisa eselihudululeke ngayo phansi sekumele bazithobe, baguqe bavume izono.Lesi yisikhathi sokuthi baxolise baze bashwelezele ngisho abanye abathinteka kulezi zigameko. Kungiphathe kabi kwinhlolovo yami ukuthi abaningi bathi emabandleni abakuwo ayikhulunywa eyokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane.Alukho uhlaka okumele luwuhlabe inhlali manje ngendlela osekonakele ngayo. Kumele ngabe kuzo zonke izinkundla okuhlangana kuzo abesilisa, kuqiniswa ekukhuzeni lo mhlola. Amabandla nawo awekho msulwa uma kukhulunywa ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane.Inkolo nesiko kunesandla njengoba kumanje baningi abahleli emishadweni “engekho”, abayibambe ishisa. Emabandleni abesifazane uma befuna ukuphonsa ithawula, bashaywa ngevesi elithi “owesifazane ongayakhi indlu yakhe, uyayibhidliza ngezakhe izandla”.Abantu baphume ngamabhokisi emishadweni yabo bebambelele ekutheni kuyabekezelwa. Okungiphula umoya wukuthi ezithangamini, eziye zihlelwe ukwakha nokweluleka abantu kwezobudlewano, bayingcosana abesilisa abazihluphayo. Nalabo abanogqozi yilabo vele abaqotho. Ontabakayikhonjwa abayingeni ngoba bazi ukuthi bangongqeqhe futhi ngeke batshelwe ukuthi baziphathe kanjani. Abanye banqabela ngisho abathandana nabo ukuthi baye kulezi zithangami ngoba bebona ukuthi bazovuleka amehlo.Ngibona sekukuncane okungenzeka kwabesilisa asebekhulile, osekumele kuqiniswe ebafaneni. Uma uzele ingane yomfana unenselelo yokuyiguqula indlela ecabanga ngayo. Lokhu kumele kuqale ngezinto ezincane zokukhipha umqondo wokuthi umfana ungcono kunentombazane.Kumele kushintshe ukuthi umfana abuye sekuhwalele ekhaya, angathinti lutho endlini ngoba kuthiwa akusebenze intombazane. Ingane yomfana ayitshelwe ukuthi kuyimvelo ukuzwela ubuhlungu futhi akulona ihlazo ukukhala, ukuze kuphume intukuthelo.Okonakele kakhulu yindlela esikhuliswe ngayo, ikakhulukazi thina sizwe esimnyama. Abafana bamanje kumele batshelwe ukuthi itshe seligaya ngomunye umhlathi.Kumele bazi ukuthi abesifazane bamanje nabo sebesebenza amahora afanayo nabesilisa. Kumele bazi ukuthi akusefani nakudala lapho umama ebelethwa emshadweni ukuzovusa umuzi ngokulamanisa izingane kuphela, ubaba abuye kanye ngonyaka esezolamanisa futhi.Inkinga enkulu wukuthi ngesikhathi kushintsha indlela yokuphila kuleli, abesilisa abacijwanga emqondweni ukuthi nabo bashintshe indlela yokucabanga.Elokugcina, kumele ibhekwe nalena yokubhekela kakhulu amantombazane ukuthi ayiyitshali yini inzondo ebafaneni.Ngesikhathi izwe likhululeka kuqhakanjiswe ukubhekela abesifazane, bashiywa ngemuva abafana. Yize yaziwa inhloso yalokhu kodwa sekumeleibuyekezwe.Uma umfana ephase ngo-A abayisithupha, kubhekelwa intombazane ephase ngokufana noma ngaphansi kunaye uma kutholwa umfundaze. Ngokunjalo nasemsebenzini kubhekwa kuqala ukuqashwa kwabesifazane, okwenza kutshaleke inzondo emfaneni owayengekho ngezikhathi zobandlululo, osethwala amacala okhokho. Kusamele sizinuke amakhwapha kokuningi, ngale kwalokho sizokhuluma kuze kutsheke imilomo.
title: Abamabandla abekho msulwa ngokubulawa kwabesifazane

text: Kulolu hlelo okuzobonakala kulo osaziwayo bakuleli beveza amakhono abo okupheka luzoqala kuMzansi Magic (Channel 161), ngoJanuwari 8, ngo-9.30, ebusuku. Lolu hlelo luzokhonjiswa iziqephu ezingu-13, osaziwayo beveza ikhono labo lokushaya ibhodwe.Esiqeshini ngasinye kuzobonakala uZola ehlangana nosaziwayo ozombuza ukuthi yini afuna bayipheke futhi iphekwa kanjani bese behlanganisa leso sibiliboco.Lowo saziwayo uzoxoxa ukuthi lokhu kudla yini emenza akukhonze futhi wafundiswa ubani ukukupheka.Lokhu bazokwenza bebe beqhabula iziphuzo ezihlukene bukhoma ohlelweni.Uphrojusa walolu hlelo uGideon Eksteen, uthe ekupheleni kwesiqephu ngasinye laba bayobe sebejabulela ukudla abebekupheka.“Injongo yalolu hlelo ukukhuluma nosaziwayo ngezinto ezehlukene esiyohlale sibakhumbula ngazo. Luzobe lukhonjiswa bukhoma, osaziwayo bexoxa ngomsebenzi wabo abawenzayo, ubudlelwane abanabo nabanye osaziwayo endimeni abakuyo nokuthi obani ababagqugquzela ekutheni babe lapho bekhona manje. Ngeke sikushiye ngaphandle ukuthi obani ababukela kubo emkhakheni abakuwona,” kusho uGideon.Uthe lolu hlelo ngeke nje lubheke ukuthi yini ezodliwa kodwa nabathanda ukupheka bazosizakala ekuthuthukiseni ikhono labo lokupheka njengoba bezobona konke okudingekayo uma ulungiselela ukudla okuconsisa amathe.
title: Uzoba nohlelo lwakhe lokupheka kwiTV

text: SIZOVALWA yiNewzroom Afrika isikhala esishiywe yisiteshi sezindaba i-AfroWorld View kwiDStv.Lezi zindaba zimenyezelwe yisikhulu esiphezulu sakwaMultiChoice SA, uMnuz Calvo Mawela izolo, othe bakhethe iNewzroom Afrika ngoba iyona eze nebhidi ekahle futhi iphethwe ngabantu abamnyama.INewzroom Afrika, isiteshi sezindaba esisha, iphethwe ngobefunda izindaba kwaSABC, uNksz Thabile Ngwato (28) onenkampani ebizwa ngeRapid Innovation noMnuz Thokozani Nkosi (43) we-Eclipse TV.UNksz Ngwato ushayele uhlelo lwakhe lokugcina lwezindaba kwaSABC ngo-Agasti 18 njengoba emenyezelwe njengomnikazi wesiteshi esisha.I-Eclipse kaNkosi ikhiqiza izinhlelo ezifana ne-I Want to Sing Gospel, Big Up! ne-It’s Gospel Time.UNkosi uke walingisa emidlalweni ehlukene yethelevishini okubalwa iYizo Yizo isizini yokuqala.Kuvela ukuthi uNksz Ngwato noNkosi yibo bodwa abanikazi beNewzroom Afrika okusho ukuthi umuntu emunye uphethe * -50%.UNksz Ngwato uzalelwe eMpumalanga kanti uqale ukusebenza kwiY-FM ngaphambi kokuyosebenzela iSABC njengomfundi wezindaba.Ungumfundi wezindaba, umphathi wezinhlelo, wenza izikhangiso ezidinga izwi kanti ukhuluma izilimi eziyisithupha zaseNingizimu Afrika okuyisiNgisi, isiBhunu, IsiZulu, IsiXhosa, iSePedi neSeSotho.UNkosi uzalelwe eSoweto ushadelwe nguNkk Bonolo Nkosi ababusiswe naye ngamadodakazi amabili uKholiwe no-Owakhe.Izolo abathanganga ukuphendula imibuzo yezintatheli njengoba bethe bacela ukukhuluma nabezindaba namhlanje.UNksz Ngwato uthembise abantu baseNingizimu Afrika izindaba eziseqophelweni eliphezulu futhi ezingenakho ukwenzelela kwabathile.Esitatimendeni bathe isiteshi sabo sizoqala ukusakaza ngonyaka ozayo futhi sizoba nezintatheli ezinohlonze njengoba ophethe ophikweni lezindaba ngowayeyisikhulu sakwa-eMedia, uNksz Malebo Phage.Izindaba ezisakazwayo zizoqashwa ngeso lokhozi yintatheli esayathatha umhlalaphansi eke yaba wumxazululi emacaleni athinta abezindabauMnuz Joe Thloloe ozoba yiNhloko ye-Editorial Ethics.UNksz Zanele Mthembu odumile ekukhiqizweni kwezindaba zethelevishini uzoba yiBroadcast Operation Chief.
title: Sesimenyezelwe isiteshisetv esizovala i-Afroview

text: UVULWE ngempumelelo umbukiso wamafilimu amancane namakhulu owaziwa ngeDurban International Film Festival (DIFF), oqale eThekwini, eLangeni Hotel izolo.Lo mbukiso ongowesi-39 kulo nyaka uzophela ngoJulayi 29.Injongo yawo ukukhombisa ngamafilimu ahlukahlukene aqoshwe e-Afrika naphesheya kwezilwandle.Amanye awo asuke esekhonjiswe phesheya kwezilwandle nala athola khona ukunconywa kakhulu.Izolo kuvulwe ngesithangami sabezindaba la abanikazi bamafilimu abafufusayo benxuse khona ukuthi abantu basukume bazobukela umsebenzi wabo. Ntambama kube nemibukiso ehlukene.Abaqophi bamafilimu abaningi bakhulume ngazwi linye kulesi sithangami benxusa abezindaba ukuthi ababadlulisele isikhalo sabo emphakathini sokuthi uphume ngobuningi uzobakhombisa uxhaso.“Emalokishini ahlukene kuzobe kukhona imibukiso, siyanxusa ukuthi abantu beze khona bazobona umsebenzi wethu, njengoba konke esisuke sikwenza, sisuke sizinikele futhi sikwenza ngothando thina esikudingayo nje uxhaso kuphela ukuze umsebenzi uye phambili,” kuchaza izinsizwa nezintokazi ebezizisukumela zona kulesi sithangami zingajutshwanga muntu ukuthi azisukume.U-Eric Applegreen obemele uMasipala weTheku, uthe bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukukhuthaza abantu ukuthi bahambele imibukiso ehlukene.“Ngomunye yemibukiso emikhulu eyenzeka eThekwini lona futhi siyaziqhenya ngawo. Siyathemba ukuthi uyothi uphela kuyobe kusizakele abaningi. Miningi imicimbi ehambisana nawo, siyathemba abantu bazophuma ngobuningi babo,” kuchaza yena.USbusiso Zondi, oyimenenja ehhovisi lezokuVakasha, eThekwini uthe, ukuba nemicimbi efana nalena eThekwini kusho lukhulu.“Silindele izivakashi ezingaphezu kuka-50 000 ukuza kulo mbukiso nezizoshiya inzuzo enkulu. Siyathemba ukuthi abantu bazowujabulela lo mbukiso futhi nentsha efuna ukungena emkhakheni wamafilimu kube khona ekuncelayo kubantu abehlukene,” kuchaza yena.
title: Uvulwe ngempumelelo umbukiso wamafilimu iDIFF

text: ‘Babona inqwaba yeziguli nabantu zonke izinsuku. Bese beyagoduka. Baye ezitolo. Abahloliwe. Abanazimpawu. Balokhu belifafaza nje igciwane ngaphezu kokulelapha. Icabangeni le nto. Kumele sibavalele bonke abahlengikazi nodokotela izinsuku ezingu-30, isibalo sabathelelekayo sizokwehla. Iyona kuphela indlela. Noma-ke bavele badutshulwe bonke bayahlanya vele.”Ubusho kanje omunye umbhalo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Kuyacaca ukuthi umuntu ongenazwelo lona, akazi lutho futhi akasiboni isidingo sokubonga ukuzinikela nokuzidela kwabasebenzi bezempilo okuyibona abasekhaleni lokulwa nokubhebhetheka kwalolu bhubhane lweCovid-19.Kodwa uma uyibeka eceleni indelelo yalo muntu ezinye zezinto azishoyo ziyezwakala futhi ziyiqiniso ngobungozi babasebenzi bezempilo uma sebehlangana nomphakathi okungaba yimindeni yabo noma uma beya ezitolo njengawo wonke umuntu ikakhulukazi ngoba abahlolwa bonke nokuyinto nabo ebakhathazayo.Uma sebeshayisile, bayagoduka, kokunye badlule ezitolo bacoshacoshe izinto futhi nabo bayabasiza abantwana babo ngomsebenzi wesikole.Owabo umthwalo uphindaphindiwe ngoba kumele bazigade emsebenzini nasekhaya.Omunye wodokotela kwesinye sezibhedlela zaseMgungundlovu uthe nakuba lapho esebenza khona ebengakabi bikho umuntu osetholakale ukuthi uphethwe yiCorona kodwa ubungozi bukhona futhi sebuyishintshile impilo emsebenzini nasekhaya.“Awusakwazi ukusondela esigulini uma usixilonga ngoba sekumele niqhelelane kakhulu kunakuqala. Usuxilonga futhi unake kuphela lezo zindawo esikhala ngazo.“Uma ngigoduka manje, angigezi nje izandla kuphela ngesibulalamagciwane kodwa ngifutha nezicathulo zami, umata emotweni, isteringi semoto nezindawo engizinyathelayo emotweni uma ngishayela. Nginganyathela noma yini emsebenzini, amathe, izikhwehlela kungenzeka noma yini. Yize kungesiye imigomo ye-World Health Organisation lena kodwa ngibone kungcono ukuthi ngiqikelele ngokweqile,” usho kanje.“Noma ngifika ekhaya manje, izicathulo ngizishiya emnyango, ngingene ngomnyango wangemuva ngiqonde ngqo e-bathroom, ngiwashe izingubo zami futhi ngigeze ngaphambi kokuthi ngihlale nomndeni wami. Angisakwazi ukuvele ngifike ekhaya ngigxumele izingane noma umkami njengakuqala ngoba ngeke ngazixolela uma bengatheleleka ngenxa yami.”Nakuba lo dokotela esincoma isinqumo sikahulumeni sokuvala izwe thaqa masinyane nokunqande ukubhebhetheka mawala kwe-Corona okubonakale kwamanye amazwe kodwa uyasigxeka isinqumo sokungazilungiseleli masinyane.“Kuze kube namhlanje abasebenzi bezempilo abakaze bafundiswe kahle futhi akukaze kube khona ngisho esisodwa isigcawu sokucobelelana ngolwazi. Kwakumele sisebenzise uJanuwari noFebhuwari ukwenza njalo ngoba vele kwase kubonakala ukuthi siyasabalala nakwamanye amazwe. Futhi kwakumele sisheshe sibahlole abantu abaqhamuka kwamanye amazwe.”Kumphatha kanjani lo dokotela ukubona abantu bezigcaluzela bewuvanzi?“Kunzima kodwa futhi siyakuqonda ukuthi impilo ayimi ngoba nakhu sekunobhubhane. Engingakwazi ukubaxolela yilaba abaqhubeka nemicimbi efana nemishado nababuthana emasontweni,” usho kanje.UMHLENGIKAZI wasesibhedlela iMediclinic eCenturion eGoli, uNksz Baphile Mxotwa elungisa iwodi leziguli. Isithombe esigciniwe: Thobile MathonsiUmhlengikazi osebenza kweminye yemitholampilo eThekwini uvumelana nalo dokotela ngokuthi abaqeqeshiwe kahle abasebenzi bezempilo. Uthi futhi uyafisa sengathi ngabe bayahlolwa njalo ngoba ubona kuyibona abayingozi kakhulu emphakathini.“Ngingazifutha izandla zami ngesibulalimagciwane uma ngiphuma emsebenzini futhi ngisifake nesifonyo kodwa inyufomu yami isuke ingafuthiwe. Ngingagibela etekisini okukhona kuyo umama onengane encane. Ngingabelethisa umuntu ngingazi ukuthi kanti senginalo igciwane ngoba asihlolwa,” usho kanje lo mhlengikazi.Ukhale nangokushoda kwezimpahla zokuzivikela lezi ezibizwa ngama-PPE.“Sinikwa isifonyo esisodwa ukuthi sisisebenzise usuku lonke kanti empeleni uma usuke wabona isiguli esinofuba kumele usishintshe leso simfomo. Kanjalo noma uma sesike sathinta amathe kodwa asikwenzi lokho ngoba sisebenzisa esisodwa usuku lonke. Asinazo nezigqoko kanti igciwane liyahlala nasezinweleni okuyingozi nakho.“Mina ukube ngiphethe ngangiyoqala ngihlole abasebenzi bezempilo futhi ngabe abasebenzi bonke kanyekanye ukuze uma kuba khona abagulayo kungaguli wonke umuntu.”Uthi abahlengikazi abafana naye abathembele ematekisini kumele baphinde babekezelele nokujeqezwa kabi ngabantu uma begibela ngoba abantu abathandisisi ukugibela nabo.“Ukuba wunesi umsebenzi okhathazayo sidalo, manje usufika ekhaya ubhekane nomunye umshikashika uzama ukuvikela umndeni wakho. Ngishiya izicathulo emnyango, ngishintshele egaraji futhi senginanebhakede elihlala emnyango engiwashela kulona izimpahla engizigqoka emsebenzini. Ngiqala ngokugeza uma ngifika kodwa nalokho kuyangikhathaza ngoba sinendawo eyodwa yokugezela esiyisebenzisa nomyeni wami, izingane futhi mina nginezingane ezincane eneminyaka emihlanu neneminyaka eyisikhombisa nosisi ongisizayo ukubheka izingane.“Siyabezwa nje abantu bethi asiqine ngoba safunga kodwa bayakhohlwa ukuthi phela singabantu, sinegazi futhi imindeni yethu ayizange ifunge kodwa zonke izinsuku siyibeka engcupheni ngoba ayikho into esizoyenza kumele sisebenze.”Uyakhala ngokuthi abasebenzi bezempilo ababalwanga ndawo ngesikhathi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ememezela usizo lukaR500 billion.ABASEBENZI bezeMpilo eKapa abasebenzela iCommunity Health Care bayingxenye yabantu abahlolela abantu iCovid-19 emphakathini ngaphansi kohlelo lomnyango wezeMpilo. Isithombe: Armand Hough/African News Agency(ANA)Omunye umhlengikazi osebenza kwesinye sezibhedlela ezinkulu eThekwini uthe ngenhlanhla abakabi nesiguli esesike satholakala siphethwe yiCorona kodwa sekuke kwatheleleka abalingani babo ababili.“Ngiye ngizibuze njalo uma sengingena esangweni ukuthi kodwa ngiyaphi ngempela uma ngibheka ubungozi. Kodwa umuntu ngeke avele ayeke umsebenzi ngoba nakhu kunobhubhane, akulona ubhubhane lokuqala nakuba lulubi kakhulu lolu ngoba alikho ikhambi, vele-ke umkhuhlane awunalo ikhambi. Umuntu nje kumele aqikelele,” usho kanje.Njengalaba abanye abalingani bakhe, naye ushintshela egaraji uma efika ekhaya futhi naye ufutha nezicathulo ngesibulalimagciwane.“Ngithi ngifika nje ngibe ngigeza ngaphambi kokubona izingane, ngisabela kakhulu lona omdala ngoba une-asthma. Abazali bami yibona abanovalo kakhulu, ubaba ungifonela cishe zonke izinsuku ekuseni bese ngiyamchazela ukuthi angikho ewodini labantu abahlushwa yizifo zesifuba futhi isibhedlela asigcwele njengokujwayelekile ngoba bakhishwa abanye abantu nokusizayo. Kodwa kona kunzima,”Umyeni walo mhlengikazi uthe baba nenhlanhla ukuthi ngesikhathi kuqala ukuvalwa kwezwe thaqa wayesahlabe ikhefu umkakhe nokwabanika ithuba lokuzilungiselela bakwazi nokuya ekhaya elikhulu bayoshweleza nasemsamo ngaphambi kokuthi umkakhe abuyele emsebenzini.“Isikhathi esinzima ngoba usuku nosoku awazi kuzokwenzekani noma uzobuya emsebenzini kwenzekeni. Kodwa siyazihlomisa ngolwazi ngayo yonke indlela, nezingane ziyazi ukuthi kumele zigeze izandla njalo noma zibuya endlini uma zikade zisemnyango“Kuyadabukisa nje ukuthi abantu bazimisele futhi bazinikele ekuhlengeni izimpilo zabantu ngoba akuwona nje umsebenzi lo kodwa ubizo kodwa uhulumeni akabahlangabezi futhi akhombise ukubabonga.”Omunye umhlengikazi yena ungomunye walabo ababahlolayo abasebenzi bezempilo okusuke sekusolwa ukuthi bathelelekile uthe ukube akubhekiwe yena ekhaya ngabe usewuyekile umsebenzi.“Mina ngihlola laba abasebenza emawodini ka-Covid-19, angikaze ngibatshele nokubatshela ekhaya ukuthi ngiqondene ngqo nabo. Sengafunda nje ukuthi ngishintshela egaraji uma ngifika, izicathulo zomsebenzi zisala khona. Ngithi ngifika ngibe ngigeza.“Ngifisa sengathi ngabe bayazi laba abangaphoqelekile ukusebenza ukuthi banenhlanhla kanjani ukuthi bahlezi emakhaya ngoba sonke singathanda ukwenza njalo kodwa abanye bethu ayikho into abangayenza. Zonke izinsuku siziphonsa emlilweni siwubona sihlalele ethembeni ngoba nansi ne-lotto ayiwineki. Ngifisa kabi sengathi bengingake ngibavalele bonke abasebenzi bezempilo bahlolwe kodwa akekho onendaba nathi futhi ayikho into esigqugquzelayo,” usho kanje.Uthe ukuhlola abasebenzi bezempilo kunezakho izinselelo ngoba imiphumela ayisheshi nokubuya.“Nalo mbandela wokuzihlangula ohambisana nemiphumela awenzi izinto zibe lula ngoba phela abasebenzi bezempilo bayawuqonda kahle ukuthi usho ukuthini. Lo mbandela wokuzihlangula uthi ukungaveli kwegciwane akusho ukuthi awunalo ngoba kungenzeka ukuthi awuhlolwanga kahle; kungenzeka ukuthi uhlolwe ngesikhathi igciwane lisacashile futhi ungakabi nazo izimpawu.”Omunye umhlengikazi osebenza emtholampilo naye uvele wakhala uma ekhumbula usuku lokuqala lokuvalwa kwezwe thaqa evuka eya emsebenzini eshiya indodakazi yakhe yodwa.“Njengabahlengikazi nathi siyasaba futhi lokho kwenziwa kakhulu ukuthi asikaze siqeqeshelwe lesi sifo. Ngesikhathi kuqala kwakuthiwa abakwa-NICD abazohlola abantu, gwiqiqi sekuthiwa akube yithina, thina kowethu umtholampilo sanqaba ngoba sathi ngeke sikwazi ukuvele sifunde sesiwenza umsebenzi ngesifo esibucayi kangaka.”Naye ukhale ngokushoda kwezimpahla zokuzivikela.“Ngelinye ilanga nje ngifike emsebenzini seziphelile izifonyo ngoba base bezithathe bonke abafike kuqala kunami. Kwamele ngiqhamuke nelinye icebo, ngavele ngasebenzisa lokhu esivala ngakho izicathulo njengesifonyo, nganika nesiguli engangizosisiza into efanayo ngoba kumele isiguli uma sesifikile ngisisize futhi kwakuyisiguli esinofuba.”Uthe usenobhaskidi wakhe wezingubo ezingcolile lapho efaka khona izingubo zasemsebenzini uma engakaziwashi futhi nezicathulo zasemsebenzini uyazihlukanisa, akasazibeki ndawonye nezinye.Uthe bayagqugquzelana bebodwa nabalingani bakhe futhi sebekhuleka nasemini ukuze bame isibindi.“Nemiyalezo yokusigqugquzela nokusibonga evela emindenini nasezihlotsheni zethu iyona esinika amandla kanjalo nezintshumayelo. Nabaphathi bethu bayaseseka kakhulu. Kodwa iqiniso nje ukuthi kunzima, sisizwa umusa kaNkulunkulu.”
title: Usizi, uvalo nezinselelo kwabezempilo abalwa nobhubhane lwe-Corona

text: SEKUVELE negama likangqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Bheki Cele kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana eqhubekayo eParktown eGoli. Igama likaCele livezwe ngowayeyisikhulu sophiko lwezobunhloli kuleli uColonel Dhanajaya Naidoo ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi kwikhomishini ngoMsombuluko. Ekhuluma kwikhamera uNaidoo uveze ukuthi uCele wasebenzisa ngokungemthetho imali yezobunhloli. Owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu sezobunhloli uMnuz Richard Mdluli watshela uGeneral Solly Lazarus (owayeyisikhulu sezimali) ukuthi, uzosuswa ekuphatheni i-akhawunti yesikhungo. Ngo-2008, uLazarus owayeyingxenye yokudliwa kwezimali, watshela uCele ukuthi akakumise ukususwa kwakhe. UNaidoo uveze ukuthi uLazarus waba nenqwaba yemihlangano noCele kepha wagxila kowodwa ababanayo emzini kasomabhizinisi waseThekwini uMnuz Panganathan "Timmy" Marimuthu. Uthe, uLazarus wayedinga imali yomhlangano wamnika u-R40 000. UNaidoo uthe, le mali wayecabanga ukuthi ngekaCele kanti futhi wayengenaso isizathu sokucabanga ngenye indlela. "Ayikho imali eyabuyiselwa kumina. Ngokucabanga kwami, yanikwa uCele," kusho yena.Ebuzwa yiJaji Raymond Zondo ukuthi kungani ecabanga ukuthi imali kwakungeyenkokhelo ngoba wayengekho ngesikhathi kuxoxwa uNaidoo uphendule wathi, wazicabangela ukuthi imali kwakungeyokugwazela. UNaidoo uqhube waveza ukuthi abasebenzi bophiko lwezobunhloli akubona kuphela abazuza ekuluthweni kwe-akhawunti yophiko, kodwa imali yahamba yaze yafinyelela ekufezweni kwezidingo zezintatheli ezakhokhelwa ukuthi zingazibhali izindaba ezithinta uphiko ezinye zalungiselwa izimoto zazo. Ngokusho kukaNaidoo, osehlale ngaphansi kohlelo lokuvikelwa umbuso iminyaka engu-11 edlule ngemuva kokushaya ikhwelo ngenkohlakalo kwezobunhloli i-akhawunti okukhulunywa ngayo yayibekelwe ukulekelela ukusebenza kwezinhlelo zobunhloli kodwa yasetshenziselwa impilo ewubukhazikhazi yezisebenzi.UNaidoo ovume ukuthi wazuza kule nkohlakalo, uthe wayazi izikhawu ezintathu lapho izintatheli zakhokhelwa khona ukufihla izindaba. Isikhathi sokuqala, kwakhokhelwa intatheli u-R20 000 eyahlangana noMdluli eyayinemininingwane eyayingadicilela phansi igama lophiko. UNaidoo uthe, wayekhona ngesikhathi uLazarus etshela omunye umsebenzi ukuthi kufanele kukhokhelwe enye intatheli imali. Yize uNaidoo engayidalulanga intatheli kepha uveze kancane ukuthinteka kukaNksz Ranjeni Munusamy, oyintatheli yeTiso Black Star. UMunusamy wabekwa ekhefini ngenyanga edlule ngemuva kokuvela kwegama lakhe kubufakazi bukamseshi woKlebe uMnuz Kobus Roelefse, nabo obuthinta imali yophiko.
title: Kuvele igama likaCele kwikhomishini kaZondo

text: ISundowns izovakashela iChiefs emdlalweni obhekwe ngabomvu wombango wesicoco se-Absa Premiership e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, namuhla ngo-6 ntambama. AmaBrazilians, asele ngamaphuzu amathathu kwiChiefs esesicongweni se-log, abengakaze awine nowokubika umdlalo weligi selokhu kubuye imidlalo yePremier Soccer League (PSL).NgoMsombuluko ahlule i-Arrows ngo 1-0 ngegoli elishaywe uThemba Zwane umdlalo usuyophela.Ukuthola amaphuzu amathathu kweSundowns kwi-Arrows kushubise umbango wesicoco seligi. IChiefs ilahle amaphuzu emidlalweni emibili edlule nokwenza izithole isixinwe yiSundowns. Iqale ngokuthola isibhaxu sika 3-1kwiBloemfontein Celtic ngesonto eledlule kwathi ngempelasonto edlule yabanjwa yiStellenbosch umdlalo uphela ngo 1-1.“Kusethule umthwalo ukuwina kwi-Arrows ikakhulukazi njengoba singenzi kahle siyiqembu. Sizamile emidlalweni eminingi ukucosha amaphuzu amathathu kodwa bekunzima ngoba asivimbi kahle emuva futhi asiwashayi amagoli ngendlela esifisa ngayo,” kusho uKekana.“Kodwa manje sisesimeni esihle ngoba siphumelele ukuthola amaphuzu amathathu ebesikade siwafuna siyiqembu. Manje abafana bayazi ukuthi singawuwina omunye umdlalo ngoba miningi esisazoyidlala. Sinalo ithuba lokuqhubeka nokuwina imidlalo.”Umphumela womdlalo wanamuhla uzocacisa okuningi ngeqembu elingase likhale lemuke nesicoco seligi.ISundowns ilwela ukusiwina okwesithathu kulandelana. IChiefs ifuna ukuqeda ishobolo leminyaka kwazise igcine ukusiwina ngo-2015.Emuva kwalo mdlalo amaqembu womabili azosalelwa yimidlalo emithathu ngalinye.“Siyazi ukuthi kufanele sibhekane nomdlalo ngamunye ngesikhathi. Eminye yemidlalo okufanele sibhekane nayo oweKaizer Chiefs futhi siyazi ukuthi kufanele sisebenze ngempela ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyawuwina.“Sisesimeni esihle sokuthi sikwenze lokho ngoba sisanda kuwina umdlalo okuyikho okusinike umdlandla. Singabadlali sifuna ukuwinela iMamelodi Sundowns izindebe,” kusho uKekana.Ekhempini yeChiefs, umdlali wasesiswini uWillard Katsande usevele ushilo ukuthi bayazi ukuthi ihlulwa kanjani iSundowns njengoba sebekwenze kabili kule sizini.Umzuliswano wokuqala wala maqembu waphela ngo 2-0 kuwina iChiefs ngamagoli ashaywa uSamir Nurkovic ozobe engekho kulokhu ngenxa yamakhadi aphuzi.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Namuhla - Ngo-3.30pm: Bloemfontein Celtic v Bidvest Wits (Absa Tuks Stadium).Ngo-6pm: Kaizer Chiefs v Mamelodi Sundowns (Orlando Stadium).Kusasa - Ngo-6pm: Stellenbosch v Chippa United (Absa Tuks Stadium).
title: I-Sundowns izodlala neChiefs inokuzethemba

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEAGCOTSHWE aba ngompetha abasha AmaZulu FC kwiDStv Diski Challenge Rewired eguqisa ngo 2-0 iMamelodi Sundowns emdlalweni wamanqamu obuseFNB Stadium eGoli, izolo emini.Abafana boSuthu abancane abaqeqeshwa nguSboniso “Nini” Vilakazi, baye kulo mdlalo benganikwe thuba njengoba bengakaze bahambe ibanga elitheni kwiDiski phambilini. AmaBrazilians amancane acijwa nguSurprise Moriri yiwona abethwelwe ngeqoma njengoba evamise ukuvulela kulo mqhudelwano.USuthu lufinyelele emdlalweni wamanqamu lungayitholanga induku emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili. Eqoqweni lesibili obeluboshelwe kulo lugcine luhlezi endaweni yesibili. Lufinyelele kowamanqamu ngokuguqisa iKaizer Chiefs ngo 4-3 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi.ISundowns iqede ihlezi endaweni yesibili kwi-log kwelayo iqoqo. Yona ingene kowamanqamu ngokuguqisa iCape Town City ngo 3-2.Emdlalweni wayizolo, womabili amaqembu akhombise zisuka ukuthi afuna ukuba ngompetha lapha njengoba abehlaselana kube ncane indawo. Kodwa abafana beSundowns yibona ebebengaphezu kancane ngomdlalo esiwombeni sokuqala.Emzuzwini ka-16 iSundowns ebicindezela ngamandla ithole i-free kick kodwa uSiphesihle Mkhize emhlulile njengoba eyibhamuze phezulu. Ngemuva kwalokho AmaZulu alitholile elawo ithuba, uGlen Baadjies unozinti wamaSandawana walichilizela ngaphandle ibhola ebelishaywe nguLindani Shange ngomzuzu ka-21. Ngomzuzu ka-28 uShange ugcine eyibonile inethi, ethola ibhola ebeligotshwe nguLindani Zungu. Kuyiwe ekhefini AmaZulu ehamba phambili ngo 1-0.Esiwombeni sesibili, amaqembu aqhubekile nokuhlaselana kodwa kusebenza onozinti.Ngomzuzu ka-67 uSuthu luthole iphenathi ebekwe enethini nguSibusiso Khumalo. Ngemuva kwaleli goli abafana bamaBrazilians bangqongqoze ngamandla emapalini oSuthu kodwa kwasho ukuthi abadlali basemuva bezikaVilakazi bese bekhonkile, bengafuni lutho oluzothinta unozinti wabo u-Olwethu Mzimela..Ngemuva komdlalo, uVilakazi uncome umsebenzi wethimba lakhe ngempumelelo yabo. UMoriri uthe nakuba behluliwe kodwa uyabancoma abadlali bakhe ngendlela abadlale ngayo kwiDiski Challenge kule sizini.
title: Kukhonye AmaZulu eba ngompetha beDiski
