text: UDUBE ukucula umrepha uDuncan ngesikhathi kunqamuka umsindo emcimbini i-INK Hop Festival ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Ungene isikhathi sesibheke ku-1 entathakusa. Ushaye izingoma zakhe okubalwa kuzo ethi, Dlala Mrepha ne Ring of Lies. Kuthe uma eseqala iTsiki Tsiki ngo-12.55 umsindo wanqamuka.Ukhombise ukudideka ukuthi kwenzekani qede waphuma esiteji. Akekho ochazile ukuthi kwenzekani kunalokho kwangena iqembu iBlack Diamond.Imizamo yokuthola uDuncan ayiphumelelanga ngenxa yokuthi uvele waphela emehlweni. Alungenanga ucingo ngesikhathi eseshayelwa.Umphathi wakhe, uNgane Sikobi, ukhale nge sound system.“Uma ungena esiteji usuke uhlelile ukuthi uzokwenza kanjani. Uma usuphazamiseka kulokho ngeke kubukeke kahle,” kusho uSikobi.Umcimbi ubuseqophelweni eliphezulu. Emgwaqweni besingekho isiminyaminya ngenxa yamaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku abebheke isimo.Abantu bebephume ngobuningi babo begcwele otshanini abanye belapho kuhlala khona izihlwele uma kubukwa ibhola.UVUSI Nova ushaye amanoni akhe abantu bawacula naye kwi-INK Hop Festival KwaMashu ngoMgqibelo ebusukuKuthe uma sekungena uVusi Nova phakathi kwamabili abantu basondela phambi kwesiteji. Ubelokhu ebuza ukuthi bafuna yiphi ingoma bememeze bathi i-Asphelelanga. Ugcine evala ngayo ngemuva kuka-12.30 kwahlanya inkundla yonke.UMREPHA u-AKA ucule kwahlanya abantuNgaphandle kwakhe phakathi kwabanye abebenandisa kubalwa uBeast, Mthokozisi Ndaba, AKA, Prince Kaybee, DJ Fresh, TDK Macassette, DJ Sox, Zakwe, Zakes Bantwini, Mlindo The Vocalist nabanye. Uhlelo beluphethwe nguClement Maosa, Collen Zondo, Zeal, Mlwazet, Thah Simelane nabanye.
title: Kunqamuke umsindo waduba ukucula

text: PHILI MJOLIABANTU  abadala abangu- 85 000 abashone kuleli kusukela ngoMeyi nyakenye  kungenzeka ukuthi babulawe iCovid-19. Ucwaningo olwenziwe iSA Medical Research Council (SAMRC) luveza ukuthi maningi amathuba okuthi abangu-85 000 abashonile  abaneminyaka ewu-60 kuya phezulu,  abavela ohlwini lomnyango wezasekhaya,   babulawe yiCovid-19 .Usolwazi Debbie Bradshaw we-SAMRC uthe lokhu kungasho ukuthi bangu-1.5%  abantu abadala ababulawe yileli gciwane kuleli  ngalesi sikhathi.Izibalo zakuleli zababulewe yigciwane ezikhishwa uMnyango wezeMpilo zikhomba ukuthi bangaphezulu kuka-40 000 abantu ababulawe yilona.USolwazi Bradshaw uthe bayaxhumana noMnyango wezeMpilo njalo kodwa ngesikhathi benza ucwaningo bebebheka izibalo zabadala abashonile ezibhaliswe eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya. Okwenza ukuthi bathi kungenzeka ukuthi babulawe yiCovid-19 uthe yingoba bashone ngesikhathi bebaningi abahaqwa ygciwane." Uma sibheka amaphepha omnyango achaza ngezikhathi lapho zenyuka kakhulu izibalo zabahaqekayo kuba nengcindezi nasezibhedlela, sibona benyuka abashonayo ngokwezibalo zababhaliswe eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya. Lokho kusitshela ukuthi maningi amathuba okuthi babulawe yiCovid-19. Abantu abadala basuke benezifo ezingamahlalakhona  kanti abantu abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona babalwa njengabantu abasengcupheni yokuhaqwa yigciwane. Ingqinamba esibhekana nayo ukuthi iningi labantu esikhuluma ngabo lishonele emakhaya, alizange liye ezikhungweni zezempilo kanti siyazi ukuthi uMnyango wezeMpilo sikhona isikhathi lapho ubungakawushayi umthetho wokuthi zonke izidumbu zihlolwe, manje  kunzima ukwazi ukuthi abantu abashona bachazwa njengabashone ngokwemvelo  ngaphambi kwalo mthetho ngabe bebengenayo yini iCovid-19,"  kusho yena.Uthe isizathu esenza abantu bashonele emakhaya akucaci ukuthi yingoba izikhungo zezempilo bezigcwele noma yingoba imindeni ibingasiboni isidingo sokubayisa ezikhungweni zezempilo ngoba vele bebehlala ngokugula ngakho ibizitshela ukuthi ukugula kwabo okujwayelekile." Esikuqaphelayo wukuthi abantu abashonile bebondla imindeni. Abantu abaneminyaka ewu-60 bondla imindeni ngakho ukushona kwabo ngale ndlela kuzodala izinkinga kwezomnotho,"  kusho yena
title: Kusolwa iCovid-19 ngokushona kwabadala abangu-85 000 kuleli

text: SEKUQUBUKE umbango phakathi kothisha nesigungu esilawula isikole, iPhembisizwe High, eNtuzuma ngenxa yesikhundla sikathishanhloko okubikwa ukuthi sigaqelwe nawothisha abafundisa kulesi sikole.Kuthiwa lesi sikhundla esavuleka ngo-2017, nokusabambe kuso owayeyi-HOD, sesisuse omkhulu umsindo osuholele ekutheni kungabibikho ukubambisana phakathi kothisha nesigungu  esesihlukene phakathi.Othisha abagaqele isikhundla kubikwa ukuthi udaba baludlulisela ezinyunyaneni ngenhloso yokuthi luxazululwe njengoba bekhala ngokuba sebumnyameni mayelana nokungavalwa kwaso.Inhlolokhono yomsebenzi kubikwa ukuthi isiyenziwe kwaze kwaba yizikhawu ezintathu kodwa kungabibikho muntu oqashwayo nokwenza ukuthi abanye othisha nesigungu bashaye amakhala ngezinhlelo zomnyango.Omunye wothisha bakulesi sikole esiligodlile igama lakhe, uthe basola inkohlakalo ngohlelo lokuqashwa kukathishanhloko osekuphele iminyaka luhlehliswa. Uthe ihhovisi lomnyango wezemfundo abajwayele ukuxhumana nawo mayelana nezikhalo zabo uthembisa ukubasiza kodwa namanje basasebumnyameni.“ Iyinkinga indaba yakulesi sikole futhi sisola  inkohlakalo njengoba izinhlelo zokuqashwa kukathishanhloko zihlezi ziba nokuphazamiseka. Njengamanje sinebamba likathishanhloko esikhalayo ngalo nesingafuni ukuthi lingene kulesi sikhundla esingakavalwa. Into eyenza ukuthi singayizwa eyebamba wukuthi nalo lihlangene nethimba esikhala ngalo,” kubeka lo thisha.Ilungu lesigungu esilawula isikole, uMnuz Mdumiseni Khuzwayo, uthe isifiso salabo abafuna ubulungiswa enkingeni ekhungethe lesi sikole, wukuthi kungenelele umnyango ukuze kuxazululeke zonke izinkinga.“Sekunesikhathi eside kunalo mdonsiswano futhi sifuna ozohola lesi sikole ngendlela efanele yingakho sithi makungenelele umnyango. Akusaphephile nhlobo njengoba abantu sebebhekene ngeziqu zamehlo ngenxa yale nkinga,” kubeka uKhuzwayo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu - Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa,  uthe umnyango uphezu kwalo  lolu daba.
title: Umsindo ngesikhundla sikathishanhloko

text: USIHLALO weKhomishini ephenya ngokuLawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana iJaji uRaymond Zondo ugxeke ithimba lakhe labameli ngokuhluleka ukukhuluma nowayengumkhuzi wamaphoyisa kuleli, uNkk Riah Phiyega, ngezinsolo zokuthi wayephethe kabi iphini lakhe manje eseliyisikhulu soKlebe u-Advocate Godfrey Lebeya.ULebeya ubethula ubufakazi kule khomishini izolo. Ubelindeleke ukuba afakaze ngokugxambukela kwabathize ezindabeni zamaphoyisa. Esitatimendeni esinikezwe ikhomishini uLebeya owayephethe abaphenyi futhi eyiphini lomkhuzi wamaphoyisa, uveze kabanzi ukuthi wayengaphethwe kahle futhi ebekwa eceleni amaphoyisa, okubalwa naye uPhiyega.Uthe lokhu kwakudalwa amacala ake awaphenya athinta amaphoyisa nokubalwa icala lomphathi wezobunhloli uMnuz Richard Mdluli.UZondo ukhale ngo-Advocate Suzan Wentzel, ngokuhluleka ukubona ukuthi iyiphi ingxenye yobufakazi bukaLebeya enikezwe ikhomishini ethinta amaphoyisa nokungaphathwa kahle kwakhe.“Ngabe kukhona umphenyi oke waya kuPhiyega, wambuza ukuthi kungani wenza lokhu kuLebeya? Miningi imibuzo ebingabuzwa. Kungenzeka uma ebuzwa ngalezi zinto abe nezimpendulo, okungenza kucacise izinto,” kusho uZondo.U-Wentzel, uthe uPhiyega waveza ukuthi angabuletha ubufakazi kwikhomishini.UZondo uthe kungumsebenzi wethimba labameli ukuba liye kuyena limbuze ngezinsolo ezibhekiswe kuyena.“Ithimba labameli libe nephutha ngokungayi kuyena, nabaphenyi banephutha ngokungayi kuye, Ikakhulukazi abaphenyi. Ngigxeka ithimba labameli ngoba yibona okumele balawule abaphenyi,” kusho uZondo.ULebeya waqokwa uMengameli wakuleli uCyril Ramaphosa ngo-2018 ukuba angene esikhundleni sowayephethe oKlebe uMnuz Berning Ntlemeza, owayekade exoshwe owayengungqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Fikile Mbalula.Lokho kwenzeka emuva kokuba iNkantolo eNkulu yaseNorth Gauteng yakhipha isinqumo sokuthi kwakungamele aqokwe kulesi sikhundla ngowayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma.
title: UZondo ugxeke abameli bekhomishini ngolukaPhiyega

text: AKUKHO muntu ozovumeleka ukuthi avakashele ezikoleni ngaphandle kokuthi avumelane nothishanhloko wesikole ngasinye ukuze kuliwe nokusabalala kweCovid-19 ezikoleni.Lokhu kushiwo uNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga ngenkathi ephawula ngamalungiselelo okuvulwa kwezikole ngoMsombuluko wangoJuni 8 lapho aveze khona ukuthi u-95% wezikole kuleli ukulungele ukwamukela abafundi.UNkk Motshekga uthe yizikole ezihlangabezana nemithetho yezempilo yokulwa neCovid-19 kuphela ezizovulwa okunguGrade 7 noGrade 12.Ezikoleni okutholakala ukuthi azinazo izinsiza zezempilo zokunqanda ukusabalala kweCoronavirus, uthe abafundi bakulezo zikole bazothathwa bayiswe ezikoleni ezingomakhelwane ezinazo izidingo."Sizoxhumana noMnyango wezeMpilo mayelana nezithuthi zabafundi ukuthi zibe sezingeni elifanele lokulandelwa kwezokuphepha kwabafundi," kusho uNkk Motshekga.Uthe uma kukhona abazali abanquma ukuthi izingane zabo zingalubhadi ezikoleni kusukela kusasa, hhayi ngenxa yeCovid-19 kodwa ngezizathu ezaziwa yibona, lokho basakuhlela njengomnyango.Ukhuluma kanjena uMotshekga, uke wakubeka phambilini ukuthi abazali abakhetha ukuthi bazifundisele emakhaya izingane zabo, banelungelo lokukwenza lokho, inqobo nje uma bezosebenzisana noMnyango.Uthe phambilini umnyango wawubesula kwirejista abafundi abazali babo abakhetha ukubafundisela emakhaya, kodwa wathi kulokhu ngeke bakwenze."Abazali bangazenza izinhlelo zokufundisa izingane zabo emakhaya kuze kufike lapho ababona khona ukuthi sekumele babaphindisele esikoleni," ucashunwe esho kanje uNkk Motshekga.Ngokwakhe, isikole yindawo ekwazi ukukhulisa umqondo womfundi, yindawo ekwazi ukunakekela ukuphepha kwabafundi, nokuthi bathole nokudla okubenza bathuthuke kwabakwenzayo.
title: Akukho muntu ozovakashela izikole engahlelanga nothishanhloko

text: KUSEYISILONDA enhliziyweni yobengumpetha womhlaba, uMzonke “The Rose of Khayelitsha” Fana, ukuphucwa ibhande le-International Boxing Federation (IBF) Super Featherweight.UFana (44) usenqumo ukuphanyeka amagilavu emgibeni.Waqala isibhakela esikhokhelayo ngo-1994, uthe usegcine esithathile isinqumo sokuyeka isibhakela emuva kweminyaka engabaza. Ugxekiwe yiningi ngo-2016 ecishe efela eringini emuva kokushaywa kanzima ngu-Emmanuel Tagoe waseGhana empini yebhande le-International Boxing Organisation (IBO) eKumasi, eGhana.UFana (38-13-0) uquleke emuva kokukhala kwensimbi eqeda empi, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela. Nokho uyohlale ekhunjulwa njengomunye wabashayisibhakela ababeke isibhakela saseNingizimu Afrika ebalazweni lomhlaba.Uwine ibhande lokuqala nge-SA Super Featherweight ngo-1999 ehlula uMatthews Zulu, walivikela kayisithupha ngaphambi kokuwina ele-World Boxing Council (WBC) International ngo-2003. Uthole ithuba eliyingqayizivele lokulwela ibhande le-WBC ngo-2005 kodwa wakhala ngaphansi engqweleni yaseMexico, * -Antonio Barrera.Ngo-2007 uFana uwine ibhande le-IBF Super Featherweight ehlula uMalcolm Klassen. Nokho lisheshe lamhlahlekela ephucwa nguCassius “Hit Man” Baloyi ngonyaka olandelayo. UFana ubuyise leli bhande ehlula uBaloyi ngo-2010 lingasaphethwe muntu. Emuva kwalokho uthwale kanzima ukuthola impi yokulivikela ephromothwa nguBranco Milenkovic onuka iqaqa kwabanini eNingizimu Afrika. UFana ugcine ephuciwe ibhande yinhlangano i-IBF.“Sengiyasiyeka isibhakela. Kumanje ngibeka isikhindi sami namabhuzi ami phansi kombhede. Uyazi nawe ukuthi akulula ukuthatha isinqumo sokuyeka into oyithandayo. Kodwa miningi le minyaka. Ngaqala isibhakela ngo-1985, ngangena kwesikhokhelayo ngo-1994. Ngizamile ukwenza okusemandleni ami, angikhonondi ngalutho, angizisoli ngalutho. Ngabe nginamanga uma ngithi isinqumo sokuyeka ngisithathe namuhla. Sekuphele iminyaka emithathu ngiyeka kodwa ngibuyele,” kusho uFana.“Angikhonondi ngalutho ngoba okwenzeka bekuyingxenye yamagingxigingxi esibhakela nepolitiki yakhona. Ngaphucwa ibhande le-IBF ngenxa yazo lezo zimo zesibhakela. Yilokho-ke okubuhlungu enhliziyweni yami. Kwaba yizindaba ezimbi kakhulu , hhayi kimina kuphela kodwa kubona bonke abantu abathanda uMzonke neNingizimu Afrika yonke.”UFana uveze ukuthi njengoba eseyeka isibhakela usezoba ngumqeqeshi kaFelix Venganayi waseZimbabwe. UVenganayi ubengumqeqeshi kaFana kwazise ubengasenaye umqeqeshi asebenza naye ngokugcwele.“Ngizoqopha umlando ongakaze wenzeke esibhakeleni. UFelix obekade ehlala ekhoneni lami, usezoqhubeka nokushaya isibhakela mina ngingene ekhoneni,” kusho uFana.
title: UFana usethi khumu emankomaneni

text: Mbali KhanyileLo mkhuba ojwayele ukwenziwa uma kuzoba nabantu abaningi, usuphenduke into ejwayelekile kubantu okuholela ekutheni bangasiboni isidingo sokunaka ukubukeka kwengaphakathi lomuzi uma kungekho zinhlelo zemicimbi yemindeni.Yize kunabantu abangasiboni nhlobo isidingo sokuzijwayeza ukuvuselela indlela okumele libukeke ngayo ingaphakathi le ndlu, bakhona abazinika isikhathi sokubheka indlela esesitayeleni eyenza ikhaya libukeke lilihle futhi liheha ngenxa yokuhlotshiswa kwalo.UNksz Thando Sibisi weYellow Couch Concept okuyinkampani elungisa ingaphakathi lemizi, uthe okumqoka nokumele abantu bangakukhohlwa, wukuthi indlela ebukeka ngayo indlu isuke ichaza ukuthi uzithanda kangakanani umnikazi wayo.“Kumqoka ukuthi abantu babheke imibala abapenda ngayo ngaphakathi endlini. Isikhathi esiningi imibala egqamile nezothe ngendlela ehehayo. Ngaphezulu kokubheka izindonga, nemibala yama-cushion ebekwa kosofa nayo iyakwazi ukwenza indlela elibukeka ngayo igumbi lokuphumula, lihlobe,” kuchaza uNksz Sibisi.Phakathi kwezinye zezimpahla zasendlini ezenza lihlobe ingaphakathi lomuzi ubale izibuko ezinkulu ezinamekwa odongeni athe kuhlotshiswa ngazo ephaseji, egumbini lokugeza, elokulala, elokuphumula nelokudlela.Ubale nama-rug abekwa embhedeni uma sewendlalwe kahle, namalambu ahlobisayo esayidini lombhede.Uthe okunye osekungenisile wukunamekwa kwamatshe obumba odongeni, okwenza indlu ibukeke ngendlela egculisayo nehehayo kwabathanda izindlu ezihlobile.Echaza ngemibala edlisayo kulezi zinsuku, uthe ngumbala osasibhakabhaka othe ukuzotha, ompunga kanjalo negqamile okubalwa kuyo omhlophe, oluhlaza nombala onsundu.“Okunye okubalulekile nokumele abantu bakwazi wukugwema ukugcwalisa kakhulu indlu ngezimpahla ezingenasidingo. Indlu kumele iphefumule ukuze ibukeke kahle futhi ihehe amehlo akho noma kuthiwa sewenze ushintsho kuyona,” kubeka le ntokazi.Uthe inhlanzeko ngokunye okumele kube semqoka futhi bakuqaphele ngaso sonke isikhathi abantu noma ngabe umnikazi womuzi unekhono elingakanani lokuhlobisa indlu.“Abantu kumele bangakubalekeli ukuthatha amaqhinga asetshenziswa emahhotela abalala kuwona uma bezikhiphile noma behambe ngokomsebenzi. Amanye amaqhinga okuhloba bangawathatha kuwona,” kuphetha uNksz Sibisi.
title: Kuhle ukushintsha ukubukeka kwekhaya

text: NJENGOBA kunenkinga yeCoronavirus ezweni, abadala nabakhubazekile kuleli bazosheshe bayithole imali yempesheni kahulumeni.Izolo inhlangano ekhipha isibonelelo sikahulumeni iSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa), ikhiphe isitatimende lapho ithe ngenxa yeCorona bafike esinqumeni sokuba abadala nabakhubazekile basheshe bahole.“I-Sassa ikhathazekile ngenxa yeCorona nendlela ephazamise ngayo izwe. Kube sekuboniswana kwaphuma isinqumo esithi isibonelelo sika-Ephreli sizosheshe sitholakale ngoMashi 30 no-31, 2020 kwabadala nabakhubazekile. Ngo-Ephreli 1 nonyaka, kuzobe sekuphuma zonke ezinye izibonelelo okubalwa nesezingane,” kusho isitatimende sakwaSassa.Bathe lena yimizamo yabo yokwehlisa isiminyaminya sabantu abagcwala ezitolo, emadolobheni nasemabhange uma bezohola imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni.I-Sassa ithe labo abahola emholweni bazokwazi ukuthola imali yabo kusukela ngo-Ephreli 3 nonyaka, bese kuzoya ngokuthi lapho uhola khona iluphi usuku okuholwa ngalo.AbakwaSassa bathe labo abafakelwa imali ebhange, uma isingenile ngeke isaphuma. Banxuse abahola emabhange ukuba bangayikhiphi yonke imali yabo kodwa besebenzise ezinye izindlela okubalwa ukusebenzisa ikhadi uma bethenga, kunokheshi.Ezikhungweni okuholelwa kuzo, bathe kuzoqinisekiswa ukuthi kunokuhlanzeka. Kuzophinde kuqikelelwe ukuthi abeqi ku-100 abantu abasizwa ngesikhathi.AbakwaSassa banxuse ukube abantu beshintshe indlela yokwenza izinto ikakhulukazi kwinhlazeko nokugeza izandla ngaso sonke isikhathi.
title: Bazosheshe bahole abadala nabakhubazekile ngenxa yeCorona

text:
IGWETSHWE odilikajele ababili neminyaka engu-15 ngaphezulu eNkantolo eNkulu oPhongolo indoda yakwaNongoma elahlwe ngamacala amabili okubulala nelilodwa lokuzama ukubulala.UMnuz Ndumiso Sikhakhene (31) utholwe enecala ngoLwesine waphinde wagwetshwa yinkantolo ngalo lolu suku.Ulahlwe yicala lokubulala uMnuz Mholi Gabela noMduduzi Nkosi nelokuzama ukubulala uMnuz Thabo Ndwadwe ngesikhathi kuhlaselwa isitolo Okhukhwaneni, KwaNongoma, ngo-2005.Kuthiwa ngo-Januwari 19, 2005, kwaba nokudubula kulesi sitolo okwaphetha ngokuthi kushone uGabela noNkosi kwalimala kanzima uNdwandwe.Amaphoyisa enza uphenyo abe esebopha abasolwa uSikhakhane noSifiso Mnyandu.Kuthiwa uSikhakhane weqa waya eGoli, wabuya wahlala eThekwini ngalesi sikhathi eqile.UMnyandu kuthiwa wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-12 ngo-2007 ngala macala enkantolo enkulu eMtubatuba.USikhakhane kuthiwa waboshwa ngo-2008 kodwa waphinde weqa.Kuthiwa ngesikhathi eqile wabe esesolakala ecaleni lokubulala omunye umuntu eThekwini, waboshwa wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-19 ngaleli cala neminyaka emithathu ngelokweqa.USikhakhane uhambe izinkantolo eziningi ngaleli cala ngaphambi kokuthi agixabezwe ngodilikajele ePhongola.Khonamanjalo, ugwetshwe iminyaka engu-20 ngoLwesine umlisa olahlwe ngamacala okudlwengula.USithenjwa Mkhize (28) ugwetshwe enkantolo yesifunda ePinetown ngecala okuthiwa walenza ngoMashi 26, 2011.Wadlwengula owesifazane oneminyaka engu-20 ophazamisekile emqondweni ngesikhathi evakashele uskwiza wakhe eClermont.Ngesikhathi owesifazane ehleli egcekeni kwafika uMkhize wambamba ngenkani wangena naye endlini yakhe wafike wamdlwengula.Owesifazane wabika udaba kuskwiza wakhe. umdlwenguli waboshwa ngo-Agasti nyakenye. – 
Intatheli yeSolezwe
title: Ugwetshwe odilikajele ababili ngawokubulala

text: Nhlanhla Sithole OMUNYE wokaputeni osehlabane ephindelela ne-Orlando Pirates, uLucky Lekgwathi, ukholwa wukuthi uma inqoba yonke imidlalo esele, bese kuqhuzuka izimbangi zayo kungayisiza iphendule amatafula kwi-Absa Premiership.Exoxa nentatheli yeSolezwe ngeSonto ngomqhafazo ugcizelele wathi ezikaMagebhula zisenalo ithuba lokukhala zemuke nesicoco seligi uma abadlali bezobuyela enkundleni bezitshela ukuthi bazoyinqoba yonke imidlalo.“Basengaba ompetha beligi uma bezothi besuka baphonsele wonke amaqembu abazodlala nawo inselelo enzima.Bangase bayinqobe yonke imidlalo bese kuthi laba ababanga nabo phezulu baqhuzuke emidlalweni embalwa esilele.Ngaleyo ndlela ngibabona benalo ithuba lokuphendula amatafula,” kusho uLekgwathi.EzikaMagebhula kumiswe imidlalo yePremiership zihlezi endaweni yesine ohlwiini lokukleliswa kwamaqembu ngokwamaphuzu eziwaqoqile.Zibambene phezulu neSuperSport United ngamaphuzu awu-40 ehlezi endaweni yesithathu, okuchaza ukuthi zisele ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili kwiKaizer Chiefs eqhwakele phezulu, okuyenza isale kwiMamelodi Sundowns enamaphuzu awu- 44 nehlezi endaweni yesibili.ULekgwathi ukhulume kanje ngeqembu lakhe elidala, nashiya kulona eyiqhawe labalandeli ngendlela alihola ngayo liyothatha izindebe ezintathu ngesizini eyodwa kulandelana, elizovula ngomdlalo onzima.Kulo mdlalo lizogadulisana nompetha bangesizini edlule iSundowns eDobsonville Stadium, eSoweto ngo- Agasti 11 ngo 6 ntambama.Lo mdlalo uzokuba ngumkhombandlela ekutheni ezikaMagebhula zikuyona indlela yokuyophendula amatafula.Kanti ngokolunye uhlangothi neSundowna izobe ibheke ukuthi iwathatha wonke amaphuzu amathathu ukuze izibeke ethubeni lokubamba Amakhosi.Amasandawana azodlala lomdlalo ephuma komunye umdlalo onzima weNedbank Cup Semi-Final neBidvest Wits, nayo ezodlalela ukuthi ivalelise kule sigaba ngegiya eliphezulu njengoba ngokuphela kuka-Agasti, leli gama lizokube lingasekho emabhukwini ePremier Soccer League.Lokhu kulandela ukuthengiselwa kwayo usomabhizini waseLimpopo uLawrence Mulaudzi, ozoyishintsha igama ibe iTshakuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) ngesizini ezayo.NgoLwesithathu Amakhosi azokube ebhekene neWits nayo ezokube iphuma emdlalweni onzima, emdlalweni ozokuba se-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto ngo-6 ntambama.
title: ULekgwathi uthi iPirates ingawaphendula amatafula

text: KUYANCOMEKA ukuthi umphakathi usuqalile ukubona ukuthi akusizi ukugxila emantombazaneni kuphela uma kuhlunyeleliswa izimilo noma kuyalwa abantwana. Kuyacaca ukuthi abantu besilisa - abadala nabancane - kufanele bazi ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthi empilweni siyafika isikhathi sokuphoxeka okufanele bakulungiselele ukubhekana naso ngaphandle kokusebenzisa udlame nesihluku. Ukungathembeki komuntu omthandayo, izikweletu, ukungahloniphani, nokungaboni ngaso linye kuyingxenye yempilo.Akufanele-ke uma umuntu ezithola ebhekene nokwaliwa; ebambe isithandwa sakhe simbhangqe nomunye noma ekhulise ingane engesilo igazi lakhe - ukubala nje izimo ezinzima zempilo - kube wukuthi uyaqala ngqa ngisho ukuyicabanga into enjalo.Ngendlela izimo zothando eziguquguquka ngayo kufanele umuntu ahlale elindele noma ngabe yini nganoma yisiphi isikhathi - futhi ukubhekana nazo kube yinto asake wayicabanga, wavuma ukuthi uzobhekana nazo ngendlela efanele. Angikholwa wukuthi bonke laba bantu besilisa abaphenduka izilwane uma sekuphele uthando kusuke kuyinto abake bayicabanga ukuthi bayophoxeka noma bazizwe bedeleleka ngelinye ilanga.Bheka nje ngesonto eledlule utolika wasenkantolo udubule wabulala umkakhe obeyimantshi nabantwana babo abathathu. Kuthe kusombuluka leli sonto kwadutshulwa umhlengikazi waseMahatma Gandhi ebulawa umyeni, obe esezidubula naye wafa. Konke lokhu kwenzeke phambi kwabantwana babo.Sekuwumlando okwenzeke phakathi komculi wegqom’ uMampitsha noBabes Wodumo.Abafundi bale ngosi bazokhumbula ukuthi ngonyaka ka-2016 ngenyanga yabesifazane, ngabhalela uBabes incwadi eyayisuka ekujuleni kwenhliziyo kimina ngenxa yenjabulo yokumbona engenisa kulendima kaqed’isizungu. Kwase kuphele isikhathi eside kukade kwagcina ukuba khona umuntu wesifazane onedumela nekhono elingaka. Kulencwadi ngangimyala ngithi uma efika kulendima akozibamba ziqine ngoba udumo luyinkinga.Ngasho nokuthi njengoba evela endaweni eyilokishi nje baningi ababheke yena, nabantu abasha abazofisa ukuhamba ezinyathelweni zakhe.Ngamkhumbuza nokuthi impilo yakhe akuseyona eyakhe yedwa, njengesihlabani silindele lukhulu kuyena. Ngamxwayisa nangezinto ezihogelwayo neziphuzwayo uma ukulendima, kodwa kunezinkomba zokuthi naye ungene kulolu gibe abaningi esasibathanda ababengaphambi kwakhe abangena kulona.Ngoba nakhu naye evulelwa amacala okushaya - nakuba lokho kungasho-ke ukuthi akashaywe. Into eyenzeke phakathi kwalaba bobabili, nakulezi zigameko engizibalulile, kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi isihluku esenzeka ekhaya, phakathi kwezithandani, siseyingxenye enkulu yempilo kuleli - nokuyinto ekhathaza kakhulu.Ngaphambi kokuba ngigogode ezifundweni zokunakekelwa nokukhuliswa kwabantwana eDurban University of Technology, besiba nesikhathi lapho siyosebenza khona nentsha ngenhloso yokulekelela ezindaweni ezehlukene ezinabantwana nentsha.Sisebenzile nasezikoleni zamabanga aphezulu. Besisungula imidlalo ezolekelela abafundi ukuthi baqhamuke nezindlela ezahlukahlukene zokubhekana nodlame kanye nanoma yiziphi izimo abangahambisani nazo: ezibaphoxayo, ezibacasulayo, ezibafikisela ngosizi noma ezibehlisa isithunzi.Inqwaba yabafana ebesinabo kulezi zinhlelo belubuza ukuthi kungani kufanele kuchithwe isikhathi uma umuntu ekucasula, akashaywa ngani. Kukhona nje owayibeka ngembaba eyokuthi uma yena exakwa umuntu akahluphi, ubuya nommese ngakusasa “alungise” udaba uma kuphuma isikole.Nakuba bekushaqisa lokhu kodwa kwakhombisa isidingo esikhulu sokufundiswa kwabantwana babafana ngezindlela zokubhekana nezimo ezibafaka ingcindezi.Abafana bayazidinga izinkundla zokufundiswa ngokuphatha umuntu wesifazane, ukubhekana nezimo ezingabacasula nokukwazi ukukhuluma ngezimo ezihlukumeza umoya wabo - kanye nokubaluleka kokuvele usishiye isimo obonayo ukuthi singaphezu kwakho, lokhu okubizwa ngesilungo ngo- “Just Walk Away.”· Ukuzazi uma usudinga usizo beze uyalucela: Ayikho into eyongijabulisa njengokubona isizukulwane sabesilisa esizongacwasani ngoba nje kukhona ocele usizo. Uma ukhuluma ngemizwa yakho, kuba lula ukuthola usizo lokubhekana nesimo;· Ukuba nendlela obhekana ngayo nezimo ezikucindezelayo: Ungathola umuntu ongakhuluma naye, uzijwayeze ukuchaza indlela ozizwa ngayo kulowo muntu osuke ekuphazamise umoya noma ngabe uphathina wakho, ngaphandle kodlame;· Ukuzithoba nokwazi izinto ezikucasulayo: Kubalulekile ukwazi ukuthi yini ekwenza uzizwe wehluleka ukuzibamba nokuthi uma usuzizwa kanjalo uzobona ngaziphi izimpawu, futhi ujwayele ukwenzanjani ngakho;· Yiba nozwelo kuwe uqobo: Ukuzibona sengathi akumele wehlulwe yimizwa kufaka enkulu ingcindezi. Khohlwa wukuthi “Indoda ayikhali” ngoba ukukhala kufana nokubhodla. Kuyasehlisa isimo esesiqongile, noma ngabe uphoxekile noma ngabe udiniwe. Okokugcina, ngisaphinda futhi: kungcono ukuvele uhambe kunokudala umonakalo omkhulu ozozisola ngawo noma ukuphuce umphefumulo wakho.
title: [IMIBONO] Azisukunyelwe izinkinga kwezothando

text: ISIKHULU esiphezulu seSouth African Airways (SAA), uMnuz Vuyani Jarana, sithi inkulumo kaNgqongqoshe weziMali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, iholele ekutheni abantu bahoxise amathikithi akade bewathengile ngoba bengazi ukuthi inkampani isazoqhubeka nokusebenza noma cha.UMboweni uthe njengoba iSAA ingayenzi imali kufanele uhulumeni ayidayise.UJarana uthe kumanje umatasa nokuqinisa abantu idolo ukuthi iSAA iyaqhubeka nokusebenza ngoba uyasilungisa isimo senkampani.“Sesilethe uzinzo eSAA ngoba nemizila yangaphakathi isiyayenza inzuzo. Imizila esasinikeza inkinga ngeyamazwe angaphandle. Sesilungisile isimo eLondon. E-Afrika umzila osasinika inkinga owase-Uganda, i-Entebbe. Sinenkinga futhi ngeHong Kong ngoba sincintisana no-Emirates nezinye izinkampani,” kusho Jarana.Uthe iSAA inesikweletu sikaR9.2 billion kodwa uyazama ukulungisa isimo.Mayelana nokuthi uhulumeni kufanele adayise iSAA uJarana uthe leso yisinqumo sikahulumeni bona benza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi yenza inzuzo.UNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi kahulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, ugqugquzele abasebenzi beSAA ukuthi balwe nenkohlakalo ukuze iSAA ingawi.Uthe uke wakhuluma neDanish Airlines ebifuna ukusebenzisana neSAA ukuze ingenise kwamanye amazwe.Ugcizelele ukuthi ngeke uhulumeni akwazi ukutakula iSAA minyaka yonke ngakho kufanele yenze inzuzo ngoba nabakhokhi bentela bakhathele yiyona.“Kuyishwa ukuthi iSAA yayiphethe imakethe yase-Afrika eminyakeni edlule kodwa leso sicoco sesiphethwe yinkampani yamabhanoyi yase-Ethiopia. Ngiyacela abaphathi benkampani nani basebenzi nishintshe isimo ngoba uma zingashintshi izinto nizosala nezihlalo ezingenamuntu emabhanoyini,” kusho uGordhan.UDkt Azar Jammine, isazi somnotho kwa-Econometrix ,uthe uhulumeni kufanele adayise ingxenye ethile yeSAA ukuze ayeke ukukhokha imali yokuyitakula inkampani egcine ukwenza inzuzo ngo-2011. “Angazi ukuthi kungani uhulumeni engadayisi ingxenye ethile yeSAA ngoba uma kunenkampani ezimele isimo sizoshintsha yenze inzuzo. Asikwazi ukuba nenkampani kazwelonke ewumthwalo kubakhokhi bentela.”
title: Isikhulu sakwaSAA sisola inkulumo kaMboweni

text: ABABUKELI bomdlalo iThe Queen sebeveze ukuthi besingekho isidingo sokuvala isikhala sikaVuyiswa (Zandile Msutwana), kulo mdlalo.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi ngoMsombuluko uThembisa Mdoda olingisa indawo kaVuyiswa kulo mdlalo eqale ukubonakala kuwona.UThembisa ulingisa le ndawo ngemuva kokulimala kukaZandile eqopha okumanje ululamela ekhaya.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ababukeli balo mdlalo baveze imizwa ehlukene ngokubonakala kukaThembisa.Abanye bathe ngabe kube ngcono ukuthi indawo yakhe imisiwe aze alulame.Abanye bebedidekile njengoba bebezibuza ukuthi kwenzekeni kuVuyiswa abamaziyo kulo mdlalo. UMelvy-Melz uthe: “Umoya wami awuvumi ukwamukela lo Vuyiswa. Abanye abalingisi kudalelwe ukuthi bamiswe uma besenezinkinga kuze kube bayalulama babuye emsebenzini”.URose Roro uthe: “Ngizithola ngibuka umdlalo iThe Queen Mzansi ngibona uThembisa Mdoda elingisa indawo kaVuyiswa. Ngiyamthanda impela kodwa hhayi ukuthi alingise le ndawo”.UMthimkhulu Rhadebe uthe: “Angimuzwa kahle lo Vuyiswa omusha”.UMs Sharo_shaz uthe: “Uyohlala eyedwa uVuyiswa kimina. Sengikhumbule indlela amamatheka ngayo nje”.U-Awethu Mangali uthe:“Angijabule ngalo Vuyiswa siyacela nisibuyisele uSis Vee wethu”.UTopollo Tayx uthe: “Ngabe kungcono ukuthi  bavale isikhala sikaVuyiswa ngomuntu ofana naye nse”.UMzansi Magic ngenyanga edlule wakhipha isitatimende umemezela  izindaba zokuza kukaThembisa kulo mdlalo.Esitatimendeni bakubeka kwacaca ukuthi uZandile kudingeke ame ukuqopha njengoba elimale khona ngaphakathi kulo mdlalo, kodwa indawo yakhe izoqhubeka nokuba khona kulo mdlalo njengoba izovalwa uThembisa.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi uThembisa usazobonakala kulo mdlalo isikhashana njengoba uZandile eyoze abonakale uma sekuqala isizini entsha.
title: Isikhalo kunyamalala uZandile kwiThe Queen

text: Bazali nabaBheki abathandekayo, Ngibhala ukunazisa kafushane ngokwenzekayo ngamaphuzu amqoka ehlukene aphazamise ukuqala konyaka wokufunda wangowezi-2020 nangokuqhubeka konyaka wokufunda. Njengoba nazi, ukuqala konyaka wokufunda wangowezi-2020 ubuhaqwe yizibhelu nokucekelwa phansi kwempahla okuholele ekuphazamisekeni kwezinhlelo zokubhalisa nokuqala konyaka wokufunda.  Ngenkathi iNyuvesi isiqala ukubuyela esimweni, siphoqeleke ukuthi sethule izinhlelo ezisheshayo nezinqala zokubhekana nobhubhane i-coronavirus (noma i-COVID-19).IZIBHELU NODLAME – IZIMFUNO ZOKUBHALISA MAHHALANgokuqala kwesikhathi sokubhalisa ngonyaka wezi-2020, i-UKZN ibhekane nezimfuno zezitshudeni zokucisha izikweletu ezindala nokuthi ibhalise izitshudeni ezicela kumaphesenti angama-78. Loku bekuyizimfuno isikhungo ebesingeke sikwazi ukuzivuma ngenxa yezizathu eziningi ezinjengalezi ezilandelayo:Kakade ngisho inqubo kahulumeni yokuxhasa ezemfundo ephakeme ayifinyeleli kwizitshudeni imindeni yazo ehola imali eyevile kumaR350 000; Ukuthi izitshudeni ezindala bezikweleta iNyuvesi uR1.7 billion ekupheleni kowezi-2019; INyuvesi ibingadingi ngisho nesisodwa isitshudeni ukuthi sikhokhe imali esiyikweletayo iphelele ngaphambi kokubhalisa; Inkokhelo yesikweletu edingeka kwizitshudeni ibingenye yeziphansi kakhulu emanyuvesi kahulumeni, isukela kumaR10,000 iye kuR45 000 isitshudeni sisinye kuthi amaphesenti angama-60 azo zonke izitshudeni zethu akhokhe ngaphansi kwezi R10,000 ukuphungula isikweletu namaphesenti angama-67 angakhokhi nhlobo uma ebhalisa ngoba exhaswe yiNSFAS nabanye abaxhasi. Nakuba kunje, bekuthiwa izitshudeni ngeke zikwazi ukukhokha izimali ezidingekayo nokujwayele ukuphazamisa izinhlelo zokubhalisa kodwa iNyuvesi ikwazile ukubhalisa abantu abalingana naseminyakeni edlule.Njengoba nginibhalela nje, iNyuvesi isivele iyedlulile imigomo ebizibekele yona yokubhalisa izitshudeni ezenza iziqu zokuqala ngonyaka wokufunda wezi-2020 ngephesenti. Izitshudeni ezivumelekile ukubhalisa ngaphandle kokukhokha nezingenamibandela ngokwezifundo zikwazile ukubhalisa ngokobuchwepheshe kusukela mhla ziyi-7 ngoMasingana wezi-2020 kwaze kwaba mhla ziyi-6 kuNdasa wezi-2020. Zicela kumaphesenti angama-84 izitshudeni ezibhalise zikude, okuyisibalo esihambisana nesangonyaka odlule. Ngenkathi kuvalwa inyuvesi mhla ziyi-19 kuNdasa wezi-2020, bezimi kanje izibalo zokubhalisa eNyuvesi: Abeziqu zokuqala Bawu- 35 179 ababhalisele ukubhala kanti bawu-34 914 abahlela ukubhalisa (101%).Abaziqu zokuqhubekaBawu- 11 113 ababhalisele ukubhala kanti bawu-12 812 abahlela ukubhalisa (87%).Bebonke bawu-46 292 ababhalisele ukubhala, bawu-47 726 abahlela ukubhalisa (97%).Loku kuwubufakazi obusobala bokuthi iningi lezitshudeni zethu azikaze nakanye ngesikhathi sokubhalisa zihambisane nezibhelu nokuthi futhi zazingekho zona njengoba ziqhubekile nokubhalisa ngisho zesatshiswa, zihlaselwa nabaphathi beNyuvesi. Kuqubula imibuzo ebalulekile ukuthi kungani i-UKZN ihlaselwe ngale ndlela ngisho izitshudeni zangempela zivumelene nemizamo yeNyuvesi, zazama izaba zokuthola imali ukuze ziqhubeke nemfundo yazo.Kuyacaca manje ukuthi izibhelu nodlame bekungasuki emoyeni nje. Kunezinhlobo ezimbili zamaqembu abantu imisebenzi yabo iphazanyiswa yizinguquko ezinqala ezenzeka eNyuvesi: (i) Abalingani asebezitholele umbele ogwansile ngokuphehla udweshu nokugqugquzela izibhelu eNyuvesi (ii) neqeqebana lezitshudeni esezihlale isikhathi eside zingaqedi izifundo zaze zagcina sezifana “nefenisha” yaseNyuvesi. Kuwona womabili la maqembu sekuneminyaka eminingi ukwehlela ngezansi kweNyuvesi kwenza ukuthi ahlomule ngokwezimali nangokwemisebenzi edalekayo, azitamuzele umbuso nokho okukhubaza iNyuvesi.Umphumela waloku wukuthi umsebenzi omqoka weNyuvesi, okungukufundisa, usuwehlengamaphesenti angama-99 eminyakeni eyishumi edlule, kwathi isibalo sezitshudeni sakhuphuka ngamaphesenti angama-90 ngaleso sikhathi.Kunamaqoqo alokhu ekhona eNyuvesi aphokophele ukusibuyisela emuva, afuna ukuthi izenzo zenkohlakalo, ezobumbungulu nezindlela ezidida usathane zabantu abathile namaqembu athile kuchume nakuba kuwisa i-UKZN.Siyakubona loku kanti abaphathi beNyuvesi bazimisele ukuqhubeka nalezi zinguquko ezinqala ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ikusasa lesikhungo liyasimama negama layo liyandlondlobala ezweni lonkenasemhlabeni wonke. Ngeke sisonge izandla ngenkathi izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme emhlabeni wonke zishintsha izindlela ezenza ngayo izinto ngokushesha, kushintsha nezinto ezilindelwe emanyuvesi kahulumeni.Ngeke siphumelele kulokhu ngaphandle kokusimama ngokomnotho okwenza ukuthi sikwaziukutshala imali – ngeke sivele “sithenge” ukusetshenziswa kodlame nokwesatshiswa ngenxa yokubambelela emgomweni nasekutheni kuzowisa i-UKZN, ngakho sizoqhubeka nokuhlakula ukhula lwabantu namaqembu acabangela izisu zabo; noma ngabe yilabo osekuwumsebenzikubona ukuba yizitshudeni nezimpisi eziphila ngokukhwezela umlilo wezibhelu Ukuze ziphumelele lezi zinguquko, sidinga ukwesekwa yinina bazali nababheki ukubhula izinkulumo ezibhebhezela izibhelu, ukubona ukuthi abaphathi base-UKZN benza izinto ngendlela efanele ukuqinisekisa inhlalonhle nemfundo yezingane zenu nokuqhubeka nizeseke, neseke nathi ekuzakheleni ikusasa eliqhakazile.UMKHANKASO WETHU NGE-CORONAVIRUS (I-COVID-19)I-COVID-19 imenyezelwe njengobhubhane lomhlaba yi-World Health Organization nenhlekelele yezwe lonke nguMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa. I-UKZN iyasithakasela isinqumo esiphusile nesisheshayo sikaMengameli sokuvala izwe thaqa ukulwa nesifo esibhebhethekayo i-COVID-19ukunciphisa izinga loku”bhebhetheka kwaso”. Yisikhathi esinzima lesi emhlabeni kanti siyiNyuvesi sisheshe sasukuma savalela amaholidi aphakathi nonyaka ngokushesha kusukela mhla ziyi-17 kuNdasa wezi-2020 ukuze sinike izitshudeni ithuba lokuthi ziphume lapho zihlala khona eNyuvesi, zisheshe zifinyelele emakhaya ukuzama ukuphephisa impilo yazo.Asisodwa kuloku. Ezinye izikhungo ezingabalingani bethu eNingizimu ye-Afrika yonkana, eYurophu naseNtshonalanga Melika nazo ziphoqeleke ukuthi zithathe izinyathelo ezifana nalesi. Umsebenzi wethu wokunakekela impilo nenhlalonhle yezitshudeni zethu, abasebenzi bethu nomphakathi uhambisana nomsebenzi wethu wokuba yizakhamuzi ezweni. Njengoba kufanele sibambisane ukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane, sehlise izinga lokusabalala kwalo ukuze sinqobe lolu bhubhane.Umgomo omqoka emphakathini wukunqanda igciwane, okubalwa kukhona ukugwema ukuhlangana nokunciphisa abantu abaningi endaweni eyodwa. INyuvesi ihlinzeke ngezinto zokuthutha kwizitshudeni ezingenawo amandla, yahlinzeka ngendawo yokugcina izimpahla kulezo zitshudeni ezingakwazanga ukugoduka nezimpahla zazo.Kukhishwe amabhasi acela kuma-300 ukuthi ahambise izitshudeni ezinkabeni zamadolobha esifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natali. La mabhasi ahlanziwe, kwabulawa amagciwane, izitshudeni zanikwa izinto zokuhlanza izandla, amagilavu nezifonyo ngaphambi kokuthi agibele amabhasi ukuvika ingozi. Okwamanje akukacaci ukuthi zizoqhubeka nini izifundo. Sizobona ngezimemezelo zikahulumeni.Zonke izitshudeni zinxuswa ukuthi ziqhubeke nokuba nesimilo, ziqhubeke nokwenza umsebenzi wesikole ngalesi sikhathi. Kwenziwa yonke imizamo ukuthi kuphothulwe isu lokufundisa nokufunda nge-internet. Kepha siyazazi izinto ezidinga ukukhunjulwa: (1) kunezitshudeni ezenza unyaka wokuqala eziningi ezinjengokuthola ama-laptop (2) nendaba ye-wifi. Ngenxa yalezi zizathu, akulindelekile ukuthi izitshudeni zithumele umsebenzi wesikole noma ziwuthole kwi-internet njengoba bengaba baningi abangeke bakwazi ukubamba iqhaza. Kunezinto ezintathu abaphathi beNyuvesi abazibhekayo. Nazi: (i) wukuthi sizobuyela esimweni sakudala (sokuxhumana emabaleni enyuvesi) ngemva kukathaqa wezinsuku ezingama-21 (ngomhla wama-20 kuMbasa); (ii) wukuthi ngeke sibuye ezinsukwini ezingama-21 nokuthi mhlawumbe singakwazi ukubuyela ekubonaneni ngoNcwaba (iii) nokuthi kungenzekani uma singalahlekelwa yisimesta yonke yonyaka wokufunda ngenxa ye-COVID-19.IHhovisi lokuFundisa nokuFunda, i-ICS, amaphini oMphathinyuvesi namaDean ezikole kumaKolishi ezokuFundisa nokuFunda bebesebenza kanzima ukubheka ukuthi yini edinga ukwenziwa, nini futhi nokuthi ngubani ozoqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lonyaka luyaqhubeka ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka kakhulu. Kuloku kukhona okudingeka ukwenziwa ngabasebenzi njengokufaka umsebenzi wesikole ku-MOODLE kodwa okumqoka kakhulu abakwenzayo wukuthi yiziphi izinyathelo siyiNyuvesi esizithathayo ukuze zonke izitshudeni zethu zilungele ukufunda zikude uma kuba nesidingo sokuthi kufundelwe kude okukhona kukona ukusebenzisa ama-laptop njengendlela yokuxhumana, njll.Ukubheka nokulungiselela izindlela zokuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe ukuthola nokusabalalisa izinto zokufunda akufanele kuthathwe njengonto yokusiza manje kuphela kodwa kufanele kuthathwe njengendlela yokuphucula izinga lezitshudeni zase-UKZN (nabasebenzi) esikhathini esizayo. Izitshudeni zizokwaziswa ngaleli su ngesikhathi esifanele kanti iNyuvesi izokwenza konke okudingekayo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izitshudeni ziyaziswa ngendlela efanele, zicijwe ngaphambi kokuthi kubhekwe indaba yokulandela lolu hlelo lokufunda ngobuchwepheshe. Minyaka yonke, iNyuvesi iba nezitshudeni ezingama-30 000 nemindeni yazo emiCimbini yokweThwesa iziQu yonyaka. Ngeshwa, ngalesi sikhathi kudingeke ukuthi simise imiCimbi yokweThwesa iziQu yangoMbasa. IHhovisi elengamele ukubhalisa lizothumela labo obekufanele bethweswe iminyezane ukuthi bazozithola kanjani izitifiketi zabo. Ngokuvumelana nabaholi bezitshudeni, abaphathi benyuvesi bayakwemukela ukuthi imiCimbi yokweThweswa imiNyezane imqoka kwizitshudeni zethu, kepha ikakhulukazi emindenini yabo. Ngakho-ke lesi sinqumo sokumisa imicimbi sizobuye sibuyekezwe esikhathini esizayo, kubhekwa ukuthi ihamba kanjani indaba yobhubhane i-COVID-19.Ukunciphisa amathuba okutheleleka kwabasebenzi nokuhambisana nemigomo kathaqa ezweni lonke, yimisebenzi emqoka kuphela ezoqhubeka nokwenziwa emabaleni eNyuvesi. Bonke abasebenzi kudingeka ukuthi baqhubeke basebenzele emakhaya uma kungenzeka ngokuyalelwa yizimenenja zabo. Sizama ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uyaqhubeka umsebenzi ngangamandla enyuvesi kulesi simo esingejwayelekile. Konke ukuhlangana nokuhamba okungenasidingo kumisiwe noma kuhlehlisiwe.IMPUMELELO YASE-UKZNNakuba kukhona izinselelo esibhekene nazo siyi-UKZN nomhlaba wonke, kepha siyaziqhayisa ngempumelelo yethu efakazela amagalelo ethu njengeNyuvesi ePhambili kwezokuFundisa e-Afrika.UKUSIMAMA KWE-UKZN KUYIBEKA ESICONGWENIINyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natali ibe sesicongweni eNingizimu Afrika ngemiphumela yocwaningo olushicilelwe ngonyaka wezi-2018. Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi umNyango wezeMfundo ePhakeme nezokuQeqesha ugcina ukubhekisisa. I-UKZN isike yalala isibili kuzwelonke kwezamaphepha ocwaningo ashicilelwe esephelele.Funda KabanziI-UKZN YETHULE UMKHANKASO WOKUQALA WE-COVID-19 E-AFRIKAI-UKZN yethule ingqophamlando kwezeMpilo yaseNyuvesi yokulwa nemikhankaso yokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwe-Coronavirus (i-COVID-19). Ukweseka le mikhankaso, iNyuvesi yenze iposilombani elithi: [email protected] ne-hashtag ethi: #ukzncovid19 yemibuzo yezitshudeni. Kuzoba nocingo lwezimo eziphuthumayo lokuxhumana nabalingani beNyuvesi ngegciwane.Funda KabanziNANGU UMENGAMELI WE-SA MATHEMATICAL SOCIETYUmHoli weziFundo zeziBalo ophikweni lwaseMgungundlovu uSolwazi u-Precious Sibanda usanba kubekwa waba nguMengameli we-South African Mathematical Society (i-SAMS) amahlandla amabili. Uyaziwa ngamagalelo akhe endimeni yezocwaningo nezindlela zokusetshenziswa kwezibalo nokubumba uketshezi ngendlela yezibalo, uSibanda uneminyaka eli-17 engumfundisi wase-UKZN.Funda KabanziISIFUNDISWA SAKWA-HUMANITIES SIQOKELWE UKUBA NGUMENGAMELI WE-ENGLISH ACADEMY OF SOUTHEN AFRICAIsifundiswa sase-College of Humanities uSolwazi Mbongeni Malaba siqokelwe ukuba nguMengameli we-English Academy of Southern Africa (i-EASA). I-EASA iyinhlangano engenzi nzuzo eyasungulwa ngonyaka we-1961 ukukhuthaza ukusetshenziswa kwesiNgisi ezweni lonke kulesi sifunda. Ngesikhathi sakhe sokuba nguMengameli, uSolwazi Malaba ufisa ukugqugquzela ukubambisana phakathi kwemiNyango yesiNgisi emanyuvesi esifundeni samazwe aseningizimu ye-Afrika, nokuqhubeka nokugqugquzela ukubambisana phakathi kwezikole.Funda KabanziISIPHETHONakuba kunezinselelo ezingakaze zibonakale esibhekene nazo, kepha asikho isidingo sokudangala. Abasebenzi baseNyuvesi bakhombise ukuba ngabasebenzi abavuthiwe, okuyinto iNyuvesi eyaziwa ngayo. Sezishintshile izimo kodwa okusihlanganisile kusenjalo kanti loko esimandla kukona kuzosinqobisa ngalesi sikhathi esinzima. Impela njengoba sibhekene nalobu bunzima kodwa kumenyezelwe ukuthi i-UKZN isesicongweni kumanyuvesi ezweni kwezemiphumela yocwaningo olushicilelwe. Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi umNyango wezeMfundo ePhakeme nezokuQeqesha ugcina ukubhekisisa. I-UKZN isike yalala isibili kuzwelonke kwezamaphepha ocwaningo ashicilelwe esephelele. Ngalesi sikhathi sokudideka, izinqumo zizokhishwa kwi-website yeNyuvesi, iNdlela yeziMemezelo yeNyuvesi nangezincwadi zombani. Ngalesi sikhathi niyanxuswa ukuthi niqhubeke nibhukulele impilo enhle nokunciphisa amandla obhubhane.Ozithobayo,USolwazi uNana PokuUSekelashansela noMphathinyuvesi
title: UKZN: Umyalezo kasekela shansela ngokuqala konyaka wokufunda wangowezi-2020

text: UMHOLI we-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) uMnuz Julius Malema usegqugquzele abantu ukuthi bakhombise inhlonipho nakubanu besifazane abadayisa ngocansi. UMalema usho kanje njengoba kuyinyanga yabesifazane ngesikhathi ethula inkulo yakhe kugujwa usuku lwabo ngempelasonto. UMalema uthe ziningi izindlela abantu besifazane bakuleli ababukelwa ngayo phansi okubalwa nabadayisa ngomzimba. Uveze ukuthi abantu abadayisa ucansi nabo banamalungelo njengabo bonke abantu abenza imisebenzi eyahlukene. UMalema uthe kumele ahlonishwe amalungelo abantu abadayisa ngocansi bayeke nokuhlambalazwa njengoba kwenzeka uma betholwa bedayisa. UMalema uthe kuyihlazo nokuthi kuboshwa abesifazane abadayisayo kuphela bebe bekwenza nabesilisa. "Kungani beboshwa abantu besilisa abathengayo bengaboshwa? Kuboshwa omahosha ngoba bengabantu besifazane ngoba kulula ukuhlambalaza kalula kanjalo abantu besifazane.," kusho uMalema.Eqhuba uthe lolu daba lubalulekile futhi kumele lulungiswe ngokushesha. UMalema uthe akekho umuntu osuke ephoqiwe ukuthenga, yingakho kumele abantu besifazane kumele bayekwe basebenzise amalungelo abo. Ephetha uthe kufanele ngabo omahosha kuyimanje bayabhekelelwa ngamagilosa okuthi bakwazi ukudla njengoba kuvalwe imigwaqo emingini, kuze kube umnotho ubuyela esimeni esingcono bakwazi nokuqhubeka nebhizinisi labo.Mayelana nokukhishwa inzalo kwabesifazane ngaphandle kwemvume yabo uthe kumele nakho kubhekisiswe ngoba bonke abantu besifazane banelingelo lokuzikhethela mayelana nokuthola abantwana.
title: UMalema ukhuthaza ukuhlonishwa kwabadayisa ngomzimba

text: UGAXWE ithayi entanyeni wangqongqiswa owesilisa obesolwa ngokudlwengula alengise ngothayi umfundi kaGrade 12 eMacekane, eMpangeni, kuleli sonto.Lo mphakathi obudinwe uthelwa ngamanzi, kuthiwa uqale watitinya kanzima lo msolwa (22), obizwe ngoLindo Mthembu, ngaphambi kokuthi agaxwe ithayi ashiswe ngoLwesine ebusuku.Leli phephandaba lithole ngemithombo yalo ukuthi uMthembu ubanjwe ngamalungu omphakathi engazelele emgwaqweni endaweni yaseMatshana khona eMpangeni ase emqhuba amphindisela eMacekane.NgoLwesine Isolezwe libike ngokutholakala kwesidumbu sikaSiphelele Mbatha (19) obefunda eQhamuka High School, okusolwa ukuthi uMthembu umdlwengule wamklinyela ehlathini elibuqamama nakubo.Intukuthelo yomphakathi igqame ezithombeni ezithunyelwe lapho umufi evela ethungeleke ngomlilo, nakwi-video lapho kukhona abamemezayo bethi akaqotshwe abe yizicucu.Ngokusho kwekhansela likaMasipala waseMhlathuze ku-Ward 31, uMnuz Sipho Ntombela, umsolwa kuthiwa ubengabonwa nangokhalo eMacekane selokhu isidumbu sikaNksz Mbatha satholakala ngoLwesibili.“Ngifike endaweni yesigameko kanye namaphoyisa. Umufi ubesevele eshonile.“Ngizwe khona lapho ke ukuthi selokhu intombazane yakwaMbatha yabulawa, umphakathi ubumatasa wenza olwawo uphenyo.“Awugcinanga lapho kodwa kuthiwa uphume inqina kusuka ngoLwesibili wayomfuna lo mlisa osolwayo. Uthe ungamthola wase umbuyisela la enze khona icala,” kusho uNtombela.Eqhuba uthe libi icala uMthembu abesolwa ngalo kodwa umphakathi bekungamele uzibambele umthetho ngezandla.“Muhle umsebenzi wokuthi bamtholile. Bese kufanele bamnikele emaphoyiseni ukuze ashushiswe, agwetshwe ngesenzo sakhe.“Njengomholi womphakathi angilugqugquzeli udlame olwenzekile. Ngiyaqonda ukuthi umphakathi uphakanyelwe umoya ngokubulawa ngesihluku kwentombazanyana emsulwa,” kusho uNtombela.Embikweni weSolezwe, kuvele ukuthi uSiphelele unyamalale ngoMsombuluko endleleni egodukayo ephuma esikoleni.Ngesikhathi isidumbu sakhe sitholwa, kuthiwa wayehilelwe ngothayi wakhe womfaniswano wesikole kanye nomunye uthayi wesikole esiwumakhelwane.Kuthiwa eduze kwakhe kwakukhona ophaqa bomfana owaziwayo ofunda uGrade 9 kulesi sikole esiwumakhelwane.Okuvela manje ngemithombo ukuthi lo mfana obekunguyena oqale wasoleka kugcine kuhlaluka ukuthi uyisihlobo sikaMthembu, kanti nalezi zimpahla zakhe zazihambe naye uMthembu ngalelo langa lesigameko.Ethintwa ngalolu daba uMnuz Sizwe Mbatha (31), ongumfowabo kaSiphelele, uthe ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma ngoba usematasa ngamalungiselelo omngcwabo.Imizamo yokuthola izihlobo zikaMthembu ayiphumelelanga.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, u-Colonel Thembeka Mbhele, ukuqinisekisile ukubulawa kwaleli bhungu.“Amaphoyisa aseMpangeni aphenya icala lokubulala. Asikakwazi okuholele kulesi sigameko kodwa uphenyo luyaqhubeka,” kusho uMbhele.
title: Ugaxwe ithayi wangqongqiswa osolwa ngokudlwengula

text: KUKHALWA nxa zonke ngomholi weNFP obesanda kushadelwa oshone engozini yemoto nozwakwabo ababili oPhongolo.UMnuz Mduduzi Xaba (44), obenguSihlalo weNFP oKhukho, oLundi, kuthiwa uhlangabezane nengozi esendleleni esuka emsebenzini oPhongolo eya ekhaya oLundi ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.Ubesebenza kuMasipala waseZululand.Kuthiwa imoto abehamba ngayo ishayisene nebhasi.Umufi uvelelwe yingozi kuzoba nomngcwabo kaninakhulu ngoMgqibelo ngempelasonto. Emasontweni amabili bekugcwatshwa uyise.Kuthiwa ngoJune 28 nonyaka ubeshadelwa.Umndeni nabeqembu bathe bafe olwembiza ngokufa kwakhe.Udadewabo kamufi, uNksz Sicholo Xaba, uthe baphithene amakhanda ngokudlula komfowabo.“Siphithene amakhanda impela ngokwenzekile ngoba bekuwumuntu obesuka emsebenzini simlindile ukuba afike ekhaya. Simangele sekuthiwa wehlelwe yingozi nabanye okuthiwa ubesebenza nabo. Asikayi ngisho nalapho kwenzeke khona ingozi,” kusho uNksz Xaba.Umufi kuthiwa ushiye inkosikazi yakhe nezingane eziyisishiyagalolunye.UMnuz Siphamandla Ntombela, weNFP uthe: “Ubuholi beNFP buzohambela umndeni wakwaXaba oKhukho, oLundi, kusasa (namhlanje) ukuyohlanganisa amehlo nokuzwa amalungiselelo omngcwabo.”Uthe umufi ubesondelene nomholi weNFP, uNkk Zanele Magwaza Msibi.“UXaba akayijoyinanga iNFP kodwa wayekhona kusungulwa i-friends of VZ, waba khona futhi kusungulwa kweNFP,” kusho uNtombela.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt-Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe kuphenywa amacala amathathu okubulala ngokungenhloso.Awatholakalanga izolo amagama ababili abebehamba nomufi.
title: Umholi weNFPushone engozini yemoto

text: UMBUZO: Umyeni wami udlule emhlabeni ngonyaka odlule wangishiya nabantwana ababili. Ngisanda kuthola ukuthi ubenomunye umntwana ngaphandle ayengifihlele yena. Angazi ngempela ukuthi kumele ngenzenjani ngale ndaba. Uma ngiyicabanga ivele ingicasule kakhulu ngoba angikaze ngizitshele ukuthi wayengenza into enje. Ngivele ngifikelwe oukucasuka uma ngicabanga ngabantwana bami osekumele ngiphazamise impilo yabo ngibazise ukuthi banomfowabo abebengamazi yonke le minyaka.Ngabe ngenza iphutha uma ngivele ngizivalela umlomo wami ngingatsheli muntu ngale ngane yomyeni wami yangaphandle?Igama ligodliweImpendulo:Siyazwelana nawe kodwa ngeke kukusize ukuyifihla le ndaba ngoba iyogcina ivelile. Abantwana bakho bayosola wena ngoba bayothola ukuthi ubuyazi indaba sonke lesi sikhathi. . Kuhle ukuthi abantwana bakho bakhule bazana nowakubo. Sibona kungcono uhlanganise imindeni uyazise ukuze nabo bazi ukuthi umyeni wakho ushiye umntwana obungamazi. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wazise nabantwana bakho ukuze bakhule bazana nomntwana wakubo. Angangahlala nani kodwa anganivakashela ngamaholide ukuze abantwana bakhule bazana ukuthi bangabandawonye.Umbuzo:Nginenkinga kankosikazi ohleze ebalisa ngayo yonke into. Ayikho into ehamba kahle emehlweni akhe. Uma engabalisi ngomsebenzi wakhe, ubalisa ngezinto esinazo noma esingenazo emshadweni wethu. Akukho nje akubona kuhamba kahle ngomshado wethu ngokubona kwakhe. Uhleze esiqhathanisa nabanye abantu okuyinto esiqala ukungikhathaza ngoba ubengenjena sisanda kushada.Besiziphilela kamnandi yonke le minyaka, yintsha le nto yakhe. Besingakhathazwa nhlobo yizinto ezenzeka ngaphandle. Manje angisazi ukuthi sekushintshephi. Akusemnandi nhlobo emshadweni wethu ngenxa yalokhu. Ngenzenjani ukuze isimo sibuyele endleleni esasiyiyo ekuqaleni?Mondli, eNewlandsImpendulo:Kuyenzeka empilweni ufikelwe isikhathi lapho ubona sengathi kukhona okushodayo empilweni yakho. Esikhathini esiningi kwenzeka uma usufinyelele kuzo zonke izinto obuzibekele zona empilweni lapho usuke usudinga izinselelo ezintsha empilweni. Kuhle ukuthi nike nibhekisise amaphupho enu njengomndeni ke nibuke ukuthi nikuphi ngempela.Ngabe senifikile ezintweni enanizibekele zona njengomndeni? Uma kwenzeka ukuthi senifikile, zinikeni inselelo entsha. Kusobala ukuthi unkosikazi wakho udinga enye inselelo, into ezomenza ukuthi uma evuka ekuseni asebenzele phezu kwayo. Vuselelani izinto enanikade nizifisa, nisebenzele phezu kwazo ukuze ningabi nesikhathi sokubheka ukuthi kwenziwani kweminye imizi.Umbuzo:Umyeni wami ulahlekelwe umsebenzi ezinyangeni eziyisithupha ezedlule. Wathola yonke imali yakhe emsebenzini kodwa wayihlaphaza yonke wangakhokhela nesisodwa isikweletu sakhe noma esiqondene nekhaya lethu. Manje akanawo ngisho uzuka lo.Usecela kimina imali ekubeni imina manje osebhekene nazo zonke izidingo zasendlini kanti nami angisebenzi into etheni. Ngiyabazi ubunzima bokuzama ukuthola omunye umsebenzi ungawutholi kodwa nami sengiyasindwa manje ukuthwala ikhaya ngingedwa. Izinto azisafani ngempela phakathi kwethu. Sesihleze sixabanela imali into ebingakaze ibe yinkinga phakathi kwethu. Ngiyamthanda kakhulu umyeni wami kodwa ngifuna ukwazi ukuthi ngimbekezelela kanjani umuntu olahlekelwe umsebenzi ikakhulukazi umuntu owasaphaza yonke imali kodwa manje usefuna mina ngithwale ikhaya. Siyokwazi kodwa ukudlula kulesi simo ngelinye ilanga?Joyce, eThekwiniImpendulo:Siyazwelana nawe sisi. Ukulahlekelwa umsebenzi kunzima kakhulu kulezi zinsuku ngoba umsebenzi awusatholakali kalula. Umyeni wakho wenza elikhulu iphutha ngokuthi uma eseyitholile imali angasizi ngezinto zasekhaya ngoba ngabe umthwalo wakho uthe ukuba lula ngoba kukhona izikweletu asezivalile emva kokuthola imali. Kuhle umyeni wakho ake abheke ezinye izindlela zokwenza imali ngaphandle kokuqashwa. Iziphi izinto azithandayo noma aphiwe kuzona? Akazame ukwenza imali ngalezo zinto ukuze akwazi ukukubambisa ekhaya. Kunabantu abalahlekelwa umsebenzi kodwa manje sebengabaqashi babanye abantu. Kuningi angakwenza esalindele ukuqashwa.Akukho ongakwenza ngaphandle kokumeseka umyeni wakho. Amukho omunye ongakwenza loku ngaphandle kwakho.Yebo kunzima ukuthwala ikhaya uwedwa kodwa emshadweni wafungela ukuthi uyoba naye kukuhle noma kukubi. Manje ususesimeni lapho ekumele uzimele izifungo zakho. Sinifisela inhlanhla!
title: [Ezothando] Akusemnandi emshadweni ngenxa yomkami obalisayo

text: KUBOSHWE  abesifazane ababili baseSteadville, eMnambithi, emuva kokutholakala kombungu ugqitshwe ethuneni elingashoni phambi komnyango wendlu egcekeni lomuzi.Abesifazane bakhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngesonto eledlule emuva kokuthi omunye wabo obekhulelwe, ebonakale engasenaso isisu kodwa ingane ingabonwa futhi.Kuthiwa abomndeni wakhe bamhlalise phansi bamfaka imibuzo, wankwankwaza, base bebiza amaphoyisa. Umthombo uthi amaphoyisa awachithanga sikhathi afika aqala uphenyo lwawo olusheshe lwamphenya izinqe umnikazi wombungu nomunye wesifazane okuthiwa unesandla odabeni.“Yiwona-ke amaphoyisa amhlanzise iqiniso ngoba amphose imibuzo wagcina ehlambuluka ukuthi uyizalile ingane wayigqiba ethuneni elingashoni,’’ kusho umthomboKuthiwa amalungu omphakathi abethukuthele eveva abememeza unina wengane ngesikhathi evalelwa evenini ethi akabolele ejele, awamfuni nokumbona.Kuthiwa ithuna elingashoni beliphambi kwenye yezindlu khona egcekeni.Kuvele nokuthi kube yisimo esinyantisa igazi ngesikhathi amaphoyisa esevukuza ekhipha umbungu umbozwe ngengubo ethuneni.Kukhale ubumayemaye besililo samalungu omphakathi ecela amaphoyisa ukuba ahlenge umphefumulo wengane engenacala nokho kwacaca ukuthi bese konakele.Umthombo uthi kuzohlolwa isidumbu ukuqinisekisa imbangela yokufa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe babophe abesifazane ababili abathintekayo esigamekweni.“Baboshelwe icala lokufihla ukukhulelwa emuva kokuthi kutholakale umbungu ugqitshwe ethuneni elingashoni. Uphenyo lwethu luyaqhubeka lwenziwa ngamaphoyisa aseMnambithi,’’ kusho uCaptain GwalaKwenzeka lesi sigameko nje Isolezwe ngeSonto libike ngokuboshwa kowesifazane osolwa ngokosa usana lwakhe eMtiwaneskop khona eMnambithi ngesonto eledule.
title: Kuboshwe abesifazane ababili abagqibe umbungu egcekeni

text: INHLOKO yenkulisa ye-Orlando Pirates, u-Agusto Palacios, itusa usihlalo, u-Irvin “Iron Duke” Khoza ngokusayinisa ukhilumu wabadlali abafanele ukugqoka ijezi leZimnyama.Ekuqaleni kwesonto iPirates imemezee abadlali abasha abayisishiyagalolunye okunguVincent Pule, Meshack Maphangule, Paseka Mako, Linda Mntambo, Abel Mabaso, Brilliant Khuzwayo, Kudakwashe Mahachi, Asavela Mbekile noBen Motshwari.Kumasizini ambalwa adlule uKhoza ubegxekwa ngabalandeli, bemsola ngokungalikhathaleli iqembu. Ngesizini ka-2016/2017, iPirates ishintshe abaqeqeshi, yagcina iqede ngaphandle kweTop 8 emuva kokuwina imidlalo eyisithupha isizini yonke. Ekuqaleni kwesizini ka-2017/2018, uKhoza ushintshe ukwenza ebuyisa uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, wamqashela iphini uRulani Mokwena obekwiMamelodi Sundowns.“Ngihlala ngisho ukuthi usihlalo uyalwazi uhlobo lwabadlali iqembu eliludingayo. Lokho ukukhombisile ngesizini edlule ngesikhathi kufika uMicho noRulani. Uyabona iminyaka yabadlali abasayinisile, ngeke badlale amasizini amathathu noma amane kuphela.Ngikholwa wukuthi iqembu lenze kahle ngesizini edlule, sekufanele liqhubeke lapho. Okubalulekile manje wukuthi ubani omsayinisayo. Yikho iPirates ihlala ithule, ingabangi umsindo ngokuthi yimuphi umdlali emfunayo. Kuhlale kuqagela abezindaba. Sithole abadlali abahle uma kuhlaselwa. Sivele sinoLyle Foster manje sekufike uMahachi. Ngijabule kakhulu ngendlela iqembu elisayinise ngayo. Sengimaze iminyaka engu-24 u-Irvin, ngiyazi indlela enza ngayo izinto. IPirates iya kwiCAF Champions League okusho ukuthi kufanele iqembu liqine nhlangothi zonke. Ngicabanga ukuthiisizini ka-2018/2019 iyathembisa,” kusho uPalacios.Nakuba iPirates ibukeka izoqina kakhulu ngesizini ezayo kodwa kuhlale kuyisilonda kwabaningi ukuthi abadlali basenkulisa abanyuselwa esikimini esikhulu.Ukuvuna izithelo ngenkulisa, iPirates yagcina ngoGift Leremi, Senzo Meyiwa, Joseph Makhanya, Bennedict Vilakazi, Lebohang Mokoena nabanye.Iqembu lePirates lika-Under 19 eliqeqeshwa nguPhilani Kubheka, linyukele kwi-ABC Motsepe League emuva kokudla umhlanganiso kwi-SAB League eGauteng.“Okubalulekile wukukholelwa kubadlali nokunyusa ukuzethemba kubona. Ngiyazi ukuthi abadlali bazokwenza kahle. Angikhathazekile ngokuthi abekho abadlali abasuka enkulisa abanyusiwe. Nyakenye besinoFoster manje kukhona uMbulu (Siphumelele) oyibamba esiswini odlale emdlalweni wokugcina wesizini.Kufanele abadlali ubanyusele esikimini esikhulu uma sekufike isikhathi. Awufuni ukumnyusela ukuthi ayohlala ebhentshini,” kusho uPalacios.
title: UKhoza ushiye uPalacios encamile

text: AKUBUZWA ukuthi umdlalo wamasemifinal ozodonsa amehlo eningi ngowamaqembu aseke aba ngompetha balo mqhudelwano, iMamelodi Sundowns neBidvest Wits kodwa lapho kuzoqopheka khona umlando kusemdlalweni weBaroka FC neBloemfontein Celtic.Womabili la maqembu azonqwama kwi-semifinal yokuqala e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto ngo-2 ntambama, ngaphambi koweWits neSundowns ngo-7 ebusuku, awakaze adlale kowamanqamu eNedbank Cup.Lokhu kusho ukuthi iqembu elilodwa phakathi kwabo lizongena emlandweni wokudlala okokuqala kowamanqamu alo mqhudelwano.Phakathi kwala maqembu yiBaroka egcinile ukudla isicoco iguqisa i-Orlando Pirates kowamanqamu eTelkom Knockout ngo-2018.ICeltic nayo ike yayinqoba iTelkom iguqisa iSundowns eThekwini ngo-2012.Iphindile iCeltic yangena kowamanqamu eTelkom ngo-2017 kodwa yaguqiswa yiWits nayo eThekwini.IBaroka idlulele kuma semifinal iguqisa omkhaya bayo, iBlack Leopards ePeter Mokaba Stadium ngoMashi.ICeltic yona ithwale kanzima ukuze idlule kwiTS Sporting edlala kwiGladAfrica Championship, inqoba ngo 2-1 emaphenathini ngemuva kokubambana ngo 1-1 Kanyamazane Stadium, eMpumalanga.ICletic iya kulo mdlalo isiphazamisekile ngemuva kokushiywa isgubhukane ngumqeqeshi wayo ebimuzwa kahle, uLehlogonolo Seema, ovumbuke kwiChippa United.Esihlalweni asishiye kwiCletic uSeema, kubekwe owayengukaputeni walo iqembu laseBloemfontein, uJohn Maduka.Ngaphansi kukaSeema iCeltic ibidlala ibhola elihle futhi iyithola nemiphumela encomekayo yize bekunesikhalo esingapheli ngokutenga komnotho kuleliya qembu.IBaroka ayisilo iqembu elidala kunobhuthsuzwayo waseNingizimu Afrika kodwa selokhu yafika yazakhela udumo lokuba ngufishi omncane odla abakhulu.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi idume ngayo iNedbank Cup inquma izinkunzi zaseSoweto, iKaizer Chiefs neMoroka Swallows eminyakeni engu-10 eyedlule.Ngaleso sikhathi ibisadlala kwi2nd Division esiyaziwa manje ngokuthi yi-ABC Motsepe League.Akuthathanga sikhathi ukuthi idlulele kwi1st Division njengoba isibhukuda nezingwenya kwiPremiership.
title: IBaroka neCeltic ethubeni lomlando kwiNedbank Cup

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele ngithi ake ngithathe leli thuba ngibeke umbono wami ngobuholi be-ANC eKZN, ikakhulukazi eThekwini.UKhongolose mkhulu awubambeki, ikakhulukazi eThekwini, Mzimkhulu, Newcastle naseSikhaleni. Ngingabala kushone ilanga kodwa indlela esehle ngayo isibalo samavoti siyadumaza. Kuyacaca ukuthi abantu sebelahlekelwe yithemba kuKhongolose bafudukela kwi-IFP nakwi-EFF amaqembu akhula ngamandla. Phela awakaze athinteke enkohlakalweni futhi awakaze agqame nakwiKhomishani kaMoerane eyayigxile ekubulaweni kosopolitiki. Kawathinteki futhi nakwiKhomishini kaZondo. Kanti kwenzenjani kuKhongolse? Lo mona ongaka?Abekho abaholi abazi ijele ukudlula abaholi bakaKhongolose - bayeba bayabulala. Sekwanele phela manje, ake senzele uLuthuli noMandela amaqabane ayelwela umzabalazo osuzomuka ngenxa yomona.Sengiphetha ngiyafisa ubuholi obuphezulu baseThekwini obuhlowa ngubaba uZikalala ke buhoxise umama uGumede bebambise uNomusa Dube-Ncube ngoba njengoba esehhovisi nje uzophazamisa uphenyo. Akwenziwe njengoba kwenziwa kuNdobe, kungakhethwa iphela emasini.Freeman Sifundo Manyonienseleni
title: [IMIBONO] Abantu sebephelelwa yithemba kuKhongolose ngenxa yomona

text: INHLANGANO yokhetho kuleli i-IEC ithi iyasithokozela isinqumo seNkantolo yezoKhetho sokuhlehlisa izinhlelo zokhetho lokuchibiyela obekufanele lubanjwe ezindaweni ezahlukene. I-IEC ithumele isitatimende sabezindaba ngoLwesibili ichaza ukuthi ukubheduka kwegciwane iCorona (Covid-19) kwenze kwaphoqeleka ukuba kuhlehle izinhlelo zokhetho. Isitatimende sithi inkantolo ikhombe uJuni 3 no-10 njengezinsuku okungase kuqhutshekwe ngazo nezinhlelo zokhetho. Kuvela nokuthi ukhetho bekufanele lubanjwe ezinsukwini ezingu-90 lapho kuvalwa khona izikhala zamakhansela kodwa akuvumelekile ukuthi lubanjwe emuva kwezinsuku ezingu-120, emuva kokuphuma kwesinqumo senkantolo.Ngenxa yale micilikishi kuzophoqeleka ukuthi ikhalenda lokhetho libuyekezwe kabusha ukuze kuqondanisiwe kahle konke. Inkantolo iphinde yanika i-IEC igunya lokuthi ibuyele kuyo izofaka isicelo sokuhlehlisa uma kunesidingo. Izifundazwe ebezilinde ukuba nokhetho komasipala bazo yi-Eastern Cape , North West , KwaZulu-Natal ,Gauteng naseWestern Cape. E-Eastern Cape bekuzokhethwa kuMasipala iWalter Sisulu , uMzimvubu ne-Amahahlathi. INorth West ibizoba nokhetho komasipala iRusternburg neJB Marks. KwaZulu-Natal bekuzokhethwa koMasipala oPhongolo naseRay Nkonyeni kanti eWestern Cape bekuzoba eDrankenstein
title: ICorona iphazamise ukhetho lokuchibiyela

text: ISOUTH African Football Association (Safa) ayiphumeli obala ngekusasa lika-Owen Da Gama okhwele wadilika kule nhlangano eyisola ngokungamhloniphi.Ngesonto eledlule iSafa imemezele uStuart Baxter njengomqeqeshi omusha weqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana. UBaxter ocija iSuperSport United edlala ku-Absa Premiership uzovala indawo ka-Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba oxoshwe ekupheleni konyaka odlule.Kuthintwa uDominic Chimhavi wezokuxhumana kuSafa ngezinhlelo zomqeqeshi omusha uvele wangena ezintangeni.“Umqeqeshi omusha sihlele ukumethula kwabezindaba ngasekupheleni kwesonto. UDa Gama uyiphini labaqeqeshi kwelesizwe futhi isikhundla sakhe sisami kanjalo. Akukho okushintshile,” kusho uChimhavi.UDa Gama usole iSafa ngokumbukela phansi ngesikhathi ethintwa yileli phephandaba izolo.“Ngisebumnyameni ngekusasa lami. Angazi nami ukuthi kwenzekani. Indaba yomqeqeshi omusha nami ngiyibone sengiyifunda ephepheni. Ngeke ngisho ukuthi ngimi kuphi. Ngikhulumile nesikhulu esiphezulu kuSafa uDennis Mumble wathi uzobuyela kimina. Kuze kube yimanje ubengakaze abuyele kimina. Ngidumele ngesenzo seSafa. Kubuhlungu ukuthi ngemuva kwakho konke esengikwenzele iqembu lesizwe bese bengiphatha ngale ndlela. Ngifake iqembu lesizwe lika-Under 23 kuma-Olympic Games ngemuva kweminyaka engu-16 lihluleka wukudlala kulo mqhudelwano. Ngiphinde ngaba yiphini leqembu likaShakes Mashaba elenze kahle lingena ku-Africa Cup of Nations ngo-2015. Sidlala neBurkina Faso kwakuhlezi mina noShakes ebhentshini,” kubalisa uDa Gama.Lo mqeqeshi unenkontileka ephela ngonyaka ozayo neSafa. Ufike kwelesizwe ngesikhathi kuqashwa uMashaba.“Mina belingindele ukuthi iSafa ingithinte ingazise ukuthi isimtholile umqeqeshi omusha nokuthi kuzokwenzekani. Ngikhathazekile ngekusasa lami ngeke ngiqambe amanga. Akekho umqeqeshi ongajabulela ukusebenza ngaphansi kwalezi zimo. Kuzokwenzekani uma uBaxter ethi ufuna ithimba lakhe elisha labaqeqeshi? Kumele baphumele obala ngokuthi uhlelo lokusebenza kwabaqeqeshi luzoqhubeka yini. Phela amaqembu esizwe amancane enza kahle wonke. Ngiyezwa kuthiwa angizange ngisifake isicelo sokucija iBafana. Ngangizosifaka kanjani singazange sikhishelwe esidlangalaleni? Kwathiwa sizokhishwa kodwa lokho kwangenzeka ngemuva kwalokho kwathiwa ngiphumele obala sekuhambe isikhathi,” kusho uDa Gama.Ngenyanga ezayo iBafana izodudulana neNigeria emdlalweni wokuhlungela ukuzibekisela indawo kwi-Afcon eseCameroon ngo-2019. Ngemuva kwalokho iBafana izodlala imidlalo yokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba eseRussia ngonyaka ozayo.
title: Usola iSafa ngokungamhloniphi

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ubeyokotha iSilo samaBandla uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu ngoLwesibili, eyosibeka esithombeni ngokwenzeka emnyangweni wakhe.UMshengu obephelezelwa yiNhloko yoMnyango, uDkt Enock Nzama, ubevakashele esigodlweni seSilo Osuthu, KwaNongoma.Esitatimendeni esikhiswe umnyango kwabezindaba, kuvela ukuthi ukuvakasha kukaMshengu bekuwukuyokotha iSilo nokukhuluma ngezithinta ezemfundo.“INgonyama ingushampeni kwezemfundo esifundazweni futhi isebenzisana kahle nomnyango ukuqhakambisa isiko lokufundisa nokufunda,” kusho isitatimende.Bekungokokuqala ukuthi ungqongqoshe ayokotha iSilo esigodlweni saso selokhu eqokelwe kulesi sikhundla.Ungqongqoshe usanda kuncoma iSilo komunye umcimbi wokwethulwa kwesichazamazwi samabanga aphansi eThekwini ngenyanga edlule.Uncome iSilo ngokukhathalela ezemfundo kulesi sifundazwe, wazibophezela nokuthi bazimisele ukuqhubeka nokusizana naso kuzo zonke izinhlelo kwezemfundo.Kulo mcimbi iSilo sikhuthaze ukufundwa kwezincwadi nangokufundiswa kwezingane ngolimi lwazo.UMshengu wagcizelela kuBayede ukuthi bazoqhubeka nokuqhakambisa ukufundwa kwezincwadi zolimi lwebele emikhankasweni yabo kwezemfundo.
title: Ungqongqoshe ubeyokotha iSilo Osuthu

text: KUSAMILE ukufunda ekolishi eliqeqesha ngamakhono eGroutville emuva kokuba sekuphele izinsuku izitshudeni zilala emakilasini ngoba zingakhokhelwe imali yokuqasha izindawo zokuhlala. Izitshudeni zize zakhishwa ngamaphoyisa ekolishi ngoLwesihlanu.Izitshudeni zaseMfolozi TVET College zicasulwe wukuthi sezibekezele isikhathi eside zingayitholi imali yokukhokhela izindawo zokuhlala ekhishwa yisikhwama iNational Students Financial Aid Scheme (Nsfas). Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ngoMsombuluko odlule bafike emakilasini nezimpahla nezingubo zokulala ngoba abanye sebexoshiwe emiqashweni abebehlala kuyo ngenxa yokungakhokhi. Ukulala kwabo emakilasini kuphazamise nokufunda njengoba kuthiwa othisha bagcine bengasafiki yavalwa ikolishi.Okhulumela isigungu sezitshudeni, uMbali Nxumalo, uthe bagcina ukufunda ngoMsombuluko odlule.“Izitshudeni bezilokhu zibekezele kodwa inkinga iqale sezixoshwa ezindaweni zokuhlala ebeziqashe kuzona. Inselelo enkulu wukuthi zihlala ezindaweni ezikude futhi zizidinga ngempela izindawo zokuhlala. Kumanje ezinye zimpintshiswe abanezindawo zokuhlala, ezinye zaphindela emakhaya,” kusho yena.Uthe izitshudeni azihlangene nokuphazamiseka kokufunda ngoba ukulala kwazo bekungaphazamisi. Uveze ukuthi bamangele uma othisha nabahlanza amakilasi bengasafiki. Bagcina ukulala ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokukhishwa ngamaphoyisa. Kuthiwa le nkinga isiphazamise nezitshudeni ezifunda ngasese njengoba othisha bengasafundisi. Zilinganiselwa ku-80 izitshudeni okuthiwa zithintekile kulolu daba.UMnuz Sam Zungu, ophethe wonke amakhempasi eMfolozi, uthe kuzocaca ngoLwesithathu ukuthi sizovulwa nini isikhungo. Uphikile ukuthi izitshudeni ziqale ukulala emakilasini ngoMsombuluko wathi ziqale ngoLwesithathu.“Okumele sikucacise wukuthi asikwazi ukulawula uhlelo lokukhipha imali yezitshudeni kwaNsfas. Izitshudeni zizifakela izicelo ngqo kwaNsfas thina sithole uhla lwabazoxhaswa emuva kwesikhathi. Inkinga iqale ngokuthi kufike uhla lwamagama abazoxhaswa uNsfas ngesikhathi izitshudeni zisemaholidini ePhasika ngo-Ephreli 4. Bekumele ziqale ukufunda ngoMsombuluko odlule, ngenxa yokuhluleka ukubekezela zacasuka. Besisalindele ukuhlaziya uhla bese siluphindisela kwaNsfas ukuqinisekisa abazoxhaswa,” kusho uZungu.Ekhuluma nephephandaba uMnuz Kagisho Mamabolo okhulumela abakwaNsfas uthe ziyaqhubeka izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa izitshudeni ezizoxhaswa bacela zibekezele.
title: Kusamile ukufunda kwelicija ngamakhono

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEIKAIZER CHIEFS izigwazele ibhece kwiMamelodi Sundowns iyitalabha ngo 4-1 emdlalweni weDStv Diski Challenge eJohannesburg Stadium, eGoli izolo ntambama.Amagoli aweze ngelibanzi iChiefs, abekwe enethini nguKamohelo Hoala oshaye amathathu ngomzuzu ka-11, 41 noka-43 nelikaTshepo Mohlala elingene ngoka-81.Ukunqoba kwesikwati seChiefs esiqeqeshwa ngu-Arthur “10111” Zwane, kusenze saqhubeka nokuhlala phezulu esicongweni se-log kaGroup B kwiDiski Challenge, ngamaphuzu angu-12 emidlalweni emihlanu. Lokhu sekwenze yabukeka ikhanya indlela yaso yokuyodlala emidlalweni eyandulela owamanqamu.Iqembu elizoqeda phezulu kumaqoqo amabili eDiski nelesibili yiwona azodlulela kweyandulela owamanqamu. Lo mdlalo uqale ngegiya eliphezulu njengoba womabili amaqembu abehlaselana engakhombisi ukwesabana. Ngomzuzu ka-11 ukaputeni waMakhosi uSabelo, uqhamuke nomnyakazo omuhle, ethumela ibhola elide phambili lahlangana noHoala ongacucuzanga ukulibeka enethini engasabonwa ezintini uGlen Baadjies ovimbela amaBrazilians, acijwa nguSurprise Moriri.Ngemuva kwegoli leChiefs, nabafana beDowns baqalile ukuziqoqa njengoba besebehlasela bephindelela emapalini eChiefs abegadwe nguBontle Molefe.Akumangalisanga ukuthola kweSundowns igoli lokulinganisa ngomzuzu ka-19 elishaywe ngu-Ofentse Mashiane obethole ibhola eliyikhona ebithathwe nguThando Buthelezi.Ngemuva kokuthola igoli lokulinganisa, abafana bamaBrazilians kube sengathi bathelwe ngezibonkolo njengoba bebelokhu bengqongqoze njalo emnyango wabafana beziMpofana.Ngomzuzu ka-26 noka-28, uMolefe weChiefs usebenze umsebenzi omkhulu evimba amabhola amabili abethunyelwe kuye nguButhelezi weSundowns.Ngemuva kwalokhu iChiefs ibuye nayo yaqala ukuhlangana. Ngomzuzu ka-41 ithole igoli lesibili ngonyawo lukaHoala obethole ibhola ebelivela kuMthokozisi Balakazi.Ngomzuzu ka-43 ubuyile futhi umthakathi wezindaba uHoala wabeka elesithathu enethini. Esiwombeni sesibili abafana beSundowns bazamile ukuvuka bazithintithe kodwa kwala kona ukuthi udonga lwasemuva lweChiefs obeluholwa nguJordan Sampson ngokubambisana no-Aden McCarthy, belungafuni lutho oluzothinta unozinti walo.Ngomzuzu ka-78, amaBrazilians abeneshwa ngesikhathi unompempe obephethe umdlalo, uXola Sitela, ekhiphela ngaphandle ngekhadi elibomvu uKarabelo Ramakepa ngemuva kokudlalisa kabi uTshepo Mohlala weChiefs.Ngomzuzu ka-81 uMohlala ushayele iChiefs igoli lokuvala inkundla ngemuva komnyakazo omuhle obuqhamuke noHoala ogcine eqokwe njengomdlali wosuku.Imiphumela yeDStv Diski Challenge:Bloemfontein Celtic 2-0 Tshakuma, Orlando Pirates 2-3 Swallows, SuperSport United 4-3 Maritzburg United, Baroka FC 1-2 Black Leopards, TS Galaxy 0-0 AmaZulu FC, Lamontville Golden Arrows 4-2 Stellenbosch FC, Cape Town City 2-0 Chippa United, Kaizer Chiefs 4-1 Mamelodi Sundowns.
title: IChiefs encane ivulele umpetshisi kwiSundowns

text: UZOGUGELA ejele owesilisa ogwetshwe udilikajele ngecala lokudlwengula umshana wakhe wentombazane owayena-10 emaflethini aseCornubia, ngaseVerulam ngoMeyi 2019.Le ndoda eneminyaka engu-37, elingeke lidalulwe igama layo ngenhloso yokuvikela umgilwa, igwetshwe yiNkantolo yesiFunda eVerulam.Kuthiwa yakhoseliswa ilo mndeni ngemuva kokukhululwa ejele ngemuva kokudonsa iminyaka ngecala lokugqekeza nokweba.Ngosuku lwesehlo, kuthiwa le ndoda yabuya ebusuku idakiwe kulo muzi oyiflethi yaqonda esitezi lapho kwakulele khona umgilwa nodadewabo, yafike yamnukubeza. Kuthiwa yaphuma yahamba emuva kwalesi sehlo.Uyise wengane kuthiwa wayelele ekamelweni elingezansi, waze wabikelwa ekuseni benogogo wengane ngalesi sehlo.Okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Kara, uthe bayasamukela isigwebo esinikwe umsolwa.UNkk Kara uthe umsolwa wavele waya emaphoyiseni eyofuna amkhoselise esezwile ukuthi umphakathi owawuwotha ubomvu, wawufuna ukumudla luhlaza.UNkk Kara uthe amaphoyisa avele ambopha ngemuva kokuthola ukuthi uyena owayesolakala.“Ingane yathunyelwa esibhedlela iyokwelashwa yalulekwa nangokomqondo. Enkantolo umsolwa ubelokhu eliphika icala, waze walanda umuntu athi wayehlezi naye ngesikhathi okusolakala ukuthi wanukubeza ngaso umgilwa,” kusho uNkk Kara.Kodwa ubufakazi bengane obuqandula ikhanda, bamgojela umsolwa. Kuvele nokuthi ngobusuku besigameko, umsolwa wabashiya ayehlezi nabo isikhashana, wabuye wabuya.
title: Ugixabezwe udilikajele owadlwengula umshana

text: ISIKHULU seHighlands Park, uSinky Mnisi, sidinwe siyaveva ngomkhuba esithi mubi wokupotshozwa kwezindaba zeqembu ogcina ubaveza bengabantu abangamahlathi.UMnisi, onamasheya eqenjini, ucasulwe yimibiko eqhamuke ngoLwesibili ethi badedele abadlali abangu-12.Okumkhalisayo wukuthi lezi zindaba ziqhamuke emithonjeni yabezindaba bebe bengakatshelwa bonke abadlali ngesinqumo esesithathiwe. IHighlands idle umhlanganiso ngamalengiso kwiNational First Division ngesizini edlule iqhuba imidlalo engu-19 ingehlulwa ngaphansi kuka-Owen Da Gama.“Yebo, sibadedelile abadlali. Into embi eyenzekile engifuna ukuxolisa ngayo wukuthi bekungafanele abadlali bezwe ngabezindaba ukuthi abekho ezinhlelweni zeqembu. Lokho kwenza sibukeke njengeqembu elingenzi izinto ngendlela eqondile. Kukhona lapha ngaphakathi umuntu obe ukhanda limtshela okwakhe wadedela lezi zindaba, engingazi ukuthi ubethunywe wubani ngoba thina siyiqembu besingakasho ukuthi akwaziswe abezindaba,” kusho uMnisi obezwakala ukuthi iyamcasula eyokuba khona kukaphoshozwayo eqenjini lakhe.Abadlali abaphelelwe umsebenzi kwiLions of the North, uTumisang Mashele, Seun Ledwaba, Elias Monene, Larry Horaeb, Mxolisi Gumede, Ayo Oluwafemi, Mbuyiselo Thathani, Siphelele Luthuli, Pentjie Zulu, Zamuxolo Ngalo no-Edwin Sitayitayi.“Sibadedele ngoba bebengekho ezinhlelweni zomqeqeshi. Ubengabasebenzisi ngesizini edlule ngakho bekusobala ukuthi ngeke bayithole indawo kwiPremiership. Zonke izinqumo esizenzayo sizenza ngokuxhumana nethimba lethu labaqeqeshi. Kusemqoka ukuthi umhloniphe umqeqeshi ukuze iqembu lisebenzisane kahle,” kusho uMnisi.Indaba yabadlali abachithiwe akusiyona kuphela ecasula uMnisi, uzihlangulile ngombiko othi iqembu selisayinise obeyisitobha seMaritzburg United, uBevan Fransman.“Angifuni ukuphawula ngendaba kaBevan ngoba ayiqhamukanga ngathi. Yimenenja yakhe ecashunwe ithi usesayinile nathi. Yebo, ubekhuluma nomqeqeshi kodwa mina njengobhekele izindaba zokuphathwa kweqembu angikayiboni inkontileka yakhe,” kusho uMnisi.Imenenja kaFransman, uSteve Kapeluschnik, icashunwe ithi umdlali usayine inkontileka yeminyaka emibili neHighlands Park.
title: Ucikwe wukuputshuka kwezeqembu

text: Ubekhuluma emcimbini wokucobelelana ngolwazi bezamafilimu iDurban Filmmakers in Conversation endaweni yobumnandi iS43 eMorningside, eThekwini, ngoLwesine ebusuku.Uveze ukuthi kumthathe cishe iminyaka emihlanu ngaphambi kokuthi iphupho lakhe lifezeke.Uthe ufikelwa umunyu uma ebona indlela abantu abawuthakasela ngawo lo mdlalo ngoba uvele acabange ubunzima adlule kubo ngaphambi kokuthi ube yimpumelelo. “Ngiqale ukuqoqa ulwazi ngalo mdlalo ngo-2013/2014 lapho engihambele khona amahostela aseThekwini ngiqoqa ulwazi. Ngangifisa ukuthi kube yifilimu ehlanganisa wonke amahostela aseThekwini,” kusho uMthunzi,Uthe uhambele iziteshi zethelevishini eziningi ehamba ecela uxhaso lalo mdlalo kodwa zonke zamchitha ngenxa yokuswela amava.Uveze ukuthi kwalesi siteshi lo mdlalo osudlala kuso naso samchitha, sathi akathole inkampani enamava angasebenzisana nayo. “Ngo-2016 ngisebenza kuZalo ngaphoqeleka ukuthi ngitshele abakhiqizi boZalo ngeHostela, bachazeka kakhulu. Baqala bangqongqoza eziteshini zethelevishini ezahlukene, zabuya izimpendulo. I-SABC ibe nenkinga yezimali engicabanga ukuthi yingakho singakwazanga ukusebenzisana nawo. Angazi kwenzakalani kwi-e.tv.”Uthe iM-Net yabaphendula ngasekuqaleni kuka-2017 esesebenza emdlalweni we-e.tv Imbewu.Imali uthe yiyo eholele ekutheni lo mdlalo ungagcini usukhombisa wonke amahostela. Ngenxa yocwaningo alwenzile ngalo mdlalo, uthe uyaqonda ukuthi kunezinto okungamele azithinte noma amagama okungamele awabize.Uthe ubone kungcono ukuthi adlale eduze kweqiniso, angacasuli abantu ukuze noma besafuna ukuqhubeka nalo mdlalo bamukeleke ehostela KwaMashu.“Kuveze okubi ufundise abantu kodwa ukuveze nokuhle. Ukhulume ngento esatshwayo abantu kodwa uyenze bayithande. Abantu basehostela bangabantu abagcina sebephoqeleka ukuthi benze okubi ukuze baziphilise,” kusho uMthunzi.Ukhuthaze amaciko asafufusa ukuthi angayeki ukukhwezela umlilo ozovuthisa amaphupho awo.
title: Umsunguli  weHostela  uchaza ngobunzima adlule  kubona ngalo mdlalo

text: AKAZIMISELE ngokuphonsa ithawula ngombango wesicoco se-Absa Premiership u-Ernst Middendorp opheka iKaizer Chiefs.UMiddendorp uthe amathemba akhe ngesicoco ngemuva kokushaya iHighlands Park ngo 3-2 eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngoMgqibelo ebusuku anyukile. Amagoli ashaywe uBernard Parker, Leonardo Castro noDumisani Zuma. Awe-Highlands abekwe uBevan Fransman noLesenya Ramoraka.IChiefs isinamaphuzu awu-32. Isele ngegebe lamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili kwiMamelodi Sundowns enamaphuzu awu-40. ISundowns ilahle amaphuzu ibanjwa ngo 0-0 iBloemfontein Celtic ekhaya emdlalweni wangempelasonto. I-Orlando Pirates igudluze iBidvest Wits endaweni yesibili ihlula iLamontville Golden Arrows ngo 1-0. Izitshudeni ziguqiswe yiCape Town City ngo 3-2.UMiddendorp uthe kusengenzeka noma yini ngesicoco uma bengayeka ukulahla amaphuzu njengoba benzile emidlalweni edlule.“Ngokwezibalo kusengezeka noma yini. Sizowulungiselela ngokuzimisela umdlalo ozayo neMaritzburg United ebe nomdlalo omuhle (ishaya AmaZulu FC). Njengoba ngike ngasho phambilini, uma singayeka ukulahla amaphuzu njengasemidlaweni edlule bese senza ngendlela efanele esisuke sikuhlelile singawathola amaphuzu amathathu noma sidlala nobani. Okuhle nokumnandi ngebhola wukuthi awukwazi ukuqagela okuzokwenzeka,” kusho uMiddendorp.Ukuze kuphenduke amatafula iChiefs idinga ukunqobe yonke imidlalo esele okungayibeka emaphuzwini awu-56 bese wonke amaqembu angenhla kwayo kwi-log wona elahle amaphuzu.UMiddendorp ugcizelele elokuthi yize esalakha iqembu kodwa asikho isikhathi sokudlala ibhola elihle.“Amaphuzu amathathu yiwona amqoka njengamanje. Angizimisele ngokuthi ngemuva komdlalo ngizochaza ngokuthi sidlale ibhola elihle. Kumele sishintshe indlela esidlala ngayo ngoba esikudingayo ngamaphuzu amathathu futhi yilokho esizozilungiselela khona ngomdlalo ozayo.”Umdlalo wabo ne-United useFNB Stadium ngoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama.ITeam of Choice ilwela ukubalekela izembe njengoba iyibambe emsileni ngamaphuzu awu-17. Ngempelasonto ishaye omakhelwane Amazulu emdlalweni obushubile ophele ngo 2-1.Okunye uMiddendorp azimisele ngakho wukulungisa udonga lwakhe. Sebengenelwa amagoli ayisikhombisa emidlalweni emihlanu edlule yeligi.Ngale kwalo mbango weligi uMiddendorp angaziboni ephumile kuwona, iChiefs isenalo ithuba lokuqeda le sizini nendebe njengoba izodlala neCape Town City kowandulela owamanqamu eNedbank Cup ngasekupheleni kwenyanga.IChiefs yayigcine ngaphansi kukaStuart Baxter ukudla isicoco kumasizini amathathu edlule.
title: OweChiefs akalilahlile ithemba ngesicoco seligi

text: BAZOGCINWA esitokisini abasolwa abayisikhombisa abagasela emzini womuntu eDrummond, ngaseMgungundlovu, maqede bagwaza umnikazi wawo. Uphiko lwamaphoyisa obephenya, izolo eMgungundlovu lubophe laba basolwa abaneminyaka engu-18 kuya ku-34 kulandela ukuthi bangena emzini womlisa (67) eDrummond go-7 ebusuku ngoMeyi 15 bambamba inkunzi. Laba basolwa bangena ngaphakathi kulomuzi bebahlanu behlome ngezibhamu nemmese maqede babophela umgilwa kwelinye lamagumbi okulala.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni saKwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe abasolwa bafuna ngenkani inombolo yasebhange  eyimfihlo  kamgilwa yokukhipha imali ngaphambi kokuthi bamgwaze emzimbeni bephindelela. muva kwalokho kwabe sekukhishwa imali ewu-R7 000 ekhadini lakhe lasebhange eMgungundlovu naseHammersdale. Amaphoyisa abesenza uphenyo olunzulu oluholele ekutheni kuboshwe laba basolwa zatholakala nezinye zezimpahla ezebiwa. "Abasolwa bathatha ithelevishini, ilaptop, amakhadi asebhange nezinye izinto ezibalulekile maqede bahamba. Umgilwa wakwazi ukuziqaqa wabikela amaphoyisa wase ephuthunyiswa esibhedlela ukuyothola usizo. Abasolwa bavelile enkantolo kaMantshi eCamperdown ngecala lokuphanga.
