Bazobuyela ngoJuni  15 ukuze bafake isicelo sebheyili," kusho  uCaptain Gwala. Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa esifundazweni uLieutenant General Khombinkosi Jula uwashayele ihlombe amaphoyisa ngobamba laba basolwa.
title: Bavele namhlanje enkantolo abayisikhombisa ababoshwe eMgungundlovu

text: USEKHULULEKILE ukubheka amadlelo aluhlaza kwelinye iqembu obengumdlali we-Orlando Pirates uMpho Makola, ongomunye wabamataniswa neKaizer Chiefs. IPirates ngoLwesine imemezele ukuthi isivumelene nalo mdlali ukuthi inqanyulwe inkontileka abenayo naleli qembu asehlale kulo amasizini ayisikhombisa.“Sivumelene nomdlali ukuthi kunqanyulwe inkontileka yakhe ngemuva komhlangano naye. Iqembu lifisa ukubonga uMakola ngakwenzele lona, simufisela inhlanhla ngekusasa lakhe” kusho iPirates esitatimendeni esishicilele kwiwebsite yayo. Ngenyanga edlule iPirates ibikuvezile ukuthi uMakola usohlwini lwabadlali abangekho ezinhlelweni zomqeqeshi uMilutin ‘Micho’ Sredojević. UMakola ubesedlale imidlalo engaphezulu kuka-170 kwi-Orlando Pirates kusukela ayijoyina ngo-2012. Uyishayele amagoli awu-21. Ngesizini edlule uMakola udlale imidlalo ewu-13 kuphela yeligi.Ngaphandle kukaMakola, iPirates isidedele abanye abadlali okubalwa kubo uThamsanqa Gabuza, Thabo Matlaba, Gladwin Shitolo, Phetso Maphanga, Diamond Thopola noCaio Marcelo. Khonamanjalo, umgadli weSupersport, uBradley Grobbler useziqinisekisile ezokweshelwa yi-Orlando Pirates.
title: Kuphelile obekuhlanganisa iPirates noMpho Makola

text:
LISAQHUBEKA nokubhebhetheka ngesivinini kuleli igciwane iCovid-19 njengoba izolo uMnyango wezeMpilo uveze ukuthi sesinyukele ku-45 973 isibalo sabantu osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi bahaqwe yileli gciwane kuleli. UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Zweli Mkhize udalule lokhu ngoMgqibelo ebusuku lapho aveze khona ukuthi isibalo sabashonile sesiku-952 kuleli. Kwabashone kamuva, abawu-25 abaseWestern Cape, abayisithupha abaKwaZulu-Natal, abayisikhombisa abaseGauteng nabayisithupha base-Eastern Cape. UMkhize uthe noma sisakhuphuka isibalo sababulawe yileli gciwane, eNingizimu Afrika leli gciwane lisabulale kuphela u-2% wabantu abahaqekayo. Emhlabeni leli gciwane selibulale u-6% wabantu abathelelekile ngalo. IWestern Cape isahamba phambili ngesibalo sabantu abathelelekile njengoba bewu-30 379, okuwu-66% wabo bonke abantu abaphethwe yileli gciwane kuleli. As of today, the cumulative number of confirmed COVID-19 cases is 45 973, the total number of deaths is 952 and the total recoveries is 24 258 pic.twitter.com/T62CJfeZzM%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID19SouthAfrica?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID19SouthAfricaStatistics as at 06 June 2020. 
pic.twitter.com/3RYyNl1Vz8— Dr Zweli Mkhize (@DrZweliMkhize)Sebebalelwa ku-850 871 abantu asebehlolelwe iCovid-19 kuleli kanti abawu-30 196 kulabo bahlolwe emahoreni awu-24 edlule. NgoMgqibelo uMkhize wamukele ama-ventilator awu-20 eChris Baragwanath Academic Hospital eGoli. Ama-ventiators, okuyimshini esiza abantu abangakwazi ukuphefumula kahle, azosiza empini neCovid-19 kanti ayingxenye yamanye awu-50 athunyelwa yizwe i-United States of Amerca kuleli. IMelika ithembise ukunikeza iNingizimu Afrika ama-ventilator awu-1000, kanti iyodwa inani layo lilinganiselwa kuR500 000. "Sizokwamukela lesi sipho esikhulu esikhombisa ubungani, ukuseseka nokubambisana...lokhu kwenzeka ngenxa yengxoxo phakathi kukamengameli Donald Trump nomengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lapho amazisa khona ukuthi sishodelwa yizinsiza zezempilo empini neCovid-19. Kungijabulisile kakhulu ukwazisa umengameli ukuthi ingxoxo yakhe noTrump isithela izithelo," kusho uMkhize.
title: #Coronavirus: Sinyukele ku-45 973 isibalo sabahaqekile kuleli, kushone abanye abawu-44

text: SIZWE BLOSEP HAMBILINI uma uzoqala ibhizinisi wawubheka ukuthi akekho yini umuntu owenza lelo bhizinisi noma ubone igebe elikhona bese uyaliqala ukuze uvale leso sikhala obona ukuthi sivulekile.Akhona-ke lawo mabhizinisi othola ukuthi ayavulwa ngaphandle kocwaningo, njengaleli lamatafula, othola abantu bembondelene ndawonye bedayisa obhanana noma ama-apula bonke.Angazi noma nasemsakazweni sesilandela lolu khondolo yini.Okubuhlungu ngalo wukuthi ludala ukuthi imisakazo ingakhuli, ihlezi igidagida ndawonye njengoba kwenzeka kweminye.Njengamanje sinemisakazo yomphakathi eminingi, abanye bathi isizathu salokhu kwaba nezindawo eziqokwe ukuthi zizothuthukiswa, lokhu kwenzeka ngesikhathi sikaMengameli wesibili wezwe ngemuva kwenkululeko uMnuz Thabo Mbeki.Ngalesi sikhathi kuvela ukuthi kwaba nesiphakamiso sokuthi kube nemisakazo yalolu hlobo ukuze kube lula uma abantu befuna ukusabalalisa ulwazi ezindaweni zabo.Ngicabanga ukuthi kwakungumbono omuhle lo, ikakhulukazi uma kukhulunywa ngentuthuko kodwa kubonakala sengathi akukho ukulawuleka okukahle ekukhishweni kwezimvume zemisakazo.Sengathi kunalabo abalalayo bavuke ngakusasa bacabange ukuvula umsakazo nangempela bayithole imvume. Iningi lale misakazo kalenzi kahle ngokwezibalo nangokwebhizinisi.Bheka nje iVibe FM, yize izinze KwaMashu kodwa isakazela umphakathi waseThekwini namaphethelo, uma ngibheka angiyiboni yenza kahle ngabalaleli enabo abangu-74 000.Lokhu kungishiya nginombuzo wokuthi kungani kuneVibe FM kuphinde kube neNanda FM endaweni eyodwa ebizwa nge-INK (Inanda, Ntuzuma, KwaMashu) Area. Uma sibheka ngasohlangothini lwebhizinisi, le misakazo iyalimala.Isibonelo nje uMasipala weTheku ngicabanga ukuthi kumele uzifake izikhangiso zawo kodwa ngesinye isikhathi ugcina ufake komunye umsakazo ungafaki komunye.Ukube nje bekuwumsakazo owodwa umele i-INK Area, ngicabanga ukuthi nesibalo sabalaleli ngabe sikhulu.Kuphinde kube noGu Youth Radio ne-Radio Sunny South, kungani nje le misakazo esendaweni eyodwa yanikezwa imvume, kuthiwa iSunnySouth ilalelwa ngabantu abangu-13 000.Angiyazi-ke inkinga yoMgungundlovu FM njengoba lo msakazo uzicanasela eMphithi futhi amabhizinisi kahulumeni wesifundazwe amaningi enzelwa khona, kungani ungenzi kahle ngokwezinombolo nezikhangiso.Kule engenisa inzuzo, nayo ikushiya unemibuzo.Ngikhumbula uGrant Shakoane weVuma FM ethi uma beke bahlanganisa i-million, yena uyobe esegculisekile noma angawushiya umsakazo.Omunye wozakwethu uthi uPhindi Gule wathi bazothi beqeda unyaka babe sebenabalaleli abayisigidi.Njengamanje lo msakazo uqeda unyaka ngibona kusazothatha isikhathi ukuthi iVuma FM ifinyelele kulesi sibalo, okusho ukuthi uGrant njengoba eno-74 usazohlala eside isikhathi kwiVuma FM.Cha, iqiniso wukuthi sikhona isiminyaminya emagagasini omoya. Ukube asikho lesi siminyaminya ngabe iGagasi kudala lawushaya u-2 million njengokwesifiso salo.Ukugcwala kwemisakazo kugcina kuyiphazamisa nasohlangothini lwebhizinisi.Umkhangisi usecabanga kabili ngaphambi kokuthi athumele isikhangiso, uzocabanga ngeVuma ebanga neGagasi FM nayi ne-East Coast Radio igolozile futhi yona iyazibuthela ezikhangisweni noma isibalo sabalaleli bayo sisincane.Ngicabanga ukuthi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi iVuma FM iyeke ukuzibekela imibandela eminingi, ayidlale umculo ngokukhululeka, ngoba ngisho ubuza umuntu osebenza khona ukuthi idlala umculo onjani, uzothi lo ogqugquzelayo kodwa uzwe sekudlala neMi Casa. Mina ngithi abakhululeke badlale umculo bangazinswinyi ngoba lokho kuzobenza bangayi phambili.
title: Isiminingi ngokuxakile imisakazo

text: KUKHONJWA ngenjumbane unina wengane ngokuvikela isoka lakhe eliboshelwe icala lokudlwengula intombazane eneminyaka engu-14 elingayizali.Umsolwa waseMnini, eMgababa, ukhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngoLwesithathu ngo-10 ebusuku ngecala lokudlwengula.Isihlobo sentombazane sikhale ngomzala waso, okungunina wengane ukuthi uvele wazithela ngabandayo. Wenqabile ukuhambisa ingane esibhedlela ukuyohlolwa ngodokotela emuva kokudalula ukuthi ibidlwengulwa iphindelela nguyise ongayizali kusukela ngonyaka odlule.“Sibabi kunina wengane ngokuveza lolu daba njengoba ethi sihlukumeze ingane yakhe ngesenzo sethu. Ize yahanjiswa ngugogo wayo esibhedlela ngoba unina ethe ngeke ahambe ngoba kunezingane okumele asale nazo endlini,” kusho isihlobo esingeke sidalulwe.Isihlobo sithe sibikele abadala emndenini emuva kokuzwa izingane ezincane emndeni zilukhulumela phansi lolu daba.“Sisola ukuthi unina wengane ubazi ngokudlwengulwa kwengane kodwa efihla. Umzala obehlala nonina wengane edlwenguliwe uthi wabuzwa yilo wesifazane ukuthi angathini uma kuthiwa uhlangabezana nesimo lapho isoka lakhe (likamzala) lidlwengula ingane yakhe (kamzala). Kuyasolisa uma ulalela lo mbuzo nokuzithela kwakhe ngabandayo ukuyisa ingane esibhedlela,” kusho isihlobo.Isihlobo sithe unina wengane uhlala nesoka nezingane zabo ezine nangayizali endlini yomxhaso.Lesi sihlobo sithe baphatheke kabuhlungu bengumndeni ngalesi sigameko futhi ingane ikhombisa izimpawu zokudideka emqondweni.“Ingane iphazamiseke ngomqondo uyizwa noma ukhuluma nayo. Isitshele ukuthi kusukela ngonyaka odlule inukubezwa ngokocansi nguyise ongayizali. Umsolwa umuntu othulayo ongamphikela ezenzweni zobugebengu. Sifuna anganikwa ibheyili kodwa anikwe isigwebo esiqinile.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uColonel Thembeka Mbele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa asesiteshini saseManzimtoti ngoLwesithathu avule icala lokudlwengula.UColonel Mbele uthe idokodo selidluliselwa esiteshini samaphoyisa eMlaza ophikweni olubhekele amacala odlame emndenini, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo.
title: Uboshiwe ‘obedlwengula’ ingane angayizali

text: ISITOBHA seHighlands Park, uBevan Fransman, sibona iChiefs “isiyinja engenamazinyo” uma kuqhathaniswa nezikhathi sisagijima kuyona bewina isicoco se-Absa Premiership kabili ngaphansi komqeqeshi uTed Dumitru ongasekho.UFransman oyibambe kwiChiefs kusukela ku-2003 kuya ku-2006 engakaze adlale kwiPremiership, usedlalele amaqembu ayisikhombisa kusukela lapho. Akakufihli ukuthi iChiefs ayisenaso isithunzi njengalena adlala kuyona eyayishaya ngabadlali okukhona kubona uJohn “Shoes” Moshoeu, Patrick Mabedi, Cyril Nzama nabanye.IChiefs isiphenduke ihlaya eNingizimu Afrika ngokuhluleka ukujabulisa abalandeli bayo. Isiqede amasizini amane ngaphandle kokuwina indebe.“Angicabangi ukuthi kumnandi ukuqhathanisa amaqembu ezikhathi ezihlukene kodwa ngizokhuluma iqiniso. Ngangisemncane ngidlala kwiChiefs, ngino-19 noma-20. Isikwati esasinaso sasiphethe izihlabani zodwa eMzansi, abadlali beBafana Bafana. Ukuthola isikimu kwakuyinto enkulu kumdlali ona-19. Ngaleso sikhathi iqembu elaliboshelwa liyafana neliboshelwa yiSundowns manje. Abadlali abawu-11 abasenkundleni babengadingi ukutshelwa ukuthi kufanele benzeni. Sasinabadlali abenza izinguquko ngaphandle kukaTed, bethi asiyeke lokhu, asenze lokhu,” kusho uFransman.“Umdlali oshisayo eMzansi ubekwiChiefs, uJabu Pule, Stanton Fredericks, Shoes Moshoeu unamba-10 ophambili eMzansi futhi akekho osafike kuyena. Yisikhathi esihlukile manje. IChiefs isilahlekelwe ubuyona nesithunzi. Amaqembu abesaba ukudlala nathi. Ngangidlala emuva kwesokunxele kodwa ngiphumelela ngoba akekho owayesihlasela. Babesaba ngenxa yezinto ezazenziwa abadlali bethu kubona.”I-Highlands eqede endaweni yesikhombisa kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership ngesizini edlule ikade ibuya kwiNational First Division (NFD), izokwamukela iChiefs emdlalweni wePremiership ozoba seMakhulong Stadium, eTembisa, ngeSonto, ngo-3 ntambama.Umqeqeshi * -Ernst Middendorp uhlalelwe wumsebenzi wokubumba iqembu elizobuyisa izinsuku zenjabulo. Ngempelasonto iChiefs ihlulwe yi-Orlando Pirates ngo 2-0 koweCarling Black Label Cup nakuba kuqale abadlali abebekade beqokwe ngabalandeli. Akubuzwa ukuthi abalandeli bazofuna iChiefs iqale ngegiya eliphezulu ukuze bayethembe ukuthi kule sizini izosiqeda isomiso sezindebe.UFransman usebenze noMiddendorp emaqenjini amathathu okuyiChiefs, Bloemfontein Celtic nakwiMaritzburg United kumasizini ambalwa edlule.“Kulula ukudlalela ukusinda ezembeni eqenjini elisuke liphuma ehlathini. Kodwa thina ngesizini edlule sizifake ingcindezi sazitshela ukuthi asenze okungaphezulu kwalokho. Kuyasiza kancane ngoba kuyasiphoqa ukuthi sizikhandle. Uma kungenzeki lokho uqeda endaweni ekahle. Bekungelula. Wonke amaqembu abezitshela ukuthi azozenzela kithina. Siyazi ukuthi iChiefs ayikutholanga ebikade ikufuna ibhekene nePirates koweCarling kodwa asikubheki lokho ngoba isikimu besisethwe abalandeli,” kusho uFransman.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:NgoMgqibelo: Mamelodi Sundowns v SuperSport United (Lucas Moripe Stadium, 3pm); Baroka FC v Cape Town City FC (Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3pm); Chippa United v Stellenbosch (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 3pm); Orlando Pirates v Bloemfontein Celtic (Orlando Stadium, 6pm); AmaZulu FC v Bidvest Wits (King Zwelithini Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Highlands Park v Kaizer Chiefs (Makhulong Stadium, 3pm); Black Leopards v Polokwane City (Thohoyandou Stadium, 3pm); Lamontville Golden Arrows v Maritzburg United (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium, 3pm)
title: Isitobha seHighlands sikhala ngezinga leKaizer Chiefs

text: MHLELI: Ngingumlaleli womsakazo uKhozi FM ongeneme ngohlelo olushayelwa uSelby Mkhize noS’ya Mhlongo i-12 to 3 Cafe. Uhlelo alunazo izingosi ezihlabahlosile kodwa abasakazi bakhuluma ngezinto ezithinta bona isikhathi esiningi.Kukancane lapho uhlelo lwabo olufaka khona umlaleli. Into engimangaza kakhulu wukuthi umdidiyeli omkhulu wohlelo ungumuntu osemnkantshubomvu kodwa ngendlela okwenzeka ngayo ungathi akukho lutho oluhlelwayo lubhalwe phansi bese luyalandelwa.Kunengosi emnandi ebingena emuva kwezindaba zokugamanxa kwehora lokuqala lapho bekudlalwa khona izingoma ezipholile kwesinye isikhathi kube ngezicelwe umlaleli, asebefike bayishintsha.Badlala imfishimfishi yento engaqondakali. Ngicela abaphathi nomdidiyeli wohlelo, uThozama Ngwenya, bake babuyekeze uhlelo babheke ukuthi luyabaheha yini abalaleli.Robert MdladlaECingci
title: [IMIBONO] Safa abasakazi bekhuluma ngabo

text: OWAYENGUNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Willies Mchunu uthi kuzoba nzima kozongena esikhundleni seSilo samabandla onke, uGoodwill Zwelithini ka Bhekuzulu.UMchunu osebenze neSilo kakhulu ngesikhathi esewuNdunankulu wesifundazwe, uthe iMbube ishiye imbe umgodi okungelula ukuba kube khona ozowugqiba."Ukungena esikhundleni somuntu obuse cishe iminyaka engu-50, kuzoba umqansa. Kepha sinethemba lokuthi indlunkulu izokwazi ukuthola umuntu osezingeni lakhe. Siyayethemba indlunkulu, inomlando wokukhiqiza izilo. Sinethemba lokuthi ozongena endaweni yeSilo naye uzothola ukuhlonipheka okufanayo."UMchunu ukusho lokhu engaphandle kwesigodlo KwaKhethomthandayo, KwaNongoma izolo.UMchunu ubehambisana nonobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule nomengameli we-ANC Women's League, uNkk Bathabile Dlamini.Bonke laba baholi basho ngazwi linye ukuthi iSilo besigqugquzela ubumbano kwi-ANC.Njengoba sekusondele ukuba iSilo sitshalwe, kubonakale ukhula umthamo wabantu abahambela esigodlweni.Phakathi kobuholi obuphezulu obuhambele esigodlweni izolo, kubalwa isekela mengameli uMnuz David Mabuza, ubuholi bukazwelonke bePAC, ubuholi bukazwelonke be-ATM, amakhosi ezinye izizwe kubalwa inkosi yakwaMokoena, eyamaBhaca neyabaPedi.Abazobhonga emswaneni bebengena beshintshana, abanye balinde imizuzu eminingi ngaphandle kwesigodlo ngenxa yesibalo esikhulu sabantu abebelinde ithuba lokuyobhonga emswaneni.Bekumatasa ngaphakathi esigodlweni njengoba abasebenzi abenza amalungiselelo okutshalwa kweSilo bebephuma bengena esigodlweni, beqinisekisa ukuthi konke kumi ngomumo.Nezinkomo abezilethwa abazokhalisa indlunkulu, bezifika ubuthaphutha.Nakuba kumatasa ngaphandle kwesigodlo, abekho abadayisi abasebenzise leli thuba ukwenza inzuzo.Ichaza enye yezinduna eyingxenye yenqwaba yezinduna ezifika  esigodlweni zonke izinsuku, ithe ukudayisa akuvumelekile esigodlweni njengoba isizwe sisazilile.Izinduna ezihleli ngaphandle kwesigodlo zenza isiqiniseko sokuthi wonke umuntu uyayihlonipha imithetho yasendlunkulu okubalwa kuyo ukungafakwa kwezigqoko  nezandla emaphaketheni.Loyo ophula eminye yale mithetho, izinduna ziyamhebeza, zisabise ngokumhlawulisa.Khonamanjalo, ungqongqoshe wezoLimo  nokuThuthukiswa kwezindawo zaseMakhaya uNkk Thoko Didiza, unqabile ukuphawula ngekusasa leNgonyama Trust Board.UNkk Didiza, ongomunye wabebezobhonga emswaneni, uthe njengoba kusaziliwe, akufanele kukhulunywe ngamafa eSilo.Kunesiphakamiso esisacutshungulwa sokuthi kuhlakazwe Ingonyama Trust Board, eyengamele umhlaba weSilo.
title: 'Siyayethemba iNdlunkulu ngokuqoka umholi'

text: SIVELE obala isizathu esenza abalandeli bangalubhadi ezinkundleni uma kudlala iBafana Bafana ngesikhathi idlala ngokulingana neParaguay izolo ebusuku emdlalweni wesihle wokuhlonipha lowo owayengumengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu kuleli uNelson Mandela.Nakuba umqeqeshi weBafana uStuart Baxter enze izinguquko eziningi kulo mdlalo kodwa akubathokozisanga abalandeli ukubona abanye babadlali beboza ekubeni bebizwa njalo kwelesizwe.IBafana iyona eqale ngomfutho esiwombeni sokuqala uPercy Tau enza adume ngazo ekhombisa ukungaluhloniphi udonga lwasemuva lweParaguay.Ngomzuzu wesibili uTau ujike kwasani wathi ulibeka enethini waphika unozinti weParaguay * -Antony Silva kwaba yikhona.Iqalile yakhombisa izimpawu zobungozi iParaguay ngomzuzu ka-15, ngesikhathi umgadli wayo uFederico Santander enyenyela udonga lwasemuva lweBafana, wabhekana ngqo noDarren Keet, wathi ulibeka enethini lashaya ipali, kwaba ukuphunyuka kweBafana.Isitobha seMamelodi Sundowns uMotjeka Madisha siphenduke impuphu ngomzuzu ka-18, sizama ukusebenzisa amandla ku-18 waso, sishoka uDerlis Gonzalez sashibilika. Ulithathile uGonzalez ibhola wathi ulibeka phakathi kwagoloza uKeet emapalini.Kuphakame wonke umuntu ezihlalweni ngesikhathi uPule ededela inguzunga yeshodi engaphandle kwe-18 ngomzuzu ka-29 kodwa yaphuma eceleni kwepali.Ubuhlakani beParaguay buvele ngesikhathi uMiguel Almiron odlala kahle ngonyawo lwesinxele ejika kwasani odongeni lwasemuva kwiBafana, wabhekana noKeet, wathi uyalibeka wavimba, lwahlangana nonyawo lukaSantander walibhajiswa ezintanjeni, zahamba phambili ngo 1-0 izivakashi.Ngemuva kwalokho uMadisha uziqhathe nabalandeli ephasa umphuphe wephasi engafikanga kuKeet, umgadli wezivakashi uSantander wabhekana nepali kodwa wageja. Abalandeli bashwibe izandla bemfuna ephumile uMadisha obebukeka sengathi akekho kahle emdlalweni.Iqale ngendlela efanayo njengasesiwombeni sokuqala iBafana, iya ngomfutho odongeni lwasemuva lwezivakashi kodwa bekugoloza ukaputeni weParaguay uJunior Alonso noFabian Balbuena emuva.Abadlali uBaxter abafake ngesiwombe sesibili uDino Ndlovu, Fortune Makaringe, Thulani Serero, Buhle Mkhwanazi, Thamasanqa Mkhize nonozinti uRonwin Williams.Bangene ezindaweni zoTiyani Mabunda, Lebogang Maboe, Mothiba, Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Darren Keet noMadisha.Akusisazanga nokho kangako njengoba ezikaBaxter ziqhubekile nokungathathi izinqumo eziphusile ikakhulukazi uma zihlasela.Kucishe kwangena elesibili kwiParaguay ngesikhathi uHector Villalba ephuma uqekelele ebhekana noWilliams nokho wamgeza.Kuthe sekuvalwe amehlo ekugcineni isithandwa sabalandeli bebhola lakuleli uPercy Tau washaya ingcwenga yegoli, elibuyise injabulo kubalandeli abese bedubile abanye sebehamba enkundleni.
title: UTau uthobe izinhliziyo zabalandeli beBafana

text: Zanele Mthethwa BAVUKE bazithuntutha abesifazane abasebhizinisini lokudla, izitsha zabo ebezilele uthuli ngenxa yokuqina kwemithetho kathaqa. Kubuye inhlasi yethemba ngesikhathi uMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa enciphisa imigomo kathaqa, wamemezela ukuthi abamabhizinisi okudla sebengawathumelela amakhasimende. Laba besifazane bathe bayazama nokulandela imigomo kathaqa.UNksz Fikile Xaba ongumpheki nomnikazi wendawo yokudla iMafifi Leaflet Restaurant & Bara eJozini, uthe ikati belilele eziko. Uthe ushayeke kakhulu ngesikhathi kuqala uthaqa ngoba indawo yakhe idayisa notshwala. Yize eseqalile ukuthuthela amakhasimende afaka ama-oda, uthe inkulu inselelo."Akulula ukuhambisela ukudla abantu emakhaya, kungcono labo abasemadolobheni. Ngisendaweni enezinga eliphezulu lokwebiwa kwezimoto, okwenza ngisabe ukuthutha ukudla. Ngenxa yokuthi yisemakhaya abanye abantu abasebenzi, amanani okudla aphansi, okuzodla iphakethe uma ngihambisela amakhasimende," echaza.Uthe uzoqhubeka nebhizinisi noma kunzima, ukwenzela ukuthi amakhasimende angamkhohlwa.UNksz Thabi Kweyama weThabi's House Cakes, Events & Catering eHammarsdale, uthe ubesephuthwe ama-oda amaningi kwabafuna amakhekhe emicimbini yokuzalwa."Kube nzima ngoba ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa imigomo kathaqa bengingenaso izithako ezenele endlini. Kuthe noma sekuxegiswa imithetho, ezinye izitolo bezingenazo izithako esizisebenzisa uma sibhaka. Nokho sengiqalile ukupheka nokubhaka, ngihambisele amakhasimende. Inselelo enkulu ukuthi kuyizindleko ukuthutha ukudla, okumele ucabange ezinye izindlela ukuze ungashayeki ephaketheni," kuchaza yena.UKHALA ngenselelo yokuba semakhaya uNksz Fikile Xaba onendawo yokudla, osekudingeka athuthele amakhasimende ukudla njengoba sekuvunyelwe esigabeni sesine sikathaqa ISITHOMBE:FACEBOOK --UNksz Kweyama uthe usenqume ukupheka okuyisikalo esikhulu ukuze noma ethola ikhasimende, angalimali kakhulu ephaketheni. UBuye aphekele imicimbi nemishado, okwenze walimala kakhulu njengoba nayo imisiwe. Uveze ukuthi amanye amakhasimende abesekhokhile kwadingeka awabuyisele imali.UNksz Nokwazi Cele weGee Gee's Cakes eThekwini, uthe uthole amakhasimende amaningana ngempelasonto yeMother's Day. Uthe ubesefile amakhasimende emkhalela efisa amakhekhe akhe kodwa evalelwe imithetho kathaqa. Njengoba sebevunyelwe ukuthutha ukudla, uthe usenamakhasimende azokwenza emakhaya imicimbi yokuzalwa neyokugubha usuku lomshado."Kunzima kuleli bhizinisi kodwa ngixwayisa abanye ozakwethu ukuthi bazame ukungalahlekelwa amakhasimende ngenxa yalesi sikhathi esinzima. Kumele bazame ukusebenza ngalokhu abanakho, ngeke kufane nokungenzi lutho," kusho yena.
title: Bavuke bazithuntutha abesifazane abasebhizinisini lokudla

text: MHLELI: Ngiyathokoza ukuthola ithuba lokubhala ephephandabeni elihamba phambili.Ngithanda ukuphawula ngomsakazo Ukhozi FM ngokuxwayisa abaphathi bawo. Ngithi uma bengabhekile luzophelelwa ushatini ngenxa yento eyenziwa abasakazi bohlelo Us’giya Ngengoma yokusakaza sengathi basakazela abangani babo.Banomkhuba wokukhuluma noma yini ewukubhinqa emsakazweni ubezwa kahle ukuthi bachukuluza abathize.Siyacela kubaphathi bomsakazo bayibheke le nto, okungenani abakhishwe abasakazi bakaS’giya Ngengoma kufakwe abanye. Akunikwe ithuba umsakazi omusha kulolu hlelo.Ngiyafisa ukwazi ukuthi buphi ubuholi obudala obabuhola Ukhozi FM ngezikhathi zoLinda Sibiya ngoba ngalezo zikhathi Ukhozi lwaluheha abasakazi ababehlonipha umbhobho kodwa manje sekukwampunzi edlemini.Thulisani MyezaETHEKWINI
title: Abasakazi bazowubulala USgiya Ngengoma

text: UYAVEVA umzali wengane eneminyaka eyisikhombisa yesikole saseMlaza, iSandakahle Primary okuthiwa ishaywe uthisha yaba midwa yidwa.Unina omkhulu wengane ogama layo ligodliwe, efunda uGrade 1 kulesi sikole esikwaV, uthe baphatheke kabi ngesimo efike ikusona ekhaya ngoLwesibli ibuya esikoleni.Uthe ingane ibonwe ngunina oyizalayo ngesikhathi eyikhumula umfaniswano wesikole.“Ingane ibinemivimbo emhlane, engalweni nasezimbanjeni kubonakala ukuthi ibishaywa. Asiyivuni futhi asisho ukuthi ayigangi kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi kufanele ishaywe kanjena. Sixakwa wukuthi bakuvumela kanjani lokhu esikoleni ngoba umthetho awukuvumeli ukushaywa kwezingane. Njengoba eseqalile eshaya ingane kuqala unyaka uyophela injani,” kusho unina omkhulu wengane.Uthe okunye okubakhathazayo wukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi akuyona ingane yabo kuphela eshayiwe kodwa mhlawumbe lokhu kuyenzeka nakwezinye.Uthe bafisa sengathi umnyango ungangenelela uvikele izingane ekuhlukunyezweni ezikoleni.Izibalo zabakwaStats SA zangaphambilini ziveza ukuthi iningi lezingane ezifunda ezikoleni zakuleli ziyashaywa ezikoleni. Isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal sikwezihamba phambili ekushayweni kwezingane njengoba kuvele ukuthi zingu-10.1% izehlakalo zokushaywa kwezingane ezikoleni.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe imigomo yomnyango ithi akuvumelekile ukushaywa kwezingane.“Abazali kufanele basibike lesi sigameko eMnyangweni wezeMfundo. Uma kuqinisekiswa ukuthi lezi zinsolo ziyiqiniso sizothatha izinyathelo zokuqondisa ubugwegwe,” kusho uMahlambi.
title: Intukuthelo ngengane ‘eshaywe’ esikoleni

text: UMENGAMELI we-ANC Women’s League, uNksz Bathabile Dlamini, ubalule ukwanda kwezenzo zokubulawa kwabesifazane nezingane wase enxusa ukuthi izinhlelo ezilwa nako aziqale zisebenze manje.Ubekhuluma emgubheni we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal weminyaka ewu-108 obusoGwini Sports and Leisure Centre, eGamalakhe, izolo.UNksz Dlamini uthe akukhulunywe nabantu, ikakhulukazi abafana abancane, bafundiswe ngokuthula, ubumbano nokuhlonipha abantu besifazane.“Ezikoleni akufakwe izifundo ezifundisa ngobulili. Bonke abaholi, abamasonto nabendabuko, abazihluphe ngezindaba zokuhlukumezeka kwabesifazane ngoba sesiphatheke kabi kakhulu. Izindawo ebezihlonishwa yila osekunukubezwa khona kakhulu abantu besifazane oCheryl Zondi bawofakazi. Amajaji, amaphoyisa nabameli abaphethe izindaba zokuhlukunyezwa mabaqhubeke njalo nokuqeqeshwa kungamiwa,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.Uthe wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika akabe ne-biometric (ubufakazi obuveza ubuyena bomuntu).“Maqabane ibheyili yomuntu odlwengulile asiyivumi. Asikufuni ukudedelwa ngoshwele ejele kwabantu abadlwengulile. Sifuna bathole isigwebo sokudilikelwa yijele futhi abahlale emajele okuvalelwe kuwo iziboshwa eziyingozi. Uma ngabe ulibofuzo seluqinisekisile ukuthi umuntu udlwengule umuntu wesifazane, wambulala akushicilelwe ukuze abantwana bethu bezokwazi,” kusho uNksz DlaminiUthe bafuna izingane zifundiswe imfundo ezozenza zikwazi ukuzenzela izinto, ziqale namabhizinisi.“Ezomnotho zethu azakhe amathuba omsebenzi, zeseke amabhizinisi abesifazane nemifelandawonye. Okhethweni oluzayo ngithi bantu besifazane sikhona, yithina esibaningi singaba amakhensela,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.UNobhala we-ANC Youth League KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo, ubalise ngentsha engawatholi amathuba omsebenzi wathi iningi lababethamele umgubho wayizolo abasebenzi.Uphonsele inselelo abaholi bezombusazwe nabakahulumeni ukuthi emakhanda abo kudume ukusungula amathuba omsebenzi uma bebuyela emakhaya.“Angasali namakhansela. Ngonyaka ozayo siya okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya. Ngeke size seseke ikhansela noma imeya engabacabangeli abantu abasha. Siyazibonga izimeya namakhansela eziqasha izihlobo nezintombi zazo. Kulo nyaka ozayo zimeya nani makhansela lungisani izindlela zenu. Uphiko lwentsha lunomgomo ka-40% wokumeleleka ezinhlakeni zikahulumeni. Ngonyaka ozayo sifuna izimeya namakhansela amancane kungabi ngaphansi kuka-40%,” kusho uSabelo.
title: ‘Azisebenze izinhlelo ezilwa nokubulawa kwabesifazane’

text: Leli ciko, ebelifunda esikoleni esizimele iSt Stithians Girls’ College, liphase ezinye izifundo ezimbili ngo-distinction.“Ngiyakhala njengamanje,” ubhale kanje uBotlhale (17) ekhasini lakhe lakuTwitter.Yize engatholakalanga ukuba aphawule kodwa wakuveza ukuthi ukuhaya izinkondlo nokulingisa akumphazamisi ezifundweni zakhe. “Ngifuna uma sengiphothule isikole ngiyokwenza izifundo zeChartered Accountant.”Ukuphumelela kwakhe akuthusi ngoba isiqubulo sakhe sithi “Ukuhlanganisa iMfundo noJesu kuphuma iMpumelelo.”Le ntokazi yaseMahikeng, eNorth West, yaqala ukwaziwa ngesikhathi idla umhlanganiso emqhudelwaneni waku-e.tv, iSA’s Got Talent .Ngemuva kokuhlabana, uBotlhale wabe eseqopha iCD esihloko sithi Spoken Word & Music, eyayigabe ngenoni elalithi Africa My Pride.Ngemuva kwalokho ube esehlabana ngendondo yeBest Praise Singer kumaSatma Awards futhi uyinxusa lokuqala elincane kunawo wonke lalo mqhudelwano wezindondo.Ubuye waqokwa njengenxusa lomkhankaso weNelson Mandela’s Children’s Hospitai iLegacy of Hope ngesikhathi wethulwa eNew York e-USA .Wabe esehlonishwa yiBrand SA ngokuhlonipha uMandela ngenkondlo kaMaya Angelou e-USA.
title: Umlingisi ukhale mi ephasa uGrade 12

text: BASALE bezibuza imibuzo abantu abaningi ngokudlondlobala kweqembu lezepolitiki ebelingabhekiwe okhethweni iFreedom Front Plus eholwa uMnuz Pieter Groenewald. Kumanje selibalwa namaqembu amahlanu azihola phambili njengoba belihlezi endaweni yesihlanu ngesikhathi kushicilelwa.IFreedom Front Plus iyaziwa ngokumela amaBhunu inqwaba yawo okungabalimi abangahambisani namaqembu agcwele izinhlanga ezahlukene.Umbuzo obubuzwa abantu abaningi othi yini edale ezikaGroenewald zesekwe kungaka. Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uSolwazi Bheki Mngomezulu uyiphendulile le mibuzo eveza ukuthi zimbili izinto ezikhuphule leli qembu.UMngomezulu uthi iphuzu lokuqala elizuzise iFF Plus kube wudaba lomhlaba oluwatatazelisa kakhulu amaBhunu uma luthintwa. I-ANC inanelwa yi-EFF, abajiki ekutheni uhlaba awuthathwe ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo."I-Freedom Front Plus iyaziwa ukuthi iyaphikisana nomgomo we-ANC wokuthatha umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo.“AmaBhunu ethukile ngendaba yomhlaba kodwa abeke ithemba lawo kwiFreedom Front Plus ebukeka ikhuluma kahle kuwona,’’ kuchaza uMngomezulu.Uthi amaBhunu uma enenkinga ayahlangana edwebe amaqhinga okuyixazulula yingakho ehlale phansi anquma ukuthi kufanele avotele iFreedom Front Plus ngobuningi bawo.Uze walinganisa ngokuthi abantu abamnyama benza okuphambene ngoba uma benenkinga abaqhamuki namaqhinga kodwa bavele bagxobe itoyitoyi babulale impahla.Iphuzu lesibili uMngomezulu alibekile wukufuduka kwabanye abamhlophe besuka ku-DA ngoba bengasayizwa kahle."I-DA isizibeke njengeqembu elemukela zonke izinhlanga kanti abamhlophe abaningi abahambisani nalokhu, babambe elentulo ngokuthi kabadlelani nezinye izinhlanga. Inqwaba isukile kwiDA yazitholela ikhaya elisha kwiFreedom Front Plus,’’ kuchaza uMngomezulu.
title: #Ukhetho2019: Okubeke i-FF plus phambili emaqenjini amancane

text: UMISIWE emsebenzini umdansi wase-Afrotainment, uNhlanhla “Sgaqah” Chiliza onecala lokudlwengula intombazane eneminyaka engu-13.USgaqah (31) uyilungu leqembu Amadada Dancers adansela abaculi base-Afrotainment okungoDJ Tira, Tipcee noDladla Mshunqisi.Imenenja kaSgaqah, uSenzo Shezi, ithe lo mdansi ngeke abonakale esiteji.“Inkampani ithathe isinqumo sokuthi imumise uSgaqah kuze kudlule le lifu elimnyama elimgubuzele,” kusho uSenzo.Uthe bayameseka lo mdansi ngoba akakalahlwa ngecala yinkantolo yomthetho njengoba esahamba icala.“Akaxoshiwe, usasebenza nathi kodwa umile ukubonakala esiteji. Wenza eminye imisebenzi emqhelanisa namehlo abantu. Uhlukumezekile yena ngale nto kodwa uzoba ngcono,” kusho uSenzo.USgaqah waboshwa maphakathi nenyanga eyedlule.Isolezwe labika ngokuthi kuthiwa wacelwa imali, uR8, yintombazane efunda uGrade 8, wayibuza ukuthi ihleli nobani ekhaya yathi ihleli yodwa wase eyilandela.Unina wentombazane wathi sebesendlini wayiphushela ekamelweni labazali wayehlisa ama-legging nephenti wayifaka iminwe esithweni sangasese.Ngesikhathi evele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini waliphika icala.USgaqah wadedelwa ngebheyili kaR5 000 ngemuva kokuveza ukuthi uzohlala nemenja yakhe eGreyville. Icala lakhe lahlehliselwa u-Okthoba 5 njengoba kusaqhutshekwa nophenyo.Kusukela aphuma akakaze abonakale esiteji uma ozakwabo beyonandisa.
title: Umisiwe kowokudansa owe-Afrotainment

text: KUNEZINTO ezimbalwa ezicasulayo ngokuyobuka umdlalo webhola bukhoma enkundleni eNingizimu Afrika. Enye yazo ukuthi kuyaye kuthi ungakangeni enkundleni, sekufanele ubhekane nonogada abaluhlaza.Bahlale benolaka nje onogada basebholeni ungafunga ukuthi iyona ndlela abaqeqeshwa ngayo nabatshelwa ukuthi yilona limu abalandeli bebhola abaluqonda kahle.Uyabekezela ugwinye itshe uma uwumlandeli webhola, uqhubeke uye enkundleni ngoba ukubuka ibhola bukhoma kumnandi kakhulu kunokulibuka kwithelevishini.Yingakho sithi asibathulele isigqoko onogada abebesemcimbini kamaskandi obe yingqophamlando ngoMgqibelo i-#Gcwalisa iMabhida.Bebenesihe futhi behlonipha ngendlela emangalisayo. Kusukela usengaphandle enkundleni, bebekufuna kahle ithikithi, bakuchazele ngenhlonipho ukuthi kumele ushone ngakuphi kuze kube uyofika lapho uhleli khona.Baze bawuhlonipha abantu umsebenzi wabo futhi baze bakwenza into emnandi ukuya enkundleni, ufike emcimbini usajabule hhayi usuhluthukile ngoba kade ukhacwa ngonogada.Inkampani ebinikwe umsebenzi iwuphathe ngobunono yenza izinto ngalo mcimbi obuhlelwa yiNdlamlenze Development Foundation kaKhuzani wahlonipheka futhi waba sezingeni ngayo yonke indlela.Yebo ngasekugcineni kukhona okwaphazamisa njengoba kukhona abantu abayisishiyagalombili abaphuthunyiswa esibhedlela sebelimele kodwa futhi nalapho abahleli bomcimbi bakhombisa ukuthi ukuphepha kwabantu bakubeke eqhulwini njengoba bavele bawuvala umcimbi benzela ukunqanda isimo.Kulula ukubhangqa abantu ngebhande elilodwa futhi uma abantu bedume kabi akube kusanakeka uma benza okuhle. Yingakho nje sibona kubalulekile ukuqhakambisa umsebenzi omuhle wonogada abebesebenza kwi-#Gcwalisa iMabhida kungabi nje ukukhuluma ngonogada uma begxekwa kuphela.Njengoba kuyizinto ezincane ezona umcimbi, zona futhi lezo zinto ziyawuphakamisa umcimbi. Onogada babe nesandla ekuphakamiseni umcimbi kaKhuzani.- Umbono wePhephandaba
title: [IMIBONO] Kuyancomeka okwenziwe onogada abebeseMabhida

text: UMNYANGO wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal usuxwayise izikole  ngokubamba imiphumela yabafundi ngenxa yokuthi abazali bayehluleka ukukhokha imali yokufunda yezingane zabo.Esitatimendeni umnyango uveze ukuthi,  usuthole inqwaba yezikhalo ezivela ezindaweni ezehlukene ngokubanjelwa kwabafundi ama-riphothi ngoba kuthiwa abakhokhe imali yesikole.“Sesikuveze kaningi ezikoleni  ukuthi ukujezisa abafundi ngokubabambela imiphumela yabo ngenxa yokuthi abazali babhekene nenselelo yokungabikhona kwemali, akuvumelekile. Izikole ziyacelwa ukuthi zikhulume nabazali kuhlelwe indlela yokukhokha ngaphandle kokuphazamisa ikusasa lengane,” kusho isitatimende.Khonamanjalo, umnyango uthe seluqalile  uhlelo lokumakwa kabusha nokubuyekezwa kwamaphepha abebefunda u-matric nyakenye abakholwa ukuthi kwaba namaphutha  ngesikhathi  bemakelwa. Lolu hlelo luqale ngesonto eledlule kanti luvuleleke kubona bonke abanesifiso sokumakelwa noma ukubalelwa kabusha amamaki abawathola kuleso sifundo umuntu anezinsolo zokuthi abenzekanga kuso ubulungiswa.  Lolu hlelo luzophela ngoLwesithathu ngesonto elizayo, imiphumela ikhishwe ngoMashi,14.Imali yokumakelwa kabusha nokubuyekezelwa imiphumela, ofisa ukufaka isicelo uyokwaziswa ngesikhathi efaka isicelo.  Kuthiwa abafisa ukubhalisa bangaxhumana namahhovisi ezifunda.
title: OwezeMfundo e-KZN uxwayisa izikole ezibamba imiphumela yabafundi

text: UKUNCIPHA kokusetshenziswa kukagesi kulawa maholidi, kwenza i-Eskom ingabhekani nenkinga yokuba kucishwe ugesi kulezi zinsuku.Yize kunjalo abakwa-Eskom izolo bathumele isitatimende baxwayise ukuthi awusetshenziswe kahle ugesi njengoba kungenzeka uphinde ucinywe uma bebhekana nengcindezi.“I-Eskom izoqhubeka isebenzise ugesi obekelwe izimo eziphuthumayo uma kunesidingo ngalesi sikhathi.“Yize kunjalo, sifisa ukukhumbuza amakhasimende ethu ukuthi isimo asikabi sihle futhi ngeke sikwazi ukuqagela ukuthi singashintsha nini,” kusho abakwa-Eskom esitatimendeni esithunyelwe abezindaba.NgeSonto ugesi awuzange ucinywe, bathe ngo-6.30 ekuseni amandla kagesi abengu- 14,574MW. Ithimba lakwa-Eskom kuthiwa liyaqhubeka nokuqapha isimo ngesikhathi samaholidi, ukuze banciphise amathuba wokuba ugesi ucinywe.“Siyawanxusa amakhasimende ethu ukuba ehlise ukusetshenziswa kukagesi, ukuze ugesi ungacinywa,” kusho abakwa-Eskom.
title: Abakwa-Eskom basaxwayisa abantu

text: SIMANZONZO isimo eMgungundlovu kulandela ukuvulelwa ngenhlamvu erenki yaseMasukwane kwashona umuntu oyedwa obezidlulela ngoLwesihlanu. Kusuke esinamathambo kule renki ngesikhathi kufika amadoda ahlome ephelele avulela ngenhlamvu, kwashiswa nemoto yonogada eyodwa.Lokhu kuhlasela kuthiwa kumayelana nombango womzila phakathi kwamatekisi aseHowick nawaseMgungundlovu.Amatekisi aseHowick nawaseMgungundlovu asesifundeni esisodwa kodwa kuhlukene ososeshini - Zimeleni Taxi Association nePMB Long Distance.Kuthiwa amatekisi asebenza umzila waseHowick yiwona anemvume yokuthutha kodwa awaseMgungundlovu nawo asenayo imvume yize engenayo indawo yokuthulula uma efika eHowick.Abanikazi bamatekisi aseMgungundlovu baveze ukuthi njengoba benemvume, bazoqala ukusebenza kulo mzila ngenkani.Abamatekisi aseHowick baya enkantolo bezama ukunqanda ukuthi awaseMgungundlovu angangeni emzileni wabo.Udaba lusesenkantolo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala nelokulimaza impahla.“Ngabo-10:30 ekuseni kufike amadoda ehlomile erenki adubula abantu. Onogada baserenki nabo badubulile. Owesilisa olinganiselwa eminyakeni engu-30 obezihambela udubulekile ekhanda. Ushonele endaweni yesigameko. Imoto yonogada ibe isishiswa. Akekho oboshiwe kodwa uphenyo luyaqhubeka,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Abashayeli bezimoto nomphakathi obudlula kule ndawo ngesikhathi sesigameko bathe bethukile futhi bazizwa bengaphephile emuva kwalesi sehlakalo.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bekukhona ababhale ukuthi kushone abantu abayisishiyagalombili, abanye bethi bayisithupha. Lokhu kuchithwe amaphoyisa.NgoFebhuwari kube nokudubula okufanayo erenki, unogada (32) waserenki waboshwa ngecala lokuzama ukubulala kulandela ukudubula umshayeni (40) esetekisini khona eMasukwane.Imenenja ehhovisi leSantaco eKZN, uMnuz Sfiso Shangase, uthe udaba lokubangwa kwalo mzila bayalwazi futhi balusebenze kakhulu lwaze lwaya enkantolo.“Lwakhulunywa udaba kwaba sengathi luyaphela. Kuyadumaza ukuba kudutshulwe erenki ngoba kufaka nabagibeli engozini. Sihlezi sikukhuluma ukuthi asikho isidingo sokuba abantu bebulalane, akuhlalwe phansi kuxoxwe,” kusho uShangase.USihlalo kusoseshini waseMgungundlovu, uMnuz Bheki Sokhela, ethintwa ngalokhu, uthe ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma ngoba usangena emhlanganweni noNgqongqoshe wezokuThu-tha uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda.UKaunda uthe amaphoyisa azokwenza konke okusemandleni ukubopha abenzi bobubi.“Mayelana nezimvume, sihlanganile nezinhlaka ezithintekayo, savumelana ngokuthi akusetshenziswe ngokwesivumelwano senkantolo,” kusho uKaunda.Ukuphikile ukuthi umnyango wakhe yiwo oqhatha ososeshini ngokukhipha izimvume.Khonamanjalo izolo KwaMashu amaphoyisa adubule ababili abebesolwa ngokuduna imoto e-Avoca babulala owesilisa ngoLwesine.
title: Isidumo kuvulelwa ngenhlamvu erenki

text: NJENGOBA kuvulwe izikole abanye abazali babhekana nomqansa wokungazi ukuthi wuhlobo luni lomphako abangawulungisela izingane zabo. Lokhu kudideka ukubona ngabanye babo abenza ukudla okuphambene nalokho okumele bakulungisele izingane, nokudingeka ezikoleni njengoba ezinye zezikole zikubeka kucace ukuthi kumele ingane iphathe ukudla okunempilo. Imvamisa lezi ezinabazali abangakunaki ukubaluleka kohlobo lokudla okumele bakulingise, uzifica ziphethe ukudla okungenayo impilo nokungenazo nhlobo izakhamzimba. Izitsha zazo zijwayele ukuba nomphako ogcwele izoso, uswidi omningi, amakhekhe wodwa noma ijusi enoshukela omningi ngokweqile.Umpheki uChef Nono Mtshali, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi umzali enze ukudla okungeke kubuye ekhaya kungadliwanga nhlobo yingane.“Abazali kumele benzele izingane zabo ukudla okuhehayo okuzokwenza ukuthi izingane zikuqede. Ngakho ukwenza uhlobo lomphako owodwa ngoba unqena, kungagcina sekuholela ekutheni ingane yakho ingakuthokozeli nhlobo ukudla umphako wayo esikoleni,” kusho uChef NonoUthe uma ingane ibuya nomphako ekhaya kumele umzali azibuze ukuthi kungani ibuye nakho? Uthe ziningi izindlela ezingasetshenziswa ngabazali ezingenza ukuthi izingane zabo zihlezi zikuthakasela ukuvula izitsha esikoleni uma sezihlangene nezinye izingane.Phakathi kohlobo lokudla athe abazali bangakufaka, ubale isemishi elithakwe nokudla okufana noshizi, upholoni, lettuce, cucumber, umkhwepha wenkukhu nakho konke okunye okwenza ukuthi isemishi lihehe. Uthe isidlo ebesidliwa ngobusuku bayizolo esifana nepasta, i-lasagne kungaphathwa yizingane ezikoleni. Ama-wrap athakwe ngezindlela ezahlukene uthe angafakwa esitsheni somphako wengane. “Asikho isidingo sokuthi ingane ihlezi yenzelwa amasemishi uma iya esikoleni. Izingane ziyacikeka wukudla into eyodwa ngaso sonke yisikhathi yingakho kusemqoka ukuthi abazali basebenzise amacebo ahlukile,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi ukudla kwengane kumele kuqikelelwe ukuthi kunezakhamzimba. Uthe kumqoka nokuthi abazali bajwayeze izingane zabo ukuthi ziphuze kakhulu amanzi kunejusi.“Ingane ingaqala ukujwayezwa lo mkhuba wokuthanda ukuphuza amanzi ekhaya ukuze ingabi nayo inkinga yokuwaphuza nasesikoleni.”Omunye umpheki, uNksz Ntokozo Khanyile, uthe ama-sliders afakwe i-mince, utamatisi, u-lettuce nocucumber ngokunye abazali abangakwenzela izingane. Uthe i-sauce kumele abazali badlalele kude nayo ngoba inomkhuba wokona ukudla kwengane njengoba isikhathi esiningi yenza ukuthi  ifike nakho esikoleni sekumanzi futhi kungasanambitheki ngendlela efanele. “Kunokuthi kube nama-chips eceleni kwesitsha somphako, umzali akafake ukherothi ongaphekiwe noshizi we-cheddar namagrebhisi, ubhanana noma i-aphula. Ibhodlela elinamanzi lisemqoka kakhulu emphakweni wengane. I-yoghurt ngezinye zezinto ezinezakhamzimba abazali abangazifaka, ” kusho uNksz Khanyile.Uphethe  ngokuthi ama- meat balls nawo ayathakaselwa kakhulu yizingane. Uthe umzali kumele aqikelele ukuthi ufaka amathathu kuphela njengoba esuke ehambisana ne-wrap kwesinye isikhathi. Nakhu okunye ukudla ongakulungisela ingane yakho: Pizza bread Ama-fish cake
title: Qikelela ngomphako  owulungisela ingane esikoleni

text:
USEDLULILE emhlabeni owayengunozinti weKaizer Chiefs, u-Arthur Bartman. Ukudlula kukaBartman kuqinisekiswe yiMaritzburg United, ayeqeqesha kuyo onozinti, ngoLwesibili ebusuku. “Iqembu selithole izindaba ezibuhlungu zokushona kowayengumqeqeshi wonozinti eqenjini, u-Arthur Bartman. Sikhulekela umndeni wakhe kulesi sikhathi. Uyohlezi eyingxenye yeTeam of Choice,”  kusho leli qembu ku-twitter.Akukacaci ukuthi yini imbangela yokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni.UBartman, obeneminyaka ewu-46, uqale ukudlala kuPSL ngesizini ka-1998/1999, edlalela i-African Wanderers. Eminyakeni engaphezulu kwelishumi udlalele amaqembu okubalwa kuwo iMoroka Swallows, Bush Bucks, Supersport United, Kaizer Chiefs neGolden Arrows.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abadlali bePSL, amaqembu nabalandeli bebhola bathumele imiyalezo yenduduzo emndenini abanye beveza ukuthi bayomkhumbula ngani. Umgadli weChiefs, uRyan Moon uthe uyazigqaja ngokuthi wasayina inkontileka yakhe yokuqala eqenjini uBartman ayegijima kulo njengomkhaya wakhe. I was not only privileged enough to come from the same small town as you, but also went on to work with you during my first professional contract. My deepest condolences to the Bartman family 
#RIPArthurBartman🙏🏽 
pic.twitter.com/QXnVh0fPPe— Ryan Moon (@ryan29moon) 
March 19, 2019Rest In Peace, Arthur 🙏The club has learnt with sadness of the passing of former goalkeeper coach, Arthur Bartman. Prayers and thoughts go out to the Bartman family during this time. You will always be a part of the Team of Choice.
#WeAreUnited
pic.twitter.com/Sbtj9J6GJG— Maritzburg United FC (@MaritzburgUtd) 
March 19, 2019CTCFC Family has learnt with sadness of the passing of legendary goalkeeper, Arthur Bartman. Our prayers and thoughts are with Bartman family during this time.Rest In Peace AB 🙏💙🙌 
pic.twitter.com/zoBxBLa1lQ— Cape Town City FC (@CapeTownCityFC) 
March 19, 2019R.i.p Arthur Bartman i miss you mate

March 19, 2019
title: Usedlulile emhlabeni owayengunozinti weChiefs

text: : Sineminyaka eyisikhombisa sishadile nonkosikazi wami. Kuningi okusihambela kahle njengomsebenzi nezifundo zethu. Kusukela eminyakeni emine edlule sizama ukuthola ingane kodwa lutho. Kuze kube yimanje asinayo ingane yethu sobabili. Ngisola ukuthi inkinga ikuyena ngoba imina kuphela enginayo nomunye usisi waphambilini.Angiziboni ngiqhubeka nomshado okungenazingane kuwona. Sizame konke engicabanga ukuthi kufanele sikwenze, njengokuya kwadokotela, ukuthatha amaholidi nokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi unkosikazi wami uhlezi ejabulile emshadweni wethu.Udokotela akukho akubonayo okuyinkinga, ngakho angazi noma sekuyinto edinga isiko lakubo na. Angifuni ukuhlukana naye kodwa ngidinga izingane ezithi thina. Ngicela usizo.Thabani, eHarding: Noma abantwana beyisibusiso esivela kuMdali kodwa akuyena wonke umuntu obekelwe ukuthi uyoba nabantwana.Ngakho akuyona into enhle ukufuna ukuhlukana nonkosikazi wakho ngenxa yokungatholi kwakhe abantwana. Phela akulona iphutha lakhe ngakho ukumsola ngalokhu kuyinto embi kakhulu.Kuzomhlukumeza kakhulu ukwazi ukuthi ufuna ukumshiya ngenxa yokungabatholi abantwana. Uma odokotela bethi abayiboni into evimba ukuthi angabatholi abantwana kungenzeka ngempela ukuthi asikho isidingo sokutatazela.Yekelani izinto zenzeke ngesikhathi sazo. Kwezinye izikhathi kuyenzeka ukuthi ingcindezi yenze kube nzima ukukhulelwa kumuntu wesifazane. Yeka ukumxina ubone ukuthi kuzokwenzakalani ngemuva kwesikhathi. Uma kwenzeka egcina engabatholi abantwana, akuyona inkinga leyo. Ningakhulisa lo mntwana wakho eninaye noma nikhulise umntwana okungeyena owenu. Abantu abaningi sebenzenjalo. Ningathokoza emshadweni noma bengekho abantwana uma nina nifuna ukuhlalisana kahle.: Sesineminyaka emibili sithandana nowesilisa odabuka eZambia. Siyathandana kakhulu futhi ungiphathisa okweqanda ngendlela anginakekela ngayo. Kodwa ngisanda kuthola njengoba silungisela ukushada ukuthi akanazo izincwadi ezisemthethweni zokuba kuleli. Ngiyesaba ukuyotshela iziphathimandla zoMnyango wezaseKhaya ngoba bazomphindisa kwelakubo, kube wukuphela kobudlelwane bethu lobo.Ngifisa ukusheshisa udaba lomshado ukuze abe isakhamuzi sakuleli kodwa manje izincwadi ezifanele akanazo. Ngicela usizo bakithi.Tholakele, eVerulam: ENingizimu Afrika kunomthetho othi uma umuntu okungeyena owakuleli eshada nomuntu wakuleli kunikeza umuntu wangaphandle ilungelo lokuhlala kuleli.Kubukeka sengathi isoka lakho selizitholele indlela yokuhlala eNingizimu Afrika njengesakhamuzi. Okubalulekile kodwa ngukuthola ukuthi ngempela ukushada ngoba ekuthanda hhayi ngoba efuna indlela yokuhlala kuleli.Nguwe kuphela ozokwazi ukukubona lokho. Thina nje sithi vula amehlo ukuze ungene kulo mshado ubhekile, ungaziboni usuyithikithi lakhe lokuhlala eNingizimu Afrika. Uma konke kukuhle futhi nithandana, cha asiyiboni inkinga ngokuthandana nomuntu wakwelinye izwe.: Abantwana bami abamfuni nhlobo umyeni wami. Ngahlukana nobaba wabo eminyakeni embalwa edlule nganenhlanhla yokuthola omunye umshado ngonyaka odlule. Njengonina, lokhu kungiphatha kabi kakhulu. Naye useze waphuma kubona njengoba ebona sengathi abamuzwa nhlobo. Lokhu kuyangihlukumeza ngempela ngoba kusobala ukuthi sekumele ngikhethe phakathi kwabo nomyeni wami. Mina bengizifunela umuntu ozongithanda nabantwana bami. Le eyenzeka manje bengingazange ngicabange ukuthi ingenzeka.Ziningi, eThekwini: Kujwayekelekile ukuthi abantwana babe nesikhwele ngomuntu umzali athandana noma ashada naye. Bona njengabantwana banovalo lokuthi ukufika komunye umuntu empilweni yakho kuchaza ukuthi bona bazolahlekelwa ngomunye umzali.Ukuhlukana nobaba wabo kukodwa kunzima kodwa uma nomzali enisele naye eseshada kwenza abantwana babone sengathi sebezolahlekelwa abazali ababili. Ngaphandle nje kokuthi balwela nobaba wabo.Noma iyiphi ingane inesifiso sokuthi abazali bayo bahlale ndawonye. Ayikho ingane ethokoziswa wukuhlukana kwabazali. Ngakho into ebalulekile njengamanje wukuthi ubenze babone ukuthi ukushada kwakho akuzoshintshalutho.Usabathanda njengomama wabo futhi ngeke kushintshe lokho. Kubalulekile futhi bazi nokuthi umyeni wakho akazelanga ukuzovala indawo kababa wabo.Ubaba wabo uyohlale engubaba wabo futhi kuhle nawe ubakhuthaze ukuthi babonane nobaba wabo ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuze bobone ukuthi ubaba wabo usekhona empilweni yabo.
title: [EZOTHANDO] Izingane zami azimfuni nhlobo umyeni wami

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEINJINI yesisu kwiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM), uCelimpilo Ngema, ithi abafuni ukuzifaka emlandweni omubi wokuba yiqembu lokuqala kwiPremier Soccer League, ukunqoba indebe yeNedbank Cup  bedlala kwiligi ephezulu, iDStv Premiership, bese ligawulwa yizembe.UNgema usho kanjena nje, kubukeka itshe limi ngothi njengoba iTshakhuma isemaqenjini asempini yokuvika izembe elizogawula uma kusongwa isizini.Iihlezi endaweni ka-13 kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-29 emidlalweni engu-28. UNgema, uthe yonke imidlalo abayidlalayo inzima kakhulu kwazise wonke amaqembu abhukule kakhulu njengoba isizini isisongwa.Nakuba kunzima kunjalo kodwa uthembisa ukuthi bazokwenza konke  okusemandleni abo ukuvika izembe.“Kunzima kakhulu ukuba kule ndawo esikuyo njengamanje, kodwa kumele senze ngakho konke okusemandleni ethu ukuthi siyalisindisa iqembu ezembeni.“Indlela esidlala kahle ngayo kulezi zinsuku ingenza ngibe nokuzethemba okukhulu ukuthi nangesizini ezayo sizobe sisagijima kwiDStv Premiership. Asifuni ukuzifaka emlandweni omubi wokwaziwa njengeqembu elanqoba indebe yeNedbank kodwa ekugcineni lahamba nayo laya ehlathini,” kusho uNgema phambilini obedlala kuThongathi FC  kwiGladAfrica Championship.Iqembu elizoqeda emsileni kwi-log lizoya ngqo ehlathini kwiGladAfrica. Elisendaweni ka-15 lizodlala eyokuhlunga namabili aqhamuka kule ligi yeNational First Division.UNgema ubuye waphawula nangokufika kwabaphathi abasha nomqeqeshi uDylan Kerr.“Ngingasho ngithi ukufika kwabaphathi abasha eqenjini kuze nomehluko omkhulu kakhulu uma kuqhathaniswa naphambilini.“Manje sesidlala ngaphandle kokuba nokhwantalala kwazise phambilini izinto bezingahambi neze kahle eqenjni. Manje sesinake umsebenzi okumele siwenze enkundleni. Okwenzeka ngaphandle kwayo umsebenzi wabaphathi beqembu. Nokufika komqeqeshi uKerr kube nomthelela omkhulu ekutheni sidlale kahle emidlalweni yethu yakamuva. UKerr ungumqeqeshi okhaliphile wenza izinto ngendlela ehlukile kunomqeqeshi ebesinaye phambilini.”ITshakuma iyoze ibuyele enkundleni ngoJuni 2 idlala neChippa, e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane. IChippa ibambe unombolo-15 okusho ukuthi womabili amaqembu azobe ewadinga ngendlela exakile amaphuzu aphelele.
title: OweTTM ufuna bagweme umlando omubi kwiPSL

text: BAZOWUKHOMBA umuzi onotshwala abadayisa izikhala kulayini wasehhovisi loMnyango wezaseKhaya elisemgwaqeni uMngeni eThekwini.Lokhu kuvezwe imenenja yaleli hhovisi, uMnuz Mbongeni Magagula, ethe ishaqekile ngokuzwa ukuthi kunabantu abafuna imali kubantu ngokubangenisa ezikhaleni zabo kulayini.Isalukazi esicele ukungadalulwa, siveze ukuthi sikhokhele amadoda amathathu ukuze abe phambili kulayini kodwa ashaye achitha nemali yaso.Uthe ufike ekuseni kuleli hhovisi ngoLwesihlanu kwaqhamuka amadoda amathathu acela ukumfunisa indawo yokupaka imoto yakhe.“Bangilandelile ngasemuva kolayini omude, bathembisa ukuthi bazongifaka esikhaleni esiphambili kulayini uma ngingabanika uR300.“Ngibe nokungabaza kodwa ngabacela ukuthi behlise imali ngathi nginoR150. Bagcine sebethatha wona,” kusho isalukazi.Uthe unogada ubembuka ngesikhathi ebanikeza imali, ezama ukumcebisa ukuthi angabaniki. Kodwa wamziba ngoba ebona ubude bukalayini.Uveze ukuthi enye into emenze wakhokha le mali yingoba akakwazi ukuma isikhathi eside, unenkinga yedolo kanti akazi ukuthi udlala amaqola.Onogada ababili abebekhona isalukazi siqolwa bathe sebeyazi ngalo mkhuba wabantu abadayisa izikhala kolayini.Bathe bakhona abantu asebeke bababamba kodwa kunzima ukubona abanye ngoba bafika bengabantu abazokwenza omazisi.UMagagula obeqaphe ulayini uthe lo mkhuba usunesikhathi uqhubeka kuwo wonke amahhovisi abo.Uthe selokhu eqale ukusebenza kuleli hhovisi ngoMashi nyakenye, usexoshe inqwaba yabantu abama ngaphandle kwalo ngenhloso yokuqola abantu.“Sekuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha ngagcina ukuwabona la maqola. Umnyango wethu ubeka eqhulwini abantu asebekhulile ngeminyaka, abakhubazekile nabakhulelwe asebezobeletha.“Uma izisebenzi zinqaba ukubasiza kumele babike ehhovisi lami,” kusho uMagagula.Uthe ukhulumile nonogada ukuthi kumele kuqiniswe ezokuphepha, abazobanjwa bazobathumela emaphoyiseni.
title: Bazoboshwa abadayisa izikhala kolayini

text: IMIPHUMELA yokhetho lokuchibiyela obeluseNkandla ngoLwesithathu isifake itwetwe kwabanye abaholi beNFP asebebona sengathi iyizinkomba zokushabalala kwale nhlangano.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi leli qembu lithelwe ngehlazo lathola amaphesenti amabili kuphela, okuyizibalo ezibengaphansi ngisho kweze-EFF ethole amaphesenti amane ku-ward 7.Bekungekhona okokuqala izibalo ziyiphika njengoba emasontweni amabili edlule lithole izibalo ebezikhomba ukulahlekelwa ukwesekwa okhethweni obeluseMtubatuba.UNkk Sindi Mashinini Maphumulo, obuye ahole abesifazane baleli qembu, uthe inkinga abanayo yimibango okumanje isezinkantolo.Abaholi baleli qembu bafakana enkantolo ngonyaka odlule ngoba befuna kucace ukuthi ngabe uNkk Zanele Magwaza Msibi uyena yini obhala izitatimende nothatha izinqumo ezijulile ngeqembu.Kumanje kulungiselwa ukuba icala lingene ngoJuni 7 enkantolo yaseThekwini ukuze kuqhubeke lolu daba.“Sekuyoba yinhlanhla uma ukhetho luka-2019 lusifice sisekhona ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi okwenzeka manje kukhomba ukuthi sizogcina sishabalele. Yingakho mina engafaka udaba enkantolo ngithathe isinqumo sokuba kuxoxiswane ukuze le ndaba ingabe isaqhubeka ngokwezinkantolo. Nokho inkinga ukuthi ithimba esixoxisana nalo alivumelani nathi ngeziphakamiso esinazo. Thina kolwethu uhlangothi sicele ukuba kubuyiswane bese sithatha abanye abaholi sibafaka esigungwini esakhethwa engqungqutheleni eyayiseNewcastle ngonyaka odlule. Sifuna le nto yokudonsisana iphele ukuze kwakhiwe iqembu ngoba sisenkingeni. Ngisho imiphumela yaseNkandla nezibalo zaseMtubatuba zishayisa ngovalo. Zisitshela ukuthi lukhulu luyeza,” kusho uNkk Mashinini Maphumulo.Lo mholi wafaka iqembu enkantolo ngonyaka odlule ekhala ngesinqumo sokuhlakazwa kweNational Working Committee.Wayefuna inkantolo icacise ukuthi ngabe uKaMagwaza Msibi uyakwazi yini ukubhala nokukhuluma.Leli cala lingene ngoJanuwari 30, lahlehlela uMeyi 25, laphinde lahlehla langena ngoLwesihlanu nalapho lihlehliselwe khona uLwesine (Juni 7).UMnuz Ericson Zungu osohlangothini olufakwe enkantolo uvumile ukuthi isimo ababhekene naso sibe nomthelela okhethweni lokuchibiyela eNkandla naseMtubatuba.“Sonke sifuna iphele le nto yezinkantolo ngoba kumanje uthola ukuthi noma kunokhetho lokuchibiyela akekho ohambayo ayokhankasa. Nalabo abayayo baya kanye noma kabili bese bezihlalela. Ngisho uhlelo lokuqokwa kosuke ezomela iqembu kuba yihlazo nje ngoba kuhlangana abantu abangu-10 bese kuthiwa sekuqediwe. Nalokho kwenziwa ngamakhempu yikho kunje,” kusho uZungu.Uqhube wathi udaba ababhekene nalo lubucayi ngoba uhlangothi lukaNkk Mashinini olufake iqembu enkantolo, aluvumi ukwamukela iziphakamiso zabo.“Bathi bona asikhiphe uMnuz Maliyakhe Shelembe noSolwazi Nhlanhla Khubisa ebuholini ngoba yibo abenza iqembu lagcina lingalungenelanga ukhetho ngo-2016. Thina sithe uma kunjalo abavume ingqungquthela eyayiseNewcastle ukuba ithathwe njengento engazange ibekhona. Sifuna iqalwe phansi bese kuxoxwa indaba yabaholi okufanele bamele zonke izinhlangothi kuTop 6. Inkinga abakuvumi lokho,” kusho uZungu.Uthe yize bebhekene nalesi simo kodwa eZululand ubuholi bakhona buthathe isinqumo sokusebenzisana kahle.Uveze ukuthi kumanje bahlela ukungenela ukhetho lokuchibiyela oluzoba KwaNongoma ku-ward 20.Le ward isale ingenamuntu ngemuva kokugwetshwa iminyaka engu-6 kwekhansela le-IFP.
title: Itwetwe kwiNFP iqembu 'lishabalala'

text: USjava emasontweni amabili kuvele ukuthi uye kuleli lizwe kwangacaca ukuthi uyokwenzani.Kulesi siteji kukhonjiswa abaculi basemazweni ahlukene abasuke bezokhombisa ngethalente labo.USjava eGermany ubeyocula ingoma yakhe ethi Mama.Le ngoma ibe nesasasa kuleli njengoba abantu bebekhombisa ukuyithakasela, naveza ukuthi ubehlonipha ngayo unina wakhe.Ku-video ayifake enkundleni yokuxhumana ubonakala ecula le ngoma nashayelwe izandla abantu abaningi.USjava uthe kukhona konke, ubonga abanikazi balesi siteji abamnike ithuba lokuyocula kusona.“Ngiyabonga kakhulu kwabakaColours. Hhayi nje ngokunginika ithuba lokuthi ngicule kodwa futhi ngokuphinde ngigqugquzele abantu abahlukene abanamaphupho amakhulu, ngiyabonga kakhulu,” kusho uSjava.Uthe ukubonga kwakhe ngeke nje kugcine kubantu abambizile kodwa nakophrojusa bale ngoma.“Ngiyabonga nakubantu bakuleli abalokhu bekhombise ukungixhasa kakhulu,” kuchaza le nsizwa ngonyaka odlule ekhale yamuka nendondo yeViewers’ Choice Best International Act emcimbini wamaBET.Inkampani aqopha ngaphansi kwayo uSjava ikhiphe isitatimende la iveze khona ukuthi iyaziqhenya ngalo mculi.“Uma uqophe endaweni efana naleya, ingoma yakho ibukwa abantu abangaphezu kuka 3 million. Siyambonga ngokuziqheya ngemvelaphi yakhe nokuqhakambisa umculo wakuleli,” kuchaza yena.
title: BUKA: USjava uyaqhubeka nokubhakuzisa ifulegi

text: ZITHWELE kanzima izalukazi zaseLindelani, eThekwini osekuphele izinyanga zihleli emijondolo enezimbobo, emuva kokuthi uMasipala weTheku udilize imizi yazo yodaka uthembisa ukwakha izindlu ezisesimeni esifanele ngokushesha.UNkk Nomandla Mgobhozi (73) onesifo sohlangothi utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ngoJulayi batshelwa ukuthi uMasipala weTheku uzodiliza imizi yabo yodaka eseLindelani kwa-C ngoba midala bese ubakhela imizi emihle esesimeni esifanele.“Sajabula nathi uma sizwa ukuthi umasipala usicabangela into enhle kanjena, satshelwa ukuthi kuzodilizwa ngo-Agasti bese kwakhiwa izindlu zethu. Ngempela ngo-Agasti kwafika ugandaganda wadiliza. Izingane zangihlanganisela umjondolo ngothayela engangifulele ngawo. Kunzima ukuhlala kulo mjondolo ngoba makubanda ubanda kakhulu, uma lishisa ngathi ngiyathoswa. Siyacela umasipala usakhele njengoba wawuthembisile ngoba manje akusezi muntu owakhayo.”UNkk Mgobhozi uveze ukuthi uma bebuza kubantu ababezosebenzela inkontileka okwathiwa izokwakha izindlu zabo, kuvela ukuthi yaxoshwa yingakho umsebenzi umile.Ucele umasipala ukuthi uqoke omunye usonkontileka ngoba uhlezi kabuhlungu nabazukulu bakhe ababili oyedwa oneminyaka eyisithupha nomunye oneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye.UNkk Ntombiyenkosi Sithole (67) naye odilizelwe umuzi wakhe uthe kudala bafika eLindelani, bazakhela imizi yodaka kodwa bayaphoxeka uma uhulumeni engasifezi isithembiso sokubakhela.“Izimpahla zethu zebiwe amaphara. Izingane ezindala zilala ezihlotsheni ezinye ziqube komakhelwane ngoba nginezingane eziyisithupha. Ngisele nabazukulu bami abathathu okuyibona engihlupheka nabo. Siyacela umasipala usakhele izindlu zethu ngoba sesilinde isikhathi eside.”Ikhansela lendawo uMnuz Joseph Khuboni lithe akekho usonkontileka oxoshiwe kodwa okwenzekile wukuthi ngesikhathi kufanele aqale umsebenzi kuye kwaba nabantu abamvimbayo.“Uma kuzoqala umsebenzi kuba nabahlola umhlaba ukuze babone ukuthi usesimeni esifanele yini sokwakha. Lapha kube khona abantu abavimba usonkontileka kodwa lolu daba sesilulungisile ngoba besinomhlangano ngoLwesibili. Udaba lokwakhiwa kwezindlu luzolungiswa,” kusho uKhuboni.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kuMasipala weTheku ayiphumelelanga njengoba kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela bengayiphendulanga i-email abathunyelelwe yona.
title: Izalukazi zisabambe udonga ngezindlu

text: INHLANGANO eyengamele ibhola iSouth African Football Association (SAFA) isiqinisekise iqembu elisha elizodlala umdlalo wobungani neBafana Bafana kulandela ukuhlehliswa komdlalo wayo neZambia ngenxa yezinxushunxushu zokuhlaselwa kwabantu bokufika kuleli.  IBafana ibihlelele ukudlala owesihle neZambia eLusaka ngoMgqibelo kodwa leli qembu lahoxa ngenxa yokusabela ukuphepha kwabadlali kanye nethimba labaqeqeshi. IBafana, esanda kumemezela uMolefi Ntseki njengomqeqeshi wayo omusha, izobhekana neMadgascar kowesihle ngoMgqibelo ngo-19:00 ebusuku e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto. Abalandeli beBafana bazothola ithuba lokubuka iqembu okokuqala lidlalela ekhaya kusukela ngoNovemba wangonyaka odlule, lapho eladlala khona ngokulingana ngo 1-1 libhekene neParaguay emdlalweni weNelson Mandela Challenge eMoses Mabhida Stadium. IMadagascar, ehleli kunombolo 96 emazweni omhlaba ebholeni likanobhutshuzwayo ngokukleliswa yiFIFA, idlale kahle kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) ebise-Egypt njengoba yakhishwa yiTunisia kuma-quartefinals. IMadagascar, edlala kwisigaba seCOSAFA, isadlale imidlalo emibili neNingizimu Afrika, owodwa waphela zibambene kwathi omunye kwawina iBafana. UNtseki umemezele ithimba elizomsiza okukhona kulo u-Arthur Zwane njengephini likamqeqeshi, kanye nowayengumqeqeshi weBafana uTrott Moloto njengomeluleki wakhe. UNtseki ubekelwe umgomo wokufaka iNingizimu Afrika emiqhudelwaneni i-Africa Cup of Nations ka-2021 neka-2023 nakwiNdebe yoMhlaba ezoba seQatar ngo-2022.
title: IBafana isizodlala neMadagascar kowobungani

text: KHETHA SANGWENISEWUPHILA  ngokuvuka ezintatha uyohlala olwandle umndeni wakwaNtunja, ePort Shepstone, ososizini emuva kokuthi ilungu lawo lithathwe wulwandle alangabe lisatholakala.Kuthiwa u-Oscar Ntunja (16) umfana ofundayo, usobozelwe wulwandle ngoLwesibili olwedlule ehamba nabangani bakhe bebhukuda.Uninalume ka-Oscar, uMnuz Sipho Ntunja, uthi umshana wakhe uhambe ewumuntu oyolanda ingane esikoleni bamangele sebezwa ukuthi uthathwe wulwandle. Uthi bebengazi ukuthi uzoqala olwandle ayobhukuda kusho ukuthi bavumelane nabangani ngalokho.‘’Ubehamba nabangani bakhe ababili abalingana naye base benquma ukudlula olwandle. Kuthiwa bebengena bobathathu bebambene, ulwandle lwamthatha yena abanye lwabachilizela ngaphandle. Afikile amaphoyisa ngebhanoyi amfuna aze ayeka, engamtholi.“Sivuka ekuseni ngo-5 siye khona sinethemba lokuthi ulwandle luzomkhafulela ngaphandle,’’ kuchaza uNtunja.Uthi ulwandle beluvaliwe kungavunyelwe muntu ngoba kusavalwe izwe ngenxa yeCorona. Lokhu kudale ukuthi ngesikhathi egwiliza u-Oscar, angasheshi ukuthola usizo ngoba izinhlambi azikho. Kuthiwa abangani bakhe basashaqekile ngoba isigameko senzeke phambi kwabo.UNtunja uthi abakalilahli ithemba lokuthi bazomthola umshana wakhe futhi abakakhanyisi ngisho amakhandlela ngoba abazi noma ushonile lapho akhona, abanaso isiqiniseko.‘’Into esikhala ngayo wukuthi sithole usizo lwabantu abayizinhlambi, abakwaziyo ukutshuza emanzini. Kumi yonke into ekhaya umndeni ukhathazekile ngalesi simo. Sihamba size sifike kwezinye izingxenye zolwandle ngoba kuyenzeka lumchithele kwenye indawo umuntu.’’Uthi usuku nosuku bengamtholi lunzima emndenini ngoba abakwazi ukuqhubeka nempilo bengazi ukuthi kwenzakaleni kuyena.
title: Usuhlala olwandle umndeni ubheka umfana ogwilizile

text:
IZITSHUDENI zase-University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN), eHoward College, ezivuke umbhejazane zathungela isakhiwo nezimoto ngoMsombuluko, zithembisa ukuthungela sonke isikhungo ngomlilo uma zingavunyelwa ukuthi zibhalise. NgoMsombuluko ekuseni, izitshudeni zakulesi sikhungo zitholane phezulu namaphoyisa nonogada kulandela ukunqatshelwa kwezitshudeni ezikweletayo ukuba zibhalise. Izitshudeni bezihlome ngamatshe nangezinduku, okuholele ekutheni amaphoyisa asebenzise izinhlamvu zenjoloba ukuhlakaza isixuku ebesinkanise emagcekeni esikhungo.03 February 2020 - KUMISIWE ukubhalisa e-Edgewood kulandela umbhikisho wezitshudeni ezisabise ngokushisa isikhungo sonke uma zingavunyelwa ukuba zibhalise. Isithombe: Doctor Ngcobo/African News Agency(ANA)Kusolakala ukuthi esinye isitshudeni sidubulekile okudinge ukuthi siphuthunyiswe esibhedlela. Omunye wezitshudeni obezifihle ubuso ngendwangu okhulume nephephandaba elinguzakwabo we
Solezwe, 
iThe Mercury, uthe uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo ePhakeme uMnuz Blade Nzimande, umemezele ukuthi ingxenye engu-15% wesikweletu sezitshudeni usuliwe kanti izitshudeni sezingakwazi ukubhalisa. Ngokombiko wephephandaba elinguzakwabo we
Solezwe, i
Daily News, izitshudeni zithungele ngomlilo isakhiwo iHIV Support Centre esophikweni oluseHoward. Kuphinde kwabikwa ukuthi nasophikweni oluseMgungundlovu kusuke uthuthuva ngalo udaba olufanayo. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/UKZNPROTEST?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#UKZNPROTEST"Blade Nzimande said this 15% historical debt is no more and we can register. When we get here, they demand it and telling us we can't register. What nonsense is that? We must as well burn the school," said one of the students wearing a mask. 
@TheMercurySA— Sakhiseni Nxumalo (@SakhiNxumalo)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/TheMercurySA?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@TheMercurySA
#UKZNPROTEST— Sakhiseni Nxumalo (@SakhiNxumalo)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/UKZNPROTEST?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#UKZNPROTESTLaw enforcement agencies securing the UKZN Edgewood College. The campus has been closed.

title: BUKA: Izitshudeni zishise isakhiwo e-UKZN zifuna ukubhalisa

text: INKAKHA yaseJalimane, uLothar Matthaeus, isixwayise iBayern Munich ngokuthi iqinise ekushudeni emuva uma isibhekene neBayern Munich kowamanqamu e-Uefa Champions League ngeSonto.Ngemuva kokungcwaba iBarcelona ngo 8-2 ngeledlule, iBayern iqale kanzima ngoLwesithathu itwetwiswa yiLyon egcine iyimboze nokho ngo 3-0 kwisemifinal.“IBayern ithwale kanzima kwiLyon ukunalokhu kuyehlele ibhekene neBarcelona,” kusho uMatthaeus, owayedlelela yona iBayern.“Uma bezodlala kanjeya ngeSonto, ngeke bauinqobe iChampions League noma bathembela egameni lokuba zimfivilithi.“IParis ibukhali kabi ukuneBaercola noma iLyon, futhi banabadlali abanele abanamagalelo okuphosa ibhola ezikhaleni ezibucayi.” ILyon iyeke amathuba amaningana ukuqeda ngeBayern ngemuva kokudlala amaphasi abukhali ezikhaleni nadide amaJalimane.Ukaputeni uMemphis Depay uke wageja kwathi noToko Ekambi washaya ipali emizuzwini engu-15 ngaphambi kokuthi uSerge Gnabry ehlise amaphaphu eBayern ngamagoli amabili ngesiwombe sokuqala.URobert Lewandowski ubasele igoli lokugcina ngesiwombe sesibili nokwenze iBayern yanqoba umdlalo ka-21 ilandelana.Akubuzwa ukuthi iBayern iyayishaya inethi ngemuva kwamagoli angu42 emidlalweni engu-10 kwi-Uefa ilandelana.Angu-15 alawo magoli ngakaLewandowski, ohamba phambili ngamagoli kwiChampions League kule sizini kanti uGnabry usekwayisishiyagalolunye.
title: UMatthaeus uxwayisa iBayern ngobukhali bePSG

text:
Kodwa yena uthi akazi ukuthi yini le eyenza abantu baze bambize ngaleli gama. Uthi uyazisebenzela akancikile emadodeni anemali ukuze aphile.Uthe into ebalulekile kuyena ukukhulisa indodana (9) yakhe ngendlela efanele nokusebenza imali ezomenza aphile impilo ayifisayo.Uveze ukuthi uma kukhulunywa izinto ezingeke zimngenisele mali ephaketheni, uvala izindlebe sengathi akezwa lutho.“Uma kungeke kwenze ngcono impilo yengane yami kungifakele imali angizingeni.“Ngiyazi abantu banezincazelo ezingafani ngabantu besifazane abazimele, abazithandayo nabaphila impilo abayithandayo.“Mina ngazitshela ukuthi ngizokwenza konke ukuze ngiphumelele. Ukusebenza nezinkampani zezikhangiso nokubona ukuthi basebenzisa ukukhanga kwemizimba yethu ukukhangisa imikhiqizo yabo, mina ngazibonela ithuba lokwenza imali nentuba yebhizinisi elikhulu.“Yingakho ngathi uma ngifika e-USA ngabona izinto esizenziswa mahhala emakilabhini besikhokhela imali.“Ngabuya ngafika ngashintsha ngabiza imali futhi angizange ngibe nandaba noma sekubatshazwa sengathi yihlazo ukukhangisa ngiveze nomzimba. Kodwa abalandele emva kwethu sebeyalehlisa izinga ngoba benza lokhu ngobunuku babe nqunu noma yikanjani,” kusho uTebogo.View this post on InstagramThe world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.”A post shared by 
Tebogo(@tebogo_thobejane_) on May 23, 2019 at 11:51am PDTUthe okumumangaza kakhulu wukuthi yena ziyaphela nezinyanga eziyisithupha engakaze ashelwe yindoda.“Kufana nale micimbi namazwe okuthiwa abesifazane bahanjiswa amadoda, angikaze ngikwenze lokho. Uma ngingekho ngisuke ngihambe ngokomsebenzi hhayi ngoba ngihanjiswa amadoda.“Ngiyakhangisa ngidayisa neBofa (okuyigama lamabhande okunciphisa isisu kwabesifazane) ngethula nezinkulumo ezakhayo,” kusho uTebogo.Eqhuba uthe ngesikhathi abantu abaningi bematasa nokuhlaziya impilo yakhe, yena uyaqhubeka nokushumayela ivangeli lokuzimela emantombazaneni asemancane.Uveze ukuthi uhambela izikole ezehlukene eGoli ekhuthaza amantombazane ukuthi asebenzise ithuba lezinkundla zokuxhumana ukuziveza nokusungula amabhizinisi.Lokhu uthe ukwenza ngenhloso yokukhombisa intsha ikakhulu amantombazane ukuthi angakwazi ukuzimela nokusebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana ukuzithuthukisa athole nohlobo lwamabhizinisi afuna ukungena kuwo.Ngempelasonto edlule ubeseThekwini kwiYouth Influencer and Entrepreneurs Social Media Summit eHilton Hotel ezogqugquzela intsha ngokubaluleka kokuziqalela ibhizinisi yize usemncane ngeminyaka.
title: Udalula imfihlo ngokhalo lomnyovu

text:
UMNDENI womculi wegqom' uBabes Wodumo aweneme ngendlela udaba lokuhlukunyezwa kwendodakazi yawo olusingathwe ngayo wumsakazi weMetro FM, uMasechaba Ndlovu."Ngeke singaphawuli ukuthi indlela lolu daba olusingathwe ngayo emsakazweni iMetro FM isishiye nemibuzo engaphenduleki njengoba kuye kwacaca ukuthi indodakazi yethu ivinjezelwe ekhoneni ngumsakazi ingalindele. Siyethemba ukuthi izimpendulo ngalesi senzo ziyoqhamuka kwabafanele," kusho uyise kaBabes, uMbhishobhi Welcome Simelane.NgoLwesihlanu uMasechaba unekele izwe ukuthi unomngani owathatha uBabes ngemuva kokuxhifwa wuMampintsha ebusweni ngesibhakela waphuma igazi ngamakhala. Uthe futhi wamshaya waze waphuka emlenzeni.Ngaphambi kokuveza lezi zindaba ezashaqisa abaningi, uMasechaba uzwakala ethi ubeshilo ukuthi ngeke akwenze lokhu ngaphambi kokugeqa amagula. Uze atshele uBabes futhi akadingi nokuthi aphendule.Kusukela kwenzeke lokhu abantu bahlukene phakathi abanye beseka uBabes abanye bekhala ngendlela uMasechaba aluveze ngayo udaba.USimelane uthe ushaqeke kakhulu ngokuzwa ukuthi uMampintsha ubehlukumeza indodakazi yakhe."Sifisa izwe lazi ukuthi siwumndeni asihambisani nazo zonke izinhlobo zokuhlunyezwa kwabesifazane nokuthi besingenalwazi nobudlelwano bezothando abebenabo ngaphandle komsebenzi obubahlanganisile," kusho uSimelane.Uthe akusiyo inqubo yabo ukuthi bazigaxe ezindabeni zangasese zezingane nasemsebenzini eziwenzayo kodwa lolu daba lubaphoqile ukuthi bakhulume "sizwakalise ukuthuka kwethu kwazise izimo zokubulawa kwabesifazane bebulawa ngabebethanda nabo zixhaphakile."Bathe bayabonga kuMampintsha ngokuvundulula uBabes futhi ambeke ezingeni akulo namuhla futhi banethemba lokuthi uzokwamukela ukukhula kwakhe njengoba esenkampani ethi yena iWena Wodumo Entertainment.Babonge abeseke indodakazi yabo.Part 2: ‘UBabes uyongivikela nini emhlabeni?’ 
#BabesWodumo
#Mampintsha
#MasechabaVideo: 
@FaneleBengu
pic.twitter.com/bj0he4QanH— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
May 20, 2018Ngesikhathi ekhuluma emsakazweni uBabes wathi akasathandani noMampintsha ayesethembisene umshado naye. UMampintsha yena uthe ubengaze amtshele uBabes ukuthi abasathandani.
title: Umndeni ugxeka uMasechaba ngolukaBabes

text: LUBUKEKA luselude ukhalo odabeni oluphakathi kweMeya yaseKapa uNksz Patricia de Lille njengoba elwa ngayo yonke indlela ukuphikisana nezinqumo zeqembu lakhe iDA asephenduke umzondo kulo.Ithimba labameli bakaDe Lille eliholwa wuqeqwe u-Advocate Dali Mpofu SC, litshele iNkantolo eNkulu yaseCape Town ukuthi iDA ishaye phansi kwashunqa ngeke uDe Lille alale engandlalelwe.Bafuna ahlale esikhundleni sobumeya kuze kushaye uMeyi 25, lapho kuzophinde kulalelwe khona udaba lwakhe enkantolo .Lo mholi uphume ngaphandle kwenkantolo wakhuluma nenqwaba yabantu abavela emaqenjini ehlukene abebezomeseka.“Sizolwela ubulungiswa sikholwa ukuthi wonke umuntu uyalingana phambi komthetho wezwe."Angizile lapha ngoba ngizibona ngimkhulu kuneqembu," kusho uDe Lille.Abameli bakhe batshele inkantolo ukuthi iDA ixhamazelile odabeni lukaDe Lille ayilandelanga imigudu efanele ngesikhathi imxosha.UDe Lille wephucwe ubulungu beDA wasuswa nasesihlalweni sobumeya eKapa emuva kokungaboni ngaso linye phakathi kwakhe neqembu lakhe.IDA ikhala ngokuthi ayisabethembi ubuholi bukaDe Lille nenguyazana yeqembu emkhandlwini ayisamuzwa kahle.IPhini likaSihlalo wesigungu esiphezulu kwi-DA uNksz Natasha Mazzone uthe, abantu baseKapa mabangakhathazeki ngoba umasipala usazoqhubeka usebenze kahle nakuba kusekhona umdonsiswano.
title: Luselude ukhalo kolweDA nesikhundla sikaDe Lille

text: ISESIMENI esibucayi esibhedlela saseGoli indodana (4) yomlingisi osanda kudlula emhlabeni, u-Andile Gumbi.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi uBhekani Gumbi edubuleke esithweni sangasese ngesikhathi evakashele unina uNksz Hlengiwe Ngcongo eFourways, eGoli ngeSonto ebusuku.Ngokusho kukanina ka-Andile, uNkk Philile Mthabela (58) waseMlaza, uBhekani udutshulwe yisibhamu sikamlamu kaNksz Ngcongo ebesisesikhwameni.“UHlengiwe ungitshele ukuthi bebehleli nezihlobo zakhe begubha usuku lokuzalwa lukaBhekani ngesikhathi uBhekani ethatha isikhwama sikamlamu wakhe esasinesibhamu phakathi. Uthe umlamu wabe esememeza ukuthi akabeke phansi leso sikhwama wathuka wasilahla phansi, kwaqhuma isibhamu samdubula,” kusho uNkk Mthabela.Uthe namanje usadidekile ukuthi umzukulu wakhe udubuleke kanjani ngoba isitatimende asithole emaphoyiseni asifani naleso esishiwo wuNksz Ngcongo.“Sihambile saya eGoli ngoLwesithathu ukuyobona uBhekani. Siye nasesiteshini samaphoyisa iDouglasdale lapho icala elivulwe khona. Sithole ukuthi uBhekani wayenonina noyise ongamzali kuphela ngesikhathi edubuleka. Kuyangithusa ukuthi ngabe usenomunye ubaba ngokushesha,” kusho uNkk Mthabela.Uthe akasho ukuthi uNksz Ngcongo akabambelele emathanjeni ka-Andile ngoba usemncane, impilo kumele iqhubeke.“Ngikhale ngaze ngaphuma esibhedlela ngimbona umzukulu wami ekulesiya simo. Okungiphatha kabi wukuthi angazi ukuthi kuzokwenzakalani kuye njengoba edubuleke endaweni ebucayi.“Ngifuna ubulungiswa, uma kukhona osephutheni ajeze,” kusho uNkk Mthabela.Uqhube wathi: “Bengikhathazwa wukuthi * -Andile usanda kungishiya, kuzoba nguKhisimusi wokuqala engekho,” kusho uNkk Mthabela.Uphikise nemibiko yokuthi uNksz Ngcongo wayeshadile no-Andile.Uthe * -Andile wayegcine ecele isihlobo esihle, wayengakahambisi nomembeso kanti nesitifiketi sakhe sokushona siveza ukuthi ubengashadile.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaNksz Ngcongo ayizange iphumelele.Uthe uma ezwa ukuthi ukhuluma nentatheli wabuza ukuthi kumayelana nani, maqede wathi usematasa ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eGauteng, uCaptain Mavela Masondo, uthe amaphoyisa avulele umnikazi wesibhamu icala lokuba budedenguemuva kokuthi umfana oneminyaka emine ezidubule kwesingezansi.“Kuthiwa ngeSonto ngabo 10.50 ebusuku, umlisa ona-35 wayehleli nomfana nonina ngesikhathi eshiya isikhwama esinesibhamu ekhabetheni lethelevishini, wabe esephuma eya emotweni.“Uzwe sekuqhuma isibhamu engaphandle okuyilapho bebone khona ukuthi umfana usezidubule ngesibhamu asikhiphe esikhwameni,” kusho uMasondo.Uthe umfana uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela, idokodo lecala lidluliselwe kumshushisi ukuze akhiphe isinqumo. Akukaboshwa muntu okwamanje.
title: Indida ngendodana yomlingisi edubulekile

text: INDODA, okuthiwa idlwengule isitshudeni (21) saseWits esigilwe kade sisemcimbini komunye umuzi eGoli ngempelasonto emuva kophuza ingilazi yewayini, izovela enkantolo kuleli sonto.Kuthiwa isitshudeni siphaphame ekuseni singasaligqokile iphenti.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uCaptain Xoli Mbele uthe: “Isitshudeni sithe besisephathini. Indoda ibe isisinikeza ingilazi yewayini. Sithe silale ubusuku bonke saze savuka ekuseni ngo-4.30.”Kusolwa ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi kukhona ebikufakile esiphuzweni sesitshudeni.Kuthiwa sivuke sabiza itekisi, sabona lapho ukuthi iphenti laso likhunyuliwe ngesikhathi silele sabikela onogada.Udaba lube selubikwa emaphoyiseni kwase kuboshwa indoda.UCaptain Mbele uthe amaphoyisa asaphenya. Indoda izovela enkantolo kuleli sonto.Okhulumela iWits, uNksz Buhle Zuma, uthe: “Besingakabikelwa ngokudlwengulwa kwesitshudeni kodwa sisathinte ababhekelele ukuvikeleka kwezitshudeni. Sicele ukuthi basebenzisane namaphoyisa ukuze kutholakale lesi sitshudeni bese siyasizwa.”Uphiko olululeka izitshudeni ngokomqondo kulesi sikhungo kuthiwa lulindele ukusiza.
title: Indoda izovela enkantolo ngelokudlwengula

text: UFUNWA ngamaqembu amabili adlala kwi-Absa Premiership unozinti ohambe kwiPolokwane City kungasabhekwana.Isolezwe lihoshe ukuthi uHerold Ndlovu ugaqelwe yiHighlands Park neStellenbosch FC engomakoti kulesi sigaba.Ngokusho kumthombo osondelene nalo mdlali iMSC Sports okuyinkampani ephethe izindaba zakhe, seyike yaba nemihlangano nala maqembu. Kulindeleke ukuthi izingxoxo ziphothulwe ngesonto elizayo.Kwisizini edlule kusongwe ezintini zeStellenbosch kukhonya uLee Langeveld ovimbe emidlalweni ewu-27. Kukhona noDaykan Hawes ovimbe emithathu yeligi nowodwa weNedbank Cup. UKeegan Pool akakaze adlale nakowodwa.KwiHighlands kukhona uTapuwa Kapini odlale eyeligi ewu-15 nowodwa weTelkom Knockout. Kuboshelwe noMarlon Heugh naye okubukeka engazibekile phansi.Usedlale imidlalo ewu-15 yeligi nemibili yeNedbank. UKyle Peters, obedlala kwiWits ngaphambi kukojoyina iThe Lions of the North, ijezi ulizwa ngendaba.“Nakuba iHighands itshengia ukumfuna uNdlovu kodwa neStellenbosch ayizibekile phansi ngokufuna ukumsayinisa. Kuwona womabili la maqembu kulindeleke ukuthi kucace ngesonto elizayo. UNdlovu kubukeka enganankinga ngawo womabili,” kubeka umthombo.Umthombo ubuye waveza nokuthi inkampani ephethe izindaba zikaNdlovu imzamele umsebenzi nakwiBaroka FC.Kuthintwa uNdlovu ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunamaqembu amfunayo kodwa wala waphetha ukudalula amagama awo.Uthe makuthintwe inkampani ephethe izindaba zakhe.Imizamo yokuthola uJohn Wilson weMSC Sports kayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe belungabanjwa. U-Owen Da Gama, oqeqesha iHighlands, uthe ubengakatshelwa yizikhulu zeqembu ngoNdlovu. Uveze ukuthi bakhona abadlali abazokwethulwa yiqembu ngokusemthethweni maduze.UNdlovu, oneziqu ze-Information Techonology (IT) azithola e-University of Limpopo, uhambe kwiRise and Shine sekukubi. Ubekhala ngaleli qembu ngokungamnyuseli umholo ngo-10 wamaphesenti njalo uma kuqala isizini njengoba kwakuvunyelwene esayina ngoJulayi 2015.Udaba ulufake kwiSouth Africa Football Players Union (Safpu) yona elidlulisele kwiPSL Dispute Resolution Chamber (DRC). I-DRC inike lo nozinti wasePhalaborwa igunya lokuhamba maqede yayalela iRise and Shine ukuthi iphinde imnike uR50 000 wokumsula izinyembezi.Lo nozinti ugcine ukuba ezintini zaleli qembu ngoDisemba wanyakenye azakhe zibambana ngo-2-2 neChippa United.Leli phephandaba libuye lathola ukuthi iPolokwane ngesonto eledlule ibuye yachithwa iPSL kade ifuna ukudlulisa icala. Beyigoloza nephepha elikhulula umdlali nokumkhokhela.Uma uNdlovu egcina ngokusayina kwiHighlands uzolandela uRodney Ramagalela naye ohambe kwiRise and Shine kungasabhekwana.
title: UNdlovu ukhonjwa kwiPark neStellies

text: KUBOSHWE indoda eneminyaka ewu-25 esolwa ngoxhaxha lwamacala okudlwengula abafana, ibalutha ngokuthi ingumqeqeshi kanobhutshuzwayo. Kuthiwa ibathembisa amathuba okudlalela amaqembu amakhulu akuleli, adlala esigabeni sePremier Soccer League.Lo msolwa ongakazodalulwa njengoba engakayibingeleli iMantshi, uboshwe ngemuva kokuthi kuvele ukuthi udlwengule umfanyana wasePinetown, naye abemthembise ukuthi uzomqeqesha esikhungweni sakhe, agcine edlalela iqembu elikhulu kwiPSL.Kuthiwa waya ekhaya lalo mfanyana ngoDisemba wangonyaka odlule, nalapho afike wazichaza njengomqeqeshi ozofezekisa amaphupho alo mfana ozifela ngebhola lezinyawo.Ngemuva kokugcwalisa amafomu athi umgilwa uzoya esikoleni sokuqeqeshelwa ibhola, umndeni wavuma ukuthi umgilwa ahambe nalo mqeqeshi ayohlala kulesi sikhungo.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, umgilwa utshele amaphoyisa ukuthi ngesikhathi besemzini kamsolwa oseKloof, waphuziswa ngumsolwa umuthi owamenza waba nesiyezi.“Kungaleso sikhathi lapho ‘umqeqeshi’ edlwengule khona umgilwa. Uphenyo luveze ukuthi bekungekona okokuqala umsolwa enza okufana nalokhu.“Kunezinsolo zokuthi wavulelwa amacala afanayo esiteshini esiseChartsworth nesiseMarrianhill,” kusho uCol Mbele.UCol Mbele uthe amaphoyisa aphinde athola ukuthi umsolwa unamanye amacala ohlobo olufanayo enzeka eGoli.Uthe uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luwaholele emzini oseKloof, lapho afike abopha lo msolwa oneminyaka engu-25.“Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ehlola indawo yesigameko, athole inqwaba yezinto ezingubufakazi emacaleni kamsolwa.
