Uphenyo luphinde lwaholela amaphoyisa emzini ‘wokuqeqeshelwa’ okwaM KwaMashu.“Amaphoyisa apheke ngemibuzo abafana abane abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-16 no-17 abaficwe kulo muzi,” kusho yena.Uthe kutholakale ukuthi abafana abatholwe endlini baphuma ezindaweni ezahlukene kanti baze ngoba bethenjiswa ukuqeqeshelwa ibhola.Uthe abazali babafana bathintiwe kanti kulindeleke ukuthi baphindiselwe emakhaya.Kulindeleke ukuthi umsolwa avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown, namhlanje.
title: Uzovela enkantolo onukubeza abafana

text: SESITHOLE inqwaba yemibuzo kumakhasimende ethu akuhulumeni asezothatha umhlalaphansi ngohlelo loMnyango wezeziMali olungenasijeziso uma uthatha umhlalaphansi isikhathi singakafiki okungaphansi kwesigaba 16(6) somthetho iPublic Service Act ka-1994.Leli ithuba lifeza izinhloso ezimbili, eyokuqala: ithuba lokuphuma masinyane emsebenzini kulabo abafuna ukuthatha umhlalaphansi sebeneminyaka ephakathi kuka-55 no-60. Into enhle ngalokhu ukuthi kulabo abanale minyaka abazukujeziswa ngokusheshe bayeke ukusebenza, bazothathwa njengabaye empeshenini njengokujwayelekile futhi sekufike isikhathi.Eyesibili: uhulumeni uzothola ithuba lokwehlisa izindleko zomholo okumanje zidla u-33% wesabelo-mali sezwe. Ukukucacisa lokhu, sizoqhathanisa elakuleli namanye amazwe ubone ukuthi yingxenye engakanani yesabelo-mali ethathwa yimiholo yabasebenzi. E-Russia (13.7%), Brazil (11%), Australia (10.44%), USA (9.74%), India (8.13%). Wonke la mazwe angaphansi kweNingizimu Afrika ngo-14.%. Lokhu kuvezwe ucwaningo oluthi “Our World in Data”. Ukuphumelela kukahulumeni ukwehlisa imali, kuyoyehlisa le ngcindezi.Leli cebo loMnyango wezeziMali lizosiza ngokuhlinzeka ngemali amalungu akwazi ukuthatha leli thuba futhi ahambe nezimfanelo zawo ziphelele. Uma kushoda esikhwameni sakho sempesheni uMnyango wezeziMali uzoyigcwalisa. Kunemigomo nemibandela okumele labo abacabanga ukuthatha leli thuba bayicabange.Nansi imibuzo okumele sizibuze yona:* Ingabe yiwona wonke umuntu oneminyaka ephakathi kuka-55 no-60 ofanelekile ukuthatha le mpesheni? Ngokwesaba ukuthi bazoba baningi kakhulu abathatha leli thuba bahlungiwe, akusiwo wonke umuntu ofanelekile novumelekile.Ungakwazi ukufaka isicelo sokusheshe uye empeshenini uma usebenza ngaphansi kwalezi zikhungo ezilandelayo ube ungaphezu kuka-55:EMnyangweni wezokuVikela, eMnyangweni wamaPhoyisa, eMnyangweni wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo, eMnyangweni wezeMfundo, oqashwe njengothisa namalungu eState Security Agency, kwi-Intelligence Services Act 65, 2002.Kweminye iminyango ababaliwe kulolu hlelo. Sisola ukuthi kulezi ezibaliwe yilapho zizoba ziningi izicelo zokuthatha leli thuba.* Ingabe isicelo sami sokusheshe ngithathe umhlalaphansi bazovele basamukele kanjalo-nje?Cha, isikhulu esisemthethweni ngokomnyango lowo osebenza kuwo yisona esizobheka lokhu bese sikhipha isinqumo. * Yini enye engidinga ukuyazi ngeminyango kahulumeni eqondene nokufaka isicelo sami?Kubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi uMnyango wezeziMali nawo uyakugcizelela ukuthi iminyango iqambe amasu enele okuhlunga abantu ukuze umsebenzi ungami uma sekufike isikhathi sokuba labo abazothatha leli thuba bahambe. Okunye ngesabelo-mali kuyosiza uMnyango wezeziMali uqonde ukuthi ingakanani imali edingeka bayihlinzeke ezogcwalisa imali yesikhwama sempesheni.Okunye okubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi kunezizinda ezimbili zokubhekela lolu daba kahle. Phezu kweResponsibility Authority, eyokuqala yi-Early Retirement Assessment Retrenchment Committee (ERAC).Umsebenzi wayo ukuhlola zonke izicelo zesifunda nokuthi zithinta kanjani ukusebenza kweminyango nezabelo-mali zayo. Esinye isizinda yiDepartmental Early Retirement Moderating Committee. Leli thimba yilo elithatha isinqumo sokuthi “ungahlala” noma “ungahamba” emva kokucubungula umsebenzi we-ERAC.* Ingabe isicelo sami sizobhekelwa esikhathini esingakanani?Sithi asithumele isexwayiso ngoba sonke siyazi ukuthi ukwenza izinto kukahulumeni kusebenza kanjani okungadala ukuthi kugcine sekuthathe isikhathi eside kunalokhu esikulindele.Izikhathi okumele siziqaphele futhi sizikhumbule:Kuqale ngo-Ephreli 1, 2019 kuze kube uSepthemba 31, 2019 ukuthathwa kwezicelo (uma kunokwengezwa kwesikhathi, kuyomenyezelwa).Uma samukelekile isicelo, siyohlala izinsuku ezingu-30 lapho ulindeleke ukuthi wamukele noma unqabe iphakheji abakunika yona.Kuvumeleke abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-55 kuya ku-60.Kubalulekile ukuhlela kusekude futhi uthole ukwelulekwa okuyikho nemininingwane eyiyo ukuze imalli yakho uyibeke ngendlela ozozuza ngayo esikhathini esizayo.
title: Ezezimali: Isexwayiso kwabafuna ukuthatha impesheni ngaphambi kwesikhathi

text: WAFIKA eThekwini ezonakekela indodakazi eyashayiswa yimoto owesifazane osehlala nomndeni wakhe ehlathini eWestville, eThekwini.Sekuphele iminyaka emithathu uNksz Bonisiwe Dlamini ehlala ehlathini nezingane eziyisihlanu. Kulezi zingane kukhona indodana uThulebona Dlamini (17) indodana kamfowabo u-Andile Zulu (26), ekamzala wakhe uMbulelo Mdledle, indodakazi uDineo (10) nomzukulu uPrincess (5). Amadodana kaNksz Dlamini okunguSphiwe Dlamini (30) noZamani Dlamini (23) abhadla ejele ngamacala ahlukene, nawo abehlala kuleli hlathi. Umzukulu okuthiwa walaxazwa ngunina, uzalwa ngenye yamadodana asejele.Indlela eya kulo mjondolo osehlathini idlula ezihlahleni eziminyene. Weqa ibhuloho elakhiwe ngezigxobo njengoba kunomfula ngaphansi. Elandisa Isolezwe uNksz Dlamini, uthe wasuka eXobho indodakazi yakhe uSne ishayiswe yimoto.USne owashona ngo-2016 eneminyaka engu-25, kuthiwa wayehlala emjondolo eSydenham eThekwini.“Ngafica isimo sakhe sisibi esibhedlela, onesi bathi akumele ngibe kude naye. Ngaquba isikhashana komunye umjondolo eSydenham ngabuye ngaxoshwa. Kuthe ngizihambela ngabona leli hlathi, ngazobeka umjondolo sahlala sonke nezingane. Bengiya zonke izinsuku esibhedlela futhi yayingekho enye indlela ngaphande kokufuna umjondolo ukusondelela.” Uthe indodakazi yakhe yagcina ishonile njengoba ibigula ehlala nayo kuleli hlathi.Kwahlanganisa ikhansela ukuze ingcwabeke.AKAFUNI ukubalisa ngosizi lwakhe uNksz Bonisiwe Dlamini ohlala ehlathini nomndeni wakhe, othathwe nendodana kamfowabo ahlala nayo u-Andile ZuluKwehla izinyembezi uma exoxa ngokushona kwendodakazi yakhe, athe kwamhlukumeza kakhulu. Okwamhlukumeza wukuthi bekungasekho nokuphindela ekhaya njengoba athola ukuthi umuzi wakhe washa. Uveze nokuthi bekuvele kungabhekwana emndenini, namanje akukho sihlobo axhumana naso.UNksz Dlamini ongathandi ukugqamisa usizi lwakhe, uziphilisa ngokudayisa amakhalibhothi awaqoqa emgwaqweni.Uphinde abe netafula lokudayisa izithelo eduze kwegaraji ngaseWestwood Mall. Yindodakazi yakhe kuphela ehola isibonelelo sikahulumeni njengoba umzukulu ethe usaholelwa ngunina yize amlaxaza.“Uma ngiyodayisa ngihamba nazo izingane zamantombazane ngoba akuphephile ehlathini. Izingubo nokudla siphiwa ngabantu, nakho kubuye kwebiwe yizigebengu.”UMJONDOLO osehlathini eWestville okuhlala kuwo uNksz Bonisiwe Dlamini nomndeni onezingane eziyisihlanu. Isithombe: Isolezwe lifike izingane zibase phansi zipheka ngamathini amnyama. Lo mndeni ugeza emfuleni oseduze, ubuye ucele amanzi egaraji.UMfundisi Bheki Nxumalo ofundisa eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uthe uqale ngePhasika ukubona uNksz Dlamini obehlala eqhamuka ehlathini nezingane.“Ngathatha inombolo yakhe yocingo ngayobona nalapho ehlala khona. Angikholwanga ukuthi kunabantu abaphila le mpilo,” kusho uNxumalo.UMnuz Warren Burne oyikhansela kule ndawo okuthiwe uyazi ngodaba, akatholakalanga ocingweni, wathunyelelwa iSMS engaphendulwanga.
title: Usizi ngesimo somndeni osuhlale ehlathini iminyaka

text: USWELE amaphiko okundiza uPhilile Mngadi (21) ozoyomela iNingizimu Afrika emncintiswaneni iWorld Skills ozoba seKazan, eRussia,ngo-Agasti.UPhindile wenza i-learnership ye-Electrical Engineering esikhungweni sokuqeqesha amakhono se-Edison Power Group (EPG) lapho eqale khona ngoMashi ka2017.“Ngabona udaba lokuthi kunesikhungo sikasomabhizinisi, uMnuz Vivian Reddy, esidinga abafundi ngase ngifaka isicelo sami ngenhlanhla ngaphumelela. Ngaphambi kokungena kule learnership bengiseThekwini College ngenza i-Electrical Engineering. Namanje ngisaqhuba yona futhi iyona engihambisa eRussia.“Ngiyajabula kakhulu ukuthi ngizoyoncintisana nabafundi bakwamanye amazwe bemikhakha ehlukene. Ngiyazi kuningi engizokufunda,” kusho uPhindile.Umncintiswano weWorld Skills uqala ngo-Agasti 22 uphele ngo-Agasti 27. Uhlanganise abafundi bamazwe awu-60 abazobe bencintisana.UPhindile waseMzinyathi, eNanda, uthe wayefunda eThokozani High khona eNanda, enza iPhysics neMaths.Ugqugquzele abantu abasha ukuthi bagxile kulokho abakufunayo banganaki isimo sabo njengamanje kodwa basebenze ngokuzikhandla ukuze baphumelele.“Mina bengifunda ngeNational Student Aid Financial Aid Scheme, angikaze ngicabange ukuthi ngizoya eRussia ngelinye ilanga.“Ngiphuma emndenini efana neminye yabamnyama.“Angisenaye umama, sewashona ngisele nobaba. Angizange nginake isimo sasekhaya. Ngiye ngabheka kulokho engikuthandayo, ngafunda ngakho nozakwethu ngiyacela bafunde,” kusho uNksz Mngadi.Uthe abantu abasha kufanele bayeke nokuqhathanisa impilo yabo neyozakwabo abasheshe baphumelela ngoba lokhu yikona okufakela abanye ingcindezi bagcine sebebona sengathi akumnandi ukuphila.UMnuz Brian Mpono obhekelele ezokuxhumana e-Edison Power Group, uthe uSihlalo wale nkampani, uReddy, uyakuthanda ukuthuthukisa abantu abasha ukuze bakwazi ukuba nempilo engcono.Uthe wunyaka wesine beqeqesha abantu abasha emikhakheni ehlukene futhi bayaziqhenya ngoPhilile ngoba wacela ukuthi angenele lo mncintiswano kuMnuz Derrick Nzama obhekelele ezabasebenzi e-Edison Power Group.“Ngaphambi kokuthi uye eRussia kunezivivinyo ongena kuzo kusukela esifundeni okuso, kuya kwisigaba sesifundazwe bese kuyiwa kuzwelonke. UPhilile uphumelele kuzo zonke lezi zigaba njengoba eseya eRussia.“UMnuz Reddy nesikhulu esiphezulu sale nkampani, uMnuz Bazil Govender, bayakuthanda ukunika ithuba abantu, abakhethi bala ngoba bafuna izwe libe nekusasa eliqhakazile nabantu bakwazi ukuzimela,” kusho uMpono.
title: Ulibhekisa eRussia okhethe imfundo

text: KUZOFUNDISWA izingane ngezincwadi zentatheli yeSolezwe ezibhalwe ngolimi lwesiZulu okuzokwenza kube lula kubazali ngalesi sikhathi sikathaqa eNingizimu Afrika.Izincwadi zikaNksz Zanele Mthethwa ongumbhali wodumo lwencwadi ethi Divorce Breaking The Silence, zikhethwe zabantathu yinhlangano yababhali iMacMillan ukuze zifundise izingane ngolimi lwesiZulu.Lezi zincwadi okubalwa ICebo likaSinothi, UZekhethelo nethi Isipho sikathunjana zizogqugquzela ukusetshenziswa kolimi lwebele ezinganeni nabazali. Zonke lezi zincwadi sezifakwe ngaphansi kohlu lwezincwadi ezizodayiswa ngaphansi kwale nhlangano.Okwenza zehluke kweziningi wukuthi zizokwazi nokuthi zifundiswe izingane ezenza amakilasi ahlukene okubalwa uGrade 4, 5, 6 no-7.Kuningi uNksz Mthethwa athi ukuzuzile ngokubhala lezi zincwadi njengoba kuyizincwadi zakhe zokuqala ngqa eziphathelene nezingane.“Ngacelwa omunye wabasebenza khona, ngaqale ngaba nokungabaza ngoba bengingakaze ngibhale izincwadi zezingane. Kodwa bangicathulisa bangifundisa ukuthi zibhalwa kanjani. Ngizuze okuningi ngagcina sengibhala ezinhlanu. Izincwadi zezingane zihlukile ngoba zihambisana nezithombe okuyinto ebengiyiqala ngqa. IsiZulu bekufanele singaqini kakhulu, kube wulimi olulula ezizosheshe ziluzwe,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Eqhuba uthe lezi zincwadi zizoshiya izingane nezifundo ngezinto ezahlukene njengoba iCebo likaSinothi lifundisa ngemvelo nokunakekelwa kwayo okubalwa nezilwane. Isipho Sikathunjana sona sigxile enganeni eyintandane.Yize okwamanje lezi zincwadi zisatholakala kwi- internet kodwa uma kudlula uthaqa zizotholakala nabantu abazidingayo bazithunyelelwe.“Abazali nezingane bayakwazi ukungena bafunde kwi-website ngoba kugqugquzelwa ukuthi izingane zifunde ngolimi lwazo. Lezi zincwadi zinesifundo futhi zizosiza ukuthi zikwazi nokufunda ngolimi lwebele njengoba kunenkinga yokuthi isikhathi esiningi izingane zihlala zifunda ngesiNgisi. Benze umsebenzi oncomekayo abakaMacMillan ukuze izingane zibe zikwazi ukufunda ngesikhathi sikathaqa,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Ephetha uthe ngaphandle kwalezi zincwadi zikhona nezinye ezimbili azikhiphe ngaphansi kweMacMillan ezikhuluma ngezimo ezahlukene zempilo nezizokwakha izingane.Enye yalezi zincwadi ithi Ngeke Ngiphinde, yona ikhuluma kakhulu ngokukhulelwa kwezingane zamantombazane zisencane, okuyincwadi engasiza abazali abaningi ukuqala izinkulumo ezakhaya nezingane zabo.Abazali sebengazithola lezi zincwadi ku-www.macmillan.co.za ungena ubheke uhlu lwalezi zincwadi kanti zikhona nezinye ezifakiwe.
title: Kuzofundiswa ngezincwadi zoweSolezwe

text: KUBOSHWE abashayeli bamabhasi amathathu abebethwele izintombi ebeziphuma eMkhosini woMhlanga KwaNongoma, ngecala lokushayela bephuzile.Laba bashayeli baboshwe ngeSonto izintombi sezibuyela emakhaya. Ngempelasonto kuvele ukuthi kuboshwe abashayeli abangu 24.Isikhulu esiphezulu eMnyangweni wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sibusiso Gumbi, sincome umsebenzi wamaphoyisa ngokubopha laba bashayeli.“Kuyajabulisa ukuthi ayikho ingozi okushone kuyo abantu ebikiwe ngempelasonto yoMkhosi woMhlanga, lokhu kungenxa yokusebenza ngokuzimisela kwamaphoyisa. Okujabulisa kakhulu wukuthi abaphule umthetho, babanjiwe futhi bazobajeziswa kanzima.“Uhlelo ebesilusebenzisa, lube nomphumela omuhle. Sizoqhubeka nalo mgqigqo. Impela sithi KwaZulu-Natal, alufakwa, lubuya nehlongandlebe,” kusho uGumbi.Umkhankaso wokuqikelela ukuthi kuphephile uqalwe ngoMsombulukongoSepthemba 2 nonyaka, eMdloti, lapho bekubhekwa amabhasi aya eMkhosini woMhlanga ukuthi asesimeni esihle yini.Kulo mkhankaso kwakukhona owayengu-Ngqongqoshe uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, noNgqongqoshe wezoBuciko namaSiko, ezeMidlalo nokuNgcebeleka uNksz Hlengiwe Mavimbela.Kuso sonke isifundazwe bekunemikhankaso ehlukene lapho bekubhekwa izimoto ezilayishe ngokweqile, ezigijima kakhulu, abashayela bephuzile, abangawafakile amabhande nezimoto ezingekho esimeni sokuba semgwaqweni.Kule mikhankaso ebiholwa wuGumbi eqalwe ngoLwesihlanu, KwaNongoma kuboshwe abashayeli abathathu, omunye umshayeli owaseMpumalanga.Ezimotweni ezimisiwe, ezinhlanu zitholwe zinamaphutha. Abashayeli abangu-14 baboshelwe amacala akushayela bephuzile. Izimoto ezintathu ezimisiwe, bezintshontshiwe.
title: Kuboshwe abashayeli bamabhasi abethwele izintombi zoMhlanga

text: UPitch Black, ogama lakhe lokuzalwa nguThulani Ngcobo, uvele enkantolo yeMantshi eJohannesburg ngoLwesihlanu ngecala lokubulala inkosikazi yakhe uCatherine Modisane eYeoville nyakenye ngoDisemba 31.Le nkantolo yasichitha isicelo sakhe sebheyili ngenyanga edlule. IMantshi uPaul du Plessis ithi ayikuboni okuphuthumayo okudinga lo mculi ngaphandle kwejele futhi nobufakazi obuqukethwe abashushisi  buqinile.Icala lihlehliselwe uMeyi 2 abaphenyi becela isikhathi esengeziwe sokuhlaziya umlando osezingcingweni zomsolwa nomufi.Ngaphandle kwecala lokubulala, uPitch Black usolwa nangokuphazamisa ukusebenza komthetho njengoba amaphoyisa ethi akabanga neqiniso ngokudlula emhlabeni kukaCatherine.
title: Usazobhadla ejele uPitch Black Afro

text: IMOTO: KIA PEGASIKIA ifuna ukuheha abanemindeni emincane noma abaqalayo ukuthenga izimoto ngePegas okuyi-sedan yayo entsa.IPegas ishaya ngetiger nose grille yakwaKia, amarimu angu-14 inch nemibala emihlanu ongakhetha kuyo okukhona obomvu, omhlophe neminye.Ngaphakathi bathi ivulekile ngenxa yokuthi iwheelbase yayo ingu-2 570 mm. Bathi izihlalo, eziyindwangu noma ezizishiya sasikhumba kwenye inhlobo, zintofontofo futhi isikhala ebhuthini singu-475 litres. Izinto enazo zihlanganisa i-7 inch touchscreen infotainment system eveza ikhamera ngemuva uma uhlehla, ikwazi ukuxhuma iselula nge-Apple CarPlay/Android Auto, Bluetooth, imbobo ye-USB namabhathini esiteringini. Izibuko emaceleni zihlelwa ngogesi kanjalo namawindi avulwa ngawo belu ugesi.Ngaphansi kwebhonethi kukhona uhlobo olulodwa lwenjini engu-1.4 litre kaphethroli enamandla angu-69kW netorque engu-132Nm. Isebenzisa ugearbox oyi-5 speed manual okanye umshini ozishintshayo oyi-4 speed.Ngakwezokuphepha inama-airbag amabili ngaphambili, indawo yokufaka isihlalo sengane namabhreki e-ABS ne-EBD.Intengo:Pegas 1.4 LX Manual R225,995Pegas 1.4 EX Manual R236,995Pegas 1.4 EX Auto      R251,995Zonke izinhlobo zifika neservice plan yeminyaka emine noma u-60 000kkm, newarranty yeminyaka emihlanu ehlanganisa neRoadside Assistance.
title: IKia yethule isedan entsha iPegas

text: "ANGITHANDI nhlobo ukuthi uDaniel Cardoso ashaye amaphenathi.“ Lokhu kushiwo umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, emuva kokuthi isithandwa sabalandeli beZimpofana uSamir Nurkovic, sivinjelwe iphenathi unozinti we-Orlando Pirates, uRichard Ofori, ngesiwombe sesibili emdlalweni wabakhaya baseSoweto weDStv Premiership.Amakhosi agcine ekhale ngaphansi ngo 2-1, eshaywa eZimnyama kulo mdlalo obunezigemegeme. Amagoli ePirates avalelwe phakathi uThembinkosi "Nyoso" Lorch noSiphesihle "Mbesuma" Ndlovu. Elokubika laMakhosi lishaywe uDaniel Cardoso sekuzophela isiwombe sesibili.UNurkovic uthole ithuba lokushaya iphenathi maphakathi nesiwombe sesibili, iPirates isahamba phambili ngo 1-0. Ukube lo mdlali waseSerbia uyivalele phakathi iphenathi, bekuzowushubisa umdlalo hleze nemiphumela ibizogcina ingamanga ngendlela egcine ime ngayo. Empeleni ngokwejwayelekile uCardoso nguyena ojwayele ukushaya amaphenathi kwiChiefs, kodwa uNurkovic ongukaputeni weChiefs kule zinsuku nguyena onikwe ithuba,  kwabhimba."Ngasho ngifika lapha ukuthi ngeke uCardoso ashaye amaphenathi. Ngakho anginankinga nakancane nokuthi uSamir, uyithathile yavinjwa," usho kanje uHunt.Indlela eshaywe ngayo le phenathi ibingeyinhle neze kwazise ukuphakama kwayo bekumvuna u-Ofori ukuthi ayivimbe kanti futhi ayizange iye ngasekhoneni, nobekungenza umsebenzi ka-Ofori ube nzima. Ebuzwa uHunt ukuthi ngabe usazoxoxa yini noNurkovic ngokushweba kwakhe, uHunt uthe: "Cha ngeke ngikhulume naye, kasikho isidingo. Ube neshwa nje washweba, ibhola linjalo.“Emidlalweni emithathu edlalwe yilezi zinkunzi zaseSoweto kule sizini ka-2020/2021, iPirates iyinqobe yomithathu imidlalo (okuhlanganisa emibili kwiMTN 8, nowodwa weligi). Owokuqala iPirates iqunqobe ngo-3-0, owesibili ngo-2-0 kanye nowangempelasonto ophele ngo 2-1."Bekumele siwunqobe umdlalo wethu nePirates. Sithole inqwaba yamathuba kodwa sadlala ngawo. Angazi bekumi kuphi ngampela. Sizenze thina nje ngokushweba amathuba, kulo mdlalo uma ungawashayi amagoli azongena kuwena," kusho uHunt.Isibabuli sePirates uLorch, sibe ngumdlali ovelele kulo mdlalo wabakhaya. Ebuzwa ngemuva komdlalo ukuthi yini ebenza bebhonye iChiefs kanje kule sizini uthe: "Siyazi ukuthi emuva kabanazo izitobha ezisheshayo. Besifuna ukufaka ngokushesha amabhola asheshayo ngemuva kwabo, nokuyinto esiyenze kahle osukwini sakwazi ukunqoba.“
title: UHunt akayizwa ekaCardoso kumaphenathi

text: KUQOPHEKE umlando izolo ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni iselula yokuqala ukwakhiwa eNingizimu Afrika eyaziwa ngeMara Phone.Le selula esezingeni eliphezulu yesimanje yakhiwe ngabafundi abenza izifundo zobunjiniyela efemini yokwakha amafoni eDube Tradeport eThekwini.Ukwakhiwa nokukhiqizwa kwayo eThekwini kuzokwenza ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ikwazi ukuncintisana namazwe amakhulu akhiqiza amaselula, okuyiKorea eyenza iSamsung, iChina eyenza iHuawei ne-USA eyenza i-iPhone.Ethula inkulumo yakhe emcimbini uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthe kuyintokozo kuyena ukuthi abe seDube Tradeport azozibonela ukwethulwa ngokusemthethweni kweselula eyakhiwe eNingizimu Afrika, okuzosiza izwe ukuze libalwe namanye amazwe ahamba phambili emhlabeni ekukhiqizeni ezobuchwepheshe.“Ngesikhathi ngethula inkulumo yesizwe ngakugcizelela ukuthi izizinda zokuthuthukisa umnotho zibalulekile ekufukuleni umnotho wezwe nokuheha abatshalizimali,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe amazwe amaningi athuthukile emhlabeni afana noChina aqala ngokwakha izizinda zawo zokuthuthukisa umnotho.URamaphosa uthe esembuthanweni wosomabhizinisi nyakenye kwenziwa izimemezelo eziningi, esinye sazo yilesi esithokozelwayo namhlanje (izolo) esenziwa yisikhulu esiphezulu seMara Group, uMnuz Ashish Thakkar owathi ufuna ukukhiqiza iselula ezokwakhiwa eNingizimu Afrika.“U-Ashish (Thakkar) wathi ufuna ukwenza izwekazi i-Afrika lihlonipheke. Ngiyathokoza ukuthi namhlanje iphupho lakhe lifezekile,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe esekhuluma ngesifiso sikaThakkar abanye babecabanga ukuthi uyaziphuphela.UThakkar uthe namhlanje kuyafakazeleka ukuthi abantu base-Afrika bayaphupha bese beyenza.“Namhlanje kuqopheka umlando, iphupho leNingizimu Afrika neMara lifezekile. Ngonyaka odlule senze isithembiso embuthanweni wosomabhizinisi, sathi sifuna ukukhiqiza iselula lapha ezweni. Namhlanje siyajabula ngoba isithembiso sethu sifezekile,” kusho uThakkar.Uthe inkampani yabo iqashe abantu abasha abangu-200.URamaphosa uveze ukuthi kuyimanje babheke ekutheni kuqale uhlelo lwesigaba sesibili seDube Tradeport.Uthe isigaba sesibili seTradeport sizogxila kakhulu ebuxhakaxhakeni bukagesi nomkhakha ohlanganisa amabhanoyi.“Ukuthuthukiswa kweDube Tradeport akuzosiza kuphela isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal kodwa kuzosiza iNingizimu Afrika nezwekazi i-Afrika. Kumanje iTradeport kuno-R3.2 billion, ofakwa ngabatshalizimali abazimele, kwadaleka namathuba emisebenzi angu-12 000, esigabeni sokuqala seDube Tradeport,” kusho uRamaphosa.
title: Umlando kwethulwa iselula yokuqala yakuleli

text: UMQEQESHI weReal Madrid, uZinedine Zidane, uyashaqeka yisenzo sabalandeli bezakhe abahhewule uGareth Bale emdlalweni weLa Liga wangoMgiqbelo behlula ngo 3-0 i-Athletico Bilbao.Ebuzwa ngemuva komdlalo uZidane ukuthi yini ebangela abalandeli ukuthi bahhewule umdlali osenqobe iChampions League kane eminyakeni emihlanu futhi oshaye amagoli okunqoba kumafayineli amabili alo mqhudelwano, uthe:“Angazi. Ngiqinisile, angaqondi ngempela nami.”Isilomo saseWales esinguBale singene ngesiwombe sesibili emdlalweni wangoMgqibelo ngemuva kokushiywa ngaphandle kusukela ngomdlalo wesibili uZidane ebuyele kwesokucija iReal.UBale uzithintile kubalandeli baseBernarbeu ngokuhlulwa yigoli esebhekene nonozinti.Uzamile ukuziphungela kodwa esekhombisa ukungabinamona eshiyela uKarim Benzema iphasi emnikeze igoli lakhe lesithathu kulo mdlalo. Lokho nokho akumsizanga kubalandeli.Ayiphelanga kubalandeli ngoba iReuters ibika ukuthi nabezinaba baseSpain bakhale kuye ngosiba ngoMsombuluko bethi:“Usalokhu ethi ‘good morning’ esikhundleni sokuthi ‘buenos dias’ uma efika enkundleni yokuzilolonga; nakhona uma kwenzekile wabingelela,” ibhale kanje iMarca. -Reuters
title: UZidane udidwa wukuhhewulwa kukaBale

text: ABAWUVALI umlomo abantu baseMsilili, KwaSwayimane, ngesimanga senkomo ezale inkonyane enamakhanda amabili.Inkomo kaMnuz Lindelani Maphumulo (34), uZiyabuya, eyisithole ebesiqala ukumitha, yenze okungajwayelekile izolo sizala inkonyane enanamkhanda amabili kodwa umzimba uwodwa.Umnikazi wale nkomo uthe ubizwe esemsebenzini izolo ukuba aphuthume azobona umhlola.“Inkomo yami ibimithi, bangifonela ekuseni namhlanje (izolo) ngisemsebenzini ukuthi iyazala kodwa akuzaleki. Ngicele omunye ubaba wakwamakhelwane ukuba azolekelela. Kuze kwadingeka ukuba balidonse inkonyane, ukuze liphume ngoba amakhanda abebheke ezindaweni ezehlukene. Bathuke bonke abantu sekuphuma inkonyane enamakhanda amabili,” kusho uMaphumulo.Uthe bekumele bayilekelele bayizalise ngoba ibisengozini yokufa le nkomo.“Ukube abazange bayidonse inkonyane ibizogcina ngokufa,” kusho uMaphumulo.Lo mlimi othe unezinkomo ezingaphezu ku-30 uthe ubeqala ngqa ukubona into emvelele.“Kuyenzeka inkomo ibe namankonyane amabili kodwa awahlangani kanjena. Lena inamamkhanda amabili kodwa umzimba uwodwa nezinyawo ezine. Kube yinto eyisimanga nengajwayele kwimvelo yezinkomo,”  kusho uMaphumulo.Elanda ngale nkomo yakhe athi wayithenga emapulazini, uthe: “Ineminyaka emithathu, ibiqala ukuzala. Inkomo nje efana nezinye,”Uthe le nkonyana enamakhanda amabili usayigcinile ekhaya kuze kube kufika abagcina amagugu abathe bafisa ukuyithatha.Uthe abenhlangano yezilwane ubengakaze abathinte ngalokhu okumvelele.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngokwakhe lokhu okumehlele kuchaza ukuthini uthe: “Angikwazi ukuyichaza le nto.Ubaba obeyibelethisa inkomo uthe kuyinhlanhla lokhu, kusho ukuthi sizokwanda isibaya sami. Abanye bathi kumele ngiyohlola, kukhona ekukhombayo kodwa mina ngikuthatha ngokuthi into eyenzekile nje kwaphela,”Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abantu bebengena bededelana kulo muzi bezobona isimanga. Kuthiwa abanye baze baqasha nezimoto besuka kwezinye izindawo KwaSwayimane.
title: Isimanga senkonyane elimakhanda mabili

text: SABELO NSELEUNOBHALA jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule, uthi akaphoqwanga muntu ukuthi ayovela phambi kwekomiti elibhekele ukuziphatha kwamalungu e-ANC.UMagashule uzovela phambi kwekomiti kusasa, lapho ezophendula khona imibuzo ngokuboshwa kwakhe ngecala lenkohlakalo yethenda yezigidi yokulungiswa kwezindlu ezifulelwe ngetsheboya eFree State.Ekhuluma nabezindaba izolo uMagashule, uthe wazicelela yena ukuyovela phambi kwekomiti.“Ngazicelela mina ukubabona, sabe sesivumelana ngosuku. Akungabazeki ukuthi ngizovela phambi kwekomiti ngoba lokho kuyinto elungile ukuthi ngiyenze.”Isimemezelo sokuthi uMagashule uzovela ekomitini senziwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yokuvala umhlangano wezinsuku ezintathu wesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC.Kulindeleke ukuthi ikomiti lithathe isinqumo sokuthi uMagashule kufanele ashenxe esikhundleni noma aqhubeke njengoba kusaqhubeka icala lakhe lenkohlakalo.I-ANC yathatha isinqumo sokuthi bonke abaholi abanamacala kufanele bashenxe ezikhundleni.Kepha kuningi ukuphikisana ngalo mgomo njengoba kukhona abakholelwa ekutheni awuhambisani noMthethosisekelo wezwe.UMagashule uveze ukuthi i-ANC isacubungula imibono yezazi zomthetho, mayelana nokuthi le nhlangano ingakwazi yini ukuphoqa abaholi ababhekene namacala ukuthi bashenxe ezikhundleni.UMagashule uthe uma isicubungulwe kahle imibono, kuyobe sekubhalwa phansi imigomo ezolandelwa kubo bonke abaholi abanamacala.“Leyo migomo kufanele isetshenziswe kuwo wonke umuntu, kungabi khona ukuchema. Ukuchema kuzokona imizamo yokubumba amalungu e-ANC.”Unqabile ukuphendula imibuzo mayelana nokuthi uzovuma yini ukwehla esikhundleni uma ikomiti linquma kanjalo.Phambilini uMagashule watshela abezindaba ukuthi ngamagatsha e-ANC kuphela angamtshela ukuthi akehle esikhundleni,ngoba yiwona amkhetha.
title: Angiphoqwanga muntu ukuyovela ekomitini le-ANC: Magashule

text: Baveze imibono yabo abantu mayelana nokungahoshelani kweBig NUZ noDJ Tira ongumphathi wayo e-Afrotainment.NgeSonto uTira ukhiphe isitatimende athe kuso akukho ezandleni zakhe ukuthi iBig NUZ izoyikhipha nini i-albhamu ngoba isinabaphathi abasha.Isitatimende wasikhishiswa wukuthi usebuzwe kakhulu ngabantu ngalokhu. IBig NUZ, ebunjwe nguMampintsha noDanger, yagcina ukukhipha ngo-2015 i-albhamu ethi For The Fans ngaphambi kokushona kukaR Mashesha.UMampintsha uzwakale kwiGagasi FM ethi uyakweshwama ukuthi sebenabaphathi abasha. Usole uTira ngokuthi walaxaza iqembu wazinaka yena ngemuva kokuthi ekhiphe i-albhamu kaBabes Wodumo enkampanini yakhe iWest Ink.UFANELESIBONGE BENGU unikele emigwaqweni yeTheku ukuyozwa imibono yabantu,uSIBUSISO NDLOVU wathwebula izithombe.NKOSINATHI MABUZANKOSINATHI MABUZA (19) waseTjakastad, eMpumalanga, uthe uyayazi iBig NUZ kodwa akasiyo umlandeli wayo omkhulu.“Igqom’ nomculo woDJ Tira angiwulaleli kakhulu kodwa engikwaziyo wukuthi ngeke isafana iBig NUZ noma ingabuya. Ngithi mina ayiqhubeke noTira.”NONTOBEKO MKHIZENONTOBEKO MKHIZE (27) waseNkandla uthe ungumlandeli weqembu ngakho kungaba kuhle ukuthi liphinde lisebenze lenze umculo omusha futhi.“UMampintsha unoBabes Wodumo. Siyamthanda uBabes noma ngabe ugqoke ini ngoba thina sinaka lokhu akuculayo. Uma ephuma endlini kusho ukuthi uzibona egqoke kahle. Kubuhlungu kodwa uma sekuphazamiseka iBig NUZ ngoba thina siyawuthanda umculo wayo.”LONDEKA KWEYAMALONDEKA KWEYAMA (18) waseMgababa uthe indaba yeBig NUZ yaphela ngesikhathi kushona uR Mashesha.“Vele uMampintsha uziculela noBabes, ngeke isavuka manje,” kusho yena.THABO RAMOKOENATHABO RAMOKOENA waseBerea uthe uTira udinga usizo nokwelulekwa ngokuphatha abaculi.“Bonke asebenza nabo bashona phansi ekugcineni. Udinga ukufunda ukubamba into ayakhile. Muhle kodwa yena ekudijiyeni. Ikusasa leBig NUZ likuyo ngoba uTira wayicifa ikhona.”EZILE CUJANAEZILE CUJANA (26) waseFlagstaff, e-Eastern Cape, uthe iBig NUZ bayayikhumbula ekuhlukaniseni unyaka ngoba abahlukanisayo manje “siyabaqala”.“Ayibuye ngoba ukuqala ukulandela iqembu nje ngaqala ngayo iBig NUZ.”MTHEMBENI MADIKIZELAMTHEMBENI MADIKIZELA (25) waseMbizana, e-Eastern Cape, uthe: “Okoniwe ngomlomo kungalungiswa mlomo. Ababuyisane. uTira neBig NUZ.”
title: 'I-Big NUZ noTira abaxoxe ngenkinga'

text: SEKUVELE ukuthi ilungiselela ukuqala ukuqopha umdlalo okhuluma ngempilo yeSilo samaZulu uShaka, inkampani iThe Bomb Production.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi ngoLwesihlanu, emakhasini ayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ikhiphe isimemezelo sokuthi ithungatha abalingisi abasha.Le nkampani esikhiqize imidlalo okukhona kuyo Isibaya, Yizo Yizo, Isithembiso neminye, imeme intsha yakuleli ethanda ukulingisa ukuthi izame inhlanhla.Umthombo weSolezwe uthe:“IBomb kuyimanje iya emaphethelweni okuqopha umdlalo Isibaya, ngakho ngemuva kwalokho ngeke besaba nomsebenzi omningi, yikho manje sebekhiphe isimemezelo sokubheka abalingisi njengoba sebeqala ukulungiselela umdlalo okhuluma ngoShaka. Kufuneka abalingisi abaningana impela njengoba lona kuzoba umdlalo omkhulu odinga abalingisi abaningi, abadala nabancane.“ Uveze ukuthi bakhona abalingisi abadumile abazobonakala kulo mdlalo abanye osekukhulunyiwe nabo, ukuthi babe yingxenye yawo.“Kukhona inhlolokhono eyenziwa ngonyaka odlule lapho iBomb yayisebenzisana nabalingisi abahlukene kuleli belungiselela wona lo mdlalo, manje ke kuyacaca ukuthi sebeyela emaphethelweni okulungiselela lo mdlalo yingakho sebefuna abalingisi abasha,“ kuphetha umthombo.UDesiree Markgraaff oyingxenye yabanikazi bale nkampani ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram, uveze ukuthi badinga abesifazane abamnyama abaneniminyaka engu-20 kuya ku-25, abakhuluma isiZulu nesiSotho.Uthe badinga nabesilisa abamnyama abaneminyaka engu-18 kuya ku-25 abakhuluma IsiZulu nezinye izilimi zesiNguni nababukeka kahle futhi abondlekile.
title: Ifuna abalingisi abasha inkampani eqopha Isibaya

text: LIYAVALWA ekupheleni kwale nyanga uJuni iphephandaba lansuku zonke i- Afro Voice ebelaziwa phambilini ngokuthi yi-The New Age.NgoLwesine kubikwa ukuthi abasebenzi baleli phephandaba, batshelwe ukuthi lizovalwa ‘ngenxa yezizathu ezithinta umthetho’.Kuthiwa batshelwe ukuthi abahlale emakhaya kuze kube bayaziswa ukuthi kwenzekani ngalo.Ngokwemibiko, abasebenzi bathenjiswe ukuthi bazokhokhelwa amaholo abo kaJulayi, nakuba iphephaphanda lingeke lisaqhubeka nokushicilelwa.Izintatheli zaleli phephandaba okukhulunywe nazo, zithe lesi simemezelo senziwe usihlalo walo, uMnuz Mzwanele Manyi.UManyi uphinde abe ngumphathi wesiteshi somsakazo i-Afro Worldview, ebesaziwa ngokuthi yi-ANN7 phambilini.Ngesikhathi sokuloba, akatholakalanga uManyi ukuba aphawule ngalezi zinsolo.Emuva kokuthi uManyi edayiselene leli phephandaba nesiteshi somsakazo nomndeni wakwaGupta, kwabe sekushintsha amagama amadala.Inkampani kaManyi, i-Afrotone Media Holdings yenza lolu guquko ngo-Ephreli 23.Lokhu kwaholela ekutheni kube noshintsho ngendlela okwethulwa ngayo izindaba nokulandela indlela yokubhala.Lolu shintsho inkampani yathi ilwenzela ukuthi kungabi kusaba khona okudala okuhambisana nomndeni wakwaGupta okuzoyithinta ngalokhu.Umndeni wakwaGupta, yiwona owatsheleka uManyi imali yokuthenga leli phephandaba nesiteshi sethelevishini.Ngokwemibiko, ukusebenzisana phakathi kwe Multichoice Dstv nesiteshi sikaManyi, kuphela emaphethelweni ka-Agasti, ngomhla ka 30.Selokhu kwenzeka lokhu, kubikwa ukuthi abasebenzi bebebhekana nezinkinga zokuhola sekudlule isikhathi esifanele, abanye kungaziwa nokuthi bangabasebenzi kule ndawo, abanye kuthiwa bafika nomndeni wakwaGuptas uvela nabo e-India.I-Afro Worldview kubikwa ukuthi izama inhlanhla yokuthi iphinde ibuyisele ekutheni iphinde isakaze amahora angu-24 kwiDstv njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi isivumelwanio sayo siphele.
title: Kumnyama kuvalwa iThe Afro Voice

text: I-ANC izithintele iziqandu kwabanye osaziwayo ngesiphakamiso sayo sokuba kugqokwe izimpahla ezimnyama kuleli ngoLwezihlanu ngenhloso yokuphikisana nokubandlululana ngokobuhlanga. Iphini likanobhala wale nhlangano, uNkk Jessie Duarte, uthe ngalo mkhankaso, abawubiza ngeBlack Friday, bafuna wonke umuntu wakuleli agqoke umbala omnyama ukweseka impi yokulwa nobandlululo emhlabeni jikelele."I-USA nomphakathi ongama-Afrika azinze eMelika babambe elikhulu iqhaza emzabalazweni wethu wokulwa nobandlululo. Namhlanje, njengesizwe asikhulume ngazwi linye sithi 'Izimpilo Zabantu Abamnyama Zibalulekile." Abanye osaziwayo abayizwanga kahle le nkulumo kangangoma usomahlaya obuye abe ngumlingisi uSiv Ngesi ufanise i-ANC noquqaba olungosomahlaya kwathi umlingisi uMaps Maponyane uthe iNingizimu Afrika ayilungise izinkinga zayo. "Sinomuzi ongcolile la. Angiqondi kungani sikuziba lokho sicabange ukuthi uzozihlanza wona, esikhundleni engabe siyawunaka." Abanye baze bafanisa ukubulawa kukaFloyd nokukaMnuz Collins Khoza okusolwa ukuthi wabulawa umbutho wezokuvikela kuleli ngoba esolwa ngokuphula imithetho kathaqa e-Alexander. Abanye bakhumbula isihluku okwafa ngaso owayengumholi weBCM, uMnuz Steve Biko.
title: I-ANC izithintele kwabanye osaziwayo ngeBlack Friday

text:
KUSAQHUBEKA ukubulawa kwabantu eMbumbulu ngenxa yombango wengoma namatekisi phezu kokuba inkosi yesizwe uMnuz Khehla Makhanya noNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda sebekhuzile bathi akubekwe phansi izikhali.Sebeyisishiyagalombili manje abantu asebebulewe kule ndawo emasontweni amathathu edlule kusukela kuqale impi yomshoshaphansi okusolakala ukuthi isisusa sayo wumbango wengoma namatekisi esigodini sakwaNgqinya.Kubikwa ukuthi bangaphezu kuka-80 abantu asebebulewe kule ndawo kusukela ngo-2016.Esehlakalweni sakamuva, esenzeke ngoMgqibelo, kuthiwa uMnuz Luya Bhengu ubehla etekisini, ehamba nentombi yakhe, ngesikhathi edutshulwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thulani Zwane, usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko wathi amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala.FUNDA: Kuphume izidumbu ngenxa yengoma“Owesilisa kuthiwa ubehamba nentombi yakhe edilika etekisini. Okwamanje imbangela yokuhlasela ibingakaziwa, amaphoyisa asaphenya, bekungakaboshwa muntu,” kusho uZwane.KUBULAWE abanye abantu ababili eMbumbulu namhlanje ekuseni lapho kuqhubeka khona impi yomshoshaphansi okusolwa ukuthi isuswe ingoma. 
pic.twitter.com/yUjKxBw0mK— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
June 21, 2018UKaunda usanda kuhambela kule ndawo lapho ehlangane nezinhlaka zomphakathi wafike wakhuza, wathi akubekwe phansi izikhali.UNgqongqoshe ufike wamemezela ukuthi sebesungule ithimba eliyisipesheli elizophenya ngokubulawa kwabantu kule ndawo.“Ikhona into ethi kunombango osuswe ingoma. Lo mbango uhamba uze ufake nendaba yamatekisi ngoba abanye abantu abayingxenye yengoma bangosomatekisi,” kusho uKaunda.Uthe nabo abazi ngempela ukuthi yini ebangwayo.Umthombo weSolezwe kule ndawo uthe nakuba ukhona umbango wengoma oke waba khona kodwa lokhu kubulalana kwakamuva kuhlobene nempi yamatekisi.“Abantu baseMbumbulu badlelwe umzila wabo abantu abaziwayo futhi abasatshwayo embonini, yingakho kukhona impi,” kusho umthombo.Uthe ngendlela isimo esishube ngayo abanye osomatekisi baseMbumbulu sebeze bazidayisa izimoto zabo ngoba besaba ukubulawa.
title: Luqeda abantu udlame lwaseMbumbulu

text: USHAYA phansi ngonyawo unozinti weKaizer Chiefs, uDaniel Akpeyi, uthi ngeke leli qembu ligawulwe yizembe yize libhedelwa yizinto kwiDStv Premiership. U-Akpeyi uthe bengabadlali beChiefs sebeyazi ukuthi amanye amaqembu ayazitapela amaphuzu kubona kodwa wathi konke lokho sekuphelile, sebezoshintsha ukwenza.IChiefs izodlala naMaZulu FC emdlalweni wePremiership namuhla, ngo 3 ntambama eJonsson Kings Park, eThekwini. Abalandeli beziMpofana bathukile njengoba leli qembu lidonsa kanzima.Empeleni ezikaGavin Hunt zisanqobe umdlalo owodwa vo kweyisishiyagalolunye. Lokhu kuzishovele kunombolo-14 kwi-log yeDStv Premiership, ngamaphuzu ayisikhombisa.Lesi yisimo esingajwayelekile neze kwiChiefs, kwazise ingelinye lamaqembu ahlonishwayo ngokuqopha izindaba nathathwa njengamakhulu kuleli.“IChiefs yiqembu elikhulu kabi, ngeke nje sazihlaza ngokuthi sigawulwe yizembe. Yebo, kuyinto elindelekile ukuthi abalandeli bathuke kwazise asijwayele neze ukuba kule ndawo esikuyona engeyinhle. Kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi izinto eziningi sizilungisile manje,” kusho u-Akpeyi.Selokhu kufike uBenni McCarthy kuMaZulu, leli qembu alikashaywa emidlalweni emibili. Emdlalweni kaMcCarthy wokuqala, uxoshise uLehlohonolo Seema obengumqeqeshi weChippa United emshaya ngo 3-1. Emdlalweni wesibili udlale ngokulingana neBloemfontein Celtic ngo 1-1, ekuhambeni. Kumanje Usuthu lusendaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log, ngamaphuzu ayishumi, emidlalweni eyisishiyagalolunye.“Sizothatha zonke izinhlungu zethu, nokubhedelwa yizinto sikukhiphele kuMaZulu. Sinabadlali abahlonishwayo esibheke ukuthi basitakule futhi ngokomqondo sisesimeni esihle kakhulu manje. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi siqale ukujabula manje, sijabulise nabalandeli bethu,” usho kanje u-Akpeyi.Ngaphandle kokwenza kahle kwiCAF Champions League, kwazise iChiefs isidlulele kweyamaqoqo, akukho okuhle okwenziwe yiChiefs enkundleni selokhu kuqale isizini. U-Akpeyi uthe bengabadlali bahlanganile, baxoxa bazinuka amakhwapha ngezinto ababona ukuthi zibenzela phansi.“Asineme neze ngokuthi asenzi kahle. Sivumelane ngokuthi kumele sishintshe indlela yokwenza emdlalweni wethu olandelayo. Umdlalo wethu naMaZulu sifuna kube yiwona esishintsha ngawo izinto. Iyathokozisa nendlela abadlali abazinikela ngakhona, kungakho ngingangabazi ukuthi sizozishintsha izinto,” kulandisa u-Akpeyi.Phakathi kwezinto abalandeli beChiefs abanokukhalaza ngazo, amaphutha esithandwa sikanozinti wakuleli u-Itumeleng Khune awenzile emidlalweni edlule. Ukungagqami kwabadlali abahlonishwayo kuleli qembu okubalwa uKhama Billiat noLebogang Manyama nabanye.Bakhona nabakhala ngamasu omqeqeshi uHunt, abakholelwa ekutheni awakasebenzi kuze kube manje, yize lo mqeqeshi efike ethwelwe ngeqoma kuMakhosi ngasekuqaleni kwesizini ngenxa yomlando wakhe wokunqoba izicoco. UBilliat oyiqale yonke imidlalo yeChiefs, izolo kuvele ukuthi uzohlala izinyanga ezimbili ngemuva kokulimala kowe-United ngempelasonto. Omunye ozobe engekho namuhla uLeonardo Castro okuthiwe unezinhlungu esiswini.
title: Unozinti weChiefs akayizwa eyokugawulwa yizembe

text: KUNGENZEKA ukuthi iBafana Bafana isizifake kwenkulu inkinga ngokuhluleka ukushaya iNigeria emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) eFNB Stadium, ngoMgqibelo.EzikaStuart Baxter zibambane neSuper Eagles ngo 1-1 okuchaza ukuthi kufanele zingashaywa uma sezibhekene neLibya emdlalweni wokugcina kaGroup E, ngoMashi wonyaka ozayo. ILibya izobe ingadlaleli ekhaya njengoba kunezinkinga kodwa kubonakele ukuthi idlala kahle ngesikhathi ibhekene neNigeria eTunisia emdlalweni owaphela ngo 3-2 kuwina iSuper Eagles.IBafana idinga iphuzu elilodwa ukuze izibekisele indawo kwi-Afcon eseCameroon ngonyaka ozayo kodwa ngeke kwethuse uma ingagcina ngokuhluleka ukuzibekisela indawo. Sekuke kwenzeka phambilini ukuthi iBafana ihluleke ekugcineni ukubekisa indawo kwi-Afcon.Konke kumosheke ngesikhathi iBafana idlala ngokulingana neSeychelles eshaywa yiwo wonke amaqembu kuGroup E.Kwethuka wonke umuntu iqembu lakuleli libambana neSeychelles ngo 0-0 ekubeni emdlalweni wokuqala laliwine ngo 6-0.Ngaphandle kokudlala ngokulingana neSeychelles iBafana kwakumele iwine ngesikhathi ibhekene neLibya kuleli kodwa nakuwona lowo mdlalo yadlala ngokulingana. Iqembu lakuleli yilona lodwa elingashaywa kuGroup E kodwa ukudlala ngokulingana imidlalo emithathu kungafanele kulimoshele amaphuzu.Amazwe amaningi ahlale enza isiqiniseko sokuthi ayayiwina imidlalo yasekhaya ukuze angazitholi esenkingeni ezifake kuyona iBafana. Njengamanje akekho onesiqiniseko sokuthi iBafana izofike iwine noma idlale ngokulingana ekuhambeni neLibya ngoba nayo (iLibya) iyazi ukuthi uma ingawina lo mdlalo ingazibekisela indawo kwi-Afcon, isale kanjalo iNingizimu Afrika. Kulula kona ukusho ngomlomo ukuthi iBafana idinga iphuzu elilodwa ukuze iye eCameroon ngonyaka ozayo kodwa yinto engeke ibalekelwe ukuthi ingafike ithole induku kwiLibya bese kuphela kanjalo ngephupho lokuya kwi-Afcon.Sekocaca ngawo uMashi ukuthi kwenzekani kodwa iBafana izifake yona enkingeni kungenjalo ngabe kukhulunywa ukuthi izodlala noma kanjani kwi-African ngonyaka ozayo.
title: [IMIBONO] IBafana izilethele yona ukungatshazwa  kweye-Afcon

text: AMAGATSHA  e-ANC kulindeleke ukuthi abe nemihlangano yokuqoka abaholi abazongenela ukhetho lokwengamela i-ANC oluzoba seGoli ngoDisemba.Amagatsha asecwaningiwe nguNobhala Jikelele we-ANC onqume ukuthi angu-870 amagatsha azovunyelwa ukuthi athumele izithunywa engqungqutheleni yangoDisemba. Lawo magatsha avela ezifundeni ezingu-11 zaKwaZulu-Natal.UNobhalala  we-ANC KwaZulu Natal uMnuz Super Zuma uthe isibalo sezithunywa eziyiswa engqugqutheleni siya ngokuthi igatsha linamalungu angakanani, wenza isibonelo ngokuthi elinamalungu angu-100 kusho ukuthi lizothumela isithunywa esisodwa. "Amagatsha anamalungu angaphansi kuka-100 nalawo anobuholi osebuphelelwe yisikhathi ngeke akwazi ukukhetha ubuholi ngempelasonto," kusho uZuma. Uthe amagatsha anikwe kuze kuphele inyanga ukuthi abe nemihlangano. Isazi sepolitiki uMnuz Lukhona Mnguni uthe imihlangano yamagatsha izodala ukuxokozela KwaZulu-Natal ngenxa yoqhekeko olungaphakathi kwi-ANC.
title: Iyaqala imihlangano yamagatsha e-ANC eKZN kulempelasonto

text: UMPHAKATHI waseNgotshe uvale imigudu engenela esiqiwini Ithala Game Reserve kusukela ngoMgqibelo, ukhala ngokuthi kuzolethwa abakuleli abasuka eChina, osaba ukuthi bazofafaza ubhubhane iCoronavirus.Nayizolo lo mphakathi ubusaqhinqe eduze nalesi siqiwi njengoba uveza ukuthi uthole ngabasebenzi beZemvelo KZN Wildlife ukuthi kuzolethwa abalinganiselwa ku-150 abasuka eChina, abazohlala eNtshondwe Lodge engaphakathi kulesi siqiwi.Okhulumela umphakathi uMnuz Mzomuhle Nkosi, uthe bonke basathuka izanya emuva kokuthola lezi zindaba.Uthe bayayikholwa imibiko abayithole ngabasebenzi bakulesi siqiwi, abasaba ukuthi nabo abaphephile njengoba lolu bhubhane selubhuqe abaningi eChina.UNkosi uthe bathole ukuthi indawo engaphakathi kulesi siqiwi ikhonjwe wuMnyango wezeMpilo ukuthi ifukamele abasuka eChina njengoba kusatshelwa ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi basengcupheni emuva kokuqubuka kwegciwane.Uveze ukuthi abapholisanga maseko emuva kokuzwa lezi zindaba, banikela khona esiqiwini bayovala izintuba zokungena nokuphuma kusona.Ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo uthe ekuseni bekuvalwe umgwaqo uR69 ongenela kulesi siqiwi, okuze kwafika amaphoyisa awuvula.“Ngeke sivume ukuthi sizolethelwa ukufa sibhekile. Leli gciwane libaqedile abantu eChina, osekumele lizoqeda thina la. Sithole ukuthi bese bebhukhelwe laba bantu, sathumela amalungu omphakathi ukuyosikhulumela nabaphathi besiqiwi.”Uthe emuva kokuthumela abakhulume nabaphathi besikhungo izolo, bathole ukuthi emuva kwalo mbhikisho, abaphathi besikhungo sebekuhoxisile ukuletha lezi zivakashi. UNkosi uthe bazohlala beqaphile ukuthi akukho bantu abasuka eChina abazofika kule ndawo kodwa kungcono bayizwe ngendaba iCoronavirus. Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba izolo kulindeleke ukuthi kubanjwe omunye umhlangano womphakathi nabaphathi besiqiwi.UMnuz Thanduyise Nkosi oyikhansela, uthe nguyena obize umphakathi izolo ebona udweshu oselusukile.Uthe yize engenakho okubambekayo kodwa iyamkhathaza le mibiko ngoba izodala umonakalo omningi.UMnuz Musa Mntambo okhulumela Ezemvelo KZN Wildlife, wenqabile ukuphawula wacela kuthintwe uMnyango wezeMpilo.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe phansi amaphaphu ngalesi sifo.Uthe kunabantu asebesaba kwasani ngenxa yemibiko engelona iqiniso elethwa emiphakathini.Mayelana nokulethwa kwabavela eChina, uthe akukho okusaqinisekisiwe kodwa bazohlola izindawo abazobekwa kuzo bese bexhumana nabafanele uma kunesidingo.
title: Bavale isiqiwi besaba iCoronavirus

text: ISIKHULU seKaizer Chiefs, uBobby Motaung, asinalo uvalo lokuthi uLeonardo Castro uzolandela ezinyathelweni zabagadli abasayiniswe Amakhosi besuka kwiMamelodi Sundowns kodwa bafika eqenjini bahluleka wukushaya into ecokeme.UCastro ubingelele ngegoli emdlalweni wakhe wokuqala ngesikhathi Amakhosi ethela othulini iBaroka FC ngo 2-1.Ngempelasonto edlule ungene ngesiwombe sesibili iChiefs idlala ngokulingana ngo 0-0 neSundowns.Phambilini iChiefs ike yathatha uKatlego “Killer” Mphela noJosé Torrealba bobabili eyabalanda kwiSundowns.UTorrealba washaya amagoli amane emidlalweni ewu-35 kuMakhosi kusuka ngo-2008 kuya ku-2011. UMphela yena washaya amagoli amathathu emidlalweni ewu-15 ayidlala kwiChiefs.Ebuzwa ukuthi ubengenalo yini uvalo ngokulanda omunye umgadli kuSundowns, uMotaung uthe akasiyena umphrofethi.“Uma usayinisa umgadli usuke umsayinisa ngoba unethemba lokuthi uzofike enze kahle kodwa ngeke ushaye phansi ngonyawo ukuthi uzokwenza kahle. Mina angiyena umphrofethi ngakho ngeke ngithi uzokwenza kahle noma uzokwenza kabi. Asikho isidingo sokuba novalo,” kusho uMotaung.UCastro kubhekwe ukuthi axazulule inkinga yamagoli kuMakhosi. Selokhu kwahamba uKnowledge Musona Amakhosi awakaze amthole umgadli ovutha uphondo. Asezame inqwaba yabagadli okubalwa kubo uBongani “Drogba” Ndulula, Edward Manqele, Siphelele Mthembu, Lewis Macha noMichelle Katsvairo.NgoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama kubhekwe ukuthi umqeqeshi uSteve Komphela abomphele zisuka uCastro uma iqembu lakhe selibhekene neBidvest Wits eBidvest Stadium kowe-Absa Premiership. Ngomzuliswano wokuqala iChiefs yadlala ngokulingana ngo 1-1 neWits e-FNB Stadium. IClever Boys izoya kwiChiefs igcwele ukuzethemba emuva kokuthela iSuperSport United ngehlazo lika 4-1 ngempelasonto.“Uma izinto zingahambi kahle sihlala phansi sibheke ukuthi yikuphi lapho kubhimbe khona. Kwesinye isikhathi uyamsayinisa umdlali umbona enza kahle lapho edlala khona kodwa afike kuwe kube wokunye,” kusho uMotaung.Eminyakeni eyedlule iChiefs ibiyaziwa ngezikwebhisi zabagadli abafana noFani Madida, Shane McGregor, Collins “Ntofontofo” Mbesuma, Pollen “Trompies” Ndlanya nabanye.
title: UMotaung akanavalo ngoCastro

text: UNgizwe Mchunu uzithintele iziqandu komaskandi okubalwa kubo uKhangelani “DSD” Mhlongo nabanye ngokuphika iziqu zabo zobudokotela abasuke behlonishwa ngazo, ngeqhaza labo kulolu hlobo lomculo.Ekhuluma kwi-video eqoshiwe, uNgizwe uthe babili kuphela abantu abakumaskandi okufanele babizwe ngodokotela okunguWelcome Bhodloza Nzimande noSipho Mchunu wodumo lweJuluka.“Sesikhathele ngabantu abathi bangakhumbula i-braai, bafike namakesi kabhiya nenyama, kosiwe bese bethi sebengodokotela. Ayikho indaba yokuthi kuhlangane abangani bakho, basebenzise indawo yasenyuvesi bese bekuhlonipha bethi usungudokotela.“Odokotela babili kuphela kumaskandi, uBhodloza ongumsunguli kamaskandi nobab’ uSipho Mchunu. Abanye cha, angibazi mina.”UNgizwe uthe abantu abathi bangodokotela ngokusemthethweni abaveze ubufakazi bezikhungo ezisemthethweni nezigunyazwe ukuhlonipha abantu ngeziqu zobudokotela.“Umuntu akavele ahlonishwe kodwa kwenziwa ucwaningo ngomuntu ukuthi kumfanele ukuhlonishwa. Noma ungabiza osolwazi bazokutshela ukuthi into engiyishoyo iyona ngqo.“Akekho umuntu onelungelo lokuhlonipha nanoma ngubani ngobudokotela,” kusho uNgizwe ethi inhloso yakhe ukuvikela umlando womculo kamaskandi.Abantu ababambe iqhaza emculweni kamaskandi asebeke bahlonishwa ngeziqu zobudokotela kubalwa uThokozani “Somnandi” Langa, uBuselaphi Gxowa, uKhangelani “DSD” Mhlongo woSaziwayo, Ihhashi Elimhlophe, uMfiliseni Magubane, uDumisani Goba wamaSatma Awards, uThulani “Dr 3 Seconds” Nkwanyana weDr 3 Seconds Maskandi International Festival nohlale ephambili ekuxazululeni ukungahoshelani komaskandi.UDSD imthukuthelise kakhulu inkulumo kaNgizwe“Lo muntu usehamba ezingqubuza kuwo wonke umuntu manje. Bengilokhu ngithi bayamsukela, okungikhathaze kakhulu ukuthi lo muntu uhambe ethi unesandla ekukhuphuleni umaskandi.“Kuyangidida ukuthi uwukhuphula kanjani uma esazama ukunakwa ngamaciko. Akaqali nokho ukuhlambalaza igama lami.”Uthe uma esaqhubeka nokumsanganela uzoveza ubufakazi bokuthi waxoshelwani oKhozini.“Ngaphambi kokubeka odokotela bakamaskandi kusamele atshele abantu iqiniso ukuthi waxoshwelani oKhozini,” kuphetha uDSD.UDr 3 Seconds uthe uNgizwe uzibulawelwa yindlala futhi uzama ukukhuphuka ngabantu ngoba efuna udumo.“Lokhu okungusinqasemfene kwakaMchunu eNkandla udoti lokhu. Nikuqaphele... ngizokubamba ngempela.“Kunomsangano ekhanda, kubulawa yindlala noma kuhambe kuyolusa izinkomo. Akusho ngikunike amatoho.“Iyakubulala indlala ndoda, woza uzolanda izijumbane zokudla,” kusho uDr 3 Seconds owayengumshayisibhakela ohlonishwa umhlaba wonke. USomnandi wenqabile ukuphawula kulokhu okushiwo nguNgizwe.
title: Uzithintele izibonkolo uNgizwe komaskanda

text: IZILOMO zomculo kamaskandi, Igcokama Elisha noKhuzani Mpungose, zifihlelwe induku emqubeni yiqembu elisengamavukana emculweni kamaskandi emcimbini wodumo iMpucuzeko kaMaskandi Festival eseThekwini namhlanje.Leli qembu elidlondlobala ngesivinini, Udidi Olumashoba, liyafunga liyagomela ukuthi yilo elizodla umhlanganiso emkhakheni wabaculi abazotheleka nezinkumbi zabalandeli.Le ndumezulu yomcimbi inamhlanje enkundleni iMoses Mabhida kusukela ngo-10 ekuseni.Umphathi woDidi Olumashoba, uSakhile Ngema, uthe kuzobe kukhonya umbala weqembu lakhe o-navy inkundla yonke.“Iningi labaculi lizobuyela emakhaya liphoxekile ngoba sizonqoba. "UKhuzani usazi kahle futhi usibonile emcimbini wakhe. "Sizobe sitheleke ngenqwaba yezimoto ezinhlobonhlobo ezizobe zibhalwe igama leqembu lethu,” kusho uSakhile. Yize uSakhile ekhuluma kanje kodwa amehlo abalandeli bakamskandi athe njo kuKhuzani, Igcokama Elisha, Osaziwayo, Ezechalaha naMageza Amahle.Ngaphandle kokuqhudelana kwabalandeli ngomswenko, esinye isigaba esibhekwe kakhulu ngesomculi ozoba wumpetha ekudlaleni bukhoma izinsimbi. Kulo munxa kuboshelwe izinkunzi zodwa okubalwa kuzo oShwi Nomtekhala, Thokozani Langa, Khuzani, Igcokama Elisha, Amageza Amahle, Qhoshangokwenzakwakhe, Osaziwayo, Imfezemnyama, Jaiva Zimnike, Dlubheke, AmaSAP, Njoko, Mdumazi, Ichwane Lebhaca, Inyonemhlophe nabanye. Yize kuqhathwe omakadebona abazodlala bukhoma kodwa abaningi baqagula ukuthi umncintiswano uphakathi kukaDlubheke naMageza Amahle ngenxa yamava asebenawo.Kulo nyaka kuzobuye kukhethwe ukuthi ngubani ingqongqo yasesteji phakathi kukaMkhathazi, Bahubhe, Sgwebo Sentambo naBafana BaseMawosi.Kuzoze kuse emnyango abaculi besina bededelana. Kwabazobe bephelezelwa yizinsimbi zeCD kubalwa Izingane Zoma, AmaYellow Bone, Dr Buselaphi, Ithwasa Lekhansela, Umzukulu, Dumakahle, Falabo, Majotha, Mfana Wepiki, Gadla, Cevuzile, Ithwasa Lendidane, Ischomane Sasophongolo, Inkosi Yamagcokama, Skweletu, Abafana BakaMgqumeni, Qalindaba, Oshodo, Mjikijeli, Izelamani, Othanduxolo noSkele Mbhele.Kubaphathi bohlelo kuboshelwe izilomo zoKhozi FM uTshatha Ngobe noZimiphi ‘Zimdollar’ Biyela.
title: Akhombisa ukuzethemba amavukana

text: UMHOLI we-IFP uDkt Mangosuthu Buthelezi uthi kumfikisela umunyu ukuvota okokuqala ngaphandle kwenkosikazi yakhe uNdlunkulu Irene Buthelezi esanda kushona. Ubekhuluma eqeda ukuvota eNkantolo yeNkosi eNkonjeni, oLundi izolo.“Bengihamba naye yonke le minyaka uma ngizovota. Ubezobe ejabule kakhulu ngethuba lokuvota,’’ kusho UShenge.Uthe ukuvota kumkhumbuza izikhathi zakudala bezabalazela izwe. Uthe usazimisele ngokubuyela ephalamende likazwelonke ayosebenzela abantu.Khonamanjalo umholi we-DA KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthi balindele ukuxoxa nawo wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki ngohulumeni wokubambisana kodwa hhayi i-ANC. UMncwango ubevota ngakubo eMangqwashu Primary, KwaMandlakazi KwaNongoma izolo. Uthe indlela abasebenze ngayo balindele ukuthi izibalo zikhombe ukwehla kwamavoti e-ANC esifundazweni. Uthe yilapho abazobe sebengena khona ezingxoxweni namanye amaqembu. Uthe uKhongolose abawucabangi, bayimihlambi eyalanayo.“Asikwazi ukuxoxa ne-ANC ngeke size sihlale nabo. Inkinga ngabo yinkohlakalo,’’ kusho uMncwango.Uthe abantu abaningi bawuzwile umyalezo we-DA futhi bazoyivotela.UMncwango ufike esikhungweni ekuseni ekakwe abaqaphi ababili waba kwabokuqala abahlanu abavote kusanda kuvulwa isikhungo. Ngakolunye uhlangothi uNkk Zanele KaMagwaza-Msibi uvotele ngakubo esikoleni iThengisangaye Primary.
title: #Ukhetho2019: UShenge uvukwe yisilokozane somkakhe evota

text: INGENE ehlazweni inkakha yombhali wemidlalo yeshashalazi, u-Edmund Mhlongo okuthiwa ukhulelise uZawadi Yamungu ongomunye wamaciko abewaqeqesha ngaphansi kwesitebela sakhe iK-Cap, esiKwaMashu.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeSonto ngomthombo walo ongashayi eceleni, kusolwa isenzo sale nkakha ngokuhambi kahle kwezinto emshadweni wayo noBrenda Mhlongo ongumlingisi.Umthombo uveze ukuthi lesi senzo sakhe siphinde samqhatha noMbuso Khoza abebengamathe nolimu naye ngenxa yokuthi uZawadi Yamungu ubesayine ngaphansi kwenkampani kaMbuso.Kumanje kuthiwa uMhlongo umatasa wakhela uZawadi Yamungu umuzi njengoba esemkhulelisile.UMbuso kuthiwa uyena owavundulula ikhono lokucula lale ntokazi, wase ecela umngani wakhe uMhlongo ukuthi amlekelele bayicije kanti uzomane ayikhulelise okuyinto eqede ubungani phakathi kwabo.“ Izindaba zokuthi uMhlongo uselala noZawadi Yamungu, bezilokhu zifika ezindlebeni zikaMbuso. Inkinga uMhlongo ubeze ahlebe uMbuso kule ntokazi ethi ayikho into ezoyilungela uma ilibele ukuthi iyiciko lakhe, yena uzoyenza iphumelele. Kuze kwaba nesikhathi lapho uMbuso ehlaselwa wukhwantalala, uMhlongo wathola ithuba lokumhleba kakhulu ethi usephanjanelwa yikhanda. Ubeze atshele uZawadi Yamungu ukuthi yini ezolunga ephethwe wuhlanya. Konke lokho uMbuso ubezama ukugcindezela wagcina ebonile ukuthi ayikho lento wamkhulula uZawadi Yamungu,” kusho umthombo.Ethintwa uMhlongo uthe ucela kugxilwe emisebenzini yakhe yezobuciko kuyekwe izindaba zangasese. “ Kuningi ongangibuza ngakho njengokuthi zihamba kanjani izinto eK-Cap, njengoba sishawa yiCovid-19. izindaba zangasese ngeke ngizikhulume ngoba amawongowongo lawa ongibuza ngawo. Okwamanje ngimatasa ngisemhlanganweni,’’ kusho uMhlongo. Uthe kade enomcimbi wombukiso wezamafilimu alindele ukubuzwa ngawo hhayi izindaba zangasese. Kuthintwa uMbuso Khoza ngeciko lakhe, uthe uyalazi kodwa akathandi ukuphawula ngodaba lothando lwalo wathi useqhelelene naleli ciko manje umatasa nemisebenzi yakhe.UZawadi Yamungu okuthiwa ukhulelwe ingane kaEdmund ubengalubambi ucingo, wabhalelwa imiyalezo nayo wangayiphendula kodwa kuvela ukuthi ivuliwe. Kushayelwa uBrenda Mhlongo ongunkosikazi kaMhlongo  uthe usendaweni yokucwala izinwele ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma ucela ukuthunyelelwa umyalezo.Esephendula uthumele umyalezo ebabaza kodwa wanganda ngamaningi. Uthe: “ Molo bhuti, angilwazi ke lolu daba ngiluqala ngawe ngimangele,’’ kusho yena.Ukungahambi kahle kwezinto emshadweni kaMhlongo noBrenda kuke kwabikwa ngakho kwavela nokuthi sebehlala ngokuhlukana, kodwa bakuchitha lokho.UMhlongo uyinkakha yombhali wemidlalo yeshashalazi ehlonishwayo. Useke wabhala umdlalo weshashalazi owaduma umhlaba wonke iMadam President, Johnny Makhathini The Musical, Mambazo The Musical neminye. Unenqwaba yabalingisi asebaqeqeshile abanye asebelingisa kuZalo, Isibaya, Imbewu: The Seed, The Lion King neminye.UBrenda naye ungumlingisi osezakhele igama njengoba eseke walingisa indawo kaMaButhelezi kwiGenerations: The Legacy, wadlala ekaNtombizodwa kwiThe Queen kanti kumanje udlala indawo kaKaMadonsela kwiMbewu: The Seed.
title: Ingene ehlazweni inkakha yeshashalazi 'ikhulelisa' intombi

text: LIQHUME kwacaca izembe kwi-Orlando Pirates njengoba ngoLwesithathu iqinisekise ukugqabula igoda lomshado nabadlali abane eqenjini elikhulu nenqwaba kwelincane.Lezi zinkunzi zaseSoweto okuvele ukuthi zisayinise uSiphesihle Ndlovu, Fortune Makaringe noThsegofatso Mabaso, zikhulule unozinti uJackson Mabokgwane, isithandwa sabalandeli uThabo "Section Ten" Qalinge nomgadli u-Ayanda Nkosi.Ekuseni iCape Town City iveze ukuthi isayinise u-Abbubaker Mobara inkontileka yeminyaka emine. Sebebonke abadlali abachithwe yiPirates:Reanetse Ramatlapeng, Katleho Molaba, Samuel Nkomo, Phumulani Masinga, Phila Mzila, Reanetse Ramatlapeng, Ricardo Lourenco, Riyaaz Nell, Tebogo Ngwenya, Rodi Sibanda, Lucky Mdingi noZaahir Witbooi.
title: UQalinge noMabokgwane ezembeni leBucs

text: UMENGAMELI we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa unikele ngezijumbana zokudla kubahlali basehostela iJacobs, eThekwini, izolo ekuseni.UHlabisa uthe baqhuba umshikashika wabo wokunikela ngokudla emindenini ehlala ezindaweni ezinabantu abaningi njengasemahostela nasemijondolo ekhahlanyezwe uthaqa ngenxayeCovid-19.UHlabisa nabaholi beNkatha badlulele emijondolo yaseZimbuzini, eSiphingo, nalapho benikele khona ngamaphasela okudla.Ukudla obekwamukeliswa abantu kube umnikelo wekhansela leNkatha eThekwini, uMnuz Nessa Bhanprakash.UHlabisa uthe emasontweni ambalwa edlule bebesehostela iDalton beqhuba umsebenzi ofanayo.“Lokhu sikwenza ngoba siyaqonda ukuthi iCovid-19 idale umonakalo omkhulu. Abantu abaningi abakabuyeli emsebenzini, abaholanga, kwabanye uphelile umsebenzi ngakho izinga lendlala liphezulu. Abantu esibanikelelayo asibakhethi ngokwezombusazwe kepha bakhethwa yizinduna eziphethe izakhiwo ehostela,” kusho uHlabisa.UNKSZ Bongekile Hadebe okwabathole ukudla obekunikelwa yi-IFP ehostela eJacobs, eThekwini, izolo. Isithombe: BONGANI MBATHA (ANA)UHlabisa uthe leli akulona ithuba lokukhankasa nokuhlunga abantu ngokwezombusazwe.“Asikwazi ukukhankasa ngokuhlupheka kwabantu bakithi. Ukunikela akwenziwe iwona wonke umuntu osesimeni sokuthi angakwazi ukunikela. Bheka umakhelwane wakho, imindeni enabantu abaningi eminye ephethwe izingane nabantu abadala. Njengoba abantu behlezi emakhaya badla kakhulu,” kusho uHlabisa.UHlabisa uqwashise abantu baseThekwini, eyisizinda seCovid-19, wathi abalandele imigomo ebekiwe yezenhlanzeko, baqhelelane ngokwamabanga okusondelana, bageze izandla, bafake izifonyo.“Uhulumeni ngeke anqande ukusabalala kwegciwane uma abantu bephila impilo enobudedengu phakathi.”UBhanprakash uthe uyabathanda abantu basehostela futhi kube nezicelo eziningi abazithole kubahlali bakhona abadonsa kanzima.“Sibone kukuhle ukubuyisa ithemba kubantu bakithi ngokuthi sibanikelele ngokudla kulesi sikhathi esinzima. Lesi isikhathi sokuthi abanotho belule isandla balekelele abaswele. Nami ngikhiphe ephaketheni lami, ngacela nesaphulelo lapho ngithenge khona lokhu kudla,” kusho uBhanprakash.UMnuz Sfiso Chiliza ohlala ehostela ohlomule ngokudla, uswele umlomo wokubonga ngakutholile.Ubonge usizo abalutholile wathi kuyakhombisa ukuthi abalahliwe nabo bengabahlali basehostela.“Akekho obekhethwa ukuthi uphuma kuliphi iqembu. Bekubhaliswa noma wubani. Angisebenzi sihlala sibahlanu endlini ngakho ukudla esikutholile kuzokwenza omkhulu umehluko,” kusho uChiliza.
title: I-IFP nomnikelo wezijumbana zokudla kwabahlala ehostela

text: OSOMATEKISI bamabanga amade KwaZulu-Natal bathi bazowamangalela amaphoyisa abehlise isithunzi abalalisa phansi okwezigebengu ngesikhathi ebabopha eBlood River, eNcome, ngenyanga edlule.Bathi futhi bazifuna la nezibhamu zabo ezashaqwa kade beboshwa.Icala lalabo somatekisi lichithiwe enkantolo ngoLwesihlanu.Isolezwe labika ngokuboshwa kosomatekisi abangu-95, eBlood River ngecala lokubuthana endaweni yomphakathi ngaphandle kwemvume. Ngesikhathi beboshwa batholakala nenqwaba yezibhamu, okubalwa kuzo nezinkulu ezizishintshayo.Okhulumela labo somatekisi, uMnuz BM Mthembu, onguSihlalo kasoseshini waseDundee, uthe bazowamangelela amaphoyisa ngokubehlisa isithunzi.Uthe izingane zabo bese zihlukumezeka ezikoleni kuthiwa obaba bazo bayiBoko Haram ngoba babonakala belaliswe phansi ngamaphoyisa ngesikhathi beboshwa kukhona nezibhamu eduze kwabo kuthiwa zitholakale kubona.“Amaphoyisa ayeqhosha esibophile aze asabalalisa nezithombe zethu kwabezindaba kanti le nto asibophela yona ayikho, okubuhlungu wukuthi abanye bethu balahlekelwa yimali ngesikhathi siboshwa,” kusho uMthembu.Uthe bayazifuna izibhamu zabo njengoba icala selichithiwe enkantolo.UMthembu uthe iningi lamalungu abo ngabantu abadala futhi abafundile.“Kuthina kukhona nodokotela, abanye bethu banemfuyo enzima njengoba amaphoyisa esiphathisa okwezigebengu,” kusho uMthembu.Uthe zonke izibhamu ezathathwa kubona zinabanikazi bazo.“Lezi ezinkulu ngezonogada. Banemvume yokuziphatha, awukho umthetho owaphulwa,” kusho uMthembu.Uthe bona babeseBlood River beqhuba umsebenzi wabo wokugada umsebenzi njengawo wonke amabhizinisi.Uthe banenkinga yososeshini abangamahlathi abantshontsha abagibeli bagcine sebebabulalela ibhizinisi.“Ibhizinisi bese lifile ngenxa yamahlathi ososeshini. Kusukela siqale ukugada umsebenzi akusafani,” kusho uMthembu.Uthe emgwaqweni kuba khona abantu abathathu, abanye bahlala ezimotweni ngababili. Ubechitha isitatimende samaphoyisa sokuthi babuthana endaweni yomphakathi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe izibhamu zosomatekisi zathathwa ukuze ziyohlolwa ukuthi azinawo yini amacala.
title: Osomatekisi bathi bazomangalela amaphoyisa

text: KUVUNGUZA umoya wokuhlukana phakathi kwinhlangano yezepolitiki i-EFF njengoba sekuvele imibiko ethi iphini likamengameli wenhlangano uMnuz Floyd Shivambu noNobhala-Jikelele uMnuz Godrich Gardee bangase bakhishwe ezikhundleni zabo. Lezi zindaba zivela nje, ngoDisemba 13 nango-16, i-EFF izoqoka ubuholi obusha kwinkomfa ezobanjelwa eNasrec Expo Centre, eGoli. Imithombo engaphakathi kwi-EFF iveze ukuthi isikhala sikaShivambu kungenzeka sivalwe uSihlalo wenhlangano kuzwelonke uMnuz Dali Mpofu. Isikhulumi senhlangano kuzwelonke uMnuz Mbuyiseni Ndlozi nelungu lekomidi kuzwelonke uMnuz Marshal Dlamini bathishwa ukuba bavale isikhala sikaGardee. Abe-Independent Media batshelwe ukuthi iningi lamalungu e-EFF akhathazekile ngomsebenzi kaShivambu noGardee, okuthiwa bahluleke ukukhangisa inhlangano emazweni ase-Afrika.  Elinye ilunga le-EFF elingathanda ukudalulwa igama, liveze ukuthi umengameli wenhlangano uMnuz Julius Malema nguyena kuphela ophephile esikhundleni sakhe. Imithombo ithe i-EFF isihlukene phakathi kabili, kanti womabili amaqembu aseka ubuholi bukaMalema. “Elinye iqembu lifuna isekela mengameli akhishwe, agcinwe njengelungu lekomidi lalenhlangano kuzwelonke. Usolwa ngokuhluleka ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe, ikakhulukazi ukukhangisa inhlangano emazweni ase-Afrika,” kuchaza umthombo. Ngesikhathi i-EFF ivakashele eNasrec ngo-Okthoba, uMalema wakhuluma ngokuhluleka kwabanye abaholi ukukhangisa inhlangano emazweni ase-Afrika.  UMalema waveza ukuthi amazwe ase-Africa akhombisa ukuyithanda i-EFF kodwa inhlangano yahluleka ukusebenza lelo thuba. Omunye umthombo uthe akuwona umsebenzi kaGardee ukukhangisa i-EFF emzaweni angaphandle, kodwa uMalema ubenganeme ngoShivambu ngokuhluleka ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe. “Womabili amaqembu afuna umgcini mafa uLeigh-Ann Mathys akhishwe esikhundleni. Kukhona abafuna uVeronica Mente athathe izintambo kuDali Mpofu,” kuchaza lomthombo.
title: Balengelwa yizembe uShivambu noGardee

text: USHAQEKILE umnikazi womuzi ngokufa kowesifazane obengumsebenzi wasendlini yakhe amfice entanta kwi-swimming pool eMatabetulu, eNanda, ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.UMnu Sicelo Nzimande usola ukuthi umufi ukhubekile wawela kwi-swimming pool ngoba bamthole egqoke ephelele izingubo namasokisi kodwa ophaqa bentanta naye emanzini.UNzimande uthi ufike kwakhe ngo-11 ekuseni ezoshiya indodakazi yakhe abeyilande esikoleni iqeda ukubhala wafica uNksz Nobuhle Ndlovu (46) eminzile.UNzimande ulandise wathi yena nomkakhe nezingane ezimbili ezifundayo bahambe ekhaya ekuseni kwase kufika uNksz Ndlovu eze emsebenzini njengenjwayelo.Uthe umufi ubesebabenzele unyaka nezinyanga ekhetha izinsuku, eza ngoMsombuluko, uLwesithathu nangoLwesihlanu engena ngo-7:30 ekuseni ephuma               u-4:30 ntambama.Uqhube wathi umufi ubenokhiye wakhe abengena ngawo kulesi sithabathaba somuzi oyisitezi afike asebenze bese eyagoduka ntambama abuyele emndenini wakhe eStop 8, eNanda.“Kuthe uma ngivula isango lemoto ngisondela, ngabona kunento emnyama emanzini. Sengiseduze ngibonile ukuthi uNksz Ndlovu, ngathuka, ngavele ngafonela  amaphoyisa. Sibe sesithinta nomndeni kamufi ngaphambi kokuthi akhishwe emanzini khona uzozibonela nawo lesi sehlo esibuhlungu kangaka,” kusho uNzimande.Uthe  kungenzeka ukuthi umufi ushelelile waphonseka wase ehluleka ukubhukuda aphume kule swimming pool engu-1.8 metres ukujula kwayo.Uthe umufi ubeyedwa kwehla lo mshophi futhi bafike endlini izinto zisenjengoba bezishiye zinjalo ekuseni, ukhiye uNksz Ndlovu angena ngawo ulenga esicabheni.Indodakazi kamufi, uNksz Tholakele Ndlovu ithe ishayisa amakhala indlela okushona ngayo unina. Ithe ubegqoke ephelele unina futhi isidumbu sakhe simi phuhle emanzini singavundlile okomuntu ominzile.Iqhube yathi abazi bazongcwaba ngani ngoba unina kuphela obekade esebenza emndenini."Sifike sekukhona amaphoyisa sambona engakakhishwa emanzini kwase kuthiwa asihambe. Sithe sizohamba uma sekufike imoto yezidumbu nebala efike yamthatha. Sisola isandla somuntu ekufeni kukamama, ukhona omphushele ku-swimming pool," kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe idokodo ngokushona komuntu eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa asesiteshini saseNanda.
title: Kushaqeke umndeni kutholwa osizayo entanta emanzini

text: ININGI labadlali base-Afrika alibe lisacabanga kakhulu uma kuvela ithuba lokuya phesheya, ligxuma lihlale kodwa okwesikhwishikhwishi seMamelodi Sundowns uPercy Tau kuhlukile kwazise asiyingeni eyokuya kunoma yiliphi iqembu phesheya sifuna elizosidlalisa kwi-Uefa Champions League.Lokhu kuvele ngomfowabo uDumisani Tau odlala phambili kwiRoyal Eagles obekhona begukluza iPretoria University ngo 3-0 emdlalweni weNedbank Cup wokuhlunga amaqembu ayisishiyagalombili eNational First Division azodlala kulo mqhudelwano.Umdlalo we-Eagles namaTuks ubuseSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont ngoLwesithathuntambama.Indaba kaTau nokudlala phesheya ikhulunyelwa phansi yize esengene emlandweni enqoba iCaf Champions League neCaf Super Cup neSundowns waphinda wadlala nakwiFifa Club World Cup.Uphinde waqokwa embangweni wesicoo somdlali ovelele wase-Afrika jikelele kanjalo nakovelele kwabadlala ezwenikazi.“Ufuna iChampions League. Mina ungitshele ukuthi ufuna ukudla i-Uefa Champions League, okusho ukuthi ufuna ukudlala e-Europe. Ubengitshela nangesonto eledlule ukuthi ufuna ukuya e-Europe. Uthe ‘kodwa ngifuna ukukubona ngaphambi kwalokho’ ngoba vele asibonani njalo. Yena ngigcine ukumbona ngoMeyi kusavalwe isizini kodwa ufika (ekhaya) athi qu aphinde ahambe ngoba enjalo nje umatasa nge-diploma yakhe,” kusho uDumisani, ongene ngesiwombe sesibili eClermont zisabambene ngo 0-0 kulo mdlalo wawushukumisa banqoba ngamagoli amathathu.Indlela abanenhlanhla ngayo abafana bakwaTau ibonakala nangokuthi badlalele amaqembu ezimpunyela kwazise i-Eagles ephethwe abakwaMpisane, ngelinye lamaqembu angasokoli kwiNFD kanti kwiSundowns kaPatrice Motsepe ikhiwa ngamafosholo imali.UDUMISANI Tau oveze ukuthi umfowabo akazimisele ukuyojoyina noma yiliphi iqembu phesheya kwezilwandleUDumisani uthe udumo lomfowabo lumengezela inselelo. “Kunzimanyana futhi kumnandi. Akusiyo into elula ukuyenza (ukudlala ibhola elikhokhelayo nomfowabo) ngoba uyazi kunengcindezi yabantu nabezindaba kodwa ngiwujabulela kakhulu umndeni (wakwaTau). Ibhola akusiwo umdlalo olula.”UDumisani uthe okumchaza kakhulu ngesimo sabo yindlela asebeyishintshe ngayo impilo kanina. “Umama usejwayele manje (ukuthi abafana bakhe badumile). Usejabule kwaze kweqa akasazi ukuthi angathini.“Ubaba wethu nguye umuntu obedlala ibhola. Ubedlala kakhulu.” UDumisani mdala kunoPercy okwenza ikusasa lakhe libukeke lingeke lisadlondlobala lidlule elikamnewabo osenqobe i-Absa Premiership kabili, iTelkom Knockout“Akubuzwa ukuthi yimi omdala ukunoPercy, kuyabonakala nje. Ngineminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ngidlala kwiWitbank Spurs. Ngiyamjabulela kakhulu. Ngiyaziqhenya ngaye ngoba uma uthi uyabheka ubenenhlanhla ngoba eminyakeni engu-17 yobudala ubesenqobe indondo (ye-Absa Premiership).“Anginawo nomncane umona ngomfowethu. Ukunaloko ngiyaziqhenya ngaye. "Sengineminyaka ngidlala kwiNFD (National First Division). Unyaka wesishiyagalolunye lo njengoba ngidlala kwiRoyal Eagles. Ngidlale eyisishiyagalombili kwiSpurs. Ngimjabulele ukuthi yena ufikile (ezingeni eliphezulu) ngakho ngijabule kakhulu. Yize esho kanje uDumisani kodwa uyavuma ukuthi udumo lukamnewabo omncane lumfakela ingcindezi.“Ingcidezi la kimi iningi kakhulu. Bafuna ukuthi ngenze kangcono kunaye.Ngenhlahla yena uthuthukiswe ezindaweni eziphezulu, wathola ukuqeqeshwa abaqeqeshi abaphambili.Nokho uyakhombisa ukuthi usevuthiwe ngokomqono kwazise akaziboni efanelwe wukuzixaka ngokwenza kangcono nokuzibonakalisa.“Akekho umuntu engidinga ukumchaza. Ngidlalela igama elisesifubeni nasemuva. Kufanele ngidlale umdlalo wami nje kube ukuphela. (UPercy] uzibonakalisile, usebenzile uqedile. Okwami nje wukuthi ngidlale ibhola ngisimamise igama,” kusho uDumisani. UPercy ngomunye wabadlali abamqoka abathandwayo eNingizimu Afrika. Kuyimanje ubalwa nabadlali abanamagoli amaningi kwiPremiership. Usashaye amahlanu.
title: OweSundowns usephupha nge-Uefa manje

text: ZIKHALA ngokusayina koxhaxha lwezikhulu, abafundi bebe besele dengwane izinyunyana zothisha KwaZulu-Natal ezithe lolu hlelo loMnyango wezeMfundo lwenza ukuthi uthisha ahambe aze abuye isikhala sakhe singavalwanga muntu.Izinyunyana zithe kudingeka ukuthi umnyango uyibuyekeze le nto ngoba ekugcineni abafundi abasala dengwane.Ngokomnyango kumele kuthi uma kuhamba uthisha eya elivini kuqashwe ozovala isikhala sakhe aze abuye oye elivini ukuze umfundi angasali engafundi.UMnuz Allen Thompson, iPhini likaMengameli weNatu, uthe umnyango uhlose ukonga imali ngokungaqashi othisha abazovala izikhala.Uthe uthisha uya elivini yokubeletha aze abuye isikhala sakhe singavaliwe.“Ngale nto umnyango uzama ukonga imali. Okubuhlungu wukuthi umfundi uyasala ezifundweni ngoba abanye othisha basuke bematasa namakilasi abo. Kuthi uma sekufeyilwa kukhalwe ngothisha ekubeni kuwumnyango ongazivali izikhala,” kusho uThompson.Uthe umnyango kumele unike amahhovisi ezifunda amandla okuthi aqashe othisha besikhashana ngoba yiwona asondele ezikoleni.Ukhale ngokuthi impendulo iyaphuza ukubuya enhlokohhovisi ngoba ziningi izikole.UMnuz Sihle Mchunu weSadtu esifundeni uMlaza, ekhuluma kwethulwa umkhankaso wokugqugquzela abenza u-matric ukuthi bazibambe ziqine njengoba sekusele izinsuku ezingaphansi kuka-100 babhale izivivinyo, ukhale kakhulu ngalolu hlelo wathi akumele kulindwe kusayine abantu abangu-10 ngaphambi kokuba kuqashwe uthisha.Uthe le nto ingase yenze bateleke ngoba abahambisani nayo.“Le nto ingenza siteleke ngoba asikwazi ukuthi singalinda kusayine abantu abangu-10 ngaphambi kokuba kuqashwe uthisha wesikhashana. Umnyango awuyibheke le nto.”UMnuz Nathi Ngcobo, obhekele ezokuqashwa kwabasebenzi emnyangweni, uthe yihaba ukuthi kusayina abantu abaningi ukuze kuqashwe othisha besikhashana.Unxuse othishanhloko ukuthi bangahlali namafomu emabhuthini ezimoto zabo bese efika ngemuva kwesikhathi kubona ngoba kuba nokubambezeleka.“Lolu hlelo salwenza ukuze sinqande ukuthi kumane kuqashwe othisha noma yikanjani. Yizinhlelo esazenza kodwa kuyashesha, uma besheshe beletha amafomu kuba lula ukuthi kusheshe izinto,” kusho uNgcobo.Umnyango waqhamuka nalolu hlelo ngemuva kokuthi ngoDisemba nyakenye sinyuke kakhulu isibalo sothisha abaqashwa ngale nyanga ekubeni izikole zavalwa ngasekuqaleni kwenyanga.Lokhu kwenza ukuthi kube yinhloko yomnyango kuphela ezogunyaza ukuthi kuqashwe uthisha uma kukhona oya elivini.
title: Uhlelo lowezemfundo olukhalisa izinyunyana

text: UBALISA ngengcindezi yokuqhathaniswa nengwazi enguyise umdlali osemncane weStellenbosch, uJunaid Sait, ohlalelwe wumsebenzi wokuhola leli qembu alifake ku-Absa Premiership.USait (23) ongukaputeni waleli qembu likaMario Ferreira eligijima kuNational First Division (NFD), uyindodana kaKamaal Sait owayeyisiqongqwane se-Orlando Pirates eminyakeni edlule. UKamaal udlale nakuMaZulu, Santos, nakuCape Town Spurs. Kule sizini uKamaal ubeyiphini lomqeqeshi kuSantos egawulwe yizembe kuNFD nayijoyine esuka kuMilano.UJunaid, naye oyibamba emuva, unengcindezi yokuhamba ezinyathelweni zikayise. Eminyakeni edlule abadlali abazalwa yizingwazi bahluleke bancama ukufinyelela ezingeni loyise. Kulaba kukhona amadodana kaJomo Sono uBamuza noMatsilele abadlalela iqembu likayise iJomo Cosmos kuNFD. Phezu kokuba uJomo ebizwa ngenkosi yebhola kodwa abafana bakhe abazange basondele nakancane ezingeni lakhe. UBamuza useyimenenja yeCosmos.UKaizer Motaung Junior ugcine ethathe umhlalaphansi ebholeni kuseva engakaze abatshazwe ebholeni njengoyise uKaizer Motaung ongumnikazi weKaizer Chiefs owadlala waze wafika phesheya kwezilwandle.“Kunzima ukulandela ezinyathelweni zakhe. Abantu bathi ubaba wayengumdlali oseqophelweni eliphezulu. Sengikujwayele ukuthi abantu balindele lukhulu nakimi futhi ngiyazama ukubhekana nalokho,” kusho uSait.IStellenboch, izibekisele indawo kuma-Play Off emuva kokuqeda endaweni yesithathu ku-log yeNFD. Ihlule iSantos ngo 1-0 wephenathi kaMame Niang emdlalweni wokugcina wesizini ngempelasonto. Leli qembu lithole le ndawo ebibangwa amaqembu amaningi okukhona kuwona AmaZulu, Witbank Spurs neRoyal Eagles.Endaweni yesibili kuqede iBlack Leopards engelinye lamaqembu azodlala kuma-Play Off. Iqembu lesithathu elizodlala kuma-Play Off elizoqeda endaweni ka-15 uma sekuphele imidalo ye-Absa Premiership ngoMeyi 27. IStellenbosch iyona ezoqala neqembu elisuka kuPremiership ngoMeyi 31 ekhaya. Izolandelisa ngeBlack Leopards ekuhambeni ngoMeyi 3 ekuhambeni nokuzoba wumdlalo wayo wesibili kwemine ezocacisa ngamathuba ayo okudlala kuPremiership ngesizini ezayo.Iqembu ngalinye lizodlala ekhaya nasekuhambeni.“Ngiyafisa ukudlala kuPremiership kodwa engikubeke phambili ukuphindela e-Europe. Ngidlalile eSweden iminyaka emibili nasePortugal izinyanga ezimbalwa,” kuphetha uSait.Amaqembu azodudulana kuma-Play Off aqhathwe kanje:Meyi 31: Stellenbosch v Iqembu lePremiershipJuni 3: Black Leopards v StellenboschJuni 7: Iqembu lePremiership v Black LeopardsJuni 10: Iqembu lePremiership v StellenboschJuni 14: Stellenbosch v Black LeopardsJuni 17: Black Leopards v Iqembu lePremiership
title: USait ubhekwe afake ezakhe ku-Absa Primiership

text: Imininingwane yokungcwatshwa ivezwe nguThokozani “Tzozo” Zulu.Amaciko aseThekwini izolo ahambe ayohlangana nomndeni.“Sihlangane eMega City, eMlaza, sase siya kubo KwaMakhutha sayobabona ukuze sikhale nabo,” kusho uTzozo.Uthe ngoLwesine bahlela ukuba nenkonzo yesikhumbuzo eThekwini, lapho iningi lizothola khona ithuba lokuvalelisa.“Ngisazohlangana noMfundisi Vusi Dube ngizwe ukuthi kungaba njani uma ingenzelwa ebandleni lakhe njengoba kuke kwenzeke. Umngcwabo wakhe umndeni uthe uzoba ngoMgqibelo,” kusho uTzozo.Umndeni ka-Ankel uveze ukuthi ubeguliswa yi-TB yesisu.Udadewabo, uBusisiwe, uthe le-TB iyona egcine imnqobile.U-Ankel ushonele esibhedlela esizimele eHillcrest lapho kuvele khona ukuthi ubesegula ngendlela yokuthi isifo besesingawezwa namaphilisi.Uveze ukuthi odokotela bebecabanga ukuthi unofuba kodwa emasontweni adlule bathola ukuthi yiTB yesisu.UBusisiwe uveze ukuthi umfowabo uke wawayeka amaphilisi ngenxa yokungasizakali.U-Ankeli uzakhele udumo ngokuqhulula amahlaya eWorkshop eThekwini wagcina esephatha imicimbi emikhulu eThekwini.
title: U-Ankel uzothunwa ngoMgqibelo KwaMakhutha

text: UBerita usanda kukhipha ingoma yakhe yokuqala ethi, Ndicel’ikiss enkampanini yakhe, i-Assali Music.“Kuyisifiso sami ukuthi ngibe nabaculi enkampanini yami. Kuhle ngoba manje ngiyawulawula umsebenzi wami. Ngikhiphe ama-albhamu amathathu, ngiyazi futhi nginabantu engikwazi ukukhuluma nabo uma ngidinga usizo. Ngaphambi kokuthi ngisayisine abaculi ngifuna ukuthi ngibe nezinkundla zokucobelelana ngolwazi ngifundise abantu, bakwazi ukuzenzela. Abantu abasha besimanje bafuna ukwenzelwa,” kusho uBerita.Uqhube wathi ingoma yakhe ikhuluma ngothando futhi iphume ngesikhathi esikahle ngoba yinyanga yothando.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngayo. Ngokujwayelekile, uma ngibhala ingoma ngithatha isigingci sami kodwa le ngoma yazifikela nje futhi abantu bayayithanda. Ngiyakuthanda ukujabulisa izinhliziyo zabantu,” kusho uBerita othe akanaye umuntu azogubha naye usuku lwezithandani ngoLwesine oluzayo.Uthembise ukuthi kulo nyaka uzokhipha i-albhamu egcwele njengoba agcina ngo-2016 ngeyayiqanjwe ngegama lakhe.“Abantu bayilindile manje ngoba bayabona ukuthi kuyahanjwa. Ngifuna ukuthatha isikhathi ngiyisebenza bese ngikhipha ingoma yesibili ngaphambi kokuthi ngiyidedele.”Uthe ufuna ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla afike ezingeni lika-Oliver Mtukudzi, osanda kushona. Wake wampika benoBra Hugh Masekela engomeni ethi, Mwana Wa Mai.“Ngiyawuthanda umculo, ngibukela kubantu abanjengo-Oliver Mtukudzi onama-albhamu angu-60. Mina angikakaqali ngisho ukuqala ukusebenza. Ukudlula kwakhe kwangihlukumeza kakhulu ngoba ngangingakulindele. Ngonyaka odlule sanandisa emicimbini emihlanu naye, ethi ngiyingxenye yomndeni wakhe. Umculo wakhe uzohlale ukimi.”
title: UBerita ukhiphe inoni elisha

text: UThandeka “TDK Macassette” Mkhwanazi usanda kukhipha ingoma yakhe entsha ethi Zama apike kuyo u-Okmalumkoolkat.Lena yingoma yakhe yesibili kusukela esayine inkontileka yokuqopha, e-Universal Music njengoba phambilini ubephusha ethi Domoroza apike kuyo uMnqobi Yaso.“Emsakazweni umculo wami awudlali. Sesizame sazama lutho. IDomoroza angikaze ngiyizwe, angazi yini inkinga, ngiyafisa ukwazi. Ngiyamenywa emsakazweni idlalwe uma ngikhona bengibhuqa,” kusho uTDK.Uthe usebonga ukwesekwa ngabantu abawuthengayo umculo wabo bawudlale.“Imisakazo yiyo okumele idlale umculo wethu kodwa abaphathi bavele benze sengathi ngeyabo bangasidlali,” kuqhuba yena.Uthe naphezu kwalokhu usazoqhubeka nokukhipha umculo omusha.Uveze ukuthi umatasa upheka i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala.Uthe usebenza nabantu abahlukene okubalwa kubo iRudeboyz, Okmalumkoolkat futhi kukhona nabanye asaxoxa nabo.“Ngiyasebenza angimile. Ngilokhu ngihlohlile nje, anginaso isiqiniseko sokuthi ngizoyikhipha nini i-albhamu. Vese uma uhlohla awusho ukuthi uzodubula nini, abantu ababeke amehlo ezinkundleni zami zokuxhumana.”Uthe ingoma yakhe iZama ikhuluma ngomngani othandwa ngabantu kodwa inkinga ukuthi usethathiwe.Uthe yena akafani noZama ngoba akakathathwa ngoba akanaso isikhathi sokuthathwa usagxile emculweni.Ingoma kaTDK itholakala ezitolo zomculo ze-internet.
title: UTDK Macassette ukhala ngokungadlalwa komculo wakhe

text: UGCINE ewushintshile umqondo umsakazi we-East Coast Radio ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule othe uyawushiya umsebenzi.Ngeledlule uBongani Mtolo utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ukungavumelani ngemali nabaphathi bakhe yikhona okudale ukuthi ligqashuke igoda phakathi kwabo.UBongani usakaza uhlelo lwantambama - East Coast Drive with Bongani and Mags - olungena ngo-3 luphele ngo-6.Izolo i-East Coast ikhiphe esinye isitatimende yathi bahlangene noBongani imbuza ukuthi usengakwazi ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi ngoba abakafaki muntu esikhaleni sakhe kodwa ngeke ube khona uchatha uma esafuna ukuqhubeka. Babe sebevumelana ngenkontileka entsha yeminyaka emibili nemali ebekwe yi-ECR.UZane Derbyshire, ophethe izinhlelo, uthe uBongani ukhethe ukusihoxisa isicelo sakhe sokushiya.“Sijabule kakhulu ukuthi uBongani ugcine enqume ukuqhubeka nathi. Ungumuntu onethalente futhi othandwa kakhulu ngabalaleli bethu. Okumnandi wukusebenza naye futhi usibeka phambili isiteshi kuzo zonke izinto azenzayo,” kusho uZane.UBongani uthe bahlangene naye ngoMsombuluko wababuza ukuthi isivumelwano sabo abakhulume ngaso sisame lapho yini. “Simtshelile ukuthi asikashintshi. Wonke umuntu uphume ejabulile yingakho eqhubeka nomsebenzi,” kusho uZane.UBongani uthe ngemuva kokucubungula isicelo sakhe sokushiya namathuba akade ekhona ubone kungcono abuyele.“Ngibonile ukuthi akusona isikhathi esilungile sokushiya. Ngisebenze kanzima ukuze ngifike la ngikhona manje. Kusekuningi engifuna ukukuzuza,” kusho uBongani.
title: Ushintshe umqondo umsakazi we-ECR
