text: ISIKHULU esiphezulu kwiBaroka FC, uMorgan Mammila, siphumele obala sathi asinqabile nesikhwishikhwishi esifunwa amaqembu amakhulu eNingizimu Afrika uTalent Chawapiwa waseZimbabwe.UMammila uthe iqembu elifuna lo mdlali kuzofanele lilungise imali elinganiselwa kuR3million kuya kuR5million. Ekhuluma ngeledlule eseKing Zwelithini Stadium, ngesikhathi iBaroka ishaywa AmaZulu FC ngo 1-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership, uMammila ukuchithile ukuthi iKaizer Chiefs neMamelodi Sundowns sebeke bamthinta mayelana nalo mdlali.“Alikho iqembu eselike lasithinta ngoTalent. Nami ngizwa ngamahemuhemu ukuthi ufunwa iChiefs, akukho nokho okusabekwe etafuleni okubambekayo. UChawapiwa angenqabile naye, imali abiza yona iphakathi kukaR3million kuya kuR5million. Empeleni uma eqhubeka edlala kahle, izokuya ngokukhuphuka. Okumele kwenziwe uTalent ukuthi aqhubeke nokudlala kahle, ukuze leli qembu elicashile okuthiwa liyamfuna lizophumela obala,” kusho lesi sikhulu.Leli phephandaba like labika ukuthi uChawapiwa uyindoda efunekayo eGauteng. Empeleni kuthiwa kuke kwafufusa umbango ongasukumi phansi phakathi kweSundowns neChiefs kubangwa lo mdlali.“Sizivulile izandla emaqenjini afuna uTalent. Asibona abantu abambi abangavimba umdlali uma esefuna amadlelo aluhlaza. Uma okubekwa etafuleni kusigculisa, akukho nakancane okungavimba ukuthi ahambe,” kuqhuba uMammila.Ngesikhathii iBakgaga Ba Mphahlele idlala noSuthu ngeledlule, kwavela obala ukuthi iningi labadlali beBaroka basebancane futhi abanaso isipiliyoni se-Absa Premiership. UMammila uthe kusesekuseni kakhulu basazothenga abanye abadlali ngoba abaziboni nakancane bevika izembe.“Kuzoba isizini enzima yona kodwa cha silapha ukuzohlala asiziboni nakancane sivika izembe. Sisazoqhubeka sibheke emakethe abanye abadlali, ngoba njengamanje sikhuluma nomgadli ohlonishwayo, engicabanga ukuthi sizoqeda konke naye kungekudala (akafunanga ukumdalula ngenxa yokuthi unenkontileka neqembu thizeni). Kodwa engingakusho nje, sisabheka abadlali emakethe. Sisazosayinisa abanye abadlali,” kusho lesi sikhulu ngokuzethemba.Siphinde sakuqinisekisa ukuthi sifuna umqeqeshi wasouWedson Nyirenda afake iqembu kwiTop 8.Umdlalo olandelayo weBaroka uzoba namuhla neCape Town City, ePeter Mokaba Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.
title: IBaroka ayimile kwekaTalent

text: UKHOMISHANA womnyango oqoqa intela iSouth African Revenue Service (Sars), uMnuz Tom Moyane, uzikhahlele ngezinyawo zombili izinsolo zokuthi abangani bakhe nabanye osomabhizinisi bashushumbisa imali.Lezi zinsolo ezenziwe yiDA, uMoyane uthe akazi zivelaphi.IFinancial Intelligence Centre (FIC) okuyisikhungo esibheka ukuhamba kwemali ezweni siveze ukuthi iNew Integrated Credit Solutions (NICS), ikhokhe * -R600 000 kwi-akhawunti yesinye sezikhulu zakwaSars, uMnuz Jonas Makwakwa.Kuthiwa owayeyiChief Information Officer eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya, ophinde abe ngumngani kaMoyane, uMnuz Patrick Monyeki, ungomunye wabanikazi beNICS ebalwa nezinkampani eziyisishiyagalombili ezithole ithenda lokuqoqa izikweletu zakwaSars kubantu abakweleta intela.Ngokombiko weDaily Maverick, iFIC yaveza ukuthi kukhona okusolisayo ngemali eyakhokhelwa iMahube Payment Solutions ehlanganiswa noMonyeki weNICS.Kuvela ukuthi iMahube Payment Solutions yakhokhelwa u-R17 million, okuvela ukuthi u-R600 000 wawo wafakwa kwi-akhawunti kaMakwakwa.UMoyane utshele amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi akazi lutho ngokuthinteka kukaMonyeki kwiNICS nobudlelwano bakhe nabaqoqa izikweletu.“Angazi ukuthi uMonyeki uyilungu lebhodi leNICS. Engingakusho wukuthi ngazi uMonyeki njengawo wonke umuntu, ngicabanga ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi ikomiti lenze umsebenzi walo ukuthola ukuthi unguMqondisi weNICS. INICS isisebenze neSars kusukela ngo-2004 iqoqa izikweletu,” kusho uMoyane.I-FIC ithe kufanele kuphenywe ukuhamba kwemali engaqondakali kwi-akhawunti kaMakwakwa.Uphenyo bekufanele luveze ukuthi ngabe le mali itholakale ebugebengwini noma iyashushumbiswa yini.UMoyane uthe iNICS yafaka isicelo sethenda yokuqoqa imali.Uthe akakaze abheke ithenda kodwa ibiyenziwa ngabanye abantu.“Angihlali kwikomiti elibhekelele ukubhidelwa kwamathenda. Ngitshelwa yikomiti ukuthi kunezinkampani ezingakhi. Kulokhu bezingu-68 izinkampani futhi azinikwanga yimina umsebenzi. Angingeni kumathenda,” kusho uMoyane.UMonyeki uhlale esematheni njengoba kuke kwavela ukuthi wathola ithenda ka-R378 million yasemajele kodwa yaphinde yahoxiswa.
title: UMoyane uchitha izinsolo zokushushumbiswa kwemali

text: UKUPOTOPOTOZA ibele uzihlole ukuthi awunawo yini umdlavuza webele akuyona kuphela indlela engaphephisa abesifazane ekuhlaselweni yilesi sifo.Ucwaningo lwakamuva luveza ukuthi ukuphuza utshwala, ukukhuluphala ngokweqile nokungawunyakazisi umzimba kwandisa amathuba okuthi abesifazane bahlaselwe yilesi sifo.Umqingo wezempilo iWall Street oshicilelwe kuleli sonto uveza ukuthi omunye umsuka omkhulu womdlavuza webele onganakiwe ukuphuza utshwala, ukukhuluphala ngokweqile kanye nokunyakazisa umzimba.Ungoti ohlinza abanomdlavuza webele, uDkt Melissa Pilewskie ucashunwe kulo mqiqngo ethi izindlela ezisetshenziswayo njengamanje zokuhlola ukuthi abesifazane abanaso yini lesi sifo zikha phezulu.“Akumele kusetshenziswe indlela eyodwa ukuhlonza ukuthi umuntu ngabe unawo yini umdlavuza webele, kungabhekwa ukuthi uyini umsuka.”Lolu cwaningo oluveza lokhu iPink drive okuyisikhungo esiqwashisa, siphinde sifundise ngomdlavuza webele kuleli, siveza ukuthi empeleni sekunesikhathi kuvele ukuthi ukuphuzwa kotshwala kunomthelela ekutheni ababuphuzayo bahlaselwe umdlavuza.Bathi isikhungo socwaningo i-International Agency for Research on Cancer ocwaningweni lwaso eyalwenza ngo-1981, luveza ukuthi isithako esitholakala otshwaleni i-ethanol emzimbeni iphenduka ushevu, i-acataldenhyde ekhubaza umzimba ekutheni ucubuze ezinye izinto ezingadingeki.Uma zingasacubuzeki zingena emzibeni njengezakhamzimba ezifike zakhe ama-cell omdlavuza.Ziningi izinhlobo zomdlavuza eziyamaniswa nokuphuzwa kotshwala, kuzo kubalwa umdlavuza womlomo,owomphimbo, owesibindi, owebele neminye.Inhlangano yomdlavuza kuleli iCancer Association of South Africa ithi yize likhona izinga elibekiwe lokuthi umuntu kumele aphuze utshwala obungakanani ngesikhathi kodwa lokhu akumsindisi ekuhlaselweni umdlavuza.UNkk Janice Benecke wePink Drive eThekwini uthe lokhu akusho ukuthi umdlavuza ungadalwa utshwala kuphela kodwa kodwa kumele bube ngezinye zezintoeziqashelwayo.Uthe uma umuntu esheshe wasukuma lesi sifo siyelapheka.Omunye wabantu umdlavuza wabo owelapheka uLilian Dube ongumlingisi. Wahlinzwa ibele okuyingxenye yokuvikela ukuthi lesi sifo singasabalali emzimbeni ngo-2008.
title: Kuningi okudala umdlavuza webele - ungoti

text: IYANYUKA ingcindezi yokuthi kuphinde kuvalwe ukudayiswa kotshwala njengoba kukhalwa macala onke ngokunyuka kwezibalo zezingozi emgwaqweni kanjalo nezigameko zodlame kulabo abasuke sebeqiwe wuphuzo oludakayo, kusukela buvuliwe ukudayiswa ezinsukwini ezingu-14 ezedlule.Sezizine izifundazwe esezizwakalise ukuthi kusezithebeni ukuvalwa kotshwala kuzo kanti phakathi kwalezi zifundazwe kubalwa, i-Eastern Cape, Western Cape, Gauteng neKwaZulu-Natal.Ekhuluma nabezindaba emuva kwengozi eyenzeke eJozini ngoLwesithathu ekuseni nedlule nemiphefumulo yabantu abangu-10, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, uthe makungagxekwa utshwala ngokwanda kwezingozi emigwaqeni yakuleli kodwa imbangela kungaba wumthamo wezimoto onyukile njengoba kuya ngokuya ukuxegiswa kwemibandela yokuvalwa kokusebenza kwezwe.Uthe yize kunjalo kodwa angakweseka ukuvalwa kotshwala esifundazweni njengoba nakwezinye izifundazwe kuhlongozwa ukuthi buvalwe ngenxa yezigameko ezibikwayo selokhu bubuyisiwe esiGabeni sesiThathu sokusebenza kwezwe.Emuva kokuthathwa kwegazi lomshayeli weloli lenhlekelele, kuvele ukuthi ubeshayela ephuzile nokugcine ngokuthi aboshwe.Inhlangano yezepolitiki, i-IFP, ngomlomo kaMnuz Blessed Gwala, nayo izwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuxegiswa komthetho wotshwala ababona lesi simo sizofakela izibhedlela ingcindezi engenasidingo lapho sekugcwele abantu abalimale ngenxa yezigameko ezibhebhethekiswe wuphuzo oludakayo.UNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke, uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthe banobufakazi obuphathekayo obuthinta umonakalo odalwe wutshwala kula masonto amabili buvuliwe.“Ngizolokhu ngishilo kuthi ukube kuya ngami noma ukube ngiyakwazi ukuzithathela izinqumo ngingedwa, ngingaqala ngokuvala ukudayiswa kotshwala ngoba kucacile ukuthi akukho okuhle okuza notshwala,” usho kanje.Akasalanga ngaphandle noSolwazi Salim Abdool Karim, onguSihlalo weKomiti eleLuleka oNgqonqoshe ngezeCovid-19.Uthe: “Empeleni iyinkinga le ndaba yotshwala njengoba sisalindele ukuthi sinyuke kakhulu isibalo salabo abahaqwe yileli gciwane, kuyoba nzimangoba nalabo abayobe bengenele ezinye izinto ezibhedlela njengezingozi zezimoto ngenxa yotshwala, bayobe sebesengcupheni yokutheleleka ngegciwane.”NgoLwesihlanu, uNdunankulu waseGauteng, uMnuz David Makhura, uthe uhulumeni wesifundazwe uzothatha isinqumo maduze mayelana nokudayiswa kotshwala esifundazweni.Usho kanjena nje nozakwabo wase-Eastern Cape, uMnuz Oscar Mabuyane, ngeledlule udalule ukugcwala kwezibhedlela ngenxa yezigameko ezihlobene notshwala, wathembisa ukuthi uzobhalela uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosaincwadi, amcele ukuthi abuvale utshwala e-Esatern Cape.Yize kunjalo kodwa kukhona ababona ukuthi ukuvalwa kotshwala kungaba nomthelela ongemuhle emnothweni wakuleli futhi kwandise nesibalo sabantu abangazithola belahlekelwa yimisebenzi ngalesi sikhathi.Emhlanganweni wekomiti lezezimali ngoLwesine kuvele ukuthi elakuleli lilahlekelwe yimali yentela ecela kuR1.7bn, ezinsukwini ezingu-29 zika-Ephreli ngenxa yokuvalwa kokudayiswa kotshwala nogwayi.Ekhasini lakhe lakuFacebook, uDkt Bandile Hadebe, we-ANC Professional’s League uthe: “Inkulumompikiswano ekhona mayelana nokunyuka kwezibalo zezigameko ezihlobene notshwala, ayinawo umqondo ophusile.“Akuzange kuqalwe ukuvalwa kwezwe ngoba nakhu kwelashwa abanenkinga yophuzo oludakayo kodwa kwakwenzelwa ukunqanda igciwane iCorona.“Sidinga elinye iqhinga elizimele uma sifuna ukuqeda ngesihlava sabantu abangazicabangeli uma bephuza kanjalo nokwehlisa umthwalo wokugcwala ezibhedlela ngesizathu sezigameko ezigqugquzelwa wutshwala.”
title: Bayanda abawafuna evaliwe amponjwana

text: Ekupheleni konyaka odlule ukhiphe i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi Songs About You enezingoma ezingu-10. Igabe ngezingoma okubalwa kuzo i-African Queen ayishaye noJR nezinye.UThabsie uzalelwe futhi wakhulela eKapa.“Abazali bami baqhamuka KwaZulu-Natal kodwa bakhe eKapa. NgingumZulu. Bobabili abazali basekhona futhi nginodadewethu abathathu,” kusho uThabsie.Uthe wathuthela eGoli ngo-2010 eyofunda i-Economics e-University of Johannesburg (UJ).“Ngathi sengiqedile ngabe sengisebenza ebhange kodwa ekuqaleni kuka-2017 ngathatha isinqumo sokugxila emculweni. E-UJ ngangilekelela abaculi abasafufusa ngokucula ngabe sengihlangana noPsyfo sihlanganiswa abangani. Uye ongifundisa ngomculo futhi sengikhulile njengomculi,” kuchaza uThabsie.UPsyfo, owazakela udumo ethula izinhlelo zeYO-TV futhi elingisa nakwiGenerations engu-Ajax, ungumphathi wakhe kwazise uqopha enkampanini yakhe iSid Records.Uthe yize enesikhashana esemculweni kodwa usezuze lukhulu ngoba umculo wakhe uyathakaselwa. Kulezi zinsuku iphimbo lakhe lizwakala engomeni kaMlindo The Vocalist ethi Macala.“Ngiyakwazi engikufunayo futhi yize ingcindezi ikhona yokuthi ngenze kangcono kodwa umuntu engincintisana naye lapha yimi. Ngifuna ukuba ngcono kwengikwenzayo.”Lo mculi weR&B uthe uma ebhala umculo ubhala ngezinto adlule kuzo noma izinto azibona zenzeka kubantu asondelene nabo.Kumanje uhlanganisa ingoma azoyikhipha ngaphambi kokuphela konyaka bese ilandelwa yi-albhamu ephelele ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo.“Basayididiyela manje. Kade siseZimbali sisebenza. Okwamanje abekho abantu engibapikile kodwa kukhona engikhuluma nabo,” kusho uThabsie.Ngonyaka odlule uThabsie ushade noThando Vokwana ngokwesintu.“Umyeni wami uyangeseka kukho konke engikwenzayo. Sihleli kahle futhi eyezingane asikayicabangi ngoba ngisagxile emculweni.”Uthe ukhonze ukuya ejimini, ukuzihlalela ekhaya noma asebenze enkampanini yakhe yezinwele ezinemibala egqamile iColour Queen uma engawenzi umculo.Uphethe ngokululeka abantu ukuthi uma befuna ukungena kwezokungcebeleka kumele kungabi yisinqumo abasithathela phezulu kodwa abaholwe wuthando.
title: Kumhambela kahle emculweni uThabsie

text: BELIWUMELULEKI kwamanye amakhansela licobelela ulwazi namava ekuholeni umphakathi ikhansela laseMlaza elishone ngemuva kokuxinwa wukugula isikhathi eside.Lokhu kushiwo wumndeni kaNkk Nomusa Mthembu (71) obese kuyihlandla lakhe lesibili eyikhansela ku-ward 81 kuMasipala weTheku.UNkk Mthembu ushonele esibhedlela esiseSydenham, eThekwini, ngoLwesibili ekuseni ngemuva kokugula isikhathi eside okuthiwa kumqale eminyakeni emibili edlule.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Siphiwe Mzulwini, uthe udadewabo ubesefana nenqolobane emakhanseleni amancane njengoba abehlezi efika ezothola ulwazi kuye ngezindlela zokuhola umphakathi.“Sinaye bese sivumelene ukuthi leli yihlandla lakhe lokugcina ubengasozobuyela ngonyaka ozayo naye esekhala ngokukhathala,” kusho uMzulwini.Uthe ubengesiyo inhlobo eyesabayo kangangoba ubengakufuni ngisho ukugadwa yize kunomkhuba wokubulawa kwamakhansela.“Emzini wakhe ubuzingenela nje uma uzofuna usizo engagadwa obekwenza kube lula nasemalungwini omphakathi ukuxhumana naye. Ubehlale ekuqhakambisa ukuthi akanavalo ngesikhundla asiphathisiwe,” kuqhuba uMzulwini.IMeya kuMasipala weTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda wedlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini.“Ubengumholi oqotho, ozinikele ukusebenzela umphakathi ebeka phambili ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo emphakathini. Ubenolwazi olujulile njengoba bese kuyihlandla lakhe lesibili eyikhansela. Uzohlale ekhumbuleka njalo, alale ngokuthula,” kusho uKaunda.Ukushona kukaNkk Mthembu kufike ngesikhathi lapho kusanda kusocongwa ikhansela laku-ward 84 khona eMlaza uMnuz Bhekithemba Phungula odutshulwe ngesonto elelule esemzini wakhe.
title: Balichaza njengenqolobane ikhansela elishone emuva kokugula

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo unxuse abahlengikazi ukuthi baphathe kahle iziguli ezize emitholampilo uma bezisiza.UDhlomo ubekhuluma izolo eMlaza, lapho inhlangano elwa nokubhebhetheka kwengculazi nesandulela sayo, i-Aids Healthcare Foundation (AHF) ibambisene noMnyango wezeMpilo bevule umtholampilo iK Clinic ezohlinzeka umphakathi ngosizo lokunakekela impilo kubalwa nabaphila negciwane lengculazi neTB. Lo mtholampilo uvulwe lapho okukhona umtholampilo omdala kwa-K eMlaza.I-AHF inikele ngoR20million wesakhiwo. Lo mtholampilo ungomunye wemitholampilo engu-26 esekwe i-AHF ukulwa negciwane lengculazi neTB eThekwini.Umphathi we-AHF, uMnuz Peter Reis, uthe banomlando osuka kude noMlaza kusukela bevula umtholampilo iThemba Labantu kule ndawo.“Ngenkathi sikule ndawo ngaphambilini sabona ukuthi baningi abantu abadinga ulwazi nabadinga ukulashwa igciwane lengculazi. Sabe sesiphonsela inselelo abakhiqizi bemishanguzo ukuthi behlise intengo yemishanguzo yokudambisa igciwane ukuze abantu bakwazi ukwelashwa.“Balinganiselwa ku 20 million abantu abalashelwa igciwane lengculazi kodwa basebaningi abadinga ukulashwa, yingakho sakhele lo mphakathi lo mtholampilo,” kusho uReis.UMPHAKATHI waseMlaza umasha ngenkathi kuvulwa umtholampilo eMlazaUthe angeke bagcine eMlaza kuphela kodwa bahlele ukwakhela imiphakathi eminingi imitholampilo.UDhlomo ugqugquzele abahlengikazi ukuthi benze umsebenzi kahle ukuze kusizakale umphakathi.“Kubalulekile ukuthi abahlengikazi bewusize ngomoya omuhle umphakathi, balingise lesi sakhiwo esihle esakhiwe i-AHF,” kusho uDkt Dhlomo.Amalungu omphakathi avele akikiza ngenkathi uDkt Dhlomo ethi lo mtholampilo usuzosebenza izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ngeviki njengoba ubukhala ngokuthi uvulwa izinsuku ezincane.Ikhansela laku ward 78 uNkk Thandiwe Zuma lithe lijabule ngokwakhiwa kwalo mtholampilo.“Lo mtholampilo uzoba wusizo olukhulu kulo mphakathi futhi uzothuthukisa impilo kubantu. Ngiyathemba amalungu omphakathi azowuphathisa okwezikhali zamaNtungwa,” kusho UNkk Zuma.
title: Injabulo kwethulwa umtholampilo omusha eMlaza

text: UKAPUTENI weqembu lesizwe le-netball iSpar Proteas, uBongiwe Msomi akangabazi ukuthi umqeqeshi omusha ozoqokwa uzokwazi ukuqhakazisa leli qembu elizophekelwa indebe yomhlaba ezodlalelwa eKapa ngo-2023.UBongiwe uveze ukuthi baningi abaqeqeshi bakuleli abacijwe umqeqeshi wabo osethatha umhlalaphansi uNorma Plummer.Uthe babheke ngabomvu ukuthi ubani umqeqeshi ozoqokwa ukuthi angene esikhundleni sikaPlummer.Uveze ukuthi uPlummer wamemezela ukuthi usethatha umhlalaphansi, inkontileka yakhe ibivele izophela emuva kweNdebe yoMhlaba ebiseLiverpool, e-England.Uthe noma ngabe iNetball SA ibifisa aqhubeke bekungeke kwenzeke ngoba washo ukuthi emuva kweNdebe yoMhlaba usethi khumu.“Engqungqutheleni ebikhona baveze ukuthi bazomgcina njengomqeqeshi ozokweluleka ozoqokwa. Angazi ukuthi ngibheke bani njengomqeqeshi omusha. UNorma ubeba nabaqeqeshi abacijayo njengoba besihambe noDorette. Uma siyodlala kwamanye amazwe ubethatha abaqeqeshi abahlukene. Kuke kwaba khona uDumisani Chauke ebhentshini no-Elsje Jordaan,” kusho uBongiwe.Uthe bakhona abaqeqeshi okungase kube yibo kodwa baningi, akakwazi ukuqagela.Uqhube wathi ngokwakhe umqeqeshi okhethiwe kumele ahlonishwe noma kungathiwa ubani.“Abadlali kumele baqhubeke benze njengoba bebenza kuNorma. Sibonisile singabadlali ukuthi siyazimisela, abadlali abaningi badlala phesheya. Okuzobaluleka ukuthi umqeqeshi omusha ahlonishwe ukuze umsebenzi uqhubeke. Ngibheke umqeqeshi wakuleli,” kusho uBongiwe.Echaza ngekusasa lakhe nokudlalela amaqembu aphesheya uthe ngesikhathi esuka kwiWasps okuyiqembu lase-England abelidlalela babenesifiso sokuthi aphinde abuyele khona.“Uma ngibuyela phesheya ngizobuyela khona. Angifuni manje ngilokhu ngintanta. Kuzoqala manje ngo-Agasti ukuthi abadlali banikezwe izinkontileka, okwamanje akukho okusaqinisekisiwe. Uma kwenzeka kuzoba sekutheni ngime kuphi nezinhlelo zami ezizongithuthukisa ngaphandle kokudlala i-netball. Kumele ngikhumbule nokuthi iminyaka iyahamba nokuthi akumele ngingabi nenye into ezongiphilisa uma kwenzeka ngilimala, ngingasakwazi ukudlala,” kusho uBongiwe.Unina uBusisiwe Msomi uthe wayengazi ukuthi indodakazi yakhe ingagcina isidume umhlaba wonke ngenxa ye-netball.Owayenguthisha wakhe uSthembiso Mncwabe eLuthayi High eHammarsdale ayefunda kuso uthe wayengazi ukuthi ngesikhathi emfaka kulo mdlalo uyogcina esedlalela iqembu lesizwe.Uthe impumelelo kaBongiwe yiyo eyenza ukuthi aqhubeke nokuqeqesha lo mdlalo yize aqala eminyakeni ewu-20 edlule. Ngo-Okthoba amaProteas kulindeleke adlale ne-England eKapa.
title: UMsomi ubheke kuqokwe owakuleli ekucijeni elesizwe

text: IZINWELE ezinempilo zibaluleke ukwedlula umzimba okhangayo, nokuba nemoto noma ukuya ocansini kubantu besifazane abasebancane abasezingeni eliphezulu.Lokhu kuvezwe wucwaningo olwenziwe yisikhungo socwaningo iDkt Wolf Research kubantu besifazane abawu-1001 abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 kuya ku-39 KwaZulu-Natal, eWestern Cape naseGauteng.UDkt Adolf Klenk, inhloko yocwaningo, uthe izinto ezibalulekile kubantu besifazane okukhulunywe nabo kwenziwa ucwaningo wukuba nomndeni, kulandele ukuphila kahle emzimbeni, kulandela ukuba nomsebenzi oholela kahle, ukuba nemali kugcine ukuqoma.Ukuba nezinwele ezinhle, ukuba neselula esezingeni eliphezulu ne-Internet kubaluleke ngendlela efanayo kulaba bantu besifazane. Ngemuva kwalokhu kulandela ukuzivocavoca, ukuba nomzimba okhangayo, imoto, okungabalulekile kangako kubona ukuzihlanganisa nokuya ocansini.UDkt Klenk uthe olunye ucwaningo olwenziwe yinkampani ezimele lukhombise ukuthi * -60% wabantu besifazane abasebancane bayazidaya izinwele zabo; kungaba ukugqamisa umbala wemvelo wezinwele zabo noma ukufaka omunye umbala. U-60% wabo usebenzisa imithi ethile ukwelula izinwele zawo kanti * -43% uthe izinwele zawo ziyaqothuka.Phakathi kwezinto abazibala njengezenza ukuthi izinwele zabo ziqothuke uDkt Klenk uthe babale ukhwantalala, ukusebenzisa imithi ekhanyisa isikhumba, imishanguzo yokwelapha izifo ezithile, ukugula, ufuzo, ukungasebenzi ngendlela kwama-hormones emzimbeni yabo, ukweluka, ingcindezi yomsebenzi noma ukudla okungenayo impilo.UDkt Klenk ukuqinisekisile ukuthi izinto ezifana ne-caffeine, ukhwantalala, ukudla okungenampilo noma okungenazo izakhamzimba kungaholela ekutheni izinwele ziqothuke.
title: Izinwele zibaluleke kunakho konke kwabesifazane

text: LIDEDELWE ngebheyili yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma iphoyisa elibekwe icala lokubulala owesilisa kubangwa ithoshi eMawoti, eNanda, ngo-Okthoba.UConstable Nhlanhla Goge (34) ubevele enkantolo izolo emuva kokuboshwa ngoLwesithathu ngokufa komkhaya wakhe uMnuz Zwakele Hlongwa (28) ngo-Okthoba besendaweni yokucima ukoma.UMnuz Lindokuhle Hlongwa, umfowabo kamufi uthe ummangalelwa udedelwe ngebheyili kaR2 500 ehambisana nombandela wokuthi angasondelani nomndeni kamufi.“Kusikhululile ukuthi ugcine eboshiwe. Sesithandezela ukuthi ubulungiswa benzeke athole ukujeza okumfanele ngesenzo sakhe,” kusho uHlongwa.Uthe ngesikhathi uGoge engakaboshwa bese benetwetwe ngoba bebengazi noma uzogcina eboshiwe yini ngalesi senzo sakhe.Phambilini uHlongwa ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe kusanda kufa umfowabo wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi uzizwa engaphephile njengoba ngaphandle kokuthi uwumfowabo kamufi, kodwa wayekhona ngesikhathi ebulawa.UZwakele (umufi) kuthiwa wadutshulwa wuGoge ngesikhathi behleli bonke kwenye yezindawo zokucima ukoma ebusuku ngoba efuna ithoshi ayeliphethe ngoba ethi liphathwa amaphoyisa kuphela.UGoge kuthiwa uzophinde avele enkantolo ngo-Febhuwari 13 wonyaka ozayo.Okhulumela uphiko oluphenya ngamacala athinta amaphoyisa i-Ipid, uMnuz Sontaga Seisa, uthe banelisekile wuphenyo olwenziwe ngabaphenyi becala oluholele ekuboshweni kukaGoge. Uncome ithimba labaphenyi KwaZulu-Natal eliholwa uNksz Nonhlanhla Ndlovu ngomfutho eliwufakile ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uGoge uyaboshwa.
title: Ibheyili ephoyiseni kwelokubulala

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUUMSAKAZI weGagasi FM ojoyine lesi siteshi kulo nyaka, ozobe ethula uhlelo kukhaphethi obomvu kumaMTV Africa Music Awards (Mama), e-ICC kusasa, uthi ufuna ukugqugquzela intsha yasemadolobheni amancane ngokuthi ibe namaphupho amakhulu.UNomalanga Shozi (21) oshayela i
Gagasi Music Session: Hip Hop noJunior de Rocka njalo ngoLwesine ngo-8 ebusuku, uzobe ekhuluma nosaziwayo abehlukene abazobe behamba kukhaphethi bengena kumaMama kusukela ngo-6 ntambama.Konke okuzobe kuqhubeka kuzosakazwa kuGagasi FM elingabanye babaxhasi bale miklomelo.“Ngifuna ukugqugquzela intsha yasemadolobheni amancane ngokuthi ibe namaphupho amakhulu. Uma kukhulunywa ngosaziwayo kukhulunywa ngabantu abaqhamuka eThekwini noma eGoli.“Ngithi noma ngabe uqhamuka kuphi ungaphumelela ube semsakazweni noma kuthelevishini. Ngiqhamuka eBhobhoyi (ePort Shepstone) kodwa ngizobe nginosaziwayo bakuleli nabaphesheya,” kusho uNomalanga.Uthe ujabule ngethuba alitholile ngoba usanda kufika kwiGagasi FM. “Ngiyabonga kakhulu kuNkulunkulu. Ngibonga nakwiGagasi nakuMTV Base ngokuthi bathembele kimina,” kusho lo msakazi obuye ashayele uhlelo i
The Early Rise ngo-4 ekuseni ngoMgqibelo nangeSonto.Uveze ukuthi ufisa agcine esengumethuli wezinhlelo zeMTV Base ngoba uthando lwakhe lusekubeni kuthelevishini.“Ngingakujabulela ukuba ngumethuli wezinhlelo noma umlingisi. Yiyona nto engiyithanda kakhulu yikhona ukuthi ngangena emsakazweni kuqala,” kusho uNomalanga.UKhulekani Shandu okhulumela iGagasi FM uthe: “Siyajabula ukuba yingxenye yama MTV Africa Music Awards njengoba ezobe eseThekwini. Abantu abangawatholanga amathikithi bangakhali njengoba bezokwazi ukuzwa amazwibela ngokwenzekayo kuma awards kwi Gagasi FM.”Uhlelo lukaKing Sfiso i
The Weekend Takeover luzobe lusakaza bukhoma phakathi kuka-7 no-10.AmaMama, okuzobe kungawesibili eThekwini nonyaka azobe ekhonjiswa bukhoma kuMTV Base (DStv channel 322), MTV (DStv channel 130) nakuBET (DStv channel 129) okusukela ngo-12 ebusuku.Amathikithi abiza u-R267 eComputicket.Isolezwe liphisana ngamathikithi ahamba ngamabili kulabo abafuna ukuya kumaMamas ngokuthi uthumele igama elithi Mamas ku-33258. Ukungenela kuvalwa ngehora lesithupha ntambama.
title: OweGagasi FM ufuna ukugqugquzela intsha

text: UKAPUTENI weMamelodi Sundowns ungomunye wabadlali abahamba phambili ngezicoco kuleli kodwa yize kunjalo isamubusa intshisekelo yokuphumelela njengoba elobizela ukuhola iqembu lakhe liphakamise indebe ka-10 ye-Absa Premiership.Njengoba kubuya imidlalo yePremier Soccer League (PSL) kule mpelasonto, uKekana ufuna ukufana noMoses aholele iqembu lakhe ezweni lesithembiso. Kulokhu banethuba lokunqoba izicoco ezintathu kwisizini eyodwa. I-Orlando Pirates yilona iqembu eselike lakwenza kabili lokhu emlandweni wePSL.ISundowns isivele ingompetha beTelkom Knockout. Inethuba lokulwela isicoco seligi njengoba isendaweni yesibili kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership. Ihlukaniswe amaphuzu amane neKaizer Chiefs eseqhulwini ngawu-48.NgoMgqibelo amaBrazilians azolwela ukuzibekisela indawo kowamanqamu eNedbank Cup uma esethuthana neBidvest Wits e-Orlando Stadium ngo-7 ebusuku.“Lesi kuzoba yisicoco sami sesikhombisa seligi. Ngisifuna kabi. Kuzoba okwesithathu kulandela (benqoba isicoco seligi) kithina. Kuzoba yisicoco sika-10 seMamelodi Sundowns. Iqembu libungaza iminyaka ewu-50. Siyazifuna lezi zicoco ezintathu. Yileyo inhloso yeqembu. Kodwa ke kumele sishaye iBidvest Wits. Siyazi kuzoba nzima kangakanani. Imidlalo yethu neWits ihleli ilukhuni,” kusho uKekana kwi-Independent Media.UKekana wanqoba izicoco ezimbili zeligi kwiSuperSport United. KwiSundowns ubheke ukuthola esesihlanu. Uma amaBrazilians engakwazi ukugudluza iChiefs esicongweni, kuzobe uthola esesikhombisa.“Kuningi okusikhuthazayo thina kule midlalo esele. Sonke siyakuqonda ukubaluleka kokuwina. Ukuqina komqondo yikhona okuzodingeka emidlalweni esele. Kuningi okungahlangene nebhola okwenzekayo. Kumele sizame ukukugwema. Sizozama ekutheni sigxile ekunqobeni imidlalo yethu,” kuqhuba uKekana.Sekunezinyanga ezine ibhola limile kulandela ukuvalwa kwezwe ngenhloso yokulwa nokubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCorona.“Bekungelula ukuhlala singenzi lutho izinyanga ezine. Sonke sijabule ngokuthi sesizobuya ekudlaleni senze lokhu esikuthandayo. Ngijabule ngokuthi sesibuyele esimeni esisijwayele, siyaziqeqesha silungiselela imidlalo.”Lo mdlali oyibamba esiswini uthe ufuna bakhunjulwe njengesizukulwane sabadlali abaletha injabulo yodwa kwiSundowns.“Sifuna ukukhunjulwa njengabadlali abaletha izindebe kwiMamelodi Sundowns. Sisebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa lokho. Sineqembu elikwazi ukulwa. Ukhiye wukunqoba imidlalo yethu. Uma sinqoba eyethu imidlalo sizibeka ethubeni elihle. Yize injongo enkulu kuyizindebe ezintathu kodwa, sizobhekana nomdlalo ngamunye,” kusho uKekana.
title: Intshisekelo yomlando wokuhlwitha izicoco ezintathu kuKekana

text: IZIFUNDISWA ezimnyama futhi eziqavile zisakhala ngokuthi ulwazi olukhiqizwa emanyuvesi ase-Afrika, kumele luguqulwe lufane nolwabantu abamnyama abafundiswa khona.USolwazi Pikita Ntuli wake waphawula kwithelevishini ngokuthi amanyuvesi e-Afrika, ngokwezakhiwo akhona kodwa amanyuvesi obu-Afrika ngokwesiko-mpilo owekho eNingizimu Afrika.Amanyuvesi obu-Afrika kumele akhombise futhi aphakamise isiko-mpilo lase-Afrika emfundweni nasekuhlelweni kwawo. Amanyuvesi obu-Afrika yiwo okumele akhiqize ulwazi nocwaningo oluqhakambisa ubu-Afrika kodwa ngeshwa awamaningi. Amanyuvesi obu-Afrika kumele aphinde akhiqize ulwazi oluzolekelela ekuguqulweni kwezimo mqondo ezimbi ngezwekazi lethu, i-Afrika. Akumele sibe namanyuvesi ase-Afrika kuphela. Kumele sibe namanyuvesi obu-Afrika. Izifundiswa ezimnyama okumele zenze lowo msebenzi azibonwa nangokhalo.Amanyuvesi e-Afrika okumele abe izizinda zokukhiqiza ulwazi afukanyelwe izifundiswa ezimpisholo ngokwebala kodwa ezivikela noma eziphatha isiko-mpilo laseNtshonalanga, njengezikhali zamaNtungwa.Isiko-mpilo laseNtshonalanga luvikelwa ngokuthi ulwazi olukhiqizwa kulezi zikhungo zemfundo ephakeme lunika udumo nenhlonipho kwizindlela zokucabanga nezokuphila zaseNtshonalanga. Izindlela zase-Afrika zokucabanga nezokuphila zivezwa njengezidelelekile nezingabalulekile. Kuyiqiniso elingephikwe ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika nase-Afrika jikelele, zisashoda kakhulu izifundiswa ezimnyama ezicabanga ngendlela yobu-Afrika emikhiqizweni yolwazi, phecelezi ucwaningo. Singakusho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi ubuso balezi zifundiswa bumnyama bhuqe kodwa izimo-mqondo zazo zimhlophe.Injulalwazi uLious Althusser yake yabuza umbuzo onohlonze. Yabuza ukuthi: “Yini efundwa izingane esikoleni?” Lowo mbuzo usabalulekile nanamhlanje. Lombuzo ubaluleke ngoba lokho okufundiswa izingane ezikoleni kunomthelela omkhulu endleleni ingane noma umuntu azibona ngayo.UKarl Marx, wake wathi: “Laba abasemandleni ngokomnotho ezweni yibona abalawula imfundo nesiko-mpilo lesizwe.”Imfundo evuna ukubukelwa phansi kwabantu abamnyama idala ukuzibukela phansi ezinganeni. Imfundo yethu eqinisweni isavuna abaseNtshonalanga njengesizinda sodwana sobuhlakani. Ngoba njengokusho kukaMarx abasemandleni (abamhlophe), balawula ulwazi olukhiqhizwayo nolubonwa njengolubalulekile ezweni. Kuzomele sizinuke amakhwapha sihlaziyisise ukuthi lemfundo esiyitholayo iyasisondeza yini na kubuthina njengama-Afrika? Noma ilekelela kwisimo-mpilo elidume umhlaba wonke lokungathandwa kwethu njengabantu abampisholo. Kungani iChina elifundile lingalahlekelwa ubuChina balo? Kanye neNgisi elifundile alilahlekelwa ubuNgisi balo. Yithina kuphela abantu bendlu emnyama abafunda babuye badedele okwabo. Izifundiswa ezimnyama emanyuvesi zithi kumele kube ne-Decolonization ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. Igama elikhulu futhi elisematheni kulezi zinsuku. Konje yini uku-decolonizer ngesiZulu? Kunzima ukuphendula lombuzo ngoba izifundswa zethu ezimnyama azikukhathaleli ukuchaza izinto ngolimi abantu abalizwayo. Ngakho-ke, amagama esintu anaba ngalezingxoxo mpikiswano ebantwini ngolimi lwabo awekho.Kunamampunge asabalele ngamandla okuthi ukufunda kangcono nokuhlakanipha ukukwazi ukukhuluma isiNgisi kahle. IsiNgisi esihle futhi esikhulu asichazi ukuthi uhlakaniphe kangcono. Kumele sishintshe indlela esicabanga ngayo. Siziqhenye ngobuthina nezilimi zethu.Uku-decolonizer, abanye bakubiza ngenkipha bukoloni. Le nkipha bukoloni ichaza ukuthi njengabantu abamnyama kumele sizikhulule emakhamandeleni ezindlela zolwazi lwaseNtshonalanga. Singavumi ukuthi abaseNtshonalanga basihambele phambili ekulobeni ngesiko-mpilo lwethu. Ukuhanjelwa phambi njalo ngabaseNtshonalanga kufakazelwa indlela umlando wethu olotshwe ngayo. Kungani umlando wethu oqukethwe emanyuvesi ukhiqizwe solwazi abamhlophe abanye abaphesheya? Yihlazo lelo! Kucace bha ukuthi lezo zifundiswa ezimhlophe ngeke zilande kahle ngomlando wethu. Baphi abalobi nezifundiswa bakithi abazoloba ngathi, benathi? Uphi umlando wamaZulu obhalwe amaZulu? Kungaba ubuwula ukucabanga ukuthi ulwazi olukhiqizwe phesheya luyosiveza njengabantu abaphelele? Imfundo nomlando wethu kumele kube nobunkipha bukoloni. Imfundo enjalo imemezela ukuthi abantu abamnyama nabo bangabantu emhlabeni nezindlela zabo zinobuhlakani futhi ziphelele, azishodi ngalutho. Imfundo enjalo iyovela ngathi akekho omunye oyosilamulela njengabampisholo.UKhanyile ufundisa e-Central University of Technology, Free State. Uke wafundisa nase-Wits University. Usaphothula izifundo zakhe zePhD e-Wits University.
title: Imfundo yethu kumele ibe nobunkipha bukoloni

text:
CELANI SIKHAKHANE noMLUNGISI GUMEDEB ASWELE umgodi wokucasha abefundisi bebandla lamaNazaretha ohlangothini lwaseBuhleni ngesikhathi iSilo samaBandla uGoodwill Zwelithini sibasola ngokusonga izandla babukele ibandla lihlakazeka ngenxa yemibango yobuholi eqhubekayo.Sithe kumele abefundisi kube yibo abadlala indima yokuthi kube nobumbano kuleli bandla kubuyelwe kulokhu okwakuhloswe umqali wendlela, iNkosi u-Isaiah Shembe.“Bafundisi musani ukuhlukanisa izingane zikaMayekisa ngenxa nje yokuthanda imali. Ngabe ningathanda yini nina uma kungabakhona umuntu ongaxova izingane zenu zize zihlukane phakathi. Mina nje ngeke ngihlulwe indaba yokuba ngihlanganise izingane zikaMayekisa ngoba naye lapho ekhona angiboni ukuthi uyayijabulela le nto eyenzekayo njengoba ibandla selimaqembu, izingane zakhe sezingasabhekani,” kusho iSilo.Besikhala nangokuthi kumanje leli bandla alibhekani kodwa amakholwa alo agqoka imiNazaretha efanayo namabheshu akukho okuhlukile kunomunye okolunye uhlangothi, ngakho kumele babuyisane kuphele ukungezwani.Sithe konke lokhu okwenzekayo kuyobuzwa kwabanye ngezinsuku zokugcina ngoba okwamanje icilongo alikakhali baningi basalindile ukuthi uma selikhala bese beyohlangana noMdali.Sincome uNyazi ngokufika esigodlweni sathi luze lapho okwakubekwe khona ukhokho walo uMayekisa ukuba akhonzele khona esigodlweni.Sibuye saxwayisa amaNazaretha ngokuthi nakuba elulandela uNyazi kodwa siyacela ukuba ashintshe akhumbule ukuthi ukhona uNkulunkulu ongabonwayo owadala konke nophethe wonke umuntu.“Angiqondile maNazaretha ukuba niguqule indlela enikholwa ngayo kodwa ngiyanicela ukuba nishintshe nje kancane isitayela nikhonze uNkulunkulu wethu sonke okunguyena osithumile kulo mhlaba. Lokhu engikushoyo ngisazokuxoxa neNkosi uMduduzi eseniyiqambe igama nathi uNyazi. Ngifuna sibonisane ngale ndaba yeZulu ngoba nami ngiyiNkosi yesizwe samaZulu nje kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi angiyena ongaphezu konke ngoba ukhona uNkulunkulu owasidala wabe esesithuma kulo mhlaba,” kusho iSilo.Ngesikhathi sikhuluma besiphethe i-Ipad ne
Bhayibheli sicaphuna amavesi encwadi 
Isambulo sichaza kabanzi ngokubaluleka kokuxolelana.Sithe sijabule ngokuthi isiphelile ingxabano yaso nabakwaShembe ngoba saphatheka kabi ngesikhathi siyobona uThingo lweNkosazana nalapho esithi savinjwa “abantukazana abayizinganekwane”.AbakwaShembe banikwe ilungelo iSilo lokuthi sekuzomele bafike njalo uma kuzoba noMkhosi weSilo bazokhuleka kanti ngoMgqibelo kubuywe kwakhulekelwa izintombi ezashona engozini yebhasi zibuya eMhlageni.UNyazi lweZulu nalo luzwakalise injabulo lasho nokuthi lokhu okwenzekile kube ukuziphinda komlando futhi nalo alubazi laba bantu abavimba iSilo ukuba sibone uThingo ngesikhathi lugula.“Zike zenzeka izinto ezingezinhle kodwa namhlanje sibuyele ekhaya, kuyenzeka kube khona, noma lona owonile engasaveli bese siboshwa ngabhande linye kodwa namhlanje sithethelelwe,” lusho kanje.Luthe kuluthokozisile ukuthi luthi lutheleka esigodlweni lufike iMbube isilulindele.Izolo kuphothulwe le nkonzo ngomgidi omkhulu lapho iSilo sithe konke okwenzekile kube isifundo kwaZulu nasemhlabeni sokuthi uma kuhanjwa endleleni amaphutha ayenzeka.
title: ISilo sikhuze abakwaShembe

text: KUYAJUBULISA ukuzwa ukuthi sekuhlelekile ohlelweni lwasekuseni kwiRadio 2000.Uma uzokhumbula kahle, kusuke umsindo eminyakeni emibili edlule ngesikhathi kuqedwa ngohlelo iPlanet Haaibo eyayisakazwa nguJust Ice. Abalandeli bakhe bakhala kakhulu kangongoba abanye baze babhala incwadi enezikhalo bacela abanye ukuthi bayisayine online futhi yesekwa ngabantu abaningi.Esikhaleni sakhe kwangena uPhat Joe noNala Tose, abanye abantu abangabemukelanga kahle ngoba base bejwayele uJust Ice. UPhat Joe ubebuye anyamalale uzwe kuthiwa umisiwe noma akekho ohlelweni kugcine sekusele uNala yedwa.Konke lokhu sekushintshile ngemuva kokuthi kulandwe uBongani Mtolo osesakaza uhlelo noNala.Ngabe ngiqamba amanga uma ngithi ngike ngezwa kukhona okhalayo ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa ukuthi uBongani uzothatha izintambo ngoba ufike abaningi bengamazi. Bamlande esuka KwaZulu-Natal kwi-East Coast Radio lapho akhula khona kusukela engena ebusuku washiya esesakaza uhlelo lwantambama phakathi nesonto. Ukuwenza kahle umsebenzi kumenze wathola imiklomelo kumaRadio Awards.Ngike ngathi ukumlalela kulezi zinsuku ngingaqali ngoba bengilokhu ngilalela kusukela eqalile. Usefike wangena khaxa kulesi siteshi ungafunga ukuthi uneminyaka ekhona.Okungenza ngithi ungene khaxa wukuthi useyilo Bongani esimaziyo kwi-East Coast Radio akafunanga ukushintsha azenze umuntu angasiye. Yena noNala babambisene kahle wonke umuntu uyayazi indawo yakhe.Okunye okuhle wukuthi uhlelo lwabo luhlabahlosile lukhuluma ngezihloko ezithinta ngqo abantu hhayi ukuthi bathathe nje kuphela okwenzeka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Ngike ngezwa kuleli sonto eledlule bekhuluma ngendaba yokuthi umuntu oke wahlukumeza omunye uyashintsha yini azalwe kabusha.Kushaye omunye wesilisa othe wamshaya kanye ayethandana naye ngo-2001 futhi useke wathandana nabaningi ngemuva kwalokho akakaze ababeke isandla. UBongani ubebuza ngqo imibuzo ngaphandle kokuwesaba ezama ukungena emqondweni wakhe efuna ukuthola ukuthi kusuke kwenzekani uze ubeke omunye isandla.Kushaye nomunye wesifazane waseWelkom ohlukunyezwayo futhi nonina uyamxosha nasekhaya. Nakuyena uBongani ubebuza imibuzo esinayo vele nathi njengabalaleli engakunakile ukuthi owesifazane uyakhala.Okuhle kodwa ukuthi abamshiyanga kanjalo ngoba bagcine sebemzamela usizo.Ungangibhalela [email protected], kuTwitter @fanelebengu noma kuFacebook Fanelesibonge Bengu
title: Seluhlelekile uhlelo lwasekuseni kuRadio2000

text: INYUNYANA iNational Education, Health and Allied Workers’ Union (Nehawu), ithi zisaqhubeka iziteleka emanyuvesi ahlukene kuleli, ezinye eziqale ngeledlule.INehawu ithumele isitatimende kwabezindaba izolo icacisa ngokwenzeka e-Unisa, DUT, Wits nase-University of Pretoria. Esitatimende kuthiwa abasebenzi base-Unisa abangaphansi kwale nyunyana abasebenzi kuzo zonke izikhungo zenyuvesi kuleli. Lokhu kudalwe ukuthi abaphathi benyuvesi banqume ukuhoxa ezingxoxweni baya enkantolo yabasebenzi ngoba befuna ukuthi isiteleka esiqale ngeledlule sithathwe njengesingekho emthethweni kodwa bahluleka. Isitatimende siveza ukuthi izimfuno zisamile njengoba befuna ukunyuselwa umholo ngo-10% kuzo zonke izigaba. Bafuna kuqashwe ngokugcwele abasebenzi betoho abasemkhakheni wezobuchwepheshe okuthiwa sebebe yitoho iminyaka engaphezu kwengu-15. Le nyunyana ithi i-Unisa icabanga ukuthi ingaphezulu komthetho njengoba ingafuni ukuhlonipha iLabour Relations Act ngokuthi ibaqashe ngokugcwele yize benazo iziqu.Le nyunyana isicele iCCMA ukuthi izame ukulekelela izinhlaka ezithintekayo ukuthi zifinyelele esivumelwaneni ukuze kuqhubeke ukubhaliswa kwabafundi. Inyunyana inxuse amalungu ayo ukuthi angadidiseki, akaqhubeke nesiteleka kuze kube izimfuno zawo ziyabhekelwa.E-DUT nakhona le nyunyana ithe sisazoqhubeka isiteleka kuzo zonke izikhungo njengoba kungakafinyelelwa esivumelwaneni. Le nyunyana isikhabe ngazo zombili isiphakamiso somqashi sika-6%. Isamile ekutheni ifuna kunyuswe ngo-10%, kunyuswe nomhlomulo wezindlu ngoR400 nebhonasi kaR9 000.EWits le nyunyana iqale emasontweni amabili ukuthi njalo ngesikhathi sesidlo sasemini kube nombhikisho ngoba ifuna umqashi ukuthi abuyele etafuleni lezingxoxo. Le nyunyana ithe lesi siteleka sizoba sikhulu namuhla. Ifuna umqashi anyuse umholo ngo 8%, imali ye-medical aid ngo-1%, ukubuyiswa kwemihlomulo yemali kulabo asebesebenze isikhathi eside. Inyunyana ithi abasebenzi base-University of Pretoria bafuna ukunyuselwa umholo ngo-9.5% kanti umqashi uthi uno-6%.
title: I-Nehawu ihlabela phambili neziteleka emanyuvesi

text: UPHROJUSA womculo we-House kuleli uPrince Kaybee ugcine ephumele obala wavuma izinsolo zokungathembeki othandweni nesinqandamathe sakhe uZola Mhlongo owayengumsakazi weGagasi FM. UKaybee uzidonsele amanzi ngomsele ephika ukuthi unomakhwapheni asethandane naye iminyaka emihlanu ngesikhathi kuvela ama-screenshot phakathi kwakhe nowesifazane kwi-DM ku-Instagram. Uthe esaphika lezi zinsolo kwalandelwa ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda kuTwitter besithombe sikaPrince Kaybee eveze umphambili. Ngemuva kwalesi sithombe, uKaybee uvele waphumela obala ngokushendeza waxolisa ngokuphoxa intombi yakhe. “Kubantu engibaphoxile, amabhizinisi engiwamele, intombi yami kanye nomama ngiyaxolisa kakhulu,” kusho yena.UPrince Kaybee noZola bathola abalandeli abaningi ngemuva kokuvela ohlelweni lukaYouTube iDefiningLove bekhuluma ngothando lwabo nokuthi baqala kanjani ukuthandana.
title: UPrince Kaybee uvuma eyokujolela umsakazi

text: UYISE wowayengunozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates, uSenzo Meyiwa, uMnuz Sam Meyiwa uthe ubeselwazi lonke udaba olubhadlazwe enkundleni yokuxhumana uTwitter, oludalule 'imininingwane' ngokubulawa kwalo mdlali.UMeyiwa uthe ujabulile ngokuvela kwalolu daba emphakathini ngoba kuchaza ukuthi bakhona abafuna kuvele iqiniso ngokubulawa kwendodana yakhe.Ngempelasonto, ikhasi leTwitter elisebenzisa igama lowayengummeli womsubathi u-Oscar Pistorius, u-Adv Barry Roux (@AdvBarryRoux), lishicilele imininingwane ‘ngokwenzeka’ ngosuku okwabulawa ngalo uSenzo Meyiwa. Ikhasi okubhalwe kulona ukuthi akulona elalo mmeli, lidalule ukuthi umbulali kaSenzo ungomunye wabantu ababekhona kubo kanina wengane yakhe, uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus, eGoli ngo-Okthoba 26, 2014.Kuphinde kuvele nokuthi lolu daba luyanyathelwa.Ephawula ngalolu daba uMeyiwa uthe ujabule kakhulu ukuthi lolu daba seluqala ukuvela esidlangaleni.“Ngiyayazi yonke le nto ebikhulunywa, ngake ngayizwa phambilini. Banesibindi kabi kabi laba bantu. Ngizwa kukhona ukujabula nethemba ngoba umhlaba usuyamnciphela umbulali,” kusho uMeyiwa.Uthe kuyamphoxa ukuthi ngesikhathi ethintwa abamaphephandaba kusukela ngoMsombuluko ekuseni, amaphoyisa abengakaze amthinte ukumazisa ngobekuphawulwa ngalolu daba.“Kusangiphatha kabi futhi nokubona amanye amacala amakhulu exazululwa kodwa elendodana yami kuvele kube sengathi kwabulawa intuthane nje,” kuqhuba uMeyiwa.Uthe uyethemba ukuthi umuntu obebhala ngalolu daba kuTwitter uzomthinta maduze babone ukuthi yini abangayenza.Ngesikhathi kuthintwa okhulumela uMnyango wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Vuyo Mhaga, uthe amaphoyisa asaphenya ngokubulawa kukaSenzo.“Akukho okusha okukhona kodwa uma sekukhona sizoxhumana nomndeni,” kusho uMhaga.Ebuzwa ngokubhalwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana uthe abaphawuli ngezinto ezibhalwe emakhasini ezinkundla zokuxhumana.Kuthintwe uLinda Moeketsi okhulumela uKelly wathi akukho abazokuphawula ngalolu daba.UChicco Twala akathandanga ukuphawula ngalolu daba ngesikhathi ethintwa yiphephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, iThe Star, uvele wathi akaphuwuli ngezindaba ezingekho.
title: Uyise kaSenzo Meyiwa ujabule ngokuvele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana

text: UMFUNDISI osolwa ngokudlwengula amalungu ebandla lakhe, uMphostoli Mxolisi ‘Striker’ Shange, uthe ufuna icala lakhe lisheshe liqulwe noma lisulwe. Ukhulume kanje emva kokuba iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ihlehlise ukumenyezelwa kosuku okuzoqalwa ngalo ukuqulwa kwecala lakhe.IMantshi uRavi Pillay iyalele uShange, ongaphandle ngebheyili kaR5 000, ukuba aphinde abuye ngoJulayi 23 ukuze azi ukuthi kwenzekani ngecala lakhe. Umshushisi uStain Miloszewski nguye othe alihlehliswe icala ngoba kusenenkinga ngedokodo lecala likaShange.Lo mfundisi unamacala amane okungamabili okudlwengula, elilodwa lokunukubeza ngokocansi nelokuthumba. Amacala kuthiwa wawenza emantombazaneni amane akhonza ebandleni lakhe elizinze eRichmond Farm, ngaKwaMashu, aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-14 no18 kusukela ngo-2014 kwaze kwaba uNovemba 2018.Abamangali abathathu sebethathe isinqumo sokuwahoxisa amacala, bakhala ngokuthi ayabaphazamisa emisebenzini yesikole.Kulokhu uShange ubengaphelezelwa wummeli wakhe * -Advocate Siseko Madikizela futhi ubengatolikelwa. Ummeli ubengaphandle ezincokolela nabazalwane ebebengunge unkosikazi kaShange. Ephuma uShange uvele waphenduka isilomo njengoba kukhona abaqonde kuye bamxhawula.Abanye bathe bamazela emsakazweni womphakathi waKwaMashu iVibe 94.7 FM lapho abenohlelo lwezenkolo khona. Abanye bebebabaza ukuthi usekhuluphele. Imithombo ebisesontweni lakhe ngeSonto ithe wamukelwe ngenhlokomo ngabazalwane kwaze kwaba khona namakholwa amnikelelayo.
title: Liphinde lahlehliswa icala lomfundisi

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthi kuyabakhathaza ukwenyuka kwesibalo sabasebenzi bezempilo abatholakala negciwane le-Corona.UNkk Simelane-Zulu ubephawula emva kokuthi bethathe isinqumo sokuvala isibhedlela iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza KwaDukuza emuva kokutholakala kokuthi kunezisebenzi zomnyango ezine-Corona.“Kuyasikhathaza impela uma amasosha ethu esilwa ngawo etheleleka nge-Corona ngoba asazi ukuthi iyothi iphela impi ebe esemangaki ahaqekile,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe abazi ukuthi lokhu kudalwa yini. Babuye bacabange ukuthi mhlawumbe abahlengikazi kabaqeqeshekile ngokwanele noma abazisebenzisi ngendlela izinsiza zokuzivikela.UNkk Simelane-Zulu ukugxekile ukuziphatha kwezinye izisebenzi zaseGeneral Gizenga Mpanza emva kokutholakala ukuthi kukhona ozakwabo abane-Corona.“Le ndlela yokuziphatha esiyibone lapha ayamukelekile. Sizokwenza uphenyo uma sesithole umbiko bese kuba khona izinyathelo ezithathwayo uma kunesidingo,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe sebezokugwema ukuthi bavale isibhedlela sonke uma kutholakale ukuthi kukhona izisebenzi ezinegciwane le-Corona.“Ngeke kube yinqubo yethu ukuthi sivale izibhedlela uma kutholakale ukuthi kukhona izisebenzi ezine-Corona kodwa udaba lwaseGeneral Gizenga Mpanza luhlukile ngoba khona kukhona nodokotela abathelelekile,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe uma beqhubeka nokuvala izibhedlela bazogcina bengasasele nasibhedlela.“Manje sesizovala indawo leyo enenkinga bese abantu abakuyona siyabahlola, senze isiqiniseko sokuthi igciwane aliqhubekeli kwenye indawo,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Selokhu kuqale ubhubhane lwe-Corona iKZN isibe nezikhawu lapho ivale khona izibhedlela okubalwa kuzo iSt Augustine’s neKingsway, emva kokutholakala ukuthi kunezisebenzi ezinalolu bhubhane.
title: Kuyakhathaza ukuphathwa yiCovid-19 kwabasezibhedlela

text: AKUKAZE phambilini kudingeke ukuthi uhulumeni akhethe phakathi kwempilo yabantu noma ukusimamisa umnotho. Akukaze futhi kube khona isikhathi lapho kunezingxoxo ezijulile ezibheka ukuthi kuzothatha isikhathi esinga­kanani ukuvula amabhizinisi ukusimamisa umnotho.Kuyiqiniso lokhu ngoba umnotho wehlile selokhu kuhlasele ubhubhane iCorona. Kwenzeke lokhu umkhakha wezempilo usuvele uthwele kanzima.Umnotho uzikile kakhulu nokulimazayo ngoba kulinganiselwa ukuthi kungenzeka ugcine uzike ngo-8%.Imali engenayo izoncipha, empeleni isiqalile kwezinye izindawo. Ongoti bathi abantu abangangesigidi bazolahlekelwa wumsebenzi, ikakhulukazi ezinkampanini ezizimele.Lesi sibalo siyafana nesango-2009 ngesikhathi umnotho uzikile ngenxa yokushayeka komnotho wamazwe omhlaba. Osomnotho bathi ukuzika komnotho emhlabeni jikelele kungafaniswa nokwenzeka ngesikhathi seGreat Depression futhi kungenzeka kube nomthelela ongaphezu kowangaleso sikhathi. Uma sibheka izibalo, kudingeka ukuthi uhulumeni angenelele.Kumanje sebewu-87 abantu asebeshonile kanti sebebonke abathelelekile bawu-4 546. Noma kunjalo, izibalo zingcono kunezase-Europe nase-USA lapho eseshone khona abantu abadlula abangesikhathi sempi.Kodwa-ke, ngaphambi kokuthi sigijime siyongquzula izicabha zikahulumeni sithi akavule amabhizinisi, kumele singakhohlwa wukuthi kusanda kuvalwa ibhikawozi eThekwini. EGoli kuleli sonto eledlule kutholakale ukuthi abasebenzi besibhedlela bahaqwe yiCorona.Lokhu kumele kube yisikhumbuzo sokuthi singenzi isinqumo sokuvula amabhizinisi ngobudedengu.Kunjalo nje kumele singakuzibi okushiwo ososayensi nodokotela mayena nokuvulwa kwamabhizinisi sengathi akwenzekanga lutho.Kepha kungaba wubuwula ukwenza sengathi kasiboni ukuthi abantu abajabule ngenxa yokumiswa kwempilo yabo, ikakhulukazi ngoba imali engenayo iya ngokuya incipha.Umphathi omkhulu we-Investec, uMnuz Fani Titi, engxoxweni abe nayo neBloomberg, uthe akaboni ukuthi isizwe sethu singamelana nokuphela kwemisebenzi uma kungase kuphindwe kwandiswe izinsuku zomgonqo.Imizwa yabantu eNingizimu Afrika isiqala ukushintsha. Ekuqaleni bebengawuvali umlomo bebabaza umsebenzi omuhle owenziwa wuhulumeni ekunqandeni ubhubhane. Kula masonto ezayo, uhulumeni kuzomele azimisele ukuveza ukuthi wenza konke ekusemandleni ukuvimba ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane.Ukuvulwa kwezomnotho kumele kuhlelelwe kahle futhi yinto okumele iqale khona la ku-Ephreli.Akubukeki kuwumqondo omuhle ukucabanga ukuthi kuzovele kuvulwe amabhizini ngoMeyi 1 ngoba kumele kuhlelwe ngokucophelela.Siyasamukela isinqumo sangeledlule sokuthi uhulumeni avume ukuthi izinkampani ezihweba ngamafutha nezimayini zibuyele emsebenzini.Zombili izimboni zibalulekile ekusimamiseni umnotho. Isinqumo sikahulumeni sihlanganisa nosomabhizinisi abenza imisebenzi yezobuciko nezokulungisa oku­phuthumayo. Abamapayipi nogesi nabo bavunyelwe ukubuyela emsebenzini.Lesi yisinyathelo sokuqala kodwa kuningi okumele kwenziwe uma imithetho enzima isihoxisiwe eNingizumu Afrika. Futhi kudingeka uhulumeni abe nohlelo analo lokuvuselela abantu ngoba uma ngabe ubhubhane seludlulile impilo ngeke isafana nakuqala.Ongqongqoshe bathi kumele kubhekwe izindlela zokusimamisa umnotho uma seludlulile iCovid-19. Lokhu bekuvele kudingeka kakhulu.Uma kuqhathaniswa no-60% wamazwe alimala ngenxa yokuwa komnotho ngo-2009, singasho sithi lesi yisikhathi sokuzakha kabusha kwamazwe awu-90% athintwe yile nkinga.Ngenyanga edlule iBhange loMbuso lehlise imali mboleko yamabhange. Lokhu kungaphansi kwezinga lango-1973.Lona ngomunye wemizamo wokuzama ukufukula umnotho futhi livikele iRandi kulesi sikhathi esizithola sikuso.Noma kunjalo, akukho okunye leli bhange elingakwenza. Manje sesibheke inqubomgomo yezimali ukuthi isize nayo enkingeni esinayo.Inkinga ingasiza ekutheni sigxilise imiqondo yethu ekukhuliseni amabhizinisi amancane ngoba abalulekile ekwakheni imisebenzi.Futhi kumele sicabange ngokuxegisa intela emabhizinisini angadedelanga abasenzi. Lokhu kungenza ukuthi angasheshi ukudiliza.Kula masonto ezayo kumele iqembu lezomnotho lenyuse izinga lokuqalaba kubantu. Kumele kuthi kwenziwa lokho kodwa singakhohlwa wukuthi impilo yabantu ibalulekile kunomnotho.UNksz Mavuso uyisikhulu esiphezulu seBusiness Leadership South Africa.
title: Kuzodinga ubunono ukuhlelwa kabusha komnotho

text: INKAKHA yomlingisi eyaduma kwiGenerations yakudala isithembise umshado owesifazane wesihlanu. USeputla Sebogodi ongumculi wokholo nomlingisi owaduma ngendawo kaKenneth Mashaba ayeyidlala kwiGenerations, ucele umshado isithandwa sakhe uMogau Sebaka. Lokhu kwenzeke ePalala Boutique Game Lodge eLimpopo lapho uSeputla eshaye phansi khona ngedolo wacela umshado kule ntokazi nayo engumculi nomlingisi.Izithombe zalaba bobabili bazisabalalise bona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bethakasela impelasonto emnandi nesemlandweni wothando lwabo. USeputla kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uke washadelwa izikhathi ezahlukene phambili nokwenze abantu abaningi bazithola sebephawula kakhulu ngalesi senzo sakhe.Babodwa abakhala ngokuthi usekhulile akusamfanele ukulokhu ethembisa izintokazi ezisencane njengoMogau umshado.Kodwa abanye bazwakalise okukhulu ukumjambulela bamfisela nokuthi lolu thando nomshado wabo kube ngoluhlukile noluzomjabulisa njengoba esekhulile ngokweminyaka. Abanye baphenduke osomahlaya bethi kungakuhle azehlise ayoncenga uDineo okuyindawo yentokazi eyayilingisa kwiGenerations ithandana noKenneth Mashaba ngokomdlalo.
title: Usethole uthando olusha umlingisi

text: LUNGI LANGAK UNCONYWE iKwaZulu-Natal ngohlelo lokuhambela imiphakathi okukholakala ukuthi lwenze umehluko empini yokulwa negciwane lengculazi.IKwaZulu-Natal inconywe njengeyenza kangcono ekuletheni izinhlelo zokulwa negciwane lengculazi izolo ngesikhathi kugujwa usuku lwengculazi, iWorld AIDS Day, ePort Shepstone.IPhini likaMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uncome izinhlelo zakulesi sifundazwe ethi kufanele ziyiswe nakwezinye izifundazwe.Njengengxenye yezinhlelo zeWorld Aids Day amathimba ahlukene okubalwa kuwo ebeliholwa nguRamaphosa avakashele izinhlaka ezakhiwe ngumphakathi ezibizwa ngama-War Rooms lapho okulethwa khona izinhlelo ezahlukene emphakathini.Lesi sifundazwe yisona esihamba phambili esibalweni sabantu abaphila negciwane lengculazi eNingizimu Afrika kodwa sihamba phambili futhi ekuhlinzekweni kwemishanguzo njengoba sihlinzeka abantu abangaphezu kuka-1 million ngemishanguzo yokuthithibalisa igciwane lengculazi ama-anti-retrovirals (ARV’s).URamaphosa ophinde abe yiphini likasihlalo weSouth African Aids Council (SANAC) uthe izinhlelo eziqalwe yilesi sifundazwe okubalwa kuzo iZazi Campaign neSukuma Sakhe zibalulekile futhi ezinye izifundazwe zingafunda lukhulu kuzo.“Sifuna ukuthatha uhlelo lwase-KZN iSukuma Sakhe. Sifuna ukulusabalisela kwezinye izifundazwe. Uma sikhuluma nezinye izifundazwe ngiyaye ngisho ukuthi kufanele siye eKZN siyobona ukuthi yini eyenziwa khona,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe izinhlelo ezifana neZazi Campaign zibalulekile ekutheni zenze intsha, ikakhulu eyesifazane ikwazi ukuthatha izinqumo eziphusile. Uthe kukho konke abakwenzayo bazolandela ezinyathelweni ze-KZN.UMnuz Andrew Mosane omele abantu abaphila negciwane kuSanac ophinde abe yilungu leTreatment Action Campaign kuzwelonke uthe kufanele izifundazwe zibheke ukuthi yini le eyenziwa yiKZN ehlukile.“IKZN ikwazi ukuhambela umphakathi ilethe izinhlelo kubantu. Kufanele ezinye izifundazwe zifunde kokwenziwa yi-KZN. Kwezinye izifundazwe okubalwa kuzo iGauteng akwenziwa lokhu. Kufanele lezi ezinye izifundazwe zize la eKZN zizobona okwenziwayo,” kusho uMosane.UNdunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, uthe kuyabajabulisa ukuthi lesi sifundazwe sikwazi ukuhlinzeka imishanguzo kodwa bafuna ukuthi sisuke ekubeni ngesihamba phambili ezibalweni zabantu abanegciwane lengculazi.URamaphosa uthe yize kukuningi okukhombisa impumelelo ezinhlelweni zokulwa negciwane lengculazi, kuningi okusadinga ukuthi kwenziwe.Uthe bakhathazekile ngezibalo zentsha yesifazane enegciwane lengculazi.Uthe: “Sitshelwa ukuthi zingu-2300 izingane zamantombazane kanye nabantu besifazane abaphakathi kweminyaka engu-15 no-24 abangenwa yigciwane lengculazi njalo ngesonto.”Uthe lokhu kusho ukuthi kufanele kwenziwe izinhlelo ezizogxila kubona ukuze kugwenywe lesi simo.URamaphosa uthe ngonyaka ozayo iSANAC izokwethula uhlelo olubucayi oluzobheka abantu besifazane abasebancane. Uthe ngalolu hlelo bazimisele ukwehlisa ngo-30% isibalo sabantu besifazane abasebancane abatheleleka ngegciwane lengculazi esikhathini esingangeminyaka emithathu.
title: Kunconywe iKZN kuWorld Aids Day

text:
UDJ Zinhle ungene impi yamazwi ephakathi kwalaba kulandela ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi uNtsiki usehoxile ekuveleni kuhlelo olwethulwa uPearl Thusi, iBehind the Story obekulindeleke ukuthi ageqe amagula kulo ngendlela aziphatha ngayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Kuvela lokhu nje ngeledlule kusuke umsindo phakathi kwalaba ngesikhathi uNtsiki ethi uPearl ungumuntu ongathendeki. UPearl wabe esephendula ngokuthi uNtsiki ubukeka ewumuntu okhule engathandwa, wacela abalandeli bakhe kutwitter ukuthi bamkhombise uthando.Izolo kuTwitter uPearl Thusi ubhale wathi ophrojusa bakhe baqeda ukumazisa ukuthi usehoxile ekukhulumeni ngempilo yakhe kwiBehind the Story uNtsiki. “Ngisanda kuzwa ukuthu uNtsiki usehoxile ekubeni kwiBehind the Story. Ngijabhile kakhulu ngoba indlela ebengizombuza ngayo imibuzo ibingeke imuphathe kabi, uma  lokho bekuzoba yinkinga. Bengilindile ukuthi sibe nengxoxo evundile nenolwazi, kodwa ke…” kusho uPearl kumbhalo abuye wawususa ekhasini lakhe kutwitter. Kuthe kusenjalo kwangena umngani ka Pearl Thusi omkhulu, uDJ Zinhle, wathi uNtsiki ufana nazo zonke eziqhwaga ezisezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngokubaleka uma sekumele zikhulume nabantu ngqo emehlweni. Uqhube waveza ukuthi akaphawuli ngoba uPearl ewumngani wakhe kuphela kodwa naye useke wabhekana nesimo esifanayo.“Ngikhuluma ngento engiyaziyo. Nami sengake ngazithola kulesi simo kaningana futhi angikaze ngiphawule kabi ngale ntokazi. Ngimdala kanti ngiyazi akuthi akuhlangene nami, abanye abantu uma bengaphathekile kahle bethemba ukuthi bazozizwa kangcono uma behamba benyathela abanye,” kubhala uDJ Zinhle ku-Twitter.Typical cyber bully.. They are only brave behind their phones.— #MeetingYourPower #ERAbyDJZinhle #ZeeNation (@DJZinhle) 
May 27, 2019Not even. Im talking from experience. Been a victim myself & not once have I ever said anything negative about the lady. I'm jus grown & I know that none of it has anything to do with me, some people r feeling so low & the only hope of ever feeling better is by stepping on others— #MeetingYourPower #ERAbyDJZinhle #ZeeNation (@DJZinhle) 
May 27, 2019UNtsiki Mazwai akazibekanga phansi, waphendula wathi ngelinye ilanga luzoba khona olunye uhlelo ayogeqa kulo amagula kodwa lokho ngeke akwenze kwiBehind the Story. Uthe lolu hlelo alulona isiqalo nesiphetho sakho konke. Ube esephendula nangokuphawula kukaDJ Zinhle wathi mhlawumbe uthintwe ukuthi usanda kuncoma uBonang muva nje.*Laughs in cum Laude

title: UDJ Zinhle ungene empini kaPearl Thusi noNtsiki Mazwai

text: LUGCINE lugobile uphondo kumqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso Mosimane wakusho kwagcwala ukuthi izinto azihlangani, okuzobeka iphupho labo lokuqeda isizini nezinkomishi ezintathu engcupheni.ISundowns isele ngamaphuzu ayisithupha kwiKaizer Chiefs ebanga nayo isicoco se-Absa Premiership kulandela ukuguqa ngo 3-2 kwiCape Town City ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.ISundowns izama ukuvikela isicoco seligi kanti iTelkom Knockout isisekhabetheni. Kusekhona nowamanqamu weNedbank Cup ezowudlala neBloemfontein Celtic ngoSepthemba 8.“Akuhambi kahle neze. Ukube kuhamba kahle ngabe siyawina, manje akuwineki. Okuhle ngathi ukuthi noma sibhekene nenkinga engakanani sihluleka silwile. Imiphumela iyazikhulumela ngakho ngeke sicashe ngesithupha ngalokhu. Le Sundowns ayifani nale ebesiyazi ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalwe imidlalo. Ngiyakwamukela lokho,” usho kanje uMosimane.Ngombango wesicoco neChiefs uthe: “Akubukeki sengathi sizowufica lo mbango. Inkinga ukuthi asiwini. Ngenxa yalokho kukodwa kubukeka sengathi lo mbango usuhambile. Ngalokhu angisho ukuthi ngiphonsa ithawula kodwa ngibuka isimo sethu bese ngibuka umbango.”UMosimane uncome kakhulu iCity ngokuba yiqembu elidlala ibhola hhayi njengeHighlands Parks evele ikugibele ngakho konke enakho.“Umdlalo ubunzima kodwa nathi senze amaphutha amaningi kuwona. Badlala kahle (iCity). UKermit (Erasmus) umgadli okhaliphile,” kusho lo mqeqeshi ngemuva komdlalo.Akazange aliyeke ithuba lokuveza ukuthi kukhona nokuthi abadlali bakhe athembele kubona abekho esimweni esifanele.“Uma labo badlali osuke uthembele kubona kuyibona abakhombisa izimpawu zokuba buthaka, kufanele wazi njengomqeqeshi ukuthi akuvumi khona. “UThemba (Zwane) akekho esimweni aziwa ngaso kodwa kufanele ngimbophele ngoba umqoka endleleni esidlala ngayo. Bonke oSibusiso (Vilakazi), Gaston (Sirino) bonke babukeka bengebona nje kodwa sonke imbangela yalokhu siyayazi,” kuqhuba uMosimane.“Uma singayiwini iligi ngiyasho futhi sizolwa ngakho konke esinakho ukuthi siwine iNedbank Cup. Linjalo ibhola. Ungakufisa konke futhi ukulwele ngawo wonke amandla onawo kodwa ngeke ukuthole konke okufunayo."Lokhu kwenzeka kuwona wonke amaqembu emhlabeni. Kunzima kodwa sizoqhubeka nokuzama,” kusonga yena.
title: UPitso uthi izinto azihlangani kuDowns

text: KUNGAKAPHELI sikhathi esingakanani kutholwe izidumbu zababili esihlabathini sasebhishi laseSuncoast, sekuphinde kwatholwa isidumbu sowesilisa (49) obekwelinye lamagumbi ehhotela elikulendawo eThekwini, ngoLwesibili. Amaphoyisa aqinisekise ukuthi asazophenya kabanzi ngalesi sigameko. Okhulumela amaphoyisa uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe kuzovulwa icala, bephenye imbangela yokushona kukamufi. UMbele uthe isidumbu besidindilize phansi kwelinye lamahhotela aseNorth Beach. “Uphenyo mayelana nalesi sigameko lusaqhubeka. Ukuhlolwa kwesidumbu yikhona okuzocacisa ngembangela yokushona kukamufi,” kuchaza uMbele. Lesi sehlakalo silandela esinye isigameko esenzeke olwandle eThekwini, lapho kutholwe khona owesifazane (50) nowesilisa (24) begwazwe babulawa endaweni engaqhelile kakhulu kuleli hhotela. Kusolwa ukuthi uFathima Muhammad noKresen Chandiah bagwazwa bashonela endaweni yesigameko. Izidumbu zatholwa owesilisa owayebheka izimpahla azozidayisa.  Akukaboshwa muntu ngaleso sigameko. Akucaci ukuthi lezi zigameko zihlobene yini.
title: Kutholwe esinye isidumbu eSuncoast

text: ELAKULELI libhekene nezihlava ezimbili okumele izwe libambisane ekulweni nazo, okuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane, neCovid-19.Usho kanje uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngenkathi ethula inkulumo abeyibhekise esizweni mayelana nokuxegiswa kweminye yemithetho kuleli esigabeni sesithathu ukuze kukhule umnotho wezwe.Ngaphandle kokukhula komnotho, uRamaphosa uthe kunamabhizinisi osekunesikhathi eside avalwa angakwazi ukungenisa imali, kanti nabantu ebesebenza kuwo, bengakwazi ukuthola imali yokondla imindeni yabo.“Nginethemba lokuthi ngokubambisana singakwazi ukunqoba lezi zihlava kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe okubuhlungu wukuthi abahlumeza abantu besifazane nezingane, abantu esiphila nabo, okungamadodana ethu, nobaba bethu.Ugxeke kakhulu ukwanda kwezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane emva kokuthi kuvunyelwe ukudayiswa kotshwala kulandela ukuwelela kwezwe esigabeni sesithathu.NgokukaRamaphosa, akubona utshwala obudlwengula buphinde bubulale abantu besifazane nezingane, kodwa abesilisa abangalawuleki.Uthe kunezinhlelo uhulumeni asezenzile ukulekelela izisulu ezihlukumezekile, njengokunikela kukahulumeni ngamabhilidi okuzohlaliswa kuwo asebehlukumezekile.Uthe kunezinkantolo esezimisiwe ezizolekelela abomthetho emacaleni aphathelene nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.Phakathi kwamabhizinisi uRamaphosa axegise kuwo ukuthi asebenze yilawa:Abacwala izinwele sebezovumeleka ukuthi baseqale ukusebenzaIzindawo ezidayisa ukudla sezizovunyelwa ukuthi abantu bathenge kuzona baphinde bahlale phansi, wathi kulokhu kusazocacishwa ngeminye imininingwane ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.Ukuhlangana kwabantu ezindaweni zokuzijabulisa kuzovunyelwa kodwa ngaphansi kwemithetho ethile  Nezemidlalo okungathintwana kuzona njenge tennis, uthe zizovulwa.Nakuba uRamaphosa ethe kuzokuba nokuxegiswa kwasekubalile, ukuqhubeka nokuzibhekelela ngokulandela inhlanzeko yokulwa nokusabalala kweCovid-19, kusazomele kulandelwe.Uthe i-Afrika izobambana ukuthola izindlela zokulwa naleli gciwane.Uthe kuye kwakhuthaza futhi ukuthola ukuthi i-Oxford University eBritain, isiqhamuke nekhambi elingakwazi ukuthi lisetshenziswe ekulweni naleli gciwane, wathi ngenhlanhla kunenkampani kuleli engakwazi ukuthi ilisabalalise ngokubambisana noMnyango wezeMpilo.Mayelana nokunye okuzokwenzeka, uRamaphosa uthe kuzocaciswa ngokuhamba kwezinsuku.
title: Elakuleli libhekene nezihlava ezimbili okumele libambisane ekulweni nazo - Ramaphosa

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi uNkk Lindiwe Zulu namhlanje umemezele imigomo nemibandela ebilindelwe ngabomvu ngabantu bakulei yokuhola isibonelelo sikaR350 sabangasebenzi. Lesi sibonelelo simenyezelwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngeledlule ngesikhathi ekhuluma nezwe ngoR500 billion wokutakula abantu abahlwempu bakuleli ngokunjalo namabhizinisi athikamezwe ukuvalwa kwezwe. ENingizimu Afrika babalelwa ku-29% abantu abangasebenzi  kanti ngaphambi kokuvalwa kwezwe ngenxa yeCovid-19, abantu bese bevele beqalile ukulahlekelwa yimisebenzi ubuthaphuthaphu, abanye bahlezi emakhaya ngenxa yokukhula kancane komnotho okunciphisa amathupha omsebenzi. Ekhuluma namhlanje, uNkk Zulu uthe le mali eyokulekelela abantu abangasebenzi. Imigomo nemibandela yokuhola lesi sibonelelo imi kanje: - Ngeyabantu abaneminyaka engaphezulu kuka-18 - Abangaqashiwe nabanganazo izindlela zokwenza imali - Abangaziholi izibonelelo zikahulumeni- Abangahlomuli lutho ngokohlelo lwe-Unemployment Insurance Benefit - Abangatholi mali kuNSFAS - Abangahlali ezindlini ezixhaswe uhulumeni Nakhu ozokudinga ukubhalisela ukuthola uR350: - Inombolo yakho kamazisi ehambisana namagama akho nesibongo njengoba kuvela kumazisi. - Yisho ubulili nokukhubazeka - Imininingwane yasebhange - Imininingwane yokuxhumana nawe '- Incwadi efakazela ikheli lakhoUNgqongqoshe uthe bayaqonda ukuthi kunabantu abangasebenzi abanganawo ama-account asebhange kodwa nazoba nazo izinhlelo zokulekelela labo bantu. Abadinga lolu sizo bangafaka izicelo zabo ngokuthumela umyalezo kuWhatsApp kwinombolo ethi 0600 123 456 bese ucela ezithinta iSASSA. Noma ungathumela i-email [email protected]
title: #Coronavirus: Nakhu okufanele ukwenze ukuhola uR350 wabangasebenzi

text: USEKWA nayiziMeya zomasipala abakhulu eGauteng umholi weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango (osesithombeni), iqembu lakhe elibheke engqungqutheleni yesifundazwe ezoba se-Olive Convention Centre, eThekwini, ngoFebhuwari 3.IMeya yaseJohannesburg, uMnuz Herman Mashaba, neMeya yaseTshwane, uMnuz Solly Msimanga, ngoLwesibili baphumele obala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana baseka uMncwango ekutheni abuyiselwe esikhundleni sakhe.UMashaba noMsimang bathi iDA ikhule kakhulu eKZN iholwa wuMncwango.UMncwango ubanga isikhundla sokuhola iqembu eKZN noMnuz Emmanuel Mhlongo oyikhansela laseThekwini.Oke waba yimbangi kaMncwango enkulu, uMnuz Sizwe Mchunu, akazange awungenele umbango.Esikhundleni sikaSihlalo wenhlangano esifundazweni kubanga uMnuz Francois Rodgers noMnuz Dean Mcpherson.UMncwango ukwamukele ukuphakanyiswa kwakhe.Ilungu leDA esiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Hlanganani Gumbi, ngoLwesibili uthe lifisa uMncwango ukuthi aqhubeke nokuhola iqembu esifundazweni.UGumbi uthe iDA ikhulise ukwesekwa kwayo esifundazweni iholwa nguMncwango.“Okokuqala emlandweni iDA inamakhansela uMkhanyakude wonke, namakhansela KwaNongoma nakwezinye izindawo zasekhaya. Konke lokhu sikuzuze ngoMncwango,” kusho uGumbi.Uthe kumanje iDA ihola omasipala abaningi KwaZulu-Natal ngokubambisana ne-IFP. “Uma kusenoMncwango iDA izosuka ekubuseni ngokubambisana ne-IFP igcine sekuyiyona yodwa ebusayo,” kusho uGumbi.
title: Abaseka uMncwango bathi iDA ikhuliswe wukuholwa nguye

text: UMCULI wakuleli osezakhele igama, uJabu Hlongwane uchaze amaKrestu aseNingizimu Afrika ngokuthi angabantu abanganamsebenzi walutho.Uze wasebenzisa igama lesilungu ethi a-useless.UHlongwane ubemenywe engqungqutheleni yeThekwini Community Church (ECC), eholwa nguMbhishobhi Vusi Dube.Ubalule izinto athe zimenza abone ukuthi ayikho indaba yamaKhrestu eNingizimu Afrika.Ukhale ngokuqhakambisa ukukholwa kwawo kuze kube sengathi yinto enkulu. Uthi asikho isidingo sokuthi umuntu okholiwe amemezele ngokukholwa kwakhe.Uthe kuyishwa ukuthi sekwande amaKrestu agabisa ngensindiso. “Njengoba sewukholwa ngaphezulu kukaJesu nje, yini inkinga yakho. Kusemhlabeni lapha, yithi ukholwa kodwa ube uphumelela empilweni. Ungalibali ukudumisa ukukholwa ube ungenalutho,” usho kanje.Ukukholwa ngokudlulele, uHlongwane uthe kwenza amaKrestu athithize. Uthe kunacabanga ukuthi ukukholwa kuchaza ukuhlonipha kakhulu, uthobe noma kungenasidingo.Ukhale nangedimoni lokungazazi kwamaKrestu nokungazihloniphi kwawo, athe yikhona kanye okwenza amaKrestu abonakale engabantu abangenamsebenzi walutho.“Yingakho nje nohulumeni wethu ungazihluphi nangokuthi kube khona okubuzayo kumaKrestu.Yingoba uyabona ukuthi ayikho into ongayithola kumaKrestu aseNingizimu Afrika,” kusho uHlongwane.UMbhishobhi Dube uthe inhlosongqangi yale ngqungquthela bekuwukuzocija abazalwane, bakuqonde kahle kamhlophe ukubaluleka kokuzwakala kwezwi labo eNingizimu Afrika.Ukhuze nesihlava esihlasele abesifazane athe bayagagamela bajahe ukugana bengakakulungeli.Weluleke abesifazane ngokuthi bangajahi, kodwa abalinde isikhathi okuyisona sona sokushada. Ugcizelele nangokuthi kuhle abesifazane bakubeke eqhulwini ukuzithuthukisa kunokujaha ukushada.
title: UJabu Hlongwane utinyele amakholwa

text: LIZOQULWA icala likaMampintsha uma yena noBabes Wodumo, owammangelela ngokumshaya, bengazethameli izithangami zokwelulekwa wosonhlakalahle beFamily and Marriage Society of South Africa (Famsa).Lokhu kushiwo yiMantshi uPillay (igama layo eligcine lingatholakalanga) eNkantolo ePinetown izolo lapho uMampintsha evele khona.UMampintsha usolwa ngokushaya uBabes esehlweni esabonakala kwi-video sasabalaliswa bukhoma kwi-Instagram.Umshushisi uNdoda January, utshele imantshi ukuthi ngokudlule icala laguqa ngenxa yokuthi kwavunyelwana ngokuthi ummangali nommangalalelwa bazoyobona iFamsa.“Lezo zithangami azikapheli.”Uthe ngokukasonhlalakahle kusamele babe nezithangami ezintathu ngaphambi kokuthi enze umbiko. Okwamanje sinye.“Kuwumshophi ukuthi ummangali uyagula. Ubecabanga ukuthi uzobe esengcono kodwa ukugula kwamqinisa,” kusho umshushisi.Uthe akanaso isiqiniseko sokuthi unani. Imantshi ithe kumele eze nencwadi kadokotela uma udaba selubuyela enkantolo ngoJulayi 9. Umshushisi uzoxhumana nommangali ngalokhu.Imantshi ibe isiyalela uMampintsha ukuthi abuye enkantolo ngoJulayi 9 ekuseni ngale kwalokho uzophucwa ibheyili yakhe avalelwe.“Khumbula, kubalulekile ukuthi yena (Mampintsha) nommangali bathamele izithangami zeFamsa. Uma bengazithameli, icala lizoqhubeka lithethwe,” kusho imantshi.UMampintsha obehambisana nomdansi wakhe, uPhila Tshomela, ubebukeka ekhululekile efake ijini nejakhethi emnyama.Ngemuva kokuguqa kwecala uphume eqhuga nommeli wakhe uPat Magwaza, bakhuluma nabezindaba.UMagwaza uthe banethemba lokuthi kuzoshaya uJulayi 9 sebeqedile neFamsa bese udaba luyasongwa.Uthe uMampintsha akathukile ngokuthi icala lingase libuyele enkantolo luyoqulwa.
title: Lizoqulwa icala likaMpintsho uma bengayi kolulekwa

text:
KHULEKANI MASEKOamagobolondo amathathu atholakala eduze kwesidumbu sikaNksz Nomathamsanqa Mntungwa adutshulwa yisibhamu esisodwa.Lobu wubufakazi obuthulwe eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini yilowo owahlola amagobolondo atholakala eduze nesidumbu, uWarrant Officer Singh.Umnuz Nathi Nyamazane ubekwe icala lokuthi wabulala unina wengane yakhe uNomathamsanqa Mntungwa.Inkantolo ibigcwele abantu abebegqoke izikibha ze-ANC ezinesithombe sikaNksz Mntungwa.Ethula ubufakazi, u-Warrant Officer Nonduduzo Mbeje, osophikweni lwamaphoyisa olucwaninga ngezibhamu, uchazele inkantolo indlela ahlola ngayo isibhamu okusolwa ukuthi yisona esadubula sabulala umufi.Uthe inhloso yokucwaninga isibhamu kwabe kungukusihlola ukuthi siyasebenza yini. Wathola ukuthi isibhamu esasikade sithunyelwe kuyena sasisebenza kahle.Owahlola amagobolondo atholakala eduze nesidumbu sikaNksz Mntungwa, uWarrant Officer Singh, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amagobolondo amathathu ngokokuhlola kwakhe aphuma esibhamini esisodwa. Uthe lokhu kwaba wumsebenzi olula kakhulu njengoba bekumele aqhathanise omaka bamagobolondo. Kodwa uthe ngeke akuqinisekisa ukuthi inhlamvu eyabe isidubulile neyayithunyelwe kuye ukuthi ayihlole ngabe nayo yaphuma esibhamini esisodwa ngoba yayiyinye engeke ayiqhathanise nalutho.“Angikaze ngisibone ngamehlo isibhamu, kodwa ngabona amagobolondo nenhlavu eyayisidubulile. Umsebenzi wami kwabe kunguhlola amagobolondo nenhlamvu, hhayi isibhamu,” kusho uWarrant Officer Singh.UConstable Vivian Naidoo, ongumthwebuli emaphoyiseni, uvezele inkantolo ukuthi efika endaweni yesigameko kwabe sekukhona amaphoyisa ayesevele esefikile.Uthe wabona isidumbu sowesifazane silele eceleni kukhona amagobolondo ezinhlamvu zesibhamu kanye nenhlamvu eyabe isidubulile. Wathwebula amagobolondo wamaka nalapho ebekhona. Wawathatha ukuba ayohlolwa ngoMashi 2014.Kube sekungena ebhokisini lofakazi umngani kammangalelwa, uMnuz Sanele Dlamini. Utshele inkantolo ukuthi wafonelwa wumngani wakhe ngosuku okwanyamalala ngalo uNksz Mntungwa wamcela ukuthi amlandele imoto yakhe ayembekele yona kubo. Esendleleni ebheke emzini kammangalelwa wahlangana naye esevenini yamaphoyisa, wabe esemnika ikhadi lomfundi wase-UNISA nomazisi okwabe kungokukamufi kanye nesikhwama semali nesikhiye semoto yakhe ummangalelwa. Wabe eseyalelwa wumngane wakhe ukuthi umazisi nekhadi lomfundi kukamufi akufake ethoyilethi.Ummeli wommangalelwa, u-Advocate Sachin Govender, uthe ummangelelwa uyakuphika ukuthi wanika uMnuz Dlamini umazisi kanye nekhadi lomfundi kukamufi. “Ukufika ezandleni zikafakazi kwezimpahla zikamufi kwenza ukuthi asoleke ufakazi ukuthi unolwazi ngokunyamalala kukamufi,” kusho uGovender.Ufakazi wokugcina kube umngani kaMntungwa, uNksz Nonhlanhla Ngcobo. 
Icala lisaqhubeka.
title: Amagobolondo aphuma esibhamini esisodwa

text: BADUBE ukusebenza izolo abasebenzi bezempilo baseNkonjeni, abahlola abanobhubhane iCovid-19.Abasebenzi okukhona kubo nabashayeli, bakhala ngokuthi bahole imali engaphelele kwabebethenjiswe yona beqala ngo-Ephreli. Bathi bakhethwa kulolu hlelo lokuhlola abantu ngaphansi kwesifunda iZululand. Omunye walaba basebenzi okhulume naleli phephandaba wacela ukungadalulwa, uthe bebeqala ukuyithola imali ngesonto eledlule.“Besilindele ukuthi sizofakelwa * -30% kodwa sithole * -15%. Sizamile ukufuna izimpendulo kumphathi wesibhedlela obambile kodwa akasinaki. Izinqumo uzithathela yedwa ngaphandle kokuxhumana nathi,” kusho yena.Omunye wabasebenzi ukhale ngokuthi isifunda abasebenzela kuso sinesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abahaqekile. Uthe lokhu kubabeka engcupheni, osekubaphatha kabi uma bengasaholelwa kahle njengokwesithembiso.“Ngesikhathi siqala ukusebenza besingena nangempelasonto. Sithole ngesonto edlule ukuthi ngeke sisasebenza ngempelasonto. Okusixakayo wukuthi sonke lesi sikhathi besisebenza kodwa ngoba sekuqala ukuphuma imali sekumele siyeke ukusebenza ngempelasonto,” kusho umsebenzi.Laba basebenzi izolo bagcine beqhinqe lapho obekumele bathathwe khona yizimoto ukuyosebenza emiphakathini ehlukene.OnguNobhala weDenosa esifundazweni uMnuz Mandla Shabangu, uthe ucabanga ukuthi laba basebenzi abachazelekile ngalolu hlelo. Uthe okwamanje ayikho imali eholwa abasebenzi bezempilo eqondeneneCovid-19.“Indaba yokuholelwa ngokweCovid-19 isakhulunywa ezingeni likazwelonke, akukho okusaphumelele. Laba basebenzi bafakwa kulolu hlelo ngo-Ephreli kodwa abaqashiwe ngokugcwele. Amaphesenti abaholelwa wona banikezelwa ukuthi abanayo imihlomulo njengalaba abaqashwe ngokugcwele,” kuchaza uShabangu.Mayelana nokusebenza ngempelasonto, uthe vele ayikho imali eyengeziwe abazoyikhokhelwa ngoba abaqashiwe ngokugcwele. UShabangu uphawule ngodaba lwasesibhedlela iNkosi Albert Luthuli lapho sekuhaqeke abasebenzi bezempilo abangaphezu kuka-100. Uthe bebesenza olwabo uphenyo ngaphakathi.“Sithole ukuthi kukhona ukungaphathwa ngokulingana phakathi kwabahlengikazi nodokotela. Kuthiwa odokotela banikezwa izifonyo amaN95 bese kuthi abahlengikazi banikezwe ama-surgical mask. Besisafuna ukuthola kahle ukuthi kufinyelele kanjani ekutheni kuhaqeke isibalo esingaka, okumanje sisacubungula udaba,” kusho yena.Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba uMnyango wezeMpilo ungakaphawuli ngodaba lwaseNkonjeni.
title: Badube ukusebenza abahlola iCovid-19

text: UKHOMBE indlela abasebenzi abangu-28 uMasipala Ugu ngenxa yokungenela isiteleka esingekho emthethweni ebese sidonse amasonto amathathu.Laba basebenzi abasophikweni lwezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle edepho yomkhandlu esePark Rynie, baxoshwe ngoLwesibili.Ngesonto eledlule lo mkhandlu uxoshe abasebenzi bawo abangu-42 eHarding.Okhulumela umasipala, uMnuz France Zama, uthe abasebenzi abezanga emsebenzini amasonto amathathu. Uthe abasebenzi abaxoshiwe bashaye indiva umyalelo wabaholi bomkhandlu obubayalela ukuthi babuyele emsebenzini futhi ubaxwayisa ngokungase kwenzeke uma beqhubeka nesiteleka.“Isiteleka sabo besihambisana nezenzo zobugebengu, okuhlanganisa ukuphazanyiswa kwendlela okuhlinzekwa ngayo abantu amanzi emiphakathini. Kuyaqhubeka nokuba nomthelela ongemuhle empilweni yabantu abebekwenza ngoba amanzi ayisidingo sawo wonke umuntu,” kusho uZama.UZama uthe umkhandlu uzoqinisekisa ukuthi umthetho uyagcinwa emsebenzini.“Umthetho uzothatha indawo yawo kulabo abaphazamisa ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu ngamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle wumasipala,” kugcizelela uZama.UMnuz Mthandeni Ngcobo, ongusihlalo wenyunyana iSouth African Municipal Workers Union (Samwu) Ogwini, uthe badumele ngesinqumo somkhandlu kodwa ubuholi bale nyunyana KwaZulu-Natal, sebuvele busiphonsele inselelo isinqumo esithathwe wumkhandlu.UNgcobo uthe bonke abasebenzi abaxoshiwe bazobuyela emsebenzini ngoba baxoshwe ngaphandle kokubizelwa phambi kwesigcawu esiqondisa ubugwegwe ukuze kuzwakale uhlangothi lwabo.“Besithi abaholi bomkhandlu bayawazi umthetho kanti inhloso yabo wukulwa nabasebenzi. Sizolwa ngayo yonke indlela ukuze babuyiselwe emsebenzini abasebenzi abaxoshiwe. Yini ingaxoshwa imenenja kamasipala nenhloko yamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle, okuyibona bantu abagcwele inkohlakalo. Thina besilwela ukuthi kumiswe lezi zikhulu emsebenzini, kuqalwe uphenyo ngenkohlakalo egcwele emkhandlwini,” kusho uNgcobo.Uveze nokuthi bebengekho esitelekeni abasebenzi kodwa bebezwelana nabaholi babo abebemiswe emsebenzini wumasipala ngoba besolwa ngokudunga umhlangano womkhandlu.“Umkhandlu yiwona obuphazamisa ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu ngamanzi khona kuzoqashwa izinkampani ezizimele zamaloli. Lokhu bakwenza ngenhloso yokukhwabanisa ngoba ayibe isalandelwa imithetho elawula ukuqashwa komuntu ozokwenzela umkhandlu umsebenzi ngoba kuthiwa sekuyaphuthuma,” kusho uNgcobo.Ubuze ukuthi kungani engabizwanga amaphoyisa ezobopha abasebenzi umkhandlu obasola ngokuthi bebephazamisa ingqalasizinda ehlinzeka imiphakathi amanzi.Kuthiwa bangu-16 abamele abasebenzi abamiswe yilo masipala
title: UMasipala  Ugu uxoshe abebetelekile

text: KUMQHATHE nezingane ezine aziholela imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni ugogo waseMatikwe, eNanda, othi ikhwatshaniswe emshinini ngabantu abangaziwa.UNkk Nesta Dladla uthe ngoMsombuluko imali ikhishwe emshinini yena esendlini nekhadi lokuhola.Uthe akaze alilahle ikhadi lokuhola wabe esekhomba ngenjumbane isikhungo esiholela izimpesheni iSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa) ngokumholela Ophathe.“Angiyikhiphi yonke imali ngosuku lomholo kodwa ngenza izidingo zasekhaya, enye isale ekhadini. Ibilokhu iqongeleleka okuthe uma kungena umholo wale nyanga, yashaqwa yonke. EPosini bathe asiye kwaSassa ngoba akukho okukhomba ukuthi iphutha likubona,” kusho uNkk Dladla.Uthe nasesitolo ubesebenzisa ikhadi uma ethenga engawuphathi ukheshi ngesandla.“Izingane kazeneme, isimo simuncu ekhaya, akumnandanga ngoba ziyabona ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle ngemali yazo,” kusho uNkk Dladla.Izolo uNkk Dadla ubesemahhovisi oMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi eMatendeni, eNewtown A, eNanda, eyofuna impendulo.UMqondisi wezokuxhumana nokumaketha kwaSassa KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Sandy Godlwana, uxolisile ngokukhwatshaniselwa kukaNkk Dladla imali wathi uphenyo lwabo lukhomba ukuthi iphutha lisePosini.“Siyazwelana naye ngokwenzekile futhi iSassa ikhokhe ngesikhathi ngoba asizimisele ukubhekana nezingqinamba. Kungenzeka kunomuntu othile ePosini obebona ikhula le mali wabe eseyikhwabanisa,” kusho uNksz Godlwana.UNksz Godlwana uthe bazonika uNksz Dladla isijumbana sokudla ukuze abambise ngesikhathi kusaphenywa mayelana nenkinga yakhe.
title: Ukhala ezithulisa ugogo oqolwe imali yesibonelelo

text: INHLANGANO eqoqa igazi eNingizimu Afrika, iSouth African National Blood Services (SANBS) seyiveze ukuthi kunenkinga yokushoda kwegazi kuleli.Ongumqondisi wezokukhangisa eSANBS KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sifiso Khoza, uthe eNingizimu Afrika yonkana kunegazi elingasetshenziswa izinsuku ezintathu kuphela bese kuthi KwaZulu-Natal kube negazi elingasiza amahora angu-42 kuphela.Uthe isikhathi samaholidi kaDisemba yisikhathi esinzima kubona ngoba abakwazi ukuthola igazi abasuke belidinga ukuze basize iziguli ezigulayo nalezo ezisuke zilimele.“Namuhla sinxusa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi basisize. Njengoba sekuza isikhathi esimatasa samaholidi sibhekene nesimo esinzima futhi sidinga abantu abazonikela ngegazi ukuze kunyuke umthamo wegazi esingakwazi ukulihlinzeka iziguli ezisezibhedlela, ezithembele kithina,” kusho uKhoza.Uthe zonke izinsuku bathembela emseni wabantu abanikela ngegazi ukuze litholakale. Ngokusho kwakhe, lesi sikhathi ngesibucayi kakhulu.UKhoza uthe bafuna ukugqugquzela amalungu omphakathi asebenzise imizuzu engu-30 bayonikela ngegazi kulawa maholidi njengoba ethe igazi lomuntu oyedwa lingasindisa impilo yabantu abathathu.Uthe banohlelo lokuphuma umkhankaso wokugqugquzela abantu ukuthi banikele igazi kusuka ngesikhathi samaholidi kuze kube nguJanuwari. Phezu kwalokhu bazolula nesikhathi abasebenza ngazo babe nemikhankaso nangezimpelasonto.Uthe inhloso yabo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi inhlangano yabo ayisuki emehlweni abantu nokuthi itholakale kalula.Uqhube wathi bangakwazi ukuthola igazi elenele uma kungaqhubeka kube khona abantu abanikela njalo.
