Uchaze abantu abanikela igazi njengabantu abakhathalela impilo yabantu futhi yibo abasiza ukwenza lula umsebenzi onzima wabasebenzi bezempilo.
title: Kunxuswa abantu ukuthi banikele ngegazi kula maholidi

text: IQEMBU lesizwe lebhola labesifazane, iBanyana Banyana, likwazile ukufeza ebelibekelwe khona kulo nyaka okufanele kube wukuvuleka kwekhasi elisha ekufukulweni kukanobhutshuzwayo wesibhuda eNingizimu Afrika.Impumelelo yeBanyana eqophe umlando eGhana ngokuzibekisela okokuqala emlandaweni indawo kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eseFrance ngonyaka ozayo, kumele kuphonsele inselelo iziphathimandla zebhola eNingizimu Afrika ekutheni zigcine ezazo izethembiso.Ngesikhathi umqeqeshi uDesiree Ellis enikezwa umsebenzi umengameli weSafa, uDanny Jordaan, akazange akufihle ukuthi umbandela abekelwe wona owokufaka iNingizimu Afrika kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. U-Ellis nabadlali bakhe abalwe njengamabhubesi eGhana bakwenzile lokho, kwahlokoma wonke amakhona eNingizimu Afrika.Njengoba kuzoqala unyaka omusha, amehlo asebheke kuJordaan nethimba lakhe ukuthi bayazigcina yini ezabo izethembiso.Eqhulwini wukusungula iligi kazwelonke esezingeni elikhokhelayo yabesifazane okade kwakukhulunywa ngayo. Ngokusho kukaJordaan le ligi izoqala ngo-Ephreli wonyaka ozayo. Kusukela ebuyiselwe ihlandla lesibili njengomengameli weSafa, ujube elinye lamaphini akhe uRia Ledwaba ukuhola umkhankaso wokuyisungula.Okunye okusemqoka wukuqinisekisa ukuthi iBanyana ihlelelwa imidlalo yobungani namaqembu aqinile aphesheya ukulungiselela iNdebe yoMhlaba engoJuni lapho iqhathwe neSpain, Germany neChina kuGroup B.* NgoJanuwari iBanyana ivule unyaka ngomdlalo wobungani neSweden eKapa ngaphansi kobuholi buka-Ellis obengakaqashwa ngokugcwele. Kulo mdlalo iBanyana ibhaxabulwe ngo 3-0, kodwa kwacaca lapho kumele kulungiswe khona. Iqembu lamantombazane labaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-20 lihlulwe yiNigeria emzuliswaneni wokugcina wokuhlunga amaqembu azoya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba.* NgoFebhuwari * -Ellis unikezwe isikhundla sokupheka iBanyana ngokugcwele sekucacile ukuthi iSafa ihlulekile ukuthola abaqeqeshi baphesheya obese kuphele cishe unyaka wonke bezanywa. Omunye umqeqeshi wesifazane uSimphiwe Dludlu uzifake emlandweni eyisa iqembu lika-Under 17 kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ebibanjelwe e-Uruguay ngoNovemba. UDludlu ulandele ezinyathelweni zikaSolly Luvhengo owafaka Abantwana okokuqala kweyoMhlaba ngo-2010 eTrinidad & Tobago. Abantwana bakwaze ukubuya nephuzu e-Uruguay, bashaywe kabili, badlala kowodwa ngokulingana.* NgoMashi elakuleli liye kwiCyprus Cup lapho eliqede khona endaweni yesithupha emazweni awu-12, okuyindawo engcono elike layithola. Kulo mqhudelwano umgadli weqembu lesizwe uThembi Kgatlana uqokwe njengomunye wabashaye into ecokeme. UKgatlana ubeqhubeka lapho egcine khona ngo-2017 enqoba owomdlali ovelele kwiCosafa Cup, waphinde waqokwa emunxeni wabavelele ngaphansi kweCAF kodwa wakhala ngaphansi ku-Asisat Oshoala waseNigeria.* NgoSepthemba iBanyana ivikele isicoco sayo seCosafa ishaya iCameroon ngo 2-1 kowamanqamu. Ukwenza kahle kulo mqhudelwano kufane nophethroli * -Ellis abewudinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abadlali bakhe bafika kwi-AWCON bewumshini.* NgoNovemba 18 iBanyana iqophe umlando iba yiqembu lokuqala ukwehlula iNigeria emdlalweni wokuvula we-AWCON idlula ngo 1-0 wegoli likaKgatlana. NgoNovemba 27 amagoli kaKgatlana noLebo Ramelepe aqinisekise ukuthi elakuleli liyaya eFrance lihlula iMali ngo 2-0 kowandulela owamanqamu. IBanyana ifike kowamanqamu yahlulwa iNigeria ngo 4-3 kumaphenathi. Abadlali bagixabezwe ngesheke likaR2.4 million abazohlukaniselana lona njengebhonasi yokuya eFrance.* Okunye okwenzekile ebholeni labesimame kuleli:UThembi Kgatlana noLinda Motlhalo balandele ukaputeni uJanine van Wyk bethola izinkontileka kwiHouston Dash yase-USA.UKgatlana uqokwe njengomdlali ovelele kwi-AWCON nomshayimagoli ophambili ngamahlanu abuye nawo.Uqokwe noVan Wyk emunxeni womdlali ovelele wabesifazane emcimbini weCAF ongoJanuwari 8, eSenegal.UDesiree Ellis uzobanga emunxeni womqeqeshi ovelele kuthi iBanyana ibange oweqembu eliphambili.URefiloe Jane noRhoda Mulaudzi bathole izinkontileka kwiCanberra United yase-Australia engelinye lamazwe anamaligi ahlelekile abesifazane.I-TUT Ladies inqobe isicoco seVarsity Cup, yaphinde yaba ngompetha beSasol League National Championship okokuqala emlandweni, iphuca isicoco iBloemfontein Celtic Ladies.Iqembu lesizwe lika-Under 20 libuye negolide emidlalweni yeRegion 5 esongwe ngempelasonto. Lihlule iBotswana ebingosokhaya ngo 1-0 wegoli likaLindokuhle Gladile.
title: IBanyana iphonsele inselelo abeSafa

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu kuzwelonke, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, usethole isicelo esiphuthumayo kuMcwaningi Mabhuku jikelele, sokuthi angenelele emuva kokusatshiswa kwabenza uphenyo kuMasipala weTheku nowaseMsunduzi.Esitatimendeni uMkhize uthe uMcwaningi, uMnuz Kimi Makwetu, uthe ufuna kungenelele umnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana emuva kokuthi kudingeke ukuthi kuhoxiswe abebenza uphenyo ngoba besatshiswa.“Lezi zehlakalo ziyashaqisa futhi azamukelekile. Kwenziwe into engavumelekile, asikwazi ukuvumela isimo lapho kusatshiswa abantu abacwaninga amabhuku bangabe besakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wabo. Kumele kuhlonishwe umsebenzi wezikhungo ezifana nalezi ziqhubeke nomsebenzi ngaphandle kokwesatshiswa,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe bazosebenzisana neminyango yezifundazwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuyaqhubeka ukwenziwa komsebenzi komasipala ababili.USihlalo wekomiti elibhekele uMcwaningi Mabhuku ePhalamende, uMnuz Vincent Smith, uthe kuyaqala ukuthi kube nokusatshiswa kwabaphenyi KwaZulu-Natal wathi kwezinye izifundazwe yinto asebeke bayizwa.Uthe akuvumelekile ukuthi kusatshiswe abasebenza kuleli hhovisi wathi kumele amaphoyisa aphenye abambe abenzi bobubi.Umcwaningi usanda kudedela umbiko ongemuhle ngesimo somasipala bakuleli.“Sinxusa abezepolitiki ukuthi basize izisebenzi zomcwaningi mabhuku ukuthi ziqhubeke nomsebenzi wazo. Kumele umcwaningi asebenze ngaphandle kokwesaba.”IMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, uthe bazoqinisa ezokuphepha kubasebenzi abenza ucwaningo.Uthe kudingeke basheshe babuye ngemuva kokuzwa ngalokhu kade bengaphandle kwezwe.“Ngiyalele inhloko yezokuphepha, uMnuz Dumisani Bhengu, ukuthi akhe uhlelo lokuvikela izisebenzi zomcwaningi mabhuku. Siyaxhumana nehhovisi likamcwaningi ukuze kuleli sonto babuyele bazosebenza,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Uthe lesi sehlakalo akumele siphinde senzeke wathi bazimisele ekutheni bathole imibiko emihle yezimali.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uthe uzophenya ngokushesha.“Asikwazi ukuvumela ukuthi umcwaningi mabhuku aphume nyova komasipala ngoba esatshiswa. Senza yonke imizamo siwumnyango ukweseka omasipala ukuze bathole imibiko emihle yezimali,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.
title: Kucelwe uMkhize angenelele kwelokusatshiswa kwabacwaningi

text: ENYE yezimpunyela eziyikha ngamafosholo kuleli, uMnuz Johann uRupert, ikhwele yadilika kwabachitha izimali zabo ezindaweni zobumnandi kunokuyitshala kuleli. URupert uveze lokhu engxoxweni nomsakazi wePower FM uGiven Mkhari ngoLwesibili. Le njinga isolwe abaningi ngokwedelela nokucwasa ngobuhlanga njengoba kade ekhuluma enganabukelisi.Uthe akayizwa kahle indaba yabantu abajaha ukuphila impilo yobukhazikhazi esikhundleni sokuba banake inqubekela phambili yabo.‘Ngake ngahlangana noSteve Biko esemncane cishe wayeneminyaka ebalelwa ku-20 ubudala. Angikhumbuli ukuthi wayephansi phezulu nempilo yasematshwaleni.’Uthe intsha yakuleli kufanele ishintshe ukwenza ihloniphe nabantu abadala abaphambi kwayo. Uthe abantu abamhlophe kudala elakuleli lingakakhuluki babematasa ngokufunda nokonga imali abakaze balibale yimpilo yobukhazikhazi ephezulu. URupert ukuphikile ukuthi umndeni wakhe wahlomula ngaphansi kwenqubo yobandlulo. Abantu abaningi abebelalele bagcine sebesola lo msakazo ngokunika uRupert ithuba lokwedelela abantu abamnyma bukhoma emoyeniIqembu eliphikisayo kuleli i-EFF iphawulile kulolu daba ithi yona kade yaqala ukwexwayisa abantu ngendaba kaRupert.‘Siyajabula ukuthi izwe lonke selize lambona uRupert ukuthi ubusw aumoya wokucwasa abantu. Ungungxiwankulu onomhobholo wokufuna ukuzicebisa yena okunye nabanye abantu akanandaba nakho,’’kusho i-EFF esitatimendeni.
title: Usolwe ngokudelela abohlanga uRupert

text: ZISALE dengwane iziguli zasesibhedlela Osindisweni abasebenzi balesi sibhedlela beshiya phansi ukusebenza ngoLwesithathu bethi ngeke baqhubeke nokusebenza kusekhona izikhulu zesibhedlela abazisola ngokungaphathi kahle.Abasebenzi abangaphansi kwenyunyana iNehawu, bathi uMnyango wezeMpilo kulesi sifundazwe uwuhlabe inhlali ngezikhalo zabo, ezihlanganisa ukuthi kwenziwe uphenyo ngokusetshenziswa kwezimali kulesi sibhedlela, ukushoda kwabasebenzi, ukushoda kwemithi nezinsizakusebenza nokungalungiswa kwesibhedlela.UMnuz Ayanda Zulu iphini likanobhala wale nyunyana eThekwini, uthe ngoMeyi bakhala emnyangweni becela ukuthi ulungise lezi zinto ezingenhla, kodwa babona  sengathi uhudula izinyawo ngoba akukho nokukodwa osukulungisile.“Ezikhaleni ezingaphezu kuka-20 ezikhona kulesi sibhedlela kwakhangiswa ezithathu futhi akekho umsebenzi oseqashiwe kuzo. Abahlengikazi bashaywa yiziguli zibasola ngokungawenzi kahle umsebenzi ngenxa yolayini abade kanti lokho kwenziwa ukuthi bayashoda,” kusho yena.Uthe bakholwa ukuthi izikhulu zalesi sibhedlela okungumphathi wesibhedlela uNkk Ntombenhle Ngcobo, umphathi wehhovisi likandabazabantu nomphathi wezezimali kulesi sibhedlela yibo abenza ukuthi singaphumi isisombululo, ngokuthumela imibiko engachazi isimo njengoba sinjalo emnyangweni.“Ngemuva kwemashi yethu yangoMeyi kwaba khona imihlangano phakathi kwenyunyana nomnyango. Ngemuva kokuhlangana nathi siyazi ukuthi umnyango wafuna umbiko kubo laba baphathi esathi sicela baphenywe. Ngokubona kwethu umbiko wabo awusichazi ngendlela isimo sakulesi sibhedlela njengoba singalungiswa nje. Sekufike lapho sithi ngeke sibuyele emsebenzini besekhona ngoba zonke lezi zinkinga zenzeka ngaphansi kobuholi babo,” kusho yena.Uthe kukuwo umnyango ukuthi uzofika nini esibhedlela uzolalela ukuthi bakhala ngani,  kodwa bona ngeke babuyele emsebenzini kuze kube laba baphathi bayakhishwa esibhedlela.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uNcumisa Mafunda,  uthe: “Iyamangaza futhi iyakhathaza nokho imibiko ngesiteleka esingekho emthethweni, ikakhulukazi ngoba umnyango unobudlelwano obuvulelekile  neNehawu futhi usebenza ngokubambisana nayo. Kusukela ngo-Meyi umnyango ubuxoxisana nenyunyana ngenhloso yokusombulula izikhalo zabasebenzi, futhi uzoqhubeka nalokhu. Sifisa ukuxolisa kunoma ubani okungenzeka ukuthi uphazamisekile ngenxa yalesi siteleka.”UNksz Sphesihle Nxumalo obezolanda isifutho njengoba enesifuba somoya,  uthe abasebenzi bamtshele ukuthi akusetshenzwa kodwa ubesahleli ngoba akazi ukuthi uma eba nenkinga ekhaya uzosebenzisani. Akuyena yedwa obelokhu encike esangweni enethemba lokuthi uzosizakala.UNkk Mavis Khuzwayo obezolanda amaphilisi eBP naye uthe kunzima ukuthi agoduke ngoba iphilisi lokugcina uliphuze ekuseni. ABASEBENZI basesibhedlela Osindisweni bemasha ngaphandle kwesango lalesi sibhedlela izolo, bebethi umnyango wezempilo awususe ezikhundleni zikhulu zalesi sibhedlela abazisola ngokuthumela umbiko ongachazi kahle ngezinkinga zesibhedlela
title: Zisale dengwane iziguli esibhedlela

text: WEHLELWE yisibalo sabalaleli umsakazo ongenisa inzuzo KwaZulu-Natal.Izibalo zakamuva ziveza ukuthi Igagasi lilahlekelwe ngabalaleli abangu-104 000, phambilini belinabalaleli abangu-1.7 million kodwa manje sebengu -1.6 million.Kubukeka kuzoba nzima ukuthi lo msakazo ufinyelele ku-2 million njengoba ungakaze usondele kulesi sibalo selokhu waqala.UKhulekani Shandu, okhulumela Igagasi FM, uthe wehle kancane. Uphinde wakhala ngokuthi sincane isikhathi abantu abasichitha beseduzane komsakazo.“Lokhu ngeke kushintshe okuningi njengoba Igagasi kuseyiwona umsakazo ozimele omkhulu kuleli futhi ngisho sesiqhathaniswa nezingaphansi kukaSABC sibambe indawo yesikhombisa ngabalaleli,” kusho uKhulekani.Umsakazo iVuma FM, ukhombise ukukhula okukhulu njengoba ubunabalaleli abangu-188 000 ngekota ephelile kodwa kule ufinyelele kubalaleli abangu-239 000.Umsakazo ohamba phambili uKhozi FM, ukhule ngesivinini esikhulu njengoba ngekota ephelile ubunabalaleli abangu-7.3 million, kule kota ufinyelele kubalaleli abangu-7.5 million.Ukukhula koKhozi akukho kuphela kubalaleli njengoba kuyisiteshi esihamba phambili ngokulalelwa e-Afrika.I-East Coast Radio yehle kancane njengoba ibiku-1.033 million kodwa manje seyiku-1.032 million njengoba nayo yehlelwe isibalo, neMetro FM inyuke kancane kule kota.Emisakazweni yomphakathi KwaZulu-Natal Izwi Lomzansi likhombise ukukhula njengoba lisuke ku-109 000 lafinyelela ku-121 000.Inongoma FM nayo inyukile njengoba isuke ku-90 000 yafinyelela ku-102 000.
title: Sehlile isibalo sabalela Igagasi

text: UMNDENI kaSbahle Mpisane uthi impilo yakhe kayisekho engozini yize ukululama kwakhe kuzothatha isikhathi eside ngenxa yokulimala kwakhe engozini yemoto ngenyanga edlule.USbahle walimala ehamba ngeBMW 4 Series Convertible emgwaqweni uMargaret Mncadi Avenue ngo-Agasti 9. Imoto yakhe yaphuma emzileni yashayisa isihlahla ngaphambi kokugqamuka amalangabi.Uyise kaSbahle, uSbu Mpisane, uthe indodakazi iyalulama esibhedlela eSt Augustine.“Uyabuyela esimeni ngemuva kokuba segunjini labagula kakhulu esesimeni esibucayi futhi ephila ngemishini amasonto. Yinto ongayibiza ngomlingo kaNkulunkulu. Akasekho esimeni esibucayi kodwa ngoba alimala kanzima nje engozini, kuyacaca ukuthi ukululama kwakhe kuzothatha isikhathi. Amathambo aphukile ajwayele ukuthatha izinyanga ukuze ahlangane, ngakho ukukhishwa kwakhe esibhedlela akusiyo into esingayicabanga okwamanje kodwa ubuchwepheshe bungangiphikisa,” kusho uSbu.Uthe babonga uMdali nethimba lasesibhedlela ngokusebenza ngokuzikhandla. Ubonge nemithandazo elokhu ingena yokuthi indodakazi yakhe ilulame ngokushesha.Ngempelasonto isoka likaSbahle eliphinde libe ngunozinti weBafana Bafana, u-Itumeleng Khune, libhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi lijatshuliswe wukuzwa iphimbo likaSbahle.
title: ‘Impilo kaSbahle kayisekho engozini’

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weBanyana Banyana, uDesiree Ellis, ubonge abaqeqeshi bamaqembu ngokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abadlali baba sesimeni esihle phezu kokuba sekuphele unyaka amaligi abesifazane engadlalwa.Lo mqeqeshi ubize ikhempu yabadlali abayibamba kuleli kuphela, abawu-18. Ibanjelwe eSafa Technical Centre, eGoli.Bekungokokuqala leli qembu lihlangana kusukela lanqoba inkomishi yeCosafa, ngoNovemba wanyakenye."Ngichazekile ngezinga lokuba qatha kwabadlali, sekuphele unyaka amakilabhu abo engadlali. Lesi yisiqalo esihle, ukuba qatha kwabo kuyisiqalo esihle. Sibize le khempu ngenhloso yokuhlola isimo sabadlali. Inhloso wukuthi uphele lo nyaka sesisesimeni esasikuso ngaphambi kokuya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eminyakeni emibili eyedlule."Okwabadlali bakukeli kulukhuni, abangcono abadlala phesheya. Amaligi abo ayaqhubeka, lokho kusiza iBanyana. Ngale khempu sihlose ukusiza abakuleli ngokuba qatha, bafinyelele ezingeni labadlala phesheya. Asifuni libe likhulu igebe uma sekubuye nabaphesheya. Kukhona nabadlali abasha esibabizile, sizohlola isimo sabo.Sibize nabanye abangayiqedelanga iCosafa ngenxa yokubhala izivivinyo. Sikholelwa ekutheni abalitholanga ithuba elanele lokuziveza. Siqonde ukubatshengisa ukuthi kabavalelwe ngaphandle. Siyakugqugquzela ukuthi bafunde ukuze bangahlupheki uma sebeyeke ibhola," kusho u-Ellis.Lo mqeqeshi uqhube wathi ekhefini elilandelayo leFifa uzobiza nabadlali abayibamba phesheya."Sihlalelwe wukwenza kahle emidlalweni yokuhlungela i-Africa Women Cup Nations nasemidlalweni yawo uqobo lo mqhudelwano. Sidinga iqembu eliqinile ngoba lo mqhudelwano ngowokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba. Kulokhu kuzoba nzima njengoba esezoba u-12 amaqembu. Ngixhumana njalo nabadlali abaphesheya, nabo sebekubheke ngabomvu ukudlalela iqembu lesizwe.”
title: U-Ellis uchazekile ngakubone kwikhempu yeBanyana

text: Isilo sacashunwa kuleli phephandaba sithi uKhozi alukunakile ukuthi luhlalelwe wumsebenzi wokufundisa abantu kabanzi ngolimi lwabo ngoba luyigugu lesizwe.Sathi lesi siteshi simenzela phansi uZulu.“Ngabona ngokuthi bashintshe igama elinoZulu bathi bawuKhozi. Bavele basiqamba ngenyoni nje, sekuyacaca ukuthi babeqonde khona ukubulala ulimi,” yasho kanje iNgonyama yengeza nokuthi ayazi nokuthi lichaza ukuthi leli gama lenyoni.Okungikhumbuze le nkulumo yeMbube wukuzwa abanye babasakazi bengakhulumi ulimi ngendlela efanele.Angisiyena ungoti wolimi nami kodwa kukhona izinto esikwaziyo ukuzisho ngolimi lwethu ngaphandle kwenkinga. Yizinto ezincane lezi engikhala ngazo njengokusho isikhathi nje. Ukusho ukuthi sekuzofundwa izindaba ezifingqiwe kunokuthi sisaya kuma- news headlines.Nathi lapha ephephandabeni sihlale silungiswa mihla namalanga uma siphambuka futhi esingakwazi sicela ukukhanyiselwa ngabahluzi bethu kukho. Ngicabanga ukuthi kumele kube yinto efanayo futhi nasoKhozini. Umsakazi uma kukhona angakwazi ukukusho ngesiZulu acele usizo. Bakhona ozakwabo abanjengoTshatha abasaziyo isiZulu. Ukhona futhi nobaba uMpumelelo Mbatha ohlale efundisa ngolimi ohlelweni lwasekuseni phakathi nesonto.Abanye futhi abantu abanokuphula ulimi yilo ithimba elifunda izindaba. Lishayeka kakhulu ngesikhathi sekufanele lihumushe elikufundayo okanye litolike obekushiwo wumuntu obekhuluma isiNgisi. Lihumusha ngendlela okubhalwe ngayo igama negama kanti empeleni kumele uhumushe umqondo womusho. Uma ulandelanisa ngegama kugcina kungasazwakali kahle okanye kube yi-“zunglish”.Ngike ngimuzwe uKing Sfiso ezama ukukhuluma isiZulu yize engowaseGoli futhi esejwayele ukukhuluma isiLungu. NoMzokoloko uyazama ukujwayela ngoba ubesesakaze ngesiNgisi isikhathi eside kodwa unakho ukufaka isiNgisi kungenaso isidingo nokuyinto okumele ayiqaphele. Phela lena yinsizwa yalapha nje eGingindlovu. Kumele engabe uyasho ukuthi seligamenxe ihora lesine hhayi ukuthi isikhathi ‘uhalf past 4’.Omunye esimthwalisa kanzima IsiZulu uSelbeyonce bandla. Nanegama nje lohlelo lwabo noSiya Mhlongo lulodwa luyisiNgisi, 12 To 3 Cafe.Mhlawumbe yithi esingaqondi ukuthi Ukhozi alusakazi ngesiZulu phaqa. Mhlawumbe * -90% wesiZulu bese kuba wu-10% IsiNgisi. Kwi-website yabo akucaci kahle ukuthi kuthiwani ngolimi, ngike ngadlulisa amehlo kuyona.IsiZulu simnandi ungasishebi nalutho. Bheka umdlalo iHostela wawuthokozelwa kanjani nesiZulu sawo. Bheka abaculi abanjengoSjava batuswa kanjani ngokuziqhenya ngokuba ngamaZulu.Ungangibhalela [email protected] kuTwitter @fanelebengu
title: [IMIBONO] Uthini umgomo woKhozi FM ngolimi?

text: USESHINTSHE umqondo waqoma ukuhlala kwiBloemfontein Celtic uLorenzo Gordinho obekuvela ukuthi ubuyela ekhaya kwiKaizer Chiefs ngemuva kokushiya kukaSteve Komphela ojoyine iSiwelele samaSokolara.Sishicelele udaba ngenyanga edlule obeluthi imenenja yakhe, uMike Makaab weProsport International, wathi ukufika kukaKomphela kwiCeltic kwenze uGordinho wafuna ukushiya kwiSiwelele ngoba vele ubekade ebolekisile.UMaakab wayeveze ukuthi banesivumelwano neCeltic sezinyanga eziwu-12 (kusuka ngoJanuwari nonyaka). Lokhu bekusho ukuthi ngoJuni bekusasele izinyanga eziyisithupha kuleso sivumelwano.“Sixoxile neCeltic savumelana ngokuthi angabuyela kwiChiefs noma kusasele izinyanga eziyisithupha kwinkontileka yesikhashana,” washo kanje uMakaab esikhathini esingangenyanga esedlule.Nokho izolo uMakaab uveze ukuthi uGordinho usecula elinye iculo lokuthi ufisa ukuqedela izinyanga eziyisithupha ezisele kwinkontileka yokubolekisa anayo neCeltic.“UGordinho usezohlala kwiCeltic kuze kuphele lo nyaka (okusho ukuthi kuzoze kube uDisemba). Usewushintshile umqondo wakhe wathi uzoqhubeka kwiCeltic ahlale,” kusho uMakaab izolo.Okwakuxosha uGordinho kwiChiefs wukuthi ubewukudla kwebhentshi uKomphela engamdlalisi.“Okubalulekile wukuthi adlale njengamanje, ngisola ukuthi uyabona ukuthi uzolithola ijezi kwiCeltic. Mhlawumbe kwiChiefs usabona ukuthi uzodonsa kanzima,” kusho uMakaab.Akafunanga ukuphendula ngezinkinga ezibhekene neCeltic okuvela ukuthi ikweleta abadlali amaholo. Nakuba amaqembu amaningi ehlukile ngendlela asingatha ngayo izindaba zamaholo, ikakhulukazi uma umdlali ebolekisile, kodwa kungenzeka isimo esikwiCeltic simthinte naye uGordinho.Inkontileka kaGordinho neChiefs iyaphela ngoDisemba. Akwaziwa ukuthi kuzokwenzekani kuGordinho ngoba wabolekiswa kwiCeltic ngesikhathi kuphethe uKomphela kwiChiefs okumanje uqeqesha iSiwelele.
title: UGordinho usezoqhubeka kwiCeltic

text: UZOZAMA ukuthola isixazululo sokuvimba ukungenelwa ngamagoli kwezakhe uCalvin Johnson ocija AmaZulu FC aguqe ngo-2-1 emdlalweni womkhaya neMaritzburg United obungoLwesihlanu ebusuku eHarry Gwala Stadium.Lo mqeqeshi uthe kuyamkhathaza ukuthi emidlalweni emibili ezakhe sezingenelwe amagoli ayisithupha.Uthe eqembini elikhulu njengoSuthu lokhu akwamukelekile.Ngesonto eledlule ezakhe zibhaxabulwe yi-Orlando Pirates ngo-4-1 njengoba sezingenelwa ngamabili eTeam of Choice.Selokhu iqalile isizini ka-2018\19 uSuthu selungenelwe amagoliangu-30 kwathi lona lwashaya angu-25.“Kuzomele sonke sibambisane ukuthola isixazululo sale nkinga engasifaka kwenkulu inkinga.“Yinto embi impela le. Okuhle ukuthi kasiqala ukuba kuyo, nakuqala sakwazi ukuthi siyinqobe, namanje sizokwenza okufanayo” kubeka uJohnson.Lo mqeqeshi ukhale ngokuthi abadlali bakhe benze obekungavunyelwananga ngakho ejimini.Uthe yinto abayixoxe lonke isonto eledlule ukuthi iMaritzburg izokhipha konke enakho, ngakho kuzomele bahlale beqaphile. Ube esesola izitobha zakhe ngokubuye zidunyelwe amakhanda.“Kusibulele kakhulu ukuhluleka ukuvimba amabhola abadlali abanjengoTimm Miquel. Bekubuye kube sengathi abadlali bami balahlekelwa indlela yokudlala ebesiyihlelile.“Sinike izitha ifree kick engenasidingo endaweni eyingozi saphinde savumela ukungena kwegoli umdlalo sewuyophela. Ingaba sendaweni ekuyo iMaritzburg kodwa size kulo mdlalo sazi ukuthi idlala ibhola elihle, kayilona iqembu elisabunjwa. Ujeza kanje uma ulahla umgqigqo,” kusho lo mqeqeshi.Uqhube wathi kuzomele baqale ukukuqonda ukuthi empeleni kabakaze basuke ezambeni.”Nathi kasiphephile nakancane, kumele sazi ukuthi empeleni kasikaze. Ngabe ngiyezwa mhlawube ukube sinamaphuzu angu-6 ngaphezu kwalawa esinawo. Sihlukaniswe ngamaphuzu amancane kakhulu namaqembu asekugcineni. Kuzomele sishintshe ukwenza”USuthu seluqoqe amaphuzu angu-23 emidlalweni engu-22.NgoMgqibelo ozayo luzotholana phezulu neBidvest Wits kozoba eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza.
title: Ukhathazwa ukuvuza kwamapali owaMaZulu

text: KUSOLWA umbango wamatekisi ngokushona kwabane ezigamekweni zabadutshulwe eVerulam naKwaDukuza.Lezi zigameko okuvela ukuthi zihlobene zenzeke ngokuhlukana njengoba kwesokuqala kudutshulwe usomatekisi eNyokeni eHezelemere, eVerulam ngabo-8.30 ebusuku ngoMsombuluko.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abahlaseli babaleke ngemoto abebehamba ngayo iToyota Condor. Kuthiwa kutholakale ukuthi imoto yabahlaseli ingasedolobheni KwaDukuza laba bajahwa ngabantu abangaziwa abadubule imoto yabo.Kuthiwa imoto iphaphalazile yangena ezihlahleni. Ibhekiwe kodwa yangatholakala ngaleso sikhathi.Ize yatholwa izolo ekuseni amaphoyisa.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi laba abahlaseliwe kuvele ukuthi basebenza embonini yamatekisi nabo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uziqinisekisile lezi zigameko wathi kuvulwe amacala amane okubulala.Ngokophenyo kugasele abasolwa emzini kamufi ngoMsombuluko ebusuku bamdubula. Kwesinye isigameko esenzeke namhlanje (izolo) ngo-5 ekuseni amaphoyisa aKwaDukuza avule icala lokubulawa kwabantu abathathu abadutshuliwe. Ngokophenyo laba bebehamba kuN2 ngesikhathi behlaselwa abantu abangaziwa,” kusho uCol Mbele.Umthombo weSolezwe osondelene nalolu daba uthe laba basolwa abathathu bahlaselwe ngoba bebenukwa ngokuthi babulale usomatekisi eVerulam.“Kusolwa umbango wawo amatekisi ngokubulawa kwabo yize kungacaci ukuthi kubangwani,” kusho umthombo weSolezwe ocele ukungadalulwa.Imenenja ehhovisi leSantaco eKZN uMnuz Sfiso Shangase ithe bayadumala ukuthi kusekhona izigameko zokuhlaselana kosomatekisi.“Kumanje sihlela umkhuleko weSantaco ezobe ihlangene noMnyango wezokuThutha wokukhulekela khona ukubulawa kwabantu kule mboni, oThukela ngo-Okthoba 28,” kusho uShangase.
title: Kusolwa umbango wamatekisi kudutshulwa, kufa  abane

text: LIHLEHLISELWE uJanawari 24 icala lokubulala ngokugenhloso elibhekene noMnuz Duduzane Zuma oyindodana yowayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Lokhu kwenzeke emva kokuthi evele kafushane eNkantolo yeMantshi eRandburg namhlanje. Ubephelezelwa nguyize uZuma.  UDuduzane udedelwe yile nkantolo ngesexwayiso. Kulindeleke ukuthi leli cala liqale ukuqulwa kusukela ngoMashi ngonyaka ozayo.UDuduzane wayalelwa ukuba avele enkantolo ngoJulayi ngamacala amabili okubulala ngokungenhloso aphathelene nesigameko esenzeka ngo-2014, okwenzeka kuso ingozi okwafa kuyo uNksz Phumzile Dube. UNksz Dube washona endaweni yesigameko emva kokuthi imoto Porsche kaDuduzane iphaphalaze yashayisa itekisi ku-M1 eGoli. Omunye wesifazane owayekade ekulelo tekisi, washonela esibhedlela nakuba kwatholakala kamuva ukuthi ukufa kwakhe kwakungahlobene nengozi.UDUDUZANE Zuma obeseshutha nabebegqoke izikibha zeDA abebezobhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo.Ezivikela uDuduzane, wathi akukhona ukuthi wayeshayela budedengu njengoba imoto yakhe ingazange ilawuleke okwaholela ekutheni ashayise leli tekisi.Ophenyweni olwenziwa iMantshi uLalitha Chetty, wathola ukuthi uDuduzane waba budedengu, nokuthi ukwenza kwakhe yikona okwaholela ekutheni kushone uNksz Dube.Nakuba kunjalo, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), yaba nongabazane ngokushushiswa kwakhe ngo-2015, yabeka isizathu sokuthi mancane amathuba okuthi lolu daba lungaphumelela enkantolo.Ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, lolu daba luphinde lwaqubuka emva kokuthi owayenguMshushisi weNPA uGerrie Nel ne-Afriforum besabise ngokuthi bazozishushisela bona ngokwabo uDuduzane.
title: Lihlehlele uJanuwari elikaDuduzane

text: UBONA ikusasa eliqhakazile kwisitobha sakhe esisha umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uSteve Komphela, osalokhu eqhubekile nokunika abadlali abasebancane ithuba lokuyibamba kuMakhosi.Yize iqembu liphikwa yimiphumela kodwa uKomphela akanalo uvalo lokuzama abadlali abasha esikwatini. Emidlalweni emibili edlule ye-Absa Premiership ubophele umdlali waseZimbabwe uTeenage Hadebe emuva. Phezu kokwenza lolu shintsho iChiefs iqhubekile nokungavuzi emuva.Umdlalo waMaZulu FC waphela ngo 0-0 kwathi abawudlale neFree State Stars ngempelasonto, kwangena igoli okube umkhonto ogwaze ekhaya ibhola lishayisa kuDaniel Cardoso.“Indlela adlale ngayo (koweStars) ubebonakala ukuthi useyazethemba ngisho nangezinqumo azithatha enkundleni esebenzela kulokhu akuveza emdlalweni waMaZulu. Ngimbona enekusasa eliqhakazile kwiKaizer Chiefs,” kusho uKomphela.UHadebe (22) ufike kuMakhosi ekuqaleni kwesizini njengoba imsayinise esuka kwiChicken Inn. UKomphela ubuye achazwe wukuthi lo mdlali “unonyawo oluhle lwesokunxele.”Ukulimala yikhona okuholele ekutheni angabonakali ekuqaleni kwesizini. Ukwenza kahle kwakhe esikimini kusho ukumisa kabi * -Eric Mathoho ongomunye wababanga naye ijezi. UMathoho, oseyibambe isikhathi eside engenambangi, akazange ayiqale kahle isizini njengoba ubekhombisa ukwehlelwa yifomu. Amanye amaphutha awenzile eholele ekutheni athole amakhadi abomvu kulandelana kwiChiefs nakwiBafana Bafana.UHadebe ufike ngesikhathi lapho ingwazi eyayiyibamba kuMakhosi, uSimphiwe Mkhonza, isanda kuveza ukuthi uMathoho udinga imbangi ukuze akwazi ukunyusa amasokisi.Abanye abadlali abasha uKomphela asebanike ithuba, uPhilani Zulu, Siyabonga Ngezana noWiseman Meyiwa bonke abasakhombise ukungangenwa ngamanzi emadolweni ngokudlalela elinye lamaqembu athathwa njengamakhulu kuleli ngenxa yomlando.“Kufana nephupho (ukudlalela iChiefs). Ngifisa ukubonga ngendlela engamukeleke ngayo kwiChiefs ngezandla ezifudumele. Njengomdlali kumele ngizethembe. Okungenze ngakhululeka kakhulu wukuthi ngiyakwazi nokulidlala ezinyaweni ibhola,” kusho uHadebe kwi-website yaMakhosi.IChiefs isiqhube imidlalo emine idlala ngokulingana. Igcine ukunqoba ishaya iMamelodi Sundowns ngo 2-1 ngo-Okthoba 17. Isihleli endaweni yesithupha kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-16. Umdlalo wayo olandelayo ungoDisemba 6 neChippa United eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium.
title: UKomphela uncoma ikhono likaHadebe

text: BANGAPHEZULU kuka-1 200 abasebenzi bezempilo asebegomele iCovid-19 selokhu kwethulwe uhlelo lokugoma ngoLwesine eKZN.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala obethula umbiko wakamuva mayelana neCovid-19 kulesi sifundazwe izolo, uthe bonke abagomile ababanga nankinga ngemuva kokugonywa.Uthe zehlile izibalo zabahaqwa yileli gciwane kulesi sifundazwe. NgoMgqibelo izibalo bezikhomba ukuthi bangu-313."Ukwehla kwezibalo akusho ukuthi sekumele sikhululeke. I-KZN iyisifundazwe sesibili esinezibalo eziphezulu zabahaqwa yileli gciwane ngosuku uma iqhathaniswa nezinye izifundazwe, kanti iyisifundazwe sesithathu esinabantu abaningi ababulawa yiCovid-19,"  kusho uZikalala.Ugxeke ababhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi kusetshenziswa abantu ukuhlola lo mgomo. IJohnson & Johnson ingaphansi kohlelo lokwenza ucwaningo,  iSisonke Protocol, wathi le ndlela beyenzelwe ukuthi umgomo usheshe utholakale ube usetshenziswa kusalindwe ukuthi ugunywazwe kuleli."Lo mgomo awukabhaliswa ezweni osungulwe kuwo, i-United States, ngakho-ke isikhungo esigunyaza imithi sakuleli ngeke sikwazi ukuwubhalisa ungakabhaliswa ezweni lawo. Kuzothatha isikhathi ngaphambi kokuthi kuphothulwe lolu hlelo. Umgomo siyawudinga ukuze sivikela abantu ngobuningi, kusetshenziswe le ndlela ukuze utholakale,"  kusho uZikalala.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe lesi sifundazwe sithole umgomo ongu-10 800. U-30% uzonikezwa umkhakha wezempilo ozimele kodwa kuzonikezwa abaseduze kwalapho lo mgomo ufikele khona."Kunodokotela abasuka kwezinye izifunda abazifikele esibhedlela eMshiyeni Memorial nase-Inkosi Albert Luthuli bethi bazogoma baphindela emuva bengagonyiwe. Ngesikhathi ufika umgomo akuchazwanga ukuthi u-30% uzonikezwa umkhakha wezempilo ozimele. Uma sesitsheliwe ngakusasa kube sekuchazwa ukuthi akube abaseduze nalapho umgomo ufikile khona ukuze kungaxoveki ukusatshalaliswa kwawo," kuchaza ungqongqoshe.
title: Akukabikwa lutho olubi ngabagonyelwe iCovid-19

text:
ADEDELWE ngebheyili ka R1 500 umuntu emunye amadoda amathathu aboshwe ngamacala okubulala okusolwa ukuthi ahlobene nodlame lwamatekisi.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa ophiko lweProvincial Task Team ebambisene nawaKwaDukuza abophe laba basolwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka 27 no 43 ngamacala amabili okubulala nelokuzama ukubulala. Isolezwe lithole ukuthi laba ngesikhathi beboshwa batholwe nezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni okusolwa ukuthi zisetshenziswe ngesikhathi kudutshulwa amadoda amathathu abesolwa ngokudubula usomatekisi waseVerulam ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.UMnuz Mlungisi Maphumulo (27) kuthiwa udutshulwe emzini wakhe phambi kwengoduso yakhe eHazelmere ngabantu abangaziwa okuthiwa babaleke ngeToyota Condor.FUNDA: 
Kusolwa umbango wamatekisi kudutshulwa, kufa abaneKuthe ngoLwesibili ezintatha kwabe sekudutshulwa abasolwa abathathu okuthiwa bebesolwa ngokubulala lo somatekisi. Umbiko wamaphoyisa uveze ukuthi kushone ababili kulaba ngesikhathi bedutshulwa kwalimala oyedwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN uthe ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ebopha laba basolwa athole izibhamu ezintathu ezisemthethweni nezinhlamvu ezingu 45. Uthe bonke abasolwa bavele enkantolo yeMantshi KwaDukuza  badedelwa ngebheyili. Icala lihlehliselwe uJanuwari 10 ngonyaka ozayo. Uphenyo luyaqhubeka.
title: Kuboshwe abasolwa ngokuziphindiselela ngokubulawa kukasomatekisi

text: UMLANDELI womculo wokholo uzongivumela uma ngithi omunye wabaculi abahamba phambili kulezi zinsuku nguNeyi Zimu.Lokhu kufakazelwa wukuthi wayeqokwe kathathu kumaSABC Crown Gospel Music Awards ngonyaka odlule, emunxeni weBest Male, Best Gospel Artist noweBest Contemporary Song.Lapha ngibala iminxa ayeqokwe yedwa khona, hhayi njengeqembu ayingxenye yalo iSpirit of Praise nalo elalivela eminxeni eminingi.Wagcina ethathe indondo yeBest Male.Uwina lo mklomelo nje, uthe indlela yakhe ayizange ibe lula ukuze afike lapho ekhona.Uzalwa eSebokeng, eningizimu neGoli. Abazali bakhe bametha ngelikaMoses Gcinumuzi Zimu (47).“Ekhaya sibahlanu futhi yimi ngedwa umculi. Uthando lokucula luqale ngisemncane, ngicula emincintiswaneni yasesikoleni.Ukungena kowokholo, ngiqale sengisesikoleni samabanga aphakeme futhi kusuka lapho ngaqhubeka ngaba nebhendi.Ngakhula ngayofunda umculo unyaka wonke. Kulesi sikhathi ngahlangana noSipho Hotstix Mabuse, siculela ibhendi yakhe.”Uthe ngeminyaka ka-1990 wathuthela eThekwini lapho ayefunda khona iTheatre Technology ngaphansi kweDrama, eNatal Technikon esiyaziwa ngeDurban University of Technology.“Yilapho engahlangana khona noMfundisi uMthunzi Namba noMfundisi uJabu Hlongwane, sabe sesiqala iqembu okuthiwa yiFamily Factory.Lakhula laya kwiJoyous. Ngaleso sikhathi ngangisebenzela iSABC ngingumdidiyeli wemisindo,” kuqhuba uNeyi.Ngo-2001 waqala waqopha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala, walandela ngenye ngo-2004.Ngo-2006 wenze eyesithathu ethi Message.“Ngangizimele, ngicula yonke indawo, emarenki amatekisi ngizama ukuzimaketha.Ngo-2010 ngenza enye engingazange ngayikhipha, okwathi ngemuva kancane kwalapho ngabizwa nguMfundisi uBenjamin Dube, ukuthi ngizosebenza naye kwiHealing in his Presence. Ngabhala izingoma ezimbili iCome As You Are neLamb of God.”Uthe yilapho avela khona ngoba wathola inkontileka yokuqopha neSpirit Music nokuthe ngo-2012 wenza i-albhamu yokuqala i-I trust In You. Ube esengena eqenjini iSpirit of Praise.Yilapho enze khona ingoma eshise izikhotha ethi Jehova Retshepile Wena.Ngonyaka odlule uqophe i-albhamu ethi The Waiting is Over, ebophele izingoma ezithi Sinenqaba, Miracles nezinye.Lo mculi uthi manje akasekho kwiSpirit Music njengoba esenenkampani yakhe iNN Productions, ayiphethe nenkosikazi yakhe, uNelisiwe.Yingaphansi kwayo lapho ekhiphe khona i-albhamu yakhe yakamuva ethi Another Level of Worship, okuyiyo ayiphushayo kulezi zinsuku.Ibophele izingoma ezingu-15, okukhona kuzo iJehova Retshepile Wena, Hallelujah apike kuyo u-Omega nezinye.UNEYI Zimu okhiphe i-albhamu yakhe entsha ethi Another Level of Worship, okuyiyo ayiphushayo kulezi zinsuku. Video: FANELESIBONGE BENGUUNeyi, onezingane ezintathu, uthe ukukhonzile ukusebenza nabanye abaculi njengoba enza no-Omega bezibiza ngeFriends in Praise.“Ufunda okuningi uma usebenza nabanye abaculi futhi nifika kude. Ngingabagqugquzela nabanye ukuthi basebenzisane nabanye abaculi, ukuze nje nabantu bezobona ukuthi siyezwana. Ngangithanda ukusebenza noSfiso Ncwane ngenxa yokukhuthala kwakhe kodwa manje ngingafisa ukusebenza noSgwili, Thinah Zungu noBlack Coffee ngoba bangakuthatha bakuyise lapho sebekhona bona.”Lo mculi ujwayele ukubonakala enandisa emicimbini ye-EFF. Uthe, nokho, uyilungu lokuqina le-ANC.“UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa angikamboni kahle kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi unethuba lokuthatha iNingizimu Afrika ayibeke endaweni efanele ngokwezimali.Ngokwepolitiki angimtholi ukuthi umi kuphi. Umengameli owedlule (uJacob Zuma) wayenamandla ngokwepolitiki. Mhlawumbe wayengaqinile ngokwebhizinisi futhi kwazamazama umnotho.URamaphosa ngingathanda ukuthi asebenze nabantu abasemazingeni aphansi, angagxili kubantu abaphezulu kuphela.”U-Neyi uma engasebenzi ukhonze ukuhlala nezingane zakhe, alale noma afunde izincwadi.Ithelevishini akayibuki futhi ukhonze ukudla ujeqe nenyama yenkukhu.
title: Beyinzima indlela ayihambile kwezomculo

text: MINENHLE MKHIZEUFUNWA yiqembu laseFrance umdlali weMamelodi Sundowns, uKhama Billiat ovutha engabaselwe kuleli qembu lasePitoli.Isolezwe litshelwe yimenenja kaBilliat, uRalph Nkomo, ukuthi lo mdlali odabuka eZimbabwe ufunwa yiLille egijima kuLigue 1 eFrance.“Izikhulu zeLille zizotheleka eNingizimu Afrika emasontweni amathathu ezayo. Uma sezifikile lapha ngizokukhulumisa nazo uzizwe ukuthi yini eziyibhekile kubadlali baseNingizimu Afrika. Lapha eNingizimu Afrika bazobe bezohlola uBilliat. Sebewabukile ama-video akhe, njengamanje sebefuna ukumbonela eduze,” kusho uNkomo ophethe ubisi lwabadlali abagijima phesheya kwezilwandle.UBilliat (25) ubalwa nabadlali asebeshaye amagoli amaningi kuSundowns kule sizini ka-2015/2016. KuSundowns ufike ngo-2013 esuka ku-Ajax Cape Town.Elinye iqembu laseFrance elike lathathwa yikhono likaBilliat yiRennes, egcine ithenge uKermit Erasmus obedlala ku-Orlando Pirates. ILille, efuna uBilliat, ihlezi endaweni ka-15 ku-log yeFrench Ligue 1. Leli qembu libophele abadlali abafana noVincent Enyeama waseNigeria, Eder wasePortugal noRio Mavuba waseFrance.“Ngaphandle kukaBilliat, leli qembu lizophinde libuke abanye abadlali abathathu balapha eNingizimu Afrika. Siyethemba ukuthi uBilliat uzoqhubeka nokudlala ngokuzimisela uma sebefikile laba bantu baseFrance,” kusho uNkomo.Le menenja izakhele igama ngokuphatha izibabuli zabadlali ezifana noSamuel Eto’o waseCameroon, Nwanko Kanu waseNigeria noBenjani Mwaruwari waseZimbabwe. UNkomo ube nesandla ekutheni u-Erasmus agcine ephelele eFrance.Igama likaBilliat alisali uma kukhulunywa ngabadlali abangase badle umklomelo womdlali ovelele ku-Absa Premiership ekupheleni kwesizini.ISundowns ivele izolahlekelwa nguBongani “Ben10” Zungu ekupheleni kwesizini, kwazise ubheke ePortugal. NgoJanuwari uZungu usayine inkontileka yesibambiso neVitoria Sport Clube.Uma uBilliat engagcina ehambile ekupheleni kwesizini kungenzeka iSundowns izithole isenkingeni efanayo nebhekane neKaizer Chiefs ngesizini edlule. Amakhosi afike adla isicoco seligi neseMTN 8 kwathi ekupheleni kwesizini alahlekelwa ngabadlali bawo abamqoka uTefu Mashamaite osayine kuBK Hacken yaseSweden noMandla Masango ojoyine iRanders FC edlala ezweni elifanayo.
title: Ufunwa ngelaphesheya uKhama Billiat

text: OBENGUMENGAMELI wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma uthi uzozama ukuthola amakhompyutha ukuze abafundi bakwaGrade 11 nabakwaGrade 12 baseBizimali High eNkandla bakwazi ukwenza isifundo sekhompyutha.Uthe njengesiqalo, ikilasi elilodwa ufuna libe namakhompyutha ukuze kuqalwe kufundwe lesi sifundo.“Ngifisa ukuthi kushintshwane ngezinsuku, abanye bafunde ngosuku oluthile nabanye bafunde ngolunye ngoba sebezophuma baye kosebenza. Angiboni ukuthi kuyinto enhle ukuthi ingane ephuma eBizimali ifike enyuvesi iqede isikhathi eside isafundiswa ikhompyutha. Uma kuthiwa i-mouse le ize ithi laba bantu ibizitshela ukuthi bafundile kanti bayizidomu njengoba beyibiza ngegundane kanti ayilazi,” kusho uZuma.Ubekhuluma emcimbini waminyaka yonke owenziwa kulesi sikole yibandla iCovenant Fellowship Church International (CFCI) eliholwa nguMphostoli Collins Dhlomo wakhona eNkandla isebenzisana nenkampani egayayo iProcess Litho.Uthe uzohamba ayoyisebenza le nto yamakhompyutha ukuze atholakale.Uqhube wathi azobasiza uma sebenza unyaka wokugcina ukuze bakwazi ukuyisebenzisa uma befaka izicelo zokufunda emanyuvesi.“Abafake izicelo zokufunda emanyuvesi besafunda la. Bangalindi ukuqeda isikole bese begijima amanyuvesi befuna izikhala. Ngiyazibophezela kulokhu ngifuna ukubakhuthaza ukuze iNkandla izovelela. Uma uphuma eNkandla kumele uyazi ikhompyutha kungathiwa kambe nomengameli wenu wayengayazi. Ayikho indawo eyofana neNkandla, bangasho nje abakushoyo inezintaba ezinhle, namakhosi namaqhawe. Siyaziqhenya ngalesi sikole, sihamba yonke indawo sizishaya isifuba, noma ningathini nithini ngeNkandla ikhona iBizimali,” kusho uZuma.Uthe lesi sikole kusuka ngisho izingane zakude ngisho zaseGoli zizofunda kuso.UZuma uthe uke waxoxa kabanzi nothishanhloko waso ngezinkinga esinazo.“Ngiyafisa kubaphathi bemfundo ukuthi bake balethe le nto isikole esingenayo nje ngoba senza kahle. Uthishanhloko wangitshela ngezingqinamba abanazo, ake sifake ompompi kulethwe amanzi kufakwe ugesi, ababuzayo ukuthi kungani sifakelwa izinto sibatshele ukuthi yingoba senza kahle lesi sikole,” kusho uZuma.UDhlomo wamukelise abafundi abahlanu abenze kahle kwa-matric nyakenye ama-laptop amahlanu kanjalo nakubafundi abenze kahle kwaGrade 11 nyakenye asebenza * -matric nabo bathole amakhompyutha.“Ngizoqhubeka ngiseseke isikole njengoba ngenza minyaka yonke. Ngifuna ukuthi abafundi bagqugquzeleke benze kahle ukuze nabo bahlomule ngama-laptop,” kusho uDhlomo.UDhlomo ukhulekele abafundi ukuthi baziphathe kahle bangangeni ezilingweni zomhlaba.
title: UZuma uthembise ukuxhasa abafundi

text: IZOQEDA ukuqagela ngekusasa layo ebholeni ingwazi yeBafana Bafana uSteven “Schillo” Pienaar.UPienaar (35) uke waxoxa neCape Town City kodwa leli qembu lagcina lingamsayinisanga.Le ngwazi yeBafana isidlale esigabeni esikhokhelayo iminyaka engu-19. Idlale engu-15 phesheya kwezilwandle ngaphambi kokubuya.Ekuqaleni kwesizini isayine kwiBidvest Wits inkontileka yesizini kodwa yanqanyulwa ngoJanuwari ngenxa yokuthi uhluleke wancama wukwenza izimanga abelandelwe zona kwiClever Boys.Imenenja yakhe uLance Davids ithe uPienaar uzocacisa ngekusasa lakhe kusasa.“Konke kuzocaca kahle ngoLwesithathu ngekusasa likaPienaar ebholeni. NgoLwesithathu uzosho ukuthi uyayeka ukudlala ibhola noma usazoqhubeka yini,” kusho uDavids.UPienaar uzakhele igama kakhulu emaqenjini aphesheya kwezilwandle nakwiBafana. Ugijime kwi-Ajax Amsterdam eHolland ngemuva kwalokho wadlulela kwiBorussia Dortmund yaseGermany.UPienaar uqhubekile nokudlondlobala ebholeni ngesikhathi ejoyina i-Everton edlala kwi-English Premier League (EPL). E-England uyibambe nakwiTottenham Hotspur. Ugcine ukudlala kwiSunderland egawulwe yizembe kwi-EPL ngesizini edlule.Kwi-Everton uke wayibamba kowamanqamu weFA Cup. Ngo-2009/10, uPienaar waqokwa njengomdlali ovelele kwi-Everton. Ngo-2009 waqokwa yiSouth African Football Association njengomdlali ovelele eMzansi.KwiBafana udlale imidlalo engu-61 wahlohla amagoli amathathu. Kwelesizwe udlale iminyaka eshumi. Waqala ukuyibamba kulona ngo-2002 wathatha umhlalaphansi ngo-2012 esengukaputeni.KwiBafana udlale kwiNdebe yoMhlaba kabili. Ubekhona ngo-2002 eJapan/Korea waphinde wayibamba nalapha eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2010. Ngo-2009 udlalile kwiFifa Confederation Cup kwathi ngo-2008 wagijima kwiCaf Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) eGhana.
title: UPienaar uzocacisa ngekusasa lakhe ebholeni

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele ngithi ake ngisike elijikayo kule ndaba esingundaba mlonyeni ngaphansi kwezihlahla.Ithi ingaba nkulu ingabe isazekeka, Isolezwe nalo selike layibika kaningana le ndaba yomkhandlu wesifunda iTheku eliholwa ngumama uZandile Gumede. Lo mkhandlu unenkinga yokungakhokhi izimali zalabo abanikwa imisebenzi phecelezi amathenda. Ngezwa ngamabhasi athutha izingane zesikole ngagcina enenkinga engakhokhelwe, abanye bakhuluma phansi kwezihlahla kodwa uma kubalwa kuyeqa eshumini izinkampani ezikweletwa izinkulungwane. Uma ufaka isicelo semali abasebenzi bathi ayikho imali kulo nyaka.Umbuzo uthi kanti ngempela kwenzeknai ngalo mkhandlu omkhulu kangaka? Bengiwethemba lo mkhandlu ngoba uholwa yinzalabantu kodwa sekuvele kwaphela ukuwethemba.Ngyacela bandla lingahlukumezeki ilungelo lethu lokuba sithole okungokwethu.OkhathazekileeThekwini
title: [IMIBONO] Angisawethembi lo mkhandlu weTheku awukhokhelani

text: SINYUKE ngo-1.4% isibalo sokubulawa kwabantu kuleli, okuchaza ukuthi kubulawa abantu abawu-57 ngosuku kuleli ngokwezibalo zonyaka wezimali ka-2018/2019. UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele nokhomishana wamaphoyisa kuleli uGeneral Khehla Sitole nethimba labo bethule umbiko ngobugebengu kuleli kwikomiti lasePhalamende elibhekelela ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika nabezindaba.Ngonyaka ka-2018/2019 kubulawe abantu abawu-22 022. Lesi sibalo sikhuphuke ngo-686 uma siqhathaniswa nonyaka wangaphambilini.Kuvele ukuthi ukubulawa kwabantu kwenzeka kakhulu ngempelasonto, okungachaza ukuthi kusuke kuhlobene nokuphuzwa kotshwala nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa.  UCele uthe isibalo esiningi sababulewe kuvela ukuthi babulawe abantu ababaziyo, okungelula ukuthi amaphoyisa angenelele akunqande. "Kuzoba nzima kakhulu ukuthi amaphoyisa aqaphe lawa macala okutholwa ukuthi abantu basuke bazana," kusho uCele. Amacala okuzama ukubulala wona anyuke ngo-4.1% njengoba ebewu-18 980. Awokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza anyuke ngo-2.2% efinyelela ku-170 979.Okunye okuzokhathaza abakuleli ukunyuka kwesibalo samacala okudlwengula nawokunukubeza ngokocansi, akhuphuke ngo-4.6% afinyelela ku-52 420. Kuvela lezi zibalo nje uhulumeni ungaphansi kwenkulu ingcindezi yokuthi axazulule inkinga yokudlwengulwa nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane kuleli. - African News Agency (ANA)
title: #CrimeStats: Sinyukile isibalo sokubulawa nokudlwengulwa kwabantu kuleli

text: AKHUNGATHEKILEamalungu omphakathi wakwa-V eMlaza kutholwa isidumbu sowesifazane sigwaziwe silaliswe eduze komgwaqo iMangosuthu Highway.Kuthiwa isidumbu salo wesifazane ongaziwa ukuthi ungubani besinenxeba lokugwazwa, sihlubule kwesingezansi njengoba kusolakala ukuthi ngaphambi kokubulawa, uqale wadlwengulwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisaathole ucingo ekuseni izolo ebelubika ngokutholwa kwalesi sidumbu.“Kuphenywa icala lokubulala elivulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eMlaza,” kusho uGwala.
title: Kutholwe isidumbu sowesifazane eMlaza

text: ISIKHULU esisabambile sePassenger Rail Agency of South Africa (Prasa) uDkt Nkosinathi Sishi, sithi bazojeziswa kanzima abazama ukweba impahla yalenkampani.USishi usho lokhu emuva kokuxoshwa konogada abawu-14 abalahlwe yicala lokuzama ukweba amatekisi (Toyota Quantums) akwaPrasa ngo-Okthoba 31 wonyaka odlule.Kuthiwa labo nogada bagasela emahhovisi akwaPrasa ngabo 1:30 kuya ku-1:50 bafike bakhomba ngezibhamu onogada ababesebenza ngalolo suku, babashaya, babavala amehlo baze bababopha nezandla.Ngebhadi balahlwa elakubo njengoba bathi besahlela ukuhamba namatekisi kwagasela amaphoyisa baboshwa.Labo nogada baqondiswa ubugwegwe icala labalahla.USishi uthe kuyathusa ukuthi onogada abawu-14 bazama ukweba amatekisi baze balimaza ozakwabo.“Kuyathusa ukuthi banikwe umsebenzi wokuvikela umphakathi nempahla kodwa yibona abazama ukuyeba."."USihlalo weBhodi lakwaPrasa uNkk Khanyisile Kweyama naye usishayele ihlombe isinqumo sokuxoshwa kwalabo nogada.
title: IPrasa ixoshe onogada abawu-14 abebayo

text: USHIYE angalazi kubaholi boMkhonto weSizwe Military Veterans Association (MKMVA) uNgongqoshe wezokuThutha kuleli uMnuz Fikile Mbalula ebiza okhulumela le nhlangano uMnuz Carl Niehaus ngesigebengu esidala esiqashwe nguNobhala-jikelele we-ANC eLuthuli House, uMnuz Ace Magashule.UMbalula usho kanje ngoNiehaus empini ayisuse izolo ekuseni ekhasini lakhe kuTwitter lapho aveze khona ukuthi i-ANC ibhekene nezimpisi ezicashe ngesikhumba sezimvu.Lokhu kulandela imashi iMKMVA ebiyeseka kuyo iSanco neCosas eGauteng kumashelwa ukuthi kuboshwe uMbalula. Bakhala ngokuthi uMbalula uhlulekile ukulungisa izinto kwaPrasa ekubeni abantu bethembele ezitimeleni.FULL: STATEMENT BY MINISTER @MBALULAFIKILE on CAMPAIGN BY PEOPLE WHO ALLEGE THEMSELVES AS MK VETERANS pic.twitter.com/EfDnw7XCodEbhala kuTwitter uMbalula uthe empeleni kunabaholi bayo iMKMVA abebedla ngezinkampani zonogada ezingombombayi ebeziqashwa kwaPrasa. Uthe izinkinga eziningi abebebhekene nazo sezizoxazululeka njengoba uPrasa usuzoziqashela wona onogada,"UPrasa ubufana nenkomo ebeniyisenga, isono sami kube ukuvala umpompi. Benizenzela umathanda ngezinkampani zonogada ezingombombayi. NINYILE," kuloba uNgqongqoshe kuTwitter.Uqhube wakhumbuza abantu ukuthi uNiehaus wake waqamba amanga wathi kushone unina ukuze athole izimali zomshwalense.Karl Niehaus faked the death of his own mother ,Faked death of his own mother ,faked death of his own mother today he is showing up with chicken audacity threatening everyone including the state.Akagcinanga lapho uMbalula njengoba edlulele kumengameli weMKMVA, uMnuz Kebby Maphotsoe naye ethi useke wabhekana nezinsolo zobugebengu njengoNiehaus.Uphakamise imibuzo ngendima eyadlalwa uMaphotsoe empini nohulumeni wobandlululo ethi njengoba enengalo eyodwa nje walahlekelwa yisandla ngenxa yobugwala hhayi ngoba ayelwa nobandlululo.Ephendula le mibhalo uMaphotsoe uthe uMbalula kuzomele axolise ngakho konke akushilo ngoba uhlasele iMKMVA. Uthe kuzomele axolise ngaphambi kokuthi enze inkulumo emphakathini."Noma ngabe ukuphi, sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyasukuma axolise phambi kwabantu. Uma engakwenzi lokho akukho mhlangano azokhuluma kuwo," kusho uMaphotsoe.Noma engalifakanga igama likaMbalula kumbhalo wakhe uMagashule ubhale kuTwitter wathi: "o thomile go gafa" (usuqalile ukuhlanya). Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uMbalula uwuphendulile lo mbhalo ebuza ukuthi ngabe usho kuye yini ukuthi useyahlanya."Sengibathinte kwezwakala, obasi babo sebephumela obala. Bathi siyahlanya, abaholi bethu," kubhala uMbalula.Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Pule Mabe uyigxekile imibhalo kaMbalula kuTwitter wathi kumele asebenzise izinhlaka zangaphakathi enhlanganweni ukuzwakalisa izikhalo ngabanye abaholi benhlangano.
title: Kusuke olwezichwe uMbalula egadla ku-Ace Magashule nakubaholi be-MKMVA

text: UMHOLI we-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) uMnuz Julius Malema uthi akasiboni isidingo sokuthi akhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela owayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma uma elahlwa ngamacala abhekene nawo. UMalema uveze lokhu engxoxweni ekhethekile yePress Club namhlanje ekuseni elandela inkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni ebiyethulwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngoLwesine. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ekuqaleni kwale nyanga inkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ikhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukubosha kukaZuma kulandela ukungaveli kwakhe enkantolo. UZuma bekumele avele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngecala lenkohlakalo elithinta izinsolo zokugwazelwa kwakhe yinkampani yaseFrance yezikhali, iThales, kodwa wangakwazi ngoba kubikwa ukuthi uyagula. I-EFF ibalwa namaqembu ayehola phambili umkhankaso wokuthi kukhishwe uZuma kwesobuMengameli kuleli, imsola ngenkohlakalo nangokunikeza umndeni wakwaGupta amandla kuhulumeni. UMalema nokho ngoLwesihlanu uthe uMsholozi, oneminyaka ewu-77, kumele aquliswe amacala abhekene nawo enkantolo kodwa angabe esaboshwa ejele. “Ngathi uma kunamacala avulelwe uZuma kumele aye enkantolo. Kodwa asikwazi ukumfaka ejele, ngabe siwumphakathi onjani obopha abantu abadala? Kumele aphendule enkantolo, nayo inkantolo kumele icabange ngeminyaka yakhe. Ijele yindawo yokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo. Ukufaka uZuma ejele kungaba ukumosha imali ngoba yini esengalungiswa kulo muntu omdala? Inkantolo kuzomele ithole enye indlela,” kusho uMalema.Ebuzwa ngezinsolo zokuthi i-EFF yadla izimali zebhange i-VBS Mutual Bank uMalema uthe akekho noyedwa owe-EFF ophule umthetho kulolu daba.  “Abaphenyi bathole abantu okungeyibo - asikho lapho. Manje ngoba asihambisani noPravin sebethi ‘laba bantu beVBS ababoshwe…’ ababophe. Badedeleni babophe...bazobopha abantu babo, akekho noyedwa we-EFF ozoboshwa. Umfowabo kaFloyd Shivamvu waboleka imali eVBS, wayikhokha, kuphelile. Ibhange lamboleka imali, wayikhokha. Yini enye abayifunayo? Abantu sebeyaboshwa ngokuboleka imali?” kubuza uMalema.
title: UMalema akahambisani nokuboshwa kukaZuma

text: ISADTU ifuna zivalwe izikole kuze kwehle izinga lokutheleleka kwabantu ngeCovid-19.UNobhala Jikelele weSadtu uMnuz Mugwena Maluleke uthe beze nalesi siphakamiso ngoba bayabona ukuthi ziyanda izibalo zabatheleleka ngeCovid-19 ngakho impilo yothisha neyezingane isengcupheni uma izikole zisavuliwe.IPhini likaNobhala Jikelele weSadtu uMnuz Nkosana Dolopi lithe bazoba nomhlangano noNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyiSisekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga ukuze babhunge udaba lokuvala izikole.“Okwamanje asinalo usuku nesikhathi esizohlangana ngalo noNgqongqoshe kodwa kufanele kwenzeke maduze ngoba lolu daba luyaphuthuma,” kusho uDolopi.Uthe akusikho ukuthi othisha abathandi ukufundisa kodwa bacabangela impilo yabo neyabafundi ngenxa yokuthi iCovid-19 ayikalawuleki.Uphakamise ukuthi abafundi basebenzise izinkundla zokuxhumana ukufunda, imisakazo namathelevishini ukuze bangasali ezifundweni zabo.Uphakamise ukuthi izifundo zifakwe online kodwa kungadingeki idata nezinye izindleko uma abafundi benza izifundo zabo.Uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngabafunda uGrade 12 uma kuwukuthi kuyekwa yonke into ngoba abakwazi ukuphuma esikoleni nokuzoba yinkinga kubafundi okufanele bayoqala uGrade 1.Uthe kuleli sonto othisha bayalelwe ukuthi baye esikoleni kodwa ngeke liphele kungacacanga ukuthi izikole zizovalwa noma kanjani kwazise bayawudinga umhlangano noNgqongqoshe.UNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNkk Angie Motshekga, izolo esitatimendeni uthe isinqumo sabo sokuvula izikole sasifanele isigaba sikathaqa futhi bazimisele ekuhlengeni impilo yabantu. “Isikole siyigxenye yempilo yethu. Izikole nohlelo lonke lwemfundo lubhekene nesimo esisha kodwa esekumele kube indlela ejwayelekile yokuphila ngenxa yeCorona. Lokhu kungenza izikole zizithole zibhekene nengcindezi ngenxa yokuvulwa kwezikole. Uhulumeni ukhathazekile ngothisha, othishanhloko, abasebenzi abalekelela ezikoleni abasebenzisa nanoma iziphi izinkundla ukuba behlasele uhulumeni ngokubuyela kwabo emsebenzini. Lokhu abakwenzayo kubukeka sengathi bona bazibona behlukile kwabanye abasebenzi bakahulumeni,’’ kusho uNkk Mothsekga.I-Public Service Association (PSA) neYoung Communist League of South Africa (YCLSA) bahambe emazwini eSadtu becela umnyango ukuthi uvale izikole. IYCLSA ithe akusizi ukuqhubeka nokuthi kuyiwe ezikoleni noma isimo singavumi.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba le nhlangano ithe akukwazi ukuthi kungabekwa impilo engcupheni.“NgoMeyi nonyaka saphakamisa ukuthi abafunda uGrade 12 bayiswe emakhempini bese kuthi abanye abafundi bahlale emakhaya. Ekupheleni kukaMeyi sanika umnyango ithuba lokuthi ubonakalise ukuthi ezokuphepha zizoqiniswa ngaphambi kokuvulwa kwezikole. Ngakho sizwakalisa ukungazithembi izindlela zokuqinisekisa ezokuphepha ezikhona ezikoleni yikho sisaqhubeka sithi akubekwe impilo phambili kunokuthi kuqhutshekwe nokufunda.”Lesi sitatimende siqhuba sithi okwenzeka manje nokuyishwa wukuthi zinyuka ngamandla izibalo zabatheleleka ngeCorona ezikoleni nokuyinto ebingagwemeka ukuba umnyango uhambise phambili ukuphepha kwabafundi nabasebenzi kunokuthi kuqhutshekwe nokufunda.“Sinxusa umnyango ukuthi uhlehlise ngokushesha ukuqhubeka kokufunda uze nezindlela ezingcono zokuqinisekisa ezokuphepha lapho kungeke kube khona ukuthelelana ngegciwane noma kuze kube nomgomo wegciwane. Uma kungukuthi ukufunda akukwazi ukuqhubeka nonyaka ngenxa yokumiswa kwako sinxusa ukuthi bonke abafundi badluliselwe kwamanye amabanga ngonyaka ozayo ngaphandle kuka Grade 12. Umnyango kumele wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi abafundi nothisha bazokwazi ukumelana nomsebenzi walo nyaka ngonyaka ozayo.”
title: I-Sadtu ifuna kuvalwe izikole

text: IWAHLABA iyawahlikiza amaqembu e-Absa Premiership inkakha yeKaizer Chiefs, u-Abel “Chaklas” Shongwe, iwasola ngokubukela phansi abadlali abangumsinsi wokuzimilela eNingizimu Afrika.Okwenza uShongwe, odlalele iChiefs ngeminyaka yawo-80, asole amaqembu ePremiership ngokubukela phansi abadlali baseMzansi, yindlela awele ngayo imingcele eyosayinisa abadlali bangaphandle kuleli windi eliqhubekayo lokudayiselana abadlali.Kuleli windi lokuhwebelana ngabadlali, bahamba phambili abadlali bangaphandle kwazise namaqembu amathathu amakhulu nokuyiwo okuthenjelwe kuwo ukuthi akhiqize abadlali abavuthayo beBafana asesayinise abayisikhombisa ngokuhlanganyela.“Awukaze uvuleke kanje umngcele ngewindi elilodwa. Indlela okwenzeka ngayo njengamanje uyabona ukuthi amaqembu asebathatha kancane kakhulu abadlali baseNingizimu Afrika. Awela imingcele eyothenga abadlali abangekho ezingeni eliphezulu, abafanayo nalaba esinabo futhi abanye babo bangaphansi kwalaba esinabo la ekhaya abadlala kwiNFD nakwi-ABC Motsepe League,” kusho uShongwe odlale nabadlali abanohlonze njengoTeenage Dladla, Ace Ntsoelengoe noDoctor Khumalo owagqama eDaliwonga Secondary School, eSoweto.“Sine-SAB okudlala kuyo i-Under 21, yiMotsepe League okudlala kuyo i-U/23 kanjalo neNFD nayo enomthethu ka-Under 23. Bonke laba badlali abakule minyaka kanti bashonaphi? Bazosayinwaphi? Le nto yokubeka le mithetho yeminyaka kwakungaqondiwe yini ngayo ukwandisela amaqembu abadlali basekhaya angakhetha kubo? Indlela abazitshwa ngayo abadlali yenza kubukeka sengathi le mithetho yeminyaka kwakuqondwe ngayo ukuqedela abanye imisebenzi.”Iqembu likaShongwe lakudala, iChiefs, yilo elihamba phambili ekusayinweni kwabadlali bangaphandle kuleli windi.IChiefs isayinise abadlali abane bangaphandle okunguLazarous Kambole waseZambia, James Agyekum Kotei waseGhana, uSamir Nurkovic waseSerbia noKearyn Baccus wase-Australia kodwa okuthiwa uzobhaliswa njengowaseMzansi ngenxa yokuthi azalelwa eThekwini.I-Orlando Pirates yona isayinise uJordi Delle waseFrance no-Austin Muwowo ongumkhaya kaKambole kwathi iMamelodi Sundowns yavuka noMauricio Affonso wase-Uruguay.Akupheli lapho kwazise AmaZulu asayinise * -Andre de Jong waseNew Zealand, iStellenbosch yavuka ngenjini yaseMexico uDiego Franco, iLeopards yasayinisa uJonas Asvendo Mendes waseGuinea Bissau.“Kulaba abane (beChiefs) nguKambole kuphela umdlali wangempela. Uyabona-ke loyo angahlula ngisho uBilliat (Khama). Bonke laba abanye bazovala izikhala zabadlali baseNingizimu Afrika,” kusho uShongwe.Ngokwabanye abaqeqeshi asebeke baxoxisana naleli phephendaba ukugcwala kwabadlali bangaphandle ikakhulukazi abagadli kunomthethela ekungenzeni kahle kweBafana Bafana emqhudelwaneni emikhulu njenge-Africa Cup of Nations neFifa World Cup.
title: UChacklas uhlaba awePSL ngokweya abazalelwe kuleli

text: UMasipala weTheku usuluqalile uhlelo lokubonisana nomphakathi ngombiko wonyaka ka-2028/19 ngakho umema umphakathi ukuba ubeke imibono yawo ngalo mbiko. Kukhona umhlangano womphakathi ohlelelwe ukwethula lo mbiko emphakathini nokulalela imibono yomphakathi ngawo. Lo mhlangano uzoba mhla ka 4 Mashi eLuthuli Hall, eCity Hall, ngo-10:00. Bonke abafisa ukuba yingxenye yalo mhlangano bayakhuthazwa ukuba beze. Umbiko wokusebenza kukaMasipala onyakeni wezimali owedlule unikeza imininingwane yalokho uMasipala akwenze ngempumelelo, izinselelo ahlangabezane nazo kanye nezitatimende ezihlanganisiwe zezimali zonyaka. Imibono etholakale kulolu hlelo yiyo esetshenziswa ukwakha uHlelo Lwentuthuko Edidiyele nesabelomali sonyaka wezimali olandelayo. Lo mbiko ukhombisa ukuthi yize noma zibe khona izinselelo, ezinjengesimo esingesihle sokukhula kwemali engenayo kuMasipala kanye nokukhula ngesivinini kwesibalo sabantu abathutheleka edolobheni, uMasipala wenze kahle futhi wathola nombiko kamcwaningimabhuku-jikelele ongenacashaza. Ubuholi bukaMasipala buzinikele ekushiseni ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo kubantu nokuqikelela ukuthi wonke umuntu owakhele iTheku lonkana uphila impilo engcono.UMasipala uqhubekile nokuhanmbisa izidingo kwabahlwempu. Ufakele amakhasimende kuka-740 000 ugesi endaweni elinganiselwa kumakhilomitha awu-2 000 futhi wafakela abantu abahlwempu abantu-109 749 ugesi wamahhala.Umnyango wakwa-Cleansing & Solid Waste unikezele ngosizo olunhlobonhlobo u-3.4 million wamakhasimende emizi, ezimboni nawamabhizinisi kanti masont’onke uqoqela udoti imizi engu-1 063 624 kanye no-106% wabahlwempu.UMasipala wakhe 3142 wemizi emisha, waphothula 32 wezakhiwo zemindeni ezintsha, walungisa izakhiwo ezingu-223. Umnyango Wezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu kuMasipala uweqile umgomo wawo ngokuthola amahekthare angu-614 omhlaba wokwakhela abantu izindlu. Lezi zindawo ezakhiwayo zokuhlalisa abantu zisezindaweni eziseduze namathuba omsebenzi. Ngenxa yalokhu, uMasipala uthole inqwaba yezindondo zokusebenza kahle ngaphansi kohlelo lwezindondo ze-Govan Mbeki Awards nokuyinto ekhombisayo ukuthi iTheku linguMasipala osebenzayo. Umnyango wakwa-Human Settlements kanye nowakwa-Water & Sanitation babalwe nezinhlaka ezingu-15 emhlabeni esisemgqeni wokuthola izindondo eGuangzhou International Award for Urban Innovation.Umnyango Wezamanzi uqikelele ukuthi u-85% wemizi uthola amanzi ahlanzekile ayisidingongqangi bese kuthi u-98% uthole amanzi amahhala. UMasipala uyaqhubeka nokuba sesimweni esihle sezimali njengoba izinga lakhe lokuqoqa izikweletu liphezulu ku-91.9%, yanda imali ayiqoqayo, engathembele kakhulu emalini yokwebolekwa futhi enemali eyenele yokukhokha izindleko zakhe. UMasipala ukwazile ukuqhubeka nokuba negama elihle lokufanaleka ukwebolekwa izimali esuka kua-AA waya ku-AA+ kwezikhokhwa isikhathi eside nelika-A1+ kwezikhokhwa isikhathi esifushane. Kulo nyaka ikhulile ngo-4% imali engana kuMasipala uma kuqhathaniswa nonyaka owandulelayo, nesilinganiso sokwethembela emalini yokwebolekwa sibe phansi ku-25% ekupheleni konyaka okungaphansi komgomo kaMgcinimafa kazwelonke, ongu 45%-50%. UMasipala uqhubekile rnerekhodi elihle lokuhlinzeka abantu ngezidingo njengoba esebenzise R4.951 billion esabelweni semisebenzi emikhulu, okungu-75% wesabelo semisebenzi emikhulu sesisonke. Ukusetshenziswa kwalesi sabelo kulo nyaka kulibazisekile kunobekulindelekile ngenxa yokungasebenzi ngokulindelekile kosonkontileka, izinselelo/ukulibaziseka  kokuthenga namacala afakwe ezinkantolo kumaphrojekthi amane omgwaqo, abafake izicelo zokuba kubuyekezwe izinqumo ezithathiwe ngezinkontileka zamanye amaphrojekthi kanye nokumiswa komsebenzi ngenxa yeziteleka nezinselelo zamaforamu amabhizinisi. Kepha uMasipala usethathe izinyathelo ezifanele zokubhekana nalezi zinselelo.Lo mbiko wonyaka uyatholakala kwi-website kaMasipala weTheku kuleli kheli: www.durban.gov.za. Futhi uyatholakala nasezikhungweni zikaSizakala nasemitapweni yolwazi kaMasipala. Umphakathi uyakhuthazwa ukuba uwufunde lo mbiko bese uphawula ngawo ngokuthumela imibono kuleli kheli: [email protected] UMasipala uzokwazi ukubasiza abadinga ukusizwa ngokubhalelwa phansi imibono yabo. Usuku lokugcina lokulethwa kwemibono umhla ka 13 Mashi 2020.
title: Ithuba lokuphawula ngombiko wonyaka

text: BABHALE begadwe ngamaphoyisa abafundi abafunda u-matric eGlenhaven Secondary, eVerulam, izolo njengoba ozakwabo bebebhikisha ngaphandle kwalesi sikole.Abafundi bakulesi sikole baqale umbhikisho ngoLwesibili bethi amasango asanda kufakwa ayabaphazamisa uma beshintsha amakilasi njengoba benqunyelwa imizuzu emithathu ukuthi baphume kwelinye ikilasi baye kwelinye.Bebekhala nangokuthi amathoyilethi esikole awahlanzekile nokuthi ompompi bamanzi abenele.Bathi uthishanhloko walesi sikole uMnuz Genesis Reddy unobandlululo uhlale ethi abafundi abamnyama bakulesi sikole abahambe baye kwezinye izikole uma behluleka ukumelana nemigomo yalesi sikole.UMfundo Ndunakazi, umengameli wesigungu sabafundi kulesi sikole, uthe sekukaningi ezama ukukhuluma nothishanhloko ngamasango afakiwe kube nhlangazimuka nomoya.“Ngamtshela ukuthi abafundi bayakhala ngamasango afakwe kuwo wonke amabhlokhi bathi avalwa ngemuva kwemizuzu emithathu, abanye abafundi bazithola beme ngaphandle bengasafundi bevalelekile. Akazange avume ukuthi sibonisane, siqhamuke nendlela engcono engasetshenziswa kunalokho yena nothisha bangihlasela ngenkulumo bethi angiyena umholi oqotho,” kusho yena.Uthe okunye okuvuse uhlevane kubafundi ukunqanyulwa kohlelo lokudla kwabanye abafundi kwasala uGrade12 okuyiwona osakuthola ukudla.“Ziningi izingane eziphuma emindenini entulayo ebezisizakala ngokudla lapha esikole eminyakeni ephambili, okunqanyulwe ekuqaleni konyaka. Kwathiwa abaxhasi abathe akunikwe leli kilasi kuphela,” kusho yena.NgoLwesibili, kuphazamiseke ukubhalwa kwezivivinyo ku-matric kulesi sikole. Izolo kubhaliwe amaphoyisa abebagadile abafundi ababhalayo.Abamanye amakilasi bebegcwele ngaphandle kwesikole.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Fakazi Mdletshe obekhona esikoleni, lithe okwamanje akukacaci ukuthi abafundi babhikishelani ngoba amasango abakhala ngawo anamasonto amabili efakiwe.“Abafundi esikoleni basuke bezofunda ezinye izinto okungenzeka ziphazamise ukufunda ngikholwa ukuthi zingalungiseka kube kuqhutshekwa kufundwa,” kusho uMdletshe.UMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa okhulumela uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo kulesi sisifundazwe, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu uthe ungqongqoshe uvakashele lesi sikole namhlanje ukuze athole ukuthi yini eholele ekutheni abafundi babhikishe balimaze nempahla yesikole. Uthe ngesikhathi bephenya batholile ukuthi kunezikhalo zokucwaswa ngokwebala ngokunjalo nokuhlukunyezwa kwabafundi abasazobhekana nazo njengomnyango.
title: Babhale beqashwe amaphoyisa

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUNQABE ukubolekiswa kwiMaritzburg United, uTiyani " Shuga" Mabunda olizwa ngendaba ijezi kwiMamelodi Sundowns.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi iSundowns bese iqede konke neTeam of Choice kodwa lo mdlali oyibamba esiswini washaya phansi ngonyawo, wathi akalibeki eMphithi.Ngokusho kwalo mthombo osondelene nalo mdlali isizathu esidale ukuthi anqabe wukuthi kwiMaritzburg ubengeke athole imihlomulo agixabezwa yona eChloorkop.Kuthiwa uMabunda uthe ufuna ukuyiqedela kwiSundowns inkontileka yakhe ephela ekusongweni kwesizini ka-2020/21."UMabunda usekwamukele ukuthi iSundonws ngeke iyivuselele inkontileka yakhe. Osekumhlalise kuyo yimali. UFarouk Kadodia (umnikazi weMaritzburg) bese eqede konke neSundowns, beyingenankinga ukuthi imdedele. KwiMaritzburg kubukeka ebezolithola ithuba lokudlala,” kubeka umthombo.Kuthintwa uKadodia ukuvumile ukuthi bebefuna ukumboleka uMabunda kodwa kwavimba ezinto ezithile."Kuliqiniso ukuthi besimgaqele uMabunda ngesikhathi kusavulwe iwindi. Kuvimbe izinto engingeke ngikwazi  ukuzidalula kwabezindaba. Empeleni angithandi ukuphawula kakhulu ngalolu daba, kumele sikuhloniphe ukuthi uMabunda unenkontilela neSundowns," kusho uKadodia.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kweSundowns ayiphumelelanga njengoba lowo okhulumela iqembu uShupi Nkgadima engazange ayiphendule imibuzo athunyelelwe yona.Ngaphambi kokuqala kwale sizini, iSwallows beyifuna ukuboleka lo mdlali. Ivinjwe ukuthi beyingeke ikwazi ukumholela imali ayithola kwiSundowns.Selokhu kuqale isizini, uMabunda owake waba semabhukwini eBlack Leopards nakwaweFree State Stars, ulizwa ngendaba ijezi kwiSundowns.Ubanga indawo esiswini no-Andile Jali, Hlompho Kekana, noRivaldo Coetzee osuswe emuva wafakwa esiswini.UMabunda izinto ziqale ukumbhedela ngesizini edlule edlala imidlalo eyisishiyagalolunye kuphela yeDStv Premiership neyisithupha yemiqhudelwano.  Wagcina ukuba nesizini enhle kweka-2018/19, edlala imidlalo ewu-22.Eminyakeni edlule uke waba ngelinye lamasosha ayeyizithenjwa zikaPitso "Jingles" Mosimane oseqeqesha i-Al Ahly yase-Egypt.UMabunda usenqobe neSundowns isicoco seCaf Champions League ngo-2016, isicoco seDStv Premiership kahlanu, kabili iTelkom Knockout neNedbank Cup ngokuhlukana kwemiqhudelwano.
title: Kuvela okubhuntshise izingxoxo zeMaritzburg neDowns ngoMabunda

text: I-UNITED Democratic Movement  (UDM) ikopele izinhlelo ze-Democratic Alliance zokucela amalungu omphakathi ukuthi abhalisele ukuba ngamalungu ale nhlangano ephalamende nakwizishayamthetho ezifundazweni. I-UDM eyiqembu eliphikisayo, icele amalungu omphakathi afuna ukungenela ukhetho luka-2019 emele leli qembu ukuthi abhalise ngaphambi kuka-Ephreli nonyaka. "Simema abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abafuna ukumela i-UDM ukuthi bafake izicelo zokuyimela ephalamende nakwizishayamthetho," kusho i-UDM ezikhangisweni. Izinhlangano eziningi zepolitiki okuhlanganisa i-ANC ne-EFF zithatha amalungu ephalamende kwizishayamthetho nasohlwini lwabantu abasuke bevoteliwe emagatsheni. Ukuqokwa kwamalungu ephalamende kuye kudale ingxabano ezinhlanganweni zepolitiki. Umholi we-UDM, uGeneral Bantu Holomisa uthe iqembu lakhe lisebenzisa abantu abaqokwe wumphakathi ezifundazweni eziningi. "I-UDM imandla kakhulu e-Eastern Cape kodwa ngenxa yohlelo oluvumela amalungu ukuthi aqembukele kwezinye izinhlangano ehlile. Sizama ukuvusa i-UDM kwezinye izindawo," kusho uHolomisa.Uthe umkhankaso wabo wokumema amalungu omphakathi ukuthi amele i-UDM uhamba kahle ngoba baningi abantu abafuna ukuba kuleli qembu. "Sifuna uhlelo lokuqokwa kwabantu luhambe kahle, asifuni ukuzithola sesinohlu oluzolwisa amalungu ethu. Sizoba nezinkundla zokucobelelana ngolwazi kulabo abafuna ukuba ngamalungu ephalamende amele i-UDM ezizoba ngoJuni nangoJulayi. Sifuna bazi kahle ukuthi i-UDM imeleni nokuthi abavoti sibaheha kanjani. Siheha abantu abaneziqu zemfundo ephakeme nalabo abangafundile inqobo nje uma benekhono lokuphatha kahle abantu," kusho uHolomisa.Uthe abafuna ukumela i-UDM akumele bazihathaze ngeziqu zemfundo ephakemengoba ipolitiki ifuna umuntu okwazi ukuheha abantu nokubachazela ngobuhle be-UDM. UMnuz Mabine Seabe obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwiDA, uthe bamema abantu ukuthi bafake izicelo uma befuna ukumela iDA kodwa okuhlukile ngabo wukuthi sebeqalile ukubheka labo abazomela iDA  ephalamende kumalungu abo. Umkhulumeli we-ANC, uMnuz Pule Mabe akatholakalanga ukuthi aphawule ngokwenziwa yi-ANC njengoba ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe.
title: I-UDM ikopele okwenziwa iDA

text: Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele uMnuz Thabani Khumalo uthe i-ANC isemgudwini omuhle wokubuyisa ithemba kubantu bakuleli.Wathi kodwa kusala imibuzo ngemigomo abaphuma nayo ezingqungqutheleni, wakhala ngokuthi kuba wumqansa onganyukwa mbongolo uma sekufanele ifezwe imigomo.‘’Banemigomo emihle kabi uma ubheka lo wokubuyisa umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo. Bazoyenza kanjani leyo nto ngoba badinga ukuba yiningi okubonakala kuzoba nzima ukuthola iningi elanele lokho.Bakhuluma ngazwi linye ne-EFF odabeni lomhlaba. Bekufanele babambisane nayo kodwa ngeke kwenzeke ngoba bayinkukhu nempaka,’’ kusho uKhumalo.Uyincomile i-ANC ngokubuyela kubantu, wathi iwabonile amaphutha ayo iyazehlisa kubantu bakuleli.‘’Iqale ngokuhambela abaholi bendabuko amakhosi, kusobala ukuthi ubuholi obusha buyazazi izinkinga ze-ANC ukuthi zikuphi futhi buzimisele ngokuzilungisa.“Okwabo sekufanele babuyele emagatsheni bayoqala phansi bawahlanganise,’’ kusho uKhumaloUthe nakuba izamile i-ANC ukulwa nobuqembuqembu kodwa kusekhona inhlese. Kubonakala nangendlela isigungu esiphezulu esihlala ngayo emcimbini kuhlawa ngamaqoqo, kuyahletshwa kukhulunyelwa phansi.
title: URamaphosa ulethe ithemba ebophezela i-ANC ezimisweni

text: KUGWAZANE izitshudeni eDurban University of Technology (DUT) ophikweni lwayo iSteve Biko, eThekwini,  izolo kubangwa indawo okubekwa kuyo itafula okusiza izitshudeni ezizobhalisa.Lo mdonsiswano ophethe ngokuthi kulimale izitshudeni ezinhlanu eziphuthunyiswe emtholampilo ukuyokwelashwa, ubuphakathi kwezinhlangano zezitshudeni i-EFF Student Command neSouth African Students Congress (SASCO) kulesi sikhungo.UZama Mathenjwa oyilungu leSASCO, uthe bebeqhuba umkhankaso wabo obizwa ngeRight to Learn abawuqale kuphuma imiphumela ka-matric ngoFebhuwari, nalapho bebeka itafula labo netende ngasesangweni lenyuvesi ukulekelela izitshudeni ezidinga usizo uma zizobhalisa.“Siyaye sifike esikhungweni ngo-6 siqale ukusiza izitshudeni. NgoLwesihlanu kwafika abe-EFFSC basisusa belinga nokwephula itende lethu, bethi inyuvesi iphethwe yibo. Abanye babo bebenuka utshwala.“Namuhla (izolo) siqhubekile nomkhankaso wethu. Baphinde batheleka bathatha itafula baliphosa lapha, baqala bashaya ama-comrade. Omunye oshayiwe uphuke ingalo, usesibhedlela, kanti uphila nokukhubazeka kokungezwa ezindlebeni kangongoba izinsiza-kuzwa zakhe zize zacoshwa ngamaphoyisa seziwele phansi,” kusho uZama.Uthe bebengakhethi, beshaya nabesifazane, wathi bebesabisa nonogada besho ukuthi babulala uMlungisi Madonsela okusolakala ukuthi wadutshulwa onogada ngesikhathi kunombhikisho kule nyuvesi ngo-2019.UMengameli wesigungu esimele izitshudeni eDUT, uZabelo Ntuli oyilungu le-EFFSC, uthe nakuba ubengekho kusuka izibhelu kodwa utshelwe ukuthi izitshudeni zale nhlangano zidinwa abeSASCO ngokuqola izitshudeni ezizobhalisa imali yazo.“Njengoba kubhaliswa ngohlobo lwezobuchwepheshe, kunabantu beSASCO abakhohlisa izitshudeni, bazinike ama-akhawunti asebhange okungesiwo bethi azifake imali. Izitshudeni zinqume ukuthi zibasuse ngoba zingahambisani nokuqolwa kwabantu okwenziwa ngamalungu eSASCO,” kusho uZabelo. Uthe kunezigameko ezimbalwa ezibikwe kubona njengesigungu esimele izitshudeni okuthi uma kuchazwa indlela umuntu obegqoke ngayo, kubacacele ukuthi ngoweSASCO.UShansela kule nyuvesi, uSolwazi Thandwa Mthembu esitatimendeni esishicilelwe ekhasini lenyuvesi likaFacebook, uthe zizothathelwa izinyathelo izitshudeni ezibonakala zilwa kwi-video esabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Akwemukelekile ukuthi isitshudeni sasenyuvesi zisebenzise izindlela  zobuqaba ukuxazulula ukungaboni ngaso linye. Iziphathimandla zizothatha izinyathelo ezinqala kubona bonke ababonakale kule-video ngoba abenzisi okwabantu abafunda enyuvesi,” kusho uMthembu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu- Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile isigameko kodwa wathi abagilwa bayalelwe ukuthi bavule amacala.
title: Kugwazane izitshudeni zaseDUT kubangwa itafula

text: LIHLEHLELE uJulayi 2 icala lendoda (31) ebekwe amacala amabili okudlwengulwa owesifazane nomzukulu wakhe.Izolo ivele enkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini lapho ifike yawavuma khona amacala yangafuna nebheyili.Icala libe selihlehlela uJulayi 2.Indoda idlwengule owesifazane (51) nomzukulu wakhe oneminyaka eyisikhombisa ngeSonto, eChesterville extension 2.Kuthiwa abazange bayixwaye ngesikhathi ingena emzini wowesifazane ngoba bakhonza esontweni lakubo kodwa inkinga yaqala uma isibakhomba ngommese ibadlwengula.Ibalekile emuva kokugila umhlola kanti yaze yabanjwa emuva kokuthi umphakathi usabalalise isithombe sayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Itholwe isizifihle kwelinye iflethi elisePhoyinti.Owesifazane nomzukulu basalele esibhedlela ngoba balimala kanzima emuva kokudlwengulwa.Kulindeleke ukuthi bathole ukwelulekwa ngokwengqondo nolunye usizo lwezempilo.Umphakathi waseChesterville ubuphume ngobuningi bawo uzokweseka umndeni.Ikhansela le ndawo, uMnuz Sfiso Mngadi, lithe bewumphakathi waseChesterville bafuna abolele ejele ummangalelwa ngoba ayikho indawo yomuntu ofana naye kulowa mphakathi.“Into ayenzile yimbi, isihlukumezile siwumphakathi. Sifuna umthetho umjezise kanzima, angadedelwa akabolele ejele. Sithole ukuthi ubephume ngeparole njengoba esegila lo mhlola,” kusho uMngadi.Uthe nakusasa bazobe begcwele ngobuningi babo bezokweseka umndeni nokuthi bazwakalise ilaka labo njengomphakathi.
title: Lihlehlile elodlwengule owesifazane nomzukulu wakhe

text: MBALI KHANYILEUMNDENI kamkhulu nomzukulu abaminze emasontweni amabili edlule ngesikhathi bekhuculula ibhuluho lomfula uThukela, eNkandla, ucela ukulekelelwa ngokufuniswa izidumbu zabo.Bakhala ngokwenzelwa phansi ngamaphoyisa. Umndeni uthe ucela usizo kunoma kungubani onesikebhe futhi ongakwazi ukusisebenzisa njengoba umatasatasa uthungatha uMnuz Hlomisimpi Smakade Magwaza ( 62), noLwandle Magwaza (8).UMnuz  Sdumo Magwaza oyilungu lomndeni, uthe ngenxa yokubona kudlula izinsuku amaphoyisa engazitholi izihlobo zabo, sebenqume ukuzibambela.“Siyavuka nsuku zonke siyobheka izidumbu namalungu omphakathi ngoba amaphoyisa asisawaboni ebathungatha. Inkinga esibhekene nayo wukungakwazi ukungena emfuleni ngenxa yokungabi naso isikebha. Yingakho sicela noma yimuphi uMsamariya onaso, ukuthi alekelele ukuze sikwazi ukudlula kulesi simo esisikhungethe,” kubeka uMnuz Sdumo Magwaza.Eqhuba ucele iziphathimandla ukuthi nazo zilekelele njengoba amaphoyisa ophiko lwezinja eMpangeni,  ebatshele ukuthi aseqedile ngomsebenzi wokucinga umkhulu nomzukulu wakhe.“Kuningi amaphoyisa acasha ngakho manje. Aqale asitshela ukuthi ngeke akwazi ukufaka isikebhe ngoba kunamatshe emfuleni njengoba esesitshela ukuthi asewuqedile umsebenzi wokubacinga,” kusho uMagwaza.Isolezwe libike ngalolu daba ngeledlule kanti kuthiwa umzukulu nomkhulu babehlangene namanye amalungu omphakathi ayekhuculula imfucuza kadoti ebhulohweni iNdondondwane, eliphakathi kwaseKranskop naseNkandla.ULwandle wezwakala esekhala efuna usizo waze wabonakala esengezansi komfula emuka. UMagwaza kubikwa ukuthi wagxuma emanzini wabamba uLwandle kodwa bagcina bemuka bobabili.Kushaye esokushicilela kusalindwe amaphoyisa ukuba aphawule.
title: Udinga usizo umndeni wabaminza emfuleni

text: USESABISE ngokugeqa amagula ngezindaba zangasese zikaBlack Coffee uMbali Mlotshwa kulandela ukuchithwa yinkantolo yemantshi eRandburg ecaleni abemsola ngalo lokumshaya. Lo mlingisi owazakhela udumo kwiTshisa ukhihle esikaNandi echazela abalandeli bakhe ukuthi inkantolo ichithe isicelo sakhe sokuvikelwa kuBlack Coffee. Uthe ngenxa yokuhluleka enkantolo, uyaphoqeleka ukuthi aphumele obala “ngokuhlukumezeka” emshadweni wabo. “Ngizonitshela yonke into, sengiyivikele isikhathi eside le ndoda (uBlack Coffee). Uqambe amanga enkantolo wathi ungene ngaphansi kwengalo yami. Emude kangaka? Wazi kahle ukuthi ungishayile futhi wangiphusha sisemzini wethu,” kusho u-Enhle Mbali obekubonakala ukuthi udinwe uyaveva ekhuluma bukhoma ku-Instagram. Uqhube wathi izinxushunxushu zabo sezihlukumeza nezingane ngokomqondo njengoba bedivosa. Uthe phakathi kwezinto ezithikameza izingane ukuthola ukuthi ziyalanywa ngaphandle. UMbali uthe uzobiza isithangami nabezindaba maduze lapho azokhiqiza khona ubufakazi ngokuhlukunyezwa wuBlack Coffee. Ekhasini lakhe kuTwitter uBlack Coffee uphendule ngokubonga abamesekile kulolu daba edalula ukuthi ihoxisiwe incwadi ebimvimba ekuhlanganeni noMbali ngokunjalo nokuya emzini wabo. “Ngiyabonga kubo bonke abangesekile. Ngo-Ephreli ngabhala kuTwitter ukuthi angikaze futhi angisoze ngambeka isandla uMbali. Ngakwenza lokhu ukuze ngilungise ayesekusho ngami. Ngakhetha ukuthula emva kwalokho ngethemba ingalo yomthetho kuleli,” usho kanje.
title: UMbali Mlotshwa  usabisa ngokuchaya izindaba zomshado wakhe

text: UHLAWULISWE uR1 000 uNgqongqoshe wezokuXhumana kuleli uNkk Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, ngecala lokwephula umthetho wokuvalwa kwezwe kathaqa ngenxa yeCoronavirus. Okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), uNksz Phindi Mjonondwane izolo ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams uyikhokhile le nhlawulo emuva kokuvuma ukuthi abekwe icala lokwephula imithetho yezinhlekelele njengoba izwe lingaphansi kwesikhathi sikathaqa.Uthe ukuvuma kwakhe ukukhokha kusho ukuthi usengumuntu osefana nogwetshiwe. Uqhube wathi ubenikwe amasamanisi okuba avele enkantolo ePitoli ngoMeyi 22 nonyaka, wabe esekhokha inhlawulo kaR1 000.UNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams uyikhokhe ngoLwesibili le nhlawulo.Ungqongqoshe wephula imithetho kathaqa ngesikhathi evakashela emzini wowayeyiphini likangqongqoshe wezemfundo ephakeme, uMnuz Mduduzi Manana. Wathathwa isithombe ehlezi noManana nabanye kudliwa ngo-Ephreli 5 nonyaka.Isithombe safakwa nguManana kwi-Instagram yakhe kodwa washesha wasisusa. Ngokusho kukaManana, ungqongqoshe waya emzini wakhe eyolanda izimpahla zokuvikela ezazidingwa ngabafundi.I-NPA iveze ukuthi ukuvakashela kwakhe kwakungeyona ingxenye yomsebenzi obalulekile njengoba kunothaqa ezweni.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wammisa emsebenzini izinyanga ezimbili uNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams. Kweyodwa inyanga ngeke ahole. Waphoqwa nokuthi axolise esizweni okuyinto ayenzange-video.
title: Uhlawuliswe uNdabeni-Abrahams ngokwephula imithetho

text: KUBOSHWE umzukulu okuthiwa uhlasele uyisemkhulu wamgwaza ngento ecijile ekhanda, wafa KwaGudlucingo, eHlokozi.UMnuz Mzukayise Mchunu (66) kuthiwa ugwazwe ngoMgqibelo ebusuku esemzini wakhe ngowesilisa, amaphoyisa athe uyaziwa.Umsolwa oneminyaka engu-21, uboshwe ngecala lokubulala. Kulindeleke avele ePhungashe Periodal Court namhlanje.Indodana kamufi, uMnuz Bhekizitha Mchunu, ithe uyise ubenesibazi esiphongweni nenxeba elijulile enhlafunweni. Uthe ngoMgqibelo ebusuku uthole ucingo ebeluvela kumfowabo omdala, emlandisa ngosekwenzekile.Kuthiwa umndeni ubuhlangene ekhishini udla isidlo sakusihlwa maqede wahlukana usuyolala ezindlini zawo.Kuzwakale ngomufi esememeza, ekhala efuna usizo, kwaphuma indodana yakhe endala kwenye indlu, emfice elele phansi eceleni kwendlu engagqokile.“Ubesakwazi ukukhuluma etholwa wubaba ngoba ngikhulume naye ocingweni wathi ‘mfan’wami ngiyashona la, ngidutshulwe * .’ (egagula igama likamsolwa). Kuthe uma ngimbuza ukuthi kukhona yini ukuphambana ngemibono okube khona, wangaphendula esephelelwa amandla,” kusho uMchunu.Kuthiwa umufi uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela eChrist the King, eXobho ngemoto yakwamakhelwane kodwa washona eqeda ukwehliswa emotweni esebekwa ohlakeni lwesibhedlela.UMchunu uchaze ummangalelwa njengomuntu ohluphayo emphakathini futhi obhema iwunga.
