Uthe badabukile futhi basathukile ngokudlula emhlabeni kukayise ngesandla somuntu wasemndenini.“NgoDisemba bengishadelwa, ubaba ejabule ngendlela eyisimanga futhi engihalalisela kanti ngiyagcina ukujabula naye.Ubaba ubengumuntu wabantu ethandwa, ehlonipha futhi ewusizo. Besingalindele ukuthi kungenzeka into enjena,” kusho uMchunu.Umufi ushiye emhlabeni unkosikazi, izingane ezingu-11 nabazukulu. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCapt Nqobile Gwala, uthe kusolwa ukuthi ummangalelwa ushaye umufi wamdonsa emkhiphela ngaphandle kwendlu.Uthe kusolwa ukuthi umufi ugwazwe ngento ecijile ekhanda.“Izolo ebusuku (esho ngoMsombuluko) ithimba labaseshi eHighflats lilandele umkhondo oliholele lapho bekukhona umsolwa eHlokozi, zamkhalela,” kusho uCapt Gwala.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa eKZN, uLieutenant General Khombinkosi Jula, usigxekile isenzo sokuhlaselwa kukaMchunu okungumuntu obesekhulile.
title: Umzukulu kwelokubulala uyisemkhulu

text: IMENENJA yeKaizer Chiefs, uBobby Motaung, iyakuchitha ukuthi umqeqeshi waseHolland, uRobertus “Rob” Hutting, uzothatha isikhundla sikaSteve “Mphathi” Komphela osekuphele amasizini engawinanga neyokubika indebe eNaturena.UHutting (62), oneziqu zokuqeqesha ze-UEFA Pro Licence, umenyezelwe yiChiefs ngoLwesibili ukuthi uzolekelela uKomphela “ngeziyalo” aphinde asebenze nasenkulisa yaleli qembu. Usayiniswe inkontileka yezinyanga eziyisithupha.Izolo esithangamini nabezindaba uMotaung uthe uyazi ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika uma iqembu liqasha umqeqeshi ozolekelela ngamaqhinga, ubhekwa ngokuthi uzothatha isikhundla sovele esuke ekhona eqenjini. IChiefs ibikade yethula ngokusemthethweni abadlali bayo abasha okunguKabelo Mahlasela, Siphelele Ntshangase, Siphosakhe Ntiyantiya noLeonardo Castro. Iphinde yachaza ngezinhlelo zayo kulezi zinyanga ezisele ngaphambi kokuphela kwesizini ka-2017/2018.“Ngifuna ukukucacisa ukuthi uHutting akezile ukuzothatha umsebenzi kaSteve kodwa uzomeseka. Ngikholwa ukuthi sithole umuntu okulungele lokho. Sikhulume nabantu abaningi. Ngeke ngidalule amagama abo ngoba bazobona ukuthi behlulekile. Ngiyazi ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika kukhona inkolelo yokuthi osebenza elekelela umqeqeshi ngamaqhinga usuke ezoba ngumqeqeshi olandelayo.“Siqale ukukhuluma naye ezinyangeni eziyisithupha ezedlule nomqeqeshi (uKomphela) ubeyingxenye yalokho. Nyakenye kuhambe uConti Kubheka noDoctor Khumalo, izindawo zabo azizange zivalwe. Bekufanele sithole umuntu osezingeni ongenazo izinhloso zokuthatha isikhundla somqeqeshi esinaye.”Emuva kokumenyezelwa kukaHutting ngoLwesibili, iqalile imibuzo ngolwazi lwakhe lwebhola, ikakhulukazi elaseNingizimu Afrika. Kuvele ukuthi uHutting akakaze aliqeqeshe iqembu elikhulu kodwa ungumqeqeshi ogxila enkulisa. Kubaqeqeshi ababhekane nalokhu kukhona uStuart Baxter ogcine esewine isicoco seligi kabili neChiefs. Nakuba iChiefs izame ngakho konke ukuchitha indaba yokuthi uHutting kungenzeka kube uyena umqeqeshi weChiefs ngesizini ezayo kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi isiqalile ukulungiselela impilo ngaphandle kukaKomphela. Inkontileka kaKomphela ayikavuselelwa.“Ngifikele kumqeqeshi ovulelekile futhi ocabanga okuhle ofuna kubanjiswane. Ngijabule ukuba lapha. Kodwa mkhulu umsebenzi okufanele wenziwe yingakho ngilapha. Ngiyakwazi iqembu elizibekele khona. Iqembu linomfutho. Sizokwenza konke okusemandleni kulezi zinyanga eziyisithupha. Ngiyazi ukuthi kusekhona iligi neNedbank Cup,” kusho uHutting.Ebuzwa ngamagalelo akhe ebholeni nokungatholakali kwemisebenzi yakhe ngempumelelo emaqenjini amakhulu kwi-internet, ukhombise ukufudumala, wathi:” Kuya ngokuthi ufuna umqeqeshi we-internet noma oneziqu. Ungayibulali ingane ingakazalwa. Ngicela ufike emuva kwezinyanga ezintathu uzobuza lokho.”Kusasa: Maritzburg United v Bloemfontein Celtic (Harry Gwala Stadium, 8pm); Ajax Cape Town v Platinum Stars (Cape Town Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Mamelodi Sundowns v Orlando Pirates (Loftus Versfeld Stadium, 3.30pm); Free State Stars v Cape Town City FC (Goble Park, 6pm);Kaizer Chiefs v Polokwane City (FNB Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Baroka FC v AmaZulu FC (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3.30pm); Golden Arrows v SuperSport United (Princess Magogo Stadium, 3.30pm); Chippa United v Bidvest Wits (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: Uphephile umsebenzi kaSteve: Bobby

text: IVELE enkantolo yemantshi izolo indoda eneminyaka ewu-38 okuthiwa idune imoto ethwala izidumbu emathuneni eTafuleni, eNanda, ngeSonto.Kuthiwa amadoda amabili akhombe umshayeli wemoto ethwala izidumbu phakathi emathuneni eqeda kushiya isidumbu.Eyodwa yawo ivele enkantolo kanti enye isathungathwa ngamaphoyisa.Kuthiwa aphoqe umshayeli ukuthi ashayele imoto abheke eVerulam ngaphambi kokuthi amlaxaze esigangeni.Amaphoyisa aseNanda abikelwe ngalokhu ase ehlala ezithendeni zawo amadoda.Kuthiwa abe esebelibangisa eTerrence Park, eVerulam. Kusolwa ukuthi lapho abeyohlangana nomuntu obezothatha umshini wokwehlisa ibhokisi.Abese eqalile ukwehlisa umshini emotweni ngesikhathi kutheleka amaphoyisaebopha indoda ebihleli emotweni eduniwe.Akwaziwa ukuthi ibikuphi indoda yesibili ngesikhathi kufika amaphoyisa. Itholakale nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nezimhlamvu.Ivele enkantolo izolo ngamacala amathathu ethweswe wona - elokutholakala nempahla entshontshiwe, isibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazwe, uCapt Nqobile Gwala, uthe idokodo elineminingwane yendoda eboshiwe belingakabuyi enkantolo kodwa kulindeleke ukuthi iphinde ivele enkantolo ngoMsombuluko.
title: Indoda enkantolo ngelokuduna imoto yezidumbu

text: SELUSEMOME ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 8. Lubukeka luza nezinselelo ezahlukene emaqenjini ezepolitiki athathwa ngokuthi makhulu KwaZulu-Natal. Kusukela kuleli sonto sizokwethulela amaqembu epolitiki esekwa kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal.Sizokuphakela izinto ezahlukene ngalelo qembu, siphinde sikhulume nabahlaziyi bepolitiki abazohlaziya ngeqembu okuzobe kukhulunywa ngalo. Kule ngosi sizophinde sibheke ukusebenza kwalawa maqembu kusukela okhethweni lukazwelonke lwango-2014, kuya okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2016.Kulokhu sibheka iDA okungelinye lamaqembu abhekwe ngabomvu ukuhola iKwaZulu-Natal uma liwina ukhetho.Sizobheka umqulu weDA wezethembiso zokhetho, ukuthi wona ubakhanga kangakanani abavoti ukuthi bangayivotela ngobuningi bayo okhethweni oluzayo.Ngokwezibalo, iDA yazama ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla ngo-2014 okhethweni lukazwelonke nakuba yagcina ithole u-12.76%, eKZN. Lapha kukhulunywa cishe ngamavoti abalelwa kwangu-489 430 okungabantu abayivotela ngo-2014. Ngokwabahlaziyi bezepolitiki, kubukeka kuzokuba nzima ukuthi iDA ithole abavoti abazoyivotela ngobuningi kulesi sifundazwe ngalolu khetho.UMnuz Thabani Khumalo ongumhlaziyi wezepolitiki, uthi isizathu esingaholela ekutheni iDA ingavotelwa ngobuningi KwaZulu-Natal, ukuthi yehlulekile ukuzibonakalisa ukuthi yimuphi umehluko yona engawenza emva kokuthi inikezwe ithuba lokuthi iphathe emadolobheni amakhulu okuyi Cape Town, Tshwane neGoli.UMHOLI weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango. Abahlaziyi bezepolitiki bathi abayiboni ithola amavoti iDA, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kulesi sifundazwe njengoba imele abamhlophe abahlala emadolobheniKuMasipala iNelson Mandela Bay, igcine ichithwe yi-UDM emva kombango wokungabethembi ubuholi bukaMnuz Atholl Trollip owayeyiMeya emele iDA kuwona.“Kuyimanje iDA ithwele nzima kakhulu ezindaweni ezisemakhaya,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe abantu abazovotela le nhlangano, abamhlophe njengokujwayelekile, nemithonseyana ethile yabamnyama.“Isazama ukuzakha, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni ezisemakhaya KwaZulu-Natal. Kodwa uma sekufanele iphumele obala ngezinye zezinto, iDA idla amazambane, ingazwakali ukuthi ithini,” kusho uKhumalo.Wenze isibonelo ngodaba lomhlaba, ukuthi iDA ayizwakali ukuthi ithini ngalo ngoba vele iyiqembu elimele ukuvikela izinhloso zabamhlophe nomhlaba abawuphethe. Uthe lokhu kubonakala ngokuthi uma kukhulunywa ngokunikezwa kwamathuba ngokulinganayo kwabantu abamnyama ezindaweni zemisebenzi, iDA iyaphikisana nalokho.Uthe into eyenza yesabe ukukhuluma ngezindaba zokubuyiswa komhlaba, ikakhulukazi emakhaya lapho engenabo khona abayesekayo, wukuthi inqena ukuziqhatha nabaholi bomdabu.“Le nhlangano intekenteke ngendlela yokuthi ayehlukene nomuntu oncelisa amawele. Ngakolunye uhlangangothi ivikela izinhloso zabamhlophe, iphinde yenze sengathi iyahambisana nabantu abamnyama kube kungenjalo,” kuchaza uKhumalo.UKhumalo akakuboni kungaba khona okuhlukile okuyisimanga okungenziwa yiDA kulolu khetho ngoba komasipala ebikade ibaphethe, awukho umehluko ewenzile.Nakumqulu wayo wokhetho, uthe ayizange ikhombise ukuthi iyinhlangano evuthiwe, kwazise inkulumo yomholi wayo, uMnz Mmusi Maimane, cishe yonke yayigxeka iqembu elibusayo.Uthe lokho kwayilahlekisela ngenqwaba yabavoti okwakulindeleke ukuthi izakhele bona.USolwazi Somadoda Fikeni ongumhlaziyi wezepolitiki, uthe iDA isalandelwa yiphunga lobandlululo, kwazise abantu abamnyama basayithatha njengeqembu labamhlophe.“Ibhekene namanye amaqembu anzima KwaZulu-Natal, okuyi-ANC, EFF ne-IFP. Kuphela iDA inabalandeli balabo abanemihlaba ebayivikelayo,” kusho uFikeni.UFikeni uthe inkinga yeDA KwaZulu-Natal, ayinabo abaholi abasezingeni elingagqugquzela abantu abaningi ukuthi bayivotele.“IDA nakhona kulesi sifundazwe ayihlukile ngoba iphikisana nomlando wokulwelwa kwenkululeko, ayihambisani nokunikezwa kwabantu abamnyama amathuba alinganayo,” kusho uFikeni.Wenze isibonelo ngezwe laseMalasiya ukuthi ngenkathi selakha kabusha umnotho walo, ababencishwe amathuba phambilini, banikezwa amathuba okuzithuthukisa ukuze balingane nabanye.Ubale abaholi besifazane abafana noNksz Lindiwe Mazibuko noNksz Mbali Ntuli, abavela kulesi sifundazwe, ukuthi abazange banikezwe ithuba lokuthi ikwazi ukungenisa ngabo ezindaweni zasemakhaya.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, kuleli sonto leli qembu liphinde lagqemeka enye ingozi engeqiwa ntwala kulandela ukushiywa kwalo elinye ilungu lalo eliqavile, uMnuz Sizwe Mchunu obeyilungu lesiShayamthetho elimele iDA KwaZulu-Natal.Ngenxa yalezi zimo ezenzeka kule nhlangano, abahlaziyi babikezele ikusasa layo elilufiliba eKZN ekutholeni amavoti angaliyisa phambili njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni.Njengamanye amaqembu ezepolitiki asewuthulile umhlahlandlela wawo wezethembiso zokhetho nayo iDA ithembisa lokhu okulandelayo kowayo:* Ukuvala igebe lokungalingani kwezomnotho kubantu abehlukene ezweni* Ukuletha izidingo zomphakathi kubo bonke abantu bakuleli ngendlela esheshayo nehlelekile* Izobeka phambili ukulwa nesihlavasenkohlakalo* Izokhulisa umnotho ngokudala amathuba emisebenzi, ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi imingcele yakuleli igadwe ngendlelaefanele* Izobeka abantu bakuleli phambili kukho konke ekwenzayo.NgokweDA, ifolosa ngoMnuz Zwakele Mncwango ongowokuzalwa KwaNongoma ozoba ngundunankulu uma kwenzeka inqoba iKwaZulu-Natal.UMncwango ngesikhathi esanda kukhethwa wathembisa ukuthi uzosebenza kanzima, ukuze ehlise ngo-50% ukwesekwa kwe-ANC. Njengamanje inezihlalo ezingu-10 eSishayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.Abaholi bayo KwaZulu-Natal bami kanje:Umholi wayo wuMncwango, iPhini lakhe uMergan Chetty, uSihlalo uFrancois Rodgers amaPhini uHlengiwe Shozi, Craig Millar noShehana Kajee.Abaholi abasesiShayamthetho nguMncwango ohola ithimba, uSotswebhu, uRodgers uHlanagani Gumbi uyiPhini likaSotswebhu. Inamalungu alinganiselwa ku-12 000 KwaZulu-Natal. Awukho umasipala ewuphethe kodwa inawo amakhansela ayimele komasipalaabathile.
title: I-DA ivikela izinhlelo zabamhlophe: ungoti

text: USOBISHINI owesifazane waseSobantu, eMgungundlovu, okweleta umasipala waseMsunduzi uR220 000 wezindleko zamanzi, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nokuqoqwa kukadoti. UMasipala uveze ukuthi le mali eyeminyaka engu-14 edlule.Umnikazi wendlu, uNksz Nomusa Ngcobo, uthe umndeni wakhe wathenga lo muzi ngo-1999 kodwa itayitela langabhaliswa ngaphansi kwegama lo muntu womndeni, okuyinto abebengayazi.UNksz Ngcobo uvumile ukuthi abakaze bakhokhe ngisho isenti selokhu baqala ukuhlala kule ndawo ngoba abakaze bathole incwadi ebayalela ukuthi bakhokhe. Uthe owayengumnikazi wendawo ubazise ngenyanga edlule sebehlelela ukubhalisa indlu ngaphansi kwabantu bomndeni.Umnikazi wendlu uNksz Nomusa Ngcobo uthe umndeni wakhe wathenga lo muzi ngo-1999"Ngiye kwamasipala ngafika ngatshelwa ukuthi lesi yisamba engisikweletayo samanzi, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nokuqoqwa kuka doti. Ngesikhathi sikhuluma nabo basazise ukuthi udaba seludluliselwe kubammeli. Uma bethi asiyikhokhe le mali angazi ukuthi sizokwenzenjani," kusho uNksz Ngcobo. Ikhansela lewadi uMnuz Sandile Dlamini uthe lo mndeni usumazisile ngalolu daba futhi uhlela ukuhlangana nabomkhandlu kuleli sonto. "Lesi samba angisiqondi ukuthi sivela kuphi ngoba awukho umuzi kuleli lokishi ongakweleta imali engaka, futhi sengiwubonile nomuzi okukhukunywa ngawo," kusho yena. Uthe ikhona neminye imizi kuleli lokishi ekweleta imali eqala kuR80 000 kuya kuR100 000."Kuyacaca ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle ngendlela okubalwa ngayo izindleko ngoba nami bake banginikeza isamba esingesona. Ngemuva kokuxhumana nabo babala kabusha kwavela isamba esiyiso," kusho yena. Uthe kuzobaluleka ukuthi ilungiswe indlela umkhandlu obala ngayo izindleko ezikweletwa abantu. Okhulumela umasipala uThobeka Mafumbatha uthe isamba esikweletwa yilo wesifazane siyiso. "Lesi samba esama-rates, ukuqoqwa kwendle kanye namanzi. Akukaze kukhokhelwe lokhu kusukela ngo-2004 futhi sinakho ubufakazi balokho.Ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi kulo muzi kuphezulu kakhulu," kusho uMafumbatha.
title: Usobishini okweleta umasipala uR220 000 ngendlu yodaka

text: EZIGENDELA ibhola ngaphandle kwenkundla eSpringbok, eNorthen Cape uRivaldo Coetzee ehamba neKakamas Sundowns ngo-2009, akekho owayecabanga ukuthi angadlondlobala ayodlala kwiBafana Bafana.Kodwa ngenxa yekhono lakhe omunye wabaqeqeshi baseSafa Transnet School of Excellence, ababeyohlwaya amakhono uMandla Mazibuko wakwazi ukumbona ukuthi unekhono maqede wangacucuza, wahambisa igama lakhe eqenjini lesizwe lika-Under 17 elaliqeqeshwa nguSolly Luvhengo.Kodwa muva nje kubukeka ikusasa lalo mdlali owaba ngukaputeni waMajimbosi, waqopha umlando edlala kwiBafana eneminyaka engu-17, libukeka lifithiza ngenxa yokungalulami selokhu efike kwiMamelodi Sundowns.Ngemuva kwezinyanga ezingaphezu kuka-12 lesi sitobha esithengwe yiSundowns ngezigidi, asikakhahleli ibhola ngenxa yokulimala okungajwayelekile.Noma kunjalo isekhona inhlansana yethemba lokuthi abalandeli bamaBrazilians bazombona maduze enkundleni.Lokhu kuvele engxoxweni yeSolezwe ngoMgqibelo noThulani Thuswa, osophikweni lwezokuxhumana kwiSundowns noMike Makaab wePro-Sport International eyengamele izindaba zikaCoetzee.“Eyokuthi useluleme ingacaciswa ngochwepheshe. Yibo abanganika umbiko okuyiwo ngoCoetzee kodwa okuthembisayo ukuthi uzobuya ngesizini ezayo, wukuthi useyakwazi ukuhamba kahle, uyaligqoka ikhokho agijime futhi uyashayela nje kahle,”kusho uThuswa.UMakaab obengesinye sezicukuthwane emcimbini wokwethulwa kuka-Amanda Dlamini ekubeni yinxusa elisha le-Laureus Sports Awards eMhlanga ngoLwesihlanu, uthe uzobuya noma kanjani uCoetzee kule sizini.“Isebucayana yona indaba yakhe ngoba iSundowns yanqaba ukuthi ahlinzwe. Bakhetha olunye uhlelo lokuthi elashwe. Kuyimanje useyaziqeqesha. Ukhona emalungiselelweni esizini ezayo sikhuluma nje. Okunye sesokushiya emthandazweni,” kusho uMakaab.ISundowns izobuyela enkundleni ngoJulayi 17 lapho izobhekana ne-AS Togo Port de Lomè yaseTogo.Umdlalo uzoba seLome ngo-4 ntambama.Uma ibuya lapho ngoJulayi 21, iSundowns izofika eNingizimu Afrika ilindelwe yiKaizer Chiefs abazodlala kwiShell Helix Ultra Cup, esanda kwethulwa.UCoetzee, ongene emlandweni ephula irekhodi lika-Aaron Mokoena lokudlalela iBafana Bafana esemncane, usephuthwe ngokuningi ngenxa yokulimala kwakhe okungajwayelekile.Nyakenye ubesengene kwezinoju esayiniswa ngelinye lamaqembu amakhulu ase-United Kingdom, iGlasgow Celtic yaseScotland.Bese kuqedwe konke neGlasgow kodwa umdlali waphoxeka imishini yochwepheshe baleli qembu sebethola ukulimala naye lo mdlali ayengakwazi.Yamyeka kanjalo iCeltic, ivika ngokuthi ifuna isitobha esizofika singene ensimini ngokushesha hhayi esisazonesa ukulimala.ISundowns nokho yaqoma ukumsayinisa ngoba ithi izokwazi ukumlinda aze alulame.Ngenyanga edlule umqeqeshi weSundowns, uPitso Mosimane, uke wacashunwa ebhoboka kweminye imithombo yezindaba ngosizi lukaCoetzee.UMosimane ukhale ngokuthi okwenza kube lukhuni ukululama kulo mdlali wukuthi igazi alifiki endaweni ethintekile onyaweni.Phambilini leli phephandaba lake labika ngokwabizwa ngesixwazi onyaweni lukaCoetzee, okuyiso esenza angalulami.
title: Ithemba ngokubuya ensimini kukaCoetzee ngesizini ezayo

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENII KAIZER Chiefs ayizihluphi ngokuphumela obala ngabadlali bayo abayisikhombisa abaphelelwa yizinkontileka ngoJuni okuyinto ebanika igunya lokukhuluma nanoma yimaphi amaqembu azimisele ngokubanika amakhaya amasha ngesizini ezayo.Kulaba badlali abayisikhombisa akabaliwe uLincoln Zvasiya obolekiswe yileli qembu ku-OFI Crete yaseGreece futhi akubukeki sengathi lizomlanda e-Europe lapho kubikwa khona ukuthi wenza kahle.Abakhona kulesi sibalo uTsepo Masilela, Josta Dladla, Willard Katsande, Siyabonga Nkosi, Keegan Ritchie, Lehlohonolo Majoro noKnowledge Musona.Eqinisweni bonke laba badlali bamqoka kuChiefs kwazise iya e-Afrika ngesizini ezayo ngakho-ke ukuthula kwayo kungase kuyifake enkingeni ngoba abanye babo bangalisebenzisa ithuba lokusayina izinkontileka zesikhashana ngokuvuleka kwewindi ngoJanuwari.Okhulumela iChiefs, uVina Maphosa, utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi ngisho ngabe ubekhona uBobby Motaung, oyimenenja kuMakhosi, bebengeke badalule izinhlelo zabo ngabadlali kwabezindaba.“Sibe nomhlangano ngodaba lwezinkontileka saphuma nesinqumo sokuthi akekho ozokhuluma nabezindaba mayelana nokuthinta le ndaba. Uma kukhona okwenzekayo sizokukhipha ku-website yethu njengoba sihlale senza,” kusho uMaphosa.UMusona, ongomunye wabagadli abamqoka, ubolekwe ku-1899 Hoffenheim yaseGermany kuze kube uJuni futhi kubukeka sengathi uzobuyela eqenjini lakhe ngaphandle uma iChiefs naleli qembu bevumelana ngokuhlukile.Nakuba uMasilela ebengomunye wabadlali abasize iChiefs yadla isicoco ngesizini edlule, ukuhlushwa kwakhe yidolo, afike nalo ephuma kuGetafe yaseSpain, kungambangela izinkinga kanti uDladla oneminyaka engu-34 ubukeka ephelelwa yisikhathi ebholeni elikhokhelayo.Akabukeki engaba nenkinga nokho uKatsande kwazise ubengomunye wabadlali beChiefs abasebenze kakhulu ekuwineni isicoco. Uma bengamdedela futhi ngabe bazidalela utalatiya ngoba umsebenzi wakhe uwenza kahle ukubedlula bonke kuleli qembu.Omunye obukeka esenkingeni wuNkosi oseneminyaka engu-31. Yize uNkosi engumdlali elaziwayo ikhono lakhe kodwa naye anganyundelwa yiminyaka kuChiefs. OlukaRitchie udaba nalo luthanda ukungamvuni kangako kwazise kusukela efikile kuleli qembu usahluleka ukulenza elakhe ijezi bese kuba uMajoro, okuthusayo-ke nokho ukuthi naye ungomunye wabadlali abangase bayishiye iChiefs. Ubengumshayimagoli ovelele kuChiefs ngaphambi kokufika kukaStuart Baxter omsebenzisa uma kuvela ithuba.
title: I-Chiefs ayithi vu|ngabadlali bayo

text: AYIZIBONI iqoma umahlalela intandokazi umrepha wesifazane osezakhele udumo endimeni yomculo ngenxa yamadoda  ayizehluleki nafuna ukunakekelwa abesifazane. UNadia Nakai usho kanje kwingxoxo ebenayo ku-Instagram nomrepha wakuleli uSlikour. UNadia njengame uveze ukuthi usahleli ngentombi akanasoka futhi akekho nomuntu ambona efanelwe ukuba yisoka lakhe ngenxa yezizathu eziningi ngabesilisa.Lo mrepha uthe into emcoba kakhulu ngabesilisa bakuleli ukuthi iningi labo libukeka lingazazi ukuthi lifunani futhi lifuna ukwenzelwa konke abesifazane. UNadia uthe kwala ngisho isoka lithola intombi engafune kwenzelwa nezizamelayo kodwa lijike libe nezindlela ezibheke eceleni nezona ubudlelwane."Engifuna ukwazi ukuthi angikafuni ukuba kwezobudlelwane okwamanje ngisabheke impilo yami," kusho uNadia. Eqhuba uthe inkinga enkulu ngabesilisa ukuthi iningi labo selincike kwabesifazane kakhulu lifuna ukwenzelwa yibo. Uma kungenjalo bagcwala amanzi emadolweni uma bebona abesifazane abaphumelele.Eqhuba uNadia wenza isibonelo ngenqwaba yesifazane abangosaziwayo abangaqomile ngenxa yabesilisa abangaqondile. UNadia uthe baningi abantu besifazane abanothando, abathembekile, abasebenza kanzima, abanezinto zabo nabangafune kondliwa amadoda kodwa yize kunjalo abesilisa balokhu beyizehluleki.
title: Umrepha uchaza ngokumenza akhethe ukungaqomi njengamanje

text: ZIVELE enkantolo izolo izithandani ezibanjwe nensangu eWinterton ngoMgqibelo. Lezi zithandani ezineminyaka engu-39 no-42 ziboshwe ngesikhathi amaphoyisa esesha imoto yazo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe emotweni yalezi zithandani kutholakale amasaka okufaka udoti ebhuthini anensangu.“Insangu etholakele ibinesisindo sika-56kg engabiza uR210 000. Abasolwa babhekene namacala okutholakala nensangu,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Abasolwa bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eWinterton izolo okushaye isikhathi sokuloba ingakatholakali eminye imininingwane yecala.
title: Zivele enkantolo izithandani ezibanjwe nensangu engabiza uR210 000

text: MHLELI: KwiSolezwe langoMsombuluko Juni 25 ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi: Uhlelo lokutakula imilutha eThekwini, ngithi ake ngibeke owami umbono ngalolu daba.Izwe lakithi liphansi kwenkulu ingcindezi yobugebengu obudlange iNingizimu Afrika yonkana. Manje ukugijimisa izigebengu kukhona umuntu olala phandle ongaziwa ukuthi uziphilisa ngani, ngibona sengathi ukunyanyalata lokho ekukhucululeni ubugebengu.Uhlelo lweMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, lokuthi lwenabele kuwona wonke ama-ward uhlelo lokuqoqa imilutha yezidakamizwa eyaziwa ngamaphara, inikwe amakhono kuze igcine iyeke izidakamizwa. Lokhu kuzokhulisa umnotho wezwe kunciphise ubugebengu.Sengathi lungaba yimpumelelo lolu hlelo nomphakathi ulekelele kusizwe laba bantu.Sphamandla MagwazaeShowe
title: [IMIBONO] Sengathi lungaba yimpumelelo uhlelo lwemilutha eThekwini

text: OYIMBONGI kaKhuzani neNdidane, uMP Mkhize Da Bee noswenka owumkhaya weGcokama Elisha, uBongani Gumede, sebethuka izanya kulandela ukuthola izinsongo zokubulawa ngemuva kokuvela kwekhava yeCD ebhalwe ukuthi Ichalaha Elisha feat. MP Mkhize Da Bee.Lo mbhalo ucasule ngisho nabasakazi boKhozi FM, uKhathide ‘MC Tshatha’ Ngobe nozakwabo uZimiphi ‘Zimdollar’ Biyela, abaze baphawula kuFacebook nakuSigiya Ngengoma ngenxa yokunengeka.Leli phephandaba lizibonele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ikakhulukazi ekhasini likaFacebook elibizwa ngaBathandi Bakamaskandi, lapho abalandeli bezihlabani zalo mculo besina bededelana, begxeka uBongani noMP Mkhize Da Bee.Kuhluleke ngisho laba beziqhelanisa nale khava kodwa kwakhona abathi kufanele babulawe.UMP Mkhize Da Bee, owagxekwa ngokwenza inkondlo ayevalelisa ngayo kuMjik’jelwa engakangcwantshwa, uthe le nto imphethe kabi ngoba ubhecwa ngobende inyama engayidlile.“Akukho ngoma engiyenze nomuntu ozibiza ngeChalaha Elisha. Angimazi nalo muntu okuthiwa ngenze ingoma naye. Sekuzothiwa ngangizenzisa ngesikhathi ngenza leya ngoma,” kusho uMP Mkhize Da Bee oze wakhombisa leli phephandaba imiyalezo athunyelelwa yona nangoWhatsApp.NoBongani uziqhelanisile naleli gama leChalaha Elisha kodwa kunesigangi esidokotele isithombe sakhe ngenxa yokuthi uvamise ukufaka izithombe zakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Ezinsukwini ezedlule ngithole i-inbox ngiqeda ukufaka isithombe lesi esibhalwe Ichalaha Elisha.Leyo-inbox ibivela komunye umngani ethi ubona isithombe sami ekhasini likaFacebook. Ngibe sengithi akunankinga ngoba abantu bajwayele ukuthatha izithombe zami, bazenze ama-profile pic ngenxa yokotini. Kuthe ngakusasa ngathola uWhatsApp uphuma komunye umngani wami, ebuza ukuthi kanti kwenzenjani nakhu ebona isithombe sami sesigcwele kuFacebook, sengiyacula yini?”UBongani uthi kuhambe isikhathi wabona sekunezingcingo nemiyalezo emsabisayo, kwahluleka ngisho esecela nokuthi kungenelele nabanye abaculi kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.“Mina angisiye umculi, ngizazela khona ukuswenka nje. Abanye bathi ngingazibiza ngeChalaha Elisha ngoba nomkhaya wami uMthandeni Manqele wazibiza ngeGcokama Elisha. Mina angifuni ukungena emculweni kodwa ngizifunela ukuba yinxusa lezimpahla zokugqoka.”Uthe uze wazama nokuxhumana noKhuzani ngoba efuna amxhumanise noZimdollar ukuze amnikeze ithuba lokucacisa emoyeni ngoba akasabuthiquthu ubuthongo futhi useyasaba nokuhamba emgwaqweni.
title: Basatshiswa ngokubulawa abamasikandi

text: ABAFUNDI bakaGrade 12 bazolulekwa bukhoma ngosaziwayo kwithelevishini njengoba izolo kuleli beqale ukubhala izivivinyo zokugcina kulo nyaka.Isiteshi sakwaSABC1, sizosiza abafundi ngolwazi lwezifundo abebezenza njengoba sizosakaza bukhoma uhlelo lwezemfundo iGeleza Nathi ngokubambisana noMnyango weMfundo eyiSisekelo kuzwelonke.Uhlelo luzohlomisa ngezifundo ezahlukene. Luzongena ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu ngo-5 ekuseni, luphele ngo-6 ekuseni.Luqale izolo luzophela ngoNovemba 30, sekuqedwe ukubhala. Kosaziwayo abazobonakala futhi bekhuthaza abafundi kukhona intokazi eyake yethula uhlelo iYo-tv, uHulisani Ravele, uDJ * -Ayanda MVP, umsakazi uMasechaba Ndlovu noMelody Miya.Obhekele izinhlelo kwaSABC, uSanelisiwe Zondi uthe babone ukuthi bafake isandla lapho kudingeka khona.“Othisha abazobonakala bazobe bethinta lapha nalaphaya ezifundweni ezingu-9 esizozikhombisa ohlelweni. Kuzobonakala othisha abazobe bebheka izifundo, okukhona kuzo iMathematics, Physical Sciences, English, Life Sciences, History, Geography, Business Studies, Economics ne-Accounting,” kuchaza uSanelisiwe.Uthe wothisha abaqeqeshwe kakhulu abazobonakala ohlelweni, bazobheka emaphepheni abafundi abawabhala phakathi nonyaka.“Bazobheka lawo maphepha, banikeze izimpendulo ezizosiza kakhulu abafundi abenza leso sifundo. Nabo abafundi bazothola ithuba lokubuza imibuzo ehlukene, babheke izimpendulo emakhasini ahlukene ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Kuzoba khona nenamba lapho bezobona khona konke abakufunayo kuWhatsApp,” kuchaza uSanelisiwe.Uthe kuzoba khona nentsha ezothula uhlelo okukhona kuyo uSiyabonga Gwala, Destiny Toli noCaddy.
title: Osaziwayo bazosiza abaka-matric kwiTV

text: I-IFP ifuna zonke izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika zifunde mahhala kusukela enkulisa, kuya ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.Umholi we-IFP, uMntwana uMangosuthu Buthelezi, uthe imfundo ibalulekile yingakho iseqhulwini likasomqulu wokhetho we-IFP.Kwezemfundo, uButhelezi uthe, bafuna ukuhlola izikole zasemakhaya nezasemalokishini ezazivaliwe ngenxa yokuba nabafundi abancane nokungenzi kahle.Uthe bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abafundi banezimoto ezibahambisa esikoleni zamahhala, kube nohlelo lokudla kuzo zonke izikole zikahulumeni.UButhelezi ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula usomqulu wokhetho we-IFP ngeSonto, eChatsworth Stadium, uthe ufuna kube nezinhlelo zokunakekela imvelo kube nezinkantolo eziyisipesheli zokushushiswa kwababulala obhejane nezinye izilwane zasendle.I-IFP izophinde isungule izinkantolo eziyisipesheli ezizolwa nenkohlakalo futhi ifuna abaholi bomdabu banikwe amandla okuxazulula amacala athile.UButhelezi ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bavotele i-IFP ngoba izokhipha amaqakelo amahhala azotholwa yizo zonke izingane ezimpofu kuzo zonke izifundazwe.Uthe banazo izinhlelo zokuthuthukisa umnotho, abale kuzo ukusungulwa kwebhange likahulumeni nomnyango wabantu abasha nowokudala amathuba omsebenzi.UButhelezi uthe kufanele kufundwe ezolimo nesayensi ezikoleni, kwakhiwe izindlu eziyizitezi ukubhekana nodaba lokusweleka komhlaba wokwakha.Ugqugquzele uhulumeni ukuthi alungise izinhlelo zokubuyiswa komhlaba ukuze ababedlelwe umhlaba bakwazi ukufaka izicelo ezintsha.Uma uhulumeni ethatha umhlaba wabantu, uButhelezi uthe kufanele banxeshezelwe.Kwezenhlalakahle i-IFP ifuna kube nosonhlalakahle oyedwa kwi-ward ngayinye kamasipala.I-IFP ifuna kusekwe izinhlangano ezisiza umphakathi ukuze zilekelele uhulumeni, kuliwe nenkinga yobugebengu, kwandiswe izikhungo ezilapha abanenkinga yezidakamizwa kunyuswe nempesheniyabadala.Osonkontileka abakha izindlu ezingekho sezingeni i-IFP ifuna bajeziswe, kuliwe nenkohlakalo yabantu abasohlwini lokwakhelwa izindlu nguhulumeni, kuvulelwe intsha nabesifazane amathuba ebhizinisi emkhakheni wezokwakha.
title: Imfundo yamahhala kusukela enkulisa iseqhulwini kwi-IFP

text: UYASHUBA umkhankaso wokuhudula izinyawo wamaphoyisa asebenza eziteshini akhala ngokushaywa ngesithende uma kunyuswa izikhundla njengoba izolo kade ehlangene ezindaweni ezahlukene ezweni lonke ebhunga ngamasu okulwa impi yawo.Amaphoyisa abalelwa ngaphezu kuka-300 asebenza eziteshini ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal, iningi lawo ebelifake izincwadi zokugula, abehlangene epaki iGugu Dlamini eThekwini lapho efunge agomela ukuthi azolwa kuze kufike ekugcineni.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Bheki Cele yena ubehlangene nosigaxamabhande bamaphoyisa izolo bebhunga ngalo udaba lokuhudula izinyawo kwamaphoyisa asebenza eziteshini.Ukuhudula izinyawo kwalawa maphoyisa sekuqala ukuzwela njengoba kukhalwa ngokuthi afika sekwedlule isikhathi eside ezindaweni zezigameko uma ebiziwe.Isisusa somsindo yindaba yezikhundla.Amaphoyisa asebenza eziteshini akhala ngokuthi ashaywa ngesithende uma kunyuswa izikhundla, kukhushulwa lawo okuthiwa asebenza ezinhlakeni eziyisipesheli okubalwa kuzo ithimba lamabharethi nelezokuvikela.Akhala ngokuthi kunamaphoyisa angene embuthweni ngo-2016 kodwa manje asengo-warrant officer ngoba esebenza kulawa mathimba okuthiwa abalulekile. Amaphoyisa asebenza eziteshini athi amanye awo asesebenze iminyaka engu-12 kodwa asengo-constable okuyisigaba sokuqala emaphoyiseni.Umkhankaso wayizolo ubusezweni njengoba bewukhona eWestern Cape, Gauteng naseKZN.Umgqugquzeli wenyunyana entsha yamaphoyisa ebihlele umhlangano waseThekwini, iSouth African Police and Allied Workers Union (Sapawu) KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Lie Mchunu, uthe bagcine benqume ukungayi ekomkhulu labo ngoba vele umuntu abebefuna amukele uhlu lwezikhalo zabo uKhomishana wesiFundazwe, uLt General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi ubengekho.“Bekungeke kusisize ukuthi siye ekomkhulu lethu ngoba uLt General Mkhwanazi ubengekho njengoba bebebiziwe wuCele nezinye izikhulu ezweni lonke beyokhuluma ngayo indaba yethu,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe bona abanankinga nozakwabo abasebenza kwamanye amathimba kodwa into abayifunayo ukuthi kulinganwe phambi kwamehlo omqashi.“Into esicikile iyona indaba yokushaywa ngesithende uma kunezinhlelo zokunyuswa kwezikhundla kwabe sekuvela nezinye izikhalo ebezivele zikhona,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe abayithandi indaba yokuphathwa ngendlela engalingani ngoba ibahlukanisa phakathi.“Sonke senza umsebenzi obalulekile akufanele kube ngathi kukhona abangcono kunabanye,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe bazolwa kuze kufike ekugcineni ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi umqashi uyahlangabezana nezimfuno zabo.UCele izolo ukhiphe isitatimende enxusa amaphoyisa angekho emsebenzini ukuthi abuyele khona ngokushesha.Uthe akukho emthethweni ukuthi amaphoyisa ateleke.“Siyazi ukuthi kumamaphoyisa abalelwa ngaphezu kuka-400 abhikishayo, siyazi futhi ukuthi amanye wawo afake izincwadi zokuthi ayagula ukuze angezi emsebenzini namhlanje (izolo),” kusho uCele.Uthe usecele uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi, ukuthi angenelele. Wexwayise nodokotela ukuthi abayeke ukukhipha izincwadi zokugula ngaphandle kwezizathu.
title: Uyaqina umkhankaso wokuhudula izinyawo wamaphoyisa

text: ANGASE abe noKhisimusi omuncu amalungu eNational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa) osekuphele inyanga namasonto amabili etelekile embonini yeplastiki.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi isiteleka sabasebenzi bemboni yeplastiki esaqala ngo-Okthoba sisaqhubeka futhi izingxoxo phakathi kwabaqashi neNumsa zigcine emasontweni amabili adlule.Abasebenzi bemboni yeplastiki baqale ukuteleka maphakathi no-Okthoba bekhala ngokwehliselwa iholo labo lisuka kuR40 liya kuR20 ngehora.Bebekhala nangokuphucwa imihlomulo etholwa ngozakwabo abasebenza ngokusansimbi, ababale kukho ukukhokhelwa uma beya ekhefini nokufakwa esikhwameni sempesheni.UNkk Phakamile Hlubi-Majola, obhekele ezokuxhumana kwiNumsa, uthe okwamanje abaqashi abakazilaleli izimfuno zabasebenzi ngakho isiteleka siyaqhubeka.“Sisaqhubeka isiteleka futhi silinde abaqashi ukuthi balalele izimfuno zabasebenzi. Okwamanje asazi ukuthi izingxoxo ezilandelayo zizoba nini. Abasebenzi baziphethe kahle, bayaqhinqa ngokuthula njengoba bedinga imihlomulo,” kusho uNkk Hlubi-Majola.Phambilini abaqashi bebekhala ngamalungu eNumsa okuthiwa ahlasela abasebenzi abangatelekile futhi alimaza ingqalasizinda.UNkk Hlubi-Majola uthe akuwona amalungu abo alimaza abangatelekile ngoba amalungu abo ayaqhinqa futhi awahlaseli muntu.UMnuz Jaco Swart, weNational Employers Association of South Africa (Neasa), uthe abaqashi bebenezingxoxo neNumsa ngoNovemba 20 kodwa zafinyelela kwangqingetshe.“INumsa isinqabile isiphakamiso sabaqashi ngakho isiteleka sisaqhubeka.Sithole imibiko yokuthi kunabasebenzi abafuna ukubuyela emsebenzini kodwa abanikazi bamafemu abakwazi ukuvele bathathe abasebenzi ngenxa yokuthi wudaba oluphethwe kuzwelonke lolu. Uma abaqashi befuna ukubuyisela abasebenzi emsebenzini kufanele bathinte ubuholi beNeasa esifundeni sabo,” kusho uSwart.
title: UKhisimusi omuncu kwabeNumsa

text: KUVELE ukuthi abasebenzi bakwa-Eskom babesaba ukuphumela obala ngokuphulwa ngemigomo yokuthengwa kwempahla ngesikhathi i-Eskom isayina isivumelwano sikaR25 billion nenkampani yaseChina iHuarong Energy Africa.IKhomishini yeJaji uRaymond Zondo itshelwe lezi zindaba wuMnuz Sincedile Shweni osebenza eMnyangweni wezeziMali.Uthe abasebenzi ababesezikhundleni eziphezulu basho ukuthi bayabona ukuthi kunemithetho ephulwayo kodwa basaba ukuphawula ngoba besaba loyo owayeyisikhulu sezimali e-Eskom.Uveze ukuthi i-Eskom yaqoka ukusebenzisana neHuarong lungakaphothulwa uhlelo lokubhidela imisebenzi njengoba kuwumgomo woMnyango wezeziMali.UShweni uthe imigomo yoMnyango wezeziMali uthi ngaphambi kokuqoka inkampani ozosebenzisana nayo kufanele ubheke ukuthi ayikho enye inkampani eyenza umsebenzi ofanayo, bese uqhathanisa.Uthe owayeyisikhulu sezimali e-Eskom, uMnuz Anoj Singh, wasayina isivumelwano neHuarong yize inkampani yabameli iWhite & Case yayimxwayisile ngalokhu, kwazise kwakunemali yokuzibophezela ewuR400 milion eyayizokhokhwa yiHuarong.Isivumelwano seHuarong ne-Eskom saqala ukuba sematheni ngesikhathi owayeyisikhulu sase-Eskom uMnuz Sean Maritz esolwa ngokugwazelwa ngoR400 million owawuvela kwi-akhawunti yaseHong Kong.UMaritz wamiswa emsebenzini ngoJanuwari wonyaka odlule wasula emsebenzini emuva kwenyanga. Lolu daba luphenywa woKlebe.Khonamanjalo, uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthe uzobathathela izinyathelo zomthetho abathinteka emacaleni okudla imali kahulumeni uma iKhomishini kaZondo isiqede umsebenzi wayo.
title: Sasisatshwa isikhulu sezimali e-Eskom

text: LIMISIWE okwesikhashana icala lomfundi (15) osolwa ngokugwaza abulale omunye umfundi esikoleni njengoba kusalindwe ukuphothulwa kophenyo. Lomfundi ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseSebokeng ngoLwesibili njengoba icala lakhe belivezwa esibukweni kwazise useneminyaka emincane. Umsolwa uboshwe ngoMsombuluko emuva kokusolwa ngokugwaza abulale uzakwabo uTshepo Mphehlo (14) ngesikele esifubeni, okuyisigameko esenzeke eThuto-Tiro Comprehensive School ngoMsombuluko. UMphehlo ushonele esikoleni kanti kubikwa ukuthi ubengumngani omkhulu kumsolwa. Imbangela yengxabano phakathi kwalaba bafundi ayikaziwa. Okhulumela amaphoyisa eSebokeng uCaptain Fikile Funda uthe ngenkathi umsolwa evela enkantolo ngoLwesibili, icala lbe selimiswa okwesikhashana njengoba kusalindwe ukuphothulwa kophenyo. “Yize kunjalo, idokodo lizobuyiselwa enkantolo futhi nomsolwa uzobizwa ukuzovela enkantolo ukuze azobhekana necala lokubulala,” kusho uFunda. Ekhuluma nephephandaba iThe Star ngoMsombuluko, obefunda nomufi ekilasini uthe ubezitshela ukuthi umufi nomsolwa bayazidlalela, kodwa abafundi baqale ukunaka ngenkathi bebona umufi esephuma igazi. “Simphuthumise egumbini labantu abagulayo. Ngenkathi esembhedeni ubehluleka ukuphefumula. Amehlo akhe abevuleke kakhulu, ulimi belugoqana wabe esephefumula kakhulu okokugcina,” kuchaza umfundi. UMqondisi wesifunda iSedibeng West uMnuz Victor Thetha uthe ngesikhathi kufika abosizo oluphuthumayo esikoleni, ithimba lezokwelapha beseliqinisekisile ukuthi umfundi useshonile.
title: Limisiwe icala lomfundi ogwaze wabulala uzakwabo ngesikele esikoleni

text: Phili MjoliISOUTH African Social Security Agency (Sassa) iyawavala amakhadi okuhola impesheni.ISassa ithe abenza izicelo zempesheni nezibonelelo kusukela kule nyanga sebezohola emabhange, abebehola ngamakhadi bazoshintshela emabhange ngoMashi ngonyaka ozayo.UNksz Sandy Godlwana, imenenja yezokuxhumana eSassa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe ukutholakala kwabantu benamakhadi amaningi abahola ngawo impesheni kungafanele yikho okwenze iBhange loMbuso lithathe isinqumo sokuthi amakhadi avalwe.Uthe abafaka izicelo zokuhola impesheni yabo kusukela kule nyanga, bazoyihola emabhange. Uma bengenawo amakhadi bazocelwa ukuthi bawathathe ukuze impesheni ifakwe kuwo.“Abanamakhadi aseSassa abahola ngawo bangatatazeli, asasebenza basazokwazi ukuhola ngawo ezikhungweni noma ezitolo njengoba kade kwenzeka kodwa abenza izicelo ezintsha bona ngeke besawathola lawo makhadi sebezohola ebhange. Kuzobe kwenziwa uhlelo lokuthi amakhadi akhona njengamanje ashintshwe okulindeleke ukuthi kwenziwe ngoMashi ngonyaka ozayo.”Uthe amakhadi azoshintshwa awaseSassa nawaseposini.
title: Amakhadi aseSassa azoqedwa

text: AKAKUTHATHI njengegxathu elibuyela emuva ukuba wumdlali weRichards Bay FC edlala kwiNational First Division (NFD), uThamsanqa Sangweni, osayine eqenjini emasontweni ambalwa edlule.USangweni uthe akukona ukubuyela emuva ukudlala kwiNFD ngoba ebholeni kungenzeka noma yini. Ngokusho kukaSangweni, osedlalele iMamelodi Sundowns, Orlando Pirates, AmaZulu FC neChippa United, angabuyela ngesizini ezayo kwi-Absa Premiership ngokukhuphula iBay.IBay isethubeni elihle lokungena kweyokuhlungela iPremiership njengoba isendaweni yesihlanu kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-39 emidlalweni ewu-25.Emidlalweni emihlanu esalele iBay, emithathu izoyidlalela ekhaya. USangweni uthe okubalulekile njengamanje wukuthi asize ezakhe zithole indawo kweyokuhlunga ngoba ubona likhona ithuba lokuthi zingakhuphukela kwiPremiership.“Ukuza kwami lapha kwiBay angikuboni njengokubuyela emuva. Ebholeni kungenzeka noma yini, angikuboni okungavimba ukuthi singene kweyokuhlunga, sikhuphukele phezulu. Sengidlalele amaqembu amaningi futhi ahlonishwayo. Engikufundile wukuthi kufanele emhlabeni ulinde ithuba lakho, bese uyalisebenzisa uma lifika,” kusho uSangweni ongafunanga ukukhuluma ngokuziqeqesha kwakhe neMaritzburg United okwaphetha ngokuthi angasayiniswa.USangweni, odabuka eDondotha, ngakhona eRichards Bay, uthe uyakuthokozela ukwesekwa ngabantu bangakubo.“Bakhombisa ukungeseka kakhulu abantu bangakithi, ngiyabonga kakhulu kubona. Bekungumdlalo wami wesibili lona (neJomo Cosmos) ebengiwudlala futhi nginethemba lokuthi kule midlalo emihlanu esisalele sizokwenza kahle, sithole nendawo kweyokuhlungela ukukhuphukela kwiPremiership. Kungiqinisa idolo ukwazi ukuthi abalandeli bayangithanda, neqembu bayaleseka. Kuningi okuyizingqinamba esengibhekane nakho empilweni kodwa ngifisa ukubonga usihlalo weBay ngokunginika ithuba lokudlala ibhola futhi,” kusho uSangweni.
title: ‘Akukona ukubuyela emuva ukudlala kwiNFD'

text: ZIDLULE nemiphefumulo yabantu abathathu izingozi zomgwaqo ezenzeke ngoMgqibelo eVerulam, enyakatho neTheku. Kushone umshayeli kwalimala abagibeli ababili ngesikhathi kugingqika imoto abebehamba ngayo emgwaqweni uR102 eVerulam ngoMqgibelo ebusuku.Ngokwesitatimende seRusa, abosizo oluphuthumayo bafice imoto i-Opel Corsa igingqikile yalala ngohlangothi emgwaqweni.“Umshayeli wemoto ubelimele kakhulu. Abosizo oluphuthumayo bazame ukumxilonga kodwa bahluleka, ube eseshonela endaweni yesehlo. Umgibeli obehleli ngaphambili ulimale kakhulu kwadingeka ukuthi akhishwe abosizo oluphuthumayo kule moto, umgibeli wesibili naye ulimalile kodwa ukwazile ukuphuma emotweni.”Kwesinye isehlo ngosuku olufanayo, kushone umshayeli ngenkathi kugingqika iveni abehamba ngalo khona emgwaqweni uR102.NgokwabeRusa, abosizo oluphuthumayo baphuthume endaweni yesehlo ngemuva kokubikelwa ngale ngozi eyenzeke ngemuva kwehora leshumi nanye emini.“Abosizo oluphuthumayo bafice iveni ligingqikile lalala emgwaqweni. Umshayeli ubelimele kanzima kanti ushonele endaweni yesigameko. Abazibonele kwenzeka le ngozi bathe umshayeli uhluleke ukulawula imoto ephaphalaze yase yagingqika.”Kwesinye isehlo esenzeke kulo mgwaqo emva kwehora leshumi ekuseni kushone owesifazane oyedwa omunye walimala kanzima ngenkathi bechithwa imoto abebehamba ngayo iToyota Corrola.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa aphenya amacala okubulala ngokungenhloso ngalezi zingozi zontathu.
title: Zidlule nabashayeli izingozi ezehlukene KwaZulu-Natal

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wamaphoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele uthe ufuna ukuphikisana nombiko woMvikeli woMphakathi u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane wokuthi kumele banikwe abavikeli ababhoboza ithumba ngenkohlakalo yokwakhiwa kwehholo laseMzimkhulu okwagcina ngokuthi kubulawe owayeyikhansela kulo mkhandlu uMnuz Sindiso Magaqa.Okhulumela uCele, uNksz Reneilwe Serero, uthe bawutholile umbiko ongakakhishelwa umphakathi.Kulo mbiko onamakhasi angu-47 u-Advocate Mkhwebane uthole ukuthi ukufeyila kukaCele namaphoyisa ukuhlinzeka ngabaqaphi uMnuz Thabiso Zulu noMnuz Les Stuta kubabeke engozini yokuthi basocongwe.Kulo mbiko uthe kumele uCele ahlinzeke uZulu noStuta ngabaqaphi abazokhokhelwa wumbuso.UZulu noStuta batshela abazili emngcwabeni kaMagaqa ngoSepthemba nyakenye ukuthi wabulawelwa ukuveza inkohlakalo ngokwakhiwa kwehholo iMemorial, eMzimkhulu.Selokhu baveza lokhu babhekene nokusatshiswa, baya emaphoyiseni bayiswa le nale ngodaba lokuvikelwa kwabo baze baya ku-Advocate Mkhwebane.U-Advocate Mkhwebane uveze ukuthi kwahlolwa ukuthi ngabe laba bayakudinga ukuvikelwa ngo-Ephreli nonyaka kwatholakala ukuthi bakudinga ngokushesha.UNksz Serero uthe uCele uyalele amaphoyisa ukuthi awubheke lo mbiko ukuze bawuphikise.UZulu uthe benoStuta bakhathazekile ngokuthi basengozini.“Amaphoyisa kumele alandele isinqumo soMvikeli woMphakathi ngaphandle uma sibekwe eceleni yinkantolo. UCele ungumholi wami, ngiyamhlonipha angifuni kubukeke sengathi lento iphakathi kwami naye. Ngaphambi kokuba abe nguNgqongqoshe ngingomunye wabantu ababefuna ukuthi abuyele kulesi sikhundla ngoba ngiwazi amagalelo akhe ekulweni nobugebengu,” kusho uZulu.
title: UCele ufuna ukuphikisana nombiko kaMkhwebane

text: UHLUKENE phakathi umkhandlu ovikela ukuhlukunyezwa kwabakhonza kwaShembe, iNazareth Judiciary Council (NJC) ngodaba lobutabane.Kuthiwa kuneqeqebana elihlubuke kulo mkhandlu ngoba likholwa ukuthi amalungelo ezitabane awabhekelelwa ngendlela.UMnuz Sibusiso Dlamini obeyilungu leNJC, usehlubukile uvule umkhandlu athi uvikela amaNazaretha abandlululekile ngenxa yemigomo yaleli bandla elandelwa yiNJC, uma icubungula izikhalo. Phakathi kwabantu athi babandlululekile ngamaNazaretha athandana nabobulili obufanayo, abhemayo naphuza utshwala.Kuthiwa okudale uqhekeko kulo mkhandlu ukuthi leli qeqebana elisanda kusungula owalo umkhandlu, belibonga okhulekile ngokumqabula ngemuva komkhuleko Umkhandlu omdala umi ekutheni lokhu kuphambene nenqubo yebandla. Yaluthatha lolu daba yaluyisa kwiKhomishini iyofuna iseluleko sokuthi kumele yenzenjani ngoba kuleli bandla akuvumelekile ukuthi umuntu athandane nomuntu onobulili obufana nobakhe, ingasaphathwa eyokuya ocansini naye endaweni engcwele.UNkk Thoko Mkhwanazi-Xaluva usihlalo wale khomishini, waweluleka umkhandlu ukuthi ugqugquzele ibandla ukuthi libe nemigomo ebhaliwe okumele ilandelwe ngabahambela entabeni.“Imigomo ekhona ngokubona kwethu iyabandlulula igcizelela ukuthi izitabane azifuneki ebandleni, akuphuzwa akubhenywa. Thina siyazi ukuthi baningi abantu abangamaNazaretha abakwenzayo konke lokhu. Uma kufika izikhalo zabantu abangamaNazaretha abayizitabane bekubanzima kwiNJC ukuthi izixazulule izinkinga zabo ngoba bakholwa ukuthi umuntu oyisitabane ungenwe yidimoni. Sibone kufanele kuhlukane inhloko nesixhanti ngoFebhuwari, ngemuva kokuthi kunabantu abashaywa ngoba beyizitabane. Izinkinga zizoxazululwa yithi, kuhlanganisa nezabaphuzayo nababhemayo ngoba sikholwa ukuthi nabo bakhishwe inyumbazana,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe okwamanje umkhandlu wabo awukabi nalo igama kodwa unamahhovisi eJozini naseHluhluwe.UMnuz Willington Myeni usihlalo weNJC, okhonza ohlangothini lwaseBuhleni ukuvumile ukuthi kuhlukane inhloko nesixhanti emkhandlwini, wathi lokhu kwenziwe ngokuvumelana futhi akekho oshayiwe.“Kuhlalukile ukuthi ngeke sisebenze ndawonye, amaNazaretha awabhemi, awaphuzi futhi awathandani nanobulili," kusho yena.UMfundisi Joseph Mhlongo waseGinyezinye uthe kuyaxaka ukuthi kube namaNazaretha ayizitabane athi alwela amalungelo ebandleni.“INkosi eseyakhothama, Ilanga, yakubeka kwacaca ukuthi ayizihlanganisi nabantu abanomoya wobutabane. Ngama-60’s wazixosha izitabane ebandleni.”UMnuz Nkululeko Mthethwa waseThembezinhle uthe ngeke aphawule ngalo mkhandlu ngoba bona abawusebenzisi, uma behlukumezeka basebenzisa abameli.UMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe waseBuhleni uthe uzwile ukuthi umkhandlu uhlukene phakathi ngenxa yobutabane, wathi ngeke aphawule ngalolu daba ngoba akakholwa ukuthi kukhona abantu abangamaNazaretha abangathi balwela amalungelo okuphuza , ukubhema nokuthandana nababobulili obufana nobabo. Lokho akuvumelekile ebandleni.UMnuz Thabo Sambothi onguNobhala eNazareth Church of God , uthe ubengazi ukuthi uDlamini usehlubukile emkhandlwini kodwa uyazi ukuthi uyisitabane.
title: Uvikela amaNazaretha acwaswayo ohlubukile

text: UZOLIBHEKISA  kwelaseManila, ePhilippines uzime wakuleli osaphethe isicoco sokuba uMiss South Africa, uNtandoyenkosi Kunene, njengoba eyoqhudelana nabanye bomhlaba emcintiswaneni kaMiss Universe.Le ntokazi yaseMpumalanga izofulathela elakuleli namhlanje njengoba umcimbi kulindeleke ukuthi ubanjwe ekupheleni kwenyanga kaJanuwari.UNtando uya kulo mcimbi ngemuva kokuba yingxenye yabanye ozime abebengenele uMiss World, okade ubanjelwe eMelika ngenyanga edlule.Uhamba nje uzobe eyingxenye yezintokazi ezingu-85 zakwamanye amazwe ezizoba yingxenye yomcimbi.Umcimbi kaMiss Universe uzobonakala kuFOX Television Network, kuDStv (Channel 125 ), nala kuzobe kusakazwa bukhoma enxanxatheleni yezitolo i- Asia Complex, eManila. UNtandoyenkosi uthe ufunde okuningi ngokuba nezintokazi ebeziyingxenye kaMiss World."Sengikulindele ngabombu ukuya kulo mcimbi kaMiss Universe, ngihlangane nezinye izintokazi ezivela emhlabeni wonke," kusho uNtandoyenkosi.Le ntokazi ithe izobe igqokiswe umsiki wengqephu uQuiteria & George kulo mcimbi.Usomahlaya uSteve Harvey uzobuye abe ngumphathi wohlelo yize enza iphutha emcimbini ofana nalona ngonyaka odlule, ngesikhathi ememezela intokazi eyayikhale ngaphansi ethi idle umhlanganiso.Lesi sigameko sasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana saphenduka ihlaya kwabaningi.Umcimbi kaMiss Universe waqala ngo-1952, njengoba usudonse iminyaka engu-64.Uma kwenzeka uNtandoyenkosi ewudla umhlanganiso uzobe engaqali njengoba uzime wakuleli uMargaret Gardiner wasithatha lesi sicoco ngo-1978. Ezinye izintokazi zase-Afrka ezake zawina lesi sicoco kukhona kubo intokazi yaseNamibia, Michelle McLean ngo-1992, intokazi yaseBotswana uMpule Kwelagobe ngo-1999 nowase-Angola, uLeila Lopes ngo-2011.Uma ebuya ePhilippines uNtandoyenkosi kulindeleke ukuthi adlulisele isicoco kwenye intokazi njengoba kuzobanjwa umcimbi wokukhetha uzime kaMiss South Africa, ngoMashi.
title: Uyomela iNingizimu Afrika kuMiss Universe owakuleli

text: KUZOFIKA umgomo ongu-9 million weCovid-19 okhiqizwa ngabakwaJohnson & Johnson kuleli. UMengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe ebhekiswe esizweni izolo, uthe umgomo ongu-80 000 oyingxenye yalo mgomo uzofika kuleli  ngesonto elizayo."Lo mgomo iwona okuzoqalwa ngawo uhlelo lokugomela iCovid-19 kuleli ngoba okhiqizwa yi-AstraZeneca ucwaningo luveze ukuthi awulivikeli ngokuphelele igciwane leCovid-19 eselizishintshile i-501Y.V2, elihlasela abantu abaningi kuleli. Le miphumela bekungeyokuqala. Sibashayela izandla ososayensi bethu ngocwaningo lwabo. Sizoqhubeka sithathe izeluleko eziphuma kubo ngalo mgomo. Silindele ukuthi kuphinde kufike omunye umgomo esiwuthenge ngaphansi kohlelo iCovax ongu-12 million ingakapheli ikota yokuqala yonyaka," kusho yena.Uhlelo lweCovax luholwa yinhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO) lapho amazwe ethenge ngokuhlanganyela umgomo weCovid-19 ukuze kungabizi kakhulu.Uthe umgomo okhiqizwa yiPfizer othengiwe kodwa ongakafiki ungu-20 million."Sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi sixoxisana nabakhiqizi ukuze kuthengwe  umgomo owanele futhi kube umgomo ozokwazi ukuvikela igciwane elihlasela abantu abaningi kuleli,"Umengameli uncome abantu bakuleli ngokubambisana kuleli nesivunguvungu sesibili seCovid-19."Ukube izikhungo zezempilo bezingahlelelwe ukubhekana nalesi simo, abasebenzi bezempilo bengazimisele ukubhekana nalesi sisivunguvungu, nomphakathi ungakwenzi okumele ukwenze ukuze uzivikele kuleli gciwane,  ngabe isimo sibi kakhulu kunalokho esikubonayo," kusho yena.Uqhube wathi ukugonyelwa iCovid-19 uhlelo lokugoma olukhulu kunazo zonke izinhlelo zokugoma esezake zakhona kuleli. Lolu hlelo uthe luholwa yiPhini likaMengameli, uMnuz David Mabuza."Izifundazwe sezizilungiselele ukuqala lolu  hlelo lokugoma abantu abahlala kuzo," kusho yena.
title: URamaphosa uncome abakuleli ngokubambisana

text: ABASOLWA ababili abaneminyaka engu-35 no-38 bavele eNkantolo yaKwaNgwanase izolo ngezinsolo zokutholwa nempahla entshontshiwe necala lokugwaza.NgeSonto ntambama, amaphoyisa aseManguzi avimbe iloli ebelintshontshiwe lizoweliswa liye eMozambique.Abaphenyi baveze ukuthi leli loli belintshontshwe eMpumalanga. Umsolwa oneminyaka engu-38 ube eseboshwa ngokutholwa nempahla eyebiwe.Ngesikhathi umsolwa esagqunywe esitokisini, omunye wesilisa oneminyaka engu-35 ucele iphoyisa ukuthi limdedele umsolwa, uzolinikeza u-R10 000.Naye ube eseboshwa, wabekwa icala lokugwaza.Olunye uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luveza ukuthi umsolwa oneminyaka engu-38, ubengaphandlengebheyili njengoba wayeboshwe ezinyangeni ezimbili ezidlulengecala lokuzama ukweqaumngcele nelinye iloli elalintshontshwe ePitoli.Uzovela eNkantolo yaseMpangeni ngalelo cala ngo-Agasti 30 nonyaka.
title: Bavele enkantolo besolwa ngokugwazela iphoyisa

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo eGauteng, uDkt Bandile Masuku, nonkosikazi wakhe uLoyiso, bathathe ikhefu emsebenzini emuva kokuthinteka kwabo kwithenda kaR125 million, yempahla yokuzivikela kwiCorona.UNkk Masuku usebenza kumasipala waseGoli. Ukuthatha kwabo ikhefu kwenzeka emuva kokuthi kube nezinsolo zokwenzelela koMnyango wezeMpilo eGauteng ngenkathi unika inkosi yamaBhaca uMadzikane Diko ithenda, ongumyeni kaNkk Khuselo Diko okhulumela uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Kulindeleke bethathe ikhefu cishe amasonto amabili kuya kwamane. AbakwaMasuku noNkk Diko bazovela phambi kwekomiti lezobuqotho kwi-ANC. Kwisitatimende sikaNkk Diko ngoLwesithathu uthe uyaxolisa ngokuthi ubukhosi bamaBhaca benze isivumelwane zokusebenzisana nomnyango. Isinqumo sokuthi abakwaMasuku baye ekhefini simenyezelwe i-ANC eGauteng izolo.UNobhala we-ANC eGauteng uMnuz Jacob Khawe, uthe bahlela ukuthi ikomiti liphothule umsebenzi emasontweni amabili kuya kwamane. Uthe njengoba uNkk Diko ethathe ikhefu babone kufanele ukuthi nabakwaMasuku bathathe ikhefu.“Senze lesi sinqumo ukuze kuvele ukusebenza okungenagcobho kuhulumeni. Sithathe isinqumo esivuna wonke umuntu ukuze abathintekayo bezokwazi ukuzikhulumela,” kusho uKhawe.Uthe ukuvela ekomitini akusho ukuthi banamacala.I-ANC icele neSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU) ukuba isheshe ukuphothula uphenyo lwayo.UNdunankulu waseGauteng, uMnuz David Makhura, ugxeke inkohlakalo wathi esikhundleni sikaMasuku kuzobamba uMnuz Jacob Mamabolo, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha.
title: Bazovela ekomitini le-ANC eGauteng

text: USIHLALO weMaritzburg United, uFarook Kadodia, uthi usekhululeke ngaphakathi emuva kokuthi iBidvest Wits ihoxise isimangalo sayo kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL).Isimangalo seWits besisukela ekudlaleni kukaYannick Zakri, weTeam of Choice, ngaphandle kwekhadi emdlalweni wala maqembu ngoSepthemba.Ngokusho kukaKadodia, ubengasabuthi quthu ubuthongo emuva kokuthi uZakri edlale ngaphandle kwekhadi lePSL emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership abawudlala neWits ngoSepthemba 15.Umdlalo wawudlalelwa eHarry Gwala Stadium, waphela ngo 0-0. Ngokomthetho wePSL, iqembu kufanele linikeze amakhadi ukhomishana ophethe umdlalo kusasele ihora umdlalo uqale. Ikhadi likaZakri lalingekho kodwa waqhubeka wadlala, okusho ukuthi wayephula umthetho.Ikhadi likaZakri laze lafika ngaphambi kokuqala kwesiwombe sesibili. Ngemuva komdlalo iWits yafaka isimangalo kwiPSL ikhala ngokubanjwa inkunzi yiMaritzburg.Lokhu akwehlanga kahle kuKadodia, okhala ngokuthi iWits ayikhombisanga ubuntu ngokufaka icala ngoba ikhadi lagcina litholakele.NgoLwesibili bekulindeleke ukuthi kuphume isinqumo ngecala kodwa konke lokho kugcine kungenzekanga ngenxa yokuthi abaphathi beZitshudeni balihoxisile icala.“Sesikhululekile ngoba besimincile ngenxa yalolu daba. IWits ilihoxisile icala, savumelana impilo iyaqhubeka. UZakri wabhaliswa sekusele amasonto amathathu kuqale isizini. Lokho kwenza ukuthi ikhadi lakhe liphuze ukufika, lahlangana namanye eqembu lethu leMultiChoice Diski Challenge (MDC). Okubalulekile wukuthi lolu daba lugcine selusombululekile,” kusho uKadodia.AmaZulu FC ngelinye iqembu laKwaZulu-Natal elidlala kwi-Absa Premiership elisanda kujeziswa, aphucwe amaphuzu ayisithupha yinhlangano eyengamele ibhola emhlabeni iFifa. Usuthu lujeziswe kade lunqamule inkontileka yomdlali waseNamibia uPhineas Nambandi.“Kusiphathe kabi ukuthi iWits ingabenzi ubuntu, ikhombise isihluku kithina. Yebo kwenzeka okwenzeka kodwa ekugcineni ikhadi balithola. Angifuni ukugxila kulokho nokho ngoba ekugcineni babonile ukuthi kwaba yiphutha elalingenzeka kunoma wubani,” kusho uKadodia.Uthe ukuhoxa kweWits kulolu daba kuzokwenza ukuthi uFadlu Davids nezakhe babhekane ngqo nomsebenzi wokususa iqembu endaweni embi kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership. ITeam of Choice isendaweni ka-14 kwi-log ngamaphuzu ayisikhombisa emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili.Izobhekana neHighlands Park emdlalweni weligi eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu, kusasa ngo-8 ebusuku.
title: ‘Ngikhululekile ngokuhoxiswa kwecala’

text:
IKAIZER Chiefs isikuqinisekisile ukuthi isibhalele incwadi iBloemfontein Celtic iyicela ukuthi idedele uLorenzo Gordinho, ongumdlali wasemuva, ngokushesha.UGordinho ubolekiswe kwiSiwelele samaSokolara ngoJanuwari, kanti ngokwesivumelwano bekufanele ahlale khona kuze kuphele unyaka. Njengamanje iChiefs ibukeka inezinkinga emuva njengoba isidedele amagoli amahlanu emdlalweni emine. Kube oweMTN 8 kuphela lapho ikwaze ukuwina ngo 3-0 yangadedela lutho.Chiefs ask Celtic to release GordinhoFootball Manager Bobby Motaung confirms that Kaizer Chiefs have sent a letter to Bloemfontein Celtic requesting for Lorenzo Gordinho’s early release from his loan spell with the club.

#Amakhosi4Life

August 16, 2018IKaizer Chiefs iqhube yadalula nokuthi isezinhlelweni zokusayinisa omunye umdlali wasemuva, uGodfrey Walusimbi, yathi inethemba lokuthi izingxoxo phakathi kweqembu lakhe nemenenja yeqembu uBobby Motaung zizophothulwa maduze. Football Manager, Bobby Motaung has confirmed that Kaizer Chiefs and the Kenyan club Gor Mahia are in talks to sign the Ugandan defender Godfrey Walusimbi.“The two clubs are in discussions and we hope to finalise the matter in the next few days.”

title: IKaizer Chiefs ibuyise indodana yolahleko

text: USAGCWELE amathafa umshayeli weloli elaholela ekutheni kushayisane mahlanze itekisi neloli elithwala uphethroli emgwaqweni uR33 eWartburg, KwaZulu-Natal, kwashona abagibeli abangu-13  ngoSepthemba 22, ekuseni.Lokhu kuvezwe uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuThutha, ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli izolo.UNtuli uthe ingozi yadalwa ubudedengu bomshayeli weloli elaphazamisa elinye elalithwele uphethroli, elagcina selitholana phezulu netekisi.“Kuyishwa ukuthi kuze kube manje asazi ubani umshayeli nokuthi iloli kwakungelikabani. Sifuna umshayeli aziveze yena singaze simthole thina. Njengamanje siqoqa ulwazi olwaqoshwa ikhamera yeloli elithwala uphethroli.”UNtuli ubesemhlanganweni  weSantaco KwaZulu-Natal ehhotela eCoastlands, eMhlanga. Bekubhekwa indlela le nhlangano esebenze ngayo ngo-Okthoba okuyinyanga yezokuthutha.Bekugujwa neminyaka engu-10 kwasungulwa uHlokomela okuwuphiko olulekelela iSantaco ekuqinisekiseni ukuphepha emgwaqweni.UNtuli uthe umnyango wakhe uzoqeqesha abasebenzi beHlokomela ubacije ngamakhono ukuze balekelela amaphoyisa beqinisa ezokuphepha emgwaqweni.Umnyango wakhe uzobiza umhlangano ophuthumayo nabamaloli baqinisekise ukuthi izingozi ziyehliswa ngesikhathi samaholidi kaKhisimusi.“Yebo avuliwe amathaveni kodwa umuntu ozongena emotweni ephuzile uzolutheza olunenkume. Oshayela budedengu afune ukwandisa izingozi zomgwaqo naye akazoba umngani womnyango. Sicela wonke umuntu abe yiso nendlebe, ngoba umuntu ozophula umthetho uzobe ona igama lesifundazwe sonke,” kusho uNtuli.Ngalo Disemba uthe akekho umshayeli wetekisi okumele ashayele ephuzile, elayishe ngokweqile futhi engenayo iprofessional driving permit (PdP).USihlalo weSantaco eKZN, uMnuz Boy Zondi uthe kusuka ngo-Okthoba 1 kuya ku-Okthoba 26, bahambele amarenki angu-20 ezifundeni zabo ezingu-16 beshumayela ivangeli lokuphepha emgwaqweni. Bebefuqa nomkhankaso olwa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nasezinganeni.UZondi ukwamukele uqeqesho oluhlinzekwa umnyango ngoHlokomela, wathi bazoqhubeka babambisane nomnyango ekulweni nezingozi zomgwaqo.Uthe ososeshini babo esifundazweni bayabaqondisa ubugwegwe abashayeli bamatekisi abaphula imithetho yomgwaqo. Uthe lokhu kwenziwa njalo ngoLwesine.
title: Akakatholakali umshayeli weloli lesiphihli sengozi

text: USIHLALO webhodi elisha esikhungweni esikhulu kunazo zonke kuleli, esigcina iziguli eziphazamiseke emqondweni iDurban and Coastal Mental Health, uMnuz Sipho Shezi uthi bazibophezele ekuphuculeni isikhungo basibeke kwelinye izinga.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uShezi uthe ziningi izinkinga abazifice esikhungweni ezinye zazo asebeqalile ukuzixazulula.“Sifike lapha kunenkinga yokuxega kwezokuphepha, obekubeka engcupheni impilo yeziguli, njengamanje sesifake onogada ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi isikhungo sethu siphephile,” kusho uShezi.Uthe enye into asebeyisukumelile wukuqasha osonhlalakahle nabahlengikazi. “Phambilini bekusetshenziswa abantu abangenazo izicucu zobuhlengikazi, besiza iziguli, benza namaphutha njengoba kukhona amacala lapho kushone khona iziguli ngendlela engaqondakali, kwavela ukuthi zathatha imithi engafanele noma ziyisebenzisa ngokweqile,” kusho uShezi.Uthe abahlengikazi ababaqashile bazosebenza emagatsheni abo angu-27.UShezi uthe bazimisele ngokuthi bawandise amagatsha abo ukuze kusizakale abantu kuso sonke isifundazwe.Uthe enye into abayenzile beyibhodi elisha wukuqoka isikhulu esiphezulu sesikhungo, uMnuz Lungisani Mthiyane.“Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi uMthiyane esimqokile nguyena owenze kahle kunabo bonke kwinhlolokhono futhi ungumuntu omnyama,” kusho uShezi.Uthe bayathemba ukuthi bazobambisana kahle noMthiyane ukuyisa isikhungo phambili.“Ziningi izinto esifisa ukuzenza inkinga yikona ukushoda kwenkece. Okwamanje nakuba kukhulunywa ukuthi isikhungo siyaphila yingenxa yoxhaso esiluthola eMnyangweni wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi nowezeMpilo. Siyafisa ukuthi noMnyango wezeMfundo ufake igxalaba,” kusho uShezi.Uthe banxusa osomabhizinisi abazimele ukuba balekelele. UShezi uthe ukuqokwa kwebhodi elisha kumele ngabe kade kwenziwa njengoba ibhodi eliphumile bese lihlale iminyaka ephakathi kuka-12 kuya ku-20.“Siyibhodi elisha siyazi ngezingqinamba ezikhona, ezinye zazo ezicishe zadicilela phansi isithunzi sezikhungo njengezinsolo zokudlwengulwa kweziguli nokushona kwazo ngendlela engaqondakali,” kusho uShezi.Uthe akhona amacala avuliwe emaphoyiseni asaphenywa mayelana nokudlwengula.
title: Uguquko kwesabagula ngengqondo

text: Lo mculi ozakhele udumo ngemidanso yakhe yokulahla umlenze, uthe ubephethe amakhondomu angu-100 000.“Yonke into ihambe kahle kakhulu kwaba mnandi. Ngidayise u-93% wamakhondomu ebengize nawo,” kusho uDr Malinga.Uthe okumsizile wukuthi ubekuzona zonke izinkalo kuleli dolobha ezibambele mathupha ekudayiseni.“Abantu baseThekwini bangesekile kakhulu. Bengiphethe zonke izikhangiso futhi bekukhona abanye ebengibabeke kwezinye izindawo abebengidayisela. Kubalulekile ukuthi ebhizinisini uzibambele uma kusaqala ukuze uzwe ukuthi yikuphi lapho okumele uthuthuke khona nokuthi yikuphi lapho owenza kangcono khona,” kuchaza uDr Malinga.Uqhube wathi uqale ibhizinisi lamakhondomu emva kokubona ezindaweni aya kuzona ukuthi abantu bayawasebenzisa.“Bengifuna ukuzakhela umnotho kube yifa lami. Ngithe uma ngibheka izindawo engiya kuzo ngabona ukuthi abantu bayawasebenzisa futhi angifuni ukuthi silahlekelwe abantu abasha ngenxa yocansi olungaphephile. Manje abantu bathenga amakhondomu ngokukhulu ukuziqhenya futhi abanye baze bashuthe nawo. Ekuqaleni abantu bebecasha uma bewathenga kodwa manje bawathenga behleka. Ungena nawo ekhaya wazi ukuthi kukhona okuyokuhlekisa njengoba kushiwo ukuthi umuntu othandana naye umuntu ohlekisana naye,” kusho yena.Uthe okwamanje asathengwa kuye kodwa ulwela ukuthi aqale angene ezitolo.
title: U-Dr Malinga wethule amakhondomu akhe

text:
KUSHONE abantu abathathu kwalimala abalinganiselwa ngaphezulu kuka-200 kushayisana izitimela esiteshini iMountain View ePretoria ngoLwesibili ekuseni.Abezimo eziphuthumayo bathi baningi abanye abasezimeni ezibucayi kodwa ibingakaqinisekiswa imibiko yokuthi sesinyukile isibalo sabadlulile kule ngozi.“Ngokwemibiko evela endaweni yesigameko kusadlule abantu ababili okudingeke ukuthi baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ngendiza,” kusho okhulumela iNetcare 911 ephawula ngaphambi kokuthi kuqinisekiswe ukushona kowesithathu.“Balinganiselwa ku-200 abanye abalimalile kodwa  bathole imihuzuko kuphela. Okwamanje asinalo ulwazi ngokuholele kule ngozi kodwa amaphoyisa akhona endaweni yesigameko.”Pretoria - 
#TrainCrash
#MetroRail Multiple injuries at Mountain View station 
pic.twitter.com/kNUJpjuUGS— Rob Beezy (@TrafficSA) 
January 8, 2019
title: BUKA: Kushone abathathu kwalimala abawu-200 kushayisana izitimela

text: KWETHULWE uhlelo lokucathulisa osomabhizinisi oluzokwenza ukuthi amabhizinisi abo ahlonishwe njengamakhulu.ISiyabakhulisa Training Program yethulwe kuleli sonto emahhovisi eDurban Chamber of Commerce and Industry (DCCI) eThekwini.Lolu hlelo luzosiza osomabhizinisi abancane emalokishini, abakuleli nabokufika abazocijwa ngokuphatha amabhizinisi.Oyisikhulu esiphezulu seDurban Chamber uNkk Palesa Phili, uthe uhlelo lolu luqondene ngqo nosomabhizinisi abancane, abasemalokishini nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya.“Sihlose ukuthi labo somabhizinisi sibacije ukuze bakwazi ukuba sesimeni sokuphatha amabhizinisi. Bazohlonyiswa ngamakhono abawadingayo ukuze baphumelele emabhizinisini. Osomabhizinisi abancane kudingeka bacijwe futhi banikwe amathuluzi afanele okuphatha amabhizinisi. Bayadinga ukwazi ngokuphathwa kwezimali, imithetho kahulumeni nokukhangisa amabhizinisi abo.”UNkk Phili kulolu hlelo uthe bahlose ukukhiqiza osomabhizinisi abazokhulisa umnotho emabhizinisi abo, bakafe isandla nasekukhuliseni owakuleli. Lolu hlelo luxhaswe yi-American Consulate futhi kuzoqeqeshwa osomabhizinisi abangu- 470 emalokishini nasemakhaya.UNkk Sherry Zalika-Sykes oyiConsul General yase-USA uthe uhulumeni uyaziqhenya ngokuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo.Uthe sekunesikhathi eside benobudlelwane neDurban Chamber ukuthuthukisa umkhakha wamabhizinisi.UNkk Zalika-Sykes uthe bayathemba ukuthi bazovela nabanye abazohlanganyela neDurban Chamber ezinhlelweni zabo zokukhuliswa kwamabhizinisi nokubuyisa isithunzi kulo mkhakha esifundazweni.UNkk Phili ubonge wanconcoza kwi-American Consulate ukuthi ixhase lolu hlelo, athe beludingeka kakhulu.“Umsebenzi wethu wukwakha izinkundla nezinhlelo lapho kuzosizakala khona osomabhizinisi ukuze bakhule. Lolu xhaso luzosiza ukuthi senze lokhu ebesifisa ukukukwenza kodwa singakwazi ngenxa yokushoda kwamandla. Ngalolu hlelo sizobona amabhizinisi amancane asemalokishini nasemakhaya esimama, abukeke njengamabhizinisi amakhulu ahlonishwayo ngenxa yokuqeqeshwa.”
title: Uhlelo lokuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi abancane

text: ISITSHUDENI sase-University of KwaZulu-Natal, esithole iziqu zokuba ngudokotela wamazinyo, sithi sifuna ukuqeda usizi lokushoda kwezindawo zokuxilonga amazinyo eMpangeni.UMnuz Fanele Mthethwa (21), ophase nge-cum laude  iziqu zeDental Theraphy, uthe ukulekelela umphakathi wangakubo yiphupho lakhe leminyaka abehlezi efisa lifezeke.Uthe ukholwa wukuthi uzokwazi ukunqanda izinkinga zabantu abahamba amabanga amade uma bedinga usizo lwamazinyo ngomkhakha akuwo."Indlela obekunzima ngayo kwizitshudeni zonke enyuvesi bengingazitsheli ukuthi ngingase ngiphase kahle. Ngibonga ukubambisana esibe nakho nezitshudeni kanjalo nama-lecturer ngenkathi sifunda online emakhaya. Kube nzima njengoba thina esihlala ezindaweni zasemakhaya besiba nezinkinga zokungadonsi kwe-network. Yize sihlangabezane  nalezi zinkinga, imivuzo yokubekezela nokuyibamba kunzima iyabonakala njengoba sijabulela izithukuthuku zethu namhlanje," kuchaza uMthethwa.Echaza ngezifundo abezenza enyuvesi, uthe wayengazitshela ukuthi uzoqhubeka nazo ngonyaka wesibili njengoba kwaphoqeleka ukuthi enze zona ngoba enqena ukuhlala ekhaya ngemva kokuphothula u-grade 12.Uthe uthando lwazo luqale ukukhula ngenkathi esephakathi nazo ngonyaka wakhe wokuqala."Kungisize kakhulu ukubuka usizi lwabantu bendawo yangakithi. Ngingasho nje ngingananazi ukuthi yikho okungigqugquzele ekutheni ngibone ukubaluleka kwalo mkhakha engawukhetha," kusho lesi sitshudeni esehlelwe yinhlanhla yokuthola umsebenzi walo mkhakha eMlaza ngoMashi.Eqhuba, ubonge abazali nomamkhulu wakhe, athe bebeqinisekisa ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthi bayameseka ngenkathi enza izifundo zakhe.Le nsizwa, ephinde ibe ngunompempe weSAB League eThekwini,  ibuye ichithe isikhathi sayo ngokuba sezinkundleni zemidlalo.
title: Ufuna ukusiza abangakubo ogile izimanga e-UKZN

text: I-EFF isifuna kuhoxiswe ingxenye yesibhunu ebizwa ngeDie Stem kwiculo lesizwe kulandela isinqumo senkantolo sokuthi kuzothathwa njengenkulumo egqugquzela inzondo noma uhlevane ukuphephezelisw kwefulegi elidala lakuleli, elalisetshenziswa ngezikhathi zobandlululo. Izolo inkantolo yezokulingana inqume izolo ukuthi kuzothathwa njengenkulumo egqugquzela inzondo noma uhlevane ukuphephezeliswa kwefulegi IJaji uPhineas Mojapelo, lethula isinqumo lithe lokhu akusho ukuthi livalwe thaqa leli fulegi njengoba livikelwe umthetho ukuba lisetshenziswe amaciko, ukufunda (izifundiswa), izintatheli nokunye okumayelana nomphakathi.Ijaji ligxeke abaqhubeka nokulibhakuzisa emphakathini ifulegi langezikhathi zobandlululo.“Labo abasebenzisa leli fulegi, bakhetha ngamabomu ukusebenzisa lona futhi benza ngamabomu ukuba bangasebenzisi ifulegi elisha lentando yabantu. Bakhetha ingcindezelo kunoma bakhethe inkululeko,” kusho uMojapelo.Uthe abaveza leli fulegi esidlangaleni kumele bangaboshwa kodwa kumele bahlawule.Leli fulegi elinombala osa-olintshi, omhlophe noluhlaza sasibhakabhaka lalisetshenziswa kuleli ngesikhathi sobandlululo.Yize kunjalo kukhona abantu abasalisebenzisa uma kunemihlangano yezepolitiki noma ezinkundleni zemidlalo, ikakhulu ebholeni lombhoxo.Inhlangano iNelson Mandela Foundation, yiyona ebiye enkanotlo ifuna kuthathwe njengento engekho ukusetshenziswa kwaleli fulegi elidala ngoba ithi kukhombisa ukucwasa ngokwebala.IKhomishini yaMalungelo Abantu kuleli, iSouth Africa’s Human Rights Commission, ibiyeseka iNelson Mandela Foundation kulesi sicelo senkantolo.I-Afriforum, ibikuphikisa ukuthi kuvalwe ukuphephezeliswa kwaleli fulegi.UMnuz Ernst Roets, we-Afriforum, uthe bona abakholwa ukuthi ukusebenzisa leli fulegi kubhebhezela udlame.“Siyakholelwa ekukhulumeni ngokukhululeka, ukuvezwa kwaleli fulegi asikholelwa ekutheni yingoba sisuke sigqugquzela udlame.”Esitatimendei esishicilelwe yi-EFF, leli qembu livele ukuthi sekumele kulandele iDie Stem. "Ifulegi langezikhathi zobandlululo kuleli neDie Stem okwabantu ababodwa. Uma bephephezelisa leli fulegi bacula iDie Stem, ngoba iyona ndlela abakwazi ukuzwakalisa ukungahambisani kwabo nabamnyama," kusho i-EFF. Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Pule Mabe, usishayele ihlombe isinqumo senkantolo, wathi ukusetshenziswa kwalo kubukela phansi imizamo yokugqugquzela intando yabantu.Uthe abasaqhubeka nokuphephezelisa leli fulegi bakhetha ingcindezelo kunenkululeko.Owe-Afriforum, uMnuz Ernst Roets, uthe bona abakholwa ukuthi ukusebenzisa leli fulegi kunodlame.“Siyakholelwa ekukhulumeni ngokukhululeka, ukuvezwa kwaleli fulegi asikholwa ukuthi kungoba usuke unodlame. Udlame kumele luhambe nesenzo sokulimaza,” kusho uRoets.NePhini likaMengameli wezwe, uMnuz David Mabuza lisamukele isinqumo senkantolo.
title: I-EFF ifuna kususwe iDie Stem kwiculo lesizwe

text: SENYUKE ngo-56% isibalo sabantu baseNingizimu Afrika abahlaselwe wukhwantalala oluwumphumela weCovid-19 .Lokhu kuvezwe wucwaningo olwenziwe yinkampani ekhiqiza amakhambi okwelapha izifo, iPharma Dynamics.IPharma Dynamics yenze ucwaningo ngabantu abawu-1 200 bezifundazwe ezehlukene yathola ukuthi ingcindezi ehambisana neCovid-19 iholele ekutheni isibalo sabahlaselwa wukhwantalala senyuke.Imiphumela yocwaningo isanda kukhishwa. Ihambisana nokuthi u-Okthoba uhlelelwe ukuthi ube yinyanga yokuqwashisa ngezifo ezithinta ukuphazamiseka kwengqondo.Imenenja ePharma Dynamic, uDkt Abdurahman Kenny, ophethe uphiko lwezempilo, ithe abantu abaningi ebebekwazi ukulawula izifo ezintinta ukuphazamiseka komqondo, abasakwazi ukuzilawula ngenxa yengcindezi eyengeziwe edalwe yiCovid-19.Uthe ngesikhathi benza ucwaningo babheka ukuthi bangakanani abantu abanokhwantalala ngalesi sikhathi, bathola ukuthi ziningi izizathu ezenze ukuthi babe nokhwantalala kodwa zonke ziwumxhantela weCovid-19“Kuhlaluke ukuthi * -53% wabantu okwenziwe kubo ucwaningo ulahlekelwe wumsebenzi. Lokho sekubenza babe nokhwantalala, abanye behliselwe iholo ngenxa yokuthi inkampani ebebesebenza kuyo kayisakwazi ukubakhokhela iholo eliphelele ngenxa yayo iCovid-19, noma bangosomabhizinisi abaphoqeke ukuthi bavale amabhizinisi abo ngoba engasayenzi inzuzo ngenxa yemigomo yokusebenza ehambisana nokunqandwa kokusabalala kweCovid-19,” kusho * -Kenny.Kwabanokwantalala uthe * -81% usuzidlela noma yini ngoba uthi uzama ukupholisa ubuhlungu obhekene nabo, * -20% usuzinikele kakhulu otshwaleni, * -18% ingcindezi ubhekana nayo ngokubhema ugwayi, * -6% ubhema insangu, * -22% usebenzisa amaphilisi alapha imbandezeko.U-60% wabantu okwenziwe kubo ucwaningo uvumile ukuthi awusayinakekeli impilo njengoba kade wenza ekuqaleni, u-52% wavuma ukuthi awusakwazi ukulala kahle.U-20% wabathandanayo uthe usuxabana kakhulu kunakuqala kanti u-68% uthi ukhathazeke ngesimo somnotho,  u-44% awusakwazi ukukhululeka njengakuqala ngenxa yokuhlala ucabanga, u-6% usuke wazama ukuzibulala ngoba uhluleka ukubhekana nesimo.UKenny uthe ngenxa yesimo kulindeleke ukuthi babe baningi abantu abazogcina sebesebenzisa izidakamizwa bethi benzela ukuthi bangacabangi kakhulu kanti bazifaka enkingeni enkulu.“Makhulu amathuba okuthi babe baningi abantu abaphathwa yizifo ezithinta ukuphazamiseka kwengqondo ngoba ziningi izinto eziwushintsho ezifike neCovid-19. Ukuphela komsebenzi nengcindezi yezomnotho, ukwesaba ukuthi uzohlaselwa yigciwane, uvalo lokuthi kungenzeka ufe, ukungakwazi ukumelana nokuhlala ngawedwana ngesikhathi ugonqile, ingcindezi yokufundisa izingane ekhaya okuyinto ebingekho phambilini, konke lokhu kusitshela ukuthi baningi abantu abazozithola benezifo ezithinta ukuphazamiseka kwengqondo.”
title: ICovid-19 inyuse isibalo sokhwantalala

text: I-ENGLAND izigwazele ibhece endleleni yayo ebheke emaqenjini angu-16 azosala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eseRussia ngemuva kwemidlalo yamaqoqo.Leli lizwe elithungatha isicoco salo sesibili selokhu lasigcina ngo-1966, libhaxabule omakoti beNdebe yoMhlaba iPanama ngo- 6-1 kulo mdlalo obuseNizhny Stadium izolo ntambama.Ngesikhathi seliyoshona uFelipe Baloy utholele izwe lakhe igoli lomthobanhliziyo ngomgundatshani weshodi, zajabula izinkulungwane zabalandeli bePanama ebezithamele umdlalo.Emdlalweni wokugcina wamaqoqo i-England izodlala neBelgium ngoLwesine nayo enamaphuzu ayisithupha kuGroup G.I-England ibhakuzise amagoli amahlanu esiwombeni sokuqala, amaphenathi amabili kakaputeni uHarry Kane, uJohn Stone ovule inkundla, naye uphume namabili kwathi elinye kwaba imbumbulu yeshodi likaJesse Lingard.UKane ongumshini wamagoli eqenjini lakhe iTottenham Hotspur, kwi-English Premiership uphinde washaya elesithathu sekubuywa ekhefini. Usenamagoli amahlanu kulo mqhudelwano, okumbeka kwabaphambili ohlwini lwabagadli, okukhona nomgadli weBelgium uRomelu Lukaku onamagoli amane.Namuhla amehlo azobheka kuGroup B emidlalweni yokugcina yamaqoqo lapho kulindeleke ukuthi izintandokazi zamaqembu iSpain nePortugal zizibekisele indawo emaqenjini angu-16.Womabili amaqembu anamaphuzu amane. ISpain sizobhekana neMorocco kuthi iPortugal iqhuthane ne-Iran.Ukuwina yikhona okungenza la maqembu angaphathwa yikhanda ngekusasa lawo kulo mqhudelwano.Iran inamaphuzu amathathu okusho ukuthi ingawona umcimbi wePortugal uma inganqoba.Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi leli qembu lase-Europe lizodinga ukaputeni walo uCristiano “CR7” Ronaldo aqhubeke nokuba bukhali phambi kwamapali. URonaldo useshaye amagoli amane emidlalweni emibili.Ngo-2014 eBrazil uRonaldo nezakhe baphuma emaqoqweni ngemuva kokubambana ne-USA ngamaphuzu amane bahlukaniswa amagoli. ISpain okwaso okungenani wukudlala ngokulingana ukuze labo mpetha bango-2010 badlulele phambili.Ku-Group A kuzobe sekudlalelwa ukugcina icala njengoba iRussia ne-Uruguay sebelinde abazodlala nayekwi-Last 16 emaqenjini azoqhamuka kuGroup B.Imidlalo yanamuhlaNgo-4pm: Uruguay v Russia; Saudi Arabia v Egypt.Ngo-8pm: Spain v Morocco; Iran v Portugal.
title: I-England igwaze ibhece kwiPanama

text: UMQEQESHI weqembu lesizwe lekhilikithi lika-Under 19, uLaurence Mahatlane, ugculisekile ngekhono alibone emqhudelwaneni i-2019 Coca-Cola T20 Schools Challenge obusePitoli ngempelasonto.Bekudlala izikole eziyisishiyagalombili eziphuma ezifundazweni ezehlukene zizobanga uR110 000.Ngendlela uMahatlane agculiseke ngayo uthe akakungabazi ukuthi abanye abadlali abashaye into ecokeme emqhudelwaneni bazoba seqenjini lakhe elizodlala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ka-Under 19 ngonyaka ozayo. INdebe yoMhlaba izoba seNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngoJanuwari ngonyaka ozayo kuze kube wuFebhuwari.Izikole ebezibambe iqhaza emqhudelwaneni yiSt Charles College yaseMgungundlovu, Hudson Park yase-Eastern Cape, Paarl Gim yaseWestern Cape, St Andrews yaseBloemfontein, St Andrews yaseGrahamstown, Waterkloof yasePitoli, St Stithians yaseGoli neQueens okuyiqembu eliqhamuka kwi-Inland Focus.Umqhudelwano ugcine unqotshwe yiSt Stithians eyehlule iSt Charles College ngama-run awu-53 kowamanqamu.“Ngibona likhona ithuba lokuthi abanye babadlali babe seqenjini lami kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ngonyaka ozayo. Sekuyolala kubona uma sesihlunga ukuthi bayalithatha yini ithuba abalitholayo. Ngichazeke kakhulu ngengikubone lapha, ikakhulukazi iSt Charles neSt Stithians obekungamaqembu abengashayeki nhlobo,” usho kanje uMahatlane.Zingaphezu kuka-800 sezizonke izikole ezivela kuzo zonke izifundazwe ezidlala kulo mqhudelwano. Ngokushiyana kwamandla kugcina sekusale eziyisishiyagalombili ezigcina zidlale kwiCoca-Cola T20 Schools Challenge.KwiNdebe yoMhlaba ebiseNew Zealand ngonyaka odlule, iqembu lesizwe lekhilikithi alidlalanga kahle. Laphuma endaweni yesihlanu. I-India yanqoba isicoco ishaya i-Australia kowamanqamu.UMahatlane ukuthatha njengento esidlule lokho ngoba ufuna ukwenza kahle njengosokhaya ngonyaka ozayo.“Ngicabanga ukuthi okusishayayo wukuthi abadlali bethu abadlali imidlalo eminingi njengakwamanye amazwe. Isibonelo nje, i-India noma i-Australia bafika emqhudelwaneni abadlali babo bedlale imidlalo ebalelwa kwewu-40 kuya phezulu. Umdlali obedlala eqenjini lesizwe lasePakistan ebelibhekene namaProteas, uShahin Afridi, wasibulala sidlala nabo ngonyaka owedlule. Bheka manje ukuphi. Sibheke ukuthi abalandeli basekhaya kube yibona abasesekayo ngonyaka ozayo. Kwazi bani hleze sisinqobe isicoco,” kubeka uMahatlane.Iqembu lika-Under 19 lisasinqobe kanye isicoco seNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-2014. Ngalesi sikhathi kwakusadlala uKagiso “KG” Rabada no-Aiden Markram, ukubala nje abambalwa.
title: Umqeqeshi limgculisile ikhono alibonile

text: UXINWA ngabaqeqeshi ngendaba yokuzimuka umdlali wasesiswini weCape Town City, u-Ayanda Patosi, osekuphele isikhathi kukhalwa ngayo kodwa ungabonakali umehluko.UPatosi ujoyine iThe Citizens ekuqaleni kwesizini edlule emuva kokuchitha isikhathi edlala phesheya kwezilwandle.Uphinde walikhombisa izinga lakhe ngesikhathi eshayela ezakhe amagoli amabili, zagcina zidlale ngokulingana ngo 2-2 ne-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership e-Orlando Stadium. Bekungokokuqala uPatosi edlala umdlalo wonke kule sizini.Ngesi-zini edlule usihlalo weCity, uJohn Comitis, upha-wulile ngendaba yoku-khuluphala kukaPatosi wathi umamfuza amagwinya yikho ezimukile. Emasontweni adlule, umqeqeshi uBenni MacCarthy, uthe indaba yesisindo sikaPatosi iyinknga kodwa yena akumfanele ukukhononda ngayo ngoba wayebhekene nesimo esifanayo esengumdlali. Iphini lakhe, uVasili Manousakis, liveze ukuthi abajabule ngokuzimuka kukaPatosi abukeka engayinqobi impi yakho.“UPatosi unenkinga yokuba qatha. Uyazama ukusebenza kanzima, usehlise amakhilo amabili cishe emasontweni amabili adlule, wadiliza u-2% wamafutha. Siyawubona umehluko. Kodwa uma uzodlala umdlalo wonke kufanele uphithizele. Akayena omunye wabadlali abasheshayo kwiPremiership, nakancane. Kodwa uyingozi, uhlale ekunika okuthize. Sihlezi kuyena, siyamxina ngoba ungomunye wo-no.10 abaphambili kwiPremiership. Uma ubheka ukuthi salahlekelwa nguLebo Manyama kuleya ndawo, ubheke ukuthi ukhona yini omunye umdlali omfunayo, u-Ayanda Patosi. Kodwa umdinga esesimeni esihle,” kusho uManousakis. IThe Citizens iyoze ibuyele enkundleni ngoMgqibelo uma isibhekene neSuperSport United emdlalweni wamanqamu weMTN8 eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini. Kungokwesibili amasizini elandelana iCity idlala kowamanqamu alo mqhudelwano. Ngesizini edlule, iThe Citizens ihlulwe iyona iSuperSport enkundleni efanayo.“Kusisize kakhulu ukuthola iphuzu kwiPirates, kuzonyusa ukuzethemba. Kube wumphumela omuhle kakhulu. Eqinisweni besidinga amaphuzu amathathu ukuze sisuke ezansi lapho kunesiminyaminya khona. Sidlale nePirates, sizolandelisa ngeSuperSport bese sidlala neWits. Uma ubheka konke, kubalulekile ukuthi khona esiphume nakho.”
title: UPatosi usancengwa namanje ngeyokwehlisa isisindo

text: UMosimane ukusho lokhu sakubhuqa ngoMsombuluko ebusuku eqeda ukunqoba ngo 1-0 kwiLamontville Golden Arrows okuwumphumela ombeke emhlane wezika-Ernst “Mazinyo” Middendorp opheka iChiefs.Sebehlukaniswe ngamaphuzu amathathu ngaphambi kokuhlangana kusasa.“Cha, umdlalo olandelayo awusivuni thina. Akukho okusezandleni zethu. Isicoco eseChiefs ukuthi isidedele, hhayi thina. Thina siyabajaha nje kuphela.“Banamagoli, banamaphuzu akukho okunye abangathi bayakudinga.“Ngincamela ukushintsha izindawo nabo uma ngikhuluma iqiniso.
