Ngakho ngicabanga ukuthi uMiddendorp usendaweni enhle,” kusho uMosimane kwiSuperSport.IChiefs ilwela ukunqoba isicoco sayo sokuqala seligi kusukela ngo-2015 kanti uMosimane nezakhe balwela ukuthatha esesihlanu kusukela lo mqeqeshi afika ngo-2012.Uma kuwina iChiefs lokho kuzokwenza kukholakale nakubadlali ukuthi bangasidla lesi sicoco esesibaceze amasizini amahlanu elandelana ekubeni ukunqoba kwezikaMosimane kungenza kuxege amadolo kwezaseNaturena kule midlalo emithathu ezobe isisele kwazise lizobe selivalekile igebe elike laba ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye esikhathini esingesingakanani esedlule.“Kunzima kithina sonke kodwa bese kusifanele nathi ukuthi sithole okuthile. “Okuhle nje ukuthi lokhu esikuthole kwi-Arrows kuyisikhumbuzo sokuthi ukuzama noma kubukeka kungavumi kunawo umvuzo ekugcineni.“Singqongqoze kwaze kwagcina kuvulekile,” kusho uMosimane.Ukubalulile ukuthi akukho la eke wacabanga khona ukuthi iqembu lakhe lingase libe senkingeni yokushaywa yi-Arrows.“Umdlalo besiwuphethe cishe wonke. Akukho lapho bengibona khona sengathi kunengozi esilengela kuyona. Kusisizile lokhu sadlala ngokukhululeka kancane ngoba besazi ukuthi amagoli akhona.“Yize imiphumela ibibhimba kweminye imidlalo kodwa amagoli abelokhu ekhona.”UMiddendorp uzoya emdlalweni wakusasa ngaphandle kukaSamir Nurkovic ngenxa yamakhadi.Ubambe umoya ngoLebohang Manyama noLeonardo Castro abalimele. KwiSundowns uRicardo Nascimento uyena ozobe engekho onesigwebo samakhadi.
title: Sekulele kwiChiefs ngesicoco: Pitso

text: UBOSHWE ebhace ezihlotsheni eZinqoleni ngasePort Shepstone umlisa wesithupha osolwa ecaleni elithinta ukudliwa kwabantu eMtshezi. Lo msolwa oneminyaka engu-25 kuthiwa uboshwe esezihlotsheni zakhe ebezizitshela ukuthi uvakashile kanti ubhacile ngoba efunelwa leli cala laseMtshezi eseliphenduke undabamlonyeni. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbhele uthe amaphoyisa abelandela lo msolwa kanti atholile ukuthi ukhona, abe eseya kulo muzi abebhace kuwo, ambopha.Uthe amaphoyisa aseZingolweni abophe umsolwa ngezithuba zo-1 ngoLwesithathu emini wabe eselandwa ngamaphoyisa aseMtshezi aphenya icala lokubulala nelokukhanda itulo lokubulala elithinta abanye abahlanu abagcinwe ezitokisini. UColonel Mbhele uthe umsolwa uzovela enkantolo yemantshi eMtshezi ngoLwesine.Uthe amaphoyisa asaqhubeka nophenyo lwawo ngaleli cala kanti kusalindeleke ukuthi aphinde abophe abanye abasolwa. Kuboshwa lo msolwa nje ngoMsombuluko bekuvele abanye abahlanu okubalwa kubo izinyanga ezimbili, abasolwa ngaleli cala kanti banqume ukungasifaki isicelo sebheyili ngoba besabela ukuphepha kwabo ngenxa yokuthi amalungu omphakathi abesho ukubamba ngezandla imoto ababelethwe ngayo enkantolo efuna ukubadla luhlaza.
title: Kuboshwe owesithupha 'kwelamazimuzimu'

text: KHETHA SANGWENI I-IFP iphezu kophenyo olunzulu ngomhlangano okuthiwa wawubanjwe eNquthu, ngamalungu ayo nokuthiwa uyasolisa ukuthi ungase ube nemiphumela emibi ngekusasa leqembu.Umthombo olwazi kahle udaba uthi angu-47 amalungu e-IFP abizelwe esithangamini sesigungu esiphezulu seqembu, ukuthi achaze ukuthi kwakuxoxwa ngani kulo mhlangano osolisayo.Kuvela ukuthi la malungu ayamaniswa nezinsolo ezinzima kodwa ezikhulunyelwa phansi okwamanje.Kuthiwa umhlangano ubuseNquthu futhi kwakukhona nomunye umholi oqavile oke waba nesikhundla kumasipala wendawo.“Kuthiwa kwakunehele lezimoto zihlabe ujenga kuyiwa kulo mhlangano ongaziwa ukuthi ngowani ngoba wawungabikwanga ezinhlakeni zeqembu nokuyinto engehlanga kahle ezikhulwini," kubeka umthombo.Umthombo uthi amalungu kade ebizwe yisigungu esiphezulu oLundi, lapho aphoswe khona imibuzo mayelana nomhlangano futhi izithangami zophenyo ziyaqhubeka. Kuthiwa iqembu lizama ukubaqondisa izigwegwe ngokubamba umhlangano ongaziwa ukuthi uyisima kanjaniOkhulumela i-IFP kuzwelonke uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kukhona uphenyo oluqhubekayo kodwa wacacisa ukuthi abekho ababekwe amacala kuyaphenywa nje, kuphela."Akekho umuntu oqondiswa izigwegwe kodwa kukhona umhlangano owaba khona eNquthu, iqembu eliwuphenyayo ukuthi wawubizwe ngaphansi kwaziphi izimo.“Umhlangano uhambisana nezinsolo ezingezinhle neze neze, mayelana nekusasa leqembu. Iningi labathintekayo babiziwe ukuzochaza,’’ kusho uHlengwa.Uthe lukhona ulwazi abanalo beyiqembu abalutholile maqondana nalo mhlangano kodwa angafunanga ukuludalula.Uthe bazobe sebeqhathanisa nalokhu okushiwo yilabo abaphenywayo bese iqembu lithatha isinqumo esiphusile.UHlengwa uthe umangele nokuthi udaba selufike kwabezindaba ngoba bona bazi ukuthi wudaba lwangaphakathi.
title: I-IFP iphenya amalungu ayo angu-47

text: KUKHALWA ngesivinini esiphezulu obekuhamba ngaso umshayeli weveni oshayisane nesithuthuthu kwashona abafundi ababili eNkwali ngaseMgababa.UMlungisi noThabiso Maphumulo abebefunda eRoberts Hlongwa High bashone engozini yesithuthuthu ngakubo ngoLwesibili ntambama.Laba bozalo olulodwa kwaMaphumulo kuthiwa bebengahlukani, bejwayele nokuhlangabezana ngaso isithuthuthu.Imizi yasemakubo isondelene.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeke kuyoshaya u-3 ntambama. Kuthiwa iveni enezinsimbi ezinkulu, ishayisane mahlanze nesithuthuthu, abafundi bashonela endaweni yesigameko.Umshayeli kuthiwa ubalekile, waya esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze.UNksz Nokwanda Maphumulo ongudadewabo kaMlungisi uthe kube umzuzwana esuka ekhaya bathola umbiko wokuthi kube nengozi.“Ubesekhaya njengoba esenenkinga eyenza angakwazi ukuya esikoleni. Uhambe ngesithuthuthu ukuyolanda okuthize kwamakhelwane. Sikhala kakhulu ngesivinini esiphezulu esizwe ukuthi umshayeli weveni ubehamba ngaso endaweni eyijika kanti uzozithela phezu kwabo. Okunye okusikhalisayo silinde kakhulu i-ambulensi ukuba ifike. Baze bashonela ezandleni zethu ngoba bebelimele kakhulu. Kube nzima kakhulu ngoba abantu bandawonye futhi besisabheke lukhulu kubona,” kusho uNksz Maphumulo.UThabiso obefunda uGrade 11 kuthiwa ubephuma esikole esabelethe isikhwama sezincwadi, efake nomfaniswano.Laba bafundi kuthiwa bebengazifakile izigqoko zokubavikela ekulimaleni uma uhamba ngesithuthuthu njengoba bezisele kubo kaMlungisi.UMlungisi kade efunda uGrade 9.Amalungu omphakathi abevakashela le mindeni njengoba isemanzini abekhala ngokuhamba ngesivinini esiphezulu kwezimoto emwaqweni okwenzeke kuwona ingozi ekubeni unamajika.Kubo kaThabiso, uyise ubengekho. Kucelwe ukuba afonelwe ukuze akhulume nezintatheli ngalolu daba. Akazange atholakale ocingweni lakhe. Umndeni wakhona uthe nawo ushaqekile ngalesi sigameko esibazumile.Amaphoyisa aseManzimtoti avule icala ngalengozi, uphenyo lusaqhubeka.
title: Kukhalwa ngesivinini ngedlule nabafundi

text: UMKHANDLU weTheku uthathela izinyathelo izisebenzi zawo ezimosha i-internet ngokuhlala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngesikhathi somsebenzi.Ngokomphumela wophenyo olusanda kwenziwa, kuthiwa izisebenzi zisebenzise i-data engaphezu kuka-65%, zenza izinto ezingahlangene nomsebenzi.Lokhu kuvele embikweni owethulwe wuphiko iMunicipality’s Information Management Unit (IMU), emuva kokuphenya ngezizathu zokuhamba kancane kwe-internet emkhandlwini.Amakhansela nezikhulu bebehluleka ukuxhumana neminye iminyango ngama-email emasontweni embalwa edlule emuva kokuthi i-internet kade ingasebenzi.Omunye umsebenzi womkhandlu ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe ama-emails iyona ndlela abantu abaningi abancamela ukuxhumana ngayo.“Uma i-internet ingekho noma ihamba kancane kusho ukuthi akusebenzeki kahle njengoba kusuke kungaxhumaneki,” kusho lo msebenzi.Uthe banazo izingcingo nezinye izindlela zokuxhumana kodwa bakholelwa kakhulu kuma-emails.“Sincamela ukusebenzisa ama-email ngoba anobufakazi bento esuke ikhulunyiwe,” kusho lo msebenzi.Ngemuva kwezikhalo eziningi mayelana nokungasebenzi kwama-email, kube sekwenziwa uphenyo.Abasebenzi bazisiwe ngoMsombuluko mayelana nezizathu zokungasebenzi kwama-email emkhandlwini.I-IMU ichaze ukuthi inkinga ibincike ekusebenzeni kwama-emails obekudalwa ukuhamba kwancane kwe-internet.Okhulumela uMkhandlu weTheku, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe umasipala wabo mkhulu ungalindela ukuthi ube nezingqinamba ekusebenzeni kwe-internet.“Yebo siyavuma ukuthi kuke kwakhona ukuphazamiseka kokusebenza kwama-email kodwa lokho akuzange kube nomthelela omubi ekubhekaneni nomsebenzi wethu wokuhambisa izidingo kubantu.“Mayelana nezisebenzi ezisebenzisa i-internet ngendlela engafanele, zikhona izinyathelo esizenzayo zokubhekana nalokho,” kusho uMayisela.Uthe bajabule ngomsebenzi owenziwa i-IMU ehlale njalo isukumela phezulu uma kukhona izikhalo ezikhona.Umholi wekhokhasi yeDA eThekwini, uNksz Nicole Graham, uthe kuyabakhathaza ukuthi abasebenzi bachitha isikhathi esiningi kwi-internet.“Sinenqwaba yabantu abalindele ukulethelwa izidingo kodwa izisebenzi zichitha isikhathi zihleli kwi-internet,” kusho uNksz Graham.UMnuz Mdu Nkosi we-IFP uthe umphumela wophenyo lwe-IMU ukhombisa ukuthi izisebenzi zikamasipala aziziphethe kahle.
title: ITheku lilwa nabahlala kwi-internet

text:
UKUSHINTSHA abaqeqeshi sekusele amahora angaphezudlwana kwangu-24 lisuke lihlale kwi-2018 Fifa World, kuzokwenza umhlaba wonke uyihlahele amehlo imidlalo yeSpain.Ompetha be-2010 FIFAWorld Cup edlalelwe eNingizimu Afrika, bazoqala inyathuko yabo eRussia eFisht Stadium, eSochi kusasa ngo-8 ebusuku sebecijwa nguFernando Hierro.BREAKING: Spain have sacked manager Julen Lopetegui with just one day to go till the start of the World Cup after the Spaniard had "secret agreements" with Real Madrid to be their new manager without informing the Spanish FA. 
pic.twitter.com/0xPGXJghSX— FIFA World Cup (@WorIdCupUpdates) 
June 13, 2018UHierro uqashwe yinhlangano eyengamele ibhola Spain ngoLwesithathu emini ngemuva kokuxoshwa isigubhukane kukaJulen Lopetegui khona izolo.ULopetegui uxoshelwe ukuthatha umsebenzi wokucija iReal Madrid uma ebuya kwiWorld Cup.Kuvele ngoLwesibili ukuthi uLopetegui uvume inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu ecija iReal, eshiywe ngumqeqeshi oyinqobise ama-Eufa Champions League amathathu, uZinedine Zidane. UHierro ubevele ekhona ethimbeni losomaqhinga beSpain kwazise ubengumqondisi webhola.ISpain iboshelwe nePortugal, Iran neMorocco.Spanish FA president, Luis Rubiales:“Lopetegui’s been a great coach, but we can’t accept this behaviour. This has been done without our knowledge. The FA cannot be left outside the negotiation of one of its employees and find out just 5 mins before a public announcement.” 
pic.twitter.com/P275A9CQfB— Arsène's Son (@hughwizzy) 
June 13, 2018Abadlali baseSpain okubalwa kubo uSergio Ramos kubikwa ukuthi bazamile ukuncenga iSpanish FA ukuthi singamxoshi umqeqeshi. Isithombe: Reuters Bheka ezinye eizthinta i-2018 Fifa World Cup kwiDiski Yomhlaba kwiSolezwe ngoMgqibelo nakwi-Isomag kwi-Isolezwe ngeSonto.
title: ISpain sizidonsele amehlo ngolomqeqeshi kwiWC

text: IZINHLELO okukhona kuzo oluthi Uyajola 9/9, Isencane Lengane ngezinye okulindeleke ukuthi zidonse amehlo ababukeli beMoja Love (157) uma sezibuya ngenyanga ezayo.Lezi zinhlelo seziqalile ukukhangiswa kulesi siteshi futhi nabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana sebezilindele ngabomvu.UJub Jub noMoss Makwati bazobambisana eziqeshini ezihlukene zohlelo Uyajola 9/9.Izithandani ezashada zisencane, uThando noSiyacela bakhombise abantu bakuleli ukuthi kuhamba kanjani emshadweni wabo njengoba sekuyiminyaka emithathu babopha elikasofa silahlane.Ohlelweni Uyajola 9/9,  abeMoja Love baveze ukuthi akukho okuhlukile njengoba bezoqhubeka nokusiza  abafuna ukubona ophathina babo ukuthi bathembekile yini.Ngeledlule kusabalale i-video eqoshwe eMatatiele, e-Eastern Cape, lapho uJub Jub abehambele khona.Kule video kubonakala owesilisa ogibele ihhashi ebalekela uJub Jub nethimba lakhe, bemjaha. Kugcina ngokuthi ihhashi limchithe, bamthola kanjalo.Abantu bakuleli baveze ngokusobala ukuthi lesi ngesinye seziqephu abasilindele ngabomvu.ULindiwe Mbonambi weMoja Love, ukuqinisekisile ukubuya kwazo zonke lezi zinhlelo, wathi maduzane nje bazothula nezinye.Isolezwe lihabule nokuthi kusona lesi siteshi kuzobonakala umdlalo omusha wamahlaya othi, Ikhaya Labadala.Lo mdlalo kuvela ukuthi ubophele osaziwayo abahlukene, okukhona kubo uLillian Dube, Nandi Nyembe, Jerry Pele, Vusi Thanda nabanye.Isolezwe ngeSonto libe nengxoxo noSiyacela noThando abaveze ukuthi bajabule ngokubuya kohlelo lwabo futhi bajabule ngokubuye bakhombise ngempilo yabo.Babuye baveza ukuthi emshadweni wabo kusahamba kahle.
title: Kubuya izinhlelo ezithandwayo kuMoja Love

text: KULINDELEKE zingehli kahle kubalandeli be-Orlando Pirates izindaba ezithi basazoqhubeka nokulinda ukubona unozinti wabo omusha, uBrilliant Khuzwayo, abakushayele inhlombe elikhulu ukusayiniswa kwakhe esuka ezimbangini ebezingamdlalisi iKaizer Chiefs.Ubumnyama ngokubonakala kukaKhuzwayo okokuqala enkundleni egqoke ijezi leZimnyama, buvezwe yisikhulu esiphezulu kuleli qembu uFloyd Mbele.“Usajimela ukuthi ajwayeze umzimba ukunyakaza (phecelezi irehab) kodwa yena uza kahle,” kusho uMbele.Impendulo kaMbele isho ukuthi akakaqali uKhuzwayo ukujima okuphelele neqembu ngemuva kwamasonto ekhishwe izingcingo ebezifase iqakala elilimale esejimini neZimnyama ngo-Agasti.UMbele uthe bazozwa kongoti babo ukuthi usekusiphi isigaba nokuthi abalandeli bangamlindela nini. Sekuneminyaka iPirates inezinkinga ezintini.“Njengoba nami ngingeyena nje udokotela, angikwazi ukuqagela ukuthi angase abonakale nini enkundleni. Sizozwa ethimbeni lezempilo bese siphanyeka kwi-website. Mhlawumbe kungaba yisonto elizayo (okwe-website), sizobona. Nina hlalani nibhekile kwi-website ukuthi yini esiyiphanyeka khona,” kusho uMbele.UKhuzwayo kwakuthiwe uzohlala amasonto amane ngemuva kokukhishwa izingcingo eqakaleni. Nokho kubukeka ukuphola kwalo nozinti waseMlaza, eThekwini kuthatha isikhathi eside kakhulu ukunebesilindelwe.Umdlalo cishe iningi elifisa ukumbona ngawo uKhuzwayo ngowabakhaya baseSoweto oseFNB Stadium ngo-Okthoba 27.Mayelana nalokho uMbele uthe:“Asikhathazekile ngokuthi uzodlala noma cha kowabakhaya. Ungumdlali wethu futhi usazothola ithuba kweminye eminingi yabakhaya. Kodwa ngoba ngisho nje, sizophanyeka kwi-website ukuthi uqhuba kanjani.”Akusibo bodwa abalandeli bePirates abajahe ukubona uKhuzwayo ezintini zePirates kodwa nabalandeli bakanobhutshuzwayo ngisho nabeChiefs imbala.Okwenza abeChiefs nabanye abasemaceleni bemlindele uKhuzwayo wukubona ukuthi uzokuzuza yini okuyikho okumsuse kuMakhosi.UKhuzwayo wale waphetha ukuvuselela inkontileka kwiChiefs yaze yaphela, wahamba bhusende ngoba ekhathazwa wukukhuhliswa ibhensthingu-Itumeleng Khune.Ukholwa wukuthi uma engathola ithuba lokudlala njalo angawushubisa umbango wejezi kuKhune kwiBafana Bafana.Akasolwanga muntu nokho ngesinqumo sakhe uKhuzwayo kwazise wayekhuluma iqiniso ngokuphanga ijezi kwazise uze aboshelwe ngisho elimele.AbePirates nokho bona balindele abahlenge ezinhlekeleleni abazigilwa ngonozinti babo okubalwa kubo uWayne Sandilands, Jackson Mabokgwane noSiyabonga Mpontshane ophambili kulezi nsuku.Selokhu kwadlula emhlabeni uSenzo Meyiwa, ongumkhaya kaKhuzwayo, iPirates ipheka iyathulula ezintini ayimtholi ungqo.
title: Kumnyama ngonozinti waseKZN kweZimnyama

text: BABALELWA ku-1 400 abantu bakuleli abashayela ucingo esikhungweni esisiza abanezinkinga zengcindezi yomphefumulo, iSouth African Depression and Anxiety Group (SADAG) ngosuku selokhu kwahlasela iCovid-19 kuleli.Le nhlangano uthi iningi lalaba bantu abashaya ucingo banovalo nokwesaba ngoba bengazi ukuthi ikusasa libaphatheleni, abanye behluleka ukumelana nobuhlungu bokushiywa izihlobo zabo.UNkk Cassey Chambers walesi sikhungo, uthe ngaphambi kokuthi kufike iCovid-19, bebethola izingcingo ezingu-600 ngosuku kodwa manje sebethola eziphakathi kuka-1 200 kuya ku-1 400.UNkk Chambers usho lokhu ngesikhathi echaza ukuthi ngabe ukufika kweCorona kuyishintshe kanjani indlela ebebesebenza ngayo njengoba sekuphele unyaka ikhona kuleli. "Lokho kusitshela ukuthi sidinga ukubhekana nenkinga yokuphazamiseka komqondo, i-mental health, ngendlela ehlukile kuneyakuqala ngoba baningi abantu abadinga usizo kunakuqala," kusho yena.Uthe abantu abaningi abashaya ucingo njengamanje abehlulekayo ukumelana nobuhlungu bokushiywa izihlobo, nabehluleka ukumelana nobunzima bokuphelelwa yimisebenzi."Inkinga esinayo ukuthi ukuphazamiseka komqondo emiphakathini yethu kuthathwa ngokuthi umuntu uyahlanya kanti lesi sifo sihlasela umuntu oyedwa kwabathathu kuleli. Ukuphazamiseka komqondo akusho ukuthi uyahlanya kusho ukuthi uphatheke kabi ngale ndlela yokuthi awukwazi ukumelana nakho. ICovid-19 isikhombise ukuthi kusamele sifundisane ukuthi ukuphumela obala kwaziwe ukuthi awuphathekile kahle kuyindlela yokuzelapha futhi akulona ihlazo. Ziningi izinto ezishintshile ngokufika kweCovid-19. Besinendlela yethu yokududuzana uma sishiywe izihlobo, manje asisakwazi ukufika phakathi nesonto siduduze, sikhalisane obekwehlisa ubuhlungu kulabo abashonelwe. Nangomngcwabo asikwazi ukwenza izinto ngendlela ebesenza ngayo," kusho yena.Uthe uma beqhathanisa izibalo zika-2019 no-2020, ngo-2019 bathole izingcingo ezingu-225 000 kwathi nyakenye lesi sibalo saphindaphindeka kabili saba u-450 000.Izingcingo ezingu-95 000 uthe bezivela kubantu abazizwa benomuzwa wokuzibulala."Ngeshwa asinazo izibalo zokuthi bangaki abazibulele ngalesi sikhathi, kumele sizwe sihlanganise ukuze sibe nezibalo eziyizo,"  kusho yena.
title: Sinyukile  esabanokhwantalala ngenxa yeCorona

text: KUTHIWA bayizigidi eziyisikhombisa abakuleli abaqhubeka nokuthenga ugwayi ongekho emthethweni, phezu kokuba kuvaliwe ukudayiswa kwawo ukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kweCovid-19.Kusukela kwamenyezelwa imigomo kathaqa ekupheleni kukaMashi, kwavalwa ukudayiswa kukagwayi kodwa kuthiwa kukhona abawushushumbisayo.Ngokombiko weHuman Sciences Research Council (HSRC), abantu basawuthola ugwayi, ikakhulukazi labo abahlala emijondolo nasemalokishini. Ucwaningo luthole ukuthi kubantu abangu-19 330, bangu-12% abazivumele ukuthi basawuthenga ugwayi. I-HSRC yenze lolu cwaningo phakathi kuka-Ephreli 4 kuya ku-Ephreli 28. Ucwaningo luveza ukuthi kwabahlala emijondolo abangu-24% bathe basawuthola ugwayi.“Kunzima ukugwema ukubhebhetheka kweCovid-19 uma ugwayi usadayiswa ubuthaphuthaphu. Yize bebaningi abaphuza utshwala kunababhemayo kuleli, ucwaningo lukhomba ukuthi abathola ugwayi kumanje basengcupheni enkulu yokuthola iCovid-19. Bakhona nabadayisa utshwala ngokungemthetho kodwa sithole ukuthi bambalwa kunabadayisa ugwayi,” kusho iHSRC.UMnuz Yusuf Abramjee ongumsunguli weTax Justice South Africa, uthe yize ukudayiswa kukagwayi kwenza umnotho ulahlekelwe uR35 million ngosuku, lolu cwaningo luveza ngokusobala ukuthi bangakanani abasengcupheni yokuthola ubhubhane.“UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, ngaleli sonto uveze ukuthi ukudayiswa kukagwayi ngokungemthetho kunyuke ngo-30%. Ngaphambi kokuqala kukathaqa, ngoyedwa kwabathathu obethenga ugwayi ongekho emthethweni, manje isibalo sinyukile. Okuthusa kakhulu ukuthi izibalo ziveza ukuthi igciwane lisazobhebhetheka,” kusho * -Abramjee.Uthe okwandisa amathuba okutheleleka ukuthi abathenga ngokungemthetho baphula nemigomo yokuqhelelana. Ukuvalwa kokudayiswa kukagwayi kususe umsindo ngesikhathi izinkampani zawo ezinkulu zisabisa ngokubopha uhulumeni. I-British American Tobacco ibuye yasihoxisa lesi sinqumo yathi izosebenza nohulumeni ukubheka izindlela zokunqanda igciwane, yaphakamisa nokuthi ugwayi udayiswe ezitolo ezisemthethweni.I-World Heath Organisation ixwayisa ngokuthi ababhemayo basengcupheni yokuhaqwa yiCovid-19.
title: Basawuthenga ngokungemthetho ugwayi

text: I-ANC isiphumele obala yavuma ukuthi ibhekene nenkinga yezezimali ngenxa yokulaxazwa ngabaxhasi nosekuholele ukuthi ihluleke izikhawu eziningi ukuholela ngesikhathi abasebenzi bayo.Njengoba abasebenzi bale nhlangano bezokuba nemibhikisho namhlanje lapho bezokuba bekhala ngokungaholelwa ngesikhathi, izolo i-ANC ibhoboke ngokulaxazwa kwayo ngabaxhasi nethe yikhona okwenze ukuthi ihluleke ukukhokhela ngesikhathi abasebenzi bayo imiholo.UMgcinimafa Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Paul Mashatile, uveze ukuthi abaxhasi baqale ukuqhela kuyona ngesikhathi kubheduka ubhubhane iCorona ngonyaka owedlule.UMashatile uthe bathe besazama ukubhekana nengcindezi yokuqhela kosomabhizinisi abebehlehle ngenxa yomthelela ongemuhle weCorona  kwezomnotho, izinto zavele zabheda kakhulu kulo nyaka ngesikhathi kuqala ukusebenza komthetho olawula ukuxhaswa ngemali kwamaqembu ezepolitiki.UMashatile, obenenkulumo ekhethekile nesiteshi sethelevishini esikhokhelwayo, uthe abaxhasi abaningi balaxaze le nhlangano ngesikhathi kuqala ukusebenza kwalo mthetho ngo-Ephreli. Lo mthetho uphoqa amaqembu ezepolitiki ukuba adalule bonke abanikela kuwo ngemali.“Kukhona osomabhizinisi abangafuni ukuthi amagama abo adalulwe. Ingakho bemanqika ukunikela. Lena akusiyona inkinga ebhekene nathi kuphela, kepha namanye amaqembu ezepolitiki azochaphazeleka.“Lesi simo sifike sivele sidonsa kanzima njengoba bekunzima ukuthola abantu abazoxhasa inhlangano njengoba osomabhizinisi abaningi bekhahlamezwe iCorona nomvalelandlini.”UMashatile uthe njengamanje le nhlangano idonsa ngodizili.“Isimo sinzima. Njengoba sikhuluma nje abasebenzi abakayitholi imiholo yabo kaMeyi. Sinethemba lokuthi bazoyithola lingakapheli leli sonto.”UMashatile uthe isisombululo sinye kule nkinga, wathi ukudiliza abasebenzi, nathe bazoncishiswa ngo-50%.“Kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi sigcina kuphela abasebenzi esibadingayo, hhayi abantu abazolokhu bezulazula ehhovisi, abangenamsebenzi.”Namhlanje abasebenzi be-ANC kulindeleke ukuthi babhikishe ekomkhulu lale nhlangano eLuthuli House, eGoli, emahhovisi ezifundazwe nawezifunda, lapho bezokube bekhalaza ngokhondolo lokuholelwa sekudlule isikhathi.Izinkinga zamaholo kwi-ANC zaqala ngo-Disemba 2019, lapho abasebenzi bale nhlangano baqala khona ukuhola emva kwesikhathi. Ngo-Ephreli, le nhlangano ibhalele abasebenzi bayo ibatshela ukuba balindele ukuthi imiholo yabo izongena emva kwesikhathi.
title: I-ANC ivuma ukushaywa yinkece nokulaxazwa ngabaxhasi

text: USHUMAYELA ivangeli lokuzithoba umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, ezakhe ezingakangenelwa yigoli emqhudelwaneni iCAF Champions League.IPirates inyukele esicongweni sikaGroup B emuva kokubhaxabula iHoroya A.C yaseGuinea ngo 3-0, emdlalweni wesibili wamaqoqo e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Amagoli ashaywe nguJustin Shonga amabili noThembinkosi Lorch. Emdlalweni wokuqala wamaqoqo iPirates idlale ngokulingana ngo 0-0 neFC Platinum yaseZimbabwe ekuhambeni. Ukuwina kwePirates kusho ukuthi iyalingana ngamaphuzu ne-Esperance yaseTunisia ehlule iPlatinum ngo 2-0 ngoMgqibelo.EZimnyama zihlezi phezulu ngenxa yokuthi azikangenelwa yigoli kwazise zibambene ngamagoli ashayiwe.“Besikade sihlele ukuthi sizobavimba bangangeni ebhokisini lethu ngoba emidlalweni edlule sibacubungulile sabona ukuthi wonke amagoli bawashaya sebengaphakathi kulona.“Ngicabanga ukuthi lokhu sikwenze kahle ngoba abadlali benze ngendlela ebesikade sihlele ngayo yokuvikela ibhokisi lethu,” kusho uSredojevic.Uthi kodwa baphila ngokuthi uma kukuhle ungajabuli kuze kweqe nokuthi uma kukubi ungalilahli ithemba.“Ngijabule ngokuthi lo mdlalo usibuyisele ukuzethemba nokuthi asingenelwanga yigoli nakho kusho lukhulu.“Kodwa ngisekude ukujabula ngoba kusekuningi okufanele sikulungise njengeqembu nangayedwana.“Le wini siyibhekise kuPhilemon Masinga, aphumule ngokuthula, “kubeka uSredojevic. Uqhuba nokulanda uthe sesibheke ekuphumuleni ukuze balungele umdlalo ne-Chippa neBlack Leopards.“Ngemuva kwalokho bese sibhekana ne-Esperance emasontweni amabili kusukela manje.“Ngakho asinaso isikhathi sokunaka osekwedlule.”UMicho, odabuka eSerbia uphinde waphawula ngomdlalo wasekuhambeni ne-Esperance ozoba ngoFebhuwari 12 eTunisia. Lo mdlalo uzodlalwa ngaphandle kwabalandeli. Lokhu kungenxa yesigwebo semidlalo emibili i-Esperance esithole enhlanganweni eyengamele ibhola e-Afrika, i-Confederation of African Football (CAF) ngenxa yobudlova babalandeli bayo.“Ngiyababongela ukuthi baqeda iminyaka engu-100. Lokhu akuyona into elula ebholeni lase-Afrika. Bayiqembu elikhulu, kodwa kuyishwa ukuthi bazodlala ngaphandle kwabalandeli kodwa ebholeni kunjalo, kufanele ujeze uma kukhona okungalungile.”Uthi ukudlala ngaphandle kwabalandeli kuhle futhi kubi.“Kuhle ngokuthi zizobe zingekho lezi zinto abaxhopha ngazo unozinti wethu, abadlali basemuva nabanye.“Okubi ukuthi sizodlala kusebusika obukhulu njengoba uFebhuwari 12 no 13 kuzobe kubanda kakhulu kule ndawo okufanayo nangoJulayi lapha.Ngakho kufanele sisheshe sithole ngokushesha indlela yokuzijwayeza nesimo sezulu emuva komdlalo wabakhaya ngoFebhuwari 9,” kusho uSredojevic.
title: Ushumayela ivangeli lokuzithoba uSredojevic

text: WILLEM PHUNGULAAYISEKHO emhlabeni inkosi yesizwe saseNhlangwini eHighflats, uMntwana uMelizwe Dlamini. Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba inkosi ikhothame namhlanje ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokudunguzela isikhathi eside. Izindaba zokukhothama kwenkosi ziqinisekiswe ngokhulumela isizwe saseNhlangwini, uMntwana uMqondisi Dlamini. Uthe imininingwane egcwele izomenyezelwa kusasa  ngoMgqibelo noma  ngeSonto emuva komhlangano womndeni.
title: Kuyenele iNkosi yaseNhlangwini

text: AMAPHAPHU aphezulu kosomatekisi abakwiMpumalanga Taxi Owners Association emuva kokubulawa kukaMnuz Mthethomusha “Mthetho” Ngubane (38), odutshulwe emgwaqweni uN3 eduze kwaseHammarsdale, izolo ekuseni nomunye odutshulwe ngabo-6.30 ntambama.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela lingakatholakali igama likasomatekisi wesibili obulewe kodwa izindaba zokudutshulwa kwakhe ziqinisekiswe nguSihlalo weSantaco eDurban West uMnuz Mathula Mkhize othe sebezwile ukuthi kulimale omunye kodwa basaqoqa imininingwane.Osomatekisi abangathandanga ukudalulwa amagama ngenxa yokusaba ukuthi bangase badutshulwe bathe isimo asisihle kusoseshini waseMpumalanga njengoba ungenabo ubuholi obuphezulu.Baveze ukuthi ngoJulayi nyakenye kudutshulwe iPhini likaSihlalo, uMnuz Dumisani Magwaza kwathi ngoKhisimusi kwabulawa uMnuz Mbhekeni Hlophe odutshulwe ngentululwane yezinhlamvu.UMnuz Mluleki Mntungwa, obhekelele ezokuxhumana eMnyangweni wezokuThutha, ukuPhepha koMphakathi nokuXhumana KwaZulu-Natal, uthe uNgqongqoshe uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda ukhathazekile ngokubulawa kosomatekisiembonini.“Ungqongqoshe uhlela umhlangano namalungu kasoseshini waseMpumalanga nezinye izinhlaka ezithintekayo ukuthola ukuthi kwenzekani. Umhlangano uzoba maduze ngoba ungqongqoshe ufuna siphele isihlava sokubulawa kosomatekisi. Ugqugquzela namaphoyisa ukuthi akuphenyisisie ukubulawa kosomatekisi,” kusho uMntungwa.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kaNgubane ukuthi uphawule ayiphumelelanga njengoba zingatholakalanga izinombolo zawo.UMkhize, uthe baphatheke kabi ngokuqothana eMpumalanga futhi bazoba nomhlangano namalungu akhona lingakapheli isonto.UCaptain Nqobile Gwala, wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe ngabo-6.50 ekuseni amaphoyisa athole isidumbu sowesilisa (38) sinamanxeba okudutshulwa kwesingenhla.“Amaphoyisa aseHammarsdale aphenya icala lokubulala, ayikakatholakali imbangela yokubulawa kwalona wesilisa. Asikakabophi muntu futhi sicela noma ngubani onemininingwane ngalesi sigameko ukuthi athinte amaphoyisa aseduze naye noma iCrime Stop ku-08600 10111,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Uvalo eMpumalanga kudutshulwa osomatekisi

text: ISIBABULI somdlali waMaZulu FC, uSiyethemba Mnguni oseshintshe isibongo njengoba esezibiza ngoSithebe, sithi izinkinga zasemsamo yizona eziholele kulolu guquko.Ngokwejwayelekile nxa owesilisa eshintsha isibongo, kuyaye kube ukuthi usuka kwesakoninalume, aye kwesikayise. Kodwa uSiyethemba wenze okungajwayelekile ebuyela kwesakoninalume.Engxoxweni ekhethekile uSithebe abe nayo neSolezwe, uSuthu luqeda ukuqukula isicoco seKZN Premier’s Cup okokuqala, uyichazile eyokushintsha isibongo sakhe.“Sikhula sikholelwa emasikweni ahlukene. Nokho ngithe ngiya ngokukhula kwavela izinkinga. Empeleni komalume kukwaSithebe bese kuthi isibongo sikababa kube uMnguni.Kodwa ukucacisa nje mina ngikhule kwaSithebe, nokho ngabiza isibongo sikababa okunguMnguni. Ngenxa yokuthi kukhona okungenzekanga, ngibe sengiba nezinkinga, okuholele ekutheni ngibuyele emuva,” kuchaza le nsizwa yemiyeko egqoka ijezi unombolo 14.USithebe ushaye into ecokeme ngesizini edlule, ekubeni kade kuyisizini yakhe yokuqala kwi-Absa Premiership. Umdlalo agqama kuwona ingesikhathi uSuthu lushaya iLamontville Golden Arrows ngo 2-1 ngoFebhuwari nonyaka ngesizini edlule kwi-Absa Premiership.“Ngizoqhubeka lapho ngigcine khona ngesizini edlule. Kubalulekile ukudlala ngendlela efanayo nangokwedlulele ngoba abalandeli balindele lokho kimina.Kodwa ngiphushela ukuthi okungenani kube khona isicoco esisodwa esisitholayo siyiqembu,” usho kanje uSithebe.AmaZulu azovula neBaroka FC ngoMgqibelo eKing Zwelithini Stadium ngo 8.15 ebusuku.“Sizobhekana neqembu eligijimayo iBaroka kodwa ukudlala kwiPremier’s Cup kusisizile kakhulu ngoba sikwazile ukubona abadlali futhi nangokomqondo babonakala sebesesimweni esihle.Sekusele izinto ezimbalwa nje ukuthi sizihlanganise maphakathi nesonto, noma kanjani izoshaya impelasonto sesiwulungele umdlalo,” kusho umqeqeshi waMaZulu uCavin Johnson. ngemuva kokunqoba isicoco seKZN Premiers Cup.@MgabadeliNdu
title: Izinkinga zomsamo zimenze waguqula isibongo owaMaZulu

text: UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma ugcine eqoke uGeneral Khehla John Sitole njengoKhomishana wamaphoyisa kuzwelonke emuva kokuthi iNingizimu Afrika isihlale iminyaka eyisikhombisa ingenaye ukhomishana.USitole ubeyiNhloko yoPhiko lwezokuvikela kuzwelonke kanti useke waba nguKhomishana wamaPhoyisa eFree State. Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe yihhovisi likaMengameli Jazcob Zuma uthe “uSitole unesipiliyoni seminyaka emaphoyiseni okuzomsiza ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe wokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika baphephile. Simfisela konke okuhle esikhundleni sakhe,” kusho uZuma.USithole wazalalwa eStanderton eMpumalanga kanti waqala ukuba yiphoyisan go-1986.“Ubelokhu ekhula emsebenzini wakhe ezikhundleni zobuphoyisa kwazise ngo-2011 uqale ukungena ezikhundleni ezikuzwelonke njengoLietenant General,” kusho uZuma.Okhomishana bamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika ababeqashwe ngokugcwele yilaba -1995-2002  George Fivaz -2002 -2009 Jackie Selebi (Owasuswa esikhundleni ngemuva kokugwetshelwa amacala enkohlakalalo)-2009-2011 Bheki Cele (Owaxoshwa njengoKhomishana ngemuva kophenyo olwenziwa nguMvikeli woMphakathi uThuli Madonsela olwamuthola engasilungele isikhundla sokuhola amaphoyisa)Akade bewokhomishana ababambile -2011-2012 Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi -2012-2015 Riah Phiyega (Osuke kulesi sikhundla ngemuva kwesibhicongo saseMarikana, okwadutshulwa kwabulawa kuso abavukuzi abangu-34 ababebhikisha)-2015-2017 Kgomotso Phahlane -Juni 2017 Lesetja Mothiba
title: UZuma uqoke uKhomishana omusha wamaphoyisa

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEIMENENJA kaThemba “Mshishi” Zwane weMamelodi Sundowns ithi kumele bathinte iqembu abazimisele ngokusayinisa lo mdlali oyiqale ngenothi eliphezulu isizini yeDStv Premiership.UJazzman Mahlakgane ophethe izindaba zale nsephe utshele Isolezwe ukuthi sekuke kwafika kuye ukuthi uPitso Mosimane oqeqesha i-Al Ahly e-Egypt, uyayifuna. Nokho uthe akukho ukuxhumana okusemthethweni osekwenzekile phakathi kwakhe noMosimane noma i-Al Ahly.Uthe akafuni ukwanda ngalolu daba ngoba kumele kuhlonishwe ukuthi uZwane unenkontileka neSundowns.“Angifuni ukuqamba amanga, kufikile ezindlebeni zami ukuthi uMosimane ufuna uZwane amjoyine e-Egypt. Kulukhuni-ke ukuphawula ngalolu daba ngoba akukho ukuxhumana okusemthethweni osekube khona.  Angazi mhlawumbe i-Al Ahly seyike yaba nakho ukuxhumana neSundowns. Udaba olunjena lubucayi ngoba uZwane ungomunye wabadlali ababalulekile kwiSundowns. Ngaphandle kwalokho kumele sikuhloniphe ukuthi unenkontileka neSundowns,” kusho uMahlakgane.Kuthintwa uShupi Nkgadima osemnyangweni wezokuxhumana kwiSundowns uthe ucela ukubhalelwa umyalezo, ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma ngamahebezi  ocingweni. Akawuphendula umyalezo abhalelwe wona. Kwale noma esekhunjuzwa kodwa wangabuyela entathelini. Iwindi lokusayiniswa kwabadlali livaliwe kuleli ngoMsombuluko. Seliyoze livulwe ngonyaka ozayo. Omunye umdlali weSundowns okuke kwavela uthi ufunwa uMosimane, uGaston Sirino.Kuvela lezi ndaba nje, ezinyangeni ezedlule uMahlakgane watshela Isolezwe ukuthi uZwane ngeke esamyisa ndawo, uzogugela kuleli.Wayekusho lokhu emuva kokuvela kwamahebezi athi le njini igaqelwe amaqembu athile phesheya kwezilwandle.UMahlakgane wakhala ngeminyaka yobudala esihambile kuZwane (33). Waphinde waziseka ngokuthi iligi yakuleli isezingeni eliphezulu. Wathi ngeke aphuphise uZwane ngokumyisa kumaligi angasile, ufanelwe ukudlala kwahloniphekile.Selokhu uZwane abuyela kwiSundowns, ephuma ekubolekisweni kwiMpumalanga Black Aces, ungomunye wabadlali abebengaconsi phansi kuMosimane owayefike kwiSundowns ngo-2012.Kwisizini edlule uZwane uqokwe njengomdlali ovelele kwiPremiership. Ubuye wamuka nomklomelo wePlayers' Player of the Season, Midfielder of the Season noweSundowns Players' Player of the Season.Kwaqala usoseshini wezintatheli iSouth African Football Journalist Association (Safja) owamgixabeza ngomklomelo womdlali velele kwisizini edlule.UZwane ungomunye wabadlali abanqobe izicoco zeligi noMosimane amahlandla amahlanu.Nalo mqeqeshi uphinde wanqoba kabili iTelkom Knockout neNedbank Cup ngokuhlukana kwemiqhudelwano.Unqobe neCaf Champions League ngo-2016 neCaf Super Cup ngo-2017. Lo mdlali kuzobhekwa ukuthi aqhubeke nefomu aqale ngayo uma iSundowns seyivakashele iMaritzburg United ngoMgqibelo eHarry Gwala Stadium ngo-8.15 ebusuku. Useshaye amagoli amahlanu kwiligi, emidlalweni emihlanu.
title: Angase alandele uMosimane umdlali ongayibheki inethi

text: UMENGAMELI wakuleli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uthi zizoqala kusasa izingxoxo ngokuxegiswa kwemithetho ethinta ukudayiswa kukatshwala nogwayi kuleli. URamaphosa uveze lokho ngesikhathi ehambele isifundazwe i-Eastern Cape ukuyobheka ukuthi uhulumeni walesi sifundazwe ulwa kanjani naleli gciwane.Ekhuluma nabezindaba uRamaphosa ukhumbuze abantu bakuleli ukuthi ngeke bahlale ngaphansi kwezigaba zikathaqa impilo yabo yonke wabacela ukuthi babekezele ngoba vele sekunqunyiwe ukuthi izwe lizongena esigabeni sesithathu kusukela ngenyanga ezayo.  "Bengazi ngeke usale umbuzo katshwala nogwayi. Sesishilo vele ukuthi sizokwehlela esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa, sekushoda ukuthi simemezele imithetho ezohambisana nalesi sigaba. Kusasa sizoqala izingxoxo ngokudayiswa kukagwayi notshwala nomkhandlu obekelwe ukulwa neCovid-19 bese sidlulela ezifundazweni ngoMgqibelo," kusho uRamaphosa. Umengameli uncome ukuzimisela kwabantu bakuleli ngokubambisana nohulumeni ukulwa neCovid-19, ukuthi yinto angakaze ayibone yenzeka kwamanye amazwe omhlaba ahlaselwe yileli gciwane.“Ngihlabeke umxhwele ngendlela lesi sifundazwe esilusingethe ngalo udaba lweCovid-19 ngoba ididiyele izinhlaka ezihlukene,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe uzothumela ongqongqoshe namaphini abo kulesi sifundazwe ukuthi bazosebenzisana nohulumeni wakhona, njengoba esenze okufanayo nakwezinye izifundazwe zakuleli.Wenze isibonelo ngokuthi nanoma yini ezodinga ukungenelela kukahulumeni ngokuphathelene nodlame lobulili, nosizo lwezokuphepha, uhulumeni ngeke ananaze ukuhlinzeka ngosizo.Uthe nezikole ezingu-3,300 osekutholakele ukuthi zidinga amanzi nokuphuculwa kulesi sifundazwe, akumele zivulwe zingakahlinzekwa ngezidingo ezifanele.Ngokusho kwakhe, ukuhlangana ngaso sonke isikhathi ngenhloso yokunciphisa ukusabalala kweCovid-19, yikhona okusiza kakhulu.“Nami ngihlale nginemihlangano ethatha amahora angu-18 kuya kwangu-20 ngoba ngihlose ukuthi silwe ngokubambisana,” usho kanje.URamaphosa uthe iCovid-19 isifundise ukungazicabangeli wedwa.Uthe esikwenza manje kufanele sazi sikwenzela ikusasa lezwe.“EGauteng u-50% wezibhedlela ezakhiwa kabusha, zilungiselelwa ukuthi zisebenze uma sekuqale uhlelo lwe National Health Insurance (NHI),” usho njalo.URamaphosa uhambela kulesi sifundazwe nje, kubikwa ukuthi singesinye esihlaselwe kakhulu yiCovid-19.Ngesikhathi sokuloba bebebalelwa ku-1 532 abantu asebesuleleke ngaleli gciwane. Asebesindile bona bebebalelwa ku-632, abashonile bengu-24.UDkt Zweli Mkhize onguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uthe kubikwa isibalo esikhulu nje kulesi sifundazwe, yingenxa yokuthi kuthathe esikhathi eside ukuthi kube nabasulelekayo ngaleli gciwane, nokuthi kunokusulelana phakathi kwaso nesaseWestern ngenxa yokwakhelana kwazo.
title: 'Sizoqala kusasa ukubhunga olukagwayi notshwala' - Ramaphosa

text: UMNYANGO wezeMpilo kuleli uthi bangaphezu kuka-126 000 abantu abadala asebebhalisele ukugomela iCovid-19,  sekulokhu kwethulwe uhlelo lokubhaliswa kwabo ngoLwesihlanu.Uhlelo lokubhalisa abantu abaneminyaka engu-60 kuya phezulu, i-Eletronic Vaccination Data System (EVDS),  luqale ukusebenza ngokusemthethweni ngoLwesihlanu ntambama kanti kubhaliswa kwi-website. Lwethulwa nje abantu abaningi basakhathazekile ngokuthi uhlelo lokugoma kuleli  luhamba kancane. Muva nje, kumiswe nokugonywa kwabasebenzi bezempilo abagonywa ngeJohnson &Johnson. Umgomo umiswe ngemva kombiko othi e-United States, kunabesifazane okutholakale ukuthi igazi labo linamahlule ngemuva kokugonywa ngalo mgomo.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe uhlelo lokugoma luhamba kahle futhi luzoqhubeka uma sekutholakele ulwazi oludingekayo.UNkk Milani Wolmaran, umphathi we-EVDS kulo mnyango uthe ngehora luvuliwe lolu hlelo kubhalise abantu abangu-126 000.UNkk Wolmaran uthe bayazi ukuthi bakhona abantu abangenawo amaselula abangakwazi ukungena kulolu hlelo wathi umnyango unazo izinhlelo zokuthi abangakwazi basizwe ngabanye abantu emphakathini  ngokubhalisa. Lezi zinhlelo uthe zizobe zenziwa ezikhungweni zomphakathi ezinjengamahholo nezinye izindawo ezizomenyezelwa." Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi kuphephile, siyazi ukuthi bakhona abantu abangenawo kwawona amaselula kodwa uma ungakwazi ukubhalisa ngohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe uyakwazi ukuyobhalisa esikhungweni sokugoma kodwa asifuni ukuthi kube nabantu abaningi abashaye ujenge kulezi zikhungo. Uma usubhalisile uzothola umyalezo okutshelayo ukuthi usuku lwakho lokugoma lunini. Ubuchwepheshe buyathuthukiswa njengoba luqhubeka sizolokhu siluthuthukisa kuze kube abantu abaningi bayakwazi ukulusebenzisa,"  kusho yena.UDkt Mkhize uthe uhulumeni ufuna ukugoma kuqale ngalabo abasengcupheni yokuthola iCovid-19 okungabantu abadala, nabagulayo. Unxuse amalungu omphakathi akwaziyo ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe ukuthi asize abantu abadala abangakwazi ukuzibhalisa
title: Bangaphezulu kuka-126 000 abadala ababhalisele ukugomela iCovid-19

text: INGANE yentombazane eneminyaka emithathu itholakale emgodini ojulile inqunu, ngemuva kwezinsuku eziyisithupha ilahlekile KwaKhula, eDukuduku.UYamkelwa “Yami”  Ndlanzi wanyamalala ekade edlala nengane yomfana enguntanga wakhe yakwamakhelwane.“Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje umama womntwana wayekhona esendlini. Wathi uma ephuma wafica umntwana engasekho. Wabe esehlaba umkhosi. Umphakathi waphuma ngobuningi bawo wathungatha umntwana,” kusho uNksz Bongiwe Mbuyisa, ongusonhlalakahle kule ndawo.Uthi zonke izinsuku umphakathi ubulokhu uvuke njalo uthungatha le ngane yentombazane, okuthe ngosuku etholakale ngalo, umphakathi wanqamula emahlathini waze wafika kwesinye isakhiwo esingahlali muntu, ebesikhiyiwe.“Bezwe umsindo womuntu okhalayo beqa ucingo. Yilapho bethole khona uYami esemgodini, engasagqokile, ephelelwe ngamandla futhi ezama ukuphuma kodwa ehluleka. Uthathwe endaweni yesigameko, waphuthunyiswa emtholampilo ukuyobhekwa ukuthi akanukubezekanga yini ngokocansi.  Imphumela ibingakabuyi,” kusho uNksz Mbuyisa.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukanina wengane ayiphumelelanga ngenxa  yokuthi ubematasatasa esibhedlela saseRichards Bay, kodwa okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uYami utholakele futhi usesezandleni zomndeni wakhe.“Ngemuva kophenyo olunzima lwamaphoyisa endawo, uphiko lweK9 Unit namalungu omphakathi, uYamkelwa utholakele izolo (esho ngoLwesihlanu) emgodini wasendaweni yakwaKhula. Ubengalimele futhi uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ukuba ayoxilongwa,” kuphetha uColonel Mbele.UNksz Mbuyisa unxuse abazali ukuba bangahlali imizuzu ephakathi kuka-20 no-30 bengazi ukuthi abantwana babo bakuziphi izinkalo.“Singabashiyi bodwa. Akube khona omdala kunabo okwaziyo ukukhuluma.Umphakathi awubambisane namaphoyisa uma kukhona isigameko esikhona futhi uphume inqina ngoba yinto engehlela nanoma ngubani lena.Abazali abazame ukutshela abantwana ukuthi uma kukhona umuntu ofuna ukuthatha omunye wabo, bakhale kakhulu. Kungasiza nalokho.”Esephetha uNksz Mbuyisa unxuse abazali ukuthi uma beyophuza noma edolobheni bacelele abantwana komakhewane, bangazishiyi izingane zodwa.
title: Intombazane (3) itholakale inqunu isemgodini

text: ABALANDELI befilimu ethi Happiness is a Four Letter Word, bazokujabulela ukuzwa izindaba zokubuya kwale filimu esishintshe igama njengoba isizokwaziwa ngeHappiness Ever After.Ifilimu i-Happiness Ever After, izoqhubeka lapho  kwagcina khona i-Happiness is a Four Letter Word, njengoba ibophele abalingisi okukhona kubo uKhanyi Mbau noRenate Stuurman.Ifilimu yakamuva isuselwe encwadini ethi Happiness Ever After, ebhalwe uNozizwe Cynthia Jele.UNozizwe uveze ukuthi le filimu izoqhubeka ithathe izinhliziyo zabantu abaningi njengoba ibheka izihloko ezimnandi okukhona kuzo ezithinta uthando  nobungani. “Kodwa ke kulokhu ababukeli bangalindela isiphetho esihle njengoba kuzoba khona abantu abazoba sothandweni olusha, okuyinto ababukeli abangayilindela ngamehlo abomvu njengoba kuzoba yinto ebingalindelekile nezoshiya abaningi bemangele,” kuchaza yena. UKhanyi Mbau uveze ukuthi yize ifilimu yokuqala ihlukile kancane kule ncwadi okususelwe kuyo eyakamuva, kodwa ukubuya kwabalingisi abadala kuzokwenza ithakaselwe futhi basheshe babone ukuthi iya kuphi. “Abakubona kwifilimu yokuqala nale entsha kuzobajabulisa kakhulu njengoba kuzoba yinjabulo yodwa ehambisana nezigigaba ezehlukene. Sifuna ukuthatha ababukeli nabalandeli bethu sibanike into entsha. Abantu ababuka ifilimu ethi Happiness is a Four Letter Word uma sekuqala le bazobuyiselwa eminyakeni emihlanu edlule ngokuthi kwagcinaphi bese siya kokusha okuqhubekayo manje,” kuphetha uKhanyi.AbakwaNetflix baveze ukuthi bamatasa baqopha le filimu manje eGoli, futhi maduze bazomemezela ukuthi izobonakala nini esiteshini sabo.
title: Ibuya nokuhlukile ifilimu ebophele osaziwayo

text: ILALE ibaliwe indoda (34) esolwa ngokudlwengula udadewabo (11) nomngani wakhe (8) isikhathi esingangamasonto amabili, ePhase 6, eWaterloo.Indoda iboshwe ngoMgqibelo ngabo-1 emini emuva kokuthi amalungu eReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa) eyiphulukisile emphakathini obufuna ukuyibulala.Ngokusho kwabeRusa bafice indoda esolwa ngokudlwe­ngula izivalele endlini kugcwele amalungu omphakathi ngaphandle ephethe obhushu, izinduku zegalofu namabhodlela efuna ukuzibambela.Abe-Reaction Unit bathe uma bebuza ukuthi kwenzenjani batshelwa ukuthi indoda ibivakashele uyise obekade eye emshadweni nenkosikazi yakhe.Kuthiwa uthe eyolanda udadewabo (ozalwa yinkosikazi kayise) obesele kamakhelwane ethi akazohlala naye kodwa wanqaba udadewabo.“Uye watshela omakhelwane akade eshiywe kubo ukuthi akathandi ukusala nomfowabo ngoba usaba ukuthi uzomdlwengula futhi. Kuthe uma omakhelwane bembuza ukuthi kwenzeke nini lokhu bathola ukuthi kade kwenzeka futhi indoda ibidlwengula udadewabo nomngani wakhe ohlala komunye umuzi,” kusho abeRusa.Omakhelwane bathole ukuthi umngani kadadewabo ubelokhu ekhala ngobuhlungu ebuntwini bakhe emasontweni amabili edlule kodwa unina ecabanga ukuthi uzilimaze edlala.Kuthe uma bezibuzisisa izingane ukuthi indoda ibizidlwengulelaphi zathi ibiziyisa endaweni esithele esemuva kwezindlu igile khona imikhuba yayo.Kuye kwasabalala indaba yokuthi indoda idlwengule izingane umphakathi wase ufuna ukumlimaza.Kuthiwa indoda, enezingane ezintathu, iye yazivalela endlini isaba abantu akade sebebuthene kubo. Isizwe wukufika konogada beRusa abayithathile bayidlulisela emaphoyiseni.UColonel Thembeka Mbele wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa ayazi ngodaba.Uthe amaphoyisa abhekelele amacala athinta udlame lwemindeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nocansi asePhoenix aphenya amacala amabili okudlwengula. Indoda izovela namhlanje enkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam.
title: Uboshiwe ‘odlwengule’ udadewabo nomngani

text: “ASISUKI kuleli  sango  lenyuvesi kuze kube iziphathimandla zihlangabezana nesikufunayo.”Abesho kanje  amalungu angu-44 omkhandlu omele izitshudeni e-University of KwaZulu-Natal abeqhinqe nezimpahla zawo zokulala esangweni elikhulu, ophikweni lwayo oluseWestville izolo.Zifuna inyuvesi ibuyise zonke izitshudeni ezindaweni ezihlala izitshudeniUNobhala wesigungu uPhilani Mncwango, uthe selokhu behlale ngaphandle kwamasango kusukela ngoMsombuluko balala khona ngoba bafuna ukubonisa ulaka labo ngezinqumo ezicindezela izitshudeni ezathathwa yinyuvesi.“Inyuvesi yathatha isinqumo sokuthi izomukela izitshudeni ezingu-13 000 kuphela ezindaweni zokuhlala izitshudeni kulo nyaka kuhlanganisa zonke izikhungo zayo.  Lesi isibalo sincane kakhulu ngoba kusona kukhona nezitshudeni ezizokwenza unyaka wokuqala nasebebuya,” kusho uPhilaniUthe ngesikhathi elakuleli likuthaqa, inyuvesi yaqhubeka nokukhokhisa izitshudeni imali yokuhlala endaweni ehlala izitshudeni yize kukhona ezagcina ukuhlala ngoMashi kuqala uthaqa.“Sifuna inyuvesi ibuyisele izitshudeni imali yazo ikakhulu lezo ezingakhokhelwa esikhwameni sezitshudeni, i-National Student Financial Aid Scheme kwazise abaxhaswe yilesi sikhwama uNgqongqoshe uDkt Blade Nzimande wathembisa ukuthi bazokhokhelwa.  Ngokwazi kwethu imali yokuhlala ibalwa ngosuku oluhlalile ngakho okwenziwa yinyuvesi kuwukuqola izitshudeni ilanga libalele,”  kusho uPhilaniOkunye abakhala ngako bathi inyuvesi yasihlaba inhlali isiphakamiso sezitshudeni sokuthi yesule u- 50% wemali ekweletwa izitshudeni yanyakenye elakuleli libhekene nezinselelo zokwehla komnotho nokulahleka kwemisebenzi ngenxa yobhubhane i-Covid 19, okugcina sekwenyusa umthwalo kubazali.Bakhala nangohlelo lokubhalisa ngezobuchwepheshe abathi luzodida izitshudeni ezizokwenza unyaka wokuqala,banxusa inyuvesi ukuthi kulezi zitshudeni isebenzise uhlelo olujwayelekile.  Lezi zitshudeni zithe abaholi bazo bayaxoxisana neziphathimandla, kanti zizoqhubeka nokulala emasangweni kuze kube inyuvesi ihlangabezana nezikufunayo.Obambe njengoMqondisi ophikweni lwezokuXhumana e-UKZN uNksz Normah Zondo uthe bayaxhumana nobuholi bezitshudeni ngezikhalo zabo.“Sinethemba lokuthi isixazulula sizotholakala, okuzovunyelwana ngakho kubekwa obala ngesikhathi esifanele,”  kusho uNksz Zondo.
title: Asisuki emasangweni singazitholile izimpendulo- Izitshudeni

text: UMSAKAZI weMbokodo FM usolwa ngokuqola umlaleli walo msakazo uR500, ethembisa ukumsiza enkingeni lo mlaleli ayebhekene nayo.UThandazani Makhaye (58) ukhala uyazithulisa ngokugilwa uThamsanqa Ntombela owenza uhlelo lwasemini olungena ngo-12, iNjobo Ithungelwa Ebandla. Elandisa Isolezwe uThandazani uthe, lo msakazi osemnkantshubomvu noseke wawina indondo kumaCrown Gospel Awards, wathembisa ukumsiza ngokumtholela ummeli ngecala ayebhekene nalo emsebenzini, wabe esethi kuzomele amnike uR500 ukuze amxhumanise nomunye ummeli.“Into eyangenza ngithinte uThamsanqa ukuthi ngijwayele ukumuzwa emsakazweni esiza abantu, okunye ukuthi ummeli wami ozimele wahluleka ukungisiza,’’ kuchaza uThandazani.Uthe ngemuva kokunika uThamsanqa le mali kube sekuphela izinyanga eziyisithupha engalutholi usizo.“Ngibe sengimcela uThamsanqa ukuthi abuyise uR500 engamnika wona ngoba alukho usizo eza nalo, ube eseqala ukungibalekela,” kusho uThandazani.Uthi kuze kube imanje imali akakayibuyisi uThamsanqa.UThandazani uthi into eseyenziwa ilo msakazi ukumthumelela imiyalezo ethi naye akakaholi uzomnika le mali uma eseholile.Ethintwa uThamsanqa uthe akanalo ilungelo lokuphawula, kungakuhle kuthintwe uSandile Ngema amchaze njengomkhulumeli wakhe nophinde abe ngumdidiyeli wohlelo (Isolezwe lingasho nje ukuthi uSandile Ngema elimaziyo ongumphathi womsakazo).USandile uthe ngeke akwazi ukukhulumela uThamsanqa kepha angakhulumela isiteshi. “Uma sisiza abantu sibuye sibale nezindleko zemoto esuke iphumile iye kulowo mlaleli,’’ kusho uNgema.Ebuzwa ngodaba lukaR500 womlaleli uSandile uthe, ngeke akwazi ukukhulumela uThamsanqa kepha yena angakhulumela ukuthi babuye bacele izimali zezindleko zesiteshi.
title: Umsakazi usolwa ngokuqola umlaleli

text: UMFOWABO kaMjik’jelwa ‘Ichalaha likaShafuza’ Ngubane, uMnikezwa ‘Isimakwana SikaShafuza’ Ngubane, ucacise ngendaba yokuxoshwa kukaMthandeni ‘Igcokama Elisha’ Manqele owayezohlanganisa amehlo nomndeni.Igcokama like labalwa nabanye abantu okuthiwa bajikiswe neminikelo abanye beza nezinkomo kwathiwa akufuneki zipho neminikelo konke komukelwa ngosuku lomngcwabo.Le nsizwa yakwaNgubane ibikhuluma enkonzweni yomngcwabo womnewabo izolo KwaJikijiki, KwaMaphumulo. Ithe kukhona abayihlanekezela inkulumo bathi umndeni uxoshe Igcokama kanti akunjalo. Ishwelezile kakhulu ngokusabalala kwezindaba ethe zidala uqhekeko ngoba Igcokama lingene ehlazweni.UMnikelwa uthe empeleni uyena owakhipha umyalelo wokuthi alingeniswe Igcokama kodwa banqaba umnikelo walo, bathi alifike nawo ngosuku lomcimbi hhayi ngoba bebelixosha. Ube eseshweleza ngokuphuma kodaba ngendlela okungeyiyo luphendukezelwa abathize nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Kuzwakale kabi, le nto ihlambalaza umndeni wakwaNgubane, le nto ngizoyisho phambi kukamama nobaba nabo bonke abakhona. UMthandeni wuzakwethu, sasingeke simxoshe uma ezohlanganisa amehlo nomndeni. Kukhona abantu ababhimbise inkulumo nje yagcina isabalala kabi,” kusho uMnikelwa naye ophinde abe sendimeni yomculo.Ubize leli ciko elifike ligadwe yisiqethevu esidlubhe izibuko nesudu bagibela esiteji. Okuqaphelekile ukuthi lesi siqethevu besilokhu sixine eduze Igcokama siliqaphe ngelokhozi kubonakala ukuthi bakhathazekile ngezokuphepha kwalo.Ligibele esiteji Igcokama lazwakalisa ukuba nenhliziyo ebuhlungu ngezindaba zokuxoshwa kwalo ngesikhathi lizobabaza emndenini weChalaha. Lithe ukube laxoshwa ngabe alibuyanga emngcwabeni.“Ngidabukile ngokuhamba kweChalaha esisebenze nalo kakhulu kodwa konke okukhulunyiwe ngami ngeke ngikunake ngoba ngizohlonipha le nsizwa ebesisebenza nayo,” kusho Igcokama Elisha lishaya ngamafuphi.Leli ciko lifike emuva kwesikhathi limboze ithawula ekhanda nakhona lingenasinqe lilokhu lisukuma liyaluza nomqaphi walo obehline njengabantu abagade imoto yemali.
title: AbakwaMjik’jelwa bacacisa ngokuxoshwa kweGcokama

text: SIYAQHUBEKA nokushuba isimo kwiDemocratic Allaince kulandela imibiko yokuthi uNkk Patricia De Lille angase ashaye ungqimphotho odabeni lokusula njengeMeya yaseCape Town.NgoLwesine ekuseni ngesikhathi kuhlangene umkhandlu, uSotswebhu omkhulu weDA eKapa, uMnuz Shaun August, uthuse abaningi ememezela ukuthi uyasula kulesi sikhundla futhi uyasula njengelungu leDA ekhala ngokucwaswa kuleli qembu.“Isinqumo sami akusona engivele ngasithatha kalula nje uma ubuka ukuthi ngichithe iminyaka emibili edlule ngithwele kanzima ngenxa yokucwaswa nokucindezelwa iDA ebikubhekisa kimi,” kusho u-August.“Ngeke ngisakwazi ukusebenzela iqembu elibukela phansi imizamo yami yokuthi abantu balingane kuleli. Ngeke ngisakwazi ukusebenzela iqembu elisho okunye lenze okunye ngapha.”AMALUNGU e-ANC ejabula kulandela ukusula kukaMnuz Shaun Abrahams njengekhansela nelungu leDA ngoba ethi akasakwazi ukukumela okwenziwa yiDA kwiMeya yaseKapa uNkk Patricia De Lille. Isithombe: Ayanda Ndamane African News Agency (ANA)Isimemezelo sika-August silandelwe amanye amalungu amane eDA nawo athe ayayilaxa le nhlangao. Amakhansela asulile uMnuz Siya Mamkeli, uNksz Suzette Little, uMnuz Greg Bernado noMnuz Thulani Stemela.Ekuseni uDe Lille ugxeke abaholi be-DA athe bamatasa babeka isithombe esibi ngaye kwabezindaba. Lokhu kulandela umbiko kaBowman Gilfillan obuphenya ngezinsolo zobukhonyovu nokungaphathwa kahle kwezimali kumasipala waseKapa.UDe Lille usekuchithe kaningi ukuthi kukhona ubukhonyovu obuthinta yena kulo mkhandlu, kangangokuba wathembisa ukusula njengeMeya uma iDA ihoxisa amacala emsola ngawo.Nokho iDA kamuva nje isanda kweseka umbiko kaBowman kanti sekubikwa ukuthi uDe Lille angase ashintshe umqondo ngokusula kulesi sikhundla abathembise ukukwenza ekupheleni kuka-Okthoba.
title: Zimapeketwane izinto kwi-DA eKapa

text: UPHUMELA obala usomabhizinisi waseThekwini, uMnuz Mzwandile Zondi weSiyajabula Driving School, ngokuthandana kwakhe nomsakazi woKhozi FM, uZimiphi “Zimdollar” Biyela. Kuleli sonto, uZimdollar ukhiphe isitatimende echaza ukuthi usehlukene noZondi njengoba esezoshadela kwaDlamini.UZondi uyakuphika ukuthi usehlukene noZimdollar.“Ngithandane noZimdollar ngo-2011. Namanje akangitsheli ukuthi usengalile, nami angikaze ngimale. Ngize ngaxabana nenkosikazi yami ngenxa kaMaBiyela. Kuze kwaphoqeleka ukuthi ngishiye umuzi wami nezingane ngayohlala noMaBiyela emaflethini eThekwini. Iflethi lokugcina esihlale kulona lisePhoyinti. Sigcine sesiqashe umuzi  eWestville osekhona namanje,” kusho uZondi.Uthe ngisho kubo kaZimdollar akekho ongazi ukuthi uthandana nale ntokazi futhi uZimdollar wamtshela ukuthi ubeshade noXulu.“UMaBiyela wangitshela ukuthi uXulu ubemhlukumeza wagcina ephumile emshadweni. Mina ngiye emndenini kaMaBiyela ngoba sengifuna ukumlobola. Lokho ngikwenze ngoba bese kuvume nenkosikazi yami ukuthi angimthathe. Inkosikazi beyifuna ngibuyele ekhaya, ikhala ngokuthi izingane ziyangidinga,” kuqhuba uZondi.Ngemuva kokuvuma kwenkosikazi yakhe, uZondi uthe uziqale lapho izingxoxo zelobolo likaZimdollar.“ Abazali bakaMaBiyela bangitshele ukuthi kuzomele kube nendlela esenza ngayo uma ngimthatha ngoba akahlukanisile noXulu. Ngimiswe yilokho ukuqhubeka nelobolo. SingamaNazaretha sobabili noMaBiyela, siyawuhlonipha umthetho webandla wokuthi akalotsholwa kabili owesifazane ibe isekhona indoda ashade nayo,” kusho uZondi.UZondi uthe uyathandwa kubo kaZimdollar futhi umndeni wakhe wamcela lo msakazi ukuthi angamlahli uZondi ngoba umthwale esephelelwe umsebenzi kuKhozi FM.Uthe ukushiya kukaZimdollar kuKhozi FM yinto ayevele engayemukelanga. Uthe uZimdollar wamthembisa ukuthi yonke into izohamba kahle ngoba iNFP ibifuna ukumenza ilungu lePhalamende ezoyohlala eCape Town, kanti izinto azizohamba kahle. “Sekubheda izinto kuMaBiyela ngimvulele ibhizinisi eShowe iSiyajabula Driving School kodwa salibhalisa ngewele lakhe uSipho Biyela. Izinto bese zibheda kuyena ngoba nemoto ayehamba ngayo iHyundai Sonata emhlophe, waze wayiphindisela egaraji,” usho kanje.UZondi uthe uqale ukwazi ngoDlamini ngo-Agasti nyakenye. Uthe ubemazi njengesesheli sikaZimdollar. Kodwa obekumphatha kabi wukuthi bekunemali ebilokhu ifakwa uDlamini kwi-account yasebhange kaZimdollar. Uma ebuza ngayo, uZimdollar ubemtshela ukuthi uDlamini ungumhleli wemicimbi, usuke emqashile.UZondi uthe uDlamini ugcine esesondelana nezingane zakubo kaZimdollar ezigcine sezimzonda (uZondi).“Ngatshelwa uZimdollar ukuthi ngingazinaki izingane zakubo yena uzoqondana nazo.”Uthe akambambele igqubu uZimdollar futhi umfisela inhlanhla emendweni wakhe. Uthe ngeke azikhalele nezinto abemenzela zona. Nebhizinisi eliseShowe uthe lizoqhubeka newele likaZimdollar uSipho.
title: UZondi uchitha eyokwaliwa uZimdollar

text: Ngokusho komndeni namaphoyisa, uMnuz Sifolokolo Makatise (48) uthelekelwe ngamadoda amathathu eyedwa kwakhe ngoLwesithathu olwedlule ngo-9.20 ebusuku amokhela ngomlilo.Kuthiwa amadoda ashaye achitha neziklabhu eziwu-34, izimbuzi ezimbili nezingubo zokulala ezintathu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amadoda amathathu kulindeleke avele enkantolo yeMantshi yaseKokstad namuhla.“Athweswe icala lokubulala, elokuphanga emzini womuntu nelokokhela ngomlilo. Bazovela enkantolo kuleli sonto,” kusho uCaptain GwalaAmadoda kuthiwa abekade eboshwe ngoLwesine ngo-2.30 entathakusa ngenkathi ezithela phezu kwamaphoyisa aseSwartberg abezulazula eqaphe ubugebengu.Amaphoyisa abone iveni elimhlophe okuthe uma elimisa, umshayeli walo walibhula kakhulu.Iveni, ebigcwele izimvu nezimbuzi, ijahwe yaze yaficwa kwase kuboshwa amadoda amathathu abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-17 no-23. Izimvu eziwu-14 bese zifile.UMnuz Masupha Miya, oyilungu lomndeni, uthe imfuyo etholwe amaphoyisa ekaMakatise.Uthe benze isihluku abasolwa abangqongqise uMakatise engenzanga lutho olubi kodwa obulawelwe imfuyo yakhe.“Empeleni zingaphezu kuka-200 izimvu nezimbuzi eziwu-95 abese ebelwe zona uMakatise. Imfuyo ibilokhu intshontshwa izikhawu kanti ekugcineni bazomthelekela eyedwa kwakhe bambulale ngesihluku,” kusho uMiya.Uthe basitakule ezibini isidumbu sikamufi esethule ngemva kokubona indlu yakhe isha ubuhanguhangu.“Ubehlala yedwa egade imfuyo yakhe. Inkosikazi yakhe yayingekho, iwumuntu oziphilisa ngokudayisa izingubo ezingamasekeni. Sifuna banganikwa ibheyili, kuthethwe icala lize liphele bengaphakathi bese benikwa isigwebo esinzima,” kusho uMiya.
title: Amadoda amathathu enkantolo ngelokufa komlimi

text: “Sifuna ukuthuthukisa izwe sigqugquzele nemfundo emphakathini.”La mazwi ashiwo uNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Bongiwe Sithole-Moloi ngesikhathi evula umtapo wolwazi eVulamehlo, eDududu kuMasipala waseMdoni.Umtapo wolwazi owakhiwe ngoR21 million usuvulelwe ukuthi wonke amalungu omphakathi waseVulamehlo awusebenzise njengoba ulungele ukusetshenziswa abadala, izingane nabakhubazekile.Kulo mtapo kunamagumbi okuhlanganyelwa kuwo uma kunezingxoxo, awemidlalo nawezingane okufunda.Kunamakhompyutha ane-internet yamahhala ezolekelela abafunda ezikoleni nasezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, iphinde isize abangasebenzi uma befuna umsebenzi.UNkk Sithole-Moloi uthe umtapo wolwazi uzowusiza ngezindlela eziningi umphakathi.“Uzohlomulisa umphakathi waseDududu njengoba uletha ulwazi emphakathini. Uzokwenza kube lula ukuthi abantu bafunde baphinde baqale amabhizinisi abo,” kusho uNkk Sithole-Moloi. Lo mtapo wolwazi unezincwadi ezingu-8 000 uphinde ube nemidlalo ye-chess neyethelevishini.Imeya yesifunda Ugu, uMnuz Mondli Chiliza, ithe ikujabulele okwenziwe wuhulumeni enzela abantu baseDududu.“Lokhu kuyakhombisa ukuthi uhulumeni uyalalela futhi uyazifeza izidingo zabantu. Ngijabule kakhulu ngalo mtapo wolwazi ngoba uzothuthukisa umphakathi,” kusho uChiliza.Emcimbini bekukhona neMeya yaseMdoni uMnuz ThobaniDube.UChiliza unxuse amalungu omphakathi ukuthi awuphathise okwezikhali zamaNtungwa umtapo wolwazi.“Umtapo wolwazi owomphakathi ngakho kumele uwunakekele ukuze uhlale usesimeni,” kusho uChiliza.UNkk Sithole-Moloi ubonge izinduna namakhosi ngokubambisana nohulumeni. Uthe basazoqhubeka nokuletha izidingo kubantu njengoba bezovula omunye umtapo wolwazi ePort Shepstone maduze.
title: Sebenomtapo wolwazi eVulamehlo

text: UMLINGISI wakuleli ohlonishwa umhlaba wonke, uTerry Pheto, usaqhubeka nokuphakamisa ifulegi lakuleli emuva kokumenyezelwa kokuthi usethubeni lokunqoba indondo yeNational Film Award (NFA), e-United Kingdom.UTerry ungene emnxeni weBest Supporting Actress ngendawo kaNaledi Khama ayilingisa efilimini, i-A United Kingdom kumaNFA. Usethubeni lale ndondo nje, ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule wayesethubeni lokuthola eyodwa kumaBritish Independent Film Awards (BIFA) emnxeni ofanayo. Engxoxweni neSolezwe uTerry uzwakalise ukujabula kakhulu ngokuthi usevuna izithelo ngomsebenzi wakhe.“Ukuba sethubeni lokunqoba izindondo ezifana nalezi kusho lukhulu kimina ngoba kuchaza ukuthi umsebenzi wami esengiwenze iminyaka engu-13 uyabonakala. Kuchaza nokuthi abantu abasemazweni ahamba phambili kwezamafilimu bazoqhubeka banake abalingisi base-Afrika,” usho kanje.Phambilini lo mlingisi uke waveza ukuthi akaphikisani nokuthi abalingisi bakwamanye amazwe balingise izindawo zabantu abaqavile bakwamanye amazwe. Wathi lokhu akanankinga nakho ngoba naye njengomlingisi wakuleli useke walingisa izindawo zabantu bakwamanye amazwe.“Ngikholelwa ukuthi uma siqhubeka silingisa izindawo ezihluka hlukene senza kahle, lokho kuzonyusa ithemba kophrojusa bakwamanye amazwe ukuthi singakwazi ukuzibambela thina nakuleli,” usho kanje.Efilimini i-A United Kingdom uTerry ulingisa indawo kaNaledi Khama, ongudadewabo kamengameli wokuqala waseBotswana, uSereste Khama, okusuke kuvezwa impilo yakhe kule filimu. Ukubeka lo mlingisi ethubeni lokubuya nale ndondo e-UK, ungavota kule website: www.nationalfilmawards.co.ukKhonamanjalo, uzoqala ukukhonjiswa namhlanje phesheya kuBET umdlalo wethelevishini ozobe uveza impilo kalowo owayengumengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu, uDkt. Nelson Mandela, obizwa ngeMadiba. Lo mdlalo uneziqeshana eziyisithupha ezidonsa ihora. Kuwo uTerry uzobe edlala indawo kaWinnie Madikizela-Mandela kanti ekaMandela izobe ilingiswa uLaurence Fishburnewase-United States.
title: UTerry Pheto ethubeni lendondo kumaNFA

text: UBHUQUZA ekhaya umfundi ogodle ingalo emuva kokudindwa wuthisha ngomshiza esikoleni. U-Emihle Bhengu (12) ofunda uGrade 4 eNdlokolo Primary KwaNgcolosi ushaywe uthisha wafaka ukhonkolo kulandela ingxabano ebiphakathi kwakhe nabanye abafundi ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalwe izikole. Elandisa leli phephandaba ngemvume kanina, uthe ngoLwesihlanu ngo-Ephreli 16 yena nomngani wakhe bavinjwe abafundi abane bakwaGrade 5 babashaya ngaphandle kwesikole. UNkk Thandeka Philile Mbambo Mbatha (50)  'odume' ngokushaya izingane kulesi sikole akazange esabuza ngakusasa wabathela induku."Salwa nabo sabahlula bafike basiceba kuqala singakasho, wasibiza uthisha wathatha uswazi wathi luncane wabuye wathatha ipayipi wathi ngeke limenelise nalo lincane. Wabuya nomshiza wasishaya ngaze ngangakwazi ukusebenzisa isandla. Wathi ufike utshele unyoko uBongiwe, kumngani wami wathi utshele uyihlo uSthe anginandaba," kusho umfundi.Eqhuba uthe akugcinanga lapho ngoba ngoMsombuluko wabizwa omunye uthisha embona  ebophe  ingalo eyaboshwa wugogo wakhe ngeduku. "Wayekhona naye ngasho ukuthi ngishaywe uyena wavele wayidonsa kabuhlungu ingalo wathi sengingaze ngiyigodle. Ngakhala ngithi kubuhlungu wathi ngiphaphe kakhulu ngokungishaya nje sengizigodlisa ingalo," kusho umfundi.Unina womfundi uNksz Bongiwe Mbambo, uthe ingane iyesaba isahleli ekhaya kodwa umnyango usuqalile ukumthinta wathembisa ukuthi umfundi uzozanyelwa isikole. "Ngihlala KwaNdengezi ngafonelwa umama engibikela ukuthi ingane seyilimele. Ngaya kobika esikoleni wadumala uthishomkhulu wathi angizame ukunakekela ingane ngiyihambise kudokotela. Udokotela ufike wathola ukuthi iphuke ithambo wasidlulisela esibhedlela yakhonkwa. Ihleli manje ekhaya iyesaba ukubuyela esikoleni," kusho uNksz Mbambo.Owesigungu esilawula isikole, uMnuz Sabelo Bhengu, uthe lolu daba belungakafiki kubona kodwa nakanjani bazolulandela bathole kahle ukuthi kwenzekani.Amaphoyisa asiqinisekisile lesi sigameko. Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe uthisha uboshiwe. " Singaqinisekisa ukuboshwa komsolwa ngecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza. Uvelile ngoLwesine olwedlule enkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown ngesigameko esenzeke esikoleni ngo-Ephreli 16 kulandela ukushaya umfundi olimele engalweni. Wahanjiswa esibhedlela eyothola usizo," kusho uMbele. Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi uthe umthetho awumvumeli uthisha ukuthi abeke  umfundi isandla. " Siyabanxusa othisha ukuthi balandele umthetho ngoba bafike bakwenze bentshontsha ukushaya izingane bese kuba nale miphumela. Awukho umthetho ogunyaza ukushaywa kwabafundi. Kuhle uma eseboshiwe ngoba umthetho uyawazi," kusho uMahlambi.
title: Wesaba ukuphindela esikoleni umfundi oshaywe wuthisha

text: Selokhu kwaqala ingosi ethi sikhipha igwababa, uMroza wenze ezibukwayo esiza izinsizwa eziningi ukuthi ziqonywe. Eziningi izinsizwa ezingakwazi ngisho ukweshela uMroza uvele alivale ihlazo angenelele insizwa isiphelelwe isankwankwaza.UMroza uma eshelela insizwa uze uzibuze ukuthi ngabe uyintombi ngempela noma uyinsizwa ngoba inqwaba yezinsizwa azinalo ikhono lokweshela elifika kwelikaMroza. Intombi uyeshela incame futhi enye noma ibingakazimiseli ngokuvuma igcina isivumile. Ngiyakuvuma MaButhelezi uyinsizwa ngempela la ekwesheleni. Nesikole sokweshela uma ungasivula, imizi yobaba iyovuka.Intombi eyehlula uMroza, empeleni isuke isikhombe kwenye indawo futhi izimisele ngempela ngesuke isimnike ucu. Uma ixega esokeni, uMroza uyayikhipha ngobunsizwa nangesisoka sakhe nolimi lwakhe olwakhishwa umnqantula.Ngiyakuvuma MaShenge uyinsizwa, unesisoka ngiyakwethwesa uphaphe lwegwalagwala la ekwesheleni nesisoka olimini lwakho. Sengathi le ngosi ingephele uma kusekhona wena kulolu hlelo. Eyakho le nto uyiphiwe, Ubizelwe kuyo Mroza, siyakuvuma. Kwazisholo iNdidane yathi: ngivumeni. Nami ngithi asimvumeni uMaButhelezi.Impela uma kunomfowenu noma isihlobo sakho sesilisa esingenaye umaqondana, yingoba singafuni ngoba sinaye usisi noma umzala ongasishelela noma iyiphi intombi. Siyakuvuma Mroza.Sibusiso Patrick Zikalala
title: [IMIBONO] Ngiyamvuma uMroza ngokweshela, impela wakhishwa umnqantula

text: IZINKINGA ngobulili bakhe kazimvimbelanga ukuthi afeze iphupho lakhe lokumodela uMiss Sundowns, othi uphila njengabo bonke abesifazane phezu kokungayi esikhathini.UNksz Sharon Rose Khumalo (25), okhulele eMamelodi, uqale ukwazi eneminyaka ewu-21 ukuthi akanawo amaqanda njengabanye besifazane, okusho ukuthi ngeke akhulelwe futhi akayi esikhathini.Yize kwamethusa ukwazi ngesimo sakhe uthe kodwa kwaba yicebo likaNkulunkulu ukuthola esekhulile.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ukube ngasheshe ngathola ngesimo sami ngisemncane, ngangingeke ngikwazi ukwamukela. Ekhaya sasinganakile ukuthi angizili, sicabanga ukuthi umzimba wami uthatha kancane. Bengilokhu ngihlehlisa uma kuthiwa angiyobona udokotela ngaze ngaya sengino-21,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.Uthe kwaba nzima etshelwa ngesimo sakhe kodwa ukuba nomndeni omesekayo kumsizile. Ngaphandle kwale nkinga yokungabi nanzalo, konke okunye uthi kufana nowesifazane ngisho imizwa yakhe.Uveze ukuthi uke wahlinzwa ngenxa yokuthi bese kuqala ukuhluma izinhlamvu zamankwahla kodwa ngale kwalokho akanayo imizwa yendoda.UNksz Khumalo, ongathandani namuntu okwamanje, uthe unemizwa yokuthanda abesilisa kanti nomzimba wakhe ungowesifazane.Waqala ukubonakala kwezokumodela engenela uMiss South Africa (SA) nyakenye wagcine esale kwiTop 5. Ukutshela abantu bangaphandle ngesimo sakhe ukuqale emajajini alo mncintiswano.“Ngabona kufanele ngiwacacisele amajaji yize ukuphumela kwami obala bekungeke kungikhiphe emncintiswaneni. Bengifuna ukuthi bezwe ngami futhi ngajabula uma bengamukela. Emuva kwalokhu ngaqala iBlog yami, ngaphumela obala kuyo ngiqwashisa nabanye ngalesi simo futhi ngazizwa ngikhululeke kakhulu kunakuqala.”UNksz Khumalo uthe okumduduzayo wukuthi bakhona abanye abanalesi simo yize bembalwa abaphumela obala. Akudingi ukuthi wonke umuntu aphumele obala njengaye kodwa okubalulekile wukuthi uzamukele ukuthi akulona iphutha lakho ukudalwa ngale ndlela.Mayelana nothando lokumodela uthe waqala esafunda engenela imincintiswano nasesontweni. Ngesikhathi uKerishni Naicker ethatha isicoco sikaMiss SA ngo-1997, uSharon wayazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga naye uyothweswa esakhe.Uthe ukuba nguMiss Sundowns kuyindlela yokuheha abesifazane ebholeni nokubathuthukisa.Uthe akabanga nankinga ukuhlwithwa isicoco ngoba wakhulela eMamelodi lapho iSundowns isekwa khona kakhulu.“Ngiyalithanda ibhola futhi bengivele ngilithanda. Angikujabuleli ukulibuka kwithelevishini kodwa ngithanda ukuba senkundleni.”UNksz Khumalo wafunda e-University of Pretoria wenza iVerterinary Biology ngo-2009 wayifeyila. Kwadingeka ahlale unyaka ekhaya abazali bethi akacabange kahle ngafuna ukukwenza.Wasebenza ezindaweni zokudla enguweta unyaka ngaphambi kokubuyela enyuvesi wenza iDegree kwiBiological Sciences, wabuye wenza iBiotechnology neBiochemistry ayiphothule ngo-2014.Uke waba nguthisha efundisa abafundi baseChina isiNgisi nge-internet. Manje ungusokhemisi, umsebenzi ongamphazamisi emsebenzini wakhe wokumodela.
title: Akazenyezi ngazalwe eyikhona uMiss Sundowns

text: ISOUTH AFRICAN SOCIAL SECURITY AGENCY (Sassa) ixwayisa ngendoda okuthiwa ithi idayisa amakhadi akwaSassa enkundleni yokuxhumana iFacebook.Obambe kwesokuba yisikhulu sakwaSassa, uMnuz Abraham Mahlangu, uthe amakhadi abedayiswa asevaliwe ngeke asaba wusizo lwalutho kumuntu.“Umphakathi uyexwayiswa ukuthi ungalingeki uze uzame ukuwathenga ngoba kawanamsebenzi. Ayikho imali yesibonelelo ezotholakala emakhadini antshontshiwe. Abantu abawathengayo bazozifaka enkingeni uma betholakala nawo ngoba bazobekwa icala lokutholakala nempahla eyebiwe.”Ukhumbuze labo abathola isibonelelo ukuthi izinhlelo zakwaSassa zitholakala mahhala ngakho kufanele bakugweme ukunika abantu imininingwane yabo enjengezinombolo zikamazisi, izinombolo zokukhipha imali noma izinombolo zamakhadi abo akwaSassa. Uthe abantu abafuna lezi zinto basuke befuna ukubaqola.“Ukudayiswa kwamakhadi akwaSassa akukho emthethweni futhi kuwubugebengu. Abantu abahola isibonelelo kufanele babike lezi zigameko emaphoyiseni noma babike kwaSassa. Abasebenzi bakwaSassa kabayifuni imali kubantu uma bebatholela amakhadi. Labo abahola isibonelelo kufanele bakhumbule ukuthi inombolo yokukhipha imali iyimfihlo nokuthi akufanele banike omunye umuntu inombolo yekhadi nekamazisi,” kusho uMahlangu.Okhulumela abakwaSassa, uMnuz Paseka Letsatsi, unxuse abantu abathola isibonelelo ukuthi babe mehlomane ukuze bangabi abagilwa bokuqolwa isibonelelo. Abafuna ukubika ubugebengu besibonelelo bangathinta abakwaSassa ku-0800 601011. - African News Agency (ANA)
title: Isexwayiso ngabadayisa amakhadi akwaSassa

text: UMLINGISI waseGoli, uThuthuka Mthembu, uthi wathola ingqayizivele yethuba ngokunikezwa indawo ephambili kulo mdlalo owuchungechunge obukwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika, Uzalo ngoDisemba 2018.Lo mlingisi oneminyaka ewu-22 uthe yena wayengakaze waziphupha enza lomsebenzi wokulingisa kodwa kwathuka ucilo uzishaya esagileni.UThuthuka udlala indawo yomlingiswa onguNonka, okuyintombazane eneminyaka engu-18, ehlala KwaMashu futhi ezididekele ngoba ayazi ukuthi kufanele ikhetheni phakathi kothando nemfundo."Yingqayizivele yethuba kwithelevishini futhi ukuba semdlalweni obukelwa kakhulu ezweni yimpumelelo enkulu kimina. Angikaze ngakufundela ukulingisa kodwa ukuthekela ulwazi kwabanye ozakwethu nasekufundeni kwindima yezokulingisa yilona hlelo engizicija ngalo. Ngibusiswe ngale ndawo futhi ngicabanga ukuthi uma nje ngisenza into engiyithandayo, ngizobe ngifeza iphupho lami." Uthe indima yezokungcebeleka inezinselelo eziningi njengokuzama ukwamukela udumo."Ngolunye usuku ngangiwumuntu nje ojwayelekile, manje sengidumile. Inselelo kimina ukuthi kwakufanele ngifunde ukwamukela uguquko ukuze ngingabi nenkinga emphakathini nokuthi umsebenzi wami udinga ngenzeni. Ukubhekana nabantu noma ngingingabhekani nabo kwayiguqula kakhulu impilo yami. Yinto engisazama ukuzijwayeza yona."Uthe kule ndima ubukela kakhulu abantu abanjengo-Oprah Winfrey, Ava DuVernay nabanye osaziwayo bakuleli abanjengoDawn Thandeka King. Uthe ukuze uhlale isikhathi eside endimeni yokulingisa kufanele ube wumuntu ofundisekayo."Uzohlale uthola ukugxekwa kukho konke okwenzayo. Kuzohlale kunabantu abakuzondayo. Udinga ukwamukela ukugxeka kkwakhayo ukuze ubhekane kahle nenselelo," kuphetha uThuthuka.
title: Oseyisilomo soZalo uthi wayengaqondile ukuba wumlingisi

text: Kuphoqe ukuthi uMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa aphume ngopotsho izolo esigodlweni ngesikhathi amabutho evale isango, esabisa ngokungena ngendlovu iyangena enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo yeSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.Abaqaphi bakamengameli kuphoqe ukuba bavule upotsho esigodlweni kwaKhethomthandayo ukuze bashushumbise uRamaphosa, nezinye izicukuthwane ebezisenkonzweni yesikhumbuzo.Lokhu kwenzeke kusanda kuphela inkonzo, lapho izicukuthwane seziqala ukuphuma etendeni obekubanjelwe kulo inkonzo.Amabutho avele avuka umbhejazane asabisa ngokudlula namaphoyisa abevimbe esangweni.Amabutho abekhuza iziqubulo ezikhombisa ukungahambisani namaphoyisa okukhona esithi, "kwagijima iphoyisa esangweni, liyaphi", abekhala ngokuthi ancishwe ithuba lokuyokhuleka okokugcina kwiMbube."Ningenisa oRamaphosa kodwa nivalela thina mabutho. Nivalele ngisho izinduna namakhosi, abantu abebephila neSilo," kusho omunye obenamabutho abevunule econsa.Amabutho agcine engenile kepha ukujabula kwawo kusheshe kwaphela.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu, Inkosi uMangosuthu Buthelezi uyalele amabutho ukuba aphume ephele esigodlweni."Inhlonipho ibalulekile. Kufanele ningihloniphe njengoNdunankulu waKwaZulu. Ngakhuluma ngisho emsakazweni ngasho ukuthi bambalwa abantu abazovunyelwa ukungena esigodlweni ngenxa yemigomo kahulumeni elawula ukusabalala kwegciwane iCorona."Amabutho abe esephuma esigodlweni njengokomyalelo kaButhelezi.Aqhubekile nokukhuza iziqubulo ehuba namahubo ngaphandle kwesigodlo.Abuye aphindela ngaphakathi esigodlweni ntambama ngesikhathi ezinye izicukuthwane sezihambile.Ngaphandle kwesigodlo abantu bebetheleke ngezinkani bezovalelisa kwiSilo.Izintombi ebezivunule, bezihuba ngasesangweni, eduze kwalapho bekungena khona izicukuthwane.Akubona bonke ababe nenhlanhla yokungena esigodlweni, abanye bajikisiwe kwathiwa amagama abo awaveli ohlwini lwabantu abanemvume yokungena.Kuphoqeleke ukuthi bagcine sebewubuka kwithelevishini  ebingaphandle kwesigodlo umcimbi.
title: Uphume ngopotsho uRamaphosa amabutho engena ngodli

text: Intokazi esingenisile emculweni, uMoonchild Sanelly, umculi ophinde abe nohlelo olukhuluma ngempilo yakhe, uPapa Penny nosomahlaya uJoey Rasdien babe ngabesibili ukumenyezelwa, kulandela uMark Fish, Nina Hastie noFrancois van Coke bona amagama abo akhishwe ngesonto eledlule.UPapa Penny useveze ukuthi uzobukisa ngo-AKA ngalolu suku.“Abantu bake bahlekisa ngami izikhathi eziningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Ngakho ukuba yingxenye yaIolu hlelo ngikubheke ngabomvu futhi ngifisa sengathi ngabe lolu suku selufikile,” kusho uPapa Penny.Uthe kulolu hlelo uzofika egqoke ngendlela ehlale idonsa amehlo kwabaningi, ukuze abukeke kahle esiteji.UJoey uthe ukuze kube mnandi kakhulu kulolu hlelo ngalolu suku yena uyofika noBonang noCassper Nyovest abayobe bengabanye bosaziwayo esiteji.UMoonchild uthe ngenxa yokuthi kuleli useke wathola ukudeleleka okuningi emkhakheni akuwo, akukho akubona kungaba yinkinga uma sebechwensa yena.“Ngicabanga ukuthi uma ungusaziwayo ukubonwa ngabantu uhleka, lokho nje kwethula umthwalo wezindaba ezinye ezingelona iqiniso ezihlala zikhulunywa ngawe.Ngakho bayabona ukuthi noma bangakwenzani futhi bangakhulumani kodwa akukhona konke okukuphatha kabi,” kuchaza le ntokazi.Lolu hlelo luzoba seThe Teatro, eMontecasino, ngoFebhuwari 21.Kumenyezelwa laba nje, kuphinde kwaphuma olunye uhlu, olunabantu abadumile okukhona kubo umculi waseNigeria uDavido nabalingisi okukhona kubo uMoshe Ndiki noPierre Van Pletzen.Laba bonke baveze ukuthi bakujabulele ukuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo futhi sebekubheke ngabomvu ukuthi kufice usuku okuzosakazwa ngalo lolu hlelo.UDavido uthe, abantu base-Afrika abalindele into abangakaze bayibone njengoba emcimbini wamahlaya kungafihlwa lutho.
title: Osaziwayo balubheke ngabomvu uhlelo lwamahlaya ngo-AKA

text: YIZE kube nenhlokomo ngokuthola kwePremier Soccer League (PSL) abaxhasi abasha abazofaka isandla esigabeni esiphezulu seligi, iDStv, ezingezinhle ngezithi sizoncipha isibalo sezicoco ezizodlalelwa kwisizini ezoqala ka-2020/2021.Usihlalo wePSL u-Irvin “The Iron Duke” Khoza, umemezele izolo ukuthi ngeke ubekhona umqhudelwano iTelkom Knockout (TKO) ngesizini ezayo. Uthe isizathu salokhu ukugadla kweCorona okulimaze amabhizinisi amaningi.“Ngeke sibe neTKO kule sizini ezoqala. Mhlawumbe lokho kuzosiza ngoba ukuminyana kwemidlalo bekuzosishaya kakhulu. Isizini entsha izoqalwa phakathi no-Okthoba, lokhu akukaze kwenzeke nhlobo. Sibheke ukusonga isizini ngasekuqaleni kukaJuni ngonyaka ozayo. Lokhu kukhomba ukuthi kuzominyana imidlalo, ngakho bekuvele kuzoba nzima ukuba neTelkom ibikhona. Ngingakuqinisekisa nokho ukuthi kuzoba yisizini ezayo kuphela singenawo umqhudelwano iTelkom. Ngesizini ezolandela ezayo sizothola abanye abaxhasi abazovala isikhala seTelkom,” kusho uKhoza.Ngokujwayelekile imiqhudelwano engaphansi kwesigaba esiphezulu ebholeni kuba isicoco sePremiership (esesaziwa ngeDStv Premiership), iMTN 8, iNedbank Cup neTKO engasekho.Amaqembu afana neKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates, osekuphele amasizini amahlanu agcina ukunqoba isicoco, kumele azibambe ziqine acacise zibekwa ngezicoco, kwazise zinciphile kule sizini. Hleze esokuqala isicoco lamaqembu okumele azihluphe ngaso ngeseMTN 8. Ngokusho kukaKhoza lo mqhudelwano uzoqala ngo-Okthoba 17. Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership izoqala ukudlalwa ngo-Okthoba 24. Iqembu elizokhala limuke nesicoco seligi lisazohlabana ngemali efanayo neyangesizini edlule uR15 million.UKhoza uthe akukacaci kahle ngosuku lokuqala kwemidlalo yeGladAfrica Championship, kodwa wakuqinisekisa ukuthi kuzoba ngenyanga ezayo. Okunye okucaciswe uKhoza izolo udaba lokubuya kwabalandeli ezinkundleni.“Sizwile umengameli wezwe ecacisa ngokuthi isibalo sokuhlangana uyasisusa ku-50, usiphinda kabili. Uveze nokuthi izindawo ezimumatha abantu zingakwazi ukuthatha inani elingakanani. Kodwa okumele sikuqonde ukuthi uthe kwezemidlalo akushintshi lutho. Lokho kusho ukuthi kusami kanjalo, abalandeli abavumelekile ezinkundleni. Kodwa sizolindela uhulumeni ukuba asihole kulolu daba lwabalandeli. Sibonile kwamanye amazwe afana no-England bezama indaba yokubuyisa abalandeli kodwa kwagcina kungalunganga. Ngakho sizolinda ubuholi bezwe busihole kulolu daba,” kusho uKhoza.
title: Kuncipha izicoco ezizodlalelwa ngesizini ezoqala

text: BAVELE enkantolo ababili ngokuzama ukubulala owesilisa odutshulwe ngesikhathi kubulawa unesi wasesibhedlela e-Edendale, eMgungudlovu.Phakathi kwababoshiwe kukhona nomyeni kanesi ophenywa ngecala lokubumbulala.Isidumbu sikaNkk Nontobeko Kheswa (41), satholakala sinamanxeba okugwazwa emzimbeni nasentanyeni ngoLwesihlanu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant-Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amadoda aneminyaka ewu-40 no-43 avele ngoMsombuluko eNkantolo yeMantshi eMgungundlovu. Abekwe amacala okuzama ukubulala nokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni okusolwa ukuthi kwadutshulwa ngaso unesi wesilisa obesebenza noNkk Kheswa.UZwane uthe amadoda asolwa unesi wesilisa owayehamba noNkk Kheswa ngemoto ngoLwesihlanu lwesehlakalo.“Oyedwa wabamangalelwa ngumyeni kanesi obulawe ngoLwesihlanu, isidumbu sakhe satholwa silahliwe. Usaphenywa, okungenzeka abekwe icala lokubulala phezu kwalawa ababoshelwe wona,” kusho uZwane.Uthe icala lokubulawa kukanesi liphenywa esiteshini eMountain Rise.Izolo kube nomkhuleko esibhedlela e-Edendale obuhanjelwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo. Kukhulekelwe nozakwabo wesilisa igama lakhe elingadalulwanga, owasinda ngesikhathi bedutshulwa.UDhlomo unxuse ozakwabo bakaNkk Kheswa ukuthi baqine kulesi sikhathi sobunzima. Uthe yize engayigqugquzeli idivosi kodwa kumele abantu babheke izimo abahleli kuzo emshadweni.Ilungu lomndeni kaNkk Kheswa elicele ukungadalulwa ngenxa yokwesaba, lithe ubehlukumezekile emshadweni. Ubekhala ngokushaywa ngumyeni wakhe. Umndeni wazama ukungenelela kodwa wehluleka.Umndeni ubungekho izolo emkhulekweni ngoba ulungiselela umngcwabo ozoba ngoMgqibelo.
title: Kuboshwe ababili ngokuzama ukubulala
