text: ABAHLAZIYI bezepolitiki bathi uMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa unqindeke amandla akakwazi ukukhipha abaholi abanogcobho ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende ngoba bakhethwa ngamagatsha.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele uMnuz Xolani Dube onguMcwaningi esikhungweni iXubera Institute uthe, uRamaphosa ulawulwa umthetho akakwazi ukuxosha abantu ikakhulukazi njengoba abanye babo bebhekene nezinsolo nje bengakaze balahlwe ngamacala.UDube uthe iyingozi eyokungaxoshwa kwabo ngoba abantu bazoyijezisa okhethweni i-ANC.“Labaholi bazoya ePhalamende kodwa abavoti bazoyijezisa i-ANC okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya ngo-2021,” kusho uDube.I-ANC iqhubekile nokwehlelwa ngamandla njengoba ilahlekelwa ngamavoti.Phakathi kwamalungu e-ANC asohlwini lokuya ePhalamende kubalwa uMnuz Malusi Gigaba, uNksz Faith Muthambi, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, uNksz Bathabile Dlamini noMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane.UMnuz Thabani Khumalo naye ongumhlaziyi wepolitiki uthe abantu akufanele bayibuke ngohlangothi olulodwa indaba yokubuya kwamalungu anogcobho ePhalamende ngoba uRamaphosa ubhekene nomsebenzi onzima wokudala ubunye kwi-ANC, noma yimuphi umnyakazo awenzayo uzoba nomthelela kuhulumeni.“URamaphosa kufanele ayakhe kabusha i-ANC kodwa akakwazi ukususa amalungu avotelwe ngamagatsha ukuthi aye ePhalamende. Ukube abaholi abanogcobho bayayithanda i-ANC bekufanele baziphumele ohlwini lwe-ANC. Ukuba khona kwabo kuyayilimaza i-ANC ngoba umsindo owenziwa amaqembu aphikisayo nezinhlangano zomphakathi uyayinyakazisa i-ANC,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe laba baholi bafana no-ayisi okufanele uzincibilikele.UNkk Mokonyane, osendaweni ka-10 ohlwini lwe-ANC, useke waba ungqongqoshe wezokuXhumana, wezeMvelo, owaManzi neNhlanzeko. Usolwa ngenkohlalalo emnyangweni waManzi neNhlanzeko, okuthiwa uwushiye ukweletwa uR11.2 billion ngenxa yokungaqoqwa ngendlela kwemali yamanzi komasipala.Abangafuni aye ePhalamende bakhala ngokuthinteka kwegama lakhe enkohlakalweni yaseBosasa emuva kokuthi uMnuz Angelo Agrizzi atshela ikhomishini ukuthi uNkk Mokonyane wayegwazelwa ngoR50 000 ngenyanga ukuvikela inkampani kwabezomthetho.UNksz Dlamini obenguNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi wasusa umsindo esolwa ngokudala inkinga ekuholweni kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni. Ngaphambi kokhetho ubewuNgqongqoshe wabesiFazane ehhovisini likaMengameli ngemuva kokususwa emnyangweni wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi ngoFebhuwari nyakenye.NgoSepthemba nyakenye iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo yamyalela ukuthi akhokhe * -20% wezindleko zokuqulwa kwecala elithinta iSouth African Social Security Agency neFreedom Under Law neBlack Sash Trust.Izinhlangano zasola uNksz Dlamini ngokuxhaphaza imali ngokudlulisela udaba lweCash Paymaster Service (CPS) eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, okwaholela ekutheni yelulwe inkontileka yeCPS. Ngo-2014 wathi ukuqokwa kweCPS kwakungekho emthethweni futhi kungafanele. Le nkampani yayiqokwe ngo-2012.UGigaba usolwa ngokulekelela umndeni wakwaGupta uthole ubuzwe bakuleli.Esewungqongqoshe wezaseKhaya wabeka imithetho ethikameze imboni yezokuvakasha kuleli.Odabeni lweFireblade Aviation, inkantolo enkulu eGuateng yathola ukuthi uGigaba wahubhuza amanga ngemininingwane ethize ePhalamende ngalolu daba. UGigaba wazidonsela amanzi ngomsele kuputshuka i-video yakhe eziphulula isitho sangasese.UNksz Muthambi usolwa ngokuphula umthetho ngesikhathi esebenza kwiGovernment Communication and Information System (GCIS). Usolwa ngokuqasha abantu abawu-27 ngokungemthetho kwiGCIS okukhona kubo abangani nezihlobo zakhe.Owayengungqongqoshe woMnyango wokuMbiwayo, uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane, ovame ukungalubhadi ePhalamende uma ebizelwe ukuthi azophendula ngakwenza emnyangweni, naye uyabuyela ePhalamende.I-ANC ithole izihlalo eziwu-230 okhethweni lwalo nyaka, isuka kwezingu-249.Imizamo yokuthola i-ANC ayiphumelelanga, ucingo lukaMnuz Pule Mabe belungabanjwa.
title: URamaphosa enkingeni ngabaholi abanogcobho

text:
UBabes Wodumo uzwakalise ukuphoxeka kwakhe ngalesi sigameko ngoMsombuluko ekhasini lakhe kwi-Instagram waveza nokuthi bathole izikhwama zabo zimapeketwana zivuliwe.Omunye wabadansi baBabes, uHlengiwe Mbabo, ubhale kwi-Instagram ekhalaza ngempatho yabasebenzi bakwaMango Airlines athe banqabile ukusiza noma ukubanxephezela ngemali.@FlyMangoSA, what a disappointment, my dancers clothes were stolen from their bags today while travelling with @FlyMangoSA to CPT - some bags came back half open and the airline refuses to help or pay. This is proper theftA post shared by 
Bongekile Simelane(@babes_wodumo) on Jul 15, 2018 at 10:55pm PDTOkhulumela iMango Airline, uSergio Dos Santos, utshele iphephabhuku iDrum Magazine ukuthi bayaphenya ngalolu daba. “NjengeMango Airlines siyaxolisa ngalesi sigameko nokuphazamisa uNksz Simelane. Sesazisiwe ngalesi sigameko sacela ukuthi sibanxephezele ngempahla elahlekile njengokomgomo wethu. Sisaphenya ngalolu daba, sizoba neminye imininingwano ngalo uma sekuphothulwe uphenyo,” kusho uDos Santos.
title: Uyaveva uBabes ngokwebelwa

text: ISIKHULU seKaizer Chiefs uBobby Motaung asikaliphonsi ithawula ngeseNedbank Cup ne-Absa Premiership.Lesi khulu sivumile ukuthi izinto bezingahambi kahle ngesikhathi kuqala isizini kodwa sathi kusukela manje kuya phambi kuyethembisa kakhulu. Uthe uyalethemba iqembu lakhe ukuthi kukhona elisengakuzuza kule sizini.“Kusenezindebe ezisele, iNedbank Cup nesicoco seligi. Leli zindebe sizazozilwela. Iqembu belidlala kahle kodwa kungekho imiphumela. Nokho kubukeka sengathi lokho kushintshile ngaphambi kokuthi sivale. Lokho kusikhuthazile njengeqembu. Kufanele siyibambe kanjena ukusuka lapha kuya phambili,” kusho uMotaung.Uthe ngokubona kwakhe iNedbank nesicoco seligi kusengathathwa yinoma yiliphi iqembu kulawa aphezulu, kanti neChiefs inalo ithuba.“Kusekude phambili. Iligi isengathathwa noma ngabe ubani phakathi kwethu namanye amaqembu esinawo kwawokuqala amahlanu. Thina sisele ngephuzu elilodwa emaqenjini azihola phambili kuPremiership, lokho kusho ukuthi noma ngabe ubani angayinqoba,” kusho uMotaung.Mayelana nomdlali olahleke esikhumulweni sezindiza u-Ismael Toure kufanele abuyele emuva e-Ivory Coast uMotaung uzwakalise ukunengeka. Lo mdlali ukhonjwa kuMamelodi Sundowns engompetha base-Afrika kulandela ukunqoba iCaf Champions League ngonyaka odlule.“Lokhu kukhombise ukuthi akavuthiwe ngokomqondo lo mdlali. Nalona omthathe esikhumulweni sezindiza uyefana nse naye. Kodwa asikhali ngoba usengumdlali weqembu lase-Ivory Coast. Ulahlekile esikhumulweni sezindiza. Besingakulindele lokhu ukuthi kungenzeka. Yena nalo omthathile babe budedengu kakhulu,” kusho uMotaung.Lesi sikhulu sisamile ekuthini lo mdlalo ubengalona uhlobo lomdlali abebelufuna ngoba bona bebefuna umdlali ozodlala emuva maphakathi. Lo mdlali ubehlolwa kuleli qembu laseNaturena.“Uhlulekile ukwenza ebesikulindele kuyena ngesikhathi simhlola futhi akayena umdlali ebesimfuna. Sizinikile ithuba lokumhlala kodwa sabona ukuthi akukho angasisiza ngakho kulokho ebesikufuna kuyena,” kuphetha uMotaung.IChiefs izobuyela enkundleni ngokubhekana neFree State Stars emdlalweni wePremiership ngoFebhuwari 7, eFNB Stadium, eSoweto.
title: UBobby usenethemba leNedbank neseligi

text: Uyazi kuyadumaza ukubona amahlazo enziwa abantu besifazane uma sebebukhile nokwenza ukuthi ubone ukuthi le nto yayingafanele ukuphuzwa umuntu wesifazane ikakhulukazi labo abangakwazi ukuzilawula nokuzihlonipha uma sebephuzile.Ziningi izinto ezingalungile ezenziwa umuntu wesifazane eziyihlazo osuke eseqiwe amankwebevu nezidicilela phansi isithunzi sakhe njengomuntu wesifazane.Ukube kuya ngami ngabe ngithi wonke umuntu wesifazane owomayo akathenge amankwebevu ayophuzela endlini yakhe lapho ezokwazi ukubenuza khona kahle engabonwa muntu kuze kube uficwa ubuthongo alale.Ayikho mnandi le nto esiyibona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nasezitaladini lapho othola khona ukuthi owesifazane usephuzile bameqa ngoba benjalo nje bayahluleka ukuzikalela, uthole ukuthi uselele esitaladini ukhamisile uvuza namathe, mhlawumbe, nezinto azigqokile sezingcole ziyaxathuka.Akubukeki bakwethu, angifuni siqambelane amanga. Yebo siyaphuza ngoba siyoma kodwa akulungile kwasanhlobo. Abanye bavele behlise amadilozi bagovoze noma ikuphi ngoba basuke bengasaboni lutho futhi umuntu wesifazane ophuzile akakhuzeki nhlobo, uvele abe nenkani.Benjalo nje nempi bayayithanda, kusuke kuyinhlanhla uma bephuze baze bagoduka bengaxabananga. Okunye okubi ngalo ijiki ukuthi libuye lehlele ngezansi, uthole umuntu esehangaza amadoda, eziphosa kuwo.Angisayiphathi-ke eyalabantu besifazane abangogimba, umuntu ophuza noma yini ebekwe phambi kwakhe. Izinto esizenzayo uma siphuzile bantu besifazane ziyasihlambalaza futhi zenza amadoda anqikaze ukusishada.Ayikho indoda engakhipha izinkomo zayo ilobole umuntu ophuza ahluleke nawukuhamba. Kubuhlungu ukubona umuntu wesifazane eyabhuzela edolobheni sekugqashuke nentambo kabhodisi mhlawumbe nezicathulo eseziphethe ngesandla, ehamba ekhuluma yedwa amankwebevu ebila ekhanda.Ngifisa sizihloniphe singabantu besifazane, ngiyazi ukuthi nithenga ngemali yenu futhi nami angingeni ndawo lapho kodwa ngizama ukuthi siqoqe isithunzi sethu, noma ngabe ungumhambi wezindawo zobumnandi owaziwayo awuke uzame ukwehlisa.Akubukeki ukuthi wena njalo njengomuntu wesifazane uhlezi ugonxe utshwala. Uma unezingane uzinika nini isikhathi futhi uzinakekela nini? Yonke imicimbi namagigi kwaziwa uwena, abanye sebeze banephuza-face, omunye usezibazibazi kade ayewa elwa esephuzile.Abanye abasakwazi ukuhlala nje kuphele inyanga umuntu engaphuzile. Ayimnandi le mpilo esiyiphilayo bafazi, yebo imnandi kithina ngoba siyayithanda kodwa kukhona abantu abasondelene nathi abafisa engabe asiphili ngamankwebevu.Kunabantu abasikhathalelayo abafisa siziphathise okwabantu besifazane. Awukwazi ukulala ngotshwala uvuke ngotshwala ungumuntu wesifazane uze ukhale ngebhabhalazi.Uyacabanga nje usulimalela endaweni yobumnandi kade uphuzile, uyacabanga usulimala nemoto kade uphuzile?Thenga iwayini lakho uhambe uyophuzela ekhaya, laba abaphuza ubhiya angifuni nokuyixoxa eyabo, Jehova. Mina ngikhule ngazi ukuthi ubhiya into yokuphuzwa amadoda, hhayi umuntu wesifazane. Ningangizwa kabi, angisho ukuthi yekani izidlo zenu kodwa ngithi asehliseni bakwethu sizikalele, singaphuzi njalo singaphuzeli esidlangalaleni sibukwa abantu.Uma ungumuntu wesifazane akufanele uhlale utholakala ngaso sonke isikhathi uma kumele kuyophuzwa kuthintwe wena ngoba uyaziwa ukuthi ngasotshwaleni awucushwa.Uyaziwa futhi nokuthi uyaziminyela, uphuza noma yini, awuzona izindleko kanti futhi unomusa uma usuphuzile nenkomo awuncishani nayo.Ungabi ileyo nhlobo yomuntu wesifazane. Asifundeni ukuzithanda sikwazi nokuzikalela bantu besifazane siphinde sizikhethe nezindawo esiphuzela kuzo.
title: Elawini likaMaGumede: Kuyadumuza ukuphuza kwabantu besifazane

text: YIZE bekuhlale kunezikhalongohlobo lwabadlalibeKaizer Chiefs ibuholwanguSteve “Mphathi” Komphelakodwa isikhulu seqembu, uBobbyMotaung, uthi bekungesiyonainhloso yabo ukuthi umqeqeshiahluleke. UKomphela usulengempelasonto ngemuvakokubhaxabulwa yiFree State Starsngo 2-0 emdlalweni we-semi finalyeNedbank Cup eMoses MabhidaStadium, eThekwini. Ukwenze lokho ngemuvakwezidubedube ezisuke ngemuvakomdlalo lapho abalandelibevukwe wubulwane bangenaenkundleni befuna ukumudlaluhlaza. Babulale impahlabaphinde balimaza onogada. Exoxa nabezindaba ngemuvakomdlalo ngesikhathi ememezelaukwesula kukaKomphela,uMotaung uthe bekungeyonainhloso yabo ukuthi uKomphelaahluleke yize bengazangebamsayinele abadlaliabaseqophelweni eliphezulunjengoba bebefisa.Kuqeqesha uKomphelaiChiefs isayinise abadlali abafananoBongani “Drogba” Ndulula,Suva Matovu, Mitchelle Katsvairo,Lewis Macha, Siphelele Mthembu,Edward Manqele no-EnocentMkhabela. “Ngicabanga ukuthi kumelesisukume samukele inselelonamaqiniso. SiyiqembuiChiefs sisukumile salwelaukufeza izinhloso nemigomoyeqembu. Siyakholwa wukuthingesikhathi siqasha uSteveKomphela kwakungesikonaukuthi sizombulala nomasasinezinhlelo zokuthi ahluleke.Ngicabanga ukuthiwonke umuntu ocabanga kahlefuthi olaziyo ibhola, uzobonaukuthi uSteve wenze umsebenziomuhle kwiChiefs. Wakheiqembu ngebhadi-ke umakusuke kungavumi ngalelo langanoma ngaleyo minyaka kusukekungavumi,” kusho uMotaung. Abadlali abaseqophelwenieliphezulu abasayinisweyiChiefs kuqeqesha uKomphelakube nguSiphelele “Stashi”Ntshangase, Leonardo Castro,Kabelo Mahlasela, Siyanda Xulu,Ramahlwe Mphahlele noSibusisoKhumalo. “Ngiyaqala ukuzaesithangameni nabezindabangemuva komdlalo. Isenzosabalandeli kasihambisani naso,abakwenzile akwamukelekile.Wonke umuntu uyakwaziokwamukelekile. Ngeke ngibabizengeziwengu noma okunye okuyelangalapho. Bebediniwe kodwaisenzo sabo kasamukelekile. Ukuzesiqinisekise ukuphepha sithatheisinqumo sokuthi umqeqeshi asule.Bekumele sithathe isinqumo.Lokho akusho ukuthi sesiyizitha.Akacasukile (uKomphela)kodwa yisimo esiphoqeukuthi sithathe isinqumongokuphazima kweso,”kusho uMotaung.Namuhla ngo-7.30ebusuku, iChiefsizobhekana neLamontville GoldenArrows emdlalweni we-AbsaPremiership ePrincess MagogoStadium, KwaMashu.
title: "UKomphela usebenzile kwiChiefs"

text: KUTHIWA umndeni wakwaNtuli ohola i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal usuhlukene phakathi ngenxa yokuhlukana kwemibono mayelana nombango wokuhola iTheku.Emndenini wakwaNtuli oku-ward 1 KwaXimba kukhona uNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, ogaqele ukubuya njengoNobhala eThekwini, noMnuz Thembo Ntuli, onguSihlalo we-ANCYL eThekwini.Okuhlukanisa phakathi umndeni wukuthi uBheki usohlangothini lukaMnuz Thabani Nyawose kuthi uThembo ongumfowabo kaMdumiseni yena uhamba nohlangothi lukaNkk Zandile Gumede.UThembo, osohlangothini lukaNkk Gumede obeyiMeya yeTheku oke waba nguSihlalo eThekwini, uphakanyiselwe esikhundleni sePhini likaSihlalo.Osibhincamakhasana bathi uMdumiseni useka uhlangothi loBheki hhayi olunomfowabo omncane uThembo.Okhulumela uhlangothi lukaNkk Gumede, uMnuz Mzo Dube, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uThembo usohlangothini lwabo.“UThembo onguSihlalo we-ANCYL eThekwini igama lakhe laphakanyiswa ngamagatsha e-ANC aseNtshonalanga neTheku athi angafisa abe sebuholini abe yiPhini likaSihlalo ohlangothini lukamama,’’ kusho uDube.Uthe ohlangothini lwabo kabazikhetheli ukuthi ngubani ozongena esikhundleni esithile kodwa ngamagatsha aziqokelayo.UDube uthe ipolitiki ayihambi ngolibofuzo kodwa ihamba ngokuthi wena unamuphi umbono.“Umuntu uyabheka, acubungule ukuthi yena angangena kuphi khaxa bese ethatha isinqumo esincike ekutheni umbono wakhe uthni. Ngizokwenza isibonelo, siphuma esikhathini lapho izinsizwa zandawonye kade zihlukana kakhulu omunye abe yiNkatha omunye abe yiqabane kodwa ekugcineni nisuke niwumndeni,” kusho uDube.Uthe abanye abantu bebethi uBheki uzozidlela amahlanga engqungqutheleni njengoba ehlobene noMdumiseni kodwa manje sekukhona uThembo ongumfowabo omncane kaMdumiseni okolunye uhlangothi.UDube uthe umkhankaso wabo uhamba kahle kakhulu wathi bajabule ngendlela amagatsha abamukela ngayo.Ngesikhathi kuyiwa engqungqutheleni yesifundazwe, umndeni wakwaNtuli ububumbene njengoba uThembo noBheki babeseka uMdumiseni esikhundleni sikaNobhala njengoba manje izinto sezijikile.Ebuzwa uNtuli (Bheki) uqale waphela yinsini wathi ngokwazi kwakhe uThembo unguSihlalo we-ANCYL eThekwini.“I-ANCYL yathatha isinqumo sokuthi iseke uhlangothi lwethu iRRU (Renewal, Rebuild and Unity). Ngokwazi kwethu uThembo uboshwe yisinqumo esathathwa wuhlaka aluholayo. Kungenzeka ukuthi yisifiso sabo oDube ukuthi uThembo abe ngakubo.”Imizamo yokuthola uThembo ayizange iphumelele. Ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa kanti nomyalezo athunyelwe wona kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engawuphenduli.Yize uBheki ethe ngokwazi kwakhe uThembo uboshwe yisinqumo sohlaka aluholayo kodwa uThembo kuthiwa wayekhona embuthanweni wekhokhasi kaNkkk Gumede ePinetown Civic Centre nakulapho waze wanikwa khona ithuba lokuthi athule inkulumo yakhe.
title: Umbango wokuhola iTheku uhlukanise umndeni

text: IZINTANDOKAZI zoKhozi FM, uDudu “Lady D’’ Khoza noSelby “Selbeyonce” Mkhize zizobanga ukuvotelwa abalaleli balo msakazo kumaDStv Mzansi Viewers Choice Awards, azoba seGoli, ngoNovemba 24. ULady D noSelbeyonce baqokwe emkhakheni weRadio Personality of the Year, abaqhathwe noDJ Fresh no-Anele Mdoda.Lo mcimbi wethulwe izolo, eSandton, eGoli nala bekugcwele khona osaziwayo ababonakala ezinhlelweni ezehlukene kulesi siteshi. Lo mcimbi ozoba ngowesibili kulo nyaka ubophele izinkakha emikhakheni ehlukene.IDistruction Boyz kulo mcimbi iqokwe kathathu emikhakheni ehlukene.Kuphinde kwaqopheka umlando kumaskandi njengoba uKhuzani kuphinde kwaba uyena yedwa kulolu hlobo lomculo oqokiwe. Uqokwe emkhakheni womculi othandwa kakhulu nabaculi okukhona kubo u-AKA, Lady Zamar, Shekhinah nabanye.Omunye umkhakha okuboshelwe kuwo kulo mcimbi owesifazane ohamba phambili ekulingiseni. Kuwona kuboshelwe uThembsie Matu, Rami Chuene, Moshidi Motshegwa, Linda Sebezo nabanye.DUDU “LADY D” KHOZAUReneilwe Sema weMzansi Magic, uthe bajabule ngokubuya kwalo mcimbi futhi kulo nyaka uzobe umkhulu kakhulu. Nakulo nyaka lo mcimbi uzophindwe wethulwe uBonang Matheba obengumethuli wawo nayizolo.Eminye imikhakha embalwa imi kanje:1. FAVOURITE SONG OF THE YEARA. PRINCE KAYBEE & LASOULMATES FT ZANDA ZAKUZA & TNS - CLUB CONTROLLERB. DJ MAPHORISA FT DJ TIRA, BUSISWA & MOONCHILD SANELLY - MIDNIGHT STARRINGC. HEAVY K FT NOKWAZI & BUCIE - INDED. DISTRUCTION BOYZ FT DLADLA MSHUNQISI & BENNY MAVERICK - OMUNYEE. KWESTA FT WALE - SPIRIT2. FAVOURITE TV PRESENTERA. LERATO KGANYAGOB. THOMAS MLAMBOC. PEARL MODIADIED. CAROL TSHABALALAE. ANELE MDODA3. FAVOURITE COMEDIAN (KIA)A. SKHUMBAB. FELIX HLOPHEC. TUMI MORAKED. SMOWKEY NYEMBEE. MPHO POPPS4. FAVOURITE RISING STAR (KIA)A. SMASH AFRIKAB. LUVUYO MANYONGAC. DISTRUCTION BOYZD. LANGA MAVUSOE. LUNGI NGIDI5. FAVOURITE RADIO PERSONALITYA. ANELE MDODAB. NTATE THUSO MOTAUNGC. DUDU ‘LADY D’ KHOZAD. DJ FRESHE. SELBY ‘SELBEYONCE’ MKHIZE6. FAVOURITE ACTOR (1LIFE)A. WARREN MASEMOLAB. HAMILTON DLAMINIC. MDUDUZI MABASOD. MASOJA MSIZAE. KHULU SKENJANA7. FAVOURITE ACTRESS (1LIFE)A. THEMBSIE MATUB. RAMI CHUENEC. LINDA SEBEZOD. MOSHIDI MOTSHEGWAE. LESEGO MARAKALLA
title: AboKhozi FM bazobanga abalaleli

text: IMARITZBURG United isivale ngomdlali wangaphandle isikhala sikaKurt Lenjties oshiye iqembu wajoyina iChippa United.Isolezwe lihoshe izindaba zokuthi iTeam of Choice ilande umdlali wangaphandle ukuvala isikhala sikaLenjties obengukaputeni oshiye abaphathi beshaqekile ethatha isinqumo sokungayivuseleli inkontileka. Umthombo ongashayi eceleni uthi uYazid Atouba waseCameroon usethelekile eMphithi ukuzosayina kwiMaritzburg.Umqeqeshi weTeam of Choice, uFadlu Davids, ukuvezile ngempelasonto edlule ukuthi bazosayinisa abanye abadlali ngaphambi kokuvalwa kwewindi. Emasontweni edlule leli qembu lethule abadlali abasha abayisikhombisa okukhona kubona uSiyanda Xulu obedlala kwiKaizer Chiefs nonozinti waseGhana uRichard Ofori.“Isikhala sikaKurt sivalwe ngomunye umdlali waseCameroon. Ufike eMgungundlovu ngoMsombuluko. Usenikiwe nendawo azohlala kuyona. Udlala esiswini. Sesiwabukile ama-video akhe, unzima kakhulu. Uyadlala ngempela. Igama lakhe ngu-Atouba (Yazid),” kusho umthombo othembekile.U-Atouba udlale emaqenjini aseDemocratic Republic of Congo okubalwa kuwona nezinkunzi i-AS Vita.Kuthintwa usihlalo weqembu uFarook Kadodia wenqabile ukudalula ukuthi sebemsayinisile lo mdlali.“Kunomdlali esizomsayinisa ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalwe iwindi. Umdlali oseqophelweni eliphezulu kodwa angikwazi ukudalula igama lakhe,” kusho uKadodia.U-Atouba kuvela ukuthi uqale ngoLwesibili ukuzilolonga neqembu. Lo mdlali kubhekwe ukuthi alandele ezinyathelweni zabanye abadlali bangaphandle abafike benza kahle kwiTeam of Choice. Eminyakeni eyedlule leli qembu lisayinise abadlali okukhona kubona * -Onismor Bhasera oseyibamba kwiSuperSport United, Mohamed Awal owadayiselwa phesheya, Rudolf Bester, Cuthbert Malajila no-Evans Rusike bonke abafike eNingizimu Afrika kwezwakala. Kumanje iTeam of Choice ishaya ngabadlali bangaphandle uDenis Wiedlich waseGermany ongukaputeni, Rusike waseZimbabwe, Ofori waseGhana noLiam Youlley wase-Australia. UBrian Onyango uzobhaliswa njengomdlali waseNingizimu Afrika kule sizini.ITeam of Choice isalinde isinqumo seMamelodi Sundowns mayelana nokubolekwa umdlali wasemuva uKwandakwensizwa Mngonyama.“Sisalindile ukuthi iSundowns ithathe isinqumo ngodaba lukaKwanda. Izingxoxo beziqhubeka kahle kodwa kusalindwe umengameli wayo ukuthi athathe isinqumo ngaphambi kokuvalwakwewindi.
title: Ivuke ngowangaphandle iMaritzburg United

text:
NOKUBONGWA PHENYANE‘N GISAFUNA ukushada ngibe nezinye izingane ngithole uthando ngitha-ndwe nami ngoba umuntu obezo-ngenzela konke lokhu akasekho”.Lawa ngamazwi ashiwo umculi we-Afro Pop, uKelly Khumalo osanda kushiywa isoka lakhe ebelingunozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana uSenzo Meyiwa owadutshulwa ngo-Okthoba. Engxogxweni ekhethekile akade enayo ohlelweni olukhiphela osaziwayo esitikini i
Real Gobhoza, ekhonjiswa kuSABC 1, uKelly uthe umndeni wakhe yinto asayidinga.“Konke kwenzekile empilweni yami, unyaka ka-2013 nalona esizowuphetha ngeke ngikukhohlwe. Ziningi izinto ezibuhlungu ezingehlakalele abantu bangigxeka ngapha nangapha kodwa ke uNkulunkulu kukhona abantu abakhethayo ukuthi babhekane nobunzima obuthize ukuze abone ukuthi baqine kanjani okholweni. Nami ngiyethemba ngingomunye wabo,” kusho uKelly.Uthe uzwile kukhulunywa ngokuningi okwenzeka ngosuku okwadutshulwa ngalo uMeyiwa, wathi ukuba kuya ngaye ngabe uyabatshela abantu kodwa njengoba kusaqhubeka uphenyo ngeke asho lutho.“USenzo wayengavikeli mina ngela-nga ashona ngalo njengoba kushiwo. Kusaqhubeka uphenyo akukho engizokusho,” kuchaza uKelly.Ube esecacisa ukuthi ngesikhathi eboshelwa ukushaya unkosikazi kaSenzo, uMandisa ngonyaka odlule kwakungeyena owamsukela. “Nganginezinyanga ezimbili vo ngikhulelwe ngihamba nodadewethu ngesikhathi umuntu wesifazane esishayelisa kabi nokwaphoqa ukuthi size siphumele ngaphandle,” kusho uKelly.Ngesikhathi ephuma uthe wayesevele ethukuthele nokwaphoqa ukuthi avele amgibele ngenduku uMandisa. UKelly akabange esacacisa ukuthi wayemazi yini uMandisa noma cha. Okunye akuvezile ukuthi wake wacwila ezidakami-zweni ayefakwe kuzo umuntu ayesondelene naye.
title: Ucishe waphahluka ngokufa kukaSenzo

text: ISIKHULU seCape TownCity, uJohn Comitis, asizimiselengokumlaxaza u-Ayanda Patosiongadlali kuleli qembu likaBenniMcCarthy ngoba engekho esimeniesifanele umdlali webholaelikhokhelayo kodwa sinenkingangokuhluleka kwakhe ukukhethaukudla okumfanele. Sekunesikhathi engabonakalienkundleni uPatosi ekubeniengomunye wabadlali abenzaizinto zenzeke kumaCitizens.Enkulumeni ayenze ngoLwesibili emsakazweni, uComitis uvezeokuningi angazange akushongesikhathi Isolezwe limnikaithuba ngosuku olufanayo. Ubuyele emsebenzini ngoLwesibili uPatosi ngemuva kokunqunyelwaugwayi katiki kodwa kusazobayisikhathi ngaphambi kokuthiabonakale enkundleni ngenxayokukhuluphala kakhulu. “Sibhekene nenkinga laphangoba sifike simdwebele kahleukudla okufanele agxile kukonangoba uyazazi ukuthi unenkingayokuzimuka kodwa akayingenileyo nto. Uzithandela amagwinyanezinto ezifana nama-fried chips.Ngisho singabeka amasaladiamahle kanjani uPatosiakayingeni leyo nto. Sinenkingayokukhokhela umdlali izizumbuluzemali kodwa engakwenzi lokhuaqashelwe khona. Siba yiqembuelihlukile uma esenkundleniyingakho singeke simlahle kodwakusemqoka ukuthinaye abhukuleasisize njengobasimsiza nathi,” ushokanje uComitisemsakazweni. Lo mdlaliulandwe eBelgiumngoba iCityihanjelwe abadlaliababili abamqokaokunguLebohangManyamaoye eTurkeyno-Aubrey Ngomayena oqomeiMamelodiSundowns
title: Kukhalwa ngokumamfuza amagwinya kumdlali we-PSL

text: ANGAHLE azithole esenkingeni umculi osanda kuhlulwa kuma-Idols South Afrika akuMzansi Magic ngenxa yezinsolo zokushaya owesifazane.UMthokozisi Ndaba wakwaMashu ohlulwe nguPaxton Fieles, usolwa ngokumuhluza kanzima owesifazane ogcine eqhephuke izinyo.Izithombe zalo wesifazane zizungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Zihambisana nombhalo osola uMthokozisi ngokumshaya kabi.Owesifazane ozibiza ngoNeo Tsele ubhale ukuthi ubeseflethini lomngani wakhe ngesikhathi uMthokozisi elokhu ebaphazamisa bekhuluma.“Besithi uma sizixabanela angenelele angiphushe kabi aze angincikise odongeni. Ngimtshelile ukuthi angiyithandi into ayenzayo. Uvule ibhodlela leVodka lami. Ngamtshela ukuthi akaliyeke angaliphuzi. Kube ngizithintele ngoba ungidudulele phandle.Ngizamile ukuzivikela kodwa wangidudula kabi wase engixova ngisibhakela ngaze ngopha. Umngani wami uBandile uzame ukumvimba kodwa kwangathi uthelwe ngezibonkolo.Ungishaye ngaphelelwa amandla ngaze nganaka ukuthi elinye izinyo lami liqhephukile.”Uthe akazange axolise kunalokho ubemusho ngenhlamba emthuka. Kubizwe amaphoyisa okuthe uma efika, uMthokozisi wabaleka.Omunye ozibize ngomngani kamgilwa, uthe uNeo oshayiwe ubengamazi uMthokozisi futhi uzingenele eflethini engamenywanga. Imizamo yokuthola uNeo ukuthi aphawule ayiphumelelanga.Isigameko kuthiwa senzeke ngoLwesihlanu ku-100 Jorrison Braam, eBraamfontein eGoli kanti kuhabisana nokuvela kwiTwitter yakhe uMthokozisi obhale ngawo uLwesihlanu ukuthi useBraam ngosuku olufanayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa asesiteshini saseHillbrow eGoli, uSergeant Mduduzi Zondo, uthe baphenya icala lokushaya.Imizamo yokuthola uMthokozisi ayiphumelelanga ngenxa yokuthi ucingo belukhala kodwa lungabanjwa.Okhulumela uMzansi Magic uNondumiso Mabece uthe sebeke bazibona izithombe nezinsolo ezibhekiswe kuMthokozisi.“Sizamile ukumthola kodwa kwangalunga ngenxa yokuthi ubuyele kubo. SinguMzansi Magic nama-Idols SA asihambisani nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu,” usho kanje.Kusuka ngeSonto eledlule uMthokozisi ubesematheni ngenxa yokuhluleka wukwamukela ukwehlulwa. Lokhu kuhlaluke engalubhadi esithangamini sabezindaba esiba khona njalo emuva kokuvalwa komcimbi wama-Idols SA.Kubikwe ukuthi ngendlela abephatheke kabi ngayo uyelulekwa.Lezi zinsolo zivele ngesikhathi iNingizimu Afrika isemkhankasweni wezinsuku ezingu-16 Zokuxwayisa ngoDlame oluBhekiswe kwaBesifazane nezingane.
title: Owama-Idols usolwa ngokushaya owesifazane

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEUNGQONGQOSHE wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Bongiwe Sithole-Moloi, wethule uhlelo lokusiza abalimi ngogandaganda, imishini yokutshala nezimbewu.Lolu hlelo lwethulwe eDondotha eKing Cetshwayo.Uthe ngohlelo kuhloswe ukulekelela abalimi ukuba balime odukathole bamasimu ukuze kwandiswe imikhiqizo yokudla okutshaliwe esifundazweni.“Lolu wuhlelo lokusiza abalimi ngezinsiza kusebenza okungogandaganda, imishini yokutshala, umanyolo, imbewu, izithombo, amadamu namalungelo amanzi. Lolu hlelo ludle uR57.2 million.”Ushiye ogandaganda abangu-10 abahambisana namageja nemishini yokutshala ukuze lesi sifunda silime umhlaba ongu-1 220 wamahektha. Zonke izifunda zizohlomula kulolu hlelo.UMnuz Fuyinkomo Mpungose ongusihlalo weQedindlala Project ehlomulile, uthe: “Ukuphumelela kwesicelo sethu sokulinyelwa ngumnyango kusithokozisile kakhulu. Besingenawo amandla okuzilimela wonke umhlaba kepha manje sesikwazile ukutshala umbila, izintanga, ubhontshisi ne-soya beans,” kusho uMpungose.UMpungose weluleke abanye abalimi abanomhlaba omkhulu kepha abangenawo amandla okuwulima ukuba bafake izicelo zokwelekelelwa ngogandaganda nezinye izinsiza kusebenza ukuze kuliwe nendlala esifundazweni.
title: Kwethulwe uhlelo lokusiza abalimi

text: USELE nesilonda esingeke siphinde silapheke umndeni womhlengikazi (42) waseRichmond Crest, eMgungundlovu ozibonele umyeni wendodakazi eyidubula, emahoreni ambalwa naye wazidubula.UNkk Ntombizodwa “Zo” Dlamini udutshulwe wumyeni phambi kwabazali bakhe asebekhulile, umfowabo, umakoti wakubo nengane eneminyaka engaphansi kwemithathu ngeSonto emini. Umufi ubekubo ngesikhathi kugasela umyeni wakhe, uMnuz Sipho Dlamini, obengujele wamdubula ephaseji, maqede wabaleka.Khona ngeSonto emuva kwamahora ambalwa, utholwe emotweni yakhe epake eceleni komgwaqo umyeni. Amaphoyisa kuthiwa amncenge cishe amahora amabili ukuba alethe isibhamu. Kuthiwa ubekhala ngokuthi ngeke akwazi ukubekezelela ukuphila ngaphandle kwenkosikazi yakhe njengoba eyilungu eliqavile ebandleni futhi uma eboshwa ezobhekana neziboshwa abezigada.Umsolwa kuthiwa ubesezidubula kanye esilevini, washona khona lapho. Uyise kaNkk Dlamini, uMnuz Ndoda Ntuli (72) uthe isilonda esisele njengoba indodakazi yakhe ibulewe phambi kwakhe nomndeni wakhe, ngeke siphinde siphole kwazise nombulali ngeke asajeza ngesenzo sakhe.“Isilonda ngeke siphinde siphele kithina njengoba sizibonele indodakazi yethu ibulawa. Kuke kube buhlungu uma kuthiwa phuthuma endaweni yesigameko, ufice umuntu eseshonile, usubona umzimba umboziwe. Thina esibonile emdubula, sambona elele phansi, sambona eseshona. Ngaphezu kwalokho nomuntu owenze lokhu wakhetha ukuzibulala. Lesi silonda singaphela kanjani nje? Sibone lukhulu,” kusho uNtuli.UMNUZ Lot Ndoda Ntuli, uyise kamufi uNkk Ntombizodwa Charlotte Dlamini (42), esemzini wakhe lapho indodakazi idutshulwe wumyeni wayo eMgungundlovu Isithombe: Motshwari Mofokeng/ANAUnkosikazi wakhe uNkk Bongiwe Ntuli (70) kuthiwa kusukela kubulawe indodakazi kunzima nokuba akhulume, nezinyembezi zilokhu zigobhoza.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lihambele ikhaya okwenzeke kulo isehlo izolo, abazalwane, izihlobo nabangani bebelokhu befika bezokhuleka.Uyise kaNkk Dlamini uthe indodakazi yakhe ibisiphenduke ukudla kwenduku, ishaywa wumyeni wayo.UNtuli uthe ufike kwakhe ephethe izidlo zeMothers’ Day kanti uzozithela phezu kwendodakazi yakhe ishayiwe.“Ubeshayiwe engakwazi nokuhamba. Ngithole ukuthi umkhwenyane ubejwayele ukumshaya. Yize engazange asibeke isizathu sokushaywa kwakhe kodwa ukuvezile ukuthi into aseyijwayele,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe indodakazi yakhe kade iphuma kudokotela, njengoba ingabange isaya emzini wayo eWestgate, yakhetha ukuya ekhaya. Umyeni wayo kuthiwa uye esibhedlela e-Edendale eyoyilanda kanti ayisekho.“Ungene nezicabha ethi ufuna indodakazi, ukuze bezoya emzini wabo. Ngimtshelile ukuthi ngifuna ukwazi ukuthi ngabe uhlala ngokumshaya yini. Uvele wavuma wathi vele uyamshaya, wunkosikazi wakhe phela. Ube esezingenela endlini eya ekameleni lapho besimcashise khona uZo, ufike wakhahlela isicabha. Wasidubula. Wakwazi ukuvula, wamdubula, uwele ephaseji, washona,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe ubeseshaye phansi ngonyawo ukuthi indodakazi yakhe ngeke isaphindela emzini wayo emuva kokuthola ukuthi ibihlala ngokuhlukumezeka.“Angikufiseli omunye umzali engikubonile. Engingakusho nje wukuthi uma ubona ukuthi uhlukumezekile othandweni lwakho noshade naye kumele usheshe ushiye phansi, ungahlali ucabange ukuthi kuzoba ngcono. Akumele ufihlele abazali nabasondele nawe ngokuhlukumezeka kwakho,” kusho uNtuli. Abashonile bese beneminyaka engu-12 beshadile. Bashiye izingane zabo zabafana ezineminyaka engu-12 nengu-10. Umuzi abebehlala kuwo bawuthengelwa uNtuli.Ngokusho kukaNtuli ikhona incwadi ekuthiwa umyeni wakhwakhe uyibhalile ngaphambi kokuzibulala, ekhala ngokuthi indodakazi yakhe ibingasathembekile.“Okungiphatha kabi nokwenza ngibone ukuthi uqamba amanga yingoba kade efika ekhaya akazange akuphathe ukuthi uyamsola ngokuqoma noma ukungathembeki. Ubengumuntu ozolanda unkosikazi wakhe nje emuva kokumshaya. Kungani engazange alukhulume nomndeni udaba uma ubesola indodakazi ngokuthile,” kusho uNtuli.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi umyeni walo wesifazane ubekhala ngokuthi ziningi izimoto ahamba ngazo, ezimshiya esangweni lakwakhe, okuvele ukuthi ubesebenzisa ama-meter taxi kwazise lo wesifazane ubengenayo imoto.Umyeni wakhe kuvele ukuthi wuyena obemnqabela ukuba abe nemoto ngoba ethi uzozenza indoda.Umdeni walo mhlengikazi umchaze njengomuntu obenomoya ophansi, obengathandi ukukhuluma izinto zomuzi wakhe. Kuthiwa ubewuthanda nomsebenzi wakhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCol Thembeka Mbhele uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala nedokodo ngokushona komuntu. Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa lusaqhubeka.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo eKZN uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo usigxekile lesi sigameko wathi ukuhlukumezwa kwabesifazane kumele kuliwe nakho.Uthe ngaphandle kokuthi balahlekelwe umsebenzi, njengoba kusukela ngo-2006 engumhlengikazi umufi, izingane zakhe zilahlekelwe unina.“Lesi kube yisenzo sobulwane. Kubuhlungu ukulahlekelwa umsebenzi obezimisele ezikhandla, angisayiphathi ke eyomndeni wakhe. Sizovakashela umndeni maduze,” kusho uDhlomo.
title: Kunzima bebona indodakazi ibulawa umyeni

text: USOMAHLAYA ongumsakazi weGagasi FM, uFlymotion, uthi ukuqokwa kwakhe emincintiswaneni emibili kanye kanye, kungenxa yokuthi ubuye anikeze abanye osomahlaya ithuba lokuzibonakalisa.Uqokwe emkhakheni weBest Comedy kumaDurban Creative Awards esibili kulo nyaka. Uqhathwe noNeil Green noCalvin H Goldstone.Uphinde waqokwa kumaSouth African Comedy Awards emunxeni weTop Comedian on Radio. Uncintisana noSkhumba Hlophe, Carl Weber, Dalin Oliver, Angel Campey. Darren Maule, Jason Goliath, TT Phasha, Pelepele Mchunu, Felix Hlophe noMr ajp Magwedze.“Kuningi engikwenzayo emsakazweni nangaphandle kwawo ukufukula abanye osomahlaya. Bekulukhuni kosomahlaya ukuthi banikezwe ithuba emsakazweni. Mina ohlelweni engisebenza kulo iNoma Yini ngo-12 kuya ku-3 ntambama noHeazy noLe Soul, nginikeza osomahlaya inkundla yokuthi basho amahlaya bukhoma ngoLwesine. Kuyabakhuthaza futhi badume bathole nomsebenzi. NgoLwesibili nangoLwesithathu ngithatha iziqeshana zalapho benandisa bukhoma ngizidlale. Nginemidlalo emifishane engiyenzayo wonke amasonto nakhona ngisebenza nosomahlaya ngibuye ngizibambele mina ngoLwesihlanu.”Uthe ukuqokwa kwakhe kumenze akhuthazeke ngoba abantu bayakubona akwenzayo.Okumkhathazayo wukuthi osomahlaya bathathwa kancane kunamanye amaciko.“Osomahlaya kumele basebenzise ubuciko obukhulu kabi uma beqamba amahlaya amasha kodwa bathathwa kancane. Uma ngisho imali engibiza yona uyiqhathanise nomuntu ongumculi noma uDJ, ihluke kakhulu futhi abantu bakubona njengomuntu ongasile. KoDJ kulula badlala izingoma zabantu kodwa babiza kakhulu. Yingakho sengizama nokuzenzela imicimbi yami hhayi ukwenza imali kuphela kodwa nokunikeza abanye ithuba. Kunengizowenza iCoastal Lounge eMgababa ngomhlaka-26, nomunye ngoDisemba 19 e-Olive Convention Centre.”Uzama ukuhlanganisa umdlalo wamahlaya ozoqasha abanye osomahlaya abasafufusa.AmaSouth African Comedy Awards akhuza ibuya emuva kweminyaka agcina ukuba khona.Abanqobile bazomenyezelwa emcimbini ozoba seSoweto Theatre ngoDisemba 12.
title: ‘Nginikeza osomahlaya ithuba lokuzibonakalisa’

text:
ULULAMELA esibhedlela umlingisi we-
7de Laan uPatrick Shai osinde edutshulwa ebhikishela ukungabibikho kukagesi emphakathini waseDobsonville, eSoweto. Kubikwa ukuthi uShai, oselingise kwi
Generations nakwi-
Ashes to Ashes udutshulwe ngoMsombuluko ekuseni ngenkathi ezama ukungenelela odabeni lomphakathi obubhikisha phambi kwamaphoyisa, wabe esethola amachaphazelo. Umphakathi waseDobsonville ububhikishela ukungabibikho kukagesi. Kubikwa ukuthi ugesi ubungekho kusukela ngoLwesihlanu. UShai, naye ohlala eSoweto, ubengenayo inkinga kagesi kodwa uqome ukujoyina umbhikisho ukuze kube nokuthula phakathi komphakathi namaphoyisa. Ngokombiko weChannel 24, uShai udutshulwe amahlandla angu-11 ngezinhlamvu zenjoloba ngenkathi ezama ukuxazulula ingxabano phakathi kwamaphoyisa nomphakathi. Uthe udubuleke ethangeni futhi izinhlamvu zimshaye kakhulu eqolo esezama ukubaleka. Ekhuluma kwiRadio 702, uShai ukhalaze ngokuziphatha kwamaPhoyisa, waveza ukuthi uzofaka isikhalazo kwi-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (Ipid). Sekunesikhathi eside kukhona imibhikisho mayelana nokungabibikho kukagesi eSoweto njengoba sekuvele imibiko ethi umphakathi ukweleta u-Eskom imali engaphezulu kuka-R1,8 million, ngokungawukhokheli ugesi.
title: Umlingisi usinde edutshulwa embhikishweni

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weSuperSport United, uKaitano Tembo, uphume iqhubu nabadlali abaphekwe ezinkuliseni zaleli qembu, wabancoma ngokufela enkundleni.Lo mqeqeshi odabuka eZimbabwe utshele Isolezwe ukuthi akazi ukuthi angayichaza athini injabulo elethwe eqenjini uSipho Mbule, Tebogo Mokoena nonozinti uRowen Williams.Uncome laba badlali ngokukhula kukona konke enkundleni.Uveze ukuthi okumjabulisa kunakho konke wukuthi baphekwe ezinkulisa zeqembu.Uqhube wathi nakuba engaqondile ukuthi abadlali abasanda kusayiniswa kabalenzeli lutho iqembu, kodwa ngeke akufihle ukuthi ukuhamba kwezithenjwa ezifana noJeremy Brookie, Dean Furman kumasizini edlule nokushiywa ngabafana no-Aubrey Modiba nabanye kubashaye inkebenkebe yengozi.Uqhube wathi okumthokozisayo ukuthi bazibonele bona oMbule, Mokoena noWilliams  ukuthi ijoka libhekene nabo, kuyabaphoqa ukukhipha konke abanakho." Ngiyaziqhenya ngabobonke abadlali bami, kodwa kulokhu ngizophuma iqhubu noRowen, Sipho noTebogo. Bakhulile ngokomqondo, bafithi, bayazi ukuthi kumele benzeni uma sekunzima. Kuba njena-ke uma iqembu lizinakekela izinkulisa zalo. Uma bengaqhubeka kanjena, iqembu lizobanjwa kude. Nabo siqu  banekusasa eliqhakazile,“ kubeka uTembo.Akasalanga ngaphandle uBradley Grobler osekuyikhaya lakhe lesibili kwiSuperSport njengoba esehlale kuyo iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili. Lo mdlali uzihola phambili kwiDStv Premiership ngamagoli awu-12.UTembo uphinde waveza ukuthi ugezeke igilo ngokuzimisela kukaThamsanqa Gabuza ofike kuMatsatsantsa a Pitori ngo-2019 ephuma kwi-Orlando Pirates. Useshayele leli qembu amagoli amahlanu." UGrobler ungumgadli wokuqina sidalwa. Ukuba bukhali kwakhe ngeke kube wusizo eqenjini kuphelakodwa neBafana Bafana izosizakala ngaye. Ngihlale ngibatshela abafana bami ukuthi kubalulekile ukugcina umgqigqo. Ngesifanayo kuGabuza, kule sizini ubukeka esazoba yingozi. Ungene khaxa esitayeleni seqembu".Izinto ziwahambela kahle Amatsatsantsa a Pitori. Asendaweni yesibili, abambene phezulu neMamelodi Sundowns neSwallows ngamaphuzu awu-27.
title: Bachonywe uphaphe abakhulele ezinkulisa zeSuperSport

text: Le ngoma ike yadla ubhedu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu benza ngayo izitayela zokuhamba bedunusa. Ibisohlwini lweziyishumi ebezivotelwa kwezohlukanisa unyaka kuKhozi FM. NgoLwesihlanu kusuke umsindo kuvela ukuthi kube nezikhalo ezikhulwini zomsakazo ngokungena kwale ngoma.Usomabhizinisi waseThekwini, uMnuz Calvin Mathibeli, uyena obhoboze ithumba wabhala kuFacebook ukuthi le ngoma ayisekho ngemuva kokuthi Igcokama Elisha liye enkantolo liyofuna incwadi yokuyivimba. Ngemuva kokuvela kwalezi zindaba abathandi bomculo abathanda bakamaskandi badinwe bathelwa ngamanzi bathi lo msakazo awubahloniphi.Abanye babhale kuFacebook bekhala ngokuthi kumele kubuyiswe izimali zabo asebevote ngazo. UPhilani KaMjikijelwa Makhundwane uthe: “Yingakho nje Umhlobo Wenene uyohlezi unishaya oKhozini ngoba nikhohlakele, lezi zinto ezingenasiko.”Ulebeleka Sithutha Setshitshi MfokaMakhathini uthe: “Sifuna imali yethu ngoba esikhishwe ohlwini lwe-Top 10.”U-Iam’Sbusiso Nkoskhona Skhangane Sokhulu uthe: “Sifuna uMzukulu abuye ohlwini lweTop 10”.UNomvelo Mvelo Jama uthe: “Yeyi nina Okhozini, buyisani ingoma yethu yomdunuso. Bese ngithenge iBrentwood ngilungiselela ukujabula ngale ngoma, nina seniyayikhipha. Ngithi nilimoshile ilanga lethu singamabhinca”.USiyabonga Manana uthe: “Singamabhinca sibhizi sibheka intambo esizoyinqamula ezokwenza uKhozi lungezwakali umhlaba wonke. Uma uMzukulu engeke awuhlukanise unyaka Ukhozi kumele lungabe lusahamba phambili umhlaba wonke.”Yize Igcokama belisolwa ngokuba nesandla kodwa belingakaze lithi vu ngalezi zindaba.Isolezwe limthinta uMthandeni uthe, ngeke aphawule usacela kuthintwe imenenja yakhe. Kodwa ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi akazani nalezi zinsolo ezibhekiswe kuye. Imenenja yakhe, uMpilo Manyathi, ithe bamatasa kukhona izingoma abaziqophayo.“Sibonile okushiwoyo, uma ngingasho nje asikwazi lokhu okukhulunywayo ukuthi kuvelaphi. Asibona abantu abangaqhubeka nokucindezela umculo kamaskandi njengoba sithanda ukuwubona ukhula,” kuchaza yena.
title: Igcokama Elisha liphika isandla kwekaMzukulu oKhozini

text: BAYATHUTHUMELA othisha kulandela ukushona kukathisha waseMlaza obenegciwane iCorona, izolo.Umndeni walo thisha ohlala eMlaza, ofundisa kwesinye sezikole eSiphingo ukuqinisekisile ukushona kwakhe.Leli phephandaba libhale udaba lomndeni walo thisha obunamalungu amathathu analeli gciwane izolo.Udadewabo kamufi ongeke adalulwe, ukumvikela, uthe bathole ucingo luphuma esibhedlela ekuseni khona izolo lubazisa ukuthi udadewabo useshonile.“Esibhedlela abelele kuso bekungasavumelekile ukuthi abantu bavakashele iziguli ezilaliswe kuso, selokhu kuvalwe ukwenziwa kwezinto eziningi kuleli ngeledlule.“Kuningi esingakakuzwa kahle kodwa siyazi ukuthi ubenaleli gciwane futhi ngemuva kokuthi litholakale kuye, kunabanye abantu ababili lapha ekhaya nabo abahlolwe kwatholakala ukuthi banalo,” kusho yena.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, uthe uwutholile umbiko wokuthi kunothisha onaleli gciwane oshonile.“Sitholile futhi ukuthi uthisha owumngani wakhe, owamlanda esibhedlela kungakaziwa ukuthi unaleli gciwane,naye imiphumela yakhe ikhomba ukuthi usenalo. Emalungeni omndeni kalo thisha, kuthiwa kunomfundi wakwesinyeisikole naye okutholakale ukuthi unaleli gciwane.“Kusadingeka ukuthi sithole ubufakazi balokhu esibikelwe khona eMnyangweni wezeMpilo bese senza izinhlelo ezifanele.“Uma kuliqiniso lokhu kuzosho ukuthi kumele bonke othisha bakuleso sikole nabanye abantu abake bathintana nabo, bahlolwe kulandelwa imigomo ebekwe umnyango,” kusho yena.UNobhala weSadtu KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza, uthe bakhathazeke kakhulu ngokushona kwalo thisha.“Uzakwabo kamufi owamlanda esibhedlela, kuthiwa wabuyela esikoleni wayofundisa ngoba izikole zazingakavalwa. Yize kuthiwa asingethuki kodwa lolu lwazi lusenza sikhathazeke.“Sithandazela ukuthi bangabi baningi abathelelekile ngalesi sikhathi ngoba akekho obazi ukuthi kukhona onalo.“Mhlawumbe sesifikile isikhathi sokuthi uMnyango wezeMpilo uma ukhipha izibalo zakulesi sifundazwe usitshele ibala loshonile ngoba lapha emphakathini kusanenkolelo yokuthi lesi sifo ngesebala elithile.“Lokho kuzosiza ngokuthi abantu bazi futhi kube nezindlela zokwesekana,” kusho yena.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe kunowesifazane oneminyaka ewu-46 waseMlaza oshonile ngenxa yaleli gciwane.
title: Bakhathazekile othisha kushona uthisha waseMlaza obeneCorona

text: NIYAKWAZI ukuphoxa umuntu bantu bakithi, ave ngiphoxekile ngizwa ukuthi kukhona abantu abatshale oR100 000 “ebhizinisini” elibathembisa ukuthi emva kwamasonto amabili imali yabo izobuya isuwuR200 000. Sekukangaki sinixwayisa ngokuthi wuyekeni lo mkhuba?Ayikho inkampani etshala imali engakuthembisa inzalo enkulu kangaka, ngiyanicela bandla uma nifuna ukutshala imali nibheke izinkampani ezigunyaziwe ukwenza lo msebenzi.Ngiyazi nizongiphoxa ningibuze ukuthi ngingenaphi uma nifaka imali yenu ebhanoyini elithi lizoyiphinda kabili imali yenu. Ngingena ekutheni uma esephahlazekile la mabhanoyi nifonela Isolezwe nikhala ngokuthi umnikazi “wenkampani” ubaleke nemali yenu.Okubuhlungu wukuthi kuleso sigaba ngisuke ngingasakwazi ukunilekelela ngoba ibhanoyi uma seliphahlazekile, umnikazi walo uhamba nemali yenu. IFinancial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA) ixwayisa abantu abatshale imali yabo kwiBitcoin Investment ngoba ayigunyaziwe ukunika abantu usizo lwemali.Iphinde yacela abantu ukuthi uma bengenaso isiqiniseko ngezinkampani ezigunyaziwe ukululeka ngokwezimali kufanele bayithinte ku-0800 203 722 noma bangene kwi-website yale nkampani ethi www.fsca.co.zaIFSCA iphinde yaxwayisa abantu ngokusebenzisana neYES Money Loans, Ekasi Bucks Insurers nanoSanele Forex Ngwenya Ngwenya.Mayelana nebhanoyi laseNewcastle ngiyacela nivakashele i-website yeFCSA kodwa engingakusho wukuthi amaphoyisa ayaphenya.* Amaphoyisa agqugquzele abantu ukuthi babike uma bethathelwa oR99 kuma-akhawunti abo, lesi sinyathelo sithathwe emva komhlangano obuphakathi kwezinhlaka zokuphepha namabhange. Esinye isixazululo okuziwe naso wukuthi abantu kufanele bavule amacala ukuze amaphoyisa aphenye bese ebopha abenza lo mkhuba.Kuthiwa yize lo mkhuba udlangile kodwa abantu bebengawavuli amacala, kwazise bagcina ngokubika emabhange abo kuphela.*Izihlathi zizovakashela izindlebe kubathengi uma bezwa ukuthi amabhange awasenalo ilungelo lokuthatha imali abayikweletayo kwamanye ama-akhawunti abo. Phela kuyenzeka kwesinye isikhathi uthole ukuthi weqiwe yinyanga esikweletini esithile sebhange kodwa lona lithathe leyo mali kwi-akhawunti olondoloza kuyo.Kuleli sonto inkantolo enkulu yaseGoli ivune iNational Credit Regulator (NCR) ebifakele iStandard Bank icala emva kokuthi leli bhange lithathe imali elikweletwa yona amakhasimende alo kwamanye ama-akhawunti.INCR ithe iStandard Bank ayinalo ilungelo lokuthatha imali kwi-akhawunti engasayinwanga phansi wumuntu ngesikhathi ethatha isikweleti.UNkk Nomsa Motshegare oyisikhulu esiphezulu seNCR, uthe amabhange anawo lo mkhuba.“Sifake icala enkantolo emva kokuthola izikhalo kubantu abebebona imali yabo isikhishiwe kuma-akhawunti abalondoloza kuwo imali, ikhokhele isikweleti sabo neStandard Bank. Umthetho wabathengi uthi imali kufanele ithathwe kwi-akhawunti ebhaliswe wumuntu, hhayi kwamanye ama-akhawunti lapho elondoloza khona. Siyasamukela isinqumo senkantolo ngoba uma amabhange efuna ukuthatha imali yabantu kufanele acele imvume kubona. ,” kusho uNkk Motshegare.INCR itholakala ku-011 554 2600 noma ngokuvakashela ku-www.ncr.org.za* ISouth African Banking Risk Information Centre (Sabric) izwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokwanda kwezigameko zokuqolwa kusetshenziswa amakhadi.Iveze ukuthi izigameko zokuqolwa kwabantu ngamakhadi zinyuke zadla uR873 394 351.Zandile nezigameko ze-vishing lapho amaqola efonela abantu azenze abasebenzi basebhange, afune imininingwane eyimfihlo yamakhadi abo.Isikhulu esiphezulu seSabric uNkk Kalyani Pillay sikhumbuze abantu ukuthi ibhange alisoze lababuza imininingwane yabo eyimfiho ngakho uma bethola ucingo olubabuza le mininingwane kufanele basheshe baluvale bese bebikela amabhange abo.Uthe bakhathazekile ngoba lezi zigameko zinyuke ngo-75.3% ngesikhathi ethula umbiko wakhe ngasekupheleni kukaJuni.Uthe ukuqola kusetshenziswa uhlelo lwe-mobile bankinga kunyuke kwafinyelela ku-100% kwadla uR28 941 040.Ziwu-11 077 izigameko zokuqolwa kwabantu ngohlelo lwe-swim swap ezibikiwe.UNkk Pillay ucele abantu ukuthi baqaphele ngoba amaqola ahlale ecabanga izindlela ezintsha zokubaqola.Uthe uyajabula ukuthi zehlile izigameko zokubanjwa kwezimoto zemali kwazise ngo-2017 beziwu 376 kodwa ngonyaka odlule kubikwe eziwu-292.Ukwehla kwazo uthe kwenziwa wukuthi abezimoto zemali namabhange basebenzisana nezinhlaka zomthetho.Uma unenkinga edinga ukuxazululwa kwezabathengi ungathumela i-email [email protected] Ubhale Ezabathengi endaweni yesihloko.
title: [IMIBONO] Iyangiphoxa eyabantu abaphikilela namabhanoyi

text: Bagcwele ukuzethemba ababhala u-matricKHULEKANI MASEKOBAYAZETHEMBA abafundi baka-matric futhi bazilungiselele ngokwanele ukubhala ezivivinyo zokuphela konyaka, abazoqala ukuzibhala namuhla.Isolezwe livakashele izikole eMlaza naseNgonyameni eThekwini izolo, lakhuluma nabafundi njengoba namuhla bezobe bebhala iphepha lokuqala lesiNgisi. Iningi labo lithe lime ngomumo ukubhekana nezivivinyo yize bekungelula ukufunda kulo nyaka ngenxa yobhubhane iCovid-19, oluphazamise izinhlelo zokufunda.Esikoleni samabanga aphakeme uMhawu esiseNgonyameni, abafundi bakaGrade 12 bahlanganile babamba umkhuleko ngenhloso yokuthandazela ukubhala okungenazihibe.UThobeka Dube (17) ongumfundi kaGrade 12 kulesi sikole, uthe bezikhona izinkinga ekufundeni kwabo ngesikhathi elakuleli likuthaqa, wathi kodwa othisha bebengazibekile phansi bezama konke okusemandleni, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi bazizwa besekilasini.“Ngikulungele ukubhala futhi ngizophasa. Besisebenzisa iWhatsApp ukufunda, othisha besithumelela umsebenzi ngayo basimakele basibuyisele, sibone ukuthi silungise kuphi. Siphinde saba namakilasi online asisize kakhulu,” kusho uThobeka.Uthe sabajabulisa isinqumo sikahulumeni sokuvula izikole ngoba kwasekunovalo lokuthi zingase zivulwe ngonyaka ozayo.USiyanda Mdunge naye ofunda eMhawu High, uthe ukuphela kwe-data bekuyinkinga ngesikhathi kufundwa, kusetshenziswa izinkundla zokuxhumana ngoba ibiphela ngokushesha kanti iyabiza.“Uma sinenkinga ye-data besibuye sintshontshe ngokuhlangana nesifunda nabo esikoleni, sifunde nakho okusilekelele kakhulu.  Sengizethemba kakhulu futhi kuningi engikufundile ngakho ngikulungele ukubhala.“Bekungelula ngoba kwesinye isikhathi bekukhona lapho ungaqondi khona kube sengathi kungama uthisha phambi kwakho akuchazele, kodwa sigcine sijwayele ukufunda ngeWhatsApp,” kusho uSiyanda.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lifika esikoleni iMenzi High, bekuwubutata abafundi belungisa amakilasi okuzobhalela kuwo abenza u-matric. Ayisithupha amagumbi azobhalela abafundi abangu-156.USibanisethu Hadebe (18) uthe basizwe ukusebenza ngokubambisana kanti akangabazi ukuthi bakulungele ukubhala.“Sibone ukuthi asifunde sonke sikwazi ukulekelelana ezifundweni ezithile ikakhulu iMaths, enabantu abaningi abayifundayo esikoleni.“Siyazithemba kakhulu njengoba othisha bethu bezinikele kakhulu ekusifundiseni kangangoba esikhathini esifushane sikwaze ukwenza izinto eziningi ngenxa yomfutho abawufakile,” kusho yena.ULondiwe Nsele (17) ofunda eMenzi, ukhale ngobunzima ababhekane nabo njengabafundi kulo nyaka wathi esikhathini esiningi ubengekho uthisha phambi kwabo ukubafunza ngezimpendulo noma ukucacisa, kulokhu umuntu abezithola ehluleka kukho. Uthe ukuvula kweqoqo kwiWhatsApp kulekelele kakhulu.Babhala nje, kade behleli emakhaya kusuka ngoMashi okuthe ngoJulayi abafundi bakaGrade 12 babuyela ezikoleni. Bangu- 129 000 abafundi okulindeleke babhale isiNgisi, namuhla kulesi sifundazwe.Okhulumela uMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uthe abafundi bazohlolelwa izinga lokushisa komzimba ngaphambi kokuthi bangene ezindaweni ababhalela kuzo.“Akusho ukuthi uma umfundi umzimba wakhe ushisa ngo-38  degrees akazovunyelwa ukubhala noma uzothathwa njengohaqekile, kodwa uzobhalela endaweni ethile khona esikoleni, angahlangani nabanye kuze kube kubuya imiphumela yakhe yokuhlolwa,”  kusho uMhlanga.Uthe otholakala ukuthi uhaqekile akazovunyelwa ukubhala, kuze kube uyalulama noma abhale ngonyaka ozayo.Khonamanjalo, iSouth African Democratic Teachers Union (Sadtu) ifisele abafundi ukubhala okuhle.Esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba le nyunyana ithi yize bekunezinselelo kugadla iCovid-19,  kodwa abafundi bakhombise ukuzimisela ngekusasa labo.“Sithanda ukuncoma nothisha ngokusebenza ngokuzikhandla nangesikhathi esengeziwe ukulekelela abafundi. Sinxusa abafundi ukuthi ngalesi sikhathi bazinikele ekubhaleni bangenzi izinto ezizophazamisa ukubhala kwabo,”  kusho isitatimende.AKUBAPHAZAMISANGA kangako ukuvalwa kwezwe ngenxa yeCovid-19 abafundi baseMhawu High, bathi bakulungele ukubhala izivivinyo zabo okuqala namuhla
title: Bagcwele ukuzethemba ababhala u-matric

text: Njengomlaleli woKhozi FM ngibona kufanele ngilukhuze uma selundizela phansi ngoba ukhozi lwaziwa njengenyoni endizela phezulu emafini.Ngicela izikhulu zoKhozi ziphume ziphele kulo mqondo wokuthi uKhozi FM lulalelwa abalaleli abagibela amatekisi nezitimela kuphela.Yebo siyavuma ukuthi siyasizakala ngokuthi uZwane asazise ngokuhamba kwezitimela noMsweli asethulele ngobunono isiminyaminya sezimoto emgwaqweni.Umbuzo odinga ukuphendulwa uthi, kungani kungabikwa ngokuhamba kwamabhanoyi oKhozini?Kungabe lukhona yini ucwaningo olwenziwa lwakhipha imiphumela yokuthi abalaleli boKhozi FM bahamba ngamabhasi nezitimela kuphela?OkaVolos uyaphikisana nomcabango wokuthi umlaleli woKhozi akatholakali ebhanoyini.Ngokuzithoba sicela izikhulu zoKhozi zipheze ukwehlisa izinga labalaleli ngoba sikhona sibaningi singabalaleli boKhozi abahamba ngamabhanoyi amakhulu namancane.Kungasijabulisa kakhulu ukuthi sibikelwe ukuthi kunokulibaziseka kokundiza kwamabhanoyi esikhumulweni sezindiza iKing Shaka Airport.Kungamsiza umlaleli woKhozi ukwazi ukuthi sinjani isiminyaminya sezindiza ezingenayo neziphumayo esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo International Airport.MaSolezwe, akusikhona ukuzikhukhumeza uma ngithi umlaleli woKhozi uyayidinga imininingwane yokuthi iBritish Airways noma i-Fly Emirates ishiywe yisikhathi yasilela emuva ngemizuzu emingaki?Izikhulu zoKhozi kumele ziqonde ukuthi uKhozi lunabalaleli abasezintweni, abandiza umhlaba wonke beyotshala imali emazweni angomakhelwane.Sisekuzo ezokundiza kwamabhanoyi; ngiyathanda ukwedlulisa amazwi endunduzo kubantu base-Ethiopia ngokushona kwabantu abangu-157 ngesikhathi kuphahlazeka indiza iBoeing 737.MaSolezwe ngiyathanda ukuthi sicathulisane kulo mkhakha wezokundiza kwamabhanoyi ngoba ubucayi futhi abantu abaningi abawuqondi.Okukuqala engifisa kuqondakale wukuthi ibhanoyi alifani nemoto, uma ibhanoyi lilisha kusuke kusho ukuthi liyingozi, akufanele ulethembe kanti imoto entsha isuke isho ukuthi yethembekile, akulula ukuthi yenze ingozi.Uma uthenga indiza kufanele ubuke ukuthi iyisekeni eselihambe amahora amangaki emoyeni ukuze uqiniseke ngokuthi iyilolu hlobo olungaphahlazeki kalula.MaSolezwe okaVolos akasho ukuthi imiqondo yabantu ayidume amabhanoyi kodwa uthi kungakuhle abantu baphume emqondweni wezimoto uma bengena othandweni.Kufanele kungenwe othandweni ngomqondo wamabhanoyi ukuze kujatshulelwe ukuthi isithandwa sakho sesake sathandana nabanye abantu ngaphambi kwakho.Njengoba sengike ngachaza ukuthi ubuhle bebhanoyi busekutheni selindize kangakanani, nasothandweni kufanele kungabukwa kabi ukuthi umuntu sewaqoma noma sewaqonywa abantu abangaphezu kuka-50.Emkhakheni wamabhanoyi asikho isikorokoro sebhanoyi ngoba kuyaziwa ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kakhulu kusho isipiliyoni esiqinisekisa ukuphepha.Nasothandweni akufanele kubalekelwe abantu abanesipiliyoni sokuqoma nokuqonywa kakhulu ngoba bangomakadebona abangasethuswa yizinkinga.Ngeso likaVolovolo
title: Volovolo Memela: Kungabe abalaleli boKhozi FM kabahambi ngamabhanoyi?

text: UMHLAZIYI wepolitiki, uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uthi uma isimo somnotho singashintshi eZimbabwe, abantu bakhona bangase bathutheleke eNingizimu Afrika nakwamanye amazwe awomakhelwane.NgoMsombuluko othisha baseZimbabwe abangamalungu eProgressive Teachers’ Union bebegcwele imigwaqo yaseHarare bemashela ukuthi baholelwe ngamadollar ase-United States ngoba iZim dollar ingasenawo amandla.Bathe abakwazi ukukhokhela izidingo zabo nokukhokhela izingane ezikoleni. Isimo asikhombisi ukuba ngcono emnothweni waseZimbabwe. Ngo-Okthoba izitolo ezinkulu okubalwa kuzo esezimpahla i-Edgars, ezokudla iTeta, KFC, St Elmos Zimbabwe neCorky’s Pub and Grill zibike ukuthi ziyavala eHarare. EGweru, elinye idolobha laseZimbabwe, isitolo sezimpahla iTruworths neTopics zivaliwe futhi akwaziwa noma zizobuye zivulwe yini.UKhumalo uthe amazwe ase-Afrika eseNingizimu kufanele alekelele iZimbabwe futhi ayivulele namathuba okuthuthukisa umnotho ngoba ukuwa komnotho wakhona kusho ukufuduka kwezakhamuzi zakhona zize kuwo.“Uma umnotho ufadabele abantu baya emazweni angomakhelwane ukuyobheka amathuba. NabaseZimbabwe bazongena emazweni angomakhelwane. Kuyasithinta okwenzeka eZimbabwe ngoba kumanje kunezakhamuzi zakhona ezigcwele la okusho ukuthi izidingo esizinikwa wuhulumeni sizisebenzisa nabo,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe ohulumeni bamazwe angomakhelwane eZimbabwe kufanele basebenzisane noMengameli omusha, uMnuz Emmerson Mnangagwa, ngoba ukhombisile ukuthi uzimisele ukuvusa umnotho wezwe nokulalela izakhamuzi zakhona.Isazi somnotho nezomthetho, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, uthe okwenzeka emnothweni waseZimbabwe ngeke kuwise umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika kodwa kufanele abantu bakhona bafunde kokwenzeka khona. “Inkinga esizoba nayo ngeyokuza kwabantu baseZimbabwe la kodwa ngaphandle kwalokho umnotho wethu ngeke uwe. Kufanele abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bayeke ukufuna izidingo kuhulumeni ngodli ngoba okuwise iZimbabwe yilokho,” kusho uDumisa.
title: ‘Ayilekelelwe iZimbabwe ngoba iyinkinga yethu’

text: UMASIPALA weTheku uveze ukuthi ulahlekelwa wuR60 million njalo ngonyaka ngenxa yokwebiwa kwamakhebuli kagesi ezindaweni ezehlukene.Kuleli sonto, abantu baseNanda basole uMasipala weTheku ngokuhudula izinyawo uma kuphele ugesi emalokishini nokusukumela phezulu uma uphele eMhlanga.UMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uthe akusilo iqiniso ukuthi umasipala uhudula izinyawo uma kufanele ulungise izinkinga ngoba usukumela phezulu noma ngabe inkinga ikuyiphi indawo.Uthe eNanda amasela anqamule amakhebuli awu-3km ngoLwesihlanu okusho ukuthi kwebiwe amakhebuli amaningi kakhulu kunalawo avamise ukwebiwa.“Ugesi size sakwazi ukuwubuyisa ngoLwesibili emuva kokuthi kwebiwe amakhebuli ePhola. Ngonyaka umasipala ulahlekelwa wuR60 million ngenxa yokwebiwa kwamakhebuli. Kuye kwathatha isikhathi ukulungisa le nkinga ngenxa yokuthi besingenawo amakhebuli amaningi enqolobaneni yethu. Umasipala uzokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi kukhona amakhebuli abakhona enqolobaneni yawo ngoku-oda isitokwe esanele,”Uveze ukuthi uma endaweni kuxhunywe ugesi wezinyokanyoka kuye kuthathe isikhathi eside ukuwulungisa uma uhambile ngoba kufanele ithimba liqale lisuse izinyokanyoka kwisekhethi ukuze likwazi ukusebenza.Uma sekususwe izinyokanyoka kwisekhethi kusuke sekuphephile ukuthi ithimba elizolungisa ugesi liqale ukuwulungisa ukuze ubuye endaweni esuke uphele kuyo.UMayisela ucele abantu ukuthi babike izigebengu ezeba amakhebuli ku-080 131 3111.Uphethe ngokucela umphakathi ukuthi wehlise umoya uma kuphele ugesi, uthinte umasipala ukuze uzowulungisa.Uthe bayawuchazela umphakathi uma bebhekene nezingqinamba ezizokwenza kuthathe isikhathi ukulungisa ugesi.
title: ITheku likhala ngezigebengu ezinqamula amakhebuli kagesi

text: BAWINILE NGCOBOZ ISAQHUBEKA izigameko zokuhlaselwa kwabokufika emalokishini akuleli yize lezi zigameko sezigxekiwe yizinhlaka zikahulumeni nezizimele.Izigameko zakamuva ezimbili zenzeke kwa-F, eMlazi kuhlaselwa izitolo zabokufika.Esigamekweni sokuqala esenzeke izolo entathakusa, kubulawe umsolwa kwaboshwa omunye ngesikhathi bedubulana namaphoyisa bebanjwa oqotsheni bengaphakathi esitolo sikasomabhizinisi wase-Ethiopia abebezobamba kuso inkunzi.Kwesinye isigameko esigcemeni esifanayo kuboshwe abasolwa abathathu izolo emuva kokubanjwa kwenkunzi isitolo sikasomabhizinisi waseSomalia, ngoMsombuluko.Izolo kuthiwa abasolwa abayisithupha bahlasele isitolo sabase-Ethiopia ezinzulwini zobusuku.UMnuz Abdurezek Hossen osebenza kule ndawo uthe abahlaseli babhodloze udonga ngemuva kwase kungena abathathu.“Omunye wabo ubephethe isibhamu kanti babe sebezama ukugqekeza ngaphambili kodwa behluleka. Sibe sesiciphiza i-alarm,” kusho uHossen.Bathathe ugwayi nemali engatheni kodwa akulimalanga muntu ngoba uHossen nabenaye bakwazile ukucasha kwenye indlu exhumene nesitolo ekhiyekayo.Uthe bebesazama ukuvula umnyango ngesando esikhulu abahlaseli kanti sekuqhamuka amaphoyisa kwase kuyadutshulwana.UHosseni uthe sekungokwesine behlaselwa bebanjwa inkunzi kusukela ngoDisemba, ukuhlasela kwakamuva uthe kwenzeke emasontweni amabili edlule lapho kubhodlozwe udonga abasolwa bangena ngaphakathi bazitapela izinto.Ngakulolu donga obekubhodlozwe kulo kupheshiwe ngosimende kanti yilapho kwabhodlozwa khona emasontweni amabili edlule ngesikhathi kuhlaselwa.“Umnikazi wesitolo wafika eminyakeni emibili edlule kule ndawo wavula indawo yokudayisa abelokhu eyinweba. Siyaqala ukuhlaselwa ngalezi zigameko zamanje besingakaze sibe nenkinga,” kusho uHossen.Uthe yena usefisa ukuhamba kule ndawo ngoba akacabangi ukuthi kusaphephile, vele uyasebenza akusiso isitolo sakhe.Izolo ukudayisa kulesi sitolo bekuqhubeka ngokujwayelekile kuvalwe indlu okuhlaselwe kuyo ngoba ibisafakwe intambo yamaphoyisa ekhombisa ukuthi indawo yesigameko.Bese kuqaliwe nokuvalwa kwembobo ebhodlozwe ngabasolwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uMajor Thulani Zwane uthe kushone uNjabulo Khathi kulesi sigameko kwaboshwa umsolwa oneminyaka engu-19 ozovela maduze eNkantolo yeMantshi eMlazi.Amaphoyisa athole isibhamu iNorinco nezinhlamvu eziyisithupha endaweni yesigameko.Kuphenywa icala lokubamba inkunzi ibhizinisi, ukuzama ukubulala, ukutholwa nesibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni kanti kuyaphenywa ngokubulawa komsolwa.UZwane uthe abasolwa abaneminyaka engu-23 ababoshelwe ukubamba inkunzi bazovela eNkantolo maduze.Ukuhlaselwa kwezitolo zabokufika sekuyinsakavukela ezingxenyeni eziningi zesifundazwe kanti izigameko zokuhlaselwa kwabo ziqale KwaMashu lapho bebehlaselwa ngamabhomu kaphethiloli belele ebusuku.
title: Bahlangane nembibizane behlasela abokufika

text: UBEPHEKWE ngebhodwe elincane waze washo izinto wabuye waziphikisa yena ufakazi eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu izolo ecaleni lokubulawa kwabantu ehostela iGlebelands.Lo fakazi ongeke adalulwe ngoba ubethula ubufakazi ngasese, ubehlohlwa imibuzo ngu-Adv Martin Krog ongummeli kammangalelwa wokuqala kuleli cala, uSergeant Bhekukwazi Mdweshu.UKrog ubemdida ngemibuzo lo fakazi, waze wagcina esesho izinto ezishayisanayo.Umbuze ukuthi kungani esitatimendeni sakhe sokuqala asenza emaphoyiseni engazange asho yonke into ayaziyo ngezigameko zaseGlebelands, waphendula ngokuthi okunye wabe esekukhohliwe ngoba wayesathukile.UKrog utshele ufakazi ukuthi isitatimende sakhe sokuqala wasenza ngo-2017, yini eyayimenza athuke ngoba izigameko zenzeka phakathi kuka-2014 no-2016, ufakazi uthe into eyayimthusa ukuthi wayezizwa engaphephile ngoba wake wajahwa ngabantu angabazi ngesikhathi eya emsebenzini waze wasizwa ngamaphoyisa.UKrog ubuze ufakazi ukuthi yini eyamenza wathatha isinqumo sokwenza isitatimende emaphoyiseni, ufakazi wathi ingoba wayesekhathele ukubona kuchitheka igazi ehostela.UKrog ubuze ukuthi kungani ngesikhathi enza isitatimende sokuqala engazange akhulume ngesigameko sika-Agasti 19, 2014, sokuzama ukubulala ngoba wayenolwazi ngaso, ufakazi uthe ucabanga ukuthi wakhuluma ngaso kodwa umphenyi wecala wangabhala phansi.UKrog uphinde wambuza ukuthi kungani engazange awatshele amaphoyisa esitatimendeni sakhe sokuqala ukuthi wayekhona emhlanganweni wokuboshwa kwetulo lokubulawa kukaMnuz Sipho Ndovela owadutshulwa emagcekeni eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza, uphendule ngokuthi wawatshela kodwa akazi ukuthi yini kungabhaliwe phansi.Ummeli umbuzile ufakazi ukuthi amaphoyisa amfundela yini isitatimende, wathi akasakhumbuli ngoba sesiside isikhathi.UKrog ubuze ufakazi ukuthi amaphoyisa amchazela yini ukuthi ungufakazi obizwa ngoSection 204, okusho ukuthi naye wayeyingxenye yecala, ufakazi uthe akakhumbuli ukuthi wachazelwa noma cha.UKrog uthe uyamtshela ufakazi ukuthi akasiye ummangali kuleli cala njengoba esho kodwa ungumangalelwa naye.Ufakazi uphikile ukuthi yena ungummangalelwa. UKrog uthe uyamtshela ukuthi bekunecala lokuzama ukubulala ebelimbophile eliqhubekayo, uNdovela abengufakazi kulona.Ufakazi uthe akasakhumbuli ukuthi kukhona icala analo ngoba akasilo iphoyisa. UKrog uthe akudingi ukuthi ube yiphoyisa ukuze wazi ukuthi unecala.Ufakazi utshele inkantolo ukuthi ubudlelwano bakhe noMdweshu bese bungebuhle, wambuza ukuthi bambizela emhlanganweni wetulo lokubulala uNdovela, wathi akazi.Icala liyaqhubeka.
title: Ummeli udide ufakazi ngemibuzo kolwaseGlebe

text: AKAYINGENI eyokuba yiphini lomqeqeshi eqenjini elikhulu leKaizer Chiefs u-Arthur “10111” Zwane, oqeqesha iqembu leMultiChoice Diski Challenge (MDC) kuMakhosi.Eminyakeni edlule, uZwane ubelokhu emataniswa neqembu elikhulu kwazise amava akhe ayabonakala kwiMDC.Useke wanqoba isicoco seMultiChoice Diski Shield (MDS) neChiefs, waphinde wakhiqiza inqwaba yabadlali okubalwa kubona uNkosingiphile Ngcobo, Siyabonga Ngezane noHappy Mashiane, ukusho abambalwa.Bakhona abalandeli beChiefs ababona ukuthi njengoba izinto zilibhedela iqembu, sekuphele iminyaka emihlanu lingasazi isicoco, hleze sekuyisikhathi sokuthi kubuye izinkakha eqenjini elikhulu zizosiza umqeqeshi.Eminyakeni edlule, kuke kwasiza uDoctor “16V” Khumalo noDonald “Ace” Khuse. Akhona amahlebezi okuthi * -Ernst “Mazinyo” Middendorp opheka iChiefs, ufuna iphini lesithathu kwezakhe.Ekhuluma nezintatheli, emqhudelwaneni waminyaka yonke oqanjwe ngenkakha, iSiyabonga Sangweni Youth Festival and Mayoral Sports Day, eDondotha, uZwane uthe akayingeni eyokuba yiphini.“Angijahile mina ukuya eqenjini elikhulu. Angizimisele futhi ukuba yiphini ngoba ugcina ube yilona impilo yakho yonke,” usho kanje uZwane.Kungenzeka ukuba uZwane uphahlukile, ubeveza ukuthi izikhulu zeChiefs, sezike zamsikaza ngokuthi azokuba yiphini eqenjini elikhulu.Ukhuluma kanjena nje uZwane, uphuma phesheya kwezilwandle e-United Kingdom lapho kade eyofundela iziqu zokuqeqesha i-Uefa B license.“Kuningi engikufundile phesheya kwezilwandle. Kungicacelile ukuthi sisele ebholeni. Kuningi okusafanele sikufundise abadlali bethu. Empeleni kufanele bafunde besebancane. Uyazi phesheya kwezilwandle abadlali bafundiswa izinto eziningi besebancane. Ngifunde lukhulu futhi ngizokusebenzisa kubadlali bami,” usho kanje uZwane.Ebuzwa ukuthi kungani ekhethe ukwenza iziqu ze-Uefa B licenze ekubeni abaqeqeshi abaningi benza i-Uefa A license wenabile.“Angijahe lutho mina. I-Uefa B license isiza kakhulu kubadlali abasebancane, laba-ke mina engisebenza ngabo. Mina ngifuna ukuthi ngiqale lapho. I-Uefa A license yenziwa kakhulu abadlali abebedlala phesheya kwezilwandle ezigabeni eziphezulu. Mina-ke ngifuna ukuthi ngihambe ngezitebhisi ezifanele ngoba angifuni ukufike ngishibilike, ngithathe ngamawala,” kuqhuba uZwane.Ebuzwa ngeqembu lakhe leMDC, uZwane ukhale ngokuhanjelwa abadlali abaningi asebedlala eqenjini elikhulu.“Kufanele ngiqale yonke into phansi. Ngilahlekelwe yinqwaba yabadlali esigijimela iqembu elikhulu. Vele yilowo kanye umsebenzi wethu, ukuthi sikhiqize abadlali sibanike iqembu elikhulu,” kusho uZwane.
title: UZwane akazimisele ngokuba yiphini

text: UKUSHAYELA ihlombe ukukhethwa kukaRia Ledwaba njengelinye lamaphini amabili kwiSouth African Football Association (Safa), u-Amanda “Toki” Dlamini, obengukaputeni weBanyana Banyana eminyakeni edlule.Le ntokazi yaseHarding, edlalele iBanyana amahlandla awu-96, yavalela amagoli angu-24, ithe ukusondela ngokwesikhundla kukaLedwaba obe ngowesifazane wokuqala ukuba yiphini likamengameli kwiSafa, kufanele kubukeke ngokuthi yisiqalo esisha ebholeni labesifazane.“Ngijabule ngokuqokwa kwakhe kepha angifisi ukuqokwa kwakhe kube wukuthi uvalwa umlomo. Ngifisa kucace ukuthi sekukhona owesifazane kubaholi beSafa. Usehlale isikhathi eside kwiSafa futhi ubezama ngakho konke okusemandleni ukufukula ibhola labesifazane. Ngiyafisa abe khona uma kuthathwa izinqumo ngebhola labesifazane ngoba iqiniso ukuthi lisasilele kakhulu,” kusho u-Amanda oqokwe njengenxusa elisha lakwaLeureus Sport for Good Foundation ngoLwesihlanu, eMhlanga.Olunye udaba olusematheni ngebhola labesifazane wukuthi kunombono wokuthi kufanele kuqale iligi yabesifazane ezofana ncamashi ne-Absa Premiership. Ukwakha iligi yabesifazane ewulolu hlobo kuzolekelela ngamathuba omsebenzi ezingxenyeni ezahlukene, kuphinde kulekelele namaqembu esizwe emiqhudelwanweni emikhulu njengoba licaca igebe asele ngalo emazweni anamaligi abesifazane.“Umama uRia kade ayefuna ukuthi kube khona iligi yabesifazane esezingeni eliphezulu. Ngigcine kuwukuthi bekusashoda abaxhasi ukuze igcine isunguliwe. Kodwa okufanele sikuqaphele wukuthi abadlali badinga ukucijwa besebancane njengoba kucaca ukuthi abadlali baze bakhule besashoda ngezinkulisa emazingeni aphansi. Ngiyazi ukuthi amaqembu akhona angadlala kwiligi kodwa mhlawumbe kubambe uhlelo oluzolandelwa nabaxhasi abazoyeseka ngoba ekugcineni inhloso ukuthi iBanyana Banyana ithuthuke, ibe sezingeni eliphezulu imelane nezikhondlakhondla zamanye amazwe,” kusho * -Amanda Dlamini.
title: Ujabule ngokuqokwa kukaLedwaba kweseSafa

text:
intatheli yesolezweABEZOKUSHUSHISWA koMphakathi, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), babophezelekile ngokomthetho ukuba bashushise uMengameli Jacob Zuma 
(osesithombeni) kulandela isinqumo seNkantolo eNkulu eNorth Gauteng ngeledlule ebeke eceleni isinqumo sango-2009 sokuhoxisa amacala angu-783 okukhwabanisa, inkohlakalo nokuthola imali ngokungemthetho abekwa wona. Lokhu kushiwo iDemocratic Alliance (DA) izolo.I-DA ekwazile ukuthola imvume yokuthi kubuyekezwe isinqumo sango-2009 sokuhoxisa amacala, ithe ngokuthola iziyalo kubameli, kucacile ukuthi amacala “asezivukele wona kabusha”.“Sihlangene nabameli basicebisa ngasohlangothini lwezomthetho, nangokubuyekeza isinqumo sangesonto eledlule seNkantolo eNkulu yaseNorth Gauteng. Kucacile ukuthi amacala ahoxiswa ngendlela eyiphutha, kwakungafanele ahoxiswe yiNPA ngo-2009,” kusho uMnuz James Selfe we-DA.Uthe manje la macala sekufana nokuthi asevuke kabusha ngaphandle kokuthi iNPA inqume. Uthe uMqondisi wezokuShushisa u-Advocate Shaun Abrahams, umelwe wumsebenzi wokumshushisa uZuma.Ungoti kwezomthethosisekelo uProf Pierre de Vos uthe isinqumo seNkantolo eNkulu sashiya iNPA nokubili okwakucacile engakwenza, okuwukuthi ishushise uZuma kumbe idlulise isinqumo esikhishwe ngoLwesine olwedlule.“Ngesikhathi iNkantolo eNkulu yaseNorth Gauteng isichitha njengesingekho isinqumo sowayebambe njengomqondisi wezokushushisa sokungaqhubeki nokushushisa uZuma ngamacala enkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa, isinqumo sokuqala sokuthola uZuma enamacala sabuyiswa,” kusho uDe Vos ebhala umbono wakhe kwi-blog yakhe i
Constitutionally Speaking, izolo.Uthe: “INPA njengamanje ngokomthetho inemvume futhi inesibopho sokuthi imbeke amacala uZuma ngaphandle uma sedluliswa isinqumo.”Amacala ahoxiswa ngaphambi kokuba kube nokhetho lukazwelonke ngo-2009, okuyinto eyavumela uZuma ukuba akwazi ukuqokwa njengoMengameli wezwe.INkantolo eNkulu yathola ukuthi izizathu ezabekwa ngu-Advocate Mokotedi Mpshe, zokuhoxisa amacala, kungenzeka ukuthi zazinenhlese yezepolitiki.
title: I-DA ifuna uZuma abhekane namacala enkohlakalo

text: ISITESHI samaphoyisa iDurban Central, esibhekelela izindawo ezimaphakathi nedolobha iTheku, iDurban beachfront nezindawo eziseMorningside sihamba phambili ngokubikwa kwamacala okudunwa kwezimoto nezithuthuthu eNingizimu Afrika. Izibalo zobugebengu ezikhishwe ngoLwesine zikhombisa ukuthi amacala okudunwa kwezimoto nezithuthuthu abikwe esiteshini iDurban Central anyuke ngo-19%. Ukudunwa kwezimoto nezithuthuthu kusuke ku-622 ngonyaka ka-2017/18 kwanyukela ku-666 ngo-2019/19. Iziteshi zamaphoyisa eziseThekwini, iBerea noMbilo zifakwe ohlwini lweziteshi ezinhlanu ezihamba phambili ngokubikwa kwamacala okudunwa kwezimoto nezithuthuthu eNingizimu Africa. IBerea ehleli kwinombolo yesine, inyukelwe ukubikwa kwamacala okudunwa kwezimoto nezithuthuthu esuka ku-551 agxumela ku-591. Anyukele ku-540 amacala okudunwa kwezimoto nezithuthuthu esiteshini saseMbilo, esibekwe endaweni yesihlanu, njengoba kade esuka ku-497.Isiteshi esihleli kwinombolo yesibili ngokubikwa kwamacala okudunwa kwezimoto nezithuthuthu eNingizimu Afrika kube yiHoneydew esisedolobheni iGoli. IBrooklyn, okuyisiteshi esiseGoli, sihleli endaweni yesithathu ngokubikwa kwamacala okudunwa kwezimoto nezithuthuthu. Iziteshi zamaphoyisa ezintathu zaKwaZulu-Natal okuyiMarianhill, Umlazi noKwaMashu E zifakiwe ohlwini lweziteshi ezingu-30 ezihamba phambili ngokwebiwa kwezimoto eNingizimu Africa. Umlaza ukleliswe endaweni yesishiyagalolunye ngokwebiwa kwezimoto njengoba zingu-147 izimoto ezidunwe khona. Izibalo zokwebiwa kwezimoto eMlaza zehle ngo-3 njengoba ngonyaka odlule kade kubikwe amacala angu-150. EMarianhill, kubikwe izimoto ezingu-134 ezitshontshiwe, kwakhuphuka ku-80 wamacala ayebikwe ngonyaka ka-2018. KwaMashu E kubikwe izimoto ezingu-129 ezitshontshiwe, okudlule u-84 owawubikwe ngonyaka ka-2018. UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uBheki Cele uthe izibalo zobugebengu eNingizimu Africa azikho zinhle.  Ukubikwa kwamacala obugebengu kwehlile kwezinye izindawo okubalwa kuzo ukubamba inkunzi ngenhloso yokulimaza, ukudunwa kwezimoto okunciphe ngo-(1,8%), nokubanjwa inkunzi kwamabhizinisi okwehle ngo-(1,3%). Ukuhlaselwa kwemoto yemali kwehle ngo-(23,1%), kwathi ukuhlasela kwamabhange kwehla ngo-(69,2%). Ukudunwa kwamaloli kwehle ngo-(1,7%) kwaphinde kwashona phansi nokuhlaselwa kwezindawo zamabhizinisi, okwehle ngo-(0,8%).
title: #CrimeStats: ITheku lihamba phambili ngokudunwa kwezimoto

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuVikela, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, unxuse ukuthi abezomthetho banikwe ithuba ukuze babhekane nodlame nokuhlaselwa kwabokufika eGoli.Uthe lezi zigameko zihleliwe futhi zihambisana nobugebengu. Uqhube wathi abomthetho bafuna ukubamba abasusi bodweshu okuthiwa seludlule nabantu abevile ku-10.Bangaphezulu kuka-400 abantu asebeboshiwe esikhathini esiyisonto.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ulugxekile udlame wathi abantu abalufuqayo bayizigebengu.Amaphoyisa ayaqhubeka nokuqapha isimo ezindaweni ezike zagubuzelwa wudlame eGoli.NgeSonto ebusuku kuvele ukuthi kukhona isakhiwo esishisiwe, kwezinye izitolo kuthathwe impahla.Amaphoyisa anxuse ukuba abantu behlise umoya.Abanye abakhulume neSABC baveze ukuthi yize bengabakuleli kodwa abaphephile futhi bayaphazamiseka ezifundweni zabo nasemisebenzini ngenxa yalesi simo esiqhubekayo.
title: Isicelo sikaMapisa-Nqakula ngodlame eGoli

text: KUBOSHWE indoda eneminyaka engu-34, eThembalihle eMgungundlovu etholwe no-R800 000 womgunyathi endlini yayo.Le ndoda iboshwe ngoMgqibelo amaphoyisa aseMountain Rise kwashaqwa nemali yomgunyathi.Kuthiwa endlini yayo kutholakale nethelevishini okusolwa ukuthi ngeyokwebiwa.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngomthombo ongashayi eceleni, umlisa ubengungqondongqondo ekuzakheleni imali, ebukeka sengathi eyangempela. Imali kuthiwa uma unganakile ungaze uzitshele ukuthi eyangempela ngenxa yendlela eyakhiwe ngayo.Kuthiwa umsolwa ubezama “ukuyidayisela” abantu ukuze ebezothola eyangempela.Kuthiwa ubethenga nezimpahla ezintshontshiwe ngayo bese ezidayisela impahla ukuze enze inzuzo athole nemali yangempela.Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa egasela endlini yomsolwa kuthiwa imali ibitakiwe, ifihliwe ezindaweni ezehlukene khona endlini yakhe.Kuthiwa ezinye zezinto ezibambise umsolwa wukuthi imali ubeseyidayisela abantu.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ubeke akunikeze uR100 bese ethi ungamnikeza uR50 wakho.Ngale ndlela ubekwazi ukushintsha imali engumbombayi bese ethola eyangempela.“Abantu bese beyithenga le mali yakhe bengazi ukuthi ingumbombayi. Umuntu ubejabulela ukuthi uthole uR100 ngokumnikeza uR50. Le mali kusolwa nokuthi ubeqola nangayo abantu, enze sengathi angabacebisa ngensavunsavu yemali kanti ukhuluma ngombombayi,” kusho umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umsolwa uboshwe nemali engumbombayi enguR800 000.“Amaphoyisa aseMountain Rise kade ephenya ngoMgqibelo. Athole umkhondo ngendlu eseThembalihle obekuthiwa igcwele imali engumbombayi. Anikele khona amaphoyisa afica umsolwa enemali enguR800 000 engumbombayi. Kutholwe nethelevishini okusolwa ukuthi intshontshiwe. Umsolwa ubhekene necala lokukhwabanisa. Uzovela enkantolo yaseMgungudlovu kusasa (namhlanje) ukuze abhekane necala. Izishaqane zemali engumbombayi zishaqwe amaphoyisa ukuze iyiswe kohlolwa,” kusho uZwane.
title: Usezikhindini obanjwe noR800 000 womgunyathi

text:
USEPHINDE wathola ukugxekwa futhi umsakazi weMetro FM uMasechaba Ndlovu kulandela ukukhwesha umculi ngesihloko sempilo abengazimisele ukukhuluma ngaso.Isigameko sakamuva sibe ngoLwesihlanu ohlelweni uMasechaba alwethula ngokubambisana noMo Flava iThe Drive on Metro FM engena ngo-3 kuya ku-6  ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu.Kulesi sigameko uMasechaba usolwa ngokukhwesha kabi umculi u-Anatii embuza imibuzo mayelana nokuthwasa kwakhe nokuyinto okuthiwa ubengazimisele ukukhuluma ngayo. Lo mculi ubehambele iMetro FM neminye imisakazo ekhangisa i-albhamu yakhe entsha,
IYEZA. Lesi senzo sigxekwe ngabantu abebelalele nabanye ababone i-video yengxoxo yabo esabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Masechaba is bully. Again using her platform to address things that aren’t related to the subject of the interview. This behaviour of feeling entitled to people’s personal lives must be the energy thats weighing her down.

October 5, 2018She seems to enjoy bullying people into talking about their personal stuff, she just ambushes people it’s uncalled for. 
@MasechabaNdlovu yoooh hai sis uyadina— MOEPAGAUTA (@PNtlhophi) 
October 5, 2018So grand grand was Masechaba expecting Anati admit to uthwasa because she felt some typa way around him? Wow this woman doesn't stop hey. So unnecessary 😷💆— Im gonna be ready - Yolanda Adams❤️ (@CyberMqalo) 
October 5, 2018Ephawula ngalolu daba kwiTshisaLive uMasechaba uthe ubengaqondile okubi ngokubiza u-Anatii ngalolu daba. Uthe abantu 'bayohlezi bebona abafisa ukukubona'. Okwenzekile kuze kwakhumbuza abaningi isigameko lapho uMasechaba abuza waphinde waziphendula ngokuhlukunyezwa kukaBabes Wodumo nokuyinto ayesola uMampintsha ngayo.UMo Flava usanda kuphawula ngalesi sigameko ohlelweni iThe Real Talk olwethulwa ngu-Azania Mosaka. Ephawula wathi okwenzeka kwaba yiphutha kwakungafanele balusingathe ngendlela abenza ngayo.
title: Usephinde wakususa futhi lokho uMasechaba...

text: INTOKAZI yaseNquthu, uZandie Khumalo, iveze ukuthi akuwona wonke umuntu wesilisa ongenalo uthando nodlala ngalo uma elutholile.Ukusho lokhu engomeni yakhe entsha yothando ethi Onjengawe, nathi izophuma ngoLwesihlanu oluzayo. Uthe iyothi iphuma ibe isitholakala kuzona zonke  izindawo ezidayisa umculo ngendlela yesimanje.“Le ngoma ngiyibhale ngenxa yamadoda alungile enza konke kahle uma kuziwa othandweni. Ngiwumuntu oluthandayo uthando futhi ezingomeni zami ngihlale ngenza isiqiniseko sokuthi angilushalazeli.  Kule ngoma ngibheke izindlela ezindala zokukhombisa uthando, oluvela kubantu besilisa belukhombisa abesifazane. Kuyona ngithi nje ’Ngiyabonga ngokuthi ukhethe  mina, ngiyabonga ngokungithanda’. Le ngoma ihambisana nesigqi somculo wase-Afrika,” kuchaza uZandie.Uthe abantu abaningi banemibono ehlukene ngobubi obenziwa abantu besilisa baze babizwe ngodoti.“Ngale ngoma ngikhumbuza abathandi bomculo ukuthi amadoda aqotho asekhona la ngaphandle futhi basengawathola. Uyazi la ngaphandle kusenamadoda athanda imindeni yawo, anakekela abantu athandana nabo aphinde anakekele nezingane zawo. Ngakho ngizobuyisa ithemba ngale ngoma,“ kuchaza yena.UZandie udalule ukuthi useyishuthile ivideo yengoma, kuyona nokuzogqama imvelo nobuhle bayo yonke into emhlabeni.“Ngiyathemba ukuthi abadala nabancane bazoyijabulela le ngoma. Kubona bonke abajabule othandweni nabalinyazwe uthando ezinhliziyweni zabo ngiyafisa ukuthi balalele le ngoma futhi bayoba nomuzwa ohlukile ngabesilisa. Ngiyakhuthaza nje ukuthi abantu bangalilahli ithemba uma kuziwa kwezothando,” kuchaza uZandie. Kule ngoma uthe usebenze nabantu okubalwa kubo uMojalefa Mjakes Thebe noMondli Ngcobo.
title: UZandie uncoma abesilisa abanothando ngengoma

text: IMITHETHO eyayishaywe yidlanzana labamhlophe elawula isibalo sabantu abasendaweni ethize yize yayingemihle kodwa yayenza ukuthi kwazeke ukuthi bangaki abantu abahlala kuleyo ndawo, kungafani namanje njengoba sekuyikampunzi edla emini.Lokhu kushiwo yisakhamuzi esidala saKwaMashu uMnuz Obede Mbatha (77) obekhuluma emcimbini wokugubha iminyaka ewu-60, kwasungulwa leli lokishi, izolo, othe kuyadumaza ukuthi manje akekho umuntu ozazi kahle izibalo zabantu abahlala kuleli.UMbatha othe wafika eThekwini ngo-1957, uthe abamhlophe bakha indlela yokuthi kube nesidingo sokuthi abantu abahlala ezabelweni abase besusiwe emihlabeni ababehlala kuyo emihle, babuyele emadolobheni bazosebenza, ngokusungula intela, i-poll tax.“Kwase kumele size emadolobheni siyosebenza ukuze sikhokhe intela. Yize kwakunjalo wawungazingeneli nje edolobheni, kwakukhona KwaMuhle lapho kutholakala khona imvume yokuthi usebenzei,” kusho yena.Uthe ngaphambi kokuthi ayohlala KwaMashu wayehlala eMkhumbane kodwa basuswa kabuhlungu balethwa KwaMashu, bakhelwa izindlu zamapulangwe abathi uma bekhishwa kuzo bafakwa ku-4 room owawuhlala imindeni emibili, kule mizi manje sekuyisesigcemeni sakwa L.“Kule ndawo kwakunepulazi lo mlimi uSir Mashall Campell, abantu epulazini lakhe bagcina sebelinqamulela ngokuthi iKwaMarshall, bagcina sebenqamulela ngokuthi iKwaMashu,” kusho yena.U-Edmund Mhlongo weK Cap uthe bambalwa abantu abaziyo ukuthi kungani kule ndawo kuthiwa kusesinqawunqawini.Uthe leli gama lasuselwa ekutheni omunye womama owayedayisa ukudla waphelelwa inyama wapheka inyama yenja.
