Amakhasimende akhe uma ebuza ukuthi lenyama emnandi kangaka eyani, wayewaphendula ngokuthi eyesinqawunqawu.ISIKHULU saseKcap uMnuz Edmond Mhlongo ekhuluma emgubhweni weminyaka engu-60 kwasungulwa ilokishi KwaMashu“Cishe akekho ongasazi isisho esithi wakhala phansi okwentshebe yaKwaMashu kodwa akekho ozihlupha ngokubuza ukuthi ubani leyo ntshebe. Iqiniso ukuthi leyo ntshebe indoda eyayinentshebe eyanqanyulwa ikhanda isitimela,” kusho uMhlongo.UNksz Jacinta Ngobese uthe intsha kumele izinuke amakhwapha ngokuphuza okwedlulele nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa, okudlangile kuleli lokishi.
title: Kukhunjulwe umlando waKwaMashu

text: SACISHE sashonelwa umndeni wonke engozini yemoto isitshudeni esithweswe iziqu, saphasa ngamalengiso e-University of Zululand (Ongoye).USimphiwe Mbona (22), ubashaye emakhanda ophikweni iFaculty of Arts. Uthweswe ngesonto eledlule iziqu zeBachelor of Arts in Drama and Theatre Performance. Akalukhohlwa usuku lwangoMeyi ngo-2017 okwakuyiMothers’ Day.Ngalolu suku uMbona wayelungiselela izivivinyo enyuvesi, wangakwazi ngisho ukufisela unina usuku oluhle lomama. Ngalo lolu suku unina uNkk Nomathamsanqa Mbona, uyise uMnuz Qiniseka Mbona nodadewabo onguthunjana uSithokozile, bagingqika nemoto.“Kwakunezikhukhula ezabulala abantu, ubaba ehambisa umama nodadewethu ekhaya ePort Shepstone. Babekade bevakashela elinye ikhaya elisePhoenix eThekwini kanti bazovinjwa yimvula enamandla, kwaphaphalaza imoto yagingqika. Konke lokho ngakuthola ngakusasa ngoba abadala bangifihlela ngengozi,” echaza.Uthe wathola ucingo kumzala wakhe ekhala, ebuza ukuthi ugcine nini ukukhuluma nonina. Yilapho aqala khona ukuthuka wazama ukushayela ucingo unina noyise, bobabili bengatholakali.“Ngabona ukuthi kukhona okwenzekile kodwa okwakubuhlungu ukuthi ngangingatholi zimpendulo. Kwaphazamiseka yonke into, ngaze ngashayelwa ucingo ubaba ngakusasa engichazela. Nakhona akachazanga okuningi, wafihla nokuthi basesibhedlela,” kusho yena.Uveze ukuthi akakwazanga ngisho ukuyobona abazali bakhe belimele ngoba wayexinwe ukubhala. Lokhu kwamphazamisa kakhulu, kwehla namamaki ezifundweni zakhe. Ubuye wabona ukuthi akasebenzise lesi simo esimehlele ukuzimisela ngoba wacishe walahlekelwa abazali abebemfundisa. Emuva kwalokho uMbona waqala wafundisa ezinye izitshudeni, wafundela nokudlala uphiyano namanje asadlalela izikole ezicula amakhwaya.Kumanje wenza izifundo zobuthisha, iPostgraduate Certificate kwi-Education e-University of KwaZulu-Natal. Ulingisa nasemidlalweni yeshashalazi kodwa ufisa ukulingisa kwithelevishini. Uthe ukufundela kwakhe ubuthisha kuzomnika ulwazi olunzulu ngezobuciko, avundulule amathalente kubafundi. Ngesikhathi ethweswa iziqu oNgoye ubephelezelwa abazali nothunjana, bezomhalalisela njengoba bacishe bangalubona lolu suku.Yize imoto okwakuhamba ngayo umndeni wakhe yafahlaka yaphela, ubonga ukuthi imiphefumulo yasinda. Kumanje unina akakwazi ukuzishayelela imoto ngoba ufakwe insimbi engalweni.
title: Wagqugquzelwa yingozi yabazali obethweswa iziqu

text: UMDLALI waMaZulu, uTalent Chawapiwa, ufuna bafele enkundleni kule midlalo emine esele ukugwema ukulahlekelwa yimisebenzi okungenzeka uma iqembu ligcina ligawulwa yizembe ekupheleni kwesizini.USuthu lubalwa namaqembu asenkingeni yezembe ngasemsileni we-log ye-Absa Premiership kusukela kuqale isizini ka-2019/2020. Lwehlele endaweni ka-15 luhlulwa yiBidvest Wits ngo 2-1 eFNB Stadium ngoLwesihlanu ntamba.Isiphekepheke saseZimbabwe, uChawapiwa, siveze ukuthi umoya munye ekhempini yoSuthu.“Wonke umuntu uyakwazi esikufunayo ngaphandle kokutshela omunye. Sonke sifuna ukusindisa imisebenzi yethu, sonke sifuna ukusindisa iqembu. Yilowo umgomo esinawo,” kusho uChawapiwa.AmaZulu aphume nephuzu ebambana ngo 0-0 neBaroka emdlalweni weligi ngempelasonto edlule nobekungumdlalo wabo wokuqala ngemuva kwekhefu lenkani yeCovid-19. IWits abebedlala nayo ibisidlala okwesihlanu.Ngomsombuluko ngo-3.30 ntambama, AmaZulu azobhekana neBloemfontein Celtic eLucas Moripe, nokuzobashiya nemidlalo emithathu yeligi ngemuva kwalokho“Asikwazi ukulahla amaphuzu manje uma ubheka indlela i-log eyiyona. Kufanele senze konke okusemandleni ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siphuma namaphuzu amathathu. Sinenhloso eyodwa sonke okuwukuwina noma yikanjani,” kusho uChawapiwa.
title: AbaMaZulu bafuna ukusindisa imisebenzi

text: Imithombo esondelene naleli cala itshele iTMZ ukuthi kunemigilwa ebiyethula ubufakazi ngoLwesithathu ngamacala abhekene noR Kelly. Kulobu bufakazi kuvela ukuthi ithimba likaR Kelly ilona ebelenza izinhlelo zokushushumbisa imigilwa ziyiswa kuR Kelly futhi kungalandelwa imithetho yezwe yokuvakashela kwelinye izwe.Kuphinde kwavela nokuthi lo mculi wake waphazamisa ukusebenza komthetho ngokukhokhela omunye wofakazi ukuthi angabethuli ubufakazi ecaleni elalibhekene naye elithinta ucansi ngo-2008.Kuleli cala uKelly watholakala engenacala. Kuthiwa kwakhokhelwa nomndeni walo mgilwa ukuthi wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi indodakazi yawo ingabethuli ubufakazi.Ngaphandle kokukhokhela ofakazi, kuthiwa uKelly nethimba lakhe basabisa imigilwa ngokuthi bazoyenzakalisa uma ike yafakaza kuleli cala.Nangesikhathi seliqulwa icala kuthiwa ofakazi bahlelelwa iholidi lokuthi bazikhiphe ukuze kube nesiqiniseko sokuthi abezi kulona nangephutha.Kuthiwa yithimba lakhe elalenza izinhlelo zeholidi ukuze liqhelise ofakazi enkantolo kuze kuphele icala.Kumanje kuthiwa abashushisi eNorthern District of Illinois bahlanganisa ubufakazi belinye icala elizobhekana noKelly elihlukene nabhekene nalo eNew York kumanje.Okhulumela iNorthern District of Illinois nommeli kaKelly, uSteven Greenberg banqabile ukuphawula ngalolu daba. - TMZ
title: Okushaqisayo ngamacala abhekene noR Kelly

text: Omunye uyabuza ukuthi kwenzekani kuye.Kukhona othi akaneme ngendlela okwenzeka ngayo emculweni wakhe ngoba wayethembisa.“Bake bakusho lokho ukuthi nje kumele ngabe ngile kude. Ngiyakuthanda lokho futhi ngiyakujabulela ukukuzwa ngoba kuyakhombisa ukuthi bangifisela okuhle kodwa,” kusho uNaima Kay.“Mina ngingathi yonke into inesikhathi sayo. Ngeke ngize ngisole lapho engikhona njengamanje, ngiyazi ukuthi kukhona okunye engibekelwe khona kodwa la engikhona manje kuhle, kumele vele ngibe khona kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi kukhona okuzayo. Ngeke ngize ngigcine la.”UNaima, ozalwe wethiwa uLungile Khumalo ePort Shepstone, ubekhuluma naleli phephandaba ngesikhathi enengxoxo ekhethekile nalo.Lo mculi uqale ukugqama ngo-2013 ngesikhathi ekhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi Umsebenzi anqoba ngayo umklomelo weBest Newcomer kumaSouth African Music Awards.Ube eselandelisa ngamanye ama-albhamu amabili ethi Ngiyavuma ngo-2014 ngaphambi kokukhipha ethi All About Love ngo-2016.“Ngajabula ngesikhathi ngikhipha i-albhamu yami. Ngizwa ingoma yami okokuqala emsakazweni ngingasekhaya nginogogo. Sajabula kwangathi kungene imali. Ngakhipha eyesibili ngokushesha ngoba sasingafuni ukubambezela abantu. Babengitshela ukuthi umculo wami ukhuluma nabo futhi nami ngangibhalela ukubagqugquzela.”Uthe wayengakaze azitshele ukuthi angaba wusaziwayo ngenxa yesimo akhula ngaphansi kwaso. Wakhuliswa wuninakhulu ngemuva kokushona kwabazali bakhe.“Ugogo wayesenzela konke yize siba khona isikhala somzali. Saseneliswa esikutholayo futhi ngangingafuni ukuziqhathanisa nezinye izingane.”Uthe ngemuva kokuqeda umatric eNgwemabala Comprehensive High ngo-2008, wasebenza ePosini ngoba uninakhulu wayethi ufuna basebenze.Wasebenza unyaka owodwa ngaphambi kokuhlangana noMdu Ngcobo, ophethe inkampani iTouch Africa Records, owamuzwa ecula emcimbini Ugu Jazz Festival wabe esemsayinisa.Uthe kumanje impilo yakhe igxile emculweni ngoba akukho okunye akwenzayo ngaphandle kwawo. Uthe njengoba ebengakhiphi nje, yingoba usiza abanye abaculi aqopha nabo enkampanini okunguLasandra, umfowabo uDJ Sammy K noPrince M.“Nami ngimatasa ne-albhamu yami. Sengenze cishe izingoma eziyisishiyagalombili futhi isikhona eyodwa esemsakazweni ethi, Soka Lami. Kwi-albhamu ngisebenze noMondli Ngcobo, Siphiwe Jula, Nathi Mankayi nabanye.”Uthe uma engasebenzi uphila impilo eyejwayelekile.“Ekuseni ngivuka ngilalele umsakazo. Ngiyazihlalela ngingaziphaquli ngibuke ithelevishini ngoba ngiyayithanda. Ngiyaphuma nabangani bami. Nginabangani abaningi, abanye baze bakhale ukuthi angisitholi isikhathi nabo.”UNaima uthe kukhulu asafuna ukukuzuza njengokusabalala kwamanye amazwe e-Afrika naphesheya kwezilwandle.
title: UNaima Kay ufuna ukuya kude nomculo wakhe

text: UMATO “Mkabayi” Madlala, oyisikhulu esiphezulu esibambile kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL), uzishaya isifuba ngohla olugweme ukushayisana kwemidlalo ye-Absa Premiership neyeCaf Champions League obekudlala kuyo iMamelodi Sundowns.“Ngikholelwa kakhulu ekutheni konke kwenziwe ngobulungiswa.“Ngasho kahle ukuthi izinsuku iSundowns ezodlala ngazo emiqhudelwaneni yeCAF kufanele sizifake zonke ohlelweni lwePSL ukugwema ukungqubuzana obekuba khona esikhathini esiphambili,” kusho uMadlala.“Kuthe uma sesiludwebile uhla, sabiza uPitso (Mosimane oqeqesha iSundowns) ukuze ezofaka umbono wakhe. Yingakho nje engazange abe nezikhalo.”Ugcizelele wathi le ndlela yokwenza izinto ibasize kakhulu ekugwemeni ukugxekwa obekuqhamuka kwabezindaba ngenxa yokushayisana kwezinsuku zemidlalo yeLigi neye CAF.“Selokhu siqale ukwenza izinto ngendlela ehlukile isihlenge ekugxekweni abezindaba uma sekukhona ukungqubuzana kwemidlalo yeCAF neye PSL.“Ukuphuma kwabo (iSundowns) nabo kuzobenza bathole ukuphefumula emidlalweni abebezoyidlala ngoba sesizobuyekeza uhlelo lwethu.Khona ukuphuma kwabo akuyona into enhle ngoba ukuhamba ibanga elide kule miqhudelwano kunikeza iligi yethu isithunzi,” kubeka uMadlala.“Ukuxhobela iqembu ngothotho lwemidlalo akusizi muntu ngoba uma likwehlula lisuke lisazoqhubeka likwehlule.“Ngakho ubulungiswa yinto engikholelwa kuyona kakhulu futhi kubalulekile ukuthi ububeke eqhulwini.”Yize ukuphuma kweSundowns kulo mqhudelwano kubukeka kuzokwehlisa umthwalo kwiligi nakuyona imbala kodwa kusazoqala olunye ushikishi ngoDisemba lapho amaqembu amane ezodlala kwiChampions League (Mamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates) nakwiConfederation Cup (Free State Stars neKaizer Chiefs).“Nakhona siwahlelele kuze kushaye uJanuwari wangonyaka ozayo ngokuthi sizibeke eceleni zonke izinsuku abazodlala ngazo emidlalweni yamaqoqo.”Uphetha ngokuthi kuzothi uma sekuphela imidlalo yamaqoqo sebazi ukuthi ngubani ozodlulela esigabeni esilandelayo esuka kwesamaqoqo, bazobuya bese sibuyekeza uhlelo lwethu lwemidlalo.Okuzokwenyukela kakhulu ngale midlalo ezoqala ngoDisemba wukuthi kufanele iphelile ngoMeyi, okuzokube kuphela ngayo eyePSL.Amaqembu adlulele esigabeni sama-quarter final eChampions League amikanje; Group A: Al Ahly ne-Espérance Sportive de Tunis, Group B: TP Mazembe ne-E.S. Setifiene, Group C: Wydad athletic Club neHoroya, Group D: Etoile du Sahel neClub Sesportivo.
title: Uzigqaja ngohla olugweme ukungqubuzana kweyePSL neyeCAF

text: NKOSIKHONA CELEIBHANTSHI ligcwale umoya kubefundisi ababili abagingqane ngesibhakela, beficana enyangeni eKorinte, eMzimkhulu.INhloko yeJerusalem Church in Zion kuzwelonke, u-Archbishop Zakhele Mchunu, ngesonto eledlule ibambe umhlangano ophuthumayo nesigungu esiphezulu esengamele ukusebenza kwebandla, bavumelana ngo "elethu” ukuthi uMfu Skhakhane noMfu Zikhali abebeyokhendla enyangeni, baxoshwe.Kuvela ukuthi u-Archbishop Mchunu ubashayele ucingo bobabili ebazisa ngokuxoshwa kwabo ebandleni.Kuthiwa uze wababhuqa wathi ubafisela inhlanhla ebandleni labo lomuthi abazolisungula ngokubambisana.Bebuzwa ngokuxoshwa kwabo, baphikile bathi bona basengamalungu ebandla.UZikhali wesabise ngokuthi uzophuma nabo bonke abazalwane begatsha lakhe ngoba bashunyayezwa nguyena.
title: Baxoshiwe abefundisi abalwe beficana enyangeni

text: KULINDELEKE ukuthi bavele enkantolo yaseBellville, eKapa, ngoLwesine abashayeli abangu-23 abangaphansi kweCape Amalgamated Taxi Associations (Cata) abasolwa ngecala lokuzama ukubulala. Abasolwa baboshwe ngemuva kokuthi amaphoyisa ebophe amatekisi angu-8 angaphansi kweCata, kulandela ukudutshulwa kwamalungu eDelft Taxi Association (Deta) ngoLwesibili. Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uFrederick van Wyk uthe abashayeli ababoshiwe bebedubula bebhekise erenki ekuMain Road. Uthe abasolwa abathathu badutshulwe balimala, kwatholwa nezibhamu ezimbili ezingekho emthethweni. Ukushuba komoya phakathi kwalabo soseshini kuqale emasontweni amathathu edlule, kanti sekushone umshayeli oyedwa weCata nomshayeli webhasi oyedwa. Impi phakathi kwabo isishiye abagibeli abaningi bengenakho okokugibela njengoba iCata isimise konke ukusebenza kwamatekisi ayo eNyanga, Delft, Wynberg, Claremont naseCape Town Station. Okhulumela iCata, uVictor Wiwi, uthe ukushuba komoya phakathi kwalabo soseseshini kususwe ukuthi abeDeta abasafuni ukubabona kumzila waseDelft. "Baxoshe abashayeli bethu kulo mzila, babadubula. Kade sithule ngalolu daba. Sikhethe ukuthi kume ukusebenza yonke indawo njengendlela yokuzwakalisa izikhalo zethu ngokwenziwa yiDeta," kusho uWiwi. Usihlalo weDeta, uNazeem Daniels, uthe kumele luphele udlame wacela abezomthetho ukuthi bangenelele. Uthe ngoLwesibili abangaphansi kwalo soseshini basinda kukubi behlaselwa abashayeli abangaphansi kweCata bebadubula. "Kudingeke ukuthi sibaleke sicashe. ICata ayidingeki kulo mzila, futhi ngeke isiphoqe ngokusisabisa ukuthi siyivumele," kusho uDaneils.
title: #TaxiWar: Kuboshwe abashayeli abangu 23 ngecala lokuzama ukubulala

text: UMENGAMELI we-Economic Freedom Fighters uMnuz Julius Malema ukhwele wadilika kwinkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ngesikhathi ephendula inkulumo kamengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ebhekiswe esizweni eyisola ngokuzifaka kwezepolitiki kuleli. Ngaphambi kokuthi angene kwinkulumo kaRamaphosa uMalema uqale wasola umengameli ngokuvikela izifiso zabamhlophe kuleli ngokunjalo nokuqinisekisa ukuthi bayaceba ngesikhathi izwe libhekene nobhubhane iCovid-19. “Ngaphansi kobuholi bakhe, abantu abawu-2 million ababenemsebenzi ngesikhathi engena ehhovisi likamengameli abasenayo. Kufanele uzisole wena ngokuthi abantu abawu-2 million sebelahlekelwe yisinkwa,” usho kanje. UMalema uthe uRamaphosa nekhabhinethe yakhe basaqhubeka nokushaya udaka kwezomnotho njengoba izwe likhungathwe yiCovid-19 nyakenye kanti livele libhekene nenzikamnotho. Uthe bahlulekile ukubhekela abantu boHlanga ngesikhathi sobhubhane kunalokho babhekele izisu zabamhlophe nabamazwe angaphandle njengoba bethenge izinsiza zokuvikela abasebenzi bezempilo kwiCovid-19 emazweni angaphandle. “Nichithe uR30 billion nithenga izinsiza zokuvikela abasebenzi kwiCovid-19, lokhu kwahlomulisa izinkampani zangaphandle. Kwala ngisho izinkampani zakuleli zifuna ukukhiqiza lezi zinsiza nazishaya indiva ngoba nibhekela izifiso zezinkampani zangaphandle,” usho kanje. UMalema uphinde wathi inkohlakalo ibukeka ikhuphuka ngaphansi kukaRamaphosa. Uthe inkohlakalo evundululwe yiSpecial Investigative Unit kumathenda eCovid-19 iwubufakazi bokuthi isanuka phu inkohlakalo kuhulumeni oholwa uRamaphosa. “Nakuba bukhona ubufakazi ngenkohlakalo ngamathenda eCovid-19, inhlangano yezokushushisa ayikabophi futhi ayikagwebi nesisodwa isikhulu sikahulumeni.”Uthe ngenxa yalokhu sebebhalele iPhalamende ukuthi kumele zihlale obala zonke izinkontikela ezithinta iCovid-19. Ngesikhathi ekhuluma uMalema ubelokhe egcizelele njalo ukuthi uyamhlula umsebenzi wobumengameli uRamaphosa. Engena odabeni olusematheni kulezi nsuku oluphakathi kwalowo owayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ikhomishini kaZondo kanye nenkantolo yoMthethosisekelo uMalema uthe ngeke besakuziba ubufakazi bokuthi kunamaJaji athengiwe kuleli. “Ngeke sisaziziba izinsolo  zokuthi kunamaJaji aseke agwazelwa ngezinhlelo zeState Security Agency, ngokunjalo nangeminikelo yeCR17 esesaziyo ukuthi kwakuwumkhankaso wenkohlakalo nokushushumbisa izimali. Amajaji kumele azi ukuthi awekho ngaphezulu komthethosisekelo. Ungaba yijaji kodwa awuyena uNkulunkulu...akumele bazitshele ukuthi bangakwazi ukuguqula umthethosisekelo bathathe amalungelo abantu,” usho kanje. UMalema uqhube ngokuxwayisa amajaji “ambalwa” ukuthi uma eqhubeka eziphathisa okomthetho, engadlulisi umthetho obhaliwe, abantu ngeke bakumele lokho. “Amajaji nawo ayaphenyeka, akumele azitshele ukuthi angaphezu komthetho.”
title: UMalema ukhwele wadilika kuRamaphosa

text: UKUVALWA kokudayiswa kotshwala izinsuku eziwu-21 ukulwa nokubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCorona kuholele ekwehleni kwezibalo ezibikwayo emaphoyiseni zobugebengu nodlame ezweni lonke.Lokhu kuqinisekiswe wuNgqongqoshe wamaphoyisa, uGeneral Bheki Cele, esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba izolo.Okhulumela uCele, uBrigadier Mathaphelo Peters, uthe uCele ukwamukele ukwehla ngamandla kobugebengu.“Nakuba izibalo zobugebengu zika-2019/2020 zisazokwethulelwa iPhalamende kodwa ucwaningo ngemibiko yamanje olungakaqinisekiswa oluqhathanisa isonto lokuqala lokuvalwa thaqa kwezwe nangesikhathi esifanayo ngonyaka odlule, luveza ukuthi ubugebengu behlile,” kusho uPeters.Uthe amacala okubulala asuke ku-326 ngesikhathi esifanayo ngonyaka odlule kanti asengu- 94 kulo nyaka.Awokudlwengula asuke ku-699 ehlela ku-101, awokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza ayengu-2 673 ngonyaka odlule kanti awu-456 asabikiwe kusuka esontweni lokuqala lokuvalwa kwezwe.Uthe nakuba amacala okubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe, awokudunwa kwezimoto nawokugqekeze ehlile esuka ku-8 853 ehlela ku- 2 098 kodwa kubukeka kuwuhlobo lobugebengu obunodlame kakhulu njengoba iningi labasuke benza lobu bugebengu besuke behlome ngezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni.Uthe amaphoyisa athola inqwaba yezingcingo ezevile ku-2 300 ngezikhalo ngodlame lobulili selokhu kuqale ukuvalwa kwezwe.Awu-15 924 amacala odlame lobulili abikwe emaphoyiseni kusuka ngoJanuwari kuze kube sekupheleni kwenyanga edlule kanti abewu-87 920 ukuqhathanisa nesikhathi esifanayo ngo-2019.UCele uphinde wakwemukela ukwehla kwezibalo ezibikwayo zokuhlukumeza okuthiwa zenziwa amaphoyisa.“Ukwehla kwezibalo zezikhalo ebezibikwa ngokuhlukumeza obekuthiwa kwenziwa amaphoyisa ezinsukwini zokuqala zokuvalwa kwezwe kukhombisa ukuthi abantu sebeqala ukukuqonda ukuvalwa kwezwe futhi sebeyayilandela imigomo nanokuthi amaphoyisa aseyabambisana nomphakathi.”Okhulumelai-Independent Police Investigative Directorate, uMnuz Sontaga Seisa, uthe awu-12 amacala enziwe ngamaphoyisa selokhu kuqale ukuvalwa kwezwe. Kuwo kunamathathu okubulala - amabili eGauteng nelilodwa eWestern Cape.
title: Zehlile izibalo zobugebengu

text: KUNGAKAPHOLI maseko kuboshwe iMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede mayelana nezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa, iNhloko ehhovisi layo uMnuz Martin Xaba isibekwe amacala umasipala ngoba uyisola ngokuhluleka ukuthathela izinyathelo labo abasolwa ngokuphula umthetho.UXaba usolwa ngokuhluleka ukuthathela izinyathelo izikhulu zikamasipala ezithenteka kwinkohlakalo yokuholelwa kwezisebenzi eziyizipoki ohlelweni lwemisebenzi yamatoho, i-EPWP.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uXaba ubekwe amacala ekuqaleni kwaleli sonto cishe ngesikhathi esisodwa okuboshwe ngaso imeya.Umkhandlu izolo awuzange ukuqinisekise noma ukuphike ukubekwa kwamacala kukaXaba.Okhulumela uMkhandlu weTheku, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe umkhandlu awuzikhulumi izindaba ezithinta umsebenzi nomqashi kumuntu wesithathu.Uthe uma kukhona izindaba ezithinta umsebenzi bazixoxa ngqo nomuntu osuke ethinteka.Imizamo yokuthola uXaba ayiphumelelanga izolo ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa kanti nomyalezo athunyelelwe wona akazange awuphendule kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.Kodwa umthombo weSolezwe osondelene kakhulu nodaba ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uXaba ubekwe amacala umasipala ngoba esolwa ngokuxegisa isandla kulabo abasolwa ngokuphula umthetho.Uthe inhloso yokubeka amacala uXaba ukuzama ukwenza ihhovisi lemeya ukuthi libukeke libuthaka futhi lingenalo uzinzo.Uthe enye inhloso yalo mkhankaso ukuthi kuphazanyiswe umkhankaso kaNkkk Gumede njengoba kubhekwe engqungquthelani yesifunda ngo-Okthoba.“Kuyaliwa njengoba kuyiwa engqungqutheleni kukhona abangasafuni ukuthi imeya ibuye njengoSihlalo we-ANC eThekwini manje benza konke okusemandleni abo ukuzama ukungcolisa igama layo,” kusho umthomboKhomananjalo, uyaqina umkhankaso wokuthi uNkk Gumede ehle esikhundeni sakhe ngemuva kokuboshwa ngoLwesibili.Abanye abantu abadume ngokuba inkukhu nempaka noNkk Gumede, Abahlali baseMjondolo izolo bakhiphe isitatimende lapho benezelele kwikhwelo elithi imeya ayishenxe esikhundleni.Okhulumela le nhlangano, uMnuz Sbu Zikode uthe abazange bathuke uma bezwa ukuthi imeya iboshiwe.“Inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa kudla lubi eThekwini, uMbuso bese kumele ungenelele ukuze kunqandwe lobu bugebengu obenzekayo,” kusho uZikode.Unxuse i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ukuba imkhombe indlela uNkk Gumede.“Kade sasho ukuthi iTheku manje seliphethwe izigebengu,” kusho uZikode.UNobhala-jikelele weSamwu, uMnuz Koena-Ramotlou, uthe badumele futhi baphoxekile mayelana nokuboshwa kukaNkk Gumede.URamotlou uthe kuyacaca ukuthi uphiko lwakwaDSW luyasetshenziswa ngosopolitiki ngenhloso yokufeza izinhloso zabo.“Kade sasho ukuthi ukukhishwa kwamathenda ale misebenzi engenziwa yizisebenzi akwenziwa ukuze kusheshiswe uhlelo lokuhambisa izidingo kubantu kodwa kwenziwa ukuze kudliwe imali,” kusho uRamotlou.Uthe bayanxusa ukuthi uNkk Gumede ashenxe esikhundleni sakhe njengoba kusaqhubeka uhlelo lwasenkantolo.Uthe bafuna kuqalwe phansi kubuyekezwe uhlelo lokukhishwa kwale thenda kadoti yezigidi ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi akuzange kuhambe kahle ekuqaleni.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uNobhala we-ANCWL eThekwini uNkk Zama Sokhabase, uthe bona bakholwa ukuthi uNkk Gumede kumele aqhubeke nokwenza umsebenzi wakhe wokuba yimeya.Uthe amakhwelo okuthi uNkk Gumede ehle esihlalweni wumkhankaso wokuzama ukumgudluza njengemeya noSihlalo wesifazane we-ANC eThekwini.“Siyazi ukuthi kunomkhankaso okufakwe kuwona imali enkulu obizwa nge-Operation Khuthuza iTheku-the okappis okuhloswe ngawo ukukhipha imeya esikhundleni,” kusho uNkk Sokhabase.
title: UMasipala weTheku ubeka inhloko amacala

text: USEJIKE izinto umculi ophinde alingise kulandela ukuba nohla lwakhe lwamakhondomu.UDr Malinga wodumo lwengoma ethi Akulaleki, uthi usebala izinsuku ngaphambi kokuba ethule ngokusemthethweni iKick it Safe with Dr Malinga.Exoxa neSolezwe ngeSonto uDr Malinga uthe, uphuphuma injabulo ngalolu hlobo lwebhizinisi asengene kulona.“Kungithathe iminyaka emibili nesigamu ngilungisa udaba lokuthi uhla lwejazi lomkhenyana lami lugcine luphumelele,” usho kanje.Uthe okumenze wangena kulolu hlobo lwebhizinisi, wukuthi ijazi lomkhwenyana yinto ebalulekile nesetshenziswa zonke izinsuku.“Ngaphezu kwalokho angenye yezinto ezibalulekile okufanele kukhuthazeke noma ngubani ukuyisebenzisa ngaphandle kokwesaba. Kufanele abantu bakhuthazeke ukuyisebenzisa hhayi ngoba bevika izifo eziwubhubhane kodwa nasekuhleleni imindeni nje,” kubeka uDr Malinga.Uthe yena njengomzali uhlezi eyala futhi efundisa abanye ngokubaluleka kokuhlezi kusetshenziswa lona ukuzivikela nokukhombisa uthando ngokuvikela labo okusuke kuthandanwa nabo kokuningi.UDr Malinga ucacise ukuthi yena akazakheli ijazi lomkhwenyana kodwa kunenkampani ewenzayo asebenzisana nayo nangeke akwazi ukuyidalula njengamanje.“Engingakusho wukuthi umsebenzi wami ugunyaziwe futhi udlule ezigabeni zokuhlolwa ukuze ube seqophelweni eliphezulu.”Uzishaye isifuba ngokuthi wakhe amajazi aqinile, awayona into yokudlala. Abantu bazowezwa kahle uma sebeqale ukuwasebenzisa ukuthi asezingeni elicokeme kangakanani,” kusho uDr Malinga.Mayelana nentengo yawo uthe yinto abamatasa ngayo kulezi zinsuku kodwa kuyothi kuphela le nyanga bazobe sebevumelene ngayo. Uthe azotholakala ezitolo nasezindaweni eziseduze nomphakathi.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uDr Malinga, ulindele ukuthi inkosikazi yakhe ibelethe indodana aseyethe igama lokuthi uLingas.“Ngiyazi abanye sebeqalile ukungijova bathi mina ngilindele ukuthola ingane kodwa ngikhipha amakhondomu, okusho ukuthi angiwasebenzisi, anginendaba. Engikushoyo kubona wukuthi ngimdala futhi ngishadelwe,” kusho uDr Malinga.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uDr Malinga akaqali ukukhombisa uthando lwezebhizinisi. Eminyakeni edlule wethula itracker yakhe yemoto namanzi asemabhodleleni.
title: UDr Malinga usezogadla ngamakhondomu

text: UZOCHUSHISA abesifazane abafuna ulwazi lokuthi bangakhula kanjani emabhizinisini, uMnuz Musa Zulu osezakhele olukhulu udumo ngokubhala izincwadi. UZulu kulindeleke ukuthi abe yisikhulumi sosuku aphinde acule emcimbini obizwa nge”Zenzele Mbokodo”, ohlelwa uNksz Shilex Shange. Lo mcimbi uzokuba ngoMgqibelo, eGallery of Faith, eThekwini.Lo mcimbi uwenza ngokuhlanganyela noNkk Sithandiwe Khamanga ophethe isicoco sikazime, uMrs KZN Senior Citizens.Elandisa Isolezwe ngalo mcimbi uNksz Shange uthe inhloso yawo ukuhlangana kwabesifazane bakhulisane emkhakheni wamabhizinisi, nangezinye izinto ezithinta impilo. “Lesi yisikhathi sokuthi abesifazane bavuke bazenzele, okunye okubalulekile wukuthi bazokhuthazana kwabona, kwazise badlule ezintweni eziningi ezingafani. Kulo mcimbi bazophinde babelane ngolwazi ngalokho abakwaziyo,” kuchaza uNksz Shange.Ephawula ngalo mcimbi uZulu, uthe ukuthokozele kakhulu ukuba yisimenywa kuwo yize kungowabesifazane kuphela.“Kukodwa engizokutshela abesifazane ngalolu suku, wukuthi konke kuyenzeka noma ungaba kusiphi isimo. Mina kuningi engikwenzile kwaphumelela yize ngiphila ngokukhubazeka njengoba ngihamba ngesihlalo,” kuchaza uZulu.Uthe imbokodo ayiphume ngobuningi bayo njengoba kukuningi ezokuzuza ngalolu suku.UNksz Shange uthe, kulo mcimbi izikhulumi zizobe zishumayela izwi lokuthi abesifazane bazenzele bangabheki ukwenzelwa ngoba ayikho into ebaluleke njengokuzimela.“Sibone kungcono ukuthi sibize umuntu wesilisa azokhuluma ngezinto ezihlukene njengoba naye esemkhakheni wamabhizinisi. Umuntu onolwazi oluningi nesingangabazi ukuthi abazohambela lo mcimbi bayohamba umgodla wabo ugcwele ulwazi,” kuchaza uNksz Shange.Uthe kulo mcimbi kuzongenwa ngoR100, nokuwumnikelo wokuba yingxenye yalo mcimbi.“Ayifike ngobuningi bayo imbokodo kulo mcimbi njengoba ingeke izisole, kuzobe kusindwe ngobethole. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sikhulisane ngazo zonke izinto ukuze sikhule futhi sikwazi ukuzenzela singabesifazane,” kuchaza uNkszShange.
title: Umbhali uzochushisa abesifazane ngezamabhizinisi

text: ISIVUVU sesibili seCovid-19 siphazamise ukuvulwa kwezikhungo zemfundo ePhakeme kanti iNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, imemezele ukuthi ngeke ivule namhlanje njengoba bekuhleliwe,  ngenxa yegciwane.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba kudaulwe ukuthi ngeke kuvulwe ngenxa yokuthi izikhungo zenyuvesi zisezindaweni ezinesibalo esiphezulu sabahaqwe yiCovid-19.Kuthiwe kuzovumeleka abenza imisebenzi ebalulekile kuphela okwamanje.“Sazisa izitshudeni nabasebenzi ukuthi uhlelo lokubhalisa luzoqala ngoJanuwari 18. Kufanele lwenziwe online ngoba ngeke kube khona umuntu ozovunyelwa ukuthi azobhalisa esikhungweni,” ngokombhalo wesitatimende seNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal.Inyuvesi iqhuba ithi kusukela ngesikhathi sikathaqa baphoqelekile ukubheka izindlela ezintsha zokufunda nokufundisa ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwezitshudeni nabasebenzi.Ngalesi sizathu izifundo eziningi zizokwenziwa online futhi nedata izotholakala njengoba ibitholakala phambilini.Izitshudeni zingaphansi kwekolishi leHealth Sciences, kuthiwa zizokwaziswa ngamaDeputy Vice-Chancellor namaDean ukuthi zizoqhubeka kanjani.NaseNyuvesi yaseZululand  kubikwa ukuthi ngeke kuvulwe okwamanje ngenxa yokuthi yakhiwe endaweni iKing Cetshwayo, enesibalo esiphezulu sabahaqwe yiCovid-19.“Asikho isitshudeni esizovunyelwa ukungena ezikhungweni zethu okwamanje. Lokhu kwenzelwa ukuvikela izitshudeni nabasebenzi kwiCovid-19 nokulandela imigomo yesigaba sesithathu yokuvalwa kwezwe,” kusho abaseNyuvesi yaseZululand esitatimendeni.I-Mangosuthu University of Technology (MUT) ngeke izamukele izitshudeni namuhla kodwa kuzomukelwa abasebenzi kuphela.Iphini leShansela elisabambile eMUT, uSolwazi Marcus Ramogale, lithe bebenomhlangano ophuthumayo ngoDisemba 31 lapho benqume khona ukuthi ngeke kuvulwe okwamanje.Izitshudeni ezisemakhaya kufanele zihlale emakhaya zingezi ezindaweni ezihlala izitshudeni kuze kube ziyaziswa ukuthi zenzenjani.“Sinqume ukuthi izitshudeni zingezi okwamanje ukuze sithole isikhathi sokuzilungiselela. Uma kunesidingo sokuthi sibuyekeze izinhlelo zethu zokufunda nokufundisa sizokwenza lokhu ngaphansi kwesigaba sesithathu sokuvalwa kwezwe. Izitshudeni zizokwaziswa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ukuthi zizobuya nini nokuthi ukufunda kuzoqala nini,” kusho uRamogale. Ucele izitshudeni ukuthi ziqhubeke nokuzivikela kwiCovid-19, zigqoke izifonyo athemba ukuthi zizozigqoka noma sezibuyele eMUT nalapho kuhlala izitshudeni.
title: Awazukuvula amanyuvesi KwaZulu-Natal ngenxa yeCovid-19

text:
IZINHLANGANO zamaciko KwaZulu-Natal seziveze ukuthi sekube nesivumelwano sika-30% phakathi kwazo noCassper Nyovest uma kuwukuthi uyayithola imali yokuxhasa umcimbi wakhe kuMasipala weTheku. Lokhu kuvele esithangamini nabezindaba ebesiseMoses Mabhida izolo.Izinhlangano okukhona kuzo iCultural and Creative Industry Federation of South Africa (CCIFSA), Creative Workers Union of SA (CWUSA), Triple Visual Demention (TVD), South African Arts and Culture Youth Forum (SACCYF), Imbumba Business Forum, KwaZulu-Natal Creative Industry Forum (KCIF), Amadelangokubona Business Forum neFederation for Radical Economic Transformation (FRET) beziyingxenye yesithangami. UJoy Mbewana obemele izinhlangano uthe bebengahambisani nomcimbi kaCassper ngoba abafuni ukuthi umnotho waseThekwini uphume kungasizakali muntu okhokha intela kumasipala.“Siyamvumela uma ethi akatholi xhaso njengoba nathi sinalo lolo lwazi. Izindaba ezavela zokuthi kuphume uR56 million ngalo mcimbi zasithusa kakhulu sasho ukuthi ngeke ube khona ngenxa yokuthi sasingazi ukuthi amaciko azosizakala kanjani kuwo nokuthi nathi njengezinhlangano sizotholani. Sahlangana noPhillip Sithole noThembinkosi Ngcobo basitshela ukuthi okuvelayo nabo abakwazi. Sabe sesihlangana nethimba likaCassper salibekela kwacaca ukuthi ngeke kuyeke phambili uma kuqhubeka kanje. Basitshela ukuthi akukho abasakutholile,” kuchaza yena.Uthe bavumelene noCassper ukuthi oxhasweni azoluthola bazothola u-30% njengezinhlangano zaKwaZulu-Natal futhi kuzoqashwa intsha yakulesi sifundazwe ezosebenza emcimbini. Bebuzwa ukuthi uma umasipala engasabaniki uxhaso yini ezokwenzeka esivumelwaneni sika-30% abavumelene ngaso, bonke bathe kuyobe kusho ukuthi bashwebile.FUNDA: 
Luyashuba olwamaciko aseThekwini nomasipalaUCassper uthe yize ebhekane nezingqinamba ezehlukene kuleli dolobha kodwa umcimbi uzoba khona ngisho engaxhaswanga.“NaseGoli izinkinga ezinjena saba nazo kodwa ukukholelwa entweni kuyasiza kakhulu njengoba umcimbi uzoqhubeka. Uvalo nginalo kodwa emalini ebenginayo sengisebenzise eningi ukuze umcimbi wami ube yimpumelelo,” kuchaza uCassper.Esithangamini bekukhona noDJ Tira obesolwa ngokuba nomona ngomcimbi. Kodwa ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi konke okushiwoyo kungamanga njengoba enezinkinga zakhe noMnyango wezokuVakasha kuMasipala hhayi umcimbi kaCassper.“UCassper wangifonela ethi unomcimbi kodwa iGagasi FM lase lingithinte kuqala. Ngabuyela kwiGagasi ngabatshela ukuthi sesicelwa nawuCassper kodwa bakubeka kwacaca ukuthi bacela ukuthi ngibhekane nowabo umcimbi ngalolu suku ngingayi komunye. Bangicela futhi ukuthi ngikhulume ngawo noma kuphi lapho ngiya khona nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana kodwa hhayi ngoba singahambisani nokaCassper,” kusho uTira.Uthe akaxabene noCassper njengoba naye ehlela imicimbi ehambela amadolobha ahlukene.Ekhuluma nephephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe iDaily News, uPhillip Sithole uthe uselinde incwadi enesivumelwano esithathwe emhlanganweni obuphakathi kukaCassper nezinhlangano zamaciko, nokuzothi uma sebeyitholile bese beqhubeka nesicelo salo mculi. Uthe bazowuxhasa noma kanjani lo mcimbi.
title: Zizoxebula umkhoma izinhlangano zamaciko ngomcimbi kaCassper

text: AMAQEMBU epolitiki afuna izinhlaka zomthetho ziphenye udaba lwezigidi zama-dollar okuthiwa ngezowayenguMengameli waseLibya, uMnuz Muammar Gaddafi ongasekho okuthiwa zazigcinwe emzini kaMnuz Jacob Zuma obenguMengameli kuleli.Elinye iqembu lithe kufanele kungenele namaphoyisa akwamanye amazwe esikhundleni sokuthi kuphenye uhulumeni oholwa yi-ANC.Lokhu akusho emuva kombiko weSunday Times oveze ukuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wacelwa ukuthi alande uR442 million owawugcinwe emzini kaZuma eNkandla, washushumbiswa wayiswa eSwatini.ISunday Times ithe uZuma wahlangana neNgwenyama uMswati III, esikhumulweni samabhanoyi i-OR Tambo kungoLwesine eqinisekisa ukuthi ikhona leyo mali.UMnuz Solly Malatsi okhulumela iDA , uthe uRamaphosa akathembeke esizweni asho ukuthi uthinteka kanjani kule mali.“Uma edinga usizo ngokulanda lezi zigidi kufanele asebenzise uphiko lwezokushushisa ukuze luqinisekise ukuthi uZuma uyaziphendulela ngesenzo sakhe,”Uthe akwamukelekile ukuthi uZuma wasiza undlovukayiphikiswa onguGaddafi, uphiko lwezokushushisa kufanele luphenye kutholwe ukuthi iyiqiniso yini imibiko.UMnuz Dennis Bloem okhulumela iCope, uthe kufanele lusukunyelwe phezulu lolu daba, izinhlaka zomthetho zingenele ukuze zibone ukuthi akekho yini owaphula umthetho lapha.UMholi we-UDM uJenene Bantu Holomisa, uthe:“Ngeke siyithembe i-ANC noZuma ngalolu daba. Kufanele kufakwe amaphoyisa amazwe omhlaba ukuze athole ukuthi imalini eyangena kuleli,” kusho uHolomisa.“Bebelwazi lolu daba yonke le minyaka. Bayalwa manje sekuvela ukuthi imali ibigcinwe wuZuma,” kusho uHolomisa.UMnuz Dakota Legoete okhulumela i-ANC osabambile uthumele i-video kaNgqongqoshe weZindaba zangaPhandle uNksz Lindiwe Sisulu ephendula imibuzo ngalolu daba.UNksz Sisulu uthe udaba lweSunday Times lufana “nodaba lwesipoki.”“Ngesikhathi siseSwaziland bekunamahlebezi athi imali ikuleliya lizwe. Ayikho imali yaseLibya eseSwaziland nami angikaze ngiyithole imali okuthiwa eyaseLibya. Uma abantu baseLibya befuna siphenye ngalolu daba sizokwenza njalo,” kusho uNksz Sisulu.
title: Bafuna kuphenywe ngezigidi zikaGaddafi

text: ABAHOLI abaphezulu ebandleni laKwaShembe kuvela ukuthi sebekhuze umkhuba owenziwa amalungu aleli bandla bathi akayeke ukucula izingoma zobumnandi, eziphendulwa izihlabelelo.Kuleli bandla kuvela ukuthi sekuwumkhuba ukuthi izingoma zikamaskandi, house, neminye iminxa ziculwe emathempelini.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi emasontweni adlule kusabalale i-video, yelinye lamathempeli okuvela ukuthi iseMtubatuba, lapho bekubonakala amalungu ebandla ngaphakathi ethempelini ecula ingoma kaKhuzani ethi Ijele.Kule video kubonakala elinye lamalungu liyiqala bese kuvunywa le ngoma ngaphakathi.NgoMgqibelo kuvela ukuthi umfundisi Ntombela waseBuhleni ukhwele wadilika kumalungu aleli bandla, ewatshela ukuthi awawuyeke lo mkhuba.Kwi-video Isolezwe elinayo, uNtombela uzwakala ethi, emathempelini oNyazi LweZulu, akuvumelekile ukuthi kuculwe noma iyiphi ingoma.“Izihlabelelo ziyaveza ukuthi akuvumelekile ukuthi kuculwe ezinye izingoma. Kusha thinana njengoba niqhubeka nenza kanjena. Ayiyekwe le nto yokucula izingoma ezifana nalena kaKhuzani ethi Ijele, futhi akuyona kuphela le ngoma eseke yaculwa ziningi, ngakho ke awuyekwe lo mkhuba. Uma kukhona abaqhubekayo nawo abahambe baye ejele njengoba owethu umshado la ungelona ijele uyisibusiso,“ kuphetha uNtombela.UMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe okhulumela ibandla, uveze ukuthi kade babewukhuza lo mkhuba kuleli  bandla.“Ngesikhathi siwukhuza usaqala kwakungathi sizonda uNyazi kanti cha. Izingoma esinazo ezihlabelelweni zethu zingaphezu kuka-200 futhi kumele kugxilwe kuzona. Lo mkhuba waqalwa abagcotshwa, abefundisi nabanye abaholi. Lokhu nje sikufanisa nebhadi ngakho ke siyakukhuza ukuthi kungenzeki noma kuliphi ithempeli eGoli, eThekwini nakhona eMtubatuba awume lo mkhuba wokucula izingoma okungezona ezethu,” kuchaza uMncwabe.Ethintwa uKhuzani uveze ukuthi uyabaxolisela bonke abenze lokhu.“Ngiyilungu lebandla laKwaShembe, ngakho ngiyazi ukuthi uthando abantu abanalo ngami lukhulu, ngiyabonga futhi ngalokho. Kodwa uma kukhona umkhuba okhuzwayo ngiyacela bawuyeke,” kuchaza uKhuzani.
title: Kukhuzwa abakwaShembe ngezingoma zobumnandi emathempelini

text: UMA kuya ngamazwi ephini lomqeqeshi kwiKaizer Chiefs, uShaun Bartlett, abalandeli baleli qembu kufanele bakwamukele ukuthi ngesizini ezayo ayikho indebe ezongena eNaturena.IChiefs iqede isizini yesine ingawinanga neyokubika indebe. Kushabalale wonke amathemba ngesikhathi ihlulwa yiTS Galaxy kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup eThekwini emasontweni edlule.Ngaphezu kwalokho, Amakhosi aqede isizini ka-2018/2019 ngaphandle kweTop 8 nokusho ukuthi azoyibuka nezihlwele imidlalo yeMTN 8. Abalandeli beChiefs abakufihlile ukudinwa kwabo ngokwenzeka eNaturena kwazise bafuna abadlali abathize bahambe nomqeqeshi * -Ernst Middendorp.Izolo, ngesikhathi kwethulwa iCarling Black Label Cup ka-2019 ePark Station, eGoli, uBartlett uthe abalindele neze ukuwina izindebe ngesizini ka-2019/2020 ngoba iqembu lizobe lakhiwa kabusha.IChiefs izodlala umdlalo weCarling Black Label Cup ne-Orlando Pirates ngoJulayi 27 eFNB Stadium, eGauteng. Amakhosi asevele aphumele obala ngezinguquko ezizokwenzeka ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2019/2020.“Kusukela sidlale owamanqamu siphezu komsebenzi wokuthola abadlali. Bakhona esesibahlonzile, sanika abaphathi amagama abo. Okwethu njengethimba labaqeqeshi ukudla amathambo engqondo, sibone ukuthi sibheka phambili kanjani,” kusho uBartlett.“Ngeke sizikhohlise ngokuthi sizosuka endaweni yesishiyagalolunye siyowina iligi. Kufanele sicathule. Njengoba siqhubeka nokufaka abadlali abasebancane, kufanele sibheke ukuthi sibahlanganisa kanjani nabadala ukuze sibe neqembu elihlangane. Emuva kwalokho, kancane kancane sizofika ekubeni yiqembu eselingakwazi ukuwina izindebe siphinde sifinyelele esicongweni se-log. KwiChiefs kuhlale kulindelwe ukuthi kuwinwe izindebe neligi kodwa kufanele sibhekane neqiniso lokuthi eminyakeni emine edlule asiwinanga lutho, sikushintsha kanjani lokho?”ICarling izobe idlala okwesishiyagalombili kulokhu. IChiefs inethuba lokuyiwina okwesithathu kulandelana kwazise iyiqukulile ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2017/2018 neka-2018/2019.Ukaputeni wePirates, uHappy Jele, uthe baphoxekile ngokuqeda isizini edlule bengawinanga lutho. Wathi kodwa iCarling iyithuba lokujabulisa abalandeli beZimnyama.“Sibe nesizini enhle kakhulu. Sikhombisie ukuthi sifuna ukwina izindebe kodwa ngebhadi siyiqede singapethe lutho. Ngesizini ezayo sizoqhubeka nokusebenza kanzima. Ukuwina iCarling kuzowunyusa umfutho nokulangazelela ukuwina izindebe,” kusho uJele.Mayelana neCarling uBartlett uthe: “Leli yithuba labalandeli lokwenza izinto ngendlela yabo. Sihlale sigxekwa, sitshelwa obekufanele sikwenze.”
title: UBartlett ubona siseza isomiso kwiChiefs

text: ISIFUNDA Ugu, siqhubeke nokuziqwaqwada amakhanda ezinye izifunda KwaZulu-Natal, ngemiphumela emihle ka-matric wanyakenye njengoba lwenza okufanayo nango- 2019.Lesi sifunda sithole u- 81.7%  ngo-2020,  sehla ngo- 4.6 % kweyango- 2019 esasithole kuyo u-86.3%.Silandelwa eduze isifunda saseMlazi ngo- 80.9% bese kuthi uMkhanyakude ulale isithathu ngo- 80.6%.    UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo esifundazweni uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu uthe ukwenza kahle kwazo zonke izifunda zakulesi sifundazwe kuyathokozisa kwazise asikho esithole imiphumela engaphansi kuka- 70%.  EsaseMajuba sithole 80.5%, esaseMgungundlovu 80.3%, Ilembe 76.9, esaseZululand 76.7, esasePinetown sathola u- 75.8%, eKing Cetshwayo kwaba wu- 74.8 %, Uthukela lwathola-  73.5 %  kugcine esaseMzinyathi ngo- 72.6 %.UPhumlani Zuma (17) waKwaMsane, eMtuba obefunda esikoleni  i-Nomathiya Technical esingaphansi kwesifunda saseMkhanyakude, ubaqwaqwade bonke amakhanda ezweni lonke esifundweni i-Technical Sciences.“Ngifake isicelo sokwenza izifundo kwi-Mechanical Engineering e-Wits University,”  kusho uPhumlani.UThembelihle Tsengane (19)  obefunda e-Little Flowers Secondary uhlonishwe esifundazweni nakuzwelonke njengomfundi owenze kahle kakhulu ngaphansi kwezikole eziku-quintile 2. Uhleli phezulu ezingeni lesifundazwe wabe  eselala isibili kuzwelonke.“Ukufunda ngokusebenzisa izinto zobuchwepheshe yikhona okungilekelelile  ngathola le miphumela yize bekungelula.  Ngifake isicelo sokwenza iziqu zobudokotela e- University of Cape Town,”  kusho uThembelihle.U-Obono Eyono Cynthia (18) obefunda eWestiville Girls esifundeni i-Pinetown, uwumfundi ophase kahle kunabo bonke KwaZulu-Natal kanti uyena kuphela  owebala elimnyama osohlwini lwabayishumi abaphase ngamalengiso esifundazweni. USinoyolo Ngubane (18) obefunda KwaThintwa School for the Deaf, ungomunye wabaklonyelisiwe,  ngokulala isibili kubafundi abaphase kakhulu i- Sign Language kuzwelonke, wazihola phambili ezingeni lesifundazwe.USihlalo wekomiti lezeMfundo esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Jomo Sibiya uthe imiphumela yalo nyaka iyajabulisa.“Okujabulisayo kakhulu  yizinga abafundi abaphase ngalo.  Ukukhula kwesibalo sabaphase iMaths kuyizinkomba zokusebenza ngokuzikhandla komnyango, othisha, abazali nabafundi.  Siyikomiti, sisebenze ngokuzikhandla silekelela umnyango nalapho ubuthanda ukungenzi kahle khona siwubuyisela endleleni. Sibongela umnyango ngokwenza kahle,”  kusho uSibiya.
title: Lwenze kahle Ugu kwimiphumela ka-matric

text: USEBUYA naseNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala eBloemfontein owesifazane waseMzimkhulu ofuna kukhululwe indodana yakhe ejele egwetshwe udilikajele ngecala lokudlwengula athi ayilenzanga.UNkk Noncedo Tshaka, waKwaMeyi eMzimkhulu kodwa ohlala eCape Town ngomsebenzi, ngoLwesithathu ubeseNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ezolalela icala lendodana yakhe uThemba Ntshaka (27).Lona wesifazane uthi enye yamadoda amabili adonsa isigwebo noThemba ngaleli cala yabhala incwadi efungelwe emaphoyiseni yenza nezitatimende ukuthi indodana yakhe ibhecwa ngobubende wumakhelwane.Elandisa iphephandaba ngokwenzeka, uNkk Tshaka uthi ngo-2011 kuthiwa kwangena amadoda amathathu emzini wekhehla elingumakhelwane wakhe elalibuya kohola impesheni baliphanga.“La madoda akhahlela isicabha angena endlini amfuna imali umkhulu. Kuthiwa waxolisa wakhomba la madoda ejazini lakhe ethi abayithathe khona imali, bangambulali. Sebeyithathile imali enguR1 000 kuthiwa la madoda adlulela ekamelweni likamakoti wakulo muzi afike amdlwengula eshintshana ngaye,” kulandisa uNkk Tshaka.Uthe ngakusasa amaphoyisa akhahlela umnyango wakwakhe abopha uThemba engagqokile emfuna abangani bakhe.“Ngesikhathi secala ummangali wathi wadlwengulwa ngamadoda amathathu kodwa akachazanga ukuthi uThemba wayekhona. Indodana yami yaboshelwa ukuthi yayiwumngani wababoshwa, behlezi bendawonye ngakho amaphoyisa kwathi mhlazane esebopha abasolwa ababili acabanga ukuthi nakanjani umsolwa wesithathu indodana yami kanti akunjalo. Umuntu wesithathu odidaniswa nendodana yami kuthiwa waboshelwa elinye icala lokudlwengula,” kusho uNksz Tshaka.UTshaka udonsa udilikajele eNew Prison eMgungundlovu. Unina uthi usechithe uR160 00 efuna kwenzeke ubulungiswa ngaleli cala.“Sengichithe imali eningi njengoba ngibuya eBloemfontein.Ngiyethemba ubulungiswa buzokwenziwa ekugcineni,” kusho uNkk Tshaka.Uthe uma ikhululwa indodana yakhe, uzimisele ngokumangalela uMbuso ngokubhadla kwendodana yakhe ejele ngecala engalenzanga.UMnuz Derrick Mdluli weJustice for Prisoners and Detainees Trust for Human Rights, uthe inhloso yabo wukubona ubulungiswa benzeka kuleli cala.Uthe njengoba abameli befake izethulo ezintsha enkantolo, unesiqiniseko amajaji azomkhipha phambili uTshaka.“Ekuqaleni amajaji abona ukuthi kunobudedengu obenzeka kuleli cala emantshini eyayilisingethe (eMzimkhulu). Isinqumo senkanolo sizokhombisa ukuthi uThemba uhlale iminyaka eyisikhombisa ejele ehlalele into angayenzanga. Emva kwalokho sizofunda izitatimende zecala nesigwebo bese sibopha uMbuso,” kusho uMdluli.
title: Ulwela indodana yakhe eboshelwe icala 'engalenzanga'

text: LISHONE izolo ngemuva kokugula isikhashana ijaji laseNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ebese lithathe umhlalaphansi uThembile Skweyiya.Izolo ibingena ingenile imiyalezo yenduduzo ngokushona kukaSkweyiya.“Sizitholile izindaba zokushona kweJaji uSkweyiya, sidabuke kakhulu. Ulisebenzele izwe ngobukhulu ubuhlakani engummeli olwa nohulumeni wobandlululo, eyisishoshovu esilwela amalungelo abantu waphinda waba yijaji laseNkantolo eNkulu nelaseNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo eNingizimu Afrika,” kusho isitatimende esikhishwe ngumengameli wamaJaji, uMogoeng Mogoeng.USkweyiya (76) ushone eseyijaji elengamele ukuhlolwa kwamajele (inspecting judge) okuwumsebenzi aqokwa kuwo nguMengameli Jacob Zuma abesawenze izinyanga ezine kuphela.Wazalwa eWorcester, eWestern Cape, ngo-1939. Wafundela ubumeli e-University of Natal kusuka ngo-1963 kuya ku-1967.Waqashwa waba ngummeli KwaZulu-Natal ngo-1970, waphinde waba wummeli enkantolo eNkulu eLesotho naseNamibia ngo-1974.“Ubengomunye wabantu base-Afrika ababe negalelo elibalulekile kwezomthetho, waze waba ngumuntu wokuqala wase-Afrika ukunikwa isikhundla sokuba yiSenior Counsel ngo-1989,” kuqhuba isitatimende.“Njengoba ebewungoti we-commercial law iJaji Skweyiya ubengathola umsebenzi onemihlomulo emihle kabi kepha uthando lwakhe lobulungiswa nenkululeko luholele ekutheni isikhathi esiningi enze imisebenzi ehambisana nokulwela amalungelo abantu nenkululeko.” Waba yijaji leNkantolo eNkulu yaseKZN ngo-2001, ngonyaka olandelayo wakhuphukela eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo athathe umhlalaphansi kuyo ngonyaka odlule.“Amagalelo akhe ekuthuthukiseni umthetho ayaziwa futhi anconywa emhlabeni jikelele. uzokhunjulwa kakhulu ngobuhlakani bakhe, ukuthobeka nelukuluku lokulwela amalungelo abantu, ekwazi ukusebenza ngokuzimela futhi ewuqonda kahle umthetho obusa intando yabantu. Impela bekumnandi kakhulu ukusebenza naye, enokuthula. Ilahlekelwe kakhulu iNingizimu Afrika, sizomkhumbula.”USkweyiya ushiye emhlabheni inkosikazi, uSayo nezingane ezine.
title: Kushone ugalagala kwezomthetho uSkweyiya

text: UMA kuya ngempendulo enikezwe umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, ngesikhathi ebuzwa ngamalungiselelo ezakhe eCaf Champions League, kubukeka sengathi leli qembu laseSoweto lisazoqhubeka nokuzishayela udaka kulo mqhudelwano omkhulukazi emaqenjini asezwenikazi i-Afrika.Izolo IziMpofana zibhekise amabombo eCameroon njengoba zizodlala nePWD Bamenda engompetha beligi yakuleliya lizwe. Lo mdlalo ongowomlenze wokuqala ungeSonto ngo-2 ntambama.Okugqamayo ngeBamenda wukuthi iyaqala ngqa ukudlala kwiChampions League emlandweni wayo.Ngenxa yezinkinga ezibhekene neChiefs kwiDStv Premiership, njengoba ihlulwe okwesibili kwiligi, iguqiswa yiSwallows FC ngo 1-0 ngoLwesibili eDobsonville Stadium,  uHunt ukhulume sengathi ufisa kudlalwe kusheshwe, kubuywe kuzoqhutshekwa nempi enzima ababhekene nayo kuleli.“Sizoya sidlale, ngethemba lokuthi sizokwenza kahle, bese siyabuya sizozama futhi,” kusho uHunt kwiSuperSport ngemuva komdlalo.IChiefs isanqobe kanye emidlalweni emihlanu yeligi.Ukushaywa kwayo yiSwallows kufanele wukuthi akubaniki ithemba abalandeli bayo ngokuthi ingahamba ibanga elide kwiChampions League.Leli qembu laseNaturena alinawo umlando omuhle kulo mqhudelwano. Selivamile ukuphuma zibekwa, lingalibhadi kweyamaqoqo lapho okusuke sekuqhuthana izinkunzi zangempela.Ephawula ngomdlalo wezabo neSwallows uHunt, uthe: “Kuyaphoxa impela okwenzekile, ngeke lokho sikubalekele. Bekungebona abantu okufanele basehlule, kwazise abakaze babe yingozi umdlalo wonke. Siwakhile amathuba, sashaya negoli (alizange libalwe). Angisiqondi isizathu esenze langabalwa igoli, kodwa siwakhile amathuba sashaya nepali. Kumele ushaye amagoli, lokhu esingakwenzanga. Bathola ithuba elilodwa, lakhala enethini, manje-ke ungathini.”Emidlalweni emihlanu yeDStv Premiership, iChiefs inamaphuzu amahlanu.Izizathu zokungenzi kahle kweChiefs ziningi, uma ulalelisisa kahle abahlaziyi bebhola kanye nabalandeli bonkana kunobhutshuzwayo, kuyavela ukuthi uhlobo lwabadlali oluficwe wuHunt kuleli qembu, aluhambisani kahle nesitayela sakhe sokudlala.Abanye kulabo badlali iminyaka ihambile, abasadlali njengakuqala. Bakhona nabasola indlela iqembu eliphethwe ngayo nangohlobo lwabadlali abasayiniswayo. Enye inkinga wukuthi uHunt ufike ngesikhathi iChiefs inesigwebo sokungakwazi ukusayinisa abadlali ebafisayo amawindi amabili, okusho ukuthi kumele asebenzise izinduku azificile noma ngabe sezivoveke kangakanani.Ilog yeDStv PremiershipAmaqembu	P	W	D	L	F	A	PtsSwallows	5	3	2	0	5	1	11Sundowns	4	3	1	0	9	3	10Pirates		4	2	2	0	5	3	8Baroka		4	2	1	1	6	4	7CPT City		4	2	1	1	6	5	7Arrows		4	1	3	0	7	5	6TS Galaxy	4	1	3	0	2	1	6SuperSport	4	2	0	2	5	5	6Stellenbosch	4	1	2	1	4	3	5Tshakhuma	4	1	2	1	2	3	5Chiefs		5	1	2	2	3	6	5AmaZulu	4	1	1	2	6	6	4Chippa		4	1	1	2	4	5	4Leopards	4	1	0	3	2	7	3Celtic		4	0	1	3	3	7	1Maritzburg	4	0	0	4	2	7	0
title: Uya koweCaf egcwele amanzi emadolweni uHunt

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEUSOMABHIZINISI wesifazane waseMtubatuba wenza umehluko empilweni yabanye abantu njengoba esenabasebenzi abangaphezu kuka-10 abaqashile.UNkk Phumzile Ndlovu (40) unebhizinisi lakhe iSnothando Trading CC elakha izindlu nezinye izakhiwo.Kulo mkhakha kugcwele abesilisa kakhulu kodwa uPhumzile uthe ikhona lokho okwenza wafuna ukwenza kahle kuwona.Igama lenkampani yakhe iSnothando uthe waliqamba ngoba enothando ngalokhu akwenzayo nokuthanda ukusiza umphakathi.Ngaphambi kokuba angene kwezokwakha waqala enenkampani yokupheka ukudla.“Kwavela ithuba lokuba ngingene emkhakheni wokwakha ngo-2009 ngalibamba ngezandla zombili manje ngiyaqhubeka nokukhula. Okusemqoka kumina ukwenza umehluko empilweni yabantu, nokwazi ukuthi kunemindeni elala idlile ngenxa yebhizinisi engaliqala. Kumanje nginabasebenzi abangu-10 engibaqashile,” kusho uPhumzile.Lo somabhizinisi wasebenzisa imali yakhe ukuqala leli bhizinisi. Kumanje usungaphika ukuthi wayehlala ekhaya ngaphambi kokuba abe nebhizinisi lakhe.“Bekunzima ngisakhula emakhaya. Ngangihamba ibanga elide ukuya esikoleni noma sengibuya. Uma ngifika ekhaya kwakumele ngiqale ngiyokha amanzi emfuleni, ngipheke bese ngenza neminye imisebenzi yasendlini. Kwakungelula nhlobo ukufunda ngalezo zikhathi. Sasingekho nesikhathi sokwenza umsebenzi wesikole nogesi ungabonwa, kumele usebenzise ikhandlela,” kusho yena.Uthe kwakuhlezi kuyiphupho lakhe ukuba nebhizinisi kodwa engazi ukuthi kumele enzenjani.Impumelelo yakhe uthe ilele kakhulu ekutheni uzibambela mathupha emsebenzini, akakukhonzile ukuhlala phansi elokhu ethumela.Ukhonze ukuhlela umsebenzi nokufundisa abanye umsebenzi.“Kwezamabhizinisi asikho isikhathi sokulokhu ukhala, ungaphoqi nabanye ukuba benze intando yakho kodwa kumele ukwazi ukusebenzisana nabanye abantu ukuze uphumelele,” kusho yena.Ziningi izinselelo uPhumzile abhekane nazo ngaphambi kokuba abone inkampani yakhe iphumelela. Isikhathi esiningi uthe ubengalali nasebusuku esebenza kanzima ukuze aphumelele.Lo wesifazane uncome kakhulu ukwesekwa i-Ithala Development Finance Corporation ngezimali nangolwazi kwezamabhizinisi.“Akuyena wonke umuntu okwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa ebhizinisini lakhe. Ngenhlanhla Ithala laba nami, lenza kwaba lula ukuba abantu basemakhaya njengami bakwazi ukuthola usizo nangolimu lwabo,” kusho yena.Umyalezo wakhe kwabanye besifazane abahlose ukuqala amabhizinisi abo uthe kumele bayeke ubuvila basebenze ngokuzikhandla.“Noma ubani angakwazi ukulandela amaphupho akhe. Ubuvila nokuhlezi ucabanga ukuthi uzohluleka ikhona okubambezela impumelelo. Zicoshe bese uyaqala ukusebenza kanzima,” kusho yena. Uthe umsebenzi uqala ngo-7 ekuseni aze aqede ntambama.Uthe ubeka uNkulunkulu phambili kukho konke akwenzayo nokwenza umsebenzi wakhe ube lula.
title: Usesiza abaningi ngebhizinisi lokwakha

text: AMAPHOYISA asePinetown anxusa amalungu omphakathi ukuthi aqaphele amaqola. Lokhu kulandela ukunyuka kwesibalo samacala okukhwabanisa avulwa esiteshini sakule ndawo kulezi zinyanga ezidlule.Ngaphandle kwamacala okukhwabanisa athinta ama-ATM, amaphoyisa asePinetown aveza ukuthi athola izikhalo kubantu abehlukene abakhwabaniselwe imali ikakhulukazi kusetshenziswa amaselula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe isikhathi esiningi abasuke beqoliwe bathi bathola ucingo oluvela kumuntu osuke ezenza osebenzela inkampani yamaselula bese ethi kukhona ozama ukushintsha inombolo yakhe yocingo athembise ukusiza umnikazi weselula acele imininingwane yakhe.Ngemuva kwemizuzu embalwa umnikazi weselula uthola umyalezo kwiselula yakhe uveza ukuthi sekukhishwe isamba semali ethile kwi-akhawunti yakhe.UZwane uthe kwesinye isigameko umnikazi weselula wathola ucingo oluvela kowesifazane ethi ushaya kwenye inkampani yamaselula kanti lo wesifazane wayefuna ukumbongela umnikazi wocingo ngokuthi kukhona asekuwinile kule nkampani yamaselula.“Yize kwakuthiwa umnikazi weselula uwinile kodwa owayeshaye ucingo wathi kunemibandela yokuthi akaqale afake i-airtime ka- R60. Ngemuva kokuthi umgilwa eseyifakile i-airtime, wathola olunye ucingo luvela kowesifazane obeshaye ucingo ethi akacishe ucingo imizuzwana ngaphambi kokuthi abuye aluvule. Ngesikhathi eseluvula umgilwa lwalungasadonsi. Ngemuva kwesikhathi wathola imiyalezo ngemali esikhishwe kwi-akhawunti yakhe ebhange,” kuchaza uZwane.Enye indlela okuthiwa isetshenziswa abaqolayo wukufaka izikhangiso zezimpahla ezidayisayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana noma emaphephandabeni. Uma umthengi ekhombisa intshisekelo yokuthenga okukhangisiwe iqola lifuna ukukhokhelwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi. Uma sekukhokhiwe umdayisi uyabaleka noma aqhamuke nezaba ngokuletha impahla esikhokhelwe.UZwane uthe ukunyuka kwalezi zigameko kwenza amaphoyisa akhathazeke kanti anxusa umphakathi ukuthi uqaphele. Kucelwa noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi olungaholela ekuboshweni kwabaqolayo ukuthi axhumane noLt Colonel Mwelase ku-079 5000 402 noma uSgt Babalwa Mqedlana ku-072 193 8718.
title: Isexwayiso ngabaqola abantu ngamaselula

text: ZIYAQINA izingxoxo phakathi kweMamelodi Sundowns no-Andile Jali ongenalo iqembu okwamanje.UJali usanda kulaxaza iKV Oostende abegijima kuyona eBelgium. Ubaba kaPotshoza, Isolezwe uke wabika ngokuthi iSundowns ifuna uJali ehlise iholo ukuze asayine inkonetileka neqembu.Umthombo kaPotshoza udalule ukuthi imenenja kaJali, uMike Makaab weProSport International, okuyinkampani ephethe izindaba zalo mdlali useGoli ngenxa yazo lezi zingxoxo.“UMakaab useGoli lapho elungisa khona indaba kaJali. ISundowns isimnikile isicelo senkontileka entsha.Inkontileka yakhona iyaheha kodwa kunezinto okumele kuvunyelwane ngazo ngaphambi kokuthi kusayinwe,” kusho umthombo.Imizamo yokuthola uMakaab igcine ingaphumelelanga kwazise ucingo lwakhe belukhala kodwa lungabanjwa.PITSO MOSIMANEUPITSO UNCAMELA UKUZONDWA KUNOKUTHANDWA KODWA ENGAWINIUMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns esigile izimanga edla izicoco ngaphandle kokuphumula iminyaka emine ilandelana, uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane. Uncamele ukunuka iqaqa kubathandi bebhola baseNingizimu Afrika kunokuba yisithandwa sabo engafaki lutho ekhabetheni lezinkomishi laMasandawana.Lokhu uPotshoza uzihlanganele nakho ezipholele ngoMsombuluko ebusuku. Lapha uPitso ubekhululekile ezikhininda zonke. Kuze kwavela ukuthi abanye bathi yena neqembu lakhe bayakhunkula kwazise kwezinye izinsuku baziqeqesha phakathi kwamabili nangamahora okuqala osukwini ezintathakusa.“Angikholelwa ekubhekeni eceleni kakhulu. Kusukela kuManqoba (Mngqithi) kwehle njalo kuze kuyofika kwabahlalele ukucubungula yonke imidlalo yethu, ngithola uthando olungeke lwafaniswa nalutho. Kubalandeli asebeze bakha izingoma ngami. Uthando engiluthola kubona lwanele. Lezi zingoma ezakhiwa abalandeli ziholwa uSugar (Tiyani Mabunda) noPercy (Tau) ngakho-ke ngijabule ngakho konke engikunikiwe.“Angiyona le nhlobo ethanda ukuthandwa vele. Ngikholelwa ekutheni ngiwine izinto ukuze labo engisuke ngibawinela kumbe engiwina nabo sakhe ubudlelwano obungamdingi omunye umuntu. Ngincamela ukunuka iqaqa kubathandi bebhola baseNingizimu Afrika kunokukhunjulwa njengomqeqeshi owayengeve enomoya omuhle kodwa ongakaze ame phambi kwezwe azishaye isifuba ngokuhlabana kwakhe,” usale ekhexile uPotshoza ezwa lokhu.Kuyiqiniso impela okushiwo uPitso ngoba ukuhlabana yinto asekhombisile ukuthi uphilela yona. Kuliqiniso futhi ukuthi ngeke bakuthande bonke abantu ngoba awuyona imali. Okukhexisa uPotshoza lapha akukhona ukuzithwala kukaPitso kodwa okuqaphelekayo ukuthi ngaphandle kokuba umnqobi, ukuzethemba nokungancethezi kwakhe kuyamangalisa.I-CAF IVUME ISICELO SE-SUNDOWNS EZODLALA NE-BARCASIVUNYIWE isicelo seMamelodi Sundowns sokuthi ihlehlise umdlalo wayo weCAF Champions League neHoroya FC yaseGuinea ngenxa yokuthi isizobhekana neFC Barcelona kowobungani ngoMeyi 16.Umdlalo okuthiwa uhambisana nezinhlelo zokugubha iminyaka engu-100 kwazalwa uNelson Mandela ongasekho, uzoba seFNB Stadium, eGoli.Umengameli weSundowns, uPatrice Motsepe, nguyena odalule lezi zindaba ngesonto eledlule.Bekulindeleke ukuthi ngoMsombuluko iBarca imemezele esithangamini nabezindaba obekuthiwa sizoba khona kodwa sagcina singenzekanga.Inhlangano eyengamele ibhola e-Afrika, iCaf, ithe iyavuma ukuthi umdlalo weSundowns neHoroya uhlehlele uMeyi 22 njengoba bekumele ube ngoMeyi 15 ekuhambeni.“Siyathanda ukucacisa ukuthi ngenxa yokuhlehla komdlalo kuzoba nezindleko zokusakaza ezilinganisela ku-$10k okuzomele ikhishwe yiMamelodi Sundowns,” kusho iCAF.Izolo uPotshoza izolo ulinde waze waba nesithukezi ebheke ukuthi abeBarcelona imemezele ngomdlalo.Okhulumela iSundowns uThulani Thuswa ubethe isithangami sizoba khona izolo ntambama kodwa akazange aphumele obala ngesikhathi.Kulesi sithangami yilapho obekuzocaca ngodaba lwamathikithi nokuthi umdlalo uzoqala ngasikhathini. Okwamanje bekusathiwe amathikithi azoqala ku-R40.BRILLIANT KHUZWAYOUKHUZWAYO UBHEKE KWEZIMNYAMAUBHEKE kwi-Orlando Pirates uNhlanhla Brilliant Khuzwayo oshiyayo kwiKaizer Chiefs ekupheleni kwenyanga ezayo.UKhuzwayo uvele useyibhalele iChiefs incwadi eyazisa ngokuthi ngeke abuyele kuyo ngesizini ezayo. Lo nozinti ubengalitholi ijezi njengoba bekugiya * -Itumeleng Khune yonke isizinii. Uke wacela ukuthi adlaliswe imidlalo yomkhumulajezi, uKhune abhekana neyeligi kodwa iChiefs yangasivuma leso sicelo.UPotshoza uhabule ngomthombo wakhe osondelene naye lo nozinti izindaba ezithi uKhuzwayo uya kwiBucs.“Wasayina ngoJanuwari inkontileka yesibambiso. Kona-ke kunezinto ezingacaci enkontilekeni yakhe, okusamele kuxoxwe ngazo. Nokho yena uya kwiPirates uma sekulungiswe yonke into ngendlela,” kusho umthombo.KwiBucs uKhuzwayo uzobanga ijezi noSiyabonga Mpontshane noJeckson Mabokgwane. Bobabili labo nozinti sebeke babizwa kwiBafana Bafana phambilini, kanti naye uKhuzwayo useke waligqoka ijezi leqembu lesizwe.TONI SILVABALENGELWA YIZEMBE ABADLALI BE-DOWNS BANGAPHANDLEKUZOHLALUKA maduze ukuthi yimuphi umdlali weMamelodi Sundowns ozochithwa njengoba iqembu lisanda kumemezela ukuthi lisayinise uToni Silva waseGuinea-Bissau.Njengamanje iSundowns ayinayo indawo yomdlali wangaphandle njengoba kukhona uJeremy Brockie, Bangaly Soumahoro, Ricardo Nascimento, Gaston Sirino noRazak Brimah.USilva uzofika ekuqaleni kwesizini entsha ngakho iSundowns kumele isheshe ithathe isinqumo ngokuthi yimuphi umdlali ezomdedela kulabo enabo bangaphandle.Emasontweni adlule umqeqeshi weSundowns uPitso Mosimane uvumile ukuthi kukhona umdlali asebemsayinisile yize engathandanga ukudalula igama lakhe.“Ukhona umdlali esesimsayinisile futhi kukhona omunye esizomsayinisa maduze nje,” kusho uMosimane.“ISundowns ayisayenzi le nto yokusayinisa abadlali abangu-15. Kuba ababili noma abathathu njalo futhi siyazi ukuthi sifuna bani. Siyazi lapho kumele siqinise khona ngakho ngeke sivele siyothenga bonke abadlali esihlangana nabo.”USilva uke wadlala eqenjini elincane leChelsea neleLiverpool okungamaqembu ase-England.Uke wayibamba nakwiNothampton neBarnsley.
title: POTSHOZA: Iyavuthwa eka-Andile Jali neSundowns

text: UMLINGISI osemnkantshubomvu,  uMangaliso Ngema, ucacisa ngezinsolo zokuhlukumenza ngokocansi ezimenze wakhonjwa indlela emdlalweni wakwaSABC 2, iLithabo. Ngesonto eledlule uzakwabo kaNgema, uLorraine Moropa (23),  ubhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi kunomlingisi omdala kuye ngeminyaka nangamava omhlukumezayo kulo mdlalo kodwa ongakaze wathathelwa izinyathelo. Ngibe sekuphawula nomsakazi weY FM, naye olingisa kwiLithapo, uAltovise Lawrence, wathi naye wake wahlukunyezwa yilo mlingisi, okugcine kuvele ukuthi nguMangaliso. Inkampani eqopha lomdlalo, iQuizzical Pictures, ibe seyithatha isinqumo sokunqamula isivumelwano sokusebenza noMangaliso. Ephumela ibala uMangaliso uthe zingamanga aluhlaza lezi zinsolo."Ongimangalelayo uthi ngazithinta ngendlela engamukelekile ngesikhathi ngigqolozele yena. Ngithanda ukukutshela ukuthi akusilo iqiniso lelo. Akaqondanga, wabe esezitshela okunye. Ngamqonda ngaxolisa kuye ngokumenza azizwe ngaleyo ndlela." Uthe obekumenza awuhlabe inhlali ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi ubefuna kube nemiguqu elandelwayo emsebenzini."Lezi zinsolo angizibukeli phansi. Sisesikhathini esinzima lapha eNingizimu Afrika lapho abantu besifazane behlukunyezwa futhi baphathwa kabi. Abantu besifazane bacindezelwe kuyoyonke imikhakha yempilo. Ngiyazi ukuthi loludaba libucayi kanjani ikakhulukazi kimina njengobaba okhulisa izingane zamantombazane. Ngicabanga ukuthi kusemqoka ukuchaza ukuthi kwenzekani khona uzozwa uhlangothi lwami.KwakuwuMsombuluko womhlaka20 sishutha isiqephu, nganginenkinga nezingubo engangizolingisa ngazo.  ibhulukwe ilami lalingimpintsha, ngangithwele kanzima kangangoba kwakuthi uma kudingeka ukuba ngisukume kwakungathi lizodabuka.  Ngisahleli, ngaphakathi endlini futhi kunabadidiyeli, ngimatasatasa ngihlola ibhulukwe lami ukuthi ngeke yini lidabuke. Uma ngiqalaza, ngambona buqamamana engibhekile (esho uLorraine). Wacabanga ukuthi ngiyaziphulula, okuyinto eyayingenjalo. Okuyibhadi nje."Uthe uzwile  ukuthi uLorraine wake wakhalaza ngaye. Echaza uMangaliso uthe babeshutha  esinye isiqephu acabanga ukuthi esokuqala njengezithandani emdlalweni."Sacelwa ukuba sigingqike embhedeni. Wakhalaza ngokuthi ngesikhathi umqondisi ethi asiyeke, mina ngaqhubeka nokulingisa ngoba angisisusanga isandla sami enqulwini yakhe. Ngaqala ngathi yinto encane.  Emuva kokuhlala phansi nomphathi wami nophrojusa, ngathi sengizwe isikhalo sakhe, ngaxolisa. Ngacabanga ukuthi ngizame ukungamnaki ukuze singaphazamisi ukuqopha. Khona ngiyaxekeka ngoba umuntu ohlale ethi angimasaje emhlane. Ngisho nangemuva kokungisola kodwa wangicela ukuba ngimasaje. Ngangilindele ukuthi abomdlalo babezolandela imigudu efanele kodwa, ngaphambi kokuba kwenzeke lokho,  wabhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Kwaphinde kwaqhamuka nomunye uzakwethu wathi naye ngenza okufanayo nakuye. Angiqondanga kwaze kwaba yilapho kuvela ukuthi ngamthembisa ifenisha. Iqiniso wayethwele kanzima ngoba wayehlala kude nasemsebenzini. Ekhala ngokuhamba ibanga elide. Ngamnikeza ikhotheji elifenisha ekhaya. Kodwa wagcina esethi lokho ngangikwenza ngoba ngimfuna." Uziqhelanisile nenkulumo eyabhalwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngomuntu owazibiza ngegama lakhe futhi efake isithombe sakhe. Uthe kwangesiye loyo futhi yena akakaze wavuma ukuthi wayenza lento asolwa ngayo."Iningi lenu seliyazi ukuthi isivumelwano sami sokusebenza sanqanyulwa.   Lokhu kwenza sengathi kwalandelwa imigudu, ngase ngitholakala nginecala, okuyinto engenzekanga. Lolu daba sengiludlulisele kubammeli bami abangelulekayo ukuthi yiziphi izinyathelo okufanele ngizilandele kuyaphambili. Angizami ukuzivikela ngoba ngiyazazi nami angikho msolwa. Angikaze ngafisa ukuhlukumeza umuntu wesifazane. Ngithanda ukuxolisa kubo bonke abantu besifazane abathunukalile ngokuzwa lezinsolo. Ngiyaxolisa kubo ekujuleni kwenhliziyo," kuphetha uMangaliso.
title: Umlingisi ucacisa ngezinsolo zokuhlukumeza uzakwabo ngocansi emdlalweni

text: UBONGE uMdali ngokumgcinela abazali bakhe baze babone impumelelo yakhe emculweni, umrepha uZakwe, obethula ngokomthetho iGold Disc yokudayiswa kwe-albhamu yakhe iCebisa.Umcimbi wokwethula le mpumelelo kaZakwe ubuhlelwe yiMabala Noise, eViews @Twenty Five, eThekwini, ngoLwesihlanu.“Ngiyambonga uNkulunkulu ukuthi kufika leli thuba abazali bami basaphila bobabili. Iningi lethu livamise ukuzwakala lithi ukube abazali balo basaphila ngabe bayajabula manje, uma sekwenzeka izinto ezinhle empilweni yabo. Mina ngisenenhlanhla ngoba abazali bami basaphila basakwazi nokuzibonela impumelelo yami emculweni.“Ngibonga nemisakazo namaphephandaba, ozakwethu, abangani nabaphathi benkampani yami ngokungeseka ukuze ngifinyelele kuleli zinga esengikulona,” kusho uZakwe.Kulo mcimbi ubekhona unina kaZakwe, uNkk Lungile Zakwe, uzwakale ekikiza ngesikhathi lo mrepha esecula ingoma entsha ethi Ngiyabonga.UZakwe uthe kungokokuqala eza emcimbini wobumnandi nonina ngoba ubefuna ukuthi abone impumelelo yakhe. Unina ubephelezelwa udadewabo kaZakwe nengoduso yalo mrepha.Uthe ingeyokuqala le albhamu ayikhiphe ngaphansi kweMabala Noise kodwa isidayise yathola igolide.Uthe kuningi okuhle okuzayo njengoba ezokhipha i-albhamu yakhe abayihlanganise noDuncan ngo-Okthoba. Uthe sekumi ngomumo ngayo futhi abantu abalindele okukhulu njengoba kuhlangene iMabala Noise ne-Afrotainment kwi-albhamu eyodwa.Kulo mcimbi uZakwe uphinde wahlonipha Isolezwe ngeGold Disc noKhozi FM ngokunjalo namanye amaphephandaba.Emcimbini kuphinde kwanandisa uMnqobi Yazo.
title: UZakwe ubonge abazali ngempumelelo yakhe

text: ISIPHINDE yagqemeka  ingozi engeqiwa ntwala iMamelodi Sundowns kushona omunye umdlali wayo wasemuva, uMotjeka Madisha engozini yemoto. IMamelodi Sundowns ibingakaphawuli ngalolu daba kodwa ngokwemibiko kuvela ukuthi ingozi yenzeke ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. Kwenzeka lokhu nje ngasekupheleni kwenyanga edlule kushone omunye umdlali weDowns engozini yemoto u-Anele Ngcongca, obefihlwa kuleli sonto. UMadisha ubengomunye wabadlali abahamba phambili kwiSundowns kule sizini, eqhwakele kwilog yeDSTv Premiership, kanti kumasizini edlule ukhombise ukuba umdlali omncane onekhono, okuyinto eyayichaza owayengumqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane owayembona enekusasa kwiBafana Bafana.
title: Kushone omunye umdlali weSundowns engozini yemoto

text: MHLELI: Ngicikwa ngamaphoyisa aseMandeni eSupermarket.Sihlaselwe ngumfana wakwamakhelwane ezosiqeda ekhaya ehamba nabazala bakhe ephethe isibhamu.Sawabiza amaphoyisa afika, nebala awubona umonakalo owenziwe ngumhlaseli kodwa akakaze aboshwe namanje. Wahlasela ekhaya ebusuku ngo-Okthoba 27.Umfana usayiphathisa imilayezo la elala khona ethi usazobuyela ekhaya azoqeda. Asisalali ekhaya silala ezintabeni ngoba sesaba.Uma sibikela umphathi wecala uMsweli uthi uyawazi umsebenzi wakhe ngeke ezwe ngathi.Amaphoyisa aseMandeni angazi noma afuna size siwadizele yini ukuze abophe lo mfana.Angazike sizowadizela ngani ngoba asisebenzi ekhaya, noma afuna lo mfana aze asibulale.Sekukaningi ngifunda ngabantu ababulawayo kuleli phephandaba, sengiyesaba.OkhathazekileeMandeni
title: [IMIBONO] Ngabe amaphoyisa afuna sibulawe sonke ekhaya?

text: Kube nokuxokozela abanye bashaya amatafula abanye banikina amakhanda bethi abahambisani nesiphakamiso sikaMengameli Jacob Zuma sokuthi labo abazohlulwa engqungqutheleni ye-ANC yokukhetha ubuholi ngoDisemba benziwe amaphini.UZuma wenze lesi simemezelo evala ingqungquthela yale nhlangano edonse izinsuku eziyisithupha eNasrec, eGoli.Uthe leli kungaba yikhambi lokunqanda uqhekeko nokuhlukana ngoba amaqabane awazona izitha.“Isiphakamiso esihle lesi, uma kunesidingo sokuthi ngihambele izifundazwe ngikhuluma ngaso ngiyokwenza lokho. Labo abazohlulwa abangashiywa ngaphandle kubuse uhlangothi olulodwa kodwa nabo abangene ezikhundleni. Ngo-2007 sashayeka kakhulu kuphuma abanye abaholi bayovula into yabo ngoba behluliwe. Selitholakele ikhambi lale nkinga,” kusho uZuma.Ukusho lokhu kwaba nokuxokozela, elinye ilungu ebelifake isigqebhezane esiveza ukuthi liyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC eLimpopo lisukume laphuma lanikina ikhanda lathi yisikhathi sikaRamaphosa (Cyril) manje.URamaphosa noDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma kulindeleke ukuthi bangenele umbango wokuhola i-ANC ngoDisemba.Lesi siphakamiso sokuthi ozohlulwa abe yiphini siqale saphakanyiswa nguSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala othe sizobumba inhlangano.UZuma uthe njengoba kunesiphakamiso sokuthi kube namaphini amabili omengameli, iphini lokuqala kuzoba ilowo ohlulwe embangweni wokuba umengameli.“Kanjalo njengoba kunesiphakamiso sokuthi kube namaphini onobhala elinye lalo kuzoba elihlulwe embangweni wokuba iphini likanobhala. Noma kungathiwa abantu bayisithupha abangenele umbango iphini lokuqala kuzoba ilelo elihluliwe ekubeni unobhala bese kuthi elesibili kube ilelo elizothola amavoti amaningi ukudlula abanye,” kuqhuba uZuma.Uthe amagatsha kusadingeka ayixoxe le ndaba bese ebuya ngoDisemba isizoba umgomo.“Ngiphakamisa ukuthi uchitshiyelwe umthethosisekelo we-ANC ngoba asikwazi ukuthi kungafa inhlangano ngoba singafuni ukuchibiyela umthethosisekelo. Noma kungathiwa lesi siphakamiso sobuholi asenzeki kulo nyaka kodwa kumele senzeke ngezinye izingqungquthela ezizolandela,” kusho uZuma.Uthe kule ngqungquthela ujabulile ngoba intsha nomakadebona babeke imibono ephusile kwaphikiswana kwaze kwavunyelwana.Uthe le ngqungquthela ibe yimpumelelo enkulu ngoba kufezekile obekuzoxoxwa ngakho.Uqhube wathi amaqabane aseyizitha ngenxa yokuthi abanga izikhundla.“Abantu baze bangakhulumisani iminyaka emihlanu ngoba behluliwe. Yingakho sithi akumele kube khona abazohlulwa nabazowina okubalulekile ngukuthi kumele kuwine i-ANC,” kusho uZuma.
title: Abasizwa kahle isiphakamiso sikaZuma

text: IGWETSHWE udilikajele neminyaka engu-17 ngaphezulu yiNkantolo yesiFunda yaseMzimkhulu indoda elahlwe ngecala lokubulala owayeyintombi yayo ngo-2017.USivuyisile Mtshali (32) uthole udilikajele ngecala lokubulala, emihlanu ngokuthumba, emihlanu ngelokuzama ukubulala iphoyisa, emine ngelokuzama ukubulala ilungu lomphakathi nemithathu ngelokutholakala nesikhali esiyingozi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe uMtshali waboshwa ngemuva kokushaya owayeyintombi yakhe, wamhudulela endlini yakhe.“Ilungu lomphakathi lazama ukumvimba waligeja ngommese. Wahudulela umgilwa endlini yakhe, wamgwaza ngomkhonto,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Uthe ngesikhathi kuthintwa amaphoyisa aseMzimkhulu, uMtshali wajijimeza elinye ngomkhonto lasinda ngokulambisa. Uthe wazama ukuzinquma kodwa wabanjwa waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela lapho elashwe khona ngaphambi kokuboshwa.
title: Udilikajele kowabulala wase ezama ukuzinquma

text: SEBENGABHADLA ejele isikhathi esiyiminyaka emithathu noma bakhokhe inhlawulo abafafaza amanga ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuleli.Lokhu kulandela ukuba uMengameli wakuleli, uCyril Ramaphosa, esayine umthetho ogunyaza iCybercrimes Act ngoLwesithathu olwedlule.Kulindeleke ukuba umengameli amemezele ukuthi lo mthetho uqala nini ukusebenza.Lo mthetho, othinta ubugebengu obusuke benzeka kusetshenziswa izinkundla zokuxhumana obaziwa nge-Cybercrimes noma ukuphula imithetho ye-cybersecurity, waqala ukuhlongozwa ngo-Agasti 28 2015. Kwaphinde kwalethwa eminye imininingwane ngoJanuwari 19, 2017, kwabe sekuyiswa ezithebeni zePhalamende ngoFebhuwari 22, 2017. Lolu daba lwahlala kwiNational Council of Provinces (NCOP) lase luyiswa emphakathini kusukela ngo-2019.Labuyiselwa ePhalamende ngoJulayi 2020. Laphasiswa ePhalamende lase liyiswa kumengameli  ngoDisemba 2020 ukuba alucubungulisise. Njengoba lo mthetho ususayiniwe, kulindeleke ukuba noma yinini uqale usetshenziswe yizinhlaka zomthetho.Umqingo ochaza lo mthetho uthi:“Lo mthetho osuphasile ephalamende usho ukuthi abawuphulayo bazozithola benecala. Phakathi kwezinto okumele baziveze wukubeka obala imiyalezo ethunyelwe eyingozi. Kuleyo miyalezo kubalwa enodlame nokulimaza impahla. Ukusatshiswa kwabantu nokulinyazwa kwempahla yabo. Ukuthunyelwa kwemiyalezo eyimfihlo noma izithombe eziyimfihlo ezithunyelwe ngaphandle kwemvume,” kusho isitatimende ngalo mthetho.Kuzobalwa nenkohlakalo, ukuqola nokuntshontshwa kwezinto zabantu kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe.Abatholwa benamacala bangabhadla ejele iminyaka emithathu noma bakhokhiswe inhlawulo engafika       ku-R50 000. Ezikhathini eziningi abantu bebeluthwa koFacebook nakoWhatsapp ukuba bafake imali bathenge izinto ezithize. Labo abenza lokho sebezobhekana ngqo necala lokugebenga besebenzisa ukuchwepheshe.Kukhona abanye abebeqamba amanga ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bedlulisa ulwazi olungamanga ngegciwane leCorona noma ezinye izifo noma izinhlelo zikahulumeni.Kuke kwabonakala nama-video abanye besabisa ngemigomo yeCorona ukuthi iyingozi. Konke lokhu uma utholakala ukufafaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ungaboshwa noma ukhokhe inhlawulo.Amacala okudicilela phansi isithunzi nawokuqamba amanga abevele ekhona ngaphansi komthetho wakuleli. Awokwenza lokhu usebenzisa ubuchwepheshe azozimela.
title: Sebezoboshwa abafafaza amanga ezinkundleni  zokuxhumana

text: KUMSHUBELE umlimi waseDumbe, KwaZulu-Natal, osolwa ngokubulala izimbuzi zomphakathi ngoshevu wamagundane, izakhamizi azifuni nokuyizwa indaba yesethembiso sakhe sokuzinika ingxenye yomhlaba wakhe. Zithi usezihlukumeze kakhulu.Umphakathi waseNkonkotha umile ekutheni ufuna uMnuz Jacques Odendaal akhokhe izimbuzi zawo kuqala, ngaphambi kokuba abatshele ngezethembiso zokubapha umhlaba wokulima.UMnuz Mfana Zwane, oyingxenye yabafelwe izimbuzi okuhlanganisa nezikadadewabo ezingaphezulu kuka-40, uthe sebekhathele ukuthenjiswa umhlaba * -Odendaal kodwa bona bafuna izimbuzi zabo.Amanye amalungu omphakathi awafuni nokuba asondele endaweni yawo ngoba athi afuna izimbuzi zawo kuqala azikhokhe.“Kade aqala ukusithembisa ukuthi uzosinikeza ingxenye yomhlaba osepulazini lakhe.Kodwa kuze kube manje akakaze akwenze. Empeleni ungumuntu onamanga, yingakho singayingeni indaba yakhe yezethembiso kodwa sifuna izimbuzi zethu. Okusicasulayo ukukhuluma ngokusipha umhlaba ekubeni ngesikhathi efika kuleli pulazi eminyakeni eminingi edlule, wagugula amathuna ethu, sasala nezinhliziyo ezibuhlungu. Kade ayesihlukumeza. Nakhu manje usebulala izimbuzi zethu. Ngikhuluma nawe nje sihlela imashi enkulu yokulwa naye ngoba sizifuna la izimbuzi zethu. Ngikhuluma nawe nje namanje umatasa ufaka lo muthi wakhe kwezinye izingxenye zepulazi,” kusho uZwane.U-Odendaal uthe uyazisola ngokwenzeka eminyakeni edlule futhi wayeseyingane, ngakho lokhu akushoyo ukuthi uzozikhokha izimbuzi uqinisile futhi unohlelo lokubanikeza umhlaba ongamaphesenti angu-60 aphezu kwalo.“Yebo, ngiyakuvuma konke abangisola ngakho ngakwenza. Ngawagugula amathuna nokunye kodwa ngangiseyingane. Ngikhule ngokwanele manje ngineminyaka engu-50 ubudala ngakho sengiyawabona amaphutha ami futhi ngiyafisa ukuwalungisa. Umhlaba ngizobanikeza futhi ngifuna nohulumeni abone ukuthi ngiyalweseka uhlelo lokunikezelwa kwabamnyama umhlaba. Mina ngifuna kube uhlelo oluyimpumelelo ngoba ngizobafundisa kwezolimo, ukuze sihlomule sonke ngenzuzo nabo bakwazi ukuzenzela imikhiqizo,” kusho * -Odendaal.Uthe okubi ukuthi kukhona amalungu omphakathi aseqamba amanga athi nawo afelwe izimbuzi kodwa uma ethi abazikhombe lapho zikhona ukuze akwazi ukuhlanganisa izindleko, awafuni.Uthe uzamile ukuxhumana neMeya, uMnuz Majuba Mavuso kodwa kwaba ukuthi imatasa ukuze akwazi ukuba asizakale ahlangane nomphakathi.Uvumile ukuthi nayizolo ubeqhubeka efaka ubuthi epulazini lakhe obuvunywe isigaba-36 kuMthethosisekelo okubulawa ngabo amagundane adla umbila emasimini.Amaphoyisa noMnyango wezoLimo bagcine bethe basaphenywa ukuthi ngabe izimbuzi ezifile zibulawe ubuthi buka-Odendaal ngempela yini.
title: Kumshubele osolwa kufa izimbuzi

text:
YIZE exolisile uBongani Zungu ekuphaphalazeni kwakhe engcofa uMicho Sredojevic noPitso Mosimane ngesikhathi encoma uRulani Mokwena, kodwa kubukeka esazoba nesigcwagcwa esikhulu.Udweshu lusuke ngokuthi uZungu odlala kwi-Amiens eFrance nakwiBafana Bafana ebhale kwiTwitter encoma uMokwena ngokunqoba kwe-Orlando Pirates eyehlule iPolokwane City ngo 2-1 izolo ebusuku.NgokukaZungu, uMokwena uyena oshintshe izinto kwiBhakabhaka kunoSredojevic. Ngesikhathi oyedwa wabalandeli bakhe ecela ukuthi aqhakambise iqhaza likaSredojevic uZungu uvele waqhubeka wadalula ukuthi nakwiSundowns kwakuwuMokwena owayenza umsebenzi. UZungu uze wafaka negama likaKeagan Dolly, ayegijima naye kwiDowns, wacela amufakazele. "Ngithembe uma ngithi uyena (owenza umsebenzi). NakwiSundowns, buza [email protected]_keegan07 uzokutshela," kubhala uZungu kuTwitter. Abamshiyanga abalandeli bemsola ngokuthi ubukela phansi uMicho nokuyikho okuholele ekutheni agcine exolisile uZungu.pic.twitter.com/q3XJe8xZOB— Bongani Zungu (@BonganiZungu08) 
November 7, 2018Akumvimbanga kodwa lokho uBenni McCarthy ukuthi amgxeke ngokubukela phansi uMosimane owamsiza ukuthi awelele phesheya.Wow didn’t expect u to have so little class my man 
@BonganiZungu08 disrespectful to coach Pitso for building your career so that you can succeed in Europe now you pushing assistant coach rulani to be the brains behind Pirates success,wow😮Friends or not some respect Son 🤔— Benni McCarthy (@bennimccarthy17) 
November 7, 2018Ngenxa yokulimala uZungu akekho esikwatini seBfana esizodlala neNigeria ngoNovemba 17.UBen 10 uphawule kanjena nje, bahlukene phakathi abalandeli bePirates ngalolu daba kulandela ukubonakala kukaRulani kungathi uphikisa uMicho emdlalweni wayizolo. Abaningi bebezibuza ukuthi ubani umqeqeshi phakathi kwabo. Who’s the real coach at Pirates? 
@robertmarawa
#AbsaPrem
pic.twitter.com/quGor26Myx— Budlelwane Dalasile (@BudleWayne) 
November 6, 2018
title: NguMokwena owenza umsebenzi kwiPirates- Zungu

text: AMAXHWELE nabaqhafi bazongena shi ephaketheni emuva kokuthi uNgqongqoshe weziMali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, ememezele ukuthi utshwala nogwayi kuyakhuphuka.UMboweni uthe ubhiya uzonyuka ngo-8 cents, iwayini ngo-14 cents, iwayini elihlohlozayo ngo-61 cents, ugologo ngoR2.89.Iphakethe likagwayi i-20 lizonyuka ngo-74 cents, isigazu ngoR6.73. Ijuba ngeke linyuke.Kulokhu uMboweni uthe bazoqala ukufaka intela kulezo zinto ezihlobene nogwayi noma ezishiswayo bese ziyabhenywa.“Ugwayi ophafuzwa ngogesi (electronic cigarettes) wona bekungakhishwa ntela ngawo kodwa manje sekuzoshintsha lokho,” kusho uMboweni.Kusukela ngo-2021 uhulumeni uzobe esefaka intela kulo gwayi ojwayele ukubheywa abadla izambane likapondo.Ne-hubble bubble nayo kuthiwa isizofakwa intela kusukela ngo-2021. I-hubble ijwayele ukubhenywa ezindaweni zobumnandi, inamapayipi ekufuquzwa ngawo intuthu.Ucwazi nawo uMboweni uthe uzofakwa intela ka-25 cents kusuka ngo-Ephreli nonyaka.IRandi livele ladlo-ndlobala ngemuva kwalesi sabelo sikaMboweni njengoba kuqale usuku lintenga lase liyaqina lahlala kuR15.09.
title: Amaxhwele nabaqhafi bazokhokha kakhulu

text: Lindi MasingaKUHLEHLISIWE ukukhishwa kwesigwebo ecaleni elibhekene noDJ wodumo uDj Donald “Donald Duck” Sebolai lokubulala. Izolo nkantolo yeMantshi eseGoli, iPalm Ridge Magistrate's Courte ikuhlehlisele ukuba kukhishwe yiNkantolo eNkulu ukugwetshwa kukaDJ Donald.Lo DJ owake wasebenza njengomsakazi komunye wemisakazo yomphakathi eSoweto, iJozi FM, ubhekene necala lokugwaza abulale intombi yakhe uNksz Dolly Tshabalala nyakenye.IJaji uCassim Moosa lithe ngemuva kokubhunga nethimba lalo linqume ukuhlehlisa ukukhishwa kwesigwebo kube ngoMsombuluko mhla ka 12 Okthoba. Ngemuva kokuhlehliswa kokukhishwa kwesigwebo, uNksz Gloria Khoza, ongudadewabo kamufi uthe: “Thina njengomndeni sisibheke kabi isinqumo. Besithemba ukuthi kuyaphela ngalo sizwe isigwebo yize konke lokho kungeke kusamvusa udadewethu. Siphatheke kabi”
title: Kuhlehlisiwe ukukhishwa kwesigwebo sikaSebolai

text: Bobabili basungule iMove The Nation, sebegijime izinsuku eziwu-16. Ngosuku bebegijima * -35km kanti namhlanje kulindeleke ukuthi bagijime besuka eMgungundlovu balibangise eThekwini kuhle kweComrades Marathon.Bobabili sebake bayigijima izikhawu iComrades Marathon.Ngesikhathi beqala babenehloso yokuqoqa uR6 million ozokondla izingane eziwu-10 000 ezweni.Ezinsukwini ezedlule asebegijime kuzo amakhilomitha awu-500 sebeqoqe imali engaphezu kukaR1 268 034.Phakathi kwababesekayo kubalwa kubo iShoprite, Hollywood Bets, C16 Running Crew, Little Ashford, Areshumeng Holdings neFerguson Films.I-Old Mutual inikele ngoR1.1 million. Ukugijima bazokugoqa eSouth Beach. Ofuna ukunikela ungena ku-www.hopewitheverystep.com.
title: Babhekwe namhlanje eThekwini abagijimi uKabelo noPeteni
