text: KUSHAQEKE omakhelwane kutholakala usana lwentombazane obese lunesonto luzelwe, lufihlwe ku-wardrobe, njengoba unina ebesaba ukuthi uyise azi ukuthi usenenye ingane.UNksz Amo Cele (20) waseMlaza ozibelethisile, esizwa wudadewabo ofunda esikoleni samabanga aphansi, ubefihlile ukuthi ukhulelwe esaba uyise njengoba enenye ingane eneminyaka emithathu.Omunye womakhelwane ongathandanga ukudalulwa igama, uthe u-Amo uyingane elungile nekhonze umndeni wayo njengoba ehlala noyise.“Ngisola ukuthi ubesaba ihlazo nobaba wakhe ngoba usenengane encane. Ubesaba ukuyiveza ingane noma esebuzwa."Abanye baze bathembisa ukumshaya kwayima eyiveza. Sibonga ukuthi ingane iyaphila ngoba uyithole ngendlela engafanele ubengayi nasemtholampilo,” kusho lo makhelwane. U-Amo utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi bekungelula ukufihla isisu kodwa ubeqinisekisa ukuthi akekho ombonayo ekhaya.Isizathu esikhulu esenze wafihla le ngane uthi wuvalo, ubesaba ukuthi uyise uzomxosha ngoba usethola umntwana wesibili kanti usemncane.“Ngazama ukusikhipha ngahluleka ngasale sengibekezela. Bengilokhu ngifunda ngezindlela zokuzibelethisa, ngifunda nakuFacebook ukuthi kwenziwanjani. Ngakwazi nokuziqhumisela amanzi, usisi wami omncane wangisiza ngesikhathi ngibeletha kodwa bengibuye ngithi akavale amehlo ukuze angathuswa yigazi,” kusho * -Amo. Echaza ngelanga abeletha ngalo, uthi kwasekuqala ukuhlwa eqala ukusikwa kanti uzobeletha ebusuku.“Ngibe nenhlanhla ukuthi ayitetemi ingane yami. Noma yakhala ngangisanda kuyibeletha kodwa bekungathi iyasibona isimo ngoba bekuthi uma kufika umuntu ithule. Bengiyindlalele umcamelo, ngiwuvule kancane u-wardrobe ukuze kungene umoya. Izimpahla bengingaziwashi ngoba bengiyigoqa ngethawula kuphela. Bekunzima kona kodwa ngiyabonga ukuthi ubaba ungixolele wangangixosha ekhaya,” kusho u-Amo.Ephetha u-Amo uthe ubonga uNkulunkulu ukuthi noma eyibelethe ngale ndlela indodakazi yakhe kodwa iyaphila.Uma ephuma esibhedlela eMshiyeni Memorial Hospital lapho ehlinzekwa khona ngosizo nendodakazi yakhe, ufisa ukuthola umsebenzi ukuze akwazi ukukhulisa amadodakazi akhe. Lesi simo sakhe uthe uyafisa sibe yisifundo nakontanga yakhe bakwazi ukuyobikela osonhlalakahle ukuze basizakale.Lolu sana okwamanje belingakethiwa igama ngokusho kukanina osadidekile.
title: Uxwayisa ontanga ozale wafihla usana

text: INJINI yoThongathi enkabeni yenkundla, uSiphamandla Mtolo, ibona iqembu lakhe lisenalo ithuba lokubuyela phezulu kwilog yeNational First Division (NFD) njengoba lingekho iqembu elihleleke njengeHighlands Park ngesizini edlule.UMtolo (25), obedlala kwiNkobongo United ngaphambi kokuthi afudukele oThongathi eyodlalela iMaidston FC, ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ephawula ngomdlalo abazowudlala neRichards Bay, eMhlathuze Sports Complex, namuhla ngo 3.30 ntambama.UThongathi luyiqale kahle isizini nokulwenze lwabonakala luqhwakele phezulu kwilog okwenze abantu abaningi bavula amehlo. Ngaphandle kokuthi luke lwaqhwakela lungelinye lamaqembu adlala kule sigaba adlala ibhola elithakaselwayo njengoba ngaso sonke isikhathi lisuke lidla utshani.“Ukushelela kwethu esicongweni ngicabanga ukuthi kungenxa yokuthi sasuke sadlala imidlalo eminingi ngesikhathi esifishane. Ngemuva komdlalo wethu neKings (Real Kings) sabe sesishaywa imidlalo emibili kulandelana. Kodwa le miphumela ayichazi ukuthi sekuphelile ngathi nombango wesicoco seNFD,” kusho uMtolo ongowokudabuka endaweni yaseNkobongo, eShakaskraal ngaseStanger.Uthi okubenza baqine idolo yindlela ngalesizini ngokuthi nabo bangasithatha isicoco seligi kungenxa yokuthi alikho iqembu kulawa akhona elifana neHighlands Park ngesizini edlule.“Umjaho wesicoco seligi usavulekile. Noma yiliphi iqembu elidlala kulesigaba lingasinqoba. Ngesizini edlule ubungeke usho kanje ngoba iHighlands Park yakhombisa kusese kuseni ukuthi ifuna ukubuyela phezulu. Kuyona bekufana noma ngabe ibidlala ekuhambeni ibiqoba abantu,” kusho uMtolo.UMtolo uthi okubenze badlale ibhola elinenkosi phakathi kungenxa yokuthi umqeqeshi ubanikeze inkululeko yokudlala ngokukhululeka. Uveze ukuthi uMsombuluko noLwesibili kusuke kuwusuku lomqeqeshi ejimini besekuthi kusukela ngoLwesithathu basuke bedlala ibhola ngendlela umqeqeshi afuna badlale ngayo.“Kusukela ngoLwesithathu umqeqeshi usitshela ukuthi usewenzile owakhe umsebenzi ngakho nathi sekufanele senze owethu wokudlala ibhola ngokukhululeka,” kusonga uMtolo.Imi kanje imidlalo yanamuhla engo 3.30 ntambama:Cape Umoya United v Witbank Spurs (Cape Town Stadium); JomoCosmos v University of Pretoria (Makhulong Stadium); Richards BayFC v Uthongathi FC (Umhlathuze Sports Complex)
title: UThongathi nethemba ngeNFD

text: Tania BroughtonISIKHULU senkampani yamabhasi aseThekwini uMnuz Mandla Gcaba kuthiwa wazigixabeza ngo R30.7 million okwabe kuyimali yokubolekwa ukuze iqhube umsebenzi webhizinisi lamabhasi, nakuba inkampani idonsa kanzima. Abacwaningi bamabhuku baxwayisa ngokuthi uma le mali ingabuyiselwa, ibhizinisi lamabhasi lizozithola lidonsa kanzima kwezezimali.Abedolobha laseThekwini bathi lokho sekwenzekile njengoba sebefake isicelo esiphuthumayo eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini njengengxenye yemizamo yokubuyisela emuva le mali.UMasipala weTheku uthi le nkampani ikweleta umasipala imali engu R52m, kanti eminyakeni emibili edlule le nkampani ibidonsa kanzima okungangokuba ike yashodelwa ngisho nawudizili wokuqhuba umsebenzi wamabhasi ayo angu 450 eyawathatha okwesikhashana kumasipala weTheku. Amabhasi abhekene nomsebenzi wokuthwala abantu baseThekwini abawasebenzisayo abalinganiselwa ku 50 000.AbeTheku bathi sekukaningi betakula le nkampani okungekaGcaba ophinde abe isikhulu esiphezulu samatekisi. Ngo-Okthoba ngonyaka odlule umbiko wesikhulu seTheku onganekelwanga umphakathi waphakamisa ukuba le nkampani yamabhasi iTansnat, zonke izinto zayo ezithinta izimali zisuswe ezandleni zayo.Encwadini efungelwe engaphambi kweJaji uRashid Vahed, uMgcinimafa weTheku uKrish Kumar uthe umasipala wanikela amabhasi kule nkampani ngo 2009, isivumelwano sabuyekezwa ngonyaka olandelayo. Lokhu kwakusho ukuthi iTansnat kwakumele ikhokhele umasipala imali engu-R15 000 ngenyanga ngesivumelwano sokubolekana umsebenzi wokuba baphathe amabhasi.Le nkampani yathola uxhaso kwaboMnyango wezokuThutha luka-R16 million kanti kumasipala bathola uR15 million.UKumar uthe ngo-Okthoba iTansnat yahluleka ukukhokhela abasebenzi amaholo yahluleka nokuthenga udizili wamabhasi.Le nkampani isinikezwe kuze kube wukuphela kwenyanga ukuba ifake enkantolo amaphepha aphikisa lokhu. Izolo ummeli kaGcaba uMnuz Sandile Khoza unqabile ukuphawula.
title: Eyamabhasi ikweleta iTheku u-R52 million

text: MLUNGISI GUMEDEI-COSATU KwaZulu-Natal ikhala ngokuthi abukho ubulungiswa ecaleni elibhekene noMnuz Sanele Goodman May owayeshayela iloli eladala isibhicongo sengozi kwashona abantu abangu-22 ePinetown ngenyanga edlule.Kuvele ukuthi sesinyuke safinyelela ku-24, isibalo sabantu abashona kule ngozi.Esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba izolo, uNobhala we-Cosatu esifundazweni uMnuz Zet Luzipho, uthe babona ukuthi abenziwa ubulungiswa njengoba uMay esegqunywe ejele isikhathi eside enganikezwa ibheyili kodwa umqashi wakhe ezipholele ngaphandle.“Lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala futhi kuthumela umyalezo othi labo abadla izambane likapondo futhi abathile emphakathini umthetho ubaphatha ngezandla ezintofontofo,” usho kanje.Uthe imindeni yalabo abashona ifuna ukubona kwenziwa ubulungiswa “njengoba sivuma nathi ukuthi uMay kunecala okumele aliqule kanjalo nomqashi wakhe”.“Siyi-Cosatu sifuna ukwazi ukuthi kungani umqashi kaMay engaboshwa. Asisiboni isizathu esenza ukuthi umqashi aqhubeke nokusebenza nje ngokujwayelekile kube kwashona abantu, imindeni yabo ibe esesezinhlungwini, uMay yena esejele. Umqashi naye kumele abhadle ejele kuze kuphele ukuqulwa kwecala,” usho kanje.Izolo uMay uphinde wavela enkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown.Inkantolo ilalele ubufakazi obuthi amacala angu-23, okubulala ngokungenhloso abebekwe uMay, aseguquliwe aba awokubulala. Obunye ubufakazi obuvelile izolo, wukuthi uMay ukuleli ngokungemthetho futhi akanayo nemvumo yokusebenza.Umbuso uveze ukuthi uyaphikisana nokuthi uMay anikezwe ibheyili.Njengenjwayelo abalandeli baMay bebegcwele enkantolo befuna ukuzwa ukuthi kuqhubekani kuleli cala.Nayizolo uMay ungene ebhokisini ezimbhoze ikhanda ngengubo ezama ukuzifihla kubathwebuli.Umphenyi wecala u-Warrant Officer Sanjeey Singh utshele inkantolo ukuthi usekuqinisekisile ukuthi incwadi egunyaza uMay ukuthi athuthe impahla noma abantu ngeyomgunyathi.Uthe yize uMay enazo izincwadi zokushayela kodwa ubezokwazi ukuthi afake isicelo sokuthi athole ilungelo lokushayela emphakathini ethutha abantu noma impahla ngoFebhuwari 2014.Isinqumo mayelana nesicelo sebheyili sikaMay sizophuma ngo-Okthoba 22.
title: ‘Abukho ubulungiswa ecaleni likamshayeli weloli elabulala abantu’

text: UBusiswa ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi enandisa eBroadway Lifestyle, eMgungundlovu, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.UBusiswa noProfessor benza ingoma ethi One Night Stand eyayikwi-albhamu kaProfessor ethi The Orientation.UProfessor ubegubha iminyaka engu-42 edla anhlamvana. Uchungechunge lwemigubho selokhu lwaqala ngoMashi luhambela eMax’s Lifestyle nase-Artizen KwaMashu.“Ukudlula ku-40 akuyona into encane. Unyaka wonke nje lo ngiyawugubha. Zikhona futhi nezinye izindawo engisazoya kuzo ngiyogubha nabanye ngoba bayacela ukuthi ngiye ngasemakubo. Ngiyabonga nozakwethu emculweni abangisekayo, baningi ngeke ngibabale ngamunye,” kusho uProfessor.Abanye abebenandisa kubalwa kubo uDJ wakhona eMgungundlovu * -Andileh DJ, DJ Oros, Character obeshaya izingoma zakhe zakudala, Sparks Bantwana ongene ngevosho yakhe ebizwa nge-360 degrees vosho, DJ Sox, Emza nabanye.Umnikazi womcimbi uProfessor naye ungenile washaya amanoni akhe adume ngawo.Lo mculi uveze ukuthi kungekudala uzokhipha ingoma entsha eshaya ngesigqi samapiyano.“Ngihlala ngipheka. Ngizokhipha izingoma ezihamba ngazodwa ngizwe umoya wabantu ukuthi bayayifuna yini i-albhamu. Ikhona entsha ethi Amabhodwe engiyenze noChomee.”
title: UBusiswa ubonge uProfessor ngempumelelo yakhe

text: SEKUPHELILE ukuqagela ngokuthi ngobani abazolingisa emdlalweni omusha waku e.tv, Imbewu: The Seed oqoshwa KwaZulu-Natal eChatsworth, eMlaza naseNquthu, okulindeleke ukuthi uqale ukuboniswa ngo-Ephreli nonyaka.Abalingisi abashiya emdlalweni Uzalo, uGxabhashe (Mpumelelo Bulose), uMaNzuza (Leleti Khumalo) noThembi Mtshali-Jones, bangabanye osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi bazolingisa izindawo eziphambili kuwo.Laba balingisi kuvela ukuthi sebethole amadlelo aluhlaza kuwo. Kwavela ukuthi balandwa uDuma kaNdlovu ongomunye wabasunguli boZalo osewashiya kulo. Inkampani yakhe iDuma Ndlovu’s Word of Mouth Pictures ingaphansi kwenkampani edidiyela lo mdlalo iGrapevine Productions ngokuhlanganyela ne-Anant Singh’s Videovision Entertainment neLuyks Productions.Kuthiwa bazobe beyingxenye yomndeni wakwaBhengu lapho uLeleti elingisa indawo kaMaZulu okuyinkosikazi kaZimele, olingiswa uMpumelelo.UThembi Mtshali-Jones osanda kushiya emdlalweni okhonjiswa ku e.tv iBroken Vows, uzolingisa indawo kaMaNdlovu okungunina kaZimele nomfowabo uPhakade (Sandile Dhlamini).Omunye umlingisi osezakhele igama uRaphael Griffith olingisa indawo kaVusi emdlalweni wakwiSABC2 iMuvhango, yena uzolingisa indawo kaZithulele.Lo mdlalo kuthiwa uzodlisela ogageni Uzalo nalo oluqoshwa eThekwini njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi uvumbulule amakhono abalingisi baKwaZulu-Natal.UZiyanda Mngomezulu oyiHead of Local Productions uthe i-e.tv izimisele ngokunikeza ithuba abalingisi abasafufusa nokuqhakambisa ikhono labalingisi abamnkantshubomvu.“Umdlalo Imbewu: The Seed uvumbulule abalingisi abasha abaqhamuka KwaZulu-Natal lapho uqoshwa khona. Asingabazi ukuthi laba balingisi bazofika kuzwakale kulo mkhakha wethelevishini. Ababukeli bazokujabulela ukubona ubuso obusha obuzobe bucijwa izinkakha zabalingisi abazobe beshiyelana inkundla nabo. Lo mdlalo wansuku zonke uzoqala ukuboniswa ngo-Ephreli nonyaka,” kusho uMngomezulu.
title: Abebeyizilomo emdlalweni Uzalo sebekhonjwa komunye

text: UFIKE wayithola indawo enhliziyweni yomqeqeshi weSuperSport United, uGeorge Lebese, osuke kwiKaizer Chiefs ngenhloso yokuyothola okungcono kwiMamelodi Sundowns lapho efike khona waphenduka ifenisha.ULebese (29), osayine inkontileka yokubolekwa yezinyanga eziyisithupha esuka kwiSundowns eya kwiSuperSport, kufanele ukuba akakholwa ukuthi ufike eqenjini eliphekwa uKaitano Tembo okhombise ukukholelwa kakhulu kuyena njengomdlali.Izinto esezenzeke kuLebese eminyakeni emibili edlule kufanele zimenze aphelelwe wukuzethemba kodwa inkulumo kaTembo ngemuva kokunqoba ngo 3-2 kwiLamontville Golden Arrows ngeSonto, eClermont kwi-Absa Premiership kufanele imkhuthaze abuyelwe yikho konke ukuzethemba.NgokukaTembo, ukusayinisa kwabo uLebese noMxolisi Macuphu njengoba bekuvuleke iwindi lokushintshana ngabadlali kuzobeka iSuperSport ezingeni okufanele ngabe kudala yaba kulona.“Bafike kwezwakala (oMacuphu noLebese). Angingabazi ukuthi bazosenza sibe ngcono kakhulu kunalokhu esesiyikhona. Lokhu angikusho ngoba ngibukela phansi abadlali abebevele bekhona kodwa ngeke ngikufihle ukujabula kwami ngoba ngithole abadlali abanginika ebengingenakho. Indlela alibamba ngayo ibhola uMacuphu alinde ozakwabo iyamangalisa. Akukhathaleki ukuthi uzungezwe yizitobha ezingaki yinto angayinaki leyo. Manje tshela mina ukuthi kungani kungafanele ngikujabulele ukuthi ngithole umdlali onjalo. Isipiliyoni sikaLebese senza izinto eziningi zibe lula. Engikubona ejimini kuyangikitaza. Inkinga encane esekhona ukuthi akakangeni khaxa egiyeni ngokulungela umdlalo."Lapho ezongena khona egiyeni iSuperSport izolokhu ikhuphuke njalo kwi-log. Bobabili basinika okukhulu yingakho sineme kangaka ngokuthi singazishaya isifuba sithi abethu,” usho kanje uTembo.Mayelana nomdlalo uTembo uthe bekufanele uphele esiwombeni sokuqala. Ngokwalo mqeqeshi i-Arrows ize yaphaphama ngesiwombe sesibili okuyisikhathi lapho bekufanele ngabe amagoli asengene ngakuyona maningi kakhulu.“Kuhle sinqobile kodwa kucishe konakala. I-Arrows idlala kahle kodwa besiyibanjelwe namuhla. Ize yabuya esiwombeni sesibili nje yingoba yithina ebesikuvumela lokho. Ngijabule ngoba manje siyaqala siqoqa amaphuzu. Wumdlalo wethu wesibili lo lapho siqoqa khona amaphuzu agcwele. Isendleleni iSuperSport engiyaziyo futhi isiseduze kakhulu. Inkinga yethu bekuyikhona ukuhlanganisa imiphumela. Kuyalunga konke manje,” kusho uTembo.Umdlalo weSuperSport weligi olandelayo usekhaya lapho bezovakashelwa yi-Orlando Pirates esemaqenjini asembangweni wesicoco.
title: Uhlomule ngabadlali abebadinga oqeqesha iSuperSport United

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe bazoqala uhlelo lokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ukugcina ulwazi lweziguli kumakhompyutha oluzotholakala kuzo zonke izibhedlela nasemitholampilo yesifundazwe uma siyolashwa.UNkk Simelane-Zulu uthe uhlelo i-hechathon luzoqala ukusebenza ekupheleli kukaFebhuwari ngonyaka ozayo.Ukusho lokhu esibhedlela iNkosi Albert Luthuli eThekwini ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi kuqala umncintiswano wezinsuku ezintathu wezitshudeni ezenza i-Information Technology (IT) okuzotonyulwa kuzo ozonikwa umsebenzi wokwenza lolu hlelo. Abazonqoba abangu-10 bazoqashwa umnyango.Njengamanje umnyango usebenzisa uhlelo lokugcina ulwazi lwesiguli kumafayela.“Kuthatha isikhathi eside kusafunwa ifayela lesiguli ezikhungweni zethu. Uma singabanga nenhlanhla isiguli lilahleke ifayela okusho ukuthi kumele kuqalwe phansi ifayela elisha. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ulwazi ngokugula kwesiguli luyalahleka. Udokotela oselaphayo ngaleso sikhathi akabi nesithombe esiphelele sokuthi aselaphe kanjani ngoba usuke engenalo olwazi olugcwele ngomlando wokugula kwesiguli,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe kuba nzima uma kukhona ofaka umnyango enkantolo ngoba uthola ukuthi ifayela alisatholakali noma izinto ezibhalwe phansi azisabonakali.“Uhlelo lokugcinwa kwemininingwane yesiguli kumakhompyutha lusiza ukwehlisa ingcingezi kwisiguli futhi kusheshe.“Kwesinye isikhathi uthola ukuthi umuntu uya esibhedlela esiseShowe athathwe igazi. Bese kuthi emuva kwezinyanga ezimbili noma ezintathu eze eThekwini noma eMgungundlovu kumele siphinde sithathe igazi. Kanti ukube bekunohlelo olunalo lonke ulwazi lwesiguli bekuzovela ukuthi isiguli besisanda kuthathwa igazi futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi siphinde sihlolwe,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe kudla umnyango imali enguR1 500 ukuyohlolwa igazi kwesiguli ngasinye lokhu okubenza bakhokhe kaningi uma isiguli sihlolwa igazi ezikhungweni zabo ezahlukene.“Uhlelo lokusetshenziswa kwefayela ukugcina ulwazi lwesiguli kudla umnyango imali enkulu futhi alwanele. Ukulahleka kwefayela kusho ukuthi umlando ngesiguli uyaphela. Uhlelo olusha luzosiza umnyango neziguli,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe bahlose ukuthuthukisa intsha ngalolu hlelo athe luzobasiza ukonga imali njengoba umnyango uyaye ukhiphe imali ecela kwisigidi wenzelwa umsebenzi yizinkampani ezizimele ngenyanga noma ngonyaka.Bazomenyezelwa kusasa abantu abazokwenzela umnyango lo msebenzi.
title: Ungqongqoshe uqeda amafayela

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZESEKUDUMA imidlalo yama-Olympics emakhanda abasubathi abagile izimanga, benqobela okokuqala elakuleli, indondo yegolide, kwi-4x100m, kumaWorld Athletics Relay Championships, abeseSilesia, ePoland ngempelasonto.Leli qembu elakhiwe ngu-Akani Simbine ongumpetha wakuleli kwi-100m, Thando Dlodlo, Gift Leotlela noClarence Munyai lenze isikhathi esiwu-38.71. Indawo yokuqala ihambisana no-USD 40 000,  ngokwemali yakuleli ingaphezulu kuka-500 000.USimbine obengukaputeni weqembu lakuleli, ogijime u-100m wokugcina kowamanqamu, uqhashise okwenhlamvu yevolovolo, eyodlula uPaulo Andre Camilo de Oliveira waseBrazil, egcine ijezisiwe, indawo yayo, yesibili yanikwa i-Italy.Ngemuva kokunqoba uSimbine abonge iqembu lakhe ngokuzimisela."Kangazi ukuthi injabulo yethu ngingayichaza kanjani. Siye ePoland sinomqondo wokunqoba ngoba sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi sifuna ukuncintisana ezingeni lomhlaba. Ngiyababongela abafowethu. Ngiyibheke ngabomvu le sizini. Angingabazi ukuthi ama-Olmpic alo nyaka azoba wumbukiso omnandi. Nakuba sigijime isimo sezulu singesihle kodwa bengazi ukuthi ngigijima kahle endaweni ebandayo,“ kusho uSimbine.UMunyai uthe: "Ngiphelelwe ngamazwi. Ngiye ePoland nethimba elihle labagajimi. Ngijatshuliswa wukuthi siwenzile umsebenzi ebesithunywe wona. Angifuni ukwenza izethembiso ezinkulu ngama-Olympics, sizoyeka izinyawo zizikhulumele zona enkundleni. Iminyaka emine kuya kwemihlanu edlule beyinzima. Kumnandi ukubuya ngalolu hlobo.“UDlodlo uthe ufisa kube sengathi angajabula ngalolu hlobo ngemuva kwayo yonke imiqhudelwano. Uthe ukholwa wukuthi ngeqembu abanalo bazenza izimanga, basengaphinda baliphule irekhodi lase-Afrika.Ezinye izindaba ezimnandi ezenzeke ePoland, wukuzibekela indawo kuma-Olympic kweqembu lika-4x400m, ebelakhiwe uLythe Pillay, Zakithi Nene, Oscar Mavundla noRanti Dikgale. Lokhu kwenzeke ngokuthi emjahweni wamanqamu lilale isihlanu ngesikhathi esiwu-3:05.76. Libekwe njengeqembu lesithathu eligijime izikhathi ezinhle.Umengameli we-ASA, u-Aleck Sikhosana ubongele abasubathi nomqeqeshi, uPaul Gorries nemenenja, uDanie Cornelius nodokotela ngokusebenza ngokuzikhandla."Ekubeni ngingumengameli we-ASA, ngiswele amazwi. Ngagxekwa kakhulu ngesikhathi ngiya eTshwane ngiyokhuluma indaba yekhempu yaleli qembu. Ngangazi ukuthi ngenzani. Namuhla ngithokozile, laba bafana benze saziqhenya siyizwe."Amaqembu amabili alubhekisa kuma-Olympic, futhi singompetha bomhlaba kwi-4x100m. Sigcina ukunqoba kwi-4x400m kwakungu-2001 kuma-World Championships. Ngibonga kakhulu i-University of Pretoria ngale ndondo yegolide nangokuya eTokyo kweqembu lika-4x400m,“ kusho uSkhosana.Iqembu elixube ubulili le-4x400m, lihlulekike ukuzibekela indawo kuma-Olympic, aqala uJulayi 23, eTokyo eJapan..
title: Sebebheke ama-Olympic abagile izimanga benqoba isicoco se-relay

text: ULUVUYO “Baracks” Ncandana owayengukaputeni kuMthatha Bush Bucks nosengumhlaziyi kanobhutshuzwayo kwiSouth African Broadicasting Corporation ukholwa wukuthi ukusayina kuka-Leonardo Castro kwiKaizer Chiefs kungaba yikhubalo elingelapha uzozo, obesekunesikhathi eside uhlupha abaphathi nabaqeqeshi bayo ngokuba buthuntu kwabagadli phambi kwamapali kusukela amasizini amathathu.Ukusayina kukaCastro eNaturena kuqinisekiswe izolo uVina Maphosa osophikweni lwezokuxhumana kwiChiefs.UNcandana uthe abaphathi beChiefs bebevele besephutheni ekutheni bathembele kubadlali ababodwa abafana noBernard Parker noSiphiwe Tshabalala ekubeni sebedlale amasizini ayishumi.“Ngicabanga ukuthi bayihlabe esikhonkosini ngokusayinisa uCastro. Akekho ongamazi ukuthi ungumgadli osezingeni eliphezulu. Inkinga angabhekana nayo njengamanje wukuthi ubengasadlali njalo kwiSundowns okungenzeka ukuthi akasekho ezingeni ebesimazi ekulona nokuthi uzokwazi yini ukusheshe azinze kwiqembu lakhe elisha,”kusho uNcandana.Uqhuba uthi ngesitayela esidlalwe yiChiefs kungenzeka ukuthi asheshe awubambe umgqigqo abuyele ezingeni lakhe aziwa ngalo.“Nakuba kade engasadlali mhlawumbe ukungadlali kwakhe bekwenziwa yimixhantela eminingi esingayazi. Kungenzeka ukuthi ukushiya kwakhe kwiSundowns nokudlala kwiqembu elisha kuzomenza agqugquzeleke abuyelwe ukuzethemba okuzomenza aqhubeke kalula nezinga aziwa ngalo,” kubeka uNcandana.Lo mdlali odabuka eColombia ngo-Agasti kuke kwaba nokwesaba ukuthi kungenzeka angabuyeli eChloorkop njengoba afika ngemizuzu yokugcina sekuzovalwa ushwele wokudayiselana ngabadlali.Ngalesikhathi wayekade evakashele kwelakubo ngoba umkakhe ayelindele ukuthola umntwana.Kwakufanele abuye ukuze iqembu likwazi ukuvuselela isivumelwano naye.UCastro uzokuba ngumdlali wesibili odabuka eSouth America, ukushiya iSundowns ayodlalela iChiefs. Ngaphambili kwakhe kwaba nguJose Torealba waseVenezuela, owashiya kwiSundowns ngaphansi kwefu elimnyama ngemuva kombango wokuthi kwakukokotelwe indlela asayinda ngayo.Okunye okungenza asheshe ajwayele kwiChiefs ukufica umkhaya wakhe uGustavo Paez abadabyuka naye eSouth America.UCastro ufike kwiMamelodi Sundowns wahlangana kahle noKhama Billiat, Keegan Dolly phambili.Lo mdlali usekhonjwa eNaturena nje Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo labika ngo-Okthoba 21 ukuthi iChefs isiqede konke noCastro, kodwa izinhlangothi zombili zaphika zalala ngomhlane.
title: UCastro uza nekhubalo lamagoli kwiKaizer Chiefs

text: SISAQHUBEKA isililo semiphakathi eyahlukene KwaZulu-Natal ngamakhansela okuthiwa agweva nokudla okuhlelelwe ukunikeza abampofu njengoba izwe livaliwe.Amakhansela asolwa ngokuvalela lokhu kudla emahhovisi awo.Okunye ukudla kuthiwa ayakuthwala aye nakho emizini yawo.Esehlakalweni esenzeke eNtshawini KwaDukuza ngoMsombuluko, kuthiwa ikhansela laku ward 15 kule ndawo, uMnuz Patrick Mabasa, usabise abantu ngokubadubula ngenkathi beza ngobuningi babo bezofuna ukudla abekusabalalisela emphakathini wakule ndawo.“Ngenxa yokuthi abantu abaningi bakule ndawo balambile, beze ngobuningi babo bezofuna ukuthi nabo banikezwe amaphasela okudla,” kusho omunye wabantu abebe khona kulesi sehlo.Libona ikhansela ukuthi bafika ngobuningi babo, umthombo uthe libe selibayalela ukuthi abahambe, kwaba khona abakukhipha ngenkani ukudla emotweni, kwayilapho elisabise khona ngokuthi lizodubula abenza lokhu.UMabasa uvumile ukuthi kunabantu abebanikeza ukudla kule ndawo ngoMsombuluko.“Abantu abakwi ward engikuyo bangu-6 200 kanti mina bengiphethe amaphasela okudla angu-80 ebengiwanikezwe umasipala wakule ndawo,” kusho uMabasa.Ebuzwa ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani ukuthi aphathe amaphasela okudla angu-80 ekubeni kunabantu abangu-6 200 ewadini yakhe, uthe ngokusebenzisana nonompilo endaweni, ubezitshela ukuthi yilabo kuphela abadinga ukudla kanti kuzofika nabanye abaningi.Ukuphikile ukuthi usabise abantu ngokubadubula, wavuma ukuthi kukhona abafake unyawo kulo mkhankaso abagcine ukudla sebekuthatha ngenkani emotweni yakhe. Ikhansela elisolwa ngokuvalela ukudla ehhovisi lalo okunye laya nakho kwalo eDassenhoek alilubambanga ucingo lwalo lithintwa. Nemilayezo aliyiphendulanga.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Richardo Mthembu, uthe usezwile ngalezi zikhalo.“Ngizohlangana noNdunankulu namhlanje (ngoLwesibili) sibone ukuthi iyiphi indlela ehlelekile okungasetshenzwa ngayo uma abantu sebenikezwa ukudla,” kusho uMthembu.Uzwakalise ukudumala ngalokhu, wathi lokhu kuwubudedengu obukhulu emakhanseleni. Uthe kumele engabe ayabazi abantu abadinga ukudla ezindaweni ahlala kuzo ukuze uma ehambisa ukudla, kungabi khona ukudonsisana njengoba kwenzeka.
title: Isililo ngamakhansela agweva namaphasela okudla

text: ITULO lokubulawa komndeni wakwaVilakazi eKhombe, eNkandla, kuthiwa liqale ukuthungwa ngoDisemba wonyaka owedlule ngesikhathi kubanjwa imihlangano amalungu omphakathi asola lo mndeni ngokuthakatha nokweba imfuyo.Lokhu kudalulwe omunye umthombo osondelene kakhulu nomculi kamasikanda ofe kulesi sigameko esenzeke ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Kulesi sigameko kutheleke amadoda amabili angaziwa okuthiwa abaqhulule ngenhlamvu abashiya bedindilizile.Ababulewe kube uNkk Khulumile Vilakazi (76) ongunina kaNksz Ntombikayise Vilakazi (45) obethwasisa umculi kamasikandi uMnuz Kuhlalokuhle “Skokela” Goqo (34), kwesinye isigameko okusolwa ukuthi sihlobene nalesi kubulawe uMnuz Mfudumezeni Mhlongo (76) waseZimbidli obeyinyanga.Kuthiwa lo mndeni ubusolwa ngokulanda umuthi kuMhlongo ubuye uzothakatha ngawo endaweni.Lo mthombo uthi kunemihlangano eke yabanjwa lapho okwaphuma khona igama lokuthi kufanele lo mndeni uthathelwe izinyathelo ngoba weba izimbuzi futhi uyathakatha.Uthe bese kunesikhathi abakwaVilakazi benyamanambana emphakathini ngenxa yalezi zinsolo ebezisabalele.“Kwafika umuntu ezoxwayisa lo mculi ukuba asuke kulo muzi ngoba bazohlaselwa kodwa yena wathi ayikho leyo nto seyadlula. Le ndaba ibikhulunywa nje nabantu besho ukuthi kugilwa imikhuba kulo muzi, naye lo sisi obethwasisa wake wakhala ngokuthi kuthiwa uyathakatha,’’ kulanda lo mthombo.Uveze nokuthi kuke kwagasela amaphoyisa ngelinye ilanga kudliwa imbuzi kwaVilakazi afika athola ukuthi akuyona le mbuzi enombala okuthiwa yebiwe.Leli phephandaba ebelinkanise kule ndawo ngoLwesihlanu, lihambele lo muzi wakwaVilakazi okwenzeke kuwo isigameko, lafica isimo simuncu.Ilungu lomndeni uNkk Khangwayini Vilakazi (69) ebelihleli emakhandleleni lithe babona sengathi lo muzi uzolenga ingidi ngoba akekho ozohlala khona ngenxa yokwesaba.“Asilali nathi sifika ekuseni sibuye sihambe ntambama, siyesaba ngisho emini ngoba bangase bafike basivimbezele. Siyokhululeka mhla kwaboshwa abenzi bobubi. Ngisho izingane ezibone kwenzeka isigameko zithathwe abezenhlalakahle, ngeke zibuye lana ngoba akuphephile,’’ kusho uNkk Vilakazi.Bathe bayoyixoxela amagwababa echobana ngoba le nto bahlala beyizwa emsakazweni nakothelevishini, abakaze bayibone.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe bekungakaboshwa muntu ngalesi sigameko kodwa uphenyo luyaqhubeka.
title: Laboshwa kudala itulo lokuqotha  umndeni waseKhombe

text: UMNYANGO wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo KwaZulu-Natal usuzwakalise ukuphoxeka kulandela ukusabalala kwevideo yocansi phakathi kukajele wesifazane nesiboshwa esigcwele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okubalwa kuzo noWhatsApp. “Ivideo eshaqisayo yocansi phakathi kukajele nesiboshwa saseNcome Correctional Centre, KwaZulu-Natal iyasiphoxa futhi iyasihlaza njengomnyango,” kusho okhulumela umnyango uMnuz Singabakho Nxumalo. “Izenzo zocansi phakathi kojele neziboshwa ziyihlazo futhi akumele abasebenzi bethu bazibandakanye kuzo.” UNxumalo uthe ujele othintekayo uzothathelwa izinyathelo aqondiswe ubugwegwe. Uthe nesiboshwa sizothathelwa izinyathelo ngalokhu. “Abasebenzi bezokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo kulindeleke ukuba balandele imigomo yokuziphatha, ucansi nesiboshwa yisenzo esinyanyekayo futhi esingeke simelwe,” kuqhuba yena. UMnnyango ucele abantu ukuthi bayeke ukusabalalisa le-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Bephawula ngale video abanye abantu baveze ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi yisiboshwa esiyipotshozile ngoba sifuna okuthile kujele. Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje umnyango usanda kumemezela ukuthi abanye ojele sebezofaka ama-camera emzimbeni ukwehlisa izigameko ezingekho emthethweni ezenzeka emajele.
title: 'Iyasihlaza ivideo yocansi kajele nesiboshwa' - uMnyango

text: AMAPHOYISA athungatha uyise wengane yomfana enonyaka ngezinsolo zokuyibulala kulandela ukuthola ukuthi unina usenelinye isoka eMaoti eThekwini.Ingane obekuvulwe icala lokuthi ilahlekile ngoMgqibelo, kutholwe isidumbu sayo sesonakele e-Phoenix, ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Isidumbu somfanyana igama elingeke lidalulwe njengoba kuthinteka uyise ongakaboshwa ekufeni kwakhe, kuthiwa besiboshwe ngocwazi ekhanda nasemqaleni.Kusolwa ukuthi umuntu ombulele umncishe umoya esebenzisa ucwazi.Isidumbu kuthiwa sitholwe ngamalungu omphakathi kwabe sekubikelwa inkampani yonogada namaphoyisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt. Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aphansi phezulu afuna umsolwa.“Amaphoyisa asePhoenix aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela ukutholwa kwesidumbu somfanyana ononyaka sesonakele ngoLwesithathu ngo-10 ebusuku.“Isidumbu sitholwe ehlathini eTrenance Manor khona ePhoenix. Ingane ibidukile kusukela ngoMgqibelo, kwavulwa icala. Ukuhlolwa kwesidumbu kuzoveza imbangela yokushona kwayo. Umsolwa kuleli cala akakaboshwa, uyathungathwa amaphoyisa,” kusho uZwane.UMnuz Gareth Naidoo, okhulumela inkampani yonogada iKZN Vip Unit Security, uthe bathole izingcingo zivela kubantu emphakathini bethi bathole ingane isishonile.“Ngesikhathi sihlola indawo okwenzeke kuyo isigameko sithole ukuthi isidumbu senganebesinocwazi ekhanda nasentanyeni. Isidumbu bese sonakele.“Abezimo eziphuthumayo baveze ukuthi ingane isishonile. Kube yisimo esinzima kubasebenzi bethu ukubona isidumbu sengane sikuloluya hlobo,” kusho uNaidoo.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi isoka elisha likanina, belilokhu lithola ucingo luvela kowesilisa ebika ukuthi ingane isishonile futhi wachaza ukuthi isidumbu sayo sikephi.Umndeni kuthiwa uthe uphuthuma kuleyo ndawo kanti omakhelwane sebesitholile isidumbu babikela amaphoyisa nenkampani yonogada.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa uthe uyise wengane wayithatha ingane ikubo, ekhala ngokuthi unina usenesoka athandana nalo.Amaphoyisa acela ongaba nolwazi ngokuthi ukephi nezinkalo uyise womfana axhumane nanoma yisiphi isiteshi samaphoyisa.Imizamo yokuxhumana nomndeni ayiphumelelanga.
title: Kusolwa uyise wengane etholakale ibulewe ngocwazi

text:
INDODA okuthiwa yafika nezitho zomuntu esiteshini samaphoyisa ithi isikhathele ukudla abantu isulela ngecala enye eyayiboshwe nayo okuthiwa yashonela esitokisini. UMnuz Nino Mbatha (32) oboshwe noMnuz Khayelihle Lamula (32) noLungisani Magubane (32) babekwe icala lokubulala nokukhanda itulo lokubulala uNksz Zanele Hlatshwayo. Omunye ummangalelwa, uMnuz Sthembiso Doctor Sithole, washonela esesitokisini nonyaka.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi wazihilela kodwa lokhu bekungakavezwa enkantolo ngaphandle kokuthi washona nje. Icala beliqulwa eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu izolo. UMbatha ngomlomo wommeli wakhe, u-Advocate Dianne Franklin, uthe amumele wayezozicelela usizo lwamaphoyisa ukuba ubophe umakhelwane wakhe owayemkhweleta imali yotshwala. “Ummangalelwa lona uthi yena waya impela esiteshini eyocela usizo emaphoyiseni ukuba amlekelele ukuba athole imali yakhe kumakhelwane wakhe uMchunu owayedayisa utshwala ngoba engafuni ukumkhokhela imali yakhe. Wathenga isiphuzo ngo-R100, wangawuthola ushintshi wabuya nomunye u R100 ezothenga wangawuthola futhi ushintshi wakhe. Waya emaphoyiseni ngoba esedinga ukuba amlekelele kuleyo nkinga. Konke lokhu okunye osekuvezwa ngamaphoyisa akulona iqiniso,"kusho u-Adv. Franklin.FUNDA: 
Bazowaphika amacala okuthiwa badla abantuUMbatha uthe izitho zomuntu zafika noSithole yena eboshiwe ngamaphoyisa ase-Estcourt. “Ummangalelwa uthe ngesikhathi esagqunywe esitokisini, wabona uSithole owayekade ephethe izitho zomuntu ehamba namaphoyisa. Ummangalelwa yena akazange nje afike emaphoyiseni nezitho zomuntu futhi akazazi kodwa zaziphethwe uSithole,” kusho uFranklin. Iphoyisa okuyilona elabopha UMbatha, uConstable Ndumiso Ntshalintshali, likuphikile lokhu wathi yena akazange nje abone uSithole efika nezitho zomuntu esiteshini kodwa kwakunguyena uMbatha. UNtshalintshali uze wathi akuwenzi umqondo ukuthi umuntu angathenga ngo-R100 angawutholi ushintshi, aphinde ubuye nomunye u-R100 uzothenga futhi. Icala liyaqhubeka
title: Bakhomba owazibulala kwelezicubu zabantu

text: UTHUKA izanya umndeni wevolontiya le-ANC eliphinde libe yiPhini likaSihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole eSwayimane High, emuva kokuthi lishiselwe izimoto zalo ezintathu ngoMgqibelo.UMnuz Thami “Mlenge” Mbhele uthe kulothiswa izimoto zakhe nje, ubesanda kugqekezelwa ngeledlule.“Angazi ukuthi ngizothi ubani oshise izimoto zami ngoba akekho engimazi eyisitha sami. Umndeni usathukile ngesigameko esenzekile ngoba asazi ukuthi owenze lokhu sithini isinyathelo sakhe esilandelayo,” kusho uMbhele.Uthe ngesikhathi kushiswa izimoto zakhe bekuhambe ugesi endaweni yabo eKwaSwayimane ngoba uvuswe wumsindo omkhulu wento ebiqhuma wathi uma eqalaza wabona izimoto zakhe zisha.UMbhele uyivolontiya le-ANC, akekho ebuholini obuphezulu benhlangano KwaSwayimane futhi uyiPhini likaSihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole KwaSwayimane.“Ngisadidekile ngale nto eyenzekile ngoba angazi ngempela ukuthi kwenzekani. Ngesonto eledlule bengigqekezelwe abafana ababhema izidakamizwa. Ngenhlanhla sibatholile sazithola nezimpahla ebezebiwe. Angazi noma ukugqekeza kwabo kuhlobene yini nokushiswa kwezimoto zami. Ngisola ukuthi zishiswe ngamabhomu kaphethroli kodwa angazi ngoba ngivuke sezisha,” kusho uMbhele.ULt Col Thulani Zwane wamaphoyisaKwaZulu-Natal ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kushiswe izimoto eMabheleni, KwaSwayimane.“Kushiswe izimoto ezintathu ngabantu abangaziwa ngoMgqibelo. Kuvulwe icala lokucekela phansi impahla, akukaboshwa muntu,” kusho uLt ColZwane.
title: Uselala obenyoni oshiselwe izimoto

text: UBASETSANA Kumalo wenkampani eqopha izinhlelo ezihlukene zethelevishini iConnect tv, uveze ukuthi uhlelo olusha oluthi Pastor Wants A Wife, luzotshengisa ukuthi kunzima nakubefundisi kwesinye isikhathi ukuthola amakhosikazi.Lolu hlelo luqale ngoMgqibelo odlule ngo-8 ebusuku ku-1Magic kanti kulindeleke ukuthi luqale namhlanje kuMzansi Magic ngo-8.00 ebusuku.Kuzobonakala u-Apostle Aaron Zioan Khunou noPastor Lincoln Fero, befuna amakhosikazi abazowashada. Kuneziqephu eziwu-13 ezizoveza abesifazane abayisithupha bezama ukuthatha amehlo alaba befundisi. Ngeke kugcine ngabo kodwa kuzohlanganisa imindeni nabangani babo.“Uhlelo luzoveza ukuthi ibandla kanye nemindeni kungena kangakanani ekusizeni umfundisi noma umholi walo ekutholeni umaqondana. Ngeke kugcine ngokuthi kubonakale abefundisi nalaba besifazane kuphela, kodwa baningi abazongenelela basize ekukhetheni intokazi eyiyona yona. Ngeke bagcine ngokukhethana uma konke kuhambe kahle, siyohamba nabo baze babophe ifindo lo mshado,” kuchaza uBasetsana.Uthe ibandla nomndeni womfundisi bayoqala bahlangane nabesifazane bambuze imibuzo embalwa uma kucaca ukuthi akakulungele okufuna oyedwa kulaba befundisi, yilapho beyobe sebevumelana ngokuthi akhishwe lowo wesifazane ohlelweni.“Abesifazane okubahambela kahle bayogcina beya ngisho enkonzweni eholwa yilaba befundisi, bayophinde babe nesikhathi bobabili baye eholidini bazijabulise ukuze bazane kangcono. Okumele bakwazi ababukeli ukuthi kulaba besifazane abayisithupha, uyedwa ozobe ephuma ohlelweni isonto ngalinye kuze kusale ababili abayokhethwa yilezi zinceku. Sikholwa ukuthi ngalolu hlelo sixoxa indaba yothando futhi sithemba ukuthi abantu bakuleli bazolujabulela. Siyazi futhi abantu bazozithanda  lezi zintokazi  isiqephu ngasinye uma bezibona,” kuchaza uBasetsana.UKumalo nozakwabo sebekhiqize izinhlelo ezithandwayo kuleli okubalwa  i-Our Perfect Wedding  neDate My Family.UNomsa Philiso wakwaM-Net, uthe abangabazi ukuthi uhlelo lungolunye oluzodonsa amehlo ababukeli futhi luzobenza bakhulume ngalo.
title: Uvuka ngohlelo oluzosiza abefundisi abafuna omaqondana

text: KUTHUNUKE izilonda ebeseziphola emndenini okwabulawa ilungu lawo ngendlela efanayo eminyakeni edlule, ukutholakala kwezidumbu zabesifazane zilahlwe epulazini lomoba eMthwalume.UNksz Nosipho Ngcobo ongudadewabo kaNksz Nombali Ngcobo, isidumbu sakhe esatholwa silahlwe emobeni eMzinto ngo-2007 emuva kwesikhathi esingangenyanga edukile, uthe izigameko zakamuva ezibikwa eMthwalume zibavusele izinhlungu.UNombali ngomunye wabesifazane abangu-13 ababulawa wumalugaju uThozamile Taki owagwetshwa odilikajele abangu-13, iminyaka engu-208 nengu-16 icala ngalinye ngokubamba inkunzi ehlomile yiNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.“Ngike ngazibuza ukuthi uTaki usephume nini ejele? Selokhu kuvele izindaba zokutholwa kwabo emobeni. Ekhaya sekuvele kwashuba sengathi udadewethu ubulawe izolo, ikakhulu enganeni kamufi okwenzeka isigameko isencane kakhulu,” kusho uNksz Ngcobo.Uthe usola abagila lo mkhuba wokubulala abesifazane eMthwalume ukuthi bangabanye abebesebenzisana noTaki ngoba wanqaba ukuveza amagama abantu ayesebenzisana nabo kwaze kwaba uyagwetshwa. “Imindeni kudingeka ithole usizo lokwelulekwa ngokomqondo ngoba lesi yisimo esingelula ukuthi semukeleke kalula.Ngebhadi thina asikwazanga ukulekeleleka ngokwelulekwa komqondo,” usho kanje. Ziyisithupha izidumbu ezitholwe kuleli pulazi eliseMthwalume kanti kunengebhe yokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi kunomalugaju obulala abesifazane.Isidumbu sakamuva sitholwe ngoLwesine ngeledlule kanti akucaci ukuthi ngesikabani ngoba kusenziwa ulibofuzo. Esinye esitholwe ngoLwesibili olwedlule ngesikaNksz Zama Chiliza (39). Ezinye ngezikaNosipho (15) nodadewabo uNksz Akhona Gumede (25) abatholwa ngo- Ephreli nonyaka babegcine ukubonakala ngoNovemba 19 nyakenye.UNksz Nelisiwe Dube (23) esakhe isidumbu sitholwe endaweni efanayo ngenyanga edlule kanti wayegcine ukubonakala ngoJuni 28 ephume ekhaya ezobuya.EsikaNksz Bajabulisile Duma (41) satholwa ngo-2018.Imindeni ibonge ukusukuma kukahulumeni yathi uxhaso elutholayo luyithoba amanxeba. Eminye yemindeni ithe ayikakulungeli ukukhuluma.UNksz Silindile Dube ongudadewabo kaNelisiwe, uthe ukuboshwa kwabasolwa ababili kulethe ithemba. “Akukwazi ukuthi bekungabantu ababili abebengabulala abantu abaningi kanje. Okusithuse kakhulu wukuthi omunye wababoshiwe ngumuntu wendawo, esimaziyo,” kusho uNksz Dube.UMnuz Jefrey Phehlukwayo uyise kaNosipho no-Akhona, uthe bese behlanze ngedela sebelindele ukuthi amadodakazi awasekho.“Bekungesibo abantu abebehamba izinsuku bengabuyi ekhaya. Ukulahleka kwabo ngoNovemba kwenza sabona ukuthi kukhona okubavelele. Sifisa bajeze abenzi bokubi,” kusho uPhehlukwayo.I-IFP eholwa uMengameli wayo uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, ibambe umkhuleko nemindeni nomphakathi ezimobeni lapho kutholakale izidumbu izolo.Bekuhambele noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele nowezokuPhepha nokuThutha eKZN uMnuz Bheki Ntuli.UHlabisa uthe kumele abasolwa uma betholwa benecala bathole odilikajele banganikezwa ibheyili. “Sifisa izinkantolo zenze isibonelo kubantu abadlwengula baphinde babulale abesifazane. Uhulumeni akalimele ngezinyawo leli cala lisheshe lizigwebe izigilamkhuba,” kusho uHlabisa.Kubasolwa ababili ababoshiwe kuthiwa oyedwa ubesebenza egaraji kanti kukhona otholakale nezimpahla eziyamaniswa nezabagilwa.
title: Bathunukele kutholakala izidumbu

text: SISHAYE kwezwela isomiso kuMntwana waKwaPhindangene njengoba ekhala ngokufelwa yizinkomo ezingaphezulu kuka-60 okuyinto emkhathaza kakhulu ngosizi alubona lubhekene nomphakathi.UButhelezi ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokwethulwa kwamaloli angu-20 amasha athengwe nguMasipala waseMzinyathi abethulwa eMvoti ngoMgqibelo.Uthe uyazi ukuthi lesi simo asibhekene naye yedwa ngoba ubonile naseNkandla nakwezinye izindawo lapho abenqamula kuzo ukuthi izinkomo zibulawa yindlala ngenxa yokuswela amanzi.“Ngiyazi ukuthi kangingedwa kulokhu kulahlekelwa. Njengoba sonke esingabalimi sithembe imvula, iva lokuhlukunyezwa yisomiso selihlabe lephukela kithi. Ngakolunye uhlangothi isivuno sommbila nezolimo zilahleka ngenxa yesiqhotho. Ngakho ukungenelela okuphuthumayo kuyadingeka. Ngiyakujabulela okwenziwe nguMasipala waseMzinyathi ngokuletha amaloli azosiza kulesi simo esikhungethe abantu bakithi,” kusho uButhelezi.EMvoti, Msinga naseNquThu isomiso sigadle kwezwela kwafa nenqwaba yemfuyo. Sekuke kwaba nemibhikisho umphakathi ubalisa ngokuthi awusazi ukuthi uzokwenzenjani ngoba amanzi awekho.Kwezinye izindawo zaseNquthu kuthiwa kusiza uma kushoniwe njengoba abantu belethelwa amanzi.UButhelezi ucele umphakathi ukuba ungalokothi uyeke imiyalelo kahulumeni yokusetshenziswa kwamanzi ngokucophelela ngoba lesi simo sisekude ukuphela.Uthe okunye okumkhathazayo ukuthi kunophenyo lwenkohlakalo lokusetshenziswa kwemali yesomiso KwaZulu-Natal.UButhelezi uthe lolu phenyo lwenziwe, umbiko wakhona awukaze unekelwe umphakathi kanti ne-IFP esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal isiwufune kwaze kwashona ilanga ungadedelwa.Imeya yaseMvoti, uMnuz Thami Ngubane, ikhale ngokuthi okuyikhathazayo ngukuthi amaloli amanzi kunenkohlakalo egcwele kuwona njengoba kwebiwa udizili amanzi angafinyeleli kubantu.Ucele ukuba le nto ibhekisiswe wathi lolu daba useluxoxe nanoNdunankulu uMnuz Sihle Zikalala.IMeya yaseMzinyathi, uMfu Petros Ngubane nemenenja esabambile, uMnuz Lethu Mthembu, badalule ukuthi sebefike esiphethweni senkohlakalo yamaloli amanzi njengoba lawa amasha esenobuchwepheshe obuqapha umshayeli ukuthi ukuphi nokuthi uhamba nobani futhi uzofika nini lapho eya khona.Uthe lokhu bakubona kwi-video kumaselula kamasipala aqapha lonke uhambo lomshayeli. UMthembu uthe okunye ngukuthi njengoba bethenge amaloli bakwazile ukonga imali eningi.Ubuye wathi abantu bamathenda abebenza lo msebenzi bebeqola umasipala ngemali yamanzi.
title: Isomiso sishaye kwazwela kuShenge

text: UNOBHALA wophiko lwentsha ye-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uthi uyadumala uma ecabanga ngokuqanjelwa amanga ngetulo lokuketula uMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.UMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo uthi ebengangena ejele abhekane necala lokuvukela umbuso ngokuqanjelwa amanga.Ubekhuluma okokuqala ngendlela aphatheka ngayo kuthiwa yena nabanye be-ANC bahlela ukuketula uRamaphosa.Uthi ngale kokuthi ubethola izingcingo zimqinisa idolo kodwa abazali bakhe bahlukemezeka.Uthi kuzo zonke izinkinga ake abhekana nazo kayikho efana nalena kodwa akakhali ngoba imqinisile futhi yamxhumanisa namagatsha nezifunda ebezimbiza zifuna ukuzizwela ngale ndaba.“Ngigcine ngingasenaso isikhathi sokubhekana nezaseKZN ngoba bengibizwa ngapha nangapha,” kusho uSabelo.Uthi le nto yaphekwa enhlanganweni ye-ANCYL ngoba befuna ukumgqiba kwezombusazwe.Uthi abenza lokhu basezikhundleni eziphezulu kwi-ANCYL.“Lokho akusho ukuthi ngibambe amagqubu, futhi njengoba ngizokhethwa njengoMengameli we-ANCYL kuleli sonto, ngeke ngibazonde.”Uthe unoxolo kangangoba ufisa ukukusebenzisa nakuKhongolose ukuze amalungu abuyisane kubhekwe phambili okhethweni.USabelo ubangisana nomgcini-mafa wophiko lwentsha uMnuz Reggie Nkabinde ongathandanga ukuphumela obala ukuthi useyilungele kangakanani ingqungquthela.USabelo ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi usizwe umthandazo njengoba akhuliswa ngawo kubo eMbumbulu.Akananazi ukuthi liyothi liphela leli sonto abe esenguMengameli we-ANCYL ngenxa yokwesekwa okukhule ngesivinini kwizifunda ezingu-44 kwezingu-53 azihambele kuleli.Ugcine ngokugcizelela ukuthi ubufakazi bokuthi waboshelwa amanqina enyathi ngezinsolo zetulo lokuketula uRamaphosa, buzovela emiphumeleni yophenyo esimangalweni asifaka emangalela iphephandaba elaveza lolu daba.
title: Uyabazi ababopha itulo ngolukaRamaphosa uSabelo

text: USADIDEKILE umndeni kuhlaselwa amalungu omndeni amabili adutshulwe abulawa ngabasolwa abangaziwa emzini owodwa ezigamekweni ezimbili ezehlukene.UMnuz Sthembiso “Mashe” Mngwengwe (35) kuthiwa ubekubo eMpumalanga, eThekwini, esigodini saKwaLatha, ngeSonto ebusuku ngesikhathi kungena amadoda amabili okuthiwa abehlome ngezibhamu, afike amphoqa ukuthi awanike isibhamu ngaphambi kokuthi amdubule. Ushonele endaweni yesigameko. Ngesikhathi umndeni usahlela ukufihla ilungu lawo elisemakhazeni, ngoLwesibili ebusuku kuphinde kwahlaselwa emzini ofanayo kwadutshulwa udadewabo kamufi uNksz Dudu Mngwengwe (47), naye oshonele endaweni yesigameko.Isihlobo ebesikhona kwenzeka lezi zigameko esingathandanga ukudalulwa ngoba sesabela ukuphepha kwaso, sithe bewumndeni basashaqekile ngalokhu kuhlaselwa osekuphoqa ukuthi uma kuhlwa umuzi bawuvale bahambe beyobhaca ezindaweni ezehlukene.“Lesi sigameko sisethuse kakhulu kangangoba namanje siyazibuza ukuthi amalungu ethu abulawelani? Ekhaya kusele mina nomkhulu kuphela, bonke abantu sebebalekile bayobhaca ezihlotsheni ezikude ngenxa yalesi simo. Nathi uma ilanga lishona siyaphuma siyocela ukufihla ikhanda kweminye imizi sibuye ekuseni,” kusho lesi sihloboUthe womabili lawa malungu asemakhazeni, futhi basadidekile ukuthi azongcwatshwa kanjani njengoba umndeni kunzima ukuthi uhlangane uhlele ngenxa yalesi simo. Uveze ukuthi akukho muntu abamsolayo ukuthi wuye owenze lesi sigameko njengoba uMngwengwe ubewumuntu onenhlinziyo enhle, ekhonzwe ngabantu abaningi endaweni futhi ezigqaja ngezinto zesintu. Uthe udadewabo kamufi naye obulewe, ubengahlali lapho kuhlala khona uMngwengwe kodwa ubefike njengelungu lomndeni ngemva kokuzwakala kwezindaba zokubulawa komfowabo kanti naye usezodutshulwa ngendlela efanayo ngemva kwezinsuku ezimbili kubulawe umufi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe abasolwa bathatha isibhamu sikamufi (uMngwengwe), neselula yakhe bashaya bachitha.“Ngolwesibili amaphoyisa aphinde athola umbiko wokubulawa komuntu emzini ofanayo okuthe uma efika afica isidumbu sowesifazane ona-47 sidindilizile, sinamanxeba amathathu okudutshulwa ekhanda.  Amaphoyisa esiteshini saseMpumalanga aphenya amacala okubulala nelokubanjwa kwenkunzi,” kusho uCapt Gwala.
title: Kubulawe omunye kusahlelwa umngcwabo

text: MLUNGISI GUMEDEnoCELANI SIKHAKHANEU MENGAMELI we-NFP uNkk Zanele Magwaza-Msibi uthi sekufike lapho behluleka khona ukubekezelela ukuhlukunyezwa kwamakhansela abo ngozakwabo be-ANC komasipala abababusa ngokubambisana.UNkk Magwaza-Msibi wenze lesi sitatimede ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi ekhuluma engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi besifundazwe bophiko lwabesifazane eShowe.“Inkinga esibhekene nayo ukuthi amakhansela kaKhongolose abukela phansi awethu kangangokuthi awafuni bambiswano, izinqumo azithatha ngawodwana. Le nto isiyenza sengathi yithi esincengile kulobu budlelwano esinabo ne-ANC ngenxa yokuziphatha kwamakhansela ayo esithola nokuthi axosha nabasebenzi komasipala ngaphandle kokuhlangana ne-NFP,” kusho uNkk Magwaza-Msibi.UNkk Magwaza-Msibi ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokuthi ngeledlule amakhansela eqembu lakhe kumasipala waseMbabazane evele akhipha iMeya ye-ANC esikhundleni uNkk Phindile Strydom ngokuvota ndawonye ne-DA ne-IFP.UStrydom ubesolwa ngokuxosha iMenenja kaMasipala uMnuz Mthetheleli Ndlela. Kuphume uStrydom esikhundleni sakhe kwangena uMnuz Mbuzeleni Mkhize we-NFP.Kumanje i-NFP ihlela ukuthi ibambe umhlangano ne-ANC ukuze kulungiswe lesi simo kuphinde kubuyekezwe ubudlwelwano babo obubukeka busengcupheni.I-NFP ne-ANC benza isivumelwano sokusebenzisana komasipala abangu-19 KwaZulu-Natal ngemuva kokuthi lingabanga khona iqembu elinqoba ngamalengiso.Ziningi izigameko lapho amakhansela e-NFP ephula khona umgomo wokusebenzisana ne-ANC kodwa akhethe ukuvota ndawonye ne-IFP njengoba kwenzekile futhi eMbabazane.Ikhansela le-DA kumasipala waseMbabazane uMnuz Sandile Ndlovu uthe bangakujabulela ukuthi umshado we-ANC ne-NFP ukuthi uphele ngoba wenza ukuthi kungasebenzeki.UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uthe isikhalo se-NFP siyazwakala.“Asisho ukuthi iyiphi ingxenye enenkinga kodwa sifuna ukuthi lapho kukhona izinxushunxushu sibambisane kulungiswe isimo ukuze kungabikhona ukuphaza-miseka kwentuthuko,” usho kanje.
title: Kumuncu emshadweni we-ANC ne-NFP

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAI NKAKHA kwezokusubatha emijahweni yamabanga amade eNingizimu Afrika, uWillie Mtolo, ithipha omunye umakadebona kwezokugijima uHendrick Ramaala ukuthi angaphephezelisa ifulegi lakuleli ku-Old Mutual Two Oceans Marathon ngempelasonto.UMtolo owanqoba iNew York Marathon ngo-1992, uthe ubona amava kaRamaala kuyiwona azomsebenzela kulo mjalo ongu-56km ozogijinywa ngoMgqibelo ekuseni eKapa. Uzosakazwa bukhoma kuSABC 2 kusuka ngo- 5.30 ekuseni.URamaala (43) odabuka eLimpopo, umnkantshobuvu ekugijimeni. Usehambele amazwe ahlukene edla imihlanganiso. Ngo-2004 wanqoba iNew York Marathon waphinda wanqoba iMumbai Marathon ngonyaka ofanayo. Ugcine ukuyibamba ngaphandle kwelakuleli ngo-2012 lapho athola indawo yeshumi kuBerlin Marathon.Nyakenye ubeqala ukugijima kuTwo Oceans kodwa wakwazi ukuthola indawo yesibili ewashini waqopha u-3:11:33 engena ngemuva kukaLebenya Nkonka waseLesotho.“Kunzima ukuqagela ukuthi ngubani onganqoba kodwa kwabakuleli ngibona uHendrick Ramaala engayifaka ingcindezi. Indlela agijime ngayo nyakenye ekubeni ubeqala inginika ithemba. Usenaso isipiliyoni salo mjaho futhi kade ayebona emijahweni eminingi agijime kuyona,” kusho uMtolo.Le nkakha eke yayimbamba nakuComrades Marathon, ithe ibona kusazoba wumqansa ekutheni kube khona owesifazane waseNingizimu Afrika okwaziyo ukukhonya.“Into ehlupha abagijima bakithi wukuthi bagijima imijaho eminingi ngoba bejahe imali. Kufanele bayikhethe imijaho abayingenelayo. Okuhle manje wukuthi njengoba isiminingi enemali sebengakwazi ukuzikhethela ukuthi iyiphi abazoyingenela bese benza kahle kuyona.”Ephuzwini le mali, abagqugquzeli beTwo Oceans babeke umhlomula ka-R1 million kumgijimi wesilisa nowesifazane ozophula irekhodi ngaphezu kuka-R250 000 otholwa ngokuphuma phambili.Elabesilisa lingu-3:03:44 elabekwa uThompson Magawana ngo-1988. Elabesifazane lingu-3:30:36 laqoshwa uFrith van der Merwe ngo-1989.“Angiboni kukhona ozokwazi ukushaya irekhodi elisha ikakhulukazi njengoba nomgudu okuzohanjwa ngawo ushintshile. Ngeke kubelula abantu abaningi abayazi indlela entsha. Okunye nesimo sezulu saseKapa sishintsha njalo ngeke wazi ukuthi sizobe sinjani ngosuku lomjaho,” kusho uMtolo.Ngokujwayelekile indlela ibidlula eChapman’s Peak kodwa le ndawo icekeleke phansi ngesikhathi kunomlilo wequbula eKapa. Sekuzodlulwa e-Ou Kaapse.Uthe bayadingeka abagijimi abafana noGert Thys nyakenye, wayeshoshela phambili ngejubane eliyisimanga kucaca ukuthi uphuthuma irekhodi kodwa wagcina ephelele endleleni ebanjwa amajaqamba.“Abagijimi uma befuna ukwenza kahle kumele basizane, kungabhekwa umuntu oyedwa emehlweni. Uma benza njalo bangakwazi ukushaya izikhathi ezinhle,” kusho uMtolo.
title: Kubhekwe uRamaala kuTwo Oceans

text: UMHOLI omusha weSoul Brothers, uThokozani Hadebe, usesheba umculo nokulingisa njengoba esebonakala emafilimini akhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic.UThokozani (52) wangena endaweni zengwazi yombhaqanga engasekho uDavid “Mdavu” Masondo, owadlula emhlabeni ngo-2015.Lo mculi, odabuka eWembezi, e-Estcourt, ubedlala indawo eqavile efilimini esihloko sithi Uyangenza ngoMgqibelo.“Ngifakwe emkhakheni wokulingisa nguTumelo Mpanza no-Andile Mhlongo. Bebevele benza amafilimu. Bathe kule nami angingene ngilingise. Ngiyababonga kakhulu ngokuvumbulula ikhono ebengingazi ukuthi nginalo,” kusho uThokozani.Le filimu ekhuluma ngomholi wezigebengu uMbukeni Zulu osethandana nendodakazi yesitha sikazakwabo, izophinde ikhonjiswe kuDStv Channel 161 ngoSepthemba 27 ngo6 ebusuku.UThokozani uthe ngeke awuyeke umculo kodwa uzokusheba. “Kuzosina kudedelana.”Yena neSoul Brothers basanda kukhipha icwecwe elisha elisihloko sithi Iqiniso.Ngaphandle kokuhola iSoul Brothers, uThokozani ubuye acule yedwa. Ngo2015 ukhiphe icwecwe abehamba kulo yedwa elithi Hamb’ Ubuye. Bekungekhona okokuqala kodwa wazibula ngelalithi Washonaphi, elamenza wahlabana ngomklomelo weBest Mbhaqanga kumaSouth African Traditional Music Achievement (Satma)Awards.
title: Kuvele elinye ikhono koweSoul Brothers
‘Akuthi shu okushiwo uTrump, asimesabi’ - Julius Malema

text: UKUQOKWA kukaLuvo Manyonga emunxeni wabesilisa abakhiphe unyawo kwezokusubatha kulo nyaka, kufana nomayinhlonze womgqigqo walo mdlali selokhu alwa nedimoni lezidakamizwa.UManyonga oyibamba kwi-long jump ubalwe yinhlangano eyengamele ezokugijima emhlabeni i-International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF), kwabayishumi okuzokhethwa kubona umdlali wesilisa ovelele kulo nyaka.Umcimbi wokumemezela abadle umhlanganiso useMonaco ngoDisemba 4 kanti amavoti azovalwa ngoNovemba 13.Uvota ngokuya ekhasini [email protected] kwi-twitter bese u-retwitter lowo ohamba naye. La mavoti azohlanganiswa nawesigungu se-IAAF ukukhipha abawinile. Ukumenyezelwa kukaManyonga ngoLwesibili kulandela okokuCaster Semenya omenyezelwe kwabesifazane ngoMsombuluko.UManyonga uzakhele ugazi negama etholela iNingizimu Afrika indondo yesiliva kuma-Olympic eBrazil ngo-2016. Ulandelise ngokudla ubhedu ethola igolide ngonyaka olandelayo kwi-IAAF World Champs. Khona nyakenye uphinde wabashaya emakhanda kwi-IAAF Diamond League. Kulo nyaka uvikele isicoco sakhe seDiamond League, wathola isiliva kwi-World Indoor kanjalo nakwi-African Championship. Yonke le mpumelelo ilandele ukuvuka azithathe ngemuva kokuqeda isigwebo sakhe sokutholakala ne-tik egazini ngo-2012.Nyakenye isicoco somhlaba sihambe nomdlali we-high jump waseQatar uMutaz Essa Barshim obengekho emiqhudelwaneni kulo nyaka ngenxa yokulimala. Kulo nyaka umbango ushubile njengoba kuqokwe nomgijimi waseKenya u-Eluid Kipchoge ophule irekhodi lomhlaba kwi-42km enqoba iBerlin Marathon. Ubuye abe ngumpetha weLondon Marathon.Kukhona abakhaya bakhe u-Emmanuel Korir ongumpetha weContinental Cup futhi onesikhathi esihamba phambili emhlabeni kwi-800m. Omunye okhona uTimonthy Cheruiyot ongumpetha weDiamond League kwi-1500m.Bazobanga nezibabuli zabagijimi base-USA uChristian Cole noNoah Lyles abayibamba kwi-100m.UTomas Walsh waseNew Zealand ogila izimanga kwi-shot put uqokiwe. Ungumpetha we-World Indoor, Commonwealth Games neDiamond League. UKevin Meyer waseFrance ungumpetha we-hemptathlon kwi-Indoor futhi uphethe irekhodi lomhlaba kwi-decathlon, bese kuba u-Abderrahman Samba waseQatar ongumpetha weContinental Cup ku-400mH.
title: UManyonga uqokwe nabaphambili emhlabeni

text: Sithembiso MkhizeKUTHIWA ihamba phambili iKaizer Chiefs emaqenjini afuna ukusayinisa uBuhle Mkhwanazi obedlalela iBidvest Wits isitifiketi sayo sokudlala kwiDStv Premiership esithengwe yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM).Umthombo osondelene noMkhwanazi, oyibamba maphakathi emuva, uthe izikhulu zaMakhosi sezibe nemihlangano eminingi nomphathi wezindaba zakhe, uPaul Mitchell.Ngokusho komthombo maningi amaqembu axoxa noMitchell kodwa yiChiefs ebeka okungcono etafuleni.Kuthiwa isivumelwano sesisayiniwe kodwa sekubambezele ukulinda isinqumo seCourt of Arbitration for Sports (CAS) ekutheni ihoxise isinqumo seFifa esivimba iChiefs ekusayiniseni abadlali kumawindi amabili.Yagwetshwa ngokusayinisa ngokungekho emthethweni * -Andriamirado “ Dax” Andrianarimanana waseMadagascar. Ngokusho komthombo iChiefs isithandazela ukuthi kuvalwe iwindi iCAS isiyiphendulile. Iwindi lokusayinisa abadlali abasha lizovalwa ngoNovemba 17.UMkhwanazi, owajoyina iWts ephuma kwiPretoria University, usalelwe yinkontileka yesizini neTTM ephethwe nguMasala Mulaudzi.“Akhona amanye amaqembu afuna uMkhwanazi kodwa elihamba phambili yiChiefs. Isingashaywa kuphela yisinqumo seCAS. Seyibe nemihlangano eminingi noMitchell. Naye uyachazeka ngekubeka etafuleni. Asazi-ke yibhola leli, mhlawumbe kungavalwa iwindi kukhona eseliqhamukile labeka okungcono,” kusho umthombo.UMitchell ukuvumile ukuthi akhona amaqembu afuna uMkhwanazi kodwa wathi usenenkontileka neTTM.UVina Maphosa wezokuxhumana kwiChiefs uthe: “Okwamanje ukusayinisa abadlali sisakumisile kuze kube kuphuma isinqumo seCAS. Ukuthi sixoxa noMkhwanazi ngiqala ngawe ukukuzwa. Ezinsukwini ezizayo ngizobuza izikhulu zeqembu”.KwiWits uMkhwanazi ubeyelinye lamasosha kaGavin Hunt oseqeqesha iChiefs. Ngesizini ka-2019/20 ugijime imidlalo yeDStv Premiership ewu-19, washaya igoli elilodwa. Udlale owodwa kwiTelkom Knockout nakwiNedbank Cup. Omunye umdlali obekwiWits ojima neChiefs, uSifiso Hlanti, naye obengumdlali weWits.Elinye elifuna uMkhwanazi AmaZulu kodwa ahlulekile uku­khokha imali abeyihola kwiWits. Kuthiwa ubehola uR5 million ngonyaka. NgoMgqibelo AmaKhosi azovula imidlalo yeligi neSundowns. Ngeledlule ashaye iMaritzburg United ngo-2-1 kwi-quarterfinal eMTN 8.
title: IChiefs kuthiwa imfuna uthuli uBuhle Mkhwanazi

text: KUTHUNGATHWA uthisha wesilisa wasoThongathi oselokhu anyamalala emuva kwengxabano eyasuka ebumnandini. UMnuz Luyanda  Xolo (23) waseClare Estate eSydenham kodwaofundisa oThongathi selokhu agcina ukubonakala ekuqaleni kwenyanga ngoJuni 1. UXolo ngokwesitatimende  samaphoyisa  wahamba nabangani bakhe bayozijabulisa epaki ekuBurnwood Road kanti kuzoqubuka ingxabano lapho babezijabulisa khona. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe ngokusho kukafakazi lesi sigameko senzeka ngabo-8 ebusuku. Lo fakazi uphinde wakuveza ukuthi emuva kwale ngxabano kwaqhutshekwa nohambo kwayiwa emjondolo ekuCandover Road eduze nepaki ebebezijabulisa kuyo. Nakhona kule mIjondolo kwaqhutshekwa nobumnandi kwaphinde futhi kwaqubuka impi yesibili phakathi kwabangani kwaze kwaba kuyasakazekwa wonke umuntu uyabaleka. UXolo wagcina ukubonakala laph,o kuze kube yimanje awuzwakali umkhondo wakhe. UMbele uthe uphiko lwamaphoyisa eK9 alwenzile uphenyo kodwa kusacwebe iziziba okwamanje. "Kuvulwe icala lomuntu olahlekile eSydenham kuyaphenywa. Amaphoyisa eK9 amthungathile kwangatholwa kule ndawo kodwa uphenyo luyaqhubeka. Uwuthisha oThongathi ofaka nezibuko, kusho uColonel Mbele.Amaphoyisa anxusa abantu abangaba nolwazi mayelana noXolo ukuba bathinte uWarrant Officer Cliffy Reddi  ku-084 556 6032, naku- 031 202 2798 no-031 202 2808 noma bashayele inombolo yokulwa nobugebengu  ewu-08600 10111.
title: Kufunwa uthisha owanyamalala ehambe wayozijabulisa nabangani

text: IJEZI eliwunombolo 21 lisetshenziswe kakhulu nguSiyabonga “Nsimbi” Sangweni waseMpangeni, kwi-Orlando Pirates eminyakeni edlule. Empeleni nomfowabo, uThami ubezifela ngaleli jezi esadlalela AmaZulu FC namanye amaqembu.Insephe yePirates uNkanyiso Zungu, nguyena othathe leli jezi kwiBucs, kanti kuqondana nokuthi naye ungowokuzalwa eMpangeni.UThami Sangweni uxoxe naleli phephandaba izolo ngokuthatha kukaZungu ijezi ebeliyigugu kumfowabo.“Inombolo ebhalwe ejezini, yinombolo nje. Kayisho lutho. Ngiyathemba noZungu uzokuqonda ukuthi okubalulekile ukuthi ashaye into ecokeme ngoba uzobe ebanga ijezi nabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu nokuthi phela iPirates yiqembu elikhulu,” uqale washo kanje uThami  ebuzwa ngejezi.UZungu ugqame kuMaZulu FC, wagcina eshiyile khona walunguza kwiJomo Cosmos kwiGladAfrica Championship.U-Ephraim “Jomo” Sono, ongumnikazi weZenkosi wamchoma uphaphe lwegwalagwala uZungu, washo nokuthi uya kude ebholeni kodwa kunezinto okumele azilungise ngaye ezingamenzela phansi nxa eziziba.Kubukeka sengathi uzilungisile ngampela uZungu, ngoba ubizwe uSteve Barker opheka iStellenbosch FC ukuba ezodlalela ezakhe ngenxa yobudlelwano obuhle abanabo nalo mdlali ngesikhathi esaqeqesha Usuthu eminyakeni edlule.Eqhubeka echaza uSangweni, uthe ... Udaba luqhubeka ephepheni lanamuhla...zitholele elakhe ukuze ungezwa ngabantu.
title: USangweni weluleka uZungu ngePirates nempilo yaseGoli

text: AMALUNGU e-ANC eMshwathi ngaseMgungundlovu asola inkantolo ngokuchema nephoyisa elibhekene necala lokubulala obeyilungu lekomiti le-ANC Youth League KwaZulu- NatalINkantolo yeMantshi yaseNew Hanover inike uConstable Sandile Mkhize (31) ibheyili kaR4 000 izolo ngecala lokubulala uNksz Sindisiwe Ndlovu (34).Imantshi, uRod Stewart, ilihlehlisele uFebhuwari 18 nonyaka icala. UMbuso kawusiphikisanga isicelo sebheyili sikaMkhize. Eminye yemibandela yebheyili yakhe wukuba ayosayina esiteshini samaphoyisa kabili ngesonto, angahlangani nofakazi futhi angalubhadi eMshwathi lapho okwenzeka khona isigameko.Amalungu e-ANC abesecaleni aphatheke kabi ngokukhululwa kukaMkhize, asola inkantolo ngokuchema “nombulali”.Ilungu lesigungu seSanco eMgungundlovu, edlelana ne-ANC, uMnuz Muzi Mngadi, lithe badumele ngesenzo senkantolo sokungakhombisi ubulungiswa ikhipha uMkhize ngebheyili.“Abantu besifazane bafela ezandleni zabantu okumele ngabe bayabavikela. Kubi kakhulu kulesi sigameko ngoba umsolwa yiphoyisa elibulale uNksz Ndlovu ngesihluku esimangalisayo. Umndeni kamufi nengane yakhe basezinhlungwini kodwa inkantolo ibone kungcono ikhulule umbulali. Okusikhathaza kakhulu wukuthi icala liphenywa wuzakwabo kamsolwa esiteshini saseCrammond, engabe liphenywa i-Ipid (ephenya amacala amaphoyisa). Sihlela ukumashela ezindlini zoMbuso eMgungundlovu siyoveza ukuthi kaseneme ngendlela okusingethwe ngayo leli cala."INGXENYE yamalungu e-ANC angeneme ngesinqumo senkantolo enike ibheyili iphoyisa elisolwa ngokubulala ilungu lekomiti le-ANCYL eKZN, uNksz Sindisiwe Ndlovu, ngoDisemba nyakenye.Isithombe: Bongani Mbatha/Agency (ANA)UMkhize, uyiphoyisa eCrammond, usolwa ngokudubula unina wengane yakhe, uNksz Ndlovu, esifubeni besendaweni yobumnandi ayembizele ukuthi baxoxe kuyona esebenzisa isibhamu somsebenzi.Emva kokumdubula, kuthiwa walayisha uNksz Ndlovu emotweni yakhe ethi umphuthumisa esibhedlela kanti uzoshonela endleleni.
title: Abe-ANC bakhala ngebheyili enikwe iphoyisa elisolwa ngokubulala

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEKUBE yinjabulo yodwa kwiBlack Lions yasesifundeni Ilembe neRunning Water yaseMzinyathi benyukela kwi-ABC Motsepe League.ILions, eqeqeshwa nguNkokhelo Zulu, izifake esigabeni esingaphezulu ihlula iReal All Stars yaseZululand ngo 2-1 emdlalweni owandulela owamanqamu emidlalweni yokuhlunga yamaqembu akuSAB League KwaZulu-Natal.IRunning Water iwine ngo-3-1 sekushaywa amaphenathi kowandulela owamanqamu.Umdlalo ubuphele zibambene ngo-1-1.Imidlalo yokuhlunga ibiseMnambithi ngempelasonto.ILions iqophe umlando ngokuba yiqembu lokuqala esifundeni Ilembe ukungena kwiMotsepe ngezithukuthuku zalo.IQwabe United, iKwaDukuza neMuzi King Masters bangena ngokuthenga izitifiketi.EMzinyathi, iRunning Water ijoyine Umvoti United,  obumele iKwaZulu-Natal  emasontweni edlule,  kweyokuhlungela ukunyukela kwiGladAfrica Championship ebiseGauteng.Okuqaphelekile imidlalweni yokuhlunga, ebihanjelwe nguHlengiwe Mavimbela owengamele uMnyango Wezemidlalo  KwaZulu-Natal, wukuqashelwa kwemigomo yeCovid-19.NgoMgqibelo izikhulu zeSafa ziphoqelekile  ukumisa imidlalo ngenxa yezibukeli ebezinqaba ukulandela imithetho.  Ize yaqedelelwa izolo.Okunye obekugqame ngale midlalo yizinga layo ebeliphezulu.Kufanele ukuba izinhloli zamaqembu ePremier Soccer League ((PSL) ebezigcwele kuyo ziphindele emuva zinenqwaba yamagama abadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu azibonile.Ukunyuka kweLions neRunning Water kusho ukuthi  asezoba wu-19  amaqembu adlala kwiKZN Motsepe League kwisizini ka-2020/21Lokhu kudalwa yisinqumo seSafa sokuthi kungabikhona iqembu elizodliwa yizembe kwiMotsepe League ngoba ingaqedelwanga imidlalo emuva komvalelandlini. Kuhlanganisa nokuthi uMvoti uhlulekile wukunyukela kwiGladAfrica Championship ngesikhathi udlala kweyokuhlunga, ekubeni iRoyal Eagles yaseKZN, idliwe yizembe kulesi sigaba esingaphezulu.IYoung Cavaliers yaseWentworth, eThekwini, abaningi abebethipha yona ukudla umhlanganiso ngenxa yebhola eliphezulu elidlalayo, iphume esigabeni samaqoqo. UNtokozo Bhengu, oyicijayo kumele azame abadlali ngesizini ezayo.Iningi labadlali bakhe belishelwa ubuthaphuthaphu yizinhloli zamaqembu-PSL. Omunye walaba badlali uSimanga Ngcobo waseMlaza, eThekwini, okuthiwa ufunwa yiMamelodi Sundowns, Kaizer Chiefs, TS Galaxy.IRoyal AM,  eyibamba kwiGladAfica Championship, kuthiwa  ivinjwe ifuna ukumsayinisa khona eMnambithi. Kuvele ukuthi umdlali ubengasalali yizingcingo zingena amaqembu emheha ngemali engcono, nokuphoqe uBhengu ukuthi amphuce umakhalekhukhwni wakhe ngesikhathi kusaqhubeka imidlalo.
title: Injabulo iBlack Lions neRunning Water benyuka

text: BELISEBENZA ngisho lingekho emsebenzini iphoyisa (34) laseKranskop elidutshulwe lafa lingekho emsebenzini.Uyise kaDetective Constable Thandoluhle “Ndo” Mhlongo, uMnuz Sazi Mhlongo uthe likhulu igebe elizovulwa wukubulawa kwendodana yakhe emaphoyiseni. Idutshulwe ingekho emsebenzini ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.UMhlongo ophinde abe nguSihlalo weCommunity Policing Forum (CPF) eKranskop uthe indodana yakhe beyisebenza noma ingekho emsebenzini.“Ubenza umsebenzi ngokuzimisela. Bekuthi uma eshayelwa ucingo abantu ebusuku, engekho emsebenzini aye lapho ebizelwa khona ayosiza. Uma kudingeka ukuthi kuboshwe umuntu ubembopha bese edlulisela kwabasebenzayo. Ubengasho ukuthi ngeke asize ngoba akasebenzi. Uma kungaba namanye amaphoyisa angu-20 anjengaye isifundazwe singaqonda,” kusho uMhlongo.Uthe kusenzima emndenini ukwamukela ukuthi indodana yakhe ayisekho. Uthe nasemndenini akekho obengayikhonzile. Uthe ishiye izingane ezintathu ezisencane, eyokuqala ineminyaka emihlanu.UMhlongo uthe kubahlukumezile ukubulawa kwayo ngalolu hlobo futhi kabazi ukuthi yini eholele ekufeni kwayo.NgoLwesihlanu eManzimtoti kubulawe elinye iphoyisa ebelingekho emsebenzini. UWarrant Officer Radebe udutshulwe wafa emini ngoLwesihlanu kuN2.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa uGeneral Kehla Sitole ukugxekiwe ukubulawa kwamaphoyisa amabili.Udlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini yawo nomunye umlisa oshonile ngesikhathi kudubuleka abantu abathathu esigamekweni sokudutshulwa kukaDetective Constable Mhlongo. Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa kukholakala ukuthi uDetective Constable Mhlongo ubesendaweni yokosa inyama ngesikhathi ebona imoto esolisayo ilokhu izulazula. Uthe uma ephuma eyohlola wahlangatshezwa yinhlamvu ebivela emoteni. Kuthiwa izigelekeqe kulesi sigameko ziphinde zadubulana namaphoyisa abebiziwe, kwalimala ezimbili. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kuthiwa kutholakale izidumbu ezimbili okukholakala ukuthi ngezezinye zezigilamkhuba. Kuthiwa kutholakale nesibhamu sesinye isigilamkhuba endaweni yesigameko.USitole usenxuse noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi olungasiza ophenyweni ngalezi zigameko ukuthi ashayele inombolo yokubika ubugebengu ku-08600 10111. Ngeke kudingeke ukuthi bazisho amagama abo.
title: Kunconywa ukuzinikela ephoyiseni elibulewe

text: KUBHEKWE isinqumo seCourt of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) ngokusayina kukaSifiso Hlanti kwiKaizer Chiefs ememezele ukuthi uziqeqesha nayo ekuqaleni kwesonto.Amakhosi abambe umoya ngesigwebo esiwavimba ukuthi asayinise abadlali amawindi amabili asigixabezwe yiFIFA ngasekuqaleni konyaka. Ilahlwe yicala elafakwa yiFosa Juniors emuva kokusayinisa u-Andriamirado “Dax” Andriarimanana waseMadagascar. IChiefs izenzile izethulo kwiCAS. Manje isilinde isinqumo. Uma iCAS iyichitha iyoze ibhalise abadlali ngoMashi ngonyaka ozayo.UHlanti, obedlala kwiBidvest Wits, uziqeqesha neChiefs ngenhloso yokusayina inkontileka engenza asebenze nobengumqeqeshi wakhe kwiZitshudeni, uGavin Hunt.Imenenja kaHlanti, uSizwe Ntshangase, ithe azikho izingxoxo eziphakathi kwabo neChiefs okwamanje.“IChiefs imcelile uHlanti ukuthi izombheka eduze. Akukho okubi ngalokho kwazise akanaqembu. Kuyenzeka kuwona wonke amazwe ukuthi umdlali ongenaiqembu acelwe ukuzojima emaqenjini acabanga ukuthi angamdinga,” kusho uNtshangase.“IChiefs okwamanje ayivumelekile ukubhalisa abadlali futhi isalinde isinqumo seCAS. Ngakho nathi kuningi okufanele sikubheke. UHlanti kule minyaka akuyona akufanele ahlale engadlali. Sihlale phansi naye savumelana ngokuthi ayojima neChiefs. Konke kuzoncika ekutheni kwenzekani ngecala leChiefs ngoba kufanele uHlanti adlale ikakhulukazi ngoba ubheke ukugcina indawo kwiBafana Bafana.”UHunt kusalindeleke ukuthi asayinise abanye abadlali kwiChiefs azoqinisa ngabo iqembu uma iphumelela kwiCAS. Kuvela ukuthi ufuna uCole Alexander noPhathutshedzo Nange abeyibamba ngabo enkabeni yenkundla kwiWits. Ngaphambi kokuthi uHlanti ajime neChiefs bekuvele nokuthi ufunwa nayi-Orlando Pirates.“IChiefs ayikabeki lutho etafuleni. Lokhu kusho ukuthi asiwavaleli ngaphandle namanye amaqembu. Asivali lutho ngoba newindi lisavuliwe. UHlanti uziqeqesha neChiefs ngoba ikhulume nathi. Sizobona ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ukuthi kwenzekani,” kusho uNtshangase.
title: I-Chiefs ilinde isinqumo seCAS ngokusayinisa abadlali

text: UMNDENI wowesifazane wasoKhukho, eMahlabathini, okusolwa owayeyisoka lakhe ngokumbulala bafuna emlobole yize eseshonile lo wesifazane.Umndeni kaNksz Mbalenhle “Mbali” Njoko (24) ubhodla umlilo kulandela lesi sigameko sangoMsombuluko nabathi umsolwa bafuna akhokhe zonke izindleko zokungcwaba indodakazi yabo aphinde amlobole amqede ukuze bezothola ukuthula.UNksz Njoko kusolwa ukuthi udutshulwe ngumsolwa amahlandla amabili ekubo maqede wabaleka nendodana yabo eneminyaka emihlanu.Kuthiwa bese kuphele iminyaka engu-10 ethandana nomsolwa kanti waqoma umsolwa ngosiko lokumisa iduku efunda uGrade 11, eyitshitshi.Unina kamufi, uNkk Dudu Njoko, izolo utshele Isolezwe ukuthi badumele kakhulu ngalesi sigameko futhi bafuna umsolwa alobole umufi.“Bengingekho ekhaya ngesikhathi efika edubula umufi. Umsolwa ubengafuni ukwamukela ukuthi indodakazi ibisihlukene naye. Indodakazi ibisikhathele ukuqhubeka naye ekubeni engayenzeli lutho, engayiloboli kodwa ebe esebenza kahle ezimayini. Kumanje nje sifuna ukuba umsolwa azokhokha lonke ilobolo yize isishonile indodakazi. Sifuna akhokhe nezindleko zonke zokufihlwa kwakhe. Uma kwenzeka eboshwa umgcwabo ungakenzeki, sifisa adedelwe nasesitokisini azomgcwaba njengokumbulala kwakhe,” kusho uNkk Njoko.Uthe ngisho angaboshwa, ufuna abomndeni kamsolwa bayokhipha imali yakhe emsebenzini wakhe bazolobola.Uthe ingane kamufi ebisendlini ngesikhathi kudutshulwa unina yalandela umsolwa nokwenza wagcina eyithathile wahamba nayo umsolwa.“Ingane yayimlandela ihamba ithi akalethe isibhamu adubule ngaso unina ukuze nayo izomdubula. Ngikhuluma manje nje ingane ngisazoya kosonhlalakahle ngiyoyithatha njengoba itholwe amaphoyisa ehlathini eliseduze nomfula ayiyisa kosonhlalakahle,” kusho uNkk Njoko.Uthe umsolwa ubeyihlukumeza indodakazi yakhe njengoba wayinqabela ukuba iyofuna umsebenzi ekhala ngokuthi abanye besilisa bazoyibona.“Umsolwa wahlawula ingane ngoR9 000 wathi izinkomo ezimbili. Ubengakaloboli,” kusho uNkk Njoko.Uthe ubengenalo ulwazi lokuthi sekunesikhathi esingakanani laba behlukene.Uthe bafisa umsolwa aboshwe ngokushesha ngoba uyingozi njengoba ephethe isibhamu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ingane itholakele, nokuthi kuphenywa icala lokubulala.Umsolwa ubesathungathwe.
title: Umndeni ufuna umsolwa angcwabe umufi amlobole

text: UKELLY Khumalo useveze ukuthi ziningi izingoma asazozikhiphela abalandeli bakhe ezikwi-albhamu yakhe ayikhiphe ngonyaka odlule ethi The Voice of Africa (TVOA).Ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokukhipha ingoma ethi Ngathwala Ngaye, ekule albhamu ngeledlule.Kule ngoma athi eyothando, uveze ukuthi usebenze noMondli Ngcobo, obe nesandla kakhulu kule albhamu.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uKelly, uthe njengoba uFebhuwari kuyinyanga yothando, ubone ukuthi akhiphe le ngoma ukuze izithandani ziyijabulele.“Kusukela ngisagxile ekuculeni noRobbie Malinga, inyanga kaFebhuwari bengiyithatha njengokumele ngikhiphele ngayo izithandani ingoma, nalena ke ihambisana nayo le nyanga. Ingoma eqhakambisa uthando lena futhi kungijabulisile ukusebenza noMondli. Izwi lakhe lizwakale kule ngoma njengoba umkhulu umsebenzi esiwenze naye ngokubambisana kuze kube manje njengoba i-video yayo sesiyishuthile futhi izophuma maduzane,“ kusho uKelly.Uthe uyalubonga uthando abantu bakuleli abalukhombise kule albhamu njengoba yenza kahle kakhulu.“Izingoma engizikhiphe ngonyaka odlule abantu bazithakasele kakhulu, ukukhipha ingoma yokholo ethi Esiphambanweni, kwenze abantu babona indlela. Bengizimisele ngesikhathi ngiyenza futhi yenza kahle ngisho isisemphakathini,“ kuchaza uKelly.Uveze ukuthi manje usefuna ukusebenza nabaculi abahlukene base-Afrika angakhipha izingoma nabo.Uthe okunye azoba matasa ngakho ukulungiselela isizini yesibili yohlelo olukhuluma ngempilo yakhe oluthi Life with Kelly Khumalo.Uveze ukuthi uthando olukhonjiswe ngabantu kusizini yokuqala yilona olwenze baqala ukulungiselela eyesibili.
title: Usazoveza okuningi emculweni uKelly

text: MHLELI: Ngizwakalisa isikhalo nesinabo esisebenzela izikole njengomabhalane kodwa singaholelwa.UMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natali uyazi ukuthi bakhona abasiza ezikoleni kodwa asitholi ngisho imali yokuthi sibukeke uma sesiyohlangana nabasebenzayo.Nathi sicela sisukunyelwe sinikwe nje insipho-ke okungenani. Nathi sishiya izingane zethu emakhaya kodwa asizikhohlisi ngalutho uma sesibuya etohweni.Nobuhle ZungueKranskop
title: [IMIBONO] Singomabhalane ezikoleni sicela ukuholelwa

text: ABAHOLI bezinhlangano zamaciko bajutshwe ukuthi bayoxhumana nezinhlaka ezehlukene ukuze amaciko athole uxhaso njengoba ekhala ngokuthwala kanzima ngenxa yeCovid-19.Laba baholi basethimbeni eliqokwe uNgqongqoshe wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke uNathi Mthethwa elibizwa ngeMinisterial Advisory Team (MAT), ukuba limluleke ngezinkinga ezibhekene namaciko nokuthi zingasonjululwa kanjani.Umnyango uthe yize uqhamuke nezinhlelo zokuwanikeza imali amaciko ashayekile futhi wabambisana noMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa kwamaBhizinisi amaNcane neSolidarity Fund, kodwa asemaningi amaciko angahlomulanga.IMAT ibunjwe nguSharif Baker weSouthern African Communications Industries Association (SACIA), Cina Mpololo weSouth Africa Music Industry Council (SAMIC), Joy Mbewana weCultural & Creative Industries Federation of South Africa (CCIFSA), Nozipho Nguse-Dlamini weCstahood, Gabi Le Roux weTrade Union for Musicians of South Africa (Tumsa), Thobela Dlamini weSouth African Creative Practitioners Union (SACPU) noLara Foot weTheatre Dance Employers Association.USharif noCina bazobhekelela ukuthi bakhulume namabhange nabanikazi bezindawo zokuhlala eziqashisayo ukuthi baqhamuke nezinhlelo ezizosiza amaciko njengokuthi anikezwe ikhefu lokukhokha.UJoy noNozipho babhekele uhlelo lokululeka amaciko ngendlela yokuziphatha ethinta imali, indlela yokuphila nokunye.UThobela uthunywe ukuthi axhumane nezinkampani ezizimele ukuthi athole iminikelo noxhaso lwamaciko.ULara uzokhuluma nezikole ukuze izingane zamaciko zingaxoshwa ngenxa yokungakhokhi.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi leli thimba linikezwe izinyanga eziyisithupha ukwenza lo msebenzi.UJoy uthe bayajabula ngokuthi bazokwazi ukulekelela amaciko."Akuwona umsebenzi olula kodwa ngenxa yokuthi sisebenza nezinhlaka ezehlukene, kuyasijabulisa. Kuzosiza nokuthi uNgqongqoshe angazicabangeli kodwa simsize ukuthatha izinqumo ngezinto esizizwa ngamaciko esiwaholayo."
title: Izinhlelo zokusiza amaciko ashaywe yiCovid-19

text: Zakhele XabaUMQEQESHI weBidvest Wits, uGavin Hunt, unethemba lokuthi uzobona umfutho awujwayele kubadlali bakhe yize kungasasele sikhathi esingakanani kuphele ngeqembu.IWits izobhekana neMamelodi Sundowns emdlalweni owandulela owamanqamu weNedbank Cup e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, ngoMgqibelo ngo-7 ebusuku. Kuzoqala iBaroka neBloemfontein Celtic komunye umdlalo owandulela owamanqamu kuyona le nkundla.IWits sekusele amasonto ambalwa kuphele ngayo ebholeni laseMzansi kwazise isidayiselwe iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM). Abadlali abahlukene abakufihlile ukuthi lesi yisimo esinzima kubona kwazise sekufanele bacabange ngokuthola amaqembu uma kuwukuthi ayibathathi iTTM. Iqembu likaHunt liyaziwa ukuthi lihlala liyinkinga kweyomkhumulajezi.“Abadlali abakhombisi ukudikibala okwamanje. Sizobona kahle enkundleni ngosuku lomdlalo. Okwamanje akukho okukhombisa ukuthi umfutho uphansi kubadlali. Ngithemba ukuthi kuzoqhubeka kanje. Akukho okunye, kufanele siqedele isizini. Sikulungele ukubuyela enkundleni,” kusho uHunt.IWits izodlala neSundowns ngaphandle kuka-Elias Pelembe ovaleleke eMozambique ngenxa yokuvalwa kwemingcele engena eNingizimu Afrika okwenzelwe ukulwa nokusabalala kweCovid-19. Ngaphandle kwalokhu kunabadlali abakwiWits asebevele besayine izinkontileka neSundowns okungunozinti uRichardo Goss, Hashim Domingo noGift Motupa.IZitshudeni, Sundowns, Baroka neCeltic kulindeleke ukuthi bahlolelwe iCovid-19, bangene emgonqweni ngoLwesihlanu.“Kuzoba wumdlalo onzima neSundowns kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi nathi sisesimeni esihle. Sisitholile isikhathi sokuziqeqesha. Sizobona enkundleni,” kusho uHunt.
title: UHunt usenethemba ngempi yokugcina

text: UKHALA ngamanzi ageleza emgwaqweni ekubeni ompompi sebalala ulwembu umphakathi wasoSindisweni, ngaseVerulam, othi sekuphele iminyaka ungenawo.UNksz Lungile Ndlovu osekomitini lomphakathi kule ndawo, uthe  bewumphakathi bayafisa ukuthola izimpendulo kuMasipala weTheku njengoba ithangi elikhulu eligcina amanzi elisendaweni ligcwele liphuphuma, amanzi asegeleza nasemigwaqweni kodwa namanje basathembele emanzini abawalethelwa ngamaloli.“Kwaqala kwathiwa isomiso, lokho kwakuqondakala ngoba sasihlasele izingxenye eziningi esifundazweni. Kodwa kamuva, izimvula ziyana kugcwele amadamu kangangoba ngisho lona ithangi eliphambi kwethu okumele lisiphakele ngamanzi emakhaya liyaphuphuma, kodwa amanzi dololo,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Uthe bazamile ukukhuluma nomasipala bewumphakathi ngodaba lwamanzi, kodwa waqale waveza ukuthi kufe injini, yakhandwa ngakho abasakwazi okuvimbe ukuthi amanzi engaphumi empompini esemakhaya.“Sesikhathele amanzi alethwa amaloli ngoba awahlanzekile ngokwanele.  Kunokuba amanzi athunyelwe emakhaya, umasipala uncamela ukuwabuka aphelele emgwaqweni futhi aphinde alimaze umgwaqo. Sicela umasipala usicacisele ngosekubambile ekutheni silungiselwe amanzi. Njengoba kuzovotwa, abaholi bazobe bengena belakanyana, befuna ukuvotelwa kodwa behluleka ukusilungisela inkinga yamanzi esekuphele iminyaka singenawo,” usho kanje.Uthe zonke izindawo ezikuWard 59 abale kuzo KwaMjoji, eKwazini, Thumbela, Nsimbini nase-Oakford, azinawo amanzi.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Mswawakhe Mayisela, uthe umasipala usezinhlelweni zokunweba isizinda sokuphakela amanzi kule ndawo ukuze ikwazi ukumelana nokukhula kwesibalo sabantu abakhele indawo yasoGunjini.“Ukuphakelwa kwamanzi endaweni yasoGunjini kuhamba kancane ngenxa yokukhula kwesibalo sabakhele indawo okwenza umasipala uhluleke ukufinyelela kwezinye izindawo. Ngaleyo ndlela, umasipala uphakela ngamanzi kuphela oGunjini 2 nasesibhedlela Osindisweni. Izindawo yasoGunjini 3 nasoGunjini 4 ziphakelwa ngamanzi kusetshenziswa amaloli ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akuphazamiseki isibhedlela ngokuphakelwa ngamanzi.” Uthe izakhamizi zizokwaziswa ngokunwetshwa kwesizinda samanzi endaweni ngendlela ngumasipala okholelwa ukuthi lokhu kuzosiza ukuxazulula inkinga yamanzi endaweni.
title: Bakhala ngamanzi 'angekho' bebona ezigelezela emgwaqweni

text:
NOKUBONGWA PHENYANEIZOQALA ngo-Okthoba 5 i
Big Brother Africa abalandeli bayo abaphoxeka ngesonto eledlule ngemuva kokuthi indlu obekuzohlalwa kuyo ishe yangqongqa.Emasontweni amabili adlule abakwa-Endemol nabakwaM-Net, okuyibo abadidiyela i
Big Brother, bamemezele ukuthi ngeke isaqala ngoSepthemba 7 ngenxa yomlilo.Lokhu kwaphoxa abalandeli abase beyilinde ngabomvu.UMichelle Esau, okhulumela abakwaMultichoice, uthe ngemuva kokuzikhandla bagcine beyitholile indlu okuzohlalwa kuyo ku-Big Brother.“Siyajabula ukusho ukuthi uhlelo luyaqhubeka ngeke lusaphinde luphazamiseke. indlu itholakale khona eGoli,” kusho UMichelle.Uthe ngemuva kokusha kwabhekwa ukuthi lolu hlelo luzoqoshwa kuphi njengoba kwase kuphuthuma.“Sibheke ngisho kwamanye amazwe phesheya kwezilwandle nase-Afrika kodwa sagcina singayitholanga kwaphoqa ukuthi sibuye eGoli,” kuchaza UMichelle.Uthe babonga bonke abalandeli bohlelo e-Afrika yonkana ngokubabekezelela.
title: IBig Brother Africa izoqala ngo-Okthoba 5
