text: UHAMBE nabangani bakhe engabikanga kunina umfana okusolwa ukuthi uminze ebhukuda nabangani bakhe emfuleni uMlaza ngeSonto.UNksz Fikile Phewa, ohlala kwaCutshwayo ngasezitolo eziningi KwaDesai, uthe akasenalo ithemba lokuthi indodana yakhe uNkanyiso Phewa (9) izotholakala isaphila.UNksz Phewa uthe uNkanyiso, obefunda uGrade 4 eNqobani Primary, uminze ngeSonto emini kade ebhukuda nabangani bakhe okuthiwa usuke nabo ekhaya bathi bayozingela kodwa bagcina sebebhukuda ngenxa yokuthi bekushisa.Uthe uNkanyiso nengane kadadewabo, uNtandoyenkosi Mthembu, ohlengwe esegwiliza, bebeqala ukuhamba nabanye abafana beyozingela eduze komfula.UNKANYISO Phewa okusolwa ukuthi uminze emfuleni uMlaza Isithombe: SITHUNYELWE“Uma kwenzekile bayobhukuda bebeya emfuleni oseduze kwasekhaya uCutshwayo. Lona ukude nasekhaya futhi kuyaziwa ukuthi unezinyoka eziyingozi. Ziningi izingane zabafana okuthiwa zike zaminza kuwo. Kusolwa ukuthi zidonswe yinyoka. Naye uNkanyiso ngisola ukuthi kwenzeke into enjalo ngoba abafana abebehlenga uNtandoyenkosi, bathi bambone ephakama kakhulu kanti mfishane amanzi abemgqiba uma emile. Bathi uphakame kakhulu maqede wacwila babona amanzi enyakaza kwangathi uhamba ngaphansi kwawo uza ngasedwaleni elisosebeni,” kusho uNksz Phewa.Umzala kaNksz Phewa, uNkk Nompumelelo Mthembu, obesele nezingane uthe uNkanyiso noNtandoyenkosi abazange bacele ukuhamba bavele banyamalala.“ Ngigcine ngikhuluma noNkanyiso engitshela ukuthi uphaqa wakhe uqhumile. Ngithe akagijime ayotshela umawakhe obesendleleni eyogibela eya ePinetown ukuthi amthengele abanye. Uphendule ngokuthi ngeke esabadinga ophaqa. Anginakanga ngaqhubeka nokuhlanza indlu. Ngemuva kwesikhashana ngacabanga ukuthi ake ngimbize ngimbuze ukuthi kungani ethi ngeke esabadinga ophaqa. Ngitshelwe yizingane ezincane ebezisegcekeni ukuthi baphume ngesango,” kusho uNkk Mthembu.Uthe akazi ukuthi kungani bekhethe ukuyozingela lapho bebezingela khona.“Uma ngibuza abafana ukuthi bafike kanjani esizibeni bathi abasakhumbuli kodwa baqale ukubhukuda enhla nawo umfula behla ngawo, kwaze kwabe uNtandoyenkosi noNkanyiso baba nenkinga. Bathi bahlenge uNtandoyenkosi obebonakala enenkinga kakhulu. Bathe uma bephenduka babona uNkanyiso ephakama maqede wacwila phakathi emanzini sengathi kukhona okumdonsayo,” kusho uNkk Mthembu.Izolo amalungu omphakathi nomndeni bebehleli osebeni lomfula bebukela amaphoyisa abehla enyuka emfuleni ebheka isidumbu sikaNkanyiso.UColonel Thembeka Mbhele, okhulumela amaphoyisa, uthe aqale ngeSonto ukubheka umfana okuthiwa uminzile kodwa ubengakatholakali izolo.
title: Umfana (9) kusolwa ukuthi uminze eMlaza

text: KUSHONE olwangoLwesihlanu kulilwa zinkalo zonke kudlula emhlaben isishoshovu somzabalazo, uMnuz Eric “Stalin” Mtshali.UMtshali (87), owake waklonyeliswa nge- Order of Mendi for Bravery in Silver, ushonele esibhedlela iNkosi Albert Luthuli Hospital eThekwini izolo ngemuva kokugula obesekumxine isikhathi eside.Leli qhawe lazalelwa eClermont, eThekwini, futhi lajoyina umzabalazo ngemuva kokuphothula isikole.Wayeyisishoshovu samalungelo abasebenzi, isosha loMkhonto weSizwe (MK) ngaphambi kokuba yilungu lePhalamende ngo-1994. Wayeqeqeshelwe ezempi nobunhloli eRussia naseCuba.Ngo-2014 uMtshali wahlonishwa ngokuthi kuqanjwe isikole samabanga aphezulu eWyebank ngegama lakhe. -ANA
title: Kushone isishoshovu somzabalazo

text: UKHALA ngokuhlukumezeka owesifazane waseDundee othi uqale washaywa wanaba ngobeyisoka ngaphambi kokuba amkhokhele uR100 000 athi wawutsheleka efuna ukuthenga imoto.Lo wesifazane (25) unovalo lokuthi iso lakhe ngeke lisabona kahle ngemuva kokushaywa kanzima ngobeyisoka lakhe abebenezinyanga ezintathu bethandana naye.Ucele ukungadalulwa igama ngoba esaba ukuthi akaphephile ngoba esanda kuthola uR730 000 kwiRoad Accident Fund.Obeyisoka kuthiwa uthenge iBMW X5 ka-2010.“Ucingo ubengasalubambi. Ngaya kubo nabazala bami besifazane ngiyocela imali. Wangibhaxabula waze wangibhuquzisa phansi. Wangigxoba nomlenze engalimala kuwo ngesikhathi ngivelelwa yingozi yemoto ngo-2014. Kumanje angazi noma ngizobuyela yini esimeni njengoba iso nomlenze kulimele,” kusho lo wesifazane.Uthe kumanje usaba nokuphuma endlini ngoba akazi ukuthi uphephile yini emuva kokushaywa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi owesifazane uvule icala lokushaywa “yisoka” lakhe.Uphinde waqinisekisa ukuthi nowesilisa uvule icala lokushaywa owesifazane.Lo wesilisa usebenza kuMasipala waseMzinyathi naye ngeke adalulwe ngoba akakaveli enkantolo. Uthe “intombi” imhlasele ebusuku futhi nemali uyikhokhele.“Owesifazane ebesinenyanga sithandana naye wazicelela ukungiboleka uR100 000 wathi ngingamkhokhela ngoR5000 ize iphelele imali yakhe. Savumelana kahle wangifakela imali. Imoto kwaqondana ukuba ngiyithenge ngesikhathi esifanayo. Angiyithenganga ngemali yakhe ngoba sengimbuyiselile nje yona,” kusho lo wesilisa.Uthe lo wesifazane ugasele ngo-2 entathakusa ngoMsombuluko endlini yakhe, enentombi yakhe yeminyaka.Uthe intombi yayisikade imalile ngeSonto ngoba imphoqa ukuthi ahlukane nale intombi yakhe ngoba isimboleke uR100 000.“Ngicabanga ukuthi wacikwa wukuthi ngiyenqaba ukuhlukana nentombi yami njengoba wayesezofuna imali yakhe,” kusho lo wesilisa.Uqhube wathi yafika endlini nabazala bakhe bebukhile, bamushaya bathatha nokhiye wemoto yakhe.Uthe okwenzekakwamhlukumeza kakhulu futhi akasayifuni nalapho ihambe khona le ntombi.“Ngiyasola ukuthi inhloso yakhe wayefuna ukungiphoxa emsebenzini, efuna nokuthi ngixoshwe ngecala lokushaya ngoba wafika endlini ezongihlukumeza,” kusho lo wesilisa.Yize eyibuyisile imali kodwa lo wesifazane uthi ufuna icala liye enkantolo ukuze ajeza ngokumhlukumeza.
title: Ushaywe ‘yisoka’ efuna uR100 000

text: IKWAZULU-NATAL neMpumalanga yizona izifundazwe eziphoxile ngokungezi kahle ekulweni nobugebengu ngesikhathi samaholidi kaKhisimusi.Lokhu kushiwo wuNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Bheki Cele, esithangamini sabezindaba eThekwini izolo.UCele uthe uyancomeka umsebenzi wamaphoyisa wokulwa nobugebengu njengoba kuboshwe abantu abangu-84 000 ngesikhathi samaholidi.“Wonke amaphoyisa abesebenza futhi nasemphakathini abebonakala. Lokho kusisizile ukuba sikwazi ukwehlisa isibalo sabantu ababulewe ngesikhathi samaholidi uma uqhathanisa namaholidi ango-2018. Zonke izifundazwe zisebenze kanzima zenza kahle ngaphandle kwe-KZN naseMpumalanga. Kusamele benze kangcono,” kusho uCele.Ebuzwa ngokuthi inkinga ebhekene neKZN neMpumalanga iyiphi, akazange aphumele obala njengoba ethe izinombolo eziqondile ezithinta izibalo zobugebengu zisazovezelwa umphakathi.“Akukho okuningi engingakusho ngaphandle kokuthi lezi zifundazwe, iKZN neMpumalanga, kulo mbandela obubekelwe zonke izifundazwe bona bahlulekile,” kusho uCele.Ukhale kakhulu ngotshwala wathi yibona obunomthelela omkhulu wokuba kube nezigameko zobugebengu.“Sihambele amabhishi sabuvala utshwala nesikholelwa wukuthi kulekelele ekutheni kwehle izigameko zobugebengu ngamaholidi.Yingakho sivale namathaveni angekho emthethweni angu-6 124, kulawo angu-2 000 siwavale e-Eastern Cape,” kusho uCele.Phakathi kwabantu ababoshiwe abangu-84 000, abangu-173 ababededelwe ngoshwele emajele.Ababoshelwe ukushayela bephuzile babe ngu-24 827. Uthe lesi sibalo sikhule ngo-4 000 uma kuqhathaniswa namaholidi ka-2018.Uthe kunezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni ezithathwe ngamaphoyisa ezingu 4831, ngesikhathi samaholidi.Uthe zizohlolwa zonke ukuthi azikaze zisetshenziswe ekwenzeni amacala.UCele uthe babopha abokufika kuleli abangenazo izimvume abangaphezukuka-223 ngesikhathi esingamahora amabili kuphela, olwandle.“Kuyashaqisa ukuthi kukhona abantu abazihambelayo nje kuleli bengenamvume. Lokhu kumele sikunqande,” kusho uCele.Uthe bayazi ngesimo sodlame lwamatekisi eKZN kanti basebenza kanzima ukuluxazulula. Uthe okuhle wukuthi bayabopha izinkabi nalabo abasuke bezithumile kwezinye izigameko.UCele uncome amaphoyisa ashiya imindeni yawo yodwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ayasebenza ukuze izwe lizophepha.
title: 'IMpumalanga neKZN bahlulekile'

text:
NONHLANHLA MKHABELAWETHEMBISA ulozolo lodwa ku-albhamu yakhe ezophuma maduzane umculi waseThekwini owazakhela udumo ohlelweni lomncintiswano womculo ama-
Idols SA.ULloyd Cele uthe umatasatasa upheka i-albhamu ethi 
Shades Of Grey ezophuma ngasekupheleni kukaJulayi noma ekuqaleni kuka-Agasti.Uthe le albhamu uyiqophe ngokuhlanganyela namaciko ehlukene okuyiSoweto Gospel Choir, Brian Themba, Drakensburg Boys’ Choir, DJ Tira noFisherman.“Ngihlanganise izigqi eziningi ezahlukene kule albhamu yingakho ngiyiphe nesihloko i
Shades Of Grey ngoba asikho isigqi esisodwa ongasipha yona. Ngifake umculo engaziwa ngawo we-R&B, i-pop enesigqi esidansisayo, umculo wokholo. Kuzophuma into emnandi kunayo yonke esengike ngayenza phambilini,” usho kanje.Uthe ingoma ayenze neDrakensburg Boys’Choir uyibhalele ukuhlonipha umengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu wakuleli uNelson Mandela.“Ngiveza ukuthi uMandela ubaluleke kangakanani kimina, amagalelo akhe ekukhululeni izwe nokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni kungithinte kanjani,” kusho uLloyd.Uthe ingoma ayenze ngokuhlanganyela neSoweto Gospel Choir esihloko sithi 
Hold On To The Light yona yingoma yokubuyisa ithemba kubantu.Ukuyibhala uthe usizwe ngumbhali nomdidiyeli womculo waseNew York uCurtis Richardson oseke wabhalela abaculi okubalwa kubona uJennifer Lopez, Rihanna, Deborah Cox, Joss Stone nabanye abaningi.“Ngihlangene naye ngenkathi ngihlanganisa i-albhamu yami yesibili i
No Limits njengoba i-video yenye yezingoma zayo i
Hero yenzelwe khona. Wangisiza kakhulu kuleyo albhamu yingakho nginqume ukumcela angisize nakulena.”ULloyd uqokwe eqoqweni leBest Creative Album emiklomelweni eyenziwa yiSouth African Music Rights Organisation ebizwa ngeWawela Music Awards ezoba ngenyanga ezayo.“Kungijabulisile ukuqokwa kwami kule miklomelo ngoba kukhomba ukuthi ubuciko engibukhombisayo uma ngihlanganisa ama-albhamu ami sebuyabonakala,” usho kanje.Kwi-albhamu i
No Limits uLloyd usebenze noDJ Fresh, DJ Euphonik, AKA noSasha P ongumrepha waseNigeria.Ngayo waqokelwa iBest Pop Album, Song of The Year ngengoma i
Hero neBest Collaboration nge
Louder ayenza noDJ Fresh, Euphonik noSlikour kuma-Sama.Eyokuqala i-
One wahlabana ngayo iBest Pop Album, waqokelwa iSong of The Year ngengoma i
Make it Easy neBest Collaboration ngengoma ayicula noLoyiso Bala ethi 
Thando.ULloyd uthe uzobe enandisa emdlalweni wamaBhokobhoko neWales oyingxenye yeCastle Lager Incoming Series okusasa eGrowthpoint Kings Park Stadium, eThekwini.
title: ULloyd ne-albhamu ehlanganise izigqi

text: BAZODELISANA inkani eringini yesibhakela ngoMgqibelo eNkosi Albert Luthuli ICC, eThekwini, osaziwayo asebezakhele igama emidlalweni ewuchungechunge iGenerations: The Legacy noMuvhango.UGabriel Temudzani odlala indawo kaChief Azwindini noVuyo Dabula odlala indawo kaGadaffi kuGenerations bazohlangana eringini ukuvuselela uthando lomdlalo wesibhakela kubantu.NgoMgqibelo kuzoba nomcimbi wama South African Boxing Awards (SABA) okuzonikezwa kuwo izindondo abadlali besibhakela abenze kahle.Ngokusho kwabahleli bomcimbi, umdlalo wesibhakela yinto engasanakiwe futhi ebingasakhonjiswa kakhulu ngisho nakuthelevishini.“Silethe labo saziwayo ukuze abantu bakhuthazeke babone ukuthi umdlalo wesibhakela usekhona futhi usathathelwa phezulu kakhulu. Kulo nyaka sizobe sigubha iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili. Sifuna ukubanga umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba isiqubulo sithi “#BoxingIsBack,” okusho ukuthi isibhakela sibuyile,” kusho umgqugquzele weSABA, uTsholo Lejaka .Uthe abalingisi benze konke okwenziwa ngabashayi-sibhakela abasezingeni lomhlaba kuleli naphesheya uma bezilungiselela izimpi ezinkulu.“Sibaqeqesha ngempela njengoba kwenza abadlali besibhakela. Bangenile ngisho esikalini ukuze kubonakale ukuthi imizimba yabo ikulungele yini ukungena enkundleni yesibhakela,” kuchaza uTsholo.Uthe abalingisi kade beqeqeshwa womakadebona esibhakeleni uJan Bergman noDingaan Thobela.UTsholo uthe uThobela uqeqeqesha uGabriel kanti uJan Bergman yena uqeqesha uVuyo.“Abantu abafike ngobuningi bezobona abalingisi bebambene enkundleni imizuliswano emibili. Konke okuzobe kwenzeka emcimbini kuzokhonjiswa bukhoma kuSABC 2 ngo-9.30,” kusho uTsholo.Uthe bafihle induku emqubeni mayelana nezinto ezizobe zenzeka njengokuthi nje kukhona abanye abalingisi besifazane abazobe nabo beshaya iqupha.“Baqale namhlanje nabo ukuzilungiselela. Nabo bazojima benze konke ukuze bangene enkundleni bekulungele ukuba kuyo. Ngeke siwasho kodwa amagama abo ukuthi bangobani, bazobonakala emcimbini omkhulu” kusho uTsholo.
title: Wuqhude manikiniki kubalingisi abaziwayo

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIUSAQHUBEKA nokupheka ethulula ngenhloso yokuphuma nenqanawe yesikimu umqeqeshi weCell C Sharks, uGary Gold owenze izinguquko ezimbili eqenjini azobhekana ngalo neVodacom Bulls.Lo mdlalo weVodacom Super Rugby ukusasa ngo-5.05pm eLoftus Stadium, ePitoli.Kusukela efikile kuSharks ulokhu esishintshe njalo isikimu uGold kodwa kwesinye isikhathi ubuye aphazanyiswe ukulimala kwabadlali abamqoka njengoba kwenzekile koTendai “Beast” Mtawarira emdlalweni wokuqala.Kubadlali abebesenkundleni iSharks inqoba ngo 29-12 ku-Emirates Lions babili kuphela abazoqala oweBulls abebengekho eGrowthPoint Kings Park, ngempelasonto edlule. Laba ngo-Andre Esterhuizen, osemncane futhi owondlekile, noRyan Kankowski ongumdlali omdala weSharks kodwa okade edlala eJapan wabuyiswa.Nakuba kujabulisa ukubonakala kuka-Esterhuizen kubathandi beSharks ngomfutho azoza nawo maphakathi nenkundla kodwa kungenzeka lo mdlali ashenxe ngelizayo uma Oshaka sebebhekene neDHL Stormers eKapa ngoba kuzobe sekufike uFrancois Steyn naye obuya eJapan. UKankowski ungene endaweni kaTera Mtembu.“Okwami ukuphuma nesikimu esiqinile ngaso sonke isikhathi. Ngihlale njalo ngibeka phambili okuzosenza sinqobe. Sidlala neqembu okungadingi ukuchazwa ukuthi linzima kangakanani ikakhulukazi ekhaya. Sizimisele ngokubuya nomphumela ovuna thina,” usho kanje uGold.Isiyonke imidlalo yeVodacom Super Rugby kule mpelasonto imi kanje:Namuhla:Highlanders vs Reds (Forsyth Barr, 8.35am); Force vs Hurricanes (nib Stadium, 1pm); Cheetahs vs Blues (Free State Stadium, 7.10pm).Kusasa:Chiefs vs Crusaders (Waikato Stadium, 8.35am); Rebels vs Brumbies (AAMI Park, 10.40am); Bulls vs Sharks (Loftus Versfeld, 5.05pm); Lions vs Stormers (Emirates Airlines Park, 7.10).
title: UGold usaqhubeka nokupheka ethulula

text: ZIDINWE zigane unwabu izikhulu zakwaPrasa ngokwebiwa kwesitimela KwaZulu-Natal esishayelwe izigebengu ibanga elingamakhilomitha awu-12. Ngempelasonto izigebengu ezimbili zishiye onogada benkemile ngesikhathi zintshontsha isitimela esiteshini saseMkhomazi.Kubikwa ukuthi lezi zigebengu zishayele lesi sitimela zaze zayosimisa eMgababa lapho ezehle khona zacela empunzini zingena ehlathini eliseduzane zijahwa onogada. Ngokusho komsebenzi ocele ukungadalulwa, lesi sitimela besimiswe ukuphelelwa umfutho endaweni enyukelayo.Omunye umsebenzi wakwaPrasa obesebenza kujantshi ngesikhathi sesigameko, uzwakalise ukwethuka enkundleni yokuxhumana, esola abadla iwunga ngalokhu."Bengicabanga ukuthi sengikubone konke emsebenzini wami, kanti cha. Ngesikhathi simatasa sisebenza kwezinye izitimela, abadli bezidakamizwa ababili bantshontshe esinye sezitimela basiqhuba besisusa eMkhomazi bayosifikisa eMgababa. Cabanga nje, ubunzima bokusidumisa, ukudedela amabhreki, ukuqokelela ivacuum ngaphambi kokuthi sisuke sihambe," kusho lo mthombo.Okhulumela abakwaPrasa uZama Nomnganga uthe, abazimisele ngokuveza imininingwane eminingi ngalolu daba ngoba kusenziwa uphenyo. UNomnganga uthe isitimela besiduma ngesikhathi laba ababili benquma ukusithatha."Lokhu abakwenzile bekunobudedengu ngoba bekugenzeka noma yini kubona. Bebengashayisana nesinye isitimela noma babulale abantu," kusho yena.Uthe lokhu kufaka imibuzo ekhathazayo ngezokuphepha."Abaqhubi bethu bezitimela bagqoka umfaniswano oluhlaza nokumhlophe. Sizonxusa ukuba bonke bagqoke imifaniswano yabo enombhalo wamagama abo ukuze kube lula ukubabona," kusho yena.
title: Kusolwa amaphara 'ngokudunwa' kwesitimela eMkhomazi

text: BUHLALE obala ubudedengu bamaphoyisa ngesikhathi ufakazi oyiphoyisa ecaleni lokubulawa kwabantu ehostela laseGlebelands evuma eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngoLwesithathu ukuthi benza amaphutha ngesikhathi beqoqa ubufakazi kwesinye sezigameko.Isigameko, ufakazi u-Constable Mthokozisi Sishi avumile ukuthi benza amaphutha kuso, esokuzama ukubulala abantu abane esithinta ummangalelwa wokuqala kuphela uSergeant Bhekukwazi Mdweshu ngo-Agasti 19, 2014.Okunye okuvelile ukuthi amaphoyisa aseMlaza angaqeqeshiwe ukuphenya ezehlakalweni zobugebengu, athatha amagobolondo ezinhlamvu kulesi sehlakalo.Inkantolo iphinde yezwa ubufakazi obuthi amaphoyisa aseMlaza adukisa uzakwabo * -Constable Mthokozisi Sishi owayesuka eThekwini onguchwepheshe ekuphenyeni ezehlakalweni zobugebengu, amtshela ukuthi isigameko senzeke ngaphambi kwehora efikile ngo-Agasti 20, kanti empeleni sabe senzeke ngayizolo ebusuku.USishi uvumile phambi kwenkantolo ukuthi amaphoyisa aseMlaza kwakungafanele athathe amagobolondo ezinhlamvu.Inkantolo iphinde yezwa ubufakazi obuthi imininingwane eyaqoqwa nguSishi mayelana nalesi sigameko ngo-2014, isadukile.Umbuso ububize uSishi ukuze azothula ubufakazi mayelana ne-DNA yegazi okusolakala ukuthi ngelikaMdweshu. Umbuso usola ukuthi uMdweshu walimala naye ngesikhathi ehlasela izisulu.USishi ubezokhuluma ngebhodlela lamafutha okuthiwa labe linamachaphazelo egazi okusolakala ukuthi ngelikaMdweshu elatholakala endaweni yesehlakalo.Ummeli kaMdweshu, * -Adv Martin Krog ubuhlabe wabuhlikiza lobufakazi bukaSishi wathi abukhombisi ukuthi isithombe saleli bhodlela sathathwa kuphi.Uthe lesi sithombe sasingathathwa noma ikuphi.“Mnuz Sishi bengilindele ukuthi wenze kangcono, uma ushutha isithombe sikhombise okuthile okukhomba ukuthi sithathwe ehostela endaweni yesehlakalo, lesi sithombe akukho okukhombisa ukuthi sithathwe kuphi,” kusho uKrog.Kuleli cala lokuzama ukubulala, uMdweshu usolwa ngokubulala uMnuz Bongani Mthembu, Mnuz William Mthembu, Mnuz Mandlakayise Gyanthi noMnuz Lucas Mbekelwa.UKrog ubuze uSishi ukuthi zazingaki izindawo ezinegazi endaweni yesehlakalo, waphendula ngokuthi zaziningi.Waqhubeka wambuza ukuthi kungani athatha ubufakazi begazi endaweni eyodwa, wathi abaseshi abathi akathathe lapho athatha khona ngoba ilapho kwakumi ngakhona umsolwa ngesikhathi edubula izisulu.Izolo inkantolo ibize ofakazi ababili, uSishi noConstable Sithembisile Thabethe naye owethule ubufakazi ngezinye zezigameko ezenzeka eGlebelands aziphenya.UConstable Thabethe naye wayebizwe ukuze azoqoqa ubufakzi esehlakalweni sokubulawa kukaMnuz Siniko Ncayiyana ngo-Mashi 27, 2015. Icala liyaqhubeka.
title: Iphoyisa livume amaphutha kwelaseGlebe

text: UNOZINTI weMamelodi Sundowns, uDennis Onyango, uvikela abagadli beqembu esomisweni samagoli esihlasele eChloorkop.ISundowns ikhishwe kabuhlungu kwi-CAF Champions League yiHoroya yase-Guinea emdlalweni obekufanele iwuwine ukuze idlulele esigabeni sama-quarterfinal. Igcine ihlulekile ukushaya igoli phezu kwendathane yamathuba ewakhile.Kwi-Absa Premiership isashaye amagoli amathathu emidlalweni emithathu okungamaphenathi amabili kaRicardo Nascimento nelikaLebohang Maboe alishaye behlula iPolokwane City ngo 2-0. Ngempelasonto edlule ihlulwe yiCape Town City ngo 1-0 emlenzeni wokuqala wowandulela owamanqamu weMTN 8 eKapa.“Ngicabanga ukuthi kufanele abagadli sibasize nathi emuva sibanike amabhola amaningi. Lokhu kubhekene neqembu lonke, asikwazi ukubagxeka ngoba ngabe sihlukanisa phakathi iqembu. Uma umdlali wasemuva ethola ithuba naye angalishaya igoli. Umsebenzi awuhlezi emahlombe abagadli kodwa useqenjini lonke.“Iqembu lifuna ukubumbana ukuze lithole imiphumela. Mhlwumbe amaqembu esidlala nawo aqine kakhulu emuva yingakho singawashayi amagoli. Kodwa sidinga ukubeseka abagadli bethu futhi sidinga ukuthola isixazululo enkingeni yamagoli. Ngicabanga ukuthi akukubi kangako kodwa inkinga wukuthi sihlulwa ngamathuba,” kusho u-Onyango.Umqeqeshi weSundowns, uPitso Mosimane, usanda kuveza ukuthi akakhathazekile ngenkinga yokugqoza kwamagoli ngoba bayawakha amathuba, wathi angaqala ukubona ukuthi banenkinga uma bengasawakhi. Kulezi zinsuku kumnyama kubadlali beSundowns abajwayele ukuyishayela amagoli okukhona kubona uSibusiso Vilakazi, Themba Zwane nabanye.Nokho kuzofanele amaBrazilians ashintshe ukwenza uma ezimisele ukudlulela kowamqamu weMTN 8. Azokwamukela i-The Citizens kowomlenze wesibili eLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli, ngeSonto ngo-3 ntambama.Uma iSundowns ihlulekile ukushaya igoli kungasho ukuphuma emiqhudelwaneni emibili ngesonto elilodwa.Ngakolunye uhlangothi iCity, eqeqeshwa nguBenni McCarthy, iyishaya iphindelela inethi kulezi zinsuku. Maphakathi nesonto kowePremiership, ibuye seliyozilahla kunina ibambana ngo 2-2 neFree State Stars.“Likhona ithuba lokudlulela phambili kodwa lo mdlalo siwubuka ngokuthi usekhefini, bahamba phambili. Sinethemba kowomlenze wesibili. Lena yindebe esingakaze siyiwine siyiqembu, nami angikaze ngiyiwine. Ngiwubheke ngabomvu umdlalo ngeSonto. Asikwazi ukugxila emphumeleni weChampions League kodwa kufanele sakhele kuwona siqhubekele phambili. Sidlala neqembu elihle elinabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu. Ngethemba ukuthi sizodlala kahle ngeSonto,” kusho u-Onyango.
title: ‘Ukushaya amagoli okweqembu lonke’

text: I-DA esiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal yenze izinguquko eziholele ekutheni lowo owake waba ngumholi wale nhlangano esifundazweni, uMnuz Sizwe Mchunu, akhishwe ekomitini lehhovisi likaNdunankulu.UMchunu usefakwe ekomitini loMnyango wezemiSebenzi yoMphakathi endaweni yakhe kwangena uMnuz Francois Rodgers.URodgers ohola leli qembu esiShayamthetho usefakwe ekomitini obekukhona kulo uMchunu.URodgers wakhethwa ngaphandle kokuphikiswa esikhundleni sokuhola leli qembu esiShayamthetho.Ezinye izinguquko, uNksz Mbali Ntuli ukhishiwe ekomitini lezeMfundo kwafakwa uDkt Rishigen Virana.UNksz Ntuli usejutshwe ekomitini lezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi obekukhona kulo uVirana.UMnuz Hlanganani Gumbi ungene ekomitini lezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu obekukhona kulo uMnuz George Mari osefakwe ekomitini lezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu.Umholi we-DA KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango ubukeka engakazimiseli ngokusuka eThekwini njengoba engathinteki ezinguqukweni zeqembu lakhe esiShayamthetho.Ngokujwayelekile umholi weqembu uba sesiShayamthetho njengoba kade kwenza uMchunu.Engxoxweni neSolezwe uMncwango wathi ngeke ahambe eThekwini ashiye izinto zisemapeketwane."Kuningi okungahambi kahle eThekwini, uma ngingahamba umkhandlu ungashayeka phansi. Ngisazoqhubeka nokuhlala khona ngiyohamba ngoba sengibona ukuthi izinto sezihamba kahle,” kusho uMncwango.UNksz Ntuli okhulumela iqembu esiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal uthe inhloso yalezi zinguquko ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi iqembu limeleleke kahle esiShayamthetho.“Uyazi ukuthi iqembu selinobuholi obusha obusanda kukhethwa, ukushintsha kobuholi kuza nezinguquko eziningi,” kusho uNksz Ntuli.Uthe isizathu esidale ukuthi uRodgers afakwe ekomitini lehhovisi likaNdunankulu wukuthi nguyena osehola iqembu esiShayamthetho.“UMchunu ubekuleli komiti ngoba kade engumholi weqembu,” kusho uNksz Ntuli.UNksz Ntuli uthe ngoMsombuluko bazoba ne-rally eMgungundlovu lapho bezokwethula khona izinhlelo zabo ezingaguqula isimo sesifundazwe ngaphambi kokuthi uNdunankulu uMnuz Willies Mchunu ethule inkulumo yakhe yesimo sesifundazwe.
title: Izinguquko ezenziwe yiDA eKZN

text: ISHIYWA yisitobha esibalulekile iMamelodi Sundowns esethubeni lokudla izicoco ezintathu ngaphambi kokuphela kuka-2018.ISundowns ingase idle iNedbank Cup, isicoco se-Absa Premiership neCaf Champions League esidlulele esigabeni samaqoqo kuyona. Leli phephandaba lithole ukuthi iSundowns izoqala isizini ka-2018/2019 ngaphandle komdlali wasemuva, * -Anele Ngcongca, ophindela eBelgium okuyilapho edlale khona iminyaka ngaphambi kokujoyina AmaBrazilians.UNgcongca ofike ngesizini edlule kwiDowns ubeseqala ukuyithola indawo esikimini somqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane ngemuva kokuhlulwa wukulimala.Ushaye into ecokeme iSundowns ihlula iLamontville Golden Arrows ngo 1-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngoLwesibili eLoftus Versfeld. Emuva komdlalo uMosimane uthe ubone uNgcongca amaziyo, owakhishelwa imali yiSundowns.Umthombo weSolezwe okwiSundowns ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uNgcongca ubuyela eBelgium ekupheleni kwesizini. Uzojoyina iCercle Brugge esanda kunyuselwa kwiligi enkulu yakuleliya lizwe. Iqeqeshwa nguFrank Vercauteren obekade eqeqesha uNgcongca kwiGenk kumasizini adlule.“UNgcongca usevumile ukubuyela eBelgium. Ufunwa ngumqeqeshi obekade esebenza naye kwiGenk. ISundowns useyitshelile futhi angiboni kukhona okuzomvimba. Izingxoxo phakathi kwamaqembu womabili ziyaqhubeka. Angiboni iSundowns izomvimba kwazise iBrugge ifuna ukumthenga,” kusho umthombo.UNgcongca umiswe kabi nguThapelo Morena emuva kwesokudla. Ungomunye wabadlali ababhaliswe yileli qembu kwiChampions League.UNgcongca uvumile ukuthi uyakhuluma neBrugge.“Ngingumuntu okhuluma iqiniso. Ngiyakhuluma neCercle Brugge, ngiyakhuluma nomqeqeshi kodwa ngisenenkontileka. Ungibuzile ukuthi isimo sami simi kanjani, ngamtshela ukuthi ngisalelwe wunyaka onombandela. Kodwa sizokhuluma ekupheleni kwesizini. Angikwazi ukusho manje ukuthi ngizohamba. Kuzoncika kwimenenja yami neqembu. Sizobona ekupheleni kwesizini. Okwamanje kufanele ngigxile kwiSundowns sekusele imidlalo embalwa, kufanele ngizame ukusiza iqembu, siwine iNedbank Cup neligi,” kusho uNgcongca.“IBelgium iyikhaya lami lesibili, ngazi wonke amakhona akhona. Ngeke ngisho ukuthi ngeke ngibuyele khona kodwa kuzocaca ekupheleni kwesizini ukuthi umqondo wami ungitshela ukuthini nokuthi laba bobabili (umqeqeshi neBrugge) bavumelane neSundowns. Ngikujabulele ukudlala eBelgium, ngeke ngikhononde ngayo ngoba ngiyithanda kakhulu. Kodwa sizobona ekupheleni kwesizini.”ISundowns ihlalelwe wumthwalo wokubhekana neMaritzburg United emidlalweni emibili ilandelana. NgeSonto la maqembu azodudulana kowandulela owamanqamu weNedbank Cup eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu ngo-3 ntambama. NgoLwesithathu abhekane koweligi.“Sibhekene neqembu elinzima enkundleni yalo, ngeke kube lula. Kodwa sinabadlali abaningi abasezingeni eliphezulu nabanamava. Lokho kufanele kusisebenzele,” kusho uNgcongca.
title: UNgcongca ezingxoxweni zokubuyela eBelgium

text: Uthi iminjunju edalwe wukungahambi kahle kwezinto kuwo wonke amasoka abe nawo muva nje, mikhulu kakhulu futhi iyaqaqamba.Noma kunjalo kodwa uMshoza uthe ngeke axabane nabantu asedlule kubo, kunalokho uzimisele ngokuvuselela uthando nokwakha uxolo namasoka akhe asehlukene nawo.UMshoza usho kanje kulandela izinkulumo zokuthi usebuyelene nobengumyeni wakhe nongusomabhizinisi waseBergville uThuthukani Mvula.Laba bobabili kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi bahlukana kabuhlungu uMvula esabalalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi uMshoza uyaphinga.UMshoza uthe sebedlule kulezo zingxabano bayaxoxa ngezinto eziphusile noMvula.“Ngiwumuntu wothando, angithandi ukuhlala ngokuxabana nabantu. Yingakho ngisakhuluma naye, asinankinga sikhuluma njengabantu abadala.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi sesibuyelene kodwa siyaxoxa kahle,” kusho uMshoza.Eqhuba uthe usakuthola kusenzima ukwamukela ukuphuphunyelwa yisisu kodwa noma kunjalo akazisoli ngesinqumo sokuhlukana nomdlali wasemuva kwiMamelodi Sundowns * -Anele Ngcongca.“Ngihlukene no-Anele ngoba ngifuna isikhathi sokubhekana nami, nezingane zami, umculo namabhizinisi engiwaqalayo.“Angixabene kodwa naye sizokhuluma uma kufanele ngoba akumele sibe yizitha kade sihlanganiswe uthando.“Kuningi engikwenzayo njengamanje okuzongenza ngigxile kukhona ngaphandle kokujaha uthando nokuthandwa abanye abantu. Ukuphuphunyelwa isisu kungihlukumeze kakhulu kodwa ngiyazi ngoNkulunkulu kuzodlula.“Mhlawumbe ngizokwazi ukukhuluma ngakho ngelinye ilanga,” kusho uMshoza.Uphinde wakuqinisekisa ukuthi uzokhipha ingoma entsha ngesonto elizayo.Le ngoma uthe ikhuluma ngothando lomuntu wesilisa okwazi ukumela umuntu wesifazane noma izitha zizama ukuluchitha uthando lwabo.“Ingoma yothando ekhuluma ngomuntu ongithandayo nongangifela. Into engenze ngabhala ngothando ukufuna ukuveza amandla othando kubantu ababili abasuke bethandana ngokweqiniso,” kusho uMshoza. Lo mculi kulo nyaka ugubha neminyaka engu-20 angena embonini yomculo.Yize kunjalo akakaze ahlonishwe njengoba engowesifazane wokuqala ngqa ukwenza ikwaito ngama-90’s nokuyinto athi ngeke isamsiza ngalutho uma eseshonile.“Baningi abantu abafana nami, njengo-Arthur Mafokate uphakamise abaculi abaningi kodwa akanikezwa lutho.“Sesijwayele samukela uthando lwabalandeli nokuthengwa komculo wethu ngoba ngeke kungenzele lutho ukuhlonishwa sengishonile,” kusho uMshoza.
title: UMshoza uphika eyokubuyela kumyeni

text: ‘UKUBE ngaphiwa ukucula bengizoqhubeka lapho agcina khona umyeni wami kodwa bekumele ngisebenzise ukubhala ukuze igama lakhe lingafi.”Lawa ngamazwi kaNkk Ayanda Ncwane ongumfelokazi obegane umculi wowokholo uSfiso Ncwane, osekhiphe incwadi ekhuluma ngempilo yabo.Le ncwadi esihloko sithi For The Love Of Sfiso Ncwane ikhuluma ngokukhula kwabo nempilo yasemshadweni neyodumo. UNkk Ncwane uthe usebenzise isikhathi sokuzila kwakhe ukuhlanganisa le ncwadi, aveza kuyo ngisho obekungaziwa ngomyeni wakhe.“Ngikhethe ukusebenzisa isiphiwo uNkulunkulu angiphe sona ukuqinisekisa ukuthi nezizukulwane ezizayo ziyazi ukuthi kwake kwaba noSfiso Ncwane. Ngikhethe ukubhala incwadi ngiqhubeke nemicimbi ebesivele siyenza naye, ngikhiphe nomsebenzi wakhe ahambe engakawukhiphi. Incwadi ikhuluma ngempilo yethu, izinto esidlule kuzona nempumelelo yethu,” echaza.Uveze ukuthi kwakuyinhloso yakhe noNcwane ukukhipha incwadi uma sebehlanganisa iminyaka engu-10 beshadile, obekuwunyaka odlule.“Inhloso bekuwukuthi sizokhipha ebesingakaze sikuveze ngempilo yethu ngoba abanye babona kumnandi sesishadile bengazi ukuthi sidlulephi ukusiza abanye abashadile abasebancane. Ngebhadi akwenzekanga kodwa kwasala ijoka lokuthi ngiqhubeke nokubhala incwadi futhi ngakufaka nalokhu esasivumelene ngakho noNcwane,” kusho yena.UNkk Ncwane okusahlengezela izinyembezi uma ekhuluma ngokushona komyeni wakhe, uthe akalufisi usuku lwangoDisemab 5 okwashona ngalo umyeni wakhe ngo-2016. Njengoba sekusele amasonto ambalwa kufike lolu suku, uthe uyabikelwa ngoba akuvumi ludlule. Ngonyaka odlule uthe walala usuku lonke ezivalele endlini, ekhaliswa nayimiyalezo abeyithunyelwa ngabantu bemduduza. Namanje akanazo izinhlelo ngalolu suku, athe ugubha kuphela usuku lokuzalwa lukamyeni wakhe.Ekhuluma ngokuzila kwakhe nezinkulumo ezisuke emuva kokushona komyeni wakhe, uthe yizona ezimenze wabhala incwadi. Uthe yize abanye bebemgxeka kodwa ubengeke azivalele endlini unomphelo kodwa bekumele aqhubeke nomsebenzi futhi unesiqiseko sokuthi nomyeni wakhe uyajabula ngalokho.“Sengiphila izimpilo ezimbili ngoba phambi kwabantu kumele ngiziqinise ngimamatheke ngisebenze ukuze kuphile abantu abathembele kimina. Nginezingane ezimbili okumele ngizondle, obekungeke kungisize ukuhlala ngikhala,” kusho yena.Uthe ayikho indlela ewumgomo yokuzila futhi asikho isikhathi lapho kuphola khona. Lokhu kumenze ukuthi ahlangane nabanye abafelokazi abasebancane ikakhulukazi emakhaya. Uveze ukuthi abafelokazi bayehlulelwa futhi bayahlukunyezwa ngisho emabandleni nasemindenini yabo. Incwadi isiyatholakala e-Exclusive Books naku-Amazon kanti uhlela nokuyethula ngokusemthethweni maduze. Okumjabulisayo ukuthi indodana yakhe endala ithanda ibhizinisi lomculo bese kuthi encane ikhonze ukucula, athe kumnika ithemba lokuthi ngeke lishabalale igama likaSfiso.
title: UmkaNcwane uchaza ngokubhala incwadi ngempilo yabo

text: OWESIFAZANE waseMtshezi, uNksz Nokulunga Valentia Mbanjwa ubaqwaqwade bonke abadayisi basemgwaqweni emcimbini wokugqokiswa kwamajazi emfundo ephakame obuseGarden Court, eSouth Beach eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu. UNksz Mbanjwa (21), obephothula izifundo zeNew Venture Creation e-Egsibit Training, uklonyeliswe ngendondo yeBest Performing Student.Le ntokazi, egobe amadlangala eReservoir Hills, eThekwini, ithe yona idayisa emgwaqweni waseThekwini uMansel. “Ngifunde lukhulu ngokuphathwa kwebhizinisi ngendlela nokuthi imali yongiwa kanjani ukuze kusimame ibhizinisi lakho,” kusho uNksz Mbanjwa owaphothula uGrade 12 eMtshezi High ngo-2014. Usihlalo wekomiti lomnyango obhekene nokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi kuzwelonke, uNksz Ruth Bhengu, ukhuthaze abadayisi ukuba bagxile kakhulu emkhakheni wezobuchwepheshe bamanje.Abadayisi basemgwaqweni abebegqokiswa amajazi ngemuva kokuphothula izifundo zebhizinisi eThekwini“Njengamanje sesikwi-4th Industrial Revolution. Kufanele sihambisane nesimo samanje, sifunde ukufaka ama-oda ngezobuchwepheshe. Sekufanele namabhange ayeke ukunikeza osomabhizinisi ulwazi oseludlulelwe yisikhathi. Ayababulala osomabhizinisi,” kusho uNksz Bhengu. Uthe izinto eziningi sekufanele zenziwe ngekhompuytha. Okhulumele i-Egsibit Training, uMnuz Mthokozisi Shange, uthe bebethwesa iziqu abadayisi basemgwaqweni abagxile ezimpahleni zangaphansi zakwaJockey.“Besibachushisa ngokuthi bangalisimamisa kanjani ibhizinisi. Sathola ukuthi leli bhizinisi loku-odwa kwezimpahla zakwaJockey selisabalale kakhulu ngisho naseLesotho. Abadayisi babe sebehlangana benza inhlangano, iTexCon Hawkers Forum, ukuze bakwazi uku-oda ngokuhlanganyela ukuze bathole isaphulelo.Yize sithole ukuthi banekhono lokudayisa kodwa bebeshoda ngekhono lokuliphatha,” kuphetha uShange. Kuzwakale umikikizo namakhwela sebethwesa imiyezane abadayisi. Umcimbi ubuhanjelwe yizicukuthwane eziqhamuka ezinhlakeni ezehlukene.
title: Uhambe phambili kwelokudayisa emgwaqweni

text: SEKUVELE ukuthi usezishaye zaphelela ekhweni lakhe umsakazi woKhozi FM uBheka Mchunu, osakaza uhlelo Ikhethelo Lokhozi, njalo ngoMgqibelo ngo-5 ekuseni kuya ku-9.NgeSonto ntambama kusabalale izithombe zalo msakazi ehambisana noLinda Sibiya noLungisani MaVundla ofunda izindatshana kuwona lo msakazo besemzini abebeyokhongela kuwo uBheka.UBheka kuvela ukuthi ubeyolobola isithandwa sakhe seminyaka, uMapaseka waseLimpopo, Isolezwe eligcine lingasitholanga isibongo sakhe.Bebeyolobola kubo kwale ntokazi eChatsworth, eThekwini, kodwa kuvela ukuthi okuningi kuzokwenzelwa lapho izalwa khona eLimpopo.UBheka ngisho ezinkundleni yokuxhumana akalufihlile uthando lwakhe nale ntokazi ngoba kukhona izithombe zayo icula, nangesikhathi ithweswa iziqu zayo zemfundo ephakeme.Umthombo weSolezwe uthe uBheka uyazifela ngale ntokazi ahlangana nayo eThekwini.“Sekuneminyaka bethandana. Ngesikhathi kuyiwe okokuqala ekhweni lakhe kwafihlwa bese kuphindelwa okwesibili njengoba benibona nje ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapho kufike kwakhishwa konke obekusele okuthinta ilobolo ,”kuchaza umthombo.Omunye uthe uBheka uyazifela ngale ntokazi futhi baningi abebazi ukuthi uyoyilobola ngale mpelasonto.“kukhona namahlebezi okuthi umembeso ukulo nyaka kodwa awomshado okwamanje akakezwakali,” kuchaza umthombo.Imizamo yokukhuluma noBheka ngalolu daba ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.Nomyalezo athunyelelwe wona ugcine engawuphendulanga.
title: Ugawule eLimpopo owoKhozi FM

text: Inkampani ephaka ugesi kuleli, i-Eskom namhlanje imemezele ukuthi kusukela ngehora lesine ntambama kuzophinde kube  nokuhamba kukagesi kuze kube yihora leshumi. kusihlwaBathi lokhu kwenziwe yizinkinga ababhekane nazo njengoba kukhona isizinda esiphaka ugesi esithwele kanzima.Esitatimendeni u-Eskom uthe ama-generator ayisithupha eMedupi, Tutuka, Kendal, Majuba naseGrootvlei kuye kwadingeka abuyiselwe emuva ukuyolungiswa.U-Eskom uveze ukuthi badinga ama-megawatts awu-2 000 ukuze izinto zihambe kahle.
title: Uzoqala ukuhamba ngehora lesine ugesi namhlanje

text: UYICHITHA ngazo zombili eyokuthi usebenzisa izidakamizwa umrepha u-eMtee okusabalele i-video yakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ecula aze awe esiteji.Kuyo i-video ubonakala emile esiteji ingoma ibe isho. Lapho ethi uphakamisa khona umbhobho uyacula uvele awe. Kukhona enye esephuma esiteji egaxiwe namaphoyisa emgadile. Kuzwakala iphimbo lithi abamphelezele bayomfaka emotweni.Ebuzwa izolo uthe: “Eish, ngingachaza ngithini.”Ube esethi yi-video endala eyathathwa ePolokwane emcimbini ayeqashwe kuwo.“Ngisebenza ngokuzikhandla ngiyakhathala. Ngangikhathele kakhulu lapha. Umuntu osebenzisa izidakamizwa uyakwazi ukubona omunye. Nabantu abaphuza ubhiya ubezwa bethi ngimbona ebusweni owuphuzayo. Labo abathi ngidla izidakamizwa kusho ukuthi bayazidla nabo. Angizidli. Bangangishaya ekhaya, ubaba angangishaya ngoba ngiseyingane,” kusho u-eMtee.Uthe naye akazi wayewiswe yini. Ekhasini lakhe leTwitter uthe akabuthinti ngisho notshwala.Ngemuva kokuvela kwe-video ngeSonto, abantu abaningi bathe kumele athole usizo ngokushesha ukuze ayeke izidakamizwa.USizwe Dhlomo uthe kuyadabukisa ngoba uyazifela ngaye.Inkakha uDJ Oskido unxuse uSjava, asesitebeleni esisodwa naye, ukuthi amsize.“Kwesinye isikhathi siyazondwa ngokuzama ukubonisa abafowethu indlela. UNkulunkulu usinikeze ithuba lokuthi sibe wutho. Sinemindeni okumele siyondle. Asingadlali ngamathalente. Asingahlekani futhi. Asisizane. Yeka izidakamizwa!!!” kubhala umrepha uCassper Nyovest kuTwitter.
title: U-eMtee uphika eyokusebenzisa izidakamizwa

text: AMAPHAPHU aphezulu emaphoyiseni asesiteshini saseNgcobo emuva kokuthola ukuthi izigebengu ezibulale ozakwabo abahlanu bezihlela ukuwabulala wonke.I-Independent Media ithole umbiko wezinhloli oveza ukuthi amanye amaphoyisa aseNgcobo abezobulawelwa emizini yawo.Uhlelo lwezigebengu luphazamiseke ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ngesikhathi ithimba lamaphoyisa elihlanganiswe wuKhomishana wamaphoyisa kuzwelonke, uGeneral Khehla Sitole, libulala izigebengu eziyisikhombisa kweziwu-20 okuthiwa zibulale amaphoyisa amahlanu nesosha eselathatha umhlalaphansi ngoLwesithathu.Kuthiwa izigebengu yizona ezidubule kuqala amaphoyisa ase eziphindiselela ngesikhathi eseMancoba Seven Angels Ministries Church, eNyanga, okuyisonto eliseduze kwesiteshi samaphoyisa eNgcobo.Amaphoyisa aseNgcobo kuthiwa abesebalekile emizini yawo ngoba esaba ukuthi azodutshulwa.Omunye umastende waseNgcobo utshele i-Independent Media ukuthi isiqashi sakhe esingumseshi esiteshini saseNgcobo sibalekile emqashweni.“Ungitshele ukuthi uthole imininingwane yokuthi amaphoyisa asazohlaselwa yizigebengu. Uthe uyasaba ukuthi uzolalelwa unyendle,” kusho umastende.UCaptain Khaya Tonjeni, okhulumela amaphoyisa, uthe amaphoyisa azolulekwa ngokwengqondo, anikwe usizo olutholwa ngabadlule esimeni esinzima.Umphathi wesonto iMancoba Seven Angels Ministries Church, uMnuz Banele Mancoba, uthe umfowabo uThandazile uyathinteka ekudutshulweni kwamaphoyisa aseNgcobo.UThandazile ubalwa nezinye izigebengu ezidutshulwe esontweni. Ezinye izigebengu zisagcwele iziganga.Izigebengu ezibulewe ngoMhlazane Mfazwe, Siyasanga Mfazwe, Xolisa Mancoba, Michael Mancoba, Thandazile Mancoba, Loyiso Dlambulo noLuzuko esingatholakalanga isibongo sakhe.UNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi e-Eastern Cape, uNkk Weziwe Tikana, uthe amaphoyisa asebenza ebusuku eNgcobo, azonyuswa asuke ku-10 abe ngu-15.USitole uthe isiteshi sizothuthukiswa emuva kokuthola ukuthi kulahleke ukhiye wendawo egcina impahla ebalulekile njengama-CCTV cameras.Imininingwane yomngcwabo wamaphoyisa abulewe izokhishwa enkonzweni yawo yesikhumbuzo ezoba sesontweni laseWeseli eliseNgcobo ngoLwesithathu.
title: Bekunetulo lokuqeda ngamaphoyisa eNgcobo

text: UMDLALI weMamelodi Sundowns uSoumahoro Bangaly uthi inhloso yabo enkulu wukuvikela isicoco akukhathalekile ukuthi basivikela kubani.Uthe akusho lutho kubona ukuthi badlala neWydad noma ne-Al Ahly ehlonishwa i-Afrika yonke ngamagalelo ayo kwiCaf Champions League. I-Al Ahly yase-Egypt iyona ephethe izicoco eziningi zeChampions League. Isinqobe eziyisikhombisa.ISundowns evikela isicoco seChampions League iqede endaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye ngemuva kwemidlalo eyisithupha.Abafana Ba Style bazodlala neWydad Casablanca yaseMorroco kuma-quarterfinal.Umlenze wokuqala uzodlalelwa eNingizimu Afrika ngempelasonto kaSepthemba 8 kuthi owesibili udlalwe ngekaSepthemba 15 ekuhambeni.Ekhuluma ngemuva komdlalo weSundowns ne-AS Vita Club eLucas Moripe Stadium emasontweni amabili edlule UBangaly ukusho kwagcwala umlomo ukuthi alikho iqembu abalisabayo kwiChampions League.“Yithina esingompetha balo mqhudelwano ngakho alikho iqembu esifuna ukuligwema. Amaqembu yiwona okumele alwele ukugwema thina. Ukuthi sidlala neWydad noma ne-Al Ahly lokho akuthi shu lapha kithina. Lapha kuSundowns asikhethi ukuthi sidlala nobani. Inhloso yethu enkulu wukuvikela isicoco. Iyona into esizikhathaza ngayo hhayi ukuthi sidlala nobani,” kusho uBangaly.Emidlalweni edlule uBangaly wenze inqwaba yamaphutha agcine edlisele iqembu. Amaphutha kaBangaly aholele ekutheni agxekwe ngabalandeli bebhola kuleli.Emdlalweni wamaqoqo eCaf Champions League uBangaly udlisele iSundowns ngesikhathi ibhekene ne-Esperance. Abafana Ba Style bagcina beguqiswe ngo 2-1.UBangaly wayengaqali ukwenza iphutha njengoba ashaya igoli ngakubo emdlalweni obalulekile bebhekene neKaizer Chiefs koweligi e-FNB Stadium, eSoweto, eGoli.“Amaphutha ngiwenzile futhi ngifundile kuwona. Umqeqeshi (uPitso Mosimane) uhlale engiseka ngaso sonke isikhathi. Uhlale ahlale angikhumbuze ukuthi ngingumdlali oseqophelweni eliphezulu. Lokhu yikona okungikhuthazayo.” kusho uBangaly.
title: Okwethu wukuvikela isicoco: Bangaly

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uthi ucwaningo lwakamuva olusanda kushicilelwa yiNational Institute for Communicable Diseases, lukhomba ukuthi kwiziguli ezintathu ezamukelwa esibhedlela ngenxa yeCovid-19, esisodwa sazo sisuke sinezifo ezinjengesikashukela, isifo senhliziyo, ukuphefumula kanzima nezinye.URamaphosa usho lokhu encwadini yakhe yamasontonke ayikhipha njalo ngoMsombuluko.Ngokusho kwakhe, eminye imininingwane ekhishwe uMnyango wezeMpilo, ikhomba ukuthi abantu abanohlobo lwalezi zifo esezibaliwe nezinye, kulula kubona ukuthi bazithole sebebambeka bagcine ngokudlula emhlabeni bethathwa yiCovid-19.“Lokhu akukuhle ezweni lethu elikhungethwe isibalo sabantu abaningi abanesandulela ngculazi nesifo sofuba, okuyisifo ebesihamba phambili ngokubulala abantu kuleli nyakenye,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe njengamanje bangu-4.5 million abantu bakuleli abanesifo sikashukela, nokukhombisa ukuthi lesi sibalo sesiphindeke kabili kusukela ngo-2017.“EWestern Cape kuphela, isifo sikashukela yisona esiyimbangela enkulu yokufa kwabantu ngenxa yeCovid-19,” usho njalo.Ubale nabantu asebebadala abahlala ezikhungweni okuhlaliswa kuzo asebekhulile okungaselula ukuxhumana nezihlobo zabo, wathi empeleni lena yindlela yokubasindisa ngokugcina ukuqhelelana okufanele.“Nanoma ubani angahaqeka ngeCoronavirus, kodwa abantu asebebadala yibona abasengcupheni yokugula kakhulu baze bafe,” kuxwayisa uRamaphosa.Uthe kumele bakhuthazwe abantu okuthe ngalesi sikhathi sikathaqa, benza izinto ezizogcina imizimba yabo isesimeni esinempilo, abanye bayeka nokubhema ugwayi.
title: URamaphosa uthi izifo ezahlukene zinomthelela ekushoneni kwabantu ngeCovid-19

text: UKUQUBUKA kweCovid-19 kuveze obala ukungalingani kwabantu ikakhulukazi kwezobuchwepheshe, kulindeleke ukuthi iselula entsha eNingizimu Afrika i-itel Vision 1 Pro ikushintshe lokhu.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba abakwaTransision Holdings, kuvela ukuthi iningi labafundi baseNingizimu Afrika alikwazi ukuthenga amaselula njengoba livela emakhaya ampofu.Kuvela ukuthi ngesikhathi abanye abafundi befundela emakhaya, abangenawo amaselula bebengakwazi ukungena online ukuze bathole izifundo.AbakwaTranssiion bathe bazokushintsha lokhu ngokuletha amaselula angambi eqolo.Kule nyanga iTransision izokwethula iselula yayo yakwa itel mobile ebizwa ngeVision 1 Pro.Le selula kuthiwa inabo bonke ubuchwepheshe besimanje yize izobiza uR1 699 uma iqhathaniswa namanye amaselula anobuchwepheshe obufanayo.Phakathi kwezinto enazo kubalwa iscreen seHD+ esiwu 6.5 inches, Unisoc CPU 4GLTE, i-storage esiwu-32GB ne-2GB RAM, ikhamera ewu-8MP+QVGA rear camera ne-5MP front camera. Iyavuleka ngokuveza ubuso bakho nangamanyela eminwe.Bathe le selula izojatshulelwa kakhulu abantu abasha ababizwa ngeGen Z abenza u27.5 million wabantu baseNingizimu Afrika nama-millenials enza u14 million wabantu bakuleli.Le nkampani ithe ingenisa kakhulu emazweni angaphansi kweBrics ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu uyingxenye yezobuchwepheshe besimanje.Bathembise ukuthi abantu abasha baseNingizimu Afrika akade besele ngaphandle kwezobuchwepheshe besimanje bazokwazi ukuba yingxenye yezobuchwepheshe njengozakwabo base-India nakwamanye amazwe.
title: Kuzofika iselula ezosiza intsha ehlala emakhaya

text: OSAZIWAYO baKwaZulu-Natal abaqokwe emcimbini amaDStv Mzansi Viewers Choice Awards, bathi abangabazi ukuthi abalandeli babo benze konke okusemandleni ukuthi babuye nezindondo abaqokelwe kuzona kulo mcimbi.Lo mcimbi ozobanjwa okwesibili kulo nyaka, uzoba seSandton Convention Centre, eGoli ngoNovemba 24.Umcimbi walo nyaka uzobe uphethwe intokazi uBonang Matheba.Ukuvotela osaziwayo obathandayo kuvalwa ngoMgqibelo.Umsakazi woKhozi FM, uDudu Khoza oqokwe emkhakheni weRadio Personality of the Year, uthe angajabula ukuthi ayithole le ndondo njengoba ukuqokwa kwakhe kulo mcimbi kungenziwanga uyena kodwa yibona abalaleli. “Abaqhubeke abalaleli bavote njengoba sekuzovalwa nje.”UZipho “Goldmax” Mthembu oyilungu leDistruction Boyz, iqembu eliqokwe emikhakheni emithathu kulo mcimbi uthe, banethemba elikhulu lokuthi bazobuya nazo zonke izindondo abaqokelwe kuzo kulo mcimbi.SELBY Mkhize“Imindeni, abangani nezihlobo zethu ziyasikhombisa ukuthi ziyasivotela kulo mcimbi, ngakho siyathemba ukuthi lesi kuzoba isikhathi sethu kulo mcimbi.”U-DJ Tira uthe uyabonga kubantu abasaqhubeka nokumvotela njengoba eqokwe emkhakheni weFavourite DJ.“Noma yini ingenzeka kulo mcimbi, abantu abaqhubeke nokungivotela njengoba ngoLwesihlanu lolu esiya kulo ngizokhipha ingoma entsha ethi Happy Day nengisebenze kuyo nabantu okukhona kubo uPrince Bulo noZanda Zakuza,” kuchaza yena.Umsakazi woKhozi FM uSelby Mkhize uthe njengoba sekusele izinsuku ezintathu nje kuvalwe abantu abavote sengathi abakaze bavota phambilini.Abanye osaziwayo bakulesi sifundazwe abaqokiwe kulo mcimbi khona kubo noFelix Hlophe, Nomzamo Mbatha, Khuzani noShekhinah.
title: Banethemba kubalandeli babo

text: UXWAYISWE ngokuthi angalokothi abheke amagama abadlali kepha agxile ekutheni obani abenza umsebenzi oncomekayo kulezi zinsuku kwi-Orlando Pirates umqeqeshi waleli qembu uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic kulandela ukuvela kokuthi sebeluleme oXola Mlambo noVincent Pule kanti uThembinkosi Lorch usesiqedile isigwebo samakhadi.Lesi sixwayiso sikhishwe uHelman “Midnight Express” Mkhalele oyinkakha yeBucs ngaphambi komdlalo omqoka weligi weqembu alidlalele kusukela ngo-1993 kuya ku-1997. IPirates izobhekana neBlack Leopards namuhla ngo-7.30 ebusuku e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto.Ukubuya kwalaba badlali kushiya uMicho ebhekene nengwadla ngokuthi uzokwenzenjani ngoBen Motshwari obekhanya njengesibani esisiwini seBucs njengoba laba badlali bebengekho. UMlambo ulimale iPirates ikhishwa iFC Horoya yaseGuinea kwiCAF Champions League kanti uPule ubesevele elimele kufika lowo mdlalo.NgokukaMkhalele, uMicho akufanele enze iphutha lokucabanga ukuthi laba badlali bazobuya besesimeni abalimale bekusona kodwa akaqhubeke akhombise ukuba nethemba kubadlali abafana noMotshwari.“Kungaba iphutha ukuthi uMicho avele amshintshe nje uMotshwari. Ukhombise ukukhula elinde ithuba lakhe lo mdlali. Ungumdlali omkhulu futhi useke wadla nesicoco seligi (neBidvest Wits) kodwa ukuzithoba kwakhe engadlaliswa kukhombise ukukhula. Uphinde waqhubeka nalokhu esenikwa ithuba waziveza. Ubelokhu eyihole njengesibani iPirates bengekho laba ababuyayo. Kungaba elikhulu iphutha uma engavele ashintshwe nje uMotshwari ngoba kuthiwa kukhona asebebuyile ngaphandle uma umqeqeshi eyihlelele ngenye indlela iLeopards kumbe (uMlambo noPule) bemkhombise okukhulu ejimini,” kusho uMkhalele osesiza ezikwatini zesizwe ezincane.UBEN Motshwari ongomunye wabadlali be-Orlando Pirates abagqamile kule siziniNgemuva kokunqoba kwiWits ngempelasonto kwiligi, uMicho ukhombise enkulu injabulo ngokululama kwalaba badlali wakucacisa futhi ukuthi uzimisele ngokubasebenzisa ngokushesha ngoba vele nesizini isiyela ngasemaphethelweni.“Alikho iqembu elingeke likujabulele ukululama kwabadlali abamqoka. Sizobabhekisisa kahle ngokwesimo bese kuba ima sinquma ngokuxhumana nodokotela ukuthi sebengabuyela yini enkundleni,” kusho Sredojevic.IPirates ihleli esicongweni kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-44. Uma inqoba namuhla izovula igebe kumaqembu ayilandelayo njengoba isiya ngokuphela imidlalo. Ukungahlulwa kwayo emidlalweni emihlanu esele kungakhulisa kakhulu amathuba okunqoba isicoco seligi eyasigcina ngo-2012.
title: Inkakha ixwayisa oweBucs ngabakhe

text: SABELO NSELEAYISEKHO emhlabeni imeya kaMasipala waseMlalazi, uMnuz Thelumoya Zulu.UZulu ushone ngoMgqibelo ngemva kokugula isikhashana.Ube yimeya yokuqala ye-ANC, ukuhola lo masipala ongaphansi kwesifunda iKing Cetshwayo. Wagaxwa amaketango obumeya ngo-2011, ngesikhathi i-ANC inqoba okokuqala ukhetho kulo masipala.Wabuyiselwa kulesi sikhundla ngo-2016  ngesikhathi i-ANC iphinda inqoba ukhetho kulo masipala. UZulu ubengummeli kanti waqala ukuba yikhansela kulo masipala ngo-2008, ngesikhathi usaphethwe yi-IFP.Okhulumela umasipala uMnuz Mkhuseli Buthelezi, uncome igalelo likaZulu lokushumayela ubumbano emkhandlwini."Ubelelwa ukuthi kube nobumbano kumasipala yize sinamakhansela aqhamuka emaqembini epolitiki ahlukene,“ kubeka uMnuz Buthelezi.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, uthe umkhakha wezohulumeni basekhaya ugqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ngokushona kukaZulu."Udlula emhlabeni ngesikhathi ohulumeni basekhaya bebhekene nesikhathi esinzima ngenxa yokubheduka kwegciwane iCorona. Ubengomunye wezimeya ebeziphambili ekulweni nokusabalala kweCorona,“ kusho uMnuz Hlomuka.
title: Ishonile imeya yaseMlalazi

text: BAVIKA izinyoka, amaxoxo, amagundane nezinye izilwane ezitholakala endle abahlala kolindela baseSiphingo.Abahlala kule ndawo bathi sekuphele isikhathi eside umasipala engabugundi utshani kule ndawo, amanzi ayageleza sekuze kwadaleka amaxhaphozi adala omiyane.UNksz Amanda Nzimande osekomitini labahlala kule ndawo uthe bambalwa abahlala kule ndawo abangakaze balale nenyoka endlini.“Le ndawo inesikhotha, udoti ongalandwa ubiza amagundane. Uma kunamagundane amaningi endaweni nakanjani izinyoka nazo ziba ziningi. Ayisaphathwa eyomiyane abadalwa ngamaxhaphozi akule ndawo. Ibuhlungu impilo esiyiphilayo sesize sikhumbule emijondolo esakhishwa kuyo. Sasicabanga ukuthi sizothola izindlu ezingcono kodwa akwenzeki, sizithola sihleli kule ndawo iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye. Noma ngubani ofuna ukuzokwenza isithembiso uza lapha simlalele ahambe angabuyi,” kusho yena.Uthe sebekhathele nokumasha bezwakalisa ilaka labo ngoba bahlakazwa ngezinhlamvu zenjoloba.Nyakenye uthe iMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, yabatshela ukuthi le ndawo iyingozi akumele kuhlale kuyo abantu ngoba ihlale ihlaselwa yizikhukhula, yathi ucwaningo lwabo lubakhombisile ukuthi lokhu kuzohlale kwenzeka. “Sasizitshela ukuthi kuzosheshiswa uhlelo lwezindlu kodwa lutho. Akukaze kuphume muntu kule ndawo ngemuva kwalokhu,” kusho yena.UNksz Pamela Sithole ohlala kule ndawo uthe bahlala becuphe ngamabhakede okukhongozela imvula uma lina.“Umasipala wasakhela amathoyilethi kodwa iningi lawo awasebenzi, amanye awasashayeki, amanye akufinyeleleki kuwo ngoba kunamaxhaphozi anomiyane. Izingane zethu zinotwayi, abantu abadala nabo bayagula ngenxa yokungahlanzeki kwendawo,” kusho yena.UNksz Tozi Mthethwa, okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uthe umasipala wakha izindlu ezingolindela ezingaphezulu kuka-700 kule ndawo ngo-2009. Njengamanje bangaphezulu kuka-320 abebekhoseliswe kuzo asebethole izindlu zomxhaso eCornubia.“Sebengu-445 abantu abasalinde kule ndawo. Indawo yaseSiphingo inenkinga yokuzwela uma linile. Abasasele bazosuswa kule ndawo bakhelwe enye indawo yokulinda esendaweni ephakeme ekhona eSiphingo, kuze kube kwakhiwa izindlu zabo. UMasipala weTheku uzothumela iminyango eyehlukene yawo kule ndawo kuyohlanzwa kuphinde kufuthwe. Uphiko olulwa nezinambuzane nalo luzofika luzobhekana nenkinga yezinambuzane,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.
title: Babanga indawo nezinyoka kolindela

text: UTHUTHILE endaweni umndeni wakwaNzima KwaNzimane, e-Utrecht, ngemuva kokuqothwa ngenhlamvu kwashona amalungu amane ngempelasonto.Lo mndeni kaNkk Mavis MaPhenyane Nzima, owake waba yikhansela le-ANC naye obulewe, uthuthe ngeSonto emuva kokuhlaselwa ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.Umhlaseli kuthiwa ufike wathi ufuna uMaPhenyane, wagcina esedubula nabanye abantu abebesendlini okubalwa indodakazi yakhe, indodana nesisebenzi sakhe saseSwazini.Umndeni uthutha nje, sesinyukile nesibalo sabashonile safinyelela kwabahlanu emuva kokushona kukamyeni kaMaPhenyane, uMnuz Mlayezeni Nzima okusolwa ukuthi ubulawe wukwethuka kakhulu.Umndeni uthi usola ukuthi ukuhlaselwa kwawo kuhlangene nezinsongo ezike zabhekiswa kuwo mayelana nokuthwala ngomfana wasendaweni, okuthiwa ubewulusela izinkomo.Uthi abakubo komfana bebethi wabulawa uMaPhenyane ngoba efuna ukuthwala ngaye ukuze abuyele ebukhanseleni.Ilungu lomndeni elikhulume neSolezwe izolo kodwa lacela ukungadalulwa, lithe umndeni uthathe isinqumo sokuthutha endaweni ngoba ubona ukuthi awuphephile.“Sibone ukuthi ukuhlala lapha akusaphephile, kungcono sivele sifune enye indawo,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Lithe into ebaphatha kabi kakhulu ukuthi nesibalo sabashonile sesinyukile.“Ubaba wekhaya uvele washona naye. Sisola ukuthi ubulawe ukwethuka kakhulu ngemuva kokubona izidumbu ezine ziphuma egcekeni,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Libonge izikhulu zikamasipala ngokubasiza ngeloli abathuthe ngalo izimpahla.“Yonke impahla sesiyithuthile. Izinkomo ezicishe zasala ngoba ibingekho into yokuzithutha kodwa izingane zivele zaziqhuba emgwaqweni,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Liqhube lathi:“Usisi nezingane zakhe ezimbili bazofihlwa eMondlo, umkhulu yena uzofihlelwa ePaulpietersburg.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aphenya amacala amane okubulala. Uthe okwamanje bekungakaboshwa muntu.
title: Uthuthile umndeni kubulawa abane

text: BABE noKhisimusi noNcibijane omuncu aboZalo njengoba bewugubhe ikati lilele ezike kwazise abawuholelanga uNovemba noDisemba. Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo lithole ngemithombo engaphakathi ukuthi obekudala ukuthi  bangaholi wukuthi bebesamile ukuqopha. "Njengoba wazi nawe ukuthi abalingisi bangamatoho. Awuholi ungasebenzanga. Nathi besingaholi lutho. Isibulele indlala. Lapho namatoho esiwabamba eceleni abengekho njengoba kusavalwe izwe," kusho umthombo. Ethintwa omunye umlingisi oqavile kulo mdlalo uvumile ukuthi usenezinyanga ebhuquza ekhaya ngenxa yokuthi basamile ukuqopha. Ethintwa okhulumela lo mdlalo uNomfundo Zondi uvumile ukuthi ukuqoshwa koZalo kuke kwaphazamiseka ngenxa yezinkinga zesivumelwano zalo mdlalo nenhlangano yezokusakaza kuleli, iSABC. "Kuthathe isikhathi esingaphezu kwebesilindelekile ukufinyelela esiphethweni kwezingxoxo zesivumelwano. Okunye asivumelekile ukudingida ngezivumelwano zomsebenzi,“ kuchaza uNomfundo. Uthe phansi amaphaphu kubalingisi ngoba ngoMsombuluko luyaqala ushikishi lokuqoshwa kwalo mdlalo. Kwenzeka lokhu nje kuke kwaba namahlebezi abethi inhlangano yezokusakaza kuleli (SABC), isabise ithimba labadidiyeli balo mdlalo ngokuthi uma bengaqhamuki neziqephu ezihlabahlosile, izophoqeleka ukuba iluqede Uzalo.Kuthiwa iSABC yanqumela ugwayi katiki inkampani ekhiqiza lo mdlalo, iStained Glass Productions, ukuba iholele ngendlela egculisayo abalingisi futhi ibuye ibuyekeze neziqephu zoZalo ukuze kubuye ababukeli. Elinye lamaphephandaba kuleli, iSunday World laveza ukuthi iSABC yathola ukuthi kunabalingisi abebeholelwa amakinati kulo mdlalo, nokusolwa njengembangela yokuthi lehle izinga lokulingisa. Nababukeli bese beqalile ukukhalaza ngezinga leziqephu zoZalo, ngokuthi liphansi kakhulu futhi lichaza ukuthi abadidiyeli ababahloniphi ababukeli. Liqhuba leli phephandaba laze ladalula ukuthi iSABC beyingasaneme nangesamba sikaR179 million okuxhaswa ngawo Uzalo minyaka yonke. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa okhulumela iSABC uMmoni Seapolelo, wawachitha lawo mahlebezi okusikazwa koZalo ngejozi, wathi lo mdlalo usaqengqeleza phambili eNingizimu Afrika ngokubukwa ngoba  unababukeli abangaphezu kuka-10 million zinsuku zonke.
title: Ikati lilele eziko kwaboZalo

text: Ebika eseCape Town Stadium, eKapaCape Town City (0) 1Orlando Pirates (0) 0ASELELE ku-Absa Premiership amathemba e-Orlando Pirates okuqeda indlala yezicoco kulandela ukuwashiswa ijezi yiCape Town City kwi-last 16 yeNedbank Cup izolo ebusuku eCape Town Stadium, eKapa.ICity inqobe ngo 1-0 wegoli lika-Ayanda Patosi alivalele enethini ngomzuzu ka-55. IPirates sekuphele amasizini amane yagcina ukuphakamisa isicoco. Leli qembu lagcina ukunqoba indebe ngo-2014 lidla yona iNedbank Cup ngesikhathi libhekene neBidvest Wits.IPirates ivele isiphuthwe yiMTN 8 neTelkom Knockout njengoba izolo iphume kwiNedbank Cup. IBucs sekuzomele ifake wonke umfutho wayo kwiligi okuyisona kuphela isicoco esinethemba lokusinqoba kule sizini ka-2017/18.IPirates ihlezi endaweni yesibili kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership. Isele ngamaphuzu amane kwiMamelodi Sundowns eqhwakele. ICity ijoyine Ubuntu Cape Town, Baroka FC, Free State Stars, Kaizer Chiefs, Maritzburg United, Bloemfontein neMamelodi Sundowns kuma-quarterfinal.Amaqembu azoqhathwa namuhla ngo-7.30 eKapa. Umqeqeshi weCity uBenni McCarthy usathungatha isicoco sakhe sokuqala njengomqeqeshi. Ekuqaleni kwesizini ufinyelele kowamanqamu weMTN 8 lapho edliwe khona yiSuperSport United.UMcCarthy ubengakaze azishaye izinkunzi zaseSoweto, iPirates neKaizer Chiefs kule sizini. ICity yenze isiqiniseko sokuthi iba yeqembu lesibili kulo nyaka ukushaya eZimnyama emidlalweni eyishumi kuyo yonke imiqhudelwano. I-Ajax bekuseyilona kuphela iqembu elisashaye iBucs kulo nyaka. Yayibhudluza ngo 3-0 eCape Town Stadium koweligi.Ngemizuzu engu-20 yokuqala womabili amaqembu akhe amathuba amahle okushaya amagoli. UJustin Shonga obeyiphela endlebeni ezitobheni zeCity, ushaye ipali ngomzuzu wesikhombisa kanti ngowesibili udonse ishodi elivinjwe nguSage Stephens ezintini zeCitizen.ICity nayo ibingazibekile phansi kwazise * -Ayanda Patosi uke wadonsa imbumbulu yeshodi ephebezwe nguSiyabonga Mpontshane ezintini zeBucs ngomzuzu wesishiyayagalolunye. UThamsanqa Mkhize naye ulitholile elakhe ngoka-13 kodwa wasebenza * -Innocent Maele okhiphe ibhola eliyingozi ebeliyoqabula enethini.Umdlalo ushintshe ngo 0-0. Ngesiwombe sesibili imvula ibishaya ngamandla kumhlophe qwa enkundleni. ICity igcine ilitholile igoli ngesikhathi uPatosi evalela enethini ibhola elihle abeligotshelwe nguLyle Lakay ngomzuzu ka-55. IPirates ihluleke yancama ukuthola elokulinganisa.
title: Isithembe kwese-Absa iBucs edliwe iCity izolo

text: OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma izolo ebusuku ushicilele incwadi engamakhasi awu-12 ayibize ngeyokugcina odabeni lwekhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana nenkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ayisola ngokugcwala amajaji asezigaxe njengenyama yomsipha kwezepolitiki kuleli. UZuma ubephendula umnyakazo wakamuva wekhomishini 'empini' yabo njengoba izolo usihlalo wekhomishini uJaji Raymond Zondo ememezele ukuthi bazombika enkantolo yoMthethosisekelo uZuma ngokudelela umyalelo wekhomishini ngokushaya indiva amasamanisi ayemphoqa ukuthi avele phambi kwayo kuleli sonto. UZondo uqhube wathi bazokwenza isicelo sokuba aboshwe uZuma.Ephendula kulokhu uZuma uthe ubengayigolozeli inkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ngokungaveli kwikhomishini izolo kodwa ubeyimela esikhathini lapho “kunamajaji asezishiyile izifungo zawo kumthethosisekelo ajoyina izimpi zepolitiki.”UZuma uthe indlela aziphathe ngayo izolo uZondo iqinisa inkolelo yakhe yokuthi uphume iqhuzu naye. “Iphini leNhloko yamaJaji (uZondo) liphetha ngokuthi icala lami lokudelela liyisizathu esanele sokuthi liye eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo lifune isigwebo. Impela uzosithola. Anginaso isiqiniseko sokuthi leyo yindlela ahamba ngayo amacala athinta ukudelela inkantolo ngokwenjwayelo, kodwa sengikwamukele ukuthi iphini leNhloko yamajaji uZondo nenqubo efanele yomthetho bahlukene,” kuloba uZuma. Uqhube wathi njengoba sekuphelile obekubahlanganisa nekhomishini, uselindele isigwebo esizokhishwa yinkantolo yoMthethosisekelo. “Ngisamile esitatimendeni engasenza ngoFebhruwari 1 nonyaka futhi akukho ukwesatshiswa nokusongelwa okuzoguqula umbono wami njengoba ngikholelwa ekutheni akumele siyivumele ingalo yomthetho lapho ubulungiswa kanye nenqubo efanele kugcinelwa kuphela abathile hhayi abanye,” usho kanje. UZuma ubuye wakugcizelela ukuthi akagolozeli umthetho wakuleli kodwa uvukela amajaji athile akhohlakele abolisa izinkantolo ngezizathu ezithinta ipolitiki. “Akulona igunya lenkantolo yoMthethosisekelo engilichithayo kodwa ngichitha ukuxhashazwa kwalo, okwenziwa amajaji ambalwa. Angichithi umthetho wethu kodwa ngichitha amajaji asezishiyile izifungo zawo kumthethosisekelo ajoyina izimpi zepolitiki. Ngiyawuhlonipha umthetho wakuleli futhi ngithulile ngawulandela ngisho sengixhashazwa ngawo eminyakeni engu-20 edlule,” usho kanje. UZuma uthe sasingekho isidingo sokuthi ikhomishini iye enkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ukuyothola incwadi ezomphoqa ukuthi avele kuyo ngoba wayesevele evelile phambi kwayo kabili phambilini. Ephendula labo abathi kufanele aphucwe imali yakhe yempesheni yalabo ababengomengameli kanye namanye amagunya uthe kumele bakhumbule ukuthi ubesekushilo phambilini ukuthi akanankinga nencane nokuzimela ngesinqumo sakhe sokulwa lempi. “Kuzobajabulisa ukwazi ukuthi ngahluleka ukuzivikela kulolu daba, ngizobhekana nejele. Ukuphakamisa ukuthi ngingaguqula umqondo wami ngokucindezelwa yizinkantolo ngemali yempesheni nangamagunya kuvela kubantu abakholwa wukuthi ungathenga noma yini ngemali.”Ngemuva kwesimemezelo sikaZondo izolo, sekulindwe isinqumo senkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, engakathi vu kulolu daba.
title: Incwadi 'yokugcina' kaZuma ngekhomishini kaZondo nenkantolo yoMthethosisekelo

text: KUGCINE kulenele iphoyisa eliphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ngemuva kokuzingqokloza ngesibhamu liqeda ukudubula unkosikazi nomfowabo kankosikazi eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini izolo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbhele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi leli phoyisa lishonele esibhedlela.Kuvela ukuthi bese kuphele iminyaka emibili iphoyisa nonkosikazi walo bengafinyeleli esivumelwaneni ngedivosi.Iphoyisa elingaphansi kombutho wamaphoyisa kuleli ophikweni olugada izitimela KwaMashu liphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ngemuva kokuzidubula ekhanda selidubule unkosikazi walo uNkk Dibuseng Chiliza nomfowabo obemphelezele uMnuz Moss Moss (22).Umthombo osondelene nalo mndeni, obukhona enkantolo ocele ukungadalulwa ngenxa yezimo zokuphepha, uthe bese kuneminyaka emibili begqigqa enkantolo ngodaba lwedivosi kodwa behluleka wukufinyelela esivumelwaneni idivosi yabo ingalalelwa.“Bekungokokuqala kule minyaka emibili ukuthi inkantolo ifike esigabeni sokuthi ilulalele udaba lwabo,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi inkantolo ithathe ikhefu lesikhashana kwathi, sebesekhefini umsolwa wacela ikheli likankosikazi wakhe osehlala eGauteng njengoba bedivosa kodwa ummeli wakhe (kankosikazi) wanqaba nalo wathi ngokubona kwakhe akuphephile ukuthi umsolwa azi ikheli lakhe.“Ummeli kamufi ubuze ukuthi kungani efuna ukwazi ikheli likamufi wathi ufuna ukuthumela amaphepha abameli mayelana nengane yabo.Ummeli kamufi uthe angasebenzisa ikheli lasemsebenzini kamufi ngoba ukumnikeza ikheli lalapho kuhlala khona umufi akuphephile. Udinwe wathelwa ngamanzi kanti bese kushaye isikhathi sokuthi kubuyelwe enkantolo.Ngesikhathi kubuyelwa ngaphakathi uhoshe isibhamu wadubula unkosikazi nomfowabo, naye wazidubula.UCol Thembeka Mbele, okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe, uthe ngokuthola kwamaphoyisa umsolwa okuthiwa uyiphoyisa udubule kwashona abantu ababili naye wazidubula enkantolo.“Ngokuthola kwethu abashonile kuthiwa unkosikazi kamsolwa nomfowabo. Okwamanje amaphoyisa awakatholi ukuthi yini imbangela yokubulawa kwabo, esikwaziyo wukuthi umufi wesifazane nomsolwa bebeze enkantolo ngodaba lwedivosi. Kuvulwe amacala amabili okubulala. Umsolwa uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela esesimeni esibucayi. Uzobe egadwe amaphoyisa khona esibhedlela,” kusho uCol Mbele ngaphambi kokuthi ashone umsolwa.Lesi sigameko siholele ekutheni kuhlehle amacala abezoqhubeka enkantolo i-O lapho kwenzeke khona isigameko.UNgqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa nokuHlunyeleliswa kwezimilo, u-Advocate Michael Masutha, esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba uthe usethumele uhlaka lomnyango wakhe ukuthi luphenye ngalesi sigameko.“Ulwazi esinalo okwamanje olokuthi umsolwa uyiphoyisa, okwenze ukuthi onogada bangakwazi ukwehlukanisa ukuthi uze enkantolo ngoba eze ecaleni elithinta yena noma uwufakazi ecaleni elithile. Sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi izinkantolo ziphephile,” kusho yena.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni wabashonile ayiphumelelanga.
title: Kulenele iphoyisa elibulale unkosikazi nomlamu walo enkantolo

text: UBONGA akaphezi kubalandeli be-Orlando Pirates ngokukhumbula imisebenzi emihle ayenzele iqembu umdlali wasemuva, uJustice Chabalala okungenzeka aligqoke okokugcina ijezi leZimnyama emidlalweni weCarling Black Label Cup kusasa.IPirates izobhekana neKaizer Chiefs eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, ngo-3 ntambama. EZimnyama, ezisayinise inqwaba yabadlali, zibhekene nenselelo yokuqeda ukhondolo lokuhlulwa Amakhosi kulo mqhudelwano kwazise isibhiyozelwe kabili kulandelana eNaturena. UChabalala ngomunye wabadlali bePirates abavotelwa ngabalandeli baleli qembu ukuthi bawuqale umdlalo nakuba engazange adlale nowodwa umdlalo ngesizini edlule. Inkontileka yakhe ayikavuselelwa. Emasontweni adlule kuvele ukuthi izikhulu zePirates zizomnika ithuba lokugcina lokuzibonakalisa. Uma ehluleka uzolandela abanye asebevele bachithiwe kuleli qembu.“Ngithanda ukubonga abalandeli ngokungivotela ekubeni kade ngagcina ukudlala. Ngesikhathi ngifika kwiPirates ngisuka kwiChippa ngaqala ukudlala kowabakhaya. Ngicabanga ukuthi kuyinto enhle kimina. Ngibonga abalandeli ngokukholelwa kimina ukuthi ngingawenza umsebenzi kulo mdlalo nakweminye engingayidlalanga, “kusho uChabalala.“Uma uMdali ekunike isiphiwo, ngesakho, akekho ongasithatha. Noma ngabe ungaphandle noma usesikimini, sihlala kungesakho. Ngiyakholwa ukuthi ngizokwazi ukwenza umsebenzi ngakho konke enginakho. Sibona ngendlela efanayo nabalandeli. Bayakholelwa kimina, nami ngiyakholelwa kimina uqobo. Abazange bangilahle ngoba nakhu sengihlale ebhentshini isikhathi eside. Bakhumbulile ukuthi kunoJustice owenze umsebenzi omuhle kuma sizini amabili adlule. Ngeke ngisho ukuthi abalandeli kukhona abakubonayo kimina kodwa abaqeqeshi abangakuboni.”Kunezinkulumo ezithi uChabalala ufunwa ngumqeqeshi weCape Town City, uBenni McCarthy ofuna umdlali ozovala isikhala esivuleke emuva kokuhamba kukaKwanda Mngonyama osayine kwiMaritzburg United.“Engingakusho wukuthi ngingumdlali wePirates futhi ngisazoba lapha. Ngeke ngikhulume okuningi ngoba angikulandeli okushiwo abezindaba, angiwafundi amaphepha. Ngigxila ebholeni nakwiPirates,”kusho uChabalala.Mayelana nokuhlala ebhentshini isizini yonke uthe:”Iqembu kade lenza kahle. Abadlali engibanga nabo indawo uHappy Jele, Munetsi (Marshall) noNdengane (Alfred) kade benza kahle. Abaqeqeshi bangitshelile ukuthi angilinde ithuba lami. Ngilindile ithuba. NgoMgqibelo yilona. Ngizokwenza okusemandleni. Ngaphakathi nginomona wokuthi uma omunye umdlali enza kahle, ngizitshele ukuthi ngingenza kangcono. Ngiyathemba. “
title: Uthembisa lukhulu obesebhentshini

text: ABASEBENZI basezindlini bathi basengcupheni yokutheleleka ngeCorona njengoba abaqashi babo bengabadedelanga ukuba bagoduke. Ekhuluma kwiZwi LoMzansi, ohlelweni olusakazwa nguThembeka “Dodo” Ngongoma ebusuku, omunye umsebenzi uthe yena akavunyelwe ukugoduka.“Ngigada ubaba wakhona ogula kabi. Angazi uguliswa yini kodwa ave ekhwehlela. Okungiphethe kabi kakhulu ukuthi kuke kufike abazalwane bezombheka. Inkinga angazi ukuthi nabo abanaso yini lesi sifo,” kusho umlaleli.Omunye uthe usebenzela abaqashi asebebuya kohlolwa emuva kokuba omunye wabo etholakale enegciwane.“Mina bangishiya ngemuva. Angizazi noma senginalo yini igciwane. Ngizoya kanjani ezinganeni zami ngingazi noma ngiphephile yini,” kusho omunye umsebenzi othe usebenza eThekwini.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, umengameli wenyunyana yabasebenzi basezindlini, i-United Domestic Workers Of South Africa (UDWOSA), uNkk Pinky Mashiane, uthe lezi ngezinye zezingqinamba ababhekene nazo njengabasebenzi basezindlini.Uthe uze wabhalela ngisho noMqondisi-Jikelele woMnyango wezabaSebenzi, uMnuz Thobile Lamati, incwadi (Isolezwe elinayo ikhophi yalo) ngenhloso yokuveza usizi lwabasebenzi basezindlini.“ Ezinye izinselelo esibhekene nazo ngezabaqashi abangafuni ukuhlonipha umthetho futhi abashaya eyabo. Kunabasebenzi abagcinwe ngabaqashi emizini yabo ngaphandle kwemvume yabo. Babhadle emisebenzini kunokuhlala nezingane nemindeni yabo.”Uthe abanye abaqashi ababavumeli abasebenzi ukuba baye emakhaya ngoba bethi bazobabuyela nokugula njengoba behlangana nabantu abaneCoronavirus.“Abanye abasebenzi bathunyelwe emakhaya ngaphandle kwenkokhelo ngaphambi kokuba uMengameli amemezele ukuvalwa kwezwe. Yingoba abaqashi bakholwa wukuthi abasebenzi basezindlini bazobathelela ngesifo ngoba bagibela amatekisi namabhasi.”Uthe abanye abasebenzi bathunyelwe emakhaya emuva kokuba kade beyolashwa emitholampilo. “Abanye abaqashi babatshele ukuthi emitholampilo bahlangana nabantu abaningi abaneCoronavirus. Lokhu sikubona njengobandlululo. Abanye abasebenzi bangase bathelelwe ngabaqashi babo ngegciwane njengoba behla benyuka.”Esephetha uNkk Mashiane uthe nabo benza imisebenzi emqoka njengoba iningi labo libuye ligade imizi nabantu.
title: Abasebenza ezindlini novalo ngeCorona

text: ABACWANINGI bomhlaba bakholwa wukuthi ekugcineni sebeze bayithola into engagcina iqeda ngegciwane lengculazi.Izolo laba bacwaningi abawu-30, bakhiphe umbiko okhomba ukuthi igciwane lengculazi likwazile ukwelapheka emagundaneni awu-23.Okuseqhulwini kulo mbiko, kube wukuthi bakwazile ukususa iHIV kulibofuzo (DNA) lwamagundane.Bathe konke lokhu kwenzeke ngokusebenzisa imishanguzo ethithibalisa leli gciwane, ama-ARV, asetshenziswa nethuluzi abalibize ngeCRISPR elikwazi ukudala umehluko endleleni umuntu asuke edalwe ngayo.Laba bacwaningi baseTemple University nase-University of Nebraska Medical Center, baveze ukuthi ngeke bapholise maseko, bazoqala ukuzama le ndlela yokwelapha iHIV kubantu ngonyaka ozayo.Njengamanje kuvela ukuthi basalinde ukuthi iFood and Drug Administration igunyaze ukusetshenziswa kwalezi zithako kubantu abaphilayo, abazisebenzise emagundaneni.Omunye wabebehola lolu cwaningo, uSolwazi Kamel Khalili, uthe nakuba kunjalo, yena nabambisene nabo kulolu cwaningo lweHIV, bakugcizelele ukuthi kunegxathu elikhulu okumele kudlulwe kulo ocwaningweni abalwenze ngamagundane, ukuze lusebenze nakubantu.“Besikwazi esifuna ukukwenza. Kodwa ubuchwepheshe bebungekho,” kusho uSolwazi Khalili ekhuluma nephephandaba iThe Washington Post.Ugcizelele ukuthi yena nethimba lakhe, bebelokhu belindele ithuluzi elifana neCRISPR, ukuze bakwazi ukulwa negciwane “eliba yingxenye yomsebenzi wabo we-chromosomes”.Kodwa njengoba kunokuthile okuvelile ekugcineni, uthe lokho kuyabajabulisa kakhulu.Uma igciwane selifile, uthe iHIV isingakwazi ukunqandeka ngokwelashwa ngemishanguzo evele ikhona.Lokhu kwelapha ngokusho kwakhe, kuhlale kuqaphe igciwane ngaso sonke isikhathi; ngaphandle kokuthi umuntu alokhu eqhubeka edla imishanguzo, okwenza isiguli sikwazi ukuba namandla okulwa nokugula.Ngokwezibalo zakamuva zeWorld Health Organisation, iHIV ihlasela abantu abangu-37 million emhlabeni jikelele.Kubikwa ukuthi bangu-22 million kuphela kwasebebaliwe abathola ukuhlinzekwa ngemishanguzo.Cishe bangu-1 million abantu ababulawa yizifo ezihlobene neHIV ngo- 2017 ngokusho kweWHO.Ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, kwavela ukuthi omunye umuntu wesibili wayeselaphekile ekubeni naleli gciwane.Le mibiko yaletha elikhulu ithemba empini yokulwa naleli gciwane.
title: Ithemba ngekhambi lokwelapha iHIV

text: UYANNICK Zakri weMaritzburg United usebuyele eqenjini ngemuva kokunyamalala engaziwa ukuthi ukuphi ngaphambi kokuqala komzuliswano wesibili wePremier Soccer League (PSL).Abadlali babenikwe ikhefu elifushane likaKhisimusi ngemuva komdlalo wokugcina ka-2018 lapho babebhekene neBaroka FC eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.Bonke abadlali kwakulindeleke ukuthi babuyele ekhempini yeqembu ngoDisemba 27 kodwa uZakri wangafika. Iqembu alikwazanga nokuxhumana naye.Umqeqeshi weTeam of Choice uMuhsin Ertugral ukuqinisekisile ukuthi usebuyile eqenjini.“UZakri ubuyile. Ufike izolo (ngeSonto) kodwa ngeke adlale uma sesibhekene neMamelodi Sundowns. Ubengakwazi ukungena eNingizimu Afrika ngoba ihhovisi elinikeza incwadi eyimvume belivalile kwaze kwaba uJanuwari 5. Uyitholile incwadi evela kuleli hhovisi ebichaza lokho,” kusho * -Ertugral.IMaritzburg iyibambe emsileni we-log ye-Absa Premiership ngamaphuzu angu-11 ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-16. Izobhekana neSundowns emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLoftus Stadium, ePitoli, kusasa ngo-7.30 ebusuku.“UZakri wenze kahle kakhulu ngesikhathi ngisebenzisana naye kwi-Ajax Cape Town ngesizini edlule. Ungumdlali omuhle kakhulu uma ebeke umqondo kulokho akwenzayo,” kuchaza u-Ertugral.ITeam of Choice ithole abagadli abangase bayisize emzuliswaneni wesibili njengoba isayinise uJudas Moseamedi noThabiso Kutumela.IMaritzburg igcine ilahle amaphuzu ngeledlule ngesikhathi ithelwa othulini ngo 2-1 yiFree State Stars eHarry Gwala Stadium. Kulo mdlalo yake yahamba phambili ngo 1-0 kodwa yadedela amagoli amabili ekugcineni. ITeam of Choice isawine umdlalo owodwa nje vo kwengu-16 esiyidlalile selokhu kuqale isizini.
title: Kubuye umdlali  obenyamalele

text: UMCULI wekwaito, wodumo lwengoma ethi Kortes nethi Abantu Bami futhi ezingamhambeli kahle izinto kwezothando nasemculweni, uNomasonto “Mshoza” Maswanganyi, usefuna isixazululo nakubelaphi bendabuko.Kumangale amalungu omphakathi waseMevamhlophe, eMpangeni, ngesikhathi uMshoza ethushuka emzini womthandazi odumile uThulani “Dr 3 Seconds” Nkwanyana, owayengumshayisibhakela. Akwaziwa ukuthi uyozelapha noma uyothwasa yini.Omunye umthombo ongumakhelwane kaDr 3 Seconds kodwa ocele lingavezwa igama lawo, uthe uzibonele ngawakhe uMshoza efika emzini wale nyanga ngoLwesithathu. “Ulale khona ngoba ngimbone ngakusasa ephumela emnyango egqoke izingubo zokulala. Ngimbone sebehamba no-3 Seconds beyoguqa lapho ethandazela khona abantu,” kusho lo mthombo.Omunye uthe umbonile uMshoza edolobheni laseMpangeni eqiqinge izimpahla. “Khona angimangalanga ngoba uDr 3 Seconds uhlale evakashelwa ngabantu abadumile ngisho nezikhulu zePhalamende. Kukhona omunye umholi we-ANC owayengapheli lapha. Ngisho abaculi bakamaskandi nabesicathamiya abapheli lapha bezofuna usizo. Ngisho sebezobonga siyababona,” kusho umthombo wokuqala.Omunye umculi kamaskandi ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uficene noMshoza kwaDr 3 Seconds.“Ngimgcine ezohamba izolo (esho ngoLwesine) kodwa ezobuya kahle ngesonto elizayo ezoqedela ukwelashwa,” kuphetha lo mculi osazizamela.UMshoza ufike wahlukana nomyeni wakhe wokuqala uMnuz Jacob Mnisi abanezingane ezimbili naye. Kuthe kusenjalo waqhamuka esethandana nesiqumama saseBergville uMnuz Thuthukani “Thuthu” Mvula. Sekuyinto edume njengophuthu ukuthi uMshoza noMvula bahlukane kabuhlungu.UMshoza ugcine esethandana nephoyisa lasesiteshini samaphoyisa eFree State, uConstable Thlabe Mbele.Uke wabuyela emculweni ngenoni elishise izikhotha elithi Abantu Bami kodwa lolo dumo lwashabalalisa okwamazolo ebona ilanga.Ethintwa uDr 3 Seconds uvele wabhoka ngolaka wathi usekhathele yizintatheli ezimphazamisa emsebenzini wakhe.“Nangifunani ngempela? Ningiphazamiselani emsebenzini wami? Qhubekani nje, ngizonigqilaza."Anibhali uma ngisiza umphakathi nentsha kodwa niqhamuka seningibuza ngamakhasimede ami. Bhala ukuthi ngihlela indumezulu yomcimbi kamaskandi engizohlonipha kuyo izinkakha zalo mculo, hhayi oMshoza engingabazi,” washo uDr 3 Seconds maqede wavala ucingo.Ethintwa uMshoza akaphikanga futhi akavumanga kodwa uthe akuxhunyanwe nomphathi wakhe uKeke Mokoena onxuse ukuba iphephandaba lingaluvezi lolu daba ngoba luzophazamisa okuyokwenziwa nguMshoza.“Animyeke aqedele akuqalile ngoba le nto iyisiko,” kubhoka uKeke ngolaka.Okuxakayo ukuthi uDr 3 Seconds noMnisi ngabangani abakhulu njengoba aze wayomethula naseSilweni.Nasemcimbini kaMnisi owawuseGoli, uDr 3 Seconds nguye owayehola abaNtwana baseNdlunkulu.
title: Indida uMshoza evumbuka enyangeni

text: UTHINTEKILE umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, ngokusula isigubhukane njengomqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates kobeyimbangi yakhe uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic.EZimnyama zimemezele ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ukuthi uMicho usesulile ebeka izizathu zangasasese kwathiwa izintambo zizobanjwa uRulani Mokwena esizwa uFadlu Davids noFranck Plaine.UMicho uhlale kwiPirates amasizini amabili agcwele. Kulawo masizini uyithwalise kanzima iSundowns embangweni wesicoco seligi aqede kabili belele endaweni yesibili kunqoba amaBrazilians.UMosimane uveze ukuthi ukwazana kwabo noMicho kusuka kudala esewumqeqeshi weSuperSport United.“Ngiphatheke kabi kakhulu (ngokuhamba kukaMicho). UMicho uyena owanginikeza uDenis Onyango waphinde wanginika nomunye umdlali wesokunxele emuva. Ngimazi kudala esekwiSt George engimema emqhudelwaneni iCECAFA ngizobheka abadlali ebalula uDenis nabanye abadlali. Ngimthumelele umyalezo, angikabheki ukuthi usephendulile yini, ngimazisa ukuthi ngiphatheke kabi ngokuhamba kwakhe. Besinombango omuhle naye. Asikaze sichukuluzane. Ungumqeqeshi osezingeni eliphezulu futhi ozithobile ngisho kuthiwa uhluliwe. Ubengafani nami angikuthandi ukwehlulwa. Uyafana noSteve Komphela ngiyafunda kubona,” kusho uMosimane.Ubekhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva kokuthi iSundowns idlulele kweyandulela owamanqamu kwiMTN 8 ngokuhlula iBloemfontein Celtic ngo 3-1 eLucas Moripe Stadium ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Amagoli ezikaMosimane ashaywe uThemba Zwane iphenathi, uMosa Lebusa noKeletso Makgwala. ICeltic ibibekwe phambili uNdumiso Mabena, wonke la magoli angene ngesiwombe sesibili.UMosimane uveze ukuthi uwuthumele umyalezo nakuMokwena emfisela inhlanhla.“Ngimfisele inhlanhla. Kade ayelifuna leli thuba selize lafika. Sengike nganitshela nani ukuthi ngicabanga ukuthi uzoba umqeqeshi osezingeni eliphezulu futhi uzongidlula nami kodwa ibhola luwuhambo olude. Akungamkhathazi ukuhlulwa kwakusihlwa (ngoMgqibelo) lokho kuyingxenye yebhola.“UMicho besincintisana naye, ubengenza ngihlale manzonzo. Ubengiphusha kule minyaka emibili edlule kodwa iPirates iyohlezi iyiPirates iyohlezi ikhona, inabadlali inejubane. URulani akangakhathazeki. Nami sengike ngahlulwa imidlalo emithathu kulandelana. Niyazi kwenzakalani esimeni esinjalo, wonke umuntu uyakhuluma, babone amaphutha. Ngizokhuluma naye uma kudingeka kodwa angifuni ukugxambukela,” kusho uMosimane.I-Pirates ikhishwe yiHighlands Park ngo 1-0 kwi-quarterfinal yeMTN 8 ngempelasonto. Lo mphumela ulandele owangesonto eledlule lapho beshaywe yiSuperSport United ngo 3-0 kwiligi ekubeni ihluliwe nakoweChampions League.
title: UPitso uthintekile kusula uMicho

text:
SIZWE BLOSE noFANELESIBONGE BENGUU SEYAZISOLA umculi wekwaito obhekene necala lokugqoka umfaniswano wamaphoyisa kaMasipala waseThekwini.UProfessor uthi ubengazi ukuthi ukugqoka umfaniswano wamaphoyisa emcimbini wokuklomelisa abaculi amaMetro FM Music Awards, obuse-ICC, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo, kuzomfaka obishini.Izolo uzinikele esiteshini samaphoyisa, kwavulwa icala lokugqoka ngokungemthetho umfaniswano wamaphoyisa njengoba umthetho olawula amaphoyisa ungakuvumeli ukuthi umfaniswano ugqokwe yinoma ngubani ngaphandle kwemvume.UProfessor, ogama lakhe langempela nguMkhonzeni Langa, uthe uyaxolisa futhi uyazisola ngokugqoka kwakhe lo mfaniswano.“Ngiyaxolisa kakhulu kubantu bomthetho nakubaphathi bedolobha ngokwenzekile ngoba bengingaqondile. Sengiyazi manje ukuthi engikwenzile kuyicala. Ngicabanga ukuthi kube wubudedengu futhi nokunganaki.
