Amaphoyisa ngihlalile nawo namhlanje (izolo) angichazela ukuthi lokhu kuphambene nomthetho,” kusho uProfessor.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eThekwini, uCaptain Khephu Ndlovu, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bavulele icala lo mculi owole izindondo ezimbili kumaMetro FM Music Awards.“Sisaqhubeka nophenyo kanti abantu bazokwazi maduze ukuthi kwenzekani ngaye,” kusho uNdlovu.UProfessor uthe uyayihlonipha ingalo yomthetho futhi akaziboni ephinde etholakala ekulesi simo esifanayo.“Ingalo yomthetho ayincengi muntu. Ngiphenduke umuntu ofana nabo bonke abanye njengoba amaphoyisa ebengangitotosi. Akuthokozele ukuthi angibalekanga kodwa athe engifonela ngazinikela. Ngifunde izinto eziningi ngokulahleka kwemifaniswano yamaphoyisa ngoba angitshele ukuthi abanye benza ubugebengu. Manje ngifundisekile futhi ngeke ngiphinde ngibe budedengu,” kusho lo mculi. Uthe uyaxolisa nakubalandeli bakhe ngoba lesi simo sesiphazamise izinhlelo zokujabulela ukuwina kwakhe izindondo.“Bengizimisele ngokuthi ngijabule nabalandeli kodwa akusenzekanga ngenxa yalokhu. Ngiyathemba kodwa ukuthi sisazoqhubeka nokujabula,” kusho uProfessor.Uthe ngeke achaze okuningi ngecala ngoba lisezithebeni zenkantolo kodwa okhulumela amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku, uSenior Superintendent Eugene Msomi, uthe lo mculi ubatshele ukuthi mfaniswano uwuboleke kumzala wakhe oyiphoyisa likamasipala.Umshushisi enkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini ongavumelekile ukukhuluma nabezindaba uthe icala lisezandleni zabo kanti basazothatha isinqumo ngokuthi bamenza njani uProfessor.Kwenzeka konke nje lokhu, sekumiswe nezinhlelo zokukhishwa kwe-video yengoma yakhe ethi 
Baphi kuyo okukhona iveni lamaphoyisa nathe uzothi ukuyimisa kancane.Uthe usafuna ukuhlolisisa kuqala ukuthi okwenzeka kule video akuphambene yini nomthetho.UProfessor wawina izindondo ezimbili ngoMgqibelo. Phambilini wake wagqoka umfaniswano ofana nowamasosha.
title: Uyaxolisa uProfessor ngomfaniswano

text: ABALANDELI bakaMjik’jelwa bachitha amawele angabafowabo alo mculi ongasekho abanga ukuhola amaqembu akhe njengoba beveza ukuthi alikho eseliqokwe yibona ukuthi bengamele amaqembu akhe.Umbango uphakathi kukaMnikezwa noBheki Ngubane abangamawele abasanda kuveza ukuthi baqokwe ngabalandeli bakaMjik’jelwa ukuthi bengamele amaqembu akhe njengoba engasekho.Induna yabalandeli bakaMjik’jelwa ababizwa ngeZihonga, uSoh Mkhonza ithe, bebengakaqoki muntu phakathi kukaBheki noMnikezwa ukuthi kubekhona ozokwengamela amaqembu alo mculi.“Kusithusile nje sibona sekuvela umbango ophakathi kukaBheki noMnikezwa bethi yithina esibaqokile ukuthi bengamele amaqembu kaMjik’jelwa.“Kuyiqiniso impela ukuthi njengabalandeli sinezwi ekuqokweni komuntu ozohola amaqembu kaMjik’jelwa kodwa besingakaqoki muntu.“Lokho ngeke sikwenze nabo laba baculi asebebanga kodwa sizokuxoxa noyise nonina.“Ngokwazi kwethu uMjik’jelwa ubeziphathele inkampani okusho ukuthi umuntu onelungelo lokukhuluma ngezinto zakhe abazali bakhe kuphela,” kusho uMkhonza.UMkhonza uthe abasagxile kukhona njengamanje ukukhipha i-albhamu kaMjik’jelwa ashiye eseyiqophile abazimisele ngokuthi igcine idayise ifike kwi-platinum.Uqhube wathi njengoba iqembu likaMjik’jelwa elikhulu “Amangcukumane” liqashiwe ukuthi linandise kwiMpucuzeko Maskandi festival ngoJulayi 21, ukhona ozobe elihola.Uthe ukhona ozohola leli qembu kwiMpucuzeko kodwa lokho kuzobe kungasho ukuthi sekunguyena abamqokayo ukuthi ahole amaqembu kaMjik’jelwa wonke, kuzoba yinto yesikhashana.Embangweni oke wavela phakathi kwabafowabo kaMjik’jelwa, uMnikezwa uveze ukuthi kukhona izinto asazozengeza kwi-albhamu kamfowabo.Lokho ukuchithile uMkhonza, uthe alikho elinye izwi elizozozwakala kule albhamu ngaphandle kwelikaMjik’jelwa.Okunye okuke kwavela ukuthi uThembi Ngubane oyimenenja kaMjik’jelwa unamalungelo alinganayo nalo mculi ongasekho okusingatha inkampani yakhe.UMkhonza uthe ngokwazi kwabo uMjik’jelwa ubeziphathele inkampani yedwa yingakho zonke izinto zakhe kumele zikhulunywe abazali bakhe nabalandeli.
title: Akakaqokwa ozokwengamela amaqembu kaMjik’jelwa

text: UNEPHUPHO lokudlala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba yango-2023, uKhutha Mchunu, oyi-tighthead prop kwiCell C Sharks.UMchunu (21) waseGreytown, udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala kwiVodacom Super Rugby ngeledlule ezakhe zinenebula iSunwolves ngo 45-10, eSingapore.Ngokusho kukaMchunu nakuba kusesekuseni ukuqagela ngekusasa lakhe, iphupho lakhe ukuthola ijezi njalo kwiSharks, nathi uma kungahamba ngokwezifiso zakhe, uzodlala noma kanjani kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ezoba seFrance ngo-2023.Namuhla iSharks izobhekana neBlues, eKings Park, emdlalweni ozoqala ngo-3.05pm. UMchunu utshele leli phephandaba ngezifiso zakhe zamanje nezangomuso.“Okwamanje isifiso sami ukuthola ijezi kwiSharks kulo mqhudelwano omkhulukazi iSuper Rugby. Kungakuhle uma ngingasinqoba lesi sicoco neSharks ngoba akukaze kwenzeke. Ngiyathemba ukuthi uma konke kuhambe kahle, ngizoqala ukubonakala kumaSpringboks. Ngo-2023 ngifuna ukuyodlala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba,” usho kanje uMchunu obumbona ngisho ebusweni ukuthi ufuna ukuya eFrance.Ephawula ngokudlala okokuqala kwiSuper Rugby, uMchunu uthe: “Namanje angikakholwa ukuthi ngidlale emqhudelwaneni omkhulu ngale ndlela. Bekuyiphupho lami ngineminyaka engu-13 ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngidlale kulo mqhudelwano.”Ebuzwa ngabadlali abukela kubona ebholeni lo mbhoxo, uMchunu ubale igama elijwayelekile akholelwa ekutheni limenze wathanda lo mdlalo.“Ngeke ngingalibali igama likaBeast (esho uTendai Mtawarira), kakhulu akwenzele lo mdlalo. Angikhulumi nje kuphela ngokudlala enkundleni, kodwa nezinto azenzele abamnyama ngalo mdlalo ziyamangalisa Empeleni uBeast usenze singabantu aba-mnyama sakholelwa ekutheni nathi singawudlala lo mdlalo. Ukudlala naye namuhla kungenza ngizizwe ngithobeke kakhulu.“Kuningi engikufunda kuyena, kangangoba njengamanje nginesifiso sokuthi uma sengimi kahle kwezezimali, kube khona okuyinkulisa engikwenzayo eGreytown ukuthuthukisa lo mdlalo kubantu abamnyama,” kusho uMchunu.Imidlalo yeSuper RugbyNamuhla:Brumbies v Chiefs (GIO Stadium, 10.45am); Sharks v Blues (Jonnson Stadium, 3pm); Stormers v Lions (Cape Town Stadium, 5.15pm); Jaguares v Bulls (Stadio Jose Amalfitani, 11.40pm).
title: UMchunu weSharks ulambele ijezi lamaBhokobhoko

text: LENZA iziqu zobudokotela iningi labafundi abebefunda esikoleni iBizimali High elenza ezibukwayo ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa imiphumela ka-matric nyakenye, liphasa ngamalengiso.Umcimbi wokuhlonipha abafundi abangu-10 abaqengqeleza phambili ku-matric wango-2019 ubungoMgqibelo, emagcekeni esikole. Kugqame ikhono lothisha lokufundisa njengoba bamukelwe bonke emanyuvesi amakhulu kuleli emikhakheni ehlukene.OwayenguMengameli kuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma obeyisikhulumi esiqavile, uncome isikole esisemakhaya ngokwenza kahle minyaka yonke uma kumenyezelwa imiphumela ka-matric.UZuma wethule inkulumo emfishane njengoba engakalulami kahle kwazise uke waxinwa ukugula.“Niyithemba kithina elikhulu. Nothisha bakulesi sikole bayisibonele esihle. Sifisa ukubonga kini nonke ngokuthatha isikole esisemakhaya nisibeke kwibalazwe,” kusho uZuma.Umsakazi woKhozi FM ophinde abe ngumnikazi wesikole sokuphothula izifundo zika-matric iMatric School of Excellence esiseThekwini, uBheka ‘Beekay’ Mchunu weluleke abafundi, wabaxwayisa ngakubize ngokuphapha.“Ningaphuthumi ukungena kwezothando kodwa hambani niyofunda nibuye nisebenze nishintshe izimo zasemakini,” kusho uMchunu.Abebehlonishwa nguSiyabonga Cele owalala endaweni yesishiyagalombili kuzwelonke kwabaphasa ngamalengiso owenza iziqu ze- Actuarial Science e-Wits University, uBayanda Mdlalose owenza i- Actuarial Science e-Wits, uSiphesihle Msomi owenza iMechanical Engineering e-University of Pretoria, uSipho Shelembe owenza iMedicine e-University of KwaZulu-Natal(UKZN), uPhindile Zungu owenza eze-Optometry e-UKZN, uMinenhle Biyela owenza iMedicine e-Medical University of Southern Africa (Medunsa), uNoxolo Biyela owenza iMedicineeMedunsa, uSiphesihle Mbambo owenza iMedicine e- UKZN, uThubalakhe Makhoba owenza iMedicine eMedunsa noZethembe Zungu owenza B Com Accounting e- University of Cape town.Abamabhizinisi ahlukene noZuma bahalalisele lezi zitshudeni ngokuzipha izipho ezehlukene.Inkampani yabangcwabi Amathole Funeral inikele ngama- laptop awu-10 enani elilinganiselwa ku- R58 000, iProcess Litho ibambisene noMfundisi Colleen Dlomo yanikela ngawu-10, uZuma wanikela ngamahlanu kwathiIthala lanikela ngama- hamper.UMnuz Vezokuhle Nala ongumnikazi we-Amathole Funeral, uthe basazoqhubeka nokubhekelela izikole zasemakhaya ezenza kahle ngezinsiza-kufunda.“Kuyajabulisa ukubona isikole sasemakhaya siphumelela. Njengomuntu okhulele emakhaya ngiyabazi ubunzima obubhekana nabafunda kulezi zikole,” kusho uNala.
title: Kuhlonishwe abafundi basemakhaya

text: NGESIKHATHI sezibhelu ngeminyaka yabo-1987, baningi kakhulu abantu abadukelana eMgungundlovu namaphethelo, lapho inkaba yami ikhona. Wawugcina ungazi noma umuntu wadlula nalo yini udlame, okanye usadla anhlavana.Nami baningi engathuka sengizithela kubona ngemuva kweminyaka, engangicabanga ukuthi mhlawumbe base baba mathambo mhlophe. Ngiyazi nami bakhona ababecabanga ukuthi ngaba yingxenye yezinkulungwane ezalahlekelwa yimiphefumulo ngesikhathi sodlame.Isimo seCoronavirus esibhekene naso njengamanje, sisenza siqhelelane njenganezikhathi zodlame, sekusiza kona nje ukuthi umhlaba sewathuthuka kakhulu, sesikwazi ukuxhumana ngezindlela eziningi ezihlukene yize singasondelene.Nami-ke angihlukile kulabo abavele banyamalala ngesikhathi kubekwa umthetho kathaqa ezweni, ngenxa yeCoronavirus. Kakade njengamanje izinto azihambi njengokujwayelekile, futhi kuningi okonakalayo.Nokho, sengithi namuhla angithi memfu EMGODINI, ke ngisike elijikayo ngesimo esibhekene naso kwiPremier Soccer Leaguer (PSL), esidalwa iyona belu iCorona. Angisoze ngizenze umuntu owazi kangcono kunosihlalo wePSL, * -Irvin Khoza, nethimba asebenzisana nalo kodwa ngithi nje nami ake ngiphonse itshe esivivaneni.Inkinga esibhekene nayo njengamanje wukuthi izoqedelwa kanjani imidlalo yePSL esele, ngaphandle kokubeka engozini impilo yabadlali. Akukho ukungabaza ukuthi iCorona idla lubi futhi ilokhu ibhebhetheka zonke izinsuku.Ngike ngezwa kancane kuthiwa emhlanganweni wePSL neSouth African Football Association (Safa), kuphume izwi lokuthi imidlalo iqedelwe eGauteng yonke. Kuyavela futhi ukuthi banazo izinhlelo abazozilandela ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabadlali kule midlalo esele.Uma ngingaphosisi, lapha sikhuluma ngemidlalo ecela ko-54 ye-Absa Premiership, okumele idlalwe ukuze kusongwe isizini. Engikwazi kahle wukuthi akulula ukuthatha isinqumo ngemidlalo yePremiership ngoba kuthinteka nabaxhasi.Angikucacise kuhlale obala ukuthi ngiyaqonda ukuthi iPSL ngeke ivele iyithathe njengento engekho isizini ka-2019/2020, ngoba iningi kakhulu imali yabaxhasi esetshenzisiwe. Nami futhi angihambisani nalowo mbono.Kuyavela futhi ukuthi i-Absa ishaya amakhala ngokusayina isivumelwano esisha nePSL (isizini ezayo ngeyokugcina kulesi esikhona), ngakho ukuthatha imali yayo (i-Absa) uyifake emfuleni imuke namanzi, kungafana nokuthatha umuntu obangwa nezibi umemboze ngeqhwa, ngethemba lokuthi ngeke afe.Engikubona kuyingozi enkulu, yikona ukuqedela imidlalo yePSL ngoba kunzima ukulwa negciwane elingaqondakali nelingabonakali njengeCorona. Lapho-ke ngibona sengathi sizobe sidlala ngegeja kuziliwe, sigenda impilo yabadlali budlabha.Ngokwami isizini yePSL kumele kuvele kuthiwe seyiphelile ngoba angiboni isimo sizovuma ukuthi kuqedelwe imidlalo njengamanje. Nalapho ngiyazi miningi imibuzo eqhamukayo efana nokuthi kuzothiwani ngesicoco se-Absa Premiership, yimaphi amaqembu azodliwa yizembe nokuthi yimaphi eGladAfrica Championship azokhuphuka.Nangu-ke umbono wami. Njengoba ngishilo, ayithathwe njengesiphelile isizini ka-2019/2020. Ngiyazi baningi abangahambisani nalokhu kodwa isicoco kumele sinikwe iqembu eliphezulu (okuyiKaizer Chiefs), uma kuthathwa isinqumo sokwenza lokho. Ngebhadi-ke iCorona ibheduke kuyilona iqembu eliphezuluAkungabi khona iqembu elizodliwa yizembe kule sizini kwi-Absa Premiership, okuchaza ukuthi ngesizini ezayo kuzoqhubeka amaqembu afanayo. Nokho ekupheleni kwesizini ezayo amaqembu amabili ePremiership azodliwa yizembe, kungadlalwa eyokuhlunga.Uma sekuqalwa isizini entsha, isimo sesivuma, kwiGladAfrica Championship akuqedelwe imidlalo esele (ka-2019/2020) ngesikhathi kwi-Absa Premiership beqala isizini ka-2020/2021.Amaqembu amabili azoqeda phezulu kwiChampionship (njengoba kuzoqedelwa imidlalo yakhona ka-2019/2020) kuzoba yiwona azonyukela kwiPremiership ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2020/2021. Ngeke idlalwe eyokuhlunga.Uma eseqede imidlalo yeligi amaqembu eChampionship, kuzomele kukhulunywe nabaxhasi iGladAfrica ukuthi ngesizini ka-2020/2021 adlale iGladAfrica Cup ezodlalwa imidlalo ewu-15 kuphela bese kutholakala umpetha. Lapha kuzobe kungabhekiwe ukuthi kukhona abazonyukela kwiPremiership ngoba azobe esaziwa amaqembu azonyuka ekupheleni kwesizini.IGladAfrica Cup izobe yenzelwa ukuthi amaqembu eNational First Division (NFD) angahlali nje, kube khona azobe ekwenza ngesizini ka-2019/2020. Sekuyothi uma sekufika isikhathi seNedbank Cup ayihlungele njengoba ehlale enza.Kwi-ABC Motsepe nakhona kuzokwenzeka okufanayo. Bazaqedela imidlalo imidlalo esele bese bedlala imidlalo yokuhlunga kazwelonke lapho kuqala isizini ka-2020/2021. Amaqembu amabili ayodla umhlanganiso, ayoze anyukele kwiChampionship ekuphelelni kwesizini ezoqala (2010/2021).Nakhona bangadlala i-ABC Motsepe Cup ukuze bangahlali isizini yonke bengenzi lutho. Leyo Motsepe Cup ingahlelwa ngendlela yomqhudelwano womkhumulajezi ongadonsa isizini yonke ngoba maningi amaqembu kulesi sigaba.Amaqembu okumele alale ngenxeba kuyo yonke le nto, ngaweSAB League okungamele alinde nje isimo size sibuyele kwesijwayelekile, ukuze athole ukukhuphukela phezulu.Ngiyazi ukuthi kulula ukusho kunokwenza kodwa ekugcineni kumele kuphunywe nesisombululo. ICorona ihlakaze zonke izinhlelo kodwa manje kumele kube khona indlela eya phambili yize kukhona abazonyatheleka amakhona. Ngokwami kungakuhle ukuthi sizame ukuqala isizini entsha ka-2020/2021 ngoSepthemba, sesiyiqonda kangcono iCorona.Bengimane ngiphonsa nje esivivaneni, ngiyazi umhlonishwa uKhoza nethimba lakhe kwiPSL, bazi kangcono kunami. Niphephe kwiCorona, ningabi wuvanzi. Shwi!
title: Akuthiwe kuphelile ngesizini ka-2019/20

text: UPHINDE wazenzela ugazi kubalandeli bakanobhutshuzwayo umqeqeshi weBanyana Banyana, uDesiree Ellis, ngokuvikela indebe yeCosafa Women’s Championship ayinqobe ngonyaka odlule.Amagoli eBanyana aqotshelwe phakathi nguRefiloe Jane ngokwehlukana kweziwombe zalo mdlalo wamanqamu obuseWolfson Stadium, eBhayi ngoMgqibelo.Elokubika ekhaya emuva eCameroon lishaywe nguMbelec.Ngemuva komdlalo umqeqeshi u-Ellis uphawule wathi: "Besibhekene nobunzima kulo mdlalo kodwa okuhle ngaleli qembu ukuthi aliliphonsi ithawula kalula njengoba lilwe kwaze kwaba sekugcineni.”Ngakolunye uhlangothi umqeqeshi weCameroon, uBernadette Zang uthe kube ngumdlalo omuhle njengoba elungiselela imidlalo ye-Afcon.“Sidlale kahle kakhulu kunesikhathi esedlule," kusho uZang. Kuyiwe ekhefini iBanyana ihamba phambili ngo 1-0 ngenguzunga yegoli elibekwe phakathi nguJane sekusele amanenjana unompempe athi khumu amaqembu awayophuza amanzi nokuthi bathole amaqhinga amasha kubaqeqeshi.Kwesesibili isiwombe iCameroon icindezele umdlalo zisuka ebhandeni abadlali bayo bekhombisa ukuthi bazimisele ngokuthola igoli lokulinganisa.Ukudlala ngale ndlela kweqembu laseCameroon kwenze abadlali beBanyana baqala baxhamazela nobekwenza balahle amabhola amaningi.Nakuba kuyakhulunywa ukuthi izintokazi zaseCameroon ezidlala ngokusebenzisa isikhwepha azilitholanga igoli lokuninganisa kungenxa kanozinti weBanyana uKaylin Swart, oqokwe njengomdlali wosuku, obala ukhasha oluza ngakuye.Ukuqhubeka nokucindezela kweCameroon ekugcineni kuthele izithelo ngesikhathi uMbeleck eshayela izwe lakhe igoli lokulinganisa.Okuqaphelekile ngalawa mazwe womabili ukuthi iBanyana ibiqala ukuhamba phambili bese kuthi iqembu edlala nayo libuye lilinganise kulo mqhudelwano.Ngokunjalo neCameroon ibiqala ukulandela ngemuva eqenjini ebidlala nalo kule midlalo.Bekuyigoli lokuqala ukungenela unozinti weBanyana uSwart njengoba kuyona yonke imidlalo abayidlale ngaphambi kokuthi bafinyelele kowamanqamu, bekungakaze adedele ibhola lidlule kuyena.Ngemizuzu yokugcina esikhathini esengezwe sikanompempe, uJane uphinde wavalela elinye lesibili elihlanyise ibhentshi leBanyana ebeselilungiselela ukushaywa kwamaphenathi.Ngemuva komdlalo umengameli weCosafa uPhilllp Chiyangwa utshele abantu baseNelson Mandela Bay ukuthi lomqhudelwano ubuyela khona ngonyaka ozayo.
title: UJane ube yiqhawe leBanyana

text: Lesi sitebele somculo ebesizinze eGoli sikalowo obengumgcinimafa wophiko lwentsha lwe-ANC, uReggie Nkabinde, sivule iminyango yaso kabusha kusukela ngenyanga dlule.Okhulumela iMabala Noise, uKeke Mokoena, uthe lesi sitebele sibuye ngezinkani futhi sizokwenza umehluko kwezobuciko.“UReggie ubuyile futhi uzogxila kwezobuciko manje. Uzimisele ukuqhubeka nokwenza umehluko kwezokungcebeleka njengoba ayeqalile ekuqaleni ngokuthi avumbulule amakhono abaculi abangaziwa, awathuthukise ukuze ahlonishwe embonini yezokungcebeleka emhlabeni jikelele,” kusho uKeke.Yize uKeke eveze eyokuthi lesi sitebele sibuya ngabaculi abasha kodwa ucele ukungabadaluli labo baculi okwamanje.“Bakhona esesibasayinile nesisaxoxa nabo. Ngenxa yokuthi kuseva sicela ukungabavezi amagama abo okwamanje kodwa izwe lizokwazi kungekudala,” kusho uKeke.IMabala Noise Entertainment iguqe nyakenye ngesikhathi kuvela ukuthi uReggie useyogxila kwezepolitiki.Lesi sitebele sizakhele igama eminyakeni edlule siveza uhla lwamaciko ebesizosebenza ngawo. Phakathi kwawo bekukhona abaculi nabalingisi abadumile. Abaculi abebephethwe iMabala Noise bekuGigi LaMayne, Zakwe, Nasty C, Zola, PRO, Major League DJz, DJ Finzo nabanye. Kubalingisi kwakukhona uLetoya Makhene, Khanyi Mbau noKay Sibiya nabanye.IMabala Noise ibiyaziwa ngokuphatha kahle abaculi bayo beyitamuza imali abanye begijima ngezimoto eziphambili.
title: Ithembisa okukhulu iMabala Noise ebuyile

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEI-NFP isiyazisola ngobudlelwano eyangena kubo ne-ANC komasipala abawu-19 KwaZulu-Natal ngo-2011.Isifunge yagomela ukuthi emuva kokhetho oluzayo ayizimisele ukuthi iphathe imikhandlu nelinye iqembu uma iphumelela.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi abaholi bayo bezungeza idolobha laseThekwini izolo begaya ivoti kubantu, bebathembisa nokuthi kumele bafike embuthanweni wokwethula umhlahlandlela wayo wokhetho ozoba ngoMgqibelo ukuzozizwela ezinye zezinto ezizobe zikhulunywa nguMengameli wabo, uNkk Zanele Magwaza-Msibi.I-ANC eKZN, ngomlomo kaMnuz Mdumseni Ntuli, ithe uma iNFP ikhuluma kanje kusho ukuthi isifuna ukuphuma kuhulumeni izimele njengeqembu elibusayo.Uthe: “Nakuba ubudlelwano bethu komasipala bube nezinkinga ezintweni esasivumelene ngazo kodwa asikawudwebi umugqa obomvu wokuthi ngeke sisaphinde sisebenzisane nabo uma kwenzeka kuba nomasipala abadinga kubanjiswane kubo.”USihlalo weNFP, Mnuz Maliyakhe Shelembe, uthe komasipala abebebambisene kubo ne-ANC bazithole bebukeleka phansi ngenxa yokuthi ibisuke inezinhloso zayo abangazazi.“Sidelile ngokusebenzisana esibe nakho ne-ANC, ngakho asifuni ukuphinda lelo phutha lokubambisana nenye inhlangano uma kudlula ukhetho kodwa sifuna ukuziwinela ingcaca ngaphandle kokudinga ukubambisana nabanye. Komasipala esiphethe kubo ngokubambisana izinto kazihambi kahle nabantu bahlale bekhala ngentuthuko kodwa lapho esiziphathele khona sisodwa njengaKwaNongoma, Dumbe nasoPhongolo akunazinkinga. Ngakho sifuna ukuphuma kulobu budlelwano uma kufika ukhetho siziphathele sodwa,” kusho uShelembe.Ubuye waphawula ngamakhansela asebashiyile ajoyina ezinye izinhlangano wathi bona kabanandaba nawo ngoba abevele evilapha futhi abethanda izikhundla.UShelembe ubehambisana nesigungu seqembu okubalwa kuso uNobhala Jikelele uSolwazi Nhlanhla Khubisa, ilungu lePhalamende uMnuz Scelo Mabika, umholi wentsha uMnuz Sbu Mncwabe, nabanye.UShelembe uqhube wathi uma abantu bengakukholwa akushoyo kumele babheke ukuthi amakhansela noma abaholi abalaxaze iNFP abekho yini ohlwini lokuba ngamakhansela okufoloswe ngawo emaqenjini asebewajoyinile.“Sebefike emaqenjini abawajoyinile bathatha indawo yabantu abakade babakhona. Sekuyibo osekufoloswa ngabo nokufakazela ukuthi bashiya iNFP ngoba bebona ukuthi abazukuqokwa njengamakhansela,” kusho uShelembe.I-NFP yasungulwa ngo-2011 yangenela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya nolukazwelonke ngempumelelo, kodwa izinto kazihambi kahle ngoba kuyaliwa kubangwa izikhundla. abanye bagcina sebenukwa ngokufa kwabanye abaholi ngaphakathi.Ngaphandle kwalokho komasipala abawu-19 iNFP eyayibambisane kubo ne-ANC kugcine ngokuthi abahlanu babuyele ku-IFP. Phakathi kwabo kubalwa iNkandla, Mthonjaneni, Hluhluwe (Big 5 False Bay), Ntambanana nowaKwaHlabisa.
title: ‘Ngeke siphinde siphathe kanye nelinye iqembu’

text:
MCEBO MPUNGOSEICIKO elibalwa nahlonishwayo kuhip hop kuleli, u-Ifani, uthi kudingeke ukuthi ahlabe ikhefu emculweni emva kokutinyelwa amanye amaciko nabalandeli enkundleni yokuxhumana u-twitter.Nyakenye lo mrepha wasusa umsindo i-albhamu yakhe idayisa amakhophi angi-20 000 osukwini lokuqala iphumile. Wamemezela lokhu ku-twitter nokuyilapho abantu bemsola ngendlela adayisa ngayo le albhamu, abanye bethi empeleni inkampani yotshwala iRedd’s eyathenga amakhophi angu-20 000 ayo.“Kuningi okwashiwo abantu ku-twitter endimeni yehip hop emva kokuphuma kwe-albhamu yami. Lokho kwangenza ukuthi ngithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngiziqhelelanise nomculo kancane ngizibheke mina ngezinto ezashiwo abantu ngokunjalo nobudlelwano bami nabantu basekhaya nokunye okuningi,” kuchaza u-Ifani.Uthi kusukela kuleso sikhathi akaze anandise emcimbini omkhulu futhi akaze aqophe amaculo amasha.“Ngigcine ngikhiphe iculo elilodwa ku-albhamu yami, elithi 
Ayadelela. Nonyaka ngiziqala phansi ngisabalalise amanye ngoba ngifuna i-albhamu yami ifinyelele ekudayiseni i-platinum,” kuqhuba yena.Ngaphandle komsindo owasuka nge-albhamu yakhe, u-Ifani uke waba nezinkinga nesitebele abeqopha kusonao iSony Music Group. Utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi inkontileka yakhe nalesi sitebele isiphelile, ngoJulayi uzokwethula isitebele sakhe somculo.“Ngijabule kakhulu ukuthi sengizokwazi ukuba nesitebele esiphethwe yimina ngenze umsebenzi wami kahle ngokukhululeka ngoba ngizobe sengizithathela mina zonke izinqumo,” usho kanje.U-Ifani kamuva nje ube ngomunye wabaculi abasethubeni lokuwina indodo kumaSouth African Music Awards njengoba eqokwe eminxeni weBest Music Video of the Year nge-video ye-
Ayadelela.Ngo-2014 lo mrepha wanqoba indondo yeBest Rap Album kanti uthe nakulokhu ufuna ukuyithola eyeBest Music Video kulo mcimbi ozobe use-ICC , eThekwini ngoJuni 4.
title: Umrepha wodumo usahlabe ikhefu emculweni

text: PHEZU kokuba uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi uNksz Bathabile Dlamini egcizelele ukuthi bonke abahola impesheni bazoyithola ngo-Ephreli 1, kunengebhe kwabayiholayo ngenxa yesixakaxaka esikhona.Abahola isibonelelo sikahulumeni okubalwa imali yokuguga, eyokugula, eyezingane neyezintandane bawubheke ngabomvu u-Ephreli 1 ozoba umayihlokoze wokushiwo nguNgqongqoshe.Udaba lakwaSassa nesivumelwano nenkampani eholalelayo iCash Paymaster Services (CPS) lusematheni njengoba kuke kwabikwa ukuthi le nkampani iyaphucwa inkontileka. Kubuye kwavela ukuthi uNgqongqoshe useyilungisile indaba yemipesheni waqinisekisa ukuthi yonke izotholakala ngenyanga ezayo.UNkk Bongi Ndlovu (67), waKwaMashu ungomunye wabangenwe ngamanzi emadolweni ngenxa yalolu daba. UNkk Ndlovu othembele empeshenini yokuguga ayiqale eneminyaka engu-60, uthe azisamphuthi izindaba ngoba efuna ukuzwa okwenzekayo ngodaba lomholo wabo.“Selokhu yaqala le ndaba ngiyayilandela ngoba ingiphethe kabi. Ngithembele kuyona le mali kuzo zonke izidingo zasendlini ngoba ngisho imishwalensi ngiyikhokhela ngayo. Izingane zami sezashada zihlala emzini yazo. Yize uvalo lusekhona kodwa ngiqine isibindi ngizwa uMengameli eqinisekisa ukuthi sizohola ngoba angiboni ukuthi angaqamba amanga,” kusho uNkk Ndlovu.Abusafiki ubuthongo kuNkk Selina Khumalo (77) waseMariannhill ohola impesheni yokuguga eyondla abazukulu abathathu abafundayo nomzukulwana.“Ayikho into esiyixoxayo manje nezinye izalukazi ngaphandle kwalena yomholo. Mina anginayo ngisho ithelevishini nomsakazo, konke ngikuzwa ngabantu. Bagcina sebekhuluma okuningi njengoba abanye bethi kuthiwa ngeke sihole sonke,” echaza.UNkk Khumalo uthe unovalo lokuthi ikati lizolala eziko uma kwenzeka engaholi ngoba kumanje unezikweletu komashonisa nasebhange.Esithangamini nabezindaba ePitoli izolo, uNksz Dlamini uqinisekise izwe ukuthi izibonelelo zizokhokhwa ngenyanga ezayo.Uthe yize ingekho inkontileka esayiniwe kodwa abantu abangu-17 million abathembele kule mali bazoyithola nakanjani.“Siqinisekisa nyanga zonke ukuthi isabelo esingu-R140 billion sezimpesheni siyafinyelela kubantu abafanele ngesikhathi. Nyanga zonke sikhokha * -R11 billion, ngifuna ukutshela umphakathi ukuthi sizoyikhokha yonke imali yesibonelelo ngo-Ephreli 1,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.Uthe ziningi ezinye izinhlaka abaxoxa nazo kubalwa nabeposi lakuleli njengenye yezinkampani zikahulumeni ezingenza umsebenzi wokuholela abantu.Ugxeke abezindaba ngokubanga umsindo ngento engekho yokuthi abantu ngeke bazithole izibonelelo zabo kusuka ngenyanga ezayo.“Abezindaba abasusa leli sasasa lokuthi ngeke sikhokhe ngo-Ephreli 1. Nenze kwangaba nozinzo ezweni, ogogo nomkhulu abahamba amabanga amade uma beyohola. Abantu ababalulekile njengoba siwuqinisekisa nomphakathi ukuthi uzohola ngenyanga ezayo ilabo abathola izibonelelo,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.Uthe labo abangakholwa ukuthi izibonelelo zizokhokhwa abalinde kuphele le nyanga.UNksz Dlamini unqabile ukuphawula ngokusula isigubhukane kobenguMqondisi-Jikelele kulo mnyango, uMnuz Zane Dangor, okhale ngokuthi bebungasebuhle ubudlelwano bokusebenza phakathi kwakhe nongqongqoshe. UNksz Dlamini uthe ngeke baphawule okuningi ngaye ngoba akuyona indlela abenza ngayo izinto.“Uma yena ehambe wenza izinsolo ezithile wukuthanda kwakhe. Ungumuntu ohlonishwayo emkhakheni wezokuthukiswa komphakathi ngeke ngize ngiphawule ngezinto ezithinta yena, sizozixoxa ngaphakathi,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.
title: Izalukazi zinovalo ngemali yempesheni

text: UKUVULWA kwazo zonke izindawo ezidayisa utshwala ngokusemthethweni kungasiza ekugwemeni isiminyaminya sabathengi esingadalwa wukuthutheleka endaweni eyodwa ukuyofuna okokucima ukoma okungagcina sekubhebhethikisa igciwane iCorona.Lokhu kuvezwe nguMqondisi wezokuLawula nenqubomgomo kwaSA Breweries, uNksz Hellen Ndlovu, ngesikhathi ephawula ngesimemezelo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokugunyazwa kokudayiswa kotshwala esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa kusuka ngoMsombuluko ozayo.Uthe uphakamisa ukuthi okungenani utshwala budayiswe kusuka phakathi kuka-9 ekuseni no-5 ntambama phakathi nezinsuku, bese kuthi ngoMgqibelo budayiswe kusuka ngo-9 ekuseni kuya ku-12 emini, ngeSonto nangamaholidi zingavulwa izindawo ezidayisa utshwala.Uthe lukhona uhlelo olubizwa ngeCheck and Collect, abangalusebenzisa ukugwema imigqa emide ezindaweni okudayiswa kuzo utshwala ezisemthethweni.“Sihlela ukuthi izindawo ezidayisa utshwala zisebenzise i-App lapho abathengi bezokwazi ukufaka khona ama-oda besebenzisa iWhatsApp baqhamuke sebezothatha abakuthengile kunokuthi bame kolayini,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Unxuse abaphuza utshwala ukuthi babuphuzele emakhaya futhi bazihloniphe ukuze kungagcini sekusizakala labo abagxeka ukubuyiswa kokudayiswa kwabo.Sekulindwe isithangami songqongqoshe okulindeleke sicacise ngezinsuku nangezikhathi okuzodayiswa ngazo utshwala.Enkulumeni kaRamaphosa ngeSonto ebusuku uthe zonke izindawo ezidayisa utshwala ngokusemthethweni kubalwa nezisemalokishini zizovulwa.Usomnotho kwa-IQ Businesses uMnuz Sifiso Kenjana, uthe ukuvulwa kweminye iminxa yamabhizinisi kuzolekelela kakhulu ukufukula umnotho ikakhulu kulesi sikhathi njengoba elakuleli lifakwe kwinzikamnotho.“Kusemandleni ethu ukuqinisekisa ukukhula komnotho sibe senza isiqiniseko sokuthi abantu baphephile. Sesilinde ukubona iminxa yezomnotho iqala ukusebenza nokuthi izoqinisekisa kanjani ukuphepha kwabantu,” kusho uKenjana.
title: Izinhlelo zokudayisa utshwala  ngezobuchwepheshe

text: KUSHONE umfana oneminyaka emithathu okuthiwa ugwazwe uyise ongamzali amanxeba amaningi eMahikeng, North West.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseNorth West, uColonel Adele Myburgh, uthe isigameko senzeke ngoLwesithathu.Akwaziwa ukuthi kungani le ndoda igwaze izingane ezimbili, enye iphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.Le ndoda nayo ibe isizibulala.“Amaphoyisa abizwe emzini wale ndoda eBokone, eMahikeng. Afice isidumbu somfanyana oneminyaka emithathu edamini legazi. Umfowabo oneminyaka eyisikhombisa yena ube esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela elimele kanzima. Ngokolwazi olutholakele, lo wesilisa ufike wagwaza izingane wabe esebaleka endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uMyburgh.Lo wesilisa ube eselandelwa amaphoyisa, imoto yakhe itholwe ngaphansi kwesihlahla, eseshonile.Kuvulwe icala lokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala nedokodo ngokushona komuntu.Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa eNorth West, uLieutenant General Baile Motswenyane, usigxekile lesi senzo wathi kumele kukhulunywe emphakathini ngodaba lokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabesifazane.
title: Ugwaze izingane ezimbili enye yafa

text: KUSUKE umsindo ngesizathu esibekwe umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana, uStuart Baxter, sokungabizi eqenjini lesizwe umdlali we-Orlando Pirates uXola “Ten-Ten” Mlambo (27) osefomini kulezi zinsuku.UBaxter utshele abezindaba ukuthi yize elibona ikhono likaMlambo kodwa akamqokanga ngoba engenalo ijubane futhi neminyaka ayimvumeli. Lo mqeqeshi ubememezela iqembu elizobhekana neSeychelles emidlalweni emibili yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) eseCameroon ngonyaka ozayo.Kubadlali basesiswini ubize uDean Furman, Teboho Mokoena, Lebogang Maboe, Hlompho Kekana, Sibusiso Vilakazi, Thabo Nodada, Kamohelo Mokotjo noVincent Pule.“Ngibe nemihlangano nePirates. Ngibatshelile ukuthi ulidonsile iso lami. Kodwa okwamanje ngibheke ukuqinisa iqembu. Ngicabanga ukuthi okwamanje ngobani esizobhekana nabo. Ngimcabangile sizodlala neLibya ngenxa yekhono lakhe lokudlala ezikhaleni ezincane. Kodwa futhi besazi ukuthi kuzomele sisebenzise ijubane uma siyivala iLibya. KwiPirates akadlali ngale ndlela, ngabanye abadlali ababuya ngokushesha kunaye (uma kumakwa).“Ngicabanga ukuthi uselinyusile izinga kodwa ngibone kungcono ukuqoka umdlali osemncane. Angisho ukuthi akenzi kahle kodwa uma ngibhekelela ikusasa kuhle ukukhetha umdlali osemncane,” ucashunwe esho kanje uBaxter emithonjeni yabezindaba.Abebengayizwa incazelo kaBaxter bathe kuwukucasha ngesithupha ukubalula ubudala bukaMlambo uma kubhekwa ukuthi uke waqoka uSiphiwe Tshabalala eqenjini lesizwe ngesikhathi lizodlala eyokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba nyakenye.UBongani Yengwa ongumqeqeshi abuye ahlaziye ibhola kuKhozi FM, naye uzibona ziwukucasha izizathu ezibekwe uBaxter ngoMlambo. “Baningi vele abadlali abengakhetha kubona kodwa izizathu zakhe azizwakali. Akunabo ubulungiswa uma ezobalula iminyaka ngoba vele iqembu lethu akusilona elabadlali abancane. Uma udlala eyokuhlunga awubheki iminyaka kodwa ubheka abadlali abasefomini abazokulethela imiphumela oyidingayo.“Uma kuwukuthi akanalo ijubane angabekwa nabanye abadlali abanalo futhi ke iSeychelles esizodlala nayo akusilona iqembu ongathi liyashesha. Yena bekumele asho ukuthi uMlambo ngeke angene endleleni yena afuna ukudlalisa ngayo ngoba uma sikhuluma ngefomu, yena usefomini. Awubi umdlali osefomini ngokuthi ugijima kangakani kodwa kuya ngokuthi uma usenkundleni uyakwenza okudingeka kuwena,” kusho uYengwa.IBafana izodlala neSeychelles ngo-Okthoba 13 nango-Okthoba 16. Kumele iyinqobe le midlalo ukugeza izinhliziyo zabalandeli ngemuva kokushaya into ephansi ibanjwela ekhaya iLibya ngo 0-0 eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ngenyanga edlule.
title: Umsindo ngencazelo kaBaxter yokuziba uMlambo kwelesizwe
Ngeke unqanyulwe ugesi kuleli sonto

text: UMQEQESHI weRangers FC, uSteven Gerrard, uncome umdlali weBafana Bafana, uBongani Zungu, ngokuba wuhlobo lomdlali abebemfuna ukuqinisa ngaye iqembu.UZungu kugcine kumlungele ejoyina iRangers edlala kwiScottish Premiership ngemizuzu yokugcina ngaphambi kokuvakwa kwewindi.Kuke kwaba nokungabaza ukuthi lo mdlali oyibamba esiswini uzoya kuleli qembu ngemuva kokuvela kwemibiko ethi iRangers isimanqika ngoba ikhala ngokuthi uzimukile. UZungu wayichitha njengampunge le mibiko.NgoMsombuluko iqembu liqinisekisile ukuthi selifinyelele esivumelwaneni sokumboleka isizini eyodwa uZungu eqenjini lakhe i-Amiens yaseFrance. UZungu ubengekho ezinhlelweni ze-Amiens kusukela kuqale isizini entsha eFrance ngemuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi unezingxoxo neRangers.Ephawula uGerrard, oyinkakha yebhola lase-England nozakhele igama edlala kwiLiverpool, uthe uZungu uzoliqinisa iqembu lakhe.“UBongani uwuhlobo lomdlali ebesimfuna, ozoqinisa isisu. Sikubeke obala ukuthi sifuna umdlali ozokwenza siqine isikwati sethu neqembu labawu-11 abazoqala umdlalo. Sikholwa wukuthi uBongani ungena khaxa kulokho,” kusho uGerrard kwi-website yeqembu.“Besifuna umdlali wasesiswini onamandla okwaziyo ukulawula, onegama, ongasiza iqembu futhi akwazi ukusebenzisana nabadlali esinabo. Besilokhu simbhekile isimo sakhe, lesi bese kuyisikhathi esifanele.”UZungu uzojoyina iqembu selinemidlalo ewu-10 yeligi laqoqa amaphuzu awu-26. Okwamanje iRangers isazihola phambili, ihlukaniswe ngamaphuzu amathathu nompetha iCeltic abangemuva ngomdlalo owodwa.IRangers izodlala kwi-Europa League kule sizini, umdlalo wayo wokuqala wamaqoqo ungo-Okthoba 22 neStandard Liege yaseBelgium.“Sikholwa wukuthi sinesikwati esizokwazi ukuncintisana kuyona yonke imiqhudelwano, lapha ekhaya nase-Europe. Sigculisekile, sikubheke ngabomvu ukuthi uBongani ajoyine isikwati,” kuphetha uGerrard.UZungu uthe naye uzihluphile ngokuthola ulwazi ngeqembu aya kulona.“Ngilicubungulile iqembu ngikholwa wukuthi kukhona engizofika nakho okuzolisiza libe ngcono. Ithuba lokudlalela iqembu elikhulu njengaleli nelokudlala emiqhudelwaneni yase-Europe liyangijabulisa,” kusho uZungu.Ukuthola iqembu azodlala kulona uZungu kubukeka kuzomsiza ekutheni abuyele eqenjini lesizwe iBafana.IBafana izogijimisana neNamibia kusasa eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium ngo-7 ebusuku. NgeSonto izodlala neZambia enkundleni efanayo ngo-3 ntambama. Le midlalo ithathwa njengoyokuzicijela ukubhekana neSao Tome and Principe ngoNovemba kweyokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations.
title: Weneme kakhulu ngoZungu umqeqeshi weRangers FC

text: ISOUTH African National Taxi Council (Santaco) KwaZulu-Natal ithi izonquma ngoLwesithathu ukuthi iyasijoyina noma cha isiteleka semboni yamatekisi esiqalile namhlanje esGauteng. Bathwale kanzima abagibeli bamatekisi kulesi sifundazwe ngoMsombuluko ekuseni kulandela isinqumo seSantaco eGauteng sokumisa izimoto njengendlela yokuzwakalalisa ukungenami kwayo ngoxhaso lukahulumeni lukaR1.135 billion lokutakula imboni. Kushayisana imibono phakathi kwabemboni yamatekisi nohulumeni ngalolu xhaso olumenyezelwe ngeledlule njengoba bethi abaneme ngoR5 000 ozotholwa yitekisi ngayinye ngaphansi kwalo njengoba befuna uR20 000. Uxhaso luza nemigomo nemibandela okubalwa kuyo ukubhaliswa kwezimoto ngaphansi kwebhizinisi ukuze likhokhe intela, nokubhaliswa kwabashayeli emnyangweni wezabasebenzi ukuze bahole i-UIF. Imenenja yeSantaco KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sifiso Shangase uthe ubuholi besifundazwe buzohlagana ngoLwesithathu ukudingida izinkinga ababhekene nazo ngenxa yeCovid-19 kanye nesiteleka esesiqalile. Uthe bazodingida nezigameko zokubulawa kwabantu embonini yamatekisi ezidlangile ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule. Uthe bazophinde bathathe isinqumo ngokuthi ososeshini bazoyenyusa nini imali yokugibela phakathi kuka-Agasti no-Septhemba nonyaka. UShangase uthe iCovid-19 iphefumulisa ngenxeba osomotakisi abaningi. "Kunamatekisi enza uR100 ngosuku," kusho uShangase othe abanye abanikazi bamatekisi basabhekene nokukhokhela izikweletu zasebhange.Kuqala lesi siteleka nje, imboni yamatekisi ibivele ikhalaza ngokushaywa indiva uhulumeni ngesikhathi enza izinhlelo zokutakula amabhizinisi ngesikhathi kusanda kuqala ukuvalwa kwezwe ngenxa yeCovid-19. Njengendlela yokulungisa isimo sokuhlakelwa imali, ososeshini baseGauteng bamemezele ukuthi bazokwenyusa imali yokugibela, okushiye abagibeli abaningi bekhala njengoba kwezinye izindawo ibizonyuka ngenani elingaphezulu kuka-100%Khonamanjalo, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha kuleli uMnuz Fikile Mbalula kusasa kulindeleke ukuthi ahlangane nabamele imboni yamatekisi ukudingida abangavumelani ngakho ngoxhaso lwakamuva lukahulumeni.
title: ISantaco eKZN izonquma ngoLwesithathu ngokujoyina isiteleka samatekisi

text: IKOMITI elizama ukuphemba uxolo phakathi kwabaculi bamaskanda abalwayo lizimisele ngokuthi baqhutshwe bayobonana neSilo Samabandla uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu, ukuze bachaze kahle ngokuzibiza ngamakhosi bengakaze babekwe muntu.Umdidiyeli wekomiti uDkt 3 Seconds uthi bazoba nomhlangano ngoLwesine lapho bezobe bebize khona laba baculi uKhuzani ‘Indlamlenze’ Mpungose noMthandeni ‘Igcokama Elisha ‘Manqele abayizimbangi.UDkt 3 seconds ukhulume kanje emuva komhlangano wokulamula obuseMpangeni phakathi nesonto nalapho kufike khona uKhuzani kwathi iGcokama langaphumelela."Isinqumo sizothathwa emhlanganweni ukuthi kuyiwa nini komdala lapho okuzofanele bachaze kahle ukuthi ubani owababeka ezihlalweni zobukhosi ngoba iSilo esibeka amakhosi. ISilo sasho kahle ukuthi asiyifuni indaba yokulwa komaskanda ngoba kugcina kufa abantu baso sangithuma ukuthi ngiyixazulule lento," kusho uDkt 3 Seconds.UZOQHUTSHWA eyobona Imbube uMthandeni Ígcokama Elisha ‘Manqele njengoba bekhuzwa ngokuzibiza ngamakhosi kamaskandaUthe bayophekwa ngemibuzo bechaze kabanzi ngezihloko zamacwecwe abo Inhlinini Yoxolo kaKhuzani nesithi Ithuna leDixa yeGcokama. Ukhale ngokuthi kwakungasafanele laba baculi bakhiphe lezi zihloko ezinokungcofana ngoba base bexolelene.Ukhale kakhulu nangabahleli bemicimbi yomculo kamaskanda wathi bafike baqashe abaculi ekugcineni bengezi uma kunezithangami zokubalamula.‘Kufanele sibambisane nabo bonke abathinteka emculweni kamaskanda ngisho nemisakazo edlala lo mculo akufanele ime kude uma sizama ukulamula laba bafana,’’UKhuzani ethintwa ngalolu daba uvumile ukuthi ubekhona emhlanganweni wathi uma beya koNgangezwe lakhe bayobe beyobika ukuthi sebexolelene akayazi eyokuyoquliswa ngokuzibiza ngamakhosi.“Ibingekho ohlelweni lomhlangano indaba yokuyobonana neSilo angikaze ngikuzwe kushiwo lokho bekuxoxwa nje ngokunye ebesihlangene ngakho,’’ kusho ukhuzani.Igcokama lithe lona alikaze lizibize ngenkosi. Kufanele kuhanjiswe abantu abazibiza ngamakhosi beyochazela iSilo.‘Mina ngibizwa abantu ngenkosi angikaze ngisho ukuthi ngiyiyo. Bakhona abaculi abazibiza ngamakhosi bayaziwa ,’’ kusho Igcokama.
title: Bazobonana neSilo omaskanda abalwayo

text: USAZISOLA namanje uKemiso Motaung osethimbeni leKaizer Chiefs lezokukhangisa ngesenzo sakhe sokugxeka umfowabo uBobby Motaung esidlangalaleni ngenkulumo ayenza ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba eminyakeni eyedlule.Indaba kaKemiso noBobby yaphenduka undabamlonyeni ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nakwabezindaba ngo-2011.UBobby wakhwela wadilika kwabezindaba ethi yena ngeke axoshwe kuChiefs ngoba akafakanga i-CV eqenjini lakubo, Amakhosi, okungelona iqembu lepolikiti.UKemiso wabhala kuFacebook wasola uBobby ngokuphuma eceleni ngenkulumo yakhe ayenza kwabezindaba.NgoLwesihlanu uKemiso ubesemkhankasweni wokuxwayisa abafundi bezikole zaseMzumbe ngengozi yezinkundla zokuxhumana, lapho edalule khona ukuthi usazisola namanje ngokugxeka umfowabo kuFacebook. IChiefs ibihamba nabaxhasi bayo, iVodacom.“Mina ngenza elikhulu iphutha eminyakeni eyedlule. Umfowethu uBobby wakhuluma kabi kubalandeli beqembu ethi yena akazange asifake isicelo somsebenzi kuChiefs. Ayekusho ngakuthatha ngokudinwa, ngathi ngizihlalele nesithandwa sami ngishaya ingilazi yewayini ngathatha ucingo lwami ngabhala kuFacebook ukuthi uBobby usho okungafanele endaweni engeyiyo. Hhayi ngayisusa-ke lapho. Ngagcwala izinkundla zokuxhumana indaba yaba nkulu kwabezindaba. Engangikusho kwakuyiqiniso kodwa sasingekho isidingo sokuthi ngikunameke kuFacebook,” kusho uKemiso.Phakathi kwezikole ebezivakashelwe yiChiefs kukhona iSithokozile High School (okungeyona eKwaDabeka), Zibonele High School, Sinokubonga Junior Primary School, Bongucele Junior Primary School neBonguzwane High School. Isikole ngasinye besikhiphe abafundi abawu-20. Umcimbi ubuseSihlonyaneni Community Hall, eHibberdene.IChiefs iphinde yanikeza bonke abafundi amajezi ayo, abanye bawina ama-airtime, ama-starter pack, ama-USB noyedwa owine iLaptop.“Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi namanje uma ubheka uKemiso Motaung ku-Google kuvele kuqhamuke leyo ndaba yami noBobby. Mina ngabhala kuFacebook ngoba ngithi abantu abangazi, bazi uJesseca, uBobby noJunior (Kaizer). Kusukela lapho-ke abantu bazi ukuthi ngubani uKemiso. Angithandi ukwaziwa kanjalo kodwa nginesiqiniseko sokuthi kunabantu abangazi kanjalo ngoba engakubhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kwasala kanjalo.”Ukhuze nomkhuba wokuthi uma kukhona oshaywayo noma ohlukunyezwayo abantu bese bethatha izithombe bemfaka kuFacebook.IChiefs ibize nabadlali bayo abane kulo mcimbi uCamaldine Abraw, Eric Mathoho, Ryan Moon noKeagan Buchanan. Umcimbi uzovezwa kuKC TV edlala kuSuperSport 4.
title: Uyazisola ngakubhala ku-Facebook

text: UMajor Mandisa Mfeka okhulele eNtuzuma ngaphambi kokuthi bathuthele eMalvern, ungumshayeli wendiza wokuqala ofunde ngobuchule bokulwa ngayo, iCombat Pilot, uthe unina nogogo wakhe bebemthatha ngemoto bayombukisa izindiza kusukela eseneminyaka emihlanu. Ubezifela ngokubuka izindiza, engazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga indiza iyobe isuswa nguye.“Ayikho into ebingichaza njengokubuka ibhanoyi lisuka, ngihleli emotweni. Uma kuwumbukiso wamabhanoyi bengithokoza kakhulu.”UMajor Mfeka uthe ngaphambi kokuthi angene embuthweni wezomoya wayethanda ukuba ngudokotela, yize ayengazi ukuthi ufisa ukuba udokotela owelapha ziphi izifo. Konke lokhu kwabuye kwaguquka.“Ngelinye ilanga ngacabanga ukuthi ukuba wudokotela kwakungelona iphupho lami kodwa yiphupho likababa. Nguye owayefisa ukuba udokotela kodwa wagcina ebe nguthisha. Ngazibuza ukuthi konje mina ngifuna ukwenzani futhi yini engiyithandayo. Ngaqala lapho ukufunda ngezinto engingazifundela uma nginesayensi neMaths,” kusho yena.Uthi uzakwabo ayefunda naye wathi ufuna ukuba yi-aeronautical engineer.“Ngezwa ngiwuthanda lo msebenzi nami wokuba unjiniyela okhanda izindiza. Umalume wafika nencwadi eyayichaza ngemisebenzi ongayifundela uma unezifundo zesayensi neMaths. Ngathi ngisapheqa amakhasi ngibuka, ngabona isikhangiso sombutho wezokuvikela wakuleli wezomoya. Ngabona izifundo ezidingekayo nginazo, ngajabula, ngasithatha ngaleso sikhathi isinqumo.Ungene embuthweni ngo-2008, ngo-2010 wangena esikoleni sokufundela ukushayela amabhanoyi, iCentral Flying School, esiseLangebaan, ngaphandle kwaseCape Town.UMajor Mfeka ungumshayeli wendiza yempi kwiSouth African Air Force.“Lo mkhakha kusengowamadoda, uma ukuwona abesifazane ababonwa kanti kumnandi ukuba nozakwenu besifazane ozoxoxa nabo. Yize ngingedwa, ozakwethu abangibandlululi,” kusho yena.Le ntokazi ithi ukufinyelela kulesi sigaba kuseyisiqalo, isafisa ukuqhubekela phambili.“Amantombazane asemancane afisa ukungena emkhakheni wokushayela izindiza kumele azijwayeze ukuya emibukisweni yezindiza, kulapho othola khona ulwazi,” kusho yena.
title: Ungowesifazane wokuqala ezindizeni zempi

text:
LUNGI LANGALIPHINDE lahlehla icala elibhekene nabalisa abane abasolwa ngokubulala owesilisa owabulawa ngaphandle kwenkantolo yaseMlazi.Laba balisa okungoMnuz Sanele Hlophe (25), Mnuz Mxoleleni Hobson Bhani (27), Mnuz Sithandiwe Sincuba (31) noMnuz Bheko Duma (29), basolwa ngokubulala uMnuz Sipho Ndovela owabulawa ngaphandle kwenkantolo yeMantshi eMlazi ngoMeyi nonyaka.Izolo iMantshi uNkk Vanitha Armu ilihlehlisele unyaka ozayo leli cala ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo nokuthi kuzwakale isinqumo somshushisi omkhulu mayelana nokuhlanganiswa kwamacala abasolwa.Kulindeleke ukuthi babuyele enkantolo ngoFebhuwari 2.Begcina ukuvela enkantolo laba abasolwa ababili ababoshwe kuqala kuleli cala uBhani noHlophe bajoyinwe nguSincuba noDuma.UBhani nguye oboshwe kuqala, ngemuva kwakhe kuboshwe uHlophe ngo-Okthoba, owathathwa endlini kamfowabo uMnuz Bongani Hlophe owayebulawe ngayizolo.Wathathwa ehlanza indlu kamfowabo ngesikhathi umndeni wakhe ulande izimpahla zakhe.UNdovela kusolwa ukuthi wabulawa ngabasolwa ngesikhathi ephuma enkantolo.Izolo 
  Isolezwe libike ukuthi unkosikazi wakhe wayekhuluma naye ngesikhathi edutshulwa lapho ayemtshela ukuthi icala limkhiphe phambili ngoba abamangali babengalihambi.Ngokusho kukankosikazi wakhe wayelinde amaphoyisa ngoba wayekade elandwe yiwo ekuseni ngenxa yezinsolo ezazivela kubantu ababethi bazombulalela enkantolo ngoba bengamtholi ehostela.Ubulawa nje ubengasahlali ehostela kodwa esefika ngoba eze emacaleni enkantolo.Lokhu kulandela isigameko sokudutshulwa kwakhe ngoFebhuwari nyakenye.Kulesi sigameko kwabulawa umngani wakhe uMnuz Fikile Siyephu abengufakazi ecaleni lokubulawa kwakhe.Ngesikhathi uNdovela ebulawa wayeye ecaleni lakhe ngoMeyi 18.Kwakulindeleke ukuthi aphinde afakaze ecaleni elalizoba ngoMeyi 21 elalithinta ukuhlaselwa kukasibari wakhe.
title: Liphinde lahlehla elowabulawa  esenkantolo

text: KUNYOMFEKE izinhlelo ekhempini yeBafana Bafana kutholakala ukuthi iphini lomqeqeshi, uJanevski Cedomir, lihaqwe yiCovid-19.IBafana izogadulisana ne-Uganda emdlalweni wobungani ozoba se-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, namuhla ngo-6 ntambama. Lo mdlalo ungowokuzicijela owokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba ozoba ngoSepthemba. Nokho kuphazamiseke izinhlelo ngesikhathi imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwangoLwesibili kaCedomir, ongamehlo nezindlebe zomqeqeshi omusha uHugo Broos, ikhomba ukuthi uneCovid-19. Lokhu kwenzeka nje, bekuvele sekuhoxiswe abadlali uPercy Tau, Tebogo Mokoena abatholakale ukuthi bahaqekile. USipho Mbule ukhishwe kwiBafana ngoba ubekade esondelene noMokoena ongumngani wakhe futhi abadlala ndawonye kwiSuperSport United. UCedomir waseBelgium, ubekade ezosizana nelinye iphini likaBroos, uHelman Mkhalele emsebenzini abawubize ngowokuqala phansi iqembu lesizwe. U-Broos uphindele ekhaya eBelgium ukuyogoma umgomo wesibili weCovid-19 ngaphambi kokuzoqala umsebenzi wakhe eNingizimu Afrika.Udokotela weBafana, uTshepo Molobi, uthe: "Siyaqhubeka nokuhlola izimpawu futhi sigqugquzela abasebenzi ukuthi bafake izifonyo ngaso sonke isikhathi, baqhele ibanga elifanele, wonke umuntu abe segunjini lakhe yedwa."Umdlalo weBafana ne-Uganda yiwona ozocacisela uBroos nethimba lakhe ngomsebenzi obahlalele emizameni yokubuyisela iqembu lesizwe esicongweni. Ngaphandle kwabadlali abahaqwe yiCovid-19, iBafana ilinyalelwe ngabayisithupha abebekade bebiziwe. Kubadlali okupheshwe ngabo kukhona uNjabulo Blom weKaizer Chiefs, Jabulo Ngcobo weSwallows, Evidence Makgopa noDenwin Farmer beBaroka.UMkhalele uthe labo abathole uthuba abalisebenzise"Akuwona wonke umuntu othola ithuba lokumela izwe lakhe. Uma ithuba livela lisebenzise, wenzele wena, umndeni wakho nezwe liziqhenye," kusho uMkhalele odlale imidlalo engu-66 kwiBafana.
title: Omunye oneCovid-19 ekhempini yeBafana

text: UNEZINHLELO zokuhlohla abadlali bakhe ukuthi baye emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership naMaZulu ngeSonto ngo-3 ntambama, eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, ngenhloso yokukhipha isibhongo umqeqeshi wePolokwane City, uJozef Vukusic.Lo mqeqeshi ukholelwa ekutheni iqembu lakhe libe nebhadi laphaphama ilanga selishonile kodwa ujabule kakhulu ngokuthi ngeke alinde isikhathi eside ukuthola iqembu azokhiphela kulona isibhongo njengoba ezovakashela Usuthu.Kusukela eqalile ukusebenza kwiRise and Shine, uVukusic usephendule leli qembu elinye layinkinga kwiPremiership kwazise lishaywa yiPirates ngoLwesibili nje bese lidlale eyeligi eyisikhombisa lingayazi induku.“Sibe nebhadi kulo mdlalo. Amathuba esiwakhile bekumele okungenani kungene amabili awo. Kumqoka nokho ukubalula ukuthi uma uyeka amathuba afana nalawa ayekwe yithina ubhekene neqembu elifana nePirates ekugcineni kuba nokukhala nokugedla kwamazinyo. Angikhali kakhulu nokho ngoba sinethuba lokubhodlela kuMaZulu.“Yithuba lethu leli lokukhombisa ukuthi lokhu esikwenza masonto wonke akuwona umlilo wamaphepha. Yebo kuzoba nzima ngoba sisekuhambeni kodwa uma sizodlala ngale ndlela bese sisheshe sicacisa ukuthi sifuna ukwenzani, ngeke siwele kulesi sikhinsi esiwele kusona namuhla,” kusho uVukusic ngoLwesibili.IPolokwane iwuqale kahle umdlalo kodwa ngokuyeka kwayo amathuba yaqala yavuka iPirates yashaya amagoli ngoMarcelo da Silva noJustine Shonga. Uzamile * -Ayanda Nkili ngegoli lokulinganisa kodwa kwasho ukuthi isikhathi sesidliwe yinja.“Indlela esiqede ngayo kwiPirates iyona kanye okumele siqale ngayo eThekwini. Kungijabulise kwaze kwangikitaza ukuthi lokhu esizifundisa khona ngamakhona kuyasebenza. Kunamathuba amabili amahle obekumele angene. Ukungangeni kwawo kungicacisele ukuthi inhlanhla ayikho ngakithi kulo mdlalo. Ngijabule kakhulu ngendlela abadlali bami abaqhubeke ngayo bazama yize bese kucacile ukuthi amaphuzu ayahamba. Uma sizokwenza kanje emdlalweni ozayo nakanjani esizobhekana naye sizokhiphela kuyena isibhongo,” kusonga uVukusic.
title: Ufuna ukukhiphela isibhongo kuMaZulu

text: I-ANC isiphakamise ukuthi ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya luhlanganiswe nolukazweloke kanjalo nezifundazwe.Lokhu kuvele emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC, ngemuva kokubamba umhlangano obalulekile.UNobhala Jikelele wale nhlangano, uMnuz Ace Magashule ubehola isithangamini sabezindaba ngoLwesithathu ekoMkhulu lale nhlangano iLuthuli House, eGoli.“Sibhekene nezinye izindlela ezizohlomulisa elakuleli ngaphandle kokuthi lizithole selehlela ngezansi njengezwe elizimele,” kusho uMagashule.Ukutsheleka imali enhlanganweni i-International Monetory Fund (IMF), World Bank nakwezinye izikhungo ezitshelekisa ngemali, uthe ngezinye zezinto lesi sigungu esiziphakamisile.Odabeni oluthinta inhloko yamajaji eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo kuleli, uJaji Mogoeg Mogoeng ngasanda kukusho ngelakwa-Israel, uthe lolu daba balushiyele kuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi kube uyena obonisana ngalo noMogoeng.UMagashule uthe beyi-ANC, bayaziwa ukuthi bayahambisana nombono wabantu basePalestine wokucindezelwa kwelakwa-Israel.“Mayelana nezinkampani ezingaphansi kukahulumeni ezifuna ukudiliza, siphakamise ukuthi abazothinteka banikezwe amakhono amasha azobasiza,” usho njalo.Uthe ukudiliza kuka-Eskom neSABC, ngeke kulethe isithombe esihle ngoba abasebenzi abaqashwe kulezi zinkampani bondla imindeni  yabo, bakhokhela izimoto nemizi.Uthe lesi sigungu siphinde sakuqaphela ukuthi uphiko oluqoqela uhulumeni imali yentela, alikwazanga ukwenza umsebenzi walo ngendlela ejwayelekile ngenxa yeCovid-19.Mayelana nokusebenza kwamakhansela emphakathini, uphakamise ukuthi umphakathi usebenzisane nawo, wathi kunoR20 billion uhulumeni ahlele ukuwunikeza omasipala ngenhloso yokufeza izidingo zomphakathi.“Izindaba ezikhulunywayo nezingelona iqiniso, lokho akusho ukuthi kusuke sekunecala elikhona. Abomthetho bakhona okungavulwa kubona amacala uma kukhona okungahambi kahle,” usho kanje.Ubephendula umbuzo ngokusanda kushiwo owayengusihlalo webhodi lePassenger Rail Association of South Africa (Prasa), uMnuz Popo Molefe obevele kwiKhomishini kaZondo ephenya ngokubuswa kwezwe yidlanzana, ukuthi isigungu esiphezulu se-ANC iTop Six, sabe sinolwazi ngenkohlakalo yamathenda emali eyizigidi eyayidla lubi kwiPrasa ngesikhathi esengusihlalo webhodi layo.
title: I-ANC ifuna ukhetho lomasipala luhlanganiswe nelukazwelonke nezifundazwe

text: AKUCACI ukuthi lizobuya nini eRussia iPhini likaMengameli wezwe, uMnuz David Mabuza, osekunesikhathi eside lingabonakali emphakathini.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uMabuza useRussia lapho eyoxilongwa khona wodokotela.UNgqongqoshe weziNdaba zangaPhandle, uNksz Lindiwe Sisulu, ezindabeni zeRise FM ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uMabuza uyoxilongwa eRussia kodwa wathi ngeke akwazi ukunaba kakhulu ngokuthi uyoxolongelwani.“Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi iPhini likaMengameli lithathe ikhefu ukuze liyoxilongwa wodokotela eRussia. Ngeke ngikwazi ukudalula imininingwane eminingi ngokuthi kodwa engingakugcizelela wukuthi useRussia,” kusho uNksz Sisulu.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwabasehhovisi likaMabuza ayiphumelelanga njengoba uMnuz Thami Ngwenya engayiphendulanga imibuzo ayithunyelelwe yiSolezwe nge-email nange-sms futhi ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngo-Okthoba uMabuza watshela amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi ngo-2015 waya eRussia eyolashwa emuva kokudliswa ushevu.Waveza ukuthi wasizwa yindodana yowayenguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uMnuz Duduzane Zuma ukuya eRussia.Amaphephandaba angempelasonto abebike ukuthi uMabuza uyoxilongwa ukuze odokotela babheke ukuthi ubuthi obabusegazini lakhe baphela bonke yiniAbeveze ukuthi kulindeleke ukuthi atheleke kuleli ngoMsombuluko kodwa akucaci ukuthi ugcine efikile yini noma usaseRussia.
title: Akwaziwa uzobuya nini ekhefini uDD

text: IGWETSHWE iminyaka engu-15 ibhadla ejele indoda eyangena ihlomile esakhiweni sakwaFidelity, eVryheid yashaya yachitha nemali engaphezu kukaR12 million.UMgeyi Gumede ugwetshwe yiNkantolo eNkulu eMadadeni, ngoLwesibili. UGumede nozakwabo kuthiwa babehlome beyizingovolo ngesikhathi bengena lapho kugadwa khona imali, bakhomba onogada ngezibhamu.Okhulumela oKlebe kuzwelonke, uColonel Katlego Mogale, uthe abasolwa babaleka nemali engaphezu kukaR12 million.“Uphenyo olunzulu lwamathimba oKlebe aseRichards Bay naseNewcastle, lwaholela ekutheni kuboshwe uMbuyiseni Mthembu emva kwesigameko. Kwatholakala ukuthi uMthembu owayewunogada, wahlanga nabangani bakhe ukuze kwenziwe lobu bugebengu,” kusho uCol. Mogale.Kwathi ngoSepthemba 2019, kwaboshwa uGumede wavela enkantolo kodwa wanqatshelwa ibheyili. Wagqigqa inkantolo engaphakathi ezikhindini ezimnyama. UCol. Mogale uthe uGumede ulahlwe yicala ngenyanga edlule, wahlulelwa ngoLwesibili enikwa iminyaka engu-15 ebhadla ejele.“UGumede ugwetshwa nje uMthembu uvele udonsa isigwebo sakhe ejele,” kusho uCol. Mogale.Inhloko yoKlebe KwaZulu-Natal, uMajor General Lesetja Senona ibashayele ihlombe abaphenyi nabashushisi ngomsebenzi omuhle oholele ekugwetshweni kukaGumede. Ugqugquzele ukuthi baqhubeke nomsebenzi wabo baqinisekisa ukuthi buyenziwa ubulungiswa.
title: Ugwetshiwe owaphanga uR12 million

text:
Isolezwe ngoLwesibili lishicilele umbono obugxeka ngokwakha lo msakazi, ngokucaphuna iBhayibheli njalo kulolu hlelo, nakuba kungelona uhlelo lwezenkolo. Umbhali uthe: "Ngikholwa wukuthi akuyena wonke umuntu olalela Ukhozi ongumKhristu. Akwenzayo akuhlukile nokugqamisa inkolo yakhe isidana. 
Noma ngabe maningi amaKhristu alalela umsakazo kodwa anamahlelo ahlukene engingakholwa wukuthi afuna ukuzwa ngelilodwa likaTshatha. 
Umdidiyeli wohlelo uyivuma kanjani le nto ukuthi, mihla namalanga sihlale sitshelwa ngeBhayibheli. Abaphathi bona bathini?" Ephendula lo mbhalo uTshatha uthe, usebenzisa ibhayibheli njengendlela yokusekela izinkulumo zakhe waveza nokuthi zonke izinkolo zisebenzisa le ncwadi engcwele. "Sengineminyaka engu 16 ngisakaza oKhozini, selokhu ngafika ngo-2003, akekho ongazi ukuthi ngijwayele ukusebenzisa ibhayibheli lapha nalaphaya uma selulekana nabalaleli. Lokho ngiyaye ngikwenze ngoba ngisuke ngesekela inkulumo noma ingxoxo esisuke sinayo ngaleso sikhathi! Angimane nje ngisukeleke ngibelesele ngenkolo yami.     "Yebo izinkolo zehlukene ngiyavuma, kodwa leli bhayibheli engisuke ngesekela ngalo izinkulumo zami, lisetshenziswa yizo zonke izinkolo. Angazike ukuthi njengoba eseyifanisa nepolitiki nje lento engisuke ngiyenza, lihlanganaphi ibhayibheli nepolitiki ngoba phela kazidlelani lezozinto futhi kazisoze zefana!" usho kanje. Impendulo kaTshatha ephelele isekhasini lakhe ku
Facebook.
title: UTshatha uyaziphendulela ngokufaka ibhayibheli njalo ohlelweni

text: UNKOSINATHI Sibisi oyisitobha seLamontville Golden Arrows unesifiso sokudlala kwiCAF Confederation Cup.USibisi (24) uthe abadlali be-Orlando Pirates neMamelodi Sundowns banomehluko omkhulu uma beqhathaniswa nalabo abadlala kuleli kuphela, ngenxa yesipiliyoni abasithola kwiCaf Champions League neConfederation Cup.Ukhuluma kanjena nje uSibisi, Abafana Bes’thende basethubeni lokukhala bemuke nesicoco seNedbank Cup njengoba bezibekisele indawo kowandulela owamanqamu kulo mqhudelwano.I-Arrows izobhekana neTS Galaxy kowandulela amanqamu ngo-Ephreli 20, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont. Uma ingagcina isinqobile lesi sicoco izodlala kwiConfederation Cup ngesizini ezayo.“Abadlali bePirates neSundowns banomehluko omkhulu kwabamanye amaqembu kwiPSL. Ngicabanga ukuthi nokudlala kule miqhudelwano kwenza ukuthi unakwe, bese uyakhethwa eqenjini lesizwe,” usho kanje uSibisi.USibisi ungowaseMpophomeni, eHowick. Ufike eThekwini ezofunda eMangosuthu University of Techonology, eMlaza. Ubenza izifundo zePublic Administration.Uthe useqedile ngezifundo zakhe, sekusele ukuthi ayogqoka ijazi. Iqembu alidlalele ngasekhaya esakhula yiReal Argentina. Uthe ufike kwi-Arrows ngemuva kokuthi kube khona isikhathi lapho bebehlola khona abadlali, ngenhlanhla yakhe wakhethwa.USibisi uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi ekhula ubengumlandeli wePirates. Phakathi kwabadlali abamchaza kakhulu begqoke ijezi leBucs uMbulelo “OJ” Mabizela.“Bengilandela iPirates ngisakhula, bengithanda kakhulu ukubuka uMabizela edlala ngase ngizitshela ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngiyolandela ezinyathelweni zakhe. Okungigqugquzela kakhulu ukuthi naye (uMabizela) ungowaseMgungundlovu. Lokho kungenze ngabona ukuthi empilweni ungenza noma yini, noma ngabe ungowakuphi,” kuchaza uSibisi.Eqhubeka uSibisi, uthe ufuna ukuthi ngelinye ilanga adlale kwiBafana Bafana.“Kunzima ukudlala eqenjini lesizwe, ngakho kufanele ngisebenze kanzima ngokuphindwe kabili ukuze ngizibeke ethubeni. Isibonelo nje umdlali ofana noThamsanqa Mkhize odlala indawo engiyidlalayo kwelesizwe. Udlale kahle kakhulu kule sizini, futhi uyazimisela. Ngiyethemba kodwa ukuthi uma ngizimisele ngizogcina ngifikile kwiBafana ngokusebenza kanzima nokuzimisela,” usho kanje uSibisi.I-Arrows izobhekana naMaZulu FC emdlalweni wabakhaya ngeSonto, eSugar Ray Xuliu Stadium, eClermont, ngo-3 ntambama.
title: Owe-Arrows unesifiso sokudlala kwiCAF

text: MINENHLE MKHIZEI SITOBHA seKaizer Chiefs uTefu “Masha” Mashamaite sizibona sisethubeni elingcono lokubizelwa kuBafana Bafana uma isidlala imidlalo yokuhlungela ukuzibekisela indawo ku-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ka-2015 ngoSepthemba.UMashamaite (29) ubehlezi eshaywa ngesithende kusewuGordon Igesund obecija iBafana yize iningi labathandi bebhola belimbona kumfanele ukufakwa kwelesizwe.U-Igesund inkontileka yakhe neBafana ngeke ivuselelwe njengoba iphela ngo-Agasti. UCarlos Queiroz, odabuka ePortugal, nguyena othwelwe ngeqoma ukuthi athathe lesi sikhundla ake wasiphatha phambili ngo-2000 kuya ku-2002.uMashamaite ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi likhulu ithemba ngokubizelwa kwelesizwe ngaphansi komqeqeshi omusha.“Ngiyafisa sengathi ukungena kuBafana ngabe kwakufana nokungena kuCarling Black Label Cup kuyona okungabalandeli abavotela ukuthi kufanele kudlale baphi abadlali. Baningi abashoyo ukuthi ukudlala kuBafana kungifanele kodwa ngebhadi-ke umqeqeshi ubengaboni kanjalo futhi anginanxa nalokho. Okwami wukuthi ngiqhubeke nokwenza umsebenzi eqenjini lami, uma isikhathi sesifikile ngizolithola elami ithuba.“Ukuqashwa komqeqeshi omusha kuzongibeka ethubeni elihle lokuthi ngibizelwe kuBafana uma ngiqhubeka nesigqi sangesizini edlule. Okuhle wukuthi kuzobe kungumqeqeshi wangaphandle (kuqagela lo mdlali),” kusho uMashamaite.KuBafana uMashamaite umiswe kabi nguThabo Nthethe weMamelodi Sundowns, Buhlebuyeza Mkhwanazi, ongukaputeni we-University of Pretoria, Siyanda Xulu ogijima kuRostov FC yaseRussia noBongani “Model-C” Khumalo weTottenham Hotspur edlala ku-English Premier League (EPL).Ku-African Nations Championship (Chan) uMashamaite ubekhona kodwa akazange adlale imidlalo eminingi. Kwelesizwe lesi sitobha esidabuka eLimpopo sesidlale imidlalo emibili nje vo.“Kuyisifiso sanoma yimuphi umdlali ukumela izwe lakhe. Nami angihlukile kulabo. Ngiyethemba ukuthi ngonyaka ozayo ku-Afcon eMorocco ngizobe ngihambe neqembu elidlala kulo mqhudelwano (uma sizibekisela indawo kuyona kweyokuhlunga),” kusho uMashamaite.Ngesizini edlule iqembu lakhe iChiefs liqede isizini lishwiba izandla kwazise alizange linqobe ngisho esisodwa isicoco kwezine ebelizilwela.“Ngesizini ezayo ngibheke kakhulu isicoco seligi. Akuzange kubemnandi ukuqeda isizini ngaphandle kwesicoco. Sifundile emaphutheni ethu futhi ngesizini ezayo sizobe siyiqembu elihlukile kakhulu. Ngasohlangothini lwami ngibheke ukuthi ngidlale imidlalo engaphezu kwengiyidlale ngeyedlule ngiphinde ngiqobele namagoli amaningi,” kusho uMashamaite ocele abalandeli ukuthi bamvotele kuCarling Black Labela Cup.
title: Ithemba lokubizwa kuBafana Bafana

text: KUNGEKUDALA kade bezikhiphele eFrance ngeledlule, manje uSomizi Mhlongo usethembise isithandwa sakhe uMohale Motaung umshado.Emuva kokuthi kade behambile uSomizi ubelokhu eshutha izithombe ezifaka ku-Instagram wakhe.Izolo ekuseni ufake i-video ekhombisa indandatho esihambisana nombhalo wokuthi uvumile.Ngemuva kwalokho kube nendathane yemiyalezo ebivela kosaziwayo.Kuthiwa nasohlelweni akulo, iFresh Breakfast, bamshayele ucingo kodwa ubengekho enza umsebenzi wama-Idols.Imenenja yakhe, uThato Matuka, uthe ngeke akwazi ukuqinisekisa lokhu ngoba wudaba oluthinta uSomizi ngqo.Khonamanjalo, uSomizi uzolandela abane osaziwayo asebeke babonakala ohlelweni iComedy Central (DStv channel 122) kuhlekiswa ngaye.Uhlelo iComedy Central Roast of Somizi luzokhonjiswa ngoMeyi 7 ngo-9 ebusuku.Phakathi kwasebake babonakala kulo kubalwa uJustin Bieber, Donald Trump nabanye. AbaseNingizimu Afrika aseke babonakala kulo nguSteve Hofmeyr noKenny Kunene.Esitatimendeni uSomizi uthe ujabule kakhulu.“Ngesikhathi iComedy Central iza kimi angizange nginanaze. Kade kwasa ngifuna ukuba kulona. Ngingakwazi ukumelana nalo mlilo ngoba angizweli kalula,” kusho uSomizi.Isikhulu sakwaComedy Central, uDillon Khan, uthe bayachichima yinjabulo ngokwethulela ababukeli babo uhlelo lweRoast noSomizi nakwiShowmax.“Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bahlale bejovana mihla namalanga futhi nohlelo lwethu siluthanda lunjalo,” kusho uKhan.Uhlelo luzoqoshwa eThe Lyric Theatre, eGold Reef City, ngo-Ephreli 26. Amathikithi atholakala eComputicket ngoR200 umuntu ngamunye.
title: USomizi uthembise isithandwa sakhe umshado

text: KUHLELWA imashi yokugqugquzela amadoda aqotho ezohambisana nemidlalo yokukhumbula owayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates, uSenzo Meyiwa.Lokhu kuvezwe izolo ngabagqugquzeli bemidlalo ezokuba seKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, ngoJuni 9.Ngokusho kukaSibusiso Gumede weNUZ Events ongomunye wabaxhase imidlalo nemashi, inhloso wukukhumbula uMeyiwa kuphinde kukhuthazwe abesilisa emiphakathini ukuthi baphile impilo eqotho.Imashi izokuba ngoJuni 2, isuka eMangosuthu University of Technology iyophelela esiteshini samaphoyisa kwa-V eMlazi.“Lena ngenye yezindlela esikhumbula ngayo uMeyiwa njengoba ubaba (uSam Meyiwa) eke washo ukuthi ubengumuntu obelibhekile ikhaya. Sifuna ukugqugquzela abesilisa ukuthi baphile impilo eqondile. Simema abancane nabadala ukuthi babe yingxenye yale mashi,” kusho uGumede.UGumede nabambisene nabo, uNathi Ngwenya weNN Holdings noNtokozo Sikhakhane, bathe bafisa imicimbi kaSenzo kube yinto eyenzeka minyaka yonke kodwa konke kuzoncika oxhasweni abalutholayo.Ubaba kalo nozinti owabulawa ngokudutshulwa eVosloorus, eGoli, uSam Meyiwa, uyakweseka okuzokwenzeka.“Sekuphele iminyaka emingaka kungenzekile lutho kodwa manjenakhu kubonakala engathi uNkulunkulu uyaphendula."Ngesikhathi bengitshela ngezinhlelo zabo ngambiza umfana ngathi, Senzonakhu kubonakala sengathi izinto ziyenzeka."Ngicela uNkulunkulu abanike amandla baqhubeke,” kusho uMeyiwa.Umfundisi Vusi Dube webandla i-ECC ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uzoba yingxenye yale mashi.
title: Kuhlelwa imashi kaSenzo Meyiwa

text: KUKHONYE i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal nakuzwelonke  okhethweni lokuchibiyela obelungoLwesithathu.Le nhlangano iwagcine wonke ama-ward ebiwaphethe yaphinde yaqumba izimbangi zayo kuma-ward amabili.Njengoba ebengu-14 ama-ward obekunokhetho lokuchibiyela kuwona, i-ANC idle umhlanganiso kuma-ward angu-12, amabili awo abephethwe yi-IFP  neDA ngokwehlukana.KwaZulu-Natal, i-ANC ihlwithe u-ward 5 KwaMaphumulo yaphinde yagcina ama-ward ayo u-ward 6 eThekwini, ward 7 KwaMaphumulo, ward 4 uBuhlebezwe no-ward 20 eMzimkhulu.I-IFP  idle umhlanganiso ku-ward 5 KwaDukuza, okuyi-ward ebivele iphethwe yilo leli qembu.Kuzwelonke, i-ANC  ihlwithe u-ward 11 kuMasipala iKnysna, eWestern Cape, okuyisizinda se-DA.I-DA yona ikwaze ukugcina i-ward eyodwa, u-ward 20 kuMasipala waseCape Town.I-ANC ithe le miphumela ifike ngesikhathi esikahle njengoba nomengameli  uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, esanda kumemezela usuku lokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya.Okhulumela le nhlangano, uMnuz Pule Mabe, uthe le miphumela inikeza ithemba lokuthi bazokwenza kahle kulolu khetho oluzoba ngo-Okthoba.“Njengoba sibheke okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya, sizoqhubeka nokuxhumana nabantu, ukuze sizwe izidingo zabo, siphinde silwele nokushintsha impilo yabo.”i-DA ithe le miphumela ikhombisa ukuthi leli qembu seliyavuka liyazithintitha emva kokwenza kabi okhethweni lokuchibiyela olwalungonyaka odlule.Umholi wale nhlangano, uMnuz John Steenhuisen, uthe kukhona okuhle abakubonile kule miphumela, wathi futhi ibakhombisile ukuthi ilaphi lapho kufanele basebenze kanzima khona.
title: Kukhonye i-ANC okhethweni lokuchibiyela

text: WILLEM PHUNGULAKUSOLWA ukuthi uthathwe yisifo esiyamaniswa nokudliswa ushevu obeyiBambabukhosi lesizwe samaZulu, uNdlunkulu Mantfombi  uMaDlamini Zulu.UNdlunkulu waKwaKhangelamakengane, ukhothame ngoLwesine. Leli phephandaba selingakudalula ukuthi sekunesikhashana layizwa indaba yokuthi udunguzela nje uNdlunkulu, yingoba wadliswa ushevu khona ngaphakathi endlunkulu. Lokhu lakuthola ngomthombo osondele kakhulu endlunkulu. Umthombo wesibili, ongomunye wabaNtwana okhulume nephephandaba ngoLwesine, ngaphambi kokukhothama kukaNdlunkulu, uthe yindaba eyaziwa yiwo wonke umuntu ngaphakathi endlunkulu ukuthi wadliswa futhi uyaziwa osolwa ngokumdlisa."Hawu! Yinto eyaziwayo leyo. Isilo samemezela emcimbini wosuku lwaso lokuzalwa siKwaKhethomthandayo ngomunye unyaka, ukuthi uNdlunkulu Mantfombi udlisiwe futhi sagagula negama likandlunkulu osolwa ngokumdlisa ushevu," kusho uMntwana.Ekhuluma nesinye seziteshi ezingaphansi kwenhlangano yezokusakaza kuleli iSABC, uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMntwana Mangosuthu Buthelezi, uthe uyazi ngamahlebezi okudliswa kukaNdlunkulu okhotheme kodwa akafuni ukugxila kuwo.Esitatimendeni asithumele leli phephandaba, uShenge uthe odokotela bekumele ngabe bamhlinzile uNdlunkulu kodwa ’’bancoma ukuthi kumiswe ukuhlinzwa kwakhe ngoba unoshevu esibindini’’.Ngokuthola kwephephandaba, isigameko senzeka ngo-2017 okwaphoqa ukuba uNdlunkulu okhotheme, aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela eMilpark, eGoli. Egonyuluka ngokugula kweNdlovukazi, uShenge uveze ukuthi yibikwelakubo eSwatini emva kokuthi umnewabo iNgwenyama uMswati III, icele ukuthi ike iyokwelashwa ezweni lakubo. Uthe uhlale eside isikhathi ehamba esibhedlela saKwaManzini, khona eSwatini. UMntwana Mangosuthu uveze nokuthi iNdlovukazi ilale isikhathi eside esibhedlela esiseGoli, iMilpark. Ike yabanjwa nawubhubhane iCovid-19 kodwa yabuye yasinda. Uthe konke lokhu kwenzeka nje, uNdlunkulu ubengakasindi ekuguleni obekumngenisa ezibhedlela.
title: Kusolwa ukuthi idliswe ushevu iNdlovukazi

text: IZINYUNYANA zabasebenzi zilichithile ikhwelo elithi abasebenzi kumele bahlale emakhaya ngoLwesihlanu bangenele umbhikisho balwisane nezinguquko ezenziwe nguMengameli Jacob Zuma kwikhabhinethi, okubalwa nokuxoshwa kobenguNgqongqoshe weziMali uMnuz PravinGordhan.Lo mkhankaso oqale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngempelasonto, unxusa abantu bakuleli ukuba babambe iqhaza kule mibhikisho kazwelonke ezoba ngoLwesihlanu, ngo-Ephreli 7.“Ningayi emsebenzini noma esikoleni ningenzi lutho ngaphandle kokuthi niye emgwaqweni, valani imigwaqo engothelawayeka, enzani noma yini enizozwakalisa ngayo ilaka lenu,” ufundeka kanje umyalezo obusatshalaliswa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Kuwona lo mkhankaso kunxuswa uMengameli Zuma ukuba ashenxe esikhundleni njengoba kukhalwa ngokuba mapeketwane kwesimo sepolitiki, inkohlakalo nokwenzelelwa komndeni wakwaGupta.Okhulumela iCosatu kuzwelonke uMnuz Sizwe Pamla uthe umfelandawonye wezinyunyana awuyeseki le mibhikisho.
title: I-Cosatu ayiyingeni eyemibhikisho ngoZuma

text:
I-ORLANDO Pirates isibheke ukubuyisa isithunzi sayo emdlalweni wangoMgqibelo uma isibhekene naMaZulu FC kulandela ukushaywa yiSuperSport United ngo 1-0 ngoLwesithathu ebusuku eMbombela Stadium.Lo mphumela uthathe iSupersport wayibeka endaweni yesine namaphuzu awu-32 kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership. IBhakabhaka, elisaqoqe amaphuzu amabili emdlalweni emithathu edlule yeligi, lisahlezi endaweni yesithathu namaphuzu awu-33, lisele ngamane kwiWits ehlezi esicongweni.Emdlalweni waseMbombela obushisa kusukela esiwombeni sokuqala, igoli laMatsatsantsa livalelwe ukaputeni uClayton Daniels olingqofe ngekhanda emzuzwini ka-65.Umqeqeshi wePirates uMilutin Sredojevic kufanele ukuba usale ezibuza ukuthi iqembu lakhe libuye lilambatha kanjani kulo mdlalo kwazise libe namagoli amathathu acishiwe ngoba unondweba ethi -offside, kanye nephenathi egejwe ukaputeni uHappy Jele sekusele imizuzu ewu-15 emdlalweni.Shout out to Clayton Daniels for winning the man of the match award 👏👏👏 
#AbsaPrem
pic.twitter.com/lJtynLGUA2— SuperSport United FC (@SuperSportFC) 
February 20, 2019Noma iSupersport ibizenzela lo mdlalo usanda kuqala, umdlalo kungenzeka ukuthi ngabe ube nomunye umphumela ukuba igoli elishawe uMusa Nyatama alicishwanga yisinqumo sikanondweba ophakamise ifulegi ebiza i-offside.Kusukela lapho umdlalo wePirates ubungahlagani. Emzuzwini weshumi uSiyabonga Nhlapho uvinjwe kuphela unozinti weBucs uWayne Sandilands ngesikhathi ephakelwa ibhola elihle ngu-Aubrey Modiba.IBucs idinge uSandilands ukuthi aphinde avimbe elinye ibhola okusale kancane leqe ulayini wegoli kuhlasela iSupersport ngesikhathi uDaniels engqofa ibhola ngekhanda.ISupersport ibibukeka iyingozi uma ihlasela ngesivinini isuka imuva.#AbsaPrem- FULLTIME:Clayton Daniels' crisp header propels Matsatsantsa back into the top 4 as they down the Buccaneers 1-0 at Mbombela Stadium ⚽

February 20, 2019 Ngaphambi kwekhefu kusale kancane ukuthi uMxolisi Macuphu alivalele phakathi ngesikhathi esethelwa nguBradley Grobler.Esiwombeni sesibili iBucs ibisidlala kangcono kangangokuba ngomzuzu ka-47, umgadli waseZambia uJustin Shonga ulivalele enethini kodwa laphinde laphakama iduku le-offside.Ronwen Williams to the rescue ⚽👏Watch the rest of the encounter on SS4 &

February 20, 2019IPirates iqhubekile nokucindeza iSupersport, oVincent Pule noThembinkosi Lorch bekhahlela amabhola abheke kunozinti we-United uRonwen Williams.UShonga uphinde wavalela elinye igoli sekusele imizuzu ewu-20 kodwa nalo libe yi-offside.IPirates izobhekana naMaZulu ngoMgqibelo ngo 8.15 ebusuku e-Orlando Stadium.
title: IPirates isithembe ukuvuka ngoSuthu

text: UMBUZO: Ngishade ngo-2015 nomyeni wami ngenqubo yasesontweni yokuthi akujolwa futhi asibonani size sishade. Iqiniso lithi angazi ngaluthwa yini kulo muntu. Akasiyo nhlobo le nto engangiyifisa empilweni yami. Akanakho nokukodwa nje okungijabulisayo.Lokhu ngaqala ukukuzwa ezinsukwini ezimbalwa nje sishadile, ngabekezela ngoba ngithi mhlambe asikazani kahle. Kodwa kuyangicacela manje ukuthi akusilo ubambo lwami lolu, ngehluleka ngisho ukuzenzisa. Manje useGoli ngokusebenza, uma efikile ngifisa ngabe usehambile. Okubi nje sesinomntwana. Ngifisa ngisho ukuduka nezwe kunokuba kulo mshado kodwa uma ngicabanga ngomntwana wethu ngivele ngihlale. Ngicela ningisize.Igama ligodliwe, eThekwiniIMPENDULO:Uma ushada nomuntu, noma ngabe kungaluphi uhlelo, nishada nobabili senikhulile, ninesipiliyoni sempilo ngokwehlukile. Abekho ababili abashada bese bayanamathelana ngokushesha. Kuthatha isikhathi ukunamathela koshade naye.Akekho noyedwa oshadile, oshade ubambo lwakhe. Sonke njengabashadile sifunda ukunamathela omunye komunye nsuku zonke.Uthando akuyona imizwa kodwa ukuthatha isinqumo nsuku zonke ukuthi uzozinikela ngenhliziyo yakho yonke kulo omganile.Bheka ukuthi yini ngempela ongayithandi ngomyeni wakho, bese nihlala phansi nikhulume. Siqinisekile ukuthi kukhona naye angakuthandi ngawe, ngoba sonke njengabantu asimsulwa.Ukuhlala nomuntu nithandane nize nihlukaniswe ukufa isinqumo ozithathela sona wena wedwa kuqala. Uthatha lesi sinqumo wethembise ukuthi uzomthanda lo oshade naye ngaphandle kokunaka amaphutha akhe. Usuke unquma ukuthi ubudlelwano benu bomshado buyobuswa yintethelelo, ukuthula nokwethembana. Ukuthanda umuntu akuzenzekeli, kuyasetshenzwa.UMBUZO:Sesineminyaka cishe ewu-9 sashada. Ngagana indoda emadodeni, sabusiswa nangezingane ezimbili. Akakaze angihluphe ngalutho. Uyena kuphela osebenzayo, njengoba savumelana ukuthi mina nginakekele izingane nomuzi wethu. Wenza konke engicabanga ukuthi kufanele kwenziwe yindoda.Inkinga nje ukuthi nginesizungu emshadweni wami. Ngazinikela kuye nakulo mshado ngale ndlela yokuthi yonke impilo yami ingomyeni nabantwana bami. Anginampilo ngaphandle kwabo. Akukho engingakwenzi ukujabulisa wonke umuntu la ekhaya. Kodwa mina angisenawo awami amaphupho, futhi loku kungiphatha kabi. Ngicela ningisize.Londiwe, eThekwiniIMPENDULO:Akuve kulula ukuzibona usugwinywe umshado unganakile. Loku kwenzeka kakhulu kubantu besifazane ngoba bangabantu abazinikelayo sidalo. Kuyinto enhle ukuthi uyayibona le nkinga kusemanje.Kufanele uzinikele umshadweni wakho ngokuphelele kodwa ungazikhohlwa phela nawe. Qala ngokuthi kube nelanga nje elilodwa lakho esontweni lapho wenza khona noma yini oyithandayo eqondene nawe. Kungaba ukuyozivocavoca noma ukuya ekhaya kini uyobonana nabakini owaziyo ukuthi bayakuthanda. Zijwayeze ukuba nesikhathi esithi wena. Uma wawunabangani ngaphambi kokushada qala uvuselele lobo bungani. Kuyingozi enkulu ukulahlekelwa impilo yakho usesemshadweni ngezinhloso zokujabulisa umyeni wakho.Hlala phansi uvuselele konke okwakuyiphupho lakho. Kungaba ukuqhubeka nezifundo, ukuqala ibhizinisi noma ukubuyela emsebenzini nje. Cabangisisa nokuthi, njengoba ungasasebenzi nje, wawuyingxenye engakanani ekuthatheni leso sinqumo? Hlala phansi nomyeni wakho umtshele inkinga obhekene nayo.UMBUZO:Ngineminyaka ewu-38, ngiganwe unkosikazi ona-27 weminyaka. Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule uqale ukusabisa ngokushiya phansi umshado wethu ngenxa yobudoda bami obungasenamandla. Akukho engingakwenzi ekhaya njengendoda, inkinga yinye nje kuphela, ile yobudoda bami. Sengiyizame yonke imishanguzo nezimbiza ezivusa umlilo kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya. Kwala ngisho sengimthengela imoto kanokusho ukuzama ukumehlisa umoya kodwa lutho akulungi. Umshado wami usengcupheni. Ngenzenjani?IMPENDULO:Siyazwelana nawe mfowethu. Akulona iphutha lakho ngempela kodwa kumele umzwele noma kunjalo unkosikazi wakho. Kuthatha umuntu oqotho ukuhlala emshadweni ongenalo ucansi, okanye omunye engagculisekile khona ngokocansi. Kona kuyahlaleka, akuyona into engaze inenze nehlukane. Okubalulekile ukuthi nifunde nibe nezinye izindlela zokuzijabulisa.Xhumana nathi ku:Facebook: Mo&PhindiInsta: Mo_PhindiEmail: [email protected]
title: EZOTHANDO: Ngashada ngenqubo yesonto, umyeni wami akangigculisi

text: I-DA isabise ngokuthi izothatha izinyathelo zomthetho ukuze uMengameli Jacob Zuma achaze ngeqhaza aba nalo ekulungisweni komuzi wakhe oseNkandla.Ithimba labameli beDA libhalele uMqondisi wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi uShaun Abrahams lifuna aveze ukuthi ngabe uzoshushiswa yini uZuma noma ngeke ashushiswe. IDA ifuna ukuthi u-Abrahams abanike impendulo namhlanje.Umholi weDA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, uthe uma bengayitholi incazelo bazothatha izinyathelo zomthetho ukuze uZuma ashushiswe.“Ngeledlule ngitshele ithimba labameli ukuthi alibhalele iNPA ngoba ngavulela uZuma amacala ayisishiyagalombili. Selokhu ngawavula lawo macala sengithumele nenqwaba yemibuzo ePhalamende. Sekuphele iminyaka emithathu bengaqhamuki nento ecacile,” kusho uMaimane.Uthe impendulo asanda kuyithola kuNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa uMnuz Fikile Mbalula eyokuthi uphenyo seluphothuliwe.Uqhube wathi uMbalula uthe idokodo lathunyelwa kwiNPA ngo-2015 ukuze kukhishwe isinqumo sokuthi kuyashushiswa yini kuleli cala.“Kuyacaca ukuthi iNPA ihudula izinyawo kulolu daba ukuze ivikele uZuma. Akukuhle ukuya ezinkantolo ngodaba olufuze lolu kodwa uma kukhona abahudula izinyawo kudingeka kuyiwe ezinkantolo,” kusho uMaimane.Uthe bazoqhubeka balwe nenkohlakalo kuhulumeni nasemikhakheni ezimele.
title: I-DA isabisa ngenkantolo kolukaZuma neNkandla

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa usebizele emhlanganweni uNgqongqoshe wezokuXhumana, uNkk Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, ukuba azomchazela ngesithombe sakhe nowayeyiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezemfundo ephakeme, uMnuz Mduduzi Manana, bevela bedla isidlo emzini kaManana njengoba izwe livaliwe nje.URamaphosa ukusho lokhu kade ekhuluma nabezindaba emuva kokusabalala nokugxekwa kukaNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu bebuza ukuthi kanti uthaqa awubathinti yini ongqongqoshe njengoba bekwazi ukuphuma beyovakashela abangani babo ekubeni abantu kuthiwa abahlale emakhaya.Isithombe esifakwe sabuye sasuswa ngokushesha ngenxa yokugxekwa, besinombhalo obuthi uNkk Stella Ndabeni, kade evakashele emzini kaManana wafike wadla isidlo sasemini.Enkulumeni evezwe bukhoma kwi-eNCA uRamaphosa uthe: “Sengimcelile ungqongqoshe ukuba azongichazela ngesithombe esivele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Njengoba ningibona ngilapha yingoba ngizosebenza, uma ngiqeda ngeke ngiye emzini womngani wami noma ngiyovakashela isihlobo noma usisi wami. Ngizoya ekhaya. Kusemqoka ukuba sonke sigcine imiyalelo.”Inhlangano kaManana, iMduduzi Manana Foundation, izolo ithumele isitatimende kwabezindaba lapho ebeziphendulela evikela nokufika kukaNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams kwakhe.Uthe ngeSonto ufonelwe nguNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams emazisa ukuthi kunabafundi abasebenza ohlelweni lwezokuxhumana kwezobuchwepheshe (Digital Service) abebedinga izifonyo, amagilavu nezibulalimagciwane okuyizinto inhlangano yakhe enikela ngazo.Uthe ube esecela uNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams ukuba afike emzini wakhe azolanda zinto azidingayo.Uthe ufike nje vele umndeni wakhe ubunesidlo sasemini okuyilapho acele khona ungqongqoshe ukuba azodla, angaphumi engadlile.Umhlaziyi wepolitiki, uMnuz Lukhona Mnguni, uthe uRamaphosa kuzomele amthathele izinyathelo ngempela ungqongqoshe.“Abantu abajwayelekile kuleli kumele balandele umthetho kodwa labo abanegunya bona benze noma yikanjani ngokukhululeka? Kumele nabo bazibophezele kulokhu okubekiwe,” kusho uMnguniNgokusho kukaMnguni lokhu osekushiwo uManana esitatimendeni kubukeka kuyinto aseyicabange ngemuva kokuba ekhulume nabanye bomsakazo ngalesi sithombe.KwiTwitter nakwiFacebook abantu bebekhwela bedilika kuManana noNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams bethi benza noma yikanjani ngoba beyizikhulu.Abanye bebelibeka ngembaba ukuthi ungqongqoshe kumele ahoxe esikhundleni uma ehluleka ukulandela imithetho kathaqa.
title: URamaphosa ufuna uNdabeni-Abrahams azochaza ngesithombe

text: UKUMISWA kokudayiswa kukagwayi kwehlise isibalo seziguli eziphuthunyiswa ezibhedlela zidinga usizo oluphuthumayo lokwelashelwa izifo zamaphaphu ngo-63%.Lolu cwaningo lwenziwe uMnyango wezeMpilo eWestern Cape nophiko olubhekele izimo eziphuthumayo nemindeni esibhedlela iGeorge Regional, ngokuqhathanisa isibalo seziguli ezivakashele kulesi sibhedlela zidinga usizo ngo-2019 nango-2020 ngesikhathi kuvaliwe ukudayiswa kukagwayi kuleli. Omunye wabacwaningi, uNkk Piero Saieva, uthe lolu cwaningo lwenziwe kucutshungulwa imininingwano yeziguli ezivamise ukungena esibhedlela iGeorge Regional zidinga usizo oluphuthumayo lokwelashelwa isifo samaphaphu, i-Emergency Centre attendance for Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)  phakathi kuka Januwari 2019 kuya ku-Agasti 2020.Imiphumela yalolu cwaningo ishicilelwe emqingweni wezempilo i-African Journal of Primary Health Care & Family Medicine.
