Abacwaningi bebeqhathanisa amakhadi eziguli agcinwe kumakhompyutha, ama- eletronic card, bebheka ukuthi ukuvakashela kweziguli ezibhedlela kuyefana yini.I-COPD isifo samaphaphu esenza ukuthi umuntu akhwehlele ngendlela engelawuleki. Uma ubhema ukukhwehlela kuvuka ngamandla ukhwehlele kuze kunciphe umoya ungakwazi ukuphefumula kahle, kudingeke ukuthi uphuthunyiswe esikhungweni sezempilo. Ngesikhathi kuvalwe ukudayiswa kukagwayi kuleli, abanye abantu bebengawutholi ugwayi okuholele ekutheni kunciphe ukuvakashela kwabo kulesi sibhedlela ngenxa yale nkinga. INyuvesi yaseCape Town nayo yenze olwayo ucwaningo olusondelene nalolu, yona yathola ukuthi ngesikhathi kuvaliwe ukudayiswa kukagwayi kuleli, ababhemayo bebewuthola ugwayi kodwa ubudayisa ngemali enkulu. Ngokwalolu cwaningo bekwenzeka ukuthi ibhokisi elinogwayi ongu-20 ebelidayiswa ngemali ephakathi kukaR25 kuya kuR45 ligcine selidayiswa ngoR144. Ugwayi ngamunye ubudayiswa ngoR5.69c obekuholela ekutheni abanye babantu ababhemayo behlise ukubhema ngoba imali yokuwuthenga bebengenayo.Lolu cwaningo lwenziwe kubantu abangu-12 118, u-42% wabo uzame ukuyeka ukubhema ngenxa yokubiza kukagwayi ngalesi sikhathi. U-39%, uphumelele ukuwuyeka. UDkt Sharon Nyatsanza weNational weCouncil Against Smoking, uthe lolu cwaningo luveza ngokusobala ukuthi kubalulekile ukulawulwa kokubhenywa kukagwayi ukuze abantu babe nempilo enhle.
title: Ucwaningo luveze ezimnandi ngokuvalwa kukagwayi

text: UCWANINGO lwenhlangano yezomnotho nelwela amalungelo abantu seluveze ukuthi abantu bakuleli sebekhokha imali ethe xaxa ngo-30% uma bethenga ukudla ezitolo uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esingaphambi kokuvalwa kwezwe okwaqala ngoMashi 27 kuleli. Izwe selivalwe izinsuku eziwu-81 kusukela ngo-Mashi 27 kanti nakuba isithanjisiwe imigomo kathaqa njengoba izwe selivulwa ngezigaba, inhlangano, iPietermaritzburg Economic Justice and Dignity Group, ithi abantu bakuleli basazoshayeka ephakatheni njengoba sebekhokha imali enyuke ngo-30% uma bethenga ukudla kwasekhaya. Ngokocwaningo abalwenzile, abantu sebekhokha uR265 ngaphezulu uma bethenga ukudla okuncane ezitolo. Lolu cwaningo luveze ukuthi amanani okudla okubalwa kukho i-rice, amazambane nesinkwa, anyukile. Umcwaningi uJulie Smith uveze ukuthi abantu abahola uR3 487, okuyimali okuqalwa kuyo ngokomthetho ukuholela abasebenza ngokugcwele kuleli, ngeke besakwazi ukuthenga igilosa iphelele. "Inqola eyodwa yokudla manje isibiza uR3 486," kusho uSmith othe kwayibona abantu abaholelwa imali encane abanye babo balahlekelwe yimisebenzi.  Uqhube waveza ukuthi enye inkinga ebhekene nemindeni njengamanje ukuthi njengoba lisavaliwe izwe, abantu bachitha isikhathi esiningi ekhaya okuchaza ukuthi ukudla kuyashesha ukuphela. Ucwaningo luthole ukuthi noma impesheni yeCovid-19 nezijumbane zokudla kusiza, akwanele ukumelana nenkinga yokunyuka kwamanani okudla ezitolo.
title: Anyuke ngo-30% amanani okudla ezinyangeni ezintathu ezidlule

text: Simphiwe Ngubane AMAPHOYISA asephinde axwayisa umphakathi ngobugebengu bokudunwa kwezimoto eMkhanyakude zishushumbiselwe eMozambique.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe izigilamkhuba ziphanga izimoto zosomabhizinisi imisebenzi yabo edinga bahlangane nabantu njengalabo abakha amakhabethe.UCol Mbele uthe osomabhizinisi abayizisulu yilabo okumele baqale bazoklama ngaphambi kokuthi umsebenzi uqalwe.“Uma befika lapho bebizwe khona yizigilamkhuba, kuhanjwa nabo kuyiwe endaweni ekude. Le ndawo iba kude nesiteshi samaphoyisa. Uma befika khona bese bephucwa iselula, imali nemoto,” kusho uCol Mbele.Uthe izimoto zidunwa zeqiswe umngcele zibheke eMozambique. Abagilwa bashiywa buqamama nesiteshi samaphoyisa nemigwaqo emikhulu.Lapho imoto isuke seyeqisiwe umngcele. Sicela osomabhizinisi abenza imisebenzi ebahlanganisa nabantu ukuthi baqaphele. Sibeluleka ukuthi baqale bathinte amaphoyisa khona ezobaphelezela ngaphambi kokuhlangana nabantu,” kusho uCol Mbele.Uthe noma bacele amaphoyisa ukuthi ababhekele labo bantu abababizayo ukuthi bababizela umsebenzi ngempela noma bafuna ukubaholela ophathe.Emasontweni amathathu edlule amaphoyisa abambe umkhuba wokushushumbiswa kwezimoto ngeloli yezinkwa eJozini.Iveni lakwaTotoya elalebiwe eDurban North lalifakwe phakathi elolini lezinkwa. Umshayeli weloli waphuma wadla phansi ngesikhathi emiswa amaphoyisa.Umphakathi waseManguzi, Jozini nasoPhongolo ukhala ngokwebelwa izimoto zishushumbiselwe eMozambique.Lokhu kwenze uhulumeni wesifundazwe wakha udonga oluwukhonkolo emngceleni ohlukanisa iNingizumu Afrika neMozambique ukunqanda ubugebengu.
title: Isexwayiso ngamasela ezimoto azisa eMozambique

text:
SEBENGU-116 abantu abanegciwane iCorona eNingizimu Afrika. Lokhu kumenyezelwe ngungqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize ngoLwesithathu ekuseni. Isibalo sabanaleli gciwane sinyuke ngo-31 kuleso ebesimenyezelwe ngoLwesibili ebusuku. UMkhize uthe siyanda isibalo sabantu bakuleli abathelelekile abangakaze bahambele amazwe angaphandle, okuchaza ukuthi lesi sifo sesiyasabalala kuleli. Bangu-6 abathelelekile abangakaze bewahambele amazwe angaphandle. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID19?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID19— Department of Health (@HealthZA)“Sesiluqoqile ulwazi lokuthi laba balithole kanjani igciwane. Sisazoyidalula imininingwane emphakathini ukuze wazi ukuthi lisabalala kanjani. Ngeke kodwa siveze yonke njengoba kumele sivikele amalungelo esiguli,” kusho uMkhize. Izibalo zakamuva zikhomba ukuthi sikhula ngesivinini isibalo sabathelelekile eGauteng njengoba bengu-16 okutholwe igciwane kubo muva nje. Bayishumi eWestern Cape, bathathu KwaZulu-Natal kanti ababili abaseMpumalanga. Umengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu uhlangane namaqembu ezepolitiki akuleli bedingida izindlela zokubhekana neCoronavirus (Covid-19). Uthe nakuba behlukile ngokwemibono kwezepolitiki, bazosebenzisana ukulwa nalesi sifo. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID19?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID19
#CoronaVirusUpdate
pic.twitter.com/vKi3Dr5LQV— Department of Health (@HealthZA)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID19?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID19
pic.twitter.com/xAeZ7ORcU5— Department of Health (@HealthZA)
title: #Coronavirus: Sebengaphezulu kuka-100 abathelelekile kuleli

text: UZOKWETHULA iqembu lepolitiki emasontweni amabili ezayo uNkk Patricia De Lille osule ngenyanga edlule esikhundleni sakhe sokuba yiMeya yaseCape Town.Namhlanje uNkk De Lille uthule inhlangano ezosiza umphakathi ebizwa ngokuthi yiFor Good athe izolekelela wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika.“Ngiye ngenza ucwaningo ngaphambi kokuthatha isinqumo sokusungula inhlangano yepolitiki futhi lukhomba ukuthi abantu bayangidinga. Ngizimisele ukusebenzela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bazo zonke izinhlanga ngoba kwiDA bengihlukunyezelwa ukuthi ngifuna wonke umuntu abe nempilo engcono kungakhathaleki ukuthi ibala lakhe linjani. Iqembu lwami lepolitiki ngizolethula emasontweni amabili azayo futhi ngizongenela ukhetho kuzo zonke izifundazwe,” kusho uNkk De Lille.Uthe usenawo amandla okukhankasa nokusebenza ngoba ipolitiki isegazini lakhe futhi uzimisele ukusebenzela izwe. Uthe uhlu lwabo lokuheha abavoti imanifesto luzobe selulungile ngoJanuwari futhi akangabazi ukuthi bazoheha abantu abangazwani nenkohlakalo abafuna impilo engcono.Umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema uthe bayamamukela uNkk De Lille ngoba uzophuca iDA ivoti lamaKhaladi okusho ukuthi uma i-EFF ihluleka ukungena kwesokwengamela izwe, izokwazi ukuba yiqembu eliphikisayo lokuqala bese kulandela amanye.Uthe bayamhlonipha uNkk De Lille ngoba ungumholi onesibindi ongavumanga ukumela ubandlululo oludla lubi kwiDA.
title: Uzokwethula iqembu elisha uPatricia De Lille

text: AFRICAN NEWS AGENCY (ANA)  noNONTUTHUKO NGUBANEOWAYEYILUNGU lePhalamende le-ANC, uDkt Makhosi Khoza, izolo utshele iKhomishini ephenya ngokuLawula koMbuso iDlanzane ukuthi wayethenjiswe isikhundla sokuba uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali ngesikhathi kusaphethe owayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma.UDkt Khoza uthe owayengungqongqoshe wezokuXhumana, uNkk Faith Muthambi, wamtshela ukuthi uZuma ufuna ukumnikeza lesi sikhundla.Uthe uNkk Muthambi wamtshela ukuthi kumele abe nomphathi oyedwa, uZuma. Lokhu wakusho benomhlangano ehhotela eGoli.UNkk Muthambi uthe naye wamtshela ukuthi unomphathi oyedwa futhi akanendaba nobuholi obuphezulu be-ANC.UDkt Khoza uthe uNkk Muthambi waphinde wamtshela ukuthi ujabule uZuma ngowayengumphathi weSABC, uMnuz Hlaudi Motsoeneng, yize uMvikeli woMphakathi u-Advocate Thuli Madonsela, wamchitha njengoba wayengenazo iziqu ezifanele uMotsoeneng.UDkt Khoza uthe akubona esePhalamende kwithimba le-ANC ukuthi owayenguSotswebhu, uMnuz Stone Sizani, wayengakuqondi ukubaluleka kwePhalamende, kwaze kwaba kungena uNgqongqoshe eHhovisi likaMengameli, uMnuz Jackson Mthembu.Uthe uSizani wayengafuni nhlobo ukuba kugxekwe amalungu e-ANC. Uthe uMthembu yena wayefuna amalungu e-ANC ePhalamende enze umsebenzi ngendlela yize naye wayengumuntu othembekile kwi-ANC. Uthe wagxekwa kakhulu amanye amalungu e-ANC.“Kwakunzima kakhulu kumina ukuba ngisebenze ngaphansi kwesimo lapho kwakumaqembuqembu. Ngawenza umsebenzi wami, ngangingenandaba ukuthi wena uyingxenye yaliphi iqembu.” Uthe kwaba khona nokumsola ekomitini lezezimali ukuthi wayemgxeka kakhulu owayengusihlalo webhodi le-SAA uNkk Dudu Myeni.Uthe elinye ilungu lePhalamende le-ANC laze lamtshela ukuthi linenkinga ngaye ukuthi uvumelana nelungu le-EFF, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu.“Ngazithola nginokungezwani namanye amaqabane,” kusho uDkt Khoza.Khonamanjalo; uSihlalo weKhomishini uJaji Raymond Zondo ufake isicelo enkantolo sokuthi kululwe isikhathi sekhomishini kuze kube uJuni.
title: Owashiya kwi-ANC ugonyuluke ngokuzondelwa iqiniso

text: I-APP yeMaths entsha isikopishwe izikhathi ezingaphezu kuka 1000 selokhu yethuliwe ngesonto eledlule.Kuthenjwa ukuthi i-App, esungulwe owayeyisitshudeni sase-University of KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Lloyd Gordon (26), ebizwa nge-Open Omnia, izokwenza kube lula ukwenza iMaths kubafundi nezitshudeni.UGordon uthe ikopishwe eNingizimu Afrika naseNamibia, USA, United Kingdom ne-Egypt.UGordon, ozalelwe eMgungundlovu wathweswa iziqu zeComputer Science ngo-2017, uthe kuthathe ngaphezu kweminyaka emibili ukuphothula ukwenza i-App. Uthe ubunzima ahlangabezana nabo efunda iMaths esikoleni yikona okwenze asungule i-App.“Yayinzima kakhulu iMaths kimi ngesikhathi ngifunda esikoleni samabanga aphezulu. Ngangisebenza kanzima ukuzama ukuyiqonda ngenxa yokuthi ngangingenayo nemali yokukhokhela umuntu owayengangifundisa yona ngaphandle kwasesikoleni,” kusho uGordon.Nge-Open Omnia kuhloswe ukusiza izitshudeni ukuthi ziqonde iMaths kangcono ngokutshengisa zonke izindlela zokuyenza. Ingasetshenziswa ngabafundi basesikoleni samabanga aphezulu nezitshudeni zasenyuvesi.UGordon uthe uyakujabulela ukusekwa yi-InQubate yase UKZN. Uphinde wabonga ukusizwa yibhange Ithala emuva kokuphuma indawo yesibili nokuwina uR50 000 kade efake i-App emncintiswaneni weThala owaziwa nge-Ithala Development Finance Corporation’s Inkuzi isematholeni Youth in Business ngo-2017.Echaza ukubaluleka kweMaths, ofundisa enyuvesi yaseWits, uMnuz Aaron Koopman, uthe ngesikhathi abafundi bethola ubunzima babefuna ukuyiyeka bakhethe iMath Literacy. IMaths isiza umuntu ukuthi aphikelele aphinde acabange ngokujula uma efuna ukulungisa inkinga.“Izinkampani zifuna abantu abakwazi ukucabanga bejule uma kumele kulungiswe izinkinga. Ukucabanga kanjalo kwenzeka uma wazi iMaths,” kusho uKoopman.
title: Isasasa nge-App entsha ezosiza kwiMaths

text: UBOSHIWE owesifazane (21) waseNewcastle okuthiwa ushaye ingane yakhe waze wayiklinya wabe eseziqopha enza lokho.Ubekwe icala lokuzama ukubulala indodana yakhe okuthiwa ineminyaka emibili.Kuthiwa lokhu wakwenza ngoJanuwari 8. Kuthiwa wakwenza ngoba wayexabene noyise wengane manje efuna ukumzwisa ubuhlungu ngokuhlukumeza ingane yabo.Uvele enkantolo yaseNewcastle ngoJanuwari 10 icala lahlehliselwa uJanuwari 21 azocela ngawo ibheyili.Kuthiwa omunye osondelele naye wathola okuqoshiwe okumveza eshaya ingane yakhe wase eyobikela amaphoyisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko wathi uphenyo lusaqhubeka.“Owesifazane oneminyaka engu-21 uboshwe amaphoyisa ophiko oluphenya amacala odlame lwemindeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala ocansi eNewcastle. Uvelile enkantolo icala lahlehliselwa uJanuwari 21 nonyaka ukuze afake isicelo sebheyili. Ngokophenyo olusenziwe umsolwa ubhekene necala lokuzama ukubulala kulandela isikhalo esithi ngoJanuwari 8 nonyaka waziqopha eshaya ingane yakhe, waphinde wayiklinya. Isigameko sabikwa emaphoyiseni, aqala uphenyo kwabe sekuboshwa umsolwa,” kusho uCol Mbele.Ingane kuthiwa inikezwe uyise ngoba unina esagcinwe esitokisini.
title: Uboshiwe ‘oshaye waklinya’ ingane

text: SEHLE cishe ngo-10 000 isibalo sabafundi abakhulelwayo ezikoleni zakuleli.Lokhu kuvezwe ngokhulumela uMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, othe izinhlelo zomnyango zokufundisa abafundi ngokuzithiba nokuzinakelela zithela izithelo.UMhlanga uthe siyehla nesibalo sabafundi besifazane abasuleleka ngegciwane lengculazi masonto onke.“Ngo-2013 bangaphezulu kuka-99 000 abafundi ababekhulelwa besebancane uma uqhathanisa no-2017 njengoba bengu-82 000. Izinhlelo esizenza neminyango ehlukene okubalwa nowezabesifazane ehhovisi likaMengameli uthela izithelo,” kusho uMhlanga.Uthe emantombazaneni amancane sehlile isibalo sasuleleka ngegciwane lengculazi sisuka ku-2 000 njalo ngesonto siya ku-1 300 kwaneminyaka engu-15 kuya ku-24.Uqhube wathi la mantombazane asuke esesikoleni amanye awo. Uma engafundi kufanele ngabe asezikoleni ngenxa yeminyaka yawo.Uthe kumanje bahlola uhlelo lokuthi baqinise uhlelo lwezemfundo ezifundazweni ezinhlanu kuleli lokubhekana nesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane. Zingu-1 572 izikole okuvivinywa kuzona lolu hlelo ezifundazweni okubalwa neKwaZulu-Natal.“Sinazo nezinhlelo zokufundisa ngempilo jikelele kwiLife Orientation, okubalwa nokufundisa ngengculazi. Lezi zinhlelo ziyasiza nakuba abanye othisha baqale baba nenkinga benqikaza ukufundisa ngezinto ezithinta ucansi nokunye.”Uthe bakha uhlelo lokufundisa ngezinto ezithinta ingculazi nokukhulelwa kwabafundi kusuka kwaGrade 4 kuya ku-matric.UMhlanga uthe kunezinsiza ezisiza othisha ngokuthi yikuphi okumele bakufundise baphinde bagxile ezintweni ezithinta indaba yokuhlukunyezwa ngokobulili, udlame, ukushintsha komzimba, nezinye izinto ezithinta inhlalo.
title: Siyehla esabafundi abakhulelwayo

text: I-IFP ithi yisikhathi sokuthi umthetho udlale indima yawo odabeni oluthanda ukuba yinsakavukela, lokusocongwa kwamakhosi KwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu ikusho ngemuva kwesigameko sokubulawa kwenkosi yesizwe saseMbokodwebomvu eNquthu, uNkanyiso Mncube, othelwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu esemotweni noyise omncane emgwaqweni uR68, phakathi kweNquthu neBabanango ngeSonto.UMnuz Blessed Gwala, okhulumela i-IFP kwezokuphepha nokuxhumana komphakathi, uthe iqembu likhathazekile ngesihlava esidla lubi kule minyaka, sokubulawa kwamakhosi kodwa kungaboshwa muntu.“Kusiphathe kabuhlungu ukubulawa kwenkosi yesizwe ngale ndlela.“Sinxusa amaphoyisa ukuthi angashiyi lutho ophenyweni lwawo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izigilamkhuba ziyaboshwa.“Ukushona ngokuzuma kwenkosi kushiye isizwe saseMbokodwebomvu singenamholi, ngakho kudingeka ubulungiswa,” kusho uGwala.Uqhube wathi ukukhothama kwenkosi kulandela ezinye izigameko zokubulawa kwamakhosi, okuze kube manje akukaboshwa muntu.Usole ukuhamba ngonyawo lonwabu kohlelo lokungenelela kwamaphoyisa ukuqeda udlame lokubulawa kwamakhosi.Abalelwa kwayisikhombisa amakhosi asebulewe KwaZulu-Natal phakathi kuka- 1990 no-2020.Phakathi kwamakhosi asocongiwe esifundazweni okungakaboshwa muntu ngakho, yinkosi Macala Gwala (27) yaseNkwezela, eBulwer, eyabulawa ngo-2012 ngokudutshulwa, inkosi Linda Mathonsi (60) yaseMandeni eyadutshulwa ngo-2016, inkosi Bongani Lushaba yasePort Shepstone, ebulawe ngo-2015, inkosi Mbongeleni Zondi yaseNgome eMvoti, ebulawe ngo-2009, inkosi V Gwala yaseDonnybrook, inkosi Nkosibeyiphika Mdluli yaseMkhanyakude nenkosi Magongo Gwala waseMaphephetheni eNdwedwe, owabulawa ngo-1990.UGwala unxuse abangaba nobufakazi obungalekelela ekuboshweni kwababulali ukuthi bathinte amaphoyisa.
title: I-IFP ifuna kuboshwe ababulala amakhosi eKZN

text: UMREPHA wakuleli, uRiky Rick uthe uzogonyuluka maduze ngenkulumo yakhe ayenze ngesikhathi amukela indondo emcimbini wama-16th Metro FM Music Awards abese-ICC, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.Kuthuke abaningi abanye bamshayela ihlombe lo mculi odume ngengoma ethi Sidl’ ukotini, ngesikhathi kumele abonge indondo kodwa wathi akaneme ngoba kukhona abantu abenza kahle emculweni kodwa abavalelwa ngaphandle banganakwa.URiky Rick ubeqala ngqa ukuthola indondo emcimbini wamaMetro FM njengoba emukeliswe eyeBest Hit Single.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe akukho azokusho kwabezindaba okwamanje kodwa ucela ukuphendula imibuzo ngoLwesithathu.“Ngimile emazwini ami engiwakhulumile kodwa manje ngeke ngisho lutho, maphakathi nesonto ngizokhuluma, ngiphendule yonke imibuzo kodwa manje akusiso isikhathi. Uma ubukhona kuloya mcimbi ubungeke ujabule indlela izinto ebezihamba ngayo kodwa konke kuzohlala obala maduze,” kusho uRiky Rick.Lo mrepha uqhube wathi: “Khululekani ngizoyiphendula yonke imibuzo ngengikukhulumile kulo mcimbi.”Lo mrepha ugxeke kakhulu ukungadlalwa kwamaculo abanye abaculi emisakazweni ngoba bengenayo imali.“Ngibashayela ihlombe bonke abaculi abenza umculo osezingeni kodwa abavalelwa ngaphandle ngoba benganayo imali. Lo 90% eniwuzwa emsakazweni wumbhedo. Umculo wangempela ukwi-internet.”Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu bamshayele ihlombe njengoba abanye beveze ukukhathazeka kwabo ngokungawini kukaBabes Wodumo.UBabes Wodumo ubeqokwe eminxeni emine kulo mcimbi kodwa wabuya elambatha.Umethuli wezemidlalo kuthelevishini nasemsakazweni, uRobert Marawa ube ngomunye ophumele obala ngokuzwelana noBabes Wodumo.Ubhale kuTwitter ukuthi ubuhle bokuphumelela akusho ukuthi umculi kumele abe nezindondo ezingaki.UMhlo Gumede waseMabala Noise uthe akukho abakwaziyo okuholele ekutheni uRiky Rick akhulume ngale ndlela.Uthe lo mculi ubeqala ukuthola indondo yize eneminyaka angena emculweni.“Ngisho ezingomeni zakhe kukhona amavesi la eveza khona ukuthi yena akasenendaba nezindondo. Siyazi-ke ukuthi njengoba ekhulume kanje yindlela azizwa ngayo ngoba ubengalindele lutho,” kuchaza uMhlo.Engomeni yakhe ethi Sidl’ ukotini, kukhona ivesi elithi “Uma kuwukuthi kukhona abaculi abakukhokhelayo ukuthola izindondo mina angizifuni.”Imizamo yokuthola uBabes Wodumo ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe.Ethintwa ngalolu daba okhulumela i-SABC, uKaizer Kganyago ugxeke uRiky Rick ngokusebenzisa umcimbi wamaMetro ukufeza izinhloso zakhe.“Uma kuwukuthi akayijabulele indondo ayitholile ubewangenelelani amaMetro? Akekho umculi ophoqwayo ukuthi awangenele, ibona abazilethela umculo kithi,” kusho uKganyago.UKganyago uqhube waphendula nezinsolo ezibekwe yilo mrepha zokuthi iziteshi zomsakazo ze-SABC zidlala kuphela umculo okhokheliwe.“Uma esho njalo uzama ukuthini ngomculo wakhe nozakwabo? Ngisho ngoba phela uyadlalwa umculo wabo bonke eziteshini ze-SABC. Uzama ukuthini ngesitebele sakhe? Okunye engingakusho wukuthi abantu uma benobufakazi bokuthi bayagwaziswa ukuze umculo wabo udlalwe emisakazweni abaphumele obala balethe ubufakazi. Sisanda kuxosha umsakazi nje kuKhozi FM ngoba kwakunobufakazi,” kusho uKganyago.Ephawula ngabazwakalise ukukhononda ngengoma yonyaka kaNasty C, iHell Naw, uthe abantu bakhononda ngendlela elalikhethwa ngayo ekuqaleni njengoba kwakunabantu abaqokiwe ababelikhetha.“Sakushintsha lokho sathi akuvote abantu, manje sekuyakhalazwa futhi. Ayikho into ongayenza ngemicimbi yama-Awards engagculisa abantu.”
title: Angijiki kwengikushilo - Riky Rick

text: Lo nyaka ka-2019 ngiwuhlonze njengonyaka wokuthi kubuzwe kubantu abanolwazi ngoba isikhathi esiningi sidukuza emswaneni ngenxa yokweswela ulwazi. Umbuzo uthi kuyosisiza ngani ukuthi siphikisane ngobukhona nobungekho bezinto sibe singahlomile ngolwazi oluzosenza siqonde ukuthi izinto ezithile zenzeka kanjani?MaSolezwe, sengake ngaloba ngezikhuzathando eziyimithi yangaphakathi edliswa abantu ukuze babe nothando olungenamkhawulo. Kule ngosi yanamuhla angihlaziyi ukuthi akhona noma awekho amakorobela, okuyiyona inhloso wukuthi kucelwe ogobela abafana noVVO Mkhize ukuthi basichazele ukuthi yimiphi imithi emihle okufanele kudliswe ngayo abantu?Indlela okwenzeka ngayo izinto iyakhombisa ukuthi kunezinyanga ezisebenzisa imithi emibi uma zithaka imithi yentando. Kuyiqiniso ukuthi kunezinyanga ezithaka zixube nenhlabathi zamathuna uma zihlanganisa umuthi wangaphakathi. Uthole ukuthi umuntu uthanda umuntu kodwa kubonakale ukuthi kunothando olwakhiwe oluhambisana nesipoki esingenza kufe umuntu uma kunokuphambana kwemibono.OkaVolos uyazi ukuthi kudala umuthi wangaphakathi ufakwa umunyu nezinyembezi zengane ukuze umuntu odlisiwe ahlale ekhala, ekhumbula isithandwa sakhe. Le mithi yangaphakathi yesimanjamanje efakwa igazi nensila yiyona edala ukuthi abantu bashiswe wuthando eliwubulima bancamele nokuzibulala.Okunye okubalulekile nengifisa uSolwazi uMkhize asicacisele khona wukuthi umuntu okusiphi isigaba ofanelwe wukuthi usengamdlisa umuntu athandana naye. Kulesi sikhathi esiphila kusona sibona izimanga, uthole ukuthi ingane yesikole idlise enye ngegomondela eyenza ingasakwazi nokufunda, ilibele ukucabanga isoka okanye intombi. Okubi ngokudlisana kwabantu abancane wukuthi basuke bengenanhloso yokushadana, okusho ukuthi kwakhiwa uthando oluningi olugcina lufana nomgwaqo ongayindawo.MaSolezwe, ayikho into ebuhlungu njengokubona ingane idliswe ngomuthi othakwe neqanda lenkukhu ngoba ijike ithithibale ifane nechwane lenkukhu elinethwe yimvula.Isikhathi esiningi abantu abaze bangabona ukuthi ingane ibanjwe yigomondela ngoba basuke becabanga ukuthi yenyukelwe wubulima noma seyilunge kakhulu.MaSolezwe, ngiqonda kahle ukuthi kuyimanje kunabantu abashaywa wuvalo bafise ukwazi ukuthi kufanele benzeni ukuze bagweme ukudliswa intando.Ngokomlando, kuyavela ukuthi abantu abathanda inyama badliseka kalula ngoba intando ifakwa esobheni.Uma ungumuntu othanda ukudla izitshulu kufanele wazi ukuthi maningi amathuba okuthi udliseke.Ngokunjalo nomuntu okhoze ukudla ophaya akaboni noma esedliswa, kuyisimo esifanayo nakumuntu ophuza utshwala ogcina ejabule ethi udakiwe kanti usedakwe nayintando efakwe kubhiya.OkaVolos uyafisa nazi ukuthi akulula ukudlisa umuntu odla izithelo, uma ufuna ukugwema ukudliswa kufanele udle obhanana nama-aphula. Ukuthanda kwakho izithelo akufanele ukwedlulisele ekutheni uthande namayogathi enziwe ngezithelo ngoba umuthi wangaphakathi ungangena kuyogathi.Uma ungafuni ukudliswa kufanele uwagweme amajusi ngoba intando ingena kalula ejusini, uma womile ufuna into ozoyiphuza kungcono uphuze amanzi ngoba kulula ukubona uma sekuntanta izinto ongaziqondi.- NgeSo likaVolovolo
title: [IMIBONO] 'Abathanda ukudla ophaya yibona abadliseka kalula'

text: UTHOLE ithothali kwiSayensi wabaqwaqwada bonke abanye abafundi bakwa-matric KwaZulu-Natal umfundi waseMagabheni obefunda lesi sifundo ngencwadi.USbu Ngqondo (18), waseSidelile High, uthe ugcine ngokufunda lesi sifundo ngencwadi ngoba isikole sakhe singenazo izinsiza zeSayensi.Umenyezelwe njengomfundi othole ithothali emcimbini wokuklomelisa abafundi abenze kahle ku-matric wango-2018 esifundazweni obuseNkosi Albert International Convention Centre eThekwini, ngoLwesihlanu.Uthe ngokomthetho kumele ngabe kuba u-25% okufundayo bese kuthi u-75% kube ilokhu ozokwenza ngezinsiza.“Asinazo izinsiza zeSayensi siyifunda kuphela ngencwadi kodwa ngikwazile ukuthi ngenze kahle kulesi sifundo. Bekuyisifundo engisithandayo nasesikoleni bekwaziwa ukuthi ngiyasiphasa,” kusho uSbu.Uthe into emsizile ukuthi asidabule ngale ndlela wukusebenzisa amaphepha amadala akwa-matric.Ubuye wathi ubegcina ngokufunda esikoleni noma afunde uma zingekho ezinye izingane zakubo ngoba bahlala baningi endlini eyodwa.“Ngikhuliswe ugogo, ubaba angimazi, umama akasebenzi. Sibane endlini eyodwa nezinye izingane zasekhaya ezizalwa o-anti bami. Bekuba lula uma ngifunda bengekho kunzima uma bekhona.”Uthe baphila ngempesheni kagogo nomkhulu wakhe.“Ngifuna ukwenza iziqu ze-Actuarial Science eWits. Ngisalinde umfundaze wokwenza lezi ziqu, engisawutholile owokwenza umkhakha wezamandla,” kusho uSbu.Uthe kwiMaths uthole * -96% wathi ubengajabula ukube uthole ithothali.Uthole o-A abayisikhombisa kwiMaths, Sayensi, Geography, Life Orientation, isiZulu, English neLife Science.
title: Wenze ezibukwayo kwiSayensi

text: ABEZINKULUMO ezakhaya bavame ukuthi ‘ikusasa lakho lisezandleni zakho’ nokungamazwi okufanele ukuba ankenteza ezindlebeni zabadlali be-Orlando Pirates ngesicoco se-Absa Premiership uma bebheka ukuthi bazodlala neMamelodi Sundowns neBidvest Wits ngokulandelana.Lawa maqembu iPirates ibanga nawo ukunqoba isicoco seligi kanti uma ingawaqumba phansi ivuke namaphuzu ayisithupha ingazibona esicongweni ekubeni kuzobe sekusele imidlalo emihlanu kuphothulwe isizini.Kuyimanje yiSundowns eqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-43 kuthi iWits ilandela ngawu-41 bese kuba yiPirates ibenaw-40.ISundowns evikela isicoco iyona ezobhekana nePirates kuqala emdlalweni ose-Orlando Stadium kusasa ngo-7.30 ebusuku.Lowo mdlalo uzokwenza womabili amaqembu alingane neWits ngemidlalo engu-24.IWits izobe isilandela ngokusingatha iPirates eBidvest Stadium ngo-Ephreli 6.Umdlalo wePirates neSundowns bekumele ube ngo-Ephreli 27 kodwa wasondezelwa usuku lwakusasa ngenxa yokudlulela kwayo kuma-quarter-finals eCaf Champions League lapho ezobhekana khona ne-Al Ahly.Esewonke amaqembu athinteka kulesi simo seSundowns yiBaroka FC, Pirates, SuperSport United, Lamontville Golden Arrows neBlack Leopards.Ukaputeni wePirates, uHappy Jele, uthe ujatshuliswa wukuthi baya emdlalweni wakusasa bengenabo abadlali abalimele.“Ngicabanga ukuthi kumqoka kakhulu kithi njengabadlali ukufaka umfutho kulo mdlalo ozayo (weSundowns). Okungijabulisayo wukuthi iningi labadlali bethu alilimele. Sidlale omunye umdlalo wobungani nosize ukuthi ozakwethu bathole ithuba lokudlala. Kubalulekile ukuthi sizimisele sithole amaphuzu, sidlala ekhaya,”kusho uJele.Enanela amazwi kakaputeni wakhe uLuvuyo Memela, uthe:“Okumqoka kakhulu manje wukuthi singakuvumeli ukuthikamezeka emiqaondweni yethu. Sisalelwe yimidlalo eyisikhombisa (kuphele isizini). Enkundleni kufanele singazicindezi kodwa umdlalo weSundonws siwuthathe ngendlela esithatha ngayo eminye.”ISundowns izosingatha i-Al Ahly emlenzeni wokuqala eLoftus Stadium ngoLwesihlanu ngo-9 ebusuku.Umlenze wesibili usegibhithe ngo-Ephreli 12 enkundleni esazomenyezelwa.Imidlalo yeSundowns eshintshiwe imiswe kanje:17/04/2019 - Sundowns v SuperSport United, Loftus Versfeld, 7.30pm;20/04/2019 - Baroka FC v Sundowns, New Peter Mokaba Stadium, 4pm;01/05/2019 - Black Leopards v Sundowns, Thohoyandou Stadium, 3pm;07/05/2019 - Sundowns v Golden Arrows, Loftus Versfeld Stadium, 7.30pm.
title: UJele ukhuthaza abadlali ngomdlalo neSundowns

text: BAZOLALA behleka bodwa ababhema ugwayi kuleli kulandela isimemezelo sikamengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokuthambisa eminye imithetho kathaqa ebibekelwe ukulwa nokusabalala kweCovid-19 kuleli. URamaphosa ngoLwesine wazise abantu bakuleli ngeminye yemithetho esithanjisiwe kulandela ukumemezela uR500 billion wokutakula umnotho nabantu bakuleli kumonakalo odalwa yileli gciwane. UMengameli uthe kusagqugquzelwa abantu ukuthi bahlale emakhaya ngaphandle kwalabo abasebenza imisebenzi ebucayi noma labo abazovunyelwa ukubuyela emisebenzini ngokohlelo lokuvulwa komnotho kancane kancame. Ezokuthuthwa zizothanjiselwa imithetho kodwa eminye izosala ukuqinisekisa ukuthi alisabalali igciwane. URamaphosa uthe kunambhizinisi azovunyelwa ukubuyela emsebenzini kodwa lokho kumele kwenziwe ngesineke futhi kuvunyelwe abasebenzi abakwazi ukusebenzela emakhaya ukuthi baqhubekele khona. Uthe kumele kusebenze u-30% wabasebenzi. Uthe ukudayiswa kukagwayi, obekuyisikhalo sabaningi, kuzovunyelwa kodwa izindawo ezidayisa utshwala zisavaliwe. Ukuhambela ezinye izifundazwe kuvaliwe kanti uRamaphosa uthe imicimbi ehlanganisa abantu abaningi njengemishado isavaliwe. Ukuhambela izindawo zokungcebeleka njengama-cinema kusavaliwe kodwa sekuzovumeleka ukuthi abantu bazovocavoce, ngaphansi kwemigomo emisha. Imingcele yakuleli nayo isavaliwe, kuvumeleke kuphela abantu abebevaleleke kwamanye amazwe. Isigaba esilandelayo sokuqedwa kukathaqa kancane kancane ngesokwehliswa kwemithetho ethinta amabhizinisi nokuhlangana kwabantu. URamaphosa uthe oNgqongqoshe bomkhandlu obhekelele ukulwa neCovid-19 kuleli kusasa bazokwenaba ngezinqumo zakamuva. Amazwibela enkulumo kaRamaphosa: %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: Public transport will continue to operate, with limitations on the number of passengers and stringent hygiene requirements, including that all passengers must wear a face mask.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: The public is encouraged to stay at home, other than for essential personal movement, doing essential work and work in sectors that are under controlled opening. People can exercise under strict public health conditions.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: All gatherings, apart from funerals and for work, will remain prohibited.Those who are elderly, and those with underlying conditions, must remain at home and take additional precautions to isolate themselves.The sale of cigarettes will be permitted.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: The range of goods that may be sold will be extended to incorporate certain additional categories. These will be detailed by the relevant Ministers.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: Conference and convention centres, entertainment venues, cinemas, theatres, and concerts will remain closed. Concerts, sporting events, and religious, cultural and social gatherings will not be allowed until it is deemed safe for them to continue.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)
title: URamaphosa uthambise imithetho kathaqa, nakhu okuzoshintsha

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUU MCULI wekwaito, uKabelo Mabalane 
(osesithombeni) usengene kwezokusakaza njengoba eseshayela uhlelo kuRadio 2000 aqale ukuzwakala kuyo ngoLwesihlanu.UKabelo owagqama ngama-90’s eqenjini iTKZee wenza uhlelo lwasebusuku njalo ngoLwesihlanu.Uhlelo ulwenza noGavin Koppel kanti lungena ngo-7 kuya ku-9.Ujoyina nje, vele lesi siteshi esisakazela iNingizimu Afrika yonke sisanda kwenza izinguquko eziqale ukuzwakala ngoMeyi 1.Sijoyinwe nguThami Ngubeni osakaza nakuMetro FM lapho khona enza uhlelo lwangeSonto ekuseni i
Sacred Space.UThami kuRadio 2000 ungene esikhaleni sikaThabiso Tema owashiya wayojoyina isiteshi esisha esingakazwakali emoyeni, iPower FM.Abanye abajoyinile nguLupi Ngcayisa, Kia Johnson, Bongani Nxumalo, Kitty Phetla, Lindo Zici noKass Naidoo kwathi uCarol Tshabalala yena wahamba.UKabelo kumaSouth African Music Awards muva nje obeqokwe emkhakheni weBest Kwaito Album nge-albhamu yakhe ethi 
Immortal Vol. 2 lapho ebeqhathwe khona noL’vovo, Bhar, Teddy Bears noProfessor owagcina eyithathile, uthe ujabule kakhulu ngokuba semoyeni.“Ngiyajabula kakhulu ngokuba lana. Cabanga ngingena ngemuva komuntu engikhule ngimlalela u-Ernest Pillay,” kusho uKabelo emoyeni.Sekuwumkhuba ojwayelekile ukuthi imisakazo iqashe osaziwayo njengoba uLloyd Cele noLeleti Khumalo besakaza kuVuma FM,uDJ Ms Cosmo unohlelo ku-5FM, uMinnie Dlamini ungena ngoMgqibelo kuMetro FM.Bakhona nabanye osaziwayo abangazibekile phansi emisakazweni nakumabonakude.
title: OweTKZee usengumsakazi

text: AMALUNGU e-ANC kufanele akwemukele ukuthi kungafika ingqungquthela ezinye izikhalo zawo zingaxazululekile. Lokhu kushiwo nguMgcinimafa we-ANC uDkt Zweli Mkhize. "Angilindele ukuthi zonke izikhalo sizokwazi ukuzixazulula ngaphambi kwengqungquthela," kusho uMkhize. Amagatsha e-ANC ezweni afake izikhalo emuva kwemihlangano yamagatsha okukhetha abaholi. UMkhize obe nengxoxo nezintatheli eSandton kuleli sonto uthe ufuna i-ANC iqeqeshe abaholi bayo ngaphambi kokuthi bayoqekelwe ezikhundleni eziphezulu. "Kufanele siqeqeshe abantu emagatsheni," kusho uMkhize. UMkhize uthe seziqalile izinhlelo zokuqeqesha abaholi kodwa ngeke akwazi ukudalula okunigi ngazo. Uthe uma eqokelwa esikhundleni sokuhola i-ANC uzoqinisekisa ubuyisa ubumbabo, ucwaningo aqinisekise nokuthi abaholi bayakuqonda ukuthi bamele abantu. Uthe uzoqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lobulungu aluqoleki. Abaholi abangazifezi izinhlelo ababekelwe zona zokuthuthukisa umphakathi bazoqondiswa. "Kubalulekile ukuthi abaholi bazifeze izinhlelo zokuthuthukisa umphakathi," kusho uMkhize esho nokuthi abaholi kufanele babeqotho. Uthe uzolwa nenkohlakalo ngoba iyona edala izinkinga enhlanganweni. Uzophinde alwe nokuqhekeka kwe-ANC njengoba kudala abanganelisekile bavele basungula iCOPE ne-EFF."Sifundile emaphutheni ethu futhi asifuni ukuthi sibe nezinye izinhlangano eziphuma kwi-ANC. Sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuletha ubumbano," kusho uMkhize. UMkhize uphinde wathi kufanele kube neCodesa yemikhakha ehlukene kwezomnotho ukuze kubunjwe isizwe, kuthuthukiswe nomnotho.
title: Azilindeleke izinkinga nangosuku lwengqungquthela-Mkhize

text: UNTOKOZO “TK” Dlamini olingisa kuZalo wale waphetha ukuthatha isithombe nozakwabo ngesikhathi ecelwa ukuthathwa isithombe noJessica Nkosi weSibaya e-47th Avenue, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.UTK, umlingiswa wakhe okunguMastermind, ubenze umcimbi wokugubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa. Yena noJessica, uQondi kwiSibaya, bebehleli etafuleni elilodwa nabanye abangani babo kanti phambilini sekuke kwavela izindaba zokuthi bayathandana kodwa abakaze bakuqinisekise lokhu.Ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa ukuthi uJessica ukhona emcimbini, kanti naye bekuwusuku lwakhe lokuzalwa, bacelwe ukuthi bashaye isithombe ndawonye kodwa uTK wanqaba.UTK uthe ingaye le nto ngakho akube nguye yedwa oshuthwayo. Akafunanga futhi ukuqinisekisa ngobudlelwano bakhe noJessica. Nangesikhathi esethintwa izolo uvele waluvala ucingo.Uphinde wala ukudalula iminyaka yakhe wathi “sekusele kancane ngifike ku-30”.Esikhangisweni somcimbi bekungabhaliwe ukuthi kuzonandisa bani kodwa kuthiwe kuzocula abantu abayimfihlo futhi kuzotheleka nosaziwayo.Usaziwayo obekhona bekunguNay Maps olingisa noTK kuZalo odlala indawo kaMxolisi. Bekukhona noDJ Benny Maverick wodumo lwengoma ethi Memeza ayishaya noDladla Mshunqisi.Abebenandisa kubalwa kubo uDJ Sonic ongumsakazi weGagasi FM, uDJ we-hip hop, uMeech nabanye.Ngesikhathi efika usingaye ngabo-1.30 entathakusa abantu bebengakagcwali ngaphakathi. Kodwa kuthe kubheke ko-2.30 endaweni yokudansa bese kuqala ukuphithizela.Khonamanjalo, uJessica yena usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa ubekade elugubhe eViews at Twenty5, eStamford Hill, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo emini.Ubehlanganisa iminyaka ewu-28. edla anhlamvana.
title: Wale waphetha ukushutha nozakwabo

text: ABANTU abaningi bathi lusabambe ngakho uhlelo lukamaskandi olusakazwa yizintokazi zoShikishi, uZimiphi ‘Zimdollar’ Biyela noNonhlanhla ‘Mdonso’ Ngcobo kuKhozi FM ngoMgqibelo. Kuthintwa omunye womaskandi besifazane abahamba phambili, uBuselaphi Buthelezi-Gxowa, uthe ubona besaqhuba kahle kakhulu ngokunikeza abaculi abasafufusa ithuba nokudlala ngokulinganayo abaculi bobulili obuhlukene. “Bengingakaliboni iphutha kubona. Noma inkonyane isazwakala ukuthi isathuka isisinga kuMdonso ngenxa yokuthi usaphuma esiteshini somphakathi kodwa kuzohamba kuhambe naye ajwayele.Engikuthanda kakhulu ngabo wukuthi abadlali abaculi ababodwa futhi abathukanayo.” NoBoneni ukujabulele kakhulu ukunikezwa kwabantu besifazane ithuba lokusakaza lolu hlelo ngoba liyenyuka nezinga lokudlalwa kwabaculi besifazane kulona, ikakhulukazi abasha.Ube esecela ukuba lezi zintokazi zinikezane ithuba uma zisakaza ngoba kuzwakala sengathi kusakaza umuntu oyedwa. “Babuye bakhulume kanyekanye. Okunye kuzofanele baqinise kakhulu ekucwaningeni ngoba kubuye kube nokuphaphalaza.” Ubekhuluma ngokubizwa komculi wesifazane uGaranti ngensizwa, ukubizwa kukaMjikijeli ngoMjikijelwa nokuthi kuthiwe abalandeli bakaKhuzani bazobe bephakamisa amathawula, ekubeni esetshenziswa abeGcokama.uZimiphi ‘Zimdollar’ BiyelaOmunye umculi ocele ligodlwe igama lakhe, unxuse ukuba bagade ulimi oluqosheme njengoluthinta ucansi. “Siyacela impela ukuba bathi ukwehlisa ezindabeni zocansi. Uma omunye umsakazi ephaphalaza, abangalungisani emoyeni kodwa abakhulume ngasese futhi bangabuzani imibuzo bengahlinzekene ngezimpendulo.”Uphrojusa ongumphathi wabaculi uMjaphani Mkhize uthe yize uShikishi lunenyanga eyodwa kodwa uhlelo ulubona lusahamba kahle. “Ngabe ngiqamba amanga uma ngingathi kukhona amaphutha engisawazwile. Engikuthanda kakhulu ngabo wukuthi bakwazi ukudlala zonke izinhlobo zomculo ngokulinganayo.”NoDkt Musa Zulu weMaz Entertainment uthe lolu hlelo seluyakwazi ukuqhakambisa umculo wabesifazane kunakuqala futhi badlala ngokulinganayo nezingoma zabo. “Uhlelo lwabo luhleleke kahle futhi ngithanda nezingosi ezikhona, ziyakuheha ukuba ulalele.”UZulu unxuse lezi zintokazi ukuba zithi ukwehlisa emancokweni kodwa zigxile engomeni.
title: Bancoma izintombi zoShikishi oKhozini

text: IBHANTSHI ligcwale umoya kubaholi beNFP, uMnuz Maliyakhe Shelembe noSolwazi Nhlanhla Khubisa abagwetshwe iminyaka engu-10 bengazihlanganisi neqembu kwaphinde kwahoxiswa nobulungu babo ngemuva kokulahlwa ngamacala ebebekwe wona yiqembu.Ikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe leqembu, lithole uShelembe obenguSihlalo kazwelonke owesula esikhundleni noKhubisa obenguNobhala-jikelele naye owasula, benecala lokwehluleka ukubhalisela iqembu kusenesikhathi ukuze lingenele ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya nokwaholela ekutheni ligcine lingangenanga.Ibamba likaSihlalo weNFP kuzwelonke, uMnuz Bheki Gumbi, ukuqinisekisile izolo ukuthi ikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe leqembu libathole benecala, uShelembe noKhubisa.“Uzokhumbula ukuthi laba baholi uShelembe, uKhubisa noMnuz Scelo Mabika, bavele phambi kwekomiti leqembu eliqondisa ubugwegwe. Siphumile isinqumo, uShelembe noKhubisa batholwa benecala. Banikwe isigwebo esithi ubulungu babo buhoxisiwe iminyaka eyishumi, lokho okusho ukuthi kuzomele bangabe besazihlanganisa nezinto zeqembu kuze kuphele lesi sikhathi,” kusho uGumbi.Uthe uShelembe noKhubisa balahlwe yicala lokuthi behlulekile ukwenza umsebenzi wabo okuholele ekutheni iqembu ligcine lingakwazanga ukungenela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya. Uthe ikomiti libathumelele laba baholi isinqumo salo.“UMabika yena usindile ngenxa yokuthi buncane ubufakazi obebumhlanganisa namacala wabe eseshaywa ngoswazi oluncane lokuthi angazihlanganisi nezinhlelo zeqembu unyaka owodwa, ubulungu bakhe kabumisiwe,” kusho uGumbi.Uthe iphalamende lizothunyelelwa isinqumo sekomiti.“Lesi sinqumo sisho ukuthi uShelembe noKhubisa kulindeleke ukuba baphume ePhalamende ngoba abasayimele iNFP,” usho kanje.UGumbi uthe obenguMgcinimafa weqembu uMnuz Xolani Ndlovu naye obethinteka endabeni yokuthi iqembu lingakwazi ukungenela ukhetho kade amiswa enhlanganweni.“Ubulungu bukaNdlovu bamiswa iminyaka emihlanu ngemuva kokulahlwa yicala, isinqumo sathathwa engekho njengoba ebebaleka, wangavela ngisho phambi kwekomiti,” kusho uGumbi.UShelembe noKhubisa bavumile ukuthi bayitholile incwadi bathi bazosidlulisela phambili isinqumo. UShelembe uthe uGumbi uyagagamela ngokugijima akhulume kwabezindaba zingakalandelwa zonke izinhlaka zangaphakathi.“Into ayijahile ukuya ePhalamende yingakho enza yonke lento,” kusho uShelembe.
title: Sebeshaywe ngesithende abaholi beNFP

text: ZIBALEKE zashiya izibhamu izigebengu okuthiwa beziyobamba inkunzi eThekwini, izolo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa asesiteshini samaphoyisa eDurban Central abenomkhankaso wokulwa nobugebengu ngesikhathi emiswa yilungu lomphakathi ebelikhathazekile.Kuthiwa libikele amaphoyisa ukuthi kukhona abafuna ukubamba inkunzi ibhizinisi ku-2nd Avenue.Amaphoyisa kuthiwa avele aya kule ndawo ababona abebesolisa bemile ngakuleli bhizinisi. Abasolwa kuthiwa babone amaphoyisa eza babaleka bashiya isikhwama okutholwe kuso izibhamu ezimbili nezinhlamvu. UZwane uthe amaphoyisa ayaphenya azama ukuthola abasolwa. Amaphoyisa ancome ilungu lomphakathi eliqaphele ukuthi kukhona abasolisayo lawabikela.
title: Kusale izibhamu bebalekela amaphoyisa

text: UMCULI ocula owokholo uBetusile oqokwe emunxeni weSong of the Year kuma-Independent National Gospel Music Awards (Ingoma) unxuse abalandeli bakhe ukuthi bakhombise uthando lwengoma ngokuyivotela.UBetusile wodumo lwengoma ethi Zundithwale uqokwe ngengoma ethi Itarhu Lakho.“Ngiyacela kubalandeli bangivotele. Ingoma sayikhipha kusathiwa uthaqa uzoba yizinsuku ezingu-21 yaba phambili ezingomeni zowokholo isikhathi eside. Abantu babengithumelela ama-video beyicula umhlaba wonke.”Uthe okwamumangaza ukuthi uyicula ngesiXhosa esiqinile abanye abangezwa nokuthi uthini.“Ngikholwa ukuthi iyababusisa ngakho abayivotele. Uma ngingena estudiyo ngithandazela ukuthi uNkulunkulu anginike umyalezo odingekayo ngaleso sikhathi hhayi ingoma emnandi. Le ngoma ibuyisa ithemba kubantu, ibanikeza ithuba lokuthi baphenduke ezintweni ezimbi abazenzile. Kukhona lapho ithi khona ‘ngingumoni Thixo wami nginecala.’ Abantu bavuma izono bacela ukuxolelwa.”Le miklomelo kuzoba ngeyesikhombisa ikhona kulo nyaka. Ukuvota kuvulwe kuze kube * -Okthoba 11 bese kuthi abanqobile bamenyezelwe ngo-Okthoba 31.Uma uvota uthumela igama Ingoma, umunxa negama lomculi ku-40439. I-sms ibiza uR2.Uhla lwabaqokiwe lumi kanje:BEST GOSPEL COLLABORATION1. Curt Hardy ft. JD Crosson2. Sophy Mmako ft Tau Diarora3. Nelkay ft Cliff M, Jael & Christian Mbuyi4. Nathi Sithole ft Sneazy5. Papa Ndu ft Sipho Makhabane, Donny Ngwenyama & Nicholus MabuzaBEST LIVE RECORDED DVD1. Minister Lombard Matshinge - Scaling Higher Heights2. Dumi Mkokstad - Calvary (Live at Durban City Hill Church)3. Mpumi Mtshweni - Getsemane (Live at Witbank Civic Hall)ALBUM OF THE YEAR1. Dumi Mkokstad - Calvary2. Justice Nemaah - At the feet of Jesus3. Mthoko Nkosi - IzinyembeziARTIST OF THE YEAR1. Curt Hardy2. Tebogo Mokhuwane3. Jumbo4. Mpumi Mtshweni
title: Ucela amavoti  kubalandeli uBetusile

text: INTOKAZI eyaziwa ngeQueen of Gqom, uBabes Wodumo, isiwachithile amahebezi asabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoLwesibili okuthi ikhulelwe.Kube nesasasa ngesikhathi kusabalala isithombe sayo igqoke ingubo eyenza ibukeke sengathi izithwele.Kube nemibuzo eminingi ngesithombe sikaBabes esathathwa egubha usuku lokuzalwa.Iningi lisale nemibuzo ebelingazi ukuthi lizoyiphendulwa ngubani ngoba yena ubengaphawuli.Kodwa izolo lishone eseqophe ivideo wayifaka ku-Twitter iveza ifiga yayo ithi yona isekude ukuthi ikhulelwe.“Ngingakhulelwa kanjani nje. Umuntu usebenzile kusho ukuthi nengcebo iyangilandela yikho sekuthiwa ngikhulelwe. Ngisekude ukuzithwala, ubani ozodansa ngoDisemba, nansi neDurban July isiseduzane, ubani ozoshaya amavosho, hhayi ningazodlala nina, ngeke ngikhulelwe mina, okungenani hhayi manje, kuseva, sizohlangana KwaDezi, uzophinde ungithole KwaDanaza,” kusho uBabes ovale ivideo ngokucula ingoma.Uthe kusho ukuthi abantu ababazi abantu abazithwele.Ukusolwa kukaBabes ngokukhulelwa kulandela imibuzo eke yaba khona ngendandatho ayifakile obekuthiwa uMampitsha wamthembisa umshado ngayo.Ekhuluma neSolezwe phambilini uBabes wawachitha amahebezi omshado wathi uzifakele nje indandatho.Imizamo yokuthola uBabes ayiphumelelanga, ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.
title: UBabes Wodumo uchitha eyokukhulelwa

text: YIZE umlingisi weSibaya, u-Amina Jack engakaze akufundele kodwa indawo kaThokozani Zungu, uyilingisa ngokuzimisela nangeqophelo eliphezulu.U-Amina (19) odabuka oSizweni eNewcastle, ubonga abenkampani eqopha umdlalo ngokumcija aze afike kuleli zinga asekulo. Echaza ngokungena kuwo, uthe wayengakaze aziphuphe engumlingisi.“Ngomunye unyaka umama wavele wangibuza ukuthi ngiyafuna yini ukuba umlingisi. Wabe esethi ubone inhlolokhono. Ngakho angiyozama ukuze ngibone ukuthi kuzokwenzekani.”Nebala waya kokwenza inhlolokhono kwiZion 14, wathathwa ukuba alingise indawo yendodakazi kaKing Sibiya, uMbali.“Ngenxa yokuthi lo mdlalo wawukhiqizwa yiThe Bomb esiqopha Isibaya. IThe Bomb yangifaka kwiSibaya.” Njengoba enza unyaka wokuqala ezifundweni zePsychology e-University of KwaZulu-Natal, ophikweni oluseMgungundlovu, uthe isikhathi esiningi usichitha kulesi sifundazwe.“Uma kuneziqephu engizozishutha kwiSibaya bayangibiza. Ngigibela ibhasi ukuze ngifike ngisebenze, maqede ngibuyele emuva eMgungundlovu.”U-Amina uzichaze njengomuntu ohluke kakhulu kuThokozani.“Anginaso isibindi, nginamahloni ekubeni uThokozani uyazikhulumela. Ngiyakuthanda ukufunda izincwadi. Yena uzalelwe esithenjini kanti mina angiphumi ekhaya elinaso.” Uveze ukuthi unekhono lokuqhulula amahlaya uma ezihlalele  nabangani bakhe kodwa akasoze aba wusomahlaya ngoba unamahloni. Njengoba engusaziwayo uthe akabi nankinga nabalandeli bakhe abasuke befuna ukushutha naye.“Ngisho befika ngimatasatasa neminye imisebenzi. Ngibacela kahle ukuba bangilinde, ngiqede engikwenzayo. Okwamanje inkinga kuseyiCorona. Angikwazi ukushutha nabantu ngenxa yokubalekela ukusondelana kakhulu,” kuchaza u-Amina.Ungumagcino ezinganeni ezine zikaNksz Ethel Jack. Uqale ukufunda eQhubimfundo Primary eNewcastle, naseForest Hill Primary eGoli kodwa waphothula uGrade 12 eNationwide School eGoli. Ukufunda ukuqale nyakenye kodwa wabuye wahlaba ikhefu ngenxa yokuba matasatasa nomsebenzi.
title: Wayengakaze aziphuphe elingisa

text: Izigebengu zibaleke noR200 000ASALE encela izithupha amalungu esitokofela ngesikhathi kugasela amadoda abehlome ngesibhamu athatha imali engaphezu kukaR200 000 ebizohlukaniswa KwaQanda, eTaylors Halt, ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu.Amalungu esitokofela Isolezwe elikhulume nawo izolo acela ukungadalulwa, akhale ngokuba noKhisimusi omnyama.Umthombo obukhona kuqolwa uthe izigebengu zifike emini ngo-12 zihlome ngesibhamu zathatha yonke imali.“Amalungu esitokofela awu-12 ahlangane ngo-12 ngoMsombuluko ezohlukanisa imali. Namhlanje (ngoLwesibili) bekulindeleke ukuthi siyothenga ukudla. Sidlala izitokofela ezintathu, esokudla, esemali nesefriji (kuthengwa izinhlobo zenyama).“Kube ukungena nje emhlanganweni, kwangena abantu besilisa ababili, abanye bama ngaphandle. Omunye ubesikhombe ngesibhamu, omunye ephethe iselula. Bavele bathi ‘sifuna imali’. Baqalile-ke bathatha imali kubo bonke abebeyiphethe.“Omunye ubelokhu ekhuluma neselula, bese eqonda kulowo ophethe imali ayicele yonke. Babe sebethatha amaselula, yize omunye ethe uzosibuyisela wona ngoba bona abafuni amaselula, bafuna imali. Bagcine bengasinikezanga kodwa. Babe sebekhiya babaleka ngezinyawo. Amalungu esitokofela azame ukuphuma ngamafasitela,” kusho umthombo.Uthe lapho bebehlukanisela khona ayingeni imoto ngakho izigebengu zibaleke ngezinyawo zaze zayofika ezimotweni ezimbili ebezihamba ngazo, zashaya zachitha.Omunye umthombo uthe: “Imali bayithathe yonke. Ibiningi yize besingakayibali yonke. Imali esicabanga ukuthi bahambe nayo ingaphezu kukaR200 000.“Uma uhlanganisa zonke lezi zitokofela ezinamalungu awu-54, abangu-13 bebedlala esefriji, abangu-17 bedlala esokudla bese abangu-24 bedlala eyemali. Bekukhona nemali ezalayo.“Ngaphezu kwalokho ngaleli langa sonke besizokwengeza ngoR500 ilungu ngalinye imali eyimpoqo ebizwa ngokuthi umshuqulu,” kusho umthombo.Amalungu esitokofela asola ukuthi kungenzeka kukhona onikeze izigebengu ulwazi ngoba bezilokhu zikhuluma neselula futhi zifune ngodli imali okuthiwa umshuqulu.“Bathe abahambi bengakawutholi umshuqulu. Elinye ilungu lize lakhumula lanqunu libakhombisa ukuthi aliyiphethe imali. Imali bebazi ukuthi iphethwe ngobani ngoba bebevele baqonde koyiphethe bathi akayikhiphe bese bemsesha ukuthi ayikho enye egodliwe,” kusho umthombo.Kuthiwa ngelanga lokubanjwa inkunzi lilodwa ilungu ebelingekho emhlanganweni futhi lona beliphethe imali eningi ewuR14 000 obekumele lifike nayo.Izolo bekunomhlangano kuhlanganiswa amakhanda.Lawa malungu abesedlale isitokofela iminyaka futhi besihlukanisa emzini welungu elisuke liqokiwe kulowo nyaka. Athe kulo nyaka abeqala ukuba maningi kangaka, sebecabanga nokuba bayifake ebhange ngonyaka ozayo ngemva kwesehlo.“Sikhulu isililo ngoba abantu abaningi abadlala isitokofela kabasebenzi bahola iqolo. Bebethembe le mali ukuthi bazothengela izingane izinto zikaKhisimusi, kufike ukudla. Manje asazi ngempela senzenjani. Nabanye bayoze bahole sekudlule uKhisimusi, yiyo le mali ebesiyithembile. UKhisimusi wethu umnyama,” kubalisa elinye ilungu.Kuthiwa kubizwe amaphoyisa kodwa angafika. Elinye ilungu lize laziyela lona esiteshini ukuyovula icala sekuntambama ngoMsombuluko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubanjwa kwenkunzi.“Amaphoyisa aseTaylors Halt aphenya icala lokubanjwa kwenkunzi.“Ummangali uthe bekunomhlangano wesitokofela KwaQanda kwase kufika abesilisa abangaziwa babakhomba ngesibhamu, base beyabaleka nemali.”Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luyaqhubeka.
title: Izigebengu zibaleke noR200 000 wesitokofela

text: BANINGI abasacabanga ukuthi bazothathani bahlanganise nani ngoKhisimusi njengoba kudlisa izibiliboco. Kujwayelekile ngalesi sikhathi ukuthi abantu bafune ukupheka okwehlukile, kungabi yizidlo ezijwayelekile. Umpheki uNkk Zanele van Zyl osanda kwethula incwadi ethi Cooking With Zanele, unamathiphu ezinye izidlo ezihlabahlosile ezingajatshulelwa umndeni ngalo Khisimusi. UNkk van Zyl ophinde asebenze nabakwaSpekko, usiphathele izidlo ongazenzela zona ngalo Khisimusi, okukhona ne-dessert ehlukile.“Izidlo engizikhethile ezingadingi izithako eziningi,” echaza.Inkukhu echochobalisiwe1. Inkukhu echochobalisiweOkudingayo:*Inkomishi yeButtermilk noma amasi*125ml weLemon juice*10ml Whole grain mustard*10ml Chicken spice*5ml Paprika*15ml weFresh rosemary eqotshiwe*15ml weThyme*Amaqhezu amathathu ka-garlic ogayiweIndlela yokwenza:Endishini enkulu xuba izithako bese ugcoba inkukhu ngaphandle nangaphakathi. Goqa inkukhu ngephepha lokubhaka (foil) bese uyifaka kuhhavini upheke imizuzu engu-45. Susa i-foil uphinde upheke imizuzu engu-15 ize ishintshe umbala inkukhu. Ungayiphaka ne-rice noma imifino.Apricot Jam Gammon2. Apricot Jam GammonOkudingayo:*2 kg weGammon*U-carrot ombili oqotshiwe*Izigaxa ezimbili zika-anyanisi obomvu*Ilitha yamanzi*Uhhafu we-apricot jam*250 ml we-Apple juice*50g we-White rice vinegar*50g kashukela onsundu*15ml weBabercue Spice*Amaqhezu amathathu ka-garlic ogayiwe*Uginger ogayiwe*Salt and pepperIndlela yokwenza:Ebhodweni elikhulu bilisa iGammon kanye no-carrot no-anyanisi upheke imizuzu engu-30. Uma sekuvuthiwe beka eceleni kuphole. Ebhodweni hlanganisa ujamu, apple juice, ushukela, white rice vinegar, garlic, ginger, usawoti no-pepper. Yeka ebhodweni kuze kushube. Hluba isikhumba enyameni. Thela enyameni ingxube kajamu bese ufaka inyama kuhhavini ubeke ku-180 degrees.Isaladi lethanga no-Beetroot3. Isaladi lethanga no-beetrootOkudingayo:*500g wethanga eliqotshiwe*Izigaxa ezine zikaBeetroot oqothiswe wabiliswa*500g wamahlamvu kaLettuce*Izigaxa ezimbili zika-anyanisi obomvu*60ml oweBalsamic Vinegar*60ml we-Olive Oil*IFeta cheeseIndlela yokwenza:Basa uhhavini uwubeke ku-180 degrees. Chelela ithanga ngo-olive oil bese ufaka kuhhavini imizuzu engu-15. Beka eceleni kuphole. Geza uBetroot ukuze ungavuzeli kwisaladi. Endishini enkulu ufake ithanga eselivuthiwe, uLettuce, Beetroot no-anyanisi. Xuba i-olive oil neBalsamic vinegar bese uvuvuzela kwisaladi, ubeke ngaphezulu iFeta cheese nezinhlamvu zethanga ukuze kubukeke kahle.4.Cheese TartOkudingayo:*2 Izinkomishi ezimbili zeCream cheese*500g we-fresh berries*1 Inkomishi yeCondensed milk*Izinkomishi ezimbili zika-flour*250g webhotela*125g kashukela*5ml kasawotiIndlela yokwenza:Beka uhhavini ku-160 degrees. Esitsheni sokubhaka faka amabhisikisi ayizimvuthu afike esinqeni sesitsha. Xuba uflawa, ushukela, usawoti nebhotela bese ubhaka kuze kushintshe umbala bese uyapholisa.Sebenzisa i-electric mixer ukuhlanganisa i-cream cheese, condensed milk nama-berries. Thela le ngxube kumabhisikidi ubeke efrijini kuze kuqine.Thela ngaphezulu amanyeama-berries.
title: Umpheki namathiphu ezidlo zikaKhisimusi

text: Uthe okwamanje ngeke awadalule amagama abaculi asebaqashile ngoba kusasele ukuthi basayine izinkontileka zokuqashwa kwabo ngaphambi kokuba abaveze.“NgoMsombuluko azoqala ukudayisa amathikithi eComputicket. NgoLwesihlanu (Januwari 18) ngizoba nomhlangano nezinduna zabalandeli ngohlelo lomcimbi ukuze siqale ukuwumaketha. Ngosuku lomhlangano sizoqhamuka nohlelo oluzosisebenzela ukuwumaketha,” kusho uKhuzani.Uthe izindlela ezisetshenziswe uCassper Nyovest ukumaketha owakhe ngesikhathi efuna ukugcwalisa iMoses Mabhida, ngeke akuqinisekise ukuthi naye uzosebenzisa zona.“Uma sesinomhlangano sizobheka ukuthi indlela esizowumaketha ngayo izosisebenzela yini. Uma kungukuthi indlela uCassper Nyovest awumakethe ngayo owakhe sibona ukuthi izosisebenzela, nathi ngeke siqhele kuyona kodwa uma ingeke isisebenzele sizoyiyeka. Njengamanje zikhona izindlela enginazo zokumaketha umcimbi kodwa kulukhuni ukuthi ngizidalule singakahlangani. Lokho kungangifaka ngaphansi kwengcindezi uma kungukuthi azimukelwa wumhlangano sengiziveze emphakathini,” kusho uKhuzani.Omunye wabagqugquyzeli balo mcimbi, uMthokozisi Zuma, uthe bazoqala ngokukhipha isitatimende abazosithumelela kwabezindaba ngohlelo lomcimbi.“Sizoqhamuka nento yethu eyehlukile ngoba asifuni kubukeke sengathi sithathe izinto zabantu ngokumaketha umcimbi. Kumanje sesinalo uhlelo lokumaketha umcimbi kodwa ngeke siludalule emphakathini singakabi nomhlangano esizovumelana kuwona ukuthi sithathe izinqumo ezifanele. Engingakuqinisekisa nje manje ukuthi izinhlelo zomcimbi ziyaqhubeka futhi wonke umuntu osekomitini elihlela umcimbi unomsebenzi wakhe,” kusho uMthokozisi.Okunye okuvelile ukuthi njengoba uKhuzani ezoba nomcimbi eMoses Mabhida, usezinze eThekwini kuze kudlule umcimbi.
title: UKhuzani usemi ngomumo

text:
ZANELE MSOMIITHOLAKALE ishonile ethoyilethi izolo ekuseni indodakazi yosomabhizinisi baseThekwini abashona kuwa ibhilidi lesonto eNigeria ngoSepthemba.Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba kungacaci ukuthi ubulawe yini u-Andiswa Ngcobo ozalwa nguMnuz Thuthukani Ngcobo noNkk Dickie Ngcobo abangabasunguli boKuphila Wellness Centre. Abazali baka-Andiswa babesengabanye bakuleli abawu-85 abashona ebandleni likaMfu TB Joshua iSynagogue Church of All Nations (Scoan), eNigeria. Izidumbu zabo zabuyiswa emuva kwezinyanga ezimbili sekungenelele uhulumeni wakuleli bangcwatshwa ngoNovemba.Kuthiwa isidumbu sika-Andiswa oneminyaka elinganiselwa kwengu-20, sitholakale ethoyilethi emzini walabo somabhizinisi eDurban North.Imithombo ebisashaqekile ngalesi sigameko esenzeke kusanda kungcwatshwa labo somabhizinisi ibibabaza ifu elimnyama elilandele lo mndeni.
Isolezwe lithole ukuthi umndeni wakwaNgcobo uvuke washayana ngamakhanda ngenxa yalesi sigameko esivuse amanxeba. Kuthiwa u-Andiswa bekulindeleke ukuthi aqale izifundo zakhe kwenye yamanyuvesi eThekwini khona izolo.Imithombo ikuqinisekisile ukuthi umufi akazilengisanga kodwa bekungakacaci ukuthi kwenzekeni. Bekubatshazwa nokuthi ubeyingane ezithobile futhi engakukhonzile ukukhuluma.U-Andiswa ubengomunye wezingane zakwaNgcobo eziwu-10 ezasala ziyizintandane emuva kwesigameko saseNigeria.Kuthintwa omunye wabafowabo bakamufi, uMnuz Simphiwe Ngcobo, ubezwakala ukuthi kunzima ngisho ukukhuluma ngenxa yalesi simo.“Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi sishonelwe kodwa angikwazi ukukhuluma nokukhipha eminye imininingwane okwamanje. Ungabuye ungishayele uma sengikwazi ukukhuluma,” kusho yena.Umndeni wakwaNgcobo ukweyathola isimemo sokudla uKhisimusi noMfu TB Joshua eNigeria. Yize eminye imindeni kuthiwa yasinqaba isimemo kodwa umndeni wakwaNgcobo wasamukela njengoba wathi awunagqubu nalo mfundisi futhi wasamukela isimo esenzeka.USimphiwe watshela leli phephandaba ukuthi umndeni uvumelane ngokuthi isimemo sihlehliselwe uJanuwari ngoba ungeke ushiye izingane zodwa kuwuKhisimusi wokuqala kushone abazali. Wathi nguye ozoya eNigeria njengoba bezicelele ukuthi esabo isimemo sihlehliswe.
title: Kushone ozalwa abashonela eNigeria

text: IYAVUTHWA eyeqembu elisha lezepolitiki KwaZulu-Natal ngemuva kokuthi ilungu lesigungu esibhekelele ukusebenza kwe-ANC, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, lithe sebezwile ukuthi kukhona enye inhlangano ezokwakhiwa ingakapheli inyanga.Ekhuluma emngcwabeni wesishoshovu se-ANC esibulewe eMoses Mabhida, uMnuz Msawenkosi “Maqatha aziqobayo” Mchunu, uMchunu uthe uzwa kuthiwa kunenye inhlangano ezokwethulwa ngoMeyi 25.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi sekunenselelo ethe xaxa ngoba kusho ukuthi seziningi izinhlangano ezizofuna amavoti, yingakho kumele sisukume sime ngezinyawo senzele ukuthi lo mbutho ukwazi ukuthola amandla afanele ukuze uqhubeke nokuphatha abantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Uma sizithambisa lezi zinhlangano eziqhamukayo ezingoqhibukhowe zizowuwisa umbuso kaKhongoloseesiwuthanda kangaka,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe kusanda kuvela izinsolo ezithi kunabaholi abathile be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal abaseka lowo obengumengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, abahlela ukwakha inhlangano entsha okuthiwa izoholwa nguZuma.Indaba yale nhlangano entsha ehlubuka kwi-ANC iqale ukukhulunywa ngemuva kwengqungquthela yaseNasrec lapho uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa aqumba phansi imbangi yakhe uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma.ABAHOLI abebehambele inkonzo yomngcwabo wesishoshovu se-ANC esibulewe eMoses Mabhida uMnuz Msawenkosi Mchunu osocongwe ngeledlule, kwesobunxele uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele, uMnuz Sifiso Sonjica noMengameli we-ANCWL uNksz Bathabile DlaminiOmunye wabaholi be-ANC abebematanyiswa nale nhlangano nguMxhumanisi we-ANC eKZN uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, ophinde abe nguNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa noMnotho nezozokuVakasha kulesi sifundazwe.UZikalala wazichitha lezi zinsolo zisanda kuvela wathi zingamampunge.Elinye ilungu le-ANC eMoses Mabhida elikhulume emngcwabeni kaMchunu elingathandanga ukudalulwa, lithe imali entshontshwa kuMasipala waseMsunduzi ngenye yenkece ezosiza ekwakhiweni kwale nhlangano entsha.Lithe kumele lo masipala ophethwe nguMnuz Themba Njilo ufakwe ngaphansi komlawuli kuphinde kuhlakazwe neKhabhinethi yesifundazwe.UMnuz Fanele Sibisi we-ANC osebenza kuMasipala waseMsunduzi uthe bakhathazekile ngokuhudula izinyawo kukaNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube ekufakeni ngaphansi komlawuli uMasipala waseMunduzi.“Asazi ukuthi ungqongqoshe usalinde ukuthi kuphinde kuntshontshwe yiphi ithenda yonogada ngaphambi kokuthi athathe izinyathelo eMsunduzi,” kusho uSibisi.UNjilo obekhona emngcwabeni kaMchunu, uswele umgodi wokucasha amalungu e-ANC eMoses Mabhida embiza ngesichuse.UMnuz Thulani “Two Ways” Xulu ongumholi nongusomabhizinisi waseMgungundlovu uthe uNjilo akasiyo imeya ufana nesichuse, wathi iMeya yaseMsunduzi uMnuz Thobani Zuma oyiPhini lakhe.“Sizwa kuthiwa umuntu oqashayo eMsunduzi nguZuma kanti abesifazane bona ubaqasha ngokuthi bami kanjani emzimbeni,” kusho uXulu.Okhulumela uNkk Dube -Ncube, uMnuz Lennox Mabaso, uthe kukhona okwenziwayo ukuzama ukulungisa isimo eMsunduzi. Wathi kunophenyo olwenziwa wumnyango noMvikeli woMphakathi.Ethintwa uNjilo unqabile ukuphawula ngokushiwo ngaye wathi yena ubeziyele emngcwabeni eyoduduza umndeni kaMchunu.UZuma uthe akakhulumi nabantu bamaphepha,“Uma kunodaba oluthintwa i-ANC esifundeni kuye kuthintwe unobhala, uma luthinta umkhandlu kufonelwa imeya,” kusho uZuma.
title: Iqembu elisha elimataniswa noZuma

text: PHILI MJOLILUYAQHUBEKA  uhlelo lokugomela iCovid-19 kusetshenziswa umgomo wakwaJohnson&Johnson obumisiwe kuleli.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe ukugonywa kwabasebenzi bezempilo okwenziwa ngaphansi kohlelo locwaningo, iSisonke Protocol, luzoqhubeka ezikhungweni ezingu-95 zokugoma ezikuleli.Uthe isikhungo esigunyaza ukusetshenziswa kwemithi kuleli, iSouth African Health Products Authority (Sahpra)  senza isiphakamiso ePhalamende sokuthi ukugoma kuqhubeke kodwa kuqashwe.Uthe njengamanje imigomo ekhona, okuzogonywa ngayo ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo, ingu-500 000.Lo mgomo wamiswa kusagonywe abasebenzi abangaphansi kuka-300 000 kwabangu-1.2 million."Ukugoma esigabeni sokuqala kulindeleke ukuthi kuphele ngoMeyi 16. Sizimisele  ukugoma abasebenzi abasele ngobuningi babo, yize kuke kwaba khona ukuphazamiseka. Sinxusa abasebenzi bezempilo nabelaphi bendabuko abangakabhaliseli ukugoma ukuthi babhalise kwi-website yoMnyango wezeMpilo," kusho uDkt Mkhize.Ukugoma ngalo ngomo kwamiswa kuleli ngemuva kokuthi kutholakale abesifazane abayisithupha e-United States benesifo esingajwayekile, sokuba namahlule egazini okusolwa umgomo, okubizwa ngeVaccine Induced Thrombotic Thrombocytopenia (VITT). Manje sebeyisishiyagalombili abesifazane abajove ngawo base beba neVITT."Ngesikhathi kumiswa ukugoma ngalo mgomo kwakusanikezwa ososayensi ithuba lokuthi bacwaninge bese bekhipha isinqumo sokuthi lo mgomo ungasetshenziswa kanjani. Ucwaningo luveze ukuthi amathuba okuthi umuntu abe nalesi sifo ngoyedwa kwabayisigidi. Abesifazane okungenzeka bangenwe yilesi sifo ngabaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 kuya ku-48. Nakhona kuthiwa amathuba okuthi igazi libe namahlule mancane. Ososayensi emhlabeni benze isiphakamiso sokuthi kuqhutshekwe nokugoma ngalo mgomo,"  kusho  uDkt Mkhize.Uthe kuleli uphiko olwenza ucwaningo ngemithi, iSouth African Medical Research Council  (SAMRC), wuMnyango wezeMpilo neSahpra nezinye izikhungo zezempilo bazobe bewuqaphile umgomo ."Bonke ababhalisele ukugoma ngalo mgomo bazonikezwa ifomu eshoyo ukuthi yibuphi ubungozi balo mgomo. Bazoyisayina ngaphambi kokuthi bagome,"  kusho uMkhize.
title: Mancane amathuba okuba namahlule kwabagome ngeJ&J

text:
OWAYENGUMHOLI we-DA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane usehlabele ikhwelo kumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi ashintshe amaqhinga akhe ePhalamende kulandela ukubhimba kwamaqhinga amalungu e-ANC ngoLwesibili. UMaimane ubhalele uRamaphosa kuTwitter wamazisa ukuthi bangene namaqhinga okudlala ipolitiki embi ePhalamende ngoLwesibili okumdonsele amanzi ngomsele.  Kuphazamiseke ukuqhubeka kokuphendulwa kwenkulumo kamengameli ePhalamende ngesikhathi ilungu le-ANC ePhalamende, uMnuz Boy Mamabolo, efuna izimpendulo ngezinsolo zokuthi umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julium Malema, uhlukumeza inkosikazi yakhe. UMalema uthathe isikhathi ukuphendula lo mbuzo ngemuva kokuphazanyiswa amalungu e-ANC ephalamende abelokhu ewubuyise njalo umbuzo. Kuthe esephendula, uMalema uthe akakaze ambeke isandla umkakhe futhi akasoze. Akagcinanga lapho nokho njengoba edalule izinsolo zokuthi uRamaphosa wayehlukumeza owayeyinkosikazi yakhe uNomazizi. “Awuthi ngikuphendule. Odabeni lokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane, mina ngasho kwenye inkulumo ngathi ongakaze ahlukumeze unkosikazi eminyakeni engu-25 edlule akaphakamise isandla.Mina angikaze ngishaye umuntu wesifazane. Ngabuza lowo mbuzo ngoba ngathola ukuthi umengameli wayemshaya unkosikazi wakhe uNomazizi, sengathi angaphumula ngokuthula,” kusho uMalema.Ephawula ngezixakaxaka zasePhalamende izolo, uMaimane uthe kuyaphoxa okwenzekile futhi kukhombisa ubungane kubaholi bakuleli. NgoLwesithathu ekuseni ubhalele uRamaphosa emcebisa ukuthi akamkhiphe uMamabolo kumalungu asebhentshini lakhe ePhalamende. “Eita Cyril Ramaphosa, abasemabhentshini akho ePhalamende bakhethe amaqhinga abhedayo izolo. Kumele ubeke uMamabolo ngaphandle. Uyakulahlekisa futhi uphazamisa ukunakwa kwezinto ezibalulekile. Lolu hlobo lwepolitiki akuyona into yakho,” kusho uMaimane.%%%twitter https://twitter.com/CyrilRamaphosa?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@CyrilRamaphosayour parliamentary benches chose a Mabena strategy izolo.You need to put Boy Mamabolo on the bench. He is costing you and taking attention away from the substantive issues.Gutter politics is not your brand. 
#SONADEBATE2020— Mmusi Maimane (@MmusiMaimane)I am disappointed with what I am seeing today in parliament. This is not what the nation expects from its leaders. The behavior today was totally unacceptable. Instead of debate we are witnessing childish behavior, insults and profanity. pic.twitter.com/BLcqnfKsHd
title: UMaimane uxwayise uRamaphosa ukuthi ashintshe ‘iskimu’ ePhalamende

text: MHLELI: Ngithi ake ngizikhalele kade ngibekezela kodwa manje sengiyahluleka sekufike la ngidinwa khona abantu badelela isibongo sasekhaya (Mkhize) ezinkundleni zokuxhuma.Le nto yaqala ngokweyiswa kwendawo engeke ngikwazi ukubiza igama layo. Manje sebengenele esibongweni sakaMkhize. Yonke into engasile isikhonjwa kaMkhize, umuntu wenza into ebhedayo usengowakaMkhize ngisho noSathane imbala sekuthiwa owakaMkhize.Kukhona nalesi siphuzo esibhalwa izibongo. Uzwa esethi umuntu ngiphuze ebesibhalwe ukuthi Mkhize ngavele ngaphathwa yikhanda, udideke ukuthi ubusithengelani esibhalwa uMkhize kwakhona ekuqaleni uma enenkinga noMkhize.Lesi sibongo sikhulu kabi, siyahlonishwa umhlaba wonke futhi siyathandwa kakhulu. Kukhona ngisho namaNdiya, abantu abasuka kwamanye amazwe ase-Afrika ubezwa sebezibiza ngoMkhize ngoba kuyisibongo esithandekayo. Noma yikuphi lapho uhamba khona uma uke wathi ungowakaMkhize abantu bavele bakujabulele ngoba bayathandwa kakhulu abantu bakaMkhize. Yisibongo samaqhawe lesi sihlonipheni ngiyanincenga.Ngiphakamisa izandla zombili ngiyanincenga hlukanani nesibongo sakaMkhize akusona esokudlala. Ngithemba ukuthi kuzwakele nizongilalela.
title: [IMIBONO] Yekani ukugcwanekela esibongweni sakithi

text: INDLALA inomthelela ekutheni kube nemibhikisho ehlale ithe chithi saka ezweni lethu, ngokumbono kaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala usho kanje ngesikhathi kuvulwa ngokomthetho ikhishi lenhlangano engenzinzuzo ephakela abaswele ukudla iFood For Life, eNewlands East ngoLwesihlanu.Uthe inkululeko ebaluleke kakhulu ngeyokuthi abantu bakwazi ukuzodla bangathembeli ekutheni bazophiwa ngabanye ukudla. Uthe uhulumeni unezinhlelo eziningi ozenzayo zokusiza abampofu ukuthi baphume ebubheni bakwazi ukudla.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi kulesi sifundazwe uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, uthe leli khishi livulwe ngesikhathi lapho inqwaba yabantu iphelelwe yimisebenzi ngenxa yeCovid-19."Baningi abantu abazithole sebesesimeni sokuthi abazi ukuthi bazodlani. Leli khishi lizosisiza kakhulu ngokusehlisela umthwalo njengoba lizophakela abantu baKwaMashu nezinye izindawo eziseduze,"  kusho uNdunankulu.UMnuz Vivian Reddy usihlalo weSibaya Trust, uthe bahlale bezimisele ukuxhasa izinhlelo ezizoletha ushintsho kubantu. Wathi uhlelo lweFood For Life lubonakala sengathi luzoletha ushintsho kubantu abampofu, yingakho befake isandla ekutheni kwakhiwe ikhishi okuzophekelwa kulo.UMnuz Vidhor Mangaroo, obekhulumela umndeni wakwaMangaroo onikele ngomhlaba okwakhiwe kuwo leli khishi, uthe lo mhlaba wawuthengelwe ukuthi uzokwakha ikhaya lo mndeni kodwa kwabuye kwashintsha okuphethe ngokuthi kunikelwe ngawo kwiFood For life." Umndeni ukholwa ukuthi ikhishi lizokwenza umsebenzi ozoshintsha impilo yabantu okuyinto nabo abakholelwa kakhulu kuyo," kusho uMangaroo.
title: Indlala iwumthelela wemibhikisho ezweni

text: WILLEM PHUNGULAKUBUKEKA usaya kude umdonsiswano ngesikhundla sozongena esihlalweni seNgonyama yamaZulu, njengoba kuvela ukuthi bakhona abangeneme ngokuthi siye kwaNdlunkulu uMantfombi (uMaDlamini).Leli phephandaba lithole ukuthi kusekuningi ukungaboni ngasolinye ngalesi sikhundla yize incwadi yefa efundwe ngoLwesithathu phambi kwabaNtwana abangaphezu kuka-200, ikhombe ukuthi isihlalo sikaNdlunkulu uMantfombi, okumenze wasibamba kuze kube uqoka ozongena kuso emva kwezinyanga ezintathu. Umthombo waleli phephandaba ugagule indlu yaKwaKhethomthandayo njengehlela ukukuphonsela inselelo ukuyiswa kwesihlalo KwaKhangelamakengana okuyisigodlo sakwaNdlunkulu uMantfombi. Kuthiwa inkinga iqale ngalo uLwesine olwedlule emva kokutshalwa kweMbube, sekufundwa incwadi yefa ntambama. Umthombo waleli phephandaba owawukulo mhlangano, uthi kayizange ifundwe incwadi ngenxa yokuthi kunabaNtwana abavele bahhomuzela, babanga umsindo kwaze kwaphoqa ukuba uvalwe umhlangano. Uthe inhloso yalaba ababebanga umsindo yingoba babengafuni ukuthi ifundwe ngoba kwase  kuzwakele ukuthi iphethe igama likaNdlunkulu uMantfombi, okuthiwa uyiqaqa kwabaningi eNdlunkulu. Umthombo uthi emhlanganweni wangoMgqibelo bakhona abaNtwana abasukuma bathi basola ukuthi akusona isandla seSilo esikhotheme esasayina, basola ukuthi kwakokotelwa ukusayina kweMbube. Omunye umthombo osondelene nendlunkulu uthi abendlu yaKwaKhethomthandayo bakholelwa wukuthi isihlalo ngesabo. Kulokhu kuthiwa bazeseka ngokuthi yiyonandlu enkulu njengoba kunguNdlunkulu uSibongile Dlamini undlunkulu wokuqala, owasha umshado wesilungu. Leli phephandaba lihabule ukuthi uMntwana uNomkhosi, ozalwa nguNdlunkulu waKwaKhethomthandayo nguye obefuna ukuba yibamba, kuze kukhule indodana kamfowabo uMntwana uLethukuthula, owabulawa eGoli ngonyaka odlule. Abale ndlu bathi nguye uMntwana uLethukuthula obekumele athathe isihlalo ukuba ubesaphila ngakho-ke kumele siye endodaneni yakhe. Kuthiwa isimaqembu mathathu indlunkulu njengoba kukhona neqeqebana ebelithi isihlalo masithathwe nguMntwana uSimakade, okuthiwa uzalwa yiSilo entombini. UMntwana uSimakade kuthiwa nguye omdala kunabo bonke kwabeSilo. Leli qeqebana kuthiwa lizeseka ngokuthi naso iSilo esikhotheme sasithatha isihlalo yize sizalwa yintombi. Abeseka indodana kaNdlunkulu uMantfombi, uMntwana uMisuzulu bathi simfanele isikhundla ngoba unina ngowasebukhosini baseSwatini nokuthi nguye owalotsholwa yisizwe.Okhulumela iNdlunkulu uMntwana uMbonisi Zulu uthe njengoba besazilile nje abathandi ukukhuluma ngezindaba zaseNdlunkulu.
title: Umdonsiswano ngeSilo esisha

text: AGWETSHWE iminyaka eyisithupha ebhadla ejele amaphoyisa omgwaqo amabili atholwe enecala lokwamukela imali yokugwazisa. Amaphoyisa amabili uBongani Buthelezi (42) noNoncedo Dube (33) afuna ngenkani imali engu-R3 500 kumshayeli owayesolwa ngecala lokudlula izimoto ezombili ku-barrier line emgwaqeni ngoMeyi wango-2017.UMnyango wezokuThutha uthe umshayeli wayikhokha lemali ngoba wayethembe ukuthi uzokhishwa esitokisini. Umshayeli akanikezwanga ithikithi futhi akanqunyelwanga usuku azovela ngalo enkantolo. Umshayeli wanikezwa inombolo yeselula yelinye lamaphoyisa, okuyinombolo eyayihambisana ne-akhawunti lapho kwakumele akhokhe khona imali yokugwaza. Emuva kokukhokha imali, umshayeli wakhishwa esitokisini. UMnyango uthe uButhelezi noDube baboshwe emuva kokuphothulwa kophenyo. Lawa maphoyisa avele enkantolo yamacala athinta izimalo ngoLwesihlanu odlule lapho banikezwa izigwebo zeminyaka eyisithupha, ngombandela wokulengiswa konyaka owodwa. Okhulumela iRoad Traffic Management Corporation uMnuz Simon Zwane uthe izigwebo ezifana nalezi zizothumela umyalezo oqinile kwamanye amaphoyisa, ukuthi uhulumeni kanye nabantu basemphakathini sebekhathele amaphoyisa asebenzisa izikhundla zawo ngokungemthetho ukuze athole imali. UNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha nezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Bheki Ntuli uthe kuyacaca ukuthi amaphoyisa atholwa enecala lokuphula umthetho azojeziswa. “Ngikhuthaza bonke abashayeli ukuthi babike amacala afana nalawa ukuze sizolwisana nenkohlakalo. Ngifuna ukuxwayisa amaphoyisa ukuba ayeke lomkhuba wokuthatha imali yokugwazela kulabo abaphula imithetho yomgwaqo ngoba lokho kulimaza imizamo yethu yokulwisana nenkohlakalo kanye nokushona kwabantu emgwaqeni,” kuchaza uNtuli.
title: Agwetshwe iminyaka eyisithupha amaphoyisa omgwaqo kwelokugwazisa

text: OWAYEYISIKHULU sebhodi sakwaSAA, uNkk Dudu Myeni, kuthiwa wakhipha umyalelo wokuthi singasayinwa isivumelano sokusebenzisana phakathi kweSAA ne-Emirates.Lokhu kuthiwa wakwenza ngocingo, wabe esethumela nomyalezo ngeWhatsApp, kwabe sekufeyila ukusayinwa kwesivumelwano okwakuzokwenzeka eParis, eFrance.Lobu kube wubufakazi bowayeyisikhulu esiphezulu eSAA, uMnuz Nico Bezuidenhout, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseNorth Gauteng, ePitoli.UBezuidenhout ubefakaza esicelweni esifakwe i-Outa neSAA Pilots Association (SAAPA), sokuthi inkantolo inqume ukuthi uNkk Myeni akumfanele ukuphatha.Izinhlangano zifuna aphucwe namandla okuba aphinde abe ngumphathi ezinkampanini.Ngeledlule kuvele ukuthi ngoJanuwari izikhulu ze-Emirates zeza kwiSAA nesiphakamiso sokuba kusetshenziswane. Lobo budlelwane babuzoletha * -$100 (R1.4 billion), owawuzotholwa iSAA ngamabhanoyi ayehamba eGoli naseDubai.UBezuidenhout utshele inkantolo ukuthi uNkk Myeni kwaba isikhathi eside eziba indaba yokuba asiphasise isiphakamiso.Uthe wathumela ama-emails amaningi kuNkk Myeni kodwa akazange aphendulwe.UBezuidenhout uthe amanye amalungu ebhodi ayeseseka lesi siphakamiso.Ngo-Juni 14, 2015 wabe eseya eFrance ukuyosayina isivumelwano nabakwa-Emirates.NgoJuni 15, 2015 wabe esexoxa nabakwa-Emirates ukuthi akakayitholi imvume yokuba basayine.“Abaphathi be-Emirates babe sebengitshela ukuthi bazoxoxa nohulumeni ngisho noMengameli Jacob Zuma imbala.”Uthe ngakusasa wafonelwa nguNkk Myeni ngo-2 ekuseni ediniwe, emsola ngokuthi uphoxe izwe, nomengameli uqobo.Udaba luyaqhubeka enkantolo.
title: ‘UMyeni wayalela ukuthi singasayinwa isivumelwano’

text: NOKUBONGWA  PHENYANEULINDELEKE ukuthi ashintshe izinto emdlalweni iThe River, uSeputla Sebogodi ozoqala ukubonakala kulo mdlalo emasontweni ezayo.USeputla uzolingisa indawo kaMohumi.UMohumi, nguyise wangempela kaTumi (Larona Moagi), ozofika azoxoxa noLindiwe (Sindi Dlathu) ngengane yabo.Umthombo weSolezwe osondelene nalo mdlalo, uveze ukuthi izinto zizohamba ngendlela angayithandi uLindiwe uma kufika uMohumi.“Engingakusho nje ukuthi ababukeli balo mdlalo abazokubona kuwona yilokhu abahlale bekujabulela ngaso sonke isikhathi, njengoba uhamba phambili ngababukeli. Indaba kaTumi, Lindiwe noMohumi izodala izinxushunxushu ezinkulu njengoba izovusa izilonda ezindala ezenzeka ngesikhathi kutholakaka uTumi,” kuchaza umthombo.Uveze ukuthi uSeputla akuyena kuphela umlingisi omusha ozobonakala kwiThe River, kukhona nabanye ababili abazobonakala maduzane.“Le sizini izophela ngegiya eliphezulu kakhulu, lobu buso obuzayo buzojabulisa ababukeli balo mdlalo. Nakanjani nizobona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuzobe kukhulunywa ngawo,” kuphetha umthombo.ULucky Mangela weMzansi Magic, akaphikanga futhi akavumanga ukuthi kukhona abalingisi abasha abazoqala kulo mdlalo maduzane.Uthe bazokhipha isitatimende maduze esizochaza ngokuzokwenzeka kulo mdlalo.Kufika laba balingisi nje, kusanda kuvela izindaba zokuthi uLunga Shabalala olingisa indawo kaLindani, uyashiya.Kuvela ukuthi indawo kaLindani iqedwa ngoba ababukeli balo mdlalo bebengeneme ngayo.
title: Kubhekwe ukuthi ashubise izinto kwiThe River

text: AMALUNGU omphakathi ase-Hennies, eVryheid, athuka izanya kulandela ukuvela kwezinsolo zokuthi kunamabhubesi acanasayo kule ndawo.Ngeledlule owesilisa owayehamba emgwaqweni u-R34 ufonele abezimo eziphuthumayo ebika ukuthi ubona amabhubesi amabili eqa umgwaqo.Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi kuphunywe inqina kubhekwa lawa mabhubesi.Lokhu kuthiwa kuwuthusile umphakathi njengoba bengazi ukuthi akephi nendawo lawa mabhubesi.UMnuz Musa Mtambo okhulumela eZemvelo KwaZulu-Natal utshele Isolezwe ukuthi batshale ithimba labo kule ndawo emuva kwalezi zinsolo.“Okwamanje sisakuthatha njengezinsolo ukuthi kunamabhubesi kule ndawo ngoba thina asikawaboni. Okwenzekile emasontweni adlule sifoneliwe sabikelwa ukuthi kukhona ababona amabhubesi kule ndawo, siwabhekile sangawathola. NgoLwesine kwenzeke esifanayo kukhona othi ubona amabhubesi kuyo leya ndawo ku-R34. Siphinde sathumela ithimba lethu ukuba liyowabheka lawa mabhubesi. Okwamanje akukho esisakutholile ngawo, sisabheka,” kusho uMtambo.Uthe yize kukhona isiqiwi esiseduze sase-Hluhluwe Mfolozi Park kodwa akukho ababikelwe khona ngamabhubesi alahlekile kuso.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa osondelene nalolu daba uthe abantu balokhu befonela esiteshini samaphoyisa bethi basaba amabhubesi.“Inkinga enkulu ukuthi abantu bayasaba nokuphuma ezindlini zabo ngoba bezwe kuthiwa kukhona amabhubesi acanasayo. Abanye izingane zabo bazinqabele nokuthi ziye esikoleni ngenxa yokusaba,” kusho umthombo.UMtambo uthe umphakathi awehlise umoya ngoba udaba lwezinsolo ngamabhubesi akule ndawo bayalusebenza.
title: Bahlalele ovalweni ‘kucanasa’ amabhubesi

text: ILOKHU iqhubekile nokuqhuma inganono eMlaza emuva kokubulawa kwendoda ebiphuza nabangani bayo ngaphandle kwasethaveni eSmindlo kwaK.Kuthiwa uMnuz Mzokhona “Kayikayi” Ndimande ( 33), odutshulwe kaningi emzimbeni ngoMgqibelo, uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela wafika washonela khona.Ukudutshulwa kwakhe kwenzeke emuva kokudutshulwa kukasomatekisi nomngani wakhe bafa.UNdimande kuthiwa udutshulwe ngomunye wabangani bakhe ngaphandle kwendawo yokucima ukoma. Kuthiwa kasishiyagalombili.UNdimande uhlaselwe esenesikhathi esingangonyaka anyamalala eMlaza.Kunezinsolo zokuthi kukhona ababekade bemfuna ngodaba oluthinta abanye abangani bakhe ababulawa khona eMlaza nodaba oluthinta amabhizinisi akhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuphenywa icala lokubulala.“Amaphoyisa aseBhekithemba aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela isehlo sangoMgqibelo ngo-4.30 okudutshulwe kuso indoda ngaphandle kwethaveni eMlaza.“Udutshulwe amanxeba amaningi emzimbeni, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela wafika washonela khona.“Imbangela yokubulawa kwakhe ayaziwa. Uphenyo lusaqhubeka. Akekho osaboshiwe,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Udutshulwe wafa obephuza nabangani

text: ZISIKHALELE kwaphinde kwashiswa nomuzi waso isangoma esineminyaka engu-37 esisolwa ngokudlwengula siphindelela ithwasa eBambanani, KwaZibusele, ngaseNew Hanover.Umsolwa uboshwe ngoLwesihlanu kulandela uphenyo lwamaphoyisa ngokudlwengulwa kowesilisa oneminyaka engu-27.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe umgilwa ubedlwengulwa wugobela wakhe ongumuntu wesilisa kusukela ngoNovemba 2019 kuze kube yimanje.Kunezinsolo eziqinile zokuthi kukhona namanye amathwasa esilisa abewadlwengula ngoba ekholwa wukuthi uqinisa umuthi wakhe umsolwa.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo osondelene nalolu daba ukuthi umgilwa wabaleka lapho abethwasiswa khona okuyilapho kuqhumbuke khona ithumba ngokwenzeka.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kulindeleke ukuba umsolwa avele enkantolo yaseNew Hanover namhlanje.“Amaphoyisa aseMgungundlovu aphenya icala lokudlwengulwa kowesilisa oneminyaka engu-27. Ngokophenyo umgilwa ubedlwengulwa ephindelelwa kusukela ngoNovemba 2019. Kuboshwe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-37 ngoLwesihlanu. Uzovela kusasa (namhlanje) enkantolo yaseNew Hanover ezobhekana necala,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Umthombo weSolezwe uveze ukuthi ngeSonto kuse umuzi wenyanga ushisiwe.“Abantu basendaweni badinwe kakhulu ngalokhu okuvele ukuthi bekwenzeka kulo muzi wenyanga. Umuzi akwaziwa ukuthi ushiswe ubani kodwa ngeSonto kuse usha. Bekungekho muntu ngoba unkosikazi wenyanga nezingane babalekile emuva kokuboshwa kwayo,” kusho umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa.Ikhansela uMnuz Bright Mkhize, eliphinde libe nguSihlalo we-IFP ngaphansi koMshwathi, lithe bashaqekile futhi badumele ngokwenzeke kule ndawo.“Engingakusho wukuthi kusishaqisile sonke okwenzekile ngoba izinyanga sizazi zingabantu abasiza abantu ngokwelapha. Okwenzekile kuzokwenza abantu bangabe besazithemba uma ziphinde zilale nabafana. Okubuhlungu wukuthi bonke abantu abathintekayo abakhona endaweni. Sizocela nokho ukuba kudedelwe amaphoyisa enze umsebenzi wawo,” kusho uMkhize.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe baningi abanye abafana bakule ndawo okuvele ukuthi bebeyizisulu zale nyanga kodwa ngokwamaphoyisa linye icala lokudlwengula eliphenywayo.
title: Kushiswe umuzi wesangoma 'esidlwengule' indoda
