text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneLILOKHU liqhubekile nokuqoqa izindondo iqembu lomculo wokholo iJoyous Celebration, osekuneminyaka lakhetha ukuma ukungenela izindondo zakuleli.Leli qembu izolo lihlonishwe ngendondo yeBest Selling DVD ngeDVD yalo ethi Volume 23 Live at CTICC kumaSouth African Music Awards (SAMA).UMlindo The Vocalist naye uhlabane ngendondo emcimbini wayizolo njengoba ethole indondo yeBest Selling Artist nge-albhamu yakhe ethi Emakhaya.UDJ Tira uthole indondo yeBest Kwaito Album nge-albhamu yakhe ethi Ikhenani.Umcimbi wayizolo uvulwe ngabadansi abahlukene akade begcwele emgwaqweni kugqanyiswa imfashini ehlukene nalapho bekucula khona umrepha uYanga Chief, othole indondo yeBest Hip Hop Album.Iqembu iBlaq Diamond nalo linandisile emcimbini wayizolo ngengoma yalo ethi Love Letter.Emcimbini wayizolo kuqalwe kwahlonishwa amaqhawe akuleli, okubalwa uDan Tshanda ohlonishwe ngeLifetime Achievement Award.Unkosikazi wakhe uSylvia namadodana abo amathathu, bamukele le ndondo bathi ngeyabalandeli bomculo kaDan, emhlabeni wonke.Nabethuli bohlelo abayidlayo indwangu abaphoxanga nayizolo, uDineo Langa ubegqoke izimpahla zakwa-Ara Emporium, uDonovan yena ubegqoke isudi yakwa-Imprint.Kosaziwayo abethule izindondo kubalwa uDJ Sabby, ongumsakazi kuYFM, Stephanie B noKid Fonque.UNhlanhla Sibisi oyisikhulu esiphezulu senkampani ehlela lo mcimbi iRisa, uveze ukuthi uxhaso abalukhonjiswe ngabantu bakuleli njengoba kuqhubeka lo mcimbi lubajabulise kakhulu.Ubongele bonke abawinile kulo mcimbi.Abanye abahlomule ngezindondo izolo yilaba:Beste Pop Album:#Partytjiedier by Kurt DarrenBest Pop Album:Ghost by Mathew Mole
title: Iyazenzela iJoyous ngezindondo

text:
U LINDANI Nkosi ongomunye wabalingisi abajwayele ukulingisa indawo yabantu abanenhliziyo embi, uthi ukudlala lezi zindawo aqondana nazo izikhathi eziningi akuchazi ukuthi uyilento ahlezi ebonakala eyilingisa emidlalweni aseke wabonakala kuyona kanjalo naleyo asadlala kuyona. Cishe kuyo yonke imidlalo aseke wabonakala kuyona lo mlingisi udlala indawo yokungabi nanembeza.Phakathi kwemidlalo namafilimu aseke wabonakala kuwo kubalwa ifilimu eyayibophele izihlabani i
Drum ayelingisa kuyo indawo yalowo owaba nguMengameli wokuqala omnyama kuleli uDkt Nelson Mandela, i
Generations ayedlala kuyo indawo kaThulani ngo-2004. Emuva kwalokho wabonakala kwi-
The Lab, Rhythm City, kanjalo nasemdlalweni owakhonjiswa emazweni wonke ase-Afrika, i
The No 1 ladies’ Detective Agency ngo-2008 kwathi ngo-2009 walingisa kwi-
Philanthropist. Lo mlingisi olingisa nasemidlalweni yeshashalazi useke wathola indondo kumaNaledi Awards, emkhakheni we-Best Performance in a Musical (Male ) ngendawo ayeyidlala kwi-
Aint Misbehavin’. Kweminye imidlalo yeshashalazi eseke wabonakala kuyo kubalwa i
Marabi, West Side Story, 
Summer Holiday, Five Guys Named Moe ne-
The Signs. 
UMBALI KHANYILE uxoxe kanje nalo mlingisi :Awuzichaze ukuthi ungumuntu onjani.Ngingumuntu omnene, onozwelo nonenhliziyo enhle. Kwesinye isikhathi ngibuye ngibe yile nhlobo yomuntu obuye azicabangele yedwa.Abantu abaningi bakwazi kakhulu kwi-
  90 Plain Street, Soul City nakwi
  Generations, njengoba usulingisa efilimini engenye yalawo akhonjiswa kwi-Durban Film Festival i
  Zama Zama, kungabe ukhona umehluko owubonile uma uqhathanisa nomsebenzi osuke wawenza kule midlalo osubonakale kuyo ngaphambilini?Ngikuthokozele kakhulu ukuqopha iziqephu zale filimu eveza isithombe sempilo ephilwa ngabantu ezweni esiphila kulo. Kanjalo nokudlala indawo kaMalcom kuyona njengoba engumuntu onesineke futhi anakekele umfowabo omncane.Njengoba le filimu ikhombisa ubugebengu bokuhweba ngokungemthetho obenzekayo ezimayini kungabe kukhona obukungakwazi okufundile ngokudlala kuyona?Buningi kakhulu ubugebengu obenzeka ezimayini, ngakho-ke ngicacise ukuthi le filimu ayibuvezi bonke ubuchule obahlukene bokusebenzisa ubugebengu kulo mkhakha wezimayini. Kungabe ngiqamba amanga uma ngingathi kukhona okusha engikufundile.Kube njani ukulingisa noPresley Chweneyagae odlala indawo kaJoseph nobengumfowenu omncane kulo mdlalo?Ayikho into ethokozisa njengokusebenza nabantu abawaziyo umsebenzi wabo kusukela kubalingisi, abadidiyeli, abaqophi nabo bonke abantu osebenzisana nabo efilimini esuke iqoshwa. Lokho kwenza ukuthi uyibone into eyenzekayo.Kungabe bakhona abalingisi bakuleli ongathi ubethulela isigqoko kulo mkhakha nofisa ukuthi uhlezi usebenza nabo nakweminye imidlalo. Uma bekhona kungabe ngobani?Ngibahlonipha bonke ngokulingana abalingisi bakuleli, akekho engingathi ngimthanda ukwedlula abanye.Yiziphi izinto esingazazi ngawe ongathanda ukusazisa zona?Ngiyakuthanda ukupheka kanjalo nokubukela umdlalo wesibhakela uma ngisekhaya.Uma unganikwa ithuba lokuzikhethela umdidiyeli oyedwa wamafilimi ongathanda ukusebenzisana naye ekuqoshweni kwefilimu, ungakhetha bani?Okwamanje ngisagxile ekulingiseni angikakazimiseli ngokuba ngemuva kwamakhamera.Iyiphi ifilimu oyithandayo nongasoze wayikhohlwa?Ngesizathu sokuthi ngingumuntu othanda lonke uhlobo lwamafilimu ngingabeka kucace nje ukuthi ngithanda amafilimu okulingisa kuwo umlingisi wase-USA uDenzel Washington noHarrison Ford.
title: ‘Ngiyawathanda amafilimu anoDenzel’

text: UKHATHAZEKILE umndeni wentombazanyana eneminyaka engu-10 KwaManz’amnyama, eMthunzini, esekuyophela amasonto amabili idukile kade iye ephathini yakwamakhelwane.USinikile Mncwango, ofunda uGrade 5 ePhembokuhle Primary, uduke ngoJuni 2 nonyaka kade egcinwe ekwamakhelwane kunephathi yezingane.Ugogo wakhe uNkk Sabathile Mncwango izolo utshele Isolezwe ukuthi abasazi kumele babheke kuphi njengoba sebehambe yonke indawo bengamtholi umzukulu wakhe.“NgeSabatha (ngoMgqibelo), siphuma enkonzweni, umakhelwane wesihlobo sami khona lapha endaweni, wasimema ukuba size ephathini yezingane ayeyenzile. Ngenxa yokuthi kwakunesihlobo esasizovakasha ekhaya, ngashiya uSinikele kule phathi ngaya ekhaya. Ngabona ilanga lishona engabuyi ngazitshela ukuthi kukhona okumbambile noma usadlala. Ngashaya ucingo kwathiwa ulale khona kodwa ngeSonto ekuseni ngo-7 uvuke wahamba eza ekhaya. Ngabatshela ukuthi akazange afike ekhaya. Siqale lapho ukumfuna, sesimfune yonke indawo asimtholi. Sikhathazekile kakhulu ngoba asazi ukuthi ingane ikuphi nezinkalo, asazi noma kukhona okwenzeka kuyona,” kusho uNkk Mncwango.Uthe bashayele ucingo abangani bakhe basesikoleni, bahamba bemfuna ezindaweni ezahlukene eMthunzini kodwa akatholakali.“Asazi ngempela ukuthi kwenzakalani ngoba akekho ombonile. Uvele wanyamalala nje. Izinsuku ziyaqhubeka njengoba sekuzophela isonto lesibili engaziwa. Akusalaleki nasebusuku ngenxa yalesi simo,” kusho uNkk Mncwango.Uthe njengoba bevule icala emaphoyiseni aseMthunzini bayathemba ukuthi yiwona asezobalekelela kulolu daba oselubakhathazile.Abakhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal bathe ulwazi ngalolu daba luzotholakala namhlanje uma sekutholakale abaseshi bodaba.Iphoyisa elingavumelekile ukukhuluma nabezindaba lithe baphansi phezulu bathungatha le ngane.
title: Ingane (10) inyamalale iye ephathini

text: WAYEYA ocansini ngisho emathuneni ne-blesser lakhe owesifazane othi useshiye le mpilo, wabhala incwadi ngayo yonke imikhuba ayeyigila ngesikhathi esandiza nezimpunyela ezidlalisa imali.UNksz Jackie Phamotse (30) odabuka eWestonaria eGauteng, ukhiphe incwadi esihloko sithi Bare lapho egeqa khona amagula ngempilo yakhe nama-blesser.Uxoxe naleli phephandaba ethi ngendlela lo mlisa ayethandana naye ayemlawula ngayo, babehamba bezitika ngocansi yonke indawo esewuvuma zonke, enganqabi lutho.‘’Uma usothandweni nalaba bantu bafuna wenze intando yabo, ukhohlwe yimpilo yakho ukhothamele bona.Wayeke aqashe indawo yokuphuzela ivalwe thaqa, abize abangani bakhe bazosibuka siya ocansini.Sasilala ngisho emathuneni nakuzo zonke izindawo ongazicabanga,’’ kusho uNksz Phamotse.Le ncwadi yakhe isanda kuzuza indondo yencwadi ehamba phambili ngokudayisa.Uthe wathandana nalesi sigwili esidala ngeminyaka engu-19 kunaye.Eminyakeni emine ngesikhathi behlangana endaweni yobumnandi ayetohoza kuyo, kwaba wukuqala kothando.AKASAFUNI nokuwabona ama-blesser uNksz Jackie Phamotse okhiphe incwadi exoxa ngale mpilo Isithombe: MOTSHWARI MOFOKENG“Mina ngake ngathengelwa iMercedez Benz SLK kaR700 000 newashi likaR100 000 ngosuku lwami lokuzalwa kuthiwa yizipho nje, akonakele lutho.Ukuthenga lezi zinto kulaba bantu kufana nokuthenga isinkwa.Yinto engelutho.’’Uthe akukho ayekweswele njengoba lesi siqumama sasimenzela konke ayekufuna. Uthe le mpunyela yayinganqeni ukuqasha ibhanoyi elibiza uR700 000 uhambo ngalunye kutetemukwe ngalo nabangani nezinye iziqumama.Elanda indaba yakhe ende, uthe unqume ukuyiyeka le mpilo. Uxwayise intsha ngayo ngoba uyabona ukuthi baningi abangena eweni.Useqale nokukhuluma ezindaweni ezahlukene lapho eba ngumethuli wezinkulumo ezivuselela unembeza.Uthe kunenqwaba yosopolitiki abasezikhundleni eziqavile kuhulumeni abaphila le mpilo yokuba ngama-blesser.“Kumanje mina anginayo indoda.Angifuni lutho ngizishayelwa umoya nje anginayo ngisho ingane ngenxa yokuthi ngake ngadlwengulwa yiqulu labantu ngisemncane.Kwaba khona ukulimala esibelethweni kwathiwa ngeke ngisabathola abantwana.’’Uthe kumanje unamasheya enkampanini kasaziwayo uSbu Leope yesiphuzo esibuyisa amandla iMo Faya.Uveze nokuthi uneziqu emkhakheni iMakerting and Sales.Uthe abantu abafuna ukuzwa konke ngohambo lwakhe bangayithola incwadi esitolo i-Exclusive Books.
title: Ugeqa amagula owayejola ne-blesser

text: INKANTOLO yabasebenzi eGoli inqume ukuthi kwakungekho semthethweni ukuxoshwa kwezikhulu ezintathu zePassenger Rail Agency of South Africa (Prasa).Izolo inkantolo inqume ukuthi kwakungafanele zinqanyulwe izinkontileka zoNkk Onica Ngoye obeyisikhulu sokuhambisana nezokuphepha nomthetho, Mnuz Nathi Khena obeyisikhulu esiphezulu esibambile noMnuz Tiro Holele owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu e-Autopax.UKhena noNkk Ngoye baxoshwa ngoJanuwari kanti uHolele uxoshwe ngenyanga edluleKubuye kwayalelwa iPrasa ukuthi ikhokhele izindleko zenkantolo ibuyisele laba abathathu ezikhundleni zabo.Kuthiwe kufanele ibakhokhele umholo wabo nemihlomulo yabo kusukela ngelanga abaxoshwa ngalo.Lezi zikhulu zaxoshwa emuva kophenyo olwalumayelana nokungalandelwa kwemithetho yokuphatha nokubhubhudlwa kwemali ePrasa.Emuva kokuxoshwa kwazo lezi zikhulu, zatshela iPrasa ukuthi azizange zisayine inkontileka yeminyaka emihlanu futhi aziboni ukuthi kunobulungiswa ekuxoshweni kwazo.Zithi azizange ziyithole impendulo ePrasa njengoba zigcine ngokudlulisela lolu daba enkantolo yabasebenzi.USihlalo webhodi lePrasa, uMnuz Leonard Ramatlakane, uthe basibonile isinqumo senkantolo yabasebenzi futhi bazosiphikisa.“Lesi sinqumo sizosiphikisa, kubukeka sengathi sithathwe ngaphandle kokuthi kulandelwe umthetho. Ithimba lePrasa lizofaka amaphepha enkantolo kusasa (namhlanje),” kusho uRamatlakane esitatimendini.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, usihlalo wekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwezezimali zikahulumeni, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, udonse ngendlebe ibhodi lakwaPrasa ukuthi lizihlele kahle ukuze le nkampani iyeke ukumosha uR1.3 billion.UHlengwa uthe kuyaphoxa ukuthi ubuholi bebhodi lePrasa abazi ukuthi zingaki izikhala zomsebenzi ezivulekile kule nkampani nokuthi yiziphi izinyathelo esezithathiwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imali kayibhubhudlwa.“UMcwaningi maBhuku Jikelele waveza ukuthi ibhubhudliwe imali ePrasa. Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi nenzeni njengebhodi ukuletha uzinzo kule nkampani, zingaki izikhala zomsebenzi ezikhona nokuthi zizovalwa nini? Sonke sifuna ukubona iPrasa isebenza kahle ngoba abantu bakithi nomnotho wezwe uncike kule nkampani. Angithandi ukuthi nifike lapha ningenazo izimpendulo, ngidinga ukunibona ukuthi nihlelekile,” kusho uHlengwa ngesikhathi leli bhodi kade livele kwiScopa ngoMsombuluko.UMnuz Willie Mathebula owasuka eMnyangweni wezeziMali ukuze alekelele iPrasa emuva kokuthi uMcwaningi maBhuku Jikelele ebone ukuthi iyabhubhudlwa imali, uthe kunezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda ezizoqala.Ezinye izinhlelo okubalwa olukaR5.4 billion lokuvuselela umzila wesitimela kukhishwe amathenda, kanti ezinye kumiswe abaphasasisa ukusebenza kwemali ngaphandle kokusebenza komthetho.Lapha kubalwa nolokulungisa isiteshi sesitimela eSiphingo oludle uR275, 033 880.URamatlakane uthe kuzoqashwa onogada abangaphezu kuka-3 000 maduze.
title: Inkantolo ibuyisele emsebenzini izikhulu ezaxoshwa kwaPrasa

text: Inqwaba yotshwala obudayiselwa imiphakathi eyakhele iNingizimu yeTheku ikhishiwe emashalofini esitolo. Iningi labo liphelelwe yisikhathi ngoJuni.Kushaqwe amakesi awu-103 eBrutal Fruit, angu-85 eSmirnoff Spin, angu-58 eStrongbow, angu-26 eBuidweiser nobunye. Intengo yotshwala obushaqiwe ingaphezu kukaR100 000.Umvusi wenyamazane kube yikhasimende elishayele ucingo uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha nokoNgiwa kweMvelo eKZN, uNksz Nomusa Dube-Ncube, othumele amaphoyisa nabasebenzi bomnyango wakhe ukuyohlola isimo.Bazithele kumakhasimende abethenga engazi ukuthi utshwala abuphethe sebuphelelwe yisikhathi. Abasebenzi bomnyango namaphoyisa bese besiza amakhasimende ebuyisela emuva utshwala abese ebuthengile.UNksz Nobuhle Maqobo ubethenge utshwala bukaR550 obebuzophuzwa ngempelasonto kugujwa usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa.“Sithole usizo kumsebenzi womnyango sesiphuma emnyango ukuthi iBrutal Fruit esiyiphethe iphelelwe yisikhathi. Besingazi ngoba siyaqala nokungena kulesi sitolo. Asazi ukuthi utshwala bebuzosiphatha kanjani sesibuphuzile,” kusho uNksz Maqobo.UMnuz Vuyo Mpinga ongumthengi uthe: “Ngithukuthele ngoba bengizomosha impilo yabantu ebesizophuza nabo kube sengathi kukhona into engibafakele yona otshwaleni kanti sebuphelelwe yisikhathi. Sithenge sanganaka,” kusho uMpinga.Umnikazi wesitolo uMnuz Ezekiel Ryan Andrew wenqabile ukuphawula kwabezindaba ngalolu daba. Ubengenasinqe, ehla enyuka esitolo sakhe ebona amaphoyisa nabasebenzi bomnyango nabakwaKZN Liquor Authority elokhu ekhala ngomvalelandlini ukuthi umhlinzele ezibini.UNkk Dube-Ncube uqinisekisile ukuthi uthole izikhalo kumalungu omphakathi noLwesibili ebusuku ekhala ngokuthi athenge utshwala osebuphelelwe yisikhathi.“Sizoqhubeka nomkhankaso wokuvikela abantu besifundazwe ukuthi bangaphuzi utshwala osebuphelelwe yisikhathi. Utshwala osebuphelelwe yisikhathi budala izifo.“Imithetho ekhona ngaphansi kweLiquor Licencing Act mayelana nokudayiswa kotshwala kumele ilandelwe njengoba injalo,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.
title: Kuhlwe emini  kwabesitolo sotshwala

text: UGONYULUKE ngembangela yokulaxaza iBafana Bafana obengumdlali oqavile waseMzansi, uSteven “Schillo” Pienaar, omemezele ukuthi usephanyeka amakhokho emgibeni.UPienaar ubalwa nabadlali abaphakamise iNingizimu Afrika ebholeni lomhlaba okukhona kubona uLucas Radebe noBenni McCarthy. Umemezele ohlelweni lwethelevishini, iSport At 10 ngoLwesithathu ukuthi useyaliyeka ibhola emuva kweminyaka engu-25 elidlala.Lo mdlali udlale emaqenjini ehlukene phesheya kwezilwandle okukhona kuwona i-Ajax Amsterdam yaseHolland, adlale kuyona noZlatan Ibrahimovic waseSweden oseyibamba kwiManchester United. Emuva kwalokho udlale kwiBorrusia Dortmund yaseGermany, Everton yase-England, Tottenham Hotspur neSanderland. UPienaar ubuyele eMzansi ekuqaleni kwesizini, wasayina kwiBidvest Wits. Uhlukane naleli qembu ngoJanuwari.UPienaar, owake waba ngukaputeni weBafana ayidlalele amahlandla angu-61, ngomunye wabadlali abachizele iBafana ngezikhathi ezinzima. Walaxaza iqembu lesizwe ngo-2012.Ubehlengezela izinyembezi ngesikhathi evalelisa.“Kuningi obekungahambi kahle obekwenzeka eqenjini lesizwe okwagcina kuholele ekutheni ngishiye,” kusho uPienaar.“Ngaphambi kokuxoshwa kukaPitso (Mosimane) ngangiseholidini kwadingeka ngiphuthume ekhempini. "Ngangifuna ukwenza konke ukuze ngilungele ukuba semdlalweni. "Sisekhempini silungiselela umdlalo wempelasonto, ngabikela udokotela ukuthi iqolo lami linginika inkinga, ngamcela ukuthi athole ozonginyanga ngoba sasibaningi singu-22 noma 23. "Nangempela savumelana, wamthola, saya ejimini. Unogada weza kimina esengibhokela ethi bekufanele ngikhulume naye kuqala, kungani ngizenzela.“Ngazama ukuchaza ukuthi udokotela uvumelene nesicelo sami kodwa kwaba nhlanga zimuka nomoya. "Ngaya kumqeqeshi ngamtshela ukuthi ngizame konke ukuthi ngilungele umdlalo nganikela konke kuleli zwe. "Okunye sasidlala eLiverpool, iBafana izodlala owobungani neBrazil ngilimele. Ngabizwa ukuthi ngizojoyina iqembu. Ngathi uma bengidinga ngempela abathumele udokotela azongihlola.“Kwafika lapho ngingasakwazi ukuqinisela khona, ngacela abangimele babhale incwadi bamemezele. Ngiyazi ukuthi abantu babona sengathi ngifulathela izwe sekusondele i-Afrika Cup of Nations kodwa mina ngabona kuyisinqumo esihle.”UPienaar ubekhona ezikwatini zeBafana ezidlale kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-2002 nango-2010.Uthe sekunesikhathi eninga ngesinqumo sokuthatha umhlalaphansi ebholeni, wathi uzobuye amemezele asezokwenza empilweni yakhe.“Ngibuye phesheya ngizitshela ukuthi ngizodlala isizini noma amabili. Bekuyisifiso sami ukuzoqedela ekhaya ukudlala ibhola. "Kodwa izinto azihambanga ngendlela ebengicabanga ngayo. Nginezinyanga ezimbili ngicabanga ngalesi sinqumo. "Kade sekunzima njengoba ngina-35 ukuvuka ekuseni zonke izinsuku ngiye ejimini. Manje senginesikhathi sonke sokuhlala nomama nezingane zami,” kusho uPienaar.KAFUSHANE NGO-PIENAARIgama: Steven Jerome Pienaar[1]Usuku lokuzalwa: Mashi 27, 1982 (35 weminyaka)Indawo azalelwe kuyona: EGoliIndawo abeyidlala: EsiswiniAmaqembu awadlalele: Ajax Cape Town; Ajax Amsterdam; Borussia Dortmund; Everton; Tottenham Hotspur; Sunderland; Bidvest WitsImidlalo namagoli kweBafana Bafana: 61 (3)
title: UPienaar uchaza ngokulaxaza iBafana

text: I-SACP ikushayele ihlombe ukunganikwa ushwele kukaJanusz Walus, owabulala uMnuz Chris Hani owayengunobhala jikelele wamaKhomanisi.Esitatimendeni izolo iSACP, income isinqumo soMnyango wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo oholwa nguMnuz Ronald Lamola, sokungamdedeli umbulali kaHani.UHani wabulawa ngo-Ephreli 10, 1993.Umnyango kaLamola umemezele ukuthi isicelo sikaWalus sikashwele abasamukeli.“Ungqongqoshe wenze okufanele ngokuba angamnikezi umbulali ushwele. UWalus wayegwetshwe intambo, waya nakwiTruth and Reconciliation Commission efuna ukuxolelwa, okungenzekanga. Kulo nyaka kuphela iminyaka engu-27 uWalus abulala uHani kodwa namanje alikho iqiniso eliphelele ngokwenzeka,” kusho isitatimende seSACP.UHani wayeyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC ngesikhathi ebulawa kanti wayeke wahola amasosha oMkhonto weSizwe ngaphambilini.Isibhamu esasetshenziswa uWalus kuthiwa sathathwa, akukaze kuvele ukuthi sathathwa ubani futhi wasiyisa kuphi?Ngokusho kwe-SACP, konke lokhu okungakaze kuchazwe kahle uWalus, ikhona kanye okumele anganikezwa ushwele ngenxa yakho.UWalus ugcinwe ejele iKgosi Mampuru II Centre ePitoli.
title: Bathokozele isinqumo ngowabulala uChris Hani

text: USATHUKILE umfundi (21) waseMlazA kwa-G osinde kukubi kusha indlu abelele kuyo emlilweni omshiye ephuma nabekugqokile.UNdumiso Jeza owenza uGrade 12 uthe namanje akakholwa ukuthi usinde kanjani ngesikhathi kusha umlilo elele emjondolo wakhe ahlala kuwo ongaphandle kwakubo ezintatha zangoLwesihlanu.Uthe uvuswe yintuthu ebigcwele indlu, wazama ukuphuma ngoba ubesawubona umnyango.Uthe kuthe uma ezama ukubuyela phakathi eyolanda izimpahla zakhe wanyathela upulasitiki washa onyaweni nasengalweni futhi wahluleka ukukhipha izimpahla zakhe nezikamfowabo abahlala naye kuleya ndlu.“Angazi ukuthi yini eqale umlilo ngoba ngilale ngicishe ugesi futhi bengingasebenzisi ikhandlela. Okungiphatha kabi ukuthi njengoba kushile ngishelwe yiyo yonke into. Izimpahla zami zesikole, izincwadi nazo zonke izinto. Ngiphume nezinto ebengizigqoke ngesikhathi ngilele nje kuphela,” kuchaza uNdumiso.Unina omncane kaNdumiso, uNksz Ntombifuthi Jeza (34) osenakekele uNdumiso kusukela ashonelwa ngunina, uthe lesi sigameko sibathwalise kanzima njengoba naye engasebenzi.Uthe ufisa engathi bangathola usizo ikakhulu njengoba bobabili labo abashelwe befunda. UNksz Jeza uthe ngaphandle kwezimpahla zikaNdumiso kushe nezimpahla zikamfowabo naye owenza umatric nezodadewabo omunye owenza uGrade 10 nowenza uGrade-11.“Yena nomfowabo bahlala ndawonye kuleya ndlu. Ngenhlanhla lona omunye akalimalanga ngoba ubengekho endlini ngesikhathi kusha kodwa naye ushelwe yiyo yonke into abenayo.” kusho uNksz Jeza.Uthe sebelinde ukuthola noma yiluphi usizo ikakhulu usizo olungaba ngolwezimpahla zesikole nezimpahla zokugqoka.
title: Usale nakumbethe kusha umjondolo

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANES EKUPHINDE kwaqubuka olunye uhlangothi ebandleni lamaNazaretha oluhlubuke ekuPhakameni oluzoholwa umfowabo wenkosi uVukile Shembe ethempelini laseBronkhortspruit, eMpumalanga, esizweni sakwaMahlangu.Lolu hlangothi luholwa uMnuz Mthakiwamakha Shembe (34) oqhamuke nezinguquko ezehlukile njengoba ethi angeke zisagqokwa izigqebhezana ezinezithombe zabaholi bakwaShembe ngoba lokhu kubeka isithombe sokuthi kukhonzwa umuntu ekubeni bekhonza uNkulunkulu njengabo bonke abantu .UShembe benenkosi uVukile bazalwa inkosi uLonda Shembe owabulawa eminyakeni edlule.Uthe umongo waleli bandla ngesikhathi lisungulwa uMphrofethi Isaiah Shembe kwakungukukhonza uNkulunkulu okunguye owayemthumile hhayi ukukhonza yena njengomuntu.“Ngifisa ukucacisa ukuthi angilwi namuntu noma nohlangothi oluthile lwebandla lamaNazaretha kodwa indlela esizokwenza ngayo izinto ebandleni lethu izohluka kakhulu. Okunye kuzoba ukuthi amafodo afakwa phezu kweminazaretha angeke agqokwe.“Lokhu sikwenza ngenhloso yokudala ubumbano ebandleni ngoba abantu bagcina sebedumisa igama likaShembe esikhundleni sikaNkulunkulu okunguye owayethume uMqaliwendlela. Le nto ibingenzeki ngoba umqali waleli bandla wayengakhonzwa kodwa kwakudunyiswa uNkulunkulu owasidala sonke,” kusho uShembe.Uthe ufuna leli bandla libumbane njengabenkolo yobuSulumane abangabheki uma befika endaweni ukuthi inkonzo iholwa yiluphi uhlangothi kodwa bangena ethempelini bakhuleke baqede bahambe. Uthe bazokhonza ngeMigqibelo balandele lonke uhlelo lwebandla futhi akekho umuntu ozokhonzwa ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu.Uthe uxoxile nenkosi yasekuPhakameni ngalesi sinqumo kodwa ayandanga ngamagama kunalokho imbongele.Unobhala jikelele wasekuPhakameni uMnuz Thetha Ngiba uthe kuncane kakhulu abangakusho ngalesi sinqumo ngoba babona kuyilungelo lakhe uShembe futhi nesinqumo uzithathele yena.“Okokuqala akalona ilungu lasekuPhakameni ngakho unegunya lokwenza noma yini ayifisayo futhi nemigomo ayibekile ithinta ibandla lakhe hhayi abasekuPhakameni, ngakho asizukusho lutho ngalokho.Ukube usebandleni lethu besingakhuluma ngezinto azenzayo kodwa kulokhu akukho esingakubeka,” kusho uNgiba.UShembe uthe okwamanje amakholwa akakabi nawo kodwa uyakholwa ukuthi uma sebeqalile ukukhonza azoza ngokohlelo lukaNkulunkulu wathi konke kuzoqala ngemuva kukaJuni ngoba ubesabanjezelwe yizinto ezithize.Uthe yena akazukubizwa ngeNkosi kodwa uyinceku ezokwenza umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu kuphela wokushumayela ivangeli.“Ngiyakholwa ukuthi uJehova engikhetha ukumsebenzela angeke angilahle ngoba ngikhetha indlela yakhe. Sizohamba lapho kwahamba khona uGagane, sizokwenza njengoba enza uBhombela,” kusho uShembe.Kumanje leli bandla selihlukene kasikhombisa. Kukhona oluholwa inkosi uNyazi lweZulu laseBuhleni, olweNkosi uVela Shembe, olwaseThembezinhle, kube olwaseGwinyezinye oluholwa uMfu Sizwe Shembe, olweNkosi uPhakama Shembe oluseGoli , olukaMfu Mpanza elisePinetown bese kuba olusha lwaseKuphileni oluzoba seMpumalanga lukaMthakiwamakha Shembe.
title: Sekuphinde kwaqubuka amahlubuka kwaShembe

text: UHULUMENI waKwaZulu-Natal uye kohlola ukuqalwa komsebenzi wokwakhiwa kodonga oluhlukanisa leli neMozambique, okuhloswe ngalo ukunqanda ubugebengu obenziwa emngceleni. Ngokwakha udonga kuhloswe ukuvimba ukwebiwa kwezimoto ezithunyelwa eMozambique.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli ngoMsombuluko, uziyele mathupha KwaMhlabuyalingana eyohlola ukuqalwa komsebenzi.Ububanzi bodongabuwu-8 wamakhilomitha, lusuka eSimangaliso Wetlands Park luze lufike eTembe Elephant Park.“Sigculisekile ukuthi umsebenzi uqalile, esinethemba lokuthi uzophothulwa ngokushesha uma ubuka umfutho okhonjiswa abasebenzi. Siwuhulumeni wesifundazwe senza konke okusemandleni ukunqanda izenzo zobugebengu bokwebiwa kwezimoto. Luzovimbela nokuhanjiswa kwempahla engekho emthethweni nokunqamula kwabofika ngokungemthetho,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe kudaleke namathuba emisebenzi angu-40 kubantu baKwaMhlabuyalingana futhi ukhonkolo osetshenziswayo wakhiwe yinkampani yaseMkhanyakude. Umnyango ubeke ithimba elizoqapha ukuthi uqhutshwa ngendlela umsebenzi wokwakhiwa konqenqema.Ngasekuqaleni kukaMashi amalungu omphakathi aseJozini naKwaMhlabuyalingana avuke umbhejazana avala thanqa imigwaqo engena nephumayo kulawa madolobha, ekhala ngokudlanga kokwebiwa kwezimoto.Amalungu omphakahi asole namaphoyisa athize okuthiwa amdibi munye nezigebengu ekwebiweni kwezimoto.Busukumise ngisho uNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ubugebengu obenziwa emngceleni ngeledlule, ozifikele mathupha endaweni eyoxoxa nomphakathi nezinhlaka ezithintekayo.UZikalala uthe kumele kuboshwe ngokushesha amaphoyisa asolwa ekwebiweni kwezimoto ziweliswe umngcele, amiswe emsebenzini.Wagxeka ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda athe kukhinyabeze abamabhizinisi nezinhlelo zentuthuko kahululumeni.UZikalala wathi uzoxoxa noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke, uGeneral Bheki Cele, ngezinto ezidinga ukwenziwa uhulumeni kazwelonke ngodaba oluthinta umngcele ohlukanisa leli neMozambique.
title: Udonga lokuvimba ukwebiwa kwezimoto

text: IZIGIDIGIDI zabagibeli bezitimela kuleli zingase zisale dengwane uma kuqhubeka ukucekelwa phansi kwazo.Inkampani yezitimela iPassenger Rail Agency of South Africa (Prasa) , ithe kucekelwa phansi amakhoshi angu-800 njalo ngonyaka osekuholele ekutheni yehluleke ukukhokhela umshwalense olungisa izitimela izizumbulu zemali.UMnuz Cromet Molepo oyisikhulu esiphezulu ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba eThekwini izolo, uthe njengamanje abanawo umshwalense basazama ukuxoxa nezinkampani ukuze zibehlisele imali abayikhokhayo.Lesi sithangami sibizwe ngemuva kokushiswa kwezitimela ezimbili eThekwini, ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Kusolwa ukuthi zishiswe ngabagibeli abebedinwe ukuthi bezihamba ngemuva kwesikhathi.Lezi zitimela zishiswe ngezikhathi ezingefani ebusuku esiteshini eBerea naseDurban Station. UMolepo uthe ngonyaka wezimali * -2016 2017 bafake izicelo zokulungiselwa amakhoshi acekelwe phansi angabiza uR292 million, emshwalensini okhave lezi zitimela.Lokhu uthe kuholele ekutheni imali abayikhokhela umshwalensi obunguR48 million ngonyaka yenyuke ibe nguR78 million.“Njengamanje asinawo umshwalense ngoba sekubiza kakhulu ukuwukhokhela. Sisaxoxa nezinkampani ezithile ngoba siyehluleka ukukhokha le mali. Uma sigcina sehlulekile kusho ukuthi uma kushe ikhoshi ngeke isabuyiselwa ngoba awukho umshwalense,” kusho uMolepo.UMnuz Dumi Dube oyiRegional Manager yolayini bezitimela KwaZulu-Natal, uthe ngoLwesithathu bekunenkinga kagesi eholele ekutheni izitimela zihambe ngemuva kwesikhathi esifanele.“Sisola ukuthi abagibeli badinwe yilokhu kuhamba ngemuva kwesikhathi kwezitimela baxabana nabashayeli. Ngemuva kwalokho sezwa sekuthiwa isitimela siyasha eBerea. Ngemuva kwemizuzu engu-25 sishile, sathola omunye umbiko wokuthi kusha esinye eDurban Station. Abashayeli bethu nabo bathole ukuhlukunyezwa ngalesi sikhathi,” kusho uDube.Uthe ukuhamba kukagesi akulawulwa yibona futhi ngalesi sikhathi izitimela bezihamba kodwa zihamba kancane kunokujwayelekile.Bangu-475 000 abantu abahamba ngesitimela ngosuku KwaZulu-Natal, eGauteng bangu-1.6 million.UNkk Zanele Sabela wenyunyana yabesebenzi iSatawu uthe lezi zindaba ezisabisayo kumele uzitshele abagibeli ukuze bazi ukuthi kuyingozi kangakanani ukucekela phansi izitimela.“Nyakenye uPrasa uke wasibiza wasitshela ngezinkinga zokucekelwa phansi kwazo izitimela, kwavela ukuthi uhlelo lwawo lokuxhumana nabagibeli alukho. Njengamanje sekuyisikhathi sokuthi kube nohlelo oluqondile lokufundisa abagibeli ngemiphumela yokuthi uma bedinwe ukuthi isitimela sihamba emuva kwesikhathi, bese besishisa.U-Prasa unomsebenzi wokuthi uthuthe abantu abantulayo bakuleli. U-R78 million okhokhela umshwalense ungasiza ukulungisa ingqalasizinda endala,” uNkk Sabela.UDube uthe ingqalasizinda yezitimela ineminyaka engu-60 kudingeka imali eningi ukuze ilungiswe.“Kwenzeka lokhu nje sisalungisa ojantshi nolayini besitimela abagugulwe yizikhukhula ngo-Okthoba. Sisezinhlelweni zokuhlukanisa umzila waKwaMashu nowaseMlazi ohambisanayo, senzela ukuthi abagibeli bangabambezeleki,” kusho yena.UMolepo uthe isitimela sisinye sinamakhoshi angu-12 kodwa ngenxa yokucekelwa phansi kwezitimela eziningi sezinamakhoshi eyisithupha.“Lokhu sikwenzela ukuthi izitimela ziqhubeke zibe khona ngezikhathi ezijwayelekile kodwa lokhu kudala inkinga yokuthi zigcwale ngokweqile. Ezinye izinkinga ezidala ukuthi izitimela zihambe ngemuva kwesikhathi ukuntshontshwa kwamakhebula kagesi, ukulahlwa kukadoti kojantshi njengoba kunemindeni ehlala kubo ojantshi,” kusho yena.Uthe uma ugesi ungekho isitimela sidluliswa ngasinye kudingeka ukuthi umshayeli ahlale ocingweni imizuzu engu-15 okudla imali enkulu.UMnuz Zwabesho Shange usihlalo wohlaka olumele abagibela izitimela, i-United Commuters Voice uthe bayaziqhelelanisa nokushishwa kwezitimela.“Umthetho awuthathe indawo yawo, abenza lokhu baboshwe,” kusho yena.
title: Izitimela zisengcupheni  yokuvalwa kuleli

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho elingashayi eceleni, ngifisa ukwedlulisa lo muzwa enginawo ngoKhuzani iDlamlenze.Ngifisa athathe lesi sinqumo sokuthi angawaphenduli amavukana ngoba afisa ukuduma ngaye.Lesi sinqumo sathathwa yiNdidane ingasaphenduli ku-Ali Mgube noThokozani Langa, baphelelwa wushatini.UKhuzani akakwazi lokhu engizokusho, iNdidane yayizondwa yibo bonke abaculi bakamaskandi, yabe isimthelela.Nakuye kuzoba njalo njengoba bemtinyela bonke. Makazi ukuthi yindlela abamvuma ngayo ukuthi uyinkosi kamaskandi, ofakazi yibo.Bese ngithi kuMageza amahle, isinqumo sabo sokupika lo siyavalelisa kubo siyohlala kwaMpungose, iNdidane yasishiyela uKhuba.Sengigcina; Khuzani, shaya ingoma, okuyiyonanto esiyifunayo, sesodibana ngomhla ka-24 Mashi ezitolo.Mfanukhona SlwaneMgagaNQUTHU BRANCH
title: IMIBONO: UKhuzani makayeke ukunaka amavukana

text:
ABATHANDI bebhola likanobhutshuzwayo kuleli bazobona uTeko Modise elihlikihla okokugcina ibhola elikhokhelwayo kule mpelasonto ngemuva kokumemezela ukuthi usewagaxa emgibeni.Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe yiCape Town City FC ekhasini layo kuTwitter ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni lapho evalelise khona kubalandeli baleli qembu kwi-video.Uthe ukuziqeqesha neqembu kuleli sonto bekungekho lula ngoba ubengazi noma ajabule noma akhale njengoba umdlalo waleli qembu neBlack Leopards kusasa kuzoba umdlalo wakhe wokugcina.“Kwakuhlezi kuyiphupho lami ukuthi ngidlale ibhola elikhokhelayo. Inkundla yiyona ndawo engizizwa ngijabule kuyo,” kuchaza uTeko oneminyaka ewu-36.Uthe udeda ngethemba lokuthi kunomunye umdlali ofanelwe wukuthatha indawo yakhe ngoba yena usekuzuze konke ayefisa ukukuzuza ebholeni kuleli.Thank You Teko.
#NewChapterBegins💙 
pic.twitter.com/4NBLFCeqnx— Cape Town City FC (@CapeTownCityFC) 
May 10, 2019UModise ubalwa nabadlali basesiswini abaseqopheleni eliphezulu asebeke bayibamba ebholeni kuleli. Uqale ukudlala ibhola kwiCity Pillars ngaphambi kokuthi athengwe yiSupersport United ngo-2006.Usuke kuMatsatsantsa wajoyina i-Orlando Pirates lapho afika azakhela khona igama waba umdlali owayebhekwe ngabomvu kwiBafana Bafana edlale kwi-2010 Fifa World Cup.  Udlalele iqembu lesizwe kawu-66, elishayela amagoli ayishumi.Ngo-2011 kuya ku-2017 uModise ubesegijima kwiMamelodi Sundowns lapho anqobe khona isicoco seligi kabili, iCaf Champions League neCaf Super Cup.Ngemuva kwalokho ujoyine iCape Town City anqobe nayo  iMTN 8 ngo-2018.Landela lolu daba kwiSolezwe ngoMgqibelo kusasa.
title: Usewagaxa emgibeni uTeko ‘The General’ Modise

text: ZIZOHLAWULISWA uR1 million noma u-10% wenzuzo eziyenzayo izinkampani ezinyusa intengo yokudla nemikhiqizo ehlukene njengoba izwe lizovalwa izinsuku eziwu-21 kusukela kusasa.Izolo uNgqongqoshe wezoHwebo neziMboni, uMnuz Ebrahim Patel, uthe kuphenywa izinkampani eziwu-11 ezinyuse intengo yezifonyo nezibulala-magciwane.“Sicela abantu bangathengi ukudla nezinye izimpahla ngokweqile ngoba ngeke kuphele ukudla uma izwe livaliwe. Siphenya izinkampani eziwu-11 ngokunyusa intengo yempahla. Akekho onelungelo lokunyusa intengo yempahla kulesi sikhathi, oyinyusayo uzoboshwa, adonse unyaka ejele noma ahlawuliswe uR1 million noma u-10% wenzuzo ayenzayo,” kusho uPatel.Ukhuthaze abantu ukuthi bacebe izitolo nezinkampani ezinyusa intengo yempahla ngokushayela u-0800 014 8800.Uthe abantu bazovunyelwa ukuthi baye ezitolo bayothenga ukudla, imithi emakhemisi nezinye izidingo ezibalulekile.Izitolo zokudla, amakhemisi namafemu akha impahla edingekayo njengoba kuneCoronavirus, ngeke kuvalwe.Uthe izipaza zabantu baseNingizimu Afrika zizoqhubeka nokusebenza.I-Industrial Development Corporation (IDC) izosiza izinkampani ezisengcupheni kodwa ezibalulekile ekulweni neCoronavirus ngoR3 billion.Osomabhizinisi abadinga usizo baceliwe ukuthi bathinte i-IDC noma bavakashele ikhasi lomnyango wezohwebo nezimboni.Uphinde waveza ukuthi kunesikhwama sokusiza umphakathi esibizwa ngeSolidarity Fund esinoR150 million, acele ukuth abantu baqhubeke nokufaka imali kuso.Lesi sikhwama sitholakala ngokuvakashela u-www.solidarityfund.co.zaUPatel uthe bazoqhubeka nokuhwebelana namazwe awomakhelwane nokuthutha impahla ngoba lokho kubalulekile.UNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi amaNcane, uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, ubonge omacaphunakusale bakuleli oMnuz Nicky Oppenheimer noJohann Rupert ngokunikela ngoR2 billion ozosiza osomabhizinisi abancane.“Sizosiza izinkampani ezibhaliswe ngokusemthethweni esibonayo ukuthi zizokhahlanyezwa yiCoronavirus. Sicelile nokuthi osomabhizinisi abancane banikwe izinyanga eziyisithupha zokuthi bame kancane ukukhokha izikweletu zabo ngoba bathwele kanzima. Sizolandela imigomo efanele ngaphambi kokulekelela osomabhizinisi abancane,” kusho uNksz Ntshavheni.Imininingwane ngosizo losomabhizinisi abancane itholakala ku-www.smmesa.gov.za noma ngokushayela * -0860 663 7867.Kunezinkampani esezivalile ngenxa yeCoronavirus okubalwa amafemu akhiqiza izimoto, awezimpahla zokugqoka, amajimu njalo njalo.Amabhanoyi akwaComair nawo azobe engahambi kusukela kusasa kuze kube wu-Ephreli 19. Kucelwe abahamba ngawo ukuthi bathinte le nkampani ngokuvakashela ukulula.com.UMnuz Thulas Nxesi onguNgqongqoshe wezemiSebenzi, uthe abaqashi kufanele bagcwalise amafomu e-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF) ukuze abasebenzi babo bakwazi ukuhola ngesikhathi behleli emakhaya ngenxa yeCoronavirus.Uthe kunezinhlelo ezihlukene zokubhekelela abaqashi nabasebenzi okubalwa ukusetshenziswa kwe-UIF nezinye izinhlelo.Ngisho abasebenzi abazogula bazosizwa kulolu hlelo ngoba uNxesi uthe abathandi kube nabasebenzi abadilizwayo.Abasebenzi abasemikhakheni ethathwa njengokuthi ixhaphaza abantu okungowonogada, isemapulazini nasezindlini nabo bazobhekelelwa.UNxesi uthe imali ezoholelwa abasebenzi ngesikhathi seCoronavirus ngeke ibe ngaphansi kwe-minimum wage.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi abasebenzi bebekhala ngokuthi kuthatha isikhathi ukuthola imali ye-UIF, uMnuz Makhosonke Buthelezi obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwi-UIF, uthe abantu bazoyithola imali yabo ngoba banamathimba aseqalile ukulekelala izinkampani ezinabasebenzi abangaphezu kuka-50. Uthe akhona nama-technicians azolungisa ezobuchwepheshe uma benezingqinamba.Ugqugquzele umphakathi ukuthi usebenzise uhlelo lwe-uFiling, amafax nama-email atholakala kwi-website yabo ethi ufiling.co.za noma ku-www.labour.gov.za.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuVakasha, uNkk Mmamoloko Kubayi-Ngubane, uthe banoR200 million wokusiza osomabhizinisi abasemkhakheni wezokuvakasha.Uthe bayazi incane le mali ukusiza lo mkhakha omile ngenxa yeCoronavirus kodwa bazosiza izinkampani zezokuvakasha ezenza inzuzo engadluli uR2.5 million ngonyaka, ezibhaliswe ngokusemthethweni, ezinesitifiketi sentela esisebenzayo futhi osekuphele unyaka zisebenza.Kuzosizwa kakhulu izinkampani ezilandela imithetho yeBBBEE, ezabantu abasha nabesifazane.
title: Zizohlawuliswa izinkampani ezinyusa intengo ngeCorona

text: ODOKOTELA baKwaZulu-Natal bathi abajiki empini yabo yokufuna ukusebenza ngaphansi kwezimo ezingcono ezibhedlela zikahulumeni. Inhlangano yodokotela, i-South African Medical Association (Sama), egatsheni layo  KwaZulu-Natal, ithe sekusele kancane kume ukusebenza ezibhedlela zikahulumeni esifundazweni. Igxeke ukushoda kwabasebenzi kuzo nokufa kwemishini esetshenziswayo.UMnyango Wezempilo uthi ubhekene nezingqinamba ekutholeni imali yokubhekana nalezi zinkinga kodwa isazama ukuthola usizo kwizibhedlela ezizimele.Izikhulu zoMnyango ziphinde zathembisa ukuthi zizoqeqesha abasebenzi abasha ukuze kubhekwane nokushoda kwabasebenzi. AbeSama bathi sebelindele ukuhlangana naboMnyango ngoJuni 9 ukuze kudingidwe izisombululo.“Ngeke sivumele uMnyango ukuthi uhudule izinyawo usizibe ngezinkinga esibhekene nazo. Sizimisele futhi ukuqinisa ubushoshovu bethu ngalolu daba, ngoba yinto edinga ukuphakanyelwa. Akukho lapho esizojika khona, sizoqhubeka silwe silwela iziguli ngoba lento ithinta abantu abahlwempu,” usho kanje.
title: ODOKOTELA bafuna lusukunyelwe olwesimo sezibhedlela e-KZN

text: UNOBHALA Jikelele weSouth African Communist Party (SACP) uDkt Blade Nzimande uwafanise nezilima amalungu e-ANC Youth League aphazamise umcimbi wokwethulwa kwencwadi iGangester State - Unravelling Ace Magashule’s Web of Capture.UNzimande ubekhuluma emcimbini wokukhumbula iqhawe lomzabalazo elalihola iSACP uMnuz Chris Hani, obuseThomas Nkobi Memorial Park, Ekurhuleni.Uthe i-ANCYL inalo ilungelo lokungahambisani nokubhalwe encwadini kodwa ayinalo ilungelo lokuphazamisa umcimbi nokusabisa ukuthi izoshisa le ndwadi.“Akukona ubuhlakani ukusabisa ngokushisa incwadi uma kunokuthile ongahambisani nakho, kuwubulima. I-ANC kufanele ibaqondise ubugwegwe abaphazamise umcimbi wokuthulwa kwencwadi ekhuluma ngoMagashule. Akekho onelungelo lokuphazamisa umcimbi wencwadi esebenzisa igama lomzabalazo,” kusho uNzimande.UNobhala we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule uthe kuyishwa ukuthi amalungu e-ANCYL aphazamise umcimbi wokwethulwa kwale ncwadi.Incwadi edalule izindaba ezishaqisayo ngoNobhala-jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace MagashuleWacela ukuthi uma kunezinto engahambisani nazo ingabi nodlame.“Akufanele sivumele ukuphazanyiswa abantu ababhala izincwadi. Uma niphazamisa imicimbi yabo nishisa nezincwadi zabo nibenza babe ngabantu ababalulekile. Asigxileni ekuletheni impilo engcono kubantu bakithi. Sifunde kuChris Hani owayewumholi wabantu ongadunyiswanga abezindaba, sibe njengoMama Winnie Mandela,” kusho uMagashule.Bekulindeleke ukuthi i-ANCYL ihlangane ne-ANC ukudingida lolu daba.UMnuz Sello Pietersen ongumholi we-ANCYL eFree State ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bazokhuluma ne-ANC kodwa wathi abahambisani nale ncwadi ebhebhezela imfundisoze.“Sizozwa nge-ANC ukuthi kufanele senzenjani, ngeke ngisho ukuthi sizoqhubeka yini nokushisa lezi zincwadi kodwa ngeke sithenge incwadi ebhebhethekisa imfundisoze,” kusho uPietersen.I-ANC ikugxekile okwenziwa yi-ANCYL yaseFree State.USomlomo wePhalamende uNksz Baleka Mbete noSihlalo woMkhandlu wezifundazwe uNksz Thandi Mondise bayigxekile iANCYL ngesenzo sayo bathi uma inganeme akufanele isabise kodwa ayilandele umthetho.
title: 'Bayizilima abaphazamise ukwethulwa kwencwadi ekhuluma ngoMagashule' - Nzimande

text: SEKUNENDIDA ngokudutshulwa kukasihlalo kasoseshini wamatekisi aseBhamshela okuthiwa uhlaselwe umlisa ongaziwa ehleli namanye amalungu kasoseshini.Kuthiwa uMnuz Bhekukwenza Msomi (42) usesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela emuva kokudutshulwa ngumlisa ongaziwa ngoLwesithathu ntambama emuva kwehora lesithupha.Lesi sehlo senzeka nje kusanda kushiswa izimoto zomndeni wakwaMakhanya nawo onezimoto ezincane netekisi okuthutha umphakathi.Kuthiwa uMsomi ubebize umhlangano namalungu athile kasoseshini, behleli emotweni ngesikhathi kuqhamuka imoto emhlophe eyiToyota Corrola kwehla owesilisa wadubula ebhekise kuyena. Kuthiwa lo mlisa umdubule kanye wase ephinda ezama ukudubula elinye ilungu kodwa wahluleka wabaleka.Ilungu likasoseshini elicele ukuthi igama lalo ligodlwe, lithe isimo simanzonzo kulo soseshini njengoba sekudutshulwe noMsomi.Leli lungu eliphinde libe yilungu lomndeni wakwaMakhanya osanda kushishelwa izimoto lithe umfowabo, obenaye usihlalo naye usindile kulesi sehlo ngoba lo mlisa uzamile ukudubula ebhekise kuyena kodwa isibhamu sanxapha.“Ngingasho nje ukuthi akuhlalekile kahle ngenxa yazo zonke lezi zigameko ezenzekayo. Okunye okuyinkinga ukuthi abantu abasolwa ngokushisa izimoto zasekhaya nabo basekubhaceni. Kwagcina ngokuthi kuboshwe oyedwa kodwa naye wadedelwa,” kusho leli lungu likasoseshini.Usihlalo kasoseshini ongaphansi kweBhamshela Metered Taxi Association, uMnuz Muziwokubusa Dumakude, uthe abaqondi ukuthi yini eyenze ukuthi uMsomi ahlaselwe njengoba ethe bona nalo soseshini abaphansi kwawo basebenzisana kahle - akukho zinxushunxushu. Uthe bakholwa ukuthi lezi zigameko azihlobene neze nokusebenzisana kososeshini kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi kuthinta izingxabano eziseceleni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala emuva kokudutshulwa komlisa oneminyaka engu-42 eBhamshela.
title: Sibi isimo emva kokudutshulwa kukasomatekisi

text:
BAZOHLUNGWA ngohlelo lwama video abadansi abazoba yingxenye yendumezulu yedili lemidanso yesimanje eyahlukene ebanjelwa eThekwini minyaka yonke. IJomba Fringe yakulo nyaka izoshaya ngelinye igiya njengoba sekukhishwe isitatimende sokuthi konke kuzokwenziwa ngobuchwepheshe bamavideo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu uyalithola ithuba. IJomba Fringe izokwenza inhlolokhono ehlanganisa abadansi bemikhakha eyahlukene encike emdansweni wesimanje icontemporary izokwamukela izicelo zabadansi, izinkampani zomdanso, abadidiyei bomdanso esebenamava kanjalo nabasafufusa. Ukufakwa kwezicelo sekuvulelekile kanti kulindeleke ukuthi kuze kuvalwe ngoJulayi 10 ntambama. Kuhlu lwabadidiyeli bemdanso abalindelekile abahlanganise imidanso exoxa indaba kusetshenziswa ubuciko bomdanso, nabalandela imigomo ebekiwe ngaphansi kweJomba. Yize kuzobe kuhlangene amaciko kodwa ngeke bavunyelwe abantu ukuthi basebenzise imsebenzi yamanye amaciko ngaphandle kwemvume. Umculo ngenye yezinto ezizobhekwa kakhulu ukuthi umuntu uyilandele yini imigomo yokusebenzisa umculo welinye iciko, kuzophinde kudingeke nobufakazi obuyisiqiniseko salokho. Abantu okuqalwa kubo ukucubungulwa izicelo zemisebenzi yabo abazobe beneminyaka engu-16 kuyaphezulu. Kwisitatimende esikhishwe namuhla iJomba, kuvelile ukuthi abakabinalo okwamanje usuku lokuqala ukubukiswa kwale midanso njengoba kusazokwenziwa inhlolokhono kuqala. Kwabafisa ukucaciseleka ngolwazi okubalwa nezikole bangaxhumana nabeJomba kule email 
[email protected].
title: IJomba Fringe izokwamukela izicelo zabadansi ngamavideo

text: UMXHUMANISI wobuholi besikhashana be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, ucacise ngenhloso yakhe yokuhambela icala lobengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma osolwa ngenkohlakalo. UZuma ubevele okwesibili eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu lapho kubonakale khona inqwaba yabaholi namalungu e-ANC eyomeseka. UZikalala uthe ukubonakala kwakhe eseka uZuma kungenxa yokuthi usuke efuna ukuqondisa ukukhuluma okungekuhle okusabalele ngabaholi benhlangano.Uthe usuke eziyele njengesakhamuzi sakuleli hhayi njengelungu noma umholi we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal. Uveze nokuthi usazoqhubeka nokuya ngoba akaboni hlazo yena kulokho.“Uma uzoqaphelisisa ngalolo suku lwecala ngangifake ijakhethi ye-ANC kodwa ngayikhumula sengiya ecaleni ngoba bengiya njengomuntu nje bengingayomela i-ANC. Angiyiboni inkinga kulokho ngoba wonke umuntu uvumelekile ukuya enkantolo,’’ kusho uZikalalaEsekhuluma nabezindaba eceleni uthinte nendaba yekhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana eholwa iPhini leNhloko yamaJaji uRaymond Zondo. Ikhomishini isiqalile ukwenza umsebenzi wayo njengoba abanolwazi bengaluletha kuyona.UZikalala uthe abantu abangalinge babhule babe yizangoma ngodaba lokulawulwa koMbuso wathi kufanele ikhomishini inikwe ithuba lokwenza umsebenzi wayo ukuze kuvele iqiniso. UZuma ungomunye wabavelayo kwabasolwa ngokuba nesandla ekulawulweni koMbuso yidlanzana. Usolwa ngokuvumela abangani bakhe bakwaGupta ukuzitapela emalini yabakhokhi bentela.UZikalala wesekwe uNkk Nocawe Mafu oyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kuzwelonke, othe angaya kokweseka uZuma noma nini.“Nami nje ukuba benginaso isikhathi bengingaya ngoba yinto engenankinga ukuya ecaleni likaZuma,’’ kusho uNkk Mafu.UZikalala ugxeke ilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kuzwelonke uMnuz Bheki Cele ngokuhlomekisa amalungu enhlangano.Ukhale kakhulu ngesitatimende sikaCele asenze ngonyaka odlule ngoDisemba lapho athi amalungu awaqhubeke nokuyisa i-ANC ezinkantolo ukuze iqonde ngqo.UZikalala uthe lesi sitatimende siyadukisa asiyisizi inhlangano.Usole nabanye abaholi abasezinhlakeni zikazwelonke ngokuba nesandla ekutshaleni uqhekeko enhlanganweni wathi kuyadinga ukulungiswa lokhu.“Ngesikhathi sixoxa namaqabane kuvelile ukuthi kukhona ukungeneliseki ngezinto ezehlukene kodwa okunye okuvelile kube yinkinga yabaholi bakuzwelonke abaphehla ukungezwani.’’UCele ethintwa ngalezi zinsolo ezenziwe uZikalala uvele wangaphawula wathi akakwazi ukukhuluma nabezindaba ngalokho.
title: UZikalala ucacisa ngokubonakala ecaleni likaZuma

text: KUSHONE umnikazi wesithuthuthu nowesifazane okusolwa ukuthi uyintombi yakhe engozini eyenzeke izolo ekuseni KwaDukuza ngesikhathi beshayisana netekisi.Owesilisa obeshayela isithuthuthu kuthiwa ushayisane netekisi mahlanze, bobabili nowesifazane bashonela endaweni yesigameko. Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba engakadalulwa amagama abashonile neminye imininingwane yabo.UNksz Zinhle Mngomezulu okhulumela iRoad Traffic Inspectorate (RTI) esifundazweni uthe kuvele ukuthi umshayeli wesithuthuthu ubesebenza kwabezimo eziphuthumayo.Uthe kusolwa ukuthi owesifazane ashone naye ubeyintombi yakhe.“Ingozi yenzeke ngezithuba zabo 6 ekuseni. Itekisi nesithuthuthu kuhlangane endaweni eyijika, kwashayisana mahlanze. Kubonakala sengathi itekisi ibingalayishile ngoba abekho abanye abalimele ngaphandle komshayeli,” kusho uNksz Mngomezulu.Isitatimende esikhishwe abezimo eziphuthumayo be-IPSS Medical Rescue siveza ukuthi ingozi yenzeke emgwaqweni uDoesberg, KwaDukuza. Kuthiwa umshayeli wesithuthuthu nowesifazane obengemumva baficwe abezimo eziphuthumayo sebeshonile. Kuthiwa umshayeli wetekisi ulimale kancane, walashwa endaweni yesigameko.Amaphoyisa asaphenya ngembangela yengozi.
title: Kufe ababili kweyesithuthuthu netekisi

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUBAZOHLEKA bodwa abathandi bekwaito yakudala njengoba iqembu lalolu hlobo lomculo i-Alaska lizokhipha i-albhamu equkethe yona.USphiwe Picat oyilungu le-Alaska ehlanganiswe nguye, uLucky Mlakana, Thabo Tsotetsi, Les Ma-ada no-Andrew Moloisane, uthe abathandi bekwaito balambele eyakudala.Uthe ukushintsha kwezikhathi kuholele ekutheni ikwaito ishintshwe njengoba eyesimanje ishaya ngesigqi esisheshayo kanti eyakudala yayishaya ngesigqi esishaya kancane.Uthe indlala yekwaito ibonakala emicimbini njengoba oDJ uma beshaya eyakudala abantu bavele bajabule.“I-albhamu yethu ezophuma ngamaholidi ePhasika izobe inezingoma cishe ezinhlanu ezishaya ngesigqi sekwaito yakudala kuthi ezinye kube ngeyesimanje.Le albhamu izoba nezingoma ezingu-12,” kusho uPicat.Uthe abantu abakholwa ukuthi i-Alaska yodumo lwezingoma ezithi 
Accuse nezinye isangakhipha i-albhamu.“I-Alaska ayikaze ife. Besikhipha izingoma ezihamba ngazodwa njengethi 
Madagascar kodwa manje sizokhipha ephelele,” kusho uPicat.Abalandeli baleli qembu bazolibona licula bukhoma kuMgababa New Years Picnic, eMgababa, ngoJanuwari 1.UPicat, uthe: “Abantu abalindele ukuzwa umculo wethu omusha siyethembisa ukuthi bazowuthanda.”Leli dili lomculo okuzoba kungunyaka wesithupha likhona lizobe libophele uPhuzekhemisi, Thokozani Langa, Naak MusiQ, Professor, Sbo Da Poet, Khaya Mthethwa, DJ Siyanda nabanye abaningi.Omunye wabahleli balo mcimbi uThokozani “T’zozo” Zulu, uthe: “Abantu abazovunyelwa ukusondela ngezimoto ngamaVIP azobe ethenge amathikithi abiza u-R500 nabazokhokhela indawo yokupaka ebhishi ebiza u-R250, “ kusho uT’zozo.
title: I-Alaska isazoshaya ngonyawo oludala

text: KUME nse ukuqopha Uzalo izolo ngemuva kokuthi ithimba eliqopha lo mdlalo livuke umbhejazane lathi liwabeka phansi amathuluzi njengoba lingaholile.Kuthiwa abaqophi yibona abafike bamisa yonke into njengoba beveze ukuthi imali yabo ayingenile ngakho ngeke bakwazi ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi.Kuthiwa abalingisi basale benkemile ngesikhathi bezitshela ukuthi bazosebenza kodwa batshelwa ukuthi ababuyele emakhaya.Umthombo weSolezwe uveze ukuthi umholo walabo abaqopha lo mdlalo bekumele ingene ngoMgqibelo kodwa lokho kwangenzeka.“Ngesikhathi befika batshele abaphathi obekukhona kubo noGugu Zuma ukuthi ngeke basebenze, banxusiwe ukuthi kuhlanganwe ukuze kuxoxiswane. Kodwa nakhona akuphunywanga nasixazululo njengoba bephume besamile ekutheni ngeke basebenze imali yabo ingangenile,” kusho umthombo.Uthe emhlanganweni kunqunywe ukuthi uma kuze kushaya uLwesihlanu imali ingangenile ngeke baqhubeke nokuqopha.“Ngeke kuqoshwe kulezi zinsuku njengoba kusenezinkinga. Zimapeketwane izinto kulo mdlalo njengoba abanye abalingisi ikakhulukazi laba abangaphansi kwama-agent, behola kodwa kukhona nabanye okuvela ukuthi abaholi,” kuchaza umthombo. Lezi zinkinga zidalwa ukuthi inkampani ekhiqiza Uzalo ingenye yezigcine ukukhokhelwa yiSABC ngoJuni.UPepsi Pokane, wenkampani iStained Glass Pictures, esitatimendeni asikhiphile ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kumisiwe ukuqoshwa kwawo.Uthe isinqumo abasithathile sokumisa ukuqopha silandela ukuthi abasebenzi beveze ukuthi ngeke basebenze njengoba umholo wabo ka-Agasti ungangenanga.“Inkampani iStained Glass Pictures isezingxoxweni neSABC futhi yaqinisekisa ukuthi kuzothi kuphela le nyanga izobe isiyikhokhile imali. Abaphathi baphinde babiza bonke abasebenzi abathintekayo babachazela ukuthi kwenzekani. Ngenxa yokuthi abakhokhelwanga bakhethe ukubeka phansi amathuluzi kuze kube bayakhokhelwa,” kuchaza uPepsi.Uthe bayasemukela isinqumo esithathwe ngabasebenzi futhi basaxhumana neSABC ngalolu daba.Okhulumela iSABC, uNeo Momodu uthe, isimo sezimali kwaSABC asisihle kodwa bazoxhumana nazo zonke izinkampani ukulungisa lolu daba.
title: Kumiswe ukuqoshwa koZalo

text: UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, ulume ephephetha kubadlali abashaye into ephansi benikwe ithuba lokuzibonakalisa emdlalweni womlenze wokuqala weCAF Champions League neLight Stars e-Orlando Stadium, ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.IPirates ibhudluze iStars yaseSychelles ngo 5-1 emdlalweni uMicho abekade enikeze kuwona ithuba inqwaba yabadlali abangajwayele ukudlala. Kulaba badlali kukhona uKudakwashe Mahachi, Meshack Maphangule, Linda Mntambo, Mpho Makola nabanye.EZimnyama zizodlala owomlenze wesibili eSeychelles ngoLwesithathu. Nakuba uMicho ekujabulele ukunqoba kwezakhe nokuthi zizibeke ethubeni elihle lokudlulela emzuliswaneni olandelayo kodwa uzwakalise ukuthi akeneme ngabanye babadlali athe bahlulekile ukukhombisa ukuthi balilambele ijezi.“Alikho ithuba elingcono elifana naleli elinikezwe abadlali abangajwayele ukudlala. Esikhathini esizayo ngeke libe khona ithuba lokwenza izinguquko eziyisishiyagalolunye njenganamuhla. Indawo izoncipha kakhulu. Singaphumuza abadlali abane noma abayisihlanu ngenxa yemiqhudelwano esidlala kuyona kodwa abayisishiyagalolunye ngeke ngoba iqembu lehlelwa yizinga. Asikubheki kabi ukushaya into ephansi kwabadlali ngoba bayazazi. Nathi siyazi ukuthi abadlali bethu bangenza kangcono,” kusho uSredojevic.Kubadlali abahlulekile ukukhombisa ukuthi bayalifuna ijezi kweZimnyama kukhona uMahachi ohlulwe yinqwaba yamathuba okushaya amagoli noThabo Qalinge obegcina ibhola kuze kweqe.“Siyithimba labaqeqeshi sizibeke engozini ngokunika ithuba abadlali abangajwayele ukudlala. Akufanele sigxeke noma ngabe kwenzekeni. Ngakho siyakuthwala konke okungahambanga kahle. Uma ngiphoxekile ngabadlali abathize kufanele sikukhulume nabo. Akukho eqenjini lethu ukugxekana esidlangalaleni.“Sibonile ukuthi ubani olwela ijezi. Njengoba ngihlale ngisho ukuthi ijimu nomdlalo wobungani, akufani nomdlalo wangempela. Ngifuna ukuxolela bonke abashaye into ephansi kunekade ilindelekile. Iqembu likuzuzile ebelikufuna. Abanye kufanele babhukule, bakhwice imikhono, banyuse izinga,” kusho uSredojevic.Kulindeleke ukuthi abuyise izethenjwa zakhe uma sebebhekene neMaritzburg United emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership e-Orlando Stadium kusasa ngo 8.15 ebusuku. EZimnyama zihlezi phezulu kwi-log yePremiership ngamaphuzu awu-23 emuva kwemidlalo ewu-13.ITeam of Choice isendaweni ka-14 ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye emuva kwemidlalo ewu-11. Isawine umdlalo owodwa kule sizini.“Sifuna ukukhombisa ukuthi abafana bethu bangcono. Sifuna ukubahlonipha kube sengathi sidlala neMaritzburg yangesizini edlule. Kujwayelekile ukuthi amaqembu akulesi simo uma edlala namakhulu ayalenyusa izinga,” kusho uSredojevic.
title: UMicho ukhala ngababhacazile

text: AZOVELA namhlanje enkantolo amadoda ayisikhombisa aboshwe ezikholisa ngotshwala bokwebiwa emijondolo yaseBriardene ngoLwesithathu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe entathakusa ngoLwesithathu amadoda amane afike endaweni edayisa utshwala emgwaqweni uChris Hani, eBriardene, abamba unogada ambopha.Kuthiwa abe esedlula esaha izinsimbi ezivale isitolo ukuze angene ngaphakathi. Kuthiwa abe esethatha amathelevishini amabili notshwala.UNaicker uthe amadoda abe esethatha ngesivu angena emijondolo eseduze kwalapho kade entshontsha khona.“Kubizwe amaphoyisa afike ngokushesha abe eseqala esesha ebathungatha. Nebala awabhadama amadoda ezikholisa ngotshwala. Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luwaholele endlini lapho kutholwe khona ezinye izimpahla ebezebiwe zifihliwe. Amaphoyisa ashaqe utshwala nezinye iznto ebezebiwe,” kusho uNaicker.Kube sekuboshwa amadoda ayisikhombisa aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-23 no- 60 ngecala lokubamba inkunzi.UNaicker uthe kulindeleke ukuthi kuboshwe abanye abantu futhi ngoba uphenyo lwamaphoyisa lusaqhubeka.Uthe kuzobhekwa kuthi ababoshiwe kabathinteki yini kwezinye izenzo zokubamba inkunzi ezenzeke KwaZulu-Natal.Amadoda azovela enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini namuhla.
title: Abatholwe notshwala bokwebiwa enkantolo

text: INDODA eno-31 kulindeleke ukuba ivele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNsimbini namhlanje, ngamacala amabili okungelokubulala nelokuthumba. Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal,  uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe ngoMeyi 16, ngezithuba zabo-8 ebusuku, abagilwa abaneminyaka engu-21 no-30, babelapho behlala khona endaweni yakwaSheleni, e-Adams Mission, ngesikhathi bethunjwa yiqulu lamadoda ayebasola ngokugqekeza emzini yabo maqede bantshontshe izimpahla ezibalulekile.“Ngesikhathi abagilwa ababili bengabuyi emakhaya, imindeni yabo yakhathazeka kakhulu yaze yabikela amaphoyisa. Uphenyo lwaholela amaphoyisa endaweni yase-Adams Mission lapho kwaboshwa khona indoda. Ngemuva kokuphenywa kabanzi ngamaphoyisa ngokunyamala kwabagilwa, umsolwa wabe eseholela amaphoyisa lapho izidumbu zabagilwa zitshingwe khona ngemuva kokutitinywa,” kusho uColonel Mbele.  Uthe izidumbu zabagilwa zazingcwatshwe ethuneni elalingashoni kakhulu emathuneni ase-Adams Mission. Izidumbu zambiwa futhi kwavulwa icala esteshini samaphoyisa aKwaMakhutha. “Umsolwa wabe eseboshwa maqede wabekwa icala lokubulala nokuthumba. Kulindeleke ukuba kuboshwe inqwaba yabasolwa,” kusasho uColonel Mbele. Izakhamuzi zibe sezixwayiswa ngokuzithathela umthetho ngezandla. “Amaphoyisa ngeke aze anqikaze ukubopha labo abaphula umthetho. Uma izakhamuzi zisola ukuthi kunobugebengu obuqhubekayo endaweni, kumele zibikele amaphoyisa ngokushesha ukuze aphenye futhi kube nababoshwayo,” kuphetha uColonel Mbele.
title: Kuboshwe owesilisa ngokubulawa kwababili abatitinywa umphakathi

text: BAJABULELE ukuphothula izivivinyo zabo ngokubhala iphepha lokugcina izolo abathi belingenzima abafundi bakamatric.Bagcine ngokubhala iphepha lesiNgisi.Iningi labafundi okukhulunywe nalo lithe iphepha belibhaleka kodwa futhi yinto abebekade beyilindele.USabelo Shezi (17) obefunda umatric eMenzi High eMlaza uthe iphepha belibhaleka. Bekulindeleke ukuthi balibhale amahora amabili nemizuzu ewu-30 kodwa ubeseqedile ngemuva kwamahora amabili, eselungele ukuphuma ayoshaywa umoya ngaphandle.UKhwezi Mbhele (18) naye ofunda eMenzi uthe belibhaleka iphepha labo. Uthe ukholwa ukuthi manje usezokwazi ukuthi ayophumula.Bathe ngeke bawudabule noma bawubhale umfaniswano wabo - umkhuba ovame ukuthi wenziwe abafundi uma beqeda ukubhala.“Yinto eyisidala leyo futhi engenasidingo. Mina umfaniswano wami ngizowunika umfowethu omncane. Othisha bakhuluma nathi basho ukuthi labo abangenazo izingane ezincane amakubo bangawuletha esikoleni ukuze unikezwe abanye abawudingayo,” kusho uKhwezi.ULerato Hlophe uthe abafundi kufanele bathi uma beqeda ukubhala bagcine umfaniswano wabo usesimeni esihle ukuze usize abeza ngemuva kwabo.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi bawunikele umfaniswano uma sebengasawudingi ukuze nabanye basizakale ngawo.Njengabanye abafundi abebephothula izivivinyo zabo izolo uthe iphepha abalibhalile libhalekile.Uthe akujahile wukuthi aphumule ngoba bebefunda kanzima kusuka beqalile ukulungiselela izivivinyo zabo.“Akukhona ukuthi besingalali kodwa besifunda kanzima. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngizoziyela ebhishi ngiyozipholela njengoba sesiqedile,” kusho uLerato.Khonamanjalo njengoba abafundi sebezohlala emakhaya abanye benze amaphathi okujabulela ukuqeda ukubhala amaphoyisa asebaxwayisile ukuthi bahlale beqwashile ngaso sonke isikhathi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa anezinhlelo ezikhona zokuqinisekisa ukuphepha kusona sonke isikhathi sokuvalwa kwezikole nakusona sonke isikhathi samaholidi.Uthe izinhlelo zihlezi zikhona uma kuvalwa izikole, ikakhulu uma kuvalelwa uDisemba ukuqinisekisa ukuthi azibikhona izigameko zobugebengu.
title: Belibhaleka iphepha lokugcina: abafundi

text: Ngisho kushunyayelwa akusali ukuthi mhla ufayo uyoshonaphi. Kuyaye kube sengathi bakhona laba asebake bafa bawela bayolibona iZulu nokuthi kuphilwa kanjani. Kodwa konke lokhu kuphikiswa yila mazwi:“bheka-ke kwasondela kuye othile wathi: ‘Mfundisi ngiyokwenzani enhle ukuba ngibe nokuphila okuphakade na’ Wathi kuye, Kepha uma uthanda ukungena ekuphileni , gcina imiyalelo, wathi kuye, ungaphingi, ungebi, ungafakazi ngamanga ngomakhelwane wakho, yazisa uyihlo nonyoko, wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena.” (Matewu 19: 16-18).Sasinakho konke isicebi kodwa silangazelele impilo yangunaphakade. Umbuzo usale uthi: yini impilo yangunaphakade?Ngabe ukungafi, okuyinto engayokwenzeka, ukusala kwegama losadlula emhlabeni, kumbe ubukhulu basemhlabeni kunabanye abaphilayo?Yile nkinga esibhekene nesibhekana nayo imihla namalanga esiyiqaqelwe imithetho elishumi kaNkulunkulu okunzima ukuyiphila nokuyigcina. Sihlale sicela sithi siyahlupheka, ekuhluphekeni kwethu siyaphuma singena sithi sizama impilo esiyibiza ngokuthi ingcono kodwa konke lapho sisuke sihamba khona singabheki ukuthi sithi sihamba sibe siqhuzuka.Lokhu kuqhuzuka kuzwakala emlonyeni sikhuluma, kubonakala ezenzweni zethu imihla namalanga kodwa sibe sithi sifuna ukuphila le mpilo esithi ingcono futhi yinhle, kodwa singanaki ukuthi obhozo bezinyawo sebegxaza igazi.Ukhiye siwufune ulaphi kodwa ube wabekwa phambi kwethu ngemithetho eyishumi esithi iseBhayibheleni kanti uma usuyilandela uyathola iyisintu sobuntu bomuntu.Isintu somuntu simi ngobuntu bakhe nobuyena. Le mithetho akukho engakusho, okwenza kube nzima ukulandeleka, umuntu athi noma esewuphulile angaboni bese kuba lula ukuqhubeka nempilo kuyaba uzibona engcono ngoba uyakwazi ukungena endlini yesonto.Ukubulala, kubulala isizwe sonkana, ukuphinga kuletha amahlazo nobubi, ukweba kwenza okuthole ngaleyo ndlela kungahlali kube namabhadi ungunaphakade, ukufakaza ngamanga ngomakhelwane wakho kuyamlimaza nawe ulimale ungaboni, lapho sazi khona kamhlophe sebile kodwa bese siphatha igama likaNkulunkulu ngeze, uthi ungaba nemali kumbe umnotho nawo owuthole ngokweba kumbe ngokubulala, bese ufisa impahla nomfazi kamakhelwane wakho. Ishaye inhlupheko kuwena nabantabakho, uwena lowaya uyongena endlini yesonto, kumbe kugobela uyohlola, usukhohliwe ubukhona bale mithetho oyeqe imihla nayizolo.Siyahlupheka, siphila kamnandi, siyatetemuka, sibhale imibhalo ezinqoleni zethu sihlulele, konke sikubheke njengempilo emnandi, esiyifisayo, noma umbuza umuntu wenza ngani, aphendule kalula: “UJehova uyiphendulile imithandazo yami” kodwa zolo lokhu kade ephingile ukuze athole lokhu okumenze waphila kanje. Zolo lokhu ufakaze ngomakhelwane wakhe, webile wahlala kule ndlu ahlala kuyona washayela nemoto ahamba ngayo, kungakho namhlanje sekuphinde kuhamba kalula futhi. Inkinga enkulu ilena yokukhohlwa ukuthi uhamba ngezinyawo ezimbili, alulunye, kodwa uma usuphila uyakhohlwa ukuthi kambe ngingubani wakwabani, ungazikhumbuzi ngokwazisa uyihlo nonyoko, kuthi uma sekufikile ukufa uthi “uMdali uphile, uMdali uthathile” kodwa ukwazisa uyihlo nonyoko kubeka ngembaba ukuthi yikhona okuyokwandisa izinsuku zakho emhlabeni.Impica badala yokuphila kobuntu bomuntu kumuntu, nempicabadala yokwazisa uNkulunkulu nemiyalelo yakhe isasidida, sidideke. Umbuzo kungani sihlupheka kangaka size siyongena kogobela, nasemasontweni sifike sihayize size sikhale izinyembezi, kodwa sibe sazi ukuthi konakelephi. Ukuzikhohlisa sazi noma ukuqhuba izinsuku zokuphila kuze kufike ezokugcina na? Bakhona esibonile, bangasithethelela, bakhona abasonile, sangabathethelela, umakhelwane umbuka ngeziqu zamehlo kuze kuphume igama “uyathakatha” ningangenelani, kodwa ngesonto lihle ibhantshi lomhlangano ngiyongena endlini yesonto, ngibemkhulu esikhundleni emphakathini kube imina engibona ababi.Umbuzo osalayo othi: “njengalokhu siphila siphuma singena sibhecana, sifuna inhlanhla sikhala ngemali sibulala, sizondana kodwa sibe sithi siyaphila, ngakube sifuna ingcebo na? Uma sithi sifuna ingcebo ayabuya yini amzwi athi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini : onothileyo uyakungena kalukhuni embusweni wezulu.”Okuxakayo ilelizulu esikhala ngalo imihla namalanga kodwa sibe siphambana ezitaladini abanye bayohlola, abanye bayothwala abanye bayongena ezindlini zamasonto, abanye babulala abanye ukuze bathole ingcebo, abanye bayaphinga abanye bayeba izandla zabo zingcolile. Sihlala emizini emihle ngezandla eziphambane nenkulumo yesicebi sibuza ukuthi yini okufanele siyenze ukuze siphile ingunaphakade.Kukhona konke ukuphila kwanamhlanje kuthangi nayizolo, asizikhohlisi yini ilanga liphuma, lize liyoshona. Sihlulela imihla namalanga kodwa sikhohlwe ukubheka ngaphansi konyawo, ngoba kuyilona esihamba ngalo siyokwenza lokho okusuke kuzosingenisa ezulwini esikhuluma ngalo imihla namalanga. Imilomo yethu emihle igqizisiwe kodwa okuphuma kuyona kuphambene kakhulu nemithetho elishumi yobuntu bomuntu oyisidalwa sikaNkulunkulu.Bhedlindaba “VVO” MkhizeEsigodlweni saseMlambomunye087 11 00 555
title: Senza okuphambene nemithetho eyishumi yobuntu bomuntu

text: UNOBHALA-jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule usexwayise amalungu eqembu ukuba ahloniphe ihhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi. UMagashule ukhulume kanje kulandela ukusolwa kwezinqumo zoMvikeli woMphakathi u-Adv Busisiwe Mkhwebane ukuthi zinokwenzelela futhi sezingene kwipolitiki yakuleli. Muva nje, uSihlalo we-ANC, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe ugxeke uphenyo lukaMkhwebane ngomnikelo kaR500,000 owenziwa iBOSASA ngonyaka ka-2017 kuMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa. Ngokusho kweNews24, uMagashule uthe, nakuba amanye amalungu e-ANC engavumelananga nesinqumo sikaMkhwebane, kufanele bahloniphe ihhovisi lakhe."Umthetho we-ANC uthi siyazihlonipha izikhungo ezizimele. Singavumelana naye, noma siphikisane naye kuyefana. Abantu bathe kufanele siyeke (ukuhlasela) izinkantolo, isiShayamthetho kanye nezikhungo izizimele ukuze zenze umsebenzi wazo," kusho yena.UMagashule uthe kumele ahlonishwe uMvikeli woMphakathi. "Engingakusho esikhundleni se-ANC ukuthi kufanele sihloniphe leliya hhovisi, noma ngabe sinemibono yethu, ngoba kusasa uma sekukhona okwenzekayo, sizobe siyifundise thina iNingizimu Afrika ukungahloniphi lezi zikhungo. Kufanele sihambisane kulokhu,"kusho uMagashule.Ekhuluma ne-eNCA, uMagashule uxwayise amalungu e-ANC ngokugxeka ubuholi beqembu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UMagashule ubekhuluma ngeMeya yase-Ekurhuleni uMzwandile Masina, ogxeke isinqumo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ku-Twitter sokufaka uPravin Gordhan kwikhabhinethi yakhe."Sizoxoxisana nalawo malungu akhuluma enkundleni yokuxhumana uTwitter. Sizokhuluma nawo wonke umuntu, sithi kubona, kuphela la," kusho yena.
title: UMagashule uxwayisa amalungu e-ANC ahlasela uMkhwebane

text: SIBUSISO MDLALOSEU MGADLI weBanyana Banyana, uNoko “Beep Beep” Matlou, ongabizwanga esikwatini esizobhekana nelaseComoros emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-African Women Championship (AWC), ukholwa wukuthi isethubeni elihle lokuzibekisela indawo eNamibia ngo-Okthoba.IBanyana izobhekana neComoros namuhla ngo-2 ntambama.NgeSonto iBanyana idlale umdlalo wokuzwana amandla neGhana lapho yehlulwe khona ngo 1-0 eDobsonville Stadium, eSoweto. Umqeqeshi weBanyana, uVera Pauw, uthe wenelisekile ngendlela iqembu lakhe elidlale ngayo kanti noMatlou ubona kanjalo.“Indlela iBanyana edlale ngayo kule midlalo emibili yakamuva selokhu izintambo zokuqeqesha zithathwe wumqeqeshi uVera (Pauw) inginika ithemba lokuthi sizozibekisela indawo kwi-AWC eNamibia ngo-Okthoba. Iqembu likhombisa ukuhlangana nokuzwana, futhi kuyakhombisa ukuthi kuyothi kushaya u-Okthoba liyobe selingcono kakhulu kunalokhu,” kusho uMatlou.UMatlou ungomunye wabagadli beBanyana abangalibheki ipali njengoba emidlalweni engu-74 esehlohle amagoli angu-55. Uphinde waqopha umlando ngokuba ngumdlali webhola labesifazane wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika ukuhlabana ngomklomelo i-Caf Female Player of the Year ngo-2009.“Yize singaphumelelanga emdlalweni wethu neGhana ngeSonto kodwa kuyabonakala ukuzimisela nokuzinikela kubadlali. Indlela abadlale ngayo iyakhombisa ukuthi kukhona lapho esiya khona. NgoLwesihlanu (namuhla) kudingeka sithole iwini nakanjani ukuzenzela umsebenzi ube lula uma sesibuya ekhaya emlenzeni wesibili,” kusho uMatlou (28) ogijimela iUniversity of Johannesburg Ladies edlala kuSafa Sasol League.Umlenze wesibili uzodlalelwa eNingizimu Afrika emasontweni amabili ezayo. Iqembu elizodlula lapha liyobe selizibeka ethubeni lokuzibekisela indawo ku-AWC okuzobe kungeyokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba ezodlalelwa eCanada ngonyaka ozayo.Ebuzwa ngokubizwa kwabadlali abadala kuleli qembu, okubalwa kubo uPortia “Bashin” Modise, Simphiwe “Shorty” Dludlu noVeronica “Bhudu” Phewa, nokho ongekho ohlwini lwabadlali abangu-20 abazodlala neComoros namuhla, uphendule wathi: “Noma ngingeke ngaphawula kakhulu ngoVeronica ngoba kade ngagcina ukumbona edlala futhi angilazi neqembu alidlalelayo njengamanje kodwa angiliboni iphutha ngokubizwa kwabadlali abadala abanamava eqenjini lesizwe.”“Ngicabanga ukuthi iqembu lesizwe liyabadinga abadlali abanamava bahlanganiswe nalabo abasebancane, inqobo nje uma benza kahle emaqenjini abo abawadlalelayo,” kuphetha uMatlou othe yena usathintekile edolweni.
title: IBanyana izozibekisela indawo ku-AWC: Matlou

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEBAYAVEVA abazali bezingane zesikole esiseRichmond ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu, ngecala elibhekene nothishanhloko osolwa ngokudlwengulwa uthisha ehhovisi lakhe.Uthishomkhulu oneminyaka engu-35, ogama lakhe ligodliwe ukuvikela umgilwa njengoba besebenza naye, uvele enkantolo eRichmond ngoLwesithathu, ezofaka isicelo sebheyili. Umsolwa uboshwe ngeledlule, wavela okokuqala enkantolo ngoMsombuluko.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo osondelene necala ukuthi kusukela ngoJulayi 2 ngonyaka odlule, uthishanhloko ubezitika ngocansi nalo thisha emthembisa ukuthi uzomqasha.“Okuvelile ukuthi uthisha oyitoho ubethenjiswa umsebenzi nguthishanhloko. Ubemdlwengula ehhovisi lakhe, aphinde amcele ukuba amthumele izithombe zakhe enqunu,” kusho umthombo.Omunye umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe abazali nabesikole esithintekayo bayaveva ngemva kokuzwa lezi zinsolo.“Kushaqe wonke umuntu lokhu kwenzekile futhi abazali badiniwe. Bebefika ngamunye, ngamunye esikoleni bezobuza ukuthi kwenzakalani njengoba uthishanhloko engazange abonakale esikoleni selokhu aboshwa,” kusho omunye umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa ngenxa yobucayi becala.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uliqinisekisile icala lokudlwengula elibhekene nomsolwa.“Kunecala lokudlwengula elivulwe esiteshini esiseRichmond emuva kokuba owesifazane oneminyaka engu-29 eveze ukuthi wadlwengulwa ngoJulayi 2, 2020 umsolwa. Idokodo labe seliyiswa ophikweni oluphenya amacala okuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi e-Plessislaer, ukuze kuphenywe. Umsolwa oneminyaka engu-35 ube eseboshwa. Uvele okokuqala enkantolo ngoMsombuluko,” kusho uCap. Gwala.Icala lahlehliselwa izolo njengoba ubezofaka isicelo sebheyili. Umphumela wecala izolo ubungakatholakali njengoba idokodo lisagcinwe enkantolo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe bebengenalo ulwazi ngalesi sigameko kodwa bazolandelela.“Besingazi ngalesi sigameko. Sisazobheka imininingwane ngokwenzekile bese siphawula ngokugcwele,” kusho uMlotshwa.Isolezwe lithinte umgilwa kulolu daba, ucingo lakhe beluvaliwe. Imizamo yokuthola isigungo sabazali kulesi sikole esithintekayo ukuba siphawule ayizange iphumelele.
title: Uthishanhloko ecaleni lokudlwengula uthisha

text: MHLELI: Sekube kuningi ukuqagela ngekusasa lesizwe samaZulu, njengoba kuqeda kukhothama Isilo. Abanye bayazibuza ukuthi, ngabe ozohlala esihlalweni sobukhosi uyophatha kanjani, uma kuqhathaniswa neSilo esiqeda kukhothama? Abanye bathi Isilo besingenzi lutho ukuvikela umlando waKwaZulu nokubumba uZulu. Anginakuphawula-ke ngalokho. Engizophawula ngakho yilokhu kokuthi sekuzogcwanekela okuyizizwana ekubuseni kobuholi bomdabu. Nohulumeni usezongena agamanxe ekubuseni kwezomdabu. UCogta usuzongena uthi-shi ekulawuleni amakhosi nezinduna zomdabu kuleli. Phela ubuKhosi baKwaZulu yibona obuhlonishwa kakhulu kuleli uma uqhathanisa nezinye izizwe, futhi uhulumeni ubengahlomeki noma ikanjani kusabusa uBhejane phumes'qiwini. OMama beANC nalabo abazibiza ngezinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo abantu besifazane neWorld Health Organisation, sebezobanga umsindo ngamasiko athize; njengoMkhosi woMhlanga. Sebezoqala phansi bethi la masiko awukuhlukumeza abantu, ikakhulu abantu besifazane. Laba bantu abathi balwela amalungelo abantu, basazobunyakazisa ubuKhosi bukaZulu. Nokugxambukela kwepolitiki kuzokwanda.ObhalileSibahle Ngobese
title: Bubhekwe yizinselelo ubuKhosi bamaZulu

text: IPHINI lomqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uRulani Mokwena, liqininisekisa eyezinguquko ezinqala ezizokwenzeka eqenjini ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2018/2019.IPirates iqede isizini ka-2017/2018 isendaweni yesibili kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership. Icindeze ompetha iMamelodi Sundowns kwaze kwaba sekugcineni. Ithimba labaqeqeshi bePirates belizivalele esifubeni izifiso zalo ngoba belilokhu lithi lisazama ukwakha iqembu.Umqeqeshi, uMilutin “Micho”Sredojevic, uphumele obala sekuzophela isizini ngokuthi iqembu lesifinyelele ezingeni lokunqoba izindebe ngoba sebesakhile isisekelo esiqinile. EZimnyama zizohambisana neSundowns emqhudelwaneni iCAF Champions League ngesizini ezayo.UMokwena uthe zinkulu izinguquko ezizokwenzeka ngaphambi kokuthatha inya­thuko yeCAF. Kunenqwaba yabadlali asebevele bakhonjwa kwiPirates okukhona kubo uLinda Mntambo, no-Abel Mabaso abebekwiChippa United. UMeshack Maphangule weBlack Leopards kuthiwa usevumelene nePirates. Kubadlali okuthiwa bayashiya kukhona uThamsanqa Gabuza, Ayanda Gcaba, Thamsanqa Sangweni nabanye.“Isikwati sizoqina kakhulu. Sizoligcina iningi labadlali kodwa sizoqina kakhulu ngesizini ezayo. IChampions League iyeza ngakho kufanele sengeze abadlali, sithole nabanye abasezingeni eliphezulu. Sidinga ukwengeza okungenani zonke izindawo. Nasethimbeni labaqeqeshi kuzoba khona izinguquko,” kusho uMokwena.Maphakathi nesizini kusabalale amahlebezi okuthi uSimo Dladla, umqeqeshi weKings yaKwaZulu-Natal edlala kwiNational First Division (NFD), uzojoyina ithimba labaqeqeshi kwiPirates. Kumanje iphini lesibili likaMicho nguBenson Mhlongo owayengumdlali wePirates.Abadlali bePirates abebekade beqokelwe imiklomelo yePremie Soccer League (PSL) babuye belambatha. U-Innocent Maela ukhale ngaphansi kuSiyanda Xulu kowe-Absa Premiership Defender of The Season, kwathi uMusa Nyatama wahlulwa nguSiphesihle Ndlovu weMaritzburg United kowe-Absa Premiership Midfielder of The Season.UMicho ubengakufihlanga ukuthi uNyatama uyena okufanele akhale emuke nomklomelo womdlali ovelele, i-PSL Footballer of The Season, ogcine ugoduke noPercy Tau weSundowns.“Okubalulekile wukuqokwa kule miklomelo. Kodwa-ke abantu okubafanele ukuwina bawinile. Lokhu kuzosigqugquzela ukuthi sisebenze kanzima,” kuphetha uMokwena.
title: Ziyeza izinguquko eqenjini: Mokwena

text: KUYAQALA ngqa emlandweni wesizwe samaZulu ukuthi kukhothame uNdlunkulu ebe esesihlalweni sobukhosi, nokusho izinselelo eziningi kwabasele. Ungoti wezesintu uDkt V.V.O Mkhize, uthi kuningi okuba baphathisa ngekhanda eNdlunkulu njengamanje ngoba ubeyibamba bukhosi, eyiNdlovukazi eyalotsholwa yisizwe futhi kwayena ubesazilele iSilo saMabandla esikhotheme ngeyedlule.UMkhize uthe kusho ukuthi kumele nakanjani atshalwe njengeSilo samaBandla uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu, osanda kukhothama." UNdlunkulu umama wesizwe, ukukhothama kwakhe kuyahlonishwa isizwe sizile, kubekwe namageja phansi kungangenwa ensimini kuze kuba uyatshalwa. Kodwa esikhathini samanje kuzoya ngeNdlunkulu ukuthi izothatha ziphi izinqumo njengoba ebesehleli esihlalweni esikhulu. Indlunkulu nayo ibhekene nalesi simo okokuqala ngqa emlandweni wobukhosi besizwe samaZulu, nokuzokwenza babhekane nezinkulu izinselelo," kusho uMkhize.Eqhuba uthe uNdlunkulu uMantfombi i=ubewundlunkulu okhethekile njengoba alotsholwa yisizwe nokumenza ehluke kwabanye ondlunkulu esigodlweni. Ngokwesintu nguyena isizwe esilindele ukuthi asitholele neNkosi. Ngaphandle kwakho uthe ukhothama nje naye ubesemanzini kulandela ukukhothama kweSilo, nokungezinye zezinselelo ezizobhekana nendlunkulu ngoba kusamele kulungiswe ngokwesintu."Kunzima ukuphawula ngigxile ngezinto eziningi ezithinta indlunkulu kodwa kulokhu okwaziwayo njengokukhothama kweSilo bekusho ukuthi naye usazilile. Nakho lokho kusho ukuthi abendlunkulu basazobhekana nomsebenzi omkhulu. Ngokwesintu uma sekwenzeke kanje kuyaye kudinge ukuthi agezwe kuqala. Ngezinye zezinto ezenzeka okokuqala eziphonsela indlunkulu omkhulu umsebenzi," kuchaza uMkhize.Ephetha uthe okulindelekile esizweni ngalesi sikhathi ukuthoba kuzilwe, kulandelwe nemgomo yendlunkulu nokuzoyilekelela kakhlu ngalesi sikhathi kwazise kukhona nemithetho elawula abantu ngeCovid -19. Ilokhu ingene njalo imiyalezo yokuzwelana nendlunkulu yakaZulu, o ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kanti nabantu abahlukene nezikhulu zikahulumeni, sezidlulise amazwi enduduzo.
title: Okwenzekile kuyaqala ngqa ebukhosini bamaZulu

text: XOLILE MPISANEUBONGA uyanconcoza umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows, uMandla Ncikazi, njengoba leli qembu liqophe umlando liqeda endaweni yesine kwiDStv Premiership ka-2020/21 esongwe ngoMgqibelo.Abafana Bes’thende badlale ngokulingana ngo-0-0 neStellenbosch FC eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, baqeda isizini namaphuzu awu-47. Ngesizini edlule baphelela endaweni yesi-12 namaphuzu awu-34.“Umdlalo wokugcina neStellenbosch ubunzima kakhulu. Izitayela zethu zokudlala bezishayisana. Thina besilibamba ibhola futhi sizama ukushaya amagoli kodwa bekusobala ukuthi bona bebezele iphuzu. Bebezihlalele emuva bese bezama ukusizuma ngejubane, uma bethola ibhola,” kusho uNcikazi.“Bekulukhuni ukudiliza udonga abalwakhe emuva. Sizamile ukubahlasela ezinhlangothini, sazama nokudlala ibhola eliphezulu kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya. Ngingasho kodwa ukuthi sidlale kahle yize noma sigcine sihlulekile ukuthola igoli. Ngiyaziqhenya ngabadlali nangendlela abazinikele ngayo. Besinabadlali abawu-13 kuphela abebekulungele ukudlala, abanye sibafake belimele. Ngingabala uMakhubela (Ntsako), uSibisi (Nkosinathi), uMtshali (Lindokuhle) noMathiane (Matome).“Uma unabadlali abenza konke okusemandleni ukuthi bangene enkundleni noma bengeluleme kahle, kukhombisa ukuthi iqembu linekusasa elihle. Ngiyaziqhenya kakhulu ngala badlali. Ngifisa ukuthi leli qembu liqhubeke lidlondlobale.”Abafana Bes’thende bebedinga ukuthi bawunqobe umdlalo wokugcina ukuze bazibeke ethubeni elihle lokuqeda endaweni yesithathu, obekuzoholela ekutheni babeyingxenye yomqhudelwano weCaf Confederation Cup.Ukudlala kwabo ngokulingana kwenze bahluleka ukudlula i-Orlando Pirates, egcine inamaphuzu awu-50. Noma kunjalo uNcikazi uyaziqhenya ngokuthi bakwazile ukwephula irekhodi leqembu abalenza ngesizini ka-2008/09, beqeda endaweni yesihlanu namaphuzu awu-46, izintambo zisaphethwe nguManqoba Mngqithi.Okunye okumhlaba umxhwele uNcikazi ukubona abadlali bakhe bephakanyiswa ohlwini lwabadlali abebesethubeni lokuwina izindondo kumaPSL Awards, nokubona abanye bebizelwa emaqenjini esizwe.“Kuyangithokozisa ukuthi uSifiso (Mlungwana) usethubeni lokungena eqenjini lama-Olympics. Ngiyajabula ukuthi uSibisi (Nkosinathi) ubiziwe eqenjini lesizwe iBafana Bafana. Maningi amarekhodi esiwaphulile kule sizini. Kuningi kakhulu okuhle esikwenzile.“Sidumele ngokuthi siphucwe iqatha emlonyeni sekusele kancane siyodlala e-Afrika kodwa ngisaziqhenya. Ukuba kwakukhona owangibhulela kusaqala isizini, wangitshela ukuthi sizoqeda endaweni yesine ngangizojabula kabi. Angifuni ukungeneliseki ngesikwenzile njengoba isiphelile isizini.“Ngiyaziqhenya futhi ngozakwethu ebesisebenzisana nabo ukuthi sithuthukise leli qembu. Ngiyambonga nosihlalo (Mato Madlala) ngokungipha ithuba lokuqeqesha iqembu. Ngiyethemba ukuthi sikwazile ukumjabulisa,” kusonga uNcikazi.
title: UNcikazi uchazekile  ngokwenziwe yi-Arrows

text: OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uthi kumjabulise kakhulu ukuthi azibanga bikho izigameko ezishaqisayo ezenzekile ngaphambi kokhetho nangenkathi sekuvotwa ngoLwesithathu.UZuma izolo uvote eNkandla namakhosikazi akhe uNkk Thobeka KaMadiba, uNkk Bongekile MaNgema Zuma noNkk Sizakele maKhumalo Zuma eNtolwane Primary School, esigodini sakwaNxamalala.Ngesikhathi efika kulesi sikhungo sokuvota uZuma, abantu iningi labo ebeligqoke izikibha ze-ANC, bebemjabulela bethi ‘Zuma! Zuma! Zuma’ - wabaphakamisela isandla ebabingelela.Ngaphambi kokuthi akhulume nabezindaba uZuma uveze ukuthi uxinwe umkhuhlane wabe eseveza nokuthi akuyona imfihlo ukuthi uvotele i-ANC.“Ngijabule kakhulu ukuthi sengivotile endaweni yakithi, nginethemba lokuthi konke kuzohamba ngendlela, amaqembu amakhulu azoba phambili, amancane azolandela ngemuva njengenjwayelo. Okubhekwayo manje ukuthi alandela ngemuva kangakanani amaqembu amancane,” kusho uZuma.UZuma uthe ukwanda kwamaqembu angenela ukhetho kuyizithelo zokuphila ngaphansi kwentando yabantu. Uthe kumjabulisile ukuthi azibanga bikho izimpi ngaphambi kokhetho.“Abantu sebeyabona ukuthi akusiyona impi, intando yabantu bencintisana ngokuthi iliphi iqembu okufanele lihole. Ukuvota kubaluleki ngoba kufanele ufake ivoti lakho lapho owaziyo ukuthi kuzosetshenzwa kuthuthukiswe izwe,”  kusho uZuma.UZuma ube esesola amaqembu ngokungagxili ekutheni yini abafuna ukuyenzela abantu bakuleli, kulakho agxile kwiziqubulo ezihehayo kuphela.
title: #Ukhetho2019: ‘Amaqembu amancane azolandela ngemuva njengenjwayelo’ - Zuma

text:
UMREPHA obalwa nabaphambili kuleli usephumele obala wachitha izinsolo abekwe zona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngemuva kokuwa esteji ngesikhathi enandisa izolo ebusuku.Abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoMsombuluko ekuseni bazwakalise ukukhathazeka ngalo mrepha abanye besola ukuthi ubebanjwe yizidakamizwa noma ubephuze utshwala ngokweqile. U-Emtee nokho ukuchithile lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma ne-website yezokungcebeleka, iTshisaLive, wathi kungenzeka ukuthi uwiswe nguwaya obusesteji.“Ngiyaphila, ngiwumqemane. Ngiwile nje kuphela. Onogada engiphume nabo bebekhathazekile bangithatha saya ngemuva kwesiteji nabo. Isteji besisincane kakhulu ngakho bekumele ngiqaphele lapho enginyathela khona.
