Kungenzeka ukuthi ngiwiswe uwaya ngoba bengingeke ngiwe nje,” kusho u-EmteeUphume eseqashwe amaphoyisa umrepha u-Emtee owe esteji abecula kuso wangabe esakwazi ukuqhubeka. 
pic.twitter.com/kQMTxp0mEJ— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
July 9, 2018 U-Emtee uthe izinkulumo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngalesi sigameko azithi shu kuyena.Uqhube wagxeka osaziwayo abaphawule kulolu daba abanye babo abathe isitebele angaphansi kwaso kumele senze okuthize ngaye.“Laba bantu abangazi, abahlali nami futhi,” usho kanje.Omunye wosaziwayo othe ukhulume no-Emtee ekuseni, umrepha uReason, ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bamakhe, bangamdicileli phansi.“Ngikhulumile no-Emtee namhlanje ekuseni, lento ijulile kunalokho okukhulunywa abantu kutwitter. Kodwa ke, ngenxa yokuthi siyamthanda nomculo wakhe, kumele simakhe, singamdicileli phansi,” kusho uReason ephendula umlandeli obecela ukuthi akhulume no-Emtee.Umrepha osondelene naye futhi obekhona esteji ngesikhathi ewa, uSaudi, uthe abantu kumele bakhumbule ukuthi nabo njengamaciko babuye bakhathale.“Senike nakucabanga ukuthi u-Emtee iciko elichitha izinsuku emgwaqweni ngaphandle kokuphumula esebenzela umndeni wakhe futhi ejabulisa nina? Ungumuntu naye uyakhandleka kwezinye izikhathi ikakhulu ngezimpelasonto ezimatasa kumaciko,” usho kanje.To everyone who genuinely cares I’m sorry that you had to see that but iGOAT lethu is okay and we’re making it a serious priority to take better care of his health and even our own. ❤️🏧🙏🏿The 
@Ambitiouz_Ent Story Continues.— Msotra Man (@Saudi_rsa) 
July 8, 2018
title: 'Kungenzeka ukuthi ngiwiswe uwaya ngoba bengingeke ngiwe nje' - Emtee

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, usichithile isinqumo sikahulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal sokufaka ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli umasipala oholwa i-IFP, iNquthu.Lo masipala wafakwa ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli yiKhabhinethi yesifundazwe ngenyanga eyedlule, kanye noMasipala wesiFunda uMkhanyakude.Abaholi bomkhandlu waseNquthu basiphonsela inselelo isinqumo seKhabhinethi, bafaka isikhalazo kuDkt Dlamini-Zuma, baphinde balufaka enkantolo lolu daba.UDkt Dlamini-Zuma wabe esethumela ithimba elaliyophenya ngalezi zinsolo ezenziwe ngalo masipala, wabe esechitha isinqumo sokufakwa kwalo masipala ngaphansi komlawuli.Isinqumo sokufaka lo masipala ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli seza emva kwezinyanga lo masipala ubhekene ngeziqu zamehlo noMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisa kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu esifundazweni, ngomhlangano owaqoka imeya yalo masipala, uMnuz Zama Shabalala.Obekubangwa ukuthi uShabalala wakhethwa emhlanganweni ongekho emthethweni njengoba umhlangano agaxwa kuwo amaketango obumeya, wabanjwa ngesikhathi lapho imihlangano yezepolitiki ingavumelekile.Kusalindelwe isinqumo seNkantolo ePhakeme yaseMgungundlovu ngalolu daba, njengoba lafakwa enkantolo. Uhulumeni wasifundazwe waphinde wenza izinsolo zokungaphathwa ngendlela kwalo masipala.UMasipala waseNquthu uthe isinqumo sikaDkt Dlamini-Zuma sikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi ubusukelwa.Okhulumela i-IFP, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe uhulumeni wesifundazwe wawuvele udlala ipolitiki ngokufaka lo masipala ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli.“Sekuneminyaka iKhabhinethi yesifundazwe iphazamisa ukusebenza komasipala abangaphansi kwe-IFP, ngokuthi libafake ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli ngaphandle kwesizathu.Uthe uhulumeni wesifundazwe wazama ukuhlithwa lo masipala kwi-IFP ngo-2017, ngesikhathi uhulumeni wesifundazwe uthatha isinqumo sokuwuhlakaza.“Kepha imizamo yabo ayiphumelelanga njengoba i-IFP yaphinde yazidlela amahlanga ngesikhathi kuqalwa phansi ukhetho.”UHlengwa uthe bayabethemba ubuholi obukhona njengamanje kulo masipala, wathi abakhathazekile nakancane ngokuphathwa kwawo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nonala Ndlovu, unqabile ukuphawula ngezinsolo ezenziwa i-IFP.“Angeke siphawule ngezinsolo ezingenasisekelo.”Uthe bese bazisiwe ukuthi isinqumo sokufaka umasipala ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli, sichithiwe.
title: Sichithiwe esokufakwa kweNquthu ngaphansi komlawuli

text: AKAWUVALI umlomo, umqeqeshi uClinton Larsen, ngokuzinikela kwiLamontville Golden Arrows nenhlonipho kuKudakwashe Mahachi ozobe edlala okokugcina ngoMgqibelo kuBafana Bes’thende ngaphambi kokuthi ayoqhubeka nempilo yakhe kwi-Orlando Pirates.NgokukaLarsen uMahachi, odabuka eZimbabwe, uzobonakala kulo mdlalo yize engakazi ukuthi uzowuqala noma uzochibiyela ngaye yini. NgoJanuwari uMahachi utshele Isolezwe ukuthi nakuba eyithanda i-Arrows nakho konke emenzele khona ubengeke aliyeke ithuba lokuya kwiPirates ngoba ufunwa uRulani Mokwena oyiphini lomqeqeshi kweZimnyama.Nakuba engafuni ukuphumela obala ngokuthi uya kuphi uMahachi, uLarsen uyavuma ukuthi uyahamba futhi akumphethe kahle lokho ngoba ubengumdlali athembele kuyena.“Kubi nje ngoba uke wahlala isikhathi engadlali kule sizini kodwa ngijabule ukuthi uzolithola ithuba lokuvalelisa ngendlela efanele. Uyahlonipha uMahachi futhi ukuzinikela kwakhe, ngabe isemdlalweni kumbe ejimini, bekungangabazeki. Naye ubazi ukuthi uyena engimbiza kuqala esikimini sami. Uma sekufike isikhahti sokuthi umdlali akhule noma ashintshe umoya, siyiqembu elingami endleleni yakhe,” kusho uLarsen.Lo mqeqeshi ukhuluma kanjena nje, umatasa namalungiselelo omdlalo wokuvala isizini neMaritzburg United ngoMqibelo ngo-3 ntambama, eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.“Ngesikhathi kuqala isizini besizibekele umgomo wokuthi siqede kwiTop 8 kumnyama kubomvu. SikwiTop 8 manje ngakho-ke ubumqoka bokuthola umphumela oncomekayo lapha abuchazeki. Okuhle ngayo yonke le nto ukuthi akekho esithembele kuyena ukuthi asenzele umsebenzi kepha konke kusezandleni zethu. Akekho ongazi ukuthi iMaritzburg inzima kanjani eHarry Gwala. Kuhluleke amaqembu ahlonishwa i-Afrika yonke ukuwina kuleya nkundla ngakho-ke siyakwazi esizokufica futhi sikulungele konke,” kusho uLarsen.Ebuzwa ngokuthi ukucabanga ngefayineli yeNedabank Cup kwiMaritzburg kungaba usizo yini kubona uLarsen uthe: “Iningi labo abafana abancane ngakho ngeke ulindele ukuthi bacabange okuningi ngaphandle kwalo mdlalo abazobe bebhekene nawo. Lokhu kungaba usizo kubona kodwa futhi ngoba unobhutshuzwayo unjalo, kungaba usizo nakithina. Kuzoba umdlalo onzima kithina kodwa nathi izinga lokuzethemba likhulu ekhempini kwazise sisemgqigqweni omuhle wokunqoba imidlalo njengoba senzile kwemibili edlule.”
title: Uzovalelisa ngowabakhaya umdlali okhonjwa kwiPirates

text: MBALI KHANYILEOWESIFAZANE owaqoka ukushiya umsebenzi ayeqashelwe wona wavula ibhizinisi lokuhlobisa, uthi ukuthanda indlu enengaphakathi elibukekayo yikho okwaholela ekutheni angene kulo mkhakha osekuphele iminyaka emine ekuwo.UNksz Thando Sibisi (32) weYellow Couch Concepts enamahhovisi eThekwini nehlobisa ingaphathi lendlu ephinde yakhe ifenisha yasendlini, uthe akazisoli ngokuthatha isinqumo sokushiya kumasipala ayeqashwe kuwo njengoba ibhizinisi lakhe libukeka lidlondlobala futhi enza umsebenzi obesekuneminyaka ephupha ngawo.Uthe okumchaza ngomsebenzi wakhe ngukuthi udinga ukuthi axukuzise umqondo ngezinhlobo ezahlukene zefenisha okumele ayikhande kanjalo nezindlela ezintsha zokuhlobisa ingaphakathi lendlu ngezitayela ezisuke zingenisile.“Lo msebenzi udinga ube nesikhathi futhi uphinde ube ngumuntu onobuchule nonobuhlakani njengoba uxukuzisana umqondo. Ukubona ozakwethu abakhombisa ubuhlakani ngezitayela zesimanjemanje ngezinye zezinto ezingigqugquzelayo ekutheni ngisebenze ngokuzinikela ngaso sonke isikhathi,” kusho uNksz Sibisi.Eqhuba uthe amakhasi ezinkundla zokuxhumana ngezinye zezinto ezimgqugquzelayo zimnike amacebo amasha ezindlela zokukhanda ifenisha njengoba ebukela kuzona izinhlobo ezingenisile zezimpahla zazendlini.“Kulo nyaka kube nezingqinamba ezilinqandile ibhizinisi ukuthi likhule liphinde lisabalale ngendlela ebesihlele ngayo njengoba kuphoqeleke ukuthi sishiye indawo obekuzinze kuyo ihhovisi, sayosebenzela ekhaya ngenxa yezimo zemali ezisixakazisile. Yize sidlule kulobo bunzima ngiyakholwa ukuthi okwenzekile kusivule umqondo ekutheni siphinde sigxile nasekusebenziseni izinkundla zokuxhumana uma sidayisa izimpahla zethu kanjalo noma sikhangisa ngomsebenzi esiwenzayo. Lokho ngingakubeka kucace ukuthi kusivule amehlo ukuhlasela kweCovid-19,” kubeka  uNksz Sibisi.Uthe yize engakujabulelanga ukusuka lapho ababesebenzela khona kodwa bakwazile ukugcina sebekwamukelile ukushintsha kwesimo sokusebenzela ekhaya  njengoba bebecabanga ukuthi bazothwala kanzima kumakhasimende ababecabanga ukuthi azokhononda ngokushintsha kwabo indawo.
title: Akazisoli ngokulandela iphupho lakhe owashiya umsebenzi

text: UKUPHIKWA wumlando kwe-Uruguay emidlalweni yokuvula kwiNdebe yoMhlaba kungasho ukuthi maningi amathuba okuth i-Egypt iwuqale kahle lo mqhudelwano ingavuli ngesibhaxu zibekwa nje.Umdlalo wokuqala wala maqembu uzoba seRussia namhlanje, eCentral Stadium Yekaterinburg, ngo-2 ntambama. Ngokomlando, sekuphele iminyaka engu-48 i-Uruguay ihluleka ukunqoba umdlalo wayo wokuqala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Ezika-Oscar Tabarez zagcina ukunqoba umdlalo wokuvula ngo-1970 kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eyayiseMexico. Kulo mqhudelwano owawunamazwe awu-16,i-Uruguay yayikuPot 2 neBrazil, Israel neSweden.Umdlalo wokuvula ne-Israel yawunqoba ngo 2-0. Kusuka lapho kuze kube namuhla,i-Uruguay iyehluleka ukunqoba umdlalo wayo wokuvula nakuba kungasho ukuthi igcina iphume kusesekuseni njengoba yenze kahle eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2010 ifika kowandulela owamanqamu.Namuhla i-Uruguay izobhekana nezikaFaro okungacaci kahle ngokululama kwesihlabani sazo, uMohamed Salah, owalimala kowamanqamu kwi-Uefa Champions League ngesikhathi ezakhe iLiverpool zishukana neReal Madrid, eKyiv. Kulo mdlalo, uSalah akaqedanga ngisho imizuzu engu-30, waphuma ngenxa yokulimala ehlombe, ngemuva kokubanjwa isitobha seReal Madrid, uSergio Ramos.Uma kungenzeka agcine ngokuthi engadlali uSalah namuhla, uHector Cuper ocija i-Egypt, angasebenzisa oyedwa phakathi kukaMahmoud Trezeguet noRamadan Sobhi nabo abakwaziyo ukuhlukumeza izitobha.“Sinethemba lokuthi sizokwazi ukudlala ngaphandle kukaSalah uma egcina engakwazanga ukudlala lo mdlalo. Yebo yena ubalulekile kodwa uma engekho sizodlalisa omunye ozokwenza okufanayo. Ukulimala kwabadlali kuhleze kwenzeka ebholeni, akukho okusha,” kusho uCuper ocija i-Egypt eyagcina ukudlala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-1990.
title: I-Egypt isibambelele eshweni le-Uruguay

text: Umculi ongaconsi phansi ngenxa yamanoni ezingoma zakhe, usolwa ngokunqaba ukukhokhela izindleko zemoto “yobe yintombi yakhe” okuthiwa uyishayisile ngesikhathi imboleke yona.Kuthiwa uMnqobi Yazo, usolwa ngobe yisinqandamathe sakhe uNondu Ngcobo, futhi sithi asisazi ukuthi kumele senze njani ukuze umculi akhokhele izindleko zokushayiswa kwemoto yaso.Umthombo weSolezwe ngeSonto  osondelene nowesifazane, uthe uNondu uphatheke kabi ngesenzo sikaYazo futhi ufuna usizo ngoba kuthiwa akayingeni umculi indaba yokulungisa imoto.“ UNondu usefuna noma yiluphi usizo ukuthi uMnqobi Yazo agcine ekhokhe izindleko zokukhanda imoto yakhe. Ubemboleke imoto ngonyaka odlule, wayishayisa yalimala yaphela. Lesi senzo sikaYazo sidale ukuthi izinto zingahambi kahle phakathi kwabo, baze bathatha nesinqumo sokuhlukana. Bebehlala ndawonye emzini kaReggie Nkabinde, ongumphathi weMabala Noise, esayine uMnqobi Yazo,” kusho umthombo.Ethintwa uNondu ngalolu daba uqale wathembisa ukuthi uzobuye afone ngenxa yokuthi ubambeke emihlanganweni embalwa. Emyalezweni athunyelelwe, uphendule ngokucela ukuthi udaba luxoxwe noYazo ukuze kutholakale lonke ulwazi ngalo.Kuthintwa uYazo uvele wahleka, akangaphika futhi akangavuma lutho.“ Nkabi yami bengithi njengoba ungithinta nje, uzongitshela ukuthi mhlawumbe kunendondo engiyiwinile. Akukho engingakusho ngaphandle kokuthi ukuphuma ephepheni kusho udumo kumina njengomculi. Noma ngabe kuthiwani ngami lokho kusho udumo ungabhala noma yikuphi. Okunye engingakusho ukuthi angiyena umuntu othanda ukudalula izindaba zami esidlangalaleni,” kusho uYazo.Kuthiwa umculi ubehlala noNondu emzini kaNkabinde oseFourways, eGoli.
title: UMnqobi Yazo usolwa ngokugoloza ukukhokhela imoto yentombi

text: USIHLALO we-ANC uMnuz Gwede Mantashe usekuqinisekisile ukuthi ubuholi obuphezulu bale nhlangano sebugunyazwe ukuba buxoxe noMengameli Jacob Zuma ngekusasa lakhe kwesokwengamela izwe. Uthe bagunyazwe ukuba bayoxoxa noZuma bese bebheka okuzoba nomthelela omuhle kuye kanjalo naseqenjini.“Asithunyelwanga ukuyoxosha uZuma. Inhloso ukuthola izindlela zokuthi uma iPhalamende liphakamisa ukungabethembi ubuholi bakhe, kuzokwenzekani. Kuphinde kube umbuzo kuthi kuzokwenzekani uma iPhalamende livotela ukuthi esule esikhundleni? Okunye, kuzokwenzekani uma ecela ukuzisulela ngokuthula?”UMantashe uthe uzokhethiswa uZuma bese kudingidwa. UNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule nePhini lakhe uNksz Jessie Duarte bakubeke kwacaca ukuthi uZuma akayi ndawo, kufanele aqedele ihlandla lakhe ngo-2019.Ukuphawula kukaMantashe kuqinisekisa ukuthi kunabathize abebezokhombisa ukuthi abasabethembi ubuholi bukaZuma bese bemnxusa ukuba ehle esikhundleni.
title: UMantashe uqinisa eyezingxoxo noZuma

text:
USOMABHIZINISI uMnuz Khulubuse Zuma usevumile ukukhokha imali enguR23 million wamademeshe kwabePamodzi and Aurora Liquidators. Lolu daba bese ludonse iminyaka eyisithupha enkantolo ngokusho kwenyunyana iSolidarity izolo.Lokhu kulandela ngemuva kokuthi uZuma 
(osesithombeni), ongumshana kaMengameli Jacob Zuma, nabaqondisi be- Aurora Empowerment Systems nyakenye batholwa benecala lokungawenzi kahle umsebenzi okuyinto eyadala kwaba namademeshe ka-R1.7 billion.UZuma usolwa ngokungawenzi ngendlela umsebenzi wokuba ngumqondisi ngesikhathi inkampani i-Aurora isengamele imayini iPamodzi Gold East Rands okuyinto eyaholela ekulahlekeni kwendathane yomsebenzi, izinkulungwane zabasebenzi zalahlekelwa wumsebenzi.Unobhala jikelele weSolidarity, uMnuz Gideon du Plessis, uthe uZuma ubezolahlekelwa ngokuningi ukube ubenqaba ukuyikhokha le mali. Ubengase alahlekelwe wumuzi wakhe kanokusho obiza imali elinganiselwa ku-R2 million, izimoto zakhe nebhizinisi.“UKhulubuse kufanele anconywe ngokuvuma kwakhe ukukhokha le mali ngoba ukube ubengakhokhi ubezolahlekelwa kakhulu. Uyakuqonda ukuthi akusho ukuthi usevuma iphutha kodwa uyazi ukuthi ugwema okuningi," kusho uDu Plessis.UDu Plessis uthe uZuma usevele uqalile ukukhokha imali engu-R5 million manje sekufanele aqedele ngo-R500 000 lungakapheli usuku lokusebenza lwanamuhla.“Uma kungenjalo, engakwazanga ukuyikhokha yonke, kuzofanele akhokhe ngamancozu u-R16 million njalo ngenyanga kuze kuphelele lo R500,000 bese kuthi u-R2 million oyisitolimende sokugcina awukhokhe ngamancozu o-R100 000 njalo ngenyanga kuze kuhlangane lo R23 million,” kusho uDu Plessis.UDu Plessis uthe izingxoxo phakathi kwabathintekayo zaqala ezinyangeni ezimbili ezedlule, zaphothulwa ngesonto eledlule.Isicelo esasifakwe nguZuma nabaqondisi abayisihlanu benkampani i-Aurora sokudlulisa isinqumo seNkantolo eNkulu esasithi kumele bakhokhe amademeshe kaR1.7 billion sachithwa eNkantolo ePhakeme yokwedlulisa amacala eBloemfontein ngoMeyi.“UZuma uselethe incwadi efungelwe enkantolo ehambisana nesivumelwano esifungelwe sokuthi uzokhokha. Ngo-Okthoba 25 lolu daba luzolalelwa enkantolo," kusho uDu Plessis.UDu Plessis unxuse labo ababesebenza kule nkampani i-Aurora abebengangazibhalisele izimali zesinxephezelo ukuba bakwenze lokho ngokushesha njengoba ama-Creditors ezokuba nomhlangano maduze nje ezama ukuthola ukuthi bazokhokhelwa kanjani ababhalisile."Abasebenzi sebezothola ingxenye yemali eyasalayo ezoqhamuka kuZuma njengoba ezodayisa izimpahla ezithile (zomndeni) wakwaBhana," kusho uDu Plessis."Anginaso isiqiniseko sokuthi ngabe abasebenzi bazothola R28 000 ogcwele yini njengokubhalwe kwi-Insolvency Act. Anginaso futhi nesiqiniseko sokuthi ikhona yini imali abayikhokhelwa ngemuva kwalowo R28 000 umsebenzi ngamunye," kuchaza uDu Plessis.UMnuz John Walker, ongummeli wabePamodzi Gold and Aurora, uthe zonke izicelo ezilethiwe zizocutshungulwa."Bonke abakweletwayo, kuhlanganisa nabasebenzi, kuzodingeka balethe ubufakazi bokuthi kufanele bakhokhelwe. Uma sekutholakale bonke ubufakazi, imali izobe isicazelwa bonke abafake izicelo zaphumelela, kusetshenziswa umthetho i-Insolvency Act," kuphetha uWalker.Imizamo yokuthola okhulumela uZuma, uMnuz Vuyo Mkhize, ihlulekile. – African News Agency (ANA)
title: UKhulubuse uthi uzowukhokha uR23m

text: ABAHLAZIYI bezomnotho bathi akumangazi ukunyuka kwezibalo zabangasebenzi kuleli.Ongoti bathe kuzothatha izwe iminyaka ebalelwa kwemine ukuba likwazi ukunciphisa izibalo zabangasebenzi.Ngokwezibalo zeQaurterly Labour Force Survey, ezikhishwe yiStats SA, isibalo sabangasebenzi senyuke ngendlela exakile safinyelela ku-32.6% ekoteni yokuqala ka-2021.Lesi yisibalo esiphezulu ukunazo zonke ezake zabikwa. Lo mbiko ukhombise ukuthi izibalo zabangasebenzi zikhule ngo-8 000 uma kuqhathaniswa nekota eyedlule, zafinyelela ku-7.2 million. Embikwni kuvela ukuthi abashayeke kakhulu ngamathuba emsebenzi yintsha engu-63% eneminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 no-24 ingasebenzi, abangu-41% ngabaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-25 no-34 abangasebenzi.Siphezulu kakhulu isibalo sabamnyama abangasebenzi, uma siqhathaniswa nezinye izinhlanga njengoba sikhule safinyelela ku-36.7% kule kota.Abesifazane abamnyama yibona abaningi kwabangasebenzi njengoba bengu-38.3%.Ngokombiko izimboni ezilahlekelwe ngamathuba emisebenzi eminingi, ngezokwakha, ezokuhweba nemikhakha yasezindlini.Imikhakha okukhule kuyo amathuba emisebenzi kubalwa kwezezimali, ezenhlalakahle, ezimayini nezokukhiqiza.Ongoti bezomnotho bathe bekuvele kulindelekile ukuthi lezi zibalo zikhule njengoba izwe lisabhekene nomthelela ongemuhle wokubheduka kobhubhane iCorona okube nalo emnothweni.Umhlaziyi wezomnotho, uMnuz Johannes Khoza, uthe nakuba umnotho wakuleli wubuvele untengantenga ngaphambi kokuthi kubheduke ubhubhane kodwa umvalelandlini ushaye kwazwela ezinkampanini eziningi.“Kuphazamisekile ukusebenza kwezinkampani futhi izinkampani eziningi zisaxhugela. Nakuba isimo somnotho sesithanda ukuba ngcono kodwa izinkampani eziningi azikajahi ukuqasha. Njengamanje zisagxile ekutheni zibuyele esemweni.”UKhoza uthe kuzothatha iminyaka ebalelwa kwemine ukuba izwe liphinde libuyele esimweni ebelikuso ngaphambi kokubheduka kweCorona.Esinye isazi sezomnotho, uDkt Samuel Koma, sithe baningi kakhulu abantu abalahlekelwe yimisebenzi emva kokubheduka kweCorona.“Thina kasifani namanye amazwe afana noMelika, wona akwazi ukufaka izimali ezishisiwe ukuze abantu bangalahlekelwa yimisebenzi. Kithina esiyizwe elisathuthukayo, bekulindelekile ukuthi abantu balahlekelwe yimisebenzi.”Izinyunyana zabasebenzi nazo zithe lezi zibalo bezivele zilindelekile.Okhulumela umfelandawonye wezinyunyana iCosatu, uMnuz Sizwe Pamla, uthe lezi zibalo zikhombisa ngokusobala umthelela ongemuhle wokubheduka kweCorona, okube nawo emnothweni wakuleli.UPamla unxenxe uhulumeni ukuba uvule amathuba okukhula ezinkampanini ezincane, khona kuzodaleka amathuba emisebenzi.Uthe njengamanje umnotho wakuleli usezandleni zedlanzana, okukwenza kube nzima ezinkampanini ezincane ukuba zikhule.Unobhala jikelele womfelandawonye wezinyunyana, iSaftu, uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi, uthe leli lizwe akukho eselikwenzile ukuzama ukuguqula umnotho selokhu lathola inkululeko.UVavi uthe okwenza izibalo zinyuke kakhulu wukuvalwa kwezimboni  nezemfundo, athe zivalela ngaphandle izigidi zabafundi.
title: Akumangazi ukukhula kwezibalo zabangasebenzi- ongoti

text: USESHAYA ingwiji khwebu unina womfundi ka-Grade 6 wasesikoleni (esiligodlile igama laso) eMthwalume, okwakusolwa ukuthi udlwengulwe, wakhuleliswa yiphoyisa eliyisihlobo.Emasontweni amabili edlule Isolezwe ngeSonto libike ngezinsolo zikanina womfundi ezithi leli phoyisa layengela emzini walo lo mfundi ona-13, lamdlwengula ebusuku elele.Ngesikhathi likhuluma nonina walo mfundi ngoLwesihlanu ubesecula elinye iculo.Uveze ukuthi ngemuva kokungenelela kosonhlalakahle nabomthetho kulolu daba, lo mfundi ugonyuluke kuye ukuthi leli phoyisa alimdlwengulanga lagcina ngokumqabula.Ekhuluma phambilini unina wengane wasiqinisekisa isigameko wathi kodwa akazimisele ngokuvula icala, ufuna umqhoyiso.Ebuzwa ngomqhoyiso uthe leli phoyisa ngeke lisawukhokha ngoba sekuvelile ukuthi aliyenzanga lutho ingane yakhe layiqabula nje kuphela.“Uzowukhokhelani umqhoyiso engalalanga nengane yami? Ingane ithi yethuka isiphaphama eyiqabula njengoba yayingakaze iqatshulwe umuntu wesilisa,” kusho unina womfundi.Phambilini wayethe ingane isazobuyela emtholampilo iyohlolisiswa ukuthi ikhulelwe ngempela kodwa kulokhu uthe akazi ukuthi ingane ikhulelwe.Uthe emuva kokuthi indodakazi yakhe iveze ukuthi ayidlwengulwanga, wabe eseyipopola ngoba engasazi ukuthi akholwe kuphi.“Ngayifica isagcwele mfi, kubonakala neqhwa leli elibakhona uma umuntu eseyintombi,” kusho yena.Phambilini wathi leli phoyisa lazifikela mathupha kwakhe lizoxolisa ngesenzo salo lamncenga ukuthi angalivuli icala, lizokhokha amademeshe.Kamuva uthe leli phoyisa limtshele ukuthi lalithi lizokhokha ngoba lisaba ukuthi izinsolo elalibhekene nazo zazinzima, lalingangena enkingeni nasemsebenzini walo.“Uthe wayethukile, akakaze ayidlwengule ingane yami kodwa wathi uzokhokha ngoba engafuni kusabalale lezi zinsolo ezizomenza umuntu omubi emphakathini,” kusho unina womfundi.Ekhunjuzwa ngokwashiwo okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuthi angahle abhekane nengalo yomthetho uma kuwukuthi uyalifihla leli cala uthe, akanandaba.“Uma kumele ngiboshwe, angiboshwe. Abantu bayaboshwa baphume bephila. Kwasekuqaleni ngasho ngathi ngeke ngivule cala le nto engingayazi. Angiphiki ngasho ukuthi udlwenguliwe ngoba wayengitshele kanjalo. Angisafuni ukuyikhuluma le ndaba, ngiyazigulela mina,” kusho unina womfundi.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Ncumisa Ndelu, uthe lolu daba selungenelelwe nayithimba labo lezomthetho ngendlela elibucayi ngalo.“Okwamanje ngeke ngikwazi ukudalula okuningi ngoba udaba oluthinta ingane. Engingakusho ukuthi ekugcineni lo mntwana uzobuthola ubulungiswa,” kusho uNkk Ndelu.
title: Ushaya ingwiji unina womfundi ‘owadlwengulwa’ yiphoyisa

text: KUZOTSHALWA amaphoyisa angu-2557 emcimbini wokugcotshwa kukaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa enkundleni yemidlalo iLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, izolo evakashele le nkundla eyohlola isimo wakhuluma namaphoyisa ngalo mcimbi ozobe uhanjelwe ngabanye omengameli kusasa.UCele unxuse amaphoyisa ukuthi aphathe ngendlela abantu, asize abadinga usizo.“Babalelwa ku-40 abaholi bamazwe abalindeleke kulo mcimbi omkhulu. Umcimbi owenzeka kanye eminyakeni emihlanu, ngakho udonsa amehlo, uhanjelwe ngabantu abaningi,” kusho uCele.Kulo mcimbi kulindeleke abantu abangu-34 000, abangu-10 000 baseGauteng nabangu-22 000 abaqhamuka kwezinye izifundazwe.Kumenywe izicukuthwane ezingu-2 000 eziqhamuka emkhakheni ehlukene.Lo mcimbi kulindeleke udle ngaphansi kukaR150 million uma uqhathanisa noR240 million owasebenza kugcotshwa owayenguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Kulindeleke amabhasi angaphezulu kuka-200 azobe ethutha abantu ebayisa enkundleni.Amasango azovulwa ngo-3 ekuseni. Abantu bayanxuswa ukuthi basheshe bafike.Akekho umuntu ozovunyelwa ukungena enkundleni uma ebukhile, kanjalo nalabo abazobe bephethe izinto eziyingozi ngeke bangene.Khonamanjalo KwaZulu-Natal kuzoba nezindawo lapho kuzobe kubukwa khona umcimbi kamengameli.I-GCIS esifundazweni ihlele izindawo eziyisishiyagalombili okuzobukwa kuzo lo mcimbi.Lezi zindawo ziseThekwini, uGu, eMgungundlovu, Amajuba, Mzinyathi, Zululand, iLembe nasoThukela.Kuzobekwa obhazabhaza bama-screens abazoqala ukukhombisa okuzobe kwenzeka eLoftus ngo-8 kuze kube * -2 ntambama.Ezinye zezikhungo okuzobe kubukwa bukhoma umcimbi iseMsinga High, Siyamukela High eNewcastle, ejele iNew Prison eMgungundlovu, Vukuzakhe High eMlaza, Our Lady of the Rosary esifundeni iLembe, Enkanyezi Special School oThukela, Gamalakhe TVET eRay Nkonyeni naseNkamane High eBaqulusini.
title: Kuzoqiniswa ukuphepha kugcotshwa umengameli

text: UMBHALI wezindatshana ezimfushane uSibongile Fisher, uthi abantu mabapheze ukusola izalukazi ngokuthakatha ngoba zisuke ziphethwe yizifo zengqondo abale kuzo o-alzheimers no-dementia, okuyizifo ezenza umuntu akhohlwe yizinto ezithile.USibongile utshele Isolezwe ukuthi incwadi yakhe ethi A Door Ajar ikhuluma ngabesifazane abanesibindi abasolwa ngokuthakatha.“Isikhathi esiningi emalokishini nasemakhaya asiziqondi izifo zengqondo. Uma umuntu omdala esekhuluma yedwa noma kungathi unokukhohlwa, kuvelwe kuthiwe uyathakatha. Abantu bazofunda kabanzi ngalezi zifo uma befunda indatshana yami,” kusho uSibongile.Uthe umqondo wokubhala ngobuthakathi nezifo zengqondo wawuthola emuva kokuxoxa nowesilisa othile emtshela ukuthi kunesonto lasebusuku elihanjwa ngabesifazane kuphela.“Ngesikhathi exoxa ngesonto lasebusuku ngazicabangela mina ukuthi kwenzekani kulelo sonto ngase ngibhala le ndaba ekhuluma ngabesifazaneabanesibindi. Kuyishwa ukuthi thina njengesizwe esimnyama asizimisele ukufunda ngezifo zengqondo. Kudala, umuntu uma enengcindezi bekuthiwa uyavilapha kodwa siyabona kancane ukuthi abantu sebeyayiqonda le nto,” kusho uSibongile.Le ntokazi yaseGoli ibiyingxenye yababhali abagqugquzela intsha ukuthi ibhale ngezindaba zaseNingizimu Afrika futhi ingasabi ukubhala ngezilimi zomdabu.Bekukhona nomdidiyeli wamafilimu * -Anant Singh nesikhulu seKZN Film Commission, uNksz Jackie Motsepe.UNksz Motsepe uthe lukhona uxhaso kubadidiyeli bamafilimu esiZulu, azokwenzelwa KwaZulu-Natal futhi kuqashwe nabantu bakuleli.“Abadidiyeli bamafilimu kufanele beze emahhovisi ethu ngoba sinezinhlelo zokuxhasa abenza amafilimu esiZulu futhi sibathuthukisa amakhono senze isiqiniseko sokuthi baxhunyaniswa nomakadebona kwezamafilimu,” kusho uNksz Motsepe.Uthe banawo namakilasi e-script writing nokunye okudingwa ngabantu abasemkhakheni wamafilimu.
title: Incwadi ngababulawelwa 'ukuthakatha'

text: UMARC Van Heerden, oyisitobha saMaZulu FC, ushaya phansi ngonyawo uthi iKaizer Chiefs, abazotholana nayo phezulu eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, ngo7.30 kusihlwa, ngeke iwathole amaphuzu aphelele.UVan Heerden uthe lisuke linenhlanhla iqembu eliphuma eKing Zwelithini Stadium, abangakaze bashaywe kuyo selokhu kuqale isizini, nephuzu.Kuyo le nkundla Usuthu lubhincisele nxanye iMamelodi Sundowns luyibamba ngo 3-3 ne-Orlando Pirates ngo 1-1.Nakuba sekuphele iminyaka ewu-12 Usuthu lwagcina ukushaya iChiefs kodwa uVan Heerden uthi akuyi olubuyayo eMlaza, Amakhosi azohamba kabi kulokhu.“Irekhodi lethu ekhaya liyasho ukuthi noma ngabe yiliphi iqembu elizodlala nathi eMlaza lithwala kanzima. Senzela izitha zethu kube nzima ukudlala umathanda uma sidlala ekhaya. Asifuni qembu elizozicanasela lapha. Ngokwami iqembu eliphuma nephuzu eMlaza lisuke linenhlanhla. Empeleni uma ubuka wonke amaqembu emhlabeni jikelele ikakhulukazi e-Europe awashaywa kalula ekhaya. Yingakho ngithi ofuna ukusishayela ekhaya, kuyofanele asebenze kanzima,” usho kanje uVan Heerden izolo.Eqhubeka enaba uVan Heerden, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi kube khona abakutholayo emdlalweni wabo neZimpofana ngoba abafuni ukubuyela emsileni we-log abahlale kuwona isikhathi eside ngemuva kokuphucwa yiFifa amaphuzu ayisithupha.“Sifuna ukuvula igebe phakathi kwethu namaqembu avika izembe. Yingakho kubalulekile ukuthi kube khona esikutholayo emdlalweni wethu neChiefs. Umqeqeshi wethu udlala ibhola elivulekile, engikholelwa ekutheni sizozama ukuwathola wonke amaphuzu kwiChiefs kodwa nxa sibona ukuthi isimo somdlalo asivumi, sizoqinisekisa ukuthi sithola iphuzu. Enginesiqinisekiso sakho wukuthi ngeke kwenzeke ukuthi sishaywe, lokho ngeke kwenzeke,” kusho uVan Heerden.Okhulumela AmaZulu, uBrilliant Mkhathini, unxuse abalandeli abafuna ukubukela lumdlalo mahlanze ukuthi bangalinge balindele ukuthi bazothenga amathikithi enkundleni ngoba azobe engekho. Uthe amathikithi azotholakala KwaMnyandu Mall (Khulekani Tuck Shop, Qhala Kancane Tuck Shop, Edgars Active), Kwa-D eCar Wash (M&M Liquors), kwa-P (Ndlela’s Tarven) naseSiphingo (Jeena’s Warehouse).Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership namuhla:AmaZulu v Kaizer Chiefs (King Zwelithini Stadium, 7.30pm); Mamelodi Sundowns v Maritzburg United (Loftus Stadium, 7.30pm); Cape Town City v Free State Stars (Cape Town Stadium, 7.30pm)
title: Ngeke isishaye iChiefs: owoSuthu

text: UJERRY “Legs of Thunder” Sikhosana ozakhele igama kwi-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana eminyakeni edlule, akayizwa eyokuwagaxa emgibeni amakhokho kwesithandwa sebhola, uTeko “The Navigator” Modise.Ngeledlule uModise obedlalela iCape Town City umemezele ukuthi uyashiya ebholeni elikhokhelayo. Udlale umdlalo wakhe wokugcina ngoMgqibelo ezakhe zishaywa ngo 1-0 yiBlack Leopards kusongwa imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership.Ushiya nje uModise ebholeni uneminyaka yobudala ewu-36. Ngokusho kukaSikhosana, bekungafanele uModise ashiye ibhola njengamanje kodwa bekufanele ashiye iCity afune elinye iqembu elingenayo ingcindezi. USikhosana uxoxe naleli phephandaba ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi ehambele iNedbank Ke Yona Team Search, eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.“UModise ngisebenzile naye kwiPillars ngingumqeqeshi wakhe esikhathini esedlule. Ngaleso sikhathi kwakusekhona uMvela League. Ngokwami bekungafanele asheshe ayeke ibhola. Umzimba wakhe, nendlela asadlala ngakhona angiboni kube yisinqumo esihle lesi asithathile. Ngibona esasalelwe ngamasizini amabili noma amathathu esadlala ibhola elikhokhelayo,” kuchaza uSikhosana.USikhosana uthe uModise bekufanele ashintshe iqembu alidlalelayo kwaphela.“Into obekufanele ayenze ukushintsha iqembu alidlalelayo ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi unengcindezi. Ukube ubezosayina eqenjini elifana naMaZulu noma iMaritzburg United, ubesazodlala isikhathi eside kabi,” kusho uSikhosana.Ngokusho kwale nkakha edlale kwiNdebe yoMhlaba neBafana Bafana ngo-1998, isazohlala phansi noModise imeluleke kahle ngalesi sinqumo esibona "singawenzi umqondo.’’“Ngisazohlala naye phansi ngixoxe naye. Ngizomtshela ukuthi akafune iqembu azodlala kulona ngaphandle kwengcindezi. Ngoba nakho ukudlala eqenjini lapho kulindelwe lukhulu kuwena, kwenza uhlale ngokungakhululeki. Kuningi uModise angasiza ngakho kwamanye amaqembu, njengokulekelela abadlali abasebancane, abakhule bebukela kuyena. Mina (ezisho yena uSikhosana), ngiyeke ukudlala ibhola sengimdala kabi. Naye uModise uyakwazi lokho. Empeleni kukhona isikhathi lapho angifica khona ngisadlala yena esafika. Kungakho ngithi ngizozama isikhathi ngixoxe naye, ngimncenge ukuthi abuyele ebholeni,” kuchaza uSikhosana.Phakathi kwamaqembu adlalelwe uModise singabala iRia Stars, City Pillars, SuperSport United, Orlando Pirates neMamelodi Sundowns. Udlale amahlandla awu-66 kwiBafana Bafana njengoba aba yingxenye yeqembu elabeka umlando lidlala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba yokuqala ezwenikazi i-Afrika eyayikuleli ngo-2010.
title: UJerry akayizwa eyokushiya kukaTeko ebholeni

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZIEseGoliU MQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uVladimir Vermezovic, uthi uzokwazi ukumelana neKaizer Chiefs emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership wabakhaya eFNB Stadium, eSoweto, ngoMgqibelo ntambama ngo-3.30 ntambama.Iqembu likaVermezovic linqobe ngo-4-1 kowe-quaterfinal lishaya i-Ajax Cape Town e-Orlando Stadium ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Kulo mdlalo iPirates idlulele kowandulela owamanqamu ngamagoli ashaywe nguSiyabonga Swangweni, Oupa Manyisa, Happy Jele noLehlohonolo Majoro. Elokubika lezivakashi lishaywe nguThabiso Nkoane nobekuyiphenathi.Kubonakale abadlali abese benesikhathi bengadlali okubalwa kubona uRooi Mahamutsa, obe ngumdlali wosuku, noTlou Segolela.UVermezovic uthe abadlali bakhe badlale kahle bonke futhi kungenzeka babonakale kowabakhaya.“URooi ube ngumdlali wosuku, uMajoro noHappy bashaya amagoli. Umdlalo wabakhaya uhlale ungokhethekile. Baningi abadlali abahle esinabo kuleli qembu. Ngiyethemba sizodlala kahle uma sesibhekene neChiefs. Engikuthandayo ukuthi anginabo nabadlali abalimele. Wonke umuntu ufuna ukudlala kulo mdlalo nokwenza ukuthi umthwalo wami wehle kakhulu. Kuhlale kujabulisa ukuthi sinqobe imidlalo yethu ngaphambi koweChiefs,” kusho uVermezovic.Uthe umdlalo bekungafanele ume noma belina wase encoma nabadlali bakhe nabe-Ajax.“Bekungelula ku-Ajax, amagoli esiwashaye kulo mdlalo awafani nomdlalo ngendlela obuhamba ngayo. Siyilungisile indaba yama-freekick besibahle kanti ahlale esinika inkinga. Kodwa ngithulela isigqoko amaqembu womabili ngokudlala ngaphansi kwesimo esibi sesimo sezulu, nenkundla ibingekho esimweni esihle. Bekungelula nokuthi onompempe babone ukuthi abadlali bebelimazana ngenhloso noma bebenziwa ukushelela kwenkundla. Emakhoneni enkundla bekunamanzi kodwa bekungenankinga maphakathi nayo. Nokho lokho akusho ukuthi umdlalo bekufanele umiswe,” kusho uVermezovic.Umqeqeshi we-Ajax, uRoger de Sa uthe ubefisa kumiswe umdlalo ngendlela ebeliyithela ngayo.“Ngiyayihalalisela iPirates idlale kahle yanqoba kulo mdlalo. Ngingathi sibulawe ama-free kick amabili. Abafana abancane laba enginabo bazofunda kula maphutha abawenzile baqhubekele phambili. Bazoba yiqembu eliqinile ngesikhathi esizayo,” kusho uDe Sa.“Umdlalo bekufanele umiswe ngoba izulu belina kakhulu. Ibhola belingagingqiki njengokujwayelekile. Ngimangale ukuthi uqhubekile yize bekungelula ukubona abadlali noma bedlala kabi. Lokhu akukuhle kunobhutshuzwayo.”UDe Sa uthe akanelisekanga ngephenathi.“Ngokubona kwami besingekho isidingo sayo,” kusho yena.
title: Ithemba ngaphambi kowabakhaya kuBucs

text: I-ANC ayizwa mshini ngabaholi bayo abasolwa ngenkohlakalo nokuwisa iminyango abake basebenza kuyo njengoba ibajube ukuthi babuyele njengamalungu ePhalamende.  NgoLwesithathu umengameli wamaJaji kuleli uChief Justice Mogoeng Mogoeng wamukele uhlu lwamalungu amasha ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho zezifundazwe.Kubaholi be-ANC ababuyela ePhalamende kubalwa uMnuz Malusi Gigaba, uNkk Faith Muthambi, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane noNkk Bathabile Dlamini.Lokhu kushiye imibuzo kwazise laba baholi phambilini amagama abo ake amataniswa nezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokuhluleka ukuphatha iminyango abake bajutshwa kuyo njengongqongqoshe.Nomvula Mokonyane. Isithombe: Itumeleng English/African News Agency (ANA)UMokonyane, osendaweni yeshumi ohlwini lwe-ANC, useke waba ungqongqoshe wezokuXhumana, wezeMvelo kanye nowaManzi neNhlanzeko. Usanda kusolwa ngenkohlalalo emnyangweni waManzi neNhlanzeko, okuthiwa uwushiye usesimeni esingesihle sezimali.Enye yezinkinga lo mnyango osabhekene nazo, isikweletu esibalelwa ku11.2 billion okuthiwa sidalwe ukungaqoqwa kwemali yamanzi ekweletwa omasipala, izinkampani zikahulumeni kanye nezinkampani ezizimele.UMokonyane igama lakhe liphinde lavela kwikhomishini kaZondo, ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana ngesikhathi kufakaza owayeyisikhulu sezokukhangisa eBosasa uMnuz Angelo Agrizzi. U-Agrizzi wazisa ikhomishini ukuthi uMokonyane wayegwazelwa ngoR50 000 ngenyanga ukuze avikele inkampani kwabezomthetho.Bathabile Dlamini. Isithombe: Phando Jikelo/African News Agency(ANA)Owayengungqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Bathabile Dlamini naye akasalanga ngaphandle ohlwini lwe-ANC lwasePhalamende. UDlamini ngaphambi kokhetho ubewuNgqongqoshe wabesiFazane ehhovisini likamengameli ngemuva kokususwa emnyangweni wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi ngoFebruwari nyakenye.NgoSepthemba nyakenye iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo yamyalela ukuthi akhokhe u-20% wezindleko zokuqulwa kwecala elithinta iSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa) neFreedom Under Law neBlack Sash Trust.Lezi zinhlangano zasola uDlamini ngokuxhaphaza imali ngokudlulisela udaba lweCash Paymaster Service eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, nokwaholela ekutheni yelulwe inkontileka yeCPS. Ngo-2014 inkantolo ukuthi ukuqokwa kweCPS kwakungekho emthethweni futhi kungafanele. Le nkampani yayiqokwe ngo-2012.Malusi GigabaUMnuz Maluso Gigaba naye akasalanga ngaphandle ohlwini lwe-ANC nakuba esolwa ngokulekelela umndeni wakwaGupta uthole amaphepha obuzwe kuleli, okuyinto ayiphika.Ngesikhathi esawungqongqoshe wezasekhaya uphinde wabeka imithetho ethikameze imboni yezokuvakasha kuleli odabeni lwabavakasha nezingane.Odabeni lweFireblade Aviation, inkantolo enkulu eGuateng yathola ukuthi uGigaba wahubhuza amanga ngeminingwano ethize ngesikhathi ephekwa ngemibuzo ePhalamende ngalolu daba. UGigaba ube esezidonsela amanzi ngomsele kuputshuka ivideo yakhe eziphulula isitho sangasese eyamphendula ihlaya kuleli.Faith Muthambi. Isithombe: GCISUNkk Faith Muthambi yena usolwa ngokuphula umthetho ngesikhathi esebenza kwiGovernment Communication and Information System (GCIS). Usolwa ngokuqasha abantu abawu-27 ngokungemthetho kwiGCIS okubalwa kubo abangani bakhe nezihlobo zakhe.  Owayengungqongqoshe womnyango wokuMbiwayo, uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane, ovame ukungalubhadi ePhelamende uma ebizelwe ukuthi azophendula ngakwenza emnyangweni, naye uyabuyela ePhalamende. Igama likaZwane lilokhu livele njalo uma kudingidwa umndeni wakwaGupta, okubikwa ukuthi nguwo owamsiza ukuthi athole isikhundla sobungqongqoshe.Mosebenzi Zwane. Isithombe: GCISI-ANC ibuyisele laba baholi ePhalamede nakuba omakadebona bayo ngokunjalo namaqembu aphikisayo ethe ingalinge ibabuyise. I-ANC ithole izihlalo eziwu-230 okhethweni nonyaka, isuka kwezingu-249 ngo-2014. Lokhu kusho ukuthi kukhona abaholi bayo abavaleleke ngaphandle ezikhundleni ephalamende.Ngemuva kokufungiswa njengomengameli wakuleli ngokusemthethweni ngoMeyi 25, umengameli Cyril Ramaphosa kulindeleke ukuthi aqoke ithimba lekhabhinethe yakhe entsha.Ekhuluma nabezindaba ngoLwesine uMnuz Julius Malema uthe balindele ukuthi uRamaphosa asehlise isibalo songqoqongqoshe, kuphele ngamaPhini abo. Uthe uma ehluleka ukwenza lokhu uzobe eqala impi nabantu bakuleli.
title: FUNDA: Abaholi abahlanu ‘abanogcobho’ i-ANC ebabuyisela ePhalamende

text: UMQEQESHI weBafana Bafana, uStuart Baxter, uthi iyamkhathaza eyokuba buthuntu kwezakhe phambi kwamapali eziphinde zaphoxa isizwe ngempelasonto.EzikaBaxter zishaywe yiMadagascar ngo 4-3 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi kuma-quarter final eCosafa Cup ePeter Mokaba Stadium ngeSonto.Emizuzwini ewu-90 umdlalo uphele zibambene ngo-0-0 yize iqembu lasekhaya lithole inqwaba yamathuba okushaya amagoli.IBafana bekulindeleke ukuba yenze kahle kulo mqhudelwano ngenxa yokuthi inqobe umqhudelwano iFour Nations Tournament obuseNdola, eZambia, ngoMashi. EzikaBaxter zehlula osokhaya iZambia ngo 2-0 kowamanqamu.IFour Nations Tournament ihlanganisa amazwe amane -iNingizimu Afrika, Zambia, Angola neZimbabwe. Ukushweba phambi kwamapali kwabadlali beBafana kuphendule inhlekisa iqembu lesizwe kwiCosafa Cup, kwazise iMadagascar ikleliswe yaba ngeka-114 emhlabeni. Bekungokokuqala emlandweni iBafana Bafana ishaywa yiMadagascar emdlalweni wesithupha amazwe abewudlala kusuka ngo-1993.“Ngikhathazekile ngokuba buthuntu kwabadlali bethu phambi kwamapali ngoba sakhe inqwaba yamathuba kepha sangawasebenzisa, ikakhulukazi ngesiwombe sokuqala. Ngesikhathi siziqeqeshela umdlalo sazilungisela ukuthi kungenzeka sikhahlele amaphenathi, sawakhahlela futhi bonke abadlali abawakhahlela bawashaya phakathi amaphenathi abo ikakhulukazi uLuther Singh owavalela phakathi amabili. Kungithusile kulo mdlalo (neMadagascar) uma esehluleka ukushaya iphenathi ngoba wavalela phakathi amabili ngesikhathi sizicija. Ngizophinde nokho ngilishumayele ivangeli lokuthi uma sesiphambi kwamapali siqinisekise ukuthi inethi iyabhakuza,” kusho uBaxter etshela izintatheli ePolokwane.IBafana izobhekana neNamibia namuhla emdlalweni wePlate semi final ozoqala ng-5 ntambama e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium.“Kubalulekile ukuthi abadlali abasebancane bathole amava okudlala imidlalo yase-Afrika. Ngibona kuyithuba elihle leli lokuba bathole lawo mava ayosiza ngomuso emidlalweni enzima esisazoba nayo,” kusho uBaxter.
title: ‘Sakhe amathuba sangawasebenzisa’

text: UMASKANDA owaphekwa wuMgqumeni Khumalo, uFihlisikhwele, usale dengwane ngesikhathi izigebengu zimntshontshela yonke impahla yasendlini nesigingci abesanda kusithenga endlini aqashe kuyo eNdunduma, eClermont, entathakusa ngoLwesithathu.UFihlisikhwele, ogama lakhe langempela nguSiphesihle Magubane, uthe izinswelaboya zimthathele amafriji, iTV, umsakazo, amabhodwe abenokudla, isitofu, izimpahla zokugqoka nezokulala nokudla abezokudla inyanga yonke. Uthe ushayelwe ucingo esesemsebenzini ebusuku ngumalume aqashe naye.“Uthe ufice endlini kuvuliwe, kwathi uma ebheka, wabona emnyango kugqekeziwe.”UFihlisikhwele uthe usola ukuthi isigebengu esimgilile simbonile eseya emsebenzini eMahle Berh eNew Germany lapho esebenza khona njenge-Injection Moulding Operator.“Kusho ukuthi kunomuntu nje ongibonile noma owaziyo ama-shift ami ngoba kunengane efundayo esihlala nayo kulo mqasho eshoyo ukuthi izwile kukhona okugudluza isicabha yazitshela ukuthi yimina.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aKwaDabeka aphenya icala lokugqekeza. “Kuthathwe iTV, izingubo, isitofu esinamapuleti amabili nezingubo zokulala. Akukaboshwa muntu,” kuphetha uZwane.UFihlisikhwele ukhale kakhulu ngesigingci ngoba ubesanda kusilanda eMlaza lapho besiyolungiswa khona ngemuva kokulinyazwa yizigebengu ezazimbamba inkunzi eGoli nyakenye.Uthe lo mshophi omehlele uphazamisa izinhlelo zakhe njengoba enemicimbi azodlala kuyona ngale mpelasonto yokuphela kwenyanga okubalwa kuyo neGcwalis’iMacekeceke eseJeppe Park ngoMgqibelo.Lo mculi waseSigubudu eNquthu waqala ukuzakhela udumo esagidela iqembu likababomncane wakhe, Abasemzini ngaphambi kokujoyina amaqembu kaMgqumeni, lapho agqama khona kakhulu kwiDVD ethi SMS. Eseshonile uMgqumeni, uFihlisikhwele wabe esezimela, wakhipha ama-albhamu athi Ngiphelezele, Igalelo, Izizwe Ziyavuma, Uzungu neyokugcina eyayithi Umthakathi.
title: Ugilwe amasela umaskanda

text: IMEYA yeTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda ithi umasipala ulahlekelwe nguR4.7 billion ngenxa yeCorona okushaye ezokuvakasha nokungcebeleka eThekwini.UKaunda uthe ingu-1 400 imisebenzi elahlekile okudalwe nawukuhoxiswa kwemicimbi nezemidlalo.Usho kanje esithangamini nabezindaba izolo eCity Hall ecacisa ngasekwenzile esikhathini esiwunyaka esehhovisi. Waba yimeya ngoSepthemba 5 ngonyaka odlule.UKaunda uthe wangena kulesi sikhundla ukuze alethe uzinzo kumasipala, ahlinzeke abantu ngentuthuko, akhulise umnotho weTheku.Ukhuze abasebenzi bomkhandlu abazibandakanya nenkohlakalo wathi: “Uma untshontsha usukhuziwe, usuke usubiza ukuphuma ngomnyango.”Uthe kabakhethi ukuthi ungubani uma belwa nenkohlakalo yingakho kuphenywa nangoR400 million owabelwe izinhlelo zokulwa neCorona eThekwini okunezinsolo zokuthi kukhona abehlise imali ngomlenze.UKaunda uthe uhlelo lokubuyiselwa kwamabhasi omkhandlu ngaphansi kwabo lubanjezelwe yicala elifakwe enkantolo yinkampani ewangamele njengamanje. Uthe babeke uR2 billion wokuphucula ingqalasizinda yamanzi okuzohlomulisa imiphakathi.“Amapayipi ayefakiwe ehlinzeka abantu amanzi mancane. Umthamo odluliswa yilawo mapayipi awusalingani nomthamo odingwa ngabantu ngoba imizi ikhula mihla namalanga,” kusho uKaunda.Uthe bengeze nesibalo samaloli athuthela umphakathi amanzi abengu-88 manje angu-103.Uthe sebedlulile enkingeni yokuqoqwa kukadoti eqale ngo-2017 ikakhulukazi eMlaza.“Kusukela ngoJulayi 1, siqashe abasebenzi abaqoqa udoti sishintsha isimo ngendlela udoti oqoqwa ngayo. Noma singakafiki ku-100% ekuqoqeni udoti kodwa umehluko usukhona eMlaza,” kusho uKaunda.Uthe babeke uR500 million wezinhlelo zokuqoqwa kukadoti eminyakeni emithathu ezayo eThekwini.Uxwayise umphakathi ozixhumela ugesi wezinyokanyoka wathi awuhlukane nalo mkhuba. Uthe awugcini ngokubulala abantu kepha ukhinyabeza nomnotho. Ngonyaka iTheku lilahlekelwa nguR250 million ngogesi wezinyokanyoka.Imeya ithi sehlile isibalo sabantu abahlala koLindela sisuka ku-10 140 manje bangu-8 235, nesoLindela sisuka ku-71 saba ngu-45. Uthe bakhiphe amatayitela ezindlu angu-2000 onyakeni wemali u-2019/20 njengoba bakhe nezindlu ezingu-91 ehostela elikwa-T eMlaza (eSeventini).Ube eseveza ukuthi kunoR53 million ohlelelwe ukwakha imigwaqo emalokishini nasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezakhele iTheku.
title: UKaunda ucacise ngasekwenzile

text: NKOSIKHONA CELEIsidumbu sikaSne Ntuli sitholwe silahliwe ezimobeni ezibude buduze nekhaya lakhe kuleli sonto kwase kuboshwa uMnuz Thandanani Manqele oyisoka likadadewabo okuvela ukuthi nguyena obulale le ntombazane.USne kuthiwa waduka ephuma esikoleni emasontweni edlule, okuthe uma umphakathi uphuma inqina umthungatha, wagcina uzithela phezu kwesidumbu sakhe ezimobeni.Intombi kamsolwa, uNksz Thalente Gumede, kuthiwa idideke maqede yahamba ekhaya, kumanje kayaziwa ukuthi ukuziphi izinkalo.Uninalume kamufi, uMnuz Sizwe Shongwe uchaze lesi senzo somsolwa njengesinonya olwesabekayo.Namanje uthe basamangele ukuthi kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi umsolwa adlwengule udadewabo omncane wentombi athandana nayo. Uthe lokhu bayakweshama futhi abakaze bakuzwe.Eqhuba, uveze ukuthi bafuna ukubona uThandanani ebhadla ejele impilo yakhe yonke. Uveze ukuthi ngaphambiini, uSne wake wafika wababikela ukuthi isoka likadadewabo limcele ukuthi lithinte amabele akhe, lamdonsa ngendlebe ukuthi angayithi vu le ndaba ekhaya."Kodwa uSne wafike washo ekhaya. Sonke sethuka. Sesibona manje ukuthi ingane kade aqala ukuyilandela," echaza.ISolezwe NgoMgqibelo lithole nokuthi unina womsolwa, uNkk Manqele obeziphilisa ngokudayisela abafundi baseLokothwayo Primary School ukudla, uxoshiwe. USne ubefunda khona eLokothwayo.Kuthiwa umphakathi kanye nesigungu sesikole bavumelana ngo-elethu kwelokuthi axoshwe lo wesifazane, kukhalwa ngokuthi sonke lesi sikhathi ubekade efuye umbulali endlini.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile lesi sehlakalo. Uthe umsolwa ulinganiselwa eminyakeni engu-38 yobudala. Uthe umsolwa uvelile eNkantolo yaseMthunzini kuleli sonto icala lakhe lahlehliselwa isonto elizayo ukuze afake isicelo sebheyili.Unina kaSne, eligodliwe igama lakhe, kuthiwa lesi sigameko simhlukumezile kakhulu emoyeni kangangoba kuthiwa umndeni umatasa umfunela usizo lokwelashwa ngokwengqondo.Kuyavela nokuthi umsolwa nyakenye, uke wazama kaningi ukudlwengula ingane yentobazane yomfowabo kodwa wehluleka.
title: Zimkhalele osolwa ngokudlwengula abulale umlamu wakhe

text: SEKWABA umkhuba ojwayelekile ukuthi ubone abantu bezesula umjuluko ngethawula lokugeza ngenxa yokujuluka.Kujwayelekile kunjalo, kodwa ongoti besikhumba bathi ukwenza kanje kuyingozi enkulu esikhumbeni sobuso, ungazithola usushwabanelwa wubuso umncane.Ungoti wezobuhle eThekwini uFuthi Mkhize, woBuhle Beauty Academy, uthi amathawula enziwa ngokotini oqinile okwenza ukuthi adale umonakalo esikhumbeni.Uthi ngesikhathi umuntu ezikhuhla ngethawula, kwanda namagciwane ngoba lisuke lomile lithintwa nayizandla ezingahlanzekile.“Isikhumba sobuso sithambile futhi siyashesha ukuzwela, yingakho kumele njalo umuntu ehlale esebenzisa izandla, ama-wipes noma izinto ezikhandelwe ukwesula ubuso uqobo ukuzesula.“Ilanga lishaya inyama kuzwele nokushisa okunye kuhlale esikhumbeni. Uma sewuzikhuhla ngethawula sekulimala okubizwa ngei-epidermis,” kusho uFuthi.Ukungazijwayezi ithawula kwenza kube lula nakuwe ukufunda isikhumba sakho, usheshe uzwe uma kukhona okungasahambi kahle.“Uma usebenzisa izandla zakho uyashesha ukuzwa uma kukhona okonakalayo esikhumbeni. Kodwa ithawula kuzokuthatha isikhathi ngoba uzoqhubeka ukhuhle kakhulu noma sekushisa unganaki.“Isikhumba siyaqala siyahlibuka,siyashwabana siphinde sonakale”.Ngaphandle kwethawula kukhona nomkhuba ojwayelwe abesifazane wokuvuselela iziphaqulo phezu kwakugcobile.UFuthi uthi elinye iphutha eliyingozi ngoba ehlobo umuntu ujuluka kakhulu nesikhumba sikhiqiza amafutha kakhulu.“Uma uzogcoba i-make up ngaphezulu kwenye, lokho kushintsha ibala lesikhumba.“Amafutha nomjuluko ahlangana ne-foundation no-powder obuwufake ekuseni nalokhu okugcoba ngaphezulu, kwakheke elinye ibala bese kubukeka kabi.“Ngaphandle kwalokho, kwakheka ukungcola ngoba nesikhumba asiphefumuli kahle,” kusho lo ngoti.Ephetha uthe njengoba kushisa ilanga abantu abajwayele ukusebenzisa isunscreen noma imikhiqizo ene-sun protection factor (SFP) enenombolo ephezulu.Lokhu kuzobasiza ukuthi noma umuntu ejuluka esebenzisa nama-wipes aqhubeke nokubukeka kahle nesikhumba sisale sipholile.Ugcizelela nangokuthi, kuyona yonke imikhiqizo umuntu ayisebenzisa ebusweni, kumele umkhiqizo noma isigcobo esinoVitamin E singasali ngaphandle.Ukholwa wukuthi uVitamin E uwumgogodla ekunakekelweni kwesikhumba.
title: 'Kona ubuso ukusula ngethawula'

text: INKAKHA yomlingisi uTony Kgoroge esanda kujoyina umdlalo waku e.tv Imbewu: The Seed iphumele obala ngokuthwala kanzima ingena esikhundleni somlingisi owaxoshwa, uMpumelelo Bhulose.UTony onguMengameli wenhlangano elwela amalungelo amaciko, iCultural and Creatives Industries Federation of South Africa uqale ukulingisa indawo kaZimele Bhengu emasontweni amabili edlule.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngeSonto uveze ukuthi iziqephu zokuqala zaba nzima kakhulu kuye, kwayena zazingamgculisi uma ezibuka.“Ngaqale ngadayiswa indlela engiphimisa ngayo amagama njengoba ngingesiye umZulu. Ngesinye isikhathi bengithi uma ngikhuluma bangitshele ukuthi akushiwo njalo la.Ngishadelwe unkosikazi womZulu ngakho ngiyazi ukuthi amaZulu awahlonipha kangakanani amasiko,” kusho uTony.Uthe into eyayingamlalisi ebusuku ukuthi wayenovalo lokubukeka njengesehluleki kubalandeli balo mdlalo, unkosikazi wakhe uSthandiwe Kgoroge naye ongumlingisi nabantu basekhweni lakhe.Uveze ukuthi kukhona ingcosana yabalandeli eyazwakalisa ukungamthakaseli uZimele omusha bemqhathanisa noMpumelelo, begxeka nangendlela akhuluma ngayo isiZulu.“Angifunanga ukubuka ukuthi uMpumelelo obeyidlala kanjani le ndawo kaNgcolosi. Ngiyibuke le ndawo njengomdlali omusha.UNgcolosi akusiye umuntu wangempela ngakho akekho umuntu ongakutshela ukuthi udlalwa kanjani.Ngisho umuntu ongeza emuva kwami naye kuyofuneka amdlale ngendlela yakhe,” kusho uTony.Unxuse abantu ukuthi bayeke ukumcwasa ngokobuhlanga, bamehlulele ukuthi uyahluleka ukudlala indawo yendoda yomZulu ngoba engumSuthu.Uthe abantu abakhumbule ukuthi uSindi Dlathu ngesikhathi eqala ukulingisa kuMuvhango wayengasazi nhlobo isiVhenda kodwa manje useyasithamunda.Ubonge unkosikazi wakhe ngokumlekelela ekuphimiseni kahle amagama esiZulu, obekunzima ukuthi awaphimise.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe uzozinza kulo mdlalo, uthe lokho kuzolawulwa inkontileka yakhe nokuthi usaphatheke kahle ngoba ngeke akubekezelele ukuxhashazwa.Ukhuthaze abalingisi ukuthi bangalinge basayine izinkontileka uma kunezinto abangavumelani nazo ngoba ngeke kubasize ukukhala ngemuva kwesikhathi.
title: Inkakha ithwele kanzima kwiMbewu

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uthi ubhubhane iCovid-19 lusazohlala kuleli eminye iminyaka emibili, kodwa ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya luyaqhubeka.Ukhetho kulindeleke ukuthi lube phakathi kuka-Agasti noNovemba, kulo nyaka. URamaphosa utshele amalungu e-ANC ukuthi kumele  azilungiselele ukuphila nobhubhane eminye iminyaka emibili, aphinde azilungiselele ukukhankasela ukhetho ngaphansi kwemigomo ebekelwe ukugwema ukusabalala kweCovid-19.URamaphosa ukusho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi ekhankasela ukhetho lokuchibiyela oluzoba ngelizayo, lapho bekubuthene amalungu e-ANC abalelwa ku-200.Ekhuluma eMpumalanga, ilokishi eliseThekwini, uRamaphosa uthe iCovid-19 isazokuba khona eminye iminyaka emibili. Uthe yingakho elakuleli  liphansi phezulu lizama ukuthenga umgomo walolu bhubhane ngoba uyazi ukuthi lisazohlala isikhathi eside.URamaphosa uvumile ukuthi elakuleli libhekene nezingqinamba emizamweni yokugoma isizwe njengoba uhlelo lokugoma lushaya ngolonwabu, kepha sekuyantwela ezansi."Sifike sathola owokuqala umgomo, kwatholakala ukuthi awulungile. Siphinde sathola omunye, nawo okutholakale ukuthi awuzange ubaphathe kahle abantu eMelika, sabe sesiyawumisa. Kepha ikhona eminye imigomo esizoyithola. Kukhona ozofika ophuma eRussia."URamaphosa uthe akafuni nokuyizwa eyesiphakamiso sokuthi kuhlehliswe ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya."Bakhona asebethi lolu khetho aluhlehliswe, thina siyi-ANC, silufuna manje. Silulungele ukhetho. Sihlale silulungele ukhetho."URamaphosa uvumile ukuthi nokho kuba nzima ukubamba ukhetho kusekhona ubhubhane."Lolu khetho sizolubamba ngesikhathi esinzima lapho kushone inqwaba yabantu emhlabeni nakuleli. Kufanele siqikelele ukuthi siyayilandela yonke imithetho ebekelwe ukugwema ukusabalala kwecorona."Bekukhankaselwa uMnuz Lungisani Sikakane, omele inhlangano okhethweni lokuchibiyela kuwadi 6, ngaphansi kukamasipala waseThekwini.USihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe abangabazi nakancane ukuthi uSikakane uzowudla umhlanganiso okhethweni. UZikalala uthe iMpumalanga iyisizinda se-ANC esakhiqiza amaqhawe asalala anjengoMnuz Mathews Meyiwa kanye noDkt Meshack Radebe.Uthe abahambisani nesiphakamiso sokuthi kuhlehliswe ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya, wathi labo abenza lesiphakamiso babulawa ukwesaba. Ngaphandle kwamalungu esigungu esiphezulu se-ANC kuzwelonke nasesifundazweni,  bekukhona nabagaqele isikhundla sokuhola i-ANC kwisifunda saseThekwini, uNkk Zandile Gumede noMnuz Thabani Nyawose.UNkk Gumede noNyawose, kulindeleke ukuthi baqhudelane kwisikhundla sikasihlalo wesifunda kwingqungquthela ezoba maduze.
title: I-Corona isazohlala iminyaka emibili:  Ramaphosa

text: ZAKHELE XABATshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (1) 2Kaizer Chiefs (0) 1LIYAYISHONELA iKaizer Chiefs ezabalazela ukungena kwiTop 8 njengoba iphinde yalahla amaphuzu ihlulwa yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, izolo ebusuku.Igoli leChiefs lishaywe nguLebogang Manyama esiwombeni sesibili. Awe-TTM abekwe enethini nguThabo Rakhale noThabo Mnyamana esiwombeni ngasinye.Amakhosi angene enkundleni ebheke ukuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele kulandela ukubanjwa yiBloemfontein Celtic ngempelasonto edlule. Kule sizini iChiefs ingena, iyaphuma kwi-Top 8 ngenxa yokuhluleka wukugcina umgqigqo. Ukuhamba kwemidlalo iChiefs ihluleka ukucosha amaphuzu kusho ukungena engcupheni yokungayidlali iMTN 8 ekuqaleni kwesizini ezayo. Amakhosi asalelwe yimidlalo emine ukuthi azame ukuzibekisela indawo kulo mqhudelwano. Umdlalo weTTM neChiefs, bekungowokuqala womqeqeshi uDylan Kerr esebhentshini kulandela ukulunga kwemvume yakhe yokusebenza eMzansi emahoreni ambalwa ngaphambi kokuqala komdlalo.Izolo, iChiefs ikhombise ukuwuphatha umdlalo usaqala kodwa ihluleka uma isifike phambili. Emuva kwesikhathi eside onozinti bezipholele, uBruce Bvuma, obesemapalini eChiefs, uchilizele ngaphandle ishodi likaMnyamana ngomzuzu ka-22. Ngoka-38 iChiefs ingene obishini uNjabulo Blom ethola ikhadi eliphuzi lesibili emuva kokudonsa uNdabayithethwa Ndlondlo ngaphandle kwebhokisi. Leyo free-kick ishaywe nguMnyamana, yashaya ipali, yashayisa kuBvuma wayicosha. Sekusele imizuzu emithathu, uRakhale ulibeke esifubeni, waqobela phakathi ibhola eligotshwe nguMnyamana kwesokudla.Esiwombeni sesibili, iChiefs ibuye yazama ukucindezela kodwa iTTM ibikhombisa ukuba yingozi uma ithola ibhola. Unozinti weTTM, uWashington Arubi, ugcine ekutholile azokwenza echithela phezu kwepali ibhola elingqofwe nguSamir Nurkovic ngomzuzu ka-51.Ngomzuzu ka-65 unompempe uVictor Hlungwane unikeze iChiefs iphenathi emuva kokuthi u-Ayanda Nkili edlalise kabi uNurkovic ebhokisini. Ishaywe nguManyama kodwa wayibamba u-Arubi. UManyama uyilandelile, wamjika, wayiqobela phakathi. Sekubalwa imizuzwana kuphele umdlalo, uHlungwane uyikhombe emlotheni emuva kokuthi uSiyabonga Ngezana ebambe ibhola ngesandla ebhokisini. Ishaywe phakathi nguMnyamanaEmdlalweni olandelayo, iTTM ebalekela izembe izobhekana neChippa United kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup eFree State Stadium ngoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama. Ngokunqoba lapha inyukele endaweni ka-14  ngamaphuzu awu-25. IChiefs sekuzomele iyozama ukulwela amaphuzu agcwele uma isidlala neSwallows ngoLwesithathu oluzayo. Ngalolu suku iTTM izobe idlala neSuperSport United.
title: Liyayishonela iChiefs elwela ukuqeda kwiTop 8

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUS EKUYINDABA eyaziwayo ukuthi iziteshi, kulesi sikhathi samanje, zilanda osaziwayo ukuthi babe ngabasakazi bazo ngethemba lokuthi bazoza nabalandeli babo abazogcina sebelalela lowo msakazo.Baningi osaziwayo abasebenza eziteshini ezehlukene njengoBonang Matheba, Lerato Kganyago, Pearl Thusi noPearl Modiadie bonke beMetro FM, Zuluboy kuKhozi FM nakwezinye iziteshi.Lokhu akusiyona into embi inqobo nje uma lowo saziwayo ekwazi ukusakaza.Kodwa ngisakholelwa ekutheni neziteshi kumele zizakhele abazo osaziwayo abazoba ngamanxusa esiteshi. Ngikhuluma ngomuntu ozothi uma eqhamuka kume yonke into abantu befune ukushutha naye.Lokho kungasiza nasekutheni abantu abangamazi bafune ukwazi ukuthi wenza ini bese belangazelela ukuyomlalela emsakazweni, ngenhloso yokuzwa ukuthi yini le emenza athandwe kangaka. Lapho phela kunyuka izibalo zabalaleli okuyinto ebhekwe yiziteshi ezahlukene.Ngesikhathi ngikhula, uma kuqhamuka uLinda Sibiya kwakuvele kube ngathi Ukhozi ngilubona ngamehlo. Into eyayimenza adume kangaka kwakuba yizinto ayezenza emphakathini ngaphandle komsakazo njengokufundisa abampofu, aphinde enze umjikelezo wokugqugquzela abafundi ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme iMagic Tour.Lokhu kuyisifundo nakwabanye abasakazi ukuthi, ngaphandle komsakazo, kumele kube khona izinto ezibenza basondelane nabantu. Angithi uzokhumbula ukuthi uma udumile, izinkampani ezizimele azinqeni ukusebenzisana nawe ngokuthi mhlawumbe ube yinxusa lemikhiqizo yazo.Njengamanje umuntu engibona engathi uyintandokazi oKhozini wuTshatha Ngobe, othi uma eqhamuka kuhlanye abantu. Ngaphandle kwethelevishini, njengoba eke wethula i
Roots kuSABC 1, kodwa into emenza athandeke kubantu wukuthi lapho efika khona ungena khaxa. Kubantu bakamasikandi uyathandeka ngoba uyawazi, i-hip hop uyayazi, ikwaito uyayazi. Ngisho ungambeka namakholwa ngeke abe nankinga ngoba iBhayibheli uyalazi. Inselelo engimphosela yona wukuthi asike simbone esiza abantu ukubathuthukisa ngendlela angasiza ngayo esebenzisa udumo lwakhe.IGagasi FM ngicabanga ukuthi lingathembela kuNomalanga Shozi ukuthi abe nguye usaziwayo wesiteshi. Ngaphandle nje kokuthi usemncane ngokweminyaka, njengoba ena-20, kodwa ikusasa lakhe libukeka liqhakazile. Ngike ngambona kuSupersport 4 ngesikhathi kudlala owamanqamu eMoses Mabhida Stadium phakathi kweKaizer Chiefs neMamelodi Sundowns. ISupersport yayicele yena ukuthi abe ngumethuli wohlelo lokuyokhuluma nabantu ababebukela umdlalo eMax’s Lifestyle, eMlazi.IGagasi kumele lizikhulisele yena kuthi uma sebebona ukuthi usevuthwe ngokwanele bamfake ohlelweni oluzomenza asondelane nabantu njengoba okwamanje esangena ebusuku.Ungangibhalela ku: [email protected], ku-Twitter @fanelebengu noma ku-Instagram @fanelebengu
title: Mababukele kuMr Magic abasakazi

text: LUGUJWE ngendlela ehlukile usuku lwezithandani esikoleni samabanga aphakeme esiseNanda, izolo.Abafundi baseNanda Comprehensive High, bachithe amahora amabili begqugquzelwa ngothando lwezibalo, njengoba lolu suku belubizwa ngeLove Mathematics Day kulesi sikole.UDkt Msizi Mkhize ofundisa izifundo ze-Accounting eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uvakashele lesi sikole ukuyocobelelana nabafundi ngezindlela ezilula ezingenza bathande iMaths. “IMathematics yisona sifundo esibalulekile ngoba sivula iminyango eminingi ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. ISouth Africa isilele emuva kulesi sifundo, ngakho ngibone kuwumqondo omuhle ukuthi sisebenzise lolu suku olwaziwa ngolwezithandani ukugqugquzela abafundi ukuthi bathande iMaths.”Abafundi bebebukeka beyithakasela indlela uMkhize abeyamanisa ngayo izinto ezijwayelekile nezibalo kugcine sekunika umqondo ohlukile, esebenzisa amatemu alesi sifundo. Ubebuye acaphune nezigatshana eBhayibhelini azitolike ngolimi olusetshenziswa kwiMaths abuye abhidise, obekunanelwa ngelikhulu ihlombe labafundi nothisha.“Ngicela othisha bafundise lesi sifundo ngendlela ezotshala uthando enhliziyweni yomfundi. Ukushintsha nje ukukhuluma okujwayelekile ukubize ngamatemu alesi sifundo kwenza umfundi akwazi ukusheshe abambe futhi asijabulele lesi sifundo,” kusho uMkhize.Uthishanhloko walesi sikole, uMnuz Thulile Chauca, uthe lolu suku seluzohlale lugujwa ngale ndlela kulesi sikole minyaka yonke. “Ngonyaka ozayo sifisa ukujoyinwa nangabafundi bakwezinye izikole ukuze sigqugquzele izingane ukuthi zigubhe okuqondene nazo kunokuthi zisebenzise lolu suku ukunaka izinto ezingakafiki esigabeni sazo. Siyathemba ukuthi izinto ezinjengalezi zizosilekelela kakhulu kwazise ngonyaka odlule sithole * -34% kuphela kulesi sifundo ku-matric."UNksz Thembelihle Thusi (17) owenza uGrade 12 kulesi sikole uthe kubajabulisile ukugubha lolu suku ngale ndlela wathi kuzobasiza ekukhuliseni uthando lwalesi sifundo.
title: Bagqugquzelwe ngothando lwezibalo ngeValentine's Day

text: OWAYENGUSOMLOMO kuMasipala waseMzimkhulu, uMnuz Khaya Thobela owasocongwa ekwakhe nyakenye, wayeqeda ukuchela igceke ngesiwasho ngesikhathi edutshulwa.Lokhu kuvezwe ngumfowabo kamufi uMnuz Nkosinathi Thobela othe umufi wabuya emsebenzini washintsha wathatha isiwasho eyochela egcekeni.Uthe umbulali wayengaphakathi egcekeni ngabo-6 ntambama wamdubula.“Wayechela ukuze axoshe imimoya emibi ngesikhathi edutshulwa. Unkosikazi wakhe wayesekhishini kwenzeka lesi sehlakalo, izingane zakhe zazikwenye indlu,” kushouThobela efakaza izolo kwikhomishini kaMoerane ephenya ngokubulawa kosopolitiki KwaZulu-Natal.Ukhombe i-ANC ngokubulawa kukamufi wathi ukubulawa kwakhe kuhlobene nengqungquthela yesifunda iHarry Gwala engakabi khona namanje.Le ngqungquthela isihlehliswe izikhawu eziningi kulesi sifunda kanti kumele kube ngeyokukhetha ubuholi obusha.“Asikholwa wukuthi wabulawelwa izinto ezithinta inkohlakalo ebikwayo kuMasipala waseMzimkhulu. Ukubulawa kwakhe kuhlangene nezindaba zezikhundla njengoba engomunye wabantu ababephakanyiselwe kwesikanobhala wesifunda uma sekunengqungquthela. Zimbili izinhlangothi ebezibanga, wuhlangothi olwalunoThobela bese kuba olwalunoSindiso Magaqa. Ukuhlukana kwemibono yikhona okwenza ukuthi abulawe,” kusho uThobela (Nkosinathi).UThobela, Magaqa kanjalo noMnuz Mduduzi Tshibase, bonke ababengamakhansela kulo mkhandlu, balalelwa unyendle basocongwa.Uthe umufi washonela esibhedlela iPort Shepstone.UThobela uthe abeneme ngophenyo lwamaphoyisa njengoba bengatshelwa ukuthi luhamba kanjani.“Bakhona abathathu ababoshwa ngaleli cala. Kwaboshwa inkabi kanjalo nababili, omunye wayeshayela omunye kuthiwa walanda izinhlamvu ezabulala umfowethu. Icala lagcina lichithiwe layithetha inkabi. Kuthiwa inkabi isinecala lokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni eliqulwa eMnambithi lapho yabanjwa khona etekisini ilibangise eGoli,” kuqhuba uThobela.Uthe akanalwazi mayelana nokuthi laba abanye abasolwa babekwa amacala okubulala umfowabo.“Akhona namakhansela amabili esifazane ashoyo ukuthi anikwa imali yokukhokhela inkabi. Imoto okuthiwa yasetshenziswa kulokhu kubulala kuthiwa yayebiwe,” kusho uThobela.Ohola ubufakazi kule khomishini, u-Advocate Bheki Manyathi, uthe uzohlangana nophiko lwezokushushisa athole olunye ulwazi ngaleli cala.Omele amaphoyisa kule khomishini, u-Advocate Mthokozisi Ngcobo, uthe bazokhuluma kabanzi ngaleli cala uma sebenza izethulo ngenyanga ezayo.UThobela uthe ngaphambi kokubulawa komfowabo kwaqale kwafakwa isithombe senja ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kwase kufakwa isithombe sekhandlela wabe esebulawa.
title: ‘Umfowethu wabulawa ekade echela’

text: KULINDELEKE ukuthi kuphinde kubuye futhi ukunqamuka kukagesi kuleli njengoba uhulumeni wakuleli ezoxegisa imithetho wokuvalwa kwezwe kusukela ngoMeyi 1 izwe liwelela esigabeni sesine.Ukuxegiswa kwemithetho kusho ukuthi kunezinye zezimboni ezizovunyelwa ukuthi ziqhubeke nokusebenza, okuzokusho ukuqala kokusebenza ngamandla kukagesi, kwazise nezinye izimboni zizolandela njengoba uhulumeni ethe isonto nesonto uzomemezela ukuxegiswa kwemithetho ethile.UMnuz Shaun Nel ongongoti kwezamandla, uthe noma ikanjani usuzoqala ukunqamuka ugesi.“Indaba kagesi kuleli ifana nokufa nokuphila. Noma ngingeke ngakucacisa njengamanje ukuthi kungenzeka nini, abantu abakulindele ukuthi uzonqamuka njengoba sekuzoqala ukusebenza ezinye zezimboni,” kusho uNel. NgokukaMnuz Nick Oosthuizen ongungoti kwezamandla, sisazophinde sikhule isidingo sikagesi, kwazise izinkampani eziningi kuyimanje zivivela ukuvula ukuze ziqale ukusebenza.“Ukunqamuka kwamandla kagesi kuzophazamisa izimboni ezivele ziphazamisekile ngokomnotho ngenxa yokuvalwa kwezwe,” kuchaza u-Oosthuizen.Uthe okubuhlungu, nemishini yokusebenza nayo iyathinteka uma kunqamuka ugesi okuyinto ebeka ibhizinisi esimeni esibucayi.Ngenyanga edlule abakwa-Eskom bathe kungase kuphele ubusika unganqanyuliwe ugesi kuleli. Baveza ukuthi basebenzisa isikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe ukulungisa iziteshi eziphehla amandla, baphinde balungisa nezinkinga zikagesi ezikhona emphakathini. Selokhe kwaqala ukuvalwa kwezwe ngoMashi 27 kuleli ugesi awukaze unqamuka kanti nabakwa-Eskom baqinisekisa abantu bakuleli ukuthu ngeke unqanyulwe ngesikhathi sikathaqa, oqale uyizinsuku eziwu-21 welulwa ngamasonto amabili. NgoLwesihlanu iNingizimu Afrika yonke izobe isesigabeni sesine sokuvalwa kwezwe okusho okuthi izimboni ezidla amandla, okubalwa kuzo izimayini, zibuyela emsebenzini. Nabamabhizinisi ngokunjalo babuyela emsebenzini ngombandela wokuthi kuzovunyelwa u-30% wabasebenzi kuphela ezindaweni zokusebenza. Namhlanje ntambama kulindeleke uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMfundo uNkk Angie Motshekga ukuthi amemezele isinqumo soMnyango ngokubuyela kwabafundi ezikoleni.
title: 'Kuzobuya ukunqamuka kukagesi'

text: UKUSHINTSHA indawo kweKhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso kushayelwe ihlombe yinhlangano iForum 4 Service Delivery (F4SD), incoma ukuthi kuyisinyathelo sokwehlisa izindleko.IKhomishini eholwa yiJaji Raymond Zondo ibilokhu ihleli eParktown selokhu yasungulwa.IJaji uZondo limemezele ukuthi iKhomishini ithuthela esakhiweni esidala okwakuyizindlu zoMkhandlu waseJohannesburg.Lesi simemezelo senziwe ngoLwesine kwathiwa konke kuyalungiswa ukuze kuqale ukusebenza endaweni entsha.I-F4SD kade yaveza umbono wokuthi le khomishini ithuthe ngoba imosha imali eningi ngokukhokha ebhilidini eqashe kulona, iHill on Empire eParktown. Isakhiwo ethuthele kusona ngesikahulumeni nokuchaza ukuthi kuzokongiwa imali ebikhokhwa kulesi sakhiwo abasuka kusona."I-F4SD ijabule ukuzwa ukuthi uZondo ugcine evumile ukuthi ukuhlala kwekhomishini eParktown kudala izindleko.“Sinxusa ukuthi uZondo akhiphe umbiko wesikhashana ngophenyo lwakhe manje,’’ kusho iF4SD esitatimendeni.Kulindeleke ukuthi ikhomishini iqale ukusebenzela endaweni entsha ngoMashi 11, uma isibuya njengoba isahlabe ikhefu lesonto elilodwa. UZondo ushintsha indawo nje, ubesanda kuthola imvume yokwelula isikhathi sekhomishini njengoba wayekhale ngokuthi mningi umsebenzi okufanele wenziwe. -ANA
title: Kunconywe ijaji uZondo ngendawo entsha nezindleko

text: INKAMPANI yomshwalense i-Old Mutual ithi ayikaze ingabaze ukuthi umndeni wakwaMtshali eMadundube ngaphandle kwaKwaDukuza ushonelwe yilungu lawo.Umqondisi omkhulu uMnuz Clarence Nethengwe, uthe ukulibaziseka kokukhokhelwa komndeni wakwaMtshali emuva kokushona kukaMnuz Sifiso Mtshali akwenziwanga wukuthi babengathembi ukuthi ushonile kodwa bebesafuna ukucubungula.Esitatimendeni uthe le nkampani yazama konke okusemandleni ukuphothula isicelo salo mndeni ngokushesha kodwa kwaba nesidingo sokuthi kucutshungulwe ngokwengeziwe.“Sizimisele ukuthi siphucule indlela esicubungula ngayo izicelo ezidinga ukuthi zicutshungulwe ngokwengeziwe. Siyaxolisa ngokuthi kube nokubambezeleka. Sisaqhubeka nokuxoxa nomndeni ngalokhu.”UNksz Thandaza Mtshali umshana kamufi nobabekazi wakhe, uNksz Ntombenhle Mhlongo bathi babenengcindezi yokuthi emakhazeni babala usuku nosuku isidumbu sihleli kubo kanti babengakwazi ukuboleka imali yokungcwaba njengoba kwakusho abakwa-Old Mutual ngoba akusebenzi muntu ekhaya.Babona kungcono ukuthi isidumbu basilethe emahhovisi alo mshwalense KwaDukuza ngoLwesihlanu, olwedlule.Lolu daba lususe umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba lungundabuzekwayo.Ngesikhathi beqithiza isidumbu emahhovisi kukhona owathatha i-video wayisabalalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.
title: Incazelo ye-Old Mutual ngomsindo

text: LUNGI LANGAIZOPHOQELEKA ukuthi ihlehlise imingcwabo imindeni ngenxa yesiteleka sabasebenzi basemakhazeni kahulumeni KwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu kulandela ukuteleka kwabasebenzi benyunyana iPublic And Allied Workers Union (Pawusa) esesithathe izinsuku ezintathu. Abasebenzi bafuna uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal oholwa nguDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo ulungise isimo sabo sokusebenza.Izolo imindeni ebiyenza amalungiselelo okufihla izihlobo zayo ibigodukiswa ngaphandle kwethemba lokuthi izoyifihla kuleli sonto emakhazeni amaningi ahulumeni okubalwa kuwo akuMagwaza Maphalala Street owaziwa ngoGale Street nasePhoenix.UMnuz Ntokozo Hlongwa (32) waseBhamshela uthe bazophoqeleka ukuthi bahlehlise ukufihlwa kukamfowabo uSbika (40) oshone ngeSonto. Uthe baye emakhazeni asePhoenix ngoba bezama ukulungiselela ukumfihla batshelwa ukuthi akusetshenzwa.“Besizitshela ukuthi sizofihla ngoMgqibelo lona esiya kuwo kodwa sesibona sengathi ngeke kusenzeka. Sizophoqeleka ukuthi sihlehlise umngcwabo,” kusho uHlongwa.Uthe selokhu beqale ukuya emakhazeni ngoMsombuluko kodwa akukho abasasizakele ngakho.Uthe bakhathazekile ngoba ngisho emsebenzini bacelile ukuze bathole isikhathi esanele sokwenza amalungiselelo kanti futhi njengoba kumile nje ukufihla nezindleko zamalungiselelo ziyanda. Uthe bebefisa ngisho ukusithatha isidumbu somfowabo basiyise kudokotela ozimele ukuze kwenziwe imicikilisho edingeka ukuthi yenziwe kusona bese bemngcwaba ngempelasonto.Lesi simo sesiphazamise nabanikazi bezinkampani zabangcwabi njengoba kume yonke into.UMnuz Ntokozo Ngema wenkampani yabangcwabi iLighthouse Funeral Directors uthe isiteleka sesiyazwela.“Kuba nzima kakhulu nakithina ngoba imindeni igcina ifaka ingcindezi kithina ifuna ukusheshe ifihle izihlobo zayo kodwa manje ayikho into esingayenza,” kusho uNgema.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo eKZN uMnuz Desmond Motha uxolisile ngokuphazamiseka kwezinhlelo zemindeni ebihlose ukufihla izihlobo zayo.Uthe sebenike abasebenzi abatelekile umyalelo wokuthi babuyele emsebenzini. Ngokusho kwakhe isiteleka sabo asikho emthethweni.“Iningi lezikhalo zabo eziholele ekutheni bateleka lithinta ukuqashwa futhi ngokwazi kwethu sekwaxoxiswana nazo zonke izinyunyana ngazo,” kusho uMotha.Uthe sebecele incwadi yasenkantolo ezovimba ukuqhubeka kwesiteleka.UMotha uthe basungule nolayini ongashayelwa yimindeni ehlangabezana nezinkinga. Abadinga usizo bangashayela ku: 0800 005 133 noma ku:033 395 3046.UMnuz Halalisani Gumede wePawusa uthe abazimisele ngokubuyela emsebenzini kungakacaciswa ngezikhalo zabo. Uthe babe nomhlangano neziphathimandla zoMnyango wezeMpilo ngoLwesibili kodwa abaneme ngendlela ohambe ngayo.“Besilindele ukuthi sizohlangana noDkt Dhlomo kodwa wathumela abanye abantu okubalwa kubo nomphathi wabasebenza emakhazeni. Okunye esingakuqondanga ukuthi babuye bacela kithina ukuthi sibanike amaphepha anemininingwane ngesikhala ngakho. Lama phepha silindele ukuthi banawo,” kusho uGumede.Abasebenzi bakhala ngokuthi abanazo izinsiza kusebenza ezifana nezifonyo nama-gloves, ukungasebenzi kwama-air-conditioning abathi kuholela ekutheni bangenwe yizifo. Baphinde bathi bafuna umnyango ubanike imali obakweleta yona ngoba bathi baqashwa ngamazinga angaphansi kwalawo okwakufanele baqashwe kuwo.
title: Sigadla kwabafelwe esabasebenza emakhazeni

text: ABAHLAZIYI bathi asinikezwe ithuba isikhulu esiphezulu sase-Eskom, uMnuz Andre de Ruyter, siveze amava aso, singagxekwa singakaqali umsebenzi.Usomnotho uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, izolo ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ukuqokwa kwalesi sikhulu kumele kubhekisiswe nxa zonke kodwa okusemqoka ukuba singasheshi sibekwe izici singakaqali nomsebenzi waso.“Engikubhekile ukuthi ngabe uzolenza yini ushintsho e-Eskom nokuthi uzokwazi yini ukuthuthukisa umnotho. Into eba mqoka kulesi sikhundla ukuba nethalente lokukwazi ukuhola abantu, ubahlanganise wenze umsebenzi.“Ukungabi unjiniyela kwakhe akusemqoka uma nje ezosebenza,” kusho uDumisa.Uthe udaba lwebala lakhe yize lungabalulekile emsebenzini azowenza kodwa kuyaqapheleka ukuthi emabhizinisi kahulumeni, abaningi abaqhoqhobele izikhundla abebala elimhlophe noma ezinye izinhlanga.“Khona ngeke sikubalekele ukuthi abantu abamnyama baphathile kokunye bangenza kahle, basifaka kule nkinga.“Kodwa ke ngeke sakubalekela ukuthi kubukeka beletha izinhlanga ezinye, ukuba ziphathe, kungabi abantu bamnyama,” kusho uDumisa.Omunye umhlaziyi, uMnuz Chris Yelland, uthe lesi sikhulu esisha sibhekene nomsebenzi onzima.“Angimazi kodwa kwabake bezwe ngaye kuthiwa ungumuntu owenze umsebenzi omuhle ngaphambilini.“Ngeke ke umuntu samkala ngokuthi usake wenzani ngaphambilini. Sizomkala ngokuthi uzokwazi yini ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe. Akubekelwe ukuthi akwenze ukuhlakaza * -Eskom kathathu ukuze kube noshintsho.“Okubuhlungu ukuthi uvela emabhizinisini azimele, uzongena emabhizinisini omphakathi futhi uzodinga ukwesekwa ngokwezepolitiki. Akayena umuntu okuvela ukuthi uxhumene nabezepolitiki okuzomdalela inkinga. Udaba lwebala lakhe alisho lutho ngoba kufuneka umuntu ozokwenza umsebenzi kuphela. U-Eskom ngeshwa nje akuyona inkampani ongaletha noma ubani azoyiphatha ngoba nakhu uthi umnyama noma umhlophe, kudingeka umuntu okwazi ukusebenza kwaphela nje.“Akanikezwe ithuba enze umsebenzi wakhe bese singamehlulela ke uma sesibona imiphumela,” kusho uYelland.Amaqembu ezepolitiki okubalwa i-ANC, DA ne-IFP ayameseka futhi amfisela nenhlanhla emsebenzini wakhe ngaphandle kwe-EFF ekubeke kwacaca ukuthi ukuqokwa kwakhe kungukucwaswa abantu abamnyama.Kwisitatimende se-EFF ithe: “Ukuqokwa kuka-De Ruyter kuyichilo futhi kuyihlazo, kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi bafuna * -Eskom uwe khona uzophathwa yizinkampani ezizimele. Futhi akusimangazi lokhu abakwenzile.“Ukuqokwa kwakhe kuyingxenye yokucwasa okuholwa uNgqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, obukela phansi abantu base-Afrika,” kusho isitatimende se-EFF.
title: Bacela anikwe ithuba e-Eskom

text: NGAPHANDLE kwamagalelo omqeqeshi, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, abantu abaningi babona efike nokwehlukile noRulani Mokwena oyiphini lakhe kwi-Orlando Pirates.UMokwena ubesebenza kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngaphambi kokufudukela kweZimnyama ekuqaleni kwesizini ka-2017/2018. I-Bucs iqhamuke neqhinga lokushaya iKaizer ngo 3-1 emdlalweni wabakhaya we-Absa Premiership eFNB Stadium, eGoli, ngempelasonto.UMokwena uyanconywa ngobuhlakani kwezokuqeqesha yize esengumqeqeshi osemncane. Abaqeqeshi abaningi bahlale begcizelela ukuthi kubalulekile ukuba nephini eliphapheme ngoba libamba iqhaza empumelelweni yeqembu.“Inkundla yethu (yokuziqeqesha) ihlale idwetshiwe indlela esiziqeqesha ngayo nesifuna ukudlala ngayo. Ingxenye yokwenza lokho ukuyiqonda indlela ofuna ukudlala ngayo bese uhlanganisa indlela yokuqeqesha iqembu ukuze liyiqonde. Sizama ukuthi abadlali bahlale bekhumbula ukuthi sifuna ukudlala kanjani. Imidwebo ikhombisa lapho kufanele babe khona nebhola, ukuthi kudingeka lidlalwe kuphi ngasiphi isikhathi. Sihlanganisa indlela yokudlala ezohlala isikhathi eside,” kusho uMokwena.Indlela edlale ngayo iPirates ibhekene neChiefs kucacile ukuthi beyiwuhlele kahle kakhulu umdlalo.“Ngicabanga ukuthi umqeqeshi weChiefs usevele unikeze ulwazi oluningi ngendlela iqembu lakhe elidlala ngayo. Futhi kuhle ukuthi unesibindi sokuyineka emphakathini. Mhlawumbe bekuyindlela yokuzivikela ngoba ubefakwe ingcindezi, kuthiwa indlela adlala ngayo iwukuvala emuva, upaka ibhasi. Sidlala neqembu eliqeqeshwe kahle, elaziyo ukuthi kufanele lenzenjani uma liphethe ibhola noma lingasaliphethe. Kuyacaca ukuthi iqembu seliyazi ukuthi umqeqeshi ufuna lidlale kanjani. Kuningi esikubonile ngeChiefs, safunda abadlali ngabodwana. Lo mdlalo uzoveza okuningi, uzokhomba indlela ukuthi ibhola laseNingizimu Afrika kufanele libheke kuphi,” kusho uMokwena ngaphambi komdlalo wabakhaya.Nakuba iningi libona iPirates isihlangene futhi ingawushisisa umbango wesicoco seligi kodwa uMokwena ukuchithile lokho. I-Pirates ivule elinye ikhasi ngaphambi kokudlala neChiefs ihlula iChippa United ngo 4-2.UMokwena uthe basekude ukuba neqembu elingashisisa umbango weligi.“Asikafiki ezingeni lapho singathi sibanga isicoco seligi. Okwamanje asinalo iqembu eliqine ngokwanele ukuqhudelana nelakhiwe iminyaka eyisihlanu (Sundowns) nelakhiwe eminyaka emithathu (Chiefs). Okwamanje sisadlule ngamaphuzu ayisithupha kuphela kwesiwathole ngesizini edlule emuva kwemidlalo engu-30. Sicela ukuvunyelwa sakhe iqembu, sakhe indlela esifuna lidlale ngayo. Ngeke kusheshe kwenzeke ngokushesha. Siyakuqonda okufunwa ngabalandeli kodwa lokho ngeke kusenze sishintshe ukucabanga,” kusho uMokwena.I-Pirates izobuyela enkundleni ngoLwesithathu oluzayo emdlalweni weNedbank Cup Last 16 eCape Town Stadium, eKapa. IChiefs yona inomdlalo obukeka ulula njengoba izobhekana neStellenbosch FC, egijima kwiNational First Division (NFD), eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ngoMgqibelo ngo-8.15 ebusuku.Imidlalo yeNedbank Cup Last 16:NgoLwesihlanu: AmaZulu FC v Ubuntu Cape Town (Princess Magogo Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Baroka FC v Steenberg United (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3.30pm); Free State Stars v Chippa United (Goble Park, 3.30pm); Kaizer Chiefs v Stellenbosch (Moses Mabhida Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Bloemfontein Celtic v Richards Bay (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3.30pm); Royal Eagles v Maritzburg United (Princess Magogo, 3.30pm);NgoLwesibili: Mamelodi Sundowns v EC Bees (Lucas Moripe Stadium, 7.30pm)NgoLwesithathu: Cape Town City FC v Orlando Pirates (Cape Town Stadium, 7.30pm)
title: Ayabonakala amagalelo kaRulani

text: NKOSIKHONA CELEBAKHUNGATHEKILE abesilisa abathathu abathi bondliswe ingane eyodwa ngowesifazane abebethandana naye ngokwehluka.Laba besilisa basanda kwenzela le ngane yomfana iziphihli zamaphathi okuqeda unyaka ubaba ngamunye. Basola  unina wengane oneminyaka engu-20 (esingeke silidalule igama lakhe ukuvikela ingane) waseChatsworth ngokudlala  ‘ isitokofela’  ngengane.Ngokokuthola kwaleli phephandaba, ithumbu mayelana nalokhu obese kuqhubeke unyaka wonke, liqhunjuswe ngelinye lamalungu omndeni elazise omunye wobaba ukuthi kudlalwa ngaye.Omunye wobaba bengane oneminyaka engu-30 waseMzimkhulu, uthi ubefika njalo kubo kukanina wengane ezoletha izimfanelo zengane.“ U.........ungitshele ukuthi empeleni sibathathu esifika sidedelana ukuzoletha izimfanelo zengane,” kusho lo yise wengane othi usanda kuyenzela umcimbi wokuthi iqede unyaka izelwe.Ezwa lezo zindaba uthi unqume ukuxhumana nalaba abanye ababili, agcine ebatholile. Nabo bakhuze ibhadi.“Mina angikaze ngiyibone into enje. Waze wasigila u.......“Okungiphatha kabi ukuthi ngichithe imali eningi ngale ngane futhi naye bese ngihlela ukumlobola,” ebalisa.Uthi nyanga zonke ubekhipha uR1 500. Aphinde athengele ingane izingubo zokugqoka nokudla.Uthi ingane ike yabangwa nezibi, nangaleso sikhathi kunemali abeyinikeza unina yokuthi ingane igqigqe kodokotela.Omunye uyise wengane oneminyaka ewu-31 oyiphoyisa, utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi uhlangane nonina wengane ngo-2018, naye uthi bahlangane eChatsworth.Uthi ngesikhathi behlangana inkukhu yawusola umgqakazo, ebona sengathi lo wesifazane usekhulelwe.“Sengibona manje ukuthi engangikusola kwakuyikho”.Uthe nyanga zonke ubekhipha uR1200 wokondla ingane. Uthi ngoJulayi nonyaka usebenzise uR4 500 enzela ingane iphathi yokubungaza usuku lokuzalwa.Ngaphandle kwalokho, uthi uyenzele nomsebenzi wokuyibika emadlozini, wayihlabele imbuzi.Uthi ukhiphe imali eshisiwe kwelashwa ingane njengoba ike yagula, wasebenzisa uR14 000 ezibhedlela ezizimela.Naye uthe ngoMashi ubehlela ukuyomlobala unina wengane.Owesithathu yena oneminyaka ewu-29 uthi bese kuphele iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili u-8 bendawonye.NgoDisemba uthi naye ubehlela ukuyovela kubo kukanina wengane ecabanga ukuthi usethole umfazi.“Ngiyabonga ukuthi lokhu kuvele ngingakayi ukuyomlobola,” usho kanje.Uthi wahlangana naye ngo-2014 eChatsworth njengoba esebenza kwesinye sezitolo e-The Ridge kule ndawo.“Akaqali ukungigila u...... Angazi ukuthi kungani bengiqhubeka nokumethemba. Ngo-2018 wangenzela isimanga ekhipha isisu,” echaza.Ukhale ngoR6 000 athi uwusebenzisele ukwenza iphathi yengane, abeyihlanganise nomcimbi wokuyibika edlozini.Bobathathu bakhale ngokuthi lo wesifazane wenqaba ukuba baqambe ingane igama.Wangagcina lapho ingane wayibiza ngesibongo sikamkhulu wakhe, wazishaya ngesithende zontathu izibongo zabo.
