Bobathathu basole uninakhulu walo wesifazane ngokuba ngungqondongqo “walo mdlalo”.Ngemuva kokuthi unina wengane nonina bezwe lezi zindaba zokwazana koyise bengane, kuthiwa  babalekile eChatsworth bagcwele amathafa, abaziwa ukuthi amabombo bawabhekisephi.Naleli phephandaba lifike kukhala ibhungane ekhaya lalo wesifazane.Ethintwa ngocingo lo wesifazane, ugagule omunye walabo ‘baba’ njengoyise wangempela wengane. Abanye wabaphika.Ezithombeni labo baba babonakala bonke beshuthe nale ngane.Kuyavela futhi ukuthi empeleni kukhona owesilisa wesine naye owazi ukuthi unguyise wale ngane,kodwa imizamo yokuxhumana naye ayiphumelelanga.Laba besilisa bathe bahlale phansi baxoxisana bavumelana ngokuthi bazomphoqa lo wesifazane ukuthi kuyokwenziwa ulibofuzo, ukuze kucace ukuthi ngempela ingane ekabani.
title: Wondlise amadoda amathathu ingane eyodwa

text: SIPHENYWA wuphiko oluphenya amacala athinta amphoyisa i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID) isigameko sokudutshulwa komlingisi uPatrick Shai eSoweto kuleli sonto.Ibamba lo mkhulumeli we-IPID, uSontaga Seisa uthe bathole isikhalo sokudubula lapho kushayeke khona uShai ngezinhlamvu zenjoloba wathola ukulimala.“Imibiko engaqinisekisiwe ithi amanye amalungu omphakathi nawo adubulekile futhi alimala ngesikhathi kulimala uShai. Abaphenyi bethu bathunyelwe endaweni emuva kwesigameko kodwa baze bakwazi ukuthola isitatimende sikaShai namhlanje (izolo) futhi idokodo livuliwe ladluliselwa kwi-IPID ukuthi kuphenywe. Uphenyo lwethu luyaqhubeka,” kusho uSeisa.UShai uthe isihluku samaphoyisa asithetheleleki eNingizimu Afrika.Lo mlingisi we-7de Laan udutshulwe ezama ukulamula umphakathi obuthukuthele ngenxa yokunqanyulwa kukagesi.Imibiko ithi umphakathi ukweleta i-Eskom imali engaphezu kukaR18 million. Ugesi selokhu wanqamuka ngoLwesihlanu.UShai ohlala kule ndawo kodwa ongaphazamisekanga ngenxa yokunqanyulwa kukagesi, utshele i-The Star enguzakwabo neSolezwe, ukuthi uye egaraji eyothenga isinkwa nephephandaba lapho bekuqhubeka khona umbhikisho.“Ngiye lapha njengomuntu omdala ngazama ukudambisa isimo futhi ngicela amalungu omphakathi okuthi angashisi amanye amathayi.”Uthe isimo besishubile phakathi komphakathi namaphoyisa futhi uzwe elinye iphoyisa lithi “lizobakhombisa”.“Mina bengimi phakathi kwamaphoyisa nomphakathi ngincenga amaphoyisa ngiphakamise izandla ngithi ‘ningayenzi leyonto."Lo mlingisi uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela iTshepo Themba Private emuva kokudubuleka ngezinhlamvu zenjoloba emhlane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseGauteng, uMathapelo Peters uthe amaphoyisa asebenzise izinhlamvu zenjoloba ukuhlakaza isixuku sababhikishi abalinganiselwa ku-200.Uthe ababhikishi bahlasele amaphoyisa ngesikhathi amaphoyisa kaMasipala waseGoli esusa okuvale umgwaqo u-Elias Motsoaledi. UShai kodwa uthe ababhikishi bebengenalo udlame.“Ukube bebejikijela amatshe bengizoba ngowokuqala ukushayeka ngoba bengimi phakathi komphakathi namaphoyisa.”UShai ukhale ngokuziphatha kwamaphoyisa agcina ukuthula emphakathini wathi ngisho awangesikhathi sobandlululo ayenikeza ababhikishi isixwayiso semizuzu emithathu ngaphambi kokudubula.
title: I-IPID iphenya elokudutshulwa kukaShai

text: AZINIKELE kwabomthetho, aboshwa amaphoyisa angu-11 asolwa ngokushaya nokubulala owesilisa owayengumshayeli wetekisi, ayemfuna isibhamu kwa-C oLundi ngo-Okthoba 7 nyakenye.La maphoyisa avele enkantolo yesiFunda eMahlabathini ngoLwesithathu, akhululwa ngebheyili kaR3 000 umuntu emunye.Icala lawo lokubulala, ukuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho nokushaya lihlehliselwe uMashi 23 nonyaka. Incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kwala maphoyisa ikhishwe yile nkantolo ngoFebhuwari 10.Asolwa ngokushaya kanzima uMnuz Lindani “Mandondo” Dludla (31) owashonela esibhedlela eNkonjeni. Uphiko oluphenya ngezenzo zamaphoyisa, i-Independent Investigative Directorate Directorate (IPID), ihlele ukuboshwa kwala maphoyisa kanti asebenzela ezindaweni ezahlukene.Kwababoshiwe kubalwa (sishoda ngamaranks amaphoyisa) uMziwakhe Nsibande (49), uKhulekani Gina (50),  Mpiloyakhe Magwaza (39), Lizwi Mvundla (37) Thabani Ndlovu (45), Shengelezi Buthelezi (53), Sibusiso Mhlongo (39), Njabulo Wela (37), Selby Zulu (39) no-Ayanda Msomi.Kukhona asebenzela esiteshini saseMahlabathini, kwezobunhloli oLundi, uphiko iK9 eVryheid, esiteshini eMagudu oPhongolo nayisihlanu asuka esiteshini saseNanda ophikweni iTactical Response Team (TRT).Azehlanga kahle kwaDludla izindaba zokukhululwa kwamaphoyisa ngebheyili. Bebefuna agqunywe esitokisini, bese egixabezwa ngezigwebo ezinzima uma sekuphela ukuqulwa kwecala.Ubaba kaDludla, ocele lingadalulwa igama lakhe ephepheni, uthe abaziswanga ngokuvela kwamaphoyisa enkantolo. Uthe ufonelwe abafana bendawo bemazisa ngakho abaze bamlanda emsebenzini ngemoto bamyisa enkantolo.“Kukhona ukwenzelela okukhona, bayachanasa abavalelwanga nasesitokisini ekubeni beyingozi emphakathini. Ingane yami yayishaywa iboshwe izandla ingakwazi ukuzivikela, imbozwe ngoplastiki ikhanda ishokhwa ngogesi yophela ngaphakathi. Yayiphalaza igazi, ngayiyisa esibhedlela lapho yashonela khona,” kusho ubaba kamufi ngosizi.Kwasusa izibhelu emphakathini ukusocongwa kukaDludla, kwavalwa thaqa imigwaqo engena nephuma edolobheni oLundi ngamathayi avutha, nodoti namatshe abantu befuna kuboshwe amaphoyisa athintekayo.Umbiko kadokotela woMbuso wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu wathi uDludla wazishonela ngokwakhe. Lokhu kwagovuza umphakathi kwaphoqa ukuthi sihlolwe kabusha ngudokotela ozimele isidumbu, nokuyilapho kwavela ukuthi ubulawe ngokushaywa encishwe umoya.Umufi washiya emhlabeni abantwana abathathu, umkhulu wabo athe badonsa kanzima.
title: Kuboshwe amaphoyisa (11) kwelokubulala umshayeli oLundi

text: INDAWO yaseBergville esifundeni Uthukela, ayigcini kuphela ngokwaziwa ngokwembatha izintaba zoKhahlamba nokuba yisizalo somfula uThukela, kodwa kulezi zinsuku yaziwa njengesizinda okudabuka kuso unondweba onohlonze obaqwaqwade bonke ngesizini ka-2016/17 kuPremier Soccer League (PSL).Kukule ndawo lapho kudabuka khona unondweba uPhelelani Ndaba, okunguyena okhale wemuka nomklomelo wokuba yiPSL Referee of the Season emcimbini wemiklomelo yePSL eSandton Convention Centre yodumo, eGoli, ngeledlule.UNdaba (43) udabuka e-Actor Homes, eBergville.Phambilini isifunda Uthukela besaziwa ngokukhiqiza abadlali abanohlonze. Phakathi kwabo okubalwa uBlessing “Killer” Mgidi (ongasekho) wodumo kwiMoroka Swallows ne-Orlando Pirates, Oscar “Jazzman” Dlamini wodumo kwi-Orlando Pirates, Phumlani “BMX” Mkhize wodumo kwi-African Wanderers ne-Orlando Pirates, Diyo “Msindisi” Sibisi ozakhele igama kwiFree State Stars neMaritzburg United, noThamsanqa “Gandaganda” Gabuza ongumgadli we-Orlando Pirates, ukubala abambalwa.Engxoxweni ekhethekile abe nayo neSolezwe ngoMgqibelo, uNdaba uthe lo mklomelo usho lukhulu kuye njengomunye wonompempe okukade babenethwa zimvula ezigabeni eziphansi.“Lo mklomelo usho ukuthi ngisebenzile. Bekungelula, kodwa-ke ngisebenzile ngawafaka wonke amava enginawo."Ngiyazi ukuthi bengiqokwe nonompempe abasezingeni eliphezulu kwiPSL."Ngakho ukuthola kwami umklomelo onjengalona kukhombisa ukuthi bakhona abawubonayo umfutho engiwufakayo.“Nokho-ke lokho akuchazi ukuthi sengingcono, kodwa kungigqugquzela ekutheni ngisebenze kakhulu kunakuqala ngoba ngesizini ezayo amehlo azobe ethe njo kimina ukubheka ukuthi ngizokwazi yini ukuqhubeka lapho engigcine khona, ukufakazela ukuthi bekungifanele ngempela yini ukuthola lo mklomelo engiwutholile,” kusho uNdaba.Lo nondweba uqale ukuba ngunondweba ngo-2001 kwiLocal Football Association (LFA) waseNquthu lapho abefundisa khona enguthisha eminyakeni edlule.“Ngaqala ngingumdlali webhola nginephupho nami lokudlala esigabeni esikhokhelayo, kodwa-ke ngenxa yomsebenzi neminyaka ngabona kungcono ngithathe lo mkhakha wonompempe.“Ngiqale ezingeni le-LFA eNquthu, ngathuthuka ngadlalisa kwiVodacom League, osuwu-ABC Motsepe League manje, kwaze kwaba ngikhushulelwa esigabeni sePSL/NFD ngesizini ka-2007/08.“Phakathi kwabantu engingasho ngingahlonizi ukuthi yibona abangelekele kakhu ekungicijeni nasekungivuleni umqondo kulo mkhakha wonompempe ezingeni lesifundazwe nakuzwelonke, ngibala oCryil “CB” Khumalo, George Boodhoo, Vincent Alli, noSlyvester Ndaba. Lawa ngamadoda abe nesandla ekufikeni kwami kuleli zinga engikulo namhlanje,” kuqhuba uNdaba, osenephupho lokudlalisa ezingeni leCAF neFIFA.Ebuzwa ngemali eholwa ngonondweba, uNdaba uthe: “Kahle hle imali abakhokhelwa yona onompempe ayigculisi neze, okuyingakho abanye begcina belingeka, kodwa kancane kancane siyethemba kuyoze kulunge.“Nokho, ngifisa onompempe bafunde ukweneliswa yilokhu abakutholayo ngoba kwenza umehluko omkhulu ezimpilweni zabo."Bagweme ukwemukela intshontsho ngoba lokho kungagcina kubafake ejele kuphinde kubalahlekisele ngekusasa labo kulo mkhakha, kungcolise negama lomkhakha wonompempe,” kuphetha uNdaba, obe esekhuthaza onompempe abasakhula ngokusebenza kanzima nokuzithuthukisa ngolwazi ukuze bafinyelele ezingeni eliphezulu.Ongusihlalo wonondwebwa KwaZulu-Natal, uCryil “CB” Khumalo, oyingqwele eqinise ukhakhayi uNdaba, uthe: “Ngiyaziqhenya ngempumelelo kaPhelelani, ngoba ungomunye wonompempe abadlule ezandleni zami. Ijezi lokuqala adlalisa ngalo kwiLFA yaseNquthu kwakuyijezi lami engangimeboleke lona okwakufanele alibuyise, kodwa wagcina engalibuyisanga.“Ngalifuna lelo jezi ngakhathala, ngaze ngayeka (esho sakuncokola), ngingazi ukuthi kanti yilo elalimfaka ugqozi lokuba ngunompempe osekuleli zinga akulo namhlanje,” kusho uKhumalo ophinde abe sekomitini lokuqoka onondweba bePSL.“UPhelelani ube yi-fourth official isikhathi eside kuPSL, lokhu esikubiza ngokuba 'sejalidini' ngolimi lonondweba, engalitholi ithuba lokudlalisa. Nokuthe lapho elithola,. walibamba ngazo zombili,” kuqhuba uKhumalo.Le ngwevu kwezobunondweba ithi yize uNdaba eshaye into ecokeme ngesizini edlule, kodwa asemancane amathuba okuthi adlalise kweyeCAF ngenhla yeminyaka yakhe yobudala.Okunye ngoNdaba:. Usebenza njenge-subject adviser ezifundweni zeScience ehhovisi eliseDundee loMnyango wezeMfundo esifundeni Umzinyathi. Udlalise isikhathi eside kwiNFD ngaphambikokudlalisa ku-Absa Premiership ngesizini ka-2015/16. Udlalise ifayineli yakhe yokuqala kwiPSL ngeyeNedbank Cup ebiphakathi kwe-Orlando Pirates neSupersport United eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngoJuni. Ushadelwe, uhlala nomkakhe nezingane ezimbili kwezine emzini wakhe eDundee
title: Uxwayisa onompempe ngentshontsho

text: ZONKE izifunda KwaZulu-Natal zizongena esigabeni sesithathu sokuvalwa kwezwe uma zilandele imigomo.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ngeSonto uthe lokhu akusho ukuthi zonke izinkampani ezivumelekile ukuthi zivule kulesi sigaba zizovula kodwa kuzovula lezo ezikhombisa ukuthi ziyilandelile yonke imigomo yokunqanda ukusabalala kwe-Corona.UZikalala usho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nezintatheli echaza ngesimo sesifundazwe mayelana nokulawulwa kokusabalala kwaleli gciwane eThekwini.Uthe izifunda iTheku noMgungundlovu bezihamba phambili ngabantu abaningi abanegciwane kodwa manje neLembe selingene kulezo zifunda ezinabantu abaningi abanaleli gciwane.EThekwini bangu-866 abantu abanaleli gciwane, kwiLembe bangu-326 , eMgungundlovu bangu-64. Uthe phambilini bekubonakala sengathi abahaqwa yileli gciwane abasezindaweni ezisemadolobheni kodwa manje selihlasela nasemalokishini.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu uthe ngeke bakudalule ukuthi yiziphi izindawo ezinabantu abaningi abanaleli gciwane eThekwini, ngoba kuzokwenza ukuthi abantu abahlala kulezindawo bakhishwe inyumbazana.UZikalala uqhube wathi yize siphezulu isibalo sabahaqekile likhona ithemba njengoba kubantu abangu-1 498 abanaleli gciwane abangu-806 sebeluleme. Bangu-45 abantu ababulawe yileli gciwane kulesi sifundazwe.“Okunye okusinika ithemba ukuthi izibalo zangoMgqibelo zikhomba ukuthi akekho umuntu obulelwe yigciwane KwaZulu-Natal kanti njalo ngosuku bekushona umuntu oyedwa noma ababili. Lokhu kusikhombisa ukuthi ukhona umehluko. Isifundazwe sethu njengamanje singesesine kwezihamba phambili ngabantu abanaleli gciwane kuleli. Lesi sifundazwe sike sahamba phambili ngabantu abashonayo,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe esigabeni sesithathu kuzoxegiswa okuningi okusho ukuthi izinkampani eziningi zingavulwa babe baningi abantu abahambayo.“Njengamanje sikulungele ukubhekana nezinselelo ezingase ziqhamuke kulesi sigaba. Sinemibhede engu-6 400 elungiselelwe ukulalisa abanaleli gciwane. Izinkampani ezifisa ukuzithuthela abantu bazo ngezimoto zazo zingakwenza lokho futhi kuphephile," kuqhuba uNdunankulu.UNkk Simelane-Zulu uthe bayazi ukuthi kuzoba nezingqinamba ezintsha kodwa izikhungo zezempilo ezikhona zikulungele ukubhekana nalezo zingqinamba. Uthe bafike ngeSonto odokotela baseCuba abangu-38 abazolekelela kulesi sifundazwe kodwa bazokwethulwa ngokusemthethweni ngokuhamba kwesonto.UZikalala uthe kudingeka imali eningi ukuze izikole zakulesi sifundazwe zikwazi ukuvulwa. Uthe uhulumeni kazwelonke wazisiwe ngalokho basalinde ukuthi uphendule.“Uma zivulwa izikole ngoJuni 1 isikole ngasinye kuzofunda ikilasi elilodwa okusho ukuthi sizoba naso isikhathi sokulungisa konke okunye okudinga ukulungiswa ukuze kufunde amakilasi wonke,” kusho yena.
title: Kuzoxegiselwa izifunda ezilandela imigomo KwaZulu-Natal

text: AMAPHOYISA athungatha umsolwa odlwengule isalukazi esineminyaka engu-73 eMid Illovo, wabe esethatha yonke igilosa yaso kaKhisimusi, okubalwa nenyama ebigcwele ifriji.Isalukazi esingeke sidalulwe njengoba sidlwenguliwe ngoLwesine, ngeledlule kade silele emzini waso, siphaphame sekukhona umuntu esingamazi endlini.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, umsolwa ube esesibopha izandla nezinyawo wasidlwengula ubusuku bonke.Ekuseni umsolwa kuthiwa uthathe igilosa, okubalwa nenyama ebisefrijini wahamba nakho.Umthombo osondelene necala, ongathandanga ukudalulwa uthe isalukazi sisale singenalutho futhi silimele njengoba sidlwengulwe ngesihluku.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi isalukazi siphuthunyiswe esibhedlela emva kwesigameko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile isigameko wathi basamthungatha umdlwenguli.“Kuvulwe amacala okubamba inkunzi nelokudlwengulwa, esiteshini saseMid Illovo. Idokoko liyiswe ophikweni oluphenya amacala athinta udlame lomndeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala ezocansi ePlessislaer, ukuze aphenye.”Amaphoyisa anxuse abangaba nolwazi ngokuhlaselwa kwesalukazi ukuba balethe ulwazi kunoma yisiphi isiteshi samaphoyisa.Kuvele ukuthi isalukazi sihlala sodwa emzini waso.
title: Udlwengule isalukazi washaya wachitha negilosa yaso kaKhisimusi

text: UMNDENI wentombazane ebifunda eMaqhingendoda High, eminze ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule emfuleni uMfolozi iphuma ukuyokha umcako,  uthi ukukhishwa kwemiphumela yabafundi baka-matric ngelizayo kuzovusa izilonda ngoba lo mfundi uzobe engasekho. UMnuz Nimrod Mphathiseni Bophela (64) waseMfolozi eMhlophe oLundi,  onguyise kaSamukelisiwe Bophela (18) omukile, utshele Isolezwe  ukuthi yize sebemngcwabile,  kodwa isimo sisazoba nzima emndenini njengoba uMnyango wezeMfundo kuleli uzokhipha imiphumela ka-matric maduze. Uthe imiphumela kamufi izokwenza kuvuke iminjunju emndenini.“Besijabulile sonke siyilinde ngabomvu imiphumela yakhe. Njengoba sesizithola sibhekene nalesi sehlo, siyabona ukuthi ngeke kusiphathe kahle  ukuphuma kwayo (imiphumela). Sizwa izinhliziyo zethu zithunukala uma sicabanga ngemiphumela ka-matric ebesiyilindele,” kuchaza uBophela.Echaza ngokumuka kwendodakazi yakhe, uthe yayihamba nabazala bayo abane beyokha umcako eyayihlose ukuhamba nawo uma isibuyela oLundi njengoba yayivakashele koninalume KwaCeza. Uthe ngosuku abaya ngalo emfuleni, amanzi ayesho phezulu ngenxa yemvula enamandla egasele Esidakeni, KwaCeza emasontweni adlule.Umufi wamuka nabazala bakhe abane. Oyedwa kuthiwa waphuma emfuleni maqede wamemeza efuna usizo. Kuthiwa umlisa owabona lezi zingane ziminza, wangena emfuleni watakula abazala bakaSamukelisiwe abaphuma kuwo bephila. Umufi kuthiwa watakulwa eseshonile.Ikhansela lendawo uMnuz Manyomfana Masondo, lithe inkinga ekhungethe amalungu omphakathi wukungabibikho kwebhuloho eliseduze elingasetshenziswa ngabantu abasuke bewela.“Ibhuloho elikhona likude kakhulu nendawo abawela kuyo abantu basendaweni. Silinde ukuzwa izinhlelo mayelana nokwakhiwa kwalo Esidakeni njengoba umasipala uyaye uqale ulinde uhlelo lokukhishwa kwemali ebhekele intuthuko.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ekhuluma nozakwabo weSolezwe iSunday Tribune, uthe kuvulwe idokodo lokufa komuntu esiteshini samaphoyisa aKwaCeza.
title: Iminjunju emndenini womfundi obelindele imiphumela

text:
NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEU SESIMENI esibucayi umfana oneminyaka engu-12 ongeniswe esibhedlela ngoba egwazwe ngumngani wakhe ekhanda ngommese ngemuva kwengxabano ababe nayo bedlala ibhola KwaNxamalala eSweetwaters, eMgungundlovu.Ngokwezincwadi zikadokotela ezibonwe yi
Solezwe, u-Andiswa Nxele (12) ufe ubuchopho (
brain dead) esigamekweni okuthiwa senzeke kwamakhelwane ngempelasonto.Izolo umsolwa, oneminyaka engu-11, uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi eMgungundlovu.Kucishe kwasuka uthuli lwezichwe abakwa-Andiswa bebhoka ngesikhathi bevalelwa ngaphandle enkantolo ngenkathi kuvela umsolwa, ehamba nonina. Umndeni uthe ufuna umsolwa ajeze njengoba ingane yabo “ifa esibhedlela”.Ngokusho kukagogo ka-Andiswa, uNkk Thembile Nxele, uthe bafice umfana elele phansi opha ekhanda, enenxeba lokugwazwa.“Kumanje ngisangene, ingane yami (umzukulu) iphefumula ngemishini egumbini labagula kakhulu. Selokhu yangena esibhedlela ayikhulumi, ayikwazi nakunyakaza.“Odokotela bangitshele ukuthi ubuchopho bufile, yathinteka ubuchopho ngento ecijile eyangena ekhanda.“Okungiphatha kabi wukuthi izigilamkhuba ziyacanasa ngaphandle. Ngifuna umthetho ubajezise – abasolwa bavalelwe ejele njengoba sibhekene nalesi simo sengane exinekile esibhedlela,” kusho uNkk Nxele ekhala.Umndeni utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ulande lo mfana kamakhelwane elaliswe phansi ngaphandle kwendlu, bamfica igazi ligobhoza ekhanda.Bathe laba bafanyana abangabangani nababedlala ibhola kube nengxabano, okwangenelela kuyo unina kamsolwa.“Kufike ingane ekhaya izobika ukuthi u-Andiswa uyalinyanzwa kwamakhelwane, sifike khona igazi ligcwele yonke indawo. Ubengasakhulumi engakwazi nokunyakaza, sabe sesimphuthumisa esibhedlela.“Ngokuthola kwethu unina womsolwa uzwe ngokuxabana kwalaba bafana. Wafika ekhaya ezofuna ingane ngenkani. Ekhaya bekukhona izingane zodwa ezamtshela (unina womsolwa) ukuthi akobuya uma sekufike abadala. Wadumela ingane wahamba nayo eyishaya endleleni,” kusho uNkk Nxele.Ngokusho komndeni obugcwele enkantolo izolo uzwe ngezinye izingane ezazidlala no-Andiswa nomsolwa ukuthi unina womsolwa ubebambe ummangalelwa eyalela umsolwa ukuthi amgwaze ngommese ekhanda “ukuze ezothola isifundo” ngemva kokuxabana kwabo.Unina womsolwa kuthiwa nguye obevulelwe icala kodwa wadedelwa esitokisini ngenxa yokuthi unezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ekhulelwe.Unina kamsolwa bekungakacaci ukuthi likhona icala avulelwe lona.Icala lingene izolo esithe ngenxa yeminyaka yomsolwa.Icala lihlehlele uJulayi 2 ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo.
title: Umfana (12) ugwazwe ekhanda

text: KUSHONE ingane eyodwa kwalimala nezintathu ngesikhathi kushayisana itekisi nemoto encane ebhulohweni lomgwaqo uChurch eMgungundlovu.Okhulumela abosizo oluphuthumayo, uMnuz Russel Meiring, uthe bafike endaweni yesigameko itekisi lisemgwaqweni, imoto encane itholakale imi phakathi nomgwaqo.“Izingane ezimbili zitholakale zilele ngaphandle kwemoto encane. Abosizo oluphuthumayo baxilonge abalimele bathola ukuthi intombazane eneminyaka engu-14 ilimele kakhulu kanti akukho abebengayenzela khona yashonela endaweni okwenzeke kuyo ingozi,” kusho uMeiring.Abanye abathathu abalimele okubalwa nomfana oneminyaka eyisithupha baxilongwe endaweni yesehlo ngenxa yokulimala okungatheni.“Abalimele baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela futhi namaphoyisa abekhona ukuphenya ngembangela yengozi,” kusho uMeiring.
title: Ingozi yetekisi nemoto encane idlule nomphefumulo wengane

text:
Umbuzo:Sawubona sisi MaGumede, ngicela ungibonise lapha nakhu ngisenkingeni. Ngingowesifazane ngithandana nobhuti wokufika kuleli ungowokudabuka eMalawi. Ngiyamthanda impela MaGumede futhi ngizimisele ukuba naye impilo yami yonke.Ezinyangeni ezedlule uke wakhuluma ngendaba yokuya kovela ekhaya, ayi impela ngajabula nami ngoba ngiyamthanda.Inkinga ekhaya ngithe uma ngiyixoxa le nto babhoka ngolaka bathi sengifuna ukubalethela izilwanyakazana layikhaya.Umama uyena nje oyihlabe wayihlikiza wathi maningi kabi amadoda la ngaphandle ukuthi sengingaze ngigane indoda engingayazi ukuthi eyakuziphi izinkalo.Usho nokusho ukuthi ngiyokwenzenjani uma ngifika ngiphekwa le eMalawi. Lo bhuti sengithandane naye cishe iminyaka emine futhi unomuzi khona la eThekwini ngoba ngisho singashada siyoqhubeka sihlale lapha kodwa siye kubo ngokuyovakasha.Manje angazi le nto ngizoyenzenjani sisi ngoba ngiyamthanda futhi angeke ngize ngimyeke.Impendulo:Sawubona sisi wami, ngiyayizwa impela inkinga obhekene nayo futhi ibuhlungu kakhulu ngoba angazi basavelaphi abantu abafana nabantu bakini abasacwasa abantu bokufika kuleli, ngoba sonke singabantu abamnyama.Kuyacaca ukuthi sikhulu isikole okusamele sifakwe kubantu bakini ukuze bezokhipha le nto abazitshela yona.Okwamanje awuthi ukubayeka kancane kodwa uqhubeke nokuzithandanela nomuntu wakho kodwa kungakuhle ungamtsheli iqiniso ukuthi kungani kuzomele alinde kancane ukuya kini ngoba mhlawumbe lokho kungamenza adikibale abone ukuthi akafunwa umuntu kini futhi azibone engelutho.Sisi wami ungavumeli abantu bakini noma ngabe ubani akutshele okanye akukhethele ukuthi ubani okufanele uthandane naye nokungafanele uthandane naye.Okubalulekile ukujabula kwakho nomuntu wakho ngoba omunye umuntu oseceleni angeke anenzele lutho.Umbuzo:Sawubona sisi MaGumede ngicela ungibonise dadewethu. Ngingowesilisa ngithandana nomunye usisi nje engimthanda ngenhliziyo yami yonke kodwa manje ngihlukumezekile.Uyangihlukumeza lo muntu wesifazane bakwethu. Ukhuluma noma yikanjani nami ngisho phambi kwabantu akanginiki isithunzi sami njengendoda. Ngiyamthanda sisi MaGumede futhi akuphumeki kuye ngoba ngike ngazama ukumshiya kodwa ngabuye ngamncenga mina futhi.Ngelinye ilanga sibe nokuhilizisana okuncanyana wavele wadinwa wangiqulela ngepuleti lokudla abekuphethe, hhayi ngoba ngimsaba kodwa ngake ngamthusa ngempama wavele watshela abafowabo bathi bazongidubula. Manje sengiyasaba.Ngiyacela MaGumede ungibonise ukuthi ngingenza kanjani ukuphuma kule nkinga engikuyona. Akusavumi nakimi ngoba ngibukeka njengesiyoyoyo sendoda.Impendulo:Sawubona bhuti wami, kubuke sengathi ubhekene nenkinga enkulu ngempela kulolo thando.Okwamanje ungasheshe ufune ukumshiya ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi inhliziyo ayikadeli uyena, yekela inhliziyo ize izanelise ngaye lapho-ke uzobona kuzophumeka kalula kuyena.Mhlawumbe futhi naye akazenzi kodwa unenkinga anayo adinga usizo kuyona okanye wake wahlukumezeka phambilini.Bakhona nabaluleki bezothando abaqeqeshiwe, mhlawumbe nabo bangakwazi ukunilekelela kule nkinga yenu ngoba uyasho ukuthi usamthanda.Kungenzeka futhi uthi uyamyeka uvele uthole ogxajelwa ikhanda. Sukuma uhambe uyomfunela usizo mhlawumbe uzolujabulela ngoba kubukeka sengathi ikhona inkinga anayo.Umbuzo:Sawubona dadewethu ngingumlandeli omkhulu wengosi yakho.Ngingowesilisa osethe ukuqinelwa ukhakhayi impela. Yebo likhona itoho engilibambayo kodwa manje nginenkinga yokuthi nginebhadi lokuthola abantu besifazane abathanda kakhulu izinto ngendlela yokuthi umholo wami ugcina usuphelela endleleni ngigcine ngingasakwazi ukuziphilisa mina uqobo ngoba nasekhaya futhi babheke mina.MaGumede, osisi engibatholayo bayabiza kakhulu ngoba bavele bafune izinto ezibizayo kanti mina ngiyile nhlobo yendoda engakwazi ukunqaba nokuncisha umuntu wesifazane into.Ngize ngizibone sengathi angiphilile kahle ekhanda ngenxa yokuthi ngincamela ukulala ngingadlile impela kunokuthi yena angayitholi le nto ayifunayo.Impendulo:Ayi bengingazi ukuthi asekhona amadoda afana nawe, alala engadlile ngoba enakekela izintombi zawo.Angazi ukuthi ngizokwenza kanjani ukuthi uwuyeke lo mkhuba wakho wokudiza kangaka.Nginesiqiniseko ukuthi nasendaweni usuyaziwa ukuthi ungumaliyavuza futhi abantu besifazane sebenegama abakubiza ngalo.Akushiwo ukuthi ungamnakekeli umuntu wakho kodwa kumele nawe ungazilibali. Uma ungenayo imali, akulona icala lelo. Menzele lokho onamandla akho.Kusukela manje yenza izinhlelo ngemali yakho ukwazi ukuzikalela ukuthi yini nani ozoyenza esemqoka. Lokho kuzokusiza ukuthi ungagcini usulala ungadlile.- 
Kuphendula uDistance Gumede
title: Ezothando: Ngimthanda ngenhliziyo yami yonke kodwa ngihlukemezekile

text: KUSHAQEKE umndeni isoka leminyaka licuthela intombi ngovivi, iya esikoleni layigwaza liphindelela yashona khona lapho kulandela ingxabano, okusolwa ukuthi ibihlangene nokuthi isoka belingafuni umufi abuyele esikoleni.UNosiphiwo Ntombela (18) obefunda uGrade 11 eKlwana Combined School, eBabanango, kuvela ukuthi ubehleli ekhaya iminyaka emithathu ekhulisa ingane yabo, kulo nyaka wakhetha ukubuyela esikoleni ngoba eseyibona isikhulile.Kuzwakala ukuthi lezi zindaba azehlanga kahle esokeni njengoba liwumuntu obegajwa isikhwele ngobala futhi lihlala linolaka, obekwenza umufi ahlale engathokozile.Udadewabo omdala kamufi uthi leli soka belivele lihlala limchukuluza udadewabo kodwa ubengazitsheli ukuthi lingaze limbulale. UNksz Ntombela uthe naye belike limfonele limtshela ngezinsolo elinazo ngodadewabo.Uthe belihlale lisho izinto ezihambisana nokumsola ukuthi uyajola kodwa lingabuvezi ubufakazi balokho.Ngokusho kwesinye isihlobo salo mndeni esingathandanga ukudalulwa, leli soka bese libamba amatoho eGoli. Kuthe uma lizwa ukuthi unina wengane yalo usebuyele esikoleni, kwangalithokozisa lokho, lafuthelana njengoba lize lamcuthela eya esikoleni. Kuthiwa belijwayele ukumsola ngomjolo kodwa libuye lixolise.“Kubuhlungu lokhu asizwise khona ngoba kucacile wehlulwe ukwamukela ukuthi ubudlelwano babo bese buphelile. Akekho obemazi ukuthi ukhona ngoba sizwe sekufona omakhelwane ekuseni kade esanda kuhamba udadewethu.“Uphume la ekhaya ngo-6. 20 ngoba isikole sithanda ukuqhela. Kusho ukuthi ubemcuthele endleleni. Ngimfice enamanxeba amaningi okugwazwa.“Abemaningi ngendlela yokuthi ngihlulekile ngisho ukubona ukuthi abemangaki,” kusho uNksz Ntombela ovele wakhihla isililo ngenxa yomunyu.NoMnyango wezeMfundo izolo uzwakalise okukhulu ukushaqeka ngalesi sigameko.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa uthe ihhovisi likaNgqongqoshe lizwelana kakhulu nomndeni nothisha nabafundi ngalesi sigameko.“Sidumele ngokwehlele lo mfundi. Sidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nesikole sakhe. Siyethemba umthetho uzokwenza okufanele. Sidinga ukubambisana nomphakathi ukulwa nodlame,” kusho uMlotshwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko nokuthi umufi ugwazwe umuntu owaziwayo esendleleni. "Okwamanje akekho osaboshiwe,” kusho uCapt Gwala.
title: Isoka libhokode  intombi yafa iya esikoleni

text: UMASIPALA weTheku wethule ngokusemthethweni ubuchwepheshe obusezingeni eliphezulu obuzohlola isimo sezulu ukuze ukwazi ukwenza izinhlelo zokumelana nenhlekelele engadalwa yisimo sezulu ngaphambi kokuthi yenzeke.IMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ngoLwesihlanu wethule ngokusemthethweni iForecast Early Warning System (FEWS).Uthe iFEWS ingeyokuqala ukusetshenziswa e-Afrika.Izosiza ekutheni  iTheku libhekane nezimo zenhlehlekelele ngaphambi kokuthi ziqale.“Kusukela ngo-2017 eThekwini kube nezinhlekelele ezidalwa yisimo sezulu eziholela ezinkingeni eziningi ezifana nezikhukhula, ukuguguleka komhlaba, ukuma kwamanzi ezindaweni ezingafanele nezinye eziningi. Izinkomba zesimo sezulu  zikhomba ukuthi kuzoba nemvula engaphezulu kwejwayelekie eThekwini okusho ukuthi kuzoduma kakhulu, line kakhulu kunokweywayelekile. Lobu buchwepheshe buzositshela imvula ingakafiki ukuthi ingase ibe ngakanani yini engase yonakale edolobheni lethu bese sizilungiselela ukubhekana naleso simo singakenzeki,” kusho uKaunda.Uthe izinkinga ezidalwa yisimo sezulu ziholela ekutheni kuphazamiseke izingabunjalo lamanzi okuphuza, kuphazamiseke indlela amagagasi agubha ngayo olwandle athe kuyingozi.“Uma sibe nolwazi oluyilo ngenhlekelele engase yenzeke kuzosiza ekutheni uphiko lwenhlekelele lukwazi ukuhlaziya lolo lwazi bese luqhamuka nezinhlelo ezisozisa ekutheni leyo nhlekelele ifike isilindelwe,” kusho uKaunda.Uthe uphiko olubheka  ukushintshashintsha kwesimo sezulu eThekwini  luthe kulo nyaka kuzoba nemvula ephindaphindwe kabili kunejwayelekile.“Ngo-Ephreli ka-2019 kanye nangoDisemba kube nemvula enkulu kwaba nezikhukhula eziholele ekutheni kulahleke imiphefumulo yabantu abaningi. Kwalimala amabhilidi nezindlu nengqalasizinda. Ngakho-ke ubuchwepheshe obunjengalobu buzobe bungavikeli impilo yabantu kuphela kodwa  siqhamuka nesu lokubhekana nokushintshashintsha kwesimo sezulu.”Uthe ubuchwepheshe buzobheka ushintsho olwandle, emifuleni uma kuba noshintsho luzosho lubuye lubheke ukuthi amanzi emvula angena emadanyini angakanani uma kunengozi lusho.“Uma kubonakala sengathi amanzi emifuleni eseduze kwemijondolo azogcwala kakhulu iFEWS  izosho bese kwenziwa izinhlelo ezifanele zokuhlenga labo abakhe eduze umfula ungakagcwali.”
title: Ubuchwepheshe obuhlola isimo sezulu

text: KUHLOMULA abantu bendawo ekwakhiweni kwenxanxathela yezitolo engaphezu kaR760 million ebizwa ngeMidway Mall eseduze kwesiteshi seGO! Durban esiphakathi kweNewlands neLindelani.Izolo iMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ibihambele iMidway Mall iyohlola umsebenzi nokuthi bayahlomula ngempela yini abantu abayakhele.UKaunda utshele Isolezwe ukuthi uMasipala weTheku utshale ngaphezu kukaR360 million kule nxanxathela kwathi osomabhizinisi abazimele batshala uR400 million. “Abantu bendawo ngeke bagcine ngokuba wonogada nokuxova udaka kodwa u-45% wamasheya eMidway Mall ngowabantu bendawo. Izinkampani zabantu bendawo nazo ziyasebenza njengoba kwakhiwa. Bawu-280 abantu abaqashiwe njengamanje kanti silindele ukuthi kuqashwe abawu-1 600 uma isiphelile. Okuhle wukuthi izitolo ezinkulu sezivumile ukuthi zizosebenza kule nxanxathela ezosiza abantu baseNewlands, Lindelani naseNtuzuma,” kusho uKaunda.UNkk Zama Msomi-Dunga, wakwa-ward 38 eRichmond Farm ohamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo, uthe uyiso elibheke ukuthi abakhubazekile bayaqashwa futhi nezinkampani zabo ziyayithola imisebenzi.“Kuno-5% obekelwe abaphila nokukhubazeka okungafanele ukuthi ubhidelwe abanye. Ngizohlomula njengoba kwakhiwa ngokuthi inkampani yami iNdayelihle Pty Ltd ithole umsebenzi. Ngiphinde ngibe yiso elibheke abakhubazekile ukuthi nabo bayahlomula. Ngeke sigcine ngokuhlomula uma kwakhiwa kodwa noma isisebenza inxanxathela yezitolo kunonsumbulwana esizobathola njengabanikazi beMidway Mall,” kusho uNkk Msomi-Dunga.UNKK Zama Msomi Dunga, waku-ward 38, uthi bahlomula ngamathuba omsebenzi nawebhizinisi eMidway Mall, lapha uthathwe namakhansela endawo uNkk Nokuthula Biyela noNkk Gugu ZuluUdonse ngendlebe abantu ukuthi bangajahi ukubhikisha uma kuqala izinhlelo zentuthuko lapho bakhe khona kodwa bahambele imihlangano ebizwa ngamakhansela, baye nakuma-war room ukuze bazi konke okwenzeka kuma-ward abo. UNkk Queen Ngcobo, ohlala ku-ward 38 futhi okwi-business desk eMidway Mall, uthe bayahlomula abantu besifazane kule ntuthuko ngoba abanye banezinkampani kanti abanye bathola amathuba omsebenzi.UMnuz Wonder Jaca, oyiphini likanobhala jikelele weFederation for Radical Economic Transformation (Ffret), uthe bayiseka intuthuko yeMidway Mall ngoba ithuthukisa osomabhizinisi bendawo futhi kuqashwe nabantu abakhele le nxanxathela yezitolo.
title: UKaunda uqinisekise ukuhlomula kwabantu

text: IMEYA kaMasipala weTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, iyazichitha njengamampunge izinsolo ezithi impilo yayo isengcupheni. UNkk Gumede uthe ngeke aze amoshe isikhathi sakhe akhulume ngalolu daba ngoba lungamampunge.UNkk Gumede uphawule kanje izolo ngemuva kokuvela kwemibiko kwabezindaba ethi impilo yakhe ayiphephile.Lolu daba luqale ukuvela ngempelasonto, ngesinye sezikhulu zamaphoyisa omkhandlu uSuperintendent Sibonelo Mchunu okubikwe ukuthi ubhalele i-email iPhini leMeya uNkk Fawzia Peer embikela ngokuthi impilo yemeya ayiphephile.Kule email uMchunu usole umphathi wamaphoyisa omkhandlu uMnuz Eugene Nzama ngokuthi udala ukuthi imeya ingaphephi ngenxa yokugxambukela kwakhe okunenhlese yepolitiki.UMchunu uthe njalo uNkk Gumede uma enza umsebenzi womkhandlu usuke engaphephile ngokwanele.Uthe wumbango wepolitiki owenza ukuthi uNkk Gumede angaphephi.UMchunu uthe usaba ukuthi uNkk Gumede angase asocongwe kulandela ukuxegiswa kwezokuphepha zakhe ngamabomu.Uthe uNzama kade aqala ukugxambukela kwezokuphepha zikaNkk Gumede.UMchunu naye uthe kade ayekhala kubaphathi bomkhandlu ngokuthi naye uzibona engaphephile.Uthe ukukhala ngezokuphepha kukaNkk Gumede ukususela ekubulaweni kwamanye amakhansela, okubalwa kuwo uMnuz Wiseman Mshibe, Mnuz Sbu Shezi noMnuz Sbu Sibiya owayenguNobhala we-ANC eThekwini.
title: IMeya yeTheku ichitha izinsolo zokuthi impilo yayo isengcupheni

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEI-ANC seyiphinde yagqemeka ingozi ngokudlula emhlabeni kwelungu lePhalamende futhi ebelisekomitini lezokuVakasha, uMnuz Zamuxolo Joseph Peter, emuva kokugula isikhashana ngenxa yokuhaqwa yiCovid-19. UPeter, oshone ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku, uqale ukuba yilungu lephalamende ngonyaka owedlule emuva kokhetho. Ongusihlalo wekomiti lezokuvakasha, uMnuz Supra Mahumapelo, uchaze umufi njengendoda obungathembela kuyo uma udinga usizo. "Ubenza isiqiniseko sokuthi izinhloso zekomiti ziyafezeka. Ngikhumbula ngolunye usuku komunye umsakazo kudingeka umuntu okwazi ukukhuluma ulimi lwesiNguni ukuze akhulume ngezokuvakasha ezindaweni zamakhosi’’. ’’UMnuz Peter njengomuntu ozibophezelele ekuguquleni ezokuvakasha ezindaweni zasemakhaya, emalokishini nasemadolobheni amancane, wangenelela futhi wenza umsebenzi oncomekayo ekuqhakambiseni umsebenzi wekomiti," kusho uMahumapelo. Uthe okunye abezibophezelele ngakho uPeter ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kunohulumeni ongakhohlakele eNingizimu Afrika.
title: ICovid-19 seyiphinde yagadla kwi-ANC

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEIKHATHAZEKILE imindeni esihlale emakhandleleni izinyanga ilinde ukudedelwa kwemininingwane yolibofuzo lwezidumbu zezihlobo zayo.UNksz Tholakele Gwala waseDurban North eThekwini, uthi selokhu ahlala emakhandleleni ngoJuni kushone indodana yakhe, uMnuz Sphmandla Gwala, namanje akakaze athole imininingwane.“Ngikhathazekile kakhulu ngale nto ngoba manje kumele ngabe senqiqalile ngizilela ingane yami kodwa ngisalokhu ngihlezi emakhandleleni. Ngigqingqa emaphoyiseni nasemakhazeni, bathi kusalindwe umbiko wolibofuzo. Kunzima kakhulu futhi kubuhlungu ngoba asikwazi ukumngcwaba. Engikufunayo nje wukuthi bededele ingane yami ngiyingcwabe,” kusho uNksz Gwala.Elandisa Isolezwe uthe indodana yakhe yasha nendlu ngoJuni 14.“Washa kakhulu engasabonakali, yize ngazi ukuthi wuyena yedwa owayesendlini nezimpahla eyeziggokile zibonakala, bekumele kwenziwe ulibofuzo. Ngishaqekile ukuthola ukuthi ukuqala ukuhlolwa kolibofuzo lwakhe kuze kwahanjiswa ngoJanuwari nonyaka. Angazi ukuthi sonke lesi sikhathi bekulindweni,” kusho uNksz Gwala.Nomunye umndeni waseHammarsdale ukhala esifanayo.UNksz Khosi Chamane, selokhu alinda umphumela wolibofuzo lwendodana yakhe, uMnuz Sbongiseni Chamane, kusukela ngoMashi 2020.“Silokhu silindile ukuba sifihle, angisazi ukuthi kumele senzenjani. Ngesonto elidlule ngibuyelile esiteshini samaphoyisa, kwathiwa basazolwenza ulibofuze ngoba kukhona obekuvimba ukuba bahlole izidumbu. Sekuphele unyaka silindile. Sikhathazekile kakhulu ngalesi simo,” kusho uChamane.Umufi waduka, watholwa ngakubo ebulewe, isidumbu sakhe sonakele.Unina uthe wambona ngezimpahla zakhe, nasekhukhwini kwatholakala amakhadi akhe kodwa ngenxa yokuthi ubuso bebungabonakali bekumele kwenziwe ulibofuzo.Amaphoyisa kuleli akhiphe isitatimende ukuthi lesi simo ayasilungisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke, u-rigadier Vish Naidoo uthe:“Singakuqinisekisa ukuthi ubuholi bamaphoyisa busebenza kanzima futhi sekuyakhanya manje ekuxazululeni udaba lwezinto ezithinta ulibofuzo. Lokhu kulandela imibiko yokuthi kuduke inqwaba yamazibithi kwiNational Forensic DNA Database ngenxa yokuvalwa kohlelo iProperty Control and Exhibit Management (PCEM), evalwe ukusebenza ngoJuni 2020 obeyengamele. Empeleni  lawa mazibithi abegciniwe kwiForensic Service Laboractory Administration System kanti abengatholakali ngokwezobuchwepheshe.  Sisebenzisana neState Information Technology Agency (Sita)  ukusungula uhlelo  iForensic Exhibit Management (FEM), ulokwazi ukungena esikhaleni sohlelo oludala.  Uhlelo lweFEM luqale ukusebenza ngo-Ephreli 6, 2021. Kumanje kuhlolwa amacala angu-10 million abesohlelweni oludala afakwe kulolu olusha. Kwengezwe amanye angu-25 000.Ukuhlolwa kolibofuzo kusalele ngemuva kakhulu ngamacala angu-170 000,” kusho Naidoo.
title: Bakhathazekile asebezile izinyanga

text: KUBE nosizi esikhungweni okumakwa kusona iphepha leTourism lakwa-matric uthisha obemaka ekhala ngezinhlungu esifubeni, washayeka phansi washona.Lesi sehlakalo senzeke ngoLwesibili esikhungweni iPietermaritzburg Girls High, eMgungundlovu.UMnuz Thokozani Gumede, ofundisa eBiva High, esifundeni uMkhanyakude, kuthiwa uqale wakhala ngezinhlungu esifubeni, wafuna ukusondezelwa amaphilisi akhe.Kuthiwa esasondezwa sekubizwe ne-ambulensi ube eseshayeka phansi, washona khona lapho.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane udlulise amazwi endunduzo emndenini kaGumede.Uthe kujutshwe ithimba eliye kulesi sikhungo ukuyohlangana nothisha abamakayo.Ngenxa yokuba muncu kwesimo umnyango ujube nabaluleka ngokomqondo ukuyokhuluma nabamatasa benza umsebenzi wokumaka kulesi sikhungo.“Okwamanje asifuni ukuqagula ngokuthi ubulawe yini. Sizolinda imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu okuyiyo ezohlonza ukuthi ngabe kudingeka ukuthi ube nophenyo.Ozakwabo abemaka nabo basathukile kodwa ukumaka akuzange kuphazamiseke,” kusho uDlungwane.Uthe benoMnyango wezeNhlalakahle yoMphakathi bazoqinisekisa ukuthi abamakayo bathola ukwelulekwa.“Sidlulisa amazwi endunduzo emndenini wakhe, izihlobo kanjalo nabangani. Asifuni ozakwakhe baphazamiseke ngenxa yalesi sehlakalo,” kuqhuba uDlungwane.Izinyunyana zothisha zithe zizophakamisa ukuthi kuhlale kune-ambulensi okungenani eyodwa ezikhungweni zokumaka.UNobhala jikelele weSadtu uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza, uthe kumele ihlale ikhona okungenani eyodwa i-ambulensi ukuze kube lula ukubhekana nezimo eziphuthumayo, kungalindwa imoto ezofika izosiza esuka kude.Uthe nothisha kumele baye ezikhungweni zokumaka bephila saka.“Angisho ukuthi uthisha ubegula. Kodwa othisha kumele bacabangele impilo kunemali.Kumele baye bephila saka ngoba umsebenzi owenziwa kumakwa unengcindezi enkulu,” kusho uNksz Caluza.Uthe komunye unyaka omunye uthisha washona esikhungweni sokumaka bathola ukuthi wayefune incwadi yokudedelwa esibhedlela egula ukuze ayomaka.UMengameli weNatu, uMnuz Allen Thompson, uvumelene noNksz Caluza ngokuthi kumele kube nemoto yezimo eziphuthumayo ukuze basizakale abagulayo.Uthe lokhu kungasiza kakhulu ngoba uthisha ubengaluthola usizo oluphuthumayo ngokushesha.“Sidlulisa amazwi endunduzo emndenini kathisha obumlinde ukuthi uzobuyela ekhaya ngemuva kokumaka. Sinethemba ukuthi njengoba eshone esemsebenzini umnyango uzombhekela ngendlela.”Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kaGumede ayiphumelelanga.Izolo othisha abamaka kwezinye izikhungo bebeyikhuluma le ndaba, bezwakalisa ukushaqeka ngokushona kukaGumede.Omunye wothisha omaka isiZulu, uthe noma bengamakeli endaweni eyodwa kodwa bazwile ngokudlula emhlabeni kukaGumede.“Sishaqekile ngoba uma simaka sisuke sifuna ukubuyela emakhaya siphelele. Kubuhlungu ukuthi umuntu afe enza umsebenzi wesizwe,” kusho lo thisha.
title: Ushone esesikhungweni emakela u-matric uthisha

text: UMKHANDLU weTheku uthi ngeke unqamule ugesi namanzi kwabakweletayo njengoba kukhona isikhathi lapho kungazange kuyiwe ukuyofunda amamitha ngenxa yemigomo yeCoronavirus.ITheku alikwazanga ukuhlola amamitha ngo-Ephreli nangoMeyi ngenxa yemigomo kathaqa.Ngenxa yalokhu umkhandlu ukuhoxisile ukunqamulela abakweletayo okuphelelwa isikhathi ngoJuni 30, 2020.Lokhu kuvele emhlanganweni wesigungu esilawula uMasipala weTheku ngesikhathi kudingidwa umbiko wekomiti lezimali, ezokuphepha nezimo eziphuthumayo.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe inqwaba yamakhasimende kamasipala ayikwazanga ukukhokha izikweletu okulahlekisele umkhandlu itshe lemali ongayiqoqanga.IMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ithe iTheku lilahlekelweuR1.5 billion ngo-EphrelinangoMeyi.“Siwumasipala onakekelayo futhi iminyango yethu ihlale ivulekile ukuze kuxoxwne uma kunamakhasimende adonsa kanzima ukukhokha. Sicela labo abangakwazi ukukhokha kodwa abasebenzise ithuba likathaqa bangakhokha ukuba basikhokhele. Umasipala udinga imali khona uzokwazi ukuhlinzeka abantu ngezidingo-ngqangi,” kusho uKaunda.UKaunda uthe uzolungiswa umonakalo odalekile ngesikhathi amakhasimende enikwa izincwadi eziveza isikweletu esimba eqolo.Uthe lokhu bazokwenza uma sekuqoqwe imininingwane eqondile yemitha.“Uma ungakhokhi, sizokhuphuka sibe sikhulu kakhulu isikweletu,” kuxwayisa uKaunda.Iphini lemenenja kamasipala ekomitini, uMnuz Krish Kumar, ligcizelele ukuthi buzokwenziwa ubulungiswa.“Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi buyenziwa ubulungiswa kumakhasimende ethu futhi ngeke siwanqamulele izidingo ngokuqagela isikweletu. Sosebenzisa imininingwane esizoyithatha emamitheni kuphela. Uhlelo lokunqanyulwa kwezidingo luzoqala emuva kwalokho, uma kunesidingo,” kusho uKumar.Ubuholi bomkhandlu buyalele uphiko lwamanzi nogesi ukuba lusheshise lolu hlelo khona amakhasimende ezokhokhiswa isikweletu esifanele.
title: ‘Ngeke banqanyulelwe ugesi namanzi abakweletayo’

text: Ngeledlule kuTwitter uZuma ubhale kanje: “Ngithemba senichopha ingqakala njengoba sonke siya kokamaskandi, siyo #GcwalisaiMabhida mhla ka-30 Mashi 2019.“Lungisani imvunulo nembhlaselo. Nilungise amathikithi. Asambeni siyo #Gcwalisa iMabhida kuMaskandi Concert. Ingami, Ingawe, Ingathi Sonke,” kusho uZuma owaziwayo ngokuba yibhinca elingazinyezi futhi ovamise ukusina ingoma emicimbini yesintu.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uZuma ubesanda kuvakashelwa kwakhe ngamabhinca abeswenke ngamabhulukwe eBrentwood.UZuma ulandela ezinyathelweni zeSilo Samabandla, uZwelithini noNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke, uMnuz Nathi Mthethwa.Kulo mcimbi ohlelwa yisihlabani sikamaskandi futhi esesilingisa emdlalweni eHostela, uKhuzani ‘Indlamlenze’ Mpungose, ongumkhaya kaZuma njengoba bedabuka eNkandla, kuboshelwe izihlabani zalo mculo okubalwa kuzo uShwi Nomtekhala, Phuzekhemisi, Ihhashi Elimhlophe, Mfiliseni Magubane nabanye ababalelwa ku-70.Amathikithi abiza uR100 nabiza uR250 asedayise aphela, sekusele awomntakabani.
title: Inselelo kaZuma ngekhonsathi kaKhuzani

text: USAKHUZA umhlola umphakathi nomndeni wowesilisa oneminyaka engu-40 okuthiwa ubhokode ngommese ugogo wakhe wabe esedla izicubu zakhe KwaDambuza, eMgungundlovu.Amalungu omndeni kaNkk Judith Ndlela (90), athi ayoyixoxela amagwababa echobana into ewehlele izolo ekuseni.UNksz Thandeka Ndlela elandisa Isolezwengokwenzekile uthe, ubelele nogogo wakhe ngesikhathi umsolwa engqongqoza ngendluzula efuna bavule ngenkani ekamelweni abalala kulo.“Uqale ngo-2 ezintatha engqongqoza, eshaya nesicabha. Ugogo uthe akavulelwe, ubephethe imimese nobhushu. Ulande impepho ekamelweni lakhe wabe eseyishisa eduze kwalapho bekulele khona ugogo. Ubelokhu ekhuluma into engazwakali. Uphuciwe imimese nezikhali, kwaba sengathi wehlisa umoya. Kuthe ngabo-7 ekuseni ugogo elele endlini yokuphumula ngisamenzela ukudla, wavele waqhamuka ekamelweni lakhe wabhokoda ugogo ngommese esifubeni. Ugogo ubelokhu ekhala ethi, ‘kulungile ngane yami uma ngibulawa uwena’, yilapho ngiphume khona endlini ngiyocela usizo komakhelwane,” kusho uNksz Ndlela.Uthe ubuye nomakhelwane umsolwa elokhu esika izicubu zikamufi ezidla, ebeke nosawoti eceleni kwakhe.“Ubedla izicubu zakhe, kukhona nosawoti esisola ukuthi ubegcobhoza kuwo. Bese sithukile sikhala, simangazwa yinto abeyenza kugogo,” kusho uNksz Ndlela.Uthe omakhelwane bafikile bazama ukumnqanda kodwa kwaba nhlanga zimuka nomoya njengoba ubesenolaka.Omunye umakhelwane okhulume neSolezwe wacela ukuthi igama lakhe ligodlwe ngenxa yobucayi bodaba uthe namanje kusenzima nokudla ukudla ngenxa yento ayibonile.“Besilokhu sizwa kunomsindo sazitshela ukuthi into ezophela. Sizwe abakhona sebememeza saya sithi siyolekelela. Sifice ummese usesifubeni kugogo, umsolwa ehlezi kusofa eduze kwesidumbu elokhu esika izicubu, ezidla ziluhlaza zinjalo. Namanje angikholwa into engiyibone ngamehlo ami,” kusho umakhelwane ebabaza.Kuthiwa umsolwa ubesebeke namanzi esitofini nokusolwa ukuthi ubefuna ukupheka ngawo isidumbu sikagogo wakhe.Indodakazi kamufi uNksz Busi Ndlela ithe bona bewumndeni bashaqekile ngoba umufi ubengamathe nolimu nomsolwa.AMALUNGU omphakathi awakholwanga ethola ngodaba lowesilisa oneminyaka engu-40 okuthiwa ubhokode ngommese ugogo wakhe wabe esedla izicubu zakhe KwaDambuza, eMgungundlovu.“Besingalindele ukuthi umsolwa angenza lokhu, akayena umuntu ohluphayo kodwa uma eke waphuza ugologo bekungathi uphambanelwa ikhanda. Umama (umufi) uyena umuntu obekwazi ukumgoba nomuntu abebezwana naye kakhulu njengoba ubemenzela yonke into. Noma sithetha sithi akayofesa njengoba ezihlalela ekhaya engasebenzi, umama ubemvikela. Bebezwana kakhulu bengahlukani nokusixakayo ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani lokhu,” kusho yena. Uthe noma embuza umsolwa ukuthi kungani ebulale umufi, kuthiwa akazange aphendule ubelokhu evula amehlo kakhulu, sengathi umqondo uhambile.NgoJanuwari 5 nonyaka lo mndeni bewenzele umufi umcimbi wokugubha iminyaka engu-90 azalwa. Kuthiwa umsolwa wayekhona kodwa wangagubha nabo.Abomndeni bathe abazi noma lo mcimbi akazange awujabulele yini umsolwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe, kuvulwe icala lokubulala ngemuva kokugwazwa kowesifazane oneminyaka engu-90 amanxeba amaningi.“Owesilisa oneminyaka engu-40 ushaywe umphakathi wabe eseboshwa amaphoyisa. Uyiswe esibhedlela lapho egadwe khona amaphoyisa,” kusho uCol Mbele.Umndeni uthe umsolwa ufuna ajeziswe inkantolo ngesenzo sakhe.
title: Umzukulu uficwe edla izicubu zesalukazi

text:
UPHIKA ulala ngomhlane umfundisi waseChibini, iSt John’s Apostolic Faith Mission kwa-G eMlaza, uMnuz Khayelihle Makhaye, ngezinsolo zokuqola abazalwane bakhe imali elinganiselwa ku-R4 000 umuntu ngamunye ngemuva kokubathembisa ukubafaka emsebenzini kwaTransnet.Lo mfundisi uzifikele mathupha emahhovisi e
Solezwe ngoLwesibili ngenhloso yokugeza igama lakhe.Kepha abazalwane bakhe abathukuthele, bathe uphika ubala ngoba imali bayinika yena esandleni.“Okokuqala laba bantu akubona abazalwane bami, ngosomathuba abafika ebandleni ngoba bezwe ukuthi abantu bayasizakala. Bafika izikhawu ezingaphansi kwesikhombisa, kababhabhadisiwe, futhi abanalo ikhadi lobulungu.“Yigenge yangasekhaya le efike ebandleni ngoMashi noma ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka ifuna amanzi okuphalaza nokuchatha ukuze kulunge izinto zayo. Emuva kwabo kwafika intombazane yakwaTransnet ihamba ngemoto enemibhalo yale nkampani yathi isonta eChibini KwaMashu. Yafika yaze yasebenzela nabantu abangasebenzi, ngokubanikeza amanzi okuchatha nokuphalaza. Ngelinye ilanga yathi lapho isebenza khona zikhona izikhala kodwa ziyakhokhelwa. Ngayitshela ukuthi ayikhulume nayo igenge ngoba vele manje ayisekho into engakhokhelwa,” kusho uMakhaye.Uthe lo wesifazane owazibiza ngoMandisa Mkhize waqala wathi kukhokhwa u-R10 000, wamtshela ukuthi angadlali ngabantu baseChibini, wambuza ukuthi bazoyithathaphi imali engaka.“Wathi uzokhuluma nabo bayehlise ibe ngu-R4 000. Ngabe sengiyitshela igenge le engasebenzi ukuthi nangu lo muntu usho kanje. Babembona efika esontweni akhulume nabo. Abanye babeno-R2 000 abanye no-R700. Ngagcina sengibagcwalisela ngemali yami ngoba ngithi sizobona uma sebesebenza. Abanye babemnikeza esandleni lo sisi, abanye bayinikeza mina ukuze ngiyidlulisele kuyena,” kusho uMakhaye.Uthi wethuka ngoJuni ngesikhathi esekhempini yesonto eMzimkhulu eseshayelwa ucingo ngomakhelwane bakhe bethi bekufike abantu namaphoyisa esontweni lakhe.“Ngezwa sengibuyile ukuthi le genge isingifake enkantolo ifuna imali yayo kumina. Angazi kungani beyifuna kumina ngoba bayamazi umuntu owathatha imali yabo.“Iphutha lami kwakungukuthemba umuntu ongalungile okwenza ukuthi nabazalwane bami bamethembe. Ngigcine sengithola ukuthi igama lakhe langempela nguGugu Jwara waseLovu. Kuthiwa usebaqedile nakwamanye amabandla ezindaweni ezahlukene ezakhele iTheku,” kusho uMakhaye.Omunye wabazalwane abaqoliwe uthe sebelinde ukuthi batholane nomfundisi eNkantolo yaseMlaza ngo-Agasti 17.“Sesize salunikezwa usuku lwecala, ngakho amanyala alo mfundisi sizowandlala wonke enkantolo. Sinobufakazi bemiyalezo kuWhatsApp.“Lo sisi sazitholela thina ukuthi usebenzisana nomfundisi ngemuva kokuthi kufike umuntu othi uqolwe nguyena. Akakaze akhulume nathi, ngumfundisi owathi unolayini wakwaTransnet. Imali sayinika yena esandleni iphelele,” kusho umzalwane.
title: Uyaphika ukuthi waqola abazalwane

text: UMHLENGIKAZI wasesibhedlela saseShowe ubhekene nengwadla yokuthi akhishwe emqulwini wonesi emuva kokuvela kwezinsolo ezithi ubesebenzisa igama lesinye isiguli ukuthola umjovo wokulapha izinhlungu ezingabekezeleleki, obunikwa iziguli ezithile ngokumyalelo kadokodela ukuze zidambise izinhlungu.Kuyasoleka ukuthi umhlengikazi osesebenzele izibhedlela ezinhlanu ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal, uke wawenza lo mkhonyuvu phambilini kodwa wangabanjwa.UMnyango wezeMpilo esifundazweni ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kukhona uphenyo olwenziwayo ngezinsolo ezithinta lo umhlengazi.Okhulumela umnyango, uNkk Noluthando Nkosi, uthe umnyango manje usohlelweni lokubikela umkhandlu wonesi, iSouth African Nursing Council emuva kokusula kwalo mhlengikazi esibhedlela ngo-Agasti 22.“’Umnyango ukhathazekile ngalezi zinsolo futhi awuzibukeli phansi,” kusho uNkk Nkosi.Iphephandaba elisesitebeleni esisodwa neSolezwe, i-Daily News lithole izikhalo kwabanye abasebenzi besibhedlela saseShowe bethi banovalo lokuthi kungenzeka udaba lufihlwe nokuthi kungenzeka umhlengikazi angabe esathathelwa izinyathelo njengoba esesulile emsebenzini.Umthombo uveze ukuthi abaphathi besibhedlela bezwe ngomkhonyovu ekuqaleni konyaka. Kuthiwa unesi wayebuye akhiphe umjovo kwamanye awawodi esebenzisa igama lalesi siguli okusolwa ukuthi ubezithathela yena.“Lesi siguli esidala besikade sinikwa lo mjovo ngokomyalelo kadokotela. Kodwa iziphathimandla zesibhedlela ziqaphele ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kwalo mjovo bekulokhu kuqhubeka nakwamanye amagumbi, kusetshenziswa igama lesiguli esisodwa,” kusho umthombo.Uthe akucaci ukuthi umhlengikazi uke wawusebenzisa yini lo mjovo phambilini kulesi sibhedlela noma kulezi ezinye ake wasebenza kuzona.“Kunemininingwane ethi lo mhlengikazi uke wasebenza esibhedlela saseStanger, KwaMagwaza, Ngwelezane, Chief Albert Luthuli nakwaNongoma phambilini, akucaci ukuthi wahamba kanjani kulezi zibhedlela,” kusho umthombo.Omunye umthombo uthe abanye abasebenzi bathi bekumele incwadi yokusula komhlengikazi ingamukelwa njengoba kusaqhubeka uphenyo.”Ukuntshontshwa kwemithi yeziguli yicala elibi ngoba ekugcineni iziguli ezisala zingesenayo imithi,” kusho umthombo.UNobhala weNehawu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ayanda Zulu uthe noma bebengenalwazi mayelana naleli cala kodwa abahambisani nokuntshontshwa kwemithi yeziguli.
title: Unesi ecaleni lokweba umjovo onamandla

text: IZIGWAZE ngowayo iKaizer Chiefs ihlulwa yiCape Town City emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, izolo ebusuku.Igoli elizikise umkhumbi waMakhosi lishaywe ngu-Edmilson Dove esiwombeni sesibili.Ngokwehlulwa kulo mdlalo iChiefs iphunyukwe yithuba lokunyukela endaweni yesine kwi-log yePremiership. IChiefs ithole indathane yamathuba okushaya amagoli kodwa ubuthuntu babagadli bayo bugcine buholele ekutheni igcine ihlulelwe ekhaya. Bese kungokwesibili ukuthi umqeqeshi omusha u-Ernst Middendorp ahlulelwe ekhaya. Emasontweni edlule uthelwe isibhaxu yiMamelodi Sundowns.UMiddendorp uqale umdlalo ngomdlali osemncane, uHappy Mashiane osanda kunyuselwa esikimini esikhulu. UMashiane, odlale okokuqala ngesikhathi iChiefs ibhekene neTornado koweNedbank Cup ngempelasonto edlule, ubeyibamba kuchwaze inkundla. Nangesikhathi esephuma abalandeli basukume bamshayela ihlombe emuva kokuzwakalisa ukungeneliseki kwabo ngokuthi uyakhishwa.Emdlalweni wayizolo, iChiefs ikhombise zibekwa ukuthi ifuna amaphuzu amathathu ngokuqonda iCity umdlalo uqala. Ithuba elisobala lihlule umdlali wasemuva uDaniel Cardoso ngesikhathi engqofa ibhola liphuma eceleni kwepali kukade kuyi free-kick kaKhama Billiat ngomzuzu wesihlanu. ICity igqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ilinyalelwa ngumgadli uSiphelele Mthembu emuva kokumakana noTeenage Hadebe ngomzuzu wesine. Indawo yakhe ithathwe nguKermit Erasmus. IChiefs iqhubekile nokucindezela. UKUPUTENI weKaizer Chiefs uWillard Katsande egadwe uThamsanqa Mkhize weCape Town City emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eFNB Stadium, eGoli, izolo ebusuku Isithombe: BACKPAGEPIXUnozinti weCity, uPeter Leeuwenburgh, oqokwe njengomdlali wosuku, uvimbe ishodi likaBilliat ngomzuzu ka-21, waphinde wageza uBernard Parker ngoka-22. NoweChiefs, uVirgil Vries wenze okufanayo evimba ibhola likaThabo Nodada ngo-24 nelikaGift Links ngomzuzu olandelayo.Emuva kwemizuzu embalwa uBilliat uphinde wahlulwa nguLeeuwenburgh esebhekene naye. Ngaphambi kokuphela kwesiwombe sokuqala iChiefs ikhiphe uKgotso Moleko obelimele, yafaka uSiyabonga Ngezana.Emuva kwemizuzu embalwa zibuyile ekhefini, uBilliat uphinde wahlulwa elinye ithuba lokushaya igoli emuva kwebhola aliphaselwe nguLeonardo Castro ongene endaweni kaParker. Ngesikhathi umdlalo uqhubeka, iChiefs ihluleka ukushaya igoli, abalandeli bahlulekile ukubekezela, bamcela ngaphandle uCastro emuva kokwehlulwa yithuba. Ngomzuzu ka-79 uDove ushayele iCity igoli emuva kwesibhudubhudu ebhokisini. UVries uhluleke ukubamba ibhola laduma phakathi. ICity iqede umdlalo ingasaphelele emuva kokuthi uZukile Kewuti ethole ikhadi elibomvu ngenxa yokudlalisa kabi uSiphelele Ntshangase.
title: IChiefs izigwaze ngowayo ihlulwa
UMicho uzifuna zonke izicoco ezisele

text: INKATHA Freedom Party (IFP) ifuna U-51% wamavoti okhethweni lukazwelonke oluzoba ngonyaka ozayo.Lezi zindaba zidalulwe nguSotswebhu we-IFP, uMnuz Narend Singh, izolo oveze ukuthi bazoba nezingqungquthela zezifundazwe nekazwelonke kungakapheli unyaka.“Simatasa nezinhlelo zokhetho futhi sizogxila KwaZulu-Natal naseGauteng kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi sizozishiya ngaphandle ezinye izifundazwe. Sizibekele ukuthi sifuna amavoti angaphezu kuka-50%. Sifuna ukuphumelela ngamalengiso KwaZulu-Natal ngoba sawuphatha kahle uhulumeni ngo-1994 kuze kube ngu-1999,” kusho uSingh.Uthe zihamba kahle izinhlelo zabo zokhetho sebezozigoqa maduzane.Uveze ukuthi bafuna ukuphatha KwaZulu-Natal nokungenisa kwezinye izifundazwe.Ngonyaka odlule ingqungquthela ye-IFP KwaZulu-Natal nekazwelonke yahlehliswa.USingh uthe ngeke ihlehliswe kulo nyaka ngoba sebelandele yonke imigudu efanele futhi zizoba khona izingqungquthela.“Sikulungele ukuba nengqungquthela kulo nyaka sekusele ukuthi simemezele izinsuku. Sithola izingcingo kubantu bakwezinye izifundazwe abathembele kwi-IFP ukuthi ibe yizwi labo kuhulumeni kazwelonke. Abantu bayabona ukuthi siyasebenza komasipala esibaphethe, siyasebenza ePhalamende nakuzo zonke izindawo esikuzo. Siyakhula isibalo sabantu abalandela i-IFP eMpumalanga naseWestern Cape. Lokhu sikubone ngoKhetho loHulumeni baseKhaya.”USingh uthe yize ngo-2014 bengenzanga kahle okhethweni kodwa ngo-2016 bavukile njengoba sebephethe omasipala abangu-13.“Izinombolo zethu ziyakhula, sifuna ukuhlale sikhula njalo, sicela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika baqhubeke nokusiseka.”
title: I-IFP ifuna ukuphatha iKZN ngemuva kokhetho lukazwelonke

text: UBHIKISHE ngaphandle kwesiteshi samaphoyisa umphakathi waKwaMakhutha izolo ufuna kuboshwe iphoyisa okusolwa ukuthi ladlwengula owesifazane esiteshini ngeledlule.Yize amaphoyisa ekhiphe isitatimende esiveza ukuthi umsolwa oneminyaka engu-32 oyiphoyisa esiteshini saKwaMakhutha umisiwe emsebenzini kodwa umphakathi ufuna ukuthi angagcini ngokumiswa kodwa aboshwe.Ikhansela kule ndawo uNkk Puleng Hlomuka, lithe kuyabakhathaza bewumphakathi ukuthi umsolwa usabonakala ngaphandle akakaboshwa.“ Kungani umsolwa engakaboshwa? Sifuna aboshwe abhekane necala asolwa ngalo,” kusho uNkk Hlomuka.Ngeledlule kuthiwa umgilwa oneminyaka engu-24 ubesesitolo eyothenga okuthile ngesikhathi behilizisana nomsolwa ogcine esefakwa wumsolwa evenini waya naye esiteshini.Kusolwa ukuthi ufike wamdlwengulela khona ngaphambi kokumdedela.Ngaphandle kokuthi umphakathi ufuna kuboshwe umsolwa, ufuna kuphinde kulungiswe indlela yokusebenza kwamaphoyisa endaweni njengoba ukhale ngokuthi isibalo sawo sincane kakhulu.“Isiteshi sinye kodwa sibhekela ama-ward ayisithupha okwenza kube nzima ukufinyelela kuzona zonke izindawo adingeka kuzo ngesikhathi esifanele. Sifuna andiswe amaphoyisa,” kusho uNkk Hlomuka.Kukhalwa nangesakhiwo sesiteshi okuthiwa asigculisi.Umphakathi udlulise incwadi yezikhalo kuGeneral Mgobhozi obesuka ehhovisi lesifundazwe, bamnika umnqamulajuqu wezinsuku ezingu-14.Amalungu omphakathi aphoqe ukuthi akhonjiswe incwadi eyalela ukuboshwa komsolwa okugcine sekuphoqa abesiteshi ukuthi ivezelwe umphakathi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uBrigadier Jay Naicker, ukuqinisekisile ukumiswa kwephoyisa emsebenzini.“Icala lobugebengu liphenywa ngabophiko olubhekele ukuziphatha kwamaphoyisa i-Independent Police investigative Directorate (Ipid),” kusho uNaicker.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uGeneral Khombinkosi Jula, uthe uyayithemba i-Ipid ukuthi izokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi umsolwa ubhekana nomthetho.“Siyajabula ukuthi iphoyisa liphinde lathathelwa izinyathelo zangaphakathi. Siyohlale siyixhasa i-Ipid uma kukhona iphoyisa elimangalelwe ngezenzo zobugebengu kwazise akekho ongaphezu komthetho,” kusho uJula.Okhulumela i-Ipid uNksz Ndileka Cola, uthe i-Ipid iyaliphenya icala.Lolu phiko lukhiphe inombolo ezosetshenziswa wumphakathi ukumpimpa amaphoyisa aziphatha ngendlela engafanele ethi: 0800 111969.UNksz Cola uthe le nombolo ngeyamahhala kanti umphakathi uzobika ngqo ngezenzo zamaphoyisa.
title: Bafuna kuboshwe iphoyisa

text: UBHEKE iFree State Stars ehlukile kunalena ebeyidlala ngomzuliswano wokuqala wesizini umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs uSteve "Mphathi" Komphela.La maqembu azodudulana kowe-Absa Premiership eFNB Stadium, eSoweto, namuhla ngo-7.30 ebusuku.IChiefs yazidlulela kalula ngo 2-0 emlenzeni wokuqala weligi owawudlalelwa eFree State. Kodwa uKomphela uthe manje kuzoba nzima ukushaya leli qembu ngoba linabadlali abasha.IChiefs ivale unyaka odlule ihambela phezulu iwina imidlalo ilandelana. Kulindeleke ukuthi iqhubeke nesigqi sayo uma isibhekene neStars namuhla.“Ukuvulwa kwewindi kuyisizile iFree State ngoba isayinise abadlali abahle. Bawenzile umsebenzi njengoba besivalile. Akufanele silindele iqembu abantu abebezenzela kulona esigabeni sokuqala seligi. Kufanele silindele iqembu elehlukile,” kusho uKomphela.Lo mqeqeshi uthe abadlali abasebancane beChiefs abaphuma enkulisa bayamlinga, yingakho abanye babo bezilolonga neqembu elikhulu.“Yebo sinabo abadlali abahle abasebancane okubalwa kubona uWiseman Meyiwa, odlale eNdebeni yoMhlaba ka-Under 17, Siyabonga Ngezana noNkosingiphile Ngcobo. Omunye ubengibuza ukuthi kungani ngingamdlalisi lo mdlali. Kufanele sibadlalise khona nabaqeqeshi benkulisa bazobona ukuthi bayasebenza. Okunye inkulisa yethu inkulu futhi yinhle kufanele siyisebenzise,” kusho uKomphela.Lo mqeqeshi uthe akukakapheli ngo-Edward Manqele noSiphelele Mthembu kuleli qembu.“Basenezinkontileka neqembu. Bazoza bazozilolonga njengabo bonke abadlali, uma bekhombisa izimpawu zokuvuthwa nabo bazonikezwa ithuba,” kusho uKomphela.Amehlo azobe ethe njo kumdlali osanda kufika kuleli uGustavo Paez odabuka eVenezuela, eSouth America, namuhla. UKomphela uthe uyamethemba lo mdlali ukuthi uzowashaya amagoli wathi kufanele abalandeli bamnikeze isikhathi futhi bambekezelele. Abalandeli beChiefs baziwa njengabantu abathanda abadlali abakhiqiza izithelo njengamanje.Lo mdlali angase abonakale kulo mdlalo wanamuhla nokuyilapho kuzocaca khona ukuthi uwaphatheleni Amakhosi.
title: Ulindele iStars eyehlukile uKomphela

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEISINZIMA impilo yowesifazane (38), waKwaDambuza, ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu, okuthiwa udlwengulwe ngabesilisa abathathu nabesifazane ababili, bamshutheka upelepele esithweni sangasese.Lo wesifazane, ongeke adalulwe ngenxa yobucayi becala, kumanje ugcinwe lapho kukhoseliswa khona abesifazane abahlukumezekile.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi isimo sakhe asisihle njengoba selokhu kwenzeka isigameko uselokhu eya esikhathini, okungasanqamuki.Umgilwa kuthiwa usehlala ngokuthuka.Abasolwa kuthiwa bamsola ngokuthi webe iselula nemali yabo, base bemhlanganyela, bamdlwengula.NgoLwesithathu, enkantolo yaseMgungundlovu kuvele okokuqala abasolwa abahlanu ngecala.OMnuz Khumbulani Khumalo, Sihle Mdunge, Nkululeko Mngadi, noNksz Hlengiwe Mncwabe noNtombifikile Gwiliza, babhekene necala lokudlwengula lo wesifazane.NgoLwesithathu, bebevela okokuqala enkantolo njengoba beboshwe ngoMsombuluko ebusuku khona KwaDambuza.IMantshi uNitesh Binessarie, ilihlehlisele u-Ephreli 29 nonyaka icala, ukuze bezofaka isicelo sebheyili.Laba basagqunywe esitokisini.Ngesikhathi bengena ebhokisini laba basolwa bebenyobozela, begqoke amajakhethi, omunye wesifazane efake iduku ekhanda.Abasolwa bacele ukumelwa ummeli wesihle. Uyedwa okuvele ukuthi usake walahlwa icala lokuntshontsha ngaphambilini.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe,  isigameko sokudlwengulwa lo wesifazane senzeke ngoMashi 3 nonyaka.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe kumthombo osondelene nalolu daba, umgilwa wasolwa ngokweba iselula nemali ngomakhelwane bakhe, lapho ayeqashe ngakhona.“Kwaba nokuhilizisana. Umgilwa wabe esedlwengulwa ngabesilisa, owesifazane omunye wamphoqa ukuba amukhothe isitho sakhe sangasese. Abesifazane kuthiwa babe sebemgxisha upelepele esithweni sakhe sangasese,” kusho umthombo.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi selokhu kwenzeka lesi sigameko umgilwa ubelokhu esesibhedlela ngenxa yokulimala.Kuthe noma esededelwa eyohlaliswa kule ndawo yosonhlalakahle waqhubeka nokungaphili kahle.“Ngokusho kukamgilwa selokhu kwenzeka le nto yokuba agxishwe upelepele nokudlwengulwa, ulokhu eya esikhathini. Impilo yakhe inzima kakhulu njengoba engumuntu osehlala ngokwesaba,” kusho umthombo.Laba basolwa kuthiwa baboshwe bengazelele bezilalele ezindlini zabo KwaDambuza.Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuba ikhulume nomgilwa ayizange iphumelele izolo njengoba kuthiwa isimo sakhe asikabi sihle.
title: Kunzima koshuthekwe upelepele edlengulwa ngabahlanu

text: UNksz Millycent Mashele ongusomabhizinisi ogxile ekucutshungulweni kwamabhuku ongumsunguli weThe Legacy Centre okuyinkampani ecwaninga amabhuku, uthe akazange ayikhethe i-Accounting, iyona eyakhetha yena.Lokhu ukushiso ukuthi uthi ngesikhathi efaka isicelo sokufunda enyuvesi i-Accounting yayiwumkhakha wesithathu ayewukhethile ukuthi awufundele kodwa waphendulwa kuwo.Le ntokazi ike yasebenza ehhovisi lomcwaningi mabhuku jikekelele wakuleli, eMnyangweni wezeziMali eGauteng nakwaMTN, ithe iyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni abantu besifazane kumele bathuthukiswe njengoba isiqalile emphakathini wangakubo ithuthukisa abesifazane ngaphansi kohlelo iWansati Projects okusho ukuthi owesifazane ngesiTsonga.Lolu hlelo lwenzelwe ukuthuthukisa abantu besifazane basemakhaya nasemalokishini ukuze bagweme izinkinga abangaba nazo ngesikhathi beqala amabhizinisi abo.Ngalolu hlelo umuntu wesifazane uthola umuntu ozomcathulisa ngolwazi lokucwaningwa kwamabhuku nokusetshenziswa kwemali ebhizinisini nolunye ulwazi oluzomsiza ukuthi akwazi ukuzimele ngokuphelele emkhakheni webhizinisi alikhethile uma esephumile kulolu hlelo.Uthe ngaphandle kokusiza abesifazane basemakhaya uphinde asize abantu besifazane abakuwo lo mkhakha abafuna ukuziqalela izinkampani zabo zokucwaninga amabhuku.“Amasu engiwasebenzisayo okukhula ebhizinisini asiza abanye abangena kulo mkhakha ukuze nabo baphumelele,” kusho yena.Uthe uthando lokunakelela abanye abantu walufundiswa unina owayedayisa ezitaladini owakhulisa izingane eziyisishiyagalolunye ezazihlala ezitaladini ezinakekela ngokudla enza neziqiniseko sokuthi ziyakwazi ukuya ezikoleni.“Abantu besifazane abafana nomama bayangikhuthaza uma ngibheka ukuthi babengenako okuningi kodwa kulokho abanakho babekwazi ukwabelana ngakho nabanye abantu. Umama wayengabanga nayo inhlanhla yokufunda kakhulu kodwa wakwazi ukuziqalela ibhizinisi,” kusho yena.UNksz Mashele uthe iphupho lakhe elikhulu elokuthi asungule inkampani enkululazi ecwaninga amabhuku kuleli nase-Africa.“Ngifisa nokuvula isikole esizofundisa ngamabhizinisi kakhulukazi ukuba sesikhundleni sokuphatha, ukulawulwa kwebhizinsisi kanjalo nokuthi yini oyenzayo usuku nosuku uma ususebhizinisini. Ngiyakholwa ukuthi uma unalolo lwazi ibhizinisi lakho lingakhula ngendlela efanele,” kusho yena.Uthe ugqugquzelwe ukuthi lapho ehlala khona abantu besifazane kusenemikhakha okukholakala ukuthi ngeke bakwazi ukungena kuyo. Uma bengenile kuyo kukholakala ukuthi ngeke benze kahle.“Ngeshwa ezweni lethu ayikho imali yokuxhasa abantu absasungula amabhizinisi. Kudingeka ukuthi usebenze kanzima, uphokophele. Ngesikhathi ngiqala akubanga lula ngazitshela ukuthi ngizoqala kancane ngikhule kancane kancane,” kusho uNksz Mashele.
title: Ucathulisa abesimame kwezamabhizinisi

text: FANELESIBONGE BENGU noMDU NCALANEIMOTO: GWM HAVAL 6A KUKAPHELI sikhathi esingakanani kwaGreat Wall Motors bethule iSpoty Utility Vehicle (SUV) iHover 5 kodwa manje sebevivela ukwethula enye ekulesi sigaba iHaval 6 (H6).Akusensuku zatshwala ukuthi itheleke njengoba embukisweni wezimoto iTop Gear Festival ebiseMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ngempelasonto ibibhalwe ukuthi izotheleka maduze.IH6 ihlukile kune-H5 uma uyibuka. Ihlukene kabili njengoba kukhona edonsa ngawo wonke amasondo eyi-2 litre yenjini kadizili. Kukhona nenye eyi-1.5 turbo ehamba ngophethiloli.Ngaphakathi igiya lakhona liphezulu wena owabona iToyota Verso, ine-screen esidlala i-radio futhi ikukhombisa ngemuva uma uhlela, bluetooth, izipikha eziyisithupha, ABS ne-EBD nodedangendlale wesikhala ngemuva.Imininingwane egcwele sizokwazisa yona kule ngosi uma seyethuliwe.IKwi-Hover 5 benze izinto zayo eziningi zakwazi ukuhambisana nempilo yesimanje.Le moto kade ingathembisi uma uhlangana nayo emgwaqweni futhi iwugodo noma uyishayela, kube sengathi bayakha bediniwe.Manje sebeyishintshe izinto eziningi nobuchwepheshe bahambisana nse nezimoto zesimanje ezingamaSport Utility Vehicle (SUV). Kusekuningi vele okusadinga bakwenze. Uma uyishayela uyayizwa ukuthi kusamele basebenze kanzima kodwa kuyethembisa njengoba beyiphucula njalo uma benza entsha.Isiyanakeka manje nasemgwaqweni, abantu sebeyakubukisisa uma uhamba ngayo. Engingakwazi wukuthi basuke bebheke ini kakhulukazi. Ngicabanga ukuthi ukucokama kwayo kuyilungele imigwaqo yaseNingizimu Afrika.Amasondo ayo amakhulu akulungele ukungena ebhuqwini nasemaqwaqwasini. Ukushintsha kwabo amalambu ngemuvanokuyishintsha ngaphambili kwenza igqame. Ukudimisa amawindi angemuva nelebhuthi, kwenza ibe nomehluko futhilokhu kwenza abantu abangaphandle bangaboni ngaphakathi noma ngabe upakile. Ngaphakathi le engihambengayo ibinezihlalo zesikhumba.Isinomsakazo wesimanje owushintsha ngokubuka isibuko bese ucofa ngomunwe, wenze lokho okushoyo. Isisebenzisa ngishone-bluetooth imbala kanye ne-USB, okuchaza ukuthi ungazidlalela umculo wakho ngale kweziteshi. Ungakwazi nokuwushintsha esiteringini umsakazo, njengoba le Hover inesiteringi esiyi-multifunction. Ungaxhuma ngisho neselula uma uthanda.Engikuthandayo ngale moto wukuthi inodeda ngendlale wendawo kusukela ngemuva endaweni yezimpahla kanye nasezihlalweni ezingemuva, imilenze iyakhululeka. Nangaphambili ngokunjalo ungahlehlisa isihlalo ngokushaya ibhathini uze uzelule imbala. Izihlalo zangemuva ziyagoqeka uma ufuna ukulayisha. Amawindi akhona ehliswa ngamabhathini. Ama-wiper ungawashintsha azisebenzele wona uma seliqala ukuna kanti namalambu ungawenza azikhanyisele umasekuhwalala. Uma siza ngasemandleni, ngabe ngidlala ngayo bandla i-H5 uma ngingathi inamandla futhi iyagijima. Yindobolo yangempela emgwaqweni. Ukuhamba ngemotoengakaqaqeki eseyintsha ceke nakho kuba nomthelela kodwa lena angiboni kuzoba nomehluko noma isijwayele ukuhamba. Entabeni uma ulayishile ungashintsha uze ufike egiyeni lokuqala ulokhu uwehlisile nje. Akuyona eyokuhamba abantu abaphuthumayo. Yize kunjalo uma isiye yalunguza ku-120 uhleka wedwa kodwa ziyaqhubeka zidlule ezinye.Lena ebengiyivivinya ngehamba ngopetrol enenjini yeMitsubishi i4G69 eyi-2.4litre eyake yaqokwa njengehamba phambili kwezaseChina ngo-2010.Ikunika amandla angu-110kWatts. Ngeke ngiphawule ngayo ukuthi idonsa kanjani emagelekedeni adinga i-4x4 njengoba ngisezinhlelweni zokuyivivinya khona maduze nje.I-H5 ibiza u-R212 193.
title: Bakhombisa ukukhula kwa-GWM

text: MLUNGISI GUMEDEU MHOLI we-DA ePhalamende uMnuz Musi Maimane uthe akusensuku zatshwala iqembu lakhe lithathe izintambo zombuso kwi-ANC kuleli ekhungethwe izinkinga zangaphakathi ezigcina seziphazamisa ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo kubantu.UMaimane ubehambela izindawo ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal kule mpelasonto njengoba ebekwelikaMthaniya izinsuku ezimbili kusukela ngoMgqibelo nayizolo eqhuba umkhankaso weqembu lakhe iVision 2029.NgoMgqibelo uMaimane ubekwaMshayazafe eNanda ekhuluma namalungu omphakathi. Usuke eNanda waya eMgungundlovu. Iningi labantu bakwaMshayazafe likhala ngokungabi nazindlu nokuntula imisebenzi.Izolo uqale eLovu wagcina eChatsworth. Ekhuluma namalungu omphakathi eChatsworth uMaimane uthe iqembu lakhe lizibophezele ekushintsheni impilo yabantu bakuleli yingakho liqale iVision 2029.Uthe ngalolu hlelo bahlose ukuthi kudalwe amathuba emisebenzi, kube nemfundo engcono kuphinde kuliwe nendlala.“Iqembu elibusayo libhekene nezinselelo eziningi ngaphakathi ezinhlakeni zalo, lokho kugcina sekuphazamisa ukuyiswa kwezidingo kubantu,” usho kanje.Uthe bafuna ukuthatha izintambo zombuso KwaZulu-Natal, ikakhulukazi kuMasipala weTheku ngoba khona zinkulu kakhulu izinkinga kwi-ANC ihluleka ngisho ukuhlalisa ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi.“Engikutholile ukuthi izinkinga zabantu ezindaweni ezihlukene ziyafana bakhala ngokuntuleka kwemisebenzi, izindlu nendlala. Zonke lezi zinkinga abakhala ngazo izona lezi ezenze saqala lolu hlelo iVision 2029,” usho kanje.Uthe ngempelasonto ezayo uzoya eGauteng nakwezinye izifundazwe.UMaimane uthe bajabule ngendlela abamukelwe ngayo kuzo zonke izindawo abazihambele KwaZulu-Natal.“Kuyacaca ukuthi abantu sebelilahlile ithemba ngohulumeni we-ANC manje sebenona i-DA ingaba isisombululo ezinkingeni zabo,” usho kanje.
title: I-DA ifuna ukugudluza i-ANC eKZN

text: Ethintwa yiSolezwe ngemuva kwalezi zindaba u-Abigail ucele ukunikwa isikhathi njengoba eveze ukuthi ubuhlungu abuzwayo ngeke bufaniswe nalutho.“Niyangazi ukuthi angiyena umuntu onqabayo ukuphawula uma kudlule amaqhawe akithi kodwa kulokhu ngiyahluleka ngempela, ngicela ningiphe izinsuku ezimbalwa njengoba ngingakazikholwa lezi zindaba,” kusho u-Abigail ngamafuphi.BenoDorothy bebehlala behamba bobabili emicimbini ehlukene ikakhulu obekuhlonishwa kuyo amaciko noma emingcwabeni yabaculi nabalingisi bakuleli.Okhulumela umndeni uFortune Hute uthe, le ngqalabutho engeyokuzalwa eZimbabwe ishonele emzini wayo oseGoli.“Umama uMasuka ubesehlaselwa wukugula okuhlukene njengoba eke wahlaselwa wumfutho ophezulu wegazi owadala ukuthi ahlaselwe yiStroke izikhathi ezimbalwa,” kusho uFortune.Uthe izolo bebenomhlangano womndeni obekuzocaca kuwona izinto eziningi ezithinta umngcwabo nezinhlelo zesikhumbuzo.UDorothy nomdeni wakhe basuka eZimbabwe ngemuva kokuhlaselwa wukugula eneminyaka engu-19.Kuleli uzakhele igama ngezingoma okukhona kuzo ethi Hamba Nontsokolo nethi Lendaba.Ngeminyaka yama-1950, wagxila emculweni okwagcina ngokuthi azungeze amazwe omhlaba ecula nabaculi abahlukene.Amaciko okukhona kuwo uFlorence Masebe, Proverb nabanye adlulise amazwi enduduzo emdenini.NoNgqogqoshe wamaCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke uMnuz Nathi Mthethwa ukhalisane nomndeni nelakuleli ngokudlula kukaMasuka.Namaqembu ezepolitiki okukhona kuwo i-EFF neCope adlulisele amazwi enduduzo emndenini walesi sihlabani athi akulahlekelwe umndeni kuphela kodwa lonke elakuleli.
title: Iminjunju ku-Abigail kudlula uDorothy

text: OMUNYE wabaholi igama lakhe elivelayo kwabangase bahole i-ANCYL njengoba ilungisela ingqungquthela kazwelonke, wuMnuz Mcebo Dlamini.UDlamini uthe ngeke anqabe uma kukhona amaqabane amthumayo ukuthi awahole.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uDlamini uthe akhona amaqabane aseze kuyena, athi angafisa ukuthi abe ngumengameli we-ANCYL.UDlamini, owazakhela udumo ngokuhola imikhankaso yeFeesMustFall, kulezi zinsuku useThekwini lapho ebonakala khona ethatha izithombe namaqabane ngaphansi kwesifunda iTheku.“Umamkhulu wami uhlala eNtuzuma njengoba ngikhona lapha, ngize kuye ngizophumula. Kodwa phela uma ufikile endaweni uyiqabane kumele uvakashele amanye amaqabane,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe akhona amaqabane aseveze ukuthi angafisa ukuba awahole kwi-ANCYL.“Nami ngikuvezile ukuthi uma abantu abasha bethi bayangithuma ngoba phela ukuba ngumholi wubizo, uma nawe unalo ubizo futhi uma uthunywa kawusho ukuthi hhayi mina sengathi namhlanje ngikhathele. Ngingasho nje ngithi ikhona into enjalo, ngeke ngikufihle futhi ukuthi ngizovuma uma intsha isithwesa umthwalo,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe ngaphandle kwaseKZN, akhona futhi amanye amaqabane akwezinye izifundazwe ikakhulukazi eGauteng nase-Eastern Cape akhuluma indaba yakhe.UDlamini isikhundla sokuhola i-ANCYL angase asibange noMnuz Sifiso Mtsweni okumanje onguSihlalo weNational Youth Development Agency noMnuz Reggie Nkabinde.Omunye wabantu abebethwelwe ngeqoma esikhundleni nguMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo onguNobhala we-ANCYL eKZN kodwa manje obonakala sengathi usehoshe imfe njengoba igama lakhe seliphakanyiswa ohlangothini olufuna ukuhola iTheku.
title: Isishoshovu siyawuvuma umthwalo we-ANCYL

text: AMALUNGU omphakathi waseQuarry Heights, eThekwini, akhala ngabasebenzi bakaMasipala weTheku, athi balahla udoti emgwaqweni oseduze kwemizi yabo.Lawa malungu athi sekuphele isikhathi eside ezama ukunqanda amaloli alahla udoti emgwaqweni uQuarry Hieghts Drive, kuleli lokishi.Kuthiwa abasebenzi abasuke beshayela imoto kadoti banqandeka uma kukhona ilungu elibavimbayo ukuthi balahle udot,i abasuke bewuthwele. Uma befike kungekho muntu obabonayo, kuthiwa bayawulahla maqede bahambe.UMnuz Bongani Duma oyisakhamuzi kule ndawo, uthi sebezame bahluleka wukulungisa inkinga ababhekene nayo ngoba ikhansela lendawo lingaqhamuki nesisombululo.“ Inkinga enkulu wukuthi ikhansela alisilekeleli kule nkinga. Akulula neze ukugada amaloli asuke ezolahla udoti nsuku zonke ngoba kwesinye isikhathi afika sisemsebenzini,” kubeka uDuma.Ilungu lekomiti lomphakathi uNksz Sara Luthuli, lithi sebeludlulisile udaba kumasipala kodwa basalinde ukuzwa isisombululo ozoqhamuka naso.“ Sisalinde ukuzwa kumasipala ukuthi uwusiza kanjani umphakathi okhala ngodoti,” kubeka uNksz Luthuli kafushane.Ikhansela lendawo uNksz Joyce Johnson, lithe bamatasa nophiko lokuqoqwa kukadoti iDSW,  ngomkhankaso wokuhlanza le ndawo.“ Abantu baseQuarry Heights sibacelile ukuthi bathathe izinombolo zamaloli ukuze sikwazi ukulandelela ukuthi ngobani abalahla udoti endaweni yabo,” kubeka ikhansela.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe umkhandlu unalo ulwazi ngokwenzeka ophikweni lokuqoqwa kwadoti.“  Umkhandlu ujube ithimba labasebenzi elizoqikelela ukuthi sizihlinzeka ngendlela efanele izinsiza emphakathini. Umphathi oqondene nophiko nguye ogunyazwe ukuthi enze uphenyo mayelana nale nkinga,” kubeka uMayisela.Eqhuba uthe, umkhandlu awuhambisani nomkhuba wokulahlwa kukadoti ngokungemthetho. Abantu bangabika kwinombolo ethi 031 311 8804,  uma bebona izephula mthetho ezilahla udoti endaweni okungagunyaziwe ukuthi kulahlwe kuyona.
title: Bakhala ngabasebenzi bakamasipala abalahla udoti

text: KUSHONE umbhikishi oyedwa ngesikhathi amalungu omphakathi etholana phezulu ngezulu lezandla namaphoyisa embhikishweni obuphakathi kwaseColenso naseWeenen ngeSonto ebusuku.Kuthiwa iqulu lamalungu omphakathi livuke indlobane lavala umgwaqo uR74 ngamathayi avuthayo lacekela phansi nempahla.Kuthiwa ugandaganda obuseduze komgwaqo ushisiwe ngababhikishi abebevutha bengabaselwe.Amalungu omphakathi kuthiwa ajikijele amaphoyisa ngamatshe, adubula ebhekise kuwo. Amaphoyisa aphindiselile kwase kulimala umbhikishi oyedwa ogcine eshonele esibhedlela.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe ngeSonto ebusuku amalungu omphakathi abethukuthele avuke umbhejazane avala umgwaqo uR74.“Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ezama ukuvula umgwaqo, ashaywe ngamatshe aphinde adutshulwa kwalinyazwa nemoto yawo. Ngaso leso sikhathi elinye iqulu lababhikishi belisabisa unogada obegade ugandaganda ogcine ushisiwe,” kusho uMbele.Uthe iqulu lamalungu omphakathi liqhubekile laduna iloli ebeligcwele impahla.“Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ezama ukungenelela aphinde adutshulwa. aphindesela kwadubuleka ilungu lomphakathi elilodwa eliphuthunyiswe esibhedlela lagcina selishonela khona,” kusho uMbele.Amaphoyisa aseColenso aphenya icala loludala uthuthuva emphakathini nokucekela phansi impahla.
title: Kufe oyedwa kudubulana amaphoyisa nomphakathi

text: MHLELI: Ngivumele ngibeke umbono wami mayelana nohlelo oluvezwa kumabonakude olubizwa ngoTatakho, lapho kusuke kufunwa ikakhulukazi ubaba wangempela wengane.Zikhona izingane ezihlezi nobaba abangazizali kodwa abaziphethe kahle njengezingane abazizalayo, bese kuba khona izingane ezifika nomama emendweni kungezona ezasemshadweni. Kuphinde kube nezingane ezihlezi kahle zondliwa futhi zifundiswa ngobaba abangazizali kodwa futhi uthole ukuthi kwayona ingane yazi lo baba njengobaba wayo wangempela.Wonke umuntu uyadinga ukwazi ubaba wakhe, noma ngabe usashona noma ngabe usaphila. Kunezingane namuhla ezakhuliswa ngobaba abangazizali okunamuhla ziphila kamnandi ngoba zakhuliswa kahle.Kunezingane ezihlukunyezwayo kumanje okuthiwa, "Wena kawusiyena owalapha ekhaya, hamba kini!" Uthole ukuthi ingane kayilazi elinye ikubo yazi lapha, kanti umndeni usuyibukisisile, wazanelisa ukuthi kakusiyona eyalapha ekhaya.Kwesinye isikhathi izithandani ziyavumelana ngokuba nemfihlo lapho indoda izothatha unina nengane yakhe, bavumelane ngokuthi lolu daba kuzokuba ngolwabo bobabili.Ngesinye isikhathi uma ingane ikhula iye ifune usiko lwakubo. Yilapho ke iye igule noma kube khona izinto ezingahambi kahle kuyona, igcine isiya kulaba okuthiwa bayabona, abanye ke kuye kuthiwe bayabona kanti kababoni.Iqala lapho ke inkinga, ufike umntwana atshelwe lokho namuhla kusasa atshelwe okuhlukile, ekugcineni bese ehlasela umama wakhe. Umama uhlaselelwa ukuthi kungani engalikhulumi iqiniso achazele ingane ukuthi ingeyakwabani? Uthole abanye sebeludlulisela udaba kuTatakho!Yilapho ke ingane ithola amahlazo kamama wayo ukuthi walala namadoda amangaka, kanti futhi akayazi okuyiyona eyamkhulelisa. Nakhona lapho kuyenzeka amadoda awakhumbulayo umama ukuthi waya nawo ocansini abe mathathu, nakhona lapho uthole ukuthi imiphumela iyawaphika la madoda amathathu.Kwesinye isikhathi omama bezingane bayalala namadoda ahlukene bese kuthi uma esekhulelwe abheke indoda engakwazi ukondla ingane bese ethi iyona ke ubaba wengane. Abesifazane bajwayele uma kuzikhulunyelwa nje bese bethi bayamazi bona ubaba wengane, kodwa uma ulandela uhlelo uTatakho ugcina sewutholile ukuthi lokho akusilona iqiniso.Uma ke imiphumela yamadoda amabili noma amathathu iyilandula ingane, ibe ibihlala futhi yazi ukuthi ubaba wayo yilona oshade nomama wayo, ishona kephi? Umama wayo ushona kephi? Ubudlelwane bengane nonina buba kuliphi izinga?Kuhle ukuthola iqiniso kodwa elingeke futhi lakushiya nomlilo osuyokusha inguna-phakade! Uma singalandela ukuthi labo abaphikwe yimiphumela okusho ukuthi kumanje ababazi abobaba babo, baphila kanjani ke kumanje? Sizothola ukuthi isimo sibi kakhulu kunakuqala udaba lungakayi kuTatakho.Kuyingozi ukufunwa kukababa yingane, kungcono kune ngubaba wengane oyifunayo. Nakhona futhi lapho, ake sicabange, sekuthiwa mina noma wena, kunobaba othi mina ngiyingane yakhe ngoba balala nomama wami, nomama avume ukuthi walala naleyo ndoda!
