Umama osekuvela ukuthi walala namadoda athize ekubeni eseshadile, angeke esahlala kahle emzini. Mhlawumbe nje selokhu lolu hlelo lwaqala baningi omama asebethuthile emizini yabo bahamba, ngoba vese bakhombise ukungathembeki. Kuyihlazo kakhulu ukuthi kwaziwe ukuthi ingane kamasibanibani akayazi ukuthi ingekabani!
title: [IMIBONO] Kungaba yingozi ukufuna uyihlo wakho wangempela

text: UBALISA akaphezi unina wengane osola isibhedlela ngokuhlephula ingane yakhe umlomo nekhala.UNksz Bawelile Hadebe waseMatikwe eNanda, usola isibhedlela iMahatma Gandhi Memorial esisePhoenix eThekwini ngokulimaza ingane yakhe ngenkathi simbelethisa ngokumhlinza ngenyanga edlule.Uthe isibhedlela sesifake ucingo ekhaleni lengane sithi sizama ukuvusa ikhala elisikekile.Mayelana nokudla, uthe idonsa kanzima ingane yakhe ngoba igwinya kanzima ngoba isikeke kwaze kwayoshaya entanyeni.“Unezilonda ezikhombisa ukuthi wasikeka emzimbeni kanti nasebusweni unemihuzuko ekhombisa ukusikeka,” kusho uNksz Hadebe.Njengamanje uthe bamzulisa zonke izibhedlela lapho kuthiwa uzothola khona usizo.“Kuyangimangaza abakushoyo ngoba ngenkathi ngihamba ama-scan ngisenezinyanga eziyisikhombisa ngikhulelwe kwaze kwaba wukuthi ngiyabeletha, akekho udokotela noma unesi owake wangitshela ukuthi kukhona inkinga mayelana nengane engiyikhulelwe,” kuchaza uNksz Hadebe.NgokukaNksz Hadebe, le nkinga ekhungethe ingane yakhe inkulu kakhulu futhi usebonile ukuthi kukhona afihlelwa kona abasesibhedlela njengoba bemehlisa bemenyusa ezibhedlela ezehlukene kungekho ovumayo ukuthi iphutha lenzeka kusona isibhedlela.“Ngizobekezela kuze kube wukuthi ingane yami ithola usizo. Emva kwalokho ngizobe sengifuna abazongisiza ngezinyathelo zomthetho okumele ngizithathe ngoba ikusasa lengane yami lonakele kuyimanje,” kusho yena.Kwayena uNksz Hadebe uthe uke wadonsa kanzima ehluleka ukuzibamba uma eyochama emva kokuhlinzwa kwakhe ngesikhathi ebeletha.“Sekungcono manje akusafani nakuqala,” kusho yena.Njengamanje uthe ingane yakhe iphila ngokunceliswa amabhodlela ayisipesheli awathola khona esibhedlela.Unovalo lokuthi uma ingane yakhe ikhula ingazange iluthole usizo nokunxeshezelwa ingase ikhubazeke unomphela.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Ncumisa Mafunda, uthe amarekhodi asesibhedlela ayaphikisana nokushiwoyo.“Nakuba umthetho ungavumi ukuthi uMnyango udalule isimo sempilo yesiguli njengoba lokhu kuyimfihlo ephakathi kwaso noma umzali, umqaphi waso nabezempilo, uMnyango utshelwe abaphathi besibhedlela ukuthi isiguli esithile sazalwa sivele sinesimo esithile esingadalwanga wubudedengu babasebenzi bezempilo,” kusho isitatimende esithunyelelwe leli phephandaba.Ngokwesitatimende, isiguli sesike sahlolwa ukuthi ngabe siyilungele yini i-plastic surgery kanti lokhu kuhlolwa kusaqhubeka ngoba unina ucelwe ukuba abuyele naso (isiguli) esibhedlela ngo-Ephreli.
title: Usola isibhedlela ngokulimaza ingane yakhe

text: UMNDENI wowesifazane waseMlaza owabhokodwa ngommese nguyise wengane yakhe uthi wethulwe umthwalo ngokuboshwa komsolwa.Uyise wengane kaNksz Philile Mbongo (26) wakwa-L osolwa ngokumgwaza ambulale emasontweni amathathu adlule uboshwe ngoLwesine ebusuku ebhace eCato Manor.Umzala kaNksz Mbongo, uMnuz Mzamo Mbatha, uthe bazizwa sebekhululekile bewumndeni emva kokuboshwa komsolwa obese kucishe kwaphela inyanga engatholakali.UMbatha uthe bese bekhathazekile ngokuthi uma umsolwa bemthola bangagcina benza okuphambene nomthetho.Umsolwa uboshwe ngoLwesine ntambama ngosuku obekuhamba ngalo isidumbu siyiswa eMzinto lapho umufi efihlwe khona ngempelasonto.Ngokusho komndeni, ngaphambi kokubulala uNksz Mbongo, umsolwa wayesabise ngokuthi uzombulala bese ezibulala.Kuthiwa umsolwa wamshaya, wamklinya, umufi wabaleka waya kanina omncane wase etholela umsolwa incwadi yenkantolo emvikela kuyena. Kuthiwa umsolwa wabe eseyamsongela ethi uzombulala bese ezibulala naye.“Besinovalo lokuthi umsolwa angabuya azozama ukusula ubufakazi ngokuthi ahlasele abambona ngesikhathi emgwaza,” kusho uMbatha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ngoLwesine kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-26 ngecala lokubulawa kukaNksz Mbongo. Umsolwa bekulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo izolo.
title: Kuboshwe 'owabhokoda' unina wengane ngommese

text: UMEMEZELE isikwati esiqinile umqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe lika-Under 20 uThabo Senong izolo emini.Amajita azobamba iqhaza kuCaf African Youth Championship ngenyanga ezayo. Elakuleli liboshelwe eqoqweni elilodwa neCameroon, Senegal neSudan. Le midlalo ezodlalelwa eZambia eyokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-Under 20 eseJapan ngoMeyi.Amaqembu azozibekisela indawo kuma-semi final azozitholela ithikithi elibheke eJapan. Amajita azovula neCameroon ngoFebhuwari 27 eLevy Mwanawasa Stadium, eNdola, eZambia, bese kuthi umdlalo wesibili ubesenkundleni efanayo neSenegal ngoMashi 2.Owokugcina wokuvala eyamaqoqo ungoMashi 5 eHeroes Stadium, eLusaka, eZambia. USenong ufake uPhakamani Mahlambi ogijima kuBidvest Wits.Lo mdlali ohlale izinyanga engadlali ngenxa yokulimala nguyena owayegqamile ngesikhathi iqembu lesizwe lika-Under 23 lizibekisela indawo kuma-Olympic Games abeseRio de Janeiro, eBrazil ngonyaka odlule.UMahlambi (19) kubhekwe ukuthi aphinde asize iBafana emidlalweni yokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba eRussia ngo-2018 nakweyokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ngo-2019. Ubuye ekulimaleni kwezwakala kulandela ukuhlala isikhathi eside engadlali. Abanye abadlali okubhekwe ukuthi bagqame kulesi sikwati nguKhanyisa Mayo weSuperSport United, uLiam Jordan ogijima kuSporting Libson yasePortugal, Luther Singh ongenalo iqembu, Luyanda Ntshangase oyibamba kuMatizburg United, Kobamelo Kodisang wePlatinum Stars, Thabo Cele weReal Sporting Clubbe, Tercius Malepe we-Orlando Pirates noSiyabonga Ngezana odlala kuKaizer Chiefs.Abadlali bazofika ekhempini ngoLwesine oluzayo. Bazokhempa amasonto amabili ngaphambi kokuthi balibhekise eZambia. Elakuleli sekuphele iminyaka lagcina ukudlala eNdebeni yoMhlaba ka-Under 20. Lagcina ukudlala kulo mqhudelwano ngo-2009 e-Egypt.Selilonke iqembu lesizwe laMajita limi kanje:Onozinti:Sanele Tshabalala, Darren Johnson noMondli Mpoto.Izitobha:Aghmat Ceres, Sirgio Kammies, Reeve Frosler, Notha Ngcobo, Malebogo Modise, Katleho Mohammed, Givemore Khupe, Shane Saralina, Siyabonga Ngezana no-Tercius Malepe.Esiswini:Thabo Cele, Wiseman Meyiwa, Sipho Mbule, Thabani Zuke, Teboho Mokoena, Katlego Ntshabeleng, Sydney Mtshweni, Duncan Apollis, Nkosingiphile Ngcobo, Sibongakonke MbathanoKobamelo Kodisang.Abagadli:Luther Singh, Liam Jordan, Luyanda Ntshangase, Menzi Ndwandwe, Itumeleng Shopane, Khanyisa Mayo noPhakamani Mahlambi.
title: USenong omemezele isikwati ugabe ngoMahlambi ku-Under 20

text: ABASEBENZI benkampani ethunga izimpahla iTrade Call Investement Apparel eseMobeni, eThekwini, izolo bavale umgwaqo befuna imali esiza abathikanyezwe yiCovid-19 (Covid-19 TERS).Abasebenzi, abangamalungu eSouthern African Clothing & Textile Workers’ Union (SACTWU), bathe abakaze bayithole imali yabo yeCovid-19 TERS kusukela ngoMeyi yize benolwazi lokuthi inkampani yabo ikhokhelwe yi-UIF.UNksz Nompumelelo Zwane ongumxhumanisi wabasebenzi nenyunyana eTrade Call Investment Apparel edume ngokuthi yiTCI, uthe umqashi uthe uthole uR11 000 kuphela kwi-UIF yize bona bazi ukuthi ukhokhelwe imali engaphezu kukaR1 million.“Siqale ukubuza ngemali yethu ngesonto eledlule kwathiwa izokhokhwa ngemva kwezinsuku ezintathu, sibalile sathola ukuthi ziphela ngoMsombuluko. Sibe sesibizwa emhlanganweni satshelwa ukuthi imali engenile iwuR11 000 ebhekelele iTCI oseThekwini okuyithina. Enye imali ikhokhele abanye oTCI. Kubuye kwathiwa imali kaMeyi ayikho, imali eyangena eka-Ephreli kodwa asikaze siyithole,” kusho uNksz Zwane.Babuye batshelwa ukuthi imali ifakwa kwi-bargaining council ebhekelele abasebenza ngendwangu kodwa bona abanankinga nalokho, abakufunayo yimali yabo.IPhini likaNobhala Jikelele weSactwu, uMnuz Vilina Membinkosi, lithe abasebenzi benza iphutha uma bethi imali kaMeyi isikhokhiwe ngoba imali abayibonayo ngeka-Ephreli futhi bayitholile.“Abasebenzi bacele ukubona uhlu olukhombisa imali ekhokhiwe banikezwa. Sibachazelile nokuthi imali eyangena ngeka-Ephreli. Sichazile nokuthi uma abantu bebesebenza beholelwa imali yabo abakwazi ukuthola imali yeTERS. Bakhona akade besebenza benza impahla yokuzivikela kwiCovid-19. Silindele-ke ukuthi kube yisibalo esincane esitelekile hhayi bonke abasebenzi,” kusho uMembinkosi.Uthe iSactwu ithumele abantu ababili ukuze bachazele abasebenzi konke okwenzekayo.Okhulumela iTrade Call Investment Apparel akatholakalanga ukuphawula. Abaphendule ucingo banike intatheli inombolo yeselula okuthe uma ishayelwa, obambe ucingo wathi akazi lutho ngesiteleka.
title: Bavale umgwaqo befuna imali ye-UIF

text: ISIHLABANI somculo kamaskandi, uKhuzani "Indlamlenze" Mpungose, sifikelwe wumunyu ngesikhathi sihlonishwa nguMasipala wangakubo eNkandla ngegalelo laso emculweni. UKhuzani ubungazwe esaphila nabafundi abaqhakambise indawo yaseNkandla kuGrade 12 nyakenye kumaMayoral Excellence Awards 2021 And Study Assistance, eNkandla Indoor Sports Centre ngoLwesine."Ngizithoba kakhulu ngokuhlonishwa njengomculi kamaskandi osemncane, kodwa namhlanje ngizithola ngihlonishwa. Kungifikisela umunyu uma ngizwa kukhulunywa ngami kanje, ngiphila. Ingoba ngike ngibone kukhulunywa ngabantu sebengasekho, kuthiwa benza kahle. Ubeshaya, ehlula amaqhawe..." UKhuzani uthe yize esehlonishwe kakhulu kodwa okwaseNkandla kuvelele ngenxa yokuthi uyilokhu ayikho ngenxa yomphakathi wakule ndawo okuyiwo owamkhulisa nomxhasayo.Imeya yaseNkandla, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uchaze uKhuzani njengengqalabutho abaziqhenya kakhulu ngayo kule ndawo ngenxa yamagalelo ayo. "Sihlonipha leli qhawe namhlanje, uKhuzani "Indlamlenze" Mpungose. Singabantu baseNkandla sibone kufanele sikuhloniphe kumaMayoral Excellence Awards. Akuhlonishwa nanoma ngubani. Ubokwazi uma ufike kulesi sigaba, sisuke siziqhenya kanjani ngawe. Sewuhlonishwe nabantu abasezingeni eliphezulu," kusho uNtuli ohloniphe uKhuzani ngesikhumba senkomo yabeNguni, isitifiketi, indondo, isiklabhu nesigingci sebhesi. Uhlelo lwale ndumezulu yalo mcimbi beluphethwe umhleli futhi ongumfundi wezindaba zesiZulu kuSABC 1, uVusizwe Langa nomsakazi woKhozi FM, uTshatha Ngobe.Phakathi kwezicukuthwane ebezikhona kubalwa noMntwana uPhumzile Buthelezi ongusiHlalo we-IFP Women' Brigade kuzwelonke futhi oyiLungu lesiShayamthetho eKZN, uMnuz Mthokozisi Nxumalo ongusiHlalo we-IFP Youth Brigade kuzwelonke neLungu lePhalamende, Inkosi uMzamo Buthelezi oyiPhini likaMengameli weNkatha kuzwelonke futhi oyiLungu lePhalamende, uMnuz Siphosethu Ngcobo onguNobhala-Jikelele weNkatha futhi uyiLungu lePhalamende kuzwelonke.Kusukume wonke umuntu ngesikhathi uKhuzani esecula bukhoma unqambothi lwengoma yakhe ehlukanise unyaka oKhozini ngo2020. Lo mculi ubuye wahlonishwa nangokugcwalisa iMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ngo2019. Ngaphandle kwalokho uKhuzani useke wahlula bonke abaculi kumaDstv Mzansi Viewers' Choice Awards ngo2018 futhi wahlabana nangeBest Maskandi Award kumaSouth African Music Awards (Sama) ngo2017. Usebuya nase-United States of America ngokohlelo lwamaSatma Awards ngo2016.
title: Ufikelwe umunyu ehlonishwa ngakubo

text: IZAZI zomnotho zithi basazothwala kanzima osomabhizinisi abancane njengoba kunyuke uphethroli nodizili. Ilitha likaphethroli  linyuke ngo-66 cents kanti elikadizili linyuke ngo-57 cents.UNksz Palesa Mabasa obhekele osomabhizinisi abancane kwa-FNB uveze ukuthi izindleko zosomabhizinisi abancane zizokwanda nango-Ephreli njengoba kuzonyuka intela ekhokhwa uma kufakwa uphethroli ngo-27 cents ilitha.”Le ntela ibhekela isikhwama sabalimele emgwaqweni iRoad Accident Fund nezinye izindleko ezithinta imigwaqo.UNksz Mabasa uthe osomabhizinisi abancane bakhahlanyezwe yiCovid-19 kanti ukunyuka kukaphethroli nodizili kuzokwandisa izinkinga zabo.“Osomabhizinisi abancane kufanele beze nezinhlelo ezintsha zokuthuthukisa amabhizinisi abo, babheke lapho benganciphisa khona izindleko ngoba ukunyuka kukaphethroli nodizili kuzobashaya. Okunye okuzobashaya wukuthi abathengi bazokwandelwa yizindleko okusho ukuthi ngeke babe nemali eningi yokuthenga. Abantu bazothenga abakudinga kakhulu,” kusho uNksz Mabasa.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa oyisazi somnotho uthe kuzosinda kuwo wonke umuntu hhayi kosomabhizinisi kuphela ngoba ukunyuka kukaphethroli nodizili kunyusa imikhiqizo eminingi.UMnuz Paul Makube ongusomnotho ogxile kwezolimo uthe, abalimi balungiselela ukutshala ama-hectare awu-751 000 kakolweni, awebarley, canola ne-oats  ngakho bazodinga udizili omningi.Uthe ukunyuka kukadizili kudalwe wukunyuka kuka-oyela ongahluziwe emazweni awukhiqizayo njengoba amazwe amaningi eseqale ukuvula umnotho.“Izindleko zabalimi zizonyuka ngoba nalabo abafuyile kufanele bathumele imfuyo emadeleni nakwamanye amazwe. Konke lokhu kudinga udizili. Kudingeka wonke umuntu abophe izifociya ngoba izindleko ziyanda. Siyathemba ukuthi irandi lizodlondlobala ukuze lisilwele ekunyukeni kwezindleko zika-oyela,” kusho uMakube.
title: Kusazoba wumqansa kosomabhizinisi abasafufusa

text: KUFE abantu abawu-11 kwalimala abawu-8 engozini yezimoto ezintathu emgwaqeni uN3 ngase Wilge Toll Plaza, eFree State izolo ntambama.Ngokwemibiko endaweni yesigameko kushayisane itekisi, imoto encane kanye neloli.Okhulumela iNetcare 911 uMnuz Shawn Herbst uthe kufe abantu abawu-11 endaweni yesigameko.“Abanye abawu-8 basesimeni esibucayi kanti oyedwa wabo ulandwe indiza enophephela emhlane waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela,” kuso uHerbst.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eFree State uColonel Thandi Mbabo uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala kanti kusazokwenziwa uphenyo ngale ngozi eyenzeke ngo-3.30 ntambama. Kubikwa ukuthi iloli lishayisane neToyota Quantum ebiphambana nayo.UMbambo uthe kuzophenywa imbangela yengozi.
title: Kudlule abawu-11 engozini yetekisi neloli kuN3

text: ZELDA VENTERBAZOBUYELA enkantolo ngenyanga ezayo odokotela abafuna ukuthi uMnyango wezeMpilo ugunyaze ukuthi umshanguzo obulala amazenze nezikelemu ezilwaneni, i-Ivermectin ugunyazwe ukuze kwelashwe ngawo iziguli ezineCovid-19.UDkt George Coetzee weSiverton Medical Practitioners, i-AfriForum, nabanye odokotela izolo bafake amaphepha eNkantolo eNkulu yasePretoria, befuna ukuthi uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli  Zweli Mkhize nesikhungo esigunyaza ukusetshenziswa kwemithi kuleli iSouth African Health Products Regulatory Authority (SAHPRA), bagunyaze ukusetshenziswa kwalawa maphilisi.Labo dokotela bafuna ukuthi umnyango neSAHPRA bagunyaze ngokushesha ukuthi la maphilisi  asetshenziswe nakubantu ukuze odokotela abafuna ukwelapha iziguli ezineCovid-19, bakwazi ukuwasebenzisa.Labo dokotela bathi uma udokotela efuna ukusebenzisa la maphilisi kudingeka agcwalise amafomu achaze ukuthi kungani efuna ukuwasebenzisa, aphinde athole imvume kuSAHPRA ngaphambi kokuwasebenzisa. Bathi lokhu  kuthatha isikhathi eside. Bafuna inkantolo ilumise uhlelo lokuthi bagcwalise amafomu.UMnuz Barend Uys we-AfriForum uthe: “Isikhathi esikuso asifani nesaphambilini. Abantu bafa ubuthaphuthaphu ezikhungweni zezempilo, abasebenzi bezempilo abasazi benzenjani. Usuku ngalunye ludlula nemiphefumulo eminingi.”Uthe i-Ivermectin ibhaliswe yiWorld Health Organisation (WHO), njengamaphilisi aphephile ukuthi angasetshenziswa nasezinganeni.“Ucwaningo olwenziwe e-USA, Argentina, India, Egypt  naseSpain lukhombisa ukuthi i-Ivermectin ingasiza ekwelapheni iCovid-19, okungehlisa isibalo sababulawa yileli gciwane. Yingakho sithathe lesi sinyathelo ngoba siyazi ukuthi la maphilisi ahloliwe kwatholakala ukuthi awayona ingozi." Abafake isicelo enkantolo bathi abalimi yibo abasebenzisa kakhulu i-Ivermectin manje sebebaningi abantu abayisebenzisayo okwenza ukuthi kube nzima ukuyithola emakhemisi ezilwane futhi isiyabiza.Kwamanye amazwe la maphilisi kuvumelekile ukuthi asetshenziswe kubantu, kuleli avumeleke ukuthi asetshenziswe ezilwaneni kuphela."Iqiniso ukuthi abantu abaningi basebenzisa amaphilisi ezilwane bengenalo ulwazi lokuthi asetshenziswa kanjani, okungaholele ekutheni beqise isikali okuyingozi. Kumele agunyazwe ukuze bawanikezwe odokotela nosokhemisi," kusho u-Uys.
title: I-AfriForum ibopha umnyango ngodaba lwe-Ivermectin

text: NJENGAMASOSHA eya empini abadlali beBafana Bafana abanavalo ngokuyongena esibayeni sezitha babhekane nazo ngqo emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ongempelasonto.Namuhla iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika lizobhekisa amabombo eNigeria ligcwele ukuzethemba phezu kokubhekana nezingqinamba emalungiselweni alo.Umdlalo ongowokuqala kuGroup E ungoMgqibelo eGodswill Akpabio International Stadium, e-Uyo ngo-5 ntambama. Kudlalelwa ukuthi kuphume amaqembu azoya kwi-Afcon eCameroon ngo-2019.Umlando phakathi kwala mazwe kunobhutshuzwayo ukhomba ukuthi kuhlezi kudlalelwa amagqubu njengoba kungekho ofuna ukuzibona engaphansi komunye.Okufanele ukuthi kuzokwenza umdlalo ube ngowamagqubu kakhulu kunakuqala wukuthi ngesikhathi iBafana igcina e-Uyo ngo-2014, yashiya kukhalwa kwazise umphumela ka 2-2 phakathi kwamaqembu, wakhipha amaSuper Eagles kwi-Afcon ka-2015 eyayise-Equatorial Guinea. INingizimu Afrika yayivele ifike kulo mdlalo isizibekisele indawo kwi-Afcon.Kulokhu womabili amaqembu azobe elwela ukuyiqala kahle indlela ebheke eCameroon.UBongani “Ben 10” Zungu osephenduke isethenjwa eqenjini lakhe lasePortugal iVitoria S.C, uthe uma elithola ithuba uzokwenza isiqiniseko sokulwela iqembu libuye nomphumela ozojabulisa abalandeli. “Ngiyajabula ngokubuya eqenjini njengoba ngike ngalimala. Uma ngithola ithuba ngizolibamba ngazo zombili njengoba kusemqoka esizweni sonke ukuthi senze kahle."Uthe ukudlala phambi kwezinkulungwane eqenjini lakhe sekumenze wazethemba. “Akukho okuningi okushintshile ngaphandle kokuthi sengiyashesha futhi sengikhulile ngendlela engithatha ngayo izinqumo uma ngiphethe ibhola. Ukudlala phambi kwabalandeli abaningi e-Europe nakho sekunyuse ukuzethemba kimina.”Uthe ufisa abadlali abafana noPercy Tau balandele kuyena ngokuthola ithuba lokuyodlala phesheya.Ukaputeni weBafana uThulani “Tyson” Hlatshwayo olamukele ithuba lokuhola iqembu, ufuna bafike bagingqe amadoda, wonke umdlali ozongena enkundleni azimisele ngokufela khona.“Kusemqoka ukukhuluma nabadlali ngibenze baqonde ngobumqoka bokulwela izwe. Kumele sizinikele 120% enkundleni. Noma ngabe siyahlulwa kufanele kube wukuthi sikhiphe konke esinakho, yilokho engikulindele kozakwethu,” kusho uHlatshwayo.Uthe umqeqeshi uStuart Baxter ugcizilele kakhulu ukuxina iNigeria ngejubane uma behlasela bese beqikelela ukuthi bahleze beqaphile emuva ngazo zonke izikhathi. “Siya ebantwini esibaziyo. Ngiyazi ukuthi kuzodinga sisebenze kanzima ukubuya nomphumela omuhle. Kuzodingeka amasosha futhi nami ngingomunye wawo."
title: UBen 10 uzolwela ukuwinisa iBafana

text: AMANYE amagatsha e-ANC eThekwini aphumele obala athi ayofa lapho kufa khona owayenguMengameli we-ANC nezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, noNobhala-Jikelele wale nhlangano osamisiwe, uMnuz Ace Magashule.Lokhu akusho izolo esithangamini sabezindaba eThekwini, ephumela obala ngokweseka laba baholi.La magatsha athe ayakuqonda kahle ukuthi kunezinkinga ezenza inhlangano ihlukane phakathi kodwa wona aseka uZuma noMagashule kukho konke.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe abezindaba, aqale ngokuthi: “Singamagatsha e-ANC eThekwini sikhathazekile kakhulu ngokwenzeka kuleli qembu nangendlela izindaba zombutho eziphethwe ngayo yi-National Executive Committee (NEC) ye-ANC.”UMnuz Ntando Khuzwayo, okhulumela la magatsha, uthe:“Siyi-ANC eThekwini sithi makubuyiswe uMagashule ngokushesha esikhundleni sakhe. Uma kuxoshwa umuntu kumele kulandelwe imithetho hhayi uvele ummise nje, futhi kusetshenziswe indlela enokuchema. Inhlangano ezimisele ngomsebenzi wayo ngeke yenze kanjena. Lesi senzo sinobungane futhi sisenza inhlekisa.”UKhuzwayo uthe uZuma bazomeseka kuze kube sekugcineni njengoba ebhekene necala ngodaba lokunqaba ukuyofakaza kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana, eholwa yiJaji Raymond Zondo.“Ukuboshwa kwakhe kungakaphothulwa udaba lwenkantolo ngabe akubona ubulungiswa. Sizomvikela, uma kufanele sizocela usizo kwabanye ozakwethu ezwenikazi i-Afrika, siyokwenza lokho. Kumanje siyahlangana ukuze simvikele.” UKhuzwayo uthe baphoxekile futhi abahambisani nezinto ezenziwe yiNEC wathi kumele ihlakazwe.Phakathi kwezinto athe kumele i-ANC izilungise yimfundo yamahhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uMagashule nelungu lephalamende, uMnuz Bongani Bongo, bakhishwe ngesankahlu emhlanganweni weNEC.Kulo mhlangano kuthiwa kukhona ababone ukuthi uMagashule noBongo bayingxenye yalo mhlangano, bathi mabakhishwe.Kuthiwa bakhishiwe kanti imibiko yabezindaba ithi ikhadi lokungena likaMagashule ekomkhulu le-ANC, eLuthuli House, alisasebenzi njengoba emisiwe. Khonamanjalo i-ANC igxeke ukuputshuka kwezinto ezisuke zidingidwa emhlanganweni wale nhlangano.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kuputshuke inkulumo kalowo owayenguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki, ethi i-ANC isifana nento efayo.Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Pule Mabe, ugxeke labo abaqhubeka nalo mkhuba wokuthi bapotshozele umphakathi izinto ezisuke zixoxwa kulo mhlangano.Uthe bakhathazekile ngalokhu, wathi abenza lokhu bafuna ukuhlukanisa phakathi inhlangano.“Labo abayotholakala beputshukisa izinto ze-ANC bazothathelwa izinyathelo. Ithimba lezomthetho le-ANC liyayibheka lento yokuputshukiswa kwezinto ezingamele ziphumele emphakathini.”
title: Sizokufa lapho kufa khona uZuma noMagashule - ANC eThekwini

text: MINENHLE MKHIZEU THULASIZWE Mbuyane ubhoboka ngesinqumo sakhe sokulaxaza i-Orlando Pirates asichaza njengesingazange sibe nzima ukusithatha njengoba esezogijima kuMpumalanga Black Aces asayine kuyona inkontileka yeminyaka emibili nohhafu.UMbuyane, ofike kuBucs ngo-2008 esuka ku-Free State Stars, uqede amasizini amahlanu edlala kweZimnyama adle nazo izicoco ezimbili ze-Absa Premiership, ezimbili zeMTN 8, eseNedbank Cup neseTelkom Knockout.Inkontileka yakhe nePirates ibiphela ngoJuni kodwa ijezi ubeselizwa ngendaba kwazise ugcine ukubonakala enkundleni ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi ezakhe zidlala ne-Al Ahly kweyamaqoqo eCaf Champions League.“IPirates bengiyithanda ngenhliziyo yami yonke kodwa ukuthatha isinqumo sokuyishiya akuzange kube nzima. Empilweni yami yebhola ibhentshi akukaze kube yinto yami futhi yingakho ngibone kungcono ukuthi ngishiye ngoba ijezi bengingasalitholi. Akuzange kungithathe isikhathi ukuthi ngiqome ukuyodlala ku-Aces ngoba ngibone ithuba lokuyothola ijezi okuyinto engiyifunayo. Izikhulu zakhona zingamukele kahle,” kusho uMbuyane.“IPirates ngiyohlezi ngiyikhumbula ngezinto ezinhle ngoba nginqobe zonke izicoco ezikhona eNingizimu Afrika ngaphinde ngazakhela igama lami kuyona. Ngalokho ngifisa ukubonga wonke umuntu engisebenze naye eminyakeni eyedlule ezikhathini ezinzima nezimnandi,” kusho uMbuyane.Eqenjini lesizwe iBafana Bafana uMbuyane usedlale imidlalo emihlanu waqobela enethini igoli elilodwa.“URoger De Sa, ocija iPirates, wethukile ukuthi ngiyahamba ngoba konke kwenzeke engazi. Nasekhaya angizange ngibatshele kwazise yonke into yenzeke ngokushesha baze bezwa ezindabeni. Ngiqede yonke into ne-Aces ngoLwesibili ebusuku. Njengamanje sengiwumZayoni,” kusho uMbuyane.Ku-Aces kulindeleke ukuthi akhe ubudlelwano obuhle nabadlali abafana noMabhudi Khenyeza, Thabo Qalinge, Clifford Ngobeni no-Onyekachi “Tico” Okonkwo bobabili adlale nabo kuBucs.“Okumqoka kunakho konke wukuthi ngizinze eqenjini bese ngisiza iqembu ukuthi lenze kahle futhi inselelo eza nalokho ngiyilungele. Abadlali abaningi abagijima ku-Aces ngidlalile nabo phambilini okuzokwenza kube lula ukuthi ngisheshe ngingene egiyeni. Kungakuhle uma singathola indebe eyodwa okuyiNedbank Cup engicabanga ukuthi sinalo ithuba kuyona. Empilweni yami ebholeni elikhokhelayo i-Aces yiqembu lami lesithathu futhi ngibheke ukuthi kube ngelokugcina ngaphambi kokuthi ngithathe umhlalaphansi,” kusho uMbuyane.I-Aces azodlala kuyona ilele kunombolo 10 ku-log ngamaphuzu angu-17 emidlalweni engu-14. NgoFebhuwari 5 uMbuyane kubhekwe ukuthi abonakale okokuqala egqoke imifaniswano yaleli qembu emdlalweni walo neMoroka Swallows, Kanyamazane Stadium, eMpumalanga.“Ukusebenza noqweqwe lomqeqeshi onjengo-Clive Barker kuzophinde kunginike elinye ithuba lokuthi ngikhulise ulwazi lwami lwebhola ngenxa yamava akhe kulo mdlalo. Siyamazi sonke usenqobe izinto ezinkulu njengomqeqeshi,” kusho uMbuyane.
title: UMbuyane akazisoli ngokushiya iPirates

text: ABHODLA umlilo amaphoyisa asebenza ngaphakathi eziteshini ngokushaywa ngesithende uma kunezinhlelo zokunyuswa kwezikhundla.La maphoyisa asiza umphakathi ngokuwavulela amacala, aphinde enze neminye imisebenzi njengokugxiviza izincwadi zeziqiniseko, aseqale umkhankaso wokuhudula izinyawo emsebenzini ngenhloso yokuzwakalisa intukuthelo yawo.Asabisa nangokuthi azongenela isiteleka uma iziphathimandla zingahlangabezani nezimfuno zawo.Akhala ngokuthi wona awanyuswa ezikhundleni kodwa ozakwabo abasebenza kwezinye izinhlaka bebe benyuswa.Amanye awo asesebenze iminyaka engaphezu kuka-12, ehleli esigabeni sokuqala sokuba ngo-constable kodwa ozakwabo abakwezinye izinhlaka bona bebe sebanyuselwa ezikhundleni ezilandelayo ngemuva kokusebenza iminyaka emibili.Kunezinsolo ezithi amaphoyisa asebenza ophikweni lokuqapha nakwezinye izinhlaka, kubalwa nalawo adume ngamabharethi wona asuka esikhundleni sokuba ngo-constable abe ngo-warrant officer, ajombe isikhundla sokuba ngosayitsheni.Kunohlu lwezikhalo namazwi aqoshiwe, okusatshalaliswe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zawo amaphoyisa.Ithimba leSolezwe lihambele eziteshini ezimbalwa eThekwini izolo liyohlola isimo ngemuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuhudula izinyawo.Esiteshini kuYusuf Dadoo (Broad) amaphoyisa abebonakala esebenza ngendlela ejwayelekile esiza abantu abebekolayini.Kanti esiteshini ePhoyinti naseDurban Central, inhlansi yokuhudula izinyawo ibibonakala, abantu belanyelwe bemile usizo lugqoza.EDurban Central ngemuva kwehora lokuqala emini kuya ku-2 izolo, abantu bebegcwele ebhentshini kungekho obasizayo.Esiteshini sasoPhongolo khona kubikwa ukuthi zihudulwa ngempela izinyawo.Iphoyisa elikhulume neSolezwe kodwa lacela ukungadalulwa ngoba livikela umsebenzi walo, lithe bathukuthela bayaveva ngenxa yokushaywa ngesithende uma kumele banyuselwe izikhundla.“Ozakwethu abasebenza kwezinye izinhlaka bona bayanyuselwa izikhundla thina esisebenza eziteshini siyazitshwa, abanye bethu sebesebenze iminyaka engu-12, bengo-constable kodwa kabanyuswa ezikhundleni kuthi amaphoyisa asebenza kwezinye izinhlaka njengalawo aqapha izindlu zongqongqoshe nophiko lwamabherethi wona asuka ekubeni ngo-constable enziwe o-warrant officer,” kusho leli phoyisa.Lisole inyunyana yabo iPolice and Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru) ngokubadayisa.“IPopcru ayisilweli futhi iyona evume ukuthi kwenziwe le nto yokukhetha iphela emasini uma kunyuswa amaphoyisa ezikhundleni ngoba ihlale izwelana nabaqashi,” kusho leli phoyisa.Omunye ongumphathi wolunye uphiko kwesinye seziteshi eThekwini, uthe ukuhudula izinyawo kwamaphoyisa kuyabalimaza kanti akulula ukubona kwezinye iziteshi ukuthi kuhudulwa izinyawo ngoba amanye amaphoyisa avele afake izincwadi zokugula, amanye afike emsebenzini kodwa enze okungatheni, kushaye isikhathi sokugoduka ahambe.Lithe ngoMsombuluko ozayo bahlela ukuthi kube namamashi ezindaweni ezahlukene lapho bezokwethula khona izikhalo zabo.“Ithina esisebenza ngempela eziteshini futhi siwubuso bamaphoyisa kodwa sibukelwa phansi, kuvele kunyuswe ezikhundleni abantu abasebenze iminyaka emibili abangakwazi ngisho ukubhala izitatimende,” kusho leli phoyisa.Okhulumela iPopcru kuzwelonke, uMnuz Richard Mamabolo uphikile ukuthi inyunyana yabo idayise ngabasebenzi.“Amanga ukuthi sidayisile, konke esikwenzayo thina kusuke kuwumyalelo esiwuthathe kumalungu ethu,” kusho uMamabolo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke uBrigadier Vish Naidoo uthe bazwile ngezikhalo zamaphoyisa asebenza eziteshini ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Azikho izikhalo ebezisalethwe kwiziphathimandla kulandelwa imigudu efanele,” kusho uNaidoo.Oyingcweti ezindabeni ezithinta amaphoyisa, uDkt Johan Burger, wesikhungo i-Institute for Security Studies, uthe nakuba izikhalo zamaphoyisa asebenza eziteshini zizwakala kodwa awavumelekile ukuthi ateleke.“Isigaba somthetho 41, wamaphoyisa, asivumi ukuthi amaphoyisa ateleke, uKhomishana kazwelonke noma wesifundazwe unelungelo lokuthi awaxoshe emsebenzini amaphoyisa angenele isiteleka,” kusho uBurger.Uthe abukho ubulungiswa ukuthi amaphoyisa engaphathwa ngendlela efanayo.
title: Amaphoyisa adinwe ahudula izinyawo

text: SEKUBIZWE umhlangano ophuthumayo nabaphathi bebandla lamaWeseli besifunda sakwaNongoma, emuva kwe-video esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ekhombisa amalungu ebandla ephambana nemigomo kathaqa.Isolezwe linayo i-video okuthiwa iqoshwe ngempelasonto, ekhombisa abazalwane baseWeseli begcwele itende, bagaxane begida, abanye bexegise izifonyo ezilevini. Abazalwane abasetendeni babonakala bengaphezu kwesibalo sika-50 esinqunywe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngesikhathi kuvulwa amasonto ekuqaleni kwenyanga.Ivideo efakwe kwiFacebook, ishaqise abaphawule kuyo bebabaza ukungayihloniphi imithetho kathaqa. Abanye bathe kumele bathathelwe izinyathelo abaholi bebandla abavumele lesi simo.Okhulumela ibandla lamaWeseli kuzwelonke, uNkk Bongi Moyo-Bango, uthe sesisiyaziwa isifunda sebandla esithinteka kwi-video.KUJUTSHWE uMbhishobhi Linda Mandindi ukusingatha udaba lwe-video yamaWeseli, ekhombisa abazalwane bephula imigomo kathaqa Isithombe: SIGCINIWEUsigxekile lesi senzo, waqinisekisa ukuthi okwenzekile kuphambene nemithetho yebandla. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi sekujutshwe uMbhishobhi Linda Mandindi ophethe iNatal Coastal Synod ukuthi asingathe lolu daba.“Lonke ibandla latshelwa ngemigomo okumele ilandelwe ngesikhathi kuvulwa amasonto. UMbhishobhi Mandindi uzohlangana nabaholi, athole ukuthi kwenziwe yini ukuthi kungahlonishwa imigomo. Akekho umfundisi ongatshelwanga ngemigomo kathaqa yingakho lolu daba singeke siluthathe kancane,” kusho yena.Kushayelwa uMandindi uqinisekisile ukuthi nguyena ozosingatha udaba, obekumele izolo abe nomhlangano nobuholi obuthintekayo. Uveze ukuthi akutholile ukuthi i-video iqoshwe ngempelasonto. Uthe bekungcwatshwa iphini likamengameli kwisekethe yakwaNongoma.Ngokwemigomo kathaqa emenyezelwe uRamaphosa, akuvumelekile ukuhlangana kwabangaphezu kuka-50 ezinkonzweni noma emngcwabeni. Kugcizelelwe ukuthi ngisho enkonzweni kumele kugqokwe izifonyo, kugwenywe nokusondelana.Akuvumelekile ngisho ukuxhawulana kodwa kwi-video kubonakala amadoda egida, egaxene, eshaye isikokela. Nasetendeni abanye abazalwane abangangenanga ngesikhathi kushaywa isikokela, babonakala begida phakathi bengayigcinile imigomo yokuqhelelana.
title: AmaWeseli agcwale itende aphula imigomo kathaqa KwaNongoma

text: UMFUNDI kaGrade 7 waseMgungundlovu obedukile utholwe engungwe amaphara eThekwini, ngoLwesihlanu.UNaledi Zondo (12) owaduka ngoMsombuluko kubo ePrestbury, eMgungundlovu, uze watholwa ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku esenabangani abasha.Unina walo mfundi okhulume neSolezwe emuva kokutholakala kukaNaledi, uNkk Nokulunga Zondo, uthe ujabule ngendlela ahluleka ngisho nokuyichaza ngokutholwa kwendodakazi yakhe.“Sithole ucingo ngoLwesine komunye odayisa ngomzimba kaJika Joe eMgungundlovu esitshela ukuthi uhlale nendodakazi yami izinsuku ezimbili ngoba yafika ikhala ithi idinga indawo yokuhlala ngoba unina ulimale engozini yemoto. Indodakazi yami yakwazi ukuthola u-R100 yabe isiya eThekwini. Siye eThekwini ukuyombheka. Sisihamba sinika abantu izinombolo ukuba besithinte uma bemthola sase sibuyela eMgungundlovu. NgoLwesihlanu sifonelwe wumuntu esahlangana naye eThekwini wathi uphethe Isolezwe ubona isithombe sendodakazi yami. Uthe ngaleso sikhathi ubeyibona indodakazi yami ihlezi namapharaePhoyinti.Ngiphuthumile nangempela ngayifica ingane yami izihlalele namaphara,” kusho uNkk Zondo.Uthe indodakazi yakhe ubengakayibuzi ukuthi kungani ibalekile ekhaya ngoba usayinikeza isikhathi sokuba ibuyise umqondo, iphinde ikhululeke izizwe isekhaya.“Engikujabulele ukuthi ingane yami ibuyile ekhaya. Kulezi zinsuku ezine edukile bengihlala ngokukhala ngoba bengingazi noma kuzofona abasemakhazeni yini bathi ushonile. Bengingalali ngisho nasebusuku ingane yami ngingazi ukuthi ikephi. Sihlezi sizwa ngezingane ezilahlekayo zitholwe sezishonile,” kusho uNkk Zondo.Ubonge ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla kwamaphoyisa abehamba nawo yonke indawo ebheka ingane yakhe.Ubonge abezindaba nezinkundla zokuxhumana ngokukhipha isithombe sengane yakhe okwenze wathola usizo ngokushesha.
title: Itholwe ihleli namaphara ingane ebinyamalele

text:
AMAJAJI nonompempe besibhakela bahlale benengcindezi yokukhipha izinqumo ezizojabulisa abalandeli abavamise ukugcwala amahholo bezobukela amankomane. Lo msebenzi kubukeka kungewona owamagwala ngoba kwesinye isikhathi isinqumo sishiya ababukeli bempi bekhihla isililo. U-
Eric Khoza(53) ozalelwe, wakhulela eLamontville uyinkunzi emidwayidwa ekuphathweni kwezimpi zesibhakela. Njengenjwayelo uKhoza ungelinye “lamakhehla” avulelekile esibhakeleni futhi uhlale ekulungele ukusiza lapho edingeka khona. Ngesikhathi sikhuluma naye usheshe wakucacisa ukuthi uma eseseringini (uma engunompempe) uyayikhohlwa eyabalandeli, abheke amabhokisa. Uqale isibhakela esengumfanyana omncane, ezimisele ukulwa esigabeni esikhokhelayo ngelinye ilanga. Kodwa uyise owayengumfundisi, wayengayizwa leyo ngoba ekholwa wukuthi ujimela ukushaya abantu. Lokho kwaholela ekutheni ngesikhathi sekushone uyise acele kunina ukuthi aqhubeke nesibhakela nalapho aqoka ukuthatha izifundo zokuphatha izimpi.UZakhele Xaba noKhoza baxoxe ngomsebenzi wakhe wokuba ngunompempe nokuba yijaji lesibhakela.ZAKHELE XABA (ZX): Umsebenzi wokuphatha izimpi udinga umuntu onjani?ERIC KHOZA (EK): Udinga umuntu ophansi, ozithobile futhi ovulelekile nowuthandayo umdlalo wesibhakela. Lokho kubalulekile ngoba kwesinye isikhathi udinga ukunikeza iziyalo kubashayisibhakela uma bezidinga, ngaleyo ndlela kufanele ungeneke. Akudingeki ngempela ukuphakama. Kubalulekile futhi ukuqala esigabeni sama-amesha ukuze uzokwazi ukuthi kwenzekani. Kumele uwazi umehluko phakathi kwesibhakela noma ibhokisa lishaya “ngempama”. Lokho kusiza ngokuthi wazi izindawo okungavumelekile ukushaya kuzo.ZX: Amajaji nonompempe bahlale begxekwa ngokusebenzela ekhaya okuwukwenzelela ibhokisa elisuke lilwela ngakubo. Uthini ngalokho?EK: Leyo nto izosibulala isibhakela nekusasa lebhokisa ngoba uma selifika phesheya lizoba yihlazo. Kufanele sibe namabhokisa azokwazi ukuwina ngomngqimuzo womlalisa phansi. Angikukhuthazi ukududula amabhokisa. Thina majaji akufanele sicheme. Uma ubona kunzima ukukhipha owinile kufanele ubheke ezinye izinto ezifana nokunyakaza kwebhokisa eringini neliphonse izibhakela eziningi kunelinye.ZX: Ubuye ugxekwe ngokuziba i-gumshield uma ibhokisa liyiwisa njalo. Kunabaqeqeshi abathi uyaliziba ithawula uma bephonsela amabhokisa abo, bewalamulela. Ngabe kunjalo?EK: Isibhakela umdlalo okufanele uthokozelwe ngabalandeli. Kubalulekile ukuthi amabhokisa asayine izinkontileka zokulwa ekulungele lokho. Angiyingeni indaba yomuntu ophonselwa ithawula engakatholwa nangesisodwa isibhakela. Yikho isibhakela besehlelwa ngabalandeli ngoba bebebabukisa into engekho. Eye-gumshield, angilindele ukuthi ibhokisa lilokhu liyiqathaza kungakapheli nemizuliswano emine. Uma ngilokhu ngimisa impi, kusho ukuthi ngincisha leli elinye ibhokisa ithuba lokuwina ngomngqimuzo womlalisa phansi. Amabhokisa ayazi ukuthi uma liwisa i-gumshield impi izomiswa.ZX: Ngo-2012 wagcina uquliswa ngesinqumo owasikhipha empini eyayiphakathi kukaSimphiwe Mthethwa noPromise Cabe. Sitshele ngalokho.EK: Kunjalo. Namanje ngisamile ngesinqumo engasithatha sokuqeda impi. UCabe wavuma phansi, ngambalela njengoba kufanelekile. Ngaze ngaqeda ukubala engavuki nokwakusho ukuthi uhlulwe ngomngqimuzo womlalisa phansi. Nangesikhathi sengibizelwe ukuzochaza, ngakusho lokho. Icala laqulwa ngoba ikhona likaCabe lalingenelisekile. Okuhle ukuthi uCabe wafika kimina emuva kwesikhathi wazoxolisa. Abantu kufanele bakuqonde ukuthi thina esisuke siseringini sibona kahle ikakhulukazi ibhokisa elisuke selishayekile.ZX: HHmmmEK: Kuwumsebenzi wethu njengonompempe ukubhekela isimo samabhokisa eringini. Isinqumo sami siwujuqu. Kufanele ngithathe isinqumo ngendlela engibona ngayo. Kunempi engisanda kuyiphatha (Thalente Zulu v Mhlengi Mhlongo). Umfana omncane (Mhlongo) obelwa impi yakhe yokuqala esibhakeleni esikhokhelayo ubebhekene nomuntu omdala. Bengiqaphile ngoba izibhakela bezihlala kabi kuyena kodwa aphendule kanzima nokwenze ngilokhu ngimnika ithuba. Ugcine ewinile. Siyawadinga amabhokisa anesibindi njengaye futhi impi ubeyilungiselele ngokuphelele.ZX: Yibuphi ubunzima enihlangana nabo ekuphatheni izimpi?EK: Kuhlale kunzima ukuphatha impi yamabhokisa abambanayo nangayiqondi kahle imithetho. Asikho isidingo sokuthi ngize ngiwahlukanise ngezandla amabhokisa uma esebambene kodwa uma sengimemezile ukuthi awahlukane kufanele azenzele lokho. Abantu abazi ukuthi nathi siyasithanda isibhakela. Kukhona impi ogcina uyithokozela nawe ungunompempe ngenxa yokuzimisela kwamabhokisa. Okunye abantu abayiqondi indlela esisebenza ngayo, baya ngothando lwebhokisa kanti thina siyakwazi okulindelekile.ZX: Injani imali kulo msebenzi?EK: Akufani khona. Uma kuyizimpi nje ezincane ukhokhelwa izindleko zokuhamba. Eyebhande laseNingizimu Afrika kutholakala u-R500 kuya phezulu. Kodwa uma uphethe izimpi zamabhande angaphandle uyawuthola u-R1500 kuthi amajaji athole u-R2000. Izimpi zomhlaba zikhokha u-R20 000 kuya phezulu. Sengisezingenii lokuphatha izimpi kulona lonke izinga okukhona eze-WBA, IBF, WBC ne-IBO.ZX: Yikuphi okufanele kwenziwe ukubuyisa isibhakela KwaZulu-Natal?EK: Kufanele kwande ophromotha ngoba maningi amabhokisa angalitholi ithuba lokulwa. Kubuhlungu ukuthi kunamabhokisa angene esigabeni esikhokhelayo nyakenye kodwa kuze kube yimanje awakaze angene eringini. Uma singathola osomabhizinisi abazoxhasa isibhakela angingabazi ukuthi izinga lingabuyela phezulu. Esikhundleni sokuthi osomabhizinisi baqulele imali kwa-SARS sebekhokha intela, kungaba ngcono ukuthi bayifake esibhakeleni.Okunye ngoKhoza:■ Uganwe uMaNdlovu■ Unezingane ezintathu uNqobile, Nontando noSiphelele■ Unabazukulu ababili abangamantombazane afisa ukubafaka kwezamankomane■ Ungumvangeli esontweni i-Apostolic Faith Church.
title: Uyise wayengayizwa eyokuba yibhokisa

text: BAHLALELE ovalweni abasebenzi basendlini ababili okuthiwa bashaywe wumphathi wabo wabadlisa uphoyizeni wokubulala amagundane ebasola ngokweba uR100 000, eSiphingo.Abasebenzi, abangabaseLesotho, bathe namanje basathuthumela emuva kokuhlukunyezwa ngumqashi wabo.UNksz Florina Kao (36), noNkk Lonea Sefo (33), abasola umqashi wabo ngokubathela isibhaxu ebasola ngokweba, bathe banovalo lokuhlala emjondolo wabo oseDakota, eSiphingo.Bathe lokhu kulandela isigameko okuthiwa senzeke ngoLwesibili oludlule ekuseni ngesikhathi beqala ukusebenza.“Sivame ukuthi siqale ukusebenza uma sekugamenxe ihora lesithupha ekuseni. Oyedwa ufike athathe iwashingi ayowasha, omunye abe elungiselela ingane. Nangaloluya suku ngahamba ngayothatha iwashingi kodwa umqashi wathi angilande uLonea ngoba ethi kufanele sikhiphe imali yakhe ayesisola ngokuthi siyintshontshile,” kusho uNksz Kao.Uthe umqashi wabo wabe esekhipha upulasitiki omncane wasebhange, wakhipha iRattex wathi yirayisi okufanele balidle ukuze bakhulume iqiniso ngokweba imali yakhe.UNksz Kao uthe bayidla iRattex base becela ukuthi abanike amanzi kodwa wanqaba. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kuthiwa ube eseshaya ucingo wacela ukuthi kulethwe imoto eyabathatha yabayisa kwenye inkampani yonogada okuthiwa iseSiphingo nokuyilapho abafike bashaywa khona wumqashi wabo.Kuthe uma sebeshayiwe baphinde babuyiselwa endlini yomqashi base begcina bethathwe ngemoto bayolahlwa eMgungundlovu.UNksz Kao uthe abantu abebesebenzisana nomqashi wabo ukubasabisa babathatha bayobashiya eMgungundlovu bengenamali yokugibela, bathatha nama-passport abo. Uthe labo bantu bathatha imali ababeyinikwe ngunkosikazi womqashi wabo ayebanike yona ngoba ethi akasabadingi emzini wakhe. Ngokusho kwakhe kwaphinde kwaduka imali yakhe enguR5 000 abeyibekile obekuyimali ayithole esitokofeleni nemali yomholo wakhe.“Ngesikhathi engishaya wayengisakaza phansi ngekhanda aphinde angikhahlele. Ngase ngiphuma igazi ngamakhala,” kusho uNkk Sefo.Uthe kusukela eqale ukusebenza ngoJanuwari nonyaka bekungakaze kube nesigameko esifana nalesi. UNkk Sefo uthe bebehlala emzini womqashi wabo beya emjondolo wabo ngempelasonto. Uqhube wathi okwamenza wathatha umsebenzi wukuthi noNksz Kao, osekuphele iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye esebenza kulo muzi, ubengakaze akhale ngokuhlukunyezwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala, elokushaya, elokuthumba nelokweba. Uthe uphenyo lusaqhubeka kanti bekungakaboshwa muntu.
title: Badliswe iRattex besolwa ngokweba

text:
MINENHLE MKHIZEA KAYICABANGI nokuyicabanga eyokudla umklomelo womdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi ku-Absa Premiership umgadli we-Ajax Cape Town uNathan Paulse.UPaulse (33) usehlohle amagoli amahlanu emidlalweni yeligi kule sizini ka-2015/16. Le nsika yomgadli, esiphenduke ithemba le-Urban Warriors, isele ngamagoli amahlanu kuCollins “Ntofontofo” Mbesuma weMpumalanga Black Aces.UMbesuma osaphethe irekhodi lokushaya amagoli amaningi ngesizini eyodwa kuPremier Soccer League (PSL) useqobele enethini awu-10.Exoxa ne
Solezwe ngemuva komdlalo wezakhe neLamontville Golden Arrows eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlazi, uPaulse ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi akazimisele ngokujaha imiklomelo ekubeni iqembu lakhe lidonsa kanzima.UPaulse usedlale kuPSL amasizini angu-13 kodwa akakaze ahlabane ngomklomelo womdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi. Ku-Urban Warriors nguyena ophethe irekhodi lokuqobela enethini amagoli amaningi.“Angilona lolu hlobo lomdlali oluzikhathaza ngokuwina imiklomelo. Kimina iqembu lihlezi lihamba phambili ngaso sonke isikhathi. Kusizani ukujaha imiklomelo ekubeni iqembu lingenzi kahle. Imiklomelo uma iqhamuka izoqhamuka kodwa hhayi ukuthi yinto engiyiqhakambisayo,” kusho uPaulse.I-Urban Warriors izinto aziyihambeli kahle kwazise isanqobe kanye kusukela yadla isicoco seMTN 8 eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, ePort Elizabeth, ngoSepthemba 19 ngonyaka odlule. Ngempelasonto ishaye iJomo Cosmos ngo 2-1.I-Urban Warriors ibisidlale imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili ilandelana inganqobi. Ihlezi endaweni ka-12 ku-log ngamaphuzu angu-16 emidlalweni engu-13. Leli qembu lilengela engozini yokuphuthwa yithuba lokuvikela isicoco salo seMTN 8 ngesizini ezayo.“Iqembu alenzi kahle kulezi zinsuku. Ngakho akusizi ukujaha imiklomelo ezohlomulisa mina ngedwa ekubeni iqembu lingenzi kahle. Mina ngifuna ukubona iqembu linqoba imidlalo nezicoco. Kubalulekile ukuthi siqale sithole imiphumela ukuze singazitholi sisesimweni lapho siphuthwa yithuba lokuvikela isicoco sethu seMTN 8. Njengamanje sisalele emuva emaqenjini aphezulu ku-log ngakho kumele siqale sivale igebe,” kusho uPaulse.NgeSonto ngo-3.30 ntambama i-Urban Warriors izovakashela iChippa United eBuffalo City Stadium emdlalweni weligi.“Inkinga yethu wukuthi asiwasebenzisi amathuba esiwakhayo. Nasemuva sidedela amagoli alula. La maphutha kufanele siwagweme ukuze siqale sithole imiphumela emihle,” kusho uPaulse.
title: UPaulse akayijahile imiklomelo

text: USIHLALO weCape Town City, uJohn Comitis, akanazo izinhlelo zokugudluza umqeqeshi uBenni McCarthy phezu kokuba leli qembu liqede isizini ka-2017/2018 lingawinanga neyokubika indebe.ICity iqede endaweni yesihlanu kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-40. Idlale owamanqamu weMTN 8 lapho ihlulwe khona yiSuperSport United eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini. Emuva kokuphela kwesizini kusabalale izinkulumo zokuthi iCity ingase ibuyise umqeqeshi * -Eric Tinkler oyilaxaze kabuhlungu ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2017/2018, waduma neSuperSport United. UTinkler kumanje akanalo iqembu aliqeqeshayo. Ukhonjwa kwiPlatinum Stars ezodlala kwiNational First Division (NFD) ngesizini ezayo.“UBenni uzamile, ubezama kodwa kwesinye isikhathi izinto zingahlangani. Ngicabanga ukuthi usejwayele manje. Ngasekupheleni kwesizini kade sekukhona umgqigqo, esedlalisa abadlali ababodwa. Emidlalweni eyisithupha yokugcina sihlulwe kowodwa. Ngicabanga ukuthi sizokwakhela phezu kwalokho. Asikwazi ukubuyela emuva manje. UBenni usefundile manje, uwenzile amaphutha, wazama izinto azangasebenza ezinye zasebenza. Ngicabanga ukuthi naye uBenni uyayibona indlela,” kusho uComitis.“Ebholeni akufanele usabe. Inhlanhla iwela labo abanesibindi. Kufanele uqonde ngqo. Bengifuna sidlale ibhola eliya phambili. UBenni unalokho naye. Akwenzeki ukuthi udlale lapho edlale khona kodwa ucabange ngenye indlela. Uma abadlali bengacabanga kanjalo, ngicabanga ukuthi sizoba yimbumba ngesizini ezayo."ICity sekuyiyona yodwa iqembu laseKapa elidlala kwi-Absa Premiership kulandela ukugawulwa yizembe kwe-Ajax Cape Town. I-Urban Warriors isayilwa enkantolo indaba yokuphucwa amaphuzu emuva kokuthi ilahlwe yicala lokudlalisa uTendai Ndoro kungafanele kweminye yemidlalo yayo. uComitis ungomunye wababumba i-Ajax eminyakeni edlule nomfowabo uGeorge.Nokho bagcine bephumile emuva kokuthi kube nokungezwani phakathi kwabo nomndeni wakwa-Erfstathiou okuyiwona osuphethe i-Ajax. Ukungena kwalasha kwe-Urban Warriors kusho ukuphela komdlalo wabakhaya eKapa.“Ngiphoxekile ukuthi alisekho elinye iqembu eKapa. Kade sesibukwa abantu okungenani abangu-17 000. Ukuthola leso sibalo eKapa kunzima. Ngiphoxekile, ukuba wedwa akumnandi. Udinga imbangi nombango ngoba ukwenza uhlale uphapheme. Ekugcineni ibhola lilahlekelwe. Kodwa imithetho yimithetho. Sengidlulile kokwenzeka ngikwi-Ajax, sekuphele iminyaka eyisihlanu. Kimina manje sekumayelana nebhola nokwakha ibhola laseKapa. Kubi ukuthi silahlekelwe yi-Ajax. Ngiyethemba ukuthi kukhona ozoqhamuka futhi. IStellenbosch inabaphathi abasha, ngethemba ukuthi izonyuka. Kodwa akukapheli nge-Ajax, asilinde sibone ukuthi kwenzekani.”
title: Akukho zinhlelo zokugudluza uMcCarthy

text: KUFANELE izibambe ziqine i-Orlando Pirates kowamanqamu weTelkom Knockout ngoDisemba 8 eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngoba izobe ibhekene nomqeqeshi ongayibheki indebe uma esefikile kowamanqamu.Lo mqeqeshi nguWedson Nyirenda waseZambia ogila izimanga kwiBaroka FC.Esandleni sakhe umqeqeshi owaduma kakhulu eqhulula amagoli kwiKaizer Chiefs eminyakeni edlule, iBaroka ingene kowamanqamu okokuqala ngqa. Ngaphezulu kwalokhu iBakgaga iyavutha bhe kwiTelkom. Iqale ngeLamontville Golden Arrows, kwalandela iMamelodi Sundowns, yagcine ngokukhipha ompetha beTelkom, iBidvest Wits. Konke lokhu iBaroka ikwenze ngaphandle kokungenelwa yigoli.Akumethusi lokhu uNyirenda ngoba uyindoda ezidlayo vele izicoco ngokusho kwakhe. Udonse ngendlebe abePirates ukuthi bangalokothi bazitshele ukuthi sebewinile ngoba bazophoxeka.“Ngeke ngibale ukuthi zingakanani izicoco esengizidle eZambia. Ngendlela eziningi ngayo izindondo kwami angazi ngempela ukuthi ngizoyibekaphi le esizoyidla ngoDisemba 8,” usho kanje sakuncokola.“Ngifike eMozambique iqembu ebengiliqeqesha lingakaze lidle isicoco seligi. Ngifike ngakwenza lokho ngaze ngabanezela ngenye inkomishi. Uma nizokhumbula kahle ngifike kwiBaroka ngasho ukuthi izinto eziningi zizoshintsha. Ngiwumuntu owinayo ikakhulukazi uma sengifikile kowamanqamu angidedeli lutho,” usho kanje sakuxwayisa iPirates.UNyirenda ukujabulele kakhulu ukubuyela eNingizimu Afrika athe uyithatha njengekhaya wafike wafaka iqembu kowamanqamu okokuqala. Okunye akuvezile wukuthi akayena umuntu okholelwa kumabhonasi kwazise kunamahlebezi okuthi abadlali beBaroka bazohlukaniselana amantshontsho uma bedla lesi sicoco.“Ngikukhulekele ukungena kulo mdlalo wamanqamu, ngakhoke manje sengizozenzela umsebenzi wami njengenjwayelo bese konke okunye kuziveze khona“Kusemqoka ukuthi batuswe abadlali ikakhulukazi uma bedlale kahle njenganamuhla. Eyamabhonasi ngiyishiyela kubaphathi kodwa engikwaziyo wukuthi ngisho abadlali bangathenjiswa izigidi uma bengena enkundleni benze abangazange batshelwe khona lokho kuyofana neze leze. Ngigezeke ngaphakathi ngendlela amasosha ami alwe ngayo. Bakhombisile ukuthi singabulala izizwe, inqobo nje uma sizoqhubeka nokubumbana njengoba senza,” kusho uNyirenda othembise abantu baseLimpopo namaphethelo uKhisimusi omnandi ophelezelwa yindebe yeTelkom Knockout.
title: UNyirenda usongela iBucs kwiTKO

text: NGEMUVA kweminyaka emibili eyibambe kwiGenerations: The Legacy, uBrenda Mhlongo, obedlala indawo kaNandi, akasezobonakala kuyona.UBrenda ugcine ukuqopha kwiGenerations ngoSepthemba kodwa usazoqhubeka nokubonakala kuze kube nguNovemba kulo nyaka.Ebuzwa ngalokhu uBrenda ukuqinisekisile.Uthe indlela azophuma ngayo uzothandana nomlisa obizwa ngoMandla, bagcine ngokuhamba sebeyozinza eKapa, yilapho-ke ezogcina ukubonakala kwiGenerations.“Inkontileka yami ayivuselelwanga. Akukho nami ebenginga-kwenza uma abaphathi sebebona ukuthi bayayinqamula indawo yami."Bengisathanda impela ukuqhubeka nokuba kwiGenerations kodwa bekungekho engingakwenza uma ingavuselelwa inkontileka yami. Kule minyaka emibili ngikwiGenerations ngijabule, ngaphinda ngafunda nokuningi, ikakhulukazi ukusebenzisana nabantu bezinhlanga ezahlukene ngifunde namasiko abo,” kusho uBrenda obuye acule ezibiza ngoBrinzo.Ebuzwa ukuthi ubani azomkhumbula abesebenzisana kahle naye, uthe uJack Mabaso (Vusi Kunene) obengumyeni ngokomdlalo.Uphinde waveza ukuthi indawo abeyidlala kaNandi ithinte abantu abaningi abanezimo ezifanayo.“Bengike ngishayelwe ucingo abesifazane abasesimweni esifanayo nesikaNandi, bathi ngibanika ithemba ngendlela engibekezela ngayo. Kushukuthi nababhali beGenerations babhala ngezinto ezenzakalayo emphakathini.”Maqondana nokuthi kukhona yini lapho engabonakala elingisa khona, uthe okwamanje abekho abasamthintile kanti naye ubengakaqali ukuthungatha.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwabeGenerations ngokungavuselelwa kwenkontileka kaBrenda, ibhekane nengqinamba ngenxa yokuthi oyikhulumelayo ubengatholakali.
title: Kuyaphela ngoBrenda kwiGenerations

text: ZILOKHU ziqhubekile nokumhambela kahle izinto uZolani “Last Born” Tete njengoba kuvela ukuthi usayine inkontileka nesikhondlakhondla senkampani yezimoto yaseGermany.UMlandeli “Four Rounds” Tengimfene oyimenenja yalo mpetha wesicoco seWBO World Bantamweight ukuqinisekisile kuleli phephandaba ukuthi uTete usayine inkontileka yonyaka neMercedes Benz. Uveze ukuthi uTete lesi sivumelwano usisayine ngoJulayi 1 kanti sizoba unyaka. Le menenja iveze nokuthi inkampani yakwaMercedes Benz igixabeze uTete ngonyanyavu lwemoto i-AGM 48. “Lolu nyanyavu kulindeleke ukuthi uTete alinikwe ngabakwaMercedes Benz ngokusemthethweni ngo-Agasti 15.Kumanje lusafakwa imishini yezinga eliphezulu kanti luzophinde lubhalwe igama lakhe uTete. Kukhona nokunye le nkampani ethembise ngokusixhasa ngakho inqobe nje uma esengumpetha uTete."Okwanje imininingwano eminingi ngeke ngikwazi ukuyidalula,” kubeka uTengimfene. Kwenzeka lokho nje, ngoLwesibili uTete ubefika kuleli ephuma eMoscow, eRussia lapho ebeyothamela khona ukuqhathwa kwezimpi zochungechunge lo mqhudelwano iWorld Boxing Series ezoqala ngasekupheleni kukaSepthemba.Kulo lulo chungechunge olusungulwe nyakenye ngezimpi zeCruiserweight nezeSuper Middleweight, uqhathwe ngaphansi kweBantamweight noMikhail Aloyan waseRussia.Esinye isisindo esingeziwe ngeseSuper Lightweight. Lapha kuqhudelana ompetha bamabhande amane ahlonishiwayo okuyiWBC, iWBA, i-IBF neWBO. Ozobashaya bonke kusisindo ngasinye uzokhala emuke nomgqomo wenkomishi eqanjwe ngoMuhammadi Ali. Uzophinde aklonyeliswe ngesamba sika-US$ 10 million. Ngaphambi kwalo mqhudelwano uTete uthwelwe ngeqoma ukuzidlela amahlanga ku-Aloyan. Isitha sakhe sisalwe izimpi ezine nje kuphela. Sizinqobe zonke. Sigcine ukulwa no-Elexander Espinoza waseNicaragua.Sigabe ngokuthi ngo-2010, kuma-European Championship sahlabana ngendondo yegolide ngaphansi kweFlyweight. Kuma-Olympic ango-2012 sahlabana ngeyethusi kuso isisindo esifanayo.Ngakolunye uhlangothi uTete unesipiliyoni sezimpi ezingu-30. Unqobe ezingu-27 wase ehlulwa kwezintathu. Ngaphandle kokuphatha iWBO useke waba ngumpetha wamabhande amaningi okubalwa kuwo nele-IBF. Ugcine ukubonakala eringini ngo-Aphreli eshaya * -Omar Andres Narvaez wase-Argentina. Unobude obungu-175cm kanye nokuvuleka komzima okungu-183. Nakuba amarekhodi elibeka ngembaba elokuthi uTete usemethubeni okunqoba kodwa ukuba ngamanxele kwabo bobabili laba bashayisibhakela kwenza kulindeleke impi emnandi.
title: UTete usayine inkontileka yonyaka neMercedes Benz

text: UMashaba wethule iqembu lakhe elisha i-Action SA izolo, wathi abantu bakuleli mabazitholele ikhaya elisha.Uthe amaqembu amaningi aphikisayo awanawo amandla okususa i-ANC emandleni kodwa elakhe iqembu linesu.“Sizongenela ukhetho sinqobe, kusukela kohulumeni basekhaya abazayo nje.“Izwe lethu linamathuba empumelelo nethemba kodwa lokhu kuvinjwa yinkohlakalo,’’ kusho uMashabaI-Action SA izalwe emuva kokuthi uMashaba eshiye i-DA.UMashaba wethule inkulumo ephelezelwa wumkakhe nezingane zakhe bezomeseka.Ubuholi beqembu likaMashaba nguyena umengameli kanti uSihlalo wuMnuz Michael Beaumont naye osuka kwi-DA.Phakathi kwabanye abaholi abathenjiwe kuleli qembu kukhona noDkt Makhosi Khoza oshiye i-ANC wasungula elakhe iqembu kodwa wagcina elishiya, ejoyina elikaMashaba.UNksz Vytjie Mentor owayeyilungu le-ANC ePhalamende naye ungomunye wabajoyine uMashaba.
title: UMashaba uthembisa ukugudluza i-ANC

text:
BAWINILE NGCOBOKUSHONE owesifazane oneminyaka engu-50 ngesikhathi ewa kugandaganda abecele ukugitsheliswa kuwo, wamgandaya eBurbreeze, oThongathi.UNksz Mankosi Tebisa kuthiwa ushone efika esibhedlela ngoLwesibili ntambama emuva kokuthi egandaywe ugandaganda.Okhulumela abakwaNetcare 911, uMnuz Chris Botha, uthe uNksz Tebisa bamfice elimele kakhulu.Uthe bathole ukuthi ubehleli ngaphezu kwensimbi emboze isondo ngesikhathi ewa, engena ngaphansi kwesondo ugangaganda uhamba wabe usuyamgandaya.Uthe bafike esalele emgwaqweni esesimweni esibucayi.UBotha uthe bamfaka umshini wokuphefumula base bemphuthumisa esibhedlela lapho efike washonela khona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uMajor Thulani Zwane uthe ngokombiko wephoyisa eliye endaweni yesigameko, uNksz Tebisa uficwe esemgwaqweni kunowesilisa othe bebendawonye kugandaganda.“Owesilisa utshele iphoyisa ukuthi bebegibele ugandaganda, owesifazane wawa wagandayeka. Umshayeli kagandaganda kuthiwe ubesahambile eyocela usizo eCompensation kanti ube eselandwa ngamaphoyisa ambuyisela endaweni yesigameko.”Ethintwa yi
Solezwe umshayeli owaziwa ngoSibisi, uqale wavuma ukuthi kuzokhulunywa naye wathi uNksz Tebisa uhlala khona kule ndawo kodwa kuthe sekumele kuyiwe kuye washintsha wathi isitatimende sonke usibhale emaphoyiseni akuthathwe sona.Uthe umndeni kaNksz Tebisa awukho eBurbreeze usemakhaya ngoba ubeqashile kule ndawo.
title: Ugandaywe ugandaganda obecele ukugibela

text: USULALA komakhelwane umndeni wakwaNtuli eNtuzuma ngenxa yokusaba ukuthi umuzi wawo ungawa noma yinini emuva kokuqhuma kwapayipi elihamba egcekeni lagugula inhlabathi umuzi wasala ulenga.Phezu kwengozi yokuwa komuzi kubuye kwaqhuma isitamkoko senyubathi yasabalala negceke lonke.Omakhelwane bebetheleka bethelekile eNtuzuma kwa-E bezobabaza umonakalo odalwe yipayipi okuthiwa lihamba amanzi asuka edamini.Egcekeni lomuzi ngemuva kuvuleke omkhulu umgodi wabeka obala amapayipi amakhulu. Bekuvimbanise iphunga lenyubathi umuzi ulenga.UNksz Mukelisiwe Ntuli oyilungu lomndeni, uthe umuzi, onamakamelo amane, uhlala abantu abayisithupha. Kusukela ngesonto eledlule bekunenkinga yokuphela kwamanzi abede enqamuka iziqutshana kusukela ngesonto eledlule.“NgoLwesibili sabona kuqala kuphuma amanzi epayini elisegcekeni, sashaya ucingo sibikela abakwamasipala. Kuthe ngoMqgibelo ebusuku, ipayipi laqhuma kwaguguleka inhlabathi eseduze komuzi. Siphinde sashaya ucingo sibika, kwathiwa kuzothunyelwa abantu.”Uthe kufike abasebenzi bakwamasipala ngeSonto ntambama, bathatha izithombe. Banikwe namafomu okuthiwa kumele bawagcwalise, bafake isicelo sesinxephezelo.Uthe ngesikhathi befuna usizo bashayele nasehhovisi lezinhlekelele kwathiwa alukho usizo abazoluthola ngoba akulimalanga muntu.Kuthiwa ngeSonto wonke umndeni ucele ukulaliswa komakhelwane, kwasala umnumzane womuzi. Umndeni uyesaba ukuthi umuzi ungawa noma yinini futhi ubona ukuthi ngeke ulungiswe kusenepayipi elinqamula egcekeni.Ikhansela, uNksz Gloria Mhlongo, uthe uMasipala weTheku usubikeliwe, kusalindwe ukuthi ungenelele.“Ngibonile ukuthi isimo sibi impela ngoba kukhona nomunye umakhelwane othintekile," kusho uNksz Mhlongo.Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba zingakatholakali izimpendulo kumasipala.
title: Amanzi agugule inhlabathi indlu yasala ilenga

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAUFAKE ingcindezi kwabanye abagijimi abasazimisele ngokuzibekisela indawo eqenjini lama-Olympic, uLusapho April onqobe umjaho wakhe wesithathu weHannover Marathon, eGermany izolo ekuseni.U-April ubeye kulo mjaho inhloso yakhe enkulu kuwukushaya isikhathi esihle esizomfaka eqenjini lakuleli elizoya kuma-Olympic azokuba seRio de Janeiro, eBrazil kusukela ngo-Agasti 5.Izolo, u-April, ugqashule intambo ngo-2:11:27 okuyisikhathi esihle, esimbeke kubagijimi abathathu abasethubeni lokumela iNingizimu Afrika eBrazil. Ngokwenza kahle kwakhe uzifake ohlwini oseluvele lunoSibusiso Nzima (2:11:42), noLungile Gongqa (2:11:59).Isikhathi esibekiwe emhlabeni sokuzibekisela indawo kuma-Olympic u-2:19:00 kodwa ngokweSouth African Sports Confederation and Olympic Committee (Sascoc) kuleli kuzoqokwa abagijimi abathathu okuyibona abanezikhathi ezisheshayo ukuthi bayomela izwe. U-April ngowokuqala ukunqoba iHannover Marathon kathathu, useke wagijima kuma-Olympic njengoba wayekhona eLondon, e-England ngo-2012 lapho wagcina eqede endaweni ka-43 kulandela ukuwa phakathi nomjaho.Isikhathi asishayile sifakele ingcindezi abanye abagijimi abasazimisele ngokuthi baqokwe eqenjini leNingizimu Afrika, okukhona phakathi kwabo inkakha uHendrick Ramaala.URamaala (44) oseye emidlalweni emine yama-Olympic uzimisele ngokugudluza oyedwa phakathi kwalaba bagijimi njengoba naye ezofuna ukushaya isikhathi esihle uma esegijima kuHamburg Marathon, eGermany ngeSonto.Useke wazama ukuzibekisela indawo egijima eKapa nyakenye nakuMumbai Marathon ngoJanuwari, washaya isikhathi esingu-2:17:12 no-2:33:38 esiphansi kakhulu ngokwezinga uma eqhathaniswa nezimbangi zakhe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi lo mgijimi owazakhela igama enqoba iNew York Marathon ngo-2004, kuzofanele ashaye isikhathi esingaphansi kwesikaGongqa uma ezimisele ngokuya eBrazil.
title: U-April ugile izimanga enqoba umjaho eGermany

text: ngo-9.30, ebusuku kuqaleuhlelo olukhombisa ngempilo yakhe [email protected]: Fake It You Make It.Lolu hlelo luzokhonjiswa kuMTV, DStv (Channel 130).Ekhuluma ngokutholaleli thuba uLaziswe uthe, ujabule ngoba sekungokwesibili lesi siteshi simnika ithuba.“Okokuqala ngisebenza nalesi siteshi ngangiyinxusa ohlelweni lwamahlaya iYou Got Got nokwaba wuhlelo olwangibeka la ngikhonamanje futhi ngisekude ukukhohlwa yintoeyangenzela yona kulendima njengoba abaningi kuyilapho baqala khona ukunaka ithalente lami lokuthanda ukuhlekisa abantu,” kuchaza uLasizwe.Uthe uyabona futhi ukuthi uMTV uphinde wakhetha yena ukuthi enze lolu hlelo oluzokhombisa ababukeli impilo yakhe.“Lolu hlelo abantu bazolujabulela kakhulungeke baze babe nemibuzo njengoba bezohleka isiqephu ngasinye.“Kodwa zizoba khona iziqephu lapho bezokhala khona,” kuchaza yena.Uphinde waveza ukuthi impilo yaselokishini eSoweto nokuyilapho ekhulele khona izophinde ivele kulolu hlelo kuze kube uyozimela esehlala yedwa eSandton.Kulolu hlelo kuzovela umngani kaLasizwe ophinde abe ngumsakazi * -Ayanda MVP, umngani wakhe * -Ofentse Keswa nomfowabo uLungile Mcunu.Uyise uMenzi Mcunu udadewabo uZonke Nkabinde nabo bazophinde bavele kulolu hlelo.
title: Ubonga iMTV usomahlaya ngohlelo lwakhe

text:
USbahle uveze lezi zindaba ngoMsombuluko ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram lapho edalule khona ukuthi uzimukile nasemzimbeni ngenxa yamaphilisi awaphuzayo nokungakwazi ukuhamba nokuzivocavoca ngendlela kulandela ukuxilongwa odokotela. “Imithi, ukungakwazi ukuhamba ezinyangeni eziyisishiyagalombili kanye nokungakwazi ukuzivocavoca kulesi sikhathi, sekungenze ngakhuluphala, ngiyathemba lokhu (isiphuzo) kuzongisiza ngehlise emzimbeni. Uma ngizoncipha emasontweni ngizonazisa ukuthi yini engiyifakayo kuzo nezindlela zokuzivocavoca ezilula,” kusho uSbahle ku-Instagram efake isithombe sesiphuzo sakhe.BUKA: 
Ululama kahle uSbahle MpisaneSelokhu ephumile esibhedlela kulandela ingozi uSbahle isikhathi esiningi ezithombeni ubonakale ekwi-wheelchair. Uvamile ukufaka ama-video ezivocavoca noma echitha isikhathi nabangani bakhe.Isithombe sikaSbahle Mpisane esathathwa ngo-Agasti nyakenye ngaphambi kokuba sengozini yemoto.USbahle waba sengozini yemoto enyantisa igazi ngo-Agasti 9 nyakenye eThekwini. Wangeniswa egunjini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela nokuthe uma eselulama waqhubeka wahlala izinyanga ezine njengoba eze waphuma ngoDisemba.
title: USbahle necebo lokuncipha ngemuva kwezinyanga engakwazi ukuhamba

text: SABELO NSELEIPHINI likasihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu, uzokuba ngowokuqala kulesi sifundazwe ukuvela phambi kwekomiti lenhlangano elibhekele ukuziphatha kwamalungu, i-Intergrity Commission.UMabuyakhulu kulindeleke ukuthi avele ngaphambi kwaleli komiti ngesonto elizayo kanti ngemva kwakhe kuyobe sekuvela amalungu angaphezu kuka-10 amagama awo avela ohlwini lwabanogcobho.Lokhu kudalulwe nguNobhala we-ANC eKZN uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, obekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba ebesibizelwe ukuzocacisa ngezinqumo ezithathwe wumhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu esifundazweni ophethwe ngoMsombuluko.UNtuli uthe uMabuyakhulu ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uzovela phambi kwaleli komiti eliholwa nguMnuz Sipho Magwaza, ngaphambi kokuphela kwesonto elizayo.UMabuyakhulu uzovela phambi kwaleli komiti ngenxa yesinqumo esathathwa yisigungu esiphezulu se-ANC kuzwelonke sokuthi wonke amalungu ale nhlangano anamacala kumele ashenxe ezikhundleni bese ebhekana naleli komiti.UNtuli uthe bekungakacaci ukuthi obeyimeya yaseThekwini uNkk Zandile Gumede uzovela nini.UMabuyakhulu noGumede babhekene namacala enkohlakalo.UNtuli uthe ohlwini lwabanogcobho kunamagama angaphezu kuka-10.“Abaningi basolakala ngenkohlakalo, bese kuba yilabo abasolakala ngokubulala noma ngokwakha itulo lokubulala. Kukhona nabasolwa ngokweba izinto ezinjengemfuyo.“Kukhona noyedwa osolwa ngokudlwengula. Iningi lamacala awango-2017 no-2018. Kukhona ababili abanecala lokuqhubeka nokuhola isibonelelo sikahulumeni ekubeni base bekhethiwe njengamakhansela. Bayazi ukuthi akuvumelekile ukuhola isibonelelo sikahulumeni uma uyikhansela kodwa bona baqhubeka.”UNtuli uthe amalungu anogcobho aseThekwini, Okhahlamba, Newcastle nakwezinye izingxenye zesifundazwe.“Sizophinde silulungise lo luhlu njengoba kwavela emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu ukuthi kukhona amagama angekho,” kusho uNtuli.Le nhlangano imemezele ukuthi seyaluvala uphenyo obeluvulelwe iPhini likaNobhala esifundazweni uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, ilungu lesigungu esiphezulu uMnuz Jomo Sibiya  noSihlalo we-ANC esifundeni eMalahleni uDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba.Bebephenywa kulandela ukusabalala kwencwadi eyayisola uSibiya ngowesifazane ayethandana naye, elekelelwa nguHlomuka noMahlaba.Kuthiwa lona wasifazane ongalidalulanga igama lakhe kule ncwadi, uhlulekile ukuvela phambi kwekomiti ebeliholwa ngowayengundunankulu uMnuz Willies Mchunu.UNtuli ubuye wagxeka ukuziphatha kwabebeyoxhasa uNkk Gumede ecaleni lenkohlakalo ngesonto eledlule.Abalandeli bakaGumede babephethe izingqwembe ezigxeka abaholi be-ANC.“Siyazi ukuthi kunesinqumo esathathwa yisigungu esiphezulu se-ANC ukuthi amalungu e-ANC angayi ezinkantolo ukuyokweseka amalungu anamacala.“Mhlawumbe  kufanele sikhulume noNkk Gumede. Ekuqaleni sathi uma sikhuluma naye ngale ndaba, wabaphika wathi akusibo abalandeli bakhe.“Simbonile eyokhuluma kodwa wangazigxeka izenzo zabo,” kusho uNtuli.
title: UMabuyakhulu ekomitini lokuziphatha

text: UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs uGavin Hunt ukhethe ukugwinya itshe ngokuphazamisa umgqigqo weqembu lakhe kulandela ukushaywa yiChippa United esezembeni emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ngoLwesithathu ntambama eFNB Stadium. IChippa inqobe lo mdlalo ngegoli likaBienvenu Eva Nga ngomzuzu ka-84, obekusaphele imizuzwana engenile enkundleni. IChilli Boys ishaya iChiefs nje leli qembu laseNaturena belisandizela phezulu kulandela ukushaya ompetha beligi abasesicongwnei iMamelodi Sundowns, ebingakayinuki induku kule sizini. Emdlalweni emihlanu edlule iChiefs inqobe owodwa, yadlala ngokulingana kwemibili, yadliwa kabili. Ebuzwa ngenkinga yomgqigqo weChiefs ngemuva komdlalo uHunt uphendule kanje: “Nginempendulo elula kodwa angikwazi ukuyisho. Yimpendulo elula kodwa. Uma uliqonda ibhola uzokwazi ukuthi ngithini...kodwa nje impendula ilula,” kusho uHunt. “Kodwa ke balwile. Besiphethe ibhola ngasebhokisini labo isikhathi esiningi, kumele sifake iphasi yokugcina. Kumele ibe ngcono iphasi yokugcina...kodwa uma sikhuluma ngomgqigqo, iyodwa impendulo.” UHunt uvumile ukuthi kunenkinga uma iqembu lakhe lizolawula umdlalo ngendlela eliwulawule ngayo kodwa lahluleka ukuvalela ibhola enethini. Umphumela womdlalo wangoLwesithathu ugudluze iChiefs kunombolo 8 kwi-log wayibeka endaweni yesishiyagalolunye, kodwa isanomdlalo esandleni. IChiefs izobhekana neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni olandelayo ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama.
title: UHunt unqabe ukuphumela obala ngenkinga yeChiefs idliwa

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAU SEKHULULEKILE uTlou Segolela emuva kokusayina inkontilela yeminyaka emithathu ne-Orlando Pirates ngempelasonto edlule.Kuvele ukuthi uSegolela uzikhethele yena ukuphinde ahlale kuleli qembu iminyaka emithathu ngemuva kokuthi ebekelwe ukukhetha phakathi konyaka, emibili noma emithathu.Ukusayina kwakhe kumvulele ithuba lokudlala kowomkhaya kuCarling Black Label Cup enqotshwe yiKaizer Chiefs ngo 1-0 eFNB Stadium ngoMgqibelo ntambama.Usegolela, oseke wakusho ukuthi akathandi ukudalula izizathu ebezimbambile ukuthi asayine, uphinde wakugcizelela izolo ukuthi akafuni ukukhuluma ngakho.“Engikujabulelayo njengamanje wukuthi ngivuselele ubudlelwano bami nePirates. Akwandele bani ukuthola ithuba lokudlalela iqembu elikhulu njengePirates. Ngijabule ukuthi ngisazoqhubeka nokuhlala kuleli qembu engilithatha njengomndeni. Osekumele ngigxile kukhona wukusiza iqembu emidlalweni yalo,” kusho uSegolela.Umdlalo olandelayo weZimnyama oweCaf Champions League okumele bawudlale ne-Al Ahly ekuhambeni ngeSonto ngo-10 ebusuku.Lona ngumdlalo wesibili kula maqembu aku-Group A kanti amanye amaqembu akuleli qoqo yiZamalek ne-AC Leopards bazodlala ngoMgqibelo eCongo Brazzaville.Emdlalweni wokuqala iPirates yabanjelwa ekhaya yiLeoaprds ngo 0-0. USegolela wayengekho kulo mdlalo ngenxa yokuthi wayengakayisayini inkontileka entsha.“Ngikulungele ukudlala manje. Lo mdlalo uzoba wumqansa kithina ngenxa yeqembu esidlala nalo nesimo sezwe (e-Egypt kunodlame lwezombusazwe) esingesihle kodwa siyakwazi okufanele sikwenze,” kusho uSegolela.Uthe bawubuka umdlalo weZamalek ne-Al Ahly ngesonto eledlule owaphela zibambene ngo 1-1.“Ngokwami badlala ibhola elisheshayo kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi sizokwazi ukumelana nabo. Sonke singabantu, sidla ukudla okufanayo futhi silwela amaphuzu sonke. Ngikholwa wukuthi iqembu elikulambele ukunqoba yilona elizophumelela umdlalo. Okubaluleke kakhulu kithina wukuthi siqine ngokomqondo,” kusho uSegolela.USegolela ukhuluma ngokulamba nokudla, ezivela emithonjeni yezindaba e-Egypt zicaphune umdlali we-Al Ahly, uWael Gomaa, ethi iqembu ngeke likwazi ukudlala nePirates kule mpelasonto ngenxa yokuthi basebhandeni, okuyisikhathi sokuzila ukudla kulabo abalandela inkolo yobu-Islam esibizwa nge-Ramadan. Isikhathi sokuzila siqale ngoJulayi 7 size siphele ngo-Agasti 7.“Kunzima ukudlala usebhandeli,” kuthiwa usho kanje uGomaa ku-website yeqembu.Ngokombiko we-Nile Sports, kuthiwa leli qembu selibhalele iCaf eyengamele ibhola e-Afrika ukucela ukuthi umdlalo uhlehliselwe u-Agasti 9. Kuthiwa esinye isizathu esibekiwe wukuthi kabakayitholi inkundla okuzadlalwa kuyona.Izolo okhulumela iPirates, uMickey Modisane, uthe bebengakazizwa lezi zindaba futhi izinhlelo zabo zikhomba ukuthi iqembu lizolibangisa e-Egypt ngoLwesine.
title: ‘Ngijabule ukuthi ngisazohlala kuPirates’

text: SIZOQHUMA isitswebhu kubasebenzi bomasipala abangawenzi ngendlela umsebenzi wabo.Lokhu kuvezwe nguMnuz Sipho Hlomuka osanda kuthatha izintambo ekubeni nguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal. UHlomuka uthe kuzobaluleka ukuthi abasebenzi bazi ukuthi uma bengenzanga ngendlela kufanele bathathelwe izinyathelo ezinqala.UHlomuka ubekhuluma ngokukhethekile naleli phephandaba echaza ngezinhlelo abanazo njengomnyango ukubhekana nezingqinamba ezibhekene nomasipala nezinye izinhlaka eziphansi kwalo mnyango.“Njengoba silana sikhona ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi abantu bakithi bayazithola izidingongqangi nokuthi banikezwa usizo olusezingeni elifanele,” kusho uHlomuka.Uthe kule nyanga bazoba matasa kakhulu emnyangweni wakhe njengoba benezinhlelo zokwenza imihlangano nezinhlaka ezehlukene ngenhloso yokuthola izingqinamba ezikhona ngaphakathi eminyangweni nakomasipala.Eminye yemihlangano okulindeleke ukuthi babe nayo ngeyezinhlaka zomasipala njengoba ethe kukhona omasipala abangenzi kahle nabathola imibiko engemihle nabangayisebenzisi ngendlela imali abasuke babelwe yona.Uthe kubalulekile kubona njengomnyango ukuthi bangenelele bayibhekisise indaba yalabo masipala ngoba uthe ukungahambi kahle kwezinto kuyona kusho ukuthi amalungu omphakathi awakwazi ukuthola usizo asuke eludinga.Ngaphandle komhlangano neziphathimandla zomasipala, bazophinde bahlangane namakhosi njengoba ethe kubalulekile ukuthi basebenzisane nawo.Uthe sebexoxe nomnyango wezezimali ngohlelo lokusiza omasipala ukuze bathole amacebo okuphatha kahle imali.“Sidinga ukulwa nenkinga yokungasetshenziswa kwemali ngendlela efanele nokumoshwa kwayo ngoba lokhu kuholela ekutheni izidingongqangi zingafinyeleli kubantu,” kusho uHlomuka.Ezinye izinto azibale njengeziseqhulwini ezintweni abazozibheka wudaba olwasusa ukukhuluma lokukhokhelwa kwezinduna.Uthe basalinde ukuthola umbiko ophelele mayelana nalolu daba olumqoka kodwa banesifiso sokuthi basebenzisane namakhosi nezinduna kulona. UHlomuka uthe isabelo mali sabo kufanele sibe sesimeni esifanele ukuze simelane nalolu daba lokukhokheleka kwezinduna.Okunye athe bakubona kubalulekile wukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu baseKZN ikakhulu ezindaweni ezisemakhaya bayawathola amanzi.Uthe abantu njengoba bebevota nje bakhale kakhulu ngokungabi namanzi nogesi. Uthe bazohlangana nabasebenzi baphinde bahlangane nabezinyunyana ukuze bathole ngezingqinamba abasebenzi ababhekene nazo. Noma uHlomuka eveze ukuthi uzimisele ngokuthi aqinisekise ukuthi umphakathi uthola izinsiza ozidingayo, ukugxekile okwenziwa ngabathile emphakathini uma kuneziteleka njengoba kuba nemibiko yokucekelwa kwengqalasizinda kushiswe izinto ezibalulekile. Unxuse amalungu omphakathi ukuthi akuyeke lokhu wathi kumosha imali okungabe isetshenziselwa ukulethwa kwezinye izinhlelo ezisuke zidingwa wumphakathi.
title: 'Sizoqina isandla kwabangawenzi umsebenzi'

text: Lokhu kwenzeke ngemuva kokuba uShilex esethathe isinqumo sokufaka uKhuzani kubameli ngenhloso yokuthi kube wuyena oqhubeka nokwenza isiqholo salo mculi.Leli phephandaba like labika ngombango ophakathi kukaKhuzani noShilex, oqubuke ngemuva kokuba lo maskandi ememezele isiqholo sakhe emcimbini i#Gcwalis’ Mabhida Maskandi Concert ngoMashi 30.NgoLwesibili abameli bakaShilex bathumele kuKhuzani incwadi ephoqa lo mculi ukuthi axhumane nabammele ukuba balungise indaba yesivumelwano sabo sokwenza isiqholo.Kule ncwadi Isolezwe ngeSonto eliyibonile ikhophi yayo, abameli baphoqa uKhuzani ukuthi abhalele uShilex incwadi ezibophezela ukuthi bazosilungisa isimo ungakafiki uMgqibelo (izolo).Bathe uma kungenjalo bazophoqeleka ukuthi udaba baluyise enkantolo.Kuyona baveza nokuthi noma ngabe kunesivumelwano esenziwa wuKhuzani noShilex ngomlomo kwangabhalwa phansi kodwa siyambophezela ukuthi angasiphuli isivumelwano sabo.Ethintwa uKhuzani, uthe ayikho incwadi ayitholile evela kubameli bakaShilex.“Akunasivumelwano enganginaso noShilex. Uma sikhona kuzomele aveze ubufakazi nenkontileka yokusebenzisana esayisayina. Uma kuyisivumelwano athi sasenza ngomlomo kuzomele asho ukuthi sasivumelana sikuphi. Noma ngabe iyafika incwadi yabameli kimina ngeke ngiyingene indaba yayo uma kungukuthi ayinabo ubufakazi bokuvumelana kwethu ngokwenza isiqholo.Uma engakwenzi lokho uzobe ezimoshela isikhathi, angaqhubeka uma ethanda,” kusho uKhuzani.UShilex uthe ngeke esakwazi ukuphawula manje njengoba udaba eselufake kubameli kodwa wakuqinisekisa ukuthi uyambopha uKhuzani.UKhuzani uthe akukho okumthusayo ngalo mbango ophakathi kwakhe noShilex ngoba akukho okumbophezelayo ukuthi asebenze naye. Uthe kumanje uyaqhubeka nezinhlelo zokufaka isiqholo sakhe ezitolo futhi unezingxoxo no-Edgars noClicks ukuze sidayiswe khona. Okwamanje uthe isiqholo sakhe sisatholakala Online kwabafuna ukusithenga.Uveze nokuthi njengoba engakhiphanga i-albhamu ngePhasika uyoze akhiphe ngoNovemba.
title: UKhuzani ufuna ubufakazi kombangisa ngesiqholo

text: UKUQHUBEKA nokushaya amagoli amqoka komgadli weMamelodi Sundowns uYannick Zakri, emidlalweni yakamuva kuqinisa idolo ithimba labaqeqeshi ngokuthi lo mdlali uzogcina esibambile isitayela samaBrizilians nokuthi uzokuba wusizo emkhankasweni wawo wokuvikela isicoco seChampions League.UZakri, odabuka e-Cote D’Ivoire nowayedlala kwi-Asec Mimosas okwake kwagijima kuyo izelamanani zakwaToure, uKolo noYaya emidlalweni emine yakamuva usequlele phakathi amagoli amahlanu. Uqulele amagoli amabili bedlala ngokulingana neMaritzburg United kuba ngu 2-2.Uphinde wazibonakalisa beshaya i-Orlando Pirates ngo 2-0 lapho ashaya elinye lamagoli iqembu lakhe elanqoba ngawo. Bebhekene nePlatinum Stars emdlalweni owaphela ngo 2-2 waba ngomunye wabadlali beSundowns abashaya amagoli kulowo mdlalo. Emdlalweni weChampions League obungoLwesithathu eKinshasa Amasandawana aguqise kuwo i-AS Vita yaseDRC ngo 3-1 i uZakri ubengomunye wabahlohle amagoli abanqobe ngawo.Lixoxa naleli phephandaba iphini lomqeqeshi kuPitso Mosimane uManqoba Mngqithi ngemuva kokuthi cababa esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo, eGoli liphawule lathi ngalo mdlalii:“Asethembe ukuthi uzoqhubeka nomgqigqo wakhe wokushaya amagoli. Khona uma sibheka ngendlela enza ngayo izinto muva nje, kusiqinisa idolo. “Emdlalweni neVita bekufanele ngabe ushaye amagoli amaningi ukube amabhola akhe abehlaba enxebeni. Yena ukhombisa ukuba yingozi uma ephambi kwamapali.”“Okufanele akulungise ukudlala kwakhe njengoba ebukeka esasala uma kudlalwa okukhomba ukuthi akakangeni kahle hle esitayeleni esidlala ngaso. Kodwa asethembe ukuthi yinto abazokwazi ukuyilungisa,” kusho uMgqithi.Uphinde waveza ukuthi njengoba sebeshwebe isicoco seLigi sebezokwazi ukugxila kwimidlalo yeChampions League.Amatsatsantsa anomdlalo onzima kaGroup C azowudlala ne-Esperance yaseTunisia, eLucas Moripe Stadium, eTshwane ngoMgqibelo ngo 8 ebusuku.“Kubalulekile ukuthi sihlale sikhona kwiChampions League. Ngakho kufanele sigxilise imiqondo yethu kule midlalo ngoba sinesifiso sokuvikela isicoco sethu,” kusho uMngqithi.Mayelana nomdlalo abadlala ngokulingana ne-St George yase-Ethoipia uthe abadlalanga kahle kodwa abanalo uvalo ngalo mphumela ngoba basengawunqoba umdlalo womlenze wesibili ekuhambeni.“Yithina esazihlinzela ezibini ngokungadlali kahle. Abalona iqembu elingasixaka ngisho sidlala nalo ekuhambeni,” kuqhuba uMngqithi.Uphinde waveza ukuthi kubasizile ukunikeza abadlali ikhefu elanele lokuphumula ngaphambi kwalo mdlalo nokubenze bawudlala kahle waze wayophela.Khonamanjalo i-African Independent ibike ukuthi iBotswana Football Premier League (BPL) ngokuhlanganyela neBotswana Football Association (BFA) bamatasatatsa, bazama izindlela zokubuyela ohlelweni oluzohambisana nekhalenda lokudlala lweConfederation of African Football (Caf) lona oluqala ngoFebhuwari lisongwe ngoDisemba.Leli gxathi liphosela inselele iSouth African Football Association nePremier Soccer League esabamba iyeka ngokuthi ibuyele yini ohlelweni oludala lokudlala njengoba kusalandelwa inqubo yamaligi ase-Europe aqala ngo-Agasti aphele ngoMeyi.
title: Kuqinisa idolo ukuzimisela komgadli weSundowns

text: SEKUVELE izinsolo ezishaqisayo ngosomabhizinisi odumile, uMnuz Sibusiso Ncube ongumyeni kaNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube okuthiwa uyazitamuzela amathenda emikhandlwini yesifundazwe engaphansi komnyango kankosikazi wakhe.Esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini izolo, iDA iveze ubufakazi obukhombisa ukuthi inkampani yezokuxhumana kaNcube, iBrand Partners ithole umsebenzi kuMasipala waseNkandla nowaseMthonjaneni “njengemvalamlomo” kugqitshwa ukuthi izimenenja zale mikhandlu kwakungamele ziqashwe ngoba zingawulungele umsebenzi.Kuvela ukuthi umkhandlu waseNkandla wanika iBrand Partners ithenda kaR7.5 million womsebenzi wezokuxhumana wenkontileka yeminyaka emithathu.NaseMthonjaneni le nkampani kaNcube kuvela ukuthi ithola imisebenzi ehlukene yathola izigidi zemali.I-DA isabalalise ubufakazi bokuqokwa kwale nkampani kaNcube nobufakazi lapho kade ikhokhelwa imali.Ngokusho komholi weDA esifundazweni, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthe ukuqashwa kwemenenja yaseNkandla neyaseMthonjaneni kwakungafanele kodwa uNkk Dube-Ncube akazange azithathe izinyathelo ngoba umyeni wakhe ehlomula kule mikhandlu.“Sesibhalele uNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Willies Mchunu sinxusa ukuthi amise ngokushesha uNkk Dube-Ncube ngemuva kokuvela kwalezi zinsolo,” kusho uMncwango.“Simnika izinsuku eziyisikhombisa uMchunu ukuthi amise uNkk Dube-Ncube, sifuna amise nalezi zimenenja kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo ngazo,” kusho uMncwango.Uthe uMchunu kumele akhombise ukuthi wayeqinisile ukuthi uzimisele ngokulwa nenkohlakalo ngokumisa uNkk Dube-Ncube.Ephendula ukuthi akanalo yini uvalo ngokuthi kungenzeka athuliswe ngokuphenya ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo njengoba naseThekwini kade kunguye obephenya izikhulu zakhona, uMncwango uthe uncamela ukufa wathi ngeke athule ebona abantu benza inkohlakalo.Eziphendulela uNkk Dube-Ncube uthe lezi zinsolo zeDA ngomyeni wakhe ezifaka naye zingamampunge. “Besingazimisele ngokuphendula le mbudane yeDA kodwa ngenxa yokuthi izinsolo zizoya emphakathini sibone kunesidingo sokuthi umphakathi siwuvikele ukuze ungadukiswa.”Uthe uyakuqaphela ukuthi njalo uma kuzoba khona ingqungquthela ye-ANC kuba nemizamo yokungcolisa igama lakhe. “Ezinye zezinto okukhulunywa ngazo lapha sezike zavela phambilini zihlale njalo zenziwa into entsha yiDA nalabo abayiphushayo,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Uthe kuyamkhathaza ukuthi igama lakhe nelomnyango lifakwe emabhizinisi omyeni wakhe ongusomabhizinisi ohlonishwayo. “Le nto yenziwa ngamabomu ukuze kudwetshwe isithombe emphakathini sokuthi imina owenza ukuthi athole imisebenzi kalula kwabanye omasipala.”Uthe akazibukeli phansi lezi zinsolo wathi kumele ziphenywe.“Iyangikhathaza indaba yokuthi ngilokhu ngimataniswa namabhizinisi omyeni wami, lokhu ngikubuka njengemizamo yezepolitiki ebhekiswe kimina,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Uthe umyeni wakhe uqale ukusebenza nemikhandlu ngesikhathi yena esayinxusa eCzech Republic, engazi ukuthi uyoke abe ngungqongqoshe.“Ukukhombisa ukuthi le nto eshiwo yiDA ingamanga udaba lokuqashwa kwemenenja yoMkhandlu waseMthonjaneni neyaseNkandla sengilufake enkantolo ngifuna kuchithwe ngoba ukuqashwa kwalezi zikhulu bekungahambisani nomthetho uSection 54A(7) ka-2000, wokusebenza komasipala,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi miningi imikhandlu iningi layo edonsa kanzima okuvela ukuthi inezinkontileka neBrand Partners iyenzela umsebenzi wezokuxhumana nokukhangisa.IMeya yaseMthonjaneni, uMnuz Mbangiseni Biyela ithe izimenenja ziqashwa imikhandlu bese zibikela umnyango.“Thina salandela lonke uhlelo sawubikela nomnyango ngokuqashwa kwemenja wangaphendula kwaze kwaphela izinsuku ezingu-14, sabona ukuthi akunankinga yaqala yasebenza,” kusho uBiyela.Uthe akathandi ukukhuluma ngezindaba zenkontileka ephakathi komkhandlu wakhe neBrand Partners ngoba yena akangeni ezindabeni zamathenda.IMeya yaseNkandla, uMnuz Thami Ntuli ithe balandela lonke uhlelo ngesikhathi beqasha
