imenenja bawubikela nomnyango wangasho lutho baqhubeka nokuyiqasha.“Kumina ukuthi ngubani othola umsebenzi akubalulekile engikubheka kakhulu ukuthi lowo muntu umsebenzi usuke ewuthole ngendlela efanele yini,” kusho uNtuli.Okhulumela uNdunankulu uMnuz Thami Ngidi, uthe uMchunu uzozibheka lezi zinsolo bese ephendula ngendlela efanele.
title: Izinsolo ezishaqisayo ngomyeni kangqongqoshe

text:
ISITOLO sokudla iWoolworths sihoxise ilayisi elifrizile elixustshwe nombila elithengwe embonini yaseHungary, iGreenyard Factory, okusolwa ukuthi iwumsuka weListeria kuleliya lizwe.AbakwaWoolworths baveze lokhu izolo kulandela isimemezelo seHungarian Food Safety Agency ethe kuzohoxiswa konke ukudla okuvela kule mboni.Bathe ukuphepha kokudla kubalulekile ngakho bebedinga ukuthi nabo bakuhoxise lokhu kudla.Leli layisi elixutshwe nombila liphuma lifrizile ngakho lisuke lisadinga ukuphekwa ngaphambi kokudliwa.AbakwaWoolworths bathe okunye ukudla kwabo okuyizithelo okufriziwe kuphephile.We’re recalling our frozen savoury rice as a precautionary measure; if you’ve bought the product please return it to store for a full refund.More info: 
https://t.co/He1iGKogZK— Woolworths SA (@WOOLWORTHS_SA) 
July 11, 2018Abathengi abesebelithengile leli rayisi bangalibuyisela ezitolo zakwaWoolworths eziseduzane nabo, bazobuyiswelwa imali.Ukuthola eminye imininingwane ngalokhu ungashayela ku-0860 022 002 noma ungene kwi-website yakwaWoolworths, ethi:
www.woolworths.co.zaEkuqaleni kwalo nyaka iNingizimu Afrika ihlaselwe yilesi sifo okwagcina kutholakele ukuthi umsuka waso imboni yakwa-Enterprise Foods. Lesi sifo kubikwa ukuthi sadlula nabantu ababalelwa ngaphezulu kuka-200 kuleli.Kwenzeka lokhu nje abakwaWoolworths bangaphansi kwenkulu ingcindezi yokuqinisekisa abathengi ukuthi ziphephile izitolo zabo ngemuva kokutholakala kwamabhomu kwezinye zazo eThekwini ngesonto eledlule.
title: Kuhoxiswe i-rice elisolwa ngeListeria eWoolworths

text: UMCULI ongudokotela ozokhipha i-Extended Play (EP)  uthi umsebenzi wakhe wansuku zonke awuphazamiseki nakancane ngoba uyakwazi ukuhlela isikhathi sakhe.UYanga Yaya, okhulele eThekwini uthokozise abaningi ngonyaka owedlule ngesikhathi iphimbo lakhe lizwakala engomeni, iDesire, ehambisana nophrojusa uMuzi.Le ngoma iqale ukukhonjiswa esiteshini somculo iMTV Base ekupheleni kwenyanga edlule.“I-remix kaTiro yiyona esayithumela emsakazweni yathakaselwa kakhulu. Ngokwami ngithanda lena engenziwe kabusha, okuyisona sizathu esenze ukuthi siyiqophele i-video. Ngingasho nje ukuthi abantu basayamukele kahle i-video nakuba kuwuhlobo lomculo ongavamile kuleli, nokho ngiyacabanga ukuthi leli culo lisazobanyakazisa abantu,” kusho le nsizwa yaKwaMadlala eneminyaka engu-28. Echaza uhlobo lomculo awuphekayo uthe angawubiza ngeNew Age Soul. Ulamana kakhulu neR&B enesigqi se-Electro. Njengoba esebenza engudokotela ngokugcwele isonto lonke, uYanga uthe ungumuntu obuzwa ngendaba ubuthongo, usebenzisa isikhathi sakhe sasebusuku ukubhala amaculo.Uthe waqala ukuzicathulisa emculweni kusukela esenza izifundo zobudokotela ngoba yinto ebeyikhonze ngenhliziyo yakhe. “Ukusebenza ngokugcwele nokuqopha umculo eceleni kunzima kodwa kuyenzeka. Ngesikhathi ngisaqeqeshelwa ukuba ngudokotela kwadingeka ukuthi ngigxile kwezobudokotela ngoba kwakumele ngifunde okuningi eminyakeni emibili, ngaphambi kokuthi ngiqale ukusebenza sengingudokotela ozimele,” kuchaza uYanga. Uthe wancela okuningi kumngani wakhe owenza umculo esikhathini ayesithola ngokuthi ayocula naye uma enandisa, bese ezibhalela umculo wakhe ebusuku. “Kunezingqinamba zakhona ukungafundeli into ngokugcwele. Kodwa kubuye kukunikeze inkululeko yokuthi ucije kahle ubuciko bakho,” kuqhuba uYanga. Lo mculi uthe ukhule ezifela ngamaciko okubalwa kuwo iBoys II Men, Boom  Shaka, Brenda Fassie, Ringo, Letta Mbuli nenkakha yomculo wekwaito, u-Arthur Mofokate. Njengamanje uthe upheka i-EP anethemba lokuthi uzoyikhipha ngoJuni. “Ngiyipheka nophrojusa onekhono, uMuzi, ophinde abe ngumngani wami. Ukube belingaba khona ithuba lokusebenza nabanye ngingathanda ukusebenza noShekhinah, Nonku Phiri, Thembi Seete noManthe Ribane. Kungangijabulisa futhi ukuqopha noPrince Kaybee noma noBlack Coffee ngoba bangophrojusa abaseqophelweni eliphezulu,” kusho uYanga.UYanga Yaya iculo lakhe alenze nophrojusa uMuzi eselibonakala kuMTV Base uthi umatasa upheka i-Extended Play afise iphume ngoJuni nonyaka.
title: Udokotela ne-EP ezophuma maduze

text: ISICOCO seligi yisona esiduma ekhanda kumqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane, yize ehlalelwe wumqansa wokubophela iMaritzburg United itulo lokuyikhahlelela ngaphandle kweNedbank Cup bebhekene eMphithi ngeSonto.UMosimane, osedinga amaphuzu amane kuphela ngaphambi kokuthi avalele ekhabetheni isicoco seligi sesishiyagalombili seSundowns, ubhoboke ngobumqoka beligi kwaze kwagcina sekucaca ukuthi iNedbank akuyona into agxile kangako kuyona.Uthe: “Iligi iyona eduma ekhanda kimina. INedbank ifunwa abalandeli. Siyabathanda futhi sizimisele ngokubajabulisa njalo ngoba nabo bahlale benathi njalo kodwa akekho ongazi ukuthi iligi iyona emqoka ukudlula zonke ezinye izicoco.”Akungatshazwa ukuthi le nkulumo ngeke yehle kahle kubalandeli beSundowns abakholwa wukuthi iqembu labo linawo amava nezinsiza zokuqoqa zonke izicoco ezikhona ngaphansi kwePremier Soccer League (PSL) nangaphandle kwezwe kweyeCAF.Nakuba ebejabule kodwa uMosimane akazange akufihle ukuthi unenkinga yokuhlelela iMaritzburg ngoba akekho ongasho ukuthi idlala kanjani. Uvumile futhi ukuthi inhliziyo ibicishe ime kwezinye izikhathi uma isihlasela ngasekugcineni iLamontville Golden Arrows abayishaye ngo 1-0.“Siwuqedile owanamuhla umsebenzi (esho i-Arrows) kodwa bekunzima impela ikakhulukazi esiwombeni sesibili. Ungezwa umuntu ekutshela okunye iyadlala i-Arrows uma ithandile. Sithwale kanzima impela esiwombeni sesibili kodwa kwezinye izindawo siyithwalise kanzima."Kuzobe kuhluke kakhulu-ke nokho okweMaritzburg ngoba kunzima ukuqagula ukuthi badlala ngayiphi indlela. Kwesinye isikhathi badlala ngaphandle komgadli kodwa futhi uthi usanake lokho ubabone sebenaye. Konke lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi useqophelweni eliphezulu kangakanani uFadlu (Davids),” kusho uMosimane.Uzophinda nayo futhi iMaritzburg eHarry Gwala Stadium koweligi maphakathi nesonto elizayo.ISundowns inqobe ngo 1-0 okube yiphenathi ethathwe nguRicardo Nascimento maphakathi nesiwombe sokuqala okuvule igebe labuyela emaphuzwini ayisithupha phakathi kwabo ne-Orlando Pirates esendaweni yesibili.
title: UPitso ufuna okuhlukile kunokufunwa ngabalandeli

text: OBENGUMLINGISI weGenerations: The Legacy, uBrenda Mhlongo edlala indawo kaNandi, uthe usethathe isinqumo sokungena emculweni wokholo njengoba engasalingisi ndawo.Uthe usenezingoma eziyisikhombisa zomculo wokholo aziqophe nabaculi abehlukene.Ukucula umculo wokholo, uthe yinto ayevele eyithanda kusuka esemncane, kodwa wakhetha ukungawuculi ngoba esaba ukuthi abantu bazomehlulela uma ecula wona.“Inkinga ukuthi ngingumuntu oziqinele, bengizitshela ukuthi abantu ngeke bawemukele ngenxa yohlobo lomuntu engiwuyena. Akekho osake wathi umculo wokholo awungifanele kodwa bekuyimicabango ebenginayo. Ngenxa yokukhula ngokomqondo ngigcine ngibonile ukuthi kumele ngiwushintshe lo mcabango ngenze into engiyithandayo nengixhumanisa noNkulunkulu,” kusho uBrenda.Okwamanje uthe ayikho inkampani asayine ngaphansi kwayo ngoba akafuni ukuxinwa ngokuthi akhiphe i-albhamu, futhi akafuni ukuphazanyiswa yinkontileka uma kuphinda kuvela ithuba lokulingisa ngoba usazimisele ngakho.Uqhube wathi i-albhamu yakhe izophuma ngePhasika ngonyaka ozayo, futhi uzobe ezibiza ngoBrenda Mhlongo kuyona ngoba udume ngokubizwa kanjalo.Kule albhamu uthe usebenze nabantu abaningi.“Kunengoma esiyiqophe noJumbo eyiGospel Maskandi. Kwezinye ngisebenze noZaza, Zolani Maseko, Mlu Mkhize kanti kukhona enye engizoyiqopha noMondli Ngcobo,” kuqhuba yena.Uthe umculo wakhe ngeke ufaniswe nowomunye umculi wokholo ngenxa yokuthi usebenzise indlela acula ngayo emidlalweni yeshashalazi wenza iTraditional Gospel. Uthe yikhona lokhu okumenza ahluke kwabanye abaculi bowokholo abakhona.Ngaphandle komculo, uthe uphinde abe matasa neBrenda Mhlongo Worldwide Foundation egxile ekusizeni izingane ezihlala ezitaladini ukuthi zibuyisane nabazali bazo nezihlobo. Uthe usebenzisana nabefundisi baseThekwini..
title: UBrenda Mhlongo usecula umculo wokholo

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAI THEMBA alibulali, ngeke siliphonse ithawula, ngamazwi asefana nesinkwa semihla ngemihla ekhempini yaMaZulu FC abhekene nesimo esinzima sokuzama ukubalekela ukuphonseka eweni njengoba eyibambe emsileni ku-log ye-Absa Premiership.Abanye kungenzeka ukuthi sebehlanze ngedela ngoSuthu kwazise esikhundleni sokuthi kube khona izimpawu zokuthi lingakwazi ukunyuka endaweni elihleli kuyona, kwanda izinkinga.Ngesikhathi kubuywa ekhefini AmaZulu adlale ne-Orlando Pirates eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ahlulwa ngo 2-1. Kuyona le nkundla namuhla azokwamukela iMamelodi Sundowns ngo-7.30 ebusuku. ISundowns ihleli endaweni yesithathu ku-log, ukuwina kuzosho ukunciphisa igebe phakathi kwayo neKaizer Chiefs esesicongweni ngamaphuzu angu-47.Ngemuva komdlalo wePirates, Usuthu luvakashele iBloemfontein Celtic laguqa ngo 3-0. Kuwona lowo mdlalo kukhishwe ngekhadi elibomvu uMbulelo “OJ” Mabizela, ozobe engekho emdlalweni weSundowns.Ukungabi khona kukaMabizela kuzohlangana nokushiywa nguCarlington Nyadombo obengukaputeni osehambile eqenjini kulandela izinsolo zokuloya.Ukungabi khona kwalaba badlali kushiya imbobo emuva, umqeqeshi uSteve Barker sekuzomele abambe ayeke ngabadlali abangayijwayele, uRobyn Johannes noSedate Akoriko okuyibona abebeyidlala emdlalweni weNedbank Cup abahlulwe kuwo iLamontville Golden Arrows ngempelasonto.Embangweni we-Absa Premiership kuhlezi kuzoba khona amaqembu azolwela ukuvika izembe. Okwenza kube wumqansa okwaMaZulu wukuthi asanqobe umdlalo owodwa kwengu-18, likhulu igebe elikhona phakathi kwawo namanye amaqembu angase azithole egijima ku-National First Division (NFD) uma engashintshi ukuqalaza.Ahlukaniswe amaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye nePlatinum Stars esendaweni yesibili ukusuka emsileni.Kukho konke lokhu kuxakaniseka umdlali osewasebenzele iminyaka AmaZulu, u-Ayanda Dlamini, akayingeni eyokufaka emqondweni eyokugawulwa yizembe.“Ngeke sililahle ithemba manje, kungaba yiphutha elikhulu lokho. Kumele siqhubeke nokuzimisela ngoba ngokwami ithemba lisekhona,” kusho uDlamini.Umdlalo weSundowns uzolandelwa oweSuperSport United ngeSonto. NgoMashi 7 AmaZulu azovakashela iMpumalanga Black Aces ngaphambi kokubuya azokwamukela iBidvest Wits ngoMashi 10.“Inzima yona le midlalo kodwa ngeke kusisize ukugxila kulokho. Okusemqoka wukuthi silwele ukunqoba imidlalo elandelayo. Kuzomele silwe ngoba yithina esaziyo ukuthi impilo incike emiphumeleni esizoyithola. Kumele sizame ukunqoba kuqala ngawo umdlalo weSundowns. Uma sithola iphuzu sizolamuleka kodwa sonke siyazi ukuthi amaphuzu amathathu yiwona azocacisa ukuthi siyakwazi yini ukuvala igebe,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe ngeke kubasize ukulibala izinto ezenzeka emaceleni, kumele bagxile ekulweleni ukuvika izembe.
title: OwoSuthu usahlalele ethembeni ngokuvika izembe

text: I-Unemployement Insurance Fund (UIF) ithi izoqasha abazolawula olayini abade ezikhungweni zayo ukuze iqinisekise ukuphepha kwabantu abasuke beyofaka izicelo zemali emahhovisi ahlukene.UNkk Gugu Khomo oyiPhini loMqondisi we-UIF KwaZulu-Natal, uthe olayini abade emahhovisi abo badalwa wukuthi baningi abantu abaphelelwe wumsebenzi ngakho izicelo ziningi kakhulu.“Ukuxazulula le nkinga, siyabahlukanisa abantu ngoba kuba nolayini wabazolanda amafomu abazowagcwalisa, kube nowabalethe amafomu bese kuba nolayini wabazobuza. Sizobuye siqashe abazolawula olayini maduze ukuze sisombulule le nkinga. Sinazo nezinhlelo za-online neze-sms esizisebenzisayo ukuxhumana nabantu,” kusho uNkk Khomo.Uthe okwamanje olayini balawulwa abasebenzi be-UIF kodwa ngokuzayo bazoqasha abazolawula olayini, ePinetown okungesinye sezikhungo ezigcwala kakhulu kuzoqashwa abantu abathathu abazobhekela ulayini.UNkk Khomo uthe KwaZulu-Natal sebekhokhe i-UIF ejwayelekile ewu-R1.9 billion kusukela ngo-Ephreli wonyaka odlule kuze kube wuFebhuwari. Lokhu uthe kukubeka ngokusobala ukuthi baningi abaphelelwe wumsebenzi.UMnuz Makhosonke Buthelezi onguMqondisi wezokuXhumana nokuKhangisa kwi-UIF kuzwelonke, uthe sezivuliwe izicelo zeCovidTERS kodwa zizobhekelela imikhakha engakabuyeli esimeni.Uthe i-UIF isikhokhe iCovidTERS ebalelwa engaphezu kukaR60 billion selokhu kwavulwa lolu hlelo.Ukhumbuze abaqashi ukuthi iCovidTERS yenzelwe imikhakha ekhahlanyezwe yiCovid-19, engakavuli kahle futhi lapho abaqashi behluleka wukuholela abasebenzi.Uthe abasebenzi bazokhokhelwa isigaba sika-Okthoba 15 kuya kuDisemba 31 bese bebuye bakhokhelwe isigaba sikaJanuwari 1 kuya kuMashi 15.“Imali ikhokhwa emuva kwamahora awu-48 emuva kokuthi umqashi efake isicelo. Uma kukhona imininingwane eshodayo uyaziswa masishane ukuze asheshe ayithumele. ICovidTERS ivulelwe yonke imikhakha engakasebenzi kahle okubalwa owezokuvakasha, odayisa utshwala, izitolo zokudlela  neminye lapho isimo singakabuyeli kwesijwayelekile,” kusho uButhelezi.Uxwayise abaqashi abangayidlulisi imali ye-CovidTERS kubasebenzi ukuthi bazobhekana namacala okukhwabanisa ngoba kuqashwe abacwaningi mabhuku abayisikhombisa abalandela imali yeCovidTERS ekhokhwe yi-UIF.Uveze ukuthi abacwaningi mabhuku bazohambela bonke abaqashi abakhokhelwe imali  yeCovidTERS baphenye ukuthi imali ifinyelele yini kubasebenzi, uma imali ingayanga kubasebenzi abaqashi bazoboshwa babhekane namacala okukhwabanisa.Uthe imali yeCovidTERS ayilingani nomholo womsebenzi kodwa ikhokha kusuka kuR3 500 kuya kuR6 638.Abafake izicelo zeCovidTERS njengoba isiluliwe kulindeleke ukuthi baqale ukuhola kule mpelasonto.
title: Bazophela olayini abade emahhovisi e-UIF

text: KWADINGEKA ashiye ikhaya ukuze aqhele kwababembhuqa unogada othweswe iziqu zomthetho ngoLwesine ebusuku.Kumthathe iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ukufeza iphupho lakhe uMnuz Skhumbuzo Mthembu (43) waseMgungqundlovu, othweswe iziqu zeLLB e-Unisa, ePitoli.Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi waqala ukufunda ngo-2004 wayeka ngo-2006, waqhubeka ngo-2012 ngenxa yezinkinga zemali. Ubevele engunogada oyitoho eMgungundlovu ngaphambi kokuyozinza eGauteng ngo-2018.UMthembu uthe uyise okuthiwa wayedlalela iSoul Brothers isiginci, washona eneminyaka emithathu.“Bengiwuthanda nami umculo kodwa ngingakwazi ukudlala izinsimbi. Bengizibuza ukuthi ngingasivala kanjani isikhala esashiywa wubaba ukuze umndeni wami uziqhenye ngami. Ngaqala ukufundela ezomthetho ngoba bengihlabeka umxhwele uma sengibona abameli begqoke amajazi amnyama, bephethe nemiqingo yamafayela, kube sengathi ngiyahlanya,” echaza.Uthe ngokwemvelo ungumuntu othanda ukuxukuza ugebhezi, obekumhlupha uma ehlezi nabangamqondi kahle.“Bebengibhuqa abanye bengibiza ngommeli, bengazi ukuthi ngalokho bayangikhuthaza. Bebebona ingekho le nto engiyenzayo yokufunda ngingaqedi. Nganquma ukuthi ukuze ngingapheli amandla, kungcono ngiyoqala impilo entsha,” kusho uMthembu.Wawuthola ngoJuni 2018 umsebenzi wokuba ngunogada ngokugcwele. Lokhu kumsize nokukhokhela izifundo. Uthe bekungelula njengoba ebencelisa amawele, abuye emsebenzini afunde. Kwesinye isikhathi ubelala amahora amabili, avukele emsebenzini ekade ebhekene nezincwadi. Ubonge unina nomkakhe ngokumeseka lapho abanye bebona edlala ngesikhathi. Okumphathe kabi ukuthi usezame kaningi ezinkampanini zabameli ecela ukuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi. Ufunde usushintshile umthetho njengoba ekwazile ukuthweswa iziqu engaqeqeshelwanga umsebenzi.“Ngafaka izicelo ezinkampani ezingaphezu kuka-25 kodwa angikaze ngiphendulwe. Angiphelanga amandla. Ngizoqhubeka nokuba ngunogada ngize ngithole umsebenzi wokuba ummeli ngokugcwele,” kusho yena.Wayehlele ukuthi unina abe khona ethweswa iziqu kodwa waswela imali yokumgibelisa.“Sengiyoya ekhaya ngiphethe i-degree yami ngimgqokele nejazi,” kusho uMthembu.
title: Unogada uthweswe iziqu zeLLB

text: LUZOSHUBISA uhlelo oluvumbuulula omakhwapheni balabo abasuke bejolela izithandwa zabo zingazi.Uhlelo lwe-Uyajola 9/9 oluthakaselwa kakhulu kuleli oselwenze ukuthi umethuli walo, uJub Jub abe nyamanambana kwabesilisa abangathandi kudalulwe imijolo yabo efihliwe, kulindeleke ukuthi luqale ukukhonjiswa kuChannel 157 phakathi kuka-Ephreli noJuni kulo nyaka.Inhloko yezokuXhumana kuMoja Love uLindiwe Mbonambi,  ithe lolu hlelo lusazoqhubeka nokushubisa futhi lushiye abantu besalangazelele ezinye iziqephu.“Lolu hlelo luzobonakala luhambela zonke izifundazwe njengoba besibona kwenzeka eziqeshini ebezikhonjiswa phambilini. Abantu basazoqhubeka nokubuka iziqephu ezimbili ezilandelanayo ezikhonjiswa imizuzu engu-24,” kuchaza uLindiwe.Eqhuba uthe  uhlelo  olukhuluma ngempilo kaZodwa Wabantu nalo luzobonakala kuMoja Love. Uthe nasohlelweni lukaZodwa, abantu basazoqhubeka nokumangazwa yiziqephu zakhe ezishiya ababukeli bethokozile. UZodwa uzobonakala eqinisa ubudlelwano bakhe nomndeni wakubo.Uphethe ngokuthi uhlelo Uyajola 9/9 luzoba neziqephu ezingu-26 kuthi olukaZodwa lube nezingu-13.
title: Zibuya ngegiya eliphezulu izinhlelo zeMoja Love

text: UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, u-Ernst Middendorp, akakafuni ukuyicabanga eyokuvula unyaka neMamelodi Sundowns njengoba egcizelela elokuthi okumqoka kuyena njengamanje wukufaka iqembu emzuliswaneni olandelayo weCAF Confederation Cup.Umdlalo weChiefs neSundowns ngoJanuwari 5 eFNB Stadium uzobe ungowesibili kaMiddendorp we-Absa Premiership. Kowokuqala uthole amaphuzu amathathu beshaya ngo 1-0 iSuperSport United.Iqembu likaMiddendorp lisendaweni yesithupha kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-21 kanti iSundowns ibambe indawo yesine ngawu-22.Ebuzwa uMiddendorp ukuthi ngabe yiziphi izindawo abona ukuthi zifuna ukulungiswa ngaphambi kokuthi badlale neSundowns, uthe: “Sisayibheka indlela esidlala ngayo, indlela esihlangana ngayo ngokwami kusekhona ukungaxhumani kahle. Kusenegebe phakathi kodonga lwethu, isisu nabadlali baphambili. Lokhu sikwenza siliphethe ibhola noma lingekho kithina. Yilokho okumele sikulungise kusukela ngoLwesibili (izolo) uma sesibuyela ekuziqeqesheni. Yebo iSundowns siyayihlonipha kodwa okwamanje sigxile emdlalweni wethu wasekuhambeni.”NgoMgqibelo iChiefs izodudulana ne-Elgeco Plus eMadagascar emdlalweni womlenze wesibili endleleni ebheke kumaqoqo alo mqhudelwano. Ngempelasonto iChiefs ibhudluze leli qembu ngo 3-0 eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.UMiddendorp uthe uyawuqonda umsebenzi omhlalele kuMakhosi.“Akuwona umsebenzi wami kuphela kodwa owethimba lonke labaqeqeshi. Ngiyakuqonda kahle okumele ngikwenze. Ngokubambisana leli qembu lizobuyela ekubeni ngelinamandla.”Lo mqeqeshi oke wanqoba izicoco neChiefs phambili, ngaphambi kokuxoshwa ngo-2007, uveze ukuthi uzama ukuhlola bonke abadlali anabo esikwatini.“(USiphelele) Ntshangase udlalile (kwiSuperSport) akenzanga kahle, bengifuna ukumbheka futhi.” UNtshangase ungene ewisombeni sesibili kwi-Elgeco.“Ngiyazi ungumdlali okahle, bengifuna ukumbona ukuthi uzokwenzenjani kulokhu,” kusho uMiddendorp.USIPHELELE Ntshangase weKaizer Chiefs ubukeka engakasibambi isitayela somqeqeshi omusha u-Ernst MiddendorpUthe u-Andriamirado Andrianarimanana naye ukhombisile ukuthi ungumdlali omuhle kodwa kukhona lapho okumele alungise khona kanjalo noTeenage Hadebe wathi kusamele alungise indlela aphasa ngayo ibhola.Udonse ngendlebe abalandeli ukuthi abayeke ukuhhewula uLeonardo Castro.“Kumele simkhombise uthando kakhulu kunakuqala. Akasiyena umdlali ohehayo. Ungumshayi wamagoli. Ngicabanga ukuthi lokho sikubonile yingakho athengwa. Yebo yena unakho ukunyamalala emdlalweni bese abantu bezibuza ukuthi kwenzakalani. Kodwa ngiyaluthanda lolu hlobo lwabadlali, ngoba uyakwazi ukuqhamuka esezoshaya igoli. Ngimjabulele ngamabili awashayile,” kusho uMiddendorp.
title: U-Middendorp akakafuni ukugxila koweSundowns

text: INKAKHA yomlingisi womdlalo osakazwa kwiBET othi Isono, uRami Chuene, uthi awubala amadoda amathathu kowesifazane oyedwa uma kuyiwa ocansini. URami olingisa indawo kaJumima Ndlovu, ubephendula inkulumo yomholi we-ACDP uMfundisi Kenneth Meshoe, ayenze ngesithembu sabantu besifazane. "Uma owesifazane ethandana namadoda amathathu futhi wonke emfuna ngobusuku obubodwa, kuzokwenzekani ?“ kubuza uMeshoe. URami utheakekho yini otshele umfundisi ukuthi abantu besifazane bengamelana namadoda amathathu ngosuku olulodwa ngamahora."Hhayi ukumelana nje kodwa angawaguqisa phansi ngamadolo, indoda ngayinye. Nangosuku olulandelayo, aphinde afequzise isinqe sakhe sengathi ubesenamasonto agcina. Kuvele kungihlekise ukuthi amadoda asaqhubeka nokubukela phansi abantu besifazane uma kuyiwa ocansini," kuchaza uRami oseneminyaka ewu-25 eyibambile kwezokulingisa.Uthe okwenza amadoda acabange ukuthi ayasatshwa yingoba akekho oseke waba yivulandlela. Abanye abantu besifazane bavumelene noRami kodwa amanye amadoda athi kuyihlazo akushoyo futhi ukhuluma ngamayengandoda hhayi abantu besifazane abajwayelekile."Awukaze wathola indoda yangempela," kusho uSgwili Sangempela.URami useke wadlala indawo kaGracious "TGOM" Mabuza kwiThe Queen, ekaThato kwiScandal! nekaKhomotjo Mojalefa kuMuvhango. Kuzo zonke izindawo alingisa kuzo ufike abe ngumuntu wesifazane ongungqoshishilizi. Amagalelo akhe emdlalweni othi Isono aze abonwa ngabagqugquzeli beSouth African Film and Television Awards (Saftas) bamqoka emunxeni weBest Supporting Actress-Telenovela.  Kulo munxa uzodlana imilala nezinye izingqwele kulo mkhakha okubalwa uMichelle Botes odlala indawo ka-Angelique Price kwiLegacy ekhonjiswa kuM-Net (DStv 101) noQuanita Adams onguLeatita Meintjies emdlalweni okhonjiswa kwi-kykNET (DStv 144) othi Arendsvlei. Uhalaliselwe ngabaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kanye nozakwabo okubalwa noLoyiso McDonald odlala indawo kaKagiso Khoza kwiThe Queen, uDineo Langa owayenguKea Khoza, uNokuthula Mavuso, uRenate Stuurman.*Abahlabene bazomenyezelwa namuhla kwiSABC 3 FM nakwiMzansi Magic kusukela ngo-7 ebusuku.
title: Awubala amadoda amathathu ngosuku kowesifazane: Rami

text: UKUKHOTHAMA kweSilo Samabandla kuzwelile kumholi wamaNazaretha waseBuhleni, uNyazilwezulu njengoba bebengamathe nolimi ngendlela abebezwana ngayo.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe umholi wamaNazaretha ubenobudlelwano obuhle noHlanga Lomhlabathi futhi uzothumela amakhosi esizwe asebandleni lakhe ukuyobhonga emswanini endlunkulu.“Inkosi uNyazilwezulu yedlulisa amazwi enduduzo endlunkulu nasesizweni sonkana ngokukhothama kweSilo Samabandla. Inkosi uNyazi iphatheke kabuhlungu kakhulu ngokukhothama kweSilo. Inkosi ibinobudlelwano obukhulu neSilo futhi ibingapheli esigodlweni saso eNyokeni, KwaNongoma. NeSilo besingapheli eBuhleni futhi bekunezinhlelo ezenziwa ngamaNazaretha aseBuhleni neSilo, njengolokusokwa kwabesilisa oseluneminyaka eyisikhombisa lukhona. Awukho umcimbi obuba khona eBuhleni, inkosi uNyazilwezulu obeluwenza lungaqalanga endlunkulu. Ngokunjalo neSilo besenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siqala eBuhleni uma kunomcimbi esizoba nawo, ngendlela abebesondelene ngayo nenkosi uNyazi,” kusho uMncwabe.Uthe ubudlelwano babo bebuqine kakhulu kangangoba iSilo sinesigodlo saso esakhiwa wuNyazilwezulu eBuhleni, esinye sisentabeni iKhenani. Lezi zigodlo bezisetshenziswa yiSilo uma sivakashele amaNazaretha eBuhleni noma esentabeni iKhenani.Eminyakeni edlule amaNazaretha aseBuhleni, ake abonakala egcwele inkundla iMoses Mabhida ngesikhathi uMdlokombane esingethe umgubho woMkhosi weLembe. Kulowo mcimbi uNyazilwezulu lwafike lwaxoshisa iSilo ngezinkomo.AmaNazaretha abebuye atheleke naseNyokeni lapho abevamise ukuya khona ephelezela uNyazi uma luyohlangana neSilo.
title: UNyazi ludumele ngokukhothama kweSilo

text: SEKUSABALELE umbiko ongemuhle ezinkundleni zokuxhumana osola iMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, ngokuxhaphaza imali yabakhokhi bentela ngokuthenga imizi eyisikhombisa selokhu engene esikhundleni.Umbiko, otholwe yiSolezwe ku-Whatsapp, usola iMeya ngokungabikeli abantu ngomsebenzi esiwenzile selokhu ingene esikhundleni kodwa imatasa ithenga imizi njalo ngenyanga.Imizi kuthiwa isezindaweni zomacaphunakusale - eMhlanga, Ballito, Brettenwood Estate, Hillcrest naseWestville.Kuphinde kubuzwe ukuthi uyithathaphi imali yokuthenga le mizi ngoba umholo wakhe ngeke uyikhokhele yonke le mizi.Uphinde asolwe ngokunikeza amathenda izinkampani zamaNdiya okuthiwa avotela i-DA akhohlwe ngezabantu abamnyama abavotela i-ANC.Umbiko uthi kunophiko lwakagesi kuMasipala weTheku lapho kubekwe isichuse somuntu omnyama oyiNhloko yakhona, uMnuz Sandile Maphumulo, naye osolwa ngokunikeza izinkampani zikamacaphunakusale uMnuz Vivian Reddy wonke amathenda.UMnuz Vivian Reddy uthe lo mbiko ungamanga futhi miningi esazovela njengoba kuza ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi obusha be-ANC.Uthe i-Edison Power Group okuyinkampani yakhe ayiwatholi amathenda kumasipala futhi ayilenzi ibhizinisi noMasipala weTheku noHulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal kule minyaka engu-10 edlule.Emhlanganweni wekomiti elilawula uMkhandlu weTheku eCity Hall izolo, uNkk Gumede uyichithile imibiko esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngezinsolo zoxhaxha lwemizi anayo wathi yena unomuzi owodwa osePhoenix.Khonamanjalo kushone elayizolo sekunomunye umbiko ogxeka abakhulume kabi ngeMeya yeTheku, ubabiza ngokuthi basadiniwe ngokuhlulwa kwabo engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi be-ANC eThekwini naKwaZulu-Natal.
title: Umbiko omubi ngeyeTheku

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEIPHINDE yahluleka iSwallows ukuzibuyisela embangweni wesicoco seligi, ibambana ngo-1-1 neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) emdlalweni obuyizolo, eDobsonville Stadium.Igoli leSwallows  libhakuziswe enethini uZaphania Mbokoma ngomzuzu ka-31 ngemuva komnyakazo omuhle kaKamohelo Mahlatsi noRuzaigh Gamildien.Ele TTM kube iphenathi evalelwe phakathi uBulelani Ndengane esikhathini sikanompempe.IZinyoni zibulawe uPetso Maphanga ongene esiwombeni sesibili  owise uNdengane ebhokisini singekho isidingo.Usawoti esilondeni seSwallows uphinde wathelwa ukunqoba kweLamontville Golden Arrows eshaye iBlack Leopards ngo-3-1.I-Arrows inyukele kweyesine ngamaphuzu awu-32, Izinyoni zehlela kweyesihlanu ngawu-31.Izolo bekuwumdlalo weshumi  Izinyoni zidlala ngokulingana. Zagcina ukunqoba ngoJanuwari zishaya iBaroka.Njengoba beziphuma ekushayweni okokuqala zidlala neTS Galaxy koweNedbank Cup, bekwethenjwa ukuthi zizokwazi ukuvala igebe lamaphuzu phakathi kwazo namaqembu angaphezulu.Esiwombeni sokuqala okugqame kuso unozinti weSwallows, uVirgil Vries obevimba izinguzunga zamashodi kaRhulani Manzini noFarai Madhanaga, kuhlasele zisuka yona iSwallows.Ukuhlangana kukaKamohelo Mahlatshi, Kgaokgelo Sekgota noGamildien kuzithwalise kanzima izitobha zeTTM.UNdengane weTTM  obematasa nokudlalisa kabi uMahlatshi usindele unompempe uPhilangenkosi Khumalo obekubonakala engazimisele ukukhipha amakhadi kwesokuqala.Kwesesibili ugcine elitholeli eliphuzi uNdengane. Bese kungathi uyabukisa uKhumalo ngokukhipha amakhadi aphuzi.Nakuba ibhola belisezinyaweni zeSwallows esikhathini esiningi kodwa iTTM beyifika kuzwakale ebhokisini lezitha.Ukube  ubelele eVries ngabe kushintshwe iTTM isivalele amagoli amathathu kaManzini nelikaMadhanaga.Abaqeqeshi beTTM, uMpho Maleka noDavid Mathebula kuthe uma bebona ukuthi kuyonakala, esiwombeni sesibili babeuya noCelimpilo Ngema ongene esikhundleni sikaManzini noJoseph Malongoane abangene bayishukumisa bebambisene noLerato Lamola ongawuqedanga umdlalo.Ngoka-50, uNgema udedele ingizunga evinjwe uVries maqede walimala ihlombe.Ukungena kukaTokelo Ranti noThabo Rakhale kube nezithelo, iTTM bese ihlasela ingaqedi okudale ukutatazela kwabeSwallows.Zivele sezikhona izinkulumo ezithi insimbi seyiqalile ukushisa kubadlali nakubaqeqeshi beSwallows. Amanye amaqembu aseyibambile indlela edlala ngayo.ISwallows isiyoze idlale neChippa United ngoMashi 20, eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium.ITTM izoqhubeka nokuhlala endaweni ka-14 ngamaphuzu awu-16, emidlalweni ewu-18.Kolandelayo iTTM izokwamukela iLamontville Golden Arrows, e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium ngoLwesithathu.Imiphumela yeDStv Premiership:SuperSport United 0-0 TS Galaxy; Cape Town City 1-2 Stellenbosch; Chippa United 0-3 Orlando Pirates; Black Leopards 1-3 Lamontville Golden Arrows; Swallows 1-1 Tshakhuma.Imiphumela yeGladAfrica Championship:Cape Umoya United 0-2 Uthongathi; JDR 1-2 Cape Town All Stars; Bizana Pondo Chiefs 0-0 Richards Bay FC; Jomo Cosmos 1-3 TS Sporting; Polokwane City 1-0 University of Pretoria; Pretoria Callies 2-3 Royal AM; Sekhukhune 1-0 Free State Stars; Cape Town Spurs 1-1 Steenburg.I-LOG YE-DSTV PREMIERSHIPAmaqembuPWDLFAPtsSundowns16106026736Pirates20983241535SuperSport20974281934Arrows18882271732Swallows187101211331AmaZulu18774241928CPT City        19676292825TS Galaxy18585181723Baroka18567192521Chiefs17476172019Celtic19478192319Stellenbosch17467182218Chippa18378162316Tshakhuma17377102116Maritzburg173410132313Leopards183312143112
title: Kuyibhedele ekugcineni iSwallows ibanjwa koweligi

text: OWESIFAZANE wasePholani (eMashumini) eLindelani ngaKwaMashu, uphume ngesamagundane kwakhe ehujwa indodakazi imsola ngokushintshanisa abafana abancane kunaye, bese ekipita nabo kubo.UNksz Nomandla Mqobe (44) usephenduke umahamba ehlala exoshwa wuZandile ‘Nosipho’ Buthelezi (22), othi usekhathele wunina nesoka lakhe beshaya ngesudi yesele phambi kwakhe, bewotawotana namasoka kukhona ngisho abazukulu bakhe.Udungunyane kuthiwa ludalwe ukuthi uNksz Mqobe akipitise isoka lakhe elineminyaka ewu-37, okuyisenzo esingehlanga kahle endodakazini yamagcino ngoba isola ukuthi isenzo sikanina sehlisa isithunzi somuzi.Ethintwa uNksz Mqobe uvumile ukuthi usengundingasithebeni ngemuva kokuxoshwa yindodakazi yakhe esinezingane ezintathu.“UNosipho ubengilwisa futhi engichapha ngezinkulu izinhlamba lezi. Angazi uxakwa yini uma mina ngizithandanela nesoka lami.”UNksz Mqobe uphikile ukuthi ubesekipitile nesoka lakhe alishiya ngeminyaka eyisikhombisa.“Belike lingivakashele lezo zinsukwana ezimbili noma ezintathu. Nakhona besingenzi lutho okuyimikhuba kodwa lona belilala embhedeni bese mina ngindlala phansi. Noma sithanda ukuba ndawonye kodwa lezi zingane bezinqaba ukusishiya sodwa. Kuhluleka ngisho sengibacela ukuba bayovakasha kubangani bami nasezihlotsheni ukuze sisale sobabili (nesoka) kodwa bebenqaba,” kusho uNksz Mqube.Uthe usefika kubo ngokunyenya, ezolanda ezinye izimpahla zakhe kodwa ubuye athwale kanzima ngoba sekushintshwe nokhiye.UNksz Buthelezi uphike walala ngomhlane ukuthi unina uxoshiwe kodwa uthe unina uncamele ukuduka nezwe ngoba efuna ukugila kahle imikhuba noBen 10 wakhe asemthanda ukwedlula umndeni wakhe.“Thina samkhuza umama ukuthi akayeke ukushintshashintsha abafana abangontanga yethu emzini kagogo ngoba lokho kwehlisa isithunzi somuzi. Okunye ubuye abe nesikhwele uma la masoka akhe esexhumana nathi, ezitshela ukuthi sizomphuca wona. Leli elisha belibuye lihambe nqunu phambi kwethu, nomama naye ugcine esezihambela nje ngomzimba engagqoki lutho. Kwesinye isikhathi babuye bawotawotana futhi behlekela phezulu phambi kwethu,” kusho uNksz Buthelezi.Uthe bebefuna unina ahlukane nemikhuba engasile njengoba enezingane ezine zezibongo ezingafani.“Sonke sibiza izibongo zobaba bethu ngoba akasikhulisanga. Akakaze wasenzela lutho. Namanje siyazipatanisela,” kuphetha uNksz Buthelezi.Eziphendulela uNksz Mqube uthe ngamanga ukuthi isoka lakhe belihamba nqunu kodwa belibuye ligqoke i-trunk kuphela.Uthe akazi ngempela ukuthi babangani nendodakazi. “Bese ngimbiza ngomnakwethu ngenxa yokuthi uyangibangisa futhi ubesethi nezingane zakhe azingayidli into eziyiphathelwe yimi ngoba ngikhohlakele,” kuphetha uNksz Mqobe.
title: Baxoshe unina bethi uqoma oBen 10

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEKONKE sekulele ezandleni zabaphathi beSuperSport United egijima kwiDStv Premiership ngekusasa likaBongani “Model C” Khumalo oyisiqongqwane sasemuva kuleli qembu lasePitoli.Lokhu kutholwe yileli phephandaba ngesikhathi lixoxisana noGlyn Binkin obhekene nezindaba zikaKhumalo owayengukaputeni weqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana.Inkontileka kaKhumalo naMatsatsantsa a Pitori, aqeqeshwa nguKaitano Tembo, kulindeleke ukuba iphele ngoJuni nonyaka kodwa inombandela wokululwa ngonyaka owodwa.UKhumalo (34) owayengomunye wabadlali ababemele elakuleli kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010 eyayidlalelwa lapha eNingizimu Afrika, ukhuze ibuya kwiSuperSport ngesizini ka-2018/2019 esuka kwiBidvest Wits ayesenqobe nayo isicoco seligi neseTelkom Cup ngaphansi kobuholi bukaGavin Hunt oseqeqesha iKaizer Chiefs.Lesi sitobha sigabe ngamava okudlala emaqenjini aphesheya kwezilwandle okukhona kuwo iTottenham Hotspur edlala kwi-English Premiership. Udlale nakwiReading, Doncaster Rovers, iColchester United, Preston North End okungamaqembu adlala ezigabeni ezingezansi e-England. Udlale nakwiPAOK yaseGreece.Kule sizini ka-2020/2021, kubukeka izinto zingamhambeli kahle lo mdlali odabuka eSwatini kwazise ubuye akhuhle ibhentshi kanti umiswe kabi endaweni ayidlalayo maphakathi nasemuva nguLuke Fleurs, uGrant Kekana noThatayaone Ditlhokwe.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngesimo sikaKhumalo owanqoba izicoco ezintathu zeligi neSupersport kumasizini edlule, uBinkin uthe okwamanje usalindele abaphathi beqembu ngokuthi bacacise ukuthi kuzokwenzakalani ngomdlali wakhe uma kuphela isizini?“Kuyiqiniso ukuthi inkontileka kaBongani neSuperSport izophela uma kusongwa isizini esikuyona njengamanje, kodwa-ke ngingakuveza ukuthi inombandela wokuvuselelwa ngonyaka owodwa.“Njengamanje izikhulu zeqembu bezingakasho lutho ngodaba lwenkontileka ephelayo kaBongani, mina-ke njengomphathi wezindaba zakhe ngilindele zona ukuba zize kithina ukuze zicacise ukuthi ngabe kuzokwenzakalani ngekusasa lo mdlali?“Ngingasho futhi ukuthi ukusebenzisana kwethu neSuperSport kuhle kakhulu nokungenza ngibe nethemba elikhulu lokuthi khona maduze nje zizoqala izingxoxo mayelana nekusasa likaBongani,” usho kanje uBinkin.Ngaphandle kukaKhumalo, abanye abadlali baMatsatsantsa okubikwa ukuthi basadukuza ebumnyameni ngekusasa labo, abagadli uThamsanqa “Gandaganda” Gabuza no-Evans Rusike, uSiyabonga Nhlapo odlala emuva noLucky Mohomi odlala esiswini.
title: Imenenja ilindele ukucaciselwa ngekusasa lowe-United

text: INHLANGANO yezepolitiki esanda kusungulwa, i-ActionSA, isiphume umkhankaso wokufuna labo abazoyimela okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya njengoba ihlela ukugudluza i-ANC kuMasipala waseThekwini.Leli qembu elasungulwa owayeyimeya yaseGoli, uMnuz Herman Mashaba, selinxenxe izakhamizi zaseThekwini ukuthi ziphakamise amagama alabo ezifuna bamele leli qembu okhethweni olubhekwe ngabomvu.USihlalo wale nhlangano KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Makhosi Khoza, uthe bavule izandla kwizakhamuzi zakuleli dolobha ukuba ziphakamise amagama alabo iqembu elizogadla ngabo okhethweni.UDkt Khoza uthi bafuna ukugadla ngalabo abazophakanyiswa yizinhlaka ezehlukene emphakathini kulolu khetho ekufanele lubanjwe phakathi kuka-Agasti kanye noNovemba kulo nyaka.“Sibheke kakhulu ebantwini abazophakanyiswa izinhlangano zabakhokhi bentela, izinhlangano zokuqapha umphakathi, izinhlangano zabahlali emphakathini, nezinhlangano zezinhlaka zohwebo ukuthi ziphakamise abantu abazongenela ukhetho ngaphansi kweqembu lethu kumasipala.“Sikholelwa ekutheni izakhamuzi yizona uqobo lwazo okufanele zizikhethele ukuthi zifuna ukuphathwa kanjani. Yingakho-nje sithi sinxenxa wona umphakathi usilethele amagama abantu obona ukuthi kufanele bawuhole okhethweni lomasipala luka2021.”UDkt Khoza, owahlubuka ku-ANC, uthe baneqhinga eliqondene nokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya nathe lingasiza ekuketuleni i-ANC kuMasipala waseThekwini.I-ANC yathola izihlalo ezingu-56% ngokhetho olwedlule kulo masipala.UDkt Khoza uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bavotele i-ActionSA ukuze izonqanda inkohlakalo kanye nokungakhokhelwa kwezidingo zalo masipala iminyango kahulumeni.“Kuyadabukisa ukuthola ukuthi imenenja kaMasipala weTheku nenkosikazi wayo, kanye namakhansela angu-60 babhekene namacala enkohlakalo. Ngaphezu kwalokho, kuneminyango kahulumeni wesifundazwe, ekahulumeni kazwelonke kanye nezikhulu zikahulumeni ezingazikhokhi izikweletu zikamasipala.“Lokhu kuholela ekutheni zigcine zibiza kakhulu izindleko zokukhokhela izidingo zikamasipala ngenxa yokukhushulwa kwamanani kuzanywa ukuthi umasipala ugcine wenze inzuzo ethe xaxa.”
title: I-ActionSA ifuna abazoyimela ngokhetho eThekwini

text: KUPHAZAMISEKE ukufunda nokufundisa esikoleni Umlazi Comprehensive Technical High (Comtech) izolo ngesikhathi isigejana sothisha sivimbela uthishanhloko ukungena emasangweni alesi sikole.Ngaphambi kokuvinjwa kukathishanhloko, abazali bebeye kulesi sikole beyobuza ukuthi kwenzekani emuva kokuthola ukuthi othisha ababesolwa ngokujola nabafundi bebuyile kulesi sikole.Omunye wabazali abakhulume neSolezwe ongeke adalulwe igama ukuze kungahlukumezi ingane yakhe kulesi sikole, uthe izinto zimapeketwane eComtech ngoba ukufunda akusaqhubeki kahle.“Ngonyaka odlule, kwakunezinsolo zokuthi kunothisha abajola nabafundi njengoba kwaze kwabanjwa omunye eqabula umfundi. Satshelwa ukuthi lolu daba luphenywa wuMnyango wezeMfundo kodwa sixakekile ukuzwa ngezingane ukuthi sebebuyile labo thisha. Njengoba bebuyile kuthiwa abafundisi, bafuna ukuqhuba imikhuba yabo yakudala. Izolo siye esikoleni siyobacela ukuthi abayohlala emakhaya kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo,” kusho umzali.Uveze ukuthi abazi ukuthi kwenzekani kulesi sikole njengoba uthishomkhulu evinjiwe ukuthi angene esikoleni.“Thina asithathi hlangothi lwamuntu, sifuna izingane zethu zifunde. Asazi nokuthi kungani bekuvalelwe uthishomkhulu ngaphandle. Siyacela uNgqongqoshe uMnuz Mshengu (Kwazi) angenelele kulolu daba ngoba izingane zethu kufanele zibhale izivivinyo kodwa kukhona abaphazamisa ukufunda eComtech,” kusho umzali.Isolezwe libuye lathola nencwadi eyalela ukuba kususwe igama lomzali othile ukuze angavotelwa uma sekukhethwa isigungu sabazali.Lithole nokuthi emasontweni adlule, othisha balwa ngemuva kokuthi owesilisa encome izinqa zikathisha wesifazane.UMnuz Muzi Mahlambi ongumqondisi wezokuxhumana eMnyangweni wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bayalulandela udaba lwaseComtech.“Kunothisha abasolwa ngezigameko zokwenza ukuthi isikole singalawuleki. Siyaqhubeka nokulandela udaba lwaseComtech futhi maduze sizobathathela izinyathelo labo thisha. Ukufunda nokufundisa kuyaqhubeka,” kusho uMahlambi.
title: Kushube isimo eComtech phakathi kothisha nabazali

text: BASABISA ngokuduba ukhetho abantu abadala abahlala kuward 102 emuva kokungawutholi uKhisimusi owenzelwa abantu abadala emawadini ahlukene kuMasipala weTheku ngonyaka odlule.Izolo izalukazi namakhehla baqhinqe ngaphandle kweCity Hall, eThekwini befuna ukubona iMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede. Bathe kukhona abadla imali ababezothengelwa ngayo uKhisimusi wabo.Bebuzwa ukuthi kungani belinde kwaze kwaba wuMashi ukuze bathule izikhalo zabo, bathe bebengalindile kodwa bebelandela imigudu efanele.“Size sanquma ukuzoletha izikhalo zethu kwimeya ngoba ingumuntu wesifazane, izoluqonda usizi lwethu. Kudala sikhala esigabeni se-ward kodwa singayitholi incazelo ngoKhisimusi wethu. Siyazi ukuthi uMasipala weTheku wayikhipha imali yokuthi senzelwe uKhisimusi kodwa asikaze siwuthole, uyasisiza uKhisimusi ngoba siye sithole umtsholwane onokudla noncamnce,” kusho omunye.Baphinde bathi njengoba bekuna imvula amanzi angenile ezindlini zabo kodwa akekho obahlolile ukuthi baphatheke kanjani.“Uma udaba lwethu lungaxazululwa ngeke sivote ngoba sifuna ukwazi ukuthi imali kaKhisimusi wethu ishonephi? Sifuna nabaholi abasilalelayo. Uma bezosicela ukuthi sivote, asikwazi ukubalalela ngoba sifuna abaholi abasinakekelayo,” kusho omunye.Imizamo yokuthola ikhansela laku-ward 102 uMnuz Siyabonga Thango, ukuba liphawule ayiphumelelanga. Ucingo lukaThango belungena kwi-voicemail.UMnuz Martin Xaba oyiNhloko yoPhiko olubhekelele izindaba zeMeya yeTheku uNkk Gumede uthe : “IMeya ihlangene nabadala futhi icele abasebenzi ukuthi baphenye ukuthi kungani uKhisimusi wabadala ungabanga khona. Igqugquzele zonke izakhamuzi ukuthi ziphume ngobuningi bazo ziyovota ngoMeyi 8.Uma izakhamuzi zinezingqinamba ezithile kufanele zizibike ezinhlakeni eziseduze nazo.Njengomasipala onakekelayo sizimisele ukulalela nokulungisa izikhalo zabantu sisebenzisa izinhlaka ezifanele.”
title: Izaguga zisabisa ukuduba ukhetho ngolukaKhisimusi

text: IZITSHUDENI ezifundela ubudokotela e-University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN), seziqale umkhankaso wokuqokelela isikhwama sokutakula ozakwabo abakweletayo ukuze babhalise. Lezi zitshudeni ezingaphansi kophiko iNelson Rolihlahla Mandela School of Medicine, zizimisele ukuqoqa uR1 million ukutakula abakweletayo. Bangu-118 abafundela ubudokotela kulesi sikhungo, osekuqinisekiswe ukuthi bayakweleta.Lo mkhankaso obizwa nge#IMadeADoctor, usungulwe ngezinye izitshudeni ezizwelana nalezi ezikweletayo.Usungulwe emuva kokuvela kokuthi zilinganiselwa ku-16 000 izitshudeni zase-UKZN ezisemkhakheni ehlukene, ezikweleta imali yokufunda.Iningi lazo zixhaswe iNSFAS kodwa izikweletu zazo zangonyaka odlule aziqediwe.Lezi zindaba zidale imibhikisho kwavalwa nesikhungo njengoba kuvele ukuthi abakweletayo kumele bazikhokhele u-15% emalini abayikweletayo.UXoliswa Njapha oyiStudent Support Service Officer kwiSRC ophikweni lodokotela e-UKZN, uthe bakhathazekile ngalezi zitshudeni ezingase zingaqedi ukufunda.Ukhale ngokuthi ukufundela ubudokotela kuyabiza, kunzima ukuzikhokhela uma usalindele uxhaso.“Bangu-118 asebesibikele ngokusemthethweni ukuthi bayakweleta.“Bekungcono phambilini, inyuvesi ibikwazi ukuxhasa abakweletayo kodwa manje sebebaningi kakhulu.“Izitshudeni ezithintekile zifundiswa uNSFAS, ongajwayele ukukhokhela zonke izindleko zokufunda ngonyaka wokuqala.“Yilokhu okwenza ukuthi abaningi kuthiwe bayakweleta njengoba nenyuvesi ingasakwazi ukubaxhasa,” echaza.Uthe ukuqala lo mkhankaso kube yisu lezinye izitshudeni. Uthe uma bebala abakweletayo bathole ukuthi badinga uR1 million.Umkhankaso bawuqale ngesonto eledlule kanti leli yisonto elokugcina lokuqokelela lesi sikhwama.UXoliswa uthe banxenxa noma ngubani ongafaka isandla kulesi sikhwama.Imininingwane yemikhankaso bayifake ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngaphansi kwe#IMadeADoctor.“Uma ukwazi ukuxhasa kulo mkhankaso uyobe usize ukwakha udokotela njengoba sibadinga kuleli kodwa imali yokufunda ingekho,” kusho uyena.Phakathi kwezitshudeni ezikweletayo kukhona esikweleta uR200 000 igama laso eligodliwe. Kudingeka sizikhokhele * -15% walesi sikweletu ukuze sikwazi ukubhalisa nonyaka.
title: Banxusa   izakhamuzi zizikhiqizele odokotela

text:
ATHOLWE ephelelwe amandla esigangeni amantombazane amabili okusolwa ukuthi abethunjwe ngabantu abangaziwa, eBhamshela ngaphandle kwaseDalton.U-Amanda Duma (16) noBukeka Jaca (14) abagcinwa ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni ekhaya eBhamshela, batholakele ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Uyise walezi zingane uMnuz Mbongeni Zama, uthe ngoMsombuluko ebusuku uthole umyalezo ngabathole lawa mantombazane ephelelwe amandla esigangeni.“Okwamanje sisabonga ukuthi babuyile futhi baphephile. Okwamanje basagcinwe esibhedlela njengoba betholakale bephelelwe amandla. Asazi noma kukhona yini izidakamizwa noma ukulimala abakutholile.“Ngokusho kwabo bahlangana nabantu abangabazi babathela ngokuthize okwabadaka. Baphaphame sebesendlini abangayazi bevalwe amehlo. Nabo abazi baphunyuke kanjani,” kusho uZama.FUNDA: 
Badidekile kulahleka abafundiUZama uthe uke wathola usizo lwamakhathakhatha esintu nasola ukuthi nakho kulekelele ekutholakaleni kwala mantombazane.U-Amanda okuyingane kamfowabo ifunda eKwaNondenisa High, uBukeka yena ufunda eSikhulile High.Laba babekade begcinwe besemcimbini wemiklomelo esikoleni sika-Amanda kodwa wenziwe ehholo lesikole iSikhulile.Kuthiwa bathathwe yilabo bantu abangaziwa ngesikhathi sebeya ekhaya.Ngokusho kukaZama, umbiko kadokotela uveza ukuthi abazange badlwengulwe kodwa basabhekwa isimo sempilo yabo nokuthi azikho izidakamizwa ezisetshenzisiwe kubona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Col Thulani Zwane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lawa mantombazane abuyele ekhaya.
title: Atholwe esigangeni etubekile amantombazane 'abethunjiwe'

text: ZIMAPEKETWANE izinto kwiVuma FM emuva kokuvela ukuthi umbango wezikhundla ushisa phansi.Kuthiwa umbango sewuze waholela ekutheni kumiswe umsakazi uVictor Rose Jnr.Umthombo uthe umphathi wezinhlelo uPatrick Bogatsu usejutshwe ukuthi abambe amasonto amabili kwiVuma bese amanye amabili awasebenze kwiRise FM eMpumalanga. IVuma FM neRise FM okwandawonye.“Uma uPatrick engekho kubamba uLekomotion, uMakhosi Khoza noVusi Letsoalo.Uthe ngemuva kokuhamba kukaNtobeko Mabika, okungacaci ukuthi waxoshwa noma wazihambela, kwafakwa uVictor Rose Jnr esikhaleni sakhe. UNtobeko wayengena ngo-12 kuya ku-3 emini phakathi nesonto.“UVictor kuthiwe akangene aze ayivale ngoMgqibelo enze uhlelo luka-10 kuya ku-2. Lolu lwangeSonto kwathiwa akaluyeke. NgeSonto ubengangeni kwangaba khona muntu emoyeni. Bekuze kunqamuke kungekho muntu. UPatrick umfonelile emcela ukuthi aphuthume emoyeni ngoba uhlala eduze. Kungenzeka ukuthi wakhohlwa ukufaka umuntu ozobamba.”Umthombo uqhube wathi uVictor wayephuza nabangani bakhe ngalesi sikhathi ethintwa nguPatrick emcela ukuthi aye emoyeni. Uthe uVictor uye ehamba nabangani bakhe, wangena nabo estudiyo.“Esinye sezikhulu sithe uma sifika sashutha ivideo sayithumelela kumphathi omkhulu, uPearl Sokhulu, efuna uku­khombisa ukungahleleki kwezinto njengoba umuntu ofakwe emoyeni efike nabangani bephethe utshwala. Ugaxele kanjalo uVictor. Njengamanje uhlelo lwakhe lubanjwe nguLucky Sefatsa.”Imizamo yokuthola okhulumela isiteshi uTee Van Heerden ayiphumelelanga.
title: Umbango wezikhundla eVuma FM

text: UYACHICHIMA yinjabulo umrepha uGigi Lamayne ngokusayina inkontileka yokuqopha ne-Ambitiouz Entertainment ngemuva kokushiya eMabala Noise Entertainment.Isolezwe labika ngokushiya kwalo mrepha eMabala Noise ngoDisemba wonyaka odlule. Wayesayine kuyo nenqwaba yabanye abaculi ngo-2016.Ephawula ngokuhamba kwakhe wathi wayengasajabulile futhi kungasasebenzeki. Wathi ngeke akwazi ukwanda kakhulu. Uthe ngendlela ajabule ngayo uhluleka ngisho wukuzibamba.“Inkontileka yami yinhle kakhulu. Iyona enhle okuwedlula wonke kwesengake ngaba nawo,” kusho uGigi.Uthe wayevele efuna ukusebenza ne-Ambitiouz kodwa isikhathi singakavumi.“Kwakukhona omunye umrepha wesifazane futhi kwakungeke kulunge,” kusho yena.Umrepha akhuluma ngaye nguFifi Cooper oshiye le nkampani nyakenye kungasekuhle, wazimela ngokusungula inkampani yakhe.Uveze ukuthi ngemuva kokuhlukana neMabala Noise, uqale izingxoxo ne-Ambitiouz.“Ngihambise izicelo zami ukuthi ngibe nenkontileka ehambisana nezidingo zami. Kube wumdanti, inkontileka ihamba iphinde ibuya kubameli kwagcina kulungile. Ngijabule kakhulu. Ngifuna ukusebenza, okunye kuzobe sekuzilandelela,” esho kuzwakala ukuthi weneme.NgoLwesine olwedlule ukhiphe ingoma yakhe yokuqala e-Ambitiouz ethi Iphupho.“Ngasekupheleni konyaka ngizokhipha i-albhamu ephelele. Kuzoba wunyaka omuhle lona. Ngisenkampanini okumele ngibe kuyo.”Uthe ukubheke ngabomvu ukusebenza nomculi wakule nkampani uLa Sauce nabanye, okubalwa kubo uSjava.Lo mrepha waqala ukuzakhela ugazi ngengoma yakhe ethi Ice Cream. Ekupheleni kuka-2016 ukhiphe i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala neMabala Noise ethi, Genesis ayefisa ukutholaigolide ngayo okuyinto egcine ingenzekanga. Ngonyaka odlule ukhiphe izingoma ezihamba ngazodwa, okukhona kuzo ethi My Ugly Boy, Lobola nethi 1-Bar.
title: Kufezeke iphupho kuGigi nge-Ambitiouz

text: KUBE nomunyu nosizi ngesikhathi imindeni yabangu-13 abashone kudilika udonga esontweni beyokhomba izidumbu zabo emakhazeni aseRichards Bay, izolo.Kuqhume isililo, abanye baphuma emakhazeni sebebanjiwe ngesikhathi eminye imindeni izobona okokuqala izidumbu zezihlobo zabo ezishone emuva kwesibhicongo esenzeke e-Pentecostal Holiness Church, eDlangubo eMpangeni ngoLwesine ebusuku.UMfundisi PY Sibiya, oyiCentre Manager yebandla, uthe abanankinga nokufika konjiniyela ukuzobhekisisa isakhiwo sebandla ukuthi ngabe sakhiwe kanjani.“Okwamanje siqashe onogada ukuba baqaphe, kuze kube kufika abezimo ezibucayi bakhiphe izikhwama zabazalwane namaselula abo avalelekile. Sizobalindela onjiniyele bafike bezohlola, siyibandla asinankinga nalokho. Izandla zethu zivulekile,” kusho uMfundisi Sibiya.Uthe ukwenzeka kwalesi sigameko kubahlukumezile kakhulu abazalwane njengoba kwenzeke phambi kwabo bebuka.“Ngingomunye wabantu abebekhona ngesikhathi kwenzeke lokhu. Nami nje ngizodinga ukwelulekwa ngokomqondo njengoba uhulumeni esilethele abantu abenza lo msebenzi. Kunzima esikubonile, kuqale phansi ubuhlungu sesiphelezela imindeni izokhomba izidumbu zabo,” kusho uSibiya.Umndeni ka- Andiswa Mthabela/Mthembu (13), oshone nogogo wakhe uNkk Thembi Mthabela (54), uthe kusenzima ukwamukela okwenzekile.Isihlobo sakhona uMaSibisi Mthabela uthe laba bebengahlukani.“Kusihlukumezile kakhulu ukubona umzukulu nogogo wakhe. Uma ungakaboni isidumbu somuntu uke uzikhohlise ube nethemba, uma usubabonile kuphela konke, sekucaca ukuthi bashonile ngempela. Kubuhlungu ngoba bebengahlukani, bebezwana kakhulu njengoba beshone ndawonye nje, “ kusho uNkk Mthabela.Umndeni wakaLanda nowakaMzila okhulume neSolezwe ubukhala esifanayo.UMnuz Buhle Mzila, ushonelwe udadewabo abebelamana naye uNksz Samke Mzila (34), obesebenza kuMasipala wasoLundi.“Ushiye ingane yakhe abebehambe nayo beye esontweni, eneminyaka engu-10, yona elimele yaya esibhedlela. Manje isiphumile, kuyihlukumezile ukutshelwa ukuthi unina ushonile. Kuningi udadewethu abekwenza njengoba besibambisene naye ekhaya ngokuningi, silahlekelwe,” kusho uMzila.UMnuz Sakhile Langa, ulahlekelwe unina uNkk Alta Langa (75), obehamba nabazukulu esontweni.“Kubuhlungu kakhulu ukulahlekelwa umama esenkonzweni abeyithanda, kunzima ukwamukela kodwa akukho esizokwenza. Sizolinda uphenyo ukuze sithole ukuthi kwenzakalani,” kusho uLanga.UNgqongqoshe wezabaSebenzi kuleli, uNkk Mildred Oliphant, uthe imindeni izofihlwa ngeSonto ngokwehlukana kanti belekelela imindeni ngezindleko.“Okwamanje onjiniyele bazoya beyobheka imbangela yalesi sehlo, bazobe sebeletha umbiko. Okuzovela embikweni kuyobe sekukhomba ukuthi kuzokwenzakalani ngalesi sigameko. Okwamanje okubalulekile ukufihla abashonile ngesizotha, sisize nemindeni,” kusho uNkk Oliphant.Inkonzo yomkhuleko yayizolo ibihanjelwe nayizimeya namakhansela ahlukene. Bekukhona nabaluleka ngokomqondo. NgoLwesine kulindeleke ukuba kube nenkonzo yesikhumbuzo khona kuleli sonto.
title: Umunyu kukhonjwa 13 wabashonile

text: SEKUVELE ukuthi uzohamba ngokufa kuZalo, uZandile MaNzuza Mdletshe olingiswa nguLeleti Khumalo osekwaqinisekiswa ukuthi uyashiya kulo mdlalo.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba uMaNzuza uzoshona bese enzelwa umngcwabo omkhulu.“Njengamanje kunezinhlelo zokuthi kubuyiswe abalingisi bakudala abazothamela umngcwabo,” kusho umthombo.UMpumelelo Bhulose owayedlala indawo kaGxabhashe noBonga Dlamini owayenguMkhonto bathe abakathintwa. UBhulose uthe akuthintwe abadidiyeli.Akucaci ukuthi uzofa kanjani kodwa kulezi zinsuku uzama ukusondelana kakhulu no-Advocate Bheki Zulu (Luthuli Dlamini) ababenobudlelwano bezothando naye kudala.Ubudlelwano bukaMaNzuza noZulu buzoba yindaba esematheni KwaMashu kanti kuzomhlukumeza kakhulu uMfundisi Mdletshe (Glen Gabela) ukubhidlika komshado wakhe.UMdletshe usazothwala kanzima njengoba kunemizamo yokumketula esontweni kodwa uzolwa.Umbango wesonto uzomenza asondelane noMaMlambo (Gugu Gumede) abake baba nobudlelwano naye phambilini.Umqondisi woZalo uMmamitse Thibedi uthe abalingisi ababuyayo yinto abafuna imangaze ababukeli futhi ngeke baze bayidedele imininingwane okwamanje.Izolo abasebenzi balo mdlalo babuyele emsebenzini bezoqala ukuqopha isizini yesine ngemuva kokuhlaba ikhefu.UMmamitse uthe konke kuhamba kahle lapho kuqoshwa khona.“Abalingisi bangasibona sakha kabusha imindeni futhi sipholisa amanxeba amadala. Kule sizini kuzo-bonakala kudlo-ndlobala umbango phakathi kwezelamani. Omunye ugxile ebugebengwini kanti omunye usebenzisa isonto ukulwa izimpi zakhe,” kusho uMmamitse.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe umbango uzoba phakathi kukaQhabanga (Siyabonga Shibe) ozoba mningi esontweni noNkunzi (Masoja Msiza).
title: UMaNzuza uzophuma ngebhokisi kuZalo

text: ZIMKHALELE umlisa (52) waseNyezane otholakale nezibhamu, izinhlamvu nensangu.Lokhu kulandela ukugasela kwamaphoyisa aseLadysmith namaphoyisa ophiko lwePublic Order Police endaweniyaseMangwe.Lo mlisa utholakale nezibhamu ezimbili, esisodwa esiyinhlokohlela nezinhlamvu ezingu-20 nesibhamu esincane esinezinhlamvu ezingu-36. Uphinde watholakala nensangu engamakhilo angu-190 nokukholakala ukuthi uma idayiswa ingabiza uR95 000.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker uthe lo mlisa oboshiwe bekulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eBergville izolo.“Lo mlisa ubhekene namacala okutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni nokutholakala nensangu.”Uthe kulo mkhankaso kuphinde kwaboshwa owesifazane waseMandabeni otholakale nevolovolo. Naye bekulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eBergville ngecala lokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa uLt Gen Khombinkosi Jula uwancomile amaphoyisa ngomsebenzi awenzile okubopha laba basolwa nokuthola izibhamu.
title: Kuboshwe otholakale nezibhamu nensangu

text: KUMINZE umfana (8) obekade ebhukuda nabangani bakhe emfuleni uMlaza eLamontville ngoMgqibelo emini.Isidumbu sakhe sitakulwe ngamaphoyisa angabatshuzi emfuleni eduze kwemijondolo eMega Village izolo ekuseni.Kuthiwa ilanga ebelishisa liholele ekutheni umfana nabangani baye kobhukuda emfuleni behamba ngendlela ecashile futhi engaziwa.Emva kokuminza kwakhe, kuthiwa kubathathe isikhathi eside abebebhukuda naye ukuthi batshele abazali ngokwenzekile ngenxa yokwesaba.Ikhansela lendawo lishaqekile ngokuminza komfana ngenxa yokuthi kuthiwa bese kuneminyaka eminingi kwagcina ukwenzeka into efuze lena.UNksz Nolubabalo Mthembu uthe kungokokuqala emuva kweminyaka eminingi kwagcina ukwenzeka esemncane.Uthe indawo okwenzeke kuyo iseduze nemijondolo.“Ngibikelwe ukuthi izingane ziye kobhukuda emfuleni zihamba ngendlela engaziwa ecashile. Zisabile ukusho ukuthi kukhona ominzile ebezihamba naye, zaze zasho emva kwamahora mbalwa. Sicela abazali bagade izingane zabo zingasondeli emfuleni futhi kungabhukudwa kuwo.”Uthe umfula ubukade ushile kodwa emuva kwemvula esanda kuna eThekwini ugcwalile, okungenzeka ukuthi iyonanto eholele ekutheni izingane ziyobhukuda.Uthe umasipala udonsa kanzima ukuthola umhlaba okuzokwakhelwa kuwo labantu izindlu.“Laba bantu sebehlale kule ndawo iminyaka ecela kwemihlanu manje. Igceke labo wumfula ngenxa yokuba seduze kakhulu nawo. Umfula ugcwalela kubona uma lina,” kusho uNksz Mthembu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aseMlaza avule idokodo ngokufa komuntu.Uthe umfana uhlangabezane nobunzima ngenkathi ebhukuda waminza.Isidumbu sakhe sitholwe wuphiko lwamaphoyisa eDurban Search and Rescue nabebebambisene nabo.Ngesonto eledlule amaphoyisa  akhiphe isexwayiso sokuthi abantu bagweme ukubhukuda noma yikuphi ezindaweni eziyingozi.Athi abantu kumele baqaphele uma bebhukuda olwandle, emadamini nasemifuleni.Lokhu ayekusho ngenxa yokwanda kwesibalo sabantu abaminzayo noma abamukayo njengoba sekuqale ukushisa.
title: Umfana (8) uminze ebhukuda emfuleni

text: KUQHILIKE izihlathi bejabulela ukwamukeliswa impahla yokwakha imikhukhu yesikhashana izolo, abantu abakhahlanyezwa yizikhukhula zango-Ephreli kulo nyaka ezadlula nemiphefumulo eminingi eThekwini.UNksz Zama Muthwa (52) ongowokudabuka eMbumbulu indlu yakhe eyacekelwa phansi yizikhukhula ngasekuqaleni konyaka, oyilunga leminye yemindeni esaqube etendeni eliseResevoir Hills kusuka kwenzeka le nhlekelele, uthi nakuba benikelelwa ngempahla yokwakha imikhukhu abazolindela kuyo, kodwa bazizwa beneliseke kakhulu ngoba nabo sebezokhululeka njengawo wonke umuntu.“Sijabule kakhulu. Bekunzima ukuhlala etendeni sibaningi izinyanga ezinhlanu. Ngiphoqeleke ukuthi ngihlukane nendodakazi yami ebengihlala nayo ngaphambi kokuba kuguguleke indlu ebesihlala kuyo, enye ngayiqashela kwenye indawo ngoba ifunda esikhungweni semfundo yamabanga aphakeme ngakho bekuphoqa ukuthi ihlale lapho izokwazi ukuqhubeka nokufunda ingaphazamiseki,” kusho uNksz Muthwa.Uthe isimo besinzima kakhulu kulezi nyanga ngoba kuphoqa ukuthi noma ngabe ufika sekuhwalele uphuma etohweni, ubugezela emnyango noma ucele abesilisa balinde ngaphandle.USihlalo wekomiti lokuhlaliswa kwaBantu neNgqalasizinda eThekwini uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo obeqhuba lolu hlelo lokwamukelisa le mindeni engu-17 izinsiza, uthe nakuba benikezwa impahla yokwakha izindlu zesikhashana ezizokwakhiwa emijondolo engasemgwaqweni uGerman, eThekwini, basazokwakhelwa izindlu zomxhaso kahulumeni kodwa imijondolo izokwakhiwa ukuze bakwazi ukulindela kuyo.“Le ndawo abazokwakha kuyo imijondolo ihlolisisiwe ukuthi noma kungafika ziphi izikhukhula ngeke kube nomonakalo njengoba kwenzekile ekuqaleni konyaka,” kusho uSabelo.Uthe okwenze kwathatha isikhathi eside ukuthi kubhekelwe laba abakhahlamezekile kube yinqubo kahulumeni eyenza ukuthi uma kube nenhlekelele, imali yokuhlinzeka usizo kwabakhahlamezekile iphasiswe wumengameli okuba nemigudu ethatha isikhathi eside.Uthe ukunikelwa kwempahla yokwakha izindlu zokugoba amadlangala kuzosabalala nazo zonke izindawo ezine zeTheku kubantu abahlala emahholo omphakathi nasemateneni athe kuzophela amasonto amathathu sekuphothuliwe ukunikezwa le mpahla yokwakha imijondolo emiphakathini abahlala kuyo.Uthe ukwakhiwa nokufakelwa kukagesi namanzi ezindaweni eziyimijondolo akusho ukuthi kuthunyelwa umyalezo othi abantu sekuyindawo okumele bahlale kuyo unomphela, kodwa umasipala unezinhlelo zokubakhela izindlu ngenhloso yokunciphisa imijondolo ezindaweni ezakhele iTheku.“ Isibalo semijondolo siyakhula kunokuba sehle. Lokhu kubangelwa wukuthi abantu basuka ezindaweni ezahlukene ukuzohlala eThekwini ngenxa yomsebenzi. Ngakho sithi kumele abantu besalinde ukwakhelwa izindlu, bahlale ezindaweni lapho bengeke bakhahlanyezwe khona yizinhlekelele futhi bathole zonke izidingo ezifana nogesi, amanzi nezindlu zangasese,” kusho uSabelo .Uthe zivele zikhona izindlu ezakhiwayo kodwa abakugcizelelayo wukuthi kusheshe ukwakhiwa kwazo ngakho ababhekelele ukwenziwa kwalo msebenzi kumele bazisheshise izinhlelo zokwakhela abantu.
title: Injabulo bamukela impahla yokwakha imijondolo eThekwini

text: UHLANGABEZANE nezimbila zithutha ziholwa emhlophe phambili uSihlalo we-ANC kuzwelonke uMnuz Gwede Mantashe ohhewulwe amalungu enhlangano abethukuthele eveva ngokubhuntsha kwengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi KwaZulu-Natal e-University of Zululand ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.UMantashe ubengesinye sezikhulu zobuholi bukazwelonke ebezithunywe ukuzobheka ingqungquthela egcine ivinjwe yiNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngomzuzu wokugcina, ngoLwesihlanu.Inkinga iqale ngesikhathi uMnuz Sihle Zikalala osebuholini besikhashana ethula uMantashe ethi akakhulume.Uthe uyasukuma kwaqubuka omkhulu umsindo wengoma ethi ‘Wenzeni uZuma’ kushaywa namatafula kakhulu ephazanyiswa.UMantashe uzamile ukuma isibindi phambili elinde kubohle ulaka lwamalungu abevutha bhe kodwa adloba kakhulu. UZikalala ubuyele embhobhweni wakhuza ethi ayihlale phansi ibambe umthetho, kube ngathi kuyabohla kodwa uma kusondela uMantashe kuqale phansi.Ugcine esehluthuka uMantashe ethi uzokhuluma ngenkani ngeke ezwe ngabantu abagqugquzela ubuqembuqembu.Kube uyinyathele emsileni njengoba evele adloba amalungu kaKhongolose emthuka echitha izandla ebuza ukuthi yini azoyitshelwa wuMantashe.UZikalala uphinde wangenela eyalela ezinye izikhulu ukuba ziye eduze kwamalungu zihlanganise amakhanda zizwe ukuthi olwani ulaka.Amalungu abelokhu ememeze njalo ethi ngeke akwazi ukulalela uMantashe ngoba akukho okusile azokusho.UZikalala ugcine esevula ithuba lokuthatha imibuzo nezikhalo ngokuthi amalungu aphakamise izandla akhonjwe bese ebuza.Ngokubona ukuthi isimo asisalawuleki ugcine exosha bonke abezindaba ethi abaphume bayolinda phandle sekuxoxwa ezesifuba zomndeni kaKhongolose.Elinye ilungu elisukume kuqala lazethula ngokuthi linguMnuz Mthokozisi Nojiyeza osuka eThekwini, likhale ngokubi khona kweqiniso enhlanganweni.Lathi maningi amaphutha abe khona ngesikhathi kulungiselelwa ingqungquthela.UZikalala umemezele ukuthi le ngqungquthela izoqhubeka kodwa ibe ngeyokuxoxisana ngeke isabukhetha ubuholi njengoba bekulindelekile.Isinqumo senkantolo sokuvimba ingqungquthela sidunge imimoya yezithunywa ebezidangele zihlangene amaqoqwana zidabukisa, zizodwa ebezikhala ngesikhathii sazo ezisimoshele umbhedo.Abanye bekhala ngokuthi bashiye izingane namadoda abo emuva emakhaya. Abanye besifazane beshaya umthandazo omncane bethi kazi konakelephi kuKhonglose nezinkantolo.
title: UMantashe uthwale kanzima kweye-ANC

text: USIPHATHISENE Dube odlala umdlalo wombhoxo uthi ukuyodlala phesheya ithuba elingandele bani nakholwa wukuthi kuzomthuthukisa kakhulu.UDube (27) odabuka eMvuyana eFilidi usanda kufulathela elaseNingizimu Afrika esebhekise amabombo eFrance lapho eyodlala kwisizini eyoze iphele ngonyaka ozayo.Lo mdlali omandla nasekuzivocavoceni kuzobe kungokwesithathu eyodlala ezweni elingaphandle.Usekuleli zinga akulo namuhla waqala ukudlala lomdlalo esafunda amabanga aphansi nokwathi uma esesemabangeni aphezulu wathola umfundaze. uyodlala isizini yonke ezophela ngoJuni ngonyaka ozayo.“Ngikhumbula ngenkathi ngisafunda emabangeni aphansi sasidlala ngenzinyawo.“Kwathi uma sengifunda amabangeni aphezulu kwadingeka ukuba sidlale ngamakhokho. Kwangisabisa lokho mina nokwenza ukuba ngifune ukuyeka kodwa ngatshelwa ukuthi uma ngiyeka bazongiphuca umfundaze,” kusho uDube.UDube kuyamjabulisa ukuthi akayekanga kodwa waqhubeka wabekezela nokwaba isisekelo sempilo ayiphilayo njengamanje.Umfundaze iwona owamsiza ukuba aqhubeke nezifundo zakhe nezasenyuvesi efundiswa yiwo umdlalo wombhoxo. UDube wake wadlala nakwiSharks Academy la ekuqeqeshwa abadlali abanekhono.“Ekhaya ngisaqala babesaba ukuthi ngizolimala kodwa kwathi uma sengiya eFrance okokuqala ngo-2008 ilapho babona khona ukuthi ngizimisele ngalomdlalo bamukela ukuthi into engiyithandayo.”UDube ongumzukulu kamfundisi uthi wakhulela komalume wakhe laphoafunda khona inhlonipho nokuziphatha.“Lomdlalo ungifundise lukhulu ngempilo okubalwa yona inhlonipho ngoba kumele uhloniphe ozakwenu kanye nabaphathi bomdlalo njengoba wenza ekhaya kini okanye emphakathini wakho,” kusho uDube.Uthi abantu abaningi bathi lomdlalo owabantu abamhlophe kanti akunjalo ingoba abantu abamnyama abafuni ukufunda yonke into ngawo. Baqinisa kulento abayaziyo kuphela nokwenza bancishelwe amathuba.Ukhuthaze abadlali bebhola lombhoxo abamnyama ukuthi bazikhuthaze ekuzilolongeni. UDube ongumdlali wamaBidvest Crusaders uphinde abe umsunguli weDurban Beach Touch lapho wonke umuntu onothando lomdlalo wombhoxo engakwazi ukuthi athole khona ulwazi namasu angamsiza ukuthi aphumelele.“Ngisakhula ngangidlala ibhola , ikhilikithi nebhola lombhoxo kodwa ngakhetha ibhola lombhoxo. Into engiyithandayo ngebhola lombhoxo ukuthi liyimpilo futhi isifundisa inhlonipho nokuzithoba.”Lo mdlali othanda ukudlala kwiiSevens uthi wahehwa kudlala yona ngoba kudingeka ube nobuhlakani namaqhinga ongawasebenzisa ukuze uphumelela.“Kufanele ukhethe ngokushesha ukuthi uzolikhahlela ibhola noma uzogijima nalo,” kusho uDube.Uthi uma uyifly half udinga ukuthi uhlezi ukhuluma nabanye abadlaliubatshela ukuthi kufanele benzeni. Usho lokhu uDube nnjengoba ngesonto elidlule iqembu lakhe lifike kumaSemi Final omncintiswano lwamaSevens abeseThekwini.
title: Kuzomthuthukisa ukuyodlala eFrance

text: I-IFP ifuna uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni aphenye kabanzi ngenkampani ebiphekela abafundi abebesekhempini e-Adams College, omunye wabo okusolwa ukuthi ubulewe ukudla okunoshevu ngesonto eledlule.UNkk Thembeni Madlopha-Mthethwa okhulumela i-IFP ophikweni lwezemfundo, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ngoLwesibili babhalele umnyango befuna izimpendulo ngokushona kukaMxolisi Mzulwini.UMxolisi (20) obefunda eMasakhane High eMbumbulu, ushone ngoLwesithathu olwedlule emuva kokukhala ngesisu nokushisa esifubeni.Kuthiwa wabuya ikhempu ingakapheli ngenxa yokugula.UNkk Madlopha-Mthethwa uthe kumele uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane aqoke ithimba elizimele elizophenya njengoba bebaningi nabanye abafundi okuthiwa baguliswe ukudla.I-IFP ifuna ukwazi ukuthi iyiphi inkampani ebiqashelwe ukuphekela abafundi nokuthi yayinakho yini okudingeka uma uzophekela abafundi.“Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi yiziphi izinhlelo ezizokwenza ukuthi kuhlolwe zonke izinkampani eziphekela abafundi uma kunamakhempu.“Ingabe umnyango uzothatha ziphi izinyathelo uma inkampani ebipheka itholakala inecala?“Sifuna nokwazi ukuthi yimiphi imigudu elandelwayo uma kukhethwa inkampani ezophekela abafundi,” kuchaza uNkk Madlopha-Mthethwa.Uthe bakhathazekile ukuthi ezinye izinkampani zisuke zifuna imali kuphela kodwa zihluleke ukupheka ukudla okulungele abafundi.UMnuz Phikinkani Mzulwini onguyisemkhulu kamufi uthe bebezimisele ukungcwaba ngoMgqibelo kodwa basalinde umphumela wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu.Uthe bathemba ukuthi umphumela uzocacisa nokuthi ubulelwe yini uMxolisi.“Bathe asilinde bona bazosishayela ucingo uma sekukhona umphumela.“Okwamanje asinaso ngisho isitifiketi sokufa, kunzima nokwena izinhlelo zomngcwabo,” kusho yena.UMzulwini uthe okwenza basole ukuthi umzukulu wakhe uguliswe ukudla, ukuthi wahamba engenalutho ekhaya.Uthe wabashayela ucingo esesekhempini ekhala ngesisu nesifuba.Uveze ukuthi bamtshela ukuthi akabuye, waya emtholampilo washonela ekhaya ebusuku ngoLwesithathu.Isolezwe lithole ngothisha ocele ukungadalulwa othe baningi nabanye abazali ababike ukugula ezinganeni.Uthe uthishanhloko usenkingeni ngoba abazali babuza kuyena, ekubeni ubengeyona ingxenye yohlelo lwekhempu yabafundi.Okhulumela uMnyango uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa uthe ngeke baphawule ngamahlebezi kodwa bazolinda umbiko wesekethe ngokwenzekile.
title: I-IFP ifuna incazelo ngomfundi obulawe ukudla

text: UTHOLE isikhundla esisha kwi-ANC uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, owahlulwa esikhundleni sokuba nguNobhala jikelele we-ANC engqungqutheleni yale nhlangano eNasrec, eGoli, ngoDisemba nyakenye.UMchunu, oke waba nguNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal ngaphambi kokuxoshwa wubuholi be-ANC obabuholwa nguMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uzoba ngomunye wabagqugquzeli benhlangano kanti uzosebenza ngokugcwele.UNobhala jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, uthe uMchunu uzosebenza njengomgqugquzeli kwi-ANC.Uthe amanye amaqabane kudingeka asebenze ngokugcwele kwi-ANC.“UMchunu noDakota Legoete bazosebenza ngokugcwele. Kube nesiphakamiso sokuthi kukhona okuzodingeka ukuthi basebenze ngokugcwele,” kusho uMagashule owahlula uMchunu ngamavoti ambalwa eNasrec.UMchunu kuyaziwa ukuthi ubekhankasela uRamaphosa engahlonizi kuyiwa engqungqutheleni eNasrec.Kuke kwavela izinsolo zokuthi njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi kube nezinguquko kwiKhabhinethi kaRamaphosa, uMchunu ungomunye wabantu abebebhekwe ukuthi abe kwiKhabhinethi yakhe.UMchunu, oyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC, uphinde abe yilungu lekomiti le-ANC elibheka ukusebenza kwansuku zonke okuba amalungu angu-20.UMagashule, obekhuluma ePitoli izolo njengoba bekunomhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu, uthe yilungelo likaRamaphosa ukuqoka iphini likamengameli wezwe.“Asikho isidingo sokuthi alukhulume nesigungu esiphezulu lolu daba. Uzolukhuluma nobuholi obuphezulu nezinye izinhlaka okubalwa namadlelandawonye udaba lokwenziwa kwezinguquko kwiKhabhinethi,” kusho uMagashule.IPhini likaMengameli we-ANC, uMnuz David Mabuza, kulindeleke ukuthi likhethwe kwesokuba yiphini likaRamaphosa kuhulumeni.
title: UMchunu esikhundleni esisha kwi-ANC

text: USHAYWE wabulawa owesilisa (32) ohlala emijondolo yaseSidakeni, eNyoni, okuthiwa usole omunye wesilisa abebeqashe naye kule mijondolo ukuthi upanse owesifazane.Lesi sigameko senzeke ngeSonto ebusuku ngesikhathi umufi, uMnuz Xolani Masondo ephuma emcimbini nesithandwa sakhe.Ngokusho kukaNksz Zakude Mhlongo (42), bebephuma emcimbini nesoka lakhe ngesikhathi kuba nokuhilizisana phakathi kwabo ngoba limtshela ukuthi owesilisa othile ubepansa intombazane abayaziyo. “Ngiyibuzile leyo ntombazane ukuthi umfana obeshiwo wuXolani uyipansile yini yathi cha. UXolani ube esengixhakathisa saxabana. Singene endlini kwafika abafana abane bamshaya bathi uqambela oyedwa wabo amanga. Bathe usekhathele wukushaya mina usengena izindaba zabo. Bebemgxoba, ngayocela usizo.”Ngesikhathi eyocela usizo uNksz Mhlongo uthi ushiye uMasondo esagandaywa amadoda amane.“Ngize ngasizwa abanye omakhelwane abashayele amaphoyisa ucingo. Ngihambile ngayobheka umngani kaXolani (Masondo) komunye umuzi obunomcimbi ebesihleli kuwona kodwa angizange ngimthole. Ngithe sengifika ngathola uXolani eselaliswe embhedeni, ekhihliza amagwebu, ebengakhulumi ngisho ngizama ukumsula. Ngibabizile laba akade bemshaya omunye wabo wathi sebeyobonana kwelizayo.”UNksz Mhlongo uthe ibihlungu le nto emehlele ngoba uXolani ubewumuntu aphilisana kahle naye kodwa ubulawe abantu akade eqashe nabo eSidakeni.“Kufike abezimo eziphuthumayo bathi ngeke bakwazi ukumsiza ngoba ulimele kakhulu. Amaphoyisa abize abamakhaza okuyibona abafike bathatha isidumbu sakhe. Ngifuna bajeziswe wumthetho abafana ababulale uXolani ngoba ubengabenzanga lutho,” kusho uMhlongo.ULt-Col Thulani Zwane wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe kuboshwe amadoda amane aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-21 no-24 ngesonto ebusuku.“Amaphoyisa aseNyoni avule icala lokubulala emuva okuthi owesilisa eshaywe ngamadoda amane ngezinduku, wakhahlelwa nangamabhuzi waze washona. Abasolwa baboshwe ngeSonto emuva kokuthi amaphoyisa eqale uphenyo lwawo. Kulindeleke ukuthi bavele enkantolo yeMantshi yaseNyoni maduze,” kusho uZwane.
title: Indoda ikhahlelwe yashaywa yashona

text: KUGCINE kuyilungele iKaizer Chiefs ngomdlali waseMadagascar  u-Andriamirado "Dax" Andrianarimanana ebihluleka ukumbhalisa ngokugcwele kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) kwazise iqembu lakhe elidala, iFosa Juniors, belishaya amakhala. Leli qembu laseMadagascar belisola iChiefs ngokumtshontsha lo mdlali kodwa sekugcine kulungile kuGiovanni Solinas kulandela ukungenelela kweFifa. Obekwenza kube nokungaboni ngasolinye naleli qembu laseMadagascar ukuthi belifuna inkokhelo kanti iChiefs yazi ukuthi izitholele umdlali obengenayo inkontileka kwazise ubengadlali eligini ekhokhelayo.UDax ubezisholo yena ukuthi akanankontileka neFosa Juniors kodwa leli qembu elidlala kwiMalagasy FA belimphikisa lisola iChiefs ngokweba. Lokhu kuphoqe iChiefs ukuba iludlulisele kwiFifa lolu daba kwazise iFosa ibingafuni ngisho ukudedela amaphepha abedingeka ukuze abhaliswe kwiPSL. Usenesikhathi esayinile kwiChiefs uDax kodwa sesizoba sincane isikhathi abalandeli baleli qembu abazosilinda ngaphambi kokuthi bambone lo mdlali onegama nesibongo okuzoba yinkinga kwabaningi ukukuphimisa. IFifa ivune iChiefs ukuba ingambhalisa lo mdlali oneminyaka engu-27.
title: Usengadlala uDax weChiefs

text: MLUNGISI GUMEDEABALA ukhasha amaphoyisa izolo eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini lapho kuqulwa khona icala lombango wobuholi baseBuhleni exosha kwani eyilungu lebandla elingenalo ithikithi lokungena ngaphakathi.Amaphoyisa aseqinise isandla ngenxa yokubheduka kodlame phakathi kwamalungu aseBuhleni asehlukene kabili sekukhona nalawo azinze eThembezinhle aholwa nguMnuz Vela Shembe.Besekujwayelekile ukuthi uma ehlangene kube nokuzwana amandla emagcekeni enkantolo.Ngaphambi kokuba icala liguqe iJaji u-Achmat Jappie laxwayisa amalungu ngokulwa uma eze enkantolo.Esehlakalweni esisha amalungu ajahana emigwaqweni yeTheku kwaphazamiseka amabhizinisi nabantu abasuke bezizele edolobheni.AbaseThembezinhle banquma ukuthi bahoxe ukuza enkantolo ngaphambi kokuba liguqe icala, ukugwema ukuthi kungabi khona ukubhekana ngeziqu zamehlo nabaseBuhleni.Umyalelo wokuthi amalungu ebandla angabe esasondela emagcekeni enkantolo kuthiwa ukhishwe uKhomishana wamaphoyisa, uGeneral Mmamonnye Ngobeni. Kodwa izolo okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uMajor Thulani Zwane akazange akwazi ukukuqinisekisa lokho wathi uzokwazi ukukuqinisekisa namhlanje.Izolo amaphoyisa awaxoshile amalungu abemi ngaphandle kwenkantolo awatshela ukuthi awasavumelekile.Emgwaqweni uMargaret Mncadi (Victoria Embankment) ibikhona imithonseyana yamalungu ehlezi iba khona ilinde labo abebengaphakathi enkantolo ukuba bazobabikela ukuthi bekwenzekani.Izolo bekusaqhubeka inkosi yakwaQwabe, uMakhosini Qwabe, nokwethula ubufakazi ihlohlwa imibuzo wummeli womholi waseThembezinhle, uVela “Misebeyalanga” Shembe, u-Advocate Archie Findlay SC. ubuze uQwabe ukuthi yisiphi isizathu esabenza ukuba bavakashele inkosi eseyakhothama, uVimbeni “Thingo” Shembe benenkosi yamaQadi, uMqoqi Ngcobo.UQwabe uthe babona inkosi ingekho entabeni eNhlangakazi bakhathazeka base beyoyibheka. Bathi uma befika eBuhleni inkosi (uThingo) bayifica ilele kusofa yase itshela uNgcobo ukuthi oyisemkhulu sebeyayizungeza isiyabona ukuthi seyizokhothama noma yinini. “Yathi singakhathazeki ngoba ukhona uMD Shembe uzoqhubeka nomsebenzi,” usho kanje.UFindlay uthe uThingo lwaligagula yini igama noma lasho izinhlamvu ezimele amagama omuntu olwabe lumusho, uQwabe uthe lwaligugula kodwa yena wathi uthathe isinqumo sokuthi asebenzise izinhlamvu uMD ngoba esindwa wukulibiza igama.UFindlay uphinde wabuza ukuthi wamuzwa yini uNgcobo ngesikhathi kutshalwa uThingo ethi yena njengeNkosi yamaQadi unelungelo lokubeka inkosi yamaNazaretha (eBuhleni) njengoyise ongasekho, uMzonjani, naye owenza ebeka inkosi eseyakhothama iNyangayezulu. Uthe wamuzwa. Kuthiwa uMzonjani wayalela Inyangayezulu ukuthi ithathe ubhoko ihole abantu.UFindlay uphinde wabuza uQwabe ukuthi wayenakho yini ukuqonda ukuthi uNgcobo uzokwenza isimemezelo ngesikhathi kutshalwa inkosi ngokuthi ngubani okumele ahole ibandla, wathi wayengalindele. Icala liyaqhubeka.
title: Amaphoyisa aqinisa isandla ecaleni lombango waseBuhleni

text: KUSENGENZEKA noma yini ngesicoco seligi okwenza umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uSteve “Mphathi” Komphela angaliboni iqembu lakhe selidlalela ubala emidlalweni eyisikhombisa esele kwi-Absa Premiership.NgoMgqibelo iChiefs izokwamukela AmaZulu FC eFNB Stadium ngo-6 ntambama. Lo mdlalo uzofika Amakhosi eseziqhathululile osizini lokushaywa ngomakhelwane i-Orlando Pirates koweligi, okwenze abanye bakungabaza ukuqina kombango wawo wesicoco seligi.Ngokudedela amaphuzu amathathu kulo mdlalo, ezikaKomphela kuzishiye zingemuva ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili kwiMamelodi Sundowns eqhwakele.Ngempelasonto zidlulele kuma-quarterfinal eNedbank Cup zishaya iStellenbosch ngo 2-1.“Cha, cha, asemaningi amaphuzu asazodlalelwa. Kuningi okusengenzeka. Uma ubheka umdlalo weSundowns bese kuba owePirates, kusazodlalwa. Yileyo kuphela indlela okumele ubuke ngayo izinto ngoba size lapha ukuzosebenza,” kusho uKomphela.Yize iChiefs ibiqala ukuhlulwa iPirates kusukela kuqale umzuliswano wesibili weligi, beyingaqali ukulahla amaphuzu. Idedele ayisithupha idlala ngokulingana neSundowns, iBloemfontein Celtic neBidvest Wits.Uma izimisele ngokuhlalisa lubhojozi amaqembu angaphezulu kumele ingabe isalahla lutho, iwaqoqe wonke amaphuzu angu-21 asazodlalelwa. Uma yenze njalo izoqeda inamaphuzu angu-56 bese ke imincele ukuthi, iSundowns, Pirates, Free State Stars neMaritzburg bonke bayaqhuzuka.“Izoba khona ingcindezi emdlalweni (waMaZulu) ngoba nawo azobe ezolwa njengoba efuna ukuzibona ekwiTop 8. Ngemuva kokwehlulwa, ngeke neze kube wumdlalo olula. Banabadlali abahle okuzomele sibaqaphe,” kusho uKomphela.AmaZulu azofika emdlalweni ezikhotha amanxeba ngemuva kokushaywa Ubuntu Cape Town ngo 3-2 koweNedbank Cup Last 16. Iqembu likaCavin Johnson belifike lapha izinhliziyo zibuhlungu kade lishaywe iSundowns ngo 3-1 koweligi.Emzuliswaneni wokuqala Usuthu lwakwazi ukuthola iphuzu bebambana ngo 0-0 neChiefs eKing Zwelithini Stadium. AmaZulu agcina ukuwina kwiChiefs emdlalweni weligi ngo 2-1 ngo-2007 ngamagoli amabili kaLucky Mzizi. EleChiefs lashaywa nguSerge Djiehoua.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:NgoLwesihlanu: Maritzburg United v Polokwane City (Harry Gwala Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Chippa United v Free State Stars (Sisa Dukashe Stadium, 3.30pm); Kaizer Chiefs v AmaZulu FC (FNB Stadium, 6pm); Golden Arrows v Orlando Pirates (Princess Magogo Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Bloemfontein Celtic v Platinum Stars (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: Kusengenzeka noma yini ngesicoco: Steve Komphela

text: OBENGUMENGAMELI wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma usephinde wazithola ekolunye utaku lwezomthetho njengoba inkantolo isinqume ukuthi akhokhele izindleko zecala lokuphikisa umbiko wowayenguMvikeli womphakathi u-Advocate Thuli Madonsela.INkantolo eNkulu yaseGauteng ngoLwesihlanu inqume ukuthi uZuma awukhokhe yena uR10 million wezindleko zokulalelwa kwalolu daba. Kuphuma lesi sinqumo nje, kuvele kulindwe esinye njengOba iDA ne-EFF beyise uZuma enkantolo befuna azikhokhele yena izindleko zamacala okukhwabanisa abhekene nawo.IDA ne-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) bafake icala enkantolo ngoba befuna uZuma akhokhe uR15.3 million osusetshenzisiwe emacaleni akhe.Le mali isetshenziswe kusukela ngo-2006 ngesikhathi kushushiswa uZuma ngodaba lwama-spy tapes.UMmeli weDA u-Adv Sean Rosenberg uthe kushushiswa uZuma hhayi umbuso ngakho uhulumeni akufanele akhokhele abameli bakhe.Inkantolo yazise uZuma ukuthi akelulekwanga kahle ngesikhathi aziswa ukuthi kumele aphikise umbiko woMvikeli Womphakathi, u-Adv Thuli Madonsela, ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana. Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo ukwenza lokhu kwadla imali kahulumeni ebalelwa kuR10 million.Ummeli kaZuma, u-Adv Muzi Sikhakhane uthe uZuma kwakumele awuphikise (appeal) umbiko kaMadonsela ukuze abe nesiqinisekiso ngokuthi ziphusile izincomo ayeziphakamisa kuwo.  USikhakhane uthe bazosiphikisa isamba semali okufanele ikhokhwe ngoba babona kufanele akhokhe engaphansi kwale.UZuma kulindele abuyele eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu ngokuphela kwale nyanga esebhekene namacala enkohlakalo yokuthengwa kwezikhali.
title: UZuma kumele azikhokhele izindleko zecala - Isinqumo senkantolo

text: UNCAMELE ukushiya kunokukhuhla ibhentshi uDove Wome obegijima kwiSuperSport United.UWome uqinisekisile ukuthi usehlukene naleli qembu lasePitoli ngoba umqeqeshi u-Eric Tinkler ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi ngeke ayivuselele inkontileka yakhe uma kuphela isizini.Njengamanje imenenja kaWome, uMichael Ngobeni we-M-Sports-Management, itshele Isolezwe ukuthi lo mdlali imzamela umsebenzi e-Azarbaijan.Exoxa naleli phephandaba uWome udalule okwenze wacela ukuthi akhululwe kwiSuperSport.“Umqeqeshi ungitshele emehlweni ukuthi ngeke ayivuselele inkontileka yami uma isiphela ngoJuni. Ngibone ukuthi kungcono ngihambe manje ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi angikho ezinhlelweni zakhe. Kusizani ukuhlala eqenjini obona kahle ukuthi awemukelekile kulona?Angifuni ukuqamba amanga iSuperSport ingiphathe kahle kodwa umqeqeshi ubengasithandi isitayela sami. Ebholeni kunjaloke, omunye umqeqeshi uyayithanda indlela odlala ngayo, kufike omunye uthole ukuthi akayifuni,” kusho uWome.UWome ubebolekiswe kwi-Orlando Pirates ngomzuliswano wesibili ngesizini edlule.“Uma ubheka isikhathi esiningi bengidlala uma sigijima kwiCAF Confederation Cup. Ngemuva kweCAF ngiqalile ngahlala ebhentshini. Nokho ngeke ngikhulume kabi ngo-Eric ngoba ungumqeqeshi oseqophelweni eliphezulu. Ukuthi akasithandi isitayela sami akusho ukuthi sekumele ngimbambele igqubu,” kusho uWome.UWome uke wamataniswa neCape Town City esanda kulahlekelwa ngabadlali abamqoka. Leli qembu lihlukane noLehlohonolo “Major” Majoro no-Aubrey Ngoma.“Okwamanje ngisajima ngedwa. Sihlukane kamnandi neSuperSport futhi imenenja yami imatasa izama ukungitholela ikhaya elisha. Indaba yase-Azerbaijan yinto imenenja yami esayihlanganisa.Okwamanje akukabi yinto eqondile. Uma sihluleka sizozama lapha eNingizimu Afrika,” kusho uWome.Namuhla iSuperSport izobhekana neBidvest Wits, eBidvest Stadium, ngo-7.30 ebusuku.
title: Uncame ukushiya kunokuqhinqa ebhentshini

text: UMCULI weKwaito, uMampintsha, uthe uzothandazela umsakazi weMetro FM izolo ebusuku oveze ukuthi usezohlakanisa nomyeni wakhe weminyaka. Lo msakazi weMetro FM owenza uhlelo lwantambama nomunye umsakazi wesilisa ekhasini lakhe lezokuxhumana, i-Instagram, uveze ukuthi usethathe isinqumo sokuhlukana momyeni wakhe kodwa basazoqhubeka babe abangani.“Ngithathe isinqumo esibuhlungu sokuhlukana nomyeni wami, isithandwa sempilo yami, indoda yamaphupho ami, usofa silahlane wami. Kwesinye isikhathi into enzima iyonanto enhle ongazenzela yona.
