Sisazoqhubeka sibe abangani, sibe abazali abaqotho ezinganeni zethu futhi siyohlezi sithandana sikhathalelana,” kusho lo msakazi.Imiyalezo yokumeseka lo msakazi ingene ilakanyana, abanye bemazisa ukuthi bayamthanda futhi uthathe isinqumo esihle ngokuhlukana nomuntu uma esebona ukuthi umshado wabo ubusungayi ndawo.Kosaziwayo abaphawulile kubalwa noMampintsha, osanda kukhuluma ohlelweni lalo msakazi, lapho aphekwa khona ngebhodwe elincane ebuzwa ngezinsolo zokushaya umculi owayengaphansi kwesitebele sakhe iWest Ink, uBabes Wodumo. UMampintsha uthe uzomthandazela lo msakazi kulesi sikhathi.“Uyabonake ubudlelwano bokuthandana ukuthi kunjani dadewethu...njengoba ngangishilo ngaphambilini, ubudlelwano kubuye kuxakane kakhulu. Kodwa ke nawe sizokuthandazela njengoba nathi sisasemthandazweni namanje. Inkosi ikubusise,” kubhala uShimora.Ngemuva kwalo mbhalo uthole ukugxekwa uMampintsha ngabalandeli balo msakazi abambone njengomuntu ongenazwelo. UMampintsha nokho uqhube wathatha lo mbhalo wayowufaka ekhasini lakhe ku-twitter wathi: “Siyabathandazela nalabo abangasithandi.”
title: UMampintsha uthandazela umsakazi weMetro odivosayo

text: AZOMENYEZELWA ngesonto elizayo amazwe abavakashi bawo abavumeleke ukungena eNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngo-Okthoba 1, kusho uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, izolo.Ubeyohlola ukuthi iyalandelwa imithetho yomvalelandlini ekusebenzeni kwesikhumulo sezindiza eKapa nokuthi sesikulungele ukwamukela izinkumbi zabavakashi abavela kwamanye amazwe.UMbalula uthe wonke umuntu ovela kwelinye izwe kumele abe nesitifiketi esithi uhlolelwe iCorona esikhathini esingaphansi kwamahora awu-72.“Izomenyezelwa ngesonto elizayo imithetho yezokuthutha yesigaba sokuqala somvalelandlini. Abagibela amabhanoyi abafake izifonyo ngaso sonke isikhathi baze bafike lapho beya khona. Asivunyelwe isibulalimagciwane,” kusho uMbalula.UMbalula waqala ngokuhambela isikhumulo sezindiza i-OR Tambo wadlulela eKing Shaka wavala ngesaseKapa.Yizona zontathu kuphela izikhumulo ezamenyezelwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi zizosetshenziswa kusukela ngo-Okthoba 1ukwamukela abavakashi abavela kwamanye amazwe.“Abeluleki bethu basitshelile ukuthi kuphephile ukugibela indiza futhi iyona ndawo engatholakali kalula kuyona iCorona. Abantu abaqinesekise balandela imithetho elwa neCorona futhi bafake izifonyo njalo. Isinqumo sokuvula izikhumulo sicatshangisiswe kahle.”Uthe abantu abagcwala ndawonye uma bephuza utshwala basethubeni lokusuleleka ngeCorona.“Uma abantu bephuza abazifaki izifonyo futhi abanandaba nokuthi kwenzekani lapho behlezi khona. Kumele baqaphele, ayikapheli iCorona yize iNingizimu Afrika iyixegisile imithetho. Uhulumeni ubelokhu elwa neCorona ngakolunye uhlangothi eqinisekisa ukuthi impilo ayimile kodwa iyaqhubeka.”UMbalula uveze ukuthi kube nokungenami kwabaphuza utshwala nababhemayo ngezinqumo ezathathwa uhulumeni empini elwa neCorona.Okuthutha umphakathi okuhamba amabanga amade kuzolayisha kugcwale kusuka ngenyanga ezayo.
title: ‘Bazokwaziswa abazongena ezweni’

text: SEZIQALILE izinhlelo zokulungiselela isizini yesibili yomdlalo iThe Herd ebikhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic yaphela ngo-Okthoba.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba, ukuthakaselwa komdlalo kwenze ababhali bawo baqala amalungiselelo esizini entsha.Lo mdlalo udidiyelwa yiSeriti Films kaKutlwano Ditsele phambilini oweyesebenza kwiBomb Productions ekhiqiza Isibaya neminye imidlalo.UKutlwano utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi bafihle induku emqubeni ngokuzokwenzeka ngesizini entsha.“Ngeke ngikwazi ukusho okwamanje,” kusho yena.“Sisabhala ukuthi umdlalo uzohamba kanjani, asikakabheki nokuthi yibaphi abalingisi esizobalanda,” kuchaza yena.Uthe bazoqala ukuqopha ngonyaka ozayo.IThe Herd ifike igabe ngabalingisi okubalwa kubo uWinnie “MaMngadi” Ntshaba owazakhela udumo enguKhethiwe kwiGenerations “endala”, Sello Maake Ka-Ncube odlala indawokaBhekisizwe Mthethwa, Sihle Ndaba onguKayise, Zethu Dlomo odlala indawo kaLwandle, Tiisetso Thoka onguDingane noPeter Mashigo odlala indawo kaMagubane nabanye abaningi.Ukubuya kwalo mdlalo ngeke kuthuse njengoba ikhona eminye ebuyayo kulesi siteshi njengeBeing Bonang S2 ezokhonjiswa kade idlala ku-1Magic, iKhayaelizoqala ngoJanuwari 7 neminye.
title: Uzobuya nesizini entsha umdlalo i-The Herd

text: NGEMUVA kokuvuma ukuthi ezakhe seziphumile embangweni wesicoco seligi, umqeqeshi weCape Town City, uBenni McCarthy uthe uselwela ukuqeda okungenani emaqenjini amathathu aphezulu okungasho ukuphucula indawo abaqede kuyona ngesizini edlule.Ukubalwa namaqembu amathathu aphezulu kwi-Absa Premiership kusho ukudlala emiqhudelwaneni yeConfederation of African Football (CAF) ngesizini ezayo.Amaqembu amabili azoqeda phezulu kwi-log azomela iNingizimu Afrika kwiCAF Champions League kuthi elesithathu lidlale kwiConfederation Cup.Nyakenye iCity idlalile kwiConfederation Cup yaphuma kusahlungelwa amaqoqo. Lo mkhuba wamanye amaqembu akuleli asheshe aphume kule miqhudelwano, uyagxekwa ngabanye abathi akhombisa ukuyibukela phansi.Ngabe uMcCarthy usekulungele ukuthi ezakhe zihambe ibanga elide kule midlalo?“Ngicabanga ukuthi kuhle kubadlali ukuthi badlale emiqhudelwaneni yeCAF ngoba bathola ithuba lokuzihlola namanye amaqembu ase-Afrika. Kodwa futhi kumele ubheke ukuthi sijule kangakanani isikwati sakho. Ngabe uzokwazi ukumelana nokudlala kwiMTN 8, Telkom Knockout, Nedbank Cup nakwiligi?“Uma ubheka le miqhudelwano iyasikhandla isikwati esinaso. Ngokwami le miqhudelwano (yeCAF) ifana nethuba lokuhlola abadlali bakho abehlukene kodwa uma wenza njalo uyagxekwa ngokuyibukela phansi. Abantu abakuqondi ukuthi yingoba usuke ungenaso isikwati esiqinile ukudlala yonke le miqhudelwano. Ukube nginebhajethi efana neyeMamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates, ngikwazi ukuthenga abadlali engibafunayo, angingabazi ukuthi ngabe ngihlezi ngilwela ukuyodlala kwiChampions League. Kuhle ukuthi sisengazibekisela indawo khona kodwa kumele sibe neqiniso, sikuvume ukuthi asinaso isikwati esanele sokufaka umbango khona. Ngale kwalokho ungazithola udlalela ukuwina indebe kodwa ekugcineni usale ulwela ukuvika izembe, isibonelo nje yiBaroka,” kusho uMcCarthy.Lo mqeqeshi ubekhuluma ngemuva kokuthi ezakhe zishaywe yiLamontville Golden Arrows ngempelasonto edlule.NgeSonto bazovakashela iBloemfontein Celtic eDr Molemela Stadium ngo-3 ntambama. Okwamanje iCity eqede endaweni yesihlanu ngesizini edlule ihleli endaweni yesine ngamaphuzu awu-40.
title: ‘Kudinga isikwati esikhulu ukudlala kweyeCaf’

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezindaba zoMdabu eNingizimu Afrika, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, uxwayise abantu bakuleli ukuthi yize sekungenwe esigabeni sesibili somvalelandlini kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi abantu mabakhohlwe wukuthi isababulala iCorona.UDkt Dlamini Zuma, izolo ubezocacisa ngemigomo yokungena kulesi sigaba esithangamini sabezindaba.“Kube yizinyanga ezihlanu ezinzima kakhulu kuleli. Leli gciwane lifike izinto eziningi kuleli zingekho esimeni esikahle, okubalwa amakilasi acinene, amanzi angekho kahle, imigwaqo nezinselelo kwezempilo. Yize kunjalo uhulumeni ushaye umthetho womvalelandlini ukuze kuvikelwe impilo yabantu bakuleli. Manje njengoba sekwehliswa isigaba somvalelandlini lokhu akusho ukuthi igciwane liphelile noma sekunekhambi, kusho ukuthi kumele siqikelele kakhulu kunakuqala ukuze siphephe. Uma kungenjalo abantu basazoqhubeka batheleleke, abanye bashone.”Uthe: “E-Eastern Cape, Western Cape naseGauteng siyehla isibalo sabantu abatholakala benegciwane. I-KZN iyona esisenenkinga ngayo, siyathemba nakhona igciwane lisazokwehla.”Utshwala uthe buzodayiswa ngoMsombuluko kuya ngoLwesine, ngo-9 ekuseni kuya ngo-5 ntambama.“Ezindaweni zobumnandi bangahlala abantu khona kodwa babe ngu-50 futhi kumele kulandelwe imithetho yezokuphepha okubalwa ukufakwa kwezifonyo, ukugezwa kwezandla nokuqhelelana. Izindawo zokuphuza ngeke zivulwe kuze kuse.”Uyale ukuba abantu bangaphuzi bese benza okuphambene nomthetho.“Njengoba buvulwa utshwala asibuphuze ngendlela efanele. Singaphuzi size sikhohlwe namagama ethu. Uma sesiphuzile sesibuyela emakhaya, masingashayeli. Asiphuze kahle, sivikele abasifazane nezingane. Ngeke sithande ukubuyela esigabeni esiphezulu sokusebenza kwezwe. Uma nibhema, ningabhemisani ugwayi owodwa ngoba ningathelelana,” kusho uDkt Dlamini Zuma. Mayelana nezinqumo ezithathwa nguhulumeni okubalwa ukuvalwa kukatshwala nogwayi obekugxekwa yena, uthe kuwukubeka phansi uhulumeni ukucabanga ukuthi izinqumo zithathwa nguyena yedwa.“Akuphethe umuntu oyedwa kuphethe umengameli nethimba lakhe. Wukunginika amandla engingenawo ukuthi yimina engithatha izinqumo.”Ezindaweni zokuzivocavoca uthe bangu-50 kuphela abantu abazovumeleka emajimini ngesikhathi. Imishado isivumelekile kodwa abantu babe ngu-50.Ezemidlalo zasemanzini okubalwa ukubhukuda, ukugwedla izikebhe nokunye kuvumelekile kodwa bangeqi kwabangu-50.UDkt Dlamini Zuma ugcizelele ukuthi uma kuvakashelwe abantu abadala, mabavikelwe ngoba basengozini yokuhlabeka ngenxa yokuthi banezinye izifo.“Izivakashi zingeqi kwezingu-10 ngesikhathi esisodwa emakhaya. Sekuvumelekile ukwenza umsebenzi emakhaya. Ukuvakasha kungaphenduki izinyembezi, sekumele kungcwatshwe abantu. Ama-cinema namapaki azovulwa.”
title: Luselude ukhalo ngeCorona - Dlamini Zuma

text: UMOLEFI Ntseki ugixatshezwe yiKaizer Chiefs ngesikhundla sokuba yinhloko yosomaqhinga kuleli qembu laseSoweto elisanda kuxosha uGavin Hunt obengumqeqeshi.Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe namhlanje usihlalo weChiefs, uKaizer Motaung. UNtseki oxoshwe ekubeni umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana ngoMashi unikezwe inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu eyi-Head of Technical and Youth Development Academy. Kuthiwe inombandela wokuyilula ngeminyaka emibili. KwiBafana uNtseki uxoshelwe ukuhluleka wukuyifaka kwi-Africa Cup of Nations eseCameroon ngonyaka ozayo. Uqashwa nje bekusabalele ukuthi uzofika kuMakhosi njengephini likaStuart Baxter okuthiwa ingase imbuyise ezothatha isikhundla esishiywe uHunt.“Sijabule kakhulu ngokuthola uMolefi Ntseki. UMolefi ufike ngesikhathi esifanele lapho senza izinguquko esikholwa wukuthi ziyadingeka eqenjini njengoba sibheke ikusasa. Siyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni siqashe umuntu ofanele kulesi sikhundla njengoba esebenze kuzona zonke izigaba zebhola, kusukela ezikoleni, intsha namaqembu esizwe,” kusho uMotaung esitatimendeni seqembu.Kuthiwe uNtseki uzobhekelela isikhungo sokuthuthukisa abadlali, izinhloli zeqembu, kuze kuyoshaya eqenjini elikhulu njengoba kubhekwe ukuthi iChiefs ibe nosikompilo olulodwa lokudlala, kusukela phansi kuya phezulu.
title: IChiefs iqashe uNtseki kwesikasomaqhinga

text: OWESILISA waseSoweto, eGoli, osolwa ngokubulala umndeni wakhe kuthiwa ugwaze izingane zakhe epaki abejwayele ukuyodlala kuyo nazo njalo ngezimpelasonto. Akukaziwa ukuthi inkosikazi yalo wesilisa ibulawe kanjani njengoba isidumbu sayo sitholwe sesonakele ehlathini ngaseJabulani Hostel, eZondi. Kusolwa ukuthi lo wesifazane (47) wabulawela ekhaya labo ngaphambi kokuthi isidumbu siyobekwa kwenye indawo. Kutholwa izidumbu zabo nje bekubike umndeni emaphoyiseni ngokuduka kowesilisa ongumsolwa oneminyaka engu-48, inkosikazi yakhe, nezingane ezimbili ezineminyaka engu-10 nengu-11 ngoNovemba 1 nonyaka.Owesilisa uqhamuke esehamba yedwa ngoLwesithathu ngaphandle komndeni wakhe. Ubanjwe amalungu omphakathi amyisa esiteshini samaphoyisa. Okhulumela amaphoyisa uBrigadier Mathapelo Peters uthe lo wesilisa uhole amaphoyisa ehlathini elingaseJabulani Hostel lapho kutholwe khona isidumbu somkakhe, waphinde wawayisa eMofolo Park endaweni ebizwa ngeFive Roses kwatholwa izidumbu zezingane. “Izingane zitholwe zinamanxeba okugwazwa amaningi. Ngokusho kwabantu emphakathini umsolwa ubeza kule paki nezingane njalo ngempelasonto,” usho kanje. UPeters uthe baphinde babheka ukuthi awekho yini amanye amacala okuhlukumeza ekhaya ake abikwa ngalo wesilisa kwatholwa ukuthi awekho. Umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo yemantshi eProtea ngoLwesihlanu.
title: Uvela namhlanje enkantolo ovale ngehlahla emndenini wakhe

text: KUBONGWE iqhaza elibanjwe ngosomabhizinisi abahweba ngotshwala abasalandela imigomo yokunqanda ukusabalala kweCovid-19, KwaZulu-Natal.IKwaZulu-Natal Liquor Authority (KZNLA), elawula ukudayiswa kotshwala ithi liwu-90% izinga lokulandelwa komthetho ezindaweni ezidayisa utshwala. Lesifundazwe sinezindawo ezingu-8 000 ezinamalayisensi azigunyaza ukuthi zidayise utshwala.Usihlalo webhodi leKZNLA, uNkk Mbali Myeni uthi basebenzisane namaphoyisa, ubuholi besifundazwe nezinhlaka ezahlukene beqinisekisa ukuthi, ilandelwa njengoba injalo imigomo enqanda ukusabala kweCovid-19 neyokudayisa kotshwala.UNkk Myeni uthe bavundulule izindawo eziyisithupha ebezihweba ngamalayisensi awumbombayi neziliphu zenkokhelo yawo.“Lezi zaphulamthetho sizibeke amacala zase zivela ezinkantolo. Ngesikhathi sikathaqa simise ukudayisa utshwala ezindaweni eziwu-22, ngamacala ehlukene okungalandelwa komthetho,” kuchaza uNkk Myeni.Uthe bazoqhubeka bagasele kungazelele muntu, ezindaweni ezidayia utshwala behlola ukuthi imigomo ebekiwe ilandelwa njengoba injalo.“I-KZNLA ngeke neze ikujabulele ukuphuca abantu ilungelo lokudayisa utshwala ngalesi sikhathi esinzima sezomnotho. Kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi abantu balandele imithetho ebekiwe yokudayisa utshwala. Abantu abazinakelele futhi bazivikele,” kweluleka uNkk Myeni.Le nhlangano elawulwa umnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuNgcebeleka nokoNgiwa kweMvelo ngaphansi kukangqongqoshe uMnuz Ravi Pillay, ithi izoqhubeka nemikhankaso elwa nodlame ngokobulili, ukugembula ngokungemtheho futhi iqinisekise ukuthi amakhasimende anikwa imikhiqizo evutshelwe ngendlela efanele.I-KZNLA ithi izoqhubeka nokusebenza ngokubambisana nabebhodi elibhekelele izindawo zokugembula, iKwaZulu-Natal Gaming and Betting Board.Kunxenxwe imiphakathi ukuthi ibike oskhwiliphambana nobhoko abaphula imithetho, kule nombolo yocingo ethi: 0800 00 44 24.
title: Kutuswa abadayisi botshwala abalandela imigomo yeCovid-19

text: ABAZALI baphoqe umnyango wezemfundo ukuthi umise omunye wothisha baseSiphosabadletshe High, eHluhluwe, ngenhloso yokuvikela impilo yakhe njengoba esolwa ngokuba nesandla ekuhayizeni umlibe kwabafundi.Basola lo thisha osesikhundleni nangokudala uqhekeko kothisha okugcina kuphazamisa ukufunda nokufundisa. Kuthiwa wamiswa nothishanhloko owagcina ehambile ngo-2017 ngenxa yokungqubuzana kwabo.Kodwa kuthiwa uvumbuke ngonyaka odlule ngaphandle kwencazelo yokubuyiselwa kwakhe esikoleni, evela emnyangweni wezemfundo.Ukuhayiza kwabafundi kuthiwa kuqale emasontweni amathathu edlule. Ngenxa yokubhebhetheka kwakho, uthishanhloko osabambile, ubize umhlangano womkhandlu olawula isikole kwase kubizwa nowabazali.Emhlanganweni wabazali, kunqunywe ukuthi amiswe lo thisha osolwa ngokuphatha amakhathakhatha, kwabizwa abathandazi abafike bakhuleka esikoleni. Umzali womfundi obesemhlanganweni okuthathwe kuwo izinqumo, ongathandanga ukudalulwa ephepheni, uthe abazali baphoqe umhloli nomqondisi ehhovisi lezemfundo eMkhanyakude ukuthi bamise lo thisha.“Selokhu ebuyile esikoleni ngonyaka odlule kuphazamiseka ukufunda nokufundisa futhi kunoqhekeko kothisha okuyinto ebingenzeki ngesikhathi emisiwe. Sisola lo thisha ngokuhayiza kwabafundi ngoba kunombango oshisa phansi wesikhundla sikathishanhloko. Njalo meke wanyathela emagcekeni esikole, bahayiza umlibe abafundi,” kusho lo mzali.Lo thisha umiswe ngeledlule.USihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole, uMnuz Nxeba Mhlongo, uvumile ukuthi lo thisha umiswe wumnyango.Uthe abazali bafuna izincazelo ngokobuyiselwa kwakhe esikoleni.“Kube nokuthula engekho, asisiboni isidingo sokubuyiselwa kwakhe ngoba isikole besenza kahle. Imiphumela ka-matric ibiwu-47% ngesikhathi esakhona, kamuva sithole * -76.3% esinovalo lokuthi uma eqhubeka esikoleni, izokwehla imiphumela,” kusho uMhlongo.Umthombo weSolezwe okulesi sikole uthe lo thisha uqale ukusebenza ngo-2000.Uthishanhloko okhona uneminyaka emithathu ebambe izintambo.Uthe zehlile izigameko zokuhayiza kwabafundi njengamanje luyaphela usuku kusahayize ingane eyodwa noma ezimbili okanye kuthuleke usuku lonke.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, uthe bayabethemba ubuholi bomnyango esifundeni uMkhanyakude, nezinqumo ozithathayo.“Sifuna kube nokuthula esikoleni, kungaphazanyiswa ukufunda nokufundisa. Siyethemba ukuthi isimo sizobuyela kwesejwayelekile maduze,” kusho uMthethwa.
title: Kumiswe uthisha ngokuhayiza kwabafundi

text: BAZOHOLA umholo owenyuswe ngo-7% okokuqala kule nyanga othisha bakwaGrade R.Lokhu kushiwo yiNhloko yoMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Enock Nzama, othe kunezingxoxo eziqhubekayo ngezikhalo zothisha bakwaGrade R.Ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa ukuthi othisha bazonyuselwa umholo ngo-7%, akwehlanga kahle ezinyunyaneni ngoba zithi imali incane. I-Sadtu ikhale ngokuthi sekunesikhathi eside othisha bakwaGrade R behola kancane, bengatholi ngisho amabhonasi.“Engingakuqinisekisa wukuthi bazowuthola umholo wabo wengezwe ngo-7% abanyuselwa ngawo.“Nokho ngeke bawathole amabhonasi phezu kokuba kade kunezikhalo. Udaba lwamabhonasi nokunye lusaxoxwa futhi siyathembisa ukuthi silubeke eqhulwini olothisha bakwaGrde R,” kusho uNzama.UNzama ukuqinisekisile ukuthi sifikile emnyangweni isicelo sokuthi othisha bakwaGrade R bathole amabhonasi. Izingxoxo mayelana nalokho ziyaqhubeka.Ngonyaka ozayo amehlo azobe ebheke kuNgqongqoshe womnyango, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ukuthi uthatha ziphi izinqumo ngodaba lothisha ngoba izinyunyana zisabisa ngokuqinisa isandla.UMengameli weNatu, uMnzu Allen Thompson, uthe yize benganeme ngo-7% kodwa akukho abazokwenza okwamanje.Uthe bazimisele ukuthi uma kuqala unyaka ozayo babuyele odabeni lwakwaGrade R, bavukuze nezinye izinyunyana nabo bonke othisha ukuthi bacindeze uhulumeni.UThompson usabise nangokuthi bazoba nemashi enkulu uma kuqala unyaka, ukufaka ingcindezi ngodaba lothisha bakwaGrade R.Kuke kwanezinkinga eziningi ngalabo thisha, obekuke kwenzeke kudlule izinyanga bengaholanga.Omunye uthisha ofundisa uGrade R esikoleni samabanga phansi eNgwavuma, ocele ukuthi igama lakhe ligodlwe, uthe balindele ukuhola ngaphambi kukaKhisimusi.Uthe bayazi ngo-7% kodwa bazokholwa sebewuthola emholweni.Uthe kuke kwenzeke bafakelwe imali, abanye bangayitholi.UNzama uphinde waveza ukwaneliseka kwakhe ngezinhlelo zokubhala nokumaka esifundazweni.Uthe unethemba elikhulu lokuthi isifundazwe sizofika ku-80% wokuphasa kuka-matric, abazibekele wona nonyaka.“Kusukela kuqale ukubhala konke bekuhamba kahle. Sibe nonyaka omuhle impela esithemba ukuthi nemiphumela izoba mihle.“Sijabulile nangokuthi ukumaka kuhamba kahle, akukho zigigaba ezinkulu zokuphazamiseka ezibikiwe.”
title: Uzonyuka ngo-7% owothisha bodado

text: KUHLEHLISELWE ikusasa ukuqulwa kwecala elibhekene namaphoyisa amane ekubalwa nowayeyiphini lomkhuzi wamaphoyisa eNorth West, uMajor-General William Mpembe. Leli cala bekulindeleke ukuba liqhubeke liqulwe  eNkantolo eNkulu yase-North West namhlanje kodwa kwangenzeka, njengoba abammeli babasolwa becele isikhathi ukuze babheke imiqulo ethize abayithole kumbuso. UMpembe, noMnuz Gideon van Zyl, uDingaan Madoda no-Oupa Pule  babhekene namacala okuphazamisa ukusebenza kombuso. Lamaphoyisa amabe aboshwa kulandela uphenyo lwe- Independent Police Investigative Directorate (Ipid), elathola ukuthi umsebenzi wasemayini uMnuz  Modisaotsile van Wyk Sagalala, washone wayesezandleni zamaphoyisa, engekho esibhedlela noma endaweni yesigameko lapho amaphoyisa adubula abantu abangu-34 emayini yaseMarikana ngo-Agasti 12 2012. Abasebenzi basemayini babetelekile befuna ukuthola iholo eliqala ku-R12 500 ngenyanga. Umbuso uthole ukuthi laba baqamba amanga kwikhomishini ka-Farlam, ekwakuphenywa kuyo  ngokubulawa kwabasebenzi bemayini, baphinde bahluleka ukubika ngokushona kuka-Sagalala. Ngaleyondlela baphazamisa ukusebenza komthetho, ngoba bethi wayeshonele esibhedlela. I-Ipid yabe isiphenya, kwavula icala ngoFebhuwari 2017, laba baboshwa ngoMashi 2018.
title: Lihlehlile icala elithinta nephoyisa eladuma eMarikana

text: USAFISA ukulanywa yinoma abangaki owesifazane ogane esithenjini eNdwedwe, obegcagca ngosuku olulodwa nomnakwabo.UNkk Thokozile Lushozi, uKaMakhoba (49), usehlale iminyaka engu-19 noMnuz Sabelo Lushozi (57) abegcagca naye izolo. Ugcagce nomnakwabo uNkk Khanyisile Lushozi, uMaKhumalo (43). UKaMakhoba othe wafika kwaLushozi eneminyaka engu-17, uthe wayevele efisa ukuthola umnakwabo ozomlekelela ngoba miningi imisebenzi emzini wakhe. ULushozi obeganwa izolo uyinyanga edumile eNdwedwe, aphinde abe nendawo yokusebenzela oThongathi.“Ngijabulile ukuthi ekugcineni sengize ngangena ngokusemthethweni kwaLushozi ngoba kade ngalinda. Bekukuningi ubaba obekumele akulungise, kwabambezela nomshado. Ngajabula ubaba engitshela ukuthi sekukhona uMaKhumalo ngoba bengivele ngigqilazeka. Engingakuthandi ukufihlelwa uma sekukhona olandelayo. Namanje anginankinga ngisho ngingalanywa abangaki ngoba mningi umsebenzi layikhaya. Ubaba uyinyanga usebenza nabantu kakhulu, kudingeka sibuye sibasize, sipheke namakhambi,” kuchaza uKaMakhoba.Uthe akaze abe nenkinga yokuhlala noMakhumalo, abapheka ekhishini elilodwa naye.UMaKhumalo uthe wafika kwaLushozi esazi ukuthi uyoba ngowesibili.“Siphathene kahle noKaMakhoba kungathi udadewethu. Akukho esikwenza singabonisananga. Sihlukana ngoba sekuyolalwa. Umuntu unezinsuku zakhe zokuvakashelwa ubaba futhi asinankinga,” kusho uMaKhumalo.ULushozi obehleka yedwa, uthe ubesalungisa izinto zasemsamo nezomndeni njengoba ebengakwazi ukugcagca. Uthe akaze aganwe phambilini, yingakho enqume ukuthi abashade ngosuku olulodwa ngoba vele bayezwana.“Engikwenzayo ngikutshelwa ngabaphansi engisebenza ngabo, yibona nabangivumele ukuthi amakhosikazi ngiwashade ngosuku olulodwa. Bangibonisa la makhosikazi, yingakho sihleli ngokuthula,” kusho uLushozi.Ebuzwa ngemfihlo yokwenza isithembu sakhe sizwane, uthe ukuthi wasinikwa abaphansi akazenzelanga. ULushozi uthe yize okwamanje emphethe kahle amakhosikazi akhe, ngeke aphike ukuthi ngeke esaganwa. Uthe ukhokho wayenamakhosikazi angu-19. Ugcizelele ukuthi akukho okwakwenziwa uKaMakhoba obekungamanelisi kodwa wathatha uMaKhumalo ngoba kuwumyalelo wabaphansi. Umphakathi ubuphume ngezinkani kule ndawo uzobuka umngcagco.
title: Usafisa ukulanywa obegcagca nenyanga

text:
S’BU MASANGOEbika eseKranskopABAFUNDI baseTheo Hlalanathi Secondary KwaMenyezwayo, eKranskop, maphakathi neKwaZulu-Natal, babhale izivivinyo zabo izolo begadwe ngamaphoyisa ngemuva kwempi yabafundi eqale ngeledlule.Umphathi wesiteshi saseKrankskop uColonel Caroline Minnaar ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bazoqhubeka nokuqapha isimo ngelokhozi kulesi sikole. Uthe ngoMsombuluko kube nabafundi ababili abaphuthunyiswe emtholampilo belimele. 
Isolezwe lihambele kulesi sikole ngoMsombuluko isimo sishubile abafundi begcwele igceke othisha nekomiti elilawula isikole bevalelene emhlanganweni ngenhloso yokuthola isixazululo kulolu daba.Bekugcwele amaphoyisa ezolamula le mpi ephakathi kwabafundi. Uthishanhloko unqabile ukunika imininingwane nomsuka wale ngxabano yabafundi.Ilungu lomphakathi elikhulume ne
Solezwe lithe le mpi iqale ngokuthi abafundi bagwazane ngaphakathi esikoleni. Lithe kube sekungenelela abanye abafundi abazwelanayo nalaba bafundi, kwaliwa kwagcina kuphazamiseke ukufunda.NgoMsombuluko ekuseni kuthiwa kulimale abafundi ababili okuze kwadingeka ukuthi kungenelele amaphoyisa. Omunye wabazali obezobheka isimo esikoleni utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi ingxabano iqale ngeledlule.Uthe le ngxabano iholele ekutheni bashayane kwangenelela abanye kwaba wukuqembuka kwamaqembu amabili alwayo kumanje.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi lithe abafundi uma bengaphakathi esikoleni bashayana ngamatshe kodwa uma sekuphume isikole bahoshelane izinduku, ocelemba balimazane.Yize leli lungu lomphakathi lingaqinisekisanga ukuthi bangaki abalimele selokhu kuqale le mpi kodwa lithe bakhona abalimele. Liqhube lathi abanye abafundi abasalubhadi esikoleni ngenxa yokwesaba ukuthi bangase balalelwe unyendle endleleleni.Omunye umzali obephuma esikoleni uthe abantu abasusa lolu thuthuva ngabafundi abangafuni ukufunda. Uthe uma kubhekwa abaluqalile kuyatholakala ukuthi ngabafana abahluphayo vele abangenandaba nesikole. Uthe sebenqume ukuthi babaxoshe laba bafundi ukuze kuqhubeke ukufunda.
title: Babhale izivivinyo begadwe ngamaphoyisa

text: ISIKHONDLAKHONDLA senkampani ekhiqiza inyama yenkukhu iRainbow Chicken eHammarsdale, sizovala izindawo zaso zokusebenza ezingu-15 kwezingu-25 ngenxa yokuthwala kanzima okudalwe inyama yenkukhu eqhamuka ngaphandle.Akuzogcina lapho njengoba le nkampani esiyaziwa ngeRCL Foods, izodiliza abasebenzi abangu-1 350 ekupheleni kukaJanuwari ngenxa yokushoda komsebenzi.IMike’s Chicken eseLimpopo nesibe khona iminyaka engu-38, ikhiqiza inyama yenkukhu ePolokwane, isivaliwe kwathi abantu abangu-1 000 balahlekelwa wumsebenzi.ICountry Bird eseFree State naseNorth West okungeyesithathu ubukhulu kuleli ngokukhiqiza inyama yenkukhu ngaphansi kwe-Astral Foods (Mpumalanga, Gauteng, Western Cape, KwaZulu-Natal ne-RCL) yona izodiliza abasebenzi abangu-1 500.Kuleli sonto imenenja yakwaRCL Foods, uMnuz Scott Pitman ithe ibingasazi ukuthi ikuphi okumele ikwenze ngaphandle kokudiliza abasebenzi.“Ukudiliza abantu abangu-1350 ekupheleni kwenyanga kuzoba yinto enzima kakhulu kumina, selokhu ngaba kuleli bhizinisi. Ungabadiliza kanjani nje, kodwa abantu abaningi kangaka asebekusebenzele iminyaka eko-40 ngokwethembeka,” kubuza uPitman.Uthe uhulumeni awenzanga mizamo ukulawula izinkampani zangaphandle ukuletha inyama yenkukhu kuleli. Uthe i-Europe neBrazil isebenzise leli thuba ukuletha izindimbane zenyama yenkukhu kuleli.Ngesikhathi iSunday Tribune enguzakwabo weSolezwe ngeSonto livakashele abasebenzi eHammarsdale, bebengafuni ukukhuluma ngalolu daba kodwa bakuveza ukuthi bathukuthele.Abasebenzi abadilizwayo banikwe ilungelo lokuthi bazithathele ama-package noma bafake izicelo zomsebenzi kabusha.UKatishi Masemola ongunobhala wenyunyana yabasebenzi bezinkampani zokudla, iFood and Allied Workers Union, uthe kumele abasebenzi batelekeni ngenxa yalesi simo. Uthe ukulwa kwabasebenzi akubhekisiwe ezinkampani ezidayisa inyama yenkukhu, kodwa nazo izinkampani ziyizisulu kulesi simo.
title: Kuzovalwa ngehlahla iRainbow Chicken idiliza

text: KUFANELE kube ngumlayezo ocacile emaqenjini adlala kwiNational First Division (NFD) ukuthenga kwePretoria University (amaTuks) abadlali abasha abaholwa yingwazi enguCollins Mbesuma, owaduma kwiKaizer Chiefs.UMbesuma, njengensephe enguSiyabonga Nomvethe, ubalwa kubadlali abambalwa abayibambe kwiChiefs, Orlando Pirates nakwiMoroka Swallows - okungamaqembu amathathu amakhulu aseSoweto.Enjalo nje, njengoNomvethe uMbesuma ubalwa kubagadli abahlanu abanamagoli angaphezu kuka-100 kwiPremier Soccer League.UMbesuma uphethe irekhodi lamagoli amaningi ngesizini ngawu-34 awashayele iChiefs sekuhlanganiswe yonke imiqhudelwano ngesizini ka-2003/2004. Awu-25 aweligi yiwo ayirekhodi elisamile.Ngesizini edlule lo mgadli waseZambia ubekwiMaccabi FC, ayisize isuka kwi-ABC Motsepe League.Ukuthenga kwamaTuks lo mgadli kucacisela ngisho ingane encane ukuthi akhombisa ukuthi ngesizini ezayo azimisele ukulwela ukubuyela kwi-Absa Premiership.Akusiye yedwa uMbesuma avuke ngaye amaTuks kwazise kukhona no-Athenkosi Dlala ongomunye wabadlali abebegqamile kwiMultiChoice Diski Challenge ngesizini edlule, Nqubeko Dlamini obengukaputeni futhi eyisethenjwa se-University of KwaZulu-Natal ngesizini yayo yokuqala kwiVarsity Football.Sebebonke abadlali bamaTuks abasha:uNqubeko Dlamini, Sphamandla Mntambo, Clive Gumede, Sphamandla Nzuza, Athenkhosi Dlala, Collins Mbesuma, John Tshabalala, Sphamandla Mlilo, Luvolethu Mpeta, Mosesenyane Maswanganye noKatlego Mohamme.
title: AmaTuks azogadla ngowaduma kwiChiefs

text: ZAKHELE XABAUMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, ubona ukuba nolwazi lokudlala kuneCovid-19 luzobenza babengcono kune-Orlando Pirates abadlala nayo namuhla kowe-Absa Premiership.Umdlalo useDobsonville Stadium, eSoweto, ngo-6 ntambama. EzikaMosimane zizoya emdlalweni zishayela phezulu kulandela ukudlulela kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup emuva kokuhlula iBidvest Wits ngo 3-2 ngempelasonto edlule.“Yebo, sinalo ulwazi ngaphezu kwePirates. Singasho ukuthi sisendaweni engcono kunabo ngoba sesiyazi ukuthi kwenzekani. Kuzoba nzima. Sidlala neqembu ebelikade liphumule libuka lapho thina sinabantu abadonsekelwa yimisipha. Kodwa nayo iPirates izoba nalo ithuba (lokwehlelwa okusehlele). Wonke umuntu uyeza. Sisesimeni esingcono ngokuthi sesidlalile kodwa okubi ukuthi sidlala neqembu eliphumule ngokwanele. Kuzoba wumdlalo omkhulu kodwa ngeke kube yilona owake wabonakala. Kuzoba ohluke kakhulu,” kusho uMosimane.Ukulimala kwabadlali namaphutha enzeka enkundleni ngezinye zezinto okungabuzwa ukuthi zizokhathaza abaqeqeshi abaningi. UMosimane uthe abangakadlali abavale imilomo ngoba abazi lutho.“Siyalazi manje ibhola ngaphansi kweCovid-19. Sesingaphawula. Kodwa uma ungakaze udlale, ngeke ukhulume. Uma ungakaze ubhekane nenkinga yokudonseka umsipha njengoba kwenzekile ku(Siphelele) Mkhulise noRivaldo (Coetzee) okucishe kwamvelela, akukho okwaziyo. Awazi nokuthi ungazithola ushintsha abadlali ababalulekile njengoThemba Zwane noSibusiso Vilakazi. Amaqembu angakhuluma ngebhola kuneCovid-19 yilawa asedlalile.”
title: UPitso uthi isipiliyoni seCovid-19 sizosiza ezakhe kwiBucs

text: PHILI MJOLIBANGU bangu-700 othisha okumele basuke ezikoleni abebefundisa  kuzo baye kwezinye ngenxa yokuthi kwabebefundisa kuzo isibalo sabafundi sinciphile.UMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe kulabo thisha bangu-521 okulindeleke ukuthi baye ezikoleni ezintsha namhlanje.UMahlambi uthe ekuqaleni konyaka umnyango uthole ukuthi bangu-961 othisha okumele basuke ezikoleni ebebefundisa kuzo baye kwezinye ngaphansi kohlelo iPost Provision Norm (PPN) , abangu-700 kubo  kuphele ikota yokuqala bengakayi kulezo zikole."Lo 521 okulindeleke ukuthi namhlanje uye ezikoleni ezintsha uyingxenye yalabo thisha abangu-700. Sinxusa othishanhloko namalungu ezigungu zokuphathwa kwezikole, iSchool Governing Body (SGB)  ukuthi bangabavimbeli othisha ngoba lokho kuzobe kungukwephula umthetho," kusho yena.UNkk Nomarashiya Caluza, unobhala weSadtu kulesi sifundazwe,  uthe ukuhamba kancane kwalolu hlelo kuphazamisa ukufunda ezikoleni."NgoLwesihlanu sibizele umnyango emhlanganweni  sifuna ukuba usichazele ukuthi kumi kuphi njengoba sesingena kwikota yesibili kunabafundi abangenabo othisha. Ngokwazi kwethu, bangu-700 abangakayi ezikoleni ezintsha. Umnyango uthe abangu-521 sebenikeziwe izikole ezintsha, lokho okusenzeke emaphepheni kuphela. Siyezwa ukuthi unxusa ukuthi ama-SGB abangaxoshi othisha. Empeleni iSGB ayivumelekile ukuthi ingenelele kulolu hlelo. Kungumsebenzi kathishanhloko ukuthi eluleke iSGB ngemithetho okumele ilandelwe ezikoleni ngoba yona ayibona othisha," kusho yena.Uthe nakubona othisha kuyenzeka bangathandi ukususwa lapho kade befundisa khona ngezizathu ezehlukene."Ngeshwa awukho umthetho okhava uthisha ekutheni  aqhubeke nokuhlala esikoleni okumele ngabe akasekho kuso. Umnyango kumele usheshise  lolu nohlelo lokuqasha ngoba ngaphandle kwalabo thisha abangu-700 kuvele kunezikhala ezevile ku-800 zothisha kulesi sifundazwe. Lezi zikhala ngezothisha bezibalo, abe-Afrikaans nabanamakhono adingeka ezikoleni zabafundi abakhubazekile okuvamise ukuthi kube         i-woodwork, ukuthunga nezinye. Kulaba abasuswa kwezinye izikole beya kwezinye awekho lawo makhono. Akumele silokhu sigidagida kulolu hlelo sengathi yilona kuphela olwenza kushode othisha ezikoleni. Umnyango kudingeka uqashe,"  kusho yena.Uthe kunezikole ezishoda ngothisha abangu-12 njengeSithengile High eseClermont."Lesi sikole kuqale unyaka sidinga othisha abayisishiyagalombili abengeziwe ngenxa yokwanda kwabafundi, manje sesidinga abangu-12 ngoba abanye bathathe umhlalaphansi, abanye bashona,"  kuchaza uNksz Caluza.Unobhala -jikelele weNatu uNkk Cynthia Barnes uthe le nyunyana beyingamenywanga   emhlanganweni obungoLwesihlanu, ayazi lutho  ngobekukhulunywa kuwo. Kukhalwa ngothisha abangakayi ezikoleni nje KwaZulu-Natal, kwezinye izifundazwe kunabafundi okuze kwaphela ikota bengafundi ngoba bengazitholanga izikole, besalinde umnyango ukuthi ubatholelele izikoleUMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo eyisiSekelo, uthe izifundazwe ezifana neGauteng neWestern Cape zinabafundi abaningi abadinga izikole ngenxa yokuthi abazali bayafuduka beyofuna amathuba emisebenzi."Kumele abazali balinde, le nkinga idalwa yisimo somnotho. Umnyango uye wakhe amakilasi angomahamba nendlwana nakho okuthatha isikhathi,"  kusho yena.
title: Inqwaba yothisha iya ezikoleni ezintsha  eKZN

text: Mhleli: Ngikhathazwa yilo mnumzane olokhu ebhala ephephandabeni ethi ungowaseBuhleni kodwa uhlala ekhala ngokuthi umholi wethu esimthandayo uNyazilwezulu akaziphathi kahle izinkinga zebandla.Cha, mfowethu, uyaphosisa uma uthi ungowaseBuhleni. Abantu abasele eBuhleni basele khona ngoba bethanda futhi bekholelwa oNyazini olungadinge kwehlulelwa yizinkantolo olubonakale ngemisebenzi emikhulu eyayenziwa uBhombela.Mina ngithi kuwe hlukana nokuzama ukudukisa amaNazaretha ngezinkanuko zenu. Thina sakhetha uNyazi singaphoqiwe, ngakho-ke nani qhubekani lapho nikholelwa khona nihlukane nobaba.Okunye okumele nikwazi wukuthi eBuhleni wumuzi weNyangayezulu eyawakhela izingane zayo. Nina okumele nikwenze wukuhamba niyobanga umuzi wasekuPhakameni lapho obaba benu baxosha khona iNyangayezulu.Kufanele nazi ukuthi akuwona umuzi waseBuhleni owenza izimanga kepha wuShembe. UNyazilwezulu lwasukumisa iNdiya eBalitto liyothenga imoto luzi­swenkele. Siyekeni silandele umholi niyeke ukulokhu nithi nikhathazekile nidlala amacebo la.GumedeMtunzini
title: Thina sakhetha uNyazi singaphoqiwe

text: UMNYANGO wezeMpilo sewufakele abasebenzi basemakhazeni aseMgungqundlovu ingcindezi yokuthi babuyele emsebenzini emuva kokuthi bedube ukusebenza.Lokhu kulandela umbhidlango wabasebenzi basemakhazeni okubalwa kuwo iFort Napier, Park Rynie, nePort Shepstone wokuhudula izinyawo noholele ekutheni eminye imindeni ingakwazi ukufihla izihlobo zayo.Ngesonto eledlule abasebenzi basemakhazeni aseFort Napier bagcine sebebeka phansi amathuluzi ngoba bethi bafuna izimpendulo ngezikhalo zabo. Abasebenzi bebekhala ngezinto ezahlukene okubalwa kuzo ukungasebenzi kwama-air-conditioner, ukungakhokhelwa kwabo imali ehambisana nomsebenzi abawenzayo, ukunganikwa umfaniswano nokunye.Izolo uMnyango wezeMpilo unike laba basebenzi umyalelo wokuthi baphindele emsebenzini noma babhekane nokuboshwa izinsuku ezingu-30 ngokungahambisani nemiyalelo yenkantolo.Ngokusho komnyango lokhu kulandela ukuhluleka kwawo izikhathi ezahlukene ukuncenga laba basebenzi ukuthi babuyele esimeni esejwayelekile sokusebenza.Umnyango uthe sewuthole incwadi yokugcina evimbela abasebenzi ukuthi bangasingeneli isiteleka esingekho emthethweni.“Umnyango sewunike abasebenzi ithuba lokuthi babuyele emsebenzini namuhla (besho izolo) futhi uyasibhekisisa sonke isimo esikhona. Uma abasebenzi behluleka ukubuyela emsebenzini ngokujwayelekile umnyango ngeke ube nayo enye indlela ngaphandle kokuthi ucele ijaji ukuthi uvumele ukuthi kulandelwe umthetho ohambisana nokujeziswa kwabasebenzi abangenela isiteleka esingekho emthethweni,” kusho isitatimende somnyango.Bathe sebeqalile ukwenza izinhlelo zokulungisa ezinye zezikhalo zabasebenzi kanti ezinye zilungiswa nguMnyango wezeMpilo kuzwelonke.UNobhala wenyunyana yabasebenzi bezempilo iPublic and Allied Workers’ Union South Africa (Pawusa), uMnuz Halalisani Gumede, uthe abaqondi ukuthi umnyango ukhuluma ngani. Uthe abasebenzi bakhona emsebenzini kodwa akulula ukuthi bangasebenza ngoba umnyango uthathe izinsiza kusebenza.Uthe ubona sengathi uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uDkt, Sibongiseni Dhlomo, udinga umuntu ongameluleka ngoba indlela enza ngayo izinto ayikho esimeni esifanele.Khonamanjalo, inyunyana yabahlengikazi, iDemocratic Nursing Organisation of South Africa (Denosa), seyinxuse uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal ukuthi usheshise ulungise izinkinga zabasebenzi basemakhazeni ahulumeni abathi seziphazamisa ukusebenza kwabahlengikazi.UNobhala weDenosa eKZN, uMnuz Mandla Shabangu, uthe bakholwa ukuthi abasebenzi basemakhazeni ahlukene kulesi sifundazwe abahudula izinyawo banesizathu sokwenza lokho.Uthe akukwazi ukuthi ngabe kuwubulungiswa ukuthi laba basebenzi bangaholelwa imali ehambisana nomsebenzi abawenzayo.Uthe ngenxa yalo mbhidlango wabasebenzi abawubona ufanelekile sekuze kwaphazamiseka ukusebenza kwabahlengikazi.“Uma isiguli sishona, umhlengikazi obesinakekela kufanele athathe imininingwane yaso yasemakhazeni ukuze bakwazi ukutshela umndeni (uma ubuza),” kusho uShabangu.Uthe izidumbu azisanakiwe kanti namashalofu asegcwele ngendlela yokuthi ezinye sezigcina ziwiswa phansi abasebenzi, kokunye kubekwe esinye phezu kwesinye.Uthe ngenxa yalokhu abahlengikazi abakwazi ukusho ukuthi isidumbu singatholakala kuphi emindenini.UShabangu uthe uma izidumbu zifakwe kahle emashalofini umhlengikazi ufike abhale inombolo yeshalofu isiguli esifakwe kulona emuva kokushona. Lokhu kube sekwenza lula isimo uma umndeni usufika.
title: Banqunyelwe okatiki abatelekile

text:
Empeleni uBonnie uyiphendule ihlaya le ndaba ethi kusale kancane azwelane nalaba balingisi ebhala ethi ‘umgowo wabantu abakhanyayo ngokwebala, cishe ngazwelana nabo.”Noma engakaze amgagule ngegama umlingisi abekhuluma ngaye uBonnie, kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi kusukela izolo ebusuku isematheni indaba yebala kuTwitter kulandela umbhalo kaPearl Thusi ethi abantu kumele bayeke ukuthi ulapho akhona endimeni ngenxa yebala lakhe elikhanyayo futhi  akakwazi ukulingisa. Ihlukane phakathi imibono kuTwitter ngalolu daba abanye bethi uPearl uyahluleka ukuvuma ukuthi abantu abanebala elikhanyayo bayenzelelwa kunabampisholo ngokwebala.Luze lwangenwa nguSho Madjozi lolu daba naye igama lakhe ebelifakiwe kuthiwa ngabe akadumile kuleli nasemazweni angaphandle ukube akekhanyi ngokwebala. Light-skinned mgowo, I almost sympathized 😂 
pic.twitter.com/rzlhAChRij— Bonnie Mbuli (@BonnieMbuli) 
June 27, 2019We need to understand that preference is both economic and political, it directly affects people’s chances of survival. if I prefer you based on your aesthetic, anything you do after that will impress me, I’m more likely to trust & favour you and overlook ur shortcomings.— Bonnie Mbuli (@BonnieMbuli) 
June 27, 2019So when a light skinned actress complains abt the one or two roles they didn’t get coz they weren’t dark enuf; I’m like but the part ur crying abt was being the slave who gets raped and beat up in the thing, ppl who look like u have never had to be in that position to begin with. 
pic.twitter.com/OzdQZJy1gV— Bonnie Mbuli (@BonnieMbuli) 
June 27, 2019Sis, come on! Seriously? It’s not just exclusion from an acting role, it’s an entire omnipresent system, ur comparing a splinter in a finger to a plank in the eye. 
https://t.co/26aINeifxl— Bonnie Mbuli (@BonnieMbuli) 
June 27, 2019Saw it in the series "iam the night" the black couple was stopped and the asked the light skinned black girl if the black guy she was with was bothering her.— Rori's momsi (@Modilati_H) 
June 27, 2019Esika kwelijikayo uBonnie uthe ayikho into abangakhala ngayo endimeni abantu abakhanyayo ngokwebala. “Kumele siqonde ukuthi ukukhetha kuhambisana nepolitiki nomnotho, kuthinta izimpilo zabantu. Uma ngikukhetha ngenxa yendlela obukeka ngayo, noma yini oyenzayo ngemuva kwalokho izongichaza, futhi maningi amathuba okuthi ngizokweseka futhi ngizohambisana nawe ngizibe lokhu ongakwenzi kahle,” usho kanje. Ube eseveza ukuthi yingakho uma abakhanyayo ngokwebala bekhala ngendawo eyodwa abangayitholanga ngoba bengampisholo ngokwanele uvele athi; “kodwa indawo oyikhalelayo eyesigqila esasidlwengulwa, sishaywa, abantu abafana nawo abakaze babe kuleso simo.”UBonnie uphawula kanjena nje, udaba lukaPearl Thusi luze lakapakela kwingxoxo ngezindawo asezilingisile kuthelevishini kuleli naphesheya.
title: Umlingisi uchithe ‘eyokucindezelwa’ kwabakhanyayo ngokwebala endimeni

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEB APHUME benikina amakhanda, bedumele, abalandeli nomndeni kaSibusiso Gcabashe enkantolo yaseMgungundlovu izolo kuhlehla ukugwetshwa kwakhe.Izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi bekulindeleke ukuthi kugwetshwe uGcabashe owazakhela udumo ezibiza ngomculi kamaskandi osashona uKwakhe “Mgqumeni” Khumalo.Icala lihlehliselwe uJuni 28. Izolo kuvele ukuthi ummeli wakhe, uMnuz Johan Botha, ufuna imininingwane ngamacala okuthiwa wake wagwetshwa ngawo. Kulawo macala kukhona amathathu okweba okuthiwa wawenza eNanda naseWartburg.Ummeli ubengekho enkantolo kodwa ethumele ilungu lomndeni wakwaKhumalo ukuba lilande incwadi (eveza amacala uGcabashe alahlwa ngawo) kumshushisi wecala uMnuz Nkonzo Mlotshwa.Icala lithathe umzuzu lahlehliswa. UGcabashe ungene ebhokisini watshelwa ukuthi icala liyahlehla wabuyela esitokisini. Kube nokuxokozela enkantolo ngoba iningi belilindele isigwebo. Abantu baphume benikina amakhanda bekhala ngokuhlehliswa kwalo.“Kanti kuyoze kube nini lihlehla icala ngoba sifuna ukuzwa isigwebo?” kusho umlandeli ongathandanga negama lakhe.UMnuz Sam Khumalo, uyise kaMgqumeni uthe baphoxekile ngokuhlehla kwecala kodwa akukho abangakwenza ngoba ummeli usadinga okunye ngaphambi kokugweba uGcabashe.“Isizathu sokuhlehla kwecala wukuthi ummeli ubefuna imininingwane ngamacala okuthiwa wake walahlwa ngawo. Lolu lwazi lubalulekile kakhulu kithina ngoba luzokhomba ukuthi kwenzekani ngelanga lokugwetshwa. Kusiphathe kabi ukuthi icala liphinde lihlehle. Sifuna ukufika emaphethelweni ukuze kuvele obala ukuthi ngabe lokhu esikholelwa kukho, ukuthi lona nguMgqumeni, kuyiqiniso yini,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe ngokwakhe umndeni wabo uyakholelwa ukuthi okuthiwa nguGcabashe, yiBhova, elalithunjiwe lenziwa umkhomvu.UGcabashe walahlwa ngamacala amahlanu ngoDisemba nyakenye, elokudlwengula, elokuthumba, elokushaya, elokuzenza umuntu angeyena nokuzama ukuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.UGcabashe washaqisa abaningi ngo-2012 ethi uyiBhova. Abantu bathutheleka eNquthu bethi bayozibonela isimanga.Kwavela ukuthi usenga ezimithiyo waboshwa.UGcabashe wake wazama ukweqa enkantolo kodwa wabanjwa.Kusukela laqala ukuqulwa icala umsolwa unommeli wakhe okhokhelwayo uMnuz Johan Botha.Ummeli kuvele ukuthi ukhokhelwa abakwaKhumalo njengoba bekholwa wukuthi wavuka ekufeni uMgqumeni.Abakomalume kaMgqumeni, kwaMseleku, abalubhadi enkantolo njengoba bagcina bethula ubufakazi bokuthi uGcabashe akasilo iBhova.IMantshi, uNkk Rose Mogwera, yamlahla ngecala yathi ubufakazi bukuveze ngokusobala ukuthi akasiyena lo muntu azibiza ngaye.IMantshi yakuhlaba yakuhlikiza okwenziwa ngamaphoyisa, abezindaba nabasebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana ukubhebhethekisa ukuthi uMgqumeni uvukile kwabafileyo. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi owayekhulumela amaphoyisa, uVincent Mdunge, wezwakala emsakazweni eqinisekisa ukuthi iBhova livukile ekufeni.
title: Kuhlehlisiwe ukugwetshwa kwe’Bhova’

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAUMDLALI weBanyana Banyana, u-Amanda “Toki” Dlamini, ufisa ukudlondlobala ekuhlaziyeni unobhutshuzwayo ngemuva kokuba ebonakale kuSuperSport ekhipha amangwevu akhe enekela ababukeli ngomdlalo we-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) phakathi kweBafana Bafana ne-Algeria.IBafana ihlulwe ngo 3-1 kulo mdlalo kaGroup C obuse-Estadio de Mongomo, e-Equatorial Guinea ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Esigqikini sezinkakha zediski ebeziboshelwe kuSuperSport, u-Amanda ubehleli noBenni McCarthy, Aaron “Mbazo” Mokoena noBradley Carnell bonke asebeke bagijima emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu neBafana noSammy Kuffour odabuka eGhana.Le ntokazi eyayihola iBanyana idlala okokuqala kuma-Olympics ngo-2012 eLondon, ifike kwazwakala njengoba ibiyichaza kuzwakale iminyakazo yeBafana neyezimbangi zayo.Ithole ukunconywa ngabanye ababukeli enkundleni yokuxhumana i-twitter.USandile Ndezekeli uthe: “Kudos ku-Amanda Dlamini! Uzoba umhlaziyi webhola omuhle, unakho konke okudingekayo.”UMuzi_mthembu55 ubhale ebhekise kuRobert Marawa obeshayela ohlelo, ethi: “U-Amanda Dlamini ungumhlaziyi ozethembayo, onolwazi oluningi lwebhola.”U-Amanda uthe wethemba ukuthi umsebenzi wakhe uzomvulela amanye amathuba.“Ngingathanda ukuqhubeka nokuba kuthelevishini noma sekuthiwa sengiliyekile ibhola. Ukukhuthazwa engikuthole kulabo ebengisebenza nabo nakubantu abebebukele kuyangigqugquzela. Uma ngiqhubeka ngithola ithuba ngokuzayo, ngizoqhubeka nokuzimisela,” kusho u-Amanda.Uthe uthole ucingo oluvela kwaSuperSport ngoDisemba bemcela ukuba azoba yingxenye yabahlaziyi. Ubeseke wawenza lo msebenzi phambilini njengoba eke wahlaziya imidlalo yeNdebe yoMhlaba yabesifazane ngo-2011.Ngemuva kwalokhu uthe uthole elinye ithuba ku-SABC1 ebizelwa kuGood Morning Brazil ngesikhathi kuqhubeka iNdebe yoMhlaba nyakenye.“Bengingazitsheli ukuthi kuSuperSport bazophinda bangibize. Bengicabanga ukuthi bazothola omunye umuntu ongcono. Ngaphambi kokuqala kohlelo benginovalo oluyisimanga ngoba lona ngumqhudelwano omkhulu, iBafana yenza kahle ngaphansi kukaShakes (Ephraim Mashaba), obekusho ukuthi umdlalo uzobe ubukelwe abantu abaningi. Ngijabule ngendlela engenze ngayo, ngiyathemba ukuthi nabanye abantu sebezobona ukuthi nabantu besifazane bayalazi ibhola, asigcini ngokulidlala nje kuphela,” kusho yena.Uthe okwamanje ubesanikezwe isikhala sokuhlaziya imidlalo ethinta iBafana.Umdlalo olandelayo weBafana ukusasa lapho izobe itholene neSenegal ngo-9 ebusuku eMongomo.Yize le ntokazi eneziqu zeTransportation Management ezithole e-University of Johannesburg, inefiso sokugxila ekuhlaziyeni ngomuso kodwa ithe ayikaziboni iliyeka ibhola.“Ngisazimisele kakhulu ngokudlala kuBanyana. Kulo nyaka nje sinomsebenzi wokulwela ukuzibekisela indawo kuma-Olympics,” kusho u-Amanda.Ama-Olympics azayo ango-2016 eRio de Janeiro, eBrazil.IBanyana yangena okokuqala kulo mqhudelwano ngo-2012.
title: OweBanyana nekhono lokuhlaziya umdlalo webhola

text: UKUVELA kwesiqephu ohlelweni iReal Housewives of Durban lapho ongunkosikazi wesihlabani sokholo esingasekho emhlabeni, u-Ayanda Ncwane etshelwa ukuthi kumele ayohlawula amacala awashiya kubo kwentombi, simangaze abaningi. Izakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika nababukeli bohlelo lakwiShowmax iThe Real Housewives of Durban oselukhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic, balokhu bephawule njalo ngokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi u-Ayanda Ncwane kumele angenelele azame ukuyohlawula amacala kaSfiso Ncwane owashiya ethembise ukuyohlawula kubo kanina wengane yakhe naye oyingxenye yalolu hlelo. Kulolu hlelo lokhu kuvele njengento eyingxenye yesiko newubuntu futhi umndeni wakubo kanina wengane obona kungaba yisixazululo esingaqinisa nobuhlobo.Ongoti bezamasiko bathi noma ikanjani ingane nonina bafanelwe ukuyohlawulwa futhi nabakubo kantombi bafanele ukubasela inhlawulo. Ungoti wezesintu nesazi samasiko uSolwazi Sihawu Ngubane uthe lokhu kusuke kudinga ngqo umuntu wesilisa ngoba amacala akhe okumele ahlawulwe uyena. Owesifazane oyingoduso noma oshade naye ephila noma engasekho emhlabeni usuke engangene nakancane."Akangene nakancane owesifazane emacaleni enziwe indoda yakhe ngoba noma ngabe bashadile yaphinga, kufanele kube iyona eyohlawula ingane ekhabonina. Uma kwenzeka indoda ishona ingakahlawuli, unkosikazi akangene lapho. Angikaze ngizwe ngisho emlandweni ukuthi endulo kukhona okufaka owesifazane emacaleni endoda," kusho uNgubane.Eqhuba uthe isintu sihambisana nobuntu. Uma kwenzeka owesifazane enothando lokuqoqa izingane zendoda yakhe, kuhle futhi kuyakhuthazwa kodwa kodwa akukho okomphoqayo. Uma kuvuka amacala endoda kusuke kufanele abakubo kantombi bayozibika kubo kandoda. " Inja ibanjelwa umnikazi wayo, uma indoda ishona kade ishiye yone komunye umuzi yaze yathola nomntwana, kumele kuyobikelwa abazali bayo ekhaya. Yibona okumele bamele lawo macala ngoba uma kuzohlawulwa komunye umuntu, kuthintwa nomsamo kubikelwe idlozi. Uma unkosikazi enesifiso sokufaka isandla, angapha abazali imali kube yisipho sabo bese bona beyisebenzisa ngendlela yabo,"kusho uNgubane.Eqhuba uNgubane uthe okuba umqondo omuhle ukuthi owesifazane onengane engaziwa noma etholwe ngaphandle, abakubo bayombika nangalo usuku okuvele ngalo ukuthi indoda ayisekho emhlabeni ukuze uma kunesiko eligcinwayo nelingakhaleleka enganeni isheshe ilithole. "Isiko elingagcinwa ngaleso sikhathi eliqondene nesifo kodwa uma sekukhaleleka amanye kufanele enziwe ingane seyihlawuliwe abakubo kandoda. Unkosikazi naye onezingane naleyo ndoda eshonile okumele azikhulise yedwa ngakho ukuhlawula ingane eyodwa kungabe sekusho ukuthi uma kuvela enye ingane nayo kolindeleka ukuthi enze okufanayo,"kusho uNgubane.Omunye futhi ungoti wesintu nokukhuliswa kwezintombi, uNkk Nomagugu Ngobese ubambe emazwini kaNgubane njengoba ethe ingane ezalelwe ekhaya ngokomthetho wesintu eyasekhabonina ngoba nezinto zesintu zisuke zilindeleke komalume. "Uma kuyingane yentombazane kuze kulindeleke imicimbi efana nembeleko nomemulo yenzelwe ekhabonina lapho sithi ikomalume khona. Unkosikazi wendoda eyakutholisa untwana akahlangane nakancane nenhlawulo yengane nokugcinwa kwesiko ngaphandle uma ezenzela yena kusuka othandweni,"kugcizelela uNkk Ngobese.
title: Amacala endoda awahlangene nomkayo: Ongoti

text: KUBHEKWE uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi uyambuyisa yini uSihlalo omdala weKhomishini eVikela Inkolo, Izilimi namaSiko njengoba liphelile ihlandla lakhe.Liphele ngoFebhuwari 28 ihlandla likaNkk Thoko Mkhwanazi-Xaluva obe ngowokuqala ukuba uSihlalo wekhomishini isungulwa eminyakeni eyisihlanu edlule. Uzakhele udumo ngokubiza esitikini abefundisi abebesolwa ngokudukisa umphakathi benza nemigilingwane. Esanda kufika kwikhomishini kwadingeka avule icala aqinise nezokuphepha ngenxa yokuthukwa nokusatshiswa ngabazalwane nabefundisi.Okhulumela iKhomishini uMnuz Mpiyakhe Mkholo, uthe akuyena uNkk Mkhwanazi-Xaluva kuphela ophelelwe yisikhathi kodwa bonke ayekhethwe nabo.“Aphakanyisiwe amagama abantu okumele babe kwikhomishini, nelakhe likhona. Kumele kwenziwe inhlolokhono bese kucaca abazokhethwa,” kusho uMkholo.Uthe akekho obambile.UNkk Mkhwanazi-Xaluva uthe:“Ngivumile ngenxa yokuphakanyiswa ngabantu abaningi ngale kwalokho bese ngishenxa. Ngizokwamukela noma yikuphi okushiwo umengameli.”Uthi angavuma ukubuyela ngoba baveze okuningi okumele kuxazululwe. Kubefundisi abake baphenywa nguNkk Mkhwanazi-Xaluva kubalwa uMfundisi Paseka “Mboro” Motsoeneng ngezithombe ezasabalala kuFacebook kuthiwa ubesezulwini ngePhasika lika-2016. Kuvele noMfundisi Penuel Mnguni wasePitoli we-End Times Ministries ngokufunza abazalwane izinyoka notshani. Ikhomishini yaya ezifundazweni iphenya abefundisi okubalwa neKwaZulu-Natal okuvele kuyo uMfundisi Qhoshangokwakhe Nala, uMbhishobhi Vusi Dube nabanye. Kwavela noMasipala weTheku ngokungcwatshwa kwabantu phezu kwamathuna amadala, ikhomishini eyathi kuphambene nesiko.
title: Kulindwe esikaRamaphosa ngekaMkhwanazi-Xaluva

text: BAWINILE NGCOBOEMUVA kwamahora amahlanu elindiwe yizihlobo zakhe, yizingane zakhe nabezindaba ugcine ekhishiwe ejele eWestville owagwetshelwa icala lokudlwengula indodakazi yakhe ngo-2005.USfiso Cedric Shezi (39) ukhishwe emuva kwehora lesibili ejele eWestville. Kwenzeke emuva kokuthi uMqondisi wenhlangano elwela iziboshwa iJustice for Prisoners and Detainees Trust - uMnuz Derrick Mdluli nommeli wakhe uProfessor Lindokuhle Mdletshe begcine beyitholile incwadi yasenkantolo ebigunyaza ukukhishwa kwakhe.UShezi bekufanele aphume ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule kodwa kwangenzeka emuva kokuthi umabhalane wasenkantolo ekhiphe incwadi okungesiyo eyayigunyaza ijele ukuthi limdedele.Nayizolo ekuseni kube nenkinga njengoba incwadi ebiphethwe nguMdluli noMdletshe kudingeke ukuthi bayiphindisele enkantolo iyolungiswa.UMdletshe uthe inkinga ngukuthi uShezi wakhishwa ejele eya eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini kodwa isicelo sakhe sebheyili salalelwa eNkantolo ePhoyinti, manje bese kunaleso sidididi. Ifomu ebekufanele likhishwe yinkantolo belingakhishiwe.Uthe ejele nabo bayaqikelela ngamafomu.UMdletshe uthe uma sekuqonde konke bazobe sebefaka isicelo sokuthi kubuyekezwe isinqumo senkantolo ngoba ngesikhathi kuqulwa icala ubufakazi bolibofuzo abuzange buvezelwe inkantolo.UMdletshe uthe bamangalela umbuso ngokubophela uShezi amahhala kodwa usazoxoxisana naye ngeminye imininingwane.“Baningi abantu asebevelile bekhala ngokuboshelwa into abangayazi esiphezu kwamacala abo. Emuva kokuphuma kukaNkosinathi Chiya abantu baxhumana nathi,” kusho uMdletshe.Uthe akesabi ukusiza labo ababoshiwe, akasiso isitha sombuso.UMdletshe uveze ukuthi uShezi basazomzamela uhlelo lokwelulekwa ngokomqondo ngendlela ahlukumezeke ngayo.“Bekunzima ngisho ukuxoxisana naye ngaleli cala ngoba ubevele akhale izinyembezi,” kusho uMdletshe.UShezi uphume izintatheli nezihlobo zakhe sezimlinde endaweni engaphandle kwejele, emuva kokuthi abaphathi bejele bethe bacela kukhulunywe naye ngaphandle hhayi emasangweni asejele.Kuphume umphathi wejele, uMnuz Hento Davids, ehamba nonogada basejele batshela izintatheli ze-TV ukuthi azime buqamama nesango lasejele ngoba akuvumelekile ukuthi zithathe izithombe ngakhona.Uthe yena ubengazi nokuthi kukhona umuntu ozophuma ejele obelindelwe yizintatheli.Emuva kokuthi uDavids esesukile, kuphinde kwafika omunye unogada oyisidlakela ezothi akungathathwa izithombe eziqoshiwe.
title: Kuke kwaba nesidididi ngokukhishwa kobegqunywe ejele

text: OWAYENGUMGCINIMAFA  we-ANC, uDkt Zweli Mkhize usephonsele inselelo iphalamende ukuthi limbize azoziphendulela ngezinsolo zokuthi wayefunela i-ANC intshontsho kowayeyisikhulu esiphezulu sePassenger Rail South Africa (Prasa) uMnuz Lucky Montana. Izolo uNkk Zukiswa Rantho onguSihlalo wekomidi lamabhizinisi kahulumeni eliphenya ngokusetshenziswa kombuso yidlanzana nenkohlakalo ezinkampanini zikahulumeni, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bathole incwadi evela kuMkhize ecela ukunikwa ithuba lokuziphendulela kokushiwo uMontana. "Usesibhalelile uMkhize, incwadi yakhe ngiyidlulisele kumphenyi u-advocate Ntuthuzelo Vanara," kusho uNkk Rantho. Uthe uMkhize uzonikezwa ithuba lokuziphendulela kwizinsolo zikaMontana zokuthi wazama ukutholela i-ANC intshontsho lika-10% wenkontileka ka-R465 million owawuzonikezwa iSwafambo Rail eyayizokwakha izinqola zezitimela zakwaPrasa ngo-2014. UNkk Rantho nekomidi lakhe bagxekiwe ngokuthi abamphekanga ngebodwe elincane uMontana njengoba eke wasolwa ngenkohlakalo embikweni osihloko sithi Derailed owayenguMvikeli woMphakathi u-Adv Thuli Madonsela. Uthe bambuzile imibuzo futhi wonke umuntu unikezwa ithuba lokuchaza uhlangothi lwakhe.UMkhulumeli we-ANC uNkk Khusela Diko uthe abazi lutho ngezinsolo zokuthi i-ANC yayifuna intshontsho kodwa bafuna ziphenywe lezi zinsolo.
title: Ufuna ukuziphendulela uDkt Zweli Mkhize ephalamende

text:
SapaK UNOBUFAKAZI obenele ezinkulumeni eziqoshiwe zezobunhloli ukuthi singabuyekezwa isinqumo sokuhoxiswa kwamacala enkohlakalo ayebhekene noMengameli Jacob Zuma, umholi weDA uNkk Helen Zille usho kanjalo izolo.“Sengiyifundile imibhalo esuselwe kulezi zinkulumo ezaqoshwa esizinikwe yiNPA (National Prosecuting Authority) ngoLwesine olwedlule. Zihlanganisa izinkulumo eziqoshiwe ezingu-36 ezinyangeni ezinhlanu,” kusho uZille kwi-newsletter i-
Democratic Alliance SA Today.“Ngaphandle kokuveza okuqukethwe, ngigculisekile ukuthi “lezi zinkulumo eziqoshiwe’’ zingasinika ubufakazi obenele ukuqhubeka nesicelo sethu sokuthi kubuyekezwe isinqumo esenziwa nguMqondisi owayebambile wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi uMokotedi Mpshe, sokuhoxisa amacala ayebhekene noMengameli Jacob Zuma.’’Abameli beDA baxwayise le nhlangano ukuthi ingalinge ivezele umphakathi okuqukethwe “yilezi zinkulumo eziqoshiwe zezobunhloli’’.Isizathu salokhu yisinqumo senkantolo saphambilini esesisebenza njengesibonelo seJaji u-Ashley Binns-Ward eNkantolo eNkulu eWestern Cape ecaleni ebeliphakathi kukaMasipala waseKapa neSouth African National Roads Agency Limited (Sanral).Icala elibandakanya iSanral beliphinde libe mayelana nesicelo sokubuyekeza isinqumo seDA, odabeni lwesinqumo seSanral ukwakha umgwaqo omkhulu uN1/N2.UBinns-Ward uthole ukuthi kunomthetho ovimbela ukuthi amaphepha athile asenkantolo anikwe abathintekayo ecaleni ngaphambi kokuthi isicelo silalelwe enkantolo.Usihlalo kuDA uMnuz James Selfe uthe phambilini iDA ibihlose ukuvezela umphakathi okuqukethwe kulezi zinkulumo eziqoshiwe.
title: Ugculiswe akutholile umholi weDA

text: UGODUKE noR425 000 owesifazane waseVryheid ongumlimi ophume phambili emncintiswaneni wokuchonywa uphaphe kwabesifazane abenza kahle emkhakheni wezolimo, iFemale Entrepreneur AwardsLezi zindondo ezihlelwa uMnyango wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal ubuseBallito, izolo.UNksz Thobile Mpontshane onepulazi lezingulube iMampontshi Farm and Fencing, akakholwanga ngesikhathi kumenyezela ukuthi nguye obashaye bonke emakhanda ekubeni kade esewine iminxa emibili, okuwumunxa wabalimi abalimela ukudayisa iTop Enteprenuer Commercial athole kuwo uR125 000, umunxa okhethwa ungqongqoshe, iMEC’s Special Award, athole kuwo uR50 000. Ngemuva kokuqhathwa nabo bonke abawine eminxeni eyehlukene udle umhlanganiwo wabashaya bonke emakhanda wathola uR250 000.UNksz Mpontshana oneziqu zezokuvakasha uthe washiya phansi umsebenzi endaweni yokulala eJozini ngemuva kokuthi inkampani eyayimqashile ithi izomehlisela umholo.“Ngangihola uR4 000, kwathiwa imali esiyiholayo izokwehliswa ibe nguR2 500. Ngabona ukuthi sekufana nokuhlala ekhaya ngashiya phansi. Ngaleso sikhathi ngangishadile umyeni wami engumlimi. Le mali eyenza ngosuku, wangigqugquzela ukuthi nami ngingene kulo mkhakha kodwa ngangifuna ipulazi lezinkomo ngoba ekhaya bezifuyiwe,” kusho yena.UNKSZ Lisa Mthethwa nodadewabo uNkk Lona Mnguni beFrutee Bellies abadle umhlanganiso emkhakheni wabashintsha imikhiqizo kulokho esuke itshalwe iyikho bayenze okunye, iTop Entreprenuer Processing, izolo eBallito Izithombe: Gcina NdwalaneUqhube wathi akuhambanga ngendlela ayehlele ngayo, wathola ipulazi lezingulube ngo-2014, aliqashe eMnyangweni wezeMihlaba.“Ngifunde ngendlela ngilekelelwa abantu engisebenza nabo ngolwazi. Mina bengilokhu ngifunda kancane kancane.“Namanje ngisafunda kodwa engikufundile ukuthi izingulube zithanda ukuthandwa, uma ufika egoqweni lazo uyaxoxa nazo njengoba wenza ezinganeni zakho,” ehleka.UNkk Mpintshana udayisa izingulube ezingu-80 ezikhiqiza ubhekeni njalo ngesonto.Unezinkomazi ezingu-220 nezinkunzi eziyisithupha.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uMnuz Themba Mthembu uthe * -43% wabesifazane abayibambe ishisa emkhakheni wezolimo emhlabeni, e-Afrika bawu-80% abasebenza kulo mkhakha, iningi labo ngabasemakhaya kodwa abanawo amandla okulawula umhlaba.“Njengoba kade kunezigcawu ezidingida udaba lokubuyiswa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo, bebeyingcosana abesifazane Abebeyingxenye yazo kodwa emasimini ufica kuyibona abaningi,” kusho yena.UNksz Bhekisephi Xulu osebenza epulazini iChase Farm, eliseShowe udle umhlanganiso emunxeni iBest Farm Worker. UNkk Sizakele Zuma uwine emunxeni wabalimela ukudla iBest Subsistance Producer, emunxeni wabalimi abasafufusa, iTop Entreprenuer Small Holder kuwine iMagema Fruit and Vegetables Primary Co-op, kwiTop Entreprenuer Processing, kuwine, iFrutee Bellies esungulwe izelamani zamaMthethwa uNksz Lisa Mthethwa noNkk Lona Mnguni uMaMthethwa.UNksz Mpontshana uzomela lesi sifundazwe emncintiswaneni ofanayo okuzobe kuqhathwe kuwo abesifazane abawine kwezinye izifundazwe ozoba ngasekupheleni kwale nyanga.
title: Ugoduke noR425 000 ewina kowezolimo

text: MHLELI: Bengithi ngeke ngiluthathe usiba lwami, ngikhale kule nkundla osinika yona singabafundi bephephandaba lakho. Ngenxa yezimo ngaphoqeleka ukuba ngidlulise isikhalo ngomasipala weTheku.NgoDisemba 31 nyakenye umakhelwane wami wawelwa wudonga abiye ngalo, amanzi angena endlini ngenxa yemvula eyayinamandla. Asilalanga sisiza umakhelwane, sishanela amanzi emvula kwazise kwalimala nempahla yakhe. Ikhansela laseNanda Glebe labikelwa, kodwa kuze kube yinamuhla akukho okwenzekile kanti udonga lusawa futhi lokho sekubange ukuthi kusuke umsindo nakomunye umakhelwane. Ngabe bukhona ubulungiswa ekutheni inhlekelele ingenzeka ngoDisemba 31, 2020 ebusuku kodwa kuze kube yinamuhla akwenziwa lutho? Akungadlalwa ngathi sibuka. Nomgwaqo awunatiyela kodwa osiyazi bathi ngokwebalazwe (map) kamasipala likhona itiyela. Asingenziwa izilima size sibone.MasukueNanda Glebe
title: Musani ukudlala ngathi sidinga usizo ngokushesha

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUU MSUNGULI wamaRoyalty Soapie Awards azoba se-ICC, eThekwini, kusasa ebusuku uthe abantu abangalindeli imilingo ngoba imiklomelo yakhe isakhula.AmaRoyalty Soapie Awards, okuyimiklomelo okuhlonishwa ngayo abavelele emidlalweni ewuchungechunge, ahlelwa nguWinnie Ntshaba.UWinnie owazakhela udumo elingisa indawo kaKhethiwe emdlalweni owuchungechunge kuSABC 1, i
Generations, uthe konke sekumi ngomumo ngomcimbi wakhe.“Kumele abantu bakhumbule ukuthi iseyingane le miklomelo ngoba ineminyaka emibili nje vo. Sisakhula futhi abantu bazokubona lokho ukuthi unyaka nonyaka kukhona okushintshayo,” kusho uWinnie.Uthe kulo nyaka izinto eziningi ubezibambele mathupha kwazise awukho umdlalo wethelevishini abelingisa kuwo. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngo-Agasti nyakenye abalingisi be
Generations abangu-16, okuhlanganisa noWinnie, bateleka befuna amaholo angcono.Umsunguli womdlalo uMfundi Vundla wabaxosha ngemuva kokunqaba ukubuyela emsebenzeni.“Ngithe nje angiwuthathi omunye umsebenzi kodwa ngigxile ekuhleleni imiklomelo. Bekungeke kube kuhle kubanikazi bemidlalo ukuthi ngihlale njalo ngicela ukukhululwa ngiyolungisa izinto zemiklomelo,” kusho uWinnie.Uqhube wathi nakanjani abalandeli bakhe bazombona kuthelevishini kulo nyaka.“Nakanjani ngiyabuyela. Ngiyakuthanda ukulingisa,” kusho yena.KumaRoyalty Soapie Awards anonyaka kubhekwe kakhulu 
Isibaya esikhonjiswa njalo ngo-8.30 ebusuku phakathi nesonto kuMzansi Magic (DStv channel 161) ne
Scandal esikhonjiswa ku-e.tv ngo-7.30 ebusuku phakathi nesonto kwazise iyona midlalo ezihola phambili ngokuqokwa ka-16 umdlalo ngamunye.Umdlalo wakuSABC 2, i-
7de Laan ilandela ngemuva ngokuqokwa ka-14.
title: ‘Ningalindeli milingo  kumaRoyalty’

text: KUPHAZAMISEKEkuqala nje ukufunda eGauteng izolo emuva kokushiswa kwesikole iKhutlo-Traro Secondary, eSebokeng.Yisikole sesibili lesi ukushiswa kule nyanga emuva kokuba kushiswe iTokelo High, e-Evaton.Ukushiswa kwesikole kuqhubeze inkinga yoMnyango wezeMfundo eGauteng obhekene nengwadla yokutholela wonke umfundi indawo emuva kokugcwala kwezikole eziningi.Ngokusho kuka-Brigadier Mathapelo Peters, wamaphoyisa eGauteng, osebenza esikoleni wazise amaphoyisa ukuthi siyasha.“Saziswe ngo-3 ekuseni ukuthi isikole siyasha. Bekungekho muntu ngesikhathi kuqala umlilo, nomsebenzi wasesikoleni naye uthe utshelwe womunye umuntu ukuthi kuyasha esikoleni,” kusho Peters.Uthe kushe uhlangothi langalapho kusebenzela khona othisha nokubhaliswa khona kwabafundi kodwa basazobheka ukuthi awukho yini omunye umonakalo.Amaphoyisa atshaliwe esikoleni ukuba aqaphe isimo, aphonse nemibuzo abangahle bethinteke.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango, uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi, ubethukuthele egane unwabu ngenxa yesenzo sokushisa isikole.Uthe bazodedela amaphoyisa aphenye.
title: Kuphazamise ukufunda ukusha kwesikole

text: IPHINI likaSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu, ucele ukuhoxa ohlwini lwabantu abazojutshelwa esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe ngemuva kokhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 8.UMabuyakhulu uzicelele yena ukuthi ahoxiswe okwesikhashana ohlwini lwabantu abazojutshwa kuze kuphume isinqumo ecaleni lenkohlakalo abhekene nalo nabanye abangu-16.Icala lithinta uR28 million owakhishwa ukwenza umcimbi iNorth Sea Jazz festival eyagcina ingenzekanga.Esithangamini sabezindaba eThekwini izolo, uMabuyakhulu uthe akekho umuntu omphoqile ukuthi ahoxe kulolu luhlu.UMabuyakhulu ungomunye wabantu abebephezulu ohlwini lwabantu abebezojutshelwa esiShayamthetho. Igama lakhe kuthiwa belikhona ngisho emagameni abantu abazojutshelwa ePhalamende likazwelonke.“Akukho ngcindezi noma muntu othe angihoxe, ngizihoxele mina ohlwini lwabantu abebezojutshwa ngumbutho. Ngizoqhubeka nomsebenzi wami wokuba yiPhini likaSihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni,” kusho uMabuyakhulu.Uthe ufake lesi sicelo kwi-ANC ukuze kube nethemba kubantu ngohlu lwabantu i-ANC ebajubela ukuthi bayoyimela.UNobhala we-ANC, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, uthe akekho ophoqe uMabuyakhulu ukuthi ahoxe ohlwini.Uthe i-ANC iyomjuba noma yikuphi lapho iyobona ukuthi aye khona uma sekuphele uhlelo lwasenkantolo.“Uzicelele ukuthi ahoxe, ikomiti elibheka ukusebenza kwansuku zonke lasamukela isicelo sakhe.”UNtuli uthe uhlu abaluhambisile lwabantu abazomela inhlangano luzofaka * -20% wentsha, abesifazane kanjalo nalabo abebevele bekhona.“Sesicubungula uhlu, akekho umuntu okudingeke ukuthi akhishwe kulona. Uhlu oluzokhishwa nguNobhala Jikelele we-ANC luzoba nazo zonke lezi zinto.”Unxuse ababajube kuhulumeni ukuthi baxazulule izinkinga zemiphakathi esuke ibhikisha.Uthe amaphoyisa nawo kumele aqinise isandla ekutheni avalele labo abenza okuphambene nomthetho okuthinta ukucekela phansi nempahla.UNtuli uthe indaba yobumbano yiyo eseqhulwini lwezinto abamatasa ngazo.
title: UMabuyakhulu ucele ukuhoxa kwabazojutshwa

text: USEBUMNYAMENI ngekusasa lakhe emdlalweni iThe Queen uSello Maake KaNcube.Ebuzwa ngokuthi uzobuyela nini kulo mdlalo, uthe akanalwazi.“Angazi ngizobuyela nini kwiThe Queen, usungabuza abakwaFerguson ngalokho ngoba yibo abangaba nolwazi,” kusho uSello.Kulo mdlalo udlala indawo kaKgosi ongumfowabo kaHarriet Khoza (Connie Ferguson) futhi usondelene kakhulu nale ntokazi. Wagcina ukuvela emdlalweni ngesikhathi elibangisa phesheya.Uthe okwamanje umatasa ngokuhlomisa ngolwazi abafundi baseCarltonville High eGoli ngezifundo zokulingisa.“Ngisebenzisana nabafundi, senza umdlalo weshashalazi iKomeng, obhalwe waphinde waqondiswa yimina. IKomeng indlela engikhethe ngayo ukukhuluma nabantu besilisa,” kusho uSello.Ngomdlalo weshashalazi awukhombise ngoLwesibili eCoastal TVET College kwa-V eMlaza, uthe ubefuna ukunika abantu besilisa umyalezo ngoba kungathi kukhona izinto ezibakhathazayo abangakwazi ukukhuluma ngazo, ezibenza bahlukumeze abantu besifazane.Okhulumela iMzansi Magic, uBongiwe Potelwa-Metsing, uthe nabo akukho abakwaziyo ngendawo kaKgosi njengoba kungaveli lutho ngendawo ayilingisayo.“Ngizoke ngizame ukukhuluma nabakwaFerguson abakhiqiza umdlalo ukuzwa ukuthi kwenzekani ngalo mlingisi.”
title: Akucaci ngoSello Maake KaNcube kwiThe Queen

text: Sibusiso MdlaloseUNOZINTI waMaZulu FC, obuye abe ngukaputeni uSiyabonga “Nqaba” Mbatha, uthi njengabadlali baleli qembu bakuthola kulula ukusebenzisana nomqeqeshi u-Ayanda Dlamini, osanda kuqokwa ngokugcwele kwesokuhola leli qembu ngesizini ezokwethwasa ka-2020/2021 ngaphansi komqhudelwano omusha iDStv Premiership.AmaZulu azovula ne-Orlando Pirates eJonsson Kings Park, eThekwini ngo-Okthoba 24 ebusuku.UMbatha (31), ongunozinti wokuqina kuleli qembu, usho kanjena nje kuke kwavela ngasekupheleni kwesizini edlule ngenkathi uDlamini eseyibamba lomqeqeshi, ukuthi uthola ukwesekwa okukhulu kubadlali beqembu futhi bazimisele ngokumfela enkundleni.UDlamini unikwe umsebenzi wokubamba kwesokuqeqesha ngoMashi, emva kokuthi obengumqeqeshi uJosef Vukusic enikwe ikhefu, eliphuthumayo- nogcine ekhonjwe indlela ngokomthetho ngo-Agasti, ukwazile ukuhlenga leli qembu ezembeni lagcina liqeda isizini ephelile lisendaweni ka-13 kwilog.“Ukusebenza nomqeqeshi * -Ayanda (Dlamini) kuyinto esiyithokozela kakhulu thina badlali selokhu eqale ukusebenza nathi (ngoMashi).“Okokuqala nje ungumqeqeshi oluqondayo usikompilo lweqembu, kanti uluqonda kahle nolimi lwebhola, kulula ukuxhumana nawo wonke umdlali,” kubeka uMbatha.Unabe wathi ngaphandle nje kwalokho ucabanga ukuthi sesifikile isikhathi sokuthi nabo bengadlali, hhayi abaMaZulu kuphela ukuthi babahloniphe abaqeqeshi balapha ekhaya eNingizimu Afrika ikakhulukazi abamnyama njengoba benza kubaqeqeshi bokufika.“Nathi-ke sikubone kufanele  ukuthi simnike inhlonipho emfanele umqeqeshi * -Ayanda (Dlamini) naleyo ebesimnika yona umqeqeshi obekhona ngaphambi kwakhe (uVukusic),” kusho uMbatha.UMbatha othi nakuba uDlamini exhumana kalula nabadlali futhi bekuthola kulula ukusebenza naye, kodwa uyakuveza nokuthi lo mqeqeshi “ kuyaphela ukudlala” uma sekusetshenzwa, futhi ufuna ukubona wonke umdlali ezinikela ejimini.“Kodwa-ke futhi njengabadlali sikuqonda kahle ukuthi umqeqeshi * -Ayanda (Dlamini) uma esesebenza usuke esesebenza, ngakho wonke umdlali kufanele akhombise ukuzimisela nokuzinikela uma sekusetshenzwa ngoba sonke sisemsebenzini.“Into enhle ngaye wukuthi ubaphatha bonke abadlali ngendlela efanayo, akakhethi phela emasini, kanti-ke uma ubheda akakufihleli ukuthi uyabheda.“Ukutshela ngqo futhi lokho ukwenza kunanoma yimuphi umdlali.”USuthu lwagcina ngesizini ka-2011/2012 ukuqeda isizini yePremiership lusendaweni enhle kwi-log lumi kweyesikhombisa.Ekuqaleni kwale nyanga AmaZulu adayiselwe usomabhizinisi uSandile Zungu, ofike waveza ukumeseka okukhulu uDlamini ethi akathenge abadlali abazoqinisa iqembu. Indawo kanozinti kubukeka engeke azikhathaze ngayo ngoba uMbatha unombango omuhle kuNeil Boshoff noJean Amonome waseGabon.
title: Luzolwela ukubuyisa isithunzi uSuthu

text:
BONISWA MOHALEU MPHEKI owalala indawo yesibili ohlelweni lwethelevishini iMasterChef SA, uNksz Siphokazi Mdlankomo, ugqugquzele abantu ukuba bangadidwa wudumo bagcine sebeshiye imisebenzi yabo ngoba kaluzi nemali.UNksz Mdlankomo (40) uthi ukungenela iMasterChef SA kumvulele amathuba amaningi kodwa lokhu akumenzanga washiya umsebenzi wakhe wasejalidini njengoba esawa evuka nabelungu bakhe.“Ngangigqugquzelwa ngabelungu bami ukuba ngingenele iMasterChef SA, ngakho ngeke ngikwazi ukuvele ngibashiye. Udumo alusho ukuthi usuyisicebi ngakho ngicela abantu bakithi bangadidwa yilona ngoba uma ubonakala kuthelevishini amathuba ayavuleka kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi usunemali eyanele kangangokuthi usungashiya nomsebenzi wakho,” kusho uNksz Mdlankomo.Namhlanje uzobe eseDurban Exhibition Centre nabanye abapheki kwiGood Food & Wine Show. Kuzobe kukhona uJenny Morris, Brent Owens, Claire Allen, Ndumiso Mncwabe, Penny Fitchet, Renae Smith, Reza Mahammad, Rick Stein, Roxanne Wardman noYudhika Sujanani.Kuzobe kukhona nosaziwayo okubalwa kubo u-J Something weMiCasa, Lorna Maseko wohlelo lwethelevishini i
Top Billing nabanye abaningi.Amathikithi abiza u-R115 kuhlangene namavawusha okuphuza iwayini, nengilazi yakhona. Izingane ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu-12 zingena mahhala.Amathikithi okubuka abapheki baphesheya abiza u-R100 kuthi awabaseNingizimu Afrika abe ngu-R75.Uveze ukuthi amathuba anawo ayamsiza ukuba alandele iphupho lakhe njengoba eyinxusa lakwa-Pick n Pay. UNksz Mdlankomo unengane eyodwa athi iyona nomndeni wakubo eyenza ukuthi angadidwa wudumo ahlale emsebenzini.“Uma unomndeni awukwazi ukuvele ushiye umsebenzi ngoba usuthole udumo. Kumele uqhubeke unakekele umndeni wakho noma usuvela kuthelevishini. Akulula ukulandela iphupho lakho kumele ubekezele, usebenze ngokuzikhandla futhi uphokophele phambili,” kusho uNksz Mdlankomo.Ugqugquzele abafuna ukuphumelela ukuba basondelane nabantu abalungile, abazobagqugquzela ukuthi benze abakuthandayo.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi abaqashi bakhe bayamgqugquzela kukho konke akwenzayo futhi noma esedikibala yibona abenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyabekezela.Uthe akashadile okwamanje ngoba umshado akuyona into ehamba phambili ezinhlelweni zakhe okwamanje, yize enaye umuntu ahlekisana naye.Uphethe ngokuthi akasazimisele ngokuba nengane ngoba akafuni ukuba ngugogo wayo.
title: Alumdidisi udumo umpheki ovelele

text: AMALUNGU e-ANC anganeme eFree State asabise le nhlangano ngokuthi ingqungquthela kazwelonke ezoqala ngoMgqibelo isengcupheni yokuthathwa njengento engekho uma icala elifakwe yilamalungu liphumelela enkantolo.UMnuz Tebogo Bozo oyiPhini, likaNobhala wegatsha elikuwadi 8 eMangaung, uthe amagatsha amaningi afake amacala eNkantolo eNkulu yaseFree State ngenxa yenkohlakalo emihlanganweni yamagatsha.“Imiphumela yengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi be-ANC eFree State kufanele ithathwe njengento engekho. Uma iqhubeka njengokuthathwa njengento ekhona kusho ukuthi ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi bukazwelonke be-ANC isengcupheni yokuthathwa njengento engekho,” kusho uBozo.UBozo namalungu e-ANC amathathu eFree State: oNksz Matshepo Ramakatsa, Nksz Pinky Cuze noMnuz Khehla Mosikidi bathe kungenzeka kuvote amalungu angekho emthethweni kwingqungquthela kazwelonke.Bathi ayikho semthethweni ingqungquthela ebuyisele uSihlalo waseFree State uMnuz Ace Magashule esikhundleni sakhe.Bafuna nomhlangano we-ANC eFree State omemezele ukuthi kwesekwa uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma ukuba angene esikhundleni sokwengamela i-ANC uthathwe njengongekho semthethweni kuzitshwe nezinqumo zawo.Bafuna kuvinjwe nezithunywa zamagatsha aseFree State ukuba ziyovota engqungqutheleni ka-54 ye-ANC ezoqala ngoMgqibelo eNasrec.Esitatimendeni esifungelwe, uBozo usola uNgqongqoshe wezaMandla uMnuz David Mahlobo noNobhala we-ANC eFree State uMnuz William Bulwane ngokuyenga amalungu amabili e-ANC oMnuz Ndoyisile Bozo noMnuz Mbulelo Jafta ukuthi asebenzisane nolunye uhlaka ukuze ezokwazi ukuya engqungqutheleni yesifundazwe.Kodwa uBozo noJafta banqabile base bevinjelwa ukuba baye engqungqutheleni yesifundazwe.“Lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi kuvinjwa amalungu eseka uCR17 (uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa). Abameli bethu bazilungiselela ukuya enkantolo ngoLwesine, sizimisele ukuvikela i-ANC,” kusho uBozo.Ngakolunye uhlangothi izolo abantu abaseka owayenguMgcinimafa we-ANC uMnuz Mathews Phosa balihoxisile icala akade belifake enkantolo befuna kuhoxiswe imiphumela yengqungquthela yaseMpumalanga emuva kokuxoxisana nobuholi balesiya sifundazwe.Ummeli wabantu bakaPhosa, u-Adv Dali Mpofu, utshele uJaji Edwin Molahlehi ukuthi abathintekayo sebelulungise udaba ngaphandle kwenkantolo.UJaji Molahlehi uthe amalungu e-ANC angaboni ngasolinye kufanele axoxisane ngezinkinga zawo.INkantolo eNkulu yase-Eastern Cape isichithile isicelo samalungu angu-11 e-ANC akade efuna ingqungquthela eyakhetha uSihlalo uMnuz Oscar Mabuyane ithathwe njengento engekho.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, omakadebona be-ANC bacele amalungu aya engqungqutheleni ukuba alandele umthetho wenhlangano avotele abantu abazosebenzela ukubuyisa isithunzi se-ANC.
title: AbaseFree State basabisa i-ANC

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, uhlambuluke ngokuthi ukuxakwa yiKaizer Chiefs enkundleni kumenze wagcina elincamela iphuzu emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, ngoMgqibelo.ISundowns igcine inqobe ngo 2-1 emdlalweni ebikade ilandela kuwona izithunzi uqala waze wayophela. Ibikade ibekwe phambili ngu-Anthony Laffor ngomzuzu wesithathu umdlalo uqalile kodwa uWillard Katsande washayela iChiefs elokulinganisa. Sekusele imizuzu eyisishiyagalolunye umdlalo uphele, unozinti weChiefs, uVirgil Vries, wenze iphutha weqiwa yibhola walivalela phakathi uLebohang Maboe.Ngokuwina lo mdlalo, iSundowns iqhubekile nerekhodi layo lokungehlulwa kusukela kuqale isizini ka-2018/2019. Iphule elomqeqeshi weChiefs * -Ernst Middendorp lokungehlulwa kusukela ebuyile eNaturena.UMosimane uvumile ukuthi bekungabafanele ukuphuma namaphuzu amathathu eFNB Stadium.“Ukucazelana ngamaphuzu bekuzoba wumphumela okahle. Kodwa ibhola ngoba liyibhola ngeke ungajabuli ngokuthola amaphuzu amathathu. Bengikade sengikwamukele ukuthi sizodlala ngokulingana. Amaphutha ayenzeka ngoba uyawaphoqa ukuthi enzeke. Ngikhumbula silapha nyakenye emdlalweni weligi, sazizwa ngendlela efanayo ngesikhathi uBangaly (Soumahoro) elishaya ekhaya. Namuhla bekuyisikhathi sethu sokuhlomula. Lo mdlalo siwuntshontshile,” kusho uMosimane.“Bekuwumdlalo onzima ikakhulukazi ngoba siphuma emaholidini. Lo mdlalo uyafana nesiwudlale neChiefs ekhaya. Kuyabonakala ukuthi iChiefs yiqembu elihlukile, lihlelekile. Bekunzima kithina, kungaqondakali esiwombeni sokuqala ukuthi idlala kanjani. Kusithathe isikhathi ukuthola ukuthi badlala kanjani. Emuva kokushaya igoli lokuqala sishone phansi ngoba iChiefs idlala ngendlela ehlukile, ngendlela ebengingayilindele. Kodwa bengibheke okuthize okuhlukile. Sithwale kanzima ukumaka uGeorge (Maluleka) ngoba uyena obekade ephaka amabhola, uLebo ubesithwesa inkinga kwesokudla. Ngiyazibuza ukuthi mangaki amaqembu azoza lapha athole amaphuzu. Akulula. Kungithathe isikhathi nami (ukubona ukuthi badlala kanjani). Ngesikhathi sekhefu kudingeke ngilungise izinto.”ISundowns idlale ngaphandle kwabadlali abamqoka uThemba Zwane, Denis Onyango noWayne Arendse abalimele.UMosimane uphinde wasikhomba kwiBidvest Wits isicoco seligi ngenxa yokuthi izinkunzi zixineke emidlalweni yeCAF. I-Orlando Pirates esendaweni yesibili idlulele esigabeni samaqoqo kwiChampions League. IChiefs ilwela ukungena kowamaqoqo eConfederation Cup. AmaBrazilians azoqala eyamaqoqo neLobi Stars yaseNigeria ngoLwesihlanu ekuhambeni.“Kusukela manje sizodlala njalo ezinsukwini ezintathu. Isikhala esinaso esezinsuku ezine kuphela singadlali ibhola. Sizodlala imidlalo ewu-32 kusukela manje. Yisizini leyo, yiligi. Ukuhamba nokulimala kwabadlali. Besingamdlalisa * -Onyango kodwa sinemidlalo eyisithupha ezayo, sizomdinga,” kusho uMosimane.
title: 'Bengizokwamukela ukwabelana ngamaphuzu'

text: UZIBONA enesikweletu esimhlalele umdlali weSuperSport United, George Lebese, ofike kuleli qembu ngoJanuwari.ULebese ubolekwe ngaMatsatsantsa a Pitori kuze kuphele isizini komakhelwane bawo, iMamelodi Sundowns abelizwa ngendaba ijezi kubona.Lo mdlali ufike kumaBrazilians ngesizini ka-2017/22018 esuka kwiKaizer Chiefs ayeshiye kuyona ekhala ngokungasitholi isikimu ngaphansi kukaSteve Komphela. Nokho izinto azimhambelanga kahle eChloorkop, kuthiwa kumele ehlise umzimba ukuze abuyele esimeni esifanele ukudlala.Ekhuluma nabezindaba ngaphambi komdlalo we-United ne-Orlando Pirates onamuhla, uLebese uveze ukuthi ujabule kuMatsatsantsa. Umdlalo useMbombela Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.“Kumele ngenze konke ngisebenze ngokuzikhandla ukukhokhela ukwethembeka usihlalo neqembu abakukhombise kimina. Engikuhlosile wukusiza iqembu ekutholeni amaphuzu,” kusho uLebese.Amaphuzu iyawadinga impela i-United elwela ukuqeda kwiTop 4 kule sizini ngokusho kukazakwabo kaLebese, uReneilwe Letsholonyane. Ngesizini edlule bangene ngemizuzu yokugcina kumaqembu ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu kwi-Absa Premiership.ULebese uthe bayilungele iPirates yize bekuqonda ukuthi idlala ibhola eliphezulu kulezi zinsuku.“Siyayiqonda indlela abahlasela ngayo. Bayingozi futhi bayawashaya amagoli. Okwethu wukuthi sizame ukukuvimba lokho bese silwela ukuthi nathi sishaye amagoli ngakubona, sinqobe umdlalo ukuze sithole amaphuzu,” kusho uLebese.Uthe kusukela efikile eqenjini elisha zonke izinto zihamba kahle ngemuva kokukhathazeka ngesikhathi kungacaci ukuthi kuzokwenzakalani ngaye ngoJanuwari kuvulwe iwindi.“Ngangingenalo ulwazi (ngokuthi uzosayina kwi-United) kwaze kwaba wusuku lokugcina okwakungikhathaza futhi anginalo ulwazi ukuthi kungani kwathatha isikhathi eside ukuthi kwenzeke (ukusayina). Ngosuku lokugcina ngathola ucingo kwimenenja yami lungazisa ngokuthi kukhona iqembu elingase lingisayine. Ngazizwa ngikhululekile ngesikhathi sengihamba,” kusho uLebese.Ebuzwa ukuthi uzobuyela yini kwiSundowns uma sekuphele isivumelwano sokubelekiswa ngoMeyi, uthe: “Angazi. Ngeke ngikwazi ukuphendula lokho."
title: ULebese nesifiso sokujabulisa i-United ithole amaphuzu

text: IMALI ebekelwe ukunxephezela okungenzeka balinyazwe imigomo yeCovid-19 ingase ifinyelele ku-R250 million ngonyaka wokuqala.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Zweli Mkhize, usho kanje ngesikhathi ephendula imibuzo ePhalamende ngoMsombuluko ntambama.INingizimu Afrika yenza isivumelwano nabakhiqizi bemigomo yeCovid-19 ezosetshenziswa kuleli, okuyiPfizer neJohnson&Johnson ukuthi izosungula isikhwama,  iNo Fault Compansation Fund (NFC)  okuzofakwa kuyo izicelo zokunxeshezelwa uma kwenzeka kuba khona abalinyazwa  umgomo.Uthe kulesi  sikhwama awuzukudinga ukuthi ube nommeli  ukuze ufake isicelo sokunxeshezelwa kodwa uma ulimele kumele uqale kuso ngaphambi kokuthi uthathe isinyathelo somthetho.Uqhube wathi  uma unganelisekile ngesinxephezelo isikhwama esizobe sifuna ukukunxephezela ngaso uyakwazi ukusidlulisela phambili isikhalo sakho  ekomitini elizobe libhekele abangenelisekile, uma ungakutholi ukwaneliseka nakulona  uyakwazi ukuqhubeka ufake abomthetho odabeni lwakho.Uthe le mali isuselwa ekutheni kungenzeka babe phakathi kuka-800 kuya ku-2000  abantu okungenzeka bafake izicelo zokunxeshezelwa ezizophasa ngonyaka wokuqala."
