Le mali ibalwe yahlanganisa nemali ezosebenza ngesikhathi kwenziwa imicikilisho elandelwayo uma ufake isicelo sokunxeshezelwa,"  kusho yena.INingizimu Afrika isayine isivumelwano sokuthi izothenga umgomo okhiqizwa iJ&J ongu- 31 million nongu-30 million okhiqizwa yiPfizer.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, uthe  uMnyango wezeMpilo yiwona ozobhekana nokuvula i-akhawunti yalesi sikhwama.
title: UR250 million ozonxephezela abazolinyazwa yimigomo yeCovid-19

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthi amaphaphu phansi kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika nge-coronavirus ngoba uhulumeni umi ngomumo ukulwa nalesi sifo.UMkhize uthe abavela eChina bazohlolwa uma befika ezikhumulweni zamabhanoyi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abanayo i-coronavirus.Uma kutholakala ukuthi umuntu uyashisa uzophuthunyiswa esibhedlela.“Ucwaningo nge-coronavirus ehlasele eWuhan luyaqhubeka. Kuvela ukuthi leli gciwane lithatha izinsuku ezimbili kuya kwezingu-14 ukuthi liziveze kumuntu. Ongenwe yi-coronavirus kuba sengathi uphethwe wumkhuhlane abe nemfiva. Sisiqaphe ngeso lokhozi lesi sifo siwuMnyango wezeMpilo. Siyacela abantu bangayi eHubei ngoba nohulumeni waseChina akekho amvumela ukuthi aye kuleya ndawo,” kusho uMkhize.NgokweNew York Times izibalo zakamuva zikhombisa ukuthi bangu-200 abashonile kanti babalelwa ku-9 800 abathelelekile. “Kukhona umuntu okuthiwa unezimpawu ze-coronavirus eZambia, sisalinde imiphumela kodwa asikho isidingo sokuthi abantu basabe. Sisiqaphile isimo. Bonke abavela eChina bayahlolwa ngaphambi kokuthi badlulele kwezinye izindawo. Isimo sizoqashwa ngeso lokhozi kuzo zonke izikhumulo zamabhanoyi lapho kungena khona abantu abavela eChina,” kusho uMkhize.Uhulumeni waseChina uthe akekho ovumelekile ukuphuma eHubei lapho kuqubuke khona i-coronavirus. Uze wakha isibhedlela esilala abantu abawu-1 000 ngokushesha ukuze abanezimpawu zalesi sifo, basheshe bathathwe bayolaliswa bodwa.NgoLwesine iWorld Health Organisation imemezele ukuthi icoronavirus isiyisimo esibhekene nomhlaba wonke. UMkhize ubehambisana noNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezaseKhaya, uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi, owezeMpilo eGauteng uDkt Bandile Masuku, ababhekelele ukubheduka kwezifo eNingizimu Afrika, abeWorld Health Organisation nabaseChina.IDA ithe uNgqongqoshe wezangaPhandle, uNkk Naledi Pandor, kufanele angenelele, aqinisekise ukuthi abantu bakuleli abaseChina baphephile.Ithe ixhumane nabantu bakuleli abawu-100 abavaleleke eHubei futhi abangakwazi ukuza kuleli ngenxa yokuthi abavumelekile ukuphuma kuleya ndawo.Ithe ikhathazekile ngalokhu ngoba abantu abatshelwa ukuthi kufanele baye kuphi ukuze bathole usizo uma befuna ukubuyela emazweni abo.UMkhize uthe izakhamuzi zakuleli eziseChina zizonakekelwa njengabantu baseChina, ngeke ziyekelelwe.
title: Unxusa izakhamuzi zingethuswa yigciwane

text: SABELO NSELEI-IFP isifake amaphepha eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ifuna kuxoshwe uNkk Zandile Gumede njengelungu lesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.Icala lizolalelwa ngoJanuwari 14.I-IFP ithi igcine iphoqeleka ukuthi ibheke enkantolo emva kwezingxoxo ezingaphumelelanga nobuholi be-ANC, lapho ibincenga khona i-ANC ukuthi iguqule isinqumo sayo sokuqokela uNkk Gumede kulesi sikhundla.Ukufungiswa kukaNkk Gumede njengelungu lesiShayamthetho sesifundazwe ngo-Agasti kwasusa omkhulu umsindo abaningi besola i-ANC ngokukhuphulela uNkk Gumede izimendlela nakuba ebhekene namacala enkohlakalo athinta ithenda yezigidi zamaRandi.Nakuba uNkk Gumede afungiswa ezinyangeni ezimbili ezedlule, akakaze ahambele ngisho owodwa umhlangano wesiShayamthetho ngoba i-ANC yanquma ukuthi akashenxe esikhundleni emva komsindo owasuka efungiswa.UNkk Gumede waqokelwa esikhundleni emuva kokuphucwa amaketanga obumeya kuMasipala waseThekwini.Ubhekene necala lenkohlakalo yethenda kaR430 million yokuqoqwa kukadoti eThekwini.I-IFP ithi uNkk Gumede akakufanele ukuba yilungu lesiShayamthetho ngoba usahamba amacala.Umengameli we-IFP obuye ahole inguyazana ye-IFP esiShayamthetho, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi i-ANC inqandwe emkhubeni wokufaka ezikhundleni ezibalulekile abaholi abasolwa ngenkohlakalo.“Kuyinhlamba kubantu baKwaZulu-Natal ukuthi uNkk Gumede uyaqhubeka nokuhola imali eshisiwe nakuba esamisiwe emsebenzi ngoba esaphenywa abomthetho ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo.“Asizukugcina ngokulwa nale nsumansumane kaNkk Gumede kuphela. I-ANC sifuna ukuyithumela umyalezo oqinile ukuthi ngeke siyibekezelele le nto yayo yokufaka ezikhundleni ezibalulekile abaholi abasolwa ngenkohlakalo.”Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela, uthe awekho amaphepha asebewatholile ababizela enkantolo.Okhulumela amagatsha e-ANC azwelana noNkk Gumede, uMnuz Mzomuhle Dube, uthe i-ANC okufanele iphawule kulolu daba.
title: I-IFP iya enkantolo ifuna i-ANC ixoshe uGumede

text: ISAQENGQELEZA phambili i-ANC kwizibalo zakamuva okhethweni lwango-2019. Kushaye u-3 ntambama iqembu elibusayo lisahlezi esicongweni ngamavoti abalelwa ku-56.33% ngesikhathi kusaqoqwe u-40% wamavoti kuzwelonke. I-ANC ilandelwa yiDA enamavoti awu-23.59%, endaweni yesithathu kuhleli i-EFF ngo-9.27%. Endaweni yesine kusahlezi iFreedom Front Plus eno-2.89%, kanti ilandelwa yi-IFP ngemuva. Imangaze abaningi kulolu khetho iFFPlus kwazise ngo-2014 yayihlezi endaweni yesikhombisa kanti kulokhu igudluze i-IFP endaweni yesine. Njengamanje kusaqoqwe amavoti abalalelwa ku-6.4 million kanti kulindeleke ukuthi imiphumela yokhetho iqale ukucaca kusihlwa namhlanje. Ephawula ngezibalo ze-ANC njengamanje umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uMnuz Ralph Mathekga uthe uma i-ANC iphuma no-58% wamavoti izobe isebenzile uma ubuka izinkinga leli qembu elibhekane nazo ngaphambi kokhetho. Uthe I-EFF izokhula kodwa ngeke ifinyelele kwisibalo samavoti ebifisa ukufika kuso. "I-EFF izokhula kodwa hhayi ngalendlela ebizitshela ukuthi izokhula ngayo. Abavoti babhekisise konke okwenzeke ezweni okuthinta imibhikisho i-EFF ebe nesandla kuyo. Sebezokwazi ukuthi yini abantu abangeke bayimele," usho kanje. KwaZulu-Natal I-ANC isahola phambili ngamavoti nakhona njengoba ihlezi ku-56%, ilandelwa yi-IFP eku-19%, endaweni yesithathu kuhlezi iDA ngo-11%I-ANC ihlezi esicongweni ezifundazweni ezingu-8 zakuleli, isele ngemuva kuphela eWestern Cape alpha eholwa khona yiDA enamavoti awu-55%IOL
title: #Ukhetho2019: Isaqengqeleza phambili I-ANC ezibalweni zakamuva

text: NOKUBONGWA  PHENYANEUMCULI waseLimpopo ozakhele igama  ngengoma iJerusalema uMaster KG, ubonga abalandeli bakhe emhlabeni wonke njengoba ngeSonto ebusuku ehlabane ngendondo yeBest African Act, emcimbini ama-2020 MTV EMA’s.Lo mcimbi obuqoshelwe ezindaweni ezehlukene e-Europe, ubukhonjiswa eziteshini ezimbili iMTV Base (322) neMTV (130) kanti ubuye wakhonjiswa ngoMsombuluko kuzona lezi ziteshi ngo-6 ntambama.Ekhuluma ngokudla kwakhe umhlanganiso uMaster KG, akamshiyanga ngaphandle uNomcebo Zikode athe wenze umsebenzi omkhulu kule ngoma.“Ngibonga kakhulu kuNomcebo ngokuzinikela, ngeke ngilishiye ngaphandle nethimba engisebenzisana nalo kule ndima i-Open Mic Productions. Ngeke ngibashiye nabantu engithe ngikhipha le ngoma edume umhlaba wonke bangixhasa bayithenga bayidansela futhi,” kusho le nsizwa.Uthe le ndondo akayihlomulanga yedwa kodwa nabo bonke ozakwabo abeqokwe nabo.“Eyethu sonke ebesiqokiwe kulo mkhakha, abantu  ebenginabo umsebenzi wabo uyancomeka futhi igalelo labo likhulu emhlabeni wonke njengoba umsebenzi wabo uzikhulumela wona,” kuchaza yena.Le nsizwa ihlomula ngale ndondo nje, ilandela abanye ozakwabo asebeke bayithola okukhona kubo uBurna Boy, Davido noTiwa Savage.Kulo nyaka ubeqokwe nabaculi okukhona kubo iqembu iScorpion Kings elakhiwe uDJ Maphorisa noKabza de Small, Burna Boy, Rema, Sheebah noGaz Mawete.Abanye abaculi baphesheya kwezilwandle abahlabane ngezindondo ezihlukene kulo mcimbi kukhona iqembu iBTS ehlabane ngezindondo ezine, Lady Gaga,  DJ Khaled, Cardi B nentokazi yomlingisi wakuleli uDumsani Dlamini uDoja Cat ezinze e-USA, ehlabane ngendondo yeBest Newcomer.UNgqongqoshe wamaCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke uNathi Mthethwa,  uhalalisele uMaster KG ngokuhlabana ngendondo.Uthe elakuleli liyaziqhenya ngokuba nabaculi abafana nalaba.Uqhube wathi ukuhlabana ngendondo ngokuhlanganyela noNomcebo yinto eyongena emlandweni.Ne-ANC ngomlomo kaPule Mabe imhalalisele uMaster KG ngale ndondo.“Ubesanda kuthola enye impumelelo ngale ngoma njengoba isanda kubukwa ngabantu abangaphezu kuka-100 million kuYouTube. Ukuthola le ndondo kuseyisiqiniseko sokuthi amaciko ase-Afrika angaqhudelana namanye asemazweni ahlukene futhi enze umsebenzi oncomekayo. Sicela uMaster KG ngokuhlabana kwakhe agqugquzele aphinde anikeze ukuzethemba entsheni nakumaciko asafufusa,” kuphetha uPule.UMASTER KG ohlabane ngendondo yeBest African Act emcimbini amaMTV EMAs abengeSonto ngengoma iJerusalemaIsithombe: TWITTER
title: UMaster KG ubonge abalandeli ehlabana ngeye-MTV

text:
MINENHLE MKHIZEI KAIZER Chiefs ithi ayixhumi ayixhasi odabeni lomdlali wayo u-Edward Manqele osatshiswa ngozibiza ngemenenja yakhe uJoshai Mphono ngokumthathela izinyathelo zomthetho uma kuwukuthi lo mdali uyaqhubeka nokuqinisa ikhanda ngokumkhokhela ingxenye yemali yakhe ngokusayina naleli qembu laseNaturena.UMphono usola uManqele ngokumhamba ngemuva ngesikhathi esayina inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu neChiefs okwenze ukuthi agcine engalitholanga igwaxaza lika-15% okuyisivumelwano abasenza nomdlali ngesikhathi benquma ukusebenzisana.UMphono utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi unenkontileka yeminyaka emibili yokwengamela zonke izindaba zikaManqele ezithinta ibhola.Imenenja yaMakhosi, uBobby Motaung ithintwa yileli phephandaba ngalolu daba, iveze ukuthi ayingeni ezindabeni zikaManqele noMphono.“Akakhulume naye umdlali ngoba uthi ungaphansi kwesitebela sakhe. Thina asingeni ezindabeni zabo. Konke sakulandela ngendlela ngesikhathi sisayinisa uManqele. Uma elwa nomdlali akalwe naye angasifaki thina ngoba asihlangane. Asizimisele futhi ukuzifaka ezindabeni zabo. Lo muntu (uMphono) akakhulume nomdlali hhayi neChiefs,” kusho uMotaung.UManqele obegijima kuChippa United usephenduke ithemba lomqeqeshi weChiefs uSteve “Mphathi” Komphela kwazise useqala ngaye noCamaldine Abraw phambili. Naye u-Abraw ovamise ukuqala noManqele phambili ubangwa yiChiefs neBloemfontein Celtic.UMphono uthe akazimisele ngokulwa neChiefs kodwa ufuna isixazululo.“UManqele unenkontileka yeminyaka emibili yokusebenzisa nami ezindabeni zakhe. Amalungelo akhe aphethwe yimina. Ngesikhathi esayina kuChiefs wasayina ngaphandle kolwazi lwami. IChiefs ngayithinta ngiyibuza ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani ukuthi isayinise umdlali ingangazisanga kodwa yathi uthe akanayo imenenja,” kusho uMphono.“UManqele ngizamile ukumthola ocingweni lwakhe kodwa washintsha inombolo. IChiefs ngiyazisile ukuthi ngifuna sihlale phansi sizame ukuphuma nesixazululo kulolu daba. Ngiyazi ukuthi uBobby ungithatha kancane uzitshela ukuthi ngeke ngenze lutho. Mina ngikhuluma nobaba wakhe (uKaizer Motaung ongusihlalo). Ngisalinde umsizi wakhe (uKaizer) ukuthi angitshele ukuthi yiluphi usuku esizohlangana ngalo. Uma kungukuthi asisitholi isixazululo ngizophoqeleka ukuthi udaba ngiludlulisele ezithebeni zeDispute Resolution Chamber yePSL. Ukwenza lokho yinto engingayinqeni. UBobby angasho nje ukuthi akangeni kodwa usazongena,” kusho uMphono.Le menenja isizakhele igama ngokuwina amacala. Isanda kuphuma phambili bebanga inkontileka yakwaPuma ebizotholwa nguGeorge Lebese weChiefs. NoJose Torrealba wasizwa nguyena uMphono kuthiwa usayine inkontileka engayisayinanga kuSundowns.“Emasontweni amabili edlule ngithole incwandi eqhamuka kubammeli bakaManqele ingazisa ukuthi ufuna ukunqamula inkontileka yokusebenza phakathi kwami naye. Anginankinga nalokho kodwa ngifuna imali ngokusayina kwakhe kuChiefs ngoba usayine engaphansi kwami. Ngokwemithetho yeFifa uma ufuna ukunqamula inkontileka nemenenja yakho kumele uyazise ngaphambi kwezinyanga ezintathu, into angayenzanga.”
title: Imenenja ibhodla umlilo ngoManqele

text: UMDLALI wasesiswini we-Orlando Pirates, uMusa Nyatama, akafuni bakufake emakhanda ukuhlulwa kweMamelodi Sundowns afisa balwele ukuziphindiselela kuyona.I-Pirates izobhekana neSundowns emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLoftus Versfeld Stadium ngoMgqibelo ngo-3.30 ntambama.Ngempelasonto eZimnyama ziqale kahle unyaka u-2018 zihlula iBaroka ngo 3-1. Lo mphumela umjabulisile umqeqeshi uMilutin Sredojevic obekubukeka ethwele kanzima ukuhlanganisa izinto kuleli qembu kusukela efikile ekuqaleni kwesizini.Nokho isimo sihlukile kwiSundowns evale u-2017 ngesibhaxu esithole kwiCape Town City. Ngempelasonto iphinde yaphazamiseka ukuvula igebe esicongweni se-log yePremiership ngesikhathi ihlulwa yiPolokwane City ngo 3-2.“Ngijabule ngendlela engiyibambe ngayo kusukela ngifike kwiPirates nakuba iqembu belikade lingenzi kahle. Ukuwina kwethu kuzonyusa ukuzethemba kithina. Uma sesibhekene neSundowns kufanele siqhubeke nokudlala kanjena. Kufanele sifike sizilungiselele,” kusho uNyatama obeyibamba kwiBloemfontein Celtic.“Kuzoba nzima ukubhekana neSundowns, ikakhulukazi njengoba ihluliwe. Izoza ifuhleleka. Ngiyazi ukuthi emzuliswaneni wokuqala basihlulile. Nathi kufanele siwuwine lona.”NgoMgqibelo uNyatama ushaye igoli bebhekene neBaroka.Umdlalo weSundowns nePirates usujwayele ukuhambisana nezigigaba. Ngesizini edlule abalandeli bePirates bagcine sebeshaya abadlali babo ebhentshini bebasola ngokungazimiseli enkundleni ngesikhathi iSundowns ibagijimisa ngo 6-0.Nyakenye ngesikhathi iSundowns ixebula iPirates ng 3-1, ukaputeni uHlompho Kekana, ushaye igoli engasemugqeni ohlukanisa inkundla. Lokho kwenze abalandeli bagxeke unozinti uWayne Sandilands osesizwa ngendaba isikimu kweZimnyama.UNyatama, osedlaliswa indawo yokumaka esiswini nozakwabo ayibamba nabo enkabeni yenkundla, bahlalelwe wumqansa wokubhekana noKekana, Tiyani Mabunda no-Oupa Manyisa esiswini seSundowns.USredojevic usezame abadlali abehlukene enkabeni yenkundla kodwa abekho asebadlalise ndawonye isikhathi eside.Kulaba badlali kukhona ukaputeni uThabo Matlaba, Thami Sangweni, Mpho Makola nabanye.“Ngesikhathi ngifika kwiPirates umqeqeshi ungitshelile ukuthi uzongidlalisa indawo yokumaka neyokuhlasela. Ngiyabonga ukwesekwa ozakwethu.Isisu seSundowns sinabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu kodwa sizilungiselele ukufela enkundleni,” kusho uNyatama.
title: Sizilungiselele ukufela enkundleni: Nyatama

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIJomo Cosmos (1) 1Orlando Pirates (2) 3I-ORLANDO Pirates isize iJomo Cosmos ngokuyiwashisa ijezi kuLast 16 yeNedbank Cup izolo ntambama e-Olen Park Stadium, ePotchefstroom, okuyinto engase ibe ngolukhulu usizo kuJomo Sono osezobhekana kuphela nemizamo yokugwema ukugencwa yizembe ku-Absa Premiership.IBucs ize kulo mdlalo ivele ihambela phezulu kwazise isanda kubhuquzisa iCosmos ngo-5-0 koweligi. Nakuba iBucs ibithwelwe ngeqoma kodwa umqeqeshi wayo u-Eric Tinkler ngaphambi komdlalo uthe ubakhumbuzile abadlali bakhe ukuthi kwenzekani begcina ukuvakashela iCosmos.Umdlalo uqale ngendlela vele ebilindelekile kuyiPirates ebiwuthwele, okufakazelwe wukungena kwegoli likaTendai Ndoro ngomzuzu wesithathu umdlalo uqalile, ngemuva komdlalo omuhle kaRooi Mahamutsa ogobe uswidi webhola. UMahamutsa ubebonakala okokuqala kuPirates ngemuva kwezinyanga ezimbili ezihleli ekhaya ngenxa yokulimala.Leli goli lisize iBucs yadlala ngokukhululeka kwazise ibisihamba phambili. Nesimo sezulu besingasizi kwazise belishisa likhipha umkhovu etsheni. Nakulo mdlalo uSono ubedlalisa abafana abancane kulandela ukushaywa kwezethenjwa zakhe ngo 5-0 yiyona iBucs.Zibuya ngakho kodwa ekhefini lokuphuza amanzi ngomzuzu ka-25 uChalton Mashumba, okunguyena owashaya igoli iBucs iguqiswa yiCosmos, ubuyise leli qembu ngenguzunga yeshodi eshaye ipali yakhalakathela enethini, wasala eneka izandla uBrighton Mhlongo obevimbele iBucs.Ukungena kwaleli goli kubukeke sengathi kuyayivusa emaqandeni iCosmos, ebisiphaselana ngokukhululeka kubonakala nokuthi ukuzethemba sekubuyile. Noqina thambo ububonakala kulo mdlalo, ikakhulukazi uvela ngakwezikaJomo Sono. Bekumele ayibeke phambili iBucs uNdoro ngomzuzu ka-31 kodwa walishaya phezulu kwamapali. Kulandele inqwaba yamathuba kodwa iBucs yehluleka ukuthola igoli kwaze kwafika ithuba lika-Amigo Memela ngoka-45. Kudlule imizuzu emithathu zibuye ekhefini uNdoro washaya elesithathu.Ngemuva kwaleli goli bese zilokhu zithengana kungekho kodwa iqembu elifika kuvalwe amehlo kwaze kwaba yimizuzu yokugcina, okubonakale kuyona uLehlohonolo Majoro noThandani Ntshumayelo bobabili obese kunesikhathi bengadlali ngezizathu ezahlukene.Komunye umdlalo weNedbank Cup Last 16 obukhona izolo, iLamontville Golden Arrows ishayelwe ekhaya ngo 2-0 yiBaroka FC edlala kuNational First Division (NFD).Emdlalweni wokugcina weLast 16 kuzobhekana iSuperSport United ne-University of Pretoria eLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli, kusasa ngo-7.30 ebusuku.Iyonke imiphumela yeNedbank Cup:Jomo Cosmos 1-3 Orlando Pirates; Golden Arrows 0-2 Baroka FC; Santos 0-1 Free State Stars; Mamelodi Sundowns 3-1 Mbombela United; Platinum Stars 1-2 Polokwane City; Black Aces 2-0 Maritzburg Utd; Magesi FC 0-6 Bidvest Wits
title: IPirates isize iCosmos iyibhaxabula

text: OWAYENGUMGADLI weBlack Leopards, uRudzani Ramudzuli, usola usihlalo uDavid Thidiela ngokuvalela izinkunzi ezimbili esibayeni esisodwa okuholele ekuxoshweni komqeqeshi uDylan Kerr.Ekuqaleni kwesonto, iLeopards imemezele ukuthi isihlukene noKerr okwenzeke kusaphele amahora ambalwa ehlulwe yiChippa United emdlalweni weDStv Premiership. Lo mqeqeshi ubesahole iLeopards emidlalweni eyisishiyagalolunye, waqoqa amaphuzu ayisibalo esilinganayo.URamudzuli, owayeshayela iLeopards amagoli eminyakeni edlule, uthe okudale inkinga wukuqashwa kwephini uLehlohonolo Seema ebelichithwe yiChippa."Bekulungile kunoKerr kuphela nephini lakhe uMorgan (Shivhambu) ngoba wenelisekile ngokuba kuleso sikhundla. Ngibone ngesikhathi kuqashwa uSeema ukuthi kukhona ozohamba. Awukwazi ukuqasha umqeqeshi obezimele kwelinye iqembu uzomenza iphini. Uma iqembu liwina mhlampe kungasebenza," kusho uRamudzuli."Uma usihlalo ethi kuSeema kungani umdlali othize engadlali? Uzothi yena ubefuna adlale kodwa uKerr uyena ongafuni. Ngicabanga ukuthi kube yisimo esinjalo phakathi kwabaqeqeshi.“Ngiyazi ukuthi kwenzeka kanjani kwiLeopards. Uma kuzoba nomdlalo, kufanele umqeqeshi asho ukuthi uzodlalisa bani, usihlalo ambuze ukuthi kungani umdlali othize engadlali? Uma iqembu liwina, lokhu akwenzeki njalo. Ambalwa amaqembu lapho osihlalo abangagxambukeli ekuboshelweni kwesikimu," kulanda uRamudzuli.UKerr uyaziwa ngokufuna izinto zenzeke ngendlela eqondile. Phakathi kwezinto ezimakhele amazinyo abushelelezi kwiBaroka yinkulumo yakhe yasesidlangalaleni ethi uma kungayekwa ukugxambukela emsebenzini wakhe engayibeka phezulu iBaroka. Uquliswe icala, wagcina exoshiwe.UKerr uqoke ukungaphawuli kwabezindaba ngokuxoshwa kwakhe kwiLeopards. Kunalokho, ubhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ezifanisa noJesu owakhaphelwa ngomunye wabafundi bakhe."Bekungewona umqondo ophusile ukuqasha umqeqeshi phezu komunye, umqeqeshi uyayazi indlela yakhe yokuwina. Bazobonisana nephini kodwa uma bengaphumeleli, lizomjikela lithi ngikutshelile. “Iphini linendlela elibona kufanele kudlalwe ngayo kodwa izwi lokugcina ngelomqeqeshi. Ngakho bekungeke kulunge okwenziwe yiLeopards. Iphini liyayithatha imiyalelo yabaphathi ngendlela iqembu elizoma ngayo kodwa umqeqeshi unendlela afuna ukwenza ngayo. Kuyasebenza lokho uma iphini lingakaze liqeqeshe ngokuzimela noma lingakafuni ukuqeqesha ngokuzimela," kusho uRamudzuli.
title: Kugxekwa usihlalo weLeopards ngokuxoshwa komqeqeshi

text: ISIZINI yesibili yentandokazi yomdlalo wakuMzansi Magic, iThe Queen, izoshintsha indlela abantu ababuka ngayo abanye abalingisa kuyona ngokusho kombhali omusha walo mdlalo uSihle Mthembu.Isizini yesibili iqale ekupheleni kwenyanga njengoba lo mdlalo usukhonjiswa izinsuku ezinhlanu ngesonto ngo-9 ebusuku.USihle (25), odabuka eMooi River, ujoyine lo mdlalo ekuqaleni kwesizini yesibili.“Ithimba elisebenza kwiThe Queen liyamangalisa futhi ngiyabonga kuPhathu Makwarela (omunye wabadidiyeli) ngokunginikeza ithuba. Izindaba esizogxila kuzo kule sizini zithinta abantu ngqo futhi zizokwenza abantu bashintshe indlela abacabanga ngayo ngabanye abalingisi. Abanye abantu okungenzeka ukuthi ubungabathandi uzoqala ukubathanda kanjalo nabantu obubathanda ungagcina ungabathandi,” kusho uSihle.USihle uthe wabhala umdlalo wawuthumela kubantu abahlukene ababemncoma. Wathumela nakuPhathu okwathi ngemuva kwamasonto ambalwa wabhala kuTwitter ukuthi usemkhohliwe.“Wangithumelela into yokungihlola ukuthi ngiyibhale. Ngenza kahle, manje sengila.”Le nsizwa yenze izifundo zobuntatheli eDurban University of Technology. Ike yasebenza ephephandabeni elisesitebeleni esisodwa neSolezwe, i-Independent on Saturday.Sihle Mthembu“Ngazi ngifunda uGrade 5 ngemuva kokuthi uthisha wami wesiNgisi esifundele uTom Sawyer ukuthi ngifuna ukuba wumbhali.”Uthe waqala ngokubhala imidlalo emifishane ayeyinikeza othisha ukuthi bamfundele. Esefika enyuvesi ngo-2009 waba nothando lwamafilimu.Usebhale amafilimu amabili. Kukhona ethi F is for Father ezokhonjiswa embukisweni i-International Images Film Festival for Women eZimbabwe ekupheleni kwenyanga.Uthe kukhona amanye amabili awahlanganisayo okukhona nekhuluma ngomculi waKwaZulu-Natal. Ngonyaka ozayo uzokhipha nencwadi ayibhalayo.“Ngihlela futhi nokubhala iqophamlando nefilimu engicabanga ukuthi kuzophela ngonyaka ozayo. Ngifaka nezicelo zezinhlelo ezine eziteshini ezehlukene zethelevishini engithemba ukuthi bazozithatha bese siyaqhubeka.
title: Okungalindelwa abazifelayo ngeThe Queen

text: AMAPHOYISA athungatha abasolwa abayisishiyagalolunye abebehlome beyizingovolo, abasuse iphoyisa eRichmond bayolibamba inkunzi eManguzi befuna ukuntshontsha imoto yalo.Leli phoyisa elisebenzela eRichmond, elingeke lidalulwe ngenxa yophenyo olusaqhubeka kuthiwa liluthwe izigebengu eziyisishiyagalolunye, ukuba lisuke eRichmond lize lifike eManguzi.Leli qembu lezigebengu kusolwa ukuthi lishushumbisa izimoto kwamanye amazwe.Kuthiwa abasolwa balifakele uR1000, iphoyisa, belicela ukuba lizothola ukuthi kuzoba imalini ukwakha uphahla lwendlu eyiBed & Breakfast.Umthombo osondelene nalolu daba, uthe leli phoyisa ebelingekho emsebenzini libe selithatha izingubo zokugqoka nesibhamu somsebenzi lanikela eManguzi.Kuthiwa umgilwa uthe esefika eManguzi, abasolwa abayisishiyagalolunye bebehlome beyizingovolo sebemlindile befuna ukuthatha imoto yakhe.Leli phoyisa kuthiwa beliyishintshile imoto enkulu elijwayele ukuhamba ngayo, lihamba ngemoto encane.Kuthiwa abasolwa babe sebefuna ukuba likhokhe uR30 000 ukuze balidedele.Leli phoyisa kuthiwa belingenawo kodwa bayithatha yonke imali ebeliyiphethe neselula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko wathi basaphenya.“Amaphoyisa aseManguzi aphenya icala lokubamba inkunzi. Kusaphenywa ngaleli cala,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Akekho osaboshiwe ngalesi sigameko.Maningi amacala okuntshontshwa kwezimoto aphenywa amaphoyisa aseManguzi. Kuthiwa izigebengu zithatha izimoto ezinkulu ama-4X4 namaveni ngenhloso yokuziwelisa umngcele.Lena kuthiwa ngenye yezindlela zokuba bakubambe, bakuthembise umsebenzi ngaseManguzi bese bekubamba inkunzi bakuphuce imoto.
title: Liluthwe yizigebengu iphoyisa zaligila

text: UMLINGISI okhuza ibuya emdlalweni owuchungechunge Imbewu:The Seed  uPortia Ncwane, uthe bekunzima ukubuya ngenxa yokushoda kozakwabo.UPortia (28) owaba yingxenye yalo mdlalo ngo-2018, udlala indawo kaSli Ngwenya."Ngithole ucingo lokuthi indawo yami iyabuya. Angifuni ukuqamba amanga, bekunzima ukubuyela ngaphandle kuka-Enhle Gambushe (owashona engozini yemoto ngo-2018) ngoba sasisondelene kakhulu. Bekungathi ngizombona kodwa ke umsebenzi kumele uqhubeke kunzima kunjalo," kusho uPortia oke wadlala kuZalo nasefilimini iLove Lives Here.Le ntokazi edabuka eNanda kodwa esihlala eNewlands eThekwini, ithe uSli ngumuntu ofuna kuzwakale uma ekhuluma."Ufuna inhlonipho, futhi uyazikhulumela. Njengoba manje esebuyile indawo yakhe isondelene kakhulu noKaMadonsela (Brenda Mhlongo), okuyinto ezovivinya ubudlelwano bakhe nomndeni wakwaBhengu. USli uhluke kakhulu kunami kodwa sicishe sifane ngokuthi nami ngiyayimela into yami," kuchaza uPortia.Uthe ukhuza ibuya kulo mdlalo nje, uke wanyamalala eNingizimu Afrika wayohlala e-United States of America, emuva kokuthola umfundaze weMandela Washington Fellowship for Young African Leaders eNyuvesi yaseDelaware eNewark."Bengihamba izindawo njengakoNew York ngisebenza nabezobuciko bakhona. Ngibuye ngonyaka odlule ngenza umdlalo wami ngedwa iThe Journey of Growing Pains ePlayhouse Theatre. Umdlalo ukhuluma ngezinhlungu zokukhula nokujabulela nje impilo."Le ntokazi ephinde ibe ngumdansi futhi eke yahambela amazwe ahlukene, ithe iyazifela ngobuciko nangokufukula umphakathi njengoba yaqala inhlangano engenzi nzuzo iPortia Ncwane Foundation, esiza kakhulu abantu abasha. UPortia kulindeleke ukuthi aqale ukubonakala namhlanje kwiMbewu  ekhonjiswa ku-e.tv ngo-9.30 ebusuku phakathi nesonto.
title: Umlingisi ukhuza ibuya kwiMbewu

text:
MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIK UNGASE kuxoshwe izikhulu eziphezulu kuSouth African Rugby Union (Saru) uma kungukuthi amahlebezi okuthi umqeqeshi onyamanambana kubathandi balo mdlalo uHeyneke Meyer unikwe enye inkontileka ngaphandle kokuvumelana kwesigungu esikhulu.Phakathi kwamagama avelayo lapha kukhona nelikamengameli wale nyunyana uRegan Hoskins nesikhulu esiphezulu uJurie Roux okuthiwa banike uMeyer inkontileka entsha ezophela ngo-2019. Kuthiwa uzohola R5 million ngonyaka.Nokho abazazi kangcono bathi lokhu kuzophasiswa kumbe kuchithwe ngoDisemba emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu. Kulapho kuvela khona ukuthi uma kuthiwa uMeyer uyithole ngokungemthetho le nkontileka yeminyaka emine, kukhona okufanele bajeze ngaleso senzo.Yize kunalokhu kungabaza ngekusasa lakhe kodwa uMeyer uzicelele kuSaru ukuba imgcine kuleli qembu lesizwe ngoba uyazi ukuthi ngenxa yombhoxo iNingizimu Afrika ingaphinde ihlangane, manje unesifiso sokuba yingxenye yalokho.Ngokuthola kwe
Solezwe, uMeyer uzohlala nezikhulu zeSaru kucutshungulwe inkontileka yakhe ngemuva kweNdebe yoMhlaba ephele ngeledlule e-England.Nakuba kukhona abanolwazi lokuthi uMeyer usanda kuyivuselela inkontileka yakhe ngeminye iminyaka emine kodwa indlela yena akhuluma ngayo iyakucacisa ukuthi akazi kuzokwenzekani ngekusasa lakhe kumaBhokobhoko.Ngesikhathi ememezela iqembu elidle indondo yethusi uze wancokola ngokuthi uzwa sengathi ukhuluma nabezindaba okokugcina njengomqeqeshi wamaBhokobhoko. Ngaleso sikhathi ubekhuluma ngokubaluleka kokuba yingxenye yalo mdlalo awaziyo ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uyoyihlanganisa iNingizimu Afrika.Okwenza lo mqeqeshi ezwe sengathi uhleli ngesinqe kulo msebenzi ukuhluleka ukuwina iNdebe yoMhlaba. Okwenze lokhu kwangehla kahle ukuthi ukhishwe yiNew Zealand ngamaphutha akhe okushintsha isikimu esiwombeni sesibili isidingo singekho kwazise ubehamba phambili futhi ama-All Blacks edlala engaphelele.“Ngiyayazi indima eklanywa wumbhoxo eNingizimu Afrika. Ubuyisa ithemba lokuthi izwe lisengahlangana ngakho ngingakujabulela ukuba yingxenye yalowo mlando. Ngiyazi abaningi bazongigxeka ngoba vele kulula. Ngiyavuma ngiwenzile amaphutha kodwa nginothando lokuba yingxenye yeqembu elingabuyisa ithemba ezweni,” kusho uMeyer.
title: Izinkinga kuSaru ngenkontileka kaMeyer

text: KUTHIWA kuba mnyama kakhulu uma sekuzosa, la mazwi ayiqiniso kuMnuz Nkosinathi Tongo oqale ibhizinisi emuva kokuhlala emgwaqweni izinyanga eziyisithupha.UTongo (26) odabuka kwaBhaca e-Eastern Cape wafika eThekwini ngo-2016 ezobheka amatoho ehlala nomzala wakhe.Uthi impilo yakhe yashintsha kabuhlungu ngesikhathi umzala esemxosha emzini wakhe, wagcina esehlala emgwaqweni izinyanga eziyisithupha.“Emuva kokuxoshwa wumzala ngahlala emgwaqweni ngidayisa uswidi. Ngesikhathi ngidayisa ngahlangana nowesifazane owangitshela nge-The Appliance Bank. Ngangena ezinhlelweni ze-The Appliance Bank ngo-2019 ngafunda ukulungisa impahla kagesi,” kusho uTongo.I-The Appliance Bank yisikhungo esiqeqesha amadoda angasebenzi ukuze alungise impahla kagesi. Isebenzisana nezitolo zakwaShoprite nezakwaCheckers eGauteng, Western Cape naKwaZulu-Natal, ezinikela ngempahla kagesi engasebenzi ukuze ikhandwe abafundayo.“Ngifike ngafunda ukulungisa impahla kagesi ngase ngizivulela isitolo sami esilungisa impahla kagesi. Ngikwazile ukuqasha umuntu oyedwa ongisizayo. Isitolo sibizwa ngeFamily Shop, sisemgwaqweni uMgeni, eThekwini,” kusho uTongo.Ugqugquzele abantu abasha ukuthi bangalilahli ithemba ngoba noma kunzima kanjani ekugcineni kuyakhanya.“Abukho ubunzima obungadluli noma ungazitshela ukuthi usebumnyameni  ekugcineni kuyasa. Ngesikhathi amabhizinisi amancane edonsa kanzima ngesikhathi kuvalwe izwe mina bengisebenza. Ngikwazile ukwenza imali eyanele ngathenga isiza ngakha umuzi ekhaya KwaBhaca. Ngiyakwazi nokulekelela udadewethu ngokumkhokhela imali yokufunda esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme. Bengingeke ngikwazi ukuzenza lezi zinto ukuba angingenanga ohlelweni lwakwaShoprite neThe Appliance Bank,” kusho uTongo.UNkk Tracey Gilmore obhekele ukusebenza kweThe Appliance Bank, uthe inhloso yabo wukufukula abantu abebencishwe amathuba ukuze kube namadoda azoba yisibonelo esihle ezinganeni.Uthe amadoda amaningi abawaqeqeshayo agcina esezivulele amabhizinisi njengoTongo.UMnuz Lunga Schoeman obhekele izinhlelo zokusiza umphakathi kwaShoprite, uthe bafuna ukwenza umehluko emphakathini yingakho beyingxenye yalolu hlelo.Uveze ukuthi sebenikele ngempahla kagesi ebiza uR3.92 million kwiThe Appliance Bank kanti ebiza ngaphezu kukaR61 000 inikelelwe abantu baKwaZulu-Natal emasontweni ambalwa edlule.
title: Usenebhizinisi owayehlala emgwaqweni

text: ABASEBENZI bezempilo asebejove ngomgomo weCovid-19, iJohnson&Johnson (J&J)  kungenzeka badinge omunye umjovo ozokhuthaza lo asebejove ngawo.Ungoti wezifo ezidalwa amagciwane , eWits University uSolwazi Shabir Madhi, uthe akumele ngabe kugxilwa ekutheni iJ&J ujova ngayo kanye ngoba kungenzeka kudingeke ukuthi abajove ngayo bathole omunye umjovo wokukhuthaza lo asebejove ngawo." Ngesikhathi kuhlolwa umgomo iJ&J ngaphansi kocwaningo okokuqala lo mgomo wachazwa njengomjovo osetshenziswa kane ngoba wawuhlolwa njengomgomo ozosetshenziswa uma kunezimo eziphuthumayo.  Inhloso kwakungukuthi kubhekwe ukuthi ngabe umgomo ojova ngawo kanye ungasiza yini ukuvika iCovid-19. Ukuthi uyavikela akuchazi ukuthi ukuvikela kwawo kuyalingana nomgomo ojovwa ngawo  kabili okusho ukuthi kungenzeka isikhathi sokuvikeleka singalingani ngenxa yokuthi omunye umgomo ujova kanye omunye kujovwe ngawo kabili,"  kuusho yena.Uqhube wathi abakwaziyo njengamanje wukuthi umgomo iPfizer ojovwa kabili ukuthi ojovwe ngawo angavikeleka izinyanga eziyisithupha kanti iJ&J yahlolelwa izinsuku ezingu-60 kuya kwezingu-70.UMadhi uqhube wathi: " Kungenzeka ukuthi bonke abajove ngeJ&J kudingeke ukuthi bajove ngomunye umgomo ozonikeza lo abajovwe ngawo amandla,"Usho kanjena nje eNingizimu Afrika uMnyango wezeMpilo,  usayine inkontileka neJ&J  yokuthenga umgomo ongu-30 million, nePfizer okusayinwe ukuthi umnyango uzothenga umgomo ongu-20 million ozoqala ukufika kuleli phakathi nenyanga.Bangu-800 abantu bakuleli okwenziwe ngabo ucwaningo olubheka ukuthi ngabe iPfizer iyasebenza yini.UMadhi uthe kulabo bantu bayisithupha okwatholakala ukuthi banegciwane lakamuva eselizishintshile elitholakale kuleli, i501Y.V2." Imiphumela yakhomba ukuthi lo mgomo uyasebenza. Okusho ukuthi kungakuhle uma singathola iPfizer eyengeziwe,"  kusho yena.Babalelwa ku-269 000 abasebenzi bezempilo asebegonywe ngomgomo iJ&J.
title: Kungenzeka kudingeke ukuthi bajove okwesibili abezempilo

text: AKHULULWE ngebheyili amadoda amabili aboshelwe icala lokuzenza amaphoyisa eVryheid, KwaZulu-Natal.UThokozani Xulu (33) noLindani Sibisi (36) badedelwe ngebheyili kaR1 000 umuntu emunye yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVryheid.Bazobuyela enkantolo ngoJuni 4. Abamangalelwa baqophe i-video omunye wabo esabisa ngayo abantu, ikakhulukazi abaseMondlo, ethi bazobagxoba uma bengayilandeli imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe thaqa.UXulu uvela egqoke ikepisi nesikhindi efake i-bullet proof vest yamaphoyisa, ehlezi kusofa ephethe isibhamu esandleni sokudla, nebhodlela likagologo kwesokunxele.Uthe kunomyalelo osukhishiwe othi umuntu ozotholakala emgwaqweni ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe, bazomgxoba ngebhuzu.Uphakamisa ibhodlela likagologo iJameson athi: “Utshwala lobu sibuphuzela nina-ke, abuphuzwa yizichaka, sibuphuza ezintabeni lapho esisuke sihamba khona ngezisu. Qhubekani-ke futhi nina baseMondlo ikakhulu, sigade nina,” kusho uXulu.Usuka lapho aphakamise isibhamu athi esokuzigada nje kodwa iR3, ekhomba phandle, isemotweni.Uphetha ngokuthi uzobakhombisa abantu ngoba manje ngo-3 ntambama uya emsebenzini.Kusolwa ukuthi abasolwa baboshwe ngoLwesine ngeledlule emuva kophenyo lwamaphoyisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe abasolwa bathweswe icala lokuzenza amaphoyisa.Uthe amaphoyisa ashaqe nesibhamu sikamsolwa esisemthethweni.
title: Badedelwe ngebheyili kaR1 000 abazenze amaphoyisa

text: KUMASIZINI ayisithupha edlule, i-Orlando Pirates ayikaze inqobe nesisodwa isicoco kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) kodwa ukufika ‘komshini’ waseGermany, kubukeka sekuyenze yahamba le nqola.UJosef Zinnbauer  ufisa ukunqobela abalandeli isicoco seMTN 8. Uzobe eqala ukuyibamba kowamanqamu neBucs.IPirates yehlule izimbangi zayo ezinkulu iKaizer Chiefs ngo 5-0 (sekuhlanganiswa imilenze) yomibili, kowandulela amanqamu kwiMTN 8.NgoDisemba 12, enkundleni esazomenyezelwa, izotholana neBloemfontein Celtic kowamanqamu kulo mqhudelwano. UZinnbauer uthe uyathemba ukuthi zizosuleka izinyembezi zabalandeli bezakhe kungekudala.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthi sesifike kowamanqamu. Isikhathi esinzima kakhulu lesi kubalandeli futhi sibonga indlela abaseseka ngayo. Ngiyafisa nje ukuthi kowamanqamu sibe ndawonye nabalandeli enkundleni, mhlawumnbe ngaleso sikhathi bazobe sebevumelekile abalandeli,” kusho uZinnbauer emoyizela.Eqhubeka echaza uthe balithokozela kakhulu ikhefu leFIFA, eliqala kuleli sonto ngoba bazolungisa izinto ezimbalwa.“Siya ekhefini manje, sizothola ithuba lokubhekisisa ezinye izinto. Ngiyazi ukuthi ngemuva kwekhefu sizoba nemidlalo embalwa yeligi kodwa lokho sizokubona isikhathi nxa siqhubeka. Sizoziqeqesha singaphelele ngenxa yokuthi abanye babadlai bethu bazohamba neqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana. Kodwa bazosifica siqhubeka ngendlela, sibafisela inhlanhla emidlalweni neBafana,” kusho uZinnbauer.Ababaningi abebelindele ukuthi uZinnbauer uzobe esebuyile kuleli kwazise indodana yakhe uFabio, isegumbini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela eGermany ngemuva kokulimala engozini yemoto. Abathandi bakanobhutshuzwayo, bathukile bembona ebhentshini lePirates koweChiefs, ekubeni kungekho okushiwo yiqembu ngokubuya kwakhe.“Indodana yami isesibhedlela, isesimeni esibucayi. Akukho engingakwenza okungenza umehluko yingakho ngikhethe ukubuya. Ngizolokhu ngixhumana nomndeni wami, ukuthola ukuthi isimo sihamba kanjani. Ngifisa ukubonga kakhulu usihlalo wePirates, izisebenzi, abadlali  nabalandeli ngokungeseka kulesi sikhathi esinzima,” kusho uZinnbauer.
title: UZinnbauer ufisa ukunqoba eseMTN 8

text: UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uJosef Zinnbauer, uminciswe yisexwayiso somqeqeshi weJwaneng Galaxy yaseBotswana abazobhekana nayo emdlalweni womlenze wesibili wokubanga indawo esigabeni samaqoqo kwiCAF Confederation Cup.EZimnyama zizokwamukela iGalaxy emdlalweni ozoba se-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, ngeSonto ngo-5 ntambama. IPirates inqobe ngo-3-0 kowomlenze wokuqala eBotswana ngesonto eledlule. IGalaxy yehlele emidlalweni yokuhlungela ukungena esigabeni samaqoqo eConfederation emuva kokuhlulwa yiMamelodi Sundowns kowokuhlungela ukungena esigabeni esifanayo kwiCAF Champions League emasontweni adlule.Nakuba amagoli amathathu kungabukeka eseyiwezele ngaphesheya iPirates kodwa uZinnbauer uzwakale engakhululekile ngenxa yamazwi ka-Ovis Rapotsane, opheka iGalaxy awasho ngemuva kowomlenze wokuqala."Umphumela esiwuthole kowomlenze wokuqala ekuhambeni muhle. Kuhlala kubalulekile ukuthi iqembu lenze kahle ekuhambeni uma kwenzeka. Kodwa manje kufanele siqaphele. Umphumela muhle impela kodwa kufanele sixwaye ngoba ebholeni kungenzeka noma yini. Umqeqeshi wabo uthe uma iPirates ishaye amagoli amathathu ekuhambeni, nabo bengawashaya. Basexwayisile. Sekusezandleni zethu ukuthi sishaye amanye amagoli nokuthi siqoke iqembu elifanele uma sesibonile ukuthi yibaphi abadlali abalungele ukudlala. Asifuni ukuzithela ngabandayo," kusho uZinnbauer.IPirates idlala kwiConfederation okwesithathu. Igcina ukudlala kulo mqhudelwano, ihlulwe kowamanqamu yi-Etiole du Sahel yaseTunisia ngo-2015 ngaphansi komqeqeshi u-Eric Tinkler.IGalaxy, ebunjwe ngo-2014, idlala okwesibili kwiConfederation Cup. Ibhekene nenselelo yokuthi sekuyophela unyaka imisiwe iligi yaseBotswana. Ngakho izicija ngemidlalo yobungani."Bekungelula ukuthola ulwazi ngabo. Besithola iziqeshana zemidlalo yobungani futhi nabangani bethu kwamanye amazwe basisizile kakhulu. Kodwa imidlalo yobungani ayifani neyangempela. Ithimba labahlaziyi elinoFadlu lisebenzile ekutheni sithole okuthize. Banabadlali abahle, unozinti wabo usezingeni eliphezulu. Umsebenzi manje usemahlombe ethu," kusho uZinnbauer.
title: UZinnbauer uminciswe amazwi embangi ngoweCaf

text: UBEWABHALA phansi ebhukwini amagama ezingane zakhe eziwu-38 abenazo uMnuz Sifiso Justice Mtshali (46) waseMadundube, ngaphandle kwaKwaDukuza, isidumbu sakhe esiqithilwe emahhovisi akwa-Old Mutual ngeledlule.Umshana wakhe, uNksz Thandaza Mtshali, uthe ubenebhuku elibhalwe amagama ezingane, onina bazo, amakheli abo, izinombolo zocingo nokuthi izingane zazalwa nini.Kuthiwa ubengenandaba nezingane kodwa ubenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyazibhala ebhukwini, ethi wenzela ukuthi uma kwenzeka efa umndeni wakhe ungahlupheki kodwa utshele izingane zakhe ukuthi ushonile.UNksz Mtshali uthe umalume wakhe ubekhonze ukuzidlalela. Waqala ukubhala ebhukwini ethola izingane zakhe zokuqala ezimbili ezizalwa ngonina abehlukene ezineminyaka ewu-23 njengamanje.UMNUZ Sifiso Justice Mtshali (46) waseMadundube, ngaphandle kwaKwaDukuza, isidumbu sakhe esiqithilwe emahhovisi akwa-Old Mutual ngeledlule.Ingane yokugcina ebhalwe ebhukwini ineminyaka ewu-9.“Yonke into yakhe ubeyenza ihlaya. Nalo ibhuku ubehleka uma umbuza ngalo. Ubekutshela ukuthi uyisoka, uma engabhali angagcina engasazi ukuthi zingaki. Ngiyacabanga ukuthi kodwa lokhu ubekwenza ngoba ubezazi akanaso isikhathi sokuthi elokhu evakashisa izingane zakhe ekhaya ukuze zaziwe. Uma ungazange wenze ubudlelwane nengane eceleni ubu­ngeke uyibone ngoba uyise ubesuke esenake ezinye izintombi.”
title: Ubenezingane eziwu-38 olaxazwe e-Old Mutual

text: BALALE bemoyizela abalandeli be-Orlando Pirates kulandela ukuqhuzuka kweMamelodi Sundowns izolo emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership lapho ezikaPitso Mosimane zithole induku ivela komakhelwane iSuperSport United eLoftus Stadium, ePitoli. Imizuzu yokuqala ewu-29 ibingenayo iminyakazo etheni kodwa okugqamile ukuthi umgadli weSundowns, u-Emiliano Tade, ubelokhu ezame njalo yize wonke amabhola akhe ebewaqondisa kuRonwen Williams. Bekucacile lapha ukuthi iSundowns ithembele ejubaneni likaPhakamani Mahlambi.Ngesikhathi kubukeka sengathi iSundowns iyona engathola kuqala igoli, uGrant Kekana ushaye igoli lakhe lokuqala kule sizini engqofela phakathi ikhona ngomzuzu ka-30.Leli goli liyivusile iSuperSport kwazise ibikhombisa izimpawu zokulisebenzisa kangcono ibhola. Ukulidinga kweSundowns igoli lokulinganisa bekuyenza ivuleke emuva ikakhulukazi ohlangothini lukaTebogo Langerman okuyinto ebivulela u-Aubrey Modiba ukuthi aqhamuke namabhola anzima njalo ngakwesokunxele. Nakuba iSuperSport ibisinokuzethemba, neSundowns ibilokhu iqhamuke njalo neminyakazo emihle kugqame kuyona uThemba Zwane.Isiwombe sesibili siqale ngokuthi kube iSundowns eqala kangcono kuqhubeka yena uMahlambi ngejubane. NoTade ubelokhu ezame njalo kusho khona ukuthi lisamlandele ibhadi lokuqondisela uWilliams. Obekusobala ukuthi izitobha zeSuperSport beziphapheme ikakhulukazi uClayton Daniels. Abekhona amathuba ethusayo eSuperSport kodwa uKennedy Mweene ubekhombisa ukuphaphama okuyisimanga. Ngomzuzu ka-60 uphumile uGeorge Lebese odlale kahle kwazise ubebhekene neqembu abolekiswe yilona kwiSuperSport.Ngaso sonke isikhathi kulo mdlalo iSuperSport ibibukeka sengathi izolithola igoli lesibili nangempela lize lavela ngomzuzu ka-79 likhala enethini ngonyawo lukaGhampani Lungu. Umsebenzi omuhle kaBradley Grobler ugcine ubonakele lapha ngoba wakhela uLungu leli goli nje, ubekade eqalile ezama. Kubonakale ngisho ebusweni babadlali beSundowns ukuthi kuyabethusa ukuthi sebelandela emuva ngamagoli amabili.Komunye umdlalo izolo iHighlands Park ibambane neFree State Stars ngo 1-1.
title: IDowns ishaywe kwajabula iBucs

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEL IZOPHELA maduze ibhuloho elizokwenza kube lula ukuhamba eBallito elibizwa nge-N2 Ballito Interchange elaqala ukwakhiwa ngo-2011.UMnuz Ravi Ronny obhekelele izinhlelo zokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo kwaSanral uthe inyanga izophela seliphelile ibhuloho.“Sekusele umsebenzi omncane manje, ukufaka itiyela lapho kuhamba khona abantu nokunye okungaphandle komgwaqo,” kusho uRonny.Kudle iSanral u-R110 million ukwakha iBallito Interchange kanti izohlanganisa iTheku naKwaDukuza kalula. Umsebenzi owenziwe ukufakela abantu abahamba ngezinyawo indawo yabo nokunwetshwa komzila wezimoto uba ngu-3.7m ku-M4 no-2.73m emgwaqweni oya e-Wakenshaw Estate.Umsebenzi wokuqeda ukwakha i-N2 Ballito Interchange uhlehliswe izikhawu ezintathu. Kwesokuqala inkampani eyayakha i-KNS Construction yathola ukuthi ayisenamali kwadingeka ukuthi ilandele imicikilisho yasenkantolo.Emuva kwalokho u-Stefannuti Stocks Civils KZN uthathe umsebenzi ngo-Ephreli 2012.Bekumele ukuthi liphele ibhuloho ezinyangeni eziyisishiyagalombili ezedlule kodwa imvula yabambezela umsebenzi wokwakha.Ngenhlanhla akubanga nasiteleka ku-N2 Ballito Interchange kodwa okwenze umsebenzi ungapheli ngesikhathi yisimo sezulu nokushintshwa kwetiyela ebelisetshenziswa.UNkk Zandile Nene oyi-Project Manager ukuqedela ibhuloho ngeke kuphazamise ukuhamba kwezimoto.
title: Sebezokhululeka abashayeli bezimoto

text: LIGQEMEKE udume lwengozi iqembu lesicathamiya, INkandla Lucky Stars, ngokubulawa ngesihluku kwelinye ilungu layo okutholakale isidumbu salo sidindilizile ngezintatha zangoMsombuluko. UMnuz Phumlani Buthelezi (22), utholakale eMjahweni, eNkandla enamanxeba okungaqondakali ukuthi awani kanti kuthiwa ubecwiyiwe ezinye izindawo emzimbeni. Umphathi weqembu lesicathamiya abecula kulo, uMnuz Mazwendoda Zungu, uthe bafe olwembiza ngelungu labo. Uthe kuzothatha isikhathi ukuvala isikhala sakhe njengoba ubenekhono, ewuthanda nomculo."Silimele kakhulu ngoba le ndoda ibiyilungu ebelizinikele kakhulu eqenjini kangangoba ubeke abambe izintambo uma ngingekho. Ziningi izingoma abezibhala bese sizilolonga ngazo, sizicule zibe mnandi sehlule ngazo amaqembu amaningi endaweni,’’ kusho uZungu.Uthe leli lungu bese lihlale eqenjini iminyaka eyisithupha futhi lingumuntu obethanda ukuthula noxolo.Leli phephandaba lithole ngabaholi basendaweni ukuthi umufi ubegcine ukukhuluma noyisemkhulu ngesikhathi kade eyobheka othize esibhedlela emuva kwalokho wanyamalala njengoba eze watholakala eseshonile esigangeni. Kuvele nokuthi isimo sibi emndenini kamufi njengoba bengazi nokuthi bazothatha ini bahlanganise nani ukuze angcwatshwe futhi uyisemkhulu usekhule kakhulu.Kuthiwa asiqali isigameko esifana nalesi kule ndawo njengoba kutholakale esinye isidumbu esicwiyiwe ngesonto eledlule. Kuthiwa lezi zigameko zishiye umphakathi uthuthumela, wesabela impilo yawo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kutholakale isidumbu sinamnxeba okulimala.
title: Utholwe eshonile umculi eNkandla

text: UBONGA unina ngokumvimba eneminyaka engu-16 esefuna ukungenela uhlelo ama-Idols SA uZamagambu Memela (19), odume ngelikaXae kulolu hlelo.UXae wasePinetown, uthe ngenxa yokuthi wayezazi ukuthi unethalente wacela kunina ukungenela lolu hlelo eminyakeni edlule.Le ntokazi, ebalwa kwezinekhono elimangalisayo kulolu hlelo, ithe unina wayitshela ukuthi kumele iqede * -matric kuqala bese ingenela lolu hlelo.“Ngiyajabula ngoba ngalinda kwaze kwaba yimanje. Ngiwumuntu osheshayo ukuzwela bese ngiyakhala. Kodwa njengoba sengifikile ohlelweni ngabona izingqinamba ezikhona nezinto ezikhulunywa abantu ezinkudleni zokuxhumana, ngiyabona ukuthi ngangingeke ngikubekezelele ngangiyoshiya phansi futhi ngihlale ngikhala,” kusho uXae.Uthe ukubona esekwa abantu abehlukene kuleli kusho lukhulu kuyena.“Ngisafunda okukhulu kulolu hlelo ngisho emajajini, lokhu akushoyo ngiyakuthatha ngikusebenzise.“Konke lokhu okwenzeka manje kuyisiqalo sekusasa lami njengoba kungekho engicabanga ukukwenza kodwa ukuba umculi,” kuchaza uXae.Kulolu hlelo uthe akekho ambuka asabe ngoba bonke benekhono futhi amakhono abo awafani.“Akekho onekhono elifana nelomunye ongathi uma umuzwa ecula uthuke. Sisonke njengoba sisele ngiyafisa ukuthi siphumelele emculweni okuyinto esizifelayo ngayo,” kusho uXae.
title: Ubonga unina owamlindisa okuma-Idols SA

text: KUZOSHAQWA imfuyo ewuvanzi egcaluza emigwaqweni kuMasipala waseMhlathuze kulandela izikhalo zomphakathi ngezingozi ezenzeka ngenxa yemfuyo.Lokhu kulandela isinqumo esithathwe wumkhandlu ukuze kuvikelwe abasebenzisa imigwaqo.Isitatimende somkhandlu sithe inhloso ukuvikela abahlali kanjalo nabanikazi bayo imfuyo.Sithe yonke imfuyo ezoshaqwa izokhishwa ngemali noma idayiswe esidlangaleni.“Umkhandlu uzoshaqa imfuyo ewuvanzi bese ibekwa endaweni ezovalelwa kuyo izinsuku ezingu-14 ukuze abanikazi beze bezoyilanda. Umnikazi uzokhokha imali yokuthi igcinwe lapho nemali yamakhilomitha ahanjiwe iyogcinwa kule ndawo. Izogcinwa ngaphansi komthetho iKwaZulu-Natal Pound Act No.3 of 2006.”Isitatimende sithe kuzolandelwa yonke imigudu yokuxhumana nabanikazi, ngemfuyo ewuvanzi, uma bengatholakali abanikazi bese ithathwa.Sithe abashayeli bezimoto bakhalile kulo mkhandlu ngezingozi ezidalwa yimfuyo ebeka engcupheni impilo yabantu.“Emalokishini nasezindaweni zomtakabani imfuyo idla ingagadwe wumuntu ebusuku ize igcine isivimba imigwaqo. Imfuyo ezoshaqwa ngaphansi komthetho kubalwa izinkomo, izingulube, izimbongolo, amahhashi, amakati, izimbuzi. Sinxusa abafuyile ukuthi bayiqaphe ukuthi ayidli noma yikuphi futhi igadwe ngaso sonke isikhathi.”Sithe umkhandlu uyakhuluma nabaholi bomdabu kanti le mihlangano ithela izithelo.“Sivumelene ukuthi kumele imfuyo ifakwe okuzoveza ukuthi ngekabani. Yonke imigwaqo izoqashwa ngelokhozi kuzo zonke izindawo.”
title: Umasipala uzobopha imfuyo ewuvanzi

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho elingashayi eceleni eliwela umfula ugcwele, ngicela ukuphawula ngodaba olunganakwa lokuthi kumele uhulumeni axhase osomatekisi njengoba enza emabhasini. Kuyasidumaza okwenziwa wuhulumeni ukuthi alishaye indiva ibhizinisi nokuyilo lodwa eliphethwe ngabantu abamnyama ngokugcwele, elamatekisi.Okubuhlungu wukuthi abantu abaphethe kuhulumeni bamnyama. Abantu abawuvotela ngobuningi babo lo hulumeni ngabamnyama. Abantu abanganakiwe yilo hulumeni yibo futhi abamnyama. Abantu abamnyama babuthwele ubunzima kuleli zwe, bahlukunyezwa ngezinye izinhlanga babuye bahlukunyezwe ngabantu bakubo, abamnyama. Kuleli bhizinisi osomatekisi bavele bethwele kanzima ngoba uhulumeni akayingeni eyokubaxhasa.Uhulumeni washaya umthetho wokuthi osomatekisi kumele babhalisele ukukhokha intela babe nesitifiketi. Lo mthetho uyasebenza uma uya ebhodini lezokuthutha uyolungiselwa amaphemithi, uyovuselela noma uyokwenza isicelo sencwadi yemvume. Awenzelwa lutho uma ungenaso isitifiketi sentela okubuhlungu wukuthi alukho uxhaso olukhishwa uhulumeni olubhekele osomatekisi. Kufanele ugcwalise amafomu abakuthumelela wona lapho okumele uchaze indlela ibhizinisi lakho elisebenza ngayo nemali oyisebenzisile, engenayo nephumayo.Akulula ukuzigcwalisela amafomu, kufanele uye kubantu abakufundele ukuthi amabhuku ebhizinisi abhalwa kanjani ababizwa, ngama-accountant. Uma uye kubona ukhokha imali esukela R1500 kuya phezulu.Intela ibathwalise nzima kakhulu osomatekisi ngoba kuyenzeka ihovisi lezentela livele likubhalele incwadi ethi ulikweleta R50 000 kuya phezulu. Kuthiwe kufanele uyikhokhe ngokushesha unqunyelwe izinsuku. Size silanyulelwe yiwona ama-accountant ukusula leso sikweletu nakubona ukhokha imali ukukwenzela lowo msebenzi.Okubuhlungu ukuthi iningi imali ekhokhwa usomatekisi kuhulumeni uma ethenga izinsimbi zezimoto uyayikhokha intela, uma efaka uphrethiloli uyayikhokha intela,uma ethelela imoto ilayisense yayo uyayikhokha intela, uma umshayeli wetekisi evuselela imvume yokulayisha abantu noma evuselela ilayisense yokushayela, yonke imali ayikhokhayo iya kuhulumeni.Iningi imali efakwa osomatekisi kuhulumeni kepha yena akenzi lutho.Uma osomatekisi bethenga izimoto zabo zokuthutha umphakathi bayayikhokha intela eya kuhulumeni.Njengoba sihlaselwe yilolu bhubhane lwesifo okuthiwa yiCovid-19 osomatekisi kuthiwa abalayishe abantu abangamaphesnti awu-70. Uma ubala imali elahlekela usomatekisi emotweni ngayinye ngosuku inkulu kepha nalapho uhulumeni akukho abahlangabeza ngakho.Lo hulumeni akabanakile ngempela osomatekisi ungathi ulwa nokuliqeda leli bhizinisi ngendlela enza ngayo. Kuyadabukisa ngoba abantu abaphethe izwe abantu abalwaziyo usizi nokuhlupheka komuntu wetekisi.Ntabeni umfana wentabaEHAMMARSDALE
title: Uhulumeni akabasizi ngalutho osomatekisi

text: UDJ Tira, ogxekwa nxa zonke ngezinsolo zokuthi unesandla ekutheni uCassper Nyovest acwile ezikweletini ngemuva komcimbi wakhe i#FillUpMosesMabhidaStadium ngempelasonto eyedlule, uthe ngelinye ilanga iqiniso lizovela ngaye.Engxoxweni abe nayo neSABC, uCassper uthe, ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi uthole uxhaso luka-R56 million kumdonsele amanzi ngomsele njengoba esele nesikweletu sika-R7 million.“Baphuma abaxhasi abaningi abase bengithembisile, ngasala ngedwa. Abanye baphume ngosuku lomcimbi,” kuchaza uCassper.UDJ Tira uthe “ibhadi” lakhe kwaba ukusebenzisana neGagasi FM, elalinomcimbi iBeach Festival ngosuku olufanayo nokaCassper.“Nganquma ukusebenza neGagasi njengabantu abangicela ukuthi ngibasize ngomcimbi. Bangiqasha ngokukhethekile bangangivumela ukuthi kube khona omunye umcimbi engiqashwa kuwo eThekwini. Njengesiteshi enginobudlelwano naso futhi engaqala ukusebenza naso kudala, angibanga nankinga,” kusho uTira.“Uma leso sinqumo sami singijikela, siyangijikela. Impilo iyaqhubeka. Uma abantu becabanga ukuthi ngiyilo muntu abakholwa wukuthi ngiwuyena, iqiniso lizovela ngelinye ilanga. Akungithusi nakancane okushiwoyo ngoba ngiyazazi ukuthi ngingubani. Labo abanemibono ngami kulungile, impilo iyaqhubeka,” kusho uTira.Okhulumela iGagasi FM, uKhulekani Shandu, uthe bamqasha kuqala uTira.“Saba nesivumelwano futhi sokuthi asisize ngokukhangisa umcimbi wethu,” kusho uKhulekani.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana balokhu bemtinyele njalo uTira bemsola ngomona. Abanye basabise ngokuduba umcimbi wakhe iFact Durban Rocks ezoba sePeople’s Park ngoDisemba 31.Umholi weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uZwakele Mncwango, uthe uhulumeni kumele umtakule uCassper ngoba ulizuzisile iTheku kufika izivakashi.“Abahleli bemicimbi nosomabhizinisi bacwila ezikweletini ngoba osopolitiki babathembisa ukubaxhasa bese befaka zonke izinsizakusebenza zabo ngethemba lokuthi bazoxhaswa. Kumele basho zisuka ukuthi kuzokwenzeka noma cha futhi umuntu asho ukuthi akanamandla uzoludlulisa udaba luyokhulunywa emkhandlwini, uma kuwumasipala.”
title: UTira ucacisa ngezinsolo zokona umcimbi kaCassper

text:
MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIK UNYOMFEKE izinhlelo zabadlali beMamelodi Sundowns izolo emini ngesikhathi inhlangano eyengamele ibhola e-Afrika, iCaf, imemezela ukuthi ompetha be-Absa Premiership sebebuyiselwe kuChampions League kulandela ukukhishwa kulo mqhudelwano kwe-AS Vita Club yaseDRC esolwa ngokusebenzisa umdlali ongafanele.NgokweCAF, i-AS Vita okuyiyona ekhiphe iSundowns kulo mqhudelwano sekuhlungelwa eyamaqoqo, ngeke iqhubeke nokudlala kweyamaqoqo kulandela ukubhadanywa kwayo ukuthi ngesikhathi ikhipha ezikaPitso “Jingles” Mosimane isebenzise u-Idrissa Traore kungafanele.ISundowns ibuyela kuChampions League nje, ngesonto eledlule iphume kuConfederation Cup ishaywa yiqembu laseGhana iSC Medeama.ISundowns yakhishwa yiVita ngo 2-2 ngemuva kwemilenze yesibili. Kowokuqala kwaba ngu 1-1, kowesibili iSundowns yanqoba ngo 2-1.Omunye wabadlali abaphambili beSundowns okhulume ne
Solezwe ngaphandle kokuvumelana nabaphathi njengoba kuhlale kwenziwa, okudale ukuthi anxuse ukuba lingavezwa igama lakhe, uveze ukuthi nakuba bejabule kodwa konke abebekuhlelile sekonakele.“Ngikhuluma nawe nje sikhangisa ngendebe lapha ePitoli kodwa ukufika kombiko wokuthi siyabuyela kuChampions League kuzinyomfe zonke izinhlelo ebese sinazo.“Besazi ukuthi uma siqeda ukukhangisa ngendebe siya emakhaya kwazise besizovala. Nakuba singakatshelwa okuningi kodwa siyaqonda njengabadlali ukuthi amaholidi ethu asezophazamiseka kwazise umdlalo wokuqala wamaqoqo ungoJuni 17. Sizohlangana ebusuku (esho izolo) lapho sizocaciseleka ngokuzokwenzeka. “Engingakusho nje ukuthi nakuba sijabule kodwa kuningi ebese sikuhlelile ngamaholidi osekunyomfekile,” usho kanje lo mdlali.Ukubuyela kuCaf kusho ukuthi iningi labadlali beSundowns ngeke basithole isikhathi sokuphumula kwazise iningi labo lidlalela amaqembu esizwe, nawo anemidlalo emqoka ngoJuni yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations ka-2017.UKeagan Dolly uyena ozoba nenkinga kakhulu ngoba ukhona kuBafana nakuma-Olympics ango-Agasti kubhekwe yena.Ngesikhathi iCAF ichaza ngesinqumo sayo ikucacisile ukuthi leli cala lifakwe yiStade Malien yaseMali ekhale ngokuthi ngesikhathi uTraore esadlala kuyona ngo-2015 uthole isigwebo esimmisa imidlalo emine. Lo mdlali ume umdlalo owodwa kwase kuphela isizini obekungeyakhe yokugcina kuMalien. Kusale imidlalo emithathu obekumele ayihlale eqenjini lakhe elisha (AS Vita) kodwa lokho kwangenzeka. Ngokwemithetho yeCAF u-article 114.1 no-114.2 iqembu elidlalisa umdlali kungafanele akukhulunywa ngaphandle kokuthi likhishwe emqhudelwaneni. Lo mdlali udlalile nangesikhathi i-AS Vita inqoba kuMafunzo yaseTanzania kweyokuhlunga kodwa umthetho u-article VII Clause 9 & 10 umile ekutheni iqembu elikhishwe ngenxa yaleli phutha indawo yalo ithathwa yiqembu lokugcina elishaywe (elonile) okuyiSundowns.Izolo ngesikhathi sekuqhathwa kwamaqembu azodlala kweyamaqoqo, iSundowns ifakwe kuGroup B neZamalek yase-Egypt, Enyimba yaseNigeria neES Setif yase-Algeria kwathi u-Group A kwaba yi-Al Ahly yase-Egypt, W.A.C yaseMorocco, Asec Mimosa yase-Ivory Coast neZesco yaseZambia.
title: ISundowns ibuyiselwe kweyeCAF

text: OMAKADEBENONA bamasosha oMkhonto weSizwe, iMKMVA KwaZulu-Natal bafunge bagomela izolo ukuthi bazosebenzisa ikhono labo kwezempi ukuvikela uMengameli Jacob Zuma kwabaqhuba imikhankaso yokumqumba phansi ngemibhikisho.Esithangamini nabezindaba eSeme House eThekwini izolo uSihlalo weMKMVA eKZN, uMnuz Themba Mavundla, unxuse abathanda intando yabantu ukuba baqaphe ngeso lokhozi abahlela ukuqumba phansi umbuso we-ANC noZuma.“Abantu bethu bakulungele ukuvikela intando yabantu eyasetshenzelwa kanzima. Esifuna ukukugcizelela ukuthi abaqhuba lo mkhankaso kumele badlalele kude neLuthuli House,” kusho uMavundla.Uthe bazothumela amasosha abo angaphezulu kuka-600 azonkanisa eLuthuli House ukubheka ukuthi akekho odlalela ngakhona ngoLwesihlanu.Kusasa kuzoba nemibhikisho yokuzwakalisa ukungenami ngobuholi bukaZuma osolwa ngokucekela phansi izwe. Imibhikisho ilandela ukuthi uZuma enze izinguquko kwiKhabhinethi yakhe eziholele ekutheni kuxoshwe ongqongqoshe kubalwa noMnuz Pravin Gordhan obengungqongqoshe wezeziMali.Bekuhlelwe ukuthi ulibangise eLuthuli House kodwa kwabuye kwashintshwa kwathiwa usuya e-Union Buildings ngemuva kokuthi i-ANCYL isabise ngokuthi kuzochitheka igazi.NaseThekwini kuzoba nemashi ehlelwa iDA ezosuka eDurban Circus Site iye e-amphitheatre ngasebhishi.UMholi weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango uthe bameme wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki nezinhlaka zomphakathi kule mashi.UMncwango uthe bebehlele ukuthi baye eCity Hall kodwa bangakwazi ngenxa yokuthi amaphoyisa akhale ngokuthi kuzoba nesiphithiphithi.IMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, ixwayise ngokuthi bazoboshwa abazomashela eCity Hall bengenamvume.
title: I-MKMVA embhidlangweni wokuvikela uZuma

text: LISHABALELE ikusasa lomdlali osemncane weKaizer Chiefs, uWiseman Meyiwa owehlelwa yingozi okumenyezelwe ukuthi ngeke aphinde alikhahlele ibhola.UMeyiwa (19) ubelokhu esesibhedlela kusukela ehlelwa yingozi ngoNovemba nyakenye emgwaqeni u-N3 esuka eGoli ebheke kubo eMaritzburg. Bekulokhu kunethemba lokuthi uzolulama. Nokho esithangamini nabezindaba, imenenja yeChiefs uBobby Motaung, imemezele ukuthi kuphelile ngoMeyiwa nebhola. Kuvele ukuthi lo mdlali ulimale kabi emgogodleni, usezohamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo njengoba engasakwazi ukuzihambela. "Sibone kungcono siqede amahlebezi ngesimo sikaMeyiwa. Ngeke aphinde akwazi ukudlala ibhola ngenxa yokulimala. Odokotela bakuqinisekisile lokhu. Ufikile lapha wazovalelisa kozakwabo. Uzophuma esibhedlela ngesonto elizayo ayothola ukunakekelwa esekhaya," kusho uMotaung.UMeyiwa uyena kuphela obesebenza emndenini wakhe futhi bekubhekwe yena. Ujoyine isikhungo sokuthuthukisa amakho seChiefs ngo-2014, wanyuselwa esikimini esikhulu ngo-2017. Udlale imidlalo engu-21 kwiChiefs. Ngaphezu kwalokho udlale koweNdebe yoMhlaba neqembu lesizwe lika-U/17 nelika-U/20."UMeyiwa uzoba yingxenye yeqembu ngeke simlahle. Iqembu liyazibophezela ukuluhamba naye loluhambo kuze kuba uyasho ukuthi ufuna ukwenzani empilweni yakhe," kusho uMotaung.
title: Ezibuhlungu ngomdlali weChiefs uWiseman Meyiwa

text:
MCEBO MPUNGOSEA ZOSHAYA ngolunye unyawo amaSouth African Music Awards alo nyaka ehlanganisa abethuli bezinhlelo abangaconsi phansi abayisikhombisa ukuphatha umcimbi obalwa nemikhulu kunayo yonke yokuklomelisa abaculi kuleli. Kukhona uSomizi Mhlongo, Thando Thabethe, Phat Joe, Khanyi Mbau, Pearl Modiadie noLunga Shabalala, bonke abazobe begiya bededelana ezindaweni ezihlukahlukene kumaSama esi-22 azobe ese-Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre eThekwini kusasa ebusuku.USomizi, ongaconsi phansi kulezi zinsuku kwezikaqedisizungu, uzobe ezihola phambili nomlingisi we
Generations ophinde abe ngumsakazi we-5FM uThando Thabethe belawula uhlelo e-ICC lapho kuzobe kuklonyeliswa khona abaculi abahamba phambili kuleli.Kwi#SAMA22 Amstel Green Room uhlelo luzobe luphethwe wuKhanyi Mbau nomsakazi weMetro FM uPhat Joe. KwiRed Carpet yamaSama, uBonang Matheba, Pearl Modiadie noLunga Shabalala bazokwamukela bonke osaziwayo nezicukuthwano ezizobe zihambele lo mcimbi.Abantu bazokwazi ukubona konke okuzobe kwenzeka bukhoma kuthelevishini kuSABC 1 (191) kusukela ngo-8 kulo mcimbi. Kwabazobe benandisa, ababukeli bangalindela ukubona uDJ Bongz, u-Emtee noKwesta abazonandisa ndawonye, The Muffinz, Desmond & the Tutus ukubala abambalwa.Kulindeleke ukuthi kuphithizele eThekwini kule mpelasonto ngenxa yamaSama. Baningi abaculi abazohambela lo mcimbi iningi labo elitheleke kuleli dolobha kusukela ngoLwesibili. Nezokuphepha seziqinisiwe.Amathikithi atholakala ngoR350 eComputicket.
title: Kuhlanganiswe abethuli abathandwayo kumaSama

text: KUME yonke into edolobheni eJozini izolo umphakathi uvale thanqa umgwaqo ongenayo nophuma edolobheni ngamatshe, amathayi avuthayo nemfucuza.Amalungu omphakathi abenengwa wukudlanga kwezigameko zokuntshontshwa kwezimoto zeqiswe umngcele waseMozambique.Ngempalosonto kuthiwa amalungu omphakathi abambe oqotsheni abantu okusolwa ukuthi bagila le migilingwane abatitinya.Laba bantu kuthiwa bagcine ngokuveza ukuthi kunamaphoyisa abasebenzisana nawo kulo mshikashika wokushushumbiswa kwezimoto.Umphakathi uvele wavuka indlobane ngeSonto ebusuku wavala imigwaqo engenela eJozini.Bafuna kuze uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wamaPhoyisa kuleli uGeneral Bheki Cele azoxoxa nabo ngoba abasabethembi ubuholi bamaphoyisa kuleya ndawo.Kunama video asabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumanaizolo abeveza amalangabi nentuthu emnyama enkabeni yedolobha. Ezokuthutha bezingahambi.Ilungu lomphakathielicele ukungadalulwa lithe babuyiselwe emakhaya wumqashi kwavalwa izitolo nezindawo abasebenzela kuzona ngoba isimo sishubile.“Impilo yethu beyisengcupheni ngenxa yokushuba kwesimo. Umqashi ube novalo ecabangela nebhizinisi lakhe ukuthi hleze licekelwe phansi. Umphakathi ukhala ngamaphoyisa okumele engabe ayawuvikela kodwa adayisa ngawo,” kusho ilungu lomphakathi.UMnuz Joseph Ngubane ongusihlalo wekomiti elilwa nobugebengu kuleya ndawo, uthe baqhinqile esiteshini samaphoyisa bafuna kumiswe amaphoyisa athintekayo.Uthe kunohlu lwemizi ebizontshontshelwa izimoto abaluthole kubasolwa ababoshiwe manje sebelinde uCele azokhuluma nabo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe amalungu omphakathi waseJozini abhikishe avala umgwaqo omkhulu ongenela kulelidolobha ngamatshe, izihlahla, nemfucuza.Izolo ntambama uthe umgwaqo ubusavaliwe, amaphoyisa abesiqaphe ngelokhozi isimo.
title: Babale namaphoyisa kolwezimoto eJozini

text: KUSOLWA umbango womzila ngokubulawa kaMnuz Siphelele Sithole (31) waseNtombe, eTranance Park, obeyimenenja yerenki kule ndawo nodutshulwe ngumlisa ongaziwa, ngoLwesine olwedlule.Ngokomthombo weSolezwe, impi iqale ngonyaka owedlule ngesikhathi kudutshulwa omunye wosomatekisi abangaphansi kasoseshini waseTranance Park nokunguye owayehamba phambili kusungulwa lo mzila onamatekisi ahambela kule ndawo nasedolobheni, eThekwini. Umufi, uSithole, kubikwa ukuthi nguye obesondelene kakhulu nosomatekisi odutshulwe ngonyaka owedlule nowayesebenzisana naye kuvulwa umzila.“Ngiyasola ukuthi umufi ubulawelwe ukuba ngumuntu oqondile ngokomsebenzi. Ubehlonipha impela futhi elalela. Kodwa ubengayena umuntu obevumela ukulawulwa yiwo wonke usomatekisi erenki. Siyasola ukuthi enye into emdalele amazinyo abushelelezi   wumbuzo aba nawo ngetekisi enezinombolo zaseNdwedwe ejoyine umzila waseTrenance Park. Kusithusile sonke okwenzeka kuleya renki,” kusho umthombo.Uqhuba umthombo, uthe uyabona ukuthi irenki yaseTranance Park isazokhipha izidumbu eziningi njengoba nenkampani yonogada yamiswa ukuqapha isimo  kule renki.“Imiswa kanjani inkampani yonogada ekutheni ivikele abantu abasebenza eTranance Park ekubeni kunezigigaba eziningi kangaka kulo mzila? Akukho ukuphepha nakubagibeli abasebenzisa le renki. Kubukeka engathi ziseningi izidumbu esizozibona erenki,” kusho umthombo.UMnuz Zahir Mahomed ongusihlalo kasoseshini waseTrenance Park, uthe ngokwazi kwakhe, alukho udlame olukhona phakathi kwabo njengosomatekisi.“Ubudlelwano phakathi komzila wethu, owaseNanda kanjalo nowaseMawoti buhle kakhulu. Ngiyasola ukuthi ukushona kwemenenja yerenki yinto eqondene naye ngqo nengathinti umsebenzi wakhe,” kusho usihlalo walo soseshini.Unxenxe amaphoyisa ukuthi abathungathe aphinde abavalele bonke abantu ababaphazamisayo erenki yabo.“Zikhona impela nezinye izigameko zokudutshulwa kwabantu erenki. Sesiphila ngokwesaba ngoba amaphoyisa awababambi abasolwa. Okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi sizofa ekubeni sithi sizamela imindeni yethu,” kuzikhalela usihlalo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa asaphenya ngelesi sigameko.
title: Kusolwa olomzila ngowamatekisi obulewe

text: UZOGWETSHWA namhlanje eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini umbulali nomdlwenguli owayehlalise lubhojozi umphakathi waseMlaza.USanele Makhanya (27) ulahlwe ngamacala angu-20 okubalwa kuwo nawokubulala amalungu amane omndeni wakaMzila, ngonyaka odlule.UMakhanya ubelokhu egqolozele ijaji, uPhillip Nkosi, engacwayizi, edla imihlathi ngesikhathi etshelwa izolo ukuthi amacala ayamgojela.Ijaji ngesikhathi limehlulela lithe kunzima nokucabanga ukuthi umphakathi waseMlaza wawuhlukumezeke kanjani ngenxa yalo mbulali nomdlwenguli owayehamba engenela abantu emzini yabo.“Umbuso ukwazile ukukhombisa ngaphandle kokungabaza ukuthi wena wawukhona kuzo zonke lezi zigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu. Yize ufakaze ngokuthi wena wawuzilalele kini ngesikhathi kwenzeka zonke lezi zigameko kodwa kunofakazi abeze enkantolo abakubona kulezi zigameko. Uhlulekile ukutshela inkantolo ukuthi kungani wawuhamba udlwengula ubulala nabantu nomngani wakho,” kusho uNkosi.Ukudlwengulwa kwabesifazane, uthe yikhona kanye okucacisele inkantolo ukuthi akekho msulwa uMakhanya. “Ngesikhathi niyodlwengula abesifazane abathathu, oyedwa wayekwazi ngoba nanifunda ndawonye, ukwazile ukusho ukuthi uwena owamdlwengula. Ngesikhathi behlolwa kutholwe nolibofuzo lwakho (DNA) esithweni sakhe sangasese. Kuyamangaza ukuthi uthe wena wawulele ngaleso sikhathi edlwengulwa ekubeni kunobufakazi obuqanda ikhanda. Kukhona nomunye ufakazi owakubona uphuma endlini lapho laba besifazane badlwengulwa khona,” kusho uNkosi.Ijaji lithe yize laba besifazane base bephoqwe ukuba bageze ngemuva kokudlwengulwa kodwa ulibofuzo lukaMakhanya lasala komunye wesifazane ngoba wamdlwengula ekugcineni, elandela umngani wakhe, uMnuz Sbonelo “Nkalakatha” Jali, ayegila naye le mikhuba. UJali wadutshulwa amaphoyisa endaweni yesigameko.UNkosi uthe sekuwukucasha ngesithupha kukaMakhanya ukuthi yena akazi lutho ngalawa macala ngoba nakhu ethi umngani wakhe owayedubula.Ngokobufakazi obuthulwe intombi kaMakhanya, evezwe njengoMandisa (isibongo asivezwanga) ijaji buthe yibona kanye obucacise konke.“Ngokobufakazi obuthulwe intombi yakho owayifonela wathi ayize emuva kokubulawa kwabantu kaMzila, wayitshela ukuthi wena wawuhamba nomngani wakho okunguyena owayehamba ebulala abantu. Wena wawuntshontsha kuphela, nasethaveni awuzange udubule kodwa wawugadile. Konke lokhu angikukholwa ngoba wawusubeka icala kumuntu osefile ngoba ufuna ukuba muhle entombini yakho,” kusho ijaji.UMakhanya waboshwa elele nayo intombi, nayo amaphoyisa ayithatha.Ngokobufakazi obuthulwe intombi enkantolo, yezwa ngomunye wesifazane eyibuza ukuthi akalisabi yini isoka lakhe njengoba lithinteka emacaleni okubulala abantu eMlaza. Ngesikhathi esebuza uMakhanya ngalokhu, wavele wahlanza konke waveza ukuthi ubekhona kulezi zigameko kodwa akazange abulale yena.“Ukuthi nguwena owadubula noma akuwena akusho lutho kangako ngoba nawe kuzo lezi zigameko wadlala indima enkulu," kusho yena.Amacala okuthiwa akathinteki kuwona, elokubulala umngani wakhe owadutshulwa amaphoyisa, elokudlwengula kaMzila njengoba kungumufi owenza lokho nelokubamba inkunzi aphuce usibhamu umnikazi waso.
title: Uzogwetshwa  obehlupha eMlaza

text: IZIBIZA ngebhinca elifundile intombi nto, esematheni ezinkundleni zokuxhumana emuva kokuba ibhikle ingoma ithweswa iziqu e-University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN).UZandile Sanele Shange (21) waseShowe, uhlabe umxhwele abaningi kwasabalala ne-video yakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Ubethweswa iziqu zeBachelor of Social Science ngoMsombuluko. Ngesikhathi eseyothweswa iziqu ungene esiteji evunulile, wasina ingoma. Kuthe noma esephuma wayibhikla waze washaya ungqimphothwe.UZandile utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ingoma uphila ngayo futhi wayiqala emncane.“Umama wayengithengela amaDVD ngikopele khona ukusina ngoba ngiyasithanda isintu namasiko. Kumanje ngiyintombi nto, ngazikhethela ukuhlolwa,” echaza.Uthe akekho owakhula ehlolwa kubo ngaphandle kwakhe, waqala nokuhamba uMkhosi woMhlanga. Yize ethe kade agcina ukuya emhlangeni ngenxa yokuxinwa izifundo, usaqhubeka nokuhlolwa eThekwini.Mayelana nokusabalala kwe-video yakhe, uthe uyakujabulela ngoba uyaziqhenya ngesiko.Le ntombi ebuye iqhumise uhleko lwasemfuleni, ithe ukube ibiphiwa imali emuva kokuyibhikla, ngabe iyisigwili.“Ngithe ngehla esiteji angazi bangaki abantu abebengixhawula bengincoma. Abanye bebefuna nokwazi imvelaphi yami. Ngize ngafisa ukuthi bebengixhawulisa ngemali ngoba ngabe ngibomvu manje,” egegetheka.Ubehamba nodadewabo ababili abebemphelezela ngoMsombuluko njengoba ethe unina washona ngokugula ngo-2014. Uthe uyise useShowe kodwa kukhona okumbambile wangaphumelela. Uveze ukuthi ufise engabe unina ubesaphila, azibonele imiphumela yokumkhulisa kwakhe.Uthe kade ahlela ukuthi mhla ethweswa iziqu uyovunula bese ebhikla ingoma. UZandile uthe ungaphansi kwenhlangano yamasiko khona enyuvesi, iBuya Africa Student Cultural. Uphinde asinele umculi oxube owokholo nomasikandi, uThandeka Hadebe. Uthe angakujabulela nokusinela abanye omaskanda abadumile, inqobo nje uma bezomkhokhela ngoba uyazifela ngemali.Le ntokazi isibhalisela ukuqhubeka nezifundo zeHonours kwi-Industrial Psychology. Ithe ayizenyezi ngisho enyuvesi kuyaziwa ukuthi iyibhinca kodwa yileli elifundile. UZandile ungomunye wezitshudeni ezingu-9 680 ezithweswa iziqu e-UKZN okuzophothulwa ngoLwesibili.
title: Othweswe iziqu uyazidla ngobubhinca

text: NgoJuni nonyaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abalandeli ba-Emtee baqala umkhankaso ngehashtag ethi #FreeEmtee lapho babenxusa khona abasendimeni yomculo kuleli ukuthi bangenelele bakhiphe u-Emtee e-Ambitiouz ngoba bebona ukuthi akajabule kulesi sitebele somculo. Ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwee ngaleso sikhathi u-Emtee wathi akazi ikusasa limphatheleni kwezomculo kuleli kodwa abalandeli abkhe ‘sebekhulumile’. "Okwamanje ngifisa ukubonga abalandeli bami ngakho konke abakushoyo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, nangokukhombisa ukungeseka. Abakhuluma ngakho isimo engikuso njengamanje. Angazi ngizokwenzenjani okwamanje," kusho u-Emtee ngoJuni nonyaka. Ngokwemibiko eyavela emaphephandabeni ngaleso sikhathi, i-Ambitiouz yaveza ukuthi u-Emtee unenkontileka angakayiphothuli nabo nokuthi ubakweleta izindodla zemali kulandela ukushayisa izimoto alekelelwa yinkampani ukuzilungisa. Nokho, kubukeka u-Emtee esegcine esithathile isinqumo esiwumqamulajuqu ngekusasa lakhe. Esitatimendeni asishicilele ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram ngoLwesithathu u-Emtee uthe usekhethe ukushiya kulesi sitebele. Uthe ukhulume nabameli bakhe abebemlekelela aphume kwi-Ambitiouz. “Ngemuva kwezingxoxo phakathi kwabameli bami ne-Ambitiouz Entertainment, sekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi asikho isizathu sezomthetho ebesinginqanda ekushiyeni lesi sitebele ukuze ngiqhubeke nekusasa lami kwezomculo ngendlela engibona ngayo. Ngenze njalo kusukela ngoLwesine ngo-Agasti 8,” kuloba u-Emtee.U-Emtee ubonge abaomndeni, abangani kanye nabalandeli bakhe ababemseka kulesi sikhathi.
title: U-Emtee useyishiyile i-Ambitiouz Entertainment

text: Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe yimenenja yale miklomelo yabaculi bowokholo uZama Mkhize othe umcimbi uzoqhubeka.AmaCrown akulo nyaka azoba ngoNovemba 29. Selokhu asungulwa abeba seDurban ICC. Phambilini uZama wathi bazolinda kuze kube uhulumeni uyaphefumula ngokwenziwa kwemicimbi yenjabulo okusamisiwe ngaphambi kokuthatha isinqumo sokuthi umcimbi ube nezethameli noma cha.“Njengoba isimo seCovid-19 singakashintshi kakhulu futhi sekuze kwashaya lesi sikhathi umengameli engakacacisi ngemicimbi, amaCrown ngeke abe nazo izethameli. Lona ngumcimbi omkhulu ohlelelwa kusasele cishe izinyanga eziyisithupha ngaphambi kokuthi ube khona. Noma umengameli angakhuluma athini kodwa ikomiti selisithathile isinqumo sokuthi umcimbi uzoba sezinkundleni esizozimemezela,” kusho uZama.Uthe phakathi kwezinkundla imiklomelo ezokhonjiswa kuzo kubalwa iSABC2 lapho ejwayele ukusakazwa khona.“Ababukeli nabalandeli bangacabangi ukuthi njengoba kuzosakazwa ngobuchwepheshe kukhona okuzohluka kodwa lokhu abajwayele ukukubona kuzoba yikho futhi kuzoba ngaphezulu ngendlela umcimbi esizowuhlelela ngayo. Indikimba yakulo nyaka ithi Hope and Revival ngoba sibuyisa ithemba kubantu futhi sizobabuyisela enkonzweni sibavuselele sisebenzise ne-hashtag ethi #StillWePraise,” kuchaza uZama.Uthe okwamanje ngeke bawaqinisekise amaciko azobe enandisa kodwa kuzobe kuboshelwe izingqungqulu.“Sikhuthaza nabantu ukuthi basinikeze imibono yabo yokuthi iyiphi ingoma yonyaka ngokungena ekhasini lethu likaFacebook basho khona. Ngokwenza njalo bazibeka ethubeni lokuwina imiklomelo ehlukene.”UZama uthe ukungenela kuyaqhubeka kuze kube nguSepthemba 30. Uthe imithetho yokungenela ivumela abanomsebenzi ongemdala ngeminyaka engaphezu kwemithathu.
title: Azobe engenazethameli  amaCrown alo nyaka

text: USEDLULILE emhlabeni okhulumela i-African National Congress (ANC) KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Ricard Mthembu (50). UMthembu kubikwa ukuthi ushone ngoLwesithathu kulandela ukuxinwa yigciwane iCovid-19 eselibulale abantu abawu-3 502 kuleli. Imithombo ye-website enguzakwabo weSolezwe,i-IOL kwi-ANC iyona eqinisekise lezi zindaba ngoLwesithathu ekuseni. Kuvela ukuthi uMthembu ushone kulandela ukufakwa egunjinin labagula kakhulu ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezedlule. UMnuz Lennox Mabaso okhulumela ihhovisi likaNdunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe okwamanje ngeke aphawule kakhulu ngoba nabo lona umbiko ebebesanda kuwuthola.“Sisazozitholela ngokwethu eminye imininingwane. Okwamanje kukhona esisakuhlanganisa,” kusho uMabaso.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi namhlanje uhulumeni wakulesi sifundazwe uhambele esikhumulweni sezindiza iKing Shaka lapho ehlola khona ukuqhubeka kokuhamba kwezindiza.UMthembu uke waba yiMeya yaKwaDukuza neLungu elimele i-ANC esiShayamthetho salesi sifundazwe. Udaba lusaqhubeka.
title: ICovid-19 idlule nokhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal

text: ABALANDELI bomengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma banxusa i-ANC ukuba imkhombe indlela uNgqongqoshe wamabhizinisi kahulumeni uMnuz Pravin Gordhan abamsola ngokucindezela abamnyama.Abalandeli bakaZuma ezifundazweni ezehlukene bazoqhinqa ngaphandle kwekomkhulu le-ANC, eLuthuli House, namhlanje ukuze bazwakalise izikhalo zabo.UMnuz Nkosentsha Shezi, weRET Champion KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bafuna i-ANC ithathe izinyathelo ngoGordhan zingakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kusukela namhlanje.“Lesi yisiqalo somkhankaso wethu ohlose ukukhipha uGordhan emsebenzini, uma i-ANC ingazithathi izinyathelo zingakapheli izinsuku esiyibekele zona, sizophoqeleka ukuthi siwuqinise umkhankaso wethu kodwa angingabazi ukuthi uyothi uphela uGordhan uyobe engaseyena ungqongqoshe,” kusho uShezi.Uthe uGordhan ucindezela izikhulu ezimnyama emabhizinisini kahulumeni ukuze zibukeke njengabantu abangawazi umsebenzi nabakhohlakele.“Enye inhloso kaGordhan wukuthi angene agamanxe ekulawulweni kwamabhizinisi kahulumeni khona ezoqhubeka nokuzicebisa yena nabangani bakhe abangongxiwankulu abamhlophe,” kusho uShezi.Uthe kumanje uGordhan uhlukumeza isikhulu esiphezulu sakwaTransnet uMnuz Siyabonga Gama.“UGordhan akabafuni abantu abamnyama abaphumelelayo, lokhu akwenzayo kuphambene nomgomo kahulumeni we-ANC wokuguqulwa kwezisekelo zomnotho, uma i-ANC izimisele ngokuqhuba uhlelo lokuguqulwa kwezisekelo zomnotho kumele imgudluze uGordhan,” kusho uShezi.Uthe mathathu amabhasi azosuka eKZN azobe ethutha abantu abaqhuba umkhankaso wokuxosha uGordhan.“Akhona namanye amabhasi azobe ephuma nakwezinye izifundazwe kanti namaqabane aseGoli nawo azobe ekhona, ngingasho nje ukuthi silindele amakhulu abantu,” kusho uShezi.
title: Bafuna kuxoshwe uGordhan

text: UMQEQESHI weBafana Bafana uStuart Baxter uncome abadlali bakhe ngokuzinikela kumaqhinga abewabekele ukushaya i-Egypt ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. IBafana ithuse abaningi iguqisa i-Egypt ngo 1 - 0 emdlalweni welast 16 kwi-Africa Cup of Nations eCairo International Stadium ebigcwele phama. Kwehle umsindo kule nkundla ngesikhathi umdlali we-Orlando Pirates, uThembinuosi 'Shake my Soul' Lorch evalela phakathi igoli elinqobise iBafana lo mdlalo ngomzuzu ka-85. Ekhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva komdlalo uBaxter uthe icebo labo kulo mdlalo bekuwukuqinisekisa ukuthi izibabuli zabadlali be-Egypt okunguMohamed Salah noMahmoud 'Trezeguet Hassan azilitholi ibhola. "Abadlali basebenze ngokuzikhandla. Besineqhinga lokuvala amabhola ukuze angafinyeleli kuSalah noTrezeguet. Ngicabanga ukuthi sikwenze ngempumelelo lokho. Abadlali babo abaphambili akuko okutheni abakwenzile emdlalweni," kusho uBaxter ekhuluma nabezindaba. UBaxter uqhube waveza ukuthi ukube babanikeze isikhala sokuphefumula enkundleni abadlali baphambili be-Egypt iBafana ibingaba senkingeni. ULorch noPercy Tau bebeyiphela endlebeni kubadlali basemuva be-Egypt kanti imugeze igilo uBaxter indlela abadlale ngayo. IBafana inqobe lo mdlalo nje abemancane amathemba kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ingadlulela kuma quarter finals kwazise idlule 'ngopotsho' esigabeni samaqoqo lapho inqobe khona umdlalo owodwa kwemithathu. Ukapteni weBafana uDean Furman naye uncome ukuzinikela kwabadlali kulo mdlalo. "Besazi ukuthi uma sivuka emaqandeni ngendlela esihlasela ngayo, okuyinto eyasihlula emidlalweni yamaqoqo, singashaya noma iliphi iqembu njengoba senzile namhlanje. Abekho baningi abebezitshela ukuthi sizonqoba namhlanje, kodwa wonke umuntu kwi-dressing room ubefuna futhi ekholwa ukuthi sizonqoba. Besazi ukuthi uma sidlala umdlalo wethu sizowina. Sikhombisile ukuthi singadlala nanoma iliphi iqembu kulo mncintiswano," kusho uFurman. IBafana izobhekana neNigeria kuma quarter finals, eshaye iCameroon ngo 4 - 2 ngoMgqibelo.
title: UBaxter uncome ukuzinekela kweBafana ishaya I-Egypt

text: ISAZI esisiza abacwile ezikweletini, uMnuz Neil Roets, sithi abantu mababophe izifociya ngoba umthelela wentela ekhokhwa uma uthenga impahla iValue Added Tax (VAT) nokunyuka kukaphethroli sekuqalile ukuzwela.“Abathengi baseNingizimu Afrika bakweleta uR1.37 trillion uma behlangene. Lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu kufanele babophe izifociya bangadali izikweletu ezintsha ngoba kusazoshuba. IVAT inyuke ngo-Ephreli 1 kanti uphethroli unyuka ngoLwesibili ngo-58 cents bese udizili unyuka ngo-59 cents ilitha,” kusho uRoets.Uthe ukunyuka kuka-oyela ongahluziwe nokuntenga kweRandi yikona okunyusa uphethroli.“Akukho ukubalekela izindleko zikaphethroli ngoba nabampofu bayazikhokhela uma behamba ngamatekisi namabhasi. Imali yokugibela iyanyuka, kuzonyuka intengo yokudla neyayonke impahla,” kusho uRoets.Uphinde waveza ukuthi abampofu yibona abashayekayo uma kunyuka impahla ezweni ngoba vele abanamali kanti banezikweletu eziningi okusho ukuthi bazodonsa kanzima.“Kukhohliswa abantu ukuthi abampofu abahlangani neVAT, amanga lawo ngoba zincane kabi izimpahla ezingayikhokhi iVAT ezitolo. Okunye ukudla esikudlayo kuneVAT. Kubuhlungu ngoba abantu abampofu bayagoduka baye emakhaya uma besebenza emadolobheni, lokhu kusho ukuthi ama-toll gate anyukile, kunyuke nophethroli. Osomatekisi bazozidlulisela kubagibeli izindleko okusho ukuthi abampofu nabasebenzi bazokhokha,” kusho uRoets.Uthe uma kunyuka uphethroli yonke impahla iyanyuka, kwazise ithengwa kwamanye amazwe kanti nethengwa kuleli idinga uphethroli ukuya ezindaweni ezihlukene.“Siyathemba uhulumeni uzokwandisa impahla engayikhokhi iVAT. Ukunyuka kukaphethroli nama-tollgate yinto abangazukuyibalekela abantu. Ngicela bakhokhele izikweletu zabo, bangadali ezintsha ngoba ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abantu abakhokhi ngesikhathi. Abampofu yibona abazoshayeka kakhulu,” kusho uRoets.Kolunye uhlangothi inhlangano esiza umphakathi eMgungundlovu, iPietermaritzburg Agency for Community Social Action (Pacsa), ithi ukunyuka kwentela ekhokhwa uma uthenga impahla esitolo kunyuse ubhasikidi wegilosa wafika kuR3 144.02.IPacsa yenza ucwaningo ngentengo yokudla okudingwa yimindeni nyangazonke, ithe ngoSepthemba wonyaka odlule ubhasikidi ububiza uR2 885.73 kodwa ngenxa yokunyuswa kweVAT usubiza uR3 144.02.
title: ‘Basazodonsa kanzima abathengi’

text: AKAKUTHATHI njengegxathu elibheke emuva ukudlala kwiNational First Division (NFD) uNdiviwe “Diva” Mdabuka olobizela ukuyibamba kwi-Absa Premiership ngesizini ezayo.UMdabuka waseKapa ubesephenduke isethenjwa somqeqeshi uMokete Tsotetsi (osanda kuxoshwa kwalandwa uJoel Masutha) kwiMaccabi engomakoti kwiNFD. Ukhulele enkulisa ye-Ajax Cape Town, iKamva, ngaphambi kokunyuselwa eqenjini elikhulu nalapho afike khona wazakhela igama ngokushaya into ecokeme enkabeni yenkundla.Nokho uphelelwe yindawo sekufike umqeqeshi uMuhsin Ertugral ohluleke wancama ukusindisa i-Urban Warriors ezembeni. I-Ajax nayo isigijima kwiNFD kule sizini.“Ibhola linjalo. Ngizamile ukuthola iqembu kwiPremiership kodwa ngehluleka. Ngithathe isinqumo sokubuyela kwiNFD ngizibonakalise khona ukuthi ngisafuna ukudlala esigabeni esiphezulu. Ngiyethemba ukuthi ngesizini ezayo ngizobuyela kwiPremiership,” kusho uMdabuka.“Akulona igxathu elibheke emuva ukudlala kwiNFD. Ngicabanga ukuthi enye indlela yokukhula lena. Ngeke kuhlale kumnandi.
