Kufanele ngiqale kahle phansi ukuze ngibuyele phezulu.”KwiMaccabi uMdabuka uyibamba nabanye abadlali asebebuya emaqenjini ePremiership okukhona kubona uCollins Mbesuma wodumo kwiKaizer Chiefs, Lebohang Mokoena owayedlala kwi-Orlando Pirates, Thapelo Tshilo owadlala kwiMamelodi Sundowns noThemba Mavundla osebuya emabhukwini eMaritzburg United.Nokho laba badlali bahlulekile ukuyisiza ngempelasonto edlule ngesikhathi ihlulwa yiWitbank Spurs ngo 1-0 emdlalweni weligi eDobsonville Stadium, eSoweto.UMdabuka uthe akananxa no-Ertugral omkhombe indlela kwi-Ajax phezu kokuba abekade engomunye wabadlali abagqamile.“Ukuhamba kwami kwi-Ajax kwaba ngenxa yokuthi uMuhsin wathi angikho ezinhlelweni zakhe zesizini. Ngacabanga ukuthi kungcono ngibuyele kwiNFD ngoba ngadlala khona kumasizini edlule. Ngacela bangikhulule ngiyozama kwenye indawo. Abazange bangibambe, banginika incwadi yokungikhulula ngahamba.“Inkinga ibikade iphakathi kwami nomqeqeshi, hhayi nabaphathi. Angimangalanga ngoba wonke umqeqeshi unabadlali bakhe. Mina angibanga nenhlanhla yokuba kulabo badlali. Ngiyithathe kanjalo ngoba angikwazi ukuhlala ebhentshini kwiNFD futhi,” kusho uMdabuka.IMaccabi izobhekana neCape Umoya United emdlalweni weNFD e-Athlone Stadium, ngoMsombuluko ngo-3.30 ntambama. UMdabuka kulindeke ukuthi aqhubeke adlale yize izintambo zizobe seziphethwe umqeqeshi omusha uMasutha ochithwe yiChippa United ngesonto eledlule.
title: Akalilahlile ithemba ngePremiership

text: ZAKHELE XABAKUNGENZEKA isizini ka-2013/14 ibuyise izinsuku zenjabulo kuMamelodi Sundowns esiphenduke inhlekisa kwamanye amaqembu ngenxa yokusayinisa inqwaba yabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu kodwa ingazuzi lutho.Umdlalo wokuqala wesizini neBloemfontein Celtic kufanele wukuthi unikeze abalandeli bamaBrazilians inhlansi yethemba ngokuthi kukhona okuhlukile azoqhamuka nakho umqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane.EzikaMosimane zenza okungejwayelekile zidinda iPhunya Sele Sele ngo 3-1 ekhaya kowokuvula ku-Absa Premiership.Phambilini iSundowns beyaziwa njengeqembu elihlale libanga izicoco namaqembu afana neKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates. Lokho kushintshile, leli qembu sekuphele iminyaka emine lagcina injabulo eChloorkop.Ukufika kukaMosimane maphakathi nesizini edlule, kubuyise ithemba, enqoba imidlalo yakhe yokuqala, washintsha nesitayela sokudlala.Kwezinye zezinkulumo zakhe, uMosimane, wathi: “Kulula ukunqoba imidlalo kuMamelodi Sundowns. Kufanele ufake iqembu eliqinile ensimini. Bakhona abadlali, okufanele wukubahlanganisa.”Ngesizini edlule, iSundowns iqede isendaweni ka-11 kuPremiership.Yize ephinde wathenga inqwaba yabadlali kodwa ubukeka eyazi into afuna ukuyizuza. Usayinise abadlali abasebancane nabanamava, waphinde wabakhulula abonayo ukuthi ngeke abasebenzise kule sizini. Olunye ushintsho olwethuse abaningi olokuphuca isikhundla sokuba ngukaputeni uTeko Modise ibhande walinika u-Aljie Schut odlala emuva.Impumelelo yeSundowns kule sizini ibukeka incike ekuhlanganeni kweqembu kusakhanya.Ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini amaBrazilians aye kozicija eGhana lapho ebuya engazange ehlulwe emidlalweni eyishumi.Njengamanje, njengoba isamile imidlalo yeligi, iSundowns imatasa nemidlalo yobungani. Ngempelasonto idlale naMaZulu FC ewashaye ngo 6-1, yabambana ngo 0-0 neMaritzburg United.Umdlalo olandelayo weligi weSundowns ungo-Agasti 28 lapho izovakashelwa iPlatinum Stars eLoftus Stadium, ngo-7.30 ebusuku.Abadlali abAsayiniswe yi-Sundowns:Kennedy Mweene, Bongani Zungu, Dove Wome, Cuthbert Malajila, Bryce Moon, Tiyani Mabunda, Rodney Ramagalela, Raymond Monama, Emmanuel Mathias, Sibusiso Kumalo, Glen Verbauwhede, Rashid Sumaila, Mukuka Mulenga, Katlego Mashego noMzikayise Mashaba.Abadlali abahambile:Musa Nyatama, Method Mwanjali, Themba Zwane, Samuel Jules, Calvin Marlin, Nyasha Mushekwi, Abel Mabaso, Doctor Mampuru, Walter Maponyane, Buhle Mkhwanazi, Siyabonga Ngubane, Dennis Onyango, Sibusiso Khumalo, Mumuni AbobakarUmlando omfishane ngeSundowns:Yasungulwa ngeminyaka yo-1960, ngabafana abancane eMarabastad, ePitoli.Yangena kuFederation Professional Soccer League ngo-1973Yanyukela kuNational Soccer League (NSL) ngo-1985 nokuwunyaka eyagcina ithathwe ngawo yimpunyela uZola MahobeYadliwa yibhange ngo-1985 yathathwa ngabakwaKrok ababephethe inkampani iThe Twin PharmaceuticalNgo-2003 umphathi wezimayini, uPatrice Motsepe wathenga amasheya angu-51 wamaphesenti, ngonyaka olandelayo wawathenga wonke.Amarekhodi eSundowns:n Umdlali ophethe irekhodi lokudlala imidlalo eminingi: Daniel Mudau (390)n Umdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi: Daniel Mudau (172)n Ophethe irekhodi lokuqala imidlalo eminingi ngesizini: Themba Mnguni (48)n Oshaye amagoli amaningi ngesizini: Bennett Masinga (33)n Umdlalo iqembu elawunqoba ngamagoli amaningi: 24-0 v Powerlines (Mashi 4, 2012, Nedbank Cup)n Umdlalo iqembu elahlulwa kuwo ngamagoli amaningi: 1-6 Africa Sports (Novemba 4, 2000, Caf Champions League)Izindebe enazo:n Premier Soccer League (1997/98, 1998/99, 1999/200, 2005/06, 2006/07)n National Soccer League (1988, 1990, 1993)n Mainstay Cup (1986)n Rothmans Cup (1999)n JPS Cup (1990)n BP Top 8 (1988, 1990)n Ohlssons’s Challenge Cup (1988)n Charity Spectacular (1991, 2000, 2004, 2005, 2006)n SAA Supa 8 (2007)n Nedbank Cup (1998, 2008)
title: Kungase kubuye ezenjabulo kuSundowns

text: IQEMBU lesicathamiya eselike lazungeza umhlaba, iKholwa Brothers, ligubhe inyanga yabesifazane ngokubungaza owayeyiPhini likaMengameli kuleli, uNkk Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka, ngonqambothi lwengoma.Leli qembu elizinze eNtuzuma lithe liqoke ukuhlonipha uNkk Mlambo-Ngcuka ngengoma ngenxa yamagalelo akhe nokufuna intsha yesifazane isike iphethini kuye.Leli culo elisihloko sithi The Mlambo-Ngcuka likuthatha likubeke ngokusuka nokuhlala ngempilo nangemisebenzi emihle kaMlambo-Ngcuka njengoba esehambe waze waba nguMqondisi-Jikelele woPhiko lwabesifazane eNhlanganweni yeZizwe.Okhulumela iKholwa Brothers uMthobisi Ndwandwe (20), uthe babone kusemqoka ukuba kuqhakanjiswe imisebenzi kaMlambo-Ngcuka esadla anhlamvana.“Okusikhuthaze kakhulu wukuthi ngesikhathi sihambele e-USA ngo-2018, sathi uma sifika eNew York sahambela amahhovisi e-United Nations lapho safica igama lakhe liphezulu ezikhulwini eziphethe kulesiya sikhungo. Yikho lokhu esakuhlanganisa neminye imisebenzi aseyenzele isizwe sakithi saze siqamba ingoma. Uyijabulele kakhulu le ngoma emva kokuyilalela. Yiyo le ngoma nathi esihlonipha ngayo iqhaza labesifazane.”Ekhuluma esiteshini sethelevishini i-eNCA ngokohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe eseNew York, uNkk Mlambo-Ngcuka, ubebonakala echachamba nasebusweni ngesikhathi esekhuluma ngalo mklomelo awunikezwe yiKholwa Brothers.“Lokhu kuyinhlonipho enkulu engiyithatha njengenhlonipho yabo bonke abantu besifazane ngenyanga yabo. Ngibonga kakhulu kwiKholwa Brothers ngokungihlonipha ngeculo engilithatha njengelingikhuthazayo nelikhombisa ukuhlanganisa imindeni ngoba ukuhlangana kwemindeni kwakha isizwe esiphumelelayo nesinenqubekela phambili,” kuphetha uNkk Mlambo-Ngcuka.Umholi nomsunguli waleli qembu, uDerrick Mlambo, uthe le ngoma izokhishwa ngokusemthethweni ekupheleni kuka-Agasti.Akukhona okokuqala iKholwa Brothers iqhakambisa abantu nezindawo zakuleli ngomculo wayo.Eminyakeni eyedlule yaqamba ingoma ethi Woza Ethekwini, lapho yayiqhakambisa khona ubuhle beTheku. Yaqhubeka yabungaza iSilo Samabandla ngengoma eyayithi Hlanga Lomhlabathi, othisha ngethi Sibonga Othisha, izindawo ezingaphansi kwesifunda saseMgungundlovu ngethi Two Sheleni nethi Africa My Continent.
title: Bahloniphe uMlambo-Ngcuka ngengoma

text: NgoMsombuluko abanikazi balo mdlalo, iSariti Films bafake i-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bekhombisa abalingisi balo mdlalo, babhala ukuthi sebeqala ukuqopha.NgoDisemba abakwaM-Net ohambeni ababememe kulo abezindaba baveza ukuthi isizini yesibili yeThe Herd iyabuya.UReneilwe Sema wakwaM-Net waveza ukuthi imidlalo nezinhlelo ezenze kahle kulo nyaka bakhethe ukuzibuyisa.“Umdlalo iThe Herd ngomunye wemidlalo eyenze kahle kakhulu, uqala ukubonakala kuMzansi Magic. Sizoyibuyisa yonke le midlalo abantu abakhombise ukuyithakasela nezinhlelo zakhona,” kuchaza uReneilwe.Lo mdlalo kungenzeke ukuthi ubuye uma kuphela umdlalo okhona njengamanje othi, Ehostela.Kwi-video efakiwe kuvela abalingisi abadala balo mdlalo okukhona kubo uWinnie Ntshaba, Sihle Ndaba, Cindy Mahlangu nabanye ababekhona.Maduzane kulindeleke ukuthi aboMzansi Magic bamemezele izinhlelo ezintsha ezizobonakala ekuqaleni kuka-Ephreli.Kuzona kulindeleke ezindala nezintsha ezingashaya ibuya kulesi siteshi.Uhlelo, uThando Nesithembu ngolunye kwezinhlelo ezingase zikhuze ibuya kulolu hlelo ngo-Ephreli njengoba beluqoshwa ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi uMusa eshadelwa ngamakhosikazi akhe amabili, uMaCele noMaYeni.
title: Sekuqaliwe ukuqoshwa kweziqephu ezintsha zeThe Herd

text: KUME ukufunda esikoleni iVelangaye Comprehensive Technical High eNkandla izolo, abafundi beteleka beshisa amathayi bekhala ngokuthi abanye ozakwabo basayiniswe amaphepha okuthi bazobhala izifundo ezimbalwa kwa-matric.Omunye wabafundi okhulume neSolezwe izolo uthi uphasile kodwa unikwe ifomu eli-pink okuthiwa akaligcwalise ukuze angazibhali zonke izifundo.Uthe baningi abanikwe amafomu kodwa banquma ukungawagcwalisi.“Ngeke sigcwalise into esingayazi. Simise ukufunda ngoba saphasa nyakenye,” kusho umfundi ocele ukungavezwa.Uthe ngeke kuqhubeke ukufunda uma le nkinga ingaxazululwa.“Ngeke sifunde ngoba saphasa ngendlela efanele. Sifuna incazelo ukuthi kungani kuthiwe ngeke sizibhale zonke izifundo.”Uthe kwakumele baziswe ukuthi baduduliwe ukuze bazazi ukuthi ngeke bazibhale zonke izifundo.“Sifuna ukuzibhala zonke izifundo hhayi uhhafu. Umnyango wezemfundo kumele ungenelele kulolu daba,” kusho umfundi.Izolo bekusabalele ama-video nezithombe abafundi bebhikisha ngaphandle kwesikole.Okhulumela umnyango wezemfundo, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, usigxekile isenzo sabafundi sokubhikisha.“Sizwile ngalesi simo siyasigxeka isenzo sabafundi, kumele bayekele ukuphathwa kwesikole kubantu ababekwe ngumnyango. Akumele kube nokuphazamiseka kokufunda,” kusho uMthethwa.Lesi ngesinye sezikole ezenza kahle kwa-matric eNkandla.Muva nje sigajwe yizinkinga njengoba kwamiswa uthishanhloko kuthiwa uyaphenywa ngamacala ahlukene.
title: Umbhikisho wabafundi eVelangaye

text: KUSAZOSHUBA ePhalamende njengoba senyukile isibalo sezihlalo ezitholwe yi-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) emuva kokhetho lukazwelonke obelubanjwe ngoLwesithathu.I-EFF ePhalamende eledlule ibinezihlalo ezingu-25 ishubisa isimo inganqeni ukumisa nse yonke into ifuna izimpendulo zemibuzo ebiyibuza ingasabi muntu.Ibimisa ngisho inkulumo kamengameli ebhekiswe esizweni ibuchitha bugayiwe ize ikhishwe ngesidlozana abezokuphepha.Izibalo zakamuva zokhetho zithi i-EFF ithole amavoti angu-1 881 389 nokusho ukuthi ilele isithathu ngo-10.79%.Lezi zibalo zizuzela leli qembu izihlalo ezingu-18 phezu kuka-25 abebevele benawo ePhalamende.Lokhu kusho ukuthi amalungu e-EFF azoba ngu-43 manje. I-EFF iyiqembu elingahlanganise ngisho iminyaka eyishumi labunjwa kodwa izwi lalo ePhalamende liyaziwa. Lisungulwe ngoJulayi 2013 ngemuva kokuthi uMnuz Julius Malema exoshwe yi-ANC kade engumholi wophiko lwentsha kuyona.Liqhamuke nabaholi abangaziwa iningi labo kodwa bafika bayibeka induku ebandla. Laziwa nangokufolosa ngentsha njengoba sekujwayeleke ukuthi ePhalamende bekugcwala izingwevu. Kulokhu-ke i-EFF ohlwini lwayo lwePhalamende kukhona ngisho umculi uRingo Madlingozi.Bayiqembu lesithathu ngobuningi ePhalamende belandela iDA ephikisa ngokusemthweni njengoba i-ANC kuyiyona ebusayo.Kuvalwe iPhalamende kuvele kunezinkulumo mpikiswano ezishubile kubangwa udaba lomhlaba.I-EFF nobuningi bayo buzoba mqoka kakhulu nakuyona i-ANC njengoba bekhuluma ngazwi linye odabeni lokubuyiswa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo.Nakuba i-EFF ingadli ogqokweni olulodwa ne-ANC kodwa yakubeka kwacaca ukuthi imi nayo odabeni lomhlaba okufanele ubuyiselwe kubanikazi bawo. Kuzobe kubomvu ePhalamende futhi abantu bazobe belinde ukubona ukuthi ibuya nani i-EFF.
title: Zinyukile izihlalo ze-EFF ePhalandende likazwelonke

text: OWESIFAZANE waseJozini, uNkk Skhonzile Msane, ubopha isoka lakhe abesekipite nalo iminyaka engu-11 emzini wabo oseSakhamkhanya, KwaDukuza, ngoba lisuke lamnuka ngokulithakatha.UNkk Msane (50), osabiza isibongo salapho ayeshade khona, uthi isoka lakhe (54) laphelelwa wumsebenzi eGoli, labuya lanuka yena.“Wafike wangixosha emzini wakhe engawufica umahliphihliphi kodwa ngawakha kabusha, wathi yimina omthakathile. Wathi ngantshontsha ukhamba lwasemsamu, umlotha, isicephu ahlala kuso uma eshisa impepho nezikhindi zakhe zangaphansi.“Ngaxakeka ukuthi ngangingamthakatha kanjani umuntu esengithandane naye iminyaka ewu-11 futhi engamfica engelutho, ngamenza utho emphakathini.“Inhliziyo yami ibuhlungu ngempela ngoba ungihlambalaze emphakathini. Sengaziwa njengomthakathi,” kusho uNkk Msane obezifikele mathupha emahhovisi eSolezwe.Uthe umsolwa ubuye wathatha izimpahla zakhe, wazichela ngomuthi.Ethintwa umsolwa akavumanga futhi akaphikanga ukuthi uyazi ngalolu daba kodwa uthe izintatheli azize kwakhe zizoshutha izithombe. “Okwamanje ngisematasatasa kabi,” kusho umsolwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe icala elivulwe nguNkk Msane ngelokweba. Eziphendulela uNkk Msane uthe akusilo iqiniso lelo.“Icala lokuthukwa ngokuthakatha ngilivule ePhoenix kodwa balidlulisela eStanger. Likhona vele elokuntshontsha ngalivulela lobaba eStanger kodwa akukenziwa lutho.”Induna yaseSakhamkhanya, uMnuz Khuzwayo (onqabile negama lakhe), ikuqinisekisile ukuthi uNkk Msane umbikelile ngalolu daba.“Bengilindele ukuba afike lapha ngoLwesithathu ukuze ngimyise emkhandlwini ukuze ludingidwe enkosini yendawo,” kusho uKhuzwayo.UNkk Msane uthe useyasaba ukubuyela kule ndawo ngenxa yokuthi akaphephile.Echaza ngembangela yengxabano yabo, uNkk Msane uthe kwaqala ngokuthi isoka lakhe lifike nenye intombazane ebeselijola nayo ngoDisemba 28, nyakenye.“Wafika nale ntombazane, Wazokipita nayo khona emzini wethu.“Ngathi ngiyambuza ukuthi ukwenzelani lokhu. Wafika nalo ngigula kabi, ngilele embhedeni, ngingakwazi nokuvuka ngiyochama.“Wangishaya ngaze ngavuka ngabo 4 ekuseni sengiphalaza igazi.” Uthe kusukela lapho inhlalo kuye ayibange isaba yinhle emzini njengoba umsolwa wayesehlala ngokumhlukumeza futhi wabuye washisa nezimpahla zakhe.“Wabuye wagqekeza kule ndlu engase ngihlala ngedwa kuyo nendodana yakhe engayifica emzini.“Ngayifica incane kabi, ishonelwe wunina, ngayikhulisa njengoba seyindala manje. Namanje ihlala nami, ngehla ngenyuka nayo ngoba ayinacala, yazi mina njengonina.”Uthe usemvulele uxhaxha lwamacala okubalwa kuwo nelokumhlukumeza nelokugqekeza kodwa ubengakaboshwa.
title: Ubopha isoka elithi uyathakatha

text: INHLANGANO yezokusakaza iSouth African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) iqoke uMnuz Madoda Mxakwe ngengesikhulu esiphezulu sayo noNkk Yolande van Biljon njengesikhulu esiphethe izimali zale nhlangano.Lezi zindaba zimenyezelwe nguSihlalo weBhodi, uMnuz Bongumusa Makhathini izolo.Uthe izikhulu ezintsha zizosebenzisana noMnuz Chris Maroleng obhekelele ukusebenza kweSABC kanti zizoqala ukusebenza ngoJulayi 1.Uchaze uMxakwe njengomuntu okhaliphile okwaziyo ukushintsha izinhlangano ezingayingenisi imali, azenze zibe nenzuzo.UMxakwe uneziqu zeMA (Global Political Economy) azithola eNyuvesi yaseSussex e-United Kingdom, izitifiketi zokuhola amabhizinisi azithola eLondon Business School, ezePDG kwiBusiness Administration azithole eGordon Institute of Business School (GIBS) nezinye.Useke wasebenza kwaNestle eyisikhulu esibhekelele ukukhula kwale nkampani eMozambique, Namibia, Botswana, Swaziland naseLesotho.UMkhathini uthe uNkk van Biljon naye unamava kwezamabhizinisi njengoba ebesebenza kwaDenel ephethe izimali.“Uyena oweza nohlelo lokushintsha izinto kwaDenel. Ubesebenza kwaGlad Africa Group, uneziqu zeBCom Accounting, B Compt (Hons), B Comm (Hons) neze M Comm (Taxation). Ukuqokwa kwalaba kusho ukuthi sizimisele ukuheha ongoti emikhakheni ehlukene ukuze beze namacebo okuthuthukisa iSABC, balethe ubuchwepheshe besimanje bagculise namakhasimende ethu,” kusho uMakhathanini.Uthe ukuqokwa kwezikhulu kuzoletha amakhono amasha, kuqinisikise nokuthi ubulili nazo zonke izinhlanga zimelelekile.
title: I-SABC izotakulwa ngabanamava

text: FAKA imali uzobona. Bekungathi usho kanjena umqeqeshi weBidvest Wits uGavin Hunt, ongayivumanga futhi wangayiphika eyokuthi kungenzeka alahlekelwe yizinsika eqenjini lakhe okunguThulani “Tyson” Hlatshwayo ongukaputeni waleli qembu neBafana Bafana noSifiso Hlanti odlala kwesokunxele emuva.Ngokusho kwalo mqeqeshi ongadinge kuchazwa ebholeni laseNingizimu Afrika, sekuyokhuluma imali kuphela ekutheni ngabe laba badlali ababili bayazishiya yini iZitshudeni noma bayahlala.UHlanti kuvela ukuthi ufunwa amaqembu aseMelika, ayibamba kwiMLS kanti ziya ngokuya ziqina ezokuthi uHlatshwayo angase adlubhe imibala ye-Orlando Pirates ngesizini ezayo.Akukhona okokuqala lesi sitobha simataniswa neZimnyama njengoba nangesizini edlule kube ngesifanayo kodwa kwagcina kungahlangananga.UHunt uthe kungenzeka noma yini kodwa okubalulekile kubona beyiWits ukuthi okubekwa etafuleni kuyabagculisa yini.“Sonke siyadayisa lapha kwiWits, nami nje uqobo ngiyadayisa. Kodwa lokho kuya ngokuthi imali ebekwayo iyalijabulisa yini iqembu. Angikusho lokhu ngoba ngifuna ukulahlekelwa abadlali kodwa izinto ezinjalo ziyenzeka ebholeni. Nokho uma imali iyinhle ngeke sime endleleni yomdlali,” usho kanje uHunt osezakhele igama ngokukhuluma iqiniso ebholeni lakuleli.UHlatshwayo ufike kwiWits ngo-2014, ubedlalela i-Ajax Cape Town. Kubukeka sengathi isikhala sesitobha sivulekile kwiBucs njengoba isanda kushiywa nguMarshall Munetsi osezodlala eFrance, Abbubaker Mobara ojoyine iCape Town City no-Caio Marcelo obuyele kwelakubo eBrazil.Ngaphandle nje kwalokho, uHappy Jele ubukeka esekhulile njengoba esezoba neminyaka ewu-33. Abanye abadlali basemuva maphakathi abasele ekhempini yePirates * -Alfred Ndengane noJustice Chabalala.Nakuba iPirates kuyiyona ebe yisiqhwaga emakethe okwamanje kodwa okuhlalukayo ukuthi kubo bonke abadlali ebathengile akekho noyedwa odlala emuva-maphakathi. Empeleni kubo bonke abadlali ebathengile iPirates, uTebogo Tlolane kuphela ongumdlali wasemuva.Abadlali asebethengwe iBucs kuze kube yimanje uTshegofatso Mabasa, Fortune Makaringe, Joris Delle, Gabadinho Mhango, Austin Muwowo, Kabelo Dlamini noSiphesihle Ndlovu.
title: I-Wits ivule izandla ngofunwa yiBucs

text: AMAQEMBU aphikisayo azothi emasha kusasa  ethi akaphume uMsholozi kwesobumengameli yena abe egubha usuku lokuzalwa njengoba kusasa ehlanganisa iminyaka engu-75.
title: UZuma ugubha usuku lokuzalwa amaqembu

text:
UPHENDUKE ihlaya ezinkundleni zokuxhumana umholi weqembu elisha i-African Content Movement (ACM) uMnuz Hlaudi Motsoeneng ngokusabalala kwe-video ekhuluma nabe-eNCA ethi ubheke ukuba ngumengameli wezwe.UHlaudi owayeyisikhulu se-SABC ukusho lokhu ngoLwesithathu ngesikhathi ebuzwa intatheli ukuthi yini ayibhekile njengoba imiphumela yokhetho kulindeleke ukuthi iphume kusasa.Uthe iqembu lakhe linezinyanga ezine lisunguliwe kodwa abantu bakuleli bakhombisa ukuliseka.Uthuse abaningi esethi yena ubheke ukuba ngumengameli waseNingizimu Afrika “bottom and klaar”.Okumangaze abantu ukuthi uzosifeza kanjani isifiso sakhe ibe iqembu lakhe lihlulekile ukuthola amavoti angu-35 000 abezolisiza ukuthi lithole isihlalo esisodwa ePhalamende.Ngokwezibalo ze-IEC kuvela ukuthi lisathole amavoti angaphansi kuka-3000 okwenza ukuthi libe no-0,02%.He'll be the president bottom and klaar. 
pic.twitter.com/Ntb4ertmre— Mthoko🇿🇦🇿🇦🇿🇦🇿🇦 (@MLutseke) 
May 9, 2019Has President 
@CyrilRamaphosa called the President in-waiting 
#Hlaudi Motsoeneng to concede defeat? It was truly a remarkable year for a virgin party to come so early & ascend to the Union Buildings. 
#Election2019Results
pic.twitter.com/55U5Q5ZEZ0— Loeto Mocwane (@LoetoMocwane) 
May 10, 2019Hlaudi motsoeneng deserves his own reality show!!, bottom and klaar!.— Bathong Nayi'Mhlolo (@TshomoYaphupjan) 
May 10, 2019ACM is doing extremely well so far. They got 3200 people voting for them. Hlaudi Motsoeneng should be over the moon with the developments.— Vezuchiy Fanashnikov (@fanamokoena) 
May 10, 2019
title: #Ukhetho2019: Lishabalele iphupho likaHlaudi Motsoeneng lokuba umengameli wezwe

text: UMQEQESHI weLamontville Golden Arrows, uMandla Ncikazi, ukushayela ihlombe ukuqashwa kwephini lomqeqeshi leqembu uMabhudi Khenyeza ofike ngasekuqaleni kwesizini.Ngokusho kukaNcikazi, uKhenyeza ubonakala ezoyiqeda inkinga ebiyenzela phansi iqembu kumasizini edlule.UNcikazi uthe ezakhe bezakha inqwaba yamathuba kodwa abagadli behluleka ukushaya igoli. Ukufika kukaKhenyeza kulisiza kakhulu iqembu  ngokulekelela abagadli bakhe ngokushaya amagoli. Emidlalweni emithathu edlalwe Abafana Bes’thende selokhu kuqale isizini kwiDStv Premiership, sebevalele phakathi amagoli amahlanu, bangenelwa amathathu. Kuze kube manje ezikaNcikazi aziyazi induku.  UNcikazi uqale wacacisa ngokufika kukaKhenyeza kwezakhe esuka kwiTS Galaxy.“Empeleni uMabhudi wayezojoyina iqembu kusekhona uSteve (Komphela). Kwasuke kwenzeka-ke  ukuthi uSteve ahambe, bese kufika uMabhudi. “Ngamanye amazwi akubanga wukuthi uKhenyeza uvala isikhala sikaKomphela, wayevele ezolijoyina iqembu. “UMabhudi wayezojoyina iqembu ezoqeqesha i-Arrows kwi-MDC,” kusho uNcikazi.Ukusebenza ngokuthembana nokuhloniphana yinto uNcikazi athe uyibeka phambili kwezakhe. “Yingakho ethi ngeke esamdedela uKhenyeza ukuba aqeqeshe iqembu le-MDC le-Arrows.“Sisazobheka umqeqeshi ozoqeqesha i-Arrows kwi-MDC ngoba ngiyakuthokozela ukusebenza noKhenyeza eqenjini elikhulu. “Angiqali ukusebenza naye, sike sasebenza esengumdlali phambilini. “Unomlando omude nebhola. Uzobasiza kakhulu abadlali abasakhula ngenxa yamava anawo,” kusho uNcikazi.Eqhubeka echaza uNcikazi, uveze okumenza ajabulele ukufika kukaKhenyeza kwezakhe.“Inkinga ebesibhekene nayo kumasizini edlule indlala yamagoli. Njengamanje ubasiza kakhulu abagadli bethu, uyabakhombisa okumele bekwenze uma bephambi kwamapali. Ngibona sisayibambe kahle impela.”Emdlalweni olandelayo we-Arrows izokwamukela iKaizer Chiefs eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium ngoMgqibelo ngo-3.30 ntambama.Amakhosi  asephenduke ukudla kwenduku selokhu kuqale isizini. Empeleni  awakalishayi nelilodwa igoli  kwiPremiership ngaphandle komkhonto owagwaza ekhaya bebhekene neChippa United abanqoba kuyona ngo 1-0. “UNcikazi uthe ulindele umdlalo onzima kwiChiefs, esho nokusho ukuthi abazoyithatha neze kancane ngoba ingabaphoxa ivuke ngabo. “Lo mqeqeshi uphinde wacacisa ngezinto afisa ukuzizuza njengomqeshi waBafana Bes’thende.“Okubalulekile wukuthi iqembu lihlale kwiPremiership. Okwesibili wukuthi lingene kwiTop 8. “Umnikazi weqembu (Mato Madlala) uyisikhulu esiphezulu kwiPSL, ngakho akumele nakancane siphoxe, kumele konke kuhambisane. “Indlela umnikazi weqembu aseseka ngayo iyamangalisa, ngakho nasenkundleni kumele senze kahle,” kusho uNcikazi.
title: UNcikazi ujabulela ukuqashwa kukaKhenyeza abe yiphini lomqeqeshi

text: SIFUNA ukubuya nolwazi oluzosiza umkhakha wezemfundo ngezinto ezingalekelela emfundweni yakuleli, isitshudeni saKwaDukuza esizomela i-Afrika phesheya.UNdumiso Mpanza (25) owenza unyaka wokugcina kwi-Education Law e-University of Pretoria, uzomela izitshudeni zase-Afrika engqungqutheleni edingida ngomkhakha wobuthisha kule nyanga.Kule ngqungquthela kuzobe kudingidwa ngokuthi yini engabuyisa isithunzi emkhakheni wezemfundo nokuthi kungaliwa kanjani nezinkinga ezibhekene nalo mkhakha. Kuzobe kuqala kulo nyaka ukuthi kufakwe nesitshudeni sase-Afrika kule ngqungquthela eyaqala ngo-2003.“Kunocwaningo oluthole ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ingelinye lamazwe asenkingeni enkulu emkhakheni wezemfundo. Izigameko zokushaywa kothisha ngabafundi, zingezinye ezenza ukuthi leli libukeke lisenkingeni enkulu kwezemfundo.Kuzobe kukhulunywa ngezinto ezinjalo, hhayi ekufundiseni kuphela kodwa nasekubuyiseni isithunzi nenhlonipho ezikoleni,” kuchaza uMpanza.UMpanza uzohlala amasonto amabili eSweden, adlule aye e-England amasonto amathathu. Uzovakashela nase-Oxford University evelele umhlaba wonke.Uzophinde athole ithuba lokufundisa esikoleni samabanga aphezulu eSweden, avakashele nase-University of Lund. UMpanza ubonga abazali bakhe athi basebenze kanzima ukumfundisa njengoba sekubonakala izithelo manje. Mayelana nesimo semfundo yakuleli, uMpanza uthi inkinga kuningi okukopelwa kwamanye amazwe bese kungasebenzi. Ulinganisa ngendaba yokungashaywa kwezingane, athe ibonakala ingasebenzi kuleli.“Kumele sibheke okuzohambisana nathi njengoba sise-Afrika ukuze kusizakale umkhakha wezemfundo. Iqiniso ukuthi kunezinto ezisebenza kahle kwamanye amazwe ezingeke zisisebenzele kuleli.”Uma esebuya phesheya uMpanza uzohlangana nomqondisi omkhulu woMnyango wezeMfundo eyisisekelo kuleli ngoSepthemba, ukumxoxela ngakuthole ohambweni lwakhe.Uthe uma eqeda izifundo zakhe enyuvesi angakwazi ukusebenza emnyangweni ukudweba imigomo nokuba ngumeluleki.Akaqali ukuya eSweden njengoba ngo-2012 wakhethwa ukuyomela abafundi engqungqutheleni yobuholi. Ngaleso sikhathi wayefunda uGrade 11 enguMengameli wabafundi eStanger South Secondary.“Luningi ulwazi engabuya nalo olwangenza ngakwazi ukuqhathanisa indlela esifunda ngayo kuleli nakwamanye amazwe.Ngiyathemba ukuthi namanje kukhulu engizobuya nakho, okuzosiza umkhakha wezemfundo kuleli,” kusho uMpanza.
title: OwaseKZN uyomela i-Afrika phesheya

text: USHAYANA ngamakhanda umndeni wenyanga yaseMaduladula, eNquthu, ebulawe phambi kwesiguli sayo yashiswa nendlu.UMnuz Senzo Mncube (29) kodwa owaziwa ngesibongo sakoninalume kwaShabangu, uhlaselwe amadoda amabili ngoMsombuluko ebusuku elele. Afike amfuna imali maqede amgwaza, amnquma uqhoqhoqho phambi kowesifazane abemelapha, ase emudlwengula eshintshana ngaye.Owesifazane odlwenguliwe uthe namanje izwi lakhe alipheli ezindlebeni zakhe lisho ngendlela efanayo naleyo ebemuzwa ekhala ngayo.“Mina bathe angivale amehlo ngesikhathi bemgwaza baqeda lapho bangidlwengula bephindelela bobabili. Angibabonanga nanokuthi bebengobani. Bengizele ukuzokwelashwa,” kusho umdlwengulwa eligodliwe igama lakhe.Umndeni obungenayo imininingwane egcwele ngokwenzekile, uthe ushaqekile usuthola ukuthi uqale wagwazwa wabe eseshiswa.Uninalume kaMncube, uMnuz Meshack Shabangu (67), uthe umshana wakhe ubeseqede nokulobola ekhweni lakhe kwaMabaso.“Mina ngithole ucingo lokuthi kuyasha ekhaya. Kuthe uma ngigijima ngathola uphahla selungene phakathi. Ngithathe ugodo ngizama ukumcinga ngalo lavele laqondana naye ngamtakula eseshe waphela, izingalo nemilenze kungasekho. Ngisho ikhanda alikho asilitholanga. Okubuhlungu wukuthi abasekhweni lakhe bafike lapha basithuka bashiya abangalazi. Bathi sizolikhuluma iqiniso ukuthi kwenzekeni. Abafunanga ngisho ukudla ngendlela abacasuke ngayo,” kusho uShabangu .Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu- Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe bavule icala kokubulala nelokudlwengula kodwa akukaboshwa muntu.Ngisho omakoti bakwaShabangu bathwala izandla ekhanda uma bekhuluma ngokuthukwa ngabasekhweni likamufi abathi bebebabuza ukuthi yini bengazi ngokwenzekile.“Thina sikuqala ngawe bhuti konke lokhu futhi besingazi nanokuthi kunentombazane ebikhona. Thina sazi ukuthi uSenzo ushe nendlu. Ngisho ithwasa lakhe lakwaNgubane lithi alizange lizwe lutho futhi nale ntombazane aliyibonanga. Ngikhuluma nje lithathwe wumndeni walo labuyela ekhaya. Isililo esikulo nkosi yami ngiyasesaba. Nokho siyabonga ukwazi ngoba siyakweshwama konke lokhu kokuthi ubenentombazane abeyelapha njengoba vele ubengudokotela wesintu, elapha ngamakhambi,” kuchaza omunye umakoti ongathandanga ukudalulwa.
title: Inyanga ibulawe phambi kwesiguli yashiswa

text: UMENGAMELI we-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa unxuse abaholi benhlangano ukuthi baziphathe kahle bangaphakami, bahloniphe futhi balalele ngoba abantu bababhekile.URamaphosa uthe nakuba le nhlangano inamalungu abalelwa ku-1 million kodwa yesekwa ngabantu abaningi kakhulu ngoba babalelwa ku-12 million.“Laba bantu basibheka yonke into esiyenzayo. Yingakho kumele sisebenzele abantu singaphakami. Baningi abantu abasibheka ukuthi senzani ngoba bayaseseka,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ubekhuluma namalungu e-ANC kwethulwa umkhankaso iThuma Mina, KwaDukuza ngempelasonto.URamaphosa uthe abantu abangafuni ukusebenzela umphakathi kumele bashiye enhlanganweni.Uthe uma ujoyina inhlangano usuke uvolontiya ngakho kumele ubeke umphakathi phambili.“Ukulwa kumele kuphele ngoba abantu basibhekile. Sizele ukuzosebenzela abantu njengoba sisenhlanganweni,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ebonga umsebenzi wesigungu sesikhashana esifundazweni, uthe: “UMnuz Sihle Zikalala noMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu basebenzisana kahle ukubumba isifundazwe. Kumele sibancome manje, sithi qhubekani kanjalo. Ngifuna ukuncoma uNksz Nocawe Mafu, abathunywe yisigungu esiphezulu ukubumba lesi sifundazwe.Basebenza ubusuku nemini ukubumba le nhlangano,” kusho uRamaphosa.Unxuse ukuthi kungagxekwa uhulumeni ngokunyuka kukaphethroli nezinye izinto ezweni.“Kumele kwehliswe umthwalo obhekene nabantu. Kodwa akuyena uhulumeni owenze ukuthi kunyuke uphethroli,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ukusho lokhu nje abantu bazwakalise ukuthukuthela ngokunyuka kukaphethroli okuthiwa usazophinde unyuke ngenyanga ezayo.Ubonge ukwamukelwa ngesasasa KwaZulu-Natal, wathi kukhona abebethi kuyikwa-alubhadwa kubaholi be-ANC obaphezulu abakhethwa eNasrec nyakenye.URamaphosa uthe amalungu kumele aye emphakathini alalele izikhalo zawo ngezinto eziningi ngaphansi komkhankaso iThuma Mina.Uthe kwezinye izindawo kuhlanzwa ilokishi, okuwumkhankaso iThuma Mina, ukuze abantu bahlale endaweni ehlanzekile.
title: URamaphosa ukhuthaza udlebe

text: KUFUNWA imindeni yababili eMpangeni, ngemuva kokutholakala kwendoda eshile namathambo ngokwehlukana ngenyanga edlule. Kutholakale indoda epulazini likamoba iLogan Farm, okuthiwa belishiswa.Kuthiwa indoda yaphuthunyiswa esibhedlela inamanxeba okusha emzimbeni, yashonela khona. Umthombo uthe lo wesilisa oneminyaka elinganiselwa kwengu-30, watholakala eseshiwe.Kuthiwa wayeboshwe izandla, okungasacaci ukuthi wayevele elimele yini kushiswa umoba. Waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela iNgwelezane washonela khona ngakusasa. Namanje akukaziwa ukuthi ngowakuphi.Kwesinye isigameko kutholakale amathambo omuntu omdala eduze kwejele iQalakabusha.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kunemizi esanda kwakhiwa kule ndawo okutholakale kuyo amathambo. Umthombo ongeke udalulwe ngenxa yomsebenzi, uthe bekumbiwa kulungiswa umgwaqo ngesikhathi kutholakala amathambo omuntu.“Kubonakala sengathi amathambo aseneminyaka cishe emithathu agqitshwa kule ndawo. Amathambo athathiwe ukuyohlolwa futhi ayikho imininingwane yokuthi ngabe akabani,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant-Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe abasebenzi basepulazini babeshisa umoba ngesikhathi bethola indoda eshile, yayiswa esibhedlela. Uthe lo mlisa akaziwa kodwa kuvulwe idokodo lokufa komuntu eliphenywa esiteshini eMpangeni. Ukuqinisekisile nokuthi amaphoyisa ayazi ngesigameko sokutholakala kwamathambo ngasejele.“Omunye wabashayeli bakagandaganda obemba wabona amathambo wasola ukuthi awomuntu. Amaphoyisa afikile endaweni, kwavulwa idokodo. Amathambo ayiswe ukuyohlolwa ukuze kutholakale imbangela yokufa neminye imininingwane,” kusho uZwane.
title: Kufunwa imindeni kutholakala owesilisa  namathambo

text: UMA uzwa ngempumelelo yesikole iZama High, yaseManzana, Osizweni, eNewcastle, ungacabanga ukuthi ngesinye salezo zikole zasemalokishini noma emadolobheni kanti ushayephansi.IZama High eqala kwaGrade 8 iye kwaGrade 12, ngesinye sezikole eziphakamisela phezulu ifulegi lezikole zasemakhaya futhi ezibhukulile zavala igebe ebelikhona phakathi kwalezi nezikole nezasemadolobheni uma kuziwa ngasohlangothini lwemiphumela.Kubhekwe lukhulu nakwimiphumela yalo nyaka ka-matric yeZama High njengoba kusukela ngo-2010, lesi sikole sihlale sithola u-100%.Kusukela ngo-2010, lesi sikole sihlale sikhiqiza iziqengqe zabafundi abamenywa nguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal ngokwenza kahle kwabo uma kukhishwa imiphumela ka-matric.IZama High ibihlonishwa ngisho nawuMnuz Senzo Mchunu oke waba nguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo esifundazweni ngamagalelo ayo kwezemfundo.Lesi sikole esingaphansi kwesiFunda iMajuba siyahloniswa ezweni lonke kanti amagalelo aso aziwa ngisho nawuNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyiSisekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga.Lesi sikole ngesinye sezikole ezamenywa nguNkk Motshekga ukuba zibambe iqhaza ohlelweni lomnyango, iThe Schools That Work, oluhlose ukuzama ukuqeda inkinga yokufeyila kwabafundi ezikoleni kuzwelonke.Ngaphandle kwalokhu, lesi sikole sike sahlonishwa ngomklomelo wokulala isibili kumaNational Matric Excellence Awards.Lesi sikole sachonywa uphaphe legwalagwala inkampani i-ATKV ngokuhlale senza kahle, ukuhlomula kwaso kuholele ekutheni le nkampani igcine isisiza nezinye izikole ezingomakhelwane baso.IZama idumile futhi ngokwenza kahle emculweni njengoba iqembu lomculo lesikole eliphekwa nguthishanhloko uMnuz Oscar Kubheka lihlale lizitamuzela izindondo kusukela ngo-2010.IQEMBU lomculo lesikole iZama High, sasOsizweni eNewcastle elidume ngokwenza kahle emculweniNjalo lesi sikole sihlale simele isifundazwe kumaNational Finals of South African Schools Choral Eisteddfod manje aziwa nge-ABC Motsepe Choral Eisteddfod.Ngo-2017, lesi sikole sawina kwiminxa emine kulo mqhudelwano womculo, umlawuli weqembu lomculo yena wanqoba indondo yeNational Best Conductor. Ngo-2018 seyibe yizingqwele kwiminxa emibili, yalala isibili kweminye iminxa emibili.Lesi sikole sesiqophe amacwecwe amathathu ngosizo lukaDkt Lucky Nkosi woKhozi FM.Iqembu lomculo lalesi sikole selike lamenywa ngisho nobengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma ukuthi lizomculela kweminye yemicimbi yakhe.Engxoxweni neSolezwe, uthishanhloko uKubheka uthe impumelelo yesikole sakhe incike ekubambisaneni okuhle phakathi kwabo bengothisha nabazali.“NoNkulunkulu wangibusisa ngezingane ezifunda lapha esikoleni, ingane uma ifika ingqondo yayo ivele ishintshe izimisele njengezinye izingane,” kusho uKubheka.Uthe abazali babambe iqhaza elikhulu empumelelweni yesikole ngoba bahlale benza isiqiniseko sokuthi yonke into ihamba kahle.UKubheka uphinde wabonga nomholi wesifunda sabo uMnuz Zembethe Nkosi ohlale emgqugquzela ukuthi enze kahle.“Umhloli wethu akathi ngoba izinto zihamba kahle bese eyayekelela kodwa uyaqhubeka angiphushe lokho kusiziza kakhulu isikole,” kusho uKubheka.UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, uthishanhloko waseZama High uMnuz Oscar Kubheka nePhini likaNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uMnuz Enver Surty bekweminye yemicimbi yokuklomelisa iZama ngokwenza kahle ku-matricUphinde wabonga nothishanhloko obekhona ngaphambi kwakhe uNkk Sbongile Mazibuko, wathi nguyena owakhe isisekelo esiqinile sesikole.USihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole uMnuz Nhlanhla Kubheka naye uhambe emazwini kathishanhloko wathi ukubambisana okwenza isikole siphumelele.“Enye into esiza isikole ukuthi siphumelele ukuziphatha nokuhlonipha imithetho yesikole,” kusho uKubheka.Uthe bahlale njalo befuna ukukhiqiza abafundi abazoba abantu abahlonishwayo emphakathini.
title: Izigqaja ngo-100% iZama High

text: IMEYA yoMkhandlu waseMkhanyakude, uMnuz Solomon Mkhombo, ithi bazowukhomba umuzi onotshwala osomabhizinisi abephula imigomo yomvalelandlini ezindaweni zabo zamabhizinisi.UMkhombo uthe bazobahlawulisa osomabhizinisi abazothola ukuthi bayaqhubeka nokuphula umthetho yize sebebaxwayisiwe.Ekuqaleni kwesonto eMkhanyakude kuboshwe osomabhizinisi abayisithupha, kuhlanganisa nowomdabu waseChina, obedayisa engenawo amaphepha.“Siqale umkhankaso wokubheka ukuthi osomabhizinisi bayayilandela yini imibandela. Esikutholile wukuthi bakhona abangayilandeli, sase siyabaxwayisa sathi abalungise. Kodwa kube nalabo isimo esibheda kakhulu emabhizinisini abo sabe sesiwavala,” kusho uMkhombe.Uthe bazobuyela bayobheka labo abawavalile amabhizinisi abo ukuthi abaqhubeki yini nokuhweba.Uma beqhubeka nokuhweba bazophoqeleka ukubahlawulisa.“Kwamanye amabhizinisi sithole ukuthi basebenzisa isibulali magciwane sokuzenzela esingekho ezingeni ngakho abeka engcupheni impilo yamakhasimende,” kusho uMkhombo.Kwesinye sezitolo bathole ukuthi kudayiswa inyama ebolile.“Naso isitolo ebesidayisa inyama ebolile sisivalile.”Uthe bazoqhubeka nomkhankaso wabo ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi imigomo yomvalelandlini iyagcinwa.“Kukhona namanye amadolobha ethu esisazowahambela kodwa sifuna ukuzumisa uma siya kuwo.”Unxuse abantu ukuba benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bafaka izifonyo uma beya ezitolo ukuze baphephe.“Siyakukhuthaza futhi ukuthi abantu bahlale begeza izandla ukuze banqande ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCorona.”
title: Imeya ixwayisa abezitolo ngomthetho

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uzolinda aze aqede ukufakaza owayeyisikhulu sase-Eskom, uMnuz Brian Molefe, kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokuLawulwa koMbuso iDlanzane, bese ephendula ngezinsolo abekwe zona.Ohola ubufakazi, u-Advocate Pule Seleka, utshele ikhomishini ngoLwesithathu ukuthi uRamaphosa akakaphenduli incwadi ebizwa nge-3.3, ngezinsolo ezibhekiswe kuyena uMolefe ngenkampani i-Optimum Coal Holdings.Le nkampani yayisaphethwe iGlencore. Ngaleso sikhathi uRamaphosa wayesayiphini likamengameli wezwe.Wayephethe nekomiti lase-Eskom elaliqokwe owayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ukuthi abheke izinkinga zase-Eskom.USeleka uthe uthole umyalezo ovela ehhovisi likaMengameli ukuthi bazolinda uMolefe aqede ukufakaza bese bephendula.“Akukho esisakutholile okuvela kumengameli okwamanje,”  kusho uSeleka.Ikhomishini icele ukuba owayephethe eGlencore, owaphika ukuthi uRamaphosa wayengusihlalo we-eOptimum Coal, ukuba abhale isitatimende ngalokho akusho.UMolefe efakaza, ulethe izindaba ezintathu nombiko we-Johannesburg Stock Exchange, owamemezela ukuthi uRamaphosa waqokwa ukuba usihlalo we-Optimum Coal.USihlalo weKhomishini, uJaji Raymond Zondo, uthe lezi zindaba ezibhalwe ngoRamaphosa kumele zifakwe njengobufakazi bekhomishini.Uthe ngeshwa abasakwazi ukulandela konke osekuvela ngemuva ngoba isikhathi asenele.
title: URamaphosa akakaphenduli ngezinsolo zikaMolefe

text: ISELE ngezimpahla zokulala imindeni emithathu ehlala emijondolo yaKwaGonowakhe, eCramond, emuva kokuthi umlilo oqubuke entathakusa izolo ushise imijondolo emithathu.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Bright Mkhize, lithe okwamanje akwaziwa ukuthi umlilo uqalwe yini ngoba abantu bebelele ngesikhathi uqala.“Abantu basele nezimpahla zokulala ngoba bebegqoke zona bezilalele ngesikhathi kusha. Siyacela uMsamariya olungileyo abanikelele ngezimpahla zokugqoka, umfaniswano wezingane wesikole nezincwadi. Bashile nomazisi. Siyabadinga abantu abazosiza le mindeni ithole omazisi nezitifiketi zezingane,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe ukube abantu banogesi ngabe akushanga ngoba KwaGonowakhe abantu kade becela ukufakelwa ugesi, amanzi nezindlu ezincane kodwa uMasipala waseMshwathi awukwazi ukufaka lezi zidingo ngoba indawo akusiyo eyawo.“Besicelile siwumphakathi ukuthi kufakwe noma yizindlu zangasese ezingomahamba nendlwana nompompi ngoba abantu abanazo izidingo. Ugesi bayawudinga ngoba imijondolo eshile akuqondakali ukuthi ishiswe yini ngoba kwabashelwe akekho othi ubekhanyise ikhandlela noma kukhona okuthile obekuvutha. Ukube kunogesi umuntu ogangayo ebezoshesha abonakale.”UColonel Thembeka Mbele wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kushe imijondolo yakwaGonokwakhe, eCramond, entathakusa yayizolo kodwa akhekho olimele.UMnuz Sibusiso Mkhithi, okhulumela uMasipala waseMshwathi, uthe kunezingxoxo eziphakathi kukamasipala nomnikazi wendawo okuhlala kuyo abantu baKwaGonowakhe. Umasipala ucela khona ilungelo lokulethela abantu izidingo.“Okwamanje kusaxoxwa kodwa esingakusho wukuthi zikhona izinhlelo zokulethela abantu izidingo yingakho sixoxa nomnikazi wendawo ukuze asinike ilungelo lokusebenza endaweni yakhe. Uma kushe imijondolo kuye kuthunyelwe ithimba lezinhlekelele elihlola isimo bese lenza umbiko. Abantu bayafunelwa indawo yokukhosela,” kusho uMkhithi.
title: Basale ngezimpahla zokulala kusha imijondolo

text:
CHARLES KHUZWAYOEbika eseNorth WestU MCULI kamaskandi obukeka enyamanambana emicimbini nasemisakazweni yakuleli, uMbuzeni Mkhize, akasaconsi phansi emazweni angaphandle. Lo mculi oxebula isiginci aze asibelethe emhlane uzogida ephindelela emazweni angaphandle kuze kushaye unyaka ozayo. UMbuzeni wasesigodini eMbuthwini uzolifulathela leli alubhekise eBrazil ngoSepthemba 7.Uzobuya lapho ngomhla ka-17, aphinde futhi alubangise eThailand ngoDisemba 24 aze abuye ngoJanuwari 2 bese uchungechunge lwamakhonsathi akhe aluvale ePeru ngesonto lesibili kuMashi. Kwenzeka lokhu nje, ubevele engenasinqe ngoba ubesanda kubuya eChina nase-India. Echaza ukuthi kungani eyiqaqa kuleli kodwa ngaphandle abe newozawoza uMbuzeni uthe wukuthi abantu basemazweni angaphandle abafuniseli ngomculo kodwa bawuqonda kahle. “Mina ngihamba ezinyathelweni zoMfazomnyama ngoba angingcofi muntu ngomculo wami kodwa ngakha isizwe. Ngiqamba izingoma eziyokhulisa ngokomqondo ngisho nezizukulwane. Okubachaza kakhulu abantu baphesheya nokungakhele ugazi yindlela engisincinza ngayo isiginci, ngisho sengisibelethe emhlane,” kusho uMbuzeni. Lo mculi ushiye izithameli zisahalela impinda emcimbini wamaSatma obuseMmabatho Civic Centre eMahikeng ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi edlala elinye lamanoni akhe elithi 
Ephehlweni.Ngaleso sikhathi bekungena izinhlanga ezihlukahlukene zishaya imidanso yazo. Usuzophela lo mcimbi, ubuyile uMbuzeni esehambisana nomsakazi woKhozi uNgizwe Mchunu banandisa ngengoma yabo ethi 
Khazimula (Diamond) nekwi-albhamu yabo ethi 
Indod'Ebuy'Entabeni.UMbuzeni usemacikweni adlana imilala kumunxa weBest Male okubalwa kuwona uQhoshangokwenzakwakhe, Indidane, Dlubheke, Qalindaba, Ngelo V, Mshengu, Hammy Chauke noPrince Rhangani. KwiBest Female kutholene uBuselaphi, Vumile Mngoma, Moneoa nabanye. Kwi-Afro Soul kukhona iThe New Beam Brothers, Moneoa, The Soil, Simphiwe Dana, Unathi nabanye.BEST POET: Nompumelelo Khumalo, Phindile The Poet nabanye.BEST INDIGENOUS COMEDIAN: Mondli Mzizi, Tsoro noSiyabulela.BEST NEWCOMER: Bahubhe, The New Beam Brothers, Lucas Sithole nabanye.BEST TRADITIONAL DANCE GROUP: Indlondlo Zulu Dancers, Nomtiti.BEST MBHAQANGA: Sandile Khwela, Ofeleba neMpumelelo.BEST ISICATHAMIYA: Zulu Messengers, Royal Messengers, King Star Brothers, Hlanganani neBeautiful Stars.BEST ISIXHOSA: Butho Vuthela, Gobolempundulu, Valangentsimbi, Thembeka Wittes neMpondolomthonyama.BEST MASKANDI: Imfezemnyama, Amageza Amahle, Thokozani Langa, Abafana BakaMgqumeni, Amagcokama, Umjikijelwa, Buselaphi, AmaSAP noDlubheke.BEST VERNACULAR HIP HOP: KO, Zakwe noCassper Nyovest.BEST SONG OF THE YEAR: Mjikijelwa-
Sombambasimnqume, Ithwasa Lekhansela - 
Valamehlo, Osaziwayo- 
Iphupho, Igcokama Elisha-
Malavisto, Khuzani-
Injemnyama nabanye.Ukuvota kuqalile izolo kanti uthumela iSMS ebhalwe ukuthi Satma igama lovotelwayo nomkhakha akuwo ku-34066.
title: Usezakhele ugazi phesheya

text: ISIKHULU soMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nokuthula Khanyile kubikwa ukuthi uwushaya indiva umyalelo okhishwe nguNdunankulu uMnuz Sihle Zikalala wokuthi ashenxe esikhundleni njengoba kusaqhubeka uphenyo ngendlela aziphethe ngayo emsebenzini. UZikalala usanda kubiza umhlangano ehhovisini eliseMgungundlovu nezikhulu eziphezulu kulomnyango. Kulomhlangano uZikalala umemezele ukuthi uKhanyile uzojutshwa kwesinye isikhundla lapho ezoba yisikhulu esiphezulu kwi-AgriBusiness Development Agency kulesi sifundazwe. Okhulumela uMnyango wezoLimo nokuThuthukiswa kweziNdawo zaseMakhaya uMack Makhathini uphikile ukuthi uKhanyile uzosebenza kulomnyango. UMakhathini uveze ukuthi uNgqongqoshe uBongiwe Sithole-Moloi ubengazi ngezinhlelo ezintsha. Ngesonto eledlule, abasebenzi ehhovisini likaKhanyile baqinisekisa ukuthi izinhlelo zokusebenza aziphazamisekanga njengoba wayehamba imihlangano maphakathi nesonto. UKhanyile waveza ukuthi ayikho incwadi ayitholile emyalela ukuba ashenxe esikhundleni sakhe. Ngesonto eledlule, iphephandaba iSunday Tribune libike ukuthi oKlebe bagasele ehhovisini likaKhanyile. Kubikwa ukuthi oKlebe bashaqa impahla okubalwa kuyo omakhalekhukhwini, ama-laptops kanye namaphepha ahlukene.  UKhanyile usolwa ngamacala okuphatha ngendlela ephambene nomthetho wehhovisi, ukuzicebisa yedwa, inkohlakalo, ukusabisa abahlinzeka ngemisebenzi nezikhulu. Lezi zinsolo zifakwe kumbiko othunyelwe koKlebe.Izikhulu zalomnyango zizoqala uphenyo lapho zizohlola khona inkohlakalo nokusetshenziswa kwemali ngendlela engalungile kuleli hhovisi.Abasebenzi kuleli hhovisi baveze ukuthi lolu phenyo luzomosha izimali futhi lufana nendlela yokubamba isikhathi. Baveze ukuthi uZikalala wahlela ukuthi kuvulwe uphenyo kodwa umphumela abawutshelwanga. Kubikwa ukuthi uKhanyile wabikelwa ngabantu abaletha ubufakazi kulolu phenyo. Kubikwa ukuthi labofakazi sebephila kanzima.Umphathi wezokuXhumana ehhovisini likaNdunankulu uMnuz Lennox Mabaso akatholakalanga ukuphawula. UKhanyile akatholakalanga ngenkathi kushayelwa ihhovisi lakhe.
title: Unqabe ukushenxa esikhundleni osolwa ngenkohlakalo

text: IMIBIKO evela eMalawi ngoLwesithathu ekuseni iveza ukuthi uMfundisi Sheperd Bushiri nowakwakhe uMary sebezinikele emaphoyiseni kulandela ukukhishwa kwencwadi egunyaza ukubabopha kuleliya lizwe. Izolo uhulumeni waseMalawi nawo ukhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kwalaba kulandela ukweqa kwabo eNingizimu Afrika bebalekela icala lokukhwabanisa izigidi zamaRandi. OBushiri bashaye bachitha kuleli ngeledlule kusaphele izinsukwana bethole ibheyili kaR200 000 ecaleni lokukhwabanisa imali ebalelwa ngaphezulu kukaR106 million. Ibheyili yakhe isihoxisiwe kuleli kanti oKlebe bathe kwashaya uLwesine engazinikelile emaphoyiseni akuleli uzoshaqwa umuzi wakhe obiza uR5.5 million oseCenturion, eGoli. UNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya kuleli uMnuz Aaron Motsoaledi izolo udalule ukuthi uMfundisi Shepherd Bushiri nenkosikazi yakhe uMary bebenama-passport amahlanu aseMalawi umuntu ngamunye ngesikhathi echazela iPhalamende lakuleli ngokweqa kwabo.
title: Bazinikele emaphoyiseni abakwaBushiri - imibiko

text: KUBOSHWE owesilisa (24) kutholwa isidumbu sowesifazane (32) siqotshiwe amalungu aso afakwa koplastiki abamnyama bokuqoqa udoti eflethini eliseBellvile, eKapa, ngoLwesine ekuseni. Okhulumela amaphoyisa eWestern Cape uSergeant Noloyiso Rwexana uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulawa kulandela ukutholwa kwamalungu esidumbu sowesifazane efakwe koplastiki. “Amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala ngemuva kokutholwa kwesidumbu sowesifazane oneminyaka ewu-32 eWelgemoed namhlanje (izolo) ekuseni ngo-11. Amaphoyisa aye endaweni abebizelwe kuyo, ngemuva kokuphenya athola oplastiki abamnyama obekufakwe kubo amalungu omzimba wobulewe kwelinye iflethi. Kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka ewu-24, uma esevulelwe icala uzovela enkantolo yeMantshi eBellville,” kusho uRexwana.  Ngokombiko weNetwerk24, omakhelwane bazwe umsindo eflethini likaNksz Lynette Volschenk ngoLwesithathu ebusuku. Bephenya ngakusasa ekuseni babona owesilisa efake ama-gloves aluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka eflethini lakhe. Umndeni walo wesifazane usubhale ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook ucele abantu ukuthi bangabuzi imibuzo ngokubulawa kwakhe noma babeke imibono yabo kulo. Uthe uzokwamukela kuphela imiyalezo yendunduzo evela kubangani nakubantu bomndeni kuphela.
title: Kutholwe isidumbu sowesifazane siqotshiwe safakwa koplastiki

text: Njengamanje uNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya, uMnuz Malusi Gigaba, uphenduke undabamlonyeni kusabalala ivideo yakhe ebambe umphambili ewuphulula ekhuluma ethi ‘awucabange ususemlonyeni wakho babe’.Kulula ukwenza amaphutha uma nithumelelana ‘amanyala’ ngakho nakhu okumele ukuqaphe:: Ungalinge, ngiyaphinda futhi ungalinge uveze ubuso bakho uma uthumela isithandwa sakho isithombe noma ivideo unqunu. Uma wenza lokhu uzifaka engcupheni yokuthi izithombe zakho unqunu zisabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nakuma-group oWhatsApp. Okwevideo kubi kakhulu ke ngoba kukhona ama-website ocansi kanti isikhathi esiningi uma ivideo yakho ike yaputshuka yaba sematheni, iphelela khona. Ukufihla ubuso bakho kuyasiza ugweme ukuhlazeka emphakathini uma kwenzeka ‘amanyala’ edlulela ezandleni zomuntu ongathembekile.: Uma uke waqala wazibandakanya kwingxoxo evuthayo nesithandwa sakho, qinisekisa ukuthi uphendula ngokushesha, kungenjalo uzompholisa kanti ubesefudumala. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi ungaluqali lolu hlobo lwengxoxo uma wazi ukuthi umatasa. Kuyafana noma uthunyelwe isithombe, kwesinye isikhathi isithandwa sakho sizokumangaza nje sikuthumele amanyala maphakathi nomhlangano. Ungatatazeli, yehlisa umoya uphendule kahle uma usunesikhathi.: Abantu bajwayele ukuhlekisa ngendlela abantu besilisa abashesha ngayo ukuhlanza igumbi labo lokulala uma kuza owesifazane. Uma uhlela ukwenza ivideo noma ukuthatha izithombe, qinisekisa ukuthi uyabukeka, futhi negumbi lakho lihlanzekile. Ayikho into engathandeki njengobunuku, iyonanto umuntu agcine eseyibuka kunalokhu obuthi umthumela khona.: Kungenzeka ukuthi senisesigabeni sokuthumelelana izithombe zezitho zangasese noma izithombe ninqunu (ungakhohlwa njalo umthetho wokuqala), qinisekisa ukuthi nawe uhlanzekile nokuthi isitho sakho sangasese sibukeka ngendlela egculisa isithandwa sakho ngazo zonke izikhathi.: Sithi IsiZulu ubothemba itshe kunomuntu kodwa ke kumathandana ngeke niye ndawo ningathembani. Lokho nokho akusho ukuthi wonke umuntu othandana naye kumele azi ukuthi inanazi noma umphambili wakho umi kanjani esithombeni noma kwivideo. Uma umuntu ungakamthembi ngokwanele kungcono ungamthumeli amanyala ngoba angakugila uma into yenu iphela ngokushesha.: Ngokomthetho eNingizimu Afrika kuyicala ukusabalalisa izithombe noma ivideo yomuntu enqunu/enza ucansi ngaphandle kwemvume yabo. Uma kwenzeka kuwe lokhu ungavula icala lokudicilelwa phansi kwesithunzi esiteshini samaphoyisa ngakini.
title: FUNDA: Imithetho yokuthumelelana imiqhafazo yocansi

text: IMENENJA yeMaccabi engompetha be-ABC Motsepe League eGauteng, uJames Ndlovu, iphosele inselelo abadlali baleli qembu ukuthi bangabeki wonke umsebenzi emahlombe omgadli uCollins “Ntofontofo” Mbesuma kodwa babhukule ukuze banyukele kwiNational First Division (NFD).UMbesuma wodumo lokuqobela amagoli angu-35 kwiKaizer Chiefs ngesizini ka-2004/2005, uzothwala amathemba eMaccabi emidlalweni yokuhlunga amaqembu amabili azonyukela kwiNFD ezoqala ngoJuni 4, e-Turfloop University, eLimpopo. Ayisishiyagalolunye amaqembu aphuma kuzo zonke izifundazwe zaseNingizimu Afrika azogadulisana kule midlalo ehlala ihambisana nemibiko yokugwazelwa konompempe minyaka yonke. Nyakenye iMaccabi ihluleke yancama ukuzibekisela indawo kwiNFD, kwagcina kunyuke Uthongathi yaKwaZulu-Natal neSuper Eagles yaseFree State efike yadliwa yizembe kulesi sigaba.UNdlovu uthe nakuba kubajabulisa ukuba noMbesuma eqenjini labo futhi ekhombisa ukuba sefomini kodwa ukuwina ama-Play Off kuzodinga iqembu lonke. UMbesuma akakaze adlale kule sizini ngaphansi komqeqeshi uMokete Tsotetsi owayeyisitobha seChiefs. Ufike elimele emuva kokuhlukana neHighlands Park. “Ubukeka esesimeni esihle kakhulu uma ngibuka imidlalo yobungani esiyidlalile. Yisilwane uqobo lwaso. Kuhle ukuthi sizoba naye kuma-Play Off. Kodwa ukuba noMbesuma akusho ukuthi sesiwawinile ama-Play Off. Kudingeka iqembu lonke lisebenze ngokuzikhandla. Ngokwesikwati esinaso ngingasho ukuthi sizowina kodwa kuningi okwenzeka ebholeni ngaphandle kwenkundla. Ama Play-Off ayinkinga.“Amalungiselo ahamba kahle. Sizodlala umdlalo wobungani neBlack Leopards ehambela phezulu kulezi zinsuku. Siqoka amaqembu aqinile ngoba akusizi ukudlala nangasho lutho uwine ngembudlu yamagoli. Sidlale neSuperSport United ngokulingana ngo 1-1," kusho uNdlovu.Ngaphandle kukaMbesuma, iMaccabi ishaya ngowayengumgadli weMpumalanga Black Aces neFree State Stars, uMadoda Motha. IMaccabi ayikawazi amaqembu amabili ezogadulisana nawo eqoqweni layo kwazise asabambeke emacaleni ezifundazweni zawo iNorthen Cape neMpumalanga. Alikacaci nelizomela iFree State. ISouth African Football Association (Safa) kulindeleke ukuthi iqede ngamacala ngaphambi kokuqala kwemidlalo.“Akumnandi ukuthi asazi sizodlala nobani, asikwazi nokuyobabuka kodwa bona bengakwazi ukusibuka. Sineqembu elihle kakhulu kulokhu, siyawashaya amagoli futhi asivuzisi emuva. Uma kungeke kwenzeke izinto zangaphandle kwenkundla, sizowawina ama-Play Off. Kodwa-ke kuhlala kunezinto zakhona,” kusho uNdlovu.Amanye amaqembu azobanga ukunyukela kwiNFD, uMvoti (KZN), Buya Msuthu (North West), The Dolphins (Limpopo), Steenberg FC (Western Cape) neTornado (Eastern Cape).Imi kanje imidlalo yeSafa Sasol League eKwaZulu Natal yonke eqala ngo 1 emini.Durban Ladies v Nxamalala (Mangosuthu); Umlazi Arsenal v Barcelona (King Zwelithini Outer Field); Ntuzuma Ladies v Tottenham Ladies (New Centre); White City v Newcastle (Umhlathuze Sports Complex); DUT Midlands v MUBS (Indumiso Sports Field); Juventus Ladies v Tiger Girls (Panorama Ground); Lindelani Ladies v Citizen Prayers (New Centre) UKZN v Sunflower (Westville Campus).
title: UMbesuma uyithemba leMaccabi eLimpopo

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAPHEZU kokuthi kubukeka zibhimba izinto kuMoroka Swallows kodwa ukaputeni wayo, uLefa Tsutsulupa, ushaya phansi ngonyawo ngokuthi ngeke bagebise amakhanda bafane nembuzi yomhlatshelo uma sebebhekene nePlatinum Stars kowe-Absa Premiership namuhla ngo-6.30 ntambama eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium.ISwallows ilokhu yehle ngesivinini ibheke ezansi ngenxa yokuhluleka ukuwina imidlalo osekuyibeke endaweni ka-12 ku-log.Ngempelasonto ithelwe phansi yi-Orlando Pirates ngo 1-0 wegoli likaTlou Segolela.“Sizama konke okusemandleni ukwenza okufanele. Okwethu wukuthi sihlale sinethemba lokuthi izinto zizoshintsha maduze. Ngiyakholwa wukuthi sinabadlali abanesipiliyoni esanele sokubhekana nalesi simo,” kusho uTsutsulupa.ISwallows isingenelwe amagoli angu-30 emidlalweni engu-23, okuyisibalo esingahlukile kangako namanye amaqembu ayibambe ngasemsileni ku-log. Ilamontville Golden Arrows eyivale emsileni isivuzise amagoli angu-39.“Akusikhona ukuthi sidlala kabi kodwa inkinga sipha izitha amagoli. Angisoli udonga lwethu lwasemuva kodwa uhlaka lwethu lokudlala kumele luqoqeke ngoba iphutha elenzekayo lokuhluleka wukuvala ibhola uthola ukuthi liholela egolini. Lokhu yikhona kanye okumele sikulungise,” kusho uTsutsulupa.ISwallows ayiqali ukuhlaselwa yinkinga yokuqhuba isikhathi eside ingawini imidlalo ngaphansi kukaZeca Marques. Nangesizini edlule uMarques, othathe izintambo kuGordon Igesund, ubebhekwe yisambane ephikwa yimiphumela waze wavolontiya ukuliyeka iqembu. Ngaleso sikhathi iZinyoni bezilengela ezembeni ngemuva kwemidlalo eyisishiyagalombili zingawini kodwa ekugcineni zilivikile izembe.Leli qembu elingenabo abaxhasi azikho izinguquko ezinqala ezilenzile ngemuva kokuhamba kuka-Igesund owayelibeke endaweni yesibili ngesizini ka-2011/2012. Lisathembele kuSiyabonga Nomvete, Lerato Chabangu, Tsutsulupa, noLuvhengo Mungomeni.Ngasohlangothini lwePlatinum Stars amaphuzu amathathu azosho ukuqinisa indawo yayo ku-Top 8. Ukuqeda esixhantini samaqembu ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu kusho ithuba lokuvikela indebe yeMTN 8 engompetha bayo.Imidlalo yePremiership:Namuhla: Platinum Stars v Moroka Swallows (Royal Bafokeng Stadium, 6.30pm)Kusasa: Kaizer Chiefs v Golden Arrows (FNB Stadium, 7.30pm); Orlando Pirates v Mpumalanga Black Aces (Orlando Stadium, 7.30pm); SuperSport United v Maritzburg United (Lucas Moripe Stadium, 7.30pm)NgoLwesihlanu: Moroka Swallows v Ajax Cape Towns (Dobsonville Stadium, 8pm)
title: ISwallows ayililahlile ithemba yize izinto ziyitshekele

text: Uthi okubuhlungu kakhulu abesifazane abenza lokhu nabo banezingane okungenzeka zibe nenkinga yesikhumba.ULady Zamar ukhuluma kanjena nje kukhona i-video esisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, okusolakala ukuthi uBabes Wodumo nabangani bakhe bemyoca ngezinduna ebusweni, bemthuka bembiza nangomjendevu omubi, baphinde banezelele ngegama okubizwa ngalo owesifazane ongaziphethe kahle, isi%#be.Lezi zinhlamba zisukela ngesikhathi uLady Zamar eyijaji losuku kuhlungelwa umncintiswano osakazwa kuMzansi Magic, i-Idols SA.“UBabes angimazi, nombono wakhe ngami awuthi shu...ngeke ngidinwe wuyena. Indlela akhuluma ngayo ichaza uhlobo lomuntu awuyena. Amazwi awaphimisayo, asho ubuyena,” kusho uLady Zamar.Mayelana nabanye abantu abamgxekayo, uthe okubuhlungu wukuthi ngabesifazane abenza lokhu.“Mina angiyena ungoti wesikhumba futhi angiyena unobuhle. Kungani abantu begxila esikhunjeni sami engabe banaka umculo engiwenzayo?“Maningi amantombazane anenkinga yezinduna, kumele engabe abantu banaka ukuthi ngizogcina ngiyixazulula kanjani le nkinga yami yezinduna hhayi ukuthi bayiphendule inhlekisa,” usho kanje.Njengoba lokhu kugxekwa kuqhamuke ngemuva kokuvela kwakhe kuma-Idols, uLady Zamar uthi abantu kumele baqonde ukuthi ama-Idols akuwona umdlalo kulezi zingane ezisuke ziyozama inhlanhla.“Uhlobo lomuntu engiwuyena, ngeke ngiye kuthelevishini ngiyele ukuyojivaza izingane. Zinamaphupho ajulile. Uma zikhala yingoba kusuke kubuhlungu ngoba ama-Idols yinto ebalulekile kuzona.“Ngeke ngihlekise ngazo kodwa njengomculi, umsebenzi wami bekuwukuthi ngibheke ukuthi umuntu ozozama inhlanhla unalo yini ikhono.”Lo mculi selokhu angena kule mboni akaphatheki kahle njengoba ehlale egxekwa.Uke wangcofwa ngokuhluleka wukugqoka into efanele umzimba wakhe, kwahlekiswa ngaye nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana.ULady Zamar uthi empeleni kumele engabe abesifazane bayasekana.“Kunezinto eziningi okumele engabe silwa nazo singabesifazane, singagxili ekugxekaneni sisodwa.“Kumele engabe siqinisa ekufundiseni amadoda ukuthi asiphathe kanjani, ayeke umkhuba wokusifuna ucansi uma kumele senzelwe okuthile.“Kumele engabe sigxile ekushintsheni indlela umuntu wesifazane abukwa ngayo emphakathini, sifundise nezingane zamantombazane ukuthi kumele ziyibheke kanjani impilo ukuze kushintshe indlela owesifazane aphathwa ngayo,” egcizelela.Mayelana nendlela akhuluma ngayo isiNgisi, nayo agxekwa ngayo, uLady Zamar uthi abantu abamgxekayo yingoba abamazi, abazi ukuthi ukhuliswe kanjani emndenini onjani.“Ngikhule ekhaya kukhulunywa isiNgisi. Ngiyazama manje ukukhuluma izilimi zesintu.”Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaBabes Wodumo mayelana ne-video, igcine iphunzile njengoba ucingo belubanjwa bese lubekwa phansi.
title: 'Umbono kaBabes ngami awuthi shu...' Lady Zamar

text: UMMELI kalowo owayenguMengameli kuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uMnuz Lungisani Daniel Mantsha, uthi ikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana kuleli ibukeka ilwa noZuma ngqo. Phambilini ezinkulumweni azethule emphakathini uZuma useke wakuveza ukuthi izinhlaka zikahulumeni zisasebenza ngokuzimela kuleli futhi ukuze kuthiwe uhulumeni uselawulwa yidlanzana kungamele kube nobufakazi bokuthi zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni azisazimele. Ummeli kaZuma usole ikhomishini kaJaji Raymond Zondo ngokuphuma iqhubu noZuma. “Nithungatha iqiniso lenu nokuhlambalaza ikhasimende lethu ngokumnekela izwe ngokuvela phambi kwale khomishini, kunokulandela okuyikho okwasungulelwa ikhomishini.”Kuqale kwaba nomzuliswano phakathi kwalekhomishini kaZondo nabammeli baZuma odabeni lokuvela kwakhe. Abammeli baZuma baqale bacela ukuthi athunyelelwe imibuzo ukuze ezophendula kahle uma esevela kwikhomishini, okuyisicelo esachithwa. UZuma ugcine evumile ukuvela phambi kwekhomishini phakathi kukaJulayi 15 kuya kuJulayi 19 nonyaka. Esitatimendeni ngoLwesibili ikhomishini iveze ukuthi izitholile izikhalo zikaZuma kodwa ayiphawulanga ngezinsolo zokuthi ilwa naye futhi isingene ipolitiki.
title: UZuma usola ikhomishini ngokuzama ukumhlambalaza

text: NKOSIKHONA CELEASAMANGELE futhi ayathuthumela amalungu omphakathi waseSonyongwe, phambili kwaseMzimkhulu, ngesenzo sowesilisa obhadame intombi yakhe isocansini nomakhwapheni wavele wayigwaza yathula, maqede wabasa umlilo wase eyishutheka isikhuni esithweni sayo sangasese. Wabasela i-ayina, wayishisa inkomo maqede wayihudula wayoyilahla eweni.UMnuz Mvelo Makhanya (26) kuthiwa ubeseneminyaka ethandana nomufi uNksz Zimbili Nyibe (21), ogcine embulala ngalesi sihluku. Kuthiwa uMvelo unengwe wukubhadama intombi yakhe izitika ngocansi nomfana wasendaweni uMnuz Sanele Jaca, okuthiwa uphume wabaleka emapunapuna ngesikhathi behlaselwa nguMakhanya.Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo  lithole ukuthi uMakhanya ubemenza ibhola lakhe uNksz Nyibe ngoba ubemhlukumeza ngokumshaya mihla namalanga. Kuthiwa kukaningi uuNksz Nyibe evulela isoka lakhe amacala okushaya kodwa uMakhanya axolise nayo intombi imxolele maqede isule amacala nempilo iqhubeke kube sengathi akukaze kwenzeke lutho.UMakhanya ubhadame intombi yakhe isembhedeni ngemuva kokuba elunywe indlebe ngomunye wasendaweni. Kuthiwa akazange apholise maseko ube esenikela khona kwaJaca, lapho obekulele khona intombi yakhe.Ngemuva kwalesi sigameko, kuthiwa uMakhanya usihudule kabuhlungu isidumbu sikaZimbili sinqunu sinjalo, wahamba naso wayosiphonsa endaweni ewumsele naye wangena kuwona.Amalungu omphakathi abesho ukumudla luhlaza uMakhanya kuthiwa amane adikabala ngemuva kokuba ewatshele ukuthi “awambulale vele ayisekho into ayiphilelayo ngemuva kokugilwa yithemba lakhe ebeliletha ukukhanya empilweni yakhe” esho uZimbili.UMnuz Mondli Phoswa, oyilungu lomphakathi elibhekelele izinto eziningi kule ndawo, uzwakalise ukukhathazeka kwakhe ngesehlo.“Sonke sisamangele kakhulu ngale ndaba. Ukukhuluma iqiniso nje bobabili bebephila ngokuklwebhana mihla namalanga. Kodwa akekho obebanaka ngoba sonke besazi ukuthi baxabana namhlanje, kusasa baphinde bazwane,’’ kusho uPhoswa.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi nelingusomabhizinisi uMnuz Thimothy Maduna, lithi lesi sigameko sibamangazile kakhulu. UMaduna uveze ukuthi ngemuva kokuba uMakhanya esenze lesi sigameko ufike kuyena wamazisa ukuthi usebulale umuntu ngephutha.“Ngesikhathi engitshela lento bengizitshela ukuthi uyadlala kanti uqinisile. Yimi obize amaphoyisa afika ambopha,’’ kuchaza uMaduna.Umndeni wakwaNyibe awuholakalanga ukuba uphawule ngodaba. Kodwa Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo lithole ukuthi lo mndeni ugqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ngokudlula emhlabeni kwelungu lawo ngesihluku esinjena nesimo kuwona kuthiwa simuncu kakhulu.Umufi kuthiwa ubengumuntu obezifela ngobumnandi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala usiqinisekisile isigameko. Uveze ukuthi umsolwa zimkhalele ngosuku agile ngalo umkhuba. Uthi bathole ukuthi umsolwa ugwaze wabulala intombi yakhe."Kusolakala ukuthi owesilisa wabulala intombi yakhe ngokuyigwaza kabuhlungu emqaleni. Yafa ngaleso sikhathi. Lesi sigameko senzeka emini,“ kuchaza uCaptain Gwala.
title: Udlokodle inkomo yentombi ngesikhuni sivutha

text: UFUNA uR2 million owesifazane waKwaMashu osola isibhedlela iKing Edward VIII ngokumshumpula ibele kungenasidingo.UNksz Sibongile Mthethwa (59) osephila nebele elilodwa, ukhala ngesibhedlela esamsika ibele lesokudla sithi unomdlavuza webele kodwa wathola kamuva ukuthi ubengenawo.UNksz Mthethwa uthe sekuphele iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye efuna uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal umnxephezele ngobudedengu besibhedlela.Uthe uma edlula ngakulesi sibhedlela uvele ahlengezele izinyembezi, acabange okwamehlela.“Ngaya emtholampilo ePoly ngihlushwa isibhobo ebeleni. Banginikeza incwadi yokuya esibhedlela eKing Edward. Esibhedlela bangifaka emshinini bathi bathole umdlavuza ebeleni. Babe sebehlela usuku lokungisika ibele okwakunguJanuwari 11, 2010. Ngahlala esibhedlela izinsuku eziwu-9,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Uthe esekhishwa esibhedlela wanikezwa incwadi yokuthi ayohlowa esibhedlela Inkosi Albert Luthuli, lapho afike wathola ukuthi bekungamele akhishwe ibele.Uveze ukuthi udokotela waseNkosi Albert Luthuli wambhokela ngolaka ukuthi uvumeleni ukuthi bamkhiphe ibele bengasisikanga isicubu senyama yakhe ukuze siyohlolwa isifo somdlavuza.“Udokotela wayesho ukungiqeda. Wathi bekungamele bangisike ibele ngoba bengihlushwa isibhobo nje kuphela. Ngamtshela ukuthi ngangingazi, ngangibathemba njengabantu abafundile. Ngavele ngakhala esengitshela ukuthi bekungamele bangisike ibele,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Uthe okubuhlungu ukuthi usephila ngokufaka isipontshi ebeleni ukuze abantu bengaboni ukuthi usenebele elilodwa.Ukhala ngokuthi sesiside isikhathi ummeli wakhe uMnuz Andile Magubane egqigqa enkantolo ezama ukulwa udaba lwakhe.“Angazi noma ngiyoke ngiyithole le mali. Sebefuna ngize ngife ngingayitholanga. Ngiyasola ukuthi ngangixilongwa udokotela owayeyimfunda makhela. Udokotela wase-Albert wathi kukumina ukuthi ngifuna ukubabopha yini,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Isolezwe ngeSonto liyibonile incwadi kadokotela waseLuthuli egcizelela ukuthi owamhlinza wenza iphutha.Ummeli kaNksz Mthethwa, uMnuz Magubane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bafake enkantolo uMnyango wezeMpilo.Wenqabile ukwenaba ngecala, wathi into ebahluphayo ukuthi icala selidonse isikhathi eside.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo uNksz Ncumisa Mafunda uthe: “Okushiwo yiphephandaba kuyaphikisana nemininingwane uMnyango onayo ophikweni lwawo lwezomthetho ngalolu daba. Nokho, ngeshwa uMnyango awuzukwazi ukuphawula ngoba lolu daba lusezithebeni zenkantolo,” kusho uNksz Mafunda.Uthe kuwumsebenzi wommeli kanoma wubani ovule icala ukuba alilandelele.
title: Ufuna uR2m wesinxephezelo oshumpulwe ibele yisibhedlela

text: INSIKA yomdlali waMaZulu FC uSiyabonga “Bhele” Nomvete ifunga iyagomela ukuthi Usuthu ngeke lugawulwe yizembe kwi-Absa Premiership.Usuthu luphoxe izinkumbi zabalandeli luthelwa othulini ngomafikizolo uThongathi FC emdlalweni we-quarterfinal yeKZN Premier’s Cup eMhlathuze Sports Complex, eRichards Bay ngoMgqibelo.UThongathi luguqise Usuthu ngo 2-1. Amagoli oThongathi avalelwe enethini nguSiyabonga Thwala kwathi elokubika loSuthu lashaywa nguThapelo Nyongo.Ngemuva kwalokho umqeqeshi woSuthu uJoey Antipas uvele wanyamalala. UNomvete (39) exoxa nabezindaba ngemuva komdlalo ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi ababuyeli kwiNational First Division.“Amajita akazange adlale kahle. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi naye umqeqeshi ubonile. Ngokubona kwami bebephansi kakhulu. Engifuna ukukubeka kucace wukuthi AmaZulu ngeke adliwe yizembe uma mina ngisadlala. Lokho-ke kumele kucace. AmaZulu ngeke abuyele esigabeni esiphansi. Abantu akumele basijaje ngemidlalo yokulungiselela isizini. Imidlalo yokulungiselela isizini mihle kodwa akumele unqobe yona bese uzitshela ukuthi awusabambeki. Emidlalweni yeligi yilapho sizokhombisa khona ukuthi akusahlekwa,” kusho uNomvete.Usuthu luthenge ilungelo leThanda Royal Zulu lokudlala esigabeni esikhulu. IThanda iyona ebe ngompetha beNational First Division ngesizini edlule lapho bebedlala khona naMaZulu.“Kuyajabulisa ukubuyela esigabeni esikhulu ngoba wonke umuntu uphokophelele ukudlala khona. Njengamanje umqondo wami ugxile ekutheni ngisize iqembu hhayi ukuthi ngijahe imiklomelo etholwa ngabadlali ngabodwana. Okunye kuyazenzakalela. Kuyahlupha ukuzibekela imigomo ngoba uma ingasafezeki uyaphoxeka. Isifiso sami wukubeka iqembu esimeni esihle,” kusho uNomvete.Ngempelasonto AmaZulu asebenzise abadlali abasha okubalwa kubona * -Ayabulela Konqobe, Jabulani Ncobeni, Mhlengi Cele, Thembela Sikhakhane noSadat Ouro-Akoriko.Ebuzwa uNomvete ukuthi uzimisele ngokudlala aze abe neminyaka emingaki uthe: “Ukudlala ibhola kuyisiphiwo sami. Yimilenze yami ezongitshela uma ingasavumi.”
title: 'Usuthu ngeke lugawulwe yizembe'

text: APHAZAMISE ukwakhiwa komgwaqo amalungu omphakathi aseMawoti, eNanda, adilizelwa izindlu kusukela ngo-2014, athenjiswa ukunxeshezelwa ngemali angakayitholi.Abantu, asebehlala ezindlini zomxhaso, bathe sebekhathele ukubanjiswa udonga ngesinxe-phezelo. Zibalelwa ku-34 izindlu okuthiwa zadilizwa kule ndawo ngesikhathi uNkk Zandile Gumede oseyiMeya yeTheku eseyikhansela. Umphakathi uthe wathembisa ukuthi uzonxeshezelwa kodwa azisafezeki izethembiso.UNkk Thomza Mthembu ongomunye wabathintekile uthe batshelwa ukuthi kuzokwakhiwa umgwaqo oxhumanisa iMawoti neTafula ngakho kumele basuswe.“Kwabizwa imihlangano sitshelwa ukuthi sizofakwa ezindlini zomxhaso kodwa sizonxeshezelwa nangemali. Ngenxa yokuthi sasingafuni kube sengathi sivimbela intuthuko savuma ukudilizelwa. Okusiphatha kabi wukuthi sibona sekuya emaphethelweni ukwakhiwa komgwaqo kodwa asikanxeshezelwa. Sizwa kuthiwa abanye sebakhokhelwa,” kusho yena.Uthe ngesonto eledlule bavimbe ogandaganda abalungisa umgwaqo bathenjiswa ukuthi bazobizelwa emhlanganweni nemeya, ogcine ungaphumelelanga.UMnuz Phillip Falithenjwa, othe ukhishwe emzini wakhe ngo-Ephreli nyakenye, uthe batshelwa ukuthi bazonxeshezelwa ngokushesha."Satshelwa ukuthi siyongena ezindlini zomxhaso sesinikiwe imali yesinxephezelo. Ngamangala ngishayelwa ucingo wumkami ngisedolobheni engitshela ukuthi sekufike abakwamasipala bazodiliza. Bathi uma ngibabambezela ngiyoyithola inconzuliwe imali yesinxephezelo ngoba imishini yokudiliza iyakhokhelwa,” kusho uFalithenjwa.UMnuz Bongani Qhansi oyikhansela uthe imeya iyalwazi udaba futhi izophuma imali yesinxephezelo.“Ngiwance-ngile amalungu omphakathi ukuthi angaphazamisi ukwakhiwa komgwaqo ngoba ngizohlangana nawo nezinhlaka ezithintekayo ukucacisa udaba. Kumele baqonde ukuthi kunemigomo elandelwayo ngaphambi kokukhishwa kwemali. Imeya iyona ebalwelayo ukuthi banxeshezelwe hhayi ngokunikwa izindlu zomxhaso kuphela. Ngesonto eledlule ibizimisele ukuhlangana nabo kwaba yibona abashintsha uhlelo,” kuchaza yena.Uthe okucasule umphakathi wukuthi kukhona asebenxeshezelwe. Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba uMasipala weTheku ungaphendulanga ngalolu daba yize bethunyelelwe i-email ngoMsombuluko.Udaba lokudilizelwa kwabantu izindlu eMawoti lwaba sematheni abaningi bekhala ngendluzula.Ngo-Okthoba 2015 Isolezwe labika ngokukhishwa ngesidlozana kukaNkk Manazile Tekana, ongomunye wabadilizelwa banganikwa indawo yokuhlala. Wakhala waze wabhuquza encenga amaphoyisa nabasebenzi bakamasipala bangawubhidlizi umuzi wakhe.
title: Basifuna la isinxephezelo abadilizelwa

text:
MLUNGISI GUMEDEK ULOKOZA inhlansi yethemba kubanikazi bemizi emithathu eMawoti, eNanda, edilizwe nguMasipala weTheku ngeledlule.Ukungenela kwehhovisi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Senzo Mchunu kulolu daba olwasusa umsindo kubuyise ithemba kule mindeni njengoba sebezanyelwa indawo yokuhlala.NgoLwesithathu umeluleki kaMchunu, uNksz Linda Zama, izikhulu zoMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal nezoMkhandlu weTheku zihlangane nale mindeni ngenhloso yokulungisa lolu daba.Okhulumela ihhovisi likaMchunu uMnuz Thami Ngwenya uthe undunankulu ujube uNksz Zama ukuba axhumane nazo zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo, ngenhloso yokuthola isisombululo.“Uzokhumbula ukuthi sakhipha isitatimende emva kokubhidlizwa kwezindlu eMawoti lapho uNdunankulu azwakalisa ukukhathazeka ngalesi sigameko. Yize khona lezi zindlu zibhidlizwe kukhona nomyalelo wenkantolo kodwa sikholwa wukuthi ikhona indlela lolu daba obelungasingathwa ngayo kodwa kungabi sengathi sidelela umyalelo wenkantolo,” usho kanje.UNgwenya uthe sekusungulwe ikomiti elizobhekana ngqo nalolu daba.Leli komiti lizokwenza uphenyo bese liyabika ukuthi litholeni. Okubalulekile kakhulu njengamanje wukuthi laba bantu ababhidlizelwe izindlu kube khona izindawo abafihla kuzo amakhanda ngoba siyazi ukuthi kukhona nezingane,” kusho uNgwenya.Uthe sebecele umkhandlu weTheku ukuba wenze izindlela zokuthi le mindeni ithole indawo yokuhlala yesikhashana.UNgwenya uthe bebe ngakafinyeleli esivumelwaneni sokuthi izindlu zizokwakhiwa kabusha.UNkk Maria Manazile Tekana owabhidlizelwa indlu ka-R250 000, uthe uhulumeni uthembisa ukuthi ungase ubakhele kabusha izindlu zabo.“Umhlangano wethu uhambe kahle kakhulu. Laba ebebemele izinhlaka zikahulumeni babukeka bengabantu abaqotho. Bathembise ukuthi zingase zakhiwe kabusha izindlu zethu, singene kuzona engakashayi uKhisimusi,” usho kanje.UNkk Tekana uthe benze isicelo sokuba uma kwenzeka izindlu zabo zakhiwa kabusha zivuswe emanxiweni ebezivele zikuwo.“Impilo yami iphelele eMawoti. Abantwana bami asebashona nomyeni wami baphumela khona kule ndlu ebhidliziwe nami ngiyafisa ukuthi ngiphumele khona uma sengishonile,” usho kanje.Izisebenzi zomkhandlu weTheku zigasele kule ndawo ngeledlule zafike zibhidliza izindlu ezintathu zithi zilandela umyalelo wenkantolo.Lesi senzo sigxekwe kakhulu kusolwa nokusetshenziswa kosopolitiki njengoba kunombango wesikhundla sikasihlalo we-ANC eThekwini.Lezi zisebenzi bezisolwa ngokusetshenziswa yikhansela lendawo uNkk Zandile Gumede ukufeza izinhloso zezombusazwe.Esithangamini nabezindaba, uNkk Gumede wathi bazoqhubeka nokuzibhidliza izindlu ezakhiwe endaweni engafanele.Wenza isibonelo ngaye wathi umuzi wakhe onamakamelo amane washaywa phansi ngenxa yokuthi wawakhiwe endaweni engafanele.Ihhovisi lezokuxhumana emkhandlwini weTheku izolo likuqinisekisile ukuthi liyitholile imibuzo ebeliyithunyelelwe yi
Solezwe kodwa kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela lingaphendulile.
title: Ithemba kwababhidlizelwa yiTheku

text: SIFIKILE isivuvu sesibiili seCovid-19, obekunovalo lokuthi siyeza kuleli njengoba emahoreni awu-24 kutholakale ukuthi bangaphezu kuka-6 000 abantu abatheleleke ngegciwane iCorona.Izolo ebusuku uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, uDkt Zwelini Mkhize, umemezele ukuthi isimo sibi futhi izwe selibhekene ngqo nesivuvu sesibili.“Singena kwisivuvu sesibili. Kumqoka ukuba sigcizelele ukuthi izifundazwe ezine okuyiWestern Cape, Eastern Cape, KwaZulu-Natal neGauteng yizona ezihamba phambili ekubhebhethekeni kwegciwane. Sibheke izibalo zabantu abahloliwe, abatholwe benegciwane, abantu abalalisiwe ezibhedlela nabantu abashonile. Konke lokhu bekukhombisa ukunyuka masonto onke. Sibe sesifinyelela ekutheni bayanda abantu abaneCorona. Kusukela ngoSepthemba izibalo bezehla zaze zafika ko-1 000. Manje seziyakhuphuka futhi. Namhlanje (izolo) nje sidlulile kubantu abangu-6 000 abasha okutholwe ukuthi baneCorona. Kutholakale ukuthi bangu-6 079,” kusho uMkhize.UMkhize echaza uthe emasontweni adlule nje e-Eastern Cape naseWestern Cape bezilokhu zinyuka izibalo.“Namhlanje ngokwemibiko esiyitholile izibalo ziyanda ezifundazweni eziyisithupha, yingakho kumqoka ukuthi sikunake lokhu kwesivuvu sesibili,” kusho uMkhize.“Izibalo zabantu abasha okutholwe ukuthi banegciwane zivele eWestern Cape, u-30% wabahloliwe izolo kutholwe ukuthi unalo, kwalandela i-Eastern Cape ngo-24% neKZN ngo-23% neGauteng ngo-17%. Leli gciwane uthe selimandla kakhulu nasentsheni. Ezinsukwini ezidlule, iminyaka yabahaqekile ikhombisa ukuhluka kokujwayelekile. Abaningi abahaqekile abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 no-19. Lokhu kuyakhathaza. Kusolakala ukuthi lokhu kungenxa yemicimbi ehanjwa ngabantu abasha,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa uzokhuluma nabantu bakuleli ukusho ukuthi yiziphi izinyathelo ezizothathwa maduzane.Izibalo zabashonile izolo ziveza ukuthi bangu-135 kuleli, e-Eastern Cape wu-56, Free State wu-15, Gauteng wu-15, KZN bayisikhombisa, kuthi eWestern Cape bangu-48. Asebeshonile kuleli ngenxa yeCorona bangu-22 574.
title: ‘Isimo sibi, isivuvu sesibili sesifikile’

text:
UMHOLI we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema usegcine eyiphebezile imizamo kalowo owayengumholi weDA, uNkk Helen Zille yokuba nengxoxo eqoshiwe naye.UZille kuleli sonto umeme uMalema kwipodcast yakhe ebizwa ngeTea With Helen lapho asingatha khona izingxoxo nabaholi abaqavile emphakathini kudingidwa ezombusazwe nekusasa leNingizimu Afrika.  Ngesikhathi emema uMalema uZille enkundleni yokuxhumana uTwitter, wabhala wathi uMalema angakhetha usuku nesikhathi abangabonana ngaso ngoba yena unesikhathi sonke.“Ngizokwenzela itiye. Sengilindele impendulo yakho,” kuloba yena. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/Julius_S_Malema?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@Julius_S_Malema. I would like to invite you as a guest on my podcast 
#TeaWithHelen for a no-holds-barred discussion on SA's future prospects. My diary is quite flexible, so you name the date, time and place. I'll serve the tea. Looking forward to your response.— Helen Zille (@helenzille)UMalema uqale wawuziba lo mbhalo kodwa ngoLwesibili ugcine ephendulile wabuza uHelen ukuthi udukile yini.%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/SASSA?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#SASSAoffices?— Julius Sello Malema (@Julius_S_Malema)Are you seriously ducking out of the debate with a lame "joke"?  Let's discuss the future of our country on a platform where we can go beyond 280c and get beneath the surface slogans.%%%twitter https://twitter.com/ALETTAHA?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@ALETTAHAcome this side your Gogo is lost😂😂😂😂😂 
pic.twitter.com/ngBsm2u73r— Maano (@divhambelemaano)Mara EFF can be disappointing.🤦🏽‍♂️ Yaz sometimes you think people will grow but it appears they're stagnant. I've never been a fan of Helen but all this is extremely unnecessary. Why call her names etc. Ugh man nx.
title: UMalema ugabhe uHelen Zille emshela ngetiye

text: USALE enkundleni owesilisa odutshulwe amaphoyisa obanjwe oqotsheni ebamba owesifazane inkunzi ngasemshinini wemali (ATM) enkabeni yedolobha iTheku ngeSonto. Amaphoyisa asebenza enkabeni yedolobha iTheku abehlola ubugebengu maphakathi nedolobha ngenhloso yokunciphisa ukubanjwa kwabantu inkunzi, ukudunwa kwezimoto kanye nokwebiwa kwezimpahla.  NgeSonto amaphoyisa abone amadoda amane abebamba umuntu wesifazane inkunzi ngasemshinini wemali. Lamadoda angene emotweni abehamba ngayo njengoba kade esebalekela amaphoyisa.  Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa amabili ajahe lamadoda, kwalandela ngokudubulana. “Ngesikhathi sokudubulana, amaphoyisa anqande abasolwa ababili. Umsolwa wesithathu ulimale kabuhlungu emuva kokudutshulwa. Amaphoyisa athole ummese, isibhamu esingekho emthethweni, izinhlamvu zezibhamu, amakhadi asebhange, imali kanye nomakhalekhukhwini emva kokubamba lawa madoda,” kuchaza uZwane. Abasolwa abaneminyaka engu-32 no-36 ngokuhlukana, babekwe amacala okuzama ukubulala, ukubamba inkunzi kanye nokuphatha izibhamu nezinhlamvu ezingekho emthethweni. Laba bavele enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini ngoLwesibili. UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt General Khombinkosi Jula ubongele amaphoyisa ngokunqanda ubugebengu. “Yize zigolozile izigebengu, amaphoyisa akwazile ukumelana nobunzima ayibamba ishisa. Ngiyabonga ukuthi amaphoyisa akwazile ukuphuma engalimele ngenkathi kuba nokudubulana,” kusho uJula.
title: Kusale oyedwa enkundleni bedubulana namaphoyisa

text: UMNDENI womculi wowokholo okuthiwa ubangwa nezibi esibhedlela usuthathe isinqumo sokuthi angabe esavakashelwa.Umndeni kaLundi Tyamara usukhiphe isinqumo sokuthi abonwe wumndeni nezihlobo kuphela kuze kube ululama ngokugcwele.Lokhu kulandela ukusatshalaliswa kwesithombe sakhe elele esesibhedlela, namahlebenzi okuthi ushonile asabalale ngeledlule.Okhulumela umndeni ophinde abe yimenenja kaLundi * -Anele Hlazo we-M&E Media, uthe angakusho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi isimo abekuso sesishintshe kakhulu futhi banethemba lokuthi uzolulama ngokugcwele maduze.Unqabile ukudalula isibhedlela alaliswe kusona wathi bafuna abantu bangayi ukuyombona.“Sicele ukuthi abantu bame kancane ukuzombona esibhedlela kuze kube ululama ngokugcwele futhi uyakwazi nokuxoxa kahle nabantu abamvakashelayo.“Uyalulama futhi kuyethembisa ukuthi uzobuyela esimeni esijwayelekile maduze. Siyababonga nabaculi ngokukhombisa uthando kuLundi,” kusho uHlazo. Uqhube wathi umndeni kaLundi uhlukumezeke kakhulu ngokwenziwe ngabantu basabalalise izithombe nemininingwane ekungesiyo ngokugula kwakhe.Umculi uFikile Mlomo uveze ukuthi ubengakayi ukuyombheka esibhedlela ngoba uyamazi akathandi ukubonwa.“Uyazwela kakhulu, njalo uma egula akathandi ukulokhu ezobonwa kodwa ngizokwenza isikhathi ngihlele noHlazo ngiyombona. Kungiphethe kabi ukugula kwakhe kodwa ngiyazi uNkulunkulu akamlahli umuntu waKhe,” kusho uFikile.Odadewabo baLundi uBoniswa noBabalwa Tyamara kuthiwa baseGoli ukuyokweseka umfowabo.ULundi kuthiwa uhlaselwe wukugula ngemuva kokuya eChina ngoNovemba, wangakusukumela ngoba ezitshela ukuthi waliwe wukushintsha kwesimo sezulu. Ngasekuqaleni kukaDisemba kuthiwa siye ngokuba nzima isimo sakhe, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Esitatimendenei esikhishwe nguHlazo ngoMgqibelo odlule, uveze ukuthi uLundi waba nenkinga yokuphefumula kwaze kwadingeka ukuthi aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.UHlazo uphethe ngokuthi kubantu abafisa ukwazi ngoLundi bangamthinta ukuthola iqiniso bangalaleli amahlebezi.
title: Kuvalwe izivakashi esibhedlela sikaLundi
