text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUZWAKALA ebika izaba umqeqeshi weChappa United, uDan "Dance" Malesela ngaphambi kokubhekana ne-Orlando Pirates enethuba lokusondela kwiMamelodi Sundowns esicongweni seDStv Premiership.AmaChilli Boys osekuphele imidlalo emine agcina ukuqoqa amaphuzu aphelele, azokwamukela eZimyama kusasa, eNelson Mandela Bay Statium emdlalweni ongo-5 ntambama.Leli qembu likaSiviwe " Chippa" Mpengesi kalikasindi emlonyeni wezembe.Lisendaweni  ka-12 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-16.Livule igebe lamaphuzu amane kuphela kwiBlack Leopards nakwiMaritzburg United ababambene ngawu-12 emsileni.Ngengoba sekuqale umzuliswano wesibili  weDStv Premiership kuyaliphoqa ukuthi lithole amaphuzu ngokushesha.Kubuzwa uMalesela ngamalungiselelo omdlalo wabo nePirates, uphefumelele phezulu wakhala ngokubhinjelwa izinto ngaphambi kwalo mdlalo."Kuzoba nzima ukudlala nePirates, inesikwati esiningi ngendlela exakile, ishintsha noma yinini. Esikudingayo ukuthi sibe nalo mfutho ebesinawo ngesikhathi siya emdlalweni weCape Town City. Kuyasiphoqa ukuthi sakhele kuwo. Angicabangi nokuthi sizowujimela lo mdlalo, sisisebenzise sonke isikwati sethu. Kumele sivele siziyele emakhaya, siphumule. Kusasa (ngoLwesihlanu) sizoya ehhotela sibone ukuthi siyihlanganisela maphi amaqhinga iPirates. Angingabazi, sizowuhlelela kahle lo mdlalo," kusho uMalesela.NgoLwesithathu iChippa ibambane ngo 0-0 neCape Town City koweligi obuseSisa Dukashe Stadium. Bekuwumdlalo wesithathu kulandelana idlala ngokulingana. Yagcina ukuthola amaphuzu amathathu ihlula iBlack Leopards ngo 3-0 ngoJanuwari.UMalesela uncome ezakhe ngokudlala kahle koweCity."Ngijabule ngendlela abafana bami abadlale ngayo. Babambe iCity eshaya amagoli mihla namalanga. Esiwombeni sokuqala ibingalishaya noma inini igoli kwasho ukuthi inhlanhla ibingakuthina. Ngilijabulele iphuzu esilitholile, kalisilimazi kangako."Okubi nje okwenzekile kulo mdlalo ukulimala kukaMbenyane (Andile). Lokhu kuzosilimaza kakhulu emidlalweni elandelayo.”IPirates elele isithathu, ngamaphuzu awu-32, iya kulo mdlalo ihambela phezulu kulandela ukushaya iBloemfontein Celtic  ngo 1-0 maphakathi nesonto. Ukunqoba kwayo kwiChippa kungayenza isale ngephuzu kwiSundowns eqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-36.Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership yangempelasonto:Namuhla - Ngo-5pm: SuperSport United v TS Galaxy (Lucas Moripe Stadium).Kusasa - Ngo-3pm: Cape Town City v Stellenbosch (Cape Town Stadium).Ngo-5pm: Bloemfontein Celtic v Maritzburg United (Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium); Chippa United v Orlando Pirates (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-3.30pm: Black Leopards v Lamontville Golden Arrows (Thohoyandou Stadium); Swallows v Tshakhuma (Dobsonville Stadium).
title: UMalesela ubika izaba ngaphambi kowePirates

text: OWANGUMENGAMELI waseBotswana, uMnuz Festus Mogae, uthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abangakhathazeki ngomnotho wezwe ontengayo ngoba usazoguquka uma sekuphume ubuholi obukhona.UMogae ubekhuluma ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo ngesifundo ngowayengumengameli we-ANC, Inkosi Albert Luthuli, e-UZKN ngoMgqibelo.Ukuphawula kukaMogae kwenzeke ngemuva kokuthi ngoLwesihlanu, inkampani iS & P Global iklelise izwe njengelingathembekile kubatshalimali.Ubephendula umbuzo obuthi kungani izwe lakhe linomnotho ozinzile.“Awukho umlingo esenza ngawo, ngingathi nje wukuthi sisenenhlanhla kodwa ningakhathazeki ngoba umnotho wenu usazoshintsha uma sekuphume ubuholi obukhona,” kusho uMogae.Uphinde waphawula ngodaba lokuketulwa kobengumengameli waseZimbambwe, uMnuz Robert Mugabe, wathi kumele azisole yena ngokuwa kombuso wakhe.Ugxeke abaholi beZanu PF wathi nabo banesandla ngokuyekela uMugabe ahlale isikhathi eside ezintanjeni.Uthe abaholi kumele bazi ukuthi ngeke behlale benza kahle.“Abaholi abaningi baliqala kahle ihlandla labo lokuqala, kuye ngokubheda uma beqhubeka bethatha amanye amahlandla.”Uthe abaholi bamanje kumele bafunde kubaholi abafana noLuthuli.“Ukuhola koLuthuli kwakungumnikelo hhayi ngoba befuna amandla futhi bona behola ngoba befuna ukusebenzela isizwe.”Abaphethe isikhungo esigcina umlando kaLuthuli bathe bafuna kuphenywe kabusha ngokufa kwakhe ukuze kuvele iqiniso ngokuthi wabulawa ngubani.Usihlalo wesikhungo, uMnuz Jabulani Sithole, uthe bayayilandela indaba yokufa kukaLuthuli.“Into eyenza singakhulumi ngalolu daba noma yikanjani emphakathini wukuthi sisaxoxa nazo zonke izinhlaka. Uhlelo luqale ngaphambi kokuthi kube neKhomishini yamaQiniso nokuBuyisana kudala kodwa aluphumelelanga. Namanje zikhona izinhlelo ezifaka nomndeni esizenzayo,” kusho uSithole.Uthe okunye okubagqugquzela kakhulu ekutheni bathole iqiniso wumphumela wophenyo ngokufa kukaMnuz Ahmed Timol owayeyisishoshovu esasilwa nengcindezelo.USithole uthe benza konke okusemandleni abo ukuthola iqiniso ngokufa kukaLuthuliULuthuli washona ngoJulayi 21, 1967, ngemuva kokushayiswa yisitimela eduze komuzi wakhe KwaDukuza.Kusolwa uhulumeni wobandlululo ngokufa kwakhe.
title: ‘Umnotho wezwe ontengayo usazoshintsha’

text: BAPHENDULE amatafula eFrance ogogo baseNingizimu Afrika abadlalela iVakhegula Vakhegula FC, bebuya nendebe iGrannies Cup ngemuva kokubuka iqembu lesizwe lakuleli labesifazane iBanyana Banyana liphenduka ukudla kwenduku kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eqhubeka kuleliya lizwe.IBanyana iphume ekuseni kweyoMhlaba ishaywa iSpain, China neGermany esigabeni samaqoqo. Ogogo abebehambele lo mqhudelwano njengezimenywa babuke imidlalo emibili iBanyana ihlulwa iChina neGermany.Kuthe sekuyithuba labo lokungena enkundleni, bazifundisa ibhola izalukazi zaseFrance bezibhudluza ngo 10-0 emdlalweni obungesonto eledlule eSaint Etienne.Umgqugquzeli weSouth African Elderly Football Association (SAEFA), uKatekani Mkhavele uthe izaguga lezi zilujabulele uhambo lwazo lwaphesheya.“Bekuwuhambo oluhle kakhulu kwazise abanye babo bebeqala ukuyodlala ezingeni lomhlaba futhi abanye beqala nokugibela ibhanoyi. Kuyimanje abakholwa ukuthi yibona laba abakuleli zinga. Bakhuthazekile ngokuthi baqhubeke nokudlala ibhola futhi bebemenyelwe ukuthi bayokhuthaza amantombazane amancane ukuthi nawo adlale,” kuchaza uMkhavele.Iqembu ebelihambile lakhiwe ogogo abaqhamuka ezifundazweni ezine zakuleli iLimpopo, Gauteng, Mpumalanga naseWestern Cape.Ngaphambi komdlalo abadlali beVakhegula bacashunwe kwiSABC bethembisa ukwesula izinyembezi abathandi bebhola lakuleli.UMkhaveli uthe yize isimemo sasifikele iVakhegula ezinze eLimpopo, bazamile ukuthola abadlali abaqhamuka kuzona zonke izifundazwe zakuleli kodwa kwangenzeka ngenxa yesikhathi.“Siyafisa ukuthi ibhola labadala likhule kuzona zonke izifundazwe. Kodwa uma kungenzeki lokho sizolokhu sizama kancane kancane kuze kulunge. Siyakufisa nokuthola abaxhasi ukukhulisa umdlalo,” kusho yena.Mhlawumbe sekudingeka amakhehla azonikela e-Egypt lapho kubanjelwe khona i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayokhombisa iBafana Bafana ukuthi ibhola litapetwa kanjani nokushayela ipali.IBafana iphinde yaphoxa iyivula ngenduku i-Afcon ihlulwa i-Ivory Coast ngo 1-0 ngoMsombuluko. Isizolwela ukubuyisa ugazi uma isidlala neNamibia (ngoLwesihlanu) neMorocco (ngoMsombuluko) kweminye imidlalo yamaqoqo.
title: Ogogo benze okuhlule iBanyana eFrance

text: Kaizer Chiefs (1) 3Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (0) 0IKAIZER Chiefs ikhiphe ishobolo ebeliyikhathaza ithela isibhaxu iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eFNB Stadium izolo ntambama.Amagoli eChiefs ashaywe nguNkosingiphile “Mshini” Ngcobo, Lebogang Manyama noHappy Mashiane  ngokwehlukana kweziwombe. Amakhosi angene enkundleni ebheke ukuqhubeka nomgqigqo wawo wakamuva kwazise abekade esewine imidlalo emibili ilandelana. Ngaphezu kwalokho, iChiefs ibingakaze iwine nowodwa umdlalo wasekhaya kwiligi kule sizini. Imidlalo emithathu ebikade isiyiwinile ngaphambi kowayizolo ibikade iyiwine ekuhambeni.Amaphuzu amathathu atholwe yiChiefs izolo ayenze kahlala yazinza kwi-Top 8 okokuqala kule sizini.IChiefs icacise zibekwa izolo ukuthi izowalwela amaphuzu ngokufaka ingcindezi, iphaselana ibhola ivula izikhala esiswini seTshakhuma. Nokho yehlelwe yishwa ngomzuzu ka-10 ngesikhathi ilinyalelwa ngumdlali wasemuva uRamahlwe Mphahlele odonseke umsipha. Indawo yakhe ithathwe nguNjabulo Blom. Lokhu akuyithenanga amandla iChiefs eqhubekile nokufuna igoli. Kugcine kuyilungele ngomzuzu ka-19 ngesikhathi uNgcobo esebenzisa ubunyoninco, eqisa phezu komdlali wasemuva weTTM ibhola alinikwe nguSamir Nurkovic, walibasela phakathi. Emuva kwaleli goli, iTTM izamile ukubuya kodwa yahlulwa wudonga lwasemuva lweChiefs.Esiwombeni sesibili, iChiefs ibuye ngomfutho ofanayo neqale ngawo umdlalo. Ingqongqoze kwagcina kuvuliwe ngomzuzu ka-66 ngesikhathi uManyama evalela phakathi ibhola eligotshwe nguMashiane kwesokunxele. UManyama ubelithinta okokuqala ibhola emuva kwemizuzwana engene endaweni kaLebohang Lesako olimele. Izinkinga zeTshakhuma ziqongile ngesikhathi u-Alfred Ndengane ethola ikhadi elibomvu ngenxa yokudlalisa kabi uNurkovic ngomzuzu ka-83. Ngomzuzu ka-90, uMashiane uqobele phakathi ibhola aligotshelwe uManyama. Ngesikhathi esengezwe ngunompempe uBernard Parker uthole ikhadi elibomvu ngenxa yokudlalisa kabi uBrandon Theron.Komunye umdlalo weligi wayizolo, iMamelodi Sundowns ibambane ngo-0-0 neBloemfontein Celtic eLucas Moripe Stadium. Lo mphumela unikeza iSwallows esendaweni yesibili ukuthi iqhwakele uma kuwukuthi iyanqoba namuhla uma isidlala neChippa United.
title: IChiefs ikhiphe ibhadi inqoba ekhaya koweligi

text: ABALANDELI bobeyiMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede basola ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ngokuphuma naye iqhubu buze bomxoshe ngoba bumzonda.Ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal buthathe isinqumo sokuxosha uNkk Gumede naso sonke isigungu abehola naso umasipala ngoba bebasola ngokuhluleka ukwenza umsebenzi wabo obekugcina sekuphazamisa nokuhanjiswa kwezidingo kubantu.UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, ngesikhathi ememezela isinqumo sokuxoshwa kukaNkk Gumede noMnuz Themba Njilo obeyiMeya yaseMsunduzi uthe laba baholi bafike kulabo masipala behlelwa izinga.Okhulumela abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede, uMnuz Mzo Dube, uthe bona basamile ekutheni ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal bukhombise ukuchema odabeni lukaNkk Gumede.“Ubuholi bukhombisile ukuthi buphume iqhubu noNkk Gumede ngoba buqale bathi akahlale ekhaya ngoba usanda kuboshwa mayelana namacala enkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa ekugcineni sebuthi buyamxosha ngoba uyahluleka ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe kwamasipala,” kusho uDube othe lo mbiko osetshenzisiwe ukuze kuxoshwe uNkk Gumede basawucubungula, uma sebeqedile bazobe sebewudlulisela kubantu abahlakaniphile abazi umthetho babone ukuthi kuyiwa kanjani phambili.Omunye umlandeli kaNkk Gumede okhulume neSolezwe kodwa wacela ukuthi angadalulwa uthe ubuholi baKwaZulu-Natal abuzange bulusingathe kahle lolu daba.“Kunomasipala abaningi abangenzi kahle kubalwa owaseRichmond nowaseMpofana nabanye abaningi obekuhlale kubikwa ngezinkinga zabo kodwa ubuholi besifundazwe abuzange buthathe zinyathelo khona ITheku lingcono kabi kukhona nozinzo khona kanti nokuhanjiswa kwezidingo kuyaqhubeka kodwa kuzoxoshwa amakhansela khona kuthiwa awasebenzi,” kusho lo mlandeli.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu, uthe abajabule ngokulokhu bephendulana nabantu abazibiza ngabaseki bakaNkk Gumede. “Akukho ukuphuma neqhubu noNkk Gumede ngoba uma ubheka kukhishwe sonke isigungu, i-ANC ngeke ivume ukuthi ibanjwe ngobhongwane, uma bekhuluma ngokuthi kunomasipala abaningi abangenzi kahle, sifuna ukwazi ukuthi balenzile yini ucwaningo labo abakhalayo, okunye engifuna ukukusho ukuthi asimile ekungeneleleni komasipala abangenzi kahle,” kusho uMthembu.Kusenjalo, sekuqaliwe ukuqagela ukuthi ngubani ongase avale isikhala sikaNkk Gumede njengoba kuvela amagama amaningi kubalwa elikaMnuz Cyril Xaba, Nkk Mina Lesoma noMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi. Kodwa uNgidi abanye bamchitha ngoba bathi uyathinteka ekuhlanganisweni kombiko osetshenzisiwe ukuze kugcine kuxoshwe uNkk Gumede.
title: Abalandeli bemeya exoshiwe basola ubuholi be-ANC

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEOMUNYE wabaqeqeshi beMamelodi Sundowns, uManqoba "TV" Mngqithi, uthi abadlali bakhe kumele bathole isifundo esenzweni sesitobha seCR Belouizdad esibe nesandla ekuhlulweni kwaleli qembu ngembudlu yamagoli.Ngempelasonto iSundowns inqobe umdlalo wesibili weCaf Champions League, ibhaxabula ngo-5-1,  iBelouizdad yase-Algeria, emdlalweni obuseBenjamin Mkapa National Stadium, eTanzania.EzaseChloorkop zinqobe ngamagoli amabili kaThemba "Mshishi" Zwane, Peter Shalulile, Lebohang Maboe noKermit Erasmus.Kowokuqala zashaya i-Al Hilal ngo-2-0.KowangeSonto, igoli lokuqala kube iphenathi eshaywe uZwane.Idaleke ngokuthi isitobha seBelouizdad, uChouhaib Keddad, sibambe ibhola ngesandla, engasabonwa ezintini unozinti uGaya Merbali.Unompempe, uBoubou Traore, akacucuzanga, uyibeke emlotheni wabe esekhipha uKeddad ngekhadi elibomvu.UMgqithi obambisene noRhulani Mokwena noSteve Komphela ekucijeni iSundowns, uthe ukholelwa ukuthi ukube uKeddad ulivumelile igoli, wangalivimba ngesandla, ngabe ezakhe zibuyile emdlalweni. Uthe bebeze emdlalweni inhloso wukuhlasela ngamandla, bacindezele izitha okuyokhona abakwenzile."Kumele ngikusho nokuthi sisizwe nawukuthi bathole ikhadi elibomvu umdlalo usaphansi. Engifisa ukuthi abadlali bami bafunde kukho ngoba ngikholwa wukuthi ukube lo mdlali wabo wasemuva ulivumelile igoli bebezoqhubeka nesibalo esifanele (sabadlali), babe nethuba lokulwa, babuye emdlalweni,” kusho uMngqithi.Ngokwamazwi alo mqeqeshi kubukeka konke kubavunile eTanzania.Lo mdlalo kwakumele ube emasontweni amabili edlule e-Algeria, izikhulu zakuleliya lizwe zavimba iSundowns ukuya khona, kubekwa isizathu “sezempilo”."Siye kulo mdlalo sazi ukuthi sizobhekana neqembu elinzima. Okusijabulisile ukuthi kwenzeke konke ebesikuhlelile, sibafake ingcindezi zisuka bagcina sebenza amaphutha."Siphinde salekelelwa iphutha lokuphuma zisuka kwesitobha ngekhadi elibomvu. Kodwa esiwombeni sokuqala kusingene ekhanda lokho sangalwela ukubagqobhoza kodwa silibele wukugcina ibhola. Sikulungisile lokho nethimba lami labaqeqeshi esikhathini sekhefu. Ngibonga kakhulu kubona nakubacwaningi bethu abasisize kakhulu siya esiwombeni sesibili. Kusithokozisile ukunqoba ngalesi sibalo samagoli.”ISundowns ibambe indawo yokuqala kuGroup B weChampions League ngamaphuzu ayisithupha. Umdlalo olandelayo ungoMgqibelo lapho izobe ibhekene neTP Mazembe yaseCongo ngo-3 ntambama ekuhambeni.
title: UMngqithi ufuna abadlali bakhe bafunde ngephutha lezitha

text: BAMISIWE emsebenzini onesi ababili abasolwa ngokuziba owesifazane obezoteta esibhedlal iSt Mary's, eRoma, okuphethe ngokuthi kushone usana lwakhe kusaphele amahora ambalwa luzelwe. UNksz Thulisile Khanyile (29) waseClermont ubelethiswe ezinye iziguli abahlengikazi ebebesebenza ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku kulesi sibhedlela bemtshela ukuthi akathule angalokhu ememeza, abazise uma sekukhala ingane kuphela.Uthi wafika esibhedlela ngoLwesine enezinhlungu, udokotela wathi yize enamasonto angu-26 ezithwele isibeletho sakhe sesivulekile kuzomele alale ngoba usezobeletha.NgoLwesihlanu ebusuku izinhlungu zamqinisa waya kubahlengikazi eyobika ukuthi izinhlungu sezingaphezulu kwalezi abezizwa ngesikhathi efika ngayizolo. Uthi bathe akabuyele embhedeni alale.“Ngenza njengoba beshilo kodwa ngehluleka ukuthula ngakhala kwaze kwangena udokotela obedlula wezwa ngikhala. Wangihlola wase etshela abahlengikazi ukuthi ingane isiseduze. Ngizitshela ukuthi bazosondela bazongisiza kodwa lutho. Kwaze kwavuka iziguli ebengilele nazo zishintshana abanye bengihlikihla umzimba, abanye bengiphuzisa amanzi. Omunye uye kubo ubahlengikazi eyobika ukuthi isimo sibi naye bamphendula ngokuthi baze babizwe uma sekukhala ingane," kuchaza lo wesifazane. Ngemuva kokulekelwa ezinye iziguli uNksz Khanyile wagcina etetile esezinhlungwini kodwa ingane  yashona ngemuva kwamahora izelwe. UNgoqngoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu usishayele ihlombe isinqumo sokumiswa kwalaba bahlengikazi. "Bamisiwe ngeSonto, ngoMsombuluko bathole izincwadi ngokumiswa kwabo njengoba kusaphothulwa uphenyo ngalesi sigameko," usho kanje esitatimendeni. UNkk Simelane-Zulu uthe bewumnyango ngeke bakumele ukuhlukunyezwa kweziguli waxwayisa abasebenza ezibhedlela ukuthi balandele abafunga ukukwenza. "Ngizophinde ngikusho futhi lokhu; ayikho indawo yabantu abangafuni ukuziphatha ngendlela, ikakhulukazi abangahloniphi abantu abeza ezibhedlela bedinga usizo. Umsebenzi wethu ukunakekela abantu abeza ezibhedlela ngoba ayikho enye indawo abangaya kuyo," kusho yena. Ukumiswa kwalaba bahlengikazi kulandela ukumiswa kwabanye abanqaba ukusiza owesifazane owayedinga ukuteta owaze wasizwa umshayeli wetekisi ngenyanga edlule.
title: Bamisiwe onesi 'abazibe' obezoteta

text: IZINHLANGANO zabangcwabi zithi awukho umthetho onqabela imindeni eshonelwe ukuthi ibone izidumbu ezigcinwe emakhazeni ngaphambi kokuthi iyozingcwaba.UNobhala jikelele weNational Funeral Practitioners Association (Nafupa), uNkk Julie Mbuthuma, uthe awukho umthetho ovalela imindeni ukuthi ibheke izidumbu zamalungu ayo emakhazeni.“Abantu bavumelekile ukuthi babheke izidumbu ngaphambi kokuthi bahambe nazo emakhazeni. Lokhu kwenziwelwa ukuthi kunqandeke izinkinga zokuphambana kwezidumbu,” kusho uNkk Mbuthuma.Uthe abangcwabi abakwazi ukwenza isiqineseko ngezidumbu ezilandwayo ngaphandle kokuthi babandakanye amalungu emndeni ekutheni kube yiwo eqinisekisayo ukuthi isidumbu ngesawo ngaphambi kokuya naso emathuneni.UNksz Nomfundo Mcoyi ongusihlalo weKZN South African Funeral Practitioner Association (KZNSafpa), uthe imindeni ivumelekile ukungena emakhazeni ngenhloso yokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ithatha izidumbu okuyizo  ngaphambi kokuthi ihambe nazo.“Umzimba kumele ubhekwe ngesikhathi ulandwa ngamalungu awo ukuze kugwemeke inkinga yokuphambana kwezidumbu. Ilungu lomndeni elenza lo msebenzi kumele linikwe izimpahla zokuzivikela egciwaneni ngabangcwabi okugcinwe kuwo isidumbu sawo, bese lenza isiqiniseko sokuzigqoka ngaphambi kokukuthi lisibheke,” kuchaza uNksz Mcoyi.Uphethe ngokuthi akumele umndeni uhambe emakhazeni ungazange usibone isidumbu ozosingcwaba.
title: Imindeni ivumelekile ukubona izidumbu

text: MHLELI: ENingizimu Afrika angeke ukhulume ngepolitiki ungayibali iNFP noMengameli wayo uNkk Zanele Magwaza-Msibi uyathanda awuthandi.Ukusungulwa kwaleli qembu kwavula ikhasi elisha kwipolitiki yaseNingizimu Afrika okwaba yiqembu lokuqala elathi lifika leza nokuhlukile okusha ebalazweni lepolitiki yaseNingizimu Afrika.I-NFP iyiqembu lokuqala ukuphakamisa ukuthi abafundi abaphume ku-matric sebenezincwadi zokushayela mahhala, iNFP ingamavulandlela ngohlelo lwezolimo nokuxhasa imiphakathi ngogandaganda njengoba bonke omasipala sebekwenza, ukunakekela abangenabani. Kumele siwazise umphakathi waseNingizimu Afrika lelo qiniso.Siyiqembu lokuqala ukuveza singafihli ukuhlonipha ubuholi bomdabu amakhosi nezinduna nokuhlonipha iqhaza labo emiphakathini yasemakhaya.Ukuqoqa okungenhla siyiqembu elikhuluma ngezinto ezithinta abantu ngqo, asikhulumi ngemilingo eshiwo ngabanye uma bekhankasa.Phezu kwazo zonke izinselelo esesibe nazo njengeqembu kusuka ngo-2014 kuhlabeka umengameli wethu ngokugula, 2016 sangangena okhethweni lwemikhandlu, kube wu-2017 abanye abazibiza ngabaholi befaka iqembu enkantolo kwaze kwazaleka ubambimbiswano ngomyalelo wenkantolo olwalubizwa nge-INEC noma Interim National Executive Committe eyasiyisa engqungqutheleni ngoDisemba 2019. Siyababonga nabaholi ababeyibambe lapho kuze kube manje.Nakulo nyaka uphindile futhi uMlotshwa nahambisaba nabo basifaka enkantolo bethi ababazi ubuholi beqembu. Uma besho nakulokhu amalungu eNFP asathembekile siyabonga kakhulu sengingasho ngithi sekuyantwela ezansi maduze nje leya NFP yango-2011 izobuya uma sekuhambe ababulali bayo.Zithembe NgobeseEnquthu
title: I-NFP isalidinga ithuba lokukhombisa ubuqotho

text: LIKHONJWE indlela ikhansela lomphakathi kuMasipala waseBuhlebezwe ngenxa yokuthi libonakale kwiFacebook ligqoke isikibha sePhini likaMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.UMnuz Mphikiseni Mdunge oyikhansela lomphakathi ophethe e-ward 9, utshele Isolezwe izolo ukuthi uthuke kwaphela nasozwaneni ethola incwadi ngoLwesine oludlule, evela kwimenenja yomkhandlu uMnuz Gamakhulu Sineke ebimazisa ngokuxoshwa kwakhe kumasipala.UMdunge uthe incwadi ithi uxoshiwe ngenxa yokuthi uphule umgomo kamasipala ngokugqoka umfaniswano weqembu lezepolitiki.“Incwadi ayicacisi ukuthi yiliphi leli qembu lezombusazwe okukhulunywa ngalo kodwa mina ngazi isithombe esisodwa lapho kade ngigqoke khona isikibha esinobuso bukaRamaphosa ngizimele namanye amaqabane, kubalwa noMnuz Senzo Mchunu,” kusho uMdunge.Uthe lesi sithombe sashuthwa esemkhankasweni kaRamaphosa, e-Olive Convention Centre eThekwini.UMdunge uthe lolu daba uselubike kummeli wakhe omyalele ukuthi akaqhubeke nomsebenzi.“Ngiyaqhubeka nokusebenza ngoba mina ngakhethwa ngabantu hhayi umkhandlu. Ngabantu kuphela abangangixosha uma bengasangifuni,” kusho uMdunge. Uthe uzoya nasemhlanganweni wamakhansela omkhandlu ozoba ngoLwesine kuleli sonto.Uthe ubekwi-ANC waphuma kuyo ngemuva kokucelwa ngamanye amalungu enhlangano ukuthi akabe yikhansela lomphakathi kulandela ukungaboni ngasolinye mayelana nowayephakanyiselwe esikhundleni sobukhansela, ngaphambi kokhetho lohulumeni bezindawo ngo-2016.“Ngisadidekile ukuthi kungani incwadi engixoshayo ivele kwimenenja yomkhandlu ngoba kumele ngabe iphume kusomlomo okungumuntu engibika kuyena,” kusho uMdunge.Imizamo yokuthola uSomlomo uMnuz Zwakele Mngonyama ayizange iphumelele izolo, ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe.Ithintwa imenenja uSineke, ithe ngeke isakwazi ukuphawula ngalolu daba ngoba selusenkantolo.“Uma udaba selusenkantolo alube lusakhulumeka futhi umnikazi wayo indaba uyena oluyise enkantolo,” kusho uSineke.
title: Ikhansela lixoshelwe ukugqoka isikibha sikaRamaphosa

text: USAPHITHENE amakhanda umndeni webhungu (21) okuthiwa liklabhe lalimaza unina, labulala abashana balo ababili libagenca ngobhushu, maqede lashayiswa yiloli lashona, eBhobhoyi.Umndeni kaMnuz Siphamandla Smith awuwuvali umlomo ngesigameko esihlasimulisa umzimba esidlule nemiphefumulo yabashana bakhe uSiyamthanda (3) noThobani (2) okuthiwa bahlaselwe nguye ngobhushu izolo ekuseni, emuva kwehora lesithupha. Kuthiwa unina, uNkk Marry Smith usindile kulesi sigameko kodwa usesimeni esibi esibhedlela.Ngesikhathi leli phephandaba lithinta lo mndeni izolo bewuzwakala ukuthi usakhungathekile futhi udidekile.UNkk Nana Ngcobo uthe basafisa ukuthola ongabachazela ngokwenze indodana kababekazi wakhe ivuke ihlasele unina nabashana bayo.Uthe uthole umbiko ophuthumayo kuthiwa akazobheka lesi sehlakalo. “Sisathukile futhi siphithene amakhanda ngale nto eyenzekile. Okubi wukuthi kwayena uSiphamandla ngeke size sikwazi ukumbuza ngoba ushayiswe yiloli washona emuva kwalesi sigameko. Ngeke ngithi uziphonse ezimotweni noma ushayiseke ethi uyawela kodwa naye ushonile,” kusho uNkk Ngcobo.Kuthiwa uSmith ubebaklabha emakhanda ngobhushu.Abashana bakhe kuthiwa bebeshayeke kabi eziphongweni kwaze kwaphuma ubuchopho.Unina yena kuthiwa umklabhe ekhanda nasengalweni.UNkk Ngcobo uchaze uSmith njengomuntu obethula kakhulu kodwa oqale ukuba nenkinga emuva kokudidekelwa wumqondo nyakenye. Ngokusho kwamalungu omndeni wakhe ukuphazamiseka kwakhe emqondweni bekumenza abuye abe nodlame kodwa akekho obelindele ukuthi angagcina enze lokhu akwenzile.UNksz Zamo Smith uthe ubabekazi wakhe ubehlala noSmith ekhaya nabashana bakhe nezinye izingane zakubo, okubalwa unina womunye wabashana bakhe abashonile ngesikhathi ebahlasela.UNksz Smith uthe unina wenye yezingane ezishonile nguyena ozithele phezu kwezidumbu zezingane nonina obelimele kakhulu kodwa esaphila.Uthe umndeni wonke uphatheke kabuhlungu ngenxa yalesi sigameko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Col Thulani Zwane uthe kuvulwe amacala amabili okubulala nelilodwa lokuzama ukubulala ngenxa yokuhlaselwa kwalaba bobathathu.Uthe kukholakala ukuthi umsolwa ushayiswe yiloli ngesikhathi ebaleka.Uthe kuzovulwa icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso.UZwane uthe akuqondakali ukuthi umsolwa ubezama ukuzibulala yini.
title: Ibhungu liklabhe abashana lababulala lona labulawa yiloli

text: KULOKOZA inhlansi yethemba engwazini ye-Orlando Pirates u -Edward “Magents” Motale ngokuthi umqeqeshi omusha weqembu uKjell Jonevret uzokwazi ukubuyisa izikhathi zenjabulo kuleli qembu laseSoweto.Okuhlaba umxhwele uMotale ngendlela iPirates esidlala ngayo ngaphansi kwalo mqeqeshi odabuka eSweden, wukungaliphonsi ithawula ngisho noma izimo sezinzima.“Okungijabulisayo wukuthi iqembu seliyakwazi ukulwa libuye noma lilandela ngemuva. Phela bese ungasakuboni lokhu kulwa iPirates eyaziwa ngakho emidlalweni edlule. Okunye wukwehla kwesibalo samagoli angena ngakithina,” kusho uMotale.Kule sizini iPirates ibalwa namaqembu asededele amagoli amaningi kuligi. Ingenelwe ngangu-30 emidlalweni engu-20. Kulawo magoli kubalwa nayisithupha ewadedele idlala neSuperSport United neMamelodi Sundowns ngokwehlukana. Ngesikhathi uJonevret efika into ayibalulile wukuvuza kodonga lweBucs.Emidlalweni emine aseyihlale ebhentshini bangenelwe amagoli amane. Emithathu yeligi bayidlale ngokulingana base benqoba oweNedbank Cup Last 32 ngempelasonto beshaya i-EC Bees ngo 3-1.“Lo mphumela yiwona abebewudinga kakhulu. Ngicabanga ukuthi uzoba wukuqala kokuguquka kwezinto eqenjini. Ngokubona kwami sebedlala ibhola esilaziyo lePirates futhi sebenawo u-Plan B uma izinto zingahambi kahle emdlalweni. Osekumele sikwenze manje wukuthi kube wumkhuba wethu ukuthi kube yithina esiwashaya kuqala amagoli,” kusho uMotale.Umdlalo olandelayo weZimnyama oweligi lapho zizovakashela iFree State Stars ngo-Ephreli 1.Kuleli sonto iBucs ayidlali kanti isonto elizayo elemidlalo yeFifa lapho kuzobe kudlala amaqembu esizwe. IPirates ayinabo abadlali ababizelwe kuBafana Bafana enemidlalo yobungani neGuinea-Bissau ngoMashi 25 ne-Angola ngoMashi 28.“Lesi kufanele kube yisikhathi sokuthi umqeqeshi ababheke bonke abadlali anabo ngokuthi kuhlelwe imidlalo yobungani kwazise ngesikhathi efika akazange abe nesikhathi sokubahlola. Ngicabanga ukuthi uma esebabone bonke uzobazi abangu-11 azoqala ngabo imidlalo,” kusho uMagents.Mayelana nomdlalo weStars uthe kumqoka ukuthi bangayithathi kancane ngoba iyiqembu elihlezi libathwalisa kanzima. I-Ea Lla Koto ihleli endaweni ka-14 ku-log ihlukaniswe amaphuzu amahlanu nePirates eyibambe endaweni ka-11.UMotale uphethe ngokuthi uma iPirates ingaqhubeka nomgqigqo wokunqoba ingazibeka ethubeni lokuqeda isizini neNedbank Cup abagcina ngayo ukuba ngompetha beyiwina ngo-2014.
title: Ithemba kuMagents ngoJonevret

text:
MHLELI: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele ngithi nami ake ngigiye ngiqephuze ngosiba ngiveze uvo lwami ngeshwa engilibona lehlela ababukeli bethelevishini ikakhulukazi kuSABC1.Ngithintwa wumbono owawushicilela lapho umfundi ayekhala ngomdlalo okuthiwa ubhula amaphiko phezulu esicongweni ngokuba nababukeli abaningi ekubeni uqhakambisa ubugebengu.Ngibe sengibukisisa lo mdlalo owazitamuzela izindondo, Uzalo. Ngizobala izinto ezimbalwa eziqhakambiswa yilo mdlalo okuthiwa unenqwaba yababukeli.Uzalo lusikhombisa ukuthi kunomuntu ongakwazi ukudelela indlu yesonto azogila imikhuba yobugebengu phakathi esontweni ngoba enemali. Le ngxenye ayisilo neze iqiniso, into enjeyana ngeke yenzeke nhlobo. Alikho ibandla elingadelelwa yisigebengu kanjeya kuze kubaleke nomfundisi imbala. Le ngxenye ayiyivezi indlela impilo eyiyona.Ngeke-ke mhleli ngabubala ubugebengu bukaNkunzi obuyimfundiso ze entsheni yakithi eningi kangaka engasebenzi ezogcina ibona ukuthi uma ingasebenzi kungcono izinikele ebugebengwini.Impumelelo kaMaNgcobo nayo ayimsulwa ngoba ukuze afike lapho ekhona wasebenzisa ubuqili kumyeni wakhe wamudla izithende. Lena ngenye imfundiso ze eveza ukuthi uma udla umlingani wakho izithende ungagcina uphumelele nawe empilweni.Lena-ke kakaputeni wamaphoyisa ohlulwa wukuxazulula wonke amacala nayo kimi ivela sengathi nje yakha isithombe sokuthi amaphoyisa afana nezichuse ezingakwazi ukuvimbela ubugebengu. Le ngxenye ishayisa ngamahloni.Kungani Uzalo lungasebenzisi leli shashalazi ukufundisa isizwe ukuthi isonto alisiyo indawo yezigebengu? Kungani Uzalo lungafundisi isizwe ukuthi amaphoyisa ayakwazi ukulwa nobugebengu aphenye amacala ngempumelelo aze abophe izigilamkhuba? Kungani Uzalo lungabi ngisho naneyodwa ingane efunda esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme ukukhombisa ukuthi impumelelo iyatholakala nangemfundo ngaphandle kobugebengu kuphela?Ingxenye engingathi yona ingcono yile yamantombazane anendawo yokucwala izinwele. Uzalo luqhakambisa impilo ewubukhazikhazi nempumelelo. Abantu kusho ukuthi bafunzwa impilo ewubukhazikhazi nempumelelo esheshayo yikho nabanye becwile ezikweletini ngoba balandela lo mkhakha.Ngingabhala kuphele usiba mhleli ngezinto ezingagculisi ngalo mdlalo. Sengiphetha ngizothatha leli thuba ngishaye ikhwela nginxuse ababhali balo mdlalo ngithi phela ake kube nesifundiswa esiphumeleliswa yimfundo kulo mdlalo, ake kube nebhizinisi elingenagcobho eliphumelelayo.Siyazi ukuthi amabhizinisi kaNkunzi ayilokhu okubizwa nge-fronting ngesilungu, okusho ukuthi ucashe ngawo. Ngiyabonga mhleli.- 
Umfundi weSolezwe
title: [IMIBONO] Angiyiboni into esiyifundiswa wuZalo

text: INKAMPANI yezobuchwepheshe ekleliswe kwiJohannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE), i-AYO Technology Solutions, isithathele izinyathelo zomthetho ibhange iFNB ngemva kokuthola incwadi kuleli bhange eyazisa ukuthi ihlose ukumisa ukusebenzisana nale nkampani kusukela ngoMeyi 3 nonyaka.Le nkampani ephethwe ngabantu abamnyama, ithi isihluleke yancama ukuthola kwiFNB isizathu sokuthi imise ukusebenzisana nayo."Inkampani ikhohlwa wukuthi kumele iphathwe ngendlela efanayo nezinye izinkampani futhi kumele ithole izizathu ezizwakalayo ngokuthi kungani leli bhange selingafuni ukusebenzisana nayo. Yingakho sithathe izinyathelo zomthetho ukuze sithole izimpendulo."Ngenxa yokuthola le ncwadi yesexwayiso kwaFNB, i-AYO isiyazise abanamasheya kuyo ngalokhu nesinyathelo sayo."Ngenxa yesinqumo sakwaFNB sokumisa ukusebenzisana nenkampani, abanikazi bamasheya bayexwayiswa ukuba baqaphelisise ngezinkontilaki nezinye izinqumo ezithinta imali nemihlomulo kuze kube kwenziwa esinye isimemezelo."Ngenxa yokungatholi izizathu ngesinqumo seFNB, i-AYO ithi isola ukuthi leli bhange lifinyelele kulesi sinqumo ngenxa yezizathu zepolitiki nemizamo yokuvimba izinkampani eziphethwe ngabamnyama ukuba zibe yingxenye yokusebenza komnotho wezwe, ikakhulukazi emkhakheni wezobuchwepheshe.Emaphepheni asenkantolo, isikhulu esiphezulu se-AYO, uMnuz Howard Plaatjes, sithe umphumela wokuthi leli bhange livimbe ukusebenzisana nale nkampani kungasho ukunqindeka kwayo ukuqhuba ngendlela umsebenzi futhi kugcine sekuholela ekutheni ingakwazi ukusebenza nokuzosho ukuphela kwemisebenzi.UPlaatjes uthe ngokombiko wakamuva le nkampani iqashe abantu abangaphezu kuka-1 200 kanti imali le nkampani eyikhokhela amaholo abasebenzi ingaphezu kukaR430 million.Le nkampani ithi isinqumo seFNB sibukeka sihambisana nokucwasa, sivimbela ukuhweba futhi siphikisana nelungelo lokusebenza ngokomthethosisekelo walo.Enkantolo i-AYO ilwa ngelokuthi iFNB ilawulwa yiPrudential Authority kanjalo nenqubomgomo yomphakathi."I-AYO kayisolwa ngalutho ngaphandle kokuthi ingezinye zezinkampani  amagama azo avela kwiKhomishini kaMpati. Akukho sinqumo esibeka le nkampani kabi esathathwa kule khomishini," kusho le nkampani.I-AYO ithathela iFNB izinyathelo iyisola ngokwephula umthetho ngokwezigaba zoMthethosisekelo, okuyiSigaba 9, 22, 23 neSigaba 25."I-AYO inxusa inkantolo ukuba ivikele amalungelo ethu ngokoMthethosisekelo. I-AYO isebenzisana namabhange ngobuqotho nangokuhlonipha imigomo ebekwe wumthetho iFinancial Intelligence Center Act. I-AYO ibona isinqumo seFNB sizodicilela phansi ibhizinisi, abasebenzi, amakhasimende, ababambisene nenkampani futhi sivimbela ukuguqulwa kwesimo sokuphathwa komnotho ezweni," kusho inkampani.
title: I-AYO ithathela iFNB izinyathelo zomthetho

text: INYUVESI yaseKapa (UCT) isiqalile ukwenza imizamo yokugcina izinto ezibalulekile zasomtapweni wolwazi iJagger library eyasha ngenkathi kunomlilo ngeledlule. UPick’n Pay kanye nenkampani ekhiqiza amabhokisi athutha izinto zasezitolo uCHEP banikele ngamakesi awu 2000 ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni eUCT. Inyuvesi yacela ukuba noma ngubani aphonse isandla njengoba ibhekene nalesi simo/U-Ujala Satgoor oyisikhulu esiphezulu somtapowolwazi wase UCT uthe isikhathi esinzima lesi eNyuvesi  nomlando wayo njengoba bezilela ukulahleka kwendawo ebalulekile esikhungweni.“Sesiduduzwa ukuthola usizo oluqhamuka nhlazonke. Namhlanje sibonga uPick’n Pay neCHEP ngomusa abasikhomise wona, basizwa sikhala. Sesizokwazi ukuqhubeka nohlelo lokugcina izinto zethu ezibalulekile,” Kusho uSatgoor. USuzanne Ackerman-Berman oyisikhulu esiphezulu sase Pick’n Pay, uthe okubenze bangenelela ukuthi umtapowolwazi iJagger awubalulekile eKapa kuphela kodwa ezweni lonke.Uqhube wathi akusiwona nje kuphela umtapowolwazi abebewucabangela kodwa bebekhathazekile nangezindawo okumele zilungiswe kulesi sikhungo esinomlando omude eNingizimu Afrika futhi esesikhiqize izifundiswa eziningi kuleli. Izitshudeni zibuyele emakilasini kuleli sonto e-UCT.
title: I-UCT ibonga iminikelo

text: IKAIZER Chiefs isiqalile ukuthungatha abadlali ezoqinisa ngabo iqembu ngesizini ezayo kubukeka ihamba ngebatha selokuqale lesizini ngenxa yokuthi ayikwazi ukusayinisa ezoqinisa abasha ngenxa yesigwebo seFifa.Lokhu kuvezwe ngumqeqeshi uGavin Hunt esithangamini nabezindaba izolo. Isigwebo samawindi amabili aMakhosi asigixatshezwe yiFifa nyakenye, siyaphela uma kuvalwa kwewindi esikulo ngoFebhuwari 18. Lokhu kusho ukuthi iChiefs izokwazi ukuqinisa iqembu layo ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2021/2022.UHunt uthe usenalo uhla lwabadlali abafunayo."Njengawo wonke umuntu nginohlu olude ngaphezu kwengalo yami. Kodwa ngeke sibathole bonke. Singabakhomba bonke esibafunayo kodwa ngeke sibathole bonke. Bakhona esibahlonzile futhi kwazise side isikhathi sagcina ukukwenza lokho. Sizobona ukuthi kuhamba kanjani. Ukuthi ubani esimtholayo nokuthi ubani esingamtholi, yilokho okuhlala kuyinkinga, akulula. Njengoba ngihlala ngisho ukuthi ebholeni wonke umuntu ubona umdlali omuhle kodwa kuthiwani ngofanele (ukudlalela iqembu)? Yilokho okubaluleke kakhulu. Yilokho okufanele sikwenze," kusho uHunt.Nakuba sekuneminyaka iChiefs yagcina ukuthenga umdlali walapha eMzansi kodwa uHunt ukuchithile ukuthi iqembu lizokhipha imali eshisiwe kulokhu. UHunt ubebhubhisa izizwe ekwiBidvest Wits ngabadlali abebathola mahhala, sebephelelwe yizinkontileka emaqenjini abo. IChiefs ikuzamile lokhu kodwa iningi lalabo badlali abayenzelanga lutho, ikakhulukazi abafike ngesikhathi sikaSteve Komphela.UHunt uthe ngeke aphoselwe isheke, kuthiwe akazibonele eNaturena."Ngeke kwenzeke kanjalo. Konke kuzokwenzeka ngokubambisana phakathi kwami nemenenja yebhola (Bobby Motaung) nabanye abantu. Konke kuzokwenzeka ngendlela eqondile, sithole abadlali abafanele. Ngeke kwenzeke ngendlela engahlelekile," kusho uHunt.IChiefs izogijimisana neRichards Bay emdlalweni weLast 32 yeNedbank Cup eFNB Stadium, ngeSonto ngo-5 ntambama, . Amakhosi anomlando ongemuhle wokuwashiswa ijezi ngamaqembu adlala esigabeni esingezansi uma idlala kulo mqhudelwano. UHunt uthe uzobophela isikimu esiqinile."Angikaze ngibabuke bedlala kodwa ngiwabukile ama-video abo. Badlala ngale ndlela esiyilindele. Njengawowonke aqembu adlala kwiGladAfrica, bayagijima futhi banomfutho. Ngiyafuna ukushintsha isikimu kodwa kufanele sihlakaniphe. Amaqembu amaningi emhlabeni wonke asebenzisa lo mqhudelwano ukudlala ngesikimu esixegayo. Thina asikwazi ukukwenza lokho ngenxa yethuba lokuya e-Afrika. Asikwazi ukuphisana ngomdlalo,“ kusho uHunt."Okubalulekile wukuwina lo mdlalo, sibheke olandelayo, sidlule kulo mzuliswano. Kunzima ngoba amaqembu e-ABC Motsepe League awekho. Wonke umuntu uhlala efuna ukutomula wona ngenxa yezizathu ezaziwayo nakuba engekho osuke enesiqiniseko ngokuzokwenzeka. KwiRichards Bay silindele iqembu eligijimayo. Lokho kufanele sikuqaphele."
title: OweChiefs uselukhiphile uhlu lwabadlali abafunayo

text: AFRICAN NEWS AGENCY (ANA)ALIZANGE lingene enkantolo kamantshi eKapa icala elibhekene nomethuli wezinhlelo, uKatlego Maboe njengoba bekulindeleke avele izolo kule nkantolo. UMaboe bekulindeleke ukuba avele mayelana nokuphula umyalelo wenkantolo ovikela ukuba angasondeli eduze kwalowo ayethandana naye, uNksz Monique Muller.UNksz Muller unencwadi evimbela uMaboe ukuthi angasondeli eduze kwakhe.Okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority, uMnuz  Eric Ntabazalila, uthe: “Akazange avele enkantolo uKatlego namhlanje ekuseni. Ngesikhathi umshushisi ebona udaba olubhalwe ngaye ukuthi uzovela enkantolo, ube esefonela amaphoyisa.“Utshelwe ukuthi udaba lusenkantolo namhlanje. Idokodo alizange lilethwe enkantolo. Ube eselicela, usalinde lona.”UNtabazalila uthe akazi icala likaMaboe lizobuya nini enkantolo ngoba alikakleliswa namacala azongena.UMaboe usanda kuba sematheni ezinkundleni zokuxhumana emuva kokuba kuvele i-video yakhe ezivumela ukuthi uke wangathembeka emshadweni wakhe ngokuthi alale nomunye wesifazane.Ekhuluma nethimba lezokugcebeleka kwi-IOL uMoboe wakuphika ukuthi yena ubehlukumeza isithandwa sakhe, wathi udaba lusenkantolo. \UMETHULI wezinhlelo uKatlego Maboe, obekulindeleke avele izolo enkantolo kodwa icala langangena
title: UMaboe akabange esavela enkantolo

text: KUSHONE oyedwa kwalimala abanye ababili kubona baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela ngendiza enophephela emhlane belimele kabi ngemva kokuthi kube nokushayisana kwezimoto kwagqamuka amalangabi emgwaqweni uM7 East ngaseBellville, eThekwini, izolo ekuseni.Ngokwesitatimende esifakwe abakwaNetCare 911 ekhasini labo kwiFacebook izolo, sithi abezimo eziphuthumayo bathole umyalezo wokuthi baphuthume endaweni yesigameko lapho kwenzeke ingozi.“Endaweni yesigameko bekukhona izimoto ezimbalwa ebezigqamuka amalangabi okubalwa kuzo namaloli amabili, elinye kuwo elithwala okusaluketshezi,” kusho lesi sitatimende.Sithi ngesikhathi abezimo eziphuthumayo namaphoyisa bephuthuma endaweni yesigameko, bathole ukuthi owesilisa oyedwa obeselolini ubeseshonile, kanti abangu-11 abebesezimotweni ezibandakanyeke kule ngozi bathole imihuzuko engatheni kwathi ababili ebebelimele kakhulu baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Lo mgwaqo uke wavalwa ngesikhathi abezimo eziphuthumayo belekelela abebelimele.
title: Kutholane phezulu amaloli nezimoto

text: AFRICAN NEWS AGENCY (ANA)OKHULUMELA uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa nosamisiwe esikhundleni, uNkk Khusela Diko, uziphendulele kwisiphakamiso sekomiti eliphezulu le-ANC eGauteng, sokuthi asule emsebenzini emuva kokuba simthole enecala. Lesi sigungu sizwakalise kwabezindaba ukuthi njengoba uNkk Diko elahlwe ngamacala, kumele ahoxe esikhundleni sokukhulumela uRamaphosa.UNkk Diko ngamazwi ommeli wakhe, uthe ngeke akwamukele lokho ngoba iSpecial Investigating Unit, isamphenya ngodaba lokuthinteka kwakhe kwithenda yezimpahla zokuvikela iCorona.Isitatimende esithunyelwe ngabameli bakaNkk Diko izolo ekuseni, sithe ushaqekile ngokushiwo nguNobhala waseGauteng uMnuz Jacob Khawe, kwabezindaba okokuthi kumele asule esikhundleni sakhe njengoba etholwe enecala.UNkk Diko ubebekwe icala lokungaziphathi ngendlela elindelekile, ehlaza inhlangano i-ANC ngokwehluleka kwakhe ukuveza obala amabhizinisi omyeni wakhe. Ukubekwa kukaNkk Diko amacala kusukela ekutheni  ngoJulayi ngonyaka odlule umyeni wakhe,  iNkosi Thandisizwe Diko (ongasekho emhlabeni), yahlabana ngethenda ka-R125 million yokuhlinzeka izinto zokuvikela kwiCovid-19 emnyangweni wezeMpilo eGauteng.Ummeli wakhe uthe emuva kokuba elahlwe ngamacala, bahlela ukuthi isinqumo secala sidluliswe. “Uzosebenzisa ilungelo lakhe lokudlulisela isinqumo secala esebenzisa umthethosisekelo we-ANC,” ngokusho kommeli kwincwadi ayibhalele i-ANC eGauteng.Ngokusho kommeli kaNkk Diko, ikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe eGauteng, liphaphalazile ngoba umthethosisekelo we-ANC awusho lutho ngokuthi abaholi bayo kumele badalule ukuthi abantu abashade nabo, benza maphi amabhizinisi. Ngokusho kommeli, akakholelwa ukuthi uNkk Diko wayefanele nokubekwa amacala.
title: UDiko uphonsela i-ANC inselelo ngesiphakamiso sokuthi asule

text: SIBOLILE yinduku isitshudeni sase-UKZN eWestville, eThekwini, esisolwa ngokungena ngo dli endaweni okuhlala kuyo abesifazane kuphela ngoMsombuluko. Lesi siagameko singesinye sezehlakalo eziwubungozi ezenzeke kule nyuvesi esezishiye izitshudeni zibhikisha njengoba zifuna kuqiniswe ezokuphepha ezindaweni zokuhlala abafundi ezisesikoleni. Okhulumela i-UKZN uMnuz Ashton Bodrick uthe lesi sitshudeni sesiboshiwe. Lesi sitshudeni kuthiwa singene endaweni okuhlala kuyo abesifazane sisebenzisa indlela yezimo eziphuthumayo kuleli bhilidi, saqhubeka sayongena egumbini lapho bekugeza khona isitshudeni sesifazane.“Ngemuva kokubona umsolwa engena ezindlini zokugezela, isitshudeni sesifazane simemeze kakhulu, okudale ukuthi umsolwa akhishwe kulendawo abezokuphepha i-University Risk Management Services,” kuchaza uBodrick.  Umsolwa uthe ubefuna ukusebenzisa indlu yangasese.UBodrick uthe ngesikhathi umsolwa ekhishwa kulendawo, idlanzana lezitshudeni abezidiniwe zisondele ngakubo zavulela ngesibhaxu kumsolwa. Izintatheli zephephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, iDaily News, zizibonele mathupha ivideo kamsolwa evithizwa ngenduku yizitshudeni zase-UKZN yize abasebenzi bakule nyuvesi bezama ukumlamulela. “Akuvumelekile ukuthi isitshudeni sesilisa singene endaweni ehlala abafundi besifazane kuphela noma isendlini yokugezela abesifazane. INyuvesi ngeke iwubekezele lomkhuba. Izitshudeni eziphula imithetho yenyuvesi ziphinde zenze izinto ezibeka ukuphepha kwabanye engcupheni, ikakhulukazi abesifazane, zizoqondiswa abaphathi,” kuchaza uBodrick. UBodrick uthe isitshudeni sesifazane esithintekayo sizokwelulekwa ngokomqondo. UBodrick uphinde wacacisa ukuthi abasebenzi bezokuphepha banyusiwe njengoba bezogada ngaphakathi nangaphandle kwenyuvesi. USihlalo we-UKZN Student Representative Council ophikweni lwaseWestville uMoses Nkambako uthe izitshudeni zisaphila ngokwesaba. “Basacabanga ukuthi mhlampe kusazokwenzeka kubona,” kuchaza uNkambako. UNkambako uthe izitshudeni zibanikeze iziphakamiso okumele bazihambise kubaphathi benyuvesi zokuthi bangaziqinisa kanjani ezokuphepha. Phakathi kweziphakamiso ezikhona kubalwe ukuthi kufakwe izincingo ezicijile emasangweni ukuze izimoto zingakwazi ukudlula uma kubaleka abasolwa.Izitshudeni zithe zifuna kukhanyiswe ezindaweni ezimnyama futhi kufakwe onogada. Izitshudeni ziphinde zaveza ukuthi zifuna bayeke ukuhlulwa umsebenzi abasebenzi be-risk management services.
title: Siyisuthile induku isitshudeni esibanjwe ezindlini zabesifazane e-UKZN

text: UMQEQESHI weCape Town City, uJan Olde Riekerink, unethemba lokuthi “uzobaxegisela” obengumgadli wabo uKermit Erasmus uma sebebhekene neqembu lakhe elisha iMamelodi Sundowns namuhla ebusuku.IThe Citizens izogijimisana neSundowns emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eCape Town Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku. Igcine ihlulekile ukunqaba no-Erasmus kwiSundowns obekukade kunesikhathi imfuna. Emuva kwamasonto ambalwa efulathele iCity, u-Erasmus angase ayibhubhise. Ngasekupheleni kwesizini edlule ushayele iCity igoli  ngesikhathi ihlula iSundowns ngo 3-2 ushisa phansi umbango wesicoco seligi.Selokhu efike kwiSundowns usayishaye kanye inethi ngesikhathi behlula iKaizer Chiefs ngo 3-0.“UKermit uzilungele futhi bonke abantu bangathanda ukumbona ebuya. Ungumshayimagoli ophezulu futhi sizobonakala isikhala samagoli akhe phambili. Ukudlala nomdlali obekade edlalela iqembu lakho kujwayelekile futhi kuyamgquqguzela. Ngithemba ukuthi uzoba nozwelo kithina,” kusho uRiekerink.Ngesizini edlule u-Erasmus ubekade ebalwa nabagadli abahamba phambili kwiPremiership. Ushaye amagoli awu-13 emidlalweni yeligi. Inkinga kaRiekerink wukuthola umgadli ozoshaya amagoli kule sizini. “Sinabo abadlali abangavala leso sikhala. Abanye kufanele baphakame bazibonakalise. SinoTashreeq (Morris), Fagrie (Lakay), sinoPrice (Agyemang) ongakakulungeli ukudlala ngenxa yokuthi ufike sekuhambe isikhathi. Konke kusezandleni zabo. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi baphakame, yithuba labo.”Umqeqeshi weSundowns, uRhulani Mokwena, uthe kufanele bayiqaphele iCity.“Icacile indlela iCity edlala ngayo. Kufanele siqaphele indlela esenza ngayo ngenxa yendlela edlala ngayo njengeqembu, siqaphele futhi abadlali ngabodwana ngoba baningi abayingozi. Amalungiselelo omdlalo ahamba kahle. Sithole nesikhathi sokuba senkundleni yokuziqeqesha, sacathulisa abadlali abasha ngendlela esidlala ngayo. Sesikulungele ukudlala neCape Town City” kusho uMokwena.“ICity ibuye nomphumela omuhle kakhulu kwiMaritzburg United. Idlale kahle. Kunzima ukuwina eHarry Gwala. Lokhu kusho ukuthi beza kithi bezethemba.”Emidlalweni emibili yokuqala yeligi iCity idlale ngokulingana ngo 1-1 neChippa United, yahlula iMaritzburg. ISundowns ihlule iChiefs, yabanjwa yiTshakhuma FC ngo 0-0.
title: URiekerink uthemba ukuthi uzoxegisa u-Erasmus

text: Simphiwe Ngubane BAVELE bayinyomfa abazali besikole iSiphumelele Primary, eZimangweni, eNanda, bemisa abasebenzi abebelungisa uphahla lwesikole ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Kuthiwa baphume ngesamagundane esikoleni abasebenzi bekhishwa ngabazali, kwafika namaphoyisa abezoqapha isimo.Abazali abafuni kulungiswe uphahla kodwa kuguqulwe isikole sibe yisitezi abathi babesithenjiswe sona yikhansela lendawo eku-ward 107 kuMasipala weTheku.Bafuna kucaciswe ukuthi ushonephi uR28 million abathe ikhansela labatshela ukuthi ubekelwe umsebenzi wokwakha isikole esiyisitezi.Kuthiwa amalungu omphakathi afune ngodli izimpendulo kusonkontileka aqale akhuluma naye emgwaqweni qede ambizela emagcekeni ehholo lomphakathi emhloma imibuzo.Kulapho okuthiwa usonkontileka ugcine esebavezele khona amaphepha abenepulani yesikole esiyisitezi obekumele sakhiwe.Omunye wabazali uthe kuzobeka impilo yabafundi engcupheni ukulungiswa kwesikole ngesikhathi sokufunda.“Kuzokwakhiwa izingane zikhona esikoleni, kuphi ukuphepha lapho? Akumiswe ukufakwa kophahla bese kwakhiwa esithenjiswe khona. Iphi imali yesikole esiyisitezi okwathiwa izokwakhiwa ngayo?” kubuza umzali.Uthe okubacasula kakhulu ukuthi alibonwa nangokhalo ikhansela lizobanika izimpendulo ngokuqhubekayo esikoleni.Ikhansela uMnuz Njabulo Mabanga uthe lusazoqhubeka uhlelo lokwakhiwa kwesitezi. Njengamanje balungisa lezo zakhiwo ezindala bandise isibalo samakilasi.“Ukhona umhlaba ohlwayiwe emagcekeni esikole okuzokwakhiwa kuwona izitezi ezimbili. Njengamanje kulungiswa lezo ezindala ngoba ngeke sidilize zonke izindonga zesikole,” kusho uMabanga.Uthe akukhona nje ukwenza izithembiso kepha ukudlulisela umphakathi ngezinhlelo zaboMnyango wemiSebenzi yoMphakathi nowezeMfundo okuyibona abaqhuba uhlelo lokwakhiwa kwesikole.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, uthe bazolandela ukuthi kuqhubekani kulesi sikole.Uthe uma kunohlelo lomnyango lokulungiswa kwesikole, akekho umuntu ovunyelwe ukulumisa.
title: Bamise ukulungiswa kophahla lwesikole befuna sibe yisitezi eNanda

text: AKUKATHOLAKALI mkhondo ngebamba-bukhosi elithunjwe ngamadoda abezenza amaphoyisa ngesonto eledlule.Sekuhluleke ngisho izangoma nabathandazi ukuthola umkhondo wamadoda athumbe Inkosi Makhosandile Ngcobo weQiniselani MaNyuswa, eZinqoleni.UNgcobo wathunjwa ebusuku ngoMsombuluko ngeledlule ngamadoda ayefake imifaniswano yamaphoyisa.Kuze kube yimanje akakatholakali uNgcobo noma amadoda ashaya achitha naye.Izolo, umndeni uthe awusazi ukuthi kufanele ubheke kuphi njengoba kungezwakali lutho.Umndeni uthe nabathumbi bebengakaze bawuthinte ukusho ukuthi bafunani ukuze badedele uNgcobo.Indodana kaNgcobo, uMnuz Mqondisi Ngcobo, ithe bakhungathekile njengomndeni.UNgcobo uthe bakhulekela ukuba uyise abuye ekhaya ephephile. “Ukungatholakali kukaNdabezitha akumnandi neze, kusiphethe kabuhlungu.”Enye yezinduna ecele ukuba igama layo lingadalulwa, ithe sebekuzamile konke kubalwa ukuyobhula nokuyohlola, kepha lutho ukuthola uNgcobo.“Nalaba bamanga sebehlulekile. Baningi abantu esibahambile, abakhuluma izinto ezingahlangani. Abanye bakhomba emahlathini kepha uma sithi siyobheka lapho, singatholi lutho. Kuze kube yimanje sisafuna.”Le nduna ithe umphakathi ukhathazekile kakhulu ngokuqhubeka kwezinsuku kungatholakali mkhondo ngokuthunjwa kukaNgcobo.“Njengesizwe, sinqunu njengoba umholi wethu edukile. Kunzima nokuqhuba imisebenzi yesizwe njengoba wonke umuntu egxile ekuthungatheni uNdabezitha.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe namanje amaphoyisa asambheka uNgcobo.“Lolu daba lusaphenywa.”UNgcobo uduka nje, ubesasanda kusinda etulweni lokumsoconga ngonyaka odlule.Kulesi sigameko uNgcobo wadubuleka walimala kanye nenye yezinduna zakule ndawo.IKwaZulu-Natal ihlaselwe isihlava sokusocongwa kwamakhosi nezinduna.
title: Basebumnyameni ngenkosi ethunjiwe

text: ABAWUVALI abantu umlomo uZodwa Wabantu eziqhasabula ngemoto yomacaphunakusale.UZodwa Wabantu usematheni kwabaningi selokhu efake isithombe seLamborghini ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba  abantu belokhu bembongele njalo. Lolu nyanyavu lwemoto entsha ceke ushuthe naye ekwelinye lamagaraji ezimoto eGoli.UZodwa Wabantu akazange asho okuningi kodwa kule video yakhe uzwakala ethi ’makunyiwe’ nokuyinto akhonze ukuyisho njalo uma enze into azigqajayo ngayo. UZodwa Wabantu uvela nale moto nje abantu bebesamshayela ihlombe ngobuhlakani bakhe. Emuva kokuvalwa kwemicimbi ebimngenisela imali wabona ithuba lokuqala ibhizinisi ebelibukeka lilincane futhi lingeke limenzele inzuzo etheni. UZodwa Wabantu usedume ngokudayisa amaqanda muva nje, lama qanda akakhethi zindawo kodwa uwadayisa kuwona wonke amalokishi namadolobha ngisho basemgwaqweni uqobo.Abantu balokhu bembongele njalo okubalwa ngisho osaziwayo. Kulezi zinsuku uZodwa Wabantu ubukeka ematasa kakhulu njengoba esengene naseqenjini likaSushi King, uKenny Kunene wePatriotic Alliance. Okwamanje akukho okutheni abasakuveza noma abakudalulayo laba bobabili mayelana nokungena kukaZodwa Wabantu kuleli qembu.
title: UZodwa nonyanyavu lwemoto

text: UKUMISWA komqeqeshi weBaroka FC, uKgoloko Thobejane, kukhomba ukuthi kuzobe kuhleli uDoctor "16V" Khumalo uma iqembu laseLimpopo selithathana nePlatinum Stars emdlalweni weNedbank Cup last 32 eRoyal Bafokeng gnoLwesithathu ntambama.Izindaba zokumiswa kukaThobejane ziqinsekiswe yilo iqembu ngomlomo kaMorgan Mammila, isikhulu esiphezulu kwiBaroka kodwa owalile ukudalula izizathu zokumiswa kukaThobejane.Yize engasidalulanga isizathu uMamila kodwa imithombo yeSolezwe ivele nezithi usolwa ngokuphuza utshwala nabadlali beqembu ngemuva komdlali wangeSonto abanqunywe kuwo yiFree State Stars ngo 2-0.Kuthiwa bebesendleleni ebuyela ePolokwane.Akucaci nokho ukuthi uThobejane uphule muphi umthetho kwazise wumkhuwa ojwayelekile ukuthi abaqeqeshi baziphuzele nabadlali ngemuva komdlalo.Lo mkhuba wawukhonzwe kakhulu nguClive Barker, owaqopha umlando enqoba i-Africa Cup of Nations ngo-1996.
title: Kubhekwe uDR Khumalo kwesikaThobejane omisiwe

text: OYINHLOKO yezokhetho kwi-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula washaqeka ngendlela eyisimanga ngenkathi eshayelwa ucingo u-Ajay Gupta ongumunye wezalamani zomndeni wakwaGupta embongela ngokuthi usezokuba wuNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo ngo-2011.UMbalula usho lokhu izolo eGoli ngenkathi ethula ubufakazi phambi kweKhomishini kaJaji Raymond Zondo ephenya ngezigameko zokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.“Ngavele ngashaqeka ngangazi ukuthi ngizothini,” kusho uMbalula.Uthe wayexakwa nawukuthi umuntu omazisa izindaba ezifana nalezi, akalona ngisho nelungu lenhlangano yakhe i-ANC.NgokukaMbalula, uyawazi umthetho olandelwayo wokubekwa ezikhundleni koNgqongqoshe, okuwu Section 85.Uthe ngokwalo mthetho, uMengameli wezwe kuphela onelungelo lokusho ukuthi uzokuba wungqongqoshe ozophatha muphi umnyango.NgokukaMbalula, okwamphatha kabi nakakhulu, ukuthi okwashiwo * -Ajay kuyena kwagcina sekwenzekile ngempela njengoba wagcina esenguyena uNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo njengokusho kuka-Ajay.Ngendlela aphatheka kabi ngayo, uthe waze wabikela isigungu esiphezuluse-ANC esinamalungu angu-80.Esikhundleni sokuthi athole ukwelulekwa ngenkinga ayebhekene nayo, uMbalula uthe wonke amalungu alesi sigungu agebisa amakhanda phansi, kwangekho omphendulayo.NowayenguMengameli ngaleso sikhathi uMnuz Jacob Zuma owayekhona kulo mhlangano owawungo-Agasti 2011, uthe naye wathula kwaba sengathi akezwanga lutho ukuthi uthini.UMbalula uthe uyazi ukuthi abanye ozakwabo kule nhlangano, bathuliswa wukuthi babekuqonda ukuthi uma beke bavula imilomo, kwakuzoba ukuphelelwa kwabo imisebenzi yokuba ngongqongqoshe.“Okungijabulisayo ukuthi lokhu ngakukhuluma emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC ngoba le nhlangano ihlale isikhuthaza ukuthi sizikhulume ngaphakathi izinkinga esinazo ngayo,” kusho uMbalula.NgokukaMbalula, noma kungaba khona abangamsola ngakushilo, yena bonke ubufakazi unabo ngokwenzeka.Nakuba bekhona abanye ozakwabo kule nhlangano abamncoma ngokuba nesibindi kwakhe ngakusho, uthe kukhona nabanye kule nhlangano abamsola ngakusho.Uthe ukuhlala kwendiza eyayilayishe umndeni wakwaGupta esikhumulweni sezindiza iWaterkloof ePitoli, yilapho abona khona ukuthi ngempela umbuso wakuleli usulawulwa wumndeni wakwaGupta.
title: UMbalula ufakaze ngabakwaGupta

text: AMAPHOYISA KwaZulu-Natal ashaqe izibhamu ezingu-25 ezingekho emthethweni ezindaweni ezahlukene ngempelasonto yePhasika.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt. Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa ahambele izindawo ezehlukene nokuyilapho ethole khona izibhamu, oqhwasha nezinhlamvu.“Kusukela ngo-Ephreli 14 kuze kube wu-Ephreli 20 nonyaka amaphoyisa abevimbile emgwaqweni, esesha nezimoto nokuyilapho kutholwe khona izibhamu ezingu-25 okubalwa izibhamu ezincane nezibhamu zokuzakhela. Kutholwe izinhlamvu ezingu-207 kwaboshwa nabasolwa abangu-28,” kusho uZwane.Abasolwa bazobhekana namacala okutholakakala nezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu.Abasolwa kulindeleke ukuthi bavele ezinkantolo ezahlukene e-KZN ngamacala ababekwe wona.UZwane uthe lezi zibhamu zizohanjiswa ukuyohlolwa ukuthi ngabe azikaze yini zisetshenziswe ukwenza amacala obugebengu esifundazweni.“Siyanxusa ukuthi umphakathi ubike uma kukhona abantu abanezibhamu emphakathini ngoba iningi lalezi zibhamu zijwayele ukusetshenziswa emacaleni anzima okubalwa ukwebiwa kwemfuyo, impi yamatekisi namacala ahlobene nodlame lwepolitiki,” kusho uZwane.
title: Kuboshwe 28 kutholwa izibhamu

text: USESIMENI esithembisayo ekhaya umsunguli wekhasi labesifazane elitholakala kuFacebook iLadies House emuva kwesikhathi eside kubikwa ukuthi uxinwe ukugula okunzima. USimthembile Chris Bhoni ongumsunguli weLadies House enabesifazane abawu760k besekuphele izinyanga kubanjwe umoya ngesimo sakhe njengoba ahlaselwa ikhanda elinzima.Umndeni kaChris waveza ukuthi uqalwe yikhanda ngoNovemba nyakenye eseNtuzuma nokuyilapho ekhandleke khona isikhathi eside umndeni wakhe ungenalwazi. Uyise kaChris uMnuz Mbongeni Bhoni uthe yize amadolo esaxega futhi engakakwazi nokuzimela nokuhamba kodwa usengcono kakhulu. "Uma kungaqina amadolo kungabangcono kakhulu ngoba uzokwazi ukuzama ukuhamba. Ukukhuluma useyakuzama kodwa nakhona kusenzima ngoba amagama awakavumi ukuphuma kahle. Ukuhlala esibhedlela saseMgungundlovu kusisize kakhulu sesinethemba ngento esimbona eyiyona manje," kusho uBhoni. Eqhuba uthe noma sebebuyele eLusikisiki kodwa odokotela abakaliphonsi ithawula banezinhlelo eziningi zokumsiza. "Siyaphinda ngoJanuwari odokotela sebesibhukhele ukuyomfaka emshinini ozohlola ikhanda. Nakho lokho kunginika ithemba, okunye okungijabulisayo ukuthi noma egula kodwa uyakuthanda ukudla nokwenza angakhandleki emzimbeni. Inyama iyona ayikhonze kakhulu," kusho uBhoni ehleka. Ephetha uthe uyabona nezingcingo ezimduduzayo azithola kwabesifazane baseLadies House abakhombisa ukukhathalela indodana yakhe. UBhoni uthe nezandla bazivulile kwabafisa ukuzombona ngoba akukho abakufihlile ngokugula kwakhe. Mayelana nezinto ezingamahlebezi nezingehli kahle ezike zashiwo ngoChris okubalwa nesigameko sakamuva sokuthi ushonile uBhoni uveze ukuthi konke lokhu akunandawo ezinhliziyweni zabo. Uthando uChris aluthola kubantu uthe yilona olubenza bame isibindi ngalesi sikhathi.
title: Uselulamela ekhaya umsunguli weLadies House

text: THEMBA NTSHINGILAKUNGAKAPHOLI maseko kubatshazwa umfundisi ofuthe abazalwane ngesibulali zinambuzane iDoom, abefundisi ababili owaseMthatha naseLimpopo nabo sebeqhamuke nokwabo.EMthatha kuphalaze amakholwa amanye aquleka emva kokuba ephuziswe wumfundisi wawo uketshezi okukholakala ukuthi belinobuthi.Kubikwa ukuthi angaphezulu kuka-20 amakholwa asale ezibhonqa emuva kokuphuza lolu ketshezi ngoLwesine.Ngokusho kwesitatimende esikhishwe nguMnuz Sizwe Kupelo okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo e-Eastern Cape, kubizwe abezimo eziphuthumayo eCity Hall eMthatha ngo-5.30 ntambama emuva kokuba kusuke lesi sidumo.“Kusolakala ukuthi amakholwa aphuziswe uketshezi oluthile umfundisi wawo emva kwalokho aphalaza aphinde aquleka,” kusho isitatimende.“Bangu-20 abantu abalashwe ngabezempilo endaweni yesigameko kodwa benqaba ukuba baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela. Munye kuphela ovumile ophuthunyiswe eNelson Mandela Academic Hospital,” kugcizelela isitatimende.NgokukaKupelo, lolu ketshezi bekungakacaci ukuthi lunhloboni ngempela. Noma kunjalo uthe abezempilo namaphoyisa basaphenya ngalolu daba.Exoxa naleli phephandaba uKupelo uthe izikhulu zezempilo zicoshe izigubhu zamajusi endaweni yesigameko nemihlanzo okuzoyohlolwa.Kubikwa ukuthi umfundisi osolwa ngalokhu wuMphrofethi Phumzile Topi, ubalekile emva kokwenzeka kwalesi sigameko.Kwesinye sezigameko ezifuze lezi, kubikwa ukuthi amakholwa aphuziswe iDettol wumfundisi wawo ethi uyawelapha.Kubikwa ukuthi uMphrofethi Rufus Phala we-AK Spiritual Christian Church eMakgodu, eLimpopo, usemangaze amakholwa nomphakathi ngendlela elapha ngayo yokuphuzisa abantu iDettol.Nakuba kuthiwa uPhala ushilo ukuthi uyaqonda ukuthi ukuphuza iDettol kungase kumbulale umuntu kodwa kuthiwa utshele amakholwa ukuthi wuNkulunkulu omthumile ukuba abaphuzise yona ukuze belapheke ezifweni zabo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kuneKhomishini ebhekele ezenkolo, amasiko nolimu ebiphonsa imibuzo abefundisi ‘bezimanga’ njengoba yenze izincomo ePhalamende okubhekwe ukuthi zingase ziyixazulule le nkinga.Okhulumela le Khomishini, uNkk Thoko Mkhwanazi-Xaluva, ukugcizelele ukuthi abakajiki kwabafuna kwenzeke, ukuthi bonke abefundisi kumele banikezwe amalayisense futhi kube khona isigungu esizolawula ukusebenza abefundisi njengoba kwenzeka emkhakheni wodokotela, othisha nabammeli.“Inkinga esisabhekene nayo wukuthi abefundisi abaningi abakafuni ukwamukela esifuna ukuba kwenzeke.“Yibona manje abasibambezele ngoba bethi kufanele kube khona inkululeko kwezenkolo. Kodwa engingakuqinisekisa ukuthi noma bengaqhubeka abenza lezi zinto kodwa sizofika isikhathi lapho esizobalawula khona. Ngokwami ngabe bonke laba befundisi abenza lezi zinto kumele ngabe sebasejele," kusho uNkk Mkhwanazi-Xaluva.Iphini enhlanganweni yabefundisisi KwaZulu-Natal, uMfundisisi Lucas Ngoetjana, uthe: "Sizimisele ukuxoxisana nale Khomishini kuze kube kutholakala isixazululo. Kodwa asifuni ukuthi kube khona abanyatheleka amakhona kulokhu kuxoxisana."Uthe okumele kwenzeke ukuxoxisana ngesineke kungajahwa ngoba yizwi likaNkulunkulu leli akumele litatazelelwe.
title: Bakhala ngomfundisi ophuzisa amakholwa iDettol

text: KUMISWE umsakazi wesiteshi somphakathi sasoLundi, iNguna 89.0 FM, kulandela ukuthengela ozakwabo besifazane ikhekhe ngo-Agasti 9. U-Agreement Zulu, owenza uhlelo lwasekuseni iSesifikile Breakfast Show nolukamaskandi ngoMgqibelo, kuthiwa wahlanganisa abasakazi besifazane wabathengela ikhekhe.Umthombo uthe okwadina abaphathi wukuthi abasakazi babemncoma emoyeni. Ebuzwa i-Agreement uphikile ukuthi umisiwe.“Ngizobuyela noma yinini emoyeni uma sengithanda.”Uthi usazogeqa amagula ngalolu daba. Umphathisiteshi uMfu Hebert Mncube uthe umisiwe uZulu kodwa wacela kuthintwe umphathi wezinhlelo kulesi siteshi, uMandla ‘Big Show’ Dumakude.UDumakude uphikile ukuthi uZulu umiselwe ukuthengela abasakazi ikhekhe. Uthe nalokho kuyingxenye yamaphutha.Uthe bese kungokwesibili uZulu ephambana nemigomo yesiteshi.“Saqala samkhuza ehlela i-gala dinner ngaphandle kokwazisa abaphathi. Waphinda wenza umcimbi wabesifazane, basebenzisa nomoya bengagunyaziwe. Sezwa sekunomsindo emoyeni, kukhuluma noma wubani.Waya eThekwini, wathi uhambisa ingane akazobakhona, ngathi uma ngibuza ukuthi uhlelile yini nomuntu ozombambela, wavele wavala ucingo.”Uthe wathi ebona kungafiki muntu ozombambela wafaka umuntu ozombambela ngaphambi kokuthatha isinqumo sokummisa uZulu.“Sathi sisammisile sashayelwa ucingo inyanga yaseHluhluwe okuthiwa uDlamini, ikhala ngokuthi yathenga isikhathi ohlelweni lukamaskandi kodwa iyathuka engasazwakali emoyeni uZulu. UDlamini wathi wakhokha uR2 000 kuZulu ukuze akhangise ngemithi yakhe. Ngabuza umphathisiteshi nowezikhangiso ukuthi kukhona yini isivumelwano abasaziyo esenziwa noDlamini.”UDumakude uthe uyakhumbula ezwa uDlamini ekhuluma emoyeni kodwa wazitshela ukuthi umculi kamaskandi kanti akunjalo.“Ngathi uma ngimtshela ngalokhu uZulu, wangigibela ngenhlamba, wangibiza ngenkabi engumantindane kaMncube. Wathi kukhona azongenza khona.”UDumakude uthe uxhumene namaphoyisa ngezinsongo zikaZulu kodwa uZulu uyaphika. Kunabalaleli azwakalise ukungenami ngokumiswa kukaZulu.
title: Kumiswe umsakazi onconywe abesifazane

text: ABAKWA-ESKOM basuse zonke izintambo zikagesi ezixhunywe ngokungekho emthethweni eThornville, eMgungundlovu kuleli sonto.Batheleke kule ndawo engomazakhele, bagqashula zonke izintambo njengoba kunohlelo lokuthi bafakelwe ugesi ngokusemthethweni.Umphakathi waseThornville wazakhela wona ugesi ongekho emthethweni, bazifakela izigxobo, bafaka izintambo nama-transformer.Ngokusho kwesitatimende esithunyelwe ngabakwa-Eskom, cishe ingu-4 000 imindeni ebisebenzisa lo gesi ongekho omthethweni.Abaningi bebengawukhokheli nhlobo ugesi kule ndawo.Bathe bebekhathazekile kakhulu ngoba ukuxhunywa kukagesi ngale ndlela bekubeka umphakathi engozini, ikakhulukazi izingane.Kube sekuba nezingxoxo phakathi kwabakwa-Eskom noMasipala uMsunduzi nomphakathi wakule ndawo, kwavunyelwana ngokuba ususwe lo gesi okhona ongekho emthethweni bese befakelwa osemthethweni.Ngesitatimende abakwa-Eskom izolo, bathe kube kuhle ukusebenzisana nezinhlaka ebezithinteka kulolu daba.Isigaba sokuqala sokufakwa kukagesi siqalile njengoba kungu-Agasti, uma kuhambe ngohlelo lwabo kuzophela * -Agasti sekukhona amakhaya akhanyanyo ngokusemthethweni.“Uma sebefakelwe ugesi osemthethweni, bazobe sebekwazi ukukhokhela ugesi abawusebenzisayo. U-Eskom usebenzisa imali ekhokhwa amakhasimende ukulungisa ingqalasizinda kagesi ukuze uqinisekise ukuthi bonke abantu bayawuthola. Uma abantu bengakhokhi kusho ukuthi uzocinywa futhi kube nenhlawulo.” .Abakwa-Eskom banxuse ukuba ugesi oxhunywe ngokungethetho nezintambo ezivele obala ukuba kubikwe kwinombolo ethi: 08600 37566.
title: U-Eskom unqamule izintambo zikagesi eMgungundlovu

text: ABAPHATHI bomcimbi waminyaka yonke amaSouth African Music Awards (Sama) bayilaxazile iSABC kulokhu bakhetha ukuthi umcimbi ka-26 usakazwe kuMzanzi Magic (161).Bese kukuningi ukuqagela ukuthi umcimbi ngabe uzoba khona yini ngenxa yeCovid-19 ephazamise izinto eziningi.Isiqubulo somcimbi walo nyaka sithi ForThaKultcha. Uzosakazwa izinsuku ezinhlanu zilandelana kusuka ngo-Agasti 3 kuya ku-Agasti 7 ngo-9.30 ebusuku.UNhlanhla Sibisi, umphathi weRisa ephethe amaSama, uthe baningi abafuna ukusakaza okuthinta umcimbi yingakho uzodonsa izinsuku ezinhlanu.“Kuzosakazwa izinto ezehlukene ezithinta umcimbi imizuzu ewu-30 usuku ngalunye. Kuyothi ngomhlaka-7 bese kuba wumcimbi omkhulu oyothatha cishe ihora lonke. Imfashini siyiyilindele kuwo wonke umuntu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Abethuli bomcimbi bayojabulisa abalaleli ngabaculi abayonandisa okuyinto esithemba ukuthi iyojabulisa ababukeli njengoba ithimba elihlanganisa umcimbi lenza konke ukuthi ujatshulelwe abazobe bewubuka,” kusho uNhlanhla.Uthe abaqokwe emunxeni weRecord of the Year neMusic Video of the Year nabavotelwayo bazomenyezelwa ngoLwesine ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Sibheke phambili ukwethula umcimbi ngendlela ehlukile. Simema wonke umuntu ukuthi ahlanganyele,” kusho uNhlanhla.UNomsa Philiso wakaM-Net, uthe amaSama ngomunye umcimbi ohlonipha amaciko emculweni.“Siyaziwa ngokukhombisa izinhlelo zasekhaya eziteshini zethu ezehlukene. Siyathemba ukuthi ababukeli bethu bazowujabulela umcimbi nathi okusijabulisile ukuwusakaza kulo nyaka,” kusho uNomsa.
title: AmaSama azosakazwa kuMzansi Magic

text: AHANJISWE e-laboratory ukuze ayohlolwa ukuthi kawanabo yini ubuthi amanzi aphuzwe yiMeya yeTheku esabambile uNkk Fawzia Peer eliphuthunyiswe esibhedlela izolo.Kushone elayizolo abantu bebuzana ukuthi ngabe uNkk Peer ufakelwe ushevu yini?Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba izolo, uMasipala weTheku uthe ngeke ukwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uNkk Peer udliswe ushevu noma cha.UNkk Peer usole ngokunambitheka kwamanzi awaphuzile izolo wase ephuthunyiswa esibhedlela.“Sizolinda imiphumela yase-laboratory nombiko kadokotela kaNkk Peer ngaphambi kokuphawula okuthile ngalolu daba,” kusho abakwamasipala esitatimendeni.UNkk Peer uphuze lawa manzi emhlanganweni womkhandlu weTheku obuyizolo.Umholi wekhokhasi yeDA kuMasipala weTheku, uNksz Nicole Graham, uthe uSomlomo uMnuz Lekgoa Mapena umemezele ukuthi kunopharafini emanzini omunye umuntu.Emuva kwalokho uNkk Peer uphume esevale umlomo.UNksz Graham uveze ukuthi amakhansela ahambisana neMeya yeTheku emisiwe uNkk Zandile Gumede, abange isixakaxaka engafuni ukuthi kungene imenenja kamasipala uMnuz Sipho Nzuza.“Kuze kwangenelela onogada bakaNzuza ngesikhathi amakhansela emvimba ukuthi angene emhlanganweni,” kusho uNksz Graham.Izolo bekunezigigaba eCity Hall njengoba nabasebenzi bakadoti bebetheleke ngobuningi babo befuna ukuholelwa imali yabo njengoba sekuphele izinyanga ezimbili bengaholile.IMenenja kaMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Sipho Nzuza, isigadwa kakhulu ngoba iwufakazi woMbuso odabeni lwethenda kaR208 million oluzobuyela enkantolo ngo-Agasti 8.
title: Akukaziwa ngamanzi abebekelwe imeya ebambile eThekwini

text: KUSOLWA udlame lwamatekisi ngokubulawa kukasomatekisi nomqaphi wakhe eLamontville, eThekwini.Kuthiwa uMnuz Sibusiso “Boy” Shazi nomqaphi wakhe uMnuz Sbonelo Mazibuko, badutshulwe abantu ngoMgqibelo ebusuku, besemotweni i-Mercedes Benz, bashonela khona lapho.Yize isizathu sokubulawa kwalaba singakaveli kodwa kusolwa umbango embonini.Kuthiwa yize ebengenasikhundla kusoseshini kodwa ubeqoqa imali erenki.Kuthiwa umufi ubenesikhashana efikile kusoseshini. Kuvele ukuthi ukufika kwakhe kwakungathi uzovikela osomatekisi ngenxa yemibango ekhona. Ekuhambeni kwesikhathi kuthiwa, wafaka amatekisi akhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt. Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe kuvulwe amacala amabili okubulala, akukaboshwa muntu.Umthombo weSolezwe ocele ukungadalulwa uthe: “Into abedume ngayo umufi ukushaya abantu ngezimpama erenki. Ubengenasikhundla kodwa bekubukeka sengathi uyena ophethe ngoba ubeqoqa imali aphinde aphathe neminye imisebenzi,” kusho umthombo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje eLamontville sekwabulawa inqwaba yabantu okubalwa kubo uMnuz Vela Ndebela, indodana yakhe uMnuz Khehla Ndebela nomfundisi owadutshulwa esesontweni uMnuz Vusi MabasoKuthintwa usihlalo waseLamontville uMnuz Lwazi Bhanda, uthe ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma nabezindaba, wadlulisela intatheli kumxhumanisi wakulo soseshini, uMnuz Mandla Mnyandu.“Sicela uphinde usithinte kusasa (namhlanje) ngaloludaba, okwamanje besingakahlangani njengososeshini sikhulume ngalo. Nathi besisathole ukuthi udutshulwe izolo (NgoMgqibelo). Akukho esisengakuphawula okwamanje,” kusho uMnyandu.Isolezwe lihluleke lancama ukuthola umndeni kaShazi nokaMazibuko njengoba izinombolo zabo bezingatholakali.
title: Kusolwa udlame lwamatekisi ngabadutshulwe bafa

text: ZIFINYELELE kwangqingetshe izingxoxo zokunyuka intaba eyingcwele, iNhlangakazi neyaseKhenani ngoJanuwari wonyaka ozayo ezinhlangothini zebandla lakwaShembe, njengoba kukhona ezifuna ukuphuma ngosuku olulodwa.Umhlangano wokuhlahla indlela ngokuya ezintabeni zombili ubusesiteshini samaphoyisa kwaMashu ngoMsombuluko.Kuwona kuvele ukuthi izinhlangothi ezintathu, olwaseGinyezinye, olwasekuPhakameni nolwaseBuhleni, zifuna ukuphuma ngoJanuwari 2. Uhlangothi lwaseThembezinhle kuphela okuthiwa luveze ukuthi luzimisele ngokunyuka intaba ngoJanuwari 8.Umbango wosuku olulodwa wenze kwangafikwa esivumelwaneni ngoba zonke zizimisele ngokunyuka ngalolu suku.Isolezwe ngeSonto lithole ukuthi sekuthenjwe amaphoyisa ukuthi aqhamuke nomhlahlandlela kulolu daba njengoba nawo abeyingxenye yomhlangano.Uhlangothi lwaseGinyezinye oluholwa yiNkosi uSizwe Mudliwamafa Shembe, luveze ukuthi sekukaningi luvuma ukunyuka intaba kamuva ekubeni kunesivumelwano sesikhashana esisenkantolo, sokuthi kumele bashintshane ngokunyuka.AbaseBuhleni abaholwa iNkosi Mduduzi "Nyazilwezulu” Shembe nabo kuthiwa bakhale ngokufanayo, baveza ukuthi bona banentaba yabo iKhenani abaya kuyona.AbasekuPhakameni abaholwa yiNkosi uVukile "Incoyincoyi” Shembe kuthiwa bami kokwashiwo uMphrofethi Isaiah Shembe ukuthi uShembe osemthethweni uyonyuka intaba kuqala noma ngabe sekunombango kwaShembe.Umfundisi Joseph Mhlongo okhulumela abaseGinyezinye, uthe amukho umholi osemthethweni kunabanye, bona baye banyuke intaba kamuva benzela ukuthula kodwa kungaba wumqondo omuhle ukuthi kuqale bona kulo nyaka ngoba abasebenzisi indlela eyodwa nezinye izinhlangothi uma beya entabeni.“Inkinga abasekuPhakameni abafuni ukuthi basidedele, yingakho sigcine singavumelananga,” kusho uMfu Mhlongo. Okhulumela abasekuPhakameni, uMnuz Thetha Ngiba, uthe kungaba yiphutha elikhulu ukuthi kushintshwe usuku, banyuke kamuva intaba.“Ukunyuka kwabasekuPhakameni kuqala yisiphrofetho soMqaliwendlela ukuthi siyoyinyuka kuqala intaba thina abasekuPhakameni. Esingavumelana ngakho nezinye izinhlangothi ukunciphisa izinsuku esizozihlala entabeni, hhayi ukunyuka kamuva,” kusho uNgiba.Okhulumela uhlangothi lwaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe bona balinde izwi loNyazi ngokunyuka intaba bazokwenza okushiwo yilona.
title: Zifike kwangqingetshe izingxoxo ngeNhlangakazi

text: MHLELI: Ngithi ake ngidlulise kwelakho iphephandaba ngezinkinga nenkohlakalo okusihlasele eMlaza kodwa abantu bathule sengathi akonakele lutho.Konakele futhi ngendlela okuyiyona le nto isidinga umphakathi ukuthi uzithathele wona ngokwawo umthetho ngoba kule nto kungene kwathi shi abantu bezomthetho.Kunabantu abahamba beqola abantu imizi noma amakhaya. Ngizokwenzela isibonelo, uma emzini mumbe kungasenabazali kufika lezi zigebengu seziphethe amaphepha omgunyathi.Zifike zibatshele ukuthi umuzi ngokwemiyalelo yenkantolo usuthengiwe sekuzomele baphume bayofuna indawo yokuhlala. Babuye bathenjiswe imali encane eyisinxephezelo uma nje bezovuma ukusayina amaphepha okuvuma ukuthi umuzi bayawudedela udayise.Labo abangavumi kuzofika iqembu labantu lizokhipha ngenkani bashaywe bahlukunyezwe ngazo zonke izindlela zokusabisa. Lowo muzi uzobe usuphenduka owephoyisa. Le nto iningi nje eMlaza futhi igcwele kakhulu esigcemeni kwa-U.Uyazibuza ukuthi kanti umsebenzi wephoyisa emphakathini yini uma kuzosuka wona amaphoyisa asebenzisane nezigebengu kukhishwe abantu ezindlini zabo.Kumanje kunabantu abangazi ukuthi bazolalaphi ngoba imizi yasemakubo isiqhwagwe amaphoyisa aphatha izibhamu imini nobusuku emagcekeni ukuze uma udlula ubone nje ukuthi yimpi yodwa.Uyazibuza-ke ukuthi iphoyisa elinomuzi walo elawuthenga ngokusemthethweni kwenzeka kanjani lihlale liqalaza egcekeni lihlezi liphethe isibhamu somsebenzi ngesandlaBesicela i-Ipid ingenelele kulolu daba, ikakhulukazi kwa-U ngoba konakele. Siyadinga uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, enze uphenyo olunzulu.Angiphathi-ke okwekhansela ku-ward 86, alibizi ngisho nomhlangano kube kunezinkinga ezinzima kangaka.OkhathzekilaEMLAZA
title: Amaphoyisa aqhwaga abantu imizi yabo eMlaza

text: USHIYE imibuzo kwabaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana umhlangano wetiye womculi wokholo uThinah Zungu nomculi kaMaskandi uKhuzani  'Indlamlenze' Mpungose. Laba baculi izolo bahlangane endaweni yokudlela kuFlorida eThekwini, iNext Chapter, lapho bebonakale bephuza itiye kuhle komhlangano kowayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma nomholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema. Laba bahlangana nje uThinah ubesanda kutalajwa uNgizwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngokumhleba nozakwabo emculweni wokholo behlangane nenye yezinyanga zaseThekwini.UKhuzani ubesefaka isicelo sokuthi ahlangane noThinah bake bahlale phansi baphuze ikomishi yetiye. Lokhu kuphenduke ihlaya ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba abantu bese bebasabisa ngoNgizwe. Iningi labantu belizitshela ukuthi lona umdlalo nje ongaphelela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngeke bahlangane laba bobabili ngoba kungenzeka kungehli kahle kuNgizwe.Kodwa izolo lishone sebeliphuzile itiye kulo mgwaqo ovamise ukugcwala omtakabani nomacaphuna kusale ngenxa yokubiza kwezindawo zokudla ezikuwo. Ebuzwa uThinah mayelana nokuhlangana kwabo akazange afune ukuphumela obala. "Besihlangene ngokuhle nje akukho okutheni engingakusho ngoba besiyoziphuzela itiye. Abafowethu bonke laba noNgizwe uyazi siyazidlalela sonke kusuke kungaxatshanwa njengoba abantu sebecabanga," kusho uThinah.Izithombe zabo sezinamekwe emakhasini kaThinah ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, nabantu balokhu bephawule njalo ngazo. Babodwa abathi akubizwe uNgizwe azozibonela nokuhlangana kwalaba baculi. UKhuzani naye ngokunjalo uzinamekile lezi zithombe waze wavala ngevideo elokhu elincome njalo itiye ekhala ngobumnandi.
title: UKhuzani noThinah nomhlangano wabo wetiye

text: UPHINDE wavukwa umunyu wacishe wakhala uNdunankulu kaZulu, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, ngesikhathi ebalisa ngemizamo kahulumeni we-ANC yokuthatha umhlaba weSilo Samabandla uGoodwill Zwelithini.Ethula inkulumo emcimbini wokugubha iminyaka ewu-48 iSilo Samabandla sibusa, uButhelezi uthe kuningi okushiwo ePhalamende likazwelonke mayelana neNgonyama Trust.“Kunemizamo yokuthiabantu bakithi abahlala emhlabeni ophethwe yiNgonyama Trust ngandlela thile baphucwe amalungelo abo.“Ngifuna kucace namuhla ukuthi umthetho owasungula Ingonyama Trust kwakusoshwe ukuthi kulondolozwe umhlaba owawususalele isizwe saKwaZulu emuva kokwehlulwa. Ngikhuluma ngalezi zicwecwana ezasala iSilo sephucwa izwe,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe imphatha kabi imizamo yokuthatha izicucu zomhlaba iSilo esihleli phezu kwazo.UButhelezi uthe ukuba abawuphasisanga umthetho weNgonyama Trust leli zwe kwakuyoba ngelikahulumeni ngo-1994.“Ukuphatha abantu akuyona insangu abantu abathi bangayibhema bese becabanga ukuthi konke sekulungile. Kodwa okungithokozisa kakhulu wukuthi ngihole isizwengiya lapha eMakheni lapho inhliziyo yethu njengamaZulu iqala khona lapho izinhliziyo zamakhosi aKwaZulu zilele khona,” kusho uButhelezi.NeSilo sizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngezinhlamba okuhlaselwa ngazo ibhodi leNgonyama Trust.Sithe kodwa uma isizwe samaZulu sihlangene akekho oyosithinta.
title: UButhelezi uvukwe umunyu ebalisa ngabafuna ukuthatha umhlaba weSilo

text: Simphiwe NgubaneUZOVALWA umzila wamatekisi kufakwe amabhasi azothutha umphakathi eMzinyathi, eThekwini, ngenxa yokulwa kule mboni osekukhiphe izidumbu.UMnyango wezokuThutha, ezokuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uthe uzowuvala umzila wamatekisi uma engekho ophikisana nesiphakamiso esesigunyaziwe nesesilinde kuphele izinsuku ezingu-14.Sekushone abantu abayisishiyagalombili ngenxa yokulwa kukasoseshini waseNdwedwe neDistrict Taxi Association kulo nyaka. Sekugunyaziwe ukuvalwa komzila sekulindwe kuphele izinsuku ezingu-14, uma engekho ophikisana nakho, uzovalwa.NgoMsombuluko kuboshwe amadoda amathathu asolwa ngokuba yizinkabi, kwashaqwa nezibhamu. Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe walo mnyango eKZN, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, esithangamini nabezindaba esiteshini samaphoyisa eNanda, izolo.Ubehamba noMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa eKZN uLieutenant-General Khombinkosi Jula bezokwethula uhlelo lokulwa nobugebengu nodlame embonini yamatekisi.“Manje sandise isibalo samaphoyisa aqaphe isimo. Uzovalwa bese kuqhubeka izingxoxo ngenhloso yokuthola isisombululo. Okwethu ngukuvikela impilo yabantu,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe bakuqaphe ngelokhozi ukusebenza kososeshini waseMpumalanga, iLower South Coast, iDolphin Coast, iRichards Bay, iBambanani, Umzinto naKwaSwayimane nakhona osekuke kwaba nezidube.“Kososeshini abangu-246 KwaZulu-Natal, yidlanzana elilwayo nakhona kusuke kungabangwa imizila kepha yingxabano yangaphakathi kusoseshini. Sisebenzisana nezinhlaka zomthetho siletha uzinzo,” kusho uNtuli.UNtuli, uJula noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke uGeneral Bheki Cele bazohambela eMthwalume ngoMgqibelo ngemva kokutholakala kwezidumbu zabesifazane abahlanu epulazini likamoba kusukela ngoMashi nonyaka. NgoLwesibili nangoLwesithathu amaphoyisa athole izidumbu ezimbili ebese ziqala ukonakala.UJula uthe bazoqinisa umkhankaso olwa nokudayiswa kotshwala nogwayi baqinisekise uyathotshelwa umthetho womvalelandlini. Uthe bakhathalele impilo yawo wonke umuntu ngendlela efanayo kababheki ukuthi uhlalaphi.“Sizoqinisa isandla ekulweni nokusetshenziswa budedengu kotshwala nezidakamizwa, udlame lwasemndenini, sibhushe amahlathi silwe nodlame lwamatekisi,” kusho uJula.Kubulawe abantu abawu-4 859 KwaZulu-Natal okuyisibalo esikhuphuke ngo-10.6% uma siqhathaniswa nesangonyaka odlule. Isibalo esiphezulu kunazo zonke eminyakeni engu-10.Kunxuswe abantu ukuthi babike uma kunezehlo zodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane. Kuthiwa eNanda, eMlaza, ePlessislaer, eMpangeni, KwaDukuza, Osizweni, KwaMashu, eMountain Rise naseShowe maningi amacala athinta ucansi avulwe ngonyaka * -2019/20.IKwaZulu-Natal ngesinye sezifundazwe eziphambili ngamacala obugebengu afaka phakathi ukubulala, ukudunwa kwezimoto namacala athinta ucansi.Kuzoqiniswa imikhankaso elwa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane eNanda, eNtuzuma, KwaMashu nasePinetown. Kuthiwa amacala amaningi enzeka ngezimpelasonto kusetshenziswa isibhamu nesikhali esicijile. Abagilwa nabasolwa iningi labo intsha. Isuke isebenzisa uphuzo oludakayo nezidakamizwa. Kubulawe amaphoyisa angu-10 eKZN ngonyaka u-2019/20.
title: Kuzovalwa umzila wamatekisi osuqede abantu

text: UPHIKO oluphenya amacala abucayi kuleli, amaHawks, seluqinise ezokuphepha kulandela ukudutshulwa komunye wabaphenyi abaphambili ecaleni lenkohlakalo elithinta imeya yeTheku emisiwe uNkk Zandile Gumede nabanye osomabhizinisi. UGumede kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo namhlanje nabanye abasolwa ngecala lokudliwa kwezigidi zamarandi ethenda yokuqoqa udoti lika-R208 million. NgoLwesithathu ebusuku kuvele ukuthi omunye wabaphenyi kuleli cala usinde ngokulambisa edutshulwa eGoli ngeledlule ebheke emsebenzini, kanti amaphoyisa asaphenya ngokudutshulwa kwakhe. Okhulumela amaHawks, uBigradier Hangwani Malaudzi uthe umphenyi udutshulwe ngoLwesihlanu. Uthe ngeke lidalulwe igama lomphenyi odutshuliwe ukuze avikeleke. “Isehlo senzeke ngeledlule ngoLwesihlanu ebheke emsebenzini. Kuthiwa ubemi erobhothini ngesikhathi ehlaselwa abantu abathathu bemdubula kodwa wakwazi ukuphunyuka wabaleka. Uyiswe esibhedlela kodwa manje uselulamela ekhaya,” kusho uMalaudzi. Uthe sebeqinise ezokuphepha kubaphenyi babo abaphenya inkohlakalo komasipala kuleli kulandela lesi sehlo. “Besikulindele ukuthi izinto ezifana nalezi zizokwenzeka; besazi kukhona ozodutshulwa noma ozosatshiswa. Lesi sehlo sikuqinisekisile ebesikusola. Sibonga ukuthi umphenyi akafanga, sikuthathela phezulu ukudutshulwa kwakhe. Sisaphenya futhi siyathemba sizosithola isizathu sokudutshulwa kwakhe.”
title: Usinde ngokulambisa edutshulwa umphenyi kwelemeya yeTheku

text: INYUNYANA yothisha iNational Teachers Union (Natu), ifuna umnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo ucacise ngohlelo lothisha abanezifo  ezingamahlalakhona. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi elakuleli lisesigabeni sesithathu somvalelandlini ngemva kokugasela kwesivuvu sesibili, sobhubhane iCorona.Nyakenye umnyango ukhiphe isekhula eyayivumela othisha abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona ukuthi bahlale emakhaya, ngokwesabela impilo yabo.UNobhala weNatu uNksz Cynthia Barnes uthe ukuhoxiswa kwesekhula okwenzeke ngesikhathi elakuleli lingena esigabeni sokuqala sikathaqa, kudala ukudideka kothisha ngoba izwe selibuyele esigabeni sesithathu.“Othisha bafuna ukwazi ngaphambi kokuvulwa kwezikole ukuthi umnyango ume kuphi ngalolu daba.
