Ubumqoka bale sekhula kulesi simo esikuso sesivuvu sesibili seCovid 19, busekhona,”  kusho uNksz Barnes.Ubekhuluma emhlanganweni obubanjwe ngezobuchwepheshe yile nyunyana izolo lapho uMnuz Sibusiso Malinga ethulwe ngokomthetho njengobambe kwesikamengameli weNatu, ngemva ukushona ngokuzuma kowayengumengeli uMnuz Allen Thompson emasontweni amathathu edlule, kwathi uMnuz Given Mandlenkosi Mabuza waqokwa wayiphini.Mayelana nokuhlehliswa kokuvulwa kwezikole nohlelo lokubuyela kothisha ezikoleni, i-Natu ithi umnyango ujaha ukumemezela izinqumo ozenza ngaphandle kokuxhumana nezinyunyana.“Ukuhlehliswa kokuvulwa kwezikole bekwenzelwe ukugwema ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane ezikoleni.  Pho kungani kujahwa ukubuyiselwa othisha ngoba akukho okushintshile, sisesigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa“  kubuza uNksz Barnes.Ekhuluma neSolezwe  uMalinga uthe sikhulu isikhala esishiywe nguMnuz Thompson ngoba ubengumuntu osebenza ngokuzikhandla kakhulu.“Kuyaqala emlandweni wale nyunyana ukuthi umengameli ashone kuseyihlandla lakhe lokuqala.  Lokhu kushiye isikhala esikhulu kumalungu ethu nomphakathi ngoba bekuwumuntu obesebenza ngokuzikhandla. Ngakho sizoqhubeka lapho egcine khona, ngokuphakamisa izinto ezikhathaza othisha ngaphandle kokwesaba,”  kusho uMalinga.UMalinga uthe iCovid 19 yenza kungahlanganwa kodwa uma isimo sidlula bazokwazi ukumenzela inkonzo yesikhumbuzo, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abantu abahlukunyezwe ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni, bayaphola.
title: I-Natu imemezele ongena kwesikaThompson

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMisebenzi, uMnuz Thulas Nxesi, udonse abaqashi ngendlebe ukuthi bangaphoqi abasebenzi ukuthi bahlabe ikhefu elingakhokheliwe kodwa bafake izicelo zoxhaso uma izinkampani zabo zizothwala kanzima ngenxa yeCoronavirus.UNxesi, obekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba ebesisePitoli izolo, uthe kumphatha kabi ukuzwa ukuthi kunabaqashi abaphoqa abasebenzi ukuthi bahlabe ikhefu elingakhokhelwa ekubeni zikhona ezinye izindlela.“Akukwazi ukuthi kube nabaqashi abangabaholelile abasebenzi umholo kaMashi ngoba kunezinhlelo ezihlanganisa iCovid-19 National benefit. Uhlelo lwethu lubhekelela abasebenzi abazobe behleli ekhaya izinsuku eziwu-21 uma izwe livaliwe. Asithandi abaqashi baxoshe abasebenzi yingakho sinalolu hlelo. Siyacela izinkampani zixoxe noMnyango wezabaSebenzi ukuze zichazelwe ngezinhlelo ezehlukene zokuzilekelela,” kusho uNxesi.Uthe abaqashi abaphoqa abasebenzi ukuthi bathathe ikhefu elingakhokhelwe ngaphandle kokucela usizo eMnyangweni wezabaSebenzi bazothathelwa izinyathelo.Uzothumela ithimba labacwaningi ezinkampanini ezisebenzisa abasebenzi ngenkani yize bengebona abasebenzi abadingekayo noma abakha imikhiqizo edingekayo kulesi sikhathi.Abasebenzi abaphoqwa ukuthi basebenze ngenkani kufanele bayovula icala emaphoyiseni ngoba uRegulation 11 G womthetho wabasebenzi wenza kube yicala ukuphoqa umuntu ukuthi asebenze kulesi sikhathi ebe engakhiqizi impahla edingekayo uma izwe livaliwe.“Abaqashi sifuna bafake izicelo zokunxephezela abasebenzi ngoba imali sizoyithatha kwi-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF). Kulula uma imali siyifakela abaqashi bese beyidlulisela kubasebenzi. Asithandi ukuthi abantu bagcwale emahhovisi oMnyango wezabaSebenzi ngoba kuzosuke kugcwale ngokweqile kodwa singajabula uma abaqashi besilekelela ngoba bona banama-akhawunti abasebenzi. Sifuna ukufaka imali ezikhwameni zezimboni ezithile ezizokwazi ukuyidlulisela kubasebenzi,” kusho uNxesi.Uthe badinga ukusayina isivumelwano sokusebenzisana nezimboni ezehlukene ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi imali iyadlulela kubasebenzi.Ubonge abemboni yendwangu abasheshe baphumela obala benza uhlelo lokuholela abasebenzi ngesikhathi izwe livaliwe.Abanemibuzo ngohlelo lokuholelwa yi-UIF bangayishayela ku-012 337 1997 kusukela ngo-8 ekuseni kuya ku-8 ebusuku ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu.
title: ‘Abaqashi abafake izicelo zokuxhaswa’

text: ANGAPHEZULUkuka-400 amalungu e-ANC angakwazanga ukuvotela abaholi abaphezulu ukuhola le nhlangano izolo njengoba amanye amagatsha echithiwe ukuthi avote kule ngqungquthela.Lokhu kulandela isinqumo senkantolo yaseFree State echithe ingqungquthela yakulesi sifundazwe okwenze amalungu esigungu sesifundazwe angu-27 angavota. NaKwaZulu-Natal kube ngesifanayo njengoba amalungu esigungu sesifundazwe nawo engavunyelwanga ukuthi avote. Kulesi sifundazwe amalunguangu-12 esigungu esifundazwe aye kule ngqungquthela njengamalungu egatsha okubalwa kuwo uSihlalo ochithwe yinkantolo uMnuz Sihle Zikalala noNobhala uMnuz Super Zuma.UNksz Jessie Duarte, iPhini likaNobhala we-ANC, uqinisekise abezindaba esithangamini izolo ukuthi akuzange kunyuswe izibalo zamalungu azothamela ingqungquthela.Usho lokhu nje kube nemibiko ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ebithi kukokotelwe izibalo zamalungu athamele ingqungquthela. Kwenzeka lokhu nje kube nesikhulu isikhalo kwamanye amalungu athe ngqu afica izindawo zawo sezithathwe amanye amalungu.“Kube nokubambezeleka ekutheni siphothule uhlelo lokuqinisekisa ukuthi umuntu okhona kufanele abe kule ngqungquthela ngenxa yezinqumo zezinkantolo zakamuva. Besingafuni ukuxhamazela bese siyiswa enkantolo ngalolu daba. Kunamagatsha achithiwe eNorth West angu-35, namanye amalungu eFree State ngoba sesibhekile sathola ubufakazi ukuthi awazange ahlale,” kusho uNksz Duarte.Uthe asengu-4 776 amalungu azovota kule ngqqungquthela njengoba engaphezulu kuka-5 000 akhona noma abelindelekile kule ngqungquthela.Ukuze ozowina adle umhlanganiso kudingeka athole amavoti angu-2 389 kuya phezulu.Uthe akuyona into entsha ukuthi kubambezeleke ingqungquthela ngenxa yokuthi basuke besabhekisisa indaba yokuthi ngobani okumele babe sengqungqutheleni.“Akuyona into encane ukuyenza ngoba kudingeka uchazele amalungu ukuthi kungani echithwa engqungqutheleni. Kumele amalungu lawo aguqulwe enziwe amalungu angavoti.Kube nokubambezeleka kwengqungquthela yagcina ngokuthi iguqe ngoMgqibelo ebusuku kubangwa indaba yokuthi ubani okumele abe kule ngqungquthela.Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, uthe ingqungquthela izosongwa ngoLwesithathu njengoba bekuhleliwe ngekeilulwe.Usho lokhu nje yingoba izolo ntambama bekuyima kwethulwa umbiko kaNobhala jikelele uMnuz Gwede Mantashe obekuhlelwe ukuthi wethulwe ngoMgqibelo.
title: Baphika eyokuphekwa kwezibalo

text: UMENGAMELI wezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa umemezele ukuthi ukutshalwa kwemali engu-R290 billion emnothweni wakuleli kuzokwenza umehluko njengoba isimo siya ngokushuba emnothweni wezwe.URamaphosa ubekhuluma engqungqutheleni yezokutshalwa kwezimali ebiseGoli. Abatshalizimali bezinkampani ezahlukene bathembise ukuthi bazofaka izizumbulu emnothwnei wakuleli kuvuleke namathuba emisebenzi.Le ngqungquthela ibithanyelwe yizithunywa ezibalelwa ku-1 300 ezivela emazweni ehlukene kubhungwa ngamaqhinga okulekelelana ekufukuleni umnotho.‘’Ngeke kugcine ngezethembiso nje kuphela kodwa kuzofakwa imali ngempela kulesi sivumelwano esinaso,’’ kusho uRamaphosa.Le mali ifakwa nje uRamaphosa usanda kwenza isethembiso sokuthi uzozamela elakuleli imali elinganiselwa kuR 1.2 trillion kubatshalizimali ukwenza ngcono isimo somnotho kuleli.Uthe lokhu uzokwenza eminyakeni emihlanu ezayo ngokuhamba efongqa isigqoko emazweni ehlukene.Phakathi kwezinkampani ezithembisa ukufaka imali khona nezikhondlakhonda i-Anglo American ezofaka uR 17.5 billion. Kukhona nenkampani yaseRwanda iMara Corporation.INingizimu Afrika ihlaselwe ukuntenga komnotho lokhu okuholela ekwenyukeni kwentengo yezinto ezifana nophethroli owenyuka uphindelela nokukhalisa abantu kakhulu.URamaphosa uthe nakanjani le mali ezotshalwa izofana nomjovo ozophaphamisa umnotho osegumbini labagula kakhulu.
title: URamaphosa umemezele ukutshalwa kwezizumbulu

text: UCHITHA eyokukhetha imidlalo kwabadlali bakhe umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uGiovanni Solinas, ongakawini nowokubika umdlalo we-Absa Premiership kusukela efikile eNaturena.Amakhosi aqale isizini ngendlela ethembisayo edlala ngokulingana neMamelodi Sundowns emdlalweni weligi. Lokhu kulandelwe wukushaya into ecokeme koweMTN8 ekhipha iFree State Stars ngo 3-0.Nokho kuhlakazeke konke ngesikhathi iChiefs ibuyiselwa kwamhlaba yiBidvest Wits, iyithela ngehlazo lika 3-1 eFNB Stadium emasontweni edlule. IChiefs ishayane yaze yabukana neBaroka FC emdlalweni ophele ngo 1-1, yaphinde yahluleka wukubuya namaphuzu eMgungundlovu ngesikhathi idlala ngokulingana ngo 0-0 neMaritzburg United.Indlela iChiefs edlale ngayo koweMTN 8 neyeligi ishiye imibizo kwabaningi ngokukhetha imidlalo kwabadlali beChiefs abanengcindezi yokuwina indebe emuva kwamasizini amathathu esomiso. Ngaphandle kwalokho iMTN 8 iyindlela esheshayo yokwenza imali nokubuyisa ukwethenjwa ngabalandeli.Amakhosi azobhekana neSuperSport United kowomlenze wokuqala wowandulela owamanqamu weMTN8 eLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli, ngeSonto ngo-3 ntambama.“KwiChiefs asiyikhethi imidlalo, sizama ukuwina yonke imidlalo esiyidlalayo. Akwenzeki siqoke ukuthi sifuna ukuwina muphi, siyeke muphi. KwiChiefs sihlale silungiselela ukuwina. Yikusasa lami nabadlali kwiChiefs,” kusho uSolinas.“Sizobhekana neqembu elinzima iSuperSport, elinabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu nomqeqeshi oseqophelweni. Ngiyazi ukuthi umdlalo unemilenze emibili kodwa ngeke sikunake lokho. Sizosebenzela ukuwina yomibili imidlalo. Lo mdlalo siwuthatha njengonemizuzu engu-180. ISuperSport ihlule i-Orlando Pirates, AmaZulu neWits. Iyiqembu elinzima. Kodwa angesabi, ngiyabethemba abadlali bami.”NgoLwesithathu iChiefs isayinise uLebogang Manyama obekade edlala eTurkey, noMario Booysen ogawulwe yizembe ne-Ajax Cape Town. Ngaphandle kwalokho kuvele izindaba zokuthi uSiphiwe Tshabalala noBernard Parker basendleleni ephumayo eNaturena. UTshabalala kuvela ukuthi ufunwa yi-Erzurumspor yaseTurkey futhi iChiefs kuthiwa isivumile ukumdedela.“Angithandi ukukhuluma indaba yabadlali abahambayo nabafunwa yiqembu. UTshabalala noParker bajimile neqembu ekuseni. Okwami wukuqeqesha abadlali abakhona eqenjini. Uma nabo besekhona ngizobaqeqesha,” kusho uSolinas.“ULebo ungumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu, uzosisiza kakhulu ekushayeni amagoli. Sinabo abadlali abafana noKhama (Billiat), Castro (Leornado), Moon (Ryan) noParker kodwa uLebo uzokwengenza ekuhlaseleni ukuze sithole amagoli. Emdlalweni wangeSonto ngeke adlale ngoba akakabi qatha ngokwanele. Uma eselungile, uzosisiza sithole imiphumela.”Umqeqeshi weSuperSport, uKaitano Tembo, uthe uzimisele ngokuvikela indebe yeMTN 8. UTembo ubekade eyiphini likaStuart Baxter ngesizini edlule ngesikhathi beyiwina behlula iCape Town City kowamanqamu.“Bengikhona eqenjini eliyiwinile ngesizini edlule. Nginengcindezi yokuyigcina eqenjini. Umehluko ukuthi ngaleso sikhathi bengiyiphini kodwa izinqumo bezithathwa ngokuhlanganyela. Kufanele siyivikele indebe, bese sigxila kwiligi. Imidlalo emibili edlule isinike ukuzethemba kakhulu kodwa ngeke sikhohlwe wukuthi sidlala neqembu elikhulu iChiefs, siyazi ukuthi kuzoba nzima,” kusho uTembo.
title: Asiyikhethi imidlalo - Solinas

text: UKHATHAZEKILE umndeni kajele waseWestville oduke eya emsebenzini.UNksz Nondumiso Nkabinde waseNanda uduke ngoNovemba 2 eya emsenzini. Umndeni kajele uthe ubuzitshela ukuthi uzobuya kwangenzeka.Unina omncane kaNksz Nkabinde (32), uNksz Dedi Nkabinde, uthe baqale ukukhathazeka bebona engabuyi nezinsuku zanda. “Samgcina ngoLwesihlanu eya emsebenzini sazitshela ukuthi kukhona lapho eye khona. Kuthe ziqhubeka izinsuku sathinta abasemsebenzini sibuza ukuthi bamgcina nini bathi ngoLwesihlanu akazange afike emsebenzini. Sibe sesikhathazeka. Iselula yakhe ibingasangeni kuze kube manje,” kusho uNksz Nkabinde.Uthe abazi lutho ngesoka ngaphandle kukayise wezingane zakhe ohlala ePitoli wathi sebethinte bonke abantu bebuza ngoNksz Nkabinde kodwa abatholi lutho. “Sesivule icala. Siyathemba uzotholakala ephila,” kusho uNksz Nkabinde.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe basamthungatha. Amaphoyisa anxuse ongaba nolwazi ngokuduka kwakhe ukuba athinte amaphoyisa ngokushesha.
title: Kuthungathwa ujele waseWestville odukile

text: SEKUPHINDE kwahoxa esinye isihlabani sikamaskandi kuMantshontsho Kamaskandi Awards, uPhumlani ‘Imfezemnyama’ Khumalo waMabunjwa wodumo lwengoma ethi Uhlanya Lwami nethi Wayimosha Le nto. Ngesonto eledlule kuphume uKhuzani neGcokama Elisha abakhala ngokungeneliseki ngalo mqhudelwano osuvumbulule omaskanda abaningi okubalwa kubo naMabhenanyawo.Imfezemnyama iqophe i-video yayifaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana inxusa abalandeli bayo ukuba bangalinge bayivotele kulo mqhudelwano wezindondo ngoba ayihlanganise lutho nawo.Imfezemnyama iqokwe ngeqembu layo Amabunjwa kwiBest Male Group lapho iqhathwe khona naMageza Amahle, Amagcokama, Osaziwayo naManguni Amahle yabuye yafakwa nakoweBest Supporters, nakhona etholene phezulu naMageza noSaziwayo.Ichaza Imfezemnyama ithe ithathe isinqumo sokuhoxa emiqhudelwaneni ngenxa yokwenziwa impatha isikhathi eside.“Uma kwenziwa izinto kuthiwa Imfezemnyama akufanele isale noma ingabibikho. Kodwa ukwenziwa kwale nto ngisuke ngenziwa impatha, sengenziwe impatha kakhulu.” Uthe kuqale ngesikhathi ekhiphe iCD ethi Omahlalela, athi yashisa izikhotha kodwa wahlulwa ngabaculi abangadumile.Uthe okumcika kakhulu wukuthi kule miqhudelwano uhlulwa ngabaculi abangekho ezingeni noma kwenzeka iwina ayitholi ngisho indibilishi.Imfezemnyama yake yaqopha umlando iqumba phansi Indidane kwiBest Male kumaSatma Awards ngo2013.“Indaba yaMantshontsho ngicela ukungalokhu ngibalwa kuyona kakhulu, angisafuni ukungenela ama-awards.” Ithe nezindondo eke yaziwina isiziphihlizile, ezinye yazilahla ngoba ayikaze ithole ngisho isenti ngazo.“Angingalokhu ngifakwa kuMantshontsho, angenelisekile ngaMantshontsho akhona. Engikuchazayo bafowethu ngicela nime ukuvota, Imfezemnyama izobe ingekho lapho futhi nanoma yimaphi ama-awards ngizobe ngingekho kuwona,” kuphetha Imfezemnyama.Okhulumela aMantshontsho Kamaskandi Awards, uZazi Nxele, uthe baphoxekile ngesenzo seMfezemnyama ngoba bebazi ukuthi banobudlelwano obuhle nayo ngisho nakweminye imicimbi. Uthe bekufanele iqale ixhumane nabo ngaphambi kokugijimela kwi-video.Echaza ngokuqokwa kwabaculi uZazi uthe bekuqale kucutshungulwe abangenile bese kubhekwa nabangangenelanga kodwa abanamagalelo emculweni.“Sekunabaculi asebezakhela udumo ngokuhoxa kuMantshontsho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Bahlulwa yini ukuxhumana nathi ukuze sibakhiphe kahle hhayi ukuthi benze ama-video? Akekho umculi ophoqwayo ukuba angenele.”
title: Omunye ohoxe kuMantshontsho

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEU PHITHENE amakhanda umndeni wakwaZondi epulazini eliseHowick ngaseMgungundlovu emuva kokubhidlizwa komuzi, okusolwa umalume ngesigameko.Lo mndeni onamalungu ayisikhombisa okubalwa nengane eneminyaka emibili, usuhamba uquba komakhelwane kusukela ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule.Kuthiwa uMnuz John Zondi wafika nesagila waphihliza wonke umuzi. Lokhu kwenzeka phambi kukaNkk Elizabeth Zondi (65), nomzukulu oneminyaka emibili.Okhulumela umndeni uMnuz Siyabonga Zondi (26) uthe wafica unina esehlezi emnyango.“Sisangene asazi kumele senzenjani. Salala emnyango ngelanga lesigameko sabuye sacela komakhelwane nasezihlotsheni ukucushiswa.“Umalume ufike wagqekeza zonke izindlu, akazange abeke isizathu ngokubhidliza kwakhe kodwa sisola ukuthi ufuna imali kumnikazi wepulazi ngenxa yesethembiso esenziwa ngabadala,” kusho uMnuz Zondi.Kulo muzi kudilizwe izindlu ezintathu, eyokuqala enamagumbi amahlanu, enye inamagumbi amabili okulala nekhishi bese kuba yindlu enkulu eyikhishi. Leli pulazi kwakungelomlungu walidayisela uMnuz Thulani Ndlela weBusiness Zone.UMnuz Ndlela ethintwa ngalolu daba uthe naye washaqeka uma “umalume” ediliza umuzi ngoba akazange awuxoshe lo mndeni epulazini lakhe.“Anginankinga nalo mndeni ukuba uhlale lapha kuze kube bathola indawo. Nami ngafonelwa ngatshelwa ukuthi umalume ungene epulazini lami ngaphandle kwemvume wadiliza zonke izindlu.“Ngafika ngabona ugogo nengane sebehlezi emnyango.“Ngicabanga ukuthi okususe umsindo yimali abathenjiswa yona wumlungu owangidayisela ipulazi.“Baba nesivumelwano ngemali engingayazi, wathi uzobanikeza uhhafu wokwakhwa indlu kwenye indawo, bese kuthi uhhafu abanikeze uma sebehamba epulazini, sebedilize konke,” kusho uNdlela.Uthe uyafisa ukusiza lo mndeni osusele wodwa kuleli pulazi osuhlale kulo iminyaka engaphezu kuka-30.Amaphoyisa angavumelekile ukuphawula kwabezindaba athe ayalwazi udaba kodwa akukho cala elisavuliwe.Umndeni uthe uye esiteshini samaphoyisa eHowick ufuna ukuvula icala kodwa bathi kumele balungise udaba njengomndeni.Imizamo yokuthola umalume wakwaZondi ayizange iphumelele.
title: Basele dengwane abadilizelwe umuzi wabo

text: KUPHITHENE amakhanda kubaphathi bakaMasipala wasoLundi emuva kokuthi kugqekezwe amahhovisi awo kwebiwa u-R80 000 ngempelasonto edlule.Imali kuthiwa ibigcinwe emahhovisi kamasipala ngenxa yokuthi izimoto eziyilandayo zingafikanga ngenxa yeholidi.Kuthiwa indaba yokwebiwa kwemali ibifihliwe ngenxa yokuthi sekuvamisile ukuthi kugqekezwe kwebiwe imali enkulu.IMeya yasoLundi, uMnuz Mfana Ntshangase, ithe bashaqekile ngoba kudaleke umonakalo omkhulu.“Imali eyebiwe yileyo esuke ivela kubantu abazokhokhela ama-rates nogesi nokunye kumasipala. Ngenxa yokuthi kule mpelasonto esisuka kuyo bekuneholidi, izimoto zezinkampani zonogada ezisithathela yona, azifikanga yase igcinwa emahhovisi. Ngaleyo ndlela izigebengu zithole ithuba lokugqekeza zalimaza okuningi zashaqa imali,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe akusikhona okokuqala kwenzeka lokhu.“Akungiphathi kahle lokho okushoyo kokuthi kuthiwa siyazifihla izindaba kulo masipala. Empeleni indlela obuza ngayo ikhomba ukuthi ufuna ukuhlanekezela izinto. Thina akukho esingakubiki. Ngisho kulahleke imali yokuqala sawabikela amaphoyisa kodwa akukaze kuboshwe muntu. Nakulokhu sibikile emaphoyiseni. Icala silivulie emaphoyiseni aseMagudwini, oLundi.Usungaziphenyela wena bakunike inombolo yecala,” kusho uNtshangase.UNtshangase uthe abagqekeze emahhovisi bafike babopha onogada base beshaya amafastela bangena bagqekeza isisefo semali.Uthe okokuqala bafika bathatha unogada bambopha bamvalela endlini encane bagqekeza iminyango bangena bashaqa yonke imali.Uthe udaba balubikile emkhandlwini wamakhansela njengoba behlale benza.Uthe konke okwenzekayo bakubika kuzona zonke izinhlaka eziqondene nabo. Ubebala noMnyango wezokuBusa nokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, okaMgcinimafa neminye.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokugqekeza nelokweba kodwa akukaboshwa muntu.
title: Kugqekezwe kwamasipala oLundi kwebiwa uR80 000

text: ABESIFAZANE uma besezinsukwini zabo, baba nolaka bacasulwe nayizinto ezincane, bazizwe bekhathele futhi bedangele. Konke lokhu kusuke kudalwa wukuphazamiseka kwama-hormone ngalesi sikhathi sokuya esikhathini.Ongoti bathi akubona abesifazane bodwa abazithola benale nkinga, kodwa nabesilisa njalo ngenyanga kukhona isikhathi lapho beke bazizwe khona benale mizwa. Bathi kuba nzima ukuqonda ukuthi lokhu kwenziwa yini, yingakho iningi lijwayele ukuzitshela ukuthi licasuka ngoba liyacasulwa noma ukudangala kubangwa yizinkinga nezinselelo owesilia asuke enazo.“Inkinga ebizwa nge-Irritable Men Syndrome ihlasela inqwaba yamadoda. Okubuhlungu wukuthi abanye ibhebhetheka baze benze umonakalo bengakutholi ukwelashwanokwenza izaba ngayo ngoba iyinto enganakwa nje,” kusho ungoti oseke wenza ucwaningo ngale nkinga yamadoda, uDkt Gerald Lincohn.I-hormone edume kakhulu emadodeni ngokwenza umsebenzi wokunikeza umdlandla wocansi, wokusiza ukuthi babe yizidlakela uma bejima, ukuzethemba nakho kuqhamuka kula mahomoni nokunye, i-testosterone, iyona futhi okuthi uma yehlile emzimbeni idale izinkinga ezihambisana nolaka olungaqondakali.Bathi ukwehla kweTestosterone kusuke kudalwa nawukuthi kunezikhathi lapho ikwazi khona ukuziphendula ibe ngolunye uhlobo lwehomoni okuyi-Estrogen.Lo ngoti uthi izinga lalolu hlobo lwe-hormone lungaqala ukwehla kwabesilisa abaneminyaka eko-30.Echaza uthi leli hormone liyakwenza ukuthi lishintshe usuku nosuku, ekuseni libe phezulu kuthi ngezikhathi zokulala libe phansi.Lokhu kugqama kakhulu emadodeni othola ukuthi ekuseni azizwa elangazelela kakhulu ucansi kodwa ebusuku induku ingafuni lutho.“Kubalulekile kodwa ukusho ukuthi indlela yokwehla nokwenyuka kwale homoni ayifani indoda nendoda,” usho kanje embikweni iHuman Reproductive Science, owacwaninga kabanzi ngalokhu ezilwaneni, okugcine ngokuthi kucwaningwe nakuwona amadoda.Uthi abantu abazithola besenkingeni, amakhosikazi ahlala nalaba besilisa aze agcine ezitshela ukuthi mhlawumbe obaba banolaka uma beholile (kulabo le nkinga ebahlasela kanye ngenyanga).Ukwazi ukuthi yini engenza ukuthi i-testosterone yakho yehle yikhona okubalulekile ukulwa nale nkinga uma uzibona ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi ikuhlasele.Nazi ezinye izimpawu zale nkinga:* Wukwehla komdlandla wocansi noma kuthi noma induku ivuka, ibuye ikhophoze usathi usephakathi nomsebenzi.* Ukuqothuka kwezinwele* Ukwanda kwamafutha emzimbeni okungaziveza ngokuchicha ebusweni uma uvuka noma ekupheleni kosuku.* Ukukhukhumala kwezibele, kube sengathi uyahlosa* Wukukhathala okungaqondakali* Yimicabango eminingi efika yelakanyana ehlanganisa izinto ezimbi esezike zakwehlela, abantu asebeke bakucasula. Konke kuvuka kube kusha. Lokhu kubizwa wodokotela bengqondo ngokuthi yiBrain Fog.* Wukucasulwa yinto encane udinwe uthelwe ngamanzi* Ukuzizwa sengathi awuyinto yalutho noma uyisehluleki* Ukwehla kokuzethemba, ubone sengathi abantu bakuthatha kancaneKubalulekile nokho ukwazi ukuthi lezi zimpawu ezingenhla zingahambisana nokhwantalala, yingakho kubalulekile ukuthi uma ubona lolu shintsho usheshe ufune usizo ukuze uyiqonde inkinga yakho.Ukudla okuthengwa sekuvuthiwe-Lolu hlobo lokudla lunosawoti oyingozi kule hormone. Ngapphandle kokuthi kwenza umonakalo nasezingeni lembewu yowesilisa (sperm count), kodwa i-sodium etholakala enqwabeni yalolu hlobo lokudla, yehlisa izinga le-testosterone endodeni.Amafutha okuvamise ukuthi kuphekwe ngawo, i-vegetable oil-Uhlobo lwamafutha oluhlanganisa nokubizwa nge-polyunsaturated fatty acids kuyalwehlisa izinga.UtshwalaUkuphuza ingilazi yewayini uma usuyolala, kuchazwa wodokotela njengento enhle kakhulu emzimbeni womuntu, kodwa ukubhubhuza otshwaleni kuyalehlisa le hormone.Yingakho abesilisa abaphuza kakhulu begcina belishalazela ikamelo. Kubalulekile nokubalula ukuthi odokotela bathi kwabesifazane utshwala buyalenyusa leli homoni bese belangazelela kakhulu utshwala, kodwa kwabesilisa utshwala buyalona.Amakinati-Uke uzwe amakinati esebizwa ngomvusa nkunzi ngenxa yokuthi bukhona ubufakazi bokuthi anomthelela omuhle emizweni yocansi kwabesilisa. Kodwa lukhona uhlobo lwamakinati alehlisayo izinga le-lestosterone kwabesilisa. Ama-walnuts nama-almonds abalwa kulolo hlobo lwamakinati.Nakhu okunye ukudla ongaqinisa kukhona ukukhuphula izinga leTestosterone:I-TUNAUVitamin D okulolu hlobo lukafishi wenza omkhulu umsebenzi kulama hormone.UBISI I-LOW FATNalo lugabe ngawo uVitamin DISIKHUPHASHAKuyaye kuthiwe abantu abaqinise emkhwepheni eqandeni ngoba lokhu okuphuzi kunyusa iCholesterol, okungamafutha angadingeki emzimbeni, kodwa ngakolunye uhlangothi, okuphuzi eqandeni kungakusiza ukwenyusa leli homoni njengoba kugabe ngemisoco enzulu.INYAMA EBOMVUNalolu hlobo lwenyama kuye kuthiwe alulungile njengoba ukuludla ngokwedlulele kudala iGout emadodeni, kodwa ngaphandle kwalokho, inyama ebomvu inothe ngeZinc edume kakhulu ukwenyusa izinga leTestosterone.
title: Ezempilo: Abesilisa nabo bayaya njalo 'ezinsukwini zabo'

text: UPHITHENE ikhanda owesifazane waseMgungundlovu othi webelwe ingane ngumlisa obeyisoka likamngani wakhe ngoba lithi lifuna babuyelane.UNksz Lindiswa Khuboni waseSwapo, eMgungundlovu, uthe akasabulali ubuthongo kusuka kunyamalale indodana yakhe u-Andile Malwande Fihla okusolwa ukuthi ithunjwe ngumlisa owayeyisoka likamngani wakhe.Uthe indodana yakhe beyisendleleni eya esikoleni ngoLwesihlanu emasontweni amabili edlule ngesikhathi lo mlisa eyimisa ethi ufuna inombolo kanina.Uthe ngokujwayelekile u-Andile uvame ukuthi ahambe nomzala wakhe wentombazane olingana naye uma eya esikoleni uMsilinga Primary, eZinketheni.“Nangalolu suku ubehamba naye kwase kuqhamuka * %4$#@*& (emgagula ngegama) wabamisa wase ethi ucela u-Andile amnike inombolo yami. Bathe uma bemtshela ukuthi basaphuthuma esikoleni wathi * -Andile akasale, umzala wakhe aqhubeke aye esikoleni uzomfica endleleni kodwa akabange esafika esikoleni,” kusho uNksz Khuboni.Uthe indodana yakhe ayikaze ibuye ekhaya kusuka kwenzeka lesi sigameko. Ngokusho kwakhe lo mlisa bazama ukumshayela ucingo bekhuluma naye ngoba bethi uzoyibuyisa ingane kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.“Ethintwa uvumile ukuthi ingane ikuyena. Uthe ngeke ayibuyise intombi yakhe ingakabuyelani naye. Ungisole ngokugxambukela ezindabeni zabo wathi yingakho ethathe ingane,” kusho uNksz Khuboni.Uthe begcina ukumshayela ucingo ubeseluvalile selungena ku-voicemail.UNksz Khuboni uthe sebeyile lapho obekuhlala khona lo mlisa kodwa kuthiwa akekho khona futhi nezihlobo zakhe zithi azimazi ukuthi ukuphi.Uthe lolu daba lubikiwe emaphoyiseni kanti ayazama ukumsiza kodwa namanje ingane ayikatholakali.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aseMountain Rise avule icala lokuthumba lase lidluliselwa ethimbeni eliphenya ngamacala odlame lwemindeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala ocansi eMgungundlovu ukuze liphenye.UCol Mbele uthe kukholakala ukuthi u-Andile wayesendleleni eya esikoleni ngesikhathi ethunjwa.Unxuse noma ngubani onganolwazi ngokuthi ukuphi nanoma ubani obone lesi sigameko ukuthi athinte umphenyi uDetective Sergeant Ntombela ku-083 939 8853.
title: Kusolwa obeyisoka likamngani ngengane elahlekile

text: OWAYENGU Khomishina  kwaSouth African Revenue Services (Sars) uMnuz  Tom Moyane usekuqinisekisile ukuthi irogue unit beyikhona futhi isebenza, ummeli wakhe uthe uzimisele ngokufakaza ngalokhu akushoyo.Ummeli kaMoyane uEric Mabuza uthe uma engase inkantolo uMoyane ukuthi avele azofakaza ngakwaziyo, lokho angakwenza ngaphandle kwenkinga kwazise akekho ongaphikisana nomyalelo wenkantolo.“Angabethula ubufakazi uma inkantolo imyalela ukuthi enze njalo,” kusho uMabuza ekhuluma ngoMoyana ngesikhathi ebuzwa i-Independent Media ukuthi angakwazi yini ukukufungela lokhu akushoyo.Kodwa ummeli akakwazanga ukuphendula umbuzo wokuthi uMoyane ucabangani  ngesinqumo sikaNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni uPravin Gordhan.Ngesonto eledlule lo mlisa owaxoshwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngoNovemba wonyaka odlule uyena owavula icala evulela i-unit.Uthe ezinye izinto ezathengwa zisebenziselwa ukumpimpa, amakhamera, imishini yokuqopha, ukujenywa kwama cellular, okwakwenziwela ukuphazamisa ezokuxhumana phakathi kwama phone nama cellular..“Ngavula icala esiteshini samaphoyisa eBrooklyn ngoMeyi 2015, nabasebenzi ababili bafika nabo bavuma ukuthi bazokuba ngofakazi bahulumeni," kuchaza isitatimende esithunyelwe uMoyane.Okhulumela amaHawks uCaptain Llyod Ramovha uthe izolo bebesematasa bebheka izivumelwano bazokwazi ukuqinisekisa konke ngoLwesibili.
title: Uzimisele ngokuthula ubufakazi owayenguKhomishan kwaSars

text: I-KAIZER Chiefs izovuselela inkontileka yensika yomdlali uSiphiwe “Shabba” Tshabalala oyisithandwa sabalandeli baMakhosi. Inkontileka kaShabba neChiefs iyaphela ngoJuni.Lezi zindaba zitshelwe Isolezwe nguJazzman Mahlakgane ophethe izindaba zaleli nxele eseliphenduke ingwazi yeChiefs.“Siyakhuluma neChiefs ngenkontileka entsha kaShabba. Weneme kwiChiefs futhi neqembu leneme ngomsebenzi wakhe. Njengamanje sesikhuluma indaba yezinombolo ngemuva kwalokho bese siyaqeda,” kusho uMahlakgane.UTshabalala ufike kuMakhosi ngo-2007 esuka kwiFree State Stars. Kuleli qembu usezinqobe zonke izicoco eNingizimu Afrika. Usenqobe izicoco ezimbili ze-Absa Premiership, ezintathu zeTelkom Knockout neseNedbank Cup.Kwelesizwe usedlale imidlalo engu-91 washaya amagoli angu-12.“Noma kanjani uShabba uzohlala kwiChiefs. Kungenzeka ivuselelwe ngonyaka inkontileka nombandela wokuthi yelulwe uma isiphela. Njengamanje yinto esiyixoxayo neChiefs,” kusho uMahlakgane.UTshabalala (33) usedlale kuMakhosi imidlalo engaphezu kuka-300 washaya amagoli angaphezu kuka-50. Usedlale esigabeni esikhokhelayo iminyaka angu-14. Wazakhela igama ngeNdebe yoMhlaba yokuqala esike yadlalelwa e-Afrika ngesikhathi eshayela iBafana Bafana igoli idlala ngokulingana neMexico eFNB Stadium, eSoweto, eGoli ngo-2010 eNingizimu Afrika.Leli goli lagcina lifakwe ohlwini lwamagoli avelele. Enye insika ephelelwa yinkontileka ngoJuni nguHappy Jele we-Orlando Pirates.“Ukaputeni (uJele) ngeke aze abe nenkinga. Asikho isidingo sokutatazela. Yinto sizoyilungisa emasontweni azayo. Nokho asijahile,” kusho uMahlakgane.UJele uqale ukudlala esigabeni esikhokhelayo kuyona iPirates ngo-2006. Akakaze aphinde adlalele elinye iqembu ngaphandle kwePirates. Kuleli qembu usedlale imidlalo engaphezu kuka-200.
title: IChiefs izovuselela inkontileka yensika yayo

text:
NONHLANHLA MKHABELAU METHULI wezinhlelo zethelevishini owaduma kuYO TV uthi kwakungelona iphupho lakhe ukusebenza kuthelevishini kodwa wumsebenzi asheshe wazibona ukuthi uyakwazi ukuwenza wabe eseqhubeka ehlala kuwona.UHulisani “CC” Ravele (26), osanda kukhuza ibuya ekwethuleni izinhlelo kuthelevishini emuva kokunyamalala iminyaka emine, uthe usekwamukele ukuthi impilo yakhe ikuthelevishini.Le ntokazi eshiye kuYO TV ngo-2008 iqale ukwethula uhlelo olusha lwezingxoxo i-
I Am South African, oludlala esiteshini sethelevishini sezindaba nezisematheni, i-ANN 7.“Ngeke ngiqambe amanga ngithi ukusebenza kuthelevishini kwakuvele kuyiphupho lami. Wumsebenzi nje engathi uma ngiwuqala ngineminyaka engu-11 kuphela ngingakabi nanesiqiniseko sokuthi ngifuna ukuba yini empilweni kwasheshe kwacaca ukuthi ngiwenza kahle,” kusho uHulisani.Uthe nakuba ubewuthanda umsebenzi wakhe kodwa ukhule ethanda ukungena kwezamabhizinisi njengoba akhetha nokwenza iziqu zeB Com Marketing Management aziphothule e-University of Johannesburg ngo-2008.Ngo-2010 uthe ujoyine inkampani esebenza ngobuchwepheshe lapho ayeyi-project manager khona.“Wumsebenzi obe yinselelo kakhulu kimina lona ikakhulukazi ngoba bese ngiphuma kuthelevishini. Kunabantu abebethi uma bengibona bangibuze ukuthi angiyona yini le ngane yakwaYO TV abanye ubabone ukuthi kabethembi ukuthi ngizowenza kahle umsebenzi wami nobekufaka ingcindezi yokuthi ngizikhandle ngokuphindiwe ukuzibonakalisa ukuthi ngiyayazi into engiyenzayo,” kuchaza uHulisani.Uthe uyakujabulela ukubuya kuthelevishini ikakhulukazi njengoba esekhulile futhi nohlelo alwenzayo lufundisa.“Wuhlelo oluxoxa izindaba zabantu abaningi abehlukene kusuka embonini yamabhizinisi kuya kwezobumnandi, okubalulekile wukuthi lufundise kodwa ngendlela emnandi, echazayo,” usho kanje.Ngaphandle kohlelo lwakhe olusha, uHulisani uthe umatasatasa ngezinhlelo zakhe ezimbalwa azihlanganisela ithelevishini njengoba enenkampani yakhe yokudidiyela izinhlelo.“Kunolunye nje oluzobonakala kungekudala kuthelevishini kodwa angifuni ukungena kakhulu emininingwaneni ngoba kusekhona okunye okungaqinisekisiwe,” usho kanje.Uthe inkampani yakhe yokudidiyela ayiqambe ngokuthi yiTshimbiluni Productions uyiqale ngo-2011.“Ngiyiqambe ngegama likamama kanti leli gama lichaza into oyizwa ngaphakathi enhliziyweni nokuyindlela engiwenza ngayo umsebenzi wami,” kuphetha uHulisani.
title: Ubuye nohlelo alwethula ku-ANN 7

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEAMAPHOYISA athungatha ongaba nolwazi ngamathambo okukholakala ukuthi awomuntu atholwe ePeacevalley ePhase 3 ngase-Edendale, eMgungundlovu ngoLwesine.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ngoLwesithathu ntambama, umelusi wabona okusolisayo okungathi amathambo, kwabizwa amaphoyisa. Ngenxa yokuthi kwase kuhlwile kungabonakali kahle amaphoyisa abuye  izolo kule ndawo.Kuthiwa kutholwe amathambo egcwele yonke indawo, kwambiwa kwatholwa namanye esethuneni elingashoni.Akwaziwa ukuthi awomuntu wesilisa noma owesifazane.Kusazohlolwa bese kuvela ulwazi olugcwele.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo osondelene nalolu daba ukuthi amalungu omphakathi athukile ngala mathambo atholakele.“Umphakathi ubumi izixongololo ubuzana ukuthi ngabe akabani amathambo. Okwenza kube nzima ukuthi akwaziwa noma umuntu wendawo noma umuntu owalahlwa abathize kule ndawo. Umphakathi uthukile  ngokubonile,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal u-Colonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe: “Amaphoyisa asePlessislaer avule idokodo kulandela ukutholwa kwamathambo okukholakala ukuthi awomuntu ePeacevalley ePhase 3 ekuseni namhlanhle (izolo). Uphiko lwamaphoyisa olutakulayo lubikelwe ngokuthize okutholwe kule ndawo ngoLwesithathu. Lube seluya kuyona  namhlanje (izolo), bathole amanye amathambo ethuneni elingashoni. Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa lusaqhubeka,” kusho uCol.Mbele.Khonamanjalo, uthishanhloko wasesikoleni saseRichmond, ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu, obhekene necala lokudlwengula uthisha unikezwe ibheyili ka-R2000. Icala lihlehliselwe uJuni 29 nonyaka.Umsolwa uzobe esayina njalo esiteshini esiseHilton.Isolezwe libike ngalesi sigameko izolo. Uthishanhlolo ubevele enkantolo yaseRichmond.Usolwa ngokudlwengula uthisha oneminyaka engu-29. Ngokwezinsolo kuthiwa wathembisa uthisha ukumqasha ngokugcwele kulesi sikole, wabe esemdlwengula esehhovisi lakhe.
title: Kutholwe amathambo omuntu eMphithi

text: INDODANA yowayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uMnuz Duduzane Zuma, isithumele incwadi yokumangalela umbuso njengoba izizolandelwa amasamanisi. Emuva kwezinsuku ezimbili efakaza kwikhomishana ephenya ukulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana kuleli sonto, uDuduzane usethumele umbuso izincwadi ezimbili njengoba ekhala ngokushushiswa kabuhlungu ekubeni bungekho ubufakazi obukhombisa ukuthi uyathinteka emacaleni athweswa wona. Ummeli wakhe uMnuz Rudi Krause uthe uDuduzame usethumele incwadi yokumangalela kumbuso, futhi isinyathelo esilandelayo kuzoba imali yesinxephezelo abayifuna kuhulumeni. Kulezi zincwadi ezimbili, uDuduzane ubhale ngokuboshwa kwakhe esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo ngoJulayi wangonyaka odlule ngenkathi ezongcwaba umfowabo, uMnuz Vusi Zuma. Ngaleso sikhathi, uDuduzane uboshelwe izinsolo zenkohlakalo njengoba owayeyiphini likaNgqongqoshe wezimali uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas wasola uDuduzane nomndeni wakwaGupta ngokuzama ukumfumbathisa imali engu-R600 million ukuze ezokhushulelwa esikhundleni sokuba uNgqongqoshe wezimali, 'uma ezosebenzisana nabo'. Ukuboshwa kukaDuduzane kwasusa omkhulu umsindo kwazise walethwa enkantolo efakwe amaketango ezandleni nasezinyaweni. NgoJanuari walonyaka, uphiko lwezokushushisa yahoxisa okwesikhashana amacala ayebekwe uDuduzane, yabalula ukuthi kumele uJonas aqale afakaze kwikhomishini kaZondo.Ecaleni lesibili, uDuduzane wayesolwa ngokubulala ngokungenanhloso enkantolo njengoba wayesolwa ngokushayisa abulale uNksz Phumile Dube waseZimbabwe ngemoto, esigamekweni esenzeka ngoFebhruari wango-2014. NgoJulayi kulonyaka, iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseRandburg yamthola engenacala uDuduzane, njengoba imantshi uTebogo Thupaatlase yathi omunye wofakazi bombuso wayengathembakali futhi umbuso uhlulekile ukuveza ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda. Engxoxweni abe nayo nabe-Independent Media ngoLwesibili, uKrause uthe: “Sesithumele incwadi kuhulumeni futhi sizothumela amasamanisi enkantolo ngokuhamba kwesikhathi,” kusho uKrause. Uthe isinyathelo esilandelayo ukunquma imali yenhlawulo okumele ikhokhelwe uZuma. UKrause uthe lokho kuzokwenzeka phakathi kwezinsuku ezimbili kuya kwezintathu ezilandelayo. Efakaza kwikhomishana kaZondo, uDuduzane waveza ukuthi uzothathela uhulumeni izinyathelo zomthetho.
title: Umangalele umbuso uDuduzane Zuma

text: ABAZALI bezingane ezabulawa ngoshevu ngabesifazane ababili, okukhona kubo nowayeyishende likayise wenye, bathi ngeke siphole isilonda sokubulawa kwezingane zabo yize begculisekile ngesigwebo esinikwe oyedwa wabo.Lokhu kulandela ukugwetshwa kuka-Amahle Maliwa odilikajele ababili ngokubulala uNjabulo Mankayi noLuyanda Msomi ababeneminyaka engu-10 ngesikhathi befakelwa ushevu bebulawa ngoNovemba 2017. Lezi zingane zazifunda esikoleni samabanga aphansi eClairwood.U-Amahle utshele inkantolo ukuthi wabulala izingane noNksz Liziwe Ngwayishe ngoba wayesaliwa nguyise kaNjabulo, uMnuz Thandaza Mankayi.Ngesikhathi kufundwa isitatimende sakhe enkantolo, uveze ukuthi yena noNksz Ngwayishe, bakuhlela ukuthatha izingane ngesikhathi zibuya esikoleni.U-Amahle ugwetshwe ngoLwesithathu.Izolo icala likaNksz Ngwayishe lihlehliselwe uMsombuluko ukuze axoxe nommeli wakhe.Ngaphandle kweNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini abazali bezingane bathe baneme ngesigwebo esinikwe u-Amahle kodwa amanxeba asekude ukuphola. Unina kaLuyanda, uNksz Nomusa Msomi, uthe sisebuhlungu isilonda sokushona kwengane yakhe.“Isigwebo esikhishwe yijaji siyanelisa kodwa kithina njengabazali izinhlungu ngeke ziphele, ukuphumula asikutholi. Isigwebo sifundisa noma yimuphi umuntu owenza okubi ukuthi umthetho uyasebenza. Thina bazali asikutholi ukuphumula ngesihluku esenziwa ezinganeni zethu zingenacala. Angimsoli uyise kaNjabulo ngokwenzeka ngoba akazange asithume isigebengu ukuthi sibulale izingane,” kusho uNksz Msomi.Uthe bafisa ukululekwa ngokomqondo ngoba ubuhlungu babo abupheli ikakhulu njengoba bephinde bashonelwa ngenye ingane yabo ebinenyanga izelwe ingagulanga.UMankayi uthe wenelisekile ngesigwebo esinikwe owayeyishende lakhe wathi ufisa sengathi asolwa naye angatholakala enecala anikwe isigwebo esifanayo.Uthe kwaba nzima ukukholwa wukuthi owayeyishende lakhe angenza into efana nalena ngoba wayezenza umuntu owayezithanda izingane zakhe.“Kungiphatha kabuhlungu ukuthi wabulala ingane yami. Ubelungile ekhombisa ukuzithanda izingane zami. Angizange ngikholwe ngesikhathi ngithola ukuthi ubulele ingane yami. Ubethi noma ebona izingane zidlala emgwaqweni angitshele uma esengibona ukuthi uzitshelile ukuthi azigoduke,” kusho uMankayi.
title: ‘Ngeke ziphele izinhlungu zokufelwa’

text: UKHATHAZEKILE umndeni womfundi oneminyaka eyisithupha owalahleka ehamba nabangani bakhe beyolanda izinkomo emadlelweni ngo-Agasti 29.UZabelo Lungelo Nala waseMndunduzeli, eNkandla, kusolakala ukuthi wanyamalala ngesikhathi kuqhamuka abazingeli ababehamba nezinja eziningi.Kuthiwa yena wabaleka wabuyela ngasekhaya, bonke ayehamba nabo babalekela ngalapho babeyolanda khona izinkomo. Kubikwa ukuthi lesi sehlo senzeka sebesezintabeni zasesigodini eMatholemgele khona eNkandla.UZabelo ungumfundi kaGrade 1 eMndunduzeli Primary.Umndeni wakhe uthi usumbheke yonke indawo ngokubambisana namalungu omphakathi, abaholi namaphoyisa kodwa akatholakali. Lo mndeni usukhalela okungenani ithambo lakhe ukuze ulingcwabe uma kuwukuthi akasekho emhlabeniUninakhulu kaZabelo, uNksz Shalazile Nala, uthe usekhala ubusuku nemini unina wengane edukile uma ecabanga ngayo.UNksz Nala uthe uZabelo wayehamba nezingane zakamakhelwane eyolanda izinkomo futhi kunabantu abambona edwanguzela yedwa esekhala ngesikhathi esedukelene nayehamba nabo.Uthe indawo alahlekela kuyona ayinamahlathi, wukhalo nje.“Asitholi nento ayeyigqokile nje. Izulu lalingelihle kangangoba samcinga sekunenkungu, lina ngosuku anyamalala ngalo,” kusho uNksz Nala.UZabelo unyamalale egqoke isikibha esibomvu esinemikhono emide, ibhulukwe elibubende, ijakhethi eluhlaza namabhuzi amnyama.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe uphiko lwamaphoyisa oluphenya amacala odlame emndenini, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nawocansi eShowe, licela umphakathi ulifunise uZabelo.UColonel Mbele uthe unoma ngubani ongaba nolwazi olungaholela ekutheni atholakale angathinta umseshi uSgt. Sifiso Mpungose enombolweni ethi: 079 696 3440 noma ethi: 035 473 0022.Bangashayela neyeCrime Stop ethi: 08600 10111.UZABELO Nala owaduka eyolusa izinkomongo-Agasti 29 eMndunduzeli, eNkandla Isithombe: SITHUNYELWE
title: Unina usekhala ubusuku nemini ngowaduka eyolusa

text: MENZI MAGUBANES INGAHLE sihlale izinyanga eziyisithupha singalikhahleli ibhola isiqongqwane seKaizer Chiefs neBafana Bafana uMorgan Gould esilimale ngoLwesibili emsipheni ohlanganisa unyawo nomlenze. Lokhu kulimala kukaGould ngeke kugcine nje ngokukhinyabeza izinhlelo zikaStuart Baxter (opheka iChiefs) kodwa kuzophinde kulimaze nezikaGordon Igesund (umqeqeshi weBafana) zokumbophela ku-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ekuleli ngoJanuwari nangoFebhuwari.Lo mdlali oyingozi emabholeni aqhamuka emoyeni uzophinde alahlekelwe yingqayizivele yethuba lokuyodlala neBrazil eSao Paulo ngoSepthemba 7.Nokho ngokubona kwaloyo owayedlala esiswini kuChiefs, u-Isaac ‘Shakes’ Kungoane, lokhu akakuboni kuzomthikameza u-Igesund kwazise baningi abadlali kuleli abadlala le ndawo kaGould.“Uma engababoni kahle abadlali abadlala ku-Absa Premiership kuzomele aye emazweni aphesheya kwezilwandle ngoba baningi abakuleli abadlali kulezo zindawo. Kodwa ngokubona kwami sinabo baningi abalapha. Kukhona u(Tefu) Mashamaite, (Erik) Mathoho, (Musa) Bilankulu, (Bevan) Fransman noRoscoe (Pietersen). Kukhona ku(Anele) Ngcongca okwaziyo naye ukudlala nakule ndawo. UGordon unenqwaba kabi yabadlali angakhetha kubo,” kusho uKunguane.Leli nxele elalithi uma liyihlikihla kukhale izihlwele ngezikhathi zalo liphinde laveza ukuthi lo mshophi wokulimala kukaGould akumele kube yinto u-Igesund acasha ngayo uma ebhedelwa yizinto.“Abantu bayathanda ukucasha ngesithupha uma izinto zibabhedela. Uma ungumqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe kumele ube nabadlali abahlanu ozokhetha kubo kuzo zonke izindawo. Naye kumele engabe unabo labo badlali. Kona kubuhlungu ukulahlelwa ngumdlali onjengoGould. Amava akhe ngeke uwadlulisele komunye umuntu, njengoba engekho akekho nawo.“UGordon kuzomele akhombise isizwe ukuthi naye unamava kulo msebenzi athole umuntu ozovala lesi sikhala ngokushesha. Ngiyazi ukuthi uGordon uyamthanda uGould futhi sengike ngezwa amahebezi athi ufuna ukumeza ukaputeni wakhe ngomuso,” kuqhuba uKhungoane.Lo mdlali ulimala nje kuke kwaba namahebezi okuthi kungenzeka athathe ibhade lobukaputeni kuBafana kulandela ukungagculisi kwefomu kaSteven Pienaar ogijima ku-Everton.Kuzobonakala ngoLwesine ukuthi u-Igesund ufake bani esikhaleni sikaGould uma esememezela iqembu azoya nalo eBrazil emdlalweni wobungani. Eminye imidlalo azoyizwa ngendaba uGould yile iBafana ezoyidlala neMozambique (ngoSephtemba 11, eMbombela Stadium), Poland (ngo-Okthoba 12 ePoland), United Arab Emirates (ngo-Okthoba 16, e-UAE) noweZambia weNelson Mandela Challenge (ngoNovemba 14, kuleli).
title: UGould uzofakela u-Igesund ukushisa

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneLeli qophamlando uNasty C ulenze ngokuhlanganyela neRed Bull, Africa Creative Agency nenkampani yakhe i-Ivyson Entertainment.Liyimizuzu engu-48, kanti laziwa ngokuthi iZulu Man in Japan.Kulona kuzogqama uNasty C, ecula nabaculi abahlukene kuleliya lizwe abahamba phambili okukhona kubona uJP The Wavey, Ricky, Yoshi nabanye.Ekhuluma ngokuba kuleliya lizwe uNasty C, uveze ukuthi akujabulela kakhulu ukwazi amasiko akhona ahlukene, ukudla kwakhona kanjalo nezimoto zakhona ezisetshenziswa ukuthutha abantu.“Enhliziyweni yami bekulokhu kukhona ukuthi ngidinga ukuya eJapan. Nami angazi lowo muzwa wawudalwa yini. Kungenzeka ukuthi yingoba angigcini nje ngokuba umculi kuphela kodwa ngiyiciko ngakho kuleliya lizwe uma uyiciko kuningi ongakwenza ngezinsiza ezikhona eJapan. Ngiyabonga kakhulu kwabakwaRed Bull ngokunginika leli thuba lokwandisa ulwazi lwami emkhakheni wamaciko othinta imfashini, umculo nangendlela izinwele zami ezizobe zibonakala ngayo,” kuchaza uNasty C.Uqhube wathi yena nabangani bakhe baseJapan, benza izingoma eziyisikhombisa ezinsukwini ezingu-8.“Indaba yolimi ayibanga inkinga kakhulu, ngihlale kakhulu kuleliya lizwe, abantu bakhona banobubele, bayazinikela emsebenzini abawenzayo banomdlandla,” kuchaza yena.Abasiki bengqephu athe umsebenzi wabo uzobonakala o-Ugo Mozie, Rakan Abdulwahid imenenja yakhe uColin Gayle okunguye obe umqondisi weqophamlando ngokuhlanganyela noNhlakanipho Teddy Mkhize.
title: Kuphuma iqophamlando likaNasty C

text:
NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEB AKHISHWE ngenganono abesifazane ezindlini zabo ehostela laseMlazi iGlebelands ngempelasonto.Abesifazane ababili baphume ngesamagundane endlini abahlala kuyona kwathi omunye “waxoshwa” nomndeni wakhe behlaselwa abesilisa ngezibhamu.Isehlakalo sokuqala senzeke ngoLwesihlanu kuBlock 45 lapho kudutshulwe khona abesifazane besendlini yabo kodwa kwangalimala muntu.NgoMgqibelo kuphinde kwahlaselwa omunye wesifazane obehlala nomndeni wakhe kuBlock 48.Bonke kuthiwa bathuthile ezindlini zabo ngenxa yokwesaba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Jay Naicker ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kuvulwe icala lokuzama ukubulala kulandela ukuhlaselwa kwabesifazane.“Amaphoyisa aseMlazi aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala kulandela isigameko saseGlebelands sokuhlaselwa kwabesifazane ngoLwesihlanu. Ngokophenyo owesifazane oneminyaka engu-37 uhlaselwe ngabasolwa abangaziwa esendlini yakhe. Badubule ewindini kodwa kwangalimala muntu. Isizathu sokuhlaselwa kwabo asaziwa,” kusho uNaicker.Umthombo we
Solezwe uthe abesifazane baxoshwa ezindlini zabo abafuna ukungena kuzo ngodli.“Kudideke wonke umuntu njengoba sekuhlaselwa abantu besifazane bezihlalele ezindlini zabo. Kunzima kakhulu kule ndawo uma sekukhishwa abesifazane ngendluzula ezindlini zabo njengoba bedutshulwa. Omunye uphume nezingane zakhe abazi bazohlalaphi. Sithwele kanzima kuleli hostela asazi sizolanyulwa ubani isimo,” kusho umthombo.Kuvele ukuthi esigamekweni sangoLwesihlanu kwafakwa incwadi ngaphansi kwesicabha sendlu eyayisabisa abesifazane ithi abaphume baphele kule ndlu uma bengafuni ukuphuma sebeyizidumbu.Kwenzeka lokhu nje amaphoyisa ayiqaphe ngeso lokhozi le ndawo.Abesifazane kuthiwa baphume endlini baqonda ekhumbini yamaphoyisa ebimi ehostela bawabikela ngalesi sehlakalo. Akekho osaboshiwe ngaleli cala.Isolezwe lisanda kubika ngesigameko lapho indoda yakuleli hostela eyayisinde ihlaselwa, abesilisa abayihlasela bazama ukuyoyiqedela esibhedlela.UMnuz Mbuyiseni “Maseveni” Maduna, owasinda ngokulambisa edutshulwa ngezinhlamvu eziyisithupha ngoJuni 11 ehostela, waphinde waphunyuka sekugasela abantu esibhedlela iPrince Mshiyeni Memorial, eMlazi, okusolwa ukuthi bebezomqedela.UMaduna wadutshulwa eseduze kwendlu yakhe kuBlock O ehostela elungiselela ukuya emsebenzini.Ukushuba kule ndawo kuqale phansi kudutshulwa uMnuz Sipho Ndovela owadutshulwa ngaphandle kwenkantolo eMlazi.UNdovela wayengomunye wofakazi ecaleni lokubulala elithweswe uMnuz Bongani Hlophe, Mnuz Fezile Mbadu, Mnuz Innocent Zoro Jali noMnuz Lucas Nsampa Ndlovu. Leli cala lizobuyela enkantolo kusasa.UNdovela wayengufakazi nasecaleni lokubulawa komngani wakhe, uMnuz Fikile Siyephu, wase-Eastern Cape nakwamanye ezigameko zokubulawa kwabantu ehostela.Kusanda kudutshulwa uMnuz Themba Mpine (45) waseMatatiele washona eyongena lapho esebenza khona. Abahlala kuleli hostela sebehlale bethuka izanya ngenxa yalolu dlame.Isolezwe labika ngokuthi abanye abantu abasakwazi ukuya emsebenzini ngenxa yovalo besaba khona ukuhlaselwa.
title: Kudutshulwe abesifazane eGlebe

text: UKHALA ngokudembesela kwamaphoyisa umndeni waseKhobongwaneni, eTaylors Halt, ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu, osuphila ngokuhlala ucashile ngenxa yokusaba emuva kokubulawa kwamalungu omndeni amane kwashiswa nomuzi.Ilungu lomndeni wakwaNgcobo elingathandanga ukudalulwa igama ngenxa yobucayi bodaba, litshele Isolezwe ngobunzima bempilo kulandela ukuhlaselwa kwabo.Lo mndeni uthi yize sekubulewe abantu abane bomndeni, akukho nelilodwa icala eselibophe abasolwa noma bathole umbiko emaphoyiseni ukuthi kuqhubekani ngamacala.Isolezwe ngenyanga edlule libike ngokuhlaselwa kwalo mndeni, okwashiswa kuwo umuzi nezimoto ezine ezazipake egcekeni. Kwabulawa nelungu lomndeni lesifazane. Badutshulwa behamba ngemoto, abane basinda.Lesi sigameko silanywa ezinye ezimbili zangonyaka odlule ngo-Okthoba okwabulawa kuso uMnuz Mawele Ngcobo nendodana yakhe uMnuz Vezokuhle Ngcobo.Nabo badutshulwa behamba ngemoto.Kwabulawa noMnuz Abel Ngcobo, naye owadutshulwa ehamba ngemoto. Lo mndeni unebhizinisi lamatekisi.Ilungu lomndeni elikhulume neSolezwe lithe impilo isinzima ngoba abasakwazi ukuphumela emnyango.“Kumanje siphila njengezinyamazane, sihlala sicashile ngoba asazi ukuthi sizohlaselwa nini. Impilo isinzima kakhulu emndenini. Ngisho nezingane ezifunda isikole kunzima ukuba sizidedele ngoba asazi ukuthi zizohlaselwa yini. Sikhala kakhulu ngophenyo lwamaphoyisa. Isigameko sokugcina sihlaselwa ngenyanga edlule, amaphoyisa afika ngaleso sikhathi angabuye abuya ukuzolanda izitatimende. Kumanje asazi kwenzekani. Asiphephile,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Nata,* uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, unxuse umndeni ukuba uye esiteshini uyokhuluma nobuholi.“Singawuyala umndeni ukuba uye esiteshini saseTaylors Halt ucele umphathi wesiteshi uma ungagculisekile ngophenyo,” kusho uCapt Gwala.Lo mndeni uveze ukuthi awusazi isizathu esenza bahlaselwe.“Ngisola umona ngokuhlaselwa kwethu kodwa angazi ukuthi usukaphi lo mona, asibazi ababulali,” kuphetha ilungu lomndeni.
title: Bakhala ngamaphoyisa adembeselayo abafelwa

text: UKHETHE ukungasifaki isicelo sebheyili umfundisi osolwa ngecala lokubulala intombi nabazukulu bayo, ngesikhathi evele izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi eMgungundlovu.UMnuz Themba Mkhize (73) ubhekene necala lokubulala intombi yakhe uNksz Thule Khanyisile Sibiya (46),  nabazukulu bayo oNomcebo oneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili(8), no-Asemahle oneminyaka eyisihlanu(5), abatholwe beklajwe emzimbeni ngocelemba ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.UMkhize utshele inkantolo ukuthi akayidingi ibheyili.Icala lihlehliselwe kuJanuwari 20 wonyaka ozayo kanti usazotoka. Uvele enkantolo efake ijezi eliluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka, nesifonyo esimhlophe.IMantshi uNitesh Binnessarie, ayizange imbuze ukuthi uyalivuma noma uyaliphika yini icala. Ithe kuyilungelo lakhe ukuba nommeli, uMkhize wacela ummeli wesihle.Ibe isimtshela nokuthi angafaka isicelo sebheyili, wathi uyasibonga.Enkantolo bekungekho muntu ngaphakathi ngoba kabavumelekile abantu ukuthamela amacala ngenxa yeCovid-19. Amalungu emindeni yababulewe, nawomsolwa abengaphandle kwenkantolo.Indodakazi kaNksz Sibiya, uNkk Dolly Zuma ithe kungcono ngoba ummangalelwa uzohlala ejele.“Besithi sizokwazi ukungena enkantolo. Abavumanga. Kuyasijabulisa nokho ukuthi akasifakanga isicelo sebheyili. Sizizwa siphephile ngoba uzogcinwa ejele. Ukuba ubezophuma asazi noma abantu bebezomlimaza yini njengoba bediniwe yisigameko. Sizofihla amalungu ethu ngeSonto eHopewell,” kusho uNkk Zuma.Abomndeni kamsolwa abathandanga ukukhuluma.UNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, uthe: “Sisanda kuthula umkhankaso wezinsuku ezingu-16 wokulwisana nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane, kuyashaqisa ukuthi kube khona umuntu wesilisa owenza isigameko esingenazwelo njengalesi kowesifazane, ongakwazi ukuzivikela nezingane ezimsulwa. Siwuhulumeni, sinxusa amadoda kube yiwona ahamba phambili ekulweni nalesi sihlava, avikele abesifazane nezingane.”
title: Akayifunanga ibheyili umfundisi (73) osolwa ngokubulala intombi nabazukulu bayo

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUIZIPHATHIMANDLA zendawo yokwenza imicimbi yomtakabani eThekwini, iNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre (ICC,) zithi zisaxoxisana noMasipala weTheku nenkampani yomculi wowokholo, uSfiso Ncwane, ukuxazulula umbango wabo ngale ndawo.ISfiso Ncwane Communications ihlelela lo mculi wengoma ethi 
Kulungile Baba ikhonsathi yokuqopha i-DVD yakhe entsha ngo-Okthoba 27.Ngakolunye uhlangothi uMasipala ufuna ukuba nomcimbi wokuqhathwa kwamaqembu emqhudelwaneni wamazwe ase-Afrika ozoba kuleli ngonyaka ozayo, i-Orange Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ngo-Okthoba 26. Lolu ngolunye lwezinsuku esezibekiswe yinkampani kaSifiso ukusebenzisa le ndawo.Owezokuxhumana e-ICC, uSandy Le Brasse, utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi ngeke akwazi ukuphefumula ngalolu daba njengoba besaxoxisana nabantu abathintekayo.“Ngiyalwazi udaba lukaNcwane noMasipala kodwa angivumelekile ukuphawula ngalo. UNcwane yisikhasimende lethu ngakho izinto ezenzekayo sizozixoxa naye noMasipala,” kusho uLe Brasse.Imenenja kaNcwane ebuye ibe yinkosikazi yakhe, uNkk Ayanda Ncwane, ucashunwe kwi
Solezwe ethi uqashe le ndawo ngoMashi kodwa waze wakhokha ngoMeyi futhi unobufakazi balokho njengoba asayina inkontileka.“Ngayikhokhela ukuyisebenzisela izinsuku ezimbili ngoba ngo-Okthoba 26 sizobe silungisa izinto ukuze ngakusasa sifike sesithinta lapha nalapha ngaphambi kwekhonsathi,” kusho yena.Uthe ngokwazi kwakhe ikhonsathi izoqhubeka njengoba kuhleliwe.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Thabo Mofokeng, uthe ngo-Okthoba 26 bazobe benomcimbi wokuqhathwa kwamaqembu angu 16 azodlala ku-Afcon kuleli ngoJanuwari kanti kulindeleke ukuthi indawo ize ilunge ngo-Okthoba 28.“I-ICC izobe ingakulungele ukusingatha eminye imicimbi ngalesi sikhathi nekhonsathi kaNcwane nayo iyangena kulokhu. Abantu abathintekayo okuhlanganisa abeNcwane Communications bayakwazi lokhu,” kusho uMofokeng.
title: Siyazama ukuxazulula umbango: ICC

text: USEPHILA ngokugcaluza esikhumulweni sezindiza, ehambela amazwe omhlaba usomabhizinisi osemncane okhanda izipikha ze-bluetooth ezisusa phansi azihlobise zibe zinhle.USiyabonga Ndwalane (31) odabuka eThubalethu, eMelmoth, ungumsunguli wenkampani iTurn Up Speakers esebenzela eDurban University of Technology (DUT) eThekwini.Ngaphambi kokuvula inkampani yezipikha uthe ubedayisa ama-hotdog emigwaqweni yaseThekwini ezama amasenti.Engxoxweni nale nsizwa kuvele ukuthi lo msebenzi uyayihambisa njengoba isibuya emazweni amaningi, elokugcina alihambele kube iFinland. Kumanje ilungiselela ukuya e-USA ngo-Okthoba kanti nase-Egypt bamlindile.“Umqondo wezipikha wangifikela ngisadayisa emgwaqweni, ngathenga isipikha sasheshe safa, ngathenga esinye kwaba yinto efanayo. Ngagcina ngiqhamuka necebo lokwakha izipikha ezingeke zife. Basithanda kakhulu abantu engaqala ngaso bacela ngibenzele,” kuchaza uNdwalane.Uthe bangu-30 abantu abafaka izicelo zokwakhelwa izipikha, bamkhokhele imali. Emuva kwalokho akabange esabheka emuva.Kumanje amakhasimende akhe athenga izipikha, kubalwa uMasipala weTheku othanda ukukhangisa ngazo uma kunemicimbi kukhona nabantu bakwamanye amazwe.Isikhungo iDUT simcele ukuba akhe izipikha ezizofakwa emagumbini okufundela kufundwe ngazo. Uyibonge kakhulu iDUT ngokusebenzisana naye njengoba yamnika nendawo yokusebenzela mahhala nokuyiyona asebenzela kuyona manje.“Nginesivumelwano seminyaka emihlanu neDUT njengoba ngisebenzela khona. Nginabafowethu abangu-6 engisebenza nabo okwamanje. Ngiyafisa ukwandisa isibalo kube yinkampani enkulu ezoqasha abantu abaningi,” kuchaza uNdwalane.UNdwalane uneziqu zeNational Diploma kwiBusiness Studies azithole khona eDUT. Phakathi kwezindondo asezitholile ngomsebenzi wakhe, kukhona i-Innovator of The Year ayinikwe yiDurban Chamber of Commerce.Uke wathola i-Innovator of The Year ayinikwe yisikhungo iDUT. Uphethe iSelf Sustainable Business Idea ayinikwe wuMnyango wezeSayensi nobuChwepheshe. Ikhona ahlonishwe ngayo kwiJohhanesburg Festival.
title: Useya naphesheya owakha izipikha

text: NOKUBONGWA  PHENYANEABASUNGULI bomdlalo ohamba phambili ngababukeli kuleli Uzalo, bathi abathandi bawo mdlalo mabalindele okukhulu okuzokwenzeka njengoba sekuseduzane kuphele isizini yesithupha.Esitatimendeni esikhishiwe ngaboZalo bebebika ngezinguquko kulo mdlalo, bathe kunabalingisi abasha Isolezwe ebelilokhu libika ngabo lithi bazobonakala okubalwa umculi uSjava, Nina Mkhize noBig Zulu.UMmamiste Thibedi ongomunye wophrojusa balo mdlalo, uveze ukuthi njengoba sekuyiminyaka eyisithupha waqala, okubajabulisa kakhulu wukuletha ubuso obusha obuthakaselwa ngabaningi.“Iningi labalingisi eliqale ukubonakala kulo mdlalo wethu, selidumile manje. Usuyikhaya kwabaningi futhi abantu baseMzansi basikhombisile ukuthi bayazifela ngawo.Esingakusho manje wukuthi kuningi okuzayo njengoba sethula ithalente elisha kulo mdlalo, esingangabazi ukuthi le sizini izophela ngegiya eliphezulu njengoba ababukeli bezolokhu beqhubeka nokufuna ukubona ukuthi yini ezokwenzeka.”Uthe ukufika kwabalingisi kuzoshintsha umdlalo ngendlela ababukeli akade bengayilindele kodwa lokhu okungeke kuxoshe ababukeli.“Kubalingisi abazobonakala kulo mdlalo kukhona umlingisi osekhona kulo mdlalo uBelinda Mncube (Nina Mkhize), ongumngani kaMaNgcobo onolaka, ongazwani nento ebhedayo futhi abasuka kude noMaNgcobo njengoba bazwana besebancane. Kusijabulisile ukuphinde samukele uMxolisi Majozi owaziwa ngoZuluboy, ozolingisa indawo kaSboniso, obuye aziwe ngoLast-Number, oyisigebengu esihlalise kabi umphakathi waKwaMashu. Kulo mdlalo uzobonakala ethembekile kumfowabo u-Amos, oyigeza onolimi kubantu njengoba bezifela ngaye. Indawo ka-Amos izolingiswa yinkakha uBongani Madondo,” kuchaza uMmamitse.Kulo mdlalo uthe kuzohqmuka neqembu lezigebengu elintshontsha izimoto elaziwa ngokuthi Umbutho.Leli qembu uthe linamalungu amahlanu okukhona kulona umphathi walo uMageba (Mike Mvelase), Nkunzi (Masoja Msiza), Sobhuza (Siyabonga Nene owaziwa ngoBig Zulu), Mandleni (Thokozane Sithole) noKotini (Herald Khumalo).“Ababukeli abahlale bangasuki kulo mdlalo njengoba sibheke kwisizini yesine,” kuphetha uMmamiste.
title: Bathenjiswa lukhulu abalandeli boZalo

text: KUGCINE kumenele ngoMgqibelo owesifazane waseNkunzani, KwaNongoma, obhunyelwe uyise wezingane ngophethroli wamokhela ngomlilo.UNksz Nompumelelo Mthembu (28) ushone ngoMgqibelo kulandela ukubhunyelwa ngophethilolu nguyise wezingane zakhe, ngoba enqaba ukuba bebuyelane.Umufi onezingane ezintathu nomsolwa, kuthiwa ubesebuyele kubo njengoba ngoMashi wamshaya waze wamdlokodla isitho sangasese ngesagila umsolwa kulandela ingxabano ethinta imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni yezingane.Wahlala isikhathi esibhedlela uNksz Mthembu ekhishwa isagila njengoba umndeni uthe kwaze kwaphoxeleka ukuba akhishwe nesibeletho...Udaba oluphelele kwiSolezwe ngoLwesine.
title: Isihluku eshisa unina wezingane ngophethroli efuna babuyelane

text: BANGAPHEZU kuka-1 000 abantu asebehaqwe yigciwane leCovid-19 eGauteng  njengoba lesi sifundazwe sesinabantu abangu12 193. Abantu njengamanje asebehaqwe yileli gciwane bangaphezu kuka8 664 kusukela ngoLwesibili, okusho ukuthi sebengaphezu ngo1 300 uma kuqhathaniswa nesibalo sangoMsombuluko. UMnyango wezeMpilo kulesi sifundazwe umemezele lezi zibalo namhlanje.  Kunezidumbu ezingaphezu kweziyisithupha eziphumile, ezinhlanu zazo okungezabantu baseGoli. IGoli linabantu abahlanu abahaqeka ngosuku. isibalo sabantu asebesindile kulesi sifo sesifiyelele ku3 442 futhi zingu572 iziguli ezilashwa ezibhedlela zomphakathi nezizimele.   Isifundazwe sithe bangaphezu kuka13 000 kubantu abahaqene Johannesburg60714718754149Ekurhuleni2443208091614Tshwane1710104051295West Rand 9128288616Sedibeng339265272ESoweto nase-Inner City kuyaqhubeka nokuba yizidleke zabahaqekile esifundeni saseGoli, njengoba sanda nje isibalo. ISandton neRandburg inabantu abangu500 abasahaqekile.  IGauteng ayidalulanga izibalo zasebeshonile kwisifunda ngasinye. Isifunda  A: Diepsloot, Kya Sands, Dainfern, Midrand, Lanseria, Fourways, Ivory title: Sinyuke ngo1 000 isibalo esisha sabahaqwe yigciwane leCovid-19 eGauteng

text: INKANTOLO yeMantshi yaseThekwini ibadedele ngebheyili kaR2000 umuntu emunye, abasolwa abane okubalwa nomnikazi wenkampani yamakhaza, abathinteka ecaleni lokukhwabanisa imali yomshwalense, ngomazisi womuntu osadla anhlamvana.Laba basolwa abane abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-39 no-61 ababoshwe ngoLwesibili wuphiko lwamaHawks noluphenya amacala emali eThekwini, bavele izolo enkantolo bathola ibheyili.Okhulumela uphiko lwamaHawks KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Simphiwe Mhlongo, uthe abasolwa ababili kulaba ababoshiwe babhalisela umgilwa umshwalense wokufa. Kuthe ngoSepthemba 2017, laba basolwa bobabili baya kofaka isicelo sokukhokhelwa umshwalense ngoba bethi umgilwa useshonile kodwa ebe esadla anhlamvana. Abaphenyi benkampani yomshwalense okwafakwa kuyo isicelo sekhokhelo, bawusola umgqakazo ngalezi zicelo base beqala uphenyo. Kwavulwa icala esiteshini samaphoyisa eDurban North, ngenxa yobucayi balo labe selidluliselwa kumaHawks. UMhlongo uthe uphenyo lwamaHawks lwaveza ukuthi umgilwa okwakuthiwa ushonile empeleni uyaphila, futhi akahlobene nalaba abafake isicelo sokukhokhelwa imali yomshawelense. Laphinde lwaveza nokuthi kwahanjiswa isidumbu okungesiso esomnikazi kamazisi, ngosizo lomnikazi wamakhaza kudokotela ukuba asihlole. Uphenyo lwaveza nokuthi okwakuthiwa ushonile wayengahlobene nhlobo, nababefake isicelo sokuthi bakhokhelwe umshwalense. Umsolwa wesine yena kuthiwa nguyena owasiza laba aboshwe nabo ngomazisi owasetshenziswa kulobu bugebengu. Inkampani yomshwalense ethintekayo kuthiwa ayibange isawukhokha uR110 000 owawufunwa ngabasolwa, ababefake isicelo sokuthi bakhokhelwe wona. UMhlongo uthe icala lihlehliselwe uMashi 21.
title: Owamakhaza ecaleni lokukhwabanisa

text: IVUME icala indoda yaseThekwini eyatholwa nekhanda lowesilisa eyayizama ukulidayisela inyanga. Inkantolo enkulu yaseThekwini ngoMsombuluko ithole uPhilani Siyabonga Jojisa enecala.Uthe wayekweleta umashonisa uR 6000 wayesedayisa ikhanda likaMnuz Thembinkosi Mzimakwe (34) ukuze athole imali. Ngo-Agasti 3, 2017 uJojisa watholwa ephethe ikhanda lomuntu kubhakha emakethe ekuWarwick.Abemangalelwe naye uLehlohonolo Swartbooi uliphikile icala. Kuthiwa uSwartbooi wayeyingxenye yetulo lokuthi kutholwe ikhanda lomuntu futhi wayekhona kubulawa uMzimakwe.UJojisa waya enyangeni uMnuz Lucky Khuzwayo eyobuza ukuthi uyazisebenzisa yini izicubu zomuntu uma elapha wathi uzomnika ikhanda ngoR20 000.UKhuzwayo wathi angalithatha ikhanda lomuntu. UJojisa utshele inkantolo esitatimendeni sokuvuma icala esifundwe wummeli wakhe ukuthi wayenenkinga yemali engakwazi ukondla umndeni wakhe, unina wengane yakhe nengane eyayisanda kuzalwa. Uthe indodakazi yakhe yayinezinyanga ezintathu ngaleso sikhathi. Uthi wayehola uR750 efemini ayesebenza kuyo.“Ngagcina sengifuna usizo komashonisa. Ngaboleka imali komashonisa abane ngagcina ngibakweleta uR6 000. Yize ngazama ukubakhokhela kodwa ngangehluleka, ngase ngiqhamuka necebo lokuthi ngingayithola kanjani imali. Ngakhumbula ukuthi ngike ngizwe ukuthi kukhona abantu abathenga izicubu zabantu ikakhulukazi izinyanga bazisebenzisele umuthi. Nganquma ukuthi ngizobulala umuntu ngidayise izicubu enyangeni.”Uthe waya kuKhuzwayo inyanga watshela noSwaartbooi ngomhlangano wabo.“Sobabili sasixakekile ukuthi sizolitholaphi ikhanda lomuntu ukuze sithole uR20 000.”Ngosuku ababulala ngalo uMzimakwe uthe baphuza ibhodlela leSmirnoff ethaveni kanti ngaleso sikhathi benoSwartbooi babexoxa ukuthi bazolithola kanjani ikhanda, kwase kufika uMzimakwe owaziwa ngoRhuu endaweni.Baliqeda ibhodlela bakweleta eleBells. Baphuza waze waquleka ethaveni uMzimakwe. Banquma ukuthi babulale yena.Uthe waya endlini yakhe wathatha ummese nobhakha nocwazi olungenalutho. Uthe bayisa uMzimakwe ehlathini elikude nethaveni bafike bamnquma ikhanda lahlukana nomzimba. Uthe uSwaartbooi wayebambe uMzimakwe.“Ngaya ekhaya nekhanda. Ngafica intombi yami ilele, ngashitsha izingubo ngayozilahla emfuleni ukuze intombi yami ingaziboni. Ngase ngiyalala.”Ekuseni uthe wafonela uKhuzwayo emtshela ukuthi uselitholile ikhanda wahlela ukuthi uzolihambisa endaweni yokupaka izimoto emgwaqweni uSmall.Uthe esalindile kwafika amaphoyisa ambopha. Uxolisile emndenini ngobuhlungu abazwise bona. UJojisa kulindeleke ukuba agwetshwe namuhla.
title: Ugonyuluke ngokwamenza azame ukudayisa ikhanda lomuntu enkantolo

text: UYAZIPHENDULELA umrepha onqobe indondo yomkhakha weSong of the Year kuma16th Metro FM Music Award abeseThekwini ngempelasonto.UNasty C, waseLovu, eThekwini, uthi akakugqizi qakala okukhulunywa ngabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Abantu bathe akakufanele ukuwina indondo obekumele inikezwe uBabes Wodumo, Kwesta noma uDr Malinga..“Uma kukhulunywa ngomuntu ongenankinga nokushiwo ngabantu yimina. Nami ngiye kuloya mcimbi ngingakulindele lokhu okwenzekile. Ngijabulile kakhulu, ngeke ngivumele abantu abangazi ukuthi ngisebenze kanzima kanjani ukufika la ngikhona bangiphathe kabi,” kusho uNasty C.Lo mrepha oqopha enkampanini iMabala Noise, uthe uyazi ukuthi lokhu kukhuluma kuyinto yesikhashana. “Ngesonto elizayo konke lokhu kuzobe kuyinto engasekho. Ngijabule kakhulu, nasesitebeleni sethu akekho noyedwa onake le nto. Ngingasho nje ukuthi ngijabule futhi ngibonile ukuthi senginabalandeli abaningi okuyibo abangivotelile ukuze ngiwine.”UNasty C uwine izindondo ezine, into embangele amazinyo abushelelezi.Uthe uwiniswe ukudela kwakhe ubuthongo ngesikhathi eqopha i-albhamu yakhe ethi Bad Hair Extention.Ngisho umndeni wakhe uthe umjabulele kakhulu. Wakhuliswa nguyise ngemuva kokushona kukanina enezinyanga eziwu-11. Uzoqhubeka asebenze kanzima. Phakathi kwale nyanga uzokhipha ifilimu encane equkethe wonke amavideo anomculo wakhe. Abafuna ukubona ama-video azotholakala ezindaweni okubukwa kuzo amafilimu.
title: ‘Anginandaba ngokushiwo ngami’

text:
USIZWE wukuphuma ngewindi owesilisa osindile esigamekweni okushone kuso abantu abathathu, abahlanu balimala kanzima efulethini elisenkabeni yedolobha iTheku emgwaqweni uBurger izolo emini.Lona wesilisa osindile kuthiwa uthole imihuzukwana okukholakala ukuthi idalwe ukuwa esuka esitezi sokuqala phezulu ewela phansi kuleli fulethi eliseduze neNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ngaseMtateni.Abathathu abashonile kuthiwa bashonele endaweni yesigameko, kwathi labo abalimele baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela isimo sabo sisibi.Amaphoyisa athi asola ingxabano njengembangela eholele kulesisehlakalo.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi omunye wabantu abayisishiyagalolunye, abebekhona endlini uyiphoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku.Kodwa okwamanje akucaci ukuthi umsolwa ngubani kuleli cala.Ngesikhathi ithimba leSolezwe lifika kule ndawo emini, abantu bebemi izixongololo kugcwele namaphoyisa, indawo yesehlakalo isihenqwe ngentambo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa oMkhandlu weTheku, uSenior Superintendent Parbhoo Sewpersad uthe amaphoyisa omkhandlu abikelwe ngalesi sigameko, kwathiwa kunokuqhuma kwezibhamu efulethini elisemgwaqweni uYusufDadoo.“Uma amaphoyisa efika kuleli fulethi athole ukuthi bekunabantu abayisishiyagalolunye endlini, abathathu bashonile, abahlanu balimele, oyedwa usindile,” kusho uSewpersad.FUNDA: 
Kufe abathathu kuxabana abangani eflethini eThekwiniUthe okwamanje imbangela yalokhu kudubula ibingakaziwa kodwa bakholwa ukuthi ingxabano eholele kulesi sehlakalo.“Amalungu omphakathi abekwenye indlu asitshele ukuthi kube nengxabano kule ndlu okwenzeke kuyo isigameko, abe esezwa ukuqhuma kwesibhamu,” kusho uSewpersad.Ukuqinisekisile ukuthi omunye wabantu abebephakathi kule ndlu uyiphoyisa lomkhandlu weTheku.“Omunye wabantu abebekhona endlini bekuyiphoyisa ebelingekho emsebenzini,” kusho uSewpersad.Uthe okwamanje ngeke baze bakuqinisekise ukuthi ngubani umsolwa kuleli cala.Kodwa amalungu omphakathi akhulume neSolezwe nacele ukuthi angadalulwa athe, ezwe kuthiwa umuntu odubule abantu uyiphoyisa.“Engathi leli phoyisa lixabane nowesifazane labe selidubula abantu abebesendlini, nalo labe seliyazidubula,” kusho ilungu lo mphakathi.Lithe ukhona owesilisa osindile kulesi sehlakalo.“Sizwe kuthiwa isibhamu okusolakala ukuthi isona esisetshenziswe kulesi sehlakalo sitholakale emagcekeni aseNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini lapho kupakwa khona izimoto, silahlwe khona,” kuqhuba leli lungu lo mphakathi.Elinye ilungu lo mphakathi nalo elicele ukuthi lingadalulwa lithe, lizwe kuthiwa omunye wesilisa olimele, udubuleke emqaleni.“Uma sizwa kuthiwa bekuphuzwa lapha endlini kwabe sekuyaxatshanwa nokuholele ekutheni kugcine sekuqhuma isibhamu,” kusho leli lungu lomphakathi.Umakhelwane uthe leli phoyisa belithanda ukuvakashelwa endlini yalo liphuzise abantu utshwala.“Kodwa belinenhliziyo encane uma selidakiwe,” kusho umakhelwane.
title: Omakhelwane baphawula ngokufa kwabathathu eflethini eThekwini

text: IZOHOLWA ngezinsuku ezihlukahlukene imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni,eholwa yizaguga, abakhubazekile nezingane ezineminyaka engaphansi kuka18. Abophiko oluholela lezi zibonelelo, iSassa, bamemezele izinsuku ezintsha zokuholwa kwalezi zibonelelo ngenyanga ezayo. Bathe izaguga ezayo zizoyihola kusukela ngo-Agasti 3, abakhubazekile bayihole kusukela ngo-Agasti 4 bese kuthi abesondlo sezingane nabanye bayihole kusukela ngo-Agasti 5. "Sifisa ukumemezela ukuthi, ngokwezinhlelo ezintsha, abahola imali yokukhubazeka ngeke baholelwe ngosuku olufanayo nabahola eyokuguga. Ekuqaleni konyaka, samemezela ukushintshashintsha kwezinsuku zokuholwa kwemali yesibonelelo". "Sizoqhubeka nango-Agasti ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu ababi yisiminyaminya futhi sizokwehlisa isibalo sabantu abafika ezikhungweni lapho kuholelwa khona izibonelelo nganoma yiluphi usuku," kusho oyisikhulu sakwaSASSA, uTotsie Memela. Uthe zonke izindawo okuholelwa kuzo imali yesibonelelo zihlale zinyinyitheka abantu abasuke bezohola. "Lokhu kubeka impilo yabantu asebeyizaguga nabanokukhubazeka engcupheni." Uthe uhulumeni uthathe isinqumo sokuthi izwe ligcine lisesigabeni sesithathu kokuvalwa kwezwe ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane leCorona kuyanqandwa kanti nezimpilo zabantu ziyavikelwa. Unxuse umphakathi ukuba usebenzisane nohulumeni ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi igciwane liyavinjwa ngokuqhamuka nezinsuku ezingefani."Kuyinto eyaziwayo ukuthi abantu abadala yibo abahaqeka kalula yileli gciwane. Thina njengoSassa siqhamuke namasu okuqikelela ukuthi wonke umuntu uphephile." Ubuye wadonsa ngendlebe abantu abaholayo ukuba bakhumbule ukuthi asikho isidingo sokukhipha imali ngosuku lokuqala okuholwa ngalo kodwa bengayidonsa nanoma yiluphi usuku emuva kosuku lomholo ngoba isuke izogcinwa kwi-account kuze kube iyadonswa," kuphetha uMemela.
title: Kumenyezelwe izinsuku ezintsha zokuholwa kweyeqolo neyabadala

text: SEBENGAPHEZU kuka-9 000 abantu abathatha imishanguzo yokugwema ukungenwa yigciwane lengculazi kuleli.Lokhu kusanda kuvela engqungqutheleni yezempilo, ebiyenziwe yisikhungo iBhekisisa Centre for Health Journalism engaphansi kweMail & Guardian.Ekhuluma kule ngqungquthela uDkt Thato Chidarikire, woMnyango wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uthe sebesinyusile isibalo sabantu abathola lemishanguzo kusukela beqalile ngo-2017 nosekwenze umehluko ezinhlelweni zoMnyango wezeMpilo zokulwa nokusabalala kwegciwane lengculazi.Le ngqungquthela beyibhekele izinhlelo zomnyango wezempilo zokuvikelwa kokusabalala kwegciwane lengculazi nofuba.Imishanguzo yokugwema ukungenwa yigciwane lengculazi ipre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) iqale yanikwa abantu abadayisa ngomzimba nabantu besilisa abalala nabanye abantu besilisa. Iqale yanikwa bona ngenxa yokuba sengcupheni kwabo.Ucwaningo lwaphambilini seluveze kaningi ukuthi abantu abadayisa ngomzimba kuleli baningi kakhulu abangenwa yiHIV.Phezu kwalokhu omunye umbiko owakhishwa yinhlangano yezempilo i-UNAIDS ngokuqeda ngegciwane lengculazi uveze ukuthi * -57% wabantu abadayisa umzimba banegciwane lengculazi futhi iningi labo abazazi ukuthi banalo yini leli gciwane.Lo mbiko wawubheka abantu abadayisa umzimba baseCape Town, Johannesburg naseThekwini.Phakathi kuka-2017 no-2018 balinganiselwa ku-2416 abantu abadayisa umzimba abanikwe iPrEP. Lesi sibalo sibengaphezulu kwesibalo umnyango esasiqondwe ngumnyango nokwenza ukuthi uhlelo lwawo lube yimpumelelo.Abantu besifazane abasebancane nabo babe sebenikwa le mishanguzo ngoMeyi nonyaka. UDkt Chidarikire uthe kulindeleke ukuthi iqale ihlinzekwe kubantu abasebenzisa izidakamizwa njengoba bona benabantu besifazane abasebancane baziwa njengabantu abasengozini yokuthola leli gciwane ngenxa yokuba phezulu kwezibalo zabo uma beqhathaniswa nabanye abantu kuleli.Ezinye zezizathu zokuba phezulu kwezibalo zegciwane lengculazi kwabesifazane abasebancane nabantu abasebenzisa izidakamizwa ukungalingani okukhona kubantu besilisa nabesifazane, ukuboshwa kwabantu (abasebenzisa izidakamizwa) nokungazitholi kalula izinayiti ezihlanzekile.Uhlelo lomnyango wezempilo kuzwelonke lokulwa negciwane lengculazi luhlose ukuhlinzeka abantu abalinganiselwa ku-18 215 ngePrEP phakathi kuka-2018 no-2019.Isikhulu sesigungu esilwa nokusabalala kwegciwane lengculazi kuleli iSouth African National Aids Council (SANAC), uDkt Sandile Buthelezi, uthe zonke izifundazwe zakuleli nazo zinezinhlelo ezizosiza ukuthi zikwazi ukuhambisana nolukazwelonke.“Uhlelo lokulwa nokusabalala kwegciwane lengculazi nofuba liwumhlahlandlela wethu. Lwenza ukuthi sihlangane sonke sisebenzisane ukulwa nokusabalala kwegciwane lengculazi,” kusho uButhelezi.UMnuz Patrick Mdletshe weSection27 uthe yize kukhona okwenziwayo ukuqinisa izinhlelo zokulwa negciwane lengculazi ezifundeni nasezifundazweni zonkana ikakhulu KwaZulu-Natal kodwa ezinye izifundazwe azenzi kahle.
title: ‘Bangaphezulu kuka-9 000 abathatha eyokugwema iHIV’

text: UNOZINTI weKaizer Chiefs, u-Itumeleng Khune, akayishayi mkhuba eyabagxeka ukubizwa kwakhe kwiBafana Bafana ekubeni eqiwa yijezi eqenjini lakhe.UKhune ngomunye wonozinti abathathu abaseqenjini lomqeqeshi uMolefi Ntseki elizodlala imidlalo emibili elandelana eduze yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup Nations (Afcon) neSao Tome and Principe. Umdlalo wokuqala uzoba kusasa eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngo-9 ebusuku. La maqembu azophinda ngoMsombuluko ngo-3 ntambama eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, eBhayi. i-Afcon izoba seCameroon ngonyaka ozayo.Phezu kokuba uNtseki ezamile ukuchaza isizathu esenze abize uKhune ukuthi azobanga ijezi noRonwen Williams noDarren Keet kodwa kukhona iqeqebana labalandeli elisale lingeneme. KwiChiefs uKhune udlelwe ijezi nguDaniel Akpeyi.“Abantu abagxekayo bakhona futhi bayohlala bekhona. Yikhona okwenza umdlali ngamunye aziveze ukuthi ungubani enkundleni. Sekunesikhathi ngiseqenjini lesizwe futhi ngicabanga ukuthi ukuqina ngokomqondo yikhona okwenza ngingadikibali kusukela ngiqala ukudlala. Ngihlala ngiphendula okubi ngikwenze okuhle. Ngicabanga ukuthi yikhona okuzongenza ngingadikibali. Ngizoqhubeka nokusebenza kanzima eqenjini ukuze ngibuyelwe wukuzethemba. Kade ngingadlali izinyanga eziyishiyagalolunye. Angikwazi ukuzicindezela kakhulu,” kusho uKhune.“Angisalimele manje. Ngikulungele ukubanga ijezi eqenjini nalapha kwelesizwe. Ngicabanga ukuthi yingakho ngiklonyeliswe ngokubizwa eqenjini lesizwe ngumqeqeshi uNtseki. Uyakholwa ukuthi kukhona okukhulu engingakwengeza eqenjini. Okwamanje konke kusahamba kahle selokhu sifikile. Mina, uRonza (Ronwen) noDarren siyagqugquzelana. Ngibonga umqeqeshi uLee (Baxter) ngokuhlala esenza sihlale sizimisele.”IBafana isendaweni yesibili kuGroup C oholwa yiGhana. Inamaphuzu amathathu emuva kwemidlalo emibili. Emuva kokudlala imidlalo emibili neSao Tome, izoqedela eyokuhlunga neGhana neSudan ngonyaka ozayo.“Siyazi ukuthi kuzoba nzima kanjani kule midlalo yokuhlunga. Kodwa thina sifuna ukwenza isizwe siziqhenye. Sifuna ukudlalela ukuwina kuyona yonke imidlalo ukuze sizibekisele indawo emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu,” kusho uKhune.U-ITUMELENG Khune unozinti weBafana Bafana ngesikhathi leli qembu liziqeqesha eMoses Mabhida Stadium izolo Isithombe: BACKPAGEPIX
title: UKhune iyamkhuthaza eyokugxekwa

text: Umbukiso wamafilimu onganyelawa yiCentre for Creative Arts yaseNyuvesi KwaZulu-Natal bekungokuka-41 ukhona.UMary, unina kaSomizi Mhlongo-Motaung, uthole indondo yeBest Actress ngendawo kaMantoa ayidlala efilimini kaLemohang Jerimiah Mosese This is Not a Burial, It’s a Ressurection. UMary, oshone ngoJulayi, wayelingisa noJerry Mofokeng nabanye efilimini ephume ngonyaka odlule.I-This is Not a Burial, It’s a Ressurection inqobe indondo ye-Artistic Bravery neBest Direction.Phakathi kwamajaji abehlulela amafilimu ngokuhlukana kwawo kubalwa kubo umdidiyeli weSibaya, * -Angus Gibson, Mykel Parish Ajaere waseNigeria, umbhali wemidlalo yethelevishini, uBongi Ndaba, Edmund Mhlongo nabanye.Kweminye iminxa imiklomelo ihambe kanje:Best Short Film - ExamBest African Short & Best South African Short Film - Ruby and RoachBest Documentary - SoftieBest South African Documentary - InfluenceBest South African Film Award - The TreeBest Cinematography Award - Take Me Somewhere NiceBest Screenplay - Farewell AmorBest Actor - Ntare Guma Mbaho Mwire
title: UMary Twala uqholiswe esaziphumulela

text: Umbuzo: Ngingowesifazanengilotsholiwe ngaqedwa sekusele ukuthi ngishade, umyeni wami ufunaingane ngaphambikokuthi sishade kanti nabakubo ngokunjalo basho okufanayo.Inkinga ukuthi mina nesoka lakudala sake sazama ukuthola ingane kodwa kwangenzeka nokwaphoqa ukuthi siye kodokotela nokuyilapho bafike bangitshela khona ukuthi amathuba okuthi ngibambe angu-3% kuphela.Manje ngiyasaba ukutshela umyeni ngenxa yovalo lokuthi uzongishiya njengalo wasekuqaleni uma ezwa lezi zindaba.Sobabili asinayo ingane kodwa manje kubukeka sengathi mina ngeke ngikwazi ukumnikeza, ngididekile angazi noma ngimtshele okanye siqhubeke sizame mhlawumbe ucilo ungathuka uzishaya endukwini, uma ngithi ngiyamtshela iyiphi indlela elungile engingamtshela ngayo?Impendulo: Ukuba nomtwana kuyisipho esivela kuMdali, odokotela nabo bangabantu kuyenzeka babone ngenye indlela kodwa imiphumela ibe ngokunye.Udokotela wathi amathuba okukhulelwa kuwe angu-3%, akashongo ukuthi ngeke ukhulelwe. Ungalilahli ithemba.Anike nizame, nawe udle izinto ezizolekelela ukuvunda kwesibeletho sakho. Uma kwehluleka nizame ongoti, uma bebona ukuthi usekuwo lowo 3% ungayithi vu eyokuthi wake watshelwa phambilini ngalokhu.Umbuzo: Ngingubaba nje osekhulile, umkami uyisangoma nokudala ukuthi amathwasa angene ephuma la ekhaya futhi imvamisa kugcwala amathwasa esifazane. Inkinga engibhekene nayo ngiyahluleka ukuzibamba ngizithola sengilingeka ngishela amathwasa kwazise asemancane kanti futhi nomkami asisayi ocansini.Angazi noma ngenziwa yindlala yini noma ngenziwa ukubona abantu besifazane abaningi bephithiza phambi kwami.Yebo, bakhona engibashela bavume ngoba omunye ngaze ngaya naye ocansini kodwa abanye abavumi kunalokho bavele bathi bazotshela umama, ngingawuyeka kanjani lo mkhuba ngaphambi kokuthi ungifake enkingeni?Impendulo: Kungcono ngoba uyabona ukuthi le nto oyenzayo ayilungile, angazi ukuthi uyenzelani ngempela ngoba uzoqhatha umkakho namathwasa. Yize umkakho engasavumi nizijabulise ngocansi ngicabanga ukuthi unesizathu salokho futhi ngikholwa ukuthi nawe uyazi ukuthi abantu abanedlozi banemicilikisho kakhulu. Ukushela amathwasa kuyiphutha elikhulu ngempela, ngabe ngiyezwa ukuthi uyaphuma uyoshela ngaphandle yize nakho kungalungile. Iyeke le nto kungaze konakale. Hlala phansi nomkakho umchazele ngendlala ebhokile kuwe.Umbuzo: Ngiyibhungu ngenza unyaka wokuqala enyuvesi lapha eThekwini, ngithe ngifika ngavele ngaqonywa ubuthaphuthaphu kanti ngizoba nebhadi ngikhulelise osisi ababili kanye kanye.Ngiyazi ukuthi ngenze iphutha kodwa bengingacabangi ukuthi kungase kwenzeke kanjena.Mhla ngihamba ekhaya ubaba wangidonsa ngendlebe ukuthi mhla ngakhulelisa ngiyoshiya phansi isikole ngiyosebenza.Ngiyasaba angazi ngizomtshela kanjani le nto, angazi noma ngimtshele okanye ngithule ngoba uma ngimtshela uzongiyekisa ukufunda.Nalezi zingane ngeke ngikwazi ukuzifihla ingunaphakade. Ngingaphuma kanjani kulolu bishi?Impendulo: Akusekho ukuphuma kulolu bishi ungene ungenile futhi uvele ngekhanda.Ngizwa ngizwelana kakhulu nawe ngoba awukwazi ukuthula nendaba engaka futhi ke emakubo kosisi bazofuna ukufika phela bazobika isisu nokuzophoqa ke ukuthi ushone ekhaya ngoba isisu ngeke basibike enyuvesi.Kuzokusiza ukuqunga isibindi umazise ubaba wakho ngosukwenzile.Umbuzo: Ngingowesifazane kunobhuti esengizwane naye isikhathi eside siyabonana noma inini uma sikhumbulene.Ekuqaleni uthando lwethu beluhamba kahle kakhulu kodwa manje ngibona sengathi asisazwani kahle embhedeni ngoba naye uke wayixoxa le nto esho kona ukuthi ucansi lethu alusafani nasekuqaleni.Siyathandana impela kodwa hhayi uma sithi siyazijabulisa akusashayi khona ngempela.Le nto iyangikhathaza ngoba nginovalo lokuthi angase adikibale angishiye. Singenzenjani?Impendulo: Kungenzeka ukuthi senijwayelene kakhulu kangangoba seniyehluleka ukuqala izinto ezintsha embhedeni.Ucansi kwezinye izikhathi luyaye lufane nokudla.Uma udla into eyodwa njalo noma imnandi igcina ingasakujabulisi.Imfihlo yasekhishini ilele ekutheni ukwazi ukupheka ukudla okumnandi okuhlukile ngaso sonke isikhathi.Nasembhedeni akumele njalo uhlezi uqhamuka nento eyodwa. Zamani nezitayela ezintsha.- Elawini likaMaGumede
title: Ezothando: Asisabuzwa ubumnandi uma siya ocansini nesoka lami

text: INKAKHA yomlingisi, uRapulana Seiphemo, odume ngelika Tau Mogale okuyindawo ayilingisa kwiGenerations: The Legacy, uvele kafushane enkantolo yamacala ezimali ngoLwesine ekuseni ngezinsolo zokungayikhokhi intela.Umbuso usola uSeiphemo ngokungayikhokhi imali yentela kusukela ngonyaka ka-2010 kuya ku-2013.
