AbeSouth African Revenue Services bathi lo mlingisi ukweleta imali engaphezulu kukaR48 000.Icala lihlehliselwe uNovemba 13 njengoba abameli bakhe becele ukunikezwa isikhathi sokuthi bake baxhumane nabakwaSARS bahlele ukulungisa lolu daba.USeiphemo waziswe ukuthi lizoqhubeka leli cala uma engaxhumani nabakwaSARS.Abameli bakhe baxolisile bathi usezame kaningi ukuxhumana nabakwaSARS kwangaphumelela.Ngesikhathi inkantolo isahleli lo mlingisi ubebukeka ekhululekile.Ubephelezelwa uzakwabo alingisa naye kwiGenerations, uZoe Mthiyane, olingisa indawo kaZitha othandana noTau kulo mdlalo.Nyakenye ziqinisekisiwe izindaba zokuthi sebeyathandana laba.Lo mlingisi uvela enkantolo ngalolu daba nje, abanye osaziwayo okubalwa kubo umethuli wezinhlelo uBonang Matheba, nomdlali webhola uTeko Modise nabo basobishini nabaqoqi bentela kuleli njengoba nabo bebengayikhokhi intela.
title: URapulana Seiphemo uvele enkantolo kwelokungayikhokhi intela

text: ITHIMBA lesikhashana elibhekelele ukuhlelwa kwabusha kwe-ANCYL, lithi yize kukhona ukuhamba kancane kokulethwa kwamagama ohlu lwamalungu e-ANCYL ezifundazweni kodwa ingqungquthela ingoMeyi nonyaka. Izolo amalungu esigungu sesikhashana esibizwa nge-ANC NYTT, abe nesithangami sabezindaba ngemuva komhlangano obungempelasonto.Kulesi sithangami, athe azimisele ukuba i-ANCYL ibuyiselwe esimeni iphinde ikwazi ukusebenzela abantu abasha.“Kunezifunda nezifundazwe ezingakawaqinisekisi amagama amalungu e-ANCYL. Kodwa kukhona amagatsha angaphezu kuka-2 000 wona esekwenzile lokho, zikhona nezifundazwe eseziyilindele ingqungquthela.Ngakho-ke zonke izifundazwe zizonikezwa isikhathi sokuba zikwenze lokhu okufanele kokuletha amagama. Ingqungquthela yesi-26 ye-ANCYL izoqhubeka ngoMeyi 2020 e-University of Free State. Eminye imininingwane izothunyelwa maduze,” kusho isitatimende abasithumele ngemuva komhlangano.Amalungu aleli komiti kubalwa uMnuz Malusi Gigaba, Fikile Mbalula, Collen Maine, Dakota Legoete, noNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, bahlangana njalo ngamasonto ukuzohlelela le ngqungquthela.
title: Baqinisekisa ukuhlala okungenazihibe kwengqungquthela ye-ANCYL

text: UNOBHALA-Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule uthembise ukuvikela umengameli wakuleli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa kulabo abazama ukumdicilela phansi ngenkathi ekhuluma emhlanganweni we-ANC Youth League eHammanskraal, ePitoli, ngempelasonto. UMagashule ubize ukuhlaselwa kukaRamaphosa njengomzamo wokudicilela phansi igama lenhlangano. Uphinde wanxusa amalungu e-ANCYL ukuba avikele uRamaphosa kulabo abamhlaselayo. UMagashule uthe kujwayelekile ukuthi omengameli balenhlangano bahlaselwe yilabo abafuna ukulimaza isithunzi se-ANC. “Bazofuna ukuhlasela uRamaphosa. “Indima yami nawe ukuthi sivikele umengameli we-ANC, ngoba uma kuhlaselwa yena, inhloso ukuthi kuqedwe ngenhlangano,” kusho uMagashule.  URamaphosa usemanzini abilayo kulezi zinsuku njengoba uphenyo olwenziwa uMvikeli woMphakathi uBusisiwe Mkhwebane lwaveza ukuthi waphula umthethosisekelo waphinde waqamba amanga ePhalamende ngomnikelo ka-R500 000 okuthiwa wawunikezwa yinkampani i-African Global Operations, ukuba axhase umkhankaso wesikhundla sikamongameli we-ANC ngonyaka odlule. URamaphosa uwuphikisile lombiko njengoba ewufake enkantolo ezimele ngenhloso yokuba ubuyekezwe yiyo. Kuphinde kwaputshuka izitatimende zasebhange kwabezindaba ebeziveza ukuthi abanikele emkhankasweni kaRamaphosa baxhase ngemali elinganiselwa ku-R1 billion, okushiye abaningi bekhexile. UMagashule uthe i-ANC kumele igxile ekuqiniseni ubumbano ngaphakathi kwinhlangano ukuze izoba nethuba lokunyusa amavoti iphinde ibuyise isithunzi sayo. “Ubumbano akusiyo into yokudlala. Uma singabumbani, asikhohlwe ngeTshwane. Sihleli phezulu ngesihlalo esisodwa eGauteng. UMagashule uthe oNgqongqoshe abaphikisana nenqubomgomo ye-ANC badukisa abantu baseNingizimu Africa mayelana nezikhundla kwi-ANC. UMagashule uveze ukuthi uzoqhubeka nokukhuluma esidlangalaleni uma abasebenzi balenhlangano bephikisana nenqubomgomo ye-ANC.
title: UMagashule uthembisa ukuvikela uRamaphosa

text: USHADELWE ngokwesintu umlingisi womdlalo Isibaya (Mzansi Magic 161), olingisa indawo kaZebedewu kodwa owazakhela udumo ngokuhaya izinkondlo uSbo Da Poet.USbo waseMandawe, eScottburgh, ushade nengoduso yakhe uNoluthando Maseko waseDumbe, ngaseVryheid.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uSbo uthe wahlangana noNoluthando ePiet Retief ezihambela ngezinto ezithinta umsebenzi kwaba nzima ukuthi amzibe.“Kwakungu-2010 sibonana, wangithatha ngendlela ayemuhle ngayo ngacela inombolo yakhe yocingo wanginika. Ngamtshela indlela engizizwa ngayo kodwa wangishikilisa isikhashana kwagcina kulungile,” kusho uSbo.Uthe useqede konke sekushoda umshado omhlophe.“Ngeke ngisho ukuthi uzoba nini njengoba sisanda kwenza lona wesintu nje kodwa wona uzoba khona,” kusho uSbo.Uthe konke okuthinta ilobolo nomembeso ukwenze ngonyaka odlule.“Ngizibona nginenhlanhla ngempela ngokuthola owesifazane ofana nonkosikazi wami. Ngibonga abangani bami nozakwethu abaphume ngobuningi bezongeseka kulo mcimbi,” kuchaza uSbo.USbo akuyena kuphela usaziwayo ebeziwushaya kuyena kule mpelasonto njengoba umlingisi waseHammarsdale owaduma kwiGenerations, uXoli Zondi ebophe elikasofa silahlane ngoLwesihlanu.UXoli ushade noPhiwokuhle “Bravo” Zamisa emcimbini oqale ngoLwesihlanu eCity Hill, eHillcrest waphelela kamkhwenyana eMthwalume ngoMgqibelo.Khonamanjalo insizwa yaseMlaza eyaduma ohlelweni ama-Idols SA naseqenjini lomculo wokholo iJoyous Celebration, uKhaya Mthethwa, ushadelwe ngokwesintu waphinde wembesa umndeni kaNtandoyenkosi obenguMiss South Africa ngonyaka odlule.UKhaya ushade noNtando kubo kwale ntokazi eMpumalanga ngoMgqibelo.
title: Ushadelwe ngokwesintu odume ngezinkondlo

text: ZIYAQONGA izibalo zabahaqwa yiCovid-19 kuleli njengoba kuvele ukuthi ngosuku bangu-4 236 abangenwe yileli gciwane. Uma kuqhathaniswa nangoLwesihlanu babe ngu-3 332, abatholakale benegciwane ngosuku olulodwa. Lokhu kukhomba ukuthi izibalo ziyenyuka zinsuku zonke kuleli zabatheleleka ngegciwane.Ngokusho kukaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize,  bangu-1 635 465 abakuleli abatholakale benegciwane. Abashonile ngenxa yegciwane ngoMgqibelo kutholakale ukuthi bangu-53, eGauteng babengu-27, Free State 17, babehlanu KwaZulu-Natal, kanti bathathu eWestern Cape 3, bese eba yedwa e-Eastern Cape. Abekho okubikwe ukuthi bashonile eLimpopo, Mpumalanga, North West nase- Northern Cape. Lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu asebeshonile kuleli bangu-55 802. Abasindile bangu:1  539 395, okusho ukuthi bami ku:94.2%. Abantu asebehloliwe selokhu kwabheduka igciwane bangu: 11 354 930. Khonamanjalo ucwaningo olwenziwe i-African Covid-19 Critical Care Outcomes Study (Acccos), luveza ukuthi emazweni angu-10 ase-Afrika, okubalwa nelakuleli siphezulu isibalo sabafayo ngenxa yaleli gciwane. Lolu cwaningo olwenziwe kubantu abadala abangu-3 140, phakathi kukaMeyi noDisemba nyakenye, luveza ukuthi siphezulu isibalo sabafayo uma sebengeniswe emagunjini abagula kakhulu ngenxa yegciwane. Luthole ukuthi uhhafu weziguli zishona ngaphandle kokunikekwa i-oxygen. Ucwaningo luthole nokuthi labo abanoshukela mancane kakhulu amathuba okusinda.
title: Siyenyuka isibalo sabaneCovid-19 kuleli

text: ISILO samaBandla uGoodwill Zwelithini, sikhwele sadilika kubantu bakuleli sathi bangothathekile abahamba bedlala abantu.Sikhale ngokuthi kufika abantu beqhamuka kwamanye amazwe bafike bavule amasonto bese kuyagcwala.“Namhlanje sinenkinga, maningi amabandla. Ngoba ningothathekile, kufika izigebengu zithi ziyanithandazela, zithi uma sezikhuluma izilimi zazo nithi hawu sekwehla impela imimoya, awulwazi ulimi lwalo muntu, kusasa kuqhamuke izingane zithi kade esidlwengula,” kusho iSilo.Sithe abantu manje basungula amabandla ukuze benze imali.ISilo sithe asikhumbuli nangelilodwa ilanga kuthiwa uJesu wake weba imali kodwa manje abaholi bamabandla bahlale besolwa ngokuqola abantu.Sithe inkinga, abefundisa bagxisha abantu ngezwi likaNkulunkulu bebe belambile.“Abantu asibagxishe ngezwi likaNkulunkulu kodwa ezinqolobaneni sibe sazi ukuthi kukhona ukudla ngoba uma ugxisha abantu ngezwi belambile bagcina sebekhalaza bethi lo mfundisi uyasibambezela ngabe siya kwabani siyobamba iyambazi,” kusho iMbube.Sikhulu isikhalo ngabefundisi bangaphandle njengoba omunye wabo uTimothy Omotoso namanje esatokile ngenxa yezinsolo zokudlwengula abazalwane.U-Omotoso osehlale esitokisini cishe unyaka wonke, wabanjwa ngamaphoyisa esezama ukweqa lapha eNingizimu Afrika esephindela ezweni lakhe eNigeria.
title: ISilo sikhwele sadilika kwabaluthwa amasonto

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEISUPERSPORT United izandisele umsebenzi okumele iwenze emkhankasweni wayo wokuvikela isicoco seMTN 8 ngesikhathi ibanjelwa ekhaya yiBloemfontein Celtic emlenzeni wokuqala kowandulela owamanqamu omqhudelwano izolo eLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli.ICeltic, ebidlalela ekuhambeni futhi idinga igoli njengezivakashi, iyibone kuqala inethi ngegoli elivalelwe phakathi nguNdumiso Mabena ngomzuzu ka-14. Ele-United lishaywe uGhamphani Lungu ngomzuzu ka-49.Umlenze wesibili ungoMgqibelo eSiesa Ramabodu Stadium, eFree State. Ngokushaya igoli,  uMabena utshengise ukubaluleka kwakhe kwazise bekungumdlalo wakhe wokuqala selokhu kuqale isizini ka-2020/21.Igoli lasekuhambeni leSiwelele lisho ukuthi emlenzeni wesibili umthwalo uzobe usukwi-United ukuthi izame ukuthola igoli kuqala ukuze izinikeze ithuba lokufinyelela kowamanqamu omqhudelwano ewunqobe ngesizini edlule.Womabili amaqembu aye emdlalweni wayizolo ephuma esibhaxwini kweyeligi. ICeltic ishaywe womafikizolo iSwallows kwathi iSuperSport yabhaxabulwa yiLamontville Golden Arrows.Okuqaphelekile ngalo mdlalo wukuthi bekunganqoba noma wubani ngoba womabili abengazibekile phansi. Athengane umdlalo uqala kwaze kwaba uyaphela.Kwi-United bekubhoke uJamie Webber noClayton Daniels. Ngakolunye uhlangothi uLucky Baloyi noVictor Letsoalo noSifiso Ngobeni bebengazibekile phansi kwiCeltic. Ngomzuzu ka-17 uDaniels ucishe wayibeka phakathi i-free kick emuva kokudlaliswa kabi kukaGhamphani.Ekuqaleni kwesiwombe sesibili mhlawumbe ngabe kukhulunywa okuhlukile ukube  uThamsanqa Gabuza we-United akatatazelanga  emuva kwephutha likaJustice Chabalala.Ngomzuzu ka-49, uGhampani ukuqede konke ukukhuluma eshaya igoli emuva kwebhola ebeligotshwe nguMoses Waosia.Ebona uJohn Maduka, opheka iCeltic, ukuthi izinto ziyonakala, ukhiphe uVictor Letsoalo wafaka uTebogo Potsane.Umdlalo usuya ngasekupheleni iCeltic isindele umsizi kanompempe, uGabuza eselibeke phakathi. ISiwelele sife olwembiza kuphuma unozinti  uJackson Mabokgwane ngenxa yokulimala.Isithombe:BACKPAGEPIX
title: I-United izandisele umsebenzi idlala ngokulingana neCeltic

text: UKHOMBISE ukukhula umcimbi walo nyaka iCelebrate Africa Carnival & Festival, injongo yawo okuwukubungaza inyanga kaMeyi, yokuthi abantu baziqhenye ngemvelaphi yabo.Lo mcimbi ongowesibili kulo nyaka, ukhombise isasasa kwabaningi njengoba abantu bebephume ngobuningi babo bezokhombisa ngamasiko abo ahlukene.Kume yonke into emigwaqweni yeTheku ngesikhathi kunomviliyelo obuhanjelwe abantu abaqhamuka emazweni ahlukene ase-Afrika nabakade becula izingoma zala bedabuka khona.Lo mcimbi uqale ngomviliyelo nokugcine ngokuthi kube nedili lomcimbi okunandise kulo uKhuzani, Sjava, DJ Happygal, Zandi Khumalo, Babo Ngcobo nabanye. UZanele Mbokazi okunguyena ohlela lo mcimbi, uthe into ezobenza baqhubeke bahlele lo mcimbi ukuthi abafuni ukubona kuchitheka igazi ngenxa yokucwasana kuleli.“Umcimbi ofana nalo ungokugqugquzela uzwano kuthina singabantu base-Afrika. Siyabonga kubona bonke abaphumile,” kusho uZanele.Lo mcimbi ubuhanjelwe oNgqongqoshe okukhona kubo owamaSiko namaCiko kuzwelonke, uNathi Mthethwa nowokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uWeziwe Thusi.
title: Kukhuphuke izinga kugujwa owase-Afrika

text: UBEYISA izingane zakhe emtholampilo ukuze agome usana unina wezingane oshibilike emfuleni kwaminza usana eNdaya Reserve, eNtshenkombo, eDududu.UNksz Nothando Nzimande (26), usagcinwe esibhedlela nendodakazi yakhe esindile, * -Fanelesibonge, esesimeni esibucayi emuva kokumuka nomfula uMkhomazi.Udadewabo kaNksz Nzimande, uNksz Nkule Nzimande, utshele Isolezwe izolo ukuthi udadewabo naye ubesefuna ukuziphonsa emfuleni emuva kokukhishwa kwengane yakhe enezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili, uNkanzimulo, isishonile.“Udadewethu kube sengathi ulahlekelwa umqondo emuva kwalesi sigameko. Naye ubesefuna ukuziphonsa emfuleni.Ubeya emtholampilo Kwabaniyena, eyogoma indodakazi yakhe encane, bese eyisa enye kudokoteka njengoba ibigula inomkhuhlane. Ngokusho kwabazibonele, ubephethe isikhwama, ebelethe ingane encane, enye eyibambe ngesandla.Ushelele, ingane endala ibe isihamba namanzi. Esazama ukuyihlenga kudedeleke abebophe ngakho ingane emhlane yabe isiwela emanzini yamuka nomfula.Bese kumuka izingane ezimbili, udadewethu waphuma ngaphandle komfula wamemeza. Abafana abebeseduze bangene emfuleni bakwazi ukukhipha eneminyaka emithathu iphila, le nye imuke kakhulu yaze yatholwa kwenye indawo. Ishonele khona lapho,” kusho uNksz Nzimande.Uthe sekunesikhathi becela ukwakhelwa ibhuloho phezu komfula ngoba kuyaphoqa ukuba bawele umfula uma beya emtholampilo.“Udadewethu ubejwayele ukuhamba nezingane zakhe kuwo lo mfula, uma eya emtholampilo.Wonke umuntu kule ndawo uwela emfuleni uma eya emtholampilo ngoba yiwona oseduze. Siyacela impela uhulumeni alusukumele lolu sizi esibhekene nalo, asakhele ibhuloho,” kusho uNksz Nzimande.Kuthiwa abantu basendaweni sebephelile beminza emfuleni uma beya emtholampilo.UMnuz Ndodi Kweyama, osemkhandlwini wenkosi yendawo, inkosi uPhiku’buxoki Bele, ukuvumile lokhu wathi sebecele kaningi ukwakhelwa ibhuloho ngoba abantu bayaminza emfuleni.“Uma siya emtholampilo oseduze nathi kuyaphoqa ukuba siwele emfuleni. Ngisho nami kumele ngabe kade ngaya emtholampilo, manje nginqena ukuyowela.Uma ungaweli, omunye umtholampilo useDududu, kumele ugibele. Sicela kwakhiwe ibhuloho ukuze kuzophela ukuminza kwabantu,”kusho uKweyama.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ugibela ngemali engaphezu kukaR60 uma uya emtholampilo oseDududu.Unina walezi zingane kuthiwa akasebenzi, obekwenza angabi nayo imali yokugibela ahambise izingane emtholampilo okude. Umndeni uthe kunzima kakhulu ukwamukela okuwehlele.
title: Ubeyogoma ingane eminze emfuleni

text: UMNYANGO weMfundo ePhakeme uhlela ukusungula ihhovisi elizimele elizobhekana  nezikhalo zomphakathi  emkhakheni wemfundo ephakeme.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uDkt Blade Nzimande izolo, uthe  lokhu kuzovulela umphakathi ithuba lokudlulisa izikhalo, ngendlela izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme eziphethe ngayo nalezo eziphathelene  nomnyango.“Lokhu besilokhu sikudingida ngaphakathi  kusukela nyakenye. Ihhovisi lizokwenza umsebenzi womvikeli womphakathi wemfundo ephakeme.  Uma unezikhalo ngesikhungo semfundo noma umnyango, lizobhekana nalokho,” kusho uNzimande.Uthe lokhu kuzosiza ngokuthi umnyango ubhekane nomsebenzi wawo kunokuthi wamukele inqwaba yezikhalo  iningi lazo elivamise ukufika uma kuqala unyaka.Lokhu kulandela umbhikisho wezitshudeni eMangosuthu University of Technology izolo zikhala ngokugqoza kohlelo lokubhalisa enyuvesi njengoba zithe zisengu-2000 kuphela izitshudeni ezibhalisile ekubeni inyuvesi yakhipha isimemezelo sokuthi ukufunda kuzoqala ngoMsombuluko.Umengameli esigungwini sabaholi bezitshudeni uMthokozisi Gumede uthe inyuvesi kumele ibhalise izitshudeni ezingu-13000.“Zingu- 9000 izitshudeni ezingakabhalisi.  Uma inyuvesi ithi kuyaqala ukufunda ngoMsombuluko obani abazobe besemakilasini?” kubuza uMthokozisi.Ukhale nangezindawo zokuhlala athe azikatholwa. UNzimande uthe umnyango  uyaxhumana neziphathimandla enyuvesi ukuthola ngalolu daba.Umbhikisho wezitshudeni kule nyuvesi bewuhambisana nesiteleka sabasebenzi abafuna ukunyuselwa amaholo.Obambe njengoSekela-Shansela e-MUT, uSolwazi Manyane Makua uthe ngoLwesibili bebenomhlangano nabaholi bezitshudeni, nomunye nabezinyunyana zabasebenzi.“Siyahlangana nabamele izitshudeni ukuthola isisombululo kwabakufunayo. Izitshudeni ezibhikishayo ziyingcosana kakhulu, ngakho ngeke sivume kuphazamiseke izinhlelo zenyuvesi. Isenzo sabo sibeka impilo yezinye izitshudeni nabasebenzi engcupheni,”  kusho uMakua.Mayelana nodaba oluthinta amaholo uthe inyuvesi ibeke u- 3.3% etafuleni kodwa abasebenzi bafuna u- 8%, wathi izingxoxo ziyaqhubeka.Imizamo yokuthola abasebenzi ibhuntshile njengoba ubengekho obezimisele ngokukhuluma nabezindaba.Khonamanjalo iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini,  ilihlehlisele uJuni, 4 icala lezitshudeni ezingu-16 eziboshwe kunombhikisho e-DUT. Lokhu kwenziwe  ukuze kucutshungulwe ubufakazi bama-video njengoba zibhekene namacala okususa uthuthuva emphakathini nokucekela phansi impahla.  Kuvele ukuthi zonke bezizobheka izikhala kule nyuvesi kanti sinye ebesibhalisile. Badedelwe ngoLwesibili ngebheyili  ka-R500 umuntu emunye. Abane kubona baneminyaka engaphansi kuka-18
title: Owemfundo ephakeme uhlela ukuba nehhovisi lezikhalo

text:
MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENI noMINENHLE MKHIZEK UKHONA umoya ovunguza kuCricket South Africa (CSA) ngodaba lomdlali wamaProteas, u-Aaron Phangiso, okuvela ukuthi usolwa yile nhlangano ngokuyiphoxa kulandela isigameko esenzeke endizeni nyakenye lapho lo mdlali ayedakwe khona engazazi ngisho igama lakhe ephoxa kwasani ebhanoyini.Lokhu sekwenze kwaba nokungabaza ngekusasa lalo mshwibi othembisayo kwazise ngendlela ayedakwe ngayo waze waphoqeleka ukuba afakwe kwenye indiza ukuze ezolala kancane kwehle amankwebevu.Ngokwemibiko eqale ukuvunguza eKapa, uPhangiso (31) nabanye abadlali bamaProteas bebesendizeni ngo-Okthoba nyakenye besuka e-India lapho iqembu lakuleli lalidlala khona. Endizeni eyabe isuka eMumbai izofike ibashiye eDubai lapho bebezoxhuma khona ebheke eGoli, uPhangiso (owayehlobe ephelele ngomfaniswano wamaProteas) kuthiwa waphoxa ngendlela esabekayo izintokazi ezisebenza ebhanoyini nabanye abagibeli ababezama ukumkhalima.Kuthiwa ngendlela isimo esabe sisibi ngayo kwaphoqeleka ukuthi angavunyelwa ukungena endizeni eyabe isiza lapha eNingizimu Afrika. Kuthiwa wayezofakwa kwelandelayo ababecabanga ukuthi notshwala buzobe sebehlile egazini.Kuvele ukuthi eDubai kwasala kancane ukuthi aboshwe kwazise wayeselwa kwaze kwangenelela ezinye zezikhulu ze-CSA zimncenga ukuba avume ukungena endizeni elandelayo.Imibuzo esivela manje ngeyokuthi kungenzeka yini ukuthi uPhangiso ushiywe ngaphandle esikwatini esizobhekana ne-England kweyemidlalo yosuku olulodwa ngenxa yalesi sigameko esiphoxayo? Usedlalele amaProteas kweyosuku olulodwa engu-16 namaT20 ayisishiyagalolunye.ULinda Zondi, oyinhloko yabaqoki kumaProteas, utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi uPhangiso akazange ashiyelwe ukuziphatha ngendlela engalindelekile kuyena kwelesizwe.“Izinkundla eziningi lapha ekhaya azikuvumeli ukuthi udlale ngama-spinner amabili. Eqenjini lethu u-Imran Tahir nguyena oyi-spinner esihamba phambili. Uma sidinga i-spinner sesibili sizosebenzisa u-JP Duminy. Ngakho sibone kungcono ukuthi uPhangiso simshiye adlale kuMomentum One Day Cup neqembu lakhe. Indaba yokuziphatha kwakhe ayizange ibe nomthelela ekutheni asale ngaphandle esikwatini esizobhekana ne-England kweyosuku olulodwa. Uma kungukuthi ikhona into ekanjalo izikhulu kwiCricket South Africa zizobhekana nayo. Njengamanje bezingakaze zisho lutho kithina. Simshiye ngoba sibone ukuthi ngeke adlale. Uma kukhona okwenzekayo kuTahir sizombiza. UPhangiso usesezinhlelweni zethu,” kusho uZondi.Akukona okokuqala uPhangiso eba sematheni ngenxa yezinkamba kwazise nyakenye ngo-Ephreli uke wavalelwa ngenxa yokushayela ebukhile engakubo eSoshanguve, ePitoli.Khonamanjalo uZondi utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi uStephen Cook nguyena ozovula noDean Elgar emdlalweni wokugcina wamaProteas ne-England ngoLwesihlanu eSuperSport Park, eCenturion. UCook, odlala kuBizhub Highveld Lions, uzothatha indawo kaStiaan van Zly owehlelwe yifomu. AmaProteas avele aseshaywe ngo 2-0 kulolu chungechunge lwemidlalo emine yamaTest.
title: ‘Akashiyelwanga amankwebevu u-Aaron Phangiso’

text: INATIONAL Teachers’ Union (Natu) ayeneme ngokwethulwa kwezifundo zobuchwepheshe, ezihambisana namarobhothi akhulumayo, ezizofakwa ezikoleni ukulungiselela i-4th Industrial Revolution (4IR).UMengameli weNatu, uMnuz Alan Thompson, uthe yize bengaxabene nokuthuthukiswa kwezobuchwepheshe kodwa uMnyango wezeMfundo ugagamelile. Ekupheleni konyaka odlule uNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyiSisekelo, uNkk Angie Motshekga, waveza ukuthi kumi ngomumo ukwethulwa kweCoding and Robotics Curriculum kwaGrade R kuya kuGrade 3 noGrade 7 nonyaka.Uthe kuzokwethulwa irobhothi elikhulumayo elibizwa ngoZora elizofakwa ezikoleni ukulekelela uhlelo.UThompson uthe inkulu imali ezosebenza kufakwa lezi zifundo kuthengwa namarobhothi ekubeni umnyango usahlulwa ukuletha izidingo ezibalulekile.“Sinenkinga yokuba nentsha nothisha abangaqashiwe ngoba ayikho imisebenzi. Uhulumeni uthembisa ukwandisa amathuba omsebenzi kodwa lolu hlelo luzoqeda imisebenzi yabantu. Kumele ngabe konke esikwenzayo sizama ukwandisa amathuba omsebenzi,” kusho yena.Uthe imali ezosebenza kuthengwa amarobhothi kumele ngabe iletha izidingo ezikoleni ezidonsa kanzima.“Kunezikole ezingenawo amakhompyutha, amathoyilethi nemitapo yolwazi. Ngeke sisebenzise imali engaka kumarobhothi akhulumayo esikhundleni sokuba ngabe kubhekelelwa inkinga yezidingo,” kusho uThompson.Ngesikhathi ememezela imiphumela ka-matric ngoJanuwari eGoli uNkk Motshekga uziphathile izifundo zobuchwepheshe. Emcimbini wemiphumela bekukhona nerobhothi elikhulumayo elibizwa ngoPepper, okuyilona lokuqala elenziwa yiSoftBank Robotics.Ungqongqoshe uphakamise ukuthi irobhothi lilethwe. Lokhu kuwubufakazi bokuthi umnyango usuzilungiselele ukufika kwe-4IR.Okhulumela uMnyango weMfundo eyiSisekelo, uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uthe ziwu-90 izikole okusahlolwa kuzo iCoding and Robotics Curriculum. Uhlelo luhamba kahle okufakazelwe wukuvakasha kukangqongqoshe kwesinye sezikole okuhlolwa kuso uhlelo eLimpopo ngenyanga edlule.“Konke kuhamba kahle futhi othisha baqeqeshiwe nezinsiza zikhona,” kusho yena.Uthe iNatu iyaphaphalaza ngezikhalo zayo. “Lokhu kuzoletha amathuba omsebenzi kulabo abebefunde kulo mkhakha wezobuchwepheshe kodwa bengaqasheki. Izikole esifake kuzo lolu hlelo zinawo amakhompyutha nengqalasizinda. Ngeke sincishe amathuba izikole ezizidingayo lezi zifundo ngenxa yezimbalwa esisazozilethela izidingo,” kusho uMhlanga.
title: I-Natu ishaya amakhala nge-4IR

text: ISHAYA amakhala i-EFF ngokuqokwa kukaMnuz Job Mokgoro ekubeni abe uNdunankulu waseNorth West.UMokgoro uqokwe esikhundleni ebesiphethwe uMnuz Supra Mahumapelo obenguNdunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe, waxoshwa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa emuva kokuthi kuqubuke imibhikisho umphakathi umsola ngokwehluleka ukuwulethela izidingo zawo.NgoLwesine ebusuku uMokgoro ufungiswe kwesokuba ilungu lePhalamende esifundazweni. UMokgoro(70) wethulwe nguNobhala Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule.Nakuba encoywa kwezokuphatha uMokgoro, i-EFF ithe ayihambisani nokuqokwa kwakhe.“USolwazi Job Mokgoro uyazifanela nje nabantu abakhohlakele njengoSupra Mahumapelo, okwaphoqeleka ukuthi akhishwe ehhovisi emuva koxhaxha lwamacala enkohlakalo esaphethe,” kusho uNobhala we-EFF kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Papiki Babuile.Ngokwaleli qembu, uMokgoro wuyena owaba nesandla ekutheni kuqhubeke inkohlakalo kulesi sifundazwe.Uthe i-ANC yenzele phansi umphakathi waseNorth West ngokuthi imqoke abe wuNdunankulu.Uthe ngenkathi uMokgoro esengumqondisi obambile ehhovisi likaNdunankulu, wathola ithenda yokusabalalisa iThe New Age (esibizwa ngeThe Afro Voice), okuyiphephandaba elaliphethwe umndeni waKwaGupta.
title: I-EFF ayiyizwa eyokuqokwa kukaMokgoro eNorth West

text: ISITOBHA se-Ajax Cape Town, * -Eric Chipeta, sishumayela ivangeli lobumbano kuleli qembu eliphikwa yimiphumela phezu kokuba selishintshe umqeqeshi.I-Urban Warriors iyiqale kabi isizini ka-2016/2017, yadlala imidlalo eyisishiyagalolunye ingawini. Ukubhimba kwezinto kuholele ekutheni asule umqeqeshi uRoger de Sa osethathe umsebenzi zokupheka iMaritzburg United. Nakuba umqeqeshi omusha, uStanley Menzo, efike wathembisa kodwa leli qembu seliphindele obhukwini. Emidlalweni emithathu yakamuva, i-Ajax ayikaze iwine. Isihlulwe kabili okukhona nomdlalo ebhabhadiswe kuwona yiBidvest Wits ngo 5-0 emasontweni adlule.UChipeta, obegijima kuChippa United ngesizini edlue, ufike ku-Urban Warriors ekuqaleni kwesizini.“Ayikho inkinga esinayo eqenjini engingayikhomba eyenza sihluleke ukuwina imidlalo. Kudingeka singabadlali sibumbane, sisebenze ekutheni sishaye amagoli, nasekuvimbeni ukuthi angangeni ngakithi. Njengeqembu ngikholwa wukuthi sidlala kahle kodwa singenelwa amagoli kalula,” kusho uChipeta waseZimbabwe.“Ngiyakholwa wukuthi isifiso sethu sokuqeda kuTop 8 sisengafezeka. Siyiqale kabi isizini kodwa emuva kokufika komqeqeshi omusha izinto zikhombise ukuhlangana. UMenzo ungumqeqeshi osondele kakhulu kubadlali futhi ulethe izinga elicokeme endleleni izinto okufanele zenziwe ngayo eqenjini.”I-Ajax isendaweni ka-11 ku-log ye-Absa Premiership ngamaphuzu angu-19 emuva kwemidlalo engu-18. Ingelinye lamaqembu amane kuPremiership asengenelwe amagoli angaphezu kuka-25 emidlalweni yeligi. Amanye yiBaroka (27) esemsileni, Highlands Park (34) ne-Orlando Pirates (27).Amaqhinga kaMenzo azophinde avivinywe uma i-Ajax isibhekene neKaizer Chiefs emdlalweni wePremiership e-Athlone Stadium, eKapa, kusasa, ngo-8.15 ebusuku. Lo mdlalo abaphathi be-Urban Warrios kade bewuzamela ukuthi udlalelwe eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini kodwa yabachitha iPremier Soccer League (PSL).“Ngokwezinga labadlali iChiefs ingaphezulu kunathi, abantu abaningi sebevele bazitshele ukuthi sesihluliwe. Kodwa-ke konke kusezandleni zethu, sinalo ithuba lokuthola amaphuzu amathathu. Kudingeka sisebenze ngokuphindiwe,” kusho uChipeta.“Kusinikeze ukuzethemba ukungahlulwa emdlalweni odlule sibhekene nePolokwane. Umfutho esiwukhombisile kufanele sakhele phezu kwawo. Uma singenza lokho, singawathola amaphuzu kuChiefs.”IChiefs, esanda kusunduzwa esicongweni se-log, izobhekana ne-Ajax ihambela phezulu kulandela ukuhlula iHighlands Park eThekwini ngempelasonto edlule. Inamaphuzu angu-33 emidlalweni engu-18.
title: 'Sinethuba lamaphuzu kwiChiefs'

text: MHLELI: Ngixwayisa umphakathi ngamaqola asebaqedile abantu ethi abadayisela izindawo kanti ayabaqola.Ngingomunye wabo okhokhe uR25 000 wokubambisa ngoDisemba 11 wangonyaka owedlule ngendawo Erf 289 Ziqubu Rd eNazareth, ePinetown.Ngikhokhe emuva kokuba sebelethe wonke amaphepha kubameli emveni kwalokho bashaye bachitha. Ngiyathola ukuthi umkhuba wabo abawenzayo futhi baningi abagebengwe njengami.Omunye abamgebengile ubakhiphe kwiFacebook nezithombe zabo enginazo nabameli abanawo amakhophi omazisi babo. Ngicela ukusiza abanye ngoba basazifaka izikhangiso zabo ephepheniBongani Ngcobo
title: [IMIBONO] Amaqola asebaqedile abantu edayisa izindawo

text: AMAPHOYISA anethemba lokuthi sizobathoba amanxeba abahlukumezeka isigwebo seminyaka engu-30 esinikwe owesilisa owabulala ngokugwaza amadoda amabili angabazala.U-Given Mkhize (32) ugwetshwe yiNkantolo yesiFunda eThekwini ngamacala amabili okubulala uMthobisi Dlamini nomzala wakhe, uSthembiso Dlamini.Kuthiwa uMkhize wagajwa yintukuthelo ngemva kwengxabano nabafi lapho babehlala khona emijondolo eSimplace, e-Effingham, eThekwini, ngoJulayi 11, 2020.Le ndoda kuthiwa yasuka yaqonda endlini yayolanda ummese yabuya yabhokoda la madoda angabazala yawabulala.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe emva kwesehlakalo uMkhize wadla phansi waya ekubhaceni.Uqhube ngokuthi amaphoyisa aseGreenwood Park avula amacala amabili okubulala kwase kuqala uphenyo olunzulu lokuthungathwa kukaMkhize.“Uphenyo lwabaseshi lwabaholela emzini wesihlobo sikaMkhize ayecashe kuwona eBulwer ngoJulayi 14. Kwabuywa naye wase egcinwa esiteshini samaphoyisa. Inkantolo yethulelwa idokodo elinobufakazi obuqandula ikhanda obugcine bumgojele uMkhize,’ kusho uCapt Gwala.Inkantolo ilahle uMkhize ngamacala amabili okubulala wase egixabezwa ngeminyaka engu-15 icala ngalinye.U-Capt Gwala uncome ukuzinikela kwabaseshi baseGreenwood Park.“Siyethemba ukuthi lesi sigwebo sizothoba amanxeba umndeni owalahlekelwa ngabathandiweyo bawo,” kusho uCapt Gwala.
title: Uzogugela ejele owabulala abazala

text: AMAPHOYISA aseNanda athungatha indoda esikhishelwe incwadi egunyaza ukuthi iboshwe ngemuva kokuthi ingalubhadanga enkantolo ngenyanga edlule.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe abaphenyi basesiteshini samaphoyisa eNanda bathungatha uMnuz Lungisani Derrick Ndlovu osolwa ngecala lokubulala abalamu bakhe ababili ngoDisemba 2016.Uthe uNdlovu ubhekene necala lokubulala uMnuz Mbongiseni Zondo noNksz Funani Zondo (47) abadutshulwa eNamibia, eNanda, ngoDisemba 27, 2016. UNdlovu kuthiwa wazinikela emaphoyiseni, wavela eNkantolo yeMantshi eNtuzuma wanikwa ibheyili kodwa ngo-Okthoba 1 nonyaka uhlulekile ukuvela enkantolo kwabe sekukhishwa incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kwakhe.Abangaba nolwazi ukuthi uNdlovu ukuziphi izinkalo bayanxuswa ukuthi bathinte uDetective Sergeant Mthethwa ku-072 259 3518/082 290 5726 noma bashayele inombolo yokubika izigameko zobugebengu u-08600 10111.
title: Kufunwa uthuli ongavelanga enkantolo

text: BABEKE phansi amathuluzi abasebenzi benkampani ekhiqiza izishebo, izinongo neminye imikhiqizo, i-Unilever ngoba befuna ukufakelwa isibonelelo sokuthenga izindlu nezinye izimfuno.Laba basebenzi bakwa-Unilever, eRiverhorse Valley bangenele ukhukhulelangoqo wesiteleka ngoba befuna umqashi abanike isibonelelo sokuthenga izindlu nokuthi abanike ingxenye yenzuzo eyenziwa yinkampani.Le nkampani iphakela izitolo ezinkulu ngemikhiqizo yayo.UMnuz Sibonelo Mbuyazi wenyunyana yabasebenzi iFood and Allied Workers Union (Fawu), uthe abasebenzi baqoke ukungenela isiteleka emuva kokuthi bengazange bakuthole abakufunayo ngesikhathi bexoxisana nomqashi wabo.Uthe ngo-2017 bafaka isicelo sokuthi umqashi anike abasebenzi isibonelelo sezindlu bese ephinde abanike ingxenye yenzuzo eyenziwa yinkampani.UMbuyazi uthe okunye okukhathaze abasebenzi nokwenze ukuthi baqhubeke nesiteleka ukuthi umqashi uthe uzobanika imali enguR2 000 umsebenzi ngamunye (okuhlanganisa isibonelelo sezindlu nengxenye yenzuzo eyenziwayinkampani).Uthe isiteleka sabo siqale ngoLwesihlanu emasontweni amabili adlule kodwa inkampani yabayisa enkantolo base besimisa babuyela ngoMsombuluko.Uthe kubacasulile abasebenzi lokhu ngoba bona bebefuna uR30 000 ozokhokhwa kanye kumsebenzingamunye.“Kuyakhathaza ukuthi inkampani eyenza imali njenge-Unilever ingakhombisi ukunakekela abasebenzi bayo ngale ndlela. Le nkampani yenza izigidi ngonyaka kodwa ayikwazi ukunakekela abasebenzi bayo,” kusho uMbuyazi.Umsebenzi ongagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba, uthe kuyabakhathaza ukuthi le nkampani ihambe inikela ngezindlu nokunye kubantu abahlwempu kodwa abasebenzi bayo bengakwazi ukuthenga izindlu.Owengamele ezokuxhumana kwa-Unilever, uNkk Shobna Persadh ukuqinisekisile ukuthi abasebenzi babo basesikhungweni esaziwa ngeNdonsa bangenele isiteleka emuva kokungavumelani kwabasebenzi beFawu nomqashi.Uthe isiteleka silandela ukungaboni ngasolinye phakathi komqashi neFawu kulandela izingxoxo zamaholo zango-2018.Uthe bavumelene ngamaholo kwase kudluliselwa ezinye izimfuno zabasebenzi eCommission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration.“Zonke izinhlaka zingene kulezi zingoxo ngenhloso yokuqh-amuka nesisombululo kodwa ngeshwa kugcine kumile emuva kokuthi inyunyana ingavumelani nesiphakamiso senkampani,” kusho uNkk Persadh.Uqhube wathi ukuphepha kwabasebenzi babo abatelekile nalabo abasebenzayo kubalekile kubona yingakho beqinise ezokuphepha.Uthe basazimisele ngokuxoxa nenyunyana kuze kube kutholakala isisombululo.
title: Bagxobe itoyitoyi abakwa-Unilever

text: UMCULI kamaskandi wodumo lwengoma ethi Angisilo Ivukane, uGadla Nxumalo usekhiphe umehlokaboni kaR500 ozotholwa umuntu ozomtholisela ngezimpahla zakhe ezimlahlekele eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo emini.UGadla uthe lezi zimpahla zimlahlekele etekisini abeyigibele isuka erenki yaseYMCA eThekwini iya eMakethe.Kulezi zimpahla uthe kukhona izitifiketi zebhizinisi nencwadi emgunyaza ukuthi abe nesibhamu okubhalwe ukuthi Gadlabethithiza Wiseman Nxumalo.“Konke kusale emotweni. Usisi ebengihleli eduze kwakhe, okungenzeka ukuthi nguye owehle nalezi zimpahla ngephutha, ubeya ematekisini aya eLusikisiki (e-Eastern Cape). Bekune-slip sika- R3200, ipasi, amakhadi asebhange, ukhiye wendlu, izimpahla zokugqoka nobhakha obomvu we-Nike.”Uthe uma lezi zimpahla zingathathwanga yilo wesifazane abehamba naye, kungenzeka zisale etekisini, zatholwa wumsizi womshayeli noma umshayeli wale wetekisi.UGadla unxuse noma ngubani othuka elamela lezi zimpahla amthinte ngoba zibalulekile futhi uyazidinga. “Onolwazi ngalezi zimpahla ngicela angithinte ku-073 526 5842,” kuphetha uGadla.
title: Umaskanda weyodumo ulahlekelwe

text: KUSOLWA umbango wamatekisi ngokubulawa kowesilisa odutshulwe eFairview, ePort Elizabeth ngoLwesibili ekuseni. Umufi (43) obengusomatekisi udutshulwe engaphandle kwesikole. Ngokombiko wephephandaba lansuku zonke iSowetan, lesi yisigameko sesibili kudutshulwa usomatekisi ePort Elizabeth, njengoba kubulewe uMnuz Mlungiselele Mlanjana eNew Brighton ngoLwesine olwedlule. Okhulumela amaPhoyisa uColonel Priscilla Naidoo uthe usomatekisi ubulawe ngoLwesibili ngenkathi yena nomkakhe beyoshiya ingane esikoleni kuMimosa Road. “Kusolwa ukuthi ngabo-8 ekuseni, inkosikazi kamufi (35) ibiphelezela ingane (9) beya esikoleni. Ngesikhathi ebuya emotweni yabo i-Audi Q7, kuqhamuke indoda engaziwa, yadedela inhlamvu kumshayeli,” kuchaza uNaidoo. UNaidoo uthe ufike umsolwa wesibili, wadedela izinhlamvu ezimbili. “Bobabili abasolwa bangene emotweni iVW Polo emhlophe, bashaya bachitha. UNaidoo uthe umufi udutshulwe ekhanda, emqaleni nasengalweni. Usomatekisi ushonele endaweni yesigameko. Inkosikazi kamufi ayilimalanga kodwa iphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ukuze ayokwelashwa. UNaidoo uthe uphiko lwabaseshi iProvincial Organised Crime Investigation Unit ePort Elizabeth, luphenya icala lokubulala ngenhloso.  UNaidoo uphinde waveza ukuthi lolu phiko lusaphenya ukubulawa kukaMlanjana (62), odutshulwe esemotweni yakhe iMercedez Benz, eNew Brighton ngesonto eledlule. UMlanjana udutshulwe amadoda angaziwa amhlasele ngesikhathi ephuma emhlanganweni wosomatekisi.
title: Udutshulwe washona engaphandle kwesikole usomatekisi

text: MHLELI: Ake ngiphawule odabeni lokuphakanyiswa kukaMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda (osesithombeni) obenguNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal njengoba isigungu esiphezulu se-ANC KwaZulu-Natal simqokele kwesobuMeya eMkhandlwini weTheku.UKaunda ubewuphethe kahle umsebenzi eMnyangweni wezokuThutha njengoba ngamaholide okuphela konyaka ka-2018 ezokuphepha emgwaqweni beziqinile futhi nezingozi zomgwaqo zehlile uma ziqhathaniswa no-2017.Simethembile uKaunda ukuthi uzokwazi ukuxazulula izinkinga ezihlasele iTheku ngoba yilona dolobha elithuthukisa iKwaZulu-Natal kwezomnotho. Ukungaqini kwezokuphepha nokungcola okusedolobheni ngaphakathi yikho okuzokwehlisa isibalo sabavakashi.Abesifazane abasakwazi ukuhamba ngokukhululeka ngenxa yamaphara ahlasele idolobha abaphuca izinwele zabo zokufakelwa. Lokhu kuyabahlukumeza kakhulu abanye bagcina sebencamela ukuthi bahambe bebambe amakhanda noma bangazifaki nhlobo uma beza ezitolo eziseThekwini. ITheku manje linezindawo ezaziwa njengezizinda zamaphara lapho abantu abasaba nokuhamba khona ngoba besaba ukwenzakaliswa.Amaphara awagcini ngezinwele kodwa ayagqekeza aphinde aphuce abantu izimpahla uma bezihambela. ITheku seliphenduke kwampunzedlemini ngenxa yala maphara.Muva nje uma kuzofika izivakashi noma kuzoba nemicimbi emikhulu kuleli dolobha kuba khona izimoto zamaphoyisa aqoqa la maphara ahanjiswe ezindaweni la ezokwazi ukuqala khona impilo kabusha khona. Lesi senzo thina abahlali baseThekwini, asisiphathi kahle ngoba kusho ukuthi kumele kuze kube nemicimbi ukuze kususwe amaphara.Siyacela uKaunda angenelele ngokushesha kulesi simo kungaze kushaye isikhathi samaholidi ngoba nala maphara sengathi isibalo sawo sikhula njalo. Ngenelela Kaunda safa amaphara.Andiswa MdungeEMLAZA
title: Ngenelela Kaunda safa amaphara

text: BAHLALELE ovalweni abemboni yamatekisi nomphakathi waseMuden, ngaphandle kwaseGreytown, emuva kokudutshulwa kukasomatekisi kade esemzini wakhe.UMnuz Elisha Langa, uhlaselwe ngoMgqibelo abantu abangaziwa, phambi kwezingane nonkosikazi wakhe. Umthombo weSolezwe ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe kusolwa udlame lwamatekisi ngokuhlaselwa kwakhe.“Yize isizathu sokuhlaselwa kwakhe singakaziwa kodwa kusolwa udaba lwamatekisi. Lokhu kubulawa kwakhe ngale ndlela kuwethusile umphakathi nabasematekekisini,” kusho umthombo.Kuthintwa usihlalo walo soseshini, ucingo belukhala lungabanjwa.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, ngoLwesihlanu eNanda, amaphoyisa adubule izinkabi ezintathu ebezihlasele itekisi kwalimala abagibeli. KwaNongoma kuhlaselwe umndeni wakwaNkosi, kwabulawa ababili ngeledlule.Imenenja ehhovisini leSantaco eKZN, uMnuz Sfiso Shangase, unxuse uzinzo embonini yamatekisi, wagxeka nokubulawa kwabantu.“Siyimboni yamatekisi sithanda ukukhalisana nomndeni, sidlulise namazwi okuthi indaba yokubulalana kwabasembonini isiqale phansi futhi sikhathazekile. Kulo nyaka kuzokhethwa ubuholi obusha, nokungenzeka ukuthi kunomthelela ekuhlaselweni kwabantu. Siyanxusa  uma kukhona ukungaboni ngaso linye kuboniswane,” kusho uShangase.Khonamanjalo, izolo kutholwe isidumbu sowesilisa sikhandwe ngamatshe sashiswa eWelbedacht, ngaseThekwini. Isolezwe  lithole ukuthi umufi ulandwe abantu abangaziwa esendlini yakhe, nonina wezingane.Kuthiwa abasolwa bamfune uR20 000 abathe wathathwa umfowabo. Umufi babe sebehamba naye. Utholwe izolo ekuseni esebulewe. Izolo, Isolezwe lishayele ucingo unina wezingane zikamufi, wathi basesendaweni yesigameko ngakho akakwazi ukukhuluma ngalolu daba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe usafonela iziteshi ekubikwe kuzo izigameko.
title: Uvalo ngodlame lwamatekisi kukhala inganono

text: UMREPHA ongaconsi phansi kubathandi bomculo kuleli, u-AKA, usegcine ephumele obala waxolisa ngendlela okwaphela ngayo ubudlelwano bakhe nonina wengane yakhe, uDJ Zinhle. U-AKA noZinhle bahlukana kamuncu besanda kumemezela izindaba zokuzalwa kwendodakazi yabo uKairo ngo-2015. UDJ Zinhle wadalula kwi-website yakhe ukuthi wathola ngokujola kwalo mrepha nomethuli wezinhlelo, uBonang Matheba, okwaqhubeka izinyanga ezinhlanu ngesikhathi esakhulelwe. Ngemuva kwalesi simemezelo u-AKA noBonang babe ngamathe nolimi eminyakeni emibili edlule. NgoDisemba ngonyaka odlule, u-AKA wabhala ekhasini lakhe ku-twitter ukuthi kuphelile obekubahlanganisa noBonang. Ekhuluma ohlelweni luka-Anele Mdoda, iReal Talk with Anele ngoLwesithathu ntambama u-AKA ugcine egonyulukile wavuma iphutha ngendlela okwaphela ngayo ubudlelwano bakhe noDJ Zinhle. "Ukuthandana kwami noBonang kwaqala kabi ngoba ngaleso sikhathi ngangisathandana nonina wengane yami. Wayekhululelwe futhi ngokwami into esamdlulisa kuyona ayiyinhle. Sengaxolisa ngalokho futhi namanje ngisaxolisa. Mhlawumbe naye (uBonang) usazoxolisa ngakho ngelinye ilanga," usho kanje. U-AKA osanda kukhipha amaculo amasha amabili nonyaka iSweet Fire neStarsigns uqhube wathi kwaba ubuphukuphuku ukuhlukana noDJ Zinhle. "UZinhle umuntu wesifazane oqotho, ohlakaniphile futhi ongumama oqotho, mina ngaleso sikhathi ngangisemusha futhi ngiyisiphukuphuku ukukunaka lokho," kusho lo mrepha echazela u-Anele.
title: U-AKA uzwakalise ukuzisola ngokungathembeki kuDJ Zinhle

text: PHEZU kokuthi agajwe yizinkinga AmaZulu FC, okubalwa ukukhishwa kwiTop 8 ngokuqala kwesizini nokuphucwa amaphuzu ayisithupha yiFifa kodwa konke lokho akubuphazamisanga ubudlelwano phakathi kwaleli qembu nabaxhasi balo beminyaka iSpar KwaZulu-Natal.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngoMgqibelo ngomthombo walo ongashayi phansi uthe sekuvunyelenwe ngokuthi kuqhutshekwe nokusebenzisana.“Kuthiwa sebevumelene ngokuthi baqhubeke nokusebenzisana eminya iminyaka ethile. Engingakwazi ukuthi kuvunyelwane ngeminyaka emingaki ngoba leyo yimininingwane esagodliwe kuze kube kuyasayinwa phansi ngaphmbi kokuthi kudalulwe yonke into ngesivumelwano, okungenzeka ngokusombuluka kwelizayo,” kubeka umthombo.Ethintwa ngalolu daba uLunga Sokhela, oyimenenja jikelele kuMaZulu akavumanga futhi akaphikanga ngaphandle kokuthi kusaxoxiswana. “Njengamanje akukho engingakusho ngoba izingxoxo zisaqhubeka mhlawumbe ngesonto elizayo kuzobe sekukhona okubambekayo."USpar ungenye yezinkampani esezinenkonzi ende emdlalweni webhola lezinyawo eNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kwePremier Soccer League (PSL).Ukuzimatanisa naMaZulu kwenkampani yakwaSpar kwaqala ngeminyaka yawo 90 ngaphansi komqondisi wawo omdala, uDavid Dlamini, waseMahlabathini.Lo buhlobo baqinisekiswa ukunqoba kwawo indebe yakwaCoca Cola ngo 1992.Ngaphandle kokuba ngabaxhasi bagcine sebengabaphathi beqembu ngesikhathi liqeqeshwa nguMike Makaab, ngemuva kokuthi kube khona ukungaboni ngaso linye kwabakaSpar noDlamini ngokwezivumelwano ababengene kuzo.Ngenxa yokuthi ukuphatha iqembu lebhola kwakungewona umkhakha wakwaSpar, baphoqeleka ukuthi balithengisele usomabhizinisi owayenethenda yama-Ambulance ezikhungweni zezempilo ezazingaphansi kukaHulumeni waKwaZulu omdala.Kube ngesikhathi eseyithengisele khona uNaidoo lapho uSpar athi ukuqhela ebholeni.UNaidoo naye wagadla zephuka wawathengisela uDave King naye ngemuva kwesikhathi wawadlulisela kuSisa Bikitsha.Ngenxa yokungahambisani nezinto ezazenzeka ebholeni uBikitsha wabe esewathengisela uPatrick Sokhela, kuze kube yimanje, nokube yilapho khona uSpar ekhuze khonaibuya ekuxhasenileliqembu elinomlandoomude ebholeni elikhokhelwayo kuleli.Okunye okukhombisa ukusebenzisana okuhle phakathi kwalezinhlangothi ukuphambana emgwaqweni yaseNingizimu Afrika, amaloli amakhulu akwaSpar ahlobe ngemibala neziqubulo zaMaZulu.Uphinde waveza ukuthi njengoba kuvalwe isizini abahlezi njengoba bematasatasa befunaozovala isikhalaesivuleke ngokushiya kobebhekelele ukwelashwa nokululama kwabadlali uma bekade belimele uKarel du Toid.“Akukho ukuphumula njengoba kufanele ukuthi kuqambe kuqala amalungiselelo okuqala kwesizini entsha konke kusothini. Kufanele sithole umuntu ozovala isikhala sikaKarel obeyiPhysiotherapist yeqembu, oseyozimela,” kusho uSokhela.
title: Usuthu luzoqala isizini entsha lisenobudlelwano obuqinile noSpar

text: AKEKHO owayecabanga ukuthi uyosheshe alulame umgijimi owasinda bezama ukumnquma imilenze ngesaha ngoMashi nonyaka, okumanje usengenele imijaho eminingi wawina neminye.Udaba lukaMhlengi Gwala (26) waseMayville lwaduma umhlaba wonke emuva kwesigameko esenzeka ngoMashi 6, ehlaselwa amadoda amathathu ehamba ngebhayisikili ngaseGlenwood eThekwini. Kwavulwa ngisho isikhwama somnikelo esafinyelela kuR100 000 emuva kwesonto sivuliwe. Lo mgijimi ophinde angenele nemincintiswano yamabhayisikili, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi okumenze washesha ukululama wukukhohlwa yilesi sigameko. Ngesikhathi engena esibhedlela odokotela bathi kusazothatha isikhathi ukuthi abuyele kwezemidlalo, wamangaza abaningi ephuma esezihambela esibhedlela ngo-Ephreli.“Bekungeke kungisize ukuzikhathaza ngokuthi ngobani ababezama ukungikhubaza futhi bekuzokwenza ngingasheshi ukululama. Njengoba bengakaboshwa, sengavele ngakhetha ukugxila emsebenzini wami,” kusho uGwala.UGwala ophinde abe ngumtakuli wasemabhishi kuMasipala weTheku, uthe waqala ngoJuni ukubhukuda njengendlela yokuzilolonga. Umjaho wokuqala wamabhayisikili uwungenele ngo-Agasti oyingxenye yokukhumbula uMnuz Nelson Mandela. Waqala ukugijima ngo-Okthoba emjahweni we-5150 African Triathlon eGoli.“Ngaqala ngokungenela owamabhayisikili ngoba bekungakalulameki kahle ukugijima. Ngenze kahle kulo mjaho ngoba ngaphuma isikhombisa kubantu abangaphezu kuka-100. Emkhakheni wontanga yami obizwa ngo-25-29 ngaphuma phambili,” kusho yena.UGwala uphinde wenza umjaho we-031 eSuncoast noweFNB lapho egijime khona u10km. Ngenyanga edlule ubekomunye umjaho eHowick kanti ngoMgqibelo uzongenela owamabhayisikili wakwaMr Price wokuqokelela uR1 million kubafundi abaswele. NgoDisemba uzongenela i25 Pier Challenge eNorth Beach. Uthe ngonyaka ozayo ufuna ukugxila emijahweni yokugijima ngoba uzobe eseluleme ngokuphelele. Wabuyela ngoSepthemba emsebenzini wakwaMasipala wahlonishwa nangendondo ye-Achievement Against All Odds emcimbini owenziwe uhulumeni wesifundazwe. Njengoba abaningi bejwayele ukubhala incwadi emuva kwezigameko ezibavelele, uGwala uthe akakucabangi lokho. Uthe usafuna ukugxila emsebezini wakhe ukuze angenele imijaho yakwamanye amazwe.“Mhlawumbe ngelinye ilanga ngiyoyibhala incwadi. Bakhona abebecela ukubhala incwadi ngami kodwa ngabamisa ngoba kuzongiphazamisa.”Udaba lwakhe lusaqhubeka nokuxoxwa emazweni njengoba esanda kuvakashelwa yiBBC neCNN okuyimithombo yezindaba esakazela umhlaba wonke. Ngenyanga edlule ubeyombesa ingoduso yakhe uNksz Hle Mokoena, wathi zizowushaya maduze.
title: Ufuna ukuya phesheya owasinda bemusaha

text: INKATHA Freedom Party isiphonsele inselelo abe-IEC ukuba benze isiqiniseko ukuthi abesifazane baseshwa nangaphansi uma bengena ezikhungweni zokuvota ngoLwesi-thathu ukuze kugwemeke umkhonyovu wokhetho.Lokhu kushiwo nguMengameli weqembu, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, emcimbini wokugoqa imikhankaso yokhetho eNkandla nasoLundi ngempelasonto.Ethula inkulumo phambi kwezinkumbi zabalandeli eNkandla ngoMgqibelo, uButhelezi uthe ukhathazeke kakhulu ngokulahleka kwamaphepha okuvota okubikwe ukuthi kwenzeke eSoweto ngeledlule, wathi okumanje akwaziwa ukuthi la maphepha asesabalale afinyelelaphi nezwe.Uthe ngokwakhe vele useyangabaza ukuthi ukhetho luzoba ngolukhululekile ngenxa yalesi sigameko sokudunwa kweloli ebeliphethe amaphepha okuvota. Uthe abenhlangano yokhetho kumele benze isiqiniseko sokuthi abesifazane baseshwa yonke indawo uma bengena ezikhungweni zokuvota ngoba bakhona abazoshutheka amaphepha okuvota ezithweni zabo ezicashile zomzimba ngoba bazi ukuthi ngeke bathintwe kuzo.Uthe phambilini Olundi kwabanjwa abesifazane beqembu elithile beshutheke amaphepha okuvota emabeleni ababehlose ukuwafaka emabhokisini uma sebesegunjini lokuvota bengasabonwa muntu.“Sihlushwa ngoba nakhu bevikelwe wuMthethosisekelo ukuthi kunezindawo abangeke bathintwe kuzo kodwa ukuba kuya ngokwami bekumele abe-IEC babaseshe yonke indawo ngoba asazi ukuthi la maphepha okuvota adukile akuphi futhi bekuyini inhloso yokuduna iloli ebelilayishe izinto zokhetho. Ngokwami, ngibona lolu khetho lungasezukhululeka,” kusho uButhelezi.Unxenxe abalandeli beqembu lakhe ukuba balubheke ngelokhozi lolu khetho ukuze bagweme imikhonyovu.Ucele amalungu ukuba ahlale evule amehlo abike masinyane noma yini ayibonayo ukuthi iphembene nomthetho.Uthe abalandeli be-IFP kumele babheke nokuthi akukho muntu yini ovota ewadini angahlali kuyo.Ugxeke i-ANC ngokugcizelela ukuthi kunezindaba ezinhle okumele izitshele abantu bakuleli yize isimo somnotho sisibi kangaka kulahleka amathuba omsebenzi, wathi ngisho nodaba lokulungiswa komuzi kamengameli (uJacob Zuma) eNkandla ngezimali zabakhokhi bentela ayikuboni kuyiphutha njengoba ilokhu ibelesele ukuthi kunezindaba ezinhle okumele zitshelwe abantu.UButhelezi uvale umkhankaso weqembu esizindeni salo oNdini lapho linxenxe abantu ukuba baphume ngobuningi babo babuyisele i-IFP emandleni eZululand.Umholi we-IFP eThekwini, uMnuz Mdu Nkosi, uthe sebezwile ukuthi kunamaphepha okuvota angu-500 000 osekuvotelwe ngawo iqembu elithile kumasipala weTheku azogxishwa emabhokisini okuvota ukuze lelo qembu liwine.Uthe bayasola ukuthi la maphepha yilawa okubikwe ukuthi aduke eSoweto.“Sicela ukuthi amalungu ethu angalinge asayine uma kukhona amaphepha amavoti angawaboni kahle”, kusho uNkosiOkhulumela abe-IEC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thabani Ngwira, uthe kungamanga aluhlaza okushiwo yiNkatha ngoba wonke amaphepha agcinwe ngamaphoyisa. Uthe akazi noma asetholiwe yini amaphepha alahleke eGoli kodwa wathi ucabanga ukuthi yinto yaseGoli kuphela.Ngesiphakamiso seqembu sokusesha abesifazane yonke indawo uNgwira uthe i-IFP kumele ibhalele i-IEC.
title: I-IFP ifuna kuseshwe nangaphansi

text: OWANGUMENGAMELI waseNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki, izolo ukhulume ngemiqingo yasenkantolo emfaka etulweni lokuketula uMengameli uJacob Zuma.Uthe angase athathe izinyathelo zomthetho uma eseyibonile incwadi efungelwe ebhalwe yiNhloko yoPhiko le-Asset Forfeiture Unit, uMnuz Willie Hofmeyr, eyingxenye yomqingo oyimpendulo yeNational Prosecuting Authority ecaleni elafakwa yi-DA ngo-2009 ngokuhoxiswa kwamacala abhekene noZuma.“UMnuz Thabo Mbeki useyibonile imibiko yabezindaba ethinta izitatimende zika-Advocate William Hofmeyr ezithinta izinsolo ezindala ngetulo lokuketula uZuma eminyakeni edlule,’’ kusho uMnuz Mukoni Ratshitanga okhulumela uMbeki.Ugcizelele ukuthi uMbeki uzobheka ngezinyathelo angazithatha uma eseyibonile incwadi efungelwe (ngokomthetho wasenkantolo).“Okwamanje, singabheka nje ukuthi leli tulo laqala nini njengoba lolu daba lowayengumengameli wezwe uThabo Mbeki lafika eNkantolo eNkulu yokwedluliswa kwamacala.UHofmeyr wabhala encwadini efungelwe ayithumela eNkantolo eNkulu yaseGauteng ngoLwesibili ethi owayephethe oFezela, uMnuz Leonard McCarthy, wazama ukuba nesandla ekutheni kushushiswe uZuma ngaphambi kwengqungquthela yasePolokwane lapho uMbeki ayebanga isikhundla naye.IJaji Chris Nicholson wakuchitha ukuthi uZuma ashushiswe yiNPA.I- SCA yathi okwatholwa wuNicholson kwakuthinta ezepolitiki futhi egxambukela. – ANA
title: ‘Ngingase  ngiye  enkantolo’

text: UKHALA ezimathonsi umndeni wabesilisa ababili abaduka belibangise endaweni yaseMzimkhulu ukuyobheka umuzi wakubo.OMnuz Mawande Nzimande (21) no-Onke Piyose (19) abaduka ngo-October 15, 2018 kuthiwa babethunywe ngunina abahlala naye eMgungundlovu, uNkk Nomthandazo Nzimande ukuyohlola isimo sasekhaya eMzimkhulu njengoba bezwa kuthiwa kugqekeziwe.Umalume walaba ababili uMnuz Monde Mloyeni uthe uMawande no-Onke bahamba ngemuva kwehora lesithupha ntambamba ngemoto kaNkk Nzimande, iNissan, Duke emaruni.“Kwakushayela uMawande ngalelo langa. Babezobuya ngalo lelo langa ngoba sasibalindele ukuthi babuye ngehora leshumi ebusuku,” kushouMlonyeni.UMlonyeni uthe akwaziwa noma bafika yini lapho ababelibangise khona, nemoto ababehambe ngayo ayikaze itholakale.ONKE PIYOSEUNkk Nzimande uthe ngenkathi uMawande no-Onke besendleneni, washayela uMawande ucingo ngemuva kwehora lesishiyagalolunye wabe esemthumelela nemali kaphethroli njengoba wayekhale ngokuthi usuyaphelaemotweni.“Ngibe sengizwa ngodadewethu (umama ka-Onke amzalayo) ukuthi ubone ukuthi u-Onke uke wazama ukumshayela ucingo phakathi kwamabili kodwa wangamthola ngoba ubelele,” kusho uNkk Nzimande.Lo mndeni uthe usebunzimeni njengoba ungazi ukuthi kwenzekani ngalaba ababili.IMOTO okwakuhamba ngayo uPiyose noNzimande“Kubuhlungu kakhulu ngoba asazi nokuthi sithathe ini sihlanganise nani,” kusho uNkk Nzimande.Idokodo labantu abalahlekile lavulwa ngelanga elilandelayo esiteshini samaphoyisa saseMgungundlovu i-Alexandra.UCaptain Pieter van Zentan wakulesi siteshi ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kwavulwa idokodo labantu ababili abalahleka. “Icala selidluliselwe ethimbeni loKlebe eThekwini,” kusho uVan Zentan.
title: Usakhala umndeni wabaduka nyakenye

text: KUPHAZAMISEKE ukufunda eGlenhaven Secondary School, eVerulam abafundi balesi sikole bevuka umbhejazane, bewisa amasango esikole bekhala ngokuthi ayabaphazamisa.Lesi sehlakalo esenzeke ngoLwesibili sishiye kukhalwa njengoba abafundi belimaze izimoto zothisha ngamatshe baphinde bashisa amasongo esikole amane.Kusize ukufika kwamaphoyisa kanye nezinkampani zonogada ukuze kudambe udlame njengoba abafundi beshise wonke amasango esikole abekade enesikhashana efakiwe.  Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt-Col Thulani Zwanel, uveze ukuthi lemibhikiso iqubuke ngabo-8 ekuseni kanti namaphoyisa afikile ukuzoqapha isimo. “Abafundi baphazamise ukufunda esikoleni baphinde balimaza izimoto ngamatshe,” kusho uZwane. Okhulumela iReaction Unit South Africa (RUSA) uPrem Balram uthe ozakwabo abane bathole usizo lwezempilo njengoba belinyazwe kabuhlungu ngamatshe. “Abasebenzi beRUSA kanye namaphoyisa bebenza imizamo yokunqanda udlame esikoleni, okuyilapho abafundi abaqale khona ukusishaya ngamatshe kwase kulimala nempahla kaHulumeni. Kusize ukuthi sibize abanye ozakwethu ukuze siqede ubudlova obekwenzakala,” kuchaza uBalram. Omunye umfundi uveze ukuthi ezinye izinkinga ababhekana nazo wukuthi banikezwa imizuzu emithathu kuphela ukuthi bangene emakilasini. “Besingavumelekile ukungena endlini yokuzikhulula noma ukuyophuza amanzi uma kukhona uthisha ekilasini. Ngesikhathi sokuya ekhefini, silinda kulayini omude ukuze sizosebenzisa ama-toilets angekho esimeni esihle. Asikwazi ukuwasha izandla futhi ayikho nethishu,” kuchaza lomfundi. Umnyango wezemfundo uthe usazophenya ngokuholele kumbhikisho kulesi sikole.
title: Kume ukufunda abafundi bekhalaza ngamasango esikole

text: BAYIKHIPHE ngevoti lokungayethembi ubuholi bayo iMeya yaseNelson Mandela Bay, uMnuz Mongameli Bobani, izolo.Amaqembu amaningi emkhandlwini okubalwa i-DA, ANC, Patriotic Alliance, COPE, ACDP ne-AIC, avumelane nesiphakamiso sekhansela le-DA uMnuz Morne Steyn, sokungabuthembi ubuholi bukaBobani.Emuva kokukhishwa ngevoti uBobani umemezele ukuthi uyalihlakaza ikomiti lakhe.Uqede ukusho lokho wabe esewushiya umhlangano.Phambilini ike yaba khona imizamo yokuthi lo mholi we-UDM aketulwe esihlalweni sakhe kodwa ingaphumeleli, kwazise bekuba khona amakhansela akhala ngokusatshiswa.NgoLwesine amaqembu aphumelele ukumkhomba indlela. UBobani ubesehlale kulesi sihlalo isikhathi esingaphezu konyaka, emuva kokuba kukhishwe owayenguSihlalo we-DA, uMnuz Athol Trollip, njengeMeya.Umasipala ububangwa selokhu i-ANC yehlulwa eminyakeni emithathu edlule, kwase kuphatha ngokuhlanganyela i-DA namanye amaqembu kusukela okhethweni lwango-2016.Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa kusuke izinkinga, i-ANC namanye amaqembu akhononda ngendlela okuphethwe ngayo umasipala. Lokhu kuholele ekutheni kuphakanyiswe ukungabuthembi ubuholi bukaBobani.
title: UBobani ukhishiwe bungathenjwa ubuholi bakhe

text: ABATHENGI bakuleli bangase babe senhlanhleni njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi izitolo ikakhulukazi ezezimpahla zokugqoka, ziphoqeleke ukuthi zidayise ngamanani aphansi. Lokhu kusho ukuthi akuzoba nandali kuzofiwa ezitolo zakuleli maduze nje.Lokhu kudalwa wukuthi sibe side isikhathi lezi zitolo zivaliwe ngenxa yeCovid-19, okwenze zaba ningi izimpahla ezingadayiswanga.Izitolo elinye iphephandaba eliwuzakwabo waleli okukhulunywe nazo, zinqabile ukuphawula ngalokhu. Kodwa uChris Gilomor oyi-Investment Analyst uthe izitolo eziningii zizophoqeleka ukuthi zenze izinto ebezingahleliwe ukubhekana nokuthi ikusasa alaziwa kulesi sikhathi seCovid-19.“Kuyinto ejwayelekile ukuthi izimpahla ezingadayisile zifakwe endalini ukuze zisuswe esitokweni kutholakale nemali ezithengwe ngayo,"usho kanje.Umbiko owenziwe abeWorld Economic Forum (WEF) kuleli sonto, uveze ukuthi ukudayiswa kwezimpahla zokugqoka kwehle ngo89% ngoEphreli uma kuqhathaniswa nangonyaka odlule ngesikhathi esifanayo.Impahla bathi imbondelene ezitolo nakumaWarehouse, ngisho nezindawo okugcinwa kuzo izimpahla ezisuke zizoyiswa kwamanye amazwe kugcwele kuyachichima.Kungenzeka futhi eziinye izitolo zezimpahla ziphoqeleke ukuthi zigcine zivala thaqa ngenxa yalokhu.UGilmour uthe akukho sitolo esizokwazi ukuthi sibhekane nale nkinga ngaphandle kokuthi sishayele emalini.Inkampani i-Edcon Holdings Ltd, ingezinye zezinkampani eseziphumele obala zaveza ukuthi zisenkingeni yezimali, zaveza nokuthi zizovalwa ngenxa yalokhu.Kulesi sonto nje kube nesiphakamiso sale nkampani ukuthi sidayise u-Edgars, Jet noThank U Digital Services.Le nkampani iveze ukuthi izama ukuhlela kabusha inkampani ukuze ikwazi ukubhekana nezinkinga ebhekene nazo njengamanje.UGilmour uchazile ukuthi izinkinga zakwa-Edcon, kungenzeka ukuthi zibhebhethekiswe wukuqubuka kwecoronavirus.Uthe nokuthenga ngobuchwepheshe bokusebenzisa i-online shopping akusizi kangako kuleli njengoba abantu abaningi bencamela ukuziyela bona ezinxanxatheleni zezitolo."Kubantu abaningi kubalulekile ukuthi baphume emakhaya baye ezitolo, kuyingxenye yokuzikhipha,"usho kanje.
title: Akundali kuzofiwa ezitolo zakuleli maduze nje: ungoti

text: NJENGOBA uJuni uhlonzwa njengenyanga yentsha, sekuvele izibalo ezishaqisayo zentsha yaseNingizimu Afrika yesilisa emnyama okuthiwa iqengqeleza phambili ngokucwila ezinkambeni zikaFaro. Ngo-1976 intsha yakuleli yayilwa namaBhunu ifuna ukuqedwa kokufunda ngesibhunu zonke izifundo, kodwa eyanamuhla enye yayo ingene shi kwizidakamizwa.Ucwaningo olwenziwe ngabomkhankaso oqwashisa ngokucwila otshwalweni i-Aware Organisation.Lolu cwaningo luveza isithombe sokuthi lapha eNingizimu Afrika kuthengwa utshwala buka-R3.8 billion ngonyaka. Kubantu bakuleli balinganiselwa ku-60% abaphuza utshwala kanti kubona bangu-34% abaphuza ngokweqile. Kulesi sibalo isilinganiso sekota ngabesilisa abamnyama abaneminyaka eqala ku-24 kuya ku-35 abazithola becwile kubona ngendlela exakile.Ucwaningo luveza ukuthi iningi lentsha yakuleli kuthi ineminyaka engu-12 isuke isilingeka ifise ukuzwa ukuthi utshwala bunambitheka kanjani.Enye iyadikila ingaphide ibuthinte ngenxa yokungathatheki kodwa enye iyabuyela kubona igcine isibujwayele. Ngeshwa enye iyedlulela igcine isiyimulutha yotshwala. Le ntsha isuke inezizathu ezahlukene ezisuke siyiholele kulo mbulalazwe. Phakathi kwezizathu ezibaliwe ezidoba intsha wukuthi iningi layo isuke isiphothule isikole, isanda kuqala umsebenzi futhi isizithathela izinqumo ngemali yayo.Kulapho kwabanye kuqala kube nengcindezi yokufuna ukubukwa, ukudlisela kontanga nakwabobulili obehlukile. Enye intsha ibulawa amahloni, ukuze iwaqede isebenzisa utshwala bese bekwazi ukukhuluma babe nesibindi noma benze okuthile abasuke behlukela ukukwenza bengaphuzile.Ukuhlanganyela nabangani nemindeni emicimbini, nakho kuyabahlohla abanye ukuba bagcine bekhothakhothile kwezikaFaro ngenxa yokungafuni ukusala ezintweni.Inkinga iba lapho uma abanye sebephenduka izigqila zotshwala. Izinqumo nezibopho abanazo empilweni zigcine sezithikamezwa wukuphuza kakhulu. Lapha singabala ukuthi umuntu akhohlwe yinto asuke eyikhulumile, wukuvuka sekudlule isikhathi, wukudala umonakalo njengokushayela ephuzile noma ukuba nenkani angalawuleki. Ngalezi zizathu kuphela imisebenzi, kuchitheka imishado nothando kwabanye ababe besahlonishwa kuphele nokwethenjwa.Kuzona singabala ukuwa nokuhluleka wukuhamba uqonde okungaholela ekulimaleni nokufa imbala.Utshwala obuningi emzimbeni womuntu kungadala ukuthi inhliziyo ime noma umuntu akhingcwe ngumphalazo wakhe ashone. Ukuphuza ngokweqile entsheni kuphinde kusolwe ngokwanda kwezigameko zokuzibulala uma inengcindezi empilweni yayo. Ukuphuza kakhulu kungagcina omunye umuntu esehanjelwa wumqondo nokungadala umonakalo emqondweni, omunye agule ngekhanda.Kwabesifazane abakhulelwe utshwala bulimaza ingane ibe nesifo iFetal Alcohol Syndrome esuke isakhula kuyena.Ucwaningo olwenziwe yi-University of Cape Town ngo-2014 kuya ku-2015 bulinganiselwa ku-4.8 billion utshwala obuthengiwe.Isikhulu esiphezulu kwi-Aware * -Ingrid Louw uthe kubalulekile ukuthi intsha yazi kabanzi ngobungozi botshwala obuphuzwa kakhulu.“Bakhona abantu abaphuzayo kodwa ngendlela ehlelekile nengenabo ubungozi, bese kuba khona labo abacwilile,” usho kanje.Uthe kulabo abacwilayo kubona, kubalulekile ukubazisa ngobungozi obunabo empilweni yabo nakweyabanye abantu.“Ucwaningo lwethu luveze ukuthi abantu bakuleli abasethuki uma bebona izimoto zishayisana kade zigijima ngesivinini esiphezulu nasekuboneni izidumbu zindiza ngenxa yengozi lapho kusuke kudalwe wukushayela imoto komuntu ephuzile. Akukuhle lokhu. Kusitshela ukuthi kukhona lapho singenzi kahle khona, yingakho sizozama ukulungisa isimo ngemikhankaso yethu,” usho kanje.Lo mkhankaso wokuqwashisa ngobubi bokuphuza ngokweqile, unethemba lokuthi uma kungasetshenzwa kubanjiswane kungaphela ukubikwa ngezingozi zemigwaqo ezidalwa abashayela bephuzile, ukuphuza kwezingane nezinye izinto ezimbi ezidalwa wutshwala.Ezinye zezizathu ezoholela entsheni ukuthi iphuze:Ukubona abanye abantu bephuzaUkufoma nokufuna ukuzilawulaUkufuna ukuzama izinto ezintsha empilweni ezizokwenza umuntu aveleleUkungazethembiUkuhehwa okungelona iqiniso njengezinhlelo zethelevishini nezikhangiso.
title: Icwile kwezikaFaro intsha - ucwaningo

text:
SIZWE BLOSEUMCULI kamaskandi uzifanisa nomphrofethi njengoba ethi izidubedube zokuhlaselwa kwabantu bokufika nenkulumo yeSilo, kukwi-albhamu yakhe ebizwa ngokuthi 
Amandla Ami ayikhipha ngo-2011.UMfiliseni Magubane wodumo lwengoma ethi 
Thenjiwe, utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi kumhlukumeza kakhulu ukuthi le albhamu yakhe yagcina ingafinyelelanga kubantu njengoba yayiduve emahhovisi aseKZN Music House lapho ayeqopha khona.“Basanda kungithinta bethi mangiyolanda amabhokisi anama-CD ami ngoba bayaphuma sekuzongena abantu abasha ngaphansi komnyango wezobuCiko namaSiko. Ngithuke koma nasozwaneni uma ngithola ukuthi kanti umculo wami awukaze uyiswe kubantu,” kusho uMfiliseni, osanda kubonakala elingisa emdlalweni waku-SABC 1 
Uzalo.Uthe umyalezo oqukethwe yile albhamu bekumele ufinyelele kubantu.Uveze ukuthi ingoma engunombolo-13 kule albhamu ethi 
Africa Unite, ukholwa wukuthi ukube abantu bayizwa ngabe lezi zigameko zokuhlaselwa kwabantu bokufika azenzekanga.Uthe le ngoma ikhuluma ngobunye nokuhlangana kwabantu bonke base-Afrika.“Kunengoma yesithathu kuyona le albhamu esho okushiwo yiSilo Samabandla manje ukuthi uma kungathiwa sona siphaka impi kungonakala kakhulu, ikhuza impi,” kusho uMfiliseni.Uthe njengoba wonke amabhokisi esewalandile eKZN Music House abantu bangayithola kuyena le albhamu njengoba esezoyidayisela ebhuthini le moto yakhe noma yikuphi lapho ehamba khona.UMfiliseni uphinde waveza ukuthi umatasa estudio ngomsebenzi omusha abantu abangawulindela noma kunini.Uthe njengamanje usebenzisana noSfiso Simamane kanti usazobonakala kakhulu emphakathini nasemarenki ephusha yona le albhamu yakhe abagcina bengayitholanga abantu.UMfiliseni unayo enye i-albhamu ayikhipha ngo-2002 kuyo okunengoma ethi 
Ayihlale Phansi nakuyo ugqugquzela abantu bakuleli ukuthi babambe umthetho babeke phansi izikhali.Kule ngoma ekwi-albhamu ethi 
Izwe Lihle Ngabantu kunezinhlamvu ezithi; “Vele kuyaziwa izwe ngelethu namandla awethu pho yini esiyibangayo..... Ayihlale phansi ibambe umthetho, uxolo eNatali, peace in our land.”
title: ‘Ngabe lwagwemeka udlame nge-albhamu yami’

text: UMLINGISI womdlalo iScandal, uKagiso Modupe obelingisa indawo kaMangi, usenxuse abantu bakuleli ukuthi baqhubeke nokumxhasa njengoba eseshiya emdlalweni ngemuva kweminyaka engu-13 elingisa kuwona.UKagiso ubhale enkundleni yokuxhumana i-Instagram ebonga abantu bakuleli nabaphathi bakhe kulo mdlalo ngokumnika ithuba lokuba kulo mdlalo kusukela uqala.“Ngiyathemba ukuthi la ngizobonakala khona abantu bazokuthanda engizobe ngikwenza njengoba ngizobonakala kuyo indima yobumnandi. Ngibonga abakwa-e.tv, Ochre Media nabo bonke ozakwethu kwiScandal ngothando abalukhombisile,” kusho uKagiso.Uthe kulo mdlalo ubeseqophe iziqephu ezingu-3000 okwenze abone kungcono ukuthi ashiye phansi.“Ngifuna ukubonakala kwezinye izinto ezehlukile kunokulingisa. Kusukela ngesonto elizayo kuzoqala iziqephu zokugcina engizobonakala kuzona. Kuzobe kuyindlela yokuvalelisa kubalandeli bami,” kuchaza uKagiso.UMichael Pocock wakwa-e.tv ukuqinisekisile ukushiya kukaKagiso emdlalweni.“Uzogcina ukubonakala kulo mdlalo ngoMeyi 11. Siyabonga ngokuzinikela kwakhe emdlalweni njengoba selokhu aqala kuwo ngo-2005, ufika kwithelevishini. Siyi-e.tv nalo mdlalo, sithanda ukubonga le nsizwa ngokuzinikela kwayo futhi siyfisela konke okuhle ezintweni ezoziqala njengoba ingumuntu onethalente eliyisimanga,” kuchaza uMichael.
title: Uyashiya umlingisi weScandal

text: BAZONGENA bashone emaphaketheni abagibeli bamabhasi kaMasipala weTheku kusukela ngo-Ephreli 1 okuzokhuphuka ngawo imali yokugibela ngo-8%.Lezi zindaba zivele embikweni wezokuthutha owethulelwe isigungu esilawula umasipala emhlanganweni waso obuseCity Hall, izolo.Umgibeli webhasi obekhokha u-R13 esuka KwaMashu eya edolobheni, usezokhokha uR14.04Ukukhushulwa kwemali yokugibela amabhasi ngo-8% kuzo zonke izindawo ezihamba amabhasi eTheku kusho ukuthi abagibeli sebezokhokha * -R1.04 ngaphezulu emalini akade beyikhokha.Umgcinimafa weTheku, uMnuz Krish Kumar, uthe yinto abayenza minyaka yonke ukukhuphula imali yokugibela amabhasi ukuze bahlangabezane nezindleko zokuwagcina esebenza.UKumar uthe yithimba lenkampani ezimele i-Transport and Economic Support Services (TESS) elenze ucwaningo olunzulu nezincomo ngaphambi kokuthi kufinyelelwe ku-8%.“Uma ubheka ukunyuka kwentengo kapethiloli namafutha, izindleko ezidalwa wukuguquguquka kwamandla erandi, nokukhuphuka kwezindleko zokuwagcina esesimeni, kuyasiphoqa ukuthi siyikhuphule imali yokugibela,” kusho uKumar.Uphikile ukuthi umasipala nomnikazi wenkampani iTansnat, inkampani eyanikwa umsebenzi wokuwalawula amabhasi, abafinyelele ku-8%.Uthe uma ingakhushulwa imali yokugibela kuzophoqeleka ukuthi umkhandlu unyuse imali yama-rates ukuze uhlangabezane nezindleko zokugcina amabhasi ehamba emgwaqweni.ITheku lasayina inkontileka yokusebenzisana nabakwaTansnat ngo-2009. Njengamanje ivuselelwa ngenyanga inkontileka abanayo.Umholi wekhokhasi yeDA eThekwini, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthe kuzozwela kubagibeli abadonsa kanzima ngenxa yesimo somnotho ukunyuka kwemali yokugibela amabhasi.Ubuze ukuthi yini le eyenza umasipala ungaziphatheli amabhasi ngokwawo ukuze wonge izimali.“Iningi labantu abagibela amabhasi kamasipala badonsa kanzima. Uma usukhuphula imali yokugibela kangaka, uthi abenze njani?” kubuza uMncwango.Khonamanjalo, uKumar uthe akasazi isibalo sabasebenzi abaduve emakhaya okungaziwa bazobuyela nini emsebenzini ngenxa yokuvalwa kwebhilidi abebesebenzela kulo ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule.Ibhilidi elingunombolo 75 emgwaqweni uDkt Langalibalele Dube, lizolungiswa ngo-R40million. Kulindeleke nokuthi lishintshwe namafastela angu-880 okubikwa ukuthi lilinye libiza-R9000.Kuvele ukuthi ibhilidi, elineminyango kahulumeni ehlukene nabasebenzi abalinganiselwa ku-660, linenkinga yamanzi, ama-lifts, ama-air conditioner neminkenke ezindongeni okwenze uMnyango wezaBasebenzi wathi aliphephile.
title: Imali yamabhasi izokhuphuka ngo-8%

text: ILAMONTVILLE Golden Arrows iphuce i-Orlando Pirates igunya lokubuyela esicongweni se-log ye-Absa Premiership ngesikhathi iyibambela esibayeni sayo izolo ebusuku emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto.Kulo mdlalo kubonakale okokuqala ngqa uMarcelo Da Silva waseBrazil edlubhe umfaniswano wePirates ngoba engazange akhombise izimpawu zokululama ngokushesha u-Innocent Maela (oke wabonakala ezifudumeza ebhentshini lePirates ngomzuzu ka-30). Ngenxa yomlando iPirates bekulindelekile ukuthi kube iyona ewuqala kahle lo mdlalo nangempela iqembu lasekhaya belizenzela emizuzwini yokuqala ewu-15.Okusheshe kwacaca lapha ukuthi i-Arrows ibingazimisele ngokuhlasela kepha ibihlele ukuma emuva bese izama ukuphuma ngesivinini uma ithola lelo thuba. Lokhu kufakazelwe nawukuqala umdlalo kukaSiboniso Conco (obevutha bhe), Nduduzo Sibiya, Nkosinathi Sibisi noSibusiso Sibeko bonke abaqale ukugqama kwiMultichoice Diski Challenge (MDC). Baqale ebhentshini abadlali abafana noDanny Venter noLerato Lamola abajwayele ukuqala.Livelile nokho ithuba lapho i-Arrows isondele khona kwabePirates abebezama ukuliqala emuva kodwa ibhola lawela kuDanny Phiri ocishe wona umcimbi kodwa ibhola lakhe lavundla kancane eceleni kwepali kade limdlile uSiyabonga Mpontshane obevimbele iBucs.Ngemuva kwalokhu i-Arrows kube sengathi kukhona umjovo ewutholile yasuka emuva umdlalo waqala waqaqeka.Kuze kwaba siyaphela isiwombe sokuqala lingekho iqembu elihlasela ngempumelelo.Kube iPirates futhi ebuye ngethuba lokuqala esiwombeni sesibili kodwa uThembinkosi Lorch wadlala ngomsebenzi. UClinton Larsen ufake uLamola ngomzuzu ka-58 endaweni kaSibeko obesanda kuhlulwa yithuba obekulula ukulinamathisela enethini kunokuligeja. Ngemuva kwalokhu i-Arrows ibikhushukelwe ukuzethemba. Kuphoqe ukuthi iPirates ikhiphe uLorch indawo yakhe yathathwa uJustin Shonga ngomzuzu ka-63.Ngokuhamba kwesiwombe i-Arrows ibilokhu ikhule njalo ngokomdlalo kodwa neqembu lasekhaya belilokhu likhombisa ukuthi liyingozi kangakanani.Kungene abadlali abafana noKudakwache Mahachi noThabo Qalinge ezindaweni zikaMarcelo noPaseka Mako ngemizuzu yokugcina kodwa konke lokhu akubanga usizo kuMilutin Sredojevic.Polokwane City 1-1 SuperSport United; Highlands Park 0-0 Kaizer Chiefs; Cape Town City 0-2 Bidvest Wits; AmaZulu 0-0 Mariztburg United; Black Leopards 1-0 Baroka FC; Orlando Pirates 0-0 Golden Arrows; Bloemfontein Celtic 0-0 Mamelodi Sundowns; Chippa United 1-0 Free State Stars
title: I-Arrows iphuce iPirates iqatha

text: INHLANGANO yezempilo emhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO), ithi kungenzeka kushode abasebenzi bezempilo abangu-18 million ngo-2030.Ithi lokhu kuzobe kudalwa isimo sezomnotho nezifo ezibulalayo ezihlasele emhlabeni ezibulala abantu abaningi ngisho nabo abasebenzi bezempilo.Inhlangano yezempilo iProject Hope, yona ithe kuzoshoda abasebenzi bezempilo abangu-15 million.I-Welfare Sector Education and Training Authority (HWSETA) yakuleli, ngeledlule ikhiphe isexwayiso sokuthi abasebenzi bezempilo bangabanye ababasebenzi abanamakhono abashodayo kuleli.Ucwaningo lwamakhono olwenziwe i-Xpatweb Critical Skills Survey 2020/21, luveze ukuthi emkhakheni wezempilo ososayensi yibo abashoda kakhulu.I-Hope project ithi uma kungenziwa lutho eminyakeni eyishumi, kuzobe kunabasebenzi bezempilo abangu-65 million emhlabeni wonke."Kuzobe kushoda abasebenzi abangu-15 million, okuyibo abazobe bebhekene nomsebenzi wokwelapha ama-billion eziguli."Isikhulu esiphezulu kwi-HWSETA, uNkk Elaine Bras, sithe: “Ukuhlasela kweCovid-19, kuholele ekutheni izinkinga zokushoda kwamakhono emkhakheni wezempilo zicace bha. Abasebenzi bezempilo bangabanye abakhahlanyezwe iCovid-19. Bekumele ukuthi banakekele iziguli kodwa babenovalo lokuthi kungenzeka batheleleke. Kudingeka ukuthi sibeseke ukuze bakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wabo ngempumelelo." UDkt Angelique Coetzee, umengameli we-South African Medical Association (Sama), uthe: "Siyazi ukuthi bayashoda abasebenzi bezempilo emhlabeni. ENingizimu Afrika inkinga esinayo imali yokuqasha labo basebenzi esibadingayo. Sizama konke okusemandleni ukuthi kuqashwe ezikhaleni ezikhona kodwa akulungi ngoba kuthiwa isabelomali sokwenzanjalo kasikho. Lokho kwenza ukuthi ongoti esinabo bahambe baye kwamanye amazwe kuhlanganisa nodokotela nabahlengikazi.“ Uqhube wathi ukungena emkhakheni wezempilo kunzima ngoba kudingeka umuntu abe nezifundo ezithile ezizomvumela ukuthi akwazi ukungena kulo mkhakha. USolwazi Lionel Green Thompson ophethe uphiko lweHealth Science e-UCT, uthe ukufakwa kwezicelo zokufunda kulo mkhakha akwehlile, izitshudeni ezifuna ukuzofundela lo mkhakha ziseningi. I-University of Johannesburg neWits bathi isibalo sezitshudeni ezifuna ukuzofundela umkhakha wezempilo sisalokhu sifana.
title: Kuzoshoda abasebenzi bezempilo ngelizayo

text: AMAPHOYISA ophiko loKlebe asekuqinisekisile ukuthi athole ibhomu ethempelini lama-Muslim, eVerulam ngesonto. Leli bhomu litholwa kusaphele izinsuku ezintathu kuphela ngemuva kokuhlaselwa kwamalungu amathathu ayethandaza kuleli thempeli. Kulesi sigameko esinyantisa igazi kutheleke abalisa abangaziwa bahlasela amalungu ebandla abethandaza ababhokoda ngommese ebanquma noqhoqhoqho kwafa oyedwa abanye baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Kunezinye izingxenye zethempeli ezathungelwa ngomlilo ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko"Sibe nomhlangano negatsha labaphenya ngamabhomu, okuyibo abathathe leli bhomu izolo. Ibona abaqinisekisile ukuthi okutholwe kuleli thempeli kuyisiqhumane," kusho uMnuz Simphiwe Mhlongo okhulumela amaHawks. Uthe njengamanje abakaphenyi ngokuthi iliphi ikhemikhali elisetshenzisiwe ukwakha leli bhomu. UMhlongo uthe basaqhubeka nophenyo. Ngeledlule i-ANC isigxekile lesi sigameko yathi siwukuphazamisa inkululeko yezenkolo eshicilelwe kumthethosisekelo wezwe.UMnuz Pule Mabe okhulumela i-ANC uthe ofakazi kulesi sigameko baveza ngokusobala ukuthi yinto ebihleliwe le yokuhlasela leli thempeli. Uthe kufanele kugxekwe ngazo zonke izindlela noma yimiphi imizamo yokuhlalisa lubhojozi abantu ngenxa yezenkolo.UMabe uthe beyinhlangano ebusayo bashaqekile ukuthi kukhona abantu abenza isenzo esibi kangaka njengoba onke amabandla ezenkolo evikelwe kumthethisisekelo.“Siyacela amaphoyisa uphiko loKlebe ukuba lusilekelele ngoba sifuna ukubabona bejeza abenze lokhu. Sithi dudu emndenini yoshonile, sifisele nalabo abasesibhedlela ukululama okusheshayo," usho kanje.
title: Amaphoyisa aphenya ngebhomu elitholwe ethempelini eVerulam

text: ZANELE MTHETHWAO MUNYE wabafundi abangu-2 089 baKwaZulu-Natal ababesolwa ngokukopela uGrade 12 ngo-2014, useqale phansi uGrade 11 ezama ukuqhubeka nempilo njengoba ethi akucaci ngekusasa labo.Lo mfundi oneminyaka engu-21 obefunda kwesinye sezikole eNkandla, uthe usengenza noma yini ukuze athole imiphumela kaGrade 12 ukuze aqhubeke nempilo.Ngesikhathi ebhala izivivinyo zika-2014 wayesafake isicelo sokuyofundela ubuthisha e-University of Zululand kodwa amaphupho aseyashabalala.Echaza lo mfundi obenza izifundo zakwaCommerce uthe babizwa bonke esikoleni ngoJanuwari wonyaka odlule batshelwa ukuthi kukhona abasolwa ngokukopela.“Uthishomkhulu wathi kumele sibhale izincwadi sichaze ukuthi kwenzekani ngesikhathi sibhala.“NgoJuni sabizelwa ekomitini lomnyango wezemfundo siphenywa ngokukopela. Mina ngangisolwa ngokukopela i-Accounting abanye besolwa kwi-English.“NgoMashi sabhala izivivinyo saphinda ngoNovemba sekubhala bonke omatric. Saba nethemba ukuthi sizoyithola imiphumela kodwa namanje kumnyama,” kuchaza yena.Uthe wagcina ethole isitatimende esinezifundo ezimbili kuphela wangayithola incazelo ngezinye.Esikhundleni sokubhuquza ekhaya kulo nyaka uncamele ukubuyela esikoleni eyokwenza uGrade 11.Uphindele kusona isikole abevele efunda kuso kodwa nakhona usephele amandla njengoba uthishanhloko emtshele ukuthi uzimoshela isikhathi.“Bengithemba ukuthi uma ngiqala kwaGrade 11 ngizokwazi ukugcina ngithole imiphumela ku-matric ngiqhubeke enyuvesi.“Abazali bami sebevele bathi angibuyele ekhaya ngoba kusho ukuthi ngifundela amahhala ngokusho kukathishanhloko. Lesi simo siphethe kabi nabazali ngoba kukhona nomunye udadewethu ebesifunda naye ngo-2014 naye ongayitholanga imiphumela ngenxa yokukopela.“Umama ubethi mhlawumbe kungcono ngibuyele kwaGrade 10 kodwa iminyaka iyahamba nakimina,” usho kanje.Ukhala esifanayo nomunye umfundi obefunda eNkandla naye osabhuquza ekhaya.Uthi usengenza noma yini ukuze athole imiphumela. Uthe mabebuza uthishanhloko akazi lutho njengoba naye ethi udaba luphethwe umnyango.Lo mfundi wayezimisele ngokufundela ubuhlengikazi, uthi kungcono ukuthi bajeziswe bese benikezwa elinye ithuba.Ubona sengathi kuhlukumezeka bona kakhulu kunothisha abasolwa ngokukopelisa.Yaba sematheni indaba yokukopela kwabafundi ngo-2014 okwathiwa kuthinteka othisha nothishanhloko abangu-34 esifundazweni nase-Eastern Cape.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo esifundazweni uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni wazwakalisa ukuphoxeka ngalesi senzo, wathembisa ukuthi bazoqinisekisa ukuthi abathintekayo bathola isifundo.Okhulumela ungqongqoshe, uMnuz Scelo Khuzwayo uthe bonke abafundi ababethinteka selwaxazululwa udaba lwabo.“Abafundi abazikhethela ukubhala kabusha bayithola imiphumela. Abangayitholanga kumele baxhumane nothishanhloko babo,” usho kanje.
title: Abakopela u-matric sebelahle ithemba

text: ABAHLAZIYI bezepolitiki bathi abanye ongqongqoshe abamenyezelwe nguMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa izolo ebusuku ngesikhathi enza izinguquko ngabanye babantu abebevele belindelekile ukuthi babuyele kwiKhabhinethi.UMnuz Thabani Khumalo uthe izinguko zihlanganisa bonke abantu ngoba kukhona abanye abebengameseki njengoba bekuyiwa engqungqutheleni ye-ANC eNasrec, eGoli.Uthe ukwazile ukubhalansisa ngoba ubagcinile abanye ongqongqoshe waxosha abanye nobekuvele kulindelekile ngoba bebethinteka ezintweni ezimayelana nomndeni wakwaGupta.“Ukwazile ukuhlanganisa kahle iKhabhinethi ngokulanda abantu abafana noDkt Zweli Mkhize ngoba ungumuntu onesithunzi ngoba isimo bese sisibi kakhulu. Ukubuyisa umuntu ofana noMnuz Nhlanhla Nene kube yinto enhle ngoba ngesikhathi exoshwa kwehla iRandi, ” kusho uKhumalo.USolwazi Susan Booysen ekhuluma noSABC izolo ebusuku uthe ezinye zezinguquko besezivele sezaziwa emphakathini njengoba abantu abafana noMnuz Julius Malema, ongumengameli we-EFF, ebesekhulumile ngazo.“Bakhona vele obekulindelekile ukuthi bakhonjwe indlela. Abanye bekuvele kulindelekile ukuthi uzobafaka kwiKhabhinethi,” kusho uSolwazi Booysen.Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Pule Mabe, uzamukele izinguquko kwiKhabhinethi.“Uxoxe nazo zonke izinhlaka uRamaphosa ngaphambi kokwenza izinguquko. Ngesikhathi ezethula emphakathini ubephelezelwa wuNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule,” kusho uMabe.UMfundisi Kenneth Meshoe, ongumengameli we-ACDP, ukwamukele ukuqokwa kukaMnuz Nhlanhla Nene kwezezimali ngoba waxoshwa ngoba echitha uhlelo lwenuzi.Uthe ukubuyiswa kwakhe kuzoletha ithemba nokuyisinqumo esihle esenziwe nguRamaphosa.“IRandi lizodlondlobala ngoba uNene wayehlonishwa kakhulu yizimakethe. Yisinqumo esihle lesi.”UMnuz Narend Singh, we-IFP, uthe kuyacaca ukuthi kubekwe phambili i-ANC kunabantu.Umengameli we-UDM, uMnuz Bantu Holomisa, ukhale kakhulu ngokubuyiswa kongqongqoshe abathinteka endabeni yokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.Okhulumela i-EFF, uDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi, uthe uRamaphosa ukucacisile ukuthi ungumengameli obuthaka ngoba uvumele ukuthi ingcindezi yokuhlukana kwe-ANC imphoqe ukuthi aqoke le Khabhinethi.Uthe kunongqongqoshe obekungamele babuyiswe njengoMnuz Malusi Gigaba, Nkk Nomvula Mokonyane, Nkk Bathabile Dlamini nabanye.
title: Izinhlangano eziphikisayo zibona kubekwe i-ANC phambili kunezwe

text: INKAMPANI ekhiqiza ugesi kuleli i-Eskom, imemezele ukuthi izoqhuba uhlelo lokuwunqamula kusukela namhlanje ngo-10 ebusuku kuya ku-5 ekuseni kusasa.Kulindeleke ukuthi ugesi unqamuke futhi ngoLwesine ngesikhathi esifanayo.Ukunqamuka kukagesi kwakamuva kudalwa ukuvalwa kuka unit 1 osesiteshini sikagesi wenuzi iKoeberg, okuthiwa kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthi sisebenze.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe ngabakwa-Eskom, bathi ugesi uzonqamuka ukuze bakwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kunogesi owanele kuleli sonto.Njengamanje bathi banogesi owu-6 672MW obekelwe ukubhekelela izinhlelo ezihleliwe zokulungisa izingqalasizinda, nomunye owu-12 073MW obhekelele ukulungiswa kwengqalasizinda okungahleliwe.Bathi benza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izizinda zabo eziphehla ugesi, ziyasebenza.“Sicela umphakathi ukuthi usebenzise ugesi ngendlela ehlelekile ukuze sikwazi ukugwema ukuwunqamula. Njengamanje awukho ugesi owanele yingakho sinqume ukuwunqamula izinsuku ezimbalwa. Siyaqhubeka nokulungisa izingqalasizinda yethu yingakho kwesinye isikhathi kungabi nogesi owanele. Kumanje iziteshi ezimbili eziphehla ugesi zisamile ukusebenza ngenxa yokuthi silungisa ingqalasizinda,” kusho abakwa-Eskom.Bathi bazoxhumana nomphakathi uma kukhona okushintshayo, kepha bacela abantu ukuthi babalandele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuze bathole imininingwane ngokwenzekayo.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngonyaka odlule isikhulu esiphezulu sakwa-Eskom uMnuz Andre de Ruyter, sithembise abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuletha uzinzo kule nkampani.Izazi zomnotho zihlale zikhala njalo ngokunqanyulwa kukagesi ikakhulukazi ngenxa yomnotho wezwe ongakhuli ngendlela eyamukelekile.
title: I-Eskom iqale phansi ukunqamula ugesi

text: KUNOMBANGO ofufusa buthuli ngomdlali ovelele we-Absa Premiership wangesizini ka-2015/2016 uLebohang Manyama phakathi kweSuperSport United, Mamelodi Sundowns neCape Town City.UManyama useNingizimu Afrika kulandela ukugqabula kwakhe ifindo lesivumelwano ne-Atiker Konyaspor yaseTurkey afike kuyona nyakenye esuka kwiCape Town City ngemali elinganiselwa ku-R10 million.Akuwona la maqembu womathathu kuphela afuna lo mdlali kodwa kuseyiwona asaphumele obala.NeKaizer Chiefs iyabalwa emaqenjini anyonyobela uManyama ofike eTurkey ethwelwe ngeqoma waze wanikwa unombolo 10 kodwa wehluleka wancama ukuzakhela igama.
