Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uStan Matthews usanda kuphumela obala ngokuthi bayamthanda lo mdlali kodwa baxoshwa akufuna etafuleni.UMaimane Phiri, okunguyena obhekene nezindaba zikaManyama, ubengalubambi ucingo lwakhe kodwa usanda kuphawula eqinisekisa ukuthi iKonyaspor isimnikile (uManyama) iphepha elimkhululayo.“Akusona isikhathi esikahle sokukhuluma lesi. Asikazi noma uzoqhubeka afune umsebenzi phesheya kwezilwandle noma uzobuya ngakho asikho isidingo sokuphawula ngoba asikazi,” kusho uPhiri ephephandabeni langeSonto ngasekupheleni kwenyanga edlule.Isikhulu seCity, uJohn Comitis, naso sisanda kuveza ukuthi simtshelile uManyama ukuthi bayamfuna ekhaya lakhe elidala kodwa konke kulele kuyena umdlali ukuthi ufunani.“Asikaze sikufihle ukuthi uManyama uyohlale enendawo eqenjini lami. Ngimazi emncane ngakho akubanga yinkinga ukumtshela ukuthi ngiyamdinga. Yikhona phela ukuthi akaziphethe. Siyamdinga, uyakwazi lokho futhi sinethemba lokuthi inkulumo esibe nayo naye ingamenza awele ngasekhaya lakhe elidala."Akuyena yedwa uManyama ophethe iphepha lakhe kodwa bakhona oTsepo Masilela, Mzikayise Mashaba noTokelo Rantie wodumo lokuduba umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana uShakes Mashaba.UMasilela uchithwe yiChiefs kulandela ukuphela kwenkontileka yakhe ngoJuni kanti uke wamataniswa neMaritzburg United kodwa wakuchitha yena lokho lo mdlali oke wadlala nakwiSpanish La Liga.Sisekwabanesipiliyoni sokudlala phesheya, kuyavela nokuthi uRantie uhleli ekhaya ngenhloso yokuthola ikhaya elisha kulandela ukuhlukanisa kwakhe neqembu laseTurkey. Abadlali abafana noSibusiso Masina, Vincent Kobola, Mahlatsi Makudubela noMzikayise Mashaba nabo basengawathola amakhaya amasha ngaphambi kuka-Agasti 31 okuwusuku okuvalwa ngalo iwindi lokushintshana ngabadlali. Laba badlali abadingi ukuthi kwenzeke lokho ngoba bangasayina noma yinini namaqembu abawafunayo.
title: Kufufusa umbango wabafuna uManyama

text: LUGCINE lugobile uphondo nge-data kwaVodacom njengoba izokwehla ngo-30% kusuka ngenyanga ezayo.Lokhu kusho ukuthi i-1 Gigabit ye-data izosuka ku-R149 ubize uR99 kusukela ngo-Ephreli 1 nonyaka.Izolo abakwaVodacom basayine isivumelwano nenhlangano ebhekele ukuncintisana, iCompetition Commission lapho bevume khona ukwehlisa intengo yemikhiqizo yabo.Lezi zindaba zimenyezelwe yisikhulu esiphezulu sakwaVodacom, uMnuz Shameel Joosub, othe isivumelwano sokunika abantu imikhiqizo yobuchwepheshe engambi eqolo sizobalahlekisela ngoR2.7billion ngonyaka.“Sikhethe ukuxoxa neCompetition Commission, hhayi ukulwa nayo emuva kokuthi idedele umbiko wayo we-data ngoDisemba wanyakenye.Siyathanda ukusiza abantu baseNingizimu Afrika, amakhasimende azohlomula kakhulu emikhiqizweni yethu,” kusho uJoosub.UKhomishana weCompetition Commission, uMnuz Tembinkosi Bonakele, uthe bayaxoxa nazo zonke izinkampani zokuxhumana ukuthi zehlise intengo yemikhiqizo yazo futhi unethemba lokuthi bazovumelana maduze.Uncome iVodacom ngokusayina isivumelwano esizohlomulisa abantu bakuleli.Uveze ukuthi kusukela ngenyanga ezayo amakhasimende akwaVodacom azothola imikhiqizo yamahhala uma efuna imisebenzi nge-internet, efuna ukufunda ngezempilo, izikole nasezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.Ukungena kwi-website yoMnyango wezaseKhaya nakho ngeke kudle imali emakhasimende akwaVodacom.UBonakele uthe nokungena kwiFacebook kumahhala emakhasimendeni akwaVodacom ngoba kukhona iFacebook flex.Abantu abakwi-prepaid bazophinde bathole namaSMS amabili amahhala ngosuku uma bethenge i-airtime nokunye ezinsukwini eziwu-30.Uveze ukuthi ufuna izinkampani zamaselula ziphe abantu i-data ethile mahhala njalo ngosuku.UNgqongqoshe wezoHwebo neziMboni, uMnuz Ebrahim Patel, uthe isivumelwano seVodacom neCompetition Commission sibalulekile ngoba abantu bayayidinga i-data ukukhulisa umnotho kwazise izinto eziningi zenziwa ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe.“Kubalulekile ukuthi sifake bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kwezobuchwepheshe ngakho ukuncipha kwezindleko ze-data kuzosisiza ukuthi senze lokhu.“Kuhle nokuthi abakwaVodacom bazovumela abafuna imisebenzi ukuthi bangene kwi-internet mahhala. Kuzophinde kwehliswe imikhiqizo yakwaVodacom ngo-Ephreli wonyaka ozayo, okusho ukuthi izokwehla ngentengo efinyelela ku-40%,” kusho uPatel.Uthe lesi sivumelwano soqinisekisa ukuthi kukhona ukuncintisana okuhle emakethe futhi uyathemba nezinye izinkampani zizoza neziphakamiso zokwehlisa intengo yemikhiqizo.
title: Yehlele ngezansi iVodacom nge-data

text: USIZWE wukufunda i-diary yendodakazi eyimfihlo ukuze athole ngokudlwengulwa kwayo okusolwa umqeqeshi wesibhakela eQuary Heights ngaseNewlands East, eThekwini.Unina wentombazane eneminyaka engu-14 uvule icala lokudlwengula kulandela ngokuthola ngale mikhuba umqeqeshi okuthiwa ubeyigila kusukela ngoJuni nyakenye.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi le ntombazane ibidonswe ngezindlebe ukuthi ingalinge itshele muntu ngalolu daba.Kuthiwa ibike iqobele phansi ebhukwini layo konke obekwenzeka njengoba ibisatshiswe ngokuthi ingakhulumi.Unina wengane uqaphele ushintsho oluningi endodakazini yakhe okuhlanganisa nokuthi ibingasenzi kahle emsebenzini wayo wesikole kwaGrade 9.Unina uthe kuke kwenzeka nomkhuba ongajwayelekile wokuthi izichamela uma ilele, ekubeni yayeka yayeka kudala ukuphunyuka.“Ngishaqekile ngesikhathi ngifunda i-diary yendodakazi yami ukuthi ibidlwengulwa kusukela ngoJuni wonyaka odlule ngumqeqeshi wayo. Kusukela ngo-2017 ubeqeqeshwa nguye isibhakela. Bengingakaze ngisole lutho, ngibone indodakazi yami ishintsha, nasesikoleni ingenzi kahle. Kungimangazile lokhu ngoba lo mqeqeshi ubefana nobaba noma umkhulu kuyona ngoba uneminyaka eko-50. Ngendlela engishaqeke ngayo, angazi ngempela ukuthi ngithini,” kusho unina wengane.Le ntombazane nezinye izingane beziqeqeshwa yilo msolwa njalo ngo-5.30 ntambama kuze kube * -7 ebusuku phakathi nezinsuku.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi lo mqeqeshi ubeke ayilande esikoleni le ntombazane, ayiyise emzini wakhe bese eyidlwengula egaraji.Lo mlisa Isolezwe elithole ukuthi akakaboshwa, kunezinsolo eziqinile ukuthi ubengaqali ukugila le mikhuba njengoba kukhona namanye amantombazane okuthiwa ubewabiza ngomakoti bakhe, njengoba kade esho nakumgilwa.Umndeni wale ntombazane uthe ufuna umlisa aboshwe futhi angaphinde asebenze nezingane.Umsolwa kuthiwa unonkosikazi, izingane nabazukulu abalingana nomgilwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuvulwa kwecala lokudlwengula.“Icala lokudlwengulwa kwentombazane eneminyaka engu-14 livulwe esiteshini saseNewlands East, lizodluliselwa kuphiko oluphenya amacala ocansi nodlame emindenini eNanda. Uphenyo luyaqhubeka,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Umqeqeshi usolwa ngokunukubeza intombazane

text: KULA masonto ambalwa edlule kuphinde kwaqubuka udlame phakathi kwabaseNingizimu Afrika nalabo abaqhamuka kwamanye amazwe ase-Afrika.Lolu dlame belubhekiswe kwabokufika abanezitolo emalokishini. Lube mandla ngesonto eledlule ikakhulukazi eSoweto njengoba kugcine kuphume izidumbu ezintathu.Abashonile bafe odlameni olubhedukile kuleli lokishi laseGoli lapho abantu bebekhala ngokuthi abokufika bashibhisa izimpahla abazithengisayo ngoba bedayisa izimpahla esezonakele futhi ezingumkokotelo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje eSoweto, ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule kushiswe isitolo sowokufika eNewlands, eThekwini elele ngaphakathi kusona. Kukhona abakwazile ukumsiza bamkhipha esitolo ebesikhiyiwe kanti kumanje usesibhedlela.NgoLwesine olwedlule, uMnuz John Ashtal wahlaselwa amadoda ayehlomile agqekeza isitolo sakhe KwaDabeka amphuca imali nogwayi.Sekuvamile ukuthi kuhlale kuhlale kuhlaselwe abokufika kuleli besolwa ngayo yonke inhlobo yobugebengu nokuyinto ephehla udlame futhi ebeka ubudlelwane beNingizimu Afrika nomakhelwane bayo engcupheni. Izimpahla ezonakele ikakhulukazi eziwukudla akufanele zidayiselwe abantu ngoba lokho kubeka impilo yabakuthengayo engozini ngoba kungabagulisa.Kodwa njengoba noNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, asho emasontweni amabili edlule, ngesikhathi ehambela izitolo ezahlukene edolobheni, akuzona izitolo zabokufika kuphela ezinezimpahla eseziphelelwe yisikhathi, zikhona nezabakuleli.Ngisho ngabe kuthiwa bekuyiqiniso ukuthi ngezabokufika kuphela kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi yinto okumele ilungiswe ngodlame leyo. Ziyadinga ukuphenywa izinsolo zobugebengu ezimataniswa nabokufika futhi lapho kunobufakazi, kushushiswe hhayi ukuthi abantu bazijezisele ngokwabo.Ubulwane ukushisa isitolo kunomuntu okhiyelwe ngamabomu. Yimbi le nto eyenziwe futhi iwukucwasa okungamukelekile. Uhulumeni uba nezigcawu zokudingida ngalolu dlame kodwa manje sekudingeka okungaphezu kwalokho ngoba ngelinye ilanga kuyobheduka impi okungeyuba lula ukuyinqanda.
title: [IMIBONO] Udlame kalusoze luyixazulule inkinga yabokufika kuleli

text: UBAMBE umoya umndeni womfana waseThengani, eManguzi, onyamalale emasontweni amabili edlule ngesikhathi eyovakashela umlisa obenguthisha wakhe.ULwazi Tembe (12) ofunda uGrade 6 eNonikela Primary khona eThengani, kuthiwa wahamba kubo ngoSepthemba 30 ethi uyovakashela uthisha obemfundisa ngonyaka odlule ohlala endaweni.Uyise kaLwazi uMnuz Celani Thusi (34) uthe indodana yakhe yamtshela ukuthi ibizwe nguthisha ukuthi izolanda amaphepha athile kodwa yahamba yangaphinde yabuya.“Wahamba ephethe iselula yami ayexhumana kuyona nothisha wakhe kuFacebook. Nabangani bakhe ahlangana nabo endleleni bathi wabatshela ukuthi ubizwe nguthisha. Ubejwayele vele ukuvakashela uthisha kodwa ubengahambi isikhathi eside. Besingakaze sisole lutho ngoba uthisha ngowesilisa osemncane,” kusho uThusi.Uthe wamshayela ucingo lo thisha ebona indodana yakhe ingasabuyi ekhaya kodwa waphika ukuthi ike yafika kuye.Uthe uthisha usethuthile emqashweni abehlala kuwo, okwenza basole ukuthi usebalekile.“Emuva kosuku enyamalalile umama kaLwazi wathola umyalezo ophuma kwiselula yakhe othi asifake uR5 000 eSpar ukuze abantu abamgcinile bamdedele lapho abamgcine khona. Bathi bazosiqinisa isandla uma singayifaki le mali. Imali asinayo, selokhu alahleka sichitha usuku lonke simthungatha,” kusho uThusi.Uveze ukuthi lo myalezo uthi uLwazi ubanjwe nabanye abafana ababili bebamba inkunzi nathi udaba olwakhiwe ngoba indodana yakhe ayigangile.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Lucky Tembe, lithe umphakathi ukhathazekile ngokunyamalala kukaLwazi.“Sithandazela ukuthi umfana atholakale esaphila. Ngonyaka odlule ukhona omunye umfana wasendaweni owanyamalala watholakala eseshonile eceleni komgwaqo,” kusho uTembe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aseManguzi avule icala lokuthunjwa komfana kanti idokodo selidluliselwe ophikweni oluphenya ngamacala odlame lomndeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala ocansi eJozini ukuze luqhubeke nophenyo.
title: Uvalo emndenini ngengane enyamalele

text: ABAMELI bowayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, bafuna inkantolo ibeke icala uphiko lwezokushushisa ngokwakha itulo lokuhlasela uZuma, ukuhlukumeza amalungelo akhe nokungamphathi ngokulinganayo nabanye ngenxa yesikhundla sakhe sezepolitiki.Abameli bakaZuma batshele inkantolo ukuthi uZuma uphathwe kabi.Ummeli kaZuma, u-Adv Muzi Sikhakhane, usho lokhu enkantolo izolo ngesikhathi efaka isicelo sokuthi kuchithwe amacala abekwe noZuma.USikhakhane utshele amajaji enkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu ukuthi icala lenkohlakalo lihlehliselwe u-Okthoba 15 ukuze kuphume isinqumo sesicelo sabo sokuthi kuchithwe onke amacala abekwe uZuma.Uveze ukuthi icala likaZuma selibanjezelwe isikhathi eside, kwaba nokugxambukela kwepolitiki, kwabambezeleka ubufakazi, kwaba nabakhohlwayo, nokungaziphathi kahle kwabashushisi. Konke lokhu uSikhakhane uthe kuzokwenza ukuthi bungabikhona ubulungiswa uma kuthethwa icala likaZuma.Uthe uZuma kwakumele ashushiswe nowayemeluleka ngezimali, uMnuz Schabir Shaik, eminyakeni ewu-10 edlule.USikhakhane uthe yize kuphula umthetho okuthiwa kwenziwa nguZuma kodwa lokho akuniki uMbuso igunya lokuziphatha ngokungemthetho.Uthe ukungabikho kukaZuma ecaleni likaShaik kusho ukuthi wayeshushiswa engekho.USikhakhane uthe uShaik noZuma babekwe amacala bobabili, kwakufanele anikwe ithuba lokubuza ngobufakazi obumthintayo.Uthe igama likaZuma selihlanganiswa nenkohlakalo ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi inkantolo isisuse lesi sithombe kule ndoda enomndeni.Uthe amacala abekwe uZuma abesetshenziswa ukumshaya kwezepolitiki. Lokhu kucace ngokuthi afunde ubufakazi obukuma-spy tapes.Ama-spy tapes yizingxoxo ezaziphakathi kowayenguMqondisi wezokuShushiswa komphakathi, uMnuz Bulelani Ngcuka nalowo owayephethe oFezela, uMnuz Leornard McCathy bexoxa ngoZuma nophiko lwezokushushisa ngo-2007.Ngesikhathi sekudlalwa le ngxoxo eqoshiwe ngo-2009 abameli bakaZuma bathi kuvela ngokusobala ukuthi uZuma wayewumgilwa, ehlukunyezwa yizinhlaka zomthetho.USikhakhane utshele iJaji Jerome Mnguni, Esther Steyn noThoba Poyo Dlwati ukuthi babheke ukuziphatha kophiko lwezokushushisa.“UPhiko lwezokushushisa ngeke lufike lapha nezandla zalo ezingcolile emuva kokuphula umthetho walo,” kusho uSikhakhane.UZuma ubekwe amacala awu-16 okukhwabanisa, inkohlakalo nokushushumbisa imali.La macala athinta “umgwazo” wenkampani yaseFrance eyakha izikhali iThales okuthiwa yagwazelwa uZuma isizwa nguShaik.
title: ‘Uphiko lwezokushushisa lwahlukumeza uZuma’

text: BALINGANISELWA ku-2.8 million abantu abafa ngenxa yezinkinga zezempilo ezihambisana nokuphuza utshwala.Ucwaningo olusanda kukhishwa yiThe Lancet, lukhombisa ukuthi ukuphuza utshwala kuhambisana nokushona kwabantu ngenxa yezinkinga zezempilo.Balinganiselwa ku-2.4 billion abantu abaphuza utshwala emhlabeni jikelele, kulaba bantu u-2.8 million kukholakala ukuthi ushona ngenxa yezinkinga ezidalwa utshwala.Ngo-2016 kuvele ukuthi ukusebenzisa utshwala bekuyisizathu sesikhombisa ohlwini lwezizathu eziholela ekufeni nasekukhubazekeni kwabantu, ikakhulu abaneminyaka ephakathi kwengu-15 kuya kwengu-49.Kubantu abanale minyaka, ukusebenzisa utshwala bekuholela ekutheni balimale ezingozini zezimoto, bangenwe yisifo sofuba noma bazilimaze.Kubantu abaneminyaka engu-50 nangaphezulu umdlavuza bewuyisizathu sokufa ebesincike ekusebenziseni utshwala njengoba kuholele ekushoneni kwabantu besifazane abalinganiselwa ku-27% nabesilisa abayela ku-19%.Abacwaningi bathi ababoni kukhona izinga eliphephile lokuphuza utshwala nelinomthelela omuhle.Bathe utshwala bungesinye sezizathu ezihamba phambili eziholela ekwandeni kwezifo nasekufeni kwabantu emhlabeni wonke.Le mininingwane iqukethwe wumbiko weThe Lancet obheka izizathu eziholela ekufeni kwabantu emhlabeni wonke, iThe Lancet Global Burden of Disease obheke amazwe angu-195.Abacwaningi bathe ukusebenzisa utshwala kunobudlelwane obuthile nesimo sabantu sezempilo futhi kunomthelela othile ekutheni abantu bagcine benezinkinga zokungasebenzi ngendlela kwezitho zomzimba kanti futhi kuphazamiseka ukusebenza komqondo ngendlela efanele ngesikhathi bephuzile, okungaholela ezingozini.Omunye wabacwaningi abahamba phambili kulolu cwaningo, uDkt Max Griswold, wesikhungo semfundo ephakeme i-University of Washington e-United States uthe phambilini kuke kwavela ukuthi utshwala bunganomthelela omuhle kwezinye izifo kodwa uma bebheka bathole ukuthi izinkinga ezihambisana nabo zinkulu kakhulu.“Kunokuxhumana okukhulu phakathi kokuphuza utshwala nengozi yokuba nomdlavuza, ukulimala, nokungenwa yizifo ezithelelanayo,” kusho uDkt Griswold.Bathe ucwaningo lwangaphambilini olwalubheka ukuphuzwa kotshwala nezinkinga ezihambisana nabo lwaluncike kakhulu ekutheni abantu bathini kodwa ucwaningo lwamanje lubheka okuningi kunalokhu. Lubheka ukuthi abantu babuphuza kangakanani utshwala.USolwazi Emmanuela Gakidou, wese-University of Washington uthe utshwala bubeka isimo sempilo engcupheni futhi kudingeka ukuthi kube nemigomo ezovimbela ukusetshenziswa kwabo ngokungafanele.“Amazwe wonke kufanele abuyekeze imigomo nezinhlelo zezempilo ezizosiza abantu ukuthi bagweme ukusebenzisa kabi utshwala.“Lokhu kungaba ukufaka intela ethe xaxa otshwaleni nokuvimbela ukutholakala kotshwala kalula nokuqinisa imithetho yokudayiswa kwabo ngokunciphisa isikhathi sokudayiswa kwabo nokufaka imigomo yokukhangisa,” kusho uSolwazi Gakidou.
title: Sikhulu isibalo sababulawa yizifo ezixhumene nophuzo

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGULIZOTHELEKA ngeSonto ithimba lakwaMetro FM ukulungiselela imiklomelo yaminyaka yonke, amaMetro FM Music Awards (MMA) azoba se-ICC, eThekwini, ngoFebhuwari 27.AmaMMA kuzoba ngaka-15 ekhona nonyaka kanti kuzoba ngokwesine eseThekwini iminyaka ilandelana.UChristinah Mazibuko, oyiMenenja yezokuMaketha eMetro FM, uthe kusukela ngesonto elizayo izinhlelo eziningi bazobe bezisakaza bukhoma ezindaweni ezahlukene kuleli dolobha.UChristinah uveze ukuthi amathikithi asengaqala ukudayisa noma yinini.“Sizomemezela emoyeni uma eseqalile ukudayisa. Khumbula ukuthi sidayisa ayisibalo esithize ngakho sifuna abantu bahlale belindile ukuze kuzoba nesasasa.Ngeke ngisho nokuthi azoba yimalini kodwa bazozwa emoyeni nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana,” kusho uChristinah. Ukuvota kwaqala ngoJanuwari 15.Njengamanje umunxa osavotelwa ngokushaya inombolo ethi *120*602# ngoweSong of the Year.Abaculi abancintisanayo nguBlack Coffee (
We Dance Again), Nathi (
Nomvula), DJ Sphectacula & DJ Naves (
Kings Of The Weekend Anthem), DBN Nyts (
Shumaya), Heavy K (
Umoya), DJ Ganyani (
Talk To Me), Prince Kaybee (
Wajelwa), Ricky Rick (
Boss Zonke), DJ Shimza (
Akulalwa) noPrince Kaybee (
Better Days).` Ukuvota kuzovalwa ngo-9.30 ngosuku lomcimbi.
title: AbeMetro FM bazosakaza beseThekwini ngelizayo

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUA BANYE abantu kuthi besebenza, babuye baqale phansi bayofundela omunye umsebenzi ngoba sebenothando lwawo.Kwesinye isikhathi, ikakhulukazi abaculi, ubezwa bethi bafundele into ethile kodwa ngenxa yothando lomculo sebeyacula.UBongani Dlamini odume ngoDJ Bongz naye ungomunye wabantu ababuye bacabanga ukuthi benza iphutha ngomsebenzi abawenzayo.“Ngokomthetho kwakufanele ngibe wusomahlaya ngoba ngiyathanda ukuhlekisa uma ngihleli nabantu, ukuze kuhlale kujatshulwe. Ngivele ngishaye imidanso engasile eminye igcine isiphumelela isithandwa izwe lonke,” kusho uDJ Bongz.Ngaphandle komculo uBongz usezakhele udumo ngokuqhamuka nemidanso eyahlukene njengowokudlalisa isithupha kanti owakamuva yiPenguin dance chesa baba.Lo DJ waKwaNdengezi, eThekwini, uthe njengamanje kunomunye omusha azoqhamuka nawo ozobonakala kwi-video yakhe entsha yengoma ethi 
Ofana Nawe ayenze noSobz. I-video uzoyiqopha namhlanje eThe Society kuStamford Hill, eThekwini.Kuzobe kuboshelwe uCassper Nyovest, Big NUZ, Naima Kay, Zakwe, Happy Gal, Mshoza nabanye abaningi. Ngaphandle kokuqopha i-video uzobe egubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa.“Ngiyazi usuzongibuza ukuthi ngineminyaka emingaki kodwa anginankinga. Ungaya eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya uyobheka khona. Angifuni ukufana nomdlali webhola uma usudlule ku-30 bese kuthiwa umdala. Ngiyadlala ngina-39. Uyabo sengiyobamba u-40? Sekumele ngithole umakoti kodwa akusiyo into engiyijahile. Uyovela uma isikhathi sesifikile,” kusho uBongz.Uthe ukuhamba kweminyaka kuyabonakala empilweni yakhe ngoba akasayiphili impilo yokubukwa. Uthe eminyakeni edlule ubenendaba ukuthi abantu bazothini ngaye.“Sengiwumuntu womndeni manje kwazise nginomndeni omkhulu. Kumama siwu-12 futhi imina omdala, uma kukhalwa kukhalwa kimi. Abantu bazothi izinto zami zihamba kancane kanti kumele ngenze isiqiniseko sokuthi ekhaya badlile. Kwakukhulunywa kuthiwa ikhaya angisalinakile kanti manje sengilungisile. Ngaphandle kwasekhaya nginezingane ezintathu okungabafana ababili nentombazane eyodwa.”U-DJ Bongz uqale ukuzakhela udumo ngo-2005 ngengoma ethi 
Sobabili eyayikwi-albhamu ethi 
No Retreat. No Surrender. Eminyakeni edlule ukhiphe izingoma okubalwa kuzo ethi 
Sobuye Sibonane, Sengihambile, Uvalo nezinye. Ezingomeni zakamuva uzwakala ecula okuhlanganisa nethi 
Ofana Nawe.“Sengifuna ukuzibambela manje. Abantu bacabanga ukuthi awukwazi ukuzenzela kanti ukuqhamuka nengoma eshisayo yinto yami. Uma upika umuntu uvele aphakame ehlohlwa abantu abathize agcine eseyisitha sami elokhu engilandela ethi angimkhokheli. Phela kumele ingoma ibhaliswe kwaSamro, awulokhu ulandela umuntu kodwa uSamro uyakufakela imali yakho. Abantu abawazi umculo. Sengithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngizosebenza nomuntu owaziyo,” kusho uBongz.Uthe ngengoma yakhe entsha ufuna ukuqinisekisa abantu ukuthi usebuyile.“Indoda uma ungayiboni isuke ikhokha amandla. Ngizama ukubuyisa uDJ Bongz wakudala kanti ngiyabona ukuthi uyabuya manje ngoba ngiphethe induku kuphela. Abantu uma bengangiboni emculweni ngisuke ngigxile enkampanini iMabala Noise ngoba manje sekunabantu engisebenzisana nabo, abafana noReggie Nkabinde. Akufuneki ube wugombela empilweni. Xhumana nabantu ukuze uphumelele. Kufana nemoto, kukhona abenza u-gearbox, abenza umzimba nokunye.”
title: UBongz wodumo ubesakhokhe amandla emculweni

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZIEseGoliK UNGENZEKA ukuthi akafuni ukuphumela obala ngokuthi yimuphi unozinti ozovimba ngempelasonto umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs uStuart Baxter oshaye ingwiji izolo wathi akashongo ukuthi kuzovimba uBrilliant Khuzwayo.IChiefs izobhekana nePlatinum Stars emdlalweni okulindeleke ukuthi ube nzima ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ngeSonto ngo-3 ntambama.Selokhu kuqale isonto bekulokhu kubhalwa ngokuthi uKhuzwayo nguyena ozovimba njengoba u-Itumeleng Khune ezobe edonsa isigwebo samakhadi amane aphuzi kule mpelasonto.Ekhuluma nezintatheli izolo ekuseni uBaxter uthe akazi ukuthi leyo nto ivela kuphi. Nokho ngemuva komdlalo weMoroka Swallows uBaxter wezwakala ethi uKhuzwayo nguyena ozovimba uma engafuni kufanele acashe.“Angazi ukuthi leyo nto iphumaphi. Akumina osho kanjalo, mhlawumbe bengibheme okuthize. Bonke onozinti bami abazilolongayo banethuba elifanayo lokuthi bangavimba kulo mdlalo wePlatinum. Ngizobona namuhla noma kusasa ukuthi ngubani okulungele ukuvimba. Ozovimba kufanele abe sesimweni esihle somqondo azi ukuthi akusiwo lo mdlalo kuphela azowudlala kodwa neminye kusuka manje,” kusho uBaxter.“Angifuni ukuthusa abadlali ngaphambi komdlalo, koya ngokuthi ngubani olungele ukudlala ngalolo suku. Kufanele siqaphele ekutheni singavele siqagule igama likanozinti ozovimba. Noma ngabe ubani esizomkhetha kufanele kube ngozokwenza umsebenzi.” kuchaza umqeqeshi.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi iChiefs yathelwa othulini yiBidvest Wits ngo 3-2 kuTelkom Knockout nalapho kwakuvimbe khona u-Arthur Bartman ngoba uKhune wayengekho. Lokhu kwenza abe mancane kakhulu amathuba okuthi kuvimbe uBartman ngoba uBaxter wamgxeka kakhulu ngokudlisela kulo mdlalo.“Sifuna ukusebenzisa lo mdlalo ukuvula igebe phezulu ku-log,” kusho uBaxter obebonakala ukuthi akafuni lutho kulo mdlalo ngaphandle kwewini.Umqeqeshi weStars, uCavin Johnson, uthe iqembu elizodlala kahle ngosuku lomdlalo lizonqoba.“Basishiya ngamaphuzu ayisithupha nokwenza kube nzima ukuthi sibabambe. Sebevele bayinqobile njengoba sengishilo ngaphambilini. Thina okwethu ngukuthi siziphathe kahle kulo mdlalo ukuze sikwazi ukulwela indawo yesibili ku-log. Abafana abadingi ukukhuthazwa okukhulu uma bedlala namaqembu afana neMoroka Swallows, Mamelodi Sundowns nayo iChiefs,” kusho uJohnson.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Namuhla: Maritzburg United v Moroka Swallows (8pm, Nelson Mandela Bay)Kusasa: Black Leopards v University of Pretoria (3pm, Peter Mokaba Stadium); Free State Stars v AmaZulu (3pm, Goble Park); Bidvest Wits v Orlando Pirates (6pm, Mbombela Stadium); Mamelodi Sundowns v Bloem Celtic (8.15pm, Pilditch Stadium); Chippa United v Ajax Cape Town (8.15pm, Phillipi Stadium)NgeSonto: Kaizer Chiefs v Platinum (3pm, Peter Mokaba Stadium); Golden Arrows v SuperSport United (3pm, Princess Magogo).
title: Akacacisi ngozovala esika-Khune

text: UMNDENI waKwaMashu usale nezingubo obuzigqokile kusha umuzi izolo.Lo mndeni onamalungu ayisikhombisa uphume ugijima emzini wawo onamakamelo amathathu okulala.UNkk Thobekile Siphika  uthe uvuke ekuseni wayochelela izimbali ngoba bebengekho ekhaya kusukela ngoLwesihlanu  besemngcwabeni welinye ilungu lomndeni elingahlali nabo.“Ngikhe kabili amanzi ngichelela, kuthe sengibuya okwesithathu, ngabona intuthu iphuma ngefasitela ekamelweni lezingane.“Ngigijime ngaya endlini ngiyobheka ngafica kuvutha umbhede wezingane.  Ngavusa izingane nomyeni wami abebesalele ngoba besikhathele sibuye ebusuku emngcwabeni,” kuchaza uNksz Siphika.Uthe ekamelweni okuqale kulo umlilo amapulakikagesi awasebenzi ngeke kwenzeke ukuthi umlilo usuke kugesi.“Ayikho into ebibasiwe endlini njengoba ngisho ukuthi bekusavuke mina kuphela. Kusho ukuthi ukube asibuyanga ebusuku besizofika umuzi ushile singazi ukuthi ushiswe yini.“Akukho esikukhiphile ngoba umlilo ubushesha kakhulu ngithe ngiyangena ngiyothatha isikhwama esinamaphepha abalulekile ngajika ngingakafiki ekamelweni ngoba bese kusha i-ceiling board,” kusho yena.Uthe okwamanje abakazi ukuthi bazokwenzenjani ngoba basathukile.“Sibonga ukuthi akuphumanga mphefumulo yize singazi ukuthi sizolala kuphi namhlanje (izolo),” kusho yena.Ikhansela uMnuz Muziwenhlanhla Shezi lithe belisazohlanganisa amehlo nomndeni ukuze libone ukuthi yini umasipala ongasiza ngayo.“Ngeshwa umuzi okhokhelwe ngebhange umasipala awukwazi ukuwakha kabusha kodwa okungase kwenzeke ukubasiza ngento yokuthi bakhosele okwesikhashana, izingubo nokudla. Sizame nokubacelela usizo kosomabhizinisi bendawo,” kuchaza uShezi.
title: Basale nezingubo abebezigqokile kungqongqa umuzi KwaMashu

text: UMNDENI wowesifazane waseNhlangwini eHlokozi, osephenduke inhlekisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuthiwa ushade ‘nomdodovu wekhehla’, uthi uhlukumezekile kakhulu ngalezi zinkulumo ezingekho.Lo mndeni uthe empeleni lona bekungewona umshado walaba abavela ezithombeni osekushintshwana ngazo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kodwa umkhulu nomzukulu wakhe, bebegcina isiko lokushadisa unina kamzukulu owashona engaphelelisanga emgcagcweni.UNksz Khethiwe Shange (27) noMnuz Mlungiselwa Ngubo (74) bathi umndeni uthuke sewuthintwa yizihlobo nabangani zibatshela ukuthi bayathukwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngenxa yesithombe esibaveza beshada.Abantu bachapha ikhehla ngenhlamba belisola ngokushada nengane encane.UNksz Nonhlanhla Shezi uthe usuku lwangoMgqibelo odlule bekungolubalulekile kumnandi kubona njengomndeni kodwa konke lokho kwashabalala ngezinto abathuke sezibhalwe ngomndeni kuFacebook.“Umkhulu nomzukulu abasezithombeni, besigcina isiko kwenziwa umabo kakhulu nomkhulu esebashona. Babegcine ngokushada omhlophe babhala kwase kukhaleleka isiko bese sikwenza njengomndeni, akulona iqiniso ukuthi umkhulu ubeshada nengane encane. Umkhulu ubemele umfowabo uKhethiwe emele ukhulu wakwaShange,”kusho uNksz Shezi.Uthe izithombe zifakwe wudadewabo ekhasini lakhe likaFacebook.“Ngicabanga ukuthi kukhona ozithathile wazidlulisa zafika kulaba bantu. Ngifonelwe umngani wami engitshela ukuthi zifakwe eLadies House kuyahlekwa, kwasiphoqa ukuthi sihlale phansi noKhethiwe simeluleke,” kusho uNksz Shezi. Eqhuba uthe okubaphatha kabi ukuthi nomuntu ozibize ngoZime Magudulela obe ngowokuqala ukusabalalisa amanga ngezithombe uziphendule ilungu lomndeni ekubeni bengamazi.“Silinde ukuhlangana nelungu lomndeni eliyiphoyisa nabantu abadala sithathe izinyathelo zomthetho. Sifuna afunde isifundo angacabangi ukuthi uzodicilela isithunzi sabantu bese kuphela kanjalo,” kusho uNksz Shezi.Izithombe zisajikeleza emakhasini ahlukene. UNksz Shezi uthe kuyabakhathaza lokho ngoba abazi ukuthi kungagcina kunamuphi umthelela kumalungu omndeni athintekayo.Izigameko zokuhlanjalazwa kwabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana sezivamisile kanti nengalo yomthetho isiyangenelela kuboshwe izigilamkhuba. Osaziwayo bakubantu abangasahleki uma kuza ezintweni ezibhalwa abantu ngabo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uBasetsana Kumalo ngomunye wabo nowagcina elinqobile icala.   USolwazi Sihawu Ngubane uthe ngokwesintu amalungu omndeni ayakwazi ukumela angasekho uma kwenziwa isiko. “Alikho iphutha uma amalungu omndeni egcina isiko ngoba abanye abantu kusuke sekubaphoqa kukhona lapho kukhaleleka khona. Kuyenziwa uma kuwumshado kodwa ngezindlela zokuganiselana kuyinto ende ehluka ngezindlela eziningi,” kusho uSolwazi Ngubane.
title: Kudumale umndeni kuhlekiswa ngabebegcina isiko

text: NJENGOBA sesibuyekeziwe isinqumo sokuvimba abezindaba ngokubika ngecala likaMnuz Sandile Mantsoe ngoLwesihlanu, sekuvele izinsolo zokuthi uNksz Karabo Mokoena ubulawe ngenhloso yokuqeda amashwa esoka lakhe.UMantsoe usolwa ngecala lokubulala intombi yakhe ngemuva kokunyamalala ngo-Ephreli 28, okwasusa inkulumo kuzwelonke ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane.Phambilini umphenyi wecala uCaptain Phillip Radebe unxuse ukuthi ‘ubufakazi obuqinile’ bombuso kungabikwa ngabo.Ngokusho kukaRadebe, uMantsoe wabonakala engena kubo eSandton Skye Apartments noNksz Mokoena, okuyilapho agcina ukubonakala khona ephila.URadebe uveze ukuthi ngemuva kokubopha uMantsoe wavuma ukuthi umbulele wamyisa ehlathini lapho afika wamgaxa ithayi wamshisa.Uthe ngesikhathi beqala ukuthandana uMantsoe wamnxusa ukuthi bahlanganise amagazi abo ukuze babe munye nokuqinisekisa ukuthi ibhizinisi lakhe lokuhweba liba yimpumelelo.“Ibhizinisi likamsolwa lase lingasahambi kahle ngemuva kokuhlukana kwabo, okwenza ukuthi ambulale,” kusho uRadebe.Kepha encwadini efungelwe kaMantsoe uyiphikile eyokuthi wambulala ngenhloso yokukhipha ibhadi kodwa wathi wamthola eseshonile endlini yakhe, okwenza ukuthi ashise isidumbu sakhe ngoba esaba ukuthi kuzosolwa yena.Isicelo sebheyili kaMantoe siyaqhubeka ngoJuni 30.
title: Izinsolo ezintsha ngokubulawa kukaKarabo

text:
CHARLES KHUZWAYOI NKOSI yomculo weDurban Kwaito Music (DKM) uL’vovo Derrango usezimisele ngokudla umhlanganiso kumaSouth African Film & Television Awards (Saftas) njengoba esengene emkhakheni wokulingisa.Lo mculi wodumo lwenoni elithi 
Amabhoza nelithi
Simthela Ngamanzi uzobonakala elingisa emdlalweni wethelevishini i
Kota Life Crisis ngoFebhuwari walo nyaka.Echaza uL’vovo uthe bashuthe isigcawu alingisa kuso phakathi noNovemba.“Ukulingisa ngesinye seziphiwo zami kodwa ebezicashile. Abantu ngizocela baqale babuke isiqephu salo mdlalo ukuze babone ukuthi nginalo yini ikhono noma qha. Ngiyethemba bakhona abadidiyeli bemidlalo nabamafilimu abazothi uma bechazeka yikhono lami, bangiqashe ukuba ngizolingisa emisebenzini yabo,” kusho lo mculi omatasatasa ne-albhamu yakhe entsha ethi 
The Boss.Kulo mdlalo owasungulwa ngusomahlaya uTumi Morake nomyeni wakhe uMpho Osei-Tutu, uL’vovo uzobe enabanye osaziwayo ababizwe ngumuntu thizeni ofuna kuthiwe wazana nosaziwayo.Lo mculi akukhona okokuqala enza into ehlukile njengoba eminyakeni eyedlule eke wangenela umqhudelwano womdanso iStrictly Come Dancing, lapho ayedansa khona noMary Martins kodwa kwangabahambela kahle.Okumenze wangena kulo mncintiswano yikhono lakhe lokudansa nokusungula imidanso eshiya izihlwele zisahalela impinda okubalwa kuyo ukungqangqazelisa umzimba.Le ngwazi isiqophe inqwaba yama-albhamu okubalwa kuwo ethi 
The Teddybear, 
The Heavyweight,
Irresistable,
The Fabulous nethi 
The Headmaster.Uqokwe emiqhudelwaneni eminingi okukhona neyeChannel O Africa Music Video Awards ngo-2007 nango-2008.Ngaphandle kokucula nokulingisa uL’vovo ubuye abe yinxusa lomkhankaso i-16 Days of Activism Against Women and Children Abuse.Usenenkampani yakhe eqopha umculo futhi ibuye ihlele imicimbi iDerrango Records.
title: Ungena emkhakheni wokulingisa uL’vovo

text: BELIWUKHUTHALELE  umsebenzi walo wokuvalela izigelekeqe, iphoyisa elidutshulwe ngabasolwa abangaziwa  lidlala i-snooker endaweni yokucima ukoma ekwa-C eMlaza, ngoLwesibili ntambama.U-Sergeant Siyabonga Radebe (34) obeyiphoyisa ngaphansi kophiko lwe- K9 eMlaza, kuthiwa ubejwayele ukuzichithela isizungu ngokudlala i-snooker kule ndawo  eseduze kwakubo. Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lifika endaweni okwenzeke kuyo isigameko izolo ekuseni, abantu bebesami izixongololo kubonakala ukuthi basashaqekile.Bamchaze njengephoyisa ebeliyinkukhu nempaka nezigebengu okubalwa kuzo  nezaziwayo endaweni.Omunye obekhona kudutshulwa uRadebe okhulume neSolezwe wacela ukungadalulwa,  uthe wehliswe yimoto yamaphoyisa sekuqala ukuhwalala wahamba waya kubo wabuya emva kwesikhashana esekhumule umfaniswano wamaphoyisa.“Igazi belimshiya.  Ngesikhathi ebuya kubo ume ngemva kwami ngaphandle kwalapho kudlalwa khona.  Ujwayele ukufika adlale, kodwa izolo (ngoLwesibili) baze bambiza ngaphakathi bathi akazodlala sikuyigemu yakhe.“Ayiphelanga imizuzu eyishumi engenile, kwangena amadoda amabili amdubula phambi kwethu, okuthe uma ewa abaleka,” kusho umthombo.Uthe ngesikhathi bebaleka amanye amalungu omphakathi alifukulile iphoyisa alifaka emotweni yomunye, aliphuthumisa esibhedlela okuyilapho lifike lashonela khona.Umndeni wakwaRadebe unqabile ukukhuluma nezintatheli, ngesikhathi zifika kulo muzi izolo. Bekunedlanzana labebelungisa egcekeni obekubonakala ukuthi bagcwele umunyu,  abezindaba bayalelwe ukuthi abahambe kwazise umndeni awukabikho esimeni sokukhuluma.Okhulumela  amaphoyisa kuzwelonke uColonel Brenda Muridili unxuse abanolwazi  olungalekelela amaphoyisa ukuthola umkhondo ukuthi bashayele inombolo yokubika ngobugebengu ethi: 086 00 10111 noma  babike kwi- app yawo i-MySAPS.  Uthe amaphoyisa ezingeni lesifundazwe  enza konke okusemandleni ukuqoqa izinsiza ezizolekelela ekwenzeni uphenyo ngokushesha.Ukubulawa kukaRadebe kulandela eduze komphathi-siteshi eNdwedwe obebambile uColonel Jabulani Ndawonde odutshulwe ngenyanga edlule ehamba ngemoto yamaphoyisa ebheke  ekhaya. NgoMsombuluko, amaphoyisa atholane phezulu nabane abasolwa ngokubulala uNdawonde  kwafa  abathathu nezinja zamaphoyisa ezimbili.Ngenyanga edlule ngaphambi kokubulawa kukaNdawonde, uNgqongqoshe wamaphoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele ekhipha izibalo zobugebengu zekota yonyaka,  wathi ezinyangeni ezintathu kuphela unyaka uqalile, sekubulawe amaphoyisa angu- 24 kuzwelonke.
title: Belingabhekani nezigebengu iphoyisa elibulewe

text: UKHALA ngokulawulwa wumsamo umndeni wasoPhokweni, eNumber 7 eCato Ridge, ozokwenzela indodana yawo umcimbi womhlonyane ngempelasonto.Kuthiwa kuzobe kusindwe ngobethole emndenini kaLangelihle Ngubane (21), ozokwenzela umhlonyane ozoqala ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. ULangelihle oyindodana yokugcina kulo mndeni, kuthiwa uzogeza emfuleni, afakwe inyongo ekhanda aphinde asine. Isolezwe linaso isimemo salo mcimbi okubhalwe nokuthi izihambeli zawo zigqoka umbala wosuku omhlophe nophuzi.UMnuz Bhekinkosi Ngubane, onguyise kaLangelihle, uthe emzini wakhe ulawulwa umsamo. Uthe akabheki isiko nokuthi kwenziwani kweminye imizi kodwa ulandela okushiwo umsamo wakhe. Uveze ukuthi uganwe uKaMagwaza onabadala, abadlulisa kuyena umyalezo womsamo.“Benginezingane ezilishumi zashona ezinye kwasala eziyisikhombisa. Zonke ngiyazenzela umhlonyane, angikhethi ubulili. Angikwenzi lokhu ngoba nginemali eningi noma ngifuna ukusuthisa abantu kodwa ngilawulwa wumsamo,” echaza.Uthe ezinganeni ezisele kunabafana abayisihlanu, abane asebenzelwa umhlonyane. ULangelihle ngowokugcina ezinganeni zakhe ukwenzelwa lo mcimbi njengoba ethe namadodakazi usewenzele, wamulisa neyodwa endala.“Ngizohlaba imbuzi ukubikela abadala ukuthi uLangelihle useyinsizwa. Uzofakwa inyongo bese ekuseni ngeSonto ayogeza emfuleni, abuye asine kudliwe kubuswe,” kusho uNgubane.Uthe akaphoqiwe indlela azogqoka ngayo uLangelihle kodwa uzosiniswa abafana namantombazane.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uLangelihle ubezwakala ukuthi uwubheke ngabomvu lo mcimbi. Uthe akanankinga ukuthi uwumfana ngoba bonke abafowabo benzelwa futhi abazali banezizathu.Uthe uyathemba ukuthi umhlonyane uzokhanyisa nezindlela zakhe nasebhizinisini.Oyisazi samasiko nosomlando uSolwazi Jabulani Maphalala, uthe ngokwesintu awukho umcimbi womhlonyane. Uthe yize lo mcimbi usunesasasa kwabaningi, awukho esikweni.“Ngokwesiko umfana uma esethombile ubamba inkunzi yenkomo ayibulale ngezandla esigodlweni sengonyama. Ubenikwa negama lebutho ngoba eseyinsizwa. Lokhu bekungahlangene nabazali. Emlandweni wesiko awukho umhlonyane ngoba nentombazane ayenzelwa,” kusho uMaphalala.UMnuz Sazi Mhlongo, ongusihlalo weCouncil of Traditional Healers Association, uthe abadala abahlangene nokukhuliswa komfana. Uthe akafuni nokubiza lo mcimbi ngomhlonyane ngoba akawazi.“Thina sazi ukuthi umfana osethombile uyakhuliswa, kubikwe ngembuzi kodwa hhayi umhlonyane,” kusho uMhlongo.
title: Bayalelwe yidlozi emsamo ngomhlonyane wendodana

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAOSENGUMQEQESHI obambile kuMaZulu FC, uDelron Buckely, ululeka abadlali abasakhula eNingizimu Afrika ngokuthi balibambe ngazo zombili ithuba abalitholayo lokuyohlolwa amaqembu aphesheya.UBuckley ongomunye wabadlali baseNingizimu Afrika abazakhele igama ngokugijima kumaligi aphesheya, uthe ukwehla kwesibalo sabadlali baseNingizimu Afrika abathola amaqembu kumaligi aphesheya, kungenxa yokuthi bafike bazithele ngabandayo uma benikwa amathuba.Lo mqeqeshi owayeyibamba ohlangothini lwesokunxele ngezikhathi zakhe uqale ukudlala ibhola ezingeni eliphezulu eGermany njengoba ahamba kuleli eneminyaka engu-17. Wadlalela iVFl Bochum, Arminia Bielefeld neBorussia Dortmund. Udlale nokuFC Basel eSwitzerland. Udlale okokuqala kuleli ngo-2012 esayina kuMaritzburg United.Eqenjini lesizwe ubekhona kwelika-Under 23 elaba ngelokuqala ukudlala kuma-Olympic eSydney, e-Australia, ngo-2000. KuBafana udlale eNdebeni yoMhlaba ngo-1998 eFrance naseKorea/Japan ngo-2002.“Into ekhona ngebhola nasempilweni wukuthi uyayidinga inhlanhla. Ngakho abadlali laba uma bethola ithuba lokuyohlolwa kumele balibambe ngazo zombili. Ithalente liningi eNingizimu Afrika kodwa abadlali uma beya kohlolwa bayabuya kuthiwe abekho ezingeni. Empilweni uthola ithuba kanye okumele ulisebenzise. Uma ungakwenzi lokho uzosala ngemuva.“Abadlali abaningi abebeseqenjini lika-Under 23 ngo-2000 balisebenzisa ngendlela ephusile ithuba labo, ekugcineni iningi labo laba ngabanye babadlali abahle asebeke bakhiqizwa yiNingizimu Afrika,” kusho uBuckely.Leli qembu akhuluma ngalo uBuckley lashaya iBrazil ngo 3-1 kuma-Olympic. Emdlalweni wokuqala lakhala ngaphansi ngo 2-1 kuJapan. Lashaywa iSlovakia ngo 2-1.Iqembu leBrazil elaphuma kuma-quarterfinal lagcina linqobe iNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-2002.“Kuleli qembu kwakukhona okungenani abadlali abayisishiyagalolunye abaneminyaka engu-19/20 abase bedlala phesheya. Ukube iSafa yasigcina ndawonye saze sanyukela kuBafana Bafana, nginesiqiniseko ukuthi nathi sasizofinyelela ezingeni leBrazil,” kusho uBuckely.Kubadlali ayenabo eSydney asebehlonishwa ebholeni lakuleli ngabakuzuzile, kukhona uBenni McCarthy owanqoba isicoco seChampions League neFC Porto ngo-2004. USiyabonga Nomvete oseqeqeshwa nguBuckley kuMaZulu, usegijime kumaligi ahlukene phesheya, Matthew Booth, Nkosinathi Nhleko noQuinton Fortune bonke abadlale kumaligi aphesheya.“Namanje sinalo ithalente elingenza siziqhenye eBrazil. Okubalulekile wukuthi umqeqeshi alihlanganise ngendlela iqembu lakhe,” kusho yena.U-Owen Da Gama uzohola iqembu lika-Under 23 elizomela iNingizimu Afrika kuma-Olympic eBrazil ngo-Agasti. Liqhathwe neBrazil, Denmark ne-Iraq.
title: UBuckley weluleka abadlali ekusebenziseni amathuba

text: UMQEQESHI weRoyal Eagles uRoger Sikhakhane uthi kusesekuseni kakhulu ngomjaho wesicoco seNational First Division (NFD), ngakho abalandeli bakanobhutshuzwayo bangethuki ngokuqala kwezakhe ngebatha.I-Eagles ayikanqobi nowodwa umdlalo selokhu kuqale isizini yeNFD. Ishaywe yiStellenbosch ngo 1-0 emdlalweni wokuvula, yashaywa ngomphumela ofanayo idlala neTS Sporting ngaphambi kokudlala ngokulingana nabakhaya iRichards Bay FC emdlalweni ophele ngo 1-1 ngeledlule.Njengamanje ezikaSikhakhane zikunombolo 14 kwi-log yeNFD ngephuzu elilodwa emidlalweni emithathu. USikhakhane, ongumakadebona kwiNFD, uthe kulesi sigaba akubalulekile ukuthi uqala kanjani kodwa kubaluleke ukuthi ugcina kanjani.“Kusesekuseni kakhulu, phela sikhuluma ngeligi la. Lena yi-marathon ngakho kumele ulungise izinto ngendlela, ngemuva kwalokho bese uyabonake ukuthi uhamba ufika kuphi. Sibasayinisile abadlali, ngakho ngibona sinesikwati esanele futhi esikufanele ukwenza kahle,” kusho uSikhakhane.Ukusho lokhu nje uyaziwa kwiNFD njengoba esinqobile lesi sicoco neChippa United neThanda Royal Zulu FC eminyakeni edlule.Lo mqeqeshi akafunanga ukuphumela obala ngokuthi ngabe uzokwazi yini ukukhuphulela leli qembu kwi-Absa Premiership ngesizini ezayo.“Sizohlanganisa nje, sibone ukuthi iqembu liyakwazi yini ukungena emidlalweni yokuhlunga noma lenza njani, sizobona. Okwamanje engingakusho wukuthi kusesekuseni kakhulu ukuthi sengingakhuluma izinto ezinjalo,” kuqhuba uSikhakhane.Ukudlala ngokulingana neBay ngempelasonto kumjabulisile kakhulu uSikhakhane njengoba kulo mdlalo ethole iphuzu lakhe lokuqala ne-Eagles kule sizini.“Ngiyalijabulela iphuzu esilitholile sidlala neBay ekuhambeni. Sizosebenzela phezu kwalo ngethemba lokuthi lizosivulela ukuthi sithole amanye amaphuzu,” usho kanje.I-Eagles izodlala umdlalo wayo olandelayo kwiNFD neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM), eChatsworth Stadium ngoSepthemba 15. Ziya kulo mdlalo nje, i-TTM isendaweni yesine kwi-log ngamaphuzu ayisikhombisa futhi ayikashaywa okwamanje njengoba inqobe imidlalo emibili, yadlala ngokulingana kowodwa.
title: Wehlisa itwetwe kubalandeli owe-Eagles

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi yingxabano phakathi kowesifazane noyise wengane (1)  edale ukuthi unina wayo ahlale kubhongwana enganeni yaze yashona.Kuvela ukuthi isigameko senzeke phakathi nesonto ngezithuba zasekuseni kungazelele muntu. Umthombo osondelene nodaba uthe owesifazane oneminyaka engu-22 ubudala waseSweetwaters, eMgungundlovu, ubexakwe wukhwantalala ’aludalelwa’ wuyise wengane, wavele wadinwa waklinya ingane. Emuva kwalokho wenze imizamo yokuzibulala kodwa yangaphumelela ngoba utholwe wudadewabo. Udadewabo uzwe umsolwa esho ngengila ekhala, wayombheka wamfica ezisika amalungu omzimba, ephuma igazi, wakhuza wababaza wamnqanda. Uthe esababaza lokho kanti kukhona okukhulu, wabona ingane idindilizile isithule iklinyiwe. Owesifazane akagcinanga lapho kodwa uke waphuza isiwoklo samaphilisi ezama ukuzibulala kodwa wangaphumelela. Uma abomndeni belulandela kahle udaba, kuvele ukuthi unina wosana noyise walo, bahlala ngokuxabana kubangwa izindaba zezithandani. Kusolwa ukuthi uyise wengane uyisoka futhi nesibhaxu uyasivulela kunina wengane. Lolu daba lushiye amalungu omndeni eshaqekile nomakhelwane bethi bayoyixoxela amagwababa echobana. Udaba lungenwe ngamaphoyisa asePlessislaer, athathe umsolwa amjikijela esitokisini amthwesa icala lokubulala futhi uzovela enkantolo maduze. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe bahlale phezu kwakhe umsolwa, bemcaphuna emuva kokuthola umbiko. “Kunowesifazane oneminyaka engu-22 othathwe ngamaphoyisa asePlessislaer emuva kokusolwa ngokuklinya ingane enonyaka owodwa, yafa. Kuthiwa naye umsolwa uzamile ukuzibulala kodwa udadewabo washeshe wangenela. Isigameko senzeke kuleli sonto,  umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele maduze eNkantolo yeMantshi eMgungundlovu,’’ kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Owesifazane uklinye ingane yafa exabane noyise

text: WETHUSE abaningi umfundisi webandla labasindisiwe evuma emsakazweni Ukhozi FM ukuthi unoxhaxha lwezintombi ngaphakathi ebandleni.Unamakhosikazi amabili futhi kulezi zintombi ezikhona, uhlela ukukhetha ezintathu azozishada ngo-Okthoba kulo nyaka.Lo mfundisi odume ngelika King Prophet Sazi Ndwandwe webandla iHealing Hour Emmanuel Global Ministries, ingxoxo yakhe nomsakazi walo msakazo, uNomfundo Mkhize, isisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kanti abantu abawuvali umlomo, ngisho abangabazalwane baleli bandla.Leli bandla linamagatsha amaningi KwaZulu-Natal okubalwa kuwo KwaNongoma, eThekwini, Mtubatuba, oLundi, Ophongolo naseMnambithi.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngoMgqibelo, uNdwandwe uzwakale emangala ngabanenkinga ngendlela aziphatha ngayo. Uthi akuyona imfihlo ukuthi unenqwaba yezintombi ebandleni, nangaphandle kwasebandleni uthi unazo.“Mina uma ngibone intombi ngayithanda, ngiyayitshela bese kuya ngokuthi siphathana kanjani nayo.“Uma sengibona sesithandana ukuthi ayiziphethe kahle, siyahlukana.“Nginazo zona izintombi futhi ngilungiselela ukuthatha ezintathu, zibe ngamakhosikazi ami ungakashayi u-Okthoba kulo nyaka.”Uthe kulezi zintombi zikhona ezisagcwele mpu nezinye ezingasaphelele. “Abangakathintwa, nami angibenzi lutho.“Ngibagcinela umshado kanti asebethintiwe, nami ngiyaqhubeka nokubathinta ngoba sebeyayazi indoda. Uma ngibagcina bazoqhubeka nokuthintwa ngabanye abafana ngasese.”Echaza ukuthi kungani enesithembu futhi ehlobonga nabanye abantu besifazane ekubeni engumfundisi osindisiwe, uNdwandwe uthe yena akafuni ukuphila impilo yamanga njengabanye abefundisi.“Mina ngiyindoda yomZulu. Abanye bakholelwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu okupha umfazi, mina ngineso lokubona umfazi wami.“Izishimane ezithi ziyaboniswa. Yizo lezi ezijola emakhoneni, zilalane bese kukhishwa nezisu. Mina ngiyinsizwa yomZulu esakhuzela uma ibona intombi eyithandayo.”Uthe nasemandulo kunamadoda kaNkulunkulu ayenenqwaba yezancinza.“Mina angiholwa yizwi kodwa ngilandela umgomo wakwaNdwandwe. Mina nganikezwa izwe kwathiwa angibuse kulo.”UNdwandwe uthe iningi labazalwane liyamjabulela ngoba wenza umehluko ezimpilweni zabo.Kodwa ngesikhathi leli phephandaba likhuluma namanye amalungu aleli bandla, asho okwehlukile.“Abanye bethu abaneme neze ngoba sikhonza namadodakazi ethu.Njengoba siyibandla labasindisiwe nje, akuzwakali kahle ukuthi umfundisi wethu unesithembu futhi aphinde abe noxhaxha lwezintombi.”Ukuthola ukuphawula kwamakhosikazi kaNdwandwe kugcine kungaphumelelanga.
title: Uthuse abantu umfundisi onenqwaba yezintombi

text: IPHENDUKE isishebo indlovu eyeqe kwesinye seziqiwi eziseduze kwaseMthekwini, eMdletsheni, eHluhluwe, njengoba umphakathi uvele wayihlahlela wayosa, enye yafakwa emafrijini.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi indlovu le kusolakala ukuthi yeqe esiqiwini esizimele yayohlupha emphakathini.UMnuz Vusi Zungu waseMdletsheni, uthe le ndlovu, ibonakale emphakathini ngabo 2 kuya ku-3 ngoMsombuluko ntambama kwathi emuva kwalokho kwabonakala onogada bezemvelo sebendiza ngebhanoyi.“Onogada bayidubula yafa njengoba ibisisemphakathini. Umphakathi ube usuyihlahlela uzithathela inyama. Ubuzikhethela ukuthi uthathani, umuntu ubehlahlela indawo ayithandayo. Kuyimanje igcwele emafrijini abantu kuhle kwesishebo,” kusho uZungu.Uthe akazi noma iyadliwa yini indlovu ngoba yena akakaze ayidle kodwa-ke abaseMthekwini bayihlahlele bayosa, esele bayifaka emafrijini.UMnuz Musa Mntambo, obhekele ezokuxhumana kwezeMvelo KZN Wildlife, uthe indlovu bayibulele ngoba ibisiqala ukuba yinkinga emphakathini.“Abasebenzi bezemvelo bebehamba ngebhanoyi ngesikhathi bebulala le ndlovu. Iye yasala emphakathini okuyiwona okhethe ukuzisikela inyama wahamba nayo. Inyama yezilwane eziningi zasendle iyadliwa kodwa abantu bayazikhethela ukuthi bangadli uhlobo oluthile lwenyama,” kusho uMntambo.Izilwane eziwuhlupho emphakathini, uMntambo uthe ziyabulawa ngoba kusuke kuvikelwa umphakathi.BEBEYIHLAHLELA kanjena indlovu abantu baseMdletsheni abanye bebeyoyipheka ngenhloso yokuyidla Izithombe: ZITHUNYELWENgonyaka odlule Isolezwe like labhala ngezindlovu ebezibulala ucingo zeqe, zihluphe umphakathi owakhelene nesiqiwi iHluhluwe Imfolozi Park.Le ndlovu ebulewe eMthekwini, kuthiwa iphume esiqiwini esizimele kodwa kuye kwangenelela abezemvelo ngoba abantu baseMthekwini bathinte bona.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi izindlovu zike zahlalisa lubhojozi umphakathi eManguzi okuthiwa zeqa eMozambique bese zizodla emasimini abo.Babenovalo lokuthi lezi zindlovu ezigangile zizofundisa izindlovu zaseNdumo umkhuba omubi wokweqa.
title: Bazitike ngenyama yendlovu ebiwuhlupho

text: USESIZA abanezibazi ezinjengezakhe owesifazane impilo yakhe eyashintsha emuva kokuba equnyelwe nge-acid ngumuntu owayekade ethunywe yisoka lakhe.UNksz Gugu Gumede (24) waseMawoti, eNanda, useyinxusa lenhlangano eyelapha abanezibazi emzimbeni, iLive Scar Foundation. Inhlangano, eyethulwe ngo-Ephreli, uyisungule ngokuhlanganyela noDkt Mark Rouscher owelapha isikhumba eThekwini.Akalukhohlwa usuku lwangoFebhuwari 28, 2017 olwashintsha impilo yakhe. Yize sekuphele iminyaka emibili ehlelwa yibhadi kodwa uthe impilo yakhe ayisophinde ifane.Uthe kusenzima ukukhohlwa yisehlo futhi usesaba kwasani. Wayekade ephuma emsebenzini ngesikhathi ehlangana nezinsizwa ezimbili ngakubo ezambingelela, eyodwa yase imthela ngokuthize emzimbeni. Kwahluluka ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ukuthi yi-acid ababekade bemthele ngayo.“Ngezwa kushisa umzimba wonke ngakhala ngamemeza ngiyogeza empompini. Eyodwa yabaleka enye yabanjwa ngamalungu omphakathi ayishaya eyibuza ukuthi ithunywe ngubani. Yathi yayikade ithunywe yisoka lami. Yaboshwa, kumanje ibhadla ejele,” kusho uNksz Gumede.Uthe kwase kuphele unyaka ayekade esehlukene nesoka lakhe anezingane ezimbili nalo. Lalilokhu limncenga ukuthi babuyelane. Yize indoda eyaboshwa yamusho owayeyithumile, uNksz Gumede uthe aliboshwanga isoka ngenxa yokushoda kobufakazi. Uthe namanje abaxhumani nalo kodwa wanquma ukuqhubeka nempilo azondlele nezingane.Walala izinyanga ezintathu esibhedlela, esegunjini labagula kakhulu. Washa entanyeni, engalweni, esihlathini nasemhlane.“Esibhedlela ngangihleli egumbini lami ngedwa ngendlela engangilimele ngayo. Ngapheshwa kathathu kungalungi. Ngangisaba ngisho ukubuka abantu sengiphuma esibhedlela. Ngangifa yizinhlungu ngingakholwa uma ngizibuka esibukweni.”Uthe kwakumele afe ngosuku ayethelwe ngalo kodwa akazi ukuthi wasinda kanjani. Ngenxa yokuzenyeza ngezibazi zakhe, wakhuluma nomunye umngani wamyalela udokotela wesikhumba eMhlanga.Uthe kwaba nzima ukuzikhokhela kudokotela ngenxa yokuthi kuyabiza ukulungisa isikhumba. UDkt Rouscher wambuza ukuthi kunganjani basebenze naye enhlanganweni yokusiza abanezibazi njengaye, wavuma.Echaza ngenhlangano, uthe isinabantu abawu-15 abelashwayo kumanje. Abasathathi kuphela abanezibazi zokusha kodwa noma yiluphi uhlobo lwesibazi. Ngisho abalimale ezingozini zezimoto. Inhloso wukusiza ukushabalalisa izibazi abantu babuyelwe yisithunzi nokuzethemba. Abaningi basuke bengenayo imali yokuzikhokhela ukulungisa isikhumba.“Kuyabiza kakhulu ukulungisa isikhumba nemithi yakhona iyabiza. Abafuna ukusizakala baxhumana nami bese ngibayisa kuDkt Rouscher. Ngiyazi kunzima kanjani ukuba nezibazi ngoba usaba ngisho ukuhlangana nabantu. Selokhu ngasizwa wudokotela akusefani.”UNksz Gumede, osethula nezinkulumo ezakhayo kwabesifazane, uthe kuyothatha isikhathi ukubuyela esimeni ngoba nokwalulekwa ngokomqondo akumsizanga. Unendodakazi eneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili nendodana eneyisihlanu. Uthe yize izingane zisencane, ziyezwa ngabantu ukuthi washishwa nguyise.
title: Uyokhohlwa efile wokwamehlela indoda imthela nge-acid

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEINSEPHE yeTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM), uCelimpilo Ngema, inikwa ithemba ngamaphutha e-Orlando Pirates ewachaza njengafana nawabo ngaphambi komdlalo wala maqembu weDStv Premiership.ITshamkhuma izokwamukela iPirates eThohoyandou Stadium namuhla ngo-5 ntambama.Le njini yaKwaZulu-Natal, eyibamba kuthule umoya esiswini, itshele Isolezwe ukuthi kayilingabazi ibhola elidlalwa eZimnyama selokhu kuqale isizini.Nokho ithe nalo leli qembu laseSoweto linezinkinga abangakwazi ukungena ngazo.“IPirates inenkinga ethi ayifane neyethu yokuvumela ukungenelwa amagoli angafanele nokungasebenzisi amathuba ngendlela efanele. Ubufakazi balokhu wukudlala kwayo ngokulingana kahlanu bese kithi kube yisithupha. Sobabili sithi asilingane ngamagoli esisawashayile nasingenele. Ishaye ayishumi, kithina aba yisikhombisa. Singenelwe ayishumi yona aba yisishiyagalombili. Sobabili emidlalweni yethu edlule singenelwe amagoli abengenasidingo,” kubeka uNgema Obedlala kuThongathi.Uqhube wathi: “Okuhle wukuthi la maphutha siphezu kwawo ejimini. NgoMsombuluko sikuhlaziye konke ngeBucs, ubuthaka bayo. Uma singalandela imiyalelo yabaqeqeshi ngibona izoba senkingeni. Okuhle ngokudlala namaqembu amakhulu wukuthi wonke umdlali uyakwazi okulindeleke kuye.”ITshakhuma ecijwa uJoel Masutha ilele kweyesi-11kwi-log ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili. Emdlalweni odlule ibambane ngo 2-2 neCape Town City. IPirates esendaweni yesithupha ngamaphuzu awu-14, yabelane ngamaphuzu emdlalweni wayo neSwallows uphela ngo 1-1. Ngemuva kwalo mdlalo umqeqeshi weBucs, uJosef Zinnbauer ukhale kakhulu ngokulahla amathuba amagoli, wathi kumele abagadli bakhe bakhuphule amasokisi phambi kwamapali.UNgema ukuvumile ukuthi kazehli kahle izinkinga ezibikwa eqenjini.Ezinsukwini ezedlule kuphinde kwavela ukuthi kukhona abafuna ukuthenga leli qembu likaMasala Mulaudzi. Kusolwa izinkinga zenkece okuthiwa ziholela ekutheni abanye abadlali bangaholelwa.“Noma kungabikwa izinkinga kodwa uma ungena enkundleni ukhohlwa konke ulwele ukunqoba. Kuba nale nto yokubeka iqembu phambili nokungavumi ukushaywa ngabanye abafana,” kusho uNgema.
title: OweTshakhuma ubona amaphutha kwiPirates

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUQOPHE umlando uMbuleli "Mkhaya" Mathanga waseMpangeni, enqobela iKwaZulu-Natal Athletics (KZNA) okokuqala indondo yegolide ku-10 000m, koweSizwe Medical Fund ASA Senior Track and Field +Combined Events & 20km Championships ePitoli.UMathanga oqeqeshwa wuMdu Khumalo kwiPhantane AC, ushaye intambo ngesikhathi esiwu-29:23.74. Owesibili kube wuzakwabo kwiPhantane AC, u-Adam Lipchitz ngesiwu-29:30.40.Kungokokuqala emlandweni walo mqhudelwano  ukuthi iKZNA ihlabane ngendodo yegolide neyesiliva kuleli banga. UNdumiso Sokhela wayo iKZNA akalibonanga elidlalayo njengoba egcine kunombolo-12 ngo-30:43.20.UMathanga usanda kwephula irekhodi laKwaZulu-Natal kuleli banga kumaKZN Track & Field Championship ngesikhathi esiwu-28:03.45. Uphinde abe umpetha kwelika-500m kulesi sifundazwe. Umqeqeshi wakhe uKhumalo uthe ukunqoba komsubathi wakhe ePitoli, kakuhlangani nezinhlelo zabo zokuya kuma-Olympic Games aseTokyo, eJapan ngoJulayi."Ngiyabezwa abantu bethi uMathanga usengenile kuma-Olympic. Yiphutha lelo, sisazomfunela imijaho azohlunga ngayo. Kasenzeki isikhathi esihle endaweni ephezule njengePitoli. Indawo enhle ngegudle ulwandle,“ kubeka uKhumalo obongele kakhulu noLipchitz.Isikhathi esibekelwe ukungena kuma-Olympic ku-10 000m u-27.28.00. Kwabanye abagijimi beKZNA, uZakithi Nene wenze njengoba bekulindelekile ku-heat 1 we-400m elala endawo yokuqala ngo-46.06.Omunye owenze kahle ku-heat 1 kwabesifazane, yintokazi uKirsten Ahrens eshaye intambo  ngo-54:62. Ku-heat 3 uzakwabo u-Amy Naude, uphume isithathu ngo-54.11.Imijaho yamanqamu ka-400m ikusasa kusukela ngo-4.30 ntambama.  Kwabesilisa ku-heat 1 ku-100m, uMark Gains ugcine ephume isine ngo-10.58. Ku-1500m uMthokozisi Mazibuko uhluleke wancama elala kweyesithupha ku-heat 1 ngo-4:01.11.Omunye umjaho ububhekiwe osukwini lwayizolo u-5000m wabesifazane ogcine unqotshwe uCaster Semenya ngo-15:52.28.  Uhlule uzakwabo oyindlovukazi kuleli banga kuleli, uGlenrose Xaba olale isibili eqopha u-15:55.25. Intokazi yaseKZN uThobile Mkhize, ilale kweyokugcina ngesiwu-17:50.28. Ngemuva kokunqoba uSemenya uveze ukuthi akakubekile ekhanda ukufakwa esikwatini esiya kuma-Olympic Games, okumjabulisayo ukuqhubeka nokwenza kahle ku-5000M. USemenya ngeke akwazi ukuyovikela isicoco sakhe sika-800m ngenxa yomthetho weWorld Athletics omvimbela ukuthi agijime kuleli banga. "Kufana nokugembula ukuthi ngingazitshela ukuthi ngizoya eTokyo. Ngisadinga ukwenza izikhathi ezinhle ku-10 000m. Kangilona lolu hlobo oluthatha indlela enqamulelayo. Okubalulekile kumina ukuba ngcono nokuphila kahle emzembeni. Ngibonga ukuba nomuntu ofana noGlenrose eduze kwami. Kakupheli ngami, ngisaya kude kulo mdlalo,“ kusho uSemenya.
title: Umgijimi waseKZN uqophe umlando ethatha igolide

text: USALE eziduduza ngomlando umqeqeshi weSuperSport United, u-Eric Tinkler, ezakhe zishweba isicoco seCaf Confederations Cup esithathwe yiTP Mazembe yaseDemocrati Republic of Congo ebaguqise ngo 2-1 sekuhlanganiswe imilenze emibili yamanqamu.Umlenze wesibili uphele ngo 0-0 eLucas Moripe Stadium, eTshwane, izolo ebusuku. AmaTsatsantsa angene emdlalweni wayizolo emelwe wumgomo wokuthola igoli kumnyama kubomvu kwazise emlenzeni wokuqala eLubumbashi ngeledlule abuye embathiswe u 2-1.UTinkler uqophe umlando omkhulu ngokufinyelela neSuperSport kowamanqamu eCaf kukodwa. Kusenguye kuphela ezinkakheni zeBafana Bafana ezinqobe i-Africa Cup of Nations ngo-1996 ukufinyelela kulesi sigaba sokuqeqesha.Nguye kuphela umqeqeshi waseMzansi ukufinyelela kweyamanqamu omqhudelwano weCaf kathathu uma kubalwa nokwango-2013 eyiphini likaDe Sa nokwango-2015 ephethe amatomu kwiPirates.Yize umthwalo wokushaya amagoli ububhekene namaTsatsantsa kodwa yiMazembe ekhombise ubungozi izolo nebhekane namathuba amaningana okubhakuzisa inethi.ISuperSport ibe yiqembu lesine laseMzansi ukudlala kweyamanqamu omqhudelwano weCaf.Ilandela iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates ngokudlala kweyamanqamu eCaf Confederations Cup. IPirates idlale ngo-2015 icijwa nguTinkler kanti iChiefs ibicijwa nguMuhsin Ertugral inqoba lesi sicoco sisabizwa ngeCup Winner’s Cup ngo-2001.IPirates idlale nakowamanqamu eCaf Champions League ngo-2013 uTinkler eyiphini likaRoger de Sa kanti ngo-1995 iwunqobile lo mqhudelwano iba yiqembu lokuqala laseMzansi ukudla ubhedu kwiCaf.* Khonamanjalo, amaBhokobhoko azigwazele ibhece ePadova, e-Italy, eyivathela ngo 35-6 emdlalweni wawo wesithathu weCastle Lager Outgoing Tour.Lo mjikelezo amaBhokobhoko azowuvala ngeWales eCardiff ngoMgqibelo.
title: UTinkler usale nomlando omuhle ehlulwa yisicoco seCaf

text: LUZOPHINDELA eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu kusasa udaba lombango ngencwadi yefa leSilo esisasanda kubuza, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.Leli cala lafakwa enkantolo ngaphambi kokuba kuguqe iNdlovukazi Shiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu, obeyibambabukhosi.Kwakufanele lilalelwe ngosuku eyatshalwa ngalo iNdlovukazi, kepha lahlehliswa ngenxa yokuthi kwakunenkonzo yesikhumbuzo ngalelo langa.Leli cala lihlukene kabili, elokuqala lafakwa nguNdlunkulu waKwaKhethomthandayo, uSibongile Dlamini Zulu, onguNdlunkulu wokuqala kaMdlokombane. Kuleli cala uNdlunkulu ufuna ukuba athole ingxenye yamafa kaBhejane njengoba ethi umshado wabo uhlanganisa amafa.Elesibili lafakwa ngabaNtwana baKwaKhethomthandayo, uNtandoyenkosi noNtombizosuthu. Abantwana bafuna kuchithwe ukuqokwa kweNdlovukazi njengebamba bukhosi ngoba basola ukuthi kukokoteliwe ukusayina kukaMdlokombane encwadini yefa eyayisho lokhu. Incwadi yefa eyashiywa yiNdlovukazi, yona yaqokela esihlalweni sobukhosi iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini.Okhulumela inhlangano yezokushushisa KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Kara, unqabile ukuphawula ngalolu daba.“Thina siphawula kuphela emacaleni athinta izenzo zobugebengu,” kusho uNkk Kara.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kokhulumela abafake icala, uNksz Lynette Ntuli, ayizange iphumelele.Abamele indlunkulu bakuqinisekisile ukuthi icala lizolalelwa kusasa. UMmeli uMusa Ntsibande uthe akalindele ukuthi kube khona okutheni okuzoxoxwa.“Ngicabanga ukuthi okubalulekile ukuyovumelana ngosuku okuzoqalwa ngalo ukuqulwa kwecala,” kusho uNtsibande.Khonamanjalo, ama-minute omhlangano wokugcina wasendlunkulu akhombisa ukuthi zonke izindlu zasendlunkulu zeseka iSilo esisha.Kula ma-minute abonwe Isolezwe, bonke abebehambele umhlangano ababemele izindlu, KwaDlamahlahla, KwaMinya, eMatheni, KwaBhekusuthu, KwaNgenetsheni, KwaNobamba, KwaMandlakazi, eZulwini, eziBindini naKwaGanganana, bonke basho ngazwi linye ukuthi bazoseseka iSilo.
title: Libuyela enkantolo icala lefa leSilo

text: AZOLINDA isimemezelo sikaNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme,uDkt Blade Nzimande amakolishi aKwaZulu-Natal mayelana nokuvula.Izolo Isolezwe libike ukuthi amanyuvesi ngeke azivumele izitshudeni ukuthi zize ezikhungweni kule nyanga kodwa zizobhalisa ngohlelo lwa-online ngesikhathi esizomenyezelwa.INyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, eyaseZululand neMangosuthu University of Technology ziyalele izitshudeni ukuthi ziqhubeke nokuhlala emakhaya kuze kube ziyaziswa ukuthi zize ezikhungweni ezifunda kuzo.Izolo iDurban University of Technology (DUT) ithe iyaqhubeka nezinhlelo zokufundisa za-online kodwa kuzoba nomhlangano we-Executive Committee neSenate kusasa ukuxoxa ngodaba lokuvulwa kwalesi sikhungo.UNksz Simangele Zuma obhekele abezindaba eDUT, uthe ukubhalisa kwezitshudeni ezintsha kuhlelwe ukuthi kwenzeke ngoMashi 1 kuya kuMashi 14.Izitshudeni ebezivele zifunda eDUT  zizobhalisa ngoFebhuwari 22 kuya kuMashi 12.ECoastal KZN TVET College bathe bazolinda uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme uDkt Blade Nzimande ukuthi enze isimemezelo sokuthi kuzoqhubeka kanjani ukufunda nokufundisa ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme kulo nyaka.Okwamanje bathe bebengakavuli.Elangeni College nakhona bathe bazophawula kangcono uma sekukhulume uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme ngoba okwamanje bebengakavuli. Izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme zithe izitshudeni azivumelekile ukuza ezikhungweni ngenxa yokuthi zisezindaweni ezinesibalo esiphezulu sabahaqwe yiCovid-19.
title: Bazolinda uNzimande ngokuvulwa kwamakolishi

text: MHLELI: Ngesikhathi sisayibukela kude iCovid-19, uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, wayezishaya isifuba ethi sikulungele ukubhekana nokuqubuka kobhubhane. Waphinda wagcizelela lokhu ngesikhathi kuba nomuntu wokuqala wakuleli okutholakala ukuthi usehaqekile.Angiboni ukuthi uDkt Mkhize nohulumeni bebekhuluma iqiniso. Uhulumeni wethu usihole wasifaka ehlathini. Abantu bangcwabe izihlobo zabo bengazibonanga. Kubikwe kaningi ngokuphambana kwezidumbu ngenxa yezinqumo ezingafanele ezathathwa. Abanye abantu bafihlwe besongwe ngocwazi kungafanele. Kuthe sekuxoveke izinto, wajika uhulumeni wathi kasikho isidingo sokusongwa kwabantu ngocwazi nokuthi bangcwatshwe bengabonwanga.Konke lokhu kukhomba ukuthi belungekho ulwazi olubeka uhulumeni wethu esimeni sokuthatha izinqumo ezifanele ngegciwane.Esikhundleni sokuthi kusetshenzelwe abantu ngokweqiniso, kujike kwavela inkohlakalo ezinhlelweni zikahulumeni. Namanje, kusasaphazwa imali eshisiwe kuphenywa ngaleyo nkohlakalo. Yize abanye bemisiwe noma bephenywa kepha akukho okubambekayo okukhombisa ukuthi izobuya imali entshontshiwe.Eyomgomo weCovid-19 imbule izinqe uhulumeni ngokungahleleki. Sigijime sathenga ingulube isesakeni eNdiya. Sekukhokhwe imali eshisiwe kwajike kwavela ukuthi umgomo othengiwe ngeke usisize ngalutho. Kanjani manje ngoba sihlale siziqhayisa ngokuthi sinochwepheshe bezesayensi abaseqophelweni eliphezulu? Sivuma kanjani ukuthengiswa into esingayazi? Manje siyadideka ukuthi ingabe ososayensi bethu noma uhulumeni ofaka inqola esihluthu?Umgomo esishintshele kuwona weJ&J sekuvela ukuthi udala izinkinga zamahlule egazi kubantu, manje sewumisiwe. Bekungaqalwa ngani ngocwaningo ngaphambi kokuthi kuthengwe umgomo? Kwenzeka lokhu nje, luvele uhlelo lomgomo luhamba ngonyawo lonwabu. Azikho nje izimpawu zokuthi simi ngomumo njengoba besitshelwa.Osopolitiki bethu ake bayeke ukusitshela iqiniso elingaphelele ngoba befuna ukuba bahle emehlweni ethu.Lisekhona ithuba lokuthi bashintshe ngoba uma kungenjalo kuyashabalala ngenhlangano ebusayo okhethweni oluzayo. Lokhu kuzokwenzeka uma iqhubeka nokusikhohlisa ngenkohlakalo.Madoda WandaEMBUMBULU
title: Ukhombisa ukungahleleki uhulumeni ekunqandeni ubhubhane

text: ABADLALI beMamelodi Sundowns abafuni liwele phansi izwi lomqeqeshi uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane osekuneminyaka ebalisa ngokuhluleka ukuwina indebe yeMTN8.UMosimane uyena kuphela umqeqeshi waseNingizimu Afrika osawine indebe yeCAF Champions League ayiphakamise neSundowns ngo-2016.ENingizimu Afrika usewine cisho zonke izindebe kusukela efike eChloorkop ngaphandle kweMTN8. Uwine isicoco seligi amahlandla amane,Telkom Knockout neNedbank Cup naBafana BaStyle abajoyine ngo-2013.UMosimane ugcine ukuwina iMTN8 isabizwa ngeSAA Super 8 esaqeqesha iSuperSport United ngo-2004 behlula iKaizer Chiefs kowamanqamu. Ubehlala ebeka izaba zokuthi lo mqhudelwano uqondaba ngesikhathi bematasa neChampions League ebisuka isibheke kuvuthondaba.Kulokhu iChampions League iqale kanye nesizini ye-Absa Premiership okuyinto enike abadlali beSundowns isikhathi sokuphumula. UMosimane uyalele abadlali bakhe ukuthi bawine iMTN8 ukuze aziphelelise zonke izindebe eMzansi.Injini yeSundowns, uTiyani Mabunda, ithe aliweli phansi izwi likaMosimane.“Uma umholi esekhulumile awukwazi ukumphikisa. Ungumholi wethu, uma ethi kufanele siyiwine, kufanele siyiwine. Washo okufanayo ngeChampions League sayiwina. Usho okufanayo ngeligi sakwenza lokho. Uma umqondo wakhe uhlezi kule ndebe, nenhliziyo yakhe izokweseka lokho. Siyazi ukuthi kukhona okukhethekile azoqhamuka nakho futhi silindele ukukwenza enkundleni,” kusho uMabunda.ISundowns izobhekana neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni ozoba seLucas Moripe Stadium, e-Atteridgeville, ngoMgqibelo ngo-8 ebusuku.“Le ndebe isisiphunyuke isikhathi eside. Empeleni iyona kuphela indebe esingenayo ekhabetheni lethu. Kodwa uma umqeqeshi ethi lona wunyaka okufanele kube khona esikwenzayo ngalokho, kusho ukuthi kukhona asekubonile futhi usenalo iqhinga. Sibheke ukwenza lokhu azositshela khona ukuze akushoyo kuzokwenzeka. Sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyaqhubeka nokuba omunye wabaqeqeshi abaphambili e-Afrika nasemhlabeni jikelele,” kusho uMabunda.NgoMgqibelo: Cape Town City FC v Polokwane City (Newlands Stadium, 3pm); Orlando Pirates v Highlands Park (Orlando Stadium, 6pm); Mamelodi Sundowns v Bloemfontein Celtic (Lucas Moripe Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Bidvest Wits v SuperSport United (Bidvest Stadium, 3pm)
title: Bathi izwi likaPitso ngeke liwele phansi

text: IZOSHINTSHA impilo yabafundi basikole i-Emadungeni Secondary, eHighflats, abahlomule ngobuchwepheshe bokufunda nge-E Learning Portal 365 obuthulwe uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, izolo.Lo mcimbi obuhanjelwe uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natali uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, inkosi yaseMadungeni ephinde ibe ngusihlalo wamakhosi omdabu uMnuz Phathisizwe Chiliza nobunye ubuholi obuphezulu kuhulumeni, ubuyisiqalo somkhankaso wokuthuthukisa ezemfundo eKZN.Lesi sikole esingaphansi kwesifunda iHarry Gwala sihlomule ngama-laptop kanye nethelevishini ekwazi ukuxhumanisa abafundi bezikole ezahlukene ukuze bafunde ndawonye befundiswa othisha abehlukene.UMshengu uthe lesi sinyathelo sihlose ukuthuthukisa indlela yokufunda nokufundisa ezikoleni zasemakhaya ukuze zibe sezingeni lezikole zasemadolobheni.“Njengamanje singena esigabeni esibizwa ngeFourth Industrial Revolution, lokhu kusho ukuthi uma ungafundile ngeke uze usebenze ngoba imisebenzi ebeyenziwa abantu abangafundile seyenziwa ngemishini,” kusho uMshengu.UMshengu ugqugquzele ukuthi abafundi bakulesi sikole bahloniphe impahla abanikezwe yona ukuze nabezayo bakwazi ukuyisebenzisa.“Siyawunxusa kakhulu umphakathi waseMadungeni ukuba uqinisekise ukuthi iyavikelwa le ngqalasizinda ngoba ingeyomphakathi akusiyo ekahulumeni. Sifuna ukuthi abafundi besizwe esimpisholo babe seqophelweni lomhlaba ngakho impahla kufanele ivikelwe,” kusho yena.Inkosi uChiliza idlulise ukubonga eMnyangweni wezeMfundo ngobuchwepheshe obulethwe eMadungeni.“Sithanda ukubonga kakhulu kumnyango ukuthi ulethele abantwana bethu into efana nale. Siyafisa ukuthi imisebenzi efana nale iqhubeke,” kusho uChiliza.UChiliza uphinde wagqugquzela abafundi ukuba bahloniphe othisha njengoba behlonipha nabazali.UMnuz Xolani Mbhele onguthishanhloko kulesi sikole uzwakalise ukujabula kakhulu ngalesi senzo soMnyango wezeMfundo.“Libaluleke kakhulu leli galelo ngoba ukufunda nokufundisa sekuzoba lula kakhulu. Bekuba nzima kakhulu kubafundi uma befuna imininingwane edinga i-internet noma bedinga ukusebenzisa amakhompyutha ngoba bekudingeka baye eXobho ukuze bakwazi ukuthola lokhu. Manje sekuzoba lula kakhulu ngoba amakhompyutha sebenawo khona la emagcekeni esikole,” kusho uMbhele.“Sijabula kakhulu nokuthi abantwana bazofunda ukusebenzisa amakhompyutha besebancane. Lokhu kuzobasiza kakhulu ngoba izinto eziningi sezenziwa ngamakhompyutha,” kuphetha uMbhele.
title: Abafundi basemakhaya bahlomule ngama-laptop

text: UMGADLI weBafana Bafana, uDino Ndlovu, ukholwa wukuthi kukhulu okungazuzwa yiNingizimu Afrika kubadlali abasebancane uma abalandeli benganciphisa ukugxeka kodwa babakhuthaze.UNdlovu, oyibamba kwiHangzhou Greentown yaseChina, ubuyele eqenjini lesizwe emuva kwesikhathi eqiwa yijezi ngaphansi kwabaqeqeshi abahlukene. Ushaye igoli ngesikhathi iBafana ibhudluza iSeychelles ngo 6-0 emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ngesonto eledlule.La maqembu adlale ngokuliingana ngo 0-0 kkowesibili ekuqaleni kwesonto.UDino uthe abadlali abasebancane abaficile eqenjini lesizwe bangaba yikusasa lezwe wathi badinga ukwesekwa ngabantu baseMzansi.“Ngikujabulele ukuba ndawonye nabadlali abasebancane. Ngicabanga ukuthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kufanele bawuncome umsebenzi wabo, babanikeze ithuba babeseke. Kunabantu abebekade behhewula uLebo (Maboe) ngoba ehlulwa amagoli. Ngesikhathi sidlala neSeychelles ekhaya wonke umuntu kade ehhewula uPercy (Tau). Bangabadlali abahle, badinga ukwesekwa namava kuleli zinga,” kusho uNdlovu.“Ngicabanga ukuthi siyashesha ukubheka okubi kubadlali bethu.Laba bafana badinga ukugqugquzelwa, bazosimela kahle ngomuso. Futhi angingabazi ukuthi ngokuba khona kwami, ngibanike isibindi nokukholwa ukuthi noma uneminyaa engu-20, 21 noma engu-19 izinto zingenzeka. Ungabahola abadlali abafana no-Itumeleng Khune. ULebohang Mothiba ukeenzile lokho. Kufanele banconywe benoPercy Tau baqinile ngokomqondo.”Ngokuhluleka ukuwina eSeychelles iBafana izifake ingcindezi yokuthi sekufanele nakanjani ithole amaphuzu amathathu emidlalwenii emibili esele.Bafana izobhekana neNigeria ngoNovemba 17 eFNB Stadium.Izovala ngeLibya ngoMashi 23 ngonyanka ozayo.“Sizenzele phansi, hhayi thina kuphela, kodwa isizwe sonke. Kodwa siyayihlonipha iSeychelles ngoba ayizange ililahle ithemba, ayizange iyeke ukukholwa ukuthi ingasithwalisa ubunzima.Bebekade benokuzethemba ngesikhathi sifika khona. Kukhona okubalwa obekuphikisana nathi njengenkundla ebikade iqinile. Ibhola belingagqomi kahle ngendlela obekwenzeka ngayo ngesikhathi sidlala nabo lapha ekhaya,” kusho uNdlovu.“Siphoxekile ngokwenzekile kodwa akukapheli ngathi.Sisele ngephuzu kwiNigeria. Sisenalo ithemba. Njengoba umqeqeshi eshilo, asikwazi ukuthatha okubi kule midlalo yomibili. Sikwenze konke. Kodwa sibe nebhadi lokungalishayi igoli. Akufanel sizibulale, okwenzeke eSeychelles sekudlulile, akufanele sigxile kukhona. Kodwa ngithembisa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika nabathanda ibhola ukuthi sizongena kwi-Afcon ka-2019 eCameroon.”
title: OweBafana ukhuthaza abalandeli beseke abadlali

text: Kubikwa ukuthi uHHP, ogama lakhe lokuzalwa nguJabulani Tsambo, ushiye konke obekungokwakhe kwindonda yakhe uLeano.Ngokwephephandaba langeSonto eSunday World, umuzi walo mrepha obiza izigidi zamarandi, imali abeyenza ngama-image rights, kanye nomculo wakhe konke ukushiye kwindodana yakhe uLeano.Okhulumela umndeni wakwaTsambo, uMnuz Nkululeko Ncana uziqinisikisile lezi zindaba, wathi konke kuzoya kuLeano ngaphandle uma inkankolo ikhipha isinqumo esikuphikisayo lokhu.“Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi uHHP ushiye u-100% wezinto zakhe kwindodana yakhe uLeano. Akusithusi lokhu siwumndeni ngoba ushone kuyisifiso sakhe lesi. Okwamanje akekho osakuphikisile lokhu futhi asikulindele lokho, ngoba ngokubona wethu akukho okungaseka ofisa ukuphikisa le ncwadi,” usho kanje ecashunwa yiTshisaLive.Noma umndeni wakwaTsambo usuveze lokhu, lubukeka lusakude ukuphela udaba lwawo noLerato, olwaqala ngesikhathi lo mndeni uchitha ukuthi ungunkosikazi kaHHP ngokomthetho.Lo mndeni wakhipha isitatimende ucacisa ukuthi uyakuqabuka ukuthi uLerato ubesenkosikazi kaHHP. ULerato wafaka lolu daba enkantolo njengoba ayefuna ukuzingcwabela yena uHHP, ngemuva kokutshelwa umndeni ukuthi akadingeki. Inkantolo yamkhipha phambili uLerato.UNcana uthe bazosiphikisa enkantolo isinqumo sejaji esiveza uLerato njengonkosikazi kaHHP osemthethweni kulandela isitatimende esasishicilelwe umndeni esathi wayeyingoduso kuphela. Umndeni kaHHP wafaka lolu daba eNkantolo Yokudlulisela amacala uphikisa isinqumo senkantolo eNkulu eGoli. Kulindelwe ukuthi lenkantolo inqume ukuthi wawusemthethweni yini umshado wesintu kaHHP noLerato.Ngemuva kwesinqumo senkantolo eNkulu eGoli kwabikwa ukuthi uLerato wangena ngo dli emzini kaHHP, washintsha izingidi zomuzi. Lesi senzo kuthiwa sakhalisa kakhulu umndeni wakwaTsambo uveza ukuthi ngisho uLeano akasakwazi ukungena kuwo.  Muva nje umngani kaHHP owayebambisene naye ebhizinisini iLekoko Entertainment, uSeabelo Modibe waseBotswana, ushaya phansi ngonyawo ngokuthi  indondo yeLifetime Achievement obekuhlonishwa ngayo lo mrepha kumaSama yamukelwe uLerato.Ugxeke abahleli bamaSama ngokugijimela ukumema uLerato kulo mcimbi ngaphambi kokubathinta benomndeni kaHHP.Indondo igcine ilandwe yindondana kaHHP, uLeano.
title: Akabonwa nangokhalo emafeni kaHHP uLerato

text: IYAVUTHWA indlela eya koganela esithenjini kumsakazi woKhozi FM oke walingisa nasemdlalweni wethelevishini Uzalo, uZimiphi ‘Zimdollar’ Biyela.Lesi silomo sisothandweni oluvutha amalangabi nosomabhizinisi waseThekwini uMnuz Mzwandile ‘MG’ Zondi. Kuvela ukuthi lo msakazi useze wethulwa nasemndenini kaZondi, nonkosikazi kaZondi kuthiwa usebamukele lobu budlelwane. Muva nje, uZimdollar kuthiwa ubehlezi eceleni kukankosikazi kaZondi kushoniwe e-Mt Elias, KwaMaphumulo, ngaseMtulwa.Ngokusho komthombo osondelene nalezi zithandani, uZimdollar, osakaza uhlelo lwesicathamiya nolukamaskandi, lezi zithandani azihlukani, osekusele wukuthi uZondi ayozishaya zonke kaBiyela.“Bambalwa abantu abangazi ngalolu thando ngoba seluneminyaka luqhubeka. Nemindeni yabo iyazi ngalolu thando lwabo. UZondi akapheli kubo kaZimdollar uma kunemicimbi kanjalo noZimdollar akapheli emzini kaZondi,” kusho lo mthombo ongashayi eceleni futhi osondelene kakhulu noZimdollar.Udalule ukuthi okwenza lezi zithandani zifihle, wukuthi azikalobolani futhi ukujola kwazo kuphambene nenqubo yebandla ezikhonza kulo lakwaShembe.Yize kunjalo kodwa umthombo uthi kuke kwashuba phakathi kukaZimdollar nonkosikazi kaZondi ngoba wayengayizwa indaba yokubangiswa yilo msakazi. Kodwa sebeyezwana ngoba bebehleli ndawonye ngisho sekubuywa emathuneni nasenkonzweni yomngcwabo,” kusho omunye umthombo osondelene nomndeni kaZondi.Imizamo yokuthola uZimdollar ayiphumelelanga kodwa uZondi, oqale wahleka kakhulu, uvumile ukuthi banobudlelwano noZimdollar futhi osebunesikhathi buqhubeka. “Singabangani nje. Siyasizana kokuningi ngisho nasemkhakheni wamabhizinisi njengoba nginoxhaxha lwamabhizinisi. Ngiqale ukwazana naye ngesikhathi ngizosiza ozakwabo ngezincwadi zokushayela.”Uvumile ukuthi uZimdollar ubekhona emngcwabeni wakubo futhi naye uyayihambela imicimbi yakubo kaZimdollar. “Ubengeyedwa kodwa ubehambisana nozakwabo. Nemindeni yethu iyazana.” UZondi waziwa kakhulu ngebhizinisi iSiyajabula Driving School futhi unoxhaxha lwamatekisi. Ubuye abe ngusihlalo wenhlangano efukula imiphakathi entulayo iKetanga, aphinde abe yiphini likamengameli woBumbano Driving School Operators Association nephini likasihlalo woBumbano LwamaZondi njengoba eyisizukulwane sesishoshovu somzabalazo iNkosi uBhambatha Zondi.
title: Iyavuthwa ekaZimdollar ebheke esithenjini

text: USEFISA kungenelele uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Bheki Cele, uyise womfundi owathunjwa ephuma esikoleni osekuyophela isonto lesithathu engatholakali.UMnuz Prince Ngcobo waseCastle Hill eNewlands West,  onguyise kaMmeli Ngcobo (17) obefunda ugrade 12 eHillgroove Secondary, uthe namanje kusacwebe isiziba ngomkhondo wendodana yakhe.“Ngiyafisa ukuthi uMnuz Bheki Cele angenelele kulolu daba  lokuthungathwa kwendodana yami. Sizwile ukuthi kukhona ababoshiwe kodwa kumina kuyafana nje,  ngoba abakhombi lapho abamfihle khona,”  kusho uNgcobo.UMmeli kuthiwa wagcina ukubonakala ngenyanga edlule, kuphuma isikole lapho kuthiwa wabonakala ehlohlolozwa kanzima ngamadoda amabili emphoqa ukuthi angene emotweni. Lokhu ngemva kokuthi esolwe ngokuthatha ifoni yomunye umfundi, afunda naye ekilasini ngesonto elandulela athunjwa ngalo.Kwavela ukuthi emotweni ayephoqwa ukuthi angene kuyo, kwakukhona umfundi okusolakala ukuthi wayethathelwe ifoni.  Kuthiwa ngaphambi kokuthi athunjwe, kwaqale kwafika abazali bomfundi esikoleni bamxwayisa ukuthi ayibuyise ngoMsombuluko owawulandela. Kuthe ngawo Msombuluko wathunjwa, okusolakala ukuthi kuhambisana nokwephulwa kwakhe isivumelwano sokubuyisa ifoni.Amaphoyisa awakuqinisekisanga ukuthi kukhona asebeboshiwe nalolu daba. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa asaphenya.
title: Akakatholakali umfundi owathunjwa esikoleni

text: NGEMUVA kokuthi uGaston Sirino eshiye iningi lingawuvali umlomo ngebhola alikhombise ngempelasonto edlule, umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, uphumele obala ngokuthi sekusemahlombe alo mdlali ukuthwala iqembu.ISundowns ishiywe izilomo ebezigqamile kumasizini edlule, uPercy Tau, ojoyine iBrighton & Hove Albion e-England noKhama Billiat owelele kwiKaizer Chiefs.USirino ushaye ingcwenga yebhola bedlala neTogo-Port yaseTogo bewina ngo 2-1 emdlalweni weCaf. Champions League. Uphume negoli waphinde wakhanda elesibili elivalelwe uSibusiso “Villa” Vilakazi. Kusasa i’Downs izobhekana neChiefs emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli ngo-3 ntambama.Ngesizini edlule, imidlalo yeligi phakathi kwala maqembu okubhekwe ukuthi abe sembangweni wesicoco, inikeze iChiefs amaphuzu amane. Inqobe owokuqala ngo 2-1. Owesiili uphele ngo 0-0.Kusasa uMosimane uzothembela ekutheni uSirino, odabuka e-Uruguay, uzobe evutha engabeselwe njengoba enzile kwiTogo-Port.“Kumele aqhubeke manje. Leli yithuba lakhe. Yingakho samletha lapha. Indlela adlale ngayo iyona kanye esayiyela eBolivia siyombheka. "Uyakwazi ukuyenza le nto. Okuhle wukuthi lokhu (indlela adlale ngayo kwiTogo) kuzomnikeza ukuzethemba ukubheka phambili,” kusho uMosimane kwi-website ye’Downs.USirino ufike kwiSundowns ngoJanuwari. Ubeke akhombise izimpawu zokuba umdlali osezingeni uma ethola ithuba. Kuthiwa iSundowns ngesikhathi iya eBolivia yayiyobheka * -Ali Meza kodwa yafike yachazwa uSirino obedlala kwiligi eyodwa noMeza.Sekuwumlando ukuthi uMeza naye igcine imsayinisile nokubhekwe ukuthi alekelele kubagadli njengoba ayefunelwa ukuvala isikhala sikaLeonardo Castro osekwiChiefs.Abanye abadlali beSundowns okuzolindelwa ukuthi bakhuphule izinga, umgadli uJeremy Brockie osafuna igoli lakhe lokuqala emdlalweni osemthethweni kumaBrazilians kusukela efike kuwona ngoJanuwari.UBrockie othengwe eshisa kwiSuperSport United usakwazi ukuthola igoli elilodwa kowobungani abawudlale naMakhosi emasontweni edlule. Emdlalweni weTogo uqalile futhi wawathola amathuba kodwa lutho ukubhakuzisa inethi.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Kusasa: Mamelodi Sundowns v Kaizer Chiefs (Loftus Versfeld Stadium, 3pm); Black Leopards v Polokwane City (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 6pm); Cape Town City FC v SuperSport United (Cape Town Stadium, 6pm); Bidvest Wits v Free State Stars (Bidvest Stadium, 6pm); Orlando Pirates v Highlands Park (Orlando Stadium, 8.15pm); AmaZulu FC v Baroka FC (King Zwelithini Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Maritzburg United v Golden Arrows (Harry Gwala Stadium, 3pm); Bloemfontein Celtic v Chippa United (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3pm)
title: ISundowns isibheke amagalelo kaSirino

text: IKHANSELA le-ANC eNelson Mandela Bay uMnuz Andile Lungisa likhwele ladilika koyiNhloko yezoKhetho ku-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula limbiza ngembulu ekhosoza incenge izikhundla.ULungisa, oyilungu lekomiti leMeya eNelson Mandela Bay Metro, ubhale kuFacebook ukuthi uMbalula kade wakuqala ubuxoki bakhe.ULungisa ugxeka uMbalula emuva kokuthi ephawule wathi ukube i-ANC ayigadlanga ngoMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa okhethweni ngabe ayilunqobanga.Le nkulumo isuse umsindo ngoba igxekwe ngisho uNobhala-Jikelele uMnuz Ace Magashule kodwa wabuye waxolisa.ULungisa uthi umazi kahle uMbalula babenaye ku-ANCYL, unawo umkhuba wokukhosozela izikhundla.Uthe iyamkhathaza indlela aziphatha ngayo uMbalula ngoba ingase ikhinyabeze inhlangano i-ANC uma engakuyeki kusemanje.“Lo muntu wasidayisa siku-ANCYL ngesikhathi sikhuluma amaqiniso yena wancetheza encenge isikhundla sokuba ungqongqoshe. Ngaleso sikhathi wayekhothamela uMnuz Jacob Zuma,’’ kusho uLungisa.ULungisa uthi kuyaxaka okwenziwa uMbalula manje usencetheza kuRamaphosa ekubeni wayengameseki engqungqutheleni yaseNasrec.
title: Owe-ANC usola uMbalula ngokuba imbulu
