text: OWAYEYILUNGU lePhalamende, uNksz Vytjie Mentor, uthi wathola ukuthi umuzi wakwaGupta oseSaxonwold uwubukhazikhazi mhlazane etshelwa ukuthi uzothola isikhundla esisha sokuba nguNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni.UNksz Mentor usho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi kwikhomishini yeJaji uZondo ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.Uthe wasuswa emzini wakwaGupta wayiswa eSahara Computers, inkampani yalo mndeni, emuva kokufika esikhumulweni sezindiza iOR Tambo International ngo-2010 ephuma eChina.Uthe wathintwa nguNksz Lakela Kaunda emtshela ukuthi uzoba nomhlangano nabantu bakwaGupta.UNksz Kaunda wayesebenzela owayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma.“Ngesikhathi ngifika emzini wakwaGupta ngaphathwa kahle ngoba ngangilandwe yibona e-OR Tambo. Ngabuzwa wumpheki ukuthi ngingathanda ukudlani. Ngathi ngithanda i-mutton curry ne-chai tea.”Uthe ababemele lo mndeni bamthembisa isikhundla sokuba wuNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi kahumeni kodwa yena wayefuna ukubonana noMengameli Jacob Zuma kwazise izimemezelo ezinjalo zazenziwa nguye.
title: Ngaphathwa kahle eSaxonwold: Vytjie Mentor

text: OWESILISA wasePhoenix eThekwini ozinikele emaphoyiseni kuleli sonto ngokubulala inkosikazi yakhe, uthe ubesekhathele ukuyinakekela njengoba ezimuke ngokweqile futhi ehlala embhedeni engakwazi ukunyakaza.UMnuz Dickson Naidoo (64) kuthiwa waqala ukuzama ukubulala inkosikazi yakhe, uDhunalutcmee (69) ngokumklinya ngomqamelo. Ngemuva kokuhluleka wabuya nommese omkhulu wasekhishini wamnquma uqhoqhoqho, wabe esezinikela esiteshini samaphoyisa ePhoenix.UNaidoo uvele enkantolo yeMantshi eVerulam ngoLwesine lapho angamoshanga khona isikhathi, wathi ucela ukugwetshwa ngoba ukwenzile asolwa ngakho.Umthombo othembekile osondelene nophenyo, uthi uNaidoo uveze ukuthi ubesekhathele ukunakekela inkosikazi yakhe.“Uyichaze njengomuntu obezimukile kakhulu wathi ubesehluleka ngisho ukumlekelela aye kogeza. Uthe ubekwazi ukukwenza lokhu phambilini kodwa ubesehluleka ngenxa yokuguga. Uthe akekho obemlekelela, lento ibisimcika,” kusho umthombo.  Kuthiwa inkosikazi yakhe ibinesifo esingaziwo esiyenze yahlala embhedeni isikhathi eside. Laba bashadikazi bebehlala ndawonye eflethini elise-Eastbury eThekwini.UNaido wazise amaphoyisa ukuthi indodana yakhe yadlula emhlabeni, indodakazi yakhe ngakolunye uhlangothi usekubhaceni ibalekela amaphoyisa njengoba ifunelwa icala lokweba.“Uthe ukubulala umkakhe isona sisombululo abesele naso sokuqeda ubuhlungu abebuzwa,” kuqhuba umthombo.Omakhelwane bathola lo wesifazane efile embhedeni kugcwele igazi. Omunye umakhelwane uveze ukuthi uNaidoo uke wazama ukucela usizo lokuthi umkakhe afakwe ekhaya labadala noma labantu abadinga ukunakekelwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya njengoba enganawo umbiko ovela kudokotela ngesimo sakhe sempilo.Icala lisaqhubeka.
title: ‘Besengikhathele ukumnakekela’ - obulale umkakhe

text:
OMUNYE wophrojusa asebezakhele igama endimeni yomculo kuleli, uDJ Sliqe (Lutendo Kungoane), ufeze isifiso sabaningi ehlanganisa omrepha obekukholelwa ukuthi kabasadlelani.UDJ Sliqe ngenyanga edlule ukhiphe i-albhamu yakhe yesibili, iNavy Black, equkethe amaciko aphambili kuleli okubalwa kuwo u-AKA, Riky Rick, Kwesta, Reason, ChianoSky nomrepha wase-United States uSy Ari da Kid, ongaphansi kweCash Money eyasungulwa nguBirdman. Ngaphezu kwala maciko uSliqe uphinde wapika u-Emtee noMaraza eculweni elilodwa iKasi Anthem. Labo mrepha bekusolwa ukuthi kabasaboni ngaso linye nakuba beqale ukuqopha umculo ndawonye ngaphambi kodumo.“Siqophe i-video yeculo nabo ndawonye muva nje. Bebezipholele, behleka kumnandi. “Abantu bakhombise ukukujabulela kakhulu ukuthi ngikwaze ukubahlanganisa eculweni elilodwa kodwa bengizibuza ukuthi kungani bejabula kangaka ngoba ngokwazi kwami bangabangani abakhulu,” kusho uSliqe.By @veedeepusA post shared by 
Sliqe(@sliqe) on Aug 14, 2018 at 5:41am PDTLo phrojusa uqhube waveza nokuthi ubefuna ukubuyisa ‘umculo’ kwiHip Hop, nokuyisizathu esimenze wasebenza namaciko afana no ChianoSky, eculweni elinesiginci esicishe sifane nesikamaskandi. Echaza ngokusebenzisana nomrepha wase United States, uSliqe uthi wamthumelela umyalezo ku-Instagram.“Ngamthumelela umsebenza wami wawuzwa wawuthanda, wabuyisa izinsimbi engangimthumele zona sezihamba nevesi. Uma unikeza amaciko ‘ubuciko’ bakho bayakuthokozela kakhulu lokho futhi bayakukhombisa,” kuchaza yena.Ngaphambi kwale albhamu, uSliqe owaba nguDJ wokuqala we-hip hop ukuwina iSouth African Music Award ngo-2016, ukhiphe i-albhamu enesihloko esithi Injayam Vol. 1. Uthe iNavy Black indlalelela iVol. 2 athe useqalile ukuyipheka.
title: UDJ Sliqe uhlanganise obekusolwa ukuthi abasadlelani

text: KUSHONE abantu abahlanu ngesikhathi iveni lishayisa unqenqema lomgwaqo kuN3 ngasePeacevale izolo.UMnuz Russel Meiring, okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo i-ER24, uthe ngesikhathi befika endaweni yengozi ngabo-12.06 bathole iveni isibhajwe ezinsimbini ezakha unqenqema lomgwaqo abantu besaphazeke emgwaqweni.“Sithole ukuthi abantu ababili bese beshonile, ibingekho into esingabasiza ngayo, abanye abahlanu bebelimele kakhulu, bekukhona nabebenemihuzukwana. Abasebenzi bazamile ukusiza abantu kodwa ababili kulabo akade belimele kakhulu bashona yize besizama ukuhlenga impilo yabo. Kwabashonile kukhona nezingane ezimbili. Emuva kokubaxilonga baphuthuniyiswa ezibhedlela ukuze bathole usizo,”Akucaci ukuthi owesihlanu ushonele endaweni yesigameko noma endleleni eya esibhedlela.UNksz Thobile Khwela oshonelwe ngudadewabo uNksz Nomcebo Khwela (23), uthe akazi bebephumaphi kodwa bebesendleleni ebuyela ekhaya uma ebuka.Uthe bafice abantu belimele kanzima ngebhadi udadewabo eseshonile.Akakwazanga ukuchaza okunye njengoba ebesaphatheke kabi.UNksz Nomfundo Mcetywa woMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kushone abantu abahlanu engozini yemoto eyenzeke ePeacevale izolo.Uveze ukuthi abantu abane basesimeni esibi esibhedlela kanti abathathu abalimele kakhulu.Uthe amaphoyisa asematasa nophenyo ukuze athole ngembangela yengozi.ULt Col Thulani Zwane wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uthe amaphoyisa aseHammarsdale aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso emuva kokuthi iveni ebithwele abantu ibe sengozini.“Bahlanu abantu abashonile engozini yeveni eyenzeke kuN3, ePeacevale namhlanje (izolo). Amaphoyisa asaphenya ngembangela yengozi, akekho obeseboshiwe okwamanje. Uphenyo luyaqhubeka,” kusho uZwane.
title: Kufe 5 engozini yemoto ehlasimulisayo

text: SISHUBILE isimo phakathi kwembongi yodumo, uCebo ‘Imbongi YasebuKhosini’ Shandu neNkosi yasoYaya eMbongolwane eShowe, uSthembiso Ntuli, kubangwa imali enguR2 500. UCebo (23) wasesigodini saseNgedleni, eMbongolwane, usola inkosi ngokunqwaha nenkokhelo yakhe.“Inkosi yangiqasha ukuba ngiyibongele ngesikhathi ishadelwa ngo-2017.“Ngemuva komshado yathi ngeke isakwazi ukungikhokhela ngoba yayingasenayo imali kodwa yathembisa ukunginikeza uR500 njalo ngenyanga.“Angibanga nenkinga nalokho. Savumelana, kodwa kuze kube yimanje ayisafuni ukunginikeza imali yami. Sengigqigqe izikhathi eziningi enkantolo nakoMkhulu kodwa angiyitholi le mali.“Sekuhluleke ngisho udaba sengilufake enduneni kodwa alukhulunywa udaba lwami,” kusho uCebo obuye azwakale engomeni yesihlabani sikamaskandi uKhangelani ‘DSD’ Mhlongo esihloko sithi Mkhaya Wami (ekwi-albhamu ethi The Clairvoyant) futhi obuye ahaye emsakazweni womphakathi i-Icora FM ngamaSonto.Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo lithole ukuthi inkosi yayigcagcelwa oDidini yiNdlunkulu yayo yaseMabomvini ngaphesheya koThukela ngo-Ephreli 16, 2017.UCebo uthe okumphoqa ukuba aze alufake kwabezindaba lolu daba ukuthi inkosi seyimsabise ngokuthi uzodingiswa endaweni uma eqhubeka nokuyifuna le mali.“Ngigcine ukuyobasela le mali ngo-Okthoba wangonyaka owedlule,” kuphetha uCebo. Ithintwa inkosi iphike yalala ngomhlane ukuthi ike yasongela uCebo ngokumdingisa.“Akukho sivumelwano engasenza naye, yena akaye kubantu abamqasha, hhayi kumina,” kubhoka ngolaka inkosi maqede yavala ucingo.UCebo uthe yena waxhunyaniswa nenkosi uMnuz Mbhekiseni Ntuli.“NgangiseThekwini, wathi kimina inkosi iyashadelwa, ngakho kufanele ngiyoyibongela. Wangithatha wangixhumanisa nayo, savumelana ngemali.”Ethintwa uNtuli uvumile ukuthi uyalwazi lolu daba futhi nguye owaxhumanisa inkosi noCebo.“Nami ngize ngaxabana nenkosi, sibanga ukuthi kungani ingasamkhokheli umfana imali yakhe. Mina ngabaxhumanisa kuphela, bavumelana bodwa ngemali,” kusho uNtuli obuye abe yilungu lomkhandlu wenkosi.Uthe ngeke inkosi yasabisa abantu ngokubadingisa ngoba akusekho emthethweni.“Angikholwa wukuthi inkosi yayingakhipha lawo mazwi ngoba nayo iyazi ukuthi akusenziwa lokho,” kuphetha uNtuli.
title: Sishubile isimo kwimbongi nenkosi ngolukaR 2 500

text: BASIZWE yinyunyana yabo iNational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa) abasebenzi abawu-2 895 akade sebekhonjwe indlela kwaToyota, abangafikanga emsebenzini ngenxa yesiteleka esingekho emthethweni.Izolo abasebenzi bakwaToyota babuyele emsebenzini emuva kwesiteleka esingekho emthethweni ebesesidonse amasonto amabili.Unobhala-jikelele weNumsa, uMnuz Mbuso Ngubane, uthe bavumelene nabasebenzi ukuthi babuyele emsebenzini namhlanje (izolo).“Isiteleka sesiphelile. NgeSonto saba nomhlangano nabaqashi sibacela ukuthi ababuyisele abasebenzi akade sebexoshiwe emsebenzini. Abaqashi bacele ukuthi abasebenzi ababhale incwadi ngamunye ngamunye, bachaze ukuthi kungani kufanele babuyele emsebenzini kodwa sakubona ukuthi kuzoba wumqansa lokhu. Sibe sesicela umqashi ukuthi ababuyisele. Uthe uzobanika izincwadi zokugcina zesixwayiso sase sivumelana ngokuthi ababuyele emsebenzini namhlanje (izolo),” kusho uNgubane.Uthe izixwayiso zokugcina zizohlala izinyanga ezing-18 ngoba bekuxoxiswana kanzima nabaqashi akade benganeme ngokuthi abasebenzi baqale isiteleka esingekho emthethweni.UNgubane uthe bazobhekisisa nesivumelwano sabo okuthiwa yiMasibambisane Pack okukhona kuso udaba lweQuality Bonus okuyiyona eyenze ukuthi abasebenzi baqale isiteleka.“Sifuna kucaciswe ukuthi abasebenzi kufanele bayithole uma kwenzenjani iQuality Bonus ukuze nabo bangatholi imilayezo eshayisanayo kubaqashi. Sizophinde sifundise amalungu ethu ngokubaluleka kokulandela umthetho ukuze lesi simo sokuthi baqale isiteleka esingavikelekile, esenza kube lula ukuthi baxoshwe, singaphinde senzeke,” kusho uNgubane.Uthe kunemithetho okufanele ilandelwe ngaphambi kokuteleka, okubalulekile ukuthi abasebenzi bayihloniphe ngoba noma benelungelo lokuteleka kodwa kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi bavikela imisebenzi yabo.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe wuMnuz Mzo Witbooi obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwaToyota uthe: “IToyota South Africa Motors (TSAM) imemezele ukuthi isiteleka ebesingekho semthethweni samalungu eNumsa ebesiseProspecton sesiphelile. I-TSAM neNumsa babe nezingxoxo ezinde ukuze kutholakale isixazululo. Kugcine kufinyelelwe esivumelwaneni, abasebenzi akade betelekile babuyela emsebenzini ngoFebhuwari 4, 2020. Akekho oxoshiwe.”
title: Basizwe yinyunyana kuphela isiteleka kwaToyota

text: OWAYENGU-MVIKELI woMphakathi uSolwazi Thuli Madonsela usole uDuduzane Zuma ngokuqamba amanga nokusebenzisa amasu okubalekela imibuzo ngenkathi efakaza kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana. UDuduzane, oyindodana kalowo owayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz uJacob Zuma, uthe akanikezwanga ithuba lokuziphendulela ngezinsolo ezafakwa kumbiko woMvikeli Womphakathi ngenkohlakalo kuhulumeni ngaye. UMadonsela kumbiko wakhe wathola ubufakazi bukaMnuz Mcebisi Jonas, owayeyiphini likangqongqoshe weziMali, lapho aveza khona ukuthi uDuduzane wamuyisa emzini wakwaGupta eSaxonwold eGoli lapho ashelwa khona ukuthi athathe isikhundla sikangqongqoshe weziMali uma ezosebenzisana 'nabo'. UJonas waveza ukuthi kulowo mhlangano owawuhlelwe nguDuduzane, bazama ukumgwazela ngo-R600 million. Ephekwa ngemibuzo kwikhomishini kaZondo ngoMsombuluko uDuduzane ukuchithile lokhu wathi umhlangano wawungahlanganisi abakwaGupta kodwa wawuhlelwe nguye ukuthi kuhlangane uJonas noMnuz Fana Hlongwane ukuze badingide amahlebezi thizeni ayengehli kahle kuye. Utshele ikhomishini ukuthi kumbiko wakhe uMadonsela akamnikezanga isikhathi esanele sokuthi aziphendulelele kulezi zinsolo. UMadonsela obekhuluma nabe-eNCA ngoLwesibili ekuseni, uzichithile izimpendulo zikaDuduzane, wagcizelela ukuthi bekuyindlela yokubalekela iqiniso nokuzenza isisulu. “Akakhulumi iqiniso, uma kumele sikubeke kabuhlungu, yebo uqamba amanga. Angazi kungani eqamba amanga kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi uzotholani ngokuqamba amanga. Akutholile ngokuqamba amanga ukubalekela iqiniso nokuzenza isisulu. Siyazi njengabammeli ukuthi icala awunqobi ngamaqiniso kuphela. Izinkulumo ezisemphakathini nazo zibalulekile,” kuchaza uMadonsela.  UMadonsela uthe azimthusi izenzo zikaDuduzane, wagcizelela ukuthi bukhona ubufakazi obukhombisa ukuthi uDuduzane usenikezwe amathuba amaningi okuziphendulela kwizinsolo zikaJonas. UDuduzane uzoqedela ukwethula ubufakazi kule khomishana ngoLwesibili.
title: 'UDuduzane uhubhuze amanga kwikhomishini' - Madonsela

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weTS Galaxy, uDan “ Dance” Malesela, unxuse abaqeqeshi ukuthi bashumayele ivangeli kubadlali lokuthi bayeke ukuhamba izindawo zasebusuku ezidala ukuthi bangalali okuholela ezingozini zomgwaqo.NgoMsombuluko odlule kuvukwe ngezindaba ezimbi zokudlula emhlabeni kuka-Anele Ngcongca engozini yemoto eshiye imoto yakhe iyikopi.Ubebolekwe aMaZulu FC yiMamelodi Sundowns. Uzofihlwa kusasa eGugulethu.UMalesela udlulise amazwi endunduzo emndenini wakwaNgcongca.Uthe kumphatha kabi ukuthi abadlali bashona ngendlela eyodwa futhi esikhathini esiningi kuba yisekuseni.Uthe kukhona okumele kwenziwe ukuvimba lo mkhokha oya ngokwanda.Unxuse abaqeqeshi ukuthi bashumayele kubadlali ukuyeka  ukwenza izinto ezibenza bangalali bese bengena ezimotweni.“Noma sewuthanda ngeke ukugweme ukulala, kuyindalo.  Umzimba uyakudinga ukuphumula.“Ngiguqa phansi ngedolo kubaqeqeshi ukuthi bahlale bebakhumbuza abadlali ngengozi yokungalali bese bengena ezimotweni.“Leli vangeli kumele silishumayele yonke indawo ngisho emajimini. Kumele kube khona okwenziwayo.“Ngeke phela sebephelile abadlali bethu yizingozi zezimoto ezenzeka entathakusa. Kuzomele kube khona okwenziwayo.”Uthe akazi ukuthi uNgcongca ubephuma kuphi futhi eya kuphi.Ingozi kaNgcongca yenzeka kuN2 ngaseMtunzini ekuseni.“Angifuni ukukhuluma into engingayazi ngithi ubephuma ezindaweni ezimenze wangalala.“Mhlawumbe ubephuthuma into ebalulekile noma bekukhona obekumele ahlangane naye.“Kodwa kuyethusa ukushona kwabo ngendlela efanayo.”Ingozi kaNgcongca ilandela eyango-2018 eyaphoqa uWiseman Meyiwa, owayedlalela iKaizer Chiefs,  ukuthi aliyeke ibhola ngenxa yokulimala kanzima.Kwabanye abadlali abashona ezingozini zomgwaqo singabala uLesley Manyathela, owayedlala kwi-Orlando Pirates, Gift Leremi (Mamelodi Sundowns); Richard Henyekanye (Lamontville GoldenArrows), Cecil Lolo(Ajax Cape Town), Mondli Cele noMlondi Dlamini (Maritzburg United), Mogau Tshela  (Polokwane City), Sinethemba Jantjie (Free State Stars) noThembinkosi Mbamba (TS Galaxy).
title: ‘Akutshelwe abadlali bayeke ukuhamba ebusuku’

text: ISINALO iqhinga lokunyomfa zonke izinhlelo ze-Orlando Pirates, iHoroya AC yaseGuinea ezodudulana nezikaMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic kowesibili wamaqoqo ngaphansi kweCAF Champions League kusasa ngo-7 ebusuku e-Orlando Stadium.Lokhu kushiwo umdlali wayo wasesiswini, uNaby Soumah (osesithombeni) ngesikhathi ekhuluma ne-website yaleli qembu eliqale ngokubamba ompetha balo mqhudelwano i-Esperance de Tunis.Ngemuva kwalo mphumela we-Esperance leli qembu obekuyilona futhi elimise kabi iMamelodi Sundowns eminyakeni edlule emqhudelwaneni ofanayo, lifike kuleli linokukhulu ukuzethemba.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, iPirates aziyihambeli kahle izinto njengoba idlala ngokulingana kungafanele okugcina ngokuthi ilahle amaphuzu amqoka nakwi-Absa Premiership. KwiChampions League isifo sePirates sokudedela amagoli kumbe ibe buthuntu ngendlela exakayo sibukeka siqhubeka futhi uma ingazithela ngabandayo kwiHoroya umqansa uzoqonga kuleli qoqo ekulona ngoba linzima.Lo mdlali weHoroya uzishaya isifuba ngokuthi useke wasidlala lesi sigaba nabanye abaningi abazobe bekhona enkundleni ngakho-ke akukho okufanele bakwenze ngaphandle kokuyibamba ngobhongwane iBucs.“Akukho okudlula ukuthi uma isinika ithuba lokuthi siyicindezele iPirates silibambe ngazo zombili. Emaqenjini afana nayo kufanele usebenzise wonke amandla namava onawo ngoba ayingozi. Sihlele ukuyithwalisa kanzima kulo mdlalo (ongowayo) siphinde senze okufanayo noma sesisekhaya,” usho kanje.Leli qembu selivele linesonto lifikile eNingizimu Afrika ukuzozijwayeza nesimo sezulu nakho konke abadinga ukukujwayela.“Kuyangijabulisa engikubona emehlweni ozakwethu. Kusukela sifikile sonke siyazi ukuthi yini okumele siyenze futhi sonke sazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi sizeleni eNingizimu Afrika. Kuyathokozisa nokwazi ukuthi iPirates idlale ngokulingana kodlule ngakho-ke lokho kusitshela ukuthi uma sithola umphumela oncomekayo sizobe sizisize kakhulu. Indlela esiqale ngayo isenza sizizwe singanika noma ubani esibhekana naye eqoqweni inkinga. Kumqoka ukuthi simlalelisise umqeqeshi ukuthi yini afuna siyenze kulo mdlalo,” kusho yena.“Siyazi kumele siwuzele kanjani lo mdlalo. Kusezandleni nasekuhlakanipheni kwethu ukuthi sizibeke ebuhleni ngomphumela esizowuthola kulo mdlalo. Uma senze njalo siyazi ukuthi siyobe silethe injabulo kubaholi bethu, kithina nakubalandeli bethu. Sinethuba lokuthola umphumela ozofana nomjovo kithina uma umqhudelwano usungena kuvuthondaba.”
title: OweHoroya usongela iPirates

text: “NOMA ngubani oshushiswa ngokungemthetho, bonke abantu kumele basukume bameseke futhi bamvikele.”Usho kanje uMnuz Jacob Zuma, owayenguMengameli wezwe ethula inkulumo yakhe ngemuva kokuvela enkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngoLwesihlanu.UZuma ubevele ngamacala enkohlakalo, ukukhwabanisa nokushintshisana ngemali. Uthe uhlabeke umxhwele ngendlela abantu abaphume ngayo ukuzomeseka kuleli cala.“ENingizimu Afrika sengibonile ukuthi akekho umuntu ongasukelwa amabhubesi ayekelelwe,” kusho uZuma.Uthe usebonile ukuthi amandla enkululeko akhona, awawelanga phansi. NgokukaZuma, akekho oyomvimba ukuthi akhankase njengoba kuza ukhetho luka-2019. Uthe ziseziningi izinto okumele zenzelwe abantu bakuleli. “Okhethweni oluzayo, ngifuna i-ANC iwine ngamalengiso ukuze ikwazi ukulungisa izinto eziningi emphakathini.”YINGXENYE yabantu abebezokweseka uMnuz Jacob Zuma enkantolo eMgungundlovu okukhona kubo abefundisi nabaholi bomphakathiIzithombe: DOCTOR NGCOBOEnye yezinto athe ufuna ilungiswe yintando yeningi. Njengamanje uthe intando yeningi esebenzayo ePhalamende ivuna amalungu amaningi eqembu elithize. Uthe uma i-ANC iwina ngamalengiso okhethweni oluzayo kuzoshintsha kusebenze intando yeningi yomthethosisekelo. NgokukaZuma uma sekusebenza intando yeningi yomthethosisekelo kuzophela ukuyisana ezinkantolo kwamaqembu. UZuma ugqugquzele abantu ukuba baphume ngobuningi babo, bayovota ngonyaka ozayo. “Ngeke kusisize ukuthi sidube singavoti ngoba sithi asimfuni umuntu othize,” kweluleka uZuma.Mayelana necala lakhe, uthe abameli bakhe abasha batshele uMbuso ukuthi bayalichitha leli cala, ngoba abasafuni liphinde lithethwe kwazise phela ukuthi selithathe isikhathi eside. Uthe ukudonsa kwalo isikhathi eside kukhombisa ukungabikhona kobulungiswa.Njengoba icala likaZuma lihlehliselwe uNovemba 30, uthe abameli bakhe bazofika ngalo usuku nezethulo ezizochaza ukuthi kungani bethi icala alichithwe lingabe lisaqhubeka.Uthe kuzocaca kahle ngonyaka ozayo ukuthi icala lakhe lizobe limi kanjani njengoba sekuphele iminyaka engu-17 lilokhu lingena ezinkantolo, lichithwe, liphinde livuke.
title: Oshushiswa ngokungemthetho kumele esekwe - Zuma

text:
UCELA ukuthi abathandi bomcuo bakuleli baqhubeke nokuthenga i-albhamu yakhe entsha umculi we-Afro pop uMusa osedayise ngaphezulu kwegolide (15 000).Kuleli sonto lo mculi, oshisa izikhotha ngengoma ethi 
Mthande ayishaya noRobbie Malinga, uveze ukuthi i-albhamu yakhe ayikhiphe kulo nyaka isidayise ngaphezulu kwegolide, okungamakhophi angu-15 000 ngokolimu lomculo. “Ngiyabonga kakhulu kubo bonke abantu abangesekile ukuze ngizuze lokhu. Ngaphandle kwabo bengingeke ngibe lapha ngikhona manje. Ngithi abaqhubekele phambili nokungeseka size sithole ngaphezulu kweplatinum (30 000).UMusa uthe ngesikhathi eyikhipha le albhamu wayengazi ukuthi uzodayisa igolide kodwa kwakuyisifiso sakhe ukuthi idayise ubuthaphuthaphu.“Isetshenziwe yona le albhamu. Kungithathe isikhathi ukuthi ngiyihlanganise futhi namandla esiwafakile makhulu kakhulu nabantu ebengisebenza nabo okuyibhendi nabantu engibhale nabo izingoma.”IMr Serious yi-albhamu kaMusa yesibili elandela ethi The Dream ayikhipha ngo-2013 ngemuva kokunqoba umncintiswano womculo ama-Idols SA.“IThe Dream ayiphushekanga kahle. Ngicabanga ukuthi savilapha ukuyiphusha sizitshela ukuthi izinto zizozenzakalela ngoba ngangiphuma kuma-Idols kanti kuMr Serious siwufake wonke umfutho wethu.”Ngaphandle kokuqhubeka nokudayisa uthe ufuna nokuwola izindondo. Nge albhamu yakhe edlule waqokwa kumaMetro FM Music Awards emunxeni weBest Newcomer kodwa wanganqoba. Uphinde waveza ukuthi basacubungula ukuthi yiyiyiphi ingoma yesibili abazoyiphusha baphinde bayiqophele ne-video. “’Uma sesisikhipha eyesithathu sizozwa kubantu ukuthi bafuna yiphi.” Uthe uzohambela izindawo ezahlukene kuleli ebonga abantu ngokumeseka.
title: UMusa unxenxa abalandeli

text: UZIME wakuleli uzidonsele amanzi ngomsele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana eveza ukuthi unesifiso sokuba umengameli wezwe ngelinye ilanga. UShufhadzo Musida onguMiss South Africa ubhale ekhasini lakhe likaTwitter ngokukhulu ukukhululeka kanti akazi ukuthi abantu bazomtinyela ngephupho lakhe. "Ngifuna ukuba umengameli wezwe," kubhala yena. 4Emuva kwalokho kusuke esinamathambo abantu bemtshela ukuthi akaqhubeke nokuqimba njengoba ehlala ebonakala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana efake imisweswena yangaphansi.Babodwa ebebemtshela ukuthi lihle impela iphupho lakhe futhi lingaphumelela uma engabangi namuntu. Kusukela ewufakile lo mbhalo abantu baphawule baze bahlukana phakathi abanye beveza ukuthi asikho isidingo sokuhlaselwa kwalo zime ngoba naye kuyiphupho lakhe yize abanye bemsola nangokuthi akanayo ngisho inswebu yokuba umengameli.Abalandeli bakhe nobekubonakala ukuthi bayameseka babhoke bakhahlela kwizidlamlilo zakuTwitter ebezilokhu zimngcofe njalo lo zime. Esikhathini esingatheni kube sekuqalwa ihashtag ethi #ShuduForPresident. Abesifazane abaningi basebenzise lehashtag ukulwela lozime, nokuyinto esaqhubeka njengoba isesematheni indaba yakhe. UShudufhadzo sekuvamisile ukuthi ahlale ehlaselwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okuyinto engajwayelekile kozime. Shudu is Queen. FULL STOPIf she dreams of being President of SA or the coming United States of Africa it is not just okay, but perfect. As a black woman & Miss SA it’ll certainly be dope to have her as President because she’s VERY smart! #HandsOffShudu Dare to dream back child! pic.twitter.com/9UejrtyPWCOnly people that are Broken inside will attack our Miss SA, Shudu is intelligent, beautiful, Confident and also well deserved of the title she holds. #ShuduForPresident... Bullies always hide their pain by bulling others😾 pic.twitter.com/PuW7HVQBAIbetter society.Some of us are dealing with childhood trauma, but when we see presidents like Shudu , with so much confidence, love , peace, intelligence, we draw strength from you, thank you #ShuduForPresident , You're appreciated, you're loved, I love you so much and may GodSome comments are jaw dropping to say the least. How do people walk around with such hatred and negativity in their lives? Be anything you want to be our Queen #ShuduforPresident🇿![CDATA[]]>🇦![CDATA[]]>🇿![CDATA[]]>🇦
title: Usizwe abalandeli etinyelwa kuTwitter uMiss SA

text: ODWA  MKENTANE, ESHLIN VEDAN noKHULEKANI MASEKOOWAYENGUMDLALI wasemuva weBafana Bafana neMamelodi Sundows u-Anele Ngcongca ubehlela umcimbi wokugubha usuku lokuzalwa lukanina oneminyaka engu-65 ngoDisemba 16. Lo mdlali (33), waseGugulethu kuthiwa ubesendleleni eya kohlangana nabeqembu lakhe AmaZulu FC, eThekwini njengoba ngoLwesihlanu esayine inkontileka yonyaka nabo. Umzala wakhe uNksz Ntombizodwa Magadlela, utshele iphephandaba elinguzwakwabo weSolezwe,  iCape Times ukuthi baze bathola ngo-8 ekuseni izolo ngokushona kwakhe.“Elinye lamaphoyisa abesendaweni yesigameko lishayele ucingo ilungu lomndeni lilazisa ngengozi. Ngesikhathi bengitshela, angizange ngikholwe. Bengithi kudlalwa ngathi njengoba kuke kwenziwe kwabanye osaziwayo. Size sakholwa iphoyisa selishaya ngocingo luka-Anele. Ngishayele isihlobo sethu esiseThekwini ukuze siqinisekise lokhu. Bathe kunjalo. Ubehlela ukwenzela unina (Nkk Nomahomba Magadlela Ngcongca) umcimbi wokugubha iminyaka engu-65 azalwa ngoDisemba 16.Ngempelasonto besikhuluma naye nje sihlela ethi asenze amakhadi esimemo somcimbi. Ubengumuntu othulayo kodwa uma ekhona bekuzwakala. Ubehlezi exhumana nomndeni,” kusho umzala wakhe. UNgcongca uchazwe wumndeni njengomuntu obezithobile futhi eyinsika. Nguyena kuphela ingane unina abesesele nayo, abanye sebashona. UNgcongca waqala ukudlalela iqembu iFC Fortuna, wagcina esegijima eBelgium, lapho anqoba imiqhudelwano eminingi neqembu lakhe iGenk, kusukela ngo-2007.“Sishaqekike, ubeyinsika kuleli khaya. Uyena kuphela ingane esele, abanye ababili sebashona. Ubemthanda unina. Uthando lwebhola waba nalo esemncane, wayehamba kuze kube yisebusuku edlala ibhola. Uninalume wamlethela isikhangiso kufunwa abadlali bebhola. Waba ngomunye owaqokwa ngoba wayelithanda futhi ezimisele. Waqhubeka nezifundo zakhe ebe edlala nebhola. Ubehlezi emamatheka, egcwele uthando,”  kusho uNksz Magadlela.UNksz Sisanda Ngcongca ongudadewabo uthe ubenezinyanga ezimbili egcinile ekhaya ngenxa yokuzinikela emsebenzini.Uthe basalinde umbiko wamaphoyisa ngomshayeli obehamba nalo mdlali emotweni.“Asinalo ulwazi mayelana nobudlelwane babo nabehamba naye,”  kusho uNksz Ngcongca.Uthe lo mdlali ubenengane eneminyaka emibili.Omunye uzwakwabo uSiyabonga Sangweni, uthe ubekulangazelela ukudlala nalo mdlali kuMaZulu.
title: UNgcongca ubehlela umcimbi kanina

text:
NOKUBONGWA PHENYANEU THOLWE emakhazeni kahulumeni eShowe, uMfundisi Joseph Sikhakhane (61), obese kuphele isonto engabuyi ekhaya nasocingweni lwakhe engatholakali emuva kokuba agcina ukukhuluma nomndeni wakhe engumuntu osendleleni ebuya enkonzweni eyayiKwaMashu kwa-E ngesonto eledlule.Isolezwe libike ngodaba lokuduka kukaSikhakhane webandla iChibilensindiso Church of Zion, izolo okuthe ngemuva kwalokho kwavela ukuthi washona engozini yetekisi eyaphaphalaza emgwaqweni ngelanga ayesuke ngalo esontweni.Le ngozi kuthiwa yenzeka sebeyongena edolobheni eShowe. Kuthiwa etekisini kwakukhona yena nomshayeli wayo owalimala kanzima.UNkk Sibongile Sikhakhane unkosikazi kaMfundisi, uthe basitholile isidumbu somyeni wakhe izolo ngemuva kokubizwa ngamaphoyisa ezobatshela ukuthi washona engozini.“Bese sididekile futhi siphatheke kabuhlungu ukuthi ngempela ngabe kwenzekeni. Kodwa manje kungcono ngoba simtholile,” kusho uNkk Sikhakhane.UMnuz Mthokozisi Nxumalo ongumxhumanisi kuleli bandla, uthe babonga kakhulu 
Isolezwe ngokuveza lolu daba njengoba kube sekuzwakala ukuthi kwenzekani ngaye.“Ubaba kuthiwa wagibela imoto encane esuka eThekwini, leyo moto yayingangeni eShowe nokwagcina ngokuthi bamise itekisi elalingena ngaphakathi edolobheni balicela ukuthi limgibelise. Kuthiwa etekisini kwakunguyena nomshayeli walo yena owalimala ubaba wadlula emhlabeni,” kusho uNxumalo.Uthe bathola ukuthi abantu ababefika engozini babengamazi uSikhakhane waze wathathwa wayobekwa emakhazeni kahulumeni.Omunye wesifazane othinte 
Isolezwe, uthe yena wayibona ingozi futhi kwashiwo ukuthi umuntu oshonile ubegqoke izimpahla zesonto.“Ngambona loya baba nguye impela osephepheni uyena owayeshonile kuleya ngozi,” kusho lona wesifazane.USikhakhane kuthiwa wavuka ekuseni ngeSonto elungiselela ukuhamba watshela abanye abazalwane ukuthi uyocela ukugitsheliswa izimoto ezizombeka ekhaya emgwaqweni onguthelawayeka u-N2.Indodakazi yakhe uNksz Zodwa Sikhakhane ithe okwenzekayo bekubaxaka ngoba uyise ubengajwayele ukuhamba angaziwa ukuthi ukuphi.
title: Obedukile utholwe emakhazeni

text: UMHOLI we-IFP, inkosi uMangosuthu Buthelezi, uthe inhloso yokusungula iNgonyama Trust kwakuwukunika amatayitela imikhandlu ehlukene ephethe umhlaba.Uthe kwakuzobe sekubhekwa ukuthi abahlala kulowo mhlaba banikwe amatayitela.UButhelezi uthe umhlaba akuwona owamakhosi kodwa owomphakathi ohlala kuwona.“Uhulumeni ucabanga ukuthi siyizilima. Abantu abakhulumayo bacabanga ukuthi siyizilima mhlawumbe yingakho besibiza ngondlovukayiphikiswa,” kusho uButhelezi.Ukusho lokhu ekhuluma kwi-SAFM Sunrise izolo ekuseni engxoxweni ebiqoshiwe noStephen Grootes.Owayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Kgalema Motlanthe, wabiza amakhosi ngabantu abangondlovukayiphikiswa ngesikhathi kunomhlangano we-ANC ngendaba yomhlaba muva nje.UButhelezi uthe iSilo asiwona umnikazi womhlaba njengoba siwuphathele abantu.“ISilo siphethe umhlaba siwuphathele abantu baKwaZulu-Natal. Asiwona umnikazi womhlaba,” kusho uButhelezi.Mayelana nokuthi imali etholwa yiNgonyama Trust iya eSilweni, uButhelezi uthe le mali ayiyi kuNgangezwe kodwa iya ebhodini eliholwa yiJaji uJerome Ngwenya.“Uyijaji laseNkantolo eNkulu. Imali ayiphethwe noma ayiyi ephaketheni leSilo,” kuqhuba uButhelezi.Mayelana nezinkulumo zikaMotlanthe, uthe isitatimende esakhishwa yithimba ayelihola ngeNgonyama Trust samthusa.“Ngiyamhlonipha owayengumengameli. Kulula ukumgxeka (uMotlanthe) manje, udaba lweNgonyama Trust selube sezithebeni zezingqungquthela ze-ANC KwaZulu-Natal. Kwaba nemibiko yokuthi kumele kuqedwe ngeNgonyama Trust, ngiyamangala ngoba yimina engaqhamuka nomthetho olawula iNgonyama. Imina engaqhamuka nalo mbono, abanye abantu ababengakazalwa bakhuluma baze bayiphambanise bayihlanganise nokuthi yakhiwa ukuze kube nesivumelwano sokuthi i-IFP ingenele ukhetho,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe yinto engekho le yokuthi kwakuncengwa i-IFP ukuthi iye okhethweni ngoba yayivele izoba yingxenye yokhetho kodwa isizathu kwakuwukuthi kuvikelwe umhlaba owawusele ngesikhathi siphucwa umhlaba.”Indaba yomhlaba isematheni kulezi zinsuku njengoba i-ANC ifuna uhulumeni athathe umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo.UMengameli we-ANC nezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, uqinisekise izwe neSilo ukuthi ngeke uthathwe umhlaba ongaphansi kwamakhosi kodwa bafuna umhlaba ongu-87% ongekho ngaphansi kwezandla zamakhosi.Ne-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ibe nengqungquthela ngomhlaba kuleli sonto lapho iqinisekise khona uNgangezwe ukuthi ngeke uthathwe umhlaba ongaphansi kwakhe.Mayelana nodaba lokuhola i-IFP, uButhelezi uthe akuyona imfihlo ukuthi wathi usefuna ukwehla kodwa iqembu lamncenga lathi akaqhubeke.“Ngilisebenzele leli lizwe. Ngiyidlalile indima yami. Angicabangi ukuthi ikhona into engisayibhekile.”
title: 'Umhlaba akusiwo owamakhosi'

text: UMENGAMELI wakuleli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, uzwe usizi lwabantu bakuleli ebambezeleka egibele isitimela ePitoli ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.URamaphosa ugibele isitimela sakwaMetro Rail nezinye izikhulu ze-ANC njengengxenye yomkhankaso we-ANC njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni.URamaphosa nalezi zikhulu bebehlele ukungena esitimeleni banxene abavoti ukuthi bavotele iqembu elibusayo.Ngokohlelo uRamaphosa, bekumele agibele isitimela eMabopane Station ngo-6.30 ekuseni kodwa walinda isikhathi esingangehora ngaphambi kokuthi angene kuso. Uthe esengena ngo-7.30, wabhekana nezinkinga abantu bakuleli ababhekana nazo zinsuku zonke.Ngaphakathi abagibeli bazise uRamaphosa ngezinkinga zabo okubalwa kuzo ukungagcini isikhathi kwezitimela, abanye babeka izimpilo zabo engcupheni ukuze bakwazi ukugibela. Abanye abebelinde eBosman Station kusukela ngo-5 ekuseni bathe bazofika emsebenzini sesidulile isikhathi ngenxa yokungafiki ngesikhathi kwesitimela.URamaphosa uthe ujabule ngokukwazi ukubona ukuthi abantu bakuleli babhekana nobunzima obunjani ezitimeleni. Uthembise abagibeli ukuthi i-ANC izothuthukisa ukusebenza kwezitimela kuleli maduze.
title: Uzwe usizi lwabakuleli uRamaphosa ebhajwa esitimeleni

text: KUPHOQELEKE ukuthi abafundi babuyiselwe emakhaya emuva kokufica isidumbu sikanogada esikoleni ngoMsombuluko.Abafundi nothisha baseButhathu’bunye High, eMhlabashane, eHighflats, bazithele esidunjini sikaMnuz Vusumuzi Ncobela (58) obewunogada esikoleni sinamanxeba okudutshulwa.Kusolwa ukuthi uNcobela, obegadile esikoleni ngeSonto ebusuku, uhlaselwe ngumuntu noma ngabantu bamdubula wafa. Isidumbu sakhe sitholakale eduze kwamathoyilethi esikole. Bekubonakala sengathi ubebaleka wawa washonela eduze kwamathoyilethi.Ayiqondakali imbangela yokudutshulwa kwakhe ngoba akukho okuntshontshiwe esikoleni nakuyena. Zonke izinto abeziphethe bezikuye, ngisho neselula.Kusolwa ukuthi udutshulwe ngeSonto ebusuku kodwa isidumbu size satholakala ekuseni sekufike othisha nabafundi.Umthombo osondelene nesikole uthe abafundi bebethukile bengakwazi nokufunda ngoba imoto ethwala izidumbu beyingakafiki ngesikhathi befika esikoleni.“Kuphoqeleke ukuthi othisha babadedele abafundi babuyele emakhaya ngoba bebethukile bengakwazi ukufunda. Akekho owaziyo ukuthi umufi udutshulwe ngasikhathi sini, ukuthi bebebengaki nabantu abafike bazomhlasela. Okwenza ukuthi kube novalo kakhulu wukuthi akukho okuthathiwe esikoleni noma kuye umufi, manje akuqondakali ukuthi ubulawelweni,” kusho umthombo.UMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe udaba lokuphepha ezikoleni seludinga ukuthi umphakathi ungenelele ukuze kuvikelwe izikole.“Siwumnyango sisodwa ngeke sikwazi ukuyinqoba impi yobugebengu obenzeka ezikoleni. Sekudingeka ukuthi umphakathi ubambe iqhaza. Abantu abenza ubugebengu ezikoleni baphuma kuwo umphakathi ngakho siyakholwa ukuthi uma ungabambisana nathi lesi sihlava sokubulawa konogada singanqontshwa,” kusho uMthethwa.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni yehlulekile ngoba kuthiwa umufi ubehlala yedwa emzini wakubo.
title: Kubulewe unogada esikoleni

text: IPHINI likaMengameli le-ANC uMnuz David Mabuza lithe ngeke libangise uMengameli wale nhlangano nezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa esikhundleni sakhe.UMabuza oyiPhini likaMengameli wezwe, uthe isikhundla sikaRamaphosa siphephile, akasiconseli amathe.“Ngiyohlala ngisebenza eduzane kukaRamaphosa. Ngiyazibona izinguquko. Asinike uRamaphosa ithuba. Izwe lizothuthuka. Ngiyazibona izinto ezinhle ziza,” kusho uMabuza.Uthe akasoze asifuna isikhundla sikaRamaphosa sobumengameli.Ukusho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi ehambele esifundazweni iMpumalanga njengoba ubuholi obuphezulu bale nhlangano bebugasele kulesiya sifundazwe ukuzozwa izikhalazo zomphakathi.Ubuya nje bese kunesikhathi enyamalele, ubesekhefini lokugula. Imibiko yabezindaba ithe uke waya naseRussia lapho elashwa khona.Ngesikhathi ekhuluma nezintatheli uphefumule nangokugula kwakhe lapho ethe ubuyile futhi ungumqemane.“Ngizobuyela eRussia ngoba yilapho benamafayela ami okugula. Ngaya kuleli lizwe ngigula ngingakwazi ukuhamba bangilapha khona.Ngizobuyela ngoba ngihlala ngihlale ngiye khona ukuze babheke ukuthi akukho nkinga bese beyilapha. Njengoba ukugula kuthinta mina ngqo, ngizihambela ngemali yami ukuyolashwa khona,” kusho uMabuza.Uthe njengoba eyiPhini likaMengameli, umthetho uthi kumele ahlale egadiwe ngakho onogada aya nabo eRussia bakhokhelwa nguMbuso.“Akukhona ukuthi angizithembi ezempilo zakuleli. Ngiyazethemba kakhulu, ukuthi amafayela ami okugula aseRussia.”Uthe endaweni abekuyona, elokishini iThandukukhanya kunenkinga yezindlu zangasese. Uthembise ukuthi izolungiswa indaba yazo.Uthembise nokuthi bazobuya njengoba kunabantu abafuna izindlu wakhumbuza abantu ukuthi bavotele i-ANC.
title: Ngeke ngimbangise uRamaphosa: Mabuza

text: UMOSES Bantsi, ongumengameli weConfederation of African Athletics (CAA Southern Region 5), uthi umqhudelwano i-Africa Athletics League, yisiqalo sokuzaleka komunye abafisa ukuthi ufinyelele ezingeni le-Diamond League.Lo mqhudelwano wethulwe ngokusemthethweni eMsunduzi Athletic Stadium, eMgungundlovu, ngoMgqibelo emini. Le nkundla izokuba ngeyokuqala ukusingatha lomqhudelwano ngoMgqibelo.“Lesi yisiqalo sento enhle kule sifunda. Lo mqhudelwano ozokuba kuyona lenkundla ngoSpethemba 22, nonyaka siwusungule ngemuva komhlangano esibe nawo eGoli lapho sibone kungcono ukuthi kube khona esikwenzayo ekutheni sithuthukise abagijimi ukuze bakwazi ukuqhudelana nabanye emazingeni omhlaba,” kubeka uBantsi.Uthi basabela kwikhwelo likamengameli we-IAAF uSebastian Coe, elithi akuthuthukiswe lomdlalo ngendlela esezingeni eliphezulu.“Siyisifunda sibe sesihlala phansi sabheka sazibuza ukuthi ngabe yiliphi iqhaza esingalibamba ekusabeleni kuleli ikhwelo.“Emhlanganweni esibe nawo eGoli siqhamuke nohlelo oluzothuthukisa imiqhudelwano yethu ngaphandle kokuthi imbe eqolo,” kuqhuba uBantsi.Uthi esikhathini esedlule ngokujwayelekile bebe nemiqhudelwano lapho ihlukaniswa khona ngokwezigaba okunge seYouth namaJunior.“Indlela endala ubuthola amazwe noma izinhlangano zihlanganisa amaqembu amabili nobekugcina kudla izimali ezishisiwe.“Ngale ndlela esiqhamuke nayo uthola ukuthi sekusetshenziswa indawo eyodwa yokudlala, eyokulala kanye nabaphathi bomqhudelwano bayahlangana kube yinto eyodwa.”Uphinde waveza ukuthi ngenxa yokuthi akuwona wonke amazwe ale sifunda anothile kwezomnotho nakwaziyo ukuthi ahambise abagijimi babo emazweni ase-Europe ukuyogijima khona ukuze bakwazi ukuziphendlela indawo emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu njengo World Championship, Olympic neDiamond League.“Sibe sesiqhamuka nokusungulwa kwalo mqhudelwano owuchungechunge, ozogijinyelwa emazweni amahlangu okuzokuba yiNingizimu Afrika, Mauritius, Zambia, Botshwana neZimbabwe. Ukuqoka lamazwe kungenxa yokuthi kuzokuba lula ukufinyelela kuwona kwabagijimi,” kuchaza uBantsi.Uthi lapha esifundeni esiseNingizimu kubagijimi abaphethe amarekhodi izindondo zemiqhudelweano emikhulu njengo-Olympic noCommonwealth Games.“Asimdingi umgijmi oqhamuka ngaphandle yize sizokuba nabo esizobamema ukuze siwuqinise ngokuwakhela isithunzi emazweni omhlaba.Lo mqhudelwano uzoqala eNingiziimu Afrika nonyaka bese kuthi ngonyaka ozayo usabalalele emazweni amathathu uma singeke sikwazi ukuwudlalela kuwona wonke.“Ukuze sikwazi ukuqhubekela phambili sidinga abaxhasi."Yingakho sibe nesivumelwano neWWS Group ukuthi kube yiyona esihlwayena abazosixhasa,” kusho uBantsi.UThemba Njilo, iMeya yoMsunduzi, uthe kuyena kube wukusuku olukhulu lokuthi kugcine kumenyezelwe ukusebenza kwale nkundla asethole ukuthi ingenye yezisezingeni lomhlaba.“Le nkundla siyakhe ngemali elinganiselwa kuR91 million."Ngesonto elizayo sizokube siyinikezela ngokusemthethweni komengameli bomdlalo wejubane."Abantu baseMgungundlovu namaphethelo abaphume ngobuningi babo ukuzokwethamela lomqhudelwano ozophakamisa igama ledolobha,” kusho uNjilo.
title: Kwethulwe umqhudelwano i-Africa Athletics League

text: UFUNA uMnyango wezeMpilo uqale uphenyo ngokushona kosana lwakhe lubelethwa owesifazane waKwaMashu.UNksz Dimakatso Mogoje (27) uthi usola ubudedengu babahlengikazi baKwaMashu Poly Clinic ngalesi sigameko.“Ngifuna kube khona isijeziso esinzima esizonikezwa laba bahlengikazi uma kutholakala ukuthi banecala ngokufa kwengane yami,” kusho uNksz Mogoje.Elanda ngesigameko esimehlele uthe ubekhulelwe esenezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ngenyanga ephelile, uJulayi.Uthe ngomhla ka-19 uphoqeleke ukuthi anikele kulo mtholampilo ngesikhathi ezwa izinhlungu esiswini .“Ngichaze kahle ngezinhlungu kubahlengikazi engabafica endaweni yabagulayo, base bethi angiphuthume egunjini lababelethayo. Bengisola ukuthi ngiyabeletha, noma bekungakaqhumi amanzi njengenjwayelo,” kusho uNksz Mogoje.Eqhuba uthe abahlengikazi ababili abafica egunjini lababelethayo bambuza ukuthi aseqhumile yini amanzi.“Ngithe uma ngiphendula ngithi cha, bavele bangihleka. Oyedwa wabo wangibuza ukuthi eyesingaki ingane engiyikhulelwe. Ngimtshelile ukuthi eyesibili. Uvele wathi njengomama ongaqali ukuzala, kufanele ngizazi izinkomba zokubeletha,” kusho uNksz Mogoje.Uthe ngaleso sikhathi laba bahlengikazi bamphindise endaweni yabagulayo bengazange bazihluphe ngokumxilonga.“Banqaba noma sengisho ukuthi ngiyayizwa ingane ifuna ukuphuma. Bese kubuhlungu emanyongeni kungasahambeki. Egunjini labagulayo nganikwa amaphilisi ezinhlungu ngagoduka,” kusho lo mama.Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ngalelo langa akalalanga ubusuku bonke ebhuqwa yizinhlungu.“Kuphoqile ukuthi isoka lami lingiphuthumise esibhedlela eKing Edward ngakusasa. Ngithe ngibambe ulayini, ngabonwa omunye umhlengikazi.Uvele wangiphuthumisa egunjini labakhulelwe ngaxilongwa. Odokotela bathe ingane isikhathele kakhulu futhi ingase ingaphili ngoba kudala izama ukuphuma,” kusho uNksz Mogoje.Uthe uhlinzwe ngokushesha yakhishwa ingane kodwa yashonela ngaphandle.“Ibuhlungu inhliziyo yami. Ukube ngithole ukunakwa ePoly Clinic ngabe kusheshe kwabonakala ukuthi ingane isengcupheni yokushona. Ngifuna bajeze abahlengikazi abangiphatha kabi bakhombisa ukungayilandeli imigomo kahulumeni eqhakambisa ukubeka abantu phambili. Sengisifakile isikhalazo,” kusho uNksz Mogoje.Ethintwa ngalolu daba okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo, uNksz Ncumisa Mafunda, uzwakalise ukudabuka ngokudlula emhlabeni kwengane.“Ukufika emhlabeni kwelungu elisha emndenini kuletha intokozo. Ngale kokwenzelela, iningi labahlengikazi bezempilo lisebenza ngokuzikhandla ngoba liqonda ubumqoka bomsebenzi eliwenzayo, bese kuba ilelo dlanzana labahlengikazi elizingaphathi kahle iziguli,” kuqhuba uNksz Mafunda.Uthe umnyango usuthole ukuthi isifunda esilawula isikhungo esithintekayo sesiyalele abaphathi balesi sikhungo ukuba benze uphenyo lwangaphakathi ngalolu daba.“Uma kukhona otholakala enecala uzothathelwa izinyathelo ezifanele,” kusho uNksz Mafunda.
title: Oshonelwe wusana ufuna kujeze onesi

text: UHLONISHWE ngomngcwabo osezingeni eliphezulu ugogo oneminyaka engu-82 obengesenabani waseMondlo, oshone ngenyanga edlule.UNkk Agreeneth Sibisi (82) ungcwatshwe emzini wakhe, izolo ngosizo lukahulumeni luka-Operation Sukuma Sakhe obuhambisana nazo zonke izinhlaka zikahulumuneni okubalwa kuzo namaphoyisa.USihlalo kaSukuma Sakhe okuwuhlaka olusingethwe ihhovisi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Hlengiwe Ndlozi, uthe ugogo bamthola ngesikhathi kugujwa usuku lokuzalwa kukaDkt Nelson Mandela nyakenye.“Ngesikhathi simthola ugogo wasichazela ukuthi akanasihlobo ngoba umyeni wakhe nezingane sebashona. Sacela ukumyisa ekhaya labadala kodwa wenqaba. Yingakho sanquma ukuba simnikeze usizo ehleli kwakhe eNceceni.“Kuthe ngenyanga edlule satshelwa yikhansela laku-ward 17, eNceceni ukuthi ugogo akasekho emhlabeni,” kusho uNkk Ndlozi.Uthe yilapho bengenelele khona bacela yonke iminyango kahulumeni okuhlanganisa namaphoyisa nosomabhizinisi bendawo ukuze bakwazi ukumngcwaba.“Nakuba ebengasenabani kodwa simhloniphe ngomngcwabo onesizotha ngoba umphakathi nawo ubuphume ngobuningi uzomphelezela okokugcina,” kuchaza uNkk Ndlozi.Uthe nakuba ugogo ebengenabani kodwa okuhle ukuthi ubenawo umazisi futhi eyihola impesheni.Uqhube wathi ubunzima buvele eseshonile bengakwazi ukumenzela incwadi yokumngcwaba kanti basizwe induna yendawo.
title: Ufihlwe kahle ugogo obeyintindili

text: ISAZI somnotho nezomthetho uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa sithi ukucinywa kukagesi kuzoba nomthelela omubi kwezomnotho.UDumisa uthe ukucinywa kukagesi yikona okuholele ekutheni iNingizimu Afrika ilengele kwinzikamnotho kumakota amabili alo nyaka.“Ukucinywa kukagesi kusho ukuphazamiseka kokusebenza kwezimboni ezihlukene. Lokhu kusho ukuthi imali isuke ingangeni ngalawo mahora okusuke kucinywe ngawo ugesi. Uma izinkampani zikhiqiza kancane kusho ukuncipha kwempahla eziyidayisayo nokuncipha kwemali engena emnothweni wethu.Ukucinywa kukagesi yizindaba ezimbi ikakhulukazi kulo mnotho wethu ongakhuli ngendlela egculisayo,”Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe abezindaba, ngabase-Eskom bathe ukucinywa kukagesi kudalwa wukufa kwemishini.Bathe kunama-boiler tube avuzayo futhi kufe ibhande elihambisa amalahle esiteshini sikagesi iMedupi ngoMgqibelo okuholele ekutheni lesi siteshi sibe namalahle amancane.Lokhu bathe kuholele ekutheni basebenzise ama-generator okusho ukuthi udizili wabo wehlile.Baxolisile kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika bathi ukucinywa kukagesi ngokohlelo lwesigaba sesibili okuwukucinywa kukagesi ezindaweni ezimbili amahora amabili kanye kanye kubalulekile ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izwe alibi sebumnyameni isikhathi eside.INingizimu Afrika yagcina ukucinyelwa ugesi ngoMashi emuva kwesishingishane esasihlasele eMozambique.Okwamanje akucaci ukuthi ugesi uzocinywa kuze kube nini njengoba abakwa-Eskom bethi bebengalindele ukuthi kuzofa imishini yabo.UNksz Natasha Mazzone okhulumela iDA kwezamabhizinisi kahulumeni uthe uphoxekile ukuthi i-Eskom icime ugesi ekubeni yayithembisile ukuthi ngeke ucinywe ngoSepthemba nango-Okthoba.Uthe lokhu kuzowisa umnotho wezwe ngoba kulahleka uR1 billion ngosuku uma kucinywa ugesi eNingizimu Afrika.“Uma singenawo ugesi kusho ukuthi izimboni azikhiqizi. Imali iyahamba ezweni ngoba ucwaningo luthi kulahleka uR1 billion njalo uma kucinywa ugesi. Sifuna i-Eskom ibe nozinzo kodwa akubukeki sengathi luzoba khona uma kusacinywa ugesi.”UMnuz Stanford Mazhindu okhulumela inyunyana yabasebenzi i-UASA uthe ukucinywa kukagesi kubi emnothweni wezwe, kuzokwandisa isibalo sabantu abangasebenzi.“Siyacela uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa amemezele izinhlelo zokulungisa i-Eskom ukuze kuphele ukucinywa kukagesi.Uma ugesi ucinywa izinsuku eziningi umnotho ngeke ukhule ngoba abaqashi bazonciphisa amahora asetshenzwa ngabantu. Abantu bangase bagoduke nemali encane njengoba kuza uDisemba uma ugesi ulokhu ucinywa njalo.” kusho uMazhindu.Uma ufuna ukubheka ukuthi ugesi ucinywa nini ngakini ungavakashela i-website kaMasipala weTheku ucindezele le-link Loadshedding link: bit.ly/11KH4duAbahlala kwezinye izindawo bangangenakwi-website yakwa-Eskom.
title: Kulahleka izigidi ngokucisha ugesi

text: KUVELA ukuthi kunombango oshisa phansi wezikhundla sokuba wuthishomkhulu nesephini lakhe esikoleni iMvuzo High esishiswe entathakusa ngeSonto.Lokhu kuvele emhlanganweni ophuthumayo obuyizolo eMvuzo High, eseFrance, eMgungundlovu.Ithumba liqhunjuzwe nguMnuz Dumisani Shandu owayeyiPhini likaSihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole esahlakazwa.Uthe ngesikhathi iMvuzo High ingakathutheli eFrance babengenazo izehlo zobugebengu futhi nothisha babeyimbumba ngoba baningi ababebheke isikhundla sokuphatha uma iMvuzo isiseFrance.“Isikole sesigqekezwe izikhawu eziwu-16 kodwa kuyamangaza ukuthi esidala sasingagqekezwa phezu kokuba sasingenawo amawindi. Ngeke ngithi inkinga wumphakathi ngoba siyasebenzisana nezinhlaka ezithintekayo futhi umphakathi uyiso lesikole kodwa kunombango oshisa phansi oqale emuva kokuqokwa kukathishomkhulu. Baningi ababesibhekile isikhundla. Kuthe uma kufakwa omunye umuntu kwaqala kwanezinkinga esikoleni,” kusho uShandu.Uthe kumanje iMvuzo High ayinaso isigungu esilawula isikole kodwa kunabantu ababesesigungwini esidala abavala amasango esikole.Njengoba izingane zakwezinye izikole beziyoqala ukufunda eMvuzo High bekungabonwa noyedwa umfundi futhi nothisha bathe bebesaba ukuya esikoleni emuva kokuthi sishisiwe kwaze kwalinyazwa nezimoto zabo emhlanganweni akade benawo ngoLwesibili.UMnuz Sandile Madlala onguthishomkhulu waseMvuzo High uthe banqume ukuthi baye eseketheni ngosuku lokuvulwa kwezikole bangayi esikoleni ngoba othisha bazibona bengaphephile. Uthe abafundi baphatha izikhali esikoleni, abazali abayihambeli imihlangano wathi udinga uxhaso emnyangweni nasemphakathini.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane, uthe iyamcika indaba yokubangwa kwezikhundla ngoba iphazamisa imfundo nekusasa lezingane. Ucele othisha ukuthi bangazibangi izikhundla ngoba miningi imisebenzi esazovela eMnyangweni wezeMfundo abale kuyo eyabaluleka ngezifundo, abaphathi bamasekethe nezinye izikhala ebezingagcwalisiwe.Uthe ulindele umbiko ozochaza ukuthi kungani kufinyelelwe esinqumeni sokuvala isikole. “Sizosilungisa isimo eMvuzo High futhi sizoseka isikole ngakho konke esikudingayo. Ngeke sibushintshe ubuholi obukhona. Labo abangazange bazithole izikhundla kufanele bamukele ukuthi abazitholanga baseke ubuholi obukhona esikoleni,” kusho uDlungwane.Uxwayise othisha abasebenzisa izingane ukufeza izinhloso zabo ukuthi baqaphele ngoba uma bebanjwa bazobikwa ophikweni olubhekelele ukusebenza kothisha bese bephucwa amalayisensi okusebenza.
title: Umbango wezikhundla esikoleni esishisiwe

text: SAMUKELWE ngo-elethu amaqembu ezepolitiki KwaZulu-Natal, isinqumo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokuvumela imihlangano yezepolitiki esigabeni sokuqala somvalelandlini.URamaphosa wehlisele izwe esigabeni sokuqala, exegisa imigomo kathaqa, wathi isivumelekile imihlangano yezepolitiki yabantu abawu-250 abahlanganyela endaweni evulelekile ngaphandle noma abangu-100 endaweni evalekile.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela, uthe isinqumo sikamengameli sizobanika ithuba lokuhlela izingqungquthela zezifunda okumele zisingathwe, bakhankase futhi baxhumane nemiphakathi kuqalwe uhlelo lokukhetha abantu abazomela i-ANC okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya.UMengameli we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe lokhu kuzobanika ithuba lokukhankasela ukhetho lokuchibiyela ngo-Ephreli, nolohulumeni basekhaya oluzoba phakathi kuka-Agasti noNovemba nonyaka.“Sisamukela ngokuqonda lesi sinyathelo ukuthi asikadluli kwiCovid-19. Basebaningi abantu abathelelekayo futhi siya ePhasikeni, uma kunobudedengu ingalandelwa imigomo sizongena kwisivuvu sesithathu saleli gciwane,” kusho uHlabisa.Umholi weDA KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthe kube isinqumo esibalulekile ngoba kuyiwa okhethweni.“Kumele siye kubantu sikhulume nabo ikakhulukazi emakhaya lapho imibuthano ihamba phambili khona. Umengameli bekumele acabangele namaciko, oDJ nabahleli bemicimbi abadlelwa imizi, izimoto abaokuhlakazeka nemindeni yabo ngoba abasakwazi ukuba nemicimbi,” kusho uMncwango.UMnuz Vusi Khoza onguSihlalo we-EFF KwaZulu-Natal, uthe basishayela ihlombe lesi sinqumo wathi bese bembhalele incwadi yabameli uRamaphosa befuna avule leli thuba.“Sijabule ngesinqumo ngoba sesizokwazi ukukhankasa futhi sibuyele ePhalamende ngoba amasela abezidlela imali ngenxa yokuthi imihlangano isingathwa ngohlelo lobuchwepheshe,” kusho uKhoza.UNobhala jikelele we-NFP uMnuz Canaan Mdletshe, uthe kubathokozisile ukuvulwa kwethuba lemihlangano yezepolitiki.“Ukhetho selusemome, siqale ukululungiselela ngo-2019 ngakho kumele siye kubantu siyokhuluma nabo ngezinto esizobenzela zona uma sinqoba ukhetho. Lokhu kuzosinika ithuba elihle lokuba senze amalungiselelo,” kusho uMdletshe.
title: Awezepolitiki athi azoqala akhankasele ukhetho

text: IPHINI lesibili eqenjini elikhulu le-Orlando Pirates, uBenson Mhlongo, libona ugcobho endleleni okuhlelwe ngayo iMultichoice Diski Challenge ephinde yadliwa yiLamontville Golden Arrows ngeSonto kulandela ukugingqa yona iBucs emdlalweni oqinisekise ukuthi Abafana Bes’thende basendleleni ebheke eSpain.Ayikho imininingwane egcwele okwamanje ngohambo lompetha beDiski Challenge okuthiwa lubheke eSpain hhayi eNetherlands okuyilapho i-Arrows iye khona ngemuva kokudla lesi sicoco ngo-2015. Namanye amaqembu ake asidla lesi sicoco njenge-University of Pretoria neMamelodi Sundowns avakashele eHolland kulandela ukuhlabana kwabo.Okukhathaza uMhlongo akuluthinti neze lolu hambo kodwa lo mqeqeshi osebenza ngaphansi kukaMilutin Sredojevic noRulani Mokwena ukhala ngendlela okuhlelwe ngayo lo mqhudelwano.“Angifuni ukuzwakala njengomuntu onyazayo kumbe odla amandla abakwaMultichoice ngoba umsebenzi wabo muhle. Akekho ongasiboni isandla seDiski Challenge kwi-Absa Premiership. Kuyinkinga kithina kodwa ukungabi nesikhathi esanele sokubahlola kahle abadlali asebekulungele ukunyukela esigabeni esikhulu. Mincane imidlalo uma ingu-15. Mincane kithina leyo midlalo ukubabona kahle abadlali ngoba kwesinye isikhathi abanye ababi khona ngoba belimele kanti kubuye kube khona nezigwebo zamakhadi,” kusho uMhlongo.Ngokwakhe kungangcono uma isizini ingagcwaliswa ibe nomdlalo womlenze wokuqala nowesibili.“Uma imidlalo ingu-30 maningi amathuba okuthi umdlali azibonakalise. Ngisho angaphazanyiswa amakhadi nokulimala kodwa uma isizini inemidlalo engu-30 nethuba lokululama likhona futhi liningi. KwiPirates kunabadlali abagcina bengakhushulwanga kodwa uthi usukucubungula lokho kukucacele ukuthi ube nebhadi mhlawumbe walimala isikhathi eside. Uma weqiwe imidlalo eyisithupha kwisizini enemidlalo engu-15 mancane kakhulu amathuba okuthi kube khona okwenzayo ngemidlalo esuke isele ngingasakubali-ke ukuthatha iso lomqeqeshi,” kusonga uMhlongo.Imidlalo yeMDC:NgeSonto: Cape Town City FC Reserves v Free State Stars Reserves (Parow Park, 10am); Kaizer Chiefs Reserves v AmaZulu Reserves (King Zwelithini Stadium, 11pm); Chippa United Reserves v Orlando Pirates Reserves (Wolfson Stadium, 12pm); Platinum Stars Reserves v Polokwane City Reserves (Royal Bafokeng Stadium, 12pm); Bloemfontein Celtic Reserves v Maritzburg United Reserves (King Zwelithini, 9am); Bidvest Wits Reserves v Golden Arrows Reserves (Bidvest Stadium, 1pm); SuperSport United Reserves v Baroka FC Reserves (TUT Stadium, 12pm); Ajax Cape Town Reserves v Mamelodi Sundowns Reserves (Ikamva Stadium, 12pm)
title: UMhlongo ubona ugcobho ngeMDC

text: NJENGOBA kusasa kusongwa imidlalo yeDStv Premiershi, akungatshwazwa ukuthi amehlo azobe ebheke ukuthi izinkunzi zaseSoweto, iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates zizokuthola yini ezikudingayo, ukuze kube khona okubambekayo ezithi zikwenzile kwiligi kwisizini ka-2020/2021.IziMpofana zizovala ngokuqhuthana neTS Galaxy, eMbombela Stadium kusasa ngo-3 ntambama. Ngesikhathi esifanayo iBucs izobe igadulisana neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto.Amaphuzu amathathu kwiChiefs angase ayinikeze ithuba lokungena kwiTop 8, okusho ithuba lokudlala kwiMTN 8 ekuqaleni kwesizini ezayo. IPirates yona izobe ilwela amaphuzu amathathu, ukuze ingabe isagudluka endaweni yesithathu ephethe ithikithi lokudlala kwiCaf Confederation Cup ngesizini ezayo. Amakhosi amelwe wukunqoba kwiGalaxy, okuyiyona evale kwiTop 8 ngaphambi kwemidlalo yokugcina.Ukuhluleka kwiChiefs wukunqoba kwiGalaxy, kuzobe kusho ukuthi le sizini ingenye yamabi ukuwedlula wonke emlandweni waleli qembu elaziwa ngezicoco.Kusengenzeka futhi konakale kakhulu kwiChiefs uma ingabuyi nalutho eMbombela ngoba iBloemfontein Celtic neBaroka FC bangayeqa uma benqoba imidlalo yabo yokugcina."Sizowuhlelela ngendlela efanele owokusonga isizini. Umqoka kakhulu lo mdlalo ngoba nakuwona sidinga iwini, hhayi okunye."Bazohluka kancane abadlali esizoya ngabo kwiGalaxy kodwa ukwazi ukuthi sisalelwe wumdlalo owodwa, okuyiwona futhi esingahlenga ngawo isizini, kwanele ukukhuphulela abadlali ukuzethemba," kusho u-Arthur Zwane oyibamba leChiefs.Awumkhulu kangako umehluko phakathi kokufunwa yiChiefs kulokhu okudingwa yiPirates ngale mizuzu engu-90 esele yesizini.IBucs kumele inqobe kwiTTM ukuze izibekisele indawo kwiConfed ngesikhathi esifanayo imincele ukuthi iGolden Arrows iyahlulwa yiStellenbosch FC eThekwini.Okungasiza iPirates wukuthi ishaye inqwaba yamagoli kwiTTM ngoba uma ingakwenzi lokhu, i-Arrows ingabeqa kube iyona eqeda isendaweni yesithathu. "Sisalelwe wumdlalo onzima futhi siya kuwona sazi ukuthi uma singatholi amaphuzu agcwele isizini yethu izoba ngemnyama ngaphezulu kwalokhu eyikhona."Kuhle ngoba siya kwiTTM sizethemba kulandela iwini kwiBaroka. Kucacile, (kuphakathi kokuthi) siyawina noma sivulela abanye ukuthi bangene," kusho uJosef Zinnbauer oqeqesha iPirates.UMandla Ncikazi oqeqeha i-Arrows, uthe bazimisele ngokuyivala ngezinga eliphezulu iligi. "Kayikho kangako ingcindezi ngomdlalo wokugcina kodwa kungaba kuhle ukusonga ngokuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele ekhaya, bese konke okunye okwenzekayo kube yibhonasi,“ kusho uNcikazi.
title: Kubhekwe izinkunzi zaseSoweto kusongwa iligi

text: AYIKHO into enochuku njengokungena nokuphuma kwemali uma kukhulunywa ngemali. Ibhizinisi lima nse ngenxa yokungangenikwemali.Ngisho abantu uqobo badinga ukubhekisisa indlela imali yabo engena iphinde isebenze ngayo baqinisekise isimo sabo somnotho.Uma uzwa kuthiwa isimo sezimali sikahulumeni simanzonzo kusuke kukhulunywa ngayo belu indlela imali engana iphinde isetshenziswe ngayo.Akupheleli nje ebhizinisini, lokhu kungena nokuphuma kwemali singakubuka kumuntu ngamunye noma izizinda ezifana neminyango kahulumeni noma uhulumeni wonkana.Okusemqoka ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imali engenayo ingaphezulu kwemali ephumayo. Lokhu akwenzeki sonke isikhathi njengoba ngezinye izikhathi zonyaka kudingeka imali eningi kunaleyo ekhona.Uma nje unebhizinisi umsebenzi walo okuwukuthunga inyufomu yezikole udinga imali eningi uma kuyophela unyaka ukuze ume ngomumo uma kuvulwa izikole ekuqaleni konyaka.Kanjalo uma uwumzali udinga imali ethe xaxa ngesikhathi sikaKhisimusi nokuvulwa kwezikole. Kuba ngcono-ke uma wazi ukuthi imali engaphezulu kokujwayelekile izodingeka nini ngoba uyakwazi ukuyihlelela. Yingakho iningi lidlala izitokfela ezikhokha ekupheleni konyaka. Kuyenzeka ukuthi uzunywe isimo obungasilindele esidinga imali ngokushesha.Kufanele ukwazi ukuthola imali ngokushesha kungaze konakale.Yilapha-ke odinga ukuba nendlela yokuboleka imali ngokushesha. Uma ungakwazi ukuhlelela ikusasa kahle uzithola usobishini lokudinga imali esheshayo njalo. Uma nje imali ephumayo ingaphezulu kwemali engenayo iyaqala inkinga. Uma kuphuma imali enkulu ngesikhathi esifushane kube kungengo zinhlelo zokuvala isikhala ngokushesha asuke esengena amazi endlini.Yingakho inkohlakalo ezinhlakeni zikahulumeni iyichilo elinomthelela omubi esizweni sonke.Kuba nzima kakhulu uma nokuqoqwa kwentela kungahambi ngendlela njengoba kuyikhona okufakela uhulumeni imali eningi.Inkinga yokungena kwemali nephumayo ivame kakhulu emabhizinisini amancane. Ingwadla abhekana nawo la mabhizinisi ukuthi kufanele abe nemali yokwenza umsebenzi ngaphambi kokuthi kube nemali ayongayo. Ithi ifika imali kufanele ikhokhele omunye umkhiqizo iphinde ikhokhe izikweletu.Uzwa osomabhizinisi bekhala ngokuthi imali iphelela ezandleni.Kuba ngcono uma uqala ibhizinisi ngemali yakho noma unabatshali zimali abazoba nesineke babekezele njengoba ibhizinisi lisakhula.Uma uyiboleka imali kufanele ibe nenzalo ephansi engeke igcine iwisa ibhizinisi. Lokhu kukusiza ukuthi ukwazi ukuboleka imali eyanele kuze kufike lesosikhathi ibhizinisi selisimeme.Emalini oyibolekayo kufanele ubale nemali yokukhokha sona isikweletu lesi okungenani izinyanga eziyisithupha.Akusho-ke ukuthi uboleke ngaphezu kwemali oyidingayo kodwa ukuboleka ngaphandle kokuhlela indlela osebenzisa ngayo imali yebhizinisi kuyingozi impela.Enye inkinga eyenza uhluleke ukuhlela kokungena kwemali nephumayo ebhizinisini ibangwa ukukhula ngokushesha kwalo ibhizinisi.Uma ibhizinisi likhula lidinga imali, uma likhula ngokushesha libeka ingcindezi kuyona indlela imali engena nephuma ngayo.Maningi amabhizinisi awayo ngenxa yokukhula ngokushesha agcine esenezinkinga angakwazi ukulawula indlela imali engena nephuma ngayo.Uma ungenayo indlela yokuthola imali ngokushesha kungcono ukugweme ukukhula okusheshayo.Ngiyazi ukuthi akuzwakali kahle lokhu kodwa kuyisifundo esibalulekile ebhizinisini.Ukwehluleka ukukhiqiza noma ukwenza umsebenzi kunomthelela omubi kakhulu ebhizinisini.Imali engenayo icishe ifane nesabelomali. Umehluko ukuthi isabelomali siwuhlelo lokusebenzisa imali okuncike emalini ekhona noma engenenayo.Isabelomali sisiza ukuthi uhlele izinto ezibalulekile ochitha kuzona imali.Njengoba isabelomali sikutshela ukuthi kufanele wenzeni ukuze ufike lapho uya khona.Akulula impela ukwazi ukuthi ikusasa liphetheni kodwa kubalulekile ukuhlelela izimo ezihlukene ezidinga imali.Kufanele imali ibe khona ngesikhathi edingeka ngaso.Lokhu kudinga uhlelo lokuthi wenzenjani uma kufika isimo esidinga imali ngesikhathi ingekho.Ngaphandle kwemali kuba nzima ukunyakaza kanti kungasho ukushabalala kwebhizinisi.Sebenzisa ulwazi lwe-cashflow ukuthi uhlele kahle ikusasa lomnotho wakho.- SIKHULA NGOMNOTHO
title: Ezezimali: Imali engenayo mayibe ngaphezulu kwephumayo

text: UMETHULI wohlelo lwasekuseni kwiGagasi FM, uMzokoloko, ufuna ukugwema ukuthi abafundi abaphothule u-matric ngonyaka odlule bafane naye ngokungaqhubeki nemfundo ngenxa yokuntula imali.UMzokoloko, owethula i-I Love Mornings With Mzokoloko ngo-6 kuya ku-9 ekuseni, uqale uhlelo lokupha izitshudeni imifundaze.Imifundaze uyikhipha ngaphansi kwenhlangano yakhe iMzokoloko’s Heart ngokubambisana neBerea Technical College.“Ngemuva kokuphothula * -matric ngangingenayo imali yokufunda. Ulwazi lwalungekho ngoba ukuba lwalukhona ngangizozama imifundaze. Uma uphasa kahle futhi unolwazi amathuba ayavuleka,” kusho uMzo.Uthe yingakho ezopha izitshudeni ezinhlanu imifundaze yokufunda noma yini zize ziphothule izifundo zazo.“Okumele bakwenze wukungithumelela imiphumela yabo kanjalo nencwadi eshoyo ukuthi kungani kumele baxhaswe. Ukuthumela kuzovalwa ngoFebhuwari 9 bese simemezela abawinile,” kuchaza uMzo.Uthe imininingwane uyifakile emakhasini akhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Uthe uyikhathalele imfundo nokuyingakho yena nethimba lakhe lasekuseni behambela izikole beyogqugquzela abafundi ukuze bazimisele.Lo msakazi ophinde abe nguDJ wasezindaweni zobumnandi ubuye wadalula ukuthi usehlukene nenkampani yokuqopha iMabala Noise Entertainment.Ngonyaka odlule ukhiphe ingoma ethi Ngena Enganeni kuyo le nkampani.“Isivumelwano ebenginaso bekungesengoma eyodwa. Sengiyazenzela manje. Ngifundile ngabe sengithi angizenzele izinto ngoba ngaleyo ndlela awukhombi muntu ngomunwe uma izinto zingenzeki,” kusho uMzo.Ngesonto eledlule ukhiphe ingoma entsha ethi Onjengawe apike kuyo iThee Legacy noDr Moruti.“Njengoba kuqala unyaka nje ngithe angikhiphe ingoma epholile futhi ifike kahle ngoba ngenyanga ezayo yinyanga yothando. Nayo ikhuluma ngothando futhi incoma abantu besifazane,” kusho uMzo.Ingoma iphume enkampanini yakhe iMzokoloko Events.
title: OweGagasi nosizo lwemifundaze kubafundi

text: KUME ukusebenza emafemini aseJacobs, eThekwini, akhelene neKings Victory Trading, emuva kokuqubuka komlilo kule femu.Izolo iKings Victory ishe yangqonga, uMasipala weTheku ukhiphe umyalelo wokuthi wonke amafemu akhelene nalena akhiphe abantu ukuze bangahogeli intuthu nokuthi baphephe.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi le femu esekhoneni lomgwaqo uShetland noChelmer iqashe inqwaba yabasebenzi futhi inamanye amabhilidi aseJacobs.Leli phephandaba lihoshe umoya wokuthi iKings Voctory Trading yinkampani eyodwa neJini Trading eyasha ngonyaka odlule yona eyayikuGavin Road.Abasebenzi abangathandanga ukudalulwa amagama bathe bezwe ngozakwabo bekhala ngokuthi kuyasha basebethatha okuseduze baphumela ngaphandle.Baveze ukuthi bezingekho izinsiza zokucima umlilo futhi inkampani yabo ayikaze ibafundise ukuthi bayokwenza njani uma kwenzeka kusha.“Sihola njalo emuva kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa asazi-ke noma sizowuthola umholo waleli sonto. Azikho izigubhu zokucima umlilo. Asazi noma amapayipi axhunyiwe ayasebenza yini. Okwamanje kulashwe abantu abathathu abahogele intuthu, akekho olimele kanzima,” kusho omunye umsebenzi.UMnuz Desmond D’SA oyisishoshovu sezemvelo kwiSouth Durban Community Environmental Alliance (SDCEA), uthe uMasipala weTheku akanalo uhlelo olucacile lokuvikela umphakathi uma kusha amafemu.ISHE yangqongqa ifemu yabomdabu baseChina eyenza izicathulo eJacobs kodwa akekho oshonile Isithombe: Nqobile Mbonambi/African News Agency(ANA)“Kunamafemu amaningi ayingozi eNingizimu yeTheku lana ko-Austerville naseWentworth ngakho kufanele kube nendlela yokususa abantu uma kuqubuka umlilo. Akuqali ukuthi kushe ifemu lapha eJacobs sekuyinto eyenzeka njalo ngoba kushe eyamafutha, eyezinsimbi enye yasha nangonyaka odlule,” kusho uD’SA.UMnuz Robert McKenzie wabezimo eziphuthumayo KwaZulu-Natal i-Emergency Medical Services (EMRS) uthe abantu ababili balashelwe endaweni yesigameko kwathi oyedwa waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.UDivisional Commander Trevor Stevens wezicishamlilo eThekwini uthe imbangela yomlilo isaphenywa.Abanikazi befemu banqabile ukuphawula ngesikhathi beficwa efemini.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela oyinhloko yezokuxhumana esabambile kumasipala uthe banezinhlelo ezicacile zokucima umlilo uma kunezimo eziphuthumayo eziqinisekisa ukuthi umphakathi uyavikeleka. Wathi isaphenywa imbangela yokuqala komlilo kodwa abantu kula mafemu baceliwe ukuthi baphume ukuze baphephe.
title: Isidumo kusha ifemu eThekwini

text: UMHOLI kazwelonke weDemocratic Alliance (DA) uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, uthe uzohola umbhikisho ozolubangisa ekomkhulu le-African Global Operations ebeyaziwa phambilini ngokuthi iBosasa.Lokhu kulandela ukuvela kokuthi iBosasa yanikeza uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uR500 000.“Ukuzivumela kukaRamaphosa akwenze muva nje ukuthi iBosasa yanikela ngoR500 000 ekukhankaseleni kwakhe ekubeni enguMengameli we-ANC, akwehlukene nokukhwabanisa nokuthi kudinga ukuphenywa kabanzi,” kusho ihhovisi likaMaimane.Uthe iBosasa isike yanikela ngemali emalungwini ePhalamende amaningi e-ANC, kongqongqoshe, izikhulu ezithile, nasemndeni kamengameli.Kubikwa ukuthi iBosasa isithole uR10 billion ngamathenda kahulumeni.Uthe isitholwe nayiSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU) ithinteka ekukhwabaniseni nasenkohlakalweni.“Imali yeBosasa ingcolile. Umengameli kumele aziphendulele ebudlelwaneni anabo obuhambisana nenkohlakalo kwezamabhizinisi nale nkampani,” kusho uMaimane.Kusolwa ukuthi isikhulu sakwaBosasa uMnuz Gavin Watson, sanikela endodaneni kaRamaphosa u-Andile.Emva kwezinsuku ezingu-10 uRamaphosa washintsha ayekushilo ePhalamende, wathi le mali kwakuwumnikelo wokuqhuba umkhankaso wakhe wokuba umengameli, wathi wayengenalo ulwazi ngayo.Phambilini ePhalamende uRamaphosa wayekade ethe ngokwazi kwakhe, le mali yakhokhelwa indodana yakhe u-Andile ngomsebenzi ewenzela iBosasa.
title: Imali yeBosasa ingcolile – DA

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIA SIKHO isidingo sokuthi abadlali beLamontville Golden Arrows bachazele abantu ngoba okwenzeke kuyona kufana nobekudaliwe futhi akukho okunye abasengakwenza ukugwema isimo abakusona.Lawa ngamazwi kaPhilani “Maoti” Shange ongomunye wabadlali abadala kuBafana Bes’thende abadliwe yizembe ngoLwesibili beshaywa AmaZulu ngo 1-0 ePrincess Magogo, KwaMashu. NgoMgqibelo bavale isizini ngesibhaxu beshaywa yi-Orlando Pirates ngo 3-1 eMoses Mabhida Stadium.Ngokusho kukaShange akuphelile nge-Arrows. Izovuka, futhi uma isibuya ukhakhayi luzobe seluqine ngokwanele ukuthi iphinde ihlale isikhathi eside esigabeni esikhulu i-Absa Premiership.“Akekho ongaphathekile kabi kithina njengabadlali. Okusehlele kubuhlungu. Kubuhlungu futhi ukubona abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bephuke umoya ngale ndlela. Siyazi singabadlali ukuthi sibenzele phansi. Siyazazi izinkinga ezidale ukuthi isimo size sifike kuleli zinga, yikhona nje ukuthi izinkinga zeqembu ngeke ngizineke ephephandabeni,” usho kanje uShange enkulumweni abe nayo neSolezwe.“Akuphelile ngaBafana Bes’thende. Lokho ngiyakufungela. Alikho ikhaya elingabi nazo izinkinga kodwa okumqoka wukuthi siphuma kanjani kulolu bishi esizifake kulona. Ngabe ngidlala ngabo ozakwethu, sizame konke ebesingakwenza kodwa-ke kwacaca sekuya ngasekugcineni ukuthi uMdali wayehlele ukuthi kube yithina esehlela kuNational First Division (NFD) kulokhu.”UShange, osineminyaka eyisishiyagalombili egijima ku-Arrows akakhombisi izimpawu zokuba nenkinga nokwehlela esigabeni esingezansi naleli qembu.“Engikwaziyo wukuthi nginenkontileka neGolden Arrows ngakho-ke okushiwo yimina akubalulekile kangako. Yibona abaphethe impilo yami njengoba nginenkontileka. Konke kusezandleni zikaSisi Mato (uMato Madlala ongusihlalo we-Arrows),” usho kanjeezwakala nokho ukuthi ushayekile emoyeni.Njengoba ekhuluma kanjena, uThanduyise Khuboni, ukaputeni we-Arrows, ucashunwe kuma-website ebhola naye efunga egomela ukuthi iqembu lizobuya kuNFD futhi uma selibuya lizokube seliqine kakhulu kunakuqala. Akazange nokho aphumele obala uma ebuzwa ukuthi uzokwehla nalo yini iqembu abelihola esigabeni esikhulu.Iyaqala ukudliwa yizembe i-Arrows kusukela yakhushulelwa esigabeni esikhulu ngo-2000. Ihamba nje isike yaba ngompetha beMTN 8 ngo-2009. Yize idliwe yizembe i-Arrows kodwa iwutholile u-R400 000 ngokuphuma unombolo 16.
title: Akekho ongaphathekile kabi kithina: Shange

text: UTHUKA izanya umndeni wowesifazane okuthiwa ubhunyelwe wuyise wezingane zakhe ngophethroli wase emokhela ngomlilo maqede wasabisa ngokuhlasela umndeni wonke eKhangela (eNkunzana), KwaNongoma.UNksz Nompumelelo Mthembu (28) ushone ngoMgqibelo. Icala lakhe - wenqabe ukuthi babuyelane noyise wezingane.Umufi, onezingane ezintathu, kuthiwa ubesebuyele kubo emuva kokuba uyise wezingane emshaye waze wamdlokodla ubuntu bakhe ngesagila ngoMashi. Babekade bexabene ngenxa yemali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni yezingane.UNksz Mthembu wahlala isikhathi eside esibhedlela ekhishwa isagila kwaze kwaphoqeka ukuba akhishwe nesibeletho, kusho umndeni.Kwavulwa icala lokushaya, waboshwa umsolwa kodwa waphuma ngebheyili emuva kokuthi umufi esule icala.Emuva kwalokho umndeni kaNksz Mthembu wabe usumlanda nezingane zakhe ezineminyaka emihlanu, emithathu nezinyanga ezine.NgoMeyi 1 isoka kuthiwa lamhlasela lifuna ukuthi babuyelane ngenkani futhi abuyele kubo nezingane zabo.Ongumalokazana kaMthembu, uNkk Promise Mthembu, uthe kabasalali ngoba umsolwa akaboshiwe futhi ubasabisa ngokubabulala bonke.“Wambhunyela ngophethrloli wase emokhela ngomlilo kubuka abantu. Umufi wagijima waya emfuleni ezama ukuzicima. Umsolwa wamlandela wamcindezela ngetshe emanzini. Okwenza sisabe kakhulu wukuthi umsolwa akaboshiwe. Kumanje uyasifonela uyasisabisa ukuthi uzosishisa sonke nezingane zakhe ngomlilo. Ufuna izingane zakhe ngenkani. Manje siyesaba ukuthi uzosilimaza. Siwabikelile amaphoyisa nawo ayalandula ngoba athi awamtholi. Kubo kuthiwa akaziwa. Singabantu besifazane sihlala sodwa. Sesize sayekisa nezingane esikoleni ngoba asazi noma uzosihlasela yini. Sizokhululeka uma eseboshiwe,” kusho uNkk Mthembu.Umufi kuthiwa waze wathola usizo sekubizwa amadoda endawo. Umsolwa wabaleka. Umufi uyiswe esibhedlela, ubelaliswe egunjini labagula kakhulu waze washona ngoMgqibelo.Ikhansela le ndawo, uNkk Nokubekezela Xulu, ophinde abe yiPhini leMeya kuMasipala waKwaNongoma, uthe kumphethe kabi ukubulawa kwabesifazane ngamasoka abo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe bekuvulwe icala lokuzama ukubulala kodwa manje sekungelokubulala. Umsolwa usadukile.“Bekunelinye icala abebhekene nalo lokushaya umufi,” kusho uGwala.
title: Usabisa ngokuhlasela umndeni 'obulale' unina wezingane ngokumshisa ngophethroli

text: Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi abalolu hlelo baphinde balahlwa yicala lokudicilela phansi isithunzi nokuhlukumeza ilungelo lasesithe lo mndeni wakwaMakau.Kulokhu ukuhlulwa kweNo Excuse: Pay Papgeld kuhambisana nenhlawulo ka-R20 000 okufanele ikhokhwe ungakashayi uMsombuluko (namhlanje).Le mali izokhokhelwa uMnuz Mojapela Makau ofake isimangalo kwiBroadcasting Complaints Commission of South Africa (BCCSA) ngokuhlaselwa kwakhe ngosuku lo mshado wakhe owawuseLeondale, eRoodekop, ngoDisemba 8 nyakenye .UMakau uthe wathintwa umngani wakhe ethi umbone kuthelevishini esiqeshini sokukhangiswa kohlelo iNo Excuse: Pay Papgeld ngoJanuwari 23 nangoFebhuwari 9. Uhlelo lwaluveza amazwibela esizini eyayizoqala egabe ngeziqephu ezishisayo.UMakau uthe naye wagcina ezibonele amazwibela, washaqeka.Uthe kwavezwa imifanekiso okwakungavunywanga ukuthi abesiteshi bayithathe.“Abohlelo beholwa ngumethuli walo uMoss Makwati bagasela bengamenyiwe emshadweni, bangena etendeni. Ngenxa yokuthi babengagunyaziwe ukuba semshadweni, kwaba nokuhilizisana. Kwithelevishini kuphinde kuvele neziqubu ezinodlame olwasuka ngaphakathi etendeni phakathi kwabethelevishini nababesemshadweni,” kusho uMakau.UMakau uveze ukuthi amazwibela abebonakala kwithelevishini kwavela nomalume wakhe okhonza ebandleni leZayoni nogcine esequliswa kabi ngokubonakala kwithelevishini.Ukhale kakhulu ngokumosheka komshado wakhe ngenxa yokuquliswa kwakhe ngokungondli ingane yakhe.AbeMoja Love baziphendulele bathi babengenalo ulwazi lokuthi uMakau wayeshadelwa ngosuku abagasela ngalo.Baqhube bathi babehlose ukuya emzini wakhe bamcele aziphendulele ngezinsolo zokungondli kuphela. Baveze ukuthi umethuli wohlelo owangena etendeni, ithimba ayehambisana nalo lasala emgwaqeni. Bathe umqondisi wohlelo wanxusa uMakwati ukuba ayokhuluma noMakau ngoba embona ezihlalele yedwa. Kulapho uMakau aholela khona uMokwati ngaphandle kwetende. UMakau kuthiwa wayekhulumela phansi echazela uMakwati ukuthi isikhathi abafike ngaso asisihle ukuthi kungaxoxwa, wathembisa ukuthi babuye baxoxe. AbeMoja Love basole unkosikazi kaMakau njengowafaka ukushisa nokwaholela odlameni ngesikhathi ebona indoda yakhe inoMakwati.Mayelana nesikhalo sokuthi izicukuthwane ezazisemshadweni azeneme, abeMoja Love bathe ezikhangisweni babuhliphiza ubuso ukuze zingabonakali ukuthi zingobani. IMoja Love ixolisile ngokwenzeka.Ngenxa yesimangalo nobufakazi, iBCCSA inqume ukuthi uhlelo lungasakazwa. Amazwibela ezithombe obekukhangiswa ngawo acishwe angaphinde asakazwe. Iphinde yayalela abalolu hlelo ukuthi baxolise emndenini wakwaMakau.Okhulumela iMoja Love uLindiwe Mbonambi ucele ukuthunyelwa imibuzo kodwa kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engakaphenduli.
title: AbePay Papgeld baphide balahlwa elinye icala

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uthi kumhlaba umxhwele ukubona abantu abasebasha bengafuni ukudlulwa amathuba okusungula amabhizinisi abo, ikakhulukazi uma ithuba livela kulesi sikhathi sokubhebhetheka kweCoronavirus .URamaphosa ukusho lokhu encwadini yakhe yamasontonke ephuma ngoMsombuluko lapho ekhuthaza khona abantu bakuleli ngokuthi basukume kube khona abazenzela kona kulesi sikhathi esinzima seCovid-19.“Ngazisa abantu abasebasha ikakhulukazi emalokishini ukuthi abasebenzise amathuba akhona azobawelisela ekubeni ngosomabhizinisi.Wenze isibonelo ngeCloudy Deliveries eseLanga, eCape Town.Uthe okwenziwa yintsha yakule ndawo esisungule ibhizinisi lamabhayisikili ukuthuthela abantu impahla esuka ezitolo babahambisele emakhaya emalokishini, kuyamjabulisa.Ubale nokwenziwa yintsha kwezinye izindawo njengaseLimpopo lapho abantu besungula khona amabhizinisi ngemali encane abanayo, nabo ubethulela isigqoko njengoba sekunabanye abantu asebebaqashile.Uthe osekukhonjiswe abantu bakuleli ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule selokhu kwaqala icovid-19, kumenza aziqhenye ngabo.“Okukhonjiswe osomabhizinisi abasebancane, yindlela yokulwa nokusabalala  kwecoronavirus esilethe ushintsho olukhulu endleleni esiphila ngayo nesiqhuba ngayo amabhizinisi,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe okwenziwa abantu abasha, kuhambisana nokwenziwa uhulumeni ebambisene nosomabhizinisi, izinyunyana zabasebenzi, izinhlangano zomphakathi, ongoti kwezomnotho namaqembu ezepolitiki ukuhlahla ikusasa emva kokudlula kweCovid-19.URamaphosa uthe akulona kuphela elakuleli elibhekene nale ngcindezi yaleli gciwane, kwazise nomhlaba wonke ubhekene nesimo esifanayo.Ngokuka Ramaphosa, nakuba kukhona uR500 billion owakhishwa uhulumeni ekufukuleni umnotho wakuleli, kumele kube khona izindlela ezinye ezicacile eziwuhlelo oluzosetshenziswa emva kweCovid-19.
title: URamaphosa utusa abasemalokishini abasungula amabhizinisi kulesi sikhathi seCovid-19

text: IQALE phansi intukuthelo novalo kumalungu omphakathi waseMthwalume kudedelwa obesolwa ngokuba umalugaju okuthiwa kudalwe wubufakazi obungene ngemuva kokuthi isidumbu somsolwa wokuqala kuleli cala sitholwe silenga esitokisini eScottburgh, ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Bekulindeleke ukuthi abasolwa ababili ababoshwe ngesonto eledlule ngokubulawa kwabantu besifazane, izidumbu zabo ezitholakale zilahlwe esimobeni eMthwalume babingelele imantshi, eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzumbe kodwa kwangabe kusenzeka.UMnuz Jeffrey Phehlukwayo onguyise wabesifazane ababili uNksz Akhona (25) noNosipho Gumede izidumbu zabo ezatholwa zilahliwe esimobeni ngo-Ephreli nonyaka, uthe kumzwise ubuhlungu kakhulu ukudedelwa komsolwa.“Lo msolwa odedelwe ngiyamazi futhi sakhelene. Akukho obekungisolisa ukuthi nguyena kodwa ngemuva kokuboshwa kwakhe nokutholakala nezinye izimpahla zabagilwa, ngibe nesiqiniseko sokuthi uyathinteka ekufeni kwabesifazane endaweni. Angazi ngizombhekelwa ngubani njengoba ekhishiwe nje,” kusho uPhehlukwayo.Isolezwe lithole ngamanye amalungu omphakathi angathandanga ukuvela ukuthi kubo kamsolwa sekusele amanxiwa njengoba kuthiwa bathuthe ngeSonto ngemuva kwezinsuku ezimbili eboshiwe.UNksz Hlengiwe Gambushe, oyisishoshovu somphakathi okuthiwa nguyena owayehola imashi ngenyanga edlule ukuthi udaba lokubulawa kwabesifazane lusukunyelwe, wathi kumthukuthelise kakhulu ukudedelwa komsolwa wasendaweni.“Yibuphi ubufakazi obudingwa yinkantolo? Engani izimpahla zokugqoka okubalwa khona namaselula amathathu okungokwabagilwa kwatholakala kuye? Ngizizwa ngiphelelwa amandla sesisebenze kangaka ukuthi kuboshwe izigilamkhuba. Kwakhona ukufa komuntu esitokisini kwenzeka kanjani engaphansi kweso lamaphoyisa?” kubuza uNksz Gambushe.UNksz Bongekile Sithole naye oyilungu lomphakathi uthe abesifazane basasengcupheni yokubulawa.“Ngeke siphele amandla. Siyazi siyafuna ukuthi iqiniso ligcine lisobala. Kuyacaca ukuthi kukhona umuntu onamandla kakhulu laba abamsebenzelayo ngoba umsolwa omunye sizwile kuthiwa uzame ukuzibulala, abekephi amaphoyisa? Ukuthathephi azame ukuzidlisa ngakho engaphakathi esitokisini?” kukhala uNksz Sithole.Oyinduna esigodini sasemaThulini, uMnuz Jabulani Mngoma, uthe kubathukuthelise kakhulu okwenziwe yinkantolo.“Okwenzeke enkantolo kusikhombise ngokusobala ukuthi ubulungiswa abukho emaphoyiseni. Abukho ngisho phezulu uma kukwazi ukuthi umuntu kungathiwa ufele ezitokisini. Kungani kuthiwa kufe lo ophambili kuthiwe osele osemuva?” kubuza uMngoma.Umphakathi ubuvuke ngesikabhadakazi wadela amakhaza abeshubisa umnkantsha wazobhikisha ngaphandle kwamasango enkantolo.Nakuba izinkantolo ziqala ukusebenza ngehora lesishiyagalombili kodwa kuthe kushaya ihora lesikhombisa bese kuvele kuphithizela ngaphandle kwale nkantolo abanye bedlubhe izimpahla ezinemibala yamaqembu ezepolitiki.Bebecula ndawonye bebeke eceleni ukwehlukana ngokwezepolitiki bephakamise izingqwembe ebezigcizelela ukuthi abasolwa baboshwe banganikwa ibheyili.Kusuke esinamathambo ngesikhathi iveni obekusolakala ukuthi inabasolwa ingena enkantolo nalapho amalungu omphakathi ebesho ukuyibamba ngezandla.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe likhuluma nabathile ngaphambi kokuqala kokungena kwenkantolo, bonke bebenethemba lokuthi abasolwa bazovalelwa bangaphinde babuye emphakathini. Bebekhona nabesebezwile ngokufa komunye wabasolwa yize bekungakaqinisekiswa.Ngenxa yombhedukazwe iCorona, yizintatheli namalungu omndeni nabaholi abathile bomphakathi kuphela abavunyelwe ukungena enkantolo. Kuphele ihora kuhleziwe kodwa esinye sezisikhonzi zenkantolo sitshele amalungu omphakathi nezintatheli ukuthi umshushisi omkhulu ulichithile icala wathi ubufakazi abenele.Zijikile izinto kwakhuphuka imimoya ngesikhathi abaholi bomphakathi bechazela amalungu omphakathi abengalinganiselwa ku-300 abegcwele ngaphandle, ngokuchithwa kwecala. Basole ukungasebenzi ngendlela kwamaphoyisa nesandla semfene kulolu daba.Kube nesasasa ngesikhathi kutheleka uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Bheki Cele kodwa ogcine sebemhhewula ngesikhathi egcizelela ukuthi akuhlakazekwe njengoba amalungu omphakathi abenganyakazi emasangweni enkantolo efuna ukuzibonela umsolwa odedeliwe.Uphiko lwabesifazane kwi-ANC KwaZulu-Natal luthe kuyabakhathaza ukuthi umsolwa ufe engaphansi kweso lamaphoyisa.USihlalo walolu phiko, uNksz Nonhlanhla Gabela, uthe badinga izimpendulo kulolu daba.“Sinxusa uCele ukuthi angenelele ngokushesha. Sikholwa wukuthi kukhona olunye ulwazi olufihliwe,” kusho uNksz Gabela.
title: Intukuthelo kudedelwa ‘umsolwa’

text: MHLELI: Lidinga ukushayelwa ihlombe iJaji uRaymond Zondo ngesinqumo sokuvumela ukubhenywa kwensangu.Zimbalwa nje izinto abantu abasuke bazizibe uma kukhulunywa ngensangu.
