Okokuqala wukuthi awukaze uzwe kuthiwa kuliwe kwagwazwana lapho kubhenyelwa khona insangu.Okwesibili angikaze ngizwe ukuthi kukhona umuntu ofile ebulawa ukuthi ubheme weqisa ensangwini.Okwesithathu angikaze futhi ngizwe ukuthi kukhona umuntu oseyiswe esikhungweni sokusiza imilutha yezidakamizwa ngoba ehluleka ukuyeka insangu.Okwesine angikaze ngizwe ukuthi kukhona abantu asebehluleka ukuba amadoda emizi ngoba nakhu begxile ensangwini.Izinto engizibale ngenhla ziyabalwa otshwaleni, oselokhu kwathi nhlo busemthethweni.Baningi kakhulu abantu asebebulawe yizifo ezidalwa wukudla izinto ezinoshukela kepha ushukela usemthethweni.Kuqale kulo nyaka ukuthi imikhiqizo enoshukela ibanjelwe intela ethe xaxa kuneminye imikhiqizo.Kubalulekile ukuthi ngalesi sinqumo singabi ngabantu abangothathekile abazokwenza sengathi sekuzobhema wonke umuntu manje.Akunakwe lokhu okulandelayo:* Akushiwongo ukuthi ukudayisa insangu sekusemthethweni. Izotholakalaphi pho?* Akushiwongo ukuthi izingane ezincane nazo sezingayibhema insangu. Abantu bakuthathaphi ukuthi kuzophazamiseka izingane esikoleni?* Akushiwongo ukuthi ayibhenywe ezikoleni. Bangenaphi pho abafundi ekubhenyweni kwensangu?* Akushiwongo ukuthi isingabhenywa esidlangaleni. Bakhathazwa yini abantu uma ngibhema kwami?Kungaba yinto enhle ukuthi abantu bazihlele kahle izinto abafuna ukuzisho uma befuna ukuphikisa lesi sinqumo. Umuntu obevele ebhema insangu uzoqhubeka nokuyibhema.Angiboni ukuthi yini engadala ukuthi umuntu obengabhemi aqale manje ukubhema, ngoba nakhu isisemthethweni, ngoba kwasekuqaleni ngesikhathi ingekho emthethweni, yini ngempela ebimbambe ukuthi abheme?Asithathe lesi sinqumo sisifundisise bese thina ndlu emnyama sibheka ukuthi yimaphi amathuba omsebenzi esingaqhamuka nawo.Ngicela ukucacisa ukuthi angihambisani nokuxhashazwa kwezidakamizwa ngoba zonke zithuntubeza ingqondo.Zamani KhumbuzaEMGUNGUNDLOVU
title: [IMIBINO] Angikhumbuli kubikwa imithelela emibi ngensangu

text:
KUGCINE “kungcwatshwa” ithini likafishi lapho kukhishwe khona isidumbu sowesilisa okutholwe ukuthi kuphambane izinkomishini, kwangcwatshwa umuntu okungayena eSgqumeni KwaSwayimane.Lesi sigameko senzeke ngoMsombuluko ngemuva kokuvela kokuthi izidumbu zemindeni emibili, owakwaGasa nowakwaDlamuka, ziphambene kade zilandwa emakhazeni.UMnuz Bongumusa Gasa bekulindeleke ukuba afihlwe ngoMgqibelo odlule kodwa kwangezeka. Kuvele ukuthi isidumbu sakhe siphambane nesikaMnuz Jeff Dlamuka.Le ndaba isematheni kule ndawo kwazise imindeni ethintekayo isondelene. Yomibili ayifunanga ukuxoxisana ne
Solezwe ngalolu daba.Ngokuthola kwe
Solezwe umndeni wakaDlamuka wafihla ngoLwesine olwedlule umuntu okungayena. Balanda isidumbu emakhazeni akwaSibiya eWartburg.Kuthiwa amalungu amane alo mndeni adideka ngesikhathi elanda isidumbu ngoba befana laba bobabili abashone ngokugwazwa.Umthombo we
Solezwe uthe kube yinsumansumane sekumele kumbiwe isidumbu ebese singcwatshiwe.“Kwambiwa kwaDlamuka ngoLwesine, wagcina ngokufihlwa kwaba ukuphela. Kuthe ngoLwesihlanu babizwa kaGasa ukuzobona isidumbu sakhona ngoba sebethole ukuthi akusona esabo. Kufike kwacaca ukuthi nguDlamuka uqobo lona obezofihlwa kwaGasa. Kwacaca ukuthi kungcwatshwe umuntu okungeyena. NgoMsombuluko kumbiwe kwaDlamuka sekukhona nomndeni wakwaGasa. Isidumbu bese sinephungana kodwa bakwazile ukusibona ukuthi ngesabo. Ukhishiwe engcwabeni kwabe sekufakwa ithini likafishi kwavalwa ingcwaba,” kusho umthombo.Isolezwe kade livakashele le mindeni ibhoke yakhahlela yathi akukho ezokuphawula. KwaGasa bekunowesifazane obehlezi emakhandleleni ongafunanga negama othe: “Asinankinga layikhaya. Isidumbu sizobuya sifihle. Akukho lutho okonakele. Akukho okunye engizokusho.”NakwaDlamuka kube esifanayo, owesifazane ozibize ngoNkk Dlamuka uthe: “Akekho ozokhuluma nani ngalolu daba. Asithandi ukuphawula. Abekho nabadala.”Bekunamatende egcekeni kuyo yombili le mizi, kuphithizela nabantu kubonakala ukuthi kukhona okwehlile.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kuthiwe zombili izidumbu zibuyiselwe emakhazeni. Bekulindeleke ukuba kufihlwe kwaDlamuka izolo. KwaGasa kuthiwa kuzofihlwa ngeSonto.Kuthintwa abakwaSibiya’s Funeral eWartburg, owesifazane ozibize ngoSiko (owale waphetha negama eligcwele), uthe ngumnikazi wale ndawo ongakwazi ukukhuluma nabezindaba, kodwa akekho.Kuthe noma kucelwa izinombolo zakhe zeselula wala waphetha nazo.Amaphoyisa awazange aphawule ngalesi sigameko.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi amaphoyisa awazange athintwe ngesigameko njengoba imindeni ivele yahlangana nomnikazi wamakhaza bazilungisela isimo.Akuzange kucace ukuthi udaba lubikiwe yini enkantolo ukuze kumbiwe isidumbu.USihlalo wezinyanga KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sazi Mhlongo, ethintwa izolo ngosiko olujwayele ukwenziwa uma kukhona isidumbu esimbiwe uthe uyakuqabuka okokufaka ithini likafishi.“Ngokwesintu kufakwa umuthi okuthiwa umalibeni lapho kusuke kungcwatshwe khona isidumbu. Kube sekuhlatshwa nenkomo njengoba kusuke kwenziwe isidumbu sifihlwa. Okwethini likafishi ngiyakuqala. Ufunda uze ufe. Kungenzeka ukuthi isimanjemanje leso. Kudala kwakufakwa isilwane ethuneni, kubhekwe noma isele. Awasemaningi kodwa manje amasele,” kusho uMhlongo.
title: Bafihle ithini kuphambene izidumbu

text: ILUNGU lomndeni wakwaGupta elisolwa ngokuba yingxenye yalabo abebebambe abaholi bakuhulumeni ngobhongwane selikukhahlele ngazo zombili ukuthi lake lahlangana nowayeyiPhini likaNgqongqoshe weziMali kuleli uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas. UMnuz Ajay Gupta ngoLwesine ushicilele incwadi evuthayo esola uJonas ngokuhubhuza amanga kwikhomishini ephenya ngokugwamandwa kwamandla ombuso yidlanzana kuleli.UJonas ungomunye wofakazi asebethule ubufakazi obushaqisayo kwikhomishini njengoba adalula imininingwano ngemizamo ‘yokugwazelwa’ abakwaGupta athi bamthembisa uR600 million uma ezozwa ngabo uma esengene esikhundleni sokuba nguNgqongqoshe weziMali.“Angikaze ngithembise muntu isikhundla sokuba ungqongqoshe njengokusho kwakhe. Angikaze ngithembise ukumkhokhela uR600 000 esandleni noma uR600 million kwi-akhawunti. Angikaze ngibe nolwazi ngokuguqulwa kwekhabhinethi futhi angikaze ngibe nesandla ekuqokweni kongqongqoshe,” usho kanje.  U-Ajay uqhube waveza ukuthi unabo ubufakazi bokuthi wayesemahhovisi e-Oakbay eSandton ngesikhathi okuthiwa kwakubanjwe ngaso umhlangano eSaxonworld, eGoli.Ngesikhathi efakaza uJonas wathi akanaso isiqinisekiso sokuthi ilona liphi ilungu lomndeni wakwaGupta ahlangana nalo kodwa wayelibona emaphephandabeni. Eqhubeka nokufakaza esebukisise izithombe wadalula ukuthi wahlangana no-Ajay, kodwa wathi kungenzeka futhi kube nguMnuz Rajesh Gupta.
title: ‘Angikaze ngibe nesandla ekuqokweni kongqongqoshe’ - Ajay Gupta

text:
LUNGI LANGAO DOKOTELA bafuna ohulumeni bamazwe baluthathe njengenkinga yomhlaba udaba lokusabalala kwe-ebola oluhaqe amazwe aseNtshonalanga Afrika.Lokhu kuvele engqungqutheleni yodokotela bomhlaba yaminyaka yonke iWorld Medical Association (WMA) Annual Assembly ese-ICC eThekwini eqale izolo, izosongwa ngoMgqibelo.UDkt Mzukisi Grootboom, (
osesithombeni) wenyunyana yodokotela iSouth African Medical Association ephansi kwe-WMA, uthe amazwe angakabi nenkinga ye-ebola kufanele azitshele ukuthi ingabhebhethekela nakuwona.“Kungenzeka manje ukuthi i-ebola ihaqe abantu abasemazweni aseNtshonalanga ye-Afrika kodwa akufanele ibukwe kanjalo nje kuphela. Inkinga ngesifo wukuthi asidingi imvume ukuze singene kulelo zwe. Kufanele amazwe azilungiselele futhi aqinise isimo sezempilo. Amazwe ahaqwe yi-ebola okwamanje amazwe ake aba nenkinga yezimpi futhi izinhlelo zezempilo kuwona zibuthakathaka,” kusho uGrootboom.Ngokwezibalo zenhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni wonke i-World Health Organisation bangaphezu kuka-3 400 abantu asebebulewe yi-ebola kulo nyaka. Amazwe okuthiwa ahlaselwe yilolu bhubhane yi-Guinea, Liberia, Sierra Leone, Nigeria neSenegal. Zilinganiselwa ku-7 492 izigameko esezibikiwe zabantu okutholakale ukuthi banalesi sifo.Izolo odokotela bamazwe babe neziphakamiso mayelana nokufanele kwenziwe ngohulumeni ukulwa nokusabalala kwe-ebola.Ezinye zeziphakamiso abazenzile esokuthi amazwe angakahaqwa yi-ebola afundise abasebenzi bezempilo ngezimpawu ze-ebola, izindlela zokuvikela ukusabalala kwayo nokulandelela labo abake baxhumana nokutholakala ukuthi banayo.Ekhuluma ngesikhathi kwenziwa iziphakamiso umengameli we-WMA, uDkt Margaret Mungherera, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi izinhlangano eziya kosiza emazweni ahaqwe yi-ebola zisebenzisane nabasebenzi bezempilo abakhona kulawo mazwe.“Laba basebenzi sebenesikhathi bebhekene nalesi sifo sebazi kakhulu ngaso ngakho kuyadingeka ukuthi izinhlangano zifike zisebenzisane nabo zingabakhiphi inyumbazane. Okwamanje siyezwa ukuthi abanakwa,” kusho uDkt Mungherera.UDkt Grootboom uthe kuyakhathaza ukuthi eminye iminingwane ekhishwa ngendlela okusabalala ngayo i-ebola ayilona iqiniso.“Lesi sifo kungenzeka ukuthi sinezimpawu zomkhuhlane kodwa asithelelani ngendlela okuthelelana ngayo umkhuhlane. Abantu basithola ngokuthinta uketshezi lomuntu oke wanaso njengegazi, amathe, umchamo nolunye uketshezi,” kusho uGrootboom.Uthe enye into okufanele abantu bayiqaphele ukugeza izidumbu zabantu abasolwa noma okutholakale ukuthi babulawe yi-ebola ngoba isifo asipheli emzimbeni noma umuntu eseshonile.Kusasa uMnyango wezeMpilo kuzwelonke kulindeleke ukuthi ubize isithangami sabezindaba lapho uzokwethula uhlelo lokusiza empini yokusabalala kwalesi sifo. Ngaphambi kwalokhu uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi, uzohlangana nezinkampani eziku-JSE ukuxoxa ngoxhaso lokulwa ne-ebola.
title: Bathi yinkinga yomhlaba i-ebola

text: UMNYANGO wezaBasebenzi ucacisa ngokumele kwenzeke uma kukhona obehaqwe wubhubhane iCovid-19 nemigomo okumele ilandelwe uma esebuyela emsebenzini.Umnyango uchitha imibiko eke yasabalala yokuthi umuntu obehaqekile akudingeki aphinde ahlolwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akasenalo igciwane uma esebuyela emsebenzini.UMnuz Tibor Szana, oyiChief Inspector yezokuphepha kwabasebenzi emnyangweni, uthe imibiko esabalele ayilona iqiniso.“Ngokwemigomo emisha, uma omunye wabasebenzi etholwa ukuthi uhaqekile, waphinde walandela imithetho yokugonqa, angabuyela kuphela emsebenzini uma sekuphele izinsuku ezingu-14.“Omunye umgomo wukuthi lowo obehaqekile kumele kuqinisekise umbiko kadokotela ukuthi usekulungele ukusebenza,” kusho yena.Ugcizelele ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi umqashi aqinisekise ukuthi abasebenzi bagqoka izifonyo ngaso sonke isikhathi, bayaqhelelana futhi banazo izibulalimagciwane. Uthe abaqashi kumele babhekisise izimpawu kubasebenzi uma sebebuyele emsebenzini. USzana uthe uma kusabonakala izimpawu komunye wabasebenzi, kumele othintekayo agqoke isifonyo esibizwa nge-surgical mask okungenani izinsuku ezingu-21 emsebenzini.“Omunye umgomo obekiwe ngowokuthi uma kukhona obethintene nomunye wabasebenzi abahaqekile, kumele kulandelwe imithetho yezempilo ehambelana nemithetho yeCovid-19. Kumele kubhekwe ukuthi ngeke uyini abeke engcupheni impilo yabanye abasebenzi,” kusho uSzana.Uthe uma lowo msebenzi kubonakele ukuthi ukusebenza kwakhe kubeka abanye engcupheni, kufanele agonqe izinsuku ezingu-14. Uveze nokuthi umqashi angakwazi nokuthi amnikeze igunya lokuhlaba ikhefu lokugula ngalesi sikhathi esagonqile.
title: Okumele kwenziwe uma kunohaqekile emsebenzini

text: UTHAMI Mngqolo, owazakhela igama elingisa emdlalweni iGenerations neGazi, nesinqandamathe sakhe uJo-Anne Reyneke bagcine bekuqinisekisile ukuthi kuphelile ngothando lwabo lweminyaka, njengoba base bethembisane nomshado.Laba bobabili ngoMgqibelo ntambama bakhiphe isitatimende kwabezindaba beqinisekisa ukuphela kothando lwabo lweminyaka.UJo-Anne uzakhele udumo ngokulingisa emidlalweni ehlukene kuleli, esiteshini sakwa-e.tv, okukhona kuyo iBroken Vow neRhythm City.Esitatimendeni abasikhiphile laba bathe lesi sinqumo bahlale phansi basixoxa njengoba iningi beselazi ukuthi kuphelile ngothando lwabo.“Sihlangabezane nezingqinamba ezahlukene sisathandana futhi saba nezikhathi ezimnandi. Sibusiswe ngezingane ezimbili sisendawonye futhi njengoba sithathe lesi sinqumo sizoqhubeka nokuthi sizikhulise ngokuhlanganyela,” kusho laba bobabili.Bathe bangabantu abangathandi ukukhuluma ngezinto zabo ezithinta uthando kodwa babone ukuthi bakhulume ngalolu daba.UJo-Anne Reyneke obesethandane iminyaka emibili noThami futhi banezingane ezimbili. Isithombe: INSTAGRAM“Sizama ukuthi kungakhulunywa izinto eziningi ezinye ezingagcina zingamanga. Yingakho sikhethe ukukhuluma ngalolu daba ukuze abantu bazi ukuthi kwenzakalani. Sifuna ukuqhubeka nempilo kungabi bikho zihibe futhi sihlale sisondelene kungabi bikho ukuxabana phakathi kwethu,” kuchaza bona.Bathe konke lokhu okwenzeka kubo manje akulula futhi kuphathe kabi ngisho izingane zabo.“Siyacela nisinike isikhathi sokuthi siqhubeke nempilo ngaphandle kokuhlala sikhuluma ngalolu daba. Akukho esisazokukhuluma okuthinta lona, lokhu yikhona kuphawula kwethu,” kuqhuba laba.Iphephandaba eliphuma ngeSonto liveze ukuthi laba ukuhlukana kwabo kungenxa yokuthi uJo-Anne uyena osengenisa imali njengoba uThami kungamhambeli kahle endimeni yokulingisa.
title: Sephukile isethembiso somshado

text: MHLELI: Bengicela kwabohlanga kesibheke emuva lapho sisuka khona ukuthi ngabe sisayibambe ngakho noma isisiphunyukile isidla utshani? Ake sibheke isimo phansi kwalezi zihloko ezilandelayo.(1)imisebenzi (2)ubugebengu (3)ezokuhlaliswa kwabantu.(4)umhlaba.(5)abohlanga.Ngike ngizibuze ukuthi imbangela yokuswela umsebenzi ngabe yini? Ngike ngibone izikhangiso zomsebenzi ziziningi futhi zisho nemiholo emihle bese ngixakeka ukuthi pho kungani izingane zakwethu zihlale zikhala ngokungaqasheki zibe zifundile. Uma ulandelisisa inkinga ngamava.Ngiwufakazi walokho ngoba ngiye ngibone ezikhangisweni kufuneka abanamava eminyaka ewu-3,5,7 alowo msebenzi.Bekunganjani uma uhulumeni wethu ake abhekelele abafowethu nodadewethu abahleli neziqu zabo emakhaya ngenxa yamava angekho adingwa wumsebenzi abawufundele. Imalimboleko ebizwa ngoNSfas boyoyibuyisa nini behleli neziqu emakhaya.Benginombono othi njengoba uhulumeni ekwazi ukunikeza izibonelelo kubantu abahlwempu nabo akazame ukuthi umuntu ngamunye ngokomsebenzi awufundele athole lelo thuba lokusebenza esizana nasebemkantshubomvu ukuze azuze amava awumgoqo ekutheni aqasheke. Ngicabanga ukuthi singabasiza leso sibonelelo sokuthi bakwazi ukuzibheka besafuna amava. Ubugebengu ngicabanga ukuthi imbangela yabo ukusweleka komsebenzi.Yebo singephike ukuthi nokufuna imali esheshayo nobuvila nakho kunomthelela ebugebengwini. Okunye okuyinkinga wukuhlaliswa kwabantu ezindaweni ezingakulungele ukuhlala - ezingahlelekile, ezingenagesi, amanzi ukuthuthwa kwendle nemigwaqo.Uma ngikhumbula kahle indawo ekulungele ukuhlalisa umphakathi iqala ihlolwe wochwepheshe ukuthi kukhonani phansi nokuthi kumele izakhiwo zibe wuhlobo olunjani anduba kuhlaliswe umphakathi.Umhlaba ngane zakwethu ukhona ubanzi inkinga ukuthi siyakwazi yini ukuwusebenzisa?Asingafani nomuntu othenga imoto engakwazi ukushayela bese igcina isisetshenziswa ngabakwaziyo, ingabi nanzuzo kuye. Bengingacela singabohlanga kesihlukane nobuvila nokufuna ukwenzelwa wuhulumeni ngaso sonke isikhathi. Asimlekeleleni ukuze naye asisize kwesikuvezayo. Sasingavoteli ukuhlala sikhangezwa wuhulumeni. Sasivotela ukuba sikhululeke. Uhulumeni ake asilalele uma sikhala kungaze kushiswe izakhiwo zomphakathi kube yima elalela. Lokho kukodwa nje kusiphindisela emuva ngoba kusasa uzothi akanamali yokusisiza usalungisa umonakalo odaleke ngenkathi kubhikishelwa izimfuno zomphakathi.Ngakhoke ngiyacela bafowethu nodadewethu isikhathi sokushisa nokulimaza izinsiza sesadlula. Akusezona ezobandlululo sekungezethu, yimali yabakhokhi bentela esidlala ngayo. Ake sibe nezinye izindlela zokukhononda nohulumeni asheshe ezwe angalindi ukuthi abantu baze baphelelwe yisineke.Asingazitholi sesifana namanye amazwe ase-Afrika ngobuphofu ngoba nawo ayefana nathi ekusukeni. Asiqapheleni ngane zakwethu singazibulali sibhekile.Sesikhululekile manje asiyibambeni ingasiphunyuki, sokhomba bani ngomunwe? Abakuhulumeni abangazinothisi bona nemindeni yabo. Balapho nje bathunywe yithina.Petrus RadebeEMadadeni
title: Ake sibe nezinye izindlela zokukhononda singashisi impahla

text: SIKHALA ezimathonsi isalukazi saseTshelimnyama ngaseMariannhill, okuthe sisavakashe lapho sizalwa khona, amadodana aso angamaphara asale edayisa umuzi.UNkk Buyisiwe Gumede (65) uthe ngenkathi efika emzini wakhe ukhangwe yindoda angayazi emtshele ukuthi umuzi sekungowayo, yagweva yathi akuhambe yena yona ayiyi ndawo ngoba iwuthengile lo muzi.Uthe lo wesilisa umtshele nokuthi uma ephuma kulo muzi, ufuna imali yakhe kodwa angafuni ukuyisho ukuthi yimalini.“Angizazi kwazingane lezo ukuthi zikuziphi izinkalo. Lezi zingane zazivele zingangifuni ngoba ngingazizali. Ngize ngiya ekhaya nje, bengithi ngiyoshaywa wumoya ngemuva kwengxabano engibe nayo nazo, zingithuka zingibiza ngayo yonke into,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Uthe wagana uyise ngemuva kokuthi eshonelwe wunkosikazi owayengunina walezi zingane ezidayise umuzi. Ukhombise leli phephandaba amaphepha awubufakazi bokuthi lo muzi usegameni lakhe.“Okubuhlungu wukuthi sengizame nosizo emaphoyiseni kodwa angilutholi,” usho kanje.“Amaphoyisa angitshele ukuthi ngeke akwazi ukumkhipha lo muntu endlini engagunyaziwe yincwadi yenkantolo okumele ngibe nayo,” usho njalo.Uthe ngenkathi eyofuna leyo ncwadi enkantolo, waziswe ukuthi akayoyifuna kubameli, kwaba ukwehliswa enyuswa kwakhe.“Nabo abameli baseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal okwakuthiwa ngiye kubona, bangitshele ukuthi basiza kuphela abantu abasebenza khona,” kuchaza uNkk Gumede.Uthe ugcine esemelwa wumqondo, engasazi ukuthi kumele enzenjani njengoba esechithwe yizinhlaka zomthetho.Owesilisa ozibize ngoNgidi okusolwa ukuthi nguyena owathenga lo muzi, uthe uma uNkk Gumede efuna umuzi wakhe, kumele axhumane nezingane zakhe kuqala ukuze kuhlelwe ukuthi imali yakhe izobuya kanjani.Ikhansela laseTshelimnyama, uMnuz Nada Ngcobo, lithe lizwile ngoNkk Gumede ngalolu daba.“Ngimtshelile ukuthi kuzokuba lukhuni kimina njengekhansela ukuthi ngiye kumuntu ngithi akaphume endlini ngoba lokho kungase kutolikwe ngendlela engeyiyo,” kusho uNgcobo.Uthe weluleke uNkk Gumede ukuthi kungakuhle balandele indlela yokusebenza komthetho, ngakho akayobika udaba lwakhe enkantolo ePinetown.“Umsebenzi wenkantolo wukuthi ukhiphe isithunywa sayo siyokhipha umuntu osendlini,” usho njalo.Uthe kuyammangaza ukuthi umuntu angathenga kanjani umuzi ezinganeni ngaphandle kokuthi kube namaphepha asemthethweni, achaza ubufakazi bokunikazi bomuzi.Ngokusho kwakhe, balindele ukuzwa kuNkk Gumede uma kwenzeka ehlangabezane nezinkinga ukuze angenelele.
title: Isililo amaphara edayisa umuzi

text: USEKUBEKE kwacaca uGavin Hunt ukuthi akakuphuphi ngisho elele ukuqeqesha iqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana.Empeleni uHunt uze uyakuveza ukuthi “usemncane” kakhulu, ukuthi angabhekana nokungagculiseki kwabathandi bebhola kuleli abagxeka kwasani olwenzeka kwiBafana.Ngaphandle nje kokuthi u-Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba wakuleli, nguyena mqeqeshi onerekhodi elihle kwiBafana, kodwa amazwe amaningi asengene esitayeleni sokuqoka abaqeqeshi abadabuka emazweni abo futhi kubukeka kuwasebenzela.Kubaqeqeshi abathathwa njengabahamba phambili kuleli, kubukeka sengathi uyena yedwa umfo kaHunt ongakalinikwa ithuba kwelesizwe lokuba azibonakalise. Ngeke ukhulume ngoHunt, bese ukhohlwa ukuthi usenqobe isicoco se-Absa Premiership amahlandla amane. Usinqobe kathathu kwiSupersport United, wasinqoba kanye kwiBidvest Wits. Ngenxa yokuthi ushukela ubuye ubhoke kwabanye, ake ngikukhumbuze ngabaqeqeshi abambalwa asebeke bapheka iBafana, abangumnsinsi wokuzimilela kuleli.Lapha singabala uStanley Tshabalala, Clive “The Dog” Barker, Ephraim “Jomo” Sono, Trott Moloto, April “Styles” Phumo, Pitso “Jingles” Mosimane, Steve “Mphathi” Komphela noGordon Igesund.Indlela iBafana edlale ngayo kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ebidlalelwa e-Egypt ayigculisanga neze. Ngaphandle nje kokuthi akukho bhola elitheni ebelidlalwa uStuart Baxter nezakhe, kodwa inhloso ibingekho nhlobo. Ubungaboni ukuthi iBafana ifuna ukudlala liphi ibhola.Ngize ngasola ukuthi uBaxter hleze uza enkundleni elinde izitha ukuthi zikhombise ukuthi zidlala kanjani, bese ehlala emuva avike kuze kuphele umdlalo.Okungenza ngibhale le ngosi namuhla ukuthi bengicabanga nje ukuthi uma uHunt engathatha izintambo kwiBafana (uma kuvuma iSouth African Football Association), singashintsha yini indlela esibuka ngayo izinto.Okokuqala nje uHunt akalidlali ibhola elidle ngomjiko, ukuphaselana okusheshayo lokhu thina okusijabulisayo. Kusuka eseqeqesha iBlack Leopards, Moroka Swallows, SuperSport njengoba esekwiWits, uHunt uzidlalela “into yakhe” yedwa.Uyazi kwesinye isikhathi liyasuka ibhola kunozinti, lingathintwa muntu, lifike lingqofelwe enethini ngumgadli, linqobe kanjalo iqembu eliqeqeshwa nguHunt.Manje uma sithi sifuna uHunt acije iBafana, kuzofanele sishitshe indlela yethu yokucabanga. Ngabe kanti kadeni sifunani? Sifuna ibhola elihle lomjiko kodwa lutho imiphumela? Noma sifuna ibhola elizosinqobisa imidlalo, sithole ukuhlonipheka okusifanele ezwenikazi i-Afrika?Hleze sengingaze ngidlulele nakuyona iSafa. Phela uHunt uyaziwa ukuthi “akabhenywa”. Ngabe yona iSafa ikulindele ukuthi ithole umqeqeshi ongazuvuma yonke into, ozobuza izizathu zokuthatha izinqumo zale nhlangano?Kunezinto uHunt angeke azivume uma egxishwa zona yiSafa. Hleze kadeni sifuna umqeqeshi onjalo kwiBafana ngoba bonke abanye bangamavaka, acabangela izisu zawo adele isizwe.Ubufakazi bokuthi uHunt unobuhlakani ubuka abaqeqeshi asebenze nabo. Kusuka uThomas Madigage, Mosimane noKaitano Tembo asebenze nabo kuSuperSport uyabona ukuthi insizwa enamava futhi ekwaziyo ukusebenzisana nabanye abaqeqeshi. Sekungumlango ukuthi uMosimane udla izicoco kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uTembo usengumqeqeshi weSuperSport, ngeshwa uMadigage usadlula emhlabeni.Ngingakhohlwa kanjani * -Andre Arendse asebenze naye kwiWits, osengumqeqeshi wonozinti kwiBafana Bafana.Elami lithi singabathandi bebhola kuleli, uma sifuna uHunt abe ngumqeqeshi weBafana lokho kuyobe kusho ukuthi siyakhohlwa yindaba yokulokhu sicefeza ngebhola elihle, ngoba uHunt ungumqeqeshi ofuna imiphumela kwaphela.Kuyimanje asenzi kahle ezilinganisweni (rankings). Sibalwa kunombolo 70 emhlabeni, kanti e-Afrika sikunombolo 13.Lokhu akwemukelekile neze. Sinenqwaba yabadlali egcina ingakwazi ukuyodlala phesheya kwezilwandle ngenxa yalezi zilinganiso ezingagculisi.
title: UHunt angayelapha inkinga yeBafana Bafana

text: KUHLONGOZWA ukuthi ihhovisi lezokuShushiswa koMphakathi kuleli, iNational Prosecuting Authority, kumele limhlawulise owayengumengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ngokusebenzisa ulimi olulumelayo eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, ngenkathi efake isicelo sokuthi kuchithwe ukushushiswa kwakhe ngamacala enkohlakalo.UZuma wayefake isicelo sokuthi le nkantolo imnikeze imvume yokudlulisela icala lakhe eNkantolo YokuDlukisa amaCala eBloemfontein.Ngenkathi amajaji amathathu aseNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu ekhipha isinqumo ngokunqabela uZuma ukuthi sichithwe isicelo sokuthi angashushiswa, abale amagama athe kakumele ukuthi uZuma wawasebenzisa enkantolo.La magama kubalwa elithi “ukuhlanekezelwa kweqiniso”, “inkantolo enkulu isebenzela emuva” namanye.Amajaji avumelana ngokwenqaba ukuchithwa kokungashushiswa kukaZuma, akutholile ukuxolisa kukaZuma ngalokhu, ngommeli wakhe * -Advocate Muzi Sikhakhane SC.Nakuba kunjalo, athe lokhu kufike sekudlule isikhathi njengoba * -Advocate Andrew Breitenbach SC, omele uMbuso, ubesevele ewenzile umbiko wokuthi kuzomele uZuma ahlawuliswe ngamagama angamukelekile awasebenzisile.“Njengoba * -Advocate Breitenbach esechazile ukuthi ulimi olusetshenziswe nguZuma ngenkathi efaka isicelo sokuthi kuchithwe ukushushiswa kwakhe amagama awasebenzisa kawasebenzi enkantolo,” kusho amaphepha aphambi kwenkantolo.Ngokwalawa maphepha, ulimi olulumelayo kumele lugwenywe ngaso sonke isikhathi ezinkantolo.Ngokwalawa majaji, indlela uZuma aziphatha ngayo enkantolo, ingaholela ekutheni abantu bangazihloniphi izinkantolo nokusebenza kwamajaji.“Kasisho ukuthi izinkantolo mazingagxekwa kodwa kakumele ukuthi zedliswe isithunzi,” kusho isitatimende esikhishwe ngabameli.Ngokwala majaji, okushiwo wuZuma, ukuthi agxila ekutheni kunobugebengu emacaleni abhekene nawo kunokubhekela amalungelo akhe, ngezinye zezinto ezabhekelwa esicelweni sakhe.Nakuba bekungakacaci ukuthi uZuma angase ahlawuliswe malini, kunemibiko ethi kungase kube uR400 000 sekuhlangene nezindleko zokukhokhela abameli bakhe.
title: UZuma ephutheni lokuphaphalaza

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEU PHIKO lwentsha ye-ANC esifundeni saseBaqulusini luthathe isinqumo sokuthi ungaphazanyiswa umfuziselo womholi we-IFP, uDkt Mangosuthu Buthelezi esisoLundi njengoba kunomkhankaso wenhlangano yabafundi iSasco wokuba kushintshwe igama lalo mholi esikhungweni esiseMlazi esiqanjwe ngaye.Unobhala we-ANCYL eBaqulusini uNksz Mpume Sikhakhane, uthe babone kungcono ukuthi bangawuthinti umfuziselo kaButhelezi ngoba abalwa nayo yileyo yabaholi abamhlophe bangezikhathi zobandlululo ababecindezele abamnyama.“Siye sabheka ngisho ephalamende elidala ukuthi ayikho yini imifuziselo okumele isuswe, sathola ukuthi kukhona neyamakhosi akwaZulu ahlonishwayo emlandwweni wethu njengabantu abamnyama.“Lona kaButhelezi siwuyeke ngoba sibona ukuthi asikho isidingo sokuwugudluza ngoba silwa nabamhlophe ababecindezele leli lizwe,” kusho uNksz Sikhakhane.UButhelezi useke wathola ukuhlaselwa ngabaholi be-ANC neSasco bethi akususwe igama lakhe enyuvesi yaseMlazi iMangosuthu University of Technology ngoba kukhalwa ngokuthi wayehola uhulumeni wakhe waKwaZulu ngezikhathi zobandlululo.Omunye wabaholi bohulumeni ababebizwa ngabezabelo, uMnuz Lucas Mangope owayephethe iBophuthatswana osekuyiNorth West manje, umfuziselo wakhe owawuseLehurutshe Civic Centre, wagudluzwa ngoba kukhalwa ngokuthi wawumele umbuso wobandlululo.I-EFF KwaZulu-Natal ithe umfuziselo kaButhelezi kawufani neminye ngoba umlando wakhe awumile ngokwezombusazwe kuphela kodwa ubuye abe yinkosi yesizwe nanoNdunankulu kaZulu.Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Vukani Ndlovu echaza, uthe bona kabanankinga nomfuziselo wakhe kodwa abalwa nayo yileyo yabacindezeli ababephethe ngobandlululo.“UButhelezi okwakhe kuhlukile ngoba uma ubheka nomlando wakhe wangobandlululo, okokuqala akawuvumanga, uzimele-geqe njengabanye abavuma ukuthi izifundazwe ababeziphethe zizimele njengamazwe angeyona ingxenye yeNingizimu Afrika kodwa uButhelezi akavumanga. Ngaphandle kwalokho okusiphethe kabi wukuthi kunezichuse zoQueen Victoria noLouis Botha eThekwini seziqashwe ngelokhozi ngonogada okuyinto esixakayo ukuthi zivikelwa kanjani izinto ezisithusayo singabantu abamnyama,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe bafuna zonke izikhumbuzo zabacindezeli ziqedwe kuthi abafisa ukufunda ngazo bazibheke ezincwadini.
title: Ngeke usuke umfuziselo kaButhelezi

text: UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uJosef Zinnbauer, uphumele obala ngokuthi akukho okumfaka itwetwe ngeMamelodi Sundowns abazobhekana nayo emdlalweni wama-quarterfinal weNedbank Cup eLoftus Versfeld Stadium, ePitoli, kusasa ngo-6 ebusuku.IPirates, esivele iwine indebe yeMTN 8 kule sizini, ihambela phezulu kwazise yenza kahle kwiCAF Confederation Cup. Ihlezi phezulu kuGroup A. Nokho ifomu yeZimnyama ayifani kwiDStv Premiership. Zizobhekana neSundowns esahlulwe kabili emiqhudelwaneni eyahlukene."Lona wumdlalo omkhulu kithina. Sidlala neqembu elihlezi phezulu kwi-log futhi likwaphezulu kwiChampions League. Asikwazi ukuwuqhathanisa nojwayelekile weChampions League. Lapha womabili amaqembu ayazana, abaqeqeshi bayasazi nathi siyabazi. E-Afrika udlala imidlalo cishe emine ngaphambi kokubuyela eqenjini odlale nalo. Bayazi ukuthi sifunani, nathi siyazi ukuthi bafunani. Kodwa leli yithuba lokuzikala izinga eqenjini elidlala kwiChampions League. Sinalo ithuba lokuwuwina umdlalo. Siwubheke ngabomvu. Uma siwina lo mdlalo sizodlulela kowandulela owamanqamu," kusho uZinnbauer."Ngibabuze umbuzo abadlali bami ukuthi bafunani. 'Nifuna ukuqhubekela phambili? Kufanele niwine lo mdlalo. Akukho ukudlala ngokulingana. Kufanele niwuwine lo mdlalo. Uma nihlulwa nizophuma, uma niwina nizodlulela phambili'. Ngeke silahlekelwe yilutho uma singaphumeleli. ISundowns iyona eyizimfivilithi. Manje sesiyalibona izinga eliphezulu kubadlali bethu okuyinto enhle kimina njengomqeqeshi ukubona ukuthi kuzokwenzekani kulo mdlalo. Siyakwazi enakho iSundowns ngokwezinga labadlali kodwa asiyesabi. "Iqembu elizowina phakathi kwePirates neSundowns lizobhekana neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) kowandulela owamanqamu ngeSonto. Komunye umdlalo owandulela owamanqamu ozoba ngoMgqibelo eLucas Moripe Stadium, e-Atteridgeville, iPretoria Callies izogijimisana neChippa United.UZinnbauer uphonsele inselelo abadlali bakhe ngokuthi abakwenze abahlala bekusho ukuthi bafuna ukuwina izindebe kwiPirates."Udinga abadlali abazothi 'ngifuna ukuwina'. Kungenzeka lokho emdlalweni ofana nalona. Akuyona iligi. Sekufanele sibone ukuthi kwenzekani ngabadlali bethu. Bahlala bekhuluma bethi 'sifuna ukudlondlobala, sifuna ukuphumelela, sifuna ukuwina iligi'. Ngikuzwa lokho sonke isikhathi uma bebuzwa. Manje yisikhathi sokukukhombisa lokho. Ukuthi kuzokwanela noma cha, yilowo umbuzo," kusho uZinnbauer.
title: UZinnbauer akanavalo ngaphambi komdlalo neSundowns

text: KUZOXEGISWA eminye yemithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe kulandela ukubona izinto ezithize selokhu kwamenyezelwa ukuvalwa kwezwe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngoMsombuluko odlule.Izolo esithangamini nabezindaba kumenyezelwe ukuthi kuleli bangu-1 462 abaneCorona futhi bahlanu asebeshonile.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoBuholi boMdabu kuleli, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, uthe kulandela ukubona izinto ezithize selokhu kuvalwe izwe babe sebekhetha ukuxegisa eminye imithetho nokulungisa ezinye izinto.UDkt Dlamini Zuma izolo kulesi sithangami sabezindaba ugcizelele ukuthi imingcwabo izoqhubeka, nabavela kwezinye izifundazwe bangaya emingcwabeni.Imingcwabo izohanjelwa ngabantu abangu-50 kuphela.“Baningi abantu esithole ukuthi baphatheke kabi ngoba bebefuna ukuya emingcwabeni kwezinye izifundazwe, base bavinjwa amaphoyisa. Umthetho ubuvele uthi akuvumelekile, siyaxolisa kulabo abaphatheke kabi. Sibe sesibona ukuthi lo mthetho uyinkinga sabe sesithi bavumelekile manje abavela kwezinye izifundazwe,” kusho uDkt Dlamini Zuma.Kwezokuthutha uthe kunenselelo ekuthuthweni kwabantu ngamatekisi.Kuphindwe kwacaciswa ukuthi abadayisa ukudla emgwaqweni bazovumeleka ukuthi baqhubeke badayise uma nje benazo izimvume.Nezitolo ezincane emalokishini nazo zivumelekile ukuthi zisebenze ngalesi sikhathi.UNgqongqoshe wezokuXhumana kuleli, uNkk Stella Ndabeni-Ebrahams, uthe uhlelo lokusebenzisa amaselula ukuthola asebehaqekile akukhona ukuthi uhulumeni ufuna ukulalela izindaba zabantu ezingcingweni zabo kodwa kwenziwa ukuze kulandelwe abantu abangahle babe negciwane ukuzama ukunciphisa ukuthelelana kwabantu.
title: Kuxegiswa eminye imithetho kathaqa

text:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEUNOBHALA-Jikelele weSouth African Communist Party (SACP) uDkt Blade Nzimande izolo utshele izithunywa ebezisengqungqutheleni eyisipesheli yamaKhomanisi ukuthi impilo yakhe nekaNkk Joyce Moloi-Moropa onguMgcinimafa wale nhlangano, isengcupheni ngenxa yokugxeka isivumelwano esenziwe yiSABC neMultichoice.“Impilo yami nekaMgcinimafa isengcupheni njengoba sisatshiswa abathile ngenxa yokugxeka iSABC. Kungani kumele siphoqwe ngokubuka iDStv nezinhlelo zayo eziphindwa njalo kube ngathi yisona siteshi esihlukile? I-SABC isihlangene nabeMultichoice ekudlaleni ngabantu. Silwe kabi sizama ukukhulula iSABC ezandleni zeNational Party, kumele silwe neNaspers ekuzigayeleni imali isebenzisa ithelevishini,’’ kusho uNzimande.UNzimande ubethula umbiko wesimo seqembu kwezepolitiki, kule ngqungquthela ese-University of Johannesburg, ophikweni oluseSoweto.INaspers, ephethe iMedia 24, inamasheya kuMultichoice. UNzimande usole iphephandaba leMedia 24, i
  City Press ngokumphenya ngoba egxeka iSABC.“Sizolwa ukuze sikhulule iSABC kulo mkhuba owenziwa iNaspers.”IMultichoice edlala iziteshi ezikhokhelwayo, iqinisekise isivumelwano sayo neSABC sokuthola ilungelo lokusakaza isiteshi sezindaba esidlala amahora angu- 24 nesikaqedisizungu. Ngokusho kwesivumelwano esisayinwe ngo-2013, iMultichoice izokhokhela iSABC uR100 million ngonyaka, okuzoba yiminyaka emihlanu.Baningi abasigxekayo lesi sivumelwano, abanye baze bathi iMultichoice iyona elawula imifanekiso egcinwe yiSABC.Isiteshi sikaqedisizungu esibizwa ngeSABC Encore, sidlala izinhlelo ezindala zama-80 kuya kuma-90.UNzimande ujikele abezindaba, wathi uncamela ukubuka isiteshi sethelevishini saseRussia ukuze ezothola izindaba ezisile kunokuthi afunde amaphephandaba akuleli noma abuke iziteshi zezindaba njenge-CNN ne-BBC.“Angizifundi izindaba zangaphandle emaphephandabeni ethu ngoba awakutsheli lutho. I-BBC neCNN itshala inkoleloze yamazwe.”“Angilwi nabezindaba kepha ngibaphonsela inselelo.”
title: Kusatshiswe uBlade egxeka iSABC

text: KUSHISWE amaloli angaphezu kuka-60 emasontweni amathathu KwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu kudalulwe ngabanikazi bamaloli esithangamini sabezindaba ebesihlanganise nongqongqoshe abehlukene ebesiseThekwini, izolo.Abanikazi bezinkampani zamaloli kuleli bathi kushiswa okungenani amaloli ayishumi ngosuku kulesi sifundazwe.NgeSonto kushiswe amaloli angu-17 eKZN, okuholele ekutheni izolo kube nomhlangano obuhlanganisa abashayeli bamaloli, abanikazi bamaloli, uMnyango wezeMisebenzi nokuQashwa, uMnyango wezaseKhaya, uMnyango wezamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnyango wezokuThutha kuleli, uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal noMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho KwaZulu Natal.UNkk Pria Hassan wePositive Freight, okuyinhlangano yabanikazi bamaloli kuleli, uthe ngosuku kulesi sifundazwe kushiswa amaloli angaphezulu kweshumi.Ekhuluma nabezindaba uMnuz Sihle Zikalala onguNdunankulu, uthe ukucekelwa phansi kwamaloli ngeke kusabekezelelwa kulesi sifundazwe.“Sekusungulwe ithimba elihlanganise yonke iminyango elizohlangana sonke isikhathi lidingide konke okuthinta udaba lokucekelwa phansi kwamaloli. Asisezukwenza njengakuqala lapho umnyango nomnyango bewunikezwa umsebenzi othile, kuthiwe awuwenze, bese kuhlanganwa sekuzobikwa ukuthi esikhathini esingaka kwenzekeni. Manje ithimba lizosebenza ngokubambisana ngaso sonke isikhathi. Ezinye zezinto okumele zenziwe yileli thimba ukuthi kube nohlu lwamagama abashayeli abakhona kuleli, abasebenzayo nabangasebenzi, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uma kunesigameko esenzekayo sisukunyelwa masinyane. Amacala avuliwe kumele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi ayaphenywa. Abasolwa ngokuthi bawenzile bashushiswe,” kusho undunankulu.UMnuz Bheki Cele wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uthe bangu-90 abantu ababoshiwe beyamaniswa nezigameko zokushiswa kwamaloli. Kodwa amacala abo athathwa njengamacala omgwaqo, okwenza ukuthi bungabonakali ubucayi bawo.“Kusamele sikhulume nozakwethu basophikweni lwezokushushisa nezobulungiswa, kubhekwe ukuthi akukho yini okungenziwa ukuze amacala angathathwa njengawomgwaqo ngoba awubugebengu obufaka ingcindezi kwezomnotho,” kusho uCele.UMnuz Sipho Zungu we-All Truck Drivers Foundation, okuyinhlangano emele abashayeli bamaloli, uthe abaqashi kumele benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bayabaqasha abantu bakuleli.“Asikugqugquzeli ukuthi kushiwe amaloli ngoba uma kushiswa amaloli kulimala abantu futhi ukushiswa kweloli kufana nokushisa ithuluzi lokusebenza ekubeni sithi sifuna umsebenzi,” kusho uZungu.Uzakwabo uMnuz Bheki Biyela weNational Truck Drivers Foundation, uthe abakaze bakhiphe umyalelo wokuthi kushiswe amaloli.“Abawenzayo lo mkhuba siyabacela ukuthi bame, badedele izingxoxo ezikhona ziqhubeke kuze kutholakale isisombululo,” kusho uBiyela.UDkt Aaron Motsoaledi woMnyango wezaseKhaya, uthe unesiqiniseko sokuthi umqashi ngaphambi kokuthi aqashe umuntu wangaphandle ufaka isicelo kulo mnyango, asho ukuthi udinga ikhono elingekho kuleli.“Lokho kusiza ekutheni sazi ukuthi umqashi ngamunye unabasebenzi abangaki bangaphandle, akavele azenzele nje. Konke lokhu kuzobhekwa uma sesihlangene siyithimba,” kusho uMosoalediKubuzwa uZikalala ukuthi yini esiyenziwe ngoba lolu daba kade kukhulunywa ngalo futhi kwenziwa nethimba, uthe abahloli sebezivakashele izinkampani eziningi KwaZulu-Natal, kodwa ngeke bakudalule ukuthi batholeni. Ulwazi olutholakele uthe luseyimfihlo.
title: Sekunethimba elizoqapha abashisa amaloli

text: IKHANSELA elisolwa ngokubulala elinye elinguzakwabo eMlaza ngoba kuthiwa lalifuna isikhundla, likhale ngokuboshelwa amanqina enyathi njengoba lithi lalingeke libange isikhundla “esingenawo amandla”.Ikhansela laku-ward 80, uMnuz Mthokozisi Nojiyeza, isolwa ngetulo lokubulala ikhansela laku-ward 88 uMnuz Sibusiso “Bhabhane” Maphumulongo-Okthoba nyakenye.UNojiyeza naboshwe nabo; oMnuz Phumlani Nojiyeza noNkosinathi Mbambo bafaka isicelo sebheyili.Izolo enkantolo yaseMlaza, ummeli wakhe, u-Advocate Simphiwe Mlotshwa, ucele inkantolo ukuba imvumele aphinde abuyise uNojiyeza azofakaza njengoba umphathi wecala eveze imininingwane emisha.UNojiyeza uthe yena wayengeke abange nomufi isikhundla sokuba unobhala ekubeni yena engusihlalo.“Nkosi yenkantolo, engifisa ukukuchaza ngalesi sikhundla umphenyi wecala noMbuso abangisola ngokuthi ngabulala ngoba ngifuna sona, ukuthi akusona isikhundla ovotelwa kuso futhi kuwuhlaka lokusebenza nje olungenawo amandla. Umphenyi uveze ukuthi ngoba ngangibona ukuthi umufi unabalandeli abaningi abanganginikeza inkinga uma sekuvotelwa lesi sikhundla sikanobhala. Akunjalo ngoba lesi sikhundla uyaqokelwa kuso, awuvotelwa yimuntu. Akusona isikhundla saka-ANC njengoba umphenyi wecala evezile.“Futhi lesi sikhundla asinamandla kodwa senziwa umkhandlu (weTheku) ukuba amakhansela akwazi ukusisebenzisa kuma-ward awo,” kusho uNojiyeza.Uphinde wanaba ukuthi kungamanga ukuthi umufi uyena owayexhumana nosonkontileka ngenxa yalesi sikhundla sokuba unobhala wamakhanselaaseMlaza.“Uma kuzofika usonkontileka, ophethe umsebenzi kuba uyena oxhumana nekhansela lalapho kuzosetshenzwa khona alazise ukuthi kuza usonkontileka, akuthintwa unobhala noma usihlalo,” kusho uNojiyeza.Leli khansela lithe ngokwazi kwalo isikhundla sokuba unobhala sikamufi sasilingana nesikasihlalo. Uthe wayengeke abange isikhundla esifana nesakhe.UNojiyeza uphinde wacacisa ukuthi ngokwakhe, okwenza wangaveza ukuthi usake walahlwa icala phambilini ingoba wayedidwa igama elavezwa abaseshi elithi “usake wagqoka yini”.Uthe ngokwakhe wayazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi ngo-1999 wakhokha inhlawulo kaR500 ngecala lokuntshontsha ushokoledi. UMbuso uthe uyakholelwa ukuthi uNojiyeza wafihlela inkantolo ngaleli cala ukuze eziveze emsulwa.Kulindele ukuba namhlanje abameli nombuso benze izethulo zabo, bese kuphuma isinqumo ngebheyili.
title: Likhale ngetulo ikhanselaelisolwa ngokubulala elinye

text: NGEMUVA kweminyaka emihlanu elingisa indawo kaMaNgcobo emdlalweni Uzalo, uThandeka Dawn-King uyashiya kulo mdlalo.UThandeka ungomunye wabalingisi abaqala kulo mdlalo ngesikhathi ufika kwiSABC1.Imithombo emibili engaphakathi kulo mdlalo ipotshozele Isolezwe ukuthi izindaba zokushiya kukaThandeka kulo mdlalo sezifikile nakubaphathi bawo.Umthombo wokuqala okhulume neSolezwe uveze ukuthi, uThandeka ushiya lo mdlalo nje uya emdlalweni omusha oqoshwa eGoli, nazoba yingxenye yawo.“Uthole amadlelo aluhlaza eGoli, kukhona umdlalo omusha oqoshwayo khona. Okwamanje akukacaci ukuthi uzophuma kanjani njengoba izindaba zokushiya kwakhe zifike kule mpelasonto kwabaningi. Ababhali balo mdlalo ima bezohlala phansi bacabange ukuthi bazomkhipha kanjani ngenxa yokuthi kulo nyaka Uzalo belungakabuyeli ekuqopheni ngenxa yokuthi bekusavaliwe kuyoze kuqalwe ngomhlaka 18 kule nyanga,“ kuchaza umthombo.Omunye umthombo uveze ukuthi kumangaze abasebenzi abaningi kulo mdlalo ukushiya kukaThandeka.“Kwenzeke into ebingalindelekile ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi uThandeka uyashiya. Esesikuzwile nje ukuthi okusanganisa ababhali balo mdlalo kakhulu ukuthi kushiya umlingisi omkhulu kangaka njengoThandeka nje, maduzane kuzohamba uBaby Cele kuwo, nokuzophoqa ukuthi bambuyise yize bese bezitshele ukuthi bayamchitha,“ kuchaza umthombo.UNomfundo Zondi okhulumela inkampani eqopha lo mdlalo iStained Glass, uthe ngeke baze baphawule lutho ngalolu daba okwamanje.“Akukho zimpendulo esizozinika abezindaba ngalolu daba,“ kusho uNomfundo.Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo lisanda kubika ukuthi abalingisi balo mdlalo babe noKhisimusi noNcibijane omuncu njengoba bengawuholelanga uNovemba noDisemba.Kuvela ukuthi okuholele ekutheni bangayitholi imiholo yabo, ukuthi bebemile bengaqophi.
title: Uyashiya kuZalo  uMaNgcobo wodumo

text:
MLUNGISI GUMEDE noZAMANDOSI CELES IMAPEKETWANE isimo eChief Luthayi Secondary, eMpumalanga, eHammarsdale, ngemuva kwensakavukela yezigameko zokuxoshwa kwabafundi ngothisha mayelana namacala ehlukene.Kumanje kuthiwa kunabafundi ababili abafunda u-Grade 10 C, abafunda ngenkani kulesi sikole ngemuva kokukhonjwa indlela kulandela ukubanjwa ekilasini bephethe i-laptop.Laba bafundi kuthiwa sebedlala umacashelana nothisha wabo okuthiwa uma engena ekilasini bona babe bephuma. Ukuxoshwa kwabo kulandele isigameko sokuxoshwa kuka-Ayanda Zulu, yena okuthiwa uxoshelwe ukuthi wahleka kakhulu ekilasini.Isolezwe libike kabanzi ngodaba luka-Ayanda ofunda u-Grade 12, okumanje usefunda eHillgrove High School, eNewlands West.U-Ayanda uxoshwe eLuthayi ngoba kuthiwa wahleka kakhulu ekilasini kunabanye abafundi. Ngokusho kukaNksz Nomkhosi Zulu ongunina ka-Ayanda, uthe ingane yakhe yaxoshelwa ukuhleka ekilasini.Ugcine eshiyile eLuthayi ngoba uthisha obemfundisa lesi sifundo ethi ngeke akwazi ukufundisa ekilasini okukhona yena kulo.Umthombo we
Solezwe onguthisha kulesi sikole, uthe konakele esikoleni sabo ngenxa kathishanhloko ongenawo umgogodla.“Kunothisha okukhala isicathulo sabo esikoleni, uthishanhloko kwayena uzwa ngabo. Ngikhuluma nje kunamaPhini amabili kathishanhloko, leli elinye lize libizwe ngothishanhloko olinde ukungena esikhundleni,” usho kanje.Umthombo uthe umgomo womnyango uthi uhlahlo mali lwesikole kumele lumunyungwe ngisho nayi-SGB, wengeza ngokuthi kwesabo isikole akwenzeki lokho kodwa uthishanhloko nethimba lakhe yibona abanqumayo ukuthi imali izosetshenziswa kanjani.Ikhansela lendawo uMnuz Nkosiphendule Dlamini linxuse uMnyango wezeMfundo ukuba wenze uphenyo ngezigameko zokuxoshwa kwabafundi eLuthayi.“Kuyacaca ukuthi kuningi okonakele kulesi sikole akukwazi ukuthi kulokhe kuxoshwa abafundi ngale ndlela. Ngiyadumala ukuthi umfundi u-Ayanda uze wahamba esikoleni waya kwesinye phezu kwemizamo emingaka sizama ukuxazulula le nkinga,” usho kanje.UDlamini uthe kuyadumaza ukuthi kube khona izikole ezixosha abafundi kodwa bona benomkhankaso wokugqugquzela intsha ukuthi ifunde ikwenze imfashini ukuqeda u-matric.
title: Ziyaqhubeka izinkinga eLuthayi

text:
LUYASHUBA udaba lukasomabhizinisi waseNtuzuma odilizelwe isitolo ngabasebenzi bakaMasipala weTheku namaphoyisa awo ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule, osethole ummeli ozolungisa udaba lwakhe, wavula necala.UMnuz Nduduzo Magwaza (37) obengumnikazi weYoung Minds Tuck Shop, usamile ekutheni isitolo sakhe besisebenza ngokusemthethweni kodwa yilungu elithize lomphakathi elibikele uMasipala amanga ngaye. UMagwaza ubesedayise iminyaka engu-11 kulesi sitolo esiyikhonteyna. Uthe ufuna umasipala umbuyisele endaweni yakhe futhi umkhokhele nezimpahla ezicekelwe phansi ngesikhathi edilizelwa isitolo. Kuthiwa abasebenzi bakaMasipala namaphoyisa baklabhe ikhonteyna emuva kokuba kukhishwe incwadi yesexwayiso yokuthi uMagwaza kumele ayisuse.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuMasipala uSuperintendent Parboo Sewpersad, uthe isitolo sikaMagwaza besingabekiwe endaweni efanele ngoba besiphazamisa nokuhamba kwezimoto nomphakathi.FUNDA: 
Usola umona odilizelwe isitolo“Ubesexwayisiwe ukuthi akayisuse ikhonteyna kodwa wangakwenza lokho. Sithole izikhalo zokuthi kuyagcwala kakhulu esitolo sakhe, kuphuzwe notshwala futhi sinama-video awubufakazi. Kusolwa nokuthi kusetshenziswa nezidakamizwa futhi umnikazi wesitolo ubechitha ngisho indle kuyona le ndawo. Sinqume ukuthi sithumele amaphoyisa ngoba uMagwaza ubengasilalelanga isexwayiso,” kusho uSewpersad.Uveze nokuthi sebeyazi ngecala elivulelwe amaphoyisa kamasipala, athe lingamanga futhi bazolilandela. “Wanikwa isexwayiso esanele kodwa wakhombisa ukudelela umthetho ngoba esekwa yikhansela elihlangene naye. Useke wahlawuliswa uR4 300 ngenxa yokuphula umthetho nokungabi nayo imvume. Kumele aye eNkantolo eNtuzuma ngoDisemba 7 ukuyokhuluma ngendaba yenhlawulo. Sithole nokuthi incwadi ayisayinise umphakathi uthathe nabantu abangahlali kuleya ndawo,” kusho yena.Mayelana nezinsolo zezidakamizwa nokugcwala ngaphandle kwesitolo uMagwaza uthe akukho okubi obekwenziwa.“Kuyo uyonke indawo enesitolo kujwayele ukugcwala abantu ngaphandle, obekuyizingane ezingomakhelwane. Kule ndawo kudonsa noWiFi yamahhala obekwenza ukuthi abantu bagcwale bezosebenzisa yona. Abefika kaningi amaphoyisa nekhansela bezosesha kodwa bathole ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle,” kuchaza uMagwaza.UMnuz Thomas Ntshangase oyikhansela uthe naye umangele ukuthi kungani sidiliziwe isitolo ngoba konke bekuhamba kahle.
title: Ufaka umasipala enkantolo odilizelwe isitolo

text: IMARITZBURG United inike izintambo zokuqeqesha okwesikhashana uDelron Buckley obeyiphini lika-Eric Tinkler ochithwe ekuqaleni kwesonto.ITeam Of Choice ayikazi inqobe emidlalweni ewu-11 kwiDStv Premiership (uma kuhlanganiswa nesizini ephelile). Empeleni yagcina ukunqoba ngoMashi into engehli kahle kubalandeli nezikhulu zeqembu.Emidlalweni emine kuqale isizini iTeam Of Choice iselokhu ibhekwe yisambane, ayikaze inqobe nowodwa umdlalo futhi ayikaze idlale ngokulingana.UBuckley uthe uyazi ukuthi ubhekene nomsebenzi onzima wokufukula abadlali abangenakho ukuzethemba.“Kuyinto eyejwayelekile ukuthi uma iqembu lishiywa ngumqeqeshi abadlali baqale ukuzibuza ukuthi ngabe yini enye ezolandela. Njengoba ngibambile nje, umsebenzi wami wukuthi ngizame ukukhuthaza abadlali, ngibafunzelele ngaphambi komdlalo wangoLwesihlanu,” kusho uBuckley exoxisana nomnyango wezokuxhumana kwiMaritzburg.NgoLwesihlanu iMaritzburg izobhekana neSuperSport United emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eHarry Gwala Stadium ngo-8 ebusuku.UBuckley, obeyiphini likaTinkller futhi owake wadlala kwi-United, uthe uzokwenza okusemandleni akhe kodwa waxwayisa ngokuthi okuningi kusezandleni zabadlali.“Yisikhathi sokuthi abadlali bazibambele bona ngezandla zabo. Umdlalo okumele sidlalele ukufa nokuphila kuwo kube khona esikutholayo. Kumele sikuqonde ukuthi uma sifuna ukunqoba, kumele singalinge sizincenge izitha, singene kuzo zibekwa. Uma isimo sesifana nesethu, akusafanele neze udlale ibhola elihle kodwa sekumele ulwele ukuthola amaphuzu kwaphela,” usho kanje uBuckley.I-United akuyona kuphela esidilize umqeqeshi selokhu kuqale isizini, iBlack Leopards ixoshe uPatrick Aussems ngakho belu ukuphikwa yimiphumela. Ibe isiqasha uDylan Kerr wayinqobela umdlalo wokuqala ngokuhlula iTeam of Choice ngo 1-0 ngempelasonto edlule.
title: Unikwe izintambo zokuqeqesha isikhashana

text: ZIBAKHALELE abalisa abathathu abasolwa ngokudayisa kabusha amathikithi ebhola emdlalweni weNedbank Cup Final obuphakathi kweKaizer Chiefs neTS Galaxy ngoMgqibelo.Kuthiwa lo mdlalo obusenkundleni yezemidlalo eMoses Mabhida uphele ngaphandle kwezigameko ezinqala.Kuthiwa kuboshwe abalisa abathathu abasolwa ngokudayisa kabusha amathikithi. Oyedwa walaba balisa kuthiwa utholakale namathikithi angu-49 kwathi owesibili watholakala namathikithi angu-20 omunye watholakala namathikithi amabili.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbhele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi abasolwa abathathu baboshelwe amacala okuthengisa amathikithi enkundleni yezemidlalo iMoses Mabhida.Abasolwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kweminyaka engu-46 kuya kwengu-57 kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini namuhla.Amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi ukubakhona kwamaphoyisa kulo mdlalo kube nomthelela omuhle futhi kufanele kunconywe. Kulo mdlalo iKaizer Chiefs ishaywe ngegoli elilodwa eqandeni yiTS Galaxy.
title: Kuboshwe abathathu bedayisa amathikithi eNedbank Cup

text: UZOBUYELA ekubeni wujika nelanga owayeyiMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede ophinde washenxiswa ekubeni yilungu lesiShayamthetho nasemisebenzini ye-ANC yiqembu lakhe izolo.Lo ngqimphothwe wethuse abaningi njengoba leli qembu litshele abezindaba ukuthi uNkk Gumede obhekene namacala enkohlakalo yethenda yezigidi, nozakwabo uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu basazoke bame kancane ezintweni zaleli qembu kuze kube kuyacaca ngamacala ababhekene nawo.UNkk Gumede unezinsuku ezimbalwa engenile esiShayamthetho.UMabuyakhulu naye ubhekene necala lenkohlakalo yamathenda njengoNkk Gumede.USihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe akusikona ukuthi amalungu e-ANC ayaxoshwa kodwa kufanele ayovela phambi kwekhomishini ebhekelele ukuziphatha kwamalungu ale nhlangano.Uthe bavikela isithunzi se-ANC futhi namaqabane athintekayo ayakuqonda lokhu futhi ayahambisana nesinqumo sokuthi ahoxe kancane ezikhundleni zawo.“Akusikona ukuthi amalungu ayaxoshwa noma ayasula emsebenzini wawo kodwa sithi bonke ababhekene namacala ezinkantolo abahoxe ezikhundleni abajutshwe kuzona nasemsebenzini we-ANC,” kusho uZikalala.Lesi sinqumo sethuse abaningi njengoba i-ANC kulesi sifundazwe ngesonto eledlule ikhulume yaze yakhihliza amagwebu ivikela isinqumo sokuqokwa kukaNkk Gumede esiShayamthetho yize esabhekene namacala enkohlakalo enkantolo.Ehuba elinye iculo uZikalala uthe ngisho amakhansela abhekene namacala ezinkantolo kufanele ahoxe ezikhundleni zawo.UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, uthe ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal buzoxoxa nobuholi be-ANC kuzwelonke ukuzwa ukuthi azokwenziwa njani amalungu e-ANC abhekene nezinsolo ezingcolisa igama le-ANC kodwa angamangalelwe enkantolo.Uthe i-ANC yinhlangano eyingxenye yomphakathi, ewukhathalelayo futhi ewulalelayo uma unezikhalo.Lesi senzo senze ngisho abahlaziyi bepolitiki bakhwele badilika kubaholi be-ANC kulesi sifundazwe.Umhlaziyi wezePolitiki ozimele uMnuz Xolani Dube uchaze iKwaZulu-Natal njengesifundazwe esingenamholi. Uchaze uZikalala njengomholi ofana nento engekho uma ebuka izinqumo azithathile.“UZikalala noNtuli abakaze basebenza ndawo, lokhu kuyaziveza manje endleleni nasezinqumeni abazithathayo,” kusho uDube.Uthe kuzomele kube nengxoxo ejulile ngokuthi lesi sifundazwe sisabudinga yini lobu buholi.“Ngelinye ilanga abantu bakulesi sifundazwe bayovuka sekuthiwa ayisekho iKZN, isithathwe ngabanye abantu ngaphansi kwalaba baholi....Yihlazo leli. Lawa ngamasela uqobo adayise ngelinye isela elibuthakathaka,” kusho uDube.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaNkk Gumede igcine ingaphumelelanga kodwa okhulumela abalandeli bakhe, uMnuz Mzomuhle Dube, uthe ukube leli qembu alizange limsuse esikhundleni sobumeya, ngabe ayikho yonke le nto.“Kwakumele bamyeke ngoba kucacile abazi ukuthi kumele balusingathe kanjani lolu daba lwakhe.“Bekungamele baze bakhiphe nalesi sitatimende abasenze namhlanje (ngoLwesihlanu),” kusho okhulumela abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede, wagcizelela ukuthi lolu daba alukazophela.Uqhube wathi ukube ubeyi-ANC ubengeke akhiphe sitatimende ngoba abazi ukuthi babemsuselani kwaasekuqaleni ngoba kucacile luyabehlula udaba lwakhe.
title: I-ANC  ayinamholi KwaZulu-Natal: umhlaziyi

text: ALICACI ikusasa losonhlalakahle abaxhaswe uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi ngaphansi kwezinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo, osekuphele izinyanga ezintathu bengaholile.Labo sonhlalakahle abaqashwa ngaphansi kohlelo, iHome Based-Care, bathi bagcina ngoMashi ukuhola nokuyinyanga okuphele ngayo inkontileka evuselelwayo. Njengoba sekuphele izinyanga bengaholile nezinkontileka zingavuseleliwe, abazazi noma basenawo yini umsebenzi. NgoMsombuluko abanye babo babhikishe emahhovisi omnyango eMgungundlovu, bekhala nangokuthi sebefuna ukuqashwa ngokugcwele emnyangweni.Omunye wosonhlalakahle osebenzela eNseleni, uthe waqashwa ngo-2018, kwathiwa bafakwa kulolu hlelo ukuze bathole isipiliyoni.“Okusiphatha kabi ukuthi senza wonke umsebenzi wosonhlalakahle kodwa sihola ngaphansi kwabanye. Kumanje asazi noma izinkontileka zizovuselelwa yini uma sibhekene nalesi simo. Asanelisekanga nangezimpendulo esizithole ngoMsombuluko embhikishweni,” kusho yena.Omunye osebenzela eMandlankala, uthe sekukaningi bethula izinkinga zabo kubaphathi kodwa bengasizakali.“Asineme ngisho nangezimo esisebenza ngaphansi kwazo. Sisebenza ngokufanayo nosonhlalakahle abafunde njengathi kodwa asiphathwa ngokufana. Sisiza umphakathi ngokwaluleka nangokuzivikela nasezifweni namanje sisasebenza phezu kokungaholi.”Isitatimende esithunyelwe wumnyango siveza ukuthi kuyaphenywa ngodaba losonhlalakahle kusukela belethe izikhalo ngoMsombuluko.Kuvela ukuthi osonhlalakahle bebefuna ukukhuluma noNgqongqoshe uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, kwagcina kuthunyelwa iNhloko yoMnyango uNkk Nelisiwe Vilakazi. UNkk Vilakazi kuthiwa ubehambisana nezinye izikhulu zomnyango, ingxoxo yabo nosonhlalakahle yathatha amahora amane.“Osonhlalakahle bakubeke kwacaca ukuthi bafuna ukuqashwa ngokugcwele umnyango. Basebenza nezinhlangano ohlelweni lokulwa negciwane lengculaza, iTB nezinye izinkinga zomphakathi. Inhloko yomnyango icele osonhlalakahle ukuthi balinde izinsuku ezingu-14 ukuze kubhekwe izikhalo zabo, okubalwa nokungaholi izinyanga ezintathu,” kusho isitatimende.UNkk Vilakazi uthe bakhathazekile ngezinsolo ezibhekiswe emnyangweni ngenxa yezimo okuthiwa azigculisi, okusebenza ngaphansi kwazo labo sonhlalakahle.“Osonhlalakahle baneqhaza elikhulu ekuthuthukiseni imiphakathi, yingakho sizibophezela ukuzama zonke izindlela ukuxazulula izinkinga zabo,” kusho yena.Bangu-224 osonhlalakahle abangaphansi kwalolu hlelo abasebenzela KwaZulu-Natal.
title: Bakhala ngemiholo nokunye osonhlalakahle

text: UTHISHA odle umhlanganiso eqwaqwada abanye emncintiswaneni wothisha abavelele eNingizimu Afrika ekufundiseni iSayensi, uthe kwaba yiqhinga likaNkulunkulu ukuthi ayeke umsebenzi awufundela angene ekufundiseni.UMnuz Mfanafuthi Nkosi (30) waseMadadeni, eNewcastle, ofundisa ePanorama Combined eNewcastle, udle umhlanganiso ekufundiseni iSayensi wawina imoto, izindondo, ivawusha, i-laptop, printer kanjalo nomakhalekhukhwini.Uwine emncintiswaneni wokuklomelisa othisha abavelele obungempelasonto eGoli.UNkosi oneziqu zeGeology azithola eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal ngo-2012 uqale ukufundisa ngo-2013.“Kwaba yiqhinga likaNkulunkulu ukuthi ngifundise ngoba ngiyathanda ukusiza umphakathi nezingane. Ngiqale ngiyobambela uthisha owayeyobeletha ngifundisa iMaths. Kuthe kuhamba uthisha owayefundisa iSayensi ngangena kuyona ngayifundisa,” kusho uNkosi.Uthe waba esenza iPGCE ukuze abe neziqu zokufundisa wathi ngo-2017 uqashwe ngokugcwele kulesi sikole.Nyakenye uthe ufundise iSayensi kwa-matric, wayisusa ku-48% wayiyisa ku-93%.“Kubafundi abangu-30 kufeyile ababili kuphela, kunabanye abathole o-A kulesi sifundo. Nyakenye ngikhohlwe wumsebenzi engawufundela ngoba ngithanda ukusiza abantu. Ngiyazi ayikho imali ekufundiseni, ikhona kulokhu engakufundela kodwa nginothando lokuthuthukisa ingane emnyama.”Uthe eqeda ukuthola iziqu zeGeology uke wazama ukuyofuna umsebenzi waya naseWitbank kodwa kwangalunga.Kwezemfundo wangena ngokuhambisa izinto zakhe ezama inhlanhla emahhovisi omnyango eMajuba ukuze angene kwi-database.“Nganginemiphumela emihle, ngisho esikoleni ngangiyiphasa iSayensi ngicabanga ukuthi ingakho bangibiza ukuthi ngizobamba ngoba imiphumela yami yayimihle.”Uthe noma bengenazo zonke izinsiza zeSayensi kodwa unezindlela afundisa ngazo acabanga ukuthi yizona ezimsizayo.“Noma amafoni engavunyelwe esikoleni kodwa ekilasini lami abafundi ngiyabagqugquzela ukuthi baqophe konke okusuke kufundwa ukuze bakwazi ukukusebenzisa uma sebesekhaya noma sebebuyekeza. Sine-WhatsApp group, esiyisebenzisayo ngisho ngingekho abafundi bayakwazi ukubuza ngibaphendule akudingeki ukuthi ngize ngibe sesikoleni,” kusho uNkosi.Uthe uma sekushube ngempela sekuzobhalwa kuba namakhempu lapho kulalwa khona kwakhe ukuze kubuyekezwe.“Ngishintshe igaraji ngalenza isikhungo sokufundisa iSayensi. Angikasibhalisi lesi sikhungo kodwa ngisiza nabafundi bakwezinye izikole ngalesi sifundo. Sisebenzisana namaphoyisa asizayo ngokuzulazula uma sekufundwa ekhaya ukuze abafundi baphephe ngoba kukhona nabafundi abasuka kude kakhulu. Unkosikazi wami ungeseka kakhulu kulokhu ngoba engikwenzayo kusiza ingane emnyama,” kusho uNkosi.Uthe ugqugquzelwe nguthishanhloko wakhe ukuthi angenele lo mncintiswano.“Uthishanhloko walala isibili kulo mncintiswano ngo-2015 ezintweni ezithinta ubuholi. Ungigqugquzele kakhulu ukuthi ngiwungenele ethi ucabanga ukuthi ngingawudla umhlanganiso, nakhu ngempela ngiwinile.”
title: Unqobile uthisha ofundisa iSayensi

text: UYengeni owake walahlwa yicala lenkohlakalo, kuthiwa wenze isiphakamiso emhlanganweni wisigungu sokusebenza nsuku zonke.Kuthiwa uYengeni uthe uma uRamaphosa ezimisele ngokulwa nenkohlakalo kufanele abe yisibonelo yena qobo lwakhe.Umbono kaYengeni ulandela owelungu lesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC e-Eastern Cape, uMnuz Andile Lungisa, oke waveza ukuthi uRamaphosa kufanele ashenxe ngenxa yezinsolo ezimlandelayo zemali eyasebenza engqungqutheleni.Lokhu kwenzeka nje kunencwadi esematheni kulezi zinsuku kaRamaphosa, ayibhalele amalungu e-ANC ngodaba lwenkohlakalo bese kuba nenye okuthiwa ibhalwe wuMnuz Jacob Zuma eyibhekise kuRamaphosa.Kuthiwa ekaZuma ikhala ngokuthi uRamaphosa ugeje umgodi ngokuthi abhekise incwadi kuwo wonke amalungu e-ANC ethi akhohlakele, akubeni kungabantu abambalwa abatamuza imali kahulumeni ngesikhathi inqwaba yabantu ihlupheka.Ubhekwe ngabomvu umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu e-ANC futhi udaba oluphambili yilo olwenkohlakalo.Indaba yenkohlakalo igqame kakhulu ngesikhathi segciwane iCorona, ngemva kokuba kuvele ukuthi kunabathile abebexephula umkhome.
title: UYengeni ufuna uRamaphosa asule

text: Nebala ngivule umsakazo ngifuna ukuzizwela. Nangempela ubengekho kubambe uHeazy noZisto.Kuvele kwangikhanyela ukuthi kufakazela amahemuhemu abekhona okuthi useyojoyina Ukhozi FM njengoba eqalile izolo lapho ethula khona uhlelo lwantambama noMroza Buthelezi. Empeleni cishe mibili manje iminyaka kunamahemuhemu okuthi uMzokoloko uyojoyina Ukhozi kodwa kuphindekuthuleke.Ukhozi alugcinanga ngokuthatha uMzokoloko kodwa luphinde lwashaqa noKing Sfiso obenza izinhlelo zomculo i-house.Ngike ngabona ku-Instagram ekhasini loKhozi kubhalwe ukuthi “siqedile ngomunye umsakazo engingeke ngiwusho”.Akuphelanga sikhathi esingakanani kwaphendulwa kweleGagasi nombhalo othi “#WeGotTalent” engingawuchaza ngokuthi uthi banalo ithalente. Bekunesithombe esinombhalo othi “Kuqediwe ngathi? Sibatshele noma”.Cha uma ngiyibuka le ndaba sikhulu isikhala esivulekile ngokuhamba kukaMzokoloko. Phela ubenza uhlelo olubalulekile kakhulu ovukela kulo ekuseni. Yilo okumele lukudonse ukuze uzosale usuqhubeka nokulalela umsakazo usuku lonke.Abaphathi beGagasi bathi sekuzoqhubeka uNjabs Zwane noHeazy kuze kube kufika isikhathi sezinguquko. Bobabili laba bebevele basebenza noMzokoloko.Ngokwami bengizofaka u-Alex Mthiyane ukuthi kube wuye obambayo kuze kube kutholakala umuntu ozothatha izintambo uma lo msakazo sewenza izinguquko.Uma ukhumbula ngesikhathi u-Alex ekhishwa kungena uMzokoloko, kukhona vele ababa nokukhala ngoba babemthanda. Ngakho ukubanjiswa kwakhe kuzokwenza singanakeki kangako isikhala sikaMzokoloko ngoba kufakwa umuntu onamava.U-Alex engabanjiswa nabo oHeazy noNjabs ngenhloso yokuthi bancele ulwazi kuye ze kuthi uma sekufika isikhathi sezinguquko babe sebenolwazi oluthe xaxa. Kodwa ngiyayazi futhi ingozi engaba khona uma ubambisa u-Alex, uzokhumbula ukuthi u-Alex uphume kulolu hlelo esalwenza kahle kakhulu, kwaba wukuthi umsakazo wawuthatha enye indlela nje, hhayi ngoba kukhona okubi okwakwenziwa wu-Alex. Ngiyazi ukufaka yena isikhashana kungenza abalaleli bajabule kuze kweqe kanti uzophuma ngemuva kwenyanga kugcine kubahlukumeza futhi lokho. Iqiniso wukuthi u-Alex usemnkantshubomvu kwezokusakaza.Ebusuku ohlelweni Indaba ukhona uBongani Gina oke abambe vele uma u-Alex engekho. Angaqhubeka abambe u-Alex esesekuseni ngaphandle kwenkinga ngoba yinto aseyijwayele vele.Ngingaze ngikhohlwe, mangithi halala kuNomfundo The Dazzling One osehlabe ikhefu lokuyoteta.UZisto uke alubambe uhlelo lwakhe uma engekho ngakho ngeke ibe khona inkinga ngo-9 kuya ku-12 emini phakathi nesonto.
title: [IMIBONO] - Ubengasiza u-Alex Mthiyane  kolwasekuseni

text: AYAQHUBEKA nemizamo yawo yokungenisa kuthelevishini amawele aseNewlands West njengoba ezobonakala ohlelweni lwaku-e.tv, i-Ultimate Braai Master.La mawele, uPretty noPrecious Zondo (25), sekunesikhathi ezama ukungenisa kuthelevishini njengoba eminyakeni eyedlule ake azama inhlolokhono ngesikhathi iMTV ifuna umethuli wezinhlelo okwagcina kunqobe khona uNomuzi Mabena.Ake aba nohlelo alwethula esiteshini somphakathi iGau TV, uhlelo lomculo, iVibe Zone.I-Ultrimate Braai Master, okuzoba yisizini yayo yesihlanu, izoqala ukukhonjiswa ngoFebhuwari 5 ngo-4 ntambama.La mawele azibiza ngeSpice Girls ohlelweni. Abanye abazobe bencintisana nawo kukhona kubo uGugu Ngobese noSamkelisiwe Cele baseSprings kanti amaqembu esewonke angu-10.UPrecious uthe bahambela inhlolokhono yohlelo, ngenhlanhla bathathwa.“Akukhona ukuthi wuhlelo esasifuna ukungena kulo kodwa sezwa ngenhlolokhono sabe sesiyozama. Sifuna ukulokhu sivela kuthelevishini ngethemba lokuthi kukhona ozosibona bese esinikeza ithuba. Akulula ukungena ngoba kwezinye izinhlelo akubi nenhlolokhono evuleleke emphakathini kodwa kubizwa abathize kuphela,” kusho uPrecious.Uthe bazolokhu beqhubeka nezinhlolokhono kuze kube bathola eziteshini ezinababukeli abaningi.Kulolu hlelo amaqembu ababili ahambela izindawo ezahlukene kuleli, lapho efike ancintisane khona ngokupheka ukudla okwehlukene emlilweni.Abanqobile bazohlomula nge-voucher yakwaGame kaR200 000, imoto iSuzuki Grand Vitara nokheshi kaR400 000.
title: Amawele aseThekwini ohlelweni ku-e.tv

text: USEKUBHACENI umndeni wobhekene necala lokubulala umculi osafufusa, ogwazwe wabulawa esigamekweni esenzeke kwaK eMlaza ngeledlule.Umndeni kaMnuz Mvuyisi Mabhuti Moguda (30), obevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza ngoMsombuluko, uthe selokhu kwenzeke isigameko usuthuka izanya emuva kokuthi uhlaselwe ngamalungu omphakathi ethukutheliswe wukubulawa ngesihluku kukaLindokuhle Cele (23). Kuthiwa ashise indlu yommangalelwa. Ukuhlaselwa komndeni kuwuphoqe ukuthi uyobhaca esihlotsheni, ulala obenyoni usaba ukuthi bazowuthungatha bawuthole.Imindeni yomibili, okamufi nokammangalelwa ngokuhlukana, ichazele abezindaba ngenzwabethi ngokuholele ekuxabaneni kukamsolwa nomufi.Amalungu omndeni kaMoguda abesenkantolo ngesikhathi kuvela umsolwa, athe ezwa kuthiwa ummangalelwa uthi ugwaze umufi ngoba ubenegqubu lokuthi wayenabantu abamnukubeza ngokocansi esigamekweni esenzeke ngoNcibijane nonyaka. Kodwa umndeni kamufi uthi uyaqala ukuzwa udaba olunjalo.Ilungu lomndeni kaMoguda elingathandanga ukudalulwa, lithe umfowabo ngemva kokudlwengulwa uhambe amasonto amabili wayohlala ezihlotsheni enamahloni ngokumehlele, esephenduke inhlekisa.“Sithole ukuthi iningi labantu endaweni belazi ngalesi senzo, bekuyithina kuphela ebesingazi. Kuthe uma sekuvela kwafakazelwa yizimpawu njengoba kwesinye isikhathi ubehlale ezivalele,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.UMVUYISI Mabhuti Moguda evele enkantolo ngoMsombuluko ngecala lokubulala umculi osafufusa eMlaza uLindokuhle Cele. Isithombe: Motshwari MofokengLithe batshelwe ngabathile ukuthi umsolwa wayehleli nomufi nabangani bakamufi ngoNcibijane bephuza, okusolakala ukuthi umufi nabangani bakhe bamfakela okuthile okuyisidakamizwa maqede bazitika ngaye ngocansi beshintshana. Liveze ukuthi emuva kwalesi sehlo umsolwa uhambe amasonto amabili wayohlala esihlotsheni ngenxa yokuthi ubesephenduke inhlekisa. Uthe ukholwa wukuthi ugcine esembambela igqubu umufi, okwenze agcine esemgwaza ngoba ubengaxoxi ngokumehlele.Umndeni uvumile ukuthi okwenziwe yilungu lawo kuphambene nomthetho futhi kubi, kwakumele likhulume nomndeni, livule necala. Kodwa uchaze ummangalelwa njengomuntu onenhliziyo enhle obesebenzela futhi ondla umndeni wakhe.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi eKZN, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, ugxeke isenzo sokubulawa kukaCele, wathi ummangalelwa kumele athole isijezo esimfanele.UNksz Nomusa Cele, ongubabekazi kaLindokuhle, utshele izintatheli ukuthi bezwe ngabantu ukuthi umsolwa umbulale umufi ngoba emuhle nokuthi udumile.“Sizwa kuthiwa ubemzondela ubuhle bakhe, kangangoba kuthiwa ubeze asho ukuthi ufuna ukumona ubuso. Uma sibheka indlela abulewe ngayo njengoba egwazwe ebusweni ummese wasala esweni, kufakazela khona loku okushiwoyo,” kusho uNksz Cele.UMNDENI kamufi, uLindokuhle Cele, ngesikhathi bevakashelwe wuNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza ukuzobhonga emswaneni izolo. Kusuka kwesobunxele wuNksz Nomusa Cele uyisekazi kamufi, uNkk Funani Cele nogogo kamufi uNkk Zondeni Cele Isithombe: MOTSHWARI MOFOKENG/ANAYomibili imindeni iphikile ukuthi laba bebengabangani kodwa yavuma ukuthi bebazana futhi bejwayelene.UNksz Cele uveze ukuthi bengumndeni bebecabanga ukuthi ingxabano kamsolwa nomufi yaqala ngesikhathi umufi enqaba nomngani wakhe wesifazane kumsolwa, okuthiwa wayemfuna. Uphinde waveza ukuthi utshelwe ukuthi umsolwa ubulale umufi ngoba ubemzonda ngokuthi uyisitabane. Ngesikhathi umsolwa engena enkantolo, izandla zakhe bezibhandishiwe okuvele ukuthi walimala ngesikhathi egwaza umufi.Icala lihlehlele uMsombuluko wesonto elizayo lapho ummangalelwa kulindeleke ukuthi afake isicelo sebheyili.
title: Igqubu nomona kubulawa umculi eMlaza

text:
UHLELO olwaluhlose ukuvuselela ngomculo wokholo seluphenduke inkundla yokuxazulula izinkinga zabalaleli emsakazweni womphakathi, umsakazi walo osezuze nezindondo ezahlukene.I
Dumisa Nathi Gospel Show engena ngeSonto ngo-6 ekuseni kwiVibe FM isizakhele udumo kubalaleli ngokudingida izihloko ezahlukene, ezinye ezibashiya bekhihla esikaNandi. Lolu hlelo olwethulwa uWiseman Mpunzana waKwaDukuza, ludlala umculo wokholo luphinde lube nezikhulumi ngezihloko ezahlukene. Kuphinde kube nesimenywa esifunda i
Bhayibheli sihlaziye nentshumayelo ukuvuselela abalaleli.Exoxa ngokuqala kwalolu hlelo, uMpunzana onguthisha eMelville Primary School, uthe waqala ukusakaza kwiVibe ngo-2009 bebathathu ohlelweni. Wabuye wangena yedwa kusukela ngo-2010 kuthiwa akadlale kuphela umculo opholile oxubile, athe wabona ukuthi kuzomehlula.“Ngabona ukuthi ngenxa yokuthi ngiwumuntu weGospel kuzongehlula ukudlala olunye uhlobo lomculo ohlukile. Saxoxisana nabaphathi besiteshi bathi kungcono ngidlale i-International Gospel kodwa nayo kwabonakala ukuthi ngeke kudlalwe yona yodwa ngagcina ngidlala u-90% wayo,” echaza.Uthe uhlelo lwanyukela kwelinye izinga esedlala umculo wokholo oxubile ohlelweni aluqamba ngokuthi 
Umthombo Wempilo.UMpunzana uthe naye wagcina emangala indlela uhlelo olube nesasasa ngayo ngoba belungalalelwa amakholwa kuphela. Ngo-2014 uhlelo lwashintsha igama lwabizwa nge
Dumisa Nathi Gospel Show ngo-6 kuya ku-10 ekuseni yize uMpunzana ethi akushintshanga umongo walo.“Uhlelo luyakhula kakhulu, namanje ngishayelwa ngisho abasejele, abanye bangitshele ukuthi basonta ngalo uhlelo. Ukuba kwami kulolu hlelo kungikhombise ukuthi abantu bathwele ngenxa yezinkinga. Kwesinye isikhathi ngihlangana nabo ngesikhathi sami ngibafunele nosizo,” kusho uMpunzana.Yize engakaze aqeqeshelwe ukuba ngumsakazi kodwa uthi ubevele ewuthanda umsakazo njengomlaleli. Ngaphambi kweVibe FM wayesakaza esiteshini somphakathi samakholwa iGood News, eVerulam. Ngo-2011 wathola indondo kumaSABC Crown Gospel Music Awards ngenxa yalo uhlelo, ngo-2012 waphuma kwiTop 4 kumaMTN Radio Awards eGoli. Wabuye wahlonishwa kumaMayoral Awards, KwaDukuza nakwiNdondo Awards, eMgungunndlovu. NgeSonto ubehlonishwa KwaDukuza kuma-Life Changers Awards ngeqhaza alenze ukushintsha impilo yabantu. Uma engekho emsakazweni ukhonze ukusebenza nomphakathi futhi unesikhundla sokuba yi-Elder ebandleni. Ngenxa yomsebenzi wakhe emsakazweni abanye bambiza ngomfundisi nokho yize ekuthatha njengobizo ukusakaza.
title: Luthinta impilo yabantu olweVibe FM

text: UKWESABA kwabantu ukuya kodokotela ngenxa yeCovid-19 kwenza odokotela bakhathazeke ngoba sekubangele abanye bashaywe yinhliziyo nesifo sohlangothi.Ucwaningo olwenziwe ngabePharma Dynamics luveze ukuthi kwehle ngo-90% ukubonwa kodokotela selokhu kuqale iCovid19. Ucwaningo olwenziwe kodokotela abahlukene kusukela ngoMeyi, luveza ukuthi abantu sebeyasaba ukubonana nabo ngenxa yeCovid19.UDkt Anna-Marie Grebe, iMedical Consultant kwaPharma Dynamics, uthe yize abanye behlaliswe emakhaya ngenxa yemigomo nabanezifo ezibucayi abasayingeni. Lezi yiziguli okumele ngabe zibonana nodokotela ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuyobheka isimo sempilo.“Akumele abantu abanenkinga yokukwenyuka komfutho wegazi bahlale emakhaya bengazazi isimo sabo.”Uthe iziguli ezinezifo okubalwa kuzo ushukela, umfutho wegazi nenhliziyo kumele zizinake, zibheke nezimpawu zokugula.Uthe izimpawu okumele zinakwe kubalwa ukuncisheka ukuphefumula, isiyezi nokushaya kakhulu kwenhliziyo.UDkt Grebe uthe ukwehla kwezibalo kushaye wonke amazwe kanti odokotela abaningi basancamela ukubonana ngqo neziguli kunokuxhumana nazo ngocingo. Ngokwalolu cwaningo kuthiwa bawu-92% odokotela abasancamela ukubonana neziguli ubuso nobuso, bancane abancamela ubuchwepheshe bama-video ne-internet.UDkt Portia Kheswa-Masinga waseThekwini, uthe kusebenzeka kanzima ngalezi zikhathi wakufakazela ukuthi sehlile isibalo seziguli esibonana nabo. Uthe bonke ozakwabo bakhala esifanyo ngenxa yokuthi iziguli sezisaba ukuya kodokotela. Okunye okunciphisa izibalo wukuthi abanye abasenayo imali yokubonana nodokotela, okwenza bancamele ukuya emitholampilo kahulumeni.“Okokuqala emlandweni abeHPCSA (Health Professions Council of South Africa), bavumele ukuthi odokotela basebenzise ucingo noma ubuchwepheshe ukusiza iziguli. Akuzona zonke iziguli ongakwazi ukuzisiza ngaphandle kokubonana nazo ubuso nobuso. Iziguli ezinezifo ezibucayi okungenani uyaxhumana nazo ngocingo ubheke isimo sempilo, ubhale nemithi okumele ithengwe. Kunzima kulabo abagula kakhulu okudingeka bafakwe ne-drip,” kusho uDkt Kheswa-Masinga.Naye uthe usesebenzela ekhaya nge-i-internet nangocingo kodwa kunzima kubantu abadala abakholelwa ukuthintwa udokotela nokujova.“Umkhakha wethu ushintshe kakhulu futhi sishayelekile nasephaketheni,” kusho yena.
title: I-Covid-19 yehlise isibalo sabantu abaya kodokotela

text: UMHOLI wamaqembu kamufi uMtshengiseni “Indidane” Gcwensa, uPotso Ngobese, uthe kunzima ukungena ezinyathelweni zalo mculi kodwa umsebenzi uyaqhubeka.Indidane yashona ngo-2015 ngemuva kokugula isikhathi eside, umsebenzi wokuhola amaqembu wawunika uPotso.“Kunzima ukungena ezinyathelweni zeNdidane kodwa ngiwuphethe nabafowethu, yingakho umsebenzi uqhubeka,” kusho uPotso.UPotso ubekhuluma naleli phephandaba ngemuva kokuthi Ezendidane zikhiphe i-albhamu yesithathu, ethi Inkinga Iproblem enezingoma ezingu-14.Amaqembu eNdidane akhipha kabili ngonyaka njengoba ngePhasika kuphuma i-albhamu yaMageza Amahle bese kuthi ngoDisemba kube Ezendidane.“Ngangithi ngizobamba singafuni kuphele ngomsebenzi weNdidane kodwa manje umuzi uyanda. Nababengabaza bayabona manje,” kusho yena.UPotso uthe i-albhamu yabo ibophele izingoma ezingalalelwa yiwo wonke umuntu njengoba bekhuluma ngezinto ezahlukene.“Inomyalezo kuwo wonke umuntu. Kukhona izingoma ezikhuluma ngothando, ukudabuka nezesonto. Ezesonto asizishiyi.”KumaCrown bekuqokwe Amageza Amahle ngengoma ethi Ngithandaze emunxeni weBest Gospel Maskandi. Lo mklomelo bawuthathile.Uthe kwi-albhamu usebenze nonina uTholakele Ngobese weZingane Zoma noMashwabana Mbatha.UPotso uthe abalandeli babo kumele balindele ukubabona ngasemakubo njengoba bezohambela isifundazwe sonke beyothula i-albhamu nakwezinye ezingaphandle.
title: Kunzima ukuvala isikhala seNdidane kohola amaqembu

text: KUBOSHWE omalume abathathu okuthiwa bashaye umshana wabo wafa eShane Reserve, eGreytown.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe omalume abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-25 no-26 baboshelwe ukubulala umshana wabo oneminyaka ewu-20.Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, umshana wesifazane wahamba ekhaya eShane Reserve ngoMashi 24 engazisanga muntu waze wabuya ngoMashi 28.Kuthiwa esebuya omalume bambuza ukuthi uphumaphi base beyamshaya waze waquleka. Kuthe uma kubizwa abezimo eziphuthumayo bafike baqinisekisa ukuthi ushonile. Kuvulwe icala lokubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa eMatimatolo ukuze kuphenywe kwabe sekuboshwa omalume.UCaptain Gwala uthe omalume bavele izolo enkantolo yeMantshi eGreytown ngecala lokubulala.Kobunye ubugebengu amaphoyisa aseThekwini abophe amadoda amabili emijondolo ekuHoffman Place, eSpringfield, ngezinsolo zokubulawa koMnuz Menzi Ngubelanga (26).Amadoda aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-23 no-29 kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini namhlanje.Ngokusho kwesitatimende esikhishwe amaphoyisa, uNgubelanga uvakashele abangani bakhe kuHoffman Place ngeSonto. Kube sekuba nengxabano phakathi kwakhe nabo.Kuthiwa ube eseshaywa ekhanda ngesagila wabuye wagwazwa.Uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela kodwa wagcina ngokushona.Kube sekuvulwa icala esiteshini samaphoyisa eMayville. Abaseshi baqale uphenyo olubaholele ekuthini babophe amadoda amabili.
title: Kuboshwe omalume abathathu ngokufa komshana

text: INHLANGANO yabahleli iSouth African Editors Forum (Sanef) ithi ikhathazekile futhi idumele ngesigameko sokuhlukunyezwa kwezintatheli ngesikhathi zisebenza embhikisweni wabalandeli beMeya yaseThekwini uNkk Zandile Gumede.“ISanef ikhathazekile ngezigameko eziqhubekayo zokuhlukunyezwa nokwesatshiswa kwezintatheli. Sinxusa abaholi neziphathimandla zomthetho ukuba benze isiqiniseko ukuthi izintatheli ziphephile."Akusona isigameko sokuqala ukuthi izintatheli zihlaselwe odabeni oluthinta iMeya yaseThekwini,” kusho isitatimende seSanef.ISanef ithe ziningi izindlela ezikhona ezingasetshenziswa uma kukhona onganeme ngokusebenza kwentatheli ethile.Isitebela sezindaba i-Independent Media sikugxekile kakhulu ukuhlukunyezwa, ukuhlaselwa nokushaywa kwezintatheli ngemuva kwesigameko sokushaywa kwentatheli uMnuz Sihle Mavuso.UMavuso uhlukunyeziwe washaywa ngamaphoyisa omkhandlu ngesikhathi esebenza embhikishweni wabalandeli beMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede izolo.UMavuso ubonakale kwi-video ebanjwa ngesidlozana ngamaphoyisa, emshaya emlalisa phansi emgwaqweni ngendlela okwenziwa ngayo uma kuboshwa izigebengu.Ukuhlukunyezwa kukaMavuso, kulandele isigameko sokuhlukunyezwa kwezinye izintatheli zase-Independent uMnuz Piet Rampedi noMnuz Mzilikazi wa Afrika.URampedi noWa Afrika bafake isikhalo bavula necala lokwesatshiswa ngemuva kokulandelwa yizimoto abangazazi ebezisolisa.URampedi uthathe izithombe zezimoto ebezibalandela.“I-Independent Media ikhathazekile ngokunyuka kwezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwezintatheli eMzansi."Ukuze intando yeningi isebenze, izintatheli kumele zikwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wazo ngokukhululeka nangaphandle kokwesaba,” kusho isitatimende esithunyelwe uphiko lwezokuxhumana e-Independent.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka naye ukugxekile ukuhlaselwa kwezintatheli eCity Hall.Uthe abezindaba kumele bakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wabo ngokukhululeka ngaphandle kokwesatshiswa. UHlomuka usejube izikhulu zomnyango wakhe ukuba zimnike umbiko ogcwele ngalesi sigameko.NoSihlalo we-IFP kuzwelonke, uMnuz Blessed Gwala ukugxekile ukuhlaselwa kwezintatheli embhikishweni wabalandeli bemeya. Uthe amaphoyisa kumele abophe izigebengu hhayi izintatheli.Unxuse amaphoyisa ukuba asebenzise umfutho ofanayo noma ebopha izigebengu ezibulala abantu.UGwala uphinde wanxusa uNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha eKZN uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda ukuba aphenye ngalesi sigameko.UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli ucashunwe kwabezindaba ethi bayawugxeka umbhikisho wabalandeli bakaNkk Gumede. Khonamanjalo, iDA eThekwini yona inxuse amaphoyisa akuba ababophe abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede.Umholi wekhokhisa yeDA eThekwini uNksz Nicole Graham uthe akukwazi ukuthi kuvunyelwe abantu ukuba badale ukuthi lungabikhona uzinzo edolobheni.
title: ISanef idumele kuhlukunyezwa izintatheli

text: INKANTOLO yeMantshi eseHilbrow, ilihlehlisile icala lowesilisa osolwa ngokuputshuza iphepha lesibili le-mathematics likamatric, nyakenye.UMnuz Themba Daniel Shikwambana  (31) ubevele kule nkantolo ngoLwesithathu, icala lakhe lahlehliselwa uMashi16.  Ummangalelwa wayengumsebenzi wenkampani egaya amaphepha esebenzisana noMnyango wezeMfundo eGauteng, i-Lebone Litho Printers. Uboshwe ngoNovemba nyakenye ngemuva kokuthi ummnyango weMfundo eyisisekelo, udlulisele icala emaphoyiseni ophiko loKlebe, ukuthi aphenye kanti ungaphandle ngebheyili ka-R1000.Imibiko yokuputshuka kwephepha lesibili le-mathematics yavela sekusele ihora ukuthi libhalwe. Ngesonto elilandeyo kwaphinde kwabikwa ukuputshuka kwephepha lesayensi.  Umnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo waphakamisa ukuthi lawa maphepha abhalwe kabusha ngoDisemba14 no-17 kodwa iNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli yasichitha isiphakamiso. Abekho okusabikwe ukuthi baboshiwe ngokuputshuka kwephepha lesayensi. Kulindeleke ukuthi imiphumela ka-matric imenyezelwe ngoFebhuwari 22 njengoba uhlelo lokuqoqwa kwamamaki luphothulwe kuleli sonto, kanti ngesonto eledlule luqediwe uhlelo lokumakwa kwamaphepha. UMnyango weMfundo eyiSisekelo uzohambisa umbiko ogcwele emkhandlwini olawula izingabunjalo lemiphumela ka-matric kuleli Umalusi, okuyiwona ozoqinisekisa ukwethembeka kwemiphumela ka-matric yanyakenye.
title: Lihlehlile elosolwa ngokuputshuza elikamatric

text: NGEMUVA kokuphucwa iqatha emlonyeni ezakhe zihlulwa ngoqhwasha ka 1-0 yi-Orlando Pirates kowandulela owamanqamu weNedbank Cup, umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows, uClinton Larsen, usebheke ukuthi abuyise izinduku la maqembu esephinde ehlangana ngempelasonto kowokuvala iligi.I-Arrows eguqe ngegoli lika-Abbubaker Mobara, ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu ngempelasonto, izokwamukela iPirates emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngoMgqibelo eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.Nakuba Abafana Bes’thende bephuthwe yithuba lokusayina isheke lika-R7 million elihambisana nokuba ngompetha beNedbank Cup kodwa umdlalo wangempelasonto ungabanikeza ithuba lokulwela * -R8 million otholwa ngompetha beMTN 8 ngesizini ezayo.Iqembu likaLarsen njengamanje liyibambe endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-35, lidinga amaphuzu amathathu kwiPirates ukuze libe nethuba lokuqeda kwiTop 8.Ukuhlula eZimnyama kuzoxikixa isigxivizo sokuthi okokuqala emlandweni wePremier Soccer League ziqeda isizini ngaphandle kwamaqembu ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu.Amanye amaqembu abanga iTop 8, iMaritzburg United, Ajax Cape nePolokwane City. IPlatinum Stars nePirates sekungadinga bawine ngembudlu yamagoli bese eyahlulwa la maqembu angaphezulu kwabo ukuze bathole intuba.“Umphumela lo (ka 1-0) awusho lutho. Kunalokho uyasigqugquzela ngoba sesiyazi ukuthi singaya kulowa mdlalo sifike silihlule leli qembu. Sicishe sakwenza namuhla (ngeSonto), ngesonto elizayo uma sisebenzisa amathuba silungise amaphutha singakwazi ukuwina,” kusho uLarsen.Lo mqeqeshi uthe kungenzeka ukuthi abadlali bakhe bathuswe yisiteji ikakhulukazi esiwombeni sokuqala. Abalandeli iningi labo obekungabePirates bebephume ngobuningi eMagogo.“Siyiqembu eliselincane kungenzeka ukuthi mhlawumbe abanye abadlali basindekile. Asizange sibahlakaze kanti nebhola besililahla kodwa ngiyaziqhenya ngabo, ekugcineni bazinikele ngakho konke. Njengoba sesiphumile kowomkhumulajezi kumele sigxile emdlalweni wethu wokugcina weligi.”ULarsen uthe uyakuqonda ukuthi iqembu lakhe alizange likwazi ukubamba umgqigqo kule sizini kodwa ukholwa wukuthi izikhinsi abadlule kuzona zizobenza iqembu elingcono kumasizini ezayo.“Abadlali bazofunda emidlalweni efuze lena. Bazokhula, ngethemba ukuthi ngesizini ezayo sizokwenza okungcono emiqhudelwaneni ngoba kukhona ukukhula engikubonayo umdlalo nomdlalo. Kumasizini ezayo laba badlali bazobe sebevuthiwe, sibe nesikwati esihle,” kusho uLarsen.
title: ULarsen ufuna babuyise izinduku

text: PHEZU kokuthi abaphathi baMaZulu befisa ukuthi iqembu labo libe sembangweni wokunqoba isicoco seligi kodwa akuwona umbandela abawubekele umqeqeshi, uCavin “Mthakathi” Johnson, obekelwe umgomo wamaphuzu angu-45 azoqinisekisa indawo kwiTop 8.Lokhu kuvezwe yimenenja jikelele yoSuthu, uLunga Sokhela, ebiphawula ngomgomo abawubekele umqeqeshi njengoba esekwisizini yakhe yesithathu ekuleli qembu.“Kufanele sibe neqiniso.
