Ngeke senze ihaba ngokuthi sifuna ukunqoba isicoco seligi.“Khona singajabula ukuthi sibe yiqembu eliqhudelana ngokulinganayo nabangayo. “Esikudingayo ukubona iqembu lisheshe lifinyelela eduze kwamaphuzu awu-24 ngaphambi kokuthi kuphele isigaba sokuqala semidlalo yePremiership.“Thina sikholelwa ekutheni abadlali sinabo abangakwazi ukuthi basitholele amaphuzu awu-45 nokuthi bahambe ibanga elide kwiTelkom Knockout neNedbank Cup.“Ngesizini edlule sisuke sakhungathwa yizinkinga ezisehlele nesingeke sakhomba muntu ngenjumbane ngazo. Ngeke sibe sesibeka umbandela oyihaba,”kusho uSokhela.Uveze ukuthi bafuna amalungiselelo okuqala kwesizini entsha abe sezingeni eliphezulu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayiqala ngegiya eliphezulu imidlalo yePremiership.“Sithe umqeqeshi akanikeze bonke abadlali ithuba lokuthi baziveze njengoba kukhona abadlali beMDC (Multichoice Diski Challenge) abakhushulelwe eqenjini elikhulu abanjengo Sibusiso Maluleke, Sandile Khumalo, Charlie Hlalele noNtuthuko Madela okumele banikezwe ithuba ukuze basikhombise ukuthi basiphatheleni njengoba sibonile kwenzeka kuSphe Maduna.“Njengamanje uyabanikeza ithuba ejimini nabo bakhombisa ukuzikhandla,”kusho uSokhela.Amalungiselelo esizini entsha AmaZulu azolwa ngaphandle kukaMarc van Heerden, omunye wabadlali abanamava abebeyingxenye yeqembu laseThekwini.UVan Heerden (31) akwaziwa ukuthi ubheke kuphi ngempela kodwa maningi amathuba okuthi ubuyela ngakubo eGauteng kwazise udabuka eBenoni. Leli nxele bese kuyihlandla lesibili lidlala kuMaZulu. Like lathi qu kwiChippa United nakwi-Orlando Pirates.Usuthu luvula isizini ezayo neBidvest Wits eKing Zwelithini, eMlaza ngo-Agasti 3.Imidlalo yokuqala yePremiership:Ngo-Agasti 3:Stellenbosch v Chippa, eKapa ngo-3pm; Sundowns v SuperSport Utd, e-Atteridgeville ngo-3pm; Baroka v CT City, ePolokwane ngo-3pm; Orlando Pirates v Bloem Celtic, e-Orlando ngo-3pm; AmaZulu v Wits, eMlaza ngo-8.15pm.Ngo-Agasti 4:Leopards v Polokwane, eThohoyandou ngo-3pm; H’Park v Kaizer Chiefs, eMakhulong ngo-3pm; Golden Arrows v Maritzburg Utd, eClermont ngo-3pm.
title: Umbandela waMaZulu ngesizini entsha

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUU METHULI wezinhlelo zeMTV Base, uNomuzi Mabena, uthi ukuya kwakhe eMelika ukuyokwethula amaMTV Video Music Awards eLos Angeles, ngesonto elizayo kuzomulekelela ekutheni akhule njengomethuli wezinhlelo.UNomuzi uzohamba nomsakazi we-5FM uRoger Goode ukuyosakazela ababukeli beMTV le miklomelo.Abantu bakuleli bazoyibona bukhoma le miklomelo ngo-Agasti 25 ngo-3 entathakusa kuMTV channel 130 esizotholakala nakwiDStv Compact, izophindwa ebusuku ngo-9.“Ngizimisele ngokuthi ngiqoqe ulwazi oluningi engizoluthola phesheya bese ngibuya nalo ngilusebenzise lapha ekhaya. Ngizophinde ngifundise abanye ngengizokufunda nami. Lokhu kuzongisiza ekutheni ngikhule. Ngibuye ngibe nenkampani ehlela imicimbi engingakuthokozela ukwakha ubudlelwano nabantu abathile abazosiza ekukhuleni kwenkampani yami. Ngizobuka nangendlela abenza ngayo imicimbi,” kusho uNomuzi.Le ntokazi yaseBenoni, eGauteng, izobe yethula nokuzobe kwenzeka kukhaphethi obomvu lapho kulindeleke khona osaziwayo okubalwa kubo uBeyoncé, Nicki Minaj, Maroon 5, Iggy Azalea, Rita Ora, Usher nabanye.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngalolu hambo ngoba ngizobe ngiqala ukuya eMelika. Ngake ngaya e-Europe sihambe nesikole kodwa ngiyaqala ukuya ngedwa ngiyosebenza. Kuzoba mnandi. Angethukile kakhulu ngiyazethemba. Ngemuva kokuhluleka wukunqoba umncintiswano wokuthungatha umethuli we
Live nokunqoba oweMTV ngizethemba kakhulu. Angisazivumeli izinkulumo ezibhedayo ukuthi zingiphazamise,” kusho uNomuzi othi ujabule ukuthi kukhethwe yena kwazise bekungakhethwa omunye umuntu.Uthe abantu bangamphathisa imibuzo abafisa ababuzele yona kosaziwayo baseMelika.“Ngingajabula kakhulu uma bengangithumelela imibuzo kuTwitter ekhasini lami [email protected],” kusho yena.
title: Uthi kuzomkhulisa ukuyosakaza eMelika

text: LUYA kude oluthinta umasipala nomcimbi ohlelwa umculi weHip Hop uCasper Nyovest iFill Up Mabhida nokulindeleke ukuthi ube eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngeDisemba 1. Lo mcimbi ohlelwa uCasper sewuzidalele amazinyo abusheshelezi kubahleli nakubaculi bakulesi sifundazwe okudalwa nawukuthi uMasipala weTheku awufuni ukuphumela obala ngokuthi liwuxhase ngamalini lo mcimbi.Isolezwe selike lawubuza kaninginingi lo mbuzo kodwa umasipala ubika imbiba ubika ibuzi. Ezinye zalezi zinkampani okubalwa kuzo izinhlangano ezihlela imicimbi nezamaciko zibize umhlangano ophuthumayo eMoses Mabhida ukuzocacisa ngezindaba esezisabalele, ezithinta ukuxhaswa kwemicimbi kuleli dolobha. Kwizinhlangano ezizobe zikhona kubalwa i-Afrotainment (DJ Tira), Family Tree (Cassper), Creative Workers Union of SA (CWUSA), Amadelangokubona nabanye.Lokhu kubiza lesi sithangami esiphuthumayo zikwenza njengoba kunamahemuhemu athi uCasper uxhaswe ngemali enkulu ukudlula nemicimbi elokhu ikhona. Kwenzeka lokhu nje kuvele kunokukhulu ukukhala njengoba lomasipala uphinde wathembisa ukuthi uzofaka uR3 million ukuze kubukwe ibhola eliphakathi kweChiefs nePirates ngoMgqibelo, wathembisa uR200 000 othi uzowufaka kwaMax eMlaza nomunye ozoya e-Artizen KwaMashu, kulemicimbi yomithathu kuzokuba nobhazabhaza wethelevishini lapho okuzobe kubukwa khona ibhola.UDJ Tira kuthiwa naye uyakhala ngoMnyango wezokuVakasha kuMasipala weTheku njengoba kuvela ukuthi sekuphele cishe iminyaka emithathu iFact Durban Rocks inikezwa  uR850 000, kuphinde kuvele ukuthi iHazelmere Durban Jazz Festival eba minyaka yonke ephinde ihlelwe uMdu Ngcobo yona ithola uR500 000, nayo seyiqinise isikimu ngokuthi iyadi libe netende khona njengoba kunomcimbi okuthiwa uncintisana nayo iJazz obizwa ngeBraai Day Picnic, nayo okuthiwa uxhaswa umasipala.Iphephandaba eliphuma kanye ngesonto lidalule ukuthi loDJ usebunqamulile ubudlelwano anabo nalo mnyango ngoba ekholwa ukuthi kudlalwa ngaye njengoba kunanenkolelo yokuthi iningi imali enikwe uCassper.Ekhuluma naleli phephandaba eliphuma ngeSonto uTira ukuqinisekisile ukungaboni ngasolinye nomnyango wezokuVakasha nokungcebeleka eThekwini.“Saqala ukuphikisana kwiVodacom July nonyaka. Kade baqala ukusixhasa ngalesi samba (R850 000). Benginethemba lokuthi lokho kuzoguquka kodwa kubukeka engathi kunabantu abangayithandi lento engiyenzela abantu baseThekwini. Ukuze kube nokuthula sengikhethe ukungazihlanganisi nabo,” kusho uTira.“Lento akuyona eyami, angizenzeli mina, ngiyenza ngoba nginothando lweTheku. Nabo bayahlomula ngokuthola abavakashi abasuke bezozithokozisa kulo mcimbi.
title: Luyashuba olwamaciko aseThekwini nomasipala

text: ZIBALELWA ku-20% izingane ezincane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezineminyaka ephakathi kuka-8 no-12 esezike zahlangabezana nezinto eziphathelene nezocansi zisebenzisa i-internet.Lokhu kuvezwe wucwaningo olwenziwe abeWorld Economic Forum (WEF) oluveza ukuthi iDQ Institute iveze ukuthi leli lingelinye lamazwe angu-10 kwangu-29, aphezulu ngokuba sengcupheni.UDkt Robyn Whittaker uthe lokhu kubonakale emazweni elidlondlobala khona izinga lokusetshenziswa kwezobuchwepheshe njengeNingizimu Afrika.“Amazwe amaningi phambilini abengasebenzisi kakhulu ubuchwepheshe besimanje ngaphandle kokuzilungiselala, osekwenza abe sengcupheni manje.Yilokhu esikubona eNingizimu Afrika manje. Sikhulu isibalo sabazali abangazi lutho ngokwenzekayo.Yizingane ezaziyo ukuthi zingenzani nge-internet,”Eqhuba uthe benze nemizamo yokuhlinzeka lezo zikole ezisele ngezinsiza ezifanele zokuqeqesha ngamakhono kanjalo nokukhuluma ngezingqinamba ababhekana nazo ezikoleni. “Iningi lalezi zikole lisengcupheni yokuba yizisulu zodlame nokuhlukumezeka ngokocansi online. Lokhu kungezinye zezinkinga eziningi ezibhekene nazo,”.Ucwaningo olwenziwe ezinganeni eziwu-38 000 emazweni angu-29 ngosizo lwezinhlangano ezifana neSymphonia, luvele nokuthi izingane zisengozini yokuhlangana nabantu abadala abangazicija ngolwazi olungafanele ngoba befuna ukuzisebenzisela izinhloso zocansi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.Lokhu kungenzeka ngokuthi babe nezinkulumo eziphathelene nezocansi nama video, kugcine kuyinto eyinjwayelayo ingane. Lolu cwaningo luveza nokuthi * -64% wezingane sewuke wahlangabezana nale ngozi, * -55% usuke wahlukumezeka kwathi * -11% wakhuluma ngisho nabantu ongabazi, abanye baze bahlangana ubuso nobuso.Kuzona lezi zingane * -18% usuke waba nezingxoxo ngocansi nabantu abangaziwa okufaka kwi-internet izinto eziphathelene nocansi.Ungoti wezobuchwepheshe, uKethan Parbhoo uveze ukuthi noma zingenisa ezobuchwepheshe kodwa izingane zidinga ukucijwa ngolwazi olufanele lokusebenzisa ngendlela i-internet. “Ukuze sonke sivune izithelo ezinhle zokuphila ngesikhathi sobuchwepheshe emphakathini nakwezamabhizinisi, kumele sifundise isizukulwane esizayo ukuze siphucuzeke siphucule neNingizimu Afrika."
title: Izingane engcupheni yokufunda imikhuba nezocansi

text: UKarabo Morogwa, woMzansi Magic, uthe uMakwenzeke MK Mathebula umgulukudu wesigebengu esiyingozi esiphushwa umhawu namandla esinawo senze izinto ezingalungile.“Ubengumshayi wesibhakela odume ngelikaDon kulo mkhakha. Ungumholi weqembu lezigilamkhuba elishushumbisa abantu libayise kwamanye amazwe uphinde abe ngumnikazi wamakilabhu abashayi besibhakela ahlukene eGoli. Ebuncaneni bakhe uMK wayeshayela amatekisi kwathi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wathola umsebenzi wokuba unogada ezindaweni zobumnandi lapho ahlangana khona nabaqeqeshi besibhakela abamcela ukuthi azosebenza nabo,” kusho uKarabo.Uthe uMK uzobonakala esebenzisana nomsebenzi omdala ematekisini uSgegede.“USgegede waboleka imali kuMpiyakhe wangayikhokha. UMpiyakhe utshela uQaphela ukuthi akayoyifuna okuphoqa uSgegede ukuthi asebenzise imali ayikweleta uMK ukukhokha isikweleti bese esola uQaphela ngokuthi uyithathe ngenkani. Kulapho uMK eziveza ukuthi ungubani,” kuchaza uKarabo.NgoLwesihlanu abantu bebejabula ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bebona lo mlingisi kulo mdlalo.
title: Uzolingisa indawo yesigelekeqe  kwiSibaya

text: UKUBEKA ukuphepha nempilo yabantu phambili nokugwema ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane elibanga isifo seCovid-19 eNingizimu Afrika kwenza inhlangano eyengamele umdlalo wejubane kuleli, i-ASA, ingaphangi umdaka ngokufaka isicelo kuNgqongqgoshe wezemiDlalo, uNathi Mthethwa, sokubuyela komdlalo wejubane emzileni.UMengameli wale nhlangano y-Alec Skhosana utshele Isolezwe ngeSonto ukuthi ngeke baphanyeke izingane zabantu emnqamulezweni bazifake engozini yokuthi zigcine zihaqwe yilolu bhubhane.“Umdlalo wezejubane uphephe kakhulu ngakho ngeke kuthi ngoba nakhu sibona ezinye izinhlangano zifaka izicelo bese nathi senza kanjalo."Umdlalo wethu uhlanganisa abantu abaningi ngesikhathi esisodwa, abaqhamuka ezifundazweni ezehlukene, iningi lazo zithathwa njenge sizinda seCovid-19,”kubeka uSkhosana.Uthe abagijimi abakhululekile ekutheni bangabuyela ekugijimeni yilabo abagijima emiqhudelwaneni yamazwe omhlaba nakuma-Olympics.“Abagijimi abafana noWyde (Van Niekerk) noma kuthe angaphumela ngaphandle wahaqeka, yibona esithe bangayingenela imijaho yamazwe omhlaba, abanye cha, asikabavuleli ngoba isimo lapha ekhaya sisemanzonzo,” kuqhuba uSkhosana egcizelela ngokuthi basazoqhubeka bakhele isimo umkhanya ukuze baqinisekise ukuthi sekuphephile ukubuyela emdlalweni.Ngesonto eledlule uVan Niekerk, ongumpetha wama-Olympic ebangeni eliwu-400m, bekufanele agijime emqhudelwaneni obuseTrieste, e-Italy, lapho ebezogijima ebangeni eliwu-100m no-400m ube esetholakala ukuthi usehaqwe yigciwane iCorona.Kuphinde kwatholakala ukuthi uma esephinda ehlolwa okwesihlanu kwatholakala ukuthi akasenalo nobekumvumela ukuthi usengaqhubeka nokusubatha. Kodwa ngenxa yokuthi ubesedonse negazi ube esenquma ukungabe esaqhubeka ukubhekelela isimo.“Sizoqhubeka nokuthi silandele imithetho nemigomo kahulumeni.“Kuyothi uma esethi sekuphephile nemidlalo isingabuyela ensimini, siyobe sesithatha isinqumo ngokusuku lokuqala kwemijaho. Sifuna abagijimi babuyele ekugijimeni ngaphansi kwesimo esijwayelekile sokusubatha, hhayi ngaphansi kwesimo esisibonayo ukuthi sisemanzonzo. Kithina impilo yomuntu ihamba phambili kunakho konke, umdlalo uza emuva. Angifuni sizwe amanzi ngobhoko ngezingane zabantu,” kuphetha uSkhosana.USkhosana ukhuluma kanje, ezinye izinhlanga zemidlalo ezifana neSwimming South Africa (SSA) neSouth African Hockey Association (SAHA), nazo sezifuna ukubuyela emachibini nasezinkundleni njengoba kwenzeke esigabeni esikhokhelwayo sikanobhutshuzwayo.
title: I-ASA ibeka eqhulwini ukuvikeleka kwabagijimi obhubhaneni

text: USOBISHINI umaskanda obandakanyeke engozini yemoto edlule nemiphefumulo yabantu abathathu eVryheid ngeSonto ebusuku.UMthandeni ‘Igcokama Elisha’ Manqele wehlelwe yingozi ephuma kocula emcimbini obuseJozini eMkhanyakude. Lo mculi wehlelwa yile ngozi nje nguye obeshayela itekisi yakhe iQuantum ebilayishe amagidangoma akhe ayisithupha.Oyimenenja yeGcokama uVusi Leeuw ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lo mculi ubeshayela itekisi ebilayishe abantu ngaphandle kwePrDP (Professional Drivers Permit) Licence, okuyimvume ekugunyaza ukuba ushayele itekisi enabagibeli.“Igcokama alisiye usomatekisi ohambisa abantu zinsuku zonke kodwa belizishayelela itekisi yalo. Asikho isidingo sokuthi lize libe nePrDP ngoba belihambisa abantu abambalwa nje. Lokhu kufana nokuthi umuntu azithengele itekisi yomndeni. Sekungadingeka aze abe nePrDP ukuze ashayele imoto yakhe?” kjubuza uLeeuw.Uthe njengamanje lo mculi usesibhedlela lapho exilongwa khona ngodokotela.“Egameni leGcokama nakubaphathi balo sicela ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yamalungu asishiyile emhlabeni. Sithi akwehlanga lungehliyo,” kusho uLeeuw.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane usekuqinisekisile ukuthi ingozi yenzeke ngoMashi 5 ngo-7.55 ebusuku. Uthe kunemoto eshayisane netekisi ebishayelwa yiGcokama Elisha emgwaqweni uLouwsburg.“(Kule ngozi) kufe abantu abathathu kwathi abanye balimala kabi. Amaphoyisa aseHlobane amatasatasa aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso nangembangela yengozi.” UZwane uthe akafuni ukuphawula ngezinye izinsolo ngenxa yokuthi lolu daba selusezandleni zamaphoyisa.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane uthe akekho umuntu ovunyelwe ukushayela imoto ethutha umphakathi ngaphandle kwemvume ebizwa ngePrDP, eyayaziwa ngePDP kudala.“Usuke uphule umthetho uma ushayele imoto ungenayo le mvume. Kufana nokushayela iloli ungenayo imvume yalokho usuke uphule umthetho. UNgqongqoshe * (Mxolisi) Kaunda uzwelana kakhulu nemindeni elahlekelwe futhi ufisela nomaskanda ukwelulama okusheshayo.”Esephetha uthe bazohlela nabeRoad Accident Fund ukuthi bazongcwatshwa kanjani abashonile.Imizamo yokuthola iGcokama igcine ingaphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwalo belukhala lungabanjwa.Lo mculi wehlelwa yile ngozi nje ubesanda kuyithenga itekisi yakhe neFortuner.
title: Lizalelwe yinja endlini iGcokama

text: BATHOLE elinye ithambo lokugiya abalandeli be-Orlando Pirates ezabo zishaya izimbangi, iKaizer Chiefs ngo 1-0 emdlalweni weMultichoice Diski Challenge (MDC) eVosloorus izolo ntambama.Lona umdlalo wesibili wabakhaya baseSoweto emuva kokuba iChiefs ijabhise abalandeli ihlulwa iPirates. Kwi-Absa Premiership amaBhakaniya asale ehleka kuvela elomhlathi ngemuva kokuqumba phansi iChiefs ngo 2-1.NgoMgqibelo la maqembu azophinda ahlangane eMoses Mabhida Stadium eThekwini kowandulela owamanqamu eTelkom Knockout ngo-3 ntambama. Akubuzwa ke ukuthi yibaphi abalandeli abazofika kulo mdlalo beshayela phezulu.IPirates ithole igoli umdlalo usanda kuqala elishaywe uLehlohonolo Sepeng ngemuva kwemizuzu emithathu. Usebenzise ubudedengu bodonga lweChiefs olungazange lumgade ebhokisini wasala yedwa, wakwazi ukuqedela ibhola abeligotshwe uSimiso Bophelo owenze umsebenzi omuhle eqhamuka ngesokudla.Ngemuva kwalokho Amakhosi awatholile amathuba okulinganisa kodwa wala uWyane Sandilands ezintini zeBucs.Amathuba awo ahlele uLebohang Lesako noSizwe Twala esiwombeni sokuqala kodwa bahluleka wukudlula kuSandilands.USandilands kubonakala sengathi usegxilile lapha eqenjini leMDC, kwazise ushiywe nangaphandle esikwatini seBucs esibhaliselwe ukudlala kwiCaf Champions League eqala ngoDisemba.Konozinti eZimnyama zibhalise, uSiyabonga Mpontshane, Jackson Mabokgwane noBrilliant Khuzwayo.IChiefs ibuye ngamandla esiwombeni sesibili yakha inqwaba yamathuba kodwa uSandilands wala emapalini ePirates evimba amabhola anzima ka-Itumeleng Shopane noYaseen Bunting.Ngemuva komzuliswano wemidlalo yangempelasonto kuminyene utshumo esicongweni njengoba emathathu amaqembu abambene ngamaphuzu awu-15, okuyiCape Town City, Polokwane City neBloemfontein Celtic. IBidvest Wits inamaphuzu awu-15. Iyeke ithuba lokuhlala phezulu ihlulwa iHighlands Park ngo 1-0. Kanjalo naMaZulu FC abenganyukela esicongweni ukube awavumanga ukuhlulwa iLamontville Golden Arrows ngo 2-1 kowabakhaya. Yize iPirates inqobile nokho kwilog isengemuva kweChiefs.Imiphumela yangempelasonto yeMDC: Mamelodi Sundowns 2-2 SuperSport United; Highlands Park 1-0 Bidvest Wits; Maritzburg United 6-1 Black Leopards; AmaZulu 1-2 Golden Arrows; Cape Town City 0-0 Chippa United; Baroka 1-2 Polokwane City; Free State Stars 1-2 Bloemfontein Celtic; Kaizer Chiefs 0-1 Orlando Pirates
title: AbeBucs nelinye ithambo lokugiya

text: UMASIPALA weTheku usuthembise ushwele ukusiza labo abangene ezikweletini ngenxa yokubheduka kobhubhane iCorona.Lo masipala uthi ngeke bakhokhiswe inzalo labo abangene ezikweletini kunyaka wezimali u-2020/21, inqobo nje uma bezokwenza isibophezelo sokukhokha isikweletu baphinde bahlephule nengxenye ephakathi kuka-5% no-10% wemali abayikweletayo.Lokhu kuqukethwe kwisabelo  sezimali salo masipala esesihlelwe kabusha, esethulwe yimeya uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, emhlanganweni womkhandlu. Ushwele uzobakhona kuze kube sekupheleni kukaJuni.UKaunda uthe bayakuqonda ukuthi ukubheduka kweCorona kube nomthelela ongemuhle kwezomnotho, wathi yingakho bebeke phambili abahlwempu ngesikhathi kuhlelwa kabusha isabelo sezimali salo masipala.“NgoMashi sathatha isinqumo sokungacishi ugesi noma sivale amanzi kulabo abaswele. Kepha kulabo abakweleta kakhulu futhi abahlulekayo ukukhokha, kwasiphoqa ukuthi sinqamule ugesi noma amanzi.”Amaqembu aphikisayo asigxekile lisabelo sezimali athi izigidi zamaRandi zizoya ekukhokheleni abasebenzi amabhonasi esikhundleni sokuhambisa intuthuko.Ohola inguyazana ye-DA kulo masipala uNksz Nicole Graham, uthe isabelo sezimali sifana nokuthi abantu baseThekwini bashaywa ngempama.UNksz Graham uthe kuyihlazo ukuthi nakuba umasipala unenkinga yokungaqoqwa kukadoti, amapayipi amanzi avuzayo angalungiswa kanye namalambu kagesi angakhanyi, umasipala uhlela ukunikeza abasebenzi amabhonasii.“Izikhulu zamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle zizothola amabhonasi afika ku-R54 million. Lokhu kuzokwenzeka nakuba lo mnyango uyinhlakanhlaka. Le mali kufanele engabe isetshenziselwe ukulungisa izinkinga ezibhekene nalo mnyango, hhayi ukukhokhela abasebenzi.“Abasebenzi bakwadoti, abachitha isikhathi esiningi beteleka kunokuba besebenze, bona bazothola amabhonasi afika kuR31.6 million.”UMnuz Prem Iyir we-IFP, uthe le mali kufanele engabe izosetshenziselwa ukuhambisa izidingo kubantu.“Siyazi ukuthi ungqongqoshe wezimali uMnuz Tito Mboweni, ukhulume ngokuncishiswa kwemiholo ezisebenzini zikahulumeni, kepha lapha sibona kwenzeka okuphikisana nakushilo.”Khonamanjalo lo masipala umemezele ukushiya kwesikhulu esiphezulu kwezokuphathwa kwezimali zomkhandlu, uMnuz Krish Kumar.UKumar ubesesebenze kulo masipala iminyaka engaphezu kuka-40.Ukushiya kwakhe kulandele ukusula kwePhini lemeya kulo masipala uNkk Belinda Scott, obesebenza eduze naye njengoba uNkk Scott ebengusihlalo wekomiti lezezimali kulo masipala.
title: ITheku noshwele  kwabakweletayo

text: UMNYANGO wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal uthi luzosheshiswa uhlelo lokuqedwa kwemijondolo, ezindaweni ezakhele uMasipala weTheku.Lokhu kushiwo nguNgqongqoshe womnyango uMnuz Jomo Sibiya, ngesikhathi enikela ngempahla yokwakha izindlu zesikhashana emphakathini ohlala emijondolo ebizwa ngeMarikana eseCato Crest, emuva kokusala dengwane ngesikhathi kungqongqa imijondolo engu-48 ngesonto eledlule.USibiya ubehambisana noSihlalo wekomiti lezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu nokuThuthukiswa kweNgqalasizinda kuMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo.“Sibeke imali engaphezu kukaR700 million kulo nyaka eyokuqeda izindawo eziyimijondolo. Le mali ibhekele ukuqeda imijondolo kuphela ayibekelwa ukwenza okunye. Sifuna abantu bakwazi ukuhlala ezindaweni ezihloniphekile ngoba ngeminye yemigomo ye-Freedom Charter, ukuthi abantu bahlale ezindaweni abazohlopheka ngokuhlala kuzo,” kusho uSibiya.Uthe inkinga wukuthi abantu bakha ezindaweni zikamasipala ngenkani osekwenziwe kuzo iziza zokuthi kwakhelwe abantu izindlu. Uthe ngaphansi kohlelo oseluqalile eCato Crest, olubizwa ngeCato Crest Slum Clearence Project, kanti inhloso ngalo ukuqedwa kwemijondolo kule ndawo. Zingu-1500 izindlu okwakumele zakhiwe kodwa kwakhiwa kuphela ezingu- 1045. Uthe ezisele zizokwakhiwa ngokushesha.Uyedwa umuntu oshonile uNkk Marathabile Letela (38) ongowokudabuka eLesotho, kwalimala kabi oyedwa ona-16 okuthiwa usesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela. Umfowabo kamufi uMnuz Leeto Letela, uthe kubathoba amanxeba ukuthola umnikelo.“Namanje asikazi ukuthi isidumbu sakhe sizohlala isikhathi esingakanani njengoba eshone ngokusha. Sizolinda amaphoyisa  aphothule umsebenzi, kodwa kuyasijabulisa ukuthi uhulumeni kukhona asenzela khona njengoba kwasha yonke into yakhe,” kusho uLetelo.USabelo uthe umasipala usezinhlelweni zokuphucula isimo sabantu abahlala emijondolo sibe ngcono ngesikhathi besalinde ukwakhelwa izindlu eziphephile.“Siyawulekelela umphakathi owakhe emjondolo njengomasipala. Sinohlelo lokuthuthukisa imijondolo, okuwuhlelo umasipala osuke ukuqinisekisa ngayo ukuthi uzofaka ugesi, amanzi, amathoyilethi nemihubhe ukuze abantu bathole zonke izidingo ezisuke zibhekiswe kubona,” kusho uSabelo.
title: Luzosheshiswa uhlelo lokuqedwa kwemijondolo eThekwini

text: ISILOMO somculi kamaskandi uKhuzani “Indlamlenze” Mpungose siphose itshe esivivaneni kwabesifazane ngokusayinisa intokazi engumculi ngaphansi kwenkampani yalo Indlamlenze Group and Production (IGP).UKhuzani wethule lo mculi uSiphesihle Zulu (23) odabuka KwaMthethwa, eNtuthunga, eMpangeni.UKhuzani echaza ngesinqumo sokusayinisa uSiphesihle, uthe kuwumzamo wakhe wokufukula abesifazane njengoba kuyinyanga yabo.“Ngiwumuntu obukhali kakhulu ekuboneni ithalente yingakho ngisayinise leli ciko. Ngibone kufanele ngifukule abanye abantu ngoba nami lapho engikhona kungenxa yabantu. Abesifazane akufanele sibabuke njengabantu bokuhlukunyezwa ngoba sisemhlabeni ngenxa yabo,’’ kuchaza uKhuzani.USiphesihle uthe ukujabula kwakhe kuhambisana nokwethuka ngoba uyakuthanda ukucula kodwa udumo uyalwesaba.Echaza ngokuhlangana kwakhe noKhuzani , uthe wayeyolekelela uCevuzile eyocula kuKhozi FM ohlelweni uSigiya Ngengoma. Useke wacula engomeni kaKhuzani ethi uTsotsi.“UKhuzani wacela ukuthi uTshatsha athathe inombolo yami. Saxhumana noKhuzani ngaleso sikhathi,’’ kuchaza uSiphesihle.
title: UKhuzani usayinise umaskanda wesifazane

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAUCASTER Semenya ungenele ukugijima u-5000m emqhudelwaneni iSizwe Medical Fund ASA Senior Track and Field ezobanjelwa eTshwane Stadium kusukela ngoLwesine.USemenya akavumelekile ukuncintisana ebangeni alijwayele u-800m ngenxa yomgomo wenhlangano eyengamele ezokusubatha emhlabeni iWorld Athletics.Le nhlangano yanquma ukuthi abagijimi besifazane abane-testosterone ephezulu kunejwayelekile kwabesimame bangagijimi ku-400m kuya ku-1500m ngaphandle kokudla imishanguzo yokuyinciphisa.USemenya washaya phansi ngonyawo wathi ngeke ayidle leyo mishanguzo futhi lo mthetho ucindezela abantu besifazane.Usalulwa lolu daba njengoba eseludlulisele kwi-European Court of Human Rights.USemenya ungumpetha wama-Olympic ku-800m. Njengoba lolu daba lungakapheli kusho ukuthi ngeke asivikele isicoco sakhe emqhudelwaneni ozokuba seJapan ngoJulayi.
title: USemenya uzogijima u-5000m kwekazwelonke

text: WILLEM PHUNGULAISEMANZINI indlunkulu kaZulu emva kokukhothama kwezinyane leSilo samaBandla, uMntwana uLethukuthula Zulu.UMntwana (50) kuthiwa utholakale esephangalele egumbini lakhe lokulala ngoLwesihlanu efulethini lakhe eNorthwold, eGoli.UMntwana kuthiwa ubengusomabhizinisi eGoli kodwa akutholakalanga ukuthi hlobo luni lwebhizinisi.Nguye obeyinkosana kandlunkulu wokuqala uNkk Sibongile Dlamini, esigodlweni KwaKhethomthandayo.Okhulumela indlunkulu uMntwana uMbonisi Zulu, okhulume neSolezwe ngeSonto eseGoli, uthe okwamanje kunzima ukuchaza ukuthi uphangalale kanjani ngoba ubengakayitholi  imininingwane yamaphoyisa kodwa bathole ukuthi uphangalale ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni.Akukacaci ukuthi ukhothame kanjani njengoba amaphoyisa ethi kuzocacisa umphumela wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu. esehlakalweni okukholakala ukuthi bekubanjwa inkunzi kuso. Imininingwane engaqinisekisiwe ithi izigebengu zingene efulethi lomntwana zashaqa isamba esilinganiselwa kuR80 000, zamdubula washonela lapho.Kuthiwa kuthathwe amaselula nama- laptop omntwana nomngani wakhe.Isolezwe ngeSonto lithole ukuthi inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi njengoNdunankulu kaZulu, iye kobikela ngokusemthethweni iSilo uZwelithini noNdlunkulu umaDlamini.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseGauteng, uBrigadier Mothapelo Peters, uthe amaphoyisa aseHoneydew aphenya icala lokufa komuntu.UPeters uqhube wathi umufi utholakale esekhotheme ekamelweni, futhi amaphoyisa asaphenya.Uphethe ngokuthi umphumela wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu yiwona ozosiza.
title: Likhotheme izinyane leSilo

text: UHLUBUKE maqede wasungula ibandla lakhe owabe eyisethenjwa ebandleni lakwaShembe ohlangothini lwaseBuhleni.UMprofethi Benedict Xaba wethula ngokusemthethweni ibandla elithi yena namuhla iDr X Revival Ministries eGoli namuhla.UMphrofethi uXaba ophinde abe nohlelo lapho eshumayela khona kwiBay TV ngeSonto nangoMsombuluko ekuseni, uzakhele udumo ngokwelapha ngemikhuleko nokusebenzisa amanzi athandazelwe namatshe.Ethintwa, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi usephumile eBuhleni.“Ngiphume khona ngoFebhuwari nonyaka ngenxa yokuthi bengibona ukuthi impilo yami ayisaphephile,” usho kanje.Nakuba engathandanga ukwanda ngesizathu esimkhiphe kuleli bandla uveze ukuthi akanankinga nencane nomholi waseBuhleni uNyazi futhi uyaluhlonipha ngoba alubanga nasandla ekuphumeni kwakhe.Uthe ungene kwaShembengo-2004 futhi ubesonta ethempelini iSandanezwe okuyilapho ebengumshumayeli khona kwaze kwaba uyashiya.Yize kade eSabatha kwaShembe kodwa zijikile izinto njengoba esevule elakhe ibandla ngoba ukhonza ngeSonto. Uthe akugcini lapho ngoba zikhona nezinye izinsuku phakathi nesonto lapho esonta khona aphinde alaphe njengoba aziwa ngakho.Uthe selokhu ephume kwaShembe ibandla lakhe likhule ngendlela exakile.“Abantu sebebaningi kakhulu ebandleni lami. Ngicabanga ukuthi balethwa yindlela esikhuleka ngayo ngoba siyakholelwa egameni likaJesu uMsindisi,” echaza.Uthe okunye abantu okufanele bakwazi ngebandla lakhe wukuthi alehluleli umuntu ngokubheka akugqokile kunalokho lisebenza ngenhliziyo yomuntu.UMphrofethi uXaba uthe umile ekutheni noma ngabe umuntu ugqokeni, ngisho kungaba ngowesifazane ogqoke ibhulukwe yena akanandaba nalokho ngoba yinhliziyo yomuntu ebalulekile.Uthe kukhona abantu abajaha ukunaka izevatho nokunye okungabalulekile esikhundleni sokusebenza ngomkhuleko nokuguqula inhliziyo yomuntu kubuyiswe nonembeza.Uthe yingakho ungekho umfaniswano ebandleni lakhe.Into ekhona efanayo yisikibha esimhlophe esinobuso bakhe uMphrofethi negama lebandla.“Angithi noma uye emihlanganweni yezepolitiki uye ubabone befake isikibha esibhalwe neqembu lelo lepolitiki kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi kukhonzwa lowo muntu. Nami-ke akukhonzwa mina kodwa sikhonza uJesu owasifela.”Kuleli bandla bayakholelwa kwabangasekho. Bababona njengezingelosi futhi kuyahlatshwa.Lo mcimbi uzokhonjiswa kwiBay TV, kulindeleke ukuthi kunandise abaculi abafana noShwi noMtekhala.
title: Wethula ibandla ohlubuke kwaShembe

text: KUYIZWISE ubuhlungu iNdlunkulu kaZulu nesizwe sonke  ukusatshalaliswa kwezindaba ezingamanga ngabathile, ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zokukhothama kweSilo samaBandla, iNkosi uZwelithithi kaBhekuzulu.UNdunankulu kaZulu, uMntwana uMangosuthu Buthelezi esitatimenndeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba ngemuva kokusabalala kwalawa mahlebezi, uthe lesi senzo sokubulala inkosi iphila siwunya olumangalisayo. Uthe uNgangezwe uyelulama esibhedlela ngemva kokuthi engeniswe kuso ngeSonto exinwe ukugula.“Inkosi ingeniswe esibhedlela ngenxa yokukhuphuka kwezinga likashukela. Ayikaze ibebuthaka kangangoba nanamhlanje ekuseni (izolo) iyazihambela futhi iyaqhubeka nemishanguzo yayo. Odokotela banqume ukuthi ilashelwe egunjini labagula kakhulu ngoba befuna ithole ukunakekelwa okufanele,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe izimo ezifuze lezi zokufafazwa kwezindaba ezingamampunge ngabamthile emithonjeni yabezindaba aziqali ukwenzeka njengoba naye sekuke kwabakhona abathi akasekho ngesikhathi kubikwe ukuthi uyagula.“Kulesi sikhathi samanje zokusetshenziswa kwezinkundla zokuxhumana, izindaba ezingesilo iqiniso zibhebhetheka njengomlilo wequbula. Ungathemba ukuthi labo ababika izindaba emthonjeni yezindaba esemthethweni bangaba neso elibukhali ekubhekeni ubuqiniso bodaba,”  kusho ubuthelezi.Ikhasi likaFacebook okukholakala ukuthi elaseSwatini i-Eswatini Live Feed, elilandelwa abantu abevile ku-25 000, ligxekiwe ngokubhala kuleli khasi, liqinisekisa ukukhothama kweSilo.
title: INdlunkulu ichitha eyokukhothama kweSilo

text: IZIKHUKHULA ezidlule nemiphefumulo elinganiselwa ku-70 eThekwini namaphethelo yacekela phansi nezindlu, impahla iholele ekutheni iKwaZulu-Natal imenyezelwe njengendawo yenhlekelele.Mkhulu umonakalo odalwe yilezi zimvula njengoba namanje imindeni elahlekelwe yimizi ingenayo indawo yokufihla ikhanda, kuthi nalabo abashonelwe basabamba beyeka ukuthi bazohlanganisa ini nani ukuze bangcwabe imindeni yabo.Njalo uma kunemvula enamandla emadolobheni akuleli abathwala kanzima kakhulu kuba ngabantu abampofu. Ezabo izindlu aziqinile ngokwanele ukumelana nemvula enamandla, kanti kukhona nodaba lwalabo abayimihambima abalala noma yikuphi.Sekukhulunywe kaningi ngokubaluleka kokuhlonipha imvelo ngokuthi kungangcoliswa izindawo esihlala kuzo, kepha abantu babukeka bethalalisa nje. Ukulahla kwabantu imikhiqizo kaplastiki egcina igugulwe amanzi ize iyofika olwandle, kuholela ekufeni kwezilwane zasolwandle.Kunesithombe esisabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana esiveze indlela ichweba laseThekwini ebelingcole ngayo. Bekungathi izikebhe zimi phezuu kwasezaleni. Lobu bunuku bokuthi abantu basebenzise okuthile bese bekulahla phansi kuholela ekubhajweni kwezitamkoko, bese ziyahluleka ukudlulisa amanzi ngezikhathi ezinzima njengalezi.Cishe kuzona zonke iziza ezinezingqwembe ezibhalwe ukuthi akungalahlwa kuzo udoti, ufika ingqumba kadoti ilahlwe khona, kushaywa indiva umyalelo kamasipala.Yize kungeke kwabekwa ukungcola njengesizathu sezikhukhula, kepha ukungcola nobunuku bethu singabantu yibo obuholele ekutheni kube nzima ekutheni amapayipi adlulise amanzi, lokhu kwadala amaxhaphozi emigwaqweni, kwaguguleka izimoto, kwaminza abantu.Kungaba yinto enhle ukuthi ihlonishwe imvelo ngoba ososayensi sebekuvezile ukuthi ukungayikhathaleli kwabantu imvelo nokungcolisa imvelo ngezinye zezinto eziguqula isimo sezulu.Izikhukhula eziqhamuka ekwindla azijwayelekile neze ngokwesimo sezulu. Lokhu kuyasho ukuthi imvelo nesimo sezulu sekuguquke kakhulu.- Umbono wePhephandaba
title: [IMIBONO] Ubunuku nabo yibo obusibeke la

text: UDINWE uyaveva umphakathi waseMuden osola amaphoyisa ngokuthi adubule indoda yafa kubo ngoba ethi inesibhamu esingekho emthethweni.Kodwa kuthiwa umufi udubule amaphoyisa kuqala nawo ase ezibuyiselela.UMnuz Nkwimbi Dladla kuthiwa udutshulwe esendlini yakhe yokulala izolo ekuseni ngamaphoyisa ophiko lwe-National Intervention Unit (NIU) abezofuna isibhamu esingekho emthethweni.Amanye amalungu omphakathi athe awakholwa wukuthi uDladla udubule amaphoyisa kuqala ngoba awazange asibone isibhamu sakhe futhi awazange avunyelwe ukubona isidumbu sakhe.Ilungu lomphakathi elingathandanga ukudalulwa lithe kunzima ukuthemba amaphoyisa ngoba sekube nezinto eziningi ezenzekayo endaweni abangagculisekile ngazo.“Ngesonto eledlule komunye umuzi kungene abazenze amaphoyisa nabo bafuna izibhamu. Bathola isibhamu esisemthethweni bahamba naso. Uma sesilandela, bekungewona amaphoyisa kodwa ngabantu okuthiwa abaziwa. Manje uma ungqongqozelwa ngabantu bethi bangamaphoyisa awusathembi. Manje njengoba sekubulewe umuntu kuthiwa yingoba ubedubula amaphoyisa, sizokholwa kanjani,” kusho ilungu lomphakathi.Ilungu lomndeni elithintwe yiSolezwe izolo lacela ukungavezwa igama lithe kusenzima ngoba abazi noma baphephile yini.“Okwamanje sisezwa okushiwo amaphoyisa ngoba asisibonanga isibhamu okuthiwa ubadubule ngaso, asizwanga noma kunokuqhuma okusuka endlini. Sididekile, sifuna kuphenywe,” kusho owomndeni.Obhekele ukuphepha komphakathi eMuden, uMnuz Thandanani Lembethe, uthe okwenzekile kubashaqile kodwa wanxusa umphakathi ukuba wehlise umoya.“Esikudingayo wukuba amaphoyisa aphenya amacala enziwe ngamaphoyisa (IPID) aphenye bese eyasitshela ukuthi kwenzekeni. Okwamanje umphakathi usadiniwe ngalokhu ngoba awuqondi ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani. Kumele umphakathi uthembe ukuthi amaphoyisa azowuvikela hhayi ukuwuhlasela,” kusho uLembethe.Uphenyo lamaphoyisa luyaqhubeka.
title: Basola amaphoyisa ngokubulala indoda

text: SEBEFUNA ukulandwa ebusuku bengabonwa muntu abantu asebehaqeke ngeCovi-19 KwaZulu-Natal.Ngaphandle kokulandwa ebusuku, bafuna izimoto ezibalandayo zipake kude namakhaya abo ukuze abantu bangababoni ukuthi sebehaqekile.Ubeke kanje uNdunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe ngeSonto uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ngenkathi ekhuluma nabezindaba ngokusha osekwenzekile mayelana nokusuleleka kwabantu ngeCovid-19 kulesi sifundazwe.“Laba bantu akumele bacwaswe,” kuxwayisa uZikalala.Uthe kulesi sifundazwe, bangu-457 abasebenzi bakahulumeni asebehaqekile ngaleli gciwane.NgokukaZikalala, kuzobasiza ukuthi basabalalise imikhankaso yabo ngokuqeqesha abasebenzi bakahulumeni nabezempilo ngeCovid-19.“Sifuna bonke abahlengikazi babe ngomaqhawe alwa nokusuleleka ngeCovid-19,” usho njalo.Uzwakalise ukudumala ngokwanda kwesibalo sabahaqekayo kulesi sifundazwe.NgokukaZikalala, sebengu-112 abantu asebeshonile kulesi sifundazwe ngenxa yeCovid-19 ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa ezedlule, kwazise ngeledlule bebengu-84 abashonile.“Ngeledlule bebengu-74 othisha nabafundi abahaqwe yileli gciwane. Manje sebengu-187,” uchaze kanje.Amasonto nemingcwabo uthe kunomthelela kulokhu kukhula kwezibalo.Mayelana nokuqhubekayo okuthinta abamatekisi ngokulayisha, uthe konke kusingethwe uMnuz Bheki Ntuli onguNgqongqoshe wezekuThutha kulesi sifundazwe, kwazise uNgqongqoshe kazwelonke wezokuThutha uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uyena ozothula umbiko ophelele ngalokhu.Uthe njengoba kuzoqala inyanga yamadoda uJulayi, ufisa ukubona umkhankaso wokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane, ukhula kakhulu kunakuqala.Mayelana nezomnotho, uthe bawuvulile, okubalulekile ukulandela imibandela yokuphepha yeCovid-19.
title: Bafuna ukulandwa ebusuku bengabonwa abahaqwe yiCovid-19 KwaZulu-Natal

text: NGABE sekufike ekugcineni ngabadlali ababili abanemidlalo ecela kweyikhulu kwiBafana Bafana uma ubahlanganisa, uTeko Modise (36) weCape Town City noMorgan Gould (35) weSuperSport United?Bobabili laba badlali asebeke bagijima nasezinkunzini zebhola zaseNingizimu Afrika basalelwe yizinyanga eziyisithupha ezinkontilekeni abanazo.Njengoba bekulesi simo nje, nemidlalo abayitholayo isiqala ukugqoza okwenza kuvele imibuzo yokuthi kungenzeka yini ukuthi sekuphelile ngabo ebholeni elikhokhelayo. Ithalente elikulaba badlali ngeke laphikiswa kodwa umbuzo omkhulu uthi zizovuselelwa yini izinkontileka zabo? Uma zingavuselelwa, bazowathola yini amakhaya amasha uma ziphela izinkontileka zabo ngoJuni?Njengoba iwindi lokushintshana ngabadlali liqhubeka, akubona oModise noGould kuphela abasalelwe yizinyanga eziyisithupha ezinkontilekeni zabo kepha bakhona nabanye abadlali abanamagama.Amaqembu avame ukubadedela ngoJanuwari abadlali abasalelwe yizinyanga eziyisithupha ezinkontilekeni uma efuna ukwenza inkece ngabo kodwa uma lokhu kungenzeki bayahlala bengadlali izinyanga zokugcina bese bekhululeka ngoJuni.Akubona bonke nokho ababa naleli bhadi njengoba kuke kwenzeke kwezinye izikhathi banikwe izinkontileka ezintsha sekuvalwe amehlo. UGould ungomunye walaba badlali abasengavuselela ngoba uyinkakha yeSuperSport futhi ngeke kwethuse uma enikwa umsebenzi uma kungukuthi sekuphelile ngaye ebholeni elikhokhelayo. NoModise kunezinsolo zokuthi uBenni McCarthy ufuna ukumgcina kodwa inkinga kungase kube yiholo lakhe elishaya phezulu lo mdlali oseke wadlala kwiMamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates.Omunye umdlali obhekene nalesi simo uGranwald Scott obuye eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2017 wajoyina iBidvest Wits esuka eqenjini laseSlovakia. Uhambe kuleli ehlonishwa engukaputeni we-Ajax Cape Town.Kuyona iWits lesi simo sibhekene noFrank “Gabadinho” Mhango. Iyaphela inkontileka yakhe ngoJuni ngakho-ke ngeke kwethuse uma engashiya kuyona manje ngoba vele umqeqeshi uGavin Hunt akasambheki nakumbheka uma esetha isikimu.KwiPirates * -Abbubaker Mobara usesezinyangeni zakhe zokugcina eziyisithupha zenkontileka kodwa uyalithola ijezi kulezi zinsuku okuyizinkomba zokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi usesezinhlelweni zikaMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic noRulani Mokwena abashayela umkhumbi weBucs.Owayedlalela iBucs kwaphinde kwasuka umsindo omkhulu ngaye kwi-Ajax Cape Town, uTendai Ndoro weHighlands Park asayine kuyona inkontileka yonyaka owodwa, kubukeka sengathi uzoyiqeda isizini kodwa ebholeni ngeke wazi.
title: Ikusasa alaziwa kwabaphelelwa yizinkontileka

text: ZIWAKHALELE amadoda amane abanjwe oqotsheni edayisa amathikithi omgunyathi okubuka umdlalo weChiefs nePirates, ozoba ngoMgqibelo.Lawa madoda amane kuthiwa abedayisa ithikithi ngalinye ngoR500 eWorkshop, eThekwini, aboshwe ngoLwesibili ntambama, avele enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, izolo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, uthe lawa madoda amane abanjwe ephethe amathikithi angu-110.Izolo kugcine kungatholakalanga ukuthi icala lawo lihlehliselwe inini ngoba idokodo belingakabuyi enkantolo.Khonamanjalo amadoda amane aboshwe enkundleni yezemidlalo eMabhida ngoLwesibili ngecala lokweba utshwala nelokufuna umsebenzi ngesitifiketi esingumbombayi. Kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMatshi eThekwini namhlanje.ULt Col Zwane uthe la madoda amathathu atholakale notshwala okusolwa ukuthi abuntshontshe ema-bar ale nkundla, ngoLwesibili. Oyedwa kuwo kuthiwa ibisebenzisa isitifiketi esiwumbombayi ifuna itoho lokugada kule nkundla njengoba bekudlala iBafana Bafana neParaguay.Uqhube wathi amaphoyisa nezinye izinhlaka zezokuphepha zizobe zimi ngomumo njengoba kuzobe kudlala izinkunzi zaseSoweto, ngoMgqibelo. “Abanamathikithi omgunyathi bangazihluphi ngokuya enkundleni, abazodayisa lawo mathikithi nabo bangezi ngoba bazoboshwa.” Usho kanjena nje amadoda amane asolwa ngokuthi ayedayisa amathikithi omgunyathi ngesikhathi kudlala AmaZulu nePirates kanye neChiefs neSupersport ngeledlule asengaphakathi ngemuva kokunqatshelwa ibheyili.
title: Kuboshwe abebedayisa amathikithi eTKO ngoR500

text: LUTHATHE elinye igxathu udaba lwesitobha seBafana Bafana, uBuhlebuyeza Mkhwanazi, ophenduke undingasithebeni emuva kokuthengiswa kweBidvest Wits.UMkhwanazi, odlalele iBafana ifika kuma-quarterfinal e-2019 Africa Cup of Nations, ube yingxenye yabadlali abangawelelanga emaqenjini amasha kodwa abathathwe yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila.Lo mdlali akabonanga ngasolinye neTshakhuma kwazise bathe abakwazi ukuqhubeka nokumholela imali elingana nabeyithola kwiWits lapho abebalwa khona nabadlali abebeyikha ngamafosholo.Isisombululo bekuzoba wukumnxephezela ngokunqamula inkontileka yakhe ngaphambi kokuba imnike amaphepha okumkhulula ngokwesicelo sakhe kodwa ayangakuvuma iTTM.Lokho kuholele ekufakaneni emthethweni nokungenela kweSouth African Football Players' Union (Safpu).Isolezwe ngeSonto  lithinta iSafpu ngalolu daba, uCavin Motloung, okhulumela le nhlangano uveze ukuthi uMkhwanazi udaba useludlulisele kubameli abazimele."Udaba luke lwafika impela kithi kodwa umdlali ubuye waludlulisela kwabanye abameli abazimele. Ngaleyo ndlela asinalo ulwazi ngezakamuva ngalo kodwa sisekhona, umnyango siwuvulile ukuthi noma yinini uma edinga ukwalulekwa ngokuthile okuthina lona udaba, simsize," kusho uMotloung.UMkhwanazi akakaze abonakale enkundleni kule sizini kwazise ugcine ukudlala kuphela ngesizini edlule esekwiWits.Ukungadlali sekumkhiphe ngisho ezinhlelweni zomqeqeshi weBafana. uMolefi Ntseki, ozomemezela udonga lwasemuva olusha ngoLwesine.UMotloung uthe kumqoka kubo ukuthi lolu daba luphothulwe futhi luvune umdlali ukuvikela nabanye nangomuso."Indaba yokudayiselana amaqembu kayifiki manje futhi isazoba khona kodwa akumele kuhlukumezeke abadlali ngalokho. Umthetho wokudayiselana wukuthi uma uthenga inkampani, uthenga konke nezinkinga nezikweletu zayo. Akukwazi-ke ukuthi uthathe umdlali enenkontileka neqembu, bese ufika ngale umehlisela umholo kodwa inkontileka ingakapheli futhi kusadlalwa esigabeni esifanayo. Silindele isinqumo esizophuma kulolu daba ukuthi sibe yinsika yokuvikela abanye abadlali esimeni esifanayo nangomuso," kusho uMotloung.Inqwaba yabadlali beWits ibuthwe ngamanye amaqembu.UMkhwanazi ube yingxenye yodonga lwasemuva eyibamba nobengukaputeni wakhe, uThulani Hlatshwayo, osekwi-Orlando Pirates.
title: Lungene kwelinye iqophelo olukaBuhle Mkhwanazi ongadlali

text: USALE egxeka abadlali bakhe abayibamba kwiBafana Bafana umqeqeshi weBidvest Wits, uGavin Hunt, obalisa ngokuthi bazenzele phansi njengoba sebehlisiwe esicongweni se-log ye-Absa Premiership.IWits ihlulwe yiCape Town City ngo 3-2 emuva kokuthi kuyiwe ekhefini ehamba phambili ngo 2-0 emdlalweni wePremiership obukade useBidvest Stadium ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. Lokhu kulandela ukuthi iZitshudeni zikade zibanjwe ngo 1-1 yiMamelodi Sundowns ingasaphelele enkundleni emdlalweni owandulela oweCity. Ukulahla amaphuzu kuholele ekutheni iWits yehle esicongweni se-log ebisihlale kuso isikhathi eside kule sizini. Leli qembu selehlele endaweni yesithathu kwazise kweyesibili sekune-Orlando Pirates. Udonga lweWits lwakhiwe ngunozinti uDarren Keet, Buhle Mkhwanazi, Thulani Hlatshwayo noSifiso Hlanti abadlalela iqembu lesizwe. Kukhona noVuyo Mere owake wadlala kwiBafana eminyakeni edlule.“Siwudlale kahle wonke umdlalo. Amathuba amathathu abawatholile bashaye amagoli. Ngokwamathuba esiwatholile besingagcina siwina ngo 8-3 kodwa asimakanga kahle, amaphutha abadlali ngabodwa ayamangaza. Amaphutha enziwa abadlali beBafana. ICity ishaye igoli emuva kwemizuzwana engu-18 sibuye ekhefini. Senze amaphutha elandelana. Sesingenelwe ama-free kick amaningi ukudlula wonke amaqembu kwi-ligi. Noma kunjalo besinawo amathuba okuwina umdlalo. Singenelwa amagoli kodwa sinabadlali cishe abayisihlanu beBafana Bafana emuva,” kusho uHunt.IWits izithola ingase iphunyukwe yisicoco seligi nje ibivule igebe lamaphuzu futhi indlela ebidlala ngayo bekucaca ukuthi kuzoba nzima ukuyehlisa emthini. Ukuba iwinile kwiCity ibizobuyela esicongweni kwazise izimbangi, iMamelodi Sundowns, zibanjwe yiBloemfontein Celtic ngo 0-0.“Leli bekuyithuba lokweqa sizinike nentuba yokuphefumula. Ngikholwa wukuthi noma ubani angayiwina le ligi ngoba amaqembu awanawo umgqigqo.Wonke amaqembu asephezu kwethu ngenxa yezenzo zethu. Hhayi ngoba engcono kunathi kodwa yingoba sibuyele emuva esikhundleni sokuthi ngabe sivule igebe lamaphuzu ayisihlanu noma ayisithupha esicongweni, sinethezekile. Kodwa konke lokhu kungenxa yodonga lwasemuva. Siyawakha amathuba,” kusho uHunt.
title: Bashaywe wakhala ngabeBafana

text: BEHLULEKE nawukuzibamba onina bezingane abahola isibonelelo sikahulumeni sokondla izingane, njengoba kuchwaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, befaka amavideo becula bejabula bebonga uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngokubengezela le mali ngoR300 ingane ngayinye kule nyanga.Abanye bazwakale kulama-video bethi ngesikhathi uMengameli eyimemezela, kwakunzima ukukholwa. Kodwa kuse ngokunye uma sebeyifica kuma-akhawunti abo izolo nanamhlanje.Abahola le mali kule nyanga bathole uR740 ingane ngayinye ,okusho ukuthi unina wezingane ezintathu eziholayo ubambe uR2 220 kule nyanga. Kulama-video onina bezingane bayakikiza bayacula. Babiza uRamaphosa ngoyise wezingane zabo ongazizali uStep-Father."Le mali izohamba ibanga elide ngoba izingane zivele zihleli ekhaya zidla kakhulu. Igilosa engizoyithenga kule nyanga ngizoyiphinda kabili ukuze kushaye umholo olandelayo kusekhona ukudla,"kusho uNksz Nomasonto Mkhize ongomunye wabaholele izingane zakhe ezine uR2 960.Njengamanje izitolo zokudla nolayini abaya emishinini yokukhipha imali,kugcwele kuyachichima.Ngenyanga ezayo kulindeleke ukuthi abahola le mali baphinde bengezelelwe uR500 umzali ngamunye(hhayi ingane ngayinye).
title: Babize uRamaphosa 'ngoyise' wezingane zabo bejabulela imali

text: INHLANGANO yezempilo emhlabeni iWorld Health Organisation (WHO), ithi izinyanga ezizayo zisazoba nzima njengoba amazwe amaningi eseqalile ukubona izibalo zabahaqwa yiCovid-19 zenyuka.UMqondisi-jikelele we-WHO, uDkt Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, uthe amazwe okubukeka sengathi azoba senkingeni kakhulu yilawo okunezinkomba zokuthi asengcupheni yokuthi ahlaselwe yisivunguvungu sesibili seCovid-19 njengamanje.Uthe maningi kakhulu amazwe aseqalile ukubona izinkomba zokuthi kungenzeka ahlaselwe yisivunguvungu sesibili seCovid-19.“Izinyanga ezizayo zizoba nzima kanti amanye amazwe sekubonakele ukuthi azothwala kanzima kakhulu kunamanye. Maningi kakhulu amazwe kumanje anezibalo zabahaqwa yileli gciwane ezenyukayo. Iziguli eziningi kuwo sezilaliswe ezibhedlela emagunjini abadinga ukunakekelwa okuthe xaxa. Njengamanje siseku-Okthoba okusho ukuthi uma isimo siqhubeka ngale ndlela kuzoba nenkinga yokushoda kwemibhede ezibhedlela,” kusho yena.Unxuse abaholi bamazwe ukuthi bahlale besiqaphile isimo emazweni abo, uma kuba nesidingo basheshe bathathe izinyathelo ezifanele zokunqanda ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane.Izibalo zakamuva zikhomba ukuthi bangu-42 million emhlabeni abahaqwe yiCovid-19, abashonile bangu-1.1 million.UDkt Maria van Kerkhove, weWHO e-Europe, uthe isimo sakwamanye amazwe ase-Europe siyakhathaza, njengoba sekukhona amazwe asenezibalo ezintsha zabahaqwe yileli gciwane.“Kwamanye amazwe lezi zibalo ziba wuhhafu wezibalo ebezikhona ngamahora angu-24. Lokhu kuyakhathaza impela. Imibhede ebekelwe ukulalisa iziguli ezidinga ukunakekelwa okuthe xaxa, uma ukuhaqeka kwabantu kwenyuka ngendlela efanayo emasontweni ambalwa imibhede izobe isiphelile,” kusho uDkt Van Kerkhove.Amazwe okubikwa ukuthi asenezinkomba zokuthi angase ahlaselwe yisivunguvungu sesibili ngokushesha kubalwa iSpain, Hong Kong neMexico.KwaZulu-Natal uNdunankulu uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuthi ziyanyuka izibalo zabahaqwa yileli gciwane.
title: Uvalo lukhulu ngokugadla okwesibili kweCovid-19

text: UYALELWE “ukuyolungisa umsamo” uMark “Professor” Mayambela osephenduke umantuntanendishi kusukela echithwe yiChippa United ekupheleni kwesizini edlule.UMayambela ngomunye wabadlali abadlala ibhola elinomjiko elithokozelwa yiningi ebholeni laseMzansi. Kodwa kuze kube manje alikho iqembu elifuna ukuzihlanganisa naye. Ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini kuvele ukuthi useqede konke neLamontville Golden Arrows kodwa kwabuya kwashabalala konke lokho. Kumanje uziqeqesha neHighlands Park kodwa akukho okubambekayo mayelana nenkontileka.Umqeqeshi weHighlands, u-Owen da Gama, uthe umtshelile uMayambela njengomqeqeshi nanjengobaba ukuthi akabheke umsamo wakhe ngendlela izinto zakhe ezibhidlika ngayo.“Ngimqeqeshile uMark kwiCeltic. Ngesikhathi ngifika khona wayengadlali. Ngesikhathi ngimqeqesha waba nesizini ewadlula wonke. Yilapho iPirates yamthenga khona. Kukhona okungahambi kahle ngoMark, okuthile ngempilo yakhe. Njengobaba ngimbonisile. Kimina akusikhona kuphela ukuba umqeqeshi, kufanele ubekhona empilweni yakhe. Ngimyalile njengobaba ukuthi aphindele ekhaya ahlale phansi nomndeni athandaze abone ukuthi yini engenziwa ngempilo yakhe ngoba ngicabanga ukuthi udinga inhlanhla. Ungumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu ngiyakwazi angakwenza. Kufanele alungise umqondo wakhe, alungise impilo yakhe,” kusho uDa Gama.UMayambela uchithwe kwiPirates ngo-2013 eyintandokazi yabalandeli kodwa enuka iqaqa kubaqeqeshi. Emuva kwalokho uwelele phesheya kwezilwandle, wadlala imidlalo embalwa kodwa kwaphelela emoyeni konke lokho. KwiChippa uchithwe esengukaputeni. Ubefuna ukubuyela kwiCeltic kodwa waxakwa yinkemane edla lubi kwiPhuya Selesele kwazise abadlali babuye bengaholi.“Kufanele alungise noma ngabe yini lena engalungile empilweni yakhe ngokwesintu. Uyazi ukuthi ngichaza ukuthini. Mhlampe khona ongajabule ekhaya. Mhlampe umndeni awujabule ngezinto ezithize. Yikho ngithe akayohlala phansi noyise, unina nomalume wakhe nomndeni wakhe wonke azame ukuthola ukuthi yini lena okufanele yenziwe," kusho uDa Gama.
title: Kukhalwa ngesinyama kuMayambela

text: INZIMA impilo kubantu baseSt Chads, eMnambithi, njengoba sekuyohlangana izinyanga cishe eziyisithupha bengenawo amanzi ezindlini.Abantu bakule ndawo bayaphoqeleka ukuthi bahambe amakhilomitha amabili kuya kwamathathu njalo ngosuku uma beyokha amanzi empompini.Ilungu lomphakathi waseSt Chads, uMnuz Jabulani Sikhosana, lithe sekuphele izinyanga bengenawo amanzi ezindlini njengoba anqamuka ngo-Okthoba nyakenye.“Asazi ukuthi amanzi anqanyulwa yini, akekho umuntu owake wafika kithina siwumphakathi ezosichazela ukuthi kwenzakani,” kusho uSikhosana.“Sithwele kanzima impela, siyafisa izikhulu zikaMasipala wasoThukela ukuba ziyilungise le nkinga yamanzi ngoba iyasihlukumeza,” kusho yena.Abantu besifazane nezingane zamantombazane bona amanzi bawathwala emakhanda ngezigubhu nangamabhakede.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi, uNksz Sebenzile Khoza, lithe ungafunga ukuthi bahlala emakhaya ngendlela abawahluphekela ngayo amanzi.“Isiphatha kabi le nto eyenzekayo ngoba kukude lapho sikha khona amanzi. Kungaba ngcono ukuba umasipala uyasisondezela amanzi ngamaloli ukuze siwakhe eduze,” kusho uNksz Khoza.Ngesikhathi sombhikisho wamalungu omphakathi kule ndawo, kuvele izinsolo zokuthi kucekelwe phansi isakhiwo soMgeni Water okwenza ukuthi abantu bangawatholi amanzi.Kodwa umphakathi uyakuphika lokho, uthi inkinga yamanzi iqale ngonyaka odlule ngaphambi kombhikisho.Naselokishini laseZakheni ikhona inkinga yamanzi njengoba abantu bakhona bethi aba khona, aphinde anqamuke.“Ngesikhathi sombhikisho amanzi abengekho nhlobo lapha eZakheni kodwa kuthe ungaphela abuya okwenza sisole ukuthi kukhona abawavalayo ngoba belwa nathi singumphakathi,” kusho elinye ilungu lomphakathi laseZakheni.Imizamo yokuthola izikhulu zikaMasipala wasoThukela ayizange iphumelele.
title: Bakhala ngamanzi angabonwa endaweni

text:
NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEK UVELE ukuthi bese lilobola omunye wesifazane iphoyisa eliboshelwe icala lokubulala inkosikazi yalo engumhlengikazi ngeledlule.UNkk Thabisile Doyisa (46) wadutshulwa eqeda ukungena emzini wakhe oseNapierville, eMgungundlovu, ephuma emsebenzini.Umyeni wakhe, uMnuz Nkosinathi Shangase (43), osebenza ophikweni lwePublic Order Policing (POP) eMgungundlovu, uvele izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi eMgungundlovu ngecala lokubulala.Icala lihlehliselwe uMeyi 4, usuku ayocela ngalo ibheyili.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uShangase wahilizisana nenkosikazi yakhe eyayisafake umfaniswano wasemsebenzi. kuthiwa udutshulelwe phambi kwezingane zakhe.Kusolwa ukuthi uShangase wathatha isibhamu wadubula inkosikazi yakhe maqede wabaleka. Kuthe sekugcwele amaphoyisa wabuyela emzini wakhe wazinikela kuwo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kuvele ukuthi umsolwa ubezama ukwehlukanisa nenkosikazi njengoba ubesevele elobola omunye wesifazane wakhona eMgungundlovu.Umthombo we
Solezwe osondelene nodaba nongathandanga ukudalulwa uthe indaba yengoduso ivele emuva kokufa kukaDoyisa.“Kuthe uma isishonile inkosikazi kwavela ukuthi kunengoduso aseyilobolile uShangase. Inkosikazi ibingazi lutho ngayo. Kusolakala sengathi ubevele engasafuni ukuqhubeka nomshado wakhe, yingakho edubule inkosikazi,” kusho umthombo.Udaba lwengoduso kuthiwa lukhulunyelwa phansi nasemndenini yabo bobabili njengoba bengafuni ukuba ivele emphakathini.Kuvele nemibiko yokuthi uDoyisa noShangase bese behlala bexabana emzini wabo.UDoyisa ulokhu asebenza esibhedlela i-Edendale kusukela ngo-1992. UDoyisa kuthiwa ubefunde wagogoda kwezokubelethisa. Kuthiwa sikhulu isililo ngaye kozakwabo esibhedlela.Izingane zakhe kuthiwa zithathwe yizihlobo ngenxa yokuthi zisencane – endala ineminyaka ewu-11, enye ineyisikhombisa, eyokugcina ineminyaka emine.Imizamo yokuxhumana nengoduso nemindeni ukuba iphawule ayizange iphumelele izolo.n amaphoyisa asematasa athungatha abasolwa ecaleni lokubulawa komhlengikazi wasesibhedlela i-Grey’s khona eMgungundlovu.
title: Ubesethole omunye odubule inkosikazi

text:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEI ZITHANDANI ezishadile zaKwaZulu-Natal ezifisa ukuba yingxenye yohlelo olusha lwethelevishini olwenzeka ngempela, i
Power Couple, zizozibeka ethubeni lokulungenela.Namhlanje kuzoba nenhlolokhono enkundleni iMoses Mabhida, eThekwini, nokuyilapho abadidiyeli bohlelo bemema khona bonke abaganene baseKZN abafisa ukulungenela.“Isigaba sokuqala senhlolokhono yalolu hlelo sihambe kahle kakhulu eKapa ngempelasonto edlule. Abashadile baseKapa balinyusile impela izinga kodwa sifuna ukubona ukuthi iTheku lisiphatheleni.Lokhu ngikusho ngoba ezinhlelweni ezenzeka ngempela zakwaM-Net, kuwina abantu baseKZN, njengakuma
-Idols sekuwine uKhaya Mthethwa noVincent Bones nakwi
Masterchef SA sekuwine uRoxi Wardman (Kamini Pather noDeena Naidoo),” kusho uLani Lombard okhulumela iM-Net.Uthe uhlelo lwenhlolokhono luzoqala ngo-7 ekuseni luqhubeke usuku lonke.Ngenxa yokuthi kuphakathi nezinsuku, izithandani ezishadile zigqugquzelwa ukuthi zifike ngesikhathi sekhefu emini noma uma seziphume emsebenzini kwazise kuzoze kuvalwe ngo-7 ebusuku.Abazofika ukuzohlola ikhono bazophinde bathole nethuba lokuthathwa izithombe estudiyo esizobe sihleliwe kanti lezi zithombe bazogoduka nazo, kuphinde kube nomshini wekhethelo ozobaqamba igama ngokuhlanganisa amagamo abo, wena owabona abalingisi baseMelika uBrad Pitt no-Angelina Jolie asebebizwa ngoBrangelina.Lolu wuhlelo olusha okuzongenela kulo abashadile abayisishiyagalombili abazovalelwa esithabathabeni somuzi eKapa nokuyilapho bezobhekana khona nezinselelo ezehlukene ezizotshengisa ukuthi bazana kangakanani, bathembana kangakanani nokuthi uthando lwabo lujule kangakanani.Imiphumela yemisebenzi abazobe beyenza yiyo ezosho ukuthi ngobani abazophuma isonto nesonto.Ngokusho kukaLani, izithandani zingawina imali engaphezu kuka-R1 million kulolu hlelo njengoba ilokhu ikhula noma incipha ngokuqhubeka kwalo.Uthe ngemuva kwenhlolokhono yanamhlanje eThekwini bazonikela eGoli lapho khona ezoba seNdaba Hotel, ngoFebhuwari 28.Abazongenela kumele kube ngabantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-21 ubudala, babe yizakhamuzi zakuleli ngokugcwele futhi bazimisele ukwenza noma yini ukutshengisa abathandiweyo babo ukuthi babathanda kangakanani.Lo mdlalo uzoqala ukuqoshelwa eKapa ngoMashi kanti wona uzoqala ukudlala kuM-Net (Channel 101) ngo-Agasti kuwo lonyaka.
title: Ithuba lokungenela uhlelo iPower Couple

text: USAKHUNGATHEKILE unina wesitshudeni saseWelbedacht West esibhokodwe ngommese yisoka laso elingumakhelwane elingumshayeli wetekisi sashona ngoba lingasafuni ukwaliwa.UZimhlophe Mawaba (20) obezoqala unyaka wesibili eDurban Commercial College, ngoLwesihlanu ugwazwe amanxeba amathathu yileli soka (21) lakhe ebesethandane nalo iminyaka engaphezulu kwemine kubuka umphakathi.Leli soka limgwaza nje kulandela ukuthi uZimhlophe enqabe ukuthatha izicathulo zikaR2 230 ebelimthengele zona njengesipho sokuxolisa emuva kokuthi lilale nomngani wakhe naye ongumakhelwane.Unina kaZimhlophe, uNkk Vuyokazi Ntombela uthi laba bahlukana ngoDisemba 24, isoka lilokhu lincenga umufi enqaba ngoba bese kuwumkhuba walo ukumhlupha ngezintombi bese lixolisa. UNkk Ntombela uthi sisekude ukuphola isilonda sokubulawa ngesihluku kwendodakazi yakhe ayifice seyiphefumula okokugcina.“Baphume beya edolobheni nodadewabo omncane kanti uzogibela naye esitobhini esilandelayo. Uqale ngokumchukuluza etekisini waze wamshaya ngempama. Udadewabo uthi banqume ukuthi abehle esitobhini eBlue House ngoba kunezihlobo zethu. Uthe uma ehla etekisi wamlandela wamgwaza phambi kukadadewabo. Nami ngimfice esekweqe amehlo ngamphuthumisa esibhedlela kodwa wafike washona,” kusho uNkk Ntombela.Uthe akafisi nokuthi lithole ibheyili leli soka ngesenzo salo. Intombi entsha yakamakhelwane nebiwumngani omkhulu kamufi kuthiwa selokhu kwenzeke lesi sigameko ayibonakali endaweni.UNkk Ntombela uthe bakhuluma nomndeni wentombi bawubikela isanda kubanjwa ukuthi seyiqome isoka lendodakazi yakhe kwadlulwa kulokho njengoba sekwenzeka lesi sigameko.Leli phephandaba liphinde lathola ukuthi esagwazwe inxeba elilodwa umufi ubalekile wangena komunye umuzi kodwa isoka lamlandela lamgwaza amanye amanxeba. Udadewabo omncane obebuka kwenzeka konke lokhu kuthiwa usadidekile kodwa unina uthembise ukumzamela usizo lokwelulekwa ngokomqondo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe likhona icala lokubulala elivuliwe eChatsworth. “ Umsolwa uzinikele emaphoyiseni, uzovela enkantolo ngoMsombuluko (namuhla),” kusho uColonel Mbele.
title: Isitshudeni sibhokodwe yisoka laso safa

text: UMVIKELI woMphakathi u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane, uthwese  uNgqongqoshe wezokuVikelwa koMbuso uDipuo Letsatsi-Duba icala lobugebengu ngokungathumeli kuyena amaphepha angavikelwe wumthetho ukuthi angaveli emphakathini, abezosiza ekuphenyeni uNgqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan.Esitatimendeni u-Adv Mkhwebane uthe ukuhluleka kukaLetsatsi-Duba ukuletha lo mbiko kuphazamisa ukusebenza komvikeli womphakathi futhi kuphambene nomthetho."Kungumbono wami ukuthi ukuhluleka kukangqongqoshe ukuletha lo mbiko kuphazamisa ukusebenza kwehhovisi lami futhi kuyicala.Umthetho ukubeka kucace ukuthi akekho umuntu noma uhlaka lukahulumeni oluvumeleke ukuthi luphazamise ukusebenza kohlaka oluzimele njengehhovisi lami. Inkantolo yomthethosisekelo ukuchaza kabanzi lokhu ukuthi akuvumelekile ukuthi ngiphazanyiswe ukwenza umsebenzi wami, ngibukelwe phansi noma ngicindezelwe ukuthi ngisebenze ngokukhululeka," kusho u-Adv Mkhwebane esitatimendeni.Icala livulwe ngoMashi 13 ngemuva kwezinsuku ezimbili  uNgqongqoshe uLetsatsi-Duba evulele uMkhwebane icala lobugebengu ngokufuna umbiko athole ukuthi uvikelwe wumthetho ukuthi uvezwe emphakathini.UMkhwebane ufuna ukuphenya ukuthi uGordhan akayiphulanga yini imithetho elawula amalungu esigungu esiphezulu ngokukhokha imali yokushesha ukuya empeshenini kowayephini leKhomishana yakwaSARS u-Ivan Pillay.
title: UMkhwebane uvulele ungqongqoshe icala

text: KUSOLWA  “Inkosi Yebhola”, uJomo Sono ongumnikazi weJomo Cosmos, ngokubulala umlando ngokuzicabangela yena yedwa ngokusebenzisa iqembu lakhe “njengenkulisa yamanye amaqembu, angesenantshisekelo yokuyikhuphulela kwiPremiership”.USono ngenye yezinkakha zikanobhutshuzwayo zaseNingizimu Afrika ezihlonishwa umhlaba wonke kanti selokhu asungula iCosmos ngo-1983, ugqoka izigqoko eziningi kuleli qembu elinomlando nelidume ngezeNkosi.Ngaphezu kokuba ngumsunguli nomnikazi weCosmos, uphinde abe ngumqeqeshi nomhlonzi wethalente kanjalo nosihlalo nokunye okusuke kudingeka ngaleso sikhathi.ICosmos ihamba yodwa emlandweni wokwehla yenyuka kwi-1st Division nePremier Division lapho egcine khona ngo-2015.ICosmos iyaziwa ngokukhiqiza idayise ulozolo lwabadlali kodwa uLefa Tsutsulupa, enye yezinsephe ezidlule esikoleni sezeNkosi, usola “uthisha” wakhe ngokubeka isisu sakhe phambili kamuva nje.“Mhlawumbe kumele sizibuze ukuthi ngabe yini inhloso, ngabe usafuna ukubuyela kwiPremiership noma injongo yakhe manje sekuwukudayisa abadlali nje kuphela?“Ngikusho lokhu ngoba kula masizini amabili noma amaththu edlule, usenomkhuba wokuvele adayise inqwaba yabadlali ngoDisemba nokusho ukuthi usuke esezodlala isigamu sesibili sesizini ngeqembu elisha. Yingakho ezithola esekuleso simo,” kusho uTsutsulupa oseyinxusa leMTN8.UTsutsulupa akasoli uSono ngokudayisa abadlali kodwa ukhala ngokudayisa isigamu sonke seqembu phakathi nesizini.“Yena wenza imali ngoDisemba bese eqala kabusha ngoJanuwari. Lihamba kanjalo elakhe ikhalenda. Uma ufuna ukunyukela phezulu, awukwazi ukudayisa izaqheqhe zabadlali bakho phakathi nesizini, usendaweni yesihlanu ngoDisemba?“Kubukeka sengathi akasazimisele ukubuyela kwiPremiership, ukunalokho wanele ngokuba yinkulisa yamaqembu ePSL. Njalo ngoDisemba kuyaziwa kunabadlali bakhe azobadayisa kwiChippa United.“Mhlawumbe abane noma abahlanu. Wenza cishe uR4/R5 million lapho. Athathe okungenani uR2 million awutshalele ekuvikeleni ubulungu bakhe (be-1st Division), abale inzuzo yakhe okungekho elinye iqembu eliyenzayo.”Eminyakeni engu-37 ikhona iCosmos ike yashubisa inqoba izicoco okubalwa kuzo iNedbank Cup, Telkom Knockout neligi.“Kungaba mnandi ukubona iCosmos kwiPremiership yenza izinto ezihlukile. Yiqembu elinomlando. Sikhala ngawo umlando obulawa wukudayiswa kwamaqembu amadala kodwa yena-ke akasayingeni eyokukhushulwa,” kusho uTsutsulupa, ogcine ukudlala kwiMoroka Swallows.Sekuphele amasonto kuzanywa uSono ukuthi aphendule kulokhu kodwa akalubambi ucingo futhi akaphenduli nemiqhafazo. Kwale ngisho esecelwa ukuthi abeke amabili, amathathu ngoDiego Maradona ongasekho kodwa wawuhlaba inhlali.
title: Kusolwa uJomo ngokuzicabangela yena

text: SIKHULU isililo ngokudlula emhlabeni kukamakadebona wesishoshovu sezepolitiki esalwa nohulumeni wobandlululo wakuleli, uDkt Denis Goldberg.Phakathi kwabadlulise isililo sabo, yi-University of Cape Town (UCT).UGoldberg ungomunye wezishoshovu ezalwa nobandlululo zabekwa icala noMnuz Nelson Mandela, Ahmed Kathrada, Walter Sisulu nabanye abagcina sebaziwa ngokuthi yiRivonia Trialists.Ungomunye wababoshwa bahlala iminyaka engaphezulu kuka-20 ejele.Njengengxenye ebibambe iqhaza e-UCT, ubevelele kwababambe iqhaza nasekuthuthukiseni lenyuvesi kulokho ekwenzayo.Uzalelwe eCape Town ngo-1933. Uqedele imfundo yakhe e-Observatory, wadlulela e-UCT lapho athole khona iziqu zeBSC kwezobunjiniyela ngo-1955.UGoldberg ungomunye wezishoshovu ezalwa nobandlululo zabekwa icala noMnuz Nelson Mandela, Ahmed Kathrada, Walter Sisulu nabanye abagcina sebaziwa ngokuthi yiRivonia Trialists.Ngo-2019 le nyuvesi imhloniphe ngeziqu zobudokotela (DScEng (honoris causa) ngeqhaza lakhe ekusebenzisaneni nayo.Wabeka kanje esaphila emva kokuhlonishwa ngalezi ziqu: “Ngiyazigqaja ngenyuvesi yami ngokuhlonipha indoda eyakha izikhali zokulwa nodlame.”UMphathi wale nyuvesi uVice-Chancellor uSolwazi Mamokgethi Phakeng, uthe: “Uzokhumbuleka ngomoya wakhe wokusebenza ebe engaziphakamisile eyisibonelo esihle ngekusasa lezizukulwane ezizayo. Siyazigqaja ngaye”.UGoldberg ubengumuntu ongesabi ukukhuluma okuphakathi kwakhe.Ubekugxeka kakhulu okwavela ngokulawulwa kwezwe yidlanzana, ubaziwa futhi ngokuthi wayenombono wokukufela ayekholelwa yikho.
title: Sikhulu isililo ngokudlula emhlabeni kwesishoshovu

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize ngoMgqibelo uxwayise abantu ngokuhambela imingcwabo kulandela ukunyuka kwesibalo sabantu abaphethwe yiCovid-19 kuleli, nokushona kwabanye ababili osekubeke isibalo sabashonile ku-52. Isibalo sabahaqekile sinyuke ngo-251 kuleso ebesimenyezelwe ngoLwesihlanu sika- 2 783. Kuyaqala ukuthi isibalo sikhuphuke ngo-251 osukwini olulodwa kusukela kwabikwa ngomuntu wokuqala ohaqekile kuleli ngo-Mashi 5. UMkhize ube nomhlangano nabaholi bezifundazwe ngoMgqibelo lapho kuvele khona ukuthi kunezinkinga emajele ase-Eastern Cape kwaphinde kwavela nokuthi basengcupheni abahambela imingcwabo. "Sesikugcizelelile ukubaluleka kokuthi imingcwabo ihanjelwe yisibalo esincane sabantu ngoba izinto ezenziwa emingcwabeni zingasidalela izinkinga. Sikuqaphile ukuthu abantu abahambela imingcwabo (ngisho bengekho ngaphezulu kuka-50) bazifaka engcupheni yokuthola iCovid-19 ngenxa yezinto ezenziwa uma kufihlwa," kuchcaza uNgqongqoshe. UMkhize uthe ukuqhelelana kwabantu iyona ndlela ehamba phambili yokuqinisekisa ukuthi alisabalali igciwane. Uthe uma kufihlwa abantu bayabambana, bayakhalisana baduduzane, basebenzisa amathuluzi awodwa futhi babuye bageze izandla ebhakedeni elilodwa. "Sixwayisa abantu bakuleli ukuthi uma behambele imngcwabo benza lezi zinto basenkingeni yokutheleleka ngfeCovid-19. Iqiniso ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi kukhona oyedwa oneCovid-19 emngcwabeni, abantu abangeke bazi ngaye. Uma singekho isidingo sokuthi uhambele umngcwabo siyacela ungayi. Uma uzoya sicela ulandele yonke imigomo yokuhlanzeka, ukuzivikela ngokuziqhelelanisa kanye nokufaka isifonyo," kusho uMkhize. UNgqongqoshe uthe sebebalelwa ku-108 021 abantu asebehlolelwe iCovid-19 kuleli.
title: #Coronavirus: Sinyukele ku-3 034 isibalo sabahaqekile kuleli, kuxwayiswa abantu ngemingcwabo

text: ISITOBHA saMaZulu FC, uSadat Ouro Akoriko, sikholelwa ekutheni uma bengathola amaphuzu amathathu kwiSuperSport United namuhla, bazobe sebesindile ezembeni.Lesi yisikhathi esinzima kwi-Absa Premiership njengoba ewodwa amaqembu amincele ukunqoba isicoco seligi, akhona nalawo alwela ukuzibekisela indawo kwiTop 8, nalawo asempini enzima yokuvika izembe.Usuthu alubalwa ndawo kula maqembu, ngaphandle kokuthi kunokwesabela ukuthi lungase lushibilike, luwele kwalasha, okuwumbango wokuvika izembe.Emasontweni amabili edlule AmaZulu athole iphuzu elibalulekile edlala ngokulingana neLamontville Golden Arrows kowabakhaya emdlalweni ophele ngo 1-1, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont.Leli phuzu lisho ukuthi Usuthu lusendaweni ka-11 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-27, emidlalweni ewu-26. Ngokusho kuka-Akoriko, uma bengathola amaphuzu amathathu kwiSuperSport, ngeke besasondela emaqenjini asemsileni, okuyiBlack Leopards, Free State Stars, Chippa United, Baroka FC neMaritzburg United.AmaZulu azodlala naMatsatsantsa a Pitori emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ozoba ngo-7.30 kusihlwa, eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza. “Kufanele sithole amaphuzu amathathu. Ngokwami ukubona uma senze njalo, sizosinda ezembeni, ngeke sisayikhuluma indaba yalo. ISuperSport iza ekhaya lethu, kufanele siyenze izwe ukuthi ihambile. Asishayeki kalula thina ekhaya,” usho kanje * -Akoriko izolo.Eqhubeka echaza, * -Akoriko odabuka eTogo, uthe basalelwe yimidlalo emine ebalulekile njengamanje. Uthe emibili yaleyo midlalo bazoyidlalela ekhaya.“Kule midlalo esisalele, emibili siyidlalela ekhaya. Sifuna ukuthola amaphuzu ayisithupha kuyona, bese kuthi le eminye esizoyidlalela ekuhambeni, sesingayikhuluma-ke eyokuthi mhlawumbe sizozama iphuzu kuyona. Lesi yisikhathi sokuthi ulisebenzise ithuba lokudlalela ekhaya ngokuthi uthole amaphuzu,” kuchaza * -Akoriko.Emdlalweni woSuthu ne-Arrows, * -Akoriko wayagixabezwe ngebhande likakaputeni. Nokho ngokusho kwakhe, akaboni ukuthi yinto yesikhathi eside lena ngoba uNhlanhla Vilakazi wayengekho kulo mdlalo.“Uzobuya ukaputeni weqembu uVilakazi emdlalweni wethu neSuperSport. Ngicabanga ukuthi uyena ozoqhubeka nokubamba ibhande. Umqeqeshi wethu ngeledlule wavele wabiza igama lami ngoba nakhu edinga owayezohola iqembu. Ngisola ukuthi ngaba nenhlanhla yangaleso sikhathi,” kuphetha * -Akoriko.Emzuliswaneni wokuqala owawuseLucas Moripe Stadium nyakenye, iSuperSport yanqoba ngo 1-0. Usuthu luya kulo mdlalo ngaphandle kukaButholezwe Ncune noMarc Van Heerden ngenxa yezigwebo zamakhadi aphuzi.
title: Amaphuzu amathathu azosisindisa ezembeni: Sadat

text: UMDLALI wasemuva weKaizer Chiefs, uKearyn Baccus, uncamela ukuthi behlulwe behlasela kunokupaka ibhasi uma sebebhekene neHoroya AC koweCAF Champions League.IChiefs izogijimisana neHoroya yaseGuinea emdlalweni wokugcina wesigaba samaqoqo kaGroup C eGeneral Lansana Conte Stadium, eConakry, ngoMgqibelo ngo-9 ebusuku. Kulo mdlalo kufanele kuphume iqembu elizolandela iWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco kuma-quarterfinal. IChiefs neHoroya bayalingana ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili kwi-log. Amakhosi adinga ukudlala ngokulingana okunamagoli noma awine ukuze ezodlulela kuma-quarterfinal."Ngincamela ukuhlasela ngihlulwe kunokuhlala emuva ngidlale ngokulingana. Ngakho, ngokwami uma sihlasela ngakho konke, sidlalela ukuwina, akukho okuzosilahlekela," kusho uBaccus."Umoya muhle eqenjini. Siwulungele umdlalo. Sifuna ukwenza kahle kwiChampions League njengoba singenzi kahle kwiligi okwamanje. Siwubheke ngabomvu umdlalo futhi sijabule. Sibheke uMgqibelo."IChiefs ifulathele uMzansi izolo ekuseni nabadlali abangu-18. Ihambe ngaphandle kukanozinti uDaniel Akpeyi, nomgadli uSamir Nurkovic abathole amakhadi abomvu ngesikhathi leli qembu lihlula iWydad ngesonto eledlule. ULeonardo Castro, obekubhekwe ukuthi atakule Amakhosi, usale kuleli kulandela ukwephuka ikhala eshaya igoli emdlalweni weligi ophele ngo-2-2 neStellenbosch ngoLwesibili.Uma iChiefs iphumelela ukwehlula iHoroya ekuhambeni, izoba yiqembu lokuqala laseMzansi elenze lokho. IHoroya isibhekene namaqembu ahlukene akuleli emiqhudelwaneni yeCAF kodwa alikho eselike layishayela ekhaya. Ngo-2018, idlale ngokulingana ngo-2-2 neMamelodi Sundowns esigabeni samaqoqo, kwathi ngo-2019, yathela isibhaxu sika-2-1 kwi-Orlando Pirates. Nyakenye iHoroya ivulele isibhaxu sika-2-1 kwiBidvest Wits esigabeni samaqoqo kwiCAF Confederation Cup.Emdlalweni wokuqala wesigaba samaqoqo, iChiefs neHoroya badlale ngokulingana ngo-0-0.Isitobha seChiefs, uReeve Frosler, sithe umphumela wakamuva weChampions League behlula iWydad ubafaka umfutho nokuzethemba."Kubalulekile ukuhlala sigcwele ukuzethemba futhi sikholelwe kwesikwazi ukukwenza. Sidlala ekuhambeni, kuzoba wumdlalo ohluke kakhulu. Kufanele sibekezele, sikholelwe kithina ukuthi sizodlulela phambili," kusho uFrosler.
title: OweChiefs akayizwa eyokupaka ibhasi eGuinea

text: MBALI KHANYILEA BACULI bowokholo besifazane sebethathe isinqumo sokungenelela ekuqwashiseni ngokudlwengulwa kwabantu besifazane kulandela ukwanda kwesibalo sokudlwengulwa kogogo.Laba baculi bahlele umcimbi obizwa ngeWomen In Christ, ozoba seThekwini Community Church, ngoMeyi 4.Phakathi kwabaculi abazoba semcimbini kubalwa uThabile Myeni, Kholeka Dubula, Hlengiwe Mhlaba, Nomathembu Mabeka, Thobekile Mkhwanazi nabanye.Kusanda kutholakala izidumbu zabantu besifazane ezikoleni ezimbili zaseMlazi okukholakala ukuthi baqale ngokudlwengulwa ngaphambi kokuthi babulawe. Nokudlwengulwa kwezakulazi nezingane sekuthanda ukuba yinsakavukela umchilo wesidwaba.UNosipho Daniels ongomunye wabagqugquzeli bomcimbi uthe inhloso yawo wukukhuthaza abantu besifazane ukuthi baphumele obala ngokuhlukumezeka.“Ngalo mcimbi sikholwa wukuthi bazobona ukubaluleka bokuphumela obala nabantu besifazane abashadile, abahlukunyezwa ngokocansi kanjalo nentsha yesifazane esiphenduke ukudla kwenduku kubantu besilisa. Sifuna abantu abaphila ngaphansi kwalezi zimo baphume isiguqukile imiqondo yabo, bazibone ukuthi babaluleke kangakanani emhlabeni,” kubeka umgqugquzeli womcimbi.Uthe kwamukeleke wonke umuntu kule ndumezulu yomcimbi yize izinto ezizobe zidingidwa zigxile kakhulu kubantu besifazane.Ephetha uthe abantu besilisa abazimisele ngokuhambela umcimbi nabo bamulekile ukuze bazizwele ngokwabo kukhuluma imbokodo mayelana nezinkinga ehlangabezana nazo empilweni.Amathikithi okungena emcimbini aseyatholakala ema-Computicket, Shoprite nakwaChechers ngo-R120.
title: Bazoqwashisa abesifazane

text: LIZOQEQESHWA nguRoger Sikhakhane iqembu elisha laseRichards Bay elizogijima kwiNational First Division (NFD).Lezi zindaba zitshelwe Isolezwe wumthombo walo othembekile. Namuhla kulindeleke ukuthi iPremier Soccer League iphaphisise ukudayiselana kwaMaZulu FC neThanda Royal Zulu engompetha bangesizini edlule beNFD.Ibamba lesikhulu esiphezulu kwiPSL, uMato Madlala, kuleli sonto liqinisekisile ukuthi luzodingidwa lolu daba emhlanganweni wanamuhla.Ngokunqoba iThanda ibizodlala ku-Absa Premiership ngesizini ezayo kanti AmaZulu wona ahlulekile ukukhuphukela esigabeni esiphezulu njengoba esethenga.Kuvela ukuthi isitifiketi saMaZulu sokudlala kuNFD sizothathwa nguSifiso “Jomo” Biyela osezoba neqembu lakhe.“UBiyela useqalile ukuthungatha abadlali azoqinisa ngabo iqembu lakhe. Uzobuyisa ithimba elifanayo labaqeqeshi. Lizoholwa nguyena uRoger Sikhakhane ozosebenza noJomo Ntuli noSipho Zimba. Okwamanje indaba yegama leqembu isabhungwa,” kusho umthombo.USikhakhane uzothola u-R300 000 nenye imali ngaphezu ngokufaka iThanda esigabeni esikhulu. Lezi zindaba zitshelwa leli phephandaba ngusihlalo weThanda oseyidayisa uPierre Delvaux.Iqembu likaBiyela lizodlalela imidlalo yalo yasekhaya eMhlathuze Sports Complex, eRichards Bay okuyinkundla ebisetshenziswa yiThanda.“Iqembu likaJomo ngeke lishintshe kakhulu uma uliqhathanisa neqembu leThanda elidle umhlanganiso. Uzimisele ngokuthi baphinde lokhu abakwenze ngesizini edlule. Leli qembu ufuna kube ngelabantu baseRichards Bay namaphethelo,” kusho umthombo.UBiyela ethintwa ngendaba yeqembu ucele ungaphawuli kakhulu.“Konke kusezandleni zePSL. Ake silinde sizwe ukuthi izothini. Mayelana nokuthi sengizoba neqembu yinto ebengingayazi leyo. Mina ngisasebenza njengomsebenzi weThanda. Nathi silinde isinqumo sePSL,” kusho uBiyela.IThanda ibisizabalaze iminyaka eyisikhombisa izama ukubuyela esigabeni esikhulu. UDelvaux uyidayise ngoba ekhala ngokuxinwa yizikweletu. Ukusho kwagcwala umlomo exoxa naleli phephandaba ukuthi usefuna ukushiya unomphelo ebholeni ngoba alisamletheli injabulo kodwa kunalokho limdalela usizi.Usuthu nalo lisanda kuqinisekisa ukuthi ngeke lenze inqwaba yezinguquko uma selidlala esigabeni esikhulu.
title: Lizoqeqeshwa nguSikhakhane iqembu laseBay

text: UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uJosef Zinnbauer, akethukile ngemashi ehlelwe ngabalandeli baleli qembu abathi kabasamdingi.Ekuqaleni kwesonto kusabalale ukuthi abalandeli neZimnyama bahlela imashi ezoya e-Orlando Stadium enesiqubulo esithi #coachout #JZout ngoJune 5. Lokhu kwenzeke emuva kokuthi iPirates ihluleke ukudlulela kowandulela owamanqamu weCaf Confederation Cup. NgeSonto leli qembu libhudluzwe yiRaja Casablanca yaseMorocco ngo 4-0 ekuhambeni emdlalweni womlenze wesibili wama-quarterfinal. Umdlalo womlenze wokuqala kuleli waphela zibambene ngo 1-1. Abalandeli baleli qembu bahlela imashi nje kusaphele amasonto ambalwa kumashe abeKaizer Chiefs bekhala ngokubhacaza kweqembu."Kuhlala kwenzeka ukuthi abalandeli bangajabuli ngemuva komdlalo uma nihluliwe. Ngiyabaqonda abalandeli. Kodwa kolunye uhlangothi kukhona abakubonayo okuhle. Siwine nendebe kule sizini. Sidlale saze safika kuma-quarterfinal. Ungakusho konke okubi,  thina sibheka ngakolunye uhlangothi. Abadlali bethu bathole isipiliyoni," kusho uZinnbauer."Impumelelo akuyona into ehlale ibekwe phambili. Bekukhona neCovid-19. Kufanele ubheke nokuthi bangaki abadlali abebekade belimele. Kodwa kufanele ngifunde emaphutheni engiwenzile ngingumqeqeshi, ngiqhubekele phambili. Ukunganeliseki kwabalandeli akukhona okwase-Afrika kuphela, kwenzeka emhlabeni wonke, e-England, eGermany uma uhluliwe. Kodwa uwina imidlalo emibili noma emithathu kulunge konke."UZinnbauer ubekhuluma ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni iCarling Black Label Cup, emcimbini obuseFocus Room, eGauteng izolo. Lo mqhudelwano onika abalandeli ithuba lokuziqokela abadlali abazodlala, uzoba ngoJulayi 31, ngo-8 ebusuku enkundleni esazomenyezelwa.Ngaphandle kokuvotela abadlali, abalandeli kulokhu bazobophela isikimu, bazoqoka umdlali ozoshaya iphenathi uma yenzeka ngesikhathi somdlali, umdlali ozofaka ibhande lika-kaputeni nendlela iqembu elizodlala ngayo. Ngaphezu kwalokho abalandeli bazokwazi ukuvotela umdlali ozophuma nozongena ngeTwitter.IPirates izobuyela enkundleni kusasa uma isibhekene naMaZulu emdlalweni weDStv Premiership e-Orlando Stadium ngo-5 ntambama.
title: UZinnbauer akumethusi ukumashelwa ngabalandeli

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, unxuse umphakathi waseMlaza ukuba uvikele isikole iCanaan College ebugebengwini. ‘‘Asithandi ukubona isikole esihle kangaka futhi esizosiza izingane zethu ngemfundo ecokeme sesibuswa yizigebengu njengezinye zezikole,” kusho uMshengu.Lesi sikole esizimele besivulwa ngokusemthethweni izolo eMlaza, silethe ithemba entsheni yakule ndawo elangazelele ukufunda ngobuchwepheshe.Lesi sikole saqala ukusebenza nyakenye sinabafundi abalinganiselwa ku-300 kepha kulo nyaka isibalo sabafundi sifinyelele ku-700 kuhlanganisa abafundi bamabanga aphansi naphezulu.UMshengu uthe bayaseseka lesi sikole ngenxa yokuthi izifundo ezifundwa khona zinomthelela omuhle esikhathini esiphila kusona. Ukuqinisekile ukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uzosebenzisana nabaphathi beCanaan College ukuthi izifundo ezifundwa khona zidlulele nakwezinye izikole.Omunye wabafundi bakulesi sikole, uSeluleko Ngxulelo (14) ofunda uGrade 9, uzwakalise ukuzigqaja okukhulu ngesikole sakhe. “Ukufika kwami kulesi sikole kungenze ngakulangazelela kakhulu ukufunda ngoba othisha banothando futhi bayamukelana.”Okhulumela isikole uNksz Sithabile Shezi ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lukhona uhlelo lokuxhasa abafundi bendawo oluvela kwa-Old Mutual nase-Edinvest ngemifundaze kulabo abangenawo amandla okukhokha esikoleni.Wathi babheka indlela umfundi akade enza ngayo ezifundweni zakhe emabangeni angaphambilini nezinhlelo zemidlalo ezikhona ngaphakathi esikoleni.
title: OwezeMfundo ufuna kuvikelwe isikole ebugebengwini

text: UMIKE Makaab, omunye wabantu abanamagalelo abambekayo kunobhutshuzwayo waseNingizimu Afrika, ukholwa wukuthi ukuhlakaza isigungu seSouth African Football Association (Safa) yikhona okungavusa ibhola laseMzansi.UMakaab, oseyimenenja yabadlali enkampanini, iPro-Sport International, uveze lokhu emcimbini obuseMhlanga wokwethula kwenkakha yeBanyana Banyana, u-Amanda Dlamini, njengenxusa elisha leLaureus Sports for Good Foundation SA“Iyodwa into okumele yenzeke, akuvalwe iSafa. Ayivalwe kuqalwe kabusha phansi,” kusho uMakaab, umbona ebusweni ukuthi imvusela ushukela indaba yokubhimba kwezinto kwiSafa.“YiSafa okufanele isolwe ngokucwila kwebhola laseNingizimu Afrika. Baqala ukulihlakaza ibhola ngo-1997 sikunombolo-18 emhlabeni. Ngaleso sikhathi ngangiwumeluleki ethimbeni labaqeqeshi. Saxoshwa sibuya kwi-1997 Fifa Confederation Cup kade sidlala nompetha bamazwekazi abayishiyagalombili. Savula ngeCzecko- Slovakia eyayibalwa namazwe aphambili ebholeni lomhlaba. Kusukela lapho umzila ubheke ezansi kwiBafana ngenxa yabantu abasebholeni ngenhloso yokufeza izinhloso zabo.”Ngaphandle kokuba yimenenja yabadlali nokuba wumeluleki ethimbeni labaqeqeshi elaliholwa nguClive Barker, uMakaab, uke wacija iPirates ibheke kweyamanqamu e-1995 Caf Champions League lapho eyanqoba khona isiphethwe nguBibey Mutombo.Ezintweni ezibawa nguMakaab ekuweni kwebhola laseMzansi wukushintshwa ubuthaphuthaphu kwabaqeqeshi.Uma sebebalwa bonke abaqeqeshi asebeke bahlala ebhentshini leBafana kusuka ngo-1992 ibuyela ebholeni lamazwe ngamazwe, bangu-30.Omunye walaba baqeqeshi uMakaab akhala ngaye nguPhilippe Trousier waseFrance.“Ngemuva kwalokho (ekuxoshweni kukaMakaab nethimba elaliholwa nguBarker) bazoqasha uPhilip Trousier. Yizwa lana-ke, ngisengumqeqeshi wePirates ngo-1995 ngamehlula uTrousier, abalandeli beKaizer Chiefs ayeyicija baze bamdabulela amathayi emoto yakhe ngoba becikwa wukuthi ukhombisa ukungabi nandaba nebhola lethu. Yini-ke esiyenza iSafa iqashe umqeqeshi onjalo eqenjini lesizwe? Umuntu ongenandaba nebhola lethu! ongenandaba ne-Afrika!” kusho uMakaab.Kubaqeqeshi, le nsizwa imvelaphi yayo eseNew Zealand, ibale * -Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba, okusakhala iningi ngaye ukuthi iSafa yenzela izwe phansi imxosha.UMashaba waxoshwa ngemuva komdlalo iBafana eyayiguqise ngo 1-0 iSenegal kuhlungelwa ukuya iFifa World Cup edlalelwa ezosongwa eRussia ngoJulayi 15.“Ngisanda kukhuluma nomunye wabadlali bethu kwaPro-Sport (ulishilo igama kodwa ligodlelwe ukumvikela). Uyangitshela lo mdlali ukuthi bengabadlali babejabule kabi ngaphansi kukaShakes kodwa inkinga yaba wukuthi asho into ngoDanny Jordaan wase eyaxoshwa. Uthi kwabacika lokho bengabadlali futhi namanje basakholwa wukuthi ngabe bayile kwiWorld Cup ukube kwaqhutshekwa noShakes.”UKwenzakwakhe Ngwenya, onguSihlalo wezemiqhudelwano kwiSafa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe uyabhibhidla umuntu othi akuvalwe iSafa.“Abantu abawazi umsebenzi esiwenza kwiSafa. Bayinkinga abantu abakhuluma ngemizwa," kuphetha yena.
title: UMakaab uthi makuvalwe iSafa

text:
