NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEKUBE nomunyu nosizi kushona abayisishiyagalombili bozalo lwakwaMkhize engozini yetekisi abebehamba ngayo beya emcimbini “wokuqomisa’ intombi eNtunjambili, KwaMaphumulo, ngeSonto.Umcimbi awubange usaqhubeka emuva kwesibhicongo esenzeke sekusele amanenjana bafike kubo kwentombi, uKhululiwe “Khule” Bhengu obelethelwe yisoka lakhe, uMnuz Siyonga Mkhize (33) impahla yokumqomisa.Isimo sibe muncu, isililo saqhuma phezulu esigodini eMwane, eNkandla lapho bekusuka khona abashonile. Itekisi abebehamba ngayo kuvele ukuthi iphunyelwe yisondo langaphambili, yaphaphalaza maqede yashaya isihlahla. Izolo lishone kubikwa ukuthi sebeyisishiyagalolunye abashonile kodwa amaphoyisa bengakaqinisekisi.UMkhize utshele 
Isolezwe izolo ukuthi ikhanda liyaduma njengoba kubhubhe abomndeni engozini.“Isibhicongo lesi. Angiyazi into enjena. Bonke abashonile abozalo lwami. Bebengiphelezela ukuya emcimbini wokukhunyulwa kwentombi yami (umcimbi wokuqomisa). Bengihamba ngemoto encane bona behamba ngetekisi, ngibalandela. Ngifike itekisi seyingaphansi kwesihlahla. Izihlobo zami ebezingiphelezela bese zishonile. Abanye bebekhala belimele kanzima.“Ngiyadumala ngoba bengizama ukuvusa umuzi wakithi kodwa kwagcina ngokushona abantu basekhaya,” kusho uMkhize.Phakathi kwabashonile kukhona abashana, abazala bakhe noninalume, abaneminyaka esuka kwengu-12, abaningi okuyizingane zesikole.“Bonke abebekule ngozi sihlobene nabo, izingane zodadewethu nezinye izihlobo zethu. Iningi labo lihlala ngandawonye. Sisokhalweni olulodwa. Yisililo sodwa emphaka-thini wangakithi,” kusho uMkhize.Umcimbi wokukhunyulwa uthe yilapho kusuke kuhanjiselwa intombi izimpahla zokuyikhunga. Akuwona umembeso, wumcimbi owenziwa ngezigodi uma intombi isanda kuqoma insizwa yamisa neduku. Intombi bebeyipha-thele izipho ezigcine zingafikanga njengoba ingozi yenzeke besaya emcimbini.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Willies Mchunu uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokwanda kwezingozi njengoba kushone abangaphezu kuka-16 emahoreni angu-24.“Sishaqekile yilezi zingozi ezishaqisayo zamatekisi. Sihlezi sishumayela ivangeli lokuphepha emgwaqeni. Sizokhuluma nabaphethe amatekisi mayelana nalesi simo. Sizolekelela imindeni eshonile,” kusho uMchunu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN uLt Nqobile Gwala uthe baphenya amacala okubulala kungenhloso.
title: Isililo kufa 8 engozini beyoqomisa

text: KUBHUNTSHE umngcwabo abamakhaza begoloza nesidumbu befuna imali okuthiwa bebengavumelananga ngayo nomndeni kamufi.Umndeni wakwaMohlakwana eMzongwane, eMatatiele, ukhala ezimathonsi ngezindleko othi ufakwe kuzo yinkampani yabangcwabi iHambakahle Funeral Parlour ekwaV eMlaza, kulandela ukunqaba nesidumbu sikaNksz Buhle Mohlakwana (35) okuthiwa ushonele esibhedlela iKing George eThekwini ngesonto eledlule.Isidumbu bekulindeleke ukuthi sifike eMatatiele ngoLwesihlanu. Kuthiwa bese kwenziwe zonke izinhlelo zokuthi afihlwe ngoMgqibelo.UNkk Mavundle Khoza waseMatatiele ethintwa yiSolezwe uthe bezwe ubuhlungu obukhulu ngesikhathi bethintwa ngocingo wudadewabo kamufi uNksz Busisiwe Mohlakwana, ebazisa ukuthi abamakhaza abebeke kuwo udadewabo, bayanqaba nesidumbu.“Sihlale kwaze kwasa silindile ukuthi isidumbu kuzothiwa siyeza, hleze abamakhaza bashintshe umqondo kodwa lutho. Omakhelwane abebezosikhalisa kudingeke ukuthi babuyele emakhaya. Sifile ngezindleko esingene kuzo kulungiselelwa umngcwabo ebesazi ukuthi uzoba ngoMgqibelo,” kusho uNkk Khoza.UNksz Mohlakwana uthe usola ambize ngomnikazi wenkampani yabangcwabi uMnuz Ndabezinhle Manzi ngokubalutha ethi uzobagcinela isidumbu emakhazeni ngemali encane okuthe uma sebesayinile washayela ucingo amalungu omndeni wafuna imali enkulu.“Ngesikhathi ngithola ucingo lokuthi udadewethu ushonile, ngiphuthume esibhedlela. Osebenza emakhazeni kahulumeni othe ungowakwaKhanyile, usitshele ukuthi kubiza kakhulu ukugcina umuntu emakhazeni kahulumeni ngakho kungakuhle sithole awethu amakhaza lapha sizomgcina khona,” kusho uNksz Mohlakwana.Uthe bacele umsebenzi ukuthi abaxhumanise nenkampani yabangcwabi engabasiza njengoba bengenayo imali eyisamba yokukhokhela amakhaza, wabe esebaxhumanisa noManzi.Uthe ufike kubo wathembisa ukuthi uzobenzela konke bese bona bemkhokhela imali abanayo ngohlelo lwesitolimende. Uveze ukuthi bavumelane ngoR11 000 kuhlanganisa ibhokisi nemali yokuhambisa isidumbu eMatatiele.“Sekumele kuthathwe isidumbu, uManzi ufune uR17 000, wasinqabela nokuthi sibone isidumbu ethi sikhona emakhazeni kodwa sizosibona uma sesikhokhile.” Kuthintwa uManzi, uthe umndeni yiwona ozikhethele uhlobo lokungcwaba olubiza uR17 000.“Bakhethe ibhokisi oluwuhlobo olubizayo ngoba udadewabo kamufi ubethenjiswe abaqashi bakhe ukuthi bazomnika imali enguR10 000. Uthe omunye uR10 000 uzowuthola kusonhlalakahle obelandela udaba lokugula kukamufi,” kusho uManzi.Ukhale ngezindleko athe ungene kuzo eya ezihlotsheni zikamufi, ehla enyuka ngemoto yomsebenzi eyobanxusa ukuthi bakhokhe ngenxa yokuthi bebengasamthinti kwaze kwaphela izinsuku ezintathu kungaxhunyanwa. Emuva kokungenelela kweSolezwe namaphoyisa asesiteshini saseMlaza umndeni ogcine ubike kuwo, uManzi uthe bavumelene nomndeni ngokuthi isidumbu uzosihambisa namuhla.UNksz Mohlokwana ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bavumelene noManzi, ngokukhokha imali enguR7 500. Uthe babikele amaphoyisa aseMlaza agcine esebaphelezela ukuyoxoxa noManzi.
title: Kubhuntshe umngcwabo kubangwa imali

text: IKAIZER Cheifs isikuqedile ukuqagela ngozothatha izintambo zokuqeqesha leli qembu ngemuva kokuthi imemezele uGavin Hunt ngoLwesine ntambama.Abemaningi amagama abendiza emoyeni ngozovala isikhathi sika-Ernst Middendorp oxoshwe ngoLwesithathu olwedlule kwiChiefs ngemuva kokuhluleka wukunqoba isicoco se-Absa Premiership.Amakhosi aphunyukwe yiqatha ngemidlalo yokugcina ebanjwa iBaroka FC ngo 1-1 ngesikhathi iMamelodi Sundowns engompetha beligi, ibhaxabula iBlack Leopards ngo 3-0 kowayo umdlalo wokugcina.Amanye amagama abebalwa kwabangase bathathe umsebenzi wokupheka iChiefs bekukhona uBenni McCarthy no-Adel Amrouche wase-Algeria.Kodwa isitatimende seChiefs sikuqinisekisile ukuthi uHunt uyena ogcine edle umhlanganiso.“Lo mqeqeshi ozalwa eKapa ngeke esapholisa maseko ekuthatheni lo msebenzi wakhe. Uzoqeqesha iqembu elikhulu laMakhosi amasizini amathathu,” kusho isitatimende seChiefs.UHunt obeyibamba kwiBidvest Wits kumasizini ayisikhombisa edlule, usenqobe izicoco ezine zeligi, ezintathu azithathe neSuperSport United, esinye wasinqoba neZitshudeni.KwiChiefs uhlalelwe wumsebenzi onzima wokubuyisa injabulo kubalandeli bayo osekuphele iminyaka iqembu labo lihluleka wukubanikeza indebe.Amakhosi agcina ukubhiyozela ukunqoba ngesizini ka-2014/2015 kusakhona uStuart Baxter owashiya ngemuva kokuwina iligi neMTN 8.Kusukela lapho kuqhuma isililo kuphela eNaturena, izindebe azibonwa.Usihlalo waMakhosi uKaizer Motaung uthe basicubungule kahle isinqumo sokuqasha uHunt.“Sisibheke kabanzi isimo sethu kanjalo nezidingo zethu ngaphambi kokunquma ngoGavin. Ngenxa yokuthi iCovid-19 isiphoqe ukuthi siqede isizini sidlala kwi-bio buble nokuthi isikwati sizoba namasonto amabili kuphela okuphumula ngaphambi kokuqala kwamalungiselelo esizini entsha, besimdinga umqeqeshi oqondayo isimo sasekhaya kanjalo nemakethe yethu. Ngiyakholwa wukuthi kuHunt silethe umuntu onesipiliyoni esanele kanjalo nomfutho wokukwenza lokho,” kusho uMotaung.Kuthiwe amaphini kaHunt azomenyezelwa maduze. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ibhantshi ligcwale umoya nakuShaun Bartlett obeyiphini likaMiddendorp.
title: Kuphele ukuqagela iChiefs imemezela uHunt njengomqeqeshi omusha

text: KUPHINDE kwashona abanye abantu abangu-48 ngenxa yeCovid-19 kulamahora awu-24 edlule.   Lezi zindaba zidalulwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, izolo. Kulaba bantu asebesishiyile emhlabeni kubalwa abayisishiyagalombili base-Eastern Cape nabangu-40 baseWestern Cape.Lezi zibalo zakamuva zenza isibalo sabangasekho emhlabeni sifinyelele ku2 340. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa isibalo sabashonayo sesiqala ukwehla kancane kancane. Kuleli sonto  isibalo sabashonayo sehlile, sisuke ku111 sehlela ku103, saphinda sehlela ku87 njengoba manje sesingu48 ezinsukwini zilandelana kuleli sonto.Izibalo zabahaqwe yiCovid-19 eNingizimu Afrika zenyukele ku-124 590, lapho iWestern Cape igenqeza phambili ngo46% wabantu abahaqekile sebehlangene, kulandele iGauteng ngesibalo esiwu25.2% bese i-Eastern Cape  ilala isithathu ngo17.6%.  Emahoreni awu24 kutholakale abantu abangu6 282 abahaqekile. Asebehloliwe bawu-1 493 104, kuhlanganiswa nezibalo ezintsha zabantu abangu-33 092. Isibalo sabashonile sesingu-1.9%,  kanti asebesindile emlonyeni wengwenya sebengu-64 111, okusho ukuthi asebesindile kulesi sifo bangu-51.5%.Le mininigwane ivezwe ngaboMnyango wezeMpio kuleli.
title: Ziphinde zanyuka izibalo zababulawe yiCovid-19

text: AMAPHOYISA aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso emuva kokufa komuntu oyedwa ngenkathi kushayisana izimoto ezimbili eWestgate, eningizimu noMgungundlovu, ngeSonto ebusuku.Abosizo oluphuthumayo baphuthume emgwaqweni uR57 emuva kwehora lesikhombisa lapho kade kubikwe khona ingozi.Okhulumela abosizo oluphuthumayo i-ER24, uMnuz Ross Campbell, uthe abosizo oluphuthumayo bafice imoto eyodwa onqenqemeni lomgwaqo, enye isemgwaqweni.“Umshayeli oshonile nabagibeli ababili bebevaleleke emotweni baze bakhishwa ngezindlawu ngabahlengi nabosizo oluphuthumayo. Umshayeli wemoto eyodwa ufele endaweni yengozi,” kusho uCampbell.Uthe umshayeli wenye imoto uthole imihuzukwana.“Bonke abalimalile bahloliwe endaweni yengozi ngaphambi kokuthi baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela,” kusho uCampbell.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kufe indoda eneminyaka ewu-39 engozini.“Icala livulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa ase-Alexandra. Amaphoyisa aseqale uphenyo mayelana necala lokubulala ngokungenhloso,” kusho uCol Mbele.
title: Kufe oyedwa kushayisana izimoto ezimbili

text: UMLINGISI womdlalo onezinkumbi zabalandeli Uzalo, uSimphiwe Majozi, uthi kube lukhuni satshe ukudlala indawo yomfana omncane othandana nomama omdala owaziwa ngoBen 10 ngenxa yemali. Lo mlingisi odabuka eMthwalume, ogwini oluseningizimu yeKwaZulu-Natal, odlala indawo kaSbu kulo mdlalo, uthi nakuba eseyejwayele le ndawo kodwa usebenze kanzima.“Ngike ngathi ukudonsa kanzima ngesikhathi isaqala le ndawo ngoba bekufanele ngiqabule umuntu olingana nomzali wami. Kwakufanele ngizikhumbuze ukuthi ngingumlingisi ngisemsebenzini kufanele ngiyenze le nto,’’ kuchaza uSimphiwe.Lo mlingisi udlala le ndawo noNtombifuthi Dlamini odlala indawo yomfelokazi uNkk Madlala ophunyelwe yifa likaR10 million nokwenze uSbu athi ne kuyena ukuze amchuthe. Leli qhinga uSbu ulihlanganise nentombi yakhe ethanda izinto ezibizayo nemali.Lo mlingisi uthi uthwale kanzima elingisa le ndawo aphinde abhekane nenkinga esechazela abantu asondelene nabo ngayo. Uthe bakhona abambuza ukuthi kodwa umshaya kanjani ngesinqandi umama omdala kunaye.“Ngichaza nsuku zonke, sekuze kwaba yivesi lemihla ngemihla ngoba nasekhaya bafike bakhuze bababaze into abangibone ngiyenza emdlalweni. Udadewethu nje wayengibuza ukuthi kunjani ukuqabula umuntu omdala,’’ kusho lo mlingisi ephela yinsini.Uthe ngaphandle kokulingisa useqale ukusebenza njengomqondisi wemidlalo ukuze abe nenye into ayenzayo angathembeli entweni eyodwa.“Uma ulingisa kuke kuphele nezinyanga ezintathu ungabizwanga ndawo bese uyalamba. Kuba ngcono uma kukhona okunye oqhubeka nakho eceleni ukuze uphile, nami ngizama lokho.’’
title: OwoZalo kumthwalise kanzima ukudlala indawo kaBen 10

text: MBALI KHANYILEABANTU sebeqalile ukubheka izindawo abazozihambela uma sekufike isikhathi samaholidi okuphela konyaka njengoba isiqala imvunge ehlawumbisela ukuphela komvalelandlini.Yize abanye sebemi ngomumo belinde kushaye isikhathi sokuvala nesamakhefu abazowathatha, abanye babo babamba bayayeka ngenxa yokuguquka kwezinhlelo.Lo nyaka ube nomthelela ekuguquleni izinhlelo abantu abasuke benazo  njengoba kuneCorona.Okuhle ngawo wukuthi ube nomthelela ekutheni abantu babhekisise abafuna ukukwenza ngesikhathi sokungcebeleka. Ngokujwayelekile bavamise ukukhetha  abakuthandayo nokuhambisana nephakethe labo ngale kokuthi bazihluphe ngokuqhathanisa izindlela zokuzijabulisa kwabo nemali abasuke bezoyisebenzisa.Lokhu kubanga ukuthi abantu basale bevalekile, sekuphele imali yokuthenga ukudla ekhaya, eyokugibela nekaphethroli uma sebebuya ekungcebelekeni.Kwesinye isikhathi uthola sebeboleka imali yokuthenga izimpahla zezingane ngaphambi kokuthi zibuyele ezikoleni.Lokhu akugcini ngokushiya abantu benengcindezi yokungabi namali kodwa nasemqondweni bayaphazamiseka ngoba akube kusaba lula ukuhlela basabalale ngezinhlelo abafuna ukuzifeza.UNksz Verushka Ramasami, obhala ngezokuvakasha, uthe yize isimo sokuntenga komnotho siguqule izinhlelo eziningi zabantu kulo nyaka, zikhona ezinye izindlela zokuzijabulisa ezingadingi ukuthi abantu basebenzise yonke imali abanayo.“Ukuphazamiseka kwesimo semali akuchazi ukuthi abantu mabayeke ukuzithokosiza ngezikhathi abajwayele ukungcebeleka ngazo zamaholidi. Ziningi izindlela ezehlukile kunalokho abajwayele ukukwenza abangakwazi ngazo ukugwema ingcindezi elethwa wukushoda kwemali,” kusho uNksz  Ramasami.Uthe iKwaZulu-Natal iyisifundazwe esinezinto ezinhlobonhlobo zokuzijabulisa.Phakathi kwazo ubalule ukuvakashela emapaki ezinyoni nezilwane zehlathi, ukuvakashisa izingane ema-museum okungenwa mahhala kuwo. Ezinye zalezi zindawo uthe kungenwa ngemali encane elinganiselwa kuR20 umuntu emunye, kuma-museum kungenwa mahhala.“Njengoba iTheku linenkundla yezemidlalo eyaziwa umhlaba wonke, ejwayele ukuhanjelwa yizivakashi zamazwe, ngicabanga ukuthi nabantu abahlala kulo abangakaze bazijabulise kuyo inkundla  kungakuhle bayivakashele ukuze bazibonele ubumnandi obudonsa izivakashi zakwamanye amazwe.”Phakathi kwezinto ezingadingi imali exakile ezingenziwa ngabantu abathanda ukungcebeleka, ubale ukuvakasha nomndeni esiqiwini, ukuyophola noma ukuyokosa emapaki, ukuvakasha emadamini anezinto ezehlukene zokuzijabulisa nabangani noma nomdeni.Okumnandi ngamadamu wukuthi asuke ekhona ama-tour guide asizayo,  asuke egade abantu abavakashile ngaleso sikhathi.Noma begwedla emanzini, asuke eseduze kwabo echaza ngomlando wedamu nezindawo ezisondelele nalo.UNksz Ramasami uthe kumele abantu bazinike isikhathi esanele kulo nyaka  sokwazi kabanzi ngamadolobha abahlala kuwo nangomlando wawo njengoba izindawo zokungcebeleka zithe chithi saka.
title: Sebeqalile ukubheka izindawo abazozivakashela

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGULISINDE ngokulambisa iqembu le-hip hop laseThekwini, iDreamteam, ngesikhathi imoto ebelihamba ngayo ishayisa itshe ngaseMthunzini izolo entathakusa nokusolakala ukuthi libekwe yizigebengu.IDreamteam edume ngezingoma i
Tsekede ne
Yaya ibiphuma konandisa kwaNembula, eSikhawini emcimbini obizwa ngeMbizo ngesikhathi yehlelwa yingozi.Leli qembu lehlelwe yingozi nje, omunye umculi uSipho “Big Fish” Makhabane usesibhedlela ngemuva kokuba sengozini yemoto ku-N4 eMpumalanga ngeSonto ekuseni.IDreamteam ihlanganiswe nguLusaso “L-Sas” Ngcobo, Mthoko “M-Dash” Mkhathini noTrevor “TrevorTrey” Sineke.UTrey utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi ingozi yenzeke ngabo-1 entathakusa sebephindela eThekwini besuka eSikhawini.“Asiqedanga ngisho amakhilomitha angu-10 sijoyine uthelawayeka u-N2 sibheke ngaseMthunzini ngesikhathi sizithela phezu kwetshe ligcwele umgwaqo. Sigibele phezu kwalo imoto yaze yagcina isihamba emzileni wezimoto esiphambana nazo. Kuqhume amasondo elangaphambili langena ngaphansi,” kusho uTrey.Uthe ngenhlanhla bayilawulile imoto yaze yama.“Sibonga uNkulunkulu okwazile ukuthi sisinde ngoba akekho noyedwa kithina olimalile. Sithukile kuphela. Ukube kuthiwa kukhona oyedwa wethu olimele besingeke sibonakale emcimbini esiqashwe kuyo (namhlanje). Imoto yona ilimalile kodwa ngenhlanhla ayithintekanga injini. Kuzoba yimali enkulu khona ukuyilungisa kodwa sisaxhumana nabantu bomshwalense,” kusho uTrey.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngenyanga edlule uDJ Merlon noMondli Ngcobo bodumo lwengoma ethi 
Koze Kuse imoto yabo yalimala yaphela ngesikhathi begibela amatshe endaweni efanayo.Babephuma emcimbini wokwethulwa kwamaMetro FM Music Awards eRichards Bay sebephindela eThekwini ebusuku.Iphoyisa laseMthunzini elingagunyaziwe ukuphawula kwabezindaba laziqinisekisa izigameko zokuphonswa kwamatshe emgwaqweni kodwa lathi abantu kabawavuli amacala.UTrey uxwayise abashayeli ukuthi baqaphele emgwaqweni ngoba izingozi zidlangile ngalesi sikhathi samaholidi.“Abantu abahlale beqaphile uma besemgwaqweni. Bengagijimi futhi bengashayeli bephuzile. Ukube thina besigijima noma besiphuzile mhlawumbe ngabe kukhulunywa enye indaba,” kusho uTrey.
title: IDreamteam icishe yalimala engozini

text: BAZOVELA obala uma sekumakwa amaphepha ka-matric abafundi abakopele noma abasizwe ngothisha ngesikhathi kubhalwa izivivinyo.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane izolo ekhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva kokuphothula kwabafundi baleli banga ukubhala.UDlungwane uthe azibanga khona izehlakalo zokuputshuka kwamaphepha okubhala ngoba ezokuphepha beziqiniswe kakhulu.“Kube nesehlakalo esenzeke eMlaza lapho omunye wazama ukubhalela omunye kodwa washeshe watholakala. Wabaleka kubizwa amaphoyisa ngoba abaqaphile babona ukuthi kukhona okusolisayo. Beziqine kakhulu ezokuqapha * -matric ngoba bekukhona nabebevakashela izikole behlola ukuthi kubhalwa kanjani,” kusho uDlungwane ngemuva kokubheka ukuthi libhalwe kanjani iphepha le-Agricultural Management eDumisane Makhaye High, ngaseChatsworth.Uthe njengoba kuqalwa ukumaka ngelizayo abamaki bazoqala ukufika ngempelasonto ezikhungweni ezingu-27 zokumaka.“Uma sekumakwa sikwazi ukubamba labo abasize abafundi bekopela. Sibabamba ngendlela okusuke kuphendulwe ngayo imibuzo. Ukumaka kuzoqala ngoDisemba 3 kuphothulwe ngoDisemba 14,” kusho uDlungwane.Uthe kube nokuphambana kwezinto okwenziwa ngumnyango kazwelonke ephepheni iHindi.“Sawazisa umnyango kazwelonke ngoba kwafika iphepha lokuqala kodwa ngaphakathi kuyiphepha lesibili. Leli phepha labonakala selivulwa ezikoleni ngoba akekho okwazi ukulivula ngaphambi kokuba lifike ezikoleni.”Uthe abafundi abangakwazanga ukubhala ngoba begula noma besezibhedlela bazothola elinye ithuba lokubhala ngonyaka ozayo.“Kunezivivinyo zokuchibiyela abazothola ithuba lokuthi babhale kuzona abangakwazanga ukubhala zonke izifundo zabo. Senza izinhlelo kubafundi izikole zabo ezakhahlanyezwa yimvula ngokuthi sibahambisele amakilasi angomahamba nendlwana ukuze babhalele kuwona,” kusho uDlungwane.Bangu-7706 abazomaka * -matric, bangu-1485abangama-senior markers, babe ngu-63 abangama-chief markers, angu-203 ama-deputy chief markers babe ngu-1289 abazosiza ngesikhathi kumakwa.UDkt Barney Mthembu, obhekele izivivinyo, uthe nakuba zibekhona izinxushunxushu kwezinye izindawo kodwa aziphazamisanga izivivinyo.Uthe ezinye zalezi zindawo yisoThungulu nakwiLembe wathi uDlungwane wangenelela zangaphazamiseka izivivinyo.UNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga uzomemezela imiphumela ka-matric ngoJanuwari 4 ntambama bese kuthi iminyango yezifundazwe iyikhiphe ngoJanuwari 5.Bangu-802 636 abafundi ababhale * -matric kuzwelonke, kulaba bangu-634 527 ababhale ngokugcwele.Zingu-144 izikhungo zokumaka kuzwelonke kanti bangu-44911 abazomaka amaphepha angu-10million.
title: Ukumaka kuzoveza abakopelile

text: ISITATIMENDE sikaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi ngabokufika, sesidale uhlevana ezingxenyeni ezithile zezepolitiki. UMotsoaledi ukhale ngokuthi abokufika benza ukuthi umnyango wakhe udonse kanzima ngoba kufanele uhlinzeke nabo ngezidingo zezempilo. UKHETHA SANGWENI uxoxe nokhulumela i-EFF, uDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi, osola uMotsoaledi ngokucasha ngesithupha.: Uphaphalazile kakhulu ungqongqoshe ngento ayishilo ngabokufika, asivumelani naye. Le nto ayishoyo iyingozi ngoba ingase ibhebhethekise impi yokucwaswa kwabokufika. Sibona ukuthi ukwehluleka kwakhe uMotsoaledi uzama ukucasha ngabokufika, ubenza izimvu zomhlatshelo. Umnyango wakhe usukhombise ukuthi ubuthakathaka, iminyaka eyishumi yonke ukhungethwe yizinkinga zokushoda kodokotela nemishini nemithi nokwenza. Abantu bakuleli bathwale kanzima.: Nizolusukumela kanjani udaba lukaMotsoaledi njengoba nilokhu nithi kufanele aqondiswe?Okokuqala nje kufanele iSouth African Human Rights Commission (SAHRC) ihlale izithonto kuyena imthathele izinyathelo ngoba le nto ayishoyo ithinta amalungelo abantu. Uma ethi abokufika baningi kakhulu kuleli zwe usholo phezu kwani ngoba alukho ucwaningo noma izibalo azibeke etafuleni, uvele wakhuluma nje. Ayikho indaba yokuthi abantu abaningi badala ukuthi umnotho ufadabale. Empeleni abantu abaningi badala ukuthi umnotho uqine ngoba bonke basuke bebamba iqhaza ngobuningi bewukhulisa. Uma uya eChina abantu bakhona baningi kabi kodwa umnotho wakhona wenza kahle.: Niyaphika yini ukuthi abakufika baningi kuleli ?: Asikuphiki kodwa esilwa nakho ukuthi kuphunywe iqhubu nabantu base-Afrika ngoba ukube abelungu laba abagcwele, ngabe kuthulekile ngoba bona bayesatshwa. Le nto ikhomba ukuthi umuntu omnyama usazenyanya yena ngoba abantu bakithi abamnyama laba esikhala ngabo.: Nina njenge-EFF nibona kufanele zisingathwe kanjani ezempilo kuleli?: Into edala ukuthi kugcwale ezibhedlela zikahulumeni ukuthi asinalo uhlelo lokusheshe sinqande izifo kusenesikhathi. Abantu bafika ezibhedlela sekukubi kakhulu. Konke lokhu kukhomba ukuthi alikho icebo elicacile.
title: ‘Uphaphalazile uMotsoaledi ngakusho ngabokufika’

text: I-ANC isikhumbuze abaholi abaqokelwe ezikhundleni eziphezulu enhlanganweni ukuthi kumele bashiye izikhundla ezisezifundazweni, kubizwe ingqungquthela kukhethwe abaholi abasha ukuze kuvalwe lezo zikhundla.Lokhu kusho ukuthi uMnuz Ace Magashule oqokelwe kwesikaNobhala Jikelele wenhlangano, onguSihlalo we-ANC eFree State, uMnuz David Mabuza onguSihlalo we-ANC eMpumalanga oseqokelwe kwesePhini likaMengameli we-ANC noMnuz Paul Mashatile oqokelwe kwesikaMgcinimafa njengoba engusihlalo we-ANC eGauteng, kumele bazishiye izikhundla ezifundazweni zabo.UDkt Mathole Motshekga, obekhuluma ngezinto ezithinta umthethosisekelo we-ANC uthe kulezi zifundazwe kumele kubizwe imihlangano ama-Provincial General Council bese kukhethwa abazovala izikhala.Uthe umthethosisekelo we-ANC ucacile uthi uma usukhethelwe esikhundleni esiphezulu kumele ushiye esingaphansi kwaleso.“Uma usukhethelwe esikhundleni esiphezulu awukwazi ukungenela ukhetho esikhundleni esingaphansi kwaleso. Kanjalo futhi uma usuqokelwe esikhundleni esiphezulu, esingaphansi kumele usishiye,” kusho uMotshekga.Uthe ingqungquthela isichithile isiphakamiso sokwengeza amalungu ezigungu zezifundazwe.Mayelana nokuqashwa nokuxoshwa koNgqongqoshe, uthe lokho kusemseni kamengameli.“Esinye isiphakamiso esichithiwe ngukuthi iContralesa yenziwe ibe wuphiko lwe-ANC njengophiko lwabesifazane noma lwentsha. Le nhlangano imele abaholi bendabuko noma kungathiwa bakuliphi iqembu,” kusho uMotshekga.Mayelana nokuvota ePhalamende, uthe amalungu kumele alandele imigomo yenhlangano nalokho akuthunywe yinhlangano hhayi ukuvota ngonembeza.Usho lokhu nje ngesikhathi kuvotelwa ukuchithwa kukamengameli Jacob Zuma ePhalamende amanye amalungu avota ngonembeza angahambisana nokushiwo yi-ANC ukuthi avikelwe.UNksz Nocawe Mafu, okwikhomishini ethinta impilo jikelele, uthe indaba yokushiywa ngaphandle kwabesifazane ezikhundleni eziphezulu kumele ibhekwe ngelibanzi. Kwezokuphepha nozinzo uMnuz David Mahlobo uthe kumele kunyuswe isibalo samaphoyisa emphakathini. Uthe uma sinyuswa isibalo umphakathi uzophepha. Uqhube wathi izinkampani ezizimele zonogada ezisebenzisa imifaniswano ecishe ifane neyamaphoyisa noma amasosha kumele kubhekwane nazo.
title: Okukhunjuzwe abaholi abaqokiwe kwi-ANC

text: Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi uKhuzani ngomunye wabalingisi abafakiwe eziqeshini ezintsha zomdlalo.“Okwamanje uyena kuphela osakhona kwabasha, angazi noma kusazoba khona abanye njengoba ukuqopha kuzophela ekupheleni kwesonto,” kusho umthombo.Ethintwa uKhuzani uvumile ukuthi uqophile nalo mdlalo izolo futhi lokhu kusho lukhulu kuye. “Ngibonga kuMjosty ngento ayenzile njengoba kunguyena obone ukuthi le ndawo ngingayilingisa kahle. Ngiyacela ukuthi abantu babukele lo mdlalo njengoba indawo yami izodonsa amehlo kakhulu.”Uthe ngesikhathi eqopha akubanga nzima njengoba abalingisi balo mdlalo bememukele ngezandla ezimhlophe okwenze umsebenzi wakhe waba lula. “Lokhu kungikhombise ukuthi angiyena nje umaskanda kuphela kodwa nali elinye ikhono lami eselimbulekile nesengifuna liqhubeke. UMjosty ngeke ngimkhohlwe ngempela njengoba ekhombise ukungabi nomona wangifaka entweni enkulu kangaka.”UKhuzani kulo mdlalo uzobe engalingisi ndawo yamuntu okuchaza ukuthi uzobe enguyena. UKhuzani unxuse abantu ukuthi babukele lo mdlalo ngoba ubafihlele induku emqubeni. Uzobonakala esiqeshini esizobonakala ngeSonto elizayo ngoMashi 24 kuMzansi Magic (161).Kwenzeka lokhu nje wonke amehlo abheke emcimbini i-#Gcwalisa iMabhida ekupheleni kwenyanga nokungumcimbi osungulwe uKhuzani ohlelwa iDlamlenze Development Foundation.Lo mcimbi uzoba seMoses Mabhida ngoMashi 30.
title: UKhuzani uzobonakala eHostela eziqeshini ezintsha zalo mdlalo

text: ISIKHULU esiphezulu seDurban Chamber of Commerce of Commerce, uNkk Palesa Phili, sifuna uMasipala weTheku uze nohlelo olucacile lokulwa nenkinga yezikhukhula ezenzeka njalo uma izulu lina isikhathi eside.UNkk Phili uthe imvula iphazamise ukusebenza kwamabhizinisi amaningi ngenxa yokuthi abasebenzi abafikanga bonke emsebenzini ngoLwesibili.Amanye alinyalelwe yizindawo zokusebenza ngenxa yemvula ene isikhathi eside.“Umonakalo omkhulu udalwe wukuthi amapayipi ahambisa amanzi madala kakhulu. Kufanele alungiswe ngoba ukungalungiswa kwawo kuholela ekulimaleni kwabantu, kuphazamise nomnotho. Uma abasebenzi bengakwazanga ukufika emsebenzini kusho ukuthi usomabhizinisi akakwazi ukukhiqiza impahla ngesikhathi esilindelekile. Lokhu kusho ukwehla kwemali engenayo ebhizinisini nasemnothweni weTheku nowezwe,”Uthe kunzima kakhulu kosomabhizinisi abancane uma amabhizinisi abo ezohlaselwa yimvula ngoba iningi labo alinawo umshwalense owanele ozolisiza ukuthi limelane nemali elahlekile uma lingasebenzanga.“Sicela uMasipala uze nohlelo olucacile lokuthi uzokwehlisa kanjani umonakalo odalwa yimvula kubantu nasemnothweni wezwe. Uhlelo kufanele lusho ukuthi ingqalasizinda ithuthukiswa kanjani nokuthi amapayipi amadala ahambisa amanzi azolungiswa nini. Ucacise nokuthi njengoba imvula idala isiminyaminya nomunye umonakalo kwezokuthutha uzokwenzanjani ngalokhu.”Uthe uma zingatholakali izisombululo zenkinga kusho ukuthi baningi abantu abazolahlekelwa wumsebenzi ngoba uma amabhizinisi elahlekelwa yimali agcina ewile.Uphethe ngokugqugquzela osomabhizinisi abangamalungu abo ukuthi babike umonakalo owenziwe yimvula kuMnuz Yolan Nagoor oyiPolicy and Advocacy Manager kwiDurban Chamber ku-031 335 1000 noma bambhalele i-email [email protected]
title: ‘Umasipala akenze uhlelo lokulwa nezikhukhula’

text:
BABALELWA ku-31 000 abasebenzi abangamalungu eNumsa abasebenza ukukhiqiza izimoto abatelekile izolo ngemuva kokuba izingxoxo zamaholo zifinyelele kwangqingetshe ngenyanga edlule.“Abasebenzi kule mboni bafuna ukukhushulelwa amaholo ngo-14% kuwo wonke umsebenzi noma ngabe kunezikhathi lapho bengabizwa khona abanye,” kusho ohola izingxoxo kwiNumsa, uMnuz Alex Mashilo.UMashilo uthe i-short-term yenzeka uma kunezinkinga zokulethwa komkhiqizo bese abasebenzi begodukiswa.Ngalesi sikhathi basuke bengaholi kuze kube isimo sibuyela kwesijwayelekile, babuye babizwe emsebenzini.“Abasebenzi bakhathele wukugodukiswa uma kunezimo ezenzekayo emsebenzini ezingaphezu kwamandla abo bese beyolaliswa bengaholi nakuhola. Laba basebenzi abanaye omunye umqashi ngakho kumele bahole uma inkampani isasenkingeni isabamisile,” kusho uMashilo.“Akulona iphutha labo ukuthi izingxenye ezithile zezimoto azifiki ngesikhathi enkampanini njengokufanelekile.”Abasebenzi bafuna no-R750 wemali yokwesekwa ekuthengeni izindlu no-R125 wokugibela njalo ngesonto.Izingxoxo zamaholo selokhu zaqala ngoMeyi zaqhubeka kwaze kwaba wuJulayi. Nokho zehluleka, abaqashi nabenyunyana abafinyelelanga esivumelwaneni.Kusukela ngoJulayi bekunezingxoxo ezinye kwaze kwaba yingoMsombuluko odlule kodwa nakhona zifinyelele kwangqingetshe.Izinkampani ezithintekayo yi-BMW, Nissan, Mercedes, Volkswagen, General Motors, Toyota, UD Trucks, neMAN Truck and Bus. 
– Intatheli yeSolezwe
title: Kuteleke abakhiqiza izimoto abawu-31 000

text:
Izinkinga phakathi kwabo ziqale ukuvela emphakathini ngesikhathi oWabantu ezwakalisa ukungenami ngobudlelwano akubo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Wazwakalisa ukuphatheka kabi ekhasini lakhe lika-Instagram lapho abhala khona ukuthi udinga ukwenza izinguquko empilweni yakhe ukuze abuyise ubuyena. Wabhala wathi uzokhulula uNtobeko ngoba usakhula. Kungakapheli zinsuku ezingakanani uZodwa washintsha umqondo wathi empeleni basazowushaya no mfo kaLinda.Kuleli sonto nokho uZodwa usephinde washaya ungqimphothwe eqinisekisa ukuthi kuphelile ngomshado wakhe. Engxoxweni neTshisaLive uthe: "kuphelile ngomshado. Ngeke usabakhona. Kuphelile obekusihlanganisa noNtobeko. Sesihlukene."UZodwa uveze ukuthi esinye sezizathu zokuhlukana kwabo ngukuthi wayelindele ukuthi uNtobeko uzomlwela ngesikhathi behlabe ikhefu kodwa wangakwenza lokho. Uthe lokho ukuthathe njengomyalezo ovela kuyena ukuthi kuphelile ngabo. Kusolakala ukuthi lezi zithandani bese kuphele inyanga zihlukene kanti bezizama ngakho konke ukufihla ukwehlukana kwazo.UZodwa uveze ukuthi akazi noma umndeni kaNtobeko uzoyibuyisa yini imali amlobola ngayo. Ekhuluma emsakazweni Ukhozi FM izolo ekuseni, oWabantu ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umshado awusekho kanti uthe akazi noma ilobolo lizobuya yini. Muva nje lo nontandakubukwa uzithengele olunye unyanyavu lwemoto. View this post on InstagramI used my Brains,my Legs & Lots lots of Respect in the Industry. Promoters,Mentors,Millionaires, billionaires,Businessman/ Businesswoman ❤️🙏A post shared by 
zodwalibram(@zodwalibram) on Jul 25, 2019 at 11:59pm PDT
title: Kuphelile ngoZodwa Wabantu nesoka lakhe

text: UNksz Smangele Mnyandu (34) waseMlaza elandisa Isolezwe ngokuhlaselwa kwakhe, uthe kwaba khona ingxabano phakathi kwamalungu omndeni ngosuku ahlaselwa ngalo.“Impi yaqala ngesikhathi ngithukwa amanye amalungu omndeni emva kwengxabano esaba nayo, kwathi ngesikhathi ngiya egunjini lami lokulala ngahlaselwa amalungu amabili omndeni angishaya angidonsa ngezinwele.”Uthe akazi noma uphephile yini kubo njengoba engazi noma abesifazane bomndeni wakhe bangazama yini ukumqedela.“Indlela abangishaya ngayo iyakhombisa ukuthi babefuna ukuqeda ngami njengoba ubuso bami babudumbile.“Okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi ingane yami encane yakubona konke ukuhlaselwa kwami okuzokwenza ukuthi kube nzima kuyona ukukhululeka ngabantu abahlasela unina,” kusho uNksz Mnyandu.Owenhlangano engenzi nzuzo iNathi Singabantu Foundation, uMnuz Vincent Mathonsi, uthe ucela umthetho usebenze.“INingizimu Afrika ilwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane kuyimanje kepha kukhona abantu ababona kuyinto elungile ukuhlukumeza umuntu wesifazane ophila nokukhubazeka, sifuna ubulungiswa ukuze nabanye bafunde isifundo sokuthi abantu besifazane abahlukunyezwa,” kusho uMathonsi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa aseMlaza aphenya icala lokushaywa komuntu wesifazane. Kuboshwe abasolwa ababili abaneminyaka engu-38 no-56.“Owesifazane owavula icala wabe eseboshwa naye emva kokuthi omunye wabasolwa amvulela icala lokushaya. Bobathathu abasolwa bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eMlaza ngo-Agasti 19.“Icala lahlehliselwa uSepthemba 2,” kusho uColonel Mbele.
title: Umangele ehlaselwa yizihlobo zakhe

text: USEPHELELWE wumsebenzi ujele wesifazane owabonakala kwi-video eyagcwala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ezitika ngocansi nesiboshwa ejele. Okhulumela umnyango wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo uMnuz Singabakho Nxumalo uthe lo msebenzi uxoshelwe ejele laseNcome. Uqhube wathi omunye ujele owavuma ukuthi kusetshenziswe ihhovisi lakhe ukuze bazithokozise ngocansi naye ukhonjwe afika ngayo.“Emva kokuqondiswa izigwegwe isiboshwa asixolelwanga njengoba siphucwe amagunya, sayiswa ejele elikhulu,” kuchaza uNxumalo.Uqhube wathi njengoba umnyango wakhuluma nezwe ngoMashi 2021 ngalolu daba bekudingeka ukuthi balandele inqubo mgomo bese kuthathwa izinyathele ezifanele ngokushesha. UNxumalo uthe, “Umnyango wezokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo ufuna ukuthumela umyalezo wokuthi izenzo zocansi phakathi kojele neziboshwa azivumelekile futhi angeke zibekezeleleke.”Uthe indlela yokuziphatha ayivumelani naloku.  “Ababanjwa bephula umthetho bazoyikhotha imbenge eyomile. Umnyango angeke ungabaze ukuthatha izinyathelo kulabo abaphula umthetho. Ojele kumele babe yisibonelo esihle hhayi kwiziboshwa kuphela kodwa nasemphakathini, ” usho kanje.
title: Ukhonjwe indlela ujele owazitika ngocansi nesiboshwa

text:
IZIDONSELE amanzi ngomsele inkampani yomshwayelense i-Old Mutual  umndeni kamufi obukhala ngokungakhokhelwa imali kamasingcwabisane, ushiya isidumbu ngaphandle kwehhovisi lakhona esifundazweni saKwaZulu-Natal. Le nkampani isolwa ngokuhluleka ukukhokhela umndeni kamufi izimali zikamasingcwabisane. NgoLwesibili ebusuku, kusabalale ama-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapho bekuvela khona amalungu omndeni abethwele isikhwama esinesidumbu sikamufi. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/OldMutualSA?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@OldMutualSArefused to pay their policy benefit. Old Mutual’s arrogance is stinking now. What a shame! May the soul of the poor person Rest In Peace. Plz Retweet. 
pic.twitter.com/Gk2QFQWkoM— White Man Confession (@ConfessionWhite)Ama-video asedonse amehlo abaningi njengoba abantu bekhala ngesenzo salenkampani sokungazwelani noomndeni oshonelwe. I-Old Mutual iziphendulile lezi zinsolo, yaveza ukuthi umndeni usukhokheliwe imali. Lenkampani ithe ukukhokhwa kwemali kunemibandela yakhona ethinta umuntu ngamunye. Iningi labantu lisigxekile isenzo sale nkampani kuTwitter.“Ukuhlolwa okwengeziwe kwenziwa kuqedwe uma umndeni usufika nesidumbu?” kubuza u-Itumeleng Makgae. “Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi ngihlolisise ubudlelwano bami ne-Old Mutual. Lokhu akujabulisi neze,” kusho uReshoketswe. I-Old Mutual ichaze ukuthi ukungakhokhelwa komndeni kamufi kwakungenxa yesidingo sokuhlola okwengeziwe. Lenkampani ithe u-99% wezimali zikamasingcwabisane zikhokhwa ngemuva kwamahora angu-8 uma zonke izimfuneko zikamasingcwabisane zilungile. Esitatimendeni esikhishwe kuTwitter, lenkampani iveze ukuthi izohlangana  namalungi omndeni. We take note of this incident and would like to assure our customers that claims are assessed on an individual basis and the incident at this branch whilst isolated is regrettable.While we make every attempt to settle claims as speedily as possible, this specific claim had to undergo further assessments. Old Mutual strives to pay claims speedily - 99% of funeral claims are paid within 8 hours once all requirements are met.
title: Isidumo umndeni ulaxaza isidumbu kwa-Old Mutual

text: NGEMUVA kwezinqumo ezimshiye enengcindezi iBafana Bafana ibanjwa yiNamibia ihlulwa nayiZambia, umqeqeshi wayo uMolefi Ntseki ujikele kubadlali abaqine ukhakhayi ebuya u-Itumeleng Khune, Bongani Zungu noThulani Serero esikwatini.Laba bayingxenye yesikwati sabangu-25 abazobhekana neSao Tome emilenzeni emibili yeyokuhlungela i-2022 Africa Cup of Nations eseCameron.Umdlalo wokuqala uzoba seMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ngoNovemba 13 kuthi omunye umdlalo ube sekuhambeni ngemuva kwezinsuku ezintathu (Novemba 16 ngo-5 ntambama).UKhune sekunesikhathi engabonwa ngenxa yokulimala.Kukhombisa ukuzwa ingcindezi kuNtseki ukubiza kwakhe uRushine de Reuck, isitobha seMartizburg United asolwe kakhulu ngokusiziba ekuqaleni kwale nyanga.UDe Reuck ngeledlule uqokwe njengesitobha esivelele kwiPSL ngo-2019/2020.Kubuye noZungu osanda kusayina kwiGlasgow Rangers yaseScottland naye uNtseki agxekwe kakhulu ngokumshiya.Babuyile noKamohelo Mokotjo  osedlala kwiFC Cincinnati e-USA, Serero we-Al Jazira yase-UAE noDean Furman weCarlisle United yase-UK.Omunye obiziwe naye okusolwe ngaye uNtseki nguBradley Grobler, umgadli weSuperSport United.ome ngoNovemba 14 bese bebuyela eMzansi ngoNovemba 16 ngemuva komdlalo.Sesisonke isikwati simi kanje:Ezintini: Darren Keet (Oud-Haverlee Leuven FC), Ronwen William (Supersport United), Itumeleng Khune (Kaizer Chiefs FC)Emuva: Thibang Phete (Belenenses), Motjeka Madisha (Mamelodi Sundowns), Thulani Hlatshwayo (Orlando Pirates), Lyle Lakay (Mamelodi Sundowns), Innocent Maela (Orlando Pirates), Rushine de Reuck (Maritzburg United), Abubaker Mobara (Cape Town City), Reeve Frosler (Kaizer Chiefs)Esiswini: Andile Jali (Mamelodi Sundowns), Themba Zwane (Mamelodi Sundowns), Thulani Serero (Al Jazira), Teboho Mokoena (SuperSport United), Bongani Zungu title: UKhune, Serero noZungu babuyele kwiBafana

text: BASOLA osomatekisi ngokuba nomhobholo abashayeli bezimoto ezincane ezithutha abantu i-Uber noTaxify.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi bethole izinsongo zokuthi kusukela kusasa sekuzosebenza izimoto ezincane zeYo Taxi okuyi-App entsha esungulwe ngosomatekisi bososeshini abawu-12 baseThekwini.Bathi kunemiyalezo esabalale ebasabisayo ethi kuzophela nya nge-Uber noTaxify.Omunye wabashayeli beTaxify ocele ukungadalulwa uthe kuthiwa bona bangajoyina iYo Taxi ngoR10 000 imoto ngayinye.“Izimoto zosomatekisi kuthiwa zona zizojoyina ngoR6 000. Nakhona bathi bazobeka isikalo sezimoto ezizojoyina. Sebesukwe wumona osomatekisi. Kuzoshuba ngoba akekho ozogoba uphondo kalula. Abaningi bathenge izimoto bazifaka kwi-Uber noTaxify, basazikhokhela,” kusho lo mshayeli.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane uthe ababoni ukuthi ukuncintisana sekungaze kudale ingxabano.Uthe uhulumeni usacubungula izindlela zokugunyaza ukusebenza kwezimoto zeTaxify ne-Uber kodwa ukuthi azigunyaziwe akuchazi ukuthi azivalwe ukusebenza.“Asifisi ukuthi la KwaZulu-Natal kwenzeke njengaseGauteng lapho bekuhlaselwa abashayeli kushiswe nezimoto. Sizosiqapha isimo, sicele namaphoyisa asilekelele. Sizoxoxa nezinhlaka zonke ezithintekayo,” kusho uNcalane.Bekhuluma neSolezwe ngeSonto osomatekisi abangabaholi beYo Taxi bakuqinisekisile ukuthi izimoto zabo ezingaphezu kuka-100 zizoqala ukusebenza kusasa.Bathe abazile ukuzokhipha abantu emsebenzini kodwa abafuna ukujoyina bazofaka izicelo kososeshini abasendaweni abahlala kuyo.Imali yokujoyina bathe ngu-R10 000 ohlanganisa ukubhalwa kwemoto ngaphandle, inyufomu nethuluzi lokusebenza.Ilungu leYo Taxi lithe abashayeli be-Uber noTaxify bazobhekana nengalo yomthetho kusukela kusasa ngoba basebenza ngaphandle kwemvume.“Le App kusithathe iminyaka emibili ukuthi siyenze isebenze ngokulandela imigudu efanele. Siyisungule ngoba sibona ukuthi uTaxify no-Uber usiphuca isinkwa sezingane. Sithenge nezinkampani iMozzie Cabs neZippy okwenza sibe nemvume yokusebenza,” kusho leli lungu.Lithe ezokuphepha zizobe ziqinile kulezi zimoto.Uthe zizoshibha kunalezi ezikhona ngoba kuzoba uR7 ikhilomitha kanti abafundi nabadala bazophulelwa * -25%.Ithintwa iMenenja yeBolt Taxify kuleli uMnuz Gareth Taylor ithe bazisiwe ngezinsongo ezibhekiswe kubashayeli beTaxify.Uthe lolu daba baludlulisele kwabomthetho ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabashayeli nabagibeli.Uthe abashayeli batsheliwe ngezindlela zokuziphephisa uma behlangabezana nobunzima.Ukugxekile ukuvinjelwa kwabantu uzikhethele izimoto abafuna ukuhamba ngazo.
title: Osomatekisi vs Taxify no-Uber

text: SEWUHLALELE ovalweni umndeni wowayeyisihlabani somculo kamaskandi, uMtshengiseni ‘Indidane’ Gcwensa ngemuva kokuba kuhlasele abalisa abangaziwa emzini waso okuthiwa iKwaDlulujeqeze esigodini saseMngeni KwaMajozi eMsinga, bashaqa izindondo nemali kuleli sonto.Ingoduso yeNdidane, uNksz Zothini Ziqubu, ithe bekuyizithuba zabo-6 ntambama ngesikhathi kutheleka amadoda amane abezifihle ubuso. “Bengihleli nezingane zamantombazane ekhaya. Ngithe ngisageza ngezwa kunomsinjwana, ngatshela ingane ukuba iyobheka emnyango ukuze ibone ukuthi ngobani labo. Ibuyile yathi ayiboni lutho.”UNksz Ziqubu uthi ushaqekile ukubona enye yezindlu igqekeziwe futhi yashiywa igengelezile. “Ngingene khona ngafica amashalofu ku-wardrobe ekhishelwe phansi. Ngithole ukuthi bahambe nezindondo zeNdidane nemali enguR2 000 ebengiyifihle emcamelweni.”UNksz Ziqubu uthe uze wezwa ngendodana yakhe ukuthi laba bantu bafike ngeGolf emhlophe futhi begqoke izigqoko ezibafihla ubuso. “Esinye isigqoko sisifice egcekeni." Le nto isiphethe kabi kakhulu ngoba asikwazi ukuvala ikhaya, sihambe nezingane.”YIKHO kwaDlulujeqeza, umuzi weNdidane Gcwensa ohlaselwe yizigebengu ezifike zagqekeza futhi zantshontsha izindondo nemali kuleli Isithombe:SIGCINIWEUbuye wakhala kakhulu ngokunganakwa ngamaphoyisa asesiteshini saseNhlanhleni eMsinga. “Siwashayele ucingo siwazisa ukuthi sekwenzekeni kodwa athe angeke asisize ngalutho ngoba asikalivuli icala. Athe thina asize esiteshini sizovula icala. Kusiphathe kabi kakhulu uma senziwa kanje ekubeni Indidane yayiqhawe laseMsinga."Oyinduna yabalandeli beNdidane naMageza Amahle, uVeloh Bhengu, uthe lesi sehlakalo sibaphethe kabuhlungu.“Kukhombisa isihluku esikhulu. Abantu esibazwela kakhulu abangumndeni wasekhaya ngoba lama-award ebeyigugu kubo nesikhumbuzo ngobaba wakhona.“Le nto iyisilonda esingapheli kithi balandeli. Kubuhlungu kakhulu ngoba siyazi lezi zindondo zazichazani kuNdimande futhi yinto ebesiziqhenya ngayo noma sivakashele khona ngoba ithina esazivotela zonke ngaphandle kwale uNdimande ahlonishwa ngayo kumaSatma engasekho.”UVeloh uthe sebethemba umthetho ukuthi uzokwenza umsebenzi wawo nokubambisana nomphakathi uma uzwa umkhondo, ubikele abomthetho.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kugqekezwe umuzi weNdidane.“NgoNovemba 21, 2018 kunomuzi okusolwa ukuthi ugqekeziwe eMngeni kwathi izindondo zomculi ongasekho nesamba semali esingadalulwanga kwebiwa. Icala lokugqekeza nokweba livulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa saseNhlanhleni ukuze liphenywe,” kuphetha uColonel Mbele.
title: Kwebiwe izindondo nemali emzini weNdidane

text: UKUVELA kwegama lengqwayingqwayi yomholi weDA uNkk Helen Zille embangweni wesikhundla sikasihlalo kungase kudale itwetwe kumholi wayo, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane ohleli ngesinqe esisodwa. UNkk Zille umemezele ukuthi uyawungenela umbango wesikhundla sikasihlalo wesigungu seqembu esishiywa wuMnuz James Selfe. Abanye abangenele umbango wesikhundla wuMnuz Athol Trollip, uMnuz Thomas Walters noMnuz Mike Waters.Lokhu kusho ukuthi kuzoba nokhetho lukasihlalo omusha ngasekupheleni kwenyanga esikuyo.UNkk Zille umemezele kwiTwitter ukuthi usecelwe abaholi abaningi abaqavile ukuthi angenele umbango.Akagcinaga lapho kodwa ubuye wahoxisa ubudlelwane bakhe ne-Institute for Race Relations (IRR).Lokhu kumenyezelwe yiyona le nhlangano ekhiphe isitatimende isho ukuthi uNkk Zille uzihoxele kuyo njengoba kade elekelela ngemigomo.UNkk Zille uyahlonishwa kwiDA, uke waba wumholi wayo nasePhalamende waphinda waba wuNdunankulu waseWestern Cape.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uSolwazi Bheki Mngomezulu uthi uma angase akhethwe uZille kungabe kubhedile kuMaimane.‘’Isikhundla sikasihlalo sinamandla kakhulu kwiDA futhi ubudlelwane bukaMaimane noNkk Zille abusebuhle neze. Uzokhumbula ukuthi ngesikhathi uNkk Zille ebhala amagama angehli kahle, uMaimane wamyalela ukuthi axolise wangayingena leyo.“Uma engase abuye angasebenza nalabo abangasamfuni uMaimane,’’ kuchaza uMngomezulu.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uMaimane uhleli ngesinqe esisodwa emuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi wemukela imoto esikhulwini saseSteinhoff esisolwa ngenkohlakalo.Akayiphiki indaba yeToyota Fortuner abetetemuka ngayo ekhankasela ukhetho kodwa uthi wayiphindisela emuva sekuvele amahlazo enkampani.Olunye udaba oluthanda ukuba yinkinga olwendlu kaR 4 million ahlala kuyo uMaimane eClaremont, eKapa.Kuthiwa indlu ekasomabhizinisi waseThekwini nakho okudala umsindo.Ziyavela izinkulumo ezithi isimo asisihle ngaphakathi kwiDA njengoba kukhona abamfuna ephumile uMaimane.Ikomiti lezezimali kwiDA lithe alibutholanga ubufakazi bokuthi kukhona angakuhambisanga kahle uMaimane.
title: UZille embangweni wobuholi kwiDA

text: AYA ngokuqonga amahlebezi okuthi bangase babuyiswe abalingisi abamiswa kuZalo oludlala ku-SABC1, abebedlala bengamaphoyisa esikhaleni sabo kwafakwa amaphoyisa angempela.Isinyathelo sokubuyisa abebedlala indawo yokuba ngamaphoyisa, kuthiwa sithathwe ngenxa yokungahlabi umxhwele kwamaphoyisa akwaSouth African Police Service (SAPS) obekuvalwe ngawo isikhala sabalingisi.Ngokwemithombo, bese kubami emphinjeni abadidiyeli ukuqala phansi njalo uma kuqoshwa ngenxa yokuthi kuvele kudume upotiyane emaphoyiseni eSAPS, uma sekulingiswa.“Siningi isikhathi ebesichitheka kulokhu kuthiwa “cut” (okuyindlela yokumisa umthwebuli wekhamera ukuqopha), ngoba iphoyisa lingenzi lokhu okufiswa ngumdidiyeli,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo ongaphakathi uthe ukuchitheka kwesikhathi yinto abadidiyeli abangahambisani nayo, ngoba usuku nosuku basuke bezikalele ukuthi ungakanani umsebenzi okufanele wenziwe. Uqhube wathi ukuma izikhathi eziningi bekubonakala ukuthi kubuyisela emuva.“Yingakho sekubonwe kungcono ukuthi akubuyiswe abalingisi, ngoba bayawazi umsebenzi wabo futhi abenzi maphutha,” kusho umthombo.Isolezwe ngeSonto labika ngonyaka odlule ukuthi kuze kufike kulesi sigaba nje kwaphuma umbiko owawuvela ekomkhulu leSAPS omayelana nokuvalwa kokugqokwa nokusetshenziswa kwezinto ezithinta amaphoyisa akuleli emidlalweni nasemafilimini.Lokhu kwenza ukuthi aboZalo bagcine sebesebenzisa amaphoyisa angempela.Yize kunjalo, eminye imidlalo ayizange ithinteke nakancane ngenxa yokuthi yona ayisebenzisi umfanekiso woqobo. Ngokwemithombo, uZalo nalo seluhlele ukwenza njengeminye imidlalo, lusebenzise umfaniswano ozokwehluka kancane kowamaphoyisa, ukuze kuqhutshekwe nokusebenzisa abalingisi abaqeqeshiwe. Ukuvalwa kwezinto zeSAPS kwaba ngenxa yokuthi abanye babalingisi bagcina bengalandeli kahle imithetho yokuziphatha neyokugqoka ngendlela efanele.Okhulumela uZalo, uKoketso Phala, uphawule wathi akukho angakuphawula okwamanje kodwa uma kuba khona okwenzekayo bazokhipha isitatimende ukwazisa abezindaba.
title: Iyinkinga eyamaphoyisa alingisa kuZalo

text: ZAKHELE XABAUBALISA ngengcindezi abayithweswa ngamanye amaqembu umdlali wasesiswini weBidvest Wits uPhumlani Ntshangase ohlalelwe wumsebenzi wokuhlakaza iminyakazo ye-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership namuhla ebusuku.IWits, esendaweni yesibili ku-log yePremiership ngamaphuzu awu-45 emidlalweni ewu-22, iyona kuphela esele ngamaphuzu angaphansi kuka-10 kuMamelodi Sundowns esiqala ukucacisa ngesicoco seligi. AmaBrazilians asesicongweni ngamaphuzu awu-52 nokusho igebe lawu-12 phakathi kwayo nePlatinum Stars enyukele endaweni yesithathu ngempelasonto ngawu-40. Umdlalo weWits nePirates uzoba seBidvest Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.Amehlo wonke azobheka ukuthi iZitshudeni ziqhubeke nokuhlala ezithendeni zeSundowns ukuze ingaqhubeki nokuvula igebe lamaphuzu ngoba lokho kungasheshe kukhiphe amanye amaqembu embangweni wesicoco seligi.Yileyo ngcindezi uNtshangase akhala ngayo ukuthi yenza bazithole sebephoqeka ukuwina yonke imidlalo ebasalele kuPremiersip.“Abantu bonke babheke thina ukuthi simise kabi iSundowns. Ngokwamaphuzu singakwazi ukukwenza lokho ngoba singagcina sithole amaphuzu awu-24 emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili esisalele. Kodwa lokho kusifaka kwenkulu ingcindezi ngoba sekufanele nakanjani siwine, ayikhulunywa eyokudlala ngokulingana,” kusho uNtshangase.“Nathi siyakuqonda ukuthi ukuze sibabambe kufanele sicoshe amaphuzu ukuze sigqugquzeleke. Uma izinto sezinjena ugcina usuphindela emuva, ucabanga imidlalo esilahle kuyo amaphuzu kungafanele okukhona kuwo oweFree State Stars esathola kuwo iphuzu, oweMpumalanga Black Aces noweBloemfontein Celtic esabuya kuyo silambatha.”IPirates izobhekana neWits ihambela phezulu emuva kokuthela ngehlazo lika 5-0 iJomo Cosmos emdlalweni wePremiership e-Orlando Stadium, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. Ukuwina iligi kwePirates, esendaweni yesithupha ku-log ngamaphuzu awu-32, sekuncike ekutheni iSundowns ihlulwe kuyona yonke imidlalo ezoyidlala bese kuthi amaqembu ayilandelayo angadluli emaphuzwini esiwaqoqile. Nokho eZimnyama zibukeka zizinikele ukuyidudula kuze kufike emidlalweni yokugcina. Seziwine imidlalo emine ilandelana okukhona kuwo oweNedbank Cup nabakhaya iKaizer Chiefs. IPirates yagcina ukuhlulwa ngenyanga edlule ngesikathi ikhala ngaphansi kuFree State Stars ngo 1-0 wegoli lika-Ayanda Nkosi.IWits isiwine imidlalo emine yePremiership ilandelana. NakuNedbank Cup idlulele ku-Last 16 emuva kokuhlula iCeltic ngo 1-0. Nokho ngempelasonto irekhodi layo liphazamisekile ngesikhathi ihlulwa yi-Azam ngo 3-0 emdlalweni weCaf Confederation Cup eBidvest Stadium ngempelasonto edlule.“Ukudlala nePirates asikuqali futhi siyazi ukuthi ihlelelwa kanjani. Siyihlulile emidlalweni emibili edlule esiyidlale nayo. Lokho kusho ukuthi izoza kithina ifuna ukuziphindiselela,” kusho uNtshangase.Imidlalo ye-Absa PremiershipNamuhla ngo-7.30 ntambama: University of Pretoria v Ajax Cape Town (Tuks Stadium); Mamelodi Sundowns v Bloem Celtic (Lucas Moripe Stadium); Bidvest Wits v Orlando Pirates (Bidvest Stadium)NgoMgqibelo: Golden Arrows v SuperSport United (Chatsworth Stadium); Free State Stars v Polokwane City (Goble Park)Ngesonto: Platinum Stars v Black Aces (Royal Bafokeng Stadium, 3.30pm); Chippa United v Maritzburg Utd (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: ‘Abantu babheke ukuthi simise iDowns’

text: IDA  isiluqaile uhlelo lokubheka ozongena esikhaleni seMeya yaseCape Town, uNkk Patricia De Lille ozogcina emsebenzini ngo-Okthoba 31.Umholi weDA  eWestern Cape, uMnuz Bonginkosi Madikizela uthe bazoba nezingxoxo zokuthi kuqala nini ukuqokwa kwabantu abangase bangene esikhaleni sikaNkk De Lile."IFederal Executive (okuwubuholi obuphezulu beDA) izohlangana ngempelasonto ukuze ibheke ukuthi kuzoqala nini ukuqokwa kwabantu abafisa ukungena kulesi sikhundla silindele ukuthi bafake izicelo bagcwalise namafomu. Emuva kwalokho sizobe sesihlunga sibona ukuthi banamakhono afanele yini okwenza lo msebenzi," kusho uMadikizela.Uthe yiFederal Executive ezoqoka umuntu ofanelwe wukuba yimeya.UNkk De Lille ugcine esulile emsebenzini wakhe wokuba yiMeya emuva kokubhuntsha kwemizamo yeDA  ebifuna ukumxosha, ihlulekile nawukumshaya ngevoti lokungabuthembi ubuholi bakhe. IDA  ithe ngeke umshushise ngaphakathi kodwa amacala asenkantolo azoqhubeka ukuze kube yizinkantolo ezinquma okuzokwenzeka. Umholi weDA  kuzwelonke, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane uthe ufuna kungene umuntu ozophatha kahle idolobha laseCape Town, ozoqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bahleli kahe. Phakathi kwabantu okuthiwa bangase bangene esikhundeni sikaNkk De Lille kubawa uMadikizela, uMnuz JP Smith ohola ikhokhasi yeDA  eCape Town noNdunankuu waseCape Town uNkk Helen Zille. UMadikizela uthe akathandi ukuba yiMeya yaseCape Town kodwa ufuna ukukhankasela ezinye izikhundla kwiDA."Angithandi ukuba seCape Town okwamanje, mhlawumbe ngiyobuya ngokuzayo hhayi okwamanje," kusho umadikizela.UMnuz JP Smith uthe ngeke aliphakamise igama lakhe ngoba umatasa nesikhundla asiphethe. "Okwamanje abekho abantu abazwakalise ukuthi bafuna isikhundla seMeya. Mina angithandi ukuba yimeya kodwa uma ngibuzwa ukuthi wubani ofanelwe yilesi sikhundla ngizophakamisa abathile kodwa ngeke ngingenele ukhetho," kusho uSmith.
title: IDA ithungatha ozovala isikhala seMeya

text: ISINDILE ezembeni iMeya yaseGoli uMnuz Herman Mashaba ngesikhathi i-ANC ihoxisa isiphakamiso sayo sokuthi ayisabuthembi ubuholi bakhe.NgoLwesithathu i-ANC eGoli iveze ukuthi ijabule ngohlelo lokuba ivotele ukungamethembi uMashaba ukuthi aqhubeke abe yimeya.Bekumele lesi siphakamiso sidingidwe kuvotwe izolo emhlangaweni womkhandlu kodwa lwahoxiswa ngomzuzu wokugcina.I-ANC ibifuna uMashaba asuke esikhundleni ikhala ngokuthi amadolobha amakhulu anezinkinga futhi nentuthuko emphakathini iza kancane.UMashaba ekhuluma emuva kokuba kuhoxisiwe lesi siphakamiso, ubeveva ukudinwa ethi i-ANC idlala ngabakhokhi bentela.“Yisiphi isizathu esenza i-ANC imoshe isikhathi sethu? Yinto engaxoleleki lena ukuthi kuhoxiswe isicelo sokungathenjwa ubuholi bami ngomzuzu wokugcina,” kusho uMashaba.Usole i-ANC ngokuthi ayinayo imali eyenele yokuthenga amavoti yingakho ishaye ingwiji ngalesi siphakamiso.Ilungu le-ANC uNksz Loyiso Masuku lisukume latshela uSomlomo uMnuz Vasco Da Gama ukuthi bayasihoxisa isiphakamiso sokuthi abasabuthembi ubuholi bukaMashaba.Ikhansela le-ANC uMnuz Jolidee Matongo, lithe bebesalungisa izinto ezithize ezivele eqenjini yingakho bemise eyalesi siphakamiso.“Okwamanje siyakuhoxisa ukufaka isicelo kodwa asisho ukuthi ngeke sisasifaka. Sizokwenza lokhu ngomhlangano ozoba ngoSepthemba,” kusho uMatongo.Amalungu eSouth African National Civic Organisation (Sanco), abeme ngaphandle kwamahhovisi njengoba bekunomhlangano womkhandlu elindele ukuzwa okuqhubekayo.Abephethe izingqembe ezibhalwe ukuthi: “Akahambe uMashaba”.Ezokuphepha beziqinisiwe emahhovisi omkhandlu ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umhlangano.
title: Isinde ezembeni iMeya yaseGoli njengoba i-ANC ibingasamethembi

text: UBabes Wodumo (Bongekile Simelane) nodadewabo obuye abe yimenenja yakhe uNondumiso Simelane baziqhathe nemantshi befika sekudlule isikhathi esingaphezulu kwehora kwebesibekwe yinkantolo ukuthi bavele ngaso. Lezi zintokazi zithe bezinenkinga yemoto. Umsolwa wesithathu, uThobeka ‘Tipcee’  Ndaba ufike ngesikhathi enkantolo. Bobathathu basolwa ngecala lokutitinya owesifazane eMbilo ngoMashi.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngasekuqaleni kwale nyanga laba bobathathu bakhishelwa izincwadi egunyaza ukuthi baboshwe kulandela ukungafiki kwabo enkantolo bezovela okokuqala. Bagcina bezinikelile emaphoyiseni bevela enkantolo batholwa benecala lokungaveli enkantolo. UTipcee kuphela owatholwa enganacala kulandela ukuphatha incwadi kadokotela eyayifakazela ukuthi wayephethwe yisisu.Kulokhu iMantshi uJackie Jonck uxwayise abakwaSimelane ukuthi ngeke akumele ukungaziphathi kwabo ngendlela enkantolo, wathi ngokuzayo kumele babize i-Uber uma benenkinga nemoto.Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukudingidwa kwecala ababhekene nalo abasolwa baveze ukuthi sebenommeli omusha, uMnuz S Shongwe, kulandela ukuhoxa kowayebamele bevela okokuqala.Ummeli wabo omusha unikezwe izitatimende zamaphoyisa ezithinta leli cala. Icala lihlehliselwe uMeyi lapho kuzondlalelwa khona ukuqulwa kwecala.
title: Bacike imantshi uBabes Wodumo nodadewabo bevela enkantolo

text:
KUBOSHWE umfundi oneminyaka engu-19 ngecala lokugwaza omunye umfundi emagcekeni esikole eMvaba Secondary eNanda, eThekwini.UBongani Mthembu (16) obefunda uGrade 10 kulesi sikole ushonele emtholampilo wendawo ngoMsombuluko kulandela ukugwazwa esifubeni omunye umfundi.Laba bafundi kuthiwa bebexabene yize ungaziwa umsuka wegxabano yabo.Umfundi kaGrade 11 okuthiwa ubevalelwe ngaphandle kwazise uvele unamacala okungaziphathi kahle esikoleni ungene nommese ngesikhathi kusashintshwa amakilasi wagwaza lo mfundi.Ilungu lesigungu esilawula isikole, uMnuz Siphiwe Makhathini uthe bakhethe ukuyoqapha isimo esikoleni kulandela lesi sigameko.“Siphatheke kabi ngokugwazwa kwalo mfundi, ugwazwe omunye umfundi wethu. Kusithusile lokhu nokwenze sayeka phansi ukusebenza namhlanje (izolo) seza lapha esikoleni sizobheka ukuthi izingane ziphephile yini. Asifuni lesi sigameko siphazamise ukufunda njengoba kuqhubeka nje. Abafundi sebezobhala izivivinyo, akudingeki bephazamiseke,” kusho uMakhathini.FUNDA: 
Izidumbu zabafundi empini equbuke esikoleniOkhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnus Scelo Khuzwayo uthe izigameko ezifuze lezi ziyadumaza njengoba sezijwayele ukwenzeka ezikoleni.“Kwenzeka lesi sigameko sokugwazwa komfundi nje, ngeledlule eMasakhane High kubulawe abafundi ababili. Siyanxusa ukuba abazali bakhulume nabafundi beziphathe kahle ezikoleni,” kusho uKhuzwayo.Uthe bazobheka ukuthi abafundi bathola ukulashwa ngokomqondo kulandela lesi sigameko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala esiteshini saseNanda.“Amaphoyisa abizwe emtholampilo waseNanda lapho ethole isidumbu somfundi oneminyaka engu-16. Kuboshwe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-19, kulindeleke avele enkantolo yaseNtuzuma maduze ngecala lokubulala,” kusho uCol Mbhele.
title: Umfundi ugwaze omunye washona

text: USIHLALO weBhodi yeTransnet, uDkt Popo Molefe, uthi ezinyangeni ezine ezedlule iTransnet ihlanganise ithimba longoti bomthetho nabaphenya amacala athinta imali ukuze baphenye ngokuphulwa kwemithetho ngesikhathi kuthengwa impahla enkampanini.UMolefe usho lokhu emuva kokuthi uMnyango weziMali uphakamise ukuthi zithathelwe izinyathelo zomthetho izikhulu zakwa-Eskom nezakwaTransnet ngodaba lokuthengwa kwempahla ezinkampanini zikahulumeni phakathi kuka-2012 no-2016.UMnyango weziMali wacela iFundudzi Forensic Services ukuthi iphenye. NgoLwesihlanu kushicilelwe umbiko weFundudzi.Phakathi kwezinto ebeziphenywa yiFundudzi Forensic Services wumsebenzi owenziwa yiMcKinsey eNingizimu Afrika, owenziwa yiRegiments Capital Management neTrillian Capital e-Eskom naseTransnet.UMnyango weziMali ucele oKlebe nophiko oluphenya ngamacala ezimali ukuthi baphenye ukuthi izikhulu zeTransnet neze-Eskom, okuhlanganisa uMnuz Anoj Singh owayephethe ezezimali e-Eskom, baphenywe ukuthi abagwazelwanga yiMcKinsey neRegiments.IFundudzi iphinde yakhala nangohlelo lokuthengwa kwezitimela eziwu-1 064.Esitatimendeni uMolefe uthe selokhu beqale uphenyo ezinyangeni ezine ezedlule banike izikhulu ezithile amaphepha okuthi kufanele zikhokhe imali ebalelwa kuR1.3 billion.Uphinde waveza ukuthi sekumiswe izikhulu eziningi kwaTransnet abale kuzo uMnuz Siyabonga Gama obeyisikhulu esiphezulu oxoshiwe, uMnuz Phetolo Ramosebudi obenguMgcinimafa kwaTransnet oxwayiswe ngokuthi uzomiswa waqoma ukusula emsebenzini, uMnuz Thamsanqa Jiyane, ophethe ezokuthengwa kwempahla eTransnet Engineering osamisiwe, uNkk Lindiwe Mdletshe oyiManager Supply Chain Services omisiwe noMnuz Edward Thomas oyiGeneral Manager of Finance naye umisiwe.UMolefe uthe okwamanje kusaqhubeka uphenyo futhi ngeke bame kuze kube kujeziswa abathintekayo.Isikhulu esiphezulu se-Eskom, uMnuz Phakamani Hadebe, sithe zizosetshenziswa iziphakamiso zombiko woMnyango weziMali futhi nabasebenzi benkampani bayalwa nenkohlakalo njengoba beza nemininingwane esizayo ukuthi kujeziswe abangayilandeli imithetho.Izolo uMnuz Khulu Phasiwe, obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwa-Eskom, uthe sebeqale isigaba sesibili sokucima ugesi kusukela ngo-12.15 emini kuze kube wu-10 ebusuku.Uxolisile ngokucinywa kukagesi esho nokuthi bawucima ukuze bonge lo okhona ngenxa yokuthi kushoda amalahle.Uthe abantu kufanele bangene kwi-website yakwa-Eskom ukuze babone ukuthi ugesi ucinywa nini endaweni abahlala kuyo.
title: Kuzophenywa izikhulu zeTransnet ne-Eskom

text: SISHAYELWA ihlombe elihambisana nezeluleko isenzo samaqembu ePremier Soccer League (PSL) sokwamukela inselelo emkhubeni omusha ebholeni emhlabeni wokuqasha abaqeqeshi abasebancane njengezinhloko zabaqeqeshi.Ingwevu kwezokuqeqesha enguKenny Ndlazi ngomunye wabantu abakushayela ihlombe lokhu kodwa elayo ihlombe lihamba nesiluleko.UNdlazi, igama lakhe elihlezi livela ethimbeni elaliholwa nguShakes Mashaba kukhona noThabo Dladla behlula iBrazil kuma-2000 Olympics eSydney, uthe kunezinto ezintathu amaqembu okumele azenze uma eqasha laba baqeqeshi.“Okokuqala nje wukubabongela abafana ngokunikwa le misebenzi emaqenjini amakhulu nethuba ngokunjalo lokuhola ibhentshi.“Ngibongele nabafana bami ebesinabo kuma-Olympics ngo-2000 ngokukhombisa ukukhula njengoBenni (McCarthy) noQuinton Fortune osanda kuqashwa njengomqeqeshi weReading nabanye.“Buka nje umsebenzi omuhle ubabekephi * -Arthur Zwane noDillon Sheppard. Siyababongela kakhulu,” kusho uNdlazi.Inkulumo yakhe kodwa ibe isibheka ngasemaqenjini.“Afanelwe wukushayelwa ihlombe amaqembu kodwa futhi kufanele aqaphele ukuthi uma uqashe umuntu ongakabinawo amava kangako, kuzodingeka abathile abanamava eduze kwakhe abazomeluleka.“Lowo muntu onamava kungaba uqashelwa kwesenhloko yamaqhinga noma umeluleki, njalonjalo.“Okwesibili, kufanele badedelwe laba baqeqeshi babe nombono noma bazikhombele abadlali abakholwa wukuthi bazobayisa phambili.Ukwenza isibonelo nje, uma ufelwe yimoto uqasha umakhenikha, ngabe nguwe omtshelayo ngezinto ezilimele emotweni noma kusho yena ukuthi idingani ngenxa yokuthi ilimele kuphi?“Okwesithathu, akubhekisiwe emaqenjini ikakhulu kodwa kubheke kubona abaqeqeshi ngqo, kumele babeke phansi imimoya bafunde ukubekezelela abadlali babo.“Uma ungumqeqeshi usuke ufana nobaba kubadlali ngakho kumele uzame ukuthi ungaqhudelani nabo ngezimoto, ngezimpahla zokugqoka eziyizitayela abazithandayo ngisho nezitayela zasekhanda imbala,” kusho uNdlazi.Ebuzwa uNdlazi ukuthi uma ethi abaqeqeshi abasebancane abasingathwe ngasebemnkantshubomvu, akusikho yini ukuthi uyazifesela, uthe:“Ngingumqeqeshi mina, akukho okunye. Uma ngizoba yingxenye yokuqeqesha, ngingasebenza ngisho esikoleni, ngingaba nangumsizi womqeqeshi osemncane.“Njengamanje akukho la ngiqeqesha khona kodwa ngiyalandelela futhi ngiya njalo nasemajimini amaqembu amaningi. Ngiyazi ibhola liyashintsha.“Ngingajabula kakhulu ukuthola umsebenzi ngoba iCorona ingiphazamisile, ngoMashi kade sengithole omunye kwiBombay City e-India nakwiSimba Young Lions eTanzania.“Sekuyingozi kodwa manje ukuya kule misebenzi, ngakho kumele ngithole omunye lapha ekhaya. Kuningi engisangakwenzela ibhola laseNingizimu Afrika.”
title: UNdlazi nezeluleko ngabaqeqeshi abasebancane

text:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEU KUTHI unemikhuba enye yezindlela abantu abangachaza ngayo uDkt Agrippa Khathide 
(osesithombeni), indoda engesabi ukukhuluma noma yini esemqondweni wayo ngocansi.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, abanye abantu bangamchaza njengomuntu oneqiniso futhi onesibindi.Njengoba kuzocaca kwi-
Uncensored yeTop Gospel, le ndoda ayihloniphisi neze uma ikhuluma ngezocansi kodwa isho leyo nto ekhuluma ngayo ngqo.Noma ngabe yini ongafisa ukukhuluma ngayo kunendlela egcina isingene ngayo kwezocansi.I-
Uncensored uhlelo lwezingxoxo lapho abantu abashadile abanezinkinga zocansi bemenywa ukuba bazozinekela izwe ngethemba lokuthi bazothola izisombululo kulo dokotela onolwazi.“Siyazama ukwenza abantu ukuthi bakhulume ngaphandle kokuthi kube nabakufihlayo,” kubeka uKhathide.“Kuyangimangaza ukuthi kunabantu asebebe ndawonye iminyaka ngeminyaka kodwa uma beya ocansini abasho ngisho nelilodwa igama komunye. Kwesinye isikhathi amadoda asho nokuthi noma eseneminyaka eshadile kodwa uma esekuvuthondaba achithela ngaphandle kwamakhosikazi awo. Namanye amakhosikazi aye afike athi awakaze afike kuvuthondaba,” kuchaza uKhathide.Ngaphandle kokuthi uze umahlulele lo dokotela kumele uqale ufune ukuqonda indlela acabanga ngayo nendlela achaza ngayo ukuthi kungani aze athathe lo msebenzi wokubhekana nalezi zinkinga.“Uthola abanye abantu besifazane abangathembekile kubantu babo ngoba bebeka isizathu sokuthi abagculisekile ngokocansi ekhaya. Kunabanye abathi bazizwa engathi bayizinto nje bese ngibafundisa ukuthi bangenza kanjani ukuthi impilo yabo yocansi ibe ngcono. Elami lithi, uma ingculaza isuleleka ngokocansi ngeke size siyinqande uma kunenqwaba yabantu abangenelisekile ngokocansi emakhaya,” kusho uKhathide.Kwesinye isikhathi uDkt Khathide wenza izimanga esiza abantu ngolwazi abanikeza lona.“Ngake ngasiza abashadikazi abese beshade iminyaka engu-30 kanti sathi uma sesixoxile, umkhwenyana ongumfundisi wabuya kimina ezosho ukuthi akakholwa ukuthi kanti ubephuthelwa kangaka,” kusho uKhathide naye ongumfundisi.Umsebenzi wakhe wamukelwa ngokwehlukana ontanga bakhe njengoba abanye bethi uphambene nokuba umzalwane.Ezinye izinkolo zithatha izindaba zocansi njengalezo okumele zixoxelwe futhi zenzelwe ekamelweni ziphelele khona. “Abanye bake bathi nginobizo olungamanga kanti abanye sebake bangibiza ngesikhonzi sikaSathane kodwa ngiyayimela into engiyishoyo. Nginama-CD akhuluma ngalezi zinto engizishoyo adayisa aze afike ku-platinum. Uma abantu bengayithandi into engikhuluma ngayo kungani ngidayisa ama-CD amaningi kangaka?” kubuza uKhathide.I-
Uncensored idlala kwi-Top TV kuChannel 350 ngo9 ebusuku ngoMsombuluko.
title: UKhathide uzithamunda ku-TV ezocansi

text:
SIZWE BLOSEI BHANTSHI ligcwale umoya kumsakazi weMetro FM osematheni kulezi zinsuku ngokuzifaka obishini ngokukhangisa ngesiphuzo sakhe iMoFaya.Izolo 
Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo othembekile ongaphakathi kulesi siteshi ukuthi uSbu Leope akafakwanga ohlwini olusha lwabasakazi nezinhlelo zabo okulindeleke ukuthi izikhulu zakulesi siteshi zizimemezele maduze.USbu ubemisiwe kulo msakazo ngemuva kokwephula umthetho ngokungena esteji ezokwethula indondo, wafike wakhangisa iMoFaya kumaMetro FM Music Awards.Umthombo
, uthe yize lo msakazo ungaphumelanga obala ngesizathu esiholele ekutheni ingavuselelwa inkontileka kaSbu kodwa kusobala ukuthi kungenxa yesenzo sakhe.Kulo mcimbi uSbu wangena noKhanyi Mbau esteji wagcina esememeza iMoFaya yize babeyaliwe ukuthi bangakhangisi ngemikhiqizo yabo uma sebengena esteji.“Engikwaziyo wukuthi iMetro FM beyingazimisele ngokuhlukana ngisho noyedwa umsakazi wayo kodwa ukuziphatha kukaDJ Sbu kulo mcimbi nokungafiki emsebenzini ukuzobambela uTbo Touch ohlelweni lwantambama njengoba yena ayelungiselela ukuphatha uhlelo emcimbini, yikhona okumdonsele amanzi ngomsele,” kupotshoza lo mthombo.Uthe uSbu nguyena kuphela ongeke abuyele yize kuzoba nezinguquko kulesi siteshi.USbu uvelelwa yilezi zindaba ezibuhlungu nje, izolo uhlangane nesikhulu esiphezulu sephephabhuku i
Forbes Africa uChris Bishop. Ufake isithombe ku-Instagram enaye emahhovisi abo wayesebhala ukuthi sebenesivumelwano esihle sebhizinisi nabakwaForbes, abacishe bamthathela izinyathelo zomthetho ngokusebenza kwesithombe sakhe ekhaveni yaleli bhuku ngendlela ewumkokotelo.Umthombo uphinde wakuqinisekisa ukuthi lo msakazo uzojoyinwa ngumethuli wohlelo lwaku-SABC1 i
Zaziwa, uPearl Modiadie. “Okunye engingakusho wukuthi noMo Flava uzoba ngomunye wabasakazi abasha abazojoyina iMetro FM.”Ethintwa uHappy Ngidi okhulumela iMetro FM, uthe: “Engingakutshela khona wukuthi izikhathi zabasakazi zizoshintsha kakhulu, yilokho okumele bakulindele. Izinhlelo zangeSonto ngeke zithinteke kulolu guquko ngoba zenza kahle kakhulu ngokwezibalo zabalalelaleli.”
title: Ligcwale umoya ku-DJ Sbu kwi-Metro

text: UTHI akafisi nokumbona umfowabo obhokode indodana yakhe ngomkhonto, wayibulala kubangwa ukhiye wendlu owesifazane waKwaMakhutha.UMnuz Siyabonga “Sya” Mkhize (39), ubhokodwe ngomkhonto ngeSonto ebusuku.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe umufi nomsolwa (47) babezijabulela bephuza.Umsolwa kuthiwa yisosha eselathatha umhlalaphansi.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe okususe umsindo ukuthi umalume uncikisela abashana ngekubo, wayefuna nokhiye wendlu yakhe kumufi.UNksz Balungile Grace Mkhize (54), utshele Isolezwe ukuthi akafisi nokumbona umfowabo ngenxa yesenzo sakhe. “Umfowethu into ayenzile ibuhlungu kakhulu futhi angifisi nokumbona, ukuthi angabhokoda ingane yami ngomkhonto. Angifisi ukumbona ngamehlo ami,”  kusho uNksz Mkhize.Elandisa Isolezwe uthe indodana yakhe nomfowabo bebengamathe nolimi kodwa uma sebephuzile umfowabo ubejwayele ukuncikisela, ethi abaye emakubo.“Yinto umfowethu abejwayele ukuyenza ukuthi axoshe izingane zami uma ephuzile, athi aziye emakubo. Nami impela ngaze ngathutha lapha ekhaya ngenxa yalokhu  kukhuluma. Ngelanga lesigameko kuthiwa babange ukhiye wendlu, umfowethu wabe esemgwaza. Ukhiye siwuthole esidumbini sendodana yami,”  kusho uNksz Mkhize.Uthe indodana yakhe ibulawe engekho.“Ngangisanda kuhamba ngoba ngiqashe eduze kwasekhaya. Ngibizwe esegwaziwe. Ngafika ngathatha ingane yami ngayiphuthumisa emtholampilo. Bafika bathi isishonile angibuyele nayo ekhaya. Ngabuyela nesidumbu ekhaya, kwafonelwa amaphoyisa. Umfowethu ufike ekhaya efuna ukukhuluma nami, ngabaleka ngoba angifuni nokumbona, akukho engizokukhuluma naye ingane yami isishonile,” kusho uNksz Mkhize ekhihla isililo.Uthe umfowabo ufike wambula isidumbu, wabona ukuthi useshonile wabe esethwala izandla ekhanda. Uthe wabe eseya komunye umuzi kamfowabo wacela bemphelezele aye emaphoyiseni eyozinikela.Umthombo weSolezwe osondelene nalolu daba uthe kulo muzi bekujwayelekile ukuthi kube  nomsindo umsolwa ethi abashana abaye emakubo.Umsolwa njengoba bese ethole imali yempesheni ubejwayele ukuthenga utshwala nenyama kosiwe.UNksz Mkhize uthe umfowabo  wayeka  emasosheni cishe ngo-2017.Uthe yize ebexosha izingane zakhe uma ephuzile kodwa bebezwana nomufi njengoba bebegqoka izimpahla ezifanayo futhi esanda kumenzela izincwadi zokushayela.UNksz Mkhize wayenezingane eziyisithupha, ezintathu (okubalwa nomufi) bezihlala nomsolwa, eyodwa uthe yahamba yayoqasha ngoba ibalekela  umsindo obususwa umsolwa. Ezimbili sezashona. Uthe izingane zakhe zidinwe kakhulu ngalesi sigameko. “ Ngifisa umthetho usebenze kulolu daba, noma angabhadla ejele umfowethu.Okubuhlungu kodwa ukuthi ingane yami ngeke isavuka. Izingane zakwabo zidiniwe ngokwenzekile, kungakuhle nje umfowethu agcinwe ezitokisini,”  kuphetha uNksz Mkhize. Okhulumela amaphoyisa uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aKwaMakhutha aphenya icala lokubulala.“Icala lokubulala livulwe KwaMakhutha, ngo-23.30 ngeSonto, kuMusa Avenue, owesilisa oneminyaka engu-39 ubhokodwe ngomkhonto kade exabene nesihlobo sakhe. Uyiswe emtholampilo, wafike washonela khona. Kuboshwe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-47.. Uzovela enkantolo yaseMbumbulu maduze,” kusho uCapt Gwala.
title: Owesilisa 'ubhokode' umshana ngomkhonto kubangwa ukhiye

text: UMISIWE uthishanhloko wesikole saKwaMakhutha esibe ngundabuzekwayo nyakenye ngesikhathi kushona abafundi ababili kugwazana abafundi iMasakhane High.Izolo okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uthishanhloko wakulesi sikole umisiwe emuva kwemizamo yokuthi anikwe incwadi yokumiswa engayamukeli.“Kuyiqiniso ukuthi ngesikhathi enikwa incwadi yokumiswa akazange avume ukuyithatha kodwa yaphinde yathunyelwa kuye nge-email. Ngokwazi kwethu umisiwe,” kusho uMahlambi.Akazange anabe ngesizathu esiholele ekumisweni kukathishanhloko wakulesi sikole esibe nezinkinga eziningi nyakenye.Umthombo waleli phephandaba ocele ukuthi igama lakhe lingadalulwa uthe uthishanhloko uke wanyamalala engatholakali ukuze anikwe incwadi yokummisa.Ngaphandle kokugwazana kwabafundi okwaholela ekutheni kuphazamiseke ukufunda, phambilini kwaba nenkinga yokuqhinqa kothisha abangu-17 emahhovisi oMnyango wezeMfundo eMbumbulu ngoba kuthiwa baxoshwe nguthishanhloko nabazali kwase kufakwa amavolontiya angu-22 ukuze bafundise abafundi bakulesi sikole.Izinkinga zaseMasakhane High zaholela ekutheni umnyango wenze uphenyo ngokwenzeka esikoleni wase uphinde wethula umbiko owaveza ukuthi uyabasusa bonke othisha bakulesi sikole okubalwa kubo nalabo thisha abangu-17 namavolontiya ayeselethiwe.Izolo, uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube uhambele kulesi sikole eyoxoxisana nazo zonke izinhlaka ezithinteka kulolu daba lapho enxuse khona othisha, abazali nesigungu esilawula isikole ukuthi babeke abafundi phambili.Lokhu bekuyingxenye yezinhlelo zikahulumeni wesifundazwe zokubheka ukusebenza kwezikole.UNkk Dube Ncube uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokusebenza kwalesi sikole.“Okwenzeke kulesi sikole akufanele kuphinde kwenzeke noma ikuphi. Izikole zethu kufanele zibe yizindawo eziphephile lapho okufundwa khona nsukuzonkeAkufanele izikole zethu zibe yimihhume yezigebengu bese ziphendulwa indawo yempi,” kusho uNkk Dube Ncube.UNksz Lungile Lushaba onguSihlalo wenyunyana yothisha iSadtu esifundeni sase-Andrew Zondo uthe bafisa ukuthi kuqhubeke kulandelwe iziphakamiso ezenziwa nguMnyango wezeMfundo ngodaba lwalesi sikole.
title: Kumiswe owesikole esixakwe yizinkinga

text: BAZIHAMBELA bodwa osaziwayo bakuleli emikhakheni ehlukene njengoba ngoLwesibili ebusuku kumenyezelwe amaciko azoqophisana eminxeni ehlukene emcimbini wezindondo waphesheya kwezilwandle owaziwa ngama-International Achievement Recognition Awards (IARA).Umcimbi uzoba ngoSeptemba 22, eHilton Hotel Canary Wharf, Marsh Wall, eLondon.Osaziwayo bakuleli okukhona kubo uLira, Thuso Mbedu, Bonang Matheba, Cassper Nyovest, Nasty C, Pearl Thusi, Kay Sibiya, Black Coffee, Maps Maponyane noGert Johan Coetzee baqokwe eminxeni ehlukene kulo mcimbi.Ngonyaka odlule umlingisi owazakhela igama ngokuqala ukubonakala elingisa efilimini ethi Tsotsi, uTerry Pheto, wabuya nezindondo ezimbili kulo mcimbi wahlabana ngendondo yeBest Actress neyeBest TV and Drama.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana belilikhulu isasasa abantu behalalisela amaciko aqokwe emcimbini.UBonang uqokwe eminxeni emibili kulo mcimbi, oweBest TV Presenter noweBest Media Personality.UBonang uzithakasele lezi zindaba wabonga abahleli bomcimbi ngokumqoka eminxeni ehlukene.UKay Sibiya ubonge uNkulunkulu ngokuqokwa kulo mcimbi wathi lokho kusho lukhulu kuye.UPeal Thusi naye uqokwe eminxeni emibili okukhona kuwo oweBest Actress noweBest International Actress ngendawo ayeyilingisa emdlalweni wase-USA iQuantico.UPearl ubonge abantu bakuleli abese beqalile izolo ukumvotela.Eminye iminxa imi kanje:BEST YOUNG ACTRESSNathalie Emmanuel (Fast & Furious 8)Thuso Mbedu (Shuga)Stefanie Martini (Prime Suspect)Zynelluh Zuh (Deranged)Regina Daniels (Land of Slaves)Emily Irene VanCamp (The Resident)Sophie Austin (Moving On)Kate Davies Speak (Knights of the Damned)BEST MALE ARTISTLouis Tomilinson, DavidoMichael Dappah, Peter Okoye Mr PBread Boi, Ihab Amir, Sheku Kanneh-MasonGeorge EzraBEST INTERNATIONAL FEMALE ARTISTJustine Skype, Souhila Ben Lachhab, NiniolaSalma Rachid, Lira, Angeline QuintoMzvee, Angun
title: Kuqokwe abakuleli kowaphesheya

text: MINENHLE MKHIZE noMTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIU MGADLI weKaizer Chiefs uMatthew Rusike akaziboni enengcindezi yokwenza imilingo egilwe abadlali baseZimbabwe abebegijima kuMakhosi eminyakeni eyedlule.Kusihlwa ngo-7.30, e-FNB Stadium, iChiefs izodudulana ne-Ajax Cape Town emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership. Ngemuva kwalo mdlalo Amakhosi azodudulana ne-Orlando Pirates ngoMgqibelo ngo-3.30 ntambama eFNB.URusike uyazitamuzela ngesikimu kuChiefs kusukela kuhambe umkhaya wakhe uKingston Nkhatha obeyithemba lomqeqeshi weZimpofana uStuart Baxter.IChiefs yaziwa ngokulanda ukhilimu wabadlali abadabuka eZimbabwe. Kubadlali baseZimbabwe asebeke bagqoka imibala yeChiefs ngempumelelo kukhona noKnowledge Musona ongalibheki ipali.Ngo-2010/2011 uMusona wagila izimanga kuPremier Soccer League (PSL) eqobela enethini amagoli angu-15 emidlalweni engu-29 yeligi okwenza wakhala wemuka nomklomelo womdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi.Ngesizini edlule uMusona ubebolekiswe kuChiefs yiTSG Hoffenhiem yaseGermany abegijima kuyona. Kuleli qembu ufike wahlabana ngomklomelo womdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi ngangu-15 kuyo yonke imiqhudelwano.“Anginayo ingcindezi yokulandela ezinyathelweni zikaNkhatha, Musona noma uNengomasha (Tinashe). Mina ngingomunye umdlali ohlukile kunabo ngoba izindlela zethu zokudlala azifani. Inselelo enginayo eyokuzakhela elami igama kuChiefs hhayi ukuthi ngizifakele ingcindezi yokuthi ngifuna ukulandela abakhaya bami abagila izimanga kuChiefs ngezikhathi zabo. UNkhatha ubengumdlali obalulekile eqenjini kodwa ukuhamba kwakhe akusho ukuthi iChiefs isiphelile. UNkhatha akayona iChiefs,” kusho uRusike.UNengomasha, owayeyibamba enkabeni yenkundla kuMakhosi, udlale iminyaka engu-10 kuChiefs. Ngo-2003/2004 waqokwa njengomdlali ovelele kuPSL ngemuva kokusiza iChiefs ukuthi ikhale yemuke nesicoco seligi.“Into eza phambili kimina yiqembu. Ukuthi ngubani odlalayo noma ngubani oshaya amagoli yinto engangikhathazi. Okuhle wukuthi bonke abadlali bayawashaya amagoli,” kusho uRusike.“Indaba yomdlalo wabakhaya yinto engekho emiqondweni yethu ngoba amaphuzu esizowalwela kuPirates ngoMgqibelo amaphuzu afana nesizowadlalela uma sesibhekene ne-Ajax kusasa (namuhla). Kufanele siyinikeze inhlonipho eyifanele ngoba iyiqembu eliyingozi. Nathi sifuna ukufika kuwona umdlalo wabakhaya sigcwele ukuzethemba. Asifuni ukufika kowabakhaya imimoya iphansi,” kusho uRusike.Lo mdlali ukhuluma kanjena nje, omunye wabagadli abanikwe ithuba nguRoger de Sa, u-Erwin Isaacs uthe ubona ithuba elikahle lokuthi baphoxe iChiefs.“Asikho isikhathi esingcono sokudlala nabo njengalesi. Babukeka sengathi bayasindelwa njengoba bengakanqobi kulo nyaka kweyeligi. Uma siliyeka leli thuba ngeke siphinde silithole elinye,” usho kanje lo mdlali othi ukuba kuya ngaye ngabe ngeke aphinde adlalele iqembu laseGoli ngoba leli dolobha liyamphika.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Namuhla: Kaizer Chiefs vs Ajax Cape Town (FNB Stadium, 7.30pm); Free State Stars vs Orlando Pirates (Charles Mopeli Stadium, 7.30pm); Chippa United vs Polokwane City (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 7.30pm).NgoLwesihlanu: Bidvest Wits v Bloemfontein Celtic (Bidvest Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Kaizer Chiefs v Orlando Pirates (FNB Stadium, 3.30pm), SuperSport United v Ajax Cape Town (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 6pm), Free State Stars v Mamelodi Sundowns (Charles Mopeli Stadium, 8.15pm), Black Aces v AmaZulu (Mbombela Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: University of Pretoria v Maritzburg United (Tuks Stadium, 3.30pm), Platinum Stars v Moroka Swallows (Royal Bafokeng Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: Anginayo ingcindezi kuKaizer Chiefs - Rusike

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUUHANJELWE izinhlanga ezihlukene umcimbi wokugubha usuku lokuzalwa lukamrepha waKwaMashu, uZakwe, obuse-Empyre Night Club, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.UNtokozo, odume kakhulu ngesibongo sakhe uZakwe ubegubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa ehlanganisa iminyaka engu-26. UZakwe, owaduma ngezingoma okubalwa kuzo ezithi 
Bathi Ngiyachoma nethi 
Isukile urepha ngesiZulu ezingomeni zakhe eziningi kodwa ephathini yakhe bekukhona ngisho namaNdiya.Abedansa ngathi awanamathambo futhi abebukeka emjabulela uZakwe njengoba ethe eyongena esteji kwaba khona ashaya amakhwela.Uma ungena ubungazitshela ukuthi abantu bayidlanzana kanti iningi labo beligcwele phezulu kwazise le kilabhu inezindawo zokudansa ezimbili. UNgane, osebenza noZakwe ubalandile phezulu kwagcwala ezansi.Umphathi wohlelo osakaza uhlelo lwasemini phakathi nesonto kwiGagasi FM, uMzokoloko, ubize uZakwe esteji ukuba azosika ikhekhe.Ngemuva kokusikwa kwekhekhe umnikeze isipho sezicathulo iCarvella. UZakwe akahlukani nezicathulo zalolu hlobo njengoba kuphi nakuphi lapho ecula khona usuke edlubhe zona.Kulo mcimbi bekunandisa uDJ Le Soul, Mzulu, Duncan, Ngane nabanye abaningi. Ngokusho kwezikhangiso bekuthiwa kuzoba khona neBig NUZ, Professor, DJ Tira kodwa ithimba le
Solezwe lize lahamba bengabonwa nangokhalo.
title: Izinhlanga ezahlukene emcimbini womrepha wodumo

text: SELUQALILE uhlelo lokukhishwa kwamakhadi amasha okuhola eSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa). Owezokuxhumana kwaSassa KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mbizeni Mdlalose, izolo uthe lokhu kusenzeka ezikhungweni zokuhola kuphela.“Amakhadi amasha aseqalile ukukhishwa kodwa amadala asazoqhubeka asebenze nawo. Amakhadi amasha asatholakala ezikhungweni zakwaSassa kuphela okwamanje kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi azobakhona nakwezinye izindawo okuholelwa kuzo,” usho kanje.Ukwethulwa kwamakhadi amasha okuholela imali yempesheni ngenye yezinguquko zakamuva zakwaSassa ngemuva kokunqanyulwa kobudlelwane bayo nenkampani iCash Paymaster Services.Inhloko yezokuxhumana kwaSassa, uMnuz Paseka Letsatsi, ngesikhathi ibhalela iphephandaba eliwuzakwabo weSolezwe, iSunday Tribune, ithe enye yezinkinga abafuna ukuziqeda ngamakhadi amasha ukuthathwa kwemali yabahola izibonelelo zikahulumeni.Imali ebithathwa bekuthiwa eye-airtime, omasingcwabisane, ugesi nokunye.“Ngokomthetho u-26 A weSocial Assistance Act, ukuthathwa kwemali okuvumelekile okuthinta umasingcwabisane futhi nakhona akumele kudlule ku-10% wemali yesibonelelo,” usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi bathole ukuthi kwezinye izindawo amakhadi akwaSassa abesebanjwa omashonisa njengendlela yokubophezela abakweletayo ukuthi bakhokhe, beyalelwa ukuthi bashiye ikhadi nenombolo eyimfihlo yokukhipha imali.Uthe kuleli khadi elisha, elikhishwa yiSouth African Post Office, imali ngeke isathathwa ngezindlela ezingekho emthethweni.Ngaphezu kwalokho abahola ngekhadi elisha bazokwazi ukukhipha imali mahhala kathathu ezindaweni ezisebenzisana neSassa.
