Bazoyikhipha mahhala kanye eposini.Uhlelo lokushintsha amakhadi luzoqhubeka kuze kube uSepthemba nonyaka.Kukhishwa lawa makhadi nje izolo kuqale isiteleka sabasebenzi abangaphansi kwenyunyana iPublic Servants Association (iPSA), bakwaSassa abafuna ukunyuselwa umholo.UMdlalose uthe lesi siteleka ngeke sikuthikameza ukusebenza emahhovisi abo.
title: Sekuqalile ukukhishwa kwamakhadi amasha okuhola

text: UZUZE okuhle okuphindiwe umshayeli wetekisi obezifundisa ngomholo wokulayisha abantu ebasusa e-Ivory Park ebayisa eSunninghill eGoli. Ngokombiko weSowetan, usoseshini okusebenza kuwo uMnuz Nkazimulo Khumalo (28) i-Ivory Park Taxi Association (IPTA) unqume ukumbuyisela sonke isamba sika-R52 500 asisebenzise efundela ubuthishela. Okukhuthaze lo soseshini ukuthi wenze lokhu ukuba yisibonelo esihle kukaKhumalo kozakwabo nokuthi akazange acele sizo yize azi ukuthi usoseshini wakhe usiza abafundi abaningi baseTembisa lapho ahlala khona. USihlalo we-IPTA uMnuz Buti Mkonza uthe kuyamjabulisa ukubona abashayeli bamatekisi benza umsebenzi oncomekayo. "Ingihlaba umxhwele indlela ayithathele phezulu ngayo imfundo yakhe," kusho uMkonza. Iphephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, iThe Star, ngoLwesibili libike ukuthi ngemuva kokuphothula umatric ngo-2010, uKhumalo wanquma ukuba umshayeli wetekisi ngoba ehlulekile ukuthola uxhaso lwezimali zokufunda. Abagibeli bakhe bebemgqugquzela ukuthi angalalilahli iphupho lakhe lokuthola imfundo yasenyuvesi. Ubhalise e-University of South Africa (UNISA) ngo-2015 wagqoka ijazi lakhe lobuthishela ngesonto eledlule. "Bengimcane kunabo bonke erenki yamatekisi abantu behleli bengibuza ukuthi kungani ngishayela amatekisi ngimncane kangaka engabe ngiyafunda. Bebehleli bengitshela ngokubaluleka kwemfundo. Ngase nginquma ukugcina imali yokufunda ngabhalisa e-UNISA," kusho uKhumalo. UKhumalo uthe ubehola uR700 ngesonto ekhokha uR2000 wokufunda ngenyanga. Noma ubezimisele emsebenzini wakhe wesikole, uKhumalo uthe bekunzima ukukwenza kokubili. "Bekudingeka ngivuke ngo-3 ekuseni ngiye erenki. Emuva kokwehlisa abagibeli bengiphuthuma emtapweni wolwazi ngesikhathi itekisi likulayini wokulayisha. Abaqaphi bolayini bebengifonela uma sekuyithuba lami lokulayisha," kusho yena. UKhumalo uthe okwamanje usafuna umsebenzi. Angafundisa izibalo, isiZulu, iLife Orientation kanye neSocial Science. UKhumalo uhlala nonina ongasebenzi nezingane zakubo ezintathu ezifunda enyuvesi ngemifundaze. Njengoba iNingizimu Afrika ihlaselwe ukwenyuka kokwentuleka kwamathuba emisebenzi, uKhumalo usakholelwa wukuthi kube ngcono athole imfundo ukuze uma amathuba eqhamuka amufice evivile. "Abantu abanini abasha bacabanga ukuthi imfundo kayisho lutho, kodwa eqinisweni awazi ukuthi ithuba lakho liyoqhamuka nini. Kungcono ukuhlala ulindele kunokudembesela uhlale ekhaya ungenzi lutho," kusho uKhumalo.
title: Usoseshini ukhokhele izindleko zeziqu ezitholwe umshayeli wetekisi

text: KUWUSHUBELE umndeni wakwaGupta njengoba oKlebe bewuphenya ngezinsolo zokuthinteka ekulawulweni kombuso yidlanzana.I-Independent Communications Authority of South Africa (Icasa) ikuqinisekisile ukuthi izophenya iMultiChoice ngezinsolo zomgwazo kaR100 million neSABC ngezinhlelo ze-digital migration.IMultiChoice ephethe iDStv neM-Net isolwa ngokukhokhela isiteshi sezindaba i-ANN7 eyayiphethwe ngabakwaGupta uR25 million. Isolwa ngokunyusa inkokhelo ye-ANN7 isuka kuR50 million iya kuR141 million ukuze ibe nezwi uma uhulumeni esekhiqiza amabhokisi acacisa isithombe kwithelevishini.I-DA ifake isikhalo kwi-Icasa icela ukuthi kuphenywe ngemali ekhokhwa yiMultiChoice eziteshini zezindaba.UMnuz Paseka Maleka, obhekele ezokuxhumana e-Icasa uvumile ukuthibayaphenya.“I-Icasa idlulisele lolu daba ophikweni lwayo olubhekele ukusebenza kweziteshi zokusakaza. Kuzothi uma sesiluqedile uphenyo sikhulume neDA ngokwenzekayo,” kusho uMaleka.UNksz Phumzile van Damme, okhulumela iDA, uthe bayakujabulela ukuthi i-Icasa izophenya ngoba abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kufanele bazi ukuthi imali eyakhokhwa yaphuma ngokusemthethweni yini.“Izinkampani ezifana neMultiChoice kufanele zinikezwe ithuba lokudala imisebenzi kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi aziphule umthetho. Kufanele zincintisane kahle nezinye. Ayikho inkampani esiyilwelayo kodwa kufanele sisukume uma kukhona abaphula umthetho,” kusho uNksz van Damme.UMnuz Kaizer Kganyago okhulumela iSABC uthe akazi lutho ngalolu phenyo.“Uphenyo luthinta iMultiChoice kodwa uma bedinga okuthile kithina sizobasiza,” kusho uKganyago.I-New Age ephethwe yi-Infinity Media enamasheya amaningi kwi-ANN7 neTNA Holdings nayo izophenywa njengoba kunekhomishini ezophenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.UNkk Maritjie Groenewald, oyiNhloko yezokuxhumana kwaMultiChoice akayiphendulanga imibuzo ye-Independent Media eshicilela Isolezwe. UMnuz Mzwanele Manyi owathenga i-ANN7 neNew Age kwabakwaGupta esebenzisa uhlelo lokubolekwa imali abantu abakudayiselayo, akakaze ayiphendule imibuzo ye-Independent Media kusukela ezinyangeni ezinhlanu ezedlule.
title: I-Icasa izophenya iMultiChoice ngezomgwazo

text: ABELAPHI bendabuko bathi kungcono ukube balalelwa kwasekuqaleni uma bethi amakhambi esintu angasiza kwiCoronavirus.Basho kanjena-nje inhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO), ngempelasonto ikuvumele ukuthi amakhambi esintu ahlolwe ukuthi aphephile yini ukuthi angasetshenziselwa ukwelapha iCovid-19.UMengameli weKZN Traditional Healers Association, uMnuz Sazi Mhlongo uthe: “ IsiZulu sithi elempofana libonwa kamuva. Sasivele sishilo ukuthi amakhambi esintu afana nomhlonyane ayawelapha umkhuhlane futhi siyakholwa wukuthi nawo lo mkhuhlane ayawelapha, kwazitshwa, kwakhulunywa ngokuthi kumele kube nocwaningo kodwa nalo lolo cwaningo lwangenziwa. Ngesikhathi sikusho lokhu leli gciwane lalisadlange kakhulu phesheya, laze lafika nakuleli labulala.“Ukube amakhambi avele asetshenziswa ngabe bambalwa abashonile. Abelaphi bendabuko bayazi ukuthi amakhambi axutshwa kanjani ukwelapha imikhuhlane,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi uyajabula ukuthi ekugcineni iWHO isize yakuvumela ukuthi amakhambi esintu ahlolwe.“Uma esehloliwe lawo makhambi kwatholakala ukuthi ayasebenza angabe esephenduka awabathize ngoba ngawethu. Thina siwasebenzisa ngendlela yethu yase-Afrika. Besivele siwasebenzisa futhi sizoqhubeka,” kusho yenaUSolwazi Nceba Gqaleni waseDurban University of Technology owungoti wamakhambi, uthe isinyathelo seWHO sihle, sizophendla indlela yokuthi amakhambi esintu ahlolwe kusetshenziswa imigudu ekhona ukuze kuphenduleke imbibuzo ebiba khona mayelana nawo.USolwazi Mahmoud Soliman owusokhemisi futhi owenza ucwaningo ngamakhambi esintu e-UKZN, uthe kuyinto enhle ukuthi amakhambi esintu aziwe umhlaba wonke.“Asidingi ukuvunyelwa ukuthi sihlole amakhambi esintu, esikudingayo wukuthi kwaziwe ukuthi nawo angaba yisixazululo sokulwa nezifo. Uma lokho sekwaziwa, kuzoba lula ukuthi kutshalwe imali uma ehlolwa,” kusho yena.
title: Injabulo kuhlolwa amakhambi esintu

text: MHLELI: Ifike yedlula iVodacom Durban July (VDJ). Kuhle ukubona isizwe esimnyama sizicika ngezibiliboco, utshwala obuphambili, umculo, ukugembula nengqephu.Okubuhlungu kakhulu ngukuthi okuyibona bantu abenze imali ngale VDJ ozindlebezikhanya ilanga.Kanjani na? Yibo abanamahhashi abegadulisana laphaya. Bazihlomulele ngezigidi. Thina ndlu emnyama sisele nezikweletu nje kuphela. Siyaphi na kwiVDJ uma singenandaba namahhashi? Yingoba sifuna ukubukwa ukuze abantu bacabange ukuthi sinemali.Ukube iVDJ iwumqondo wabantu abamnyama ngabe akugcwali kanje. Buza noma ngubani usomabhizinisi onemali ukuthi kunzima kangani ukuthenga ihhashi lomjaho.Ngaphandle kokubiza ngendlela exakile yimakethe okusazoba neminyaka eminingi iphethwe abebala elimhlophe. Ikhona nengcosana yabomdabu baseNdiya. Thina bantu siyathanda ukuzihlanganisa nezinto esifuna ukuthi zisiveze njengabantu abanemali ikakhulu uma kunomlungu phakathi.Ngibashayela ihlombe abantu abasuke beye kwiVDJ beyokwenza imali. OMax Mqadi weMax’s Lifestyle noMjay Zama waseYadini badinga ukushayelwa ihlombe ngokukwazi ukwenza imali ngale mpelasonto ehlomulisa abelungu ngemali yabantu abamnyama.Notha kaGadlakwabo PhungulaEMNINI
title: [IMIBONO] Ngabelungu abenze imali ngale VDJ

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho elidume emagunjini onke kwelaMthaniya ngivumele ngicobhoze lolu siba ngizwakalise ilaka lami ngezenzo ezenziwa emaphoyiseni enza umsebenzi obucayi.Okokuqala nje ngabe uMthethosisekelo uwakhiphela ngaphandle yini wona njengoba ngazi ukuthi umuntu uma onile uyaboshwa aziphendulele ngasuke ekwenzile. Ubani onelungelo lokubulala omunye umuntu ngaloluya hlobo ekubulawe ngalo abantu esibabiza ngabenza umsebenzi obucayi badutshulwe babulawe kuhle kwezinja? Uhulumeni uye okhuthaza umphakathi ukuthi uyeke ukubulala amaphoyisa kodwa yena ukhipha izinkabi zakhe ziqhobozele ozakwabo.Akukhona okokuqala uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele (osesithombeni) nosigaxamabhande behlukanisa umbutho phakathi. Baqale banyusela izingane zobhululu babo ezikhundleni zibe ziphuma ekolishi kwasala amaphoyisa aneminyaka evile kwelishumi egida ndawonye.Iphi imiphumela yekhomishini eyajutshwa, ayiveli ngani kwithelevishini njenganalaba abebedla imali yabakhokhi bentela?Uthini uMthethosisekelo ngokukhishwa kwezithombe ezinyantisa igazi kanje zabantu enithi benza umsebenzi obucayi.Iphoyisa lithwele kanzima. Ingozi yemoto yilona, ozilengisile yilo, kuhlinzwa isidumbu yilo bese livika nomqashi ophethe inkemba ebhekise kulo. Angiyiphathi eyomphakathi othi ungaphuza ulibize ngazo zonke izinhlamba.Hhayi bo lo mlilo othelwa upharafini uzocishwa kanjani uma usubhebhetheka?Mkhonzeni kaMzondeni BhebhuKhenana, Bulwer
title: Athwele kanzima amaphoyisa bakwethu

text: KUSOLWA ingxabano yomakhelwane ngokudutshulwa kushone owesilisa eWaterloo, eVerulam, ngoMgqibelo entathakusa.Ngokombiko wesitatimende senkampani yonogada iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), umufi ubeyolanda imoto yomkakhe ekhalakathele emzini womsolwa kuCrocodile Road.Kuthiwa inkosikazi kamufi ibijikisa imoto yayo iHyundai i20 endleleni engenela kwayo kanti izoyiphunyuka yayokhalakathela kamakhelwane phezu kwemoto kamsolwa.Ngalesi sikhathi kuthiwa umsolwa ube esesebenzisa izimoto zakhe ezimbili evimbela imoto yenkosikazi kamufi ukuba isuswe egcekeni lakhe kuze kube kulungiswa indaba yamademeshe.“Umufi ufike ehamba ngemoto yakhe iMahindra Bolero wabe eseyalela ukuba kususwe izimoto ezivimbe imoto yomkakhe ukuze itakulwe. Kube sekuqubuka ingxabano phakathi kwabo okuphethe ngokuthi umsolwa adonse isibhamu adubule umufi esifubeni,” kusho iRusa.Kuthiwa umsolwa ubikele amaphoyisa ukuthi udubule umufi ngenhloso yokuzivikela ngoba ubefuna ukumgwaza ngommese. Kodwa kuthiwa akutholwanga mmese endaweni yesigameko.Umsolwa uboshiwe kwathathwa nesibhamu sakhe i-9mm esisemthethweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.UColonel Mbele uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala kanti umsolwa kulindeleke avele enkantolo maduze.
title: Isidumbu kuxabana abakhelene

text: INHLANZI ishelwe amanzi kubalisa ababili ababoshelwe ukweba amakhebuli kagesi emzileni wesitimela eJacobs, eThekwini.Laba basolwa babonwe amaphoyisa abesebenza nezinye izinhlaka zezokuphepha abezulazula ngasemzileni wesitimela ngezinyawo eqaphe ubugebengu ngoMsombuluko.La madoda aneminyaka engu-27 no-28, abonwe egaxe izikhwama emhlane nokuthe uma emiswa eseshwa, kwavundululwa inqwaba yamakhebuli. Isisindo sawo singu-20kg.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe abasolwa bahlulekile ukuchazela amaphoyisa ukuthi bawathathephi amakhebuli? Babe sebekhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela.Baboshwe base begqunywa esiteshini samaphoyisa eWentworth babekwa icala lokutholakala nempahla okusolakala ukuthi yebiwe.“Amaphoyisa azoqhubeka abheke abasolwa ukuthi abathinteki yini kwamanye amacala okweba amakhebuli namanye amacala eWentworth,” kusho uCol Mbele.Bekulindeleke ukuthi abasolwa bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eWentworth izolo.
title: Kuboshwe 'abantshontshe' amakhebuli kagesi

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAKaizer Chiefs (0) 2 Golden Arrows (0) 0UKUNQOBA kweKaizer Chiefs ihlula iLamontville Golden Arrows kulo mdlalo obuseFNB Stadium izolo ebusuku kunike isithombe sokuthi nayo ayizimisele ngokunikela ngesicoco se-Absa Premiership ezimbangini zayo ezinkulu kule sizini, iMamelodi Sundowns.Lo mphumela kufanele ukuthi ube yimpendulo kuPitso Mosimane okusho ngeqholo ngempelasonto edlule ukuthi “noma ubani ozonqoba (iligi) uzobe eyisebenzele, ngeke simnike ngesoso lesiliva”. Wayekhuluma ngemuva kokulingana ngamaphuzu angu-49 neChiefs ezakhe zihlule i-University of Pretoria.Amagoli ka-Eric Mathoho noKingston Nkhatha ngemizuzu ka- 53 no-69 asho ukuthi umdlalo olindelwe ngabaningi wangempelasonto phakathi kweChiefs neSundowns uzofika zombili izinhlangothi zazi ukuthi kusezandleni zazo ukucacisa ukuthi ngubani ozimisele ngokuhlwitha isicoco seligi, osushubile umbango waso.Ukunqoba kweChiefs ngoMgqibelo kuzoyenza ibe negebe ingagudluki esicongweni. Uma ezikaMosimane ziyifaka induku, lezi zinkunzi zizoqhubeka nokududulana ngamaphuzu alinganayo, nokho iChiefs izobe ingemuva ngomdlalo owodwa.Ukubuyela emdlalweni wayizolo, iChiefs igange ngomdlalo esiwombeni sokuqala. Phezu kokuzenzela ngebhola, awekho amathuba anyusa amaphaphu akhiwe yiqembu laseNaturena.EzikaStuart Baxter beziwulawula ngendlela ezithanda ngayo umdlalo kodwa uma sezifike ebhokisini beziwenza ube lula umsebenzi wokuvimba ku-Arrows, ngoba amaphasi azo abengashayi emhloleni. Empeleni siphelile isiwombe sokuqala unozinti wezivakashi u-Arthur Bartman engazange avimbe ibhola elinzima elithunyelwe yiChiefs.Abafana Bes’thende kucacile ukuthi yize beyibambe emsileni kodwa abajahile ukuthola amagoli angabanika amaphuzu amathathu njengoba bebesabenzisa iqhinga lokuhlasela ngokuzumisa nokho nakho okungazange kwenzeke, kuze kwayiwa kophunyulwa unozinti weChiefs, uBrilliant Khuzwayo efana nesibukeli enkundleni.Kufanele ukuthi kumchazile umqeqeshi we-Arrows, uShaun Bartlett ukushintsha komdlalo zibambene ngeqanda kwazise ukuvezile ekhuluma kuthelevishini ngaphambi kokuqala komdlalo ukuthi iphuzu elilodwa liyobe lanele. Ubenethemba lokuthi luzobuyisa ukuzethemba kwezakhe ezisanqobe umdlalo owodwa emzuliswaneni wesibili kuligi.Lahlula iPolokwane City ngo 3-2 ngemuva kwalokhu selishaywe imidlalo eyisithupha kulandelana.Imiphumela ye-Absa PremiershipKaizer Chiefs 2-0 Golden Arrows, Orlando Pirates 0-1 MP Black Aces, SuperSport United 1-3 Maritzburg UnitedUmphumela weNFDFC Cape Towns 4-3 Sivutsa FC
title: IChiefs nenselelo kwiSundowns

text: Chippa United (0) 0- (0) 1 Kaizer ChiefsKUBHEKWE isinqumo seKaizer Chiefs ngabadlali abaziqeqesha nayo ngemuva kokuthi singaphumelelanga isicelo ebisifake kwiCourt of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) evune eseFifa ngesijeziso sokuthi ingasayinisi abadlali amawindi amabili.IChiefs, ehlule iChippa United emdlalweni weDSTV Premiership, eNelson Mandela Bay izolo, ingene enkundleni isikuqinisekisile ukuthi iCAS iyichithile imizamo yayo yokuphikisa isinqumo seFifa. ICAS ibikade isikhiphe isitatimende ngesinqumo sayo. Amakhosi alahlwa yicala lokusayinisa umdlali u-Andriamirado “Dax” Andrianarimanana waseMadagascar.Iqembu lakhe iFosa Juniors lifake isimangalo lithi unenkontileka nalo ngakho kufanele iChiefs ikhokhe uma imfuna kodwa yena ubelokhu ekuphika lokho. UDax sewasidonsa isigwebo sezinyanga ezine. Osekusele wukuthi iChiefs icacise ngabadlali abaziqeqesha nayo ngethemba lokuthi izovunwa yiCAS bese iyabasayinisa.Laba badlali nguSifiso Hlanti, Phathutshedzo Nange nonozinti uBrandon Petersen bonke abasuka kwiBidvest Wits. Iwindi lokuqala lesigwebo lizophela ngenyanga ezayo. Elesibili lizoba ngoFebhuwari wonyaka ozayo. Uma iChiefs iqoka ukubagcina laba badlali, izokwazi ukubasayinisa ngoMashi ngoba alibavaleli iwindi kwazise abanalo iqembu.Ngaphambi komdlalo wayizolo, umqeqeshi uGavin Hunt uthe uzolinda iqembu liphawule ngokuchithwa kwabo yiCAS. Izolo, iChiefs iqale umdlalo ngegiya eliphezulu, ikhombisa ukuba yingozi uma ihlasela kodwa kungekho okukhathaza unozinti weChippa uVeli Mothwa. Nokho kusheshe kwashintsha lokho. Ngomzuzu ka-24 ibhola ebelikade lingqofwe nguLeonardo Castro lishaye ipali kukade kuyi-free-kick kaKhama Billiat.Emuva kwemizuzu eyisikhombisa kuphindile lokho i-free kick kaLebo Manyama ishaya ipali ibuyela enkundleni. Amakhosi aqhubekile nokulwa. Ngomzuzu ka-39 iChippa iphinde yaphuma emlonyeni wengwenya ngesikhathi ibhola likaBilliat lishaya ipali.Esiwombeni sesibili iChiefs ibuye ngomfutho ofanayo kodwa ihluleka isifike phambili. Emuva kokuhlulwa yinqwaba yamathuba, igcine ilitholile igoli ngomkhonto ogwaze ekhaya kaGregory Damons oqobele ngakubo ibhola eligotshwe nguManyama kwesokudla ngomzuzu ka-77.Komunye umdlalo wePremiership, iBaroka ihlule iBlack Leopards 3-1.ZAKHELE XABAIlog yeDstv PremiershipAmaqembuPWDLFAPtsBaroka2200526Sundowns1100303SuperSport1100203Chiefs2101133AmaZulu1010111Celtic1010111CPT City1010111Arrows1010111Pirates1010111Stellenbosch1010111Swallows1010111TS Galaxy1010111Tshakhuma1010111Chippa2011121Maritzburg1001120Leopards2002150
title: Kulindeleke iChiefs icacise ngabadlali abaziqeqesha nayo

text: NJENGOBA esebuyela kwiGenerations:The Legacy, umlingisi uChi Mhende, uthi ababukeli abalindele ukuconsa amathe ngoba bazobona izigcawu ezizosusa okukhulu ukukhuluma.UChi, olingisa indawo kaWandile ‘Wandi’ Radebe, uthe njengamanje umatasatasa nokuqopha lezo ziqephu ezizojulukisa abantu abaningi yize engafunanga ukuzichaza.“Abantu abagqolozele lo mdlalo.”Lo mlingisi odabuka eZimbabwe uke wathi khumu kwiGenerations, esakazwa kuSABC 1 phakathi nezinsuku, njengoba ebesagxile emdlalweni weshashalazi osihloko sithi Chasing Chairs.Ukulingisa kwiChasing Chairs kumenze waqokwa emqhudelwaneni wezindondo wababambe iqhaza emidlalweni yeshashalazi, ama-14th Naledi Theatre Awards, aqhathwe kuwo noMasasa Mbangeni, Ameera Patel, Jennifer Steyn noVanessa Cooke kwiBest Performance in a Play: Female. UChi uqokwe ngendawo kaKat abeyilingisa kwiChasing Chairs.UChi uthe kumenze wahambela phezulu ukubungazwa ngomsebenzi wezobuciko awuthandayo.“Ukuthi ukhona yini engimsabayo yigama elishaya eceleni. Ngiqhathwe nezingadlangadla, abantu besifazane abangicijayo. Njengomlingisi osemusha, ngiyaziqhenya kakhulu ngokuba seqoqweni elilodwa nalezi zinkakha.”Abanye abalingisi abaqokwe kumaNaledi ngoMbongeni Ngema, Nondumiso Tembe, Andile Gumbi, Velephi Mnisi, Nompumelelo Gumede, Noxolo Dlamini, Kanyi Nokwe, Gregory Maqoma, Todd Matshikiza, Camilla Waldman, Mncedisi Shabangu, John Lata,Valephi Mnisi, Bianca le Grange, Lerato Mvelase, Mpho Osei-Tutu, Lindani Nkosi, Warren Masemola, Sello Maake kaNcube.UChi waba ngumlingisi wokuqala wesifazane ukudlala indawo yomuntu wesilisa ekubeni yena engumuntu wesifazane kangangoba wagcina eseguqulwa ubulili.Le ntokazi idabuka eZimbabwe kodwa yenze izifundo zeBA in Live Perfomance esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme sakuleli i-AFDA Cape Town ngo-2006 ngaphambi kokulingisa emidlalweni nasemafilimini.Emidlalweni yethelevishini abonakale kuyo kukhona iStokvel, Mad Dogs, Homeland, Jamillah and Aladdin neDominion.Ngo-2014 uChi ulingisa efilimini yamahlaya ethi Love The One You Love futhi waphumelela indondo yeBest Actress kwiDurban Film International Festival.
title: Kuzosuka ukukhuluma kujuluke abantu eziqeshini zeGenerations

text: UNOBHALA  Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule uthe indodana yakhe ayithinteki ndawo ezinsolweni zenkohlakalo ephathelene nomndeni wakwaGupta eFree State. UMagashule ubebuzwa wugalagala lwentatheli yakwaNews 24, uNksz Mahlatse Gallens ngodaba lwaleli pulazi esithangami nabezindaba eLuthuli House izolo.Ngokwama-emails aputshukile, indodana kaMagashule, uMnuz Gift Magashule isisebenzele umndeni wakwaGupta iminyaka eyisikhombisa njengoba yaqala ukuwusebenzela ngo-2010 ngesikhathi eyi-consultant yalo mndeni. Umndeni wakwaGupta usolwa ngokusebenzisana nendodana kaMagashule nekaZuma ukuze uthole amathenda kuhulumeni. "Indodana yami isebenzela umndeni wakwaGupta, akukaze kufihlwe lokho. Ngibe wuNdunankulu waseFree State isivele isebenzela abakwaGupta, ngisho nani zintatheli benikwazi lokho. Ayithinteki nakancane odabeni lwepulazi lobisi eliseVrede. Asilinde umthetho uthathe indawo yawo ngodaba lwenkohlakalo yepulazi laseVrede," kusho uMagashule. Uthe kuyaziwa ukuthi wonke umuntu umsulwa kuze kube inkantolo imlahla ngecala elithile. "Njengoba siphakamise ukuthi sizolwa nenkohlakalo, siyalwa nayo.  Sithi umthetho kufanele uthathe indawo yawo epulazini laseVrede nakwezinye izigameko ezithinta inkohlakalo," kusho uMagashule. UMagashule noNgqongqoshe wezokuMbiwaphansi uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane amagama abo ayavela odabeni lokukhishwa kwezigidi zemali yasepulazini eyanikwa abakwaGupta. UZwane ngaleso sikhathi wabe enguNgqongqoshe wezoLimo.Kuthiwa bathembisa abasepulazini ukuthi bazobanika amasheya.Ethula inkulumo yakhe kwabezindaba uMagashule, uthe i-Lekgtotla yabo idingide izihloko eziyisithupha kubalwa ezemfundo, umhlaba, ezolimo, ukuvuselela umnotho, ezempilo nobumbano."I-Lekgotla ivumelane ngokuthi zonke izinqumo ezithathwe engqungqutheleni kazwelonke ye-ANC ebiseNasrec eGoli ukuthi kumele kwenziwe isiqiniseko sokuthi ziyalandelwa," kusho uMagashule.
title: UMagashule uthi ayithinteki indodana yakhe kwinkohlakalo ethinta ipulazi lakwaGupta

text: KUKHALWA ngezehlakalo zokudlwengulwa kwezalukazi okuthiwa zidlangile eHarding okuvele ukuthi kwenziwa abafana abancane bendawo.Usihlalo kaSukuma Sakhe ku-ward 8 eKhwezi khona eHarding, uMnuz Anele Phungula, uthe seziqala ukwanda izigameko zalolu hlobo kule ndawo nosekuletha itwetwe ngokuphepha kwezalukazi.“Emasontweni amabili edlule, esinye isalukazi sakhona endaweni sidlwengulwe ngesikhathi siwasha emthonjeni njengoba kunenkinga yamanzi kule ndawo.“Umfana ogile lo mkhuba ngowendawo, umphakathi ugcine usumnikela emaphoyiseni ngemva kokumtitinya,” kusho uPhungula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuboshwe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-30 ngalesi sigameko.“Owesifazane oneminyaka engu-68 udlwengulwe ngesikhathi ewasha emfuleni endaweni yaseNdakeni. Kuvulwe icala lokudlwengula esiteshini samaphoyisa eHarding kwathi idokodo ladluliselwa ophikweni olubhekelele udlame lwemindeni, ukuvikeleka kwezingane namacala aphathelene nocansi esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseKokstad,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Uthe umsolwa uvelile eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseHarding ngesonto eledlule.UPhungula ubuye waveza ukuthi ngoNovemba nyakenye, bebesanda kungcwaba esinye isalukazi sakule ndawo okuthiwa sona sidlwengulwe maqede sabulawa ngabantu abangaziwa kodwa amaphoyisa awasiqinisekisanga lesi sehlakalo njengoba inombolo yecala igcine ingatholakanga.Uphinde wathi kukhona esinye isigameko sokuzama ukudlwengulwa kwesalukazi esina-89 kodwa okugcine kungaphumelelanga.“Ngenhlanhla ugogo ukwazile ukumemeza, umsolwa wathuka wabaleka. Umfana naye ungowasendaweni,” kuchaza uPhungula.Uthe icala alivulwanga ngoba umphakathi unqume ukuthi udaba lwakhe lukhulunywe emhlanganweni womphakathi.Uveze ukuthi izigameko eziningi ezifuze lezi ziyenzeka endaweni kodwa zikhulunyelwa phansi, kazibikwa okwenza izigilamkhuba zingajezi.
title: Ichilo izalukazi zidlwengulwa yintsha

text: UQHUTSHWE nguyise wamyisa emaphoyiseni owayengumfundi waseSiyathuthuka High, eNanda, okusabalale i-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ebhokloza omunye wesifazane owayefunda kulesi sikole.Yize le video kuthiwa yaqoshwa ngoNovemba nyakenye, kodwa uyise walo mfundi (19) kuthiwa uthukuthele eyibona i-video ngeholidi lokugubha uSuku Lwabesifazane.Kuthiwa umqhubile ngoLwesihlanu ntambama ukuze ajeze ngesenzo sakhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbhele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lo mfundi uboshiwe.Uthe kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam ngoMsombulukp.Uthe amaphoyisa aseNanda aphenya nezinsolo ezibikwe nguyise wentombazane zokuthi amaphoyisa anqaba ukuvula icala ngalesi sesigameko.Ibamba likaKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uMajor General Bheki Langa, lithe basebenzisana noyise kamgilwa ukuthola ukuthi ngamaphi la maphoyisa akhuluma nawo ngonyaka odlule.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, uthe bavakashele kulesi sikole ngoLwesihlanu ukuthola ngalesi sigameko.“Sithole ukuthi uthishanhloko walesi sikole akenzanga okwanele ukusukumela lolu daba njengoba engazange awubikele nomnyango ngaso. Besizitshela ukuthi yinto esanda kwenzeka, kodwa sathola ukuthi into elokhu yenzeke nyakenye,” kusho uMthethwa.Kuthiwa lo mfundi (16) washaywa ngenxa yokuthi wabuza ukuthi umhlukumezelani udadewabo ayiwele naye.Kuthiwa lo mfundi wesilisa wavele wamshaya.Lolu daba lusukunyelwe nawu Ngqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Fikile Mbalula omemezele ukuthi uzohlangana nomgilwa noyise nokuthi uzohambela lesi sikole aphinde abonane nomsolwa maduze.
title: Uboshiwe umfundi oshaya omunye kwi-video

text: IMPUMELELO kaPitso Mosimane, oqophe umlando enqoba iCaf Champions League nge-Al Ahly e-Egypt ngoLwesihlanu, ilindelwe ukuba iklame indima enkulu emkhankasweni kaPatrice Motsepe wokuhola iConfederation of African Football.Ukhetho lweCaf lungoMashi 12 eMorocco.UStanley “Screamer” Tshabalala, okuyimanje uyinhloko yamaqhinga kwi-Orlando Pirates, nguye owavumbulula  uMosimane esengumfanyana, ngo-1982, emthatha kwiRockville Hungry Lions emuyisa kwiJomo Cosmos kaJomo Sono, esengumfundi waseSekano-Ntoane High School, eSenaoane, eSoweto.UMosimane uhlule ngo 2-1 iZamalek ngoLwesihlanu. Ungumqeqeshi wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika ukunqoba iChampions League kabili. Kusenguye yedwa odlale kwiFifa Club World Cup, ozokuphinda ngoFebhuwari eQatar.“Into eyangithatha kuye wukuthi wayedlala ngesinxele, okuyinto-ke leyo eyivela kancane. Ngamthatha lo mfana ngamuyisa kuJomo ngathi ‘nangu umdlali awumbheke ukuthi ngeke yini umsebenzise’. Nangempela wamthatha. Kodwa yeyi! Wake wangisokolisa kabi uPitso ngoba wayevele angafiki lapho engithe asihlangane khona. Ngaze ngaya kuyise owayenesitolo. Ngafika esitolo sikayise saxoxa, ngamtshela ukuthi lo mfana unethalente, sengimkhulumele noJomo. Nangempela kwasiza-ke lokho,”kusho uTshabalala.Okwenza uTshabalala angamangazwa yimpumelelo kaMosimane ekubeni ngumqeqeshi, wukuthi wakhombisa esengumdlali ukuthi unemibono ehlukile.“Ngaphinda ngamlanda kuJomo sengikwiMamelodi Sundowns. Lapho uJomo wayengasafuni naye kodwa sakwazi ukumthenga. Ngiyakhumbula nje nguye owagoba ibhola elaba ngumkhonto ogwaza ekhaya, iSundowns inqoba isicoco sayo sokuqala ngqa ngeMainstay Cup.“Kangimangali uma ngimbona eya ethuthuka kanje ekuqeqesheni ngoba wayevele engumdlali onemibono ngaso sonke isikhathi. Wayengathuli nje avumele kusetshenzwe. Wayehlezi enemibono, ngisho ukuba nemibono ngayo yonke into. Ngisho nangezinga lokuzilolonga nokunye,” kusho uTshabalala.UMosimane uqashwe yi-Ahly ekuqaleni kuka-Okthoba esayina inkontileka yeminyaka emibili.Unikwe umbandela wokunqoba iCaf Champions League.Ufike iqembu selivele selisinqobile isicoco seligi, ingakapheli nemidlalo ye-Egyptian Premier League.Amagoli ashaywe ngu-Amr Soleya noMohamed Magdi awe-Ahly, kwathi eleZamalek laqhamuka noShikabala.Kwakugcine ngo-1965 ukuthi owamanqamu ube wumlenze owodwa.UMQEQESHI we-Al Ahly, uPitso Mosimane, ephakamisa indebe yeCaf Champions League ayinqobe neReds e-Egypt, ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku Isithombe: Amasandawana Twitter
title: UScreamer ayimethusi impumelelo kaMosimane

text: UYISE womculi wowokholo uKhaya Mthethwa, ufongqa isigqoko kusomabhizinisi amkweleta isamba semali okuthiwa singaphezu kukaR 60 000, ukuba ambekezelele aze ayithole le mali.UMfundisi Bhekithemba Mthethwa webandla i-Oasis Felowship Centre, umiswe kabi wusomabhizinisi uMnuz Siyabonga Dlamini othi uyifuna iphelele imali yakhe.UDlamini uthi imoto yakhe yashayiswa yiloli likaMthethwa emgwaqweni thizeni eThekwini base bevumelana ngokuthi bazokhokhelana.UDlamini uthi ube esehambisa imoto kumuntu ozoyikhanda ethembe ukuthi izokhokhelwa.Kuthe sekufanele kukhokhwe imali uMthethwa wangabe esakwazi ukugcina isethembiso kwaze kwaphela unyaka. UDlamini uthi uMthethwa uke wamcela ukuba amthumelele imininingwane yakhe yasebhange kodwa walinda waze wacikeka ebona imali ingangeni. UDlamini uthi imoto yakhe ibisebenza ngaphansi kwe-Uber, ithutha abantu futhi imenzela imali ecela kuR 12 000 ngenyanga kodwa manje ayisangeni le mali."Sengike ngaya ngisho esontweni ngimcela kahle ukuba akhokhe ngoba isikweletu siyenyuka lapho okuhleli khona imoto. Abantu bafuna imali kimi yena akasabambi nezingcingo zami, uma ngimthola ulokhu engethembisa,’’ kusho uDlamini.Uthi udaba useke walufaka kubameli bakhe kodwa bangamphatha kahle manje usehlela ukusebenzisa omunye ummeli.UMthethwa ethintwa ngodaba akachithanga sikhathi, uvumile ukuthi udaba ulwazi ukusuka nokuhlala. Uthe ubhekene nenkinga yokubhedelwa yibhizinisi akabaleki nemali kaDlamini futhi naye wamchazela."Ngidlelwe amaloli ami ngadlelwa nenye imoto ngaphezulu kwabheda izinto, ayikho nhlobo imali. Angikuthandi ukukweleta umuntu, ngizama konke okusemandleni ukugwema lokho. Ikhona imali engiyilindile uma kwenzeka ingena ngiyombeka phambili ezinhlelweni zami, ngimkhokhele.UMthethwa uthi usenamahloni okukhuluma noDlamini ngoba akasazi ukuthi uzothini kuye maqondana nemali. UMthethwa uthe uyayiqonda intukuthelo kaDlamini kodwa uyacela ukuba aqonde isimo abhekene naso. Uthe yena uyindoda ebahloniphayo abantu ngeke abaleke nemali yomuntu ngamabomu
title: Uyise kaKhaya Mthethwa enkingeni yesikweletu

text: U-Andile ushicilele izitatimende ezimbili ezinde ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram lapho asole khona uyise uMnuz Sbu Mpisane ngokudla amandla kanina uShauwn eminyakeni engu-20 edlule. Ebhala u-Andile uveze ukuthi ukhule engumuntu obelithanda ibhola kwazise wadlalela u-under 13 waMaZulu eneminyaka ewu-11, esekwa unina kuphela ‘nakuba wayematasa ethuthukisa amabhizinisi akhe.’“Wabona uthando enganginalo ngebhola, wazithweza ijoka lokungithengela iqembu okwakuyiSivusta Football Club ngemali yakhe enephupho lokuthi akhulise into engiyithandayo. Wangena wagamanxa kwezikanobhutshuzwayo kuleli.Wazinikela nangesikhathi umyeni wakhe eselaxaze iqembu iminyaka emibili, libhekene nezembe kusele imidlalo eyishumi nje kuphela. Ukwenze lokho ngoba leli qembu bekungeyona nje into yokubukisa, ubekuhlonipha okudingeka ukuthi ukwenze ukuze ube neqembu elinempumelelo, kwazise ubefuna ngibe nesandla ekuphathweni kwaleli qembu uma sengikhulile,” usho kanje. UMpisane uthe sekuneminyaka ebuka unina ezehlisa ukuze aqhakambise umyeni wakhe, emnikeza izikhundla ‘kwaziwa ukuthi akenzi lutho’. “Ngeshwa into ayithengela mina, yadala isimo esimuncu phakathi kwami nomyeni wakhe. Kusukela ngo-2014 uziqhelelanisile nami. Nami ngiqhelile kuye ngoba njengebhungu bese ngiqale ukubona indlela aphatha ngayo umama wami,” kuqhuba yena. UMpisane uveze ukuthi kube buhlungu kuyena ukuvalelisa iqembu elalithengelwe yena kodwa wathi uncamela lokho kunokuphila engajabule. U-Andile nonina baphoqelekile ukuhoxa ekuphatheni iRoyal Eagles emuva kokuthi iPremier Soccer League (PSL) iqale uphenyo ngokubhaliswa kweqembu.Lokhu kulandele isexwayiyo sikasihlalo we-Eagles, uSbu Mpisane, sokuthi ukuqala imidlalo ye-GladAfrica Championship kweRoyal Eagles ngaphansi kwegama iRoyal AM Football Club, yena njengomnikazi angalazi, bekungenza labo abathintekayo bazidonsele amanzi ngomsele ngokuthi iqembu lidonselwe amaphuzu kuyona yonke imidlalo elizoyidlala ngaphansi kwaleli gama.Ngaphandle kwezinkinga zeqembu, uMpisane uphinde waveza ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka emibili bengakhulumisani noyise futhi yingakho engasambizi ngobaba. “Ngimbiza ngomyeni wakhe ngoba akaseyena ubaba kimi. Ubaba ngeke kuphele iminyaka emibili engakhulumi nendodana yakhe. Ubaba ngeke aqambe amanga atshontshe okwakhelwe indodana yakhe. Ubaba akebi kunina wengane okubekelwe indoda yakhe,” kuloba yena. Lezi ziqumana zisenkantolo lapho zifake khona isecelo sokwehlukanisa umshado. UMpisane uveze ukuthi uyise ubengathembekile kunina njengoba enezingane ezine zangaphandla ‘azaziyo’.
title: Indodana kaMpisane ikhwela yadilika kuyise ‘ngokumdlela’ iqembu

text: MHLELI: Ngithi angidlulise ukukhathazeka kwami ngokuphuza kwabesifazane. Indlela asebephuza ngayo utshwala iyethusa. Sesiphila esikhathini esinzima lapho abesifazane bephuza kakhulu kunabesilisa kangangoba abantu besilisa bagcina sebenakekela izingane.Kwesinye isikhathi uyaye uthole umuntu wesifazane esexabana nabantu ngenxa yotshwala, abanye bagcina sebelimazene. Sekukaningi ngizwa kuthiwa kukhona abashonile ngenxa yokulwa bephuzile kodwa lokho akubethusi odadewethu, bayaqhubeka nokuphuza kuze kweqe.Abagcini ngokuphuza utshwala, sebedla nezinye izidakamizwa eziyingozi. Odokotela bathi ezinye zalezi zidakamizwa ziqeda inzalo kumuntu wesifazane.Baye baphuze utshwala ngenxa yokuthi babona ozakwabo bephuza nabo babone kungcono baphuze besaba ukuthi buzophela ubungani. Kuye kube buhlungu uma sebephuza imali yezingane yesibonelelo sikahulumeni, bangabe besazifeza izidingo zezingane.Ababoniseki ngobungozi botshwala bavele bacabange ukuthi wena uzibona ungcono kunabo.Abesifazane nabesilisa kumele bafundiseke ngobungozi botshwala nangokuthi bakhulume uma kunengcindezi ababhekene nayo engabenza bagcine sebecwile otshwaleni.Gugu CeleMehlomnyama
title: Abantu kumele bafundiseke ngengozi yotshwala

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho elingashayi eceleni ngithi ake ngiphawule ngodaba lwabantu abanomkhuba wokukhuluma neselula emakhumbini.Le nto iyinkinga kabi ngoba umuntu uthi sekufanele akhiphe imali yokukhokha kodwa uthole ukuthi ubhizi ukhuluma neselula anisakwazi ukuyiqoqa kahle imali yomshayeli nilinde yena ukuthi aqede.Ake sizifundiseni ukwenza into eyodwa ngesikhathi siyiqede bese senza okunye. Ukhuluma neselula udlulisa imali uze wenze namaphutha.Uma kungena ucingo usekhumbini ehambayo akuthi uma sekuqoqwa imali umtshele abuye akuthinte mhlawumbe ngemumva kwemizuzu emihlanu ukuze uyikhiphe kahle imali okhokha ngayo.Abanye ubathola befake ama-head set khona ekhumbini agcine engasezwa lutho uma kukhulunywa ngemali.Asiyiyekeni bakwethu le mikhuba yokusebenzisa amaselula emakhumbini ngoba kugcina sekuphazamiseka nabanye abantu abasuke begibele.Edmund NgcoboEHammarsdale
title: [IMIBONO] Asiyeke izingcingo ematekisini

text: SEKUQUBUKE indida ngodaba lowesifazane okuthiwa uphuce iphoyisa isibhamu somsebenzi wazidubula washonela khona lapho emuva kokuba ebalise ngokuthi unezinkinga.Lesi sigameko senzeke eMagwaveni, oThongathi, ngasekuqaleni kwesonto.Umthombo uthi umufi uNksz Khethiwe Khanyile (31) owakhona endaweni futhi abantu basale bekhuluma izinto eziningi ngale ndaba.Okudala indida ukuthi isigameko senzeke entathakusa yangoLwesine ngezithuba zehora lesine.Kuthiwa iphoyisa elithintekayo lisebenza esiteshini iDurban Central, eThekwini.Kuthiwa belingazelele iphoyisa ngesikhathi umsolwa ehosha isibhamu somsebenzi enqulwini yalo, wazibulala lasala likhexile.Umthombo othembekile osendaweni uthi akuqondakali ukuthi iphoyisa lixhumene kanjani nomufi kodwa kuzwakale ukuthi bebehleli ndawonye.Imibiko eshayisanayo eqhamuka endaweni ithi umufi ubesothandweni oluvuthayo nephoyisa kwaba khona inkinga phakathi kwabo kodwa akuqinisekisiwe noma umufi uzidubulile ngempela yini.Eminye imithombo ithi kukhona obekumcikile umufi okudale ukuthi abhozomele isibhamu enqulwini yephoyisa azidubule.Lolu daba luwehlukanise phakathi umphakathi ngoba abanye bathi abaphenyi abahlale izithonto ephoyiseni.Amalungu omphakathi akhala ngokuthi kushayisa amakhala ukufa kukamufi ngoba bebebobali nephoyisa ngakho kunzima ukukholwa indaba yokuthi uzidubulile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi livuliwe idokodo lokubulala emuva kwalesi sigameko."Idokodo lidluliselwe ophikweni oluphenya ukuziphatha kwamaphoyisa emuva kokuvulwa kwecala lokubulala esiteshini oThongathi," kuchazauGwala.
title: Uphuce iphoyisa isibhamu wazidubula

text: BATHOLAKALE sebeshonile abangani baseShiyane eRorke’s Drift abaminze emfuleni beya emshadweni.Kuthiwa abangani uMnuz Siphiwe Enock Buthelezi noMnuz Bongikosi Thwala baseShiyane batholakale emfuleni iBuffalo River sebeshonile ngoMsombuluko ntambama emuva kokuthi benyamalale ngoMgqibelo beya emshadweni esigodini saseSigubudu.Indodakazi kaButhelezi, uNksz Nompumelelo Buthelezi, ithe uyise bebemgcine emini ngoMgqibelo emuva kokuthi ehambe ekhaya ethi uya emshadweni.Ithe uze watholakala ngoMsombuluko esetholakala nomngani wakhe uThwala naye owayelokhu eqale ukubhekwa ngeSonto emuva kokuthi enyamalele.UNksz Buthelezi uthe ngesikhathi uyise engabuyi emshadweni abazitshelanga ukuthi uminzile kodwa bazitshela ukuthi ulale ezihlotsheni njengoba ebeke enze. Uthe abazange bathuke nangeSonto emini uma engafiki ngoba bazitshela ukuthi ubuyele emshadweni.“Siqale ukukhathazeka uma sesithola ukuthi umngani wakhe uminze emfuleni, saqala nathi sasola ukuthi mhlawumbe naye kungenzeka ukuthi uminzile. Sithole ukuthi wayehamba nabangani bakhe okwakukhona kubona uThwala kodwa bawela ezindaweni ezahlukene khona emfuleni kodwa kwangacaca ukuthi bafike babonana yini emshadweni,” kusho uNksz Buthelezi.Uthe ngesikhathi bethola isidumbu sakhe bathukile noma bebenakho ukuzitshela ukuthi bangamthola eseshonile.UNksz Buthelezi uthe baphatheke kabi ngokushona kukayise. Uqhube wathi uyise noThwala bebengabangani abebevamile ukuthi bahambe ndawonye uma beya emicimbini.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ithimba labatakuli likhiphe izidumbu zalaba bangani emfuleni. Uthe amaphoyisa avule amadokodo amabili ngokufa kwabo.
title: Batholwe beminze emfuleniabangabangani

text: AMAPHAPHU aphezulu emphakathini waseMgangeni, eMzinto kulandela ukudlwengulwa kwezaguga ezimbili. Kunezinsolo zokuthi zidlwengulwe ngabafana bendawo abaziwayo nabasatshwayo.Esinye salezi zaguga esikhulume naleli phephandaba, esidlwengulwe emasontweni ambalwa edlule silandise sathi: “Bekungu-8 ebusuku ngizikhanyisele amakhandlela kodwa ngingakashudi emnyango.“Bengingazitsheli ukuthi kungase kwenzeke lokho ngoba angikaze ngiphazanyiswe muntu njengoba ngizihlalela ngedwa.”Lesi saguga esisebenzisa udondolo uma sihamba, sithe umsolwa owasidlwengula simazi kahle sasimbona kahle nangalolo suku.Sithe uyindodana yowesifazane wasendaweni.“Lo mfana wafika egulukudela engazange angqongqoze. Wayephethe amabhodlela amabili kabhiya ezandleni zombili,” kusho lesi salukazi.Sithe lo mfana akazange apholise maseko esengenile, wathi asikhumule.“Ngaqale ngazitshela ukuthi uyazidlalela noma uzidakelwe njengoba ayephethe amabhodlela ezandleni zombili. Kodwa esengiklinya ngabona ukuthi uzongibulala,” usho njalo.Esekhumulile uthe umsolwa wazitika ngaye ngocansi kwaze kwaba phakathi kwamabili.“Wayengidlwengula abuye aphumule aphuze obhiya ayebaphethe,” echaza.Ngokwalesi salukazi, kwahlula noma sesithi umsolwa akangasiqabuli ngoba umnukisela ngogwayi kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.Sithi wayesiqabula ngenkani enza yonke imigilingwane yocansi.Ngemuva kwalesi sigameko, lesi saguga sithi sigulele ukufa ngoba besingakwazi ukuhamba amasonto amabili.“Intamo yami yayibuhlungu ngendlela exakile ngingakwazi nokuyijikisa. Emqaleni ukudla bekungehli,” usho njalo.Ngenkathi umsolwa esehamba, uthe waqhosha ngokuthi unina uyaziwa endaweni, noma engayovula icala, ngeke aboshwe.“Wathi uma ngiyovula icala, ngizothi ngibuya ebe efikisana nami ekhaya ngoba yena ngeke aze aboshwe,” kuzikhalela lesi salukazi.Lesi saguga sithe lesi sehlakalo asikwazanga ukuyosibika emaphoyiseni, besithembele enduneni yendawo ukuthi isisize sixhumane namaphoyisa.Induna yaseMgangeni uMnuz Mdu Ngcobo ikuqinisekisile ukuthi isalukazi silubike kuyena udaba.“Ngahamba ngayobika emaphoyiseni aseHighflats naseXopo ngalolu daba.Ukuthi kwenzekani ngalo, sekuyiwona amaphoyisa angachaza.”Akakwazanga ukuqhamuka nempendulo ecacile ukuthi yini eyenza ukuthi angasizi isalukazi siyothola ukwelashwa esibhedlela asiyise nasemaphoyiseni.“Njengoba ngisho nje ukuthi konke ngakubika emaphoyiseni, bengithi yiwona azoqhubeka nodaba.”Uthe wawubiza umphakathi wakule ndawo ewazisa ngalesi sigameko esenzekile.Ngesikhathi leli phephadaba lizama ukuthola eziteshini zamaphoyisa okuthiwa athintiwe, anqabile ukuphawula athi akukhulunywe namaphoyisa ezingeni lesifundazwe.Ngesikhathi sokuloba okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe basaxhumana nalezi ziteshi okuthiwe kubikwe kuzona ukuthola kabanzi ukuthi kwenzekani.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mhlaba Memela, uthe bahlale bewukhuthaza umphakathi ukuthi babavumele abadala bezohlala emakhaya abadala angaphansi kwalo mnyango.“Lokhu sikwenzela ukuphepha kwabo, ikakhulukazi labo abahlala bodwa,” kusho uMemela.Uthembise ukuthi bewuMnyango bazothumela osonhlalakahle kulesi saguga ukuze sisheshe sithole ukusizakala ngayo yonke indlela.
title: ‘Udlwengule’ isaguga waqhosha

text: ABASEBENZI abahlanza  amawodi eziguli ezineCovid-19, isibhedlela eKing Dinuzulu, balaxaze umsebenzi izolo ekuseni befuna ukunikezwa izimpahla zezokuzivikela, ezinjengalezo ezigqokwa ngabahlengikazi.Laba basebenzi bathi lesi sibhedlela asibanikezi izimpahla zokuzivikela ezifanele, ekubeni kuyibo abahlanza amawodi eziguli ezineCovid-19.Omunye wabasebenzi abakhulume nephephandaba izolo uthe baqashwe yinkampani enenkontileka nesibhedlela, ngesikhathi kuqala ukufakwa iziguli ezinaleli gciwane esibhedlela, umqashi wabo wabatshela ukuthi izimpahla zokuzivikela ezifanele bazozithola esibhedlela kodwa uma bezicela, bayazitshwa." Umqashi wasikhombisa incwadi eyisivumelwano nesibhedlela. Sasilindele ukuthi sizofundiswa ukuthi kumele siwahlanze kanjani l amawodi kodwa akwenzekanga. Uma sicela izimpahla zokuzivikela siyazitshwa, onesi basitshela ukuthi sinomqashi wethu nguyena okumele asilethele lezo zinto, kanti thina satshelwa ukuthi umqashi uzoletha amakhemikhali okuhlanza, izimpahla zokuzivikela sizozithola esibhedlela. Izimpahla esisigqokayo siziwasha emakhaya kodwa abahlengikazi esisebenza nabo kula mawodi banezimpahla abazigqoka besebenza eziwashwa khona esibhedlela, ngoba kuyaziwa ukuthi kuyingozi ukuziwasha ekhaya. Okunye okusicasulayo ukuthi asitshelwa nokutshelwa ukuthi leli wodi elabaneCovid-19 , sithola ngendlela.  Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi eyethu impilo ayibalulekile yini. Abahlengikazi nodokotela abalokothi bangene emawodini uma engahlanziwe kodwa thina uma sekumele sivikelwe, kukhonjwa umqashi naye akhombe isibhedlela. Ukuyeka kwethu ukusebenza besifuna ukucaciseleka ngoba onesi basitshela ukuthi asisebenze ngoba siholelwa yintela yabo, kungenjalo kuzonqanyulwa inkontileka yenkampani yethu,"  kusho yena.UMnuz Prince Mthalane unobhala weNehawu eThekwini, uthe laba basebenzi nakuba bengewona amalungu enyunyana yabo kodwa le nyunyana ibikelwe ngalolu daba." Abasebenzi bathi akuzange kulandelwe imithetho elandelwayo yokuthi okubonakala sengathi basengcupheni, okungaba abanezifo ezingamahlala khona nasebekhulile, bangafakwa kula mawodi. Bathi babona sengathi kwakumele kube nokuqeqeshwa mayelana nokuthi bawahlanza kanjani lamawodi  nokungenziwanga. Sikwazile ukukhuluma nabasebenzi ukuthi babuyele emsebenzini bese belinda izinhlaka zonke ezithintekayo, ukuze lolu daba lukhulunywe,"   kuchaza uMthalane. UMnuz Ntokozo Maphisa okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo kulesi sifundazwe, uthe abasebenzi bebengatelekile futhi abazange bayeke ukusebenza kodwa kube nomhlangano obungagunyaziwe osheshe wahlakazwa. “ Bekunokungaboni ngasolinye phakathi kwenkampani enenkontileka nomnyango nabasebenzi bayo . Zombili izinhlaka ezithintekayo zixoxisene. Umqashi wabasebenzi uyalelwe ukuthi abhalele abaphathi besibhedlela, umbiko ochaza kabanzi ngokwenzekile,”  kusho uMnuz Maphisa.
title: Bashiye umsebenzi befuna izimpahla zokubavikela

text: Ngingowesifazane osemncane, nginenkinga ngihlala nabazali bami. Ngisanda kuthola ukuthi ubaba engihlala naye akasiyena ubaba wami wangempela. Uma ngizwa kuthiwa umama wahlukana nobaba ngisemncane wabe esethola lona ashade naye njengamanje.Sengike ngambuza umama ngesibongo sami sangempela kodwa wanqaba ukungitshela.Wathi ngifunani ngoba nginaye ubaba lo esihlala naye futhi angikaze ngilale ngingadlile.Kimina akukho mayelana nokulala ngidlile okanye ngingadlile kodwa ngifuna ukwazi ubaba wami wangempela ongizalayo.Ngifuna nokuthola umndeni wami wangempela ngoba ngelinye ilanga ngiyazi ukuthi zikhona izinto ezizoba inkinga empilweni yami ngenxa yokuthi angisazi isibongo sami soqobo.Yikuphi engingakwenza ukuze umama angitshele ukuthi ngingawuthola kuphi umndeni wami?Ngalokho angisho ukuthi ngizobe sengiyawubalekela umndeni ongikhulisile. Kodwa ngifuna ukwazi imvelaphi yami.: Angisiboni isidingo sokuthi unyoko akufihlele ukuthi kukuphi kini nokuthi ubani uyihlo wangempela. Yebo, siyabonga ngoba lo baba ohlala naye ukukhulisile wakondla.Kepha kunezinto okuzofanele uzenzelwe ekhaya kini njengamasiko okuyogcina kuphoqa ukuthi umama wakho akwazise ukuthi ungowakabani kahle wena.Akukhathaleki noma ngabe ubudlelwano phakathi kukanyoko noyihlo abuphelanga kahle. Kodwa wena awungeni ndawo lapho, unelungelo lokwazi ukuthi uzalwa ubani. Akunandaba noma ngabe uyihlo akasekho emhlabeni kodwa ngikholwa ukuthi umndeni wakhe nezihlobo zakhe zisekhona.Awukhulume nonyoko futhi umcele akwazise ngemvelaphi yakho ngoba ingozi yale nto ungagcina usuhlangana nobhuti wakho ongamazi, uthandane naye, mhlawumbe nize nibe nengane naye ngento ebingakwazi ukugwemeka kuseyimanje.Mncenge kahle unyoko ntombazane, ucele akusize ngoba le nto uyadinga ukuyazi.: Ngingowesifazane angijabulile neze emshadweni njengamanje. Ngisanda kushada futhi konke bekuhamba kahle phakathi kwami nomyeni wami ngaphambi kokuba sishade. Kodwa manje angazi ukuthi sekubuye kwajika kuphi.Inkinga enginayo induku yakhe ayisafuni nhlobo ukunyakaza. Kuhlula ngisho sengizama nezitayela engaziyo ukuthi azishayi eceleni kodwa induku yakhe ivele ingibuke nje.Le nto isidala ukuthi sihlale ngokuxabana njalo ngoba nami sengiphenduke ngaba nolaka ngenxa yendlala yocansi. Siyazama kona ukusukuma siyofuna usizo kodwa okwamanje akukho okusasisizile. Kuhlula ngisho sengimbuza ukuthi kungabe kukhona yini into emudlayo emenza aphathwe ukhwantalala nomzwangedwa kodwa uthi cha, akukho lutho.Sibancane nomyeni wami. Kufanele engabe injabulo ibuzwa kithina, engabe izitayela zocansi simuka nazo uthuli kodwa lutho akunjalo. Ngicela usizo.: Ibuhlungu le nkinga enibhekene nayo nomyeni wakho. Ngiyabonga ukuthi uyameseka kukhona konke. Kungenzeka ukuthi ikhona inkinga umyeni wakho abhekene nayo emudlayo, mhlawumbe asabayo ukukutshela yona ngoba nawo umzwangedwa uyakwenza ukuthi induku ikhophoze inganyakazi nhlobo.Kuzomele nithole umeluleki wezemishado oqeqeshiwe mhlawumbe umyeni wakho uzokwazi ukuxoxa ukuthi inkinga yakhe ikuphi.Ngaphandle kwalokho bakhona nodokotela bamadoda abaqeqeshiwe nabo abanganisiza ekutheni nidlule enkingeni enibhekene nayo.Umkhuthaze futhi umyeni wakho ukuthi azwane nokuchatha nokucobelelana nolwazi nezinye izinsizwa okungamsiza.Okwamanje awuthi ukubekezela kancane ungamlahli futhi ungajoli ngoba uyambona ukuthi naye akahleli uyaludinga usizo.: Dadewethu ngixakekile. Ngashonelwa inkosikazi ngasala nezingane.Ngazama ukuzikhulisa ngendlela efanele. Ngenxa yesizungu sengizame kaningana ukuthola umuntu engizohlekisana naye kodwa ayikhona akwenzeki, bonke bayangiphunyula. Uma ngingaphosisi bathathu abantu esengihlukane nabo kusukela ngo-2016 selokhu inkosikazi yadlula emhlabeni.Uma ngithi ngiya kwababonayo kufike kuthiwe inkosikazi inesikhwele kayifuni ukubona omunye umuntu wesifazane eduze kwami.Le nto iyangihlupha ngoba phela ngeke ngikwazi ukuhlala ngingenamfazi impilo yami yonke. Okungikhathaza kakhulu ukuthi bonke abantu engihlola kubona bayazama ukwenza izaba zokuthi ngisizakale kodwa kudlule kufane.: Angazi ukuthi ngalapho izinto nizenza kanjani. Kodwa ngokwazi kwami uma wadlulelwa inkosikazi emhlabeni, uma usufuna ukuganwa futhi kufanele uqiniseke ukuthi zonke izidingo zakho nemicimbi okumele enzelwe kona usuqedile, bese ushisa impepho ucele kuyena njengondlunkulu ukuthi akusize akufunise umuntu oqotho ozokwazi ukuhlala nezingane zakhe.Noma ngabe unesikhwele kanjani kodwa uma zonke izinto zakhe uzenze ngendlela efanele angeke akunikeze inkinga. Mhlawumbe labantu ohlola kubo bakwenzele nezaba akukaqondani kahle. Angisho ukuthi bashaya eceleni.- Elawini likaMaGumende
title: Ezothando: Senginolaka ngenxa yendlala yocansi emshadweni

text: UDIDEKILE umndeni wowesifazane waseMlaza obenyamalele kusukela ngoDisemba, otholakale ngeSonto eselimele.Kuthiwa usathukile uNksz Pinky Masuku (30) wasesigcemeni sakwaG eMlaza, okuthiwa uhluleka nokuchaza ukuthi ubeshonephi.Umndeni wakhe usola ukuthi ubethunjiwe njengoba anyamalala ngoDisemba 29, eyothenga iziqhumane zikaNcibijane enxanxatheleni yezitolo iMega City.Okhulumela umndeni ongathandanga ukuvezwa, uthe uNksz Masuku ulaliswe esibhedlela njengoba engekho esimeni esihle.“Bekuvele kusethusile ukunyamalala kwakhe ngoba uwumuntu ohlala esekhaya. Ubengavalile ngisho emsebenzini, wayegcine ngoDisemba 27 ezobuyela ngoMsombuluko kaDisemba 30.“Wahamba ekhaya eyothenga iziqhumane zezingane, okuthe sengimshayela ucingo ngifuna ukumphathisa okunye ezitolo ngangamthola. Siphinde samzama ocingweni nangakusasa, ucingo lusavaliwe,” echaza.Uthe bavule icala, baqala nokumthungatha bebuza nabamjwayele ukuthi bamgcine nini. Bambheke nasemsebenzini kwathiwa akafikanga ngosuku obekumele abuyele ngalo.Umndeni kaNksz Masuku ubusumfake ngisho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ufuna ukufuniswa yena. Kuthiwa umndeni wakhe ushayelwe ucingo ngowesifazane thizeni omthole eSiphingo.“Abantu abebemthumbile bamlaxaza ndawana thize ogwini oluseNingizimu KwaZulu-Natal, wacela ukugitsheliswa ngomunye wesifazane omshiye eSiphingo. Kumanje nathi sididekile ngoba naye uyahluleka ukuchaza okwenzekile ngenxa yokuthuka. Unezibazi zokulimala emzimbeni, yingakho elele esibhedlela,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lavulwa icala lokunyamalala esiteshini samaphoyisa eMlaza.Uthe kusaphenywa ngesigameko emuva kokuba etholakele ngeSonto ebusuku.
title: Utholakele owathunjwa eyothenga iziqhumane

text: MHLENGI SHANGASEU KUBA nothishanhloko abanamava okuphatha yikhona okwenza izikole zenze kahle ngoba yibona abawumgogodla waleso sikole. Lokhu kuvezwe uMqondisi wesifunda uMlazi, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, ophinde wanconywa nguNgqongqoshe kazwelonke uNkk Angie Motshekga ngokuphephezelisa ifulegi lesifundazwe uma kuza ngasekuphaseni njengoba lesi sifunda sizishaye zonke emakhanda kwa-matric.Lesi sifunda esinezikole eziningi emalokishini ahlukene okubalwa iFolweni, Makhutha, Mlazi, Chesterville, Lamontville nezindawo ezisemakhaya okuyiMbumbulu, Mkhomazi nezinye senze kahle sathola ngaphezulu kuka-70%.Yisona sifunda esinesibalo esikhulu sabafundi ababhale u-matric abangu-23 000. Sikhulu uma usiqhathanisa nesifundazwe iNorthern Cape okubhale abangu-20 000 ku-matric.Kulesi sifunda kunezikole ezisemalokishini ezenza kahle minyaka yonke zidlula ezisemadolobheni kubalwa iMenzi High, ethola u-100% minyaka yonke, Adams College, Velabahleke, Zwelibanzi, Sibusisiwe nezinye. UNtuli uthe othishanhloko yibona abangafukula noma bawise izikole.“Uma esikoleni esifana neMenzi esihlale senza kahle uletha uthishanhloko ongenamava okuphatha noma obhidliza izinto lesiya sikole singawa sibe nemiphumela emibi. Yingakho sihlangana njalo ngekota nothishanhloko ukuze sibhunge ngezokuphathwa kwesikole nezinto ezilindelekile. Abezikole ezenza kahle sibaxhumanisa nalezi ezingenzi kahle ukuze bancele ulwazi bese benza kahle,” usho kanje. Uthe uzohlangana nabahloli namhlanje ukuze athole kahle ukuthi yiziphi izifundo ezingaphaswanga kahle kulesi sifunda ukuze bangenelele.Uqhube wathi banezinhlelo abazenzayo beyisifunda zokusiza izikole ezingenzi kahle ngokuziyisa esikhungweni sabo esiseMorningside eThekwini. Kulesi sikhungo kufundisa othisha abenza kahle ezifundweni ezithile, abaqeqesha abanye othisha abafundisa lezo zifundo. Nabafundi abangenzi kahle bayathathwa bayohlaliswa khona impelasonto, bafunde.”Sizobheka isifundo ngasinye ukuthi senze njani, sibheke nemibuzo ebe inkinga bese sihlala kuyona. Sizobheka nezikole ezingenzanga kahle kulezo zifundo ukuze sigxile kothisha bakhona ngoba akusizi ukuthatha bonke othisha uyomfundisa yonke into nangayidingi,” usho kanje.Uthe banohlelo lokufunda ngamaholidi obelwenziwa yizikole ezingenzanga kahle ebezisizwa yizikole ezingomakhelwane. Kulezi zikole athe zenze kahle ebezifunda ngoba zingenzanga kahle ngo-2014, ubale iMakhumbuza esuke ku-44% yaya ku-84%, KwaMathanda esuke ku-46% yaya ku-72%, Masibambane eyayaziwa nge-Isibambanezulu esuke ku-52% yaya ku-89% neSibongindlela ebeyaziwa ngeSolemamba esuke ku-53% yaya ku-98%. “Ngiyaziqhenya ngalezi zikole ngoba zenze kahle kakhulu zisuka phansi kanti bezisizwa ngezinye ezingomakhelwane. Sithathe othisha balezi zikole ezenza kahle sabayisa kwezingenzi kahle ukuze bayosiza. Besibabonga ngemali engatheni ngokuzinikela kwabo,” usho kanje. Uthe kunalabo abacabanga ukuthi uMlazi wenza kahle ngoba unezikole ezisemadolobheni.“Izikole zethu eziningi zisemalokishini, ingxenye yazo eningi iseMbumbulu okuyindawo esemakhaya. Kubafundi abangu-23 000 abafunda ezikoleni zabelungu bangu-6 000 kuphela okusho ukuthi u-18 000 ufunda emakhaya nasemalokishini. Akulona iqiniso ukuthi lesi sifunda senza kahle ngoba sinezikole zabelungu.”“Sinohlelo lokusiza izikole ezazidume ngokwenza kahle kodwa ezingasenzi kahle manje ngoba sekwaqiniswa isandla uma kubhalwa. Kuphuma bonke abasebenzi bomnyango bayoqapha lezo zikole,” kusho uNtuliUbonge abasebenzi bomnyango abasebenza ngokuzikhandla wathi bayasebenzisana nezinyunyana zothisha.
title: ‘Othishanhloko bawumgogodla’

text:
N GABE ngiphixiza webuya uma ngingaqali enhlambulukweni ngaphambi kokuthi ngibabele isihloko engikuso namuhla. Kwesinye seziqubu ngiloba ngomqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane (
osesithombeni) kulesi sikhala somusa woMhleli, ngamgandaya ngamshiya eyinyengethwa. Futhi, uma kungukuthi bamtshela ngalokhu engakubhala ngaye, usengavinjwa wumthetho ukuthi angangitheli othulini ngodalimede bamavelemane uma kwenzeka ihlangana esikhaleni kwaNtombela.Ngabe ngingaqali nokho ukumgazinga umfo kaMosimane ngoba naphambilini kuyo le ngosi ngike ngakuveza ukungamnambithisisi kwami. Lapha kungesikhathi esibhibhidlela eqenjini lesizwe, iBafana Bafana.Kokunye nje cishe abaningi basola ukuthi ukuphawula kwami ngalo mqeqeshi sekuhambisana nokunyevuza nje hleze okungenasisekelo. Nokho imibono yami kayiguqukile ngoba yabe ingahlose kuhuzula siqu sakhe lo mqeqeshi, noma labo abasondelene naye kodwa kwabe kungukuqangqalaza ngalokho engangikubona ngaleso sithuba.Yingakho ngicabanga ukuthi okunye ukuphawula kwami namuhla kungase kwenze kube khona abathi leli lungu lesizwe saMaMbatha linya indoni namakhiwane bese ngilahlekelwa nayisithunzana ebinginaso. Kanti cha, kunjalo nje uma uhlala esiminyeni – kuthi nanxa izinto seziwuphikisa umbono wakho bese uyivuma ukuthi ingenile lapha emhlubulweni.Indaba ilapha ekudidekeni kobuwengu bethu thina balandeli bebhola. Kulokhu kudwayiza kuhle kwezinhlwabusi linile, kunokulibala ukuthi umvimbi okuyiwona ohlola inala ulokhu uqhubekile laphaya eChloorkop. Ukuhhomuzela okuhambisana nomdlalo phakathi kweKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates kungakushiya ufana nenhlwabusi impela ngoba kujike bese kukhohlakala ukuthi empeleni yiliphi iqembu elisezingeni elihle lebhola, hhayi ngokuzalela kwehlokohloko.Asivumelane ngokuthi umdlalo weZimnyama neZimpofana obungempelasonto edlule bekuyicece nje lezimbangi ezindala. Lo mdlalo ubungahlanganise lutho nomncintiswano weligi. Kulokhu nje ngabaqeqeshi abebenakiwe ngoba sebephenduke imizondo ngemiphumela engahambisani nomsindo okwakhelwe kuwo la maqembu.Leli dumela leChiefs nePirates liyisimo esiconsisa amathe kuMosimane futhi useyakwazi ukuthi asebenzise la mathuba ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi wakhe engenangcindezi njengoba abalandeli, ngisho abangawalandeli la maqembu, besuke benake lo bhuzamlandela. Uma ungase ubale ukuthi igama likaSteve Komphela, oqeqesha eNaturena, selivele kangaki emaphephandabeni, labalulwa kangaki emisakazweni nobuso bakhe bavela kangaki kuthelevishini, ungamangala. Kodwa uMosimane ungabala ngeminwe kule sizini. UMuhsin Ertugral yena ungafuna kuze kudumbe izithupha sengathi ushuka ngazo imboza ungamtholi emaphephandabeni, yize iqembu lakhe lilele isibili.Ngilapha-ke ekutheni uMosimane nethimba lakhe sebebumbe inqanawe okumanje isigijime imidlalo ewu-17 ingakaze ilinuke nangephunga uswazi. Namagoli ayangena, ngale kokuthi udlalise muphi umdlali uMosimane. Kuye kungidide-ke ukuthi bese kuthi ngqoklo umsindo, kubatshazwa sengathi kubonakele uMfundisi nokhololo eyobhula esangomeni, noma la maqembu aseSoweto amakhulu ebonakala ukuthi awekho ndawo.Okusobala wukuthi uma kungenzeka iChiefs iwine isicoco seligi kuyoba yisiga nje sethamsanqa elidilike njengemana esagcina ukuzwa ngalo ebhayibhelini lehlela isizwe sakwa-Israyeli ehlane. Uma iPirates ikwazile ukungena emaqenjini ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu ekupheleni kwesizini, kungabi yingcuphe, umqeqeshi wayo u-Eric Tinkler nosihlalo u-Irvin Khoza kuyomele benze isiphihli sedili ngoba njengamanje obekudla amantshontsho emsamo kweZikamagebhula akusenanhloni sekugida emini kwabha e-Orlando Stadium.Ngincoma-ke uMosimane ngokuba wuchakijana kubo bonke lobu buwelewele babalandeli beChiefs nePirates, edeze echezuka eqokelela amaphuzu asambeke esicongweni namanje. Kanjalo no-Ertugral – ukujabulela kakhulu ukubukeka njengesi-aramu seNkosi esiziphembela ngozwathi esimweni esinhlinhlizayo kuMpumalanga Black Aces.Ubukhalulu kuMosimane ubuzwa nalapha olimini ekhuluma sengathi ubindwa yizambane eliphuma emalahleni futhi engaphenduli imibuzo ebhekiswe kuye. Kokunye njalo aqhamuke nombono othusayo ozokwenza ukuba abacosheli bagqegqemuke nawo bayeke ukulandela umsebenzi owenzeka enkundleni. Uyothi unganakile komunye umzuzu uhlakanyana athi memfu eseklwele ebomvu amehlo azwakalise ukunengeka. Bese udideka ukuthi konje udinwe yini iqembu lakhe liwinile nje?La maqhinga asusa amehlo kubadlali nakulokho abakwenzayo. usebaqedile ngawo uMosimane. Abanye abaqeqeshi bathi belele obenyoni yena ebe eshaye amangqeshane kuhle kombusi onezincelebana ezihlale zimqaphile.
title: Ziyombamba esekude izitha uPitso

text: Mhleli: Nginike ithuba nami ngibeke olwami uvo mayelana nokuqhubeka kuKhozi FM. Kuyaqala ukuthi kube nomsindo ongaka ngezinguquko noma izinqumo ezenzeka emsakazweni ngalolu hlobo.Ngokwami ukubuka abantu okumele kulalelwe imibono yabo ngokuphathwa komsakazo nezinhlelo ngabantu abakufundele ukusakaza bagogoda kuzo ezokusakaza.Hhayi le nto yokuthi nanoma yimuphi nje umbono womlaleli sekumele ulalelwe. Umsakazo ufana nebhola, nanoma ubani ucabanga ukuthi uyawazi.Kuyaphoxa ukuthi abalaleli sebehhomuzela kangaka nje babethule exova izinto kuKhozi FM uNgizwe Mchunu. Lokho kuxova sekuze kwadala ukuthi axoshwe. Ngoba uyisangoma akahambe ayobhulela abantu.Indaba yokuthi abalandeli bakamasikanzi ngeke besalulalela Ukhozi yinto engekho leyo. Futhi ubani owathi Ukhozi olwabathandi bakamasikandi kuphela?Yini le edala abantu bakamasikandi bazenze ongqo shishilizi ekuphathweni komsakazo?Yini bakhulume kangaka ngoba nakhu izikhundla zokuphatha kuKhozi FM sezikubantu besifazane (uZandile Tembe umphathi wezinhlelo noSbongi Ngcobo umphathi wesiteshi) na?Ayikho inkampani engaphathwa ngokubuswa yizwi likawonke wonke. Leyo nkampani kungachaza ukuthi ayinambono nazinhloso ezibhalwe phansi.Anginanxa noNgizwe mina, kepha uma kungukuthi wayeqashiwe, sekufike isikhathi sokuthi agoduke. Wayenganikiwe inkontileka yangunaphakade. Naba noLinda Sibiya bahamba balokhu besabisa ngokuvula iziteshi online. Siphi nje leso siteshi?Akekho umuntu omkhulu kunomsakazo. Useyakwazi uNgizwe lokho. Abayeke ukuzixaka ngokuyomasha abalandeli bakamasikandi. Bakhombisa ukuba nesithukuthezi nokuthi abanayo into engcono abangayenza kunokuyobhiyozela uNgizwe.Siyanda MbheleUMLAZA
title: [IMIBONO] UNgizwe ngoba uyisangoma akayobhulela abantu

text: OBENGUMENGAMELI wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma ukhwele wadilika kwabayizifundiswa zakuleli wathi zicabangisa okwabantu basemgedeni.Ekhuluma emcimbini wokuhlonipha abafundi abenze kahle basesikoleni iBizimali eNkandla ngoMgqibelo, uZuma uthe manje kumele kukhiqizwe izifundiswa ezizocabangisa okwama-Afrika hhayi ngendlela yaseNtshonalanga.“Kumele sikhiqize izifundiswa manje ezizothi okwethu okwathathwa abaseNtshonalanga akubuye, futhi uma sesikubuyisa kungabikhona abamnyama abazobavikela laba baseNtshonalanga abahlangana bacabanga ngokuthi kumele babelane kanjani ngezwekazi i-Afrika,” kusho uZuma.Unxuse intsha ukuba ifunde ukuze kubuyiswe umhlaba.NgoMgqibelo uZuma unikele ngama-laptop amahlanu, wathembisa ukuthi kusukela ngonyaka ozayo usezonikela ngawu-10.Uthe isifiso sakhe ukuthi kwakhiwe inyuvesi eNkandla ukuze izingane zakhona zingeke zisahamba ziye kwezinye izindawo.“’Angifisi ukuthi ngife inyuvesi ingekho lapha endaweni yethu,” kusho uZuma.Uthishanhloko wesikole, uMnuz Ntandoyakhe Ntuli uthe uyafisa uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal ukuba ubandisele amakilasi.“Kulo nyaka sijikise abafundi abangaphezu kuka-1000, ngenxa yokuthi asinawo amakilasi enele,” kusho uNtuli.Uphinde wanxusa izikhulu zoMnyango wezeMfundo ukuthi zibuyekeze indaba yokuthi othisha bafundise ngezincwadi ezikoleni.“Ukufundisa kwethu sekuyize ngoba siyazifundisa izingane zifike emanyuvesi ziphenduke izidomu ngenxa yokuthi azikwazi ukusebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe bamakhompyutha. Kungakuhle nasezikoleni zethu ukuba izingane ziqale zifundiswe ngama-tablets ukuze zithi zifika amanyuvesi zibe sezibujwayele ezobuchwepheshe,” kusho uNtuli.IMeya kaMasipala waseNkandla, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, ivule ngokusemthethweni ugesi kulesi sikole njengoba phambilini kade kukhanyiswa nge-generator kubuye kusetshenziswe namakhandlela.
title: UZuma ufuna inyuvesi eNkandla

text: UKULIMALA  eqakaleni kwaphoqa owayengunozinti weKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates, uBrilliant Khuzwayo, ukuthi awagaxe emgibeni amakhokho  akhe eneminyaka ewu-29 ngesizini edlule kodwa akakaliphonsi ithawula ekwenzeni into ayithandayo.UKhuzwayo wazakhela igama ngo-2010 edlalela AmaZulu ngahambi kokuthi abolekiswe kwiThanda Royal Zulu ngo-2011.Ngemuva kokudlala kahle kuMabhubesi ngesizini ka-2011/2012, iChiefs yamcathamela uKhuzwayo ifuna asayine kuyona.AmaZulu naMakhosi bavumelana ngokudayiselana uKhuzwayo, kwaba ukuhamba kwakhe lokho. UKhuzwayo wayengesona isibukeli nje kwiChiefs ngesikhathi edlala kuyona. Wasifaka kakhulu isandla empumelelweni yeqembu eminyakeni eyisithupha ayihlala kulona.Wawina isicoco seligi kabili, iNedbank Cup neMTN 8. Ngesikhathi exoxa ne-Independent Media, uKhuzwayo uthe usengagxumela noma yiliphi ithuba eliqhamukayo.“Uma kukhona ithuba eliqhamukayo, umuntu angalibhekisisa ukuthi angalithatha yini uma ekholelwa kwakwenzayo. ”Ngiyazinakekela futhi ngiphila impilo ehlanzekile. Ngisemncane, ngineminyaka ewu-30 kuphela. ”Angazi ukuthi impilo izongisa kuphi, uma ingisa ezulwini okungasho ukudlala ibhola futhi, lokho ngiyokwamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe, ngisijabulele leso simangaliso. ”Uma impilo ingangisi lapho, nginesiqiniseko sokuthi iyongisa lapho ngingakaze ngiye khona phambilini. Ngingaphila ngize ngibe neminya ewu-70 ngenxa yendlela engiziphethe ngayo,” kusho uKhuzwayo.Eminyakeni engu-30 anayo uKhuzwayo usehlomule ngezinto eziningi ebholeni, kubandakanya nokuyomela iBafana Bafana kwi-Africa Cup of Nations e-Equatorial Guinea ngo-2015.“Uma lingavela ithuba elincane lokuthi ngiphinde ngidlale futhi, ngiyolithatha nakanjani. Angizange ngiphonse ithawula futhi yingakho namanje ngingakadikibali. Yizimo ezithile ezangiphoqa ukuthi ngiyeke ibhola. Uma nje likhona ithutshana elincane, ngingabuyela ebholeni. Kungamele ngilithathe lelo thuba elincane. Kodwa ake sime sibone. Isikhathi yisona esizocacisa ukuthi kwenzekani. Ukuthi ngiyabuya noma akwenzeki lokho, uMdali uyena ozothatha isinqumo.”UKhuzwayo uke waba semabhukwini ezinkunzi zaseNingizimu Afrika iChiefs nePirates.“Abantu abaningi abaphili impilo ehlanzekile. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi bagule kakhulu. Ngifuna ukukhombisa abantu ukuthi njengomdlali webhola elikhokhelayo ngisengayiphila impilo ehlanzekile bese ngigwema nokuthola izifo kalula. Ukuphila impilo ehlanzekile kukunika ukuzethemba. Uma ngingenza lokho ngikhululekile. Ngiziphilela impilo yami ngendlela ehlanzekile,” kwengeza uKhuzwayo.AmaZulu akhethe ukungayivuseleli inkontileka kaMoeneeb Josephs. Usuthu yiqembu uKhuzwayo aqala kulona ukudlala ibhola elikhokhelayo. Ngabe angasivala isikhala sikaJosephs kuMaZulu?“Cabanga isimo lapho waqala khona ibhola elikhokhelayo, wase uqhubeka wayodlalela iBafana Bafana, Under 23, Kaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates. Njengomuntu owazalelwa eThekwini ungafisa ukukuqedela kuphi konke? Ekhaya, angithi? Yize izinto zenzeka eGoli kodwa zikuphi izimpande zakho? Yizimo ezangiyekisa ibhola ngenkani, angizange ngiziyekele ngokuthanda kwami,” kugcizelela uKhuzwayo.
title: Akakaliphonsi ithawula owayengunozinti weChiefs neBucs

text: Sithembiso MkhizeKUMELE izisole yona iMamelodi Sundowns ngokuhluleka ukuqoqa amaphuzu amathathu ngesikhathi ibambana neTshakhuma FC ngeqanda emdlalweni weDStv Premiership izolo ebusuku, eLoftus Versfeld Stadium.Uqala umdlalo kwaze kwaba kuphela isiwombe sokuqala abadlali abafana noRivaldo Coetzee, Hlompho Kekana noPeter Shalulile bageje amagoli abesobala.Kuyiwe ekhefini leli qembu elicijwa uManqoba Mngqithi ngokuhlanganyela noRhulani Mokwena noSteve Komphela selilikhahlelele izikhawu eziyisikhombisa ipali.Bekubhoke uThemba “Mshishi” Zwane ephaka amabhola ayingozi. ISundowns ibize kulo mdlalo ihambela phezulu ngemuva kokubhaxabula iKaizer Chiefs ngo 3-0 kowokuqala weligi ngempelasonto edlule. Akungatshazwa ukuthi lo mphumela ubunikeza ithemba abalandeli bayo ngokuthi bazozigwazela ibhece nakwiTshakhuma engomakoti esigabeni esikhulu. Ngemuva kokubhacaza isikhathi eside esiwombeni sesibili, iSundowns ibuye ngamandla sewuzophela umdlalo.Ngaleso sikhathi iTshakhuma bese igqishe emuva, kucaca ukuthi izolijabulela iphuzu ezolithola ngokubamba ompetha beligi.UMogakolodi Ngele oyiqale ngenothi eliphezulu isizini eshaya amagoli kuleli qembu laseLimpopo izolo ubevalwe ngci kungathi akekho enkundleni.Nembala kube yinjabulo yodwa kusihlalo weTshakhuma uMasala Mulaudzi obonakale emamatheka kuvela elomhlathi ngesikhathi unompempe esewuqeda umdlalo. Bekufanele ajabule kwazise leli qembu lakhe elifike kwiPremiership lihaqwe zinkinga, alikahlulwa.UMngqithi nozakwabo kuzomele bazoyilungisa eyokulahla amathuba ngaphambi komdlalo wayo olandelayo neCape Town City ngoLwesithathu oluzayo. Eminyakazweni eyenziwe yiSundowns izolo, uCoetzee uyishaye phezu kwepali i-free kick ebingaphandle nje kancane kwebhokisi ngemuva kokuthi isitobha seTshakhuma, uBulelani Ndengane, edlalise kabi uZwane.Kumele ukube uyazisola lapho ekhona uKekana oqome ukufuqa ibhola lashaya ipali esebhekene nonozinti wezimbangi, uWashington Arubi. Iphutha belenziwe wuye uNdengane. UNdengane uyena ocishe iTshakhuma njengoba ebenza amaphutha angenasidingo edlalisa kabi abeSundowns.UShalulile udlale ngomsebenzi kumele alibeke phakathi emuva kwebhola eleligwetshwe uThapelo Morena. Ngesiwombe sesibili iTshakhuma ecijwa uJoel Masutha izamile ukubuya kubhoke uCelimpilo Ngema obephasela ozakwabo ngobuchule.Ngoka-85, uMasutha wenze ushintsho lokuqala efaka uThembisani Nevhulanga wakhipha uShonga obenamaphutha axakile.
title: ISundowns ilahle amathuba idlala ngokulingana neTTM

text: ABAMHLOPHE bafika ezwenikazi i-Afrika bathola abamnyama benamasiko abo. Nakuba babaphuca okuningi kodwa kukhona abangabanga namandla okubaphuca khona. Kokunye abangakwazanga ukukuphuca khona abampisholo yilo isiko nesintu sabo. Bafaka inkolo ngenhloso yokumdunga umqondo umuntu omnyama. Kuyadabukisa ukuthi kuthe uma sekuphatha umuntu omnyama, waphuca umuntu wakubo isiko nesintu sakhe. Namhlanje sinobugcwelegcwele izwelonke uhulumeni wakha imali ngabo, namhlanje sinezingane ezihlala emigwaqweni ezijika zibe yizigebengu, ezigcina sezibizwa ngamaphara.Ngo-1996 kwaqhanyukwa noMthethosisekelo wezwe owanconywa kwathiwa muhle kunayo yonke emhlabeni. Lihle iqiniso, lokho kwaba yingcwaba lokugcina kumuntu omnyama. Umuntu omnyama kuqale lapho ukuthi kuthiwe akenze izinto eziphambene nesiko nesintu sakhe, okugcine kumngcwaba okokugcina.Uma ingane izalwa emandulo bekwaziwa ukuthi uma uyise nonina bengashadile leyo ngane ingumlanjwana, iyohlale ingeyakoninalume. Namhlanje uma ingane izalwa esibhedlela akubuzwa nakubuzwa kuvele kuthiwe ayibhalwe ngesibongo sikayise, lawo maphepha ayogcina eseMnyangweni wezaseKhaya, nakhona ingane igxivizwe ngesibongo sikayise. Unina ngokungazi isiko njengalokhu selamuka nezinkolo avume kugcine isibongo esisebenzayo kungesikayise wengane. Uma makhathaleni ingane isinezinkinga, kugcina sekufanele kuhlehlelwe emuva ingane ilungise iphutha elenzeka ngesikhathi izalwa sekuthiwa ayihambe iyofuna izincwadi ezifungelwe kokunye kuthathwe igazi. Uma uyise wengane nonina sebexabana kuqala inkinga. Akubhekwa ukuthi iphutha leli elenzeka emuva esibhedlela, lilungiswe kalula ngoba kwaziwa ukuthi isiko nesintu kuthini.Namhlanje la maphara esikhala ngawo amaqanda azalwe nguMthethosisekelo wethu owakhiwe omnyama kubusa omnyama, amachwane achanyiselwa yilokhu kuhlupheka esikubona kubhebhetheka imihla namalanga enganeni yomuntu omnyama. Siqamba amanga sithi kunezinkumbi zezingane ezingayitholi imisebenzi ngoba sifuna ukwanelisa izifiso zepolitiki sibe sazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi akulula ukuthola umsebenzi kuphambene esibongweni. Uma ingane iphuma iyofuna umsebenzi iphuma naliphi ithongo? Lokhu ongqongqoshe abaphethe kowezaseKhaya bakwazi kahle kamhlophe, ezabo izingane ngeke bavume ukuthi zibizwe ngesibongo abaziyo ukuthi akusona. Kufana ncamashi nokuthi ezemindeni yabo ezakhona izingane bazifaka ezibhedlela ezingcono, nasezikoleni ezingcono bese bethi bahola umphakathi wona oyiswa ezikoleni nasezibhedlela abathi ezikahulumeni. Liphi iqiniso eliyophephisa lisindise liphinde liphilise umuntu omnyama oholwa omnyama na?Namhlanje sekuyinsakavukela umchilo wesidwaba ukuthi yonke ingane ezalwayo uyise nonina abashadile, noma beshadile kodwa akuzange kwagcagcwa njengalokhu sekwalahleka isintu namasiko. Namhlanje sekuyinto enzima ukuthi uma uganwa ungaganwa umuntu ongenayo ingane. Iningi labesifazane linezingane, kanjalo nebesilisa.Ukuyeka imikhuba efana nokusoma nokuhlolwa kwabesimame nokufundiswa kwabafana entabeni yikhona okuchamisele le nkinga yokuthi wonke umuntu usethatha isinqumo sokuganwa enomuntu onengane yomunye. Kukabili-ke le ngane ayithole engakashadi owesimame uzohamba nayo uyoyibiza ngesibongo salapho eganele khona, kokunye uzwe bona abadala obathembile okuthi bazi isintu abazizalukazi namakhehla bethi hamba uyobiza isibongo sakini khona ungayohlupheka. Kulapho-ke kuqala khona izinkinga. Kulapho uqala khona ukuba nezinkinga zasemsamo usuhlangabezana nale nkinga yaseMnyangweni wezaseKhaya, sekuthiwa thola izincwadi ezifungelwe, kumbe kuthathwe igazi ukuthola ukuthi bayakuzala ngempela yini laba bantu ngoba uthi uzama ukuguqula isibongo kube ngesilungile.Abantu abaningi abaya kohlola ezangomeni namhlanje bazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi yisibongo esonakele. Uyozwa nohlolayo ethi thatha isibongo sikayihlo into engelona nakancane isiko, belekelelwa amanye amabandla akhona athi ancike esintwini kodwa ebe ekhuthaza into ephambene nesintu.Lithi-ke elami uma uhulumeni engakalungisi ezibhedlela lapho kuzalelwa khona izingane kanjalo nasemnyangweni, abantu bakithi abathi beyokulungisa batshelwe lokhu nalokhu, usekude umuntu omnyama ukukhulukeka nokuthi umnotho ube sezandleni zakhe.
title: [IMIBONO] UMthethosisekelo waba yingcwaba lokugcina komnyama

text: AMAGATSHA e-ANC eMoses Mabhida afuna kube nengqungquthela yesifunda, asabisa ngokuthi azoya enkantolo uma kuphela inyanga ubuholi bukazwelonke bungacacisi ngengqungquthela yawo.Amagatsha awu-76 kwawu-89, ayehambisana noDkt Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma ngesikhathi kuyiwa engqungqutheleni yaseNasrec ngonyaka odlule, afuna ukuthi ingqungquthela yesifunda ibe khona ukuze kukhethwe ubuholi obusemthethweni.Okhulumela la malungu, uMnuz Sthembiso Nkuna, uthe balindele ukuthi ubuholi bukazwelonke bucacise ngendaba yengqungquthela yabo ngaphambi kokuthi kuphele uNovemba.“Uma ubuholi bungasigunyazi ukuthi sibe nengqungquthela sizophoqeleka ukuthi senze into esingayithandi siye enkantolo,” kusho uNkuna.Uthe naphambilini bayile enkantolo yanquma ukuthi ingqungquthela ibe khona ngoJuni kodwa yaphazamiseka ngemuva kokuthi kube khona amalungu enhlangano asabisa ngenkantolo.Ubuholi bukazwelonke bamemezela ukuthi ingqungquthela yaseMabhida neyaseLower South Coast izoba ngemuva kokhetho lwangonyaka ozayo ngemuva kokuthi lezi zifunda zike zakhungathwa yizinxushunxushu ezigcine ziholela ekutheni kuphume imiphefumulo.UNkuna uthe akusikho ukungahloniphi ukuphikisana nesinqumo sobuholi obuphezulu.“Yebo siyavuma ukuthi ubuholi bukazwelonke bunamandla kodwa lawo mandla awubuniki ilungelo lokuthi buphule umthethosisekelo weqembu,” kusho uNkuna,Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, ngeSonto usigxekile isenzo samalungu afuna kube nengqungquthela wathi kumele alinde impendulo kaNobhala-jikelele, uMnuz Ace Magashule.“Lawa maqabane ahamba ahlangana noNobhala-jikelele kodwa okwamanje ubengakawaphenduli. Siyawanxusa ukuthi ahloniphe izinhlaka zangaphakathi enhlanganweni,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.
title: Basabisa ngokuya enkantoloabe-ANC

text: WENQABE waphetha ukwamukela imfene ‘yomthakathi’ obeseyichitha ngoba eselaxaza ubuthakathi.Lo “mkhunkuli” wasePort Shepstone ocele ukuthi lingadalulwa igama lakhe, ngoba esabela ukuhlaselwa wumphakathi, wethuse abaningi eMthwalume eyonikezela ngale mfene ngoba ethi usekhathele ukuyifuya.Obenikezwa le mfene, uMnuz Hloniphizwe “Double 12” Mkhize, uthi ubengayesabi le mfene kodwa unqabe ukuyithatha ngoba ubengazi ukuthi kwenzekani.UDouble 12 uthi ngesikhathi lo mlisa efike enkonzweni yakhe, waba nesibonakaliso sokuthi lo mlisa uhlushwa yimfene kwakhe futhi akasabulali nobuthongo.Uma esethola kabanzi, kwavela ukuthi lo wesilisa wemfene unengane enezinyanga izelwe, engalali ebusuku ngenxa yale mfene. Unkosikazi wakhe usecele ukuthi buyekwe ubuthakathi ngoba buphazamisa inhlalakahle yengane.“Ngithuke esebuya nayo eseyilayishe emotweni. Uma echaza, uthi wayishiyelwa umalume wakhe osashona. Manje njengoba ngihamba ngezimoto ezibizayo, imfene ibingahlalaphi emotweni yami?”kubuza uMkhize.Uthe umyalele ukuthi abuyele nayo emzini wakhe ukuze ayoyibonela khona.“Ngifike sekuthiwa uye eMaputo, uyozama usizo khona,” kusho uMkhize.Omunye wabantu ababekhona kufika le mfene, uthi bashaqeka ngoba babengalindele ukuthi kukhona umuntu ongaphumela obala ngento ebucayi kangaka.Eziphendulela lo wesilisa okuthiwa akasayifuni imfene, uthe ubengaqondile ukucasula umthandazi ngalesi senzo.“Ukuza kwami nalesi silwane kumthandazi bekungekhona ukumcasula ngendlela osekwenzeka ngayo. Inhloso yami bekuwukuthi akasithathe lesi silwane bese ethatha isinqumo ngaso ngoba ukwazile ukungibhulela ukuthi nginemfene esiyinkinga emndenini wami,” kusho umnikazi wemfene oneminyaka elinganiselwa ku-40.Uthe ubezama ukuyisusa egcekeni lakhe.“Ngikwazile ukuyilahla imithi kodwa imfene yona izibuyele ngemuva kokuthi ngiyilahle ehlathini,” usho kanje.“Umthandazi ungitshele ngokugcatshwa kwami ngokuthakathwa ngisemncane, ngakho bengifuna angelaphe , angisuse nethunzi lale mfene engihamba nayo, bese eyidukisa kimi ingabe isabuya.”Uthe kodwa bekungamele lolu daba lufike kwabezindaba.“Bekungafanele ngibizelwe izintatheli ngoba nasendaweni bebevele bengisola ngokuthathaka, manje uma kuvela into enje kwabezindaba, sizobulawa sonke emndenini,” kuzikhalela "umthakathi”.“Njengoba umthandazi enqaba ukuyithatha, ngizozama ukuyibuyisela la umalume ayeyithathe khona njengoba yafika njengefa ezandleni zami.”
title: Umthandazi wenqabe imfene abeyiphiwa 'ngumthakathi’

text: KUSHONE abane engozini yomgwaqo eyenzeke eRamsgate, ngesikhathi kushayisana izimoto ezintathu ngoMgqibelo.Le ngozi yenzeke kuN2 ngabo-4 ntambama.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuphenywa amacala amane okubulala ngokungenhloso.“Kube nengozi ebandakanya izimoto ezintathu eRamsgate. Kushone abantu abane endaweni yesigameko. Amaphoyisa aseMargate aphenya amacala amane okubulala ngokungenhloso,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Kwenzeka le ngozi nje, ngeledlule kushone abangu-16 oLundi, ngemva kokushayisana kweloli netekisi kwagqamuka umlilo, basha.Le ngozi ilandela eyenzeke e-Underberg lapho kwashona abomndeni owodwa abangu-13. Nayo ilandela eyenzeke ngenyanga edlule KwaChakide, ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu, okwashona abantu abangu-13 abebehamba ngetekisi eyashayisana neloli.Khonamanjalo, amaphoyisa aseHilton ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu aphenya icala ngokushona kwababili abaphahlazeke nendiza ngoMgqibelo.“Umshayeli wendiza oneminyaka engu-58 nobegibele oneminyaka engu-60, baphahlazeke nendiza eHilton, eduze naseHilton College. Amaphoyisa aseHilton avule idokodo ngokushona kwabantu,” kusho uColonel Mbele.
title: Kushone abane engozini eRamsgate

text: UMGADLI omusha waMaZulu FC, u-Andre de Jong, ukholelwa ekutheni ukudlala kahle kwakhe kuSuthu kuzomenza athole ijezi eqenjini lesizwe langakubo iNew Zealand.UDe Jong (22), usayine kuleli qembu ngoMeyi esuka kwi-Eastern Suburbs edlala esigabeni esiphezulu saseNew Zealand. Ushaye amagoli awu-17 ngesizini edlule.Ngokusho kwalolu nkonko lo mgadli, ibhola lakuleli lehlukile uma yena eliqhathanisa nelaseNew Zealand.Uthe eNingizimu Afrika ibhola lakhona liyashesha, kuyagijinywa kakhulu kanti ekhaya eNew Zealand akusheshwa kodwa kusetshenziswa kakhulu amaqhinga.UDe Jong uvumile ukuthi usazama ukujwayela ibhola lakuleli kodwa wathi akafuni ukuzifaka ingcindezi.“Ngisadlale amahlandla amabili kuphela eqenjini lesizwe laseNew Zealand. Ngingakujabulela kakhulu ukubizwa futhi kwelesizwe njengoba kuzothi ngoNovemba sibe nemidlalo emibili esizoyidlala ne-Ireland neLithuania. Ngiyazi ukuthi ukubizwa kwami eqenjini lesizwe kuncike ekutheni ngenza kanjani lapha kuMaZulu. Kungakho ngizimisele ukwenza konke okusemandleni ukuthi iqembu linqobe,” kusho uDe Jong.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe akayizwa yini ingcindezi kwazise uJeremy Brockie, Emiliano Tade noMichael Boxall abadlale eNew Zealand bafike kuleli bashaya into ecokeme, uDe Jong uthe: “Ngiyaxoxa nabo bobathathu ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi balazi kahle ibhola lakuleli. Angifuni nakancane ukuzifaka ingcindezi. Uma nje ngingenza okumbalwa okwenziwe uTade noBrockie ngingajabula kabi. Kodwa cha, ngeke ngithi ngizofana nabo, nami ngizozakhela igama ngendlela yami."UDe Jong ubesekhempini yoSuthu ebiseGoli, kanti udlalile nakwiMsunduzi Cup eMgungundlovu ngempelasonto.“Ngijabule ngendlela umqeqeshi nethimba lakhe abangethemba ngayo, nabadlali bayangisiza kakhulu ukujwayela ngokushesha. Nginethemba lokuthi inethi ngizoyibhakuzisa. Angifuni kodwa ukuzicindeza, inkani nje uma ngilekelele iqembu laphumelela, yilokho okubalulekile,” kubeka uDe Jong.Usuthu luzovula neBidvest Wits kwi-Absa Premiership ngo-Agasti 3. Umdlalo uzobe useKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza ngo-8.15 ebusuku.
title: OwoSuthu uzolwela indawo kwelesizwe

text: IYABALISA imenenja yoMvoti FC uBongani Msomi ngokudlula emhlabeni komqeqeshi wayo uBheka Phakathi oshone engozini yemoto eyenzeke eGreytown izolo ekuseni.UPhakathi ubematasa neqembu belungiselela ukuyodlala kumaPlay Offs e-ABC Motsepe League ngemuva kokudla umhlanganiso kwiligi yeSafa KwaZulu-Natal.“Zibuhlungu izindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kukaBheka Phakathi. Wenze umsebenzi omkhulu kakhulu. Ngesizini edlule usibeke endaweni yesibili ekubeni efike isizini iphakathi kanti kulokhu usibeke endaweni yokuqala.“Le nto yenzeke ngesikhathi esibi silungiselela amaPlay-Offs. Sihlalele ethembeni lokuthi abadlali bazokwazi ukwenza obekufunwa nguBheka ngoba sebeyazi ukuthi yini elindeleke kubona. Sithi akalale ngokuthula. Okwamanje besingakasithathi isinqumo sokuthi ubani ozovala isikhala sakhe ngoba le nto iseyintsha,” kusho uMsomi.Uveze ukuthi ingozi yenzeke ngemuva kokuthi imoto iqhunyelwe yisondo. Uthe uPhakathi ubehamba nabangani bakhe ababili ngesikhathi kwenzeka ingozi kodwa bona basinda.UPhakathi ubedlala esiswini nasemuva ngezikhathi zakhe esayibamba enkundleni.
