Wayengomunye wezethenjwa ze-Orlando Pirates neLamontville Golden Arrows.Ngaphambi kokuqeqesha uMvoti wayeyiphini lomqeqeshi kwiRoyal Eagles edlala kwiNational First Division (NFD). Uphinde waba yiphini kwi-Arrows ngesikhathi beyikhuphula noShaun Bartlett isuka kwiNFD iya kwiPremiership. Phezu kwalokho uke waba wumhlaziyi webhola kuKhozi FM.
title: Kukhala imenenja yoMvoti FC ngoPhakathi

text: UMHOLI weNFP uNkk Zanele Magwaza-Msibi uziphendulele kumholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema othe kumele amiswe ekubeni yiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezeSayensi nobuChwepheshe ngenxa yesimo sempilo emuva kokushaywa yisifo sohlangothi.UMalema ekhuluma emsakazweni ozinze eGoli, iPower FM noJJ Tabane ongumethuli wohlelo, uthe waze wakhuzwa ngamanye amalungu ale nhlangano ngesikhathi elibeka ngembaba elokuthi uNkk Magwaza-Msibi uholela into engekho ngoba isimo sakhe asisavumi ukuthi asebenze. UMalema uveze ukuthi abaholi abasebenza naye kuleli qembu bakhale ngokuthi ukhombisa ukungabi nazwelo esimeni esibhekene nomengameli weNFP.UNkk Magwaza-Msibi, obezifikele mathupha izolo emahhovisi eSolezwe, uziphendulele kokushiwo uMalema ngaye. Ekhuluma ngomlomo kaNobhala Jikelele weNFP uSolwazi Nhlanhla Khubisa, uthe inkinga yamaqembu aphikisayo anjenge-EFF wukuthi awazihluphi ngokubabuza bona njengeqembu kodwa avele akhulume nje.UNkk Magwaza-Msibi ubekhulunyelwa uKhubisa ngenxa yokuthi kusenzinyana ukukhuluma kuyena ngenxa yokugula.“UMagwaza-Msibi kuningi akwenzela umnyango njengePhini lezeSayensi nobuChwepheshe, ziningi izindawo azihambelayo esiza abafundi. Okunye okuhle ukuthi wakhethwa obengumengameli uJacob Zuma kanti noMengameli omusha uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa akazange asho lutho ngaye njengoba ekade ethula iKhabhinethi entsha,” kuchaza uKhubisa.Ngesikhathi kukhuluma uKhubisa, uNkk Magwaza-Msibi ubelokhu enqekuzisa ikhanda ekhombisa ukuthi uyavumelana nokushiwo unobhala wakhe.UNkk Magwaza-Msibi ubevakashele Isolezwe ngemuva kokuthi eqede umjikelezo wakhe wokugqugquzela abantu ukuthi babhalisele ukuvota ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalwe izikhungo izolo ngo-5 ntambama.Izolo ukhombise obukhulu ubungcono, naye wakuqinisekisa lokho.
title: Uziphendulele kokushiwo uMalema

text: Mhleli: Ngikhathazwa ngabaholi abangayilandeli imithetho yezwe abalawulwa yimizwa yabo. UNgqongqoshe wezabaSebenzi kuzwelonke, uMnuz Thulas Nxesiuthi kumele sihlephulelane ngesinkwa esingekho nabokufika. Uyasithuka singabantu bakule lizwe esalivotela ukuze sizuze inkululeko. Ngabe yiyo le nkululeko yokudelelwa nguNxesi?Siyazi ukuthi sanibeka emandleni kusukela ngo-1994, sicela ningadlali ngathi baholi bethu.Uyabona ngesikhathi kuteleka abamaloli bekhala ngokuthathelwa imisebenzi ngabokufika, impendulo kaNxesi ithe nabokufika kumele baqashwe.Ngabe ubezizwa ukuthi uthini uNxesi uma ekhuluma kanje noma uthathe inkulumo wazoyisho kithina engayihluzanga nhlobo?Uma ethi kumele sibanike imisebenzi abokufika, ngabe usho miphi imisebenzi ?Izovelaphi imisebenzi njengoba sihlaselwe yindlala nokusweleka kwamathuba emisebenzi ezweni, ikakhulu intsha efundile nengafundile?Mhlawumbe le nkulumo ubeyiqondise emndenini wakhe osebenzayo nongaswele hhayi emndenini onezingane ezineziqu zemfundo kodwa okungasebenzi muntu kuyo.Emva kwenkulumo kaNxesi kuvele ukuthi amanye amazwe anjengoZambia, Tanzania, Nigeria athi imisebenzi engadinge buciko nokuyimisebenzi enjengokushayela amaloli, ngeyabomsinsi wokuzimela kulelo lizwe.Lokho kusho ukuthi kabadingi muntu ezweni labo ozofesela ukuba wumshayeli weloli noma unogada noma umsebenzi wasezindlini nokuyizinto esizivumayo kuleli ukuba sithathelwe zona.Ngaphambi kokuba umholi akhulume kumele angene ezicathulweni zabantu abangasebenzi noma zabantu abalala bengadlile.UNxesi ungenze ngabona ukuthi sicindezelana sodwa ezweni futhi sicindezelwa ngabantu esabavotela ukuthi basiphathe.Khabzela KB MzimelaEZWELIBOMVU
title: UNxesi ubukela phansi abasebenzi

text: Ukusho lokhu emuva kokumemezela izindaba zokuthi usezozwakala njalo ngoLwesihlanu ohlelweni lukaDudu Khoza, iJabul’ Ujule, oludlala izingoma ezihlukene.UKhozi lumemezele lezi zindaba ngoLwesibili kulona lolu hlelo.Luphinde lwaziqinisekisa ekhasini lalo enkundleni yokuxhumana i-Instagram lapho luveze ukuthi abantu bakuleli bangaphuthelwa ukulalela izingoma ezizobe zidlalwa ilo DJ.UPrince Kaybee ebhala ngalezi zindaba, uthe ukwemukela ngokuzithoba ukuba ingxenye yoKhozi FM.“Njengoba nizwile nje, lo msakazo umemezela lezi zindaba, sibe nesivumelwano sonyaka nawo, sokuthi ngidlale ohlelweni lukaDudu Khoza.Leli ngelinye ikhasi elisha empilweni yami futhi elikhulu okwakukudala ngilifuna futhi bese ngililinde isikhathi eside,” kusho uPrince Kaybee.Uthe abalaleli boKhozi bazokujabulela ukuzwa izingoma azobe ezidlala njalo emsakazweni.Kuvela lezi zindaba nje uPrince Kaybee ubesanda kujabulela izindaba zokuthi i-albhamu yakhe ethi, Re Mmino ifinyelele esigabeni segolide.Akugcini lapho uphinde waveza ukuthi ingoma yakhe ethi, Fetch Your Life, isilalelwe abantu abayisigidi kuYouTube yize i-video yale ngoma ebengakayikhiphi.UPrince Kaybee izinto zimhambela kahle njengoba ngo-2017 ekhiphe ingoma ethi, Club Controller eyenza kahle kakhulu.Ngonyaka odlule ingoma yakhe ethi Banomoya ayicula noTNS noBusiswa ibe ingoma ehamba phambili yaze yahlukanisa unyaka eziteshini zomsakazo ezihlukene kuleli.
title: Kufezeke iphupho kuDJ engena kuKhozi FM

text: UMISIWE emsebenzini uthisha wasesikoleni iPInnacle College Kyalami, uNkk Sonya De Vynck, kwathi uthishanhloko walesi sikole esiseMidrand, yena wanikezwa ikhefu elikhethekile, emuva kokuba uNkk De Vynck, enze ihlaya, efundisa ngobuchwepheshe, ngokufa kwesakhamuzi sase-US, uMnuz George Floyd. UNkk Vynck kusolwa ukuthi usabise umfundi ngokuthi uma engayithumeli imidwebo uma sekuvulwa kabusha isikole, uzomnikeza into azoyibhikishela bese ehlala entanyeni yakhe.Iningi liyamanise izinsongo zikathisha nokufa kukaFloyd (46), oshonele ezandleni zamaphoyisa amane, elinye lawo elalimcindezele ngedolo entanyeni imizuzu eyisishiyagalolunye- yize ayekhalaza ukuthi akusaphefumuleki, okuyisigameko esabonakala nakwi-video eyasabalala emhlabeni wonke. Izinkumbi zabantu zingene emigwaqweni nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana zifuna kube nobulungiswa ngokufa kukaFloyd ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi Black Lives Matter. UNkk De Vynck ubhale eside isixoliso, ethi akasiye umbandlululi futhi ezisola ngezinsongo zakhe "njengento ewubilima eyavele yaziqhamukela ekhanda". "Ngiyaxolisa ngempela, uyazi ukuthi isiBhunu sibhekana nokusaba nobuhlungu ngehlaya. Sizama ukwenza amahlaya ngakho konke ukwehlisa ubuhlungu. Angisiye umbandlululi, angisoze ngawisa muntu. Ngikhale mi izinyembezi ngoFloyd, nanoma wubani obulawa kanje kuphatha kabi."Encwadini esiyibhalele abazali izolo, isikole sithe: "IPinnacle College Kyalami ishaqekile izinsongo ezenziwe ngomunye wothisha besikole samabanga aphezulu ngesikhathi kuqhubeka izifundo kwi-online. Siyaxolisa ngokungenambandela ngobuhlungu nokuphatheka kabi okudalekile nangendlela oluqale lwasingathwa ngayo lolu daba. Njengoba senazi, uthisha umisiwe. Uthishanhloko uthathe isinqumo sokuhlaba ikhefu... Uphenyo luyaphuthuma futhi luyaqhubeka."Iqhuba le ncwadi ithe isikole sohlela nokuxhumana ngqo nomfundi othintekayo. "IPinnacle College ayilubekezeleli nakancane ubandlululo futhi sizoqinisekisa ukuthi lolu daba lusingathwa ngendlela."
title: Kumiswe uthisha "ohlekise" ngokufa kukaGeorge Floyd

text: UYISE kaSenzo Meyiwa owayengunozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates, uMnuz Sam Meyiwa ushaya phansi ngonyawo uthi ngeke livalwe idokodo lecala lokubulawa kwendodana yakhe esaphila.Ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo ngemuva kombiko wephepha langeSonto obuthi idokodo lecala likaSenzo selivaliwe, uMeyiwa uchaze lo mbiko njengembudane ezomnyusela ushukela.“UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele kade nginaye emqhudelwaneni kaSenzo obuseMlaza wangitshela ukuthi udaba basalulandela. Wangithembisa nokuthi uzohlale engibikela ukuthi kuqhubekani,” kusho uMeyiwa.Uthe amaphoyisa abengeke avale icala lendodana yakhe engambikelanga.UMeyiwa uthe usehlela ukuyobikela Isilo samaBandla uGoodwill Zwelithini ngodaba lukaSenzo nokungakhokhelwa kwakhe yi-Orlando Pirates imali yendodana yakhe.“Sengicabange kahle ngizohamba ngiyozilahla kwiMbube ngiyicele ukuthi ayingenelele kulolu daba ngoba sekudlalwe ngami kakhulu, Isilo sekuyithemba lami lokugcina njengoba kuyisona ubaba wami walapha emhlabeni,” kusho uMeyiwa.Uthe ngeke aze aphumule bungakenzeki ubulungiswa ngokubulawa kukaSenzo.USenzo wabulawa ngo-Okthoba 2014, manje sekuphele iminyaka emine abulawa kodwa akuboshwa muntu.“Sebengamane babulale mina ngoba vele noNkulunkulu sengamcela ukuthi awamukele umphefumulo wami uma kwenzeka ngibulawa,” kusho uMeyiwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke uBrigadier Vishnu Naidoo ukuchithile ukuthi icala likaSenzo selivaliwe wathi lisekhona.Senzo Meyiwa“Udaba lusaphenywa, inkinga wukuthi okwamanje abukho ubufakazi obusha,” kusho uNaidoo.Ebuzwa ukuthi kungani leli cala selisusiswe futhi kumaHawks labuyiselwa kwiSAPS, uthe alikho iphutha kulokho ngoba zombili lezi zinhlaka ziyakwazi ukuphenya amacala okubulala.Imizamo yokuthola uMntwana uThulani Zulu ayiphumelelanga, ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: UMeyiwa usethembe Isilo ngolukaSenzo

text: SEKUSUNGULWE ithimba elizokwenza umsebenzi wokudala ukuthula kusoseshini waseMpumalanga okhungethwe yizinxushunxushu esezidlule nenqwaba yemiphefumulo.Leli thimba elifaka izikhulu zoMnyango wezokuThutha nokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal, ezophiko lwezokuthutha emkhandlwini weTheku, amalungu enhlangano yosomatekisi iSouth African National Taxi Council (Santaco) namaphoyisa lisungulwe nguNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha nokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli.UNtuli uphinde wayalela leli thimba ukuba lithole ukuthi yini isisusa somsindo kusoseshini waseMpumalanga. NgoLwesibili bekunomhlangano eHammarsdale ngenhloso yokuthola isisombululo.Usihlalo weSantaco eNtshonalanga yeTheku uMnuz Mathula Mkhize ethula umbiko wabo emhlanganweni ukhale ngezinkinga eziningi kubalwa nokuthi usoseshini waseMpumalanga awunabo ubuholi.UNtuli uyalele ithimba lakhe ukuba liqhubeke nokuxoxa namalungu kasoseshini.“Sizibophezele ekuqedeni udlame embonini yamatekisi kodwa lokhu ngeke sikuzuze uma amalungu ososeshini engathobi, kuyakhathaza ukuthi yinqwaba yabantu esibulewe ngenxa yombango wangaphakathi kulo soseshini waseMpumalanga kule minyaka edlule,” kusho uNtui.Uthe uma ososeshini bengenawo umthethosisekelo obalawulayo udlame ngeke luphele.UNtuli uthe imali eqoqwa ngendlela engekho emthethweni ivamise ukusetshenziselwa ukuqasha abaqaphi iphinde ikhokhele izinkabi.Uqinise idolo amalungu kasoseshini wathi izinkinga zawo ezikhona kubalwa nemvume yokusebenza zizolungiswa khona maduze.Unxuse amalungu alo soseshini ukuba abumbane, aphinde abike amalungu abhebhethekisa udlame.
title: Ithimba elizoxazulula izinkinga zikasoseshini

text: SEZIQALE phansi izinkinga esikoleni samabanga aphezulu eMbumbulu esacishe savalwa ngenxa yokungaziphathi kahle kwabafundi, asebekhala ngesibhaxu kuthishanhloko.Abafundi baseMbambangwe Secondary abafunda u-matric badube amakilasi izolo nangoLwesithathu bekhala ngokuthi abasakwazi ukubekezelela ukushaywa nguthishanhloko, bakhala nangokuthi uyabathuka. Njengoba abafundi abaningi baka-matric bezoqhubeka nokufunda uma kuvalwa izikole namuhla, abaseMbambangwe abacele ukungadalulwa bathe abalubhadi esikoleni. Bathi sekukaningi bekhononda ngokushaywa manje sebenqume ukulusukumela lolu daba. Izolo bathe sebecele ukubonana nothishanhloko bamtshele okokugcina ngezikhalo zabo.Kuke kwavalwa amehlo ngesimo salesi sikole ngo-2014 kukhalwa ngabafundi abangalawuleki. Abanye babesolwa ngokuzihlanganisa namaqembu ezigebengu bese beqhubeka nezimpi zabo esikoleni. Ngo-2015 kwangenelela ikomidi iMbumbulu Education Forum ukulungisa isimo sesikole obesekuhlongozwa ukuthi sivalwe.USihlalo wekomiti inkosi Nathi Maphumulo, uthe bebengakezwa ngezinkinga zabafundi. Uthe uyadumala uma sebeqala olunye uthuthuva phezu kwemizamo yokulungisa isikole.“Uma abafundi bekhala ngokuqiniswa kwesandla nangokushaywa kumele baveze ubufakazi. Asihambisani nokuhlukunyezwa kwabafundi kodwa ngeke sikhulume futhi ngento engenabo ubufakazi. Kuyadumaza lokhu ngoba isimo sesikole bese sibuyela kwesijwayelekile nathi sesigculisekile. Kuningi osekushintshile ngoba nohulumeni uthembise ukulekelela ukuze kunyuke nemiphumela ka-matric,” kusho uMaphumulo.Uthe ungomunye wabanxenxe iMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede ukuthi ivakashele kulesi sikole nonyaka. UNkk Gumede ovakashile lesi sikole ngoFebhuwari, wanikela ngezimpahla zesikole wathembisa nokuqinisekisa ukuthi isikole senza kahle. UMaphumulo uthe konke lokhu bekuyimizamo yokuthi abafundi bakhuthazeke, isikole singabuyeli esimeni sakudala.Uthembise ukuthi bazolulandela udaba nezikhalo zabafundi.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lesi ngesinye sezikole esike sahlupha ngezinkinga phambilini.“Sizocela umbiko kwisekethe ukuze sithole ukuthi sinjani isimo esikoleni. Kudingeka sazi ukuthi yimiphi imizamo eyenziwayo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukufunda akuphazamiseki, ikakhulukazi njengoba kuthinteka no-matric,” kusho uMlotshwa.Mayelana nezinsolo ezibhekiswe kuthishanhloko uthe badinga ubufakazi ukuze baphenye.
title: Badikile isikole abasola uthisha ngesibhaxu

text: OBENGUMENGAMELI, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ukhale ngamambuka amcindezelayo ngesikhathi ekhuluma nesigejana sabalandeli bakhe ngaphandle kweNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu izolo emuva kokuhlehliswa kwecala lakhe lenkohlakalo eliphathelene nokuthengwa kwezikhali.UZuma uthe amambuka, ayekhona nakudala, asekhona namanje yingakho kukhona nengoma kamasikandi ethi asemaningi kakhulu amambuka.“Amaxoki asemaningi kakhulu kuthi angibulale elinye kodwa ngiyadlala maxoki ngeke ngize nginibulale,” kusho uZuma.Uthe uzolulwa udaba lwecala lakhe kuze kugcine kwenziwe ubulungiswa.UZuma ubonge abalandeli bakhe ngokuhlale njalo bemeseka.“Angifuni ukusho izinto eziningi ngoba kukhona le nto ethi akumele ukhulume ngodaba oluphambi kwenkantolo,” kusho uZuma.Uthe ukuba khona kwabalandeli bakhe kumqinisa idolo.Izolo bekukhona isigejana sabalandeli bakaZuma abebengafikile ngisho ku-150, ngaphandle kwasenkantolo emuva kokuthi kube nokuthi kuhoxiswe amabhasi abesuka esifundeni iMoses Mabhida naseThekwini obekumele athuthe abantu.UMfundisi Vusi Dube uthe bathukuthele bayaveva ngokuhoxiswa kwamabhasi obekuhlelwe ukuthi athuthe abalandeli bakaZuma.Uthe balale bazi ukuthi amabhasi akhona kodwa bathola ama-SMS izolo ekuseni ebatshela ukuthi amabhasi ahoxisiwe.“EThekwini besilindele amabhasi awu-30, eMoses Mabhida khona besilindele awu-35. Ukungabikhona kwamabhasi kwenze ukuthi abantu abaningi bangakwazi ukuza enkantolo kodwa udaba sizolidlulisela kuNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, ngoba thina sazi ukuthi amabhasi awomphakathi aqashwa inoma ngubani owadingayo,” kusho uDube.Uthe bafuna ukwazi ukuthi ngubani othe akuhoxiswe amabhasi.Icala likaZuma nenkampani eyakha izikhali yaseFrance iThales amangalelwe nayo, lihlehliselwe uFebhuwari 4, wonyaka ozayo okuwusuku okulindeleke ukuthi liqale liqulwe ngalo.Izolo ithimba labameli baZuma lifake isicelo sokudlulisa isinqumo senkantolo sangoLwesihlanu lapho kuchithwe khona isiphakamiso sokuthi icala eselidonse iminyaka ewu-15, kuhoxiswe ukuthethwa kwalo.Ukulalelwa kwesicelo sokudlilisa isinqumo senkantolo sokuchitha isicelo sabameli bakaZuma kulindeleke ukuthi kube noNovemba 22.Umshushisi u-Adv Billy Downer izolo utshele inkantolo ukuthi uMbuso usukulungele ukuthi uqhubeke nokuqula icala.Uthe ngonyaka ozayo nabamele iThales bazobe bekhona uma seliqulwa.Kanjalo no-Adv Thabani Masuku wethimba labameli baZuma naye uthe kade bakulungela ukuthi icala liqulwe.
title: Amambuka ayangicindezela: Zuma

text: SIGCINE sitholakele isidumbu sowesifazane omuke nomndeni wakhe eMawoti ngempelasonto. Abezimo eziphuthumayo besebenzisana namaphoyisa izolo ekuseni bathole isidumbu salona wesifazane omuke ngeSonto nengane yakhe noyise wayo.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo, iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), uMnuz Prem Balram uthe izolo bathole ucingo obeluvela ekhanseleni lendawo licela ukuthi basize ukuthola isidumbu.Isidumbu sengane  noyise wayo zona zitholakale kuleli sonto.UBalram uthe bebefuna isidumbu ngendiza enophephela emhlane behambisana namaphoyisa asebenza ngezinja kanti  akuphelanga sikhathi esingakanani amaphoyisa abe esesithola isidumbu eduze kwebhuloho. Isidumbu salona wesifazane sitholakale simbozwe utshani obude kwaze kwasiza inja  ukuze sitholakale. Lo mndeni kuvela ukuthi wamuka ngesikhathi kuna imvula enamandla ngeSonto.
title: Kutholwe isidumbu sowesifazane omuke nomndeni eMawoti

text: Umenywe ukuthi abe yingxenye yomcimbi omkhulu wokubungaza izindawo zokudlela iTaste of Dubai Festival, ezoba seDubai Media City Amphitheatre ngoMashi 7-9.ULorna wohlelo lakwi-SABC 3 iThe Hostess, usephoqeleke ukuthi engeze izinsuku zakhe zokuhambela phesheya kwezilwandle njengoba ehambe kuleli emasontweni amabili edlule ukuyokwethula indondo emcimbini iWorld Restuarant Awards obuseParis ngoFebhruwari 18.Kulo mcimbi kuthiwa uLorna uzothola ithuba lokuhambela izindawo zokudlela eziseqophelweni eliphezulu zaseDubai eziwu-20, lapho ezocobelelana ngolwazi nabanye abapheki.Uzobe ehamba nabapheki abahlonishwayo uMatt Preston we-Mastrchef Australia, uDavid Myers weMichelin nozakwabo uMasaharu Morimoto.Kuthiwa bazobe beholwa phambili yizinkakha zabapheki baseDubai uNick Alvis noScott Price.ULorna ulijabulele leli thuba lokuyobonisa ikhono lakhe phambi kwabapheki abavelele umhlaba wonke.Unethemba lokuthi abantu abazohambela lo mcimbi bazokuthokozela ukudla kwakhe njengoba ehlela ukugadla ngokudla kwaseNingizimu Afrika.Uthe kuzofezeka iphupho lakhe leminyaka njengoba ubehlezi ewubukela kude lo mcimbi waseDubai enesifiso sokuba yingxenye yawo." Sengijahe kabi ukuhlangana nabathandi bokudla abasuka ezindaweni ezahlukene zomhlaba. Ngizimisele ngokujabula, ngihleke kakhulu nokuthi sipheke ndawonye. Kusazoba mnandi ngempela," kusho uLorna.
title: Uzopheka emcimbini omkhulukazi eDubai uLorna Maseko

text: Mbali Khanyile AMADODA amathathu nebhungu elilodwa abesolwa ngokuntshontsha imfuyo adutshulwe afa oKhozini, eZwelibomvu ngoMgqibelo.OSthembiso Sithole (24), Nhlanhla Shange (17), Simphiwe Khanyile (23) noThabani Nene (21) bebengabangani abebelusa izimbuzi endaweni. Badutshulwe enkundleni yezemidlalo ngemva kokuqoqwa ngabebebasola ngokubantshontshela izimbuzi.Kuthiwa ukuntshontshwa kwemfuyo yinto edlangile eZwelibomvu.Yize iningi labantu belisaba ukukhuluma ngodaba kodwa kuvelile ukuthi sebeqedene abantu endaweni ngenxa yokulahleka kwemfuyo. Ababulewe kuthiwa bebeqhamuka ezigodini ezehlukene okubalwa kuzo esasoKhozini nesakwaShabalala, eZwelibomvu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa Kwa-Zulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukubulawa kwamadoda amane.“Kuvulwe amacala amane okubulala esiteshini saKwaNdengezi. Amaphoyisa ayaphenya,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Khonamanjalo kutholakala isidumbu sendoda (35) sinamanxeba okudutshulwa endaweni yaseMangangeni, eZwelibomvu.Isidumbu sendoda edutshulwe ekhanda sitholwe yizingane ebezizingela izimbila ematsheni aseduze nomhosha.UColonel Mbele ukuqinisekisile ukutholakala kwesidumbu.“Icala lokubulala livuwe esiteshini samaphoyisa aKwaNdengezi. Amaphoyisa ayaphenya,” kuphetha uColonel Mbele.
title: Badutshulwe bafa abebesolwa ngokweba

text: BAZOTHWALA kanzima oskhwiliphambana nobhoko abazobe begcaluza emigwaqweni ngesikhathi izwe livaliwe izinsuku ezingu-21.Kuzovalwa thaqa nezindawo ezizobe zihweba ngotshwala isinyenyela nezizobe zidayisa ngokungemthetho, ikakhulukazi emalokishini nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya.Kuzoba nezivimbamgwaqo, kuliwa nobugebengu emiphakathini futhi kunohlelo lokuthungathwa kwezigebengu ezifunwa uthuli amaphoyisa.Kuzoboshwa abashushumbisa izimpahla zomgunyathi nabathutha izimpahla ezingemqoka kakhulu.Lo mbiko oshubile ukhishwe wuNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Bheki Ntuli esithangamni nabezindaba ekomkhulu lamaphoyisa esifundazweni.UNtuli uthe konke kumi ngomumo kusukela emasosheni, emaphoyiseni, kwezobunhloli, nasemaphoyiseni omgwaqo.UNtuli uthe umyalezo ucace bha: “Hlala ekhaya.Sizobe sitholakala kuzo zonke izindawo kusukela emalokishini, emadolobheni, emiphakathini yabadla izambane likapondo nasezindaweni zasemakhaya, siqinisekisie ukuthi ilandelwa njengoba injalo imigomo ebekiwe ngokuvalwa kwezwe wumengameli,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe ugculisekile wugqozi olukhonjiswe abakhuzi bemibutho eyehlukene anethemba lokuthi luzonanela nakwabaphethe abazobe beqinisekisa ukuthi uyagcinwa umthetho.“Amathimba ethu azobe ehambela izindawo ezigcwala kakhulu abantu okubalwa kuzona amabhishi, amapaki, ezokuthutha zomphakathi nezinxanxathela zezitolo. Ngibikelwe ngebanga eselihanjiwe ngophenyo lwamacala angu-22 okuphulwa komthetho, iDisaster Management Act, nezinhlelo ezibekwe wumengameli. Kuyakhathaza ukuthi kunoskhwiliphambana nobhoko abangayigqiziqakala indaba yobhubhane lweCorona,’ kusho uNtuli.Uthe uphoxekile ngabantu ababili ababoshwe bathweswa amacala okuzama ukubulala ngokubhebhethekisa iCoronavirus.“Siyakugxeka ukubukelwa phansi kwezinhlelo zikahulumeni ezilwa nokusabalala kwegciwane. Sibumbe ithimba elizophenya la macala okuzama ukubulala nokuphulwa kweDisaster Management Act.Ngokuboshwa kwalaba ababili sithumela umyalezo wokuthi ngeke zibekezelwe izenzo zobudedengu. Sinxusa abantu ukuthi balandele imiyalelo yabezempilo. Sizozigada izindawo ezigcine abantu abahaqwe igciwane, siqinisekisa ukuthi abeqi. Sifuna kubuyekezwe izinqumo ezithathwe ngabahaqwe igciwane abazivalele ngokwabo emakhaya,” kusho uNtuli.Mayelana nezokuthuthwa komphakathi, uNtuli uthe baxoxisana nobuholi bemboni yamatekisi ngenhloso yokwakha uhlelo lokuthuthwa kwabasebenzi abenza imisebenzi ebucayi nabazobe befuna usizo lwezempilo nezinsiza ezimqoka.Uthe lapha kubhungwa nangokuthi itekisi kumele ilayishe abantu abangaki ngezikhathi zokusebenza.
title: Zizowukhomba umuzi onotshwala izigebengu

text: UKUBA nomqeqeshi okholelwa kubadlali yikho okwenza iqembu lesizwe le-netball, iSpar Proteas, libonakale ligila izimanga kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2019 ebanjelwe eLiverpool, e-England.I-Spar Proteas yenze okungajwayelekile ihlula iJamaica ngo 55-52 emdlalweni wokugcina kaGroup C nokwenze yaqeda iqhwakele eqoqweni layo.IJamaica ikleliswe ngaphezulu kwamaProteas emhlabeni, endaweni yesibili ngemuva kompetha i-Australia.La maqembu aye emdlalweni wangeSonto, iNingizimu Afrika inerekhodi elibi uma ibhekene nezintokazi zaseJamaica, kwazise bese kuphele iminyaka eyisikhombisa ihluleka wukunqoba lezi zimbangi.Emidlalweni ewu-14 edlule elakuleli belisanqobe kabili nje kuphela, lahlulwa kwewu-12.UPhumza Maweni, odlala indawo ye-goal keeper kwiSpar Proteas, ubonge umqeqeshi uNorma Plummer ngokubeseka.“Sijabula kakhulu ukuba siwine umdlalo wanamhlanje (ngeSonto). Besazi ukuthi ngeke kube lula kodwa besazi ukuthi sinomqeqeshi osethembayo noma ngabe yini esiyenzayo. Uhlezi esibuka emehlweni esitshela ukuthi asiyokwenza noma ngabe yini esifuna ukuyenza. Besikulindele ukubhekana nanona iyiphi inselelo,” kusho Maweni.INingizimu Afrika ibekwe endaweni yesihlanu ngokukleliswa emhlabeni okuyindawo engcono uma kubhekwa ukuthi kuleli i-netball isewumdlalo osesigabeni sama-amesha. Yize kunjalo uPlummer uye kwiNdebe yoMhlaba enethemba lokuthi iqembu lakhe lingagcina libalwa namaqembu amane azogcina esele ukulwela izindondo. Elakuleli lagcina ukuthola isiliva ngo-1995 kulo mqhudelwano.Inselelo esihlalele uPlummer nezintokazi wukugudluza iScotland (abadlale nayo izolo ebusuku), i-Uganda abazodlala nayo kusasa ne-England abazoshikilisana nayo ngoLwesine.Kuleli qoqo uGroup G okukhona kulona neJamaica, iNingizimu Afrika izobe ilwela indawo yokuqala noma eyesibili ukuze ingene emidlalweni eyandulela owamanqamu.
title: ISpar Proteas igile izimanga eLiverpool

text: MHLELI: Ngidumele ngenkulumo engehlanga kahle ka-Unathi Nkayi (osesithombeni) oyijaji emncintiswaneni ama-Idols SA osufinyelela emaphethelweni.Siyisizwe kuyiqiniso ukuthi sisazama ukuhlangana nangokobuhlanga njengoba sahlukaniswa ngesikhathi sisacindezelwe ngamabhunu.Uma sithinta izindaba eziphathelene nobuzwe kumele sizame ukulugada ulimi lwethu. Akuwona umkhuba omuhle ukuthi abantu sibabuke ngokobuhlanga kunokuba sibheke amakhono abo abanawo njengoba lenzile ijaji liveza ukuthi lo nyaka owamaXhosa.Ngiyacabanga ukuthi kuyosiza ukuthi ithimba elibhekele ukuqoka amajaji limkhiphe u-Unathi ohlwini lwamajaji akuma-Idols noma aziphumele ngokwakhe. Ukuxolisa kwakhe akuzwakali kahle futhi ngeke kwenze mehluko kulolu qhekeko aludalile ezweni.Makakhishwe u-Unathi kuma-Idols bese ethola abantu abazomeluleka kule nkinga anayo yokucwasa ngokobuhlanga.Sabelo Sigudu
title: Akakhishwe u-Unathi kuma-Idols

text: UMENGAMELI weNatu uMnuz Allen Thompson usenxuse ikomiti lezemfundo esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal ukuthi liqaphe ngelokhozi indaba yesabelo samaqakelo ezikoleni.UThompson uthe abakaze baphikisane nesabelo samaqakelo kodwa ababengahambisani nakho wukwenyuka ngendlela emangazayo kwalesi sabelo.INatu yashaya amakhala ngokunyuka kwesabelo samaqakelo sisuka kuR20 million siya ngaphezulu kukaR100 million.UNgqongqoshe weziMali esifundazweni, uNkk Belinda Scott, wabele amaqakelo uR27 million kulo nyaka wezimali.“Siyawamukela uR27 million wamaqakelo ngoba sasivele singenankinga nendaba yawo. Khumbula ukuthi ayabelwe uR20 million sangaba nenkinga nalokho, into eyasikhalisa ngukuthi inyuke kakhulu imali yamaqakelo yaya koR100 million,” kusho uThompson.Uthe babekhaliswa ngukuthi othisha bakwaGrade R babengakhokhelwa ngesikhathi, izikole zingafakelwa ngesikhathi imali, osonkontileka bengakhokhelwa ngesikhathi, izikole ziphinde zingalungiswa.“Sasikhala ngazo zonke lezi zinto yingakho sasithi kuzona zonke izinkinga ezikhona emnyangweni, indaba yamaqakelo akukaze kwenzeke ukuthi angakhokhelwa. Sifuna ukuthi ikomiti lezemfundo lisiqaphe ngelokhozi lesi sabelo samaqakelo,” kuqhuba uThompson.UNgqongqoshe weziMali kuzwelonke, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, wamemezela ukuthi kunesabelo esihlinzekwe lolu hlelo ukuze amantombazane angalovi esikoleni uma esezinsukwini zawo.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo esifundazweni, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane, uthe uhulumeni kazwelonke usike iphethini kulolu hlelo lwamaqakelo.Uthe noMengameli wezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa umemezele ukuthi lolu hlelo luzoba seMnyangweni wezabesiFazane.“Ithimba ehhovisi likangqongqoshe obhekele abesifazane, ehhovisi likamengameli oholwa nguNksz Bathabile Dlamini lisebenzisane noMnyango wezeMfundo njengoba kwathulwa lo mkhankaso eMpumalanga. Amaqakelo asatshalaliswa ezikoleni ezingoQuintile 1 kuya ku-3. Siyajabula ukuthi uhlelo lwamaqakelo seluthathwe nasemnyangweni kazwelonke,” kusho uDlungwane.Uthe yinto emqoka kuyena ukusatshalaliswa kwawo.
title: ‘Asiqashwe isabelo samaqakelo’

text: ISILOMO somculo kamaskandi, uMthandeni “Igcokama Elisha” Manqele, sidalule ukuthi sikuhoxisile ukwenza kabusha ingoma kaVusi Nova eshisa izikhotha kulezi zinsuku ethi Asiphelelanga ngoba “ngibalekela ukukhuluma”.Kwaba nokukhulu ukukhuluma ngengoma kaVusi ebala abaculi abangasekho njengoba bengekho abakamaskandi. Kwavela ukuthi uhlela ukuyenza kabusha ehambisana neGcokama Elisha.Lokho kwamukelwa ngezindlela ezehlukene njengoba umculi kamaskandi uCevuzile wathi uVusi kumele ababale yena abaculi hhayi ukuthi apike Igcokama Elisha.“Amabhinca avele alwa ngavele ngathi angiyiyeke oCevuzile bayicule bona. Ngiyalihlonipha igama leGcokama Elisha angikufuni ukukhuluma. Umona usuke lapho ekutheni ngiyiGcokama Elisha,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi: “Ngibalekiswe wukuthi lokhu kuzokwehlisa umculo kamaskandi kuthiwe abaculi bakamaskandi abantu abalwa bodwa. Kwakudlalwa ngaye vele uVusi ngoba akekho umuntu onelungelo lokutshela umculi ukuthi ashintshe ingoma yakhe.”Uthe uVusi wayelwenze kahle ucwaningo lwakhe ngoba uye kumculi othandwa ngabantu futhi onabalandeli abaningi.“UVusi wenza izinto ngesikole akavele athathele izinto phezulu. Ubonile ukuthi yimina ophethe isitayela futhi othandwayo.”Uthe sebenze ingoma entsha nalo mculi ethi Thula Mntanami ezotholakala mahhala kusasa ngo-7 ekuseni.Uthe yendlalela i-albhamu yakhe entsha ezophuma ngoDisemba 1 enezingoma athe zizoshisa izikhotha okubalwa kuzo ethi Umhlaba Kafish.
title: Kuhoxe iGcokama kwekaNova

text: IZITOBHA zeBloemfontein Celtic nezeChippa United zinethuba lokuba nesandla ekucaciseni ngozothatha isicathulo segolide, iLesley Manyathela Golden Boot Award, esibangwa uPercy Tau weMamelodi Sundowns noRodney Ramagalela wePolokwane City.Womabili la mafolosi abambene ngamagoli angu-11 kanti asalelwe umdlalo owodwa ukucacisa ngozogoduka nomklomelo.UTau umelwe wukudida u-Alfred Ndengane, Ronald Pfumbidzai noWandisile Letlabika beCeltic uma ezimisele ngokuthola amagoli emdlalweni wokugcina ngoMeyi 12.URamagalela yena kumele asebenzise wonke amangwevu akhe ukumangaza uFares Hachi, Ayabulela Konqobe noJames Okwuosa beChippa uma ezimisele ngokudla lo mklomelo.Lo mgadli wePolokwane ulale isibili nangesizini edlule ngamagoli angu-11. Lesi sibalo sakhe besisele ngamagoli amabili kuLebohang Manyama obedlalela iCape Town City. Akukaze kwenzeke eminyakeni engu-21 ukuthi abagadli bahlukaniselane umklomelo.Lesi sicathulo sihambisana nentshontsho lika-R25 000 kumgadli oqeda isizini eshaye amagoli amaningi emidlalweni yeligi.RODNEY RAMAGALELAIyinkinga indaba yamagoli ngisho kuStuart Baxter umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana. Uma kugcina ngokuthi laba bagadli bayabambana ngamagoli angu-11, kuzoba isibalo esisendaweni yesibili emlandweni ngokushaywa kwamagoli amancane kwisizini yePremier Soccer League (esigabeni esikhulu). Umgadli wokugcina ogoduke nalesi sicathulo eshaye amagoli angu-11 nguKeryn Jordaan (ongasekho) oshaye lesi balo edlalela iManning Rangers ngo-1998. Isibalo esincane kakhulu kodwa esadla isicathulo segolide, sibekwe umgadli weKaizer Chiefs uBernard Parker ngokuhlohla amagoli ayishumi kumasizini amane edlule.UCollins “Ntofontofo” Mbesuma wuyena umgadli osazihambela yedwa ngokubeka isibalo samagoli amaningi ngesizini njengoba enzile ngo-2004/2005 eshayela iChiefs amagoli angu-25.UTau uya kulo mdlalo weCeltic uzobe ekhululekile kwazise vele sebesidlile isicoco seligi, kanti uRamagalela kuhlukile okwakhe njengoba iPolokwane isesendaweni engenzi bonke abaxhumene nayo bakhululeke.Laba bagadli balandelwa uGift Motupa weBaroka FC yena onamagoli ayisishiyagalolunye bese elandelwa uKhama Billiat weSundowns no-Evans Rusike weSuperSport United, bona abanayisishiyagalombili. ULux September okhulumela iPSL uthe banethemba lokuthi kukhona ozoshaya amagoli phakathi kukaTau noRamagalela emidlalweni yokugcina.“Okwamanje asikanqumi ukuthi sizokwenzenjani uma begcina bebambene ngamagoli. Sizobhekana nalokho uma sekwenzekile. Kodwa ukukhuluma iqiniso okwamanje angazi ukuthi yikuphi okungase kwenziwe uma begcina benamagoli alinganayo,” kuchaza uSeptember.
title: Kuzocacisa izitobha ngomklomelo wamagoli

text: ISIMEMEZELOse-Eskom sokuthi izocisha ugesi ngezikhathi ezithile sesiqubule itwetwe njengoba siqondene nokuqala kokubhalwa kwezivivinyo zika-matric zokuphela konyaka.Inkampani ephakela ngogesi i-Eskom ikhiphe isimemezelo izolo.Esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba ngokhulumela uMnyango weMfundo eyiSisekelo kuzwelonke, uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uthe ukuphazamiseka kokuphakelwa kukagesi ngalesi sikhathi kuzoba nomthelela ongemuhle kubafundi abalungiselela ukubhala izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka okuqale izolo.“Sizoxoxa ne-Eskom ngenhloso yokuwuqaphelisa ngemiphumela engemihle engadalwa ukunqanyulwa kwamandla kagesi njengoba sekuqale izivivinyo zika-matric kuzwelonke,” kusho uMhlanga.Uthe zikhona izinhlelo umnyango onazo ezizosetshenziswa ukubhekana nalesi simo uma kukhona abafundi abangakwazi ukubhala ngenxa yaso. Khonamanjalo, uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, uye esikoleni iGeorge Campbell Technical eyokhuluma nabafundi ebafisela ukubhala okuhle sekusele isikhathi esingaphansi kwehora kuqalwe ukubhalwa kwe Computer Applications Technology izoloBangu-3 600 abafundi kulesi sifundazwe obekulindeleke ukuthi babhale lesi sifundo.Ekhuluma nabafundi uMshengu uthe bathwele amathemba esifundazwe ekwenzeni kahle kakhulu kulo nyaka uma sekumenyezelwa imiphumela ka-matric.“Njengoba niqala ukubhala izivivinyo zenu sinifisela okuhle kodwa futhi siyathemba ukuthi nizoliphakamisa izinga kulo nyaka lokuphasa * -matric. Siyasiqonda isimo enikuso njengoba nathi sike saba ngabafundi baka-matric. Sazi kahle ukuthi uzizwa kanjani uma sekuyilesi sikhathi kodwa bhalani ngokuzimisela nazi ukuthi ngokwenza kahle, kungekhona kuphela kulesi sifundo enisibhala namuhla (izolo) kodwa nakwezinye, kuzolekelela ukuthi sithole * - 100% njengoba kuyisifiso sethu ukuthi niphase nonke,” kusho uMshengu.Ukugcizelele ukuthi umnyango wakhe ubufuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukuqala kwezivivinyo zokuphela konyaka akunazihibe kufiselwe nabafundi okuhle.Bangu-13 abafundi kulesi sikole ababhale leli phepha. UMuziwamajama Dlamini (17) waseMlaza, ongomunye wabafundi abebebhala leli phepha, uthe uyazethemba kakhulu.“Anginalo nakancane uvalo. Ngizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ngiyaphumelela,” kusho uMuziwamajama.Lesi sifundo sisezifundweni ezingu-12 ezintsha ezikoleni.
title: Itwetwe kuphela ugesi kubhalwa

text: UKHATHAZWA eyokugqoza kwamagoli eqenjini lakhe umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, njengoba sebehluleke kulandelana wukuqoqa amaphuzu emidlalweni abebesalele ngayo emuva kwamanye amaqembu ku-Absa Premiership.UMosimane uveze lokho ngemuva kokuthi labo mpetha banyakenye beligi bephinde bahluleka wukuqoqa amaphuzu emdlalweni weligi ngempelasonto beguqiswa yiKaizer Chiefs ngo-2-1.Lona bekuwumdlalo wesine kuligi amaBrazilians ehluleka wukuqoqa amaphuzu. Okusho ukuthi emidlalweni emine abebengathatha kuyona amaphuzu angu-12 basakwaze ukuqoqa amabili kuphela.ISundowns idlale ngokulingana neChippa United ngo-0-0, yashaywa iCape Town City ngo-1-0, yabelana ngamaphuzu nePolokwane City kuba ngu-0-0 yase ishaywa iChiefs. Igcine ukunqoba umdlalo ithela phansi iBidvest Wits ngo-2-0.Le miphumela emibi isho ukuthi kumele nakanjani labo mpetha bavuke bazithathe uma sebetholene neBloemfontein Celtic namuhla.Umdlalo useLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli ngo-7.30 ebusuku.“Iqiniso wukuthi silahle amaphuzu emidlalweni emine edlule. Into ekhona siyawakha amathuba kodwa asiwashayi amagoli. Ngeke ngithi angigculisekile ngeqembu lami kodwa kuyangikhathaza ukuthi uma sesifika phambili asiwasebenzisi amathuba ethu. Ngethemba ukuthi sizofunda kulokhu osekwenzekile siqhubekele phambili,” kusho uMosimane ngemuva komdlalo weChiefs.AmaBrazilians ayibambe endaweni yesihlanu ku-log ngamaphuzu angu-34. Uma enqoba azobambana ngamaphuzu neSuperSport United esendaweni yesine ngawu-37. Kuzomele leli qembu likaMosimane lingabe lisabheka emuva noma selidlala nawo Amatsatsantsa a Pitori ngo-Ephreli 13 kwazise nemidlalo elisele ngayo emuva iya ngokuncipha.“Ukuhlulwa kwethu (yiChiefs) akusho ukuthi sekuphelile ngathi ngokunqoba isicoco seligi,” kusho uMosimane.ISundowns, ephinde ilinyalelwe abadlali yize kuyinto uMosimane athe ngeke avike ngayo, kusazoyishubela njengoba inemiqhudelwano emithathu eyibambe kuyona. Ngaphezu kokulwela ukuvikela isicoco se-Absa Premiership, ivikela eseCAF Champions League esingene esigabeni samaqoqo kuyona. Kukhona neNedbank Cup lapho bezodlala neLamontville Golden Arrows ngoMgqibelo esigabeni seLast 16. KuCeltic iDowns izohlangana neqembu eliwadingayo amaphuzu kwazise ifuna ukuqhela emaqenjini abhekene nezembe. Ngempelasonto iPhunya Sele Sele ibuye namaphuzu agcwele kuPolokwane City.
title: UPitso ukhala ngeshwa emapalini

text: IGQEMEKE engeqiwa ntwala i-NFP ngokulaxazwa iphini likaMengameli wayo elikhale ngokungaphathwa ngendlela kweqembu.UNkk Sindi Maphumulo Mashinini umemezele izolo ntambama kuFacebook ukuthi useyavalelisa kuNFP ngemuva kweminyaka eyisishiyagalombili eyisebenzela.Ethintwa Isolezwe uthe akukho abengakwenza kodwa uphoqekile ukuba ayishiye i-NFP.“Leli qembu ngilisebenzele ngakho konke enginakho ngisho nangezimali zomuzi wami. Bengisebenzisa nezimoto zami ngizifakela uphethroli ngiphinde ngizilungisele. Akugcini lapho esifundazweni iMpumalanga iNFP ngiyifakele amakhansela amahlanu kusuka ngo-2011 ngisebenzile ngobuqotho. Nokho ngibongile ngoba akekho noyedwa obejabulela ebengibenzela khona. Okunye ngike ngakhala ngendaba yokuvunyelwa kukaMnuz Canaan Mdletshe nendodana kaMengameli uZanele kaMagwaza Msibi ukuba bathamele imihlangano yesigungu esiphezulu. Bengivele ngitshelwe ukuthi uMdletshe uzoba yiso nezindlebe zikaMengameli"Bengibuza ukuthi uma kunjalo yini angangeni ephalamende amphelezele ukuze sibone ukuthi uyizindlebe zakhe. Nendodana yakhe uMelusi ngasho ngathi uma beziphatha kanje balimaza umlando omuhle kamama wabo,” kusho uNkk Maphumulo Mashinini.Uthe nakuba eyishiya i-NFP kodwa akanankinga noKaMagwaza-Msibi ngoba abantu abayinkinga abasondelene naye.Ngonyaka odlule uNkk Maphumulo Mashinini ufake iqembu enkantolo efuna ukaMagwaza-Msibi anekele inkantolo ukuthi ngabe uyakwazi yini ukubhala nokukhuluma.Wayekwenza lokhu ngoba engakholwa ukuthi izinqumo okwakuthiwa zivela kuye zokuhlakaza isigungu esiphezulu kwakungezakhe.Uthe usamhlonipha namanje futhi ufunde lukhulu kuye kusuka beseku-IFP.Uveze ukuthi kumanje i-NFP imkweleta imali engaphezulu kuka-R200 000, abekhokhela ngayo amahhovisi nezisebenzi.Okhulumela ukaMagwaza-Msibi, uMnuz Cannaan Mdletshe, uthe bashaqekile ngokuthola ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi uNkk Maphumulo Mashinini usebashiyile.Uthe akudikizi ngisho inqulu ngokuhamba kwakhe.
title: Uvalelise kuFacebook oweNFP olaxaze iqembu

text: Akubanga mnandi kubalandeli bamaBrazilians ukungawunqobi lo mdlalo, ikakhulukazi njengoba iChiefs “ilahlile” yashaywa iBidvest Wits emdlalweni oqale ngaphambi koweSundowns.Lokhu bekunika iSundowns ithuba lokuba iqhwakele kwi-log okokuqala ngemuva konyaka kubusa Amakhosi esicongweni se-log. Empeleni ukunqoba kweSundowns kwiBaroka bekuzosho ukuthi sekumele inqobe imidlalo emibili elandelayo bese isivikela ngempumelelo isicoco.Kube yimbibizane ehlangane noMosimane nezakhe, nabo beshaywa ngomphumela ofana nse noweChiefs.“Niyohleze niyiqembu elidlalela ukuvika izembe nina,” uqale washo kanje uMosimane kanti amakhamera ethelevishini ayayiqopha yonke inkulumo yakhe.Akagcinanga lapho njengoba ehlale izithonto kunozinti weBaroka * -Ayanda Dlamini.“Leli qembu libaphethe impela onozinti balo abaziwisayo, bahambise isikhathi. Bengithi banoChipezeze (Elvis) kuphela, kodwa lo obevimbile engingamazi naye uyayenza into yakhe. Engabe ibakhiqizaphi iBaroka labo nozinti,’’ kubhuqa uMosimane kwiSuperSport.Lezi zinkulumo beziveza ngokusobala ukuthi uMosimane uyakuqonda ukuthi balahle ithuba lokunqoba isicoco seligi. Imidlalo emibili elandelayo yeSundowns, izodlala namaqembu avika izembe iPolokwane City neBlack Leopards.“Uma izinto ebholeni zingahambi kahle, angithandi ukuthi ngibeke izaba. Sishaywe ngoba asiwasebenzisanga amathuba ethu futhi sehlulekile ukumaka kahle ebhokisini kwikhona egcine isidlile. Yilokho nje okusidlisile,” kusho uMosimane.Bakhona abangathi bekumele yenze kangcono iSundowns, kwazise bese bevele bewazi umphumela wokuthi iChiefs isishaywe iWits.“Ngeke ngaphumela obala ngithi abadlali bebazi ukuthi iChiefs idlale kanjani, angazi. Abadlali bebhola ngeke ubazi, uzothola ukuthi bese betshelene nokungenzeka kubenze bashintsha indlela ababuke ngayo lo mdlalo. Ngeke futhi ngipeqululane nomakhalekhukhwini babadlali, ngenhloso yokuthola ukuthi yini esebeyazi nabangayazi. Angifuni ukwenza izaba, sihluliwe kwaphela,” kuqhuba uMosimane.Kuselukhuluni satshe okwamanje ukusho ukuthi isicoco seligi sizoya ngakuphi, yize iChiefs isethubeni elingcono ngenxa yamagoli.
title: Intukuthelo namazwi ayiziswana iDowns ishaywa yiBaroka

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa usejube iSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU) ukuthi iphenye noma yiziphi izinsolo zenkohlakalo ezithinta ukuthengwa kwempahla ngesikhathi sikathaqa.URamaphosa uthe labo abaphula umthetho uma kuthengwa impahla bazobhekana nengalo yomthetho.“Ngizobe ngithola umbiko emuva kwamasonto ayisithupha uvela kwiSIU mayelana nophenyo esilwenzile. Sifuna kubuyiswe yonke imali edliwe, noma uma izimpahla ezithengiwe zibiza kakhulu, noma iyiphi impahla eyathengwa uma kukhona okusolisayo izophenywa,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe noma ngubani owenze umkhonyovu uzobhekana nomthetho.“Ngeke silinde kuze kuphele iCoronavirus ngoba igciwane lizohlala nathi isikhathi, yingakho esikwenzayo sikusheshisa manje. Ngiyabancoma omasipala asebeqalile nezinhlelo zokuqondisa ubugwegwe abathintekayo enkohlakalweni,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe abantu bayazigqoka izifonyo wathi izwe alikaze libhekane nenhlekelele efuze le yecorona.“Nginxusa abantu ukuthi baqine, baphephe ngalesi sikhathi. Lesi sikhathi esinzima sizodlula ezweni lethu.”Uxolisile ngokubambezeleka ekukhokheni imali yalabo abangasebenzi okunguR350 ngenyanga. Uthe imali isazokhokhwa izinyanga eziyisithupha wathi sebekhokhele abangu-4.5 million. Uthe sebengu-408 052 kuleli abaneCorona.Uthe umngcwabo wesishoshovu somzabalazo uMnuz Andrew Mlangeni uzoba sezingeni loMbuso.
title: Uphenyo lweSIU ngenkohlakalo ngomvalelandlini

text: intatheli yesolezweUJ anusz Walus, indoda eyabulala umholi weSA Communist Party, uMnuz Chris Hani, maduze nje izokwazi ukuthi ngabe isicelo sokukhululwa ngoshwele ejele siyaphumelela yini noma cha. Lokhu kushiwo yiNkantolo yasePitoli izolo.UWalus watholwa enecala wagwetshwa ngomhla ka 10 Ephreli 1993 ngokubulala uHani. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi phambilini iNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli yasichitha isicelo esifakwe nguhulumeni sokuphikisa isinqumo sokukhishwa kukaWalus ngoshwele.UNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa, uMichael Masutha, nguye owafaka lesi sicelo enkantolo. UMasutha usethe umbuso uzofundisisa kahle isinqumo seNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli sokuba kudedewe uWalus.Sekuphele iminyaka engu-23 uHani adutshulwa washona engaphandle komuzi wakhe eBoksburg.“Bengicabanga ukuthi bengizokwazi ukukhipha isinqumo namhlanje kodwa akwenzekanga. Ngokulalela konke osekushiwo sengifuna ukucabangisisa kahle,” kusho ijaji Nicolene Janse Van Nieuwenhuizen.“Okwamanje ngiseNkantolo iPalm Ridge Criminal Court. Ngizobhala isinqumo esizobe sesimenyezelwa womunye wozakwethu ePitoli,” kusho uJanse Van Nieuwenhuizen.Ngaphambi kokuba iguqe inkantolo, uJanse van Nieuwenhuizen utshele u-Advocate Gcina Malindi ukuba akhuze ikilayenti lakhe, (esho amalungu eSACP abehhomuzela abanga umsindo.)“Wena njengomuntu womthetho akungabazeki ukuthi uyazi ukuthi kumele kuhlonishwe umthetho wenkantolo,” kukhuza ijaji Janse Van Nieuwenhuizen.Amalungu eSACP nonkosikazi kaHani ongumfelokazi, uLimpho, bebeyigxeka indlela iJaji Janse van Nieuwenhuizen ebeliphethe ngayo lolu daba lukaWalus lokucela ushwele.Umfelokazi kaHani, uthe akasoze ayixolela indoda eyathatha impilo yomyeni wakhe.UWalus ufuna ukukhululwa ngokushesha ngoshwele, ngesikhathi kusalindwe isicelo esifakwe nguNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa nokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo, u-Adv Michael Masutha eNkantolo eNkulu yokwedluliswa kwamacala.UMasutha usenqume ukuphikisa isinqumo senkantolo sokuthi kukhishwe ngoshwele uWalus.U-Advocate Roelof du Plessis, omele uMalus, uthe ikilayenti lakhe lithwele kanzima ejele.“Uma kutholakala mhlawumbe ngonyaka ozayo ukuthi ikilayenti lami (Walus) bekufanele likhululwe ngoshwele, ingabe bazokwazi yini ukumbuyisela lowo nyaka olahlekile awuchithe ejele ekubeni esenikezwe ushwele?” kubuza u-Adv Du Plessis ebhekise kuJanse van Nieuwenhuizen.
title: Umbulali kaHani uzokwazi maduze ngesicelo sikashwele

text: IBAMBA lesikhulu esiphezulu kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) uMato Madlala liphumele obala lachaza mayelana nokuthi kungani iTheku lihlale linikwa imidlalo yamanqamu.Kube nemvunge ngeledlule ngesikhathi iPSL imemezela ukuthi umdlalo wamanqamu weTelkom Knockout uzodlalelwa ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.ITheku seliyisingathe yonke imidlalo yamanqamu yePSL kulo nyaka. Leli dolobha yilona elisingathe umdlalo wamanqamu weNedbank Cup lapho iSuperSport ibhudluze khona i-Orlando Pirates ngo 4-1 eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ekupheleni kwesizini edlule.Kuthe kusenjalo iMoses Mabhida Stadium yanikwa elinye ithuba lokusingatha umdlalo wamanqamu weMTN 8 phakathi kweSuperSport United neCape Town City. NgoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama iBidvest Wits izodudulana neBloemfontein Celtic ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.UMadlala ubekhuluma nabezindaba eMabhida izolo emini. “Ziningi izinto esizibhekile ngaphambi kokuthi siphume nesinqumo sokuletha umdlalo wamanqamu eThekwini. Sonke siwubonile umdlalo weKaizer Chiefs neBidvest Wits eBidvest Stadium elayisha abantu abangu-4 000. Umdlalo wahamba kahle kakhulu nezokuphepha zaziqondile. Bekuyisicelo sabaxhasi ukuthi umdlalo wamanqamu udlalelwe elokishini laseThekwini okuyinto eqalayo ukwenzeka. Basinike izinkundla ezahlukene abebengathanda ukuthi umdlalo udlalelwe kuzona. Izinkundla ezimbili zaseThekwini beziseqhulwini ohlwini,” kusho uMadlala.Amathikithi abiza u-R40 abadala kanti ezinganeni awu-R15. Aseqalile ukutholakala ezitolo. “Siyiligi sixhumane namaqembu amane abesele kuma-semi final eTelkom ngenkundla angathanda ukudlalela kuyona umdlalo wamanqamu. Sibanikile izinkundla abangakhetha kuzona. Wonke amaqembu amane akhethe iTheku. Isinqumo esisithathayo sisithatha ngokuyalelwa abaxhasi ngoba basuke benohlelo. Abaxhasi baqoke amadolobha amabili. Isinqumo sokuthi umdlalo wamanqamu udlalwa kuphi akusona esePSL yodwa. Asizikhetheli ukuthi le midlalo iya kuphi. Amaqembu asuke eyingxenye yomqhudelwano anesandla esikhulu ekutheni umdlalo uzoya kuphi. Wonke amaqembu abekuma-semi final aqoke iTheku futhi yingakho silapha,” kuchaza uMadlala.Isikhulu sakwaTelkom uCambridge Mokonyane naso siphumele obala ngesinqumo sokuletha kowamanqamu eThekwini. “Ngiyazi ukuthi kuzothiwa lo mdlalo siwulethe eThekwini ngoba unkosikazi wami ungowalapha kodwa inhloso yethu wukuxhumana nokusondelana namakhasimende ethu sisebenzisa ibhola. Imidlalo emibili edlule yamanqamu idlalelwe ePolokwane naseMbombela. Ngesikhathi sithatha isinqumo ngenkundla ezosingatha umdlalo wamanqamu asizange sinanaze. Besazi ukuthi sizowuyisa eThekwini. ITheku liyayigcwalisa inkundla. Abantu basuka ezindaweni ezahlukene beze enkundleni uma kudlalwa eThekwini. Awasekho amaqembu amancane manje. Ayisekho imidlalo yamanqamu emincane. Womabili la maqembu adlala kowamanqamu akufanele ukwesekwa,” kusho uMokonyane.
title: UMato nencazelo ngokuqokwa kweTheku njalo

text: AKHALELWE ngamasongo kaSigonyela amaphoyisa eSAPS abanjwe ephula imithetho kathaqa ngempelasonto, amahlanu kuwo abanjwe ephuza utshwala ethaveni. Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuleli, uBrigadier Vishnu Naidoo, uthi kuboshwe amaphoyisa amahlanu asesiteshini samaphoyisa eNamaha, ePhuthaditjhaba eFree State abeyingxenye yabantu ababanjwe bephuza utshwala ethaveni yendawo ngoMqgibelo. Uthe lawa maphoyisa acele empunzini ngesikhathi ebanjwa oqotsheni ephuza ngoMgqibelo kodwa agcina eboshiwe ngeSonto kulandela ukusabalala kwezithombe zabo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. "Kuboshwe nomnikazi wethaveni oneminyaka ewu-44 ophule umthetho wokuvalwa kokudayiswa kotshwala. Kushaqwe bonke utshwala, ithaveni yavalwa. Amaphoyisa azobekwa icala lokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho ngokunjalo nokuphula imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe," kusho uNaidoo. Kwesinye isigameko, ngoMgqibelo kuboshwe amanye amaphoyisa ayisithupha aseziteshini zamaphoyisa iBrooklyn neSilverton ePitoli asolwa ngokweba uR30 000 kubantu ababemiswe kwisivimbamgwaqo. Amaphoyisa aboshwe mgemuva kokubikelwa kweMpumalanga Anti-Corruption Unit ngaleli sigameko. NgokukaNaidoo, amaphoyisa kuthiwa aqale afuna ukugwazelwa ngoR100 ngemuva kokuthola ukuthi umshayeli nabagibeli ababili ayehamba nabo babenganayo incwadi ebagunyaza ukuthi babe semgwaqeni njengoba livaliwe izwe ngenxa yeCovid-19. Kuthiwa ngemuva kokuhluleka ukuthola uR100, kuthiwa amaphoyisa asesha imoto atshontsha uR30 000. UNaidoo uthe bafuna ukudlulisa umyalezo oqinile emaphoyiseni ngokuboshwa kwalawa maphoyisa ukuthi aziqhelelanise nokwephula umthetho.
title: Kuboshwe amaphoyisa abanjwe ebudlonya ethaveni

text: BEBEHLUNGA imithi engashile emlotheni abadayisi bemithi basemakethe yaseThekwini, eseduze kweBerea Station, abafike isitoko sabo sesishe sangqongqa izolo ngemuva kokuthi kuqubuke umlilo ngeSonto ebusuku kule ndawo.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abadayisi abangaphezu kuka-60 bashelwe yizitolo zabo ezisemakethe yemithi ngenxa yomlilo obusha ubuhanguhangu ngeSonto ebusuku.Izolo, uNkk Lindiwe Ngcobo (44), utshele Isolezwe ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka engu-20 edayisa imithi emakethe kodwa kuyaqala ngqa ukuthi kube nomlilo oshisa yonke impahla yabo.“Asazi sizothathani siyihlanganise nani ngoba imithi siyayithenga bese izinyanga nezangoma ziyithenga kithina. Ngishelwe yisitoko senyanga yonke, angazi ngizowakhokhela ngani amakhosikazi aKwaMhlabuyalingana engithenga kuwo imithi. Sizama ukucosha imithi engashile kuyimanje, siyihlunga emalahleni asazi sizokwenze njani,” kusho uNkk Ngcobo.Uthe abakwaMasipala weTheku bathe bazophenya ngembangela yomlilo ngoba abazi ukuthi uqubukephi njengoba abadayisi befike sekusha.Abanye abadayisi bathe basuka eMkhomazi befuna ukuzobona lo monakalo, abanye bebezibhongqa phansi bengafuni nokukhuluma nezintatheli.Imakethe yemithi iyavalwa njalo ebusuku, iphinde ibe nonogada abayiqaphayo.UMnuz Nkulumo Dube wezicishamlilo eThekwini, uthe bafike emakethe yemithi ngabo-10 ebusuku bacisha umlilo ngamaloli amathathu nezicishamlilo ezingu-15.Uthe akekho umuntu olimele kulo mlilo kanti ngamaphoyisa azophenya ngembangela yomlilo.ABANYE abadayisi abashelwe yizindawo zabo zemithi bebengafuni ngisho nokukhuluma nezintatheli bebuka izicishamlilo ebezimatasa nokucima Isithombe: Motshwari Mofoken/African News Agency (ANA)UMnuz Mandla Nsele, oyiPhini leNhloko yezokuXhumana kuMasipala weTheku, uthe uphiko lwabahlola indawo yezigameko emaphoyiseni luzophenya ngembangela yomlilo futhi bazokhipha umbiko ophelele ngokuthi mngakanani umonakalo uma sebethole imiphumela yophenyo.“Uma abaphenyi bethi ayivalwe imakethe ngesikhathi besaphenya sizokwenza njalo. Okwamanje sizonika abadayisi indawo yokuhweba yesikhashana,” kusho uNsele.ULt Colonel Zwane wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bawutholile umbiko ngomlilo emakethe yemithi kodwa akekho ovule icala ngalesi sigameko.
title: Bafe olwembiza kusha imithi emakethe

text: INKAKHA yentatheli yakwaSABC futhi esizakhele okukhulu ukuhlonishwakuKhozi FM ngenxa yezinhlelo zezindaba ezethula kulo msakazo, uBongani ‘Qhawe’ Mavuso, isanda kushicilela incwadi yayo engeka-14 esihloko sithi, The Undying Spirit of a Dead Man.Lo methuli wohlelo oluthi Abasiki Bebunda noluthi Ezangempelasonto, uhlanganise izinkondlo ezilotshwe ngolimi lwesiNgisi ngenhloso yokwethulela isigqoko izishoshovu zomzabalazo zakuleli. “Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika igubha iminyaka engu-100 yomakadebona bomzabalazo abangasekho uMnuz Nelson Mandela nobaba u-Albertina Sisulu okuyisikhathi sokugubha kwabo iminyaka engu-100 bazalwa, ukube basaphila ngabe bagubha nathi leyo minyaka.”Le ncwadi kaMavuso iphinde idwebe isithombe esigqamile ngezigigaba ezehlukene ezikhungathe izwekazi i-Afrika ngakwezepolitiki nenhlalo. Izimo ezikhungethe iNingizimu Afrika neZimbabwe ngakwezepolitiki zigqama kakhulu ezinkondlweni eziqukethwe yile ncwadi okubalwa kuzo ethi Zimbabwe My Blood nethi The Gupta Syndrome.“Njengembongi ngikubone kufanele ukuthi ngisebenzise usiba ekuzwakaliseni imizwa yami ngezindaba ezithinta impilo yomuntu jikelele ezwenikazi lase-Afrika. Lona ngumnikelo wami eshungwini lobuciko bamazwi alotshwe phansi. Kufanele sikuvikela ukunotha komlando wezwekazi ngokubhala ngazo zonke izigameko ezithinta ngqo abantu abakhele izwekazi. Ngaphandle kolwazi olusezincwadini, isizwe ngeke sikwazi ukuthuthuka ngokugcwele,” kuphetha uBongani.Leli ciko selingumakadebona kulo mkhakha njengoba selibhale izinkondlo iminyaka engaphezu kuka-12. Izincwadi zesiZulu azishicilele zibandakanya esihloko sithi Izimbali Zemfolozi ngo-2015, okungenye yezincwadi zakhe ezithengwa kakhulu, Izintombi Zengcugce ngo-2018 efundwa e-Unisa, Inhlansi ayiloba ngokuhlanganyela nozakwabo, uNhlakanipho Zulu. UBongani akasagcini ngokubhala kodwa usebuye avumbulule futhi athuthukise izimbongi ezisakhasayo okubalwa kuzo uSiyabonga Mpungose noMaGcwabe ohlabane nyakenye ngeBest Poet kumaSatma Awards. Lezi zimbongi uzivumbulula ezinkundleni zokucobelelana ngolwazi nasemiqhudelwaneni ayisingatha KwaZulu-Natal namaphethelo. Nyakenye uBongani wethule inkampani yakhe eshicilela izincwadi iKaMavuso Publishers ezoqhubeka nokuvundulula amakhono ababhali, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zasemakhaya futhi abagxile kakhulu ezincwadini zesiZulu.UBongani uphinde waba nesandla esikhulu ekusungulweni kwengosi yezinkondlo iBack to My Roots kuKhozi FM ngo-2005, alwethula ngokubambisana noDudu ‘Lady D’ Khoza ngoLwesihlanu futhi uphinde abe nengosi eshicilela izinkondlo ngoLwesihlanu kwiSolezwe. Izincwadi zikaMavuso ziyatholakala ezitolo ezithengisa izincwadi. Ungakwazi nokuzithola kuye ngokuthumela isicelo ku-email ethi [email protected]
title: OwoKhozi ushicilele incwadi engeka-14

text: MANINGI amagama ongawasebenzisa ukuchaza uSimangele “Sma” Mathibeli.Ungusomabhizinisi, umlingisi futhi ungumdidiyeli wezihlelo zomsakazo.“Umama watshala imbewu yokuthi ngingabavumeli abantu ukuthi bangitshele ukuthi ngibe wubani kunalokho kumele ngibe wumuntu engiwuye. Njengegama lami uSimangele, ngizolokhu ngimangaza abantu ngokuthi yini engingakwazi ukuyenza nokuyizuza,” kusho uSma.Le ntokazi izalelwe eDiepkloof, eSoweto, yakhuliswa wuninakhulu, unina noyisekazi. Uthe laba besifazane babenganqeni ukusho abakucabangayo ngisho lokho kuyinto eyayingababangela isigcwagcwa kwabanye.USma uthe nguye yedwa intombazane kubo. Uzalwa nezinsizwa ezimbili ezingafuni lutho ngaye.“Ukukhula kwami kwakungahlukile kunezinye izingane zaselokishini ezazicabanga ukuthi indlala yinto eyejwayelekile kuze kube ngiyahlakanipha.”Uthe kusuka ekhula wayazi ukuthi uhlukile kunabanye ngendlela ayecabanga ngayo.“Angicabangi ukuthi kukhona umuntu ongafunda ukukwazi ukuqhamuka nezinto ezintsha, ngazalwa nginje kodwa ngase ngithola olunye ulwazi ukuthuthukisa ithalente lami.”Le ntokazi izakhele udumo njengomlingisi ngesikhathi idlala indawo kaNomsa kwiYizo Yizo. Eminye imidlalo eke yadlala kuyo yiScandal! Gaz’lam neZone 14 kuSABC 1 lapho ayelingisa khona indawo kaMadi.Ngaleso sikhathi wayengumdidiyeli omkhulu wezinhlelo zeGagasi FM iMidday Madness ne-Afternoon Show-off.Ngo-2011 ujoyine Ukhozi FM njengomdidiyeli wohlelo lwasekuseni iVuka Mzansi eyayenziwa nguLinda “Mr Magic” Sibiya ngaleso sikhathi. Wajoyina ngemuva kokuthi owayeyididiyela uZandile Tembe wathola isikhundla sokuba wumphathi wezinhlelo.Kulo nyaka ushiyile kulo msakazo esedidiyela uhlelo lwantambama iWoza Nabangani Bakho noS’giya Ngengoma.“Uthando enginalo lwalezo zinto aluchazeki. Angikaze ngiyishiye ithelevishini noma umsakazo kodwa ngasula enkampanini ethile ukuze ngikhule. Njengamanje ngisazibuza ngiziphendula ukuthi ngisazobuyela yini? Impilo yami ayinamingcele futhi uma ngicabanga ukuthi yini okusamele ngiyenze namathuba okuba wusomabhizinisi ovelele okumele ngibe wuye kuyangijabulisa.”USma uyisikhulu esiphezulu enkampanini yakhe nomyeni wakhe uCalvin Mathibeli, iCalvin and Family Group enoxhaxha lwezinkampani ngaphansi kwayo. Uphinde abe ngumnikazi wendawo yokudla i-Unique Lifestyle Cafe, eMhlanga.Uthe kusuka kudala wayekholwa wukuthi kumele abe nezindlela ezahlukene zokungenisa imali.“Ngake ngabamba itoho isikhathi eside futhi kwakungekho engingakwenza ngaphandle kokuthi ngenze iqhinga lokuthi ngizoyandisa kanjani imali engiyenzayo. Lokho kwaholela ekutheni ngivule inkampani yezokuxhumana nokumaketha ngesikhathi ngiyitoho eSABC nakwezinye izinkampani.”Empilweni usezuze lukhulu okuhlanganisa nokuwola izindondo ngokuba wumdidiyeli ovelele.Uthe okumgqugquzelayo wukuthi uyazi ukuthi kumele abe owesifazane onjani - ophumelele futhi onamandla.USma uzobe eyisikhulumi esiqavile emcimbini weSolezwe Intandokazi Womens Club ozoba seCoastlands Hotel, eMhlanga. Uhlelo luzobe luphethwe nguDudu “Lady D” Khoza. Kuzobe kunandisa uDJ Happy Gal noDJ Cndo.“Ngiwumuntu othanda ukubona abesifazane bethuthuka hhayi kuphela ebhizinisini noma ehhovisi kodwa njengomuntu uqobo.”Intandokazi inikeza ithuba abesifazane abaningi ukuthi bathuthukiswe ngabesifazane abangabaholi abaxoxa ngezinto asebedlule kuzo ezibalulekile kubo kusuka ebhizinisini nokunye.”Uphethe ngokululeka abesifazane ngokuthi: “Awuvotelwanga ukuze uzalwe. Wadalwa nguNkulunkulu ngenxa yesizathu, ngakho thola isizathu owazalelwa sona.”
title: #IbhizinisiLami: Ufuna ukudlondlobala emabhizinisini

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMfundo eGauteng uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi uthi ujabule ngesibalo sabafundi abaphase umatric ngo-2020 kulesi sifundazwe. Ngokwezibalo ezimenyezelwe wuNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo kuleli uNkk Angie Motshekga izolo, kuphase u-83.8% wabafundi bakamatric eGauteng, okuyibeke endaweni yesibili ngezinga lokuphasa kuleli ilandela ngemuva iFree State (85.1%). ULesufi uthe ujabule kakhulu ngokuzuzwe abafundi baseGauteng kwazise u2020 bekuwunyaka onzima kubo, kothisha kanye nakubazali ngenxa yeCovid-19 ebihambisana nezigaba zokuvalwa kwezwe.“Ezikoleni eziyishumi ezihambe phambili, eziyisithupha ngezaseGauteng, ngijabule kakhulu. Sinyuse nesibalo sabafundi abathole ibachelor pass esesisondele ku-50 000 sisuka ku-43 000. Bazobe begcwele emanyuvesi ahlukahlukene kuleli,” kusho uLesufi. 1/2 Thank you so much Gauteng Citizens, our learners scored the following:- The 2nd Position overall in the country- Six of our districts are in the Top Districts in the country- Our Bachelor passes increased from 43494 to 49680- Our distinctions increased from 37422 to 41459 pic.twitter.com/GICPOgWnec2/2 My sincere gratitude to all our educators, SGBs, Teacher and Learner Formations, Religious Bodies, Team GDE and the entire Gauteng Leadership under stewardship of our Premier @David_Makhura We will continue to work hard. But the support is truly appreciated @educationgp pic.twitter.com/CpMh52pANLNakuba iGauteng neFree State benze kahle uma beqhathaniswa no-2019, izifudazwe eziningi zithwale kanzima. Kwezinye izifindazwe kwehle isibalo sabaphasile ngo-10%. Uma kubalwa izifundazwe zonke kuphase u-76.2% wabafundi eNingizimu Afrika okuyisibalo esehle ngo-5% kwesango-2019. UMotshekga naye uzwakalise ukuziqhenya ngalesi sibalo izolo eveza ukuthi akukho abangakhala ngakho bewumnyango njengoba bekufundwa ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima nyakenye. Uthe usazokhuluma nongqongqoshe bezifundazwe ezehlelwe yisibalo sabafundi abaphasile. “Kunezifundazwe ezehlelwe yisibalo sabaphasile kakhulu, kuzomele sikhulume nazo ukuthola ukuthi ngaphandle kweCovid-19, yiziphi ezinye izingqinamba ezidale ukuthi sehle kangaka isibalo sabaphasile,” usho kanje.
title: ULesufi uyaziqhenya ngesibalo sabaphase umatric eGauteng

text: UYISUTHILE induku oyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANCYL, uNksz Sizophila Mkhize, obehambele umcimbi thizeni wesintu, Olundi, ngoMgqibelo odlule.Kuthiwa usukelwe owesifazane thizeni wamnenebula waze wamhlwitha iwigi ekhanda, wamjikijela ngayo phambi kwezethameli zomcimbi.Umthombo othembekile olwazi kahle lolu daba uthi, akuqondakali kahle ukuthi lo mholi ubebangani nalo wesifazane okhulile kunaye ovele wahlala izithonto kuyena.Uthe lo mholi ubemagange eya kulo mcimbi ebhala nakuFacebook ukuthi uyajabula ukuya khona kanti akabuzanga elangeni uzohlangabezana nezimbila zithutha, ziholwa emhlophe phambili.Kuthiwa lo wesifazane uvele waqonda kulo mholi wambuza imibuzwana okungezwakalanga ukuthi ithini, wamyabula waqala washaya emdonsa kanzima ngesihluku.Kuthiwa uNksz Mkhize unxuse omunye abanaye embuthweni abehamba naye ukuba amphelezele ayovula icala emaphoyiseni.UNksz Mkhize uvumile ukuthi wehlelwe yisigameko esimethusile nabengasilindele kodwa wathi akafuni ukwanda kakhulu ngoba udaba lusezandleni zamaphoyisa.“Kunezimpahla zami ezilimalile kulesi sigameko njengefoni yami efile nemoto yami iklwebhekile idinga ukulungiswa.“Ngifuna ubulungiswa ngoba lo muntu angimazi, ubengisuka ngaphi, bengiqala nokumbona nje.“Bengiziyele emcimbini ngingalindele lutho njengoba evele wangihlasela,’’ kuchaza uNksz Mkhize.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunecala eliphenywayo elivulwe uNksz Mkhize.“Icala lokucekelwa phansi kwempahla nelokushaya avulwe esiteshini saseMahlabathini emuva kokuba ummangali ehlaselwe umuntu ngesikhathi esemcimbini endaweni.“Akukaboshwa muntu kodwa udaba luyaphenywa amaphoyisa,’’ kusho uZwane.Le ntokazi yehlelwa yilesi sigameko nje kusabalele izindaba zokuthi igaqele isikhundla sokuba yiphini likamengameli walolu phiko kuzwelonke.Umbango usuqalile ukushisa phansi njengoba kuzoba nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi bukazwelonke ngoSepthemba eGoli.
title: Ubolile yinduku umholi we-ANCYL esoLundi

text:
BAMASHELE amahhovisini e-ANC eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu abaseka iMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede, engaphansi kwengcindezi ukuthi ishenxe kulesi sikhundla kulandela ubekwa amacala enkohlakalo.Amaphoyisa abephume ngobuningi bawo ezoqapha isimo kumasha izinkumbi zabantu abazibiza ngabalandeli baGumede ovele eNkantolo yamaCala eMali eThekwini ngemuva kokuzinikela kumaHawks ngoLwesibili. Ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR50 000.Ezinye zezingqwembe abeziphethwe abebebhikisha bezibhalwe ukuthi ‘iNPA namaHawks basetshenziselwa ukulwa izimpi zepolitiki’.Abaseka uGumede bathe bafuna umhlangano nosihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnUZ Sihle Zikalala abamsole ngokuba nolwazi ngokuboshwa kukaGumede, okuyinyo ayichithile.Thousands of ANC members who are supporters of the embattled Ethekwini mayor Zandile Gumede are marching to ANC Provincial office 
pic.twitter.com/bzscSALGGz— Thuba Vilane (@thubao) 
May 17, 2019UNkk Zandile Gumede ubekwe icala lokukhwabanisa nenkohlakalo mayelana nethenda kaR208 million yokuqoqwa kukadoti. Uboshwe nabanye ababili.Abebebhikisha bathe basafuna uGumede aqhubeke nokuba yiMeya noma kunengcindezi evela emaqenjini aphikisayo nakwi-ANCYL abathe kumele ashenxe.Okhulumela i-ANC uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu usole umholi weDA kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, ngokuba nesandla ekuqubukeni kwalo mbhikisho. Uthe uMncwango nguye ofake amagama abaholi be-ANC odabeni lukaGumede.“Ngemuva kokudliwa okhethweni uMncwango uzama ukuvusa igama lakhe kwezepolitiki ngokusabalalisa amanga ngabaholi be-ANC. Siyinhlangano sigculisekile ngokuthi uZikalala usexhumane nabomthetho ukuthola ukuthi ngobani abakhuluma kwinkulumo eqoshiwe esabalelele ku-WhatsApp nakwezinye izinkundla zokuxhumana. Kule nkulumo kunababili besilisa abafaka uZikalala ukuze kube ngathi ubazi ngokuboshwa kweMeya uZandile Gumede,” kusho uSimelane-Zulu osole uMncwango ngokusabalalisa amahlebezi.Khonamanjalo, ngoLwesihlanu kuvele imibiko yokuthi kusazoboshwa amakhansela abalelwa ku-62 eThekwini asolwa ngokuhlomula ekudliweni kwezimali zethenda kaR200 million yokuqoqa udoti.
title: BUKA: Bamashele emahhovisini e-ANC abaseka uZandile Gumede

text: IMAMELODI Sundowns ivule isifuba ngoKhama Billiat omataniswa neqembu laseSaudi Arabia, i-Al-Nassr FC.Ngempelasonto kusabalale amahlebezi okuthi iSundowns ifuna ukudayisa uBilliat ngoba akaziphethe kahle ngaphandle kwenkundla.UThulani Thuswa wezokuxhumana kwiSundowns uvumile ukuthi iqembu laseSaudi Arabia selike labathinta ngalesi sibabuli saseZimbabwe.“Iqembu laseSuadi Arabia selike lasithinta libuza ngoKhama kodwa lokho asikuthathi njengokufaka isicelo. UKhama usanenkontileka neqembu futhi ukubadlali bethu abamqoka kodwa asinankinga ukuxoxisana naleli qembu. Usaphatheke kahle eqenjini futhi naye uyalithanda. Kodwa uma kuyisicelo esihehayo sizimisele ngokusifakela izibuko ngoba asifuni ukuba yisithiyo endleleni yakhe,” kusho uThuswa.Indaba kaBilliat yokujoyina i-Al-Nassr ibonakele iyindaba egudwini naseSaudi Arabia. Lokhu kubonakale ekhasini lalo mdlali ku-Instagram, lapho abalandeli baleli qembu bebelokhu bembuze njalo ukuthi kuyiqiniso yini ukuthi uzobe egijima kulona ngesizini ezayo. Abanye bebesho ukuthi ngeke akukhalele ukuza eqenjini labo kwazise inkundla ihlezi inyinyitheka abalandeli.Okunye okuvelile wukuthi lo mdlali uyanqaba ukuvuselela inkontileka yakhe njengoba anayo iphela ngoJuni wonyaka ozayo.“UKhama ungumdlali oseqophelweni eliphezulu ngakho uma ukhuluma udaba oluthinta yena ngeke uthathe usuku olulodwa bese ufinyelela esivumelwaneni. Bekunzima ukuthi siqale izingxoxo njengoba iqembu belimatasa nemidlalo yeChampions League, i-Absa Premiership kwaphinde kwaba nemidlalo yamaqembu esizwe. Enye into ephazamisile ukudlula emhlabeni kwemenenja yakhe. Siyathemba ukuthi njengoba kunekhefu sizokwazi ukuhlala naye phansi ukuze sithole isixazululo,” kusho uThuswa.Uthe kungamampunge ukuthi uBilliat akaziphethe kahle.
title: I-Downs ilinde abagaqele uBilliat

text: UHLEZI lubhojozi umphakathi waKwaMambulu, eSondokhulu, KwaMaphumulo, emuva kokubulawa komshayeli wetekisi ngabantu abangaziwa.Lesi sigameko senzeke ngoMgqibelo ebusuku ngesikhathi owesilisa ezilalele kwakhe.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi lo wesilisa ufike wapaka itekisi abelishayela ngabo-3 ntambama, wase engena endlini. Emuva kwalokho kuye kwafika imoto ebinamadoda angaziwa yehlisa eyodwa. Kuthiwa le ndoda iye yafica indodakazi engazalwa wumufi ihleli ngaphandle, yabuza ukuthi uphi uyise, indodakazi yakhomba endlini, yase le ndoda ingena endlini yadubula umufi.Kuthiwa umufi ubelele embhedeni, umkakhe ehleli esihlalweni ngesikhathi le ndoda engaziwa idubula ngezinhlamvu eziwu-11 ibhekise kumufi.Emuva kwalokho kuthiwa le ndoda iye yangena emotweni evele yaphuma ngesivinini esikhulu. Umka mufi kuthiwa ubekhihla isililo wabalekela kwamakhelwane, indodakazi yakhe nayo yamlandela njengoba ibisithukile.Abakhulume neSolezwe kodwa abangathandanga ukudalulwa bathe sekuvamisile ukubulawa kwabantu KwaMambulu, ngoba kubulawa amakhansela, izinduna ngisho nabantu abangenazikhundla nje.UColonel Thembeka Mbele wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uthe amaphoyisa aseKraanskop, aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kokudutshulwa kubulawe kowesilisa (49).Uthe kutholwe amagobolondo ezinhlamvu ayisikhombisa kanti umufi kutholakale ukuthi unamanxeba awu-11.Ubedubuleke esifubeni, emqaleni, engalweni nangemuva. Uthe akukaboshwa muntu ngalesigameko kodwa uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luyaqhubeka.
title: Bahleli lubhojozi kubulawa umshayeli wetekisi

text: AMAPHOYISA athungatha abasolwa ngokubulala umshayeli we-metered taxi owayengusomatekisi, eLamontville.Owesilisa oneminyaka elinganiselwa ko-30, igama lakhe elingakadalulwa, udutshulwe ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule ehamba ngemoto encane asebenza ngayo ukuthutha abantu uma eqashiwe.Umufi kuvele ukuthi wayenamatekisi amathathu ngaphansi kwaSoseshini waseLamontville kodwa wagcina ewadayisile.Ukubulawa kukamufi akucaci ukuthi kuhlobene nani njengoba evele wahlaselwa abantu bamdubula, washonela endaweni yesehlo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala, uphenyo luyaqhubeka, kanti futhi bebengakabophi muntu.“Amaphoyisa aseLamontville aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela ukudutshulwa kowesilisa. Ayaziwa imbangela yokubulawa kwakhe kodwa kuyaphenywa,” kusho uCol. Mbele.Umthombo weSolezwe ocelwe ukungadalulwa, uthe ukubulawa kwamufi kushiye eminingi imibuzo njengoba bekunokubulawa kwabantu eLamontville kulandela ukudutshulwa kukaMnuz Boy Shazi.“Umufi ubesephumile ematekisini njengoba awadayisa wabe esengena ekuthutheni abantu ngemoto encane. Ubesebenzisa iselula uma ufuna akulande.“Manje kube khona izigameko lapho behlaselwa khona laba bashayeli. Lokhu kwenza kungacaci noma ukuhlaselwa kwakhe kuhlobene nempi yamatekisi noma kubhekene nokusebenzisa imoto encane. Sonke sisale sididekile,” kusho umthombo osondelene nalolu daba.Umufi kuke kwavela nezinsolo zokuthi kukhona owesifazane obesemotweni naye ngesikhathi ehlaselwa, naye wadubuleka kodwa amaphoyisa awazange akuqinisekise lokhu.Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuthola umndeni kamufi ayizange iphumelele njengoba imininingwane kamufi nezinombolo zabo kungazange kutholakale.
title: Indida kubulawa owe-metered taxi

text: ISIKHULU esiphezulu sebhodi eliphethe izinkundla zemidlalo kuleli, iStadium Management SA, uMnuz Jacques Grobbelaar uqinisekise ukushona kwabantu ababili kwisiminyaminya eFNB Stadium ngesikhathi kutholene phezulu iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni weCarling Black Label Cup. Ngemuva komdlalo uGrobbelaar ekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba uthe sibaphathe kabi lesi sigameko. "Siphatheke kabi ngokushona kwabantu namhlanje (ngoMgqibelo). Isiminyaminya sidalwe yisibalo esiphezulu sabantu ebesizama ukungena emasangweni umdlalo usuqalile," usho kanje. Uthe kulesi sigameko kulimale nabanye abantu abangu 19, oyedwa wabo usesimeni esibucayi. "Lokhu kube yishwa ngoba umdlalo ubuhlelelwe kahle, njengoba sihlale senza. Selokhe yasungulwa ngo-2011 iCarling Black Label Cup sihlale sinesibalo esiphezulu sabalandeli, kodwa asikaze sibe nezingozi ngaphambilini. "SiyiStadium Management SA, iCarling Black Label Cup, i-Orlando Pirates neKaizer Chiefs, sicela ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini elahlekelwe," kuphetha yena. IKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates nabo badlulise amazwi enduduzo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana badalula ukuthi amaphoyisa ayaphenya.
title: Kuzophenywa ngokushona kwababili emdlalweni weCarling Black Label

text: UMNDENI oshiselwe isitolo obuqashise ngaso abokufika eMachobeni, eNanda, ukhala ngokuthi usuzobhuqwa yindlala njengoba bebethembele emalini yokuqashisa abokufika kuleli.Isitolo obekudayisa kuso abokufika baseSomalia sishiswe sigcwele impahla yokudayisa ngoLwesine.Kukhona nesinye isitolo esishisiwe kuyo le ndawo khona ngoLwesine.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe kufike izimoto ezibalelwa kwezingu-10, kwehla abantu abafike bakhala ngokuthi leli bhizinisi liwisa amanye ngoba kushibhile abakudayisayo. Kuthiwa bachele uphethroli ezimpahleni bashisa.Abaqashe lesi sitolo kuthiwa baphume ngesamagundane beshiya uR25 000 abese bewuthole ngokudayisa noR300 000 abawubeka kulesi sitolo.UNksz Clara Mngadi (57) ngesikhathi evakashelwe Isolezwe ngoMsombuluko kulesi sitolo ubebalisa ngosizi ethi akazi ukuthi sebezodlani. “Imali yokuqashisa isitolo iyona esiziphilisa ngayo ngoba ilona ifa esalishiyelwa abazali bethu. Kumanje njengoba isitolo sishisiwe asazi ukuthi sizothathani sihlanganise nani. Kunezingane eziyizintandane engizondla ngale mali yokuqashisa.”SIVALIWE isitolo obekuqashe kuso abokufika kuleli eMachobeni, eNanda, kulandela ukushiswa kwaso Izithombe: Gcina NdwalaneElandisa Isolezwe uthe ingaphezu kwengu-10 iminyaka isitolo besiqashise laba bokufika kuleli.Uthe bebephathene kahle ngoba bebeyikhokha ngesikhathi imali yokuqasha futhi bengakaze babe nezinkinga.Uthe ukuqashisa kwesitolo kuyabasiza ngoba bona kabanawo amandla okudayisa kulesi sitolo.Uthe lesi sitolo sakhiwa umkhulu wabo ngoba efuna kube ifa lomndeni wakhe.Abazali bakhe babedayisa kusona, kuthe sebeshona yena nodadewabo abathathu kwaba ngesabo isitolo.Kulo R4 000 abaqashisa ngawo isitolo bahlukaniselana nodadewabo.“Phambilini sebeke basicekela phansi abantu isitolo kodwa sasivusa.“Kulokhu sishe kakhulu, angazi noma sizokwazi yini ukusilungisa ngoba izindonga zilimele,” kusho uNksz Mngadi.Kuthintwa obeqashe kulesi sitolo ozibize ngoMohamed, isibongo sangatholakala, uthe ulahlekelwe kakhulu njengoba kushe lo R300 000 nokudla abezokudayisa.“Silindele emaphoyisa ngoba icala livuliwe,” kusho uMohamed ngamafuphi.Abasolwa abathathu baboshiwe ngoLwesihlanu ngokusha kwesitolo.Izolo bavelile eNkantolo yaseNtuzuma, icala lihlehlele isonto elizayo, uphenyo lusaqhubeka.
title: Usizi emndenini oshiselwe isitolo

text: KUFANELE kuyifake ingebhe iManchester United ukufika kosuku lwanamuhla lokubhekana neJuventus kaCristiano Ronaldo esanxanele ukuzakhela ugazi kubalandeli be-Old Lady.Okwenza isimo sibe sibi nakakhulu kwiRed Devils kaJose Mourinho wukuthi ngaphandle kwezinga elikhombise ibambana neChelsea ngo 2-2 kowePremier League ngempelasonto, ayikangeni egiyeni lemidlalo emikhulu.URonaldo udume ngokubasela amagoli udede kangangoba kwiChampions League usahamba yedwa ngerekhodi lamagoli amaningi emlandweni walo mqhudelwano.Isilomo sasePortugal sinamagoli angu-120 kwiChampions League.Silandelwa yimbangi yaso yase-Argentina, uLionel Messi ngawu-103.Okwenza uRonaldo abe yingozi kakhulu kwiRed Devils namuhla akusikho nje ukuthi uzobe edlala neqembu lakhe elidala noma ukuthi ungumdlali ongayibheki inethi.UMQEQESHI weManchester United uJose Mourinho nomsizi wakhe uMichael Carrick abazobeka amathemba abo kuPaul Pogba owayengumdlali weJuventus uma sebebhekene naleli qembu namhlanje. Isithombe: Martin Rickett/PA via APOkuyikho okuseqhulwini okwenza uRonaldo abe yingozi kwiRed Devils namuhla wukuthi akakayenzeli lutho iJuventus kwiChampions League.Empeleni akakayidlaleli lutho iJuventus kwiChampions League kule sizini uRonaldo. Emdlalweni owodwa aboshelwe kuwo uphume ngekhadi elibomvu maphakathi nesiwombe sokuqala.Kowesibili behlula ngo 3-0 iYoung Boys yaseSwitzerland ubengekho esadonsa leso sigwebo.Lo wanamuhla ufana nokuthi kuzobe kungowakhe wokuqalaweChampions League kusukela ejoyine iJuventus. Yize ahamba kahle kwiRed Devils engumdlali obiza ukubedlula bonke, kodwa ukubhekana neqembu lakhe elidala kwenza kulindelwe lukhulu emdlalweni wanamuhla.Ngasohlangothini lwe-United, uMourinho uzobeka amathemba akhe kwinjini yasesiswini uPaul Pogba, owayengumdlali weJuventus ngaphambi kokubuyela kwiRed Devils, ngokunjalo no-Anthony Martial ongalibheki ipali muva nje.
title: I-United enkingeni kubuya uRonaldo e-Old Trafford

text: MHLELI: Siyethusa futhi siyamangaza isinqumo esithathwe yithimba le-ANC sokuchitha icala ebelibekwe uMnuz Pule Mabe lokuhlukumeza ngokocansi umsizi wakhe.Icala elinjengaleli, lapho umuntu esolwa ngokuhlukumeza ngokocansi, kumele libikwe futhi lisingathwe yinkantolo. Akukwazi ukuthi kungaba wudaba lwangaphakathi futhi alithethwa esithe. Kufanele lubikwe emaphoyiseni.Lelo thimba alinamandla, yinkantolo okumele ilalele udaba bese ikhipha isinqumo.Ngisola sengathi kube nokwenzelela ngoba ithimba likhiphe isinqumo lase lijika lithi i-ANC kayinawo umgomo oqondene nokusola ngokuhlukumezeka ngokocansi. Kumele wenziwe zingakapheli izinyanga ezintathu.Ithule le nto eliyishoyo. Uma bengenawo bona njengeqembu inkantolo inawo. Abaholi bahlale begqugquzela abantu ukuthi ababike ukuhlukumezeka kepha lapho sebebikile kubonakala kunokucindezelwa kwabathile.Ngiyasola labo abebesethimbeni bakhethe ubumbano kunokwenza umsebenzi ngendlela. Engabe beli­zo­phuma nasiphi isinqumo ukuba owahlukunyezwa bekungadadewabo wegazi womunye wethimba.Lo dadewethu uma enobufakazi akaye emaphoyiseni ayobika ngoba uma ethula nale nto izomlimaza nasemoyeni.Sibusiso Innocent Ndebele
title: [IMIBONO] Ngisola ukwenzelela odabeni lukaPule Mabe

text: BANE othisha asebebulawe yiCovid-19 selokhu kuvulwe izikole ngenyanga edlule KwaZulu-Natal.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, usho lokhu izolo esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini, ecacisa ngesimo sezikole njengoba kuvula uGrade 11 no-6 kuleli sonto.Uthe isifundazwe sineziguli eziwu-977 ezihaqekile, ezilaliswe ezibhedlela. Kuzo ziwu-694 ezisezibhedlela ezizimele neziwu-283 kwezikahulumeni.Kothisha ababulawe yiCovid-19 uZikalala uthe babili abaseZululand, oyedwa eMzinyathi noyedwa eMlaza. Kushone nonogada wesikole esingadalulwanga esifundeni iLembe.“Silindele ukuthi abahaqekile ezikoleni bazokwanda kodwa kuzolandelwa imigomo efanele kulabo abatholakalayo. Sandise ukuthengwa kwezinto ezibalulekile ukubhekana nesifo njengoba kuvulwa izikole.”Bawu-429 asebehaqekile ezikoleni, isibalo esikhule ngo-242 ku-187 obubikwe ngesonto eledlule. Uthe bawu-306 othisha abahaqekile, abafundi (81) nabasebenzi bomnyango wezemfundo (42).Isifunda uMgungundlovu sihamba phambili ngabawu-93 abahaqekile. Phakathi kwezifunda ezinezibalo eziphezulu kubalwa eMajuba (13), Harry Gwala, (33), Pinetown (66) oGwini (41) Umlaza (51) naseZuluand (29).“Sithole ukuthi seziwu-345 izikole ezinabahaqekile. Ezikoleni eziwu-236 okwakubikwe ukuthi zinabahaqekile phambilini, eziwu-70 sezikulungele ukufunda nokufundisa. Bawu-39 obekubikwe ukuthi bahaqekile ezikoleni, okulindeleke ukuthi babuyele ungakashayi uLwesithathu,” kusho uZikalala.Ugcizelele ukuthi benze konke okusemandleni ukulungiselela ukuvulwa kwezikole, wathembisa ukuthi alikho ikilasi elizobe lishoda ngothisha. Njengoba bekunezikhalo zokuthi kwezinye izikole amanzi awekho, uthe kukhishwe amathangi awu-3 425 nezindlu ezincane eziwu-1 060. Yize uZikalala ekhale ngokwenyuka kwezibalo zabahaqekile KwaZulu-Natal uthe akukafiki esibalweni esishaqisa kakhulu.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ugcizelele ukuthi zimi ngomumo izikole.Ukhale ngabazali bezikole ezisePhoenix, Chatsworth naseMerebank athe sebezisungulele esabo isigungu sabazali asisole ngokuba semkhankasweni wokuvala izikole.“Kuzo zonke izinqumo esizithathayo sisuke sikhulumile nezigungu ezilawula izikole nezinyunyana zothisha. Sikhumbuza abazali ukuthi akekho ophoqiwe ukuyisa ingane esikoleni kodwa kumele kulandelwe imigudu efanele ukuze abhalisele uhlelo lokuzifundisela ekhaya,” kusho uMshengu.Uxwayise nalabo somathuba abafuna ngodli umsebenzi wokwenza okokuvikela kwiCorona wathi alikho izwe elizobuswa ngenkani.Uthe usuwandile umkhuba walabo abazibiza ngosomabhizinisi wokufuna ngodli izinto.
title: I-Covid-19 isibulale othisha abane

text: UMampintsha usolwa ngokushaya intombi yakhe uBabes Wodumo naye okukhishwe incwadi yokuthi aboshwe ngemuva kokuthi engafikanga enkantolo.Egcina ukuvela uMampintsha ngenyanga edlule, uBabes ongummangali, akafikanga, kuthiwa uyagula. IMantshi uNkk Pillay yathi kumele afike nencwadi kadokotela.Ummeli kaMampintsha uPat Magwaza ofike enkantolo ngemuva kuka-11 ngoLwesibili ekuseni utshele imantshi ukuthi ubexhumana nomshushisi uNdoda January ngokuthi uzofika ngemuva kwesikhathi.“Ngihambe ngaya endlini yomsolwa ngiyobabheka nommangali ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bayeza enkantolo. Bekungabo-8.30 kanje. Kukhona engimtholile othe balele. Ngithe ngizoya mina siqu sami,” kusho uMagwaza.UMagwaza uqhube wathi: “Ngithe ngifika kwakhona owesifazane ovule isango. Ngikhulume naye kodwa angibabonanga. Ngichithe cishe imizuzu engu-30. Lona wesifazane ungitshele ukuthi bebesebenza kwaze kwaba yisezintatha estudiyo.”Uthe utshelwe ukuthi bandawonye. UMagwaza uthe ngenxa yalokhu “kungaba kuhle ukuthi ngisule kuleli cala”.Umshushisi uthe akukho okubhalwe phansi okuqinisekisa ukuthi uMampintsha noBabes baziphothulile izithangami zokwelulekwa wosonhlalakahle beFamily and Marriage Society of South Africa (Famsa).“Ngikholwa wukuthi sebeqedile kodwa anginaso isiqiniseko esibhalwe phansi,” kusho uJanuary.Ngokwedlule imantshi yathi icala lizoqulwa uma bengazithameli lezi zithangami.Ibe isigunyaza incwadi yokuboshwa kwabo ngokuhluleka ukuvela enkantolo.UMampintsha noBabes bake bazifanisa noBonnie noClyde ababeyizithandani zase-USA ezaziyizigelekeqe ezazingawuhloniphi umthetho.
title: Ummeli kaMampintsha usegeze izandla ngaye

text: Leli qembu liqokwe kumaSama eqoqweni le-Best African Indigenous Gospel nge-albhamu yalo ethi Sesiphunyukile.Kulindeleke ukuthi umcimbi wokuklonyeliswa kwabawinile ube seSun City Arena, eNorth West ngo-Juni 01 nonyaka.Yize leli qembu lingaqali ukuqokwa emiklomelweni njengoba selike laqokwa nakumaSABC Crown Gospel Music Awards, kodwa iThimba Le-Afrika lithe ukuqokwa kumaSama kusho ukukhula nokuhlonishwa okumangalisayo.Okhulumela iThimba-Le-Afrika, uPhindile Mkhize, uthe bajabule kakhulu njengoba bemenyezelwe njengamanye amaqembu nabaculi abangaphansi kwalo mkhakha weBest African Indigenous Gospel.“AmaSama ahlonishwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.
