Ukuqokwa kukhomba ukusebenza kanzima kwethu kule-albhamu futhi asibeke kwelinye iqophelo,” kuchaza uPhindile.Uqhubeke wachaza ukuthi leli yithuba elihle lokuzibonakalisa ezweni lonke njengoba beqokwe emncintiswaneni ohlanganise umculo ohlukahlukene, okuveza obala ukuthi bayiqembu elidlondlobalayo.Noma leli qembu liqokwe namanye amaqembu omculo wezokholo kodwa amathemba aphezulu njengoba bethi bafisa ukubuya nayo indondo.“Sizimisele futhi sifisa ukuyithola le ndondo."Siyawahlonipha la maqembu esiqokwe nawo kodwa nathi siyazithemba,” kusho uPhindile.Ngaphandle kweThimba Le-Afrika, amanye amaqembu aqokwe emkhakheni weBest African Indigenous Gospel Award kubalwa iTrust in Christ Ministries, Christ Worshippers Mass Choir; The General Isitimela ne-In Zion of Christ.
title: Lineme iThimba liqokwa kowokholo kumaSama

text: BAHLEKA bodwa abalandeli beMamelodi Sundowns ngemuva kokuvela kwezindaba ezithi labo mpetha be-Absa Premiership ngeke baphucwe amaphuzu ngecala lokudlalisa uWayne Arendse kungafanele ngo-Okthob.Kushone elangoMsombuluko sekuvele ezithi iSundowns izohlawuliswa kuphela imali ngokudlalisa.Bese kunesikhathi iPSL iyithole iSundowns inecala kodwa singaphumi isigwebo nokwenze umqeqeshi waBafana Ba Style washiya angalazi njalo uma ebona umbhobho phambi kwakhe.Ngemuva kokuphendula kwazo zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo iSundowns isamukele isinqumo sesigungu esizimele esiqondisa ubugwegwe kwiPSL esibahlawulise iR250 000, uhhafu wayo olengisiwe izinyanga ezingu-12.No-Arendse uhlawuliswe ngendlela efanayo.Kufanele ukuba zizokwamukeleka ngezandla ezivulekile kubalandeli bamaBrazilians lezi zindaba kwazise bebemincile kusenokusabela ukuthi bangase baphucwe amaphuzu.ISundowns ihlezi endaweni yesibili kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership, inomdlalo esandleni kanti isele ngamaphuzu amathathu kwi-Orlando Pirates.Namuhla iSundowns isethubeni lokufica iPirates esicongweni se-log emaphuzwini angu-53.Ukuze kube njalo kodwa kuzofanele yehlule iBlack Leopards eThohoyandou Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.IPirates ibuyela enkundleni ngoMeyi 4 neCape Town City.
title: IPSL isokolise iPirates ngesinqumo seDowns

text: AYAVUTHA amakhansela kaKhongolose kuMasipala wesiFunda uMzinyathi KwaZulu-Natal, asola izikhulu zawo ngokuwaphendula umnyango wokwenza imicimbi yobumnandi, esikhundleni sokulwa nesomiso okuwumsebenzi wawo.I-ANC iqale ukukhononda ngoLwesine olwedlule ngalolu daba, ikhala ngokuthi umasipala uchitha imali ebumnandini ekubeni imali kawusenayo neyokuholela abasebenzi nosonkontileka.USihlalo wekhokhasi ye-ANC eMzinyathi, uMnuz Lucky Moloi, uthe bafuna umasipala uchaze ukuthi uyithathephi imali yokwenza imicimbi ekubeni usuhluleke wancama ukulwa nesomiso nokukhokhela izinkampani ebezithole imisebenzi ngoba kuthiwa imali ayikho.“Lo masipala usuphenduke uMnyango wezobuCiko namaSiko neMidlalo ngendlela owenza ngayo imicimbi emikhulu. Okubi wukuthi imali kayisekho. Ngikhuluma nawe nje, ususele noR20 million kuphela kwi-akhawunti yawo. Ngakho abasebenzi basengcupheni yokungaholi uma kuphela uNovemba. Cishe ngesonto benza imicimbi emikhulu engaphezulu kwemithathu,” kusho uMoloi.Uthe abakhali ngokwenziwa kwemicimbi kodwa inkinga wukuthi kusetshenziswa imali engekho yokuyenza ekubeni eminingi yayo kayibi yimpumelelo, kuchithwa imali ngento engekho.Uthe kuleli sonto eliphelayo bekunomcimbi eGlencoe wobumnandi, kwaba nemibili eMvoti kamaskandi okuyinto ebashaqisile.Imenenja ebambile eMzinyathi, uMnuz Lethu Mthembu, ithe kakulona iqiniso ukuthi sebewumnyango wezobumnamndi nokuthi imali abasenayo.“Imicimbi esisayenzile kule nyanga eyedlule ngowokuhlonipha omaskanda asebashona nowokwethulwa kwama-truck amasha amanzi angu-20, emcimbini obuseMvoti.Akulona iqiniso ukuthi imali asisenayo. Emthonjeni wethu sinemali engaphezulu kukaR200 million esibhekile. Izinkampani nazo sezikhokhelwe futhi sizikhokhela mhla ka-7 nomahlaka-25 no-27,” kusho uMthembu.
title: Bakhala ngomasipala wezobumnandi

text: AMAZULU afake abadlali abayisithupha ohleni lwabadayisayo kwathi abathathu babolekiswa emaqenjini ehlukene KwaZulu-Natal (KZN) ukuze ithimba labaqeqeshi lisale nesikwata esizokwazi ukulawuleka.Laba badlali abahambanga neqembu okuthe izolo lalibangisa ekubhaceni lapho liyoqhubeka khona nezinhlelo zesizini ezoqala.UBrilliant Nhlanhla Mkhathini, obhekene nezokuxhumana kuleli qembu, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi umqeqeshi nethimba lakhe nabaphathi sebesithathile isinqumo ngabadlali abafuna bafakwe endalini nalabo okumele babolekiswe ukuze bayothola isikhathi sokudlala kwenye indawo.“Bayisithupha abadlali okuthathwe isinqumo sokuthi bafakwe ohleni lwabadayiswayo. Abanye abathathu babolekiswe kuThongathi nakuRoyal Eagles, nasebevele baqalile ukuzilolonga nalawa maqembu,” kusho uMkhathini.Abadlali abakhonjwe indlela ngokufakwa endalini uBoysen Mbatha, Zaakir Williams, Zola Jingxi, Mpendulo Dlamini ongomunye wonozinti, Simphiwe Mutsweni noNkanyiso Zungu.UZungu ufakwe kulolu hla nje, ngesizini edlule ubebolekiswe kwiJomo Cosmos eyehlulekile ukubuyela esigabeni sePremieship ekubeni ibithole ithuba lokudlala emidlalweni yokuhlunga.“Abadlali ababolekisiwe nasebevele bezilolonga namaqembu ababolekiswe kuwona ngoLungelo “Qashana” Dlamini okwi-Eagles, Sibusiso Magaqa noSibongiseni “Fanifani” Mthembu bobabili abaye kwiThongathi,” kuqhuba uMkhathini.UMagaqa usebuyela okwesibili kuThongathi FC njengoba ngewindi langesizini edlule ujoyine leli qembu ngokubolekwa nafike khona wabamba elikhulu iqhaza ekulitakuleni ezembeni.UMkhathini uphinde waveza ukuthi udaba lukaNjabulo Ngcobo alukacaci noma uzophinde abolekiswe kwiRichards Bay FC.“Indaba kaNjabulo (Ngcobo) ayikacaci. Kodwa kubukeka kuzokuba nzima ukumgcina ngale sizini njengoba iqembu libuyise uXolani Slawula obebolekiswe kwiThongathi FC ngesizini edlule. Ngaleso sizathu kungaba nzima kumqeqeshi ukubagcina bobabili ekubeni bedlala indawo efanayo. Yize edlale kahle (emidlalweni yesihle) kodwa angashaywa wukuthi uSlawula ubesenesikhathi eside edlala kuThongathi FC kanti nangale kwalokho iRichards Bay ngokuphela kwesizini iphinde yakhombisa uthando lokumbuyisa nakule sizini,” kubeka uMkhathini.Usuthu lubolekisa ngalabadlali nje, lusanda kusayinisa abadlali abahlanu okunguMarc van Heerden osekhuza ibuya esuka kwi-Orlando Pirates, Charlie Hlalele obekwiTornado FC, Emiliano Tade obekwi-Auckland City, obengumdlali weFree State Stars uNhlanhla Vilakazi noMoeneeb Josephs
title: Achitha abadlali AmaZulu FC

text: UKUPHELA kwesigaba samaqoqo kusho ukudlula kwesigamu sokuqala se-2018 Fifa World Cup ezosongwa ngoJulayi 15 enhlokodolobha yaseRussia, iMoscow nokuyilapho kuqale khona izindaba ngoJuni 14.Kusukela uqalile lo mqhudelwano oba njalo ngeminyaka emine, awukho umdlalo ophele kungangenanga goli kanti kowokuqala ngqa, osokhaya iRussia bavathele amahlanu kwiSaudi Arabia.IRussia ibalwa namazwe adlulele esigabeni somkhumulajezi lapho ezothathana khona neSpain kusasa kanti iSaudi ikulawo asebuyele emakhaya.IRussia ayigcini nje ngokubalwa kwi-last 16 kodwa iyavela nasohlwini lwabashayimagoli abahamba phambili lapho imelwe khona nguDenis Cheryshev odlala kwiVillarreal eSpain.UCheryshev uphume namagoli amathathu esigabeni samaqoqo nokusho ukubambana noDiego Costa waseSpain.NjengoCosta, ozalelwe eBrazil, uCheryshev uvule ngamagoli amabili emdlalweni wokuqala.UCheryshev akalona ithemba lamagoli kwiRussia ekubeni uCosta nguyena mgadli iSpain esilindele kuye ukuthi abhakuzise inethi.Laba bobabili balandela isilomo sasePortugal, uCristiano Ronaldo nenkunzi yaseBeglium uRomelu Lukaku, bobabili abanamane ngamunye.Eqhulwini kusongwe eyamaqoqo kukhonya uHarry Kane wase-England.UKane noRonaldo yibo kuphela abasaphume nama-hat trick kulo mqhudelwano. UKane uyishaye emdlalweni wesibili benquma iPanama ngo 6-1 kanti uRonaldo uyibasele ngomdlalo wokuqala neSpain.UKane uyabalwa futhi nakuma-brace ngamagoli amabili awashaye bebhekene neTunisia. ULukaku unama-brace amabili emidlalweni emibili, uCosta uneyodwa ayishaye bebhekene neSpain kanti uCheryshev naye uyitholile benquma iSaudi.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ukunqoba iGolden Boot akusho ukuthi usuzonqoba iWorld Cup kwazise nango-2014 nguJames Rodriguez waseColombia ohambe phambili ngamagoli enayisithupha kodwa baphuma kuma-quarterfinal.Ngaphandle kokubanga isicathulo segolide, enye inselelo ebhekene nabadlali abasele eRussia, wukudlula amagoli angu-171 ashaywe eBrazil ngo-2014.KwiWorld Cup edlule eBrazil kushaywe amagoli angu-171 nalingana nawango-1998 okwaqala ngawo ukuqhudelana amaqembu angu-32 esuka ku-24.-Harry Kane wase-England (5); Romelu Lukaku waseBelgium (4); Cristiano Ronaldo wasePortugal (4); Denis Cheryshev waseRussia (3) noDiego Costa waseSpain.-Ababambene ngamagoli amabili ngamunye endaweni yesithupha yilaba;-Yerry Mina waseColombia, Mohamed Salah wase-Egypt, Eden Hazard waseBelgium, Son Heungmin waseKorea Republic, Mile Jedinak wse-Australia, Ahmed Musa waseNigeria, Wahbi Khazri waseTunisia, Luis Suarez wase-Uruguay, Artem Dzyuba waseRussia, Philippe Coutinho waseBrazil, Luka Modric waseCroatia, John Stones wase-England, Andreas Granqvist waseSweden.
title: Isigamu sesibili sizocacisa ngesicathulo segolide

text: PHEZU kokusayinisa abadlali asebemnkantshubomvu kwi-Absa Premiership, iBlack Leopards ibalwa namaqembu ayiqale ngebatha imidlalo yale sizini njengoba isishaywe kwemibili eyidlalile.Iqale yahlulwa yiPolokwane City ngo 1-0 kowabakhaya, yaphinde yawalahla amaphuzu isihlulwa yiKaizer Chiefs ngo 1-0 ngempelasonto eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.Leli qembu eliphekwa uLionel Soccoia obengekho ebhentshini koweChiefs ngenxa yekhadi elibomvu, lisayinise uThabo Matlaba, Cuthbert Malajila obeqala ukudlala kowaMakhosi, noThuso Phala oqale ebhentshini.Yize kubukeka kusenzima ukuthi iqembu lihlangane lithole imiphumela eliyidingayo, iphini likaSoccoia, uPatrick Mabedi lithe isizini isephansi kakhulu ukuthi sebengaqala ukutatazela.“Yebo sesihlulwe imidlalo emibili okuyinto engeyinhle okumele sizithintithe siyilungise. Kusesekuseni sisengakwazi ukubafica abanye. Kwesinye isikhathi into emqoka empilweni nasebholeni wukuqonda ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi uyaqala kahle uqede kahle futhi ungaqala kabi kodwa kube nesiphetho esihle. Akubalulekile ukuthi uqala kanjani okumqoka wukuthi uqeda kanjani. Sizobuya,” kusho uMabedi.Uma kukhulunywa ngendlela yokuqeda, ngesizini edlule iLeopards izithole ibalwa namaqembu abalekela izembe kwaze kwaba yimidlalo yokugcina yeligi ngakho lokhu ukulahla amaphuzu.Iqale isizini kuhleli uJoel Masutha ogcine ededeliwe ingavuki imiphumela emihle kwaqashwa uDylan Kerr ezozama ukufukula umkhumbi obuzika.Emdlalweni olandelayo ngo-Agasti 24, iLeopards izovakashelwa yiHighands Park eThohoyandou Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.Mayelana nomdlalo weChiefs, uMabedi owayengukaputeni weChiefs uthe: “Besiyihlelele iChiefs futhi nendlela esiqale ngayo ibinokuzethemba. Sizamile ukumelana nabo esiswini kodwa sagcina sibavulela isikhala esikhulu sokudlala. Uma silahla ibhola besingakwazi ukulibuyisa ngokushesha ngenxa yejubane labo. Negoli esilidedelile belilula. Kwesinye isikhathi uyabanikeza abadlali umsebenzi kodwa bangawenzi.”
title: 'Phansi amaphaphu, isizini isephansi'

text: KUBUKEKA izoba wumqansa indlela ye-Orlando Pirates yokuzibeka ethubeni lokuwina izindebe ezintathu, ngesizini ka-2020/2021.Lokhu kulandela ukuqhathwa kwamaqembu kuma-quarterfinal eNedbank Cup, okuyibeke ethubeni kokubhekana neMamelodi Sundowns evuthayo kule sizini.Indawo yokugcina kuma-quarterfinal isalele iqembu elizowina phakathi kweMamelodi Sundowns nePolokwane City emdlalweni ohlehliselwe uMashi 10. Lo mdlalo uhlehlisiwe ngenxa yokushayisana kwezinsuku nomdlalo weSundowns kwiCAF Champions League obuyizolo.IPirates izibekisele indawo kuma-quarterfinal eNedbank Cup emuva kokuxebula iMaritzburg United ngo 3-1, eMgungundlovu ngempelasonto. Iyona kuphela iqembu elikwiDStv Premiership elinethuba lokuwina izindebe ezintathu kule sizini, kwazise kulokhu ayikho iTelkom Knockout. EZimnyama sezivele zihlabane ngeMTN8 futhi zisenalo ithuba lokuwina isicoco seligi, uma zingabamba umgqigqo bese iSundowns iqhuzuka endleleni ehamba ngayo. Leli qembu lagcina ukuphakamisa iNedbank Cup ngo-2014. Ngesikhathi iPirates igcina ukuqala isizini ngokuwina iMTN 8 yawina izindebe ezintathu, okubalwa iTelkom neligi ngesizini ka-2010/2011. Ukuzibula ngeMTN 8 kunyuse ithemba kubalandeli lokuthi iqembu lizokuphinda lokho. Nokho akubuzwa ukuthi ithuba lokuqondana neSundowns, engakaze ihlulwe, kuzowanyakazisa amaBhakabhaka.IPirates izobuyela enkundleni kusasa lapho izobhekana neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni weligi, e-Orlando Stadium ngo-5 ntambama.Isiyonke imidlalo yama-quarterfinal eNedbank Cup imi kanje:Black Leopards v Tshakhuma Tsha MadzivhandilaChippa United v Richards Bay FCCape Town All Stars v Pretoria CalliesPolokwane City/Mamelodi Sundowns v Orlando Pirates
title: IPirates ilinde ezodlala nabo kwiNedbank Cup
BUKA: Limisiwe iphoyisa lomgwaqo elifike emsebenzini 'libukhile'

text: IZAZI zomnotho zithi ukunqamuka kukagesi kuzophazamisa izinhlelo zokusimamisa umnotho okuhlelwe ukuthi zenzeke njengoba izwe selingenele esigabeni sesibili.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa, oyisazi somnotho esizimele, uthe ukuvulwa kokudayiswa kotshwala nogwayi nezokuvakasha kufanele kuvuse umnotho obusufadalele kodwa izinkinga zokunqamuka kukagesi zizowubuyisela emuva.“Ukunqamuka kukagesi kwenza sizibuze ukuthi abekho yini abasenza ngamabomu lesi simo ngoba ukuphela kukagesi yikona okusifake kwinzikamnotho. Ibingalungiswa ngani imishini nengqalasizinda kagesi okuthiwa sekufanele kulungiswe manje?” kubuza uDumisa.Uthe uma uhulumeni ezimisele ngokusimamisa umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika kufanele alungise udaba lukagesi acacise ukuthi kwenzekani e-Eskom ngoba umnotho okhulayo udinga ugesi ngaso sonke isikhathi.I-Eskom iqale uhlelo lokucima ugesi yize yayikade ithembise ukuthi ngeke ucime ugesi ebusika.Ibuye yaveza ukuthi kuleli sonto ungase ucishe ngenxa yokuthi imishini yokuwuphehla idinga ukukhandwa.Esinye isazi somnotho, uMnuz Dawie Roodt we-Efficient Group, sithe umvalelandlini uqede imisebenzi ewu-3 million eminye ewu-1 million esiphele unomphelo.“Inkinga yokunqamuka kukagesi iyawushaya umnotho. Kufanele ilungiswe ngokushesha. Ngilindele ukuthi njengoba kuvulwe umnotho ngokwesigaba sesibili amathuba omsebenzi avele emkhakheni wezokuvakasha nasezindaweni zokudlela. Umonakalo owenzeke emnothweni waseNingizimu Afrika ngenxa yomvalelandlini uzothatha iminyaka eminingi ukuthi ulungiswe,” kusho uRoodt.Uthe yize abanye abantu bezozikhiphela ezindaweni zokudla abazithandayo noma bayoshaywa wumoya ezindaweni zokulala izivakashi kodwa iningi labantu baseNingizimu Afrika lizohlala ezindlini ngoba alinayo imali yokuvakasha.“Izikweletu zabantu zandile ngoba abanye baphelelwe wumsebenzi, abanye bancishiselwa amaholo. Asazi ukuthi abantu sebekweleta malini. Yisimo esibi lesi esizithole sikusona, amanye amabhizinisi azovalwa unomphela ngenxa yomvalelandlini. Intela elahlekile ngokuvalwa kwezimboni ezihlukene ngeke ibuye. Kufanele uhulumeni alungise isimo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izimboni ziyakhiqiza nabantu bayaqashwa,” kusho uRoodt.
title: ‘Ugesi onqanyulwayo uzothikameza ukusimama komnotho’

text: NgoLwesine kutholwe isidumbu sikaMnuz Phumlani Mlambo (32).Lesi sigameko silandela esinye esenzeka emasontweni amabili edlule lapho kwatholwa owesilisa, entanta emfuleni naye eseshonile.Naye kukholakala ukuthi wabulawa wabe esephonswa emfuleni.UMlambo kuthiwa ubefunwa umndeni wakhe njengoba aduka ekade ephumele emnyango eyokhuluma neselula.Kuthiwa umufi ubenamanxeba okudutshulwa.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe sekuwukhathazile umphakathi ukutholwa kwabantu befile kulo mfula.“Sekuyathusa khona ukuthi njalo kutholwa abantu bebulewe. Lona otholwe ngoLwesine kuthiwa uphoswe ebhulohweni. Akusona isidumbu sokuqala lesi sitholakala, emasontweni amabili edlule kutholwe esinye. Cishe nasezinyangeni ezimbili ezedlule kube khona esinye.Umfana obulewe ngoLwesine ubenamanxeba okudutshulwa, okusho ukuthi uphonswe lana esevele eshonile,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile isigameko wathi kuphenywa icala lokubulala.“NgoLwesine kutholwe isidumbu sowesilisa obenamanxeba okudutshulwa. Amaphoyisa aseNewark aphenya icala lokubulala. Akekho oseboshiwe,” kusho uCap. Gwala.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kamufi ayizange iphumelele njengoba izinombolo zawo zingatholakalanga.
title: Bakhathazekile ngezidumbu ezitholwa emfuleni uThukela

text: UHLALELE ovalweni umndeni waseNewlands West, eThekwini, kulandela ukuklayeka kwenhlabathi eseduze komuzi kwavuleka umgodi omkhulu ngemuva komuzi.Lo mndeni usola ukuthi ukuklayeka kwenhlabathi kudalwe umgwaqo weGo! Durban owakhiwa eduze kwale ndawo.Lo mgodi ulinganiselwa emamitheni angu-12 ukushona phansi.UNksz Jabulisile Ngcobo umnikazi womuzi okuvuleka umgodi egcekeni lakhe, imijondolo emibili esegcekeni yalenga, uthe selokhu kwenzeke lesi sigameko abakwamasipala bayangena bayaphuma kwakhe kodwa akekho oqhamuka nesisombululo sokuthi kuzokwenziwa njani.“Ngesikhathi kuzoqalwa umgwaqo sabizelwa emhlanganweni kwathiwa yonke imizi eseduze kwalo mgwaqo izosuswa, kwathiwa ulayini wonke uzosuswa, emuva kwalokho kwathuleka.“Sabona sekufika abanikazi benkontileka bethi bazobheka iminkenke ezindlini. Nakho lokho asazi ukuthi kwakwenziwelani.“Njengoba lo mhlaba uklayekile nje asazi noma umile noma uzoqhubeka, uma ngibuka inhlabathi ngibona sengathi iyahamba ngoba seyihlehlile, ayisagcini lapho ibikhona ngoMsombuluko. Sekunzima nokulala endlini ngoba siyesaba, emini sihlala emnyango,” kusho yena.Indodakazi yakhe ebilele nezingane zayo emjondolo ngesikhathi kuqhekezeka umhlaba uNksz Nomfundo Ngcobo, ithe batholelwe indawo yokulala okwesikhashana kodwa izimpahla zisele emjondolo.“Basisizile ngendawo yokulala kodwa manje sinezimpahla esingazi ukuthi sizozibeka kuphi ngoba indawo esinikwe yona eyokulala kuphela. Ngeke ugcine kuyo izimpahla,” kusho yena.Ikhansela lakule ndawo uNksz Joyce Johnson nalo ebelizobheka umonakalo lithe alikhumbuli kuthiwa kunemizi ezodilizwa lona lazi imijondolo ebiyakhiwe endaweni kamasipala ngemuva kwemizi okwathiwa kumele idilizwe.“Kwayona le mijondolo esinenkinga njengoba kuvele inhlekelele akumele ngabe ikhona. Abantu abakhe imijondolo sakhuluma nabo basitshela isimo semindeni yabo esiyandile bethi abaseneli ezindlini zemixhaso.“Yagcina ingadiliziwe ngoba kucatshangelwa imindeni. La kwaNgcobo bawu-15. Okwenzeke lapha okwamanje sazi ukuthi kube yinhlekelele yemvelo, onjiniyela basahlola ukuthi yini edale ukuklayeka komhlaba.“Siyazama izindlela zokuthi umndeni othintekile usizakale njengokuthi imijondolo esengozini yakhiwe ngaphambi komuzi ngoba ukususwa komndeni wonke akuyona into engenzeka ngokushesha, okubalulekile manje wukuthi siphephise impilo,” kusho yena.UMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uthe onjiniyela bakamasipala bakuleya ndawo babheka ukuthi singalungiswa kanjani isimo.Uthe ngokuthola kwabo yimvula eholele ekutheni inhlabathi ingabe isazinza.
title: Usengcupheni umndeni kuklayeka inhlabathi

text: “ASIQONDILE ukubaphuca isinkwa osicabha kodwa sibaxoshe ngenxa yokuthi sifuna ukuqeda ubugebengu nokuhlukunyezwa kwabagibeli embonini yamatekisi.”Usho kanje uMnuz Wealth Gcumisa onguSihlalo kasoseshini i-Inner Circle osematheni kulezi zinsuku ngokuxosha osicabha.UGcumisa uthe emuva kokwenza ucwaningo bathole ukuthi abanye osicabha babhema iwunga, abanye bahudula impahla yabagibeli, abanye babamba inkunzi futhi abahlanzekile.“Sibaxoshile abasizi babashayeli abangaziphethe kahle ngoba asifuni kube khona abagibeli abahlukumezekayo. Sibacele ukuthi bafake izicelo zomsebenzi sathola ukuthi kukhona abondla imindeni ngemali abayenza kulo msebenzi. Abanye sibaqashe kabusha ngoba sithole ukuthi baziphethe kahle kuyimanje bayasebenza. Abanye sibakhuphulile njengoba sebebheka umsebenzi erenki,” kusho uGcumisa.Uthe bazowuqapha ngeso lokhozi umsebenzi wabo ngoba abafuni kusebenze abantu abadla izidakamizwa.“Kuzoba nezimoto eziqaphe umsebenzi ngoba sisebenzisana nozakwethu bamatekisi ahambela eCasino (North Beach). Sonke asihambisani nobugebengu nokuhlukunyezwa kwabagibeli. Abantu bazophepha noma belinde izimoto ngoba sekukhona ababhekelele umsebenzi erenki,” kusho uGcumisa.UMnuz Linda Nkosi, okhulumela inhlangano elwela amalungelo abashayeli bamatekisi iQina Mshayeli, uthe abahambisani nokuthi kuxoshwe bonke osicabha ngoba kukhona abawenza kahle umsebenzi.“Ukuxoshwa kosicabha kuyabalimaza abashayeli ngoba bazenzela konke. Sekufanele bazibalele imali, bazibizele abagibeli. Abanye bathe ngisho imali abayisebenza ngosuku inciphile njengoba bengasekho osicabha,” kusho uNkosi.Ucele ososeshini abahlukene ukuthi bangabaxoshi osicabha kodwa beze nezinhlelo zokubasiza ngoba sikhulu isibalo sabangasebenzi.Uthe abanye bondla izingane, imindeni yabo kwazise emakhaya amaningi abasekho abazali.
title: ‘Siqeda ukuhlukunyezwa kwabagibeli ngokuxosha osicabha’

text: NJENGOBA isihlehliselwe u-Agasti 8 inkulumo mpikiswano yokuchitha uMengameli Jacob Zuma, uMgqugquzeli we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uxwayise amalungu enhlangano ePhalamende afisa ukuvota namaqembu aphikisayo ngokuthi azoshushiswa.UMbalula uthe abamele amabhantshi noma imindeni yabo ePhalamende kodwa bamele i-ANC.“Uma sebefuna ukuhamba, bazixoshe bona emsebenzini bazovota namaqembu aphikisayo. Ngeke sihlonize sizobhekana nabo. Asikwazi uvota ne-DA. Ukuba yilungu lePhalamende kufana nokuba umuntu ogqoke ibhomu ongayiqhumisa noma yinini, uba yidelakufa. Uma inhlangano ithi enza lokhu noma ungahambisani nakho kumele ukwenze,” kusho uMbalula.Ukusho lokhu ekhuluma nabezindaba engqungqutheleni ye-ANC eNasrec, eGoli.Okhulumela ihhovisi likaSomlomo wePhalamende, uMnuz Moloto Mothapo, uthe ngemuva komhlangano namaqembu ahlukene ePhalamende kuvunyelwene ngokuthi aluhlehliswe usuku lwenkulumo lube ngo-Agasti 8. Phambilini bekubekwe ukuthi izoba ngo-Agasti 3.Uthe umnqamulajuqu wamaqembu wokuthi afisa kuvotwe ngayiphi indlela nguJulayi 14.“USomlomo uzobe esenquma ukuthi iyiphi indlela ezolandelwa uma sekuvotwa ngaphambi kuka-Agasti 8.”UMbalula uthe amalungu e-ANC ePhalamende ezwa ngekomiti lesigungu esiphezulu.“Ngeke sihoxise uMengameli ePhalamende noma kwi-ANC. Yingakho sithi amalungu kumele alandele lo myalelo. Isigungu esiphezulu sesibhunge kabanzi ngale ndaba kwavunyelwana ngokuthi uZuma akayi ndawo.”Uthe wonke amalungu alandela umyalelo wamaqembu awo uma kuza ezintweni ezifuze lezi.“Ngisho uMaimane (Mmusi-umholi we-DA) akazange amxoshe uHelen Zille (uNdunankulu waseWestern Cape) ngoba naye ulandela imigomo ethile. Nathi kwi-ANC senza lokho.”Uthe abakwazi ukutshelwa amanye amaqembu ukuthi kumele bayilawule kanjani i-ANC.
title: 'Sizobhekana nabazovota naphikisayo'

text: UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma usegxeke labo abayisa i-ANC enkantolo uma bengeneme.Uthe lokhu kuzokwenza kube nzima ukulawula inhlangano ngomuso.UZuma okhulume amahora amabili evula ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi eNasrec, eGoli, izolo uthe kumele kubuyelwe esinqumeni esathathwa sokuthi labo abayisa inhlangano ezinkantolo bathathwe njengabantu asebezixoshile.“Kumele kuphele ukuyiswa kwenhlangano ezinkantolo ngabangeneme. Amalungu e-ANC kumele asebenzise izinhlelo zangaphakathi uma enezinkinga. Amajaji akumele anqumele i-ANC ukuthi ikuphi okumele ikwenze,” kusho uZuma.Usho lokhu nje ngoLwesihlanu inkantolo yaseMgungundlovu inqume ukuhambisana nesinqumo esakhishwa enkantolo ngoSepthemba sokuthi ubuholi obachithwa besifundazwe buphume ehhovisi. Inkantolo yaseFree State inqume ukuthi ithathwe njengento engekho ingqungquthela yesifundazwe yakamuva, kwathi eNorth West inkantolo yachitha ingqungquthela yesifunda iBojanala kule ndawo.“Sikhona isinqumo esathathwa, kumele sibuyele kusona. Ubuholi baba neqhaza ekutheni lesi sinqumo singalandelwa. Kumele sibuyele kusona, uma ubuholi bungasilandeli kwabona buthathelwe izinyathelo ezinqala,” kusho uZuma kwaduma ihlombe.Uthe i-ANC kumele iphume nesu kule nkinga ukuze ingalahlekelwa ukwethenjwa.UZuma ugxeke namalungu enhlangano asebenzisana noma avota namaqembu aphikisayo noma le nhlangano isikhiphe umyalelo.Ubalule nokuthi i-ANC ineminyaka engu-105 yabakhona ngakho iyakwazi ukubhekana nezinto ezithinta ukuphakanyiselwa kwabaholi ezikhundleni eziphezulu.“Kuqopheke umlando abaholi abayisikhombisa bengenela umbango wokuhola le nhlangano. Lokhu kwenzeka kuphela kwi-ANC, ungakhetha noma ngubani kulaba abangu-7, uzobe unomengameli oqotho. Asinaso isimo esifana namakhosi, amagatsha ayazikhethela. Uyedwa ozokhethelwa ukuba ngumengameli kulaba abayisikhombisa,” kusho uZuma.Unxuse labo abazohlulwa ukuthi baseke labo abazowina.“Ngizobuyela lapho ngiphuma khona, ngilandele ngemuva ngilalele ozongihola. Uma ukwazi ukuphatha kumele uvumele ukuphathwa.”Uthe inhlangano itshengisa ukuthi inenqwaba yabaholi abazophatha.“Kwi-ANC sinenqwaba yabaholi, baningi ngozukwa. Ngaba nengxoxo eyakhayo nalaba baholi abayisikhombisa esidlweni esaziwa nge-Last Supper. Ngibazi kahle bonke, balungile, savumelana ngemigomo ye-ANC. Ngime la nje ngilindele noma ngubani ozowina engizombiza ngomengameli,” kusho uZuma.Ubalule nokuthelwa ngehlazo kwakhe emgubheni weCosatu woSuku lwaBasebenzi lapho abhikishelwa wangakwazi ukukhuluma kulo mgubho.“Yizinto okumele sibhunge ngazo lezi. Ngavalwa ukukhuluma emgubheni weCosatu ne-SACP. I-SACP ize yangenela ukhetho iyodwana, lezi zinto kumele sizixoxe.”Unxuse nobuholi bomakadebona benhlangano ukuthi bakhe inhlangano kungabi ibona abazoba yizinkinga zenhlangano.Uthe abantu bakhathele ukuthi i-ANC ilwa yodwa ekubeni bebhuqwa yindlala, bengasebenzi.“Kumele kuphele ukulwa sodwa, sibhekane nezinkinga zomphakathi. Abantu bayakhala ngokuthi inkohlakalo siyayigqiba okuyinto okumele siyiqede.”Uthe abafundi abangu-9 million bafunda mahhala, wathi izimpesheni zizokhokhwa yiposi.“Kukhona isikhathi lapho ngazi khona ukuthi ngisho izinto eningazithandi. Angibambe gqubu, ningamaqabane bami anginanxa nani,” kusho uZuma kwaduma ihlombe.Kudume ihlombe eqala inkulumo ebingelela iphini lakhe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.
title: #ANC54: UZuma ugxeka abafaka uKhongolose ezinkantolo

text: KUVELE ukuthi ayibanga budedengu indodana yowayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uDuduzane ngesikhathi ishayisana netekisi ngoFebhuwari ka-2014.Izolo ummeli kaDuduzane, U-Adv Mike Hellens, utshele iMantshi yeNkantolo yaseRandburg ukuthi umuntu ammele akabanga budedengu kodwa amanzi ayegcwele emgwaqweni yiwona aholela ekutheni iPorsche yakhe ibe sengozini.UHellens uthe uDuduzane wayeshayela ngokukhulu ukucophelela ngoba lalina izulu. Umshayeli wetekisi eyashayisana nemoto kaDuduzane, uMnuz Vusi Dlamini uthe, yize lalina izulu kodwa wayebona kahle emgwaqweni.Ufakazi woMbuso uMnuz Mthombisi Khumalo, oqashwe kwaSouth African Weather Service uthe akakwazi ukusho ukuthi kwana imvula engakanani ngelanga lengozi.UDlamini uthe ngaphambi kokwehlelwa yingozi lalina kakhulu, izitamkoko ziphuphuma amanzi. Uthe lapho okwehla khona ingozi amanzi ayekhona emgwaqweni.UDuduzane ubebhekene namacala amabili okubulala ngokungenhloso emuva kokuthi ingozi iholele ekushoneni kukaNksz Phumzile Dube noNksz Nanki Jeanette Mashaba.UNksz Dube washona emuva kokuthi iPosche kaDuduzane ishayisene netekisi emgwaqeni uN1 eGoli, uNksz Mashaba washonela esibhedlela.Inkantolo ilihoxisile icala lesibili lokubulala ngokungenhloso emuva kokuthi umbiko wodokotela uveze ukuthi uNksz Mashaba wayevele ehlushwa ngesinye isifo.UDlamini uthe akayibonanga imoto kaZuma kodwa wabona kukhanya amalambu wezwa sekushayiseka itekisi lakhe waquleka. Icala liyaqhubeka.
title: Ingozi yadalwa yimvula: ummeli kaDuduzane

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezaseKhaya kuleli uMnuz Malusi Gigaba unxuse amalungu e-ANCYL ukuba aphume ezindabeni ze-ANC wathi awanake izinkinga zentsha.Ekhuluma emcimbini wokugujwa koSuku lweNtsha ngesikhathi evakashele umndeni kamengameli wokuqala we-ANCYL, uMnuz Anton Lembede eMbumbulu ngoMgqibelo, uGigaba uthe abaholi be-ANCYL kumele baqhube imfundo phambili futhi bahloniphe.“Kumele abaholi be-ANCYL basike iphethini kuLembede owayeyisigayigayi esikhonze imfundo futhi esinenhlonipho,” kusho uGigaba.Uthe intsha yakuleli ibhekene nezinkinga eziningi idinga abaholi be-ANCYL ukuba ibaxazulelele zona.“Uma amalungu e-ANCYL nobuholi bayo bengazinaki izinkinga zentsha lokho kungenza ukuthi uKhongolose ulahlekelwe ivoti labantu abasha,” kusho uGigaba oke waba ngumholi we-ANCYL.UGigaba uphinde wahambela nasethuneni likaLembede lapho efike amhlonipha khona waphinde watshela abantu ngomlando waleli qhawe.“Ithuna likaLembede kumele libe isiziba lapho amalungu e-ANCYL eKZN ephuza khona amanzi,” kusho uGigaba.Uthembise umndeni kaLembede ukuthi uzozisukumela izicelo zawo kuhulumeni.Okhulumela lo mndeni, uNkk Sibongile Lembede-Gumede uthe uhulumeni kaKhongolose wabathembisa izinto eziningi kubalwa nokwakhiwa kwesikhungo i-multi purpose centre ngo-2002 kodwa kuze kube manje akukaze kwenziwe lutho.Uthe bayabonga ukuthi umgwaqo omkhulu eThekwini obuwaziwa ngoSmith uqanjwe ngoLembede.“Sifisa ukuthi igama lakhe kuqanjwe ngalo nezakhiwo yikhona iqhaza lakhe emzabalazweni lizohlale likhumbuleka,” kusho uNkk Lembede-Gumede.UGigaba uthe bashaya amakhala ngendlela uLembede ashona ngayo.Babenokusola ngokushona kukaLembede kodwa bekungekho ababengakwenza ngoba wayeshone kudala kakhulu.ULembede washona eneminyaka engu-33, ngo-1947.
title: UGigaba unxuse i-ANCYL ukuba iphume ezindabeni ze-ANC

text: OKLEBE baphenya icala lokubulawa kwephoyisa lesifazane elineminyaka engu-25, okuthiwa lidutshulwe ngumlisa ongaziwa ngoLwesihlanu, kwa- E, eMlaza.Kuthiwa iphoyisa elinguConstable Portia Mhlanga, belisebenzela esiteshini esikuleli lokishi. Beliselivini ngenkathi lihlaselwa. Kubikwa ukuthi kuqhamuke umsolwa obhekise isibhamu ngakulo, lisalinde isoka lalo emotweni. Umsolwa kubikwa ukuthi udubule amahlandla amahlanu, maqede wanyamalala emehlweni.UCaptain Simphiwe Mhlongo, okhulumela oKlebe, uthe ithimba lophiko lobugebengu obuhleliwe eThekwini, limatasa nophenyo lokubulawa kwephoyisa.“Imbangela yokubulawa kwalo ayikaziwa. Akukaboshwa muntu,” kubeka uCapt Mhlongo.Umufi ubelinde isoka lakhe ebelisangene endaweni yokudla ekuleli lokishi, Ebenvilla ngenkathi kugasela umsolwa okuthiwa umdubule kwesingenhla emzimbeni.Amaphoyisa kubikwa ukuthi athole izinhlamvu ezine endaweni yesigameko.Kuthiwa umufi, ushone esesibhedlela, iPrince Mshiyeni Memorial.
title: Kuphenywa ngokubulawa kwephoyisa

text: KUZOQHUTSHEKWA nokuthethwa kwecala lephini lika Khomishana wamaPhoyisa eNorth West, uMajor General William Mpembe nabanye abangu-8 eNkantolo ePhakeme yaseNorth West ngoMsombuluko.Bonke abasolwa babhekene namacala aphathelene nokudubula eduze kwaseRustenburg ngaphambi kwesigameko sokudutshulwa kwabasebenzi basemayini iLonmin ngo-Agasti 2012.UMpembe osesebenza njengenhloko yonogada emayini yaseMarikana, usolwa ngokubulala uMnuz Semi Jokanisi, Tembelakhe Mati, uWarrant Officer Hendrik Tsietsi Monene noWarrant Officer Sello Ronnie Lepaauku.Uboshwe noColonel osewathatha umhlalaphansi, uSalmon Johannes Vermaak (53), uConstable Nkosana Mguye (38), uWarrant Officer Masilo Mogale (49), uWarrant Officer Katlego Joseph Sekgweleya (39) noKhazamola Phillip Makhubela (49), abasolwa ngokubulala uPumsile Sokhanyile.UVermaak ubhekene nelinye icala lokwephula ingalo yomthetho nokuphikisana nomthetho wekhomishini.UMpembe noVermaak badedelwa ngebheyili kaR5 000 umuntu ngamunye kanti, uMguye, uMogale, noSekgweleya badedelwa ngebheyili kaR2 000 umuntu ngamunye.UMpembe (55), ubhekene nelinye icala lokuphikisana nomthetho wekhomishini, ne-Independent Police Investigative Directorate Act. UMpembe uphinde abhekane nelinye icala lokwephula umthetho. Ubekwe leli cala noGideon van Zyl, uDingaan Madoda no-Oupa Pule.OVan Zyl, uMadoda noPule basolakala ngokufihla ukuthi umsebenzi wasemayini uModisaotsile van Wyk Sagalala washona eboshiwe ngesikhathi ehanjiswa emayini iLonmin ngo-16 Agasti 2012.UVan Zyl, uMadoda noPule bakhishwe ngesexwayiso.
title: Liyaqhubeka elabasolwa ngokubulala abavukuzi eMarikana

text: IMEYA yaseNkandla uMnuz Thamsanqa Ntuli iphume icikekile enkantolo emuva kokuthi kubhuntshe ukuqala kokuqulwa kwecala layo lokwephula imigomo yokumiswa kokusebenza okujwayelekile kwezwe. UNtuli ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi eNkandla kuleli sonto ngethemba lokuthi icala lakhe lizoqala ukuqulwa kodwa lahlehla ngenxa yokuthi uMbuso uthe awukakulungeli ukuqala.Indaba yaqala ngokuthi uNtuli aphe abantu ukudla edolobheni eNkandla ngesikhathi sekuvaliwe ukuhlangana kwabantu ngemizamo yokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCorona. Kwabonakala nezimoto zamaphoyisa ziyingxenye yalo mbuthano okwakukhishwa kuwo izijumbane zokudla.Noma engathandandanga uNtuli ukwanda kakhulu ngecala kodwa ukuvezile ukuthi usamile ekutheni ikhona ipolitiki phakathi kuleli cala. Ubale nezikhulu zikahulumeni ezenza into efanayo zangaboshwa kodwa yena uyaboshwa, wathi kukhona ukukhetha iphela emasini.UNtuli nePhini lakhe uNkk Nonhlanhla Nzuza noSomlomo uMnuz Sibusiso  Sibiya babhekene namacala emuva kokuboshwa futhi baphuma ngebheyili kaR1 000 umuntu ngamunye.UNtuli ubehambisana nabanye abasebenzi bakamasipala namakhansela amqinisa idolo.Icala lihlehlele uJuni 23 nalapho kulindeleke ukuthi liqale khona ukuqulwa futhi uMbuso uthembise ukuthi cishe uyobe usumi ngomumo.
title: Imeya icikwe wukuhlehla kwecala

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi ibisaba ihlazo lokukhulelisa ingane yasekhweni layo inyanga edumile okuthiwa iphuze amaphilisi ne-brake fluid yazibulala.Le nyanga ebiyaziwa kakhulu ngelikaMkhulu Mthethwa waseMandlankala, eSikhaleni, ishonele esibhedlela phakathi nesonto emuva kokuthi ingeniswe isesimeni esibi. Umthombo othembekile olwazi kahle udaba uthe umufi ubenengoduso emzini ongumakhelwane kodwa futhi ejola nengane yakhona eneminyaka engavumelekile ukuba sekungayiwa nayo ocansini.Ngokomthetho wakuleli umuntu ubekwa icala lokudlwengula uma eye ocansini nentombazane eneminyaka engu-15 nangaphansi.Kuvela ukuthi indaba ivelile, inyanga yabona ukuthi ibhemile kungcono ife. Kuthiwa umjolo wayo nengane encane ibiwufihlile kodwa indaba yonakale ngokuthi kuhlale isisu nokwenze indaba yahlala obala.“Ungeniswe egunjini labagula kakhulu wagcina eshonile ebusuku emuva kokuphuza i-brake fluid namaphilisi. Ubedume kakhulu ngokwelapha abaningi bayamazi uMkhulu Mthethwa,’’ kulanda umthombo ocele ukuba lingaphathwa nangengozi igama lawo.Umufi kuthiwa ubebuye athwasise futhi ukhiqize inqwaba yasebesebenza ngokuzimela.Ithimba leSolezwe ngeSonto livakashele umndeni kamufi liyowubuza kabanzi ngalolu daba kodwa lafike lanqwamana nenkinga.Isingqongqo samadodana kamufi eholwa wuyise omncane abehleli phansi kwendlu emthunzini avumile ukuthi uyise akasekho kodwa athi ngeke alandise abezindaba ngoba bazoneka amahlazo kamufi emaphepheni.Umfowabo kamufi uthe akubhalwe umlando wakhe hhayi okunye okuhlangene nembangela yokufa kwakhe.“Niyahlupha nina bephepha, nihamba niyofuna amahemuhemu nibhale wona bese indaba niyibeka ngendlela yenu. Siyathanda ukuthi kubhalwe umlando womfowethu kodwa hhayi okunye. Kuzoba nani uma nibhala ningasho ukuthi ubulawe yini?” kubuza umfowabo kamufi.Abebehleli endlini besifazane bathumele umyalezo wokuthi ngeke bakhulume lutho ephepheni. Bekubonakala ukuthi umoya uphansi kwabomndeni bebukeka bedangele ngokufa kukasokhaya. Indlu abesebenzela kuyona ibivalwe, kunezindwangu zengwe emawindini.Le nyanga idume kakhulu nangokuhanjwa wosaziwayo ngisho bakwazinye izifundazwe. Kukhona ngisho umculi kamaskandi omgagula engomeni embonga ngamandla akhe uMkhulu Mthethwa.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula komndeni wentombazane igcine ingaphumelelanga njengoba isiqhoqho samadodana kamufi enqabele izintatheli ukuthi zingalubhadi kulo mndeni ongumakhelwane.Basabise nangokwenzakalisa ithimba leSolezwe ngeSonto uma like laveza isizathu esiholele ekufeni kukayise.
title: 'Uzibulele' esaba ihlazo lokukhulelisa ekhweni

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEIQEMBU lezombusazwe, iNFP, lithi isigebengu esidlule emhlabeni ngoLwesibili emva kokuxinwa ukugula, u-Ananias Mathe, wayevele efanelwe isigwebo sentambo kudala. I-NFP iveze lokhu ngoLwesithathu ntambama esitatimendeni emva kokusabalala kwezindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kukaMathe ngoLwesibili ebusuku. UMathe ushone esibhedlela iKing Edward VIII Hospital emva kokuxinwa ukugula okubikwa ukuthi kuphathelene nenkinga yokugaya ukudla esiswini. Udlule emhlabeni nje uMathe ubekade edonsa isigwebo seminyaka engu-54 ejele ngamacala okubalwa kuwo awokuphanga kuhlonyiwe, ukudlwengula, ukubulala nokugqekeza.Okhulumela i-NFP KwaZulu-Natal, u-Erickson Zungu, uthe uMathe nezinye izigebengu eziyingozi njengaye emphakathini bafanelwe isigwebo sentambo.“I-NFP ikholelwa ekutheni izigebengu ezifana noMathe kumele ngabe zithola isigwebo sentambo ngamacala okubulala,” kusho uZungu esitatimendeni.“Kuyiqiniso elingeliphikiswe ukuthi uhulumeni angakwazi ukonga imali nesikhathi ukube iziboshwa ezinamacala afana nakaMathe zithola isigwebo sentambo. Imali yabakhokhi bentela esetshenziswa zinsuku zonke kuyena ejele ibingasebenza kwezinye izindawo,” kuqhuba yena.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uMathe waba yisiboshwa sokuqala ukweqa ejele iC-Max ePitoli ngonyaka ka-2006, wabanjwa emva kwenyanga eqile. Ngo-2005 weqa eJohannesburg Central Police Station.  Ngonyaka ka-2009 wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-54 ejele emva kokulahlwa amacala angu-64 ayebekwe wona.UZungu uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi uhulumeni uvule inkundla yokuthi abantu baphawule odabeni lwesigwebo sentambo ngoba ayisizi indlela umthetho osebenza ngayo namhlanje.“Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi uhulumeni ubone ukuthi isicelo sethu sokuthi kubuyekezwe isinqumo ngesigwebo sentambo kuleli asithinti kuphela ukuqondisa ubugwegwe emphakathini, kodwa singehlisa nobugebengu,” kusho yena.
title: 'Izigebengu ezifana noMathe zifanelwe isigwebo sentambo' - NFP

text: KUHLUKENE imibono kumaqembu aphikisayo mayelana nenkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni ethulwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ePhalamende izolo.UMholi weDA, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, uthe uma umengameli eqala ebheka okufunwa abantu phambili bazozwana kodwa uma esabeka phambili lokho okufunwa abaholi be-ANC bazohlale bengaboni ngasolinye.Uthe ubengajabula ukuthi zonke izikhulu ze-ANC ezithinteka kwinkohlakalo yaseBosasa sezizobhekana nokushushiswa.“Lezi zinsolo azizintsha kumele ngabe sekukhona asebeboshiwe,” kusho uMaimane.UMengameli we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema uthe isizathu esidale ukuthi bangayinyomfi izolo ukuthi uRamaphosa ukwenzile lokhu abebekufuna ukuthi achaze ngodaba lweBosasa ngaphambi kokuthi athule inkulumo yakhe.UMalema uthe uRamaphosa uphumile kumqulu wokhetho we-ANC wanquma ukuntshontsha amaphuzu akumqulu wabo wokhetho.Umholi we-FFPlus, uDkt Pieter Groenewald, uxwayise ngokuthi uma uRamaphosa eqhubeka nohlelo lokuthathwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo ngeke aze awukhulise umnotho wezwe.UMgcinimafa jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Paul Mashatile, uthe bayayamukela inkulumo kaRamaphosa, wathi ibinesigqi.UMashatile uthe bayakwamukela futhi ukubuyiswa koFezela ukuze kuqiniswe izinhlaka zokulwa nenkohlakalo.Umholi weGood Party, uNkk Patricai de Lille, uthe uyamuzwa umengameli ukhuluma ngezinhlelo ezintsha kodwa ufisa ukwazi ukuthi kwenzekeni ngezinhlelo ezindala okwakukade kwakukhulunywa ngazo.Uthe ujabule ngohlelo lwe-Early Childhood Development.“Uhulumeni angakwazi ukukhulisa umnotho wezwe ngokuthi afake kakhulu imali kwingqalasizinda,” kusho uNkk De Lille.Umholi weCope, uMnuz Mosiuoa Lekota, uthe bengalindele okutheni enkulumeni kamengameli ngoba vele bekuphindwa izithembiso ezindala.Uthe ukwethulwa kwalenkulumo sekuphenduke umbukiso wemfashini, ayiqhamuki namasu okuxazulula izinkinga ezibhekene nomphakathi.
title: Kuhlukene imibono ngenkulumo

text: BABHEKENE ngeziqu zamehlo abadlali beBlack Leopards emuva kokuthi kuvele ukuthi kuneqeqebana labadlali abadala abakhonondo ngezizumbulu zemali eziholwa ngabadlali abasanda kufika.Ngokwemithombo eyehlukene, abadlali beLeopards abasuke neqembu kwiNational First Division (NFD), abanye abazalelwe eLimpopo, bathi abadlali abasha baphathiswa okwamaqanda futhi bagoduka netshe lemali uma kuphela inyanga. Kuvela nokuthi abanye abadlali kabaneme ngokunikezwa ibhande kukaThabo “Festival” Matlaba kube kukhona abadlali abazi yonke into ngeqembu abaneminyaka belidlalela.Iqembu laseLimpopo lisanda kusayina uMatlaba, Thuso Phala, Cuthbert Malajila noMogakolodi Ngele, ukubala nje abambalwa.“Abadlali abadala eqenjini kabaneme neze ngendlela abaphathwa ngayo abadlali abasha. Ngaphandle nje kokuthi bahamba netshe lemali kodwa indlela okwenziwa ngayo izinto ayigculisi neze futhi ayilingani. Basola nomqeqeshi uLionel Soccoia ngokwenzelela futhi sebemfuna ehambile ngoba uyehluleka ukubumba iqembu,” kusho umthombo osendelene neLeopards.Esinye isizathu esivezwe ngomunye umthombo ngesokuthi iqeqebana labadlali “bendawo” kaleneme ngokunikwa kukaMatlaba ibhande ngoba likholwa wukuthi bakhona abadlali abadala abangalihola ngobuqotho iqembu.“Unikwe kanjani uMatlaba ibhande efika nje eqenjini? Yini le engaka aseyazi ngeqembu ukudlula abadlali bendawo futhi asebehlale iminyaka eqenjini?” usho kanje omunye umthombo.ILeopards isadliwe kuyo yomibili imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership esayidlalile. Ishaywe yiPolokwane City ngo 1-0, yaphinde yashaywa yiKaizer Chiefs ngendlela efanayo ngeledlule.Ibuzwa ngoqhekeko eqenjini, iTechnical Director yeLidoda Duvha, uMlungisi “Professor” Ngubane, ithe: “Akukho okusafike kimina kwabikwa ngalokho, ngakho kunzima ukuphawula, ikakhulukazi odabeni oluthinta imali ngoba luphethwe ngusihlalo weqembu uqobo.“Odabeni lokukhethwa kukakaputeni, hhayi ngicabanga ukuthi wumona nje wabadlali ojwayelekile ngoba phela ngeke uvele usuke nje ukhethe ukaputeni noma yimuphi. Siyaye sibheke amava omdlali nokuthi uyakwazi yini ukuthwala iqembu emahlombe akhe noma izikhathi zinzima. Yilezi zizathu ezenza kwakhethwa uMatlaba.”I-Leopards izobuyela emidlalweni ye-Absa Premiership ngokubhekana neHighlands Park eThohoyandou Stadium, ngo-Aagsti 24. Kule mpelasonto ngeke idlale ngoba kuzobe khona imidlalo yeMTN 8 engekho kuyona.
title: Babhekene ngeziqu zamehlo abadlali bele-PSL

text: USALE ushaqekile umphakathi wakwa-F KwaMashu, kubulawa umlisa ongumshayeli wamabhasi angaphansi kukaMasipala weTheku, ehlezi nonkosikazi wakhe emzini wabo ngoLwesibili ntambama.Kubikwa ukuthi umufi uMnuz Obert Zulu ( 58) uhlaselwe ngamadoda angaziwa okubikwa ukuthi abelokhu ezulazula ngePolo emhlophe ngakwakhe ngabo-6 ntambama. Kuthiwa abasolwa abebehlome beyizingovolo, bafike badedela intululwane yezinhlamvu emzini kamufi.UZulu kubikwa ukuthi uphelele endaweni yesigameko. Inkosikazi yakhe elimale kanzima, iphuthunyiswe emtholampilo wendawo.Indodana yabo abahlala nayo, kuthiwa bebeyithume esitolo ngesikhathi kugasela abasolwa. Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje, Isolezwe lisanda kubika ngokudutshulwa komunye umshayeli wamabhasi emasontweni edlule kulo leli lokishi. Umsolwa owazenza umgibeli, kuthiwa wavulela ngenhlamvu ngaphandle  kwengxabano, edubula umshayeli owashonela endaweni yesehlakalo.Umthombo wephephandaba uthe kusolwa ukuthi ukufa kukaZulu kuhlangene nezinkinga ezikhungethe abasebenzi bamabhasi angaphansi kukamasipala. “Abasolwa badedele intululwane yezinhlamvu ezilinganiselwa kwezingu-12 kuya phezulu. Amagobolondo ezinhlamvu abewubusaphasapha egcwele yonke indawo lapho okwenzeke khona isigameko. Namalungu omphakathi asashaqekile ngokuhlaselwa kukamufi nenkosikazi yakhe,” kusho umthombo.Uthe isimo simuncu endaweni njengoba umphakathi uthukile ngokubulawa kwabashayeli kuleli lokishi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseThekwini uSuperintendent Parboo Sewpersad, uthe ubengakayitholi imibiko mayelana nesigameko. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe, " Amaphoyisa asesiteshini saKwaMashu aphenya  icala lokubulawa komlisa odutshulwe ngamadoda angaziwa," kubeka uCap Gwala.
title: Bashaqekile kubulawa umshayeli wamabhasi

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns kuMultichoice Diski Challenge (MDC), uDavid Notoane, akazimisele ngokuthi icala elibekwe iqembu nomdlali wakhe uThabang Sibanyoni, ligubuzele izinhloso abanazo zokukhala bemuke nesicoco sale ligi.NgoLwesithathu oluzayo iSundowns nomdlali bazovela ngaphansi kwekomiti lePremier Soccer League lokuqondisa ubugwegwe ngemuva kokubekwa icala lokudlalisa uSibanyoni enamakhadi amane aphuzi. Lokhu kwenzeka ngesikhathi i’Downs ibambana ngo 1-1 neChippa United ngoDisemba 4. USibanyoni nguyena owashaya igoli lamaBrazilians.Nokho ngaphambi kwalokho uNotoane uhlalelwe wumsebenzi wokulungiselela iqembu lakhe njengoba lizoqhuthana neFree State Stars ngeSonto eTUT Stadium ngo-12 emini. ISundowns izoza kulo mdlalo izihola phezulu ngamaphuzu angu-28 emidlalweni engu-12.“Ngeke ngikhulume ngecala ngoba yinto yomthetho. Okwami wukulungiselela iqembu ukuthi likwazi ukuthola amaphuzu amathathu esiwabhekile emdlalweni weStars. Empeleni kule midlalo emithathu esele sifuna amaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye. Okuzokwenza ngaphandle kwenkundla sizokubona uma sekuphume isinqumo esizobheka ukuthi sisithinta kanjani,” kusho uNotoane.ISundowns isiphunyukwe yisicoco seMDC kabili selokhu uqalalile lo mqhudelwano ngo-2015. Yahlulwa yi-University of Pretoria kowamanqamu ngesikhathi kusadlalwa ngamaqoqo. Nyakenye iphucwe iqatha yiLamontville Golden Arrows njengoba manje ingase iphazanyiswe yileli cala.Kulokhu amaqembu asembangweni nayo, yiBloemfontein Celtic abashiyana ngephuzu njengoba inamaphuzu angu-27 bese kuba yiMaritzburg United enamaphuzu angu-25.Uma nawo la maqembu engaqhubeka nokuqoqa amaphuzu kungenzeka kushube ngemidlalo yokugcina yeligi ngoFebhuwari 25.ISundowns isalewe yiStars, iKaizer Chiefs neCape Town City. IPhunya Sele Sele izobhekana ne-Orlando Pirates ngempelasonto, bese kulandela i-Ajax Cape Town ivale ngeBaroka FC.ITeam of Choice kule mpelasonto ivakashela iBidvest Wits, ilandelise ngePolokwane City ngaphambi kokuvala umcimbi ne-Ea Lla Koto.Imidlalo yangempelasonto yeMDCKusasa: Ajax Cape Town v Chippa United (10am, Ikamva Stadium); Orlando Pirates v Bloem Celtic (10am, Rand Stadium); Cape Town City v Baroka FC (10am, Gugulethu).NgeSonto: Bidvest Wits v Maritzburg United (10am, Sturrock Park); Highlands Park v Platinum Stars (12pm, Makhulong Stadium); Kaizer Chiefs v Golden Arrows (12pm, Dobsonville Stadium); Mamelodi Sundowns v Free State Stars (12pm, TUT Stadium); Polokwane City v SuperSport United (12pm, Peter Mokaba).
title: OweDowns uwafuna womathathu kuStars

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUSIHLALO weMaritzburg United, uFarouk Kadodia, uthi bazohlala phansi, bacwaninge imbangela yokujwayelwa wumkhuba wokuhlale bevika izembe.Kube injabulo yodwa kubalandeli banobhutshuzwayo KwaZulu-Natal, izembe lingagadli kumaqembu akulesi sifundazwe ayibamba kwiDStv Premiership.Bekubanjwe umoya ngeTeam of Choice ehlale emaqenjini abesemsileni iqala isizini ka-2020/21. Nakuba ngesizini ka-2019/20 yasongwa ikweyesikhombisa, kulokhu iqede ikweyesi-13, ngamaphuzu awu-30. Kowokugcina ibambane ngeqanda nomkhaya bayo, AmaZulu kobuseHarry Gwala Stadium, ngoMgqibelo.Ukuba nesizini embi ngalolu hlobo, iMaritzburg yayikugcine ngeka-2018/19 ibuya emidlalweni yokuhlunga iqeqeshwa u-Eric Tinkler. Enye eyaba yimbi ngeka-2015/16, isonga ikweyesi-14.Kulokhu iqembu eliya kweyokuhlunga iChippa United esonge isendaweni ka-15, ngamaphuzu awu-27.I-Black Leopards idliwe yizembe."Iyasijwayela le nto yokuthi kuwo wonke amasizini silwele ukuvika izembe. Sifike senze kahle kule sizini kuthi kwelandelayo sibe enkingeni efanayo. Uma kuzohlale kunjena ngeke sikuthokozele ukudlala esigabeni esikhulu. Angazi ngingakuchaza kanjani ukuphatheka kabi nokutatazela ebenginakho kule midlalo emine yokugcina. Imiphumela yayo iyona ecacise okuningi. Kuyangijabulisa ukuthi sigcine silivikile izembe kodwa kuzomele sihlale phansi sibheke imbangela yokuhlale sivika izembe. Mhlawumbe inkinga ikuthina, kuzomele sizihlole thina uqobo. Isimo esenzeke kwisizini ka-2020/21 kangisidingi kweka-2021/22. Nathi sidinga ukubalwa namaqembu aphezulu,“ kusho uKadodia.UKadodia obezwakala ukuthi uthokozile, uthe ziningi izinto ezibe nomthelela wokuba nesizini embi."Phakathi kwalezi zinto wukushintshwa kwabaqeqeshi, ezinye ngeke ngizidalule. Nokungabi bikho kwabalandeli kungenzeka ukuthi kube nomthelela. Abalandeli bethu bayinsika yeqembu, bahlale beseseka kukhona konke. Nokho angeke ngaphika ngalokhu, namanye amaqembu abedlala ngaphandle kwabalandeli.“Mayelana nezinhlelo zesizini ezayo, uthe: "Kuzoba nezinkulu izinguquko ngesizini ezayo. Sizongena sigxile emakethe, sizoqinisa zonke izindawo. Njengoba sengishilo, lesi simo esiphuma kuso kangisidingi ngesizini ezayo. Okunye okungithokozisayo ukuthi nomqeqeshi (Ernst Middendorp) uzoyiqala isizini, akwazi ukuthola isikhathi sokuyilungiselela. Imininingwane eminingi ngizoyidalula uma sesihlale phansi nomqeqeshi, sadweba uhlelo lwesizini ezayo.“Lesi sikhulu sibe sesibongela AmaZulu ngokuthola ithuba lokuyodlala kwiCaf Champions League. Asonge esendaweni yesibili.Siphinde safisela iRoyal AM neRichards Bay ukuthi bagcine bengenile kwiDStv Premiership.Sithe ukwanda kwamaqembu akulesi sifundazwe esigabeni esiphezulu kuzokwenza zibe lula izinto.
title: Akasafuni nokuyibona eyokuvika izembe oweMaritzburg

text: I-SXSW ingezinye zezingqungquthela ezihlonishwa umhlaba wonke futhi ezifukula amaciko eminxeni eminingi.USduduzo Myeni, usagobe amadlangala e-Eastern Cape lapho esebenza khona njengomxhumanisi wezobuCiko e-University of Fort Hare.“Nami ngiqokwe ukuba ngibe sethimbeni eliyocobelelana ulwazi nabanye ongoti bakwamanye amazwe. Ingqungquthela izoqala ngoMashi 9 (esho namhlanje) ize iphothulwe ngomhla ka-19.”Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo lithole ukuthi iSXSW ingolunye lwezinhlelo ezixhaswe wuMnyango wokuHwebelana nezeziMboni ne-IMEXSA (International Music Exporters South Africa).Izinga layo lilinganiswa nombuthano oba minyaka yonke eCanada noMeyi naseFrance ngoJuni.Uthe yena uqokwe ngenxa yamagalelo akhe ekufukuleni ezobuciko eNingizimu Afrika. “Amaciko nababambe iqhaza emculweni njengami bazothola ithuba lokuvezela umhlaba ukuthi senzani ukuthuthukisa umkhakha wezobuciko eNingizimu Afrika.”USduduzo usesebenze nezingwazi eziningi zakuleli okubalwa kuzo umufi uBusi Mhlongo, Gloria Bosman, Siphokazi, Zuluboy, Cama Gwini, Pu2ma, Zonke Dikana,Isabella Novella, Jimmy Dludlu, Zamajobe, Ringo Madlingozi, Sipho Mabuse, Zakwe, The Soil, Mtiki Afrique, Musa Mashiane noSimphiwe Dana.Le ntokazi isebenze kakhulu nengqalabutho kwezomculo nengumsunguli wenkampani iNative Rhythms, uSipho ‘Malambule’ Sithole.USduduzo uthe uzobe ebambe iqhaza lapho kuzobe kudingidwa khona ngezihloko ezihlukahlukene.“Esinye sazo yilesi esizodingidwa kwiKZN Music Imbizo ka-2019 esithi Ukuphatha Imboni Yomculo, Wumsebenzi Kabani Ngempela” ebhasini ezobe ithwele izivakashi nase- University Of North of TEXAS e-Austin.Ngaphandle kwamava, uSduduzo ubuye agabe ngolwazi aluthole ngemfundo.Uphothule iziqu zeBA in Communications azenze e-University of Zululand ngo-2001 futhi uyaziqhuba eFort Hare.Useke wasebenza kwiShanghai Expo ebiseChina ngo-2010, wadlulela kwiHip Hop Summit eParis, SA nasePortugal. Esephetha uSduduzo, uthe ulwazi azolithekela kongoti baphesheya uzoludlulisela emacikweni akuleli asafufusa.
title: OwaseMtubatuba uyomela leli e-USA kwezobuciko

text: MINENHLE MKHIZEA KAZI ukuthi kumele ajabule noma akhale yini umqeqeshi wonozinti kuMaritzburg United, u-Arthur Bartman, ozobhekana neqembu lakhe lakudala iKaizer Chiefs okokuqala selokhu egaxe amakhokho emgibeni ekupheleni kwesizini edlule.UBartman udle isicoco se-Absa Premiership neNedbank Cup neChiefs ngesizini edlule ngaphambi kokuthi athathe isinqumo sokuwagaxa emgibeni amakhokho.Akuphelanga sikhathi esingakanani wathola umsebenzi wokucija onozinti ku-Team of Choice ngemuva kokushiya kukaRonnie Kanalelo oseyiphini lomqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe laseNamibia. Kusasa ngo-8.15 ebusuku iTeam of Choice izoshukana naMakhosi emdlalweni weligi.“Angazi kumele ngenzenjani kwazise kusahleli imicabango emihle ngeChiefs. Yiqembu enginqobe nalo izicoco nemiklomelo kodwa konke lokho kuzomele ngikukhohlwe ngoMgqibelo (kusasa) ngoba manje sengisebenzela iMaritzburg okuyiyona engiholela zinyanga zonke. Ngingakujabulela ukuthi sibuye namaphuzu yize ngazi kahle ukuthi kuba ngumqansa kangakanani njengoba sidlala nompetha beligi abafuna ukubuyela ezingeni labo ngemuva kokungaqali kahle kweyeligi,” kusho uBartman.KuChiefs uhlale amasizini amahlanu. Ngaphandle kokudla izicoco ezimbili ngesizini edlule uBartman uhlabane ngeseTelkom Knockout amahlandla amabili neseMTN 8.Ngo-2010 uqokwe njengonozinti ovelele kuTelkom Knokcout edlalwe kabili ngonyaka owodwa. Ngesizini edlule uvimbe umdlalo owodwa kuphela bewashiswa ijezi yiBidvest Wits ibathela othulini ngo 3-2.“Akukho okutheni engizocebisa ngakho abadlali. IChiefs yiqembu elihlezi livela kuthelevishini. Ukudlala neChiefs kukodwa kuhlezi kubagqugquzela abadlali. Nakulokhu kuzoba yinto efanayo. Emidlalweni yethu emibili edlule asizange senze kahle, ngakho sibheke ukubuyisela izinto esimweni,” kusho uBartman.IMaritzburg neChiefs basesimweni esifanayo. Ngemuva kwemidlalo emithathu bobabili sebeqoqe amaphuzu amane. IChiefs ishaye iMpumalanga Black Aces emdlalweni wokuqala kwathi kowesibili yadlala ngokulingana neMoroka Swallows njengoba kowokugcina ivithizwe yiSuperSport United ngo 3-1. Ngakolunye uhlangothi iTeam of Choice iqumbe phansi iPolokwane City ngo 1-0, kowesibili yanabiswa yiFree State Stars ngo 2-0 kwathi kowokugcina yadlala ngokulingana ne-University of Pretoria.Emidlalweni emine edlule iChiefs yehlulekile wukushaya i-United.
title: UBartman ufikelwa wukudideka

text: INHLOKO yabaqeqeshi kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uManqoba "TV" Mngqithi, ishaya amakhala ngokuthi ezayo zihlulekile ukucosha amaphuzu aphelele emidlalweni emibili yakamuva, zahluleka nokushaya igoli. Yize engeneme ngalokhu uMngqithi, uthe uwubheke ngabomvu umdlalo wezakhe neSwallows FC ngempelasonto. Izinyoni zizovakashela amaBrazilians emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eLucas Masterpieces Moripe Stadium, ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama.Okwenza uMngqithi ajahe ukudlala neSwallows wukuthi ezakhe zidlale ngokulingana emidlalweni yakamuva emibili. Lokhu kusho ukuthi emaphuzwini ayisithupha, bathole amaphuzu amabili kuphela ."Akufani nhlobo nje neSundowns ukwehluleka ukushaya igoli, nokudlala ngokulingana kuze kube kabili. Kodwa nginethemba abafana bazobuya ngamandla kungekudala," usho kanje uMngqithi ngemuva kokudlala ngokulingana ngo 0-0 neBloemfontein Celtic ngoLwesibili. Ngeledlule kube ngesifanayo kwiSundowns, idlala ngokulingana ngomphumela ofanayo neSuperSport United. Amaphuzu amane alahlwe yiSundowns, asondeze iSwallows kwi-log. "Sidlala neSwallows engasibeke thuba kwi-log, ngakho kumele sizibambe ziqine ngoba basemuva kwethu ngephuzu (ngaphambi komdlalo wayizolo weSwallows neChippa United). Sibheke umdlalo ozoba mnandi kakhulu ngoMgqibel. Sobona iyozala nkomoni," usho kanje uMngqithi.Yize kumjabulisa uMngqithi ukuthi ezakhe azikashaywa selokhu kuqale isizini, ukwehluleka ukushaya amagoli, akumphathi kahle neze."Umdlalo wethu neCeltic ungijabulisile kakhulu uma ngiwuqhathanisa noweSuperSport. Indlela ebesihambisa ngayo ibhola, nendlela esakhe ngayo amathuba ingijabulisile. U-Erasmus (Kermit), ube neshwa bekumele okungenani ashaye amagoli amathathu kulo mdlalo kodwa zaphika izinto," kusho uMngqithi.Okunye okuzonezezela ekutheni umdlalo weSundowns neSwallows ushube, ukuthi uBrendon Truter weZinyoni nomgadli wazo uRuzaigh Gamildien, bamenyezelwe yiPremier Soccer League (PSL), njengomqeqeshi nomdlali abavelele phakathi kukaDisemba noJanuwari.I-PSL iveze ukuthi uTruter noGamildien behlule umqeqeshi weSuperSport United uKaitano Tembo noBradley Grobler kanye noMngqithi kulo mklomelo abahlabane ngawo.
title: UMngqithi ushaya amakhala ngezakhe

text: KUBUKEKA sengathi useyifake nasemndenini wakubo eyesithembu, uMnuz Musa Mseleku wodumo lohlelo Uthando Nesithembu olubonakala kuMzansi Magic.Udadewabo omncane kaMseleku, uNksz Nompumelelo Mseleku, oke abonakala kulelo hlelo, uyoganela esithenjini.Kuvela ukuthi uthathwa yisiqumama saseMaqongqo, uMnuz Khanyisani Phungula, ongusomabhizinisi wemfuyo.Umthombo othembekile nosondelene nomndeni wakaMseleku, uveze ukuthi ukubona indlela uMseleku aphethe ngayo amakhosikazi akhe yikho okwenze kwaba lula ukuthi udadewabo angabi manqika ukuyoganela esithenjini.UMseleku ethintwa ngalolu daba, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi udadewabo uyogana kodwa wangathanda ukwenaba ngohlobo lomendo wakhe.“Bakhona abantu bakaPhungula abafikile ekhaya kodwa angizange ngitshelwe lutho mayelana nesithembu. Kodwa ngeke ngakhuluma kakhulu izindaba zabantu ngicela noNompumelelo ningamfaki ephepheni usemncane umtaka mama,” kusho uMseleku ehleka.UDADEWABO kaMnuz Musa Mseleku, uNksz Nompumelelo Mseleku okuthiwa uhamba ezinyathelweni zikamfowabo njengoba kunamahlebezi okuthi uganela esithenjini Isithombe: FACEBOOK/ NOMPUMELELO MSELEKUYize engathandi ukungena agamanxe kule ndaba uMseleku kodwa uthe ngeke kube yinkinga kudadewabo ukuba sesithenjini ngoba usazi kahle.“Ngihlale ngisho ukuthi anginayo inkinga nesithembu kodwa sekungaba ukuthi uhlobo lwendoda enjani aganela kuyo. Kungenzeka ukuthi isithembu ekuqaleni wayengasithandi kodwa ngokubona indlela esiphila ngayo ekhaya wafunda okuningi ngaso,” kusho uMseleku.Omunye umthombo othembekile uveze ukuthi udadewabo kaMseleku useqalile ukuba undaba mlonyeni lapho ezoganela khona futhi akaconsi phansi nakuPhungula.Kuthiwa abasemzini wakhe sebemjahile njengoba etuswa nangokukhuthala nokwenza amakhekhe aconsisa amathe.Ngaphandle kwezasesithenjini, uMseleku nomndeni wakhe izolo bethule ilebuli yezimpahla zabo iThanxma ehambisana nohlelo lwabo lwesithembu kuthelevishini.Le lebuli izoqala ukudayisa online ngaphambi kokuthi kuqokwe indawo ezoba nesitolo lapho abantu bezothenga khona.IThanxma izogaba kakhulu ngezikibha, kanjalo namakepisi, uMseleku uthe zonke lezi zimpahla zizobiza imali encane ukuze zithengwe yibona bonke abalandeli bakhe.
title: Uzoganela esithenjini udadewabo kaMseleku

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEI NSEPHE yeDurban Ladies uSlindile Ngubane, uxakwa ngumqeqeshi weBanyana Banyana uJoseph “Skheshekheshe” Mkhonza omshaya indiva yize elokhu ewabasela njalo amagoli enethini okuyinto okuhlezi kukhalwa ngayo kwelesizwe.UNgubane (25) ubevutha engabaselwe ezakhe zitalabha i-Als Pak Tawana, yaseNorth West ngo 9-1 eKing Zwelithini Stadium emdlalweni wokuqala weDurban Ladies weSasol League National Championship ngoMsombuluko.Utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi kuyammangaza ukushiywa ngaphandle eqenjini lesizwe ekubeni azi kahle ukuthi igoli lishaywa kanjani.“Ngendlela engidlala ngayo kungifanele ukuba eqenjini lesizwe. Kade ngangizikhandla, noMkhonza uyazi ukuthi ngizimisele kangakanani. Angikwazi okwenza ngisale ngaphandle njalo uma ebiza iqembu lesizwe,” kusho uNgubane.Amagoli eDurban Ladies ahlohlwe, uZamandosi Cele amabili , Dombi Thabethe elilodwa, Charlotte Mshengu naye elilodwa, uNgubane washaya amahlanu.Elokubika leTawana liqhamuke noMosego Ntoagae.UNgubane waseMpophomeni eHowick akalona neze ivukana ebholeni labesifazane, waqala kwiDambuza Ladies kodwa lagcina lishabalele leli qembu.“Umqeqeshi wami ngaleso sikhathi wangithatha wangiletha Ladies ukuze ngizoqhubeka ngidlale. Ngafika kwiDurban Ladies ngangazibeka phansi ngadlalela ukufa nokuphila. Ibhola liyimpilo yami,” kusho yena.IDurban Ladies iyaziwa ngokukhiqiza inqwaba yabadlali beBanyana Banyana okubalwa kubona u-Amanda Dlamini ongukaputeni, Zamamandosi Cele, Memory Makhanya, Nondyebo Mgudu nabanye abaningi.UMkhonza ebuzwa ngoNgubane uthe umazi kahle kamhlophe futhi ungomunye wabadlali abasezinhlelweni zabo.“Ngambona e-FreeState ngonyaka odlule kuyo iSasol League National Championship. Inkinga kwaba wukuthi udlala kahle kakhulu kweminye imidlalo bese kweminye angabonakali. Bengisabheka ukuthi uyakwazi yini ukuqhubeka ngendlela adlala ngayo angalehlisi izinga,” kusho uMkhonza.Lo mqeqeshi usabathungatha namanje abadlali azobasebenzisa kwiBanyana njengoba efuna iqembu lakhe lande ukuze engeke ashodelwe ngabadlali ababukhali emapalini.Ukushaywa ngomzimba kukaNgubane nguMkhonza kumenze wakulambela kakhulu kunakuqala ukugijima kwelesizwe nathi nakanjani uma ebizwa ngeke bakholwe yibhola ayobadlalela lona.I-Durban Ladies izodlala umdlalo wayo wesibili neBloemfontein Celtics namuhla ngo-3 ntambama.Imiphumela yemidlalo:NgoMsombulukoBloemfontein Celtics 10- 2 RC MillsDurban Ladies 9-1 Als Puk TawanaIzolo:Palace Super Falcons 5–0 City LadsAls Puk Tawana 10–1 RC MillsBloem Celtic 9-1 Msiphuya LadiesKanatla 0-3 Cape Town Roses
title: OweDurban Ladies uxakwa wukungabizwa kwiBanyana

text:
BILLY SUTER noSPHELELE NGUBANES EKUQOSHWE ingoma ehambisana nomkhankaso wokususa uMengameli Jacob Zuma esikhundleni obizwa nge
Zuma Must Fall.Le ngoma, ebhalwe nguDon Clarke acula kuyo nomrepha uThembiso “Special Care” Sithole, isidonse amehlo abaningi kwi-internet njengoba kuYouTube isibukwe ngabantu abangaphezu kuka-14 000.“Uma ubhekisisa kuYouTube kuvela ukuthi i-video yengoma ibukwa ngabantu abasemazweni ahlukehlukene,” kusho uClarke.UClarke usewine imincintiswano eminingi yokubhala izingoma kanti useke wabhalela nabaculi abaziwayo njengoP J Powers wabhalela nomqondisi wamafilimu uLeon Schuster.“Angiyena usopolitiki kepha uma kukhona into engithintayo ngivele ngithathe isigingci sami. Yenzeke kanjalo nale ngoma. Akufanele size sibuze ukuthi ngaphambi kokuthi kuphele ngebhasi kumele siqale sigudluze umshayeli ebese sibheka ukuthi ungakanani umonakalo okulo,” kusho uClarke.Uthe ukhethe ukusebenzisana noSpecial Care ngoba uyawazi amagalelo akhe besebenzisana phambilini.“Sesisebenzisane iminyaka emingi, ikakhulukazi emafilimini kaLeon Schuster. Uphinde acule phambilini engomeni yami ethi 
The Long Walk Is Over eyawina emncintiswaneni iThe Great American Song Contest ngo-2014,” kuveza uClarke.USpecial Care uthe kuthe uma bexoxa ngobuholi bukahulumeni nesimo sabantu bakuleli, wabona isidingo sokuthi abe yingxenye yale ngoma.“Bekumele sizwakalise imizwa yethu. Ngibhale izinhlamvu zengoma ezicacisa ukuthi kungani sithi uZuma kumele agudluke. Ngamvotela uZuma ngakho kumele ngichaze manje ukuthi kungani sengifuna aphume,” kusho uSpecial Care.Uthe yonke le minyaka ubebukisisa ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ixhugela kuphi lapho uhulumeni bekufanele angenelele khona kepha angezi lutho.“Ngisho nakuqala uMadiba wasithembisa izinto eziningi njengemfundo yamahhala kepha osekwenzeka manje akukhona lokhu esathenjiswa khona. Abaholi bamanje babheke nje ukondla imindeni yabo. Siyamthanda uZuma futhi ngamvotela kodwa angiseneme ngaye.”USpecial Care uthe ngesikhathi eya estudiyo ukuyoqopha wayengasabi ukugxekwa ngabalandeli baZuma.Uthe imibono yakhe kayiphikisani ne-ANC kepha abaholi bamanje.Le ngoma bayiqophe base beyifaka kuYouTube ngoJanuwari 11.
title: Sekuqoshwe ingoma iZuma Must Fall

text: SABELO NSELEAMAQEMBU  aphikisayo kwisishayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal akhala ngenkohlakalo ekuthengweni kwezinsiza zokulwa negciwane iCorona.Kwinkulumompikiswano ebisesishayamthetho sesifundazwe ngoLwesine, amaqembu aphikisayo athe inkohlakalo inuka “phu” eminyangweni yalesi sifundazwe.Ngokombiko okhiswe umcwaningimabhuku uMnuz Kimi Makwetu, iningi inkohlakalo eyenzekile kusuka leli lizwe liqale ukuthenga izinsizwa zokulwa nobhubhane.USotswebhu weDA, uMnuz Francois Rodgers, uthe kuningi okufanele kuphenywe ngoba kuningi okushayisa amakhala mayelana namanani iminyango ebithenga ngawo izinsiza.“Ukubheduka kwalolu bhubhane kuvulele izikhulu zikahulumeni ezingogombela kwesabo, ithuba lokuntshontsha imali yabantu abahlwempu.“Umnyango wezeNhlalakahle kulesi sifundazwe kusazofanele usichazele ngala mathawula okugeza ubuso abathi bawathenga ngoR2,7 million.“Kuzofanele futhi uchaze ngamaphepha asendlini yangasese abathi bawathenge ngoR2,5 million nokudla kukaR500 000 abathi kwakuphakelwa izaguga emahhovisini ezempesheni,” kusho uRodgers.Umholi we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe kusukela kwamenyezelwa umvalelandlini, zanda kakhulu izinsolo zenkohlakalo.“Ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa umvalelandlini, amanqe abona ithuba lokukhwabanisa izimali zabantu abahlwempu.“Laba bantu bahola izigidi kodwa abanamahloni okweba izimali zahlwempu,” kusho uHlabisa.Ilunga le-EFF uMnuz Mongezi Twala, lithe kuyishwa ukuthi bekwebiwa izimali ekubeni abasebenzi bezempilo bengenazo izinsiza ezanele zokuzivikela kuleli gciwane.“Umnyango wezeNhlalakahle kulesi sifundazwe kuningi okusafanele ukuchaze.“Kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi bathenge izimfonyo ngo R51 ngasinye ekubeni eminye iminyango ikwazile ukuzithola ngo R11?“Zona izijumbane ezazikade zithenjiswe abantu zibhajwe kuphi?” kubuza uTwala.Ilunga leNFP uMnuz Vikizitha Mlotshwa, uthe kufanele kuxoshwe abantu.“Kodwa aninamahloni maqabane kaTambo (Mnuz Oliver Tambo owayengumengameli we-ANC), seningaze nintshontshe imali yomkhuhlane ekubeni abantu befa.”UNdunankulu waseKZN uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe nakuba ikhona inkohlakalo kuhulumeni, kodwa kuningi isifundazwe esikwenzayo ukulwa nalesi sihlava.
title: Basola inkohlakalo ekuthengweni kwezinsiza zokulwa neCoronavirus

text: SEKUNOMNYAKAZO odabeni lokuthi ukuqwayiza kube semthethweni kwazise izolo bekudingidwa umbiko weSouth African Legal Reform Commission (SALRC) ophakamisa ukuthi ukuhweba ngocansi kufaniswe neminye imisebenzi.Izolo izinhlangano ezisiza umphakathi zitshele amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi azihambisani nokuthi ukuqwayiza kube semthethweni.NgoDisemba i-ANC yaphakamisa ukuthi ukuqwayiza kufanele kungabi yicala.UNkk Koketso Moeti we-Amandla.mobi uthe bazoqhubeka nokulwela ukuthi ukuqwayiza kube semthethweni futhi abahambisani nalabo abafuna ukucindezela amalungelo abaqwayizi.ENingizimu Afrika kuyicala ukuqwayiza njengamanje elakuleli akulona kuphela elifuna kube semthethweni ukuqwayiza kwazise naseKenya abaqwayizi bafuna ukuhweba ngocansi ngokukhululeka.UNkk Moeti uwugxekile umbiko weSALRC wathi abaqwayizi abazange banikezwe isikhathi esanele sokuzikhulumela futhi ufuna wenziwe kabusha ukuze babe nezwi.“Sifuna uMnyango wezobuLungiswa usitshele ukuthi imithetho yokuqwayiza izoshintshwa nini ngoba sidinga isisombululo kulolu daba. Sifuna nabaqwayizi bazikhulumele ngoba abazange banikezwe isikhathi esanele sokufaka imibono yabo embikweni okhona njengamanje,” kusho uNkk Moeti.Umbiko ngeziphakamiso zokuthi kube semthethweni ukuqwayiza ushicilelwe ngoMeyi wonyaka odlule kanti uphakamisa ukuthi ukuqwayiza kwabadala kungabi yicala.UNkk Ntombovuyo Mente we-EFF ePhalamende uthe uyasiseka isiphakamiso sokuthi kube semthethweni ukuqwayiza.“Uma ukuqwayiza kusemthethweni kuzosiza ukulwa nobugebengu obuthinta abesifazane ikakhulukazi abaqwayizi abahlukunyezwayo. Abaqwayizi badinga ukuvikelwa, badinga usizo lwezempilo, olwamaphoyisa nendawo ephephile yokwenza umsebenzi wabo,” kusho uNkk Mente.Uthe uma ukuqwayiza sekusemthethweni abaqwayizi bazokwazi ukukhombisa amaphoyisa izigebengu ezishushumbisa abantu nalabo ababaphoqayo ukuthi bangene ngenkani emsebenzini wokuhweba ngocansi.
title: ‘Ukuqwayiza akufane namanye amatoho’

text: ISILO samabandla, uGoodwill Zwelithini, siphakamise ukuthi abadlwenguli bashumpulwe ubuntu babo ukuze kuliwe nalesi sihlava.Sikhuluma emkhosini weLembe kwaDukuza ngoLwesibli, Isilo sithe amadoda adlwengulayo ayizishimane.“Ake silungise ukucabanga kwethu madoda, konakele. Asilungise izingane zethu, asike sithandaze kuNkulunkulu sicele ukuthi asisize nanti izwe lethu lifa.“Niyongixolela ngoba angikholwa ukuthi umuntu osokile angangcolisa ubusoka kwakhe. Engikushoyo ukuthi asibhasobheni ngoba umonakalo njengoba ungaka isitha sethu manje izishimane, ezidlwengula izingane zethu ngoba angikholwa ukuthi insizwa yakwabo ingangcolisa ubuntu bayo, ithathe ubungcwele ibufake kwaSathane esihogweni.“Ngabe kungcono ukuba kuthiwa umuntu odlwengulayo kuthiwe cha ake siyoxoxa naye, anikwe thina zinsizwa zakubo siyomlungisa, sithi awulethe le nto sibone siyithi yebhu!“Ingaphela le nto ngoba lokhu uma kungale ndlela okwenzeka ngayo kumele sikwenze ngendlela ezokwenza ukuthi sivezele izwe ukuthi uZulu akahambisani nechilo.“Mhlampe kuke kube khona oyedwa okhalayo ophuthunyiswe esibhedlela kodwa angabulawa ngoba ukusoka siyakwenza, kufanele sinqume seqe, mina ngicela sikwenze lokhu njengengenxenye yokuhlonipha iLembe yokwelapha umthetho,” kusho iSilo.Isilo siphinde sakhala ngesihlava sokubulawa kwabantu besifazane nezingane kuleli.Sithe yize kunjalo kodwa kumele siwukhuze nomkhuba owenziwa ngabesifazane abafike bazale izingane baphinde bazibulale.“Akumele kube ngathi konakele abesilisa kuphela, kubole yonke into kodwa ngifuna ukuxwayisa ngokuthi ngeke zibe khona izisombululo uma sizoxova izinto,” kusho Omdala.Imbube iphinde yakhala ngezinga eliphezulu lokuphuza kwentsha.“Obani abebesemcimbini wezintombi? Ibiyinhle leya nto kodwa kubuhlungu ukuqoqa izinto ngingazi ukuthi zingiqoqela obani njengoba izinsizwa ziganwe ngamabhodlela otshwala. Sizoyenzenjani le ndaba? Singazilungisa kanjani izinganezethu zabafana, ukuba ziyeke le nto eziyenzayo zibuyele esigabeni sokuziphatha kahle?” kusho iSiloIsilo sikhwele sadilika kubanikazi bamathaveni, sathi baqhosha ngokuthi banemali bebe bebulala izwe.“Ungaqhosha ngokuthi wenza imali ethaveni, Ndunankulu Khuzeni (Sihle Zikalala) ake nisilekelele.“Masibuka sishaywa uvalo, uma sibuka amaphepha neminyango eqondene nalokhu izishaya izifuba, ithi yenze okungaka kube ngathi imiphumela ka-matric, awu bakithi ake nisixolele.“Nabo laba okuthiwa bathengisa izidakamizwa baphuma ngaphandle, bakwenza lokhu besizwa ngabantu bangaphakathikuleli ngoba kunezigangi nakhona lapha okusadinga ukuthi kubhekwane nazo,” kusho iSilo.Sithe iNingizimu Afrika ihamba phambili emhlabeni wonke ngokuba nezidakwa eziningi.“Yizwe elinjani okuthiwa lihamba phambili otshwaleni,” kusho iSilo.
title: ‘Abashumpulwe ubuntu abadlwenguli’ - Isilo samaBandla

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Bheki Cele usexwayise umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema ukuthi umbutho wamaphoyisa ngeke ukumele ukusatshiswa kulandela inkulumo yakhe ethi uzimisele ukulwa namaphoyisa akuleli.Ekhuluma nabalandeli beqembu ngeSonto uMalema usole amaphoyisa akuleli ngokusebenzisana nabamhlophe ukulwisana nabo ngesikhathi bebhikisha eSenekal naseBrackenfell eKapa ngeledlule. UMalema utshele abalandeli be-EFF ukuthi uma amaphoyisa ezimisele ngokulwa nabo, lokho bazokwenza ngisho emakhaya awo. “Uma amaphoyisa efuna ukulwa, awaphumele obala. Sizowaphatha ngendlela efanayo njengalawo eminyaka yama-80s. Ngeke silwe nawo lapho esibhikisha khona. Sizoya emakubo silwe nawo emizini yawo kanye nemindeni yabo. UCele uyigxekile inkulumo kaMalema wathi iyingozi wabe esehlabela amaphoyisa ikhwelo lokuthi azivikele uma ehlaselwa. “Ngicabanga ukuthi umholi we-EFF uphaphalazile, ngeke usabise amaphoyisa bese ulindela ukuthi azosonga izandla. Umsebenzi wamaphoyisa ucacile futhi ulotshwe kuMthethosisekelo; ukuvikela, ukugwema nokuvimba ingozi kanye nokuphenya ubugebengu. Amaphoyisa aphinde aqinisekise nokuthi umthetho uyalandelwa ngakho akekho umuntu onelungelo lokusabisa amaphoyisa uma enza umsebenzi wawo,” kusho uCele. UCele uthe inkulumo kaMalema ibeka engcupheni izimpilo zamaphoyisa nemindeni yawo. Ngaphandle kukaCele, inhlangano yamaphoyisa iPolice and Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru) izolo nayo iyigxekile inkulumo kaMalema.
title: 'Ngeke sikumele ukusatshiswa kwamaphoyisa' - uCele uphendula uMalema

text:
Esiqeshini sakamuva uZodwa uthi inkinga ngabesilisa abathandana nabobulili obubodwa ukuthi bazitshela ukuthi banesitho sangasese sowesifazane kanti lutho banomphambili. "Izitabane zinokudlala ngoba zilwa nabantu besifazane. Ngitshele ngesitabane esisodwa esingakaze sixabane nowesifazane endimeni yezokungcebeleka. Inkinga yabo ukuthi bazitshela ukuthi banenanazi, kodwa banomphambili. Thina sinenanazi. Siyabemukela nje ukuze uma sifaka imikhiqizo yokuziphaqula nabo bayifake noma futhi sixoxa ngamadoda nabo baxoxe," kusho uZodwa. This Is Not Even Fun 🙄🙄🙄The Hate SpeechShe's Just Descriminating Our Fellow Brothers 💔💔💔 Being Gay Doesn't Mean You Trying To Make Yourself A female, I'm Just Disgusted By Your Words Of Hate Speech. Smanga Is Just Your Hand Bag 
#ZodwaCancelled
#Uyajola99

July 7, 2019Lawa mazwi awehlanga kahle kubabukeli balolu hlelo nokuze kwaholela ekutheni baqale umkhankaso we-petition ukuthi luvalwe uhlelo lwakhe kuMoja Love. Ethintwa yiSolezwe uZodwa uthe ayekusho wayekuqondise kumngani wakhe uNathi Msomi ngoba wayemntshontshele izimpahla zakhe."Uhlelo lwami lukhuluma ngempilo yami futhi lokhu engakusho ngangikusho ngomngani wami uNathi Msomi ngoba wayengintshotshele amateku ami engawathenga eDubai, isuitcase engalithenga eDubai, amateku kaNtobeko, uBen 10 wami, kanye nezinye izicathulo zami engazithenga e-USA. Abantu kufanele babuke uhlelo lwami beyeke ukuphawula ngezinto ezithinta impilo yami ngoba mina ngikhuluma ngezinto ezenzeka empilweni yami," kuchaza yena.
title: UZodwa Wabantu uzithintele kwabobulili obubodwa ebachomela ngenanazi

text: IGAMA leLungu leSishayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal elaliyimeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede kulindeleke ukuthi libe kulawo awabantu abamiswa yinhlangano nabanqaba ukushenxa ezikhundleni. Kulindeleke ukuthi bathole izincwadi zokubamisa maduze nje. Lokhu kuhambisana nodaba olusegudwini lwe-ANC, lapho iphakamise ukuthi amalungu ayo ahamba amacala ezinkantolo, ashenxe ezikhundleni zawo kuze kube kuphothulwa amacala awo. Kuthiwa lokhu kwenzelwa ukuvikela isithunzi senhlangano esimanaphanapha yizinsolo zenkohlakalo. Kuthiwa inhlangano imi ngo-Rule 25.70 okwavunyelwana ngawo engqungqutheleni ye-ANC ka-54 eyayiseNasrec ngo-2017. UNkk Gumede nabanye bahamba icala lenkohlakalo elisukela ngesikhathi eseyimeya yeTheku. Kulindeleke ukuthi ayovela okokuqala eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini kuyobhungwa ngokuqala ukuqulwa kwecala. KwaZulu-Natal kusavele igama lePhini likaSihlalo wenhlangano uMnuz Mike  Mabuyakhulu ozishenxele esikhundleni, ubhekene necala lenkohlakalo elizoqala ukuqulwa ezinyangeni ezizayo. Kuthiwa KwaZulu-Natal kunehele labantu okufanele lishenxe futhi inqwaba iseThekwini.UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ucashunwe kweminye imithombo yezindaba ethi babe nomhlangano namalungu phakathi nesonto eliphelayo lapho bewachazele khona ngomthetho wenhlangano. Kuthiwa bonke bebebizelwe ehhovisi le-ANC esifundazweni. Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela, akafunanga ukungena kakhulu odabeni, wathi akulindwe umbiko. “Kunomhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu sesifundazwe ozohlala ngoMsombuluko bese sithola umbiko ophelele lapho-ke,’’ kusho uNtombela. Indaba yokushenxa kwabantu ezikhundleni ithinta ngisho uNobhala-Jikelele wenhlangano uMnuz Ace Magashule, othathele i-ANC izinyathelo zomthetho wayiphonsela inselelo enkantolo ngokumiswa kwakhe.
title: I-ANC izomisa abagolozayo ukushenxa KwaZulu-Natal

text: ZIZOTHATHELWA impahla yazo izikhulu zebhange iVBS Mutual Bank emuva kokuthi uMengameli wamaJaji aseGauteng osabambile uMnuz Moroa Tsoka egunyaze ukuthi ithathwe ngoLwesihlanu.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe yihhovisi lomlawuli wezindaba zaseVBS, izikhulu ezizothathelwa impahla ngoMnuz Andile Ramavhunga noMnuz Robert Madzonga.Ezinye izikhulu ezizodlelwa impahla ngoMnuz Tshifhiwa Matodzi, Mnuz Phillipus Truter noMnuz Phopi Mukhodobwane. Kuzodliwa nempahla yeVele Investments okuyiyona ebinamasheya amaningi eVBS Mutual Bank.Kuvela ukuthi iVele Investments ihlomule ngoR745 million othathwe ngokungemthetho eVBS.UJaji Tsoka uthe akanelisekelile ngencazelo kaRamavhunga yokuthola kwakhe uR15 million ngoba ingamanga futhi ukholwa wukuthi uyithole ngokukhwabanisa.Uthe incazelo kaMadzonga yokuthi uR4.5 million owawukwi-akhawunti yakhe wawuyibhonasi ngamanga.“Kufanele kwenziwe ubulungiswa kwiVBS ngokuthi kuthathwe impahla yayo neyabantu abathintekayo ekuyiwiseni ukuze kukhokholwe abantu abampofu akade belondoloze imali yabo kuyo. Kuye kwakhwatshaniswa imali ngabantu abanomhobholo,” kusho uJaji Tsoka. Umlawuli ophethe izindaba zeVBS, uMnuz Anoosh Rooplal uthe uyajabula ngesinqumo sikaJaji Tsoka ngoba sisho ukuthi uzokwazi ukubuyisa imali engu-R1.5 billion yabantu akade beyilondoloze eVBS. “Abantu abazohlomula ngokubuya kwale mali kubalwa omasipala, izinkampani ezizimele nabantu akade belondoloze ngaphezu kukaR100 000,” kusho uRooplal. Uthe abantu akade bepnemali engaphansi kukaR100 000 bakwazile ukuthola imali yabo emagatsheni akwaNedbank.Ukhumbuze abakweleta iVBS ukuthi baqhubeke nokukhokha ngoba ukungakhokhi kuzokwenza ukuthi bathathelwe izinyathelo zomthetho.
title: Zizothathelwa  impahla izikhulu zeVBS

text: ITHOLWE inecala lokwakha itulo lokusoconga owayenguMengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma noNobhala Jikelele we-ANC indoda yaseSoshanguve, ePitoli, u-Elvis Ramosebudi.IMantshi uMnuz Collin Mathitse ilahle uRamosebudi ngamacala amabili okwakha itulo lokubulala.URamosebudi (35) waduma ngo-2017 emuva kokubhalela uMnuz Ajay Gupta noMnuz Nicky Oppenheimer efuna bamxhase ngoR60 million ukuze asoconge abathile.Wayebhale ukuthi usebenzela inhlangano ebizwa nge-Anti-State Capture Death Squad Alliance ne-Anti-White Monopoly Capitalist Regime.Kule ncwadi ayebhale ukuthi ivela kwi-Anti-White Monopoly Capitalists Regime ayeyibhalele uGupta, uRamosebudi wayefuna ukubulala o-Adv Thuli Madonsela owayenguMvikeli woMphakathi, uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas owayeyiphini likaNgqongqoshe weziMali noNksz Vytjie Mentor owayeyilungu lePhalamende.Incwadi ayeyibhalele u-Oppenheimer, uRamosebudi owathi ivela kwi-Anti-State Capture Death Squad Alliance, kuyona wathi ufuna imali yokusoconga owayenguMengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uNobhalala Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule, indodana kaZuma uDuduzane, owayenguNgqongqoshe wezobuNhloli uMnuz David Mahlobo, owayewuSihlalo webhodi lakwaSouth African Airways uNkk Dudu Myeni nowayeyisikhulu sakwa-Eskom uMnuz Brian Molefe.URamosebudi wathi lezi zincwadi kwakungezona ezangempela wayezidlalela kuzo ngoba wayengenayo inhloso yokubulala abathile.Yize kunjalo imantshi imthole enamacala.
title: Limlahlile owakha itulo lokusoconga uZuma

text: UMPHAKATHI waseMbumbulu namaphethelo wesabisa ngokuqhubeka nokushubisa isiteleka ngenxa yokungabi nawo amanzi.Kuphazamiseke ukufunda e-Adams, Folweni naseMbumbulu emuva kokuthi amalungu omphakathi evale imigwaqo ekhala ngokuhlala amasonto amabili engenawo amanzi.Ilungu lomphakathi elicele ukuthi igama lalo lingadalulwa, lithe amalungu omphakathi adinwe ngukuthi sekungenela esontweni lesithathu engekho amanzi.“Amanzi alokhu aphela emasontweni amabili adlule futhi ayikho into eyenziwayo ukuletha isisombululo. Kumanje okucasula abantu ngukuthi akulethwa ngisho izimoto zamanzi. Okubuhlungu ukuthi abanye abantu baphuza amaphilisi. Okunye okusiphatha kabi ngukuthi nogesi uhlale ungekho. Akwenzeki lingapheli isonto ugesi ungaphelanga.”Elinye ilungu lomphakathi nalo elicele ukuthi igama lalo ligodlwe lithe ngisho izingane aziyanga esikoleni ngoba amanzi awekho.Nakwezinye izindawo eThekwini kukhalwa esifanayo sokungabi khona kwamanzi njengoba kunesiteleka sabasebenza kulolu phiko abakhala ngamaholo.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe bayazi ngesiteleka esikhona kulezi zindawo futhi sebethumele ithimba labo ukuthi liyobheka. Uthe ukulethwa kwamanzi kuthikamezekile ezindaweni ezahlukene ngenxa yesimo sezulu esingesihle kodwa amathimba abo asebenza kanzima ukulungisa lesi simo. Uthe ngokwazi kwabo izimoto zamanzi ziyathunyelwa ezindaweni ezithikamezekile kodwa uqhube wathi bazophenya ngezinsolo zokungalethwa kwazo bese belungisa leso simo.
title: Intukuthelo eMbumbulu ngokuphela kwamanzi

text:
USIYAONGA "Bhele" Nomvethe uzosonga izinsuku zakhe ebholeni elikhokhelayo ngomdlalo waMaZulu FC wokugcina ekhaya kule sizini.Usuthu luthathana neBlack Leopards eKing Zwelithini Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.Nakhu okunye ngoNomvethe:Siyabonga Eugene Nomvethe Uteketiswa ngelikaBhele.Iminyaka yobudala: 41Unemidlalo engu-559 ebholeni elikhokhelayo Unamagoli angu-170 ebholeni elikhokhelayoEmazweni angaphandle udlale e-Italy, Sweden naseDenmarkUdabuka KwaMashuç eThekwini.FUNDA: 
https://www.isolezwe.co.za/ezemidlalo/unomvethe-akafuni-aze-adlale-nendodana-22405642Qhubeka ulandela izinkundla zeSolezwe nakwezokuxhumana @IsolezweNewspaper kwiTwitter nakwiFacebook ukuqhubeka uthole okunye ngeBhele.@malbingo
title: !!!SIYABONGA BHELE NOMVETHE!!!
