text: AMAPHOYISA aseqinisekise ukutholwa kowesifazane waseGauteng “othunjwe yizinswelaboya ngesikhathi ziduna imoto yakhe izolo ebusuku.” Owesifazane ozibiza ngoSimphiwe Manzini Mntimande ubhale ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook izolo “evalelwe ebhuthini” ebika ngokusabela impilo yakhe kulandela ukudundwa kwemoto yakhe eMohlakeng. “Sekudunwe imoto yami, ngisebhuthini bathathe iselula yami bezitshela ukuthi ngineyodwa...ngizonazisa ukuthi kwenzekani kuze kube ngiyafa,” kuloba lo wesifazane. Ucele abanenombolo yakhe kuWhatsApp ukuthi balandeli i-live location yakhe (indawo akuyo ngqo) ukuze bezozama ukulandela umkhondo. “Imoto isimile, sebebanga ukuthi ubani ozolala nami...” kuqhuba lo wesifazane. Ngaleso sikhathi abantu abebelandela lombhalo ngoLwesithathu ebusuku nasezintatha zangoLwesine ekuseni, bebelokhe belusabalalisa njalo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lolu daba becela usizo nasemaphoyiseni. Kunabantu abasondelene naye nabo abebazisa abantu ngokwenzekayo. Ngemuva kwesikhashana, uphinde wabhala uSimphiwe wathi uphethe isikele, uzozama ukuzivikela ngaso uma kukhona okwenzekayo. Ngemuva kwamahora ebhale lokho, ubuye esozobonga abantu bakuleli ebazisa ukuthi usephephile. “Ngiyabonga kakhulu ngemikhuleko yenu nokuzama ukulekelela ngitholwe. Sengiphephile kodwa ngisadinga ukuxhumana nomndeni wami kuqala. Ngeke ngisho ukuthi ngikuphi ngoba ngisasabela impilo yami...ngizonazisa maduze, okwamanje ngisadinga ukuphumula,” usho kanje. Ngemuva kokufaka ivideo kuFacebook abaningi bebesashaya amakhala ngokuthi iphephe ngempela le ntokazi kwazise bathi amehlo ayo “awathembisi” futhi ukungaveli komunye umuntu kuyo kuyabasolisa. Oyedwa wabasondelene naye, uPalesa Radebe, ubhale ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook ukuthi usetholiwe okwangempela, unomzala wakhe. Okhulumela amaphoyisa eGauteng uCaptain Mavela Masondo uthe okwamanje basaqoqa imininingwane ngalesi sehlo njengoba umgilwa esavula icala kwesinye seziteshi zamaphoyisa eSoweto. Uthe uSimphiwe ufike esiteshini samaphoyisa ngemoto yakhe. Amaphoyisa azokhipha eminye iminingwane ngalolu daba ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
title: Usetholakele owesifazane 'othunjwe kudunwa imoto' yakhe eGoli

text: ZIMKHALELE owesifazane (28) wasOgengele, eduze kwaseMtuba okuthiwa uphuzise ingane yakhe enonyaka utshwala.Kuthiwa ugogo wale ngane uthintwe ngumakhelwane embikela ukuthi akaphuthume ngoba ingane isesimeni esingesihle ngoMsombuluko emini.Ugogo wengane, ozala uyise wayo ogama lakhe ligodliwe, uthe ufike ingane isesimeni esibi kungathi iyagula, iqulekile futhi inuka phu utshwala. Kukholakala ukuthi unina uyiphuzise wayishiya kanjalo.“Ngifike ngabuza ukuthi kwenzekeni enganeni umakhelwane wangibikela ukuthi ingane iphuze utshwala iphuziswa ngunina. Ngaleso sikhathi ingane beyingakhombisi mpilo futhi ibonakala engathi iphuziswe utshwala obuningi. Angazanga ukuthi iphuziswe hlobo luni ngoba angiphuzi futhi angizazi izinhlobo zotshwala. Ingane ngiyithele ngamanzi ukuze iphaphame, ikhombisa impilo ngoba nami kwayima ngethukile,” kusho ugogo wengane.Uthe uthathe ingane waya nayo ekhaya lapha ahlala khona, wayigeza wase eya nayo emaphoyiseni eyobika lesi sigameko.Ugogo uthe ukholwa ukuthi bekusanda kugamanxa ihora lesibili ngesikhathi ebizwa ebikelwa ngodaba lwengane.Uthe amaphoyisa abe esethungatha umama, amthola ebusuku eselele noyise wengane, beqinisile ezinkambini zikaFaro bobabili.“Bebe lele bengazi nokuthi ingane ikuphi. Kwayibona bebephuzile bengazazi. Amaphoyisa amthathile unina wengane ngoba kuvele ukuthi nguye ophuzise ingane,” kuqhuba ugogo.Ugogo uthe akavuni muntu phakathi kwabazali bale ngane, uveze ukuthi kade baqala ukuhlupha njengoba ethe useke wazama ukuhlala nengane kodwa babuye bayithatha. Uthe bayithatha emuva kokuthi ecele ukuthi bayithengele izimpahla zokugqoka ngemali yesibonelelo sayo esiholwa yibona.Uthe namanje ukholwa ukuthi bebesebenzise yona imali yesibonelelo njengoba bebephuza, beyihole ngesonto ngesikhathi kuqalwa ukuholwa.Ugogo uthe useyasaba ukuyithatha ingane ngoba unovalo lokuthi bangagcina bemthumelele ngabantu abaphuza nabo ukuze bamhluphe uma osonhlalakahle begcine bebaphucile yona, bayihlalisa naye unomphelo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi unina wale ngane uboshiwe ngezinsolo zokuphuzisa ingane yakhe enonyaka utshwala nokuyishiya inganakiwe.Uthe amaphoyisa avule icala lokunganakekeli ingane kwase kuthi unina wayo waboshwa. Kulindeleke ukuthi unina wengane avele enkantolo yemantshi maduze.
title: Kuboshwe unina wengane (1) obeyiphuzisa utshwala

text: IKHISHWE ngebheyili kaR10 000 indodana kasomabhizinisi waseMpunga, eMzinto esolwa ngokubulala umshayeli wetekisi obesekuphele inyanga ebanga umhlaba noyise.UMnuz Imraan Mansoor (26) ufake isicelo sebheyili eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseDududu ngoLwesithathu.Icala kuthiwa libe selihlehliselwa uSepthemba 4, kepha uMansoor udonswe ngendlebe ukuthi angalubhadi eMzinto, ukugwema ulaka lo mphakathi.Ubhekene necala lokubulala uMnuz Sphelele Ndlovu (36) okuthiwa umdubule washona emzini womunye womakhelwane ngemuva kwengxabano ngeledlule.Umshana kamufi, uMnuz Nhlanhla Ndlovu (24) obeyingxenye yamalungu omndeni abehambele icala uthe umsolwa uveze ukuthi wayezivikela.“Sishaqekile enkantolo ummeli walo mfana ethi wayezivikela.“Uzivikela kanjani kumuntu ongaphethe sikhali wena uphethe isibhamu? Sidumele singumndeni ngoba sibona engathi udaba lokubulawa kukamalume luzophelela emoyeni.“Kuyaxaka ukuthi sekungasuka umuntu wakwelinye izwe azobanga umhlaba nomalume ongowokuzalwa kule ndawo,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe basazoqhubeka balihambele icala ngoba ekugcineni bafuna ubulungiswa ngelungu labo elibulawe ngesihluku phambi kwabantu.Uqhube wathi into ebaphatha kabuhlungu ukuthi umufi unencwadi ayithola kumkhandlu wenkosi eshoyo ukuthi indawo eyakhe.Ngaphambilini kuvele ukuthi umufi uthenge indawo ngo-R800 esihlotsheni sakhe ngenyanga edlule, okwasuka usomabhizinisi wendawo wazombangisa yona ngesikhathi eseqala ukwakha.Induna yaseMpunga, uMnuz Mbuyiselwa Ndlovu uthe umphakathi awuyizwa eyokuthi umsolwa ubulale umuntu wendawo kubangwa umhlaba.“Umphakathi uthukuthele. Umngcwabo kaSphelele kwadingeka ukuthi ngiwushiye phakathi ngoba abantu basebekhuphukelwe imimoya.“Uyazi ukuthi uma konakele endaweni abantu bokuqala abasolwayo abaholi. Angikwazanga ukuphumelela enkantolo, bengingeke ngihambe ngedwa,” kusho uNdlovu (Mbuyiselwa).
title: Ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR10 000  ‘obulele’  kubangwa umhlaba

text: Igcokama litheleke kulo mcimbi kungalindelekile njengoba selokhu aqala amalungiselelo, belilokhu liwugxibha ezinkundleni zokuxhumana futhi lithi ngowe-ANC. Laze lathuka nabaculi ebebenandisa kuwo lathi benziwa yindlala. Aligcinanga lapho, liqambe amanga lathi linomcimbi ofana nalo oseFNB Stadium eGoli ngalolu suku. Libuye lathi linomunye oseJeppe Park, okuzobukwa kuwo izimoto zalo ezingumacekeceke.Lingene enkundleni eMabhida lilandelwa yingcosana yabalandeli balo, kwahlokoma inkundla, abantu belingunga. Imithombo engashayi eceleni ezibonele ngawayo ithe indaba yonakale seliqonda ngemuva kwasesteji, lifuna ukufakwa ngenkani esiteji ukuze licacise okuthize. Lihlangabezane nezimbila zithutha ngoba lifice ithimba leGcwalis’iMabhida lingawubambi umshini. Lifane nomuntu ohlokoloze iziqandu selibanjwa ngesidlozana, nabalandeli balinamathela ngesibhaxu nangezinhlamba kwaze kwalamula omunye wabagqugquzeli bomcimbi. NabeSolezwe bayibonile i-video liphuma seliphelezelwa ngonogada, kukhona olijikijela ngokuthize futhi eliphebeza nangesandla. Lithintwa Igcokama ukuze liziphawulele ngemuva kwalesi sigameko, lithe ngamanga aluhlaza ashiwowo. Imithombo eveze lokhu igcizelelile ukuthi litubekile yisibhaxu Igcokama.IGcokama liqale lazama ukufohla esiteji ngaphambi kokuthi likhishwe. Video: FACEBOOK“Ngifike kahle laphaya ngesizotha, yize ngiqhamuke esithubeni kungalindele muntu, kwavele kwasuka iqulu labantu, langilandela, lijabula liza kimina. Abanye bebeshutha nezithombe ngemuva kwesiteji.Kuthe kusenjalo kwase kuqhamuka enye insizwa yakwaZuma ethe ingomunye wabahleli bomcimbi, ingicele ngesihle leya nsizwa ukuthi mangivele ngicashe, ngibuyele emuva ngoba ukuvela kwami kubantu kungahle kuphazamise abantu, bangabe besagxila emcimbini.”Uthe uwuhloniphile umyalelo womhleli womcimbi wahamba yize egcine engasakwazanga ukudlulisa amazwi okuhlambulula igama lakhe phambi kwabaholi nakubalandeli ebebethamele umcimbi njengoba besekukhulunywe okuningi ngaye kuthiwa unenhliziyo embi, ungudlayedwa futhi uphakeme kakhulu.Uthe yena akazisoli ngokuya kulo mcimbi ngoba abantu abaningi bathokozile ngesenzo sakhe. Uthe abalandeli bakhe bancome ubuqhawe ngesenzo sokuya eMabhida.”Uthe ushayelwe ucingo ngoLwesihlanu ngomunye wabagqugquzeli, uBhodloza Nzimande, emgqugquzela ukuthi avele naye emcimbini.“Amazwi akhe abambe elikhulu iqhaza njengengqalabutho esikhulile. Ngiwahloniphile namazwi akhe ngoba ubengaphethe mali kodwa ubeza nje ngeqiniso nangokwakha ubumbano kumaskandi,” kuphetha Igcokama. Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje uSgwebo Sentambo uhluleke nawukuzibamba esiteji, wavele wathi, lo mculi usijwayela kabi, akahlale kubo, ube esebuza abantu ukuthi, ukhona olambile la. Kube sekucacela noma ngubani obekhona ukuthi ubhekise kwiGcokama Elisha, kwazise lake lathi abaculi abalambile abazoya kulo mcimbi.UBhodloza uthe, wakhuluma neGcokama kudala ngoba ekhathazwa wukungaliboni kubaculi akade bezonandisa.“Ngangifuna azocula mina ukuze kuqhubeke ubumbano emculweni kamaskandi kungabi bikho ukwehlukana lokhu okukhona, yena wangitshela ukuthi usazobona ukuthi uzoba khona yini ngagcina ngingayitholanga impendulo. Lo mculo angiwuthuthukiselanga ukuthi abantu baxabane,” kuchaza uNzimande.UMthokozisi Zuma, obesethimbeni elihlela umcimbi, uthe njengoba Igcokama belingekho ohlwini lwabaculi obekumele banandise balicele ngesihle lifika ukuthi kumele lihambe.“Ngimtshelile ukuthi ngicela aphume nganxusa ukuthi kube khona abamphelezelayo ukuze aphephe. Ubengeke akwazi ukungena esiteji ngenxa yokuthi ubengekho ohlwini lwabaculi ebesinabo,” kusho uZuma. Ebuzwa ukuthi ungene kanjani kule nkundla, uZuma uveze ukuthi nabo abazi.
title: BUKA: Liphume lihlehla Igcokama eMabhida

text: ILAMONTVILLE Golden Arrows isiphefumule ngemibiko esisabalalele evela kwabanye abalandeli be-Absa Premiership abayinuka ukuthi ’’idayise’’ umdlalo kwiMamelodi Sundowns, ebanga isicoco seligi neKaizer Chiefs.I-Arrows iguqe ngo 1-0 kwiSundowns umdlalo usuyophela emdlalweni weligi ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Lelo goli likaThemba Zwane lingenge unondweba esengayishaya nanoma yinini indweba yokuqeda umdlalo.Lokhu kudale ukuthi iSundowns ishoshele kwiChiefs eyijaha esicongweni.La maqembu azohlangana e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto eseshiyana ngamaphuzu amathathu kwazise iChiefs iku-53 kuthi iSundowns ibe ku-50.Abalandeli beChiefs bashiye abangalazi kwi-Arrows ezinkundleni zokuxhumana beyisola ngokuthi idayise umdlalo kwezikaPitso Mosimane.Yize ingasebenzisanga amazwi ayo kodwa i-Arrows isiphendulile kulokhu ngokuthi iphanyeke ekhasini layo leTwitter amazwi agadla kubalandeli beChiefs.EXACTLY https://t.co/Bsv685Uku2Lo mbhalo weTwitter ovela ekhasini elibizwa [email protected] Rants, uhumusheka kanje. ’’Abalandeli [email protected] bakhombisa ukuba nomqondo ofanayo wokulandela ubuholize.Okokuqala- Yini engenza iGolden Arrows iphisane ngomdlalo ekubeni ilwela ukuqeda kwitop8?’’Okwesibili - Uma unesikwati esincane, kwesinye isikhathi kudingeka abadlali abasebancane. Ukuntula amava kungayeleka ingcindezi.’’ Kulokhu kuqhubekile ukujovana kanti abalandeli beChiefs kwazise abanye bathi ezika-Ernst Middendorp, ongakaze ayinqobe iligi selokhu aqala ukuqeqesha, sekumele zizishayle yona iSundowns.
title: I-Arrows iphendula abayinuka ngokudayisa umdlalo kwiSundowns

text: UMENGAMELI we-ANC, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa useyalele abaphathi benkampani ephehla ugesi, i-Eskom, ukuthi balungise iziphehli ngokukhulu ukushesha ngoba zindala futhi ziyimbangela yokucima kukagesi.URamaphosa ubekhuluma emcimbini we-ANC wokugubha iminyaka engu-108, iJanuary 8th Statement obusenkundleni yezemidlalo eKimberly, eNorthen Cape izolo.Udaba lokucima kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, luyindaba egudwini kulezi zinsuku.‘’Ukucima kukagesi kunomthelela ongemuhle empilweni yabantu abaningi ezweni lethu futhi ibeka engcupheni impilo yabantu abalashwayo ezibhedlela.Siyalele i-Eskom ukuba ibheke indaba yeziphehli, zilungiswe ngoba zindala, zidala ukuthi kucime ugesi,’’ kusho uRamaphosa.Uqinisekise isizwe ukuthi i-Eskom ngeke idayiselwe abazimele kodwa izokwesekwa ukuthi yenze kangcono.Uthe i-Eskom yinkampani enkulu kabi ukuthi ingawa kalula nje futhi uhulumeni ngeke akuvume lokho.Umemezele ukuthi kunethimba eliholwa yiphini likamengameli, uMnuz David Mabuza, elibheka izindaba ze-Eskom.Uthe konke lokhu kufanele kwenziwe ngokushesha ngoba isikhalo sabantu ngokucima kukagesi sizwakele.URamaphosa uphawula ngo-Eskom nje, kusanda kwesula uMnuz Jabu Mabuza usihlalo webhodi le-Eskom.Kayisalanga ngaphandle indaba yokubuyiswa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo athe uRamaphosa abakhohlwanga yiyona futhi kukhona okwenziwayo ngayo.Ugcizelele ukuthi umhlaba uzobuyiswa kodwa kube kugadiwe ukuthi kakuphazamiseki ukukhiqizwa kokudla ezweni.Uthinte nendaba yokudalwa kwamathuba omsebenzi, okungenye yezinto ezihlupha kakhulu abantu bakuleli.
title: URamaphosa nomyalelo kwa-Eskom

text: UYAQHUBEKA nokuziveza e-Egypt, uPhakamani Mahlambi njengoba esize i-Al Ahly inqoba ngo 4-1 kwi-Enppi okubeke amaRed Devils endaweni yesibili ku-log. UMahlambi wakha leli goli nje ngeledlule wenze okufanayo okumenza abe ngundabamlonyeni e-Egypt kusukela eqalile ukudlala kweyeligi.Ezinye ezibe mnandi kule mpelasonto ukubuya kuka-Andile Jali kuKV Oostende ngemuva kokuqeda isigwebo samakhadi. Kusenzima nokho kwabanye njengoKeagan Dolly noTokelo Rantie.Ubengadlali nakulokhu uDolly iqembu lakhe iMontpellier libambana ngo 1-1 ne-Olympique Marseille. Yize kungacaci kodwa eziphuma ekhempini yeMontpellier zithi uDolly unenkinga yokulimala yingakho engadlali.Ubuyile uJali wawuqala umdlalo futhi iqembu lakhe i-Oostende liqhubekile nomgqigqo walo wokungehlulwa kwazise badlala u1-1 nje bese kungokwesikhombisa zingayazi induku ezalo mdlali waseMatatiele. Bebebhekene neSporting Charleroi kanti uKnowledge Musona osindise ezikaJali ngokuzishayela igoli lokulinganisa.Yize edlale kahle waqokwa waba ngumdlali ovelele kwiTurkish Cup ngeledlule, uLebohang Manyama akazange asetshenziswe ngesikhathi iKonyaspor inenebulwa yiBursaspor ngo 3-0. Sebesengcupheni yezembe manje njengoba sebekunombolo 16.Bese kungokuka-10 uKamohelo Mokotjo eqala umdlalo kwiChampionship yase-England waba wusizo futhi kuBrentford ebuye ekulandeleni emuva ngo 1-0 yaze yanqoba ngo 3-1 kwiFulham. Ngemuva engu-20 uMokotjo nezakhe bakunombolo 11.Nakuba kubanjwe umoya ngokulimala kukaDino Ndlovu udlale imizuzu engu-79 esiza iQarabag inqoba ngo 1-0 iNetfci okubabeke esicongweni yize besele ngomdlalo owodwa. Ubengabonwa nangokhalo nakulokhu uRantie iGenclerbirligi inqoba ngo 4-0 kwiSivvasspor. Ucishe wawuqeda nakulokhu uThulani Serero kodwa wakhishwa sekusele imizuzu embalwa ukuthi umdlalo uphele, iVitesse ishaywa yiFeyenoord ngo 1-0 eNetherlands.
title: Uyisilomo eGibhithe oweBafana

text: KUKHALWA ngenkosi yendawo okuthiwa ayidakwa ibuya ngokuzolala, ishaya amavosho emathaveni nasemicimbini yomphakathi.Kusolwa nokuthi le nkosi ithatha imali, ewoR10 000 abakhokhwa ngabantu ngeziza, iyibhubhudle kuzona lezi zindawo zobumnandi.Umndeni weNkosi Phathisizwe Luthuli yaseMnini eMgababa, uthi uzibona wehliswa isithunzi yile nkosi okuthiwa ayiphuzi ilala khona.UMnuz Ndoda Hamilton Luthuli, ongomunye wabafowabo benkosi, uthe nakuba kuyilungelo layo ukuthi izijabulise ngendlela ethanda ngayo, kodwa ukubonakala kwayo idansa emathaveni nasemicimbini ngendlela eyenza ngayo, bakubona njengento engamukelekile.“Ukubonakala kwenkosi icwile ezimbizeni zikaFaro kwehlisa isizwe sonke isithunzi. Sikhathazekile impela ngalo mkhuba osunesikhathi eside uqhubeka,” kusho uLuthuli.Uthe okubuhlungu wukuthi nemali inkosi ethenga ngayo utshwala kusuke kungoR10 000 eyithola ngokudayisa iziza zabantu ezisuke sezikhokhelwe yona futhi ngale mali.ULuthuli uthe udaba lokudayiswa kweziza zabantu wumfowabo ludala. Kodwa ukubonakala kwakhe eyinkosi ehamba edansa ezindaweni okusuke kuhambele kuzona oDJ kule ndawo, yikona okwenza babone ukuthi kusho ukuthi akazimisele ngokusebenzisana nesizwe ukuze kube khona inqubekela phambili ezinkingeni ababhekene nazo.“Ungumfowethu impela omdala kodwa indlela enza ngayo izinto, ayisiphathi kahle,” kusho uLuthuli.Uthe enye yezinselelo umfowabo abhekene nayo, useke wahubha abantu besifazane abagqoke amabhulukwe endaweni, wathi akafuni kubabona bewagqokile.“Lokho kwaze kwaholela ekutheni amasoka abo labo bantu besifazane ayihlasele inkosi, kwaze kwangenela thina. Sawubhula lowo mlilo,” usho njalo.Ngenkathi leli phephandaba lihambele kule ndawo kuleli sonto, lifike emzini wenkosi latshelwa wumkayo ukuthi isaphumile.Umfowabo wenkosi ubeshilo ukuthi akulula ukuthi siyifice ngoba isikhathi esiningi ayihlali kwayo.Ithintwa ngocingo inkosi ngoLwesine ekuseni, ithe icela ukuthintwa ngo-2 ntambama.Ayibange isalubamba ucingo ngesikhathi okuvunyelwene ngaso. Nangosuku olulandelayo kwenzeke okufanayo. Nemilayezo eshiyelwe yona ocingweni nethunyelelwe yona ngomqhafazo ayiyiphendulanga.Induna yakule ndawo ezibize ngoMnuz Nala, ithe lena yimizamo nje yokudicilela phansi inkosi ngenxa yombango wobukhosi oqhubekayo kulesi sizwe.“Nami ngiyathukwa njengayo inkosi emuva kokuthi kwavotelwa mina kade kuphethe enye induna kule ndawo,” kusho uNala.
title: Umphakathi unengwa yinkosi eshaya amavosho

text:
IFILIMU: Pet SemataryABAQONDISI: Kevin Kolsch, Dennis WidmyerABABHALI: Stephen King, Matt Greenberg noJeff BuhlerABADIDIYELI: Lorenzo di Bonaventura, Mark Moran, Steven Schneider noMark VahradianABALINGISI ABAQAVILE: Jason Clarke, Amy Seimetz, John Lithgow noJete LaurenceISIKHATHI: 1 hour: 41 minutesUHLOBO: HorrorUMHLAZIYI: Smangele ZumaAKUSIYO ifilimu yokubukelwa amagwala afana nami le. Ngiphume kuyo ngiphethwe yikhanda, kukhona lapho engike ngesaba khona ngacishe ngaphuma ngabaleka ingakapheli ifilimu.Critics are calling 
#PetSematary“one of the best Stephen King movies ever.” See PET SEMATARY in Trinidad and Tobago cinemas TOMORROW - April 17. 
pic.twitter.com/DKQMGAhmUY— Paramount Trinidad (@paramount_tt) 
April 16, 2019Kafishane nje, le filimu ikhuluma ngodokotela uLouis Creed (Jason Clarke) othengele umndeni wakhe umuzi osemaplazini eMaine. Yena nenkosikazi yakhe uRachel (Amy Seimetz) nezingane zabo ezimbili * -Ellie (Jete Laurence) noGage (Hugo Lavoie) bathuthela kulo muzi osehlathini.Bathe befika kulo muzi bathola ukuthi emuva kwawo kunamathuna ezilwane, lapho abantu basendaweni bengcwaba khona izilwane zabo. Kule ndawo batholana nekhehla uJud (John Lithgow) elithi liyabasiza kanti libafaka otakwini.Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi bayabona ukuthi la mathuna ababezitshela ukuthi ngamathuna nje, anomkhuba phakathi. Bakubona lokhu ngemuva kokufa kukaChurch okuyikati lendodakazi yabo * -Ellie. Ikhehla lisiza uLouis ukuthi ayongcwaba leli kati endaweni efihlekile engale kwamathuna okuwumhlaba ovusa abafileyo.Leli kati livuka selingafani, selinolaka. Lo muzi useduze komgwaqo ngakho kancane kancane kudlula iloli elikhulu lidla amagalani. Kuvele kubande amathumbu uma selidlula leli loli. Iloli leli ligcina selibulala * -Ellie ngosuku lwakhe lokuzalwa ngemuva kokuthi ebone ikati lakhe lisemgwaqweni.ULouis ungena esilingweni sokuyomba indodakazi emathuneni ukuyoyingcwaba lapho avusa khona ikati.Uyavuka * -Ellie kodwa eseyisilwane enomthungo omkhulu ekhanda. U-Ellie ubulala ikhehla uJud emsola ngokubonisa uyise lo mhlaba ovusa abafileyo.Akagcini ngoJud ubulala nonina amthathe ayomvusa lapho abavusa khona abafileyo. Indodakazi nonina bagcine sebebulala uLouis.Kugcina sekuwumndeni wezipoki.Iphela lezi zipoki seziya emotweni lapho ebekushiywe khona uGage okungumfowabo ka-Ellie omncane. Ikushiya unovalo ngoba awazi ukuthi lezi zipoki zizoyenzani ingane.
title: Sibuyekeza amafilimu

text: MHLELI: Ngiwumhlali waseHarding ekumasipala uMuziwabantu, sihlale singenawo amanzi eMkangala ku-ward 2.Bebezithulele, manje sebesitshela ukuthi amanzi azophela ngenxa yesomiso ngoba esephelele abantu baKwaMachi nabasedolobheni bona abahlala nemeya.Thina savalelwa amanzi eminyakeni emihlanu edlule. Ngifisa uhulumeni wesifundazwe ake azosibheka afike ngemoto khona ezozwa nomgwaqo ukuthi ukulungele yini ukusetshenziswa abantu abaphilayo. Sengathi uma ezofika angazumisa ngoba lezi zonakali ezihola lo masipala zingasukuma zilungise uma kuzofika izikhulu zikahulumeni. Sekunzima nokujabulela ukuvota ngoba kunakwa abantu ababodwa thina asinakiwe.Nkashankasha Vumani MkhungoeHarding
title: [IMIBONO] Siswele amanzi eHarding kunzima ukuvota ngoba asinakwa

text: UBabo, ubeshisa izikhotha nge-albhamu yakhe ethi Uhambo One ayikhiphe ngo-2016 nokumanje abantu basayithakasela. Inezingoma okubalwa kuzo iNgiyadeserva nethi Thixo Mkhululi.“Uma usebenza ungenayo ingcindezi uyaye wenze nje unganaki. Uma wazi kodwa ukuthi abantu bakubhekile usebenza ngokuzikhandla,” kusho uBabo.Ubekhuluma eseMangosuthu University of Technology, eMlaza, lapho bekunomthandazo wokuvula unyaka khona wezitshudeni ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.“Izingoma zami zisathandwa namanje kodwa ngithe angizelamanise zingakaphuphi zikhishwe ngezinye. Bese ihlalile i-albhamu ngoba ineminyaka emithathu,” kusho uBabo.Uthe entsha, Uhambo Two, izobe inezingoma abantu abazozithakasela ezinye zazo asebebazwisile amazwibela azo.“Kukhona ethi Usevele Wakuphinda Lokho engihlale ngiyicula ngizwa amanzi ngobhoko. Abantu bayayithanda ngakho ngizoyifaka. Zikhona nezinye. Abaculi bangasabi ukuqala bazisikaze izingoma ukuze bezwe ukuthi abantu bayazithanda yini ukuze kube lula uma sebekhipha.”Uthe usebenze no-Andile Mbili waBanqobi, DJ Mngadi nabanye abagodlile. Uveze nokuthi ngabe kade eyikhiphile i-albhamu kodwa kunezinye izingoma abefuna ukuziqopha bukhoma.Uqhube wathi ukuphuma kwe-albhamu yakhe kumenze wacela ukuhlehlisa uhambo lokuya e-USA oluhlangene nomklomelo wakhe wamaCrown.“Ngiyoze ngihambe ngoMeyi ngoba ngifuna ukuqala ngiphushe kahle ekhaya.”Ngaphandle kukaBabo, kulo mcimbi bekunandisa uMalusi Mbokazi, Abathandwa, Thobekile, Sgwili nabanye. Bekukhona nomsakazi woKhozi FM uSbu Buthelezi obethula izinkulumo ezakhayo.Kuqalwe ngo-6 ntambama kwaze kwavalwa ngo-10 ebusuku. Izitshudeni bezigcwele phama ehholo iSeme ezinye zimi ngezinyawo.
title: UBabo usohambweni lwesibili

text: KUHLALE obala ukuthi umholi we-DA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane uyisichuse  ngemuva kokukhipha isitatimende, ethi uNdunankulu waseWestern Cape uNkk Helen Zille umisiwe esikhundleni sakhe kanti akunjalo, ngokusho komhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele eKZN uMnuz Protas Madlala."Imbeka ehlazweni uMaimane lento eyenzekile ngoba sekubona wonke umuntu ukuthi akasiye usigqoko kwiDA," kusho uMadlala.Uthe njengo mholi uMaimane kulindeleke ukuthi abe ngumlomo ongathethimanga.UMaimane ngempelasonto ukhiphe isitatimende esithi uNkk Zille umisiwe kuzona zonke izinhlaka zeqembu kulandela umbhalo wakhe ku-twitter lapho ethi khona kukhona okuhle okwenziwa uhulumeni wamakoloni.Isitatimende sikaMaimane silandelwe esikaSihlalo wesigungu esiqondisa iubugwegwe enhlanganweni, uMnuz James Selfe ebesishayisana nesomholi sithi uNkk Zille unikwe incwadi ethi akanikeze izizathu ezishoyo ukuthi kungani kumele angamiswa njengoba kusaqhubeka uphenyo ngodaba lwakhe.UMadlala uthe lezi zitatimende zikhombisa ukuthi kunokungaboni ngasolinye kwi-DA."Uzokhumbula ukuthi khona kwiDA bekukhona abebengafuni ngisho abekwe icala uNkk Zillle," kusho uMadlala.Uthe akaboni lesi sigameko sizoba nomthelela omubi okhethweni luka-2019."Isigameko nje esisodwa esizimele esidinga ukuthi inhlangano isilungise, angiboni kukhona umonakalo esizowenza njengoba nokhetho lusakude," usho kanje.Omunye umhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele uMnuz Thabani Khumalo uthe ukushayisana kwezitatimende zeDA odabeni lukaNkk Zille kukhombisa ukuthi kunemifantu ekhona enhlanganweni."Lokho okushiya imibuzo ukuthi ngabe lemifantu ekhona igqugquzelwa ibala noma cha," kusho uKhumalo.UKhumalo uthe lokungaboni ngasolinye kuzoba nomthelela omubi enhlanganweni okhethweni luka-2019."Lento eyenzekile idala ungabazane ukuthi i-DA ikulungele yini ukuthatha umsebenzi omkhulukazi wokuphatha izwe, uma inezinkinga zalolu hlobo ngaphakathi," kusho uKhumalo.
title: Kungabe uMaimane uyisichuse kuDA?

text: UMNDENI wowesilisa obulawe kade evakashele intombi yakhe eNtuzuma ufuna ubulungiswa njengoba uthi umsolwa uyaziwa kodwa uyazichanasela endaweni.UMnuz Xolani Ndwandwe (36) waseLovu, kuthiwa ushaywe waze washona kade evakashele intombi yakhe eSimunye, eNtuzuma, emasontweni amabili adlule.Kusolwa uyise wengane yentombi ngalesi sigameko.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kwafika uyise wengane yentombi, efuna ukuba bezoxoxa. Kuthiwa intombi yavula kancane umnyango, umsolwa wangena ngodli, emuva kokuba likhiphe ama-burglar guard.Kuthiwa umufi wathi ucela ukuhamba yena ngoba akangene odabeni oluthinta bona bobabili. Kuthiwa umsolwa wathi ufuna yena umufi impela.Kuthiwa waqala lapho emshaya, intombi yabaleka iyofuna usizo, yabuya eseshaywe waze washona.Uninalume kamufi, uMnuz Bonginkosi Ngcobo, uthe bakhathazekile ngokuthi baze bangcwaba ngempelasonto edlule kodwa umsolwa ebe aziwa engakaboshwa.“Umshana wami ubulawe ngesihluku eshaywa kade evakashele intombi yakhe. Esikufunayo njengomndeni ukuba kwenziwe ubulungiswa umsolwa aboshwe. Kunzima ukwamukela lesi simo uma kungakaboshwa muntu ekubeni umsolwa aziwa,” kusho uNgcobo.Ngokusho komndeni le ntombi kamufi bebengayazi, baze bathola ngayo emuva kwesigameko.Umngani kamufi uNksz Nonzwakazi Makhanya, naye ukhala esifanayo njengoba ethe kuningi abangakuqondi ngokubulawa kwamufi nabafuna umsolwa abachazele kona ngesenzo sakhe.Umufi ushiye izingane zakhe ezinhlanu abezondla.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe: “Amaphoyisa aseNtuzuma avula icala lokubulawa komuntu kulandela ukushaywa kuze kushone owesilisa eSimunye, eNtuzuma, ngoJulayi 25 nonyaka. Kusaphenywa, akekho osaboshiwe,” kusho uZwane.
title: Ufuna ubulungiswa umndeni wobulawe evakashele intombi

text:
USOMIZI ugqemeke udume lwengozi kudlula emhlabeni unina, uMary "Mampinga"  Twala, ngoMgqibelo.Lezi zindaba zidalulwe nguye uSomizi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Uthe uMary (80) ushonele esibhedlela esizimele eGoli iParklane namuhla, okuwusuku okwazalwa ngalo uyise ongasekho, uNdaba "Mshefane" Mhlongo. "Namuhla wusuku okwazalwa ngalo ubaba (esho uNdaba "Mshefane" Mhlongo ... futhi umama uvele wasabela ngesikhathi embiza eZulwini...Umuthi omkhulu uwile. Ngilimele kakhulu...kodwa ngingabe nginomhobholo uma ngingamkhululi,"kubhala uSomizi."...umama uphile impilo yakhe ngokugcwele....wafeza okungaphezu kwamaphupho akhe...kubuhlungu njengasesihogweni...Ngeke ngiqambe amanga...Alukho usuku obeludlula engangifonelanga, ecela ethi 'Ngiyakuthanda' noma 'Ngiphe imali'"...Ngiyabonga Ningizimu Afrika ngokuthanda lesi sihlabani esingumama...Usishiye ngokuthula ngabo-11 ekuseni esibhedlela esizimele iParklane njengoba kade ngisendlleleni ngiyomnikeza ingubo yakhe. My tree has fallen........lala Ma pic.twitter.com/CjojR7k2uX"Udokotela wakhe ubengifonelile engazisa ukuba ngize ngoba usevukile futhi uzijabulele...Ngifike engasekho...Lala ma!" UMampinga wadlala emidlalweni yethelevishini nasemafilimini okubalwa kuwo i
Sarafina, 
Beat The Beat, 
Hopeville, 
Leading Lady, 
Ubizo. Kubantu abadlulise amazwi enduduzo kubalwa uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, umculi uLady Zamar, umlingisa uThembisa Mdoda-Nxumalo nabanye.
title: USomizi ugqemeke udume lwengozi kudlula emhlabeni unina

text: ISIKHWAMA esixhasa izitshudeni ngemali yokufunda iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), sizoqhubeka nokukhokhela imali yokudla neyezidingo zezitshudeni ezizovala sesidlulile isikhathi.UNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme neSayensi uDkt Blade Nzimande,  izolo uthe lo nyaka wehlukile kuneminye kanti ezinye izikhungo zezemfundo zizowuqeda ngoFebruwari 2021, ngakho kudingeka ukuthi izitshudeni ezikhokhelwa yiNSFAS zinikezwe imali yokudla neyezidingo ngalezo zinyanga zokufunda ezengeziwe.“Ayikho imali ebekelwe ukuthi inikezwe izitshudeni ezizofunda isikhathi esengeziwe, kodwa manje ngenxa yokuhlasela kobhubhane iCorona unyaka wokufunda uphazamisekile,” kusho uNgqongqoshe.UNzimande uthe ama-laptop ezitshudeni obekumele ziwathole kulo nyaka asezotholakala ngonyaka ozayo ngoba kube nokulibaziseka ngesikhathi kukhethwa izinkampani ezonikezwa ithenda, yokuwathenga.“Izinkampani ezinhlanu ezinikezwe ithenda zazisiwe ukuthi zithole umsebenzi ngoNovemba 5, njengamanje kusasayinwa izivumelwano zokusebenza. Siyaxolisa kakhulu ukuthi lezi zinsiza kufunda bekumele zifinyelele kwizitshudeni kulo nyaka kodwa sezizoze zifinyelele kuzo ngonyaka ozayo, bekumele kulandelwe imigomo efanele yokuqokwa kwezinkampani, “ kuchaza uNzimande.Uqhube wathi ukuhlasela kweCovid-19 kuleli kuveze ukuthi kunesidingo sokuthi kufundwe ngezobuchwepheshe wathi usazohlanganisa ithimba elizophenya ngokufunda ngezobuchwepheshe ngoba ubona sengathi sekumele kube yindlela esetshenziswayo.“ ICorona izohlale ikhona akumele ilokhu iphazamisa ukufunda, yingakho kumele sicubungule ukuthi akumele yini siqale uhlelo lokufundisangezobuchwepheshe, ngakho kumele  sizilungiselele.”Uthe izitshudeni ezifake izicelo zokuxhaswa ngemali yokufunda ngonyaka ozayo zingu-648 000, u-27% wazo ngowaKwaZulu-Natal.“Silindele ukuthi senyuke isibalo sezitshudeni ezizofaka isicelo kuNSFAS sibe ngaphezulu kuka-800 000 ngoba abazali abaningi balahlekelwe yimisebenzi ngenxa yeCovid-19,” kusho uNzimande.Uqhube wathi unyaka wokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme uzoqala ngoMashi ngonyaka ozayo, ngoba kuzolindwa imiphumela ka-matric ezophuma ngoFebhuwari.  “Silindele ukuthi kulo nyaka senyuke isibalo sezitshudeni ezifaka izicelo kuNSFAS sibe ngaphezulu kuka800 000 ngoba abazali abaningi balahlekelwe yimisebenzi ngenxa yeCovi-d19,”  kusho uNgqongqoshe.Ngonyaka ozayo uthe unyaka wokufunda ezikhungweni zezemfundo ephakeme uzoqala ngoMashi ngoba kuzobe kulindwe ukuthi abafundi ababhala umatric bathole imiphumela yabo ngoFebhuwari.
title: Kwelulwe uxhaso lweNSFAS

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneIZINTOKAZI ezingenisile endimeni yobumnandi uNatasha Thahane no-Ayanda MVP, bazobonakala belingisa emafilimini ahlukene akuleli esiteshini saphesheya kwezilwandle iLifetime (DStv 131).Kulesi siteshi esikhonjiswayo nakuleli kudlala kakhulu izinhlelo zaphesheya kwezilwandle ezihlukene futhi izinhlelo zakhona eziningi zilungele umndeni wonke.La mafilimi ahambisana nesiqubulo esithi Wild Love, azoqala ukubonakala ngoNovemba kuze kube wuDisemba.UNatasha uzobonakala kwifilimu ekhuluma ngothando ethi My Nightmare Landlord, u-Ayanda MVP uzobonakala kwethi Looking for Mr Wonderful.Omunye ozobonakala kumafilimu azokhonjiswa kulesi siteshi ngunina womrepha u-AKA, uLynn Forbes.Yena uzolingisa kwifilimu ethi Merry Liddle Christmas.UNatasha uzolingisa indawo kaLydia ozobonakala ethutha endaweni abehlala kuyona eseya kwenye, ngemva kokuhlukana nesithandwa sakhe seminyaka.Ufika endaweni entsha azizwe engaphephile njengoba umnikazi wendawo ehlala emnaka futhi ekhombisa ukuthi umthanda kakhulu.U-Ayanda MVP uzobonakala elingisa indawo kaLisa, ovula ikhasi elisha ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngenxa yokuthi akafuni unina nabangani bakhe bazi ngalo njengoba esefuna ukuzitholela umaqondana.Ngokwenza kwakhe kanjalo uzolithola isoka alithandayo kodwa ngemva kwalokho izinto kazihambi kahle empilweni kaLisa.ULynn uthe abantu bazobona amafilimu ezobajabulisa ngesikhathi samaholidi.“Yithuba elingandele bani leli engilitholile njengoba ngizobe ngisebenza nosaziwayo okukhona kubo uKelly Rowland olingisa indawo kaJacquie.Kulo mdlalo ungowesifazane ongusomabhizinisi ongathandani namuntu kodwa nomndeni wakhe awuhlangene owenza konke okusemandleni ukuwuhlanganisa njengoba kusondela isikhathi samaholidi kaKhisimusi,” kuchaza yena.Kulesi siteshi ezinye izinhlelo ezizobonakala kubalwa iMarried at First Sight US nesizini yesibili ethi Marrying Millions.
title: Izintokazi ezinegama emafilimini esiteshi saphesheya

text:
AKUWONA wonke ushokoledi ongadingeki emzimbeni njengoba kuthiwa onsundu kakhulu owaziwa nge-dark chocolate, unokuhle okwenzayo.Ngaphandle kokuthi ushokoledi udliwa ngoba uletha lowo muzwa oconsisa amathe, onsundu unezakhamzimba ezingakusiza.Lo shokoledi kuthiwa wakhiwe nge-cocoa tree kanti ungehlisa amathuba okuhlaselwa yisifo senhliziyo.Ongoti kwezokudla bathi isixwembe sikashokoledi esingu-100 grams siqukethe, i-fibre, i-iron engasiza ukwakha igazi emzimbeni, i-manganese ne-magnesium. Zonke lezi zithako ziyadingeka emzimbeni womuntu ukulwa nezifo ezithize.Yize uqukethe ne-caffeine okuthiwa ingadala ukuphaphamisa okungakwenza uqwashe nasebusuku, izinga le-caffeine kulo shokoledi alilingani nelekhofi eliphezulu kakhulu.Ngokombiko ohlanganiswe ngongoti bezokudla wabhalwa kwi-
AuthorityNutrition.Com kuthiwa lo shokoledi awunabo ubungozi bokukhuluphalisa njengezinye izinhlobo, kodwa ngaphambi kokuwudla kumele ubheke nesikalo sikashukela othakiwe.Akudingeki nokuthi bese uphila ngawo nsuku zonke kodwa ungadla iqhezu okungenani kanye ngesonto.
title: Ushokoledi ohlasela izifo ezithize

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEUSEPHENDUKE unina wengane enezinyanga ezinhlanu umzanyana, ngemuva kokubaleka kukanina wamshiya nengane KwaBangibizo, eMthwalume.UNkk Bongekile Sengane (45), uthi uzithola esephenduke unina wengane yingoba unina wayo kusolwa ukuthi ubalekele amaphoyisa ngenxa yecala avulelwe lona lokweba izimbuzi emsebenzini wakhe.Uthe le ngane yentombazane waqala ukuyigada inamasonto amathathu ngonyaka odlule ngoba ecelwe wunina ngenxa yokuthi yena uyasebenza.“Unina wale ngane wayazi umakhelwane wami, wacela yena ukuba amfunele umuntu ozomgadela yona. Ngavuma ukwenza umsebenzi savumelana ngo-R1 200 ngenyanga. Kusukela ngoSepthemba bengisala nengane emini bese eyilanda ntambama. Kuthe sekuhamba isikhathi wakhala ngokuthi ngeke esayilanda ntambama ngoba iyakhala kakhulu ayimjwayele. Angizange ngibe nenkinga. Ingane ibisihlala nami emini nasebusuku kusukela ngoNovemba. Unina ubefika alethe ukudla nemali yami,” kusho uNkk Sengane.Uthe inkinga iqale kulo nyaka lapho lo wesifazane engasafiki ukuzoletha ukudla kwengane.“Unina wengane ngamgcina ngoDisemba ezongilethela imali nezinto zengane, emuva kwalokho angibange ngisamthola. NgoJanuwari besilokhu sikhuluma ngocingo, ethumela nokudla kwezingane. Wakhala ngokuthi akanayo imali ngakho wangangiholela. Angizange ngibe nenkinga ngoba ngazitshela ukuthi uzobuye anginikeze imali. Kuthe sekushaya uFebhuwari kwacaca ukuthi akasabuyi nakwiselula ngingasamtholi,” kulandisa uNkk Sengane.Uthe waqala ehamba emfuna lo wesifazane lapho ahlala khona wafica kukhala ibhungezi.“Ubeqashile lapho kade ehlala khona, bathi uphume ngesamagundane noyise wengane bebalekela amaphoyisa ngoba esolwa ngokweba izimbuzi. Ngaya nasemsebenzini bafika bangitshela okufanayo. Manje ingane isele ngakumina,” kusho yena.UNkk Sengane ukhale ngokuthi ingane akazange ayishiye nesitifiketi sokuzalwa nokwenza kube nzima ukubhalisela isibonelelo sikahulumeni.“Nginekhadi lokugoma ingane kuphela ngoba bengijwayele ukuyiyisa kudokotela. Isitifiketi sayo sokuzalwa anginaso. Angikwazi ukuyibhalisela isibonelelo sikahulumeni. Angisebenzi ngakho kunzima ukuthengela ingane ukudla,” kusho uNkk Sengane.Uthe unezingane ezimbili zabafana eneminyaka engu-18 nenye eneminyaka engu-24.“Angisebenzi nomyeni wami washona. Ngidinga imali ukuze ngondle le ngane ngoba sekungeyami. Angifuni ukuhlukana nayo ngoba senginesikhathi ngiyikhulisa. Ngiyile kwabezenhlalakahle bathi angizame ukuthola unina wengane. Nasemaphoyiseni ngiyile ukuyobika udaba kodwa bangalivula icala ngoba bathe vele uyathungathwa unina wengane,” kusho uNkk Sengane.Uthe abomndeni wengane akabazi njengoba abazali bayo bebeqashile.Iphoyisa elingagunyaziwe ukukhuluma livezile ukuthi owesifazane okuthiwa unina wale ngane ufunwa amaphoyisa ngecala lokuntshontsha imfuyo.
title: Usephenduke umzali owashiywa nengane encane unina wayo wabaleka

text: USEWUPHENDULE isikole santambama umuzi wakubo owesifazane waseNanda ongalitholanga ithuba lokuthi ayofundela ubuthisha.UNksz Nonhle Phenyane (26) wasOhlange, usephendule umuzi wakubo indawo yokubuyekeza ngomsebenzi wesikole nokufunda amakilasi engeziwe kubafundi abangakuzwanga kahle ngesikhathi besafundiswa ekilasini.UNksz Phenyane uthi iphupho lakhe bekuwufundela ubuthisha kodwa isiNgisi sakhe sasingesihle esitifiketini sika-matric okwaholela ekutheni akhale ngaphansi ngesikhathi efake isicelo sokufunda e-Unisa ngo-2014.“Kwadingeka ukuthi ngenze i-bridging course ukuze ngikwazi ukwamukelwa, ngeshwa ugogo okunguyena mzali enginaye wathi ngeke abe nayo imali yokuthi ngiyokwenza lokho, wathi okungcono angiye emakolishi ngiyobheka ukuthi akukho yini engingakuthanda okufundelwa unyaka owodwa. Ngenza njengoba ngitsheliwe ngaphuma ngingena emakolishi kodwa kwakungekho okusondelene nezemfundo engakuthola, ngagcina ngifundele ubuntatheli. Angizange ngisithole isitifiketi ngoba ugogo wehluleka ukukhokha uR13 000 wokufunda.”UNksz Phenyane uthe uke waba yintatheli kwelinye lamaphephandaba omphakathi kodwa wabuye wabona ukuthi akuwona umsebenzi awuthandayo. Bekuthi uma enezinselelo kuwona angakwazi ukubekezela wakhetha ukuyeka ukusebenza.“Odadewethu banezingane bengilokhu ngichitha isizungu ngokuthi ngizisize ngomsebenzi wesikole uma zibuya esikoleni. Kube yisikhashana ngiqalile, ngabona sekufika nezinye izingane zakomakhelwane ezingangazo nazo zifuna usizo. Manje angisagcini ngomsebenzi wesikole ezinikwa ukuba ziwenze ekhaya kodwa sengizisiza nangalokho abangakuzwanga kahle ngesikhathi befundiswa,” kusho yena.UNKSZ Nonhle Phenyane waseNanda osephenduke uthisha ofundisa amakilasi engeziwe ezinganeni zakomakhelwane kanye nomakhelwane wakhe abamsiza ngamakilasi engeziwe awafundisela ekhayaUthe njengamanje kunezingane ezingu-27 ezifika kubo zizofunda ntambama. Lezi zingane uthe zifunda uGrade R kuye kuGrade 8.Uqhube wathi abafundi bakhe ubahlukanisa ngokwamabanga abakuwo, uGrade R uwuhlalisa wodwa kanjalo namanye.Uthe okwamanje akakhokhelwa ngalokhu akwenzayo futhi akanazo nezincwadi ezanele zokufundisa. Usebenzisa udonga lwakubo namaphepha kube sengathi yibhodi.“Ukuvuleka kwaleli thuba kungifundise ukuthi yonke into yenzeka ngesizathu. Nyakenye ngibuyele e-Unisa ngafaka isicelo sokufunda sengiwulungisile * -matric wami. Ngasiza nabanye abangani bami ababili ukuthi babhalise, bathathwa mina ngasala ngoba bebebaningi kakhulu abebefake izicelo zokufundela umkhakha wezemfundo. Bengihlale ngikhala ngingazi ukuthi ngingenzenjani, ekugcineni kuvuleke ithuba engingakaze ngilicabange. Ngifuna ukuthola indawo ekahle ngithole nezinsizakufundisa eziyizo.”
title: Usenamakilasi kubo obefisa ukuba wuthisha

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuVakasha kuzwelonke uNkk Mmamoloko Kubayi-Ngubane unxuse abasiza izivakashi abazimele nabenza amatoho ukuthi bafake izicelo zoxhaso ngokushesha ukuze bahlomule kuR30 million obekelwe ukubalekelela kulesi sikhathi seCovid-19.UNkk Kubayi-Ngubane uthe ubeke le mali emuva kokuthola izikhalo kubasizi bezivakashi bekhala ngobunzima besimo abaphila ngaphansi kwaso ngoba abaningi abaqashiwe yizinkampani kodwa bathola amatoho njalo uma kunezivakashi ezindaweni ezihlukene.Abasizi bezivakashi bazolekelelwa ngoxhaso yilabo abhalisiwe ngaphansi kweTourism Act. Kuzoba yilabo abangaqashiwe ngokugcwele yizinkampani abazimele nabangenazo izinkampani zabo. Uthe lolu xhaso kuzoba ngolwezinyanga ezintathu, imininingwane itholakala ku-www.tourism.gov.zaUveze nokuthi bamatasa ngezingxoxo zokuthi izindawo zokudlela zivumele abantu ukuthi bahlale phansi ngoba okwamanje zizodiliva ukudla, ezinye ziyabavumela abantu ukuthi bazokulanda.Ngaphansi kokuvulwa kwezwe ngokwesigaba sesithathu iziqiwi ezizimele zivumelekile ukuvula, kanti abasiza izivakashi, abahlela ezokuvasha nabasebenza emahhovisi ezokuvakasha, bavumelekile ukusebenza.Izindawo zokulala okubalwa namahhotela zizovunyelwa ukwamukela abahamba ngomsebenzi hhayi abangcebelekayo.Ukungcebeleka akukavumeleki okwamanje kanjalo nokugembula ema-casino nokuhlangana kwabantu abahambela ingqungquthela.Khonamanjalo uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha kuzwelonke uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe ezokuthutha sezivunyelwe ukusebenza nalezo eziya kwezinye izifundazwe.Uthe amatekisi kumele alayishe * -70% wabantu abafake izifonyo, amabhasi azogibeza * -50% kanjalo namatekisi azimele ngoba akufanele abantu bacinane.Ezokuthutha ezihamba amabanga amade kufanele zithwale abaya emngcwabeni, ababuyela lapho behlala khona akade besuke ngenxa yeCovid-19, ababuyela esikoleni nasemsebenzini nalabo akade beyokwelashwa.Izikole ezifundisa ukushayela nazo zivunyelwe ukusebenza.Izitimela ezizosebenza ezakwaMetrorail ngoJulayi 1, iGautrain isiqalile ukusebenza. Izitimela zakwaPrasa zisazopaka. Amabhanoyi azosebenza uMbalula uthe kufanele kuqiniswe kwezenhlanzeko.
title: Kunesibonelelo sabasiza izivakashi

text: UKUFA sekuphinde kwagadla emndenini wakwaKhwela kulandela ukushona kwezilamani engozini yemoto eyenzeke kuN3.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kuke kwadutshulwa kwabulawa izelamani kuwo lo mndeni, kwalandela uyise obengumculi wodumo lombhaqanga, uSandile Khwela naye owashona ngokudutshulwa.Umndeni wakwaKhwela usuhlalele ovalweni lokuthi ingabe ubani ozolandela.Lo mndeni womgwedli osezakhele igama kwiDusi Canoe Marathon, uSbonelo Khwela, uthi lokhu kugadla kulandelana kokufa, sebenemibuzo eminingi engaphenduleki njengomndeni.Lezi zelamani ezidlule emhlabeni kuleli sonto, engozini eyenzeke kuN3, ngoNksz Nomcebo Khwela (23) nomfowabo uThabiso Khwela (20).Ngokusho kwabezimo eziphuthumayo, iveni abebeyigibele ishayise izinsimbi ezivimba umgwaqo uHighway, ngakuN3.Okhulumela umndeni, uMnuz Busani Khwela, uthe abasazi ukuthi bathatheni bahlanganise nani ukuze kunqandwe lokhu kufa njengoba izidumbu zilokhu zelakanyana kulo mndeni.Ngaphandle kwalaba abadutshuliwe nabashone engozini yemoto, uKhwela uveze nokuthi kukhona nomunye umfowabo ogule kancane naye washona kuwona lo nyaka.“Asazi ukuthi kumele senzenjani ngoba sesingena siyaphuma nabakwabonayo kodwa akekho oshoyo ukuthi inkinga ikuphi.“Sesikhathele ukungcwaba kulo mndeni.”Uthe kwenzeka lesi sifo nje kugqigqwa ezibhedlela kuyobhekwa abasanda kugingqika nemoto, okungumfowabo omunye nomakoti wakhe.Esephetha uKhwela uthe bazofihlwa emathuneni asekhaya eNtshangwe esigodini saseMngeni kusasa ngemuva kwenkonzo ezokuba sekhaya ngo-9 ekuseni.
title: Udidekile umndeni ngokushonelwa kulandelana

text: UMGOMO wobhubhane lweCovid 19 kulindeleke ufike eNingizimu Afrika ngoMsombuluko ukuvikela izisebenzi ezenza imsebenzi eyahlukene nebalulekile. Onogada abatholakala esangweni ezibhedlela kanjalo nasemtholampilo kuthiwa ngeke basale ngaphandle nabo bazoba ngabokuqala ukugomela iCovid 19.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize ngesikhathi echaza kabanzi ohlelweni lwezindaba kuKhozi FM namhlanje. UDkt Mkhize uthe kungaba yiphutha ukuthi kugonywe odokotela nabahlengikazi kuphela ekubeni baningi abasebenzi bezempilo. Onogada nabantu abahlanza izibhedlela nemtholampilo nabo baphezulu ohlwini oluzogonywa kuqalaUDkt Mkhize uthe uma umuntu engena egula umuntu wokuqala afikela kuyena esangweni ngunogada ngakho nabo kuzoqinisekiswa ukuthi bayavikelwa njengabo bonke abasebenzi bezempilo. Mayelana nokunye okuphathelene nalo mgomo uthe kuningi okusazokwenziwa ucubungulisiswe uma ufika ngaphambi kokuthi usetshenziswe. Lokhu uthe kwenzelwa izinto eziningi ukuthola ukuthi ngabe akunamaphutha yini futhi yonke imigomo ifike ivaliwe isesimweni esifanele ukusetshenziswa.Izakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika kuthiwe zizohlinzekwa mahhala ngalo mgomo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abantu bayasizakala. Lezi ezisebenzisa i-medical aid kuzothathwa kuyona imali yokuyikhokhela ukuhlangabeza izindleko zalo mgomo ukuze kusizakale bonke abantu.
title: Kuzoqalwa ngonogada esangweni ukugomela iCovid

text: USIHLALO we-ANC, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, usephonsele inselelo inhlangano ebusayo eZimbabwe, iZanu-PF ukuthi ikhiphe izimfihlo esabise ngokuzidalula mayelana nohambo lwe-ANC lwaseZimbabwe.Uhambo lwabaholi be-ANC lwangonyaka owedlule lapho yayiyohlangana khona nobuholi be-Zanu-PF lwasusa umsindo ngesikhathi kuvela ukuthi leli thimba lwahamba mahhala ngendiza yombutho wezokuvikela eyayihambise uNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, owayeye kuleliya lizwe ngokomsebenzi kahulumeni.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula wahlawuliswa umholo wezinyanga ezintathu mayelana nalesi sigameko.Muva nje, iZanu-PF isisabise ngokubhobosa ithumba mayelana nalolu hambo.Kepha uMantashe uthe akazi ukuthi iyiphi le mfihlo iZanu-PF ethi izoyidedela kepha wathi le nhlangano kuzofanele iyeke ukusabisa, ivele iyidedele leyo mfihlo.“Asikwazi ukuba nomakhelwane ohlezi njalo esisabisa. Ubudlelwano bethu neZimbabwe ( Zanu-PF) buhlezi bunezinsongo nokwesabisana. Ayingiphathi kahle le nto.“Uma kuwukuthi iZanu-PF ifuna ukugeqa amagula mayelana nomhlangano wethu, abakwenze lokho. Ngiyafisa ukwazi ukuthi yiziphi lezo mfihlo abafuna ukuziveza,” kusho uMantashe.UMantashe ubekhuluma kwiNewzroom Afrika izolo.
title: UMantashe uthi iZanu-PF ayiyeke ukubasabisa

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMGADLI waseZambia, uChitiya Mususu, osanda kusayina kwiTS Galaxy, ufisa ukuvula ngeKaizer Chiefs emkhankasweni wokushayela iqembu lakhe elisha amagoli.I-TS Galaxy neKaizer Chiefs kuzotholana phezulu koweDStv Premiership namuhla eFNB Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.UMususu, obedlala kwiZanaco yangakubo, uthe ukholelwa ekutheni ukushaya igoli kudlalwa neChiefs, emdlalweni wakhe wokuqala,  kungamnika amandla okuhamba ezinyathelweni zabagadli bangakubo abafika kuleli bawushubisa umbango wamagoli.Kubagadli baseZambia obenze kahle kuleli, lihamba phambili igama likaCollins “Ntofontofo” Mbesuma owadla ubhedu eqhulula amagoli awu-25 kwiChiefs, wakuphinda lokho esedlala kwiMpumalanga Black Aces evelela ngamagoli awu-14.Kukhona noDennis “Chesa Mpama” Lotha owabavulela indlela ngalesi sicoco  esadlala kwi-Orlado Pirates ngo-1999/20, Christopher Katongo owasiwina esekwiJomo Cosmos, James Chamanga owayekwiMoroka Swallows noMwape Musonda okuvalwe ngaye ngo-2018/19 edlala kwiBlack Leopards.“Ukushaya igoli emdlalweni wami wokuqala ngidlala neqembu elihlonishwa njengeChiefs kuzonginika ukuzethemba. Isifiso sami wukuqhubeka nokwengeza lapho kugcine khona abadlali bangasekhaya. Esengikuthandazela wukunikwa wumqeqeshi ithuba lokuziveza.”Uthe ufunzelelwa nawukuthi ngesikhathi iGalaxy isadlala kwiGladAfrica Championship yashaya iChiefs kowamanqamu eNedbank Cup.Yena ufike kumaRockets emasontweni amathathu edlule. Ubebanjwe yizincwadi zokusebenza kuleli, asezitholile.“Ngiyazi kuningi okulindeleke kimina kwazise kwiZanaco bengenza kahle. Nokho kangizimisele ukuzicindeza.“Ngizoqala ngokuzijwayeza isimo seligi yalapha, emuva kwalokho isimo sizozichaza sona. Okuseqhulwini wukusiza iGalaxy ekufezeni amaphupho ayo”.UMususu uthe ukholwa wukuthi ukudlala kwiDStv Premiership kuzomcabela indlela ebheke e-Europe. Isifiso sakhe esikhulu wukudlala kwi-Uefa Champions League.IGalaxy iya koweChiefs ingawazi umpetshisi. Kodlule ishaye AmaZulu ngo-1-0, kowokuqala yadlala ngokulingana neTshakhuma FC.IChiefs isenemivimbo yenduku ka-3-0 euithole kwi-Orlando Pirates kowandulela owamanqamu eMTN 8. Kwiligi igcine ishaye iChippa United ngo-1-0.
title: UMususu ubona ezovuka ngegoli kwiChiefs

text: KUME yonke into enkabeni yedolobha eThekwini ngoMsombuluko kudutshulwa kubalawa abathathu kwalimala abanye abahlanu ngesikhathi kusuka ingxabano phakathi kwabangani kwelinye lamafulethi emgwaqeni uDr Yasuf Dadoo Avenue.  Owesithupha kuthiwa uphume enganamyocu ebaleka ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sehlo esenzeke eflethini iTeesav Flates.Abazizwele kuqhuma isibhamu abangomakhelwane bathi kube nengxabao phakathi kwephoyisa nabangani balo, noma bengawazwanga umsuka wengxabano.Ongumakhelwane othe unguBuhle, uthe ubelele endlini yakhe ngesikhathi evuswa umsindo wokuqhuma kwesibhamu.“Bekuxokozela ngesikhathi ngivuka, abantu bebeshaya iminyango bengqongqoza. Lento yenzeke kwi-floor yokuqala, mina ngikweyesibili kodwa bengizwa yonke into. Angazi bangaki abantu abebethinteka (ngesikhathi kuxatshanwa) kodwa baningi abebekhuluma,” usho kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa omkhandlu weTheku uSenior Superintendent Parboo Sewpersad ukuqinisekisile ukuthi omunye wabantu abebekhona endlini uyiphoyis lomkhandlu.Uthe okwamanje ngeke aqinisekise ukuthi ngubani umsolwa kulesi sehlakalo.“Amaphoyisa abizelwe esigamekweni sokudubula endlini ebinabantu abawu-9. Kufe abathathu., kwalimala abahlanu oyedwa akalimalanga. Asina” kusho uSerpersad. Uthe uphenyo lusaqhubeka.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thulani Zwane uthe amaphoyisa athole isibhamu esisodwa endaweni yesehlo.
title: Kufe abathathu kuxabana abangani eflethini eThekwini

text: UNGOTI wezemfundo owaziwayo ngokugxeka uhulumeni angahlonizi ngokuhluleka ukufukula imfundo yakuleli uSolwazi Jonathan Jansen uthi uma uhulumeni ungase ugxile kakhulu emazingeni aphansi ezemfundo ngeke ibe khona inkinga yezinkumbi zabafundi abashiya phakathi ukufunda bengafinyelelanga kwa-matric.UJansen ozinze eNyuvesi yaseStellenbosch oke waba ngumphathi weNyuvesi yaseFree State, ukhwele wadilika kuhulumeni ngokuthi akayikhathalele imfundo ngoba izingane zosopolitiki zifunda ezikoleni ezingcono.“Ukuze uhulumeni alungise inkinga yezemfundo kuleli, kumele kugxilwe emazingeni aphansi ikakhulu ezinkulisa (Grade R). Akungagxilwa emazingeni aphezulu ikakhulu emanyuvesi,” kusho uJansen ekhuluma engqungqutheleni yenyunyana yothisha iNaptosa eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu.Uthe izinto zimapeketwane kwezemfundo yingakho abafundi abawuhhafu wesigidi bengafinyeleli kwa-matric beshiya phakathi izifundo.Usho lokhu nje izinyunyana zothisha zihlale zikhala ngokuthi kumele kuqiniswe emazingeni aphansi ikakhulu uGrade R njengoba othisha bakhona bengaqashiwe ngokugcwele. Imfundo ethathwa njengebalulekile iqala kwaGrade 1.Uthe kukhulu ukwehlukana kwezemfundo njengoba izingane zabacebile zithola engcono.Unxuse othisha ukuthi bangalindeli uhulumeni ukuthi afukule imfundo kodwa babhukule bazenzele.“Ningalindeli uhulumeni ngoba ayikho into azoyenza ngoba izingane zongqongqoshe zifunda ezikoleni ezikahle. Sukumani nenzele izingane zabahlwempu ezidonsa kanzima.”Ukhale kakhulu ngenye yezinyunyana angayidalulanga ukuthi uma iteleka ayifuni kuvalwe izikole zabamhlophe ngoba yilapho kufunda khona izingane zamalungu ayo.Uthe ucwaningo luyaveza ukuthi umfundi ofunde esikoleni esinayo yonke into, noma lezo ezazaziwa njengazabamhlophe kuba negebe uma umqhathanisa nalabo abafunde ezikoleni zabamnyama wathi leli gebe alibe lisavaleka kuze kuphele iminyaka engu-12 yokufunda.Ugqugquzele ukuthi kufundelwe abafundi nezingane izincwadi wancoma nothisha bokufika ukuthi bayawazi umsebenzi wabo.UMnuz Basil Manuel, isikhulu seNaptosa sikhale kakhulu ngokuthi kunenkinga kwiMaths njengoba abafundi beyifeyila.Uthe izinga lokuphasa lesi sifundo liphansi wathi noma bedlulela kwamanye amabanga aphezulu isimo siba sibi kakhulu.UNksz Thirona Moodley, isikhulu sale nyunyana kulesi sifundazwe, uxwayise othisha ukuthi bangabacwasi abafundi noma bafake imizwa yabo uma befundisa.Ukhulume ngesehlakalo sikathisha osulile waseWestville Girls High, osolwa ngokubiza abafundi abamnyama ngegama lokubacwasa eliqala ngo-K.
title: Ungoti ugxeka uhulumeni ngemfundo engagculisi

text: INHLOKO yabaqeqeshi kwiNigeria, uGernot Rohr ikholwa ukuthi iBafana Bafana iyona iqembu eselibhekwe ukuba lidle isicoco se-Afcon eqhubeka e-Egypt. Ngabe uqinisile noma uyabhuqa? UPotshoza ukholwa ukuthi uzama indlela yokusulela ingcindezi ngakwi-Bafana njengoba la maqembu ezodududulana namuhla eCairo.URohr uthi ukusho lokhu ngoba ukushaya i-Egypt isingethe futhi ibophele lonke ubisi lwabadlali ongabacabanga kukwenza uthwalwe ngeqoma ukuthi uzoshaya wonke amaqembu azobekwa phambi kwakho. IBafana inyakazise i-Afrika ikhipha i-Egypt phambi kwabalandeli abangu-80 000.Lo mqeqeshi uthi baya kwiBafana ngenkulu inhlonipho. “Akekho ongayibukanga iBafana yenza okungalindelekile. Siyayazi le nto ebesiyibuka ngoba iBafana besinayo eqoqweni elilodwa kweyokuhlungela yona le Afcon. Indlela umphumela otholwe iBafana kwi-Egypt okukhuphula ngayo ukuzethemba, abantu abazothwala kanzima ithina. Sebengahamba baze basidle lesi sicoco ngoba bayazi ukuthi bangashaya noma ubani kwi-Afcon ngenxa yomphumela abawuthole kwi-Egypt.”Eqhuba le nkulumo uRohr uthe: “Bekuyifanele futhi ukunqoba kwi-Egypt iBafana ngoba ibingcono. Uma ukhipha abantu abathwelwe ngeqoma ukudla isicoco , kuphenduka kube uwena obekwa lowo mqhele. Sidlale kahle nathi sinqoba kwiCameroon. Lokhu kusikhuphulele okwethu ukuzethemba ngakho-ke angingabazi ukuthi lo mdlalo uzoshuba. Okwenza sibe nethuba wukuthi siyiqembu elibumbene ngaphezulu kwezithenjwa ezintsha iBafana. Kuyangijabulisa nokuthi sishaye amagoli emaqenjini abengadedeli lutho. Konke kodwa kubuyela ekutheni iBafana iyona esithishwe ukuthi idle lesi sicoco,” kusho uRohr.
title: Ngabe uqinisile noma uyabhuqa umqeqeshi weNigeria?

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuThutha, ukuPhepha nokuXhumanisa uMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, uthe amaphoyisa awangafi ephethe izibhamu uma ehlaselwa yizigebenu njengoba sekuqale isikhathi samaholidi okuphela konyaka.Ukusho lokhu ePeople’s Park eThekwini izolo, ethula ngokusemthethweni umkhankaso wokulwa nobugebengu emiphakathini nowezokuphepha emgwaqweni.UNtuli uthe iphoyisa alisikhiphe isibhamu lizivikele.“Uma umuntu eseze wasikhipha yena kuqala isibhamu, uma kunethuba lokuhlehlela emuva hlehla kodwa uma ubona ukuthi ufuna ukusikhipha ekubeni wena njengephoyisa uqeqeshiwe, sikhiphe uzivikele,” kusho uNtuli.Izolo ngo-3 entathakusa amaphoyisa agasele emahostela, emarenki nalapho kuhlala khona abantu abangaqondakali enkabeni yedolobha iTheku, afike abopha abantu abangu-211.Iningi labo belivele lifunwa ngamaphoyisa ngamacala ahlukene obugebengu.Kubantu ababoshiwe kukhona abangu-12 ababoshelwe ukubulala, oyedwa kwelokuzama ukubulala, abangu-68 ngecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza, bayisishiyagalolunye ababoshelwe ukuphanga, bathathu ababoshelwe amacala odlame lwasemndenini, bangu-10 kwelokucekela phansi impahla, abangu-18 ababoshelwe ukushayela bephuze utshwala.Kuboshwe nabayisishiyagalolunye ngokweba, abangu-22 ngecala lokusebenzisa izidakamizwa. Kushaqwe izibhamu ezinhlanu erenki yamatekisi ngakuWarwick Avenue eThekwini ngesikhathi amaphoyisa egasele ezosesha.UNtuli uthe akumphathi kahle ukuvulwa kuphinde kuvalwe amacala athe kwenziwa ngabesifazane abasuke bevikela abantu abathandana nabo ababahlukumezayo.“Lo mkhuba umosha isikhathi nezinsiza. Siyazi kuzokwanda nokubikwa kwamacala alolu hlobo, okuzothi ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo ubone abantu sebezohoxisa amacala bevikela abantu ababahlukumezayo. Akunamuntu wesifazane okumele enziwe into yokushaywa. Ukwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa kwabantu nokudlwengula eNanda sizobhekana nakho,” kusho uNtuli.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt General Khombinkosi Jula, uthe lesi yisikhathi sonyaka esinezinselelo emaphoyiseni ngenxa yokwanda kwezigameko zobugebengu.Uthe angu-24 000 amaphoyisa abawakhiphe ukuba azoqinisa ezokuphepha emiphakathini nasemigwaqweni esifundazweni.“Zizonyuka izigameko zobugebengu, yingakho kumele sinyuse izinga lethu lokubopha. Sizokwandisa isibalo samaphoyisa emabhishi, kwinxanxathela yezitolo nasezindaweni eziyimijondolo. Sinxenxa abantu ukuthi basinike ulwazi ngezigilamkhuba emiphakathini,” kusho uJula.Uthe ubugebengu benzeka kakhulu ebusuku nangezimpelasonto ngenxa yokusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwezidakamizwa notshwala. UJula uthe bazobhukula bathole izinkabi eseziqede abantu embonini yamatekisi kanjalo nakumaqembu emigulukudu ezindaweni ezifana neWentworth neSydenham.
title: Asemi ngomumo amaphoyisa ukulwa nobugebengu

text: UHLOSE ukushaya izinyoni ezimbili ngetshe elilodwa umdlali waseThekwini weTS Galaxy, uSinethemba “Snebenebe” Ngidi ozobhekana neqembu lasendaweni adabuka kuyona, Lamontville Golden Arrows kowandulela owamanqamu weNedabank Cup ngoMgqibelo, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont.UNgidi, okhule ezinkulisa zeSuperSport United waze wayozama inhlanhla kwiTottenham Hotspur yase-England, usemabhukwini aleli qembu laseMpumalanga eliqeqeshwa uDan Malesela. IGalaxy esendaweni emaphakathi kwi-log yeNational First Division (NFD), ineminyaka emine yasungulwa yi-agent yabadlali, uTim Sukazi.Kusukela kufike uMalesela eqenjini uNgidi ubonakala edlondlobala ngenxa yokwethenjwa yilo mqeqeshi odume ngokudlalisa ibhola elinenkosi phakathi futhi elidla utshani.Lo mdlalo umqoka futhi unzima ngezindlela eziningi kuNgidi ozobe edlala phambi kwabazali bakhe nalo lonke uzalo, okuhlanganisa oninalume nabangani bakhe. Uthe kuzoba nzima kuyena kodwa unalo iqhinga lokuzethula umthwalo.“Kulula okwami kulo mdlalo. Asikho isidingo sokuvumela isimo engibhekene naso ukuthi singibuse umqondo kepha kumele ngenze konke okulula futhi ngihlale kulokhu okufunwa umqeqeshi. Ngibona ithuba lokukhumbuza ngisho nabaqeqeshi esengike ngasebenza nabo phambilini ukuthi ngisekhona ebholeni. Lo mdlalo ukwithelevishini ngakho-ke angazi ukuthi ubani ozobe ebuka. Kodwa enhliziyweni yami nginakho ukuthi kukhona okuhle okubhekene nami okuzokwenzeka ngenxa yalo mdlalo. Kusemqoka nokho ukuthi ngibeke iGalaxy phambili bese izimfuno zami zilandela ngemuva,”usho kanje uNgidi ekhuluma neSolezwe.Mayelana nomdlalo, uNgidi uthe balindele ukuthi kube nzima ngoba i-Arrows isiqeqeshwa uSteve “Mphathi” Komphela odume ngokudlalisa ibhola elihle.“Ngenhlanhla enkulu angikaze ngisabe muntu enkundleni, ngakho nakulo mdlalo ngiya ngokukholwa ukuthi sizodlulela esigabeni esilandelayo. Asikawubheki lo mdlalo (weNedbank) kangako ngoba kusafanele sidlule kwiRoyal Eagles (ebashaye ngo 1-0 kwiNFD). Unethemba nomqeqeshi wethu ukuthi singadlula kwi-Arrows kodwa sizoyihlelela kahle uma sesiqede nge-Eagles.”Mayelana nokubhekana nabangani phambi komndeni nakuwona okukhona abalandeli baBafana Bes’thende, uNgidi uthe ukwehlisa umoya kuphela okuzomsiza.“Angikungabazi ukuthi umdlalo uzoba mnandi ngoba kwi-Arrows kukhona nabangani bami njengoSanele (Mathenjwa). Lokhu kwenza ngithole izingcingo eziningi bengibuza ngalo mdlalo.”Khonamanjalo iPSL ibeke icala iBloemfontein Celtic lokuhluleka ukuhlela ezokuphepha okuholele ekutheni ungaqhubeki umdlalo wayo neCape Town City ngeSonto. Umdlalo umiswe kungu 0-0 ngoba abalandeli sebengena enkundleni. Izovela ngo-Ephreli 25 ekomitini eliqondisa ubugwegwe.
title: Angase abe yinkinga kwi-Arrows uNgidi

text: UFAKAZI owabona abantu bebulawa ehostela laseMlaza iGlebelands, uthi wayesaba ukubikela amaphoyisa ngokwenzeka.Lokhu kuvezwe ngufakazi woMbuso, igama lakhe eligodliwe njengoba engaphansi kohlelo lokuvikela ofakazi.NgoMsombuluko ufakazi oneminyaka engu-34 utshele inkantolo ukuthi kwabulawa abantu abathathu ngokuhlukana ebuka kodwa akazange awatshele amaphoyisa ngenxa yokwesaba.Ufakazi obephonswa imibuzo ngumshushisi kuleli cala u-Advocate Dorian Paver, uthe abasolwa uyabazi ngoba bebehlala ndawonye ehostela.Bayisishiyagalombili ababekwe icala okunguSergeant Bhekukwazi Louis Mdweshu, uMnuz Khayelihle Mbuthuma, Vukani Manenze Mcobothi, Wonderboy Eugene Hlophe, Ncomekile Matlale Ntshangase, Mbuyiselwa Mkhize, Mondli Thalente Mthethwa noBongani Mbhele.Ufakazi uthe kusuka ngo-2008 ubehlala ehostela ngoba efuna amatoho.Uthe ngo-2015 kwabulawa umuntu ayehlala naye endlini, iphephandaba elingeke lilidalule igama lakhe ukuvikela ufakazi.Uthe wayebuya emsebenzi wayophuza nabanye kwenye indlu ngesikhathi ebona abasolwa belandela umufi.“KwakunguBonga Hlophe (ongasekho), Vukani Mcobothi, uMroza (Khayelihle Mbuthuma), uWonder (Wonderboy Hlophe), noMbanjwa (okungacacanga ukuthi ngubani). Bamlandela, sezwa sekudutshulwa. Kwaba umzuzwana uMroza wafika esethi umufi useshayiwe. Ngagijima ngiya lapho kodwa wayeseshonile. Ngangazi ukuthi obani abambulele. Sekufika amaphoyisa ngawatshela ukuthi umufi ngiyamazi,” kusho ufakazi.U-Advocate Paver ubuze ukuthi kungani engawatshelanga amaphoyisa ukuthi ababulali ubabonile.“Uma ukhuluma namaphoyisa kwakuthiwa uyimpimpi, uma uyimpimpi impilo yakho yayiba sengozini. Nami angiwatshelanga amaphoyisa ngengakubona ngoba ngangisaba,” kusho ufakazi.Uphinde wathi wabona kubulawa ababili ngoMashi 26, 2016 ehostela.Uthe wayemi kuveranda ngasendlini yakhe ngesikhathi ebona ababulali behlasela.“Ngalunguza ngabona uMahliphiza (Ntshangase), Thalente (Mthethwa), Gadafi noNgcobo (okungacacanga ukuthi bangobani) beyodubula laba ababili. Ngagijima ngayongena endlini. Emva kwesikhathi saphuma endlini safica ababili bedubulekile, omunye wayeseshonile omunye ebanjwe wumfowabo opha kakhulu,” kusho ufakazi.Uthe noma sekufike amaphoyisa akazange athi vu ngakubona.Uqhube wathi waze waqala ukukhuluma ngalokhu akubona esethintwe ngamaphoyisa acela abhalise isitatimende ngakubona.“Ngashayelwa ucingo amaphoyisa sengazibuyelela ekhaya athi asizobhala izitatimende ngokwenzeka. Yilapho-ke engaqala khona ukukhuluma,” kusho ufakazi.Kulindeleke ukuba namhlanje ummeli wabasolwa aphonse ufakazi ngemibuzo kulokhu afakaze ngakho.
title: Wayesaba ukubizwa ngempimpi ufakazi ecaleni laseGlebe

text: UKHALA ngesihluku samaphoyisa owesifazane waKwaMakhutha, othi ushaywe kanzima ngamaphoyisa ethi unezibhamu. UNkk Vinolia Mkhize (33) ufuna ubulungiswa njengoba ethi amaphoyisa abebalelwa ku-11 aze athatha imali nokhiye wemoto yakhe emuva kokumhlukumeza ngeSonto elidlule ngoLwesithathu.“Amaphoyisa angene esesikhomba ngesibhamu, ethi afuna isibhamu sami. Emva kwalokho athatha umfana wami ona-15 amguqisa phansi amshaya ngezimpama ethi wuyena ubaba womuzi,” kusho uNkk Mkhize.Uthe uma ebuza ukuthi bayishayelani ingane yakhe, bathi isazokhuluma.Uqhube wathi bathathe uplastiki omnyama bamvala ngawo ebusweni wangakwazi ukuphefumula, bamkhahlela bamshaya ebusweni, waze wazichamela, bethi akasho ukuthi siphi isibhamu.“Konke lokhu kwenzeka nje kukhona ingane yami encane eneminyaka emine iyabuka, iyakhala. Kuthe kusuka lapho base bethatha imali ewuR3 700 yokukhokhela umntwana esikoleni. Bathatha izikhiye zemoto iHyundai i20 bahamba nazo, bathatha o-5kg bensipho yokuwasha abathathu, izipho zami zomshado notshwala obabusale ngomshado owawungo-Okthoba,” kusho uNkk Mkhize.Uthe bathathe utshwala ngoba bethi uyabudayisa, bavula nogologo bawuphuzela endlini, obunye bahamba nabo.“Amaphoyisa kawagcinanga ngokungihlukumeza nokungehlisa isithunzi phambi kwezingane zami kodwa aphinde abulala nempahla yami, okubalwa ama-wardrobe, umabonakude ne-decoder yeDSTV.”Okumshaqise kakhulu uNkk Mkhize wukuthi kade kukhona namaphoyisa esifazane athi awatshengisanga zwelo noma esezikhalela ecela amanzi kuwona.Uqhube wathi amaphoyisa athe ayambopha akaphathe uR500 webheyili aye esiteshini saseManzimtoti. Uthe uma efika esiteshini amaphoyisa akabange esaziveza izinto azithathile futhi akazange aboshwe kodwa unikwe iphepha kwathiwa akabuye ngakusasa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe icala lokushaya nokucekela phansi impahla livulelwe amaphoyisa esiteshini samaphoyisa Isiphingo. Uthe lizodluliselwa emaphoyiseni aseManzimtoti okuyiwo azonquma ukuthi liyadluliselwa yini ophikweni oluphenya amaphoyisa, i-Ipid.
title: Owesifazane ushaywe amaphoyisa (11) emfuna isibhamu

text: IZIMANGA ezigilwe yiManchester City kwiPremier League ngesizini ka-2017/2018 akubuzwa ukuthi zenze abaqeqeshi, bavusa izinhlonzi bashaya indesheni kubaqashi babo ukuba baqaqe ama-akhawunti asemabhange bagcwale izinkalo, basike abadlali abazoshubisela ngabo uPep Guardiola ngo-2018/2019.UGuardiola uqophe umlando eba ngumqeqeshi wokuqala ukuqeda iligi yase-England ngamaphuzu angu-100.Yize kubonakala ukuthi amaqembu amaningi asalinde kudlule i-2018 Fifa World Cup ukuze agxile ekusayiniseni abadlali, kodwa izimbangi zeCity seziqalile ukuqinisa izikwati.Kulezi zimbangi kuhamba phambili iLiverpool, Arsenal neManchester United kanti iChelsea isabhekene nomchwayo wamamboza ezinhlelweni zayo zokunqamula inkontileka yomqeqeshi wayo, u-Antonio Conte, okuphele isizini esemanambana.I-Arsenal ibhekene nekusasa elingaziwa kwazise izoqala isizini yayo yokuqala eminyakeni engu-22 ngaphandle kuka-Arsen Wenger.Isikhala sikaWenger akuchithanga sikhathi ukuthi sivalwe ngo-Unai Emery waseSpain nobekwiParis Saint Germain yezilomo.Kusukela efikile * -Emery, ozakhele igama enqoba i-Uefa Europa League amahlandla amathathu neSevilla, usesayiniselwe uStephan Lichtsteiner osuka kwiJuventus, uBernd Leno evela kwiBayer Leverkusen noSokratis Papastathopoulos ethathwa kwiBorussia Dortmund.Abachithiwe kwi-Arsenal nguTakuma Asano obolekiswe kwiHannover, uSanti Cazorla osekwiVillarreal, uPer Metesacker osewagaxa emgibeni noJoel Campbell onqanyulelwe inkontileka.ILiverpool kaJurgen Klopp, nehlulwe yiReal Madrid emdlalweni wamanqamu e-Uefa Champions Leaue, isike uNaby Keita kwiRB Leipzig ngo-£54m noFabinho weMonaco ngo-£45m. Abachithiwe ngu-Emre Can okhonjwa kwiJuventus, uJon Flanagan noJordan Williams okhonjwa kwiRochdale.IManchester United kaJose Mourinho, imbangi enkulu kaGuardiola, isike uDiogo Dalot kwiPorto ngo-£19.8m noFred kwiShakhtar Donetsk ngo-£52m.Abaphumile nguMichael Carrick osewagaxa emgibeni noDean Henderson obolekiswa kwiSheffield United. Babodwa abayimatanisa noKylian Mbappe no-Antoine Griezmann baseFrance.IChelsea, efuna uMaurizio Sarri weNapoli, ayikasayinisi muntu kwazise ivele isapheka ithulula olukamqeqeshi kodwa izikhala isizivulile, ichitha iningi labadlali abangaziwa njengoMatej Delac, Wallace, Eduardo, Mitchell Beeney, Ruben Sammut, Lewis Baker noJake Clarke-Salter.ITottenham Hotspur kaMauricio Pochettinho ayikasayinisi muntu kodwa isimchithile uKeana Bennetts kanti kusabhekiwe ukuthi yiziphi izilomo zayo ezizothatha ngemuva kweWorld Cup.IMan City isasayinise, uPhilippe Sandler, ovela kwiPEC Zwolle ngo-£2.25m.Nayo ichithe abadlali abangaziwa njengoPablo Maffeo othathwe yiStuttgart, Olarenwaju Kayode oye kwiShakhtar Donetsk noYaya Toure.IBrighton & Hove Albion, emataniswa noPercy Tau, isisayinise uFlorin Andone, Leon Balogun, Joseph Tomlinson noJason Steele.NB: Olunye ulwazi lucashunwe kwi-www.mirror.co.uk
title: Izimbangi zeMan City seziqalile ukuzicijela isizini ka-2018/2019

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, uthe akukho okuphambene nomthetho akwenza ngesikhathi evumela owayeyiPhini likaKhomishana wakwaSARS, uMnuz Ivan Pillay, ukuba athathe umhlalaphansi kungafiki isikhathi sakhe.Izolo uGordhan uhambe nommeli wakhe u-Adv Tebogo Malatji emhlanganweni noMvikeli woMphakathi, u-Adv Busisiswe Mkhwebane, okade efuna uGordhan achaze ukuthi kungani avumela uPillay ukuba asheshe athathe umhlalaphansi amsayinele nempesheni.UGordhan utshele i-eNCA ukuthi u-Adv Mkhwebane udlala ngaye.“Sikhombise ngokusobala ukuthi akukho esasikufihlile ngesikhathi ngiwuNgqongqoshe weziMali. Ngangilandela umthetho futhi nokuqashwa kabusha kukaPillay kwakusemthethweni. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngingenza izinto ezingcono ngesikhathi sami kunokuthi ngizochaza le nto,” kusho uGordhan.Uthe u-Adv Mkhwebane uyadlala ngoba konke ayekwenza kucacile.“Akukho engangikufihla, konke kusemthethweni futhi sinabameli esasikhuluma nabo ngaphambi kokuthatha izinqumo. UMvikeli woMphakathi unenzondo.”UMnuz Oupa Segalwe, okhulumela ihhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umhlangano ube khona esho nokuthi u-Adv Mkhwebane ubefuna ukuthola ukuthi uGordhan wazithatha kanjani izinqumo ezithile.“UNgqongqoshe (Gordhan) uye waziphendulela futhi wanikeza uMvikeli woMphakathi amaphepha azomsiza. Okwenze ukuthi abizelwe emahhovisi oMvikeli woMphakathi wukuthi ubengaphenduli uma ebhalelwa,” kusho uSegalwe.NgoMsombuluko uGordhan kulindeleke ukuthi ayokwenza izethulo zakhe kwikhomishini kaZondo ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.
title: ‘Akukho okuphambene nomthetho engakwenza’

text: IMINDENI engaphezu kuka-30 yaselokishini laKwaMashu ibuyele emakhaya izolo ihleka yodwa njengoba beyisiqiqinge izinjumbane zokudla ezihambisana nezifonyo nezibulalimagciwane. Lo mcimbi obubanjelwe eKwaMashu Sports Centre bewenziwe ngokubambisana yiKasi 2 Kasi ne-Operation Sukuma Sakhe. Umsunguli walo mkhankaso wokutakula imindeni ehlwempu, uMnuz Lwazi Nqetho, uthe kumjabulisile ukubona abantu befika bekhathazekile kodwa babuyele emakhaya ymlomo sewuvakashele amadlebe. "Sibe nenhlanhla yokubakhona kobuholi bukaMasipala weTheku kulo mcimbi wokuguqula izimpilo zabantu," kusho uNqetho.Uthe lolu hlelo olubizwa ngeKasi 2 Kasi Social Relief Program lizosuka KwaMashu lulubhekise eHammarsdale Cash Carry ngoLwesithathu ngo-10 ekuseni bese ludlulela eShadows, KwaDabeka ngeSonto lwango-Agasti 9 ngo12 emini.UNqetho, uthe ngalesi sikhwama bahlose ukusiza imindeni edla imbuya ngothi emalokishini aseThekwini kulesi sikhathi esinzima esidalwe yisifo seCovid-19. "ICoronavirus ihlasele umhlaba wonke futhi akekho umuntu owayezihlinzekele ngalokho, eshiya abantu bekhahlamezekile ngakwezomnotho ngenxa yokuvalwa kwezwe. Yingakho iKasi 2 Kasi ibone kunesidingo sokulekelela. Kulesi sikhathi iKasi 2 Kasi ithole ukuthi iningi labantu abadala bakuleli, imindeni ephethwe yizingane nabantu abakhubazekile  bantu izinto eziyizidingo nqangi." Uthe baqala lolu hlelo behlose ukusiza amalokishi akuleli dolobha kuphela kodwa manje selusabalele nezwe lonke. "Lolu hlelo luhlose ukunikela ngezijumbane zokudla emindenini ezibiza uR2000 ukuze ukudla kukwazi ukondla imindeni izinyanga ezimbili."UNqetho uthe kulolu hlelo abakhethi mabala njengoba bengabheki ukuthi umndeni wesekela liphi iqembu lepolitiki.Uthe lesi sikhwama selokhu sethulwa ngoMeyi 15 kodwa sesitakule imindeni eminingi yaseMlaza,  Mayville,Cato Manor, KwaDabeka naseClermont. "Asigcini ngokunikela ngokudla kuphela kodwa sinikezela nangama-sanitizer nezifonyo."Esephetha uNqetho unxuse nabanye osomabhizinisi ukuba baphonse itshe esivivaneni ukuze lolu hlelo luqhubeke nokuyotakula eminye imindeni nakwezinye izifundazwe.
title: Imindeni ehlwempu ibuyele emakhaya nezijumbane nezibulali magciwane

text: ASHAQE inqwaba yezidakamizwa nemali eManzimtoti, eThekwini, amaphoyisa ophiko olulwa nokudayiswa kwezidakamizwa nezibhamu izolo.Kuboshwe nabasolwa ababili abaneminyaka engu-25 no-29 okubikwa ukuthi batholwe nezidakamizwa ezahlukene.Esitatimendeni asithunyelwe amaphoyisa kuvele ukuthi amaphoyisa abe nomkhankaso olwa nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa eManzimtoti emva kokuhletshelwa ukuthi kukhona umuzi onezidakamizwa.Agasele kwancane indawo emzini othile lapho ebophe khona abasolwa kwashaqwa nezidakamizwa nemali.Kulezi zidakamizwa kukhona i-crystal meth engu-14, mandrax ne-heroin ewu-40. Kushaqwe nemali isamba sayo esingadalulwanga okusolakala ukuthi itholwe ngohwebo lwezidakamizwa.Abasolwa bekulindeleke bavele izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi eManzimtoti.Amaphoyisa acele umphakathi ukuba uwabikele ngabahweba ngezidakamizwa.
title: Kuboshwe 2 kwashaqwa izidakamizwa nemali

text: ALAHLWE elakubo amadoda amabili abebamba inkunzi emgwaqweni Ingome KwaMashu ebanjwa esethi ayabaleka endaweni yesigameko.Lesi sigameko esithinta amadoda amabili aneminyaka ewu-23 no-30 senzeke ngoLwesine KwaMashu esigcemeni sakwaC.Kuthiwa amadoda akhombe ngezibhamu abantu ababili abebezihambela, abafuna imali namaselula. Ababanjwe inkunzi bathinte amaphoyisa ngokushesha kwachazwa nokuthi abukeka kanjani amadoda abambe inkunzi, amaphoyisa aqala uphenyo.Emuva kophenyo amaphoyisa ayalelwe emzini othile athola isibhamu esinezinhlamvu eziyisikhombisa, amaselula amahlanu, i-speaker se-blue tooth, izikhwama nemimese.Kuboshwe amadoda amabili kanti amaphoyisa athe esavula icala kwafika omunye umuntu esiteshini KwaMashu wathi ubanjwe inkunzi.Lo muntu uye wakhomba amadoda aboshiwe wathi yiwona athathe isikhwama sakhe esitholwe emadodeni abeboshiwe.Amadoda amabili aboshiwe abingelele iMantshi yeNkantolo yaseNtuzuma ngoLwesihlanu lapho etshelwe khona ukuthi anecala lokubamba inkunzi ehlomile nokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu.Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa aKwaMashu luphinde lwathola ukuthi isibhamu esitholwe kubasolwa kwakubikiwe ukuthi sebiwa kusomabhizinisi owabanjwa inkunzi esitolo sakhe esisemgwaqeni uMalandela.Kusaphenywa ukuthi isibhamu asithinteki yini kwezinye izenzo zobugebengu.
title: Inhlanzi ishelwe ngamanzi kwabebebamba inkunzi

text: KUHLUKANA inhloko nesixhanti phakathi kweChippa United nobengukaputeni wayo, uJames Okwuosa, okuvela ukuthi akekho ezinhlelweni zomqeqeshi uDan Malesela.Leli phephandaba lithole ukuthi iChilli Boys izama ukufinyelela esivumelwaneni sokuhlukana nalesi sitobha saseNigeria. U-Okwuosa unenkontileka neChippa ezophela ngo-2020 ayisayine ekuqaleni kwesizini ka-2017/2018 emuva kokuchithwa yi-Orlando Pirates. Ubekubadlali iPirates eshintshane ngabo neChilli Boys nyakenye okukhona kubona uMarc van Heerden, Justice Chabalala, Sello Jafta, Donald Mukondelela noNkosinathi Mthiyane. U-Okwuosa, ofike eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2012, udlale umdlalo owodwa kwiPirates ibhekene neMamelodi Sundowns. EZimnyama zithelwe ngehlazo lika 6-0 kulo mdlalo. Isikhulu seChippa, uLukhanyo Mzinzi, sikuqinisekisile ukuthi u-Okwuosa ngeke abonakale kuleli qembu kule sizini ka-2018/2019.“U-Okwuosa akekho ezinhlelweni zomqeqeshi. Siyakhuluma naye nommeli wakhe ukuze sithole isixazululo, simkhokhele njengoba esanenkontileka neqembu. Kubalulekile ukuthi le nto isheshe iphele ngoba yithina esithwala izindleko zokusuka kwakhe eNigeria uma sizoxoxa naye. "Sesizoqeda kodwa lunzima udaba lwakhe. Uma sekuphele konke ngizokwazi ukwenaba kahle,” kusho uMzinzi.IChilli Boys ibuyise uMthiyane noThamsanqa Sangweni abathwale kanzima ukuthola ijezi kwiPirates ngaphansi kwabaqeqeshi abahlukene. UBernard Morrison noThabo Matlaba banqabile ukuya kwiChippa. UMorrison uphindele kubo eGhana washiya kukhalwa. Kuvele ukuthi uwele imingcele nemali kasihlalo weChilli Boys, uSiviwe Mpengesi abekade esemkhokhele yona yokufudukela ePort Elizabeth. IChippa izoqala isizini ka-2018/2019 ngokuvakashela iBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eDr Molemela Stadium, eFree State, namuhla ngo-3 ntambama.
title: Kuhlukana inhloko nesixhanti kwiChippa nobengukaputeni

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu kuzwelonke, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, uthi uma kwenzeka kuhlehliswa ukhetho ngenxa yeCovid-19, kuyodingeka baye ePhalamende naseNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.Ukusho lokhu ephendula umbuzo welungu le-IFP ePhalamende, elibuze ukuthi ngabe kusezinhlelweni zikahulumeni ukuhlehlisa ukhetho njengoba izwe libhekene nesiqubu sesithathu nokuthi uma kungenjalo, zithini izinhlelo zikahulumeni.UDkt Dlamini Zuma uthe iKhomishini eyengamele ukhetho kuleli, i-IEC, ithe ikulungele ukubamba ukhetho ngo-Okthoba 27, 2021.Uthe izinhlelo zokulungiselela lolu khetho ziyaqhubeka futhi kuzolandelwa yonke imigomo ethinta iCovid-19.“Kuzolandelwa yonke imigomo ethinta iCovid-19 ukuze kungabikhona umuntu ozoba sengcupheni yokusuleleka ngegciwane. Sizolokhu siqhubekile nokuqapha isimo ngoba asazi igciwane lizodlanga kangakanani. Uma kwenzeka kuba nesidingo sokuthi kuhlehliswe ukhetho njengoba ngokomthethosisekelo libekelwe ukuthi libe ngesikhathi esithile, kuyodingeka senze izinhlelo zokuthi ziye ePhalamende kanjalo naseNkantolo yomthethosisekelo,”  kusho impendulo kaDkt Dlamini Zuma.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kusasa i-IEC yethula ngokusemthethweni lolu khetho ukuze kugqugquzelwe abantu ukuthi baqhubeke nokubhalisela ukuvota.Khonamanjalo ijaji eselathatha umhlalaphansi, uJaji Dikgang Moseneke, okunguye obhekele uhlelo lokuhlola ukuthi ukhetho luqhubeke noma lungaqhubeki ngenxa yeCovid-19, uyaqhubeka nomsebenzi wakhe njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi abuyise umbiko kwi-IEC ngenyanga ezayo.UMoseneke ufuna ukuphawula kwezinhlaka ezehlukene mayelana nokuthi kumele lolu khetho luhlehle noma luqhubeke.Phakathi kwezinhlaka afuna kuzo ukuphawula kubalwa iminyango kahulumeni okukhona kuwo nowezempilo. Nomphakathi unikiwe ithuba kuze kube uJuni 18, ukuthi ulethe izethulo mayelana nokuthi kungani ukhetho kumele luqhubeke noma lungaqhubeki.Amanye amaqembu ezepolitiki athi kumele lolu khetho luhlehle.Abafuna ukuphawula bangathumela okubhaliwe ku: Tugela House, Floor 1, 1303 Heuwel Road, Centurion, 0157. Bangashayela ku:012 622 5574 noma bathumele i-email ku: [email protected]
title: Ziyaqhubeka izinhlelo zokulungiselela ukhetho

text: UMISIWE esikoleni uthisha weseManqondo Primary, eNkandla, osolwa ngokunukubeza ngokocansi abafundi besifazane bese ebavala imilomo ngoR2 noma ngoncamnce.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lo thisha umisiwe ngenxa yokuganga ngezingane. “Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi ugcine emisiwe kulandela ukuvela kwezinsolo zokunukubeza abafundi. Umnyango usaphenya. Uzothatha izinyathelo ezifanele uma usuluphothulile.”Emasontweni adlule Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo lishicilele udaba ngalo thisha okuthiwa ufaka isandla sakhe ngaphansi kwemifaniswano yezingane zamantombazane bese ethinta isitho sangasese. Kwathiwa kwesinye isikhathi uzibamba izandla azithintise isitho sakhe sangasese esisuke sesiqumbile ebhulukweni.Abazali balezi zingane bathi izingane zibatshele ukuthi uma esegile le mikhuba, ube esezipha oR2 njengemvalamlomo. Kuthiwa ngisho nezifunda oGrade 1 ubezigila le mikhuba.“Enye wake wabhadanywa nayo eyiganga ngasezindlini zangasese,” kusho omunye umthombo osesikoleni.Usihlalo wesigungu esiphethe isikole, uMnuz Mehlonke Bhengu, wathi ubizelwe emhlanganweni ukuze kudingidwe lolu daba olugcine selubikelwe nomhloli.
title: Umisiwe ‘onukubeza’ odado esikoleni

text: UMHOLI we-DA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane uthi ukuhluleka ukuphatha kweqembu elibusayo nemigomo ebhedayo eliyenzile yikona okwenza isimo somnotho sezwe sibe manzonzo.UMaimane ubekhuluma emuva komhlangano wezinsuku ezimbili wesigungu eGoli. Utshele abezindaba ukuthi uhulumeni obusayo uhlulekile ukudala amathuba omsebenzi nokusebenzisa kahle imigomo kwezomnotho.“Siyaqala ukuba nenzikamnotho kusukela ngo-2009 futhi unyaka wesihlanu lona sibhekene nesimo sokuhlupheka kuleli. INingizimu Afrika isiyizwe elintekenteke kunawo wonke kwezomnotho kanti amanye amazwe ase-Afrika ayasimama ngamaphesenti amathathu. Ngesikhathi amazwe afana no- Ethiopia, Rwanda, Cote d’Ivoire, neSenegal ekhula ngaphezu kuka-7%, thina sisele ku-0,7%. Konke lokhu kwenziwe ukungalawuleki kahle komnotho wethu,” kusho uMaimane.Uthe isizathu sokuhlupheka kwabantu yingenxa yokukhohlakala kwe-ANC nokubuswa kombuso yidlanzana.“Uphethroli ubiza uR16 ilitha, iVAT noshukela kwenyukile kanti bangaphezu kuka-10 million abangasebenzi,” egcizelela.Uthe lesi simo senza ukuthi abatshali bezimali bahudule izinyawo ngoba sebelahlekelwe yithemba emnothweni. Uveze ukuthi uma isimo sezwe siqhubeka bazobaleka bonke abatshali bezimali ngoba akukho okubabophezela ukuthi batshale kuleli.Ulinganise ngokuwa kweVBS Mutual Bank athe kukhumbuza abantu ngenkohlakalo edalwe yi-ANC ihlangene ne-EFF.
title: UMaimane uhlaba i-ANC ngesimo somnotho esintekenteke

text: IMOTO: Nissan LeafSEKUPHELE izinyanga ezine iqalile ukudayisa kuleli iNissan Leaf eyakhelwe ukonga imvelo futhi ehambisana nomkhankaso wakwaNissan wokugqugquzela ukwakhiwa kwezimoto ezingayinukubezi imvelo futhi ezingakhafuli isisi esigcolisa umoya esiwuphefumulayo. Ngokwezibalo ezikhishwe abakwa Nissan emhlabeni wonke sekudayiswe ama Leaf evile ku 100 000, kanti naseNingizimu Afrika kubonakala le moto iyithola indawo yayo kancane kancaneLapha ukudayiswa kwale moto kuqale eGoli nasePitoli lapho sekufakwe khona nezindawo abashayeli bale moto abazokwazi ukuba kuzo bagcwalise ama battery njengoba ibattery yayo igcwaliswa njalo emuva kwebanga elithile.Lezi zindawo zibizwa ngama quick charge stations. Okwamanje kwa Nissan bathi le moto ikwazi ukusuka ku 0 ifinyelele ku 100km/h ngemizuzwana engu 11.5 kanti ijubane layo eliphezulu ligcina ku 144km/h. Ibattery ye Leaf kumele ihlale kwishaja amahora angu 7 ngaphambi kokuthi imoto uhambe ngayo lokho okukunika ibanga elingamakhilomitha angu 195.Amagaraji athile eGauteng adayisa iLeaf asenazo izindawo zokushaja ezingakhokhisi mali kubanikazi balezi zimoto futhiezivulwa ubusuku nemini njengamagaraji ajwayelekile ka petrol.
