Inani layo liyakhalisa kodwa kwa Nissan bathi izimoto ezincintisana ne Leaf zibiza R484 000 ezisebenzisa upetrol nenjini elinganayo kanti lezo ezingama hybrid zibiza R505 000.Ngaphambi kokuba iLeaf iqale ukudayiswa kuleli kwa Nissan bayethula kuhulumeni nakwaboMnyango wezeMvelo okungangokuba kukhona ezinye zezimoto ezisetshenziswa yilo mnyango ngenhloso yokugqugquzela ukongiwa kwemvelo. Amanye amagaraji azodayisa iLeaf azofakwa eThekwini naseKapa ngo 2014 kube nezindawo zokushaja.ILeaf iphuma ne service plan yeminyaka emithathu emuva kwebanga elingu 90 000km kanye ne warranty yeminyaka emithathu emuva kuka 100 000km.Iservice kumele yenziwe njalo emuva kwebanga elingu 15 000km.INANIR470 000
title: Iyaqala ukungenisa kancane iLeaf emakethe

text: UMGADLI weBanyana Banyana uThembi Kgatlana uzifake emlandweni eshaya elihle igoli elinikeze elakuleli amaphuzu amathathu, lihlula ompetha iNigeria emdlalweni wokuqala weWomen Africa Cup of Nations (AWCON) izolo ebusuku eGold Coast eGhana.Kungokwesibili emlandweni iBanyana ihlula iNigeria. UKgatlana ube umdlali wesibili ukushaya igoli kubhekenwe namaSuper Falcons. Uthole ibhola elide eliqhamuke kuJermaine Seoposenwe, angazange alicime walikhahlela layoqabula inethi ngomzuzu ka-86.INingizimu Afrika yayikade igcine ukuhlula iNigeria emqhudelwaneni wango-2011 e-Equatorial Guinea idlula ngo 1-0 wegoli likaJanine van Wyk njengoba nayizolo ithole umphumela ofanayo.Iqembu likaDesiree Ellis lilwela ukushaya izinyoni ezimbili ngetshe elilodwa, ukuya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba nokunqoba i-AWCON. Kokubili iBanyana ayikaze ikwenze.Kodwa ayidingi ukuba ngompetha base-Afrika ukuze iye kweyoMhlaba eFrance ngonyaka ozayo. Okumele ikwenze wukuqeda umqhudelwano ibalwa namaqembu amathathu azobe ephezulu.Ngo-2014 kuhlungelwa iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2015, iBanyana yagcina ithole indawo yesine, ashabalala kanjalo amaphupho isaholwa uVera Pauw.Izolo esiwombeni sokuqala iNigeria ibibukeka iyingozi uma iphethe ibhola yize ingazange yakhe amathuba amaningi anikeze ubunzima unozinti wakuleli, uKaylin Swart.Kuthathe imizuzu engaphezulu kuka-30 ukuthi amaSuper Falcons athole ithuba elicishe lashiya kukhala ebhentshini leNingizimu Afrika ngesikhathi isilomo sawo * -Asisat Oshoala etholana nenkanka uDesire Oparanozie. Kodwa lelo bhola laphuma phezu kwamapali.IBanyana ibe nazo izikhawu zokukhombisa ingozi uma iphethe ibhola ilibeke phansi lidle ngamaphasi. Kuqala isiwombe sesibili ikhombise ukudlala ngokuzethemba, ixina iNigeria ngasebhokisini layo.Ezika-Ellis ziqhubekile nokuhlasela kwaba yizona ezigcina ziyibonile inethi.
title: OweBanyana uzifake emlandweni bedla iNigeria

text: USENGENE emculweni uThobile MaKhumalo Mseleku wodumo lohlelo lakuMzansi Magic, Uthando Nes'ithembu.Kulindeleke ukuthi akhiphe umucu wakhe wokuqala womculo wokholo ngenyanga ezayo.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngeSonto uMaKhumalo ongomunye wamakhosikazi amane kaMnuz Musa Mseleku, uqinisekisile ukuthi usengumculi. “Kumanje simatasa nokuqedela leli culo. Ngisebenzisane nomunye wabaculi bowokholo odumile kodwa okwamanje angeke ngikwazi ukudalula ukuthi ngubani. Sizomemezela maduze uma sesilithula ngokusemthethweni leli culo,” kusho uMaKhumalo.Uthe ukuhlabelela into akhule eyithanda kodwa wayengakaze azitshele ukuthi angaba umculi. Uveze ukuthi nguye lo mculi owambona kweminye yemicimbi ayeyihambele wachazwa indlela ayecula ngayo.Uqhube wathi okwamanje akazi noma ukhona omunye umucu ozolandela noma i-albhamu.Uthe konke kusezandleni zabantu, kuzoya ngokuthi bawamukela kanjani umucu wakhe wokuqala.Ephawula ngokugunda kwakhe imiyeko uthe uyigunde ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ngoba efuna ukushaywa umoya. Izinwele ezincane uthe ziyamsebenzela njengoba engumuntu ohlezi ematasa kodwa imiyeko usazobuye ayibuyisele ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.Ebuzwa ngokuncipha kwakhe uthe kuyamsebenzela ukushintsha indlela adla ngayo.“Njengoba saveza ohlelweni lwethu, siyazama ukuthi sidle ukudla okunempilo. Kwami nje sengishintshe nohlobo lokudla engiluthengayo. NoMthombeni useze wajwayela ukuthi asisadli noma yini. Isikhathi sokuya ejimini siyangishaya, ngijima endlini. Ngavele ngathenga yonke imishini yokujima engiyidingayo. Akufani khona nasejimini ngoba wenza ngendlela othanda ngayo."UMyeni wakhe uMseleku uthe ungumuntu ophiwe emculweni, bakubone kaningi lokho njengoba ejwayele ukubaculela emcimbini yemindeni.Ukuthulwa kwalo mucu uthe bazowuqondanisa nokuthulwa kwabusha kwencwadi yabo iLife in Polygamy esizotholakala kuzo zonke izitolo zezincwadi.
title: Usengumculi uMaKhumalo weSithembu

text: SEKUKHISHWE incwadi egunyaza ukuthi aboshwe obenguMengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma emva kokuhluleka ukuvela enkantolo ngoLwesibili.UZuma bekumele avele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngecala lenkohlakalo elithinta izinsolo zokugwazelwa kwakhe yinkampani yaseFrance yezikhali, iThales, kodwa wangakwazi ngoba kubikwa ukuthi akaphilile kahle. Inkantolo ikhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukuthi aboshwe kulandela ukuthi abameli bakhe bengazange baveze incwadi esemthethweni eqinisekisa ukuthi uyagula.Ummeli kaZuma uMnuz Daniel Mantsha unikeze ijaji incwadi kadokotela wasesibhedlela samasosha, kodwa ijaji lithe alinaso isiqiniseko sokuthi lencwadi isemthethweni noma ibhalwe ngudokotela osemthethweni. Ekuseni ngoLwesibili umshushisi woMbuso u-Adv Billy Downer wazise inkantolo ukuthi bafuna kukhishwe incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kukaZuma. Uthe bafaka lesi sicelo ngoba uZuma akaze abanikeze ubufakazi bokuthi uyagula futhi akaze abazise ukuthi uphethwe yini le ebimqanda ukuthi avele enkantolo namhlanje. UDowner uthe baziswa kusanesikhathi ukuthi uZuma ngeke avele enkantolo, kodwa inkinga iqale sebengayitholi eminye imininingwane kubameli bakhe ngesimo sakhe sempilo. Ngesikhathi inkantolo isiguqile uDowner uchazele i-Independent Media ukuthi incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kukaZuma ilengisiwe, okusho ukuthi amaphoyisa ngeke ambophe njengamanje kodwa kuzolindwa kuze kushaye isikhathi sokuthi abuyele enkantolo la azoyichazela khona ukuthi kungani engavelanga ngoFebruwari 3, 2020. Uthe uma uZuma enikeza inkantolo impendulo engagculisi, angase abhekane nelinye icala. Uthe uma uZuma egula kumele ethule umbiko wesimo sempilo yakhe ovela kudokotela, ozofundwa ngasese. Icala lihlehliselwe u-Meyi 6 nonyaka.
title: Inkantolo ikhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kukaZuma

text: OKWENZEKA kwiDemocratic Alliance (DA) kumele kusijulise ngemicabango yezizathu nezinhloso zaleli qembu nokuthi lezo zinhloso zingaba namiphi imithelela kwipolitiki yaseNingizimu Afrika.Kuyishwa ukuthi sibona ukukhishwa inyumbazane kuleli qembu koMmusi Maimane, Herman Mashaba, Zwakele Mncwango, Mbali Ntuli nabanye abaholi abamnyama njengethuba lokubabuza ngokubabhuqa sithi “benithi nenzani?” Ngeshwa sisehlulekile ngukubukisisa ngeso elinzulu okuyizinhloso zaleli qembu. Ngenkathi kahulumeni wobandlululo abamhlophe bakuleli babe neqhinga nohlelo olunezinhloso, phecelezi i-agenda. Umbuzo okumele sizibuze wona manje ngothi kulawa maqembu akhona ezepolitiki, yini inhloso yawo ngabantu abamnyama? Kwehluke okwempumalanga nentshonalanga amasiko nezinkolelo zabantu abamnyama nabamhlophe nokwenza kube nzima kakhulu ukuthi lezi zinhlanga zingabona ngaso linye izinkinga ezibhekene nezwe futhi zibe nezixazululo ezifanayo. Yingakho ngibona kungaba yiphutha elikhulu ukucabanga ukuthi iDA ingaba yikhambi ekuxazululweni kwezinkinga zabantu abamnyama. Owayengumholi weDA, uMnuz Tony Leon, ukuvume esidlangalaleni ukuthi iDA isemkhankasweni wokuzivuselela emuva kokuhluleka kohlelo lokuvivinya ubuholi bosopolitiki abamnyama ekukhuliseni amandla eqembu ngaphandle kokuphambuka ezinhlosweni zayo. Phela iDA yaqalwa ukuze ibe sophondweni lokuvikela ingcebo yedlanzana labamhlophe ngokunjalo nokuvikela umnotho wosomabhizinisi.Inhloso yokubuyiswa kukaNkz Helen Zille ukuzolungisa okonakele kubukeka kukhipha leli qembu emgqigqweni wenhloso yalo. Phela nguye uNkk Zille owaphathiswa yingqungquthela yaleli qembu ngo-2007 umsebenzi wokulikhulisa ngokuheha abaholi nabalandeli abamnyama. Emuva kokuba iDA inhlanhlathiswe nguMaimane nokuphethe ngokuba ilahlekelwe ngabalandeli bayo abangumsinsi wokuzimilela okhethweni luka-2019, leli qembu seliphoqeke ukuthi likhiphe inyumbazane abaholi abamnyama ukuze liqhubeke nelaqalelwa kona. Muva nje, iDA yethule umkhankaso wayo wokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya luka-2021 nosiqubulo sawo sithi “Sekuyisikhathi soshintsho”.I-DA isemkhankasweni wokwakha amaqhinga namasu okuthatha ukubuswa kwaleli lizwe ezandleni zeqembu elibusayo. Lokho kungasho ukubuswa ngabamhlophe njengoba kwakwenzeka ngaphambi kwenkululeko. Umehluko kuyoba wukuthi uhulumeni weDA uyobe uvotelwe nanguquqaba lwabantu abamnyama asebenengekile ngamanga osopolitiki, inkohlakalo, ubugovu, ubuvila nokulwisana ngaphakathi kwendlu emnyama. Inselelo isikwi-ANC, njengomholi womphakathi nomphathi hahulumeni, ukuthi isheshise elayo uhlelo lokuzakha kabusha. Bonke abaholi namalungu athinteka ekuqhwagweni kombuso, kwinkohlakalo nakumacala anzima kufanele bashenxe ezikhundleni ngokushesha futhi bamiswe ukuba yingxenye yezinhlaka nezinhlelo zenhlangano ukuze iqhubeke nokuba yiqembu elinenhloso yokuhola, ukuthuthukisa nokuhlomulisa abantu abamnyama kwezomnotho ngobuqotho nangenkuthalo. Umsebenzi we-ANC ethenjiwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izinhlaka zemiphakathi yaleli zwe zibumbene ukuze zifuqe inhloso yezwe ngaphandle kokubandlulula, ikakhulukazi izinhloso zomphakathi omnyama.Kusuka ngo-1912 ukusebenza kwe-ANC kwakhelwe phezu kwezimiso ezintathu. Okokuqala; i-ANC yakhelwa ukukhulula uquqaba kuhulumeni wobandlululo bese ihola uhulumeni wentando yabantu. Okwesibili; i-ANC yayisebenza ngokulawulwa yimigomo nezimiso zentando yabantu okuhlanganisa ukusebenza ngokuvulelekile, ngokuhlanganyela, ngobunye nangokwethembana nemiphakathi. Okwesithathu; i-ANC ibilokhu ingumholi womzabalazo wenkululeko yesizwe sonkana njengoba manje isisophondweni lokuphathwa kwezwe.Namanje i-ANC isamelwe yijoka lokuthi ihole umkhankaso wokufezekisa inhloso yabantu abamnyama. Uma singakubhekile ngeso lokhozi ukusebenza kweDA, inkululeko yabamnyama izulelwa ngamanqe. * UMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uwungoti kwezokuphatha nomhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele
title: I-DA ngeke ibe yikhambi lokuxazulula izinkinga zabamnyama

text: UNOZINTI waMaZulu FC, uMoeneeb Josephs, ufuna ukubingelela abalandeli beqembu ngenothi eliphezulu uma sebedlala neBaroka FC emdlalweni wokuvula we-Absa Premiership ngempelasonto.USuthu luzobe ludlala phambi kwabalandeli balo eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlazi ngoMgqibelo ngo 8.15 ebusuku.Ngempelasonto edlule uJosephs, osuka kwiBidvest Wits, ulitholile ithuba lokuvimba ngesikhathi bedlala kwiKZN Premier’s Cup kuyona le nkundla.Wenze iphutha eliholele ekutheni iReal Kings abebedlala nayo emdlalweni wokuqala ithole igoli lokulinganisa. Kodwa ukwazile ukugeza igama lakhe evimba amaphenathi okuholele ekutheni bangene kowamanqamu alo mqhudelwano abagcine ngokuwunqoba.“Asikafiki lapho esifuna khona kodwa uma sibheka lokhu esifuna ukukwenza ngicabanga ukuthi lesi yisiqalo esihle sokuthi kubekhona esikunqobayo. Le ndebe izosinikeza ukuzethemba ngokuthi singakwazi ukukunqoba okuthile njengeqembu,” kusho uJosephs.Uthe ufisa ukuthi abalandeli beqembu baphume njengoba benzile kwiPremier’s Cup.“Ngiwubheke ngabomvu umdlalo futhi njengoba sizobe siphambi kwabalandeli bethu siyabadinga ukuthi bazosikhuthaza. "Okubalulekile wukuthi siqale isizini ngenothi eliphezulu. Imidlalo yasekhaya iyona okumele ulwele ukuthola amaphuzu ngaso sonke isikhathi. Kuleli sonto sizogxilisa imiqondo yethu emdlalweni weBaroka,” kusho lo nozinti oseke wavimba nakwi-Orlando Pirates.AmaZulu agcine egejwe yithuba lokudlala kwiMTN 8 ngemuva kokuthi i-Ajax Cape Town ilahlwe icala lokudlalisa uTendai Ndoro. Ukunikezwa kweSuperSport United, kukhiphe Usuthu kwi-Top 8.“Okubalulekile wukuthi abaphathi bethu bebesilwela kodwa ngebhadi kwangalunga. Lezi zinto ziyenzeka ebholeni futhi ngeke ukwazi ukuzilawula. Okusezandleni zethu njengamanje umdlalo wangoMgqibelo okumele siwunqobe futhi siqede phezulu kwi-log ukuze kulokhu kungabikhona ukungabaza,” kusho lo nozinti ozobanga indawo noSiyabonga Mbatha no-Energy Murambandoro.Umqeqeshi woSuthu, uCavin Johnson uthe ugculisekile ngemidlalo embili yezakhe kwiPremier’s Cup njengoba imnike ithuba lokuhlola abadlali abasha.Uzidlasile zonke izinduku zakhe ezintsha okukhona, uNhlanhla Vilakazi, Josephs, Emiliano Tade noMarc van Heerden.
title: UMoeneeb wethembisa into ecokeme kwaboSuthu

text: IKHANSELA ebeligadwa ngamaphoyisa kamasipala amabili adutshulwe afa eqaphe umuzi walo eBhambayi ngoMsobuluko ebusuku, likholwa wukuthi ababulali bebezohlasela lona.UMnuz Sthe Zulu uthe ubengakalali ngesikhathi amaphoyisa, okushaye isikhathi sokushicilela engakatholakali amagama awo, abesevenini yawo ebime esangweni lomuzi wakhe ebulawa aphucwa nezibhamu zawo.Uthe bekunomsindo sengathi kukhona oqongqotha imoto ngokuthile ngasesangweni ngaphambi kokuthi kuqhume isibhamu.“Ngemuva komsindo kuqhume isibhamu amadoda amabili edubula amaphoyisa. Ngemuva kokudubula abe esedubula ebhekise endlini, angazi ukuthi aphazanyiswe yini abaleka ngemoto. Ngizizwa ngingaphephile kakhulu kunakuqala uma abantu abakuqeqeshelwe ukuvikela bebulawa ngale ndlela behlomile,” kusho uZulu.Uthe amaphoyisa anikezwa wona abesefana namalungu omndeni wakhe ngenxa yokuthi bese kunezinyanga eziyisishayagalolunye esebenza ngokushintshana ubusuku nemini emgada emzini wakhe.“Ngo-2017 kube nezivuvaba eziningi abantu abebekhala ngezidingo bemashele emzini wami, besabisa ngokungenzakalisa. Kwaze kwabonakala ukuthi lokhu kumasha kuyingozi kimi nasemndenini wami. Ngabikela umasipala kwase kwenziwa ucwaningo olwathola ukuthi kumele ngigadwe ngamaphoyisa nonogada ubusuku nemini. Amaphoyisa abulewe abenza lowo msebenzi eshintshana namanye. Kubuhlungu ukubulawa kwawo, kufana nokuthi kubulawe amalungu omndeni,” kusho uZulu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt-Col Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa asePhoenix avule amacala amabili okubulala nelokubamba inkunzi emuva kokuthi kubulawe amaphoyisa kamasipala amabili kwase kuthathwa izibhamu zawo.Uthe bekungakaboshwa muntu kodwa amaphoyisa asaphenya.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku, uSenior Superintendent Parboo Sewparsard, uthe balahlekelwe kakhulu ngokubulawa kozakwabo obese kunesikhathi beyibambe emaphoyiseni e dolobha.Uthe womabili amaphoyisa abulewe - elendoda (58) nelesifazane (37) - abesebenza esiteshini samaphoyisa kamasipala esiseVerulam.Uthe indoda ibisineminyaka engaphezulu kuka-30 iyiphoyisa owesifazane eneminyaka ewu-15.“Ngokubambisana namaphoyisa iSAPS sisungule ithimba eliqale umkhankaso wokufuna ababulali nezibhamu abazintshontshile. Ngeke siphumule zingakaboshwa lezi zigilamkhuba,” kusho uSewpersard.IPhini leMeya yeTheku, uNkk Fawzia Peer, inxuse amaphoyisa ukuthi enze konke okusemandleni ukuthi izigilamkhuba ezibulale amaphoyisa zitholakale.“Ukubulawa kwamaphoyisa kungukubukela phansi uMbuso. kumele zijesizwe kanzima. Ukubulawa kwawo kuzoshiya isikhala esingeke sivaleke ngokushesha emaphoyiseni.”
title: Ligeqa amagula ikhansela ebeligadwa amaphoyisa abulewe

text: WILLEM PHUNGULAUBONGA ukweseka ngabaKwaZulu-Natal ngempumelelo yohlelo lwakhe umsakazi weMetro FM.UMsizi Shembe owenza iSunday Soul Therapy ngeSonto phakathi kuka-12 no-3 ntambama, uthi uhlelo lwakhe lungezinye abaphathi bakhe abathi lwenza kahle kakhulu. Ngalokhu uthi kungenxa yokwesekwa akuthola esifundazweni adabuka kusona okuyiKwaZulu-Natal. Uthe akukho mlingo awenzayo ukukhulisa uhlelo ngaphandle kokuzinikela athe kungesinye sezizathu akholwa ukuthi simkhulisile kwezokusakaza saphinda sakhulisa nohlelo. UMsizi odabuka eMlaza esigcemeni kwa-D, uthi izinkomba zakamuva zikhombisa ukukhula kwezibalo zabalalela uhlelo lwakhe eMlaza nasesifundazweni sonke. Uthe ngale mpumelelo yohlelo sebesungule iqembu iLove Movement ngokubamisana nezinye izinkakha zabasakazi okungoWilson Nkosi owenza i-State of the Entertainment Address kusuka ngo-9 kuya kuya-12 emini, uSentle Lehoko owenza i-The Romantic Repertoire phakathi kuka-3 no-6 ntambama noMo G ongena ngo-6 kuya ku-9 ebusuku. Zonke lezi yizinhlelo ezinomculo ongasoze wabuna ezingena ngeSonto. UMsizi uthi liyakhula isasasa leLove Movement njengoba bethola izimemo eziningi ezindaweni zobumnandi becelwa ukuba bezodlala ndawonye."Izinto zihamba kahle. Sesilinde izibalo ezisemthethweni ngoJune kodwa angingabazi zizokhomba ukwenyuka. Kukhulu ukwesekwa engikuthola esifundazweni sami iKZN okuyinto engiyibonga kakhulu," kusho uMsizi.UMsizi uqale ukuzihlanganisa nokusakaza ngesikhathi ejoyina iCapital Radio eseyibizwa nge-East Coast Radio. Udlulele eGoli wajoyina isiteshi esenza inzunzo iKNI.  Ngo-1997, kusungulwe iYFM yase iyamthatha. Ubuyele KwaZulu-Natal wajoyina iP4 osekuyiGagasi FM. Udlulele kwiVuma FM ngaphambi kokujoyina iMetro FM ngo-2017 kuze kube manje. Uphethe ngokuthi uphinde asebenzisane noDJ Muntu (Masterblaster) kanjalo noDJ Muntu (Jikeleza) la eKZN.
title: Ubonga ukwesekwa ngomkhaya oweMetro FM

text: INYUNYANA iPublic Service Association (PSA) yamxwayisa uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezaseKhaya, uMnuz Aaron Motsoaledi, ngokuqasha oyiNhloko esabambile kwiGoverment Printing Works (GPW), uNksz Alinah Fosi, esikhundleni ngokugcwele. IPSA ijoyine iSA ngokuphikisa ukuqashwa kukaFosi ngokugcwele esikhundleni ngenxa yokushaywa kwamakhala ngeziqu zakhe zemfundo ephakeme, ukuhlukumeza abasebenzi baseGPW nokuxhaphaza imali yabakhokhi bentela ngokuxhasa uhambo lwabangani bakhe lwaphesheya. IPSA, ezishaya isifuba ngokuba yinyunyana enamalungu amaningi eGoverment Printing Works, ithe phezu kwendathane yezincwadi ebizibhala ngenhloso yokucela ukuhlangana noMotaoeledi ukuze imbikele futhi badingide ngalezi zinsolo zokungaziphathi kahle kukaNksz Fosi, uMotsoaledi akaze azihluphe ngokuba nomhlangano nabo. "Kunokuba uNgqongqoshe Mostoaledi anikeze iPSA ithuba lokuba imnikeze umbiko ogcwele ngezinsolo nobufakazi, uqhubekile waklelisa uNksz Fosi kubantu abazophekwa ngemibuzo futhi wabizekwa kwinhlolokhono yalesi sikhundla, wayiziba unomphela imibiko yokuthi uNksz Fosi akasifanele lesikhundla nokuthi akanazo iziqu zaso. Ngesikhathi uNksz Fosi eseyiNhloko ebambile, wabuveza ubuthakathaka bokuthi akasifanele lesi sikhundla njengoba abasebenzi bebelokhu bephelelwa wumdlandla futhi abasebenzi abaningi nezimenenja bebekhalaza ngendlela aphethe ngayo," kusho isitatimende sePSA.IPSA ithe ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi uMotsoaledi udaze inkani ngokuqoka uFosi ngisho enogcobho, ithe yona izokwenza konke ukuvikela amalungu ayo "ngisho nokusiphonsela inselelo enkantolo lesi sikhundla."Ithe isamcela uMotsoaledi ukuba enze okufanele futhi amise esikhundleni uNksz Fosi ngokuphazima kweso, kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo."Akusona isikhathi esikahle ezweni lethu ukuqoka abantu abanogcobo ezikhundleni zokuphatha ezinkampanini zikahilumeni njengoba sibonile abantu abanjalo bazenzenjani izinkampani eziphethwe ngumbuso. Nokhulumela iDA kulo mnyango uNkk Angel Khanyile uthe uMotsoaledi akammise uNksz Fosi njengoba kusenophenyo. UNkk Khanyile ubuye waveza ukuthi uFosi wake wamosha isamba sikaR500 000 ngokwenza umbuthano wokucobelelana ngolwazi eBela-Bela Hotel nokukhipha amathenda ngaphandle kokulandela imigomo ebekiwe.
title: Abamfuni esikhundleni osolwa ngokuba neziqu ezinogcobho

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthe izinto zizogaya ngomunye umhlathi kulabo abasuke behamba nesidumbu emotweni uma kuyongcwatshwa njengoba bezoba babili emotweni.Uthe lokhu bakwenza ukuze kuvikelele abahamba naso. “Kumele babe babili abazohamba nesidumbu uma siyongcwatshwa. Lokhu sikwenza ukuze sibavikele uma kungukuthi oshonile ubeneCoronavirus,” kusho uCele. Ubephendula imibuzo kuchazwa ngemigomo yesigaba sesithathu sikathaqa esiqala ngoMsombuluko.Uthe bangu-243 000 asebeboshiwe selokhu izwe laqala ukuvalwa ngoMashi.Ukhale ngesibalo esiphezulu samaphoyisa ahaqwe ubhubhane athe angu-841.“Uma ubheka kulesi sibalo samaphoyisa ahaqekile, angu-601 aseWestern Cape, okukhomba ukuthi inkulu inkinga khona. Ayisishiyagalombili amaphoyisa asebulewe yiCorona.”Uthe izivimbagwaqo zisazoba khona futhi basazowuqinisa umthetho.“Sizowuqinisa umthetho ikakhulu kulezi zindawo ezinesibalo esiphezulu seCorona okubalwa nesifunda iLembe KwaZulu-Natal nezinye. Sisazoqhubeka sifune imvume yokuthi uphumelani ekhaya, sifuna abantu baqhubeke bagqoke izifonyo.”Uthe ukuvakashela izintombi, izihlobo, nabangani akuvumelekile. Odabeni lotshwala uthe ngoLwesihlanu kuya ngeSonto akumele utshwala buhanjiswe noma budilivwe.“Sifuna ukunxusa abantu ukuthi bangalingeki badayise uma sekumele kuvalwe ukudayisa. Uma kushaya * -5 vala...”UNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula uthe kumele kubikwe amaphoyisa namasosha ahlukumeza umphakathi. Uthe uma amasosha efica umuntu ephuza kwakhe, awamzibe angangeni.Uthe bangabikwa ku: 0800 333 177.
title: Umthetho obekelwe abasuke behamba nesidumbu

text: MHLELI: Uhulumeni sengathi angake abhekisie lolu hlelo lwethelevishini olwethulwa nguJub Jub nozakwabo aluvale luphele nya.Lapha eNingizimu Afrika kukhalwa ngesihlava esibhebhethekayo sodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane. Lapha ngikhuluma ngokuphuma kwemiphefumulo yabantu ikhishwa abantu abasuke bebathemba ukuthi yibona abazobavikela.Kunalolu hlelo olubizwa ngokuthi Uyajola 9/9, lapha othola khona uJub Jub nezigora zakhe bejivaza abantu besilisa nabesifazane.Abantu besilisa bayashaywa, bayathukwa, bathelwa ngamanzi umuntu abe manzi te, bahlubulwe izingubo belele, beshaywa, bejivazwa abesifazane abasuke bevikelwa nguJub Jub nezidlakela zakhe.Ngibona sengathi njengoba uhulumeni enza umsebenzi omuhle kangaka wokuzama ukunqanda udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane uJub Jub nethimba lakhe bayithela amanzi yonke le mizamo kahulumeni. Kunokuthi kube khona ubungcono obungalethwa yilolu hlelo, ngilubona lubhebhethekisa inzondo emangalisayo.Angikholwa wukuthi uJub Jub emfundweni yakhe wawufundela umthetho. Angikholwa ukuthi uyakwazi ukuthetha amacala akhiphe isinqumo esiphusile.Uma esemangele lowo omangalayo wesifazane uJub Jub uya komangalelwe evese esemehlulele ngasolwa ngakho. Lona wesifazane usuke evikelwa yilezi zigansonso ezitapela kowesilisa emshaya, emthuka, emjivaza ngayo yonke indlela ongase uyicabange.Uma ubuka ithelevishini bese kudlalwa lolu hlelo uye uzibuze ukuthi kanti umuntu wesilisa wonani kuleli zwe. NoNdosi, uNgqongqoshe wama Phoyisa, akayifakele izibuko le nto ngoba ngelinye ilanga kophuma isidumbu kubuka wonke umuntu waseMzansi. Okudabukisayo wukuthi yena uJub Jun nezigora zakhe babukisa ngabantu besilisa basuke bahambe, lona wesifazane osuke kade eqhoshe ngabo ugcina esesele yedwa.Jub Jub, ubani owakutshela ukuthi ukuqonywa kuyicala. Wena awuqonyiwe nje njengoba usuzenza ugcwelengcwele ngamanye amadoda?Uma umuntu ethandana nentombazane ubani owathi kunefindo elisuke seliboshiwe phakathi kwabo. Lapha asiboni omama bemizi behambe bethungatha amadoda abo, kodwa sibona amantombazane nje asephelelwe wushatini elokhu esidalela isicefe.Lalela-ke funa omunye umsebenzi ngoba lona uzokufaka kwenkulu inkinga lena.Hulumeni wethu waseNingizimu Afrika nqandani nangu umuntu eqhatha izwe nibe nenza yonke imizamo yokuqeda lesi sihlava esibhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane.Jabulani Zenzo Khumalo
title: Aluvalwe uhlelo lukaJub Jub Uyajola9/9

text:
UBONGE wanconcoza kubalandeli bakhe usomahlaya uTrevor Noah kulandela ukuphinde amenyezelwe njengomunye wabaqokwe kuma-Emmy Awards alo nyaka.UNoah uveze lezi zindaba eseRussia nokuyilapho eyobuka khona imidlalo yeNdebe yoMhlaba.Uthe uhlelo alwethulayo iThe Daily Show, luqokwe emikhakheni emithathu kulo nyaka.Ku-Instagram uNoah ufake isithombe esimveza eme ngaphambi kwamabhilidi ayimibhoshongo aseRussia. Ubhale wathi: "Ngivakashe la eRussia izinsuku ezintathu ngizobuka ibhola sengithola izindaba zokuthi uhlelo engilwethulayo iThe Daily Show luqokwe kathathu."Ngesikhathi esilandelayo ngiyohlala isonto lonke ngibuye sengizongenela isikhundla esokuba ngumengameli wezwe.”Ubonge kwabamesekile, ozakwabo nalabo abangaphuthwa wuhlelo selokhu lwasungulwa ngokuqokwa.Wow, I visited Russia for 3 days and now The Daily Show is nominated for 3 Emmys. Next time I should stay for a week and then run for president 😄 To all the people who voted for us and to all who watch our show I could not be more grateful. Spasibo 🙌🏽 #EmmysA post shared by 
Trevor Noah(@trevornoah) on Jul 12, 2018 at 2:47pm PDTUkuqokwa kukaNoahkungenxa yohlelo lwakhe alwethulayo iThe Daily Show e-USA esakazwa emazweni amaningi omhlaba.Sekungokwesithathu eqokwa kulezi zindondo. Ezikhathini ezimbili zaphambilini ubashaye emakhanda abekade eqhathwe nabo.-AP
title: UTrevor ubonge abalandeli eqokwa kuma-Emmy Awards

text: UNGOTI wezamandla uthi sekusele kancane ukuba eNingizimu Afrika kube mnyama bhuqe kucishwe ugesi njengoba abakwa-Eskom bekhuphula izigaba zokucishwa kukagesi.UMnuz Chris Yelland, engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uthe sekusele izigaba ezimbili kuphela bese abakwa-Eskom bephelelwa amacebo, ngokucishwa kukagesi, okungagcina kuholele ukuba kucishwe ugesi ezweni lonke.“Kuyaqala kuleli ukuba sifike esigabeni sesithupha sokucinywa kukagesi. Abakwa-Eskom baphelelwa amaqhinga manje, sekusele isigaba sesikhombisa nesesishiyagalombili kuphela. Emuva kwalokho kuyocaca ukuthi kucishwe ugesi kube mnyama bhuqe.Uma nje abakwa-Eskom bephelelwa amaqhinga sizoba senkingeni. Lokhu kuzokwenza osomabhizinisi badinwe balahlekelwe nayimali.“Kanjalo nomnotho uzokwehla. Le nkinga kumele isukunyelwe manje singaze sibe sobishini esingeke siphinde siphume kulo.”Abakwa-Eskom bafake isitatimende kwiTwitter ebesithi kube nenkinga eholele ukuba banciphise ugesi kuze kufike esigabeni sesithupha kusukela ngo-6 ntambama kuze kube * -11 ebusuku.Kusukela ngeledlule ugesi ubucinywa.Kwisitatimende * -Eskom uthe: “Siyaxolisa ukunazisa ukuthi ukucishwa kukagesi sekusukile esigabeni sesine, sekusesigabeni sesithupha kusukela ngo-6 ntambama namhlanje (izolo).Lokhu kungenxa yenkinga kwisiphehli-mandla sikagesi eMedupi. Nemvula enamandla ibe nomthelela emalahleni.”Ngokusho kwabakwa-Eskom, isigaba sesithupha sisho ukuthi bazocisha ugesi ukuze bathole * -6000MW.“Sifisa ukukhumbuza amakhasimende ethu ukuthi ukucishwa kukagesi esigabeni sesithupha akuyona into okumele aphakamise ngayo amaphaphu ngoba isimo siyasilungiswa.”Ngokwencwadi i-Eskom eyifakile kwiTwitter bechaza ngokunqanyulwa kukagesi, bathe lesi sigaba sisho ukuthi ugesi ungacishwa kabili ngosuku endaweni eyodwa.Kungenzeka lokhu kwenzeke amahora amabili kuya kwamane.Leli pheshana liphinde lichaze ukuthi uma sekufikwe esigabeni sokugcina okuyisigaba sesishiyagalombili, kuyosho ukuthi ugesi uyocinywa * -50% ngosuku.Lokhu kusho kuthi uhhafu wosuku, ngeke ugesi ubekhona.KwiTwitter abantu bakhwele badilika ku-Eskom bekhala ngokunyuswa kwesigaba sokucishwa kukagesi.
title: Ilahlisa ithemba indaba ye-Eskom

text: UKUNGAGAYELWA mphako kwe-Cape Town City selokhu kuqale isizini nokuqubule imbuzo kuthele izithelo zokubizelwa kwabadlali bayo ababili asebeke balahliswa okwenyongo yenyathi amaqembu abebedlala kuwo kwi-Absa Premiership.Laba badlali nguLebogang Manyama noShu-Aib Walters ababoshelwe eqenjini leBafana Bafana elimenyezelwe ngu-Owen Da Gama, eSafa House, eGoli ngoLwesine ekuseni. Leli qembu lizodlala neGuniea Bissau eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngoMashi 25 ngo-3 ntambama.Bobabili bebekwiMpumalanga Black Aces ngaphambi kokuguqulwa kwegama yaba iCapeTown City, ngemuva kokuthengwa ilungelo layo lokudlalakwi-Absa Premiership nguJohn Comitis.Bahlangana kwiBlack Aces ngemuva kokuchithwa ngamaqembu ababedlala kuwona ngoba benuka iqaqa.UManyama (26), wayelahlwe yiSuperSport United ngaphansi kukaGordon Igesund owayecija Amatsatsantsa ngaleso sikhathi. UWalters owayekwiBafana kwiFifa 2010 World Cup edlalele kuleli wayekade ekhonjwe indlela kwiMaritzburg United ngaphansi kwesizathu sokungaziphathi njengomdlali osemnkantshubomvu.UManyama ungomunye wabadlali kwiPSL okubhekeke ukuthi akhale emuke nesicoco somdlali ohlohle amagoli amaningi ngokuphela kwesizini.Ubambene phezulu noTendai Ndoro we-Orlando Pirates ngokushaya amagoli awu-11 umdlali ngamunye selokhu kusombuluke isizini ka-2016/17.Lo mdlali odabuka e-Alexander Township, eGoli, ogcine ukubizelwa eqenjini lesizwe ngo-2013 lapho adlala khona neNigeria neBurkina Faso, utshele iGoal.com ukuthi leli thuba uzolibanga ngazo zombili ngoba kungenxa yokusebenza kwakhe ngokuzikhandla ngale sizini.“Ngizogxila emsebenzini engiqashelwe wona okunye kuzo zenzekela. Akukho okunye engikucabangayo ngaphandle kokuthi ngiyokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ngizibekela indawo yami unomphela kwiBafana Bafana,” kusho uManyama ogcine ukudlala kwiBafana iyibambe kwiCosafa Cup eyayiseRoyal Bafokeng ngo 2015.Limi kanje selilonke iqembu:Onozinti: Itumeleng Khune, Darren Keet noShu-Aib Walters.Abasemuva: Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Rivaldo Coetzee, Thulani Hlatshwayo, Erick Mathoho, Lorenzo Gordinho, Diamond Thopola noTebogo Langerman,Abasesiswini: Hlompho Kekana, Thabo Mnyamane, Keagan Dolly, Andle Jali, Kamohelo Mokotjo, Tiyani Mabunda, Dean Furman noThemba Zwane.Abagadli: Thulani Sereero, Percy Tau, Lebogang Manyama. Phakamani Mahlambi, Lars Veldwjik , Kermit Erasmus noLuther Singh.
title: UManyama noWalters kwababoshelwe kwiBafana

text: AKAKATHATHI sinqumo ngekusasa lakhe uNkk Patricia De Lille ngoLwesithathu omemezele ukuthi uzosigcina isinqumo sakhe sokusula njengeMeya yaseKapa.UDe Lille umemezele lezi zindaba engaphandle kweNkantolo eNkulu yaseWesterm Cape lapho afake khona isicelo sokuthi kuchithwe imibiko emibili eyenziwa abameli beBowman Gilfillan ebiphenya ngendlela abephethe ngayo umasipala.Noma udaba lusaqhubeka enkantolo, uDe Lille uthe akaguquki kwisinqumo sakhe sokusula kwesobuMeya wabe esememezela nokuthi uyalishiya iqembu leDA ngemuva kwesikhathi eside ‘ecindezelekile’ kuyona.Usayine incwadi yakhe yokusula njengeMeya emastebhisini khona enkantolo. UDe Lille usula nje usanda kubekwa icala lokukhwabanisa ngemuva kombiko weBowman oveze ukuthi bekwenziwa umkhonyovu ngamabhasi eMyCiTi.Omunye wabaphenywayo ngalezi zinsolo ukhomishina wezokuthutha osamisiwe emsebenzini, uMelissa Whitehead, okusolwa ukuthi uyathinteka ekukhwabanisweni kwethenda likaR286 million lamabhasi ahamba ngogesi.Ngesikhathi kuhlangane umkhandlu ngeledlule kwavunyelwana ngokuthi udaba ludluliselwe emaphoyiseni ukuze kuphenywe bonke abathintekayo. Ngesikhathi uhleli lowo mhlangano kwabamuncu kusula amanye amalungu awu-5 eDA esola le nhlangano ngokucwasa nokucindezela uDe Lille ngalezi zinsolo abathi abukho ubufakazi bazo.UDe Lille uthe uyasola ukuthi abammeli beBowman Gilfillan bebesebenzisana nosopolitiki ukumbhixa ngezinsolo zokuthi ubedla imali yabakhokhi bentela.
title: Akakasithathi isinqumo ngekusasa lakhe uDe Lille olaxaze iDA

text: UBOSHWE ezihlalele nesoka lakhe owesifazane (32) wasePit Sand eVerulam okuthiwa uzame ukubulala usana lwakhe alubelethele ethoyilethi lasemsebenzini waluphonsa ehlathini, ngoMgqibelo.Lo wesifazane osebenza eCordoba Gardens kuthiwa ucele ukusheshe agoduke ekhala ngezinhlungu zezinyo. Ngaphambi kokuthi ahambe asebenza nabo basolile ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle kuye njengoba engene ethoyilethi wahlala isikhathi eside engaphumi khona kodwa bebengazi ukuthi uzithwele.Abezimo eziphuthumayo bakwaReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), babizelwe kule ndawo ngemuva kokuthi omunye wabasebenzi abasebenza nalo wesifazane ethe uzwe kukhala ingane ngemuva kwethoyilethi lakhona lapho besebenza khona nalo wesifazane.Ufice usana luphonswe ehlokozini ngaphandle kwalo ithoyilethi, lunendwangu entanyeni obekubukeka sengathi unina ubezama ukuliklinywa ngayo.AbakwaRusa bathi kukholakala ukuthi unina walolu sana uqale wazama ukuluklinya ngaphambi kokuthi aluphonse ngaphandle kwasethoyilethi ngefasitela.Lolu sana olungu3.9 kg lutholakale ebangeni elingamamitha amathathu ukusuka ethoyilethi lutholakale lusaphila lwaphuthunyiswa esibhedlela Osindisweni.UMnuz Prem Balram wakwaRusa uthe omunye osebenza nalo msolwa uhambe nabo wayobakhombisa kubo kazakwabo.“Uficwe ehleli nesoka lakhe. Uma ebuzwa ngengane okusolwa ukuthi uyibelethe wayilahla etholakale ngaphandle kwethoyilethi abelisebenzisa, akazange aphendule. Ucele ukuthi aboshwe. Unqabile ukuhanjiswa esikhungweni sezempilo. Isoka lakhe abehleli nalo lithe belingazi ukuthi ukhulelwe,” kusho yena. Uqhube wathi lo wesifazane kuthiwa unezinye izingane ezimbili.ULt Col Thulani Zwane okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uthe lo wesifazane uboshelwe icala lokufihla ukuthi ubelethile nokulahla usana.Uthe kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo yemantshi yaseVerulam namhlanje.
title: Uboshwe enesoka ‘olahle’ usana efokozini

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANE noBALDWIN NDABAABAHLAZIYI nesazi somthetho bathi kululaze isithunzi seKhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana, ukulaxaza ikhomishini kowayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob  Zuma engazange azise usihlalo wayo.UZuma umangaze iJaji uRaymond Zondo engasabuyi ekubeni engazange ayithole imvume yokwenza lokhu.Ummeli, uMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala weZikakala Attorneys, ethintwa Isolezwe uthe  okwenziwe uZuma kuwuphoxe kabi umthetho.“Okokuqala nje ukungayihloniphi ikhomishini akwenzile, uma ubheka uhlobo lwabameli bakhe, ubuke nokuthi wayengumengameli lo muntu bekumele awuhloniphe umthetho. Uma ebona ukuthi akakwazi ukuba ingxenye yekhomishini, bekumele acele ukuhoxa kuyona, angavele anyamalale. Ikhomishini akuyona impela inkantolo kodwa yisigcawu sezomthetho okunemithetho elandelwayo kuyo. Uma ubuka indlela ekwenzeke ngayo, abameli bebengacela ukuphinde babuye sebezilungiselele ngoba kade bematasa nesicelo. Asikho isizathu ebesingenza uZondo anqabe uma becela kuhlehliselwe olunye usuku. Ngokubuka kwami manje ikhomishini izokwenza ngayo yonke indlela ukuzama ukuletha uZuma azofakaza. Kodwa bazogcina benesimo lapho engasafuni ukuphendula lutho kuyona, lokho ke ngeke kubayise ndawo,” kusho uZikalala.Umhlaziyi ozimele uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uthe ukuthi uZuma avele ahambe kuveze obala ukuthi akukho afisa ukukusho kwikhomishini.“Ngibuke ukuthi akukho uZuma abefisa ukukusho kule khomishini ngakho uma isicelo sakhe sichithwa uvele wabona kufanele ahambe. Akukuhle nokho ngoba kubukeka sengathi ubukela phansi ikhomishini. UZuma nangasekuqaleni ezofakaza akukho afika akusho ngaphambi kokusola abantu, wagcina esengene ezinkingeni ngalokho. Manje usenkingeni yokuthi kumele aphendule imibuzo. Sekuyosebenza wona umthetho ukuba uphoqe uZuma ukuba azofakaza futhi,” kusho uKhumalo.USolwazi Bheki Mngomezulu uthe yize okwenziwe uZuma kululaze ikhomishini kodwa noma ubani ubengakwenza.“Kuningi esingakufunda kulokhu okwenziwe uZuma. Okokuqala nje ngasohlangothini lwekhomishini kuyayilulaza okwenziwe uZuma ukuba avele ayishiye ngoba kulindeleke ukuba bonke bayihloniphe. Ohlangothini lukaZuma noma ubani ubengashiya ngoba lo muntu akhala ngaye uyamchitha futhi sekumele aqhubeke athule ubufakazi kuye. Uma ubheka lokhu uZuma akhala ngakho uthi ubona uZondo echemile manje angakwazi kanjani ukuqhubeka asingathe udaba lwakhe. Lokhu vele uZuma kumenza abe nongabazane ngaye nangekhomishini. Kumele uyibheke nangasekuqaleni ukuthi ikhomishini yaqinisa amabhawodi uZuma ethula ubufakazi, wabuza imibuzo kwaba sengathi ubekwa icala. Kunzima ukuphinde ahlale kule khomishini ngoba unakho ukuthi bacabanga ukuthi unecala. Kusazoba lukhuni satshe ukuba uZuma azokhuluma kule khomishini,” kusho uMngomezulu.Ikhomishini kuvele ukuthi izohlala nangempelasonto ukubhunga ngesinqumo sikaZuma.Ummeli kaZuma u-Advocate  Muzi Sikhakhane, uthe bazosiphikisa isinqumo sikaZondo sokuchitha isicelo sikaZuma sokuthi uZondo ahoxe uma ezofakaza.UZondo unxuse ithimba labameli bekhomishini ukuthi licubungule okwenziwe uZuma izolo ngakho kumele bahlangane ngempelasonto.UZondo ekhipha isinqumo uthe uZuma uhlulekile ukuveza ukuthi uchemile.Ukuchithile ukuthi wavakashela uZuma emzini wakhe eThekwini.“Emuva kokuqoka ukuthi ngibe usihlalo wekhomishini, iNhloko yamaJaji (Mogoeng Mogoeng), yathi uZuma ufuna ukuhlangana nami. Ngaya emzini wakhe ngokomsebenzi.”
title: ‘Kululaze isithunzi sekhomishini okwenziwe wuZuma’

text: KUSUKELA abaxhasi nabagqugquzeli beCarling Black Label Champion Cup bememezele ngoMsombuluko ukuthi umdlalo oba khona minyaka yonke ngeke udlalwe kulo nyaka ngoba bevulela isitebele sabo esisha esixhase iNdebe yoMhlaba, ukuthi sikhangise ngokukhululeka, kunemvunge ngokubuya kwawo ngesizini ezayo.Lo mdlalo osufana nesiko ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini, odlalwa yiKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates, ngeke ube khona kulokhu ngoba abaxhasi bawo banika isitebele sabo esisha ithuba elanele lokukhangisa ngeBudweiser, okuyiyona exhase iNdebe yoMhlaba ezoba ngenyanga ezayo eRussia.Ngesikhathi lo mqhudelwano ufika eminyakeni eyisikhombisa eyedlule, abalandeli bebhola eNingizimu Afrika okuhlanganisa nabazo izinkunzi zaseSoweto, bakhalile ngawo ngoba bebebona ukuthi usuphakamisa la maqembu womabili kuphela.Imbangela yalokhu kuvungama kwabantu ngeCarling Black Label Cup bekudalwa ukuthi ingene esikhundleni seTelkom Charity Cup ebidlalelwa amaqembu amane bese kuthi yonke imali ebeyenziwa ngayo (iCharity Cup) ihlukaniswe izinhlangano ezisiza abangakwazi ukuzisiza bona.Nokho iPremier Soccer League (PSL) nabakwaBlack Label baqinise abathandi bebhola kuleli idolo ngokuthi nakuba izoshintsha indlela okucazwa ngayo imali kodwa abahlwempu basazohlomula.Akukho osekuke kwezwakala ngokuhlabana kwabahlwempu ngenxa yeBlack Label Cup ngaphandle kokuqeqeshwa kwabaqeqeshi abasafufusa kodwa nakho okugcina kungabafikisanga ndawo.Abathandi bebhola kuleli baveze iqiniso ngokuthi yini abayizwa ngaphakathi ngeBlack Label Cup kusukela kumenyezelwe ngoMsombuluko ukuthi ngeke ibe khona kulokhu. Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abalandeli basayibhunga namanje le ndaba kodwa okucacayo wukuthi igcagcele esokeni kwabaningi, abanye bafisa ungaphinde ubuye. Babodwa abathi akubuye iCharity Cup eyaqedwa kungalindele muntu ngo-2010.“Kungani kumiswa eyethu imidlalo ngendaba yeNdebe yoMhlaba esingadlali kuyona siyiNingizimu Afrika?” ubuze kanje [email protected] AKA Ngozi The Return. [email protected]_VersusEditorRound 3 uthe: “Kunganjani kuvele kubuye iCharity Spectacular?”[email protected] uthe: “Ayivele iqedwe iBlack Label Cup ngoba iyacika futhi ayihlabahlosile.” [email protected] uthe: “Vele inkomishi kabhiya le. Ayivele idlalewe abadlali bakudala (legends).” Ayivele iyekwe indaba yayo kusho [email protected]“Ayingahlehli kepha iqedwe bese kubuyiswa iCharity Cup,” kusho [email protected]“Sijabule kakhulu ukuthi ibhuntshile eyalo nyaka. Sifuna kubuyiswe iCharity Cup. Kungumsebenzi weChiefs nePirates ukukwenza lokho,” usho kanje [email protected]Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, uJacques Grobbelaar ophethe iFNB Stadium umemezele kwiTwitter wakhe ukuthi ngoJulayi 21 kuyona le nkundla iChiefs izodudulana neMamelodi Sundowns emqhudelwaneni omusha ozokwaziwa ngeleShell Helix Cup.
title: Imvunge ngeBlack Label beyigxeka

text:
UZolani udalule lezi zindaba ekhasini lakhe kutwitter ngoLwesine ebusuku lapho aveze khona ukuthi usezoba ngumculi ozimele. Ubesehlale iminyaka ewu-17 naleli qembu. Bendawonye, bakhiqize amanoni abalwa nezingasoze zabuna okubalwa kuwo i
Nomvula, Doo Be Doo, Pot Belly, Fire Is Low namanye.UZolani uthe uhlela ukucula yedwa kodwa ngaphezu kwalokho usezongena ekukhiqizeni imidlalo yeshashalazi, izinkulumo ezakhayo kanti futhi uhlela nokuba nezinhlelo zokufundisa endimeni yezobuciko.  %%%twitter https://twitter.com/FRESHLYGROUNDsa?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@FRESHLYGROUNDsa, I am launching my solo music career, and starting a new career as a public speaker.I am Zolani Mahola.I am the one who sings. 
#TheNextChapter

pic.twitter.com/NOTqVMwUKA— Zolani Mahola (@zolanimahola)Abalandeli bakhe bamufisele inhlanhla uZolani abanye bethi abangabazi ukuthi usazoqhubeka enze kahle noma esecula yedwa.%%%twitter https://twitter.com/zolanimahola?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@zolanimahola! title: Useyishiyile iFreshly Ground uZolani Mahola

text: BAZOBHADLA iminyaka emine ejele oJabulani Ngcobo odume ngelikaCashflow nomngani wakhe uMzabalazo Dlamini njengoba inkantolo yamacala athinta imali ibagixabeze ngalesi sigwebo ngesonto eledlule.Laba bebebhekene noxhaxha lwamacala abavulelwa wona ngabantu abahlukene ababebasola ngokubaqola, njengoba bebedume ngokuthi bakhulisa imali.Inkantolo igwebe laba iminyaka emine bebhadla ejele yabalengisela emibili. Ibe isibahlawulisa uR200 000 elengisiwe ukuthi ngeke bayikhokhe uma bengatholakali necala elifanayo eminyakeni emihlanu.Isitatimende esikhishwe iFinancial Sector Conduct Authority, siveze ukuthi laba babafaka enkantolo ngemuva kophenyo olunzulu.“Abaphenyi bathola ukuthi laba baqamba amanga ukuthi bangabahwebi abasemthethweni abasiza amakhasimende ekuwakhuliseleni imali yabo uma wona engekho. Lokhu kulicala elibomvu futhi lesi sigwebo siyasemukela ngezandla zombili.” Isolezwe kusuka ngesonto eledlule belizama ukubheka lolu daba njengoba imithombo yaveza ukuthi ababoshwa ngoLwesibili bagwetshwa ngoLwesihlanu. Izolo imithombo esondelene nalaba ikuqinisekisile ukuthi basejele. Nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana abanye baveza ukuthi bambonile uCashflow ejele laseWestville.Ku-Instagram akade bemandla kuwo laba bobabili, uCashflow wagcina ukufaka izithombe zakhe ngenyanga edlule, uMzabalazo wagcina ngoDisemba.UCashflow uzakhela udumo enza iziphihli zamaphathi okwakumenywa kuzo osaziwayo. Uphinde wazakhela udumo ngencwadi ayibhalile lapho ethi khona uselale nosaziwayo abaningi, echaza nangokuphunyuka kwakhe emacaleni ayevulelwe wona. Kunabanye bosaziwayo abebengamanxusa enkampani yakhe. Lapho ekade enza khona imicimbi ikakhulu yokuzalwa kwakhe kade kusuka osaziwayo ezindaweni eziningi.Ethintwa uNatasha Ramkisson-Kara wakwaNPA ucele ukuthunyelelwa i-email nathe ngeke bayiphendule izolo bazoyiphendula kusasa ngenxa yokuthi abasebenzi abaningi basheshe baphuma emsebenzini izolo.
title: Bagwetshwe iminyaka emine ngamacala okuqola

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEKALIVUMI ukuphela igqubu kumdlali weKaizer Chiefs, uNjabulo Blom lokubanjwa yiBaroka FC bagcina bephunyukwe isicoco seligi ngomdlalo wokugcina wesizini eyedlule.La maqembu okuhlala kusiphuka isidindi uma etholene phezulu, namuhla azobhekana emzuliswaneni wesibili weDStv Premiership oqala ngo-3 ntambama, ePeter Mokaba Stadium.IChiefs eqeqeshwa uGavin Hunt, ihambela phezulu ngenxa yokungena okokuqala kuma-qaurterfinal eCaf Champions League. Lokhu ikwenze ngokubambana ngo-2-2 neHoroya yaseGuinea ekuhambeni ngempelasonto edlule. Izoya kwiBaroka sekudlule imidlalo eyisikhombisa yagcina ukwehlulwa. UBlom oyibamba esiswini kuMakhosi, uthe bayilindele iBaroka."Ngijatshuliswa yizinga eliphezulu lokuzethemba eqenjini. Lokhu kudalwe imiphumela yakamuva. Kuhlale kunzima ukudlala neBaroka, uma ngicabanga ngayo inhliziyo iba buhlungu. Wonke umuntu wayibona ngesizini edlule isiphuca isicoco seligi. Yebo, iSundowns (Mamelodi) eyagcina isithathile kodwa yiBaroka eyama endleleni yethu. Siyakwazi esikulindele kuyo, akumele siyeye. Siyazi ukuthi iyiqembu eligijima ngendlela eyisimanga futhi elisebenza ngokuzikhandla. Sizokhipha konke esinako,“ kusho uBlom.Kuwafa wafa womdlalo wokugcina wesizini ka-2019/20, uManual Kambala washayela iBaroka igoli lokulinganisa kungasalindele muntu.EleChiefs okwase kubhekwe ukuthi iChiefs izonqoba ngalo lashaywa nguKhama Billiat. Bekungokwesibili iBakgaga ima endleleni yeChiefs. Ngo-2011, isadlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League, yashaya Amakhosi ngo-1-0 wegoli likaThobani Mncwango kuma-quarterfinal yeNedbank Cup.Kule sizini, emlenzeni wokuqala, iChiefs yabambana neBaroka ngo-1-1 koweligi. EzikaHunt zasizwa umkhonto owagwaza ekhaya kaGoodman Mosele sewuyophela umdlalo.Yize kulokhu iChiefs ingalweli isicoco seligi kodwa kusemqoba ukuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele njengoba ilwela ukungena kwiTop 8. Isaqoqe amaphuzu awu-24 emidlalweni ewu-20 okuyibeka endaweni yesishiyagalolunye. Uma iBaroka inqoba izoyigudluza iChiefs endaweni ekuyo.Njengamanje, ezikaThoka Matsemela zikweyeshumi nambili, ngamaphuzu awu-23, emidlalweni ewu-21.UBlom onemidlalo ewu-19 yeDStv Premiership, ubengekho kodlule weligi bebambana ngo-2-2 neStellenbosch, ngenxa yamakhadi.Uthe uyajabula ukubuyela kweyeligi.“Kwangiphatha kabuhlungu ukungabibikho sidlala neStellenbosch. Ayikho into engangizoyenza, ngase ngithole amakhadi amane. Ukunqoba kwethu koweChampions League, eGuinea, emdlalweni obunzima ngendlela eyisimanga, ngikholelwa ukuthi nakho kuzosisiza koweBaroka. IChampions League ihlukile, uma sidlala kuyo sisuke simele izwe,” kusho uBlom.
title: Asikapholi isilonda seBaroka kumdlali weChiefs

text: UWelcome Simelane usho kanje emuva kokuthi inkantolo yasePinetown ilihoxisile icala lokushaya ebelibekwe uMampintsha. Lezi zithandani zanyakazisa izwe lonke kusabalala i-video lapho uMampintsha eshaya uBabes Wodumo ngempama, ayichaza njengento eyayingathi shu.USimelane uthe uyasamukela isinqumo senkantolo. Kodwa uma kuphinde kwenzeka lokhu, uyobeka ubufundisi eceleni abhekane naye ngqo.“Ngiyajabula uma sebethole indlela yokulungisa izinkinga zabo. Mina engingakufuni ukuthi uMandla ashaye ingane yami. Uyazi naye kade ngangimkhuza.“Okwangenza ngahlubuka kakhulu, wukusabalala kwe-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ngadinwa kakhulu ngaze ngakhuluma ngaleya ndlela. UMandla uyaphila emoyeni ngiyamazi, ufuze uyise ongumfundisi, wukuthi nje uhlushwa yileli dimoni lokushaya,” kusho uSimelane.Eqhuba uthe uyabona ukuthi lesi sigameko sizomenza indoda eqotho uMampintsha ngoba uke wamuzwa emsakazweni egqugquzela amadoda ngokuziphatha.“IBhayibheli lithi kuhle izinto zoniwe ngomlomo futhi zilungiswe ngawo. Ngiyajabula ukuthi benze intethelelo nami sengixolile. Kodwa ngiwubaba ngeke ngibukele ingane yami ishaywa. Uma kuphinda kwenzeka ngicela abantu bazi ukuthi ngisazozilwela izingane zami. Ngiyazi sengigxekwe kakhulu ngokukhulumela uBongekile kodwa ngicela abantu bangixolele ngoba udumo lwakhe alungenzeli lutho, yinto ayiphiwa uNkulunkulu, mina ngiyamzala ngizomgada,” kusho uSimelane.Uthe noma emfisela umshado nokujabula kodwa akasoze amkhethela uBabes Wodumo ukuthi aqome bani. “Ngike ngambiza kufika umfundisi osemncane ofundile futhi ophila kahle ezozibika ecela umshado kuye. Wanqaba uBongekile ukushadwa wumfundisi, wathi uthanda uMandla. Sakwamukela ekhaya lokho ngoba sifuna ajabule. Angisoze ngamphoqa noma ngamkhethela umkhwenyana ngoba ngibona imali“Ngamtshela naye ukuthi ngomthanda nezinkinga zakhe noma sekumbhedela, uyingane yami,” kusho uSimelane.Okhulumela ezokuShushiswa koMphakathi, uNatasha Kara, uthe abantu kumele bazi ukuthi umthetho uqinile futhi uzimisele ukulwa namacala okuhlukunyezwa kwabantu ngezindlela ezahlukene.“Abantu kumele bazi ukuthi akuyena ummangali osule icala kodwa lihoxe ngaphansi kwemibandela yokuthi bacela ukuthola ezinye izindlela zokulixazulula ngaphandle kwenkantolo. Bekunemithetho obekumele bayilandele. Imibiko yabuya iveza ukuthi konke bakwenze ngendlela. Uma sekunjalo ngokomthetho kusuke sekufanele lihoxiswe icala,”kusho uNatasha.UMampintsha uhlawuliswe uR2 000 ngokungafiki enkantolo njengoba bekumele avele ngoLwesibili, uBabes Wodumo akahlawuliswanga ngenxa yezizathu azibikile.
title: 'Wala ukushadwa wumfundisi uBabes'

text:
UNINA wowesifazane (24) obulawe yisoka lakhe eThornwood, eMariannhill eduze kwasePinetown uthe kudala ayeyincenga indodakazi yakhe ethi ayibuyele ekhaya kodwa inqaba ithi iyohlukaniswa wukufa nesoka layo.UNkk Sindi MaGumede Njakazi (48) uthe uphatheke kabi ngokubulawa kwendodakazi yakhe ngoba indlela ebulawe ngayo iyakhombisa ukuthi bekukhona okonakele othandweni lwayo.UNkk Njakazi uthe indodakazi yakhe, uNksz Philile Gracia Gumede, ibulawe yisoka layo uMnuz Khulekani Dube (21), obulale unina uNkk Thembi Dube (57), waphinde wabulala nendodana yakhe enezinyanga ezintathu uNhlakanipho Dube, wagwaza nendodakazi yakhe uNonkululeko Dube (2) otholwe encela ibele likanina obeseshonile. UNonkululeko usesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela.UNKSZ Philile Gumede kuthiwa kade ayecelwa ukuthi abuyele ekhaya kodwa ethi uzohlukaniswa wukufa nesoka lakhe“Indodakazi yami ibingashadile noKhulekani kodwa bebezalisene futhi abakwaDube bebegcina ngokuthembisa ukuthi bazolobola kodwa bebengakaze bafike. Ngiphatheke kabi ngokuthi indodakazi yami ibulawe wuKhulekani ngoba bengiyincenga ngithi ayibuye ekhaya ingitshele ukuthi uKhulekani wumuntu onolaka okuthi uma esethukuthele kube iyona kuphela ekwazi ukumehlisa. Ibithi uma ingivakashele ayifonele uKhulekani ayibuze ukuthi ibuya nini ibe iqeda kufika,” kusho uNkk Njakazi.FUNDA: 
Bashaqekile ngoqothe umndeniUthe kwala ngisho eseyisabisa ngokuthi uzoyilanda namaphoyisa kwaDube kodwa ayizange ifune ukubuya.UMNUZ Khulekani Dube obulele umndeni wakhe maqede wazikhunga.“UPhilile wangitshela ukuthi yena noKhulekani bayohlukaniswa wukufa, ngiphatheke kabi ngoba sekwenzekile lokhu ayekushilo. Ngiyacela ukuthi izingane zamantombazane zikhulume uma zinezinkinga othandweni lwazo zingafeli ngaphakathi. Ngiyasola ukuthi bekunezinkinga othandweni lwendodakazi yami kodwa ibifela ngaphakathi,” kusho uNkk Njakazi.Uveze ukuthi indodakazi yakhe ibisihlale kwaDube iminyaka eyisithupha kanti kwaNjakazi abasebenzi njengoba beziphilisa ngokudayisa amashidi ombhede.Mayelana nengane yendodakazi yakhe esindile uthe usazoya esibhedlela aphinde akhulume nosonhlalakahle ngoba izodinga ukwelulekwa ngokwengqondo.IMEYA yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede ithi umasipala uzolekela ukuze kufihlwe umndeni wakwaDube oqothwe yindodana yakhona egcine ngokuzihilela. Video: BONISWA MOHALEIMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, ibizifikele mathupha kwaDube yathi siyishaqisile isigameko sokuqothwa kwalo mndeni.“Baningi la bantu besifazane abadlule emhlabeni ngesandla somuntu wesilisa osemncane kakhulu, sithinteke kakhulu ezinhliziyweni. Njengomkhandlu onakekelayo sizoqinisekisa ukuthi umndeni ufihlwa ngesizotha. Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi ingane esele, esesibhedlela njengamanje, ithola ukuhlunyeleliswa kwezengqondo ngoba ihlukumezeke kakhulu, ihlale isonto lonke nabantu abashonile incela ebeleni likanina. Kuyinto ebuhlungu kakhulu. Sizoqinisekisa umndeni ozobe uhleli nayo ukuthi sizoyinakekela ngoba uhulumeni wethu unezinhlelo zonke zokunakekela abantwana abangenabo abazali,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Ugqugquzele amadoda ukuthi avikele abesifazane ayeke izidakamizwa ngoba uKhulekani uchazwe njengomuntu obephuza futhi kutholwe namaphilisi eduze kwakhe.UNKK Thembi Dube obulewe yindodana yakhe uKhulekani Dube emgwazile yaphinde yamnquma.Khonamanjalo uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Weziwe Thusi, uthe uzothumela osonhlalakahle bayosiza umndeni wakwaDube.Uphinde wacela imindeni ukuthi isheshe icele usizo uma inezinkinga kungaze kube nezigameko ezifuze esakwaDube.
title: Ubengafuni ukubuyela ekhaya obulawe yisoka eThornwood

text: SIBANJWE yisakhamuzi saseKapa isizumbulu sePowerball sika-R232 million ebesibhekwe ngabomvu ngoLwesibili.Isikhulu se-Ithuba National Lottery, uNksz Khensani Mabuza utshele Isolezwe ukuthi lesi sakhamuzi  esinyelwe yinyoni esandleni besingakaveli.Uthe bakhuthaza bonke abantu abadlale iPowerball izolo ikakhulukazi abaseKapa ukuthi babheke amathikithi abo.Uthe abasakutholile ngowinile ukuthi udlale esitolo i-Ok Mini-Mark, eTygerdal eKapa."Ithikithi eliwinile elika R22,50. Umdlali uzikhethele yena izinombolo eziwinile," kusho uNksz Mabuza.Uthe bayaqonda ukuthi abantu abaningi abakawabheki amathikithi abo njengoba izinombolo eziwinile zimenyezelwe izolo ebusuku. Echaza ngokukhuphuka kwemali ye-Powerball ebanjiwe njengoba bekulindeleke ukuthi ibe ngu-R225 million, uthe ikhushulwe ukunyuka kwesibalo sabadlali."Imali esuke ibekiwe isuke ihlawumbiselwa, hhayi ukuthi imali esuke ibekiwe. Kuya ngokuthi bangaki abantu abasuke bedlalile. Belilikhulu isasasa le-Powerball njengoba ibiqophe umlando ngokuthi ikhuphuke ize ifike kule mali. Owinile uhleka yedwa lapho ekhona njengoba imali ayiwinile yengeziwe ngemali ecishe ifike ku-R10 million," kusho uNksz Mabuza.Ukhuthaze abadlali be-Powerball neLotto ukuthi bangadikibali ukuzama inhlanhla ngoba mhlawumbe ngelinye ilanga kuyoqondana.Owinile unonyaka wonke ukuxhumana nabe-Lotto ukuze bamnikeze lesi sizumbulu.
title: Ibanjwe eKapa iPowerball ka-R232 million

text: ZIKHATHAZEKILE izikhulu zikaMasipala weTheku ngesibalo esiphezulu samacala anqwabelene - 300 - okuqondiswa ubugwegwe kwezimenenja ezithinteka ezinsolweni zenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.Emhlanganweni wamakhansela alawula umkhandlu eCity Hall izolo, kwethule umbiko othi kuhamba kancane ukuthethwa kwamacala ezimenenja okuqondisa ubugwegwe okwenza inganqobeki kalula impi yokulwa nenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.Inhloso yokwethula umbiko bekuwukwazisa isigungu samakhansela alawula umasipala nezikhulu zomkhandlu mayelana nenqubekela phambili emacaleni enkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa aphenywayo.Ukuzama ukuxazulula inkinga kwaphakanyiswa ukuthi njalo ekupheleni kukaNovemba kubikwe ukuthi uphenyo seluhambe kangakanani, bese kubikwa njalo emuva kwezinyanga ezimbili.Ukulalelwa kwamacala kuhlukaniswe kabili -ilawo anezinsolo eziqinile nezingaqinile.Ikhansela le-DA, uMnuz Thabani Mthethwa, lithe kuyakhathaza ukuthi kube nesibalo esiphezulu samacala angaqediwe.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi iTheku lisasilele emuva empini yokulwa nenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa,” kusho uMthethwa.Ikhansela le-IFP, uMnuz Mdu Nkosi, lithe ithimba eliphenyayo nalabo abaqondisa ubugwegwe kumele libabikele ukuthi ngenyanga lifuna ukubalibe seliqede amacala amangakiukuze kube khona inqubekela phambili.“Siyabonga ukuthi kulokhu imenenja yoMkhandlu, uMnuz Sipho Nzuza, isinike umbiko obambekayo esingakhulumela phezu kwawo kunale nto engasho lutho ayesinike yona phambilini,” kusho uNkosi.Uthe into ekhathaza kakhulu wukuthi iningi lezikhulu ezinamacala zihola zihleli emakhaya.“Laba bantu abasuke bemisiwe bayahola njalo ngenyanga, okwenza umkhandlu umoshe imali uholela umuntu ongenzi lutho. Abanye sebemiswe izinyanya ezintathu kuya kweziyisithupha. Ngake ngezwa kuthiwa kukhona esinye isikhulu esase simiswe unyaka kodwa sihola,” kusho uNkosi.IPhini leMeya, uNkk Belinda Scott, lithe esinye isizathu esidala ukuthi ahambe kancane amacala wukuthi bafike baqale uhlelo lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe kungenelele oKlebe bathiabame kancane ngoba lolo daba ludinga ukuthi kuvulwe icala lobugebengu.
title: Bakhathazwe ukwanda kwamacala angaqulwa

text:
BABHEKENE ngeziqu zamehlo abaseka umengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngokuputshuka kwemininingwane ngezimali ezazinikelelwa umkhankaso wakhe wokuba ngumengameli we-ANC ngo-2017 obizwa ngeCR17. NgoLwesihlanu i
News24 ibike ukuthi isazi sezobuchwepheshe uMnuz Alexio Papadopulo usolwa ngokuba nesandla ekuputshukeni kwemininingwane yeCR17 yangasese. UPapadopulo kubikwa ukuthi wayengesinye sezithenjwa zikaRamaphosa ngesikhathi esembhidlangweni wokuba ngumengameli wenhlangano ebusayo. Manje kubikwa ukuthi usephenywa abophiko lwamacala abucayi kuleli, oKlebe, ngokuputshuka kwama-email eCR17. Ngaphezu kwalokho kubikwa ukuthi ukusolwa kwakhe sekudala ukuthi babhekane ngeziqu zamehlo nenhloko yonogada baRamaphosa uMnuz Wally Rhoode, okusolwa ukuthi phambilini wayesondelene noPapadopulo. Ngokombiko, kuvela ukuthi uPapadopulo ubesebenzisana noKlebe ngesikhathi kuqala uphenyo ngokuputshuka kwale mininingwane. Akugcina ngokuputshuka kwama-email kaRamaphosa kuphela nje kodwa nezitatimende zemali eyayingena uphuma kuma-akhawunti eCR17 zanekelwa izwe lonke kuvela amagama abantu ababenikela emkhankasweni nalabo ababethola imali. UPapadopulo kuvela ukuthi wakhokhelwa uR4.8 million ukuze aqinise ezokuphepha kwezobuchwepheshe kumkhankaso weCR17. Kuvela ama-email kaRamaphosa nje ngumbiko woMvikeli Womphakathi u-Adv Thuli Madonsela oqhumbuze ithumba ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo ngesikhathi ephenya ngomnikelo kaR500 000 owawuvela kwisikhulu seBosasa uMnuz Gavin Watson, ongasekho emhlabeni. Lokhu kulandela isikhalo seDA ePhalemende isola uRamaphosa ngokukhohlisa iPhalamende ngalo mnikelo.
title: Ixabanise izethenjwa zikaRamaphosa eyokuputshuka kwamagama abanikela kwiCR17

text: ABACULI kumele benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bazimaketha ngayo yonke indlela ekhona ukuze baqashwe ubuthaphuthaphu.Lokhu kushiwo nguDJ waseSwazini kodwa ozinze kuleli, uThabo “Touch of Soul” Mnisi (26), onamakepisi asematheni ezitaladini zaseThekwini. Amakepisi akhe abhalwe ukuthi TOS.UTouch of Soul ufike eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2010 ezofunda e-UKZN lapho enza khona iMasters kuHousing.“Kubalulekile ukuziphusha nanoma yingayiphi indlela. Abantu bazokuqaphela futhi bakuhloniphe. Ngisho ungekho abantu bazokhuluma ngawe bese abahleli bemicimbi beyakuqasha,” kusho uTouch of Soul.Uthe wayeqala eyozigayela yena izikibha namakepisi, abantu bagcina bewathanda.“Ngangithi uma ngigqoke ikepisi abantu balicele. Babebuya bangitshele ukuthi nakubo kukhona abalicelile. Bekulokhu kwenzeka njalo ngaze ngagcina sengiwadayisa. Abantu bawa-oda emakhasini ami ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.”Uthe usezokhiqiza namajakhethi namabhulukwe futhi ngeke agcine ngokuwadayisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Uthe uzoba nezitolo ezingomahamba nendlwana.“Ngizokwenza imicimbi engizofike ngidayise kuyo izimpahla. Owokuqala nje uzoba seBasement Lounge, eMgungundlovu. Olandelayo use-Absolute kuFlorida maphakathi nenyanga ezayo.”UTouch of Soul usezakhele igama ezindaweni zobumnandi nasemicimbini yobumnandi eThekwini njengaseYadini Loungenase-Azar.Uthe uqale ukudlala ngemuva kokufika kuleli wazifundisa.“Uthando lomculo ngangivele nginalo. Ngangisebenzisa amathuluzi enganginawo nasesikoleni.
title: Zimaketheni baculi ukuze niqashwe: Touch of Soul

text: OWAYEYISIQONGQWANE kwiKaizer Chiefs, uSylvester “City” Kole kusukela ngo-1976 waze wawagaxa emgibeni amakhokho ngo-1988 uthi ngeke iMamelodi Sundowns iyithole inkanyezi yesibili yeCAF Champions League uma ingalubhekisisi kahle udaba lokuntenga kodonga lwasemuva.UKole ukhala ngamaphutha enziwa umdlali wasemuva uSoumahoro Bangaly aholela ekutheni iFC Barcelona ishaye amagoli amabili ngemuva kokuphiwa abadlali bamaBrazilians kwiNelson Mandela Centenary ebiseFNB Stadium ngoLwesithathu.Le nkakha ithi amenza abukeke engelona uhlobo lokudlalela leli qembu laseChloorkop.Ngisho nabalandeli bazwakalise ukungenami ngodonga lokugcina lweSundowns. Igoli lokuqala nelesithathu amaphutha abadlali beSundowns okunguBangaly noHlompho Kekana. IBarca igcine inqobe ngo 3-1“Angazi noma kwakwenziwa ukuthi babezitshela ukuthi badlala neBarcelona edumile emhlabeni jikelele, lokho kwabenza bangenwa amanzi emadolweni bagcina sebabanga amaphutha angenasidingo,” kusho uKole.Uqhuba uthi awukwazi ukuba nomdlali onjengoba Bangaly okuthiwa uqhamuka ngaphandle abe namaphutha angenasidingo.“Lo mdlali akafanele ngabe udlala eqenjini elisezingeni leSundowns. Okunye engakuqaphela ngabadlali basemuva ngaso sonke isikhathi babeficwe yibhola kube sengathi bebengalindele.“Noma kwakwenziwa ukuthi uKekane (Hlompho) wayengavimbi ngendlela okuvimba ngayo esiswini umdlalo odlala kule ndawo yakhe okumele enze ngayo."Omunye umdlali abantu abakhala ngaye kwaba nguMotjeka Madisha, abathi usebe namaphutha amaningi selokhu ngale sizini.Yize abantu bezwakalisa ukungenami ngendlela abadlali basemuva beSundowns abavuza ngayo kodwa umaqeqeshi wayo uPitso Mosimane uyazichitha zonke lezo zinkulumo.“Bebethukile benexhala lokho kwejwayelekile. UBangaly wenze iphutha lokho kujwayelekile. UKekana ngokujwayelekile uyakwazi ukuqala ibhola emuva. Badlala kangcono bazethemba bakhombisa ukuzethemba ngesiwombe sesibili ngemuva kokubatshela ukuthi abadlale ngendlela okudlalwa ngayo kwiSundowns,”kuchaza uMosimane.Uqhuba uthi ubatshele ukuthi abangesabi ngokuthi uBangaly wenze iphutha.Ecashunwa enye intatheli esesitebeleni seSolezwe ngoMgqibelo uluvikele uMosimane udonga wathi:“Ucabanga ukuthi uHlatshwayo (Thulani) ubengawavimba lawa magoli. Angayivimba iBarcelona? Akaqale avimbe iSundowns kuqala.”Amasandawana anawo umkhuba wokuvuza uma esedlala ezingeni lomhlaba njengakwi Fifa Club World Cup 2016, abafike bahlasele kahle kodwa besekuthi udonga lokugcina lubenzele phansi.“Angivumelani nokuthi ukuba sasayinda abadlali lapho abazokube beqhamuka khona, bebezokwenza kangcono. Cha, siwenzile amaphutha ngiyavuma. Sibaphile amagoli amabili kodwa asizange sibhede. Izinga likaDembele nabanye wonke umuntu uzibonele. Uneminyaka ewu-21, udlala ngonyawo lwesokudla kodwa buka ngendlela akhahlele ngayo ngolwesinxele. Besazi ukuthi ujwayele ukungena ngaphakathi isikhathi esiningi. Ukuba asizange siphanise ngamagoli amabili ubani owaziyo ukuthi besizokwenzenjani.”Uphethe ngokuthi into okumele kukhulunywe ngayo ukuhluleka ukuqedela amathuba.“Ukuqedela kwethu amathuba ebesiwathola besingenza kangcono kuwona. Ngihlale ngithi kuPercy Tau, ukuthi sidinga ukulungisa indlela esiqedela ngayo.”
title: UKole uyakhala ngodonga lweSundowns oluntengayo

text: USergeant Sphesihle Ntshangase (42), usebenza esiteshini saKwaNongoma, ngaphansi kophiko iRoyal Protection, okungamaphoyisa aqapha izikhulu nabaholi bendabuko emphakathini.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi leli phoyisa ebelingekho emsebenzini lizithele kowesifazane obexinekile ebeletha ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.“Noma ngingesiyena umuntu okwazi ukukhuluma ngizozama ukuchaza. Phambi kwakaBoxer esitolo ngifice kukhona abafana bemngungile lo wesifazane, esele ngobhodisi wodwa. Ngibuze ukuthi kwenzenjani. Bathi usisi uyabeletha. Ngizamile ukumsiza. Ubesaxhumene nengane unina. Ngibe sengibheka ukuthi ingane iyaphila, ngathola ukuthi iyaphila ngoba ibisikhala. Ngibe sengimlekelela wangena emotweni ebengihamba ngayo. Ngamphuthumisa esibhedlela,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe bese kuhlwile kwenzeka lokhu.“Yize isikhathi ngingasibhekanga kodwa bese kumnyama ngimthola, ngize ngasuka esibhedlela ngo-8 ebusuku ngemva kokumshiya. Angazanga ukuthi kungani lo wesifazane ebesedolobheni, ngibe senginaka indaba yengane ngangabuza izinto eziningi.“Angibange ngisabona ukuthi ingane ngeyomfana noma yintombazane ngoba bese kushesha,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe lo wesifazane akazange ayithole imininingwane yakhe ngenxa yokuthi ubebambekile.“OwakwaZulu isibongo, igama angilibuzanga. Owasesigodini saseZiphambanweni. Ngenxa yokuthi ngimshiye esibhedlela nengane eyiphethe ngithembe ukuthi uzosizakala,” kusho iphoyisa.Libuzwa ukuthi belingenalo yini uvalo lisiza owesifazane lithe: “Nginazo izingane ziningi. Kube khona ukuthuka ngesikhathi kwenzeka konke lokhu, ngibona umuntu wesifazane ebeletha kodwa ngoba ngafundiswa emaphoyiseni ukuthi ngehlise umoya uma ngibhekene nesimo esinzima, angizange ngitatazele,” kusho yena“Bengiya ekhaya, ngisuka kuzakwethu ngesikhathi ngizithela kulesi simo,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe ukuba wumzalwane yikhona okwenze wakhetha ukusiza.“Ngiyakholwa ebandleni iDamaseku Ukuthula Apostolic Church in Zion. Ngokwenkolo yobuKristu, kumele umsize umuntu uma exakekile, yingakho nami bengingeke ngidlule nje owesifazane esenkingeni,” kuphetha yena.Umsebenzi wasesibhedla ofice leli phoyisa libelethisa eceleni komgwaqo uMnuz Sakhile Mncwango, uthinte iphephandaba encoma.“Ngifikile mina eteta lo wesifazane, ngafica iphoyisa lesilisa limsiza. Belingenawo ngisho ama-gloves, owesifazane opha. Ngibheke emotweni ngathola ama-gloves. Wambamba wamfaka emotweni yakhe ingane ibisiphumile, kungekho osezonquma umzanyane, wabe esemphuthumisa esibhedlela. Kuhle kakhulu akwenzile ngoba abantu bebedlula,” kusho uMncwango.Ozwakwabo bephoyisa balithulele isigqoko ngelikwenzile lihlenga ingane.Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuthola unina wengane ayizange iphumelele.
title: Ubelethiswe yiphoyisa oxineke emgwaqweni

text: IPHINI likaSomlomo esiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Meshack Radebe, likhulume ngokusinda ekufeni ngemuva kokuxinwa ukugula.Ekhuluma engqungqutheleni yezemfundo ebihlelwe yihhovisi lakhe ehholo lomphakathi KwaMagaba, eMpumalanga, ngempelasonto, uRadebe (67) uthe ucishe wafa ngenxa yokugula.“Ngicishe ngafa kodwa manje sengisindile nani niyangibona ngiwumqemane,” kusho uRadebe ongazange adalule ukuthi ubephethwe yini. Ngivukile ukuze ngilungise izinto ngizohamba emhlabeni uma konke sekuhamba kahle,” kusho uRadebe.Nyakenye uxinwe wukugula wangeniswa esibhedlela wahlala izinyanga ezimbalwa.URadebe ongumholi we-ANC onamava KwaZulu-Natal ugxeke othisha wathi banesandla ekufeyileni kwezingane eMpumalanga.Uthe balibala ukupepenyeka ezinxanxatheleni zezitolo ngesikhathi sokufunda.“IMpumalanga inezikole ezingamaHigh School eziyisishiyagalolunye kodwa zimbili ezithole ngaphezu kuka-60% kwimiphumela ka-matric nyakenye,” kusho yena.Uthe isifunda sasePinetown sinezikole ezingu-17, iMpumalanga ilale unombolo 16.“Lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi sinenkinga ezikoleni zethu zaseMpumalanga, unyaka nonyaka imiphumela yethu iyehla kunokuthi inyuke."Ngabe simosha imali yabakhokhibentela uma sizoba nemihlangano yalolu hlobo kodwa singatshelani amaphutha,” kusho uRadebe.URadebe uthe othisha sebengene shi kwipolitiki baze bakhohlwa umsebenzi wabo wokufundisa.“Othisha sebengamaqabane kakhulu ukwedlula thina. Omunye owayephethe isikhungo engangiyobhalisela kuso ukuvota wafonela abaphathi bakhe wathi ngizokhankasa ekhuluma into engekho,” kusho uRadebe.Unxuse umphakathi ukuba ubampimpe othisha ababonakala ezitolo ngesikhathi sesikole.Othisha basezikoleni zaseMpumalanga bakhale ngokuthi izikole zabo azinayo ingqalasizinda okwenza abafundi bangenzi kahle ezifundweni zabo.Okunye abakhale ngakho ukusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa ezikoleni.
title: Ngicishe ngafa kodwa manje sengisindile: Radebe

text: SIZWE BLOSEUMA ulalele izinhlelo eziteshini zemisakazo akumele kube sengathi unohlelo oluthize olulandelayo.Eziteshini zomsakazo eziningi zakuleli izinhlelo ziba ngamahora amathathu futhi kuba nabasakazi bohlobo olulodwa abenza uhlelo olufanayo.Ukuze icace kahle le nto engikhuluma ngayo ake ngenze isibonelo. Ntambama uthola abasakazi abanomfutho othi awufane njengoThato ‘DJ Fresh’ Sekwane (5FM), KCi August (Umhlobo Wene), Sipho ‘Sgqemeza’ Mbatha (Ukhozi FM), njll.Akukho lapho okubhalwe khona phansi ukuthi uhlelo lwantambama kumele lume ngalolu hlobo.Ngaphandle nje kwabasakazi, kunemisakazo ezitshelile nje ukuthi ngeSonto abantu bafuna ukulalela i-jazz noma umculo wokholo uma kuntambama.Lokhu kugcina kushiya abantu bengenakho okuningi abangakhetha kukho abanye bagcine sebebuyele kuma-CD abo.Uma ulalela iMetro FM ngeSonto uthola i-jazz, noKhozi FM lukunika lolu hlobo lomculo, uma uya kwiVibe FM uzithela emculweni wokholo, iSAFM yenza okufanayo uthola umculo wokholo.Kumele ikhululeke imisakazo ingenzi sengathi kwashaywa umthetho othi uma kuyiSonto uzothola i-jazz noma umculo wokholo.Uma ulalela umsakazo ekuseni ngo-9 kuya ku-12 ungathi kunomuntu owathi angalinge angene umuntu wesilisa ngalesi sikhathi. Kuyancomeka okwenziwa yiKhaya FM engalandeli lo mthetho ongekho. Kulo msakazo kunoThabo Mokwele odume ngoT Bose ongena ngalesi sikhathi, i-East Coast Radio yenza kahle kakhulu ngoMakhosi Khoza ongumuntu wesilisa.Iphuzu elimqoka elokuthi abantu abayi nganxanye bengemanzi. Imisakazo ayiyeke ukufunza abantu ngezinhlelo bagcine sebecabanga ukuthi kunezinhlelo ezingenziwa abantu besilisa kuphela noma abesifazane kuphela.Baningi abantu besifazane abangalwenza kahle uhlelo lwasekuseni, baningi futhi abesilisa abangawenza kahle oluka-9 kuya ku-12 emini.UThemba Nkosi odume ngo-Euphonik wenza omuhle umsebenzi ngeSonto. Lo msakazi udlala umculo we-house, owe-eletro nekwaito. Uhlelo luka-Euphonik luyisiphephelo kubantu abathanda ubumnandi. Okuhle wukuthi uphinde abe nabanye oDJ abasuke bezodlala ohlelweni lwakhe.Akancintisani namuntu ngeSonto, uzihambela yedwa njengoba imisakazo eminingi izitshela ukuthi isuke iphuma emgqeni uma idlala enye into ngaphandle kwe-jazz nomculo wokholo.Ziba khona izinto ongeke wazishintsha uma ufuna uhlelo lwakho kumbe umsakazo wakho uhambe kahle.UJustice Ramohlola odume ngelikaJust-Ice weRadio 2000 into emenza ahambe phambili ezinhlelweni zasekuseni wukuthi uyazihlupha ngolwazi, uthi uma engena ohlelweni abe esewafunde wonke amaphepha.Uphinde azwakale ukuthi akagcini ezindabeni azithandayo kuphela kodwa ulifunda lonke iphepha nokumenza ahluke kwabanye abasakazi abangena ekuseni.Ngicabanga ukuthi lo msakazi uma ungambuza noma yingani angakuphendula, kungakuhle ukuthi abasakazi bazihluphe ngolwazi ikakhulukazi ezinhlelweni zasekuseni.U-Ayanda Ntuli owenza uhlelo lwasekuseni kwiVibe FM ungomunye wabasakazi abenza kahle kakhulu. Into emsizayo wukuthi uyafunda naye uthi engena emsakazweni ebe esenolwazi ngokwenzekayo.Okunye okungabasiza abasakazi basekuseni wukuthi bangazenzi osomahlaya. Into esiyidinga kakhulu uma sivuka ekuseni wukwazi ukuthi kwenzekani ezweni sakhile. Igenge yasekuseni ayehlise emahlayeni noma ibize bona osomahlaya bangempela.
title: Ake ihlukane nalo mkhuba imisakazo

text: UBONA sengathi ukudlala kuPremier Soccer League (PSL) kuyambambezela ekutheni aqinise indawo yakhe eqenjini lesizwe laseGhana, u-Edwin Gyimah, osanda kuzicelela ukukhululwa enkontilekeni abenayo ne-Orlando Pirates.Ngesikhathi kuvela lokhu abaningi bebezitshela ukuthi kusuka ekuxabaneni kwakhe uGyimah nobengumqeqeshi wePirates, uMuhsin Ertugral, ngoSepthemba. Lo mdlali beno-Ertugral bathwetshulwe esikhumulweni sezindiza eCape Town bexabana kwaze kwadingeka amaphoyisa ukuthi abalamule kade beyodlala ne-Ajax Cape Town.Ukuchithile-ke nokho lokhu usihlalo wePirates, u-Irvin Khoza, ngesikhathi ezomemezela umqeqeshi omusha wase eveza ukuthi uGyimah uzicelele ukudedelwa kodwa zangavela izizathu. Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uGyimah ozanyelwa umsebenzi phesheya kwezilwandle, ubone kungcono ayozama phesheya ngoba ukuqhubeka nokudlala kuPSL kwenza angabhekwa nangeso uma sekusethwa isikimu seGhana.Ku-Afcon ebiseGabon lo mdlali akazange alithinte ngisho sekucacile ukuthi iGhana isidlulele emzuliswaneni olandelayo. Ngokusho kwakhe nabaphethe izindaba zakhe iProSport International, lo mdlali angalithola noma yinini iqembu phesheya ngoba inkontileka yakhe inqanyulwe lingakavulwa ngisho iwindi lokuhwebelana ngabadlali.Yize uKhoza eze wakumemezela lokhu ngoFebhuwari 16 kodwa uGyimah ubhale incwadi ngaphambi kokuya ku-Afcon lapho ebezicelela khona ukudedelwa. IPirates isamukele lesi sicelo.“Njengoba iphepha lakhe likuyena asijahile kangako kodwa senza konke okusemandleni ukumtholela umsebenzi phesheya kwezilwandle. Siqinise kakhulu e-Europe ngoba umdlali kulapho ebheke ukuyodlala khona.“Akukho okukhona etafuleni okwamanje kodwa asinalo itwetwe ngoba uma sithola iqembu elimfunayo angaqala noma yinini ngaphandle kokulinda amaphepha athile,” usho kanje omunye wabasebenzi baseProSport International kodwa ongagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba.UGyimah (25) ube ngomunye wabadlali abathathu (abazinze e-Afrika) esikwatini seGhana ebesiku-Afcon. Laba uFatau Dauda, naye oke wavimba kuPirates noRichard Ofori. Bobathathu abazange balithole ijezi eGabon okwenza icace indaba kaGyimah yokubona iPSL njengesihibe ekwenzeni indawo ibe ngeyakhe kumaBlack Stars.
title: Ubona sengathi ukudlala kuPSL kuyambambezela

text: UGWETSHWE iminyaka eyishumi owayeyisikhulu eVBS Mutual Bank kulandela ukuwavuma wonke amacala athinta inkohlakalo abebhekene nawo ngokudliwa kwemali ebalelwa kuR2.7 billion kuleli bhange. UPhilip Truter, owayeyiChief Financial Officer (CFO) ngesikhathi kutamuzwa imali yaseVBS Bank uzobhadla iminyaka eyisikhombisa ejele njengoba ilengisiwe iminyaka emithathu yesigwebo sakhe. UTruter ubevele enkantolo yezimali enkantolo yeMantshi ePalm Ridge, eGauteng ngoLwesithathu ekuseni. Kuwo wonke amacala abebekwe wona uTruter uvumile ukuthi wayazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi uphula umthetho ngesikhathi ezibandakanya nokudliwa kwezimali zaleli bhange.UTruter ungumsolwa wesishiyagalolunye kuleli cala kanti bonke abanye asolwa nabo, okubalwa kubo nowayengusihlalo weVBS, uMnuz Tshifhiwa Matodzi, bayawachitha amacala ababekwe wona.
title: Ugwetshwe iminyaka eyishumi owayeyisikhulu eVBS Mutual Bank

text: UNOBHALA-jikelele weSACP uDkt Blade Nzimande unxuse abasebenzi ukuba bangathuli uma bebona abantu benza inkohlakalo ngoba lokho kubeka ikusasa lezwe enkingeni.Ekhuluma emgubhweni kazwelonke wabasebenzi enkundleni yezemidlalo eSugar Ray Xulu eClermont ngoLwesithathu, uNzimande uthe iminyaka eminingi edlule imoshakele ngenxa yenkohlakalo ebiqhubeka."Kuleminyaka emihlanu ezayo ngemuva kokhetho kumele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi lesi sikhathi asimosheki senze izinto ngendlela efanele," kusho uNzimande. Uthe bengamaKhomanisi bazohlale beyiseka-ANC kodwa waxwayisa ngokuthi ngeke baze bathule uma bebona izinto zingahambi ngendlela.Unxuse ukuthi kwakhiwe kabusha umbimbi, waxwayisa ngokuthi lokhu uma kungenzeki kuzoba nomphumela ongemuhle.Uthe kuleminyaka edlule bekunabantu abathile abebeme endleleni bengenzi izinto ngendlela efanele okugcine kudala ukuthi bungabibuhle ubudlelwano kumbimbi."Thina singamaKhomanisi singaphuma sihambisane nomuntu owenza kahle embutheni njengoba seseka ukuvuselelwa kabusha kombutho ngoba ngeke size sithule sibone izinto zonakala," kusho uNzimande.Uthe abasebenzi akumele bathule bebona izinto zonakala. "Izwe licishe layongena eweni, abantu bezenzela umathanda ko-Eskom abasebenzi bebuka kodwa bengenzi lutho," kusho uNzimande.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi avuselelwe wonke amabhizinisi kahulumeni."Lento ibalulekile, kumele siyiguqule Iningizimu Afrika, siwavuselele wonke amabhizinisi kahulumeni akade esefakwe ehlathini ngenxa yabantu abathile abebevumele ukuthi kwenzeke inkohlakalo kuwona," kusho uNzimande.Uthe kumele kuphinde kubekhona ubulungiswa ngokubulawa kukaNobhala-jikelele wabo uMnuz Chris Hani nabanye abaholi."Ngaphambi konyaka siye okhethweni ngo-1994, kwabulawa uHani abelungu kwacishe kwasuka impi enkulu, siyabonga ngokuthi kwakhuzwa kwangaliwa, kodwa kunamacala amaningi okubulawa kwabaholi namanje angaphelile okumele asukunyelwe," kusho uNzimande.   Uthe inhlangano yezizwe yahlonza ubandlululo njengobugebengu obubhekiswe kubantu, wengeza ngokuthi kumele bajeze abantu ababegqugquzela lesi sihlava.
title: Basebenzi ningathuli uma nibona inkohlakalo - Nzimande

text: UMREPHA wakuleli, uThulani "Pitch Black Afro" ,Ngcobo, utholwe enecala lokubulala engaqondile owayengumkakhe, uCatherine Modisane. UPitch Black Afro, wodumo lwengoma ethi Mantofontofo, ulahlwe yileli cala eNkantolo eNkulu iSouth Gauteng High izolo. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa ukhishwe phambili ecaleni lokudukisa ingalo yomthetho. Okuqaphekile ngalolu suku ukungabonakali nangokhalo kukanina kammangalelwa ekubeni ubelokhu efika ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukuthethwa kwecala.NgoDisemba 31, 2018, uPitch Black Afro nomufi, baba nokugejana ngenkulumo emuva kokuphuza nabangani. Ekubuyeni kwakhe endaweni ababehlala kuyo eYeoville, umufi waqhumisa ngempama lo mrepha, naye owaziphindiselela. UPitch Black Afro wagcina esedudula umufi kabuhlungu waze wangqubuzeka ngekhanda. Kuleli cala, uPitch Black Afro abesegqigqe kulo iminyaka emibili, iJudge uJ du Plessis, lithe okwenze lo mrepha walahlwa yicala ukuthi ukhombise ukuba wufakazi obuthakathaka ngesikhathi esaphekwa ngemibuzo. "UMbuso awukuthandabuzi ukuthi umsolwa wayekuhlelile ukubulala umufi. Bobabili babephuzile, waziphindisela ngendlela enodlame.  Kwacaca bha embikweni wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu ukuthi umufi wabulawa ukulinyazwa ngento engekho bukhali ekhanda." Ijaji lithe abukho ubufakazi bokuthi umufi wayekuhlosile ukuhlasela lomculi.Uthe nokuphika kwakhe ukuthi wamshaya umufi nakho kukhombise ukuthi ngeke akholakala. Yize ijaji likhulume kanje kodwa uPitch Black Afro ubesamile ekutheni yena umsulwa. Uzokwazi namhlanje lo mrepha ukuthi uzobhadla iminyaka emingaki ejele ngaleli cala.Yize ijaji likhulume kanje kodwa uPitch Black Afro ubesamile ekutheni umsulwa futhi uyasukelwa.
title: UPitch Black Afro uzokwazi namhlanje ngesigwebo azosithola ngokubulala umkakhe

text: UMNDENI wesikhulu senkampani iBosasa, uMnuz Gavin Watson (71), uthi awusoli lutho ngokufa kwakhe ngoba ukholelwa wukuthi kube yingozi.UWatson ufe izolo ekuseni engozini yemoto emgwaqweni obheke ngasesikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo eGoliIsikhulu esiphezulu seBosasa esiyaziwa nge-African Global Operation, uMnuz Papa Leshabane, ekhuluma ne-eNCA, uthe umndeni usuphuma emakhazeni uyoqinisekisa isidumbu sikaWatson.Uthe ubehamba ngemoto ashone kuyo ngoba eyakhe ibinenkinga.“Imoto yakhe ibilungiswa yingakho abehamba ngemoto yenkampani. Ubesebenzisa imoto ashonele kuyo ngoba ngempelasonto eyakhe ibilungiswa.”Imoto abehamba ngayo yedwa iToyota Corolla, ishayise ubonda lukakhonkolo emgwaqweni onguthelawayeka.“Asifuni ukuqagela ngokuthi kwenzekeni. Kube yisimo esingesihle, yingozi nje. Asinalo ulwazi ukuthi ubeyaphi, sishaqekile sonke.”Usho lokhu nje bese kuqubuke izinkulumo eziningi abanye besola ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi ngokufa kukaWatson ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Igama likaWatson lavela ngesikhathi kufakazwa kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.Kwavela ukuthi inkampani yakhe yayigwazela izikhulu zikahulumeni.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana izolo bese kukuningi ukukhuluma ukuthi kungani ebehamba ngeToyota Corolla. I-ANC idlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini kaWatson yathi walwa nobandlululo eseyeyilungu le-UDF.
title: ‘Ukufa kukaWatson kube yingozi nje’
BUKA: UKomphela ushaywe ‘ngempama’ wajoyina abalandeli beCeltic bejabula

text: U-AUGUSTINE Mulenga, osayiniswe AmaZulu FC, uthi uyazazi ukuthi uwumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu ngakho ubengeke amele indaba yokuduva ebhentshini abukele abanye abafana bedlala kwi-Orlando Pirates.Abanye bangakuhumusha lokhu njengempakamo, noma ukungahloniphi ozakwabo kodwa uMulenga ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi yena ufanelwe wukuba senkundleni, hhayi ukubukela ibhola nezihlwele.Umdlali waseZambia ukhulume nezintatheli ngoMsombuluko ngemuva kokwethulwa Usuthu njengomdlali walo omusha kwisizini entsha yeDStv Premiership. UMulenga ubephendula umbuzo mayelana nesizathu esimenze wadla phansi, washiya kwiBucs ekubeni kade kusabhekwe lukhulu kuye.“Isizathu esingenze ngayisha kwiPirates wukuthi bengingadlali ngesizini edlule. Ngaphezu kwalokho iqembu liphinde lasayina abadlali abasha abaningi ngabona ukuthi indawo yami ngeke ibe khona. Akungoba ngingafuni ukuncintisana nabadlali abafikile kodwa bengingafuni ukuphindwa okungehlele ngesizini edlule. Yingakho ngikhethe ukuthi ngishiye, ngijoyine AmaZulu,” kusho uMulenga.IPirates isayine abadlali abasha okubalwa kubo uThulani Hlatshwayo, Terrence Dzvukamanja, Deon Hotto, Thabang Monare, Collins Makgaka noWayde Jooste.“Bekungesona neze isinqumo esilula ukujoyina AmaZulu ngoba abekhona amanye amaqembu abengifuna. Kodwa ngibonga umndeni wami ngokuthi ngithathe lesi sinqumo. Akekho ongazi ukuthi ngingumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu, bekunzima kodwa ngijabule ukuthi ngilapha kuMaZulu,” kusho uMulenga.Ngeledlule uMulenga wethulwe njengomunye wabadlali abasha beTshakuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM). Kungakho kuthusile ukumbona esethi memfu kuMaZulu.“Nami ngathuka impela ngibona igama lami ohlwini lwabadlali abasha beTTM. Angikaze ngisayine kubo. Yebo bazama ukuqalisa izingxoxo kodwa ngabatshela ukuthi ngicela bangilinde, ngisadinga ukucabangisisa ababengibekele khona etafuleni. Sekuyaba bayangimemezela nokwangethusa. Mina ngisayine kuMaZulu, yingakho ngilapha,” kusho uMulenga.Imibiko engaqinisekisiwe ithi iTTM ifuna ukuthatha izinyathelo zomthetho ngoMulenga njengoba namanje isakholelwa ekutheni ungumdlali wayo. Kungenzeka kube nzima kwabanye abalandeli bebhola ukukholwa yilokhu, ikakhulukazi ngoba iqembu selikhombise ukungahleleki okuyisimanga selokhu lifikile esigabeni esikhulu. Akuyena kuphela uMulenga omenyezelwe yilo njengomdlali walo, kodwa wavumbuka kwelinye iqembu.Omunye nguBrian Onyango, naye ovele ohlwini lwabadlali beTTM kodwa okhonjwa kwiMamelodi Sundowns.ITTM iphinde yamangaza ngempelasonto edlule ifika nabadlali abawu-14 emdlalweni wayo we-quarterfinal yeMTN 8 neSuperSport. Igcine iguqe ngo 3-2.
title: Bengingeke ngikumele ukungadlali: Mulenga

text: UMANGAZE abaningi owayengunkosikazi kaMnuz Malusi Gigaba uNksz Norma Mngoma ethi ayikho into angayenza ngoR3 000 empilweni yakhe. UNorma uveze lokhu ngesikhathi ephendula imibuzo kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana ngempilo ewubukhazikhazi ayeyiphila noGigaba, asehlukene naye, okusolwa ukuthi yayixhaswe abakwaGupta. UGigaba wayengungqongqoshe wezaseKhaya ngaleso sikhathi. NgoLwesihlanu uNorma uchazele ikhomishini ngezindodla zemali ababenazo noGigaba eveza ukuthi unenqwaba yamasudi athengwe ngokheshi futhi wamnikeza ikhadi angakwazi ukuchitha uR100 000 ngalo ngenyanga.
