Encwadini ayibhalele ikhomishini uGigaba ukuchithile lokhu wathi empeleni wamnikeza ikhadi eliyi debit futhi wayemkalele ukuthi asebenzise uR3 000 kulo ngenyanga. Ephendula lokhu uNorma uthe: “uma ethi kwakuyi-debit card eno-R3 000...ayikho into engingayenza ngoR3 000 empilweni yami futhi uyakwazi lokho. Into engiyaziyo mina ukuthi kwakuyi-credit card. Into ayisho ukuthi uma ngilisebenzisa ngingeqi kuR100 000 ngenyanga.”UNorma uqhube wathi kwakwenzeka ukuthi uma esemazweni aphesheya azithole esethenga isikhwama sika-R30 000 kuya kuR40 000. “Ngakho kungamanga ukuthi lalinoR3 000. Empilweni nje ayikho into engingayenza ngoR3 000,” kusho uNorma. Lokhu kuthuse abaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kwazise kunabantu abebeziphilisa ngesibonelelo sikaR350 sabangasebenzi njengoba umnotho ukhahlamezwe yiCovid-19. Abanye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bathe kuyabaxaka lokhu ngoba baningi abantu abahola le mali ngenyanga kuleli abakwaziyo ukuhlanganisa. “In my life, there’s nothing that I can do with R3000!!” 🥺 When I think how far R3k would stretch for me right now....!#NormaGigabaThere's nothing I will do with R3000 in my life.. #normagigaba #StateCaptureCommission ..someone's else salary for a whole month #3000 🤔Ngaphandle kwabo uNorma uthe nomndeni kaGigaba ubuhlomula ngezimali ababezithola kwabakwaGupta.
title: 'Ayikho into engingayenza ngoR3 000' - Norma Mngoma

text: INHLANGANO i-Electricity Crisis Movement eSoweto ihlela ukuvala thaqa imigwaqo ukuze iqinisekise ukuthi akungeneki enxanxatheleni yezitolo eselokishini.Lokhu enye indlela yempi abayibhekise e-Eskom ngodaba lokucinyelwa ugesi. Abantu baseSoweto bathi i-Eskom isebenzisa ububhoklolo ngokubacimela ugesi ezindaweni zabampofu kodwa kwezinye izindawo njengakoSandton ugesi awucishwa njalo.UMnuz Trevor Ngwane, uthe bahlela ukubhikisha eTshwane namhlanje ukuqondanisa nenkulumo yokuvula isiShayamthetho saseGauteng ezobe yethulwa uNdunankulu, uMnuz David Makhura.Uthe balindele namanye amaqabane eseTshwane ukuba nawo avale imigwaqo, abhikishe lapho kuzobe kunenkulumo yesifundazwe. UNgwane uthe umbikisho uzoqhubeka ngoLwesithathu eKapa, lapho abenhlangano yabangasebenzi bezobhikishela uNgqongqoshe wezimali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, ozobe ethula khona isabelo sezimali.ESoweto nase-Orange Farm bahlela ukuvala yonke imigwaqo ukuze kuphazamiseke amabhizinisi.“Inkinga ye-Eskom ayizange iqale ngenxa yesikweletu saseSoweto. I-Eskom njengawo wonke amabhizinisi kahulumeni ibhekene nezinkinga zokungaphathwa ngendlela. Basebenzisa isikweletu saseSoweto ukuvala ihlazo labo elikhulu,” kusho uNgwane.Okhulumela iJoburg Metro Police, uMnuz Wayne Minnaar, uthe bayazi ngokhukhulelangoqo wesiteleka sanamhlanje futhi basilindele.“Sandise isibalo samaphoyisa azobe esebenza, kukhona nawombutho iSAPS navela kuzwelonke esizosebenzisana nawo,” kusho uMinnaar.
title: ESoweto bahlela ukuvala imigwaqo bekhononda ngokunqanyulelwa ugesi

text: UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uthi iTheku lingase liqhubeke lihlale kusigaba 5 wokuvalwa kwezwe ekupheleni kwenyanga ka-Ephreli uma siqhubeka nokwenyuka isibalo sabahaqwe yiCovid-19 kulesi sifunda. UZikalala uveze lokhu ekhuluma nabezindaba ngeSonto echazela abantu baKwaZulu-Natal ukuthi kusho ukuthini ukuxegiswa kwemithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe kusukela ngenyanga ezayo kulesi sifundazwe. Kuleli sonto uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa umemezele ukuthanjiswa kwemithetho kathaqa ngokwesigaba sesine sokuvalwa kwezwe. Kusukela ngoMeyi 1 abantu abaningi kuleli bazokwazi ukubuyela emsebenzini ngaphansi kwemigomo ebekiwe eqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabasebenzi, ezokuthutha zivunyeliwe ukusebenza ngaphansi kwemigomo ebekiwe, ugwayi usozodayiswa kanti nabantu sebengazivocavoca. Noma izwe lonke lizobe lisesigabeni sesine sokuvalwa kwezwe futhi kuvumelekile ukwenza lezi zinto, uZikalala usexwayise abantu abahlala ngaphansi kukamasipala waseThekwini ukuthi kungenzeka baqhubeka bahlale ngaphansi kwemithetho eqinile. NgeSonto izibalo zabahaqekile ngokwezifunda KwaZulu-Natal bezimi kanje: Amajuba- 8 EThekwini - 579 King Cetshwayo - 12 Harry Gwala - 1 Ilembe - 122Ugu- 16Umgungundlovu - 49 Umkhanyakude - 21 Umzinyathi - 3UThukela - 23Zululand - 2 "Ngeledlule ngeSonto babewu-383 abantu ababehaqwe yiCorona eThekwini kodwa namhlanje (izolo) sesifinyelele ku-579. Isibalo sabashonile ngeledlule besiku-21 namhlanje sebebalelwa ku-25 abashonile. Ezinye izifunda ezine okushoniwe kuzo kusashone umuntu oyedwa kuzo okuyinto esenza sikhathazeke ngesimo saseThekwini," kusho uZikalala. Uthe uma zingaguquki izinto kulesi sifunda kuleli sonto, iTheku lizobalwa nezifunda ezizoqhubeka zihlale ngaphansi kwesigaba 5 sokuvalwa kwezwe.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma ngoMgqibelo waveza ukuthi izigaba zokuvalwa kwezwe zizokwehluka ngezifunda, kuzoqiniswa umthetho ezindaweni ezinesibalo esiphezulu sabahaqekile.
title: Ingase ingasuswa imithetho eqinile kathaqa eThekwini

text: KWEHLE izihlathi kwabebecabanga ukuthi sekuseduze bacebe ngenxa "yegolide" ebelimbiwa KwaMachi, eHarding njengoba umbiko wososayensi uveza ukuthi akulona.Ithimba leCouncil for Geoscience (CGC), ngoLwesine livakashele eHarding lethula umbiko ngophenyo lwenkwali obekusolwa ukuthi ikhiqiza igolide. Leli thimba lajutshwa nguNgqongqoshe wezokuMbiwayo uMnuz Gwede Mantashe ngoJuni, emuva kokuba izinkulungwane zamalungu omphakathi bezigijimela ukumba inkwali. Esitatimendeni sombiko weCGS esishicilelwe kwi-website yalo mkhandlu, kuvele ukuthi le nkwali ayinalo igolide. Kuvele ukuthi umhlaba okukhona kuwo le nkwali, awunothile ukuthi ungaba negolide.Umbiko uthole ukuthi kule nkwali kukhona amatshe abizwa nge-pyrite, chalcopyrite, pentlandite, cobalite, sphalerite ne-galena. Kuvela ukuthi i-pyrite ne-chalcopyrite icishe ifane negolide.“Ngokophenyo lwethu sithole ukuthi alikho igolide kule nkwali noma eduze nayo. Le ndawo ayisoze yakhiqiza igolide ngenxa yesimo somhlaba onganothile,” kusho umbiko.Ngesikhathi kuqalwa ucwaningo ngonyaka odlule, kwathathwa amatshe ayohlolwa eMintek Laboratory eGoli. Kuvela ukuthi le nkwali ububanzi bayo obuwu-150 metres, ibisetshenziselwa ukumba inhlabathi yokulungisa umgwaqo. Inkwali yavalwa ngo-Okthoba wonyaka odlule ukuze kwenziwe kahle uphenyo.Okhulumela ikomiti lomphakathi uMnuz Tony Mbuthuma, uthe abanelisekile ngombiko wabacwaningi. Uthe yize bechazeliwe ukuthi kungani kuchithwa izinsolo zegolide kodwa kuneminye imibuzo engaphendulekanga.“Umphakathi awuyizwa kahle indaba yokuthi inkwali ingabe isambiwa. Kuvele ukuthi kumele imbiwe kuphela yilabo abanelayisensi yokumba izimayini. Phambilini bekumbiwa inhlabathi kule nkwali, osekushiya eminye imibuzo uma kungasavumelekile nokuthi imbiwe,” kuchaza uMbuthuma.Uthe selokhu kwaqalwa uphenyo inkwali ibivaliwe, kubekwe nonogada. Batshelwe ukuthi namanje izogadwa futhi umphakathi akumele usondele kuyo.“Okushiya imibuzo ukuthi uma inkwali ingenawo umnotho kungani bese kuvinjelwa umphakathi uqhubeke nobukwenza khona. Lokhu kuqinisa izinsolo zokuthi indawo inawo umcebo,” kusho uMbuthuma.Ngesikhathi iphephandaba iThe Mercury eliwuzakwabo weSolezwe livakashele le nkwali, umphakathi wawuyimba ngamafosholo. Abanye baveze ukuthi bayawadayisa amatshe abawathola kule nkwali, abakholelwa ukuthi yigolide. Baveze ukuthi amatshe aqala kuR50. Kwaphoqeleka ukuthi kubiywe inkwali emuva kwemibiko yokulimala kwamalungu omphakathi.
title: Indumalo 'ngegolide' ebelitashwa eHarding

text: MHLELI: Ngivumele ngigadle ngenhlonipho nangeqiniso ngenhloso yokwakha nokuxwayisa ngokuphaphalaza okwenziwa ngabaculi bakithi ikakhulu lapha emculweni wesintu nokho okugcina kuholele ekuhlukumezeni abanye abantu ekubeni kubalekelwa ukutshela abantu iqiniso.Ngiphawula ngokwenziwe yiGcokama eLisha phambi kwezinkumbi zabalandeli balo. Bakwethu kulihlazo ukuhluleka kweGcokama ukudlala isigingci lize lizizwe nalo uqobo ukuthi cha akuhambi kahle ezintanjeni.Ngizibuza umbuzo wokuthi lisola bani ngoba yilona elidlala lezi zinto bukhoma. Cha mfana uhlulekile iqiniso. Ngezwa ngishaywa amahloni ngakhumbula amaqhawe ayibamba kusenzima kusashoda nezinandisi zomculo kepha ayeyidonsa intambo bukhoma ufise impinda.Lapha ngibala amaqhawe afana noMfaz’Omyama Khumalo, Sandile Mbongwa noMgqashiyo Ndlovu. La madoda ayeyoneqa ngaphezulu bafana ayengangathekisi enkundleni uma enza into yawo.Okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi ukuhluleka komasikanda abaningi kugcina kuphazamisa ukusebenza kwabasakazi. Ukusolwa kwabasakazi abasethulela izinhlelo zikamaskandi kungaze kwenze ukuthi izingane zabantu ziphelelwe yimisebenzi imbala. Abasakazi ababethula uhlelo lomculo kamaskandi abanjengoNgizwe Mchunu noTshathugodo Ngobe sebafaniswa nezitha zabaculi ekubeni kuyibo abaculi abangenzi kahle.Abasakazi abanacala abakwenzayo bayakwazi futhi bakufundele nani zehliseni niyofunda ukudlala izintambo kothisha bentambo. Ayikho into engenaso isikole esikhathini sanamhlanje. Ukucasha ngesithupha akusizi ngoba kufakana ehlazweni elinjengaleli elehlela umfo kaManqele ehlulwa wukudlala isigingci phambi kwabantu ekubeni simhlonipha kangaka.Mhleli ngibonga ithuba lokubeka iqiniso eselafaniswa nomlilo oshisa abaningi ngoba bayalibalekela abafuni ukulikhuluma kanti phela umuntu wakhiwa ngabanye abantu.Lwazi DlaminieBergville
title: [IMIBONO] Kuyihlazo okwenziwe yiGcokama Elisha esiteji

text: INDLUNKULU kaZulu izohlangana maduze ibhunge ngezinhlelo zokuthi iSilo esisha uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, agcagcelwe ngaphambi kokuthi agcotshwe ngokusemthethweni esihlalweni sikayise. Isihlalo sisale emuva kokuthi kukhothame iNgonyama uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu ngoMashi exinwe wukugula, emuva kwalokho kwabekwa ibamba nalo lanqotshwa wukugula. IMbube entsha imenyezelwe ngoLwesihlanu ntambama esigodlweni KwaKhangelamankengane, lapho ummeli u-Advocate Griffiths Madonsela egagule khona igama layo. UMadonsela uthe lokhu akushoyo kuyizifiso zendlovukazi uMantfombi Dlamini Zulu, eshiye izibhalile encwadini yefa. Kudalulwe ukuthi esinye sezizathu sokuqokwa kukaMisuzulu wukuthi unina weSilo esisha, walotsholwa yisizwe ngezinkomo ezingu-300 ezaya eSwatini. Kuvele nokuthi uBayede omusha akagcagcelwe kodwa unayo indodana eyodwa kanti ngokomgomo kaZulu, kufanele agcagcelwe umuntu ngaphambi kokuthatha isihlalo. UMntwana uThulani Zulu, okhulumela iNdlunkulu kaZulu, uthe kusazoxoxwa ngalezi zinhlelo zokugcotshwa nokugcagcelwa kweSilo. Uthe umndeni usazohlangana maduze noma usuku lungakaziwa. Ukumenyezelwa kweSilo esisha bekwengamelwe wuNdunankulu kaZulu uMntwana Mangosuthu Buthelezi, lapho okusuke khona umsindo kwaze kwaphoqa ukuthi iMbube ikhishwe ngesamagundane eNdlunkulu. UMisuzulu Sinqobile Zulu uzalwe ngoSepthemba 1974 KwaHlabisa, ezalwa wuNdlukulu okhotheme futhi ungomdala kuye. Ungumshana wenkosi uMswati wesithathu njengoba unina ezalwa wuSobhuza wesibili owayeyingonyama yakhona eSwatini. Ufunde e-U.S kanti uneziqu ze-International Relations. Amaqembu ezombusazwe aseqalile ukukhipha izitatimende zokwamukela ukuqokwa kweSilo esisha phakathi kwawo yi-EFF, ethi kuhle kuhlonishwe izifiso zeSilo esikhotheme. I-IFP ayisalanga nayo ithe iyakwemukela ukubekwa kweSilo esisha yathi isilinde ukuthi sigcotshwe.
title: INdlunkulu ibhunga ngokugcagcelwa nokugcotshwa kweSilo

text: MHLELI: Ngivumele ngiphawule ngokubhebhetheka kobugebengu eNingizimu Afrika. Ezinsukwini ezintathu ezedlule sekutholakale ukuthi kukhona intombanzane edlweguliwe yabulawa. Kuphinde kwaphuma ukuthi kukhona indoda ehlala eWyebank ebulale izingane zayo ezine. Sekungathi isonto nesonto kukhona abantu ababulawayo noma abantshontshwayo kuleli lizwe.Ngibona ukuthi inkinga iqala ekutheni singabantu baseMzansi Afrika siyathula sibuke uma lezi zigameko zenzeka. Isibonelo, uma umuntu egijima ngesivinini esidlula amakhilomitha abekiwe, uthola ukuthi uzokhetha ukufumbathisa iphoyisa esikhundleni sokuthi aye enkantolo. Lezi yizimo ezinje ezenza ukuthi abantu bacabange ukuthi ubugebengu into enhle.Esinye isibonelo, isenzo sokuthi abantu benza umgunyathi uma befuna izincwadi zokushayela. Uzwe ngephoyisa likutshela ukuthi uma ungangifumbathisanga into encane ngeke ukwazi ukuba nezincwadi.Ngesinye isikhathi uthola ukuthi umuntu akakwazi ukushayela kodwa ngokuthi unemali yokufumbathisa ugcina ezitholile izincwadi zokushayela.Ngenxa yokuthi singabahlali bala eMzansi Afrika senza umathanda sithembe ukugwaza, kusekude ukuthi buphele ubugebengu. Sihlezi sikhala ngokuthi osopolitiki banobugebengu kodwa nathi sibe sinabo. Inja iyawaqeda amanzi ngolimi.Ubugebengu bungancipha ezweni lethu uma nathi njengabahlali sizofunda ukulandela imithetho ebekiwe. Kumele siyeke ukufumbathisa nokuntshontsha ukuze sizokwazi ukuphatha kahle izwe lethu. Njengabahlali baseMzansi kumele kube yithina esihola indlela ukuze sizophila ezweni elikahle. Mina ngikholelwa ukuthi ushintsho luqala ngawe. Asiyeke ubugebengu ukuze buzoncipha nakuhulumeni.Minenhle Khazi
title: Ngenxa yemigwazo kusekude buphele ubugebengu

text: LUYAKHULA uhlu lwezikhulu ze-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ezisezikhundleni zikahulumeni ezizophendula phambi kwekomiti eliphenya ilungu lesiShayamthetho, uMnuz Jomo Sibiya, ngezinsolo zokuhlukumeza owesifazane othi wayeyintombi yakhe ngokumphoqa ukuthi ahushule isisu.IMeya yaseNewcastle uDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba noMnuz Sipho Hlomuka onguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal bazovela ekomitini.I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal isungule ikomiti lophenyo emuva kokuba owesifazane uNksz Snokwanda Ndlovu esole uSibiya athi babethandana naye ngokumkhulelisa bese emnxenxa ukuba ahushule isisu.UNobahala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uHlomuka noMahlaba bazobizwa bazophendula ngoba amagama abo ayathinteka encwadini yesikhalo.Ikomiti liholwa yinkunzi eluvava kwezobuholi uMnuz Willies Mchunu kanti kukhona noSomlomo kaMasipala weTheku, uNkk Weziwe Thusi, naye ongumholi omdala eqenjini.Kuleli komiti kuvela negama likaMnuz Don Gumede ongomunye wabazobe bephenya.Okhulumela uMasipala waseNewcastle uMnuz Mlungisi Khumalo uthumele impendulo kaMahlaba lapho abegcizelela khona ukuthi uyaluhlonipha uhlelo olusungulwe yi-ANC.“Ngiyilungu le-ANC eliqotho futhi ngiyisithunywa somphakathi. Uhlelo olusungulwe yi-ANC ngiyalwethemba kakhulu.“Ngiyisishabasheki esizibophezele ukulwa nodlame lwangokobulili ngaphandle kokwenzelela. Ngizimisele ukubamba iqhaza kunoma yiluphi uhlelo engidingeka kulona. Ngeshwa angikwazi ukungena ngigxile ngemidanti esencwadini ngoba akwaziwa ukuthi ibhalwe ngubani, ngibona kukuhle sidedele uphenyo luqhubeke,’’ kusho umyalezo okuthiwa uvela kuMahlaba.Imibuzo ethunyelwe kokhulumela uHlomuka ayiphendulwanga.
title: Bayanda abe-ANC abazovela ekomitini

text: AKHALELWE ngamasongo kaSigonyela amaphoyisa ayisikhombisa ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokwephula ingalo yomthetho eGoli ngoLwesine.UWarrant Officer oyedwa noConstable abane baboshwe ngozakwabo ngesikhathi bezama ukudayisela 'abokufika' izimpahla zomkokotelo ezishaqwe eGoli ngoLwesithathu. Abanye ababoshiwe amalungu amabili eTactical Response Team asolwa ngokuluma abanikazi bezitolo indlebe ngokushaqwa kwempahla obekuzokwenziwa ngawo uLwesithathu. Ukuboshwa kwalaba kulandela uphenyo olwenziwe kulandela ukutholakala kwezimpahla zomkokotelo zifihlwe ezimotweni ezingu-46 endaweni yokupaka esebhilidini iLister.La maphoyisa aboshwa nje abeyingxenye yamaphoyisa abephume inqina eshaqa izimpahla zomkokotelo ezithe chithi saka ezitolo zabokufika eGoli.Kulo mkhankaso kuboshwe abokufika abangenawo amaphepha afanele abangu-560 nokulindeleke ukuthi uMnyango wezaseKhaya uqinisekise ukuthi bakuleli ngaliphi. Angu-12 amabhilidi ahloliwe kanti impahla eshaqiwe ilinganiselwa esambeni sika-R250 million. Phakathi kokushaqiwe kubalwa ama-rifles (6), pistols (6), shotguns (4) namakhulu ezinhlamvu egumbini elilodwa eMedical One Shopping Centre emgaqweni uRahima Moosa. Kuboshwe umsolwa oyedwa ngokutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.UKhomishana waMaphoyisa esifundazweni saseGauteng uLieutenant General Elias Mawela uwushayele ihlombe umsebenzi wamaphoyisa abeyingxenye yalo mkhankaso."Siyethemba ukuthi ukuboshwa kozakwethu abayisikhombisa kuzocacisa kubantu baseGauteng ukuthi sizimisele ngokuqeda ubugebengu, noma ngabe lokho kusho ukuthi sibophe ozakwethu. Akekho umuntu ongaphezu komthetho," kugcizelela uKhomishana.
title: Kuboshwe amaphoyisa (7) abanjwe edayisa impahla eshaqwe eGoli

text: Isolezwe izolo lihambele umphakathi emuva kwezigameko zokubulawa kwabantu abayisishiyagalombili ngoLwesithathu.Izolo bekufihlwa abahlanu bomndeni wakwaNxele, noyedwa oshone kwabathathu abadutshulwa ekuseni ngoLwesithathu.Kule ndawo kwadutshulwa oMnuz Sbonelo Ndawo, Lawrence Zondi no-Ayanda Sishi, ngabo-12 emini. Ebusuku ngabo-8 kwahlaselwa abakwaNxele. Kusolakala ukuthi lezigameko zihlobene.Ngokuthola kwephephandaba kunombango oqhubekayo kuleya ndawo. Kuqale kwahlaselwa umndeni wakwaNgcobo kwaze kwashisa umuzi wakhona. Kwabulawa nomkhwenyana wakwaNxele, oyilungu lomndeni wakaNgcobo.Yize kungacaci ukuthi kubangwani kodwa kusolwa eyombango wamatekisi kanti kwaNgcobo kukhona nenduna eyahlaselwa.Leli phephandaba likhulume nabantu bakule ndawo abazwakalise ukudumala ngendlela amaphoyisa alusingethe ngayo udaba.“Abantu babulawa emini kubuka abantu kule ndawo kodwa akuboshwa muntu. Siyakhala kakhulu ngokusebenza kwamaphoyisa. Awatholakali uma siwadinga. Aze afike esezolanda izidumbu. Kunini abantu bebulawa kule ndawo kodwa akukaze kuboshwe muntu ngamacala. Siyangcwaba nje,” kusho ilungu lomphakathi elicele ukuthi igama lingadalulwa.Owesifazane okhulume nephephandaba nocele igama ligodlwe, uthe inkinga ilele emaphoyiseni.“Kumanje lukhulunyelwa phansi lolu daba, kuzodlula lokhu soze siphinde siwabone amaphoyisa uma sekudutshulwe abanye. Uyabona njengoba amaphoyisa egcwele kanjena manje, akhiphe yonke inhlobo yemoto. Ngelanga kuqhuma izibhamu kwaphela amahora engafiki endaweni. Sesisola ukuthi nawo ayayisaba le ndawo. Ngiwumuntu wesifazane kule ndawo angiphephile ngizihambela emgwaqweni,” kusho owesifazane.Omunye onqabile negama lakhe, uveze ukuthi le ndawo isiphenduke ujombigazi.“Akukho nje ukuthula kule ndawo. Abantu bayabulawa ngempela, kuthuleke nje.Okubuhlungu wukuthi abantu abasolekayo bayaziwa kodwa abathintwa. Sesisola nokuthi amaphoyisa ayasetshenziswa kule mpi eqhubekayo. Asiphephile. Ulokhu ulishayile ucingo esiteshini uma kwenzeka izinto. Amaphoyisa kokunye afika ngakusasa.”
title: Bakhala ngokudembesela kwamaphoyisa ezigamekweni zokubulawa kwabantu

text: MINENHLE MKHIZEK UYABABHEDELA abadlali abachizele iKaizer Chiefs u-Itumeleng “Itu” Khune noMandla “Mzimba Shaker” Masango abebemataniswa neqembu elisha likaStuart Baxter, iGenclerbirligi SK yaseTurkey.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi leli phephandaba lilumana indlebe noBaxter obelolonga iChiefs engompetha be-Absa Premiership neMTN 8 ngesizini edlule. UBaxter useke waphumela obala phambilini ngothando lwakhe lokusebenzisana noKhune. “Baningi abadlali baseNingizimu Afrika engingathanda ukusebenzisana nabo kodwa inkinga iqembu engisebenza kulona alinayo imali eningi. Iqembu lami lakhiwe ngabadlali abangu-26 kanti ngithe ngiyafika ngazithela kubadlali abahlanu abasayiniswe ngumengameli weqembu. U-Itu ngingathanda ukusebenzisana naye futhi iqembu liyamazi kodwa asikaze sisifake isicelo ngaye. Ngiyazi kuningi obekulokhu kushiwo ngami naye kwabezindaba. Abanye bebethi yimina engathi akangayivuseleli inkontileka yakhe kuChiefs khona ngizomthatha,” kusho uBaxter“Angikwazi lokho ukuthi kwakuqhamuka kuphi. Ngaphambi kokuthi ngisayine umdlali kufanele ngiqale ngixhumane nabathungathi bekhono eqenjini. Ngokubona kwabo laba badlali bahle emaqenjini aseNingizimu Afrika (esho laba baseMzansi abafunayo okubalwa kubona noMasango).”KuGenclerbirligi edlala esigabeni esikhulu saseTurkey usayine inkontileka yonyaka owodwa enombandela wokuthi yelulwe uma isiphela. Kulezi zinsuku iligi yaseTurkey idle ngokulanda abadlali abanegama okubalwa kubona abebeyizilomo zeManchester United uRobin van Persie noNani abayodlala kuFenerbahce SK. UKhune noMasango abanawo amaqembu abagijima kuwona. Bahlulekile ukuvumelana ngezinkontileka ezintsha kuChiefs.”Njengamanje iqembu alibhekile kakhulu ukugawula izinduku ezintsha ngoba livele linabadlali abaningi. Okumqoka wukuhlanganisa laba badlali engibafice eqenjini ngibenze le nto engiyifunayo. Ngesonto elizayo siya eHolland ukuyokwenza amalungiselelo okuqala kwesizini entsha,” kusho uBaxter.UMasango noKhune bazilolonga bodwa. Bagcine ukubonakala kuBafana ngesikhathi idlala imidlalo yokuhlungela ukuzibekisela indawo kuCaf African Nations Championship (Chan) eseRwanda ngonyaka ozayo.Emlenzeni wokuqala iBafana ihlule iMauritius ngo 3-0 kwathi kowesibili yadlula ngo 2-0. UKhune uyidlale yomibili wangadedela nelilodwa kwathi uMasango wanamathelisa elesibili emlenzeni wesibili.“Ngeke kungiphazamise ukufika eqenjini sengisayinelwe abadlali. NakuChiefs ngesikhathi ngifika iningi labadlali lase lisayiniwe. Njengomqeqeshi onamava into ebalulekile uma usebenza nabadlali ongabazi ukubenza bazi ukuthi ufunani. Uma uyibambe lapho uzophumelela,” kusho uBaxter.
title: UKhune noMasango abayi eTurkey

text: INHLANGANO ebhekelela ezempilo emhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO) ngoLwesithathu ishayele ihlombe iNingizimu Afrika ngezinhlelo ezibekile zokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCovid-19. Izikhulu zale nhlangano ngoLwesithathu zincome uhulumeni wakuleli ngendlela olwa ngayo nokusabalala kwegciwane eselibulale abantu abanganphezulu kuka-180 000 emhlabeni. "Amaqhinga asetshenziswa yiNingizimu Afrika asekelwe ukuhleleka, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bayakugwema ukutheleleka ngokuvalwa kwezwe kanye nokuqapha ukuthi imithetho iyalandelwa. Banezindawo zokuhlola eziwu-67 zesikhashana ezitshalwe ezweni lonke, kunabasebenzi abawu-28 000 abaqeqeshelwe ukuhlola abantu. Sekuhlolwe abantu abangaphezulu kuka-120 000...kuyamangaza asebekwenzile nemiphumela abayitholayo," kusho umqondisi we-WHO, uDkt Mike Ryan.Ngokwezibalo ezishicilelwe uMnyango wezeMpilo ngoLwesithathu, bawu-133 774 abantu asebehlolelwe iCovid-19 eNingizimu Afrika. Kwabahloliwe, basabalelwa ku-3 635 osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi banaleli gciwane, kubo sekusinde abawu-1 055 kwashona abawu-65.  UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa umemezele ukuvalwa kwezwe kusukela ngoMashi 27 kuya ku-Ephreli 16 kuleli. Ngemuva kokuvuna izithelo ezinhle ngothaqa, uRamaphosa ukhethe ukwelula isikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe ngamanye amasonto amabili kanti namhlanje kulindeleke ukuthi amemezele izinhlelo zokuvulwa kwezwe ngesineke. Kulindeleke ukuthi amemezele ezinye izimboni ezizovunyelwa ukubuyela emsebenzini ngokunjalo nezinhlelo zokufukula umnotho ngemuva komonakalo odalwe ukuvalwa kwezwe. INingizimu Afrika ibalwa namazwe alandela imigomo eyabekwa yiCentre for Disease Control (CDC) neWHO ngesikhathi kusaqala ukubhebhetheka kwaleli gciwane kuleli. Ngaphambi kokuthi livalwe izwe, uMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli ngaphansi kobuholi bukaDkt Zweli Mkhize, ubusuqalile ukufundisa abantu ngezindlela zokuzivekelwa kwigciwane ngokunjalo nezimpawu ezikhomba ukutheleleka.
title: I-WHO ishayele uhulumeni wakuleli ihlombe ngeCovid-19

text: ICORRUPTION Watch ifuna bathathelwe izinyathelo zomthetho abaqashi abangayidluliseli eMnyangweni wezabaSebenzi i-Unemployement Insurance Fund (UIF) yize beyidonsa emholweni wabasebenzi.NgoJanuwari i-UIF ibisikhokhe uR56.7 billion weCovid-TERS kubasebenzi abawu-13.2 million abebemile emsebenzini ngenxa yeCovid-19.NgoMsombuluko, iCorruption Watch idedele umbiko wayo obubheka izingqinamba ezihlangabezane nabasebenzi ngesikhathi izwe livaliwe, abaningi bethembele kwiCovid-TERS ebiyenzelwe ukubaholela ngesikhathi besamile emsebenzini.ICorruption Watch ithe laba baqashi kufanele bathathelwe izinyathelo zomthetho ngoba bayizigebengu ezingawuhloniphi umthetho wezwe.“Abasebenzi abaningi bashaqekile uma sebethola ukuthi yize bebanjelwa i-UIF emholweni wabo kodwa le mali ayifiki eMnyangweni wabaSebenzi. Kuthe uma sekuphenywa kwatholwa ukuthi abaqashi babo abayidluliseli emnyangweni imali abayidonsa emholweni wabo. Kufanele umnyango ubabophe labaqashi babuye bathathelwe izinyathelo zomthetho oKlebe nezinye izinhlaka zomthetho,” kusho iCorruption Watch.Ithe uMnyango wezabaSebenzi nawo kufanele uqaphe isimo ngeso lokhozi emazingeni aphansi ukuze zonke izinkampani ezisebenza kuleli zilandele umthetho.“Kuyadingeka ukuthi abahloli boMnyango wezabaSebenzi bahambele zonke izinkampani ukuze babe nesiqiniseko sokuthi uyalandelwa umthetho. Kufanele kuthuthukiswe nezobuchwepheshe ukuze njalo uma kuphela inyanga ibonakale imali efakwa yizinkampani ezihlukene ukubhekelela abasebenzi,” kusho iCorruption Watch.Kulo mbiko kuvele ukuthi amacala okukhwabanisa noma awenkohlakalo ethinta i-UIF abikwe e-Gauteng, kulandele iWestern Cape kuze iKwaZulu-Natal nezinye izifundazwe.Imikhakha obekukhalwa kakhulu ngokungakhokhwa kwe-UIF ngowonogada, owezokuvakasha, owamagaraji, owezokuthutha nowokwakha.Kuvela ukuthi inkohlakalo yokukhwabanisa i-UIF ibidlange kakhulu ngoJulayi ngoba kwabikwa amacala awu-40, kunamahlanu abikwe ngoNovemba wonyaka odlule.Abantu abathinteka ekukhwabaniseni imali ye-UIF izikhulu ezibhekelele ukuholelwa kwabasebenzi, abaphathi bezimali ezinkampanini, abaphathi babasebenzi, abahloli boMnyango wezabaSebenzi okuthiwa bebemukela umgwazo kanjalo nezinhlangano ezizimele ebezithembisa ukuphenyela abasebenzi nge-UIF yabo.ICorruption Watch ithole amacala awu-77 abaqashi akade bengayidluliseli imali kubasebenzi yize sebeyitholile.Bawu-11 abaqashi akade befaka izicelo zeCovid-TERS yize abasebenzi babo bebesebenza futhi bengancishiselwanga umholo, ayisishiyagalolunye awabaqashi abebeholela abasebenzi imali encane kunaleyo abayinikwe yi-UIF.Ayisikhombisa abaqashi akade bekhohlisa abasebenzi ngokuthi imali bayibuyisele kwi-UIF namane lapho abaqashi bebethi baboleka abasebenzi umholo ngesikhathi sikathaqa.
title: Ababoshwe abaqashi abangayikhokhi eye-UIF:Corruption Watch

text: KUNGQONGQE izihlobo zesihlabani somculo kamaskandi esingasekho uMjik’jelwa ‘Ichalaha LikaShafuza’ Ngubane engozini yemoto eyenzeke emgwaqweni ophakathi kwasoThongathi naseDalton uR614 izolo ntambama.Izihlobo zikaMjik’jelwa ezintathu bezihamba ngeGolf GTI emnyama etholane mahlanze neQuantum ngasemgwaqweni ongenela eMontebello, obheke e-Appelsbosch, oZwathini.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane, kule ngozi kushe kwangqongqa abantu abathathu abebekwiGolf GTI nababili abebesetekisini.“Kulimale kabi abantu abangu-12 abebesetekisini baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela sendawo,” kusho uZwane. Ngesikhathi sokuloba uZwane uthe amaphoyisa abesasendaweni yesehlo esaqhubeka nophenyo.“Kuzovulwa icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso,” kusho uZwane.Ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo ntambama uyise kaMjik’jelwa uMnuz Mshubo Ngubane, uvumile ukuthi yizihlobo zabo ezibandakanyeke engozini yemoto.“Sengizwile ukuthi kunezihlobo zethu zaseMthombeni ezehlelwe yingozi ngaseBhamshela kodwa ngisathumele izingane ngemoto ukuba ziyobheka ukuthi zingobani,” kusho uNgubane.Yize bese kusabalele amahlebezi okuthi le moto okuthiwa beyishayelwa ngumfowabo kaMjik’jelwa wasemndenini bekungeyakhe uMjik’jelwa kodwa uNgubane uthe ngamanga aluhlaza lawo ngoba imoto kaMjik’jelwa eyiGolf GTI ibomvu futhi isegcekeni.“Selokhu yama ngesikhathi uMjik’jelwa eqalwa ukugula,” kuphetha uNgubane. Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uMjik’jelwa ubefihlwa ngoMgqibelo ngemuva kokudlula emhlabeni ngoMeyi 25.Okhulumela usoseshini wamatekisi obekusebenza ngaphansi kwawo itekisini ebe sengozini, iBhamshela Taxi Association, uMnuz Vukani Shangase, uthe kubukeka sengathi itekisi beyilayishe abantu isuka nabo eMgungundlovu iya oZwathini kanti imoto encane beyiphuma oZwathini iya eMgungundlovu.“Kule ngozi kushone bonke abebesemotweni encane kanti umshayeli wethu akakwazanga ukuchaza ukuthi ingozi yenzeke kanjani ngoba ulimale kabi,” kusho uShangase.Uthe okuningi uzokwazi ukukuchaza kahle namhlanje sebethole yonke imininingwane.“Kunzima okwamanje ukuchaza konke ngenxa yokuthi besingakakwazi ukukhuluma nomshayeli wethu ngoba uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.”Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela abantu besagcwele endaweni yesigameko, bebabaza lo mshophi ovelile.
title: Bashe bashona abahlobene noMjik'jelwa

text: USASHAQEKILE umndeni wowesifazane waseXobho ‘ovuke ekufeni’ ngemuva kweminyaka engu-15 angcwatshwa.UNkk Priscilla Dlamini waKwaDabeka, eClermont, uthi usadidekile ngokutholakala kwendodakazi yakhe uNksz Nomvuyo Dlamini (30) ayigcwaba epulazini eXobho ngo-2003 ineminyaka engu-15.UNksz Dlamini utholwe ngesonto eledlule emzini wesalukazi thizeni okuthiwa selokhu ahlala naso ngo-2010.UNkk Dlamini uthi ayizange igule indodakazi yakhe yakhala ngekati elisabekayo ekuseni ilungisela ukuyobhalisa uGrade-8 ngoba kwakuqala unyaka.“Ngamfica esethule egcwele izintuthwane sekungathi kade ashona. Nobaba wayekhononda eyolandwa emakhazeni ngoba wayeseshintshe ibala kodwa amalungu omndeni avumelana ngokuthi uyena,” kusho uNkk Dlamini.LESI yisithombe sikaNksz Nomvuyo Dlamini esathathwa eminyakeni engu-15 eyedlule ngaphambi kokuthi ashone Isithombe: SITHUNYELWELo mndeni uthi kwenzeka lokhu nje, ubuthi uma uye kubantu ababonayo, kushiwo ukuthi indodakazi yabo isaphila, kodwa badideke.Kuvela ukuthi lo mndeni kulo nyaka uthole umkhondo ngalo wesifazane, okugcine ngokuthi atholwe eHighflats esebukeka edidekile emqondweni.“Kuningi akukhulumayo okungathi kuyenzeka kuyena,” kusho uMnuz Mlekeleli Dlamini umfowabo walo wesifazane otholakele.Umndeni uxhumane naboMnyango wezaseKhaya ukuze bathole imvume yokwenze ulibofuzo.Sebelubikile udaba nasemaphoyiseni kumanje sebelinde imiphumela yolibo fuzo.Kodwa unina walo wesifazane uthi ulibofuzo balwenzile nje kodwa ziningi izinto azibonayo eziqinisekisa ukuthi le yindodakazi yakhe.“Esandleni washa esemncane unesibazi, nasendlebeni umfowabo wayembhoboza walimala, naleso sibazi sikhona,” kusho uNkk Dlamini.Endaweni abantu basakhuluma ngalo udaba, futhi bebabaza nokufana kwalo wesifazane noNkk Dlamini.Yize kukuningi abathi kukhomba ukuthi lo wesifazane uyingane yabo, kodwa lo mndeni uthi wulibofuzo oluzokhuluma konke.Kodwa uma kwenzeka lubachitha, bayokwamukela nalokho. “Uma ulibofuzo lukhomba ukuthi uyena, kuyomele amaphoyisa aphenyisise ukuthi kwenzekani. Sekuyomele kuvele nokuthi kanti sangcwaba bani njengoba kukhona ithuna ebesithi ngelakhe,” kusho uNkk Dlamini.Njengamanje lo wesifazane uhleli nalo mndeni bazama ukumbuyisela esimeni esifanele njengoba bethi wafika elenga izinto ezixakile, egaxe inqwaba yamakhadi asezitolo nawasemabhange. Wayebukeka njengomuntu ogula ngengqondo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezaseKhaya KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Cyril Mncwabe, uthe ziningi izigaba okumele zilandelwe ngaphambi kokuthi ‘kuvuswe’ umuntu.“Uma sekuze kwaphuma isitifiketi sokushona, sisuke sesidinga bonke ubufakazi bezinhlaka ezifanele zikahulumeni ezivezayo ukuthi umuntu usaphila.“Uma bonke ubufakazi nophenyo lwamaphoyisa selikwazile ukuthola nokuthi kwakungeyena umuntu owangcwatshwa, kwatholwa nokuthi kwangcwatshwa bani sizobe sesikwazi ukungenelela.“Uzobe esengakwazi lowo muntu ukuvuswa,” kusho uMncwabe.Umholi wabelaphi beNdabuko uDkt Sazi Mhlongo uthe izimo ezifuze lezi ziyenzeka emindenini eminingi kodwa kusuke kufanele kwenziwe izaba engakangcwatshwa umuntu.“Okwamanje ngeke ngiphawule ngigxile ngalolu daba ngoba nomndeni angixoxanga nawo ukuthola kahle. Kodwa engingakusho wukuthi uma umndeni uqala ubona izimpawu zokuthi kungenzeka umuntu wabo ukuthi uthwetshuliwe abasukume engakangcwatshwa baxhumane nomuntu oyinyanga abenzele intelezi.“Yilapho okucaca khona ukuthi ubuthakathi ngempela yini noma bekuwukushintsha nje kwebala lesikhumba. Kodwa kuyenzeka umuntu uma ethwetshuliwe ashintshe ibala, bangcwabe into engekho,” kusho uDkt Mhlongo.
title: Owangcwatshwa kudala ‘uvuke ekufeni’

text: UKUHOXA kwamacala abebhekene neMeya yaseNewcastle, uDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba, kuyethule umthwalo. Yize kunjalo ithi ikhathazekile ngoba imindeni eyalahlekelwa isebumnyameni njengoba iqiniso ingalazi ngenxa yabathile abasemandleni, abadlala umacashelana. UDELI MNCWABE umkhiphele eshashalazini.NGOSUKU okuhoxiswe ngalo amacala obuthweswe wona wakhwela wadilika kuNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele. Ingabe kukhona inkinga noma ukungezwani phakathi kwakho naye?ANGINANKINGA noCele kodwa uyena onenkinga nami.YINI inkinga yakhe ngawe?NGO-2015 kwasha ihhovisi le-ANC. UCele wasola mina wathi ngiyathinteka ngoba wayezama ukuvikela omunye umuntu owayeboshiwe ngaleso sikhathi. Ngambuza ngaleyo nto. Into ayenza wukuthi angishayele ucingo ngo-12 ebusuku wakhuluma ukuthanda kwakhe. Angimnakanga ngoba ngiyamazi uwumuntu othanda ukukhuluma.NJENGOBA amacala ehoxisiwe uzizwa unjani?KUYANGITHOKOZISA ngoba ngangishilo kwasekuqaleni ukuthi le nto ikhandiwe, ngimsulwa. Siyeza isikhathi lapho kuzovela khona wonke amaqiniso ngokwenzekayo.UKE wathi uzothatha izinyathelo zomthetho ngalolu daba. Usuhambe ibanga elingakanani kulezo zinhlelo?KUNETHIMBA labameli engisebenzisana nalo, elizobe selikuhlanganisile kwabathintekayo. Kuzoba yimpi enzima impela ngoba kunabantu abashaywa baboshwa bephoqwa ukuthi abathi yimina owenza amacala amabi.Abanye babhaliswa izitatimende zamanga. Kukhona ngisho okuqoshiwe lapho bezwakala bekhala beshaywa kanzima abantu ngoba kuzanywa ukuthi kupendwe mina ngamacala kuthiwe enziwe yimina. Nginobufakazi obuqoshiwe amaphoyisa eziqopha ngesikhathi eshaya abantu.Ngeke ngimangale uma laba bantu abazama ukwesulela mina ngala macala okufa kwabantu kuyibona abawagila.Ngelinye ilanga ububi obenziwa emnyango buyohlala obala baziwe yizwe.KUKE kwanamahlebezi okuthi ubugaqele isikhundla sokuba nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, kuyiqiniso kangakanani lokhu?AKUSILO iqiniso. Okokuqala nje ngazihoxela mina ohlwini.KUNABANTU abakweseke kusukela uqala umsindo kuze kufike esiphethweni. Ungafisa ukuthini kubona?NGIFISA ukubabonga kusukela kwi-ANC, ubuholi bezenkolo, abelaphi bendabuko nomphakathi jikelele.Abantu bangakithi bayangazi ukuthi ngiyinhloboni yomuntu, bayazi nokuthi le nto isukaphi, ihlanganiswe ngobani.
title: Anginankinga noCele kodwa nguye onenkinga nami - imeya

text: BAKHONJWE indlela abasakazi besiteshi esizinze eGoli, i-947 FM ngemumva kokusabala kwezinsolo abathinteka kuzo mayelana nokudlwengulwa kowesifazane. Inkampani ephethe lesi siteshi, iPrimedia Broadcasting ngoLwesithathu ithumele abezindaba isitatimende imemezela ukuthi ngeke besaba yingxenye ye-947 FM oThato “ DJ Fresh” Sikwane noThemba “ Euphonik” Nkosi. Isikhulu esibambile ePrimedia, uGeraint Crwys-Williams,  sithe lesi sinqumo sithathwe ngemuva kokudla amathambo engqondo ngemibiko evele emasontweni edlule futhi “sithathelwe ukuvikela inkampani.”“Isinqumo esithathiwe asihlangene nezinsolo ababhekene nazo laba basakazi kodwa sibeka phambili iPrimedia Broadcasting nezinhloso zayo zebhizinisi,” usho kanje. NgoLwesithathu uThemba noDJ Fresh bakhiphe isitatimende bephawula ngokuxoshwa kwabo. “Ngemuva kokuxhumana nabameli bethu sibone kungcono ukuthi siqhubeke nomsebenzi wethu wokusakaza emphakathini. Sesilinde ukuthi kuhlanzeke amagama ethu (enkantolo). Ngeshwa asivumelananga nePrimedia Broadcasting sagcina sivume ukuthi sidedelwe kulesi siteshi njengamanje,” kusho isitatimende. Abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana basihlabile isinqumo sePrimedia, iningi lithi bekumele balinde isinqumo senkantolo njengoba kusaphenywa futhi abakatholwa benecala kwizinsolo zokudlwengula abebhekene nazo. Laba basakazi baqale bamiswa emsebenzini ngenyanga edlule kulandela ukuvela kowesifazane owabasola ngokumdlwengula ngo-2011. Losing your income over something you might not have done is terrible. But if you're innocent you will come back.This Primedia letter reminds me of those relationships that ends with " it's not you, it's me". Go on and be great, nna ke shap ka wena!What a time to be alive!#Djfresh #euphonik pic.twitter.com/0luM0KbnXQ
title: Kuphelile ngoDJ Fresh noThemba kwi-947

text: UMENGAMELI wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa angase abe ngumengameli wokuqala kuleli ukuhola uR3 million uma engakwemukela lokho.IKhomishini ebhekele ezamaholo abasebenzi bakahulumeni, iphakamise ukuthi wenyuswe umholo kaRamaphosa.Kuvela ukuthi isiphakamiso sithi akanyuselwe ngo-3% okuchaza ukuthi kungase kwengezwe uR90 000. Lokhu kusho ukuthi angasuka emalini enguR2.99 million aye kuR3.1 million ngonyaka.IPhini lakhe, uMnuz David Mabuza lona lizothola R2.9 million ngonyaka.USihlalo wekhomishini oyiNhloko yamaJaji eNorth West, iJaji uMashangu Leeuw, uthe bayasiqonda isimo somnotho esibhedayo.IJaji uLeeuw lithathe isinqumo sithathwe emuva kokubhunga nongqongqoshe abehlukene ababeke imibono ngalolu daba lweholo likaRamaphosa. Phakathi kwabo kukhona uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Ronald Lamola wezobuLungiswa, uMnuz Tito Mboweni weziMali. INhloko yamaJaji * -Adv Mogoeng Mogoeng ithintiwe kulolu daba.Kubuye kwaxoxwa nekomiti lezinkantolo ezisesigabeni esingaphansi, elithe zikhona izikhalo ezivelile ngalokhu kwezinye izinhlaka kodwa bayazifakela izibuko.Owayengumengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu, uMnuz Nelson Mandela, wanqaba ukwenyuselwa umholo ekhala ngokuthi abantu ezweni bahlupheka kakhulu, akafuni ukubonakala ehola imali enkulu ekubeni isimo somnotho singakuvumi lokho.
title: Angase ahole R3 million uRamaphosa uma evuma

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, uyalele amaphoyisa ukuba abheke zonke izitshudeni zaseNyuvesi yaseZululand ezivela kwi-video zishaya osolwa ngokubulala ukuze ziboshelwe icala lokushaya.Izolo uCele ukhwele wadilika ezitshudenini eziziphindiselelayo uma kukhona okwenzekayo enyuvesi yazo wathi lezo ezenze njalo zizobhekana nolaka lwamaphoyisa.Izitshudeni zivele zamhhewula uCele, zachitha izandla zikhombisa ukungahambisani nokuthi kungenzeka ababonakala kwi-video bebhekane nengalo yomthetho.UCele uvakashele oNgoye, eMpangeni, eyohlangana nezikhulu zenyuvesi, izitshudeni, abone nalapho kubulewe khona isitshudeni, uSazi Ngubo (20), ngeSonto obenza izifundo zobuthishela, kuwunyaka wakhe wokuqala.Isitshudeni (20) esisolwa ngokumbulala besihlala nomufi endlini, senza izifundo ze-Information Science. Naso bekungunyaka waso wokuqala.Kuthiwa izitshudeni zikhande umsolwa ngamatshe emuva kokuba uNgubo egwaziwe.“Sengiyalele amaphoyisa ukuba abhekisise i-video ehlasimulisa umzimba okushaywa kuyo umsolwa. Azobheke zonke izitshudeni ezivela kuyo ukuze zizobhekana nomthetho. Anginandaba ukuthi nithini kodwa lokho kuzokwenzeka, amaphoyisa kumele enze umsebenzi wawo,” kusho uCele.Ukugxekile ukubulawa kwesitshudeni nokuphuzwa kotshwala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.“Ukuphuzwa kotshwala kuhlezi kuyinkinga ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, nalapha ngiyabugxeka utshwala. Ngike ngezwa ukuthi nina nike nafuna indawo yenu yokuthenga utshwala, ngeke ngingene-ke kakhulu kulokho ngoba yinto yabaphathi besikhungo kodwa engikushoyo wukuthi utshwala buyinkinga.Okusemqoka wukuthi nazi ukuthi nikuphi. Kumele nazi ukuthi nizofunda lapha, anizile ukuzohlala emjondolo nenze umathanda,” kusho uCele.Iphini likamengameli wezitshudeni oNgoye, uNdumiso Ntshangase, lithe badumele ngokubehlele futhi badinga ezokuphepha ziqiniswe.“Akukho obekungenziwa yisikhungo ukuvikela lezi zitshudeni ngoba okwenzekile kwenzeke zihlezi zombili endlini futhi kwasebenza isikhali sasekhishini. Onogada yibona ababe ngabokuqala ukufika lapho kubulewe khona isitshudeni. Yize kunjalo zikhona izehlo lapho izitshudeni zigqekezelwa khona izindlu, zintshontshelwe. Sifuna ezokuphepha ziqine ezindlini zezitshudeni,” kusho uNtshangase.Ophethe ezokuxhumana oNgoye, uNkk Gcina Nhleko-Mdluli, uthe bashaqekile ngokwenzekile. “Udaba lokuphepha kwezitshudeni siluthathela phezulu. Inkinga esinayo wukuthi kunezindawo esingakwazi ukuzibiya ngenxa yokuthi kuhamba kuzo amalungu omphakathi njengoba umhlaba okwakhiwe kuwo isikole kungewona owaso isikhungo.”Abafundi abahlala eSphetho Block BB lapho kwenzeke khona isiga bathe basathukile.USnegugu Ngcobo benoKhethiwe Shezi bathe njengoba bezoqala ukubhala uzivivinyo zokuphela konyaka ngo-Okthoba 14 baphazamisekile ngokomqondo.
title: ‘Ababoshwe abashaya isitshudeni kwi-video’

text: Mbali KhanyileUDONSE abantu ngendlebe, wabayala ngokubaluleka kokuqikelela ukuthi bayisebenzisa ngendlela efanele imali ukuze bagweme ukwentuleka kwayo, usomabhizinisi wodumo lohlelo lwakuMzansi Magic, uThando Nesithembu.UMnuz Musa Mseleku obethula incwadi yakhe esihloko esithi How I Made My First Million eCity Hall, eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu ntambama, uthe inhloso yokubhala incwadi wukuthi ufuna ukudwebela abantu isithombe ngempilo yakhe nendlela ayihambile ukufinyelela lapho ekhona, kwezezimali.“Ngibone kunesidingo sokuthi ngibhale incwadi emva kokuthi ngidlule kuyo yonke imisebenzi esengike ngayenza phambilini. Yize omunye wayo engangisebenza kuwo ngaphansi kukaMasipala woGu wawukhokha kahle, ngenza amaphutha nokwaholela ekutheni ngizithole senginengcindezi ezimalini,” kubeka uMseleku.Eqhuba uthe ngesizathu salokho adlula kukho, ubone kungaba kuhle ukuthi abhale incwadi engaxwayisa abantu ngokumosheka kwemali, singekho isidingo.“Kuhambe ngabona ukuthi kunezinto abantu abangaziqondi ngami ngenxa yalokho, abakubuka kumabonakude. Amakhosikazi ami wonke ngidlala nawo izitokofela futhi ekupheleni konyaka asenzi imali engaphansi kukaR500 000,” kusho uMseleku.Wathi izitokofela ziwumthombo wokwenza imali.Amakhosikazi akhe abehleli ndawonye kulo mcimbi obuhlelwe wuPhiko lwezamaPaki, ezokuNgcebeleka namaSiko, egqoke econsa enodadewabo kaMseleku.Unkozikazi wokuqala uMato MaCele odume ngelikaMam’khulu, udlulise amazwi okubonga ngokuphumelela kwencwadi ebhalwe ngumyeni wabo.“Siyaziqhenya ngoMseleku ongagcini nje ngokuba wumyeni wethu kodwa ophinde abe ngumeluleki nobaba kithina. Siyaziqhenya kakhulu ngokubhala kwakhe incwadi.INhloyo yoPhiko lwezamaPaki, ezokuNgcebeleka namaSiko, uMnuz Thembinkosi Ngcobo  ibonge uMseleku ngokuba ngabanye babantu abadlala indima ekutheni, babhale izincwadi ngempilo yabo. Ube esegqugquzela namaciko ukuthi nawo angahlonizi ekucikozeni ngempilo yawo.
title: UMseleku uxwayisa abantu ngemali

text: UMNYANGO wezeMpilo uzozithathela izinyathelo izibhedlela okuzotholakala ukuthi zibeke engcupheni impilo yabasebenzi ngokungabanikezi izinto zokubavikela kwiCoronavirus.UNgongqoshe wezeMpilo, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe ukuvikela abasebenzi kusho ukuthi bafundiswe ukuthi iziguli ezinegciwane kumele ziphathwe kanjani, ukunikezwa kwabo izinto zokuzivikela. Konke lokhu kumele kwenziwe kulandelwa imithetho ebekiwe.UDkt Mkhize usho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi ehambele esibhedlela i-Ermelo, eMpumalanga, lapho kade kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lokuhlolelwa igciwane okwenziwa emphakathini.Uthe uzwile ukuthi kunemibiko yokuthi kunezibhedlela ezibeke abasebenzi engcupheni okuholele ekutheni abasebenzi bathole igciwane. Njengamanje kusenziwa uphenyo ngokwenzeke kulezi zibhedlela. Uma kutholakala ukuthi kube nobudedengu obenziwe ngabaphathi bezibhedlela bazothathelwa izinyathelo.Izinyunyana zabasebenzi zisola ngobudedengu izibhedlela ezizimele zakwaNetcare KwaZulu-Natal ezivaliwe okwesikhashana emuva kokuthi kube neziguli ezinegciwane.Esibhedlela iNetcare St Augustine’s sivaliwe ngeledlule emuva kokuthi abasebenzi abawu-68 kuvele ukuthi bathole igciwane ezigulini. NgoLwesithathu iNetcare Kingsway, eseManzimtoti, ivaliwe okwesikhashana ukuze kulawulwe igciwane.Unobhala weNehawu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ayanda Zulu, uthe ngokuthola kwabo abaphathi bezibhedlela bebebafihlela abasebenzi ukuthi iziguli abazinakekelayo zineCoronavirus obekwenza ukuthi baye kuzo bengazifakile izinto zokuzivikela.“UMnyango wezeMpilo sithi awuphenye ngalokhu. Uma kutholakala ukuthi izinsolo ziyizo kuzomele uthathe izinyathelo eziqinile ngoba siyakholwa wukuthi okuhamba phambili kuzo ukungenisa imali nokugcina igama lazo lilihle. Izitatimende ezithunyelwa abaphathi bezibhedlela ziveza isithombe sokuthi konke kuhamba kahle, bayakwazi ukulawula igciwane kodwa uma ukhuluma nabasebenzi uzwa okunye. Kuthiwa bayafihlelwa ukuthi iziguli abazinakekelayo zinaleli gciwane. Sifuna ukuthi nomnyango wezemisebenzi uqale owalo uphenyo.”UNobhala weDenosa KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mandla Shabangu, uthe kuyadumaza ukuthi izibhedlela ezithathwa njengezinenzisiza zokubulala amagciwane nengqalasizinda esezingeni yizo ezibonakala zehluleka ukuvikela ukusabalala kwegciwane.“Izinkinga ezinjengalezi besizilindele ukuthi zingenzeka ezibhedlela zikahulumeni ngoba ingqalasizinda yakhona ayikho ezingeni elifanele,” kusho yena.
title: Zizothathelwa izinyathelo izibhedlela

text: UBongz wodumo lomdanso igwaragwara, utshele Isolezwe ngeSonto ukuthi ngasekupheleni kwenyanga uyalifulathelaelakuleli ulibhekisa phesheya kwezilwandle.Uthe yize kuleli idumela lomdanso wakhe selithanda ukwehla kodwa emazweni aphesheya basazifela ngawo.Uveze ukuthi usayobangena ngawo lo mdanso e-USA.Kulezi zinsuku uthe into eduma ekhanda lakhe yilolu hambo lwakhe ngakho uphatheke kabi esethola umbiko wokuthi kunomuntu ozenza yena kuWhatsApp ocela abantuukuthi bamthumelele imali nge e-wallet.“Abantu bayahlupha. Bathatha izithombe bafake inamba yabo. Ngithe ngifonela uMashamplane mayelana nomcimbi i-All White Party ozoba ngeSonto, ngezwa esethi akawusebenzisi uFNB, akakwazanga ukungithumelela imali ebengiyicelile,” kusho uBongz.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abantu babheke inombolo yomuntu osuke ethumela umyalezo anganaki isithombe.Uveze ukuthi akekho umuntu asondelene naye ongene ogibeni lokuqolwa ngoba bayazi ukuthi uma edinga imali uyafona akathumeli imiyalezo.“Abaqali ukungigila. Ngonyaka odlule bagebenga iWhatsApp yami, bezama khona ukuqola abantu. Ngisola ukuthi abantu basuke besebenzisana nabezinkampani zamaselula,” kusho uBongz.Unxuse abantu ukuthi baqaphele bangadlali abantu abalambile, abashaywe uJanuwari noFebruwari.Iqola leli elimnakashele ucele ukuthi lihlukane naye phansi.Umfutho wakhe uthe ufuna ukuwufaka ekuphusheni i-albhamu yakhe iGwara Nation asanda kuyikhipha, hhayi ekuhubheni amaqola.
title: Uyobangena ngegwaragwara e-USA uDJ Bongz

text: BAZOKWABELANA ngebhonasi kaR102 million abasebenzi bakwaShoprite Group abazosebenza njengoba kuqhubeka iCoronavirus.Lesi simemezelo senziwe yisikhulu esiphezulu seShoprite Group, uMnuz Pieter Engelbrecht izolo.Uthe abasebenzi abazothola le bhonasi ezokhishwa kulesi sikhathi yilabo abasebenza ezitolo nabasabalalisa impahla.“Abasebenzi bethu basezitolo babalulekile emkhankasweni wokulwa neCoronavirus. Sizobabonga ngebhonasi kaR102 million abasezitolo nabasabalalisa impahla. Le bhonasi bazoyithola ngoLwesine oluzayo. Basiza abathengi abawu-29 million abangena ezitolo zethu,” kusho  u-Engelbrecht.Uthe bayabavikela abasebenzi ngokubalethela izibulala-magciwane nokuqinisekisa ukuthi izitolo zabo azigcwali ngokweqile, kulandelwa imithetho kahulumeni.U-Engelbrecht ucele abathengi ukuthi bangakhithizi ngokweqile ngoba kunokukudla okwanele ezitolo zabo ngakho amashalofu azohlala egcwele.“Izindawo zethu ezigcina impahla zigcwele, sicela abantu bangakhithizi ngokweqile. Izitolo zethu zizovulwa noma izwe selivaliwe izinsuku eziwu-21. Siyacela abathengi baqaphele ezokuphepha nenhlanzeko uma beyothenga ngoba nentengo yempahla esiyidayisayo ngeke ibize, amanani azohlala ephansi,” kusho u-Engelbrecht.
title: Abasebenzi bakwaShoprite bazokwabelana uR102 million

text: SISHUBILE isimo eMaoti, eNanda, ku-ward 59, kulandela isigameko sokudutshulwa kwevolontiya (25) le-ANC endaweni yokucima ukoma ngeSonto ebusuku.UMnuz Sizwe Mchunu kuthiwa ubenabangani bakhe ethaveni yendawo ngesikhathi edutshulwa.Ngokusho kwabangani bakamufi, uMchunu udutshulwe ngumqaphi womholi we-ANC endaweni, ongumnikazi wethaveni okwenzeke kuyo isigameko.Umthombo weSolezwe uthe uMchunu ufike nabangani bakhe bezophuza kwathiwa akangangeni.“Kube nokuhilizisana phakathi kwakhe nomqaphi, umqaphi wagcina esekhipha isibhamu wamdubula,” kusho umthombo.Uthe uyasola ukuthi ukubulawa kukaMchunu kuhlobene nomsindo okhona endaweni phakathi kwamalungu e-ANC.Ngeledlule Isolezwe libike ngesigameko sokushaywa kwamavolontiya e-ANC angu-12, aze angeniswa esibhedlelaoSindisweni.La mavolontiya kubikwa ukuthi ashaywe ngamanye amalungu enhlangano kodwa asondelene nekhansela lendawo uMnuz Linda Majola.Ingxabano kuthiwa isuswe yizinto eziningi okubalwa nokumiswa kwabasebenzi abathile abaqashelwe ukusebenza ohlelweni lokwakhiwa kwezindlu oluqhubeka endaweni.Kusukela kushaywe lawa mavolontiya ngeledlule, kubikwa ukuthi simanzonzo isimo endaweni njengoba sekuze kwabulawa uMchunu.Lithintwa izolo ikhansela lendawo, uMajola, lithe lisashaqekile mayelana nesigameko sokubulawa kukamufi.UMajola uthe bezwe kuthiwa umufi ubesendaweni yokucima ukoma ngesikhathi edutshulwa ngumqaphi wongumnikazi wethaveni, ophinde abe ngumholi kaKhongolose endaweni.Uthe umufi ubulawe kade ezoqala umsebenzi izolo njengoba kade esanda kuqashwa ohlelweni lwemisebenzi yamatoho.“UMchunu besimqashile namanye amavolontiya esezosebenza njengoba esebulewe,” kusho uMajola.Uthe uyazi ukuthi kukhona akade bemgxeka uMchunu bethi uyincelebane yakhe njengoba bebesondelene.“Umufi nabanye abangani bakhe abathathu ngabathatha ngahlala nabo phansi ngabayala njengoba bebevamise ukusetshenziswa ngabantu abafuna ukufeza izinhloso zabo zezepolitiki endaweni,” kusho uMajola.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko wathi amaphoyisa aseMtshebheni aphenya icala lokubulala kanti bekungakaboshwa muntu.
title: Kudutshulwe ivolontiya le-ANC eMaoti

text: INDABA yokuthandana kwabesifazane abasebancane nabesilisa esebekhulile ngeminyaka, kuye kuthiwe yidokwe elingagayelwe muntu.Umuntu uyazikhethela ukuthi ufuna ukuthandana nobani, onjani futhi omngakanani ngokweminyaka. Yize kunjalo, kodwa lolu thando uma kuzogcina kuvela nezingane kulona, kukhona okungekuhle okungavela.Ongoti bezempilo bathi owesilisa osekhule kakhulu ngokweminyaka othola ingane nowesifazane osemncane, ingane ingaba nezinkinga.Lokhu kuvezwa nawucwaningo lwakamuva olwenziwe ososayensi enyuvesi yaseMelika iStanford eveza ukuthi lezi zingane ezitholwa ngale ndlela zisengcupheni yokuba nesifo sokuwa, ukubelethwa isikhathi singakafiki noma onina bangenwe isifo sikashukela besakhulelwe.Kuyavela nokuthi ezinganeni ezingu-40 million ezizalwa kobaba esebekhulile kusukela ku-35 ziba nenkinga yokushaya isisindo esingaphansi kwesifanele.Abesilisa abaneminyaka engu-45, u-14% wabo yiwona osengcupheni yokuthi izingane zawo zisheshe zibelethwe singakafiki isikhathi.Bese kuthi abaneminyaka engu-50 kuya phezulu, u-28% wabo usengcupheni yokuthola izingane ezithi zibelethwa zibe zidinga usizo oluphuthumayo ngenxa yesimo sempilo engeyinhle.Ungoti wezempilo uDkt Micheal Eisnberg uthi bebefuna ukubheka kakhulu izinkinga ezihambisana nezokubeletha kakhulu.“Okwamanje lezi zinombolo azisho ukuthi abantu sebengashintsha izinhlelo zabo, ngoba noma kunobungozi kodwa abukho kakhulu kangako,” kusho uDkt Eisnberg.Ephetha uthe lolu cwaningi abantu kumele baluthathe njengesifundo sokubavula amehlo uma behlela ukwandisa umndeni.Ungoti wezempilo kuleli naphesheya kwezilwandle, uDkt Karl Le Roux, uthi ukukhulelwa kowesifazane osekhulile akukhethi noma ngabe ongakanani ngeminyaka, kuvele kuhambisana nengozi.Uveze ukuthi ukuvuthwa kwembewu yabesilisa kwenza kube lula kubona ukuthi bakwazi ukuthola izingane noma kunini.Kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi basuke bezithola nontanga yabo ngoba abesifazane babheke nenkinga yokuthi awabo amaqanda kuhamba isikhathi aphelelwe isikhathi. Uma kungenjalo, usuke ezalwe enesibalo samaqanda amancane.Ngenxa yokuthi ngokwemvelo abesilisa bahlala bekulungele noma yinini ukwakha ingane, akubi iminyaka inkinga yokungabatholi abantwana kodwa kuba izizathu eziqondene nempilo.“Yingakho ngesinye isikhathi uzwe kuthiwa kunowesilisa oneminyaka engaphezulu kuka-70 okhulelise owesifazane. Akubi untanga yakhe ngoba abesifazane kuba nzima uma esefike ku-35 ukukhulelwa kalula.“Owesilisa angakhulelisa ngisho eno-80 uma esazithokozisa ngokocansi. Ingozi ingaba khona enganeni ngezindlela eziningi uma umama oyithwele ebe nenkinga ekukhulelweni kwakhe,” kusho uDkt Le Roux. Ngaphandle kokusho kodokotela, bakhona nabesilisa abaziwayo esebekhulile abawubufakazi bokuthi umuntu uyayithola ingane esemdala.
title: #Ezothando: Bathi ubaba osekhulile angaba ‘yingozi’

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEICRICKET South Africa (CSA) isiphefumulile ngezinsolo zokuboshelwa kukaVernon Philander ngenxa yebala lakhe kumaProteas atebhekene neNew Zealand kowandulela amanqamu eNdebe yoMhlaba e-Eden Park ngenyanga odlule.Ibhodi yeCSA ikhiphe isitatimende ngempelasonto ngemuva kokuthi umengameli wayo, uChris Nenzani, enze ucwaningo ngohlelo olwasetshenziswa ngesikhathi kuqokwa abadlali abawu-11 okwakumele babhekane namaBlack Caps.Ucwaningo lweCSA lwenziwe ngemuva kwenkulumo kaMike Horn obegqugquzela amaProteas ngezinkulumo ezakhayo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka iNdebe yoMhlaba lapho ephawule khona ngoLwesine olwedlule ngokugxambukela obekwenzeka kumaProteas.Ithimba ebelenza ucwaningo lihlangane ngoLwesihlanu nesikhulu esiphezulu kuCSA, uHaroon Lorgat, umqeqeshi, uRussell Domingo, no-Andrew Hudson, inhloko yethimba labaqoki kumaProteas, ukuthola iqiniso.Ngokocwaningo kwalandelwa imigudu efanele nejwayelekile yokuqoka iqembu okuwukuxhumana nesikhulu esiphezulu ngodaba lokuboshelwa kwabadlali abamnyama.Okunye okuphinde kwavela wukuthi uPhilander waya kohlolwa ngodokotela beqembu ukuthi uwulungele yini umdlalo. Bathola ukuthi wayengadlala ngoba wayengumqemane. Umqeqeshi waphinde wakhuluma naye wabe eseqinisekisa ukuthi yebo ukulungele ukudlala.UHudson, uDomingo noLorgat balimise ngesihloko elokuthi abakaze bathole ngisho nowodwa umyalelo wokuthi kufanele babophele umdlali omnyama oqhamuka kungqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, uFikile Mbalula, noma elungeni lebhodi yeCSA.UHudosn noDomingo baphinde baqinisekisa ukuthi bayilandela yonke imigudu yokuqoka abadlali eyabekwa yibhodi ngo-2013 ephoqa ukuthi kube nabadlali abane bebala kwabangu-11 abasuke beqala umdlalo. Inhloko yabaqoki nomqeqeshi baxhumana noLorgat owakubeka kwacaca ukuthi baqoke iqembu eliqinile kodwa bangakhohlwa yindaba yokuboshelwa kwabadlali abamnyama. Bobabili baphinde bavuma ukuthi kwaba khona ukuphikisana okujwayelekile uma kuqokwa iqembu kodwa ekugcineni bavumelana ngokuthi iqembu abaliqoka laliqine ngokwanele ukwenza umsebenzi. AmaProteas agcine ehluliwe yiNew Zealand.Abaningi basala bemangele ngesikhathi uPhilander, owayengazange adlale ngesikhathi amaProteas ebhekene neSri Lanka kuma-quarterfinal nakowokugcina wamaqoqo elakuleli elahlula kuwona i-Afghanistan, eboshelwa esikhundleni sikaKyle Abbott owayesefomini eyisimanga.“Uma sibheka lokhu okungaphezulu nencwadi kaMike Horn yokuxolisa, kusobala ukuthi izinsolo esabhecwa ngazo ezinhlakeni ezehlukene kwabenzindaba zazingelona iqiniso. Ibhodi yeCSA igculisekile ngocwaningo nangendlela ithimba labaqoki, umqeqeshi nesikhulu esiphezulu ababophela ngayo iqembu. Sifuna ukubonga wonke umuntu ngokuba neqiniso nogqozi lokuzihlanganisa kulolu cwaningo. Ibhodi iyethemba ukuthi indaba isiphelile ngakho ngeke isaphawula ngayo,” kusho uNenzani.Khonamanjalo, izolo iDemocratic Alliance (DA) iveze ukuthi isibhalele usihlalo we-komidi yezeMidlalo ePhalamende icela kubuyekezwe udaba lukaPhilander.
title: Azilona iqiniso izinsolo ebesibhecwa ngazo: CSA

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, uthi kumele amaqembu ayeke ukubalisa kodwa abhukule emiqhudelwaneni yeConfederation of African Football.Ngempelasonto iSundowns, enqobe isicoco sesishiyagalombili se-Absa Premiership, izoqala imidlalo yamaqoqo yeCaf Champions League.Okwesithathu kulandelana iSundowns idlala kwiChampions League eyayinqoba ngo-2016.Njengamanje iSundowns iyona kuphela esele kwiChampions League. IBidvest Wits, enqobe iligi ngesizini edlule, iphumile kulo mqhudelwano yehlela kwiConfederations Cup, nakhona yafike yasha induku.Isilomo somdlali weBidvest Wits, uDaine Klate, sifake isithombe sesidlo sofishi abasabekayo ebesibadla ngesikhathi beyodlala ne-Enyimba yaseNigeria koweConfederations Cup emasontweni edlule.“Nikhala ngofishi abebedliwa yiWits nicabanga ukuthi thina sidlani. Nathi sidlalile ne-Enyimba ngesikhathi siseNigeria kwiChampions League. Nifuna sinitshele ukuthi yiziphi izingqinamba esabhekana nazo? Uma senazi nizokwenzani? Ngubani onendaba nokuthi sibhekene nani? Uma sengichaza nizothi ushayiwe yingakho esebeka izaba. Yise-Afrika lapha akusiniswa nje amahleza, “ kuchaza uMosimane.NgoMgqibelo eLucas Moripe Stadium, iSundowns izokwamukela ompetha banyakenye iWydad Atletic emdlalweni ozoqala ngo-9 ebusuku.Amanye amaqembu aqhathwe neSundowns kuGroup C yi-AS Togo yaseTogo neHoroya yaseGuinea.“Ngebhadi ngibona abantu bedlalisa izikimu ezithambile e-Afrika. Uma abantu benza njalo akumele baziqhathanise neSundowns,” kusho uMosimane.Ukuwina kweSundowns isicoco seligi ngempelasonto edlule kuyibuyisela kulo mqhudelwano nangonyaka ozayo. Izojoyinwa yi-Orlando Pirates ezoqeda endaweni yesibili kwi-Absa Premiership.“Sesidlale iminyaka emine ilandelana kwiChampions League. Yithina kuphela esisenze lokho. Sihlale siqeda endaweni yokuqala noma eyesibili. Ezinye izinkunzi ezenza lokhu yi-Esperance (yaseTunisia), Al Ahly (yase-Egypt) neMamelodi Sundowns. Ngisho oWydad Casablanca noZesco United bathwala kanzima. Sonke siyazi ukuthi iSuperSport United ikuphi kwi-log. Siyazi iWits ikuphi. Ufuna ukudlala iChampions League, ayikho inkinga asambe siyodlala. Yilapho sesiqala khona ukukhuluma ibhola-ke, “ kusho uMosimane.UMosimane ufanise iqembu lakhe neMadrid yaseSpain.“Yonke iminyaka iReal Madrid ihlale idlala kwiChampions League. Ifinyelela kweyamanqamu. Njalo ngemuva kwezinsuku ezintathu iyadlala. Le nto ayifuni imali. IWits iyiziqumama, iSuperSport ixhaswe ithelevishini. Amanye amaqembu anoxhaxha lwabaxhasi, ngisho iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates. Ngakho ayikho le ndaba yabantu abathi balahlekelwa yimali,” kuvala uMosimane.
title: UMosimane ululeka ngeCaf

text: ABESIFAZANE abahlukunyezwa ngabathandana nabo mabahlukane nokufela ngaphakathi okwebutho likaZulu, baphumele obala bebike ngezinkinga ukuze balulekwe. Lowo kube ngumyalezo wosuku ngesikhathi kwethulwa uhlaka lokusiza abesifazane ekulweni nokuhlukunyezwa kwabo olubizwa nge-Intimate Femicide.Lo mcimbi obuhlelwe wumnyango wezoBulungiswa kuzwelonke, ubuseProtea Hotel eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu. Abesifazane abayizisulu zokuhlukunyezwa bathole ithuba lokuxoxa ngezinkinga zabo nokwabelana ngezeluleleko.Omunye wabo obethula inkulumo uNksz Maureen Zamagatsheni Ndlovu, owasinda ngokulambisa isoka lakhe lizama ukumbulala usekhiphe incwadi exoxa ngosizi abhekana nalo. Utshele abesifazane ukuthi abaphumele obala ngokuhlukunyezwa bangathuli.‘’Uma usahleli nothandana naye okuhlukumezayo, awuzithandi. Mushiye lowo muntu ngoba ungafa nokufa,’’ kweluleka uNksz Ndlovu elandelwa yihlombe elikhulu. Uthe yena useke wadlwengulwa yiphoyisa elalimsiza ngesikhathi elimele.“Nokudlwengulwa ngisuka kukho ngikwazi kahle, ngadlwengulwa umuntu engangimethemba. Nasekhaya ngangikhule ubaba ehlukumeza umama phambi kwami,’’Utshele imbokodo ebigcwele indlu ukuthi umuntu wesifazane uyakwazi ukuphumelela ezimele ngaphandle kokuncika kowesilisa.“Uyindlovukazi ngaphandle kowesilisa, ngoba okunye okuhluphayo wukuthi sincenge ukondliwa sihlalela izingane sisabe ukushiya. Kuphelile lokho, phumela obala ubike, impilo izoqubeka.Lo mcimbi ubuhanjelwe nayiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa uMnuz John Jeffery, otshele abesifazane ukuthi ababodwa kodwa nohulumeni wenza konke okusemandleni ukuthi abahlukumezi bajeze.“Ziningi izinhlelo ezikhona ezibhekene nokuhlukumezeka kwabesifazane. Ningasabi ukubika nasemaphoyiseni, kunamagumbi ongeniswa kuwona ukuze uchaze udaba lwakho ungabonwa muntu,’’ kusho uJeffery.Uthe okunye okukhathazayo wukuthi abantu bayawavula amacala bebuye bawahoxise. Wathi lesi sihlava kufanele wonke umuntu asisukumele.“Ukuhlukumezeka yinto engakhethi bala noma isigaba sempilo yinto ehlasele yonke indawo, kufanele sibambisane ekulweni nayo,” kusho uJeffery. Lezi zithangami kulindeleke ukuthi zijikeleze zonke izindawo ukusiza abahlukunyezwayo.
title: Kuvuswe abesifazane abahlukunyezwa ngabathandana nabo

text: UMCULI odume ngezingoma zothando uNaima Kay, uthi uyazi usebathembise kakhulu abantu i-albhamu entsha kodwa naye kube ngaphezu kwamandla akhe ukuhlehliswa kokuphuma kwayo.UNaima, owazakhela udumo ngezingoma okubalwa kuzo Lelilanga, Thando nezinye, selokhu agcina ukukhipha i-albhamu ngo-2016.Wagcina ngethi It’s All About Love. Ngaphambi kwalokho wayekhiphe iNgiyavuma ngo-2014 eyayilama Umsebenzi ayikhipha ngo-2013.“Ngiyaxolisa kakhulu kubantu sengibathembise isikhathi eside ukuthi i-albhamu iyeza.”“Mina nethimba lami besithi sizokhipha ngo-Agasti kwavele kwaba neCovid-19, sadideka sonke. Besisaba ukuthi mhlawumbe ngeke idayise, ngeke siqashwe ndawo ukuthi siyocula ngakho besingafuni ukuthatha amashansi sase sibona ukuthi asime. Manje sesizokhipha uma kuqala unyaka ozayo mhlawumbe ngoFebhuwari noma ngoMashi.”Uthe ngeke kuthuleke abantu belindile yingakho ngoLwesihlanu ekhipha ingoma entsha ethi Imimoya aseqalile ukuyicula ezindaweni aqashwa kuzo.“Ngisebenze noSphiwe Jula kuyo nongumdidiyeli wami esenza naye, uThando. Ingoma ngeyokholo kodwa eshaya ngesigqi se-house.“Ngiyibhaliswe yizinto ezenzeka ezweni. Njengomuntu okhulele esontweni ngiyabona ukuthi kukhona konke okwenzekayo ezweni yingoba uNkulunkulu usicasukele ngakho ngimcela ukuthi ehlise umoya. Uyasikhombisa ukuthi Nguye umikazi wakho konke.”
title: UNaima Kay ukhipha ingoma entsha ngoLwesihlanu

text: ZAKHELE XABAINHLANGANO eyengamele ibhola e-Afrika, iConfederation of African Football (Caf), iphakamise ukuthi udlalwe kwelinye ilizwe umdlalo weCaf Champions League, ophakathi kweKaizer Chiefs neWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco.IChiefs bekufanele ivakashele iWydad emdlalweni wokuqala wamaqoqo kaGroup C kodwa uhulumeni waseMorocco, wenqaba nezimvume zokungena ezweni ekhala ngokudlanga kweCovid-19 Ningizimu Afrika. Amakhosi abesezikhokhe zonke izindleko zokuya eMorocco, okubalwa ezokuthutha nendawo yokuhlala. Umdlalo bekumele ume ngempelasonto. IWydad nayo ikuqinisekisile ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule, ukuthi ayizimisele ngokwamukela iChiefs ngoba yesaba igciwane eselibhubhise inqwaba yabantu e-Afrika nasemhlabeni jikelele.Ngokwencwadi eyimpendulo ebhalwe yiCaf, iyibhekise esikhulwini esiphezulu seSouth African Football Association (Safa) izolo, ithe umdlalo weChiefs neWydad uzodlalelwa kwelinye ilizwe njengoba kwenzekile koweBloemfontein Celtic neRivers United yaseNigeria, emasontweni adlule. INigeria nayo ikhale ngakho ukudlanga kweCovid-19 kuleli. Kube sekuqokwa elinye ilizwe okudlalelwe khona umdlalo womlenze wesibili wokuhlungela amaqoqo."Ngokwencwadi yakho ethunyelelwe iCaf mayelana nomdlalo ongunombolo 81, sifisa ukuqala ngokuxolisa ngokuphazamiseka okwenzeke kwiKaizer Chiefs ngenxa yokuqiniswa kwemigomo kubantu abavela eNingizimu Afrika, okwenziwe ngamanye amazwe ngenxa yobhubhane iCovid-19. Sibhekane nobunzima mayelana nokuhlela imidlalo eNingizimu Afrika. IBloemfontein Celtic ibhekane nesimo esifanayo ohambeni lwayo iyodlala neRivers United FC koweCaf Confederation Cup."Iqhubeke yathi:" Ngokufanayo neKaizer Chiefs ibhekene nenkinga efanayo ngokuthola izimvume zokungena eMorocco, iyodlala neWydad Casablanca AC emdlalweni obekufanele udlalwe ngoFebhuwari 13 eCasablanca. Njengoba kubaluliwe encwadini evela enhlanganweni eyengamele ibhola ngoFebhuwari 10, uhulumeni akawuvumelanga umdlalo ukuthi udlalwe eMorocco, ngenxa yokucophelela isimo sezempilo kubantu abaphuma eNingizimu Afrika. Siyasibhekisisa lesi simo esingajwayelekile. Ngenxa yalokho sidluliselwe esigungwini esihlela imidlalo iCaf Organising Committee, esiphakamise ukuthi umdlalo udlalelwe ezweni elizoqikisekiswa ngosuku nesikhathi okusazoqinisekiswa emahoreni angu-24. IKaizer Chiefs ingathumela kwiCaf ubufakazi nezindleko engene kuzo, izodlulisela ekomitini elifanele elizonquma ukuthi ngubani okufanele azikhokhe. Sithembele ekubambisaneni nawe okujwayelekile ngalesi sikhathi lapho izinyathelo ebezingalindelekile kufanele zithathwe."Okhulumela iChiefs, uVina Maphosa uthe ihhovisi labo livalile ngoba kade kuyiSonto. Wathi bazophawula namuhla ngesiphakamiso seCaf.
title: Isinqumo seCaf ngomdlalo weChiefs neWydad

text: UKAPUTENI weSuperSport United, uDean Furman, uthi kubuhlungu ukuthi uzobe ebabukela nezihlwele ozakwabo belwela ukuqeda okungenani endaweni yesihlanu emdlalweni wokugcina we-Absa Premiership.UFurman ube yisisulu sikanompempe, uPhelelani Ndaba, owamkhomba ngaphandle bedlala neBidvest Wits koweligi emasontweni edlule. UNdaba osemisiwe akagcinanga ngokunikeza uFurman ikhadi elibomvu elashiya abanye beshaya amakhala kodwa wabuye waphika igoli leWits kulo mdlalo owagcina uphele ngo 1-1.NgoMgqibelo i-United izosonga imidlalo yeligi neHighlands Park, eLucas Moripe Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.Amatsatsantsa a Pitori ahleli endaweni yesithupha ngamaphuzu awu-44. IHighlands yona ibambe indawo yesishiyagalombili ngamaphuzu awu-30, okusho ukuthi iyawadinga amaphuzu ukuze igcine indawo kwiTop 8.UFurman uthe yize ezobe engekho kodwa uthemba ukuthi ozakwabo bazokwazi ukuphushela ukuthi okungenani bathole indawo yesihlanu kwi-log.“Ngiphoxeke kakhulu (ngokungadlali). Akukaze kube mnandi ukumiswa kodwa yinto okumele uyamukele. Ngithemba ukuthi ozakwethu bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayawenza umsebenzi ukuze okungenani siqede endaweni yesihlanu. IHighlands iyiqembu eliqinile futhi ilwela iTop 8 okuzokwenza umdlalo ube nzima kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi sivale kahle,” kusho uFurman.Uthe ukuqeda ngamaphuzu amathathu ngokwakhe kuzosho ukuvala kahle kwazise isizini yabo ayibona ibe ngengcono.Ngesizini edlule i-United ike yathwala kanzima ivika izembe, yagcina ingene ngemizuzu yokugcina kwiTop 8.Lo mdlali oyixova esiswini yize edumele ngokungadlali eqenjini lakhe kodwa ukulangazelele ukuba seqenjini leBafana Bafana elizoyibamba kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ngoJuni e-Egypt.“Kuzoba yinto enhle kakhulu kimina ukuya kwi-Afcon. Sengidlale kabili kwi-Afcon. Yilapha (ngo-2013) eyayifana nomuzwa weNdebe yoMhlaba kimina njengoba ngangikhekho kuleso sikwati. Sibuye saya e-Equatorial Guinea. Yize siphume esigabeni samaqoqo khona kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi uma ngibizwa nabanye ababekhona leso sipiliyoni singalisiza iqembu. Ngicabanga ukuthi wonke umuntu njengamanje uzikhandlela ukuthi abe khona esikwatini,” kusho uFurman.
title: Ubalisa ngokungabi khona ezakhe zivala isizini

text: ABEZWA mshini abantu abathwala izizumbulu zemali ngoplastiki bayozifaka ebhizinisini okukholakala ukuthi yibhanoyi elikuKeate Street eMnambithi.Okuheha abantu ngaleli bhizinisi elibizwa, ngeBitcoin Wallet, wukuthi libabuyisela imali yabo isiphindwe kabili ngemuva kwezinsuku ezingu-15.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe ngeSonto livakashele kuleya ndawo, bekunolayini omude ngendlela exakile, abantu abangaphezu kuka-200 beshaye ujenga. Bonke bebelengise izikhwama kucacile ukuthi baphethe imali abazoyifaka. Kubantu lisematheni igama lomnikazi waleli bhizinisi uMnuz Siphelele “Sgumza” Mbatha osebizwa ngo'Nkulunkulu’ waseMnambithi ngenxa yaleli bhizinisi. Ngemuva kokubuza ukuthi ugcina kubani ulayini, kwabebeklele kuwona, intatheli iphendulwe ngokuthi ulayini ewubonayo ngowosuku lwangakusasa.“Sizolala kulayini sesilungisela usuku lwakusasa. Abebekule ndawo izolo yibona abafaka imali yabo namhlanje,” kuphendula onqabile negama lakhe.“Ngaqala ngafaka uR1 000 ezinyangeni ezimbili ezidlule ngemuva kokuyalelwa umngani wami."Nganginovalo kodwa ngemuva kwezinsuku eziwu-15 ngathola R2 000. Njengoba ungibona ngiyofaka enye ethe xaxa. Simlethelwe uNkulunkulu uSgumza,” kusho owesifazane ongathandanga negama lakhe.Osondelene nezikhulu zale nkampani uthe ngesonto bangaphezulu kwenkulungwane abantu abafaka imali yabo.“Sikhuluma ngabantu abafaka imali esuka kuR1 000 abanye bafike nengaphezu kukaR2 million izofakwa la. Abanye basula emsebenzini bathathe imali abayitholayo bayifake kwiBitcoin Wallet futhi iyabuya isiphindwe kabili. Abantu bayazi ukuthi leli bhanoyi lizowa kodwa akekho owaziyo ukuthi lophahlazeka nini,” kusho umthombo.Umlisa ohlala emgwaqweni uthe selokhu kwaqala leli bhizinisi balala bebomvu yimali nsuku zonke.“Ngiyawuhlanganisa uR300 kuya kuR400 ngosuku ngokumela abantu abasuke benqena ukulala kulayini."Selokhu kuqale leli bhizinisi ezinyangeni eziyisikhombisa ezedlule, baningi abantu okuvela ukuthi sebehlomule imali eshisiwe ngokuyitshala kulona ibuye isiphindwe”.Abapotshozele leli phendandaba bathe kubantu abafaka imali kukhona amaphoyisa, izifundiswa, osomabhizinisi, abahlengikazi nabantu abajwayelekile.Ukungena nje kulo mgwaqo ukhangwa olayini babantu abalinganiselwa ku-300.Sekunezinkulumo zokuthi leli bhizinisi alikho emthethweni futhi liyaphambana nemigomo elawula ukuphathwa kwemali kuleli.Kodwa okhulumela amaHawks, uCaptain Simphiwe Mhlongo, uthe akukho cala abaliphenyayo njengamanje, kuphela basezwe ngabezindaba ngaleli gidigidi.“Sisathole imibuzo kwabezindaba kuphela akekho osabikile noma ovule icala ngokwenzeka eMnambithi. AmaHawks ngeke akwazi ukuvula icala wona uqobo,” kusho uCaptain Mhlongo.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaMbatha ngaphakathi ebhizinisi ayiphumelelanga. Onogada bale nkampani nabantu abebekolayini obheke emahhovisi, bale ukhasha basabisa nangokwenza mnyama intatheli ebifuna uSgumza. Ngesikhathi benyukelwa ushukela bexosha abezindaba, imoto okuvele ukuthi ekaMbatha esawolintshi, idlule kwaqhuma umkikizo namakhwela abanye bekhuleka bethi: “Nangu uNkulunkulu waseMnambithi."
title: Abezwa lutho abagaya imali ehlane

text: UCHAZWE njengomuntu onenhliziyo enhle umfundi waseMbilwi Secondary School eLimpopo ozibulele kulandela ukusabalala kwe-video yakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ehlukunyezwa omunye umfundi.Kube nomunyu namhlanje enkonzweni yomngcwabo kaLufuno Mavhunga (15) ozibulale ngoMsombuluko kulandela ukuhlukunyezwa umfundi alingana naye okubikwa ukuthi uboshiwe namhlanje ekuseni. Oyedwa wozakwabo esikoleni uchaze uLufuno njengomuntu obethanda ukusiza abantu futhi enomoya omuhle. Omunye umfundi uthe kwaba buhlungu bebona izibazi zokushaywa ebusweni bakhe bazi ukuthi ushaywe esukelwa. “Kwakuyini icala lakhe? Ukuthula? Ukuba nobuntu? Ngangifa yintukuthelo ngesikhathi ekhala, kodwa ngingakwazi kwenza lutho,” kuchaza lo mfundi ekhala. “Mhlawumbe ukube sangenelela ngabe usaphila namhlanje. Noma isinqumo sakhe sibuhlungu, usendaweni engcono manje - ukhululekile kulabo abebengafuni ukumbona ejabule.”Kwi-video eyacasula abaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kubonakala omunye umfundi eshaya uLufuno ngezimpama ephindelela. Lo mfundi akaphindiseli kunalokho uyazixolisela abuze ukuthi yini icala lakhe. Abanye abafundi babekhiphe amaselula beqopha ama-video  abanye  bekhuthaza lo owayemshaya. ULufuno utholwe ngunina eseshonile ngemuva kokuphuza inqwaba yamaphilisi ezibulala.
title: Ubefisa ukuba wudokotela umfundi waseLimpopo ozibulele

text: UNGQONGQOSHE waPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthukuthele uyaveva ngenxa yabantu abazibiza ngaye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Kuthiwa bayanda abantu abalokhu bezibiza ngoCele ekubeni ihhovisi lakhe laze lakhipha isixwayiso ngalabo Cele mbumbulu abankanise ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Ihhovisi likaCele lithi lo ngqongqoshe akekho nhlobo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Uphenyo loPhiko loKlebe selidumela emansumpeni njengoba kungasekude kubanjwe lezi zigilamkhuba. "UNgqongqoshe uCele wakusho kudala ukuthi akekho nhlobo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Washo futhi ukuthi iyamcika lento yabantu abazenza yena kulezi zinkundla,"kusho isitatimende esikhishwe yihhovisi likaCele ngoLwesihlanu.Kuthiwa njengamanje abalelwa ku-160 ama-akhawunti akuTwitter okuthiwa akaCele. Kukhona nakuFacebook. Abazenza uCele kuthiwa baze bafake nezithombe zakhe kube amaprofiles.Enye yalama-account inabalandeli abangaphezu kuka-60 000 abakholelwa ukuthi baxhumana noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uma bengena kuyona. "Kufanele kwazeke ukuthi maningi amacala axazululwe ngokuthi kube khona abampimpayo, eminye imininingwane eyimfihlo beyidluliswa ngqo kuNgqongqoshe uCele ngamalungu omphakathi." Lesi sitatimende sithe kungenzeka abanye bathi bampimpa izigilamkhuba kuCele kanti sebehleba kubantu abangalungile.
title: UCele uthukuthele uyaveva ngabazenza yena ezinkundleni zokuxhumana

text: AMADODANA enkosi uVela “Imisebeyelanga” Shembe athi azolinda umbiko kadokotela ngokumthathile njengoba nawo abengazi ukuthi kunesifo esimphethe.Izolo amadodana eMisebe, oMnuz Sandile (27), Wandile (27) noSibongeleni (31) ngesikhathi enengxoxo ekhethekile neSolezwe KwaNomakhanzana eMthwalume, athe kusenzima ukukholwa wukuthi uyise ukhotheme ngoba akukho abakubona okuyizinkomba zokuthi uyahamba.“Ngangikhona lapha ekhaya ngelanga ashona ngalo, wayezikhulumela kungekho okusolisayo. Into abeke akhale ngayo yizinyawo ezibuhlungu kwesinye isikhathi athi ziyabanda sengathi uhamba emaqhweni. Asikho isifo ebesisazi ebesingaze simthathe, sesiyobona umbiko kodokotela ngokumthathile,” kusho uWandile.USandile oyiwele likaWandile uthe akuvumi amukele ukuthi uyise usedlulile emhlabeni ngoba ngezinye izikhathi uke avuke azitshele ukuthi uzombona.“Ubaba ubeyikho konke kithina, ubenothando olumangalisayo. Kumanje siwumndeni siyazibuza ukuthi ngubani ozovala isikhala sokuthanda umndeni ngaleya ndlela abesithanda ngayo,” kusho uSandile.Imisebeyelanga ibiyiwele noMnuz Nhlanhla Shembe owenda ngo-2004. Yize amadodana ezalwa nguNhlanhla kodwa akhuliswe yiMisebeyelanga.“Kusukela sibancane sikhulele kubaba Imisebe, ubaba uNhlanhla ubekhona kodwa engasebenzi. Inkosi iyona ebisenzela yonke into, ize yahamba singaphansi kwayo,” kusho uWandile.Imisebe ibikhulisa izingane zomfowabo eziyisishiyagalombili nezingane zayo eziyisishiyagalombili oSlindokuhle, Nyameka, Namisa, Nala, Mthandi,Thabisa, Mthobi noSthande. Ibisebenza eNhlanhlayethu High, eNanda kodwa yayeka ngo-2011 emuva kokukhothama kwenkosi uVimbeni “uThingo” Shembe.“Ubaba obesondla lapha ekhaya ngoba thina besingakayitholi imisebenzi. Umama uMaChili akasebenzi, nogogo wethu uMaZondo ubebheke yena ubaba. Njengoba esehambile siyathemba uzosibheka iminyango ivuleke,” kusho uWandile.USibongeleni uthe uyise yize ebeyinkosi kodwa kubona ubengubaba.“Ubengaziphathisi okwenkosi kithina esiyizingane zakhe, ubengubaba esihlala naye sixoxe. Ubemesaba kakhulu uNkulunkulu, enesineke, ezithobile futhi engezwani nehlazo,” kusho uSibongeleni.UWandile ofundela ukupheka, uyena obejwayele ukwenzela uyise ukudla uma ekhona.“Ubekhonze ukudla kwesintu kakhulu nokunye okumnandi. Ubekhonze isitambu, ubhatata namadumbe. Namatabanga ubewathanda kakhulu. Esezoshona nje wayekade ecele amadumbe kwasho ukuthi awekho wagcina edle ubhatata, “ kusho uWandile.Ekhaya obekuhlala kulona Imisebe abantu bebematasa izolo kucentwa kwenziwa neminye imisebenzi.Abantu bebefika bezobhonga emswaneni kuphithizela nabazalwane.Okhulumela uhlangothi lwaseThembezinhle, uMnuz Nkululeko Mthethwa, uthe kusasa bahlela isithangami nabezindaba eThekwini lapho bezokhipha konke mayelana nohlelo lwenkonzo yokuthuna inkosi. Uthe okwamanje alukho usuku oselubekiwe lokuthuna inkosi.
title: ‘Sizolinda umbiko kadokotela’

text: UKUTHATHA noma ukuthenga amakhondomu kuseyinto engelula kubantu abasha yize emahhala.Lokhu kushiwo uMnuz Teboho Mofokeng osebenzisana nomngani wakhe uMnuz Thabang Mohapi, ohlelweni abalubiza ngePlay it Safe. Bakha amabhokisi anemidwebo nemibhalo esetshenziswa yintsha uma ikhuluma ngocansi.UMofokeng noMohapi baseLamontville, eThekwini, bathi lolu hlelo baluqale ngoba bebona ukuthi kunzima ukuthenga ikhondomu uma kunabantu abaningi, umuntu ujika esefikile esitolo.“Singabantu abasha siyasaba ukuthi kwaziwe ukuthi sesizibandakanya nocansi, sesaba ukuthi kuzothiwani? Kanti lokho kuholela ekutheni siye ocansini olungaphephile. Ezikhungweni zikahulumeni, amakhondomu amahhala kodwa kunzima kithina ukuthi siye. Sikhethe ukuthi sisebenzise ubuciko bethu sidwebe izinto abantu abasha abazaziyo, senze ibhokisi sifake amakhondomu kulo ukuze bathi behleka babe bewathatha amakhondomu,” kusho uMofokeng.Uthe nakubona bekunzima ukuthi baxoxe ngokukhululeka ngalolu hlelo kubantu abadala, besaba ukuthi le mibhalo nezithombe abanye bazozitolika ngenye indlela.Uqhube wathi ebhokisini ngalinye bafaka amakhondomu atholakala ezikhungweni zempilo zikahulumeni.La mabhokisi uthe bawanikeze intsha ebumnandini nasemicimbini ngoba bayazi ukuthi emicimbini yilapho abantu abasha bezithola sebeye ocansini bengahlelile.EMINYE yemibhalo kumakhondomu okulula ukuthi intsha iwathathe iwasebenzise ngoba asuke edlulisa umyalezo othile“Ibhokisi elibhalwe ingoma ethile noma elinomdwebo umuntu omusha ulithatha ngokushesha. Afunde ahleke ngoba lezi zingoma zisuke zinezinto ezithinta ucansi. Amanye amabhokisi anezithombe ezikhuzayo, ezinye ziyahlekisa. Leli bhokisi umuntu omusha uma elithatha uyahleka, akhombise omunye, kuqale ingxoxo ngocansi okuyinto esifisayo ukuthi abantu abasha bakhulume ngayo. Uma kufika isikhathi sokuthi kuyiwe ocansini ikhondomu isuke ikhona.”Ngengoba kuqala isonto lokukhuthaza ukuthi kusetshenziswe amakhondomu, iCondom Week ngoLwesihlanu, uMofokeng uthe bazoya ezindaweni ezinentsha bayinikeze amakhondomu.
title: Banohlelo lwentsha namakhondomu

text: BATHWALE kanzima ochwepheshe abebejutshwe KwaHlathi, eMnambithi, ukuzohlola “amadayimane” emva kokuthi lo mphakathi uvuke umbhejazane, unqaba ukubanikeza amasampula ngoba unovalo lokuthi kungenzeka angabuyiselwa.Noma begcine kukhona abakutholile, kusize ubudlelwano benkosi yendawo, uMnuz Sphiwe Kunene nowesilisa wendawo, ovumile ukulinikezela enkosini “idayimane” lakhe ngethemba lokuthi inkosi ngeke imholele ophathe.Ochwepheshe bathembise umphakathi ukuthi ngeke iphele inyanga bengabuyanga nezimpendulo ukuthi abakumbayo yidayimane noma cha.Awuzimisele ngokusuka endaweni yawo umphakathi uma kugcina kutholakala ukuthi abakumbayo yidayimane uqobo.Bafuna uhulumeni abeke bona phambili ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukisa le ndawo. Laba bantu sebebeke ithemba labo lokuphuma enhluphekweni kwabakumbayo.Iningi eliqhamuka kude lilala emigodini eliyimbayo abanye balale ezimotweni abafika ngazo.Izingane, intsha, abesifazane asebekhulile namadoda emizi yawo, babona le nto ebehlele njengenhlanhla yabo evela kuMdali ukuba azophucula isizwe sabo ebubheni obusikhungethe.Lokhu ukubona ngolaka olubavukayo uma kukhona okubaphazamisayo noma obaphula umoya ngezinsolo zokuthi akulona idayimane abakumbayo.Sekukhona nasebevule amabhizinisi badayisa ukudla, utshwala neziphuzo ezihlohlozayo zokubuyisa amandla njengoba kumbiwa ubusuku nemini.Abantu abebehlukene ngamaqoqo ububafica bemba imigodi bebheka ’idayimane’ abanye ubathole emfuleni bewasha abakutholayo.Iningi labantu livuka ngesikabhadakazi linikele kule ndawo eyiqele enamatshe nentaba, liyomba.Bathe abafune kususwa kule ndawo ngenkolelo yokuthi abakumbayo uidayimane elizobakhipha enhluphekweni, endlaleni nasosizini lokungabibikho kwemisebenzi.NgoLwesibili emini kufike izikhulu ebezivela ezinhlakeni zikhulumeni ezihlukahlukene ziholwa uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha nokoNgiwa kweMvelo eKZN, uMnuz Ravi Pillay nobuholi bendabuko, bezoxoxa nabambayo.Bacele abantu abebemba ukuthi babambisana nophenyo lochwepheshe abavela eMnyangweni wezokuMbiwayo nezaMandla.UMnuz Mondli Mazibuko uthe yintsha egcwele embayo okuyizinkomba zokungabi bikho kwemisebenzi. Abantu baphila ngemali yempesheni nesibonelelo sikahulumeni.“Asifuni uhulumeni njengoba esengenelela agcine esesiphuca umhlaba wethu nesesizitholele khona. Esikutholayo kuzosiza kudale amathuba emisebenzi, kuthuthukiswe intsha,” kusho uMazibuko.UMnuz Bhutiza Msibi uthe izikhulu zikahulumeni ziwathathile amasampula zabakumbayo ukuba ziyokuhlola. Uthe bafuna ukuhlomula uma kuwukuthi idayimane langempela.“Isinqumo sokugcina siyophuma enkosini ukuthi kwenziwani. Kodwa sicela ukubhekelelwa ngemisebenzi uma kuwukuthi kunezinhleo zokuthuhukisa le ndawo,” kusho uMsibi.Inkosi uKunene ikhathazekile ngezinkumbi zabathutheleka kule ndawo abangaqhelelene ngebanga. UKunene uthe ukhulumile nabantu ebaxwayisa ngobungozi bokuminyana kwabo.“Kuyangikhathaza nokuthi laba bantu bacekelaphansi imvelo. Uma bemba bashiya kanjalo. Kunemigodi eminingi ezothwalisa kanzima imfuyo,” kusho uKunene.U-Pillay uthe okwabo ukunika umkhombandlela ngokumele kwenzeke.
