Uthe senzekile isigameko esifuze lesi KwaMachi, eHarding, umphakathi uthi uhlabene ngegolide okwagcina kuvelile ukuthi kakulona.“Sicela abantu babekezele, babambisane nathi ngesikhathi kusahlolwa amatshe atholiwe. Sithemba ukuthi akuzothatha isikhathi eside,” kusho uPillay.UMnuz Siyabonga Vezi, imenenja ebambile KwaZulu-Natal eMnyangweni weziMbiwayo nezaMandla, uthe bayalelwe ungqongqoshe (uMnuz Gwede Mantashe) ukuthi baqale uhlelo lokuzohlola le ndawo namasampula. Uthe bazocwaningisisa bese beyabuya, bezobikela zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo.“Kuseva ukuthi kukhona esingakuqagela njengamanje. Kube khona amalungu omphakathi asinike amatshe athile esizowacubungulisisa bese siyababuyisela wona nombiko ogcwele,” kusho uVezi.
title: Banqabe ukunika ochwepheshe ‘amadayimane’ eMnambithi

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWESIDUME umhlaba wonke isitayela sokuzithwebula ngeselula esibizwa nge-selfie. Kungabe uzithwebula wedwa noma uzithwebula nabangani bakho, lesi sitayela sidla ubhedu kulezi zinsuku.Abantu abangakuqapheli kodwa uma bethatha i-selfie bebaningi yingozi abazibeka kuyona ngasohlangothini lwezempilo.Ongoti sebeqhamuke nesexwayiso sokuthi lo mkhuba wokuthatha ama-selfie ungabeka abantu enkingeni yokuthelelana ngezintwala, njengoba abantu besondelana kakhulu ikakhulukazi ngamakhanda uma bezishutha.Usokhemesi uGiulia Criscuolo uthi imvamisa izintwala zivame ezinganeni ezisakhula futhi kulula ukuthi uthelele omunye umuntu ngazo nangokusebenzisa izigqoko, amathawula, amakama, ama-brush nemicamelo.Ongoti sebexwayise ngokuthi izingane zithelelana ngezintwala ngokushutha ama-selfie nabangani bazo. UCriscuolo uthi izingane kumele zixwayiswe kakhulu ngokuthintana ngamakhanda, ikakhulukazi ngezinsuku zesikole.“Izingane zivamise ukuhlala zisondelane ikakhulukazi uma zisebenzisa izinto zobuchwepheshe noma zithatha ama-selfie, okungaholela ekutheni zithelelane ngezintwala,” usho kanje.Weluleke abazali ngezinto ezingagwema ukuthelelana ngezintwala yilezi:n Fundisa ingane yakho ukuthi ingasebenzisi nabanye abantu izinto zasekhanda noma ithintane ngekhanda nabanye abantu ngesikhathi besebenzisa amaselula noma ama-tablet.n Uma ingane yakho inezinwele ezinde, qinisekisa ukuthi zihlale ziboshiwe ukuze zihlale zithothene.n Njalo ngesonto hlola izinwele zengane yakho imizuzu engu-10 kukhanya bha ukuze ubone kahle ikhanda.n Uma ingane yakho inezintwala, ungayiyisi esikole, bikela uthisha ngokushesha.n Ukwelapha izintwala, sebenzisa i-shampoo eyenzelwe ukuzibulala etholakala emakhemesi. Ikhona nemithi yokuzigwema.
title: I-selfie ingenza izingane zithelelane ngezintwala

text:
SINYUKELE ku-3 158 isibalo sabantu abaphethwe yiCovid-19 kuleli kanti leli gciwane seliphinde ladlula nabanye abantu ababili osekubeke isibalo sabashonile ku-54. Lokhu kudalulwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli uMnuz Zweli Mkhize oveze ukuthi abashonile ngoyedwa waseWestern Cape nomunye waKwaZulu-Natal. "Lokhu kubeka isibalo sabashonile ku-54. Sidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini, sibonge nabasebenzi bezempilo abebebanakekele ezibhedlela ngaphambi kokuthi bashone," kusho uMkhize ngeSonto ebusuku. IGauteng isahamba phambili ngesibalo sabantu abahaqwe yiCovid-19 kuleli njengoba bebalelwa ku-1 148. EWestern Cape bawu-868, KwaZulu-Natal bawu-617, e-Eastern Cape basawu-293. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID_19?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID_19cases is 3158 and the death toll is now 54. 
pic.twitter.com/1FEV4h24D8— Dr Zweli Mkhize (@DrZweliMkhize)UNgqongqoshe izolo uphinde waveza ukuthi sebewu-114 711 abantu abahlolelwe iCovid-19 kuleli kanti isibalo sabahlolwayo siyanyuka nsuku zonke. "INingizimu Afrika ihamba phambili ngesibalo sabantu asebehloliwe e-Afrika. Sifisa ukugcizelela ukuthi lesi sibalo asibali ukuhlolwa kwabantu okwesibili. Umuntu uhlolwa okwesibili ukuze aqinisekise noma uma esefuna ukubona ukuthi usesindile yini," kusho uMkhize. UMkhize ube nomhlangano nabaholi bezifundazwe ngoMgqibelo lapho kuvele khona ukuthi kunezinkinga emajele ase-Eastern Cape kwaphinde kwavela nokuthi basengcupheni abahambela imingcwabo. "Sesikugcizelelile ukubaluleka kokuthi imingcwabo ihanjelwe yisibalo esincane sabantu ngoba izinto ezenziwa emingcwabeni zingasidalela izinkinga. Sikuqaphile ukuthu abantu abahambela imingcwabo (ngisho bengekho ngaphezulu kuka-50) bazifaka engcupheni yokuthola iCovid-19 ngenxa yezinto ezenziwa uma kufihlwa," usho kanje.
title: #Coronavirus: Siphinde sanyuka esabashonile KwaZulu-Natal naseWestern Cape

text: USEMANZINI umndeni weSolezwe ngemuva kokushona kubeyintatheli yezemidlalo uNduduzo Dladla.Izindaba ngoMgabadeli zifike izolo ekuseni nokushaqise wonke umsebenzi waleli phephandaba. Ushone ngemuva kokugula isikhashana.UDladla (32) odabuka e-Enseleni, eGreytown, ufike kwiSolezwe ngo-2018. Kulesi sikhashana ekhona umsebenzi wakhe ubuzikhulumela.Le nsizwa ebisencane, iyibekile induku ebandla nokugqame ngonyaka ka-2019. Ngalo nyaka uhlabane ngomklomelo weKZN Sports Journalist of the Year.Kuthe kusajatshulelwa lokho, kwadlula izinyanga wabuya nomklomelo weSA Sports Journalist of the Year.Njengoba unyaka ka-2020 ubunezivuvaba ngenxa yeCovid-19, uDladla uhambe kusawuyena intatheli ekhonyawo kwezemidlalo njengoba nyakenye ingazange ibe khona imicimbi yale miklomelo.Umhleli wezemidlalo obambile, uLungile Majoka, ukhalisane nomndeni, izihlobo, nabangani ngokudlula kwaleli qhawe ebeliselisha.“Ngizoqlala ngokucelela umndeni wakhe amandla okubhekana nalesi simo.  Ngiyazi ukuthi ubuhlungu benu bungaphezulu kwalobu esibuzwayo. Kubuhlungu futhi akukholakali okwenzekile. Besinethemba lokuthi sisazobuye sihlangane noNdu uma sekuphele lo mkhuhlane ofikile njengoba okwamanje sisebenzela emakhaya. Sizomkhumbula ngokufika akhombise intshisekelo anayo nokuhlale elwela ukuthola iqiniso emsebenzini wakhe. Sisebenzisane kahle naye futhi besisabheke ukuhlabana okukhulu kuyena.“Ngala mazwi angizikhulumeli mina kodwa ngikhulumela bonke ozakwethu, abasekhona nalabo abangasekho enkampanini,” kusho uMajoka.Hamba kahle Mgabadeli, ulale ngokuphumula!
title: Hamba kahle Mgabadeli

text: UKHALA akaphezi umfana (13), owayenesifiso sokuthuthukisa ulwazi lwakhe ebholeni phesheya kwezilwandle, kodwa kwaba nezinsolo zokuthi wenzelwa phansi uMnyango wezaseKhaya.UGeorge Maskini, waseBrooklyn eMilnerton, ubopha lo mnyango ufuna ukukhokhelwa uR461 000.Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo, umndeni uthi ubudedengu balo mnyango yibona obaholela ekutheni ungakhiphi amaphepha okuyiwo ngohambo lwakhe lokuya eThailand naseDubai.Sekube yiziqubu ezimbili uGeorge ezama ukuhamba kodwa kungalungi.Okokuqala ithuba lakhe lashabalala emva kokuthi uthisha wakhe emqoqele imali yokuthi abambe iqhaza kwiPhuket, eThailand ngoNovemba ngonyaka odlule.Okwamvimbela kulokhu, kwaba wukuthi iminyaka yakhe ayimvumeli ukuthi athole i-passport yakuleli ngoba abazali bakhe bangabokudabuka eDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC).Kwaze kwadingeka ukuthi kungenele iPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya, uFatima Chohan, owamnikeza okwakucatshangwa ukuthi yi-passport, kodwa ekugcineni kwatholakala ukuthi yincwadi nje yokuhamba ekhombisa ubuzwe bakhe bokuthi ungowakuleli.Isidididi sasuswa wukuthi kwakune-barcode kuleyo ncwadi eyayithi ungowaseDRC.Kwagcina ngokuthi angakwazi ukuhamba ayoba yingxenye yomqhudelwano eThailand.Okwesibili kwaba wuhambo lwakhe lapho kwakumele aye eDubai. Ngaphambi kokuthi aye eDubai, unina waya eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya ngenhloso yokuthola i-passport yomntwana.Akwakwazanga nangelelo langa ukuya eDubai ngoba watshelwa esikhumulweni sezindiza ukuthi ngeke akwazi ukuhamba neqembu lakhe ngoba i-passport ayithola kwiPhini likaNgqongqoshe, kwatholakala ukuthi ilahlekile nokuthi intshontshiwe.“Okusenze sayisa umnyango enkantolo wudaba lwaseDubai.“Ngenkathi ngiya kulo mnyango akekho ofune ukunginikeza impendulo ecacile,” kusho unina walo mfana uNkk Bampende Maskini.“Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi siqedela amaphepha esizowahambisa eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya masishane emva kokuthi wehlulekile ukuphendula incwadi ebesibabhalele yona,” kusho ummeli womndeni, uMnuz Romeo Tsusi..Ngesikhathi sokuloba umnyango uthe ubungakawatholi amaphepha avela kubameli balo mndeni, ngakho ngeke ukwazi ukuphawula.
title: Umfana (13) ubopha umnyango

text: UNGQONGQOSHE omusha wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, ugxeke amaqembu aphikisayo ngokusebenzisa isigameko sokubulawa kwamaphoyisa aseNgcobo ukuze abukwe.Izolo amaqembu aphikisayo ephalamende asole amaphoyisa ngokungawenzi kahle umsebenzi esho nokuthi ukube ithimba lezobuNhloli belisebenza kahle belizoshesha lizwe ngezinhlelo zokuhlaselwa kwesiteshi saseNgcobo.UCele uthe, inhliziyo yakhe ibuhlungu kakhulu ngokwenzeke eNgcobo, ngeke akwazi ukuqala inkulumo mpikiswano.Uthe ngesonto elilodwa ushonelwe ngamaphoyisa ayisishiyagalolunye, amahlanu abulewe eNgcobo kanti  amathathu ashone engozini yemoto ngesikhathi esuka eNorth West ebheke enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo yawaseNgcobo. Iphoyisa elilodwa libulawe KwaMaphumulo, KwaZulu-Natal.UMnuz Zakhele Mbhele uthe ukungabikho kwabaphathi abaneziqu ezifanele noqeqesho olubhedayo yikona okuholele ekubulawe kwamaphoyisa aseNgcobo.Amanye amalungu athe ukungasebenzi kahle kwezobunhloli yikona okuholele ekubulaweni kwamaphoyisa. UCele uthe uMbhele kufanele ahambele imingcwabo yamaphoyisa abulelwe esikhundleni sokufuna ukubukwa ephalamende. "Njengephoyisa ngizwe ubuhlungu obuyisimanga ngalesi sigameko. Kufanele uhambele imingcwabo yamaphoyisa ukuze uzoziphathisa okomuntu hhayi okwesilwane njengoba wenza," kusho uCele. Uthe uMbhele kufanele akhumbule ukuthi amaphoyisa angabantu angawagxeki ngoba efuna ukubukwa. Uxwayise iFreedom Front Plus ngokuhlomisa izakhamuzi zezwe esho ukuthi kuzokwenzeka okufuze e-United States of America lapho izingane zivele zidubule ezinye ezikoleni. Uthe bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuvikela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika baqinise nomkhankaso wokuvikela abesifazane nezingane. UMnuz Jerome Maake oyilungu le-ANC, uthe, iphalamende ngeke lixoxe ngokubulawa kwamaphoyisa zonke izinsuku kodwa kufanele lize nezixazululo. UMnuz Marshall Dlamini we-EFF, uthe, ngesikhathi uhulumeni ehlenga izingane ezingu-18 esontweni laseNgcobo, kwakufanele amaphoyisa enze okuthile ngalo ngoba izigebengu eziwabulele bezihlala kulo. UMnuz Manzoor Shaik Emam we-NFP, uthe, amaphoyisa adinga ukuvikelwa ngoba ahlaselwa nxazonke. "Uhulumeni kufanele eze nezinhlelo zokuvikela amaphoyisa ngoba abulawa ngesihluku yizigebengu," kusho u-Emam.
title: UCele ugxeka amalungu ephalamende

text: ZANELE MTHETHWAABENHLANGANO yezitabane bathi isinqumo sendodakazi yoMbhishobhi omkhulu osewathatha umhlalaphansi uDesmond Tutu eshiye ubufundisi ngoba isishade nowesifazane sizovula inkundla yokuthi kubuyekezwe imithetho yamabandla.Lokhu kushiwo nguNksz Nonhlanhla Mkhize, ongumholi weDurban Lesbian and Gay Community, emuva kokuba uMpho Tutu ephawule kabanzi ngokushiya kwakhe ubufundisi.URev Canon Mpho Tutu, obengumfundisi e-Anglican Church, washada noSolwazi Marceline van Furth eNetherlands ngoDisemba babuye baqedela umcimbi kuleli ngoMeyi.Umshado wabo ushaqise abaningi njengoba uMpho Tutu ebengakaze aphumele obala ngempilo yakhe.Ngenyanga edlule umemezele ukuthi uyahoxa ekubeni ngumfundisi wathi ubone kungcono aphume ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa yisithunzi.Kuvele ukuthi emuva komshado watshelwa ebandleni ukuthi uzophucwa ilayisensi yokusebenza njengomfundisi wathi ubone kungcono asheshe ahoxe.Ekhuluma nomthombo wezindaba i-BBC ngesonto eledlule uMpho Tutu uthe usale nesilonda njengoba kungabanga yisinqumo esivela ekujuleni kwenhliziyo yakhe ukushiya ubufundisi.Uthe uzwa sengathi kuhlephuke ingxenye yakhe ethile.“Kubuhlungu kakhulu kimina, akwamukeleki. Muva nje bengigubha nobaba iminyaka aseyichithe ebufundisini. Manje ukuba kulesi simo sokwazi ukuthi ngeke ngisaphinde ngisebenze naye ebufundisini kuyangithu-nuka kakhulu. Namanje angikwazi ukuchaza indlela engiphatheke ngayo,” usho kanje.UNksz Mkhize, othe uyasincoma isibindi sikaMpho Tutu sokuphumela obala, uthe kusenzima ukulungisa udaba lwezitabane emabandleni. Yize ethe seziyamukeleka emphakathini nasezindaweni zokusebenza kodwa kunzima ukulwa udaba lwasemaba-ndleni. Inkinga enkulu emabandleni wukuthi uma ugcotshwa uthatha izifungo ezithize, akufani nokuqashwa kunoma yimuphi umsebenzi. Imithetho yamabandla iseyinselelo futhi iyacindezela. Kusazothatha isikhathi ukulwa nalokhu kodwa siyathemba ukuthi udaba lukaTutu luzovula amehlo abaningi emabanldeni.”Uthe alubamangazanga lolu daba ngoba bayazi ukuthi izitabane zisacindezelekile emabandleni. Uthe abanye bagcina befihla impilo abayiphilayo.UNksz Mkhize uthe yize beyihlonipha imithetho yamabandla kodwa abaqondi ukuthi ukushada nobulili obufanayo kuluphazamisa kanjani ubizo lokuhola ibandla.“Amabandla kusamele abuyekeze imithetho ngoba nawo asahlukene kabili. Kukhona asebezamukela izitabane.“Lolu wudaba okumele ludingidwe ngaphakathi emabandleni ngoba thina singawubanga umsindo ngaphandle, ngeke sishintshe imithetho yamabandla.”Imizamo yokuthola abaholi be-Anglican ibhuntshile. Ihhovisi loMbhishobhi omkhulu uThabo Makgoba lidlulisele intatheli kwisifunda-bhishobhi iSaldhana Bay, naso esikhombe elinye ihhovisi eliseThekwini izingcingo zalo ebezingabanjwa.UMpho Tutu, oke washada nowesilisa phambilini, unezingane ezimbili azithola emshadweni kanti nesithandwa sakhe esisha sinezingane ezimbili zasemshadweni omdala.
title: ‘Amabandla akabuyekeze olwezitabane’

text:
UMENGAMELI wezwe uMnuz Ramaphosa, uthi uzimisele ngokuhlangana neSilo iNkosi King Goodwill Zwelithini ngenhloso yokuthi acacise ngomhlaba ongaphansi kweSilo, Ingonyama Trust, nongaphansi kwamanye amakhosi.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi uhulumeni uzimisele ngokuthi athathe umhlaba kubantu basemakhaya nalowo ongaphansi kwabaholi bendabuko,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ubekhuluma izolo esidlweni sakusihlwa eSefako Makgatho Presidential Guest House ePitoli.Inhloso yokuhlangana kwakhe neSilo, uthe ukudambisa imimoya esinyukile kubaholi bendabuko nakusona iSilo mayelana nalolu daba."Ngizohlangana naso iSilo ukulungisa lolu daba ukuze siqede lokhu kwesaba okukhona naphakathi kwesizwe samaZulu,” kugcizelela uRamaphosa.Kuleli sonto iSilo sixwayise ngokuthi kungase kusuke uthuli lwezichwe uma uhulumeni eke wazama ukuthatha umhlaba ongu-13% ongaphansi kwabaholi bendabuko eNingizimu Afrika.FUNDA: 
ISilo sikhulekele ukuba i-ANC ihlukane phakathi embizweni“Asizimisele nakancane ukuthi sithathe umhlaba ongaphansi kwe Ingonyama Trust. Uhlelo lwethu lokwabiwa komhlaba luzolandela ukusebenza koMthethosisekelo,” ubeke kanje Ramaphosa.Ukhuluma kanjena nje uRamaphosa kuyaqhubeka ukulalelwa kwezicelo emphakthini mayelana nokushintshwa koMthethesisekelo ukuze kuthathwe umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo.Inhloso ukwabela abampofu oningilabo kungabamnyama umhlaba njengoba uhulumeni wobandlululo abaphuca wona. NgokweSilo, uma umhlaba ongaphansi kwe-Ingonyama Trust uthathwa, kuzokusho “Impi yesibili” yokulwela umhlaba, eyokuqala eyaba khona phakathi kwamaZulu namaNgisi.
title: Ngeke siphucwe umhlaba iSilo - Ramaphosa

text: ISINQUMO sikaNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma sokumisa ukudayiswa kukagwayi sandisa amathuba okudayiswa kukagwayi ongumkokotelo nonomthelela omubi ngoba awufaki ntela.Lokhu kube ngezinye zezinto ezibekwe yiFair Trade Independent Tobacco Association (Fita), eNkantolo eNkulu iNorth Gauteng, ePitoli izolo.I-Fita ifake isicelo sokuba sibekwe eceleni isinqumo sikahulumeni sokuba ugwayi ungadayiswa.Yize isicelo sabo sibhekiswe kuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa kodwa bebetinyela kakhulu uDkt Dlamini Zuma esicelweni sabo.AbakwaFita bathe uDkt Dlamini Zuma wehluleke ukubachazela emaphepheni akhe asenkantolo abephendula kulolu daba, ukuthi kungani ugwayi muva nje usuyingozi engaka kwezempilo.Ugxekwe kakhulu ngokufaka ukuthi wancika emibikweni yeWorld Health Organisation (WHO) ngesikhathi enza isinqumo ngodaba lukagwayi.Ummeli weFita, * -Adv Arnold Subel SC, utshele ithimba lamajaji ukuthi kwawona lowo mbiko akhuluma ngawo, okuthiwa kunombiko wangoMeyi 8 no-26, othi akukabi khona umbiko wokugcina oletha ubufakazi bomthelela omubi ngokubhe-bhetheka kwegciwane iCorona.Uthe ngaphezu kwalokhu ukumiswa kokudayiswa kukwagwayi akusizi lutho ngoba abantu ababhemayo basaqhubeka nokubhema.“Ukuvalwa kokudayiswa kukagwayi kwenza kwaba nethuba lokuba kudayiswe ugwayi ongekho emthethweni nongalawulwa. Ukuvalwa kukagwayi inhloso yakho ukuba kungabhenywa kodwa lokho akunjalo,” kusho uSubel.Ubuye wagxeka isenzo sokuvele kumiswe ugwayi esithubeni ekubeni kwaziwa ukuthi kukhona abantu asebeyimilutha yawo abahlala ngokuwubhema nsukuzonke.Kuthiwa uDkt Dlamini Zuma wahluleka nokucabangela abalimi bakagwayi, abasebenzi nabakhiqiza ugwayi.Isinqumo samajaji sisagodliwe.
title: Bahlaba ukumiswa kokudayisa ugwayi

text: KUHLUKANA imibono ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngowesifazane ophenywa nguMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal okuthiwa ubezenza isitshudeni esebenza njengodokotela oyithwasa ezibhedlela ezehlukene ekubeni kusolwa ukuthi akawufundele lo mkhakha.Isishoshovu somkhankaso wokulwa nokunganyuki kwemali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme i-#Fees Must Fall sikulabo abaphawule ngodaba lowesifazane.UMcebo Freedom Dlamini ubhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi uyamazi owesifazane oneminyaka engu-23, okuthiwa ezibhedlela ubethi ufundela ubudokotela eWits University.“Ngeke ngazi noma wagcina eqedile yini ukufundela ubudokotela kodwa ngangimbona esikhungweni. Wayeyilungu leSasco futhi ephambili emzabalazweni weFees Must Fall ngo-2015, ophikweni lwaseParktown. Wayehlala endaweni ebihlala izitshudeni ezifundela ubudokotela eGirton,” kusho uDlamini.Owesifazane Isolezwe elinalo igama lakhe, kuthiwa ubengena ephuma ezibhedlela KwaZulu-Natal, ethunga neziguli ezenza isitshudeni.Udaba lube sematheni nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, abanye bekhala ngobudedengu bomnyango. Abanye bashaye amakhala ngalolu daba, besola ukuthi kukhona okufihliwe ngalo.UDkt Nhlakanipho Mkhize ubhale kwiTwitter echaza ngemigudu elandelwayo uma kwamukelwa isithudeni esibhedlela. Ugcizelele ukuthi isitshudeni asikwazi ukukhipha imithi kodwa siyabukela, sigadwe ngabanye odokotela.UNkk Ncamisile Nkwanyana okhulumela i-IFP kwezempilo, uthe lokhu kwenza bazibuze ukuthi ziphethwe ngendlela efanele yini izibhedlela.“Iziguli ezibhedlela ezahlukene zihlala zikhala ngobudedengu bezitshudeni ezifundela ubudokotela, ezinye zisala zikhubazekile,” kusho yena.UNkk Nkwanyana uthe lobu ubudedengu obuphindiwe, wanxusa umnyango ukuthi uphenye ngokushesha. Uthe okubi ukuthi lolu daba luvele ngesikhathi izwe libhekene neCovid-19, lapho budingeka kakhulu ubuchule bodokotela.UNkk Carol Crosley, iRegistrar yaseWits uthe sebezwile ngalolu daba waqinisekisa ukuthi ngokwamabhuku abo lo wesifazane akakaze afunde kulesi sikhungo.Uthe bazimisele ukukhipha imininingwane efanele kwiziphathimandla uma zifuna okunye ngalolu daba.Ephawula esithangamini nabezindaba ngeSonto, uNgqongqoshe womnyango uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe kukhona necala lobugebengu eliphenywayo kodwa nomnyango uyaziphenyela ngaphakathi.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi isitshudeni sesidlale ngomnyango isikhathi eside. Esikwaziyo ukuthi ngamaholidi izitshudeni ezifundela ubudokotela ziyavunyelwa ukusiza ezibhedlela. Kulolu daba kusolwa ukuthi isitshudeni besingena ezibhedlela sizenza ofundela ubudokotela. Ngeke siphawule kakhulu ngalolu daba ngoba kuyaphenywa,” kusho yena.
title: Kuyaphenywa ngobezenza  udokotela ezibhedlela KwaZulu-Natal

text: IHLULEKILE imizamo yokukhomba indlela uSihlalo weNFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Vikizitha Mlotshwa, emuva kokuthi evunwe yinkantolo yathi ukuxoshwa kwakhe akukho emthethweni.UMlotshwa kulindeleke ukuthi namhlanje ekuseni afungiswe njengelungu lesiShayamthetho laKwaZulu-Natal elimele iNFP.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uMlotshwa uthe uzoqhubeka nokuhola iqembu esifundazweni alimele nasesiShayamthetho.INFP inesihlalo esisodwa esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal esithole ngemuva kokhetho lukazwelonke lwangoMeyi 8.“Wozani esiShayamthetho kusasa (namhlanje) khona nizobona ngifungiswa njengelungu elimele iNFP ngemuva kokuthi inkantolo ishilo ukuthi imizamo yokungixosha ayikho emthethweni,” kusho uMlotshwa.Uthe ukuxoshwa kwakhe bekwenziwa wosikhotheni abangesiwo ngisho amalungu eNFP.“INFP inebhadi ngoba kuvele kuqhamuke umuntu ongesilo ngisho ilungu uzwe kuthiwa ukhulumela iqembu. Yonke le nto eyenziwayo inhloso yayo wukuqeda ngeNFP,” kusho uMlotshwa.Uthe ngeke baze bakuvumele ukuthi iNFP iphele ngoba yakhiwa yibo.“Manje sekufike ekugcineni. Ngeke kuphinde kufike umuntu ongaziwa bese kuthiwa ukhulumela iqembu sibe singalazi ngisho igatsha lakhe. Lo muntu okuthiwa nguMnuz Simo Mkhwanazi asimazi ukuthi ukuliphi igatsha njengoba eseqhamuka sekuthiwa ukhulumela inhlangano,” kusho uMlotshwa.Uthe kwayona incwadi obekuthiwa iyamxosha ibingenalo ngisho usuku lokuthi ibhalwe nini.“Kuthiwa isayinwe ngabantu abathathu, omunye wabo uyikhansela le-Al Jama-ah kanti lona omunye usephumele obala wathi yena akakaze asayine ncwadi, okusho ukuthi kukhona abantu abakokotela indlela asayina ngayo,” kusho uMlotshwa, wengeza ngokuthi lena imizamo yesibili yokumxosha kodwa iyehluleka.Uthe into ebulala kakhulu iqembu wukugxambukela kwezingane zikamengameli wabo uNkk Zanele Magwaza-Msibi ezindabeni zehlangano.“Uma ngigula mina njengoSihlalo weqembu KwaZulu-Natal akusho ukuthi sekumele kungenelele umfana wami uNkalipho akhulume izindaba zeqembu kodwa kwiNFP leyo nto iyenzeka. Izingane zikamengameli zizenzela umathanda zenze sengathi iqembu ngelakubo kwaGumede,” kusho uMlotshwa.Uthe umuntu ofuna isikhundla kwiNFP akaye emagatsheni ayowanxusa ukuthi amvotele ngaphambi kwengqungquthela.
title: Ihlulekile imizamo yokuxosha uSihlalo weNFP

text: Nkosikhona CeleUQONGQOTHWE ngesibhamu esiphundu washaywa waze wasala ngephenti owesifazane waKwaMaphumulo, enyakatho yeKwaZulu-Natal, ejeziselwa ukungasifaki isifonyo.UNksz Zamile Thusi (29) uthi uzizwa edelelekile futhi ethunazeke isithunzi ngalesi sehlo.Uthi bekungoLwesine, ngezithuba zantambama, ezihambela edolobheni KwaDukuza, ngesikhathi kuqhamuka iphoyisa abahilizisane nalo kubangwa indaba yesifonyo. Igama lephoyisa siligodlile njengoba singalitholanga ukuba liziphawulele.Uthe uyavuma ukuthi ubengasifakile njengoba besisesikhwameni futhi uyazi ukuthi kuyiphutha elikhulu.Uthe ngesikhathi esavula isikhwama ekhipha isifonyo, uzwe ngolabhabha wempama esihlathini.“Ngithe ngisadidedikile, leli phoyisa ebelingakhacisa okwengane, langibuza ukuthi yini edala ukuthi ngifune ukuncengwa ngesifonyo? Ngithe ngiyaliphendula, lavele langiphinda ngenye."Uthe iphoyisa limphoqe ukuba angene ngemuva evenini. Nangempela uthe ungenile ngoba bese likhiphe isibhamu. Konke lokhu uthi bekwenzeka phambi kwabantu ebesebemi izixongololo sengathi babukela ibhayisikobho.“Akekho ozihluphile ngokungilamulela. Bebelibele ukubuzana ukuthi ngenzeni?” Uthi iphoyisa libe selihamba naye lamyisa kwenye indawo lapho lifike lamqongqotha ngesibhamu esiphundu futhi lamshaya ngaso endlebeni yangakwesobunxele.“Ngithe ngisababaza lokho, laqhubeka langigandaya kwaba sengathi inkulu into engiyenzile. Lingishaye kwaze kwaklebhuka ingubo yami, ngasala ngephenti. Futhi angisoze ngalukhohlwa empilweni yami loluya suku,” usho kanje.Emuva kwalokho, leli phoyisa uthe limthathile lamyisa esteshini  samaphoyisa saKwaMaphumulo lapho elisebenzela khona.Eqhuba uNksz Thusi, uthe bafike esiteshini iphoyisa lamqambela amanga,  latshela ozakwabo ukuthi ulithimisele ngamathe ngesikhathi limbuza ngesifonyo. Ozakwabo uthe balincomile bathi lenze kahle laqondisa ubugwegwe umuntu ogoloza ukufaka isifonyo.Konke lokhu uthi bekwenzeka phambi komntwana wakhe oneminyaka engu-7.“Kusukela ngalolo suku umntwana wami uhlukumezekile. Uma ebona abantu, uvele abaleke acashe ngimfice ekhala. Akasathandi nokudlala nezinye izingane,” balisa.Uveze nokuthi kuyimanje ugqigqa odokotela njengoba kunegazi elophele ngaphakathi ebuchosheni bakhe kanti nendlebe yakhe eyodwa kayisezwa kahle.“Sengathi uNkulunkulu angangisiza ngilulame. Sengiqala ukuba novalo. Phela kunzima uma kuthiwa kunegazi elophele ngaphakathi ebuchosheni bami,” echaza.Okhulumela i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID), uNksz Ndileka Cola, usigxekile lesi senzo. Ucele ukuba athunyelelwe imininingwane egcwele ngalolu daba yikhona bezokwazi ukuluphenya. Uthe abakugqugquzeli nhlobo ukuba ngamahlongandlebe kwamaphoyisa.
title: Ushaywe wasala ngephenti ngoba engasifakile isifonyo

text: ZISAGCWELE amathafa iziboshwa ezinhlanu kweziyisishiyagalombili ezeqe ezitokisini zaseDurban Central, eThekwini izolo emuva kokuthi zihlule ngamandla iphoyisa ebelizigadile, zaliphuca okhiye zase zilivalela esitokisini.Kuthiwa iphoyisa elingu-Warrant Officer lizithole sekuyilo eliyisiboshwa ngemuva kokuthi lishaywe yiziboshwa ezimbili ebeliziphindisela esitokisini, zathatha ukhiye zavulela ezinye zabe sezibaleka.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe lesi sigameko senzeke ngezithuba zawo-9 ekuseni izolo.Kuthiwa kuneziboshwa ezimbili ezilandwe ngumseshi obefuna ukuyozibeka amacala ngokusemthethweni.Sezibuya ezitokisini kuthiwa umseshi uzinikele kuleli phoyisa ebeliqaphe ezitokisini.Leli phoyisa libe selizithatha laziphindisela ezitokisini kanti kuthe selivulile sekumele zingene phakathi zavele zalijikela, zalishaya, zalisonta ingalo zathatha okhiye bokuvula izitokisini.Lezi ziboshwa zifake esitokisini iphoyisa zabe sezisebenzisa okhiye ukuthi zivulele ezinye ebezigcinwe kwezinye izitokisi.Ngesikhathi ziphuma kuthiwa zihlangane nelinye iphoyisa elibe nokusola ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle elibe selihlaba umkhosi kwaphuma amaphoyisa, lezi ziboshwa seziyophuma ngesango.Kubizwe amanye amaphoyisa abezolekelela, akwaSAPS nawakwaMetro, iziboshwa zajahwa.Kugcine kubanjwe iziboshwa ezintathu.Kuthiwa kugcine kusetshenziswe ukhiye oyisipele ukuvulela iphoyisa ebelivalelwe ezitokisini. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane usiqinisekisile isigameko.“Ngezithuba zehora lesi-9 ekuseni, iziboshwa zibambe iphoyisa ebeliziqaphile zalishaya zaliphuca okhiye, zalivalela. Amaphoyisa akwazile ukubamba iziboshwa ezintathu kodwa ezinhlanu zisagcwele amathafa. Amaphoyisa acela noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi ngalezi ziboshwa ukuthi athinte amaphoyisa ngokushesha,” kusho uZwane.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela kungacaci ukuthi lezi ziboshwa beziboshelwe maphi amacala nokuthi zingobani.
title: Kufunwa iziboshwa (5) ezeqe esitokisini

text: AGWETSHWE iminyaka engu-10 ebhadla ejele amaphoyisa amabili ngecala lokugwazisa owesilisa owayeboshiwe amfuna u-R7 500 ukuze amdedele.UMusawenkosi Mabaso (48) noThulani Dlangalala (48) bagwetshwe yiNkantolo yamaCala eMali eThekwini ngoMsombuluko.Baboshwa oKlebe ababacuphela umgogo ngemva kokufumbathiswa imali yindoda eyayiboshiweOkhulumela oKlebe KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Simphiwe Mhlongo, uthe ngoMeyi 2018 uMabaso noDlangalala bajutshwa ukuba bayolanda indoda eyayiboshelwe esikhumulweni sezindiza, iKing Shaka.“Endleleni sebebuya nayo, la maphoyisa kuthiwa afuna u-R7 000 kumsolwa khona ezomdedela aye kwakhe bese evela enkantolo ngosuku olulandelayo. Anikwa u-R4 500 asephoqelela ukuthi akhokhelwe u-R3 000 osele,” kusho uMhlongo.Kuthiwa kwabikelwa oKlebe ngokushesha abase becuphela la maphoyisa umgogo.Kuthiwa la maphoyisa abhadanywa ebuya kokoleka le mali eyayisele ase eyaseshwa.“La maphoyisa atholwa nemali engu-R7 500 aboshwa. Avele esula emsebenzini ngemva kokudedelwa yinkantolo ngebheyili. Abegqigqa inkantolo kwaze kwaba alahlwa yicala ngoMashi 1 nonyaka,” kusho uMhlongo.INhloko yoKlebe KwaZulu-Natal, uMajor General Leseja Senona, isamukele lesi sigwebo.“Lesi yisifundo esihle nakwamanye amaphoyisa asebenzisa amandla awo budedengu ukungcolisa igama lombutho wamaphoyisa. Sizimisele ukukhuculula ukungcola embuthweni, izigilamkhuba sizithumele ejele,” kusho uSenona.
title: Kugwetshwe amaphoyisa ngenkohlakalo

text: KUBENELE abathathu abangqongqiswa nendlu belele KwaDesai ngaKwaNdengezi ngoLwesithathu, ngeledlule.UNksz Sibongile Mkhwanazi, uNksz Zodwa Nkhwanazi, noMnuz Khanyisani Mpanza bagcine beshonele esibhedlela ngemuva kokusha nendlu.Kusolwa uyise wengane kaNksz Mkhwanazi (Zodwa), osagcwele amathafa ngalesi sehlo.Kuvele ukuthi indodakazi kaZodwa eneminyaka eyisihlanu isesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela yize kwase kubikwe ukuthi ishonile. Kuvele nokuthi uNksz Mkhwanazi (Sibongile) ushone nengane yakhe abeyikhulelwe.Kuthiwa laba bashiswa ngemuva kwengxabano phakathi kukaZodwa nesoka lakhe.Umfowabo wezelamani zakwaMkhwanazi, uMnuz Jabulani Mkhwanazi, uthe ushaqekile ngokushona kodadewabo.“Kunzima kakhulu kuleli khaya njengamanje ngoba asazi nokuthi sizothathani sihlanganise nani,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uphinde waqinisekisa ukuthi odadewabo nosibali wakhe, uMpanza abashone ngemuva kwalesi sigameko.“Empeleni umshana usimeni esibucayi egunjini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela,” kuqhuba uMkhwanazi.Isolezwe lifika endaweni yesigameko kwakunephunga likaphethroli emnyango wegumbi okwakwenzeke kulo lesi sigameko.Owakulo muzi, uNksz Sizakele Ndlovu, wathi abashonile babelimele kakhulu bengabonakali ngisho ukuthi bangobani ngenkathi bephuma engunjini elalisha.“Into engayibona ngenkathi kuvuleka umnyango inyantisa igazi. Babebucuke izikhumba bengakwazi nokuhamba, begaqa ngamadolo baze bafika emnyango balala phansi bekhala ngokushiselwa,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa aphansi phezulu, athungatha umsolwa.“Amaphoyisa aphenya amacala amathathu okubulala nelilodwa lokuzama ukubulala,” kusho uCol Mbele.
title: Sekubenele abashiswa 'yisoka'

text: ZIFE olwembiza izintombi zoMhlanga ngemva kokukhothama kweSilo saMabandla, ebesizikhuthaza nangokuzigcina, zizithibe ocansini. Enye yezintombi nto nguNksz Brighton Shandu (24)  waseMandeni, kodwa ohlolwa eMgungundlovu ngaphansi koThuli lwezicwe. UNksz Shandu uthe bekuvele kubuhlungu ukuthi nyakenye abazange balibhade eMkhosini woMhlanga ngenxa yeCovid-19 kodwa ukukhothama kweSilo kuvele kwashaya kwezwela. "Angifuni ukuqamba amanga, mina ngife isibili ngoba bengemula ngesonto elizayo. Bekuzohlanganisa izinsizwa nezintombi ngoba sisazigcinile kodwa kuyacaca ukuthi umuntu ugqemeke udume lwengozi njengoba kukhotheme Ongangezwe lakhe. Okubuhlungu kunakho konke ukuthi eMhlangeni odlule asikwazanga nokuyomvalelisa, ngenxa yesimo esesiphila ngaphansi kwaso," kusho uNksz Shandu.Ephetha uthe ugqugquzele izintombi nto ukuthi ziqhubeke nokuzithiba. "Zimbali zezwe duduzekani ningapheli amandla. Ukuzigcina kwethu iyona ndlela esingahlonipha ngayo uNgangezwe lakhe. Ngiyazi sihlalele ovalweni lokuthi noMhlanga ungase uphele njengoba kuke kwaba nokuthinteka kwawo emnyakeni edlule," kusho uNksz Shandu.Ungoti wezamasiko nohola izintombi zikaNomkhubulwane, uDkt Nomagugu Ngobese, uthe kusenzima ukwamukela lezi zindaba ngoba nombiko umfice eseSishayamthetho. Uthe Isilo sama nezintombi nomkhosi woMhlanga kunzima, uchithwa ndlela zonke. "Isilo besilimela iqiniso ngesiko. Sithanda nabantwana bethu sibaluleka ngendlela yokuziphatha. SIlimele kakhulu, ngikhumbula sake sama nathi nezintombi kunzima ucindezelwa umkhosi woMhlanga. Ziyakhala nezingane selokhu kufike umbiko kodwa sizolinda sizwe ngokuqhubeka kwezinhlelo ukuthi kwenziwa njani njengoba kusenale nkinga yeCovid-19," kusho uDkt Ngobese.INduna yezintombi nto eNtuzuma uNksz Nondumiso Dladla (33) owaqala ukuhamba uMkhosi woMhlanga eno-14 uthe awehlanga kahle umbiko wokukhothama kweSilo. Uthe kodwa unethemba lokuthi izintombi zizohamba phezu kweziyalo ebesihlala sizikhipha emcimbini yezintombi mayelana nokuziphatha. "Kuningi iSilo ebesihlala sisifundisa kona nokwenza izintombi zilokhu ziqhubeka nokuzigcina. Ngiyafisa ukuthi ngokukhothama kwaso siqhubeke nezimfundiso zeSilo singabe seiphela amandla. Sishayekile kubuhlungu ngoba besinethemba njengoba ebesesibhedlela kodwa sizoduduzana siqhubeke nokuwuhamba uMkhosi woMhlanga," kusho uNksz Dladla.
title: Kuzwele kwizintombi nto ukukhothama kweSilo

text: USABA ngisho ukubuyela emsebenzini owesifazane wasemjondolo yaseNsimbini, eMayville, eThekwini, osola onogada bakaMasipala weTheku ngokumntshontshela uR11 000 ngesikhathi bediliza umjondolo wakhe ngoLwesithathu.UNksz Thando Mfihlelwa (33) uthi akazi ukuthi uzobabhekelwa ngubani abesifazane adayisa nabo emakethe, eThekwini, ngemuva kokwebelwa imali yesitokofela abekade eyifihle ngaphansi kwamatilasi.Uthe le mali ubeyinikezwe ngoLwesibili ntambama ukuze ayigcinele ukuthi bayovula ibhuku leqembu labo ngoLwesine.“Ngithukile ngoLwesithathu sengifonelwa kuthiwa umjondolo wami udiliziwe. Ngiphuthume endlini ngoba nginovalo lokuthi ngingase ngingayifici imali yesitokofela ebengiyifihlile. Ngivele ngaphelelwa ngamandla uma ngiqhamuka umatilasi wombhede usuncikiswe phansi, kwangicacela ukuthi imali ayisekho,” kusho uNksz Mfihlelwa.Uthe ngoLwesine uthumele udadewabo ukuthi ayochazela amalungu esitokofela ngokumehlele.“Angazi ukuthi labo mama engidlala nabo isitokofela bazokholwa yini ukuthi imali yebiwe. Kwenzeka lokhu sisanda kusiqala isitokofela. Sibawu-11 umuntu ukhokha uR1000 emunye. Besivumelene ukuthi imali soyifaka ebhange, sathi sizoya ngoLwesine ukuyovula ibhuku,” kusho uNksz Mfihlelwa.Uthi uyile emahhovisi kaMasipala weTheku kodwa bamtshela ukuthi ayikho into abangamsiza ngayo kumele ayovula icala emaphoyiseni.Umakhelwane wakhe ocele ukungadalulwa ngoba esaba uthe, naye ulahlekelwe uR300 abewufake ngaphansi kwendwangu yetafula.“Banesihluku laba bantu. Bafike badilize nempahla igcwele phakathi. Bayizigebengu ngoba bayapequlula bathathe imali, amafoni uma behlangana nakho,” kusho umakhelwane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe, amaphoyisa aseCato Manor aphenya icala lokulimaza impahla ngemuva kokuthi owesifazane edilizelwe umjondolo wakhe.Uthe lo wesifazane uveze ukuthi ulahlekelwe yimali abeyifihlile, kwalimala nefenisha yakhe.Luthintwa uphiko lweLand Invasion Unit kuMasipala weTheku, luthe ngeke lukwazi ukuphawula ngezinsolo zokweba, wudaba okumele lubikwe emaphoyiseni.Baqinisekisile ukuthi badilize imijondolo engu-32, bathi basazoqhubeka nokulwa nokuqhwagwa komhlaba kamasipala.
title: Ukhala uyazithulisa ‘owebelwe’ wonogada uR11 000 wesitokofela

text: INHLANGANO eyenza ucwaningo ngophethroli nezezimoto, i-Automobile Association South Africa (AA) ithi abantu kufanele balindele ukuthi uphethroli ungase unyuke emuva kokuthi inhlangano ecwaninga ngomnotho iMoody’s izwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokwanda kwezindleko zikahulumeni, ezidlula imali ekhona esikhwameni sakhe (fiscal deficit).Emuva kokuthi iMoody’s yenze lesi simemezelo ngoLwesithathu irandi liye lantenga ngisho izolo liqhubekile nokweba ngoR14.42 uma liqhathaniswa neDollar laseMelika.Esitatimendeni i-AA ithe ukuntenga kwerandi kungase kuphazamise uzinzo olukhona kwintengo kaphethroli njengamanje bese ugcina usunyuka ngenyanga ezayo.“Sicela abantu baqinisekise ukuthi babopha izifociya ngoba izinto ezenzeka ezimakethe zomhlaba zinomthelela ekuntengeni kwerandi eliphazanyiswa yizinto eziningi. Isimemezelo seMoody’s naso sintengise amandla erandi emuva kokuthi lintengiwe yizinkinga zelira laseTurkey.Uma irandi lintenga kusho ukuthi sithenga u-oyela ohluziwe siwuthenga ngemali enkulu bese kunyuka uphethroli. Asinaso isiqinisekiso sokuthi uphethroli uzonyuka ngenyanga ezayo kodwa sithi abantu abalindele noma yini,” kusho i-AA.Isazi somnotho nezomthetho, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa sithe uhulumeni kufanele akulalele okushiwo yiMoody’s ngoba yinhlangano engenzeleli uma ibheka isimo somnotho sezwe.“Okushiwo yiMoody’s wukuthi izidingo zikahulumeni ziningi kunemali ayingenisayo. Ibalule nokuthi abasebenzi bakahulumeni bafuna ukunyuselwa amaholo ngemali eningi ekubeni uhulumeni enganayo imali. Iphinde yakhala nangesimo somkhakha wezezimali. Kufanele uhulumeni alungise isimo ngoba iMoody’s iyona yodwa ebingakasho ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika yithembekile kubatshalizimali,” kusho uDumisa. Yize iMoody’s ithi uhulumeni akanayo imali ithe akukubi kangako ngoba uma eqhubeka nokuqoqa kahle intela isimo ngeke sibe sibi.Ithe inethemba lokuthi ngo-2021 uhulumeni uzobe esekwazile ukuvala isikhala esikwibhajethi yakhe. Iphinde yakhala ngokuthi isimo esenzeka ezimakethe zomhlaba nezinkinga ezinkampanini zikahulumeni ziphazamisa umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika.
title: Ungase unyuke futhi uphethroli

text: INKANTOLO yemantshi yase-East London isikhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa komholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema. Ijaji linqume ukukhipha le ncwadi kulandela ukuhluleka kukaMalema ukuvela enkantolo ngoMsombuluko ekuseni. UMalema waqhumisa isibhamu esesiteji kumbuthano we-EFFn ngo-2018 eMdantsane, e-Eastern Cape. I-EFF yayigubha iminyaka emihlanu yasungulwa ngenkathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko eSisa Dukashe Stadium. Unogada wakhe u-Adriaan Snyman naye ubekwe icala. UPhiko lwezokushushisa kuleli, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) luthe uJuju ubhekene namanye amacala okuphatha isibhamu esinezinhlamvu ngokungemthetho.  UMalema ubekwe icala lokubeka engcupheni izimpilo zabantu kanye nempahla. Udaba lusaqhubeka.
title: Inkantolo ikhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kukaMalema

text: ABAHLAZIYI bepolitiki bathi kubuyise ithemba ukuqokwa kobuholi obusha be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal engqungqutheleni ebingempelasonto.Umhlaziyi wepolitiki uMnuz Thabani Khumalo uthe ukuba khona kwengqungquthela ebe yimpumelelo kubuyise ithemba lokuthi izinhlaka ebezingezwani zibuyisene ngoba akekho ozwakalise ukungenami.“Inselelo isisebuholini obusha ekutheni buyaqhubeka yini nobumbano esilubonile engqungqutheleni. Asibonanga izithunywa zishayana ngezihlalo. Lokhu kubuyisa ithemba nakubavoti. Siyathemba ubumbano esilubonile luzobonakala ezifundeni nasemagatsheni e-ANC,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe i-ANC Youth League (ANCYL) isenawo amandla ekuqokeni abaholi be-ANC futhi iyakwazi ukubakhankasela.“I-ANCYL inawo amandla okuqoka abaholi be-ANC kodwa ayikwazi ukuba nesixazululo enkingeni yabantu abasha abangasebenzi. Ayinazo izixazululo zezinkinga ezikhungethe intsha,” kusho uKhumalo.Omunye umhlaziyi wepolitiki, uMnuz Protas Madlala uthe kuheleza umoya wokubuyisana kwi-ANC nakuba izilonda ezidalwe wukungaboni ngasolinye zingeke zisheshe ziphole.“Abaholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal baphoqwa wukhetho ukuthi basebenzisane abakwazi ukwenza ngenye indlela ngoba uma bengabumbani sizohamba isifundazwe, balahlekelwe yizikhundla, uphele nombele wokudla. Bazoqhubeka nokubuyisana ngoba abafuni i-ANC ilahlekelwe ngamavoti okhethweni lwangonyaka ozayo,” kusho uMadlala.Uthe ukusebenzisana kobuholi obuqokiwe nendlela izithunywa ze-ANC eziziphathe ngayo kuzobuya ithemba ebantwini akade sebezitshela ukuthi i-ANC ihlakazekile KwaZulu-Natal.“Ngisho abantu abakade sebezitshela ukuthi bazovotela amanye amaqembu ngibabona bebuya kwi-ANC ngoba babonile ukuthi isibumbene. Bazoqhubeka nokuyivotela nangonyaka ozayo,” kusho uMadlala.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe i-ANCYL isenawo amandla yini njengoba kubonakele ukukhankasa kwayo kufaka uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli esikhundleni sikaNobhala, uqale wabuza ukuthi isekhona yini?“I-ANCYL ayisenawo amandla njengasesikhathini soFikile Mbalula noJulius Malema. Ayisakhulumi ngezinto ezithinta intsha ngqo, isisuthi amathenda, ayigijimi njengakuqala isenabaholi abalambile ababengamavolontiya. Sibona abaholi bayo begijima ngezimoto eziphambili manje sebedla imali yamathenda,” kusho uMadlala.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe uMengameli Jacob Zuma uzoqhubeka yini nokulandelwa ngabantu abaningi, uMadlala uthe ubona esazoqhubeka nokwesekwa kodwa ubuholi obukhona ngeke buthande ukuphambana nobuholi bukazwelonke.UKhumalo uthe bakhona abaholi besifundazwe abazokweseka uZuma kodwa iningi labo lizolandela okushiwo wubuholi bukazwelonke.“Osopolitiki bayasebenza ngakho noma yini abayenzayo basuke becabangela ikusasa labo. Ngeke bafune ukuphambana nehlombe ngokuthi balandele uZuma yize esephumile emandleni. Bazolandela okushiwo ngosemandleni ukuze kuphephe izikhundla zabo,” kusho uKhumalo.Bheka ikhasi 14
title: Ibuyise ithemba eye-ANC - abahlaziyi

text: INYUVESI yaseZululand, oNgoye isithathe izinyathelo mayelana nezinsolo ezisatshalaliswe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zokuthi kudayiswa amamaki ezitshudeni. Isitatimende esikhishwe yinyuvesi, sithe lezi zinsolo zehlisa isithunzi sesikhungo.Ngokwalesi sitatimende esifakwe ekhasini lesikhungo kwiFacebook, siveza ukuthi kusatshalaliswe amahlebezi okuthi kule nyuvesi kudayiswa amamaki ezitshudeni. Lesi sikhungo sithi lokhu akulona iqiniso futhi udaba seludluliselwe emaphoyiseni ukuze kuphenywe.“Sesiyazi ngalezi zinsolo ezisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Umsolwa kulolu daba uveze ukuthi isikhungo sidayisa amamaki ezitshudeni. Sesikwazile nokuthola umnikazi we-akhawunti kwiTwitter, osabalalise lezi zinsolo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Sesitholile nokuthi umsolwa osabalalisa lezi zinsolo, uyisitshudeni esaxoshwa enyuvesi,” kusho isitatimende.Lesi sikhungo siveze inombolo yamahhala lapho kuzobikwa khona abenza inkohlakalo ngaphakathi enyuvesi. Kulesi sitatimende kugcizelelwe ukuthi le nyuvesi ayihambisani nanoma yiluphi uhlobo lobugebengu futhi ngeke ikumele ukudicilelwa phansi kwegama layo.“Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi bathathelwa izinyathelo ezifanele neziqinile abasabalalise amanga ngenyuvesi. Lolu daba seludluliselwe emaphoyiseni ukuze kuphenywe,” kusho isitatimende.Izitshudeni eziphawule ekhasini lenyuvesi kwiFacebook ngalesi sitatimende, zishiye ezingalazi zisola isikhungo ngokukhathalela kuphela isithunzi sayo kunezikhalo nezimfuno zezitshudeni.Abanye ababhale kuleli khasi basole inyuvesi ukuthi vele iyawadayisa amamaki. Kukhona abathe bayawabheka bathole ukuthi baphase kahle, okuthi uma sekuphuma imiphumela yokugcina bathole ukuthi amamaki aseshintshile. Bephendula lezi zitshudeni abakulesi sikhungo, bathe oseke waba nenkinga nokudayiswa kwamamaki uvumelekile ukuletha ubufakazi.
title: Basolwa ngokudayisa amamaki Ongoye

text: SIHLE MKHIZEUVULELWE icala lokuntshontsha umsakazi weMbokodo FM ngezinsolo zokuqola abafundi abathathu basesikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, i-Icesa eThekwini.Lo msolwa obengumphathi ophikweni lwezindaba kuthiwa wayalela laba bafundi ukuthi bamnike u-R300 ngamunye ukuze bazitholele izikhala zokuqedela izifundo zobuntatheli kwazise bebenza unyaka wokugcina.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uCapt Thulani Zwane usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko wathi icala livuliwe kodwa akukaboshwa muntu.UNksz Nontobeko Hadebe uthe balulekwe nguSandile Ngema ongumphathi siteshi weMbokodo FM ukuthi baphuthume emaphoyiseni asePinetown ngoba akugwazwa ukuze ungene kulesi siteshi njengoba sisakazela umphakathi.“Siqale ukusola emuva kokuphela kwesikhathi eyesithembise sona ukuthi uzosishayela ucingo. Wayekade ecele ukuthi simnikeze imali yethu wangasinika maphepha aqinisekisa ukuthi sikhokhile wase esithembisa ukuthi uzosithinta. Ngendlela alulalisa ngayo ulimi akufikanga ukuthi sisole ngoba nathi sase sikade siphuma singena sifuna indawo esingaqhuba khona izifundo. Esengasalubambi ucingo sanquma ukuziyela mathupha nalapho sihlangane khona nomphathi siteshi osiyalele ukuthi sibike udaba emaphoyiseni,” kusho uNksz Hadebe.UNksz Nosipho Gamede noNksz Nosipho Mdlalose abebehambisana noNksz Hadebe bathi le mali babeyikhokha ngezinsuku ezahlukene.UNgema uthe abanayo indawo yomuntu osebenzisa igama lesiteshi ukwenza ubugebengu.“Sibonane nezingane ngoLwesithathu ngaziyalela ukuthi zivule icala ngoba ngazi kahle ukuthi lokhu okubikwayo akuhambisani nokusebenza komsakazo. Thina asikhokhisi uma umfundi ezoqhuba izifundo zakhe lokhu akwenzile ngiyakweshwama,” usho kanje.Uthi ugcine ngoMsombuluko emsebenzini lo msolwa esiligodlile igama lakhe ngoba kuningi abaphenywa ngakho ngaphakathi esiteshini.Uqhube ngokuthi lo msolwa akaseyona ingxenye yalo msakazo, futhi ufisa umthetho udlale indawo yawo.
title: Sivulelwe icala lokugwazisa abafundi isikhulu somsakazo

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa unxuse abantu bakuleli ukuthi baphuze bazigade ukuze singenyuki isibalo sabahaqwa yiCovid-19.URamaphosa usho lokhu izolo ememezela ukuxegiswa kweminye yemigomo yize izwe lisasesigabeni sesithathu somvalelandlini. Enye yezinto ebibhekwe ngabomvu ukuvulwa kotshwala abuvala ngoDisemba nyakenye emuva kokunyuka kweSibalo Sabahaqa yilolu bhubhane. Ukwehla kwesibalo sabahaqekayo nalabo abangeniswa ezibhedlela ngezinye zezinto ezenze ukuthi avule ukudayiswa kotshwala. Phakathi kwemithetho exegisiwe kubalwa nokuvunyelwa kwezinkonzo, ukuvulwa kwezindawo zomphakathi  nokuncishiswa kwesikhathi somthethowewashi.URamaphosa umemezele ukuthi utshwala buzovumeleka ukudayiswa kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesine, kusukela ngehora leshumi ekuseni kuvalwe ngehora lesithupha ntambama ezindaweni lapho kungaphuzelwa khona.Ezindaweni lapho kuphuzelwa khona njengamathaveni, zona ziyalelwe ukuba zivale ngehora leshumi ebusuku.URamaphosa unxuse abantu bakuleli ukuba bangeqisi ophuzweni oludakayo.“Phuzani nizibheke ukuze sigweme isimo lapho sizothola sekunyuka isibalo sabangeniswa ezibhedlela ngenxa yokulimala, noma sibone kukhula isibalo sabatheleleka ngegciwane ngenxa yokuphuza budedengu.”Izindawo zomphakathi ezifana namabhishi, amadamu, namapaki, zizovulwa.Isikhathi somthetho wewashi sincishisiwe, njengoba sesizoqala ngo-11 ebusuku kuze kube u-4 ekuseni. “Abantu akufanele babe ngaphezu kuka-50 endaweni evalekile, kanti endaweni evulekile kufanele abantu bangeqi ku-100. Kufanele kulandelwe imigomo efana nokuqhelelana kwabantu. Uma kuwukuthi indawo ayivumi ukuthi abantu bakwazi ukuqhelelana ngebanga elivumelekile, kufanele kuncishiwe isibalo sabantu sibe ngaphansi kuka-50.”Eminye imicimbi okubalwa kuyo eyezepolitiki nemihlangano yemikhandlu, ayikavumeleki ngaphandle kwemingcwabo.Abantu abangu-50 kuphela abavumelekile emngcwabeni.“Emasontweni amathathu edlule sibone sehla kakhulu isibalo sabatheleleka ngegciwane uma siqhathanisa noDisemba. Ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa ezedlule, isibalo sabantu abathelelekayo besijwayele ukuba u-5 500, kanti esontweni elandulela lelo bekujwayele ukuba u-10 000.“Abantu abebengeniswa esibhedlela nabo banciphile besukela ku-2 300 ngosuku baya ku-200. Nakuba besebaningi abatheleleka ngegciwane kodwa ngingasho ukuthi sesidlulile kwisivuvu sesibili.”URamaphosa unxuse abantu bakuleli ukuthi baqhubeke nokulandela imigomo yokulwa naleli gciwane.Uthe kusazophoqeleka ukuthi abantu bagqoke izifonyo, baqhelelane waphinde wathi kubalulekile ukuthi bageze izandla. Uxwayise ngokuthi abantu abahlale beqaphile, bangayekeleli nje ukuze isivuvu sesithathu singagadli.
title: Isixwayiso uRamaphosa evula utshwala

text: UKAPUTENI weMamelodi Sundowns uHlompho Kekana usephumelele ukuhlabana emiqhudelwaneni emqoka namaqembu selokhu aqala ngo-2004 ukudlala ibhola elikhokhelayo eyibamba kwiBlack Leopards.Kodwa inselelo abhekene nayo uKekana (33) eyokuthi ayomela iNingizimu Afrika neBafana Bafana kwi-Africa Cup of Nations.Uzakwabo waleli phephandaba uxoxe nalo mdlali osenqobe izicoco eziyisithupha zeligi.Ezintathu uhlabane ngazo egijima kwiSuperSport United, ezinye ezintathu eseyibamba kwiMamelodi Sundowns.Lezi zicoco uzilamanise ngeseCaf Champions League, Caf Super Cup, Nedbank Cup nezeTelkom Knockout.Yize lo mdlali odabuka eZebediela, eLimpopo noluqinisayo unyawo esehlabene ngazo zonke lezi lezicoco kodwa usahlalelwe ukufezekisa iphupho lakhe ayomela izwe lakhe kwi-Afcon.Usekwazile ukuthi adlale imidlalo ewu-24 kwiBafana Bafana, wabhukuzisa amagoli amahlanu, kodwa ugcizelela athi asekulangazelele ngomdlandla wokuthola inggqayizivele yethuba lokuyodlala kwi-Afcon, nokuyinto eyokwenza athi kufeziwe.“Ngikulangazelele ngempela ukuthi ngiyomela iNingizimu Afrika kwi-Afcon, kuze kube manje akukaze kwenzeke. I-Africa Cup on Nations yiyona okufanele ingibeke kulelo thuba uma kuwukuthi siyazibekisela indawo yokuyodlala kuyo."Akusimina kuphela kodwa nabanye abadlali abancane bayadinga ukuyodlala kulo mqhudelano ukuze bahlome ngamava asezingeni lomhlaba,” kusho uHlompho.“Njengezwe siyadinga ukuthi sidlala emqhudelwaneni esezingeni lomhlaba. I-Africa Cup of Nations yiyona okumele inginikeze ithuba lokuthi ngikwazi ukumela izwe lami emqhudelwaneni omkhulu."Ngiwubheke ngabomvu umdlalo olandelayo nenginethemba lokuthi sizokwazi ukuzibekisela indawo ngawo.”IBafana izodllala neLibya ngoMashi emdlalweni wokugcina noyisango lokuba sohlwini lwamaqembu angu-24 azoyoncintisana eCameroon.Idinga iphuzu elilodwa nje vo, maqede isho ukuthi sekunjalo.“Lowo mdlalo uzodinga ubuchule bokukwazi ukudlala ibhola ngendlela, kodwa udinga umdlali ovuthiwe emqondweni."Kuzobe kuwumdlalo onzima nozodinga siqine emqondweni."Bayashayeka. Ngayibona iLybia idlala neSeychelles, yayidonsa kanzima."Yadonsa kanzima ngisho idlala neNigeria. Beza kithi bezodlalela idraw."Ngalolo suku senza konke okusemandleni ukuthi sikhande amathuba kodwa saphikwa imiphumela emihle,” kusho uKekana othembise ukuthi liyobe seligaya ngomunye umhlathi emdlalweni ozayo ekuhambeni.“Siyonqoba nje kwaphela.”UKekana uyena obeyibambe esiswini ngesikhathi iBafana ibambana ngo 1-1 neNigeria eFNB Stadium.“Kube yinto engijabulisile ukuthi ngikwazi ukuthola ithuba lokudlala kwiBafana."Okwakumqoka kimi kwakuwukuthola ithuba lokudlala, nokwenza umehluko. Ngajabula kakhulu ukuthi ngibeyingxenye.”NgoLwesibili uKekana nozakwabo beDowns babhekene nomdlalo onzima lapho bezogadulisana khona neLeones Vegetarianosa yase-Equatorial Guinea emlenzeni wokuqala okusahlungwa kuwo ukuqhathelwa ukudlala emaqoqweni eCaf Champions League.
title: 'Ngikulangazelele ukuya kwi-Afcon'

text: SEKUKHISHWE umvuzo kaR100 000 ngozokhipha abashise amahhovi oMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nobuHoli boMdabu eMayville, eThekwini.Kusolwa ukuthi lokhu kwenziwe yilabo abafuna umhlaba ngodli.Amahhovisi ashiswe ngoLwesithathu ebusuku emuva kombhikisho obekuvalwe kuwo umgwaqo eduze kwawo. UNgqongqoshe woMnyango KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uthe bafuna noma wubani ozoletha umbiko ozoholela ekuboshweni kwezigilamkhuba.Amahhovisi ashisiwe kuthiwa abesetshenziswa yizikhulu zomnyango namakhosi.“Umonakalo owenzekile ulinganiselwa kuR17 million yize singakaqedi ukuhlola isimo. Lesi silinganiso kasihlangene namafayela namaphepha abalulekile ashile,” kusho ungqongqoshe.NgoLwesibili amahhovisi ahlaselwe ngababhikishi okusolwa ukuthi bebephethe ibhomu kaphethroli. Umbhikisho uphazamise abasebenzisa umngwaqo uJan Smuts Highway noVusi Mzimela. Ababhikishi bebeshisa ngisho izimoto ebezidlula.“Ukushiswa kwesakhiwo sikahulumeni kuzophazamisa abantu abangenacala abafuna izidingo. Sinxusa ukuthi amaphoyisa enze konke okusemandleni ukubopha izigangi. Ukushishwa kwamahhovisi kwenza ukuthi nabasebenzi bethu basabe.”NgoNovemba kwadunwa imoto yomunye wabasebenzi bomnyango ngesikhathi kuhlasele amadoda ahlomile, antshontsha amathelevishini namakhompyutha. Imoto yabuye yatholakala eNewlands.Izolo amaphoyisa abesiqaphile isimo, abezicishamlilo becisha. Bekusashunqa intuthu ngenxa yokuthi bekusasha kwenye indawo. Abasebenzi kwamanye amahhovisi bebesebenza njengokujwayelekile. Onogada abangena ekuseni bathe bafike kusasha.Okhulumela Abahlali baseMjondolo eKhenana, eCato Crest, uMnuz Lindokuhle Mnguni, uthe abangene kulokhu. Uthe basola ababhikishi abadla ngenkani umhlaba asebezakhele imijondolo endaweni.“Laba ngabantu esingabazi abafika bazokwakha ngenkani bathi bavunyelwe yikhansela. Badinwa yisinqumo senkantolo esathi uMasipala weTheku kumele uyeke ukusidilizela imijondolo. Lokhu kwenze babhikishela ukuthi eyabo iyadilizwa ngoba bengekho kithi,” kusho uMnguni.Ikhansela, uMnuz Muzimuni Ngiba, uphikile ukuthi uyazana nalabo bantu abasolwayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokucekela phansi.
title: Umvuzo kaR100 000 ngabashisile

text: UZULELWA ngamanqe umqeqeshi weMaritzburg United, u-Eric Tinkler, ezakhe ezithelwe isibhaxu yiChippa United emdlalweni weDStv Premiership. eNelson Mandela Stadium, eBhayi, izolo ebusuku.Amagoli amathathu eChippa ashaywe ngu-Eva Nga (okukhona namaphenathi amabili) esiwombeni ngasinye.IMaritzburg ibikade ibekwe phambili nguDaylon Claasen kusanda kuqala umdlalo.Ukuhlulwa kweMaritzburg kufaka obishini uTinkler osekuvele kuthiwa abaphathi kabaseneme ngaye kusukela endleleni iqembu elivale ngayo isizini edlule.IMaritzburg isihlulwe kuyona yomithathu imidlalo kusukela kuqale isizini ka-2020/2021. Kowokuvula ihlulwe yiBaroka, kowesibili yakhala ngaphansi kwiCape Town City.Emdlalweni wayizolo iChippa iyona ezinze kuqala emdlalweni kodwa ingawakhi amathuba aphakamisa amaphaphu. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi iMaritzburg iqalile ukuswambuluka, yaliphatha ibhola.Kusheshe kwayilungela ngomzuzu ka-10 ngesikhathi udonga lwasemuva lweChippa lwenza iphutha, lwajeziswa nguClassen ozithole esebhekene nonozinti uVeli Mothwa.ITeam of Choice ihlasele iphindelela emuva kwaleli goli. Nokho emuva kwemizuzu engu-15 iChippa ithole iphenathi ngemuva kokuthi uNathaniel Mbourou edlalise kabi u-Augustine Kwem ebhokisini. Iphenathi ishaywe phakathi nguNga.Esiwombeni sesibili, iChippa ibuye ngomfutho ofanayo neqale ngawo umdlalo. Ngomzuzu ka-58 ithole iphenathi emuva kokuthi unozinti weMaritzburg uJethren Barr edlalise kabi uNga ebhokisini, wavuka wayibeka phakathi.Ngomzuzu ka-66 uNga ushayele iChippa igoli lesithathu.IMaritzburg iqede umdlalo ingasaphelele kulandela ukuthola ikhadi elibomvu kukaSibusiso Hlubi ngomzuzu ka-74 emuva kokudlalisa kabi uSizwe Mdlinzo.UHlubi ubesanda kungena endaweni kaPuleng Tlolane.
title: Ukludliwa kweTeam  of Choice kwandise ingcindezi kuTinkler

text: S’MANGELE ZUMAK USOLWA ukuthi kube nokudonsisana phakathi kwezigebengu nosomabhizinisi waseMlaza obezoshadelwa maduze otholwe evenini yakhe eseshonile enamanxeba okudutshulwa ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Kuthiwa uMnuz Sanele Ndlovu (34), ongumnikazi we-Eyethu Heel and Key Bar esenxanxatheleni yezitolo KwaMnyandu, uhlaselwe ngabalisa abangaziwa abekade bezama ukumduna iveni kwa-D eMlaza ngesikhathi eyolanda ingoduso yakhe uNksz Nonhlanhla Xaba (32) emsebenzini.Umndeni kaNdlovu, obezoshada ngoJuni 16 eMontclair, eThekwini, ususele nejoka lokwazisa zonke izimenywa ukuthi awusekho umshado.Uyise kaNdlovu, uMnuz Amros Ndlovu (72), uthe kufike amaphoyisa kwakhe ngezintatha zangoLwesibili emazisa ukuthi kutholakale iveni iChevrolet Corsa Utility linomlisa obeseshonile.“Bathe evenini bathole ikheli lala ekhaya okwenze ukuthi bafike njengoba ucingo lukaSanele belungasekho. Sibe sesiphuthuma lapho etholwe khona safica isidumbu sakhe sesithathiwe. Ngisola ukuthi laba abamdubulile bebezama ukumduna imoto kodwa wagoloza. Imoto itholwe igingqikile, okungenzeka ukuthi besebevele bemdubulile. USanele uphume ekhaya sekuzoshaya ihora leshumi ebusuku, eyolanda umakoti eGalleria,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe umndeni uthinteke kakhulu ngokubulawa kwendodana yakhe njengoba namalungiselelo omshado abesephothuliwe.“USanele ubezoshada esontweni ngoJuni 16, ngakusasa kube nomabo. Izincwadi zezimemo bese sizikhiphile. Umakoti ubesevele ehlala la ekhaya. Asikwazi nokumbheka.”Kuthiwa umufi ushiye izingane ezimbili, eneminyaka ewu-11 nenonyaka.UNksz Xaba uthe ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma ngesikhathi ethintwa ngoba usahleli nabantu abebefike ukuzomkhalisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uMajor Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aphansi phezulu athungatha abalisa abathathu abasolwa ngokubulala uSanele bezama ukumphuca imoto ngabo-11 ebusuku.“Kuthiwa umufi uzamile ukubaleka ngesikhathi befuna ukumduna imoto kodwa bamdubula, okuholele ekutheni imoto iphaphalaze. Abasolwa babe sebemkhuthuza bathatha izinto zakhe. Amaphoyisa aseMlaza aphenya icala lokubulala. Akukaboshwa muntu.”
title: Kusolwa ukuthi umufi ubenqaba nemoto

text: BABHUKUDA emalini abadlali beThanda Royal Zulu ehlezi esicongweni kuNational First Division (NFD).Lezi zindaba zihlaluke ngesikhathi uJomo Biyela oyisikhulu esiphezulu kuMabhubesi elumana indlebe nabezindaba eMhlathuze Sports Complex, eRichards Bay ngemuva komdlalo weThanda naMaZulu.Amabhubesi avule igebe lamaphuzu angu-10 esicongweni seNFD. Leli qembu seliqoqe amaphuzu angu-40 emidlalweni engu-18.“Indaba yamabhonasi okugqugquzela abadlali yinto ekhona ebholeni uma nihlela kahle."Abadlali bayazi ukuthi batholani uma bewine ekhaya, nasekuhambeni bayazi ukuthi basuke bezothola kangakanani. Akupheli ngisho izinsuku ezintathu abadlali bedlalile, imali yabo isuke isingakubona.“Bayithola ngemvelophi. Abadlali bayithanda kabi-ke imvelophu. Ubonile indlela abese belwa ngayo ngasekupheleni komdlalo (esho owoSuthu naMabhubesi) ukuthi bayalifuna leli bhonasi."Indlela esibagqugquzela ngayo ilula. Unginika amaphuzu amathathu ngikunike imvelophi,” kusho uBiyela.IThanda sekuphele iminyaka izabalazela ukubuyela esigabeni esikhulu. Leli qembu lagawulwa yizembe ngo-2008/2009.“Njengamanje le nto isasisebenzela. Imidlalo yethu siyihlukanisa ngezigaba ezintathu."Njengoba sinemidlalo engu-15 nje emidlalweni emihlanu sisuke sibheke amaphuzu angu-10."Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi kula maphuzu angu-45 esiwalwelayo emzuliswaneni wesibili sibheke angu-30."Uma abadlali bekwazile ukufeza isifiso sethu samaphuzu angu-10 ngemuva kwemidlalo emihlanu kukhona abakutholayo futhi.“Uma sigcina siwathola amaphuzu angu-30 sizoqeda iligi sinamaphuzu angu-65. Siyojabula kakhulu-ke uma sithole amaphuzu angu-65."Ngokujwayelekile iligi inqontshwa ngamaphuzu angu-56 kuya kwangu-58. Abafana bethu bagqugquzeleke kakhulu,” kusho uBiyela.Imidlalo yeNFD:Kusasa: Cape Town All Stars v Stellenbosch FC (Athlone Stadium, 3.30pm)NgoMgqubelo ngo-3.30 ntambama: University of Pretoria v Thanda Royal Zulu FC (Tuks Stadium); Black Leopards v Witbank Spurs (Thohoyandou Stadium); FC Cape Town v Santos (NNK Rugby Stadium); Milano United AFC v Royal Eagles (Athlone Stadium); Mthatha Bucks v Magesi FC (Mthatha Stadium); Jomo Cosmos v Mbombela United (Tsakane Stadium) NgeSonto: AmaZulu v Real Kings FC (Princess Magogo Stadium, 3.30pm).
title: Bahleka bodwa amabhonasi abadlali beThanda Royal Zulu

text:
SESIDLULILE ku-100 000 isibalo sabahaqeke ngeCovid-19 eNingizimu Afrika njengoba sesifinyelele ku-101 590. Lokhu kumenyezelwe uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize ngoMsombuluko ebusuku. UMkhize uphinde waveza ukuthi iCovid-19 isidlule nabanye abawu-61 kuleli, osekubeke isibalo sababulawe yileli gciwane ku-1 991. Ezibalweni zakamuva, kushone oyedwa eLimpopo, abathathu KwaZulu-Natal, abawu-18 e-Eastern Cape kanti eWestern Cape kushone abawu-39. Sekuhlolwe abantu abawu 1.3 million kuleli kanti abawu 25 116 kubo bahlolwe emahoreni awu-24 edlule. UMkhize uthe sekusinde abantu abawu-53 444 kuleli gciwane, okusho ukuthi sekusinde u-52.6% wabantu. As of today, the cumulative number of confirmed COVID-19 cases has breached the 100 000 mark, at 101 590.The total number of deaths is 1 991 and the total number of recoveries is 53 444. pic.twitter.com/gGPxwbA5Kv%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID19?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID19Statistics in South Africa as at 22 June 2020. 
pic.twitter.com/DndjKeDKoe— Dr Zweli Mkhize (@DrZweliMkhize)Isifundazwe iWestern Cape sisahamba phambili ngesibalo sabantu abahaqwe yiCovid njengoba bewu-52 554 abathelelekile.
title: Sebengaphezulu kuka-100 000 abasuleleke ngeCovid-19 kuleli

text:
UBELOKHU emamatheke njalo umfana onomdlavuza wamathambo ngesikhathi abeReach For A Dream befeza iphupho lakhe lokuhlangana noNtokozo Dlamini odlala indawo kaMastermind ku
Zalo izolo.Umfundi kaGrade 10 Ongoye High, uMbuyiseni Mfeka (18) waseSikhaleni, ubephelezelwa ngunina uNksz Khethiwe Mathenjwa, (43), nodadewabo ababili ngesikhathi eyohlangana okokuqala noDlamini estudio lapho kuqoshelwa khona u
Zalo.“Ngijabule kakhulu. Njalo uma kudlala u
Zalo ngiyaphuma ekhaya ngiyobukela ithelevishini kamakhelwane. Eyethu yantshontshwa ngonyaka odlule ngoDisemba yatholakala isifile. U
Zalo ngiyaluthanda kakhulu ikakhulukazi indlela uMastermind alingisa ngayo, angikwazi ukuphuthelwa yisiqephu salo,” kusho uMbuyiseni.Unina kaMbuyiseni uthe indodana yakhe iqale ukugula ngonyaka odlule ngoNovemba.“Waqala ngokumila inyama eqinile edolweni. Sazitshela ukuthi kudalwe ukuthi uthanda ukudansa. Besilokhu sigqigqa ezibhedlela besitshela ukuthi ababoni lutho. Sijabule kakhulu namhlanje ukuhlangana noMastermind nabanye abalingisi bo
Zalo. Sibabone ngo si abalingisi bo
Zalo ebesibazi ngokubabona kwi-TV,” kusho uNksz Mathenjwa.Uthe kumphatha kabuhlungu ukugula kukaMbuyiseni ngoba sekumphuthisela ngisho nangesikole nokudansa okuyinto azifelayo ngayo.UDlamini uthe kumjabulise ukuthola ukuthi umsebenzi wabo uthinta impilo yabantu.“Kuhle ukuthi siyakwazi ukubuyisa ithemba kubantu yize bebhekene nezinkinga nokugula okwahlukene. Kuyintokozo kimina ukuhlangana noMbuyiseni ngambonisa nezinye izindawo okuqoshelwa kuzona u
Zalo. Ngifisa ukumgqugquzela ukuthi asebenze kanzima ukufeza isifiso sakhe sokuba ngumlingisi. Nami ngikhulele elokishini e-Ashdown eMgungundlovu. Uma ufuna ukuphumelela kumele uzimisele uyifune uze uyithole into oyifunayo,” kusho uDlamini.IProduction Manager yo
Zalo uNkk Yashika Naidoo ithe ukufika kwabakwaReach for A Dream noMbuyiseni kubakhumbuzile ukuthi umlingisi ngamunye ubaluleke kangakanani.“Kube kuhle ukuthi siphume kwesijwayele ukukwenza. Kusenze sakhumbula ukuthi umlingisi ngamunye udlala indima enkulu. Akukho okudlula ukubona ukumamatheka kukaMbuyiseni ngemuva kokuthi ebone umlingisi amthandayo,” kusho uNkk Naidoo.Umfezi maphupho wakwaReach For A Dream uNksz Kholiswa Nonkwelo uthe baswele amazwi okubonga kuDlamini ngendlela amamukele ngayo uMbuyiseni.
title: Kufezeke iphupho ebona owoZalo

text: ISILOMO sezinhlelo zethelevishini esidume ngokuhlala sineme sinamahlaya, siveze okokuqala ngokugula okusihlasele nokwenza impilo ibe nzima.USomizi Mhlongo wodumo lwama-Idols usephumele obala waveza ubunzima bokuhlaselwa wukhwantalala kusukela nyakenye.USomizi uthe noma ngabe umuntu ubukeka eneme kangakanani phakathi kwabantu kodwa akusho ukuthi konke kusuke kumhambela kahle empilweni.Lokhu ukuveze ekhasini lakhe laku-Instagram lapho ebechaza kabanzi nangendlela ahlala ezizwa ngayo yize ebukeka ewumqemane kwithelevishini nasezindaweni zobumnandi.“Laba bantu ababukeka sengathi konke kuhamba kahle kusuke kungenjalo, izinto azihambi kahle empilweni yami. Ngithole ukuthi nginengcindezi yangokomphefumulo ekuqaleni konyaka odlule ngoJanuwari.“Angikholwa ukuthi iyaphela nya kodwa ngikholwa ukuthi ungenza kube ngcono ngokucabanga okuhle,” kusho uSomizi.Ngaphandle nje kokhwantalala ubhekene nanesimo esingachazeki sokukhathazeka okuhambisana novalo USomizi ubedalula lezi zindaba eqopha i-video.Uthe okumenze wathatha lesi sinqumo sokuphumela obala, wukuthi abantu bazi ukuth lokhu kugula kuhlasela noma wubani.“Muva nje ngibhekene nenkinga yokukhathazeka okuhambisna novalo futhi bengingazi ukuthi i-anxiety yisifo kuze kube ngiyabona nabantu bekhuluma ngakho kwiFacebook. Ngize ngabikela uzakwethu uLerato Kganyago ukuthi ngihlale nginamaphaphu aphezulu ngihlaselwa nawukwesaba ukuthi ngabe yini engahamba kabi.“Okwamanje izinto zingihambela kahle kakhulu emshadweni, emsebenzini nasemndenini wami kodwa kunalokhu kwethuka okuqeda injabulo,” kusho uSomizi.Uthe uvalo lukhona unanokucabanga nangekusasa lakhe yize enza kahle kodwa uba novalo nangemali.Uthe kuze kwaba nemicabango kwabanye yokuthi mhlawumbe akazinikanga isikhathi esanele sokuzilela unina, nakuvumile kodwa wathi akusona isizathu sale nkinga.USomizi uthe lokhu okwenzeka kuye kumele kube yisibonelo nakwabanye abantu ukuthi izinkinga zihlasela wonke umuntu noma ngabe ukweliphi izinga lempilo.“Ngisazilungisa nami, ngifuna nazi ukuthi wonke umuntu nabanemali eningi bayabhekana nalezi zimo, mhlawumbe bangangakhuluma ngakho kodwa kuyenzeka.“Abanemali, abadumile nabahle kakhulu babhekene nezimo ezinzima,” kusho uSomizi.Abantu abaningi bakhombise ukuyithakasela inkulumo yakhe babodwa ebebembonga ngokubavula amehlo.
title: USomizi udalula imfihlo ngezifo ezimhlasele

text: MHLENGI SHANGASEISADTU KwaZulu-Natal isiyalele uMnyango wezeMfundo ukuthi ukhokhele ngokushesha othisha abangaholanga ngomhlaka 15 kule nyanga noma ubhekane nesiteleka.Le nyunyana ithi iningi lo thisha elingaholanga libhekene nenkinga yokudlelwa imizi, izimoto abanye abasayi nasemsebenzini ngoba bengenayo imali.Labo thisha basolwa ngokungezi neziqu zabo ngesikhathi kwenziwa uhlelo lokubalwa kwabasebenzi ukuze kuliwe nabayizipoki.UNobhala weSadtu, uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza, uthe badumele ngendlela umnyango ongabakhathalele ngayo abasebenzi ngokumane umise umholo wabo ungazange uxhumane nezinyunyana.Uthe lo mnyango awuwenzi umsebenzi ngendlela kodwa ujaha ukubambela imali abasebenzi abazikhandlayo.“Othisha abangaholanga iningi labo lalikhona kubalwa kodwa siyaxakeka uma sebebanjelwa imali. Babuye babalawa futhi ngemuva komhlaka 15 kodwa kuze kube imanje abakhokheliwe. Okusimangazayo wukuthi lesi sifundazwe senze kabi kakhulu kwamatric kodwa siyaqhubeka nokulovisa othisha ngokuthi singabakhokheli okunomthelela omubi ekufundeni kwabafundi,” usho kanje.Uthe bafuna baholelwe ngokushesha bese bexoxa nazo zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo ngokuthi lolu hlelo lokubalwa lungenziwa kanjani kungaphazanyiswa ukufunda nokufundisa.“Uma kungukuthi ikhwelo lethu liyazitshwa, sizophoqeleka siyiSadtu ukuthi siteleke baze bakhokhelwe laba basebenzi. Umphakathi kumele wazi ukuthi abasebenzi abekho ephutheni, kodwa umnyango udala impi ngokubabambela imali bangakwazi ukuyisa ibhodwe eziko,” usho kanje.Lolu hlelo lwaqala eminyakeni edlule kanti othisha kudingeka beze neziqu zabo babalwe ukuthi basekhona. Ngisho labo abasebenzela izinyunyana, ithimba lomnyango elisuke lihamba nelikaMgcini-mafa liya emahhovisi liyobala labo basebenzi.Inhloso wukonga imali kungakho-khelwa abasebenzi abangekho, okudla enkulu imali.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe akakholelwa ukuthi kungafinyelela ezingeni lesiteleka ngoba bakhona othisha asebesizakele.“Asikholelwa ukuthi kungaze kufike esitelekeni ngoba bakhona asebefikile bayasizakala. Baba nezivumelwano ezithile abazenzayo nomnyango,” usho kanje.UNgqongqoshe weziMali, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, ekhuluma emsakazweni iSAFM izolo, uthe kunezinhlelo zokuqeda ngezipoki kuhulumeni njengoba kubalwa abasebenzi ukuze kungakhokhelwa abantu abangekho.Uthe lolu hlelo luthela izithelo ngoba kweminye iminyango kuyamiswa imiholo yabantu obekutholakala ukuthi bayizipoki, ukuze kuqedwe ukuchithwa kwemali kahulumeni kungenasidingo.Uqhube wathi inkulu imali ebikhokhelwa izipoki.
title: I-Sadtu ihlongoza isiteleka ngolothisha

text: UDJ ugwazwe ngunogada wafa enxanxatheleni yezitolo eMzimkhulu, bebanga ukungena emathoyilethi akhona ngempelasonto.UDJ Black Culture SA igama lakhe langempela okuwuNtuthuko Mjuqu (21), kuthiwa ugwazwe ngunogada (22) wukule nxanxathela yalezi zitolo ngemuva kwengxabano esuke ngemuva kokuthi uDJ ecele ukungena ethoyilethi engakhokhanga, ngoMgqibelo.Kuthiwa uDJ udabuka eMvubukazi, eMzimkhulu, kodwa ubehlala eMgungundlovu. Kuthiwa utshele unogada obeqaphe amathoyilethi akhokhelwa uR2 ukuthi ucela amvulele angene kodwa akanawo uR2 esikhwameni, unogada wenqaba.Abazibonele ngawabo ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko bathi uDJ usondele lapho kungenwa khona waphusha izinsimbi okuvalwe ngazo, ethi uxineke kakhulu, unogada umnqandile bagcina bephendulana. UDJ kuthiwa uthe akanankinga uzophumela ngaphandle kwenxanxathela yezitolo achithe amanzi khona. UMnuz Thulani Mncwabe, umzala kamufi uthi umufi udlule kuye esitolo asebenza kuso wathi uyothenga izicathulo kwesinye sezitolo kuyo le nxanxathela.“Uthe uzobuya sizoxoxa kahle ngomcimbi azobe edlala kuwo eMthatha. Angibuzanga okuningi nami ngoba uthe uyabuya, akabange esabuya. Ngibizwe sekuthiwa useshonile, ugwazwe ngunogada bebanga ukungena ethoyilethi.Kuthiwa unogada usuke naye emathoyilethi behamba bexabana. Omunye unogada obegade ebhange uze wakhuza wathi unogada akamyeke ahambe umzala,” kusho uMncwabe.Uqhube wathi ngokuzwa kwakhe unogada uyena ogadle kuqala, umzala wakhe waphindisela ngokumbamba emqaleni.“Angiboni ukuthi nakho ukumbamba emqaleni bekungenza umonakalo ngoba umzala ubenesandla esisodwa esisebenzayo esinye esokufakelwa. Unogada kuthiwa ukhiphe ummese ekhukhwini wamgwaza ephindelela washonela lapho. Angazi ukuthi unogada ubewuphatheleni ummese emsebenzini. Ngabe ngiyezwa ukuthi umshaye ngenduku le ephathwa ngonogada noma umbophile. Siphephe kangakanani uma sizogwazwa ngonogada okumele ngabe bayasigada. Ngifuna izwe lonke lazi ukuthi eMzimkhulu siphethwe kanje. Inkampani abeyisebenzela ithe ayisahlangene naye kodwa ugwaze umzala esebenzela yona. Abaphathi benxanxathela yezitolo nabo bazithulele. Naye umsolwa uvele enkantolo wadedelwa ngawo uMsombuluko. Buphi ubulungiswa lapha,” kubuza uMncwabe.UCaptain Nqobile Gwala okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni usiqinisekisile isigameko, wathi kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka ewu-22 ngokugwaza abulale owesilisa oneminyaka ewu-21. Uthe umsolwa uvele enkantolo ngoMsombuluko kodwa akanayo iminingwane yokuthi kwenzekeni enkantolo ngoba idokodo alikabuyi enkantolo.
title: UDJ ugwazwe wunogada wafa ezitolo

text: UMGADLI waMaZulu FC, uBongi Ntuli, ufuna ukuba nesizini engcono eqenjini kulena ezoqala.AmaZulu asanda kuqinisa abagadli bawo ngokusayinisa uLehlohonolo Majoro no-Andre De Jongh. UNtuli uthe akanankinga ngokubanga ijezi nalaba badlali.“Uma ungumdlali umbango uhlezi ukhona yonke indawo. UMajoro uwumgadli onesipiliyoni. Nangesizini edlule ubukhona umbango eqenjini. Ngiyohlezi ngisebenza ngokuzimisela ejimini ukuze ngenze isiqiniseko sokuthi umqeqeshi uyangiqoka ngoba ebona ukuzinikela kimina,” kusho uNtuli kwiHeroes Cup eChesterville ngempelasonto.Lo mdlali ufike kuMaZulu ebolekisiwe yiMamelodi Sundowns kodwa wagcina esengumdlali woSuthu ngokuphelele ngemuva kokuthi ludayisele amaBrazilians * -Emiliano Tade.“Ukubanga nabadlali asebemkantshubomvu kuyangisiza njengomgadli osemncane. Yingakho ngibuka umbango ngendlela eyakhayo. Laba bagadli bayangisiza ukuze nginyuse izinga lomdlalo wami. Kade ngangibanga nabo njengoba bekukhona uSiyabonga Nomvethe noMabhudi Khenyeza abasize kakhulu ekukhuleni kwami,” kuchaza uNtuli.AmaZulu asewaqalile amalungiselelo esizini entsha kanti uNtuli uzimisele ngokwenza kangcono phambi kwamapali."Ngesizini ezayo ngifuna ukuba umgadli ovelele. Ngizosebenza kanzima ukuze ngizuze lokho. Ngesizini edlule angizange ngigculiseke ngoba angikuzuzanga ebengizimisele ngakho. Bengifuna ukushaya amagoli angaphezulu kuka-10 kodwa kwangenzeka. Ngale kwalokho ngijabule ngokuthi sikwaze ukugcina indawo yethu kwiPremier Soccer League phezu kokuphucwa amaphuzu ayisithupha ekuqaleni kwesizini,” kusho uNtuli.Ushaye amagoli ayisithupha kwiligi ngesizini edlule kanti Usuthu lugcine luqede endaweni ka-11 kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership.
title: OwoSuthu  ufuna ukwenza kangcono
